content: Katto katne ngut ki longkmie kiba don ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingshah shukor ha uwei u rangbah uba hikai ïa ka jingïalehkai Martial Art ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Donnie Rani uba pynïaid ïa ka skul hikai Karate, Kickboxing bad kiwei de ki jingïalehkai, ka skul kaba la tip kum ka Meghalaya School of Martial Art, kaba don ha ka shnong Laitkor ha ka dong Kynton U Mon.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Baar, kine ki longkmie kiba kynthup ia ka Kong Sylvia Dkhar, ka Kong Jessica Blah, ka Kong K.Nongkhlaw bad kawei pat longkmie kiba na ka shnong Kharang, ki la kynnoh ba dang ha ka lympung ïakob kaba dang dep long shen ha Deradun, watla ka jingïakob jong ki khynnah rit kiba hap hapoh ka Category Sub Junior kam shym la don satia ka jingïakob, hynrei u Bah Donnie Ranee u la shukor ïa ki ba ka don kane ka jingïakob ha kaba ki kmie ki kpa ki la pynlut ia ka bai leit bai wan jong ki khun namar ynda la poi sha ka lympung ïakob kam shym la don satia ka jingïakhun ha ka Category Sub Junior.Kawei pat ka bynta kaba kine ki longkmie ki la kynnoh pyrshah ïa u Bah Donnie Ranee ka long halor ka jingdawa jong u ia ka bhah na ka pisa jong ki khynnah kiba jop ha ki jingïakob shabar jylla, kiba ïoh khusnam pat na ka sorkar Meghalaya, ha kaba ula dawa ban ioh bhah 10 percent na kiba ki ïoh bad 5 percent na ka Scholarship ba ki ïoh na ka sorkar bad ia kito kiba kyntait ban siew ia kaba u dawa, u beh noh ïa ki.
title: UJOR KI KMIE BA SHAH SHET KI KHUN HA U NONGHIKAI MARTIAL ARTS

content: Ka seng sainpyrthei Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) ka la rai ban pynkut noh ïa ka jingïatreilang bad ka seng sainpyrthei United Democratic Party (UDP) hapoh ka lama jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance hadien ka jingshah rem noh ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ba dang shu dep long shen.Ka HSPDP bad ka UDP ki la pynieng ïa u President barim jong ka HYC u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin kum u kyrtong ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha.Ïa kane ka pyntip da u Working President ka UDP u Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba long ruh u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei.“Ki don bun ki daw halor ka jingbym poi jong u kyrtong ka RDA sha ka thong, bad kata ka daw kumba phi ïohi wat ka HSPDP ruh ka la rai ban weng noh na ka RDA,” ong u Bah Paul.“Namarta kine ki dei ki daw kiba kongsan ba hap ban pdiang.  Mynta ki don bun ki daw bad kawei na kita ki daw ka long ba ngim lah ban trei bha ha ka rukom kaba ngi la leh bad kaba ngi la rai ha ka RDA, ïa ka kyrteng jong u kyrtong la pynbna ha ka khyllipmat ba khatduh, shi snem hadien ba u kyrtong jong ka VPP u la leit rung kylleng ki shnong,” u la ong.Haba kylli, u Bah Paul u la ong, “haoid, ki (HSPDP) la pynpaw ïa ka jingbymmon shuh ban dang ïatreilang hapoh ka RDA. Phi lah ban ong ba ngi pyrkhat ba kata ka dei kaba bha tam da kaba ïaid noh la ka jong ka lynti ba ngim lah ban kynjoh wat tang 5 percent na ka jingïoh vote ha kane ka kynti khamtam jin da lada ïakhun beit tang ka UDP mrawei, lehse ngi lah ban tam ïa kata.  Kine ki dei ki daw.”“Kata ka dei ka jingpynpaw da ka HSPDP bad ngi donkam ban ïakynduh biang ban ïapynbeit ïa kine ki mat,” u la bynrap.
title: PRA KA KTEM RDA, RAI KA HSPDP BAN PYNKUT NOH KA JINGTREILANG BAD KA UDP

content: Ka Employment Monitoring Cell jong ka KSU ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei ka la iakynduh ia u Dean jong ka College of Post Graduate Studies in Agriculture Sciences, Umiam ban pan jingpynshai halor ka jingpyllait ia ka post Library Assistant.Katkum ka Advertisement ba lah  pynlait ha 30.10.2023, ki don ar tylli ki post ba lait na bynta ka post Library Assistant, kawei na bynta ka Unreserved Category bad kawei na bynta ST category ha kaba la shem ba na ki 23 ngut ki Short Listed Candidates ym don satia ka kyrteng jong ki samla na ka Khasi-Jaiñtia category watla ki la plai ia ka kam.Na ka liang jong u Dean ka College u la pynshai ba ki samla Khasi kiba aplai ia kane ka kam ki dei kiba pyndep ia ka Bachelor Degree da kiwei pat ki jingpule bad ki leh ia ka Master jong ki ha ka Library & Information Science bad katkum ka Ordinance jong ka Central Agricultural University (CAU) ba lah pyllait ha 18.10.2023, ki nongthepkam na bynta ka Library Assistant ki dei ban pyndep ia ka Bachelor Degree ha Library & Information Science.Ka Seng ka la pynsngew ha u Dean ba ha ka jylla Meghalaya, ym pat don ka Bachelor Degree na bynta ka Library & Information Science bad kane ka dei kawei na ki daw ba ki samla ka jylla kim shim iohlad ban pyndep ia kane ka jingpule.Ka Seng ka la dawa ban pynsangeh shwa shipor ia ka jingthep kam na bynta ka Library Assistant katba kam pat iohlad ban mudui ban pynkylla ia kane ka Ordinance ban ailad ia ki samla Khasi ban ioh thepkam ha kaba iadei bad kane ka bynta.
title: JAH KYRTENG KI SAMLA KHASI BA APLAI ÎA KA POST LIBRARY ASSISTANT HA PGSAS, UMÏAM

content: Ka Na Rympei FC ka la long ka kynhun ban ïohrah ïa ka nam lahduh ha ka 1st Hynñiewtrep U-16 Football League ba la pynlong da ka Hynñiewtrep Youths’ Council (HYC) Central Body Sports Cell daba pynliem noh ïa ka Tanaw FC lyngba ka jingïashut tie-breaker.Ka jingïalehkai hapdeng kine ki ar kynhun ka la long kaba shongshit bad kaba itynnad. Ha ka jingïakhun ha ka kylla step ka Tanaw FC ka la ïoh ban pynkhih nyngkong ïa ka jar.  Ynda la poi ka jingïakhun ha ka kylla miet bad shwa ban kut ka por sa tang ar minit ka Na Rympei FC ka la lah ban pynïakhaid da kaba ïoh pynkhih ïa ka jar.U Referee uba la rai ban pynïakhun da ka Extra Time hynrei kine ki ar kynhun kim shym la lah satia ban ïoh pynkhih ïa ka jar bad ka jingïakhun ka la shu kut noh da ka jingïashut tie breaker ban rai ïa ka jingjop bad ka jingrem.Ha kane ka sngi, u President Rangbah ka HYC Bah Roykupar Synrem u la long kum ku Kongsan katba u Vice President Bah Donboklang Kharlyngdoh u la long kum u Symbud Kongsan.Ka HYC ka la pynkup burom ruh ïa ki arngut ki samla ka jylla, kata, ïa u samla Niawki Ïakai uba lah wanrah burom ïa ka jylla ha kaba u la ïoh ban long u National Refferee jong ka Wushu bad kum u Coach jong ka Jylla ha ka Wushu bad kynthup ruh ïa u samla Banteilang Jyrwa uba la wanrah burom ïa ka jylla kum u Champion Motor Cross Rider jong ka i.Ïa ka khusnam la sam da u President bad u Vice President jong ka seng.  Ïa ka khusnam Best goalkeeper la rah da u samla Wallamjingsuk Khongshun na ka Na Rympei FC, Best Player la ïoh da u samla Frezio Majaw na ka Tanaw FC bad ïa ka nam top scorer la ïoh da u samla Bankit Mujai na ka Nangïaikiew FC.
title: RAH NAM LAHDUH KA NA RYMPEI FC HA KA 1ST HYNÑIEWTREP U-16 FOOTBALL LEAGUE

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma, ha ka sngi Palei ula pyllait paidbah ïa ka Chief Minister’s Research Grant (CMRG) ban pynshlur ïa ki jingwadbniah hapoh ka Jylla.Ïa ka CMRG la pyllait ha ka jingïalang kaba long ha Secretariat ba la sakhi lang da u Myntri ka tnat Arts & Culture Bah Paul Lyngdoh bad ki ophisar ka Sorkar Jylla.Ka jingthmu jong ka CMRG ka long ban pynshlur ïa ki jingwadbniah ba kynthup ïa ka Arts & Culture, ki jaitbynriew riewlum trai jylla, ka ktien ka thylliej, ka jinghiar pateng, ki jingtei sahnam u menbarim bad kiwei kiwei. Mana kawei pa kawei ka projek ki nongwad bniah kin ïoh ïa ka song pisa ba 3 lak ban pyndep hapoh 10 bnai.Haba kren ha ka jingpyllait paidbah ïa ka CMRG, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K Sangma ula ban jur ïa ka jingkongsan ki jingwad bniah bad jingbuh jingthoh. U la ong, “ngi don ka jingsngew ba ngi duna bha ka jingbuh jingthoh bad ka jingwadbniah. Ka jingwad bniah ba da leh thikna bad ka jingbuh jingthoh ki dei ki mawbyrsiew ïa kiba bun ki kam pynroi. Kane ka sienjam ka thmu ban kyrshan ïa ki scholar bad ki nongwad bniah kiba angnud ban synniang hynrei ki bym don ïa ki nongkyrshan”.“Ngi ïohi ba kane ka jingwad bniah kan dei ka jingai pateng ïa ka jingnang jingtip ka ban ai jingmyntoi ïa ki pateng ki ban wan. Ka jingthmu jong ngi ka long ban nang pynheh ïa kane ka prokram katba nang ïaid ka por. Ngi kwah ban sdang da kaba rit, shemphang na ki bad sa nang pynheh,” ula ong.
title: 3 LAK YN ÏARAP NA KA CMRG ÏA KIBA LEH ÏA KI JINGWADBNIAH HA MEGHALAYA

content: Ka Domsohkhai Sports Club ka la long ka kynhun ka ban iohrah ia ka song pisa kaba T. 1 lak ha ka lympung ialehkai 1st Invitation Footbal Tournament 2024 ba la pyniaid da ka Southern Border Sports Association (SBSA) hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka Nongkdait Nongtwah Sports Club ha ka jingiakhun phainal kaba la long ha madan Panchiring, South West Khasi Hills District ha ka 29 tarik Jylliew, 2024.Ha kane ka sngi u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah kyrmen Shylla u la long kum u Kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u MLA ka Ranikor Constituency u Bah Pius Marwein, u District Sports Officer jong ka South West Khasi Hills District u Bah Damang Syngkon bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ba ka jingpynlong jong ka Southern Border Sports Association ia kane ka lympung ialehkai phutbol ka long ban kyntiew ia ka sap ka phong jong ki samla ha ka jingialehkai phutbol, kata, tang ia ki samla kiba shong basah hapoh ka Ranikor Constituency ha kaba ym shym la shah satia ia kiwei pat ki rangialehkai kiba dei na shabar jong ka Constituency.Lyngba kane ka lympung ialehkai ka Association don jingthmu ruh ban jied ia ki rangialehkai kiba kynsai napoh ka Ranikor Constituency na ka bynta ban iashim bynta ha ki lympung ialehkai phutbol ki ban sa long ha nongbah Shillong.
title: 1 LAK ÏOH KHUR KA DOMSOHKHAI SC HA KA 1ST INVITATION FOOTBALL TOURNAMENT

content: Ki ophisar shipai Border Security Force (BSF) bad Border Guard of Bangladesh (BGB) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la iakynduh lang ha ka jingialang ‘Inspectors General BSF-Region Commanders BGB Level Border Co-ordination Conference’ kaba la sdang naduh ka Lah Sngi u Blei bad ka ban sa kut noh ha ka sngi Palei kaba la long ha Frontier Headquarter BSF, Shillong.Ia kane ka jingialang la ju pynlong manla ka ar snem hapdeng ki ar tylli ki kynhun shipai kiba pahara khappud ban iakren ia ki mat bapher bapher kiba iadei bad ka jingmyntoi lang na ka bynta ka jingiada ia ka khappud kynthup ia ka jingiatreilang ban pyrshah ia ki kam runar ruser ha khappud, ban iathir iatai ki kam pynroi kiba dang sahteng ha ka khappud, ban khanglad bad ban iada ia ka jingjam beain ha khappud.Ha ka jingialang kaba la sdang ha ka sngi ka sngi, ïa ka kynhun jong ki shipai pahara khappud na ka ri Bangladesh la pdiang sngewbha da ki ophisar jong ki BSF ha ICP Dawki bad ha Umpling BSF campus, Shillong.Ïa ka kynhun shipai BGB na ka ri Bangladesh kaba kynthup ïa ki 13 ngut ki ophisar shipai la khlieh da u Md Shazedur Rahman Additional Director General, uba dei u Region Commander jong ka South East, Chattogram.Na ka liang jong ki shipai BSF, la khlieh da u Patel Piyush Purusottam Das, uba dei u Inspector General BSF Tripura Frontier ryngkat ki 12 ngut ki dkhot jong ka BSF na Meghalaya, Silchar bad Tripura Frontiers bad ki nongmihkhmat jong ka Ministry of Home Affairs, Ministry of External Affairs bad NCB.Ha ka sngi pynkut jong kane ka jingialang, yn sa iasoi ruh ia ka Joint Record of Discussion da ki nongialam jong kine ki tylli ki kynhun shipai.
title: ÏASYLLOK KI SHIPAI BSF BAD BDR BAN TEM ÏA KI KAM RUNAR HA KHAPPUD INDIA-BANGLADESH

content: Na na ka daw ka jingthut jong ka jinglong ka suiñbneng bad kaba lah ruh ban dang wanjia ka jingtwa khyndew ha shilynter ka Rngaiñ ka surokbah NH-40 Shillong – Dawki, ka ophis Sub-Divisional Officer (C), Pynursla Civil Sub-Division la ai jingmut ïa ki paidbah ban long kiba phikir bad peitngor haba ïaid na kane ka surok ha kine ki por ba jur slap bad ban kiar ruh katba lada ki kam kim da long kiba donkam eh.Ka ophis Sub-Divisional Officer (C) shuh shuh la ong ba ki bor badei peit ki la khmih bniah bha ïa ka jinglong jingman na ka bynta ban ai ki jingïada ïa ki paidbah.
title: BTHAH U SDO BAN DA HUSIAR HABA ÏAID NA KA SUROK SHILLONG-DAWKI

content: Ia ka met jong u Dhrubajyoti Kalita, uba la ngam jyllop katba u dang jngi ha wah Aradonga, la lap ha ka sngi U Blei.Ia ka met jong Dhrubajyoti Kalita uba la 21 snem ka rta la lap na ka jaka bam khana ha ka shnong Mawkhrang kaba don ha khappud ka jylla Assam-Meghalaya hadien ka jingwad shitom da ki Pulit ka Meghalaya bad ka Search & Rescue Team (SRT) na Meghalaya.U Kalita, ryngkat bad saw ngut ki paralok na ka shnong Milanpur kaba hap hapoh ka Chayagaon Police Station, Kamrup district, ki la leit bam khana ha katei ka jaka ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ. Kane ka kynhun ka la leit jngi ha wah Aradonga, ha kaba u Kalita u la ngam jyllop.
title: NGAM JYLLOP U SAMLA NA BOKO HA JAKA BAM KHANA HA MAWKHRANG

content: Ka kynhun ki nongsam khaw reshon ha East Khasi Hills District ki la pynpaw ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingbthah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ba ki nongsam reshon ki hap ban buh ia ka tarajur thymmai ba la tip kum ka e-scale mashin ban pynbiang thik pa thik ia u khaw reshon haba sam sha ki paidbah.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Danny Langstieh uba dei u dkhot jong ka Fair Price Shop Dealer Association u la ong ba kum ki nongsam khaw reshon kim lah satia ban pdiang ia kane ka jingbthah jong ka sorkar namarba u khaw uba la sam sha ki nongbam khaw reshon u dei uba wan na shabar jong ka jylla bad na ka jaka ba la sei ia u khaw tad haduh ban da pynpoi ha Guwahati u khaw u la nang hap khyndiat pa khyndiat na ka byrni tad haduh ba da pynpoi sha ki dukan sam khaw reshon ha kane ka jylla.U la ong ruh naei ki nongdie khaw reshon kin pynbiang haba u khaw naduh ka jaka ba la sei um biang bad ong ruh ba ki nongsam khaw reshon ki pdiang sngewbha ia ka jingtyrwa jong ka sorkar ban pyntreikam ia ka e-scale machine hynrei u khaw naduh ka jaka ba u wan u dei ban biang beit 50 kilo ha manla ka shi byrni bad um dei satia ban duna ia kata.
title: KHÑIUM KI NONGSAM KHAW RESHON BAN PYNTREIKAM DA KA E-SCALE MACHINE

content: Ka Dorbar Shnong Mawryngkneng ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ïeng pyrshah ïa ka jingai jingkyrshan jong u MLA ka Mawryngkneng Constituency u Bah HS Kharpran ban buh ïa ka Police Checkpost ha surokbah National Highway ba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Mawryngkneng.“Ka jingpyrshah ka long ba ka Checkpost ka wanrah ïa ka jingthud ïa ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah namarba ka dei ka surokbah National Highway ïa kaba ki nongshong shnong ki ju ud na ka por sha ka por,” la ong u Sordar jong ka shnong  Mawryngkneng Bah Peter Lawai ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha Shillong Press Club.“Ka tnat Pulit ka aidaw ba hap ban talasi ïa ki trok kiba kit beain ïa u dewiong bad ngi la ïakren ruh bad u Superintendent of Police hynrei u ong ba hap ban buh beit ïa ka Checkpost,” ong u Bah Lawai.“Ngi kyrpad ïa u MLA ba un ym leh ïa kane ka kam kaba long pyrshah ïa ka rai jong ka Dorbar Shnong Mawryngkneng,: u la bynrap.Katkum ka jingong jong u Bah Lawai, ka Mawryngkneng Police Station ka dang duna ki nongtrei wat ban ai jingshakri ïa ki paidbah bad lada buh sa ïa ka Checkpost ki Pulit kiba dei ban peit ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ, ban ai jingïarap ha ki jingïarap ba kyrkieh ki hap ban bunkam noh ha ka Checkpost bad kin ym lah shuh ban ai jingshakri shi spah na ka shispah.“Ka jingdon jong ka Checkpost ki Pulit kin ym don por shuh wat tang ban leit pahara ha iew ha hat, ha ki shnong ki thaw, ha surok bad ngi ïohi ïa ka jingjyllei ki jingshah tuh masi, tuh sniang ha ki shnong ki thaw, ki kali ba ïaid ha ka surok National Highway ki shah lute, ki nongniah kali ki shah shoh bad shah pynmynsaw. Kane ka dei kaba ngim kwah ban don ïa ka Check post,” la pynpaw u Sordar ka shnong Mawryngkneng.“Haba don kino kino ki jingjia bad ki jingkulmar ha ki shnong ki thaw bad ki jingjia bapher bapher khamtam haba ïohkem ïa ki nongkhaii drok bad ki nongdih drok lada ngin pyntip sha ki Pulit ka jingjngai kaba tang 50 mitar kan bam por shiteng kynta haduh shi kynta ban ïoh jubab. Ka daw ka long ba ym don briew bad ki briew ki don lut ha Checkpost.Lada ka long ha kane ka dur, ka Police Station kaba don ha Mawryngkneng kan ai jingshakri tang ïa ka Check post ne kan ai jingshakri ïa u paidbah,” la buh jingkylli u Bah Lawai.“Lada ki ong ban talasi ïa ki briew kiba wan nabar, ha Byrnihat ka don ka Anti-Infiltration Check Gate, ha Ratacherra ka don ka Anti-Infiltration, kata ka dei ka kamram jong ki (Pulit) bad lada ki sngew ba ka don ka jingma ban kem ïa kino kino kiba suba sniew shipor ki lah ban buh ïa ki Checking Point,” u la ong bad bynrap.Halor kane ka jingpyrshah ïa ka Checkpost, u Bah Lawai u la ïathuh ba kum ki nongïalam shnong kin sa leit pynsngew hakhmat ka Director General of Police ka Jylla ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang.“Lada ka tnat Pulit, ka tnat Kam Pohïing bad u MLA ki leh pyrshah ïa kane ka jingpyrshah jong ka Dorbar Shnong ngim banse na ka liang jong ki nongshong shnong ngin ym ïashim bynta shuh ha ki jingïalang bad ka tnat Pulit hapoh ka Mawryngkneng Police Station.”U la ïathuh ba ka jingmut jong ka Dorbar Shnong ka long ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingdon jong ki nongtrei ha Mawryngkneng Police Station namar ka jingkharoi ki jingsniew na ka jingjyllei jong u drok. “Ngi ai jingmut ruh ba ka Sorkar ban buh noh da uwei u Officer on Special Duty bad ki Staff jong u ban peit beit thik tang ïa ka NDPS Case. Kumno ujuh u ophisar un peit ïa ka Criminal Case, Civil Case, Drug Case.  Ka thaiñ Mawryngkneng ka dei ïa ka National Highway bad nongdie drok kiba nabar ki wan na ka por sha ka por bad ki pynjah burom ïa ka shnong ka thaw namarba ngim shym la ïohi ba ka Sorkar kan buh beit thik tang ïa u ophisar uba peit beit thik tang ïa u drok,” u la ong shuh shuh.U la ai jingmut ruh ïa ka Sorkar ba kan kyntiew ïa ka jingïarap pisa ïa ki Village Defence Party (VDP) namarba ki she jingeh ban treikam lada ym don ki lad jingïarap.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka Dorbar Shnong ka la kyntu ïa ka tnat Pulit ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka Women Police Cell ha Mawryngkneng Police Station bad ban ki Pulit pynïaid kali ban telakam ïa ka jingniah stet ki kali ban lait na ki jingjia ba sngewsih ïa ki paidbah ha surokbah.
title: PYRSHAH KA DS MAWRYNGKNENG BAN BUH CHECKPOST HA SUROK NATIONAL HIGHWAY

content: : Ka Joint Action Committee ki khun ki hajar ka Hima Sohiong ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la kyrpad ia ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ban pyndep noh hapoh shi bnai ia ka jingjied ia u Lyngdoh bathymmai jong ka Hima Sohiong.Ka Executive Committee jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ha ka 14 tarik, Jylliew, 2024 ka la pynmih ia ka jingpynbna sha ka Hima Sohiong baroh kawei hadien ka jingkhmih bniah ia ka kaiphod tohkit jong u Inquiry Officer la shem ba u Bah Banshemphang Thabah u la pynkheiñ ia ka Section-6 jong ka United Khasi and Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District (Appointment and Succession of Chief and Headmen) Act, 1959.Ha kane ka jingpynbna u Deputy Secretary jong ka Executive Committee ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council u la pyntip ba la weng noh shi syndon ia u Bashemphang Thabah kum u Lyngdoh jong ka Hima Sohiong katkum kane ka kyndon.Ia mynta ia ka synshar ka khadar hapoh ka Hima Sohiong la peit bad pyniaid da u Acting Lyngdoh.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Purningstar Shabong uba dei u Chairman jong ka JAC ki khun ki hajar ka Hima Sohiong u la ong ba ka jingjied ia u Lyngdoh ba thymmai jong ka Hima Sohiong ka dei ban long da ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima Sohiong ym shuh da ki Saw Lyngdoh kumba ju long ha ki snem ba la leit noh.“Ngi sngewthuh lada ym don hi u Lyngdoh bapura ka lah ban buh jingeh ia kiba bun.  Ka jingdon jong u Acting Lyngdoh um lah satia ban weng ia ka jingeh jong ki khun ki hajar ka Hima. Dei na kata ka daw ngi kwah ba ka District Council kan pynkloi ban buh tarik bad ban pynbna noh kham kloi ia ka elekshon jied Lyngdoh hapoh ka Hima Sohiong,” u la ong.
title: HAPOH SHI BNAI ANGNUD KI PAID KA HIMA SOHÏONG BAN ÏOH ÏA U LYNGDOH THYMMAI

content: : Ka Dorbar Shnong Mawryngkneng ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u District Veterinary Officer ka East Khasi Hills da kaba tyrwa ban ai skhim jingiarap shwa ia ki nongri jingri kiba la tbit ha ka kam ri jingri ha ka shnong Mawryngkneng.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Sordar jong ka shnong Mawryngkneng Bah Peter Lawai u la iathuh ba  ka jingkyrpad ia u District Veterinary Officer ka long ban pynbiang ia ki dawai dashin ha ka Veterinary Dispensary ha Mawryngkneng khnang ban pynsuk ia ki nongri jingri bad iathuh ruh ba ki don ki nongri jingri kiba ladep ioh jinghikai pyntbit kiba lah ban iada ia ki jingri jingdub bad ban sumar haba wan lynshop ki khlam jingpang bapher bapher.“Ka jingbym don ki dawai bad ki drip na ka bynta ki sniang, ki syiar, ki masi ka la pynduh mynsiem ia ki nongri jingri,” u la ong.U la iathuh ruh ba ka jingkyrpad ka long ban kham pynbun ia ki nongtrei ha Veterinary Dispensary naduh ki Staff bad ki VFA ba kin dup lah ban ai ka jingshakri kaba kham bha ia ki nongri jingri.Ka Dorbar Shnong Mawryngkneng ka la kyrpad ia u DVO ban pynioh ia ka Training Hall kaba pura hapoh ka Veterinary Dispensary Office khnang ban dup ai jinghikai bad jingpynshai sha ki nongri jingri ban sngewthuh kham bha ia ka kam ri jingri.U la iathuh ruh ba ka jingkyrpad ka long ban buh ia ka Boar Semen Collection Centre bad ka Demonstration FarmU la ong ruh haba wan ki jingmyntoi na ka sorkar, dei ban ai nyngkong shwa sha ki nongri jingri kiba la sdang la kham slem ia ka kam ri jingri bad kiba la don ia ki syrnot ba la pyndep ia ka jingshah hikai pyntbit bad kiba don ruh ia ka mon ban ri jingri bad ka jingpynshisha na u Veterinary Officer shwa ban ioh ia ka skhim ri jingri.Kawei na ki mat kaba kham kongsan, ka dei ka jingpyniaid iew ia ki jingri.  Ka Dorbar Shnong ka la kyrpad ia u DVO ban wanrah noh da ka Marketing Cell ha ka jaka jong ka Pig and Poultry Farm khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi hi ia ki paidbah ha ka iohkam iohjam da kaba die ia ki pylleng bad ka doh sniang.
title: AI SKHIM SHWA ÏA KI NONGJRI JONGRI BA LA TBIT, TYRWA KA DS MAWRYNGKNENG ÏA U DVO

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Anti Narcotic Task Force ka East Khasi Hills ryngkat ki Pulit jong ka Mawryngkneng Police Station kiba la ioh jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ha ka sngi Thohdieng mynta ka taiew ki la pynlong ia ka jingtalasi ia ki kali ha Mawryngkneng Police Station bad iohkem ia uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u B. Lallianzama 36 snem ka rta uba shong basah ha Law u Sib, Madanrting, Shillong.Ha ka jingtalasi ia ka kali, ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup 1,00,000 (shi lak) tylli ki suba dawai kuli Yaba kiba khia 10.122 kilo.Ki Pulit ki la kurup ruh ia kawei ka Mobile Phone bad kawei ka kali Maruti BREZZA kaba don ia u nombar ML05-P-3646.Ki Pulit ki la register case ha Mawrynkneng Police Station hapoh ka Section 22(C)29 jong ka NDPS Act.
title: 1 LAK TYLLI KI DAWAI KULI YABA KURUP KI PULIT NA U SNAR KHAIÏ DROK

content: : Khnang ban lap ia ka jingdon jong u khñiang jingpang HIV/AIDS ha ki longkmie kiba armet, ka Maternal & Child Health Hospital (MCH), Jowai bad ka Meghalaya Aids Control Society, Shillong ha ka sngi Baar ka la plie paidbah ia ka Integrated Counselling Testing Centre (ICTC) ha MCH Hospital, Jowai.Ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi lang da u Superintendent jong ka MCH Jowai Dr. E. War, ka Project Director jong ka MACS ka Dr. B. Decruse, u Incharge DM&HO West Jaintia Hills District Dr. K Dhar nalor kiwei kiwei.Ka Dr. B. Decruse ha ka jingkren lamkhmat, ka la iathuh ba ka Integrated Counselling Testing Centre (ICTC) ka dei ka jaka ban pynlong ia ka jingiasyllok bad ki briew na ka bynta ban batai halor u khñiang jingpang HIV bad ia ka jingdonkam ban leh tes ia ka snam khnang ban tip la ki don ne kim don ia u khniang jingpang HIV katkum ka mon sngewbha ka jong ki bad ka pynthikna ba ia ka kaiphod jong ka jingleh tes snam yn tip tang u nongpang bad u doktor uba u sumar sukher ia ki.Ka jingleh test ha kane ka ICTC ha MCH Hospital, Jowai kan sdang naduh ka jingleh ia ka Medical Checkup tad haduh ban da kha ia ki khunlung bad lada lap ba ki don ia u khniang jingpang yn sdang noh mardor ia ka jingsumar khnang ba u khniang un ym hiar sha ki khunlung katba ki dang don hakpoh ka kmie.
title: BAN LAP ÏA KIBA DON HIV/AIDS LA PLIE ÏA KA ICTC BAN LEH TEST ÏA KI LONGKMIE BA ARMET

content: Ka Hynniewtrep Youths’ Council (HYC) Seng Kmie ha ka sngi Palei ka la phah biang sa lai ngut ki samla kiba la im kyrni ha ka jingdih drok ban ïoh jingsumar ha ka Alive Again Foundation, ka Rehabilitation Centre kaba don ha ka jylla Assam.U General Secretary ka HYC Bah Isaac W Basaïawmoit u la ong, naduh ka 2 tarik Jymmang 2024 ba la pynbna ïa ka thma ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa u drok, ka seng khlem shongthait, ka la leit sha kylleng ki jaka ym tang ban khynra ne thang ïa u drok hadien ba la kynrup na ki nongdih drok hynrei ka seng ka la sneng la kraw bad la phah ruh ïa kine ki samla sha ki Rehabilitation Centre hadien ba la ai jingmynjur na ki bahaiing jong kine ki samla.Kane ka dei ka wat kaba phra bad kumba 24 ngut ka seng ka la phah ïa ki samla ba la im kyrni ha u drok ban leit shah sumar ha kane ka Rehabibilitaion Centre kaba don ha  Assam khnang ba kin ïoh biang ïa ka jingim ba thymmai.
title: SHA REHAB CENTRE, ASSAM PHAH SUMAR KA HYC ÏA LẠI NGUT KI SAMLA KYRNI DIH DROK

content: Uwei u rangbah Garo ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Tripash Sangma uba shong basah ha 12 mer Jorabad, Ri-Bhoi District u la duh ia la ka jong ka jingim hadien ba u la shah iuh ha ka trok ha Lad Umroi ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ha ka por kumba 9:00 baje mynstep.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum, la iathuh ba u Tripash Sangma u la mih na la ing da ka Scooty kaba don ïa u number AS01-EA7149 bad la u jong u khun uba la tip kyrteng kum u Master Moncembirth Marak ban leit shim ia ka Migration Certificate, hynrei ynda poi ha Lad Umroi u la iakynduh pynban ia ka jingjia kaba sngewsih hadien ba ka trok kaba don ïa u number NL01-AB-9291 ba la ñiah da u Sunil Kumar Jha na Kamrup Assam ka la tynrah ïa ka Scooty bad iuh ïa u Tripash Sangma haduh ba ka met kan da lwet katba u khun pat u la mynsaw jur ha kane ka jingjia.Ia une u khun uba la mynsaw la pynkit noh sha Umsning CHC bad ki Pulit ki la rah noh ia ka met jong u Tripash Sangma sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh na ka bynta ban leh ïa ka Post Mortem.  Ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia ka la ïaid shakhmat.
title: LWET KA MET U RANGBAH GARO BA SHAH ÏUH HA KA TROK HA LAD UMROI

content: Da ki spah ngut ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka thain Umden, Ribhoi District ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la wan poi kyndit ha ka jaka shah thngan jong ka Kong Bindas Syiem ha Parking Lot kaba don markhap bad ka Ophis Additional Secretatiat, Shillong ban pynrem jur ia ka Sorkar MDA namarba ka jingleh matlah ha kaba iadei bad ka jingjot rathai jong ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur.La sakhi ba ki paidbah ka thain Umden kiba la wan poi kynsan ha kane ka jaka ki la rah ruh da ki plakad ban pyrta shla da ki sur ba pynrem ia ka Sorkar ba la ialam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP), ia u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Sangma, ia u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u Bah Prestone Tynsong bad ia u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Ritu Raj Ravi halor ka jingthombor ia ka jaka shah thngan ka kong Bindas ha miet 9 tarik mynta u bnai.U Chairman ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Raid Nongtluh Bah Matthias Syiem ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba ka jingwan paidbah sha Shillong ban ai jingkyrshan ia ka Kong Binda ka dei ka rai kaba la shim ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha madan Mathana ba la pynlong da ka Nongtluh Mathan Development Forum (NMDF) ryngkat ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Raid Nongtluh.Haba kylli u la iathuh ba ki paidbah kiba iashim bynta ha kane ka jingwan kiew sha nongbah Shillong ki dei na ki 100 tylli ki shnong jong ka thain Umden.U la ong ruh ba lada ka kam ka dawa, ki nongialam jong ka Synjuk bad ki paidbah ka thaiñ Umden ki lah ban synran da kaba shong shah thngan lang bad ka Kong Bindas ha nongbah Shillong.
title: TUR KYNSAN KI PAIDBAH KA THAIÑ UMDEN HA JAKA SHAH THNGAN KA KONG BINDAS

content: Ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Kur ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep ka la pynïar ïa ki shnat treikam da kaba pynïar tnat ha kylleng ka Bri u Hynniewtrep kynthup ha East Khasi Hills, West Khasi Hills South West Khasi Hills bad ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ la pynkha ïa kane ka shnat treikam ha Jaiñtia Hills.Ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Ïalong Dorbar Hall la pynshai shaphang ka jingthmu jong ka Synjuk ban ïada ïa ki riti dustur tynrai ba la kren da u Bah Erwin K Syiem Sutnga bad u Bah Raphael Warjri.  Hadien ka jingkren da kine ki rangbah la ïashim bynta ruh da kiwei kiwei ki rangbah na ka thaiñ ha kaba ki la kdew byllai ki jingeh ba ïa tyngkhuh ha ka imlang sahlang kiba la ktah shibun khamtam ha kaba la khynra ïa ki riti dustur tynrai da ki briew ba shim kabu ban myntoi lyngba ka khaii pateng bad kiwei kiwei ki jingmyntoi kum ki riewkum jong ka jylla.Ka Synjuk ba la seng ha u snem 2019 mynba u Bah H.S Shylla u dang long u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ka la maitphang ban buhti da ki atiar jong ka aiñ ban shna ki aiñ-rew kiba dei ban ïada ïa ka jaitbynriew.  Haduh mynta kita ki aiñ-rew ki dang sahteng ha ka Sorkar Jylla bad khlem pat ïoh ka jingmynjur na u Lat ka jylla ban pynlong aiñ pura. Jar la katta ka jingpyrshang ka dang ïaid shitrhem shaphrang ban kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ban pynurlong ïa ka jingthrang jong ki paidbah ka jylla.Ha kajuh ka rukom ki rangbah na rilum Jaiñtia ruh ki la ïa synrop lang ha kata ka jingthmu bad la rai synrop ban phah ki jynthoh sha ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) na ka bynta ban pynlong aiñ noh kham kloi.Ha kane ka jingïalang la jied ruh ïa ki nongkitkam jong ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Kur ka Bri u Hynñtrep kaba la jer da ka Dorbar ki Waheh Kur Ri Jaiñtia.Ki nongkitkam ki long u  Bah Khroo Lamsalanki Pariat kum u  President, Bah Pyrkhat Shylla bad Bah D Donstan Khonglah kum ki Vice President, Bah Hamkhian Dkhar kum u General Secretary, Bah Gremalin H Bareh kum u Assistant Secretary, Bah Abutt Nelson Muksor kum u Treasurer, Bah Standbyme Sari kum u Media Secretary bad baoh ki rangbah kum ki longsan mansan ha ka Dorbar Nongkitkam kiba dei artat ki khlieh rangbah jong ki kur lajong ha la ki thaiñ.Shuh shuh ka Synjuk ka la pynkhreh ruh ban ïashem bad ki Rangbah Kur na ka thaiñ Ri Bhoi ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai ha Shillong na ka bynta ban pynkha sa ïa ka shnat ha Ri Bhoi.Khyndiat bnai mynshwa ka la don ka jingïasyllok bad ki Rangbah Kur na Ri Bhoi na ka bynta kane bad la khmih lynti ba yn sa urlong noh kloi lan khamtam ba la thmu ban pynlong ïa ka Dorbar Pyllun ha u bnai Nailar 2024.Na ka liang ka shnat na Jaiñtia Hills la pynkhreh ban pynskhem ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai ynda la pynbiang da ki nongkitkam thymmai.
title: HA RILUM JAIÑTIA LÀ PYNKHA ÏA KA SHNAT TREIKAM KA SYNJUK KI RANGBAH KUR KA BRI U HYNÑIEWTREP

content: : Ka National People’s Party kaba bat ia u lakam synshar ha ka jylla ka la mad ia ka jakhom khait hadien ba ki arngut ki kyrtong na Shillong bad na Tura ki la shah pynliem lyndang ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ba la niew vote ha ka sngi Baar.Ka Sitting MP jong ka Tura ka Agatha K Sangma bad ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba la long ruh ka Myntri Sorkar ka Jylla bad ka kyrtong na Shillong ki la mad ia ka jingshah rem ha kane ka elekshon.Ha Shillong, u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon na ka Voice of the People Party u la pynrem ïa u Sitting MP u Bah Vincent H. Pala na ka seng Congress da kaba tam haduh 3.7 lak ki vote, kaba dei ka jingjop kaba tam bun bha kaba la don ha ka jylla.U Dr. Syngkon u la ïoh palat 5.68 lak ki vote bad u la long u namtam ha ka jingiakhun bad pynliem ruh ia ka kyrtong ka NPP ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, ia u kyrtong ka UDP Bah Robert June Kharjahrin, bad ia ki arngut ki kyrtong shimet ba kynthup ia u Prof. Lakhon Kma bad ia u Bah Peter Shallam.Ki paidbah kiba thep ha u NOTA ki long 11008 vote.Ha Tura, ka Agatha ka la shah pynliem ha u kyrtong jong ka Congress u Saleng A. Sangma uba la tam haduh 1.55 lak vote na ka jingdon kiba nong thep vote haduh 6.74 lak ngut.Ka Agatha ka la ïoh 2.28 lak vote na ka Tura Lok Sabha Constituency kaba don 24 tylli ki Assembly Constituency.Ha u snem 2019, u Bah Pala u la ïoh 53 per cent na ki vote (4.19 lakh) na Shillong Seat katba mynta ka kynti u Dr. Syngkon u la ïoh 58 percent na ka jingdon jong ka vote.U Nongïalam ka National People’s Party bad u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma haba kren ha ka rynsan X u la ai khublei ïa ki arngut ki MP kiba thymmai na Meghalaya, kata, ia u Saleng A. Sangma bad ia u Dr Ricky Syngkon.U Conrad u la ong, ‘ngi pdiang ïa ka rai jong ki paidbah bad nga ai khublei ïa u Saleng A Sangma bad u Dr. Ricky Andrew J. Syngkon ba kin lah ban trei bha ha kane ka kam kaba thymmai.”
title: JOP KPUT U DR. RICKY A. J. SYNGKON, LIEM LYNDANG KI SITTING MP NA SHILLONG BAD TURA

content: Ka jingduna jong ka BJP ban ioh ia ka jingbun paid ha ka Ingdorbar Thawain Lok Sabha, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bihsar u Nitish Kumar u la long mynta kum u ‘kingmaker’ ha kaba ka seng sainpyrthei jong u, ka Janata Dal (United), ka la jop 12 seat ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ba la niew vote ha ka sngi Baar.U Nitish Kumar u dei ruh uwei na kiba la don bynta ban pynkha ia ka INDIA Bloc ryngkat ka jingiatreilang ka seng Congress, TMC bad kiwei kiwei ki party.  U Nitish u la phet noh sha ka NDA ba la lamkhmat da ka BJP hadien ba la mih ka jingiapher jingmut ha ka kynhun India Block.Ka JD(U), kaba iakhun na ki 16 tylli ki Seat hapoh ka shatri jong ka National Democratic Alliance (NDA), ka la jop sa ar tylli ki seat na kaba la khmihlynti.  Da kane ka jingjop, u Kumar u la long u nongialam sainpyrthei ba ki khmat baroh ki phai sha u.Sa uwei pat u dkhot jong ka NDA u dei u Chirag Paswan uba ialam ia ka Lok Janshakti Party (Ram Vilas) kaba la jop san seat.U nongialam jong ka Rashtriya Janta Dal (RJD) u Manoj Jha uba long ruh u MP ka Rajya Sabha  u la pynkynmaw ba kumno u Kumra u la leh ia ka bynta kaba kongsan tam ha ka jingpynkha ia ka INDIA bloc ba la lamkhmat da ka Congress ha kane ka elekshon Lok Sabha.“Ngi la thaw ia ka kynhun bad u Nitish Kumar. Ngi tip ba u ju pynsngew ia ki jingbym sngewiahap ia ki jingleh donbor ha ka sainpyrthei da ka BJP,” u la ong.  Dang khyndiat sngi, u nongialam jong ka RJD u Tejashwi Yadav u la ong ba kan sa jia ka jingjia kaba khraw ha ka sainpyrthei ha Bihar hadien ka jingniew vote jong ka elekshon Lok Sabha.Ki nongialam jong ka JD(U) ki iathuh ba ka party kan iaineh beit bad ka NDA bad kan sa leit ban iashim bynta ruh ha ka jingialang jong ka NDA ka ban sa long ha Delhi ha ka 5 tarik mynta u bnai.Na ki 40 tylli ki seat ha Bihar, ka paralok jong ka NDA ka Rashtriya Lok Morcha ba la lamkhmat da u Upendra Kushwaha ka la shah pynliem ha ka Karakat Seat, katba u nongialam ka Hindustani Awam Morcha (Secular) u Jitan Ram Manjhi u la jop na Gaya (reserved) Seat da kaba pynliem ia uba iakhun pyrshah u Kumar Sarvajeet uba la pynieng da ka RJD.Ha kane ka elekshon Lok Sabha ha Bihar, ka Janata Dal (United) ka la jop 12 seat, ka BJP ka la jop 12 seat, ka Janshakti Party(Ram Vilas) ka la jop 5, ka Rashtriya Janata Dal ka la jop 4 seat, ka Congress 3seat, ka Communist Party of India (Marxist-Leninist) (Liberation) 2 seat, ka Hindustani Awam Morcha (Secular) 1 seat bad Independent 1seat.
title: ELEKSHON LOK SABHA 2024: KYLLA ‘KINGMAKER’ U NITISH KUMAR BAN RAI THAW SORKAR HA DELHI

content: :  U President jong ka Hynniewtrep Youths Council u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem ha ka sngi Baar u la leit hajir hakhmat ki Pulit jong ka Sadar Police Station hadien ba u la shah pynngat ha ki kyndon jong ka Meghalaya Maintenance of Public Order (MMP) bad ha ki kyndon jong ka Indian Penal Code (IPC) tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba ki dkhot ka HYC ki la leit ban kyndang bad ban pynra ïa ki ïing sah beaiñ jong ki poiwir ha Lum Survey dang shen.Wat hapdeng ka jingther jong u slap, la sakhi ba ki dkhot jong ka HYC ki la leit synran ia u Bah Synrem shwa ba un rung shapoh thanat ha kaba ki Pulit kim shym la shah satia ia ki dkhot ban rung shapoh ka phyllaw jong ka thanat hynre la bthah ia ki ban ap shabar ka phalor jong ka thanat.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Synrem u la ong kum ki nongialam jong ka seng kiba trei na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ka jaidbynriew kin ngat beit ha ki jingshah pynngat kyndon hynrei watla katta kum ka seng kan ieng skhem ban trei bad ban shakri ia ki paidbah khamtam eh ha kaba iakhun thma pyrshah ia u drok.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ba sa arngut ki nongialam jong ka seng ba kynthup ia u Vice President bad ia u General Secretary kin sa khot hajir ha ki Pulit ha ki khyndiat sngi ki ban sa wan.
title: ISHU LUM SURVEY: LEIT HAJIR U PREIDENT KA HYC HAKHMAT KI PULIT KA SARDAR PS

content: : Ki ophisar ka ophis Customs (Preventive) Headquarter, Shillong kiba la hiar sha ka shnong Biswanath Chariali, Assam ha ka sngi Balang mynta ka taiew ki la ioh ban kurup saw tylli ki bniat Hati kiba khia 27.992 kilo bad kine ki bniat ki dei jong ki Hati na ka ri India.Ia ki bniat Hati la pynhap hapoh jong ka aiñ Wildlife Protection Act (WLPA), 1972 bad la kem hapoh ka kyndon 50 jong ka WLPA, 1972.  Ia ki bniat hati la aiti noh sha ka tnat Wildlife.Ka Ophis Custom ka la ai khublei ia ki Pulit jng ka Biswanath Police Station bad ia ka tnad khlaw kiba la synran lang ban ioh kurup ia ki bniat Hati.Katkum ka Wildlife Protection Act (ba la pynbeit thymma) naduh ka 1 tarik, Iaiong, 2023 la ai bor shuh shuh ia ka ophis Custom ban iakhun pyrshah ia ka jingiakhaii  tuh ia ki mrad khlaw hapoh ka Ri India.  Halor kane bor ba la pynkup ka ophis Customs ka la kham ioh lad ban iakhun pyrshah ia kane ka jingiakhaii beain  ia ki mrad khlaw.Mynta hapoh shisnem ka ophis Customs (Preventive), HQ, Shillong ki la ioh ban kurup ia ki Kerbei kiba la kot haduh  68.87 kilo bad  11.536 kilo jong Ambergris Whale Vomit bad kurup ruh 360 gram bniat Hati bad ka khlieh jong  u sim Kohkarang, ka sim  Flame, khun shrieh Orangutan.  Ia kine ki mrad la iada hapoh ka Wildlife Protection Act, 1972, kaba trei kam ha Meghalaya, Mizoram bad  Assam.Ka ophis Custome ka la kut jingmut ban ia khun pyrshah ia ka jingkhaii beain ia ki mrad khlaw ha khappud  bad kiwei ki kam sniew bad kin iatreilang ruh bad kiwei ki kynhun kiba iada na kane ka jingkhaii beain ia ki mrad khlaw.
title: KURUP KA OPHIS CUSTOM ÏA KI BNIAT  HATI NA ASSAM, SHAH KEM U SNAR KHAÏI TUH

content: U Archbishop jong ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh ha ka sngi U Blei u la plie bad pynkhamti ia ka Parish Thymmai ba la ai kyrteng “Mary Our Help Christian,” Mawpdang, East Khasi Hills District ha u Rev. Fr. Sebastian Tirkey kum u Parish Priest bathymmai.Kane ka dei ka Parish kaba 43 ha ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong kaba don ha New Shillong Township ia kaba la saindur  ha ka rukom kaba kyrpang namarba ki paidriewngeit ki dei ki la pynkhreh bha ban pdiang ia ka jingwan jong ka Parish ba la sakhi da ki hajar ngut ki paidriewngeit.Ka Balang Mawpdang baroh shikatta ka hap hapoh ka Parish Sts. Peter and Paul kumba 27 snem bad u Archbishop Victor u la ibit ban ai Parish. Hapdeng ka jingphyrnai jong ka bneng ki Lyngdoh bad ki Riewniam shynrang bad kynthei ki la ioh bynta ia ka Mass Bakhuid.U Rev. Fr. Barnes Mawrie uba dei u Asst. Parish Priest jong ka Parish Mawpdang u la don lang ha kane ka sngi kynthup ruh u Rev. Fr. Laurence Nongkseh u Parish Priest jong ka Pynthorumkhrah Parish, u Provincial jong ka Shillong Province bad kiwei kiwei.Ka Parish Mawpdang ka dei kaba pynkha na ka Parish Pynthorumkhrah Sts. Peter & Paul bad ka dei ka Parish balai hadien ka Mawpat Parish.U Archbishop Victor Lyngdoh haba plie ia ka Parish ha Mawpdang u la pynbna ba u Sohblei Sebastian Tirkey un long kum u nongsharai mynsiem banyngkong ban peit ban jngoh ia ki paid u Blei ha kane ka Parish ha kaba u la pynkhamti ryngkat ka pynkup bor katkum ka iktiar jong ka Canon Law jong ka Balang Catholic.U Archbishop u la ai bor ha u Rev. Fr. Sebastian Tirkey da ka jingphla jingngeit jong ki Apostle, ka jingkular ban shakri ia ki paid u Blei, ka jingdoh ieid ia ki saw tduh dong ka duwan, nangta la ialam sha ka khet jingphla bad ka jingaiti  ia u shabi jong ka Parish ha u nongsharai banyngkong.Hadien ba la pynkhamti ia u Sohblei Sebastian Tirkey ia ka bor jong Balang , u Vicar General jong ka Jylla Niam bah Shillong u Rev. Fr. Richard Manbha Majaw  u la pynbna ia ki kyndon bad ia u pud u sam jong ka Parish thymmai kaba iatakhuh  ia ki Parish bamarjan kum ka Mawryngkneng, ka Mawpat, ka Nongrah bad ka Mawbri Parish.Nangta, u Archbishop u la ai ia ka dulir ia kaba la shon muhor da u Archbishop Victor Lyngdoh bad ka jingsoi ia ki dulir. Ka jingplie Parish ha Mawpdang ka dei ka jingkylla jong ka por bad kaba don ka khanatang ha Jylla Niam Bah Shillong ha ka jingdon jong ki Parish Oriest na ki Parish ba markhap.Ka Mawpdang Parish kan duh noh ia ka Balang Mawkasiang kaba la shah pyniasnoh sha ka Mawpat Parish bad ka Parish Mawbri ka ioh noh ia ki Balang shnong Mawkhanu, Lumdiengngan, Wahmyntait baroh shi katta ba la peit da ka Mawpat Parish.Ka khanatang jong ka Balang Mawpdang ka dei kaba la dap 100 snem tam ha kaba ka Balang ka la poi ha u snem 1917 lyngba u Apostol ka ri Khasi u Rev. Fr. Sohblei Vendrame, u Rev. Fr. Ussai,  u Rev. C. Attard, u Rev. Fr. Peter Schiavon kiba dei ki mishoneri na ka ri Italy.
title: PYNBNA U ARCHBISHOP VICTOR LYNGDOH ÏA KA PARISH THYMMAI HA MAWPDANG

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ha ka sngi Balang ka la dawa ïa ka North-Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS) ban kyntiew ïa ka Seat pule MBBS bad Nursing na ka bynta ki samla pule na kane ka jylla Meghalaya ka ban sdang naduh ka samoi pule kaba mynta.Ha ka dorkhas ba la aiti ha u Director jong ka Institute, u President ka HYC u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la ng ba ka jingdon jong ki Seat pule na ka bynta ka MBBS ha NEIGRIHMS ba la mang tang na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya katkum ka Admission Notice ha u snem 2023-2024 ka long tang 14 Seat na ki 50 seat.Ïa ka jylla Nagaland la ai 10 Seats bad la ai paidbah sha baroh ki jylla ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi kynthup ïa ka Sikkim 18 seat. Kumba ka long, kiwei kiwei ki jylla ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi kynthup ïa ka Nagaland ki dei kiba la don la ki jong ki Medical College ha ki Jylla jong ki.“Namarkata, ngi dawa ba ki Seat na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya dei ban kyntiew naduh ka samoi pule kaba mynta,” u la ong.U Bah Synrem u la kdew ba ka NEIGRIHMS ka don ïa ka College of Nursing ha ka jingpule M.Sc Nursing bad B.Sc Nursing Courses kaba don haduh 10 seat bad 50 Seat.“Hynrei, ym shym la mang satia ïa ki Seat na ka bynta ki samla pule ka jylla Meghalaya ha kine ki ar tylli ki Course. Namarkata,  ngi dawa ïa ka Institute ba kan shimkhia mardor ban mang kyrpang ïa ka Seat na ka bynta samla pule riewlum ritpaid jong ka Jylla Meghalaya naduh ka samoi pule ojng u snem 2024 bad ban pynshong nongrim na ka Merit List jong ka All India NEET examination,” u la ong.Ka HYC ka la dawa ruh ïa ka Institute ban pynbeit thymmai ïa ka Recruitment Rules (RRs) lyngba ka Advertisement kaba la pynmih ha ka 17 tarik, Risaw, 2023 kaba dei na ka bynta ka jingthung ha ka kam Store Keeper.“Da kaba buh ïa ki kyndon jong ka “Possessing Diploma/Degree in Materials Management/Warehousing Management/Purchasing /Logistics/ Public Procurement from recognised University/ Institute”…ka dei ka jingpyrshang jong ka Management ban kyntait khamtam ïa ki nongthep kam trai jylla kiba la trei da ki snem ha ka kam ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka kam ba ki aplai,” la kdew u Bah Synrem.“Wat ki shlem pule kum ka AIIMS, New Delhi kim shym la buh ïa ki kyndon ba eh hynrei ki la ai jingithuh ïa kiba la tbit ha ka kam khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingthungkam. Namarkata, ngi dawa ba dei ban pynbeit thymmai ïa ka RR kaba long ryngkat bad ka AIIMS, New Delhi bad ban sangeh mardor ka jingthungkam tad haduh ban da pynbeit pura ïa ki rukom treikam,” u la bynrap.Ka HYC ka la kyntu ruh ki bor pynïaid jong ka NEIGRIHMS ban thungkam Nurse ïa ki trai jylla, kiba la don ka jingtbit bad ka kyrdan pule kaba biang ban thung ïa ki kam kiba lait bad ban pynrungkam ïa ki Nurse kiba la trei contractual basis hapoh ka Institute.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ïohlum kumba 40 haduh 50 ngut ki briew ba la shah thung kum ki Nursing Officers ha ka jingthungkam baladep lyngba ka NORCET kim shym la leit trei ïa ka kam ne iehnoh ïa ka kam.“Kano kano ka jingpyrshang ban pyndap ïa ki kam kiba thylli na ka thup kyrteng jong ka NORCET ba dang shu dep pynlong shen ngin ym pdiang da leilei namarba ngin ieng ha ka nongrim kaba ngi ladep ïakynduh ïa phi. Ïa ka jingthungkam dei ban leh da ka NEIGRIHMS da kaba pyndonkam ïa ka OMR method na ka bynta ka jingïaid beit jong ka kam,” la ong ka HYC ha ka dorkhas.Da kaba pynkynmaw ba ka Institute ka dei kaba don hapoh u pud u sam jong ka KHADC, u Bah Synrem u la ong ba ka long kaba donkam ïa kino kino ki bym dei ki trai jylla kiba ïohkam hapoh NEIGRIHMS ba ki dei ban ïoh ïa ka Trading Licence na ka KHADC.“La lap ba dang shen ka jingdie ïa ki Tender da ka Store & Procurement Section, NEIGRIHMS kam shym la buh ïa ka kyndon kaba bthah halor ka Trading Licence na ka KHADC. Kane ka long ka bym lah satia ban pdiang bad kino kino ki briew kiba donkti ban ym pynrung ïa ka kyndon ban shim ïa ka Trading Licence na ka KHADC dei ban pynshitom da ka Institute. Ngi ïaiban ïa ka jingshisha bad ka nongrim ba ngi ieng ba ka NEIGRIHMS ka dei ka Autonomous Institute kaba don hapoh ka Tribal Area jong ka jyla Meghalaya da ka jingthmu ban ai jingshakri ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei.  Namarkata, dei ban plie lad nyngkong eh ïa ki trai jylla ban ïohkam bad kumjuh ruh ha ka pule puthi ha ki Course bapher bapher ba la tyrwa da ka Institute,” la ong ka seng.
title: KYNTIEW SEAT MBBS BAD NURSING ÏA KI SAMLA NA MEGHALAYA DAWA KA HYC ÏA KA NEIGRIMHS

content: Da ka jingsngewkhia ia ka jingjyllei ki nongkhaii bar Jylla ha thain Byrnihat, Baridua, Khanapara, Umroi Cantonment, Rangment bad kiwei kiwei, ka Confederation of Ri Bhoi Peeple (CoRP) hapoh ka jingialam u President bah Bandari Ryntathiang rngkat ki dkhot hynne ka sngi ka la leit kynduh bad ai dorkhas ia u Chief Exective Member ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District  Council (KHADC) u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ban tehlakam ia ki nongkhaii bar jylla ha Ri Bhoi District.Ha ka jingiakynduh ka CoRP ka la ai jingmut ia u CEM ba ki dukan bar jylla kiba wan khaii hapoh u pud ka Council ki dei ban wah ia ka Trading License hakhmat dukan, khnang kin tip ia ki dukan ba la don license, bad kane kan iarap ruh ia ki nongtrei ka council ne ki kynhun sengbhalang haba ki leit khynra ia ki dukan bar jylla.Ki nongialam ki la pynpaw kumba long mynta ym tip kino ki dukan don ba don license bad ki bym don license namar ym pat don ki dukan bar jylla ba wah License hakhmat haduh mynta, kumta ki bar jylla ki shim kabu bad ka pynshlur ia kiwei pat ban wan khaii beain khlem traiding license kaba wanrah ka jingduhnong ba khraw ia ka Council baroh kawei.Kumta ka la kyntu ia u CEM ba ka Conncil ka dei ban btah ia baroh ki dukan ki dei ban wah sahkhmat dukan ia ka Trading License khang ba kin tip bad kan iarap ruh ban khanglad ia kito ki briew ba shu wankam trai ia ki dukan ha ka por khynra Lisence.Kumjuh ka seng ka kyntu ia u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ba ka Council ka dei ban sangeh noh ban ai trading License ia ki kam ba ki trai jylla ki lah ban trei hi, namar lada ka ai license ka long kumba ka khanglad ia ki trai jylla ha ka khaii pateng bad ki bar jylla ki nangiai jyllei na ka por sha ka por.Halor kane u CEM ula ong, ba un shimkhia ia katei ka kam ban tehlakam ia ki bar jylla ba wan khaii beain ha Ri Bhoi District, ula pynpaw ba u kloi ban pdiang ia ka jingai jingmut ka seng bad ki dukan ki dei ban wah ia ki Trading Licence hakhmat ki dukan ban iohi bad ula bynrap ia kane yn pyrshang shwa ban pyntreikam na Ri Bhoi District.
title: UJOR KA CoRP SHA KA KHADC BYM BUH HAKHMAT DUKAN ÏA KI TRADING LICENSE

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ha ka sngi Thohdieng, ka la dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban sei madan ïa ki mark ba la ïoh da ki nongïakhun kam shuwa ba kin leit sha ka Walk-in-Interview rung kam nos da kaba ïateh kontrak (Contractual Basis)Katkum ka shithi ba ka seng ka la phah sha ka Director of Health Services (DHS), u Chairman ka KSU-Employment Monitoring Cell u samla Reuben Najiar u la ong ba ka KSU ka sngewkhia halor ki jingkynnoh jong ki nongïakhun kam kiba aplai ïa ka kam Staff Nurse bad kane kan long katkum ka jingpynbna laitkam kaba la pynmih ha ka 06/03/2024 da ka DHS,Shillong.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, u samla Najiar u la ong katkum ka jingpynbna laitkam, ki la don shibun ki kyndon ba la buh da ka Ophis ban jied ïa ki nongiakhun ha ka interview katkum ka jingwan shakhmat jong ki, hynrei ki la mih pat shibun ki jingkynnoh jong ki nongaplai kam ki bym mih kyrteng ha ka thup Interview, ba ka thup ka dei kaba leh thok bad ia ka thup la pynkhreh da ka jingphah jong ki briew kiba bat ïa ki kyrdan bapher bapher hapoh ka Sorkar.Ka Seng ka la kam ruh ba ki la don ki jingkynnoh ba ki nongapkai kam ba la shah jied ha ka Walk-in-interview kim shym la kot katkum ki kyndon ba la buh da ka OphisShuh shuh ka seng ka la dawa ba khnang ban ioh jingshai halor ka thup ki kyrtong ba la shah jied ban leh i aka interview bad ban kiar ïa ka jingkynnoh ka ophis DHS ka dei ban pynmih ia ki mark jong baroh ki kyrtong kiba aplai ïa ka kam khnang ban  ki nongaplai kam ruh kin hun.“Ngi la dawa ban sei madan ïa ki mark jong baroh hashwa ka walk-in-interview,” la dawa ka seng.
title: PHAH SEI KA KSU ÏA KI MARKS BA ÏOH NA KI NONGÏAKHUN KAM NOS

content: Ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang, ka Ophisar IPS ka la shimti kum ka Director General of Police (DGP) ba thymmai jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei.Ka Kong Nongrang kaba dei na ka Batch 1992 IPS Officer ka dei ka kynthei Khasi banyngkong eh bad ka Ophisar IPS ban shimti ïa kane ka kyrdan ha ka tnat Pulit jong ka Jylla.Tang shu poi ha phyllaw jong ka Police Headquarter, Shillong ha ka step Lah Sngi u Blei ka tnat Pulit ka la pdiang burom ïa ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang bad hadien kane ka Kong Nongrang ka la shong jingïalang bad ki Ophisar jong ka tnat Pulit ban ïakren ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyntyllun ïa ki kam nangne shakhmat hapoh ka tnat.Ka Kong Nongrang kan shakri ha ka tnat Pulit haduh ka 19 tarik, Jymmang, 2026.Dang shen ka Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) ka la mynjur ïa ka kyrteng jong ka Kong Nongrang, nalor u Ram Prasad Meena, ADG ka Border Security Force (BSF), u Deepak Kumar, ADG ka Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) na ka bynta ka shuki DGP.Kum ka Ophisar IPS ka la shakri ha kylleng ki bynta bapher bapher ka jylla, ha ka Intelligence Bureau (IB),  nangta, kum ka Director General (DG) jong ka tnat Civil Defence & Home Guard, Meghalaya shwa ba kan shah thung kum ka DGP hadien ba ka samoi shakri jong u DGP barim u Lajja Ram Bishnoi ka la kut ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai.
title: SHIMTI KA KONG IDASHISHA NONGRANG KUM KA DGP BATHYMMAI KA JYLLA

content: : Hapdeng ka jingiakhun ban rat dyngkhong ia u drok naduh ki Sengbhalang, ki Seng Longkmie, ki Seng Samla Shnong bapher bapher hapoh South West Khasi District, kyndit kynsan ki don pat ki riew shimkabu katto katne da kaba wanrah ia ki nongbylla bar jylla ki bym biang kot biang sla kiba dei ruh ki nongdih drok kaba la pynap jingma pynban ia ki khun samla.Ha ka miet sngi Saitjaiñ ka Seng Samla Shnong Mawlangwir ka la ioh bat ia uwei u bar jylla uba trei bylla ha ka shnong Mawlangwir uba la buaid drok bad u la shang makia ia ka shnong hynrei ki samla jong ka shnong kiba la peit siar bha ki la bat bad tohkit shano u mut ban iaid ban ieng, hynrei une u bar jylla u la pan jingpruid kylla bad tyrwa drok pynban ia ki da kaba u ong lada ki kwah drok un ialam ia ki sha iingsah jong u ban ai drok ia ki.Kumta ki samla jong ka shnong ki la bat bad aiti ha ka KSU Mawkyrwat Circle ba kin bishar ia u bad ka KSU hadien ba ka ladep ban bishar ka la aiti noh sha ki Pulit jong ka Mawkyrwat Police Station.Ka KSU Mawkyrwat Circle ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor kane ba wat hapdeng ka jingiakhun kaba jur bha ban rat dyngkhong ia une u jingdih basniew hapoh ka District pynban u nangkha roi kat nangmih ki sngiKa Seng ka la maham tyngeh ruh ia kito ki briew kiba wanrah ia ki nongbylla kiba nabar khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang.
title: TYRWA DROK U BAR JYLLA ÏA KI DKHOT KA SENG SAMLA SHNONG HA MAWLANGWIR

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) Ri Mulliang Circle, hadien ba ka la lap ba ki don ki bar jylla kiba die pathar ïa ki dawai ha ka thaiñ Tynghor bad ha kiwei de ki shnong bamarjan kiba don ha ki thaiñ khappud ka la pynlong ïa ka seng ban sngew artatien ba ïoh lehse u drok un ïoh ban rung laitlain ha kane ka thaiñ.Halor kane ka bynta, ka Seng ba la lamkhmat da u President jong ka HYC Ri Muliang Circle u samla Disterborlin Wanniang ryngkat ka jingsynran lang da u President ka HYC West Khasi Hills District Unit u samla Lumlang Kharsyiemlieh ha ka sngi Balang ki la leit ban ïakynduh ïa ka District Medical & Health Officer (DM&HO) jong ka West Khasi Hills District ban ïakren halor ka jingdie dawai pathar ki bar Jylla ha ka thaiñ Tynghor, Langja, Langpih bad ha kiwei de ki shnong kiba don ha khappud jong ka West Khasi Hills District.Ka seng ka la kyntu ia ka DM&HO ba kan shimkhia halor kane ka long nalor ka jingdon jong ki bar Jylla kiba die dawai pathar, ki la don ruh sa ki nongdie jingbam kiba shu thad madan bad die pathar bad kane ka lah ban buh jingma ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ki paidbah.
title: JYLLEI KI BAR JYLLA BA DIE DAWAI PATHAR HA KI SHNONG KHAPPUD KA WKH, UJOR KA HYC HA KA DM&HO

content: It was double delight for Mawlai SC as they were able to defend their Shillong Premier League title by defeating Rangdajied United FC 1-0 in the final of SPL 2023 today.Donlad Diengdoh (26′) scored the only goal of the game with a powerful header to seal the result at the SSA Stadium at First Ground, Polo, despite Rangdajied throwing everything they could and even being denied by the crossbar in the second half.Rangdajied were left to rue their missed chances as they were consigned to the runners-up spot for a second consecutive season as they had also finished behind Mawlai in 2022.Mawlai received the champions’ trophy and cheque of Rs 3 lakh from the chief guest, the Chief Secretary of Meghalaya, Shri DP Wahlang. The runners-up cheque of Rs 1.5 lakh was presented to Rangdajied by the Chief Engineer of the State Sports Council Meghalaya, Shri BM Syiem. Other dignitaries present on the occasion included Meghalaya Football Association President Shri H Dohling, Shillong Sports Association President Shri Eugeneson Lyngdoh and other senior officials of the SSA.The highly-anticipated match saw the SSA Stadium packed to the rafters with fans, with the supporters of Mawlai standing out with their bright yellow flags. The atmosphere was electric from the first whistle and the action on the pitch did not disappoint.Donlad had missed the semifinal through injury and there were doubts whether he would be fit enough for the grand finale but he made it into Mawlai’s starting line-up. Despite being the danger man, he found himself with plenty of room to head in a corner untroubled by defenders for what was his sixth goal of the season. The goal also made him the second-highest scorer this year, behind only Shillong Lajong’s Deibormame Tongper (8 goals).Rangdajied were determined to come back at Mawlai in the second half and they made two attacking substitutions to try and do that – bringing on Dameki Khongstia and Wanlamsuk Nongkhlaw at half time.The pair were involved together in the 78th minute when Dameki whipped in a cross but Wanlam was just out of its reach. Soon after, Aibiangmame Nongneng had a free-kick and fired it through the wall but Mawlai goalkeeper Siwel Rymbai was right behind it.Seven minutes of stoppage time were added on by the fourth official and this is where RUFC came inches from an equaliser. Wanlamsuk dived forwards to meet a cross and the header beat Siwel, hit the crossbar and came down. The No. 11 was convinced it had crossed the line but the assistant referee was in the best position and play continued until the final whistle a couple of minutes later.The final was an absolute thriller of a contest that brought the entire 2023 season of the SSA’s football pyramid to a resoundingly successful conclusion. The 2024 season will soon begin with the Fourth Division, the lowest rung on the pyramid.
title: MAWLAI’S REIGN CONTINUES WITH VICTORY IN SPL 2023 FINAL OVER RANGDAJIED

content: Hadien ba ka UPSC ka la pdiang ia ki lai tylli ki kyrteng na ka bynta ka shuki Director General of Police of Meghalaya, ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit ha ka sngi Palei ka la iakynduh ia u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ban pynsngew ia ka jingdawa ban thung ia ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang, IPS (RR – 1992) kum ka DGP jong ka jylla.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, Chief Spokesperson ka BJP Bah Mariahom Kharkrang, uba dei ruh u IPS Officer ba la shongthait u la ong, ‘ka Kong Nongrang ka long kaba bit ban shimti ia kane ka kyrdan, lada kheiñ ia ka jingshakri kaba la shem napdeng ki kyrteng ba la pdiang (da ka UPSC) bad ka long ruh kaba shemphang bad kaba tbit  ban shakri hapoh ka tnat Pulit.”“Ngim shim ia kane ka sienjam bad ngi kyrmen shem ba kane ka ophisar kynthei riewlum, kaba la kha bad kaba la heh la san ha Meghalaya, ka dei ban long ka nongialam hapoh ka tnat Pulit ka Jylla namarba ka sngewthuh ia ka jingeh  jong ka jylla, kaba long ka bynta kaba kongsan tam ban pyntyllun shakhmat ha ka jingtreikam jong ka tnat Pulit,” la ong u Bah Kharkrang.
title: PYNSNGEW KA BJP HA U CM BAN THUNG DGP KA JYLLA DA KA KONG IDASHISHA NONGRANG

content: U Assistant Inspector General (AIG) barim ka tnat Pulit ka Jylla u Bah GK Iangrai ha ka sngi Palei u la ujor da ka ejahar pyrshah ia u Director General of Police (DGP) ka Jylla u Lajja Ram Bishnoi da kaba kynnoh ba u la pyndonkam bakla bad pynjulor ia u Registration Number Plate jong ka kali.Ha ka ejahar, u AIG barim u la ong ba ka Enquiry Committee ba la thung ha ka 18 tarik, Naitung, 2022, ha  ka kaiphod kaba don ha ka Para 1 jong ka sla 3, ka kdew kumne harum: “kawei ka ka kali Hyndai Verna ba la set ha Central Workshop la pyndait da u nombar thok bad ym shym la rejistar ia ka kali da u AIG-A, namarba ym don satia ki kot ki sla.”U la ong ba ka jingpynkhreh ia ka kaiphod ka paw ba la shu leh tangdep rukom, kata, ban shu ong khlem da leit jurip ha ka jaka bad ban bishar bniah ia ka rekod jong jong ka tnat Transport.Katkum ka shithi hapoh ka Right to Information (RTI) kaba 27 tarik Naitung, 2023 halor katei ka kali, kata, ka Verna 1.6 VTVT la rejister bad ka tnat Transport, ka Sorkar Meghalaya, Shillong kum ka ML-02-A-0001, ha ka kyrteng jong u Director General of Police, ka Sorkar Meghalaya.Ka jubab RTI ba la ai da ka tnat Tranport, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la lap ba ka kaiphod jong ka Inquiry Committee, ka kdew ba dei ban pynshitom ia ki dkhot jong ka Committee,” ong u Bah Iangrai.Shuh shuh ha ka Ejahar, u AIG barim u kdew, “u Lajja Ram Bishnoi, uba bat ia ka shuki jong u Director General of Police, Meghalaya, u la wan sha Shillong, ban shimti ia ka kam ha ka 17 tarik, Jymmang, 2022 da kaba shong ha ka kali Kia Carnival Limousine Model rong lieh, kaba don ia u Rregistration jong ka Sorkar Assam, hynrei hadien kata, la iohi ba u Lajja Ram Bishnoi, ha ka jingiasuhbuit kam bymman, la pynkylla ia u number Plate jong ka kali bad mynta u la pyndait da ka number plate ba thymmai uba don ia u registration number ML-02-A-0001, uba dei u nombar ba la rejistar na ka bynta ka kali Verna 1.6 VTVT.”U la ong la lap shuh shuh ba ka kali Kia Carnival Limousine ka dei ka kali kaba shu shim wai, na ka bynta ki kam, jong u Lajja Ram Bishnoi, hynrei u la pyndonkam ia kane ka kali na ka bynta kam shimet, kumba la sakhi na ki dur ba la pyndonkam bad ka jingdon jong u ha ka kali.U AIG barim u la ong ba katkum ka Rules and Standard Guidelines, u Director General of Police ka Srokar Meghalaya, Shillong u dei hok ban pyndonkam tang ia ka kali kaba hapoh T. 12 lak, katba ka kali kaba la pyndonkam mynta ka shongdor haduh T. 40 lak, ia kaba u DGP, ka Sorkar Meghalaya um dei hok satia.“Ki jingshisha baroh ba la kdew haneng ki long thik tang Offence of Criminal Conspiracy bad ka Criminal Breach of Trust bad ka jingshna thok, bad shukor ba la leh da u Lajja Ram Bishnoi. Namarkata, nga kyrpad ia phi ban register case pyrshah ia u nongleh kam bymman ba la kdew haneng hapoh ki kyndon jong ka aiñ bad ban pynngat kyndon mardor khnang ban pynthikna ba u dei ban ioh ia ka jingshah pynshitom,” la ong u AIG ha ka ejahar.
title: KYNNOH U AIG BARIM BA PYNDONKAM BAKLA U DGP ÏA U NOMBER PLATE, UJOR EJAHAR HA SADAR PS

content: : Ki paid u Blei ha Madanryting kin sa sakhi ia ka jingplie ia ka Parish bathymmai ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai da u Archbishop ka Jyllaniambah Shillong u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Vicar General u Rev.Fr. Richard M. Majaw bad kiwei kiwei ki Lyngdoh Sohblei.Katkum u kyrwoh, la pyntip ba ka jingplie ia ka Parish U Khrist U Syiem, Madanryting yn sdang da ka Mass Bakhuid ha ka por 10.00 baje mynstep.Ki bor pyniaid jong ka Balang Catholic Madanryting ki khot bad wer ia ki paidriewngeit jong ki Parish ba hap hapoh ka jylli jong ka Jyllaniambah Shillong ban sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi.
title: 12 TARIK YN PLIE ÏA KA PARISH THYMMAI HA MADANRYTING

content: Ka Awaken India Movement (AIM) Meghalaya State Unit ka la pan jingshai na ka Directorate of School Education & Literacy (DSEL) ka Sorkar Jylla halor ka jingpynkylla ïa ki skul ai jinghikai sha ki jaka sumar nongpang bad pynrung kyrteng ïa u Aadhaar.Ka Awaken India Movement (AIM) Meghalaya State Unit ryngkatlang bad kiwei pat ki State Unit kiba don ha manla ki Jylla jong ka Ri India ka la ïakynduh lang ha ka Jylla Hyderabad ha kine ki sngi ba ladep lyngba ka National Meeting Central Body jong baroh kawei ka Ri India.U Chairman jong ka AIM, Meghalaya State Unit Bah Banshai Marbaniang, u iathuh ba ha ka jingialang la shim ia ki rai kiba bun ka la mih shakhmat ban kyrsiew da jingïatylli ha ka ban ïeng ïada namar ki para bynriew halor ka jingshah pynbor ban ai DAWAI bad AADHAAR ynda hadien ba la ïohi bad sakhi halor ka jingpyrshang jong ka Sorkar Kmie kumjuh ki Sorkar Jylla bapher bapher.“Kane ka long ban wanrah ïa ka pyntreikam bakla khlem da ailad halor ka Synshar Paidbah ha manla ki ïit ki Hima katkum la ki Shnong bapher bapher khamtam hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya kaba don la ki jong ki Autonomous District Council bad ba dang hab hapoh ka Minority Status jong ka Riti Synshar Paidbah (Constitution) jong ka Ri India,” ong ka AIM.Haba ïoh ïa ki jingpynsngew da ki Kmie ki Kpa jong ki Khynnah Skul lyngba ki skul sorkar jong ka Jylla ha kaba shah pynbor ban phah ïa ki khun jong ki ha kaban pyndep ïa ki Blood test, weight bad height measurement kumjuh bad kiwei pat ki rukom ai jingsumar dawai halor kiba bun rukom khlem da don ka jingtip bad jingpynshai paidbah khamtam lyngba ki Kmie ki Kpa kiba ri ba sumar ïa la ki jong ki khun.“Kane ka la kylla long ka lynti kaba wanrah ïa ka jingbakla shikatdei eh halor ka longbriew manbriew ha sla pyrthei. Haba phai halor ka rukom jingïada khamtam ban pynbor khlem da ïoh jingmynjur lyngba ki nongri nongsumar ka long kaei kaei ka bymlah ban pdiang lada pyrkhat halor ka hok bad jingshisha,” ong ka AIM.Ka kynhun Awaken India Movement (AIM) kaba don hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew artatien haba ïohi ba ka la don ruh ka jingshah pynbor jong ki Khynnah Skul ban pyndep ïa u Aadhaar bad ynda haba la wad bniah la shem ba na ka liang jong ka Supreme Court badon burom ka la ai ïa ka rai kaba skhem ban pynpaw ba ymdei ban pyntreikam ïa u Aadhaar hapoh ki jaka pule skul bad ym ruh ban shim naduh kaba sdang ban pynrung skul ïa ki khynnah pule.Kumjuh haba phai sha u Education Minister jong ka Sorkar India u Shri. Dharmendra Pradhan ula pynpaw ïa kajuh ka phang ba ym dei ban pynbor ïa ki khynnah pule ban leh Aadhaar bad kim dei ruh ban duh kino kino ki jingmyntoi haba kum ki khynnah skul kidei ban ïoh. Kane ka la long ka mat kaba hakhmat eh ha kaba bun na ka liang jong ki MP Cabinet Minister kila pynpaw.Ka AIM ka la pyrshang ban wad bad tihbniah halor kaei ka bynta kaba kongsan haduh ban wanrah ka jingkulmar ïa ki khynnah skul khamtam na bynta ki kmie ki kpa jong ki haduh ban pynlong kum ka jaka ai jingsumar ïa ki khyllung khynnah hapoh ki Skul bapher bapher da kaba shim ïa ki kum ki nongpang ha kum kitei ki bynta kiba khlem da ïoh jingpynshai pura nalor ba ki Khynnah Skul kim don kano kano ka jingpang hapoh ka met jong ki.“Kum ki briew ngi dei ban kyndit bynriew noh namar bunsien kiwei pat ki jait dawai bapher bapher halor kiba bun ki bynta kiba dei banrung shapoh ka met longbriew manbriew ki don ïa ka jingktah (Side Infections) hapoh ka met, ha kaba ngi kum ki briew ngim lah ban tip pura ïa kane. Ngim lah ruh ban tip shai balei kumta ka jia bad lada dei ba ki Doctor baroh ki hap ban pynshai lane ban ïathuh ïa kane nga ngeit ba yn ym don ruh ki ban leit shim dawai ne wat dih Dawai,” bynrap ka AIM.Na ka liang jong ka AIM Meghalaya State Unit ka pan ïa ka jingpynshai kaba pura lyngba ka Sorkar Jylla bad ngi hap ban buh ka jingkylli ba halor kaei kadaw bah kaba pynlong ïa ki khynnah skul ba kin hap ban ai dawai haba leit skul da jingkoit jingkhiah” bad “Ka jingbuh ïa ki Skul na bynta jong ngi ki briew ka long ban leit pule na bynta ban ïoh ïa ka jingnang jingstad, ne la ka skul kadei ruh ban long kum ka Hospital ka ban hap ban sumar Nongpang?”.Ka AIM Meghalaya ynda haba ka la pyrshang ban leit ïakynduh ïa u Education Minister jong ka Sorkar Jylla Meghalaya Shri. Rakkam A Sangma bad u Director jong ka DSEL Shri. Swapnil Tembe, IAS, ym shym la ïoh lad ban ïakynduh bad khlem da pynslem la hap ban leit ïakynduh ia u Joint Director jong ka DSEL u Bah L. Lyngdoh.Kane ka jingleit kynduh ka long ban ai ïa ka jingthoh bad ban pan ïa ka jingpynshai kaba pura halor kine ki bynta kumba la shem bad ïohi. Na ka liang jong u Joint Director u la pan por ban pynshai haduh ka taïew kaban sa wan halor kiba bun ki bynta jong kane ka bynta kaba wanrah ïa ka jingsumar jingpang hapoh ki Skul bad ban phah wanrah Aadhaar ïa ki Khynnah skul.Ka AIM Meghalaya State Unit ka la phah da ka jingthoh shapoh ka Directorate of School Education & Literacy, Govt. of Meghalaya ban pynpaw halor kiba bun ki bynta ha kaba ïadei bad ki Khyllung Khynnah kiba dei ban ïoh ïa ka jingpule kaba pura da kaba pynkulmar jingmut ha kaban wanrah noh sha ki jaka ai jingsumar bad kiwei kiwei.“Lada pyrkhat jylliew shuh shuh baroh la shim ba kane ka long ka bynta kaban wanrah ïa ka jingïaleh pyrshah namar ka imlang sahlang ïa la ki jong ki aiñ kiba don hapoh ka Ri India bad ka Jylla baroh kawei bad kumjuh halor ka jingim briew man la iwei pa iwei lada phai khamtam katkum ki khyrnit jong ka Hok ba dei ban ïoh kum ki nongshong shnong hapoh riti Synshar paidbah jong ka Ri India,” ong ka AIM.Kumba la kdew shai katkum ki khyrnit ter ter naduh 14 haduh 22 bad kumjuh lada phai halor jong ka Right of Children to Free and Compulsory Education (RTE) Act 2009, Human Rights Education with  Children bad shuh shuh la sakhi ruh ba kine baroh kiba ka Sorkar ka ïalam ban pynïaid bakla lada phai halor ki rai kiba na ka liang jong ka Supreme Court ka la shim ban pynpaw paidbah, ong ka kyrwoh kaba la phah da u Bah Banshai Marbaniang shongknor ka AIM ha Meghalaya.
title: KAM KA AIM BA SHAH PYNKYLLA KI SKUL KUM KI JAKA SUMAR BAD PYNRUNG KYRTENG AADHAAR

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pyndam noh ïa ka hukum ‘be-aiñ ba la pynmih ha ka kyrdan Under Secretary ka tnat Social Welfare da kaba kam ba la ai jingbit lyngba ka jingai syrnot Scheduled Tribe (ST) sha ki nongaplai kiba shim ïa ka jait na u kpa lane na ka kmie lane ka jingshim jait na u tnga da ka kynthei kaba bym dei ka Khasi.Ïa kane ka rai ba la pyndam noh ïa ka hukum ba la pynmih ha ka 21 tarik, Naitung, 2020 la pynbna da u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ïathuh ba ha ka 28 tarik Rymphang, mynta u snem  u la lum ïa ka jingïalang bad u Executive Member bad ki ophisar jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) bad ïa ki nongmihkhmat na ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ha kaba ïadei bad ka hukum ba la pynmih ha ka kyrdan Under Secretary ka tnat Social Welfare sha ki Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills bad West Khasi Hills ha u snem 2020.Ka shithi ka ong, “ka Lineage Act, 1997 kam khang hynrei ka shah ban ai syrnot ST sha ki nongaplai kiba shim jait la ka long na u Kpa ne ka Kmie bad ka kynthei ka bym dei ka Khasi kaba shim jait na u tnga.”Katkum ka jingong jong u Bah Paul, uno uno u ophisar jong ka Sorkar um don ka hok ban pynmih ïa kano kano ka hukum kaba ïatakhuh bad ka Aiñ ba la mynjur da ka KHADC.“Ha ka jingïasyllok, kaba nyngkong eh ka jingïakren ka long ba ka aiñ kaba ïadei bad ka jingai jait ladep ban mynjur ha ka dur jong ka Bill da ka KHADC bad kane ka Bill ka la ioh ruh ïa ka jingmynjur na u Lat ka Jylla Meghalaya, namarkat, ka la long ka aiñ bapura.  Haba u Lat u la shon muhor kaba mut ba ka la ïaid lyngba ki lynti ba la dep bishar da ka tnat DCA bad ka la ioh ïa ka jingmynjur, yn ym don uno uno ruh u ophisar ka Sorkar Meghalaya uba don ïa ka hok ban pynmih ïa ka hukum kaba ïatakhuh bad ka Bill kaba la long ka Aiñ kaba la don lypa shwa ban pynmih ïa ka Administrative Order.  Namarkata, ngi lap ba dei ban pyndam ïa kane ka hukum  bad ka jingïalang ka la mynjur ba dei ban pynduh shisyndon ïa kane ka hukum,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ba ki don ruh ki kyndon ba la pynmih ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingai ïa ka syrnot SC/ST lyngba ka Office Memorandum (OM) kaba 19 tarik, Lber, 2014 sha ki Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills bad ka West Khasi Hills Districts.“Halor kane, ka syrnot ithuh jinglong Khasi ka dei kaba donkam bha ïa baroh shwa ban aplai ïa ka syrnot ST, ha kaba nyngkong eh ban ioh ïa ka syrnot ithuh jinglong khasi ba la ai da ka KHADC,” ong shuh shuh u Bah Paul.“La rai ruh ba ïa ka OM yn pynbeit noh mardor da kaba pynrung ïa ka kyntien, “ïa ka Tribe certificate na ki bor ba dei peit na ki jaka ba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka KHADC,” kan long kum kawei na ki kyndon,” la ong u Myntri bad ïathuh ruh ba u la soi bad mynjur ïa ka File kaba ïadei bad kane ka rai.Haba kylli, kaei ka jingpynshitom ïa u ophisar uba pynmih ïa ka hukum be-aiñ, u Bah Paul ula ong, “ïa mynta, kaba ngi la leh ka long ban pynbeit ïa kaba bakla,” bad bynrap ba ki syrnot ST ba la ai katkum ka hukum ba ladep pynmih yn shu khein ïap noh.
title: PYNDAM KA SORKAR JYLLA ÏA KA HUKUM BE-AIÑ KA SOCIAL WELFARE BA SHAH AI JAIT KPA

content: : Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit ha ka sngi Balang ka la pan jingshai na u Deputy Commisisoner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District u A. Baranwal halor ka jingpynkynriah ïa ka Check-post ki shipai BSF ha Sonapyrdi.Ha ka sngi Baar, u DC u la khot ïa ki heh shipai BSF halor kane ka mat.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ka jingkhot ïakren ka dei hadien ba ka seng bad ka shnong Sonapyrdi lem bad ki paidbah na ki thaiñ Huroi, Hingaria, Lejri, Myrli bad kiwei kiwei ki lah mih paidbah ban pynpaw ka jingpyrshah kaba jur haba don katei ka ktem ha ka 26 tarik u bnai ïaïong 2024.Haba ïakren bad ïoh jingshai na u DC u la ong ba ka jingïakren ka long kaba seisoh bad hapoh kine ki sngi yn pynmih ïa ka hukum ban kynriah noh ïa ki mar mar. Ka seng ka la suba ruh ba ka lah ban don ka jingbym kohnguh ïa ka order u DC ynda la pynmih hynrei ka seng ka la kyntu ba ïa kane ka mat ym tang ban shu pynsngewbha ïano ïano da kaba shim rai kyrkieh hynrei dei ban ïakren haduh ba kan urlong syndon.Ka seng ka maham ruh ban ïamih paidbah biang lada jia ba ki BSF kim treh ban kynriah bad lada ki bteng ka jingleh heh bad ktah kti ïa u paidbah.Kum ban shu kynmaw biang ka seng ka la ïaid lynti ïa kane ka mat ban dawa beh ïa kitei ki BSF la jan 6 snem mynta ha kaba naduh ka shnat treikam ka seng ka KSU Sonapyrdi unit, ka KSU Narpuh Circle tad haduh ba hap ban mih paidbah hapoh ka jingïalam ka KSU EJHDU.Ka seng ruh ha ka 18 tarik u bnai Nailur 2023 ka la pynsngew shaduh ka miej jong u myntri ba dei peit ïa ka Kam Pohïing u Bah Prestone Tynsong hynrei khlem don kano kano ka jubab na ka sorkar halor kane.“Ka jingdawa jong ngi hi ka long ba ngim dei ban ïohi shuh ïa ki BSF ha katei ka jaka bad ha Dona Umbluh hajan Ratachera. Kyntang ïawai ka seng ka pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewnguh ïa ka bor district kaba la shimkhia ban khot ïakren bad ki BSF bad kyrmen kan long kaba seisoh haduh ba kut khlem ki jingthud. Ka seng kan ïai buddien halor kane ka mat ha ki sngi ban wan,” ong ka KSU.
title: HAPOH KHYNDIAT SNGI YN PYNKYNRIAH ÏA KA CHECK-POST BSF NA SONAPYRDI SHA KHAPPUD

content: In a combined effort to curb illegal activities along the Indo-Bangladesh border, the vigilant troops of BSF Meghalaya Frontier and Meghalaya Police, successfully seized a huge quantity of Sugar from the bordering area of South Garo Hills district of Meghalaya on Sunday.Based on specific information, BSF troops from the 200 Battalion, in collaboration with the Meghalaya Police, conducted a joint operation near the Indo-Bangladesh border.During the operation 42,300 Kgs of Sugar worth more than Rs. 16 lakh were recovered from an abandoned house located in close proximity to the International border.The seized Sugar bags were handed over to the Rongra police station for further action.In another operation, Seema Praharis of 193 Bn BSF seized clothing item i.e. Sarees, worth more than Rs. 3 Lakh, while being smuggled to Bangladesh from the International border of East Khasi Hills, Meghalaya.
title: BSF MEGHALAYA & LOCAL POLICE SEIZES A HUGE QUANTITY OF SUGAR AT INTERNATIONAL BORDER

content: : Khyndiat sngi hadien ba ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) ki la shoh bad kawut lathi haduh ban da mynsaw ïa ki riew paidbah bad pynjulor ruh ïa ki kali ha East Jaiñtia Hills, ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Student Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki Waheh Shnong ki la tur sha ka ktem jong ki shipai BSF kaba don ha Sonapur.Ki Waheh Shnong, ki dkhot ka KSU, kynthup ïa ki riewpaidbah na ki shnong bapher bapher jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills ki la mih paidbah ban pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingthombor jong ki shipai BSF pyrshah ïa kiba luilui kiba dei ki nongshong shnong jong ka thaiñ Narpuh.Katba ki Waheh Shnong, ki dkhot ka KSU bad ki paidbah ki dang tur sha ka jaka ba don ka ktem ki shipai BSF ki Pulit ki la wan poi ha kane ka jaka ban tem ioh ka mih kano kano ka jingkulmar.Ki Pulit ki la pynsngewthuh ïa ki Waheh Shnong bad ïa ki dkhot ka KSU ban ym thaw jingkulmar.Ka jingïakhih jong ka KSU ka long halor ka nongrim ba ki shipai BSF ki sah beain ha kane ka jaka ha Sonapur bad nalor kata ki pyndik ïa ki Khasi-Pnar kiba sah ha ka thaiñ Narpuh da kaba talasi ïa ki kali, da kaba bom lathi ïa ki paidbah.Shwa ba ka KSU kan pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih ka la mih ka thma ktien hapdeng ki Waheh Shnong bad ki Pulit ha kaba ki la ther tyngeh ïa ka jingkhie wahleng jong ki shipai BSF.U Waheh shong jong ka Shnong Sonapyrdi u Bah E. Lamare u la ong ba ki shipai BSF kim shym la ioh ïa ka jingbit na ka Dorbar Shnong ban buh ïa ka ktem hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong.
title: DA KA JINGBITAR THALAIÑ KI WAHEH SHNONG BAD KSU ÏA KA JINGTHOMBOR KI BSF HA SONAPUR

content: U Deputy Commissioner ka Ri-Bhoi District u Arpit Upadhyaya ha ka sngi baar u la pynmih ïa ka hukum ba la bthah ïa baroh ki ophisar ba hakhlieh jong ki tnad treikam bapher bapher ha Ri-Bhoi District ban long kiba peitngor namar ka jinglong jingman ha East Khasi Hills, kaba lah ban ktah ïa ki district bamarjan.“Ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshngaiñ ki nongkynti ka Sorkar bad ban ïada na kino kino ki jingpyrshang jong ki runar ban pynjot bad pynjulor ïa ki ing ophis, ki kali sorkar bad kiwei kiwei, baroh ki District Head bad ki Ophisar la bthah ba kin buh ïa ki nongap  ha ka por mynmiet, ban pynbiang lypa ïa ki Fire Extinguishers, u shyiap bad ka um ha ki ophis treikam lada don kano kano ka jingjia,” la hukum u DC.“Ki kali sorkar dei ban pynieng ha ki jaka kiba shngaiñ ba kynthup hajan ki PS/OP/BH bad ha ki jaka ba la bthah da ka ophis jong u Superintendent of Police, Ri- Bhoi District. Dei ban kiar katba lah ban pynieng ïa ki kali ha ki jaka sah jong ki Ophisar lymda dei ki jaka kiba shngaiñ. Ïa kino kino ki jingjia dei ban pyntip mardor sha u Superintendent of Police, Ri Bhoi District, lyngba u nombar +918730940080/+919850084514 (Police Control Room), 112 (Help line),” la bthah u DC.La pynmih ïa kane ka hukum khnang ban pyllait na kino kino ki jingshah pynjulor jong ki mar sorkar.“La bthah ïa baroh ba kin bud pyrkhing ïa kane ka hukum khlem bakla.  Kiba leh bym suidñiew kin shah pynshitom,” la maham u DC.
title: BTHAH U DC RIBHOI ÏA KI OPHISAR BAN PEITNGOR ÏA KI OPHIS SORKAR

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) Sports Cell  Central Executive Commitee ka la plie paidbah ia ka 1st Hynniewtrep U-16 Football League kaba la long ha madan Malki.La plie ia kane ka lympung ialehkai da u Vice President jong ka Seng u Bah Donboklang Kharlyngdoh ryngkat ka jingiadonlang jong ki dkhot ka Dorbar Shnong Malki bad  ki nogshah khot sngewbha.La pyniaid ia kane ka program da u Chairman jong ka Sports Cell samla Franky Kharumnuid bad la pynlong ia kane ka lympung ialehkai kum shi bynta ban rakhe ia ki mawmer ka jingdap 10 snem jong ka seng.Ka jingiakhun kaba la long ha kane ka sngi ka ka long hapdeng ka PFR pyrshah ia ka Albinus, ka Lamjingshai pyrshah ia ka Tur shaphrang, ka Nangiaikiew pyrshah ia ka Little Kickers ba ka Little Star Academy pyrshah ia ka Merinda.
title: PLIE PYRDA KA HYC ÏA KA 1ST HYNÑIEWTREP U-16 FOOTBALL LEAGUE

content: Shillong, ïaïong 17: Lai ngut ki nongtuh kali na jylla Assam ki la shah thang im ha ka khlaw kaba ha East Garo Hills District ha ka step jong ka sngi balang. Katkum ka jingïathuh jong ki pulit la ïathuh ba ka la don ka jingsuba ba kadei ka kynhun jong kiba tuh kali kiba la leh ïa kane ka kam.Arngut na kine kiba la shah thang im ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Zahidul Islam bad u Jamor Ali.“Imat kane ka dei ka kam tuh kali bad ka kynhun ki nongtuh,” ong u SP ka East Garo Hills Bah SA Rynjah.U la ïathuh ba u  Zahidul Islam u dei uba ju donkti ban tuh kali na Dudhnoi bad Krishnai bad u dei ruh uba case NBWA pyrshah ïa u ha Krishnai PS.
