Katba u  Jamor Ali u dei u ba donkti ban tuh masi ha Matia PS, Assam.Ka khubor na ki Pulit ka ïathuh ba ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai ki la ïoh ïa ka jingujor ba shu pyntip ba u Jamor Ali (35) ryngkat lang bad u nongñiah u  Noor Ahmed bad u  Zahidul Islam (25) ki la mih na ka la ïing ha ka janmiet 15 tarik mynta u bnai ban wan sha Meghalaya ban leh ïa ki kam kiba kongsan sha Meghalaya.Ka khubor ïa ka ïathuh kitei ki briew na Assam ha ryngkat bad u nongñiah jong ka kali ba ki shim wai, ki la shah pynïap bad shah thang haduh bym ithuh shuh ha ka thaiñ Rongmil, kaba jngai kumba 15 Km na Rongjeng, East Garo Hills.Ïa kine ki met ïap ba ladep thang la tep ha kawei ka thliew ha ka thaiñ Rongmil.La ong ba kane ka jingpynïap kaba la jia tang arsngi shuwa ka ilekshon, ka la pynsuhjer ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka thaiñ.Shuh shuh ka khubor ba la ïoh na ki Pulit ka ïathuh ba kine ki lai ngut ki briew ki la mih na Goalpara ha ka step sngi Ba-ar bad ka jingïakren briew ba khatduh eh jong ki, lyngba ka phone ka dei ha ka por 6 baje mynstep ha ka por ba ki phone ïa la ki bahaïng ba ki dang ïabam jingbam step ha surok hadien ba rung sha East Garo Hills lyngba ka surok Damra-Dainadubi-Wageasi sha Rongmil.Ka khubor ka la ïathuh ba ki bahaïing jong ki, ki la khuslai hadien ba baroh lai ngut kim shym la phone shuh baroh shisngi bad kumta, ki la pyntip mar mar sha ki Pulit ba kin ïarap wad lem.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingjia ki Pulit ha ka jingtohkit, ki la lap ïa ka kali maruti swift kaba ki shimwai na kawei ka khlaw siej ha ka thaiñ Rongmil bad kane ka kali ka la ingkhong khait na ka jingshah thang.Ki Pulit kila pynjur ïa ka jingtohkit ha kane ka jaka bad shem ba kane hi ka dei ka jaka ba la pynïap ïa kine ki briew bad ki runar ki la thang ïa ka met ha shuwa ba kin tep ha kawei ka thliew.La ong ba artylli na kine ki metïap la tep lang ha kawei ka thliew katba kawei pat la lap na kawei ka thliew ïa kaba la suba jur ba ka dei ka met jong u nongñiah jong ka kali.
title: SHAH THANG IM LAI NGUT KI NONGTUH KALI NA ASSAM HA KHLAW RONGJENG, EAST GARO HILLS

content: : U Pator barim jong ka Sumer Patorship kaba hap hapoh ka East Jaintia Hills District Bah Remington Pasleiñ u la kam kam ba u sakhi da la ki jong ki khmat ia ka jingthep vote tuh ha Pala Polling Station kaba hap hapoh ka Sutnga-Saipung Constituency ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha kaba long ha ka 19 tarik, Iaiong, 2024.Haba pyntip ia kane ka jingjia sha u nonglum khubor jong ka Batesi TV lyngba ka telephone, u Bah Remington u la kam ruh ba wat haba la pyndait ia ka CCTV hapoh kane ka Polling Station hynrei ka jingthep vote tuh ka la iaid beit shakhmat naduh ka por 9 baje mynstep ba u la poi ha kane ka Polling Station ban thep ia ka vote.Shuh shuh u la kam ruh wat haba u la iakren bad u Presiding Officer bad ia u Rangbah Shnong ban pynsangeh ia kane ka jingthep tuh ia ka vote jong kiwei hynrei kim shym la sngap satia bad kynnoh ruh ba u Rangbah Shnong u ong ba kam shym la mih kano kano ka jingkulmar.“Nga la iakren bad ki ophisar namarba ki briew ki mih ki thep (vote), ki ong ba ngi thep ia ki bahaïing hasem, nga la ong lada kim wan te nai thep.  Ngam dei ba nga bishni iano iano. Nga khlem ong ban thep iano iano. Tangba kawei nga kwah ba uwei u briew un thep tang kawei ka vote. Ki leh beit ia kane da kaba thied khlieh briew, ka long kaba sngewsih.Nga kwah ban leh eiei nangne shakhmat,” u la ong.Haba kylli, u la ong, “la thikna beit mano ba ai pisa phi la tip hi.  Nga la ujor ha ki ophsiar ba don hangto, u Rangbah Shnong um sngap bad u ong ba ngi khlem iakulmar hangne ngam tieng. Nga la ong ba lada kulmar ne ym kulmar hynrei ban thep ia ka Vote jong u briew ne ka briew ym long.  Nga ong ba dei ban pynduh ia kane ka jingthied khlieh briew bad ia kito kiba ieng lang ban ong ai ia kato ka slip jong phi ban pynthep ma ngi. Ki ia ai ki bapli.  Nga lah ban pynshisha bad nga kloi ban mih wat ha ki lad pathai khubor.  Nga kwah ban tem ia kine ki kam ba kam dei shuh ban jia nangne shakhmat.”“Nga iohi da la ki jong ki khmat ba u briew u thep 6-7 vote marwei. Ki ophisar ba don hanngto kim sngewthuh eiei ruh,” u la ong bad bynrap ba lada ka jingdon jong ka CCTV kam pyni ia kaei kaba u la sakhi u la kob ba u kloi ban shah kem bad shah set along.Halor kane, u Bah Remington u la iathuh ba u la ujor lyngba ka telephone sha u Deputy Commissioner (Election) uba dei ruh u District Election Officer jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District u Abhilash Barwanwal halor kane ka jingjia khnang ban pynsangeh ia ka jingthep vote tuh ha kane ka Polling Station.Haba pyrshang ban kylli na u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Jaintia Hills u la pyntip lyngba ka SMS ba u la phah tohkit ha u Sector Officer ban ioh ia ka kaiphod kaba bniah.
title: KAM U PATOR BARIM KA SUMER BA DON KA JINGTHEP VOTE TUH HA PALA POLLING STATION

content: Ka samla Barilang Pyngrope kawei na ki samla kaba ju khih ju ksar bha na ka bynta ban dawa ïa ka hok jong ki samla wadkam ha ka sngi U Blei ka la khot bad wer ïa ki samla wadkam na rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia ban mih ryntih ha ka sngi Baar mynta ka taiew ha ka por 10:30 baje mynstep ban leit tur sha PTS, Golflink na ka bynta ban pan jubab na ka Central Recruitment Board jong ka tnat Pulit ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynrit ïa ka rta thungkam ha ka jingthungkam Pulit.Dang shen ka tnat Pulit ka la pynbna ïa ka jingpyllait 2938 tylli ki post hapoh ka tnat Pulit.  Ha kane ka jingpynbna, la pyntip ba ka rta rung kam na ka bynta ka post Constable ka long 21 snem bad 27 snem na ka bynta ka post Sub Inspector.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah lyngba ka Video sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka samla Barilang ka la ong, “ki samla ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingbitar, ka jingsngewsih bad ka jingduh mynsiem jong ki ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingthepkam ha ka tnat Kam Pohing namarba la pynrit syndet ïa ka rta thepkam da kaba pynmih ïa ka Revise Guidline khlem jingpynbna.  Ki samla ki dap da ka jingsngew bitar ïa ka Sorkar Jylla kaba leh donbor haduh katne katne. Ki samla ki la pan ïa ka jingpynbeit, hynrei kim ïoh.”“Ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai, ngi ki samla pule Agriculture ruh ngi ïohi ba ka Meghalaya Public Services Commission (MPSC) ki la bakla hangne hangtai bad kloi kloi ki pynmih ïa ka jingpynbeit.  Hynrei balei pat mynta ngim ïoh ïa ka jingpynbeit kaba ki samla ki kwah,” la buh jingkylli kane ka samla.“Ki samla ki la pynpaw ha nga, ym tang ïa ka jingduh mynsiem jong ngi hynrei ki pynpaw ïa ka jingtylli bad ka jingryntih ba ki long kiba kloi ban mih madan da ka jingïaryntih.  Ka la dei ka por ba ngin mih madan ba ngin buh jingkylli ïa ka Sorkar ba kumno ka lah ban leh katba mon haduh katne katne ïa ki samla khamtam ki samla kiba la pynkhreh da ki snem bad kiba la pyndep ïa ki jingpule. Ki samla ki la shu duh ïa ka lad ban aplai ( kam) na ka daw ka jingwan lynshop ka jingpang khlam Covid-19.  Kum kine ki khynnah ki donkam palat ïa ka jubab na ka Sorkar,” ka la ong.“Ngin hap ban pyni ba ma ngi ki samla ngim tieng shuh bad kim lah shuh ban leh donbor ïa ngi.  Ngi ngin mih ryntih baroh la shisngi ha PTS Golflink namarba ka Central Recruitment Board ka don hangtei bad ngin kylli ïa ki nongthung kam halor kano ka kyndon ba ki mut ban leh kumne,” la ong shuh shuh kane ka samla bad bynrap, “nga kyrpad ïa ki samla wadkam ba kin mih shakhmat bad khlem ka jingïatylli ngin ym lah ban poi shakhmat.”“Ha ka rta kaba 18 snem haduh 21 snem ki samla ki dang dei ban pynleit jingmut ha ka jingpule katba ka Sorkar ka pynsyllang ïa ngi bad mynta ngim lah shuh ban pynleit jingmut khamtam kito kiba dang pule ïa ka Class-12 bad ha ka Degree Level.  Nga kyrpad ïa ki longkmie bad ïa ki longkpa ba kin wan kyrshan lem ïa ngi. Ngin leit khlem jingtieng bad ngin buh jingkylli ïa ka Sorkar ba kumno kan knieh ïa ka hok jong ki samla ba kin tuh ïa ka kam, ba kin tuh ïa ka jingkwah jong ki samla bad ka jylla jong ngi ka dei kaba duk bad kaba duna bha ha ka jingïohkam bad ha ka pule puthi ruh ka dei kaba ran shadien. Sa katno ka Sorkar kan pynjot bad kan pynpra ïa ka jylla,”  ka la ong shuh shuh.
title: 16 TARIK YN TUR KI SAMLA WADKAM SHA PTS, GOLFLINK BAN PAN JUBAB NA KA CRB

content: UJOR DA KA EJAHAR HA SADAR POLICE STATIONU MLA jong ka Voice of the People Party na North Shillong Constituency Bah Adelbert Nongrum ha ka sngi Balang u la kynnoh kylla ia u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba peit ia ka tnat Kam Pohing Bah Prestone Tynsong  ba u la ialam bakla halor ka Advertisement khot rungkam Pulit.“Kane katba kim pat lah ban pynmih ia ka hukum lyngba ka Personel Department kam biang. Wat ialam bakla Symbud Myntri Rangbah, phi ladep mynjur ha ka Kynhun Myntri hynrei phi khlem pynmih lyngba ka Personel Department kumba long ka Office Memorandum kaba la pynmih ha ka 3 tarik, Rymphang, 2022,” ong u Bah Adelbert Nongrum ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba ladep ban ujor ejahar ha Sadar Police Station.“Kane ka dei ka bym don jingkitkhlieh jong kita kiba kam nongialam kim don ka jingkitkhlieh ia ki khun samla, khamtam ha kum kane ka por ka jingkyrduh kam,” la kynthoh u Bah Nongrum.“Lada phi ong ba nga ialam bakla bad ngam tip ia ka ain, sngewbha ujor pyrshah ia nga da ka ejahar bad kane kam dei ka sien kaba khatduh ba ngan wan da kane ka lynti bad ka dang don sa kawei pat kaba ngan sa pynbna lada ki ophisar ki phiel namarba ka sorkar mynta kam donbor,” la kob u Bah Nongrum.Haba buh jingkylli, u la ong, “ha ka 8 tarik, Lber, phi pyllait ia ka Advertisement bad ha ka 16 tarik, Lber ka wan ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) bad phi leh aiu naduh ka 17 tarik, 18 tarik, 19 tarik, 20 tarik, 21 tarik bad phi ap mynta la jan shi bnai ban pan jingbit na ka Election Commission of India (ECI). Hato kane kam dei ba phi kwah ban pynduh ia ka hok jong ki khun samla ba phi kwah tang ban dep ka elekshon ba phin mynjur da ka Office Memorandum ba thymmai ba kan long ka jingduhnong kaba khraw na ka bynta ki khun samla.”“Nga sngewthuh ba ka tnat Pulit katkum ka jingkylla jong ka por, ka lah ban pynkylla ia ka Recruitment Policy. Wat ym klet ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u ladep pynpaw ba ka jingpynbna (notification) ladep ban pynmih ha kaba iadei bad ka rta kaba u kren ha ka 26 tarik, Rymphang, 2024.  Haba nga iakren bad u Secretary jong ka tnat Kam Pohing ba ka Office Memorandum kaba thymmai dang don hapdeng ka jingpynkhreh haba kumta kumno phi lah ban iaid shakhmat ban khot aplikeshon ia ki khun samla,” la kynthoh u Bah Nongrum bad bynrap ba kane ka la pynkulmar jingmut shuh shuh ia ki khun samla kiba thep kam.“Haoid, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la pule ia ka 2nd para jong ka Office Memorandum 3.02.202 hynrei phi khlem kdew ia ka kyntiew kaba ong, kumba la pynbna da ka Personel Department. Dei na kata ka daw kane ka Advertisement ka long kaba be-ain,” u la ong.U la ong shuh shuh katba ka Office Memorandum kaba thymmai kam pat mih, ka Office Memorandum kaba la pynmih ha ka 3.02.2022 ka dang ieng kaba kdew ia ka rta thungkam haduh 32 snem ka rta bad pynjlan sa 5 snem kaba long 37 snem.“Ka tnat Pulit ka dei ban leh ia la ka jong ka kamram bad lada phim shimkhia ka dang don sa kawei pat ka lynti kaba nga dang pynkhreh ban iaid shakhmat,” u la ong.
title: U DY. CM U ÏALAM BAKLA HALOR KA ADVERTISEMENT RUNG KAM PULIT, KYNNOH U BAH ADELBERT

content: : Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO) Nongthymmai Circle ha ka taiew ba ladep ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u President rangbah u Bah Donbok Dkhar ka la pynkup burom ia ki heprit kiba la wanrah nam bad burom ia ka Jylla Meghalaya ha ka lympung ialehkai Sambo kaba long ha Haryana kaba la tip kum ka 14th National Sambo Championship 2023-24.Kine ki nongialehkai ki dei na ka Sambo Association of Meghalaya ba la lamkhmat da u Bah Elton Swer kum u President.Lai ngut ki nongialehkai kiba la ioh khur ia ka takma ksiar ki long Amaziah Syiemlieh, Dame Hector Marboh bad Samuel Mukherjee. Lai ngut kiba ioh khur takma Rupa ki long Mewanshanlang kharsyiemiong, Iaphilabet Rani bad Haridey Tamang katba uwei uba la ioh khur ia ka takma rnong u dei u Nangkitboklang Diengdoh.
title: WANRAH BUROM KI NONGÏALEHKAI SAMBO SHA KA JYLLA, PYNKUP BUROM KA HITO

content: U President jong ka Indian National Congress (INC) u  Mallikarjun Kharge ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki Nongialam ka All India Congress Committee (AICC)  u la pyllait paidbah ïa ka Manifesto kaba don shi khung ki jubanlak ban leh na ka bynta ki paidbah nongshong shnong ha ka ri India lada ka Congress ka iohbat ia u lakam synshar hadien ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha 19, ïaïong, 2024.Ki jubanlak kiba ka Congress ka la khlei paidbah ha kane ka ilekshon sha Lok Sabha ka long ban wanrah ia ka jinglong kaba mar ïa ryngkat, ban ïada ka jinglaitluid ki niam bad ïa ki ritpaid, ban kyntiew ïa ki samla, ka jingaibor shuh shuh ïa ki kynthei, ki khun kynthei, na ka bynta ki nongrep bad ïa ki kynhun ba im na ka kam tong dohkha bad kum juh na ka bynta kiba trei kam bylla.Ka Congress ka kular ruh ban ïada ïa ka riti synshar jong ka Ri India, ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka synshar paidbah, ban pynbha biang ïa kaba la pynsniew, ki lad pathai khubor, ki ïing bishar, ka jingïaleh ïa ki kam bamsap, ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki riti dustur.Kiwei kiwei ki bynta kiba la kdew ha ka kular ilekshon ka long ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot ka Ri, ka jingïaburom ïa ka jingsynshar hapdeng ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ki Sorkar Jylla, ban ïada ia ka Ri bad ban ïada ïa ka mariang. Ka jubanlak ka don haduh 54 sla.
title: ELEKSHON LOK SABHA: SHI KHUNG KI JUBANLAK KULAR KA CONGRESS HA KA MANIFESTO

content: Katba ki sngi ki la nang jan ban jied nongmihkhmat sha Parliament na Shillong bad Tura Seat, ka tnat Election jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ka la pynsdang ia ka jingthep vote ia ki tymmen ki kro ha la ing ha North Garo Hills District kaba la sdang naduh ka sngi Palei bad ka ban bteng haduh ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da ka tnat Election, ka jingthep vote jong ki tymmen ki kro ha Amlarem Assembly Segment kan sdang naduh ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai bad la thmu ban pyndep haduh ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka jingthep vote na ka bynta ki Absentee Voter hapoh ka South Garo Hills la buh sngi ha ka 12 bad 13 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha Ri Bhoi la buh sngi ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai.  Ka jingthep vote ki Absentee Voter hapoh ka South West Garo Hills la buh sngi ba kan long naduh ka 6 tarik haduh ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka jingthep vote ha la ing ia ki Absentee Voter ha East Garo Hills kan long ha ka 12 tarik bad 13 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka jingthep vote ha la ing na ka bynta ka West Garo Hills la buh sngi ha ka 8 tarik bad 9 tarik mynta u bnai.
title: ELEKSHON LOK SABHA: SDANG KA JINGTHEP VOTE ÏA KI RIEWTYMMEN NA ÏING

content: : Kawei ka kali Gypsy jong ki Pulit kaba pynieng ha Mawlai Police Station, Shillong ka la shah wiang ding ha ka step phyrngap ha ki runar ki bym lah satia ban tip ki dei kiei.Katkum ka jingioh jngtip na ki Pulit, kane ka la jia ha ka por 2:00 baje eiei.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ki Pulit ki la register case bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: WIANG DING KI RUNAR ÏA KA KALI GYPSY KI PULIT HA MAWLAI POLICE STATION

content: Ka jingkhie kynsan ka eriong erngit ha ka miet sngi u Blei ha kylleng ka Jylla ka la wanrah ïa ka jingïam kthang jong kawei ka longing ha ka shnong Mawroh Laitdom, Eastern West Khasi Hills District ha kaba u khun shynrang uba dang kumba 3 snem tam ka rta u la khlad noh hadien ba ka eriong kaba jur ka la jynrat ïa ka ing kaba ki shong ki sah bad bret ïa ki briew sha surok.Ka kmie jong une u heprit uba la tip kyrteng kum u Wiki Lawriniang, ka la ïathuh ba ki la thmu ban pynkit noh ïa u sha Tirot Sing Civil Hospital, Mairang hynrei namar ka jingkhyllem jong ki dieng hapdeng surok ka la pynlong ïa ki kali ba kim lah shuh ban ïaid bad kumta ki la hap ban shu pynkit noh sha Laitdom PHC hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba une u heprit u la khlad noh ha kane hi ka hospital.Katkum ka khubor ba la ïohlum, la ïathuh ba ki don haduh palat 80 tylli ki iing kiba la julor bad ki don ruh ki jingri kum ki sniang ki bym lah ïaid shuh namar ka jingshah ban ha ki synrum ba la pynkhyllem da ka eriong.
title: ÏAM KTHANG KA KMIE BA ÏAP U KHUN NABA JYNRAT KA ERÏONG ÏA KA ÏING HA MAWROH LAITDOM

content: U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District u Rituraj Ravi u la maham tyngeh ia ki paidbah ba kim dei ban pynsaphriang ia ki khubor lamler kiba iadei bad ka jingjia ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka shnong Ichamati.“Ka la poi ka jingtip sha ngi ba ki don katto katne ki khubor thok bad ki khubor lamler kiba la pynsaphriang ha ka Social Media ha kaba iadei bad ka jingjia ha ka 27.03.2024 ha ka shnong Ichamati. Kum kine ki khubor lamler ki buh jingma, bad pynthud ia ka shongsuk shongsain,” ong u SP ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, la kyrpad ban ym pynphriang ia kum kine ki jingjia khlem da wad ia ki jingpynshisha.  Ngi kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin ym pynsaphriang ne iasam kum ia kine ki jait khubor khlem da wad shwa ia ki jingshisha.  Ngi kyrpad ruh ia ki paidbah ban ai ka jingiatreilang ban tem ia ka jingpynphriang ia ki khubor thok ha ka Social Media, la ong shuh shuh u SP
title: WAT PYNPHRIANG IA KI KHUBOR THOK HALOR KA JINGJIA HA ICHAMATI, MAHAM U SP

content: Ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong bad kiba bun na ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Mawlai Syllaikariah, kaba hap hapoh ka Mawlai Constituency ki la rai ban ‘boycott’ ne ban ym iashim bynta ha ka Elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, Iaiong, 2024.U Rangbah  Shnong jong ka Mawlai Syllaikariah Bah C. Shullai ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei u la iathuh ba ka jingshim rai jong ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong ka long halor ka jingleh mynthi jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ka bym shym la sngap ia ka jingkyrpad ban maramot ia ka surok PWD bad ia ki surok shnong bad lynti iaid kjat hapoh ka shnong ba ka tnat PHE ka la tih bad thep ia ki pipe um mynta la shi snem tam.U la iathuh ba u Additional Chief Engineer jong ka tnat PHE u la wan peit hi dalade bad u la ong ba un sa bthah ia u Kontraktor ban shna noh ia ka surok bad ia ki lynti shnong ba ladep tih hynrei la jan shi snem la shu ieh beit kumto.“Dang lai bnai duna ngi ladep ai ia ka jingthoh da ka kti ha ka Ophis PHE hynrei ka long kumba ibeiñ ia ka shnong ba ki iehsat kumne,” la iathuh u Bah Shullai.“Ha u snem 2022 ka tnat PHE ka la wan buh ia ki pipe um ban ai um ia ka shnong lyngba ka Greater Shillong Water Supply Scheme (GSWSS).  Ki la sdang ban tih ia ka surok PWD, ia ka surok shnong bad ia ki lynti iaid kjat naduh u snem 2022 hynrei ynda ladep tih, ki shu ieh noh kumto.  Ha ka por ba slap, da ki bnai ngi (hap ban) iaid nalor ka ktieh. Ha ka por ba rang u pumpum u rung sha ki ing jong ki briew,” ong u Bah Shullai.U la iathuh ba ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong ka la kyrpad ia u Kontraktor ban tap bad ban leh bha noh bad shipor u la sdang ban leh bad u iehnoh bad u la sdang biang bad iehnoh.  “Bun ki briew ki la mynsaw ha ka por ktieh ba slap. Ngi la kyrpad rit ia u kontraktor hynrei u shu ong toto bad shu kut tang ka ktien,” la ong u Rangbah Shnong.“Shipor u la sdang biang (ban trei) bad u la iehnoh shiteng. Ki don ki jaka kiba hap ngi ban shna hi da ka shnong bad ngi la hap ban pynlut da ka pisa shnong kumba 15 hajar haduh 20 hajar ba ki nongleit nongwan kin suk bad ki kali kin suk iaid. Ki don ki jaka ba ki kali kim long shuh wat tang ban iaid,” u la bynrap.“U Kontraktor u la sdang trei bad la wan noh u slap u iehnoh. Shipor ngi la iaishah namarba la hap u slap bad hadien kata ngi la kyrpad biang ban pyndep noh ia ka kam ba ki paidbah kin suk ka leit ka wanm” u la ong shuh shuh.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Rangbah Shnong, ki don leilei ki jaka ba ki briew haba ki iaid mynmiet ki hap hapoh ki thliew. Ki la don arngut ki khynnah rit kiba hap ha kine ki thliew ki la mynsaw. I don iwei ruh i longkimie ba dang armet i la liat ha kane kajuh ka thliew bad i la mynsaw bad donbok ba dang don kiba lap ban sei ia i na thliew.“Ha ka khongdong ha lailad, kiba niah Scooty mynmiet ki ur, ki hap bad ki mynsaw bad bun ruh ki Scooty ki la sniew. Ngi la kyrpad ia ka tnat PHE bad ngi la ai ruh da ka jingthoh hynrei kam leh eiei,” u la ong.“Ngi la khot ia u MLA u ong ba um lah ban leh eiei namarba ka dei ka kam jong ka PHE bad u MDC ruh kumjuh u ong ba dei ka kam jong ka PHE um lah ban leh eiei.  Ngi la thoh da ka shithi sha ka tnat PHE ruh ki sngap manman khlem ai jubab haduh mynta,” u la bynrap.U la iathuh ba ha ka taiew baladep, kum u Rangbah Shnong u la phah noh da ka ujor lyngba ka Public Grievances Complaint sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla hynrei mynta la jan shitaiew ym don satia ba jubab eiei halor kane ka jingai ujor.“Ym don ba salia haba ngi shem jingeh.  Ngim don lad shuh bad ka lad mynta ka long sa tang ba ngin ym iashim bynta shuh ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha namarba ngim i myntoi. Ngi jied ia ki nongmihkhmat ba kin dup lah ban iarap ha ki kam pynroi bad ki jingeh ba ka shnong ka ud ka nam ban pynsngerw sha ka Sorkar hynrei ka shu kut noh kumto,” ong u Bah Shullai.“Haba ngi jied ia ki nongmihkhmat ngi mut ba kin mihkhmkat ia ngi ki paidbah bad ban rah ia ki jingeh jong ngi sha ka Sorkar pynban ngi sngew ba kam don jingmyntoi,” la kren diaw u Bah Shullai.“Ka Executive Committee ka la rai ba ngin ym iashim bynta ha ka elekshon Lok Sbha namarba ka Sorkar kam leh eiei. Kam don jingmyntoi lada ngi thep vote.  Bun ki nongshong shnong ki ong ba ngin ym thep vote. Hynrei ka shong pat ka mon shimet jong kito kiba kwah ban thep vote hynrei kiba bun hi ki ong ban ym thep vote,”la iathuh u Bah Shullai haba pyntip ia ka jingshim rai jong ka Dorbar Shnong bad ki paidbah nongshong shnong.“Ngin  ym shim jingkitkhlieh shuh ban pyniaid beit iaid ryntih ia ki Polling Station bad ngin ieh beit ba ka Sorkar kan leh katba ka sngewbit hynrei ka shnong kam don jingkitkhlieh.  Lada ka Sorkar kam iohi bad kam shimkhia ia kane ka jingeh kaba ngi la pynpaw shwa ka Elekshon MP ngi kum ka shnong ngin ym iashim bynta eiei,” la bynrap shuh shuh u Bah Shullai.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Rangbah Shnong, ki nongthep vote ha ka shnong Mawlai Syllaikariah ki don 1500 ngut bad lah ruh ban tam namarba ki don kiba dang shu pynrung kyrteng thymmai ha ka Electoral Roll.
title: RAI KA EC KA DS MAWLAI SYLLAIKARIAH BAN “BOYCOTT” ÏA KA ELEKSHON LOK SABHA

content: U Bah Vincent H. Pala uba long u nongïalam jong ka seng Congress bad uba dei ruh u sitting MP ka Shillong Seat ha ka sngi Baar u la ong ba ka BJP kan ym jop palat ïa ka 200 Seat ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long.U la kynnoh, lada ka BJP ka ïoh 370 Seat, kan pynkylla ïa ka Riti Synshar jong ka ri da kaba weng noh ïa ka kyntien ‘secularism’ khnang ban pynurlong ïa ka jingphohsniew ban pynlong ri Hindu ïa ka India.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba ladep thep kyrteng, u Bah Pala u la ong, “kumba ka long mynta, ki (BJP) khlem pynbna ïa ka thup kyrteng basaw.  Balei?  Namarba bun ki jingïashrut hapoh ka party. Namarkata, ban ong ba kin jop palat 200 Seats ka long kum u dak jingkylli uba heh na ka bynta jong namarba kim don kyrtong ha ki jylla kum ha Meghalaya bad ha North East. Kumno phin khmihlynti ba kin jop?  Ka dei tang ka buit ban pynbiej ïa ki paidbah.”U la ong ba ka BJP ka ïoh 303 ngut ki MP ha ka elekshon ba ladep bad mynta ka kynti ka BJP kan hiar bha ha Maharashtra, Karnataka, Delhi, Bihar, Punjab, UP, Himachal Pradesh bad ha kiwei kiwei ki jylla.  U la ong, “ha South India, palat 130 ngut ki MP bad mynta ka kynti, ka Congress kan ïoh kham bun ki Seat (na South).”Haba pynpaw ba ka jingbuh thong jong ka BJP ban jop haduh 400 Seat ka dei tang ka jingpyrta ban ai dak ïa ki paidbah ka ri India, u Bah Pala u la ong, “ngi don 540 ngut ki MP.  Ban pynkylla ïa ka riti synshar jong ka ri India ka BJP ka donkam 362 ngut haduh 370 ngut, na kata ka daw ki pynbna 370. Hato ki thmu aiu da kaba ong 370, 370 ki la aidak lypa ban maham ïa ki paidbah ka ri India lada ngi ïoh 370, kin pynkylla ïa ka riti synshar jong ka ri?  Ka kyntien “secularism” kin weng na ka riti synshar jong ka ri India.Lada la weng ïa ka kyntien “secularism” na ka riti synshar kan long kum ka Pakistan. Ka Pakistan ka dei ka ri Muslim, ka Bangladesh ka dei ka ri Muslim, ka Iran ka dei ka ri Muslim, ngin sa long kum ka Pakistan, kino kino kiba ngeit ha kiwei kiwei ki jait niam kan long beaiñ.  Kane ka dei ka jingthmu jong ka jingpyrta 370-400. Ki tip ba kin ym ïoh hynrei ki shu kwah tang ban pynpaw pyrthei, kin leh beit ïa kane, kin pynkylla ïa ka India sha ka ri Hindu bad kane ka dei ka jingphohsniew jong ka BJP, la ong shuh shuh u Bah Pala.“Nga la thikna ba bun na phi ki dei ki Hindu, bun na ki paralok jong ngi ki dei ki Hindu bad ngi kwah ai ka ri kaba shongsuk shongsaiñ, ngi kwah ïa ka ri kaba lait na ki jingshah thombor, ngi kwah ïa ka ri kaba lait na ki jingeh kumba la mad da ka Pakistan, Bangladesh bad kiwei kiwei,” u la bynrap.Haba kynnoh ba ka jingïashrut hapoh ka BJP kan jur bha ha kane ka kynti u Bah Pala u la ong, “ki diaw mynsiem mynta ka kynti. Phi ïohi ba bun na ki MP ba la kham rangbah, ki shah pynduh tiket bad wat ïa kiba bun ki MLA ruh kim ailad satia. Lada phi peit ha Maharashtra, ha Madhya Pradesh bad Rajasthan, phin ïohi ba ïa ki nongïalam ba la rangbah ki la shah bret shabar, ki wanrah da ki nongïalam ba thymmai.”Haba kynthoh ruh ïa u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi u Bah Pala u la ong, “sa kawei pat kaba kham kongsan ka dei kaba jarjar, phi tip lada ngi tei ïa ka Ingmane, uno uno u rangbah niam u hap ban pynkyntang hynrei mynta u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri India tang ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa ka Ram Mandir ha ka jaka ban ailad ïa ki Sadhu ba kin leh ïa ka kamram, ki politishian ki leh ïa ka kam jong ki.  Ka jingthylli hapdeng ki Hindu, ka jingthylli hapdeng ka BJP bad kito ki briew kiba dei ban leh ïa ka kamram ka la nang ïa jngai.  Ka BJP haba peit na ka liang ka niam, ki la leh bakla, na ka liang ka saiñpyrthei ki la leh bakla bad kin ym ïoh hi ruh wat 200 seat.”Da kaba pynpaw ban dang jop na Shillong seat, u Bah Pala u la ïathuh ïa ki jingjop jong ka Congress ha ki 15 snem ba la leit noh.  U la ong ba ki don bun ki jingdonkam ba dang dei ban leh khamtam ha Meghalaya kaba dang donkam ïa ka kad liengsuin ba thymmai.“Ka Congress ka la lehbha ha ka liang ka pule ka puthi, ka jingpynïasoh ïa ki surok, ka khaii ka pateng, ka jingsam marbiang ïa ka ïoh ka kot.  Ka polisi ba ka Congress ka la leh mynshwa, bad ka polisi jong ka sorkar ba mynta ki ïapher baklybak.“Nga dei tang ma nga u MP, uba la shah pynwit ha ka BJP bad kiwei kiwei ki MP la ka long ha Assam,  ha Arunachal Pradesh, bun kiba la leit noh ruh balei namarba ki la shah pynbiej ne shah byrngem, ki la phah tynruh ïa nga da ka ED, ka IT ruh kumjuh hynrei nga shaniah bad nga ieid ïa ki paidbah ka Meghalaya.  Nga don mynta hangne na ka bynta ki paidbah bad ki paidbah hi kin shaniah bad kin ai vote ïa nga,” u la ong.
title: KA BJP KAN YM JOP PALAT 200 SEAT HA KA ELEKSHON LOK SABHA, ONG U BAH VINCENT PALA

content: Ka CMC Mawiong kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih baroh shikatta da ka St. Dominic Savio Church Mawlai Parish ha ka sngi U Blei ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong la kyntiew kyrdan sha ka Parish ba thymmai kaba don la u jong u nongsharai mynsiem rangbah.Ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong ka la jer kyrteng thymmai ïa ka CMC Mawiong, ha ka jingplie Parish thymmai kum “Ka Maria ka Syiem U Rosari Bakhuid’ ïa kaba la pynbna da u Archbishop jong ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh da ka jingsynran lang jong u Parish Priest jong ka Mawlai Parish u Rev. Fr. Telesphor Nonglang bad kiwei kiwei ki Lyngdoh Sohblei.Shwa ban pynlong ïa ka Mass Bakhuid, u Archbishop Victor ha ryngkat ki paid u Blei la ïashim bynta ha ka proseshon u Sla Tlai ban kynmaw burom ïa ka jingrung jong u Jisu Khrist sha nongbah Jerusalem.U Archbishop Victor kum u kongsan u la aiti ha u Vicar General ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong u Fr. Richard Manbha Majaw ban pynbna ïa ka Dulir treikam bad u pud u sam jong ka Parish Mawiong.U Fr. Majaw haba pule paidbah ïa ka Dulir u la pyntip ba u pud u sam treikam jong ka Parish Mawiong u ïakynduh shaduh ka Parish Mawlaingut, Parish Mawprem, Parish Mawlai bad Parish Umbir.Ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka Parish Mawiong ki long ka CMC Nongkwar, ka CMC Umjajew, ka CMC Umthlong bad ka CMC Umjapung.Ïa ka Parish Mawiong la shimti ban peit bad sumar ïa ki khun Khristan Katholic da ki Phadar ka Jingïasyllok Diocesan ne ki Phadar Trai Ri, la ïathuh u Archbishop Victor uba la thung ïa u Rev. Fr. Alfred Lyngdoh Nongbri kum nongsharai mynsiem banyngkong eh jong kane ka Parish.U Archbishop Victor haba pynkupbor ïa u Fr. Alfred Lyngdoh Nongbri uba la duwai kyntang ryngkat ka kylli ka pyrthew ïa u Nongsharai bathymmai ryngkat ka jingduwai ban phla ïa ka jingngeit jong ki Apostol.Kumba dei ka bynta ka Balang ban pynkhamti bad ai bor ïa ki Lyngdoh Sohblei; u Fr Alfred u la khlei ïa ka jubanlak da kaba kular ban bud ryntih ïa ki Dulir ba la ai da ka Jylla Niam Bah bad ban ïatrei lang bad ka Balang ryngkat bad ki paid U Blei.Haba pynkupbor shuh shuh u Bishop Victor Lyngdoh ban pynskhem ïa kane ka kam kum u Nongsharai u ïalam ïa u Fr, Alfred Lyngdoh Nongbri ban dohieid ïa ki sawdong jong ka Duwan bad ka kam ban shong ha Khet Jingphla.Ka kam ba kyntang tam jong ka jingpynkupbor ïa ki nongsharai jong ka Parish bathymmai ka dei da u Lyngdoh Sad ha kaba u la aiti ïa u shabi jong ka Tabernacle ka jaka ba shong ba sah ka Met bad ka Snam jong U Jisu Khrist ba ladep pynkyntang.Hadien ka jingpynkupbor na ka liang u Archbishop u la aiti ïa ki kot dulir bad ka jingïasoi ïa ka sakhi satar hapdeng ka Parish Council u nongsharai mynsiem banyngkong.U Archbishop Victor hadien ka jingpyndep ïa ka deiti lehniam u la plie ïa u Mawnongrim, bad pynher ïa ki baloon bad ka jingot ïa u cake.
title: AI SNGEWBHA PASKHA KA JYLLA NIAM BAH SHILLONG DA KA PARISH THYMMAI ÏA KA CMC MAWÏONG

content: Ka seng kieng atiar Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) lyngba u kyrwoh ba la phah da u General Secretary cum Publicity Secretary u Bah Sainkupar Nongtraw sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ong ba ladep ban ithuh durkhmat ia u briew uba donkti ha ka jingiap jong u Bah Cherishstarfield Thangkhiew.Ha u kyrwoh, une u nongialam ka HNLC u la ong, ba u Pulit Ophisar uba donkti ha ka jingiap jong u Bah Cherish un sa mad ia ka jingeh bad byrngem ruh ba ka seng kan thwet bad kan sa pynshitom bad khrai khlieh ia u.“Ki jingiaithok ba bunsien bad ka jingtrei shitom ki Pulit ban buhrieh ia ki jingshshisha ki dei ki sakhi, leh mynleh bym tip halor ka jingshisha ba pyrshang ban tep ia ka jingshisha,” ong u kyrrwoh ka HNLC.Ha ka bynta kaba sdang jong u kyrwoh, ka HNLC ka la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngew lyngngoh ban lap ia ka jingkam jong ka tnat Pulit halor ka Audio Recording ba la kynnoh ba uwei u dkhot ba la shah kem jong ka HNLC u la iakren bad u Military Commander jong ka HNLC u Bah Sanbor Pala.  Hato ka tnat Pulit ka mut ban ong ba u Bah Cherishterfield Thangkhiew u dang im? la buh jingkylli ka HNLC.Ka HNLC ka la buh jingkylli ruh sa katno ngut ki mynsiem ba luilui kin kylla langknia ha ki ktang suloi jong ka tnat Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya tang na ka daw ba la suba ba ki lah ban dei u Bah Sanbor Pala. Sa mano ban kylla langknia?  Hato kin shu pynlong sohpdung ia ki nongialam sengbhalang da ka jingsuba ba dei u Sanbor Pala? Lada ki iohkem ia u Sanbor Pala shisha, ngin yn don jingiada ban len ia ka dur ba shisha jong u. Peit, kumno ki kem bym dei ia u Bah Tarzan Lymba halor ka jingsuba ba u dei uba donkti ha ka jingpynthei ia u bom IED, la ong ka HNLC.Ka HNLC ka la ong, ba katkum ka Judicial Report 2022 jong u Justice (Retired) T. Vaiphei, ki Pulit ki la kam bad kynnoh ba u Bah Cherishterfield Thangkhiew uba la ai kyrteng ialade kum u Sanbor Pala, u dei uba donkti ban dawa pisa bad ban pynbthei ia u bom IED.  Kane ka pynmih ar tylli ki ishu: ka jingtlot ka tnat syntiat ki Pulit bad ka buit ban shukor ia ki paidbah, ia ki sengbhalang bad ia ki bahaing hasem jong u Bah Thangkhiew ba u Bah Cherishterfield Thangkhiew u dei u Sanbor Pala bad uba leh ia ki kam pyntriem ha ka kyrteng sin Sanbor Pala.  Ka jingpyniap ia u Bah Cherishterfield Thangkhiew halor ka jingkynnoh ba u iakhun la ngeit ba ka dei ka jingiasylla hapdeng katto katne ngut ki Myntri jong ka Sorkar MDA, la kynnoh shuh shuh ka seng HNLC.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingkynnoh ba ka HNLC ka la ialam bakla ia ki samla da kaba pynbiej ban ai jingmyntoi bad ban ai kali, ka HNLC ka la kynthoh kylla da kaba ong ba ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla ki la ai khusnam ia ki Pulit Ophisar bad ia ki shipai kiba donkti ban pyntyrha, ban pynshitom, ban pyniap, ban set byndi ia ki nongialam riewlum bad ia ki riew paidbah ba luilui da kaba ai pisa, pynkiew kyrdan, ai ribon, ai medal, bad kiwei kiwei ki khusnam.“Ki samla Hynñiewtrep ruh ki dei hok ban ioh khusnam na ka jaidbynriew lane na ka HNLC lada ki iakhun bad pyniap ia ki nonglehbor kiba long ka jingma ia ki briew bad ia ka ri jong ngi.  Ka HNLC ka iaroh ia ki samla kiba len lade monsngewbha na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew lajong.  Ki ieng ban iakhun pyrshah ia ki Pulit, kiba buh shwa hakhmat eh ia ka bha ka miat jong ki briew ki bym dei ki riewlum,” la ong ka HNLC.Shuh shuh ka HNLC ka la kynthoh ruh ba bun na ki Ophisar Pulit Khasi ha ka tnat Pulit, kum ka Kong Claudia Lyngwa bad u Bah Vivek Syiem, ki dei tang ki ophisar khun shipiah kiba buhrieh ia ka dur ba shisha jong ki ha lyndet ka dur ba paw jong u Hynniewtrep.
title: BYRNGEM KHRAI KHLIEH KA HNLC ÏA U PULIT OPHISAR UBA SIAT ÏAP ÏA U BAH CHERIS

content: Ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ka la kyntait ban ai tiket ia ki kyrtong kiba tyrwa ban iakhun ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha 2024 ha Meghalaya, kata, na Shillong bad na Tura Parliamentary Constituency.Ka BJP ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynmih ia ka rai ban kyrshan tylli ia ka National People’s Party (NPP) ha Shillong bad ha Tura ban ioh ia ka jingjop.La pyntip ia kane da u nongaiktien ka BJP na Delhi Sambit Patra uba ong, “katkum ka jingbthah jong u National President u J.P Nadda, ka BJP kan kyrshan ia ki kyrtong ka NPP ha Meghalaya, kata ha Shillong bad ha Tura Parliamentary Seat.”Ha u kyrwoh ba la pynmih ha ka Twitter , u Patra u la ong, “katkum ka jingbthah jong u National President ka @BJP4India, Shri@JP Nadda Ji, nga sngewbha ban pyntip ba ka BJP kan ai ka jingkyrshan ia ki kyrtong ka NPP ha baroh artylli ki Seat ka Meghalaya (Shillong bad Tura).”U la pyntip ruh ba ka BJP kan kyrshan ia ka NPF ha ka Outer Manipur Constituency bad ia ka NDPP ha Nagaland ha ka Elekshon Lok Sabha 2024.Ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ka dei ka paralok kaba iatreilang hapoh ka Sorkar MDA-2 ba ialam da ka NPP ha Jylla Meghalaya bad ka NPP ka dei ka paralok kaba iatreilang ha ka Sorkar National Democratic Alliance ha Delhi ba la ialam da ka BJP.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ba ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit ka la phah 11 tylli ki kyrteng sha Delhi, kiba la tyrwa ban iakhun na ka tiket jong ka BJP ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ha Shillong bad Tura Parliamentary Seat.Napdeng kine ki 11 ngut, san ngut ki dei kiba ka party ka la phah ia ki kyrteng kiba tyrwa ban iakhun na Shillong Seat ba kynthup ia u Myntri Sorkar Bah Alexander L. Hek, ka Dr Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait, u President barim ka BJP Bah Ernest Mawrie, u President ka BJYM Bah Mewaker Lyngdoh bad ka Kong Sumitra Laloo.Na Tura Seat, kiba pan tiket ki long u u MDC ka Tura Bernard N. Marak, u MLA barim Winnerson D Sangma bad u KC Boro, u MDC barim u Boston Marak, ka Riya Sangma bad u Thomas Marak.
title: KYNTAIT KA BJP BAN PYNÏENG KYRTONG HA MEGHALAYA, RAI BAN KYRSHAN ÏA KA NPP

content: Ka khubor ba la saphriang ha Social Media ka la iathuh ba ki don kumba 50 ngut ki briew ba la kah durkhmat bha ialade bad kiba rah da ki tiar ki tar pynmynsaw ki la rung ha skulbah North Eastern Hill University (NEHU) ban thwet ia ki nongialam jong ka North Eastern Hills University Students Association (NEHUSU) kiba dei ruh ki nongialam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) NEHU Unit, kata, u Banpynbiang Riang bad u Mandor Diengdoh hadien ba la kynnoh ba kine ki arngut ki nongïalam jong ka HYC ki la khang ia ka prokram jong ka Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai kaba la thmu ban pynlong prokram ha skulbah NEHU.U nonglum khubor tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingsaphriang ka jingthoh ha rynsan Social Media u la leit sha NEHU bad sakhi ba ki Pulit SOT bad ki Pulit ka Mawkynroh Outpost ki la pahara ha phyllaw ka skulbah NEHU.Watla ki Pulit kim shym la lap satia ia ki briew kiba kah durkhmat bad rah ia ki tiar pynmynsaw hynrei ki la pynkhlaiñ ia ka jingpahara ban tem ia kino kino ki jingjia ba sngewsih kiba lah ban jia ha kano kano ka por bym lah ban poi pyrkhat.U General Secretary ka NEHUSU u Banpynbiang Riang haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la ong, “ki don kiba kam ialade na ka sengAkhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP) kawei ka kynthei bad arngut ki shynrang.  Nga la leit lang bad ki paradkhot ka seng na Mawlai ban iakynduh ia ki bad ka rukom kren ka long beit balei ba ngi pynsangeh ia ka prokram jong ki RSS. Nga la batai beit ia la ka jong ka nongrim balei ba la pynsangeh. Ka rukom kren ka long kaba khor bha bad ka bym sngewtynnat.”“Ka kynthei ka dei ka Khasi bad uwei u shynrang u dei u Khasi bad uwei u Garo,” la iathuh u samla Riang.“Ha ka jingiakren ki pynksan beit ia ka nia lajong bad bad nga ruh nga la kren beit halor ka nongrim lajong,” u la ong.U la iathuh hadien ba u la leit phai noh ban leit prokram hadien shikynta ka jinglong jingman ka skulbah NEHU ka la ipher bha.  “Hadien shikynta ka jinglong jingman ha NEHU ka ipher bha.  Ki briew ki la wan naduh mynsngi ban peit thuh bha ia nga bad ka rukom wan jong ki ka long kaba i shankhmat bha bad ngam tip la ki dei ne kim dei ki khynnah pule ha NEHU,” u la ong.“Ynda la dep jingialang nga wan phai noh bad u Mandor bad u la ioh jingtip ba ki don ki briew ba kah durkhmat ki don ha NEHU. Shisha (ngi lap) hajan Petrol Pump (NEHU) ki don kumba 50 ngut ne 60 ngut ki briew ba la kah durkhmat ki bat ia ki tiar. Ban sangeh shiteng lynti ym long shuh u Man u pynher ia ka kali.  Ynda la leit shaw ia u paralok sha Hostel ki don ki briew kumba 3-4 ngut ki shu wan peit bad ki iaid noh sharum.  Ynda la wan buh ia u paralok ngi la leit peit biang hynrei ki briew kim don shuh ki la iaphiah kynhun la ka jong,” la ong u Samla Riang.“Nga la ioh ia ka khubor na ki Security ba ki (briew bym lah ithuh) la kawang bilor ia ka Guest House ICCR bad ki don ki khynnah kiba ap ia ka Hostel 19 bad 20 ha ka por kumba 8:00 baje shaneng,” la ong u samla Riang.Haba kylli, “ka don ka jingthmu ban pynlong ia ka prokram bad ynda ngi la wad bniah bha ngi lap ba ki nongshah khot sngewbha ki dei ki nongialam ba hakhlieh ka RSS.  Kane ka prokram ka dei halor ka Indian Modern Literacy Language hynrei ynda la bishar bha ka dei ka Education Cell jong ka RSS.”“Ki khlem ioh jingbit na ka NEHUSU bad ki pynlong ia ka prokram ha ka por ba ngi don ia ka Cultural Night jong ka NEHUSU. Na kata ka daw ngim shah ba ka iatakhuh bad ka prokram jong  ngi,” u la ong shuh shuh.“Ngi don ia ki sakhi ba ka don ka jingiadei bad ka RSS na kata ka daw ngim kwah ba kan don kum kata.  Nga ka seng ngin sa shimkhia ia kane ka kam bad ka HYC ruh kan sa shimkhia,” la bynrap u samla Riang.U la iathuh ruh ba u la pyntip ia ki Pulit tangba ki la poi kham slem sha NEHU bad nalor kata wat ki Security bad ki samla pule ki iohi ia ki briew kiba kah durkhmat kiba ialum lymbung shi jaka ha NEHU.
title: SAPHRIANG KA KHUBOR BA THWET KIBA KAH DUR KHMAT ÏA KI NONGÏALAM HYC HA NEHU

content: : Ka Seng Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) Meghalaya, ka la pynpaw ba kam pat da don eh ka jingktah na ka jingbym pat pynbna ia ka kyrteng ki kyrtong na ka liang ka High Command na Delhi namar kumba ka long mynta ka dang ka por hynrei ki la angnud pat ba la kumno kumno na ka liang ka party Sengkmie kan dei ban pynbna noh mynta u taïew.“Haoid, ngi sngewthuh ba ka party ka la kham slem ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ki ban ïakhun ïa ka ilekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong bad Tura Parliamentary seat, hynrei kumba ka long mynta kam pat da ktah than eh ïa ngi kiba trei hapoh ka party namar ka por ka dang biang hynrei tang kawei kaba ngi kwah ban kyrpad ïa ka High Command ne ka BJP Sengkmie ba kan pynbna noh ha une u taïew,” ong u Bah M Kharkrang u Chief Spokesperson jong ka BJP Meghalaya haba iakren bad u nonglum khubor.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba na ka liang ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, ka la pynbna ba ka jingïathep vote ha kine ki artylli ki constituency ka Jylla Meghalaya bad kiwei ki Jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi, kan long ha ka 19 tarik ïaïong.Ka BJP na Delhi, ka la dep ban pynbna ïa 267 ngut ki kyrtong ban ïakhun ïa ka ilekshon hynrei ka la buhteng ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ban ïakhun na Meghalaya.Ka Party ka la phah haduh san tylli ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong kiba kwah ban ïakhun na Shillong bad hynriew tylli na Tura constituency.  Kine ki san ngut ki long u Myntri Sorkar Jylla  Bah AL Hek, u President barim ka party u Bah Ernest Mawrie, ka Kong Fenela L Nonglait, u Ba Mewaker Lyngdoh bad Kong Sumita Laloo.Na Tura ki long u MDC ba mynta ka Tura Bernard N Marak, u Boston Marak, Riya Sangma, KC Boro, Winnerson D Sangma bad u Thomas Sangma.Ki kyrtong ban ïakhun na Shillong seat ki long u MP ba mynta ka Congress u Bah Vincent H Pala, ka Myntri Sorkar ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh na ka NPP, u Robertjune Kharjahrin na ka RDA, u Dr Ricky AJ Syngkon na ka VPP bad ki arngut ki kyrtong shimet ba kynthup ia u Bah Daniel Kurbah bad u Prof. Lakhon Kma.Na Tura, ka MP ba mynta ka Agatha K Sangma kan ïakhun na ka NPP, u MLA ka Congress Saleng A Sangma bad u Nongïalam ka Trinamool Congress u Zenith Sangma.
title: KHMIH LYNTI KA BJP MEGHALAYA PYNBNA NOH ÏA KI KYRTONG MP NA SHILLONG BAD TURA

content: Shillong, Lber 17: U MDC ka BJP na Tura u Bernard N Marak ha ka sngi U Blei u la ong ba ha rilum Garo, ka Centre Scheme Monitoring Committee (CSMC) ka la leh ïa kiba bun ki kam kaba kynthup ïa ki kyrteng jong kito kiba ïoh myntoi kiba la shah iehnoh da ki Gram Sevak ha ki Block.“Ki nongshong shnong ki la pynpaw ba da ki hajar ngut ki longïing ki la shah ieh napoh ka thup kyrteng ba la ai sha ki Block da ki Secretary ki VEC (Gram Panchayat). Ban peit ban pynïaid kam bad ban ïarap, la thaw ïa ka CSMC ha ki VEC level kaba la pynkupbor ïa ki nongshong shnong ban peit ïa ki jingtreikam jong ki skhim ka sorkar pdeng khnang ba ki longïng kin ym shah ieh bad ba ki longïng kiba la shah ban beiñ kin ïoh ïa kitei ki skhim,” ong u Marak ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.U la ong ba ka kynhun jong ka Monitoring Committee ka la pynpaw ba bun na ki longïng longsem ki la shah ieh ha ki gram sevak bad ha ki block ha ki por ba la leit bad da kiba bun ki snem hynrei mynta ki la shah kynthup bad ki la long ki nongïashim bynta kiba shit rhem ha ki committee jong ki shnong.Ki longïng kim shym la ïoh ia ki skhim kum ka PMAY (BPL houses), NREGA (Job cards), RATION CARD, IHHL (Latrines), Pension bad kiwei namar ym don uwei ruh uba shim khia ban ïarap ïa ki ha madan. Ha ka jaka ban lum ïa ki ïa ki jingtip kiba bniah na kitei ki longïng, ki Gram Sevak kiba la don ki jingduna ki nongtrei ha kiba bun ki C and RD block, ki la kyntu ïa ki VEC secretary ban shim ïa ki kyrteng jong ki longïng longsem na ka bynta jong ki hynrei kiba bun ki shnong ki Secretary ki VEC ki pulom ban kynthup ïa ki longïng kiba dei hok ban ïoh ki lad jingmyntoi ban shah kynthup lang hapoh ka thup, u la bynrap.U Marak u la ong ba ki la don ki por jong ki jingtreikam, ki kyrteng jong ki longïng kiba dei hok ki la jah napoh ka thup ki nongïoh jingmyntoi naba ki la don katto katne ki nongtrei ki seng saiñ pyrthei kiba la don hapoh ka thup ha kaba kane ka la ïalam sha ka jingshah iehnoh ki longïng kiba dei hok ban ïoh ïa ki skhim hapoh ki kyrdan jong ka Gram Panchayat.“Ha kiba bun ki jingjia, ka kynhun jong ngi ki la leit ban pynshisha ïa ka thup kiba ïoh myntoi kaba ngi la ïoh napoh ka Centre kaba la paw ba ki longïng ba duk kiba la don hapoh ka thup ki khlem ïoh ïa ki skhim wat hapdeng ba ki kyrteng jong ki ki don hapoh ka thup jong ka sorkar pdeng,” u la ong da kaba bynrap, “Ki la don ruh ki jingjia ha kaba kijuh ki longïng ki ïoh bunsien ki jingmyntoi tang namarba ki ïoh ka jingkyrshan na ki katto katne ki nongïalam saiñ pyrthei.”U la ong ba lyngba ki RTI la pynpaw ba ki la don bun ki jingbakla ha kaba pyntreikam ïa ki skhim ka sorkar pdeng. Bun ki tnat sorkar kim pynpaw ïa ka kyrteng ki sub-contractor bad ki jingtip ba bniah jong ka JJM, PMGSY, NREGA, ki supplier bad kiwei namar kine ki contractor ki dei jong ki katto katne ki seng saiñ pyrthei. Ka BJP kan sa pynpaw ïa baroh hadien ba la ïoh shibun ki jingtip lyngba ka CSMC.
title: KYNNOH U MDC KA TURA BA DUH KI LONGÏING BADUK KA RILUM GARO ÏA KI SKHIM SORKAR PDENG

content: Ka Meghalaya Joint Action Committee (MJAC) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ujor sha u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah Donald P. Wahlang bad kyntu ba un shimkhia ban tuklar lem halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki Pulit ki donkti ban dawa pisa na ki trok kit maw, mawria, dewbilat, dpei dewiong bad na ki trok kit marbam.“Ka jingdon jong ki Police Outpost ha shilynter ka surokbah National Highway naduh East Jaiñtia Hills, West Jaiñtia Hills, East Khasi Hills bad Ribhoi District ki dei ki jingpang ha ka jingïaid lynti jong ngi. Manla ka por ba ngi hap ban ïaid lyngba ïa kine ki Police Outpost ngi shah pynbor ban siew da ka dor kaba heh watla ka dei ka pisa kaba ngi hap ban pynlut ban thied bam ha ka jingïaid lynti. Don ki khep ba ngi hap ban shah jingit da ki sngi namarba ngi la lut ka pisa na ka daw jong kine ki Police Outpost.Kaba kham pynmong shuh shuh, kine ki Police Outpost kiba dei ban peit ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ, pynban, manla ka sngi ki dawa pisa na ki nongñiah trok,” ong ka dorkhas na ka MJAC ba la soi da u Chairman Bah Biangshwa Shylla, u Finance Secretary Bah Balen Thubru bad u General Secretary Bah Enrico D. Passi.“Ki trok ki shah pynsangeh kumba 12 haduh 15 sien ha ki Police Outpost ba don ha ki surokbah National Highway kiba leh mynleh ban talasi ïa ka jingkit palat pud, ka jingshalan dewiong be-aiñ bad talasi ïa ki kot ki sla jong ki trok khnang ban ïohlad ban dawa pisa T.100 haduh T. 500 na kawei kawei ka trok kiba kit ïa ki maw, mawria, dewbilat, dpei dewiong bad na ki trok kit marbam,” la kynnoh ka MJAC.“Wat haba rah ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang ban kit ïa ki mar, ki Pulit ki dawa pisa nga ngi ha ka por mynsngi bad ha ka por mynmiet.  Lada ki nongñiah trok ki kyntait ban siew ïa ka pisa ba ki shah dawa ki Pulit ki shoh ïa u nongñiah bad pynjulor ruh wat ïa ki trok bad ym shah hi ruh ïa ki trok ban ïaid,” kynnoh shuh shuh ka MJAC.“Ka bym lah ban long ba u Pulit un dawa pisa khlem ka jingtip jong uba kham halor jong u.  Hadien ba la pyntreikam ïa ka GST, ngi ngeit ba ki Pulit kin ym tuklar ïa ka kam jong ngi namarba ngi la pynbiang ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang hynrei ngi shah pynbor ban siew ïa ka pisa watla bun na ki trok ki dei kiba don ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang ban ïaid ha ki surokbah.  Ym baroh ki trok ki ïakynduh jingeh.  Ki don ki khep haba ki Pulit Traffic ki lah ban pynsangeh ïa ka Trok, hynrei ym dei ban shu pynsangeh lut naphang.  Kum ka nuksa, shispah tylli ki trok kiba ïaid, bad u pulit u pynsangeh lut ïa ki.  Hato kine ki trok kin mad lut ïa kajuh ka jingeh,” la buh jingkylli ka MJAC.Ka MJAC ka la kam ruh ba wat hapdeng ka jingtalasi bad pynsangeh ïa ki trok kumba 12 haduh 15 sien hynrei ka jingshalan beaiñ ïa u dewiong ka dang don ha East bad ha West Jaiñtia Hills District.  Haduh mynta, ki dang don byllai ki trok kit dewiong kiba kit ïa u mar sha ki jaka bapher bapher ka District, ka Jylla bad wat sha ka jylla Assam khlem sangeh.“Kum kine ki kam yn ym lah ban leh khlem ka jingïada da ki bor sorkar. Kaba pynlyngngoh, ba bun na ki trok kit dewiong ki dei ki jong ki bahaing hasem ne kiba don ka jingïadei kaba jan bad ki briew kiba don ha ka bor,” la kynnoh ka MJAC.“Ngi kyrpad ïa phi ban pynsangeh noh mardor ïa kine ki jingdawa pisa da ki Pulit ha shilynter ka surokbah,” la kyrpad ka MJAC ïa u Chief Secretary bad phah kopi ruh sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, sha u Symbud Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka jylla bad sha u Director General of Police ka Jylla.
title: UJOR KA MJAC SHA KA SORKAR HALOR KA JINGKYNNOH DAWA PISA JUBOR KI PULIT NA KI NONGNIAH TROK

content: : Ka jingdon jong ki nongthep vote hapoh ka ri India la sakhi ba la ki la nang kiew shwa ba ka ri kan sakhi ia ka jingpynlong ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha.  Ia kane la pyntip da ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ haba ai jingkhein ia ka jingdon jong ki nongthep vote hapdeng ki kynthei, ki samla bad ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Chief ElectionCommissioner (CEC) Rajiv Kumar, ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Election Commissioner ba kynthup ia u Gyanesh Kumar bad u Dr. Sandhu ki la pynbna paidbah ia ka Tarik ban pynlong ia ka General Elections 2024 sha Lok Sabha bad ha ki Assembly jong ki Jylla.Kawei na ki bynta ba kongsan ba la pynpaw da ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ka dei ka jingkiew jong ki nongthep vote khamtam hapdeng ki kynthei, ki samla bad ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet.  Kumba 82 lak ki nongthep vote ki dei kiba don jingduna dkhotmet, 2.2 lak kia la kynjoh ia ka rta kaba 100 snem, 48,000 hajar ngut ki Third Gender.Kane ka elekshon kan sakhi ia ka jingkiew ki nongthep vote ki samla kiba don 1.8 klur ban iashim bynta ha ka jingthep vote ha ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ha ka jingim ka jong ki.  Nalor kata, hapdeng ka rta 20-29 snem ki nongthep vote ki don 19.47 klur.U Rajiv Kumar u la ong ba ka Commission kan pynthikna ba ka jingpynlong ia ka jingiathep vote kan long da ka lynti kaba khuid, ban leh ruh da kaba tyngeh pyrshah ia ki jingialam bakla.Da kaba bsut ia ka phang, “Celebrating Inclusivity,” ka ECI ka la iaiban ba ka jingpynlong ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha ha kane ka kynti kan dei da ka lynti kaba khuid bad kaba bym don jingiashah liang.Haba kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin iashim bynta pura ha ka jingthep vote, u Kumar u la kyntu ia ki nongshong shnong jong ka ri ba kin pyndonkam hok ia la ka itkiar ba la pynkupbor da ka riti synshar jong ka ri India da ka jingiashim bynta ha ka jingiathep vote, khnang ba yn dup lah ban sngap ia ka sur jong iwei pat iwei bad ban khein lang.
title: 2.2 LAK KI NONGTHEP VOTE BA LA KYNJOH 100 SNEM , 82 LAK KIBA DUNA DKHOTMET

content: Arngut ki briew ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills District hadien ba ka la jia ka jingpynbthei ia u bom IED hajan ka Syndicate Bus Stand, ha Them Iewmawlong ha ka miet sngi saitjain jong ka taiew baladep ha ka por kumba 10:30 baje mynmiet.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills District Rituraj Ravi u la iathuh ba ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ki la kem ia ki arngut ki briew ha ka miet sngi u Blei, kata, ia u Bah Ebakordor Nongpluh uba la 26 snem ka rta uba la shah kem na Shillong bad u Bah Tarson Lymba uba la 58 snem ka rta uba la shah kem na Dawki.Ki Pulit ki la thong ruh da ka khusnam pisa kaba 1 lak tyngka ia kino kino ki briew kiba la ban ai ia ka jingtip kaba bniah halor ka jingpynthei ia u bom IED ha Them Iewmawlong bad pyntip ruh ba ia ka kyrteng jong ki nongai jingtip yn sa buhrieh noh.
title: KEM KI PULIT ARNGUT HA KA JINGBTHEI U BOM IED HA THEM IEWMAWLONG

content: Da kaba buh hakhmat ïa ka thong ban wanrah biang sa shisien pat ia ka jingkhuid jingsuba jong ka Wah Umkhrah kaba dei ka wah kaba bna nam bha ha ki por kiba mynshwa, ka Green Tech Foundation (GTF) ka la shim ïa ka sienjam da kaba pynkhuid ïa ki bynta jong ka Wah Umkrah hajan Weiking, ka Seng Khasi College.Kane ka sienjam jong ka Green Tech Foundation ka dei ka sien baar bad kaba nyngkong eh ka dei halor ka jingpynkhuid ïa ka wah Nondeiñ ha Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills District bad kane ka sienjam ba la shim ha Nongstoiñ ka dei ka projek kaba jop namarba baroh ki ïa snohkti lang.Shwa ban pynkhuid ïa ka wah Umkhrah na ka liang jong ki dkhot ka Green Tech Foundation (GTF) ki la ber shwa da ki kynja dawai ban lait na kino kino ki jingsma kaba mih na ki jaboh jong ka wah.Ha kane ka jingpynkhuid ïa ka Wah Umkhrah, ka Green Tech Foundation (GTF) ka la pyndonkam da ki lieng ban tong bad ban khat ïa ki ñiut ki ñier bad ïa ki jaboh kiba lang ha kane ka wah.U Chairman jong ka Foundation u Bah H. Bansiewdor Nonglang haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u la pynpaw ba ka jingong ba duh jingkyrmen ban pynkhuid ïa ka Wah Umkhrah ka dei tang ka nia ha ki dukan sha hynei lada don ka mon kumta lada don ka jingkitkhlieh bad ka long kaba donkam ban ïamih lang ban pynkhuid ïa kane ka wah kaba la nguid ki phew lak ton ki jaboh ba la pyntuid na kylleng ka sor Shillong.
title: DA KI LIENG, TONG KA GTC ÏA KI JABOH jabaiñ KIBA PER HA WAH UMKHRAH

content: Shillong March 08 : Cybercriminals are fraudulently posing as Senior Government officials of CBI, IB, INTERPOL, I4C, DOT, TRAI and State Police Department of Maharashtra, thereafter serve notices and file fake charges against innocent individuals in various ways (eg:- informing an individual that some mobile numbers are registered in their name and committing illegal activities like advertising fraud investments, harassing other individuals through messages, browsing and watching pornographic content, etc. and that cases has been registered with Mumbai Police) coercing innocent individuals to divulge personal information through Skype and respond to the notice served to them within 24 hours failing which they will be arrested and dealt seriously in the Court of Law. Oflate, many citizens have fallen victim to such type of crime and most of the individuals end up paying hefty amount of money to fraudsters for case settlement.
title: BEWARE! CYBERCRIMINALS POSING AS GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS

content: March 5 : Get ready to witness the awe-inspiring precision and power of the Indian Air Force (IAF) as they host a spectacular Air Display Show at Umiam Lake on.The event, held at the Water Sports Complex near Orchid Resort, promises a thrilling display featuring theand other IAF aircraft. Witness the mesmerizing synchronized maneuvers of the Suryakiran team and be awestruck by the flypast of helicopters, fighter jets like the Su-30 MKI and Rafale.This exciting event is, offering a unique opportunity for families and aviation enthusiasts to witness the IAF’s capabilities firsthand.The event is expected to be graced by several dignitaries, including the Chief Minister of Meghalaya, adding to the grandeur of the occasion.Group Captain Vijesh Valsalan, Commanding Officer, urges everyone to attend the event and spread the word to make it a grand success. Don’t miss this chance to experience the thrill and power of the Indian Air Force at Umiam Lake!
title: INDIAN AIR FORCE TO DAZZLE SHILLONG WITH AIR DISPLAY AT UMÏAM LAKE

content: : Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU)Laban Circle ha ka sngi Balang ka la ujor ha u Chairman jong ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) bad ha u Director jong ka Meghalaya Power Distribution Corporation Limited (MePDCL) ka tnat kaba peit ia ka jingsam bording.Ha ka dorkhas ka la kynnoh ba ki briew kiba sah ha Maxwelton Estate kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka Dorbar Shnong Kench’s Trace, Oxford, Rilbong (KOR) ki ioh ia ka bording da kaba shu leh tuh bad shu ring bording na ki briew kiba don ia ki Meter.Ka seng ka la pynpaw ruh ia ka jinglynngoh ba kumno kine ki briew ki ioh ban ring bording haba kim don ia kino kino ki kot ki sla kiba biang bad wat ka Dorbar Shnong KOR ruh kam shym ithuh bad ai NoC ia ki.“Ki riewpaidbah shuwa ban tan bording ha ki thliew iing jong ki, ki hap ban pynshisha ia ka jinglong trai ia ka khyndew ne ia ka iing kaba ki sah. Hynrei kaba lyngngoh ka long ba baroh kine ki briew ba sah beaiñ ha kane ka jaka ki ioh ban ring bording bad kumno na ka liang ki bor pyniaid kim shym la jurip bad ki shu sngap jar jar baroh shikatta. Kane ka jingleh jong ka MeECL lehse ka lah ban long kawei na ki dawbah ba ka tnad ka don hapdeng ka jingkyrduh pisa,” la kynthoh ka MeECL.Ka Seng ka la ban jur ia ka MeECL ban phah jurip mardor ia ki ing sah ha Maxwelton Estate bad ban khmih bniah ia ka jingring bording tuh bad dawa ruh ba dei ban ot mardor ia ka bording bad ban pynshitom ia ki katkum ka aiñ.Ka Seng ka la dawa ruh ba ka MeECL ka dei ban jubab da ka jingthoh sha ka seng halor ka jingioh tan bording da ki ki briew kiba sah beaiñ ha Maxwelton Estate.
title: UJOR KA KSU SHA KA MeECL BA ÏOH BORDING TUH KI BRIEW BASAH BE-AIÑ HA MAXWELTON ESTATE

content: Ki Pulit ka Ribhoi District kiba la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat halor ka jingdon jong kawei ka trok kaba kit ia ki mar kiba long be-aiñ ki la pynlong ka jingap shrip ha Lad Umsaw ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki Pulit CRPF jong ka 67 Battalion.Ha ka jingtalasi ia ki kali ha surokbah Four Lane ha Lad Umsaw, ki Pulit ki la iohbat ia kawei ka trok kaba don ia u nombar NL 01-AH-5853. Ha ka jingtalasi ia kane ka trok katkum ki kyndon jong ka Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act, 1985, ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong ki nongsakhi ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup 280 song u Ganja uba don ka jingkhia kaba 4,746. 409 kilo uba shongdor 20 klur.U Superintendent of Police jong ka Ri-Bhoi District Jagpal Singh Dhanoa ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh, hadien ba la kurup ia u Ganja, ki Pulit ki la kem noh ia u Babulal Sheikh uba la 48 snem uba dei na ka Jylla Maharashtra.  Ki Pulit ki la kurup ruh ia kawei ka Mobile Phone Nokia bad ka Sim Card Airtel bad ka pisa kaba 3,760 tyngka na ka met jong u Babulal Sheikh.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh ki kyndon  jong ka Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act, 1985 ha Umiam Police Station bad ka jingtohgkit mynta ka dang iaid shakhmat ban lap ksai ia kiba donkti ha kane ka kam shalan beain ia u Ganja.
title: 4750 KILO U GANJA BA SHONGDOR 20 KLUR KURUP KI PULIT HA RI-BHOI

content: : Ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) Meghalaya State Unit ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pdiang burom ïa u MLA barim ka All India Trinamool Congress na Salmanpara u Winnerson D. Sangma uba pyntip ruh ba shen ki Sitting MLA jong ka TMC ruh kin sa pynïasoh sha ka BJP.Ïa u Winnerson la pdiang burom sha ka BJP da u State President u Rikman G Momin ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki arngut ki MLA – u Bah AL Hek bad u Bah Sanbor Shullai, u Chief Spokesperson Bah M. Kharkrang bad kiwei kiwei ki nongïalam.Haba pynpaw ka BJP ka la jop lypa ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong bad Tura, u Bah AL Hek u la ong, “kiwei kiwei ki MLA barim lane ki Sitting MLA shen kin sa wan ban pynïasoh bad ka BJP bad ngi shu ap sa tang ïa ka por bad ha ki khyndiat sngi, ma ki ruh kin sa wan.”Haba kylli, katno ngut ki MLAka TMC ki ban pynïasoh sha ka BJP, u Bah Hek u la ong, “katno ngut kin wan, sa shu ap bad shu peit.”U Bah Sanbor Shullai haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli, u la ong ba ka BJP ka long kaba la khreh ban siang Carpet saw ïa u nongïalam ka TMC u Dr. Mukul Sangma, uba long ruh u Myntri Rangbah barim ka Jylla.Shwa kane, haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Winnerson u la ong ba um lah satia ban kren eiei ha ka kyrteng jong u Dr Mukul Sangma.“Ïa ka rai jong u (Mukul) ngam lah ban kren eiei bad kata ka shong ha u (la u wan pynïasoh ne um wan).  Ka dei ka rai jong u shimet lada u wan sha ka BJP ban shakri ïa ki paidbah.Une u ophisar MCS barim u la ong ba ka jingthmu jong u haba u pynïasoh bad ka BJP ka long ban ai jingshakri kaba kham bha shuh shuh sha ki paidbah.“Nga la don ha ka jylli saiñpyrthei naduh u snem 2023. Nga la mihkhmat ïa ka Salmanpara Constituency la jan 10 snem naduh u snem 2013 haduh u 2023 hynrei ngam la rem noh ha ka elekshon baladep. Hynrei nga dang don beit ha ka saiñpyrthei. Nga kwah ban shakri ïa ki paidbah, ïa ka jylla bad ïa ka ri. Nga sngewthuh ba dei tang ka BJP ka rynsan kaba lah ban shakri kham bha ïa ki paidbah ha ki jylla bad ha ka ri.U Winnerson u la kam ruh ba kin dang don sa kiwei pat kin ban dang pynïasoh sha ka BJP ha ki khyndiat sngi ban sa wan.
title: PYNÏASOH U MLA BARIM KA TMC NA SALMAN PARA SHA KA BJP

content: : Ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ha ka sngi Balang ka la sdang ban lum ïa ki jingai jingmut na ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka jylla ïa kaba yn sa kynthup ha ka Manifesto ne mat ka treikam jong ka party na ka bynta ka Elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long shen.Ïa kane ka prokram la sdang ha ka sngi Baar ha kaba u President ka party u Rikman G. Momin u la thep nyngkong eh ïa ka jingai jingmut jong u.Ka party ka wer ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka jylla ba kin phah ïa ki jingthoh jong ki sha ka NaMO app ne da kaba shu ai Miscall ha u number 909090 2024.Ki seng trei monsngewbha bapher bapher ruh ki lah ban phah ïa ki jingai jingmut jong ki da kaba ai ïa ka jingthoh sha ka ophis treikam jong ka party ha ki district ne ha ka jylla.U President ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit u la banjur ba ka BJP ka ngeit ba ha ka synshar paidbah ki nongshong shnong ki dei ban mih shakhmat ban pynsngew ïa ki jingsngew jong ki bad khamtam ïa ki jingangnud bad ka BJP kum ka seng saiñhima sima ka pdiang ïa kita baroh bad dei tang ka BJP ha baroh kawei ka ri kaba ïaid ryngkat lang bad ki paidbah ban shna ïa ki mat treikam jong ka.Lyngba kane ka prokram ka Party ka kwah ban trei da kaba ïoh ïa ka jingmynjur na ki paidbah. Bunbah ki jingangnud jong ka jylla bad ka BJP ka ailad ïa iwei pa iwei i nongshong shnong ban phylliew.Ka seng ka la buh jingthmu ban pynpoi haduh 5000 tylli ki jingthoh halor ki mat bapher bapher kum ka jingithuh ïa ki ktien ka jylla ha ka Khyrnit Baphra, ka jingseng ïa ki Medical College, ka jingpynkiew ïa ki lad ai jingsumar,  ka jingpynkha ïa ki kam ki jam na ka bynta ki khun samla bad kumta ter ter.
title: PAN JINGMUT KA BJP NA KI PAIDBAH KA JYLLA SHWA BAN PYNMIH ÏA KA MENIFESTO

content: U Rangbah Shnong jong ka shnong Mawlai Nongkwar Bah Moonstar Nongrum ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei u la plie paidbah ia ka jaka kilan met kaba la ai kyrteng kum ka “Together Strong Gym” ha Block-11 ha ka shnong Mawlai Nongkwar.Shwa ban plie ia kane ka jaka kilan met, u Pastor D. Lyngdoh u la buh ia ka jingduwai bad ai ruh ka jingkyrkhu kyrdoh da ka jingsakhi lang jong ki bahaiing hasem, ki dkhot jong ka executive committee ka Dorbar Shnong Mawlai Nongkwar, ki dkhot ka Seng Samla Mawlai Pyllun bad kiwei kiwei de kiba la shah khot sngewbha.Ka jingthmu ba la buh ia kane ka jaka kilan met ka long ban khring ia ki samla shynrang bad kynthei ba kin pynmlien ialade ban kilan met khnang ba kin ioh ia ka met kaba koit bakhiah bad khamtam eh ban khring ia ki samla kiba la ngop ha ki jingdih kiba sniew khnang ba kin ioh biang ia ka jingim kaba thymmai.Na ka bynta ki jingtip kiba khambniah ki paidbah ki lah ban wad jingtip da kaba telephone ha kine ki number: 6009207397 bad 8415932064.
title: LA PLIE ÏA KA TOGETHER STRONG GYM BAN PYLLAIT ÏA KI SAMLA NA KI JINGSNIEW

content: : U Myntri Rangbah Duh, Narendra Modi u la sakhi ia u mawmer ha ka sngi u Blei da kaba aiti sha ka ri bad buh maw nongrim ia ki projek bapher bapher kiba kot T 48,100 klur ha Rajkot, Gujarat.Kine ki projek ki dei ha ki kam ka koit ka khiah, ki surok, lynti rel, ka petroleum & natural gas, ki kam jngoh kai bad kiwei kiwei.Lyngba kane ka sienjam, u Modi u la pyndonkam ia ki lad Digital ban plie bad pyllait paidbah ia ki ar tylli ki kali Mobile Food Testing Laboratory, (FSW) ha State Central Library, Shillong ha ka jingsakhi lang jong ka Myntri kaba khmih ia ka Tnat ka Koit ka Khiah Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u Commissioner ka tnat Food Safety u Dr. Joram Beda bad ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong R.M Kurbah bad kiwei kiwei.Kine ar tylli ki lad jong ka Food Safety Standards Authority of India (FSSAI) ban leh test ia ki marbam ki dei kiba la tip kum ka Food Safety on Wheel (FSW).Kane ka dei ruh ka sienjam ban pynthikna ia ka jingshngaiñ ki mar bam ha baroh ki jaka.  Ki FSW kiba la pynbiang lut ki jingai jingshakri bad kiba don ki nongtrei kiba la tbit ha ka kam, kin kyntiew ia ki lad leh test bad kin ai jinghikai ruh shaphang ia ki rukom kiba kyntiew ia ka jingshngain ha ki mar bam. Shuh shuh, kin pynsaphriang jingtip ha ki paidbah da kaba poi sha ki jaka ba kyndong tam jong ka jylla.Ka jingwanrah ia kine ki ar 2 tylli ki FSW ha Meghalaya ka wan ruh ha ryngkat ka projek kaba kot sha ka T. 0.95 klur.
title: NA RAJKOT PYLLAIT U MODI ÏA KI KALI MOBILE FOOD TESTING LABORATORY HA SHILLONG

content: Ka kynhun jong ki trai ba bun ïa ki kali kit mar na rilum Jaintia kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Meghalaya Joint Action Committee kiba kynthup ïa ka Association of Meghalaya Traders and Transporter (AMTT), ka Jaiñtia Hills Truck Onwers Association (JHTOA) bad ka All Jaiñtia Hills Cement and Clinker Association (AJHCCA) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la dawa ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ïalam da ka National People’s Party (NPP) ba kan pynurlong noh ïa ka jingkular ban pynkhreh ïa ka Mining Policy kaba la sahteng mynta la shisnem kynthih.U Finance Secretary ka MJAC u Bah Balen Thubru ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la kynthoh halor ka jingbym lah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynurlong ïa ka jingkular ban pynkhreh ïa ka Mining Policy kumba la kular da u Myntri Rangbah.“Ha East Jaiñtia Hills bad ha West Khasi Hills ki nongkhaïi dewiong ki la pynkup burom ïa u Myntri Rangbah hadien u la kular ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan pyndep noh hapoh shisnem ban pynkhreh ïa ka Mining Policy hadien ba ka National Green Tribunal (NGT) ka la khang ïa ka jingtih dewiong thliewkhnai ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya,” u la ong.“Ka jingbym pat lah ban pynkhreh ïa ka Mining Policy ka la pyndiaw mynsiem ym tang ïa ngi ki nongkhaïi hynrei ka ktah ruh wat ïa ki nongbylla tih dewiong hynrei wat ïa ka jingïoh lum khajna jong ka Sorkar,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Thubru.Ka MJAC ka la dawa ruh ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan ïakren bad ki bor badei peit jong ka Sorkar Pdeng na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka Land Custom Station (LCS) ha ka shnong Kuliang, East Jaiñtia Hills District khnang ba kan pynsuk ïa ki nongshalan mar ban pynpoi ïa ki mar ki mata sha ka ri Bangladesh.U Secetary General jong ka MJAC u Bah Enrico D. Passi u la ïathuh ba ka jingdon jong ka Land Custom Station (LCS) ha ka shnong Dawki ban shalan ïa ki mar ka buh jingeh ïa ki trok kit mar ha kaba ki hap ban ap haduh saw ne san sngi kynthih tang ban ïoh ïa ka Clearance na ka daw ka jingbun shaba palat ki trok kiba leit sha ka ri Bangladesh.Halor ka jingpyrshah ki kynhun bapher bapher na East Jaiñtia Hills ïa ka jingtyrwa ka Sorkar Jylla ban wanrah ïa ka lynti rel sha East Jaiñtia Hills u Chairman ka MJAC, Bah Biangshwa Shylla u la ong ba kum ka kynhun jong ki trai kali kiba im kamai jakpoh ki pyrshah ïa ka jingthmu ka Sorkar ban wanrah ïa ka lynti Rel  namarba kin mad ïa ka jingduh nong kaba khraw namarba ka Rel kan kit da ki hajar ton katba ki kali ki kit tang da ki phew ton.U Bah Shylla u la ong, lada ki kali ki kit ïa ki mar ki mata ki trai kali ki dang ïoh ïa ka kamai kajih hynrei lada wan ka lynti Rel baroh ki kali kin hap ban shu kut ha sem.U la ong ruh ba ka kynhun kan ieng pyrshah ban ïakhun haduh ban da jop bad kyrpad ruh ïa baroh ki kynhun bapher bapher ban ai jingkyrshan ïa kane ka jingthmu ban pyrshah ïa ka lynti Rel.
title: BA SAHTENG KA MINING POLICY LA JAN SHI SNEM, TAKRAIÑ KA MJAC ÏA KA SORKAR MDA

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) Sengkmie ba la lamkhmat da u Political Secretary u Samla Garry Myrboh ha ka sngi baar ha ka por kumba 9:00 baje eiei mynmiet ki la leit ban jurip kynsan ïa ki dukan kiba don ha iewduh hadien ba la ioh ia ka jingujor na ki paidbah ba ki bor synshar jong ka ophis u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem kim shym la shimkhia ha kaba iadei bad ka hukum kaba ki la pynmih ba yn ym shah shuh ia ki briew ban sahmiet ha ki dukan ha Iewduh.Ka Seng ha kane ka jingjurip ka la lap ba ki don bun ki bar jylla kiba sahmiet ha ki dukan, kum ha ki dukan diesha ha kaba la lap ia ki bar jylla kiba sahmiet haduh 8 ngut bad don ruh kiba sah haduh 15 ngut ha kawei ka dukan.Na ka liang jong ka seng ka la shu shim tang ia ki kyrteng jong ki bad shen ka seng kan sa leit ujor sha u Syiem jong ka Hima Mylliem ne sha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council.Kaba pynlyngngoh ïa ka Seng ka long don ruh ki bar jylla kiba sah ha kine ki dukan ki la pynlong ruh kum ka jaka dih kynja bad ki don ruh ki jaka sah ba ki aiwai pateng ia kiwei pat kiba trei sha kiwei ki jaka da kaba shim pisa ha ka dor 200 tyngka shimiet kum ka bai thiah ha kine ki dukan.Ka seng ka la byrngem ba kan pynlong ia ka jingjurip kaba manla ka por ia kine ki dukan ha ïewduh namarba la iohi ba bun ki bar jylla kiba sahmiet ha kine ki dukan ki dei kiba wan na ka jylla Assam, na ka ri Nepal bad na kiwei kiwei ki jylla.
title: SAH WAI KI BAR JYLLA HA KI DUKAN HA ÏEWDUH, KYNDANG KA HITO

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la kular ban buddien na ka Sorkar Pdeng ban pynbna ïa ka North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS) kum ka Institute of National Importance (INI).U Sangma u la ong ba naduh ka por ba u JP Nadda u dang long u Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah u ladep ban pynsngew ïa kane ka mat.“Ngi kyrmen ba kane ka sienjam ka long kaba ïaid shakhmat namarba ladep rah ruh ban ïatai hapoh ka Parliament bad ngi dang ïai buddien ruh na ka liang jong ngi,” u la bynrap.  U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba kam pat long kaba dei na ka liang jong u ban ai ïa kano kano ka jubab namarba kane ka kam ka dang don ha ka kti jong ka Sorkar Pdeng.Shwa kane, u Nongïalam ka Liang Pyrshah Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la kyntu ïa u Myntri Rangbah ban buddien na ka Sorkar Pdeng halor ka jingai kyrdan INI ïa ka NEIGRIHMS khnang ban weng ïa ka jingduna doktor bad ka jingmih noh jong ki  doktor ha kiwei kiwei ki jylla.U la ong ba ïa u Neurosurgeon la pynkynriah na NEIGRIHMS Hospital sha kawei ka Private Hospital kaba don ha Guwahati.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka Dorbar, u Bah Lyngdoh u la ong ba u sngewhun ïa ka jingkular jong u Myntri Rangbah ban buddien ïa kane ka kam na ka Sorkar Pdeng.Haba kylli, u Bah Lyngdoh u la ong, “kam dei tang ban shu ïoh ïa ka jingithuh kum ka Institute of National Importance. Kaba kongsan eh ka long lada ka la ïoh jingithuh kum ka Institute National Importance baroh ki doktor, ki paramedical, ki staff nurse kiba trei ha NEIGRIHMS Hospital kin ïoh ïa ki jingmyntoi kumba ka long ka AIIMS.”“Naduh ba la pynkha (ïa ka NEIGRIHMS) la ïathuh ïa nga ba kam don ka jingbishar halor ka jingthung nongtrei hapoh kane ka shlem ai jingsumar.  Ka jingbishar halor ka jingthung briew kan pynïohnong hi ïa ki briew kiba trei ha NEIGRIHMS. Hynrei kane kam shym la don satia mynta la bun bun snem kaba mut ba ka jingsiew ba ïaryngkat kam don satia,” u la ong bad bynrap kane ka dei ka daw kaba pynlong ïa ki doktor ban mih noh na NEIGRIHMS.
title: YN BUDDIEN U CM NA KA SORKAR PDENG BA PYNBNA ÏA KA NEIGRIHMS KUM KA INI

content: U President ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) Bah Lamphrang Kharbani u la kren bynniaw halor ka jingduna shaba palat ki trai ri trai muluk ka jylla Meghalaya ki ban pas ia ka IAS, IPS, IFS bad kiwei kiwei ki kyrdan kiba heh namar ka jingduh kabu na ka daw ka jingbym pat pynrung ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka riti synshar ka Ri India.Ia kane, u Bah Lamphrang u la pynpaw haba kren ha ka jingpynskhem ia ki nongkitkam ba pura jong ka Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) Nongpoh Circle ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.“Tang shu wan ka Sorkar bathymmai ha Delhi, ka seng ka long kaba la pynkhreh ban pynurlong ia ka jingdawa na ka Sorkar ba kan pynrung ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India,” u la ong.Ki nongkitkam ba thymmai jong ka HANM, Nongpoh Circle ki kynthup ïa u President u Bah Donroy Kshiar, Vice president Bah Khrawpyrkhat Thongni, General Secretary Bah Wanteibor Makri, Assisant Secretary Bah Honly Navin Marbaniang, Finance Secretary Bah Aiborlang Suting bad kiwei kiwei.Ha ka jingpynskhem ia ki nongïalam ba thymmai ka Circle kaba la long ha ïingdorbar, Sajer, Nongpoh la sakhi lang da u President ka Ribhoi District Unit Bah Ajit Makri bad kiwei kiwei ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot jong ka seng.
title: DUNA BHA KI IAS, IPS , IFS NA MEGHALAYA BYM RUNG KA KTIEN KHASI HA KA 8TH SCHEDULED: L. KHARBANI

content: Ha ka sien banyngkong eh ki samla na kane ka jylla Meghalaya ki la leit ban iashim bynta ha ka Bungy Jump, ka jaka kynthih kaba don ha ka shnong Kushma, Nepal, kaba jrong kumba 228 meter bad kaba wan ba-ar ha ka pyrthei ha ka jingjrong jong ka riat.Kine ki lai ngut ki samla ki dei kiba sah ha ka shnong Lumshyiap, Shillong ba la tip kyrteng kum u samla Banpynbiang Marweiñ, u samla Francis kharmuti bad u samla Lucky Nongspung dang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ki la leit sha ka ri Nepal ban leh ia kane ka Bungy Jump.Ha shwa ban leh ia kane ka Bungy jump, kine ki lai ngut ki la hap ban leh ia ka test hashwa ba kin ioh iashim bynta bad lada shem ba ki nongiashim bynta ki long kiba biang nadong shadong ha ka koit ka khiah, hadien kata, kin hap ban siew ia ka pisa kaba 9 hajar tyngka ban ioh iashim bynta najrong riat da kaba shu teh da u tyllai uba rben na shadem.
title: NAJRONG KA RIAT BA 228 METER LEIT KYNTHIH KI SAMLA KA JYLLA SHA NEPAL

content: Ka Umlyngka Sports and cultural club ha ka sngi Saitjain jong ka taiew baladep ka la pynlong iaka “Premmiet Shongsbai” jong ka sports club,ha madan football ka Shnong Umlyngka, ha kaba la wan sakhi lang daki Rangbah jong ka Shnong lem bad ki Longkmie ki samla jong ka thain umlyngka, U Bah Lufast Majaw u ba long ruh Kum u Kongsan ha kane ka sngi plie la iadonlang ruh ki nongialam shnong naduh u Secretary Shnong u Bah Batdor Wahlang, don ruh ki nongïalam ba rim jong ka Club u rangbah u bah Andra Kharkongor uba dei u riew rangbah jong ka shnong lem bad ki nongialam kane ka sports club,ki riew rangbah, ki samla jong ka shnong Umlyngka bad kiwei kiwei.Ha kane ka sngi la khring bha ia ki paidbah nong shong shnong kadei lyngba ki jingbam tynrai kum ka jingbam na mei ramew, ki jingbam Khasi kum ki jadoh snam, jadoh nei iong, bad ka iew ka hat kum ka jingdie ia ki khoh ki wait , moh khiew lem bad ki jain riam tynrai nalor kiwei pat.Ha shwa ban pynlong ia kane ka prokram, ka la don ka jingkren na wei u Rangbah Bah Andra Kharkongor u la ong ba haka por jong ki la seng iaka Sport and Cultural ki la shem jingeh bha namar kim don ka pisa ka biang ban thaw ki lad kumno ban treikam hynrei mynta u la ai ka jingiaroh bad kyrkhu kyrdoh iaki nongialam ba mynta ba kin dang lah ban trei khambha khnang ba ka Club kan paw ym tang hangne hynrei wat sha ki wei ki jaka ruh.Na ka liang u Rangbah shnong u ba dei ruh u Kongsan u la ong baka sport and Cultural club  ka dei ka Sien ba nyngkong eh ba ioh ban pynlong kum ka ne ka Prokram ha ba phai ha por ba mynshuwa ka Sport Club kadei tang ka jinglehkai jong ki sport bapher bapher hynrei mynta ngi la iohi baki la don sa ki wei ki prokram kiba iadei bad ka Kolshor bad da ka jingthrang ba ka Club ka pynlong bun ki prokram kiba iadei baki Samla namar mynta ngi iohi baki samla ki bun kiba ki la ngop lut halor ki kam sniew ki ba lai phew rukom.
title: KA PREMMIET SHONGSBAI, KA ÏEW TYNRAI KA CLUB UMLYNGKA BAN PYNMIH PISA

content: : Ki Rangbah Shnong jong ki shnong bapher kiba hap hapoh ka Dorbar Diengiei ba la lamkhmat da u President Bah P.J Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Balang ki la kyrpad ïa u MLA jong ka Sohïong Constituency u Bah Synshar Kupar Roy Lyngdoh Thabah ba un wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynïoh ïa ka mang tyngka na ka bynta ban siangrong noh ïa ka surok khyndew kaba pynïasoh na ka shnong Nongpathaw shaduh ka shnong Kyntonmynnar kaba jrong 2 kilomitar duna.Kane ka jingkyrpad jong ki nongkitkam ka Dorbar Diengiei ka long hadien ba ki paidbah ki la ïakynduh mawsiang na ka jingdheng kali kaba ju neh jin haduh 3 bad 4 kynta manla ka sngi ha ka shnong Mawlaingut na ka daw ka jingieng jong ki trok kiba ïaid lynti lyngba ka surok Mawmaram, Mawmih shaduh Mawlyndep ter ter haduh ban da poi ha Lad Umsaw namarba ka dang don ka jingmaramot ïa ka jingkieng Damsite.Kine ki nongïalam shnong ki la pynpaw ki don haduh 28 tylli ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Dorbar Diengiei kiba la donkam kyrkieh ban ïoh ïa ka surok kaba bha khnang ba kan pynsuk ïa ka leit ka wan bad ka rah ka rong.“Lada siangrong noh ïa kane ka surok, ka jingïaid lynti kan long tang 2 kilomitar, hynrei mynta ngi hap ban ïaid lynti 7-8 kilomitar manla ka sngi,” la ong u Bah Lyngdoh.“Ngi kwah ïa u MLA ba un kren halor kane ha ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ,” u la ong.“Bun ki paidbah kiba leit shim dawa ki ïakynduh jingeh namar ka jingdheng kali kaba ne da ki kynta ha surok Mawlaingut namar ka jingïaid jong ki trok.  Ki kali kit nongpang, ki kali ba kit ïa ki longkmie ba armet sha shillong ki sahkut bad ki don ki khep ba ki longkmie ki kha khun hapoh kali,” ula ong bad bynrap, “lada siangrong noh ïa ka surok na Nongpathaw-Kyntonmynnar, kan pynsuk ruh ïa ki paidbah jong ka shnong Sohïong, Krang, Nongbsap ban leit sha sor Shillong namarba ka pynsuk bad ka jan bha na ka bynta jong ki.”
title: KYRPAD KA DORBAR DIENGIEI ÏA U MLA BAN PYNÏOH SUROK NA NONGPATHAW-KYNTONMYNNAR

content: Ka long ka jingduhnong kaba khraw ïa ka Indian National Congress (INC) ha South West Khasi Hills District bad ha Mawkyrwat Block Congress Committee hadien ka jingmih noh ki nongkitkam bad ki nongtrei jong ka party ha ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai bad ban leit pynïasoh sha ka National Peoples Party (NPP).U President ka District Congress Committee (DCC) Bah K.K Nongsiej, u la ïathuh ba u la iehnoh ïa ka jinglong kum u nongkitkam jong ka Congress party na ki daw shimet.Ha kajuh ka por u nongthoh khubor u la sakhi ïa ka shithi iehnoh kam jong u Babu Valentine Thyrniang kum u President jong ka Mawkyrwat Block Congress Committee bad la sngewthuh ba hadien ka jingiehnoh kam na ka Block, u Babu Valentine Thyrniang u la pynshai paitbah ba un ym treh shuh ban long nongïalam hapoh ka seng Congress.Nalor kine ki ar ngut ki nongïalam rangbah jong ka Party, la sakhi ïa ka jingiehnoh kam jong ka Dr. B. Marweiñ kum ka President jong ka Mahila (Women’s Wing) hapoh ka Mawkyrwat Block kumjuh ruh ïa ka jingiehnoh kam u Bah Valdo Lyngdoh kum u District Youth President.Shuh shuh katkum ka jingïohlum jingtip ba ha ka juh ka sngi nalor kitei ki nongïalam, la ong ruh ba bun ki nongtrei jong ka Congress kiba don hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District bad ka Mawkyrwat Bock ki la iehnoh kam halor ki daw shimet shimet jong ki.
title: STAIT KA CONGRESS HA SWKH BA RESAIÑ KI NONGÏALAM

content: : Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la dawa ïa u Director jong ka NEIGRIHMS u Prof. (Dr.) Nalin Mehta ba u dei ban bud ryntih ïa ka bhah thungkam kumba la mang da ka Sorkar Kmie.Ka Seng ka la pynpaw ïa kane ka jingdawa hadien ba u Mehta u la khot ïakren biang ha ka sien kaba ar hadien ba ka seng ka la buh ïa kiba bun ki mat jingdawa ha kaba ïadei bad ka thungkam ka thungkam ïa ki trai ri trai muluk hapoh NEIGRIHMS Hospital.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingïakynduh ïa u Metha, u President ka HYC u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la ïathuh ba ki don kumba saw ne san tylli ki mat jingdawa kiba ka seng ka la buh ïa kiba la mynjur da u Director.“Kawei na ki jingdawa jong ka seng kaba ngi la pynsngew halor ka post Nursing Officer ba ka NEIGRIHMS ka la pynlong ïa ka eksamin lyngba ka NORCET kaba wanrah ïa ka jingduhnong ïa ki samla thepkam trai jylla. Kumba ngi la lap na ki 222 tylli ki post ba ka NEIGRIHMS ka la thungkam ha ka post Nursing Officer ki don 201 ngut ki shynrang bad 21 ngut ki shynrang bad tang 14 ngut ki dei ki trai jylla jong ngi.
