Ngi la dawa ïa u Director ba un pynsangeh ïa ka NORCET Examinations bad mynta ka sngi ula kohnguh ban pynsangeh ïa ka jingthungkam katba ym pat lah ban pynbeit ïa ka jingbakla,” la ong u Bah Synrem.U la ong ruh ba ka seng ka la dawa hakhmat u Director ba ka NEIGRIHMS ka dei ban pyntreikam ïa ka 80 percent na ka 100 percent kumba leh da ka AIIMS. “Hynrei ka NEIGRIHMS kam shym la leh ïa kata.  Kine ki shynrang kiba ka AIIMS kam shym la pdiang, la shu wan bret ha NEIGRIHMS,” la kam u Bah Synrem.“Katba u Director um pat lah ban pynbeit ïa ka 80 la 20 percent, kata, 80 percent ki kynthei bad 20 ki shynrang ka NEIGRIHMS kam dei ban thungkam ïa ki Nurse. U la ong ruh ba ka NEIGRHIMS kan sa thoh sha ka Ministry of Health and Family Welfare ka Sorkar India ba kin ym pynlong shuh ïa ka eksamin thungkam lyngba ka NORCET,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Synrem bad bynrap ruh ba u Director u la kohnguh ban pynsagneh shipor.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingaiwai ïa ki kam ne ki Outsourcing Agency hapoh ka NEIGRIHMS, u Bah Synrem u la ong, “ba ki Outsourcing Agency bad ki nongtrei kiba trei hapoh ki Agency ki dei ban long kiba napoh ka jylla Meghalaya,” bad bynrap ba u Director u la pdiang ïa kane ka jingdawa.“Ngi la kren da kaba shai lada ka NEIGRHIMS ka wanrah da ki Outsoursing Agency kiba nabar bad ki briew kiba nabar ban trei hapoh ki Outsourcing Agency ngin ym lah satia ban pdiang hynrei u Director u la pynthikna ba ka NEIGRHIMS kan pdiang beit ïa ki Outsourcing Agency bad ïa ki nongtrei trai jylla.Halor ka post Group C ka seng ka la dawa ban thungkam ïa ki trai jylla.  “U Director u la pynshai ba ka NEIGRHIMS ka bud ïa ka office memorandum ba la pynmih da ka Sorkar Pdeng kaba long 44% na ka bynta ki Scheduled Tribe,” la ïathuh u Bah Synrem.“Ngi la banjur ïa u Director ba u dei ban bud ryntih ïa ka office memorandum bad ngi la kren ruh da kaba shai ba ym dei ban thung ïa ki ST kiba nabar ka jylla hynrei ïa ki ST kiba na kane ka jylla Meghalaya,” u la ong.“Ngi la ïakren ruh halor ka jingkhot Advertisement jong ka NEIGRHIMS ha u snem 2022 kumba 80 tylli ki post.  Ka jingpynlong eksamin ka ladep bad ka Skill Test hynrei haduh mynta kim pat thungkam. Kawei na kita, ka dei ka Diet Clerk. Ngi la pan jingpynshai halor kane.  Ym tang katta ki (NEIGRIHMS) pynlong eksamin na ka bynta ki post ki bym don shuh bad ngi  la dawa ïa u Director ba un thoh sha ka Sorkar Pdeng ban pynim biang ïa kine ki post bad u Director u la ïathuh ba u ladep phah ïa ka jingthoh sha ka Ministry kaba la bthah ïa ka NEIGRIHMS ban leh ïa ka Revive Guidelines bad kumno ban pynim biang ïa ki post.  Ha ka taiew ban sa wan, kan sa phah ïa ka Revive Guidelines sha ka Sorkar Pdeng,” la ïathuh shuh u President ka HYC.
title: MYNJUR U DIRECTOR KA NEIGRIHMS BAN PYNSANGEH SHWA SHIPOR ÏA KA JINGTHUNGKAM NURSING OFFICER

content: : U Deputy CEM ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) Bah PN Syiem ha ka sngi Thohdieng ula ong ba ka Council hadien habud kan sa wanrah noh da ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council Heritage and Cultural Conservation and Promotion Bill ban ïoh ban pynlong noh ka Monolith Festival manla u snem.Ïa kane u la ong ha ka jingïalang kaba lyngkot hapoh Conference hall ka KHADC ha shwa ban pyllait paidbah ïa ka Theme song jong ka Monolith Festival bad ïa ka media Campaign Vehicle ne ka kali ka ban leit pynbna shaphang kane ka Festival, ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha District Council.U la ong ba ïa katei ka Bill na ka liang ka EC ka la don ha ka jingmut ban shen yn sa draft bad yn sa wanrah ha ka por kaba biang.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang ula ong ruh ba ka Festival kadei ban pyninam ïa ka jinglong tynrai u Khasi ha ka rwai ka siaw, ka tem ka put, ka bam bad ka riam tynrai.Ula ong ba ka Council kan sa shong pyrkhat ban pynlong man la ka por ïa ka Monolith Festival ha Khasi Heritage Village, Mawphlang bad yn pynkhreh ruh ïa ka Bill ba kan dei ka kamram ïa ka Executive Committee jong ka Council ba kin pynlong beit ïa kane ka Festival man la u snem.Ha kane ka jingpyllait ïa Theme Song bad ïa ka Kali ai jingpynbna, la ïadonlang ki Executive Member kiba kynthup ïa u Bah Gigur Myrthong, Bah Victor Ranee, Bah Teibor Pathaw, Kong Grace Mary Kharpuri, Kong Macdalyn Sawkmie Malong, Bah Rangkynsai Kharbuki, Bah Fantin Lakadong Bah Carness Sohshang bad kiwei kiwei ha kaba la ïadonlang ruh ki ophisar jong ka Council.Ka Monolith Festival kan sdang ha ka 22, 23 bad 24 tarik u Rymphang mynta u snem bad ïa kane ka tamasa yn pynlong da ka KHADC ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka tnad Tourism, ka Meghalaya Age Limited jong ka sorkar jylla.La pynlong ïa ka Monolith Festival nyngkong eh ha u snem 2013 bad ha ka sien ka baar ha u snem 2016 bad kane kaba mynta ka kynti kan dei ha ka sien kaba lai.Lah ong ba ha kane ka Monolith Festival kaban ong ka Council kan ai kyrpad ruh ïa ki shnong ban pynbna ha ki tynghung ha manla ki shnong khnang ba ki briew kin ïoh jingtip bad ban wan ïashimbynta.Ïa kane ka festival ha ka sngi sdang kan long ha ka shiteng sngi ban wan plie da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u Bah Prestone Tynsong bad ha ka sngi kut yn wan u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad Sangma ha ryngkatlang bad u Myntri ka tnat Tourism u Bah Paul Lyngdoh.Ha ka sngi sdang yn don ki workshop jong ki khynnah skul bad ha ki sngi ba bud yn sa khambun ki prokram.U la ong ban pyrshang ban kham pynpher mynta u snem ha kaba ki kolshor ba la leh da kiba bun ki Hima yn sa wanrah ha kitei ki sngi.Ïa kane ka tamasa yn pynïaid da ka Coordination committee on Monolith Festival ha ka jingpeit khmih jong ka kynhun ba la ïalam da u Bah Alan West bad u Professor Desmond Kharmalki kum ki dkhot.U Bah P N Syiem u la wer ïa ki paidbah ban wan sha katei ka tamasa Mawbynna kaba laisngi khnang ba kan long kaba jop namar ha kane ka tamasa yn ym shim bai rung bad ka la don ruh ka jaka ïeng kali kaba heh bad ka rukom rung rukom mih ki kali lah dep ban pynbeit khnang ban pynduna ïa ka dheng kali.
title: DA KA  AIN-REW YN WANRAH KA KHADC BAN ÏOH PYNLONG TAMASA MAWBYNNA MANLA U SNEM

content: U Justice S. Vaidyanathan u la bam smai kum u Chief Justice ba thymmai jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court ha ka sngi U Blei.U Lat ka Jylla Phagu Chauhan ula pynbam smai ïa u Justice Vaidyanathan ha ka jingïalang pynbam smai kaba long ha Dorbar Hall jong ka Raj Bhavan, Shillong.U Justice Vaidyanathan u la shimti ïa kane ka shuki na u Chief Justice Sanjib Banerjee uba la shongthait ha u Naiwieng jong u snem ba ladep.Shuwa kane, u Justice Vaidyanathan u la shakri kum u Judge jong ka Madras High Court naduh u bnai Risaw 2013.
title: BAM SMAI U JUSTICE S. VAIDYANATHAN KUM U CJ BA THYMMAI KA HC

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma, ha ka sngi Baar u la sam ia ki shithi thungkam sha ki 346 ngut ki nonghikai skul Lower Primary ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha State Convention Centre, Shillong ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u Rakkam A. Sangma.Haba kren kum u kongsan, u Conrad Sangma u la ong ba ka jingpynlong ia kane ka jingialang kam dei eh tang ban sam ia ki shithi thungkam sha ki nonghikai ba la thung thymmai ban hikai ha ki Lower Primary School hynrei ka long ruh ban iamir jingmut bad ban pyntip ia ki thong jong ka Sorkar.“Mynta ngi long kum kawei ka kynhun, ngi lah ban leh ia ki jaitkam bapher bapher ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher hynrei ngi don hangne ban kynjoh ia ka thong ka ban ialam ia ka jylla shakhmat,” u la ong.U la ong ba ka jingbhah pisa jong ka Sorkar sha ka tnat Pule Puthi ka long kaba heh.Shuh shuh u Myntri Rangbah u la kyntu ia ki nonghikai ba thymmai ba kin sdang noh ia la ka jong ka kamram da ka jingmut jingpyrkhat kaba dei namarba kum ki nonghikai kam dei eh tang ba kin ai jingnang jingstad hynrei ki dei ban long ki nongpynkylla dur ia ka jingim jong ki khynnah hapoh ka jingpeit ka jong ki.“Ngi la tei ia k iing skul bad ki jingdonkam hynrei ka jinghikai kaba phin ai bad ba phin tei ia ka lawei jong ka jylla bad ia ka ri phi dei ban long kiba nyngkong eh ban long ki nongwanrah jingkylla,” u la ongU Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi, Rakkam A. Sangma haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la ong, ka kam hikai skul ka dei kaba donburom tam. “Haba phi pyndep ia la ka jong ka kamram da ka jingaiti lut bad ka jinglen lade phi don ruh ka bor ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla namarkata ngi phah ia phi da ka jingsngew skhem ba phin ia ka jingkitkhlieh da ka jingiatreilang bad ka sorkar,” la ong u Myntri.U Myntri u la maham ruh ia kito kiba aiwai pateng ia ka kam hikai skul sha kiwei pat namarba ka ktah ia ka pule puthi jong ki khynnah skul bad ka pyntroiñ noh ia ka jingkordor ka pule ka puthi.U Myntri Rangbah bad kiwei kiwei ki kynrem ki lyndan ki la pyllait paidbah ruh ia ki tiar ai jinghikai ba la tip kum ki Jadui Pitara for pre-schoolers.Kumba 35,000 ngut ki khynnah skul kin sa ioh pyndonkam ia kine ki tiar lyngba ki nonghikai jong ki skul Lower Primary tang shu la sdang skul ban sa pyndonkam baroh shisnem.  Ki tiar ki kynthup ia ki Activity Sheet, Worksheet, Flashcard, Poster, Game Board bad kiwei kiwei.
title: AITI U MYNTRI RANGBAH ÏA KI SHITHI THUNGKAM SHA KI 346 NGUT KI NONGHIKAI LP

content: Uwei u rangbah uba la 30 snem ka rta la suba ba ula shah tep im ha ka jingtwa ka synrum jaboh ha ka jaka thehniut ha Marten, kaba don ha Mawlai.Ia une u rangbah ba la shah tep im la tip kyrteng kum u Marshall Marweiñ. Tad haduh ba la thoh ia kane ka khubor ym pat lap satia ia une u rangbah haduh mynta.Ki nongialam ka FKJGP Shillong City ki la pyntip ba ki bor ba dei khmih ha Marten wat hadien ba ki la tip ia kane ka jingjia ruh kim shym la leh eiei hynrei ka jingai jingiarap ban wad ia ka met jong une u briew ka la slem shaba palatKa kynhun ki Pulit na Mawlai Police Station ki la leit mar mar sha kane ka jaka hadien ba la ioh jingtip shaphang kanenka jingjia ba sngewsih.La sakhi ruh ba ki Pulit ki la pyndonkam da ki Puhshilum ban kyndang ia ki niut khnang ban lap ia ka met jong uba la shah tep im.Na ka liang jong ki nongtam marjot ha Marten ki la ong ba kane ka dei ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ban jia ka jingjia ba sngewsih ha kane ka jaka thehniut bad ki la ong ruh ba ka jingmih jong ka tdem jaboh na ka jingthang ding ia ki nuit ka la wanrah shuh shuh ia ka jingeh ban lap ia uba la shah tep im namar ba ka bneng ka la dum.
title: SHAH TEP IM U NONGTAM MAR JOT BA TWA KA SYNRUM JABOH HA MARTEN

content: Watla ki nongtrei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ki la trei shitom baroh shimiet haduh mynstep ban ïoh sei ïa u Bah Marshall Marweiñ uba la shah tap ha ka jingtwa ka synrum jaboh ha Marten hynrei haduh mynta kim pat lapdien satia ïa u.Halor kane ka jingjia ki ophisar ka Shillong Municipal Board ba kynthup ïa u Chief Executive Officer (CEO) u PK Boro bad u Executive Engineer Bah FB Chyne ki la hiar da lade sha Marten ban peit ïa ka jinglong jingman tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih.Kine ki ophisar ki la ïathuh ba ki nongtrei ki la trei shitom baroh shimiet haduh ka por 4:00 baje mynstep ban ïoh sei ïa u Bah Marshall hynrei wat hapdeng ka jingtrei shitom kaba la neh arphew saw kynta kim shym la lap satia u.U Bah Chyne u la ïathuh ba katkum ka jingïoh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ka dei ha ka por 1:30 baje noh sngi bad u la ong ruh ba ka jingwad ïa u Bah Marshall kan dang bteng beit haduh ban da lap ïa u na ka jingshah tap ha ka synrum jaboh.U la ïathuh ba ka Municipal ka la buh san tylli ki puh shilum ban kyndang ïa ka jaboh khnang ban lap ïa u Bah Marshall.U la pyntip ba ha kane ka jaka thehñiut ha Marten ka jaboh ka ding ka meh beit wat haba ther  u lapbah lapsan ruh na ka daw ka jingdon ka Methane Gas.Ki nongtrei ka State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) hapoh ka jingïalam jong u 2nd in Command Bah B. Sahkhar ki la la hiar sha Marten ban wad ïa u Bah Marshall ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ki nongtrei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board, la ïathuh u Divisional Commandant jong ka Home Guards, Shillong Bah P.H Shylla.“Ngi kyrmen ban ïohi ïa ki dak ki shin ban lapdien ïa u Bah Marshall bad ngi la suba ruh un im shuh hi ruh,” la ong u Bah Chyne.Haba kylli, u Bah Chyne u la ïathuh ba ka jingtwa ka synrum jaboh ha Marten ka dei kaba ju naduh ki snem 2008-2009 shaneng.  “Ka jingpynlong jaka thehñiut ha Marten ka long naduh u snem 1938, mynta ka la don 86 snem bad la shu theh shu theh ñiut bad kam don shuh ka jaka kaba lait,” u la bynrap.“Ïa ki nongtam mar jot ngi la rejistar kyrteng da kaba ai ïa ki Identity Card bad ngi la pyrkhing bha ïa ka rung ka mih ha Marten.  Ha ki por mynshwa wat ki khynnah rit ruh ki don, hynrei mynta ngi la khang bad manla ka taiew ngi ju don ka jingïalang bad kine ki nongtam mar jot ban batai ïa kaei kaba ngi dei ban leh bad ïa kaei kaba ngim dei ban leh.  Hynrei wat hapdeng kine ki jingbthah ruh ki dang mih kum kine ki jingjia,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar ka la tyrwa ban pynïakhlad ïa ka jaboh kaba don kumba shilak sanphew hajar ton khnang ban pynduna ïa ka jinglang ka jaboh ha Marten.“Ïa ka tender ki la khot na ka Directorate jong ka tnat Urban Affairs bad hapoh 3-4 bnai ka lah sdang kata ka kam,”u la bynrap.Kum ka jingsngewlem, u CEO bad u Executive Engineer ki la leit jngoh ïa ka ing jong u Bah Marshall bad ban ïakynduh ruh ïa ka kurim ka jong u bad ïa ki bahaing hasem ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih halor kane ka jingjia.
title: DURUT KA SDRF BAD SMB BAN WAD ÏA U RANGBAH BA SHAH TEP HA KA JINGTWA KA SYNRUM HA MARTEN

content: Ka tnatSports and Youth Affairs jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Palei ka la pdiang burom ia ka kynhun ialehkai phutbol na kane ka jylla kiba la wanrah ia ka nam ka burom hadien ba ki la ioh rah ia ka nam lahduh ha ka lympung ialehkai phubol Under 18-Boys da kaba pynliem noh da 2 kol la nod pyrshah ia ka Punjab ha ka Khelo India Youth Games 2023 kaba la long ha Chennai.Ia ka kynhun ki nongialehkai ba la kit ha ka kali kaba la pynkhreh lypa la pdiang burom na ka shlem treikam jong ka Banalari World Cars bad iaid lyngba ka surok Petrol Pump, ter ter sha Mawlai Iew Rynghep bad rung sha surok Seng Khasi College bad kiew pat sha Jaiaw Mawbynna ter ter sha Jaiaw Pdeng, Mawkhar, Motphran, Police Bazar, DC Office, Raj Bhawan, IGP, Additional Secretariat, Main Secretariat bad wan phai biang sha DC Office bad iaid lyngba ka Wards Lake bad hiar sha iew Polo bad pynkut pat ia ka jingiaid lynti ha madan ialehkai phutbol ka MFA ha Polo.Ha ka jingpdiang burom ia kine ki rangialehkai phutbo ka jylla la synran lang da ka Director jong ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs ka Kong Isawanda Laloo, u President ka MFA u Bah Hamletson Dohling, u Working President ka Meghalaya Sports Olympic Association Bah John Kharshiing, u General Secretary u Bah Finely Pariat bad kiwei kiwei.Hadien kane, kane ka kynhun ka la shah pynkup burom ha u Myntri ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs ka Sorkar Jylla ha Secretariat.
title: WANPHAI KA KYNHUN IALEHKAI PHUTBOL KHELO INDIA SHA JYLLA DA KA JINGJOP

content: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar uba peit ïa ka tnat (Prison) ha ka sngi Baar u la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar kam pat shim rai halor ka jaka ban shna ïa ka Central Jail.U Bah Dhar u la ïathuh ba dang shen la tyrwa ban shna ïa ka Central Jail ha New Shillong Township.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ïa ka soskular jingïamynjur ladep ïasoi hapdeng ka tnat Home (Jail) bad ka tnat Urban Affairs ban pynkynriah noh ïa ka Shillong District Jail sha New Shillong Township.Haduh lai sien kynthih la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang pyrkhat kam hapdeng ka tnat Urban Affairs bad ka tnat Home (Jail).  La mynjur ba ka tnat Urban Affairs kan shimti noh ïa ka jaka (ba don ka Shillong District Jail ba mynta) ban ïakylliang ïa ka jaka ha New Shillong Township.U Bah Dhar, uba dei ruh u Myntri uba peit ïa ka tnat Urban Affairs u la ong ba ka New Shillong Jail kan long kaba ïaryngkat kyrdan bad ka Central Jail, ha kaba ïa ki koidi bad ïa kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingshah tian bishar yn sa pynsah la ka jong.Haduh 25 akar ka Sorkar ka donkam ban ïoh ïa ka jaka ban shna ïa ka Jail ba thymmai.U Bah Dhar u la ïathuh ba u la kyrpad ban pyndep noh ïa ka Nongstoin Jail khnang ban weng ïa ka jingkhapngiah jong ka Shillong District Jail.Shuh shuh  u la ïathuh ba u la pan ïa ka kaiphod halor ka jingpynkhlaiñ ïa ki bor pahara jong ka Jail kynthup ruh ïa ka Jowai District Jail ban khanglad ïa ka jingphet tuh ki koid.“Hadien ba nga la shimti ïa ka tnat Home (Jail) nga la pan kaiphod halor ka jingpynkhlaiñ ïa ki bor pahara jong ki Jail da kaba pyndait ïa ki CCTV bad ban thung kham bun ki nongtrei. Ngi la phah sha ka tnat Pla Tyngka ban mang pisa ban thung ïa ki nongtrei khnang ban ïada ïa ka jingphet tuh ki koidi,” u la ong.Ym kum kiwei pat ki Jylla, haduh mynta ka Meghalaya kam pat don satia la ka jong ka Central Jail.Ïa mynta, ka Jylla ka don san tylli ki District Jail, kata, ha Shillong, Williamnagar, Jowai, Tura bad Nongpoh kiba lah ban ngiam 595 ngut ki shynrang bad 55 ngut ki kynthei.
title: PAT LAH SHIM RAI KA SORKAR ÏA KA JAKA BAN SHNA ÏA KA CENTRAL JAIL

content: : Ha kawei na ka jingjia ba sngewsih, uwei u rangbah u la duhei ia la ka jong ka jingim hadien ba u la shah bat ha ka bording ilektrik ha kawei ka jaka kaba don marjan bad ka jingkieng Umiam kaba hap hapoh ka Mawlai Police Station.Kane ka la jia hynnin ka janmiet sngi U Blei ha ka por kumba 5:30 baje janmiet.Katkum ka jingtip la iohlum la iathuh ba une u rangbah uba la khlad noh la tip kyrteng kum u Rishanlang Muktieh uba la 25 snem ka rta uba dei na ka shnong Ladlasharai, Ri Bhoi District bad uba trei kum u nongap pahara ha jingkieng umiam.La iathuh ba ha katei ka janmiet u la leit ban lum dieng thang najan ka jaka ba don u transformer jong ka ITD Cementation India Limited ha Umiam, hynrei khlem poi pyrkhat u la mad pynban ia kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih.Mar mar la pynkit ia u sha  Shillong Civil Hospital hynrei kham hadien u la khlad noh na kane ka sla pyrthei.
title: ÏAP SHAH BAT ILEKTRIK U RANGBAH KATBA DANG LEIT LUM DIENG THANG

content: Ryngkat bad ka ri India baroh kawei, ka Jylla Meghalaya ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la rakhe ia ka Republic Day kaba 75 snem.Ha kane ka jingrakhe ia ka Republic Day kaba la long ha madan Polo, Shillong la kynmaw burom kyrpang ia ki nongiakhun laitluid jong ka ri India bad kumjuh ruh ia ki khlawait jong ka jaitbynriew, kum u Tirot Sing, u Kiang Nangbah bad u Pa Togan SangmaU Lat ka jylla Phagu Chauhan uba la long kum u kongsan u la pynher ia ka lama lai rong jong ka ri India bad shim ruh ia ka bynta ban salute ia kiba ia shim bynta ha ka march pass ba kynthup ia ki shipai BSF, CRPF, District Executive Force, East Khasi Hills District, Sikkim Police, 1st MLP Bn, NCC Boys, NCC Girls, Meghalaya Bharat Scouts and Guides, Sacred Heart Girl’s Hr. Sc. School, Brass Band Border Wing Home Guards bad ki Pipe Band Assam Regiment Centre.U Lat ka jylla u la sam ruh ia ka khusnam ‘U Tirot Sing Award 2024’ na ka bynta ka Arts and Culture sha u Risingbor Kurkalang, ia ka Pa Togan N. Sangma Award 2024 na ka bynta ka Social Service sha ka Dr. Delphine Gare Momin bad ia ka “U Kiang Nangbah Award 2024’ ha ki kam ialehkai sha u Phrangki Buam.Haba kren kum u Kongsan u Lat ka jylla u la iaroh ia ka Sorkar Jylla kaba la pyrshang ban wanrah jingsuk hapoh ka jylla lyngba ka jingkhot iakren iasuk bad ka seng kieng atiar Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) katkum ka jingbthah jong ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) ka Sorkar Pdeng.La sam ruh ia ki khusnam Megha Health Insurance Scheme (MHIS) & Pradhan Mantri Jan Yojana (PMJAY) Awards sha ki hospital kiba treikam bha bad kiba la ai ka jingshakri kaba paka ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong.Ha East Khasi Hills la ai ia ka khusnam sha ka Pomlum PHC bad ka Mawphlang CHC na East Khasi Hills ka la ioh ka khusnam kum ka hospital ba ai jingshakri bapakam tam ha ka jylla.Ki hospital shimet kiba la shah jied ban ioh khusnam ki long ka Bethany Hospital, Shillong bad ka Bansara Eye Care Centre, East Khasi Hills.Ka Reid Provincial Chest Hospital, East Khasi Hills District ruh ha kane ka kynti ka la shah pynkup burom da ka khusnam bad ka Ganesh Das Government Maternal & Child Hospital, East Khasi Hills District ka la shah jied kum ka hospital ba paka tam ha ka jingsumar ia ki kynthei bad ia ki khunlung.Shuh shuh ka Reid Provincial Chest Hospital, East Khasi Hills District ka la jop ruh ia ka khusnam n aka bynta ka Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana Quality Certification Hospital.Ha kane ka sngi, la sam ruh ia ka Police Medal for Meritorious Service (MSM) sha u Superintendent of Police (City) Bah Vivek Syiem, ia u AB-Inspector John M Sangma bad Havildar Bah Teibor Sumer, katba ia ka Home Guards & Civil Defence Medal for Meritorious Service la ai sha ka Kong Aniosca Basaiawmoit kaba dei ka Inspector kaba shakri kum ka Senior Instructor ha Central Training Institute of Civil Defence and Home Guards, Mawdiangdiang.La pyninam ruh ha kane ka sngi ia ki tabut na ka tnat Tourism, ophis jong ka Deputy Commissioner, na ka DCIC-East Khasi Hills, na ka ophis Superintendent of Fisheries, na ka Meghalaya State Skills Development Society, na ka District Animal Husbandry and Veterinary, na ka District Horticulture, DFO, na ka Social Forestry, na ka NCC, na ka Divisional Soil and Water Conservation bad na ka District Election Officer.Ka tabut jong ka DCIC-East Khasi Hills ka la jop ia ka nam lahduh, katba ka Meghalaya State Skills Development Society ka la long baar bad ka District Animal Husbandry and Veterinary ka la long balai.Ha ka jingiakob iaid march past, ka NCC Girls ka la jop ia ka nam lahduh, katba ka NCC Boys bad ka Sacred Heart Girl’s Hr. Sc. School ki la jop ia ka kyrdan baar bad balai.
title: ÏAROH U LAT ÏA KI SIEN JAM BA SHIM KA SORKAR BAN KYNTIEW ÏA KA JYLLA

content: : Kawei ka trok kaba kit ïa ki iit kaba don ïa u nombar TN 52- F-5863 ka la ryngkang na surokbah sha phyllaw iing jong ki briew ha ka step sngi balang ha ka shnong Mawblei ha ka jaka ba long khongdong bha.La antad ba ka jingjylliew jong ka kynjang na surokbah sha ka jaka ba kane ka trok ka la hap ka long kumba 100 phut tam eiei.Katkum ka khubor ba la ïohlum la ïathuh ba u nongñiah jong ka trok u la khladnoh hashen bad u nongbud u la mynsaw jur.Kane ka trok ka la pra phum bad ki iit ba la thep hapoh ka trok ki la orpait lyngkhot lyngkhai. Kane ka jingjia ka la pynher syrngiew ïa ki briew kiba shong basah hajan ka jaka ba kane ka trok ka la hap.Ki Pulit ka Madanryting PS tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane, ki la leit ban ai jingïarap ban ïoh sei ïa ka met jong u nongñiah bad ban pynkit noh sha Shillong Civil Hospital ïa u nongbud uba la mynsaw jur.
title: NA SUIÑ RYNGKANG KA TROK HA PHYLLAW ÏING BRIEW HA MAWBLEI

content: Tura, K’lyngkot 19: Ka jingialehkai Wushu ha ka lympung ialehkai 5Meghalaya Games, 2024 ka la poi noh sha kaba kut ha ka sngi Palei jong ka taiew.Ha kaba kut jong kane ka jingialehkai, ka kynhun jong ka East Khasi Hills ka la lah ban bat ia ka kyrdan kaba halor duh ha ka miej khur takma, hadien ba kane ka kynhun ka la lah ban kur haduh 10 tylli ki takma ksiar, 5 tylli ki takma Rupa bad 3 tylli ki takma Rnong.Ka district kaba wan ha ka kyrdan kaba ar dei ka Ri-Bhoi District kaba la lah ban khur 5 tylli ki takma ksiar bad 2 tylli ki takma Rnong, katba ka District kaba la wan ha ka kyrdan kaba lai ka dei  Noth Garo Hills kaba la ioh ba kan khur 2 tylli ki takma ksiar, 4 tylli ki takma Rupa bad 1 ka takma Rnong.Ki bor ba dei khmih, ki ñiew bad shim ba ka jingialehkai Wushu ha kane ka lympung ka kren shai kdar ia ka jingsdang ban suthied bha ha kane ka jylla.  Ka dawbah kaba la pynlong ia ki ban kren kumne ka long ba lada khmih bha ia ka jingioh ban khur takma, la lap bad shem ba nalor kitei ki lai tylli ki district kiba la kdew haneng, kiwei kiwei ruh ki samla ba la wan iashim bynta na kiwei pat ruh ki district kim shym la leit phai thylli sha la iing namarba la  don ki rang bad ki thei ialehkai kiba la ioh ban khur ia ki takma.
title: 5TH MEGHALAYA GAMES : 18 TYLLI KI TAKMA KHUR KI NONGIALEHKAI WUSHU KA EKH

content: Da ki hajar ngut ki paid Khasi bad kynthup ruh ia kiwei kiwei ki jaidbynriew kiba sah ha them Ribhoi ha ka 22 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ki la mih sha surok ban pdiang sngewbha ia u nongialam jong ka seng congress u Rahul Gandhi uba la wan khnang sha Meghalaya kum shi bynta ka jingiaid kjat ne ka Jodo Nyay Yatra kaba u la sdang dang shen na ka Jylla Manipur.Ki paidbah kiba la ieng arliang surok ki la ap ban pdiang sngewbha ia u Rahul Gandhi naduh ka shnong Jorobad ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee u Bah Vincent H. Pala lem bad kiwei pat ki nongialam jong ka Seng congress.U Rahul Gandhi u la iaid da ka kjat nakhmat ka ophis u DTO, Nongpoh, bad rung sha madan NSCA Mini Stadium kaba don ha Pahamsyiem ban ai jingkren sha ki paidbah kiba la ialum da ki hajar ngut ryngkat ka jingkaweh ia ki lam jong ka seng congress.Ia u Rahul Gandhi la synran lang da u nongialam ka All India Congress Committee u Jairam Ramesh, u  General Secretary u K. C. Venugopal, u A. Chellakumar uba peit ia ka jylla Meghalaya bad kiwei kiwei ki nongialam bahakhmat jong ka party.Haba ai jingkren sha ki paidbah, u Rahul Gandhi u la takrain tyngeh ia u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi uba shu sngap mynthi halor ka jingia umsnam ha ka jylla Manipur.Ia kane, u Rahul Gandhi u la kren ha ka jingialang paidbah ha madan NSCA Mini Stadium kaba don ha Pahamsyiem, Ribhoi District bad ong ruh ba ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingiaid lynti ka la long ban pyniatylli lang ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong ha ka ri ban ioh ia ka hok, halor ka jingshah leh bym hok hapoh ka jingsynshar jong ka Sorkar BJP.U la kynthoh ruh ia ka jingbym mon jong ka Sorkar BJP ban pynrung ia ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka riti synshar ka ri India bad kynthoh ruh ia ka jingshalan tuh ia u dewiong hapoh kane ka jylla kaba la ktah kylla pat ia ki nongshong shnong kiba im kamai jakpoh na kane ka kam.Shwa ban pynkut, u Rahul Gandhi u la kular ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka jylla Meghalaya ba kan iakhun ia ka jingshah leh bym hok bad ia ki jingeh ba ki paidbah ki la mad hapoh ka jingsynshar ka BJP.Shuh shuh u la ong ba un long u shipai jong ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya na ka bynta ban pynsngew ia ki jingeh ha Delhi.
title: SHLEI U RAHUL GANDHI DA KA JINGIEID TANG SHU ÏOHI ÏA KI PAID KHASI HA NONGPOH

content: Tura, K’lyngkot 20 : Kan dei ka janmiet jong ka jingkmen ka bym lah shu ban batai ia ka kynhun ialehkai baroh kawei jong ka Ri-Bhoi Distrcit hadien ba ki rang bad ki thei ialehkai phutbol ki jong ka, ki la lah ha kaban ioh ban rah ia ka nam lahduh ne khur syndon da ka takma ksiar ha ka jingialehkai jong kiba 18 snem ka rta kynthei bad shynrang.Ha lyndet ka jinglah ban ioh rah ka kynhun napoh Ri-Bhoi District lah ban ong ba ka dei namar ka jingshim khia bad kitkhlieh lang da baroh katta naduh ki khynnah, ki kmie ki kpa, nangta sa ki skul ba ki khynnah ba ki leit ban pule, ki dkhot Ri Bhoi District Sports Association kaba juh trei borbah ban sain dur ne ban pynmih ia ki khynnah ialehkai kiba kynsai.Ha ka jingiakhun ia ka phainal kiba la long hynnin ka janmiet jong ka sngi Thohdieng jong ka taiew ha P.A Sangma Stadium, Tura, na ka liang jong ki kynthei, ka Ri-Bhoi ka la lah ba kan pynliem noh ia ka East Khasi Hills lyngba ka tie breaker da 3-2, katba ia ka takma rnong ne kyrdan kaba lai na kane ka jingiakob ka leit sha ka kynhun ki thei ialehkai jong ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District hadien ba ki la lah ban pynliem noh lyngba ka tie breaker ia ka South West Khasi Hills District.Haba phai pat sha ka jingiakhun jong ki samla shynrang, ka kynhun ialehkai jong ka Ri-Bhoi District ki la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka West Jaintia Hills District da 1-0 bad ia kane ka shi kol ba kordor tam ia ka Ri Bhoi la the pia ka da u Riskhem Syiem.Ka East Khasi Hills District mynta ka kynti ka la hun ba kan bat ia ka kyrdan kaba lai ne khur da ka takma rnong kaba la wan hadien ba ka la lah ba kan pynliem noh ia ka West Garo Hills da 3-1.Ha kaba kut jong ka jingiakhun baroh u Freddy Jyrwa ka East Khasi Hills uba la ioh ban thep 4 kol, u la ioh ban rah ia ka nam Top Scorer, katba na ka liang u Kitboklang Buam ka West Jaintia u la ioh ban rah ia ka nam best goalkeeper, katba u Tiros Kyndait jong ka West Jaintia Hills u la ioh ban rah ia ka nam Best Player.Haba phai sha ka liang ki kynthei, ka nam thei ap kol kaba kynsai ne best goalkeeper ka leit sha ka Nibari Maring jong ka Ri-Bhoi, kaba la mih paw na ka daw ka jinglah ka jong ka ba kan kyrda (save) ia ki artylli ki penalty ha ka por ba la shut ia ka tie breaker, katba ka Inrilaidor Khongthaw jong ka East Khasi Hills ka la ioh ba kan khur haduh artylli ki khusnam kaba kynthup ia ka nam top scorer hadien ba ka la lah ba kan thep haduh 15 tylli ki kol bad kumjuh ia ka nam player of the tournament.
title: KHUR TAKMA KSIAR KI RANG BAD THEI JONG KA RI BHOI IA KA JINGIALEHKAI FOOTBALL KA MEGHALAYA GAMES

content: Tura, K’lyngkot 18 : Ka jingialehkai jong ka athletics ha ka lympung ialehkai jong ka Meghalaya Games kaba San ka ba la long ha Tura, West Garo Hills District, ka la lap ba poi noh sha kaba kut mynta ka sngi.Bad ha kine ki lai sngi jong ka jingiakhun u Skhemlang Suba ka Ri Bhoi bad ka Glorify Kurbah ka EKH ki la ioh ba kin rah ia ka nam kum u rang ne ka thei ialehkai ba kynsai (best athlete).Na ka liang u Skhemlang ka daw kaba la pynlong ia u ba un ioh ban rah ia kane ka nam ialehkai ba kynsai ka lympung ka la wan hadien ba u la lah ban pyndep kham sted ia ka thong ha ka jingiakob mareh kaba 800M hadien ba u la lah ba un pyndep ia ka thong ha ka 1:54.7 sec, kaba la biang pura ia u ba un ioh ban khur 897 poin, katba na ka liang ka Glorify Kurbah, ka la ioh ba kan khur ia kane ka nam hadien ba ka la lah ba kan pyndep ia ka thong ka iakob mareh kaba 800m da  ba kaba ka  la lah ba kan pyndep ia ka thong ha ka  2:21.5 sec bad khur 809 poin.Haba khein kyllum pat ia ka rukom ialehkai ha baroh ki lai sngi jong kane ka jingialehkai,  ka kynhun jong ka West Jaintia Hills District kaba la ioh ba kan khur 17 tylli ki takma ba kynthup 8 tylli ki takma ksiar, 4 ki takma rupa bad 5 ki takma rnong, ka kynhun kaba wan ba-ar dei ka Ri-Bhoi District hadien ba ka la ioh ba kan khur 15 tylli ki takma ba kynthup 6 ki takma ksiar, 6 ki takma rupa bad 3 tylli ki takma rnong, katba ka kynhun ialehkai jong ka East Khasi ka la wan ban bat ia ka kyrdan kaba lai hadien ba ka la ioh ba kan khur 10 tylli ki takma ba kynthup 5 ki takma ksiar, 3 ki takma rupa bad 2 tylli ki takma rnong.”
title: RAH KA WJH IA KA NAM LAHDUH U SKHEMLANG BAD GLORIFY KUM KI NONGIALEHKAI BA KYNSAI HA KA ATHLETICS

content: Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ha ka sngi balang ka la pynbna paidbah ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih da kaba shong kyllaiñ myngngor hakhmat ka Meghalaya Secretariat ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai naduh ka por 10 baje mynstep haduh ka por 4:30 baje janmiet halor ka jingbym sngap jong ka Sorkar MDA hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Conrad Sangma kum u Myntri Rangbah ban jubab ïa ka jingdawa jong ka VPP na ka bynta ban thungkam biang ïa ki ophisar ba la shah weng hapoh ka ophis Lok Ayukta.“Ka jingïakhih kan bteng biang ha ka lah sngi u Blei ka 22 tarik mynta u bnai lada ka Sorkar kam sngap ïa ka jingdawa. Ka jingwengkam ai ki ophisar kam dei tang ka jingleh bymhok bad ka jingibeiñ ïa ki hynrei ïa ka jylla baroh kawei bad namarkata, ka dei ka kamram jong uwei pa uwei u nongshong shnong ban ïasnohkti lang ha ka jingïakhih bad ban pyndem khohsiew ïa kane ka Sorkar,” ong u Nongaiktien ka VPP u Dr. Batskhem Myrboh.“Ka party ka kyrpad ïa baroh kiba ïashim bynta ha ka jingïakhih ba kin kiar ban shim ïa kino kino ki sienjam kiba pynkheiñ ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.  Lada don kino kino kiba donkti ha ka jingpynthud ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ, u/ka kin hap ban shim hi halade ïa ka jingkitkhlieh,” maham ka VPP.
title: HAKHMAT SECRETARIAT YN IAKHIH KA VPP BA SHAH WENGKAM KI OPHISAR LOKAYUKTA

content: Da ki phew ngut ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot jong ka Federation of Riwar Mihngi Local Dorbar (FoRMLD) ha ka sngi Balang ki la rah da ki plakad hakhmat ka ophis treikam jong ka Regioal Office ka National Highways and Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited (NHIDCL), Shillong ban pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingbym maramot jong ka NHIDCL ïa ka surok Shillong-Dawki kaba la pynsuhsat haduh katta katta ïa ki nongleit nongwan bad ïa ki paidbah kiba shong basah ha ki shnong jong ka Riwar Mihngi.Ha ki plakad ki nongïalam ka FoRMLD ki la thoh, “kiew dor ka bai kali, kiew dor ki mar ki mata dei namarba sniew palat ka surok,” “ngi dawa na u Local MLA ban pyni da ki kam, wat heh tang ka kular,” bad kiwei kiwei.Tang hapoh katto katne por, ki ophisar jong ka Regional Office ka NHIDCL ki la khot ïakren ïa ki nongïalam jong ka FoRMLD ha kaba ki la kular ban maramot noh ïa ka surok Shillong-Dawki hapoh 20 sngi.“Ngi la banjur (ïa ka NHIDCL) ban shna pynbha ïa ka surok Shillong-Dawki naduh Pynursla shaduh Tamabil. Kum ki nongshong shnong jong ka thaiñ Riwar, bad kum ka kynhun ngi ïohi ïa ka jingleh bym suidniew jong ka NHIDCL bad ki kontraktor wat haba ladep ban pynjot ïa ka surok mynta la lai snem,” la ong uwei na ki nongïalam ka FoRMLD.U la ong, ba ka jingjot jong ka surok Shillong-Dawki ka la wanrah ruh ïa ka jingkiewdor ha ka bai kali kaba la ktah haduh katta katta ïa ki paidbah bad manla ka taiew ki kali ki hap ban leit sha karkhana namar ka jingpei thliew jong ka surok.“Naduh Pynursla shaduh Dawki-Tamabil la ïohi ïa ka jingbym kheinkor bad la ïohi ba la iuhroit ruh da u MLA jong ngi uba dei u Symbud Myntri Rangbah bad uba peit ruh ïa ka tnat PWD (Roads). Ngi pynpaw ïa ka jingdiaw ha kaba ïadei bad ka jinglong jingman jong ka surok,” u la ong.U la kam ruh ba ka ïoh ka kot ha ka thaiñ Riwar Mihngi la ka hiar haduh katta katta na ka daw ka jingsniew shaba palat jong ka surok Shillong Dawki.U Bah Edmund Khongngai u la ong ruh ba watla ki sengbhalang na ka thaiñ Riwar Mihngi ki la byrngem ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih pyrshah ïa ka jingleh mynthi hynrei ka NHIDCL kam shym la patiaw satia bad kynnoh ruh ba ka shu pynbiej na ka por sha ka por.  U la ong ruh ba watla ka SDO jong ka Pynursla Civil Subdivision ka la khot jingïalang ïa ki kynhun hynrei kam shym la poi shaei shaei ruh.“Lada ka NHIDCL kam lah ban trei pyndep ïa ka surok ïa ka Phase-IV bad ka Phase-II kaba la sniew shaba palat ngi la kren shai watla ki bor ba dei peit ka NHIDCL ki la pynpaw ïa ki daw kiba ngim lah ban pdiang,” u la ong.“Ngi la ïakren markhmat bad lada ka NHIDCL bad ka Sorkar kim shimkhia ban shna ïa ka surok, ngim banse ban mudui da ka PIL hapoh ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court,” la ïathuh u Bah Edmund ïa kaei kaba ki nongïalam ka FoRMLD ki la pynpaw hakhmat u General Manager ka Regional Office jong ka NHIDCL.“Ngi kren da kaba shai ïa ka Sorkar, la lai tylli ki snem ngi la mad ïa ka jingsniew ka surok, ka jingkiewdor ki mar ki mata, ka jingkiewdor ha ka leit ka wan, ka jingshah ktah jong ki paidbah kiba pang ba shitom bad ki khynnah skul ki thud na ka daw ka jingthud ka surok ka bym shngaiñ ban leit ban wan ha ka por slap.U la ong ruh ba ka FoRMLD ka phah ïa u kyrwoh sha u MLA ka Pynursla Constituency u Bah Prestone Tynsong lada ka jingmaramot ïa ka surok Shillong-Dawki kam urlong, u dei ban hiar noh mardor na ka shuki Myntri.
title: BYRNGEM KA FoRMLD BAN MUDUI PIL HA HC, 20 SNGI KULAR KA NHIDCL BAN MARAMOT ÏA KA SUROK SHILLONG-DAWKI

content: : Ka tnat Bording jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la ïasnohkti lang bad ka ONGC Tripura Power Company Ltd (OTPC), da kaba soi ïa ka Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) ha kaba la sakhi lang da u Myntri ka tnat Bording u Abu Taher Mondal.Ha ka jingïalang ïasoi ïa ka soskular kaba la long ha nongbah Shillong, la sakhi lang da u Commissioner and Secretary ka tnat Bording u Sanjay Goyal bad u Managing Director jong ka OTPC u Sanil Namboodiripad.Kane ka soskular ba la ïasoi na ka bynta lai snem ka dei ka thong jong ki arliang mamla ban pynmih ïa ka bording lyngba ka um ha kane ka jylla.Ha ka jingïasoi ïa ka soskular la snohkti lang da ka kynhun jong ka OTPC ba kynthup ïa u Chief Commercial Officer (CCO) Arup Ch. Sarmah, u Chief Technical Officer (CTO) u Shree Narayan bad u Head Corporate Affairs (C&M) Mr. Samarjeet Thakur.U Abu Taher Mondal haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang u la ong, “kane ka jingïatreilang kan kynjoh sha ka thong kaba ngi la angnud, ka dei shaphang ka jingkynshew ïa ka bording bad ka jingïada ruh ïa ka mariang.  Ka jingïasoi ïa ka soskular kan long kum u mawmer ban kynshew ïa ka bording, ban plie lynti na ka bynta ka jingpynjyrngam bad ka lawei kaba shngaiñ. Kane ka soskular ka pynpaw ïa ka jingtrei shitom ban pynpaw ïa ka jingdon kyrhai ka jylla Meghalaya ïa ka bording kaba lah ban pynmih na ka um. Ngi thmu ban pynïar ïa ka jingpynmih bording, ban pynthikna ïa ka jingneh kaba slem na ka bynta ki por ki ban dang wan.”Ka jingthmu jong ka soskular, ka kynthup ïa ka jingtei ïa ka Pump Storage Hydro Power Project, ka jingpynmih ïa ki Large bad Small Hydroelectric Power project, bad ka jingwad lad ban pynbun ïa ki Solar Project.Kine ki jingthmu ki long kiba yn ïaid ryngkat bad ka pyrthei na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka bording kaba khuid bad ban pynkiew ïa ka jingpynmih bording ha ka thaiñ.
title: SOI KA SORKAR MEGHALAYA ÏA KA MoU BAD KA OTPC BAN PYNMIH ÏA KA BORDING

content: Ka Nongaiktien jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba long ka Myntri Sorkar ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla kam dei hok ban tuklar ïa ka jingtreikam ba laitluid jong ka Lokayukta.“Ïa kane ka jingsngewthuh bakla dei ban pynbeit noh mardor,” la ong ka Dr. Ampareen ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor haba pynphai nia halor ka jingkynnoh jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingweng noh ïa u Director of Inquiry bad ki Inquiry Officer jong ka Meghalaya Lokayukta.Kane ka jingpynshai, ka long halor ka jingkynnoh ba la wanrah da ka Liang Pyrshah Voice of the People’s Party (VPP) ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingwengkam ïa ki Ophisar na ka Meghalaya Lokayukta, halor ka jingkam ba ki dei kiba la lap ïa ka jyrsieh bamsap hapoh ka Garo Hills Autonomous District Council (GHADC).Ki ophisar ba la shah wengkam ki kynthup ïa u Director of Inquiry and Prosecution Bah J. Rymmai, uba long u Ophisar IPS barim, ryngkat bad u Enquiry-cum-Investigating Officers Bah R. Pde bad u Anil K. Sangma.Ka la ong, katkum ka Lokayukta Act, 2014, Sorkar ka la ïoh ïa ki jingdkhoh ha kaba jied ïa ki dkhot, kiba la thung ha ka Lokayukta ba kynthup ha ka post Director of Inquiry bad u Director Prosecution.“Haba ngi ïohi ïa kine ki jingbakla, ka Sorkar ka la shim da ka sienjam ban pynbeit noh ïa ki jingbakla katkum ba la kdew ha ka Aiñ, ka Sorkar ka la ai jingmut sha ka Lokayukta, kaba la pynkupbor ban thung ïa la ki jong ki dkhot. Ïa ka kyrteng la phah sha ka Meghalaya Lokayukta bad mar mar la pynbeit ïa ki jingbakla bad jied ruh ïa ki ophisar,” ka la ong.“Ka dei ka jingkwah jong kane ka Sorkar ban ai ka jingkular sha ki nongshong shnong ba ngin ym tuklar ïa kino kino ki kynhun treikam bad ïa ki jingtreikam jong ki bad ngi kular ruh sha ki paidbah jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ba kino kino ki jingbakla ngin ïaleh ban pynbeit bad ma ngi kum ka Sorkar ngi la pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka jingtreikam katkum ka aiñ bad katkum ka jingai jingmynjur ïa ki nongrim jong ka Meghalaya Lokayukta Act 2014,” ka la bynrap.U nongaiktien jong ka National People’s Party’s (NPP) Bah Himalaya M. Shangpliang uba long ruh u Adviser jong ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla u la pynshai ba katkum ka Section 10 (2) bad 11 jong ka Meghalaya Lokayukta Act, 2014, ki ophisar lane ki nongtrei ki dei ban long kiba dang shakri ha ki tnat treikam jong ka Sorkar.  Ki nongtrei ba la shongthait kim lah shuh ban dang long ki nongtrei jong ka tnat. Ka Sorkar ka burom ka Meghalaya Lokayukta Act.U la pynshai ba ka lynti ban thung ïa kine ki ophisar ka katkum ka Lokayukta Act, 2014 hapoh ka Section 10 (2) kaba ong, “dei ban don u Director of Inquiry bad Director of Prosecution kiba ka kyrdan kam dei ban kham poh ïa ka kyrdan u Additional Secretary jong ka Sorkar Jylla lane kaba ryngkat bad kata, ïa kiba yn thung da u Chairperson da kaba jied na ka thup kyrtengba la phah da ka Sorkar Jylla.”“Katkum ka Section 11 jong ka Meghalaya Lokayukta Act, 2014 ka ong ruh, “watla kano kano kaba ïadei bad ka aiñ kaba la pyntreikam, ka Lokayukta kan thung ïa ka Inquiry Wing ban khlieh da u Director of Inquiry na ka bynta ka jingthmu ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit halor kino kino ki jingkynnnoh ba la leh da kino kino ki shakri sorkar kiba lah ban shah pynshitom hapoh ka Prevention of Corruption Act, 1988.Naduh ka por ba la thung ïa ka Inquiry Wing da ka Lokayukta, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la phah ïa ki kyrteng jong ka ophisar bad ïa kiwei kiwei ki nongtrei na ka tnat, katkum ka jingdonkam jong ka Lokayukta, na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ki jingtohkit hapoh kane ka Aiñ.Na ka bynta ban ai jingïarap ïa ka Lokayukta ha kaba pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit, ki ophisar jong ka Inquiry Wing kim dei ban long kiba rit ïa ka kyrdan jong u Under Secretary jong ka Sorkar, hynrei ki dei ban don ïa kajuh ka iktiar katkum ba la pynkupbor hapoh ka Lokayukta hapoh ka Section 88.U Bah Shangpliang u la ong ba ki Ophisar ba la weng na ka ophis jong ka Lokayukta ki dei kiba la shongthait ïa kiba la shim na ka tnat Pulit.“Ka dei tang ka kam ba shipor na ka liang jong ka Sorkar khnang ban dup lah ban pyntyllun ïa ka jingtreikam jong ka Lokayukta bad ïa ka jingthungkam la pynmih na ka bynta u Director of Inquiry ha u Risaw, 2022 bad na ka bynta ki Inquiry Officers la pynmih ha u Lber, 2023. Ka Sorkar ka sngewdei ba ka ophis Lokayukta ka dei ban don ïa ki ophisar kiba la tbit katkum ka Aiñ bad namarkata, katkum ka Section 10 bad 11 jong ka Aiñ ïa ka thup kyrteng la phah sha ka Lokayukta bad ka Lokayukta ka ladep jied bad pynmih ruh ïa ka jingpyntip halor ka shithi thungkam,” u la ong.Ha ka 19 tarik Nohprah, 2023, ka ophis Meghalaya Lokayukta ka la jied ïa u ophisar IAS IW Ingty kum u Director of Inquiry bad lai ngut ki ophisar MPS kum ki dkhot ba kynthup ïa u Challang G. Momin, u John Clitzer A. Sangma bad u Banïateilang Diengngan.“Kane ka mut ba ka ophis Lokayukta ka la treikam pura da ka jingthung ïa ki opphisar bapura ïa kiba la shim na kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingshakri hapoh ka Sorkar Jylla,” la ong u Bah Shangpliang.“Kam pat ju don kano kano ka por ba u Myntri Rangbah ne ka Sorkar ka la tuklar halor ka jingthungkam ne ban jied ïa ki ophisar ban phah sha ka Lokayukta lymne u Myntri Rangbah bad ka ophis jong u kin tuklar ïa kino kino ki case kiba ka Lokayukta ka la shimti.”
title: PYNSHAI KA DR. AMPAREEN ÏA KA JINGKYNNOH KA VPP : KA SORKAR KAM LAH BAN TUKLAR ÏA KA LOKAYUKTA

content: U Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla Bah Shakliar Warjri ha ka sngi Baar u la kaweh ia ka lama kum ka dak jong ka jingsdang ia ka jingrah ia ka Dongmusa na kawei ka District sha kawei pat tad haduh ban da pynpoi ha ka lympung ialehkai 5th Meghalaya Games 2024 ka ban sa long naduh ka 15 tarik haduh 20 tarik mynta u bnai ha Tura, West Garo Hills District.U Bah Shakliar ula aiti ia ka Dongmusa ha madan SSA Stadium hapdeng ka jingiadon ryngkat jong ki nongkitkam ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA), ki Ophisar ka tnad Sports and Youth Affaris lem bad ki nongialehkai na ki district bapher bapher.Ia kane ka Dongmusa la aiti ban rah da u rangmareh ba pawnam ka Jylla Bah Binningstar Lyngkhoi uba la ioh khur bun tylli ki takma na ki lympung iakhun ha Jylla, ha ri India bad shabar ri ruh kumjuh. U Bah Benningstar un pynpoi ia kane ka Dongmusa jong ka lympung ialehkai sha ka madan ialehkai ha Tura.Ia kane ka lympung yn sa plie paidbah da President ka ri India ka Droupadi Murmu ka ban sa long kum ka Kongsan.Haba kren kum u Kongsan, u Bah Shakliar Warjri u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkmen ba la sdang ia ka lympung ialehkai Meghalaya Games da kaba thang ia ka sharai bad ba la aiti sha ki nongpyniaid.  U la ong ba ka Meghalaya Games ka dei kawei na ki lympung ialehkai sports kaba heh ha ka jylla bad ha kajuh ka por u la ai khublei ia ki nongialehkai ki ban sa iashim bynta ha kane ka lympung.
title: YN PYNPOI U KHLUR ÏAKOB MAREH ÏA KA DONGMUSA HA KA 5TH MEGHALAYA GAMES HA TURA

content: Ka Balang Catholic lyngba ka The Dicastery for the Doctrine of Faith ka la pynmih ïa ka dulir “Fiducia Supplicans” ha ka 18 tarik Nohprah 2023 ha kaba ka la pynshai ba ki Nongsharai Balang bad ki Lyngdoh Sohblei kim lah ban ai ïa ka Sacrament Jjingkyntiew Kurim ïa kiba shongkha na kajuh ka long kynthei shynrang hynrei ki lah tang ban ban ai ïa ka jingduwai kyrkhu kyrdoh.U nongthoh khubor u la ïoh ban ïakren bad u Vicar General jong ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong u Rev. Father Richard M. Majaw ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka bynta.U Rev.Fr. Richard u la ïathuh ba ïa kane ka Dulir ka Balang Catholic kam shym la wanrah ïa kano kano ka jingpynkylla ïa ka jinghikai tynrai ha ka shongkha shongman bad ïa ki aiñ ka Balang ba ka shongkha shongman kan dei beit hapdeng u shynrang bad ka kynthei bad ka ong ruh ba kito kiba shongkha na kajuh ka long kynthei shynrang ki lah ban shu ïoh tang ïa ka jingduwai kyrkhu kaba ki Lyngdoh ki ai ïa kito kiba pan jingkyrkhu na ki kti u Lyngdoh Sohblei.U la ong ruh ba kane ka Dulir kam pynshlur satia ïa ka shongkha na kajuh ka long kynthei shynrang bad u ong ba kane ka Dulir ka thew ïa ka jingmut jong ka jingduwai kyrkhu.“Kane ka dei ka jingduwai kaba u Lyngdoh u lah ban duwai hi khlem da shim ïa ka jingduwai jong ka Balang.  Ïa kane ka jingduwai kyrkhu ym dei ban sngewthuh bakla ba ka dei ka jinglehñiam jong ka Sakrament Jingkyntiew Kurim jong ka Balang Katholik,” la pynshai u Vicar General.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, u Archbishop jong ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh u la phah da ka pynbna sha baroh ki paidriewngeit jong ka Balang Catholic hapoh ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong ban pynshai ba ka Dulir “Fiducia Supplicans” ka khlem pynkylla ïa ka aiñ tynrai jong ka Sacrament Jingkyntiew Kurim ha ka Balang Catholic bad ka jingduwai jong u Lyngdoh kam mut ba u mynjur ne pynshur ïa ka jingleh jong ki (briew kiba ïashongkha para shynrang bad para kynthei).“To ngin ïai bat barabor ïa ka jinglong bakyntang jong ka Sacrament Jingkyntiew Kurim,” la kyntu u Nongsharai Mynsiem jong ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong.
title: KIBA SHONGKHA NA KAJUH KA LONG KYNTHEI SHYNRANG KI LAH BAN SHU ÏOH TANG KA JINGDUWAI : FR. RICHARD MAJAW

content: :  Ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team (SRT) ki la ioh sei ia ka metiap jong u briew uba ngam jyllop ha ka 1 tarik, Kyllalyngkot 2024 ha Wahrew.Une u briew u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Vicky Chetri uba la 31 snem ka rta, u dei u khun jong ka Kong Starlin Syiemlieh uba shong basah ha Nongmensong.U Vicky u la leit ban khana snem thymmai shi paralok ha Wahrew bad ha ka jingiabam khana u la leit jngi kai ha khrum jong jingkieng Wahrew hynrei u la ngam jyllop.La ioh ban sei ia ka metiap jong u na ka jaka kham sharum kaba don kumba 100 mitar eiei ka jingjngai na Jingkieng Wahrew.
title: IOH SEI KI SRT IA KA MET UBA NGAM JYLLOP HA WAHREW

content: Ka tnat Pulit jong ka Jylla ka la pynkhreh ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingpahara ha nongbah Shillong bad ha Tura ha ki sngi shwa ba ka President jong ka ri India ka Droupadi Murmu kan wan iuhkjat ha ka 15 tarik bad 16 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka Murmu kan leit iuhkjat shwa nyngkong eh ha Tura kaba dei ka district headquarter jong ka West Garo Hills District, ban plie paidbah ïa ka Meghalaya Games ka ban sa sdang naduh ka 15 tarik haduh 20 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka jingpynkhreh jong ka tnat Pulit ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingpahara ka long hadien ba ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ka la weng noh na ka miej jingïakren ïasuk bad ka Sorkar bad hadien ba kawei ka kynhun lehnoh kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Terrorizers111 ka la phah ïa ka jingthoh lyngba ka email sha ki Ingbishar High Court jong ki Jylla bad kynthup ruh sha ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court da kaba byrngem ban pynbthei bom.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ba ïa ka lympung ïalehkai Meghalaya Games yn sa pynkut noh ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai bad palat 3,000 hajar ngut ki nongïalehkai kin sa ïashim bynta ha ki 22 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai bapher bapher.  Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynlut pisa palat T. 23 klur na ka bynta kane ka lympung ïalehkai.Ha nongbah Shillong, ka President kan sa buh ïa u mawnongrim ban trei ïa ka Shillong Ropeway project ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai.“Ngi la pan sa khyndai kynhun ki bor pahara ban peitngor ïa ka nongbah Shillong bad ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingpahra ha ka sngi ba ka President kan wan iuhkjat ha Shillong,” ong uwei u heh Pulit.Bun tylli ki jingïalang ladep pynlong na ka bynta ka jingwan jong ka President sha ka jylla.Ha u snem ba ladep, ka jingaiti ïa ka jaka ha Shillong Peak na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka Shillong Rope Way project, la sakhi lang da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma.La buh thong ban tei ïa ka ropeway project ha ka jaka kaba heh 1.34 hectare, ka jingmang pisa kaba kot T. 138.00 klur.  Kane ka projek ka kynthup ïa ka Lower Terminal Point (LTP), ïa kaba la tyrwa ban shna na Forest Nursery Rait Laban ha ka jingjrong kaba 11146.96 sq. m bad ha kynjang kaba 838 mitar bad ban don ïa ka Station Building, Concourse, Maintenance Room, Ticket Room cum Office, Store Room, Security Room, Waiting Area, Public Convenience bad Parking Area.
title: YN WAN KA DROUPADI MURMU, PYNKHLAIÑ PAHARA HA TURA BAD SHILLONG HADIEN BA BYRNGEM KA KYNHUN TERRORIZERS111

content: U Bah Anjelus Mawlong u la mudui da ka ejahar sha ki Pulit da kaba pyntip ba ha ka 1 tarik, mynta u bnai ha ka por kumba 2 baje mynstep ki runar ki bym lah satia ban ithuh ki tuh ïa ka pisa kaba kot T. 1.5 lak bad ïa kiwei de ki mar kiba don hapoh ka ing jong u ha ka shnong Umsohlang Umsning, Ribhoi District.Ha kawei pat ka jingjia, u Arjun Joshi u la ujor sha ki Pulit ba ha ka 29 tarik, Nohprah 2023 ha ka por kumba 11.40 baje mynstep u la lap ba ki runar ki bym lah ban tip ki la tuh ïa ki Secondary Battery na ka Junction Box jong ka CCTV Camera ba la pyndait ha Laban Cultural Club, Batti-Bazar, Laban, Shillong.U Bah Albert Mawlong u la ujor sha ki Pulit ba ha ka 1 tarik mynta u bnai, ki runar ki la rong tuh ïa ka Scooter  kaba don ïa u nombar ML-05Z-8012 na Nongthymmai Nongkhyriem, Shillong.Ha ka 30 tarik, Nohprah, 2023 ha ka por kumba 3.40 baje mynstep, ki runar bym lah ban tip, ki la rong tuh ïa kawei ka kali Maruti Eeco van kaba don ïa u nombar AS-01EF-1519 kaba dei jong u Pawan Kumar Swami na Byrnihat, Ribhoi District.U Ashutosh Kumar Paul, uba dei u nongñiah jong ka trok CG-04FL-2414 u la ujor sha ki Pulit, ba ha ka 29 tarik, Nohprah, 2023 ha ka por kumba 3.20 baje mynstep hynriew ngut ki runar bym lah ban ithuh durkhmat ki la sei jubor kumba 200 litre ka umphniang Diesel na ka trok jong u, kaba u la pynieng ha ka shnong Bhoirymbong, Ribhoi District.U Bah Budlang Pohtmi u la ujor sha ki Pulit, ba ha ka 28 tarik, Nohprah, 2023, ki runar ki la prong tuh hapoh ka ing jong u ha ka shnong Mawblei Madanrting Block-I, Shillong bad rong tuh 4 tula ka ksiar.U Siddhart Banerjee jong ka Star Cement Lumshnong, East Jaiñtia Hills u la ujor sha ki Pulit ba ha ka 12 tarik, Nohprah, 2023 ha ka por kumba 8.30 mynstep, ki runar ki bym lah ban ithuh durkhmat ki la rong tuh lai hajar tylli ki Bolts and Nuts, laiphew hynriew tylli ki Insert Plates, shispah khatar tyllli ki Drill Assembly bad ar spah arphew ar tylli ki Slotted Assembly, kiba shongdor kumba T. 1,88,17,808 klur na ka kudam buh tiar jong ka Kompeni.U Company Commander, B-Coy, 4th Bn., BSF u la ujor sha ki Pulit ba ha 28 tarik Nohprah, 2023 ha ka por kumba 2.40 baje, uwei u shipai BSF na Hawaitilla BOP, West Jaiñtia Hills u la ïohkem ïa uwei u nong Bangladesh ïa uba la tip kyrteng kum u Salim Ahmed uba la 35 snem ka rta na ka shnong kaba dang hap hapoh ka Muktapur Patrol Post, West Jaiñtia Hills. Hadien kane, saw byrni u piat ba la thmu ban shalan beaiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh la ïoh kurup najan kawei ka khlaw kaba don hajan.U Silseng M Sangma u la ujor sha ki Pulit ba ha ka 29 tarik, Nohprah, 2023, kawei ka kali Bolero pick-up kaba don ïa u nombar ML-08C-4955 ka la jah na Rongrak Gonganggre, South Garo Hills District.
title: 1.5 LAK TUH KI RUNAR NA KA ÏING U BAH ANJELUS MAWLONG HA UMSOHLANG UMSNING

content: Ki Pulit ka jylla ki la pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingpeitngor bad ka jingpahara hadien ba la ïoh pdiang ïa kawei ka jingthoh lyngba ka email ha ka sngi Thohdieng ba la byrngem da kawei ka kynhun lehnoh kaba la tip kum ka Terrorizers111.Ha u kywoh, ka Terrorizers111, ka la kam ba ka ladep ban buh ïa ki bom ha manla ki Iingbishar jong ka ri India kynthup ruh ha ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ïohlum, ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court ka la ïoh pdiang ïa ka email byrngem ha ka por 5.45 baje mynstep Sngi Thohdieng.Ïa kane ka email, hadien ka jingwad bniah la lap ba la phah na kakaba ong, “nga ladep buh bom ha baroh ki Iingbishar jong ka ri India. Ïa kine ki bom la buh  ha ka jaka bakyndong bha bad kin sa bthei ha ka por mynstep. Phin sa mad ïa ka jinglyngkien jong ka snam.”“Ngi dei na ka kynhun lehnoh kaba la tip kum ka Terrorizers111.  Ai ïa ka kyrteng jong ka kynhun jong ngi sha ki lad pathai khubor ruh ngin ym sangeh na ka jingleh ïa ki kam pyntriem jong ngi,” la ong u kyrwoh.U Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills Bah Sylvester Nongtnger u la ïathuh ba ki Pulit ki la ïoh jingtip halor kane bad ki la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bad ka jingpeitngor ha kaba u la ïathuh ruh ba u Addl SP bad ka kynhun Pulit ki la don ha Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court ban ap pahara.Nalor kata, u la ïathuh ba ka tnat Pulit ka la phah ruh ïa ki Bomb Squad ryngkat bad ïa ki Ksew ne ki K9 Unit sha iingbishar Meghalaya High Court ban wad bniah, ïoh ka don shisha ka jingbuh ïa ki bom hapoh ka Ïingbishar.
title: BYRNGEM PYNBTHEI BOM KA SENG LEHNOH HA KI HIGH COURT KYNTHUP ÏA KA MEGHALAYA HIGH COURT

content: Ka DPK Multi-Ventures kan sa pynlong ïa ka tamasa tlang harud wah Umngi ïa kaba la tip kum ka 1st Umngi Winter Beach Festival 2024 ha Dangar Mawsynram, East Khasi Hills District.Ïa kane ka tamasa Umngi Winter Beach Festival 2024 yn sa pynlong ban kyntiew ïa ka kam jngohkai pyrthei bad ban plie ïa ki lad aikam aijam ïa ki samla.U Secretary jong ka DPK Multi-Ventures Bah James Paul Ïawphniaw ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la pyntip ba ïa kane ka tamasa yn sa pynlong ar sngi kynthih, kata, ha ka 12 tarik bad 13 tarik mynta u bnaiU la ïathuh ba ka jingthmu ban pynlong ïa kane ka tamasa ka long ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa ka jingithiang bad ka jingitynnat jong ka wah Umngi kaba ïasyriem bad ka Beach ha Goa.U la pyntip ba ha kane ka tamasa kan plie lad ïa ki samla ka thaiñ ba kin pynpaw pyrthei ïa ki sap ba ki don, ban pynriew spah ïa ka lariti bad lyngba kane ka tamasa kan khring shuh shuh ïa ki nong jngohkai pyrthei la ka long na ka jylla bad na shabar ka jylla.U Bah Armstrong L Thongni uba dei uwei na ki nongïalam jong kane ka kynhun haba bynrap lang u la ïathuh ba ha kane ka tamasa kin don shibun ki jingpynbyrngia ki ban khring ïa ki paidbah naduh ka tem ka put, ka rwai ka siaw na ki nongrwai ba paw ka Jylla kynthup ka kynhun Snow White, Gracyl Ropmay, DJ DBRYN nalor kiwei kiwei.U la pyntip ruh ba yn pynlong ruh ia ka rynsan Miss Beach Festival Contest kaba kit ïa ka khusnam da ka song pisa kaba T. 40, 000 hajar ïa kaba wan nyngkong, T. 25,000 ïa kaba wan baar bad bad T. 15,000 ïa kaba wan balai.La khmih lynti ruh ba ka jingwan poi jong ki paidbah kiba ïashim bynta ha ka tamasa kan ym duna ïa ki hajar ngut ha ka shi sngi.
title: IASYRIEM KA WAH UMNGI ÏA KA BEACH HA GOA, YN PYNPAWNAM DA KA WINTER FESTIVAL

content: : Ka Voice of the Poeple Party (VPP) ha ka sngi u Blei ka la dawa ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ïalam da ka National People’s Party (NPP) ba kan thungkam biang ïa ki lai ngut ki Investigating Officer  jng ka ophis Lukayukta kiba la shah weng kam dang shen.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u President jong ka VPP Bah Ardent M. Basaïawmoit u la ong, “ka khubor ba la mih dang shen ba ka Sorkar MDA ka la pynkut noh ïa ka samoi treikam jong ki Investigating Officers ha ka ophis jong ka State Lokayukta tang ban ïada ïa ki nongmihkhmat bamsap kiba dei na ka NPP kynthup ruh ïa ki bahaing hasem jong u Myntri Rangbah dei ban pynrem bad ban pyrshah jur da baroh ki nongshong shnong ha ka jylla.”“U Myntri Rangbah u dei ban sangeh shisyndon ban tuklar ïa ka jingtreikam jong ka ophis jong ka Lokayukta kaba long ka shlem treikam ba laitluid bad kaba treikam khlem sheptieng.  Lada kane ka sorkar ba mynta kam thungkam ïa ki ophisar ba la shah wengkam, ka party kan mih sha surok ban pynlong da ka jingïakhih pyrshah ïa ka jyrsieh bamsap jong ka Sorkar MDA ba ïalam da ka NPP,” ong u Bah Ardent.“Ki paidbah ka Jylla Meghalaya ki deihok ban ïoh ïa ka jylla kaba lait na ka jyrsieh bamsap bad ka synshar ka khadar kaba bha.  Kum ka Liang Pyrshah kaba don jingkitkhlieh, ngin pynthikna ba kane ka Sorkar kam dei ban leh ïa ki paidbah ha kane ka dur,” la ong u kyrwoh.
title: BA SHAH WENGKAM KI INVESTIGATING OFFICER KA LOKAYUKTA BYRNGEM IAKHIH PAIDBAH KA VPP

content: : Ka ophis jong u Chief Electoral Officer (CE) ka Election Department ka la pyntip ba ïa ka Final Rolls kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynlong ïa ka Special Summary Revision na ka bynta ki 60 tylli ki Assembly Constituency ladep ban pyllait paidbah ha ka 5 tarik, mynta u bnai.Katkum ka jingpyntip jong u Chief Electoral Officer Dr. BDR Tiwari, ka jingdon jong ki nongthep vote ha Meghalaya katkum ka Final Rolls ka long 22,17,100 lak ngut. Kumta ka jingkiew jong ki nongthep vote kiba thymmai ka long 30,949 hajar ngut haba ïanujor bad ka jingdon jong ki 21,86,151 ngut ki nongthep vote ha ka por ba la pynmih ïa ka Draft Rolls ha ka 27 tarik, Risaw, 2023.
title: DON 22,17,100 LAK KI NONGTHEP VOTE HA MEGHALAYA

content: Uwei u rangbah ïa uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Salbinus Dhar ba ju khot ieid kum u Bah Chiang u la duhei ïa la ka jong jingim hadien ba u la mynsaw jur na ka jingshah thombor ha ki suba Khar Bangladesh kaba la jia ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka shnong Lamasaki, East Jaiñtia Hills kaba jngai tang kumba 500 mitar na ka jaka ap ktem jong ki shipai BSF.U Bah Rahul Pohtam na ka shnong Lumsohski uba la leit bud lang sha Bri kwai bad u Bah Chiang u la lait im da ka said na ka kti jong ki runar kiba la thombor ïa kine ki arngut katba ki dang don hapoh ka Bri ha kane ka sngi ban ap pahara ia ka bri.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong ki trai shnong, la ong ba kine ki ar ngut ki rangbah ki la leit ban ap ïa ka bri kwai namarba ki ju don ki mynder na ka ri Bangladesh kiba ju rung sha ki bri ki bsah kiba don ha khappud ban tuh ïa u kwai na ka bri.  Hynrei kine ki arngut tang shu poi ha bri kwai ki la shah kthong pynban ha ki runar kiba la wan da ka kynhun bad kiba rah ruh ïa ki tiar pynmynsaw da ki wait.La ïathuh ruh ba kane ka kynhun runar ka la ïoh pom ïa u Bah Chiang da ka wait na ka kti ka mon, na ka khlieh bad na ryndang, katba u Bah Rahul Pohtam u la lait phet da ka said na ka kti jong ki runar.Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Narpuh Circle lyngba u kyrwoh na u President Bah K.S.Suchiang ka la pynrem jur ïa kane ka kam runar bad ka kam riewkhlaw jong ki mynder kiba wan prong tuh na ka ri Bangladesh sha u pud u sam jong ka ri India bad ha kajuh ka por ka la dawa ïa ki bor ka aiñ ba ki dei ban kem mardor ïa ki runar kiba donkti ha kane ka kam runar.Ka KSU ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba ka dei ban pynkynriah noh mardor ïa ki shipai BSF kiba ju pahara ha jingkieng Sonapyrdi bad ong ruh ba kane ka jingap pahara jong ki shipai BSF ka long kaba beaiñ namarba ha ka jingshisha kum shipai BSF ïada ri ki ladei ban shim khia ban tehlakam ïa ki kam sniew ha ki khappud hynrei ki ïeng pahara pynban ha surokbah National Highway-6 ha Sonapyrdi.Ka seng ka ong ruh ba kum kine ka jingjia shah pynïap jong ki paidbah ha ki khappud ka la pynsuhjer ïa ki paradoh para snam jong ka thaiñ namarba kum kine ki jingshah thombor ki ju jia na ka por sha ka por.Ka seng ka pynkynmaw ruh ïa kawei ka jingshah pynïap dusmon jong kawei ka longkmie kaba la 45 snem ka rta na shnong  Donaskur, East Jaiñtia Hills District kaba la jia dang ha ki khyndiat bnai ba la leit ïa kaba la suba jur ba nongleh kam bymman ki dei ki mynder na ka ri Bangladesh bad ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka la kynthoh ruh ba ki bor Pulit kim pat shym la ïoh kem satia ïa ki runar kiba donkti ban pynïap dusmon ïa ka longkmie.Shuh shuh ka seng ka la dawa ba ka Sorkar kam dei ban shu sngap jar hynrei ka dei ban shimkhia ban tehlakam ïa ki kam sniew, ki kam pyntriem ha khappud ban ïada ïa ki paradoh parasnam ban lait na kum kine ki jingshah thombor.Ka KSU Narpuh Circle phah ruh ïa u kyrwoh sngewlem sha ki bahaïing hasem bad ka jingsngewlem halor ka jingjia ba sngewsih ïa u Bah Chiang Dhar
title: HA BRI KWAI SHAH PYNIAP DUSMON U RANGBAH HA KHAPPUD EJH HA KI SUBA KHAR BANGLA

content: Ka Nongaiktien jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba long ka Myntri Sorkar ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka dang kwah ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ka seng kieng atiar ba la shah kheiñ be-aiñ ka Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC).Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka Dr. Ampareen ka la ong, “kum ka Sorkar, ngi dang kwah ban ïohi ïa ka jingtyllun shakhmat ka jingïakren ïasuk bad kane ka seng kieng atiar ba la kheiñ be-aiñ bad ngi kwah ban ruh ba ka dei ban don ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut kaba neh shi junom.”“Kum ka Sorkar bad ka National People’s Party (NPP) ngi iengskhem halor ka nongrim ba ngi kwah ban pynïaid shakhmat ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ka kynhun kieng atiar kaba la shah kheiñ be-aiñ bad ngi kwah ban ïohi ba ka dei ban don ka jingïa sngewthuh jingmut lang na ka bynta ka jingïakren ïasuk ka ban neh shi rta, hynrei ngam lah ban batai than halor kane ka mat namarba kane ka mat ka dei kaba hap hapoh ka jingkhmih jong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla uba khmih ïa ka tnat Kam Pohiing hynrei mynta um pat lait por ban shimkhia ïa kane ka mat kaba kongsan hynrei ka seng NPP ka iengskhem ha ka nongrim ban ai jingmut ïa ka sorkar ba kan pynïaid shakhamt bad jingïakren ïasuk” ka la ong.“Ngi sngewthuh ba ki don ki jingbym hun bad jingbym sngewthuh jingmut bad ïa kine baroh ngi donkam ban da pynshisha shwa bad ngin ap ïa u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohiing ba un wanphai noh shen sha ka ophis treikam khnang ba yn lah ban ai ïa ka jingbatai kaba bniah” la ong ka Dr. Ampareen.“Ngan ym lah ban batai bniah halor kane ka kam namarba ngam pat ïoh jingtip bha hynrei ha kum kane ka por nga lah tang ban batai ïa ka nongrim ba ki nongkyrshan ka NPP ki ieng ha kawei ka liang bad ka Sorkar MDA 2.0 hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Myntri Rangbah jong ngi,” ka la bynrap.Ki san tylli ki jingdawa ba kongsan jong ka HNLC ki kynthup ïa ka jingwengnoh ïa ka jingkheiñ be-aiñ pyrshah ïa ka seng bad ban weng lut ïa baroh ki mukotduma da kaba ai ïa ka jingmap ei sha baroh ki nongïalam bad sha ki dkhot jong ka seng.
title: KUM KA SORKAR NGI KWAH BAN ÏOHI ÏA KA JINGTYLLUN SHAKHMAT KA JINGÏAKREN ÏASUK: DR. AMPAREEN

content: Ka kynhun kiengatiar ba la shah kheiñ beaiñ Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC), lyngba u nongmihkhmat Bah Sadon K. Blah uba long ruh u President jong HNYF, ka la pynpaw ba ka jingïakren ïasuk kan bteng tang lada ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Sorkar Pdeng ki weng noh ïa baroh ki mukotduma ba la pynngat pyrshah ïa ki nongïalam bad ia ki dkhot jong ka seng.“Lada ka Sorkar ka weng noh ïa ki mukotduma bad mab lut ïa ki jingleh jingkam jong ki dkhot ka seng, ka don ka lad ba ka jingïakren ïasuk kan ïai bteng namarba ïa kane la tyrwa hi da ka HNLC kumta ka don ka jingkyrmen ba ka jingïakren kan ïaid biang hynrei lym kumta, ka jingïakren ka la kut,” la ong u Bah Sadon Blah ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.U la pynpaw ba kum u nongmihkhmat jong ka HNLC, ka Sorkar ka ïaiban ban iaid da ka lynti jong ka ain katba ka HNLC pat ka kwah ban iaid da ka mon jong ka Sorkar. “Kumta kane ka shong mynta ha ka bor jong ka Sorkar,” la ong u Bah Blah.“Mynta kane ka don ar lynti, lada ka Sorkar ka kwah ban pynbeit ïa kane ka jingeh da kaba ïaid da ka lynti jong ka aiñ lane da kaba shim rai hi da ka bor jong ka sorkar,” u la ong bad bynrap, “baroh ki thma ha ka pyrthei la lah ban tehlakam ym da ka lynti ka aiñ hynrei da ka bor jong ka Sorkar.”“Lada ka Sorkar ka kam ba ka bor ka don ha ka HNLC, ka dei ka lynti jong ka aiñ ba ka sorkar ka kwah hynrei lada ka HNLC ka ong ba ka rai ka shong ha ka Sorkar, ka kynhun ka ïai ban ba ïa ka kam dei ban leh beit da ka Sorkar.  Mynta ka Sorkar ka dei ban pyntreikam da ujuh u dieng thew ia ka HNLC thik kumba ka leh ïa ki sengbhalang ha ka jingïakhih ILP ha u snem 2013,” u la ong shuh shuh.Haba pynkynmnaw ia ka jingïakhih ILP ha ki snem ba la leit noh, u Bah Sadon u la ong, “wat ma nga ruh nga la shah pynngat ha kiba bun ki kyndon hynrei da ka jingïakren la weng lut lait noh tang lai tylli. Kumta, lada ïa u dieng thew lah ban pyntreikam ïa ki sengbhalang kiba ïakhih, balei pat ym lah ban pyntreikam lang ïa ka HNLC, ka dei tang ka mon jong ka sorkar kam da donkam satia ban ïaid da ka lynti jong ka aiñ.”Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdawa jong ka HNLC ban mab noh ia ki mukotduma, u Bah Sadon u la ong, “wat u AK Mishra (MHA Advisor North East) u ladep pynpaw ba kim da don than ki kam kiba triem jong ka HNLC. Kumta, lada ki kam jong ka seng kim da dei kiba triem kumta ka Sorkar ka dei ban pyrkhat bad weng noh ïa ki mukotduma ïa baroh ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot jong ka kynhun.”
title: KA HNLC KA KWAH BAN MAB LUT ÏA KI JINGSHAH PYNNGAT KYNDON BAN BTENG ÏA KA JINGÏAKREN ÏASUK: SADON BLAH

content: U MLA jong ka Voice of the Peoples Party (VPP) na North Shillong Constituency Bah Adelbert Nongrum ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la ai jingmut ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan phah jurip ïa ki Engineer bad ïa ki Expert ïa ka jingkieng nar kaba rim kaba don markhap bad ka jingkieng Umïam ban bishar bniah la ka dang long neem kaba lah ban phah ïaid tang ïa ki kali lyngba kane ka jingkieng nar.Da lade hi u Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la hiar jurip ïa kane ka jingkieng nar kaba rim hadien ba ki paidbah ki la ud bad pynpaw ïa ka jingsohsat kaba khraw namarba ka jingdheng kali naduh Mawiongrim shaduh Umïam ban jam sha shiliang jong ka jingkieng ka la shimpor haduh 2 kynta.“Kum u MLA ngan sa phah da ka jingthoh sha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bah Prestone Tynsong uba peit ïa ka tnat PWD (Roads) bad ïa u Myntri ka tnat Bording Abu Taher Mondal kum ka jingai jingmut sha ka Sorkar,” la ong u Bah Adelbert.“Nga ai burom ïa u MLA barim jong ka Umroi Constituency bad ïa u President ka VPP Bah Ardent Basaïawmoit kiba la rah ïa ka mat hapoh ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla halor ka jingbym shngaiñ shuh jong ka jingkieng Umïam kaba la dei ban maramot naduh mynno,” u la ong.“Kaba sngewsih ka long ba ka Sorkar kam dei ban ap nalor ba ka jingim jong ka Umïam ka la kut. Mynta ka dang dei tang ka jingjulor kaba rit bad lada ka bthei mano ban kitkhlieh,” u la bynrap.“Ka jingwan jurip jong nga ha kane ka jaka bad kum u Politician ngam lah ban ong ba baroh ka lah ban long hynrei ka Sorkar ka don la ki jong ki Expert bad kan leh la ka jong ka kamram,” la kyntu Bah Adelbert.Kane ka jingdheng kali ha Umïam ka la jia naduh ka 13 tarik Nohprah, 2023 hadien ba ka ITC Cementation India Ltd. ka la maramot ïa ka jingkieng Umïam bad buh thong ban pyndep ïa ka jingmaramot hapoh saw bnai eiei.  La sakhi ba ki bor Pulit ki la bunkam ban pynbeit ïa ki kali ba leit ba wan.  Hynrei wat hapdeng ka jingmana ban ym ïa knieh ïaid ynda poi ha ka jingkieng Umïam, hynrei kiba bun na ki nongñiah kali kim shym la kheiñ snep ïa ka jingkyrpad jong ka tnat Pulit bad ka jingïaknieh ïaid jong ki kali ka la wanrah ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba jur.“Ka jingdheng kali ar kynta naduh Mawiongrim shaduh Umïam ka la ktah bha haduh katta katta ïa ki paidbah khamtam ïa kito kiba ïabeh ban leit sha Railway Station bad sha Airport Guwahati bad sha kiwei kiwei ki kam,” la ong u Bah Adelbert.U la ïathuh ba ka jingleit jurip ïa ka jingkieng nar barim ka long ban peit thuh shwa la ka dang i long neem ban pynïaid tang ïa ki kali rit khnang ban weng khyndiat ïa ka jingdheng kali ha surok Mawiongrim shaduh Umïam.“Nga ai khublei ïa ki Pulit Traffic kiba la trei shitom bad ban pynïaid beit ïa ki kali bad buh ruh ïa ka Mobile Patrolling namarba hynne da la ki jong ki khmat nga la ïohi bun bah ki kali kiba ïa knieh ïaid (Overtake). Ngi donkam ban long kiba don ka jingkitkhlieh bad to ngin long kiba ïaishah bad ka tnat Pulit kaba peit ban pynïaid beit ïa ki kali,” la bynrap u Bah Adelbert.“Nga ngeit ba ka MePGCL kan phah ïa ki Expert ba kin phah ïa ki briew ban sorbe ba ka lah neem ban long tang ban pynïaid ïa ki kali rit (na kane ka jingkieng nar barim), u la ong.
title: JUR KA DHENG KALI HA UMÏAM, AI JINGMUT U MLA VPP BAN PYNÏAID KALI NA JINGKIENG NAR BARIM

content: KYRSOIBOR PYRTUHKa jingïaumsnam ha Manipur, ha kaba da ki phew spah ngut ki nongshong shnong ki la kylla phetwir, kan ïai pynkynmaw ïa ngi ba katno ki nongshong shnong ka Manipur ki mad ïa ka jingkthang mynsiem ban shah kyndang bad shah beh na la ki jong ki ïing. Kumta, ka long kaba kongsan ïa ki bor sorkar bad ki seng ne kynhun ban ïatreilang ban kyrshan ïa kiba la shah pynphetwir khnang ba kin lah ban wan phai biang sha la shnong bad ïoh biang ban shong ha la ka jong ka ïing. Ha kajuh ka por ban pynbiang bad pynïoh ha ki ïa ka bam, ka jaka shong, ka pule dangle bad ka koit ka khiah. Ha kane ka snem thymmai ngi dei ban trei shitom lang ban kyrshan ïa kine ki nongshong shnong, ki longïing kiba la hap ban phetwir bad ban ai pat ha ki ïa ka jingim kaba don burom bad kaba shngaiñ.Ma ngi pat ki khun ki ksiew u Hynñiewtrep ngin ïai pynthymmai da kaba kut jingmut biang ban bud, ban im katkum ki jinghikai jong ki longshuwa kiba ngi la ïoh pdiang pateng la pateng. Ki jinghikai shaphang ka jinglong mar ryngkat, ka jingïakyrshan lang ïa ki para kher para mer bad ki para kur, para kha. Kine ki jinghikai tynrai ki la shah kjap mynta ha kane ka juk ïabeh ïa ka rongphong bad ka juk rhah spah bad ka khwan myntoi shimet. Ka long kaba kongsan ban pynkhie im pat ïa kine ki jinghikai shong tynrai ban tei pat ïa ka imlang sahlang bad ka jaidbynriew.Ngin ri sumar kyndong ïa kine ki jinghikai shong tynrai, ban tip briew, tip blei bad ban kamai ïa ka hok. Ki dei ki jinghikai shong sbai kiba hikai ïa ngi ba ngin ïatiplem, ban sngewthuh bad pyrkhat lem ïa kiwei. Kine ki jinghikai ki kdew sha ka jinglong khuid bad ka jinglong hok ha ka synshar khadar, treikam treijam, ka khaïi-pateng bad ka jingim.Kum ki khun Hynñiewtrep ngi dei ban sngew sarong ba ngi don ïa kine ki jinghikai shong tynrai bad ki jingstad jong ka hyndai kiba btin lynti ïa ngi ha ka jingim kaba man la ka sngi bad ha ki kam ki jam naduh ka por kulong kumah bad kine ki dang long hi ki jingshisha haduh mynta. Da kaba pynkhie im pat ïa ka mynsiem ïatiplem bad sngewthuh ïa ki jingsngew jong kiwei, bad kumjuh ruh ban im ka jingim kaba tip briew tip blei, yn lah ban tei pat bad pynlong ïa ka Ri kaba roi bad kaba shngaiñ.Snem Thymmai ba dap kyrhai.
title: KA PUSON SNEM THYMMAI 2024

content: U National Vice President jong ka BJP uba peit ruh ia ka jylla Meghalaya u Dr M Chuba Ao ha ka sngi Palei u la ong ba ka party ka la buh thong ban jop 400 seat ha ka Elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long shen.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang pyrkhat kam na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon ha Meghalaya, u Dr. Ao u la ong, “ka thong jong ngi ka long ban jop 400 seat ha kane ka kynti.  Namarkata, ngi hap ban leit sha manla ki jaka ba ngim shym la ioh eiei mynshwa bad ngin trei shitom ban poi lut sha ki kyndong kynshrot.”“Ngi ngeit ba ngin kynjoh sha ka thong bad kata ka dei ka mishon jong ngi mynta ka sngi,” ula ong.U Dr. Ao u la ong ba ki don ruh katto katne ki Seat kiba tlot bad ki don ruh katto katne ki Seat kiba long beit tang hapoh ka thaiñ hynrei ka party kan pyrshang ban treikam janai ban poi sha kine ki Seat.“Ha ki ar tylli ki elekshon ba ladep, ngi la iohi ba kam shym la seisoh satia hynrei mynta ka kynt, ngi leit ha kata ka rukom kaba ngin pynsngewthuh sha ki paidbah,” u la bynrap.Une u nongialam ka BJP u la ong ba ka party kan iakhun beit marwei ia ka Elekshon Lok Sabha khlem ka jingiatreilang bad kano kano ka party.“Ngin ym iatreilang bad kano kano ka party. Haba ngi la pynkhlain bha ialade, balei ngin ailad ia kiwei pat. Namarkata, ngi la rai ban iakhun beit marwei.  Kan ym don kano kano ka jingiasam ha ka jingiakhun,” u la bynrap.Haba kylli, u Dr. Ao u la ong ba ka BJP ka khlain bha na Shillong bad Tura Parliament Seats ha Meghalaya.“Ha ka jingshisha baroh ar tylli ki Seat ki dei kiba khlain.  Ngi hap ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh ba ngim lah ban poi lut sha ki kyndong kynshrot,” u la ong.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynieng kyrtong, u Dr. Ao u la ong ba ka party kan trei shwa bad hadien kata, kan sa shong ban iapyrkhat bad ka kynhun jong ka Jylla bad ban iasyllok bad ki nongialam bahalor jong ka party bad ban pyrkhat lang bad u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri lem bad u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ban shim rai iano ban ai tiket.U ong ba bun ki briew ki la wan pynsngew ha ka party na ka bynta ka tiket.Haba kylli, hato ka party kan pynieng neem da u Bah AL Hek uba long u MLA ka Pynthorumkhrah na Shillong constituency,  u Dr. Ao u ong, “nga la iohi ha ki lad pathai khubor hynrei ngam pat iakren eiei ruh em bad u.”U la ong ruh ba ka party ka don ia ka bhah kyrpang na ka bynta ki kynthei ban pyniakhun ha ka elekshon.
title: BUH THONG KA BJP BAN JOP 400 SEAT HA KA ELEKSHON LOK SABHA HA BAROH KAWEI KA RI INDIA

content: Ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ha ka sngi Palei ka la kyrpad ia ka seng kieng atiar Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ban pynkylla noh ia ka rai ba ka la shim ban weng noh na ka jingiakren iasuk bad ka Sorkar Pdeng lem bad ka Sorkar Jylla khnang ban pynneh pynsah ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u National Vice President ka BJP u Dr Chuba Ao uba peit ruh ia ka jylla Meghalaya u la ong, “ngi kyrpad ia ki seng kieng atiar ban wan shakhmat bad ban iakren iasuk khnang ban pynneh pynsah ia ka shongsuk shongsain.”U President jong ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit u Rikman G Momin u la ong, “ngi donkam ia ka jingsuk bad ngi kyrpad ia ka HNLC ba kan wan shakhmat ban bteng ia ka jingiakren iasuk bad ka Sorkar jylla ne bad ka Sorkar Pdeng.”U la kyntait ruh ban kynthoh eiei la ka long neem kaba dei ba ka sorkar kan mab noh ia ki kam bymman jong ki nongialam bad ki dkhot jong ka HNLC.Ha sngi Palei ka HNLC ka la phah ia ka shithi sha ka Ministry of Home Affairs ka Sorkar India lyngba u Advisor (MHA North East) u AK Mishra ban pyntip ba ka seng ka la weng noh na ka jingiakren iasuk halor ki san tylli ki daw kiba ka ladep ban phah sha ka Sorkar bad kawei na kita ka long ban bam noh ia baroh ki jingujor pyrshah ia ki nongialam bad ia ki dkhot ka seng.U Chief Spokesperson jong ka BJP u Bah M Kharkrang uba dei ruh u Ophisar Pulit ba la shongthait u la ong ba ka Party ka kyndit katlah katiai ia ka jingshim rai kyndit jong ka HNLC ban weng noh ialade na ka jingiakren iasuk bad ka SorkarU la ong ba kam lah ban long ia ka Sorkar ban weng lut ia baroh ki mukotduma pyrshah ia ki nongialam bad ia ki dkhot jong kane ka seng kieng atiar.“Lada phi la iohi ia ka jingpynmih khubor……ka thong jong ka HNLC ka long ban weng lut ia baroh ki mukotduma pyrshah ia ki nongialam bad ia ki dkhot jong ka seng.  Nga sngew ba ki dei ban iai ap namarba kam long kaba suk ia ka Sorkar ban shu weng lut ia baroh ki mukotduma khamtam lada dei leilei ki mukotduma kiba ladep pynngat kyndon bad kiba la tian bishar ha ka kashari hadien ba ladep pynngat kyndon, baroh ka shong hi ha ka Kashari. Ban ong ba ka Sorkar kan weng lut ia ki mukotduma kam lah ban long,” u la ong.“Ha kajuh ka por, ngi hap ban pyrkhat ruh ia ki lanot, ki lah ban dei ki bahaing hasem ne kiba dang don ka jingiadei, mynta lada ka Sorkar kan shu pynhun tang ia kawei ka liang, kaei ka jingbishar kaba hok kaba phin ai sha ki lanot jong ki kam bymman,” ula bynrap.U Bah Kharkhrang u la ong ba ka HNLC ka la shim rai kyrkieh ban weng noh na ka jingiakren. “Ki la dei ban ailad ba ka jingiakren kan dang bteng,” u la bynrap.Haba kylli, u Bah Kharkrang u la ong, “ngi kyrpad ia ka HNLC ba kan dang bteng ia ka jingiakren bad ka dei ka jingiapeiñ kaba phim lah ban shu dawa bad ban khmihlynti ba yn pynurlong ruh da ka Sorkar ia baroh ki jingdawa. Phi hap ban peit na baroh ki liang, bad kam mut ba tang namarba kawei ka kam kam shym la urlong kam mut ba phin shu weng noh ia ka jingiakren iasuk.”Halor ka jingkam jong ka HNLC ba ki nongialam bahakhmat ki lah ban shah kem lada ki wan mih sha ka jingiakren, u Bah Kharkrang u la ong, ba ka Seng ka dei ban shaniah bad ngeit ha ka Sorkar namarba ba la ai ia ka jingiada.“Lada ka Sorkar ka la mynjur ban ai jingiada, kam lah ban shukor ia ki bad ki dei ban ngeit ia ka sorkar,” u la ong.Halor ka jingshah byrngem ba dang shen jong u MLA ka Sohra u Bah Gavin M. Mylliem ha ka HNLC halor ka jingkhang khyrdep ia ka MCCL u Bah Kharkrang u la ong, ‘ha nga shimet, nga sngew ba kam long kaba dei. Phim lah ban pynkoit ia ka jingpang jong kompeni kaba la neh da ki 30-40 snem, bad mynta phin shu teipot ha u MLA. Kata ka bym lah satia ban pdiang.
title: KYRPAD KA BJP ÏA KA HNLC BAN PYNKYLLA NOH ÏA KA RAI BA LA WENG NA KA JINGÏAKREN ÏASUK

content: Ka shnong Kongthong ha ka sngi Palei ka la rakhe ia ka Hamara Sankalp Viksit Bharat ha kaba u Deputy Secretary jong ka Ministry of Women and Child Development ka Sorkar India u Bhaskar u la long u Kongsan ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong ka Additional Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong DD Syngai bad u BDO jong ka Khatarshnong-Laitkroh C&RD Block u Bah PS Tyngsong.La pdiang sngewbha ia kine ki kynrem ki lyndan da ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Kongthong hapoh ka jingialam jong u Sordar Bah Teibor Lynrah lem bad u Bah Rothel Khongsit nakhmat ka AMRIT Mahotsav Gate terter ryngkat ka kynhoi ka phawar bad ka jingtem ia ka ksing bad ka jingput ia tangmuri.Ki ophisar kiba la sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi, ki la ai ruh ia ka jingpynshai shaphang ki shkim bapher bapher kynthup ia ka tnat Pule Puthi, ka rep ka riang, ka ri jingri, ka koit ka khiah, ka umbam umdih, ka Social Welfare, ka NRLM, ka tnat Labour bad kiwei.Da ki spah ngut ki nongshong shnong ki la iashim bynta lang ban sngap ia ki jingpynshai na ki ophisar jong kine ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar.Shwa ban pynkut ia ka jingialang la pynlong pat sa ia ka jingpyni kolshor da ki nongshong shnong ryngkat ka drama na ki dkhot jong ka Village Organization jong ki SHG.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ia ka shnong Kongthong la shimti da u MP ka Rajya Sabha u Prof. Rakesh Sinha hapoh ka Sansad Adarsh Gram Yojna (SAGY-II).
title: RAKHE KA SHNONG KONGTHONG ÏA KA HAMARA SANKALP VIKSIT BHARAT

content: U Myntri ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei jong ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la plie paidbah ïa ka dur ba la dro pynitynnat bha da ki kti jong u samla Pascal Mario Kmenlang Pathaw, uba long uwei na ki nongdro dur ba pawnam bha ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha kane ka jingdro ba lah ban ïohi shynna bha ha ka kynroh jong ka ophis treikam jong ka ophis Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills, la batai ïa ka jingmut jong ka jingdro ba la ai jingkyrshan da ka Asian Paints, ka Start Indian Foundation bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya.Kane ka jingdro ka phalang sha ka jingriewspah jong ka jylla Meghalaya ha ki kam jngohkai pyrthei bad ki jingteinam u menbarim, kiba kynthup ïa ka jingkieng jri, kaba kdew ïa ka jingïadei hapdeng u briew bad ka meiram-ew, ka jingkhuid jingsuba jong ka shnong Mawlynnong bad ka shnong Nohwet bad ka jingdro ka pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingithiang jong ki kshaid, ki syntiew ki skud, ki sim ki doh, ki mrad ki mreng, ki mawbynna ka jingriewspah ha ka kolshor jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi, Jaiñtia bad Garo kiba long ki lai tylli ki jaidbynriew kiba shong basah ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.U Bah Paul haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la ong, kane ka
