jingdro ka pynpaw shynnah ïa ka jingmut “Root and Rhythm,”  kaba batai ka jingriewspah ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka kolshor.  Kane ka jingdro kam long tang ka jingpynitynnat ïa ka ophis Deputy Commissioner hynrei ka pynpaw ïa ka jingïalong kawei hapdeng ka lariti bad ka jingbatai ïa ka jingim ba mynta.“Kaei kaba ngi la leh mynta ka long ka jingpynshlur ïa ki nongjngohkai pyrthei ym tang ba kin ïohi ïa ka jingithiang jong ki lum ki wah hynrei ban nang kyntiew shuh shuh ïa ka kam jngohkai pyrthei,” u la ong.U la ong ruh ba ka Jylla Meghalaya ka don byllai ban tyrwa sha ka pyrthei, lada phi pyrkhat shaphang ki kshaid kiba don ïa ki khanatang, ki lum, wat ka suiñ bneng bad manla ka dur jong ka mariang ka don ïa ka pakit ki mynnor kaba riewspah.  U la ong shuh shuh ba ha u snem 2023 ka jylla Meghalaya ka la pdiang ym duna 15 lak ngut ki nongjngohkai pyrthei kiba na kylleng ka pyrthei, kaba pynpaw ïa ka jingjop jong ka jylla jong ngi.Katba ka jylla Meghalaya ka dang tyllun ban pynpaw ïa ka jingriewspah ha ka lariti, kum kine ki jingsdang ki long kiba donkam ban pynneh bad ban kyntiew ïa ki jingithiang ba la don naduh hyndai ha kane ka jylla.Ha ka jingplie paidbah ïa kane ka jingdro,la sakhi lang da ka Deputy Commissioner ka Kong Rosetta Mary Kurbah, lem bad ki ophisar.
title: PYNÏAPBIEJ KA JINGDRO U SAMLA MARIO PATHAW HA KYNROH KA DC OPHIS, EKH

content: Ka tnat Pulit ka la sdang ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit ban lapdien ïa ki briew kiba donkti ban tah ïa ki Notis beh mynder ha kiba bun ki dukan ha Sohra bad ha Shella.Ha kine ki notis, la bthah ïa ki trai ri trai muluk ba kin beh noh ïa ki nongtrei mynder na kine ki ar tylli ki shnong, hynrei lym kumta kin hap pynkhreh ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh lada mih kano kano ka jingjia.Ar sngi mynshwa, la lap ba ïa kine ki notis la tah shabar jong ki dukan ha Sohra. Ha ka sngi Thohdieng, ïa kine kijuh ki notis la tah sa ha ka shnong Ichamati bad ha ka thaiñ Shella.Ïa kine ki notis la thoh ha ka ktien Khasi ym shym la don basoi bad ym shym la pynpaw kyrteng satia la ki dei na kano kano ka kynhun.U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills Bah Sylvester Nongtnger ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba ka jingtohkit ka la sdang ban wad ïa ki briew kiba donkti halor ka jingtah ïa kine ki notis.“Ngi la bthah ïa u SDPO bad ïa u OC ba kin wad ïa ki briew kiba donkti ban tah ïa kine ki notis. Namarkata, ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia ka la ïaid shakhmat,” u la ong.
title: TOHKIT KI PULIT BAN LAP ÏA KIBA TAH NOTIS BEH MYNDER HA KI DUKAN SOHRA BAD SHELLA

content: : U Nongaitkien jong ka Sorkar MDA Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba long ruh u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la kyrpad ïa ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ban ym weng noh na ka jingïakren ïasuk.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Paul u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka la ïohi ïa u kyrwoh jong ka HNLC kaba pynpaw halor ka rai ban weng noh na ka jingïakren ïasuk tang ha ki lad pathai khubor katba ka Sorkar kam pat ïoh ktien eiei halor kane ka jingshim rai jong ka HNLC.“Kaba nyngkong, nga kwah ban kyrpad ïa ka HNLC ban ym weng noh na ka jingïakren ïasuk namarba kiba bun ki bynta kiba ladep sdang ha ka jingïakren bad ngi kyrmen ba ka jingïakren kan dang bteng bad ngi kwah ban ïohi biang ïa ka jingleit phai sha ka miej jingïakren,” u la ong.Haba kylli, u Bah Paul u la ong ba um lah ban kynthoh eiei halor kane namarba u Myntri Rangbah Conrad Kongkal Sangma bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba peit ïa ka tnat Kam Pohing Bah Prestone Tynsong ki don shabar jong ka nongbah Shillong.“Hynrei watla katta, ka Sorkar kan sa shimkhia halor kane bad kyrmen ba ka kam kan long noh kham kloi tang shu wan phai u Myntri Rangbah,” u la bynrap.U la kular shuh shuh ba ïa kane ka kam yn sa buh hakhmat eh tang shu wan phai u Conrad bad u Bah Prestone sha ka jylla.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdawa jong ka HNLC ban ai ka jingmab ei, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong, “ haoid, ka lah ban long, watla katta ka shong pat ha ki jait kam namarba ïa ki mukotduma ladep ban rejistar, bad dei ban pyrkhat eiei halor kane.”Halor ka case ba la rejistar da ka NIA pyrshah ïa ka Seng, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong, “kito ki dei ki kam kiba bniah hynrei ban shu kren kyllum haba phi la don ha ka jingïakren kam dei ban don kano kano ka kyndon bad ka jingmyntoi kaba long tang shiliang bad namarkata ka dei ban long kaba ïasngewthuh jingmut lang.”“Lada shim katkum ka nongrim jong ka jingïasngewthuh ngin sa lah ban khmih bniah ïa ki bynta kiba kyllaiñ bad lada shu kren kyllum ka dei ban long kaba ai bad kaba shim,” u la ong.
title: KA SORKAR KAM PAT ÏOH KTIEN EIEI BA KA HNLC KA LA WENG NA KA MIEJ JINGÏAKREN: PAUL LYNGDOH

content: U Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba long ruh u Nongaiktien jong ka Sorkar MDA u la ong ba ka aiñ ka dei ban ieng rasong.Ïa kane u la pynpaw haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli halor ka jingpynlong ïa ka jingïakhih kaba 48 kynta da ka All Meghalaya Tourist Taxi Association pyrshah ïa ka aiñ thymmai bym pat pyntreikam kaba la tip kum ka Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS) kaba la shna khnang da ka Sorkar India ban pynjur ïa ka jingpynshitom ïa ki nongñiah kali kiba tynrah ïa ki briew ha surok bad kiba phet krad.“Kane ka dei ka kam kaba khia ym tang na ka bynta ka Jylla Meghalaya hynrei na ka bynta ka ri India baroh kawei namarba ngi la ïohi ïa ka jingkiew ki jingjia aksiden na ka daw ka jingñiah kali khlemakor bad ha kiba bun ki khep ki nongñiah kali ki shim sting namar ka jingsynjor ka aiñ jong ka ri.  Namarkata, ka aiñ ka dei ban ieng rasong,” ong u Bah Paul ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Haba kylli, u Myntri u la ong, “katba ki dang ïakren kumne, ka jingïakhih ruh ka la jia ha baroh kawei ka ri bad ka leit ka wan jong ki kali kiba kit ïa ki nongleit jingleit ka la ktah bha ha baroh kawei ka ri India bad kane ka kam shym la jia tang ha ka jylla Meghalaya kaba don kham sha kyndong.”Ha ka sngi Thohdieng, ki nongñiah kali kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka All Meghalaya Tourist Taxi Association ki  la sangeh ban kit ïa ki nongleit jingleit bad ki la bat lut ïa ki nongñiah kali ha baroh kawei ka sor bad khap sor kum ka jingïashim bynta lang bad ki nongñiah kali ha baroh kawei ka ri ban pyrshah ïa ka aiñ BNS.Kane ka kynhun ka la rai ban pynkut noh ïa kane ka jingïakhih lashai ka sngi Saitjaiñ.
title: KYRSHAN KA SORKAR JYLLA ÏA KA AIÑ BHARATIYA NYAYA SANHITA

content: Ki bor synshar jong ka East Khasi Hills ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la pynmih da ka hukum kaba la mana tyngeh ban tih be-aiñ ïa ki marpohkhyndew bad ban tih maw ha ki jaka lum bad ban tih shyiap narud wah da kino kino ki briew, ki kompeni ne kino kino ki bor khlem da ïoh shwa ïa ka Mining License/Quarry Permit bad kiwei kiwei ki Clearance Certificate na ki bor ba dei peit.“Da kaba pyntreikam ïa ka iktiar ba la kupbor ha nga hapoh ka Section 144 CrPC bad na ka bynta ban ïada ïa ki sawdong sawkun jong ka mariang, la khang ban tih be-aiñ ïa ki marpohkhyndew bad ban tih maw ha ki jaka lum bad ban khat shyiap na wah da kino kino ki briew, ki kompeni ne kino kino ki bor khlem da ïoh shwa ïa ka Mining License/Quarry Permit bad kiwei kiwei ki Clearance Certificate na ki bor ba dei peit,” la ong ka District Magistrate Kong RM Kurbah ha ka hukum.Kane ka long hadien ba ki bor synshar district ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ka jingujor ba ka don ka jingtih be-aiñ ïa ki marpohkhyndew bad ka jingtih maw khamtam ha ki jaka lum bad ka jingkhat ïa u shyiap na wah ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka East Khasi Hills District, khamtam ha ka shnong Sohiong, Mawblei bad ha Umphyrnai kaba la ktah haduh katta katta ïa ki tyllong um ha ki sawdong sawkun bad ki jaka ba marjan.La pynpaw ruh ba ka hukum ka dei kaba la ïoh pdiang na ka National Green Tribunal, Principal Bench, New Delhi, kaba khang ïa kino kino ki briew, ki kompeni ne kino kino ki bor khlem da ïoh shwa ïa ka Mining License/Quarry Permit bad kiwei kiwei ki Clearance Certificate ba la ai da ka Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change, ka Sorkar India ha ka EIA Notification 2006 bad ha ka jingpynbeit thymmai.Kum kine ki jingtih maw bad tih shyiap ka lam sha ka jingtwa jong ki maw, u shyiap bad kiwei kiwei ki marpohkhyndew  sha ki wah bad ka jingtwa na ki jaka lum kaba lam sha ka jingpynjulor ïa ki jingthung jingtep kiba don ha ranab lum, ka pynjulor ïa ki tyllong um bad ka pynïap ruh ïa ki dohum doh wah.Bun na ki wah ki la jngut bad jaboh tang na ka daw ka jingtih maw bad khlong shyiap bad ka um kam long shuh ban pyndonkam bad kam long shuh ban dih ban sum ban sait.“Ka long kaba donkam ban pyntikna ba kan don ka jingbud ryntih ïa ka hukum ba la pynmih da ka NGT hapoh ka East Khasi Hills District bad ban khanglad ïa ka jingma jong ka jingim briew, ka koit ka khiah bad ka jingshngaiñ bad ban ïada ïa ka mei mariang,” la ong ka hukum.
title: PYNJARI SECTION 144 CrPC KA DC BAN TEHLAKAM ÏA KA JINGTIH SHYIAP BAD TIH MAW BE-AIÑ

content: Ka tnat Transports jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynim biang ïa ka post Assistant General Manager (AGM) hapoh ka ophis Meghalaya Transport Corporation (MTC) ïa kaba ladep ban pynduh naduh ki snem 2016 eiei.Ïa kane la pyntip da u Bah Disparsing Rani uba long u nongwad RTI, haba pyntip sha ki lad pathai khubor ïa ka jubab RTI ba la ïoh pdiang na ka tnat Transports.U Bah Rani u la ong, “katkum ka Advertisement ba la pynmih ha kawei na ki lad pathai khubor la pynkha thymmai ïa ka post Assistant General Manager ïa kaba ladep pynduh naduh ki snem 2016 eiei. Kane ka don eiei sha lyndet namarba mynshwa ha ki snem baladep na ka kyrdan jong u Depot Manager la lah ban pynkiew sha ka kyrdan Deputy General  Manager (DGM) hynrei ka jingpynmih Advertisement na ka bynta ki ar tylli ki post, kata, ïa ka post Assistant General Manager bad Assistant General Manager (Administative) ka la wanrah jingeh ïa ki nongtrei Regular kiba la dei ban kiew kyrdan.”“Ka jingwanrah ïa kine ki ar tylli ki post imat ka don eiei ha lyndet tang na ka daw ba ki nongtrei Contractual Basis kiba dang ar snem kin dei ki Stampman jongno re jongno,” la kynnoh u Bah Rani.U la ïathuh ba katkum ka jubab RTI, na ki 107 tylli ki bos ki don mynta sa tang 40 tylli, ka jingdie lilam ïa ki bos naduh snem 2019 ka long haduh 9 tylli ki kali bad ka jingmih kaba die ïa kine ki bos lilam ka long T. 9 lak.“Kine ki dei kiba wanrah ïa ka jingduhnong ïa ka ophis MTC,” ula ong.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba katkum ka jubab RTI, ka pynpaw ba ka jingmih pisa na ki School Bos ba la pynïaid da ka MTC tang na ka bynta shi bnai ka long T.5,17,750 lak.Ka jingpynlut pisa na ka bynta ban siew sha ki nongtrei ba la shongthait ka long T.6,8, 75, 549 klur.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jubab RTI ba la ïoh pdiang na ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei ka Sorkar Jylla halor  ka jingpynlong ïa  ka Cherry Blossom Festival, u Bah Disparsing Rani u la pyntip ba ka tnat ka la ai jubab ba kam don jingïohnong eiei ha kaba pynlong ïa kane ka Festival namarba ka Sorkar ka shu ai jingïarap T. 1. 99 klur sha ki nongpynïaid jong ka Cherry Blossom Festival kaba la long dang shen ha madan Kurkalang ha Ribhoi District.
title: BUH JINGKYLLI U NONGWAD RTI BA PYNIM BIANG ÏA KA POST AGM HA OPHIS MTC

content: : Ki nongïalam jong ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Movement (HNYM) ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Acting Rangbah Shnong ka shnong Umtring u Bah Stemar Nongbri ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la kynnoh ba u Rangbah Shnong ba la pynkheiñ da ka Dorbar Shnong u Bah Teiborlang Thangkhiew u la phah mih noh napoh shnong ïa ki 32 tylli ki longïing jong ka shnong Umtring, ka shnong kaba don hajan ka shnong Umbir, Ribhoi District da kaba aipor haduh ka 30 tarik u Nohprah, 2023 hynrei lym kumta un kyndang da ka puhshilum ïa kine ki longing kiba sah ha kane ka shnong.U General Secretary ka HNYM u Bah Jophas Kurbah bad u Acting Rangbah Shnong ka shnong Umtring u Bah Stemar Nongbri ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ki la kynnoh ruh ba u Bah Teiborlang Thangkiew u la kam nongkynti ïa ka shnong Umtring baroh kawei bad ha kajuh ka por ki la kynnoh ruh ba u la pyndonkam bakla ïa ki skhim kiba ka sorkar ka la ai sha ki paidbah kiba shong basah ha kane ka shnong.Kane ka shnong ka dei kaba dang hap hapoh ka Raid Mawbuh jong ka Hima Mylliem, la ïathuh u Bah Jophas.U la ïathuh ba ha u snem 1980 hadien ba la ithuh kum ka shnong bapura ïa ka shnong Umtring, khyndai ngut ki Rangbah Shnong kim ju pyndik satia bad ki la kynnoh ruh dei tad ynda la jied Rangbah Shnong ïa u Bah Teiborlang Thangkhiew ba ki la sdang ban mih ki kynrum kynram wat ban kam ruh ba ka Sanad kaba la ai da u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem ka dei ka Sanad shimet.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Bah Jophas, la jied Rangbah Shnong ïa u Bah Teiborlang Thangkiew ha u snem 2014 bad u dei ruh u Rangbah Shnong uba shiphew jong ka shnong.“Ngi la jied Rangbah Shnong ïa u (Bah Teiborlang Thangkhiew) namarba u dei u nonghikai jong ka skul shnong bad uba la nang la stad namarba ki nongshong shnong ki dei kiba duna ka pule ka puthi,” u la ong.“Bun bun snem um shym la khot ïa ka Dorbar. U la sdang ban mushlia ïa ki kam shnong kam thaw, ïa ki skhim sorkar bad  ïa ka hok jong ki nongshong shnong,” la kynnoh u Bah Jophas bad bynrap, “ngi la jied thymmai ïa u Bah Stemar Nongbri kum u Rangbah Shnong ba thymmai bad ngi la phah ruh ïa ka jingthoh sha ka Ophis jong u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem, hynrei mynta la shi snem kam shym la ai jubab eiei ruh em.”“Ynda ngi la pynkheiñ ïa u kum u Rangbah Shnong u beh pynban ïa ki nongshong shnong bad kane paw shai ba u kam nongkynti lut ïa ka ing ka sem, ïa ka kam shnong kam thaw bad ïa ka jaka ka puta,” la kynnoh u Bah Jophas.U la buh ruh ka jingkylli ïa ka Sorkar lada u Bah Teiborlang Thangkhiew u kam ba ka shnong Umtring ka dei ka jaka shimet kum ka Sorkar ka theh ïa ki skhim pynroi naduh ka MGNREGS, SSA, Swachh Bharat, PMAY, JJM bad kiwei kiwei ki skhim.U la ïathuh ba ki don ki longing kiba dei ban ïoh ïa ka skhim shna ing baduk na ka PMAY ba la bhah lang na ka skhim MGNERGS, hynrei ka pisa kam shym la poi satia sha ki longing kiba dei ban ïoh jingmyntoi.U President ka HNYM, Bah Louis Dohtdong u la ïathuh ba ka seng ka la lap ba u Bah Teiborlang u la buh da ka Signboard kaba don ïa ka jingthoh, “Private Land” ha ka shnong Umtring.“Lada kane (shnong Umtring) ka dei ka “Private Land’ kumno u nud ban shna skhim bad kumno ka sorkar ka lah ban ai skhim sha ka jaka jong ki riew shimet. Ha ka kyrteng jong ki skhim MGNREGS, SSA, Swachh Bharat, PMAY, JJM bad kiwei kiwei ki skhim u pyndonkam da ka kyrteng jong ka shnong, katba ha ki jingthoh jingtar u kam ba ka dei ka jaka shimet,” la kynthoh u Bah Louis.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka HNYM kan ïakhun ïa kane ka ishu bad ka shnong Umtring baroh kawei.U la ong ba ka Seng bad ka shnong Umtring kan sa pan jingpynshai na ka ophis Deputy Commissioner bad na ki bor Sorkar halor kane bad ong ruh ba ka Seng kan ym ailad ïa u Bah Teiborlang ban leh donbor ïa ki nongshong shnong shnong kumba u la byrngem ban kyndang ïa ki napoh ka shnong Umtring.
title: HAPOH 30 TARIK NOHPRAH, PHAH MIH U RANGBAH SHNONG ÏA KI 32 ING NA SHNONG UMTRING

content: Ka KSU Mawlai Nonglum Unit ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la noh synniang da ki duli Godrej buh tiar, lai phew tylli ki nep syaid bad saw tylli ki doormat sha kawei ka jaka ri ia ki khunlung kaba don ha ka shnong mawlai Nonglum kum shi bynta ka jingrakhe ia ka Christmas.Ha ka jingaiti ia kine ki tiar sha ka President jong ka Seng Kynthei  Mawlai Nonglum ka Kong Mitimai Basaiawmoit la lamkhmat da u President ka KSU Mawlai Circle u samla Biangbor Paliar bad u President jong ka KSU Nonglum Unit Samla Wanstep Dkhar, u General Secretary u samla Edie Malngiang lem bad u General secretary jong ka KSU Nonglum Unit u samla Franky Lamin bad kiwei pat ki dkhot jong ka seng.Ka Kong Mitimai Basaiamoit ka la iathuh ba kane ka Creche ba la seng da ka Seng Kynthei ka la kynjoh mynta la 34 snem bad ka la batai ruh ia ka jingthmu ba la buh ia kane ka jaka ri bad sumar ia ki khunlung kaba don 30 tylli ki jingthiah.Ka la ong ruh ba ka jingdon jong kane ka Creche ka long ban iarap ia kito ki longkmie kiba kit khunrei kiba shu im kamai jakpoh da kaba leit trei bylla bad ki don ruh katto katne ngut kiba dei ki nongtrei sorkar kiba phah ri bad sumar ia ki khun ki kti jong ki ha kane ka Creche.Ka la pyntip ruh ba ka dor ba ka Seng Kynthei ki shim ka long kaba rit bha haba ianujor bad kiwei kiwei pat ki Creche, namarba ka jingthmu jong ka Seng Kynthei ka long ban shim ia ka dork aba duna khnang ban kyrshan lem ia ki para longkmie kiba donkam ia ka jingiarap.Ka Kong Mitimai ka la ai khublei kyrpang ia ka KSU Nonglum unit bad bad ia ka KSU Mawlai circle kiba don ka mynsiem ban noh synñiang lem sha kane ka Creche kaba dang donkam ia ki lad jingiarap.U President jong ka KSU Mawlai Circle u samla Biangbor Paliar haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u la pyrto ia ki kam ba radbah kiba ka Seng Kynthei Mawlai Nonglum ka la leh bad iohi jngai naduh 34 snem mynshwa ban shim ia ka sienjam ban seng ia ka Creche da ka jingthmu kaba bha ban iarap ia ki paralongkmie kiba donkam ia ka jingiarap khamtam ha ki por ba ki leit sha ki jaka trei jaka ktah bad ki kam ka jong ki.U la ai ka jingiaroh ruh ia ki longkmie kiba trei bad kiba sumar ia ki khunlung ha kane ka Creche watla ki don la ka ing ka sem lajong hynrei ki la len ialade ban peit ban khmih bad sumar ia ki khunlung naduh ka khuid ka suba bad ka koit ka khiah jong ki khunlung.Kane ka jingshimkhia jong phi ka pyni shisha ba phi la long kum kita ki kmie ki baar jong baroh ki khunlung kiba wan ban pynsah ha ka Creche jong phi, la ong u President ka seng.Ha shwa ba yn sa kut noh ka program ka la don ka jingia ot cake lang hapdeng ki nongkitkam jong ka KSU bad Sengkynthei kum shi bynta ban ia rakhe ia ka advance christmas.
title: DA KI TIAR AI JINGÏARAP KA KSU ÏA KA JAKA RI KHUNLUNG HA MAWLAI NONGLUM

content: Ka United Democratic Party (UDP) shen kan sa shim ia ka rai ha kaba iadei bad ka jingai jingkyrshan jong u MDC ka Nongkrem Constituency u Bah Lambor Malngiang ia ka Executive Committee ba la ialam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC).Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u nongialam ka Parliamentary Party jong ka UDP u Bah Titostarwell Chyne u la iathuh ba ka Parliamentary Party ka dawa ia ki nongialam jong ka UDP ban pynshitom mardor ia u Bah Lambor Malngiang namar ka jingleh pyrshah ia ki kyndon treikam jong ka party.“Nga dang shu dep ban phah ia ka shithi sha ka Party. Lehse hadine ka Christmas, kin sa shong ban shim ia ka rai,” la ong u Bah Titos ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Haba kylli, u Bah Chyne u la ong ba um don jingtip eiei ruh em la kin dang don shuh shuh kiwei pat ki MDC jong ka UDP ki ban leit ai jingkyrshan ia ka EC ba mynta.“Ki don 8 ngut ki MDC jong ka UDP. Ngam pat iohsngew eiei (ba kin leit ai jingkyrshan ia ka EC ba la ialam da ka NPP).  Ha kajuh kapor, ngam pat iohsngew ba u MDC ka HSPDP u Bah Martle Mukhim, uba long ruh u Co-chairman jong ka RDA, un mih shakhmat ban leit ai jingkyrshan ia ka EC ba mynta,” u la ong da kaba bynrap ba wat u MDC Independent na Nongthymmai u Bah Latiplang Kharkongor u dang iai neh beit ha ka Liang Pyrshah.U la ong ba u MDC ka UDP u Bah Balajied Ranee u la pynpaw ba un ai jingkyrshan beit ia ka Lineage Amendment Bill namarba u dei uwei uba ju kren bha halor ka Shaw Bhoi. “U (Bah Ranee) kyrshan i aka Bill ym ia ka EC,” u la ong.“Watla katta, phi lah ban kylli na u Bah Balajied u don jingthmu neem ban leit pyniasoh bad kiwei pat ki party,” u la bynrap.
title: AP JUBAB KI MDC NA KA UDP BAN PYNSHITOM ÏA U BAH LAMBOR MALNGIANG

content: Naduh ba la seng ia ka Frank Motors ha kane ka nongbah Shillong haduh mynta, kane ka shlem die kali saw shaka bapawkhmat ka la lah ban aikam aijam kumba 100 ngut ki briew bad 80 percent ki dei ki samla Khasi trai jylla.Ia kane la pyntip da ka Chief Executive Manager jong ka Frank Motors ka Kong Evarika Lyngdoh ha ka jingplie paidbah ia ka Frank and Friendly Workshop Center kaba don ha ka shnong Laitkor Mawrie ha kaba la sakhi lang da u Customer Care Manager jong ka Tata Motors u Gumeet Singh uba la long kum u Kongsan ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u RCCM u Arup Sharma, u CCM u Mr Sayak, u Rangbah Dong jong ka dong Mawrie Pdeng u Bah Edmund Kharmalki, u Rangbah Dong u Bah Aibor J. Marbaniang bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.
title: 80 PERCENT KIBA TREI HA KA FRANK MOTORS KI DEI KI SAMLA KHASI

content: U nongialam jong ka Liang Pyrshah ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council u Bah Titostarwell Chyne u la iathuh ba ka Council ka la thaw da ka Special Committee ban iathir iatai sani halor ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District (Social Custom of Clan Administration) Bill.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Titos u la ong ba ka Council ka la mynjur ia ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District (Khasi Social Custom of Lineage (Amendment) Bill, 2023 hadien ba la shim rai ban pynsangeh shwa ban iatai halor ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District (Social Custom of Clan Administration) Bill.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ba ia ka Clan Bill la wanrah bad mynjur ha ka por ba u Bah HS Shylla u la long u Chief Executive Member ha u snem 2018 khnang ban pynkhlain ia ki Kur kiba don ha rilum Khasi hynrei ia kane ka Bill la pynphai biang da u Lat ka Jylla sha ka Council. Hadien ba ka executive committee bathymai ka la shimti ia u lakam synshar ha u snem 2019, la thaw ia ka special committee ba la khlieh da u Bah Bindo M. Lanong uba long u MDC Shusieh bad ka la shimpor haduh 3 snem ban iathir iatai bad ki nongialam jong ki Kur bapher bapher halor kane ka Clan Bill.“Ha ka jingshisha, ka Lineage (Amendment) Bill ka dei tang ka kopi ba la shim na ki Clauses jong ka Clan Bill. Hynrei, kawei na ki daw kaba ngi la mynjur ia ka Amendment Bill ka long ban pynrung ia ka Shaw Bhoi ha Ri Bhoi District. Bun na ki khynnah skul kim ioh ia ki Scheduled Tribe Certificate namarba ngim pat shym la ai ia ka synot ba ki dei ki Khasi,” u la ong.U la ai khublei ia u MDC jong ka Nongpoh Constituency u Bah Balajied Ranee uba la wanrah ia kane ka mat kaba iadei bad ka Shaw Bhoi namarba khatduh iawai la lah ban pynrung ha ka Amendment Bill ba la mynjur ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka Clan Bill ka kham bun ia ki bniat kiba nep ban ia ka Lineage Amendment Bill, u Bah Chyne u la ong, ba kane ka dei namarba tang ka jingthmu jong ka Clan Bill ladep pynrung ha ka Lineage Amendment Bill ka bym don satia ia ki bniat.“Hynrei ha ka Lineage Amendment Bill ka shu long tang ban ai jingithuh ia ki Seng Kur bad ban rejistar ia ki hynrei ngim iohi ba kan don ia ka bor ban pynkupbor ia ki Seng Kur,” ula bynrap.
title: THAW KA KHADC DA KA SPECIAL COMMITTEE BAN IATHIR HALOR KA CLAN BILL

content: Ka seng kieng atiar Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ha ka sngi Balang ka la pynbna ka la weng noh na ka miej jingïakren ïasuk bad ka Sorkar India bad ka Sorkar Jylla kum ka dak ban pyrshah ïa ka jingbym shimkhia jong ka Sorkar ban pynurlong ïa ka jingdawa ba kongsan tam kaba kynthup ïa ka jingmap ei.Ka HNLC lyngba u Chairman-cum-C-in-C u Bah Bobby Marweiñ bad u General Secretary-cum-Publicity Secretary u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw, ka la phah da ka shithi sha ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) lyngba u Advisor (MHA, Northeast) u A.K.Mishra ban pyntip ïa kane ka rai. Katkum kane ka shithi, ka HNLC ka la pynpaw ba ïa kane ka rai la shim halor ka nongrim ba ka Sorkar kam shym la pynurlong ïa ki mat jingdawa ba ka seng ka la buh hakhmat shwa ban sdang ka jingïakren ïasuk.Ka HNLC ka la phah kopi ruh ïa ka shithi sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohiing bad sha ki Ksiang ka Sorkar bad ki Nongmihkhmat jong ka HNLC sha ka miej ïakren ïasuk.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, u General Secretary cum Publicity Secretary ka HNLC Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw u la ong, “ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingpyntip ka long ba pynbna ia ka rai ba ka HNLC ka la weng noh na ka miej jingïakren. Ïa kane ka rai la shim kum ka jubab halor ka jingbym shimkhia jong ka Sorkar ban sngap ïa ki jingdawa ba kongsan eh jong ngi.”U Bah Nongtraw u la ong ba kine ki jingdawa ki dei kiba ladep ban phah sha ka Sorkar India da u General Secretary barim u (L) Bah Cheristerfied Thangkhiew ha ka 16 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2021.“Wat hapdeng ki jingtrei shitom ban ïai ban bad ban pynsngew ïa ki jingdawa jong ngi lyngba u nongrah ktien u Bah Sadon Blah, ka Sorkar ka la pyni ïa ka jingbym shimkhia ïa ki jingdawa jong ngi. Kumba ka paw, ïa ki jingdawa jong ngi ym shym la ïakren, lehse na ka jingbym kheiñ snep jong ka Sorkar,” u la ong.Ki san tylli ki jingdawa kiba ka HNLC ka la tyrwa hakhmat ka Sorkar ki long ban weng noh ïa ka jingkheiñ beaiñ ïa ka Seng.  Ïa ka HNLC la kheiñ kum ka seng be-aiñ hapoh ka sub-section (1) jong ka Section 3 jong ka Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act, 1967.U la bynrap, “ngi la tyrwa ban weng lut ïa baroh ki Case pyrshah ïa ki nongïalam bad ïa ki dkhot jong ngi ha ki Ingkashari kiba rit bad ha ki Ingkashari kiba heh ha baroh kawei ka jylla, khamtam eh ïa ki Case kiba ïadei hapoh rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia.  Ka jingweng noh ïa baroh ki mukotduma kan pynshngaiñ ïa ka jingïakren,” bad bynrap, “ka long kaba kongsan ban plie ïa ka lynti kaba shngaiñ na ka bynta ki nongïalam bahakhmat eh bad ki dkhot jong ka HNLC. Ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ngi kan wanrah ïa ka jingshaniah bad kan plie lad ruh ïa ngi ban ïashim bynta ha ka jingakren ïausk.”“Ngi la tywa ban thung ïa ki nongmihkhmat ba la pynkupbor kiba lah ban rah ktien bad ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka jingïakren. Ban pynbeit ïa ka rukom phah ktien lyngba ki nongmikhmat ba la pynkupbor kan ïarap ban pynstet ruh ïa ka jingïakren,” u la bynrap.U Bah Nongtraw u la ong ba ka HNLC ka la kyrpad ruh ban pyllait noh ïa baroh ki dkhot ka HNLC bad ïa ki riewshimet kiba la shah kem halor ka jingshah suba ba ki dei kiba donkti bad ka HNLC kiba dang don mynta ha along.“Ïa kane ka jingdawa, la phah lyngba u Ksiang jong ngi, u Bah Sadon Blah. Hynrei, kaba kham kongsan ban tip ka long ba tang ïa ka jingdawa jong ngi kaba 3 bad kaba 4 la mynjur da ka Sorkar napdeng ki san tylli ki jingdawa,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh shuh, u Bah Nongtraw u la ong ba ka seng ka la ïai pyntip la bunbun sien lyngba ki lad pathai khubor bad kumjuh ruh sha ki Ksiang bad sha ka Sorkar, da kaba kyntu ba kim dei ban phah ïa kano kano ka jingkhot hajir kaba lah ban nang ai ding shuh shuh bad bynrap, ‘sngewsih, ba ki jingkyrpad jong ngi kim shym la sngap, ka jinglong jingman ka la nang heh khlem nongrim.”Ha kajuh ka por, u General Secretary ka HNLC u la pyntip ba ha ka wat ïakren kaba nyngkong hapdeng ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar India, ki kynhun kiba la phah da ka Seng ki la wan phai sha la ktem ha ka 16 tarik, Nailur, 2022, ban pynlong ïa ka General Council bad CEC ban ïakren halor ka jubab ïa ki jingdawa da ka Sorkar India ba baroh ki nongïalam jong ka HNLC ki dei ban wan shakhmat ban ïashim bynta ha ka miej ïakren ïasuk. La shim ïa ka rai (ba la mynjur da ka GC/CEC) ba ka Sorkar kan ïakren tang bad ka kynhun ba la lamkhmat da u Vice Chairman tad haduh ba ki arliang mamla kin da poi sha ka jingïamynjur ban ïasoi ïa ka soskular sangeh ïasiat.“Ha ka jingïakren kaba bud, ka Sorkar, hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Vice Chairman, ka la mynjur ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang.  Hynrei, khlem poi pyrkhat, ha ka jingakren ba dang shu sdang, ma nga, kum u General Secretary, la pynbor da ka Sorkar ba nga hap ban mihkhmat ha ka jingïakren ka ban sa long,” u la ong.“Kaba pynsat shuh shuh ïa ka jingmong, ka jingleh arsap jong ka Sorkar ka la paw shynna haba ka National Investigation Agency (NIA) ïa ka khot hajir ïa nga, u Chairman bad ïa u Finance Secretary wat haba ka jingïakren ka la sdang ban ïaid shakhmat,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh u Bah Nongtraw u la ong, ha ka jingïakren ba nynkong, ki bor sorkar ki la phah sa kawei ka notis ban khot hajir ïa u, kaba long pyrshah ïa ka jingkular ba la ai da ka Sorkar India bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban kiar na kaba phah ïa ki shithi khot hajir ne ban kem ïa ki nongïalam bad ïa ki dkhot jong ngi katba ka jingïakren ka dang tyllun shakhmat.“Wat hapdeng ka jingma ba la shim da ki nongïalam jong ngi bad ki Personal Security Officers (PSO) ban ïashim bynta ha ka jingïakren, lada ka Sorkar ka kyntait ban ailad ïa ka jingsuk, kim lah ban shu pynkit pap ha ka HNLC ba ka shim da ka lynti jong ka jingïaumsnam.  Khnang ba ka jingïakren kan long kaba ïaid beit, ngi la pynsangeh lut ïa ki kam be-aiñ, ïa kaba ngi kyrmen ba ki paidbah ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep ki la ïohi lyngba ki lad pathai khubor.  Mynta, wat ym khmihlynti shuh ïa ka HNLC ba kan wanphai ban kyrpad ïa ka jingsuk kum u ksew uba kwah shyiengdoh,”u la bynrap.
title: WENG KA HNLC NA KA MIEJ ÏAKREN ÏASUK BAD KA SORKAR, RAI BAN BTENG KA JINGÏAKHUN

content: : Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Laban Circle ha ka sngi Balang ka la ujor sha u Chief Executive Officer (CEO) jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) halor ka jingkylla ktem dih drok bad ktem leh ka awria ka Shelter Home kaba don ha Kench’s Trace.Dang shen ki dkhot ka seng ryngkat bad ki Pulit ka Laban Police Station ki la hiar ban leit kyndang ïa kane ka Shelter Home ha Kench’s Trace hadien ba la saphriang kawei ka video ha ka rynsan jong ka Social Media halor ki jingdih drok jong ki kynthei bad shynrang ha kane ka jaka bad ha kajuh ka por ba kane ka jaka ka la kylla kum ka ktem dih drok bad ka ktem ki kam leh awria.Ha ka dorkhas, ka seng ka la pynpaw ba dei na ka liang jong ka Shillong Municipal Board ba kam shym la lah ban peit bniah bad jurip na ka por sha ka por ba kane ka jaka ka la kylla ka ktem ki nongbuaid, ki nongdih drok bad haduh ban kan da kylla ka jaka die met.Ka Seng ka la dawa ban dei ban buh noh ki nongap pahara (Security Gaurd) ha kane ka jaka ha ryngkat ki nongpeit nongkhmih (caretaker) ban lait na ka jingrung jingmih laitlan.  Ka Seng ka la maham ruh ba ym bit ban pynkylla ïa kane ka jaka kum ka ktem ban ïadih kyiad bad bad leh kam awria.Shuh shuh ka KSU ka la ban jur ruh ba ki don katto katne ki briew kiba sah ha ka Shelter Home kaba dei ka jaka na bynta ki briew ki bym don iing don sem bad ki bym kot bor ha ka kamai kajih, hynrei don pat ki briew kiba don la ka kali kamai, ka kam ka jam hynrei ki sah ha kine ki jaka namarba ki ïoh ei lut nadong shadong haduh ka bam ka dih.  Kane pat kan pynduh jaka ïa kito kiba donkam hok ïa kum kine ki Shelter Home. Ka Seng ka la dawa ba ïa kum kita ki briew dei ban pynmih mardor bad dei ban don ki kyndon kiba biang ba ïa kum kino ki jait briew ba lah ban pynrung ha kine ki Shelter Home bad ym dei ba kin lah ban sah shyrta hynrei dei ban buh da ka por ba ynda ki la biang ka kamai ba kin hap ban mih na katei ka jaka.Ha kajuh ka por seng ka la pynsngew ruh ba ka Dorbar Shnong K.O.R kam shym la ai jingmynjur ban buh ïa ka Shelter Home bad kane ka la mih ha ka por ba la wan shop ka jingpang khlam COVID-19 kum ka Temporary Shelter Centre hynrei mynta pat ka la kylla da kumwei.“Ka jingbymlah jong ki bor pynïaid ban tehlakam ïa ki briew ba wansah ha Shelter Home ha Kench’s Trace ka buh jingma ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka thain K.O.R bad Laban ruh kumjuh,” la ong ka Seng.
title: UJOR KA KSU SHA KA SMB BA KYLLA KTEM DIH DROK KA SHELTER HOME HA KENCH’S TRACE

content: Manish Sharma turned in a mind-blowing bowling performance whereby he took 8/14 in 15 overs as Meghalaya defeated Sikkim by a colossal 328 runs in their U-23 men’s Col CK Nayudu Trophy match in Rangpo, Sikkim, today.With a haul of 6/40 in the first innings, Manish thus claimed 14/54 in the match – some of the best-ever figures for a Meghalaya bowler in history.To recap, Meghalaya were bowled for 113 in their first innings and Sikkim were then restricted to 91 all out before Meghalaya posted 370/9 by the end of play yesterday in their second innings, giving them a lead of 392.The visitors, who had relied on captain Kevin Christopher’s century yesterday to get them to over 300, declared on their overnight score but Sikkim were nowhere near to reaching the target of 393 for victory as they were shot out for 64 in 40.5 overs.Just two Sikkim batters got 10 or more runs, with Manish running through the line-up with ease, taking a wicket on average every 11 balls bowled. The only two wickets he did not claim were bagged by Aryan Borah (1/18) and Abhishek Kumar (1/31).Meghalaya will now travel to Gujarat where they will take on Manipur in their next fixture from 14 January in Surat.
title: COL CK NAYUDU TROPHY: STELLAR MANISH BOWLS MEGHALAYA TO VICTORY

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) bad ka North Eastern Hill University Students Union (NEHUSU) ha ka sngi Balang ki la aipor 10 sngi ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan pyllait noh ïa ka baibam ne Scholarship jong ki samla pule na ka bynta u snem 2022-23.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka jingpynlong ïa ka jingïakhih hakhmat ka ophis treikam jong ka MBoSE ha nongbah Shillong, u General Secretary jong ka NEHUSU u samla Banpynbiang Riang u la ong ba ki bun ki samla pule hapoh ka jylla kiba shu shaniah beit ban siew ïa ka bai pule na ka Scholarship kaba ki ïoh shisien shi snem ban pyndep ïa ki jingpule jong ki.U Samla Riang u la ong ba ka jingpynslem jong ka Sorkar ban pyllait ïa ka Scholarship ka la pyndiaw mynsiem haduh katta katta ïa ki samla pule kiba wan na ki longing kiba duk bad kiba kham duna ka ïoh ka kot, khamtam eh ïa ki samla pule kiba wan na ki thaiñ nongkyndong.U la bynrap ba kane ka jingïakhih kaba malu mala ka long tang ban shu phah ïa u kyrwoh uba shai sha ka Sorkar Jylla ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingbym pyllait ka Sorkar ïa ka Scholarship jong ki samla pule.“Kiba dang shu aplai thymmai bad ki samla pule ba mynta kim pat ïoh ïa ka Scholarship na ka bynta u snem pule 2023  bad dei na kata ka daw ba ngi la aipor 10 sngi ïa ka Sorkar ba kan pyllait noh ïa ka Scholarship jong ngi hynrei lym kumta ngin mih paidbah sha surok,” la ong u Samla Riang.Haba ai jingkyrshan ïa ki samla pule, u President ka HYC u Bah Roykurpar Synrem u la ong, “dang shen u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u la kular sha ki samla pule ba kin sa ïoh ïa ka Scholarship hapoh ar ne lai taiew hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba la dap lai bnai, ki samla pule kim shym la ïoh ïa ka Scholarship.U Bah Synrem u la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba kan nang siew shwa na ka Contingency Fund ïa ka Scholarship sha ki samla pule.“Lada ka Sorkar ka la lah ban ai jingïarap T. 1 klur na ka Chief Minister Relief Funds sha ki lanot lynshop mariang ha ka jylla Sikkim, balei pat kam lah ban pyndonkam da ka pisa na ka Contingency Fund ban pyllait ïa ka Scholarship kaba dang sah pongding haduh mynta,” la buh jingkylli u Bah Synrem.U la ong, ba ka HYC kan dang ïai bteng ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka NEHUSU bad ïa baroh ki samla pule bad lada ka Sorkar kam leh eiei hapoh ka por ba la buh, ka Seng kan kyrshan met bad mynsiem ïa ka rai bad ïa ki jingïakhih ban pynlong da ka NEHUSU.
title: HAPOH 10 SNGI DAWA KA NEHUSU BAD HYC ÏA KA SORKAR BAN AI ÏA KA SCHOLARSHIP

content: Kum shi bynta ka Media Tour hapoh ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra ka kynhun jong ki Nongthoh khubor na Uttar Pradesh ka la wan jngoh ia ka jylla Meghalaya.Hynnin ka sngi ka kynhun ka la leit jngoh ia artylli ki jaka ha kaba la pynlong ia ka prokram jong ka Viksit Bharat ha East Khasi Hills District ba kynthup ia ka shnong Mawmihthied bad ka shnong Swer. Ki Nongthoh khubor ki la ioh lad ruh ban iakren bad ki ophisar jong ka Sorkar Jylla, ki Rangbah Shnong bad ki briew kiba ioh myntoi ia ki skhim sorkar ba iadei bad ka bha ka miat.Ki jing thmu ba kongsan jong kane ka media tour kilong ban plie lad ia ki nongthoh khubor ban iohi dalade ia ka jingiaid shaphrang ki skhim sorkar pdeng bapher bapher ba pyntreikam ha Meghalaya bad ban plie lad ia ka jingthoh khubor shaphang ki kam bapher bapher ba la pyntreikam da ki tnat sorkar pdeng bad ban iohi kumno ki kali Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra IEC Van ki ai jingtip shaphang ka jingpyntreikam ia ki skhim bapher bapher ha jylla Meghalaya.Shuh shuh, ka plie lad ruh ia ki Nongthoh khubor jong ka jylla Uttar Pradesh ban sngewthuh ia ki jinglong jingman ha kaba iadei bad ka jingseisoh ki skhim jong ka sorkar pdeng ha Meghalaya.Ka Bureau ka la pynlong ia ki press tour ha ki jylla bapher bapher ban iarap ia ki nongthoh khubor ba kin iohi dalade ia ki kam pynroi kiba dang pyntreikam ha ka ri bad iarap ia ki ban ai jingtip shaphang ki polisi ba kongsan jong ka sorkar.Ia ka Press Tour la pynlong da ka Press Information Bureau, Shillong ha ka jingiatreilang bad ka Press Information Bureau, Lucknow hapoh ka jingkyrshan ka Tnat Information & Broadcasting Sorkar India.Ka kynhun jong ki Nongthoh khubor ka la leit jngoh ruh ia ki stall jong ki skhim sorkar ba la buh ban ai jingtip shaphang ki skhim jong ka sorkar khnang ban pynpoi pura ia ki skhim bad ai jingmyntoi ia ki briew kiba haduh mynta kim pat ioh ia ki jingmyntoi jong kine ki skhim.Ka kynhun ka la iaroh ia ki sienjam jong ka sorkar jylla ban pynlong ia ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra kaba jop wat ha ki jaka nongkyndong.Ha ka jingsah jong ki ha Meghalaya haduh ka 11 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2023 kin leit jngoh ruh ia ka West Jaintia Hills bad Ri Bhoi district ban sngewthuh ia ki jinglong jingman ha kaba iadei bad ka jingseisoh ki skhim jong ka sorkar pdeng ha Meghalaya.
title: LEIT JNGOH KI NONGTHOH KHUBOR NA UP ÏA KI JAKA BA PYNLONG ÏA KA VIKSIT BHARAT SANKALP YATRA HA EKH

content: U Director General of Police ka Jylla Dr. LR Bishnoi ha ka sngi Baar u la pyndait ia ki Epaulettes ia ki 11 ngut ki Ophisar Pulit ba la pynkiew kyrdan ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Police Headquarters, Shillong.Ki Ophisar Pulit kiba la shah pynkiew kyrdan ki long u D.P. Marak, IPS kum u Inspector General of Police (SB/Border), u Dr. Raghavendra Kumar M.G., IPS kum u Dy. Inspector General of Police (WR), ka Kong C.A. Lyngwa, IPS kum ka Dy. Inspector General of Police (TAP), ka Jubi G Momin, IPS kum ka Senior Superintendent of Police (AID), u Pawar Swapnil Vasantrao, IPS kum u Commandant jong ka 1st MLP Bn., Mawiong, u Pankaj Kumar Rasgania, IPS kum u Special Superintendent of Police (CID), u Vikash Varma, IPS kum u Superintendent of Police (SCRB), u Naman Kumar, IPS kum u SDPO ka Raksamgre, u Dewansh Pandey kum u SDPO ka Amlarem, u Ishan Gupta, IPS kum u SDPO ka Dadenggre bad u Ashish, IPS kum u SDPO ka Sadar.Ha kane ka jingialang, la iashim bynta lang da u Inspector General of Police (L&O/TAP/HQ) u M. K. Singh, u Inspector General of Police (R/PR/F&ES) Bah F. G. Kharshiing, u Dy. Inspector General of Police (ER) u D. N. R. Marak,  bad kiwei kiwei ki heh Ophisar Pulit lem bad ki bahaing hasem jong ki Ophisar Pulit ba la kiew kyrdan.U DGP u la ai khublei ia ki Ophisar Pulit kiba la shah pynkiew kyrdan.
title: PYNDAIT U DGP DA KI EPAULETTES ÏA KI OPHISAR PULIT BA LA KIEW KYRDAN

content: : Lai ngut ki rangbah ha ka sngi Baar ki la pyniasoh ialade bad ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha ophis treikam jong ka BJP ha nongbah Shillong.Kine ki lai ngut ki rangbah kiba la pyniasoh kum ki dkhot ka BJP ki kynthup ia u Dr Wansainbor A Lyngwi na Sohra, u Bah Meialam Kharmalki na Upper Shillong Sawmer bad u Bah Elnathan Ryntathiang na Umlyngka.Ia kine ki rangbah la pdiang sngewbha sha ka party da u Bah Alexander L. Hek uba long ruh u Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u State General Secretary Bah Evarist Myrsing, u State Vice President Bah Khraw Basaiawmoit bad kiwei kiwei ki nongkitkam jong ka party.U Dr Wansaiñbor A Lyngwi u dei u nongialam barim ka KSU mynba u dang pule ha kolej bad u la pyniasoh ialade bad ka seng Congress bad shimti ruh kum u General Secretary jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Youth Congress (MPYC).“Ka daw kaba la pynlong ia u ban pyniasoh bad ka BJP ka long namarba u ieid ia la ka jong ka jylla naduh ka por ba u dang don hapoh ka KSU bad mynta u don ka jingsngewskhem lada ka BJP ka bat ia u lakam synshar ha ka jylla ki kam pynroi kin nang wan sha ka jylla,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Spokesperson jong ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit, Bah M. Kharkrang.
title: PYNÏASOH BJP U NONGÏALAM BARIM KA KSU, PDIANG SNGEWBHA U BAH AL HEK

content: Lai ngut ki samla pule proh jabieng jong ka IIM, Shillong ba kynthup ia ka Kashish Sharma, ka Saagarika Bhasker bad ka Sampada Dubey ki la ioh pdiang ia ka baibam kaba la tip kum ka Aditya Birla Scholarship.Ka IIM Shillong ka ju pynmih ia ki samla pule kiba stad kiba ju iai bteng ban ioh ia ka Aditya Birla Scholarship, ka baibam kaba pawnam ha ka ri.Ka jingsdang ban ioh ia kane ka baibam, ka la sdang ha u snem 2011 haba uwei na ki samla pule jong ka IIM Shillong u la ioh ia ka Scholarship ha ka sien kaba nyngkong eh bad kane ka la long ka jingsdang ban ioh ia ka baibam. Nangne shakhmat, sa 15 ngut ki samla pule jong ka IIM Shillong ki la shah jied ban ioh pdiang ia kane ka baibam, halor ka jingtrei shitom jong ki ha ka jingpule.Ka IIM Shillong ka ai khublei ia ki nongioh baibam jong u snem 2024 ba kynthup ia ka Kashish Sharma, ka Saagarika Bhasker Panyam, bad ia ka Sampada Dubey kiba dang pule ia ka PGP-2023-25, IIM Shillong na ka bynta ka jingioh pdiang ia ka baibam.Ha kajuh ka por, ka samla Aastha Ratti ka la ioh pdiang ia ka OP Jindal Scholarship ka dei kaba dang pule ia ka PGP-2023-25).Ka Aastha kaba long kawei napdeng ki 20 ngut ki samla pule kiba wan shakhmat ha ka jingpule na ki B-Schools ha ka ri India kiba la pynpaw ia ka jingproh jabieng ha ka jingpynlut por ban pyndep ia ka jingpule ha ka MBA. Ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ia ka OP Jindal Group kaba la ai ka jingithuh na ka bynta ban ioh ia ka baibam.
title: ÏOH BAIBAM ADITYA BIRLA KI SAMLA PULE KYNTHEI PROH JABIENG KA IIM SHILLONG

content: U Lyngdoh Sad jong ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong Most Rev Victor Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Baar u la phah ïa u kyrwoh sha ki Lyngdoh, ki Riewniam bad sha ki parabangeit ban pyntip halor ka jingplie ïa ki Parish ba thymmai hapoh kane ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong.Ha u kyrwoh, u Archbishop Victor Lyngdoh u la pyntip ba ki Parish ban sa plie thymmai1ba kynthup ïa ka Mawiong, Mawtawar, Umpling, Nongrah bad Madanrting.“Ha ka jingïaid lynti jong ka Balang, ngi ïohi ïa ka jingdonkam ban sumar ïa ka jingim mynsiem jong ki parabangeit ha ki jaka ba bun jong ka Jylla Niam Bah. Ngi ainguh ïa u Blei na ka bynta ka jingïaid shaphrang jong ka Balang ha kane ka Jyllaniam Bah Shillong. Katba ka Balang ka nangroi, ka don ka jingdonkam ban sumar ïa ka jingim mynsiem jong ki parabangeit ha ki jaka babun jong ka Jylla Niam Bah,” la ong u u Archbishop Victor Lyngdoh ha u kyrwoh.“Ngi da sngewnguh shikatdei eh ïa ki Lyngdoh, ki Riewniam, ki Nongtrei Balang bad ïa ki parabangeit baroh kiba la aiti met bad mynsiem ban pynïaid shaphrang ïa ka Balang Bakhuid jong U Blei. Ka dei ka jingduwai bad ka jingangnud jong kiba bun ban plie ïa ki Parish ha kylleng ka Jylla Niam Bah na ka bynta ka jingsumar ba kynja mynsiem. Ka bynta banyngkong jong ka jingpynroi ïa ki Parish kan sa ïaid shakhmat.Da ka jingngeit ha u Blei, mynta ka sngi, ka 9 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024, ngi la don ka jingïalang bad ki dkhot jong ka Council (Jyllaniam Bah), ki Parish Priest (Mawlai & Nongthymmai) bad ki Rangbah Balang ha kaba ngi la rai ban plie ïa kine ki Parish. Nga kyrpad ïa phi baroh ban duwai kyrpang katba ngi dang pynkhreh ïa ka jingplie paidbah ïa kine ki Parish thymmai,” la pynkut u kyrwoh.
title: SAN TYLLI PARISH THYMMAI YN PLIE HA JYLLA NIAM BAH SHILLONG, PYNTIP U ARCHBISHOP VICTOR

content: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomos District Concil (KHADC) ha ka sngi Balang ka la pan sakhi na ka Joint Action Committee Raid Saw Symper halor ki jingkynnoh pyrshah ïa u Syiem jong ka Hima Maharam u Pa’iem Niandro Syiemïong.Kane ka jingpan sakhi jong ka tnat Elaka ka KHADC ka long hadien ba ka JAC kaba kynthup ïa ka KSU, FKJGP, HYC bad HUAM na ka thaiñ Saw Symper ki la ujor pyrshah ïa u Syiem ka Hima Langrin bad dawa ruh ïa ka District Council ban pynhiar noh shisyndon ïa u.U Secretary jong ka JAC Bah Drimshon Mawleiñ, Secy ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ïathuh ba ki nongïalam ki la pynpaw hakhmat u Dy. Chief Executive Member (Dy. CEM) uba peit ïa ka tnat Elaka, u Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem ba kum ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima kim don shuh ka jingshahniah ha u Syiem Niandro Syiemïong da kaba kynnoh ba u long u mawjynthud, u nongpynkulmar shnong bad uba pynduh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.“Ngi kum ki nongshong shnong bad kum ki khun ki hajar jong ka hima, ngim shahniah shuh ïa une u Syiem namarba u long u mawjynthud, u long ruh u nongpynkulmar shnong bad u long ruh u nongpynduh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad ha ka dong ka thaiñ bad ha ka Hima hi baroh kawei,” u la ong.Haba ïathuh ïa ka jingieng pyrshah jong ka JAC ïa u Syiem Niandro u Bah Mawleiñ u la ong, “ka dawbah ba ka JAC ka la ujor pyrshah ïa u Syiem ka long halor ka jingpynmih ïa ka jingpynbna paidbah ha ka 31tarik, Nohprah, 2020 ban khrong khajna ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap hapoh ka Raid Sawsymper. Ngi ki khun ki hajar bad ki paidbah nongshong shnong ngi pyrshah jur ïa kane.”“Katkum ka soskular ba la ïateh hapdeng u Syiem Bamon Sing Syiem, uba long u Syiem barim jong ka Hima Maharam bad ki riew rangbah jong ka Raid ha ki snem 1944 hynrei une u Syiem ba mynta ka Hima Maharam u la pynkheiñ ïa ka jingïateh soskular. Dei halor kata ka daw ba ngi la hap ban ujor sha ka District Council namarba u Syiem u la sdang ban mushlia ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap hapoh ka Dorbar Raid,” la ong.“Ngim don shuh ka jingshaniah ïa une u Syiem bad ngi dawa ïa ka District Council ba ka dei ban pynhiar khet shi syndon ïa u,” la pynpaw u Bah Mawleiñ.“Hadien ba ngi la ujor, ka District Council ka la pynmih ïa ka Stay Order ban pynsangeh ïa ka jingpynjari hukum jong   u Syiem ban khrong khajna ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka Raid Sawsymper, um shym la burom satia ïa ka Stay Order ba la pynmih da ka District Council. U la pynmih ïa ka hukum ban khrong khajna ïa ki trok kit maw ha ki jaka tih maw kiba don hapoh ka Raid Sawsymper,” la kynnoh une u nongïalam ka JAC.“U (Syiem Niandro) ong ba u burom ïa ka Soskular ba la ïateh bad ka Dorbar Raid hynrei ki kam pat ki long markhongpong. U burom da ka ktien hynrei ki kam u leh da kumwei,” la kynnoh shuh shuh u Bah Mawleiñ.“Kum ka JAC, ngi da maham jur la ka long ïa ki riewshimet, ïa ki politishian lane ïa kino kino ki kynhun kiba wan mushlia ïa ki kam jong ka Raid Sawsymper.  Kim bit ban mushlia ïa ki kam jong ka Raid namarba kim tip ïa ka sdang bad ka kut bad kim tip ïa ka im bad ka ïap jong ka Raid baroh kawei. Dei tang ma ngi ki nongshong shnong jong ka Raid kiba tip ïa ki jingeh kiba ngi ïatyngkhuh bad u Syiem. Kiwei kiwei ki kynhun kin ym lah ban wan korbar namarba kim tip eiei,” u la ong shuh shuh.U Bah Jiedskhem Nongsiej uba dei u dkhot jong ka JAC u la bynrap da kaba kynnoh pyrshah ïa u Syiem Niandro ba u la pyndam wat ïa ka Sanad jong ki Rangbah Shnong ha ka thaiñ Sawsymper.  “Kane ka la pynlong ïa ki Rangbah Shnong ba kin kulmar jingmut halor kane ka jingpynmih hukum jong u Syiem. Halor kane, ngi pynpaw ka jingpyrshah ïa u syiem,” u la bynrap.U Chairman ka JAC u Bah Gilbert Kharraswai u la kyntu ïa ka District Council ba ka dei ban shimkhia mardor ïa ka jingujor jong ki khun ki hajar ka Hima pyrshah ïa u Syiem Niandro Syiemïong.
title: HAKHMAT U DY. CM AI SAKHI KA JAC HALOR KA JINGKYNNOH PYRSHAH ÏA U SYIEM KA HIMA MAHARAM

content: : Ki shipai 4th Battalion Border Security Force (BSF) ha ka sngi Balang ki la ïoh bat ia kawei ka kali kaba kit ia ka shini ba la thmu ban shalan tuh sha ka ri Bangladesh bad ïoh bat ia ki arngut ki nong India hajan Lyngkhat kaba don ha khappud jong ka East Khasi Hills District, Meghalaya bad ka ri Bangladesh.Lyngba ka jingtip ba bniah ba la ïohlum na ki tnat syntiat, ki shipai BSF kiba la ap ktem ki la ithuh ia ka kali bad ki la bat noh ia kane ka kali kaba kit ia ka shini hadien ba u nongñiah kali bad u nongbud kim shym la lah ban pyni ia ki kot ki sla kiba biang ban kit ia ka shini.Ia ka shini ba la ïoh kurup la aiti noh sha ki Pulit na ka bynta ban leh ia kaba donkam.
title: SHAH KEM ARNGUT KIBA THMU SHALAN TUH ÏA KA SHINI SHA BANGLADESH

content: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) haduh mynta ka dang ap ia ka kaiphod jong ka Delimitation Committee kaba la pynlong ia ka jingpynsngew paidbah ha kylleng ki shnong kiba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka District Council, kata ha East Khasi Hills, West Khasi Hills, South West Khasi Hills, Eastern West Khasi Hills bad Ribhoi District naduh ka 21 tarik, Naiwieng haduh ka 13 tarik Nohprah, 2023.Ka jingthung jong ka Executive Committee ka KHADC ia ka Delimitation Committee ka long ban pan jingmut bad pan ia ki jingsngew na ki paidbah ha kaba iadei bad ka jingthmu jong ka District Council ban pynkhreh ia ka Delimitation Bill na ka bynta ban pynbeit ryntih ia ki 29 tylli ki Constituency kiba hap hapoh ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council.U Dy. Chief Executive Member (Dy.CEM) ka KHADC Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “ka Executive Committee ka la bud ryntih ia ki kyndon baroh namarba u snem 2013 ha ka por ba ngi la wanrah ia ka Delimitation shwa ba ngin thaw ia ka Delimitation Committee ngi ïoh shwa ia ka jingmynjur na u Lat. Mynta ruh kumjuh hi, hadien ba la ïoh jingkynthoh na ki shnong, ki riewshimet ki pynpaw ba ka jingdon jong ki nongthep vote hapoh ka Constituency ka iapher kawei na kawei. Ka Mawlai Constituency ka don 50 hajar ngut bad ka Mawkhar-Pynthorumkhrah Constituency ka don 17-18 hajar ngut ki nongthep vote. Ka Laban Constituency ka don tang kumba 13-14 hajar ngut ki nongthep vote. Ngi donkam ban pynbeit ryntih biang ia ki shnong ha ki Constituency bapher bapher.”“Mynta ka Committee ka dang pyntyllun shakhmat ban bishar bad ban nujor ia ki shnong bad kam don kano kano ka bym long katkum ki kyndon. Haoid, ngim pat don ia ka Rules of Delimitation Committee ban mynjur hapoh ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ bad ia kane ngi dang pynkhreh mynta namar ban pynbeit thymmai ia ka Assam & Meghalaya District Council Rule kam mut eh tang ia ka Delimitation hynrei ka iadei ruh bad ki kam kiba iadei hapoh ka Ingdorbar. Ngi dang hap ban pynbeit thymmai bun kiei kiei,” u la ong.Haba kylli, halor ka jingshah ujor jong ka KHADC hapoh ka Ingbishar halor kane ka jingpynbeit ryntih ia ki Constituency, u Dy. CEM u la ong, “ngan ym lah ban kren eiei ia mynta bad ka shong ha ka jingsngew jong ka Ingbishar. Ngi la iaid katkum ki kyndon aiñ.”“Shwa u 2013, ia ka Delimitation la leh tang da ka Executive Committe hynrei ha u snem 2013 u Lat u la bthah ba dei ban da leh bniah bha khnang ba kan ym don kano kano ka jingleh thurmur,” la pynshai u Dy. CEM.
title: DANG AP KAIPHOD KA KHADC NA KA DELIMITATION COMMITTEE HALOR KA JINGPYNBEIT RYNTIH ÏA KI CONSTITUENCY

content: Ka shnong Byrnihat ha Meghalaya ka la paw hakhmat eh kum kawei na ki shnong kaba jaboh tam hapoh ka ri India ha u snem 2023, bud sa ka shnong Begusarai ha ka jylla Bihar bad ka Greater Noida ha Uttar Pradesh, katkum ka kaiphod ba la pyllait ha ka sngi Balang.Ka Delhi, kaba ju tip kum ka shnong kaba jur bha ka jingpynmih ïa ka lyer jaboh ha ka por tlang, ka la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba phra napdeng ki nongbah kiba jaboh tam, ong ka kaiphod ba la leh da kawei ka kynhun Centre for Research on Energy and Clean Air (CREA).U Sunil Dahia, uba dei u Analyst jong ka South Asia ha CREA, u la ong ruh ba la bishar bniah ïa ka jingkhuid jong ka lyer kaba long palat 75 percent na ki sngi ha ki 227 tylli ki nongbah ha u snem 2023.Napdeng kine ki nongbah, 85 tylli ki dei kiba kynthup hapoh ka National Clean Air Programme (NCAP). Ka jinglum jingkheiñ ka pynpaw ba 78 na ka 85 ki nongbah NCAP ki don ïa ka PM10 levels kaba palat ïa ka NAAQS (60 microgrammes per cubic metre).Ka NCAP, ba la pynsdang ha u snem 2019, ka thmu ban pynduna 20-30 percent ha ka PM2.5 bad PM10 ha u snem 2024 ha ki 131 tylli ki nongbah ki bym kynjoh ban don ïa ka lyer kaba khuid naduh u snem 2011 haduh 2015.Ka Sorkar ka la buh hakhmat ïa ka thong ba thymmai ban pynduna sha ka 40 ha ka jingjaboh ha kine ki nongbah shwa jong u snem 2026.“Hadien san snem ba la pyntreikam ïa ka NCAP, tang 44 tylli ki nongbah napdeng ki 131 tylli ki nongbah ki bym don ïa ka lyer kaba khuid la lap katkum kane ka jingwad bniah,” ong u Dahia.“Na ka daw ka jingbym don kine ki jingpule bniah, 64 percent na ka bhah pisa ba la mang hapoh ka NCAP la pyndonkam thik tang ha kaba pynduna ïa ki jingjaboh kiba wanrah jingmynsaw bad ïa ki tiar kum ki suloi siat pynum ïa  u lyoh ba la mih na ki puipui, kaba pynpaw ba kam shym la don ka jingpyntreikam pura ïa ka pisa jong u paidbah,” u la bynrap.Ka kaiphod jong ka CREA ka pynpaw ba tang 37 tylli ki nongbah kiba la shah kdup ha ka NCAP ki la kynjoh ïa ka PM10 level hapoh ka jingbuh thong kaba shisnem katkum ka prokram. Kaba sngewtynnat ka long ha u snem 2023, 118 tylli ki nongbah kim pat long ki bynta jong ka NCAP kiba lah ban don ïa ka lyer kaba khuid kaba kot ïa ka PM10.“Kane ka pynpaw ba ki nongbah ki bym shah kynthup ha ka NCAP kam mut ba kin hap hap long beit kiba khuid,” la ong shuh shuh u Dahia.Tang hynñiew na ki 20 tylli ki nongbah ba jaboh tam ha India ki don mynta hapoh ka NCAP.Ka Byrnihat, ka dei kaba shah kynthup hapoh ka NCAP, ka heh bha ïa ka jingdon jong ka PM10 kaba long 301 microgrammes per cubic metre, katba ka Silchar ha Assam ka duna bha tang PM10 level kaba long 29 microgrammes per cubic metre ha u snem 2023.Ka Begusarai ha Bihar (ka PM10 level kaba long tang 265 microgrammes per cubic metre) bad ka Greater Noida ha Uttar Pradesh (kaba long tang 228 microgrammes per cubic metre) ki wan baar bad balai kum ki nongbah ba jaboh tam.Napdeng ki 50 tylli ki nongbah ba jaboh tam, 18 tylli ki don ha Bihar, 8 ha Haryana bad 8 ha Rajasthan.Ka kaiphod ka pynpaw ruh ba ka PM10 ha ki shiphew tylli ki nongbah ba jaboh tam la lap ba ka heh 3-5 shah ban ïa ka Indian NAAQS bad kiew haduh 13-20 shah katkum ka jingbuh pud da ka WHO.
title: KA SHNONG BYRNIHAT KABA JABOH TAM NAPDENG KI NONGBAH HA RI INDIA HA U SNEM 2023

content: Ka District Magistrate jong ka East Khasi Hills ka la pynjari da ka hukum hapoh ka Section 144 CrPC ban mana tyngeh ban pyndonkam da ki bom dynamite bad ki dawai bih hapoh ki um ki wah, ki wahduid namarba ka pynïap lut ïa ki dohum dohwah hapoh ka East Khasi Hills.Ïa kane ka hukum la pynmih ha ka 8 tarik, mynta u bnai bad la pyllait sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang.Ka jingpynmih ïa kane ka hukum ka long hadien ba la ïoh pdiang ba ka don ka jingpynïap dusmon ïa ki dohkha naduh Shka Wah Umsoh shaduh Shka Wah Umsong, ha Wah Japuh bad Wah Jaduh da kaba pynbthei bom bad pyndonkam da ki dawai Chemical ba long bih.“Ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki dawai bih kan buh jingma ïa ki dohkha, ïa ki soh bad ki syntiew nalor ba ka buh jingma ruh ïa ki briew,” la ong ka hukum.Kum kine ki kam kin wanrah ruh ïa ka jingduhnong kaba khraw ïa ki nongshong shnong hadien habud, la ong ka District Magistrate.Kane ka hukum kan treikam mardor tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.
title: JUR KA JINGPYNÏAP DOHKHA HA KI WAH KA EKH, PYNJARI SECTION 144 CrPC KA DM

content: Ïa ka metïap jong uwei u rangbah la lap ha Nongkseh, Upper Shillong ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai.  Une u briew u don kumba 35 snem eiei ka rta bad la lap ïa u na ka bynta khlaw jong ka ophis GSI kaba don marpyrshah bad ka Gorkha Higher Secondary School.Ki Pulit ki la pyntip ba une u briew u phong da ka Sweater rong iong bad ka sopti rong saw jngum bad don u tattoo pyllun ha ka shadem.Hadien ba la pyndep ïa ka post morem, ïa ka met ïap la buh ha ka  jaka buh metïap ha NEIGRIHMS Hospital na ka bynta ban kam ki bahaing hasem.
title: LAP ÏA KA METÏAP U RANGBAH HA NONGKSEH

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union lyngba ka Employment Monitoring Cell ka la aiti da ka dorkhas sha u Director (Corporate Affairs) jong ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) halor ka jingpynslem jong ka MeECL ban thung ïa ka kam Assistant Engineer (Electrical/ Mechanical).Ïa kane ka post Assistant Engineer (Electrical/Mechanical) la pyndep ïa ka eksamin (written examination) ha ka 13 tarik Naitung, 2019 bad la pynmih ïa ka result ha 19 tarik, Nailar, 2019 ha kaba la jied ïa ki 24 ngut ki ban hap leh ïa ka personal interview ha 26 tarik, Nailur, 2019. Phewse shuwa kata ha u 22 tarik, Nailur 2019 ki la pynpep noh ïa kane ka interview bad la 4 snem tam kim shym la lah shuh ban pynurlong ïa kane ka kam.Ka Seng haba ïakren bad ki bor pynïaid jong ka MeECL la ïoh jingtip ba ka MeECL kam shym la lah ban thungkam ïano ïano ruh naduh u snem 2020 namar bym don pisa ban siew tulop bad ïa ki post ba kyrkieh ba donkam la shu thung kontrak (contractual basis).Ka Seng lyngba une u kyrwoh ka buh jingkylli ïa ka Sorkar jylla, khamtam eh ïa ka tnat Bording ba kaei ka sienjam ba ka la shim ban pynbeit ïa ki kynrum kynram ha MeECL bad kumba ka long mynta kaei ka lawei jong ka MeECL.Ka Seng ka dawa na ka Sorkar jylla ba kadei ban shimkhia halor ka thungkam thungjam ha ka MeECL bad kumjuh ruh ban pyllait ïa ka tulop jong ki nongtrei ka MeECL namar mar ïamih na ka jingïakren la wan poi sa ki jong nongtrei MeECL ban pynsngew sha ka seng ba ym pat pynlait ïa ka tulop ka jong ki.
title: BYM DON PISA, 4 SNEM KHLEM KHOT INTERVIEW KA MeCCL ÏA KA POST ASST. ENGINEER

content: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ha ka sngi Palei ka la ïai pynsngew ïa ka jingdawa sha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ban pynbeit thymmai noh mardor ïa ka AD Rules, kaba ailad ïa kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew ki bym dei ki Khasi ban ïashim bynta ha ka elekshon jong ka District Council.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la aiti ïa ka dorkhas sha u CEM ka KHADC Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem, u working president jong ka KHNAM Bah Thomas Passah u la ong, ka party ka la ïai pynsngew ïa kane ka jingdawa ban pynbeit thymmai noh ïa ka Rule 128 (1) jong ka Assam and Meghalaya Autonomous Districts (Constitution of District Councils) Rules, 1951, kaba kdew shai, “baroh ki nongshong shnong ka ri India kiba la kynjoh ïa ka rta kaba 18 snem ki lah ban ïakhun, ban long ki nongjied ha ka elekshon District Council”.U la ong ba ka party ka la ai jingmut ba la donkam ban pynrung ïa ka kyntien “dkhot jong ka jaidbynriew riewlum Khasi- ban ïashim bynta ha ka elekshon jong ka KHADC.Ka KHNAM ha ka shithi ka la ong lada ailad ïa ki bym dei ki Khasi ban ïashim bynta ha ka elekshon, khlempep kan pynïap noh ïa ka jingmut ban don ïa ka Autonomous District Council katkum ki kyndon jong ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka riti Synshar ka Ri India.Ka seng ka la ong, dei namar kane, ki bym dei ki reiwlum ki la shah jied kum ki dkhot jong ka Garo Hills Autonomous District Council (GHADC) bad kane ka la wanrah ka jingpyrshah kaba jur na ki jaidbynriew Garo.Haba kylli, u Bah Passah u la ong ba u CEM u la kular ba un sa shimkhia ïa kane ka kam bad ka executive committeebad u Deputy Chief Minister in-charge District Council Affairs (DCA) ban wanrah ïa ki jingpynbeit thymai hapoh ka AD Rules.
title: BA ÏOH THEP VOTE KI BAR JYLLA, DAWA KA KHNAM ÏA KA KHADC BAN PYNBEIT THYMMAI KA AD RULES

content: Ka Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP) Meghalaya ha ka sngi Palei ka la dawa ban pynsangeh noh mardor ïa ka jingthungkam Assistant Teacher ha ki Government Lower Primary Schools hapoh ka Dadenggre Subdivision, West Garo Hills District khnang ban ailad ïa ka jingtohkit halor ka jingkynnoh ba ka don ka jingbym ryntih ha ka rukom thungkam.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K Sangma, u State President ka ABVP Meghalaya u Tengku M Marak u la ong ba ka jingpynbna dang shen ïa ka resol da ka tnat Pule Puthi na ka bynta ka post Assistant Teacher ha ki Government Lower Primary Schools hapoh ka Dadanggre Subdivision na ka bynta kiba la pyndep ïa ka exam MTET khamtam ïa kiba dei na ka Unreserved Category ka la pynmih ïa u dak jingkylli uba  heh namarba ym don riewlum ba la paw ha ka kyrteng thup UR Category.Ïa ka result la pynbna ha ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai.“(Namarkata) ka Sorkar ka dei ban pynsangeh shwa mardor ïa kane ka jingthungkam. Dei ban thung da ka jingtohkit kaba thikna ban pynpaw ïa ka daw ba shongnia halor kane ka jingpynmih result,” la dawa ka AVBP.Ki nongïalam ka AVBP ki la buh ruh san tylli ki jingkylli bad dawa ruh ïa ka tnat Pule Puthi ban jubab.U la ong, “hato ym don seh ki hymmen shynrang bad ki para kynthei riewlum kiba kotbor ha kaba kim shym la rung satia wat ha ka thup UR Category? Kumno ba tang kawei ka jaidbynriew kan ïoh lut haduh 33 ki Seat ha ka thup UR category na ki 34 tylli? Hato ym don shuh kiwei kiewi ki jaidbynriew na ka thaiñ kiba la nang la stad kiba lah ban ïoh ïa kine ki post? Ka tnat Pule Puthi jong kato ka District ka la pyndonkam ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynnang pynstad tang ïa kawei ka jaidbynriew? Mano ba donkti ban wanrah ïa ka jingïaphiah ha ka pule puthi ba tang kawei ka jaidbynriew ka long kaba tbit bad katba kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew pat kim kotbor eiei.?U la ïaiban ba ka ABVPP ka pynrem jur bad dawa ban thung ïa ka jingtohkit bad ban pynïoh ïa ka hok jong ki riewlum ba dei ïoh ban ïoh ka kam.
title: DAWA KA ABVP BAN PYNSANGEH ÏA KA JINGTHUNGKAM NONGHIKAI HA KI GOVT LP SCHOOL

content: Shillong, K’lyngkot 10 : Ka Learning Links Foundation kaba dei seng trei mon sngewbha kaba trei na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ka jingpynsaphriang ia ka jingnang jingtip, da ka jingkyrshan jong ka Intel Technology India Pvt. Ltd ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Directorate of School Education and Literacy (DoSEL), SSA-SEMAM jong ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la plie paidbah ia ka Holistic Child Development Program kum shi bynta jong ka jingsdang ia ka “Adopt a School” Program.Ka jingthmu jong kane ka prokram ka long ban shut ia ka jabieng jong ki khynnah khnang ba kin long kiba sted ban bat ia ki jinghikai bad ki jingnang jingtip ba la batai ia ki. Ia kane ka prokram yn pyntreikam ha ki 10 tylli ki skul kiba hap hapoh ka Mawlai C&RD Block ha East Khasi Hills District bad ki khynnah ki ban ioh jingmyntoi na kane ka prokram kin don shi hajar ngut kata naduh klas I haduh V.Lyngba ka Holistic Child Development Program la khmih lynti ban ai jinghikai ia ki khynnah ha kiba bun rukom kum ka jinghikai ba kin sumar ia ka koit ka khiah lajong, ka jinghikai ba kin kilan met lane ba kin don ka jingsngewtynnad ha ki jingialehkai sports nalor kiwei pat. Katto katne na ki mat kiba hap hapoh ka Holistic Child Development Program ki kynthup ia ka :Ka Learning Links Foundation ka sngew sarong ban ioh ia treilang bad ka Directorate of School Education and Literacy (DoSEL), SSA-SEMAM jong ka sorkar Meghalaya na ka bynta ban pynurlong ia kane ka jingthmu bad ban pyniar ia ki jingtreikam jong ka sha kiwei pat ki District ha ka jylla.I Dr. Anjlee Prakash , Chairperson jong ka Learning Links Foundation I la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen halor ka jinglah ban plie ia kane ka prokram bad haba pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkmen jong i, I la ong kumne “Ngi ngeit ba manla uwei pa uwei ne kawei pa kawei ka khynnah ki don ia ka hok ban ioh jingmyntoi na kane, kane ka dei ka jingthmu ba ym tangba ki khynnah kin ioh ia ka jingpule kaba thoh ha ka kot pule jong ki hynrei kin ioh ruh ia ka met kaba koit ba khiah bad ban ioh jingtip ruh shaphang ka jingriewspah ka jinglong tynrai jong ngi bad bun kiei kiei . Da ka jingiatreilang bad ka Directorate of School Education & Literacy (DoSEL), SSA-SEMAM jong ka sorkar Meghalaya, ngin nang pynkhlain shuh shuh ia ka jingangnud jong ngi ban wanrah jingkylla ha ka jingim jong ki khynnah”:Ka Learning Links Foundation ka dei ka seng trei mon sngewbha kaba aiti lut na ka bynta ban pynriewspah ia ka jingnang jingtip bad ban ialam lynti sha ka lawei kaba phyrnai. Naduh ba la seng ia ka ha u snem 2002, ka la lah ban pyniar ia ki thapniang treikam jong ka ha baroh kawei ka Ri India bad ha Asia Pacific ruh kumjuh. Ka Learning Links Foundation ka ai jinghikai ia ki khynnah ym tang na ki kot pule jong ki hynrei ka saindur ia ka jingim jong ki khynnah da kaba ai ia ki ia kiwei pat ki jingtip ki bym shym la thoh ne batai ha ki kot pule jong ki. Na bynta ki jingtip ba kham bniah shaphang ka Learning Links Foundation, phi lah ban peit ha kane ka Website [Website: https://www.learninglinksindia.org].
title: PLIE KA DSEL-SEMAM ÏA KA PROKRAM SHUT JABIENG KI KHYNNAH SKUL

content: : Ka jingpynkhreh na ka bynta ka jingplie ïa ka 5th Meghalaya Games 2024 ka la iaid shakhmat ha kaba baroh ki nongïashim bynta ki la wan poi ha nongbah Tura ha ka step jong ka sngi U Blei.Ia kitei ki nongïalehkai la pdiang sngewbha da ki dkhot ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) lem bad ki bor pyniaid District jong ka West Garo Hills ha ISBT, Tura na ka bynta kane ka lympung ka ban neh baroh shi taiew lynter.Kane long ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ban pynlong ha ri lum Garo Hills ha kaba yn ban plie ka President ka ri ka Droupadi Murmu ha PA Sangma Stadium kaba ha Tura.Kumta kane ka jingwan poi jong ka khliehduh jong ka ri, kan nangpynsah jingkynmaw shuh shuh ia kane ka lympung bad kumjuh ia u paidbah jong ka ri lum Garo.Lada poi ban iuhkjat mynta ha Tura, ka shong ka thaw bad ki kyntoit ki la kup ia ka rong kaba itynnad hadien ba manla ki lad la wah ïa ki banner ne poster kiba heh bad kiba rit kumjuh ban pynpaw ia ka dak ba kum ka sor ka la khreh ban pdiang bad ban pynlong ïa kane ka lympung ïalehkai baheh ka Jylla bad ka ban ïaid beit ïaid ryntih.Haba pdiang sngewbha ïa ki nongïalehkai ha ISBT, Tura, la pynlong ïa ka put ka tem da ka kynhun tem jong ka Meghalaya Grassroots Music Project ha kaba ki jingrwai ki long na ka bynta kane ka lympung bad ki ban ai mynsiem ïa ki nongïalehkai ba kin ïalehkai bha.Shuh shuh la pynbiang ruh ïa ki lad ai jingsumar ha ISBT na ka bynta ki nongïalehkai kiba don hapdeng ki jingmynsaw.Ha ka por janmiet pat ki nongïalehkai ki la poi lut ha PA Sangma Stadium na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ïa ki prokram bapher bapher jong katei ka jingplie bad ruh ba kin hap ban bud ïa ki kyndon na ka bynta katei ka jingwan iuh kjat ka President jong ka ri.Ha kane ka lympung yn ïashim bynta da kumba 3000 ngut ki nongïalehkai na kylleng ki district bapher bapher ki ban ïashim bynta ha ki 23 tylli ki jingïalehkai ki ban pynlong ha ki 16 tylli ki jaka kiba don ha ka nongbah Tura.Lada ngin ïa kyrtiang dien sha kane ka lympung kaba la long ha u snem 2022, watla ha kaba sdang ka la don ka jingduna ha kiba bun ki liang, pynban hadien ba la lah ban weng ïa ki jingeh bad la pynbit pynbiang ka lympung ka la iaid shakhmat ha ki 19 tylli ki jait jingialehkai ba la pynlong ha ki 13 tylli ki jaka bad ïashim bynta shitrhem da ki 3000 ngut ki samla.Ia ki jingïalehkai la pynlong ha Laban Indoor Stadium, Shillong Club, Madanrting Indoor Hall, Assam Regimental Centre, NEHU, Mawlai Mawroh Community Hall, Mawlai Madan Heh, Crinoline Swimming Pool, Khlaw Malki, Shillong Golf Course, NEIGRIHMS bad ha Sports Authority of India (SAI) Training Centre.Ha kane ka lympung kumba 700 tam ki takma la lah ban sam sha ki samla ïalehkai ba la ioh ban khur ïa la ki nam jop ha ki jingïalehkai bapher bapher.Dei ha ka sngi pynhap pyrda ïa ka lympung la ïoh ruh ban sakhi ïa ka jingpyni ïa ka rukom ïalehkai jong ka gymnastic ba la ai da ki khynnah barit jong ka Gymnastics Association of Meghalaya.Ka jingpyni sap ki heprit ka la pynshohbiej ia baroh kiba la wan ban sakhi ïa kane ka sap kaba ki don.
title: KA MEGHALAYA GAMES 2024: KYNDEH KA SOR TURA BAN PYNLONG NOH ÏA KA MEGHALAYA GAMES

content: Ka President jong ka ri India, ka Droupadi Murmu kan wan jngoh ia ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam naduh ka 15 haduh 17 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, 2024.Ha ka 15 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, ka President kan plié paidbah ia ka lympung ialehkai 5th Meghalaya Games ha PA Sangma Stadium, Tura.Ha ka 16 tarik, ka President kan ai jingkren ia ki dkhot jong ki Self Help Group ha ka kad liengsuin Baljek, Tura bad kan buh maw nongrim ia ka Integrated Administration Complex, Tura ba thymmai lyngba ki lad digital.Ha kajuh ka sngi, kan ai jingkren ha ka jingialang ha Mawphlang bad kan plié paidbah ia ka jingkyntiew ia ka surok Rongjeng-Mangsang Adokgre Road bad ka surok Mairang-Ranigodown-Azra Road da ki lad digital bad kan buh maw nongrim ruh ia ka Shillong Peak Ropeway bad ki jaka sah ki nongjngoh kai pyrthei ha ki shnong Kongthong, Mawlyngot bad Kudengrim. Ha ka janmiet, ka President kan iashim bynta ha ka prokram ba pynlong da ka Sorkar Meghalaya ha Raj Bhavan, Shillong.Ha ka 17 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, ka President kan iashim bynta ha ka jingrakhe golden jubilee jong ka Karbi Youth Festival ha Taralangso, Diphu, Assam.
title: YN WAN JNGOH KA PRESIDENT IA KA MEGHALAYA BAD ASSAM NADUH 15 TARIK HADUH 17 TARIK

content: Tura, K’lyngkot 15 : Ka janmiet ban sah kynmaw pateng la pakit hadien ba ka President jong ka ri ka Droupadi Murmu ka la plie ia ka pyrda jong ka lympung ialehkai 5th Meghalaya games 2024 ha PA Sangma Stadium kaba Tura, West Garo Hills District.Watla ka janmiet ka long kaba khriat hynrei kane kam shym ka theh umpjah satia ia ka mynsiem ki 3000 ngut ki khun samla kynthei bad shynrang na baroh kylleng sawdong jong ka Jylla kiba la ialum lang ban sei madan ia ki sap ba nylla ka jong ki.Haba kren kum ka kongsan, ka President ka pynpaw ia ka jingkmen ba kan ioh ia kane ka kabu ksiar ban plie ia ka pyrda jong kane ka lympung kaba la ai kyrteng ha ka nam bad ka burom ka jong u PA Sangma, uba la long u Myntri Rangbah bad kumjuh kum u Speaker barim jong ka Lok Sabha bad uba kylla long u Speaker ba nyngkong eh na ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi.Ka President ka la ban jur ia ka jingdonkam ban kyrshan bad ban ai mynsiem ia ki samla riewlum ba don sap khnang ban saiñdur ia ka jingim ialehkai kaba pura ka jong ki.Kumta ka kyrmen ba ka lympung Meghalaya Games kan long kaba ai mynsiem ia ki khun samla nangta ban phrang ia ka mynsiem iakhun bad ruh ban wanrah ia ka jingkiew jong ka sports ha baroh ki liang.Na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la ai khublei ia ka President kaba la lah ban iadon lang ha kane ka janmiet ban plie ia ka pyrda jong kane ka lympung kaba long ruh ka sien kaba nyngkong ba kat ka nongialam ba hakhlieh duh jong ka ri ban iuhkjat ha sorbah Tura na ka bynta ban plie syndon ia kane ka lympung ba heh tam ha ka Jylla.Shuh shuh u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ka jingpynlong ia kum kane ka lympung ym dei ba la shu pynlong hynrei ka dei kaba ka sorkar ka bet ia u symbai ha ki pateng ki ban wan da kaba plie lad ia ki ba kin sei madan ia ka sap kaba ki don ha ka liang jong ka sports.“Ha kine ki ar samoi ka jinglong Myntri Rangbah ngi la lah ban tei ia kiba bun ki jaka ialehkai bad ngi khmih lynti ha kine ki san snem ki ban wan ngin dangiai bteng ban pynurlong ia ki jaka ialehkai bapher bapher ha ka Jylla hi baroh kawei.”“Nga ai khublei ia baroh ki dkhot jong ki komiti treikam  bapher bapher kiba la duh dem duh thiah tang namar ban trei shitom ban pynlong ia kane ka lympung kaba jop.”Ha kawei pat ka liang u Myntri ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs u bah Shakliar Warjri u la ong, “Nga ieng hangne hakhmat jong phi kum u Myntri jong ka tnat Sports, da ka mynsiem kaba rhem ban iohi ia ka jingsdang jong ka 5th Meghalaya Games, kaba ka jingpynkhreh ia ka, ka la wan na ki jingiatrei lang jong baroh ki shnat treikam sorkar, ki volunteer bad ki khynnah ialehkai kaba long ka thaba kum ka dongmusa jong ka Olympics kaba tehsong ia baroh ki kynhun jait bynriew na ka bynta ban tehsong ia ka Jylla baroh kawei.”Ha kane ka jingialang la ioh ia ka kynrtien pdiang burom na ka MP ka Tura Parliamentary Constituency ka Agatha K Sangma, ka jingkren na u Lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan.Hadien kane ka la don ka jingiaid ban pynithuh ia lade da ki samla kynthei bad shynrang na baroh ki district jong ka jylla ba la wan ban iashim bynta ha kane ka lympung bad bynrap da ka jingshad tynrai jong ki paid Garo, Khasi bad Jaintia ne ka shad Wangala, shad Mastieh, shad pliang.
title: HAPDENG KA JINGIPHUH IPHIENG, PLIE KA PRESIDENT KA INDIA ÏA KA 5TH MEGHALAYA GAMES 2024 HA TURA

content: Shillong, Kyllalyngkot, 15: Ka Dorbar Shnong Ryngud Hima Syiemship Sohra ka la pynlong ia ka Tamasa Tharia Wah ha ka Wahrew ne ka Beach Festival kaba la long myn ha ka 13 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024.Ia katei ka tamasa tlang kaba la tip kum ka “Tharia Wah Rew” la wan plie da u Bah A L.Hek, myntri ka TNad Fisheries bad Animals Husbandry Vetenery ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka jingiadonlang u Bah Khrawboklang Basaiawmoit, state vice-president BJP, Dr.Fenela L.Nonglait, u Paiem Freeman Syiem ka Hima Sohra, u Sordar shnong bah Edmund Khongsya bad ki nongkitkam ka Umrew Beach Festival.Ka Tamasa Tharia Wah Rew, harud Wah ka dei ka sien kaba nyngkong ia ka shnong Ryngud ban pynlong kum shi bynta ban pynkut ia ka Jingdap 50 jong ka shnong.Shuh shuh na ka jingiathuh u Sordar shnong Ryngud u Bah Edmund Khongsya ka Shnong kum ka jingpynkhreh ban pynkut ia ka Jubilee jong ka shnong ka la shim ka rai ban pynlong ia ka tamasa Beach Festival ia kaba la shim bynta da ki nongshong shnong kum ka jingiakop jngi, ka jingialehkai Volleyball, ka Iasiat Khnam bad kiwei kiwei pynsngew u Sordar shnong.Ha jingpynlong ia ka Tamasa Tharia Wah ha Wah Rew ka dei ka jingpynkynmaw ia ka Iew iadie iathied ka Shnong Ryngud Hima Sohra ia ki Mar Rep bad ki Soh ki pai kum u Sohpieng uba jur bha ban iadie ha katei ka Wah Rew namar ba ki Khar Bangla ki ju wan da ka lieng ban kit ban rong sha Bangladesh na Riwar Sohra namarkata kane ka jaka Iadie iathied ka Hat la ju tip kum ka “Hat Sohpieng” iathuh u Bah Khongsya.Ka Shnong Ryngud ryngkat bad ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Ryngud kawei na ki shnong kaba dang hap ha ka thaiñ Sohra ka dei ka jaka kaba jur u kwai bad tympew jong ka shnong u dei uwei na kiba mar bakongsan bha bad u dei ruh u markhaii uba long u budlum jong ka ïoh ka kot ïa kane ka shnong namar ha ki por mynshuwa kane ka don ia ka hat iadie iathied bad ka RI Bangladesh naduh shwa ka jingioh laitluid ka ri India haduh ban da ioh ka jylla la kajong ha u snem 1972 kane ka shnong ka im beit da ki kam rep ban Khaii Khabar ia ki soh ki pai bad u kwai u tympew kumjuh u Sohmrit bad u sla Latyrpad.Ka shnong Ryngud ha ki por mynshuwa ki wahheh ki la kyrhuh bad ki wahduid ruh ki shlei lut kat haduh ba la mih ruh wat ki umpohliew ha manla ki jaka. Kumjuh ki nongshong shnong ki pahuh pahai mynta kam long shuh naduh ba la khang dam ia ka Iew ka Hat Ryngud kaba don ha Wah Rew hadien ba la don ka thma India bad Pakistan ha u 1972 katei ka Iew Khaii Khabar ka la jah noh.Ka jingduh noh katei ka hat Sohpieng, Ryngud ha WahRew namar ha kitei ki snem ka Bangladesh ka hap ha ka jingsynshar jong ka Ri Pakistan ka la don ka thma ban knieh ia ka Bangladesh ban don bad ka Ri Pakistan da ka jingiarap jong ka Indira Gandhi ka Myntri Rangbahduh ka Ri India ka la dakhol ia ka Pakistan ban ai jingiada ia ka Bangladesh.Ha ka jingshisha ka tamasa Tharia Wah Rew ka la don teng ha ki 1984 ba la ju leh da ka Hima Sohra bad ka Shnong Ryngud ban pynim ban pynkynmaw ia ka jingiadei ia ka HAT Sohpieng hynrei ka shu jah da ki phew snem iathuh u Sordar shnong Ryngud.Mynta ka shnong ka la kwah ban pynim biang.
title: HADIEN BUN BUN SNEM PYNIM KA HIMA SOHRA BAD SHNONG RYNGUD ÏA KA TAMASA THARAI WAH REW

content: Kitrai jaka ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki dkhot ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) South Khasi Hills Unit ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la leit ban pynpra ia kawei ka dukan jong ki bar jylla kaba don ha ka shnong Mawbang, kaba don ha khappud bad ka ri Bangladesh.Ka kong Krisidian Nongtraw na ka shnong Byrong, Wahlong Sirdarship ka la kam ba kane ka jaka kaba don ha Neng Hat Mawbang ka dei ka jaka jong ka bad ka la ong ba ki briew kiba shong ha ka jaka jong ka ki shna ia ka dukan khlem da ioh jingbit na ka kum ka trai jaka.Ka la iathuh ba kham mynshuwa ka ladep khang ia ki hynrei ki la byrngem ban mait da ka wait kumta ka ialam da ki dkhot jong ka KSU ban synran ia ka ban pynpra ia kane ka dukan.Shwa ban pynpra ia ka dukan bad sei ia ki mar ki mata shabar, ka la mih ka jingiapyni nia kaba jur bha hapdeng ki ar liang mamla hynrei ki dkhot jong ka KSU bad u khun jong ka trai jaka kim shym la pynsngap bad ki sei ia ki tiar shabar, ki la pynpra bad lied syndon ia kane ka dukan.
title: PYNPRA KI TRAI JAKA BAD KA KSU ïA KA DUKAN BAR JYLLA HA MAWBANG

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) kum shi bynta ka buddien ia ki mat jingdawa kaba ki la pynlong ia ka jingiakhih ha nongbah New Delhi dang shen, ki nongialam ka seng ha ka sngi Baar ki la pan jingbit na ki bor ka Sorkar Jylla ban iakynduh ia ka President jong ka ri India ka Droupadi Murmu na ka bynta ban pynkynmaw ia ki lai tylli ki mat jingdawa kiba kum ka seng ka ladep ban aiti ia ka dorkhas ha ka ophis treikam ha New Delhi.Shwa kane, ki nongiaalm jong ka HANM ki la ioh pdiang ia ki Phone call na u Secretary jong ka President bad kumjuh ruh na u Private Secretary jong ka President ban pyntikna ba katno ngut ki ban leit iakynduh ia ka President jong ka ri India.Ha ka jingiakren bad ka Batesi Tv, u Bah Lamphrang Kharbani u la iathuh ba ka seng kan ia kynduh ia ka President jong ka Ri India halor ki lai tylli ki mat jingdawa ba ki paidbah jong ka jylla ki la angnud kata halor ka jingdawa ban pyntreikam ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP), ka jingiapynbeit pud bad ban pynrung noh ia ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka riti synshar ka ri India.
title: HALOR LAI TYLLI KI MAT JINGDAWA YN ÏA KYNDUH KA HANM ÏA KA PRESIDENT KA RI INDIA

content: Ka Voice of the people Party (VPP) ha ka sngi Baar hapoh ka jingialam jong u Dr. Rusievan Shangpliang uba dei u dkhot jong ka Media Cell jong ka VPP u la mudui da ka ejhajar ha ophis treikam jong u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District halor kawei ka jingthoh ha Facebook halor ka jingkynthoh ia u President rangbah jong ka Party u Bah Ardent Milar Basaiawmoit uba dei ruh u MLA jong ka Nongkrem Constituency ha uwei u briew ne ka briew kaba la ai kyrteng VPP Dent ha kawei ka Group “Lympung ki Khun Ka Ri”Na ka liang jong ka Party ha ka Lah Sngi  u Blei ki nongialam ki la shong pyrkhat para nongialam shuwa ban leit mudui ia ka ejahar pyrshah ia ka jingkynthoh ha ka post “Lympung Ki Khun Ka Ri.”U Dr. Rusievan Shangpliang u la ong ba lada ki don kino kino ki jingsngew ne ki Jingkynthoh kim dei pat ban pyndonkam da ki kyntien khlemakor kiba ktah mationg ia ka jingim jong ki briew lada ki dei ki briew ne ki nongialam kiba treikam paidbah hynrei ban ai ia ka jingiatreilang ym ban shu kynthoh katba sngewbit da ki ktien ki bym iahap.
title: BA SHAH KYNTHOH U BAH ARDENT HA FACEBOOK, DA KA EJAHAR UJOR KA VPP

content: Ka President jong ka ri India, ka Droupadi Murmu ha ka sngi baar ka la plie paidbah ïa ka jingpynheh ïa ka surok Rongjeng Mangsang Adokgre bad ïa ka surok Mairang Ranigodown Azra bad ka la buh ïa ki maw nongrim jong ka Shillong Peak Ropeway bad ki jaka sah ki nongjngoh kai ha Khongthong, Mawlyngot bad Kudengrim lyngba ki lad digital.Haba kren kum ka Kongsan ka President ka la ong ba naduh ki por hyndai, ki riewlum ki dei kiba ïada ïa ka mariang katkum ki jingnang jingstad, ka deiriti bad ki jingngeit tynrai. Ka la ong ba ki briew jong ka Meghalaya ki ngeit ba ‘U Basa’ lane u blei ka shong ha ki khlaw ki btap. Ka la ong ki rukom treikam jong ki riewlum ki lah ban ai nuksa shaphang ka jingïadei kaba jan hapdeng ki briew bad ka mariang. Ka la ong ba ka rukom im ki riewlum ka don bynta ha ka jingkyntiew ïa ki thong jong ka ri kiba ïadei bad ka jingpynneh ïa ka spah mariang bad ka jingpynneh ïa ka jingryntih ha ka mariang.Ka President ka la ong ba ki longkmie ki don ka bynta kaba heh ha ka jingïada ïa ka mariang bad ki kam ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ka jingkylla ka suinbneng. Ka la ong ba ka la paw shai ba ki longkmie ki don ha ka jaka pdeng jong ki kam pynneh. Ki longkmie ha ka imlang sahlang jong ki riewlum ki la ïalam lynti ha ka jingïada ïa ka mariang bad ki la ïasam ïa ki jingnang jingstad jong ki ban kyntiew ïa ka jingpynïahap bad ka jingpynduna.
