Da kaba kyntiew ïa ka jingïashim bynta ki longkmie ha ki sienjam kiba ïadei bad ka mariang bad ki kam shim rai, ngin lah ban trei kham bha ha ki sienjam ban ïada na ka jingkylla ka suinbneng bad ruh ka jingpynneh ïa ki spah ka mariang.Ka la ong ba ka kmen ba ka Meghalaya ka la shim ïa ki sienjam ban long ka jylla ba ai nuksa bad kaba pyni ïa ka jingpynryntih ïa ka jingkylla sha ka juk mynta bad ruh ka jingbat ïa ki rukom tynrai. Ka la ong ba lyngba ka jingwan ka FDI, ka jingshalan mar shabar bad ki briew kiba don sap, ka Meghalaya ka la kylla sha ka nongïalam ha ka roi ka par bad ka ai mynsiem ruh ïa kiwei.
title: BUH MAWNONGRIM KA PRESIDENT MURMU BAN TEI ÏA KA SHILLONG PEAK ROPEWAY

content: Ka Jylla Meghalaya ka la ïoh pdiang ïa ka National Startup Awards, 2022 kum shi bynta ka jingrakhe ïa ka National Startup Day kaba la long ha ka sngi Baar.Ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ïa kane ka khusnam hadien ba ka la shah jied kum ka Best Performer ha ki snem baladep.Kane ka jingjop ka dei ka thong ba ïohi jngai jong u Myntri Rangbah. Dang khyndiat snem, ka Jylla Meghalaya ka la mad ïa ki ar tylli ki jingïapher. Ha kawei ka liang ka Jylla ka don ïa ki nongshong shnong palat 72% kiba dang hapoh ka 35 snem ka rta. Ha kawei pat ka liang, ka don ruh ka jingduna ïohkam ban pynmih da ki karkhana.Kum u briew uba la long ruh u nongsengkam, u Conrad Sangma u la shim ïa ki sienjam ban pynkylla ïa ki samla kum ki nongsengkam ha ka jaka ki nongwadkam.  U la lamkhmat ruh ban pynsdang ïa ka Meghalaya Startup Policy 2018.  La wanrah nyngkong eh ïa kane ka jingthmu ban pynlong ïa ka jylla ka ‘India’s leading startup hub by 2023”.Da kaba beh ïa ka thong, ka Sorkar Jylla la pynbna paidbah ïa ka PRIME (Promotion & Incubation of Market-driven Enterprises) program ha u snem 2020 na ka bynta ka Startup Ecosystem. Ka Chief Minister’s E-Champion Challenge bad ka PRIME Incubation program ki dei ki ar tylli ki mawdong jong kane ka jingtrei shitom.Lyngba kane ka prokram la lah ban ai jingkyrshan kumba 5,500 ngut ki nongseng kam bad palat 200 ki Startups.  Bun na kine ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ki song jingïarap lyngba ka ram kaba khlem oh satia ïa ka sut.Ïa mynta bun tylli ki ‘PRIME Hubs’ kiba la seng ha kylleng ka jylla ha kaba ki nongsengkam ki ïoh ïa ka jingkyrshan na ka bynta ban pyntreikam ïa ki jingthmu ha ki kam ki jam. Kine ki PRIME Hubs ki long ruh kum ki jingplie lad ban pynïaid iew ïa ki mar ki mata ba la pynmih da ki nongsengkam ym tang ha ka jylla hynrei wat shabar ka jylla.Ha u bnai Nohprah 2023, ïa u soh ñiamtra la die paidbah tang ha ki lai sngi ha ka ‘Zest Fest’ kaba la long ha Bangalore. Shwa une u snem, u Sohtrun bad bad u shynrai Lakadong na ka jylla la pynïaid iew sha ki ri Middle East.Da kaba ithuh ïa ka jylla Meghalaya kum ka jylla kaba ai jait sha ki kynthei, 20% na ka jingkyrshan pisa la tyrwa lyngba ka PRIME program ba la mang kyrpang thik tang sha ki nongseng kam kynthei.  Bun na ki kynthei ki la ïoh  jingmyntoi na kane ka jingkyrshan bad ïa mynta ki pynïaid ïa ki shlem thaiñ jaiñ bad kiwei kiwei ki kam.Ban rah ïa ka PRIME program sha ka sienjam kaba bud, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynbna paidbah ïa ka CM-ELEVATE program ha u snem baladep, Ka thong jong kane ka prokram ka long ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki 20,000 hajar ngut ki nongseng kam ha ki san snem ki ban sa wan bad 35% haduh 75% ka jingai subsidy na ka bynta ka projek ha ki 15 tylli ki jait kam.  Ki nongaplai ïa kane ka skhim ki don mynta palat 30,000 ngut.Kum ka nonglamkhmat ha ka Top Performing State Award, ka Meghalaya ka la paw kum ka ‘Focus State’ ha ka World Food India 2023 kaba la long ha New Delhi ha u Naiwieng, 2023. Ha u Kyllalyngkot mynta u snem, ka Jylla ka la ïoh ïa ka khusnam kaba ar ha ka One District One Product (ODOP) Awards kaba la long ha Aatma Nirbhar Bharat Utsav 2024 ha New Delhi.Ïa kine ki jingtrei shitom jong ka jylla Meghalaya khamtam eh ha kaba kyrshan jingïarap pisa ïa ki Startups bad ïa ki Incubation & Mentorship la ai jingithuh ruh da ka Sorkar India. Ïa ka khusnam la pdiang da u Commissioner Secretary ka tnat Finance & Planning ka Sorkar Jylla u Dr. Vijay Kumar na u Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng uba peit ïa ka tnat Commerce & Industry u Piyush Goyal ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha New Delhi.
title: ÏOH PDIANG KA MEGHALAYA ÏA KA NATIONAL STARTUP AWARDS, 2022

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Ranikor Circle ha ka sngi Balang ka la maham ïa ki paidbah na kiwei ki distrik kiba thmu ban leit ïashim bynta ha ka Beach Festival harud ka Wah Kynshi ha ka shnong Ranikor ka ban sa long ha 19 tarik bad 20 tarik mynta u bnai ïa kaba la pynlong da ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei ka Sorkar Jylla, ba kim dei satia ban dih ne ban sum hapoh kane ka wah kaba tuid arsut lyngba ka shnong Ranikor.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President ka KSU Ranikor Circle, u samla Marconi Thongni u la kam ba bun ki briew ki bashong basah ha ka thaiñ Ranikor ki ngat ha ka jingpang Cancer bad u la ong ruh ba ka seng ka suba ba ka lah ban dei na ka jingjaboh jong ka wah Kynshi ha ka thaiñ Ranikor kaba ki nongshong shnong ki ju pyndonkam ban sum, ban dih bad ban bam ruh ïa ki dohkha kiba im hapoh kane ka wah.U la pynkynmaw ruh ba ha u snem 2010, ka shnong Ranikor ka la sakhi ïa ka jingïap them jong ki dohkha dohum hapoh ka Wah Kynshi ha ka shnong Ranikor bad ong ruh ba mynta kane ka wah kam don shuh wat tang kawei ruh ka dohkha kaba lah ban im namar ka jingjaboh jong ka wah ka la long shaba palat.U la ïathuh ba ka seng ka ladep ujor sha ka Sorkar halor ka jingkylla rong jyrngam jong ka Wah Kynshi hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba ka ophis jong ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board (MSBCP) kaba la leh test ïa ka um kam shym la pynmih paidbah satia ïa ka kaiphod la ka um ka long neem kaba bit ïa ki paidbah ban dih, bad ban sum ban sait.Ha kajuh ka por, ka seng ka la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban shna pynbha noh ïa ka surok kaba pynïasoh naduh ka shnong Mawsynram shaduh ka shnong Laitumsaw kaba la jot rathai haduh katta katta bad kaba la buh jingeh ïa ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan bad ha ka rah ka rong.U samla Marconi u la ong, “lada ka Sorkar ka bun pisa ban pynlut na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ki tamasa ka dei ruh ban pynlut pisa na ka bynta ban shna pynbha ïa kane ka surok kaba hap hapoh ka tnat PWD Mawsynram Division kaba la pynsyrtok haduh katta katta ïa ki paidbah nongleit nongwan.”
title: MAHAM KA KSU ÏA KIBA LEIT SHA KA BEACH FESTIVAL BAN YM DIH NE SUM HA WAH KYNSHI

content: : Ka North Eastern Council, Shillong kan pynlong ïa ka jingïalangbah kaba shi sngi ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai ha State Convention Centre, Shillong.U Chairman jong ka NEC u Amit Shah uba long ruh u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka ri un sa pynïaid ïa ka jingïalang.  Ha kane ka sngi, yn sa ïashim bynta lang da u Myntri ka DoNER, u G. Kishan Reddy uba longu Vice-Chairman jong ka NEC bad kynthup ruh u Myntri Khynnah jong ka DoNER u B.L. Verma lem bad kiwei kiwei ki heh ophisar jong ka tnat DoNER bad NITI Aayog na New DelhiBaroh ki Lat bad ki Myntri Rangbah jong ki Jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi bad kynthup ruh ïa ki Chief Secretary bad kiwei kiwei ki heh ophisar kin sa ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïalangbah.Kiwei kiwei ki tnat treikam ba kynthup ïa ka Assam Rifles, NEEPCo, NHIDCL, NEDFi, NERCORMS, NERAMAC, NEHHDCL, NESAC bad NIC kin sa ïashim bynta lang ha kane ka jingïalang.U Amit Shah un sa pyllait paidbah ïa ka NEC Year Book.Shi sngi shwa ban pynlong ïa kane ka jingïalang, kan sa don ka jingïakynduh ba kyrpang bad ki Chief Secretary jong ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi, ki Secretary jong ki Ministry ka Sorkar India, ki nongmihkhmat na ka NITI Aayog, u Director General (Assam Rifles) bad ki Planning Secretary jong ka NER.
title: YN WAN U AMIT SHAH SHA SHILLONG BAN ÏASHIM BYNTA HA KA JINGÏALANG KA NEC

content: Tura, K’lyngkot 17 :  Ka sngi kaba ar jong ka lympung ialehkai  5th Meghalaya Games ba la long ha sorbah  Ura, West Garo Hills District ka long ba la don kumba kato katne ki jait jingialehkai (discipline) kiba la poi noh sha kaba kut mynta ka sngi Balang jong ka taiew.Ki jingialehkai kiba la lah ban pynhap noh ia ka pyrda ka jong ki ka kynthup naduh ka Karate, Badminton, Swimming, Gymnastic, Golf.Ha baroh kine ki jingialehkai  lah ruh ban ong ba ki nam tam baroh kidei khambun na ka East Khasi Hills District.Lada ngin iaphai sha ka jingialehkai ia ka badminton, ka kynhun ki rang bad ki thei ialehkai na East Khasi Hills, ki la leit phai sha la iing bad kiba bun tylli ki nam jop, ha kaba ha ka jingialehkai kaba para marwei jong ki kynthei ka Netania T tariang ka la lah ba kan pynliem noh ia ka Shimtihum Lyngdoh ka West Khasi Hills bad ka takma rnong la khur ia ka da ka thei ialehkai kaba dei na West Khasi Jaintia Hills bad ka West Garo Hills, katba ha ka jingialehkai kaba shi jur ne ka doubles jong ki kynthei, ka nam jop ka leit sha ki shi jur ki thei ialehkai ka East Khasi Hills ba la mih madan da ka  Netaniya bad ka Caralinda Nongbri hadien ba ki la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka  Shimtihum  bad ia ka  Doreenzia Kharbani. Jong ka  bad iaka  takma rnong na kane ka jingiakob la khur da ki shi jur ki thei ialehkai jong ka West Jaintia bad West Garo Hills.Katba ka resol na ka jingialehkai jong ki shynran ka long ba haka jingiakhun kaba para marwei (singles) u lahduh dei u Reynel Kharbuki hadien ba u la lah ba un pynliem noh ia u Stephan Marwein  bad baroh arngut kidei jong ka East Khasi,  ka takma rnong na kane ka kyrdan iakhun ka leit sha ki rang ialekai jong ka Eastern West bad Ri-Bhoi, ha ka jingialehkai kaba shi jur (doubles)  u Reynel uba la mih madan lang bad u Prathan Majumdar ki la lah ban pynliem noh ia u Banshabor Lamare bad Lechan Suchiang. Ribhoi katba ka takma rnong la khur ia ki da ki nongialehkai ka West Garo Hills.: Ha ka jingialehkai Wushu kaba la long ha Don Bosco School la khur jingjop da ki district bapher bapher, watla ka East Khasi Hills ka dang dei ka district kaba la lah ban khur bun tylli ki jingjop.Tad haduh ban da wanlam ia kane khubor ka East Khasi Hills district ka la khur khyndai tylli ki takma ksiar ha ki kyrdan ialehkai bapher bapher.Ha ka sub junior boys (45 kg), ia ka takma ksiar la khur da ka Eastern West Khasi Hills hadien ba la la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka West Khasi Hills. Katba ia ka takma rnong la khur da ka East Khasi Hills bad ka South West Khasi Hills.Ha ka sub junior boys (35 kg), ka East Khasi Hills ka la lah ban pynliem noh ia ki nongiakhun kiba na South West Khasi Hills bad ia ka takma rnong la khur da ka Ribhoi.Ha ka junior boys (45 kg), ka South Garo Hills ka la khur ia ka takma ksiar hadien ba ka la jop ia ka West Khasi Hills, katba ia ki takma rnong la khur da ka East Khasi Hills bad East Jaintia Hills.Ha ka liang ka senior men (45 kg), ka Eastern West Khasi Hills ka la ah ban pynliem noh ia ka East Khasi Hills. Nalor kine ym shym la don shuh kiwei pat ki ban khur ia ka takma rnong hadien bay m don shuh ki nongialehkai ha kane ka kyrdan.Ha ka junior boys (45 kg), ka North Garo Hils ka la jop ia ka South West Khasi Hills. Ia ki takma rnong la khur da ka West Khasi Hills and East Khasi Hills.Ha ka junior girls (45 kg), ka East Jaintia Hills ka la khur ia ka takma ksiar, katba ka West Khasi Hills ka la khur ia ka takma rupa. Ia ka takma rnong la khur da ka Ribhoi bad ka West Garo Hills.Ha ka junior boys (48 kg), ka West Khasi Hills ka la khur ia ka takma ksiar hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka Eastern West Khasi Hills. Ka East Jaintia Hills bad ka South Garo Hills ki la khur ia ka takma rnong.Ha ka Junior girls (48 kg), ka East Khasi Hills ka la khur ia ka takma ksiar, ia ka takma rupa la khur da ka West Khasi Hills bad ka West Garo Hills ka la khur ia ka takmaHaba phai sha ka junior girls (52 kg) la khur da ka East Khasi Hills hadien ba la la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka West Khasi Hills. Ia ka takma rnong la khur da ka South West Khasi Hills bad ka South Garo Hills.Haba phai sha ki jingialehkai jong ka Karate, ka kynhun ialehkai jong ka East Khasi Hills District kynthup ia ki kynthei bad shynrang ki la ioh ban kin khur mar san tylli ki takma ksiar ha kaba kut jong ka jingiakhun jong ka Meghalaya Games ha Tura.Haba phai ha ka liang ki shynrang, ka East Khasi Hills ka la khur mar saw tylli ki takma ksiar bad rupa abd saw tylli ki takma rnong, katba ha ka liang ki kynthei ki la ioh ban kin khur san tylli ki takma ksiar, saw tylli ki takma rupa bd khyndai tylli ki takma rnong. Katba ka kynhun jong ka West Jaintia Hills District ka la wan ba-ar ha ka liang ki kynthei bad shynrang da kaba ki la ioh ban khur mar kawei ka takma ksiar bad rupa. Ka West Khasi Hills ka la wan balai hadien ba ka la khur tang kawei ka takma ksiar.: Ka Pdiangsuklang Syngwan bad u Banpynshngainlang Syngwan kiba long ruh ki ar ngut ki samla jngi um ba la mihkhmat ia ka Jylla h ooa ka lympung jong ka National Games kaba la long ha Goa ba la long ha u snem ba la leit, ki la long ki ar ngut ki nongialehkai kiba kynsai tat haduh ba kin da ioh ban khur ia ka nam Best Swimmer.Ha kaba kut jong ka jingiakop lada ngin ia phai sha ka jingioh khur takma ka kynhun ialehkai ka East Khasi Hills District ka la ioh ba kan khur 11 tylli ki takma ksiar, 11 ki takma rupa bad 10 tylli ki takma rnong. Bud pat sa ka South West Khasi Hills District kaba la wan ba-ar hadien ba ka la khur mar ar tylli ki takma ksiar bad rupa lem bad 3 tylli ki takma rnong. Katba kiwei kiwei pat ki district kiba kynthup ia ka Eastern West Khasi Hills, East Garo Hills District  bad ka East Jaintia  Hills District kim shym la lah satia ban ioh khur ia ki takma.:  Lada ngin ia phai pat sha ka jingialehkai ka Gymnastic, ki nam tam ne nongialehkai ba kynsai na kiba kynsai tam (all round champion) ha kane ka lympung ialehkai jong ka Meghalaya Games kaba 5 ba la long ha Tura  ki long ba na ka liang ki shynrang dei u  Mebantei Lyngdoh Marshillong bad na ka liang ki kynthei pat kane ka nam ka la leit sha ka Wansuk Merry Susngi, kaba dei ha ka kyrdan jong ka all round champion mini group,  katba ka Wandalang B Malngiang ka la ioh ba kan rah ia ka nam ha ka kyrdan jong  kiba la heh (senior).: Lada ngin ia phai pat sha ka iakob ia lympat ne ka wrestling, ka khubor ka jingmih paw jong ka sap ba nylla ka long na ka Ringchi K Sangma , Upper Wadanang, West Garo Hill, ka khynnah kaba dang 19 snem ka rta bad kaba pule ha Govt. Boys Higher Secondary School.Kum ka nongialehkai ka Ringchi ka dang shu sdang ban pynleit jingmut ha kane ka jingialehkai hadien ba ka la pyniasnoh ialade bad ka synjuk jong ka Wrestling Association of WGHD kaba don tang kum,ba 23 ngut ki nongialehkai bad ba dang shu seng artad ia ka dang shi bnai mynshwa.Ka  Ringchi, ka la ioh ia ka jingshah hikai ha ki coach jong ka synjuk bad dei tad hynnin ka sngi, ba katta ka jingim ialehkai wrestling ka jong ka, ka la sdang ba kan mih paw hadien ba ka la ioh ba kan kiew rynsan nyngkong eh ban aireng pyrshah ia kiwei pat ki thei samla
title: 5TH  MEGHALAYA GAMES: IAI TBEH KI SAMLA KA EKHD BAN IOH RAH IA KA THONG HA KIBA BUN KI JINGÏAKHUN

content: : Ki rang bad ki thei lehkai Taekwondo na East Khasi Hills district sa shisien biang ki la ioh khur ia ki takma ksiar ha baroh ki jinglehkai Taekwondo ia kaba la pynlong ha Montfort Centre ha Tura ha ka Meghalaya Games 2024.Ha ka kyrdan Junior Girls’ Kyorugi hapoh 46 kilo, ka Ibapyhnun Kharmyndai na East Khasi Hills ka la pynliem noh ia ka thei ialehkai na South West Garo Hills’ ka Joynilla Ch Sangma katba ka Nokgrikchi G. Momin bad ka Jheanchim B. Marak ki la ioh khur ia ki takma rnong.Ha ka kyrdan Junior Girls’ kyorugi hapoh 42 kilo, ka Dayalanki Challan na West Khasi Hills ka la pynliem noh ia ka Sritee Kumari na West Jaiñtia Hills bad ioh khur ia ka takma ksiar katba ka Aurialla Wasabi K. Marak bad ka Jaksal Arimchi T. Sangma ki la ioh khur ia ki takma rnong.Ha ka jinglehkai kaba khatduh ha ka kyrdan Junior Boy’s Kyorugi hapoh 45 kilo u Ravi Kumar Rai na East Khasi Hills u la pynliem noh ia u Areyo M. Sangma na East Garo Hills bad ioh khur ia ka takma ksiar katba u Kreangbeth A. Sangma na West Garo Hills bad u Samir Chetri ki la ioh khur ia ka takma rnong.
title: MEGHALAYA GAMES 2024: KHUR TAKMA KSIAR KI NONGLEHKAI TAEKWONDO NA EAST KHASI HILLS

content: Tura, January 18: In the heart of Nongstoin, situated in West Khasi Hills a hidden gem was discovered in the form of Mebanrilang Lyngdoh Marshillong, a passionate 17-year-old young individual who stumbled upon his love for Callisthenics (an artistic sport that combines dancing, gymnastics, ballet, and apparatus work) through online videos. With very little technical knowledge, he garnered attention for his outstanding abilities, leading to an invitation from the Meghalaya Gymnastics Association to join their ranks for advanced training. Little did he know that this newfound passion would not only transform his life but also bring glory to the entire community. At the ongoing 5th Meghalaya Games in Tura, Meban has wowed the audience with three Gold Medals.Mebanrilang’s journey began with humble practice sessions with friends, documented and shared on platforms like Instagram. The digital era played a pivotal role in making this talent attract the eye of none other than the Meghalaya Gymnastics Association. Recognizing Meban’s exceptional potential and dedication, the Meghalaya Gymnastics Association eagerly embraced him into their fold. In a mere three months of intensive training and preparation, Mebanrilang underwent a remarkable transformation – evolving from a small-town enthusiast to the overall champion of the prestigious 5th Meghalaya Games. His golden triumphs in the Men’s Open Category, Vaulting Table, and Floor Exercise at the Meghalaya Games were not just personal victories but a testament to the synergy of talent and dedication.Understanding the importance of nurturing budding talent, the Gymnastic Association sought the expertise of a seasoned coach from Assam. Over a 30-day training period, the coach witnessed first-hand the extraordinary potential and eagerness to learn displayed by Meghalaya’s emerging athletes. The dedicated efforts of these young athletes not only met but surpassed expectations, paving the way for unprecedented success.However, Meban’s ambitions extend far beyond local triumphs. With a vision set on the national and international stages, he aspires to elevate Callisthenics to new heights in Meghalaya. His dream is not just personal but collective, set with an aim to inspire more residents to embrace the transformative power of sports.It is due to the unwavering commitment of these young sportspersons along with the determined focus that the Government of Meghalaya is putting on Sports, for the state’s youth, these young talents are poised to make a resounding impact on the gymnastics scene, carrying the hopes and aspirations of an entire community. As they set their sights on higher stages, Mebanrilang’s journey becomes a beacon of inspiration, proving that dreams, when nurtured with dedication and support, can truly take flight.
title: VAULTING DREAMS: MEBANRILANG’S LEAP FROM AN ENTHUSIAST TO A GYMNASTICS CHAMPION, BAGS 3 GOLD MEDALS

content: Ka jingai mynsiem bad ka jingkmen ka la paw ha ka Meghalaya Games 2024 haba ka Kong Marbarisha M. Pdah, 44 snem ka rta ka la hap ban pynbit pynbiang ialade ban iakhun ha ka jinglehkai syndah lang bad ka khun kynthei ka samla Toiaibha M. Pdah, 24 snem ka rta bad kine arngut kin iakhun lang ha ka jingiakob siat suloi ha ka Senior Women’s Category ha ka 10meter bad 50 meter Rifle event bad kawei pat kan dei ha ka 10 meter bad 25 meter Pistol event.Ka jingiaid lynti jong kine arngut ka pyni shai ia ka jingkhlaiñ jong ka iing ka sem ban iaid ryngkat lang na ka bynta ban pynurlong ia ka jingphohsniew ka jong ki. Kane baroh ka la wan urlong hadien ba ka kong Marbarisha ka la sngew ioh mynsiem na ka jingsngewtynnad jong ka khun ban siat pistol bad katba ki shalyntem ka por ki nang tyllun, ka Kong Marbarisha ka ju ialam ia la ka khun ban leit pyntbit ha ka jinghikai siat pistol.Haba iohi ba ka khun ka la nang kiew ha ka jingialehkai ha ki jingiakhun bapher bapher, ka kong Marbarisha ka la sdang ban mih shakhmat ha ki kam lehkai. “Haba nga iohi ia ka Toiaibha ba ka ieng ha ka nongrim ban poi sha ka thong, kane ka pynskuiñ ia ka mynsiem jong nga bad nga sngewthuh ba kam pat dier ka por ban beh ia ka thong bad ban bud ia ka jingphohsniew,” ong ka Kong Marbarisha, haba kren shuwa ban iakhun ha ka 5th Meghalaya Games.“Ka Meghalaya Games ka ai ia ngi ia ka kabu ban mih madan lang bad ban wanrah burom ia ka jylla,” ka la bynrap.Ka samla Toiaibha ka la pynpaw da kaba ong, “Kum ka khynnah skul, nga ju don bynta kum ka NCC cadets bad dei nangne ba nga la sdang ban sngewtynnad ia ka jingiasiat suloi. I mei i ju ai mynsiem ia nga ban leit sha ki NCC camps bad i ju ai mynsiem ruh ba ngan iaid beit shakhmat ha ki jinglehkai siat suloi. Ha u snem 2016, nga ioh ia ka phone call na ka paralok bad ka la wer ia nga ban rung dkhot ha ka Shooting Association. Ka dei ka jingkwah jong i mei ba ngan long ka nonglehkai. I ju synran ia nga da leit lehkai ha Assam Rifles kaba don ha Happy Valley, Shillong. Ha kaba nyngkong, i ju sngew artatien ban rung lang ban lehkai namar ka rta, hynrei i ju synran ia nga sha ki State/National Championship.”
title: MEGHALAYA GAMES 2024: ÏALEHKAI LANG KA KMIE BAD KA KHUN HA KA SIAT SULOI

content: U Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Sorkar Pdeng u Amit Shah ha ka sngi Palei u la plie paidbah ïa ka Cyber Security Operations Centre ha Headquarter jong ka Assam Rifles ha Laitkor, Shillong ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Director General Assam Rifles u Lt. Gen P.C Nair.Ka Cyber Security Operations Centre kan pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka Cyber Security jong kane ka tnat shipai na ka bynta ban peitngor, ban ïada na ki jingma kiba wan nabar bad ban khanglad ïa ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka Assam Rifles Wide Area Network (ARWAN).Ka Cyber Security Operations Centre ka dei kaba la pyndait da ki kor ki bor jong ka Art Network & Data Monitoring Devices kaba treikam baroh arphew saw kynta.Kane ka Centre ka dei kaba nyngkong eh ban pyntreikam da ki bor pahara ka Sorkar Pdeng.  Ka jingkynrei ki Cyber Crime ha kine ki sngi kan ïada na ki riew sniew kiba donkti ban leh ïa ki kam bymman.U Myntri u la ïaroh ïa ka jingtrei shitom jong ka tnat shipai Assam Rifles kaba la pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ki kor ki bor hapoh kane ka tnat shipai.
title: PLIE U AMIT SHAH ÏA KA CYBER SECURITY OPERATIONS CENTRE HA HQ KA ASSAM RIFLES

content: Tura, Kyllalyngkot 18 : Ban pynim bad ban ri kyndong ia ki jingriewspah ka kolshor ki jaitbynriew ka jylla, ka sorkar Meghalaya ha ka sien nyngkong eh, ka la wanrah ia ki jinglehkai tynrai kum ka Rah Moo Khrah, Mawpoiñ bad Wa.Pong Sika ha ka 5th Meghalaya Games 2024. Ia kine ki jinglehkai tynrai la pynlong ha Don Bosco School, Tura. Kine ki jinglehkai ki iarap ban pyniar bad ban tip kham bha ia ki kolshor na ka bynta ki pateng jong ki Khasi, Garo bad Jaintia.Ka Rah Moo Khrah, ka jinglehkai tynrai na Jaintia Hills kadei ka jinglehkai ha kba ki nongshim bynta ki rah ia u maw ba pyllun ba khia naduh 24.4 kg haduh 138.10 Kg. U Da Oo Hi Dhar na West Jaintia Hills u la long u lahduh bad u la ioh Ia ka nam “Ki Mar” bad khur syndon ia ka takma ksiar. Katkum ka jingkheiñ ki mynbarim, ia kino kino kiba lah ban rah ia kine ki maw ba khia shaduh bakut, la kheiñ ia ki kum kingest man, bad kiba khlaiñ tam bad u Da Oo Hi Dhar lived up to the expectations. U Me-U-Ru Suna na West Jaintia Hills u la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba ar bad u Vincent Bareh na East Khasi Hills u la wan ha ka kyrdan kaba lai.Ha ka Wa.Pong Sika, la tip ia ka kum ka jinglehkai ba pawnam ki jaitbynriew Garo, ka pynkynmaw ia ki riewkhraw kum u Dikki Bandi, Gilsang Dalbot bad u Togan Nengminja Sangma. Ki arngut ki nonglehkai ki bat ia uwei u siej ba jrong 6 phut bad ki ialeh ban tan ne ban niat iwei ia iwei katba rem. U namtam ha kane ka jinglehkai u long u Pangrak R Marak na West Garo Hills katba arngut ki ranglehkai na West Jaintia Hills ki la ioh ha ka kyrdan ba ar bad balai.Ha ka jinglehkai Mawpoiñ, ka jinglehkai kaba kawei pa kawei ka longiing ha ri lum Khasi ki ju mih ban lehkai da kaba pynieng ia ki maw rit ban pynrem ia kawei pat ka kynhun. Ha kane ka jinglehkai, ka kynhun na East Khasi Hills ka la khur ia ka jingjop na ka liang ki kynthei bad shynrang. Ki rang bad ki thei ialehkai na West Garo Hills ki la ioh khur ia ka namjop kaba ar katba ki rang bad ki thei ialehkai ka West Jaintia Hills ki la ioh khur ia ka namjop kaba lai.U myntri ka sorkar jylla ba dei khmih ia ka tnad Sports & Youth Affairs, u bah Shakliar Warjri, u la ong”, “Ngi shim ia ka rai ban wanrah ia kine ki jinglehkai ban pynim bad ban ri kyndong ia ki jingriewspah ka kolshor ki jaitbynriew ka jylla, ban ai mynsiem ia ki samla bad ban pynsngewthuh ia ka jingkordor kiba ki mynbarim ki la ai.”
title: KA MAWPOIÑ, RAH MOO KHRAH BAD WA.PONG SIKA HA KA 5TH MEGHALAYA GAMES 2024

content: Ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit hapoh ka jingïalam jong u State President u Rikman Momin bad u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Alexander L. Hek ki la leit ban ïakynduh ïa u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Sorkar Pdeng u Amit Shah ha Shillong ha ka janmiet sngi Balang.Ki nongïalam ka party ki la ïohlad ban ïakren bad ban pynsngew hakhmat u Amit Shah halor ki mat jingdawa jong ka jylla kum ka jingpynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra, ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) bad ka jingplie ïa ka lynti ïaid sha ka iew ïadie ïathied jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi lynga ka jylla Meghalaya ïa kaba u Amit Shah ula sngap thuh bad u la kohnguh ba un bishar bniah halor kine ki mat.U Amit Shah u la khot sngewbha ruh ïa ki nongïalam Niam jong ka jylla sha nongbah Delhi hapoh ka jingïalam jong u State President bad u Bah A L Hek ban ïakren halor ki jingdonkam kiba ïadei bad ka FCRA bad ïa ka jingai jaka ha nongbah Delhi sha ka KJP Synod.
title: HAKHMAT U AMIT SHAH PYNSNGEW KA BJP MEGHALAYA ÏA KI MAT JINGDAWA KA JYLLA

content: Tura, K’lyngkot 18 : Ka jingialehkai phutbol Under-18 ki kynthei bad shynrang jong ka Meghalaya Games kan jam sha ka final ka ban long lashai ka sngi ka 19 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024 ha ka PA Sangma Stadium, Tura. Ha kane ka kynti ka kynhun ki thei bad ki rang ialehkai ka Ri Bhoi District ki la jam sha ka final.Ha ka jingiakhun semi final ki kynthei, ka Ri Bhoi District bad ka East Khasi Hills District ki la jam sha ka phainal hadien ba ki la lah ban pynliem ia ka Eastern West Khasi Hills bad ka South West Khasi Hills.Haba phai sha ki jingiakhun kiba la long mynta ka sngi ha PA Sangma Stadium, Tura, ki thei ialehkai ka Ri-Bhoi District ki la lah ha ka ban pynliem noh ia ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District da 5-1.Ka nam tam ha kane ka jingiakhun dei ka Imaia Shylla kaba marwei ka la ioh ba kan thep haduh 4 tylli ki kol bad sa shi kol la thep ia ka da ka Rimika Khongkai, katba ia ka shi kol naka bynta ka Eastern West la thep ia ka da ka Rympeibasuk Syiemlieh.Katba na ka liang ki thei ialehkai jong ka East Khasi Hills ki la lah ban pynliem noh da 5-0 ia ka South West Khasi Hills, kaba hangne ka nam tam jong ka jingiakhun dei ka Inrilaidor Khongthaw, kaba la ioh ban thep ar kol, bad ia ki kol kiba sah la thep ia ki da Melaribha Lyngdoh, Ibashembha Khongsit bad ka Ideibanrishisha Kharpan.Katba ha ka jingiakhun jong ki shynrang, ka kynhun ialehkai jong ka Ri Bhoi District ki la pynliem noh ia ka East Khasi Hills da 2-1 kol, ha kaba ia ki ar kol ka Ri Bhoi la thep da u Fairwin Nongkseh bad u Melvern Lyngkhoi, ia ka shi kol jong ka East Khasi Hills la thep da u Rodrygo Sympli.Katba ka West Jaintia Hills ka la lah ban pynliem ia ka West Garo Hills da 2-0 kol bad ia kine ki kol la thep da u Dawansalanmi Malang bad u Tiros Kyndait.Kumta kaba sah ka long ba ka jingiakhun ia ka kyrdan kaba lai jong ki kynthei kan long hapdeng ka Eastern West Khasi Hills pyrshah ia ka South West Khasi Hills ha ka por 12:30 mynsngi bad ha ka por 2:30 nohphai sngi ka jingiakhun kan long hapdeng ki rang ka East Khasi Hills pyrshah ia ka West Garo Hills.Katba ka final jong kane ka jingiakhun kan long ha ka por 5 baje janmiet ha kaba ki thei ka Ri Bhoi kin aireng pyrshah ia ka East khasi Hills bad ha ka por 7 baje janmiet ki rang ka Ri Bhoi Distrcit kin ia aireng pyrshah ia ki West Jaintia Hills.”
title: RUNG KI RANG BAD KI THEI KA RI BHOI SHA KA FINAL KA FOOTBALL MEGHALAYA GAMES, YN AIRENG PYRSHAH IA KA EAST KHASI HILLS BAD WEST JAINTIA HILLS

content: Ka 5th Meghalaya Games 2024 ka la lah ban sei ia ki rang bad ki thei kiba snar kiba la iakhun ha ka Weightlifting bad ha kane ka jinglehkai ki nonglehkai ki la wan poi na kylleng ki district ban iakhun ban rah ia ka namjop.Ka Ri Bhoi ka la sei ia ki nongjop ha ka jingiakhun da kaba khur haduh hynriew tylli ki takma ksiar katba ka East Khasi Hills, West Garo Hills, bad South-West Khasi Hills ki la ioh mar kawei ka takma ksiar.Ka Ri Bhoi ka la long ka lahduh ha ka Weightlifting, da kaba khur 6 tylli ki takma ksiar ha kaba na ka liang ki shynrang kiba iakhun ha ka 73 kg, u Anasthasius Ryndongsngi u la ioh khur haduh 107 points bad ha ka wat kaba ar da 112 points kaba la biang pura ia u ban ioh khur haduh 219 point. U Wanbhabianglang Thabah, u Laikmenlang Kharkongor bad u David Lyngdoh ki la long ki lahduh ha ka 61 kg, 55 kg bad 40 kg.Ki nonglehkai ka East Khasi Hills ka la ioh khur ia ka takma ksiar ha ka kyrdan 81 kg lyngba u Edegar Benneth Jana uba la ioh khur 140 points.Na West Garo Hills ha ka jingiakhun ha ka kyrdan 67 kg, u Raksil N Sangma, u la ioh khur 142 points bad ioh ia ka takma ksiar katba na South-West Khasi Hills ka la don tang uwei ba ioh ban khur ia ka takma ksiar.Ka jingjop jong ka 5Meghalaya Games, 2024 ka dei ka sakhi jong ka jingkiew ki kam ialehkai bad kilan met kaba ap ia ka lawei ba phyrnai jong ka jylla.Ha ka jingiakren bad uwei na ki nongialehkai rahnar ba la paw pyrthei, uba la jop ia ka takma Rupa ha ka Olympics bad ka takma ksiar jong ka Commonwealth Games u Robert Kabbas uba dei ruh u nonghikai bad u nongai mynsiem jong ka Meghalaya Elite Pathway program u la ong, “ka rukom pyniaid ia ka 5Meghalaya Games ka long kaba paka bha. Nga ai khublei ia ki nongialehkai baroh. Ka Weightlifting ka dei ka jingialehkai kaba biang bha ha ka Jylla ba ka jingdon ryngkatlang jong nga kan pynpoi ia kine ki khynnah sha ka thong bad ngi kyrmen shisha ba kin poi sha ka thong.”
title: MEGHALAYA GAMES 2024: 6 TYLLI KI TAKMA KSIAR KHUR KA RI BHOI NA KA WEIGHTLIFTING

content: : Ki Pulit jong ka Tura Police Station ha ka sngi thohdieng ki la kem ia uwei u briew uba la rung jubor hapoh ka Pa Togan Nengminza Athletic Stadium, Tura bad pynjulor ia katto katne ki bynta jong ka madan mareh sports.  Hadien ba la kem ia une u briew, ki Pulit ki la rah noh sha thanat na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit.Ka Director jong ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ka la ong, “ka jingpynjulor bad ka jingpynjot ia ki mar nongkynti jong ka Sorkar ka dei ka kam bymman kaba ngat ha ka jingshah pynshitom. Lah ruh ban kdew hangne ba kum kine ki jingleh beaiñ ka long kum ka jingpynjot ia ki jingmyntoi ba la mang kyrpang na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki paidbah bad ka jingkyntiew ia ka sports.”“Ka Pa Togan Nengminza Athletic Stadium, Tura ka long ka shlem ba kongsan bha na ka bynta ki nongialehkai sports jong ka thaiñ, ki khynnah bad ki samla jong ka Tura kiba angnud ban pyntbit ialade ha ka jingialehkai sports, nalor ba ia kane ka madan la ainam sha u nongialeh laitlaid.  Kane ka jingleh riewkhlaaw, ym tang ba ka long ka jingpynjulor ia u Athletic Track hynrei ka long kum ka jingkhanglad ia ka jingangnud jong ki khynnah, kaba pynpaw ruh ia ka jingbym don jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ka imlang ka sahlang,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.“La kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin long kiba peitngor bad ban ai jingtip lada ki lap ia kino kino ki jingpynjulor ia kane ka madan ialehkai kaba la shna khnang na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ka imlang ka sahlang.  Ka jingiatreilang bad ka jingkitkhlieh lang jong ka imlang ka sahlang ka long kaba donkam ban pynneh pynsah bad ban iada ia ki nongkynti u paidbah,” la ong shuh shuh ka Director.
title: RUNG JUBOR U BRIEW HA STADIUM TURA, PYNJULOR ÏA KA MADAN MAREH SPORTS

content: U MLA ka Mawlai Constituency Bah Brightstar Marbaniang hadien ka jingiatakhuh bad ki bor Pulit ha ka jingthmu ban leit tur sha Secretariat ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingbym pyndem jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdawa ban thung biang ia ki lain gut ki ophisar ba la weng na ka Meghalaya Lokayukta.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Thohdieng, u Bah Bright u la pynpaw ba ia kane ka mat kin sa iakren shwa hapoh ka party bad kin sa shim ia ka rai ban leh ia kaba donkam halor ka jingiatakhuh bad ki pulit.Shwa kane, ki nongialam ryngkat bad ki lai ngut ki MLA jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ki la shah pakhang lynti ha ki Majistor bad ha ki bor Pulit katba ki dang thmu ban pynlong ia ka jingshong kyllaiñ myngngor hakhmat ka ophis Secretariat.Ha kaba sdang u MLA ka Mawlai u Bah Brightstar Marbaniang u la shah pakhang lynti ha ki Pulit haduh ba ka la mih ka jingpyni bor bad ki Pulit.  Ha kawei pat ka liang ki Pulit ki la kyndit ban iohi ba MLA ka North Shillong Constituency Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la wan poi hakhmat Secretariat lem bad ki nongialam bad na ka liang ki Majistor kiba byrngem ban thep ha bus ban kit sha Madan Malki lada u Bah Adelbert um treh ban mih nakhmat ka Secretariat.Halor ka jingbym ailad jong ki bor pyniaid synshar District ban tur wat tang ki lai ngut ki MLA sha Secretariat, ki nongialam jong ka VPP ki hap ban shu shong harud surok mar pyrshah ka ophis Deputy Commissioner.Ki nongialam jong ka VPP, ki la pynpaw ba kane ka dang dei tang ka jingsdang bad nangne shakhmat kin dang pynjur shuh shuh ia ki mat jingdawa kiba dei na ka jingmyntoi jong ki paidbah.
title: BA SHAH PATRONG HA KI PULIT, YN LEH U MLA KA MAWLAI IA KABA DONKAM

content: Tura, K’lyngkot 19: Tang ha ka rta kaba 21 snem ka samla Phyrnai Kyndait, na East Jaintia Hills bad kaba dang pule ha ka 4th semester Bachelor of Arts, ka la tyngshaiñ ha ka jingialehkai niah saikil ha ka 5th Meghalaya Games ha Tura.Ka jingieid jong ka samla Phyrnai ban niah saikil ka la paw naduh ba ka dang rit ha ki por ba ka dang niah tang da i saikil lai shaka bad nangne ka la kiew ha ka jingialehkai. Ha u snem 2022, ka la ioh ia ka lad ban iakhun nyngkong eh ha kawei ka lympung ba la pyniaid da ka West Jaintia Adventure Cycling Association ha Jowai.Ha kane ka lympung, ka la ioh khur ia ka jingjop bad ka la lah ruh ban poi ha ka thong niah saikil na Jowai shaduh Amlarem bad kam sangeh tang hangne hynrei ka la kiew ruh ha ki kyrdan ba shajrong wat ha Mawkyrwat ba la pyniaid da ka Meghalaya Cycling Association.Ka la ioh ban mihkhmat ruh ia ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka jingiakop jong ka MTB Tawang National CFI kaba la pynlong ha Tawang, bad hangne ka la ioh khur ia ka takma ksiar. Ka jingiaid lynti jong ka samla Phyrnai Kyndait na ka nongniah saikil ba paw tang ha shnong, da ka jingtrei shitom ka la long ruh ka nongniah saikil wat ha satlak ka pyrthei.Ha u snem ba ladep, ka la iakhun ha ka 4th Meghalaya Games bad ka la jop ha ka kyrdan baar bad mynta u snem ha ka 5th Meghalaya Games, ka la ioh syndon ban khur ia ka takma ksiar ha ka jingiakhun jong ka XCO women open category/Mass start.Ka samla Phyrnai ka la ai khublei ia ki kmie ki kpa, ia ki bahaiing hasem khamtam ia u hynmen uba ju ai mynsiem ia ka ha ka jingiaid lynti kum ka thei ialehkai.  U hynmen jong ka, uba dei ruh u nongniah saikil u long u paia baskhem na ka bynta ka samla Phyrnai bad dei lyngba ka saikil u hynmen ka sa jop ia ka thong.Ka samla Phyrnai kam ju phaidien na ki jingeh bad jingjynjar bad haba ai jingkren ka la ong ba lada ka leit shabar ban iakhun ha ki rynsan, ka ju kynduh ia kiwei pat ki para nongialehkai ba kham tbit bad lada ia nujor, ki kham biang ki tiar ki tar ban ia ki saikil ba na shane bad haba ka wan na ka longing kaba sngewrit, ka long ka jingeh ia ki ban ioh ia ki saikil kiba biang ki tiar ki tar namar ki la kham rem.Khlem kano kano ka jingshah hikai, ka ju iaid marwei ha ka jingim kum ka thei ialehkai niah saikil bad ka ju niah kai tang bad ki paralok bad manla ka step ka ju mareh step kumba 5-10 kilometer bad ka ju niah saikil manla ka step bad por janmiet kumba ar kynta eiei.
title: KHLEM JINGSHAH HIKAI, JOP KA SAMLA BA DANG 21 SNEM HA KA IAKOB ÑIAH CYCLE

content: Lai ngut ki MLA jong ka Voice of the People Party ryngkat bad ki nongkitkam kiba hakhmat jong ka party kynthup ruh ki nongkyrshan ha ka step sngi thohdieng ki la pynkheiñ ia ka Section 144 ba la pynjari da ki bor synshar ka East Khasi Hills District sawdong ka jylli jong ka Secretariat da kaba thmu ban pynlong ia ka jingiakhih da kaba shong kyllaiñ myngngor ban dawa ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ialam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ba kan thung biang ia ki lai ngut ki ophisar ba la shah weng kum ki dkhot jong ka Meghalaya Lokayukta.Lai ngut ki ophisar ba la shah wengkam ki long u Director of Inquiry and Prosecution u Bah J. Rymmai, uba dei u Ophisar IPS barim; u Enquiry-cum-Investigating Officers Bah R. Pde bad u Anil K. Sangma.Ka NPP bad ka Sorkar ki la pynshai ba ka jingwengkam ia ki lai ngut ki ophisar ba la shongthait na ka Meghalaya Lokayukta ka dei kaba la leh katkum ki kyndon jong ka Lokayukta Act bad ia ka thup jong ki kyrteng ba thymmai ladep phah da ka Sorkar sha ka Lokayukta.Ka mana jong ki bor synshar ka East Khasi Hills District ban khang ia ka jingiakhih paidbah hakhmat ka Secretariat ka long namar ka jingwan poi jong u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Sorkar Pdeng u Amit Shah bad ki Myntri Rangbah jong ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ban iashim bynta ha ka jingialangbah kaba shi sngi jong ka North Eastern Council (NEC) kaba la long ha State Convention Centre, Shillong ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Ki Majistor bad ki Pulit kiba la syrtap ia ka Secretariat ki la pakhang lynti ia ki nongialam jong ka VPP katba ki dang thmu ban tur sha Secretariat.  Dei tang u MLA ka VPP na North Shillong Constituency Bah Adelbert Nongrum marwei bad ki nongsynran kiba la iohlad ban tur shakhmat Secretariat bad kane ka la pynkyndit ia ki Pulit ki bym shym la poi pyrkhat satia.Ka kynhun ba ialam da u MLA ka Mawlai u Bah Brighstarwell Marbaniang bad u MLA ka Mawryngkneng u Bah Heavingstone Kharpran ki la shah pakhang lynti ha ki Pulit hakhmat ka ophis Deputy Commissioner.Ka la mih ruh ka jingiapyni bor hapdeng ki Pulit bad ki MLA, ki nongialam lem bad ki nongkyrshan jong ka VPP.Namar ka jingpyneh jong ki Magistor bad ki bor Pulit, ki MLA bad ki dkhot jong ka VPP ki la shu pynlong tang ka jingshong kyllaiñ mynngor hakhmat ka ophis Deputy Commissioner.U Bah Brighstarwell ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, katba ka Sorkar kam pat pyndem ka party kan dang iai bteng ban pynlong ia ka jingiakhih tad haduh ba kan da thungkam biang ia ki lai ngut ki Ophisar ba la shah wengkam na ka Meghalaya Lokayukta.
title: RAI KA VPP BAN ÏAKHUN TAD HADUH BAN DA THUNGKAM BIANG ÏA KI OPHISAR HA KA LOKAYUKTA

content: Ka kynhun ki nongïalam ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit ba la lamkhmat da u President u Rikman G. Momin bad u Bah Alexander L. Hek ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la iakynduh ia u Archbishop jong ka Shillong Archdiocese u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh ha Archbishop’s House, Laitumkhrah bad aiti ha u ia ka Revered Akshat bad ia ka shithi khot sngewbha na ka bynta ka jingplie paidbah ia ka Shree Ram Mandir.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka BJP ka la pyntip ba u Archbishop Victor Lyngdoh u la pynpaw ba un sa leit jngoh ia ka Ram Mandir ha Ayodhya bad ai ruh ka jingkyrkhu kyrdoh na ka bynta kane ka jingthmu.
title: KHOT SNGEWBHA KA BJP ÏA U ARCHBISHOP VICTOR SHA KA JINGPLIE ÏA KA RAM MANDIR

content: Tura, Kyllalyngkot 19 : Ka jingialehkai jong ka jingiakhun kti kam lah khlem da pynhun hi jrut ia ki paidbah nongpeitkai ha Don Bosco Junior College Indoor Arena. Ka jingiakhun kti ka long kaba shongkun ha ka final ha kaba ki nongshim bynta ki la sei la ka buit ka bor ban jop ha kane ka lympung.Hadpeng ka jinglehkai, ka East Khasi Hills bad South-West Khasi Hills ki la wan hakhlieh duh ha ka jingiakhein point da kaba khur mar artylli ki takma ksiar katba ka West Khasi Hills, Eastern West Khasi Hills, West Jaintia Hills bad East Garo Hills ki la ioh mar kawei ka takma ksiar.Ha ka jingiakhun jong ki kynthei hapoh ka jingjia 55 kg, 60 kg bad 60 kg shajrong, ka kong Pynsuklang Lyngdoh na Eastern Wet Khasi Hills, Olivia Dkhar na West Jaintia Hills bad Rikka Ch Marak na East Garo Hills ki la sei la buit ka bor ka jong ki bad ki la ioh ban khur ia ka jingjop. Na ka liang ki shynrang, u Brandon Tariang na East Khasi Hills u la jop ha ka jingkhia 85 kg, u Mebansan Sangma na South-West Khasi Hills u la jop ha ka jingkhia 85 kg.Na ka bynta ka nam Champion of Champions, la ioh ban khur da u bah Pynskhemborlang Marngar na West Khasi Hills ha ki kyrdan jong ki shynrang ha ka jingkhia kaba 75 kg bad na ka liang ki kynthei la ioh ban khur da ka Olivia Dkhar na West Jaintia Hills ha ka jingkhia kaba 60 kg.U Deputy Commissioner, u Jagdish Chelani, IAS, u la ong ba ka long ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ba ka arm wrestling ka la rung ha ka thup jong ka Meghalaya Games bad ka Meghalaya Games ka la wanrah shibun ki jingmyntoi na ka bynta ki nongialehkai, ki rang bad ki thei ialehkai.
title: PAW BAD TYNGSHAIN KI RANG BAD KI THEI IAKHUN KTI NA EAST KHASI HILLS HA KA 5TH MEGHALAYA GAMES

content: Ha ka jingiakop siatkhnam (Archery) ki jingialehkai ki la jam sha ka kylla iakhun phainal ha ka Meghalaya Games ha kaba baroh ki jingiakhun na ka bynta ban iaknieh ia ka nam lahduh yn pynlong ha ka sngi Saitjain ha madan ialehkai jong ka Montfort Centre of Education School, Tura.Ki kynhun kiba la jam sha ka phainal ha ka Indian Round jong ki kynthei ne Women Team Event ki long ka West Khasi Hills District bad ka East Khasi Hills District. Katba ha ka jingialehkai kynhun jong ki shynrang ne Men Team Event ki long ka East Khasi Hills District bad ka South West Khasi Hills District.Ha ka Mixed Team jong ka Revurve ki long ka South West Khasi Hills District bad ka West Jaintia Hills. Katba ha ka Indian Round (Mixed Team) ki long ka East Khasi Hills District bad ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District.Ia ka takma rnong ha ka Women Team Event kaba la long ha ka sngi Thohdieng, la ioh khur da ka Ri Bhoi hadien ba ka la jop ia ka South Garo Hills District. Ka West Jaintia Hills District ka la ioh khur ia ka takma rnong ha ka Men Team Event hadien ba ka la jop ia ka West Khasi Hills District.Ka Ri Bhoi ka la khur ruh ia ka takma rnong ha ka Mixed Team Event hadien ba ka la jop ia ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District. Ha ka Indian Round Mixed Team, ka West Khasi Hills District ka la khur ia ka takma rnong hadien ba ka la jop ia ka Ri Bhoi District.
title: 5TH MEGHALAYA GAMES: LASHAI YN ÏAKHUN PHAINAL KI KYNHUN HA KI JINGÏAKOB SIAT KHNAM

content: Tura, K’lyngkot 20 : Ka East Jaintia Hills District ka la bat ia ka kyrdan ba hakhlieh duh napdeng ki district ha ka jingiakop niah Cycle jong ka Meghalaya Games kaba 5 kaba la long ha Tura.Ha kane ka jingiakop kaba la long naduh 17 haduh 19 tarik ha Rongkhon bad Darechikgre, ka EJH ka la la lah ban kan khur haduh 12 tylli ki takma kiba kynthup ia 5 tylli ki takma ksiar, 4 ki takma rupa bad 3 ki takma rupa.Ka Eastern West Khasi Hills ka la ioh ba kan khur7 tylli ki takma, kynthup ia 3 tylli ki takma ksiar, 3 tylli ki takma rupa lem bad kawei ka takma rnong. Ia ka kyrdan balai la ioh ban bat da ka South West Khasi Hills kaba la khur 8 tylli ki takma, kynthup ia 2 tylli ki takma ksiar, 3 tylli ki takma rupa lem bad 3 tylli ki takma rnong.Ka North Garo bad ka West Garo Hills ki la khur mar kawei ka takma ksiar. Katba ka East Khasi Hills ka la khur 2 tylli ki takma rupa bad 2 tylli ki takma rnong.
title: BAT KA EJH IA KA KYRDAN BA HAKHLIEH HA KA IAKOB NIAH CYCLE HA MEGHALAYA GAMES

content: Kum ka jingpeitngor shwa ka jingrakhe ïa ka Republic Day, ki shipai BSF jong ka 193 Battalion kiba la ïoh jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la ïohkem lai ngut ki nongkhaii drok bad ïoh kurup 1728 tylli ki dawai kuli Yaba na ka met jong ki.Kane ka jingkhynra ka la jia ha ki bynta kiba hap hapoh ka Ranikor Police Station, South West Khasi Hills district.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da ki shipai BSF, la ong ba ïa kine ki lai ngut ki la shong da ki ar tylli ki thuk thuk la bat da ki shipai BSF, kiba la thmu ban leit sha khappud hajan ka shnong Ranikor.Ïa kine ki lai ngut la tip kyrteng kum u Somison Sangma 25 snem ka rta, u Jenel D. Sangma  23 snem ka rta bad u Gopal Barman  27 snem ka rta.  Kine ki dei kiba shong basah ha ka shnong Nokrianala kaba hap hapoh ka Dangar Police Out Post, East Khasi Hills District.Ïa ki dawai kuli Yaba la kurup noh da ki shipai BSF bad ïa ki lai ngut ki nongkhaii dro la aiti noh sha ki Pulit ka Ranikor ban leh ïa kaba donkam.Ha kawei pat ka jingkhynra, ki shipai BSF jong ka 110 Battalion ki la ïohkem 9 ngut ki nongkhaii tuh kiba dei ki nong India  lem bad ki dohkha ïa kiba la thmu ban shalan tuh sha ka Bangladesh na u pud u sam jong ka ri India.Ïa ki snar khaii tuh bad ïa ki dohkha ba la ïoh kurup la aiti noh sha ka ophis Customs, Shella ban leh ïa kaba donkam.Kine ki jingïohkem ïa ki nongleh kam bymman ka dei ka jingpyrkhing jong ki shipai BSF ban tem ïa ki kam runar ruser bad ban ïada ïa ki kam khaii tuh ha shilynter jong ka khappud.
title: KURUP KI BSF 1728 TYLLI KI YABA TABLET, SHAH KEM LAI NGUT KI NONGKHAÏI DROK

content: U Prateek Thapa, 19 snem ka rta u la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba lai ha ka rynsan iakob ‘I Am Model Search International Modelling’ kaba la long ha nongbah Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia ha ka 13 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024.U Prateek u la mihkhmat ia ka ri India ha ka National Qualifier Event of Mister India 2023 ba la pynlong da ka Global Model India na Pune ha kaba u la ioh rung ha ka kyrdan kaba 6.  Da kane ka jingjop, u Prateek u la long ka jingsarong ia ka ri India da kaba pynliem ia ki 70 ngut ki nongiashim bynta na ki 21 tylli ki ri ka pyrthei.Ha kawei pat ka liang, u Aman passah uba la 24 snem ka rta na Jowai, West Jaintia Hills District uba dang pule ia ka MUA u la long u nongjop ha ka Mr Petite Global India 2023 bad da kane ka jingjop un sa iohlad ban mihkmat ia ka ri India ha ka Mr. Petite Global 2024 ka ban sa long ha u bnai Nailar, 2024.
title: WAN BALAI U PRATEEK THAPA HA KA INTERNATIONAL MODELLING CONTEST HA MALAYSIA

content: Ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit ka la buh jingkylli halor ka jingbym pynrung ia ka ktien Jaintia ha ka jingrwai Meghalaya Anthem jong ka Jylla, ia kaba la pyllait dang shen kum ka jingrakhe ia ka jingdap 52 snem ka jingioh jylla bapura jong ka Meghalaya.“Kito kiba la iohsngew ia ka jingrwai ne pule ia ki ktien jingrwai kin tip ba ka ktien Jaintia kam don, katba la pynrung tang ia ka ktien Khasi bad Garo kynthup ruh ia ka ktien Phareng,” ong u Nongaiktien jong ka BJP Meghalaya Pradesh u Bah M. Kharkrang.“Ka long kaba donkam ban tip, ba ha ka jingialang Kynhun Myntri kaba la bishar bniah shwa ban shim ia ka rai khatduh ban mynjur ia ki kyntien, u MLA ka BJP uba long u Myntri hapoh ka Sorkar Meghalaya u Bah AL Hek u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew jong u ba ym dei satia ban pyllait paidbah ia ka State Anthem khlem da pynrung lem ia ka ktien Jaiñtia bad ba ki nongshna ki dei ban thoh biang sa shisien ia ka jingrwai.  Hynrei, wat hapdeng ka jingpyrshah bad ka jingai jingmut jong u, la kyntait da kiwei pat ki dkhot kiba don hapoh ka jingialang,” la kynnoh ka BJP.U Bah Mariahom Kharkrang u la ong, “ka long shisha kaba sngewsih ba ka ktien bakongsan tam ha ka jylla la iehnoh sharud.  Ngi lah ban tip la ka jingbym pynrung (ia ka ktien Jaintia) ka dei kaba la leh khnang ne ka dei kaba shu jia ryngkhat, kaei kaba ngi tip, ka long ba ia ki kyntien dei ban bynrap lang da kaba pyndonkam ia ka ktien Jaintia.”“Ngi dawa ban pynbeit noh mardor khnang ba ki lai tylli ki jaidbynriew ki dei ban ioh mihkhmat bad ban ym pynsngewsih iano iano ruh.  Ki jaidbynriew Khasi, Jaintia bad Garo ki la iatylli lang kawei ban pynkha ia kane ka jylla-ngi don ia ka pakit ki mynnor kaba ngi la im lang, ka jingiatyllli ban iakhun bad ka jingiaid lynti lang ka dei ban paw ha ka jingmihkhmat ia ka jylla Meghalaya,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: KUMNO KA KTIEN JAIÑTIA KAM RUNG HA KA JINGRWAI STATE ANTHEM? KYLLI KA BJP

content: : Hadien shi snem ba la pynmih ia ka phlim “Khat Saw Phra 14/8” uwei na ki nongshna phlim batbit na ka jylla, u Bah Kenny Lyngdoh, u la pynkhreh ban wanlam biang sha ki paidbah ia ka phlim ka ban pyniapbiej bad ka ban pynsah ia ki paid nongpeit ha ka jinglyngngoh (suspense thriller).Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, u Bah Kenny u la don bynta ban pynmih ia ka phlim “Gangs of North East (2017)” bad ban shna ia ka phlim “AHOR (2022).”Ha ka phlim ‘Unveiling Shadows (RNGAI)’, la iashim bynta da kawei napdeng ki puron ba pawnam ka Regina Lamo. Ka phlim ka iathuh khana shaphang ka jingban khia ka jingsngewsih jong ka hadien ka  jingshahpynïap ka kmie bad ba iadei shipara bad ka. Ha kum kane ka jingshem lanot jong ka, ka don ka jingthmu ban wad ia ka tynrai bad ka daw jong ka jingshah pyniap ki baieid bathoiñ jong ka. Ha ka jingiaid lynti jong ka ban wad ïa ka jingshisha, ka shem ïa kiei kiei kiba pynher syrngiew ïa ka.U Bah Kenny Lyngdoh u ong, “lane ka phlim ka pyni ba ia kiei kiei baroh kam long kumba ngi mut ne iohi nabar. Kane ka phlim ka iathuh khana ia ka jingiaid lynti jong ka puron bad ka jingshem jong ka ïa kiba bun ki jingpynthame, ki jingartatien.”Ka puron Regina Lamo kan iatreilang bad u nongshna phlim Kenny Lyngdoh.Ha kane ka phlim yn iohi ruh ïa kiwei kiwei ki tyngshop bad ki puron kiba paw kum Jeremy Khongjee, ka Banatimon Mawlong, u Mangkara Khongthohrem, u Brandon Sunn, ka Phidalin Kharsyntiew, u Mewanpynbhalang Tham bad kiwei kiwei ruh.Ia ka ‘teaser’ jong kane ka phlim ladep ban pyllait ha YouTube channel bad ia ka phlim yn pyllait ha u bnai Rymphang.
title: DA KA PHLIM RNGAI, YN KHRING PAIDBAH BIANG U BAH KENNY LYNGDOH

content: U President jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) Bah Ardent Miler Basaiawmoit ha ka Lah sngi U Blei u la ong ba ka jingdon jong ki nongialam ka VPP ka la biang ban pyntip sha ka Sorkar ba u paidbah um shah ia ka Sorkar nangne shakhmat ban leh katba mon.Haba kren sha ki nongkyrshan kiba la synran lang ha ka jingtur sha Secretariat ban dawa ia ka Sorkar ba kan thung biang ia ki lai ngut ki ophisar kiba la shah weng kam na ka Meghalaya Lok Ayukta, u Bah Ardent u la ong, “ha kaba iadei bad ka jingweng ia (lai ngut) ki Ophisar na ka Lok Ayukta, ngi la ai ka jingthoh bad ngi la buh ka por ban iakhih. Nga kwah ba ki paidbah kin shai, balei ngi iakhih haba don ba pynthud ia ka Lok Ayukta. Kane ka dei kata ka bor ba la buh ban tohkit ia ki kam bamsap bad ban pynshitom ia kiba bamsap.”“Ia kino kino kiba ktah ia ka Lok Ayukta ngin hap ban iakhih kum ka party,” la ong u Bah Ardent.“Kum ka party kaba ieng ha ka nongrim ban iakhun pyrshah ia ka bamsap, ha ki khyndiat ka Sorkar ka la pyrshang ban pynsngewthuh bakla ia u paidbah ban ong ba ngi, ngi ngim tip eiei ia ka Lok Ayukta Act, dei ban pule bha ia ka Act, hynrei ngi, ngi ong ba ngim dei ki khynnah skul, ngi ladep ban pule ia ka Act, ka shah ia ngi,” u la ong bad bynrap, “hadien ba ngi la peit ia ka Lok Ayukta Act, ngi la pule ia ki Rules, ngi shem ba kane ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar ka long kaba bakla.”Haba kynthoh ia ka jingpynjari ki bor synshar District ia ka Section 144 CrPC, u Bah Ardent u la ong, ‘ha u snenm 1967 ka la pynmih ia kawei ka rai halor ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Section 144 CrPC, ka la kren shai ba kane ka Section ym lah ban pyntreikam kum ka atiar kaba khang ban ia ka jingpynsngew bad ia ki jingeh.”“Lada phi weng ia kine ki ophisar, ngi la ong hynne, niuma lada kam don kano kano ka case ngim ong eiei, hynrei ka don ka case kaba kine ki ophisar ki la tohkit ha kaba u bahaing jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u don bynta ha kata ka kam bamsap bad ngi donhok ban suba jur ba ka don ka jingthmu ban iada ia uta u bahaing jong uta u Chief Minister,” ong u Bah Ardent.“Ngim lah ban shu ailad namar lada tuh uba rit la shah kem wut wut, kumno yn iada tangba ki dei ki bahaing hasem” u la ong.“Ka thma jong ngi pyrshah ia ka bamsap kam dei kaba ngi shu kren hynrei ngi da thrang namar lada ngim lah ban rat ha kane ka por ka jong ngi, ka jylla jong ngi kan ngam. Wat ju tieng, haba ngi mih halor ka hok, haba ngi mih ngi sngewthuh ia ka nongrim kaba skhem,” la pynpaw u Bah Ardent.“Ngi donkam ban pynkhlaiñ ia ka Lokayukta Act ha kane ka jylla jong ngi,” u la ong bad bynrap, “wat mushlia ia ka Lokayukta, bad phin sa iohi kin sa bun ki ban poi (sha) ruh nar.”
title: WAT MUSHLIA ÏA KA LOKAYUKTA BAD PHIN SA ÏOHI KIN SA BUN KI BAN POI RUH NAR: ARDENT BASAIAWMOIT

content: Ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla kaba peit ia ka tnad Aiñ ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh kam shym lah ban shim ia kano kano ka rai ha ka jingiakynduh ia ki nongialam jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei kiba la tur paidbah sha Secretariat ha ka sien kaba ar ban pyrshah ia ka jingweng ia ki lai ngut ki Ophisar na ka Meghalaya Lok Ayukta.Shwa ban leit iashim bynta ha ka jingiakren bad ka Myntri, u Bah Ardent kynthup ruh lai ngut ki MLA ka VPP u Bah Adelbert Nongrum, Bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang, Bah Heavingstone Kharpran, ki nongialam ba hakhmat ka Party bad ki nongkyrshan ki la shah pakhang lynti ha ki Magistrate bad ha ki bor Pulit tang shu poi hakhmat ka Ophis Additional Secretariat.U Nongialam jong ka VPP Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit, haba kren sha ki nongkyrshan kiba ap ha Parking Lot, Additional Secretariat, hadien ba la wan phai na ka jingiakynduh ia ka Myntri, u la ong, “ngi la ia ka jingthoh bad ka Sorkar ka ong ba ngim lah ma ngi ban thung, la thung namarba ka Lok Ayukta ka dei ka Autonomous Body ne ka tnat treikam kaba laitluid ym lah ban tuklar.”“Hynrei ha ka Notification kaba u Chairman jong ka Lok Ayukta u weng ia kita ki ophisar, la weng da ka jingbthah jong ka Sorkar.  Hangno yn ong ba kam lah ban tuklar kata ka Sorkar,” la buh jingkylli u Bah Ardent ia ka Sorkar MDA.“Haba ki khot ban iakren ia ngi, ngi kloi ban leit, namarba ngim kwah ban pynmih ia kano kano ka jingkulmar. Ngi tip ba ka Myntri ka tnat Aiñ kam lah ban ai rai eiei. Kata ka shai ia ngi kum ki nongialam hynrei ngi kwah ban pyni ba ngi don ia ka jingshisha kum ki nongialam ban iathuh balei ba ngi hap ban mih madan na ka jingbakla jong ka Sorkar,” u la ong.“Ka party ka la buh shibun ki jingkylli bad na ka liang jong ka Myntri bad ia u Ophisar uba don lang  ki ong ba ka long kaba donkam ba u Myntri Rangbah un don lang, u Chief Secretary un don lang lem bad kiwei kiwei ki tnat treikam ba ngin iakren halor kane. Ka jingong jong ki ba ki donkam iakynduh ryngkat bad u Myntri Rangbah bad ki Ophisar kiba kham heh  ka pyni ba ki sngewthuh ba ka don ka jingbakla ha ka jingweng ia ki (lai ngut) ophisar,” la pynksan u Bah Ardent.“Hadien ba ngi la pyni, ia ki, ia ki kyndon, kiba ngi la iakren katkum ka ain, ka la buh jingeh ia ki ban ong ba ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar kam long kaba bakla. Ka Myntri ka la kyrpad ia ngi ban iakynduh bad u Myntri Rangbah uba (pynpaw) ma u ruh u don ka jingkwah ban iakynduh ia ki nongialam ka VPP. Dei halor kata ka nongrim ba ngi la mynjur ban iakynduh ban ia pynbeit ia kane ka kam,” la bynrap u Bah Ardent.
title: YM LAH SHIM RAI KA MYNTRI SORKAR HA KA JINGÏAKYNDUH ÏA KI NONGÏALAM KA VPP

content: U President ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la ong ba ka party kan sa ujor sha ka Privilege Committee jong ka Iingdorbar Thawain ka jylla halor ka jingjrong kti jong ki Pulit ia ki MLA jong ka party ha ka sngi ba ka party ka la sdang ia ka jingiakhih ha ka 19 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024 katba ki dang tur ban pynlong ia ka jingiakhih da kaba shong kyllain mynngor hakhmat ka ophis Secretariat ban pyrshah ia ka jingwengkam ia ki lai ngut ki ophisar na ka Meghalaya Lok Ayukta.Kane ka jingkren jong une u nongialam ka VPP ka long hadien ba ki lad pathai khubor ki la pyni ha ka taiew baladep ia ka jingpatan jong ki Pulit ia u MLA ka Mawlai Constituency u Bah Brighstarwell Marbaniang katba u dang ialam ia ki nongbud ban tur sha Secretariat ban shong kyllaiñ myngngor kum ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingmynthi ka Sorkar Jylla halor ka jingdawa ban thungkam biang ia ki lai ngut ki Ophisar ba la shah weng na ka Meghalaya Lok Ayukta.Haba kren sha ki nongkyrshan hadien ka jingiakynduh ia ka Myntri ka tnad aiñ ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Bah Ardent u la pynpaw ba ka party kam don kano kano ka daw bad ki Pulit hynrei ka jingialeh kan long bad ki Myntri kiba bat ia ka bor.“Kane ka jingiakhih jong ngi, ka dei ka hok kaba ngi iakhih ha ka ri synshar paidbah,” ong u Bah Ardent.“Ngi la rah ruh ia kane ka mat, ia ka jingpyndonkam jong ka tnat Pulit ia ki Pulit tap khmat, ki Pulit ki bym don wat tang ka kyrteng (name plate).  Lada ka dei ka mask Covid te ngin ia shah hynrei ka dei ka kaba la tap lup beit ban iohi tang ia ka dur khmat. Kata ka dei kaba ngi la iakren hynne (bad ka Myntri Sorkar). Ngi la kren ruh ia ka jingktah kti jong ki Pulit ia ki MLA ha ka sngi kaba nyngkong. Ia kane ngim pat sangeh. Ngi kwah ban iathuh ha phi, ba ka Assembly ka don ia ka Privilege Committee, kaba ki MLA jong ngi kin sa shimti ia kaba ki dei ban shim. Ngim don eiei pyrshah ia ki (Pulit) hynrei ki (Pulit) dei ban sngewthuh ba ma ngi kum ki nongialam kiba u paidbah da ki phew hajar u la jied ba ngin rah ia ki jingeh jong u paidbah ha Assembly ym dei ban ailad iano iano ban shu kheiñ dewthala ia kata,” u la ong.“Ngi la rah ia kane ka mat, da kaba sngewkhia mynne bad na ka liang jong ka Myntri ka tnat Ain, ka la kren ia u Ophisar hakhmat jong ngi ba kin shimkhia ia kane ka mat kaba ngi la rah. Ngin sa rah ruh ia kane ka mat ha ka jingiakynduh markhmat bad u Myntri Rangbah. Ngim don eiei kaba pyrshah ia ki Pulit. Hynrei ki Pulit kim dei ban kah ia ka durkhmat haba ki hap ban iatakhuh bad ki nongmihkhmat paidbah ne bad ki paidbah khamtam eh haba ngi iakhih katkum ki hok synshar paidbah. Ngim dei ki nongpynkulmar shnong, ngi dei ki nongshong shnong kiba bat ia ka aiñ, ngi tip ia ka ain,” la bynrap u Bah Ardent.Haba kynthoh ia ki bor synshar District u Bah Ardent u la ong, “ha ka jingshisha dei ki bor synshar district kiba pynkhein ia ka ain.  Ki bor synshar district shwa ba kin pynjari ia ka Section 144 ka dei ban da sngewthuh shai ba ka jingthmu jong ngi ka long kaba sniew bad kaba pynmih jingkulmar.”
title: SHA KA PRIVILEGE COMMITTEE YN UJOR KA VPP BA JRONG KTI KI PULIT ÏA KI MLA

content: Ka jingthung ia ki nongtrei sorkar kiba la shong thait ha ki tnat Directorate of investigation bad Directorate of prosecution hapoh ka ophis jong ka Lokayukta kam shym la long katkum ki kyndon jong ka Lokayukta Act 2014, la ong ka Kong Angela Rngad.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, ka Kong Angela ka la ong, “ka section 10 (2) jong ka Lokayukta Act 2014 ka kren shai ba ka Directorate of investigation bad Directorate of Prosecution ki dei ki ar tylli ki tnat treikam kiba don la ka jong ka bor ka iktiar bad ki long kiba donkam ban thaw hapoh ka ophis jong ka Lokayukta.”“U/ka Lokayukta ki dei ban thung ia ki Director jong kitei ki tnat napdeng ki kyrteng bad ki nongtrei Sorkar kiba la phah bad mynjur da ka Sorkar Jylla. Ka Ain ka ong ruh kumne , ba tat haduh kata ka por ba la lah ban thaw ia kine ki artylli ki tnat ne Directorate bad thung ia ki Director bad nongtrei ba pura, lah ban nang pynbiang ne thung shi por ia ki Director ne nongtrei. Hynrei kaba phylla ka long ha kano ka dur bad ha kano ka nongrim ba la thung ia kine ki Director ba shi por? Shuh shuh kumno la thung ia iwei na ka bynta lai snem, katba ia kiwei pat san snem haba ym shym don kano kano jingkdew ha ki rule? Sa kawei ka jingkylli-Kumno u Lokayukta u thung ia kine ki ophisar? Hato ka dei ka jingleh politics? Hato kine ki ophisar ki dei ki political appointee?” la buh jingkylli ka Kong Angela.“Ka jingkhlain bad jinglaitluid jong ka ophis jong ka Lokayukta ka shong eh ha ka jingtreikam kaba khuid bad ba shlur jong u ne ka Lokayukta kiba pyndep hok ia la ki kamram katkum ba la pruid dak ha ki kyndon jong ka Ain,” ka la ong bad bynrap, “kane ka Ain Lokayukta ka mih pyrthei bad la thaw ia ka hadien ka jingiakhun kaba jwat bad jlan jong ki nongshong shnong ka Jylla. Hynrei ka pyndiaw bad pynbitar ha kajuh ka por namar mynta la pyntlot bor bad la lob ia ki bniat jong kane Ain. Kane ka Ain Lokayukta mynta ka shah ban thung tang uwei ne kawei ka Lokayukta bad nalor kata la thung beit tang da ki babu Sorkar ne ki IAS ophisar  kiba la shong thait.”“Ka jingthung tang uwei ne kawei ka Lokayukta ka long kaba mynsaw namar ka plie lad ruh ia ka jingleh mon bad jingleh donbor tang uwei ne kawei ka briew shimet. Kane kajuh ka jingpyntlot bor la leh ruh ia ka Ain RTI.  Ka long kaba shai kdar ba ka jingthung ia ki ophisar ha ki tnat Directorate of investigation bad Directorate of prosecution hapoh ka ophis jong ka Lokayukta ka long be-ain. Shuh shuh uwei u briew, kum ba la thung ia u Bah J. Rymmai, um lah ban bat ar tylli ki kam, kata kum u Director of investigation bad Director of prosecution. Kane ka jingthung be-ain kan ktah ia ki jingtohkit halor ki kam bamsap kiba u Lokayukta u la mudui hakhmat ki iingbishar,” la kynthoh ka Kong Angela.“Ka Sorkar kam khein snep ei ei bad ka iai pynkhein ia ka Ain bad thung tang uwei u briew kum u Director of investigation bad Director of prosecution kumjuh. Ngi dei ban pynrem jur ia ka jingleh be-ain jong ka Sorkar bad ngi dei ban iakhun tyngeh na ka bynta ban pynneh bad iada ia ka jinglaitluid jong ka ophis Lokayukta. Hynrei ngin ym lah ban iakhun lada ngi iai pule bakla bad batai bakla ia ka Ain. Ngi dei ban pule sani ia ka Ain bad ki kyntien kiba don ha ka Ain bad sei madan ia ki  jingtip bad jingshem phang kiba shisha hakhmat u paidbah. Ki paidbah kim dei ruh ban shah ialam bakla ha ki nongiakhih kiba dawa na ka Sorkar ban pyndam ia kawei ka kam be-ain bad pyntreikam bujli da kawei pat ka jingleh be-ain,” ka la bynrap.“Ngi dawa ba ka ophis jong ka Lokayukta ka dei ban don bun ngut ki dkhot ki ban mihkhmat na ki phang ba pher kum ki riewtip Ain, ki dkhot jong ka imlang sahlang bad kiwei. Ha kajuh ka por ban thaw bad thung ia ki Director of investigation bad Director of prosecution katkum ki kyndon jong ka Ain. Dei ban pyndam noh ia baroh ki jingthung kam be-ain ha ka ophis jong Lokayukta,” la dawa ka Kong Angela.
title: DEI BAN PYNDAM NOH ÏA BAROH KI JINGTHUNGKAM BE-AIÑ HA KA OPHIS LOKAYUKTA: ANGELA RNGAD

content: Tura, K’lyngkot 18 : Haba phai sha ka Wrestling kaba la long ha St. Mary’s HSS, ka East Khasi Hills District ka la khur ia ka nam lahduh hadieh ba ka la lah ban khur haduh 34 tylli ki takma, ba kynthup 9 tylli ki takma ksiar, 9 tylli ki takma rupa bad 16 tylli ki takma rnong.Ïa ka kyrdan ba-ar la khur da ka West Khasi Hills District kaba la khur mar kawei ka takma ksiar bad rupa. Ka Ri Bhoi Disrtrcit ka la wan ha ka kyrdan balai da kaba khur 2 tylli ki takma rnong.Ki resol na kane ka jingiakob ki long ha ka Men Freestyle Wrestling (79 Kg) Tenjrang Ch. title: 5TH MEGHALAYA GAMES: KHUR KA EKH IA KIBA BUN TYLLI KI TAKMA HA KA WRESTLING

content: The last 10 years under the Modi government have been a golden era for the Northeast with an unprecedented focus on infrastructure development and conflict resolution, Union Home Minister Amit Shah said on Friday.The Northeast is today shifting away from its history of blockades and unrest and is pacing towards peace and development, he said.Addressing the 71st plenary session of the North Eastern Council (NEC) here, Shah also said that under the leadership of PM Modi, not only the distance from the Northeast to Delhi and the rest of India has reduced due to the creation of infrastructure, but the difference of hearts has also come down.“The last 10 years under the government of Prime Minister Narendra Modi has been the most significant decade for the Northeast as it has seen most development in the 75 years since independence,” he said.He said the Northeast, which was struggling with various problem caused by ethnic, linguistic, border and extremist groups, also got the beginning of a fresh and durable era of peace in these 10 yearsThe home minister said if these 10 years for the Northeast are compared with the 75 years after the country’s independence, then this decade will definitely be considered as the golden period for the region.He said the Modi government has always considered the Northeast as an important part of India.Shah said that between 2004 and 2014, a total of 11,121 violent incidents took place in the Northeast and it has declined by 73 percent to 3,114 between 2014 and 2023.Deaths among security forces dropped by 71 per,cent from 458 to 132, while civilian deaths declined by 86 per cent, he said.He said the incidents of insurgency have come down because in the last five years more than 8,900 members of militant groups have surrendered and joined the mainstream. This has given a message to the entire country that peace and prosperity are interconnected and without them the states cannot develop, he said.The home minister said that to bring peace and stability in the Northeast, the Modi government has signed nine agreements and many pending law and order issues have been successfully resolved through these.He said that except some parts of Assam and Manipur, 75 per cent of the areas covered under the Armed Forces Special Powers Act (AFSPA) in 2018 are no longed under it.
title: 10 YEARS HAVE BEEN A GOLDEN ERA FOR NORTHEAST UNDER MODI GOVT : AMIT SHAH

content: Ki dkhot bad ki nongïalam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la mih kyndit sha surok ban rah da ki plakad hajan ka Civil Hospital, Shillong ryngkat ka jingpyrta shla ban pynrem jur ia ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ia u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing u Amit Shah halor ka jingmynthi ban ai jingmynjur ban pyntreikam ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.U Amit Shah u la wan sha nongbah Shillong ha ka sngi Balang ban iashim bynta ha ka jingialangbah jong ka North Eastern Council (NEC) kaba la long ha State Convention Center, Shillong.Ki Pulit ki la pynkhlaiñ ia ka jingpahara khnang ban tem ia kino kino ki jingkulmar kiba lah ban mih ha kane ka jingiakhih kyndit jong ki dkhot ka HYC kiba la shong kyllaiñ myngngor hapdeng surok.Katba ki dkhot jong ka HYC ki dang shong kyllaiñ mynngor hapdeng surok ki Majistor bad ki bor Pulit ki la wan poi ban beh da ka bor ia ki dkhot ka seng bad byrngem ruh ban thep hapoh Bos ban kit sha madan Malki. Shipor ka la mih ka thma ktien hapdeng kine ki arliang mamla hadien ba ki nongialam ka HYC ki la pyneh beit triang ban kynriah nadpeng surok kat haduh ba la wanrah ka jingdheng kali kaba jur shipor kaba la pynthud ia ki kali kiba wan na ka thaiñ Civil bad kiba thmu ban leit sha IGP, Khyndai Lad ter ter sha Motphran.Kham katto katne por, ki dkhot bad ki nongialam jong ka HYC ki la kynriah noh ban pynlong ia ka jingiakhih hakhmat u durmot jong u Kiang Nangbah.Shwa ban iapra na kane ka jaka, ki dkhot ka HYC ki la pynher da ki balloon rong iong ba la teh lang bad ka jingthoh, “No ILP, No Rest.”
title: HA KA SNGI WAN U AMIT SHAH SHA SHILLONG PYNHER BALLOON ÏONG KA HYC

content: Tura, K’lyngkot 19 : Kawei na ki jingialehkai kaba lehse kaba ym juh bna koit ba kan paw ne ban ialehkai  pura ia ka, pynban dei ha ka lympung kaba mynta jong ka Meghalaya Games kaba 5 kaba la long ha sorbah Tura, ka Volleyball, lehse ka dei kawei na ki jingialehkai kaba ki samla na kane ka jylla khamtam lei lei ki shynrang ki don bha ia katta ka sap ba kin ialehkai.Kumba ka kyntien ki riewtymmen ka ong “baroh u briew ba stad mano ba lah ban len, lada khlem da plie ka lad da kumno un lait  ban kren”.Da kumta haba phai sha kane kawei na ki jingialehkai kaba la long ha kawei ka madan shyiap ba don ha kut jong ka shlem pule ka Tura Law College, la shem bad iohi ba ki sap ialehkai ba nylla ki khun samla, khamtam lei lei ha ka liang ki khynnah shyrang, ka dak jong ka jingkyrmen ka don ia ka jylla ha ka liang jong ka volleyball.Haba phai sha ki jingiakhun jong ki semifinal kiba la long mynta ka Thohdieng jong ka taiew,  ki rang ialehkai jong ka West Garo Hills ki la lah ba kin pynliem noh ia ka ia ka South Garo Hills da  25 – 22,  22 – 25,25 – 23, Set 4 : 25 -16).Katba ha ka jingiakhun ia ka semifinal kaba ar pat ka kynhun ialehkai ka South West Khasi Hills ka la lah ba kan pynliem noh ia ka North Garo Hills da  25-21, 17-25, 23-25, 25-17, 17-15,Lada yn ia phai pat sha ka jingiakhun hapdeng ki kynthei, ki thei ialehkai jong ka  South West Khasi Hills District ki la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka East Khasi Hills da 25 – 14,  20 – 25,  25 – 18, 25 – 18.Ha ka jingiakhun ia ka semifinal kaba ar pat, ki thei ialehkai jong ka South West Garo Hills District ki la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka West Garo Hills District da  25 – 09,  25 – 15,  25 – 23.Hadien kane, ka la don pat ka jingpyniakhun ia ka kyrdan kaba lai (bronze medal match) kaba na ka liang ki kynthei, ka kynhun ka East Khasi Hills ki la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka West Garo Hills District da 25 – 14, 25 – 11, 25 – 20.Katba ha ka jingialehkai ki shynrang ka jingiakhun ka dang bteng ban jam shakhmat.
title: LYNGBA KA MEGHALAYA GAMES KABA HA TURA  PAW KA SAP BA NYLLA KI SAMLA HA KA LIANG KA VOLLEYBALL

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la kyntu ïa ka seng kieng atiar ba la shah kheiñ be-aiñ ka Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ba kan pyrkhat biang sa shisien halor ka jingshim rai ban pynkut noh ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla.U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba peit ïa ka tnat Kam Pohing u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u la ong, ba ka Sorkar ka long kaba kloi ban ïakynduh ïa ki nongïalam bahakhmat jong ka HNLC ha ka jaka kaba ki jied hi ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka jingïakren bad pynthikna ba ka jingïakren kan pynmih ïa u soh.U Chairman ka HNLC cum C-in-C u Bah Bobby Marweiñ bad u General Secretary cum Publicity Secretary Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw ki ladep phah ïa ka shithi sha ka Ministry of Home Affairs lyngba u Advisor u AK Mishra ban pyntip halor ka rai ba ladep shim ban weng noh na ka jingïakren ïasuk da kaba pynpaw ba ka Sorkar kam shym la kohnguh ban mynjur ïa ki san tylli ki jingdawa ba kynthup ïa ka jingmap ei ïa ki dkhot bad ïa ki nongïalam jong ka seng.“Ka kabu ksiar ka jia tang shisien ne arsien bad kan ym jia shuh lano lano ruh. Ka jingkyrpad jong nga ïa ki nongïalam ka HNLC ka long ba kin pyrkhat bad ban phaidien biang ïa ka rai kaba phi la shim bad ban pyntip sha ka sorkar,” ong u Bah Tynsong ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Nga kwah ban kyrpad ïa ki nongïalam bahakhmat lada ki sheptieng ba ki lah ban shah kem, nga kyntu ïa ki ban jied hi ma ki ïa ka jaka, ngi (sorkar) long kiba kloi ban ïakynduh ïa phi hangta bad ban ïakren namar ba ngi kwah ban pynthikna ba ka jingïakren ïasuk kan long kaba seisoh bad kaba kut syndon,” u la ong.U Bah Tynsong haba pynshai ïa ka jingkyrpad jong ka Sorkar ban pynlong ka jingïakren bad ki nongïalam jong ka seng u la ong, “namarba ki briew ba la pynkupbor da ka HNLC kim lah ban shim ïa ka rai, (ha ka jingïakren bad ka sorkar), ngi la ïaiban ba ka jingïalang ka dei ban long bad ki nongïalam, kiba lah ban shim ïa ka rai (ha kiba bun ki mat) namarba ngi kwah ba ka jingïakren kan don ka jingpynkut.  Namarkata, ki nongïalam ki dei ban wan shakhmat (sha ka miej jingïakren).U la ong ba ka rai jong ka HNLC ban weng na ka jingïakren ka la pynkyndit ruh ïa ka Sorkar.Halor ka jingdawa jong ka HNLC ïa ka jingmap ei, u Bah Tynsong u la ong, ha ka jingshisha, ha ka jingïakren banyngkong, u ksiang jong ka Sorkar bad u Advisor ka MHA ki la kyrpad ïa ka seng ba kan phah ïa ka thup kyrteng jong ki dkhot, kiba dang sah pongding ki mukotduma ha ki kashari bapher bapher khnang ba ka Sorkar kan dup lah ban bishar ïa kaei kaba ka lah ban leh.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka HNLC kam shym la aiti satia ïa ka thup kyrteng jong ki dkhot kiba dang sah pongding ki mukotduma pyrshah ïa ki.“Ngi la bthah ba kin ai ïa ki jingtip ba bniah bad kim shym la ai satia bad ngi la ïai ap pynban ngi ïoh pdiang da ka shithi kaba kim kwah shuh ban dang bteng ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk namar kane. Ha ka jingshisha, kane ka ishu ka dei kaba ladep ban ïakren  ha ka jingïalang banyngkong eh. Na kata ka daw, ki nongmihkhmat ka HNLC ki la leit phai noh sha Bangladesh ban ïasyllok bad ki nongïalam halor kane ka mat, kaei ka jingïakren, kaei ka jingpynksan bad ka jingtyrwa ba la ai da ka Sorkar ïa ki nongïalam bahakhmat,” u la ong.Ka seng ka la kdew ba ka jingïoh shithi shah khot hajir na ka NIA bad na ka kashari jong u Judicial Magistrate First Class, Shillong katba ka jingïakren ïasuk ka dang ïaid, ka la pynartatien ïa ka seng.Halor kane, u Bah Tynsong u la ong ki notis khot hajir kim dei kiba la phah da ka Sorkar Pdeng ne Sorkar Jylla namarba kane ka dei ka kam jong ka kashari.“Hynrei ngan ïai ban.  Nga la ong ïa phi ka jingkular ba la ai da ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Sorkar Pdeng.  Sngewbhah ïa ngi ki jingtip kiba bniah, ki dkhot ki don katno la ki don tang iwei ne ar ne lai kiba dang don mukotduma ha kashari lane 20 ne 30 ngut,” u la bynrap.
title: TYRWA U Dy. CM IA KA HNLC BAN JIED IA KA JAKA ÏAKREN ÏASUK LADA TIENG BAN WAN SHA MEGHALAYA

content: Shillong, K’lyngkot 19: Ka Jylla Meghalaya ryngkat bad kiwei pat ki jylla ka la ïoh pdiang ïa ka khusnam na ka Centre for Innovations in Public Systems (CIPS) ba la pynlong ha ka sngi Thohdieng ha nongbah Shillong.Ka jingthmu ka long ban pynshlur ïa ki nongwanrah ïa ki saiñpyrkhat kaba thymmai na ki jylla kiba rit ha ka jingshakri ïa ki paidbah ha ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi, ki Union Territorries bad ki jylla ri lum, ha ka liang jong ka pule ka puthi, ka koit ka khiah, ka Information Technology bad Rural Development.Ïa kane ka khusnam la sam ha ka sien banyngkong eh da ka Centre for Innovations in Public Systems (CIPS) da ka jingïatreilang bad ka Government Innovation Lab (GIL), ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Administrative staff College of India (ASCI) kum ki paralok.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K. Sangma haba kren kum u kongsan u la ïaroh ïa ka CIPS bad ïa ka ASCI kiba la pynlong ïa kane ka jingsam khusnam ha ka jylla. U la ong ba ka lynti kaba biang tam ban kynjoh sha ka thong ka dei lyngba ka jingïatreilang bad ong ruh ha ki san snem ba la leit noh, dei ka jingïatreilang jong ki nongtrei sorkar bad kiwei kiwei ki nongtrei kiba don ïa ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka saiñpyrkhat kaba thymmai.U la ong, kine ki saiñpyrkhat bathymmai ki la ïarap ïa ki paidbah ban kynjoh sha ka thong kaba ki thmu.“Ïa mynta, ban pynduna ïa ka jingïap shiteng por jong ki longkmie kiba armet bad ki khunlung ha ka jylla, ka long kaba donkam ban sngewthuh ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki longkmie bad ki kynthei lyngba ki Self Help Group. Mynta, ka jylla Meghalaya ka don 95 percent ki longing kiba shah kdup hapoh ki SHG. U la ïathuh ruh ba ka State’s EAP funding deman ka la kiew na ka 12500 klur sha ka 2500 klur tang hapoh san snem,” la ong u Sangma.U dkhot jong ka NITI Ayog ka Sorkar India u Dr. V.K Paul haba kren kum u symbud kongsan u la ïathuh ba ka thong jong jong ka NITI Ayog ki don ar tyllli, 1) ba kyntiew ïa ka cooperative federalism bad 2) bad ka competitive federalism.U la ïaroh ïa ka sienjam jong ka Jylla kaba kyntiew ïa ki rukom treikam kiba thymmai ha ka jingshakri paidbah. U la ong ba ka ri ka la ïaid shakhmat ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka koit ka khiah ki National Programme bapher bapher ban poi sha manla ki nongshong shnong. U la kyntu ïa ki Policy Practitioners bad ïa ki Administrators ban wanrah ïa ki saiñpyrkhat ba thymmai kiba lah ban pynïaid ïa ki hospital ha ki Public Sector.U Dr. Paul u la ïaroh ruh ïa ka Meghalaya’s Village Health Councils (VHC) bad ong ruh ba ka la lah ban pynkylla dur ïa ka koit ka khiah. U la pynpaw ruh ka jingkyndit halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka CMSMS ha kaba 50 percent ka don ka jinghiar na ka jingïap jong ki longkmie baar met bad ki khunlung ha ka jylla ha ka jylla ha ki snem 2020-23. Shuh shuh u la ïaroh ïa ka Meghalaya Early Childhood (ECD) Mission bad ong ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la buh hakhmat eh ïa kane ka mat lyngba ka saiñpyrkhat kaba thymmai.U la ai khublei ruh ïa ka Jylla kaba la mang 8 percent shanng na ka jingmang pisa ban pynlut ha ka koit ka khiah bad kyntu ruh ïa kiwei ki jylla ban bud nuksa na ka jylla Meghalaya ban weng ïa ki sohkyrdoh ha ka koit ka khiah.U Development Commissioner bad Principal Secretary ka tnat Health & Family Welfare ka Sorkar Jylla u Sampath Kumar, u la ïathuh shaphang ka Meghalaya’s State Capability Enhancement Approach (MSCEA) kaba long ka polisi bad ka saiñpyrkhat thymmai kaba la law ïa ki sohkyrdot kiba bun.Shuh shuh u la batai bniah ruh ïa ki san tylli ki païa jong ka State Capability Enhancement Framework, ba la tip kum ka- 1) ban tei ïa ka jinglong nongïalam lyngba ka jinglaw noh ïa ki sohkyrdot, 2) ka jingpyndonkam pura ïa ka Data and Research, 3) ka jingïakhun ïa ki jingeh, 4) ban wad ïa ka jingkyrshan na ki kynhun bapher bapher bad 5) ban pun jingkieng ïa ki nongshong shnong bad ka Jylla.Haba kren shaphang ka bhah kyrpang ïa ki kynthei ha ka jylla, u Kumar u la ïathuh ba ha ki Village Employment Committees (VEC) la mang kyrpang ïa ka post Chairman bad Secretary ïa ki kynthei.Ki nongïoh khusnam ha kane ka sngi ki long u Sampath Kumar, IAS halor ka Positive Public Health Management Meghalaya, u Dr Phunchok Norboo, Mission Director ka ABDM, Ladakh halor ka Integration of Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission with e-Hospital, u Ram Kumar S, IAS halor ka Meghalaya Drone Delivery Network, u A. Arun Prince Milton, Scientist ka ICAR, Meghalaya halor ka Rapid and cost-effective visual Diagnostic Kit for African Swine Fever Virus, Shantanu Gotmare, IAS halor ka Kritagyata- Online Pension Sanction and Payment Tracking System, u Mukesh Repaswal, IAS jong ka Information technology Director, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh halor ka Mukhya Mantri Seva Sankalp 1100, u Krishna Kumar, IAS uba dei u Deputy Commissioner jong ka Jiribam, Manipur halor ka Manipur E-district Portal, u Issac Zothanpuia, Project Manager ka Mizoram State e-governance Society, Mizoram halor ka RTI Online to promote accountability and for ease-of filling requests, Pallav Gopal Jha, IAS, Managing Director ka GMDW&, Assam halor ka Web-based water supply connections, Registration & Payment System, Shyambir, IAS, Deputy Commissioner ka Ganderbal, J&K halor ka MASHAAL-E-GAASH- A people-driven initiative to promote literacy, u Dev Raj Dhiman, Principal ka Himachal Pradesh halor ka Inquiry Based learning for holistic development, ka Varnali Deka, IAS, DC ka Nalbari, Assam halor ka Poshan Club: Nurturing children for welfare schemes, Purva Garg, IAS, sECRETARY education, Samagra Shiksha halor ka ECCE Early Childhood Care and Education as per new education policy 2020, Varnali Deka, IAS, DC, Nalbari, Assam halor ka Mushrooms as a tasty nutraceutical supplement, u Shiv Kumar Upadhyaya bad Deepak Shah halor ka Village as Harbingers of change toward optimal utilization of resources, u Prasada Rao Vaddarapu, IFS halor ka Bamboo brooms with handles as alternatives to plastics, u Ajit Kumar Ranjan, IAS, DC, Wokha Nagaland halor ka phang Entrepreneurs Task Force, one stop model for rural entrepreneurs bad Chete Lohe, CEO, Kiwi Production company, Phek, Nagaland halor ka Promotion & Marketing of Organic Kiwi Fruit.Ha kane ka sngi, la pyllait ruh ïa ka kot ba la ai kyrteng, “Celebrating Inclusive Innovations” ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Chairman ka Steering Committee ka CIPS & Director General (I/c), Administrative Staff College of India (ASCI), Hyderabad. u Dr. Nirmalya Bagchi, ka Chairperson bad ka dkhot ka Advisory Council, CIPS, Hyderabad ka Dr. Anjali Hazarika, u Chairperson,
