Awards Committee and Member, Advisory Council, CIPS, Hyderabad u Dr. PV Ramesh, Retd, IAS, Dr. Valli Manickam, Director CIPS & Dean of Research and Management Studies , ASCI, Hyderabad bad u Secretary ka Department of Administrative Reforms and Public Grievances ka Sorkar India u V Srinivas.La pynlong ruh ïa ka jingïathir ïatai halor ka koit ka khiah ba la pynïaid da u Dr. Subodh Kandamuthan, Director jong ka Dr. Kakarla Subba Rao Centre for Healthcare Management ha ASCI. Ki nongïashim bynta ki long u Sampath Kumar, Principal Secretary, ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Dr. Phunchok Norbo, Mission Director, ABDM, Ladakh, bad u Dr. A. Arun Prince Milton, Scientist, ICAR, Meghalaya.Halor ka jingïatai ïa ka Information Technology la pynïaid da u PV Ramesh, Retd IAS, Chairperson, Awards Committee, CIPS. Ki nongïashim bynta ki long u Mukesh Repaswal, IT Director, Shimla, HP; u Krishna Kumar Deputy Commissioner, Jiribam, Manipur; u Isaac Zothanpouia, PM, Mizoram State e-Governance Society, Mizoram bad Manabend Anil Goswami, Director, IT, Scientist E, NIC, ka Sorkar Assam.Halor ka pule puthi la pynïaid da ka Dr. Anjali Hazarika, bad ki nohimgïashi bynta ki long u Shyambir, IAS, Deputy Commissioner, Ganderbal, J&K; u Dev Raj Dhiman, Principal, Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh; ka Varnali Deka, District Commissioner, Nalbari, Assam; u Purva Garg, IAS, Secretary Education cum Chairperson, Samagra Shiksha, UT, Chandigarh.Halor ka phang Environment and Rural Development Sector la pynïaid da u Dr. NV Satyanarayana, Advisor ha ASCI bad ki nongïashim bynta ki long ka Varnali Deka, District Commissioner, Nalbari, Assam; u Dr. Shiv Kumar Upadhaya, Deputy Project Director, Almora, Uttarakhand; u Prasada Rao Vaddarapu, Conservator of Forests, Forest Department, Tripura; u Ajit Kumar Ranjan, District Commissioner, Wokha, Nagaland bad Chete Lohe, CEO, Chansu Organic Kiwi Producer Company Ltd, Phek, Nagaland.Shwa ban pynkut la pynbud da ka jingshad khasi tynrai.
title: AI KHUSNAM KA CIPS IA KA MEGHALAYA KUM KA JYLLA BA PYRKHAT THYMMAI HA KA KOIT KA KHIAH

content: Hadien 52 snem ka jingïoh jylla bapura, ka Jylla Meghalaya kan sa ïoh la ka jong ka jingrwai ieid ri jong ka jylla.Haba pynbna ïa kane, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma u la ong, “nga sngew kmen ban pyntip sha phi baroh ba ïa ka jingrwai ieid ri jong ka jylla la mynjur da ka Kynhun Myntri ka Sorkar mynta ka sngi.”U Sangma u la pyntip ba un sa pyllait paidbah ïa kane ka jingrwai ieid ri ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka Meghalaya Day ha Tura ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.“Kane ka dei ka khyllipmat kaba sngewsarong bad kaba dap jingkmen namarba ka jylla kam don ïa ka jngrwai ieid ri la ka jong mynta la 52 snem,” u la ong.“Nga ai khublei ïa ka tnat Arts and Culture bad ïa kito kiba la don bynta ban thaw ïa kane ka jingrwai bad nga ai khublei kyrpang ïa ka jingtrei shitom jong ki naduh kaba thoh ïa ki kyntien jingrwai bad ïa ka sur kaba bang,” ula ong.
title: HA KA MEGHALAYA DAY HA TURA YN PYLLAIT PAIDBAH ÏA KA STATE ANTHEM

content: Ka Jylla Meghalaya mynta ka sngi saitjaiñ ka la rakhe ïa ka jingdap 52 snem ka jingïoh ïa ka jylla bapura ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha District Auditorium and Library ha Tura.U Lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan u la long kum u Kongsan, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma kum u Symbud Kongsan, ka Myntri kaba peit ïa ka tnat I&PR ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la long kum ka kongsan ba kyrpang.Ïa kane ka jingrakhe la pynlong ruh ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka jylla.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Lat u la ai khublei ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya bad u la ai burom ruh ïa ki nongïalam kiba la ïohi jngai ban ïakhun na ka bynta ban pynïoh ïa la ka jong ka jylla, ïa ki nongïaleh laitluid bad ïa baroh ki briew kiba la don bynta ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki shipai Phareng bad kiba la aiti lut ïa la ka jong ka jingim na ka bynta ban ïada ïa la ka jong ka lariti bad ïa la ka ri.Da kaba pynpaw ïa ki jingkiew shaphrang ha baroh ki liang ha ka jylla, u Lat u la ong, “ka jingpynïasoh ïa ki surok bad ki lynti ki syngkien ka long kaba donkam ban tei ïa ka lawei jong ka jylla. Ka jingtrei shitom ka dang ïaid shakhmat ban shna ïa ki surok bad ïa ki jingkieng ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ki district ka jylla. Ka Sorkar jong ngi ka la tei ruh ïa ki jaka ai jingsumar kum ki Hospital, ki CHC, PHC ha kylleng ka jylla khnang ban pynpoi ïa ki lad ai jingsumar sha ki shnong ba kyndong tam ha ka jylla.  Ka dei ka jingsarong ïa ka jylla Meghalaya naba ka long kaba lai ha ka ri bad kaba nyngkong eh ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ban don ïa ka Comprehensive Policy halor ka Mental Health and Social Care,” la ong u Lat ka Jylla.Ha ka jingkren pynkut, u Lat u la kyntu ïa ka imlang ka sahlang ban ïatreilang ryngkat na ka bynta ban pyllait luid ïa ka jylla na u drok.U Myntri Rangbah haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la ïathuh ïa ki kam pynroi kiba la pynsdang da ka Sorkar Jylla bad ong ruh ba ka jingpynlut jng ka Sorkar ka la long palat ar shah haba ïanujor bad ki san snem kiba ladep, ha kaba ha u snem 2017-2018 ka Sorkar ka la pynlut jin haduh 9000 klur ha u snem 2023-2024 bad jan 21,000 klur la pynlut ha ka Financial Year.U la ïathuh shuh shuh, hapoh ka skhim PMGSY naduh u snem 2018 haduh mynta ka jingshna ïa ka surok ka la long haduh 2526 Kilometres na ka PMGSY, kaba la pynïasoh ïa ki 600 tylli ki shnong bad kaba ïapher na kaba ladep kaba long tang 70 tylli.  Ka jingbhah pisa na ka bynta ban pynbna ïa ki ophis jong ki Block ka la ïaid shakhmat.  Baroh 2500 tylli ki skul sorkar ki la ïoh pisa ban shna ïa ki ing skul kiba thymmai ne ban pyndep ïa ka jingmaramot ïa kiba la tor, u la bynrap.Shuh shuh u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ruh ba ka jingphaikhmat kyrpang ka long ruh sha ki nongrep, ki kynthei bad ki khynnah jong ka jylla, la ka long ha kaba pynkha ïa ki Self Help Groups, ne lyngba ka rwai ka siaw, ka jingsengkam bad ka sport, kiba baroh ki la nang kiew shaphrang ha ka jylla.Ka Myntri kaba peit ïa ka tnat I&PR ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba ka jingkiew shaphrang jong ka jylla ha kine  ki snem ka dei ka jingïalam lynti jong u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma. Ka la ong ba ka Sorkar ka la nang pynroi shuh shuh ïa ki tnat treikam kum ka Agriculture, Tourism, Power Generation, Education, Information Technology, Entrepreneurship bad baroh ki tnat treikam.Kum ka jingrakhe ïa kane ka sngi, u Lat u la pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai jong ka jylla ne ka State Anthem ba la thaw da u Bah (L) Neil Nongkynrih, u nongseng ïa ka Shillong Chamber Choir.Ha kane ka sngi, la sam ïa ka khusnam Meghalaya Day sha u Bah Risingbor Kurkalang ïa ka ‘U Tirot Sing Award’ na ka bynta ka Arts & Literature, ka Dr. Delphine G. Momin ka la ïoh pdiang ïa ka Pa Togan Sangma Award na ka bynta ka Social Services bad u Bah Phrangki Buam u la ïoh pdiang ïa ka ‘U Kiang Nangbah Award’ na ka bynta ka Sports & Games.15 ngut ki nongshong shnong ki la shah pynkup burom da ka Governor’s Police Medal  na ka bynta u synniang u bynhei jong ki, 6 ngut la ai ïa ka Chief Minister’s Disaster Response Medal bad 21 la ai ïa ka Meghalaya Day Excellence Awards 2023.
title: AI BUROM U LAT IA KI NONGÏALEH HILL STATE HA KA JINGDAP 52 SNEM KA JINGÏOH JYLLA PURA KA MEGHALAYA

content: Tura, K’lyngkot 20 : Ka jingiakop siat khnam jong ka Meghalaya Games kaba 5 ka la poi sha kaba kut ha ka 20 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024 hynne ka sngi ha Monfort Centre for Education School, Danakgre, TuraHa ka jingiakhun final jong ka Indian Round (Team Event) ki kynthei, ka West Khasi Hills District ka la khur ia ka takma ksiar hadien ba ka la jop ia ka East Khasi Hills.Ha ka Indian Round (Team Event) ki shynrang, ka South West Khasi Hills District ka la lah ba kan khur ia ka takma ksiar hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka East Khasi Hills.Ha ka Recurve Mixed Team, ia ka takma ksiar la khur da ka West Jaintia Hills hadien ba ka la jop ia ka South West Khasi Hills, kaba la khur ia ka takma rupa.Kumjuh ha ka Indian Round Mixed Team, ka East Khasi Hills District ka la lah ban khur ia ka takma ksiar hadien ba ka la jop ia ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane kine ki jingiakhun final la wan sakhi lang da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma, kumjuh u Myntri ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs u Bah Shakliar Warjri, u MLA ka Jowai Constituency u Bah Wailadmiki Shylla, u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah D.P Wahlang, u DGP ka Jylla u Dr. LR Bishnoi, ki dkhot ka Archery Association of Meghalaya bad kiwei kiwei.
title: RAH KA WKH, SWKH, WJH & EKH HA KA ARCHERY

content: Ha ka sien kaba nyngkong ha ka history jong ka Meghalaya Cricket Association u samla khasi ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Kishan Lyngdoh u la lah ban kamai 268 ron tang marwei ha ka lympung ialehkai Ranji trophy ha ka jingiakhun pyrshah ia ka Arunachal Pradesh kaba la long ha ka jylla Gujarat ha ka 5tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024.Ka kynhun lum khubor jong ka Batesi Tv ka la ioh ban iakren bad une u samla uba dei ruh u Captain jong ka Meghalaya Cricket Associaton ha kaba u la iathuh ba um shym la poi pyrkhat ba un lah ban kamai haduh 268 ron bad u pynpaw ruh ba ka dei ka jingngeit ka jong u ha u Blei ba u la lah ban ialehkai bha.  Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka Ranji Trophy ka dei ka Highest Level BCCI Tournament Domestic ba kano kano ka kynhun kaba ki ialehkai kam dei kaba suk.  U la ong ruh ba ha u snem 2021, 2022 u la sha jied ha ka IPL Auction kab a sngewsih ka long ba um shym la shah thied satia bad mynta u snem u don ka jingkyrmen ba un sa shah jied ha ka lympung ialehkai IPL da ka jinglah ban ialehkai bha ka jong u.U President jong ka Shillong Cricket Association (SCA) Bah Peter MacDonald Kharsawian u la ong ba ka jinglah kamai ron jong u Kishan Lyngdoh haduh 268 ron tang marwei ka dei ka nam bad ka jingsngewsarong ia ka jylla Meghalaya ha kaba ym pat ju don mano mano ruh u rangialehkai uba lah ban tied haduh 200 ron shaneng.U la pynpaw ruh ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya kiba bun na ki nongialehkai kriket ki dei kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew katba ki trai jylla pat ki duna bha haduh katta katta la ka long naduh mynshwa ne wat haduh mynta mynne namarba ki khynnah Khasi ki kham sngewtynnat ia ka jinglehkai phutbol bad kim da pynleit jingmut than ia ka jingialehkai kriket
title: 268 RON KAMAI U KISHAN LYNGDOH MARWEI HA KA RANJI TROPHY HA GUJARAT

content: Ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) ka la teipop ïa ka Sorkar MDA ba ïalam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP) halor ka jingbym ai jingbit ïa u Rahul Gandhi ban ai jingkren sha ki samla pule ha University of Science and Technology (USTM), Meghalaya ha ka sngi Baar.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wan phai na Ribhoi District, u President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala u la kynnoh ruh ba ka Sorkar MDA ba ïalam da ka NPP ka la shah khyrwait shabi ha ka Sorkar BJP na Delhi bad ha ka Sorkar BJP na AssamHa ka jubab ba la phah da u Deputy Commissioner ka Ribhoi District sha u President ka Ribhoi District Congress Committee Bah Charles Marngar u la pynpaw ba ïa ka No Objection Certificate (NoC) na u Vice Chancellor ka USTM bad na u Rangbah Shnong ym shym la pyndait satia ha ka aplikeshon pan jingbit.  U DC u la ong ruh ba la aipor ïa ki nongpynlong jingïalang ban phah ïa kine ki kot ba donkam ïa kaba kim shym la phah satia.  Namarkata ka aplikeshon kam long kaba pura.“Ngi la buh ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha USTM namarba ka Hall ka dei kaba heh kaba ngiam palat lai hajar ngut ki briew hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba ka Sorkar ba la ïalam da ka NPP, UDP bad ka BJP ki la kyntait ban ai jingbit. Kam pat dei ka jingïalap elekshon bad ka Model Code of Conduct kam pat treikam satia ha ka ri baroh kawei namar bym pat pynbna ïa ka tarik ban pynlong ïa ka elekeshon.  Ka jingbit ka long tang ka bynta ka Security bad ka NoC na ka University. Kaba sngewsih, ka pynpaw ba ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya hukum da ka Sorkar BJP na Delhi bad na u nongïalam ka North East,” la kynnoh u Bah Pala.“Ki paidbah ki dei ban buh jingmut, ha ka elekshon ka ban sa long ïa ka vote kaba ki ai sha kino kino ki seng saiñpyrthei ki bym dei na ka Congress ka mut hi ba ki ai vote ïa ka BJP. Kane ka pynpaw shynna hynnin ka sngi ba ki tieng thot thot ïa ka Congress bad khlem kano kano ka daw ki kyntait ban ai ïa ka jingpan jingbit,” la kynnoh shuh shuh u Bah Pala.U la ong shuh shuh ba ka jingkwah jong u Rahul Gandhi ban ai jingkren ha USTM kam long na ka bynta ka jingai jingkren ha ka saiñpyrthei na ka bynta ka jingïakren bad ki samla kumno ban ai jingkyrmen ïa ki samla.“Ka Bharat Jodo Yatra ka long ban pynïoh ïa ka hok sha ki samla. Ka jingïashim bynta jong ki samla bad ki paidbah, ka jingïakren bad ki kynthei, ka jingïakren bad ki nongrep, ka jingïakren bad ki nongbylla. Kane ka long shi bynta jong ka prokram. Watla ki (bor synshar District) pynsangeh ïa ngi ha USTM hynrei ngi la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha Hotel bad ki samla pule. Ha ka por 8 baje mynmiet ki samla pule ki wan sha Hotel bad u Rahul Gandhi u la ïohlad ban ïakren bad ki. Ngi la don ruh ïa ka jingïalang jong ka North East Congress Co-ordination Committee (NECC) mynta ka sngi. Kane ka pynpaw shynna ba ïa ka Sorkar jong ngi la kyrwait shabi da ka BJP namarba ka pyrshah ïa ka Yatra ong u Rahul Gandhi. Ka BJP kam kwah ba u Rahul Gandhi un don ka jingïadei bad ki paidbah. Ka jingmut jong ka Yatra ka long ban pynïajan bad ki paidbah, ban shah skhor ïa ki (jingeh) paidbah bad ban sngap ruh ïa ka jingpynsngew jong ki paidbah. Da kata ka lynti, ngin sa lah ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingkwah jong ki paidbah bad ynda la thaw ïa ka Sorkar ngin sa lah ban pynurlong. Ynda ngi la shna ïa ka Manifesto ngin dup lah ban pynrung ïa ka jingkular,” u la bynrap.Haba kynthah shuh shuh ïa ka Sorkar MDA, u Bah Pala u la ong, “ki paidbah ka Meghalaya ki dei ban pyrkhat bha bad ki dei ban tip ba kane ka Sorkar ka dei kaba shah khyrwait shabi ha ka BJP na Delhi bad na Assam. Ïa kane ngi sngewthuh na ka jingïakren bad u Director ka USTM uba la shah byrngem. Kane ka dei ka jingshah tynjuh kaba ngi mad ha North East. Ka jingbyrngem ka long ruh wat ïa ki shlem pule bad ïa ki paidbah, bad ïa ki nongkhaii.”“Ka NPP bad ka BJP ki long kajuh. Ngi pynrem jur balei ym shym ai jingbit ïa ngi hynrei balei pat la ai jingbit ïa kiwei ki party,” u la ong.
title: BYM ÏOH JINGBIT BAN PYNLONG JINGÏALANG HA USTM, KDEW KTI KA CONGRESS ÏA KA SORKAR MDA

content: Da ka jingiatrei lang bad ka Dorbar Shnong Laitumkhrah lem bad ki tnad treikam ka Sorkar Jylla ka MLA jong ka Laitumkhrah Constituency ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba long ruh ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la lum ia ka jingialang ban ia pyrkhat halor ka jingpynkhreh ban pynkynriah ia kiba die madan ha ka shnong Laitkumkhrah, Shillong sha kawei pat ka jaka ban lait na ka dkheng kali, khamtam eh hadien ba la plie ki skul hapoh ka shnong Laitumkhrah.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong, lada ka iaid beit kumba la thmu yn sa lah ban pynkynriah ia ki nongdie madan hapoh ka shnong Laitumkhrah.Ka la ong ruh, hapdeng ka 10 tarik haduh 15 tarik yn sa phah da ka shithi ban pynkynriah ia ki nongdie madan naduh Police Point shaduh Beat House khnang ban pynsuk ia ki nongleit nongwan haba iaid lynti ha Laitumkhrah.
title: RYNGKAT BAD KA DORBAR SHNONG PYNKHREH KA MLA BAN PYNKYNRIAH ÏA KIBA DIE MADAN

content: Haba peit ia ki kyntien ba kren u Rahul Gandhi ki dap da ki jingshukor jing pynbeij, ka BJP Meghalaya Pradesh ka kob ia u nongialam ka congress ia ki jingkren jong u lada u buh nongrim watla tang shiteng ia ki jingialap jong u ha ka jingialang paidbah ha Nongpoh.“Ngi kylli ia u Rahul Gandhi ban pynshai ha kano ka dur ba ka jinglong, ka histori, ka rukom im rukom sah ki nong Meghalaya ka shah thombor, ka BJP ka la ban pynshai ia ki kam kaba ka la leh naduh tynrai ha ki rukom bapher bapher lyngba ki Morchas ka party kumno kan lah ban iarap ia ka imlang ka sahlang bad ban kiew ki paid meghalaya, ym dei ba ngi kawang ktieh ia ka party congress kaba lah synshar ia ka ri jong ngi kum ba 40 snem eiei , ka BJP ka kdew ruh ruh ba ki nongkitkam jong ka party ka bun hapdeng ki trai muluk ka ri, ha ki distrik bapher bapher na sor shaduh nongkyndong ki dang kiew katba dang mih ki sngi.  Ka jingkylli ka long lada ngi kum ka party BJP lada ngi pynjlor ia ki rukom im rukom sah ki paid meghalaya kumno ki paidbah naduh na sor bad na sha kyndong ka jylla meghalaya ki wan iasnoh lang bad ka party jong ngi, la kylli ka BJP ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Baar.“Lada ngi leh sniew ki nongkitkam jong ngi ki ym kiew manla ka sngi ym ki nongkitkam ka congress kiba dang duh jait,” la ong ka BJP.Ka BJP ban shu pynkynmaw ruh ia u Rahul Gandhi ba ki riew shlur jong ka jylla meghalaya ki ioh ia ka jingpynkup burom bad ka jingkynmaw na ki paidbah,  ban shu kren noh ngim kynmaw  ba ka congress ka ju leh kumta.“U Rahul Gandhi u la kren ba ka ktien Khasi bad Garo kam don ha ka Eighth Schedule tangba u klet pat ia ki nong Jaintia, tang hangne u la pynshai ba um pat tip bha shaphang ka tynrai ki paidbah Meghalaya, um don jingtip jingithuh ia ki paidbah bad ka jinglong jong ka ri hi baroh kawei,” la kynthoh ka BJP.“Ka BJP ka kwah ruh ban tip bad ban kylli la ka Songress ka lah leh aiu ha ki 60 snem ba ladep ha ka por ba ki dang don ha ka bor synshar ha ka ri india baroh kawei bad ha ki shnong ki thaw bad balei u Rahul um pynmih ia kita ki kyntien ha ka por ba u dang don ha ka bor, hynrei tang ki jingkylli bym don nongrim,” la buh jingkylli ka BJP ia ka Congress.“Ha ka por ba kren shaphang ka Manipur u Rahul u pynsngew kumba ka jingiakhih ka Manipur ka dei naduh ba synshar ka BJP, hynrei u klet ba ka iing ka sem jong u kam pat tip ne wan bha shane sha thaiñ shatei lammihngi ne shim kabu ban iarap.  Ngi kiba dei ki trai ri ngi tip bha ba ka Congress ka khlem wad lad ban pynbha ne pyniasuk ia ka jingiadei ha kane ka thaiñ. Ha kato ka por ngim dei ban klet ba ka Congress ka don ha ka bor ha ka ri bad ha Manipur hynrei lehnohei ba kam don ka jingiarap na ka seng ba synshar ha kato ka por, phi lah klet ia kata Rahul Gandhi? la kylli biang ka BJP.“Mynta lada ka BJP ka wanrah ki lad jingsuk bad ban pynjem ia ka jingjia ha Manipur u Rahul Gandhi u wan ai ding pynban tangba kine ki dei ki rukom trei ka Congress naduh mynshuwa,” la sangah ka BJP.“Tang ban shu pynkynmaw ia u Rahul Gandhi ka jingleh donbor dei ka polisi jong ka congress bad ki nong pyniaid ba hiar pateng kumjuh. Ka BJP ka ngeit skhem ba ka jingiatrei bad ka jingiadei jong ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla kumjuh ka lah wanrah ha ki rukom treikam bapher bapher ha ka thain Shatei Lammihngi hi baroh ka wei. Rahul Gandhi, ka ladei ka por ba phin sa ngeh noh ia ka Bharat Todo Unyay Yatra jong phi! kynthoh ka BJP.
title: “RAHUL GANDHI, SANGEH NOH ÏA KA LYNTI SHUKOR HA KA RI JONG NGI”: BJP MEGHALAYA

content: Ka jylla Meghalaya mynta ka sngi ka la rakhe ïa ka jinglong tynrai ha ka jingïalang ‘One District One Product’ (ODOP) Sampark bad la pynkup burom ïa ki nongjop na ka jylla ha ka jingïalang ODOP Sampark kaba la long ha Mumbai.Ka Invest India, ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka Tnat ka rep ka riang, Sorkar Meghalaya ka la pynlong ïa ka prokram ODOP Sampark ha nongbah Shillong. Ha ka jingïalang la pyni bad kyntiew ïa ki tiar na ka thaiñ, kaba la noh synniang sha ka jingkiew ka ïoh ka kot bad ka jingriewspah ka deiriti jong ka thaiñ.Ka Myntri ba dei khmih ïa ki kam rep jong ka jylla Meghalaya, Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la batai shaphang ki kam Aatmanirbhar Bharat jong ka jylla. Ka la ai jingïaroh ïa baroh kiba don bynta ha ka kam ODOP kiba la ïoh jingithuh lyntba ki khusnam ODOP, bad ka la kdew sha ka bynta kaba heh jong ka jingïalam lynti ïa ki nongseng kam ha ki kam ai jingpyntip kiba wanrah ïa ki khubor kiba ïadei bad ki jingjop jong ki nongrep na ki jaka ba kyndong tam. Ha ka jingkren shaphang ka jingïatreilang hapdeng ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla, ka la ong ba kane ka la kyntiew ïa ki lad ki lynti ïa ki nongrep bad ki ophisar na ka bynta ka jingbei tyngka.Ka ODOP Sampark ka ai ka rynsan ban pyni ïa ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka Meghalaya bad ki jinglong kyrpang jong ki distrik. Dang shen, ka Meghalaya ka la jop ïa ka takma rnong ha ka thup ki Jylla (B) ha ka National ODOP Awards kaba la pynlong ha ka Bharat Mandapam ha ka 3 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024.U Vice President ka Invest India, Dr.Preet Deep Singh u la ban jur halor ka jingkhlaiñ ka India ha kaba ïadei bad u shynrai kaba wan na ka jingbun curcumin. U la batai ruh shaphang ka sienjam ODOP jong ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka jingjop jong u Shynrai Lakadong. U la ong ba u shynrai Lakadong na Meghalaya u long ka dak jong ka jingjop ha kaba la ïoh jingïaroh ha Davos namar ka jingïaid iew ha Europe. Gati Shakti ka dang pynbeit ïa ki jingeh logistic ha ka jingdon jingem ha ka kam shalan mar. Ka bynta kaba kongsan ban wanrah ïa ka jingsngew sarong ka dei ka jingbteng ïa ki sienjam ban pynbha shuh shuh ïa ki mar, u la ongU Bah Maqbool Lyngdoh Suiam, ODOP- State Nodal Officer u la don lang ha kane ka sngi. U la ai ka jingkren pdiang sngewbha bad u la jubab ïa ki jingkylli ba la wanrah da ki nongïashim bynta.Ki nongrep bad ki nongseng kam lajong ha ki kam rep ki la batai shaphang ki jingjop jong ki ha kane ka sngi. Ki la kren shaphang ka jingkyrshan jong ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba ka Mission Lakadong, Mission Jackfruit bad PRIME program, khnang ban pynryntih ïa ka jingbha jong ki mar bad ban pynpoi sha ki iew hapoh bad shabar ri.Ka Kong Padma Trinity Saioo, na West Jaiñtia Hills distrik ka la batai shaphang ka jingïaid lynti jong ka ha ka kam rep shynrai Lakadong ha ka jingkyrshan jong ka Spices Board of India. Mynta ka pynbiang shynrai Lakadong sha palat 15 tylli ki jylla ha ka ri. U Perastil Sangma na South Garo Hills distrik u la ieh noh ïa ka kam sorkar jong u ban sdang ïa ka kam lajong kaba ïadei bad u sohphan. Mynta u die ïa ki mar ba shna na u sohphan na ki dukan bapher bapher ha kylleng ka jylla.Kumjuh ruh, u Bah Sunny Malngiang na East Khasi Hills distrik u la kren shaphang u sohniamtra (Khasi Mandarin) ba la ïoh GI tag, ba ïaid iew bha ha ki nongbah kum ka Bangalore ha kaba la pynlong dang shen ïa ka Khasi Mandarin. Ka Citrus rejuvenation program jong ka tnat kam rep ka la kyntiew ïa ka jingrep. Shuh shuh ka jingshalan ïa u sohniamtra sha Middle East ka la ai mynsiem bha ïa ki nongrep ba kin rep kham bun ïa une u soh.U Lotsing Sangma na East Garo Hills distrik u la kren shaphang ka jingkyrshan jong ka Sorkar kaba la plie lad ïa u ban pynïar ïa ki kam jong u kiba ïadei bad u sohtrun ha kaba u la kham ïohnong. U Bah Precious Tmung na Ri Bhoi distrik u la pyni ïa ki jaiñ eri silk hapoh ka brand ‘Zong hi’ bad u la ïathuh shaphang ka jingïaid lynti jong u ban pyntylli bad pynkhlaiñ ïa ki nongthaiñ jaiñ ban khyllie im biang ïa ki jaiñ tynrai ba ju phong da ki briew ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkyntiew ïa ki mar ka Meghalaya, ka jingsaiñdur bad ka jinghiar pateng ka deiriti, ka Sorkar Jylla, ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka Invest India, ka dang pyrshang ban seng ïa ka iew na ka bynta ki nongsaiñdur, ka Unity ne Ekta Mall. La thmu ba kane kan long ka jaka pdeng ïa ki briew ba kin ïohi ïa ka jinglong tynrai jong ka Meghalaya.Ka jingïalang mynta ka sngi ka la plie ka lad ba kyrpang ïa baroh kiba ïadon bynta ha kine ki kam da kaba kynthup lang ïa ki ophisar Sorkar, ki nongdie ODOP bad kito kiba ïadon bynta lang, ki ophisar kiba ïadei bad ki lad pathai khubor. Ka la wanrah ïa ka jingïamir jingmut shaphang ki jingeh bad ki lad kiba don hakhmat ki jaka pynmih mar ha kaba la plie lad ïa ka jingïatreilang bad ka jingnoh synniang na ka bynta ka roi ka par.Kito kiba wan ïashim bynta ki la ïoh lad ban ïohi ïa ka jingïar ki mar kiba na Meghalaya ha ka jingpyni ïa kine ki mar ba shna ha ka jylla.Da kaba phaikhmat bad kyntiew kawei ka mar na kawei ka distrik, kane ka sienjam ka wanrah ïa ka jingkiew ka imlang sahlang bad ka ïoh ka kot ha ki thaiñ ha kaba la pyni ïa ki cluster ba kyrpang bad ki jaitbynriew kiba la tei ïa la ka jinglong kaba kyrpang.
title: BATAI KA DR. AMPAREEN LYNGDOH SHAPHANG KA AATMANIRBHAR BHARAT KA JYLLA HA KA ODOP

content: Shillong, K’lyngkot, 23: U President ka United Democratic Party (UDP) Bah Metbah Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Baar u la ong ba ka UDP kam kyrshan satia ïa ka jingdawa jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ban thung biang ïa ki ophisar ha ka Meghalaya Lokayukta namar ba ka Sorkar ka weng ïa lai ngut ki ophisar tohkit ka dei namarba ka aiñ kam shah ban thung biang ïa ki ophisar ba la shongthait na ka kam.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Metbah u la ong ba ka aiñ ka la shai kdar ba ki ophisar tohkit ka dei beit da ki ophisar kiba dang don ha ka kam ym da kiba la shongthait bad dei na kata ka daw ba ka UDP kam kyrshan satia ïa ka jingdawa jong ka VPP.”Ngim lah ban kyrshan ïa kaei kaba ki (VPP) dawa namar ka jingdawa jong ki kam dei kaba shongnia shongaiñ,” u la ong.Haba kylli la kane ka jingïakhih ka VPP ka dei beit na bynta ka jingmyntoi saiñ hima, u Bah Metbah u la jubab, “ngam kwah ban ong eiei ïa kane namar kiwei kiwei ki party ki don la ki rukom treikam na kata ka daw ngam kwah ban kynthoh ïa ka kam jong kiwei ki party.”Ka VPP ka la pynlong da ka jingïakhih ha ka sngi Thohdieng jong ka taiew baladep bad hynnin ka Lah Sngi u Blei da kaba tur sha Secretariat ban dawa ïa ka Sorkar ba kan thung biang ïa ki lai ngut ki ophisar ba la weng na ka Meghalaya Lokayukta halor ka nongrim ba la weng ïa ki lai ngut ki ophisar haba ki dang tohkit ïa ka jingbamsap pyrshah ïa u bahaiing jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K.Sangma.Ka VPP ka la pynsangeh shwa shipor ïa ka jingïakhih hadien ba ka Myntri ka tnat Aiñ jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la kular ban sa buh sngi ban pynlong da ka jingïalang hapdeng ïa ka VPP bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ban ïakren halor kane ka jingdawa jong ka VPP.
title: KYNTAIT KA UDP BAN KYRSHAN ÏA KA VPP IA KA JINGDAWA BAN THUNG ÏA KI OPHISAR HA LOKAYUKTA

content: Ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) ka kynhun synrop jong ka UDP bad HSPDP ha ka sngi Baar ki la pynithuh paidbah ïa u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin kum u kyrtong ban aireng ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong Seat.Kane ka jingïalang ka dei ruh ka jingsdang ïa ka jingïalap elekshon jong ka RDA ïa u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin.Haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang u Chairman ka RDA u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh uba long ruh u President ka UDP u la ong ba ka jingïatreilang ki ar tylli ki seng riewlum ka dei namarba ki paidbah ki angnud ba kine ki ar tylli ki seng saiñpyrthei trai ri kin don ka jingïatreilang bad u la ong ba mynta ka dei sa ka pali ki paidbah ban ai jingkyrshan pura ïa u Bah Robert uba kum ka kynhun ki la i biang ban sei.U Secretary ka RDA Bah KP Pangniang uba dei ruh u President ka HSPDP u la ong ba ka jingsei ïa u Bah Robert ka dei ka jingangnud ban rah biang ïa ka burom ka jaidbynriew hakhmat ka pyrthei bad ka dei sa u paidbah ban shim khia ïa kane ka mat.U Co chairman ka RDA Bah Martle Mukhim kum u riew saiñpyrthei ba la ih bha u la ong ba ka jingïaid lynti jong ki seng saiñpyrthei trai ri ha ki snem kiba kham mynshuwa ka ladei ka sakhi ba lada ka UDP bad ka HSPDP ka ïatreilang u kyrtong ba ka sei ki ju jop beit na kata ka daw ha kane ka kynti kum ka kynhun kim don kano kano ka jingartaien ba u Bah Robert un jop ha kane ka elekshon ban wan.Ha kane ka sngi u Bah Robertjune u la ai ruh ka jingkren kaba nyngkong eh ban ïalap ïa ka elekshon MP kum u kyrtong ka UDP uba la sei ïa shibun bah ki mat kiba u don ka thong na bynta ka jaidbynriew bad ka jylla baroh kawei.U la ong ba ki paidbah nongkyrshan jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) bad ki paidbah jong ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency kim dei ban pynsep ei ïa ka vote jong ki ban kyrshan ïa u kyrtong ka VPP namar um don jingkyrmen ban jop namar ka VPP ka dang tlot ha kiba bun ki constituency.U la ong ba ha ka elekshon kaba dang shu dep dei ka UDP kaba jop bun tam ki MLA na baroh ki seng riewlum bad ka jingdon jong ki MDC ruh kiba bun tam na ki seng riewlum dei na ka UDP na kata ka daw u don ka jingsngew skhem ba kum u kyrtong ka RDA ba la kyrshan lang da ka UDP un dei tang ma u na para kyrtong seng riewlum kiba don ka bor ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki kyrtong ki national party.U la kular ba un long u simpah simsong jong ka jaidbynriew ha Parliament ban kren ïa ki jingeh jong ka jaidbynriew bad ban long ruh ka sur ban pyrta jam ïa ki jingangnud ka jaidbynriew ha kiba bun bah ki mat ba kynthup naduh ka ILP, ka Ktien Khasi, ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka Sixth Schedule bad kiwei kiwei ki mat.Shuh shuh u ong ba um shym mutdur satia ba ki nongïalam barangbah ka RDA ki ibit ban jied ïa u kum u kyrtong ban aireng na Shillong Seat bad pynpaw ba ha kano ka nongrim kine ki nongïalam ki ki pynshong nongrim ïa u kum u kyrtong ka RDA namar u dei tang uba rit eh ha ka kyrdan ban ïa nujor bad kiwei pat.U la ong ba u shim ïa kane ka jingjied jong ka RDA ïa u uba dei uba duk bad ba khun swet u bym pat don jingtbit ha ka saiñpyrhtei ruh hynrei ka jingbynshet jong ka RDA ba un long u kyrtong ka la dei ka jingai burom ba khraw bad ka pyni shai ba ka RDA ka dei ka kynhun jong u duk u rangli, u khun swet bad ki shem lanot.U Bah Kharjahrin u la pynpaw ba ka jingmih jong u ban aireng ha kane ka elelction MP ka long ym ban kynthoh ïa kiwei ki seng ne ïa kiwei ki kyrtong hynrei ban kren ïa ki nongrim kiba u don na bynta ka jaidbynriew baroh kawei bad ka jylla hi.
title: KI SENG RIEWLUM KI LA ÏATYLLI, KA DEI SA KA PALI KI PAIDBAH BAN KYRSHAN ÏA U KYRTONG KA RDA: METBAH

content: Ka Pradesh Election Committee, Meghalaya jong ka Seng Congress ha ka sngi Baar ka la shong jingïalang ïathir ïatai bad ban ïathew ïawoh hadien ba ka la ïoh pdiang ïa ki kyrteng jong ki nongpan tiket na ka bynta ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shilong bad Tura Seat ka ban sa long mynta u snem.U nongïalam jong ka Congress Legislature Party (CLP) Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la kyntait ban ïathuh ïa ki kyrtengjong ki nongpan tiket bad ong ruh ba ka kam por kam long satia ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa ki nongpan tiket hynrei yn sa pynbna paidbah ïa ki kyrtong shwa ka taiew bakhatduh mynta u bnai ynda la ïoh ïa ka jingmynjur na ka All India Congress Committee (AICC).Haba kylli, haduh katno ka Congress ka kam nongkynti ban jop biang ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong khamtam eh hadien ba ka la jop tang san Seat ha ka elekshon Assembly, u President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala u la ong, “haoid, ka long kaba jwat bha ïa ka Congress mynta ka kynti hadien ka jingmih noh jong ki nongïalam bad ki nongtrei ka party ha u snem baladep hynrei watla katta kat shaba ngi leit ngi ïoh ïa ka jingieid jong u paidbah ha manla ki jingïalang kiba ngi la pynlong.”“Ngi la tynrong kam ha ki MLA, ki MDC bad ha ki nongïalam jong ka party ba kin pynkhreh noh ïa ka elekshon,” u la ong.“Ngi don ka jingkyrmen ba ngin jop biang mynta ka kynti ruh,” u la ong.Na Shillong Seat, ïa mynta, la mih da u Bah Vincent H. Pala kum u MP ka Congress.Haduh mynta, ki kyrtong kiba la paw kyrteng ban aireng na Shillong Seat ki long u kyrtong ka VPP Dr. Ricky J. Syngkon, ka kyrtong ka NPP ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh bad u kyrtong ka RDA Bah Robert June Kharjahrin.Na Tura, haduh mynta tang ka NPP kaba la pynbna ban pynieng biang ka Sitting MP ba mynta ka Agatha Sangma.
title: SHAHNIAH U BAH VINCENT PALA BAN JOP BIANG DA KA JINGIEID KI PAIDBAH ÏA KA CONGRESS

content: Dang ha kine ki sngi ki nongïalam ka seng Congress ha kane ka jylla, ki la kynnoh ba Sokar Jylla ka la khang ïa ka jingleit u Rahul Gandhi sha USTM ha Ri-bhoi  hadien ka jing pynbor kaba la wan na Assam bad na Delhi.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka BJP ka la ong, “phewse ka USTM ka la pynshai paidbah lyngba ka Social Media ba ka seng Congress kam shym la ïoh jingbit na ki bor synshar ka Ribhoi District, kumta ka USTM kam banse ban pynsangeh noh shwa ïa ka jingai jaka ban pyndonkam da ka seng ha ka sngi ba wan u Rahul Gandhi.  Ka jingkhein sting jong ka seng Congress ban pynbiang ïa ki kot ki sla ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ka pynpaw ïa ka jing bymkhein snep jong ka seng Congress ïa ki bor sorkar bad kane ka pyni shai ïa ka jinglong barieh jong ki nongïalam jong kane ka seng.”“Ka BJP Meghalaya ka kyrpad ïa ki nongïalam ka seng Congress ba kin long shida noh ha ka rukom treikam jong ki bad lada ka long kaba khia haduh katta katta ïa ki, kim dei ban shu kren laplah kumne manla ka por. Kane ka jingbuhrieh ïa ki jingshisha bad ban kynnoh khlem nongrim jong ka seng Congress ka pynpaw ïa ka jingjaboh ka jingbymlerkam bad ka jinglongbuit poh jong ki nongïalam ka seng,” la ong ka BJP.“Na ka por sha ka por ka seng Congress ka ju kynnoh ba ka BJP ka synshar donbor hynrei ka la klet mo ïa ka Emergency? Mano ba synshar donbor ïa ka ri ha kito ki snem hato ym dei ka seng congress? Mano ba ju mlien ban wanrah ïa ka president rule bad ban weng jubor ïa ki sorkar jylla ba la jied da ki paidbah, hato kam dei ka seng congress? Mano ba la set jubor bad khang ïa ki nongthoh khubor ban kren laitluid, hato kam dei ka seng Congress? Kane ka rukom ban shu kynnoh laplah bad ban kdew kti ka pawshai ba ka seng Congress kam don jingmut eiei ban ai ka jingshakri kaba khuid sha ki paidbah,” la kynthoh ka BJP.“Ka por ka la kylla ba ki nongshong shnong ki kwah ïa ka jingsynshar kaba khuid, kaba ïohi paw bad kaba don ïa ka jingkular kaba skhem. Balei ka BJP ka jop elekshon na ka por sha ka por dei namarba ka la lah ban wanrah ïa kita ki jingkylla baroh bad ki paidbah ki hun ïa kata,” la pynksan ka BJP.“Kumba ka ktien “Satyameva jayate” ka ong ba ka hok kan ieng rasong, ka pawshai na kane ka jingjia ha USTM ba ka seng Congress kan sa duh biang ïa ka jingshaniah jong ki paidbah ha kane ka elekshon MP ban sa wan,” la ong ka BJP.
title: NANG PAW SHUH SHUH KI JINGTHOK KA SENG CONGRESS, KYNNOH KA BJP

content: : U Samla Boltijoy Ryan Nongsiej uba la jop ïa ka nam Mister India 2023 Tourism Global ha Sangli, Maharashtra ha u snem 2023 u la shah jied ban mihkhmat ïa ka ri India ha ka International Pageant ka ban sa long ha ka ri Vietnam ha u bnai Jyllliew, 2024.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei u samla Boltijoy Ryan Nongsiej, ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ka kmie bad ka hynmen kynthei u la ïathuh ba ka jinglut jingsep na ka bynta ban leit ïashim bynta ha kane ka rynsan ïakob ka ban sa long ha ka Ri Vietnam ka long kaba bun kumta kum u samla uba wan na ka longïing longsem kaba duk bad kaba duna ka ïoh ka kot, u la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar Jylla, ïa ki kynhun bapher bapher bad ïa ki riewshimet kiba don ka mynsiem ïarap ba kin kyrshan lem ïa u na ka bynta kane ka jingthmu kaba bha khnang ban dup lah ban wanrah ïa ka nam ka burom ïa ka ri India, ïa ka Jylla Meghajaya bad ïa ka jaidbynriew hi baroh kawei.Une u samla un long ruh uba nyngkong eh na kane ka Jylla Meghalaya ban mihkhmat ïa ka ri India shabar ri ha ka jingïakob Mister Tourism Global ha ka King and Queen of Mister and Miss International kaba la ïatreilang bad ka Global Model India.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne ba une u samla mynta u dang pule ïa ka Master Degree ha ka Tourism and Travel Management ha Martin Luther Christian University, Shillong.
title: HA KA RYNSAN ÏAKOB HA VIETNAM YN MIHKHMAT U BOLTIJOY R. NONGSIEJ ÏA KA INDIA

content: : Ka Inspector Aniosca Basaïawmoit kaba long ka Senior Instructor ha Central Training Institute of Civil Defence and Home Guards, Meghalaya, Mawdiangdiang ka la shah pynkup burom da ka khusnam Medal for Meritorious Service (MSM) ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka Republic Day ba 75 snem jong ka ri India.Ka Inspector Basaïawmoit ka dei ka kynthei banyngkong eh na ka tnat Civil Defence and Home Guards ha ka jylla ban ïoh  pdiang ïa kane ka Meritorious Service Medal, ong u Divisional Commandant of Home Guards, Shillong Bah PH Shylla ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.Ka Ministry of Home Affairs dang shen ka la pynmih saw tylli ki Medal, ar tylli na ka bynta ka Gallantry bad ar tylli na ka bynta ka Service ïa kaba la ai sha baroh ki dkhot jong ka CAPF, State Police, Civil Defence & Home Guards, RPF, Correctional Services, Fire Service bad kiwei kiwei.La bujli ïa kine ki saw tylli ki Medal na ki medal barim kum ka Home Guards and Civil Defence Medal for Meritorious Service bad ka Police Medal for Meritorious Service etc.
title: ÏOH KHUSNAM KA SI ANIOSCA BASAIAWMOIT

content: : U State President ka BJP Meghalaya Pradesh u Wankitbok Pohshna u la pynphai nia ïa ka jingkren laplah jong u President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) u Bah Vincent H. Pala uba dei ruh u MP ka Lok Sabha na Shillong da kaba ong ba ka long kaba sngewlyngoh ba ka Congress ka hikai pynban ïa ka BJP halor ka jinglaitluid ban mane Blei.“Katba dei hi ka seng Congress hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Nehru kaba la wanrah nyngkong eh ïa ka aiñ rew kaba la tip kum ka Indian conversion (regulation and registration) Bill ha u snem 1954, kaba la thmu ban pynlong aiñ ha kaba ïadei bad ka “jingai jingbit ïa ki nongïalap bad ka jingpyntip sha ka Sorkar haba don ka jingkylla niam.  Ïa kane ka aiñ-rew la kyntait noh da ka Lok Sabha ha kato ki snem bad la sngewlyngoh ba kat u President ka MPCC um tip ïa kata bad ka pawshai ba une u nongmihkhmat u kwah tang ban pynsaphriang ïa ki khubor shukor bad ki bym don nongrim tang ban myntoi lade,” la kynthoh u Bah Pohshna.“Dang shen u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi u dang shu dep lum ïa ki nongïalam jong ki Niam Khristan kiba pawkhmat ha ka ri kum ka dak ban ïaleh kmen lang ha ka sngi Khrismas kaba dei ka sngi khraw jong baroh ki Khristan ha satlak pyrthei bad ha ka jingkren jong u Modi u la bynrap ba ka sngi Khristmas kam dei tang ka sngi lehkmen jong ki Khristan hynrei ka dei ka sngi bakhraw ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong hapoh ka ri India bad u la pynkynmmaw halor ka jingïajan jong u bad ki kynhun Balang mynba u dang long u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Gujarat bad khlem da klet u Modi ha u snem 2021 por ba ula leit ban ïakynduh ïa u Kpa Bakhuid Pope Francis ha Rome u la khot sngewbha ïa u Pope Francis ban wan jngoh ïa ka ri India kum u nongshahkhot sngewbha (national guest),” la ong u Bah Pohshna.“Kam don ka jingartatien ba baroh ki prokram ba la wanlam da ka Sorkar u Modi ki long ki bym shah liang ïano ïano bad ki Khristan ki ïoh ïa ka bhah kumjuh kumba ïohlang kiwei kaba pawshai ba ka BJP kadei kaba khmih lut ïa baroh khlem kano kano ka jingpynïapher. U Modi u ïalap ïa ki kyntien hindi ‘sabka saath sabka vikas saka prayas sabka vishwas’ kaba mut ka jingmyntoi ïa barohlang da ka jingshniah bad ka party BJP kam ju pyndonkam ïa ki ritpaid tang ban myntoi por elekshon kumba ka seng Congress ka ju mlien haduh mynta mynne ban pynsngewbha tang nalor nalor ïa ki ritpaid ban jop elekshon,” la ong  shuh shuh u nongïalam ka BJP.“Ha jaka ba u khlieh ka seng Congress un pynlut por ban pynsaphriang ïa ki khubor lamler u dei ban sei madan pynban ïa ki kam kiba ula leh kum u nongmihkhmat na Shillong Constituency ha jaka ban pynthohbria ïa kiwei ki seng tang ban ïoh jingmyntoi ïalade ha kane ka elekshon MP ban sa wan. Ka ri India ka la kiew shakhmat ha kine ki  khyndai snem shiteng jong ka Sorkar u Modi bad manla uwei pa uwei u nongshong shnong ha ka ri ki la lah ban put turoi ba ki long mynta kita ki nongrahktien jong ka ri India ba la kiew ha ka roi ka par bad kam slem shuh ban ngin sa ïoh ban kheit ïa uta u soh ym shuh kum ha ki por ba synshar ka Congress ba ka ri ka la sahdien shaba palat,” ula ong.“Ka jylla Meghalaya kaba don bun ki Khristan ka ïoh bhah na baroh ki skhim kiba u Modi ula wanrah, kum ka umdih ha manla ki thliew iing kum ka JJM, ka iing na ka bynta kiba jynjar lyngba ka PMAY, ka jingpynïoh tyndong lyer shet lyngba ka Ujwala, u khaw sha ki longing bajynjar lyngba ka PMGKY bad kaba kham kongsan ka jinglah ban ai ïa ka tika Covid kaba la pynlait ïa ngi baroh na ka khlam bad ki don shibun kiei kiei kiba la wanlam da ka Sorkar BJP kiba kum u MP u dei ban tip,” la ong ka BJP ïa u President ka MPCC.“Ka jingïohbhah ki paid riewlum na ka mang tyngka ka la kot sha ka 89000 klur tyngka ha kine ki khyndai snem shiteng jong ka synshar u Modi katba ha ki snem ba dang synshar ka Congress tang shipawa na katei ka song ruh ki khlem lah ban ai kaba paw ba hynriewphew snem kynthih ka seng Congress ka la lehbeiñ ïa ki paid riewlum da kaba pynduh ïa ki bhah badonkam ban kyntiew ïa ka jingim jong ki. U heh ka seng congress um dei ban klet ïa ki kyntien kiba u Rajiv Gandhi ba la khlad u ju kren’ ba na ka shi tyngka kaba mih na Delhi tang Khatsan naïa ka poi sha ki jylla ïa kaba ka seng BJP ka la lah ban tehlakam ïa ka kam bamsap bad ban pyntikna ba ka hok ki paidbah kan poi shispah na ka shispah sha ki’ la bynrap u Bah Pohshna.
title: CONGRESS YNNAI HIKAI ÏA NGI HALOR KA JINGLAITLUID, ONG U HEH BJP

content: Ka long ka jingsarong ïa ka jylla Meghalaya naba u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek uba long u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla uba peit ïa ka tnat Animal Husbandry and Veterinary u la shah pynkup burom da ka khusnam Dadasaheb Phalke ba la aiti da u Myntri Khynnah ka Sorkar Pdeng uba peit ïa ka tnat social justice u Ramdas Athawale ha ka ka jingïalang kaba la long ha NDMC Auditorium, Jantar Mantar, New Delhi ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki heh ki haiñ bad ki kynrem ki lyndan na kylleng ka ri India.U Bah Hek u la shah pynkup burom da kane ka khusnam kum u Myntri Sorkar ba tbit bad kum u nong shakri paidbah ba khlem shongthait na ki 25 tylli ki snem kiba u la long u nongmihkhmat jong ka Pynthorumkhrah Constituency bad nalor u synniang u bynhei ba u la noh sha ka jylla bad ka ri baroh kawei.Ka BJP Meghalaya Pradesh u ha u kyrwoh khubor ba la phah da u Chief Spokesperson u Bah Mariahom Kharkrang u la ïathuh ba u Bah Hek u la pynpaw ba ka jingshah jied ban ïoh pdiang ïa kane ka khusnam ka la pynkmen bad ka la nang aibor shuh shuh ïa u ban trei shitom na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ka jylla bad ka ri baroh kawei.
title: ÏOH KHUSNAM DADASAHEB PHALKE U BAH AL HEK KUM U MYNTRI SORKAR

content: : Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ha ka sngi Palei ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah ba kan pyndam noh mardor ïa ka kyntien “RR Colony” bad ban thoh bujli da ka kyrteng Them Rynjah.“Na ka liang jong ka Hima Mylliem naduh u snem 2019 ka la kynthup ïa ka RR Colony lane kata ka Refugee Colony hapoh ka jingpynïaid jong ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah bad ïa kane la pynskhem ruh da ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC),” la ong u Working President ka KHNAM Bah Thomas Passah ha u kyrwoh.“Ha kajuh ka por ka KHADC ka la pynduh ruh ïa ka kyrteng Refugee Colony lane RR Colony bad la jer da ka kyrteng tynrai ïa kane ka jaka kum ka “Them Rynjah”. Hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba haduh kine ki sngi bun bha ki Signboard kiba don ha kane ka jaka ki kdew beit da ka kyrteng “RR Colony” kaba long ka jingïalam bakla ïa kiba bun balang bad kaba pynïap ruh ïa ka jingbthah jong ka District Council,” la ong ka KHNAM.Halor kane ka seng ka la phah ka shithi sha ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah bad ka la kyrpad ruh ba kan pyndam ïa baroh kine ki jingthoh kyrteng ‘RR Colony” bad ban thoh bujli noh da ka kyrteng tynrai kumba dei, kata, “Them Rynjah” khnang ban lait na kano kano ka jingsngewthuh bakla.“Ngi la pyntip ruh ïa kane sha ka KHADC bad ngi ap khmih lynti ba ynda ngi la ïaid lynti biang na kane ka jaka ngin ïohi noh ïa ka kyrteng tynrai,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: DANG THOH BEIT HA SIGNBOARD ÏA KA KYRTENG, ‘RR COLONY’ WAT HABA LA JER THEM RYNJAH

content: : Hadien ka jingkhlad noh jong kawei ka samla kaba leit shah sumar ha NEIGRIHMS hospital hadien ba la mih ka jingkynnoh ba ka dei na ka jingleh torti bad ka jingleh bym patiaw jong ki nongsumar, ka Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) ha ka sngi Palei ka la ïakynduh ïa u Director u Dr. Nalin Mehta ban tih bniah ïa ka jingshisha.Katkum ka jingkynnoh jong ki bahaiing kane ka samla kaba la 23 snem ka rta ha ki lad pathai khubor la ong ba ki bor ba dei khmih ïa kane ka jaka sumar kim shym la pyni satia ïa ka Report bad ki la shu rah beit beit ïa ka nongpang sha Intensive Care Unit (ICU) naduh ka 17 tarik tad haduh ka 22 tarik ha kaba wat ki doctor ruh kim shym la leit jngoh satia ïa ka koit ka khiah jong kane ka samla.Shuh shuh ki bahaiing ki la pyntip ba ki bor pynïaid jong kane ka jaka ai jingsumar haba ki ïa ka Report kim shym la ai satia hynrei ki ai tang ïa ka Death Certificate jong kane ka samla hadien ba ka la khladnohHa ka jingïakynduh ïa u Director ïa ka kynhun jong ka HANM la lamkhmat da u President ka seng u Bah Lamphrang Kharbani bad aiti ruh da ka dorkhas ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor kane ka jingjia.Ha ka dorkhas, ka HANM ka la maham tyngeh lada ki dang don kum kine ki jingjia hapoh kane ka hospital, ka seng kam banse ban shim da kiwei pat ki lynti jong ka aiñ ne wat ban shu khang khyrdep noh shisyndon ïa kane ka hospital.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Assistant Secretary ka Seng u Bah Wyraiwan Sohtun u la ïathuh ba u Director u la pyntip ba hapoh 10 sngi yn thung ïa ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia bad na ka liang jong ka HANM ruh ka la kyntu ïa u Director ba u dei ban khlieh hi dalade ïa ka jingtohkit khnang ba kan long kaba khuid.Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la phah ruh da ka jingujor sha ka Meghalaya Medical Council ban dawa ba dei ban thung da ka jingtohkit halor ka jingjia ha NEIGRIHMS Hospital kaba lam sha ka jingduhei jong ka samla kaba la 23 snem ka rta ban duhei ïa la ka jong ka jingim.
title: WAT LEH ‘EXPERIMENT’ ÏA KI NONGPANG HADUH BAN DA IAP, MAHAM KA HANM ÏA KA NEIGRIHMS

content: Ka President jong ka Mahila Morcha, BJP Meghalaya Pradesh ka Kong Susuki Parïat ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih halor ka jingbym pynrung jong ka Sorkar Jylla ïa ka ktien Jaiñtia ha ka State Anthem ba la pyllait dang shen da ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap 52 snem ka jingïoh jylla bapura jong ka Meghalaya kaba la long ha Tura, West Garo Hills District.“Nga kum ka President jong ka Mahila Morcha nga sngewsih ba khlem pynrung ïa ka kyntien Jaiñtia ha ka State Anthem.  Kumba ngi tip ïa kane ka mat la ujor ruh da u Bah Alexander L. Hek uba long u Myntri Sorkar na ka BJP hapoh ka jingïalang jong ka kynhun Myntri hynrei ka Sorkar kam shym la sngap satia,” la ong ka Kong Pariat ha u kyrwoh.“Ïa ka Meghalaya ngi tip ba la phiah ha ki lai tylli ki thaiñ, ka rilum Khasi, ka rilum Jaiñtia bad ka rilum Garo.  Kumta ha ka jingsngew jong nga, ha ka jingrwai ruh dei ban pynrung ïa ki lai tylli ki jait ktien jong ki Khasi, ki Jaiñtia bad ki Garo,” ka la ong.“Hapoh ktien Khasi ki don bun ki tnat ktien kum ha War, Maram, Bhoi, ka ktien KHASI ka dei ka ktien kmie ïa kine ki tnat ktien.  Katba ka ktien Jaiñtia ka dei beit kajuh la ka dei ha Jowai ne ha Amlarem, Sutnga, Wahïajer, Shangpung ngi pyndonkam beit tang ka ktien Pnar.  Ka  Garo ruh ki kren kumjuh la ka long ha Tura ne  ha Williamnagar ne ha kano kano ka bynta jong ka rilum Garo. Namarkata ngi dei ban burom ïa kane,” la ong shuh shuh ka Kong Pariat.
title: BYM RUNG KA KTIEN JAIÑTIA HA KA STATE ANTHEM PYRSHAH KA PRESIDENT MAHILA MORCHA

content: U Bah Batskhem Ryntathiang uba dei u MDC jong ka Mairang-Nongkhlaw Constituency ha ka Palei ryngkat bad la ki nongkyrshan u la pyniasoh sha ka National Peoples Party ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha ka shnong Mairang.Ia u Bah Batskhem Ryntathiang la pdiang sngewbha da u State Working President jong ka NPP u bah Hamletson Dohling ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ka Kyrtong MP ka NPP na Shillong Seat ka  Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh nalor kiwei kiwei de ki nongialam bahakhmat jong ka party.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi ka NPP ka la pynskhem ruh ia ki nongkitkam jong ka NPP Mairang Block naduh ka Parent Body, ka Women’s Wing bad ia ka Youth Wing.
title: PRA KA KTEM CONGRESS HA MAIRANG, PYNÏASOH U MDC SHA KA NPP

content: Ki khynnah skul jong ka Mission Upper Primary School, Mawryngkneng ki la pyniap biej ia u Lat ka Jylla bad ia ki kynrem ki lyndan lyngba ka sap kilan met kumba ju leh ki shipai hashwa ban leit iakhun ia ki lehnoh ha ka jingrakhe ia ka Republic Day kaba la long ha nongbah Shillong ha ka sngi Thohdieng.La sakhi ruh ba kine ki khynnah skul, ki phong ia ka Uniform ba la suh da na ki borni bad kieng ruh ia ki suloi ba la shna kyrpang da ki dieng bad pyni ia ka sap kilan met da kaba bud ia ka sur jong ka ksing.Shwa ban pynkut ia ka jingkilan met, kine ki khynnah skul, ki la pyni ruh ia ka sap iakhun ban pynliem lyndang ia ki lehnoh.Ynda la wai ka Cultural Programme u DGP ka jylla uba la iap biej shaba palat ia kane ka jinglah jong ki khynnah skul ka Mission Upper Primary School Mawryngkneng ban pyni ia kane ka sap kilan met, u la khot bad shondur ban pynsah jingkynmaw ia kane ka sngi.Ha kane ka sngi, ka jingrakhe ia ka Republic Day kaba 75 snem jong ka ri India, ha nongbah Shillong la sakhi ba ka long kaba iphuh bad ka iphieng bha da ka jingwan shim bynta shitrhem ha ki jingiakop bapher bapher.Ha ka jingiakop march pass ka kynhun kaba wan balai la ioh rah da ka Sacred Heart Girls Higher Secondary School bad ka kynhun kaba wan baar la ioh rah da ka National Cadet Corps, Boys bad kaba ioh rah ia ka nam lahduh ka dei ka National Cadet Corps, Girls.Ha ka jingia pyninam ia ki Tableau ia ka nam kaba lai la iohrah da ka District A.H Veterinary office bad ia ka nam baar la ioh rah da ka Meghalaya State Skill Development Society katba ia ka nam kaba nyngkong la ioh rah da ka District Commerce and Industries Centre.Ha ka jingiakop ia ka Cultural Programme ia ka nam balai la ioh rah da ka Seng Khasi Higher Secondary School Shillong, katba ia ka nam baar la ioh rah da ka Mission Upper Primary School, Mawryngkneng bad ia ka nam ba nyngkong la ioh rah da ka Multipurpose Secondary School, Mawngap.Ia ka khusnam na ka bynta kine ki nongjap la sam da u Chief Secretary ka jylla u Bah DP Wahlang bad u Director General of Police (DGP) ka jylla u Dr. Lajja Ram Bishnoi.
title: KHRAM LIEM LYNDANG KI LEHNOH HA KI SHIPAI HA KA SNGI RAKHE REPUBLIC

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma u la pynher ia ka lama lairong jong ka ri ha ka jingrakhe ia ka Republic Day kaba 75 snem jong ka ri India.Ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u la pynkup burom ruh da ka khusnam Lifetime Achievement sha u Rodrick D Shira halor ka jingnoh ia u synñiang u bynhei sha ka jylla bad sha ka ri baroh kawei.U Rodrick D. Shira uba dei u samla pule barim jong ka IIT Kharagpur ha ka Electronics and Electrical Communication Engineering, u la ioh pdiang ia ka Gold medal ha ka bynta Electronics ha u snem 1967 bad u la trei hapoh ka Fertilizer Industries kum u Process Control Engineer bad trei ruh ha FCI Sindri bad u la shakri ha bynta bapher bapher jong ka ri. Hadien ba la jied da ka Public Enterprise Selection Board (PESB) ha u snem 1998 u la long u Director of Production ha ka Bongaigaon Refinery and Petrochemicals Limited ia kaba la tip mynta kum ka Indian Oil Corporation Limited bad u la shongthait na ka kam ha u snem 2003.Ha u snem 2017, u la shah jied ban shimti kum u Vice Chancellor banyngkong eh jong ka Captain Williamson Sangma’s Technical University ha Jewilgre da ka Sorkar Meghalaya.Shuh shuh u Myntri Rangbah u la aiti ruh ia ka Certificate of Appreciation bad ka Water and Sanitation Award sha ka shnong Kama Galwanggre bad sha ka shnong Babadam bad ia ka khusnam Top Performing PHC sha ka Darengre PHC kaba la shah jied kum ka shlem jingsumar kaba pyntreikam bha ia ka MHIS bad ka AB-PMJAY hapoh ka district.La sam ruh ia ki Certificate of Appreciation sha ki nongtrei jong ki tnat bapher bapher.Ha ka jingpyni nam ia ki tabud, ka Tura Municipal Board ka la ioh khur ia ka nam lahduh, ka District Commerce and Industries Centre ka la ioh khur ia ka kyrdan kaba ar bad ka tnat Election ka la ioh khur ia ka kyrdan kaba lai.U Myntri Rangbah u la kaweh lama ia ki kali na ka bynta kiba iashim bynta ha ka Bilgaro Republic Day Run 2024 ban pynsngewthuh paidbah halor ka jingshngaiñ haba niah kali ia kaba la pynlong da ka Tura Motor Sports Club, Tura.Ha ka por mynsngi la pynglong ia ki jingialehkai sports na ka bynta ki heprit bad ia ka Exhibition Football match kaba la long hapdeng ka DC XI bad ka Medical XI ha P A Sangma Stadium, Dakopgre, Tura.Ia ka jingrakhe Republic Day la pynlong ruh ha Raksamgre bad Dadenggre Civil Sub-Divisions ha kaba u Limison D Sangma, MLA bad u Brening A Sangma, MLA ki la long ki kongsan.Ha Williamnagar, u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi  Rakkam A Sangma u la pynher ia ka lama lairong. Ha Ampati u Myntri ka tnat PHE Marcuise N Marak u la pynher ia la lama lairong bad sam ruh ia ki khusnam sha ki nongjop ha ka jingpyni tabut ba kynthup ia ka tnat DCIC, ka tnat Labour bad ka tnat PHE, katba ia ka khusnam Best Marching Contingent la ioh da ka St. Dominic Savio Higher Secondary School, ka St. Claret Secondary School Scouts bad ka Birin-Nuchong School Scouts.La sam ruh ia ki jingbam sha ki nongpang ka Ampati Civil Hospital, ka jingpylong ia ka jingialehkai Cricket hapdeng ki bor synshar district bad ka tnat Pulit.Ha Resubelpara u Symbud Myntri Rangbah Sniawbhalang Dhar u la pynher ia ka lama lairong bad sam ruh ia ka khusnam sha ka ophis Soil & Water Conservation kaba la shah jied ban ioh pdiang ia ka Best Tableau Award.Katba ia ka Best Marchpast la ioh da ka Resubelpara RMSA Secondary School.La pynkup burom ruh ia ki shakri sorkar hapoh ka district, la sam ruhh ia ki khusnam sha ki ASHA bad sha ki nongialehkai kiba la wanrah ia ka nam ka burom sha ka District ha ka 5th Meghalaya Games kaba la long dang shen ha Tura.Ha Baghmara u Myntri ka tnat Bording u A. T. Mondal u la pynher ia ka lama lairong bad ha ka jingpyni nam ia kit abut, ka ophis Soil and Water Conservation, ka DCIC bad ka Agriculture and Farmers’ Welfare ki jop ia ka khusnam banyngkong, baar bad balai.Ka Siju PHC ka la shah jied ban ioh pdiang ia ka khusnam Best Performing PHC hapoh ka South Garo Hills hapoh ka Megha Health Insurance Scheme bad ka Baghmara Civil Hospital ka la shah pynkup burom kum ka Best Performing District Hospital ha ka jylla hapoh ka Megha Health Insurance Scheme.Ha Jowai u Myntri ka tnat Animal Husbandry and Veterinary Bah A.L Hek u la pynher ia ka lama lairong bad ha ka jingpyni tabut, ka ophis Horticulture ka la iohrah ia ka nam lahduh, katba ka District Commerce & Industries Centre, bad ka Divisional Soil and Water Conservation, Territorial Division Jowai ki la ioh rah ia ka nam kaba ar bad kaba lai.La sam ruh ia ki khusnam Top Performing PHC ha kaba ka Sahsniang PHC ka la shah pynkup burom da ka khsnam Best Performing Public Health Centre (PHC) halor ka jinglah ban pyntreikam bha ia ka Megha Health Insurance Scheme (MHIS) bad Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana) (AB PM- JAY).Ha Khliehriat, u Myntri ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs Bah Shakliar Warjri u la pynher ia ka lama lairong bad bad sam ruh ia ka khusnam sha ka Rymbai PHC kaba la shah jied kum ka shlem ai jingsumar kaba la pyntreikam bha ia ka MHIS & Ayushman Bharat-PMJAY.Ha kajuh ka por, ka Rotary Club, Jowai ka la pynkup burom ruh ia ka Anti-Narcotics Task Force (ANTF), East Jaintia Hills District. Ki nongkitkam jong ka One Stop Centre, Khliehriat ki la ioh pdiang ia ka khusnam halor ka jingithuh ia u synniang u bynhei ba ki la lah wanrah ia ka project ‘Assisting women in Accessing Justice (AWAJ)’, ban ai jingtip sha ki nongshong shnong ha kaba bad ki jingshah thombor bad ban pynshlur ia ki paidbah ba kin wanrah ia ki jingkylli.La sam ruh ia ki khusnam sha ki nongjop ha ka March Past ha kaba ka Little Star Secondary School, Lad Rymbai bad ka Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya (JNV), Rymbai ki la shah jied kum ki nongjop.Ha ka jingpyni kolshor ka Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya (JNV), Rymbai bad ka Khliehriat Higher Secondary School, Khliehriat ki la long ki nongjop bad ha ka jingpyni tabut District Rural development Agency (DRDA), East Jaintia Hills District ka la shah jied kum ka tabut ba itynnat tam bad ka tabut jonjg ka Agriculture Department ka la ioh rah ia ka kyrdan kaba ar.Ha Nongstoin ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. M Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la pynher ia ka lama lairong bad ha kane ka sngi la pyni nam ia kit abut da ki tnat treikam bapher bapher ka sorkar.La pynlong ruh ia ka jingialehkai phutbol hapdeng ka Nongstoin Football Association bad ka Officers Club Nongstoin (Veteran). La sam ruh ia ki jingbam ha Civil Hospital, ha St. Peter’s Green Pasteur Orphanage, Pyndengrei, ha Rev. S. Wollington Children’s Home, Nongpyndeng bad ha Shelter Homes for Boys and Girls, Nondein.Ha Mawkyrwat, u Myntri ka tnat Revenue and Disaster Management Minister Bah Kyrmen Shylla u la pynher ia ka lama lairong jong ka ri bad la pynbud pat sa ka jingpyni ia ki tabut da ki hynriew tylli ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar, ka jingpyni ia ka kolshor, ka jingsam ia ki khusnam sha ki nongjop ha ka March Past.Ka J.K.M.P. Higher Secondary School ka long ka nongjop ha ka March Past, katba ka Little Start Higher Secondary School bad ka Maharam Government Higher Secondary School ki la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba ar bad balai.Ha ka jingpyni tabut, ka ophis PHE ka la ioh rah ia ka nam lahduh, bud sa ka ophis Deputy Commissioner (Election) kaba la wan baar bad ka ophis Divisional Soil and Water Conservation kaba la wan balai.La sam ruh ia ka khusnam sha ka Umjarian HWC-SC kaba la shah jied kum ka Best Performance Health and Wellness Centre ha ka District, bad ka Nongbah Marshillong Village ka la shah pynkup burom kum ka Best Village Health Council hapoh ka District.Ha Nongpoh u Symbud Myntri Rangbah Bah Prestone Tynsong u la pynher ia ka lama lairong bad la pynbud pat sa ka jingpyni ia ki tabut da ki tnat treikam bapher bapher jong ka sorkar.Ha Mairang u Myntri ka tnat Food Civil Supplies & Consumer Affairs, Bah Comingone Ymbon u la pynher ia ka lama lairong bad la pynbud pat sa ka jingpyni ia ki tabut da ki tnat treikam ka sorkar ha kaba ka ophis Sub-Divisional Agriculture Officer ka la shah jied kum ka nam lahduh, ka ophis Block Development Officer ka la jop ia ka kyrdan baar bad ka ophis Fishery Officer ka la jop ia ka kyrdan balai. Ha ka jingiakob pyninam ia ka kolshor ka Seng Khasi Secondary School, Pyndengumiong ka la iohrah ia ka nam lahduh , katba ka St. Thomas Higher Secondary School, Mairang bad ka Multipurpose Secondary School, Lumrit Sohdadek ki la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba ar bad kaba lai.Ha Sohra Civil Sub-Division u Myntri ka tnat Arts & Culture Minister Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la pynher ia ka lama lairong bad shim ruh ia ka Salute jong ki shiphew tylli ki kynhun kiba iaid march past ba kynthup ia ka East Khasi Hills DEF, ka NCC bad ki skul.Ha Dadenggre Civil Sub-Division u MLA Brening A Sangma u la pynher ia ka lama lairong.Ha Amlarem Civil Sub-Division u Bah Lahkmen Rymbui u la pynher ia ka lama lairong bad shim ia ka Salute ha ka jingrakhe kaba la long ha Amlarem Government Lower Primary School.Ha Pynursla Civil Sub-Division u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh u la pynher ia ka lama lairong.Ha Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division ka Kong Santa Mary Shylla ka la pynher ia ka lama lairong.Ha Raksamgre Civil Sub-Division u Limison D Sangma u la pynher ia ka lama lairong.Ha Chokpot Civil Sub-Division u Sengchim N Sangma u la pynher ia ka lama lairong.Ha Ranikor Civil Sub-Division u Bah Pius Marwein u la pynher ia ka lama lairong.La pynlong ruh ia ka cultural programme, bad ki jingialehkai sports na ka bynta ki khynnah rit bad ka jingsam mitmit sha ki khynnah da ka Integrated Child Development Services (ICDS), Ranikor, bad ka jingsam khusnam sha ki nongjop ha ka march past ha kaba ka Jingaiti Secondary School, Nonghyllam, ka la long ka lahduh, katba ka Nolikata Higher Secondary School ka la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba ar bad ka Indira Gandhi Secondary School, East Rangasora ka la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba lai.Ha Patharkhmah Civil Sub-Division u Bah Damanbait Lamare u la pynher ia ka lama lairong.Ha Jengjal Civil Sub-Division u Deputy Speaker ka Ingdorbar Thawain u Timothy D Shira u la pynher ia ka lama lairong.Ha Dalu Civil Sub-Division u Ian Botham K Sangma u la pynher ia ka lama lairong.Ha Rongjeng Civil Sub-Division u Jim Sangma u la pynher ia ka lama lairong.Ha Hima Shangpung, Laskein C & RD Block u Bah Wailadmiki Shylla u la pynher ia ka lama lairong.
title: PYNHER U MYNTRI RANGBAH ÏA KA LAMA LAIRONG KA RI HA KA REPUBLIC DAY HA TURA

content: Ka Ministry of Home Affairs jong ka Sorkar Pdeng, hashwa ba ka ri baroh kawei kan rakhe ia ka Republic Day, ka la pyllait ia ki kyrteng jong ki riew pawkhmat ha ka ri ki ban ioh pdiang ia ka Khusnam Padma Award mynta u snem.Ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewtynnad bad kaba sngewsarong ia ka jylla Meghalaya ha kaba ka Kong Silbi Passah ka la shah jied ban ioh pdiang ia ka khusnam Padma Shri mynta u snem 2024.Ka Kong Silbi Passah ka dei kaba shong basah ha Riatsamthiah, Shillong bad ka dei kaba la pawnam bha ha ka jylla ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynneh pynsah bad ban pyninam ia ka rukom tem bad rukom shad tynrai.Ka Kong Silbi kan pynkhreh mynta ban leit ban shimti ia kane khusnam na ka kti jong ka President jong ka ri India ha ka jingialang ka ban sa long ha Rashtrapati Bhawan ha u Lber ne Iaiong mynta u snem.Ka Kong Silbi Passah kan long ka nongshong shnong kaba ar hapoh ka Shnong Riatsamthiah ban shah jied na ka bynta ban ioh pdiang ia kane ka khusnam bad shwa kane ka Kong Silverine Swer ka la long ka kynthei banyngkong eh hapoh kane ka shnong ban ioh pdiang ia ka khusnam Padma Shri.
title: KA JINGSARONG ÏA KA JYLLA ÏOH PDIANG KHUSNAM PADMA SHRI KA KONG SILBI PASSAH

content: Kum ka jingpynshlur ia ki samla pule, ka Seng Samla Shnong Umpling ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynkup burom ia ki 13 ngut ki samla jong ka shnong kiba la pyndep ia ka jingpule ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher.Ia kane ka jingsam khusnam la tip kum ka Academic Excellence Award  ia kaba la bei tyngka da ka Chief Minister Special Grant, ha kaba u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council u la long kum u kongsan.Nalor kine ki 13 ngut, ka Seng Samla Shnong Umpling ka la pynkup burom kyrpang ruh ia ki ar ngut ki samla jong ka shnong kiba la tyngshain bha kiba kynthup ia u Bah Shanbor Warjri uba la long u u Additional Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District bad ka kong Quinnie Fancon kaba la pass ia ka eksamin MPS.Haba kren kum u kongsan u Bah Pyniaid u la ong ban lait na ka jingshah synshar ha kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew, ki khun samla jong ka jylla ki dei ban trei shitom khnang ba ki lah ban pass ia ka eksamin IAS ba ju pynlong da ka Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) bad u la kular ba lada don ki khun samla na ka shnong Umpling kiba thrang ban iakhun ia kane ka eksamin u long uba kloi ba kyrshan na ka bynta ka bai Coaching.
title: KULAR U CEM KA KHADC BAN KYRSHAN ÏA KI SAMLA BA KWAH ÏAKHUN EKSAMIN UPSC

content: U Lyngdoh Sad jong ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Thohdieng jong ka taiew baladep u la phah ia u kyrwoh sha ki Lyngdoh, ki Riewniam bad sha ki paidriewngeit ban pyntip ia ka jingplie thymmai sa ar tylli ki Parish hapoh ka Jylla Niam Bah.“Da kaba shaniah ha u Blei, ha ka 26 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ngi la don ka jingialang bad ki dkhot jong ka Council jong ka Jylla Niambah Shillong, u Parish Priest jong ka Upper Shillong bad ki Rangbah Balang ha kaba ngi la rai ban plie ia ka Parish Mawñianglah,” la pyntip u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh.Tang ha ka sngi kaba bud, u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh u la pyntip sha ki paidriewngeit ban plie thymmai sa ia ka Parish Mawpdang.“Da kaba shaniah ha u Blei, ha ka 27 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ngi la don ka jingialang bad ki dkhot jong ka Council jong ka Jylla Niambah Shillong, u Parish Priest jong ka Parish Pynthorumkhrah bad ki Rangbah Balang ha kaba ngi la rai ban plie ia ka Parish Mawpdang,” la pyntip u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh u la pyntip halor ka jingplie ïa ki Parish ba thymmai kiba kynthup ïa ka Mawiong, Mawtawar, Umpling, Nongrah bad ka Madanrting.Tad haduh mynta, ki Parish ban sa plie thymmai ki long hynñiew tylli.
title: SA AR TYLLI KI PARISH THYMMAI YN PLIE HA SHILLONG ARCHDIOCESE

content: Ki nongialam jong ka Union of Cook-cum-Helper ha ka taiew baladep ki la leit pynsngew sha ki tyndong skhor jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ia ka jingdawa ban kyntiew ia ka Honorarium jong ki nongshet ja sngi ha ki skul sha ka T.5 hajar.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha Shilong Press Club ha ka lah sngi U Blei, ka President jong ka Union ka Kong Banalis Syiem ka la iathuh ba u Secretary jong ka Ministry of Education, ka Sorkar Pdeng u Sanjay Kumar u la kular ban buh hakhmat eh ia kane ka jingdawa jong ka Union.Ha ka jingleit sha Delhi, la synran lang ia ki nongialam jong ka Union da ka Kong Delina Khongdup kaba dei ka dkhot jong ka National Commission for Women.Ka la iathuh ba u Kumar u la ong ba ia kane ka mat jong ki nongshetja sngi u la kular ban buh hakhmat bad ban shim ruh kum ka mat kaba kyrpang tam namarba u sngewthuh ia ka jingpan kam dei kaba khia haduh katta katta.“Katkum ka sur kaba u kren, ngi khmihlynti ba kin sa pyntreikam noh mynta u snem hi hadien ka Financial Year,” la iathuh ka Kong Syiem.“Kum ki nongshet ja sngi ha ki skul, ngi kyrpad ruh ia u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi ba un sngewsynei ia ki nongshet ja sngi ban kyntiew ia ka jingsiew Honorarium na ka mang tyngka jong ka Sorkar India,” la ong ka Kong Syiem.“Ngi kyrpad ruh ia u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma uba dei u nongialam ha kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ban iakren lem ia kine ki jingdawa jong ngi bad ka Sorkar India ha Delhi,” la kyrpad kane ka nongialam jong ka Union of Cook-cum-Helper.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong ka Kong Syiem, ki nongshet ja sngi ha baroh ki skul hapoh ka jylla ki don kumba 20 hajar ngut bad ki ioh ia ka bainong na ka Sorkar Jylla kaba long T.1100 bad T.900 na ka Sorkar Pdeng.Haba kylli, ka la iathuh ba ka Union ka la dawa ba ka Sorkar kan ai ia ka Identity Card, ban siew ia ka bainong baroh 12 bnai, ban siew ia ka Honorarium manla u bnai bad ban ai shuti ha ka por ba ki nongshet ja sngi ki pang.U Adviser jong ka Union Bah KL Pariat u la iathuh ba ka Union ka la dawa ruh ia ka Sorkar ban pyntreikam ia ka shuti Maternity Leave ne ka shuti kha khunlung namarba bun na ki nongshet ja sngi ha ki skul ki dei hi ki kynthei.“Ngi la iakren ban siew manla u bnai namarba ki nongshet ja sngi ki shet naduh ka lah sngi U Blei haduh ka sngi thohdieng bad ba ia pisa dei ban pynpoi ha ka Bank Account.  Baroh ki Head Teacher ne ki Headmistress jong ki skul ki dei ban pynshlur ia ki nongshet ja sngi ban plie ia ki Bank Account. Bun ki bym pat pyntreikam ban pynpoi ia ka pisa ha ki Bank Account khamtam mynshwa leilei ka pisa ka poi sha ki nongshet ja sngi tang arsien ne lai sien ha ka shi snem,” u la ong.
title: DAWA KI NONGSHET JA SNGI IA KA SORKAR PDENG BAN KYNTIEW IA KA HONORARIUM SHA KA 5 HAJAR

content: Shillong, January 29 : The 8th International Conference of World Elders, hosted by International Centre for Cultural Studies (ICCS) in Dibrugarh, Assam from January 28th to February 1st, 2024 promotes cross-cultural collaboration among spiritual leaders and elders to explore “Shared Sustainable Prosperity.” With 300 attendees from 33+ countries, the event bridges ancient wisdom with modern challenges for global harmony.The elders of Seng Khasi had the honor of participating in the Conference where they engaged with elders from various countries representing indigenous faiths. Furthermore, they had the opportunity to highlight the distinct identity of the Khasi community through a captivating performance of the traditional warrior dance “Ka Shad Thma” by the youths of Seng Khasi Kmie.The Seng Khasi Community holds the belief of “One Truth, Many Ways,” emphasizing diverse perspectives. Safeguarding their culture and traditions involves preserving oral history, rituals, and fostering mutual respect for different paths within their indigenous identity.
title: SENG KHASI AMONGST 33 OTHER WORLD ELDERS PARTICIPATED IN THE 8TH INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE.

content: Namar ka jingbym leh eiei jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya hadien ba ka Khlieh Umwang SSA LP School kaba don ha ka shnong Khlieh Umwang, Ribhoi District ka la shah pynpra noh ha ki bor ka Sorkar Assam, ka Khasi Student Union (KSU) Eastern Border ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la leit ban iakynduh ia u Myntri ka tnad Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma ban pan jingshai halor ka jingpynslem ban shna thymmai biang ia kane ka skul.U President ka seng u Samla Banjop Marsing ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ha ki snem baladep ka seng ka ladep ban pynsngew ia kane sha u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi khnang ba kan shna thymmai ia kane ka skul.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong une u nongialam ka KSU, la mang pisa T. 19, 97,500 lak ha u snem 2018 ban shna ia kane ka skul.  Hynrei ha ka por ba la thung ia ki paia, ki Pulit Assam ki la wan pynpra ha ka 10 tarik, Nailar, 2018.“Ha ka por ba la shah pynpra kane ka skul ha Khlieh Umwang, ngi la iakynduh ia u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u Bah Lahkmen Rymbui ha ka por ba ki Pulit Assam ki la rat da ka puhshilum ia kane ka skul. Ha kato ka por u Myntri u la pynpaw ba ia kane ka kam yn sa hap ban iapynbeit da ki bor synshar district,” la iathuh u Samla Banjop Marsing.U la iathuh ba ka Seng ka la iakynduh ia ka Kong RM Kurbah mynba ka dang long ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka Ribhoi District.  “Hynrei ki bor synshar district ki phah sha ka tnat Pule Puthi. Na ka tnat Pule Puthi ki phah kylla sha ki bor synshar distrik.  Naduh u 2018 ka la iaid beit kumto.  Haduh mynta mynne kane ka skul ka la shu sah beit kumto bad kam shym la don shuh kano kano ka jingmang pisa da ka Sorkar ban shna thymma ia ka skul,” la bynrap une u samla.U Samla Banjop Marsing u la iathuh ba ha ka jingiakynduh ia u Rakkam A. Sangma, u la telephone hakhmat ki dkhot ka seng ia u Deputy Commissioner ka Ribhoi District bad ong ruh ba un sa shimkhia ia kane ka kam ba la sahteng.
title: NADUH BA SHAH PYNPRA HA KA ASSAM YM PAT SHNA ÏA KA SKUL HA KHLIEH UMWANG

content: Ka Khasi Student Union (KSU) West Jaintia Hills District ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la ujor sha u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma pyrshah ia u Bah Wikiru Shylla uba hikai ha ka Lower Primary School, Larnai, da kaba kynnoh ba u leit hikai skul tang 33 sngi ha ka shi snem watla u ioh tulop manla u bnai.U Secretary ka KSU West Jaiñtia Hills u samla Hababiangki Biam ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “sngewbha ban leit hikai biang, haba ioh ia ka kam leh bha ia ka kam, ym dei tangba phi ioh ia ka kam tang ban bam pisa ei. Phi ioh ia ka kam ai ia ka nuksa jong phi sha ki khynnah namarba ki dei ki lawei jong ngi.”“Nga kyrpad ia u nonghikai ba un sngewbha ba un ai ia ka jinghikai jong phi sha ki khynnah ka skul ha Larnai khnang ba kine ki khynnah kin ioh ia ka lawei baphyrnai namarba ka jingnang jingstad ka dei u budlum,” u la ong.“Sngewsih ba une u nonghikai uba hikai ha Larnai, u wan hikai skul tang 24 sngi, tang 33 sngi, kata kaba sngewsih na ka liang jong ka seng. Ngin sa nang iai buddien bha ia kane ka kam,” u la ong.“Ngi ladep aiti ia ka dorkhas ha u Myntri bad ka Sorkar ka don la ki jong ki jingkitkhlieh ia kaei kaba ka dei ban leh,” la iathuh u Samla Biam.“Sngewbha wat ym kheiñ sting ia ka kam ba phi dei ban leh, kitkhia khnang ba ka lawei jong ngi ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep kan phyrnai shuh shuh,” la ong u Samla Biam.Haba kylli, u samla Biam u la kynnoh ba une u nonghikai um shym la thung bujli ban hikai ha ka jaka jong u wat haba u pep skul.U la iathuh ba u Bah Wikiru u la ioh ia ka kam hikai ha Lower Primary, Larnai ha u snem 2013 bad ha u snem 2017 u la shah sospon bad u la bteng biang ia ka kam hikai hynrei haduh mynta wat lada u dang dei u nonghikai hynrei ym shym la leit satia ia ka kam hikai skul.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka KSU kaba don ia ki shnat treikam ha ki district bapher bapher kan dang iai buddien ia kine ki jait kam bad lada lap ka seng kan ujor beit sha ka Sorkar.
title: TANG 33 SNGI HA KA SHI SNEM LEIT HIKAI SKUL U NONGHIKAI, UJOR KA KSU SHA KA SORKAR

content: Ka jingdawa jong ki nongtrei ka EMRI-108 kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Meghalaya EMRI Workers Union (MEMRIWU) ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan shimti ban pyniaid hi noh ia ki kali EMRI-108 kam shym la long satia kaba seisoh.Ha kane ka jingialang ba la pyniaid da ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen, la iadonlang u Mission Director ka National Health Mission u Ram Kumar bad kiwei kiwei de ki ophisar na ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah.“Ha ka jingiakynduh (bad ka Myntri) ngi dap da ka jingsngewsih ba kam don kano kano ka jingseisoh namar naduh ba la kut ka jingtreikam jong ka kompeni kaba rim (kaba pyniaid ia ka EMRI-108) ka la kynjoh shi snem watla ka Sorkar ka la panpor tang lai bnai,’ la ong u President ka MEMRIWU Bah Roypar Kharraswai ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingialang.U la iathuh ba ka Myntri ka la shu phah wan ia ki nongialam ka MEMRIWU manla u bnai ban iakren ia kajuh shi kajuh khlem da lah satia ban ia pynbeit.U la iathuh ba ka Myntri ka la phah wan iakynduh biang ha ka sngi Baar jong ka taiew ban sa wan bad shwa kane ki nongialam ka Union kin iakynduh shwa ia u Mission Director ka NHM u Ram Kumar ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei.U President ka MEMRIWU u la ong ba ka Union kan dawa beit ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban shimti ban pyniaid hi ia ka EMRI-108 namarba ia ka pisa la bei hi da ka Sorkar Jylla bad shispah na ka shispah la shisnem kynthih ki kam ki la iaid beit iaid ryntih.“Ka Sorkar kam don jingeh jingeh shuh ban pyniaid hi ia kane ka kam namarba wat ka pisa ruh kam wan shuh na ka Sorkar Pdeng,” la ong u Bah Roypar.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingsiew tulop, u Bah Roypar u la ong, “naduh ba ka Sorkar ka la pyniaid hi ia ka EMRi-108 ki nongtrei ki shu ioh tang ia ka tulop bad kim don shuh kino ki jingioh jingmyntoi la long kum ka shuti, ka Provident Fund bad ka Health Insurance. Lada ngi kheiñ, ka Sorkar ka la pyndonkam bakla ia ngi. Ngi dawa ia ka Sorkar ba kan pynbeit noh ia kane ka kam.”U Bah Roypar u la iathuh ba u Mission Director ka NHM u Ram Kumar u la kyntait ban mynjur ia ka jingdawa jong ka MEMRIWU ban pynkiew ia ka jingsiew tulop da kaba aidaw ba kan mih ka jingkhñium na kiwei pat ki nongtrei jong ka NHM.“Ha ka jingshisha ngim dei satia ki nongtrei jong ka NHM namarba ia ka kam ba ngi trei la bei pisa hi da ka Sorkar Jylla bad ia ka NHM la bei pisa da ka Sorkar Pdeng,” la ong u Bah Roypar.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla ha u bnai Nohprah, 2023 ka la khot Tender ia ki Kompeni ban pyniaid ia ka EMRI-108 hadien ba la kut ka samoi treikam jong ka kompeni GVK.“Ka Sorkar kam dei shuh ban dang khot ia ka Tender hadien ba ka la mih ka jingbym ia sngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ki kompeni ha ka por ba ka Sorkar ka la dep khot ia ka tender ha u Nohprah, 2023,” u la ong bad bynrap, “wat ia ka Tender ruh kim pat ioh hynrei ki la ia pynkulmar namarba ki don napdeng jong ki, kiba don dak sniew (Black Remark).U la iathuh ba ia kane ka jingiakulmar hapdeng ki kompeni ka sorkar ka la phah sha ka tnat Aiñ.“Ka Myntri kaba peit ia ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah, ka dei hi ka Myntri kaba peit ia ka tnat Aiñ kan wan hajuh hi bad kito ki kompeni kiba thep Tender myn ha kane, kin sa mih biang ki jingkulmar,” u la bynrap.“Namarba ka Sorkar ka la biang nadong shadong ka ladei ka por ban shimkhia hi ban thaw da ka Emergency Cell ne ka Society,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Roypar.
title: KHLEM SEISOH KA JINGÏAKYNDUH KA MEMRIWU BAD KA SORKAR HALOR EMRI-108

content: U MDC jong ka Mawlai Constituency u Bah Teiborlang Pathaw u la ong ba kum u nongmihkhmat uba la jied da ki paidbah jong ka Mawlai Consituency um don satia ka jinglehrain ban trei na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki paidbah hapoh ka Constituency.U Bah Teibor u la pynpaw ia kane haba pynphai nia ia ka jingshah kynthoh ha u MLA jong ka Nongkrem Constituency u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit uba la ong ba u Bah Teibor u dei ban lehraiñ ban mih hadien ba u la rem ha ka ilekshon MLA ha u snem 2023 na Mawlai Constituency.Haba pynphai nia ia ka jingkynthoh u Bah Ardent uba ong, ‘wat ju leh MLA jubor,’ u Bah Pathaw u la ong, “ia nga la jied da ki paidbah jong ka Mawlai Constituency kum u MDC ba ngan peit ngan khmih ïa ka Mawlai Constituency bad naduh ba nga la jop ha u snem 2019 ngam shym la shongthait bad kloi ban trei na ka bynta ka Constituency. Kam pat ju don ruh kano kano ka sien ba ngan tuklar ïa ki kam jong u MLA ka Mawlai la ka dei ka MLA skhim ne kiwei pat ki kam jong u MLA.”U Bah Pathaw u la ong ba um da donkam ba un leh MLA kumba la kynnoh da u Bah Ardent, namarba um dei hi ruh u MLA hynrei u dei u MDC ka Mawlai bad u dei u nongmihkhmat uba ki paidbah hi ki la jied.“Ym don ba lah ban khang ïa nga kum u MDC ban trei na ka bynta ka Mawlai Constituency,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Pathaw.U la buh jingkylli ruh ïa u Bah Ardent hangno ka don kata ka aiñ kaba ong ba u MDC um lah ban trei la ka dei ban wanrah skhim pynroi na ka Sorkar Kmie, Sorkar jylla ne na kino kino  kiwei pat na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi u paidbah.“Nanduh ba nga la shahjied kum u MDC, nga dei u shakri jong ki paidbah ka Mawlai bad ha ka jingiaid lynti nga la ïohi shibun ki kam kiba ka mawlai ka donkam, bad kum u MDC nga la trei shitom ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla ha Mawlai da ka jingïatreilang bad ki nongïalam shnong bad ki paidbah,” la bynrap u Bah Pathaw.U la ai nuksa ruh katto katne ki kam kum ka jingsiang ïa ki lynti ïaid kjat ha kaba ma u bad ki Dorbar  Shnong ki la leit ban pynsngew sha ka Sorkar Jylla, ka jingshna ïa ki surok kiba donkam kiba la sahteng la bun phew snem, nalor ka jingbuddien ban pynrung ia ki katto katne ki shnong ha Mawlai ban ïoh ïa ka skhim 100 sngi kaba ka la urlong da ka jingleit tur barabor bad kine ki la urlong na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki paidbah ka Mawlai.“Da ka jingïai buddien, ki shnong ha Mawlai ki bym rung hapoh ka skhim 100 sngi mynta ki la rung ha kaba la lah ban pynkylla sha ka Census Village ym shuh ka Census Town,” la iathuh u Bah Pathaw haba pynpaw ia ka jingtrei jong u kum u MDC uba la jied da ki paidbah.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka surok na Shillong-Mawlai Bypass kaba ïaid lyngba ka shnong Umsaw ka dei ka jingtrei shitom jong u lem bad ki nongïalam shnong bad mynta ka la urlong ha kaba ka jingtrei ka la ïaid shakhmat, nalor ka jingwanrah ïa ki Floodlight ha Madan Heh Stadium ban pynthaba ia ka madan.
title: YM DON BA LAH BAN KHANG ÏA NGA BAN TREI NA KA BYNTA KA MAWLAI  CONSTITUENCY: TEIBOR PATHAW

content: Ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla kan sdang naduh ka 16 tarik u Rymphang 2024.Katkum ka iktiar ba la pynkup bor da ka Clause (I) jong ka Article 174 ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India, u Lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan u la pynmih ia ka hukum ban pynlong ia ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ha ka 16 tarik u Rymphang 2024 naduh ka por 10:00 baje mynstep.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, u Commissioner and Secretary ka Secretariat jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ u Dr. Andrew Simons ula phah jingtip sha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bah Prestone Tynsong uba peit ia ka tnat Parliamentary Affairs, sha u Nongialam ka Liang Pyrshah Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh, sha ki MLA ba  kynthup ia u Bah Charles Pyngrope bad Bah Lahkmen Rymbui ba ka jingialang jong ka Bussiness Advisory Committee kan sa long ha ka 2 tarik u Rymphang ban iathir iatai na ka bynta ki sngi shong dorbar jong ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka, 2024.
title: 16 TARIK RYMPHANG YN SDANG KA DORBAR MANG TYNGKA KA ASSEMBLY
