content: Kum ka jingkynmaw ia kito kiba la len ia la ka jong ka jingim na ka bynta ka jingioh laitluid jong ka ri India, yn pynlong ia ka jingsngap jar kaba ar mimit ha ka por 11 baje mynstep ha ka 30 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024.Ia ka jingsngap jar dei ban pynlong ha ki jaka trei bad ban sangeh ruh ia ka jingiaid ki kali kaba ar minit ha baroh kawei ka jylla ha ka por 11:00 baje mynstep ha ka 30 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024.Ha kane ka sngi, yn sa pynpah ia ka Siren naduh ka por 10:59 baje haduh 11:00 baje bad hadien ka ar mimit, yn sa pynpah biang ia ki Siren naduh ka por 11:02 baje haduh 11:03 baje.Tang shu iohsngew ia ka jingpah jong ka Siren, baroh ki briew ki dei ieng khop hajuh bad ban sngapjar.Ha ki jaka bym don ka jingaidak ne ka jingpynpah Siren yn ai jingtip sha baroh ki bor ba dei peit ban pynlong ia ka jingsngap jar kaba ar minit ha ka por 11:00 baje mynstep.Ka All India Radio ka dei ban sangeh ban pathai ia ki lad jingtip bad ki kali ki dei ban sangeh ban iaid ha surok bad ban ieng khop hajuh na ka bynta ar minit.
title: AR MINIT YN SANGEH KI JINGTREIKAM HA KA POR 11 BAJE MYNSTEP KA 30 TARIK

content: U Prof. Lakhon Kma, uba long u nonghikai jong ka skulbah NEHU ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la pynbna ba u la shim ia ka rai ban rung sha ka jylli jong ka saiñpyrthei na ka bynta ban iakhun ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long shen, na Shillong Seat.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Prof. Kma u la ong ba ka jingshim rai ban iakhun ia kane ka elekshon ka long ban tyrwa sha ki paidbah ba kin jied ia u ban long u nongiasaid ia ki mat ki jura jong ka Jylla Meghalaya hapoh ka Parliament.“Nga la nga la rai ban shim ïa kane ka sienjam ban pynïasnoh pura ïalade  sha ka kam saiñpyrthei da kaba ïakhun ïa ka ilekshon MP halor kawei ka nongrim bad kata ka long ban ïohi ba ka Meghalaya khamtam ka East Khasi Hills, West Khasi Hills, South West Khasi  Hills, Eastern West Khasi Hills, East Jaintia Hills, West Jaintia Hills bad Ri-Bhoi distrik kin kiew  shaphrang ha ka roi ka par ha baroh ki liang. Kata ka roi ka par kaba kham ïadei bad ka jinglah  ban ïeng ha la ki jong ki kjat ha kaba ki paitbah jong ki shnong bad ki sor nongkyndong kin lah  ban ïoh ïa ka kamai kajih kaba thikna. Khang ba ngin lah ban kynjoh sha kata ka thong, ngi donkam  ban phai khmat sha kito ki kynhun bad ki thaiñ kiba la shu shah iehnoh baroh shi katta bad pyrshang  ban kyntiew ïa ki ha kata ka kyrdan ba kin ïa long mar ryngkat bad kiwei pat kiba la kham kiew.  Kaba ha khmat eh kaba ngi donkam ban phai khmat ka long halor ki jingdonkam ba kongsan kum  ki skul, ki surok, ka bor ilektrik, ka umbam umdih, ka jaka sumar, ka jingkhuid suba bad kiwei de,” ong u Prof. Kma.“Kaba kham kongsan shuh shuh ka long ba ngi donkam ban banjur bad pynpaw shai da ka bor baroh  ha ka Parliament halor ki jingeh ba ki nong Meghalaya ki ïakynduh bad ki jingthrang ba ki nong  Meghalaya ki kwah ban pynurlong khnang ba ngin lah ban sdang thymmai halor ki mat kiba ïadei  bad ka roi ka par. Ngim lah ban nym pynpaw ne ban kiar na ki mat kiba ïadei bad ka roi ka par  kum ka leit ka wan kaba khambha la ka long na khyndew ne lyngba na suiñ. Ka kam Jngohkai  Pyrthei (Tourism) ka dei kaba biang bha ka ïew hangne ha jylla jong ngi, hynrei ngi dang donkam  ban kham pynbha shuh shuh khang ban khring ïa ki nongwan jngohkai khlem da ktah pat ïa ka  jinglong tynrai jong dustur bad ka mariang baieit jong ngi. Ka kam jngohkai ka dei ban long kata  ka lad aikam aijam ïa ki khun samla jong ngi kata ha ka jingshakri ban pdiang bad pynbiang ïa ki  nong wan jngohkai la ka long ha ki jaka sah, ka leit ka wan jong ki bad kumjuh ruh ha ka  ecotourism ïa kaba ngi lah ban iohi nuksa kum ha Goa bad kiwei de ki jaka jngohkai shabar ri,” u la bynrap.“Ngi ladei ban pynshlur bad ïaleh ban kyntiew ïa ki Industry kiba kham ïohnong bha kata kum ha  ka pharmaceutical, ka food processing, ki dawai kynbat bad kiwei kiwei khlem da pynthut ïa ka  sawkun mariang khnang ba ngin lah ban plie ïa ki lad aikam aijam na ka bynta ki samla ka ri. Ka  jingïaknieh khappud, ka jinglip ding ilektrik khah khah, ka jingbymdon ki jaka training bapaka na  ka bynta ki samla ïalehkai, ka jingkieng pung Umiam, ka jingbymbiang ka scholarship na ka bynta  ki samla pule kiba pass bha bad khamtam kito kiba duk bad kiwei kiwei de ki dei ki jingeh kiba  ka imlang sahlang ka ïaikynduh da ki phew snem bad kiba dang ïai bteng haduh mynta hynrei ka  sorkar bad ki MP kim pat lah ban pynduh ïa kine ki jingeh. Ki daw ki long namar ka jingbamsap  ha man ki syrtap jong ka rukom pynïaid bad treikam ïa ki scheme sorkar bapher bapher. Kumta,  nga la rai ban pdiang ïa ka rukom treikam ka ban ym ailad ‘zero-tolerance policy’ ïa ki kam  bamsap ha ka rukom trikam. Ki agenda kiba ïadei bad ka jingkyntiew ïa ka roi ka par kin dei  halor kitei ki mat ba la kdew haneng bad sa kiwei de. Ka jingeh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingbyndon  ki jaka ïaleh eksamin CUET kan dei ka mat kaba hakhmat eh khnang ba ki samla pule jong ngi kin  ym duh ïa ka hok ban ïoh ïa ka jaka pule. Ka jingithuh ia ka ktien Khasi hapoh ka Eighth Schedule  jong ka Constitution ruh dei ka mat kaba hakhmat. Hynrei kum u MP ki don sa kiwei pat ki kam  ba kham khraw kum ka jingïada ia ka hok longtrai ki trai jylla, ka jingïada ïa ka basa jingim  (ecosystem), ki um ki wah bad ban ïada ïa ka hok jong ki nong Meghalaya hi baroh haba ngi pdiang  ïa ki developmental projects,” la ong shuh shuh u Prof. Kma.Haba pynpaw ba ki mat jingdawa ba hakhmat eh ka Jylla dei ban da phikir shwa, u Prof. Kma u la ong, “kwei pat ki mat kum ka lynti rel, ka Inner Line Permit, ka State Reservation Policy, ka jingïada  ïa ki jingkordor ka sawkun mariang bad ka jingïakynad khappud bad ka Assam, kine ki dei ki mat  kiba ngi hap ban pyrkhat bad phikir bha da kaba buh shuwa ha khmat ïa kaei kaei ka ban pynmyntoi  lang ïa baroh bad ka ban nym long ruh ka jingpynwit ïa ka jingroi jingsan jong ka Meghalaya  hadien habud. Ka dei ban don ka jingïabiang pyrla hapdeng ka jingïada ïa la ka tynrai bad ka  jingroi ha ka ïoh ka kot ka ban pynmyntoi ïa kiba bun.”“Khnang ban pynurlong ïa kane ka jingpyrshang na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya ka ban kiew  shaphrang, nga donkam ïa ka jingkyrshan bad ka jingïatreilang jong ki nongshongshnong ka  Meghalaya khamtam kito kiba shong basah ha ki distrik jong ka rilum Khasi-Jaintia bad them Ri[1]Bhoi. Ha kane ka jingpyrshang jong nga ban ïoh ka lad ban long u nongmihkhmat uba lah ban  pynsngew ïa ki jingkwah bad jingthrang jong phi sha ka sorkar kum u Member jong ka Parliament  na ka Shillong Seat ha kane ka ilekshon Lok Sabha ka ban wan, nga kyrpad ba phin kyrshan ïa nga  da ki vote jong phi. Haba ngi phai sha ki khun samla ka Meghalaya, ngim lah ban shu shong kli kti khlem da pyrkhat na ka bynta jong ki. Ka Meghalaya jong ngi ka donkam ïa ki kam ki jam na  ka bynta ki khun samla lyngba ki kam sorkar lane ki kam lajong tangba kiba la kyrshan pisa pat  da ka sorkar. Ki kynrum kynram ki mih haba ka lad aikam aijam kam don. Ka jingshongsuk ka wan ynda haba uwei pa uwei u don la kam ka jam bad u lah ban im kumba long kiwei pat. Ha kane ka jingïaleh kaba nga thmu, nga tip ba kin don bun ki jingeh bad ki jingduna hynrei nga don ka jingngeit ba ngi lah ban poi sha ka thong lada ngi ïatylli bad treilang na ka bynta ka Meghalaya kaba thymmai. Nga shaniah ha ka jingkyrshan jong baroh ki khun samla ka Meghalaya bad ngan leh katba nga lah na ka liang jong nga ban pynurlong ïa ki jingthmu jong phi. Kum u paralok, u hynmen u para, u kni u pyrsa jong phi, nga ngeit skhem ba nga lah ban long ka sur jong phi ha Parliament bad ha ka jylla Meghalaya. Ngan ia snoh kti lang lem bad phi lyngba ki jingialang, kawebsite jong, WhatsApp bad ka YouTube channel (@lakhonkma) bad kiwei kiwei dei ki rynsan social media kiba don ha ka bynta ‘contact me’ jong ka website. Phi lah ban iasyllok lem bad nga, sngap ki jingkren ki jong nga bad kiwei kiwei ha ka por ba kylluid jong hi. Nga la ioh ban jngoh kylleng sawdong ka ri lum Khasi-Jaintia bad ka them Ri-Bhoi bad nga dang iai leh pynshitom kham bha katba nga lah ban kham sngewthuh ia ki jingeh bad ki jingangnud ki jongphi. Lada phi kwah ia nga ban wan mih sha phi nga long uba kloi katkum ki jingdonkam ba kyrkieh. Sngewbha phah ki jingpyntip ne kino kino ha ka message lyngba kane ka website ne ha kano kano ka rukom ruh; nga kloi ban ia trei ryngkat bad phi ha ki shnong bad ki don ki kyntoit ki jong phi. Nga kyrmen ba phin shem ïa nga uba bit ban mihkhmat na ka bynta jong phi ha ka Parliament bad sngewbha ban ai ïa ka vote jong phi ha ka kyrteng jong nga. Nga pynthikna ba ngan ym phai dien na phi haduh kaba kut ka jingim jong nga,” u la bynrap shuh shuh.
title: PYNBNA U PROF. LAKHON KMA BAN ÏAKHUN ÏA KA ELEKSHON MP NA SHILLONG SEAT

content: U MLA ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) na Mawryngkneng Constituency u Bah Heavingstone Kharpran ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, u la hiar hi dalade sha ka shnong Mawlong ban leit jurip ia ka jinglong jingman jong ka shnong bad ia ki surok namarba kan sa don ka jingiaseng Presbytery jong ka Balang Presbyterian ha kane ka shnong.Kane ka jingiaseng Presbytery kan sdang ha ka 16 tarik haduh ka 18 tarik, Rymphang, 2024.Kane ka jingleit jurip jong u MLA ka Mawryngkneng ia ki jingpyntrei ia ki surok ban leit sha jaka long jingiaseng la shem ba ka jingpyntrei ia ka surok ka la iaid shaid shaid bad na ka Liang jong u MLA u la kyrpad ba kin pyndep shwa ban long ka jingiaseng.Ha kane ka jingjurip la synran lang da ki Engineer ka PWD bad ki dkhot ka VPP, u Rangbah Shnong, ki Tymmen Basan bad ki Rangbah Balang.Ha ka jingiakren bad u Bah Kharpran, u la ong ruh ba ka jingslem ban sdang kham mynshwa ka dei na ka daw ba ka slem ka mang tyngka.U Bah Kharpran u la ai khublei ia ki Engineer ka tnat PWD bad kumjuh ia u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong uba peit ruh ia ka tnat PWD halor ka jinglong jong u ban mang pisa na ka bynta ban shna ia kane ka surok.
title: JURIP U MLA KA VPP ÏA KA JINGPYNKHREH JINGÏASENG HA SHNONG MAWLONG

content: Shillong, January 30 : A quick money scam using a fake investment platform called Numgenious AI is ensnaring unsuspecting citizens in the state, promising unrealistic returns in a short period. The platform, operating through the link https://numgenius-ai.vsisk.com, has been reported to be active in East Khasi Hills district, prompting police to launch an investigation and issue a public warning.The scam operates primarily through WhatsApp groups, where members entice others to join and participate in various investment schemes. These schemes, ranging from hourly to monthly plans, promise to multiply invested money manifold. Once a victim deposits funds, however, they are met with silence from the perpetrators, who often change the platform’s name and link to target new victims.The East Khasi Hills Police Department is urging the public to exercise extreme caution and avoid falling prey to such quick money schemes. They have advised residents to report any suspicious investment platforms or similar scams to the nearest police station immediately. Additionally, dedicated helplines are available for reporting cybercrime (1930) and contacting the Shillong Police Control Room (0364-2215427 or 6009196479).
title: FAKE AI INVESTMENT PLATFORM DUPES MEGHALAYA CITIZENS: POLICE WARN OF QUICK MONEY SCAM

content: : Ka Mahila Morcha kaba dei ka seng ki kynthei ka BJP ha ka sngi Baar ki la hiar sha ki District bapher bapher jong ka Jylla ban lum jingkheiñ ïa ki briew kiba ïoh ïa ki jingmyntoi na ki skhim ba la mang da ka Sorkar Pdeng.Ïa kane ka jinglum jingkheiñ ha ki jylla bapher bapher jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kynthup ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya la bthah da ka National President ka BJP Mahila Morcha ka Vanathi Srinivasan.Ka jingthmu jong kane, ka long ban ïoh ïa ka jingkheiñ kaba bniah haduh katno ki paidbah ki ïoh shisha ïa ki jingmyntoi na ki skhim ba la wanrah da ka Sorkar Pdeng hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi.Ka President jong ka State BJP Mahila Morcha ka Kong Susuki Pariat ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ka President ka Sikkim BJP Mahila Morcha ka Srijana Thapa Chetri bad ka President jong ka Nagalnd BJP Mahila Morcha ka Shanbeni Yanthan ki la pynlong ïa ki jingïalang bad ki Asha, ki Anaganwadi, ki Self Help Group bad kiwei kiwei ki nongïoh jingmyntoi na ki skhim ka Sorkar Pdeng.Ha ka jingleit jngoh ïa ka  Jowai Civil Hospital, kane ka kynhun ki kynthei jong ka BJP ka la dap da ka jingsngew kmen ban ïohsngew ba ki nongpang ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewnguh ïa u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri.Ki nongpang ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen haduh katta katta ba ki ïoh jingmyntoi na ka Ayushman Scheme kaba la long ka jingkyrkhu ïa kito ki longiing ki bym lah ban siew ïa ka bai thiah pang.Kane ka kynhun ka la leit jngoh ruh ïa ka Wapung Skur Higher Secondary School, ka St. Joseph’s Parish bad ïa ka Cathedral, Shillong.Ïa mynta, ka kynhun ka la leit rung sha ki bynta bapher bapher ka East Khasi Hills, ka West Khasi Hills, ka East Jaiñtia Hills, ka West Jaiñtia Hills bad ka Garo Hills. Ïa ki jaka ba dang sah jong ka jylla yn sa nang pyndep shuh shuh ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ki ban sa wan.
title: PHAH LUM JINGKHEIN KA BJP ÏA KA MAHILA MORCHA IA KIBA ÏOH JINGMYNTOI NA KI SKHIM SORKAR PDENG

content: Ka tnat Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills ha ka sngi Baar ka la maham ïa ki nongshong shnong ba kim dei ban ngop ha kino kino ki jingshah pynbiej ha ka jingpynap shrip da ki riew shukor kiba ju mlien ban phah ïa ki ‘Link’ ba kular ban ïoh pisa puk puk tang hapoh khyndiat por.Ha u kyrwoh, u Superintendent of Police, (City) East Khasi Hills Bah Vivek Syiem u la ong, “la lap ba ka don ka jingpynsaphriang ha ka jylla kaba leh da ki nongshukor ba kular ban siew pisa noh marmar da kaba khñiot ha kawei ka rynsan kaba la tip kyrteng “Numgenious AI” kaba don ïa ka “Link”.  Ki riewshukor, ki pynngop ïa ki nongshong shnong ba luilui, da kaba siew pisa noh marmar ban ïoh ïa ka jingshaniah tang hadien katto katne por ba la thep ïa ka pisa.  Kiba bun kum kine ki jingjia la ïoh jingtip ba ki la jia ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka East Khasi Hills district ha ki taiew ba la leitnoh bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat ban ïoh kem ïa ki nongshukor lyngba ki kor “Online.”U SP, u la ïathuh ba ka jingpynngop ka long lyngba ka Whatsapp ha kaba ki briew ki pyntip sha ki paralok ban rung sha kine ki jingïakynshew pisa khnang ba kin ïoh pisa puk puk tang hapoh khyndiat sngi.  Ka jingsiew pisa ka long manla ka kynta, manla ka sngi, manla ka taiew bad manla u bnai bad kiwei kiwei ki skhim kiba kam ban pynkharoi ïa ki nongthep pisa khnang ba ki nongthep kin ïoh ïoh jingmyntoi katba ki nang lah ban pynrung briew.“Tang shu siew ïa ka pisa sha ki riewshukor, phin ym ïoh jingtip eiei shuh na ki nongshukor.  Ki nongshukor ki lah ban kylliang ïa ka kyrteng bad ïa ka Link ban ïoh pynap shrip shuh shuh sa ïa kiwei pat,” la ong u SP.U SP u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah lada ki ïoh kum kine ki jingpyntip kiba ishan khmat ki lah ban leit ujor sha ki thanat kiba don hajan.  Ki paidbah ki lah ban ujor lyngba u Cybercrime Helpline Number 1930 bad sha ka Police Control Room, Shillong lyngba u nombar 0364-2215427 ne 6009196479 na ka bynta ki jingïarap.
title: MAHAM KI PULIT ÏA KI PAIDBAH BAN YM NGOP HA KI RIEWSHUKOR ONLINE

content: Ki Pulit ka East Garo Hills ki la pynlong ia ka jingkhynra ha ka khlaw barben jong ka Bolkinggre, East Garo Hills, hadien ka jinglap ia kawei ka tiar ba phylla.Ki Pulit ki la pynlong ka jingkhynra kaba jur hadien ba ki la ioh jingtip ba kawei ka Parachute ka la hap na suin bneng bad kawei ka tiar ba phylla ba don bad ka song. Mar mar ki Pulit ki la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit halor kane.U Superintendent of Police ka East Garo Hills Bah S.A Rynjah ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la pyntip ba ha ka 30 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ha ka por kumba 9:00 baje mynmiet ki Pulit ka Bolkinggre OGC halor ka jinglap ia kawei ka tiar ba phylla ha ka shnong Asiragre kaba hap hapoh ka Williamnagar Police Station.Mar mar la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit ha kaba ka kynhun BDDS ka la leit mar mar sha ka jaka ba la buh ia kane ka tiar ba phylla.Ha ka jingtohkit, la sngewthuh ba ha ka 29 tarik, Kylllalyngkot, 2024 ha ka por kumba 6:30 baje janmiet, uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Silnang R. Marak na ka shnong Asiragre u la lap ia u tiar uba la tip kum u “meteomodem PS-20 ba la shna ha ri France ba la pyndait ha kawei ka Parachute rong saw ka la hap ha ka phyllaw iing jong u. Une u rangbah u la shim noh ia kane ka tiar ban buh noh hapoh ka ing lajong.Ia kane ka tiar la kurup noh da ki Pulit bad la rah sha OGC na ka bynta ban leh ia kaba donkam.U SP u la iathuh shuh shuh ba u PS-20 u dei u GPS ba la shna na ka bynta ban thew ia ka lyer.
title: HAP KA TIAR PHYLLA NA SUIÑ, LAP KI PULIT BA DEI KA TIAR THEW LYER

content: Ki shipai BSF kiba la ïoh jingtip na ki tnat syntiat ki la pynlong ïa ka jingap ktem bad ïoh kurup ïa ka jingpyrshang ki snar nongkhaii ban shalan be-aiñ ïa ka dawai Phensedyl bad ka shini na khappud sha ka ri Bangladesh.Ïa kine ki mar khaii tuh, ki shipai BSF Meghalaya ki la ïoh kurup hynnin ka Lah Sngi u Blei.Ha kane ka jingkurup, ki shipai BSF jong ka 172 Battalion ki la ïoh kurup 190 bilor ka dawai Phensedyl katba ki snar khaii tuh ki dang pyrshang ban shalan be-aiñ sha Bangladesh lyngba ka khappud jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills, Meghalaya.Ha kawei pat ka jingkhynra, ki shipai BSF da ka jingïatreilang bad ki Pulit ka Meghalaya ki la ïoh kurup 18,000 kilo ka shini na ki bynta bapher bapher ka khappud jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ïa kine ki mar khaii tuh la aiti noh sha ka ophis Customs bad sha ki Pulit ban leh katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: KURUP KI BSF ÏA KA DAWAI PHENSEDYL BAD SHINI NA KHAPPUD

content: Kum shi bynta ka jingrakhe ia ka jingdap 10 snem jong ka seng mynta u snem 2024, ka Blood Donation Cell jong ka HYC ha ka sngi Balang ka la pynlong da ka jingnoh synñiang ia la ka snam da ki dkhot kaba la long ha Community Hall, NEHU, Shillong ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Transfusion Medicine & Blood Centre, NEIGRIHMS, Shillong, ka Meghalaya AIDS Control Society bad ka Meghalaya State Blood Transfusion Council.Da ki phew ngut ki dkhot jong ka Seng ki la noh synniang ia la ka snam bakordor ka jong ki kum shi bynta ban iarap ia kito kiba donkam kyrkieh ia ka snam ha ki jingpang jingshitom ki jong ki.Na ka liang ka Blood Donation Cell jong ka Seng ka ai khublei ia baroh ki dkhot ka Seng kiba la ban ia shim bynta ha kane jingai snam ei bad ngeit skhem ba lyngba kane ka jingai snam ka jong ki kan long ka jingkyrkhu ia kiba bun ki mynsiem briew kiba kordor kiba lah ban ioh ia ka jingiarap lyngba kane ka snam.“Ngi ai khublei ruh ia ki Doctors, ki Counsellors bad ki staffs napoh ka Hospital NEIGRIHMS kiba lah wan ban pynbit pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam baroh na bynta kane ka Prokram bad lyngba ka jingiatreilang ngi la lah ban pynlong ia ka prokram kaba jop,” ong u Chairman, Blood Donation Cell, HYC– CEC, Shillong Bah Wellanstar Warpih.
title: PYNSAH KYNMAW KA HYC ÏA KA LYNGKHUH 10 SNEM DA KABA AI SNAM EI

content: : Ka kynhun jong ki nongialam ka BJP, kaba kynthup ia ka President ka Mahila Morcha na Meghalaya, Sikkim, Nagaland bad na kiwei kiwei ki Jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ki la leit jngoh ia i Kong Silbi Passah iba la shah jied ban ioh pdiang ia ka khusnam Padma Shree bad pynkup burom ruh ia i.La synran lang ia kine ki nongialam ka Mahila Morcha da u Chief Spokesperson jong ka State BJP u Bah Mariahom Khrakrang bad u State Vice President u Gagan Jain lem bad ki dkhot ka Party.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka BJP ka la ong pynpaw ba kane ka jingioh khusnam jong i Kong Silbi Passah ka long ka long sa uwei pat u mawmer ban ithuh ia u synniang u bynhei sha ka rwai ka siaw bad ka put ka tem.Ha ka jingiaid lynti kaba jrong, i Kong Silbi i la ioh pdiang ia ka khusnam Sangeet Natak Akademi, nangta, ka khusnam Indian Chamber of Commerce for Affirmative Action Front- Liners, ka khusnam Prasar Bharati bad ka Meghalaya Day Award.Na ka liang jong u Bah Mariahom Kharkrang haba ai jingkren ha ka jingialang ba lyngkot, u la ong, “da ki snem i Kong Silbi i la khring ia ki paidbah da ki sur jingrwai tynrai.  Dei tang ka Sorkar jong u Narendra Modi kaba la ithuh ia u synniang u bynhei ban pynkup burom da ka khusnam Padmashree.  Kane ka jingai jingiathuh khatduh iawai ka la nang pynriewspah shuh shuh ia ka put ka tem ha ka rynsan jong ka ri bad kaba pynpaw ba dei tang ka Sorkar BJP kaba lah ban rah ia ka Jylla Meghalaya shajrong.”Ka President jong ka Meghalaya BJP Mahila Morcha ka Kong Susuki Pariat ka la ong, “i Kong Silbi Passah i la long ka jingsarong ia ka thaiñ  Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei. Nga ai khublei ia ka Sorkar u Modi kaba ai jingithuh ia ka jingtrei shitom jong ka kynthei riewlum na ka jylla Meghalaya.”
title: LEIT JNGOH KA BJP MAHILA MORCHA NA NORTH EAST IA I KONG SILBI PASSAH

content: : Ki nongialam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) kiba la leit iakren bad u Director ka NEIGRIHMS Hospital, u Dr. Nalin Mehta ki la mih jyndat na ka jingialang hadien ba ki la kynnoh ba une u khlieh nongpeit jong ka NEIGRIHMS Hopsital u la kren ibein bad khein ia ki kum ki khynnah surok kiba kwah ban thaw jingkulmar.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u President ka HYC u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem ka seng ka la leit iakynduh ia u Dr. Mehta ka long hadien ba u la phah ktien sha ka seng ban iakynduh mynta ka sngi Balang ban iakren halor ka jingdawa hadien ba ka seng ka la ai por hapoh 10 sngi ban pynurlong ia ki jingdawa.Ha ka 22 tarik mynta u bnai, ka Seng ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Director ka NEIGRIHMS halor ka jingdawa ban pyndam noh mardor ia ka jingthungkam Nursing Officer lyngba ka NORCET kaba ktah ia ki samla thepkam trai jylla bad ba ia ka jingthungkam dei ban pynlong beit da ka NEIGRHIMS.Ka Seng ka la dawa ruh ba ia ki jingthungkam hapoh ka NEIGRHIMS ym dei satia ban aiti sha ki Agency kiba nabar bad ban pynlong ia ka eksamin thungkam hapoh ka Jylla ym shabar ka jylla.  Nalor kata, ka seng ka la dawa ba dei ban aiti ban pyniaid ia ki kam sha ki Outsourcing Agency kiba la tbit na ka jylla ym da kiba nabar jong ka jylla. Ba ia ki kam Contractual ne Contract dei ban ai sha ki trai jylla kiba la biang ia ka kyrdan pule. Ban pyntreikam ia ka one-time absorbtion policy na ka bynta ki Nurse kiba la shah thungkam Contractual Basis. Ba ia ki kam Group-C bad Group-D dei ban mang 80% sha ki trai jylla.Ka Seng ka la aipor 10 sngi ia u Director ban pynurlong ia kine ki mat jingdawa bad byrngem ruh ban khang tala ia ka Ophis treikam jong ka NEIGRIHMS.Ki Magistrate bad ki Pulit kiba la ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia, ki la wan poi ban tohkit ia ka jingbyrngem jong ka Seng ban khang tala ia ka NEIGRIHMS. Ha ka jingïakren, u President ka HYC u la iathuh ha u Magistrate da kaba kynnoh ba ka jingbitar ki nongialam ka seng ka long ba u Director ka NEIGRIHMS Hospital u la ibein bad kynnoh ruh ba ki dei kiba kwah ban thaw jingkulmar.Hadien ar kynta ba ki san ngut ki nongialam ka seng ki la ieng ha phyllaw, u Dr. Mehta u la wan mih hi dalade ban pynjem ia ki nongialam ka HYC bad panmap ruh ia kaei kaba u la kren hapoh ka jingialang.Hadien ka jingïakren sngewthuh jingmut, u Director u la kyntu ia ki ban pynlong biang ia ka jingïakren bad ka seng, hynrei ki nongialam ka HYC ki la pynpaw beit markhmat ba kim kwah shuh ban dang iakren bad u mynta ka sngi hynrei ban phah ktien ha kawei pat ka por ban iakren halor ki jingdawa jong ka seng.
title: BA SHAH KHEIÑ KHYNNAH SUROK, BYRNGEM KHANG TALA KA HYC ÏA KA NEIGRIHMS HOSPITAL

content: Ki samla pule kiba thmu ban applai ia ka Scholarship ne ka baibam ki la ia kynduh ia ka jingeh bakhraw namarba ki hap ban ieng lain da ki kynta tang ban ioh thied ia ka E-Stamp namar ka jingduna ki jaka ban die ia kine ki E-Stamp.Ka Batesi TV, ha ka sngi Balang ka la sakhi ia ka jjingbun briew ha ophis treikam jong ka Deputy Commissoner jong ka East Khasi Hills District kiba la sdang ban ieng lain naduh ka por 9:00 baje mynstep tang ban ioh kloi wat lada ka ophis ka plie ha ka por 10:00 baje mynstep.Haba pyrshang ban iakren bad kiba bun ki samla hynrei ki kyntait ban iakren halor kane ka jingeh ba ki iakynduh. Kane ka jingieng lain da ki kynta ka la pynlong ia kiba bun ki samla pule ban duh klass noh bad don ruh kiba la shu phet jyndat.Haba iakren bad uwei na ki samla u la iathuh naduh ba la pyntreikam ia kane ka E-Stamp ki la ia kynduh jingeh namarba duna palat ki jaka ba die ia kane ka E-Stamp bad kumta u la kyntu ia ka Sorkar ba kan plie lad ban buh bun tylli ki jaka khnang ba kan pynduhnong ia ki samla kiba aplai ia ka Scholarship.
title: SYRTOK KI SAMLA PULE, DA KI KYNTA ÏENG LAIÑ BAN THIED E-STAMP HA DC OFFICE

content: Da kaba buh hakhmat ia ka thong ban ioh ia ka lyer kaba khuid bad ban iohi ia ka jingjyrngam jong ki khlaw ki btap, ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Meghalaya Basin Development Agency (MBDA) ki la pynsdang ia kawei ka project kaba la tip kum ka Agro Forestry Carbon Credit Scheme.Halor kane ka jingthmu, ki don 28 ngut ki nongrep kiba la wan shakhmat ban rejistar ia la ka jaka jong ki ban ioh ia kane ka skhim ha kaba kin ioh jingmyntoi ha ka shi snem kan ym duna ia ka T. 15 hajar nalor ki mar rep kaba ki la ioh ban pyniaid iew.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang da ki khlieh nongsynshar jong ka Hima Mylliem bad na ka Hima Khyrim nalor ki nongialam jong ka IORA Ecological Solution Private Limited bad ki ophisar ka District Council na rilum Khasi bad na rilum Jaintia.
title: 20 HAJAR SHI SNEM YN ÏOH KI NONGREP LADA PYNJYRNGAM ÏA KI KHLAW

content: A team of researchers from the Zoological Survey of India (ZSI), Kolkata, have recently discovered a new species of jumping spider from the tea estate of Meghalaya. The new species Phintella handersoni is described from the Anderson Tea Estate, situated in Umran Dai, Ri-Bhoi district, Meghalaya, and it has been named in honour of the late Handerson ry Syiemlieh, owner of the tea estate.The genus Phintella, are small to medium-sized spiders characterized by their vivid colours and adorned with metallic iridescent scales. The species typically exhibits a rounded or oval head with a distinct posterior slope, while the abdomen is ovoid or elongated, showing light and dark horizontal bands.The team of researchers was led by Dr. Souvik Sen, Zoological Survey of India (ZSI), Kolkata. Dr. Sudhin P. P., from ZSI, Kolkata, and Dr. John T. D. Caleb from Saveetha University, Chennai also participated in this study.The discovery of the new spider species from Meghalaya has beenpublished in the recent issue i.e 100(1) of the reputed international journal `Zoosystematics and Evolution’. Dr Dhriti Banerjee, Director, ZSI pointed out that spider play a vital role as natural enemy in tea ecosystem and conservation of natural enemies is an important practice under non-conventional pest management practices. The children and grandchildren of late Handerson Syiemlieh were very much excited about this discovery and appreciated the efforts of the ZSI team led by Dr. Sen. They are hopeful of further discoveries from the unexplored hills of Meghalaya.
title: NEW SPECIES OF JUMPING SPIDER DISCOVERED FROM TEA ESTATE IN MEGHALAYA

content: Shillong, January 31 : The Meghalaya football team emerged as the champions, clinching a sensational 2-0 victory over Punjab in the highly anticipated finals of the Khelo India Youth Games 2023 held in Chennai on January 31. The thrilling win marked the culmination of an extraordinary journey for Meghalaya, maintaining an impeccable undefeated streak from the group stage to the title-deciding clash.In an intense showdown against Punjab, Badondor Marbaniang seized the spotlight with two crucial goals, securing the championship for Meghalaya. The leadership of Captain Colinsalmon Lyngdoh played a pivotal role in the team’s success throughout the tournament.Placed in Group A alongside formidable opponents such as Punjab, Tamil Nadu, and Uttar Pradesh, Meghalaya asserted their dominance by topping the group and advancing to the semifinals. Placed in Group A alongside formidable opponents such as Punjab, Tamil Nadu, and Uttar Pradesh, Meghalaya asserted their dominance by topping the group and advancing to the semifinals. The Meghalaya Football Team exhibited exceptional prowess in the league matches. In the first match, Meghalaya triumphed over Uttar Pradesh with a convincing 4-1 victory. Also, hard-fought battle saw Meghalaya emerge victorious against Punjab with a score of 2-1. Moreover , in another closely contested match, Meghalaya secured a 2-1 win against Tamil Nadu.The semifinal clash against Jharkhand proved to be a high-octane encounter, with Meghalaya securing a thrilling 5-3 victory. Mebanlamlynti Marsharing’s outstanding hat-trick during this match solidified his position as Meghalaya’s top scorer, tallying an impressive 7 goals in the tournament.In response to the team’s stellar success, the Hon’ble Chief Minister of Meghalaya, Conrad K Sangma, expressed his elation, stating, “This victory not only brings pride to Meghalaya but also showcases the immense talent and dedication of our youth. Congratulations to Team Meghalaya for their outstanding performance and bringing home the Khelo India Youth Games 2023 championship. This triumph is a testament to the spirit of sportsmanship and hard work that defines our state.”Speaking on the sidelines of the victory, Sports Minister Shri Shakliar Warjri stated, “The triumphant success of Meghalaya football team in the Khelo India Youth Games 2023 is a testament to our unwavering commitment to sports infrastructure development and investment. The state’s dedication to creating top-notch facilities and fostering a culture of athletic excellence has played a pivotal role in achieving this remarkable victory.”Acknowledging the exceptional performance of the players, credit is also due to the coaching staff, led by Head Coach and CDM Jeffrey Walarpih. The collective efforts of Coach Beneslaus Khyriem and Manager Andy Lyngdoh Nongpiur played a vital role in shaping Meghalaya’s triumphant journey, showcasing the significance of teamwork both on and off the field.The journey commenced with a rigorous selection trial on January 4th and 5th, 2024, followed by an intensive Coaching cum Selection Camp from January 6th to 17th, 2024, where 25 skilled players were chosen to represent Meghalaya on the national stage.A grand send-off programme was organised on January 16, 2024, hosted by the esteemed Khlain Pyrkhat Syiemlieh, renowned football coach of the Directorate of Sports and Youth Affairs (DSYA). The programme was attended by prominent figures, including Hamlet Dohling, President of the Meghalaya Football Association (MFA), Cliff Nongrum, Vice President of MFA, Freddy Kharpran, Convenor of the Youth Cell at MFA, Ailad K. Kynta, a distinguished player from Meghalaya, and members of the DSYA.The team embarked on their journey from Shillong on January 17, 2024, and subsequently departed from Guwahati Airport on January 19, 2024, geared up for the challenge that awaited them in the Khelo India Youth Games.Additionally, the team is scheduled to return from Tamil Nadu on February 1, 2024, departing from Chennai’s international airport. A formal reception, including a dignified roadshow and felicitation, has been arranged to warmly receive the team upon their arrival.Meghalaya’s victory not only reflects the individual prowess of its players but also underscores the importance of outstanding teamwork and strategic guidance provided by their dedicated coaching ensemble.
title: MEGHALAYA FOOTBALL TEAM CLINCHES KHELO INDIA YOUTH GAMES 2023 CHAMPIONSHIP

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K. Sangma, ha ka sngi Palei u la pyllait paidbah bad aiti ia ki kali kit niut ba la tip kum ki Waste Collection e-Vehicles sha ki Block bapher bapher jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills, Eastern West Khasi Hills, East Khasi Hills bad West Jaiñtia Hills.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, ki Myntri ka Sorkar kiba kynthup ia ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Marcuise N Marak bad u MLA ka Umroi u Bah Damanbait Lamare, u MDC ka Umroi u Bah Bah Rangkynsai Kharbuki bad ki ophisar n aka ntat PHE bad ka Shillong Municipal Board.Ki kali kiba la pyllait paidbah ha kane ka sngi ki long haduh 207 tylli ia kiba la aiti sha ki Block bapher bapher jong ka ri lum Khasi bad Jaintia bad kum kane ka juh ka prokram yn sa pynlong shen ha rilum Garo.Haba kren kum u kongsan u Conrad Sangma, u la ong ba thong jong ka Swach Bharat Mission (Grameen), kaba dei ka National Flagship Programme jong ka Sorkar India ban pynlong ia baroh ki shnong kum ka ODF Plus.“Mynta ka Jylla tang hapoh khyndai bnai ka la kynjoh 84.33 % na ka 10 % ha ka ODF Plus. Kane ka long namar ka jingaiti lut jong ka Sorkar bad ki tnat treikam ban kynjoh sha ka thong ban long kaba nyngkong eh napdeng ki shiphew tylli ki jylla kiba wan shakhmat,” u la ong.Haba pan ia ka jingiatreilang bad ki paidbah, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “naduh ka Financial Year ba mynta u snem, manla ka lai bnai, ha baroh ki district, block bad ki shnong, ka sorkar bad manla uwei pa uwei u nongshong shnong kin iatreilang ban pynlong ia ki shnong bad ki nongbah kiba khuid basuba.U Marcuise M. Marak haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la ong ba ka jingaiti ia kine ki kali Waste e-Vehicle ka dei ka thong jong ka sorkar ban wanrah ia ka jingkhuid jingsuba hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya.U la iathuh ba ka Predicted Plan na ka bynta 2024-2025 ka kynthup ia ka jingkynjoh shispah n aka shispah ia ka ODF Plus, da kaba shna ia ki painkhana ha ki 1,10,240 tylli k iing bad 1553 spah ngut la bhah ia ka PMAY, ban shna 570 tylli ki Community Sanitary Complex Units bad ban pyntreikam 18 units ka Fecal Sludge Management da kaba bynrap sa ia ka Govardhan Units bad ka Plastic Waste Management Unit ban shna ha baroh kawei ka jylla.
title: 207 TYLLI KI KALI KIT ÑIUT AITI U CM SHA KI DISTRICT KA RILUM KHASI BAD JAIÑTIA

content: Kum shibynta ban tehlakam ia ka jingioh kamai laitluid ki bar jylla kiba shong basah hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya bad kumjuh kiba bylla ñiah kali Tourist na Shillong sha Guwahati kiba pyndonkam da ki kali ba don ia u number ML, ha ka sngi Palei ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO) Shillong City ka la pynlong ia ka jingkhynra ia ki Trading Licence bad Labour Licence ha Inter State Buss Terminal (ISBT) Mawiongrim da ka jingsynran lang jong ki Pulit ka Mawlai Police Station bad ki Enforcement ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC).Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President ka HITO Shillong City samla Banpyntngenlang Syiemlieh u la ong ba ka jingtalasi ia ki kot ki sla jong ki bar jylla ka dei namarba bunsien ki briew kiba nabar da kaba suk ki kamai jakpoh hapoh ka jylla, katba ki trai ri trai muluk pat ki mad jingeh ha kamai kajih namar ki shah knieh lut ha ki bar jylla.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, katba ki dkhot ka seng ki dang wan phai ha ISBT, ki la ioh bat ia kumba 18 ngut ki bar jylla kiba wan na ka jylla Assam kiba thmu ban trei bylla sngi sha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.Ia kine ki bar jylla, ka seng ka la ioh bat katba ki dang iaid lynti na surok VIP Road ha ka shnong Mawkynroh-Umshing.U samla Banpyntngenlang Syiemlieh u la iathuh ba kine ki bar jylla ki la wan da ki lai tylli ki kali Private kiba don ia u nombar AS21 M-1397, AS01BA-7400 bad AS02 V-7565 bad iathuh ruh ba kine ki bar jylla kim don satia wat tang ia ka Labour License, ka  EPIC Card ne kino kino ki kot ban pynshisha hynrei lait noh tang uwei bad arngut kiba la pyni ia ki Aadhaar Card.U la iathuh ruh ba ki nongñiah jong ki kali ki len beit ba kim don jingtip shaei yn leit buh ia kine ki bar jylla bad kam ruh ba ka dang dei ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ba kin wan rung sha nongbah Shillong.“Kaba kham pynlyngngoh ia ngi ka long kine ki bar jylla kim tip shaei kin leit bad kim tip hi ruh mano ba phah bad ngim da sngewthuh sngewthaw ia ka jingkren ka jong ki,” u la ong.Nalorkata, u samla Banpyntngenlang u la iathuh ba wat ki briew kiba donkti ban wanrah ia kine ki bar jylla sha Meghalaya kim shym la wan mih satia ban iakynduh ia ki dkhot jong ka seng wat haba ki la ap haduh jin ar kynta eiei.Hadien kane, ki Pulit ka Mawlai Police Station ki la wan poi ha kane ka jaka ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.“Ngi dawa ia ki Pulit kiba ap pahara ha Infiltration Chech Gate ha Byrnihat ba kin peitngor bad kin pyrkhing ia ka rung ka mih jong ki briew kiba nabar shapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya,”u la ong.
title: SYNRAN KI PULIT BAD KHADC HA KA JINGKHYNRA KALI BAR JYLLA KA HITO HA ISBT

content: Ka BJP Meghalaya Pradesh ha ka sngi Balang ka la pynkha ia ka Scheduled Tribe Morcha ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha ophis treikam jong ka party ha Bivar Road.U President jong ka ST Morcha u Thomas Marak u la pyllait paidbah ruh ia ka ‘vocal for local’ programme kum shi bynta ka “gaon chalo abhiyan” ban pynpoi sha baroh ki shnong kiba don hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.La thaw ia ka ST Morcha da ka party khnang ban peit ia ka bha ka miat jong ki trai jylla da ka BJP, Meghalaya Pradesh.Ha kane ka sngi, u State President ka party u Rikman G. Momin, u la pdiang burom ia ki nongkitkam jong ka ST Morcha, ia ki District President bad District Committee sha ka party.U State President u la ai ruh ka jingkular ba ka party kan ai jingkyrshan borbah ia ka ST Morcha.“Ban pynthikna ia ka bha ka miat jong ki trai jylla, ka ST Morcha, kan pynlong ia ki prokram bapher bapher ha ka jylla, da kaba leit sha manla ki shnong bad ban ai jingpynshai shahang ki skhim jong ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ban pynthikna ba ki nongshong shnong kin ioh ia ki jingmyntoi.
title: PYNKHA KA BJP ÏA KA ST MOCHA BAN PYNTIP ÏA KI SKHIM SHA KI PAIDBAH

content: : Ki shipai BSF kiba pahara ha khappud ki la iohkem ia ki arngut ki nongdie kyiad bad ioh kurup ruh 356 bilor ka kyiad kaba la thmu ban khaii tuh sha Bangladesh.Ha u kyrwoh, ki BSF ki la pyntip ba ha ka sngi balang hadien ba ki la ioh jingtip bathikna ki la pynlong ia ka jingpynap shrip bad ki la iohbat ia kawei ka kali bad ha ka jingtalasi la lap ba la kit da ka kyiad bad kumta ki la kem noh ia u nongñiah bad ia u nongbud jong ka kali kiba dei ki nong India bad la kurup noh ia ka kyiad kaba don hapoh kali.Ki BSF ki la iathuh, ba ia ka kyiad la thmu ban khaii be-aiñ sha ri Bangladesh lyngba ka thaiñ khappud kaba don ha West Jaintia Hills District.Ia kiba la shah kem ryngkat bad ka kyiad kaba la kurup la aiti noh sha ka ophis Custom kaba don ha Dawki na ka bynta ban leh ia kaba donkam.
title: KURUP KYIAD KI BSF, SHAH KEM AR NGUT KI NONG INDIA

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Border Disputed Redressal Forum (HBDRF) ha ka sngi Palei ka la dawa ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ba ym dei satia ban soi ïa ka Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) bad ka Assam lymda ka Sorkar Assam kam pynphai biang ïa ka Block-I kaba kynthup ïa ki phew tylli ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Labang Nongphyllut Dolloiship ha ka jingïapynbeit pud ha ka wat kaba ar.Ha ka dorkhas ka Forum ka la pyntip ruh ba ha ka jingïalang kaba la long dang shen ka la shim ïa ka rai ban pyrshah ïa ka Notification No. TAD/ R/31/60/151 Dated 13th April 1951 ba la pynmih da ka Sorkar Assam khlem ka jingpynsngew paidbah bad khlem ka jingtip jong ki nongshong shnong jong ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Labang Nangphyllut Dolloiship (Block-1) bad u Dolloi jong ka Elaka Raliang, Elaka Chiliang Myntang bad ka Elakal Nongjngi.Ïa kane ka “Notification” la pynmih bakla da ka Sorkar Assam da kaba shu phiah julor ïa ki shnong jong ka Nongphyllut Dolloiship jong ka rilum Jaiñtia (Block-1) na ka Jowai Civil Sub-Division bad pynngat sha ka United Cachar &Mikirs Hills ha ka jaka ban pynhap sha ka United Khasi &Jaititia Hills District Councils hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya, la ong ka Forum ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u Chairman u Bah Chandame Sungoh bad ka Secretary ka Kong Purity Phawa.“Lada ka Sorkar Assam kam mynjur ban pynphai ïa ka Block-1 sha Meghalaya u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya um dei ban soi ïa kano kano ka sosukular ne ka MoU,” dawa ka HBDRF.“Lah ban kdew ba kane ka Notification la leh bakla khnang ha ka kyrteng jong ki shnong bad ka jingdon briew,” la kynnoh ka Forum.Ka Forum ka la pyrshah ruh ïa ka jingpynmih ïa ka Khanduli bad Psiar Sector ha ka Regional Committe na ka bynta ka West Jaiñtia Hills District.“Ha ka jingsynshar ka Assam, ka United Khasi &Jaititia Hills ka la ïai pyrshang la bunsien ban ïoh biang ïa kane ka jaka.  Haba ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ïa ka jylla bapura (ka Block-I) ka la kylla long ka ishu ïaknieh khappud.  Ka Sorkar Meghalaya naduh u snem 1972 haduh 2011 ka la pyrshang ban ïoh biang ïa ka Block-1.  Hynrei kaba lyngngoh ka long ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la pynmih ïa ka Khanduli bad Psiar Sector ha ka Regional Committee jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills bad shim ïa ka rai ban leit jngoh bad ban pynbeit ïa u pud u sam ha Khanduli bad ïa ka Psiar Sector katba ïa ka Block-1 yn sa pynbeit hadien,” la ong shuh shuh ka Forum.“Ïa kane ka rai la pyrshah tyngeh da ka Forum ha ka jingïalang, namar da kane ka buit yn sa iehnoh ïa ka Block-1 sha Karbi Anglong, Assam. Kane ka dei ka buit jong ki Karbi bad ka Sorkar Assam ban ïoh ïa ka Block-1. Tang shu dep pynbeit ïa ka Psiar bad Khanduli kan long kaba jwat ban ïapynbeit ïa ka Block-I,” la kam ka Forum.Ka Forum ka la pynpaw ruh ba ka jingïapynbeit ïa ka Block-I yn ym lah satia ban shu sngap tang na ka mon ki paidbah, namarba ka jingbuhai shnong bad ka jingkyntur pud ka long shaba palat bad ym tang ki Pnar bad ki Karbi kiba shong basah hynrei wat ki Nepali ruh ki don sha kine ki shnong.  Ki Nepali kim dei ki trai ri trai muluk bad kim don ka bor ban pynpaw eiei.  Hynrei kumba ka paw, ki Karbi bad ki Nepali ki don ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut ban don beit ha Assam bad tang ki Khasi-Pnar kiba kwah ban wan sha Meghalaya.“Namar kata, ki ar tylli ki Sorkar ki dei ban peit ruh ki history bad ym ban shu ngop ha ka jingleh sorjamin,” la bynrap ka Forum.“Ngi kyntu ïa ka Regional Committee ba kam dei ban pynkut ïa ka jingleit jurip tang ha Khanduli, Mukroh bad Psiar kiba dang dei ki jaka jong ka Meghalaya bad Hamren, Jrikyndeng na ka liang ka Assam ne ban pynlong ïa ka Joint Inspection na baroh ar tylli ki Regional Committee bad ki dei ban buddien ruh ïa ka Joint Survey Report jong ka District Councils ha u snem 1958,” ong shuh shuh ka Forum.“Ïa ka kaiphod jong ka Regional Committees bad ka Sorkar Jylla dei ba ïathir ïatai hapoh ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly. Kane ka mat, kam dei tang ka kam jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam bad Meghalaya hynrei ka dei ka mat jong ki ar tylli ki Jylla,” la dawa ka Forum.
title: LADA KA ASSAM KAM PYNPHAI ÏA KA BLOCK-I, U CONRAD YM DEI BAN SOI ÏA KA MOU: HBDRF

content: Ki nongshong shnong kynthup ruh ia ki nongpeit jong ki shlem pule kiba don ha Lady Veronica Lane, Laitumkhrah ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la mih ban pyrshah ia ka jingthmu ban pynkynriah ia ki nongdie madan kiba ju shong die jingdie harud surok jong ki bynta bapher bapher ka shnong Laitumkhrah.Ka Kong Monalisa Wankhar kaba dei ka nongshong shnong, u Secretary jong ka Bethany Society bad ka Director jong ka Bethany Society ka Kong Bertha Dhar ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai pathai khubor ki la ong ba kum ki nongshong shnong kim shym la ioh jingtip eiei halor kane ka jingthmu jong ka Dorbar Shnong lane na ka Sorkar ban pynkynriah ia ki nongdie madan sha kane ka dong.Ki la ong, ba ka jingpyrshah ka long namarba ka surok ka long kaba khim bad kaba rit bad nalor kata, ha kane ka dong, ki don ruh ki skul kum ka Bethany Society kaba dei ka skul na ka bynta kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet, ka Mary Rise Centre kaba dei ka skul na ka bynta ki khynnah ba don jingduna ha ka bor pyrkhat bad nalor kata ka don ruh ka jaka sumar khmat jong ka Bansara Eye Care.Ka Kong Wankhar ka la ong, “kum ki nongshong shnong ngim shym la ioh jingtip lane ka jingpynbna na ka Dorbar Shnong lane na ka Sorkar shwa ban shim ia kane ka rai.  Ngi long kumba iuh tdong bseiñ haba ngi iohsngew ia ka rai jong ka MLA ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh lem bad ki Dorbar Shnong.  Ynda haba la tohkit la lap ba ka dei ka rai shimet jong ki hi.”Haba pynpaw ia ka jingbym sngew iahap ia ka rai ban khang ia ki kali kiba iaid lyngba na kane ka surok bad ban buh da ka por ia ka jingiaid ki kali, ka Kong Wankhar ka la ong, “haba bun hi ki nongshah sumar khmat, bad ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ka met ki donkam ban shah wan buh ne shah wan shaw na ki jaka sumar.  Ki mut ban pyniaid ia ki nongpang shaduh ka Parking Lot ba ki thmu ban buh ha iew. Ha kano ka nongrim ki shim ia ka rai kaba ngim lah ban mutdur?“Kum ki nongshong shnong, lada don kino kino ki jingjia basngewsih kum kein yn iaid ki Ambulance ne ki kali pynlip ding  namarba ka lynti ka long kaba la khim lypa, nalor kata kin buh sa ia kata ka iew ha ka lynti iaid kjat naei pat ngi ki briew ngin iaid? ka la ong.“Ka long kaba sngewsih ba ka Nongmihkhmat kam shym la pyrkhat lem ai ngi ki nongshong shnong bad ia kiwei pat kiba shah ktah na kane ka rai bad ka Nongmihkhmat ka la shu pynbna hakdak ban pynkynriah noh ia ki nongdie madan,” la bynrap ka Kong Wankhar.Ka la iathuh ruh ba ki nongshong shnong bad ki nongpyniaid ia kitei ki shlem pule ki la phah da ka jingthoh sha ka Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills District bad sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla hynrei haduh mynta kim pat ioh jubab eiei ruh em.Ka Kong Bertha haba bynrap lang halor kane, ka la ong, “ngim pyrshah ia ki nongdie madan hynrei ngi dang pyrkhat ka jingtap slep ia ka nala ban pynlong lynti iaid kjat kan pynsuk ia ki khynnah skul kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet, hynrei ngim poi pyrkhat ba kin wanrah pynban da ki nongshong die jingdie.”
title: MIH KA JINGPYRSHAH BAN PYNKYNRIAH ÏA KI NONGDIE MADAN SHA LADY VERONICAL LANE

content: Ka Kynhun Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la  mynjur ia ka jingtyrwa ban pynjlan ia ka samoi treikam jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) bad Jaintia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) sa hynriew bnai.Ka samoi treikam jong kine ki artylli ki Autonomous District Council (ADC) kan kut noh ha ka 5 tarik, Lber, 2024 bad ka jingpynjlan ia ka samoi treikam kaba hynriew bnai kan sdang naduh ka 5 tarik Lber, 2024.Ka jingpynjlan ia ka elekshon jied MDC thymmai ha kine ki ar tylli ki Council ka long namarba ki la kyrpad ban pynjlan ia ka jingaipor ia ki Delimitation Committee.Ha u snem 2023, u Lat ka Jylla u la aibor ia kine ki ar tylli ki Autonomous District Council ba kin thung ia ka Delimitation Committee ban pynbeit ryntih ia ki MDC Constituency jong kine ki ar tylli ki council katkum ka jingdon jong ki nongshong shnong.U Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba peit ia ka tnat District Council Affairs ka Sorkar Jylla, Bah Prestone Tynsong ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “dang shen ki ar tylli ki Autonomous District Council ki la phah ia ka jingtyrwa sha ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynjlan shuwa ia ka jingtreikam jong ki Delimitation Committee.”Da kane ka rai ba la shim da ka Sorkar, ia ka elekshon MDC jong ka KHADC bad JHADC la pynjlan mynta sa hynriew bnai.U Bah Tynsong u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar kan sa phah ia kane ka jingai jingmut sha u Lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan ba un ai ia ka jingmynjur.
title: SA 6 BNAI RAI KA SORKAR BAN PYNJLAN ÏA KA SAMOI TREIKAM KA KHADC BAD JHADC

content: Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la phah da ka dorkhas sha u Lamphang jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla u Thomas A. Sangma halor ka jingdawa ban buh da u nongpynkylla ktien lada u Lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan um lah ban kren da ka ktien Phareng ha ka jingai jingkren ha ka sngi sdang jong ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla.Ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla kaba phra sngi kan sdang naduh ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai bad kan kut ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai.“Katba ngi dang pynkhreh ia ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka ban sa long, nga thoh sha phi ban kdew ia ka mat kaba kongsan tam kaba iadei bad ka ktien ka thylliej ban iakren ha ka sngi shong dorbar,” la ong u Secretary ka VPP Bah Heavingstone Kharpran ha ka dorkhas ba la phah sha u Lamphang.“Kum ka jingai jingmut ha ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka bad na ka bynta ka jingbiang lang jong ki nongmihkhmat ba la jied da u paidbah, ka long kaba donkam ba baroh ki dkhot jong ka Ingdorbar kin dup lah ban sngewthuh ia ka jingmut ba shisha bad ban iashim bynta ha ki jingiatai.  Hynrei, la shem ba ha ki sien shong dorbar ba ladep, u Lat u la ai jingkren hapoh ka Ing da ka ktien Hindi, kaba la wanrah ia ka jingbym sngewtynnat ia ki nongmihkhmat ki bym sngewthuh ia ka ktien Hindi bad ban buh jingmut ruh ba ka ktien Hindi kam dei ka Official Language jong ka Jylla Meghalaya,” la ong ka dorkhas na ka VPP.“Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ha ka kyrteng jong ka Voice of the People Party, da kaba burom nga pyntip ba ka jingialang jong ka Parliamentary Party kaba la long ha ka 30 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2023, ka kyrpad ia phi ba ia ka jingkren jong u Lat dei ban thoh ha ka ktien Phareng bad lada u Lat badonburom um lah ban ai jingkren hapoh ka dorbar da ka ktien Phareng, ka ophis jong phi ka lah ban buh nongpynkylla ktien ia baroh kawei ka jingkren jong u na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang lang baroh,” la iaid ban ka VPP.“Da kaba pynthikna ba ka jingiatai ia ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka kan long ha ka ktien kaba lah ban sngewthuh lut da baroh ki nongmihkhmat, ngin kyrshan ia ki nongrim jong ka jingkhuid, ka jingiaryngkat bad ka synshar ka khadar kaba jop. Khatduh iawai, ka party ka kwah ban kdew da kaba shai ba kan ym iashim bynta ia ka jingiatai lymda ka Assembly Secretariat kam lah ban  pynurlong ia kane ka jingdawa,” la pynpaw ka VPP.
title: LADA U LAT YM LAH BAN KREN PHARENG HA ÏINGDORBAR BUH DA U NONGPYNKYLLA KTIEN: VPP

content: : Ka Employment Cell jong ka Khasi Students Union ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha u Myntri ka tnat Bording u Abu Taher Mondal halor ka jingsah pongding ka jingthungkam na ka bynta ka kam Assistant Engineer (Electrical/ Mechanical) bad ka jingthud treikam jong ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL).Katkum ka dorkhas ba ka KSU ka la aiti sha u Myntri, ka la pynpaw ba ka kyrteng jong ki nongthep kam kiba la pyndep ia ka Written Test na ka bynta ka post Assistant Engineer la pynlong da ka MeECL ha ka 13tarik, Naitung, 2019 bad la pynmih paidbah ia ka Result ha ka 19 tarik,Nailar 2019 katba ia ka personal interview na ka bynta ki 24 ngut kiba la pas ia ka written test kaba la buh sngi ban pynlong ha ka 26 tarik Nailar, 20129 la pynsangeh noh da kaba pyntip ba yn sa pynbna pat kham hadien.“Mynta la saw snem tam ia ka personal interview ym pat lah satia ban pynlong,” la ong ka KSU ha ka dorkhas.“Ka Union ha ka 11 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Director (Corporate Affairs), MeECL ban dawa jingpynshai halor ka jingpynslem ia ka jingthungkam bad ka Union ka la lap ruh ba ka Corporation kam shym la thungkam iano iano ruh na ka bynta ka Permanent Post naduh u snem 2019 namar ka jingbym don pisa ban siew sha ki nongtrei,” la ong ka KSU.Halor kane, u Chairman jong ka Employment Cell u samla Reuben Najiar u la iathuh ba ka Seng ka la kyntu ia u Myntri ka tnat Bording ban sdang noh ia ka jingthungkam ha kine ki post bad kumjuh ruh ia kiwei post ba dang lait.
title: SAW SNEM KYNTHIH PAT KHOT PERSONAL INTERVIEW KA MeECL ÏA KA POST ASST. ENGINEER

content: Ka Dorbar Shnong Pynthorumkhrah Golflink ha ka sngi Thohdieng, ha ka jingiakynduh ia u MLA ka Pynthorumkhrah Constituency u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek ka la pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur lada ka Shillong Golf Club (SGC) kan pyniaid ia ka  Children’s Park bad ia ka jaka ialehkai Futsal kaba yn sa shna noh shen.Ha ka jingialang, u Rangbah Shnong ka Pynthorumkhrah Golflink Bah Micheal Hek ha ka jingiakren bad u MLA u la pynpaw ba lada pyniaid hi da ka tnad Jngohkai Pyrthei ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dorbar Shnong kan ai ka jingiatreilang hynrei lada jia ba la aiti ban pyniaid sha ka Shillong Golf Club ka Dorbar Shnong kan pyrshah namarba kan long tang kum ka jaka kamai pisa jong ka Club.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Micheal Hek u la ong ba lada ka Sorkar ka shimti ban pyniaid hi ruh ka dei ban pyntikna ba ki khun samla jong ka shnong kin iohkam iohjam.“Ha ka jingshisha ngim don jingtip ba kin buh ia ka Park, dei ki nongkitkam shnong kiba pyntip ia nga bad ki la pyntip ruh ba dei ka Golf Club kaba la phah ia ka jingtyrwa sha ka Sorkar kaba la mang ruh ia ka skhim ban shna ia ka Park. Mar mar ngi la lum ia ka jingialang bad ngi la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma, sha u MLA Bah AL Hek bad sha u Myntri ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei Bah Paul Lyngdoh bad sha u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei u Vijay Kumar,” ula ong.“Ka long kaba sngewsih ba kat kane ka jingthmu kaba heh, hynrei ka shnong kam don jingtip eiei. Ka long kaba sngewlehrain wat ia ka Executive Committee jong ka Shnong.  U MLA ula pynshai ba ka jingthmu ka long ban shna ia ka madan Futsal bad ka Children’s Park,” la iathuh u Bah Michael Hek.U la iathuh ba u MLA u la pynshai ba kan don ruh ka jingiateh kular hapdeng ka shnong bad ba ka shnong kan ioh jngmyntoi bad yn aikam ruh sha ki samla jong ka shnong.“Nga la kren shai u MLA ban iatreilang bad ka Sorkar kam don jingeh, lada ka pyniaid ka Sorkar kan don ka jingmyntoi ia ka shnong. Nga la kren pyrshah ia u MLA ba lada ka pyniaid ka Golf Club ngin pyrshah bad lada ka kam trai ia kane ka jaka bad lada ka pyniaid hi ka Golf Club, ka shnong kan pyrshah beit,” la ong u Rangbah Shnong.Haba pynpaw shuh shuh ia ka jingpyrshah ban aiti ia ka jaka sha ka Shillong Golf Club, u Rangbah Shnong u la ong, “ka Golf Club ka la pynkylla ktem kamai nangne na ka madan Golflink.  Ki wan ki Director ban iakren na ka bynta ban ker noh da ka jar nar namarba madan ka la sdang ban jot.”“Nga la ong ruh ia u Director ka Golf Club ba u dei ban aikam noh hapoh 30 ngut ia ki khynnah samla jong ka shnong bad ban thep kam ia ki khynnah napoh ka shnong ha kaba u Director u la kular ban aikam ryngkat ka tulop kaba 10 hajar shi bnai.  Ynda ki rangbah dong ki la ai ia ki aplikeshon jong ki khynnah samla ban thep kam, katba ka jingsiew tulop ka long tang T. 4-5 hajar. Na ka liang jong ngi hi, ngim treh ban iatreilang bad ka Golf Club lano lano ruh, shisien u briew uba la thok, dei na kata ka daw,” la kynnoh u Rangbah Shnong.U la maham ruh ba ka Shillong Golf Club ka leh ia kano kano ka kam nangne shakhmat ka dei ban da pyntip sha ka Dorbar Shnong hynrei lym kumta ia ka jingkhrong pisa ban rung sha madan GolfLink ka Dorbar Shnong kan leit ban khang noh.“Ka Shillong Golf Club kam dei ka Society ne ka NGO kaba iarap ia kino kino hynrei ka dei tang kaba shu kamai shimet,” la kynnoh shuh shuh u Rangbah Shnong.
title: PYRSHAH KA DS PYNTHORUMKHRAH GOLFLINK BA THMU SHNA CHILDREN’S PARK KA SHILLONG GOLF CLUB

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) South East Central Circle ha ka 27 tarik u bnai baladep ka la pynthymmai ïa ki nongkitkam ba thymmai na bynta ka samoi treikam jong u snem 2024-27Ïa ka jingjied ïa ki nongkitkam ba thymmai la pynlong da ka jingïathep vote ba la ïashim bynta da ki dkhot jong ka KSU South East Central Circle, Pynursla na ki 8 tylli ki Unit.Ki nongkitkam ba thymmai ki long u President Wallam Jingshngaiñ Suting, Vice President Basuklang N. Khongwar, General Secretary Vorrozislov Sohklet,  Assistant Secretary Sanlang Vennhanan Diengdoh, Organising Secretary Jestice Kharbyngar, Education Secretary Riskhemlang Lyngdoh, Sports Secretary Mewanteiskhem Mawïong, Environment and Cultural Secretary Thawthymmai Suting, Office Secretary Pynskhemborlang Nongrum, Publicity and Information Secretary Pynkiewbiang.Ïa kine ki nongkitkam la pynskhem da u Organising Secretary ka KSU-CEC u samla Raymond Kharjana.Ha ka jingai jingkren lyngkot sha ki dkhot ka seng, u samla Raymond Kharjana u la pynkynmaw haba ki samla ki long kum ki nongïalam ne dkhot jong ka seng, kim dei ban khmihlynti jingmyntoi na ka seng namarba ka seng hi kam ju ïoh eiei ban ai ne siew tulop ïa ki kumba long kiwei kiwei pat ki nongtrei ïa kiwei kiwei ki kam bad ong ruh ba ka KSU ka ai jinghikai ïa ki samla bad ïa ki paradoh parasnam kumno ban ieid ïa la ka ri ka jaidbynriew bad ban pynshlur ruh ïa ki samla ba kin long kiba trei shitom khamtam eh haba ki ïaleh ïa kino kino ki mat ba ka seng ka shim ban ïaleh.“Kum ki dkhot ka seng, ngi dei ban long kiba peitngor bad kiba husiar bha ïa ka jingkren bad jingkynshoit ki katto katne ngut kiba pyrshang ban pynpait pynpra ïa ka jaidbynriew halor ka nongrim jong ka jingsngewpher thaiñ, jingsngew pher niam bad ka jingpynïapher jaidbynriew halor ka ktien ka thylliej ba ngi kren ha ki shnong bad ki dong bapher bapher jong ka Bri Hynñiewtrep,”u la ong.
title: PYNTHYMMAI KA KSU-SECC, PYNURSLA ÏA KI NONGKITKAM

content: : Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ha ka sngi Thohdieng jong ka taiew baladep ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Director jong ka NEIGRIHMS, u  Prof. (Dr.) Nalin Mehta ban pan jingpynshai halor ka post Diet Clerk.Ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u President u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem, ka seng ka la dawa jingpynshai ba balei ym pat lah ban thungkam ha ka post Diet Clerk haduh mynta wat haba ïa ka result jong ka Written Test Examination bad ka Typing Speed Examination ladep ban pynbna ha ka 4 tarik, Naiwieng, 2022 bad 3 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2023, ha kaba saw ngut ki trai ri trai muluk la shem ba ki dei kiba la pas ïa kine ki ar tylli ki eksamin.”“Kane ka jingpynslem ban pynbna ïa ka result ïa kiba la pas ïa ka eksamin da ka Institute, khamtam eh nalor ba ki dei ki trai shnong ka jylla, ka la pynartatien ïa ka jingkhuid jingsuba ha ka rukom thungkam namarba ka ktah ïa ka bor pyrkhat bad ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki nongthep kam,” la ong ka seng“Lada pynslem shuh shuh, kan lam sha ka jingeh kaba ki nongthepkam kin kut noh ka rta wadkam,” la ong ka seng.“Ngi kyntu ïa phi kum u nongpeit ka Institute shahskhor ïa kane ka jingdawa jong ngi na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki samla bad ka jylla baroh kawei,” la bynrap ka seng.
title: DAWA JINGPYNSHAI KA HYC ÏA KA NEIGRHIMS HALOR KA POST DIET CLERK

content: : U MDC ka Tura u Bernard N. Marak u la kynnoh ba ki nongsam Gas lyngba ka Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY) ki dawa pisa na ki nongthang Gas baduk ha ki katto katne ki bynta ka rilum Garo.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah ha ka sngi u Blei, u MDC ka Tura u la ong, “ka pisa ba la dawa na ki nongthang Gas ka long T.1,000 haduh T. 1,500 ha ki katto katne tylli ki shnong.  Hynnin ka sngi la don ba pyntip ïa nga lyngba ka telephone na ka shnong Rewak, South Garo Hills ha kaba uwei u briew u la shah dawa ban siew ïa ka pisa T. 1,500 shi iing ban ïohei ïa u tyndong Gas.  Ki don ruh ki jingujor na kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ka rilum Garo bad nga kyrpad ïa ki nongsam ha ki District ba kim dei ban dawa pisa na ki nongïoh jingmyntoi. Nga kyrpad ruh ba dei ban leh da kaba tyngeh ïa kito kiba donkti ha kane ka kam be-aiñ“Ka PMUY ka dei ka scheme na ka bynta ki kynthei kiba im hapoh u laiñ ka jingduk.  Lyngba kane ka skhim la ai Gas ei sha ki kynthei.  Ki nongthang Gas kim donkam ban siew ïa ka pisa ban ïoh ïa u tyndong lyer shet ne ban siew ram ban pyndap ha ka sien banyngkong eh ha ka hynriew siew na ka bynta u tyndong uba 14.2 kilo. Ïa ka EMI dei ban siew tang haduh ka sien pyndap kaba hynñiew.  Kum kine ki skhim la shu rong ei da ki katto katne ki riewshimkabu kiba pynbudnam sniew ïa ka jinglehbha u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi,” ong u Marak.
title: KI NONGSAM GAS HA GARO HILLS KI DAWA PISA, KYNNOH U MDC KA TURA

content: Kibahaïing hasem kim don shuh ka jingkyrmen ba u Bah Marshall Marweiñ un dang im hadien ba u la jah rngai ha ka jingtwa ka synrum jaboh ha Marten ha ka por kumba 1:30 baje nohsngi ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep.Wat hadien 48 kynta ba ki nongtrei ka State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) hapoh ka jingïalam jong u 2nd in Command Bah B. Sahkhar ki la la hiar sha Marten ban wad ïa u Bah Marshall ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ki nongtrei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board, hynrei haduh mynta kim pat lap dien satia ia ka met jong u Bah Marshall Marweiñ uba la shah tep im ha ka jingtwa ka synrum jaboh ha Marten.U Bah Marshall u la jah rngai naduh ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep ha ka por 1.30 baje nohsngi hadien ba ka synrum jaboh ka la twa ha Marten kaba la long ka jaka thehñiut ha Mawlai mynta la 86 snem, kata naduh u snem 1938.Watla ki nongtrei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ki la trei shitom naduh ka sngi Saitjaiñ haduh mynta ka Lah Sngi u Blei  hynrei kim pat lapdien satia ïa u.Ka Kong Thilda Mary Lyngdoh Mawphlang kaba dei ka Hymen kynsi jong u Bah Marshallha ka jingiakren  bad ka Batesi TV ka la ong, kum ki bahaing hasem kim don jingkyrmen shuh ba un dang im hynrei watla katta ki kyrpad ia ki nongtrei ka Municipal bad ia ka kynhun SDRF ba kin dang bteng ban wad ia ka met jong u haduh ban da lap khnang ba kin ym don hapdeng ka jingsahnud.“Ngi ai khublei ia ki nongtrei ka Municipal bad ia ka kynhun SDRF kaba la trei shitom ban wad ia i (bah Marshall) bad kum ka iing ngim don jingkyrmen shuh ba in dang im,” la ong ka Hymmen Kynsi.U Chief Executive Officer (CEO) jong ka Shillong Municipal Board u PK Boro bad u Executive Engineer Bah F.B Chyne ha ka sngi u Blei ki la hiar jurip da lade sha Marten ban peit ïa ka jinglong jingman tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih.“Ngi kyrmen ban ïohi ïa ki dak ki shin ban lapdien ïa u Bah Marshall bad ngi la suba ruh un im shuh hi ruh,” la ong u Bah Chyne ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Sngi u Blei.Kum ka jingsngewlem, u CEO bad u Executive Engineer ki la leit jngoh ïa ka ing jong u Bah Marshall bad ban ïakynduh ruh ïa ka kurim ka jong u bad ïa ki bahaing hasem ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih halor kane ka jingjia.U Bah Marshall Marweiñ bad ka kurim jong u, ka Kong Darisha Lyngdoh Mawphlang ki don arngut ki khun, iwei i shynrang ba la 3 snem ka rta bad i kynthei ba la 2 snem ka rta bad kine ki shikurim im da ka kam wad marjot ha Marten.
title: YM DON JINGKYRMEN SHUH KI BAHAIING BA U BAH MARSHALL UN DANG IM

content: Kawei na ki lehniam tynrai jong u khun Khasi kaba la pynkhie im mynta la 25 tylli ki snem, ka dei ka Kiew Pyneh Rngiew sha u Lum Sohpetbneng.  Ïa kane ka Kiew Pyneh Rngiew la ju pynlong da ka Seng Khasi Kmie manla u snem, naduh u snem 1999, katta ha ka Robibar kaba nyngkong jong u bnai Rymphang.Ka jingleit kiew sha u Lum Sohpetbneng ka dei kaba kum ki pateng longdien mandien kiba dang bat da ksoh rdin, ha la ka jong ka niam hok tynrai, ba shisien shi snem, u khun bynriew u donkam ba un eh ïa la ka jong ka rngiew, ka rwiang, ka bok, ka nusip, kaba long katkum ka bynta bad ka hukum Blei.La ju pynïaid ïa kane ka Kiew Pyneh Rngiew da ka Lum Sohpetbneng Committee hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka Seng Khasi (Kmie).Mynta ka kynti ruh, lah ban ong ba kane ka lehniam u Khun Khasi baïar ka la long da shisha kaba da iphuh iphieng, kaba da shongkun shong blei, da ka jingwan ban iashim bynta ryntih da ki paid ka Bri U Hynñiewtrep Hynñiaw Wasa.Kumba ka ju long hashwa ka kiew pyneh rngiew sha u Sohpetbeng, ka Lum Sohpetbeng Committee ryngkat ka Komiti u Tymmen U San ka Seng Khasi Kmie, ki ju pynlong shwa da ka nguh ka dem, ka shat ka kheiñ, ka kñia ka khriam ha ki lai tylli ki jaka, katta, ha Lum Dorbar ha Lawnongthroh, bud pat sa ha ka Mei Mawbuh bad pynkut pat sa ha ka duwan ka dupat jong u Lum Sohpetbneng, kaba ha kane ka kynti kaba mynta ki dak ki shin hi ki kren shai kdar ba U Blei Trai Kynrad ryngkat ki Ryngkew ki Basa ki da wan ban pynpaw lem ia la ki jong ki dak ki shin ia ka jingpdiang ka jong ki ia kane ka Jingkiew Eh Rngiew bad ia kane ka lehniam la ju tip pat ia ka kum ka Lehniam Shi Hat Shi Taiew.Ki rangbah ba la lah ban lam khmat ha ka sien Kiew Eh Rngiew kaba nyngkong eh ha u snem 1999 ki long u Rangbah Sumar Sing Sawian, u Rangbah Mistin Tymthai kiba la bam kwai ha dwar ïng u Blei, khlem da klet ïa kiwei pat ki rangbah kum u Rangbah Dipshon L Nongbri, kiba im miet la bad sngi da kumno ban nang pynjanai bad ban ïai pynwandur ïa kane ka lehniam leh rukom kaba heh tam u khun Khasi baïar.U Khun bynriew haba u shang u krih, u rep u riang, u kamai u kajih, um juh klet ban khlem da ainam ai burom ïa la u Trai Nongbuh Nongthaw, namarba na kawei ka samoi sha kawei pat, na uwei u snem sha uwei pat, u khun bynriew u da ïaid lang ryngkat bad ka jingkyrkhu u Blei Trai Kynrad Nongthaw Nongbuh Nongsam bynta Nongbuh bynta.Kumta, haba u khun bynriew u bit u biang u dap u sup u thiar, u ioh ïa ka khiah krat ka khiah stang, ka biang ka kamai ka kajih, ka trei ka ktah, um  ju lyndet na la u Blei Trai Kynrad, hynrei u da ai ïa ka nguh ka dem, kumjuh ruh haba wan jia ka pang ka shitom, ka jynjar ka lanot, u phai sha la u nongthaw, da kaba un nguh un dem ha U, ban panmap ïa ka lait  ka let u khun bynriew.Kumta, ban pynneh ban pynsah ïa ka niam hok kaba nylla bad ruh ban pynïeng rasong ïa la ka jong ka pyrkhat niam ba nylla, ka tip kur, ka tip kha, ka tip briew, ka tip Blei, bad ban kamai keiñ pat ïa ka hok, mynta ka kynti u paidbah byllien na kylleng sawdong ka Ri Lum Khasi bad Jaiñtia, tiap ki la ïa snoh kti lang ban ïashim bynta shitrhem sha kane ka Lehniam.
title: SHONGKUN SHONG SBAI KA KIEW PYNEH RNGIEW KABA 25 SHA U LUM SOHPETBNENG

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma, ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la pynkup burom ia ki nongialehkai sports kiba la ioh khur takma ha ka Meghalaya Games 2024 bad kumjuh ruh ia ka kynhun ialehkai phutbol ka Jylla Meghalaya kiba la ioh khur ia ka takma ksiar dang shen ha ka Khelo India Youth Games 2024.Ha ka jingialanag kaba la long ha U Soso Tham Auditorium, Shillong, la sakhi lang da u Myntri ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs u Bah Shakliar Warjri, ka Myntri ka tnat Health & Family Welfare ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, ka Director jong ka Sports and Youth Affairs ka Kong Isawanda Laloo bad kiwei kiwei.Haba kren kum u Kongsan ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u la ai khublei ia ki nongialehkai sports kiba la ioh ia ka jingjop bad kiba la wanrah ia ka nam ka burom sha ka jylla Meghalaya.“Kane ka taiew ka long kaba kongsan bad baroh shitaiew ngin ia rakhe lang bad ki samla ha ka jingialehkai sports, ki nongsengkam lajong, ki nongput nongtem bad manla ki kam ba ngi don baroh shitaiew kiba iadei bad ki samla,” u la ong.U la iathuh ba ka jingpynkup burom bad ka jingai jingithuh ia ka jingjop jong ki samla ka long ban kyntiew ia ki kum ki khlur bad ki nongai mynsiem ia kiwei pat.“Nga kwah ban ong ia ki samla kiba don hangne ba phi long kiba kongsan tam bad phi don ka jingkitkhlieh bad kam dei eh tang ban ioh ia ka takma ne ban ioh khusnam hynrei ban long ki nuksa babha ia kiwei pat,” u la ong.U Myntri Rangbah u la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewnguh ia ka Meghalaya Sports Olympic Association (MSOA), ia ki kynhun ialehkai sports bapher bapher bad ia ka tnat Sports kiba la noh la u synniang u bynhei ban pynlong ia ka lympung ialehkai Meghalaya Games kaba jop.“Ki don ki jingtynjuh hynrei manla u snem ngi pynthikna ba ka jingialehkai kan kham bha bad ngin jop ruh ia ki jingeh jingtynjuh kiba shah hakhmat,” u la bynrap.Haba ai khublei ia ka kynhun ialehkai phutbol kaba la long ka lahduh ha ka Khelo India Youth Games u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba kane ka kynhun ka la pynlong ka jingsarong ia ka jylla bad bynrap, “ki la long ki Lahduh bad kane ka pyni ia ka sap ka phong kaba ngi don bad kaba ki lah ban kynjoh sha ka thong lada ngi long kiba kut jingmut bad kiba buh hakhmat ia ka thong,” u la ong.Shwa kane, u Bah Shakliar Warjri u la pynkynmaw ia ki nongialehkai ba kin pyndonkam ia ka khusnam pisa da ka jingstad khnang ba kin nang lah shuh shuh ban pynpaw ia ka sap ka phong ha ka jinglehkai sports.“Ka sorkar ka la ai jingithuh ia ka jingtrei shitom jong phi ban jop ia ka takma hynrei kane kam pat dei satia kaba jingkut.  Buh ia ka thong ban kynjoh kham shajrong namarba phi long ka lawei jong ka jylla jong ngi,’ u la ong.
title: DA KA PISA AI SNGEWBHA KA SORKAR ÏA KIBA JOP TAKMA HA KA KHELO INDIA BAD MEGHALAYA GAMES

content: Ka ophis jong u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills ka la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei ban shah pynngop ne ban sheptieng ïa ki riewshukor kiba pynkam ïalade ba kidei na ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar Pdeng, kum ka tnat Custom, CBI, NCB bad kiwei kiwei tang ban ïoh lute suk ïa ka pisa na ki riewpaidbah ba luilui.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, u Superintendent of Police (City), East Khasi Hills, Bah Vivek Syiem, u la ong, “la ïoh jingtip ba ki don ki riewshukor kiba kam ïalade kum ki nongrah tiar kum ka FedEx bad kiba telephone ïa ki riewpaidbah ban pyntip ba ki don ki tiar ba la poi ha ka kyrteng jong ki tangba kiba don pat ïa ki tiar ba be-aiñ.’“Nalor kata, ki riewshukor ki donkti ruh ban don bynta lang bad kiwei pat da kaba pyndonkam ïa ka kyrteng jong ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar Pdeng kum ka tnat Customs, CBI, NCB, bad kiwei kiwei ban pyntip sha ki briew baluilui ba ki donkti ban buhrieh ïa ka pisa bymhok bad dei ban pynphai ïa ka pisa sha ka Account da kaba kam ba ka dei ka na ka bynta ka RBI Clearance,” la ong u SP (City).“Khnang ban pyntieng ïa ki riewpaidbah, ki ju phah da ka jingpyntip ba u lanot u la lah ban shah kem ha kiba bun ki khep.  Ha kawei pat ka liang, ki ju phah ban ujor da kaba register online lyngba katto katne ki App kiba dei pynban tang ki shrip bym i don jingsuba eiei. Namarkata, wat ngop ban pdiang ïa kine ki Apps na ki briew kiba phah khlem ithuh,” la maham u SP (City).“La kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin da pynshisha shwa lada u dei u nombar ba la telephone na ka bynta ki tiar bym shym la thied.  La kyrpad ruh ïa ki paidbah ba lada don kum kine ki jingjia, ki lah ban pyntip sha ki Police Station na ka bynta ban pynshisha bad ba ki Pulit kin dup lah ban leh la ka jong ka kamram.  Ïa kine ki jingjia, lah ban pyntip ruh sha u Cybercrime Helpline Number 1930 bad sha ka Police Control Room, Shillong ha u nombar 0364-2215427 bad ha u nombar 6009196479,” ong shuh shuh u SP (City).
title: HUSIAR! PYNTIENG KI RIEWSHUKOR IA KI PAIDBAH BAN ÏOH LUTE PISA SUK

content: U MLA jong ka Pynthorumkhrah Constituency Bah Alexander L. Hek uba long ruh u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai u la leit jurip ia ka shnong Pynthorbah na ka ban ban pynbna ia ki surok, ki lynti ki syngkien bad ia ki lynti iaid kjat.Ia u MLA, la synran lang da u Executive Engineer ka tnat PWD (Roads) Shillong Central Division, Shillong u Bah Jowel Marbaninag, ka Asst. Executive Engineer Kong Anumanda Sumer, u Joint Engineer Bah Don Swer, u Rangbah Shnong ka Pynthorbah Bah Syrpai Marbaniang bad ki nongkitkam jong ka shnong PynthorbahU Bah AL Hek u la Kular ban wanrah ia ki kam pynroi na ka bynta ban pynbha bad ban pynitynnat ia ka shnong Pynthorbah khnang ba kan long ka jingkyrkhu ia ki paidbah jong ka shnong Pynthorbah.Nalor ki kam ba ladep ban pyntrei, ba kynthup ia ki surok, ki lynti ki syngkien, ki nala bad ki lynti iaid kjat ki don ruh shibun ki kam kiba u Bah AL Hek ha ka jinglong nongmihkhmat u la wanrah hapoh ki shnong bapher bapher jong ka Pynthorumkhrah Constituency.U Bah Hek u la kyrpad ruh ia ki paidbah ba kin long kiba iaishah hapdeng ka jingpyntrei bad ka jingpynbha ia ki surok bad ki lynti ki syngkien hapoh ka shnong namarba kin don ki jingwit ha ka leit ka wan bad ka iaid ka ieng jong ki paidbah bad ia ki kali.
title: JURIP U BAH AL HEK ÏA KI SUROK, NALA BAD LYNTI ÏAID KJAT HA PYNTHORBAH

content: : Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) kam don jingpyrshah eiei ruh em halor ka jingtyrwa ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynjlan ia ka samoi treikam jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council bad ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council na ka bynta hynriew bnai lada la leh katkum ki kyndon ba la bthah ha ka Section 6A jong ka Khyrnit Bahynriew.“Hynrei kane ka jingtyrwa ba mynta ka long pyrshah ia ka Section 6A jong ka Khyrnit Bahynriew kaba kdew shai, “haba ka don ka jingpynbna ia ka Emergency ba kan treikam lane lada ka mih kano kano ka daw, ha ka jingsngew jong u Lat, ka jingpynlong elekshon ka bym treikam, lah ban pynjlan da u Lat ban ym palat ia ka shi snem bad lada jia ba ka jingpynbna ia ka Emergency ka la treikam kam dei ban palat ia ka samoi kaa hynriew bnai hadien ba la pynbna.  Namarkata, kumba ka long mynta kam don kano kano ka Emergency bad kam don nongrim hi ruh ia u Lat ban phah pynlong ia ka elekshon ka bym lah ban treikam,” la ong ka KHNAM ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Working President Bah Thomas Passah.“Na ka por sha ka por, ngi la iohi ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la tuklar ia ka jingtreikam ba laitluid jong ki Council bad ka ladei ka por ban pynneh katkum ka aiñ ia ka jinglong ba laitluid ha ka synshar ka khadar,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.“Ka jingtyrrwa jong ka Sorkar Jylla ym tang ba ka pynkhein ia ka kyndon jong ka Khyrnit Bahynriew hynrei ka pynduh ruh ia ka hok jong ki paidbah ban jied pynthymmai ia ki nongmihkhmat ha ka por kaba dei. U Lat un hap ban shim ia ka rai bad ngin sa phah ia ka jingthoh sha u Lat bad ban kyrpad ia u ban iada ia ka kyndon jong ka Para 6A jong ka Khyrnit Bahynriew ka Riti Synshar ka ri India,” la ong ka KHNAM.
title: RAI KA KHNAM BAN THOH SHA U LAT BAN YM PYNJLAN ÏA KA SAMOI TREIKAM KA KHADC BAD JHADC

content: : Ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) Meghalaya Pradesh ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynkup burom ïa i Kong Silbi Passah iba la shah jied ban ïoh pdiang ïa ka khusnam Padmashree na ka President ka ri India ka Droupadi Murmu bad ïa u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek uba la ïoh pdiang dang shen ïa ka khusnam Dadasaheb Phalke ha New Delhi.I Kong Silbi Passah i la shah shah jied ban ïoh pdiang ïa ka Khusnam Padmashree halor ka jinglah jong i ban kyntiew ïa ka put ka tem bad ka rwai ka siaw sur tynrai, katba u Bah AL Hek u la shah pynkup burom da kane ka khusnam kum u Myntri Sorkar ba tbit bad kum u nongshakri paidbah ba khlem shongthait ha ki 25 tylli ki snem kiba u la long u nongmihkhmat jong ka Pynthorumkhrah Constituency bad nalor u synniang u bynhei ba u la noh sha ka jylla bad ka ri baroh kawei.Ha ka jingpynkup burom ïa kine ki arngut, la sakhi lang da u President ka BJP Meghalaya Pradesh u Rikman G. Momin bad kiwei kiwei de ki nongïalam bahakhmat jong ka party.I Kong Silbi haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang i la pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la ai ka jingithuh ïa ki kam ba i la trei da ka khusnam Padmashree 2024.“Nga ladei ban ïaid lynti da ki bun bun snem kum ka nonghikai ïa ka Subject Hindi ha ki skul bad ban kyntiew ïa ki jingrwai bad ki poitri tynrai.  Kum ka nongshong shnong jong ka jylla Meghalaya nga la ïoh shibun ki lad ban pynsaphriang ïa ki jingrwai bad ki poitri tynrai ym tang hapoh ka ri India hynrei sha kiwei pat ki ri,” la ong i Kong Silbi.Haba ai ka jingïaroh ïa ka BJP Meghalaya kaba la ai ka jingithuh, i la ong “burom ïa ka riti dustur bad ïa ka ktien tynrai bad ka pyrthei kan burom ïa phi.”U Bah Hek haba ai jingkren u la ong ba ka khusnam kaba u la ïoh kam shongdor bad ka khusnam ba la ïoh da i Kong Silbi kata ka Padma Shri Award 2024.U la ong ba ka jingïoh khusnam kam dei ka sngi bakut ban trei ïa ki kam hynrei ka dei ka jingsdang ban trei ïa ki kam ban nang kyntiew ïa ka jaidbynriew bad ïa ka jylla hi baroh kawei.Da kaba pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen halor kane ka jingshahpynkup burom, u Bah Hek ula ong ba ïa ka Dadasaheb Phalke Award la ai ïa u kum u Myntri ba kynsai tam hapoh Meghalaya.
title: PYNKUP BUROM KA BJP MEGHALAYA ÏA I KONG SILBI PASSAH BAD U BAH AL HEK

content: Ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynpaw ba kam don kano kano ka jingpyrshah lada u Lat ka Jylla u ai jingkren hapoh ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla da ka ktien Hindi.Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Lamphang ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla Thomas Sangma ban pyrshah lada u Lat ka Jylla u kren da ka ktien Hindi ha ka sngi sdang ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka ka ban sdang ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka VPP ka la dawa ruh ïa u Lamphang ba u dei ban buh da u nongpynkylla ktien lada u Lat u kren da ka ktien Hindi ha ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka“Ngam kwah ban kynthoh eiei kaei kaba kiwei pat ki seng saiñpyrthei ki don jingmut ban leh,” la ong u Chief Spokesperson ka BJP Meghalaya Pradesh ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Ka ktien Hindi ka dei ka National Language, lada phim pdiang ïa ka ktien Hindi kumno phi pdiang pat ïa ka ktien Phareng,” la buh jingkylli une u nongïalam ka BJP ïa ka VPP“Kine ki ar tylli ki ktien ki dei kiba la ithuh bad nalor kata wat ïa ka ktien lajong ruh phi lah ban kren,” u la ong.“Na ka iïang jong ngi, ka BJP kam don jingujor eiei lada (u Lat) u kren da ka ktien Hindi.U la ong ruh ba ka Secretariat jong ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly ka la pynbiang ruh ïa ki kopi ba la pynkylla ktien na ka bynta ki nongthaw Aiñ ki bym sngewthuh ïa ka ktien Hindi.“Phim lah ban shu pynlong mat politik,” ula ong bad bynrap, “ngi donkam ban pynleit jingmut ha ki kam pynroi kiba kongsan ym ban pynleit jingmut ha kum ha kine ki kam.”
title: KA BJP KAM DON JINGPYRSHAH LADA U LAT U KREN HINDI HA ÏINGDORBAR THAWAIÑ

content: : Ki shipai BSF ka 1st Battalion ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la ïoh kurup ïa ka shini ba la thmu khaii tuh sha ka ri Bangladesh lyngba ka khappud.Ïa ki song byrni ba la thep ïa ka shini la kurup na ka shnong Maheshkhola kaba hap hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka jingkhynra, ki Pulit bad ki shipai BSF ki la ïoh kurup palat 50,000 kilo ka shini ïa kaba ki la kurup.  Ïa ki byrni ba la thep ïa ka shini la aiti noh sha ki Pulit ban leh ïa kaba donkam katkum ka aiñ.
title: 50 HAJAR KILO KURUP KI BSF BAD PULIT ÏA KA SHINI

content: Ka Mission Smile, Guwahati ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ki District Early Intervention Centers lyngba ka Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram prokram ki la pynlong ïa ka Screening bad ban puid ïa ki khynnah rit kiba shitom na ka jingkad ka shyntur kaba la tip kum ka Cleft Lip bad Cleft Palate.Haduh 54 ngut ki khunlung kiba kad shyntur naduh ka por ba dang kha mynta ki la ïoh biang ïa ka jingbhabriew jong ka durkhmat lyngba kane ka jingsumar ha Ganesh Das Maternal and Child Health Hospital.Ïa kane ka Screening bad ka jingsumar la sdang naduh ka 30 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024 bad ba la pynkut ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.Kine ki 54 ngut ki khunlung ba la ïoh jingsumar ki long 12 ngut na East Khasi Hills, 14 ngut na West Khasi Hills, 10 ngut na South West Khasi Hills, 8 ngut na Ribhoi bad 10 ngut na East bad na West Jaintia Hills.Ki don pat sa 20 ngut kiba ki doctor kim shym la lah ban ai jingsumar na ka daw ba ki khunlung kim don ïa ka met kaba koit ba khiah.Ka  Medical Superintendent jong ka Ganesh Das Hospital ka Dr. A. Lyngdoh ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ka la ïathuh ba ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingai jingsumar ei ka long ban ïarap ïa kito ki briew kiba duna ka ïoh ka kot ba kin ïoh phah sumar ïa la ki jong ki khun kiba kad shyntur khlem kano kano ka jingsiew.Ka la ong ba ka thong jong ka Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram prokram ka long ban pyllait ïa ki briew na kum kine ki jingkad ka shyntur bad ka la ïathuh ruh kane ka dei ka sien kaba ar ba ka Ganesh Hospital Shillong kan pynlong ïa kane ka jingsumar.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong ka Dr. Lyngdoh, ha kane ka kynti kiba la wan ban shah screening ki la poi sha ka 76 ngut bad kiba la shah sumar ki long 54 ngut.Ka Dr. Adreena ka la khot bad wer ïa ki kmie ki kpa ha baroh kawei ka jylla ba lada ki don ïa ki khun kiba kad shyntur kin wan shakhmat ban sumar ïa ki ha kane ka Hospital.Ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi lang da ka Pediatrician ka Dr. S. Longtrai, u Pediatric Surgeon Dr. P. Khongsngi, ka Medical Officer DEIC ka Dr. J. Rani, u Managing Director ka Mission Smile guahwati u Dr. Hitesh, u Asst. Genl.
