Manager ka Mission Smile  Dipul Malakar, u Manager ka DEIC ka East Khasi Hills Bah Wanraplang Kharpran, ka Manager ka DEICEasst Jaintia Hills ka Kong Daphihi Passah bad u State RBSK Consultant, ka NHM, Meghalaya u Bah Johnson Nongbet.U Dr. Hiteswar Sarma u la ong ba ka jingpuid kam dei ban thep da ka doh hynrei la shna ha ka rukom kum ka juk kaba mynta ban suh bad ban pyndap ïa ka shyntur ba la kad bad ban leh ïa kane yn hap ban leh tang shisien shisnem na ka bynta laisien bad kan shimpor haduh lai snem ban suh ïa ka shyntur bad kumjuh ruh ban pynbeit artad ïa ka rukom kren jong ki heprit khnang ba kin lait na ka jingkren thlun.
title: ÏOH BIANG KI KHYNNAH RIT ÏA KA DUR BHABRIEW LYNGBA KA MISSION SMILE

content: Ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ka la dawa ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba ka dei ban da ai ïa ka jingpynshai kaba bniah halor kano ka nongrim ba la pynjlan ïa ka samoi treikam jong ka Khasi Hills Auotnomous District Council (KHADC) bad ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) sa hynriew bnai.Ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynjlan ïa ka samoi jong ka KHADC bad ka JHADC halor ka nongrim ba kine ki ar tylli ki Council ki la kyrpad ban pynjlan ïa ka jingaipor ïa ki Delimitation Committee.Ha u snem 2023, u Lat ka Jylla u la aibor ïa kine ki ar tylli ki Autonomous District Council ba kin thaw ïa ka Delimitation Committee ban pynbeit ryntih ïa ki MDC Constituency jong kine ki ar tylli ki council katkum ka jingdon jong ki nongshong shnong.“Ngi la ïohi ba ka Sorkar ka la pynjlan ïa ka samoi treikam hynrei kam don pat ka daw kaba shongnia. Katkum ka jingtip jong nga, ngi lah ban pynjlan ïa ka samoi treikam jong ka District Council hynrei ka dei ban da don pat da ka nongrim kaba shongnia kum ka “Emergency,” la ong u Chief Spokesperson ka BJP Meghalaya Pradesh Bah M. Kharkrang ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Hangne ka Sorkar kan hap ban pynpaw halor kaei ka daw, ka dei kaba don ka daw kaba shongnia,” u la ong“Hato ka Delimitation Committee ka lah mo ban pyndep ïa ka kamram hapoh hynriew bnai.  Ïa ka Committee la thaw la slem bha bad kam don kano kano ka jingtreikam bad shu buh lada phim lah ban pyndep hapoh hynriew bnai kaei ka ban jia,” la buh jingkylli u Bah Kharkrang.“Hato ka don ka Eemergency ne kam don, kata ka dei ka jingkylli,” u la bynrap.“Ki paidbah ki kwah ban tip na ka Sorkar kaei ka Emergency ne ka jingdonkam kyrkieh.  Kiei ki jingdawa ba kyrkieh kiba long ka daw ban pynjlan ïa ka samoi treikam jong ki District Council.  Mynta phim lah ban pynjlan ïa ka samoi treikam jong ki tang na ki katto katne ki daw barit.  Ka dei ban don ka daw kaba shongnia.  Hynrei ngi eh ïa kata ha ka Sorkar ba kan ai jingpynshai,” la kynthoh u Bah Kharkrang.“Mynta lada ka Sorkar ka sngew ba ka ladei ka khep kaba donkam kyrkieh ngi hap ban pynkut noh wat ïa kane ka jingpynbeit rynrih (ïa ki Constituency) shwa ba pynlong ïa ka elekshon ba thymmai.  Mynta ka Sorkar kan hap ban kren shai halor kata, kaei ka kam bakyrkieh,” u la ong shuh shuh.
title: KA SORKAR KA DEI BAN PYNSHAI BALEI BA PYNJLAN ÏA KA SAMOI TREIKAM KI ADC: BJP

content: : Ki bor bahalor jong ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) na New Delhi haduh mynta kim pat phah ktien eiei ruh em haduh kine ki sngi sha ka BJP Meghalaya Pradesh ban pan ïa ka kyrteng jong ki kyrtong kiba pan tiket ban ïakhun na Shillong bad Tura Seat ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long shen mynta u snem.U MLA ka BJP Bah Alexander L. Hek uba long ruh u nongïalam ka party ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la ong, “ngi khmihlynti ba ka elekshon kan kan long ha u bnai Ïaiong hynrei mynta la poi sha u Rymphang lehse hapoh une u bnai ngi khmihlynti (ba ka BJP na Delhi kan pan ïa ka kyrteng jong ki kyrtong).”Haba kylli, u la ong, “haduh mynta ki nongïalam bahalor ka party kim pat pan satia ïa ka kyrteng jong ki kyrtong haduh mynta watla ki la don katto katne kiba la pan tiket hynrei haduh mynta ngim pat lah satia ban phah sha Delhi namarba ki nongïalam haduh mynta kim pat pan satia.”Halor ka jingkylli, hato ka BJP kan ïatreilang neem bad ka NPP ha elekshon Lok Sabha, u Bah Hek u la ong, “ngam ïohi ïa kano kano ka daw balei (ba ka BJP) kan ïatreilang (bad ka NPP).”
title: YM PAT PHAH KA BJP ÏA KI KYRTENG KI KYRTONG BAN ÏAKHUN NA SHILLONG BAD TURA

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Jaïaw Circle ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la ai khusnam ïa ki samla pule kiba shong basah ha ki shnong kiba dang hap hapoh ka jylli jong ka Jaïaw Pyllun.Ki don 80 ngut ki khynnah rit bad ki samla pule shynrang bad kynthei kiba la shah pynkup burom ha kane ka sngi naduh ka kyrdan Class-IV bad kumjuh ruh ïa kiba pas bha ha ka eksamin SSLC bad HSSLC, Graduate, Post Graduate bad ki PhD.U Chairman ka North East Students Organisation (NESO) Bah Samuel Jyrwa uba la long kum u Kongsan haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u la kyntu ïa ki heprit bad ïa ki samla pule ba kin long kiba trei shitom khnang ba kin long ka lawei kaba shngaiñ ïa ka jylla bad ïa ka jaidbynriew.La sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi, da u Asst Education Secretary ka KSU Sengkmie u samla Shalkitbok Kharbani, ki  Rangbah Shnong jong ki shnong bapher bapher kiba hap hapoh ka Jaïaw Pyllun bad ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah bad ki samla ba la shah jied ban ïoh pdiang ïa ka khusnam.
title: AI KHUSNAM KA KSU ÏA KI HEPRIT BAD SAMLA PULE BA PAS BHA HA KI JINGPULE

content: Ka BJP Meghalaya Pradesh ha ka sngi u Blei ka la pynkha ïa ka BJP Shillong City District hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Bah Mariahom Kharkhang.U State President ka BJP u Rikman G. Momin u la buh ruh ïa ka thong ba ka kynhun ba la ïalam da u Bah Kharkrang bad u State Secretary bad nongsaiñdur ïa ka South Shillong u Bipen Pradhan ban peit ïa ka Shillong City na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka jingïoh vote haduh 1 lak ha Shillong City ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long shen.Ïa ki nongïalam jong kane ka kynhun la pynskhem da u Rikman Momin.Ki nongïalam ka party kiba la ïashim bynta ha ka jingïalang ki la ïathir ïatai ruh ïa ka jingthmu kumno ban pyntreikam nangne shakhmat.“U President ka Shillong City bad u nongpeit ïa ka Shillong City bad kiwei kiwei ki nongïalam ba hakhmat ka party kin sa leit rung sha baroh ki Constituency kiba don haph ka sor Shillong naduh ka taiew banyngkong mynta u bnai,” la ong u Presient ka Shillong City Bah M. Kharkrang.U Bah Kharkrang u la ong, “namarba ki nongthep vote ha Shillong ki dei kiba la tip kham bha ïa ki kam pynroi kiba wan na Delhi ki paidbah kin sa phaikhmat sha ka BJP ban jied ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ban ïa kaba pynlehnoh ei ïa ka vote bakordor sha kiwei pat ki party.  Kumba ki dak ki shin ki pynpaw, ka pawshai hi ruh mano ban ïoh thaw biang ïa ka Sorkar ha Delhi.  Lada u MP na ka jylla Meghalaya un dei na ka BJP kan pynsuk ïa ngi ban ïakren ïa kino kino ki mat jingdawa jong ka jylla bad kynthup ruh ïa ki pynsngew jong ki nongïalam Niam.”“Kan don jingmut aiu ban ai ïa ka vote sha u kyrtong MP bym dei na ka BJP ha kaba wat tang ïa ka sur jong u ruh yn ym ïohsngew satia ha Delhi,” la ong u Bah Kharkrang.U la ong ba un sa pynthikna ba baroh ki nongtrei na ki shnat treikam bapher bapher ka party kin sa leit rung sha manla ki thliew ing ban pynthikna ba ki paidbah kin ai ïa ka vote ïa u kyrtong ka BJP ha kane ka kynti.
title: 1 LAK KA VOTE BUH THONG KA BJP SHILLONG CITY BAN ÏOH NA SHILLONG HA KA ELEKSHON MP

content: : A remarkable turnaround on day three saw Meghalaya come from conceding a first innings lead to beating Sikkim by six wickets in their Ranji Trophy plate group match at Rangpo, Sikkim, today.Aryan Borah led the way with the best figures of his young career. He took an awesome 8/36 to dismiss Sikkim for a mere 80 in their second innings and Meghalaya polished off the chase thanks to a half-century by captain Kishan Lyngdoh (69).It was the hosts, though, who held the upper hand at the start of play. To recap, Sikkim had posted 284 all out in their first innings and then bundled out Meghalaya for 191.At stumps yesterday, Sikkim were 55/4, which was by no means a good position but they would not have expected to lose their remaining six wickets for just 25 runs this morning.But that is exactly what happened as the left-arm orthodox Aryan, playing only his fifth first-class match, bamboozled the opposition batters, four of whom he bowled through the gate. With his four wickets from the first innings, the 23-year-old who was only drafted in the Ranji squad for this match, ended with match figures of 12/129 and he was subsequently named Player of the Match.However, with a 93-run first innings lead, Sikkim set a target of 174 to win for Meghalaya and they were not going to make the chase easy on their home turf.Lee Yong Lepcha, who dismissed five Meghalaya batters in their first outing, bagged another two scalps today, while Ankur removed Raj Biswa, who had made 85 in the first innings, for 22.The visitors were thus poised on 54/3 when Kishan and Jaskirat Singh Sacheva came together at the crease. Together they made 108 for the fourth wicket, ensuring that Meghalaya were within touching distance of the target with plenty of wickets still in hand.Sadly for Kishan, he was not able to see the innings through to victory as he was out for 69 (119 deliveries, 7x4s), but Jaskirat (44 not out, 81 balls, 3x4s) was there at the end and was given effective company by Akash Kumar Choudhury (10 not out) as Meghalaya chased down the target in 50.2 overs.With three victories and two defeats in the round robin stage, Meghalaya qualified for the semifinals as the second-placed team in the plate group. Both semi finals will take place from 9 February and details regarding the venue and Meghalaya’s opponents will be intimated in due course.
title: RANJI TROPHY: SPIN WIZARD ARYAN ENABLES MEGHALAYA TO BEAT SIKKIM ON DRAMATIC 3RD DAY

content: Hadien ka jingwad ba khlem shongthait haduh saw sngi lynter, ki nongtrei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) bad ka kynhun State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) ka Directorate of Civil Defence & Home Guards Meghalaya, Shillong ha ka sngi Baar ki la lap ia ka met jong u Bah Marshall Marweiñ uba la shah tep im ha ka jingtwa ka synrum jaboh ha Marten ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep.Ka jinglap ia ka met iap u Bah Marshall Marwein la antad ba ka dei ha ka por kumba 4:20 baje janmiet hadien ba ka kynhun SDRF, ki nongtrei ka Shillong Municipal Board bad ki katto katne ki riewpaidbah ki la wad ia ka met jong u Bah Marshall khlem shongthait.Ka Kong Thilda Lyngdoh Mawphlang kaba dei ka Hynmen Kynsi jong u Bah Marshall Marweiñ ka la iathuh ba ka la leit ban phah duwai ha u Pastor Byrwa uba la pynduwai kyrpang bad uba la ai jingkyrmen ia ka kum ka ing ka sem ba u Blei un sa plie lad plie lynti ba yn sa lap biang ia ka met jong u Bah Marshall.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka kiaw kurim jong u Bah Marshall ka la ong iathuh ba dei ki kynthei kiba la iarap ban wad lang ia ka met jong u Bah Marshall kiba la lap shwa ia ka khoh kaba syriem ia ka khoh kaba une u rangbah ju pyndonkam ban thep ia ki mar jot bad ia u proh.  Hadien kane, ki la lap pat sa ia ka met jong u ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad nongtrei ka Municipal bad ka kynhun State Disaster Response Force.Ka la iathuh ruh ba ka jingleit ontep ia ka met ba dang sah jong u Bah Marshall kan sa long ha ka sngi Balang namar ka jingkyrpad jong ki Kur ban buh mynta shimiet ia ka met.Haba kylli, ka la ong ruh ba kum ka ing ka sem kim kwah shuh ban dang phah leh ia ka Post Mortem namarba u Bah Marshall u la duhei ia la ka jong ka jingim na ka jingtwa ka synrum jaboh ym na kiwei kiwei pat ki daw.U Chief Executive Officer (CEO) ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) PK Boro u la ai khulei ia ki nongtrei jong ka Municipal, ia ka kynhun SDRF bad ia ki riewpaidbah kiba la trei shitom ban wad ia ka met jong u Bah Marshall naduh ka sngi Saitjaiñ tad haduh ban da lap mynta ka sngi.
title: HADIEN LAI SNGI LAP ÏA KA MET U BAH MARSHALL NA MARTEN, ÏAM KTHANG KI BAHAÏING

content: : Ka tnat Pynroi Sor jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi baar ka la ai jingmynjur ia ka Dorbar Shnong Pynthorumkhrah Golflink ba kan peit, ban sumar bad ban pyniaid ia ka Children’s Park kaba don ha lyndet jong ka Hawker’s Market, Golflink ter ter shaduh Dogs Squad.Kane ka jingmynjur ka long hadien ba u MLA ka Pynthorumkhrah Constituency Bah Alexander L. Hek u la lum da ka jingialang mynta ka sngi hapdeng ki nongkitkam jong ka shnong Pynthorumkhrah-Golflink bad ki ophisar ka tnat Pynroi Sor.Ha ka jingialang la sakhi lang da u Director ka tnat Pynroi Sor u Bah E. Kharmalki, u Superintendent Engineer Bah K. Wahlang, u Rangbah Shnong Bah Michael Hek bad kiwei de ki nongkitkam shnong.Ha ka lah sngi U Blei, ka Dorbar Shnong Pynthorumkhrah-Golflink ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ban pyrshah lada aiti ban pyniaid ia ka Park sha ka Shillong Golf Club.Dang khyndiat sngi, ka Dorbar Shong bad u MLA ki la pynlong ia ka jingjurip ia ka jaka kaba don ha lyndet jong ka Hawker’s Market, Golflink ter ter shaduh Dogs Squad na ka bynta ban shna ia ka Children’s Park bad ka Dorbar Shnong ka la pynpaw hakhmat u MLA ba kan pyrshah lada aiti ia ka Shillong Golf Club ban pyniaid ia ka Park.U Bah A.L. Hek uba long ruh u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla u la pynpaw ba ka jingthmu ban shna ia ka Children’s Park ka dei ka projek na ka bynta ka bha ka miat hapoh ka shnong ka ban pynmyntoi ia ki paidbah bad ia ka shnong Pynthorumkhrah-Golflink.Ki nongkitkam ka Dorbar Shnong ki la mynjur ba kim don ka jingpyrshah ia ka projek hynrei ki don ka jingsngewkhia ba ki samla jong ka shnong ki dei ban ioh ia ki kam ki jam na kane ka projek.Hadien ba la poi sha ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut, ki ophisar na ka tnat Pynroi Sor ki la pynpaw ba kim don jingwit ban ailad ia ka Dorbar Shnong ba kan pyniaid, ban sumar ia ka Park.Ia ka soskular iasngewthuh jingmut yn sa pynkhreh shwa ban aiti sha ka Dorbar Shnong.
title: MYNJUR KA URBAN AFFAIRS BAN PYNÏAID IA KA CHILDREN’S PARK DA KA DS PYNTHORUMKHRAH-GOLFLINK

content: Ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ka la pynmih ia u kyrwoh ban maham ia baroh ki Seng Saiñpyrthei bad ia ki kyrtong kiba iakhun elekshon ba kim bit satia ban pyndonkam da ki khynnah rit ha ki rynsan elekshon.U kyrwoh u ong ruh ba ym lah ban pyndonkam da ki khynnah kum haba sam notis, sam poster ne ban rwai, pule poitri, shad ne kino kino ki prokram kiba don jingiasnoh bad ka elekshon.Ka ECI ka ong ruh ba ki seng bad ki kyrtong kin peit bha ban ym pynkheiñ ia ki kyndon jong ka Child Protection Act bad ka la bthah ruh ia ki State Election Commissioner bad ia ki District Election Officer ba kin pyntreikam  pyrkhing bha ia kane ka jingbthah.Hynrei ka ECI ka la ong pat ba u kyrwoh um thew pat ia kino kino ki khunlung barah ne bah ki kmie wat lada ki don hajan jong ki rynsan elekshon.Shuwa kane, ka ECI ka la pynmih da ka jingmaham ia ki seng saiñpyrthei bad ia ki kyrtong ba kim bit satia ban pyndonkam ia ki kyntien kiba khor ne ban kren beiñ ia ki briew ba don jingduna dkhotmet ha ki rynsan ialap elekshon.
title: WAT PYNDONKAM ÏA KI KHYNNAH HA KA POR ELEKSHON, MANA KA ELECTION COMMISSION

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Pasteur Beat House ha ka sngi baar ki la kem ia ki arngut ki shikurim halor ka jingsuba ba la kynnoh ba ki dei kiba ju donkti ban khaii be-aiñ ia u drok.Ki Pulit kiba la ioh bat ha jingkieng Lad Lawmali, Shillong ia kine ki shikurim ryngkat bad u khun uba dang rit katba ki dang shong hapoh ka kali Hyundai kaba don ia u nombar AS-01 AT 0888 ha ka por kumba 11:30 baje mynstep.Na ka met jong kine ki arngut ki shikurim ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup 2.10 gram u drok heroin, 8 tylli ki dawai kuli Nitrazepam, ar tylli ki dawai  kuli Spasmo proxyvon (SP),  10 tylli ki thyrnia injekshon, 6 tylli ki mobile phone, kawei ka wait  otdoh, ka pisa T.9,710, kawei ka Scooty kaba don ia u nombar ML05 R 8293 ia kaba la lap najan kane ka jaka ba la pyndonkam da uwei na ki nongkhaii drok, 10 tylli ki tin duma, 66 tylli ki tyndong ba thep ia u drok heroin bad kawei mobile phone ba la sniew.Ki nongialam ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia and Garo People (FKJGP) Shillong City ka la ioh ujor la bun bunsien halor ka kali Hyundai AS-01 AT 0888 kaba ju ieng ha ka thaiñ Polo ban die sopsop ia u drok bad mynta ka sngi tang shu iohi ia kane ka kali la pyntip noh sha ki Pulit jong Pasture Beat House.Shwa kane, ki dkhot ka FKJGP Shilong City ki la pyntip ia kane ka jingjia sha ki nongkitkam jong ka Seng Samla Lawmali ban wan sakhi lang ia kane ka jingiohbat ia ki nongkhaii drok bad ban aiti ha ki Pulit.U General Secretary ka FKJGP Shillong City u Bah Shane Nongrum u la pynpaw ia ka jingbynñiaw ia ka jingkharoi ki nongkhaii drok ki bym sheptieng shuh wat ia ka aiñ.
title: NA LAD LAWMALI KEM KI PULIT ÏA KI SHI KURIM KIBA SUBA DONKTI BAN KHAÏI DROK

content: Ki shipai Border Security Force ka 172 Battalion kiba la ioh jingtip kaba bniah ki la pynlong ka jingap ktem ha khappud bad ki la ioh bat ia uwei u nong Bangladesh bad lai tylli ki muid ha khappud ka shnong Rattacherra, East Jaiñtia Hills, Meghalaya.Ia une u nong Bangladesh la tip kyrteng kum u Md. Kamil Ahmed uba la 21 snem ka rta uba sah ha Donachera, Sylhet, Bangladesh la aiti noh sha ki Pulit ka Umkiang ban leh katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: KEM KI BSF ÏA U NONG BANGLA, KURUP LAI TYLLI KI MUID

content: Hynñiew ngut ki nongthoh poitri ba pawkhmat ka Jylla Meghalaya ki la leit ban iashim bynta ha ka “South Asian Literature and Cultural Summit 2024 ba la pynlong ha ka Ri Bangladesh ia kaba la pyniaid da ka “ Weekly Bwazra Katha & Association For South Asian Culture and Literature (AFSACAL).Ha kane ka jingïakynduh lang ba la iashim bynta da ki nongthoh poitri na ki 8 tylli tylli ki ri la pule ruh ia ki poitri ba la thoh da ki myllung bapaw na kylleng ki ri bad la pynshongkun ruh da ki jingrwai na ka samla Evanisha Pathaw bad ïa ki jingshad na ki nongshad bapaw na Murshidabad.Ia ka kynhun ki nongthoh poitri na kane ka jylla Meghalaya la lamkhmat da ka Professor Streamlet Dkhar  kaba dei ka Head jong ka Khasi Department, North Eastern Hill University kaba la iohpdiang ia ka ïa ka khusnam kum ka Myllung bad Nongthoh bapaw jong ka jylla Meghalaya. Kiwei pat ki nongthoh poitri kiba la leit ban iashim bynta lang ki kynthup ia ka Dr.Solony Bareh kaba dei ka Assistant Professor bad nongthoh kot, ka Dr. Melony Bareh, ka Kong Bakhiamon Rynjah  kaba dei ka Assistant Professor, ka Kong Lucky Kharpuri kaba dei ka nongthoh poitri, ka Kong Evanisha Pathaw ka nongtrei monsngewbha bad ka nongthoh poitti, ka Kong Mary Everest Bamon kaba dei ka nongtrei mon sngewbha bad ka nongthoh poitri.Nalor kata, ha kane ka jingialang la kyntiew ruh ia ka lama jong ka India ha ka jingplie ia ka lympung jingialang.Ki Myllung na ka Jylla Meghalaya ki la ïoh ka lad ban pule ïa ki poitri ki jong ki ha ka Ktien Khasi bad ryngkat ka jingpyninam ia ka jingshad tynrai u Khasi ha kaba ki myllung ki la iashim bynta lang ban shad ha ryngkat ka riam tynrai kaba la pynshoh biej ia ki nongiashim bynta.Ha kane ka lympungbah kaba lai sngi kynthih ki nongiashim bynta ki la ïoh bun ki jingmyntoi khamtam eh ki la ïoh ban pyni ïa ka jingriewspah jong ka ktien Khasi bad kumjuh ruh ka riam Khasi.Kaba kham sngewtynnad shuh shuh ïa ki nongïashim bynta ka long hadien ba ka Prof. Streamlet Dkhar ka la batai halor ka jingkhraw bad ka jinglong kyrpang jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi kiba ai jait sha ka kmie.Ka Prof. Streamlet Dkhar ka la shah jied kum ka Adviser jong ka na ka bynta ka samoi treikam 2024 haduh 2026.
title: MIHKHMAT 7 NGUT KI NONGTHOH POITRI KA JYLLA MEGHALAYA SHA RI BANGLADESH

content: Ki doktor AYUSH kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka AYUSH Medical Association of Meghalaya (AMAM) ka la pynlong ia ka jingiakhih lyngba ka Social Media ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingbym sngap jong ka Sorkar Jylla ia ki jingeh ba iakynduh.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President ka AMAM, u Dr. A. Lyngdoh u la ong, “ka Association ka la pynlong ia ki jingiakhih lyngba ka Social Media da kaba buh ia ki slogan, ki jingthoh na ki kotkhubor bad ia ki ishu bym pat lah ban weng jong ka AYUSH Department ha ka jylla.”U Dr. Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka Directorate of Health Services (DHS) ka la khot iakren ia ka Association halor ki mat kiba iadei bad ki doktor AYUSH ha ka jylla bad ka mat kaba kongsan tam ha ka jingiakren ka long halor ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Service Rule jong ki doktor AYUSH kiba shakri ha ki hospital sorkar.“Namar ka jingbym kitkhia ia ka Service Rule haduh mynta ym shym la pynrung ia ki doktor AYUSH kiba dei shakri Sorkar,” u la ong.“Kane ka mat ka dei kaba la pyntlot ha kaba iadei bad ka jingthungkam ia ki doktor AYUSH ha ka kam sorkar, bad ba ka por  ka la donkam ban thung kam bun ki nongtrei na ka bynta ban pynkha ia ka Directorate of AYUSH (kumba la mih ha ki lad pathai khubor bun bunsien),” la bynrap u Dr. Lyngdoh.“Ka ophis (DHS) la kular ruh ia ka Association ba ka tnat kan sa peit halor ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Service Rule hapoh kane ka taiew bad kular ruh ba ia kane ka kam yn sa rah ban iakren bad ki bor bahalor ha ki taiew ban sa wan,” la iathuh u Dr. Lyngdoh.Ka Assocation ka la kynthoh ruh ia ka jingbym patiaw jong ka ophis ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla halor ka jingeh jong ki doktor AYUSH kiba dei ki nongtrei jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah. “Wat hapdeng ki jingiai kyrpad ban khot iakynduh, hynrei kam shym la don kano kano ka jingai jubah,” la kynnoh ka Association.Ka Association ka kyntu ia ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh ba kan pyllait por ban khot iakren ia ki jingeh ba ki doktor AYUSH ki iakynduh lane ka Associaition kam don lad shuh da kumwei pat sa tang ban shu pynlong da ka jingiakhih da kaba mih sha surok.“Ka Association ka la rai ban iai bteng ia ka Social Media Protest bad kyntu ruh ia baroh ki doktor AYUSH bad ia ki paidbah ban pyrshah ia ka jingleh meinah jong ka Sorkar ia ka rukom sumar AYUSH hapoh ka jylla,” la pynkut u kyrwoh.
title: DA KA SOCIAL MEDIA PROTEST ÏAKHIH KI DOKTOR AYUSH, BYRNGEM BAN MIH SUROK

content: Ïa ka met ba dang sah jong u Bah Marshall Marwein la tep donburom ha ka sngi Balang da ka jingïam paitdohnud jong ki bahaing hasem bad ki kur ki kha kiba la wan synran shwa ban leit ontep ïa ka met ba dang sah sha u Lum jingtep jong ka Balang Catholic uba don ha Mawiong, Shillong.Ïa ka jinglehniam ha kane ka sngi, la pyndep da u Parish Priest jong ka St. Dominic Savio’s Church, Mawlai Parish u Rev. Fr. Telesphor Nonglang ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki Rangbah Balang bad ki paid riewngeit jong ka shnong Mawiong Umjapung.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw biang hangne, ba u Bah Marshall u la duhei ïa la ka jong ka jingim ha ka jingtwa ka synrum jaboh ha marten ha ka step jong ka 3 tarik u Rymphang, 2024. Ïa ka met jong u Bah Marshall la lap hadien lai sngi, kata, ha ka sngi Baar ha ka por kumba 4:00 baje janmiet da ka kynhun State Disaster Response Force jong ka Home Guards and Civil Defence da ka jingtrei shitom lang bad ki nongtrei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB).Na ka liang jong ka Shillong Munipal Board ka la ai jingïarap da ka synduk metïap na ka bynta u Bah Marshall sha ka ing ka sem jong ka Kong Darisha Lyngdoh Mawphlang kaba la duhnoh ïa u kurim uba long u rishot jong ka ing ka sem.
title: HAPDENG KA JINGPAIT DOHNUD LA RAH ONTEP ÏA U BAH MARSHALL MARWEIÑ

content: Da ka jingthmu ban pynitynnat ia ka sor bad ban pynneh pynsah ia ka mei mariang, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka sngi Balang u la buh ia u mawnongrim na ka bynta ban pyntreikam ia ka Riverfront Development Project ha shi lynter ka Wah Umkhrah kaba tuid na dohnud ka Sor Shillong.Lyngba kane ka jingsdang, la mang pisa T. 39 klur ban shna pynitynnat ia ka rud wah jong ka Wah Umkhrah khnang ban pynduna ia ka jingjaboh jong ka wah kaba la pynswai haduh katta katta ia ka Wah Umkhrah.Ha ka jingbuh ia u mawnongrim ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Polo la sakhi lang da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba khmih ia ka tnat Pynroi Sor u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, u Myntri Sorkar Bah AL Hek, ka Deputy Commisioner jong ka East Khasi Hills ka Kong RM Kurbah bad kiwei kiwei.Ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ki la aiti ia ka Cheque ba T.75 hajar bad T.1.50 lak lyngba ka My City Campaign sha ki Dorbar Shnong bapher bapher.“Ngi la tyrwa mynshuwa ban pynkhuid ia ka Wahumkhrah bad Umshyrpi hynrei ka Sorkar India kam shym la mynjur ban mang pisa ia ka projek hynrei la bthah ia ngi ban bishar thymmai biang, kaba ngi dang leh mynta” ong u Myntri Rangbah  haba kren ha kane ka sngi.U Sangma u la ong ruh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la iatreilang bad ka Ministry of Jal Shakti na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ia ka jingkhuid jong ka Wah Umkhrah bad Umshyrpi.“Nga kyrmen skhem ba katba kane ka project ka dang iaid ngi ngin nang pynkhreh ia ka projek ka ban kynthup ia ka jingpynkhuid ia ka Wah Umkhreh bad Umshyrpi kaba la donkam palat,” la ong u Sangma.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingkhapngiah ka Sor Shillong u la ong ba ia ki bynta bapher bapher la ithuh kum ki Multi Level Parking Lots bad ki Hawker Zone.U la ong ba ka jaka ha Polo hapdeng ka Polo Towers bad ka Majestic Hotel ba khlem pyndonkam yn sa aiti sha ka tnat Pynroi Sor na ka tnat Forest ban shna kum ka jaka pynieng kali.U la ong shuh shuh ba ka Sorkar ka la ithuh bun ki jaka hapoh ka nongbah, kynthup ruh ia ka jaka kaba don markhap bad ka Secretariat ia kaba yn sa shna kum ka jaka pynieng kali.Halor ka jingkhapngiah ka Khyndai Lad bad Iewduh, na ka daw ka jingbym pyrkhing ia ka jingiaid ki kali, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “ka Sorkar ka la bishar bniah ia ki jaka ba khapngiah bad ka la wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban weng ia ka jingkhapngiah jong kine ki ar tylli ki iew ba kongsan da kaba buh ia ki jaka ban pynieng la ka jong ia ki Bos bad ki taksi.”
title: DA KA RIVERFRONT DEVELOPMENT PROJECT YN PYNKHUID KA SORKAR ÏA KA WAH UMKHRAH

content: : Ka seng Nongrep War Jaiñtia, Amlarem ka la dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan pynkiew ïa ka dor jong ki mar rep kum u synsar, u kwai, u tympew bad kiwei kiwei ki mar rep namar ka jinghiar dor jong ki mar rep kaba la wanrah ïa ka jingduhnong ïa ki nongrep.Kane ka seng jong ki nongrep dang shen ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang paidbah ha Amlarem, West Jaiñtia Hills bad ka la rai ban kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar lyngba u MLA ka Amlarem Constituency u Bah Lahkmen Rymbui uba long u Chief Adviser jong ka Sorkar Jylla ba kin wad ki lad ki lynti ban pynkiew dor ïa ki mar rep synsar ba la pynmih na ka thaiñ Riwar.Kumba long mynta, ki nongrep ki la ïakynduh ïa kane ka jingeh ki la rai ban pynsngew sha u Sorkar MDA ba la ïalam da u Conrad K. Sangma kum u Myntri Rangbah ba ka thawlad ha kine hi ki sngi khnang ba ki nongrep synsar, kwai, tympew bad kiwei kiwei ki mar rep kin ïaid ïew ha ka dor kaba biang khnang ba ki nongrep kin kham ïoh jingmyntoi ha ka rep ka riang hapoh ka thaiñ War Jaiñtia.La pynsngew ruh ba mynta u synsar u la hiar dor shaba palat bad kumjuh u kwai bad u tympew bad kiwei kiwei ki mar rep kiba ha War Jaiñtia 80 na ka 100 ki briew ki im jakpoh ha kaba trei shitom da kaba rep ïa u synsar ha ki khlaw ki btap bad kumjuh ruh ïa u kwai u tympew bad kiwei kiwei ki mar rep kiba ai jingmyntoi shibun ïa ki nongrep ha ka thaiñ.Ki nongrep ki la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar ba kan weng noh ïa ka jingoh khajna ïa ki mar rep ha shilynter ka surokbah Jowai-Shillong lyngba ka District Council namarba kane ka ktah shibun ïa ki nongrep, la pynsngew u Secretary ka Seng ki Nongrep War Jaiñtia, Amlarem u Bah Sumer Syngkor bad u President u Bah Kolmen Pohshna.
title: DAWA KI NONGREP KA WAR JAIÑTIA ÏA KA SORKAR BAN PYNKIEW DOR ÏA KI MAR REP

content: Arngut ki snar khaii drok ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit ha Nongpoh, Ri Bhoi District ha ka step sngi Palei.Kine ki arngut ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Sumit Naha, 21 snem bad u Rahul Ghosh 25 snem kiba dei na Dibrugarh, Assam  ki la shah kem na kawei ka Bos Night Super kaba don ïa u nombar ML05T8121, ong ki Pulit.Ha ka jingïatalasi, ar tylli ki synduk thep sabon ba la thep ïa u drok uba don ka jingkhia 21.05 gram ryngkat bad 8 tylli ki tyndong bad uwei u thyrnia injek la ïoh kurup na ka met jong ki, la ong ki Pulit.Ïa ka case la register ha Nongpoh Police station bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat ban lap dien ïa kiba donkti ha kane ka kam be-aiñ.
title: SHAH KEM ARNGUT KI SNAR KHAÏI DROK HA NONGPOH

content: U Secretary jong ka North Eastern Council (NEC) u K. Moses Chalai ha ka sngi Palei u la ong ba ka jingïoh bhah na ka bynta ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kam da long eh kumba la khmihlynti.“Hynrei ngi la ïohi ba ki Jylla ki la sdang ban khih ban ksar. Lymda ki ïaid stet, ngi ruh ngin ym lah ban ïaid stet,” ong u Chalai ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli halor ka jingujor ba ka NEC ha ki khyndiat snem kam shym la lah ban wanrah ïa ki projek ba thymmai na ka daw ka jingkyrduh pisa.“Ha ki khyndiat sngi ban sa wan, ïa kane yn sa kham pynbha. Ïa mynta ka DoNER ka ju mang pisa tang kumba T. 3,000 hajar klur hynrei mynta u snem lyngba ka Prime Minister’s Development Initiative for North East Region (PM-DevINE) Scheme, la kyntiew sha ka T. 6,000 klur,” u la ong bad bynrap, “kaei kaba mut ban ong ka long ba ka Sorkar India ka la sngewthuh ba ngi lah ban leh bha hynrei ki don pat ki jyrwit jyrwat hangne hangtai bad nga kyrmen ba ngin sa jam sha kawei pat ka bynta ha kaba ka mang tyngka kan kham bun bad ka NEC ruh ka donkam kham bun (ka pisa),” u la ong.U Secretary ka NEC u la kyntait ban kynthoh halor ka jingtreikam jong ki Jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi da kaba ong, “ngan ym jer kyrteng hynrei baroh ki jylla kim long kumjuh hynrei ha ka jinglehbha ki don bad ka bhah pisa kaba thymmai kam wan lyngba ka State Treasury (lane) ka Tnat Pla Tyngka jong ka Sorkar, ka wan beit beit sha ki nongpyntrei.  Mynta ka shong ha ka tnat badei peit bad ki nongpyntreikam kumno ki lah ban pyndep kham kloi ïa ka kam.  Kam long kaba dei ïa nga ban jer kyrteng hynrei don napdeng jong ki, kiba leh bha.”Haba kren shaphang ka Meghalaya, u Challai u la ong, “ban shu kren salonsar, ha Meghalaya, ki tnat treikam kim long kumjuh, katto katne ki tnat treikam ki ai jubab kloi, katto katne teng teng i kumba ki suki shaba palat.  Namarkata, hapoh ka jylla baroh ki tnat treikam kim long kumjuh.  Nga sngewthuh ïa ka rukom pynïaid jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la kham bha bad ka lah ban leh bha ha ki sngi ki ban dang wan.”U Financial Adviser ka NEC u Gaigongdin Panmei, u la ong ba ka daw kaba kongsan ba ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka mad ka dei ka jingbym lah ban pynlut.  Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka Sorkar India kan ai kham bun ka pisa lada ki jylla ki lah ban pynlut pisa kham bun.“Watla lada phi don ïa ka pisa hynrei phim tip kumno ban pynlut bad pynlut bha bad pynlut ha ka por, kane ka dei ka daw kaba kongsan,” ula ong bad bynrap, “ka jingdon ka mang tyngka ka shong ha ka jinglah ban pynlut ïa ka pisa. Ngi ju shong pyrkhat kam manla u bnai Risaw bad ban bishar ïa ki rukom pynlut pisa kynthup ïa ki jylla bad da kaba pynshong nongrim halor ka jingpynlut pisa kaba ïadei bad ki kam ba la trei, ïa ka mang tyngka la pynthymai manla u snem,” u la ong.Ha kawei pat ka liang, u Secretary ka NEC u la kubur ba ka jingïoh jaka ka dei kawei ka jingeh ynda la wanrah ban pyntreikam ïa ki projek hapoh kane ka thaiñ.  U la ong ba kine ki projek ki kynthup ïa ka surok ha kaba ka Sorkar kam ju lah ban weng ïa ka jingeh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpan jaka.“Nga ruh nga dei u riewlum hynrei ngim lah ban don ïa kajuh ka jinglong, ki riewlum ki dei ban nang ban tip. Ka dei ka mat kaba khia.  Ki don ki jingteh pyrkhing, ki don ki jingïada bad lada donkam ngi lah ban ïapynbiang tarajur, bad nga mut ban ong, lada nga kwah ïa ka surok hynrei ngam ai jaka, kata kan ym lah ban long daleilei ruh em,” la ong u Chalai.
title: 6 HAJAR KLUR MANG KA SORKAR PDENG NA KA PM-DEVINE ÏA KA NE LYNGBA KA DoNER: MOSES CHALAI

content: : Ka North Eastern Council (NEC) ka la ai jingmynjur  ban mang pisa T.11 klur na ka bynta ban shna pynbha ïa ka Ïewduh, kaba long ka kad khaii kaba la rim tam ha kane ka jylla.Haba pyntip ïa kane ha ka sngi Palei, u Secretary ka NEC u K. Moses Chalai u la ong, “ngin sa shna pynthymmai ïa ka Ïewduh.  Ngi la ai jingmynjur hynrei ïa ka pisa ym pat pyllait.”Ka NEC ïa mynta ka dang bishar ïa ka Detailed Project Report (DPR) na ka bynta ban pynbhabriew ïa ka Ïewduh. U la ong ba kane ka projek kan kot kumba T.11 klur.U Chalai u la pyntip ba ïa ka pisa la khmihlynti ban pyllait haopoh ki ar ne lai bnai ban sa wan bad ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei ban pyntreikam noh mardor.
title: 11 KLUR MYNJUR KA NEC BAN SHNA PYNBHA ÏA KA ÏEWDUH

content: Shillong, Rymphang 8: Ka United Hynñiewtrep Movement (UHM) ha ka sngi Palei ka la pan jingpynshai na ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) halor ka Bill kaba la mynjur ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingphah rejister ei ïa ki jaka jong ki paidbah kiba shong basah ha khappud ka Jylla Meghalaya bad Assam.Ha ka jingïakynduh ïa u Dy. Chief Executive Member (Dy.CEM) ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem, ka seng hapoh ka jingïalam jong u President Bah Charlie J Rani ki la ïathuh ha u Dy. CEM katkum ka jingïakren jong ka seng bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la kubur ba tnat District Council Affairs jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka ladep ban ai mynjur ïa kane ka Bill bad ka la phah biang sha ka District Council ban pynbit pynbiang.Ha ka dorkhas ba la aiti sha u Deputy CEM, u Bah Rai u la ong ba ka seng ka kwah ïa ka jingpynshai ba haduh katno ladep ban pynbit pynbiang bad lano ban phah noh sha u Lat ka jylla khnang ban lah ban pynlong aiñ ïa ka.U Bah Rani u la ong ba ka jingïakynduh ïa u Bah P N Syiem ka dei ruh kum ka jingdawa kaba la slem ha kaba ïadei bad u pud u sam hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam.U la ong ba hadien ba ka seng ka la leit sha ki thaiñ khappud ka la lap ba ka Assam ka ai ei khlem shim pisa ïa kito kiba kwah ban register jaka sha Assam, kumta ka seng ka kwah ba ka KHADC ruh kam dei ban shim pisa na ki briew kiba sah khappud kiba kwah ban register jaka sha ka jylla Meghalaya.“Ha ka jingïakren bad u Deputy CEM u la ïathuh ba halor ki bai register jaka la pynhap la ka jong ka jong ka dor, hynrei ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdawa ban pyllait ei ïa kiba sah ha khappud u Dy. CEM u la ong ba un sa rah sha ka Exexcutive Committee ban ïakren ïa kane ka kam.  Kum ka seng ngin ym shong kli kti halor kane ka kam kaba kongsan hynrei ngin sa nang ïai buddien,” ong u Bah Rani.U la ong ka seng ka la khmih lynti ba ka EC hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem kum u CEM kin leh kham kloi ban shim ïa ka rai ban pyllait ei ïa ki briew kiba don jaka ha khappud ban pynrung kyrteng ïa ki jaka jong ki sha Meghalaya khnang ba ka jingïapynbeit pud hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam kan suk bad kloi.
title: SHA KA EC YN PYNSNGEW U DY. CEM KA KHADC ÏA KA BILL REGISTER JAKA EI HA KHAPPUD

content: : Ki nonglum ñiut na thliew iing jong ki briew ha ka shnong Lumshyiap, Shillong ki la kyndit katlah katïai haba ki la lap ïa u khunlung ba dang shu kha ha kawei na ki song plastik ba la bret ha Kali kit ñiut ha ka step sngi Palei.Kane ka la jia ha dong Shanmari kaba hap hapoh ka shnong Lum shyiap, Shillong.Tang shu lap ïa kane ka song, u nonglum ñiut u la pyntip marmar sha ki bor pynïaid shnong ha kaba ki la wan poi sha kane ka jaka ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bad ban shimti noh ïa u khunlung dang khah snam ba la shu thep beiñ hapoh ka plastik.U Rangbah Shnong jong ka shnong Lumshyiap Bah Phira Khongphai u la ong ba ka shnong ka la ai por 12 kynta ïa ki kmie ki kpa kiba donkti ban leh ïa kane kam be-aiñ bad ba kin phla hok hakhmat ka Dorbar Shnong hynrei lada jia ba kim wan mih hapoh kine ki kynta ba la buh, ka shnong kan aiti noh ïa u khunlung sha ki bor jong ka aiñ khnang ba kin leh ïa kaba donkam.
title: BRET ÏA U KHUNLUNG BA DANG SHU KHA HA KA KALI KIT ÑIUT HA LUMSHYIAP

content: Ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) ha ka sngi Palei ka la byrngem ban ïalam biang da ki khun ki hajar ka Hima Sohïong lada ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka dang ïai bteng ban pynneh biang ïa ujuh u Lyngdoh ba la shah sospon hadien ki jingshah ujor kiba bun khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingkynnoh ba la pyndonkam bakla ïa ka pisa ka Hima.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Chairman ka JAC Bah Purningstar Shabong u la ong, lada don ruh na ki Myntri, ki nongïalam shnong ne kino kino kiba kyrshan ban dang thung biang ïa u Lyngdoh barim kin tur beit sha KHADC ban dawa  ba dei ban weng beit na ka shuki Lyngdoh.Ïa kane u la pynpaw ha ka jingleit pynkynmaw ïa u Deputy CEM i/c Elaka ka KHADC u Bah PN Syiem halor ka jingdawa ban weng noh ïa u Bah Bashemphang Thabah na ka khet Lyngdoh jong ka Hima Sohïong bad kyrpad ïa ka Council ban ai kopi ïa ka Inquiry Report halor ka jingtohkit pyrshah ïa u Bashemphang Thabah halor ka jingdawa jong ka JAC.U la ong ba ka JAC ka la dawa ban pynlong da ka elekshon ban jied ïa u Lyngdoh uba thymmai bad ba pura jong ka Hima Sohïong.Ha ka jingïakynduh bad u Deputy CEM, u la ong kum ki Khun ki Hajar ka Hima Sohïong ka kwah ruh ban pynkynmaw ba ka ka Joint Action Committee naduh u snem 2019 ka ladep ban ujor pyrshah ïa u Bashemphang Thabah halor ki kam be-aiñ be-riti jong u bad ka la dawa ban sospon bad ban weng noh ïa u na ka khet Lyngdoh ka Hima Sohïong.U la ong ba kane ka jingdawa ka la ïai bteng terter haduh mynta ha kaba ka JAC ka la kynduh bun bunsien bad aiti da ka shithi jingdawa ha ka KHADC bad ka la ïai buddien ïa kane ka kam na ki por sha ki por.Ka JAC lyngba ka shithi, Dated 17/09/2019 bad kaba No: JAC/Soh/12/2021-22/01 Date: 01/12/2021 bad kiwei kiwei pat ki shithi ka la ka dawa ban wengnoh ïa u Bah Bashemphang Thabah na ka khet Lyngdoh jong ka Hima Sohiong katkum ka Section 6(1)(a), 6(1)(b), 6(1)(c) 6(1)(f), 6(1)(h), 6(1)(i), bad 6(1)(k) jong ka aiñ The United Khasi Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District (Appointment and Successin of Chiefs and Headmen)Act, 1959.Ka JAC ka la ïathuh ba ïa kane ka kam, ka Executive Committee ka barim ka la shimkhia hadien ka jingdawa kaba jur na ka liang ki khun ki hajar ka Hima Sohïong ha kaba ki la tur paidbah sha KHADC hapoh ka jingïalam jong ka JAC. Ka KHADC ka la sospon noh ïa u Bah Bashemphang Thabah bad ka thung ïa u Bah A.E. Gatphoh uba dei u ophisar ka KHADC ban tohkit halor ka jingdawa jong ka JAC.La ïathuh ruh ba ka JAC ka la ïoh jingtip ba ïa ka Inquiry Report ladep ban phah sha ka Executive Committee jong ka KHADC.“Kumta, ngi dawa ïa u Deputy CEM ba un sngewbha ban pynsted noh ïa kane ka kam bad ban wengnoh mardor ïa u Bah Bashemphang Thabah na ka khet Lyngdoh jong ka Hima Sohïong uba dang don mynta hapoh ka jingshah sospon. Lada ka KHADC ka dang ïai pynslem ban weng noh ïa u Bah Bashemphang Thabah na ka khet Lyngdoh jong ka Hima Sohïong ka JAC bad ryngkat ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima Sohïong kan hap ban wan tur paidbah biang sa shisien sha KHADC ha kano kano ka por bad ha kum kata ka por ka KHADC ka dei ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh halor ka jingpynslem bad ka jingkuman jong ka,” ong u Bah Shabong ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingïakynduh ïa u Deputy CEM.Haba ïathuh ba u Inquiry Officer u ladep ban phah sha ka Executive Committee ïa ka Inquiry Report halor ka jingtohkit pyrshah ïa u Bah Bashemphang Thabah katkum ka jingdawa jong ka JAC, kumta ka JADC ka la kyrpad ïa u Deputy CEM ban ai kopi lang sha ka JAC ïa ka Inquiry Report khnang ba ka JAC kan ïoh jingtip ban peit bniah.“Hadien ba ladep ban weng noh ïa u Bah Bashemphang Thabah, ngi dawa na ka KHADC ba kan pynkloi noh ïa ka elekshon ban jied ïa u Lyngdoh bapura jong ka Hima Sohïong khnang ba ka synshar khadar hapoh ka Hima Sohïong kan ïaid beit ïaid ryntih noh nangne shakhmat.  Ka jing ïaid beit ïaid ryntih ha ka synshar khadar trai Ri trai muluk hapoh ka Hima Sohïong ka dei ka jingthmu bad ka jingangnud jong ka JAC bad ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima Sohiong hi baroh kawei,” u la ong.U la ong ba ka JAC bad ki khun ki hajar ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingkyrmen skhem ba ka KHADC kan shah shkor ïa kane ka jingkyrpad bad ka jingdawa jong ka JAC bad ka la kyrpad ruh ïa ka tnat Elaka ban shimkhia ïa kane ka kam kaba long ka kam ïap kam im jong ka Hima Sohïong hi baroh kawei.
title: PAN KOPI KA JAC NA KA KHADC ÏA KA KAIPHOD TOHKIT PYRSHAH ÏA U LYNGDOH HIMA SOHIONG

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K.Sangma u la ong ba ladei ka por ban pyndonkam noh da ka teknoloji ban kynshew ïa ka um hapoh ka jylla.Ïa kane u la kren ha ka International Water Conclave ba la pynlong da ka Ministry of Water Resources, ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Thohdieng.“Nga tharai ba ka long kaba donkam ïa ngi ban pyndonkam ïa ki jinglum jingtip ba ngin dup lah ban pynmih ïa ki tiar kiba lah ban ïathuh lypa khnang ba kan ïarap ha ki sngi ki ban sa wan. Ngi la ïatrei bad ka North Eastern Space Applications Center (NESAC) kaba don hapoh ka Jylla. Ki peitngor ïa ki umpohliew, ïa ki jaka pynlang um, ïa ka jingdon jong ki khlaw ki btap, ïa ki jaka rep, ïa ki jingtih marpohkhyndew. Ngin sa wanrah ïa ka Data Innovation Center ha Meghalaya. Ka jingthmu jong ka Data Information Center ka long ban lum jingtip bad lum jingkhein na ki tnat treikam kiba lah ban ai jingtip bad kiba lah ban thaw ïa ki tiar kiba lah ban ïathuh lypa,” ong u Conrad.“Ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingïalang ka long ban wanrah lang ïa baroh, khamtam ïa ki tnat treikam hapoh ka jylla ban ïatreilang khlem phaikhmat than tang ïa ki skhim,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ha kaba ïadei bad ka mariang bad ki um ki wah, ka um kam don pud sawdong hynrei ka long pat kaba donkam ban don ïa ka Water Policy.  Kane ka policy kan ïarap ban kynshew ka umdih haduh ki jaka pynlang um bad ïa ki tyllong um.”“Ngi don 6800 hajar tylli ki shnong ha ka jylla bad mynta ngi don ïa ka Water Committee ha manla ki shnong bad haba ka mih kano kano ka jingeh ha kaba ïadei bad ka um, ngi pynthikna ba kine ki komiti kan shimkhia kane ka kam bad ban ïatreilang bad ka Sorkar, ki District, ki ophisar ha ki Block, bad ka tnat kaba dei peit khnang ban pynthikna ba ka um kan pahuh ha ki shnong ki thaw,” u la bynrap.Haba kren halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Jal Jeevan Mission,  Conrad u la ong, “ka Meghalaya ka dei kaba ar ha ka ri bad ngi la sdang shwa tang 1%, bad ngi la kiew sha ka 0.75% ha u snem 2019. Mynta ngi la lah ban pynpoi ïa ka um haduh 70% kaba la jan kot artat 75%. Ngi khmihlynti ba ngin sa lah ban kynjoh sha ka 90% tam ha kaba pyntreikam ïa ka Jal Jeevan bad ka umkor ha ki ing ki sem shwa ban une u snem mang tyngka.”U Myntri Rangbah u la pynsngew hakhmat ka Secretary ka Ministry of Jal Shakti ka Debashree Mukherjee halor ki ar tylli ki wah bakongsan ha nongbah Shillong, ka wah Umshyrpi bad ka Wah Umkhrah, da kaba ong ba kine kine ar tylli ki wah ki dei kiba la donkam ban pynkhuid.U la ïathuh ba u la pynsngew la bunsien sha ka Ministry of Jal Shakti ban weng ïa ka jingeh.“Nga la pynsngew ha u Myntri bad u la kular ban ai jingkyrshan pura. U la bthah ba ngin hap ban bishar biang ïa ka jingtyrwa ïa kaba ngi ladep ban leh bad ngi khmihlynti ba tang hapoh ar bnai ngin sa lah ban pyndep pura namarba ngi donkam ban pynim biang ïa ki wah kiba tuid arsut ha Sor Shillong bad ha kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ka jylla,” la bynrap u Conrad.Ka Debashree Mukherjee haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang ka la ong, “ka Meghalaya ka ladep leh ïa ka kamram. Kane ka dei ka jylla kaba nyngkong eh ha North East kaba pyrkhat ban wanrah ïa ka Water Policy. Ka Sorkar India ka lah ban ai jingkyrshan ha kaba ïadei bad kiwei pat ki kam kiba kham jwat (technical).  Ngin ai jingkyrshan ïa ki jylla bad lyngba ki kam ba ki trei ngin dup lah ban pynthikna ïa ka jingpahuh jong ka um ha ka ri.”Ka la ïaroh ruh ïa ka Sorkar Jylla kaba la buh jingkheiñ halor ka jingdon jong ki umpohliew.Ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi lang da u Additional Chief Secretary ka Sorkar Jylla u Dr Shakil P. Ahammed, u Commissioner Secretary ka Sorkar Jylla u Dr. Joram Beda bad kiwei kiwei.
title: LA DONKAM BAN WANRAH DA KI TEKNOLOJI BAN KYNSHEW ÏA KA UM, ONG U CONRAD

content: Ka Kynhun Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ai jingmynjur ïa ka Meghalaya Engineering Public Works Department Service Rules, 2024.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ha ka jaka ban pynbeit thymmai ïa ka Meghalaya Engineering Public Works Department Service Rules, 1995 ka Sorkar ka la wanrah da ka Rule kaba thymmai.“Namarkata, ngi la pyndam noh ïa ka Rule kaba rim bad ngi la wanrah da ka Rule ba thymmai. Haoid, ngi la bishar bniah ïa ka jingpynbeit thymmai ruh bad kumba nga ong ïa ka jingpynbeit thymmai ki don bun tylli bad kaba suk ka long beit ban shu wanrah da ka Rule kaba thymmai.  Mynta ka sngi, ïa ka Meghalaya Engineering Public Works Department Service Rules, 2024 la mynjur da ka Kynhun Myntri,” u la ong.U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ruh ba ka Kynhun Myntri ka la mynjur ruh ïa ka Bill ne ka Aiñ-rew kaba ïadei bad ka Meghalaya Fiscal Responsibility and Budget Management Act, 2006 na ka bynta ban wanrah ha ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka  jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka ban sa long shen.
title: MYNJUR KA CABINET ÏA KA ME PWD SERVICE RULES, 2024

content: : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la ïaiban ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka long kaba kloi ban ïakren bad ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) hapoh ki kyndon ba la buh da ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) ka Sorkar India.U la Sangma u la kyntait ruh ban kynthoh halor u kyrwoh ba la pynmih da ki nongïalam ka HNLC bad ong ba ka Sorkar ka kyrpad ïa ka seng ba kan pynkylla biang ïa ka rai bad ban wan biang sha ka miej jingïakren ïasuk.“Ngam tharai ba nga lah ban kynthoh khlem da ïohi ïa ka jingthoh (ba la phah sha ka Sorkar). Hynrei ngan ïai ban ba ngi long kiba kloi bad ngi kyntu ruh ïa ki ban pyrkhat bha ha kane ka kynti, ngi kwah ïa ka jingsuk kaba neh shi junom bad namarkata ngi kwah ban ïai ban ba ngi dei ban wan sha ka miej jingïakren sa shisien hynrei kumba nga la ong halor ka jingïakren bad ki lane ka jingphah ktien ngam pat ïohi satia ka jingthoh,”  la ong u Sangma ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Haba kylli, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka la ïai ban ïa kajuh shi kajuh ba ki kyndon bad ki jingbthah ba la pynmih da ka MHA ki dei kiba hap ban bud na ka bynta baroh ki kynhun ïa kaba ka Sorkar India ruh ka kren ïa kata.“Namarkata, kan hap ban bud ïa ki kyndon, ngim lah ban kiar na kata namarba kata ka dei kaba la bthah ïa baroh ki kam bad lada ki sdang ban pynkylla ïa kata tang na ka bynta kawei ne ki ar tylli ki kynhun, kin hap ban pynkylla lut ïa baroh.  Hapoh ki kyndon jong ka MHA ngi long kiba kloi ban ïakren,” u la ong.Ka HNLC ka la weng noh na ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ka Sorkar Pdeng bad Sorkar Jylla kum ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingbym lah jong ka Sorkar ban ai jingmynjur ïa ki san tylli ki mat jingdawa bahakhmat ba kynthup ïa ka jingmap ei ïa ki nongïalam bad ïa ki dkhot jong ka seng.Shuh shuh u Sangma u la ong ka la don ruh ka rai ba la shim mynshwa ha kaba la weng noh ïa ki case.“Hynrei kumba nga ong, lada yn hap ban leh ha ki sngi ban sa wan lane kam shong eh ha ki jait mukotduma hynrei lada phim lah ban sdang ïa ka jingïakren ngin ym lah ban poi sha kata ka thong,” u la bynrap.
title: KA SORKAR KA KLOI BAN IAKREN BAD KA HNLC TANGBA DA KI KYNDON KA MHA: CONRAD SANGMA

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la takraiñ tyngeh ïa ka jingkynnoh jong ka VPP ba ka pisa ba la mang ban pyntreikam na ka bynta ki projek hapoh ka jylla ka dei ka pisa kaba shu shim da ka ram bad ha kajuh ka por u la kyntu ïa kino kino kiba wohdong ïa ka Sorkar ki dei ban wanrah ïa ki jingtip kiba bniah bad ban da kdew ruh ïa ki projek kiba dei.U Sangma u la ong ba kam don kano kano ka jingleh bakla jong ka Sorkar haba shim ïa ka ram na ka bynta ki kam pynroi, namarba la bud ryntih ïa ki kyndon jong ka RBI bad jong ka Sorkar India.“Ka long kaba bakla shikatdei eh, kaba da bakla shaba palat bad kaba shu mutdur, (ba ka pisa na ka bynta ki song pynroi ki dei kiba la shim da ka ram).  Nga lah ban pynshai bin pa bin lada ka long kaba dei,” ong u Sangma ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor haba kylli halor ka jingkynnoh jong u President ka VPP Bah Ardent M. Basaïawmoit ba bun na ki kam pynroi ba la pyntreikam da ka pisa ba shu shim da ka ram.Da kaba pynpaw ba un ym lah ban kynthoh khlem da tip thikna ïa kano ka projek ba ka VPP ka kdew, hynrei u Myntri Rangbah u la pynshai halor ka kyrdan jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshim ïa ka ram.“Kam don kano kano ka jingbakla ïa kano kano ka sorkar ban shim ram na ka bynta ban leh ïa ki kam pynroi da kaba bud ïa ki kyndon jong ka RBI bad ka jong ka Sorkar India.  Kam don kano kano ka jingbakla. Ïa ka pisa kaba mang ban pyntreikam na ka bynta ki kam pynroi, ki kyndon ki don hapoh ka jingtreikam jong ka sorkar bad hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Sorkar India,” la ong u Sangma.“Haba phi sdang ban shim ïa ka ram na ka jingpynlut khajna, kata kan don ka jingeh. Hynrei kano kano ka jingkynshew pisa  ka dei kaba ju leh kumba la leh na ka bynta ka Infrastructural Investment ka bym dei satia ka kam kaba sniew.  Lada phi leit palat pud ïa kata, phin hap ban peit bniah. Hynrei sa shisien, ngam ïai ban ba lada ka dei hapoh ki kyndon ba la ai da ka Sorkar India, ngi lah ban shim (ïa ka ram),” la ong shuh shuh u Sangma.U la ong ruh ba lada ka Sorkar kam shim ïa ka ram, ka Sorkar ka bakla shaba palat namarba kam shim kabu ïa ki kyndon ba la buh da ka Sorkar India.Haba ai nuksa, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “lada ka Sorkar India ka ong ba phi lah ban shim ram T. 1000 klur, bad phi shim tang T. 500 klur, kata kan long ka bym dei namarba ngim shim ïa ka T. 500 klur ban pyndonkam na ka bynta ban kynshew.  Kata ka dei ka jingthmu, bad kata ka dei kaba ka Sorkar ka ailad ïa ngi ban shim.”U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka la ban shim ïa ka pisa na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka la pyntreikam ha kiba bun ki skhim bad ki jingmyntoi ba ki paidbah ka  jylla ki la ïoh.“Haoid, lah ban kynthoh, bad nga ju shim ba kito kiba wohdong ki dei ban wanrah ïa ki jingtip kiba bniah bad ngan da kmen shikatdei eh ban ai jubab,” la bynrap u Sangma.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka Umïam Hydro Electric Dam, u Sangma u la ong ba ka Sorkar India ka la mang ïa ka pisa ba la ai sha baroh ki jylla bad ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ïa ka mang tyngka kaba T. 400 klur na ka Sorkar India lyngba ka Ministry of Jal Shakti.
title: BA KYNNOH KA VPP BA PYNTREI PROJEK KA SORKAR DA KA RAM, PHAH WANRAH SABUT U CM

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka  ladep khot Tender na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka lynti ïaid kjat bad ïa ki nala ha Iewduh.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Sangma u la ai khublei ïa ka North Eastern Council (NEC) kaba la mang pisa T.10 klur ban shna pynbha ïa ki katto katne ki bynta ka Iewduh.“Ngi sngewkmen ban pyntip ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynsdang ïa ka kam bad ïa ka tender kaba T.5 klur ladep khot na ka bynta ban shna pynbna ïa ki nala bad ki lynti ïaid kjat ha Iewduh.  Ka kam ka la ïaid bad ka NEC ka la mang pisa bad lada ka wan lyngba leilei kan ïarap shikatdei eh ïa ngi,” u la ong.U la ong ba ka Sorkar kan sa ïoh ruh ïa ka pisa na ka Special Assistance on Capital Investment ban pynbhariew ïa ka Iewduh ba la rim tam ha kane ka jylla.“Ïa ka phase-I ladep ban khot Tender. Ngi hap ban aiti noh ïa ka kam hapoh shitaiew ne shiphew sngi bad ngi kyrmen ba ki lynti ïaid kjat bad ka jingshna ïa ki nala kan sdang noh shen ha Iewduh. Ka pisa ba la ïarap da ka NEC, ngi sngewkmen haduh katta katta bad ngin pyndonkam bha ruh ïa ka,” la bynrap u Sangma.
title: 5 KLUR LADEP KHOT TENDER KA SORKAR BAN SHNA LYNTI ÏAID KJAT BAD NALA HA ÏEWDUH

content: Namar ka jingshim kabu jong ki trai aikam kiba wanrah da ki bar jylla ban trei bylla ha ka dor kaba tat, ka Sohra Labour Union (SLU) ryngkat bad ka Khasi Student Union, South Khasi Hills ki la byrthen ban khynra naphang ïa ki jaka ba trei ki bar jylla kiba hap hapoh u pud u sam ka thaiñ Sohra bad Shella.Ka Sohra Labour Union (SLU) bad ka Khasi Student Union, South Khasi Hills ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ban ïapyrkhat halor ka jingshim kabu jong ki trai jylla ban wanrah da ki bar jylla ban trei bylla ha kane ka thaiñ.U President jong ka Sohra Labour Union Bah Hilchestone L Marshillong u la pynpaw ba ka jingïalang ka la shim ïa ka rai ban leit khynra sha ki jaka ba aikam ki trai jylla ïa ki bar jylla ryngkat bad ki dkhot jong ka KSU namarba bun na ki samla Khasi mynta ki la lah ban trei ïa kiba bun ki kam ba kiwei pat ki briew kiba nabar ka jylla ki lah ban trei.
title: BYRTHEN KA SLU BAD KA KSU BAN KHYNRA ÏA KI JAKA BA TREI KI BAR JYLLA HA SOHRA

content: : Ha kane ka juk kyrduh kam, ki don da ki hajar hajar ngut ki khun samla  ha kane ka jylla kiba shem jingeh ban ïoh kam wat hadien ba ki la pyndep ïa ki jingpule jong ki ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher.Hynrei dang don pat ki khun samla kiba khlem da khmih lynti than ïa ki kam Sorkar, hynrei ki wad hi da kiwei ki lad ki lynti ban kamai jakpoh.U nonglum khubor ha ka jingwad ïa ki khubor kiba kum kita, kiba phylla bad kiba kham pher, u la ïakynduh ïa kawei ka thei samla hangne ha nongbah Shillong kaba im kamai jakpoh bad pyndap ïa ka ïng ka sem da kaba trei ïa kawei na ki jait kam kaba kham ñiar ban ïohi ba ki kynthei ki kin trei.Kane ka dei ka samla Elinda Mukhim kaba sah ha shnong Nongthymmai, Nongkhryiem kaba la pyndep ïa ka jingpule ha ka kyrdan Class XII na Morningstar College.  Mynta, ka trei ha ka shlem die kali ar shaka jong ka Frank Yamaha, kum ka Mechanic, kaba, ka kamram jong ka, ka long ban pynbiang pynbit ïa ki Scooty, ki Bike, ban maramot, lane maramot ïa ki.Ka samla Elinda ka la leit ban shah pyntbit ïa lade ha kane ka kam ha Don Bosco Technical School, Laitumkhrah haduh ar snem shiteng. Ka jingshah hikai pyntbit kam dei tang ïa ki kali ar shaka, hynrei ban shna ruh ïa ki kali saw shaka. Tangba, ka samla Elinda ka la pynleit jingmut beit ban shna tang ïa ki kali ar shaka namarba ka kham pynsuk ïa ka.Hadien ba la pyndep ïa ka jingshah hikai pyntbit ka la trei ha Rani Motors kumba hynriew bnai eiei bad mynta la san snem eiei ka la trei bad ka Frank Yamaha.Ha ka jingïakren bad u nonglum khubor ka samla Elinda ka la ai khublei kyrpang ïa ka Frank Yamaha kaba la plie lad plie lynti ïa ka ban trei ïa kane ka kam namarba ka dei kaba pyntbit ïalade ha ka kam shna kali ar shaka.Lyngba kane ka samla, kan long ruh ka nuksa kaba bha na bynta ki khun samla ba lada don ka mon, ka lad ka plie, khlem da ñiew ne thew, kynthei ne shynrang ha kaba ki lah ban ïoh ïa ki kam ki jam katkum ka jingtbit ka jong ki.
title: LADA DEI KYNTHEI NE SHYNRANG YM DEI BAN LEHRAIÑ HYNREI TREI BEIT LA KA KAM

content: Ka Dorbar Shnong Lumshyiap ryngkat ka jingïatrei lang bad ki Pulit ki la lap ïa ka kmie jong u khullung ba dang shu dep kha da kaba thep ha ka plastik bad bret ha kali kit ñiut.Ka Dorbar Shnong Lumshyiap ka la aipor hapoh 24 kynta ïa kiba donkti ban wan pyndem hakhmat ka shnong shwa ban aiti sha ki bor jong ka aiñ.U Rangbah Shnong jong ka shnong Lumshyiap Bah Apphira Khongphai u la ïathuh ba ka kmie jong i khyllung kaba bret khun ka dei kaba la don kumba 22 snem ka rta bad ka dei ka khynnah Garo kaba shu wan trei ha iing briew ha ka shnong Lumshyiap.Ïa kane ka khynnah la rah noh da ki Pulit bad mynta ka dang don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar.“Hadien ba ngi ladep ïakren bad ki bor jong ka aiñ, la wan mynstep u OC ka Pasteur Beat House bad ong ba ki bahaing ki la wan shimti ïa ka met (jong u khunlung) bad kyrpad ïa ngi ka shnong ban ai ïa ka jaka tep,” la ïathuh u Bah Khongphai bad ïathuh ruh ba ka Dorbar Shnong khlem da kyntait ka la ai jaka ban tep noh ïa ka met ba dang sah jong u khunlung da ka jingsakhi lang jong ki Pulit.“Ngi la iit da ka jingïatreilang ki seng samla, seng kynthei bad hadien kato ngi la aiti noh sha ki Pulit bad ki la leh ruh la ka jong ka kamram.  Hadien ba ladep ban leh lut ïa ki test bad la rah katto katne ki longing, la lap ba ka don kawei ka khynnah kaba shu wan trei ing briew ha Lumshyiap, ka dei ka khynnah Garo kaba dang 21-22 snem ka rta,” la ong u Rangbah Shnong.’“Mynta ka dang don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar ha Ganesh Das Hospital,” la ong shuh shuh u Rangbah Shnong.Haba kylli, u la ong, “tang shu ïohsngew ïa kata, ngi la kyndit bad mar ïa telephone ïa ki nonglum ñiut ka la long ka jingjah burom ïa ngi kum ka shnong. Nga la pyntip mar mar ïa ki dkhot jong ka Executive Committee jong ka shnong, ïa ka seng samla bad ïa ka seng kynthei bad ki la shimkhia ban iit haduh ban da lap, ngin ym ailad.”U la ong shuh shuh, katkum ka jingïoh jingtip na ka trai ing ka khynnah ka dei kaba dang trei kumba lai snem.  Ka dang shu wan phai na shnong na Garo Hills dang kumba shi bnai bad ka jia noh kumne.“Ki trai ing kim suba ïano ïano ruh. Nga la kyntu ïa ki nongshong shnong lada ki ladep leh ïa ki kam kiba sniew ba kim dei ban leh ïa kum kine ki jait kam hynrei ki dei ban leit aiti noh sha Hospital ne sha kino kino ki riewshimet kiba kwah khun,” la maham u Bah Khongphai bad bynrap, ‘ban shu leh kumne ka dei ka kam pop kam sang.”“Ngi ai khublei ïa ki nongshong shnong bad ïa ka tnat Pulit ba ngi la lait na ka jingjah burom,” u la ong.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ba kane ka la jia ha ka step sngi Balang mynta ka taiew ha kaba la lap ïa u khunlung ba dang khah snam la thep ïa ka plastik bad la bret ha ka kali kaba ju lum ïa ki ñiut hapoh ka shnong Lum Shyiap.
title: DEI KA KHYNNAH KABA SHONG TREI ÏING BRIEW KABA BRET KHUN HA LUMSHYIAP

content: Ka Additional Director General, BSF (Eastern Command) Kolkata, ka Sonali Mishra ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la wan iuhkjat sha ka Jylla Meghalaya ban leit jurip ïa ka khappud jong ka East Khasi Hills bad ka South West Khasi Hills District bad lum jingkheiñ ruh halor ki kam runar ruser kiba ju jia khah khah ha khappud ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka ri Bangladesh.Ha ka sngi Thohdieng ïa ka Sonali Mishra la pdiang burom da u IG BSF Meghalaya u Harbax Singh Dhillon bad kiwei kiwei ki heh ophisar bad pynbud sa ka “Guard of Honour” ha Officers’ Institute, Shillong.U IG BSF Meghalaya u la ïathuh ha ka Mishra halor ki lad jingïada ha khappud jong ka ri India bad Bangladesh ha ka bynta jong ka jylla Meghalaya.U IG u la pyntip ruh ha ka ADG halor ki jingeh ba ki shipai BSF ki ïakynduh ha shilynter ka khappud Indo-Bangladesh bad ïathuh ruh ïa ki lad ki lynti ba ka tnat shipai ka la leh ban tem ïa ki kam runar ruser ha khappud.Ka ADG ka la leit jngoh ruh ïa ka Composite Hospital, Shillong ban ïakynduh ïa ki shipai kiba la shah sumar ha kane ka hospital.  Ka la ai jingkren ruh ïa ki ophisar bad ïa ki shipai ha ka Sainik Sammelan ha Frontier Headquarter, Umpling, Shillong.Ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, ka ADG ryngkat ka jingsynran lang u IG BSF Meghalaya ka la leit jngoh ïa ki ki Border Outpost (BOP) ha shilynter khappud ka India- Bangladesh kiba don ha South West Khasi Hills bad ha East Khasi Hills District jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ha kaba ka la ïakynduh markhmat ïa ki Field Commander bad pan jingtip halor ka kam pahara ha khappud khnang ban pynduna ïa ki kam runar ruser ha khappud.Ka Mishra ka la ïakynduh ruh ïa u Rangbah Shnong bad ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Nolikatta ha ka jingleit iuhkjat sha South West Khasi Hills.Ka la plie paidbah ruh ïa ki building ba thymmai jong ki Border Out Pot kiba hap hapoh ka Meghalaya Frontier.Ka ADG ka la ïaroh ïa ka jingtrei shitom bad ïa ka jinglen lade jong ki shipai BSF kiba ïada ïa ka khapud jong ka jylla Meghalaya baroh arphew kynta.
title: JURIP KA ADG BSF ÏA KA KHAPPUD, PAN JINGKHEIÑ ÏA KI KAM RUNAR RUSER HA KHAPPUD INDO-BANGLA

content: Ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Student’s Union (KSU) Mission Compound Unit ba la lamkhmat da u Secretary u samla Meban Syiemlieh ki la beh krad ïa ki bar jylla kiba trei bylla hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Mission Compound khlem pynbiang ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang.Ka seng, hadien ba ka la ïoh jingtip ba ki don ki nongtrei bar jylla kiba trei ba ktah hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong mar mar ka seng ka la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra ha kaba ka la lap da la ki jong ki khmat ba ki don shisha ki bar jylla kiba la trei bylla khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang. Mardor ka seng ka la beh noh ïa ki bar jylla bad phah leit phai noh ïa ki sha ka jaka ba ki wan.Ka seng ka la maham ïa ki kontraktor ba kim dei satia ban wan ïalam trei bylla da ki bar jylla hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong hynrei ki dei ban aikam sha ki trai jylla ia ki kam kiba dang lah ban trei.
title: BEH KA KSU ÏA KI BAR JYLLA NA MISSION COMPOUND KIBA TREI BYLLA KHLEM KI KOT KI SLA

content: Ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) kiba ap pahara ha khappud ka ri India bad Bangladesh ha ka shnong Muktapur, West Jaiñtia Hills District la kynnoh ba ki la sloit jubor ia ka sopti bad byrngem siat iap ia u Dr. Seiboklang Buam uba dei u Officer Incharge jong ka Veterinary Dispensary, Muktapur bad uba long ruh u nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Muktapur.Kane ka la jia ha ka sngi U Blei ha ka por 12:05 baje noh sngi katba u Dr. Buam u dang thmu ban leit khwai dohkha na wah Lakroh kaba don ha khappud ka ri Bangladesh bad kaba jngai 2 kilomitar na Muktapur na ka surok Muktapur-Jaliakhola kaba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka BSF Border Out Post Hawaitila.Ha ka ejahar ba la mudui da u Dr. Seiboklang Buam sha ki Pulit ka Muktapur PPP, u la kynnoh ba uwei u shipai BSF uba la tip kyrteng kum u Rejendra Kumar bad uwei u shipai BSF bym lah ban tip kyrteng ki la bat ia u hajan ka Shiv Mandir, Hawai Tilla ha Lakroh.“Katba nga dang iaid lynti ban leit khwai sha wah Lakroh, ki shipai BSF ba la jer kyrteng haneng tang shu iohi ia nga ki la pynsangeh bad sdang ban tohkit ia nga la nga dei u nong India ne u nong Bangladesh.  Hadien ba nga la jubab ia ka jingkylli jong ki, khnang ban buh ialade ha ka jingshngaiñ, nga la ring video da ka mobile phone ia ka jingiakren jong ngi. Tang shu iohi ia kane (ba nga ring video) ki la sdang ban ktah kti bad byrngem ban siat iap ia nga bad patrong shajan u mawpud (Zero Point) ba pyniakhlad ia ka India-Bangladesh bad nalor kata, ki la knieh ruh ia ka mobile phone kaba dang don ha ka kti jong ki tad haduh kane ka khyllipmat ba la ujor ia kane ka ejahar,” la ong u Dr. Buam ha ka ejahar.“Katba ki dang patrong ia nga sha Zero Point Indo-Bangladesh, nga la pyrta jingiarap bad donbok ba arngut ki kynthei bad uwei u nongshong dukan uba don hajan ha kata ka por u la iohsngew ia ka jingpyrta jong nga ki la wan iarap ban iakren bad ki shipai BSF ban pyllait ia nga. Hynrei wat ha kata ka por, ki shipai BSF ba la kdew haneng ki la phah panmap ia nga da kaba ktah ia ki kjat jong ki bad pyrshang ruh ban sloit jubor ia ka sopti bad ia ka patlun ban pyniaid lyngkhuid ia nga,” la ong shuh shuh u Dr. Buam.Ha ka video ba la saphriang ha ka social media, u Dr. Buam u la ong ruh katba u dang iania bad ki shipai BSF hadien ba ki la kynnoh ba u dei u nong Bangladesh, ma u ruh u la pynphai nia balei ki shipai BSF kim beh ia ki nong Bangladesh kiba ju sharai masi hajan u mawpud bad ka shnong Muktapur.Halor ka jingphah panmap bad phah nguh ia ki kjat da ki shipai BSF, u Dr. Buam u la ong, “lada don kaei kaei kaba bakla nga kloi ban map hynrei ban nguh haduh ka kjat te ngam lah.”
title: PATRONG BAD BYRNGEM SIAT ÏAP KI SHIPAI BSF ÏA U DOKTOR VETERINARY DISPENSARY, MUKTAPUR

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K. Sangma u la pynpaw ka jingkmen halor ka jingïasoi soskular Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) hapdeng ka AVENUES, Meghalaya bad ka Young Change Agents, Australia ha Melbourne ha ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai, ka ban plie lynti ïa ki samla ba dang khie dang san na ka jylla Meghalaya bad ïa kiwei kiwei ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ban ïoh ïa ki lad jingshah hikai pyntbit katkum ka jingïaid jong ka por kumno ban seng ïa ki kam ki jam lajong.Haba ai khublei ïa ka Association lyngba ki kor internet, u Sangma u la ong, “la pynsngewthuh ïa nga ba kane ka jingïateh paralok ka thmu ban plie lad ïa ki samla ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi shabar ka ri ba kin ïoh ïa ki jingshah hikai pyntbit kaba palat ar snem.  Kan long ka jingsah kynmaw ha ka North East India bad kamtam eh na ka bynta ka roi ka par jong ki samla.”U la bynrap, lyngba ka jingïatreilang hapdeng ka Avenues bad ka Young Change Agents, la khmihlynti ba da ki hajar ngut ki samla ka jylla Meghalaya bad ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kin ïoh mynsiem ban phaikhmat ban seng ïa ki kam ki jam lajong,da ka jingkdew lynti.Ha ka sien banyngkong eh la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai ha Melbourne, Australia bad lyngba kane ka jingïalang la ïasoi ïa ka Memorandum of Understanding hapdeng ka Avenues, Meghalaya bad ka Young Change Agents.Ïa ka jingai jingmynjur la lamkhmat da ka Tiffani Seaton, Indigenous Engagement Lead, Young Change Agents.Ka Margaret O’Brien, kaba dei ka CEO jong ka Young Change Agents, ka la ïasam ïa ki jingtip bad ïa ki  jingai jinghikai halor kane ka phang.“Ngi sngewkmen ban ïatreilang bad ka Avenues ha North East India, ka ban plie lynti ïa ki samla bad ngi khmihlynti ruh ban pynwandur thymmai ïa kane ka jingïatreilang da kaba phaikhmat sha ki samla ban ai jinghikai ha ka sengkam sengjam,” ka la ong.U Founder bad CEO jong ka AVENUES Meghalaya u Mark Laitflang Stone, u la ong, “kane ka jingïalang kan sah jingkynmaw na ka bynta ki samla jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi. Kan long ruh ka sien banyngkong eh ban ïasam jingtip halor ki jingai jinghikai halor ka sengkam sengjam na ka bynta ki samla riewlum hapdeng ki ar tylli ki ri.  Ka jingïatreilang bad ka Young Change Agents kan ïarap ïa ngi ban plie ïa ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki samla riewlum, ha ka lynti kaba ki samla kin ïoh jingshaniah bad kin sngewthuh ïa ka jingshisha kaba lah ban urlong.’
title: SOI MoU KA AVENUES BAD KA YCA, AUSTRALIA BAN HIKAI SENGKAM ÏA KI SAMLA TRAI JYLLA KA MEGHALAYA

content: Ka Meghalaya Veterinary Services Association (MVSA) Apex Body, ha ka Emergent Central Executive Committee kaba la long ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka la pynrem jur ia ka jingleh tohmet ki arngut ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) ia u Dr. Seiboklang Buam uba dei u Officer Incharge jong ka Muktapur Veterinary Dispensary, Amlarem Sub-Division.Ha ka sngi U Blei, u Dr. Seiboklang Buam uba dei ruh u nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Muktapur, West Jaintia Hills District katba u dang thmu ban leit khwai doh na wah Lakroh hynrei u la shah pakhang lynti hajan ka Lakroh Shiv Mandir, Hawai Tilla ha ki arngut ki shipai BSF kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Rajendra Kumar bad uwei pat u bym shym la lah ban tip kyrteng, ha ka por 12:05 baje nohsngi.Ka Meghalaya Veterinary Services Association (MVSA) Apex Body ka la mih shakhmat ban pynrem jur ia kane ka jingjia, namarba u Dr. Seiboklang u dei ruh u dkhot jong ka Association.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President bad u General Secrertary ka MVSA, Shillong, ki la ong, “ka Association ka la shimkhia bha halor kane ka jingjia, kaba la mih ha ki lad pathai khubor.  Ka MVSA ka la shim ia ka rai ban pynsngew sha ki bor bahalor jong ka tnat shipai BSF, Meghalaya Frontier Headquarter halor kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih, kaba la ktah haduh katta katta ia ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong u (Dr. Seiboklang Buam) dkhot ka Association.”Ka Association ka la dawa ba ki bor bahalor jong ka tnat shipai BSF ki dei ban panmap ryngkat ka jingkular ba kum kine ki jingjia kin ym jia shuh hadien habud.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, arngut ki shipai BSF ba la tip kyrteng kum u Rajendra Kumar bad uwei pat u bym shym la lah ban tip kyrteng la kynnoh ba ki la sloit jubor ia ka sopti bad byrngem siat iap ia u Dr. Seiboklang Buam, ha ka sngi U Blei ha ka por 12:05 baje noh sngi katba u dang thmu ban leit khwai dohkha na wah Lakroh kaba don ha khappud ka ri Bangladesh bad kaba jngai 2 kilomitar na Muktapur na ka surok Muktapur-Jaliakhola kaba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka BSF, Border Out Post Hawai Tilla.Halor kane ka jingjia, u Dr. Seiboklang Buam u la mudui da ka ejahar sha ki Pulit ka Muktapur PPP ha kane kajuh ka sngi.
title: PYNREM BAD DAWA PANMAP KA MVSA ÏA KI SHIPAI BSF KIBA LEH TOHMET ÏA U DR. SEIBOKLANG BUAM

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) War Jaiñtia Circle ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei ka la ujor ha u Sub-Divisional Officer (SDO) ka Amlarem Civil Subdivision halor ka jingleh donbor jong ki shipai BSF langrut ia u Officer Incharge jong ka Muktapur Veterinary Dispensary u Dr. Seiboklang Buam, kaba la jia ha ka sngi u Blei katba u dang thmu ban leit khwai dohkha ha wah Lakroh.Ka seng ka la phah ruh ia ka kopi jingujor sha u Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills u Bah BS Sohliya, sha u Chairperson jong ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC), sha u 2-in-command BSF bad sha u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong ba kin tuklar halor kane ka jingjia bad ba pynshitom ia ki arngut ki shipai BSF kiba donkti ha ka kam thombor ia ka longryngieng jong u Dr. Buam.Ha ka ujor, ka seng ka la ong, ‘kane kam dei shuh ka jingjia banyngkong.  Ki shipai BSF jong ka 4Battalion ki ju donkti ban pyndik ia ki nongleit iew leit hat bad ia ki nongrep.  Ki ju pakhang ia ka surok bad talasi naphang ia ki kali kit mar bad ki don ruh ki khep ba wat ki mar ki mata ki shu jah rngai.  Hadien ba la pynhap ia ki mar ki mata na ki kali, ki ieh beit hangto ba ki trai kin kyntiew biang ia ki mar ha kali bad kane ka ju wanrah ia ka jingduhnong kaba khraw ia ki paidbah.”“Kum ka seng, ngim lah shah shuh ia ki kam pyntriem pyrshah ia ki briew jong ngi, da kita ki briew kiba shah bynshet ban ai jingiada. Ngi kyntu ia phi ban shimkhia halor kane ka jingjia bad ban pynshitom ia kiba donkti halor kane ka kam khnang ba kum kine kijuh ki jingjia, kin ym jia shuh hadien habud,” la ong ka seng ha ka dorkhas.
title: BA SHAH LEH TOHMET U DR. SEIBOKLANG BUAM HA KI BSF, UJOR KA KSU HA U SDO

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 12: U Myntri Khynnah ka Sorkar Pdeng uba khmih ia ka tnat Pule Puthi u Dr Subhas Sarkar ha ka lah sngi U Blei u la aiti ia ki shithi thungkam sha ki 48 ngut ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya kiba la shah thungkam ha ki ophis treikam jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.Ia kine ki shithi thungkam la aiti sha ki nongthep kam ha North Eastern Hill University, ha North Eastern Police Academy, ha Employees Provident Fund Organisation, ha North Eastern Electric Power Corporation Limited , ha North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health & Medical Science bad ha Department of Post.Haba pynpaw ia ka jingkmen halor ka jingjop jong ka Rozgar Mela, u Sarkar u la ong ba kane ka dei ka sienjam ba la shim da u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi ban plie ia ki lad aikam sha ki samla bad ban pynthikna ia ka bha ka miat jong ki nongshong shnong.Ka samla Natasha Manar na Meghalaya ha ka jingiakren bad u Myntri Khynnah ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ia u Modi bad pynpaw ruh ka jingkyrmen ba kane ka thain kan nang ioh shuh shuh ia ki lad bad ki jingiarap na ka Sorkar Pdeng ha ki sngi ban dang wan bad ka la kyntu ia ki para samla na kane ka jylla Meghalaya ban aplai ia ki kam kiba lait ha ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar Pdeng.Ka Samla Natasa ka la ioh ia ka shithi thungkam ha NEIGRIHMS.
title: AITI U UNION MINISTER ÏA KI SHITHI THUNGKAM SHA KI 48 NGUT HA MEGHALAYA

content: Namar ka jingpynjaboh ia ka jaka jngohkai pyrthei ha Ryndang Briew, kaba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Mawiongrim, Shillong, ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong Mawiongrim ka ladep rai ban ym shah shuh iano iano ruh ban shong die jingdie ha Ryndangbriew View Point.Kane ka la jia hadien ba ki nongdie madan na Mawiong bad na kiwei ki shnong ki la thmu ban sdang biang ban shong die jingdie biang ha Ryndangbriew View Point kaba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam ka shnong Mawiongrim.Halor kane ka jingbym shah shuh jong ka Dorbar Shnong ban shong die jingdie ha kane ka jaka jngohkai pyrthei ha Ryndang Briew ka la mih ka jingiania hapdeng ki nongdie madan bad u Rangbah Shnong.Ki nong die madan, ki la pynpaw ba ki la sdang ban shong die jingdie ha u snem 2019 bad hadien ka jingkhangdam na ka jingsaphriang jong u khniang jingpang COVID-19, ki la hap ban mih shwa shipor na kane ka jaka kum shi bynta ban bud ia ka jingbthah jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla.Ki la pynpaw ba hadien ka jingkhangdam, ka Dorbar Shnong ka la pynmih da ka hukum ban ym shah shuh ban shong die jingdie da kaba kam ba kane ka dei ka hukum ba la pynmih na Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court.Ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki Pulit, u Rangbah Shnong ka Shnong Mawiongrim u Bah Sorbar L Nongpiur u la pyntip ba ka Shnong kam shah iano iano ba shong die ha Ryndangbriew View Point bad ia kiba shong die jingdie ha kane ka sngi, la phah ba kin mih noh na kane ka jaka.
title: BEH KI PULIT BAD KA DORBAR SHNONG ÏA KIBA DIE JINGDIE HA RYNDANG BRIEW

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU)Mawlai Circle ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai ka la ai da ka jingujor sha u Principal jong ka Sacred Hearts Boys Higher Secondary School, Mawlai u  Fr T. Kharsyntiew halor ka jingthoh bakla ia ka kyrteng jong ka shnong Mawlai ha ki Sweaters jong ki khynnah skul ka Sacred Heart Boy’s Higher Secondary School.Katkum ka jingthoh ha ki Sweater ha ka jaka ban thoh ‘Mawlai’ la thoh pynban ‘Mawali’.  Kane ka jingbakla ban thoh ia ka kyrteng jong ka shnong Mawlai ka la ktah bad wanrah ka jingsngewdiaw ia kiba bun ki paidbah nongshong jong ka shnong Mawlai kumjuh ia ki khynnah skul ba pule ha Sacred Boy’s Higher Secondary School, Mawlai.Ka  seng ka la pynsngew sha u Principal ba un phah pynbeit noh ia kane ka jingthoh bakla bad ban ai noh da kiwei ki Sweater kiba biang bad ba beit ka jingthoh bad spelling kaba dei jong ka shnong Mawlai.Na ka liang jong u Principal u la pyntip sha ka seng ba ka skul ka don ka jingiateh bad ka H.B.Textiles (school uniform embroidery dealership) na ka bynta ban pynbiang ia ki Uniform School jong ki khynnah skul bad ka don ka jingleh bakla na ka liang ka H.B.Textiles bad tang ioh jingtip ba ka don ka jingshon bakla ha ki Sweater u la phah pynbna ha Assembly ban phah lum lut baroh ki Sweater jong ki khynnah ba don ka jingbakla ka jingthoh bad pyntip ruh ba ki sweater kiba don ka jingbakla ka jingthoh ki dei na ka size 26 bad 38 bad ym baroh.U Principal u la pynpaw ruh kum ka skul hi baroh kawei ki ngewsih ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingshon bakla ia ka kyrteng jong ka shnong Mawlai namar kane ka jingbakla ka la ktah ia ka skul bad ia ka shnong Mawlai hi baroh kawei.
title: UJOR KA KSU SHA U PRINCIPAL KA SACRED HEART BOY’S HALOR KA JINGTHOH BAKLA HA KA SWEATER SKUL

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 13: Shi sngi hadien ba ka video ka la saphriang halor ka jingshah leh tohmet u Officer Incharge ka Muktapur Veterinary Dispensary u Dr. Seiboklang Buam ha ki shipai langrut BSF kaba la jia ha ka sngi U Blei mynta ka taiew, ka War Jaintia Student’s Union Amlarem bad Eastern Circle ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingshah thombor jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong kiba sah ha ki khappud.Ha ka lah sngi U Blei, ki nongialam ka seng ki la hiar sha ka shnong Muktapur ban leit iakynduh ia u Company Commander ka Border Out Post Muktapur bad ia ki bahaiing hasem jong u Dr. Buam ban tohkit bniah halor kane ka jingjia.Ha ka jingialang ba la khot da u Sub-divisional Officer ka Amlarem Civil Sub –Division, ki nongmihkhmat jong ki shipai BSF ki la pan por ar taiew ban phah ia ka kaiphod tohkit sha u SDO.Ka Seng ka la dawa ia ki shipai BSF kiba ap pahara ha ki shnong kiba don ha khppud ba ki dei ban ai ka jingiatreilang bad ki bor pyniaid shnong. Ka Seng ka kyntu ruh ia ka shnong bad ia ki shipai BSF ba kin pynlong ia ki jingiakynduh lang na ka por sha ka por ban pynsngewthuh sha ki nongshong Shnong jong ki shnong kiba don ha khappud ban lait na kum kine ki jingjia ha ki sngi ban wan khnang ban weng ia ka jingbym iasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ki shipai BSf bad ki nongshong shnong.Ka Seng ka la ong ruh lada kum kine ki jingjia kin dang iai jia na ka por sha ka por, ki bor pyniaid shnong bad ki shipai BSF ki dei ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh, ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Publicity Secretary ka WJSU Amlarem.
title: KHOT HAJIR U SDO ÏA KI HEH BSF BA SHAH LEH TOHMET U DR. SEIBOKLANG BUAM

content: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bah Prestone Tyngsong uba khmih ïa ka tnat PWD (Roads) ha ka sngi Baar u la ïathuh ba ka jingshna pynbeit ïa ka surok Pynursla Bypass, kaba dei ka bynta jong ka Package-III jong ka surok Shillong Dawki, ladep ban ïa pynbeit.U la ong ruh ba ka jingkynnoh ba la ai jubab ha ka Affidavit hakhmat ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court ba ka jingshna pynbeit ïa ka surok na ka bynta ka surok Bypass ym pat lah ban ïapynbeit na ka daw ka jingpyrshah jong ki nongshong shnong ka long kaba ‘bakla’“Nga sngewkmen ban pyntip ïa phi ba wat ki nongshong shnong bad ki trai khyndew ruh ki la ai ïa ka jingmynjur bad ïa ka jingshna pynbeit ïa ka surok ladep leh da ka tnat PWD bad ka NHIDCL ïa kaba la phah sha ka Ministry of Road Transport and Highways bad sha ka Headquarter jong ka NHIDCL. Dang shen, haba nga dang don ha Delhi nga la shong jingïalang bad ki ophisar ba dei peit bad nga la thikna ba shen ngin sa lah ban ïoh ïa ka mang tyngka,” la ong u Bah Prestone ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Nga tharai ba ka long kaba bakla (ka jubab ba la ai hakhamt ka Ingbishar).  Dang khyndiat sngi, ngi la lum ïa ki rangbah shnong, ïa baroh ki executive member jong ki shnong bad ïa ki trai khyndew, ngi la lum lut ïa baroh bad ngi la leit sorjamin ïa ka jaka ym tang ban shim ïa ka rai na ka dorbar hall ne na ka jaka ba ngi shong hynrei ïa ka jingsorjamin la leh da ka jingsakhi lang jong ki nongshong shnong ryngkat SDO Civil, ADM incharge Revenue, ki nongmihkhmat na ka NHIDCL bad ki Engineers na ka tnat PWD bad ka jingshim rai ka la wan urlong na ka bynta ban pynbeit ïa ka surok jong ka Pynursla Bypass,” u la bynrap.Katkum ka jingong jongu, ka jingjrong jong ka surok Pynursla  bypass ka long kumba 10-13 kilometre.Shwa kane u Bah Tynsong u la ong, ha kaba sdang ban leh ïa ka jingsorjamin na ka bynta ban pynbeit ïa ka surok Bypass la pynsangeh shwa na ka daw ba ka la mih ka jingbym ïasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ka NHIDCL bad ki bor synshar shnong.“Hynrei dang khyndiat bnai, ïa ka jingsorjamin la leh biang bad ngi don na ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki rangbah shnong bad ïa ki trai khyndew ba kin ai ka jingïatreilang bad ban peit ruh ïa ka jingdonkam ban shna ïa ka surok Pynursla Bypass,” u la ong.
title: KAM U DY. CM BA LADEP ÏA PYNBEIT BAD KI TRAI JAKA BAN SHNA ÏA KA SUROK PYNURSLA BYPASS
