content: Ka tnat shipai BSF Meghalaya ka la phah ia ka jingpynshai paidbah lyngba ki lad pathai khubor ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshah leh tohmet jong u Officer Incharge ka Muktapur Veterinary Dispensary u Dr. Seiboklang Buam ha ki shipai langrut BSF kaba la jia ha ka sngi u Blei mynta ka taiew.Ha u kyrwoh, ka tnat shipai BSF Meghalaya ka la ong, “ha ka 11 tarik Rymphang, 2024, ha ka por kumba 12:05 baje nohsngi, ki shipai langrut BSF kiba ap pahara ha khappud Indo-Bangladesh ha Hawaitila ki la iohi ia uwei u briew uba dang thmu ban leit sha wah Lakroh, kaba don markhap bad ka khappud.  Haba ki shipai BSF ki la pynsangeh ban tohkit u la pynpaw pynban ia ka jinglehmeng da kaba kam ba u dei u doctor Veterinary.  Ha kane ka por, ula ring video ruh wat ia ki shipai BSF kiba dang don ha ka kamram.”“Wat hapdeng ka jingkyrpad jong ki shipai BSF ban ym ring video, hynrei une u briew u la um shym la sngap satia ia ka jingkyrpad.  Hadien kane, une doctor veterinary u la leit noh na kane ka jaka bad byrngem ruh ia ki shipai BSF kiba dang don ha ka kamram.  Hadien katto katne por, u la wan ialam sa ia ki nongshong shnong, bad kyrkait ia ki shipai BSF bad ring video ban pynbudnam sniew ia ki shipai,” la ong u kyrwoh na ka tnat Shipai BSF.“Ka jingkynnoh pyrshah ba ki shipai BSF ki byrngem ban siat bad ban pynlaw lyngkhuid ia u ka dei kaba shu thaw bad ka dei kaba shu ialam bakla pyrshah ia ki shipai BSF.  Ki shipai BSF kiba ap pahara ha khappud ki ai ka jingiada ia ki paidbah kiba shong basah ha ki shnong khappud. Kum kine ki jingkynnoh, ym tang ba ki pynsniewdur ia ka jingtreikam jong ki shipai kiba trei shitom wat hapdeng ki jingeh kiba bun hynrei ka pynmih ruh ia ki jingjia ki bym shongnia.  Ka jingkynnoh pyrshah ia ki shipai BSF ka dei kaba shu jler bad ka bym don nongrim haei haei ruh,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia, ha ka lah sngi U Blei ki Ophisar u SDO (Civil) Amlarem Dr. Abhishek Saini, u la lum jingialang ha kaba la don lang u SDPO Amalarem Sub- Division, u Dr. Seiboklang Buam, u SHO PS-Muktapur bad ki shipai BSF.Ha kane ka jingialang, la iakren sani ha kaba iadei bad ka jingjia kaba ladep bad la shim ia ka rai ban iasuk noh hapdeng ki arliang mamla.U MLA jong ka Amlarem Constituency Bah Lahkmen Rymbui uba dei ruh u Chief Advisor jong ka Sorka Meghalaya u la khot jingialang halor kane ka jingjia.  U Additional Home Secretary ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u IG Law & Order (Meghalaya Police), u IG Border bad u IG BSF Meghalaya ki la iakren sani halor ka jingleh tohmet jong ki shipai BSF pyrshah ia u Dr. Seiboklang Buam.U Inspector General jong ka tnat shipai BSF Meghalaya, hadien ba u la pyntip halor ka jingjia baroh, u la kular ba ka tnat shipai BSF kan trei na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ka ri, wat hapdeng ki jingtynjuh kiba bun.
title: KYNNOH KI SHIPAI BSF BA LEHMENG U DR. SEIBOKLANG BUAM, PYNÏASUK U SDO AMLAREM

content: : Ka BJP Meghalaya Pradesh ka la pynkhreh ïa ka Labharti Sampark Karyakram ne ka prokram kaba pynthikna ba ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka jylla ki lah ban ïoh jingmyntoi na ki skhim bapher bapher ka Sorkar Pdeng.Ha ka jingpynkhreh ïa kane ka prokram ha ophis treikam jong ka party, la sakhi lang da u Incharge jong ka BJP North East u Avinash Koli uba peit ïa ka Lambharti program, u State President ka BJP u Rikman Momin, u General Secretary Bah Everist Mrysing bad ka State Convernor na bynta ka Labharti ka Kong Euneescy Khyriem, u Convernor na Tura na ka bynta ka Labharti u Adamkid Sangma.Ka jingmut jong kane ka prokam ka long ban pynwandur bad ban pyntikna ba ki paidbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya kin ïoh jingmyntoi na ki skhim bapher bapher ka Sorkar Pdeng bad kin ïoh jingmyntoi pura lyngba ka jingsam ïa ki skhim bad ban peit ruh ïa ka jingïohnong jong ki paidbah ka jylla lyngba kane ka prokram.Ka BJP Meghalaya ka la thung ïa ki nongtrei hapoh ka jylla ba kin leit sha manla ki thliew iing ha ki district jong ka jylla ban wad jingtip ne ïoh jingtip na ki nongïohbhah.
title: KWAH KA BJP MEGHALAYA BAN PYTHIKNA BA KI PAIDBAH KI ÏOH JINGMYNTOI NA KI SKHIM

content: Ki samla pule 4th Semester ka St. Anthony’s College, Shillong ha ka sngi Baar ki la ieng pyrshah ia ka hukum ba la pynmih da ki bor pyniaid jong ka College ban phong da ki Uniform haba ki wan klas naduh mynta u snem.Ia ki samla pule jong ka Kolej ba la synran da ki nongïalam jong ka NEHU Students Union (NEHUSU), ha ka jingiakynduh ia u Principal jong ka College u  Br. (Dr) Albert Dkhar ki la pynsngew ïa ka jingeh jong ki samla pule na ka jingpynmih hukum da ka College.Ka St. Anthony’s College Shillong ka la pynmih ia kane ka hukum ha ka 29 tarik Naiwieng, 2023 da kaba bthah ïa baroh ki samla pule ba kin phong noh da ki Uniform haba wan sha klas naduh mynta u snem 2024.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, ki samla pule 4th Semester ki la pynlong da ka Signature Campaign ban pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah halor kane ka hukum ba la pynmih da ki bor pynïaid jong ka College bad pyntip ba haduh 400 ngut ki samla pule ki la ai jingkyrshan ïa kane ka jingdawa.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u samla Arman Malngiang ula ïathuh ba ki samla pule ki la dawa ïa u Principal ba dei ban pyllait noh ïa ki samla pule 4th Semester na ka hukum phong Uniform haba wan klas.“Ngi don satang shi Semester ban pyndep ïa ka jingpule bad ki Uniform ki dei kiba shongdor T. 5000 tam.  Ki hap ban pyrkhat lem ïa ngi kiba wan College sa tang shisnem,” la ong u samla Malngiang haba pyntip ba ka jingshim klas ïa ki 4th Semester kan sdang ha ka taïew ban wan bad baroh ki samla pule ka Semester ki la rai ban ym phong satia ïa ki Uniform haba wan klas.U ïathuh ba ïa kane ka rai, ki samla pule ruh la pyntip sha u Principal khnang ba un ym shim ïa kano kano ka lynti ban pynshitom ïa ki samla pule.U la ïathuh ba u Principal um sym la ai satia ïa kano kano ka jingkular halor kine ki jingdawa bad pyntip ba un sa rah ban ïakren ïa kane ka jingpynsngew jong ki samla pule sha ki bor bahalor.“Ha ki snem ban sa wan, ki bor pyniaid ka College ki dei ban da thoh shai ha ki Prospectus bad ha ki Form ba ka long kaba donkam ba ki samla pule kin hap ban phong ïa ki Uniform haba ki kwah ban pule hapoh kane ka College,” u la ong.
title: PYRSHAH KI SAMLA PULE 4TH SEMESTER KA ST. ANTHONY’S COLLEGE BAN PHONG UNIFORM

content: : Ki dkhot jong ka KSU Malki Circle ha ka sngi Baar ki la khang tala ïa ka ophis treikam jong ka Kompeni Swiggy kaba don ha Nongmalki Road hadien ka jingshah behkam haduh 6 ngut ki khynnah Khasi kiba la trei slem hapoh kane ka kompeni khlem kano kano ka daw kaba biang.Ka jingdawa jong ka Seng ka long ba ka kompeni ka dei ban pynrung biang ïa kine ki hynriew ngut ki khynnah Khasi khlem da pynslem bad khlem da ai kino kino ki daw hynrei lym kumta ka seng ka la maham ba kan ym shah shuh ïa ka kompeni ban plie ïa ka ophis treikam hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong MalkiKa seng ka la kyntu ïa ki bor badei peit bad ïa ki bor shnong ruh kumjuh ba ki dei ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ki kyndon pynïohkam pynïoh jam ïa ki samla Khasi shwa ba kin ai jingbit lane ai NoC ïa kino kino ki kompeni kiba plie ïa ki shlem khaii hapoh ka shnong Malki.Shuh shuh ka seng ka la kyntu ïa ka Dorbar Shnong ba ka dei ban buh da ki kyndon ba ki kompeni ki dei ban pynthikna ba ki nongtrei kim dei ban shu trei da ka jingsyier mynsiem na ka jingshah behkam kyndit kaba ju jia na ka por sha ka por.
title: KHANG TALA KA KSU ÏA KA OPHIS TREIKAM SWIGGY

content: Young Minds Association ka la ai nam ai burom ia u Dr. DD Lapang uba la long teng u Myntri Rangbah barim jong ka jylla bad u nongialam ba pawkhmat ha them Ribhoi,da kaba tei ia u durmot ba shi rynieng ha phyllaw jong ka Ri Bhoi College ha Nongpoh.Ha kane ka sngi, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba khmih ia ka tnat Kam Pohing u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u la long kum u kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u MLA ka Nongpoh Constituency Bah Mayral Born Syiem kum u Symbud Kongsan, ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, u MLA jong ka Mawhati Constituency Bah Charles Marngar, u President jong ka Young Minds Association of Ri Bhoi Bah Isynei Hinge bad kiwei kiwei.Ia une u durmot, la plie paidbah da u Bah Prestone Tynsong ryngkat bad u Dr. D.D. Lapang da ka jingsakhi lang jong ki bahaing hasem.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Dr. D.D. Lapang u la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ia ki nongialam bad ia ki dkhot jong ka Young Minds Association of Ri Bhoi kiba la ai burom ia u da kaba tei ia u durmot, kaba long kum  ka jingai burom ia ka jinglong nongmihkhmat bad nongialam uba la noh synniang sha u sup u thiar jong ka them Ribhoi bad ha ka jylla.U la ong ruh ba ka jingshakri ia ki paidbah ka them Ribhoi bad ia ka jylla Meghalaya kam pat kut namar katba u dang im un dang iai trei na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki paidbah.U Bah Prestone Tynsong haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u la iaroh ia u synniang u bynhei ba u Dr. DD Lapang u la noh ym tang ha ka them Ribhoi bad ha ka Jylla Meghalaya hynrei wat ha ka ri da ka jingaiti lut ia ka mynsiem shakri ia ka bha ka miat jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka jylla bad ha ka ri.
title: U DURMOT BA SHI RYNIENG U DR. DD LAPANG PYNIENG KA YMA HA PHYLLAW RIBHOI COLLEGE

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement ha ka sngi Balang ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha u Lamphang jong ka Ingdorbar Thawain ka Jylla u Thomas A. Sangma da ka jingkyrpad ban pynshlur ia ki dkhot jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ba kin kren da ka ktien Khasi bad Garo haba ki iashim bynta ha ki jingiatai katkum ba la ai jingbit da ka Rules of Procedures and Conduct of Bussiness, ha ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka jong ka Ingdorbar Thawain ka Jylla ka ban sdang naduh ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai.U President ka seng, Bah Lamphrang Kharbani ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “kam myntoi ban shu phah tang ia ka “Resolution” sha ka Sorkar India ban pynrung ia ka Ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri Inda, hynrei kaba donkam ka long ba ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka dei ban sdang ban iakren bad ban iathir iatai da ka ktien Khasi bad ka ktien Garo ha ki sngi shong dorbar.”U la ong ruh, “lada ka don ka jingeh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingbym sngewthuh ia ka ktien, ka Ophis jong u Lamphang ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka dei ban buh da u nongpylla ktien (translator) khnang ban pynsuk ia ka jingiashim bynta jong ki dkhot ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ.”Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdawa ban pynrung ia ka Ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India, u President ka HANM u la ong baka seng kan sa nang iai buddien shwa ban shim ia ka rai ban pynlong biang ia ka jingiakhih ha nongbah Delhi ha ka wat kaba ar.
title: KYRPAD KA HANM ÏA U SPEAKER BAN PYNSHLUR ÏA KI MLA BAN ÏATAI DA KA KTIEN KHASI BAD GARO

content: The Monolith Restaurant at Mawmluh was inaugurated today by Cyril V. Darlong Diengdoh, Secretary to the Government of Meghalaya, and earlier on the day, the Laitiam River Side Eco Tourism Hub at Laitiam was inaugurated by I. Rynjah, Director of Soil and Water Conservation, Government of Meghalaya. Both these projects under Sohra Civil Sub Division were implemented by the Soil and Water Conservation Department in collaboration with the Meghalayan Age Limited.It may be mentioned that the Soil and Water Conservation Department under the Sohra Ecological Restoration Project implemented during 2010-2011 to 2015-2016 has taken up some activities and in continuation Natural Resource Improvement Intervention Project has cropped up as a scheme for the promotion of eco-tourism in the areas.Diengdoh said that the tourism sector is a job multiplier that can generate employment for the local people and uplift the rural economy. He also lauded the leaders of Mawmluh village and Mawmluh Tourism & Allied Activities Co-operative Society (MTAACS) for their cooperation in working together with the Soil and Water Conservation Department and the Monolith Restaurant stand as a testimony.  He hoped that this restaurant would provide authentic local experiences to the tourists from outside the state who visited Sohra and Mawmluh areas.The project at Mawmluh village started during the month of April, 2022 and completed during the month of September, 2023. The project includes site preparation & development and construction of a restaurant, basement staff quarter etc., at a total cost of rupees One crore thirty-nine lakh.The development of the Laitiam River Side Eco Tourism Hub at Laitiam village started during the month of June, 2022 and completed during the month of December, 2023. The construction includes four cottages, one open terrace restaurant, landscaping etc., constructed at a total cost of One crore fifty-one lakh.
title: MONOLITH RESTAURANT AT MAWMLUH AND LAITIAM RIVER SIDE ECO TOURISM HUB INAUGURATED

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Laban Circle ha ka sngi Balang ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha ka Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills Kong RM Kurbah bad aipor 15 sngi ban kyndang ïa ki briew ba sah beaiñ ha Maxwelton Estate.“Kane ka ishu ka la sahkut tang ha ka miej jingïakren naduh u snem 2022 bad kam shym la don kano kano ka jingpynbeit na ka liang ka Sorkar bad ka ophis Deputy Commissioner ban kyndang ïa ki briew kiba sah beaiñ bad katba nang mih ka por ki briew ki dang jyllei bad dang rung khlieh shuh shuh ki bar jylla,” la ong ka seng ha u kyrwoh.Ka Seng ka la pynpaw ba ki briew kiba sah beaiñ ha kane ka jaka kaba hap hapoh ka Municipal ki ri masi, ki pyntuid jaboh shapoh ki nala, ki wah bad kane ka ktah lut ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ka shnong ka thaw.“Ha ki jaka ba hap hapoh ka Municipal ka aiñ kam shah ban ri jingri hynrei ki bor pynïaid ki matlah bad kim shim la leh eiei halor kane ka bynta. Ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka bynta ka seng ka ïakynduh na ka por sha ka por ki bor pynïaid jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) bad ha ka 5 tarik, Jylliew 2023 ka la buh dorkhas bad maham tyngeh ba ka SMB ka dei ban shimkhia ban kyndang ïa kine ki briew. Na ka liang ka Municipal ki la mynjur ha kato ka por bad ki la phah notis sha ki briew ba sah ha Maxwelton Estate hynrei ka shu kut noh tang ha ka jingdaiñkuna hynrei ka jingïakren ka kylla noh ba ka SMB kam shym don ka bor ban pynmih ïa kine ki briew bad ka Seng ka suba jur ba ka don eiei sha lyndet ba ka kylla ktien ka SMB,” la kynnoh ka seng.“Kine ki briew ki sah beaiñ ki ïoh ïa ka bording, ka umbam umdih khlem kano kano ka jingsiew. Na ka por sha ka por la ju ïohsngew ruh ba ïa kine ki briew la bei pisa da ki kynhun shitniam jong ki Hindu. Kane ka jaka ka la long ruh kum ka ktem dih drok, kam leh awria, ka tuh ka thiem bad kane ka buh jingma ïa ki nongshong shnong baroh,” la kynnoh shuh shuh ka seng.“Kaba sngew thamula ka long ba kane ka jaka ka don marjan bad ka Assembly hynrei ki Nongmihkhmat ka jylla ki long kiba matlah bad manla ka por haba ki leit sha Assembly hynrei kim shim lah ban peit bad khmih ïa kane ka jaka.  Ka Seng ka kyntu ïa baroh ki Nongmihkhmat ka jylla ba ha ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka ka ban sa long kin sangeh ban hiar bad leit peit bad khmih ïa kane ka jaka kin sa lap ïa ka jingjaboh, ka jingsma iwli ba mih na kane ka jaka,” la ong ka seng.“Kane kan long ka jingïakynduh kaba khatduh na ka liang ka Seng ban ujor ïa ki bor pynïaid bad lada kim lah ban leh eiei halor kane ka bynta hapoh 15 sngi, ka seng hi kan shim ïa la ka jong ka sienjam. Ka Seng ka kwah ban ïaid da ka lynti ba jaijai ryngkat ki kyndon aiñ hynrei lada ki bor pynïaid ki leh matlah, ka seng kan hap ban shim hi ïa ka aiñ ha la ka kti na bynta ka bha ka miat jong ka jaitbynriew,” la maham ka seng.
title: 15 SNGI AI POR KA KSU ÏA KA DC BAN KYNDANG ÏA KIBA SAH BEAIÑ HA MAXWELTON ESTATE

content: Ka ophis u District Transport Officer (DTO) East Khasi Hills da ka jingïatreilang bad ki bor synshar ka East Khasi Hills bad ka tnat Pulit ha ka sngi Balang ki la rakhe ïa ka National Road Safety Month 2024 ha nongbah Shillong.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang, u Superintendent of Police (Traffic) u K. Prasad u la ong ba ka jingpynlong ïa ka National Road Safety Month ka long ban pynsngewthuh sha ki paidbah halor ka jingshngaiñ jong ki nongñiah kali bad ki nongshong kali hapoh ka jylla bad ha ka ri baroh kawei.U la ong, manla u snem da ki hajar ngut ki mynsiem bakordor ki shu duhei tang ha ki jingjia aksiden bad ka daw ka dei na ka jingñiah kali khlemakor, ka jingñiah stet shaba palat bad ka jingbym burom ïa ka hok jong kiwei pat.U la pyntip ruh ba ha u snem baladep, ka tnat Pulit ka la rejingster haduh 46 tylli ki case ba la jia ki aksiden kali ha kaba 40 ngut ki dei kiba ïap bad 15% kiba mynsaw jur.“Tang ha u bnai Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ki (Pulit) la rejistar 6 tylli ki Case ha kaba hynriew ngut ki dei ki case ba la ïoh jingkheiñ ba ki briew ki la duhei ïa la ka jingim bakordor bad 13 ngut kiwei pat ki dei kiba la mynsaw jur.U Prasad u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba ki dei ban da ñiah adkar bad ym ban ïaknieh ïaid khamtam ha ki surok ba khapngiah jong ka Sor Shillong.“Ki nongñiah kali ki hap ban bat ha ka kti ïa ki jingkitkhlieh ym tang ïa ka jingim lajong hynrei wat ïa ka jingim jong kiwei ruh.  Ki dei ban ñiah da ka jingphikir haba ki bat ïa u lakam ha ka kti,” la ong u SP (Traffic).Ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong R.M Kurbah haba kren sha ki nongñiah kali halor ka National Road Safety Month ka la ong ba kane ka jingrakhe ka long kaba kongsan tam namarba ngi ïakren halor ka jingkordor jong ka jingim bad ngim dei hi ruh ban ïalehkai.Ka la ong ba ka long kaba donkam bha ban pynlong kum ïa kine ki prokram manla ka por, ban ai jingpynsngewthuh halor ki hok bad ki kamram ba dei ban leh.Ka Kong Kurbah ka la kyntu ïa ki kmie ki kpa ba ki dei ban don ïa ka jingkitkhlieh bad ban sneng ïa ki khun ïa kaei kaba ki dei ban leh bad ïa kaei kaba kim dei ban leh, namarba ki don ki khep haba u khynnah ne kiba la san ki shah tynrah haba ïaid lynti ka jingkitkhlieh hi ka dei beit jong u nongñiah kali.Ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi lang da u District Transport Officer (DTO) u Bah R. Hinge  bad kynthup ruh ki nongñiah kali kamai.
title: 6 NGUT KIBA ÏAP AKSIDEN HA SHILLONG TANG HA U KYLLALYNGKOT, 2024, ONG U SP TRAFFIC

content: Ki dkhot jong ka HYC Sohïong Zone ba la lamkhmat da u President samla Purningstar Shabong bad u General Secretary u amla Wesmandar Lyngdoh Lyngkhoi ha ka sngi Balang ki la leit jurip kyndit ïa ka CHC Sohïong hadien ba la ïoh ïa ka jingujor bad ka jingud jingnam na ki paidbah na ka por sha ka por halor ka jingbym biang ha ka rukom sumar jong kane ka CHC.Ka Seng ha kane ka sngi ka la lap ba ym don Doctor ha kane ka CHC bad ki don tang ki katto katne ngut ki nongtrei. Na ka liang ki nongtrei ki la thok ba ka Doctor ka dang bam sha kamra. Hynrei kham hadien ki la pyntip ba ka doctor kam don ha CHC bad ka dang leit donkam.“Kaba pynlyngngoh ïa ka seng ka long ym don satia wat tang uwei ruh u ban shah sumar ha kane ka CHC bad ka CHC ka kynjah slam slam kum ka ïngjah.Kham hadien, tang shu wan mih ka doctor ka kren beit da ka jingdom bad la shu ïakren ha phyllaw ka CHC bad kam shym la khot ïakren wat tang ha kamra ruh.U President ka seng u la pynpaw ïa ka jingbynñiaw halor ka jinglong jingman jong kane ka CHC bad ula ong ba ki paidbah ki la duh ïa ka jingshaniah ha kane ka CHC kumba ka paw ba ym don nongphah sumar ha kane ka CHC.U la ong ruh ba ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ ki hap ban leit phah sumar sha CHC Mawphlang haba ki mad ïa ka pang ka shitom namarba ka CHC Sohïong kam lah ban ai ka jingshakri kumba ka dei ban ai.“Dei na ka jinglong jong ki nongtrei kaba kumne lehse, kaba la pynduh jingshaniah noh ïa ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ ïa ka CHC ha kaba ka doctor haba ïakren ka kren da ka jingdom,” la ong u Bah Shabong.“Kam mut ba baroh ki nongtrei jong ka CHC kim don ka jingkitkhlieh. Hynrei ki don ki Nurse kiba ka seng ka lap kiba trei sha ki Sub-Centre kiba hab hapoh ka jingpeit jong kane ka CHC kiba trei shitom bha. Hynrei kiba trei ha CHC ki la duh noh ka jingshaniah na ki paidbah,” u la bynrap.Ula ong ruh ba lada ka jingdon jong ka CHC Sohïong kam shym la ai jingmyntoi ïa ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ bad ka jingdon jong kane ka CHC ka long tang ban pynlut kai ïa ka pisa jong u paidbah, kam don jingmut ban don ïa kane ka CHC.U la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba ka dei ban pynbiang ïa ki doctor, ki nurse bad ki jingdonkam baroh ha ka CHC Sohïong kumba ka leh ha kiwei ki CHC bad lada ka Sorkar kam lah ban pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam ka seng kan hap ban khang tala noh ïa ka CHC ha kano ma ka sngi.
title: JURIP KYNDIT KA HYC ÏA KA CHC SOHIONG, THYLLI KI JINGTHIAH KHLEM NONGPANG

content: Ka War Jaintia Students’ Union (WJSU) Amlarem, ka pdiang sngewbha ia ka rai jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban thaw da ka Standing Coordination Committee (SCC) khnang ban wanrah ia ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ki shipai BSF bad ki paidbah kiba shong basah ha ki shnong khappud ka ri India bad ka ri Bangladesh.Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la shim ia ka rai ban thaw ia ka Standing Coordination Committee (SCC) hadien ba u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba khmih ia ka tnat Kam Pohing u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la khot da ka jingialang ha ka sngi Baar ia u IG BSF u H. Dhilon, ia u DGP ka Jylla u Dr. LR Bishnoi bad ia ki nongialam shnong ban iakren halor ka jingkynnoh leh tohmet jong ki shipai langrut BSF ia u officer incharge ka Muktapur Veterinary Dispensary, u Dr. Seiboklang Buam kaba la jia ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai.“Ha kawei pat ka liang ka seng kam sngew iahap ba kum kine ki komiti kin don ha ki Subdivisional Level namarba kane kan ym wanrah ia ka jingiasngewjan hapdeng ki shipai iada khappud bad ki nongshong shnong  ba sah ha ki shnong khappud,” la ong u Publicity Secretary ka WJSU ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Ka seng katkum ka jingthoh ba la ha u Assistant Commandant ki BSF, Muktapur, ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai bad ai kopi ruh ha u Sub-Divisional Officer (SDO) Amlarem Civil Subdivision, ka seng ka kwah bad ka thrang ba ha manla ki Asistant Commandant Level kin don kum kine ki komiti hapdeng ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) bad ki Rangbah Shnong khappud hapoh ka pud treikam jong u Asstt Commandant,” la ong ka seng.“Halor ka jingmut jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban thaw ha ki Sub-Divisional Level kan ym wanrah ia ka jingia sngewjan hapdeng ki shipai iada  khappud bad ki paidbah nongshong shnong ha ki thaiñ khappud baroh kawei,” la ong ka seng bad bynrap, ‘seng ka seng kan sa leit ban iakynduh ia u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba peit ia ka tnat kam Pohing ban iakren halor kane ka bynta.”
title: AI JINGMUT KA WJSU ÏA KA SORKAR BAN THAW DA KI KOMITI HA KI ASST. COMMANDANT LEVEL

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) ha ka sngi Balang ka la dawa ïa ka tnat Kam Pohing jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban ai jingpynshai ha kaba ïadei bad jingpynkynriahkam bad ka jingthungkam ïa ki Ophisar Pulit hapoh ka tnat Pulit.Ka Seng ka la aiti ruh da ka dorkhas ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba khmih ïa ka tnat Kam Pohing Bah Prestone Tynsong.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President ka seng u Bah Donbok Dkhar u la ong ba ka rukom pynkynriahkam ïa ki ophisar Pulit ka ïatakhuh bad ka Transfer Act, (Meghalaya Police Act 2010).U Bah Donbok u la ïathuh ba ka seng ka la pan da ka hok wad jingtip ne ka Right to Information (RTI) ha ka 20 tarik Nailur, 2022 ban ïoh jingpynshai halor ka rukom pynkynriahkam ïa ki ophisar Pulit ha kaba la lap ba ka don ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka Meghalaya Police Act, 2010 namarba katkum ka jubab jong ka RTI la lap ba ki don ki ophisar Pulit kiba shu shah pynkynriahkam tang hapoh East Khasi Hills District ym duna ïa ka 15 snem khlem da shah pynkynriah ban trei sha kiwei kiwei ki district.“Ka jubab RTI ba ka seng ka la ïoh, kam pynhun satia ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkynriah kam ïa ki Pulit bad ïa ki Ophisar bad ka jubab RTI ka pynpaw ïa ka jingthmu ban tap eitmiaw ïa ki jingleh bakla,” u la ong.“Namarba ka Sorkar ka la kam ba ka dei bud ryntih ïa ka aiñ, hynrei, ka long kaba sngewkyndit ba ka jubab ka pynpaw pyrthei  ïa ka jingtap eitmiaw ïa ki jingbakla jong ki bor ba dei peit ïa ka Home (Police) haba pyntreikam ïa ka Section 12 jong ka Meghalaya Police Act 2010 kaba kdew shai halor ka samoi treikam jong ki pulit kaba ong, “Ki ophisar kiba shah thungkum ha ka kyrdan Director General of Police, Addl. Director General of Police, Law and Order; Inspectors General of Police; Range Deputy Inspectors General of Police, District Superintendents of Police, Sub-Divisional Police Officers, Circle Inspector lane Officer-inCharge jong ki Police Station ka samoi treikam jong ki ka dei ban long tang ar snem.,” la ong une u nongïalam ka HITO.“Ngi lap ba ki don bun ngut ki ophisar Pulit kiba mynta ha ka tnat Home (Police) kiba pynkheiñ ïa ka Act 2010,” u la ong.“Ngi kyntu jur ba ïa kane ka kam dei ban shimkhia bha namarba ngi lap ïa ki katto katne ki ophisar kiba don ha kajuh ka shuki palat ïa ka 15 snem tang da kaba shu pynkynriah kam na kawei ka Unit bad sha kawei ka Unit tang hapoh nongbah Shillong bad ha East Khasi Hills District hynrei ym sha kiwei pat ki district,” la ong u Bah Donbok.“Ngi kyntu ïa ka Sorkar jong phi ban ai jubab halor ki jingkylli jong ngi ba balei katto katne  ngut ki ophisar hapoh ka tnat Home (Police) ki don beit tang ha kajuh ka district palat 15 snem lyngba ka jingleh ba ïalam bakla jong ka Intra Unit Transfer tang hapoh kajuh ka district bad ngi dawa ba dei ban shimkhia kham kloi ïa kane ka kam katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ khnang ban pynthikna ba kan don ka jingtreikam kaba khuid ha ka jingai jingshakri sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka jylla,” la ong ka seng ha ka dorkhas ba la aiti ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah.
title: PAN JINGPYNSHAI KA HITO na U DY. CM HALOR KA JINGPYNKYNRIAH KAM ÏA KI OPHISAR PULIT

content: KaJoint Action Committee (JAC) jong ka dong Namchiang, Elaka Narpuh, East Jaintia Hills District, ba la lamkhmat da u Waheh Shnong jong ka shnong Umkiang kum u Chairman bad u Waheh Shnong ka shnong Pyrtakuna  kum u Secretary ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong kiwei ki riew rangbah bad ki nongialam shnong ha ka sngi Palei ki la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba khmih ia ka tnat PWD (Roads) Bah Pretone Tyngsong ban dawa ia ka sorkar ba ka dei ban shna noh mardor ia ka surok National Highway-6.Ka JAC ka la aipor 10 haduh 12 sngi ia ka Sorkar Jylla ban shna noh ia kane ka surok kaba la pyrsyrtok haduh katta katta ia ka leit ka wan bad ka rah ka rong jong ki paidbah ka East Jaiñtia Hills District.Ka JAC ka la maham ruh ba kan pynlong da ka jingpakhang surok kaba 24 kynta hapoh ka Dong Namchiang, kata naduh ka shnong Tongseng shaduh Umkiang Ratacherra Malidor haduh khappud Assam, lada ka Sorkar kam lah ban shna noh mardor ia kane ka surok, la iathuh u Chairman ka JAC Bah Lasting Pala bad u Secretary Bah Love You Bareh.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ha ka 25 tarik, Nailur 2023, ki paidbah kiba la ai jingkyrshan ia ka KSU East Jaiñtia Hills District ki la pynlehrain ia ka National Highway Authority of India (NHAI) da kaba leh mynleh khwai dohkha hapdeng ka surokbah NH-6 kaba la dap da ki thliew ki syar namar ka jingjot rathai jong kane ka surok kaba la pynsyrtok haduh katta katta ia ki paidbah.Ki paidbah bad ki dkhot jong ka KSU ki la pynlong ruh ia ka jingiakhih da kaba thiah hapdeng surok kum ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingleh mynthi jong ka NHAI halor ka jingdawa jong ki paidbah ban shna pynbha ia kane ka surok.
title: BYRNGEM KA JAC BAN PAKHANG SUROK 24 KYNTA LADA YM SHNA ÏA KA SUROK NH-6

content: Kum shibynta na ka jingpynsngewthuh ïa ki paidbah kiba ñiah kali, la ka long ïa kiba ñiah kali kamai ne ki kali lajong bad kiba ñiah ia ki ar shaka, khamtam mynta shi bnai, ha kaba ha ka Ri India hi baroh kawei la ñiew kyrpang kum u bnai ban ïakren halor ka jingshngaiñ ha ka leit ka wan da kaba ñiah adkar ïa ki kali, kaba la tip kum ka “National Road Safety Month,” ka Batesi TV ka la ïakren kyrpang bad u Superintendent of Police (Traffic), East Khasi Hills, u Kamakhya Prasad.Ha ka jingïakren bad une u heh pulit u la phah ïa ka khubor sha baroh ki nongñiah kali, khamtam mynta ba la poi ka aïom long skul bad ba plie kiwei de ki jaka pule, ki nongñiah kali, la ki dei kiba ñiah kali kamai ne ki kali lajong kumjuh ki ar shaka ki dei ban long kiba adkar bad ban bud ryntih ia ki kyndon jong ka shnat Traffic Police.Ha ka jingïakren halor ki kyndon ñiah kali, u SP Traffic, u la ban jur ruh ïa kito kiba ñiah ia ki ar shaka, ban long kiba don akor bad kim dei ban ñiah pynher sted shaba palat, ban iaknieh iaid shakhmat  bad kawei kaba u la kham ban jur ka dei ruh ban phong ïa ki Helmet kiba skhem.U la ban jur ïa ki kmie ki kpa kiba leit on lane leit shaw skul, ba ïa ki khynnah ruh dei ban pynphong Helmet ban lait na ki jingjia ba sngewsih.Haba ban jur ïa kiba ñiah ïa kali, ki thuk-thuk ne ki scooty, u Kamakhya Prasad ula kyntu jur ruh ïa kito kiba ym pat kot sha ka 18 snem ka rta, ban ym pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon ñiah kali, bad lada lap ïa kum kita kiba pynkheiñ ïa ka Aiñ, ym tang kiba u ne kaba ñiah ki ban shah daiñ kuna, hynrei wat ki kmie ki kpa ruh kin shah pynshitom lang kumjuh.“Bunsien ngin lap ruh ba kine ki kyndon ki treikam tang hapoh sor, namar ka jingdon ki Pulit pynïaid kali ha kylleng ki jaka, katba yn ïaid pat kham sha kyndong, ba ka tnat Traffic Police kam lah shuh ban buh briew, kine ki kyndon kim treikam, khamtam ïa kiba ñiah ar shaka. Hynrei nangne sha khmat ka tnad Traffic Police ka la pyntreikam da kawei pat ka buit, kata ki pulit haba ki iaid lynti shane shatai kin deng ruh da ki Spy Cam bad ynda ki la bishar bha bad lap ia kiba pynkheiñ ïa ka aiñ, yn sa khot hajir ïa ki ryngkat bad ka kuna kaba heh. Wat ki riew paidbah kiba don kata ka jingsngew kitkhlieh na ka jingshngaiñ ki nongleit nongwan, ki lah ban shon dur ïa kiba pynkhein aiñ bad phah sha ki Pulit, ha kaba ki Pulit kin sa leh ïa kaba donkam,” la ong u SP (Traffic).Ka mat kaba khatduh kaba une u heh pulit u la phah kyrwoh sha ki nongñiah kali, ka long ruh na ka bynta ka jingshngaiñ jong ki nongïaid lynti ha ki surok.“Bunsien la ju sakhi, ba ki briew, kynthup naduh ki khynnah haduh ki rangbah, haba ki thmu ban jam na shiliang sha shiliang surok, lyngba u lain (Zebra Crossing) uba la buh kyrpang ban ïaid ki paidbah, hynrei kiba ki nongñiah kali kim ju ailad ïa ki briew ban jam sha shiliang, wat ha ki khep ba ki briew ki la poi hapdeng surok, kaba buh ha ka jinglyngngoh wat ïa ki Pulit pynïaid kali, la ka dei na ka daw ba ki nongñiah kali kim tip ïa ka jingmut jong u Zebra Crossing ne ka dei ka jingkhlem akor jong ki?” la ong shuh shuh u SP (Traffic).
title: DA KI SPY CAM YN BUH KI PULIT, LADA LAP ÏA KIBA PYNKHEIÑ AIÑ ÑIAH KALI KIN SHAH PYNSHITOM

content: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ha ka sngi Palei ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba ka dei ban pynduh noh ïa ka ‘Personal Interview’ ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynrung kam ha ka Group-B, Group-C bad Group-D ha ki tnat treikam bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar Jylla.Ki nongialam ka seng ki la pynlong ruh da ka jingteh ia ki banner hakhmat u durmot jong u Kiang Nangbah kum ka dak ban pynsngew ia kane ka jingdawa sha ki tyndong skhor jong ka Sorkar MDA-2 ba ialam da ka NPP.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Working President jong ka KHNAM u Bah Thomas Passah u la ong ba la shi snem mynta ka seng ka la phah ia ka jingthoh sha ka Sorkar ban kyrpad ba kadei ban pynduh noh ia ka ‘Personal Interview’ kaba pynlong ia ka jingthungkam na ka bynta ki post ha ka Group-B, Group-C bad Group-D ha ki tnat treikam bapher bapher ka sorkar jylla hynrei ka Sorkar kam shym la sngap satia ia kane ka jingdawa jong ka seng.U la ong ruh ba Sorkar India naduh u snem 2016 ka ladep ban pynduh ia ka ‘Personal Interview’ ha ki 23 tylli ki jylla ka ri India hynrei kaba lyngngoh ka long ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya kam pat lah satia ban bud ia kane ka nuksa ba la leh da ka Sorkar India.Haba pynksan ia kane ka jingdawa, u Bah Passah u la ong ba ka jingdawa jong ka seng ban pynduh noh ia ka ‘Personal Interview’ ka long ban wanrah ia ka rukom thungkam thungjam kaba khuid bad suba bad kaba bym don jingiashah liang ha kaba ki nongthep kam kim dei satia ban wad jingiarap na ki riewsaiñ ban ioh ia ka kam kaba ki la aplai.
title: DEI BAN PYNDUH NOH ÏA KA PERSONAL INTERVIEW THUNGKAM, DAWA KA KHNAM

content: U Bah peter Challam uba shong basah ha ka shnong Laitkor bad uba dei ruh u muktiar na ka Shillong Bar Association (SBA) ha ka sngi Palei u la pynbna paidbah ba un aireng ha ka Election Lok Sabha 2024, na Shillong Seat kum u kyrtong Independent.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha Shillong Press Club, u Bah Peter u la iathuh, naduh ba u dang long u dkhot jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) mynba u Bah Bull N. Lyngdoh u dang long u President, u la don ka mynsiem shakri bad ban iakit iabah ia ka khia ka shon jong ka jaitbynriew bad u la ong ba mynta ka por ka la ih ia u ba un rung noh sha ka jylli jong ka saiñ pyrthei khnang ba un dup lah ban iasaid ia ki jingeh jong ka jaidbynriew.Shuh shuh, u la ong ba watla um dei uba don ka spah ka phew hynrei u don pat ia ka mynsiem ban shakri, ban iasaid ia ki jingeh jong ka Jylla hapoh ka Parliament bad u la kyntu ruh ia ki paidbah nongthep vote ban ai jingkyrshan lem ia u, khnang ba un dup lah ban pynurlong ia ka jingangnud ka jong u ha ka kam shakri paidbah.
title: ELEKSHON LOK SABHA: PYNBNA U BAH PETER CHALLAM BAN AIRENG NA SHILLONG SEAT

content: Ka Khasi Jaiñtia Christian Leaders Forum (KJCLF) ka la khot bad wer ïa ki paid Assamese bad ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka thaiñ ba kin kiar na ki kam ba wanrah ïa ka jingsahbiej bad ban pyrshah ïa ki nongkam bymman pyrshah ïa ki jaidbynriew bapher bapher.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Secretary ka KJCLF u Rev Dr Edwin H. Kharkongor, ha ka sngi Palei u la ong, “ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Jaintia Christian Leaders Forum, Shillong ki la dap da ka jinglyngngoh halor ki jingshah thombor, ka jingïalam bakla bad ka jingbyrngem ban leh da ka bor ïa ki skul ba la pynïaid da ki Khristan wat hapdeng ka jingshakri ba ki ai sha ka imlang ka sahlang bad ha ka ri baroh kawei.  Ka paw ba ki kynhun thombom ki dap da ka mynsiem jingisih bad isih ïa ki Khristan ritpaid ha ka thaiñ, da kaba pynlong sohpdung ïa ki shlem kiba ai jinghikai bad kiba aiti na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki samla bad ka lawei ka jong ki.”“Ha kawei pat ka liang, da ka jingwanrah ïa ka aiñ-rew (Bill) ban khang ïa ka jingpynkoit ba shu leh bajikor ‘magical’ ha ka kyrteng ka jingai jingsumar da ki nongpynkhiah, ha Assam ka jingkhang noh na ka bor ka long pyrshah ïa ka jingmut jong ka jingmane, ka jingduwai, ka jingngeit, ka jingim mynsiem kaba kynthup ha ka jinglongbriew,” ong u kyrwoh.“Da ka lariti bad ka mynsiem ka jinglong kawei hapoh ka thaiñ, ka KJCLF ka kyrpad ïa ki paid Assamese bad ïa ki nongshong shnong ka thain ban khñiot ïa ki nongkam bymman jong ka jingisih bad ban pyrshah ïa kito kiba bthat ïa ka jingngeit bad ka jingkyrmen ha ka jingim,” la bynrap u kyrwoh“Ka Forum ka kyntu ïa ki kmie ki kpa bad ïa ki paidbah ba kin ïada ïa ki shlem ai jinghikai bad ki nonghikai kiba aiti lut ban kdew lynti na ka bynta ka bha ka miat bad ka lawei jong ki khynnah.  Ka Forum ka pynshlur ruh ïa ki nongshong shnong ban ïada ïa ka jingkyntang jong ka jingngeit ba la kdew lynti da ka mynsiem ïatip lem bad ka jingmut jingpyrkhat, bad ki dei ban kren pyrshah ïa ki bor kiba thmu ban pynduh pyndam ïa ka kolshor jong ka suk ka saiñ hapdeng ka imlang ka sahlang,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: DIAW KA KJCLF BA SHAH BYRNGEM KI SKUL BA PYNÏAID DA KI KHRISTAN HA ASSAM

content: Haduh T. 1,07,71,366 klur la pynlut ha ka shi snem na ka bynta ka jingtreikam jong ka Meghalaya Lokayukta ha u snem 2022-2023.Na kane, T. 48,75,902 lak la pynlut ha kaba siew tulop ïa u Chairperson, ïa u Director of Inquiry bad u Director of Prosecution bad ki Enquiry/Investigation Officer, T. 19,40,202 lak na ka bynta ka bainong jong ki nongtrei Casual, T. 29,54, 672 lak ka jingpynlut ha ki kam ophis, T. 4,12,270 lak ka bai wai ophis bad ka bai thang bording, T. 2,47,820 ka legal fee bad T. 3,40,820 kiwei kiwei ki jingsiew.Ïa kane la pyntip da u Secretary jong ka Meghalaya Lokayukta Bah R. Rapthap ha ka jubab ba la ai ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai  katkum ka hok jingtip Right to Information (RTI) Act, 2005 ba la pan da ki arngut ki nongtrei mon sngewbha ba kynthup ïa ka nongïalam jong ka TUR ka Kong Angela Rangad bad ka President ka CSWO Kong Agnes Kharshiing.Ka jubab ka ïathuh ba T. 43,52,240 lak la pynlut ha u snem 2021-22, T, 1,01,60,617 klur ha u snem 2020-21 bad T. 85,39,627 lak ha u snem 2019-20.Ka jubab ka pyntip ruh ba ka jingthungkam ban pyndap ïa ki kam ba la mang hapoh ka Meghalaya Lokayukta ka dang ïaid shakhmat bad la khmihlynti ban pyndep noh hapoh lai bnai.Katkum ka jubab jong u Secretary, haduh mynta ka Meghalaya Lokayukta ka shu thung da ki nongtrei Casual ba la siew bainong manla u bnai katkum ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih da ka tnat Labour jong ka Sorkar Jylla.  Ka jingthung ïa ki nongtrei Casual ka dei kaba la ïoh jingmynjur na ka Sorkar.Kine ki kynthup, uwei u LDA cum Accountant, uwei u DEO, uwei u Stenographer Grade III, lai ngut ki peon/bunglow peon, lai ngut ki nongniah kali, uwei u nongsar ing, uwei u chowkidar bad uwei u Cleaner.Ka jubab shuh shuh ka pyntip, ‘ngim don ïa ki nongtrei Contractual ha ka Meghalaya Lokayukta”.La pyntip ba ki ophisar hapoh ka Meghalaya Lokayukta ba kynthup ïa u Director of Inquiry bad Director of Prosecution bad ki Inquiry/Investigation Officer la thung da u Chairperson hadien ba la ai jingmynjur da ka Sorkar.
title: TANG HA U SNEM 2022-23 KOT 1 KLUR TAM KA JINGPYNLUT ÏA KA MEGHALAYA LOKAYUKTA

content: Ka Myntri Khynnah jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ba dei khmih ia ka Tnat Social Justice and Empowerment, ka Pratima Bhoumik ha ka sngi Palei ka la plie paidbah ia ka prokram ai jinghikai pyntbit ha ka sap treikam hapoh ka PM-DAKSH (Pradhan Mantri Dakshta Aur Kushalta Sampann Hitgrahi) Yojana, na ka bynta ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhot met ha nongbah Shillong mynta ka sngi. Ia kane ka prokram la pynlong ha Composite Regional Centre for Skill Development, Rehabilitation and Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities, Shillong.Ka Myntri ka la sam ruh ia ki NIRAMAYA Health Card sha ki nongioh jingmyntoi. Ki la don 10 ngut ki briew na nongbah Shillong kiba la pynrung kyrteng na ka bynta ka prokram ai jinghikai ha kane ka jingialang mynta ka sngi.Ha ka jingai jingkren ha ka jingialang ka Bhoumik ka la ong ba ka sorkar pdeng ka kut jingmut ban pynkup bor ia ki briew kiba don jing duna ha ki dkhot met bad ka trei borbah ban pynurlong ia ka thong jong u Myntri Rangbah duh ban ai jingshakri ia baroh ki briew. Ka Myntri ka la ong ba kane ka jingkut jingmut ka paw shai na ka jingwan jngoh u Myntri Rangbah duh Narendra Modi ia ka thain shatei lammihngi kumba 60 sien naduh u snem 2014, katba ka kynhun Myntri jong u ka la wan jngoh ia ka thain shatei lammihngi palat 450 sien. Ka jingjop kalong ka jingwan ka jingkylla ha ka thain bad ka Tnat jong ka ruh ka la trei borbah ban plie lad ia ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhot met na  ka bynta ka roi ka par kaba kynthup lang ia baroh.Ka la ban jur ia ka jingdonkam ka prokram ai jinghikai pyntbit ha ki sap treikam ban pynkup bor ia ki briew kiba don jing duna ha ki dkhot met bad ka tnat jong ka, kalong kaba kloi ban ai kino kino ki jingiarap ba donkam na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki. Ki sienjam ba la plie da ka tnat ki kynthup ia ki kam wanrah jingkylla kiba pyni ia ka jingpeit bniah ka Sorkar ban don ka imlang sahlang kaba pdiang lang ia baroh, ka la bynrap. Ka sienjam ka pyni ia ka jingieng skhem ka DEPwD ban kyntiew ia ka hok bad pyndonkam ia ka teknoloji ban kyntiew ia ka jingim jong ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhot met ha kylleng ka ri, ka la bynrap.Ka la ai jingtip ha ka jingialang shaphang ki bynta jong ki skhim ba la pyntreikam da ka Tnat na ka bynta ki briew kiba don jing duna ha ki dkhot met. Ka la ong ba ki briew kiba don jing duna ha ki dkhot met kilong ka bynta ba kongsan jong ka jingdon ki briew kiba la tbit ha ki kam bad ka sorkar pdeng ka kut jingmut ban tei ia ka jinglong jingman kaba plié lad ia ki briew kiba don jing duna ha ki dkhot met.Ka la iaroh ia ki sienjam jong ka Composite Regional Centre for Skill Development, Rehabilitation and Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities (CRC- Shillong) ha ka jingai ki jingshakri ba bha sha ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhot met. Ka Myntri ka la ai jingiaroh kyrpang ia ki jingai jingshakri jong ka centre sha ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhot met da kaba pynlong ia ki jingai jingsumar bad ki jinghikai pyntbit na ka bynta ka jingioh ia ka jingkoit jingkhiah. Ka la iakren bad ki briew kiba don jing duna ha ki dkhot met bad sngap ruh ia ki khana jingjop ba ki la iathuh. Ka Myntri ka la iaroh ruh ia ki sienjam jong ka sorkar jylla ban rah shakhmat ia ki sienjam jong ka Tnat  Social Justice and Empowerment jong ka sorkar pdeng na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki briew kiba don jing duna ha ki dkhot met ha ka jylla.Ha kane ka jingialang la iadonlang ruh u Commissioner & Secretary sha ka sorkar Meghalaya, Tnat Social Welfare, Pravin Baksi, ka Commissioner for Persons with Disabilities Sabrella B Marak bad ki heh ophisar jong ka sorkar jylla.
title: PLIE KA MYNTRI KHYNNAH KA SORKAR PDENG ÏA KA PM-DAKSH YOJANA NA KA BYNTA KIBA DUNA DKHOTMET

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 19: Ka kynhun ki doctor kiba don hapoh ka shatri AYUSH Medical Association of Meghalaya (AMAM) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la leit ban kynduh ia ka Myntri ba khmih ia tnad ka koit ka khiah ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh, ban wad jingtip halor ka jingpynslem ban thung AYUSH Doctor.Ia kane ka kynhun jong ki Doctor la lamkhmat da u Dr. Alistar Lyngdoh uba dei u President ka Association ryngkat ka jingsynran lang ki para dkhot.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la dep ia kynduh ia ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh u Dr. Alistar Lyngdoh u la ong katkum ka jingtip ba la ioh la pyntip ba ka jingpynslem ka dei namar ba kam don ka Service Rules jong ka tnad ka koit ka khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla na ka bynta ki doctor AYUSH bad u la pyntip ruh ba kin sa ia kynduh biang ha ka 29 tarik mynta u bnai.
title: BYM DON KA SERVICE RULE SLEM KA THUNG KAM DR AYUSH, PAN JINGSHAI KI DR NA KA MYNTRI

content: Kum shi bynta ban kyntiew bad pynshlur ia ki samla jong ka dong ka thain Sohra, Ka kynhun Sohra Dance Academy kala pynlong ia ka Sohra ICon Season 2 Grand Final ha Lumsainar Laitryngew Sohra.Ia kane ka kynhun Sohra Dance Academy la ialam da u samla Bobby Nongrum bad ha ryngkat ka jingia treilang bad ka dong Lum Sainar Laitryngew.Ha kane ka program la ioh ka jingkren pdiang burom na i kong Benita Nongrum bad la ioh ka jingkren ruh na u Samla Reebok Diengdoh President KSU South Khasi Hills District Unit.Ha kane ka Sohra Icon season 2 ïa ka nam la duh la rah da ka kynhun B. Boys rapper ka la ioh ban rah ïa song ka ba 10 hajar tyngka. Ïa ka nam ba ar la rah da i Rufinia Nongkynrih i la ioh ban rah ïa ka song tyngka ka ba 5 hajar tyngka Bad i Sunny Witford Sohtun i la wan ha ka kyrdan kaba lai i la ioh ban rah iaka song tyngka  kaba 3 hajar tyngka Bad I Albaqueen Swer bad ka kynhun Dohling sisters ki la ioh ban rah iaka song tyngka ba mar 1000 (consolation)  bad I heprit Isamerry Nongkynrih i la ioh ban rah iaka prize ba kyrpang.
title: RAH KA B BOYS RAPPER ÏA KA NAM LAHDUH HA KA SOHRA ICON SEASON 2 GRAND FINAL

content: Ka Universal Advertising, ha ka sien ba nyngkong eh kala pynlong ia ka 1st International Universal Expo Cum Exhibition 2024, kaba dei ka iew ia die ia thied kaba heh bha hapoh ka nongbah Shillong ia kaba la sdang ha ka 14 tarik u Rymphang mynta u snem.Na ka liang ki nongpyniaid kila pyntip ba ki lah sdang sam khusnam ia kiba jop khalai nusib na kane ka 1st International Universal Expo Cum Exhibition 2024 kaba la pynlong ha parking lot polo. Bad la iathuh ruh lah don kumba 9 ngut eiei ki nongjop khalai nusib kiba wan ban thied tiar na kane ka iew naduh ka 14 tarik haduh ka 18 tarik 2024.Shuh shuh na ka liang ki bor pyniaid kane ka iew kila kyrpad ia ki paidbah ba kin wan ban sakhi bad thied ia ki tiar kiba la wan na Dubai, Afghanistan, Bangladesh, Turkey bad Thailand lem bad na kiwei ki jylla jong ka ri India.Kum ban shu kdew ha ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai Rymphang la sakhi ba ki paidbah ba bun bha ki la tuid sha kane ka iew.
title: DA KI SPAH NGUT TUID KI PAIDBAH SHA KA ÏEW INTERNATIONAL UNIVERSAL EXPO CUM

content: Shillong, Rymphang 20 : Ka jingmih pisa na u kwai ha kine ki saw snem kiba la leit noh ka la jan kot sha ka shi hajar klur tyngka. Kane ka long katkum ka jubab jong ka myntri ka tnat ka rep ka riang ka Dr.Ampareen Lyngdoh ha iing Dorbar Thaw-ain ka jylla kaba long ha ka 20 tarik u rymphang, 2024.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka UDP na Amlarem konstitwensi u Bah Lahkmen Rymbui, ka Dr.Ampareen ka la iathuh ba ha ki saw snem ba la leit ka jylla ka la lah ban pynmih shi lak ar phew phra hajar shispah lai phew wei metric ton u kwai kata 24,032 Metric ton ha u snem 2019-2020, 24,059 Metric Ton ha u snem 2020-2021, 28,390 Metric ton ha u snem 2021-2022 bad 51,650 Metric Ton ha u snem 2022-2023.Ka jingmih na u kwai ka long 173.03 klur tyngka ha u snem 2019-2020, 235.65 klur tyngka ha u snem 2020-2021, 203.30 klur tyngka ha u snem 2021-2022 bad 382.72 klur tyngka ha u snem 2022-2023. Ka jingmih baroh ha ki saw snem ka long 994.2 klur tyngka.Ka Myntri kaba peit ia ka rep ka riang ka la iathuh ruh ba ka sorkar ka la ai 46 tylli ki Processing Unit kum ki sem ban trei ban ktah, ki mashin ban khoh kwai bad kiwei pat ki jingdonkam ha ki 21 tylli ki Block ha ki 10 tylli ki District. Ka jinglut na bynta kine ki jingiarap kiba ka sorkar ka la ai ka long 14.06 klur tyngka.Ka la iathuh ba ka sorkar ka tip ba ki don ki kwai kiba bam khniang ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka jylla, kumta ka la dep ban ai jingiarap da kaba sam da ki symbai kait bad symbai sohtrun sha ki 3581 ngut ki nongrep ba kin lah ban pynmih bujli ia ka jingduhnong jong ki na ka daw ka jingbam khniang ki dieng kwai. Nangta ka sorkar kan synreit dawai ruh ia ki dieng kwai khnang ka jingbam khniang kan ym pur sha kiwei pat ki tynrai.
title: JAN DAP 1000 KLUR KA JINGMIH NA U KWAI HA KI SAW SNEM

content: : Ki nongtrei iing briew kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka All Meghalaya Domestic Workers Association (AMDWU) ha ka sngi Baar ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew bynñiaw halor ka jingleh bym patiaw jong ka Sorkar Jylla la 12 snem tam halor ka jingdawa ban ithuh noh da ka aiñ ïa ka kam kaba ki trei.“Ngi la phah la bun tylli ki dorkhas sha u Myntri Rangbah hynrei haduh mynta kam don kano kano ka jingai jubab na ka liang jong ka Sorkar,” la ong ka Vice President ka Union ka Kong Elbina Nongkhlaw ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Nalor ba ngim dei ki briew kiba duk, ngi ïoh ïa ka jingsiew kaba rit ban pyndap ïa ka ïing ka sem bad ban trei bun kynta. Nalor ba ngi shah khate ka jingsiew bainong haba ngi pep bylla.  Ngi dawa ïa ka Sorkar ba kan pyntreikam da ka Welfare Scheme na ka bynta jong ngi,” la ong ka Kong Nongkhlaw.“Watla ka dor ka mur ki marbam mardih ki kiew ne ki hiar, ka long beit kumjuh bad kiba ïap dei ma ngi kiba duk kiba shu bylla im kamai jakpoh da kaba leit bylla ha ïing ki briew,” ka la ong.Haba kylli, ka la ong, “ngi dawa ïa ka Sorkar ban ai jingïada da kaba buh ïa ka dor trei da kaba pyntreikam ïa ka Welfare Board. Dei ban kynthup lang ïa ki nongtrei ing briew ha ka thup ki nongtrei katkum ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih ha ka Minimum Wages Act, 1984, bad ban pyntreikam ruh ïa ka dor bylla sngi.”“Lyngba ka Welfare Board ngi kwah ïa ka Sorkar ban lum jingkheiñ ïa ka jingdon jong ki nongbylla iing briew, ban ai jingïarap haba ki ïakynduh ïa kino kino ki jingjia ha ka jingim jong ki, ban ai jingïarap ha ka pang ka shitom na ka bynta ka bai sumar, ban ïa ka jingïarap haba kha khunlung bad kiwei kiwei. Dei ban thaw ruh da ki kyndon ïa ki kam ban trei bad ban pyntreikam ïa ka jingsiew katkum ka Minimum Wages Act,” la ong ka Kong Nongkhlaw bad bynrap, “ki aiñ ïada ïa ki nongbylla (Labour Laws) kim ai jingïada satia ïa ki nongtrei ha ki ing briew.”Katkum ka jingïathuh jong ka Vice President ki don palat lai hajar ngut ki nongtrei ing briew kiba la rejister kyrteng ban long ki dkhot jong ka AMDWU.Halor ka jingshah thombor ka longryngieng jong ki nongtrei ing briew, ka President jong ka Union ka Kong Patrisha Riahtam, ka la kam ba ka Union ka la ïoh ujor la bun tylli kum kine ki jingjia.“Haba don ki jingshah thombor ki dkhot jong ka Union ngi ju shimkhia kum ka Union.  Ki la don teng ki jingjia haba ki nongtrei ing briew ki shah leh be-ijot bad shah pyndik laiphew jait bad mar mar ka Union ka ju pan jingïarap na ki bor Pulit,” la bynrap ka Kong Riahtam.“Namar Kata, ngi dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla bad ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng ba kin wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban wanrah da ki polisi bad wanrah da ka aiñ ka ban ïada ïa ki nongtrei ing briew,” ong ka ong Riahtam.
title: DAWA KI NONGTREI ÏING BRIEW ÏA KA SORKAR BAN THAW DA KA WELFARE BOARD

content: : Uwei u heprit ba la tip kyrteng u Kitborlang Marbaniang uba la 10 snem ka rta na ka shnong Umtangar ha Ri-Bhoi u la shah pynïap dusmon ha ki runar bym lah satia ban ithuh ha kawei ka jaka ba long khlaw hajan kane ka shnong.Kane ka la jia ha ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai ha kaba la lap ïa ka met jong u heprit ha ka por 7:00 baje eiei janmiet.Une u heprit u dei uba dang pule ruh ha ka Class-II ha kawei ka LP School ha ka shnong Umlur bad u dei ruh u khun ba saw napdeng ki 7 ngut ki khun jong u Bah Synshar Nonghyndah bad ka Kong Diona Marbañiang.U Kpa, u la ïathuh ba u heprit Kitboklang u la mih na la iing ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ bad la ki paralok hynrei um shym la wanphai shuh sha la ing hynrei dei tad ha ka sngi u Blei ba la lap ïa ka met jong u na kawei ka khlaw hajan kane ka shnong ryngkat ki dak mong ha ka durkhmat.Ki Pulit jong ka Patharkhmah Police Station kiba la ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia, ki la leit ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit bad ban pynkit noh ïa ka met jong u sha Nongpoh, Civil Hospital ban leh ïa ka Postmortem.  Hadien ladep leh ia ka Post Mortem la aiti noh ïa ka met sha ki bahaiing hasem ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ban pyndep ïa ka jinglehñiam ba khatduh.Ki kmie ki kpa ki la mudui da ka ejahar ha Patharkhmah Police Station bad ki Pulit mynta ki dang pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap ksai ia ki runar kiba donkti ban dkhat jubor ia ka jingim jong heprit Kitborlang.
title: SHAH PYNÏAP DUSMON U HEPRIT BA DANG 10 SNEM HA UMTANGAR, THWET KI PULIT ÏA KI RUNAR

content: Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ha ka sngi Baar u la kular ba ka Sorkar kan sa shong bishar halor ka jingtyrwa ban wanrah ïa ka Minimum Support Price (MSP) ne ka dor kyrshan na ka bynta u kwai.U Sangma u la ong ba ka dor jong u kwai la die ha ka dor ba palat shiphew shah bad bynrap, “namarkata, ka dor bynrap ka long tang ka lad ban pyntyllun shakhmat.”U Sangma u la ai ïa kane ka jubab halor ka jingkylli jong u MLA ka UDP na Amlarem Constituency u Bah Lahkmen Rymbui, uba la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban thaw lad da kaba wanrah ïa ka Minimum Support Price na ka bynta u kwai.U Bah Rymbui u la ong ba ka dor jong u kwai ka la hiar bha haduh katta katta bad kane ka pynlong ïa ki nongrep ban pynmih bun bha ïa u kwai katba ka dor pat ka la nang hiar arsut.Kane ka jingkylli jong u Bah Rymbui ka long da kaba kdew ïa ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih da ka Sorkar India ha u snemn 2020 kaba buh ïa ka dor kyrshan (Minimum Support Price) na ka bynta u kwai ha ka dor T. 200.Haba pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewhun halor ka jubab jong u Myntri Rangbah, u Bah Rymbui u la kyrpad ba ka Sorkar ba kan  buh ruh ïa ka Processing Unit ha ka shnong Amlarem ban kyntiew ïa ka jingpynmih ïa u kwai bad ban pynïaid iew ïa une u mar rep.U Sangma u la pyntip ba ki don ar tylli na ki 46 tylli ki Processing Unit ba la buh ha Amlarem. U la ïathuh ruh ba jin haduh T. 41 lak la pynlut nalor ka T. 1 klur kaba ladep pynlut.”Shwa kane, ka Myntri kaba khmih ïa ka tnat Rep ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ïathuh ba ki don 46 tylli ki Processing Unit kiba don ruh ïa ka sem treikam, ki mashin khoh snep kwai, ki sem pynrkhiang kwai (solar tunnel dryer), bad ki Soaked Pit ba la buh ha ki 21 tylli ki Block jong ki 10 tylli ki District. Ka dor ba la thied ïa kine ki tiar ka long T. 14.06 klur.34 Unit ki dei kiba la shna pyndep bad sa 12 Unit kiba dang sah yn sa pyndep ha ki bnai ban sa wan.Ka Dr. Ampareen ka la ong ba u kwai u dei uwei na ki mar rep ba ka tnat Rep ka la phaikhmat bha ha ki snem ban sa wan haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la buh da u MLA ka UDP na Mawkyrwat Constituency u Bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, uba kwah ban tip hato ïa u kwai la ñiew neem kum u mar shalan.
title: YN BISHAR KA SORKAR SHWA BAN KYNTIEW ÏA KA DOR U KWAI

content: : Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la rai ban pynbun shuh shuh ïa ki Police Outpost bad ki Border Outpost khamtam ha shilynter ka khappud jong ka jylla da kaba thungkam palat lai hajar ngut ki Pulit.Haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli, ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Congress na Mawhati Charles Marngar, halor ka jingshah pyndik ki paidbah khamtam ha ki jaka ba don ka jingïakajia pud hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma u la ong, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka tnat Pulit khamtam da kaba buh ïa ki Border Outpost bad ïathuh ruh ba la nang pynbun shuh shuh ïa ki nongtrei ha ki Border Outpost barim bad bun tylli ki Border Outpost ba thymmai ladep ban pynkha khnang ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshong shngaiñ jong ki paidbah ha khappud.U Sangma u la ïathuh ba ha ki khyndiat bnai baladep, ka Sorkar ka la pyndep ai ka jingthungkam haduh 996 ngut ki Pulit, tang ban phah sha ki Border Outpost, watla ki don ki kam ba la mang, hynrei ïa ka jingpynrungkam ym pat lah ban pyndep bad mynta ki dang sah thylli.U la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar ka la rai ban pynlong noh ïa ka jingthungkam na ka bynta 3,108 ngut ki Pulit.“Kine ki kam (ba dang thylli) ha ki Outpost ba la don lypa bad ha ki Border Outpost.  Tang shu dep ka jingthungkam ïa ki 3108 ngut ki Pulit, yn sa aikam ïa ki bad ha kata ka por ngin sa ïohi ïa ka jingkhlaiñ ki bor pahara jong ka tnat Pulit,” la ong u Sangma.U la ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la leh bin pa bin da kaba sdang shwa na ka Engineering Wing hapoh ka tnat Pulit.“Kane ka la ai laitluid ïa ki SP bad ban pynlut na ka bynta ki Outpost bapher bapher bad ban shna ïa ki ing treikam khlem da donkam shuh ban leit shwa na ka Engineering Wing jong ka tnat PWD lane na kino kino ki Agency,” u la bynrap.
title: DA KABA THUNGKAM 3 HAJAR KI PULIT, YN SHNA KHAM BUN KA SORKAR ÏA KI OUTPOST HA KHAPPUD

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi baar u la ong ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la kut jingmut ban pynbeit noh ïa ka jingïakajia pud bad ka Sorkar Assam.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar Assam ba kan tuklar ban weng noh ïa ka ejahar ba la mudui pyrshah ïa ki saw ngut ki nongshong shnong ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshah pynpra u mawnongrim katkum ka jingbthah jong ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) ha ka shnong Jatalong kaba hap hapoh Block-II.Ka Sorkar ka la kular ruh ban leh da kaba tyngeh pyrshah ïa ka jingkhrong khajna be-aiñ hapoh u pud u sam jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Congress na Mawhati u Bah Charles Marngar, u Sangma u la ong, “nga kwah ban ïaiban kumba la jia ha ki por ba la leit noh bad ngi la pyni ïa ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar MDA-1 ha ki san snem baldep, ngi la kut jingmut ban ïaid beit shakhmat bad ban wanrah ïa ka jingpynkut bad ban weng noh shisyndon ïa ka jingïakajia pud.  Na ka bynta kata, ngi donkam ïa ka jingïatreilang bad ban shimkhia ha ka rukom kaba dei.’Halor ka jingjia ha ka shnong Jatalong, u Sangma u la ong ba ïa ka ejahar la mudui da u Ranger jong ka KAAC hynrei ym da ka Sorkar Assam.“Ka don ka jingthmu ban kem (ïa ki saw ngut ki nongshong shnong).  Hynrei, u Chief Secretary u la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Chief Secretary jong ka Sorkar Assam ban kyrpad ba ïa kane ka Case pyrshah ïa ki saw ngut ki nongshong shnong yn weng noh da kaba sdang ïa ka jingïakren………Dalade hi nga la kren ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam bad dalade hi nga la kyrpad ïa u katba ki jingïakren ki dang tyllun shakhmat, katba ngi dang pyrshah ban jam shakhmat ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ïa kum kine ki jingjia kaba lah ban pynheh shuh shuh ïa ka jinglong jingman, katba lah ngin pyrshang ban ïakren sngewthuh bad u la mynjur ruh ba un sa peit ïa kane ka kam bad ngi la ïatreilang ryngkat bad nga kwah ban pyntip hangne ba ngi la ïohi borabor ïa ka jingshahskhor na ka Sorkar Assam bad khamtam eh u Myntri Rangbah,” u la ong haba pynpaw ïa ka jingkyrmen ba ïa kane ka kam yn sa lah ban pynkut noh kham kloi.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkhrong khajna be-aiñ, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ki jingkhrong khajna kim jia satia hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Meghalaya namarba ka jylla ka la ñiew ïa u synsar kum u mar rep.“Ha ka jingshisha, ïa kane ka rai, ka Sorkar MDA-I ka la ïarap shikatdei eh ïa ki nongrep bad ka jingkylli kaba mih halor ka jingkhrong khajna be-aiñ hapoh u pud synshar ka Meghalaya yn ym shah daleilei ruh em bad lada ka don kum kata, ngin hap ban leh eiei mardor,” u la ong.U Sangma u la ong ruh ba kum kine ki jingjia, ki jia tang ha ki jaka ba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka  KAAC.“Lada ka don kum kata, ngin hap ban ïakren bad ka Sorkar Assam,” u la bynrap.
title: NGI LA KUT JINGMUT BAN PYNBEIT ÏA U PUD U SAM BAD KA JYLLA ASSAM : CONRAD SANGMA

content: U Tennydard M. Marak uba dei u nongtrei monsngewbha u la dawa ïa ki bor ka aiñ ban pynshitom ïa ki ophisar jong ka DMR bad ka tnat Transport halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki ailad ban shalan be-aiñ ïa u dewiong na rilum Garo.Ha u kyrwoh, u Marak u la ong, “ka long ka jingshisha ba ka jingtih be-aiñ bad ka jingshalan be-aiñ ïa u dewiong ka dang ïaibteng khlem kano kano ka jingpeitngor kaba wanrah ïa ka jingduhnong ïa ka jylla ïa kaba ka Sorkar Jylla, ka Ingbishar jong ka Meghalaya bad baroh ki tip shai ïa ki jingshisha hynrei na ka daw ka jingdon ki riewshim kabu ym shym la leh eiei satia.”“Namarkata, ka long kaba donkam ban pynshitom pyrshah ïa ki ophisar jong ka DMR bad ka tnat Transport kiba peit bad pynïaid ïa ki Checkpoint bad ki Check Gate ban lap ïa ka jingkamai pisa puk puk na ki tyllong nabar khnang ban sei madan ïa ka jingpyntreikam da ka thung ïa ka jingtohkit da ka ED Departmental Enquiry/Check bad ban register case halor ka jingbym pyndep jong ki ïa ka kamram ha ka rukom badei hapoh ki kyndon jong ka aiñ khamtam kloi katba lah,” u la ong.U la ong, ba katkum u Justice (Retied) BP Katakey, uba la thung da ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court ban peit ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka jingbthah  jong ka Supreme Court bad ka NGT, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pyntip ba ka Supreme Court shwa ban khang ïa ka jingtih dewiong, u dewiong uba ladep tih u don 32 lak Metric Tonne.Ka Government ka kren tang shaphang u dewiong uba don 14 lak metric tonne bad No.3232 bad namar kata dei ban tih bniah ïa u dewiong uba dang sah sa 18 lak metric tonne.  Namarkata, ka paw shai ba ïa u dewiong ladep ban shalan khlem ka Challan bad ka jingjahrngai jong u dewiong ka long sa 18 Lak Metric tonn,”ong u Marak.U Marak ha ka 30 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, u la ujor da ejahar ha ki Pulit ka Athiabari/ Porlakait Police Out Post pyrshah ïa ka jingshalan dewiong khlem ka Challan lyngba ka Checkpoint.“Ïa u Token No. la ai hadien ba ladep siew ïa ka pisa.  Ïa ka jingujor ejahar jong nga ladep phah sha Riangdo Police Station  ban leh ïa kaba donkam. Hynrei haduh mynta kam pat don satia kano kano ka jingpyni kam bad namar ka jingbym kitkhia jong ki Pulit, ka la don ruh ka jingkylla ka trok kit dewiong ha ka 12 tarik Rymphang, 2024 hadien ba la ujor ïa ka ejahar ha ka 30/01/2024 hajan Athiabari Police Station halor ka jingkit palat pud ïa u dewiong kumba 1 kilomitar na Athiabari Outpost,” u la ong.
title: KYNNOH U TENNYDARD MARAK BA AILAD SHALAN BE-AIÑ ÏA U DEWIONG KA DMR BAD TRANSPORT

content: Hadien 189 snem ka jingkhladnoh jong u Syiem Tirot Sing Syiemlieh, u khlawait nongïaleh laitluid ka ri India uba dei ruh u Syiem jong ka Hima Nongkhlaw, u la ïap ha ka 17 tarik, Naitung, 1835, ha ka jingshah set byndi ha ka Sorkar Bilat ha nongbah Dhaka, mynta ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la shimkhia ban tei ïa u durmot ha phyllaw jong ka Indira Gandhi Cultural Centre (IGCC), ha nongbah Dhaka, Bangladesh.Ha ka jingplie paidbah ïa une u durmot jong u Syiem Tirot Sing, la pynkylla ruh ïa ka kyrteng jong ka ICCR Library ha Dhaka sha ka kyrteng, ‘U Tirot Sing Library’.La plie paidbah ïa une u durmot da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Myntri ka tnat Arts and Culture u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, ka Myntri Sorkar ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Chairman jong ka State Planning Board Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, u High Commissioner ka India sha Bangladesh u Pranay Verma, u Commissioner and Secretary uba khmih ïa ka tnat Art and Culture Bah Frederick Roy Kharkongor, u Chairman barim jong ka UPSC u Prof. David R. Syiemlieh, u Adviser ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Hamletson Dohling, ki MDC jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ba kynthup ïa u Bah Titostarwell Chyne, u Bah Teiborlang Pathaw, u Syiem Khynnah jong ka Hima Nongkhlaw u Pa’iem K.M Syiem, u Syiem ka Hima Bhowal u Pa’iem Kynsai M. Syiem, u Syiem Khynnah jong ka Hima Khyrim u Pa’iem Habapan Syiem bad kiwei kiwei.
title: TEI MOT KA SORKAR ÏA U SYIEM TIROT SING HA DHAKA, BANGLADESH HADIEN 189 SNEM

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) South West Khasi Hills District bad Ranikor Circle ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ujor sha ka Sorkar Jylla halor ka jingpyndik bad ka jingpharep nongkhaïi da ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) ïa ki nongkhaïi kiba sah ha ki shnong khappud kiba ju im kamai jakpoh da ka kam die marbam ha ki iew kiba don ki shnong khappud ka South West Khasi Hills District.Ki lai tylli ki iew kiba heh ha ki shnong khappud ka South West Khasi Hills District bad ka ri Bangladesh ki long ka iew Balat, ka iew Photkroh bad ka iew Nongjri.  Nalor kata, sa lai tylli iew Khappud (Haat Border) kiba ju long iew shisien shitaiew, ki long ha Ryngku, Nolikata bad ha Dangar bad ha kine ki lai tylli ki iew khappud ki nongkhaïi ba la ïoh ID Card na ka Sorkar ki ju leit khaii bad ki nongkhaïi na ka ri Bangladesh.U President ka KSU-SWKHDU samla Forwardman Nongrem ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “ngi la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba khmih ïa ka tnat Kam Pohing Bah Prestone Tynsong ba un tuklar halor ka jingpynsuhsat jong ki shipai BSF ïa ki nongkhaïi bad ïa ki paidbah nongleit nongwan kiba shong basah ha ki shnong khappud jong ka South West Khasi Hills District.”“Dang ki shipai BSF kiba ap pahara ha u Zero Line ki la wan kiew sha ki shnong ba shong basah ki briew, ban talasi naphang ïa ki kali kit marbam ha surokbah Mawkyrwat-Ranikor ha ka shnong Khatphra bad ha surokbah Mawsynram-Ranikor ha lad ka shnong Balat.  Ym tang ba ki la talasi naphang ïa ki kali kit marbam, hynrei ki la pharep ruh ïa ki nongkhaïi ba ki dei ki nongkhaïi tuh kiba thmu ban shalan be-aiñ ïa ki marbam sha ka ri Bangladesh,” ong u samla Nongrem.U samla Nongrem u la ïathuh ba u Bah Prestone u la kular ba ka Sorkar  kan sa thaw da ka Subdivisional Level Coordination Committee ka ban khlieh da u SDO (Civil) ka ban kynthup ïa ki shipai BSF, ki Pulit bad ïa ki Rangbah Shnong na ki shnong khappud khnang ban weng noh ïa kane ka jingeh kaba ki paidbah ki ïakynduh.“Ngi dawa ïa ki bor synshar jong ka East Khasi Hills bad ka South West Khasi Hills ba kin shimkhia ban pynkynriah ïa ki shipai BSF na kine ki shnong briew namarba ka jingdon jong ki BSF ha kine ki ar tylli ki jaka ka pynwit haduh katta katta ïa ki paidbah,” u la ong.Haba kylli u la ong, “ki kali kit mar ki bun kiba leit sha Haat Bangla. Ka jingïaid kali ka la bun hynrei ym baroh ki kali kiba khaii be-aiñ sha Bangladeh. Hynrei ki BSF kim dei ban tuklar ïa u pud u sam treikam jong ki Pulit bad ki bor synshar district hynrei lym kumta kam don jingmut shuh ïa ki Pulit ban don ïa ki Thanat sha ki shnong khappud lada ïa ka kam jong ki la leh lut da ki BSF.”U la ïathuh ba ha u snem  2018 ki shipai BSF ki la pyrshang ban shna ktem ha ka thaiñ Rangthong kaba jngai kumba 40 kilomitar na ka khappud. “Ka Seng hi kam lah ban pdiang ïa ka jingtalasi kali kit mar da ki BSF namarba ki paidbah kim ïapei satia ïa ka ktien ka thylliej hynrei lada ka don ka jingtalasi ki BSF ki dei ban ïatreilang bad ki bor Pulit,” u la bynrap.“Ngi la pynsngew ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba ngim ïashah ïa ki nongkhaïi tuh hynrei ngi pynsngew pat ba ki nongkhaïi ba dei hok hapoh ka District kim dei ban shah pharep bad shah ktah da kumne kumtai,” ong shuh shuh u samla Nongrem.
title: UJOR KA KSU SHA KA SORKAR BA PHAREP KI BSF ÏA KI NONGKHAÏI KUM KI NONGKHAÏI TUH

content: Ka lympung ialehkai Cricket jong ka 2nd bad ka 3rd Division bad la pynlong da ka Shillong Cricket Association da ka jingiatrei lang bad ka Samkhamti ka la poi noh sha kaba kut ha ka sngi Thohdieng ia kaba la pynlong ha madan Urkaliar, Shillong.Ha ka jinglehkai jong ka 2nd Division, ka kynhun ialehkai Golflink ka la pynliem noh ia ka kynhun ialehkai Metalica bad da kane ka jingjop ka Golflink ka la iohrung sha ka lympung ialehkai First Division. Katba ha ka jinglehkai jong ka 3rd Division ka Lawsohtun ka la pynliem noh ia ka Metalica Rising bad da kane ka jingjop ka Lawsohtun mynta ka la kiew sha ka kyrdan ialehkai jong ka 2nd Division.Ha kane ka sngi, ka sakhi lang da u Bah Samborlang Diengdoh uba la long kum u Kongsan, u Secretary jong ka Meghalaya Cricket Association Bah Gideon Kharkangor kum u Symbud Kongsan, u MDC jong ka Laban u Bah Mitchel Wankhar uba la long kum u kongsan ba kyrpang, ki nongpyniaid jong ka Shillong Cricket Association ba kynthup ia u President u Bah Peter MacDonald Kharsawian, u General Secretary Bah Banri kharmalki, u Vice President u Amit Singhania bad kiwei kiwei.La sam ruh ia ka khusnam Player of the match ha ka 3rd division ba la ioh da u samla Hilar Thabah na ka Lawsohtun bad ia ka khusnam Player of the series la ioh rah da u samla Greatestful Lyngkhoi na ka Lawsohtun.Ha ka 2nd division, ia ka khusnam player of the match la iohrah da u Asif na ka Golflink bad ia ka khusnam player of the series la iohrah da u Pritam Singh na ka Golflink.
title: JOP KA GOLFLINK BAD KA LAWSOHTUN HA KA 2ND BAD 3RD DIVISION KA SCL

content: Ki nongïalam jong ka Education Cell ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la ïakynduh ïa u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u Rakkam A. Sangam ban pynsngew halor ka jingpynslem jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban pyllait ïa ka baibam lane ka Scholarship jong ki samla pule na ka bynta u snem 2022-2023.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Asst Education Secretary ka KSU u samla Richest Malngiang u la ïathuh ba kane ka jingpynsngew jong ka seng sha u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ka long namar ka jingïohpdiang ïa ka jingud jingnam na kiba bun ki samla pule halor ka jingpynslem jong ka Sorkar ban pyllait ïa ka Scholarship bad don ruh kiba ym pat ïoh ïa ka Scholarship haduh kine ki sngi.Ka jingbym ïoh jong ki samla pule ïa ka Scholarship na ka bynta ka shisnem ka la buh jingeh ïa ki bad khamtam eh na ka bynta ki samla pule kiba wan na ki longïing kiba kham duna ha ka ïoh ka kot namarba ka ladei ruh ka por ba ki hap ban siew ïa ka bai klas na ka bynta u snem 2024.Na ka liang jong u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u la kular ban shimkhia bad ban pynbeit mardor ïa kane ka kam bad u la kyntu ba ki samla pule ki bym pat ïoh ïa ka Scholarship ki dei ban leit mih sha ka ophis treikam jong u Director ka tnat Higher & Technical Education ïohba ka don ka jingthud na ka liang jong ka ophis.
title: PYNSNGEW KA KSU SHA KA SORKAR BYM ÏOH SCHOLARSHIP KI SAMLA PULE JIN SHISNEM

content: : Ka Khasi  Students Union (KSU) Bangalore Unit ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynsngew ha u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla uba peit ïa ka General Administration Department u Rakkam A. Sangma halor ka jingbym don ka Meghalaya House ha ka nongbah Bangalore, Karnataka namar kaba la buh jingeh haduh katta katta khamtam ïa ki samla pule bad ïa ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya kiba leit sha ka Jylla Karnataka na ka bynta ki kam ki duk.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u General Secretary barim ka KSU Bangalore Unit u samla Amos Syiemlieh u la ïathuh ruh ba ka don ka jingdkoh ha ki snem baladep namar ka jingbym ai jaka jong ka Sorkar Karnataka ban shna ïa ka Meghalaya House hynrei da ka jingïai buddien jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya shen yn sa shna noh ïa ka Meghalaya House bad ong ruh ba ka Sorkar ka la khot ruh ka Expression of Interest (EOI) khnang ban pynsdang noh ïa kane ka ing basa ha ka nongbah Bengalore.“Ngi ngeit skhem lyngba ka jingdon jong ka Meghalaya House ha Bengalore kan ai jingmyntoi ïa ki samla kiba pule bad kiba trei sha ka jylla Karnataka bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki paidbah kiba leit wad jingsumar,” la ong u Samla Amos.Ka seng ka la pynsngew ruh hakhmat u Myntri ha kaba ïadei bad ki Agency kiba treikam hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya kiba ju wad ïa ki khynnah Khasi ban leit pule shabar ka jylla.“Bun hi na ki Agency haba ki ai Counselling na Shillong ki leh da kawei ka rukom hynrei ynda ki khynnah Khasi ki la poi sha Bangalore ka long pat da kumwei ha kaba bun ki khep ki khynnah Khasi ki ïakynduh jingeh bha halor kane,” ula ong.U la ïathuh ba u Rakkam A. Sangma uba peit ruh ruh ïa ka tnat Pule Puthi u la kular ban shimkhia ban buh da ki kyndon kiba biang ïa kino kino ki Agency kiba shimti ban phah ïa ki khynnah Khasi ban leit pule sha bar ka jylla nangne shakhmat.
title: BYM DON KA MEGHALAYA HOUSE HA BANGALORE KYNDUH MAWSIANG KI PAID MEGHALAYA

content: Ka Indira Gandhi Cultural Centre (IGCC) ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka High Commission ka ri India sha Bangladesh lem bad ka tnad Arts and Culture jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Bangladesh Shilkapala Academy (BSA), Dhaka ki la pynlong ia ka Cultural Programme kum shi bynta ban ai burom ia u Syiem Tirot Sing u Khlawait ka ri Khasi.Kane ka jingaiburom ia u Syiem Tirot Sing ka long hadien ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la trei shitom ban pynieng ia u durmot jong une u Syiem ka Hima Nongkhlaw ha phyllaw jong ka Indira Gandhi Cultural Centre (IGCC), Dhaka ia uba la plie paidbah da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar hynnin ka sngi Thohdieng.Ia ka Cultural Programme la pynlong ha Jatiya Natyashala Milanayatan, Bangladesh Shilpakala cademy, Shegun Bagicha, Dhaka ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi lang da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, ki Myntri Sorkar ba kynthup ia u Bah Paul Lyngdoh bad ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh, u High Commisisoner ka India u Pranay Verma, ki MDC ka KHADC, ki Syiem bad ki Syiem Khynnah jong ka Hima Nongkhlaw, Hima Bhowal bad Hima Khyrim bad kiwei kiwei.
title: AI BUROM KA SORKAR MEGHALAYA ÏA U SYIEM TIROT SING HA DHAKA DA KI JINGRWAI IEID RI

content: Uwei u Pulit Unarmed Branch Sub Inspector ka Ri Bhoi District u Amit Sinha u la khlad noh ha step sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka shnong Gurgoan, Delhi na ka jingiatakhuh kali.U Amit Sinha u leit ia ka kam ophis sha Delhi bad kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih ka la wan jia katba u dang leit ryngkat lang bad u paralok jong u, u Digvijay Singh.Katkum ka ejahar ba la ujor da u Digvijay Singh u la iathuh ba ki la mih ban leit bam jingbam ha Sector 58 Gurgaon bad katba ki dang wan phai da ka kali ia kaba la niah da u Digvijay Singh kynsan kynsan kawei ka kali ka la tynrah ia ka kali kaba ki shong na ki bynta ba shadien kat haduh ba u Amit Sinha u la mynsaw jur.Ia u Amit Sinha la pynbna ba u la khladnoh da u Medical Officer ka Sanar International Hospital, Gurgaon bad u Digvijay Singh ruh u la mynsaw bad u la shah sumar ha kane hi ka Hospital.
title: KHLAD U SUB-INSPECTOR KA RIBHOI HA DELHI BA SHAH TYNRAH KALI

content: Ki rangialehkai phutbol jong ka jylla Meghalaya kin sa mih na la iing lashai ka sngi U Blei ban leit iashim bynta ha ka lympung ialehkai phutbol jong ka 77th Santosh Trophy ka ban long ha nongbah Itanagar, Arunachal Pradesh.Shwa ba kane ka kynhun kan mih na la iing, la pynlong ia ka jingialang kitbok kitrwiang ha kaba la don lang u Secretary jong ka Meghalaya Football Association u bah Sunesh Syiem, ki dkhot jong ka Senior Cell, u Coah lem bad ki rang ialehkai.Ha kane ka kynti, kin don 12 tylli ki kynhun ialehkai na ki jylla ki ban iaknieh ia ka nam lahduh ha ka 77Santosh Trophy bad ka Meghalaya kaba la ngat ha ka Group-A kaba kynthup ia ka Arunachal Pradesh, Goa, Assam, Services, bad ka Kerala.Ka Meghalaya kan iakhun nyngkong eh ia ka Services ha ka 21 tarik, Rymphang, bud pat sa ka jingiakhun pyrshah ia ka Assam ha ka 23 tarik Rymphang, ia ka Kerela ha ka 25 tarik Rympahng, ia ka Goa ha  ka 28 tarik Rymphang bad ia ka Arunachal Pradesh ha ka 1 tarik Lber, 2024.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ba kane ka kynhun ialehkai na ka jylla Meghalaya kaba la ioh rung  sha ka phainal jong ka Santosh Trophy kaba la long ha u snem 2023.Ha ka jingiakren bad u Bah Sunesh u pynpaw ba 80 na ka 100 ki rangialekai ki dei kiba la don bynta  bad ka kynhun kaba la rung shaduh ka phainal jong kane ka lympung ialehkai ha u snem ba ladep bad nalor kata, la pynrung shuh shuh sa ia ki katto katne ki samla ialehkai ha kane ka kynhun.Ki rangialehkai ka Meghalaya ki long u Siwel Rymbai, Daraphun Talang, Lionel Daryl Rymmei kiba dei ki Goalkeeper, Wanboklang Lyngkhoi, Donborlang Nongkynrih, Banskhemlang Mawlong, Brolington Warlarpih, Over Kindness L. Mawnai, Dawan Plielad Myrchiang, Lukas Syngkli kiba dei ki Defender, u Baby Sunday Marngar, Kitboklang Pale, Nekilson Bina, Damonlang Pathaw, Dameki Khongstia, Dawanchaw Carlos Challam, Robert Khongjoh, Baiaikara Swer kum ki Midfielder, u Sheen Stevenson Sohktung, Nelson Rymbai, Shaiborlang Kharpan, Chesterpaul Lyngdoh kum ki Forward.Ki Coach ki kynthup ia u Bah Khlaiñpyrkhat Syiemlieh kum u Head Coach, u Playerson Syiemlieh, Asst. Coach, Freddy Kharpran Mananger, Lucky Mary Marbaniang Physiotherapist.
title: LASHAI YN MIH KI RANGIALEHKAI PHUTBOL NA MEGHALAYA BAN ÏASHIM BYNTA HA KA 77th SANTOSH TROPHY

content: Ka Kong Simi Khongtiang kaba dei ka nongshna phlim na kane ka jylla Meghalaya ka la jop ia ka khusnam kum ka “Best Director” na ka bynta ka phlim ‘Ka Chithi’ ha ka Prag Cine Awards, 2024, North East India.Ia ka Prag Cine Awards, 2024, North East India la pynlong ha nongbah Jorhat, Assam ha ka sngi Thohdieng ha kaba la iashim bynta da ki nongpynmih phlim, ki nongshna phlim, ki tyngshop bad ki puron na kylleng ki jylla jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi.Ia ka phlim “Ka Chithi” kaba dei ha ka ktien Pnar la jied ha ki lai bynta, kata, ha ka “Best Film”, “Best Actor (Female)” bad “Best Director.”Ka Kong Simi Khongtiang, ka la pynpaw ba kane ka dei ka jingkmen bakhraw ia ka kynhun jong ka kynhun ka phlim ‘Ka Chithi.”  Ka la ong ruh ba ki dang don shibun ki phlim ba la shna na ki jylla ka thain Shatei Lammihngi kiba la shah jied na ka bynta kane ka khusnam.Kum ka Director, kane ka dei ka sien baar ba ka la shah jied ban ioh pdiang ia kane ka khusnam hynrei ha u snem 2018 kam shym la jop satia hynrei ha kane ka kynti ba mynta ka la ioh ia ka jingjop da kaba ioh khur ia ka khusnam.
title: ÏOHNAM BEST DIRECTOR KA KONG SIMI KHONGTIANG HA KA PRAG CINE AWARDS

content: Ka Youth Hostels Association of India (YHAI) Meghalaya State Branch ka la pynkup burom ïa u Chairman u Bah E.D. Nongsiang halor ka jingshah jied kum u National Vice President jong ka YHAI, India.Ïa ka jingïalang pynkup burom la pynlong da ka Meghalaya State Branch ryngkat bad ka East Khasi Hills District Unit, Mairang Adhoc Unit  bad ka Ri Bhoi District Adhoc Unit.Ha kane ka sngi, la ai jingkren da u State President jong ka YHAI Meghalaya Branch u Bah S.L. Rapthap, kynthup ruh u Vice President Babu Kular Khongjirem ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u Vice President ka YHAI, Meghalaya Bah A.M. Shadap, u Convenor ka Mairang Unit Bah Fabian Syiem, bad u Convenor ka Ribhoi Unit Bah Saibor Syiem, u State Secy ka YHAI Meghalaya, u Debashish Chakrabarty bad kiwei kiwei.
title: SHAH JIED U BAH BAH ED NONGSIANG KUM U VICE PRESIDENT KA YHAI, INDIA

content: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Sniawbhalang Dhar ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki arngut ki Myntri ka Sorkar ba kynthup ia u Bah Paul Lyngdoh bad ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, lem bad u Executive Member ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) Bah Teiborlang Pathaw, u Bah Hamletson Dohling bad u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnad Arts and Culture Bah Fedrick Kharkongorha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la leit jngoh ia ka along ba la set ia u Syiem Tirot Sing ha Dhaka, Bangladesh da ka Sorkar Bilat.U Syiem Tirot Sing u la iap ha Byndi ha Dhakha ha ka 17 tarik, Naitung, 1835 hadien ba la kem ia u da ki shipai ka Sorkar Bilat namar ka jingieng pyrshah ia ka Sorkar ban pynher krad na ka Hima Nongkhlaw.Kane ka along kaba la set ia u Syiem Tirot Sing, mynta la tip kyrteng ia ka, kum ka Dhaka Central Jail.La synran lang ia ki Myntri da ki Pulit jong ka Dhaka nalor kiwei de ki riew rangbah ki la leit lang sha Dhaka ha ka jingplie ia u durmot jong u Syiem Tirot Sing ha phyllaw jong ka Indira Gandhi Cultural Centre (IGCC).
title: LEIT JNGOH KI MYNTRI ÏA KA ALONG BA LA SET ÏA U SYIEM TIROT SING HA DHAKA

content: Watla shnong Mawsynram ka dei ka shnong kaba la bna nam ha ka jingjur slap ha ka pyrthei hynrei ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewlyngngoh ban tip ba ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki hap ban mad ïa ka jingkyrduh um.Ïa kane la pyntip da u Bah Banshai Marbaniang uba long u nongtrei mon sngewbha ha  u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.“Ki paidbah ka shnong Mawsynram ki la ïam bad ki lynñiar namar ka jingkyrduh um kaba la ktah kat haduh ba ki hap ban rah ïa la ka jong ka pliangja sha wah ban leit sait.  Ynda nga la shem bad lap da la ki jong ki khmat ba la hap ban shu thied ïa ka umbam umdih na kiwei pat ki jaka. Kane ka la buh jingeh bad ka la ktah khamtam ïa ki paidbah ki baduk ba kyrduh haduh ba kim lah shuh ban thied ïa ka umbam umdih,” la ong u Bah Marbaniang.“Kiba bun na ki paidbah ki la pyrshang ban thied ïa ka um ha ka dor kaba rem da kaba la sakhi ba ki nongtong um kiba wanrah ïa ka umbam umdih ki hap ban leit kit na jngai haduh ba ka um ka shongdor kumba T. 1,000” u la ong.“Ha kine ki sngi nga la leit ban pynsngew ha u Executive Engineer (EE) kumjuh ruh ha u SDO ba dei khmih ïa ka thaiñ Mawsynram lyngba ka ka tnat Public Health Engineering (PHE) ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingeh kaba ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki ïakynduh khamtam ha kum kane ka aiom tlang kaba ktah jur ïa ki longiing longsem ki baduk bakyrduh,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ba ka jingujor ha ka tnat PHE ka long halor kaei ka daw kaba la wanrah jingeh ïa ki paidbah jong ka thain ban kyrduh um haba ka pyrthei kylleng sawdong ka tip bad sakhi ïa ka shnong Mawsynram kum ka shnong ba jur slap ha pyrthei.“Nga la kylli halor ka jingwan jong ka Jal Jeevan Mission ba balei ka pynlong haduh katne, wat la pyntyllun ïa ki kam ban trei?,” u la buh jingkylli.“Ka jubab na ka tnat PHE ka long namarba dang duna palat ki jaka pynlang um kum ki tyllong umbam umdih ban ïoh hapoh ka shnong Mawsynram kaba la pynlong haduh ban wanrah ïa ka jingkyrduh um.  Nalorkata, u Engineer u la ong, hapoh ka shnong Mawsynram ym shym la ïohlad lyngba ka JJM ban shna ïa ki tyllong um ne ki jaka ban ring um hynrei la thaw thymmai tang ki Top Um ban shu rung um sha ki thliew iing jong ki briew,” la ïathuh u Bah Marbaniang.U la ïathuh ruh ba u Engineer bad u SDO ka tnat PHE ki la kular ba kin pyrshang ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti kumno ban wad ïa ki tyllong um na ka bynta ban pynpoi ïa ka um sha ka shnong.“Nga ladep ban pynsngew teng sha ka Dorbar Shnong Mawsynram halor ka jingeh kaba ki paidbah ki ïakynduh haduh wat tang ban ïoh pyndonkam noh sa tang ar ne lai tylli ki wah Shnong ban leitsum leitsait, hynrei kumba nga sakhi haduh kat kine ki sngi ba mynta ka dang ïai sah kumjuh khlem da shimkhia eiei ruh em lyngba ka shnong namarba la bun ki riewsaiñ pyrthei kiba la pynlong noh kum ka tnat Khaii ïa ka rukom synshar paidbah,” u la ong bad bynrap, “nga la pynsngew ruh ïa kane sha ka skhor jong u MLA Bah Olan Sing Suiñ bad ha u MDC Bah Alvin K.
