Sawkmie ba kin shimkhia da kaba wad ïa ki lad ki lynti kumno ban weng ïa ka jingeh jongki paidbah jong ka Constituency”.
title: KYRDUH UM KA MAWSYNRAM WATLA KA DEI KA SHNONG BA JUR SLAP TAM HA KA PYRTHEI

content: Kum ka kynhun kaba sngewkhia halor ka jinghiar ka pule puthi khamtam haba lap ba kawei na ki daw ka long ka jingeh ha ka ïoh ka kot ki kmie ki kpa kaba poi sha u pud ba ki khun ki hap ban sangeh pule noh shiteng por, ka Khasi Students Union Umrynjah Unit ka la shim da ka sienjam ban leh eiei khyndiat halor kane ka bynta.Ka seng ka la leit ban ai jingïarap ïa ki khynnah kiba wan na ki longiing ba duna ka ïoh ka kot kiba sah ha ka shnong Umjynjah kaba dang hap ha Mawlai Constituency da ka jingsakhi lang jong ki nongïalam ka KSU Mawlai Circle, ka KSU Umrynjah Unit.  La sam da ki kopi bad ki tiar ban pyndonkam ha skul sha ki 60 ngut ki khynnah ha ka shnong Umrynjah.Ki nongïalam ka seng ki la bynniaw halor ka jingbym lah jong ka Sorkar ban pynbiang ki tiar skul ïa ki khynnah bad ka seng kam banse ban noh synñiang watla la i long i barit.Ka KSU ka ngeit skhem ruh ba kine ki khynnah kiba ïoh ïa kine ki jingïarap kin ym iehnoh ïa ki jingpule hynrei ka kyrmen ba kin minot thop khnang ba lashai kin long ki khlur ba tyngshaiñ jong ka jaidbynriew.Lyngba kane ka sienjam kaba rit, ka KSU ka kyrmen ruh ba ha kawei ka sngi yn sa lah ban rat dyngkhong ïa ka jingiehnoh shiteng por ïa ka jingpule, ong u kyrwoh ba la pyllait da u Publicity Secretary ka KSU Mawlai Circle samla Gary Mawlieh.
title: SHWA BAN SDANG SKUL, SYNÑIANG KA KSU ÏA KI KHYNNAH KA UMRYNJAH DA KI KOPI

content: : Ki nongrep ka War Jaiñtia kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Seng Nongrep War Jaiñtia, Amlarem, West Jaiñtia Hills dang shen ki la pynsngew sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti halor ka jinghiar dor jong ki mar rep kaba la buh jingeh haduh katta katta ïa ki nongrep kiba sah ha thaiñ Amlarem kaba don markhap bad ka ri Bangladesh.Ha ka dorkhas ba la aiti sha u Myntri Rangbah ba la soi da u President Bah Kolmen Pohshna bad u Secretary Bah Sumer Syngkor, ki la pynpaw ba ki mar rep ba ki paidbah ka War Jaiñtia ki rep bha ïa u synshar, u kwai, u tympew hynrei mynta ki ïakynduh mawsiang na ka daw ka jinghiar dor kynsan jong kine ki mar rep ha iew ha hat kat haduh ba ki nongrep ki la ïakynduh jingeh ban pyndap ïa ka iing ka sem.“Ngi kyntu ïa phi ban peit lem ïa kine ki jingeh jong ki nongrep bad ban buh ïa ka dor die kaba kham heh haba die ïa u synsar, u kwai bad u tympew ha iew ha hat kiba don hapoh u pud  u sam jong ka thaiñ Amlarem bad sha kiwei kiwei ki jaka,” ong kine ki nongïalam ka seng ki nongrep.“Ki paidbah ka ri War Jaiñtia, kumba 80 na ka 100 ki dei ki nongrep kiba ju rep bha tang ïa u synsar, kwai bad u tympew naduh ki por hyndai bad haduh mynta ki dang shaniah beit ha kine ki mar rep na ka bynta ka kam kamai jakpoh ban pyndap ïa la ka ing ka sem,” la bynrap ka seng.Shuh shuh ka Seng ka la pynsngew ha u Myntri Rangbah ba un kyntu ïa ka tnat Forest kaba buh ïa ka khyrdop khrong khajna ha ka shnong Mookyndur ba kan ym oh khajna na ki kali kiba kit ïa ki mar rep na War Jaiñtia ban wan kit sha nongbah Shillong bad kumjuh ruh ïa ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) namarba ka jingsiew khajna ki nongrep lyngba kine ki khyrdop ka ktah ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki nongrep.
title: PYNSNGEW KI NONGREP KA WAR JAIÑTIA HA U MYNTRI RANGBAH BA HIAR DOR KI MAR REP

content: Kum shibynta ban pynpaw pyrthei ia ka jingitynnad jong ka jaka jngohkai pyrthei ia kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka “Dom Marwein” kaba don ha ki thain pariong Eastern West Khasi Hill District bad kum shibynta ban kyntiew iaka sap ka phong jong ki khun Samla ka dong ka thain ka “Western Khasi Hala Ki Sap Ban Sei” haka 17 tarik u Rymphang 2024 kala pynlong iaka ka W.E.S Festival ha katei ka jaka kaba itynnad ha kaba u bah Robert June Kharjahrin uba dei u kyrtong MP ka RDA na Shillong Parliamentary Seat ula wan ban long kum u kongsan.U bah Kharjahrin haba ai jingkren kum u kongsan ula pynpaw iaka jingiaroh iaka jingiohijngai ka ‘Western Khasi Hala Ki Sap Ban Sei’ ban pynlong ia kane ka festival kaba lada nang ban tyngkai bad pynwandur iaka jingitynnad jong kane ka jaka kan long kum ka pliang ja ka ban iarap ia shibun bah ki longing longsem ha kaban kyntiew iaka ioh ka kot ha ki liang baroh. U ong ruh ba ka jingiohi jngai ka organization ban plie lad plie lynti bad ban ai iaka rynsan iaki khun samla ba kin pynpaw iaka sap kaba ki don bad ban kyntiew iaka sap ka phong ka jongki ka long shisha kaba don kam ha kane ka juk kaba mynta kaba lada ki khun samla ki trei shitom bad ki pyndonkam hok iaka sap kaba ki don ym tang ba ki lah ban bsa iaka ing ka sem hynrei kin rah ruh iaka burom bad ka nam jong ka jaitbynriew.U la ong lada un jop iaka election MP u kular ban ia don ryngkat bad ki paidbah bad ban ai mynsiem iaki da kaba ai iaka kti ka mon ka kti ka diang ban pynkiew iaka kam jongkai pyrthei haki thain nongkyndong bad ban kyntiew iaka sap ka phong kaba ki khun samla ki don kaba dei ruh kawei naki lad ban rat diengkhong iaka jingduk tasam haka ri bad ka jiatbynriew.U la ban ruh da kaba ong, ba ka por kaba ngi im mynta ka dei ka por ba ngin ia ai kti ym shuh ka por ba ngin ia kdew kti, ka por ba ngin iakren iaki kam daka jingkitklieh ym da ka jingshitkhlieh. U la ong ruh baka dei kaba por ba ngin pyrkhat sani kumno ban pynbha iaka ri bad ka jaitbynriew bad kam dei shuh ka por ban ia pynibor mano ba kham tbit ban iaka wang ktieh bad ka dei ka por ba ngin hap ban ia tylli para mangi ban kyrshan lang ia kiei kiei kiba bha.U la ong ba ka jaitbynriew haki por mynshwa haba ki briew ki kham ioh kham kot ki kynnoh iaki ba ki dei ki nongri tlen bad mynta pat haba ki briew ki kham ioh kham kot ki kynnoh iaki ba ki dei nong bamsap, ula ong ka por kala dei ba ngin hap ban ai mynisem iaki para briew haba ki trei shitom bad leh iaka babha bad lada ngim ai mynsiem mano pat ban kitkhieh iaka ri bad ka jaitbynriew. U la ong ruh lada kum ka jaitbynriew ka kwah ban kyntiew iaka sap ka phong, ban kyntiew iaka roi ka par bad ka jingiada kaba pura iaka ri bad ka jaitbynriew ka por kala dei ban iawan lang ban ia tylli kawei bad ban ia ai iaka kti ka diang ka kti ka mon bad ban ia trei shitrhem daka jingkitklieh naka bynta ban iada iaka ri bad ka jaitbynriew.
title: KANE KA DEI KA POR BA NGIN IAKREN IA KI KAM DA KA JINGKITKLIEH YM DA KA JINGSHITKHLIEH: ROBERT JUNE KHARJAHRIN

content: U National President jong ka National People’s Party (NPP) uba dei ruh u Myntri Rangbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya u Conrad K Sangma ryngkat bad u State President u Bah Prestone Tynsong ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la pdiang burom ia ki ar ngut ki MDC ka Congress sha ka seng NPP bad ia u MDC barim jong ka Sohra u Bah Donevan K. Wanlang.Ki arngut ki MDC ki kynthup ia u MDC jong ka Congress na Mawkyrwat u Bah Carnes Sohshang bad uwei pat u dei u MDC ka Congress na Mairang u Bah Batskhem Ryntathiang,Da ka jingpyniasoh jong kine ki arngut ki MDC ka Congress ka NPP kaba ialam ia ka Executive Committee ka la nang kiew ha ka jingbunpaid ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC).Ka jingpynïasoh jong kine ki lai ngut sha ka NPP ka long ruh kum shi bynta ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka NPP na bynta ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long shen ha kine ki khyndiat bnai bad kumjuh ruh na bynta ka elekshon MDC kaba la khmih lynti ba kan long la kumno kumno ha ki bnai bakhatduh jong une u snem.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang da ki MLA jong ka NPP ba kynthup lang ruh ia ki MDC ka KHADC kiba dei ruh na ka party NPP.
title: STAIT KA CONGRESS HA KHADC BA PYNÏASOH KI MDC SHA KA NPP

content: Tang shu wan poi ka met, ki bahaing hasem ki la leh burom khatduh ia ka met ba dang sah jong u Amit Sinha u Pulit Sub Inspector uba la duhei ia la ka jong ka jingim ha ka jingaksiden kali kaba la jia ha ka shnong Gurgaon, Haryana ha ka 17 tarik mynta u bnai.U Amit Sinha u la ngat ha kane ka jingjia basngewsih katba u dang leit donkam sha Delhi na ka bynta ki kam ophis ba la bynshet da ka tnad Pulit ka jylla.Hadien ba ka met jong u ka la wan poi ha ka step sngi u Blei, ki bahaing hasem bad ki lok ki jor ki la leh burom khatduh ïa ka met ba dangsah ha ka shnong Dakhingoan, Kahilipara, Guwhati bad hadien ba la pyndep ia ka jinglehniam la rah ban leit onthang ïa ka met sha ka jaka lehniam thang metiap briew kaba don ha Kamakya, Assam.Ha kane ka jingleh burom ïa ka met, la donlang da u Deputy Commissioner jong ka Ribhoi District u Arpit Upadhaya, u Superintendent of Police u Jagpal Singh Dhanao, u SP barim ka Ri Bhoi u Giri Prasadbad kynthup ruh kiwei kiwei ki heh ophisar pulit kiba la sakhi ia ka jingleh burom Salami da ka tnat Pulit Ribhoi.
title: WAN POI KA MET U SI AMIT SINHA, LEH BUROM KHATDUH KI BAHAÏING

content: U State Vice President jong ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit u Bah Wankitbok Pohshna ha ka sngi Balang u la ong ba ka BJP kam dei satia ka NPP.‘Dang shen ngi la iohi ha ki kotkhubor bad iohsngew sharum shaneng ba ka BJP bad ka NPP ki dei kijuh. Kane ka jingpyniasriem ia ka BJP bad ka NPP ka long tang ka jingpynthame ban ialam bakla ia ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya,” ong u Bah Pohshna ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Baroh ki tip ba ka BJP ka dei ka National Party ba la seng hadien jong ka Jan Sangha ha ka 4 tarik u Iaiong 1980 bad ka nongrim jong ka seng ka dei halor ka ktien Intergral Humanism kaba la wanlam da u khrawpyrkhat u Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhaya.  Ka dei ka party kaba burom ia ka kolshor jong ka ri, kaba phaikhmat sha ki jingdonkam ban kyntiew ia ki jylla katkum ka rukom im jong ki nongshong shnong bad kaba lamkhmat ban kyntiew ia ka roi ka par jong ka ri. Na ka bynta ka BJP ka ri ka wan hakhmat duh bad ka trei borbah ban ai jingmyntoi ia ki paidbah,” u la ong.“Lah ban sakhi ia kita baroh lyngba ki skhim ba ka sorkar BJP ka la wanlam sha ki paidbah kum ka Ujjala, Vishwakarma, PMAY, Atal Pension Yojana, Jan Dhan Yojana, Ayushman Bharat, Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana, Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana bad kiwei kiwei. Kino kita kiwei ki party kiba la lah ban wanrah ia ki jingmyntoi shibun na ka bynta ki paidbah? Ym don wat ka NPP ruh kan nym lah? Ong u Bah Pohshna.“Ka BJP mynta ka synshar ha ki 18 tylli ki jylla ha ka ri bad ia ka Sorkar Kmie ruh la synshar da ka BJP bad ban shu nujor ka NPP tang ha kane ka thain Shatei Lam mihngi ruh kam pat da don kyrteng klet noh sha kiwei ki jylla shabar ka thain. Ka NPP ka dei kaba la mih na ka NCP kaba la pait na ka seng Congress ha kito ki snem,” u la ong.“Da kaba ong ba ka BJP ka dei ka NPP, ki klet ba ka pyrthei baroh ka tip ba u President rangbah ka BJP dei u Jaggat Prakash Nadda bad u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri dei u Narendra Modi bad ym don uwei ruh u dkhot ka NPP uba lah ban tuklar ha ki kam pohiing jong ka BJP. Ka NPP ka dei tang ka dkhot ha ka NDA ka Sorkar Synrop ba la thaw ha ka por ba la long Myntri Rangbahduh u Atal Bihari Vajpayee ba la khladnoh. Ha kane ha jylla, ka BJP ka shu ai jingkyrshan ia ka Sorkar Synrop ba la lamkhmat da ka NPP kumba leh lang kiwei,” la pynshai u State President.“Kaei kaba pyniapher ia ka BJP na kiwei pat ki party dei ba ka iengskhem ha ka nongrim ban pyrshah ia ka bamsap, ka shahliang bad ban kyntiew ia kawei ka longing ha ka sain hima sima (dynastic politics). Ym pat don ba lah ban mih bujli ia u Narendra Modi bad um salia iano iano kiba kren pyrshah bad kam pher la ki dei na ka jylla ne na kiwei ki party,” ula ong.“Ngi iaiban ia kane kawei ba ka BJP ka iakhun hi marwei ha ki elekshon bad kam ju donkam ban iasynroplang bad kiwei. Ka party ka la long kaba la khreh lypa ban wan biang sha ka bor synshar ha ka ri ynda la dep ka elekshon MP bad hadien ka jingwanphai na ka lympung iakynduhlang jong ka party kaba dang shu dep shen ha nongbah New Delhi ka BJP Meghalaya ka la nang iaid shakhmat ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon MP da kaba pynkhlain ia ki tnat hangne ha jylla bad ka la sdang ban pyntyllun ia ki prokram ‘leit sha ki shnong’ bad ‘kynduh ia ki paidbah’ ki ban long ki lad ban kynduh ia ki nongthep vote ban pynshai halor ki kam jong ka seng hapoh ka jingialam jong u president ka seng u Rikman Momin,” u la ong.U la ong ruh ba katkum ka rukom ka Central Parliamentary Board jong ka party kan sa ai ia ka rai khatduh halor ki kyrtong ki ban ioh ia ka tiket jong ka party na ka bynta ka Shillong bad Tura.
title: KA BJP KAM DEI KA NPP, ONG U STATE VICE PRESIDENT KA BJP MEGHALAYA

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Balang u la wanrah ia ka mang tyngka kaba dun T 2,029 klur na ka bynta u snem 2024-25 bad pynbna ruh ia ka ‘Mission 10’, kum ka thong ban pynlong ia ka Jylla Meghalaya kaba kynjoh sha ka ioh kot kaba USD 10 Billion shwa u snem 2028.Haba kren halor ka mang tyngka, u Sangma uba peit ruh ia ka tnat Pla Tyngka, u la ong ba ka jingioh lum pisa na ka bynta u snem 2024-25 ka long T. 27,072 klur, ha kaba ka jingioh lum khajna la khein antad ba kan long T. 23,515 klur bad ka jingioh pisa na kaba shim ram ka long T. 3,557  klur.  Lait noh na kaba shim kylliang kaba kot T.3,527 klur, ka jingioh lum pisa la khmihlynti ba kan  kot T. 23,545 klur.U la iathuh ruh ba ka jingpynlut pisa kan kot T. 27,072 klur, ha kaba ka jingpynlut na kaba ioh lum khajna la khein antad ba kan kot T. 19,653 klur bad ka jingpynlut na ka pisa ba la shim ram kan long kumba T.7,419 klur.  Laitnoh ia ka jingpynphai ia ka pisa ba la shim ram kaba kot T. 1,498 crore, ka jingpynlut pisa baroh kan kot haduh T. 25,574 klur.Ka jingsiew ia ka sut na ka bynta u snem 2024-25 la khein antad ba kan kot T. 1,236 klur bad ka jingsiew ia ka baibam tymmen ne ka penshon kan kot T. 1,865 klur.“Namarkata, nga wanrah ia ka mang tyngka na ka bynta u snem mang tyngka 2024-25 kaba duna T. 2,029 klur, kaba long kumba 3.83 percent jongk a GSDP,” la ong u Sangma haba wanrah ia ka mang tyngka hapoh ka Assembly.“Nga kwah ba baroh ki dkhot jong kane ka ing bad ia baroh ki nongshong shnong ba kin kynmaw ia kane ka mang tyngka kum ka ‘Mission 10’, ka thong ban kynjoh sha ka jingphaikhmat ka jylla ban kiew ka ioh ka kot kaba USD 10 billion lyngba ki 10 tylli ki lad ki kabu bad bad 10 ki jingkular. Ka jingpyndep ia ka ‘Mission 10’ ha u snem 2028 kan iatakhuh bad ki 10 snem ka jingtreikam jong ka Sorkar MDA,” u la bynrap.
title: WANRAH U MYNTRI RANGBAH ÏA KA MANG TYNGKA BA DUNA T. 2,029 KLUR HA ASSEMBLY

content: U Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng ba khmih ïa ka Health and Family Welfare, u Dr Mansukh Mandaviya da ka ktien u la plie ïa ka “Regional Consultative Workshop on Research Priority for Providing Accessible and Affordable Healthcare for the Northeastern States of India” ha Nongbah Shillong ha ka sngi Balang.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang u Dr Mandaviya  u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka kwah ban pynthikna ba baroh manla uwei pa uwei kin lah ban ïoh ïa ki lad sumar kiba ïa ryngkat khlem kano kano ka jingpynïapher hapdeng uba riewspah bad uba tlot ha ka ïoh ka kot.Halor ka jingangnud jong ka sorkar pdeng na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi u Dr Mandaviya u la ong, “ha kine ki 10 snem ba la leit, la don ki jingpyrshang ban wanrah ïa ka sha ka rynsan kaba ïa ryngkatlang hapoh ka ri da kaba pynïasoh ha baroh ki liang la ka dei ha ka ïoh ka kot, ka Koit ka Khiah ki surok, lyngba ka rel, ki I-Ways, ki lad lyngba ka wah bad ki Ropeway nalor kiwei pat. Ha ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ha ka ri la ïohi ïa ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi ba ka la sdang ban ïohi ïa ka roi ka san kum ka engine  jong ka ri India. U la ong ba ki lad sumar mynta ki la lah ban don bad ïoh ha kane ka thaiñ baroh kawei.U Myntri ka sorkar Pdeng u la ïathuh ba palat 31 klur ki briew ki la ïoh ïa ki Ayushman card ban ïoh ki lad sumar ha ki hospital ha kaba ïa ki longïing ki la ïoh ka lad sumar khlem siew eiei haduh T. 5 lak kaba la ai ha ka shisnem, 11,000 ka Jan Aushadhi Kendras ka la plie ha kaba 50-80 percent ka dor kaba tad jong ki dawai kiba la lah ban ïoh, palat 1.64 lak ka Ayushman Arogya Mandirs ki la mih, kiba la kheiñ bad pyrkhat kum ka Health Gate Keeper jong ki nongshong shnong ka India bad ka complete Health Surveillance System bad ka kawei ka jingsdang ka jingsumar kaba la pyntreikam na ki 48 ki BSL Lab”.Ha kane ka prokram na ka liang u Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng u la plie ruh ïa ka jaka ïew bad plie ïa ka Master Program on Health Economics and Technology Assessment (MPHETA) ha ka IIPH, Shillong ha ka jingïadonlang Myntri khynnah ka sorkar Pdeng ba khmih ïa ka Health and Family Welfare, ka Dr Bharati Pravin Pawar bad ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka sorkar jylla ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh.Kham hadien na ka liang ka Myntri Khynnah ka Sorkar Pdeng ba khmih ïa ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr Bharati Pravin Pawar ha ka por ka jingïasyllok bad ki lad pathai khubor ka la ong ba ka jingïohi jngai jong u Myntri Rangbah duh ka Ri u Narendra Modi, ka India ka la kiew bha la ka dei ha ka ïoh ka kot ha kine ki thaiñ ba kyndong jong ka ri.Ka la ong ba kane ka thaiñ ka la ïoh ki jingmyntoi na ki skhim kum ka  Ayushman Bharat Health and Wellness Centers bad kiwei.Na ka liang Anu Nagar, Joint Secretary, ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah halor ka Health Research, U Sampath Kumar, Principal Health Secretary, Meghalaya bad kiwei ki heh ophisar na sorkar Pdeng bad sorkar jylla ki la ïadonlang ha ka workshop kaba ar sngi ba la pynlong lang da ka Tnat Health Research, Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, ka sorkar India; Indian Institute of Public Health, Shillong bad ka Indian Council of Medical Research – Regional Medical Research Centre, Dibrugarh.
title: PLIE U MYNTRI ÏA KA WORKSHOP BA AR SNGI KA TNAT KA KOIT KA KHIAH

content: Ki shipai BSF ha ki jingleit khynra ha kiba bun ki jaka, kaba la pynlong ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai, 2024, ki shipai ba la peitngor bha ki la lah ban pynpulom ïa ki jingpyrshang ban khaïi beaiñ ha u pud u sam jong ka India bad Bangladesh ha kaba ki la ïoh ban kurup ïa ka dawai Phensedyl bad ka shini kaba la mut ban khaïi beaiñ sha Bangladesh.Hadien ka jingïoh jingtip kaba thikna ki shipai ba la pahara bha jong ka kynhun 172 Bn BSF Meghalaya ki la ïoh ban kurup haduh 200 bitor ka dawai jyrhoh ka Phensedyl katba dang thmu ban khaïi beaiñ sha Bangladesh lyngba u pud u sam ka ri na East Jaiñtia Hills Meghalaya.Ha kawei pat ka jingleit khynra ba la pynlong da ki shipai BSF Meghalaya, kumba 3 ngut ki nong India ki la shah bat ha ki BSF bad la kurup ruh na ki ïa ka shini kumba 6,800 Kilo na ki thaiñ khappud bapher bapher jong ka Meghalaya. Ïa kitei ki dawai bad shini ba la kurup la aiti sha ka ophis Custom bad ka thanat pulit ban leh ïa ki kam katkum ka aiñ.
title: KURUP DAWAI JYRHOH BAD SHINI KI SHIPAI BSF

content: Shillong, Rymphang 21: U Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A Sangma ha ka sngi Balang u la pyntip ba ki don 1241 ngut ki nongtrei hapoh ka SSA program ha Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynlut pisa T. 12.72 klur ha ka shisnem ban siew tulop.Haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Nongkrem u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit halor ka jingbym lah jong ka Sorkar ban pynkiew ïa ka tulop jong ki nongtrei hapoh ka SSA program ha Meghalaya, u Myntri  u la ïathuh ba ka pisa ba la mang na ka bynta ka tulop la siew da ka Management Monitoring Evolution and Research (MMER) jong ka Ministry of Education ka Sorkar India.“Ka mang tyngka ba la mynjur da ka Plan Approved Board jong ka Ministry of Education ka Sorkar India bad ka pisa kaba hapoh kane ruh la kynthup lang bad kiwei kiwei ki kam kum ha kaba siew ïa ka bai leit bai wan, ka jingshim wai ïa ki kali, ka jingwad bniah, ka jingpynlut na ka bynta ki jingïalang ha ophis bad kiwei kiwei ki jingpynlut nalor kaba siew tulop ïa ki nongtrei,” u la ong.U la bynrap ba ka MMER ka la ai pisa ha u snem 2022-2023 bad 2024 ka long T. 27.49 klur bad ka jingpynlut baroh ïa ka pisa haduh mynta ka long T. 12.46 klur.Ka Tnat Pule Puthi ka sngewthuh ïa u synñiang u bynhei jong ki nongtrei ka SSA bad ka jingjop jong ki prokram ka SSA ha ka Jylla. Ka jingaiti lut bad ka jingtrei shitom ka la pyntyllun sani bha ïa ka pule ka puthi ha ka jylla, la bynrap u Sangma.U la ong ba ka tnat ruh ka mynjur ban ai jingithuh ïa ka jingtrei shitom da ki nongtrei ka SSA bad ka jingpynkiew ïa ka tulop  kan long ka thong khnang ba ki nongtrei kin kham trei smat bad ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa kane ka prokram.U ïathuh ba ka jingpynkiew tulop ïa ki nongtrei jong ka SSA ka long ha u snem 2016, bad ha ka 12 tarik, Ïaiong, 2023 ka executive committee hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Chief Secretary ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la mynjur ïa ka jingtyrwa ba ïa ka jingpynkiew tulop dei ban ïasyllok shwa bad ka tnat Pla Tyngka bad kiwei kiwei de ki Society bad ki tnat sorkar.“Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, ka tnat Pule Puthi ka la pynkhreh ïa ka Matrix bad ka ladep aiti sha ka Sorkar Jylla na ka bynta ban ai jingmynjur bad ban buh ryntih ïa ka jingsiew tulop sha ki nongtrei katkum ka Meghalaya Fifth Pay Commission,” u la ong.“Da kaba pynshong nongrim na ka mang tyngka kaba shi snem la siew tulop T. 12.46 klur bad ka Revised Annual Budget ka long T. 23 crore, kaba pyni ïa ka jingïapher kaba T. 10.22 klur, ka Sorkar ruh ka la shimkhia bha ïa kane ka jingtyrwa bad dang ap ïa ka jingmynjur,” la ong u Sangma.
title: 12.72 KLUR SHI SNEM BEI KA SORKAR PDENG BAN SIEW TULOP ÏA KI NONGTREI SSA

content: Ka Iewduh, kaba long kawei na ki iew sahnam bad ka kad khaii kaba heh tam ha kane ka jylla, shen kan sa kylla long kum kawei na ki iew ba thymmai ka ban khring ruh ïa ki nongjngohkai pyrthei ynda ka Sorkar ka la mang pisa T.50 klur, la ïathuh u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K. Sangma haba ai jingkren halor ka mang tyngka ha ka sngi Balang.U la ïathuh ba ka jingshna pynbha ïa ki surok kaba jrong 10-kilometre ha dohnud ka sor Shillong bad ka jingshna pynbna ïa ki 20 tylli ki khongdong surok la mang pisa palat T. 50 klurU Sangma u la ong ruh ba ka Comprehensive Mobility Plan na ka bynta ka Shillong bad ka Tura ka dang don hapdeng ka jingpynkhreh.  Ïa ka Shillong Urban Mobility Policy ladep mynjur.  Ban bud ïa ka State’s Electric Vehicle Policy 2021, haduh 100 tylli ki Electric Bus yn sa pynïaid ha Shillong bad ha Tura.U la ong ruh ban weng ïa ka jingpynieng kali harud surok, ka Sorkar ka la pynkha 1,250 jaka ieng kali ha Shillong bad 150 tylli ha Tura, bad 100 ha Jowai ha kaba ka jinglut kan kot T. 150 klur.Shuh shuh u Sangma u la pyntip ba ki projek bapher bapher hapoh ka Shillong Smart City ki dei kiba la jan dep.  Ka Integrated Command and Control Centre bad ka Shopping Complex ha Polo ba la tei ha ka jinglut kaba T. 214 bad bad T. 100 klur yn sa pyndep noh  hapoh une u snem.
title: 50 KLUR YN MANG PISA KA SORKAR BAN PYNBHABRIEW ÏA KA ÏEWDUH

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pan jingïarap pisa na ka Sorkar Pdeng na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka Administrative City bad ïa ka Knowledge City ha New Shillong Township (NST).Haba kren ha ka jingwanrah ïa ka mang tyngka ha ka sngi Balang, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba ïa ka jaka kaba heh 232 akar la aiti na ka bynta ban shna ïa ki building ha New Shillong Administrative City, ka ban don ïa ka Administrative Complex kaba heh ha kaba yn buh lang ïa ka Secretariat building bad ïa baroh ki ophis treikam jong ki Directorate.Ka jingtei ïa kane ka Integrated Administrative complex la khmih lynti ba ka jinglut kan kot haduh T. 550 klur.“Yn tei ruh ïa ka Unity Mall ha ka jinglut kaba kot kumba T. Rs 220 klur. Ka Administrative bad shlem treikam ki Pulit yn sa tei lang ryngkat bad ki jaka ïalehkai sports, bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam ha kaba ka jinglut kan kot T. 1,200 klur,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, ka Administrative City kan long beit thik tang na ka shlem treikam jong ka Sorkar, katba ka Knowledge City yn sa tei ha Mawkhanu-Mawpdang ha ka jingheh ka jaka kaba 808 akar ba la ïoh da ka Sorkar.  Ka New Shillong Knowledge City kan long beit thik tang na ka bynta ka Sports, IT, Tourism bad ka Agro-logistic.“Ïa ka Detailed Project Report (DPR) na ka bynta ban tei ïa kine ki shlem treikam ka ban kot haduh T. 5,400 klur ladep aiti sha ka Sorkar Pdeng,” u la ong bad bynrap ba ka jingshna ïa ki projek bapher bapher ha kine ki City yn sa bei da ka Sorkar Jylla, ka Sorkar India bad lyngba ki jingbei pisa na ki kynhun shimet.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba kine ki ar tylli ki nongbah ba thymmai kin pynkha 50,000 hajar tylli ki kam.Ïa ka surok kaba pynïasoh ïa ka Shillong bad ka Administrative City ha Umsawli bad hapdeng ka Administrative City bad ka Knowledge City ha Mawkhanu la mang pisa kumba T. 520 klur, u la ong bad ïathuh ruh ba ka jingmang pisa kaba kot T. 365 klur la bynta na ka bynta ki projek bapher bapher ha Administrative City bad ha Knowledge City na ka bynta u snem 2024-25.
title: PYNKHREH KA SORKAR BAN TEI ÏA KA ADMINISTRATIVE CITY BAD KNOWLEDGE CITY HA NEW SHILLONG

content: : U MLA ka Trinamool Congress na Nongthymmai u Bah Charles Pyngrope ha ka sngi palei u la kyntu ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan shim ia ki lad ki lynti ban pynsangeh noh mardor ia ka jingleh shiliang khmat pyrshah ia kano kano kynhun jait niam.Haba wanrah ia ka Zero Hour notis hapoh ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ, u Bah Pyngrope u la iathuh ba kane ka jingkyrpad jong u ka long halor ka jingjia ha kawei ka riewniam kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Sr. Rose Mary na Siju, South Garo Hils ka la shah kren da ki ktien ba pynhiar dor bad nalor kata ka la shah pynhiar na Bos shiteng lynti ha ka jylla Assam katba ka dang mih na Duhnoi ban leit sha Goalpara.Kane ka jingjia ka la ktah ruh ia ka jingmut jingpyrkhat pyrshah ia kane ka riewniam.Katkum kum ka jingpyntip jong u Auxilliary Bishop ka Tura Diocese, ka Sr. Rosemary, kaba trei ha St. John Parish, Siju, South Garo Hills ka la mih na Dudhnoi sha Goalpara ha ka 17 tarik mynta u bnai bad ka la kiew da ka Bos ha ka por 11.00 baje mynstep na Dudhnoi bad siew ruh ia ka bai bos haduh Goalpara.Hynrei tang hadien katto katne por u nongbud jong ka Bos bad ki katto katne kiba shong hapoh ka Bos ki la sdang ban kren da ki ktien ba khlemakor ia ka bad ia ka jaiñ riewniam ba ka phong bad ia ka jingngeit niam jong ki.  Hadien katto katne, ki pynsangeh ia ka Bos ha kawei ka jaka ba kham kynjah bad phah hiar da ka bor na ka Bos.  Kane ka jingjia ka la ktah ia ka jingmut jingpyrkhat bad shah leh bym hok jong ka Sr. Rosemary kum ka kynthei bad kum ka riewniam.  Da ka jingiarap jong ki katto katne ki briew, ka Sr. Rose ka la kiew noh da kawei ka Bos ban leit sha Goalpara.U Auxilliary Bishop u la kyntu ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan shimkhia mardor halor kane ka jingjia da kaba iakren bad ka Sorkar Assam khnang ba kum kine ki jingjia kin ym jia shuh hadien habud.“Ban shu pyndik ia ki briew tang namarba ki phong ia ka riam kaba kyrpang lane ba ki phong ia ki jaiñ niam ka long kaba sngewkhia bha, ka bym pat ju ïohsngew bad kaba ym lah satia ban pdiang.  Kine ki jingjia, ki jia tang namarba ka don ka jingialam bakla bad ka jingpeit shiliang khmat kaba pynsaphriang pyrshah ia kano kano ka jait niam,” u la ong bad kyrpad ia ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban shimkhia mardor ia kane ka jingjia da kaba ong, “nga sngew ba kane ka sorkar ka dei ban shim ia ki lad ki lynti ban pyrkhing bha kum ia kine ki jingpeit shiliangkhmat.”Haba ai jubab halor kane ka jingjia, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ba u la ïoh jingtip bad mar mar u la pynsngew ia kane ka jingjia ha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma.U la iathuh ruh ba ka jingïoh lum jingtip kam pat biang satia ban buddien ia kane ka  kam.“Ngi dang ap ia ka jingpyntip kaba thikna namarba ia mynta ka jingtip kaba ngi ïoh ka long ia ka tarik, ka por bad ka jaka ba ka (Sr. Rose Mary) leit jingleit, hynrei ngim pat ïoh lum jingtip u nombar kali jong ka Bos lane kano kano ka sakhi kaba pynlah ia ngi ban lapdien ia kiba donkti,” u la ong.U la kular ruh ba un sa shimkhia bha khnang ba kum kine ki jingjia, kin ym jia shuh hadien habud ha kano kano ka bynta jong ka ri.U Sangma u la ong ba un sa ai jubab tang shu ïoh ka jingtip kaba bniah halor kane ka jingjia.
title: BA SHAH PYNHIAR KA RIEWNIAM NA BOS SHITENG LYNTI, PYNSNGEW U CONRAD HA U HIMANTA

content: Ka Garo Hills Autonomous District Council (GHADC) bad ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) ki la shah ktah bha haduh katta katta na ka daw ka jingkhang ban tih dewiong thliewkhnai ha Meghalaya, la ong u Myntri Rangbah ha ka sngi Palei.“Namar ka jingkhang tih dewiong dang shen ka la ktah bha i aki bad mynta ngi dang ap ban pynsdang noh ia ka jingtih dewiong katkum ki kor ki bor ka juk stad saian, dei namarkata, ka jingmih ka duna bha.  Ka jingbym iohlum khajna ka la hiar arsut namar ki daw bapher bapher kiba ngi mad na ki kyndon tih deiwong bad kiba shah ktah bha mynta ki dei ki Council, kane ka dei ka jingeh kaba ki mad bha mynta,” ong u Sangma ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Haba kylli hato ka Sorkar kan lah neem ban weng ia ka jinghiran pisa jong kine ki ar tylli ki ADC, namarba kim pat lah  ban siew ia ka tulop da ki snem, u Sangma u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka don ban iarap bad ban ai jingkyrshan ia ki district councils hynrei kam lah ban shim lut ha lade ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban siew ia ka tulop.“Ngi long kiba kloi ban iarap bad ban ai jingkyrshan hynrei ngim lah ban shim lut ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban ai sa ka tulop. Ngi la pyrshang ban wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban ai jingkyrshan ia ki, ia kane ka kam ngi dang bishar bniah. Ngin sa peit kaei kaba ngi lah ban leh,” la ong u Sangma.“Hynrei ka jingkitkhlieh ka dei beit jong ki Autonomous District Council ban pyniaid ia ka pisa pilaiñ,” u la bynrap.U la ong ruh ba ka GHADC bad ka JHADC mynta ki mad ia ka jinghiran pisa ban ia ka KHADC bad mynta ki la hap ban kiar na kaba thung nongtrei thymmai. Ka GHADC ka la pyrshang ban pynduna ia ki nongtrei na ka 2100 ne 2300 sha ka 1500 ngut.Ka Non Gazetted Employees’ Association (NGEA) jong ka Garo Hills Autonomous District Council ka la aipor khatduh 7 sngi ban pyllait ia ka tulop kaba dang sahteng haduh 32 bnai jong ki nongtrei.
title: DEI KA JINGKHANG TIH DEWIONG KABA KTAH BHA ÏA KA GHADC BAD JHADC, ONG U CM

content: : Hadien ka jinglap jong ki dkhot ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) ia ka jingsah miet ki bar jylla ha Iewduh, ha ka sngi balang ki la leit sha ka ophis u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem u Pa’iem Ainam Manik Syiem ban ai da ka jingujor pyrshah ia ki briew kiba donkti ban ai jaka sah ia ki bar jylla ha ki dukan die sha ha Iewduh.Na ka liang u Syiem u la kubur ba ka jinglap jong ka HITO ia ka jingdon ki bar jylla kiba sah miet beaiñ ha Iewduh kan buh jingma hadien habud.Ha ka jingiakynduh ia ki dkhot jong ka HITO bad u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem ki la pynbeit ban pynlong ia ka jurip ia ka Iewduh halor ka jingdon ki bar jylla ba sahmiet ha Iewduh.Halor ka jingshah kynnoh ba ki Pulit Syiem ki kyntait ban synran lang ia ki dkhot jong ka HITO, u Syiem u la pynpaw ba ka ophis jong u kam shym la ioh pdiang satia ia kano kano ka jingthoh ne ka jingkyrpad ban synran lang ia ki dkhot ka HITO.
title: KUBUR U SYIEM BA AP KA JINGMA NA KA JINGSAHMIET KI BAR JYLLA HA KI DUKAN HA ÏEWDUH

content: Arngut ki briew kiba la shah kem halor ka jingpynïap dusmon ïa uwei u heprit uba dang shiphew snem ka rta ha ka shnong Umtangar, Ri Bhoi ki la phla ba ki la leh ïa kane ka kam runar tang namarba une u heprit u la pyrshang ban rah ïa ka kiad ba dang sah sa shiteng bilor kaba dei ka jong uwei na kine ki arngut.U Pynshailang Warjri, 32 ka rta na Umtangar bad u Banshngaiñ Tynsong 28 na Pynursla ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit ha ka sngi Palei.“Ha ka jingtohkit ïa kine ki arngut, la lap ba u lanot u la sah ha ka sem jong uwei na kiba la shah kem ha ka janmiet jong ka 17 tarik, Rymphang. Ha ka step jong ka 18 tarik, Rymphang, u lanot u la pyrshang ban rah ïa u bilor ba dang don bad ka kiad kaba dei jong uwei na kiba la shahkem. Ha ka jingbitar, u Banshngaiñ Tyngsong bad u paralok ki la beh thong ïa u nadien bad ki la pynïap ïa u da ka tangon da ka pla na ki bynta ka durkhmat,” la ïathuh u SP ka Ribhoi Jagpal Singh Dhanoa.“Hadien kata, ki la buhrieh ïa ka met hajan kawei ka lawbniap bad ap haduh ban da kem iongreiñ ka bneng ban kit pat ïa ka met jong u lanot sha ka kper jong u Bah Comand Nongrah. Ïa uba donkti lang ruh ngi la kem,” u la ong.U SP u la ong ba ka jaka ba la jia ka jingshah pynïap yn sa tohkit shuh shuh khnang ba ki nongleh kam bymman kin da phla lut halor kane ka kam runar.
title: PYNÏAP KI ARNGUT ÏA U HEPRIT TANG NA KA BYNTA SHI BILOR KA KIAD

content: : Ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ia ka jingbuddien bad ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ki la iohkem ia ki arngut ki briew kiba la suba ba ki dei kiba donkti ban dkhat jubor ia ka jingim jong u heprit Kitdorlang Marbaniang ha ka shnong Umtangar Ri-Bhoi District.U Superintendent of Police ka Ribhoi Jagpal Singh Dhanoa u la iathuh ba tang hadien ba la lap ïa ka met jong u heprit Kitdorlang Marbaniang ha ka janmiet 18 tarik mynta u bnai ki Pulit kim shym la shong kli kti hynrei ki la buddien ïa kane ka kam bad register case ha Patharkhmah Police Station hapoh ka Section 302 IPC.Ki arngut kiba la shah kem ha ki Pulit ki dei kiba la ithuh kyrteng kum u Pynshailang Warjri 32 snem ka rta na ka shnong Umtangar, Ri-Bhoi bad u Banshngai Tynshong 28 snem ka rta na Nongthymmai, Lapalang, Pynursla, East Khasi Hills District bad uba shong basah mynta ha Umtangar Ri-Bhoi.Ka jingtohkit pyrshah ia kine ki ngut ka dang iaid shakhmat khnang ban lap ia ka daw tynrai halor ka jingshah pyniap jong u heprit Kitdorlang bad ban lapksai shuh shuh ia kiwei kiwei pat kiba donkti ha kane ka kam bymman.
title: KEM KI PULIT ÏA KI ARNGUT KI SUBA DONKTI BAN PYNÏAP ÏA U HEPRIT HA UMTANGAR

content: Ka Meghalaya Joint Action Committee (MJAC) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ujor sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Sorkar Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki bor pynïaid jong ki Karkhana kiba don hapoh u pud u sam jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ki khaïi beaiñ ïa u dewïong bad ïa u mawshun sha ki karkhana pynmih dewbilat kiba don ha East Jaiñtia Hills.U Secretary General ka MJAC u Bah Enrico D. Pasi ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha nongbah Shillong u la kam ba ki don la kumno kumno haduh 800 tylli ki trok kit mawshun bad 130 tylli ki trok kit dewïong kiba ju rung sha ki Karkhana manla ka sngi kiba kit ïa ki marpohkhyndew sha ki karkhana pynmih dewbilat ha East Jaiñtia bad ki trok kiba ju kit palat pud haduh lai shah na kaba dei ban kit.“Ngi dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan buh noh da ka Integrated Check Point khnang ban tehlakam ïa ka jinglait ei ka khajna namarba ka jingbym don jong ka Revenue Checkpoints ne ki Checkgates shwa ba ki trok kit dewiong bad ki trok kit mawshun kin rung sha ki karkhana pynmih dewbilat ha East Jaintia Hills,” u la ong.“Kane ka jingkhaïi be-aiñ ïa ki marpohkhyndew kum u mawshun bad ïa u dewïong sha ki karkhana pynmih dewbilat ba don ha East Jaiñtia Hills ki la ïaid lait ban siew ïa ka khajna sha ka Sorkar Jylla namar ka jingbym don ki khyrdop talasi jong ka DMR, ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) ban thew ïa ki mar ba la kit shapoh ki Karkhana,” ong u Bah Pasi.U la kynthoh ruh nalor ba ki bor pynïaid jong ki Karkhana ki trei hi ïa ki kam ba ki trai jylla ki lah ban leh bad wat ka dor jong ka dewbilat ka tat bha haba ïanujor ïa ka bai dewbilat ha Khliehriat bad ha Assam.“Ka jylla jong ngi ka dei kaba dang sahdien bha ha ka khaiï ka pateng, ka dei ruh ka jylla ka bym pat lah ban pyndap da lade ïalade, haba ka Sorkar kam shimkhia ban lum ïa ka khajna kan sa nang wanrah jingeh shuh shuh ïa ki paidbah. Ka jinglait ei jong ka khajna ka la nang pynduhnong bun shah ïa ka Sorkar nalor ba ka jylla ka la nang hiran ha ka ïoh ka kot naduh ba la khang ka jingtih bad shalan ïa u dewiong da ka National Green Tribunal (NGT,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Pasi.“Jin lada ka Sorkar ka la peitngor ban buh ïa ki khyrdop lum khajna ïa ki marpohkhyndew ha shwa ban pynrung sha ki Karkhana ka Sorkar kan jin da la ïohlum ïa ka khajna ban shna ïa ki surok, ki skul, ki hopsital bad kan long ruh ka jingkyrkhu ïa ki paidbah,” u la bynrap.
title: KYNNOH KA MJAC BA KHAÏI BE-AIÑ KI KARKHANA HA EJH ÏA U DEWIONG BAD MAWSHUN

content: U Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng uba peit bad khmih ïa ka Tnat Ports, Shipping & Waterways bad Ayush, Sarbananda Sonowal ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la plie paidbah ïa ki projek bapher bapher ban kyntiew ïa ka bor treikam ha North Eastern Institute of Ayurveda and Homoeopathy (NEIAH) ha phyllaw jong ka, kaba don ha Mawdiangdiang ha ka nongbah Shillong.Utei u Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng uba khmih ruh ïa ka tnat Ayush u la plie ruh ïa ka Guest House bad buh mawnongrim na ka bynta ka Administrative Building, Pharmacy Building, kumjuh ruh ka kynroh bad ka surok kynthup ki khyrdop ban rung bad mih ha katei ka prokram.Haba ïadei bad kane haba ai jingkren ha ka jingïalang, u Myntri Sorkar Pdeng, Sarbananda Sonowal u la ong ba lyngba ka jingkyntiew ïa ka bor treikam ha NEIAH, kin don ka lad kaba kyrpang ban ïoh jinghikai, ïatreilang bad kyntiew ïa ki bor haba ïaleh ban wanrah ka jingpynshisha ïa ki rukom ai jingsumar tynrai lyngba ka jingsakhi jong ka jingstad saïan.“Ka long ka khyllipmat jong ka jingsngewthuh kaba khraw ba ka institute ka la dep ai jinghikai pyntbit jan shi hajar ngut ki riew shemphang ha ka Ayurveda bad Homoeopathy. Kane ka la kyntiew bha ïa ka rukom ai jingsumar ha ka thaiñ, khamtam ha Meghalaya, haba ngi ïaid shaphrang ban pynurlong ïa ka thong jong u Myntri Rangbah duh jong ngi, Narendra Modi na ka bynta ka Swastha Bharat,” u la ong.U la ong ba kane ka kynhun ba thymmai jong ki nongai jingsumar, kiba don ka atiar jong ka jingai jingsumar Ayush kin ïarap ïa ki briew ban ïoh ïa ki jingmyntoi.U la ong ruh ba ki don ïa ki jingïa Ki janbha bad ki rukom ai jingsumar tynrai ba hyndai kiba da ki hajar snem, hynrei mynta lyngba ki jingai jingsumar ba la pynshisha da ka saïan ban sumar ïa bun ki jingpang. Ka jingkoit ha India, ka jingïoh jingkoit na India ka long ka jingthmu jong ka jingkhie im biang ka Ayush.La ong ba ka Guest House kaba la plie thymmai ka don ha ka jaka kaba 1780.56 SqM ka ban ai jaka sah bad kaba don ki lad ban pynlong jingïalang. Ïa kane ka jingtei kaba la pyndep kadei kaba ïahab bad ka mariang bad ka don lut baroh ki jingdonkam katkum ka juk mynta.Ka Administrative Building ban dang shna jong ka NEIAH, ha ka jingheh kaba 3160 SqM kan don kawei ka building (G+3) ryngkat artylli ki mala kaba sha trai duh, kynthup kawei ka hall. Ka jinglut ba la mang na ka bynta kane ka jingtei ka long T. 27.30 klur. Ïa ka building jong ka pharmacy yn shna ha ka jingbei tyngka kaba T. 15.33 klur na ka bynta ka G+3 building kaba 1833 SqM. Ïa ka kynroh bad ka surok kaba la pynshai sharak ba kynthup ka khyrdop ban rung bad mih la shna ha ka jinglut kaba T. 12.72 klur.Na ka liang u Sarbananda Sonowal u la ong, “Ka sorkar ba ïalam u Narendra Modi ka thmu ban ïarap bad pynkupbor ïa ki rukom sumar tynrai jong ngi ba kin saphriang palat ïa ka imlang sahlang bad u pud u sam bad ïarap ïa ki briew ban im ka jingim kaba koit ba khiah bad wanrah ïa ki jingpyn ïaid ïew na ka bynta ka thaiñ.”Katba ki jingdon jingem ki long kiba kongsan na ka bynta ki jingseisoh ba kham biang ha ka jingwad bniah bad ka jingkyntiew ïa ki kam, kan jingkyntiew ïa ka bor treikam ha NEIAH, kan pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingkhie im biang jong ka rukom ai jingsumar tynrai hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Myntri Rangbah duh, Narendra Modi.“Ka sorkar ka la kut jingmut ban kyntiew ïa ka bor treikam ha NEIAH khnang ba kan long ka jaka kaba don ïa ki briew kiba la tbit bha ha ka kam jong ka Ayush ha ka ri. Ha ka shi snem ba la leit, ka sorkar Modi ka la bei tyngka palat T. 145 klur ban kyntiew ïa ka bor treikam ha NEIAH. Ka jingmang tyngka na ka bynta ka projek ban kyntiew ïa ka bor treikam ha NEIAH kaba long T. 217. 02 klur,” ong u Myntri.U Myntri Ayush u Sarbananda Sonowal u la pynbna ruh ba ki jingshakri OPD kin sdang ha Smit, East Khasi Hills district ka ban long ka jingmyntoi ïa 40,000 hajar ngut ki briew kiba sah ha 20 tylli ki shnong. U Myntri u la pyntip ruh ba ka NEIAH ka la sdang ïa ka Swarnabindu Prashan Sanskar (Ayurvedic Immunno Modulation in Children) ha ka Ayurveda Hospital jong ka.Lyngba kane ka prokram, ka sorkar ka ïarap ïa ki nongpang lyngba ki lad jingsumar Ayurvedic ban sumar ïa ka jingpang Iron Deficiency Anemia (IDA) ha ki longkmie riewlum kiba hapdeng 18 bad 45 snem ka rta ha Mawpat bad Mylliem Block jong ka East Khasi Hills district hapoh ka AYURSWASTHYA Yojana.U la ong ba ka NEIAH ka la ïarap ïa ki nongpang lyngba ki lad jingsumar kum ka Panchakarma, Ksharasutra, Uttarabasti bad Yoga ban kyntiew ïa ka jingkoit jingkhiah jong ki.“Katba nang bun ki samla pule ki la ïoh jinghikai pyntbit ha kine ki rukom jingsumar, ba kynthup ka specialised Panchakarma Technician programme, ngi khmih lynti ba ka rukom sumar Ayush kan nang paw shuh shuh, bad kan kham suk ban ïoh ïa ki jingmyntoi kaba ai ha ka koit ka khiah.Ka India hapoh ka jingïalam ba tbit jong u Myntri Rangbah duh Narendra Modi ka la rah ïa ka jingsumar tynrai sha ka jingkhie im biang ha ka pyrthei. Ka Ayush kaba la ïoh bor biang ka la ïarap ban kyntiew ïa ka bor jong ki hajar snem ki rukom sumar tynrai haba ka bteng ban sdang ïa kane ka jingïaid lynti kumba long mynta,” u la ong.U la ong ba kane ka long da kaba wanrah ïa ki dawai tynrai shakhmat hapoh jong ka da ka jingthmu ban tei ïa ki lad ai jingsumar ba la pynshisha da ka saïan ban kyntiew ïa ka jingim jong ki briew, ban don ka met kaba khlaiñ bad ki jingmut jingpyrkhat kiba kmen.Ha kane ka prokram la donlang u Secretary jong ka Ayush, Vaidya Rajesh Kotecha; Vice Chancellor jong ka Northeast Hill University (NEHU), Prof PS Shukla; Joint Secretary, Tnat Ayush, BK Singh; lem bad u Director, NEIAH, Prof Neeta Maheskar.
title: PLIE U SONOWAL IA KI PROJEK THYMMAI BAN KYNTIEW ÏA KI JINGAI SUMAR HA NEIAH

content: Ki shipai BSF ha ka jingïatreilang bad ki pulit ka jylla ha ka 22 tarik mynta u bnai, 2024, ki la ïoh ban kurup ïa shibun ka shini bad u kwai ba la shongdor kumba T.20 lak. Ïa kitei ki tiar ba la kurup la thmu ban khaïi beaiñ sha Ri Bangladesh napoh ka khappud kaba don ha South Garo Hills.Hadien ka jingïoh jingtip kaba thikna ki shipai jong ka 200 Battalion ki BSF Meghalaya, ha ka jingleit khynra lang bad ki pulit ka jylla ki la kurup ïa katei ka shini bad u kwai ba la dep thad tyrkhong. Ïa ka shini bad u kwai la lap napoh kawei ka Ïing kaba la shu ieh shrah kaba don ha khappud kaba hajan ka shnong Rongra kaba ha thaiñ South Garo Hills.Ïa kitei ki tiar ba la ïoh kurup la aiti noh sha ka thanat pulit jong ka PS – Rongra ban leh ïa ki kam katkum ka aiñ.
title: KURUP SHINI BAD KWAI KI PULIT BAD SHIPAI BSF

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National  Movement ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la dawa  ïa uwei u briew uba kynthoh pyrshah ïa ka seng ha ka Facebook Page ba la ai kyrteng ‘Lympung ki Khun ka Ri’ ba u dei ban panmap hapoh 24 kynta hynrei lym kumta ka Seng kam banse ban mudui da ka ejahar sha ki bor jong ka aiñ.Katkum kane ka jingkynthoh ha kane ka Facebook page, u nongkynthoh uba la paw kyrteng kum u HBK Lyngdoh u la kynthoh pyrshah ïa ka seng da kaba ong ba ka jingpynlong ka HANM ïa ka jingïakhih ha Jantar Mantar ha nongbah Delhi ha ka 3 tarik Naiweing 2023 ka dei kaba la bei pisa da ka National People’s Party (NPP).Haba kyntait ïa ka jingshah kynnoh, u Vice President ka HANM Bah Bawan Nongsiej u la pynshai ba ka jingïakhih jong ka seng ka dei na ka bynta ki dawbah jong ka jaitbynriew na ka bynta ban pynurlong ïa ka jingdawa ban pynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka ri India kumba la mynjur da ka Iingdorbar Thawain ka Jylla ha ka 27 tarik Nailur 2018.U nongkynthoh HBK Lyngdoh u kynthoh kumne: “Kawei na ki sengbhalang kaba leit pynthud ïa ka jingdawa pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka 8th Schedule ka dei ka HANM. Kane ka Seng ka la leit sha Delhi ban dawa pynrung lang ïa ka ktien Khasi bad ka ktien Garo. Ka ktien Garo kam pat long qualified ban rung ha ka 8th Schedule te da dawa pynrung lang ha kajuh ka por ka ktah ïa ka ktien Khasi kaba lah long qualified ban rung ka hap ap haduh da ki phew snem shuh shuh ban ïa rung ryngkat bad ka Garo haduh ban da long qualified ka Garo.”“Lehse ban leit pynthud kumtei dei ba sponsor da ka npp.”“Ngi leit sha Delhi ban pynlong ia ka jingiakhih khlem ka jingpan pisa nangno nangno. Ngi leit namarba ngi don ka jingsngewkhia na ka bynta ka dawbah jong ka jaidbynriew,” la bynrap u Bah Nelson Kharbani uba dei u nongialam ka seng.
title: DAWA PANMAP KA HANM HAPOH 24 KYNTA ÏA UBA KYNTHOH HA FACEBOOK PAGE

content: Ha ka por ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la maitphang ban pynmih ka Stamp ha ka nam jong u Tirot Sing Syiem lyngba ka Postal Department ka Sorkar Pdeng la sngew donkam ban ïoh ïa ka durkhmat ba shisha jong u Tirot Sing Syiem, wat lada khlem lap ksai ïa kano kano ka tyllong. Kumta la pyrshang ban aiti ha ki barikor jong ka jylla bad na baroh ki ba la pyrshang la jied ïa u Bah  Bashai Rai Dohling bad u Bah Marius Main Sing Shanpru. Baroh arngut ki dei ki ba trei ïa ka kam thohdur ha ki tnat sorkar, u Bah Bashai Rai Dohling u dei u barikor (animation artist) jong ka Directorate of Film Division, Ministry of Information & Broadcasting, Government of India ha Bombay, katba u Bah Mainsing Shanspru u dei u barikor ha Directorate of Information & Public Relations, Government of Meghalaya. Baroh arngut ki la pynkhreh la ka rukom mutdur ïa kata ka dur jong u Tirot Sing Syiem, khlem da iit bniah na ki tyllong jingtip ba dei ban wad. Na ka daw ba la kyrkieh ka kam, u Bah Bashai Rai Dohling u la tehkam ha la ka shlem treikam bad u la aiti noh ha u barikor khynnah u ba dei u dkhar na dewbah India. Kumta ka dur ym da ïahap than bad la kyntait noh bad la jied da ka durthoh ba la pynkhreh u Bah Main Sing Shanpru.Ka la jia ryngkhat ba u Bah Raphael Warjri, u dei u synran hikai thohdur jong u Bah Maiñ Sing Shanpru bad la ïohlad ban sakhi ïa kata ka dur jong u Tirot Sing Syiem ka ba paw kum u tymmen rangbah, katba ha ki khanamynnor la tip ba u la ïap ha ka ryta ba dang kumba laiphew snem tam. Kumta la kynthoh mardor ban pynbeit ïa kata ka dur, hynrei na ka daw ba la kyrkieh than ka sorkar, ym banse ban aiti noh kumba ka long haduh ba la shon shab na ka bynta kata ka Stamp ha Ri India lyngba ka Postal Department. Wat lada u Bah Raphael Warjri u dang khynnah samla, kane ka jingjia ka ba long thurmur ka la ktik ïa u ban thwet thikna shaphang ka dur ba biang jong u Tirot Sing Syiem. La jia ryngkhat ba u la mar mlien ruh ha ka kam shondur bad u ïoh jingtip ba thikna ba la shem ïa ka kor shondur dang tang ha u snem 1839, kata ka mut hadien ba la ïap u Tirot Sing Syiem. Ym tang katta ka kor shondur ka dang poi sha Ri India ha u snem 1855 bad ym pat don lynti ban ïoh ka dur shon jong u Tirot Sing Syiem. Wat lada ha kata ka juk la ju don ki barikor ki ba ruiddur ïa ki kynja kynrem lyndan phareng, hynrei ym lah ban khmih lynti ba yn don ba ruiddur ïa u Tirot Sing Syiem, khamtam ba u dei u koidi sorkar ba la shah set byndi na ka daw ba ïaleh  thma pyrshah ïa ka sorkar Bilat.Kumta ha ka jingpyrshang ban thwet ïa ka durkhmat jong u Tirot Sing Syiem, u Bah Raphael Warjri u la poi ryngkhat sha ka shlem pathai khubor naduh ki snem 1990 ter ter bad la ïashem bad u Bah Skendrowell Syiemlieh, u myllung kaitor bakhraw bad kumjuh ruh ïa u Bah Kitdor Syiem, u myntri sorkar u ba dei na ka jait syiem na Mairang. Ha ka ba ïa pur khana bad u Bah Skendrowell la ïa kynduh ïa u Syiem Hima Nongklhlaw, Bah Phrestar Syiemlieh u ba dang long syiem haduh mynta mynne. Ha kata ka khep la pynkhreh da ka durim dulir halor ka jingïakhun ki Khasi pyrshah ïa ka sorkar Bilat, ha kaba u Tirot Sing Syiem u dei u khlawait ba ïalam ha phrang. Phewse kata ka khlem la urlong, wat lada ka Dorbar Hima Nongkhlaw bad u Bah Kitdor ki la aiktien ban kyrshan ïa kata ka kam. Kham hadien kata u Dr David R Syiemlieh u la lap ïa ka sngi ïap ba shisha jong u Tirot Sing Syiem ha u snem 1988, bad mar mar la pyrshang ban tohkit na u Dr David R Syiemlieh shaphang ka dur jong u Tirot Sing Syiem. Ka ba sngew bynñiaw ka long ba ym shem kaiphot ne nathi wat ïa ka met jong u Tirot Sing Syiem ba la pynkhuid da ka ba tep ne ka ba thang ruh, sa ïa ka durkhmat te ym lah ban khmih lynti da lei lei.Hadien kata ka la don ka jingthmu jong ka Dorbar Hima Nongkhlaw ban tei da u durmot jong u Tirot Sing Syiem ha Mairang ha ka jaka ba la don lypa u mot sahnam. Na ka liang jong u Bah Raphael Warjri, la ai jingmut ban tei syndon da ka shlem sahnam rikynti  (heritage monument) kat ba shah ka jaka bad la pynkhreh nadong shadong ki jingdonkam ryngkat ki dur ki dar ba kynsai halor ka thma ba la khie ha ka 4tarik Ïaiong 1829 haduh u Risaw 1833 ba la shah set byndi u Tirot Sing Syiem. Kata ruh ka khlem la urlong namar ka don ka jingkylla hadien ba la la tuklar da kiwei pat bad khatduh la aiti ha u nongkhaïi ban tei ïa uta u durmot u ba khlem ïahap bad ka kyrdan longsyiem jong u Tirot Sing Syiem bad ka ba la pynhiar dor  ym tang ïa ka rngiew u Tirot Sing Syiem, hynrei la pynjem rngiew ïa ka jaitbynriew Khasi baroh kawei. Ha ka jaka jong u Tirot Sing Syiem ba khiathew la shna da u tymmen ba phong ka riam bym ïahap, ka boh kum kharmali, u kpieng kuboit barit rïa bad ka dur jong ka wait ym dei ka waitlam Khasi.Hadien ba ka sorkar jylla ka la aiti ha ka synjuk Riti Academy na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka khilon bad ka motdur ha khyrdop jong ka State Central Library ki ba phalang ïa ka rikynti jong ka jylla, u kher rangbah jong ka tnat Deiriti bad Mattithaw (Arts & Culture Department), u Bah F R Kharkongor u la kynjoh ktien ïa u Bah Raphael Warjri na ka bynta ban tei ïa ki motdur jong ki khlawait ïaleh laitluid ka jylla, kata u Tirot Sing Syiem, u Kiang Nangbah bad u Pa Togan Nengminza Sangma.  Katkum ba la kdew lynti bad maitphang da u Bah Sanbor Shullai, Myntri sorkar jylla la aiti ha u Bah Raphael Warjri ban pynkhreh na ka bynta ban tei ïa kita ki motdur ba shirynñieng. Mar mar la pynkhreh da ka ba tih sani bad wad bniah ïa baroh ki jingdonkam na ka bynta kita ki khlawait, kum shi bynta ban rakhe ïa ka lyngkhuh snem ba hynñiewphew san jong ka Ri India ba la jer da ka Azaadi Ki Amrit Mahotsav. La plie paidbah da u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K sangma ïa kitei ki durmot jong ki khlawait ka jylla ha u snem 2022 ki ba jrong kumba khatsan pruh eiei.Ka long ka ba donkam ban batai sani ïa ka rukom pynkhreh jong ki barikor ka Riti Academy na ka bynta ban tei ïa kita ki durmot jong ki khlawait ka jylla. Ha kaba ïadei bad u Tirot Sing Syiem, nalor ki jingtip ba la lum naduh ki snem ba la leit, la nang thwet shuh shuh ki jingtip kum ha kaba ïashem bad ka longiing longsem jait syiem Hima Nongkhlaw na ka kpoh ba hiar pateng u Raja Kine Sing bad u Kedro Manik Syiem bad na kiwei kiwei ki tyllong. Kumta la ringdur na ka rengmat jong ki pateng longsyiem kumba la jer bad la thaw ka dur ka ba syriem tam katkum ka pateng jong ka kpoh long syiem bad kumjuh ruh ban ïahap bad ka ryta ba shisha shwa ban khlaw u Tirot Sing Syiem ka ba long kumba laiphew snem tam ka ryta. Nalor kata la jurip sani halor ka spong khor bad ka boh khaila kum u syiem, u paila ksiar ba kieng na tyrpeng sha synmgkai, ka jymphong syiem, ka waitlam ka stieh, ka ryntieh ki khnam ha ryngkap bad kiwei kiwei ki jnit ki jnat kat ka maiñ long syiem jong u Tirot Sing Syiem.Nalor ka dur ka dar bad ka raim ka beit jong u syiem long syiem la wanlam ruh ïa ka pyrkhat Khasi katkum ka jingshisha ha kata ka juk. La shna da u syiem u ba ïakhun ban ïada ïa la ki khun ki hajar bad ïa la ka hima sima, ym dei u ba shla pyrshah ban kput da ka ba bitar. La shna da ka dur u syiem u ba peit jylliew ha ka thong ban ïakhun kheiñduh, ba bat skhem triang ïa ka waitlam bad ka stieh bad u ba la pynkhreh ban len lade na ka bynta ka Ri bad ka jaitbynriew.  Kumta khlem pyrthuh bud ban shna da u durmot u ba ieng kynthuit ban pyneh shadem lane kum u kaikhlaw ba tur ruma da jingbitar ïa u nongshun, bad ka ba isaitmet tam ka long ba ym dei da ki dohksah ba phyllung kum ki ba kilan met ha ka juk mynta, hynrei kum ki khlawait jong kata ka juk ki ba ïa kynduh bad ka mariang, la ha ka ryngkang rynsied ne ka trei ka beng ha shnong ha thaw, ha lyngkha risai ne ha khlaw ha btap. Kine kiei kiei baroh ki mir katkum ka saiñpyrkhat tynrai ki Khasi.Ha kane kajuh ka rukom la pynkheh ka thwet ka tih sani shaphang u Kiang Nagbah ruh kumjuh. Katkum ka khana mynnor la shem ba ki phareng ki la sni ïa u Kiang Nangbah bad ïa ka kur Nangbah haduh ba ki la kthong ïa ki samla bad rangbah na ka kur haduh ba ki la iehnoh ïa ka nongrim iing ha Wah Nangbah ha dong Tpeppale bad phet sakma sha kylleng ka Ri Khasi. Ym shym lap ksai shuh ïa ki kur Nangbah ha kata ka por bad hadien la tip ba ki don ki ba na shnong Jaraiñ bad Lamin ki ba dei na ka pateng jong u Kiang Nangbah. Kumta ha ba la wad bniah la shem ba ka longiing jong u Bah Barnabas Nangbah ha Shillong ki ba dei trai shnong na Lamin ki dei ki ba hiar pateng na kpoh ka kmie u Kiang Nangbah. Kumta katkum ba la shim nongmuna ïa u Tirot Sing Syiem, kumjuh ruh la shim ksai na ka rengmat ka longiing u Bah Barnabas Nangbah ban shna thymmai ïa ka durkhmat jong u Kiang Nangbah. ha kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong u Kiang Nangbah la ïoh jingtip ruh kum na u Ma R Tokin Rymbai, Ma S Quotient Sumer, Ma Lakhon Shullai, Bah H.H Mohrmen bad kiwei kiwei. Ha kajuh ka rukom la buddien na ka bynta ka pateng bynriew jong u Pa Togan Nengminza Sangma, hynrei ym shym la lap ksai than lait tang katto katne ki bynta jong ka riam ka beit ki jynkieng jyndeng jong ki khlawait Garo ba la ai jingtip da u barikor Arak Sangma bad ka Sahana P Marak, ka ba dei teng ka kher rangbah jong ka sorkar jylla bad ki ba tip thikna shaphang ka riti dustur Garo.Halor ki kynrum kynram hamsaïa ki ba la pynkulmar jingmut ïa ki paidbah ha ka ba ïadei bad u durmot Tirot Sing Syiem ha Dhaka, la pynshai ba ka sorkar jylla ha ka ba sdang la phah shna da u durmot shiteng ba na shadem shaneng. Hynrei ynda la leit khmih sha Dhaka ha u bnai Risaw 2023, la shem ba ym ïahap namar ba u durmot u rit than. Kumta katkum ba la tuklar da ki kher ki mer jong ka sorkar khamtam u Bah F. R Kharkongor ha ryngkat ka ba ïa syllok bad ka synjuk Riti Academy, kumta la pyrkhat thymmai bad rai ban shna da u durmot ba haduh syngkai namarba ka jaka ha Dhaka, hadien ba la khmih ka khim bad ym shah jaka ban shna da u ba shirynñieng.Khatduh ïawai la shna kat ban biang ha ka jaka jong ka Indira Gandhi Cultural Centre, Indian High Commission, Dhanmundi, Dhaka, Bangladesh ba la buhti da u ba kot tang ha syngkai shaneng. Ha ka ba ïadei bad ka durkhmat, kumba la kdew ha shwa ka dei ka ba la jurip thikna lyngba ki tyllong ki ba biang bad la bishar katkum ka pateng bynriew na ka kpoh long syiem ba hiar pateng u Tirot Sing Syiem. Haba la bishar sani lah ban pdiang ba ki khun ba mih pateng na ka kpoh longsyiem kin ïa syriem katkum ka dur ka dar jong ki pateng ba mynta kum ba long lem ka pyrthei salonsar.  Ha kane ka rukom la pynbiang ha kiwei kiwei ki jingteinam kum ha iing u Lat ha Raj Bhavan bad kiwei kiwei ki shlem pyninam.Na kata ka daw kam long kaba shongnia ban nujor bad kiwei pat ki jingpyrshang ba thurmur ha ki snem ba la leit, namar ba ka Riti Academy ha ryngkat ka Sorkar jylla ka la don ka rukom pynkhreh ka ba sani bha ka ba lah da ki katto katne snem ban ïasyllok bad ka Indian High Commission ha Dhaka. La prat lynti ha kane ka bynta da u kher rangbah ka sorkar jylla, u Bah F R Kharkongor haduh ba ym dei tang u durmot ba la buhnam, hynrei la buhnam ruh ka nongmuna jong ka Stamp, nangta ka Map Hima Nongkhlaw kaba rim ba la pynkhreh ka sorkar Bilat ba la ai da u bah David R Syiemlieh, nangta ki dur ki dar ba kdew ïa ka khana jong ka ba ïaleh laitluid ba la thohdur da u Bah Raphael Warjri bad kiwei kiwei ki atiar kordor jong ka jaitbynriew Khasi ban pyninam ha ka Ri Bangladesh. Ka long kaei kaei kaba donkam ba ka iktiar sorkar kan shimkhia ïa kane ka bynta ban pynthikna ïa ka dur ba janai jong u Tirot Sing Syiem, lada dei ban pynneh da ka ba rim ba la don lypa da ki phew snem lane ban pdiang da ka ba thymmai ka ba la tih sani bad wad bniah katkum ka jingtbit ba paka bad pura.Shuh shuh, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, Myntri Mattithaw bad Deiriti u la lam khmat na ka bynta ban leit khmih ïa ka phatok Dacca Central Jail ha ka ba u Tirot Sing Syiem u la shah set byndi. Ha ka por ba dang ïa khmih bad ki heh ka phatok, la don ka jingïakren na ka bynta ban buhti ïa ka shlem pyninam ha ka nam u Tirot Sing Syiem ha Dhaka Cental Jail ha ryngkat ki myntri bad ki kynrem lyndan. Ha ka jingïatai la don lang u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, Symbud Myntri Rangbah, Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh, Myntri Pathai Khubor, bad u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, Myntri Mattithaw bad Deiriti, ba la ïa shim bynta ruh da u Dr David R Syiemlieh, Bah F R Kharkongor ha ka ba ïa don ryngkat u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, Titos Starwell Chyne, Hamlet Dohling bad Teibor Pathaw. Ka Sorkar jylla ka la pynkhreh na ka bynta kata khnang ban lah ban pynurlong ïa ka jingthmu.
title: KA JINGSHNA ÏA U DURMOT U SYIEM TIROT SING HA DHAKA, BANGLADESH

content: : Ka Meghalaya State Commission for Women ka la pynrem jur ia ka jingjia ba dang shen ha ka jylla Assam pyrshah ia kawei ka riewniam kaba trei ha rilum Garo hadien ba ka la shah pynhiar shiteng lynti na ka Bos katba ka dang mih na Dudhnoi ban leit sha Goalpara, Assam.“Kum kine ki jingjia ki ktah haduh katta katta ia ka lanot, kum ka kynthei bad kum ka riewniam.  Namarkata, ka Commission ka kyntu ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ia ka Sorkar Assam ban iatreilang bad ban pynthikna ba ki briew kiba donkti ki dei ban ngat ha ka jingshah pynshitom,” la ong ka Commission lyngba u kyrwoh ba la pynmih ha ka sngi Palei.“Ka Meghalaya ka dei ka jylla kaba kynthup lut ia baroh ki paidbah kiba don ha la ki jong ki jingngeit, bad ngi kyrshan ia ka jingailaitluid halor jingngeit katkum ka riti synshar jong ngi. Ngi dei ban pynthikna ba ka jingpdiang ia ka jingngeit niam bad ka jingburom markylliang ka dei ban long hapdeng ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ki ar tylli ki jylla bad ngin iai bteng ban imlang hapdeng ka jingsuk jingsain,” la bynrap ka Commission.“Ki Sorkar jong ki ar tylli ki jylla ki dei ban pynthikna ban pynneh pynsah ia ka shongsuk shongsain bad ba ki briew kiba donkti ki dei ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh halor ka jingbym burom khamtam ia kino kino ki riewniam,” la ong shuh shuh ka Commission.
title: DAWA KA MSCW BAN PYNSHITOM ÏA KIBA DONKTI BAN PYNHIAR NA BOS ÏA KA RIEWNIAM

content: : U Bah Prestone Tynsong uba long u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba khmih ia ka tnat Kam Pohing u la ong ba ka Sorkar kan ym ailad daleilei ruh em ia ka Garo National Liberation Army-R (Re-group) ba kan khie khlieh biang sa shisien pat namarba ka tnat Pulit bad ki tnat syntiat ki long kiba peitngor bha ban pynthikna ba kane ka kynhun kaba la leh ia ki kam pyntriem ha ki snem ba mynshwa ha Rilum Garo kan ym don lynti ban leh biang sa shisien ia kine ki kam runar kiba pynshong syier mynsiem ia ki paidbah ka rilum Garo.Kane ka jingpynshai jong u Symbud Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka long hadien ba ka shithi jong ka Garo National Liberation Army-R (Re-group) ba la soi da u Geora Pantora Sangma kum u Chairman ka la saphriang ha ka social Media ha kine ki khyndiat sngi bad poi ruh sha ki tyndong shkor jong ka Sorkar Jylla.U la ong ba ki Pulit kim pat tip la ka khubor halor ka GNLA-R ka dei kaba shisha ne kaba thok.“Baroh arphew saw kynta, ki Pulit ki long kiba la khreh bad ngin ym ailad ia kum kine ki jait kam, la ka dei tang ka khubor ne la ka dei tang ka jingthmu jong ki katto katne ngut ki briew ne ki lah ban dei tang ki samla shynrang kiba kwah ban im ka jingim kaba pahuh pahai da kaba thaw ia ka kynhun bathymmai.  Ngi long kiba peit ngor bad ngin ym thiah ym dem bad ngin pynthikna ba kum kata ka jingpynthymmai ia ka kynhun kam dei ban jia,” la ong u Bah Tynsong.U la ong ba ka tnat syntiat jong ki pulit ka dei kaba khlain. “Namarkata, sngewbha ieh ia kata ha ngi, bad ngan pynthikna kumba nga la ong ba ka jingpynim biang ia ka kynhun kan ym jia bad ngin ailad satia ia kata ba kan jia,” u la bynrap.
title: NGIM YM AILAD ÏA KA GNLA-R BA KAN KHIE KHLIEH: PRESTONE TYNSONG

content: Ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court ka la aibor ïa uba shah kynnoh pynbthei bom ba un pan jamin na ka Special Court.Ha ka rai ba la pynkut noh ïa ka jingujor ba la mudui da u Wallam Jingsuk Barim, ka Division Bench kaba kynthup ïa u Chief Justice S. Vaidyanathan bad u Justice W. Diengdoh ka la ong, “ha ka jingshem, la lap ba kam don dor ha ka jingpynksan nia jong u nongmudui, ngi sngew ba ïa ka jingmudui yn hap ban pynkut noh. Nalorkata, ïa ka mukotduma Crl.M.C.No.108 of 2023 la pynkut bad u nongshah mudui u don ka hok laitluid ban pan jamin na ka Special Court.“Lada jia ba don kum kane ka jingpan jamin, la khmihlynti ba ka Special Court kan pyrshang ban leh kumjuh bad ba kan pynkut noh ïa kane ka kam khlem kano kano ka daw na ki jingshem ba la kdew hangne,” ong ka Ingbishar.Ka bench ka la ong, “watla ha kaba sdang ngi dang pyrkhat ba pynslem ïa ka jingmynjur bad pynpaw ïa ki jingsngew jong ngi ha kaba ïadei hapoh ka Open Court, bad buh teng shwa ban pynmih ïa ka hukum bad da kaba bishar ïa kiba bun ki rai jong ka Supreme Court bad kiwei kiwei ki High Court bad ïa ki nongrim jong ka aiñ, ngi la pynkylla noh ïa ka jingmut jong ngi, kaba ailad ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih da ka Supreme Court halor ka mukotduma jong u Kushalbhai Ratanbhai Rohit bad kiwei kiwei pyrshah ïa ka Sorkar Gujarat, ba la pathai ha ka AIR 2014 SC 2291, kaba kdew ba shisien ba la soi ïa ka hukum, ka la la long ka rai khatduh bad ka Section 362 Cr.P.C. ka dei ka rai bad ka Iingbishar kam lah shuh ban dang pynkylla ïa ka rai, hynrei, lada ym pat soi, ka Ingbishar ka la shah pynkup bor ban pynkylla ïa ka jingsngew.”Ïa u nongshah mudui la pynngat kyndon ha ka 29 tarik, Naitung, 2022 hapoh ka Section 120B IPC pule lang bad ka Section 6 jong ka Explosive Substance Act, 1908.U Wallam u la pan jamin na u Special Judge (NIA) hynrei ka kashari ka la kyntait ban ai jamin ha ka 22.09.2022, 09.03.2023 bad 21.08.2023. Hadien kata, u nongshah mudui u la leit sha Ingbishar High Court ha kaba la shim kum ka Bail No.48 of 2023 bad ïa kane la weng noh ha ka 28.09.2023 da kaba aibor ïa u nongshah mudui ba un pan biang da ka jamin kaba thymmai.Katkum u nongshah mudui, ym don satia kino kino ki tiar kiba pynshisha ba u nongshah mudui u don ïa ki tiar pynmynsaw, ïa kaba la ong ba u dei u dkhot jong ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) bad  kam don kano kano ka hukum ban set along hapoh ka Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act, 1967.U nongshah mudui u la shah set ha Judicial Custody naduh shi snem, khyndai bnai bad arphew san sngi katkum ka tarik ban la phah ïa kane ka aplikeshon ha ka 13.12.2023 bad ka jingtian bishar ka kynthup ïa ki 64 ngut ki nongsakhi, kaba pyni ba ka jingtian bishar kan dang shimpor bad ka jingshah set jong u nongshah mudui ha Judicial Custody kan ktah ïa u nongshah mudui uba la pynkhreh ban ïada ïalade ban ïoh ïa ka jingbishar kaba hok.Ka hukum ka ong ba u Special Judge um shym la ïaroh ïa ka jingkyrpad jong u nongshah mudui ba um don eiei satia bad ka seng HNLC.  Wat hapdeng ki jingpynshisha ba la pynpaw ban kyrshan ïa ka jingpan jamin, ngi sngewkhia pat tang ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynslem ban pdiang ïa ka jingkyrpad bad katkum u nongujor, ka don ka jingpynslem haduh 114 sngi ban ujor.“U Special Judge (NIA) u la kyntait ïa ka jingpan jamin ba khatduh eh ha ka 21.08.2023 bad ynda la ïoh pdiang ïa ka Certified Copy jong ka hukum kaba 13.09.2023, ïa ka Bail Application No.48 of 2023 la phah sha kane ka Ingbishar, kaba la pynkut noh da kaba ai ïa ka hok ïa u nongshah mudui ban pan da kawei pat ka jamin kaba thymmai.  Yn ïaiban biang ba ka jingpynslem haduh 114 sngi ym tang kaba ktah ïa ka jingsngew jongno jongno lait noh ïa u nongshah mudui, uba shah set along la jan ar snem,” la ong ka Ingbishar ha ka hukum.
title: AI BOR KA HIGH COURT ÏA UBA SHAH KYNNOH PYNBTHEI BOM BAN PAN JAMIN BIANG NA KA SPECIAL COURT

content: Ka shlem treikam jong ki Muktiar ne ki Nongiasaid aiñ ka jylla kaba la tip kum ka Shillong Bar Association (SBA) kaba don ha lyndet ka DC Office ka la kem ding kynsan ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka por kumba 10:30 baje mynmiet eiei bad ka jingpluh jong ka ding ka la long kaba ishyrkhei bha.Ki Pulit ka Fire and Emergency Service (F&eS) tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ki la leit mar mar ban tem ia ka ding kaba klang.La sakhi ruh ba ki thylliej ding barhem ki la bamduh ia ka ing treikam baroh kawei nalor ba ka dei lypa ka ing dieng kaba la rim bha.Kat haduh ba la thoh ia kane ka khubor ym pat lah satia ban ioh jingtip halor ka jingkem ding jong kane ka shlem treikam ki Muktiar bad ym pat lah satia ban ioh jingkheiñ halor ki jingjulor.Ki nonglum khubor jong ka Batesi TV ki dang don ha kane ka jaka ban lum ia ki jingtip kiba kham bniah halor kane ka jingjia.Ngin sa nang wanrah shuh shuh ia ka khubor kaba bniah ynda la iohlum shuh shuh ia ki jingtip kham hadien katto katne por.
title: PLUH KA SHLEM TREIKAM JONG KI MUKTIAR KA SHILLONG BAR ASSOCIATION

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka Sngi Saitjaiñ u la plie ïa kiba bun ki project ha Babadam kaba ha West Garo Hills ha ka jingdonlang u Lamphang ka Ïingdorbar Thaw Aiñ u Thomas A. Sangma bad u Myntri ka tnat PHE u Marcuise Marak.Ïa ka Garo Hills Agro Food Park kadei kaba la sdang da ka All Garo Hills Multi Purpose Cooperative Society (AGHMPCS) ba la ïalam da u Fr. Sunny Mavelil. Ïa kane ka park la bei tyngka pura da ka sorkar jylla ha ka jingmang kaba T. 15.73 klur kaba kynthup ïa ka Mustard Processing Unit, Cashew Processing Unit, Hi-Tech Food Lab, Ginger Processing Unit, Solar Power Plant bad 25 tylli ki Cold Storage Unit.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “Ka sorkar jylla ka la buh ïa ka thong ban kyrshan ïa ki nongrep kiba trei ha ki kam rep bad kaba kynthup ïa ha ka kam horticulture. Ha baroh kawei ka jylla ka sorkar ka la pyntur shakhmat ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam thung jingthung na ka bynta ba kin ïoh ïa jingpynmih kaba bha, ka jinghikai ha ki rukom song ïa ki, ki kam ka jingshong dor bad ki kam ba ïadei bad ka ïew ka hat ïa ki jingpynmih jong ki”.U la ïaroh ïa ka cooperative society ba la ïalam da u Fr. Sunny ban kyntiew ïa ki kam sengkam lajong lyngba ka rep ka riang.Ka jingplie ïa ka Agro Food Park kaba thymmai kan shna kumba 100 MT jong ki mar ba la pynmih ki bym pat saiñ, kynthup ïa u sying, bad kiwei ki mar rep.Haba kren halor ka jingtuklar ka sorkar ban pynïoh nong khambun ïa ki nongrep ha ka jylla u Conrad u la ong, “Ha ki 6 snem ba la leit ngi la buh ïa ki 166 tylli ki processing unit, 154 tylli ki warehousing facility bad 34 tylli ki cold storage sha ki jaka ba kyndong jong ka jylla”.U la ong ba ïa ki Integrated Village Cooperative, ki Farmer Producer Organisation bad ki Women collective la pynshlur bad kyntiew da ka sorkar ban thaw ïa ki lad ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot ha ki thaiñ nongkyndong, ki la don katto katne ki processing unit jong ngi ki la long kiba bha bad biang bha ha baroh kawei ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi,” u la ong.Da kaba ong ba lah jan T. 357 klur la buh ïa ki kam pynroi kiba shongdor ha ka jylla, u la ong, “Ka sorkar kan pynkhlaiñ ïa ki jingtrei kiba la don bad ban pynlut ruh ha kiba thymmai ban ïoh ïa ka thong ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot kaba arshah jong ki longïing ki nongrep kiba don kumba 4.5 lak ki longïing”.U la pynpaw ïa ka jingkyrmen ba ka Agro Food Park ha Babadam ka la long kum ka model kaba la ïoh jingjop ka ban long ka nuksa sha kiwei pat ki bynta ka jylla. U la ong ruh ba kin sa don ki prokram bapher bapher bad ki tour ki ban sa pynlong da ka sorkar ba kin ïa ïoh jingtip bad ban tip ruh na iwei ïa iwei patU Myntri Rangbah u la plie ruh ïa ka Arecanut Processing unit bad u la buh ïa u mawnongrim na ka bynta P.A. Sangma Shopping Complex ha Babadam.U MLA Arbinstone Marak bad u CEM GHADC u Albinush Marak ki la donlang ha ka prokram plie ïa kitei ki projek.
title: BUN TYLLI KI PROJEK PYNROI BUH MAWNONGRIM U CONRAD SANGMA HA WEST GARO HILLS

content: Ka jingjia kaba i triem ka la jia ha ka miet 20 tarik, Rymphang 2024 ha ka shnong Urkaliar, Shillong ha kaba ka la mih ka jingïashoh ïadat kaba shyrkhei bha kaba la poi haduh u pud ba ki ar kynhun ki la sei da ka tari ban ïa dung.U Secretary jong ka shnong Urkaliar Bah Samborlang Diengdoh ha ka jingïakren bad ki nonglum khubor u la ïathuh ba kane ka jingjia ka la mih na ka daw ka jingïakput hapdeng ki ar kynhun.Hadien kane ka jingjia ka bor synshar shnong jong ka Dorbar Shnong Urkaliar ka la lum jingïalang ïa ki trai jaka bad ïa ki trai iing kiba ju ai wai iing ne ai wai dukan ha kane ka shnong.Ha ka jingïalang ka Dorbar Shnong bad ki trai ing bad ki trai dukan ki la shim ïa ka rai ba kin ym aiwai shuh ïa ki dukan ha ki briew kiba die ïa ki jingdie kiba ka Sorkar ka la ñiew ba ki long be-ain ne kiba ju die kyiad tuh ha ka por mynmiet.Ka Dorbar Shnong ka la rai ruh ban phah khang khyrdep ïa ki baroh ki dukan ha ka shnong Urkaliar naduh ka por 10:00 baje baje mynmiet katkum ka hukum ba la pynmih da ki bor synshar ka East Khasi Hills District.“Ngi la pynmih da ka jingbthah sha baroh ki nongshong dukan ba ki dei ban khang khyrdep ïa ki dukan jong ki naduh ka por 10:00 baje mynmiet bad ha kajuh ka por ki nongbuh dukan ki dei ban buh ruh ïa ki CCTV Camera hakhmat ki dukan jong ki bad ba ki dei ban pyntip sha ki bor pynïaid shnong ne sha ki bor jong ka aiñ lada ka don ka jingpynkheiñ aiñ kata lada ka jingïadie ïathied ka dang bteng hadien ka 10:00 baje mynmiet,” la ong u Bah Diengdoh.
title: MIH KA JINGÏARAH WAIT HA URKALIAR, HUKUM KA DC BAN KHANG DUKAN NADUH 10 BAJE MYNMIET

content: U MLA ka 19 South Shillong Konstitwensi u Bah Sanbor Shullai u la leit ban jurip ïa ka Police Station kaba don ha Laban na ka bynta ka jingthmu ban shna noh ïa ki ïing sah jong kiba trei ha katei ka station ka jingthmu hi ka dei ban shna ïa ka Police Quarter kaba la ïoh ka jingmang tyngka na ka sorkar pdeng bad kaba la ïaid lyngba ka jingtyrwa jong u bad kaban pyntrei da ka Police Engineering wing jong ka tnat pulit.Haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Sanbor Shullai uba dei ruh u Chairman jong ka MTDC u la ong ba ka jingmang na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka quarter kaban donlang bad ka Multiple parking lot la mang ha ka dor kumba T. 4, 72,8000 lak kaba dei ka jingtei kaba 2 tylli ha ki 6 unit kaba dei ka LS Quarter RCC building kaba dei ka mala ka G+2 bad ka por kadei hi hapoh ki 24 bnai kaban ngiam kumba 20 ïing.Ha kane ka jingleit jurip kaba la ïadonlang u Bah R Nongseij u Engineer ka tnat pulit, u OC ka Laban police station bad u Rangbah Shnong u Bah Edward Kharwanlang bad ki nongïalam shnong. Ha kane ka sngi u Bah Sanbor u la leit ruh ban jurip ïa ki nala ban shna noh shen ka Aqueduct Drainage kaba la ud da ki nongshong shnong bad kaba long na ka surok PWD kaba long hajan ka jaka sah ka Kong Glorimai Laban shaduh ka Surok sha St. John Laban Parish kaba hab ha madan Laban kaba long ka jingmyntoi ïa kiba ïaid lynti bad ki Khynnah skul kaba la mang hapoh ka SPA state PWD scheme kaba la mang T. 55, 29,000 lak ha kaba ïa kine ruh yn sa sdang noh shen ban shna noh bad tang shu lah dep ka dorbar mang tyngka ka kam kan sa ïaid noh shakhmat.Na ka Liang u Bah Sanbor u la ïathuh ba lah bun bun snem ki nongtrei kane ka tnat pulit ki la sah ha kine ki quarter kiba rim naduh ki por ka sorkar Assam bad kine ki ïing ki long ki la pei ki tnum ïing bad kiba lah sniew.Halor kine ki ïing u la ong ba u la ïoh ban tyrwa sha ka sorkar bad mynta la ïoh ka jingmang pisa.“Ïa kine ki ïing ba la sniew yn pynpra noh bad shna thymmai kumjuh ruh ban shna jaka ïeng kali ban thep ïa kine ki kali ba dang don case jong ka thanat pulit kiba la shu buh bad pynïeng ha rud surok.Nga ai khublei ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad Sangma, ïa u Bah Prestone Tynsong bad ïa u Bah Lahkmen Rymbui uba la long kum u Myntri ki Kam Pohïing barim kiba la shim khia ban pynïoh ïa ka jingmynjur bad ka jingmang tyngka,” ong u Bah Shullai.
title: 1 KLUR TAM YN PYNLUT BAN SHNA ÏA KI QUARTER PULIT BAD ÏA KI NALA HA LABAN

content: U District Magistrate ka ka West Jaiñtia Hills u la pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC hadien ka jingïoh jingujor ba ki nongshong shnong ka Umshangiar, Raij Tamu, Elaka Nongjngi, kim shym la bud ïa ka hukum ba la pynmih da u Executive Magistrate jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills District u W.K. Kharbuli katkum ka jingujor Case No. 11/2023 U/S 107/145 CrPC bad katkum ka jingïoh kaiphod na ka Saitsama Out Post jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills ba ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong ka Umshangiar ki dang bteng ban leit pom ïa ki dieng ki siej wat hadien ba la don ka jingujor mukotduma halor ka jingïaknieh jaka hapdeng ka shnong Lumlakhiat bad ka shnong Umshangiar.Katkum ka kaphod na ki Pulit la pyntip ka la don ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon aiñ ba ladep pynbna khamtam ha kine ki ar tylli ki shnong ba don hapdeng ka jingïakajia pud kata ha “LumKhohskhen”, “LumMynsiang” bad ha “Um Saitshyieng” jong ka Raij Tamu, Elaka Nongjngi West Jaiñtia Hills District.Khnang ban wanrah ïa ka jingshongsuk shongshngaiñ bad ban lait na ki jingjia ba sngewsih ha kine ki shnong, u District Magistrate, ka West Jaiñtia Hills Bah B.S. Sohliya u la pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC ba la mana pyrshah ban ïalum paidbah shi jaka palat ïa ka san ngut shaneng.La khang ban rah ïa ki tiar pynmynsaw bad kane ka hukum kam shym la khang ïa ki Pulit kiba don ha ka kamram.La khang ban pom ïa ki dieng ki siej, ka jingleit pynkhuid ïa ki jaka ki puta lane kino kino ki kam kiba pynkheiñ ïa ka kyndon aiñ.La khang ban rah ïa ki kurat bad ki wait kiba pyndonkam ban pom ïa ki dieng ki siej ha ki bynta ba ïakajia.La khang ban ïaid ki kali ha kitei ki bynta da ka jingthmu ban leit kit ïa ki dieng ki siej lait tang ki kali Pulit ki ban pyndep ïa ka kamram.Kane ka hukum kan treikam mardor ha kitei ki bynta ba ïakajia pud kynthup ha ka shnong LumKhohskhen”, “LumMynsiang”, bad  ha “Um Saitshyieng”, kiba dang hap hapoh ka Raij Tamu, Elaka Nongjngi West Jaiñtia Hills District.Kino kino kiba pynkheiñ ïa kine ki jingmana ki lah ban shah pynshitom katkum ka kyndon jong ka Section 188 jong ka Indian Penal Code (IPC).Kane ka hukum kan treikam mardor tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.
title: BA IAKAJIA PUD HA KA RAID TAMU, ELAKA NONGJRI PYNJARI SECTION 144 CRPC U DC KA WJH

content: The Khelo India University Games (KIUG) 2023 commenced on February 20, 2024 in the city was concluded today in the presence of Matsiewdor War Nongbri, Secretary Printing & Stationery, Revenue, who is also the President of Archery Association of Meghalaya, Rama Shankar Ram  General Manager  BSNL Meghalaya,  Raj Kumar Giridhari Singh Finance Officer NEHU and others.The four days event would be a memorable day for the Archers who came from different parts of the Country, also experiencing the pleasant climate of Shillong. The Games went on smoothly even though a downpour was also occurred.On 23rd February a final was conducted for Compound Men Individual in which Chirag Vidyarthi from Rani Durgavati Vishwavidyalaya won the Gold Medal, Adiya Dnyandev Gadadhe from Savitribai Phule Pune University MS won the Silver and Harpreet Singh   Maan from Chandigarh University won a Bronze Medal. In a Compound Women Individual  Mahel Pathan From Savitribai Phule  Pune University MS won the Gold Medal Sunainadevi from Lovely Professional University Punjab  a Silver medal, and B Manasa Nayana From Lovely Professional University a Bronze medal.Compound Mix Team, Savitribai Phule Pune University  represented by  Parth Sunil Korde and Mahek Pathan won  the gold medal,  Lovely Professional University Punjab represented by  Vikas and Sunainadevi a silver medal, and  Guru Nanak Dev University Amritsar represented by  Sangarsh Dev Singh and Kiran a Bronze medal.Compound Women team  Lovely Professional University represented by  Sunainadevi, B Manasa Nayana, Krati Swami, and Khushboo won a gold medal, where was Guru Nanak Dev University represented by Kiran, Somanshi , Medatwal, Khusi Sharma  and Anjali won a silver medal.  Savitribai Phule Pune University represented by  Mahek Pathan, Vaishnaveevishwambhar Ubale, Hrutuja Vinay Gate and Divya Sampat Gavhane won a Bronze medal.Compound Men team Lovely Professional University represented by  Vikas, Deepak Kumar, Vishesh Vaidwan and Deepak  won a Gold Medal, where was Guru Nanak dev University Amritsar Represented by Sangarsh, dev Singh, Hirtik Sharma, Amit Thakur and Mohd  Shavej a Silver, Savitribai Phule Pune  University represented by  Parth Sunil Korde, Aditya Dnyandev Gadadhe, Soumitro Satyabhataghosh and Anuj Sanjay Patil back Bronze medal.On 24th February a final on Recurve Men individual Punjab University Patiala represented by Pawab won a Gold Medal, Lovely Professional University Punjab represented by Mrinal Chauhan a Silver medal and Punjab University Patiala represented by Jaswinder Singh back Bronze medal.Recurve women Individual Lovely Professional University Punjab represented by Somya Negi won a Gold Medal, Hemchandracharya North University Gujarat represented by Bhagaviben Vargishkumar a Silver and Ranchi University Jharkhand represented by Sabitri Kumari back Bronze medal.  In Recurve Mix team, Rani Durgavati Vishwavidyalaya represented by Amit Kumar and Kratika Bichpuriya won a Gold Medal, Kurukshetra University Haryana Represented by Shivam Kumar and Ridhi a Silver medal and  Maharaja Ganga Singh University represented by  Anuj Bhambhu and Pariksha back Bronze medal.Recurve Men team Lovely Professional University, Punjab represented by Mrinal Chauhan, Aditya Chaudhary, Santosh Dutta and Jashandeep won a Gold Medal. Punjab University Patiala represented by Jaswinder Singh, Robin , Pawan, and Daleep Bregar with a Silver Medal and Savitribai Phule Pune University MS represented by Kunal Vinayak Pawar, Ritesh Narendra Deshmukh, Lakhan Rajendra Bhoi, and  Om Bhupal Vinchu with a Bronze medal.Recurve Women Team Guru  Jambheshwar University of Sci and Tech Hisar represented by  Avani, Ravina, Preeti, Dikshu won a Gold medal, Lovely Professional University Punjab represented by Tisha Punia, Dikshanayak, Somya Negi and  Veerpal Kaur with a Silver medal and Punjab University of Patiala is represented by Harpreet Kaur, Tanishaverma, Gurmeharkaurgrewal, and Shweta Singh with a Bronze medal.Overall best performance in men , Lovely Professional University Punjab emerged as the best and took away the trophy,  Rani Durgavati Vishwavidyalaya second and Savitribai  Phule Pune university third place and in women, Lovely Professional University Punjab emerged as the best, Savitribai  Phule Pune university in the Second place and Rani Durgavati Vishwavidyalaya in third place.
title: LPU CAPTURES GOLD IN ARCHERY AT KHELO INDIA UNIVERSITY GAMES 2023

content: Ar tylli ki kali ba kynthup ïa ka Auto Truck bad kawei ka kali JCB ba pynieng ha phyllaw ïing ki la jan ingkhong hadien ba ki runar ki la kawang da u petrol bom hynrei donbok ba ki trai ing kiba la iohsngew ia ka jingbthei ki la pynlip noh ïa ka ding da kaba theh um ban lait na ka jingpluh jong kine ki ar tylli ki kali ba la pynieng ha phyllaw ing.Kane la jia ha ka step sngi U Blei ha ka por kumba 1.20 mynstep ha kaba ki runar ki bym lah ban ithuh durkhmat ki la kawang da u petrol bom ha ka jaka ba la pynieng ïa ka kali Auto Truck bad ka kali JCB ha ka phyllaw ïing jong u Bah Lovercuf Nongshli ha ka shnong Umsning Patarim ba hap ha ka Umsning Police Outpost, Ri Bhoi District.Ka Auto Truck kaba don ïa u number ML10 A – 4205 ka dei jong uwei u bar jylla ba la tip kyrteng kum u Horander Prasad, ha kaba u ju pyndonkam ban kit ïa ki mar.Ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane, ki leit mardor sha kane ka jaka ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bad ha ka jingtohkit la lap ba ym don kano kano ka jingjia basngewwsih lait noh ka jingjulor ba malu mala jong ka kali Auto Truck.Ki Pulit ki la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap ksai ïa ki runar kiba donkti ha kane ka kam bymman bad u Superintendent of Police ka Ribhoi District u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa u ong ba ki runar kiba donkti ha kane ka kam bymman kin ym lait suk na ki kti jong ka aiñ.
