title: KAWANG PETROL BOM KI RUNAR ÏA KA JAKA PYNÏENG KALI HA UMSNING PATARIM

content: : Ka North East Students’ Organization (NESO) ka la pynrem jur ïa ka jingpynbthei bom kaba la jia ha ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai ba phyllaw jong ka AII Manipur Students’ Union (AMSU) kaba don ha DM University Campus, Thangmeiband, Imphal, kaba lam sha ka jingkhladnoh jong uwei u samla uba la tip kyrteng kum u Oinam Kenejy, uba pule ha DM College katba uwei pat uba la mynsaw jur uba la tip kyrteng kum Salam Michael uba pule ha DM College.Ha u kyrwoh, u Chairman jong ka Organisation u Bah Samuel Jyrwa u la ong ba ka NESO ka pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor kine ki jingjia khamtam hadien ka jingshah wiang ding jong ka ophis treikam UCM kynthup ïa ka Macha Leima School, ka jingpynjulor ïa kiwei kiwei ki ophis treikam jong ki kynhun sengbhalang, ka jingpynjot bad pynjulor ïa ka ingsah jong u Sinam Prakash uba dei u Advisor jong ka NESO.U la ong ba ka AMSU ka dei kaba kiar ïalade ban ïadon bynta bad ka saiñpyrthei bad kam pat ju don bynta ruh ha kano kano ka jingïaumsnam la ka long ha kano kano ka dur.“Ha kum kane ka por, ka long kaba donkam ïa ki paidbah ban kdew lynti bad ban pynthikna ba ka AMSU kan ïai bteng ban long ka kynhun ka bym don bynta ha ka saiñpyrthei hynrei ban pynlong ïa ki jingïakhih ki bym ïaumsnam. Kine ki jingjia, ki la pynkulmar jingmut bad pynsyier mynsiem ruh ïa ki samla pule bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki paidbah,” ong u Bah Jyrwa.U la ong ba ka NESO, ka khot bad wer ban wanrah biang ïa ka jingshongsuk bad ha kajuh ka por u la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba kan shimkhia ïa kine ki jingjia bad ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad ban kem ïa ki nongleh kam bymman.“Nalor kata, ka Sorkar ka dei ban bteng ban wanrah ïa ka shongsuk bad ha kajuh ka por ban shimkhia ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakren bad baroh ki seng kieng atiar khnang ban ïada ïa ki jaidbynriew ritpaid jong ka jylla Manipur ba ka jingsuk kan long kaba neh junom,” ong u Chairman ka NESO.
title: KAWANG BOM KI RUNAR ÏA KA JAKA TREIKAM KA AMSU,  PYNREM JUR KA NESO

content: Ki thylliej ding barhem ki la bamduh ïa ka ïingsah jong ka Kong Ribiang Phawa ha ka shnong Tuberkmaishnong, East Jaiñtia Hills District  ha ka sngi u Blei.Watla kane ka ïing ka la pluh ha ka por kumba 2:00 baje mynstep hynrei donbok ba ym shym la don ba mynsaw.“Baroh ki jingdon jingem hapoh ka ïing ki la kylla dpei lut namar ka jingklang jong ki thylliej ding bad bam duh ploiñ ïa ka ïing ka sem bad ki jingdon jingem baroh kiba don hapoh ïing,” la ïathuh u Waheh Shnong ka Tuberkmaishnong Bah Miki Lyngdoh.“Ka ding ka la sdang ha ka por kumba 2:00 baje mynstep hynrei ym shym la don kano kano ka jingjia basngewsih ha kane ka jingpluh ïing hynrei tang ka jingduh noh ïa ki tiar kiba don hapoh ïing,” ula ong.Na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Shnong Tuberkmaishnong khot bad wer ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong ba kin mih shakhmat ban ïarap lem ïa kane ka longiing jong ka Kong Ribiang Phawa kaba la ngat ha kane ka apot pluh ïing.Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia mar mar ki dkhot ka seng hapoh ka jingïalam jong u President Bah Streamly S. Suchen bad u Finance Secretary Bah Shaniahskhem S.Dkhar ki la leit ban ai jingïarap ïa ka longïing jong ka Kong Ribiang Phawa.Ka KSU ka la kyrpad ruh ïa ki paidbah lane ki riewshimet ba kin don ïa ka mynsiem ban ïarap ïa kiba ngat ha ki jingjia bapher bapher da kaba wan shakhmat ban ïarap lem ïa ki.
title: KYLLA DPEI KA ÏING HA TUBERKMAISHNONG, MARMAR LEIT AI JINGÏARAP KA KSU

content: Kum shibynta na ki kam ïasnohkti lang ban kyrshan ïa ki nongshong shnong na ka liang ki shipai BSF kila pynlong ïa ka jingïalehkai na ka bynta ki khynnah skul jong ki phra tylli shnong kiba don ha khappud bad ka Bangladesh ka Cheragaon, Rongdusora, Naosora, Bagli, Kachusora, Garobita, Majhesora, bad Khunjoy kiba hab hapoh jong ka South West Khasi Hills District.Ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ na ka liang jong ki shipai BSF kim shym la pynkut tang ha ka jingpynlong ïa ki jingïalehkai ïa ki khynnah skul na katei ka thaiñ hynrei kila pynlong ruh ïa ka jingai dawai ei na ka bynta kitei ki shnong ha kaba palat 200 ngut ki nongshong shnong kila ïoh jingmyntoi.Nalor ka jingai dawai ei, la sam ruh sha ki khynnah skul bad ia ki nongshong shnong, ki jingai jingïarap ki kynthup ïa ki tiar kum ki kor suh jaiñ, tiar ïarap ban ïaid, ki miej, ki shuki ki tiar kynjat ball na ka bynta ki khynnah baroh ki tiar kiba pynlut ban thied ka long T.2.95 lak tyngka.Ha kane sngi la don lang ki Rangbah shnong, ki nongkitkam shnong, ki nonghikai khynnah skul bad ki nongshong shnong, na ka liang ki rangbah shnong kila ai khublei ïa ki BSF kiba la ïarap na ka bynta ki shnong kiba sah ha ki thaiñ ha khappud.
title: SAM TIAR SPORTS BAD AI JINGSUMAR KI BSF ÏA KI PAIDBAH HA KHAPPUD SWKH

content: U Dikseng A. Sangma ha ka 18 tarik u Rymphang, 2024 u la ujor sha ki Pulit jong ka Women Police Station, Tura, West Garo Hills ban pyntip halor ka jingjah rngai jong ka kurim jong u ka Noring Ch. Marak kaba la 32 snem ka rta bad ki arngut ki khun shynrang kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Salgado .Ch Marak uba dang 9 snem ka rta bad u Algarik Ch. Marak uba dang 7 snem ka rta kiba shong basah ha ka shnong Soragre, Edenbari, Tura West Garo Hills District.Katkum kane ka ejahar u Dikseng A. Sangma u la iathuh ba  ka kurim jong u bad ki arngut ki khun shynrang ki la leit sha iew Tura ha ka 17 tarik u Rymphang, 2024 hynrei kim shym la wan phai shuh sha la iing naduh kane ka sngi.  U Dikseng A. Sangma u la kyrpad ia kino kino kiba iohi ia kine ki lai ngut kin pyntip lyngba u number 84719 48197.
title: JAHRNGAI KA LONGKMIE GARO BAD ARNGUT KI KHUN NA ÏEW TURA

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Nongpoh Circle ha ka Sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep ki la hiar jurip ha iew Nongpoh hadien ba ki la ioh ujor na kiba bun ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah skul ba ki nongdie kot ha kane ka iew ki la shim kabu shaba palat da kaba die tam na ka dor ba la buh bad kane ka la buh jingeh bha ia ki longiing kiba duk ba rangli.Ha ka jingjurip, ka seng ka la lap ba ki nongdie kot ki die tam ia ki kot na ka dor ba la buh da kaba aidaw ba ki la lut bun ha ka bai kit ïa ki kot.Na ka liang jong ka seng hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Secretary ka KSU Nongpoh Circle u samla Baiashanlang Kharshanlor ka leit ban ujor ha u Deputy Commissioner jong ka Ri Bhoi District u Arpit Upadhyaya ha kaba u Deputy Commissioner u la kular ban shimkhia ïa kane ka kam.
title: UJOR KA KSU SHA U DC BA SHIM KABU KI NONGDIE KOT HA ÏEW NONGPOH

content: Namar ka jingkhein sting bad khlem da burom lang shuh jong ki trai dukan kiba shong dukan ha Mawlong Hat ka la wanrah ia ka jingdheng kali kaba jur bha, ha kaba ki bus kiba wan na ki thain nongkyndong kim shym la ioh rung shuh sha Mawlong Hat Parking Lot, hynrei ki la hap ban pynieng noh sha Umshyrpi.Halor kane, na ka liang ka ophis Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ha ka 30 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, 2023 ka la pynmih ia ka rukom pyniaid kali thymmai ha Mawlong Hat Parking Lot ha kaba la bthah ia ka baroh ki trok ba ki dei ban mih noh ha ka por 9:99 baje mynstep hadien ba ki la dep ban pynhap ia ki mar ki mata.Kaei kaba la jia ha ka step jong ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai, ki bus kim shym la iohrung satia sha ka jaka ba la pynbeit ba kin ieng, hynrei namar ka jingbym pynhap mar ki trok kine ki bus ki la hap ban ieng ha ka thain Angelee ter ter shaduh Them Iew Mawlong hynrei ki la shah beh noh ha ki Pulit.Halor kane ki nongialam ka Khasi Hills Bazar Bus Association (KHBBA) tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia marmar ki la leit ban iakynduh ia u CEO jong ka Municipal bad kumjuh ruh ia u Superintendent of Poice (Traffic) ka East Khasi Hills bad na ka liang u CEO ka Municipal u la bthah ia ka Association ban pynbeit bad ki briew ba dei khmih jong ka tnad ba peit ia ka jaka ieng kali ha Iew Mawlong.
title: BA KHLEM AKOR KI TRAI DUKAN, MAD JINGEH KI PAIDBAH BAD DRAIBAR BUS HA MAWLONG HAT

content: Namar ka jingiai kiew man la u snem jong ka jingpang HIV/AIDS hapoh ka jylla bad shi bynta ban pynsngewthuh paidbah, ka Meghalaya State AIDS Control Society, ha ka sien kaba 5 kan pynlong ia ka Red Fest lyngba ka North East Multimedia Campaign halor ka phang pdeng, North East United Against HIV/AIDS.Ia kane ka Red Fest ka Meghalaya State AIDS Control Society yn sa pynlong ha Lariti Centre for Performing Arts, Shillong, Meghalaya ha ka 28 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha ka jingkren bad ki lad pathai khubor ka Dr. B Cruise kaba dei ka project Director ka la ong ba ha kane ka Red Fest kin don haduh 2500 ngut ki nongia shim bynta ba kynthup naduh ki heh ophisar na ki tnad bapher bapher.Na ka liang u Deputy Director u Bah Ajoy Lanong u la iathuh ba kumba 126 tylli ki district jong baroh ki jylla ka North East kin wan ban ia shim bynta ha kane ka Red Fest bad kin don ruh shibun ki kynhun tem bapher bapher ki ban wan ia shim bynta lang.
title: HA KA RED FEST, LYNGBA KI SUR JINGRWAI YN ÏAKHUN PYRSHAH ÏA KA HIV BAD AIDS

content: Watla ka University of Science and Technology, Meghalaya ka don hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Jylla Meghalaya hynrei ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewlyngngoh ban tip ba kane ka skulbah kaba don ha khappud jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bunsien ka la pynmih ia ki khubor laitkam sha ki kot khubor kiba dei na ka jylla Assam hynrei ym ha ki kotkhubor kiba la pynmih na ka jylla Meghalaya.Ki nongialam jong ka Ri Bhoi People Council ba la lamkhmat da u President u Bah Jayson Lennox Nongrum bad ka Meghalaya People’s Social Organisation ba la lamkhmat da ka President ka Kong M. Wanniang hadien ki la ioh ujor na kiba bun ki khun samla, ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei ki la leit ban iakynduh ia u Chancellor jong ka University of Science and Technology, Meghalaya u M. Hoque ban iakren sani halor kane ka kam.Ha ka jingiakren, ki nongialam jong kine ki ar tylli ki kynhun ki la kyntu ia u Chancellor ba ka USTM kan ym pynlong ia ki interview kam ha ki sngi u Blei da kaba pyrkhat lem ia ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya khambun kiba dei ki Khristan bad ban kiar katba lah ban pyndonkam ia ki Gamosha na ka Jylla Assam haba don kino kino ki prokram hapoh kane ka skulbah hynrei ban pyndonkam beit da ki jain Ryndia ba la pynmih na kane ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: WATLA KA USTM KA DON HA MEGHALAYA, PYNBNA LAITKAM SHA KI KOTKHUBOR ASSAM

content: Ki surok thymmai kiba pynïasoh sha ka shnong Nongkhlaw, West Khasi Hills District ia kiba la mang pisa da ka sorkar Jylla ban pyntrei na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ïa ka jingiaseng Samla Synod Sepngi hapoh ka shnong Nongkhlaw ha u snem 2023 ki la shu sah khongreng bad khlem don ba pyntrei shuh ia ki hadien ba la kut ka jingiaseng Synod.Ïa kane la lap da ka Fedearation of Khasi Jaiñtia & Garo People, Lai Lyngdoh Area Unit ha ka jingleit jurip ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei ha ryngkat ka jingïdonlang jong ki dkhot ka FKJGP Nongstoiñ Circle bad ki nongïalam shnong bad kane ka jingsah khongreng jong kine ki surok ka la pyndiaw bad pynlynngoh ïa kiba bun.Ki nongïalam ka FKJGP ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ki la ïathuh ba katkum ka jubab RTI kine ki don baroh haduh 6.335 kilomitar ha kaba ka jingsiangrong ka dang long tang 2 kilomkitar katba kaba dang sah ka long sa 4.335 kilomitar kaba la shu sah khongreng khlem pat da siangrong satia haduh mynta.Kumta na ka liang jong ka Seng ka la kyntu ia ki bor ba dei peit khamtam eh ïa ka tnad PWD ba kan phah trei pyndep noh mardor ïa baroh ki Contractor ki bym pat pyndep bad ka seng ka la dawa ruh ban pyndep hapoh u Lber mynta u snem hynrei lym kumta ka seng kam banse ban hap shim da kiwei pat ki sienjam ba tyngeh.
title: MAR ÏAKUT KA SYNOD SAH KHONGRENG KI SUROK THYMMAI BA PYNÏASOH SHA NONGKHLAW

content: Shillong Rymphang, 26: Namar ka jingpynslem jong ka Sorkar ban pynmih ia ka resol jong ka District Selection Committee (DSC) ha Ri Bhoi District ka Ka Ri Bhoi People’s Council (RBPC) ryngkat ka Meghalaya People’s Social Organisation (MPSO) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la pynbna ban pynlong da ka jingïakhih da kaba shong kyllaiñ myngngor ha ka 4 tarik Lber 2024 hakhmat ka Indoor Stadium kaba don ha Umlyngkdait.U President ka RBPC Samla Jayson Lennox Nongrum ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la pynpaw ba kum ka seng ka la shim ia ka sienjam ban pynlong da ki jingïakhih da kaba shong kyllain mynggnor ryngkat ka jingkyrpad ïa baroh ki samla wadkam kiba dang ap result ban ia shim bynta lang ha kane ka jingiakhih.Shuh shuh ki nongialam ki la pynpaw ba ka seng ka ladep ban iakren bad ka la iakynduh ruh ia u Chairman bad ia u Member Secretary jong ka DSC Committee hynrei i kumba ka jingleit kynduh kam shym la poi shaei shaei ruh namarba haduh mynta ym pat iohi ia u soh, kumta ki arseng ki la shim noh ia kane ka sienjam.
title: RYNGKAT KI SAMLA WADKAM YN SHONG KYLLAIÑ MYNNGOR BA SLEM KA RESULT DSC

content: Arngut ki snar nongkhaii drok ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei katba ki dang pynlong ïa ka jingtalasi ïa ki kali kiba wan na Kalain, Cachar, Assam.U Superintendent of Police ka East Jaiñtia Hills District Giri Prassad ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Baar u la pyntip ba ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ïa ka jingtalasi kali ha Umkiang ha ka por kumba 10:00 mynmiet ki la bat ïa kawei ka kali Tata truck 1512 kaba don ïa u nombar AS 28 AC -1046 katba ka dang wan na Kalain, Cachar Assam bad rung sha Lumshnong, Meghalaya.Ha ka jingtalasi, ki Pulit ki la lap ar tylli ki synduk thep sabon ba la suba ba la thep ïa u drok na ka met jong u Dony Paya Mulieh uba la 19 snem ka rta uba sah ha Khliehshnong, Lumshnong, East Jaintia Hills bad na u Langki Rymbai uba la 23 snem ka rta uba sah ha Dongdukan Lumshnong.Ha ka jingleh tes ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki riewpaidbah la pynshisha ba u dei u drok ‘Heroin’.  Hadien ba la thew, u drok u don ka jingkhia kaba 34.44 gram.Ïa u drok bad ar tylli ki mobile phone la kurup noh na kitei ki arngut bad ki Pulit ki la register case ha Lumshnong Police Station hapoh ka Section 21(b)/29 NDPS Act. Ka jingtohkit ïa kine ki arngut mynta ka dang ïaid shakhmat.
title: 34.44 GRAM U DROK BA SHONGDOR 28 LAK KURUP KI PULIT EJH, SHAH KEM ARNGUT

content: : Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) ha ka sngi Baar ka la pan jingpynshai na ka Sorkar Jylla ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkhreh ban aiti ïa u dewïong ba ladep tih sha ka Coal India Limited (CIL) na ka bynta ban die lilam ba ladep pynbit pynbiang nadong shadong da ka tnat Mining and Geology bad ïa ka jingdie lilam yn pynlong ha ki district bapher bapher.Ha ka shithi sha u Director ka Minerals Resources (DMR), u President ka HITO Bah Donbok Dkhar u la ong ba ka seng ka kwah ban ïoh jingtip ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingithuh bad ka jingpynbna ïa ki Designated Depot na ka bynta ka jinglum jingkheiñ ïa u dewïong ban die lilam, ka jingshna ïa ki Depot, ka jingkitkhlieh halor ka kit ka bah ïa u dewïong sha ki Designated Depot,  ka rukom ai ïa ka Transit Pass na ka bynta ka jingpynkit ïa u dewïong sha ki Designated Depot bad ki khyrdop mih, ka rukom pynkit ïa u dewïong da ki trai dewïong bad ki nongthied ïa u dewïong ba la lilam na ki Designated Depot hadien ba la aiti ïa ka Transit Pass, ka jingpynshisha ha Designated Depot, ka rukom die lilam bad ka buh jingkheiñ ïa ka pisa bad kiwei kiwei.Ka Seng ka la pan jingtip ruh halor ki rukom siew ïa ki Royalty, ka GST, CESS bad kiwei kiwei de ki rukom siew ba dei ban siew ïa ki nongshalan dewïong lane da ki nongthied dewïong kiba la ïoh ïa ka Challan/Transit Pass ban kit ïa u dewïong ba la ai da ka tnat Mining and Geology Department lane da ka Coal India Limited.“Hynrei ngi la ïoh jingtip ba ki don katto katne ki nongthied ïa u dewïong ba ka ophis jong phi kam shym la ai ïa ka NOC ban kit ïa u dewïong wat hadien ba ki la pyndep ban siew lut baroh ki jingsiew katkum ka lynti kaba dei.  Ka don ruh ka jingujor ba u Director um trei ban soi ïa ka NOC katba um pat ïoh ïa ka jingbthah ne u kyrwoh na ki bor bahalor jong u.  Ngi kwah ban tip mano kita ki bor bahalor ban ai ïa ka Challan ban kit ïa u dewïong lada kam dei hapoh ka bor jong u Director? la buh jingkylli u Bah Dkhar.“Ka pynlyngngoh ïa ngi ka long balei yn dang don sa kawei pat ka jingpynbeit haba baroh ki jingsiew ladep ban siew lut nadong shadong bad wat ïa ka Royalty bad ka Tax ruh ladep ban siew bad ki nongthied ïa u dewïong ki la bud ryntih ïa ki jingbthah jong ka Ingbishar bad ki bor ba dei peit,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Donbok ha ka shithi.
title: PYNKHREH KA SORKAR BAN LILAM ÏA U DEWIONG, PAN JINGSHAI KA HITO NA KA DMR

content: : U Myntri Rangbah barim ka Jylla u Mukul Sangma ha ka sngi Baar u la wanrah ïa ka Point of Order pyrshah ïa ka jingbym lah jong u Myntri Rangbah bad ki Myntri jong u ban don hapoh ka Ing ha ka jingïathir ïatai halor ka Mang Tyngka.Haba ïoh ïa ka jingthylli kreng kreng ki shuki ha ka Treasury Bench, u Dr. Mukul u la wanrah ïa ka Point of Order bad ong ba ka Rule ka kdew, “u Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka tnat um dei ban mih na ka ing khlem ka jingbit jong u Lamphang.”“(Hynrei), ngam ïohi satia uno uno ruh u Myntri, lymne ïa u Myntri Rangbah ne ïa kiwei kiwei ki Myntri ba la kham rangbah.  Tang uwei u dkhot ka Kynhun Myntri (Rakkam A. Sangma), uba shong bad u bym bat satia ïa ka tnat (ba la ïatai).  Namarkata, nga kwah ban kyntu ïa phi Symbud Lamphang ban pyntreikam da ka kyndon jong ka Procedure and Conduct of Business ha ka por kaba dei,” u la ong.Haba u Mukul u la kylli shaphang ka iktiar jong u shongknor halor kane kam, u Symbud Lamphang u Timothy D Shira u la jubaba da kaba ong, “ngan pyntip ïa ki (Myntri) ba kin wan.
title: KREN DOM U DR. MUKUL BA JAH U CM BAD KI MYNTRI KATBA DANG ÏATAI HALOR KA BUDGET

content: Shillong, Rymphang, 27: Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la mang pisa T. 5,50,00,000 klur na ka bynta ban pyntreikam ïa ka Chief Minister Youth Development Scheme ha u snem 2023-2024.Ïa kane la pyntip da u Myntri ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs Bah Shakliar Warjri haba jubab ha Assembly ha ka sngi Baar.U la pyntip ba T. 30 lak la bhah sha ka ophis Deputy Commissioner jong ka Shillong bad Tura katba T.17 lakh la mang na ka bynta ki 10 tylli ki district.U MLA ka Congress na Mawhati Bah Charles Marngar u la buh jingkylli, hato ka Sorkar ka don jingthmu ne em ban pyrkhat biang ban bhah pisa hapoh kane ka skhim katkum ka jingdon jong ki Constituency, u Myntri u la jubab ba ka jingmang pisa ka long katkum ka jingdon jong ki kynhun ne ki klob ba ladep pynrung kyrteng hapoh ka ophis Deputy Commissioner hynrei ym ha ki Constituency.Haba u MLA ka VPP na Nongkrem Bah Ardent Basaïawmoit u la pan jingtip lada ïa kane ka skhim lah ban ïoh lyngba ki MLA, u Myntri u la ong ba ïa kane ka skhim la ai lyngba ki Deputy Commissioner bad ka Directorate of Sports and  Youth Affairs.
title: 5.50 KLUR MANG KA SORKAR JYLLA BAN PYNTREIKAM ÏA KA CMYDS

content: : U MLA ka BJP na South Shillong Bah Sanbor Shullai ha ka sngi Baar ula aiti da ka shithi ha u State President ka BJP u Rikman G. Momin da ka jingkyntu ba ka party kan mynjur ïa ka Dr. Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait kum ka kyrtong  na Shillong Parliamentary Constituency ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long shen.U Bah Shullai u la kyrpad ruh ïa u Bah Alexander L. Hek, uba dei ruh u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla bad u MLA ka BJP na Pynthorumkhrah, ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka Dr. Nonglait bad ha kajuh ka por u la kyrpad ruh ïa u State President barim ka party  Bah Ernest Mawrie ban weng noh ïa ka jingpan tiket bad ban ai ka jingïatreilang.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingïakynduh ïa u State President, u Bah Shullai u la ong, “nga la wan lang bad ki nongkitkam jong ka South Shillong Mandal ban aiti ïa ka shithi ha u State President ban pynpaw ïa ka rai ba ngi la shim ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka Dr. Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait. Ngi kyntu ruh ïa ka party ba kan pdiang ïa ka (Dr Nonglait) kum ka kyrtong jong ka party ban ïakhun na Shillong Parliamentary Seat.”“Ka Dr. Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait ka dei ka Gold Medallist ha ka Law.  Ka jingnang jingstad ba ka la don kan long kum ka jingmihkhmat ïa ka imlang ka sahlang jong ngi kaba aijait sha ka kmie. Nalor, ba ka long ka briew kaba khuid bad ka jingtuklar biang por ïa ki jingeh kan ïarap ïa ngi ban ïoh ïa ka vote na ki thaiñ nongkyndong ruh,” u la ong.U Bah Shullai u la ïathuh ruh ba ïa ka shithi ba la aiti sha u National Vice President In-charge Meghalaya u Dr Chuba Ao, sha u National General Secretary bad Coordination ki Jylla ka North East u Rituraj Sinha kum ka jingpyntip.U Bah Shullai u la ïathuh ba u la ïakynduh ïa u Bah Hek ban ïakren sani halor kane ka kam mynta ka sngi.“Ngam shym ïohlad ban ïakynduh ïa u (Hek) namarba um shym la wan sha Assembly. Dang mynta hi ka sngi nga ïoh jingtip ba um lah ban ïaid namarba u shitom.  Ngan sa ïakynduh ïa u bad ngan sa ïakren markhmat khnang ba ma gni arngut ki MLA ngin  kyrpad ïa ka High Command jong ka Party ban mynjur ïa ka Dr. Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait kum ka kyrtong na Shillong Seat,” u la ong.“Nga ladep ïakren ruh bad u Bah Ernest Mawrie (bad kyrpad ïa u) lada u la lah ban weng noh ïa ka rai khnang ba ngin dup lah ban ïatreilang,” ula ong bad ïathuh ba u Bah Mawrie u la ong ba un ap shwa ïa ka rai jong ki nongïalam bahalor jong ka party.Shuh shuh u Bah Shullai u la ong ba ki paidbah ka rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia ki la babe ba ki la jied ïa u Bah Vincent H Pala. “San snem ha Parliament, u Bah Pala u la shu pynlut por tang ha kaba bam sohot,” la kynnoh u Bah Shullai.U Bah Shullai u la shah rem ha ka jingïakhun ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha kaba la long ha u snem 2019. U la kam ba u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing u Amit Shah u ladep ïakren bad u lyngba ka telephone bad kular ruh ba yn thung ïa u kum u Myntri ka DoNER lada u jop ha ka elekshon 2019.“Ka jingkyrpad jong nga sha ki paidbah ka long ba ki dei ban long kiba ïohi jngai bad ban ai ïa ka vote na ka bynta ka BJP.  Kan long ka jingkyrkhu lada ka party ka ai tiket ïa ka Kong Fenella bad lada ka jop khlempep kan ïoh ïa ka shuki Myntri bad ha kata ka por kan wanrah ïa ka dud bad ka ngap sha ka Jylla, kan wanrah shibun ki kam pynroi ban pynkha ïa ki lad ïohkam ïohjam sha ki paidbah ka jylla,” u la ong.“Lada ki samla ki kwah ïa ka kam ki dei ban ai ïa ka vote sha ka BJP. Ailad shisien ïa ka BJP,” la kyrpad u Bah Shullai.
title: KYRPAD U BAH SANBOR ÏA KA BJP BAN AI TIKET MP ÏA KA DR. FENELLA NONGLAIT

content: U Myntri Rangbah barim u Dr. Mukul Sangma uba dei ruh u MLA ka TMC na Songsak ha ka sngi Baar u la takraiñ tyngeh ïa ka Sorkar Jylla halor ka jingpynmih hukum ban pynkynriah kam ïa u Deputy Commissioner jong ka North Garo Hills hadien ba u la hukum ban thung ïa ka jingtohkit halor ka jingwanrah be-aiñ ïa u kwai tyrkhong na ka ri Bangladesh bad kumjuh ruh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshalan ïa u dewïong.Haba ïashim bynta ha ka jingïathir ïatai halor ka Mang Tyngka, u Dr. Mukul u la ong ba ïa ka hukum ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit da u Deputy Commissioner la pynmih ha ka 4 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024.“………hynrei kaei kaba la jia ka Sorkar ka ïada ïa kiba dei ban ai jingïada, ha ka sngi kaba bud (ha ka 5 tarik Kyllalyngkot) ka hukum pynkynriahkam ka la mih bluit………ha kaba u DC u la shah pynkynkynriah kam.  Mynta, nga kwah ban tip na ka Sorkar hato hadien ka jingpynkynriah kam ïa u DC ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid neem shakhmat, lane, don mano mao bym shym leh shuh ïa kata, namarba ka hukum jong u DC ka dei ban ieng,” u la ong.Ha kawei pat ka liang, u Dr. Mukul u la dawa ba dei ban thung da ka jingtohkit halor ka jingshah kawut lathi ki dkhot ka HYC ha u Pulit Ophisar hapoh Pynursla Police Station.“Nga la ïoh ïa kiwei ka jingpyntip na ka HYC, kaba ïadei bad kawei ka jingjia ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai ha kaba ki sengbhalang ki la leit pyntip sha ki Pulit ka Pynursla shaphang ka jingshalan tuh ïa ki muid.  Hynrei kaei kaba la jia ka la pynkyndit, ha ka jaka ba ki Pulit kin pyndep ïa ka kamram halor ka jingujor ki la leh donbor pynban, nga kwah ban thung jingtohkit halor kane,” u la ong.
title: SANGAH U DR. MUKUL ÏA KA SORKAR MDA BA PYNKYNRIAH KAM ÏA U DC KA NORTH GARO HILLS

content: Ki nongrep synsar kiba dei na ka thaiñ Mawsynram bad kumjuh ruh na Ri Bhoi bad na kiwei ki jaka kiba dap da ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jinghiar dor kynsan kynsan jong u synsar hapoh ka jylla ha ka sngi Balang ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki nongïalam ka Hill Farmer Union (HFU) ki la tur sha MECOFED, Mawiong ban wad jingtip halor ka dor ka mur jong u synsar.“Ka jinghiardor jong u synsar ka la pynïap nong shibun ïa ki nongrep. Ki nongrep synsar na ka thaiñ Riwar bad na kiwei kiwei ki jaka ki ïoh ban kyrshan skul ïa ki khun ki kti bad ban pyndap ïa ka ing ka sem lyngba ka kam rep synsar.  Ki la don ki nongrep synsar kiba la pyntip sha ngi, ba kim ïoh shuh wat tang ban siew ïa ka baikot na ka bynta ki khun khamtam ha kum kane ka por ba la plie ki skul,” la ong u President ka HFU Bah Commander Shangpliang ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Hadien ba jingïakren bad ki nongkhaii synsar, ngi sngewthuh ba ki don ka bor ban tehlakam ïa ka dor jong u synsar la ka long ki nongkhaii na kane ka jylla lane ki nongkhaii kiba nabar ka jylla,” la ong u Bah Shangpliang.U la ong ba ki nongkhaii ha MECOFED ki la kam ba ka jinghiar dor jong u synsar ka dei namar ka jingbun u mar.  “Ki (nongkhaii) ong ba ka jinghiar dor ka dei namarba u bun u mar, hynrei ïa kata ngim tip ïoh lehse ka dei tang ka buit jong ki bad ngi la kren da kaba shai ba kin (nongkhaii) pynkiew beit ïa ka dor ïa kaba ki nongkhaii ki la kyntait mardor,” la bynrap u Bah Shangpliang.U la ïathuh ba ka Union kan sa leit ban ïakynduh ïa ka Myntri kaba khmih ïa ka tnat ka Rep ka Riang ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh ban ïakren halor ka dor ka mur jong ki mar rep bad ba ka Sorkar ka  dei ban pyntreikam ïa ka Minimum Support Price (MSP).Shuh shuh u la kam ba ki nongkhaii ki la leh da kiba bun ki buit tang ba ïoh khñiot ïa ka dor.“Nalor ba ki nongrep ki hap ban trei shitom baroh shisnem, ki nongkhaii kim dei ban khñiot ïa ka dor namarba ka wanrah ïa ka jingduhnong kaba khraw. Ka Sorkar ka dei ban pyntreikam ïa ka Minimum Support Price (MSP) kaba ki nongrep ha ka ri baroh  kawei ki dawa. Ngi iengskhem ym dei tang ïa u synsar hynrei wat ha kiwei kiwei ki mar rep ruh ka Sorkar ka dei ban pyntreikam ïa ka Minimum Support Price (MSP),” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Shangpliang.“Ngin ym lah ban kynjoh sha kata ka thong 10 billion Dollar ba la buh da ka Sorkar, lada ki nongrep jong ngi ki dang hiar arsut,” la kynthoh u Bah Shangpliang.Uwei na ki nongrep ka thaiñ Mawsynram u la ong, “ha u snem baladep ngi dang lah ban die ïa u synshar ha ka dor T.120-130  bad ka la ïarap khyndiat ïa ki nongrep ha ka jylla baroh kawei hynrei mynta u snem ka dor  jong u synsar ngi dang ïoh ban die na ki shnong ha ka dor T.70 ha ka sien banyngkong hynrei mynta ha kine ki sngi ka dor ka hiar haduh T.40 haduh T. 30 bad kane ka pynsngewsih ïa ngi namarba ngim sngewmyntoi shuh ban dang rep.”“Ki marwari ki la ai jingmut ïa ngi ban leit ïakren bad ka Sorkar ba kan buh da ka Minimum Support Price khnang ki nongrep kin ym duhnong,” u la ong.“Ka Sorkar ka wanrah bun tylli ki mishon na ka bynta ki nongrep hynrei na ka bynta ki nongrep synsar ka long kaba sngewsih ba ka pynïap dor ïa ngi namarba ha iew ka dor ka hiar palat mar shiteng,”u la ong.
title: BA HIAR DOR U SYNSAR TUR KI NONGREP SHA MECOFED BAD KI NONGÏALAM KA HFU

content: Ia ki Finance Accounts and Appropriation Accounts na ka bynta u snem 2022-23, ba iadei bad ka sorkar Meghalaya, ba la pynkhreh hapoh ka Article 151 (2) jong ka Riti Synshar jong ka India, la wanrah ha iing dorbar thawain jong ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka 27.02.2024.Ki Finance Accounts ki pyni ia ki jingioh bad jingsiew jong ka Sorkar na ka bynta u snem, ryngkat bad ki kam pisa ba la pynpaw da ki revenue bad capital account, public debt bad public account balance ba don ha ki account jong ka. La pyllait ia ki Finance Accounts ha ki ar tylli ki volume, ban pynlong ia ki kiba bit ba biang bad kiba ai jingtip. Ka Volume I jong ki Finance Accounts ki don ka Kaiphod jong u Comptroller and Auditor General of India, ki kaiphod jong baroh ki jingioh bad ki jingsiew bad ka ‘Notes to Finance Accounts’ ka don ka jingbatai shaphang ki polisi ba kongsan ba iadei bad ki kam pisa, ka jinglong jingman jong ki account  bad kiwei kiwei. Ka Volume II ka don ki statement ba bniah (Part-I) bad ki appendice (Part- II). Na ka T. 17,641 klur ki jingioh ba la ioh jingtip ha ki Finance Account na ka bynta u snem 2022-23 ki bynta ba kongsan ba la ioh da ka jylla Meghalaya kilong T. 9,937 klur kum ka khajna, T.4,426 klur kum ki Grant bad T. 2,796 kum ki jingshim ram bad kiwei kiwei. Ka jingpynlut kaba bun ha u snem 2022-23 ki kynthup ka jingpynlut ia ki jinglum ia ki jingioh kaba T. 14,864 klur bud sa ka jingpynlut pisa kaba T. 2,742 klur.Ki Appropriation Account ki kyrshan ia ki Finance Account. Ki pyni ia ka jingpynlut jong ka sorkar jylla pyrshah ia ki jinglut ‘Charged’ ha ka Consolidated Fund lane ‘Voted’ da ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain jong ka Jylla. Ki don 4 tylli ki grant ba kyllum lang jong ka Charged bad Voted, 06 ki Charged Appropriation bad 56 ki Voted Grant. Ha kaba kut jong u snem 2022-23, ka jingpynlut jong ka sorkar Meghalaya pyrshah ia ka mang tyngka ba la mynjur da ka iing dorbar thawain, ka pyni ka jingtyngkai kaba T. 532 klur (2.43 percent jong ka Revised Estimate kaba T. 21,926 klur). Ki katto katne ki grant kum kito kiba iadei bad ka jingkhmih ia ki kam ai jingsumar, ka jingkhmih ia ki kam ba iadei bad ka rep ka riang bad kiwei kiba iadei bad kane, ka jingkhmih ia ki kam jong ka Tnat Animal Husbandry bad Veterinary ka pyni ia ki jingtyngkai ba kongsan.Ki Appropriation Account ki ai jingtip shaphang ka jingpynlut kaba bun kaba T. 3,439.41 klur palat ia jingai jingmynjur da ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain jong ka Jylla  hapoh hynniew tylli ki Grant bad kawei ka non- grant. Ka jingpynlut kaba kham tam kalong hapoh ki grant ba iadei bad ka bai bam tymmen- T. 203.62 klur, Bording- T. 382.57 klur, Ki Kam ialehkai – T. 49.03 klur bad ka non-grant Public Debt – T. 2,786.56 klur. Shuh shuh, ka don ka jingpynlut kaba T. 804.75 klur (Revenue T. 24.40 klur, Capital T. 780.36 klur) kaba la lut khlem ka jingpynbiang lypa / Supplementary / re-appropriation ha 12 tylli ki phang, 5 tylli ki Grant bad kawei ka Non-Grant.Ki Mat jong ki Annual Accounts(i) Unadjusted Abstract Contingent (AC) Bills: Ki don 53 tylli ki Abstract Contingent (AC) Bills ba kot T. 98.25 klur kiba ym pat ioh ha kaba kut jong ka 31 tarik Lber 2023 na ka bynta ki Detailed Countersigned Contingent (DCC) bills. Kumta, kam don ka jingpynthikna ba ka jingpynlut kaba T. 98.25 klur ka dei kaba la lut na ka bynta ki kam ba la ai jingbit da ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain jong ka Jylla. (Para 2 (vi) ha ka sla ba 53-54 jong ki Finance Accounts 2022-23 Vol.I).(ii) Ki Utilization Certificate (UC) bym pat ioh pyrshah ia ka Grants- in- Aid ba la sanction da ka sorkar jylla: Ha kaba kut jong u snem mang tyngka 2022-23, 454 tylli ki UC ba kot T. 3,436.01 klur ki dei ki bym pat ai, kumta, kam don ka jingpynthikna ba ka jingpynlut kaba T. 3,436.01 klur  ka dei kaba la dep ban pynlut na ka bynta ka kam ba la ai jingbit. (Para 2 (vii) ha ka sla ba 54-55 jong ki Finance Accounts 2022-23 Vol.I).(iii) Ka jingbei tyngka:  Ki jingbei tyngka kum ka share capital ha ki kompani jong ka sorkar, ki corporation, ki Joint Stock Kompani bad Co-operative  kalong T. 3,240 klur ha kaba kut jong u snem 2022-23, na kane T. 2,754.32 klur ka dei ha ki kompani bording. (Statement 19 jong ki Finance Accounts 2022-23 Vol.II).(iv) State Disaster Response Fund (SDRF):Na ka jingbei tyngka kaba T. 182.43 klur, ka sorkar ka la pyllait T. 51.58 klur ha u snem, bad ka sah sa T. 130.85 klur ka bym pat pyndonkam ha kaba kut u snem 2022-23.(Para 4(ii)(A)(a) ha ka sla ba 61 jong ki Finance Accounts Vol.I, sla 411 jong ki Finance Accounts 2022- 23, Vol-II).Na ka bynta jingtip ba bniah halor ki Anuual Accounts sngewbha iakren bad u Officer Mr. Ratul Chandra Borah, Spokesperson Deputy Accountant General (AE&VLC) Office of the Principal Accountant General (A&E), Meghalaya, Shillong. Telephone number: 0364-2223682(O) Website:E-mail:Sngewbha peit ha ka websitena ka bynta ki Jingtip ha ka ktien phareng
title: KA FINANCE ACCOUNTS BAD APPROPRIATION ACCOUNTS 2022-23 KA SORKAR MEGHALAYA

content: Shillong, Rymphang 28: U nongïalam ka Congress legislature party (CLP) Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Balang u la kynthoh tyngeh ïa u MLA ka BJP na South Shillong u Bah Sanbor Shullai da kaba kynnoh ba um ju kren eiei wat shikyntien ruh ha Assembly.Kane ka jingkynthoh, ka long hadien ba u Bah Sanbor u la kynnoh ba u Sitting MP ka Congress na Shillong u Bah Vincent H Pala um ju leh eiei ïa ka constituency hynrei, ‘u shu pynlut kai ïa ka por ha kaba bam sohot san snem kynthih ha Parliament.”“Wad ma phi, katno sien u Bah Sanbor Shullai u leit sha Assembly. Katno sien u la kren ha Assembly?” la ong u Bah Ronnie Lyngdoh ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Halor ka jingtreikam jong u Bah Pala, nga tharai ba bun ki kam u la leh. U dei u briew uba jar jar.  Um ju pynpaw paidbah kumba leh katto katne ki politishian. Bun ki kam kiba u la leh na ka bynta jong ngi bad nga tharai bun ki projek kiba la wanrah sha ka Jylla Meghalaya lyngba ka jingtrei shitom jong u,” u la ong.“Hynrei ka jingkynnoh jong u Bah Sanbor ka sting kdor kdor namarba ïalade lei um ju kren hi ruh hapoh ka Ingdorbar bad um ju kham poi sha Ingdorbar.  Hato phi la ju ïohsngew ba un kren hapoh ka Ingdorbar?  Ban shu wan sha Ingdorbar bad ban ym kren eiei kan bha ba u shong ha ing.  Namarkata ka jingkynnoh jong u ka sting kdor kdor namarba um shym la bud ïa ki kyndon pynïaid kam jong ka Parliament ha kaba u Bah Vincent Pala uba dei u MP na Shillong u ju ïashim bynta hapoh ka Ingdorbar ban kren ïa ki mat kiba ïadei bad ka Jylla Meghalaya,” u la bynrap.Halor ka jingkynnoh ba u Bah Pala um ju pynlong ïa ka jingïalang jong ka DISHA ha ka Constituency, u Bah Ronnie u la ong ba ngi dei ban sngewthuh ba ha ki 2-3 snem ba ladep, ka don ka khlam jingpang Covid-19 bad ki don bun ki skhim kiba ka Sorkar India kam shym la pyllait.  U la kdew ruh ba ka mang tyngka na ka bynta ka MGNREGS and bad na ka bynta ki kam pynroi sha ki nongkyndong ki la shah khate lut.“Ban shu pynlong tang ïa ka jingïalang khlem don eiei ban ïakren, kam don jingmut eiei,” u la ong.
title: PYNPHAI NIA SA U MLA KA CONGRESS: U MLA KA SOUTH SHILLONG UM JU KREN WAT SHI KYNTIEN RUH HA ASSEMBLY

content: Ha ka sien kaba nyngkong u Myntri uba khmih ïa ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma u la phah ïa u kyrwoh kitbok kitrwiang sha ki khynnah skul ki ban sa ïakhun ïa ka eksamin Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) bad ka Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) ki ban sdang naduh u bnai Lber, 2024.Lyngba ki lad pathai khubor, u Rakkam A. Sangma u la kyntu ïa ki khynnah skul ba kin klet shwa ïa mynta shipor ïa kino ki kam sngewbha bad khamtam eh ïa ki jingpynbyrngia ha ka Mobile Phone bad ban pynleit jingmut shwa ban minot tang ha ka kot namarba kine ki ar tylli ki eksamin ki dei kiba kongsan tam ha ka jingim jong ki khynnah skul bad kiba rai ruh ïa ka lawei ka jong ki nangne shakhmat.Ki don haduh 55,189 ngut ki khynnah ki ban iakhun ia ka eksamin Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) bad 34,335 ngut ki ban iakhun ia ka Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) ka ban sa long ha ka 1 tarik bad 4 tarik, Lber.Ki don haduh 108 tylli ki centre thoh eksamin jong ka HSSLC bad 159 tylli na ka bynta ka eksamin SSLC ha ki 12 tylli ki districts ka jylla.
title: KITBOK U MYNTRI ÏA KI KHYNNAH SKUL BAN ÏAKHUN EKSAMIN SSLC BAD HSSLC

content: KHANG KHYRDEP KI DUKAN BAR JYLLAKi dkhot jong ka Khasi Student Union, South Khasi Hills District Unit ha ka sngi Balang ki la hiar sha ka shnong Ichamati kaba hap hapoh ka Sohra Civil Sub-division, East Khasi Hills district ban pynlong ïa ka jingkynmaw burom ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap ba saw snem jong u Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta uba la shah ïap na ka jingshah bom shah tied ha ki bar jylla ha kane ka shnong Pyntha-umdan (Ichamati) ha ka 28 tarik, Rymphang, 2020.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, u Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta u la shah tangon ha ki bar jylla kiba la rah da ki tiar pynmynsaw ha ka sngi ba ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha iew Ichamati ban pynshai paidbah bad ban pyrshah ïa ka Citizenship Amendment Bill (CAB) kaba la kylla long mynta ka aiñ. U Bah Lurshai u la khladnoh ha Sohra CHC hapdeng ka jingshitom kaba jur.Ha ka jingleh kynmaw burom ïa une u dkhot ba la khladnoh jong ka seng, ka KSU South Khasi Hills District Unit ba la lamkhmat da u President u samla Reebokstar Diengdoh ryngkat ka kurim ka Balawanrisha Khongshei bad ki saw ngut ki khun ki la buh ïa ki syntiew hakhmat u durmot ba la tei da ka KSU ha u snem 2021.Katba ka KSU ka dang pynlong ïa kane ka jingkynmaw burom ïa u Bah Lurshai, la sakhi ruh ba ki dukan jong ki bar jylla ha Iew Ichamati ki la khang khyrdop bad kim shym la nud satia ban plie tad hadien ba la kut noh ka jingïalang leh burom.Na ka shnong Ichamati, ki dkhot ka KSU ki la kiew sha Sohra ban pynlong sa ïa ka jingai khusnam ïa ki samla pule jong ka thaiñ Sohra da ka 4th Maitshaphrang Academic Award kaba la long ha St John Bosco Boys Higher Secondary School, Sohra.Ki samla kiba la shah pynkup burom ki kynthup naduh na ka shnong Umtyngngar ter ter shaduh ka shnong Shella bad ha kane ka jingpynkup burom ki don 11 ngut ki samla pule ha kaba ha ka SSLC la shim ïa kiba ïoh 85% shalor, ha ka HSSLC 80% shalor bad 75% shalor ïa ki kyrdan pule Degree bad PhD.La sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi, da u President ka KSU Seng Kmie u samla Lambokstarwell Marngar uba la long u Kongsan ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Principal ka St John Bosco Boys Higher Secondary School, Sohra u Fr. Alphonsius Rongrin kum u symbud kongsan, u Vice Principal ka skul u Dr. Eligius Sawian, u Rangbah Shnong ka Pdengshnong, Sohra bad kiwei kiwei kynthup ka kurim bad ki khun jong u (L) Bah Lurshai Hynniewta.
title: HIAR KA KSU SHA ICHAMATI BAN KYNMAW BUROM ÏA KA SNGI ÏAP U BAH LURSHAI HYNÑIEWTA

content: Shillong, Rymphang 29: Hadien ba la kut ka jingai por kaba 15 sngi, ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Laban Circle ha ka step sngi palei ka 29 tarik Rymphang ki la mih ban shna ïing ia ki para Khasi ha Maxwelton Estate, hadien ba kiwei ki jaitbynriew ki la ioh ban buhai shnong ha kane ka jaka kaba dang hap hapoh ka South Shillong Constituency.Ka KSU Laban Circle dang shen ka la ai por ba ki briew kiba sah beain ha Maxwelton estate ba ki dei ban mih noh mardor namar ba ka dei ka jaka sorkar, bad ka seng ka la ujor ruh sha ki bor synshar district hynrei kam shym la ioh satia ia ka jubab.Mynta ka sngi, ha ka por 7 baje mynstep, ki dkhot ka KSU ki la ia mih ryngkat ki tiar ki tar ban shna ing ia ki para Khasi ba kin sah ha Maxwelton Estate ka jaka kaba la sah da kiwei ki jaitbynriew.Dang shen, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba khmih ia ka tnat Kam Pohiing u Bah Prestone Tynsong ula ong ba kane ka jaka ka dei kaba dang don hapoh ka jingialeh mukotduma ha ingbishar.
title: YM KWAH KA KSU BAN ÏOHI ÏA KA THEM METOR 2.0 HA MAXWELTON ESTATE

content: U President ka KSU South Khasi Hills District Unit u samla Reebokstar Diengdoh ka sngi Balang u la khot bad wer ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka Elaka Mawlong ban mih ryntih ha ka sngi ba ka seng kan leit khyndang ïa ka jingpynkha iew be-aiñ ha Kalibari, da ki bar jylla kiba sah ha Ichamati bad ha ki shnong bamarjan.Kane ka jingkhot jingwer jong une u nongïalam ka seng ka long hadien ba la ïoh jingtip ba ki bar jylla kiba ju leh ïa ka khaïi ka pateng hapoh ka shnong Ichamati mynta ki la kynriah jaka ban seng da ka iew thymmai ha ka shnong Kalibari.Ïa kane u samla Reebokstar Diengdoh u la pynpaw haba kren ha ka jingïalang kynmaw buromk ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap kaba snem snem jong u (L) Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta ha ka shnong Pyntha-umdan (Ichamati) kaba dang hap hapoh ka  Sohra Civil Sub-division, East Khasi Hills district.Une u nongïalam ka KSU u la ong ruh ynda ka seng ka la leit ban kyndang ïa ki bar jylla kiba seng iew be-aiñ Kalibari ka da kwah eh ïa ki durkhmat jong ki paidbah ka shnong Mawlong ba kin synran lang seng namarba ki sheptieng ïoh ba shisien ka sngi kin sa shah taplup ha ka jingjyllei jong ki bar jylla.“Ngi sngewlem ngi pyrkhat lem na ka bynta jong phi, lashai ynda la dap lut da ki dukan jong kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew phin trei da kaei pat kam,” ong u President ka KSU.“Mynta ngi wan beh ïa ki bar jylla ki bym don kot don sla ba shong dukan phim ai ka jingkyrshan, kan sa poi ka por ba ngin da la thait na ka liang jong ka seng kan dap da ki dukan jong ki bar jylla phin sa wan pan jingïarap na ka KSU. Ngi lei ngim don dukan hangne ha Pyntha-umdan, jar la katta ngi hap ban wan hiar na Sohra ban wan beh lut ïa ki bar jylla kiba la syrtap lut shisien ka sngi. Ngi donkam ïa ka jingkyrshan jong ki paradoh parasnam,” u la ong“Nga kwah ba ki longkmie ki longkpa, ha ka sngi ba ngi hiar sha Kalibari ban kyndang ïa ki bar jylla kiba pynlong iew be-ain  nga kwah ban ïohi ïa ka durkhmat jong ki trai shnong na Mawlong ba kin mih. Lada shah knieh ka jaka ha Kalibari phi dei ban sngewthuh ba ma phi kiba dei ban ïoh kynti kiba sah ha ka Elaka Mawlong,” la ong shuh shuh une u nongïalam ka KSU.
title: WAN PYNI DURKHMAT HA KA POR BA NGI LEIT KYNDANG HA KALIBARI, ONG U PRESIDENT KSU

content: Shillong, February 29 : The Meghalaya Multisectoral Project for Adolescent Wellbeing Empowerment and Resilience (MPOWER) – Planning, Investment, Promotion and Sustainable Development Department , The Department of Education, Information Technology & Communication (IT&C) Department, Meghalaya State Skills Development Society, Government of Meghalaya has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the 1M1B Foundation (One Million for One Billion) to setup the state’s 1st and India’s 2nd Green Skills Academy in Shillong to accelerate the adoption of green skills amongst the college youth in the state of Meghalaya. The partnership aims to train 1 Lakh youths from Meghalaya by the year 2029 with top 10 youth given an opportunity every year to showcase their work at the annual 1M1B summit at the United Nations in New York.The Memorandum of Understanding was signed in the presence of Sampath Kumar, Development Commissioner & Principal Secretary, Government of Meghalaya and Pravin Bakshi, Commissioner & Secretary, Information Technology, & Communication (IT&C) Department, and Deepika Venkatesh, Program Manager- Green Skills & Sustainability, 1M1B at Additional Secretariat, Shillong, Meghalaya,The Chief Minister of Meghalaya Conrad Sangma has a vision to enable Meghalaya’s youth to achieve their full potential through the Meghalaya Program for Adolescent Wellbeing, Empowerment and Resilience (MPOWER). The Vision of the project is to enable Meghalaya’s youth to achieve their full potential by ensuring their successful transition from school to work, with holistic support for health & well-being, thereby ensuring the long term sustainable development of the state.The 1M1B Green Skills Academy is developed for college students aged over 18. It is designed to equip the future workforce with the skillset, mindset and toolsets needed in a rapidly evolving green economy. The Green Skills Academy offers a unique blend of theoretical knowledge, projects, workplace experiences, internships and job readiness mentoring creating a dynamic learning environment. The Academy will further empower participants with a range of specialized skills like artificial intelligence, sustainable design, data analysis, and project management. By embedding real-world challenges into the learning process, the programme will nurture critical thinking, problem-solving, and collaboration abilities, all of which are crucial for success in green and sustainable career paths. The Green Skills Academy will benefit the youth through direct interactions with industry experts, mentors, and sustainability-focused organizations and provide guidance, mentorship, and potential employment opportunities.Chief Minister of Meghalaya, Conrad K Sangma said, “It is a pleasure to collaborate with 1M1B in establishing the 1M1B Green Skills Academy here at Meghalaya, aimed at accelerating the adoption of green skills among our college youth in our state.”Sampath Kumar, Development Commissioner & Principal Secretary, said, “Meghalaya has adopted a science-based life cycle model to cultivate its human capital, fostering the future economic development of the state. This collaboration with 1M1B is in perfect alignment with our mutual objective of empowering the young adolescents of the state by equipping them with skills that will prepare them for the future.”Pravin Bakshi, Commissioner & Secretary, Information Technology, & Communication (IT&C) Department (IT&C) said, “It is an innovative and vibrant collaboration that we have embarked upon with 1M1B especially setting up of 1M1B Green Skills Academy leveraging AI which is only the second such initiative in the country .The State Government of Meghalaya and stakeholder Departments of Education and IT & Communications are delighted to take forward this collaboration and partnership .”Manav Subodh, Founder and Chief Mentor, 1M1B, said, “We are proud to partner with the Government of Meghalaya to set up 1M1B Green Skills Academy in the state. We believe Green Skills and AI skills are big equalizers and can be leveraged to provide inclusive career opportunities to the youth of Meghalaya. Green Skills Academy will also collate Inputs and recommendations from diverse stakeholders in the State of Meghalaya for United Nations Summit of the Future 2024, with focus on AI, cyber safety, climate action and inclusive technologies”The Summit of the Future (September 2024) is a once-in-a-generation opportunity to enhance cooperation on critical challenges and address gaps in global governance, reaffirm existing commitments including the Sustainable Development Goals and the United Nations Charter, and move towards a reinvigorated multilateral system that is better positioned to positively impact people’s lives.About 1M1B:Founded in 2014, 1M1B is a UN-accredited nonprofit with a profound mission: to empower youth leaders, impact a billion lives. What makes them stand out? They hold a unique UN consultative status and are guided by core principles like going beyond yourself, universal empowerment, and the potential of grassroots movements.1M1B engages and enables youth to become future-ready problem solvers creating real-world impact. By undergoing 1M1B programs that are based on a unique 4.3.2.1 activation framework, youth acquire critical skill sets, mind-sets, and toolsets to access the jobs of tomorrow. Areas of focus include digital technologies (AI, AR, VR), digital creativity, digital citizenship and 4th industrial revolution skills like problem-solving, flexibility, empathy, dealing with failures and collaboration.The 1M1B program focuses on nurturing innovation and fostering the next generation of human-centred leaders who use new age tools to address age-old challenges. The annual 1M1B Activate Impact Summit held at the UN headquarters in New York, shines a spotlight on youth-led projects driving UN Sustainable Development Goals.The impact of 1M1B is impressive. They’ve empowered over 500,000 young individuals, trained 400,000 teachers, and created 6,000 job opportunities for the youth. Their mission for positive change is fortified by strategic partnerships with entities like SCET, University of California Berkeley, IBM, Meta, Aditya Birla Fashion & Retail, State Government of Telangana, India and others.1M1B exists to activate 1 million youth who will impact 1 billion people, thereby creating a world of balanced prosperity
title: MEGHALAYA AND 1M1B PARTNER TO LAUNCH INDIA’S SECOND GREEN SKILLS ACADEMY

content: U Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare ka Sorkar Jylla Bah Paul Lyngdoh ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ka Myntri ka tnat Aiñ ka Dr. M Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Palei ki la pyllait paidbah ïa ki “Ki kyndon Aiñ” jong ka POCSO Act, 2012 ba la pynkylla sha ka ktien Khasi ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Pinewood Hotel, Shillong.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ngi la ïatreilang na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki parabriew bad ban lehkmen ïa ka jinglong khynnah, haba ngi peit shakhmat sha ki sngi jong ki samla, ki rangbah, hynrei ka aiom ksiar ha ka jingim ka dei ka jinglong khynnah.U la ong ba ym baroh ki don ban sam ïa ka jingkmen, ka jingkmen ha ka jingim, dei na kata ka daw ka long kaba donkam ba kum ki nongthaw aiñ bad kum ki kynhun ki la ïatreilang ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki kam bymman kiba thombor ïa ka longryngieng jong ki khynnah rit.U Bah Paul shuh shuh u la ong ba kane ka sngi, kan long ka sngi kaba jop namarba ha ka sien banyngkong eh hadien ba la pynmih ïa ki dak thok Khasi ha u snem 1841, mynta ka sngi ngi la lah ban ïoh ha ki dak thoh Khasi ïa ki kyndon jong ka Ain POCSO kaba la dap mynta shiphew snem.U la ong ruh ba u sai sharak ba ngi la thang um long tang kum ka shab hynrei ai ba kito ki sharak rit kin meh ha ka dohnud jong ngi iwei pa iwei, khnang ba naduh ki nongthaw aiñ haduh ki nongpynkylla ktien, ki kmie ki kpa, ki nongïalam niam, ai ba  ka jingshai jong ka sharak kan meh ha iwei pa iwei na ki khnang ba kin shim halade ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ki khynnah ha baroh kawei ka jylla Meghalaya.U la ong ruh da ka jingkyrshan jong ka imlang ka sahlang, yn sa lah ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa kine ki kam bymman bad da ka jingwanrah ïa kane ka aiñ ha ka ktien Khasi kan pynthikna ba kan rung sha manla ki thliew iing jong ki shnong ki thaw, bad yn ym wat tang uwei ruh mynta uba lait na ki kynjri jong ka aiñ.U la kyntu ïa baroh kiba mihkhmat ha kane ka jingïalang ban shim ïa ka jingsmai ba ngi don hangne da kawei ka jingmut ban pynim biang ïa ka imlang ka sahlang bad ban pynim biang ïa ka jingduh jingkyrmen.Ha kane ka sngi, ka Meghalaya State Commission for Protection of Child Rights ka la pyllait paidbah ïa ka Almanak bad ka kaiphod halor ki POCSO Cases ha ki Kashari ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: HADIEN 11 SNEM SHON KA SORKAR JYLLA DA KA KHASI ÏA KI KYNDON AIÑ KA POCSO ACT, 2012

content: Shillong, Rymphang 29: Ki nongïalam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) ha ka sngi Palei ki la ujor da ka ejahar ha u Superitendent of Police (SP) ka East Khasi Hills District halor ka jingbym pyndem jong uwei u briew uba kynthoh pyrshah ïa ka HANM ha ka Facebook Page ba la ai kyrteng ‘Lympung ki Khun ka Ri’,  wat hadien ba ka jingaipor kaba 24 kynta ka la kut.Katkum kane ka jingkynthoh ha kane ka Facebook Page, u nongkynthoh uba la paw kyrteng kum u HBK Lyngdoh u la kynthoh pyrshah ïa ka seng da kaba kynnoh ba ka jingpynlong ka HANM ïa ka jingïakhih ha Jantar Mantar ha nongbah Delhi ha ka 3 tarik Naiweing 2023 ka dei kaba la bei pisa da ka National People’s Party (NPP).U nongkynthoh HBK Lyngdoh u kynthoh kumne: “Kawei na ki sengbhalang kaba leit pynthud ïa ka jingdawa pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka 8th Schedule ka dei ka HANM. Kane ka Seng ka la leit sha Delhi ban dawa pynrung lang ïa ka ktien Khasi bad ka ktien Garo. Ka ktien Garo kam pat long qualified ban rung ha ka 8th Schedule te da dawa pynrung lang ha kajuh ka por ka ktah ïa ka ktien Khasi kaba lah long qualified ban rung ka hap ap haduh da ki phew snem shuh shuh ban ïa rung ryngkat bad ka Garo haduh ban da long qualified ka Garo.”“Lehse ban leit pynthud kumtei dei ba sponsor da ka npp.”U nongïalam ka Seng u Bah Wyraiwan Sohtun ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “katkum ka hok ban kren, phi don ïa ka hok ban kren, ban pynsngew hynrei phim lah patde ban kren shaba palat pud kaba lah ban pynjah burom bad ba phin shu thaw da ki lad ki lynti ban pynjah burom bad ban pynduh mynsiem ïa kaei kaei kaba ki briew ki trei shitom na ka bynta ki jingbha jong ki paidbah.”“Lada phi kwah ban tip ïa ka jingshisha phi lah ban wan sha ka ophis treikam jong ka HANM ngin ai ïa ka jingshisha bad phim lah ban shu kynnoh ïa ngi ïa kaei kaba phim lah ban pynshisha,” la ong u Bah Sohtun.“Katkum ka hok ba la ai da ka Article 19 (1) A phim lah ban shu pynjah burom lane ban shu bein shu khoh haduh ba kiwei kiwei kin sngew ba ka jingtrei shitom jong ki ban wanrah ka jingbha bad ka jingsuk kan shu duhei noh,” u la ong.U Vice President ka seng u Bah Bawan Nongsiej u la ïathuh ba mynta ka shong sa ha ki bor jong ka ain ban leh ïa kaba donkam namar ba ka seng ka ladep ban ujor sha ki Pulit.Haba kyntait ïa ka jingshah kynnoh, u Vice President ka HANM Bah Bawan Nongsiej u la pynshai ba ka jingïakhih jong ka seng ka dei na ka bynta ki dawbah jong ka jaitbynriew na ka bynta ban pynurlong ïa ka jingdawa ban pynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka ri India kumba la mynjur da ka Iingdorbar Thawain ka Jylla ha ka 27 tarik Nailur 2018.
title: BYM PANMAP UBA KYNTHOH HA FB, MUDUI KA HANM DA KA EJAHAR HA U SP KA EKH

content: Ka Students Wing jong ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) ha ka sngi Palei ka la maham ban leh da kaba tyngeh pyrshah ïa kino kino ki kynhun kiba pyrshang ban wanrah ïa ka jingsngew ïapher jaidbynriew hapoh ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep bad ïa kino kino ki kynhun shitniam kiba pyndik ïa ki skul ba la pynïaid da ki Balang Khristan hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ki nongïalam jong kane ka kynhun ki la tah da ka notis jingmaham ha ka kynroh jong ka ophis treikam ka Assam Sanatan Dharma Sabha (ASDS) ban pyrshah bad ban maham halor ka jingkynnoh ba kane ka kynhun ka la dawa ïa ki bor pynïaid skul ban weng lut ïa ki dur niam bad ïa u stashu Jisu na ka Sacred Heart Secondary School, Marmaiñ, Ribhoi District.“Ngi la wan ban tah da ki notis jingmaham ha ki kynroh bad ki biar jong kane ka ophis ka Assam Sanatan Dharma Sabha ban pyrshah bad ban maham tyngeh ruh ïa ki halor ka jingleh jong ki ha ka thaiñ Marmaiñ kaba don ha khappud jong ka Ribhoi Distirct, Meghalaya bad ka Assam.  Ka jingleh jong ki, ka long da kaba tah notis ha ki skul ba la pynïaid da ki mishoneri da kaba maham lada kim weng ïa ki dur jong ki riewkhuid bad ïa u stashu Jisu kaba long kum ka jingibeiñ ïa ki nongpynïaid skul jong ki Phadar,” ong u Vice Chairman jong ka Student’s Wing ka HITO u Samla Kitshemphang Warjri ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha u nongthoh khubor.“Ngi ruh ngi lah ban tah ïa ki notis bad ngi lah ban maham tyngeh ïa ki namarba ka jingleh jong ka pynduh ïa ka jingmane Blei laitluid ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya. Ngim sngewtynnat bad kaei kaba phi leh ngim sngewtynnat,” la phah kyrwoh une u nongïalam ka HITO sha ka Assam Sanatan Dharma Sabha (ASDS).“Ngi maham ïa kino kino ki seng shitniam Hindutva lada ki leh ïa kine ki jait kam ban tah ïa ki notis ngin leit ban ïakynduh markhmat bad ngin ym shah daleilei ruh bad ngin ai da kaba tyngeh bad ngin rah ïa ki bor ba dei peit.  Kane ka jingleh jong kine ki seng (Assam Sanatan Dharma Sabha) ka buh jingkylli ïa ngi balei phi donkam ban phin leh ïa kumne ki kam. Lada phi kwah ban leh kumta balei kim leit ïakynduh ïa ki bor ba dei peit,” kynthoh u samla Warjri.“Me donkam aiu ma me ban wan leh kumne ha kane ka khyndew jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep.  Ngim pat ju pynthud ïa kano kano ka jaitniam ha kane ka Jylla. Lada kiwei ki leh kumne balei ngin shu sngap,” ong shuh shuh u Vice Chairman ka Students’ Wing ka HITO.“Lada ka RSS ka lah ban dei ka Hindu Extremist Group bad kiwei kiwei ki lah ban dei ki Hindu Extremist Group, ngi, ngi lah ban dei ka Christian Extremist Group. Ngim salia ïa kata, ngi ïakhih ïa kaba dei, ngim sngew eiei, ngin tur shaphrang,” la maham u Samla Warjri.
title: MAHAM ÏA KI SHITNIAM KIBA PYNDIK ÏA KI SKUL KHRISTAN HA MEGHALAYA

content: Uwei u nongñiah kali tourist Nongstoiñ-Shillong uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Mcbornbonnyson Kharbani, 29 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Pathew Mawthadraishan, Eastern West Khasi Hills District u la duh ei ïa la ka jong ka jingim hadien ba u la shah pynïap dusmon da kaba shah dung da ka wait ha ki runar.Katkum ka thymmei khubor ba la ïoh lum la iathuh ba kane ka la jia ha ka por shiteng synnia Sngi U Blei kumba 12:15 baje ha ka taxi stand Kynroh kaba don ha sor Nongstoiñ katba u Bah Macborn u dang wan jingwan bad u dang thmu ban leit phai noh sha ïing sah kaba don ha Nongstioñ.Ka Kong Aitioris Kharbani kaba dei ka bahaing jong u lanot, ha ka jingiakren bad ki nonglum khubor ka la ïathuh ba ha shwa ba un shah pynïap u Bah Mcbornbonnyson u la telephone sha u kurim jong ka ban pan jingïarap namarba ki don katto katne ngut ki briew kiba la wan kynroi ïa u bad lyngba ka telephone ki la ïoh sngew ruh ïa ki jingïania bad timsih timsang jong kita briew kiba la kylli ruh ïa u ba u dei neem uta uba ki wad ma ki ha kaba u la jubab ruh da kaba ong ba um dei.Ka la ong, katkum ka jingïoh sngew lyngba ka telephone ha ka por ba ki ïakren la sngewthuh ba ki wad ïa uwei pat u briew hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ynda la poi ma ki ha ka jaka ba ïakajia ki la lap pynban ba u Bah Macborn u la thiah lyngktar ha surok hapdeng ka jingphlei snam na ki bynta ka shadem bad khladnoh noh ha kane hi ka jaka tang hadien katto katne por.Na ka liang jong ki bahaing hasem ki mudui da ka ejahar ha Nongstoiñ Police Station.Mar mar, ki Pulit ka Nongstoiñ ki la ïoh kem ïa uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Medius Mawlot na ka shnong Mawkaton uba la shah suba jur ba u dei uba donkti ban dung ïa u Bah Macborn.Ki Pulit ki la register ïa ka case bad ka jingtohkit mynta ka dang ïaid shakhmat.Ki bahaïing ha sem jong u Bah Mcbornbonnyson ki don ka jingsuba kaba jur ba ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam runar ki don kumba 4 ngut ban khang kdong ïa u, kata, katkum ka jingïohsngew jong ki haba ki ïakren lyngba ka telephone ha ka por ba u pan jingïarap bad phah wan ïa ki bahaïing.U Bah Bankitkupar Kharbani u hymmen jong u Bah Mcbornbonnyson haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor u la ïathuh ba u Medius Mawlot uba la shah kem ha ki Pulit u la kam ba u don tang marwei hynrei u Bah Bankitkupar u ong ruh ba ki don ki briew kiba lap ïa kane ka jingjia hynrei katba ki dang thmu ban leit ai jingïarap ïa u Bah Macborn ki la shah byrngem dung wait kylla ha ki arngut ki briew kiba don ha katei ka jaka ha kaba kim banse ban phet noh sha la ing.Ki bahaing hasem ki la dawa ia ka tnat Pulit ba kan pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bad ban kem mardor ia ki runar kiba donkti ha ka kam pyniap briew.
title: SHAH DUNG ÏAP U NONGNIAH TOURIST HA NONGSTOIÑ, KEM KI PULIT ÏA UBA SUBA DONKTI

content: Uwei u rangbah uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Kynsailin Kharphanbuh ba ju khor ieid Bahïit, uba shong basah ha Lum Mawbah, Block -3, Upper Shillong, u la jah na la iing ha ka 1 tarik, Lber, 2024 naduh ka por 11:00  mynstep bad um shym la wan phai iing satia haduh kane ka sngi.Halor kane ka jingjah jong une u rangbah uba bat ïa u mobile number: 9402382844, ki bahaing hasem ki la ujor da ka ejahar ha ki Pulit jong ka Jhalupara Out Post.Ka Kong Barisha L. Mawlong ka la pyntip ruh ba u Bah Kynsailin Kharphanbuh u dei uba la don palat 60 snem ka rta bad  ïathuh ruh ba u Bah kynsailin u phong da ka patlun jain rong dark grey bad ka sweater rong iong.Ki bahaing ki la kyrpad ïa ki kino kino kiba lap ne ïoh jingtip kin sngewbha ban pyntip sha ha u mobile number: 9774850875.
title: JAH U BAH KYNSAILIN KHARPHANBUH NA ÏING

content: Ka jingbym thung nonghikai jong ka Sorkar Jylla la jan lai snem kynthih ha ki skul SSA ha kylleng ka jylla Meghalaya ka la wanrah ia ka jingkiew bha ka jingpep skul shiteng por jong ki khynnah watla ka jingthmu jong ka prokram Samagra Shiksha Abhiyan (SSA) jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ka long ban khring ia ki khynnah sha ki skul pule bad ban pynduna ia ka jingpep skul shiteng por jong ki khynnah.U President ka Meghalaya SSA School Association (MSSASA) Bah Aristotle C. Rymbai ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ha Shillong Press Club u la ong, “ngi la iakynduh ia u State Project Director ka Samagra Shiksha u Swapnil Tembe uba dei ruh u Director jong ka School  Education and Literacy (SEL) ka Sorkar Jylla, ban tyrwa ia ka Sorkar ba kan thung noh ia ki Post ba thylli ha ki skul SSA ha ka Lower Primary bad Upper Primary kiba shu sah thylli naduh u snem 2021 ter ter haduh mynta jan lai snem.”“Ngi iohi ba ka lah bha ia kito ki skul ki bym don nonghikai,” u la ong bad ai nuksa, “mynshwa ka jingdon jong ki khynnah skul ki long 50 haduh 60 ngut ki khynnah hynrei namar ka jingiohkam noh ki nonghikai shawei bad ka jingbym thung nonghikai ka Sorkar ka jingdon jong ki khynnah ha ki skul SSA ka la sdang hiar. Ki don leilei ki skul kiba don tang hapoh 10 ngut ka buh jingeh.”“Ngi la kyrpad ia u State Project Director ban thung noh ia ki nonghikai ha ki skul bym don nonghikai khnang ba ki khynnah skul kin ym shah ktah ha ka pule ka puthi,” u la bynrap.U la iathuh ba u State Project Director u la kular ba un sa iakren bad ka Sorkar halor kane ka jingpynsngew jong ka Association.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ba u Project Director u la pyntip ba ki don ki skul SSA ki bym don khynnah skul bad ka Sorkar ka lah ban shim ia ka sienjam ban thung nonghikai ha ki skul ba kham bun ki khynnah skul.“Ngin sa iakynduh ia u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ban pynsngew halor kane bad ban ioh shuh shuh ia ka jingshai ia ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar ha kaba iadei bad ka jingthungkam ia ki nonghikai ha ki skul SSA ba ki post nonghikai ki la sah thylli,” u la ong.U Project Director u la ong ruh ba ka Sorkar kam banse ban khang khyrdep ia ki skul SSA ki bym don khynnah bad ngi kyntu ia ki skul SSA khamtam ia ki Head Teacher ba kin shimkhia bha halor kane.Haba kylli, u la ai nuksa da kaba ong, tang ha East Khasi Hills, ki post nonghikai kiba thylli ki don ym duna 89 tylli ha ka Upper Primary bad ha ka Lower Primary 22tylli, ha East Jaintia Hills ki post kiba thylli ha ka Upper Primary ki don 27 tylli bad ha Lower Primary ki don 21 tylli.Ha kajuh ka por, u la iathuh ba ka seng ka la phah ruh ia ka jingthoh sha ka Chaiperson jong ka Meghalaya State Education Commission (MSEC) ka Prof. Sherwin May Sungoh halor ka jingdawa ban pynkynriah noh ia ki 12, 541 hajar ngut ki nonghikai skul SSA na ka State Implementation Society (SIC) sha ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla katkum ki kyndon jong ka Right to Education Act bad ka SSA.Kane ka jingdawa jong ka MSSASA ka long hadien ba ka Sorkar ka la thaw ia ka State Education Commission hadien ka jingiakhih jong ki nonghikai skul SSA ha nongbah Shillong.
title: KIEW KA JINGPEP SKUL SHITENG POR HA KI SKUL SSA BYM THUNG NONGHIKAI KA SORKAR

content: Ka Confederation of Ri Bhoi People (CoRP) sengkmie ka dawa ia ka MeECL ban pyntreikam noh ia ka Sub Station ba 33 KV ha shnong Umsong, Ri Bhoi District, khnang ba ki paidbah ka thain Ri Bhoi sepngi kin ioh bording ilektrik thikna kumba long kiwei ki jaka.Ha ka jingjurip ka seng ka la lap ba katei ka sub station ba 33 KV la shna naduh u snem 2004 na bynta ai bording ha ka thain Ri Bhoi sepngi, hynrei haduh mynta ka dang treikam kum ka sub station ba 11 KV, kumta ki paidbah ka thain kim ju ioh thikna ka bording ilektrik bad bun ki shnong ki shong dum, kumba long mynta ka jingduh light ka long khah khah ha ka thain bad kane ka lah ban dei na ka jingtlot ka bording ilektrik namar la pyntreikam da ka 11 KV ha jaka jong ka 33 KV.Ka seng ka pynpaw ka jinglyngngoh ba ki bor MeECL ki la iathuh ha ki snem ba la dep ba katei ka lain ka la poi haduh Lailad, hynrei haduh mynta kam pat pynpoi ha shnong Umsong. Kumta ka kyntu jur ia ka MeECL ban pyndep kloi ia ka lain bording ba 33 KV, khnang ba ki paidbah ka thain kin ioh tikna ia ka bording ilektrik.Halor kane ka seng kan sa buddien balei ka MeECL ka shim por da ki snem ban pyndep ia ka lain jong ka 33 KV na Nongpoh sha Umsong, kane ka pynpaw ba ka MeECL ka jingkhein sting ia ki paidbah ka thain Ri Bhoi sepngi. Namar wat ka ophis jong u SDO kaba la mang ban buh ha Patharkhmah haduh mynta kam pat pyntreikam.Ha ka jingleit jurip ki nongtrei ka MeECL ba dei peit ia katei ka sub station, ki la iathuh ba la pyntreikam shipor da ka lain ba 33 KV, hynrei hadien katto katne bnai kam shym la treikam shuh na ka jingthud ki sainar namar ia ka lain la pyniaid na khlaw bad la palat 6 snem ka treikam tang da ka 11 KV bad kane ka buh jingeh ban pynbiang bording ia ki paidbah ka thain.Ka seng ka kyntu ia ka MeECL ban pyndep kloi noh ia ka lain 33 KV na bynta ka jingbit jingbiang ki paidbah ka thain Ri Bhoi sepngi, la pynkut ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u Bah Gershome Hat Vice President ka CoRP.
title: DAWA KA CORP ÏA KA MEECL BAN PYNTREIKAM NOH ÏA KA SUB STATION 33 KV HA UMSONG

content: Hapdeng ka jingiaid lynti kaba jwat, ka JETS 24×7 kaba long ka Bike Taxi Aggregator kaba nyngkong eh ha kane ka Jylla Meghalaya khatduh iawai ka la ioh ia ka Permit na ka sorkar jylla lyngba ka ophis u District Transport Officer ka East Khasi Hills District ban pynsdang noh ia ka jingkamai da ki thuk thuk ar shaka ban pynsuk ia ki nongleit nongwan ha kum kane ka juk iabeh por bad ka juk bunkam ki paidbah.Ia ka JETS 24×7 kaba ai jingshakri lyngba ki thuk thuk ar shaka da kaba ki paidbah nongleit jingleit ki lah ban pyndonkam ïa u mobile app kaba la khlieh da u Samla Pynskhemlang W. Uriah kum u Managing Director la pyllait paidbah da ka Editor jong ka Kotkhubor Shillong Times ha ka 19 tarik u Nailar, 2023 ha Shillong Press Club.U Samla Pynskhemlang W Uriah ha ka jingiakren bad ka Batesi TV u la iathuh ba ka JETS 24×7 ka la ioh ia ka permit na ka Sokar ha ka 1 tarik u Lber, 2024 bad mynta kum ka kynhun kaba ai jingshakri ia ki paidbah ka la lah ban pyntyllun shakhmat ia ki jingshakri ia ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan bad ka rah ka rong ha kylleng ka nongbah Shillong.“Ki paidbah mynta ki lah ban shaniah ia ka JETS 24×7 namar ngi la don ia ka laisen bad ka Permit ban pyntyllun shakhmat ia ka jingshakri,” ong u Samla Uriah.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshngain jong ki paidbah nongleit nongwan, u samla Uriah u la ong, “ngi ladep ban pynbiang lut nadong shanong bad ki nongniah thuk thuk kiba rejister kyrteng bad ngi ki hap ban pynbiang ia ki kot ki sla kali, ka Police Verification bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam,” bad bynrap ruh ba ka JETS 24×7 ka don ruh ia ka App kaba ki paidbah ki lah ban peit haba ki donkam ia ki Riders jong ngi ha ka khep ba ki donkam.”U la iathuh ba ka JETS 24×7 ia mynta ka don ia ka pynieng ia ki thuk thuk ha Jaiaw Lan Sona Lane bad ka dang pyrshang ruh ban ioh ia ki jaka ieng ki thuk thuk ha Nongthymmai, Laitumkhrah, ha NEIGRIHMS bad ha ki jaka iew.Haba kylli u la iathuh ba ia ka dor ka mur la buh dor hi da ka sorkar.“Nga kyrpad ia ki paralok Riders khlem Permit ba kin wan register bad ngi bad ba kin iaid lynti kaba dei khnang ba kan long beit da ka lynti jong ka ain ba kin suk hi ialade hadien habud,” la kyrpad u Managing Director ka JETS 24×7.
title: ÏOH PERMIT KA JETS 24×7 NA KA SORKAR JYLLA BAN SHAKRI ÏA KI NONGLEIT NONGWAN

content: Ka Synjuk ki Seng Samla Shnong (SSSS) Shillong City ka phaha ia u kyrwoh kitbok kitrwiang ia baroh ki khun samla ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep bad ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei kiba ialeh ia ki eksamin bapher bapher jong u snem 2024 naduh SSLC, HSSLC bad kiwei kiwei.Ka Synjuk Ki Seng Samla Shnong lyngba u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Chairman u samla Pynshaibok Diengdoh ka ai mynsiem sha iwei pa iwei ki samla ba kin kiew shaphrang bad ban minot thop ban poi sha ka thong ha ka jingialeh ka jongki ha kane ka eksamin bad ban rah ruh ia ka nam ka jaitbynriew hi baroh kawei, kum ka jaitbynriew ngi donkam shisha ia ki samla trai ri trai muluk ban ioh hi ban Bat hi ia ki kyrdan ba kham ha jrong ha ki bynta kiba ba pher bapher.U Khulom Ksiar u dei u Atair bad waitlam ba nep ban pruid dak ban im bad shngain ka jaitbynriew, kyntang iawai ka Synjuk ka phai khmat ban iohi ba ki khun Samla ka Jylla ba kin long ki Dongmusa ban tbeh jingshai ia lade bad ia ka pateng ka jaitbynriew baroh kawei.  To u Blei Un kyrkhu kyrdoh ia ka jingiaid lynti ka jong phi nangne shakhmat, la ong u kyrwoh na ka SSSS.
title: KITBOK KA SSSS ÏA KI KHYNNAH SKUL KIBA IALEH EKSAMIN SSLC BAD HSSLC

content: Ki nongpeit nongkhmih jong ka kudam pynmih Atta, Moida ba la tip kum ka Magic Cook kaba don hakhmat ka surokbah Guwahati-Shillong ha Garikhana ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la hap ban ot noh ia ki nar ba la sieh ha ka lynti iaid kjat ia kiba ba la thmu ban ker da ka tin khnang ban iada ia ki nongiaid nongieng bad ia ki kali katba ka jingshna thymmai ia ka kudam ka dang iaid shakhmat.Kum  ban shu pyntip hangne, ka kudam Magic Cook kaba don ha Garikhana kaba la long trai da u Sanjeev Kumar ka dei kaba dang hap hapoh ka jingkhmih jong ka Dorbar Shnong Them Mawbah ka la kylla pdei ha ka 1 tarik, u Nohprah, 2023.Ki nongbylla ha ka jingiakren bad u Nonglum khubor kaki la iathuh ba ki la shu sieh hi ia ki nar jingker ha ka lynti iaid kjat da ka jingthmu ban ker da ki tin hynrei kaba la wanrah pat ia ka jingthud ha ka iaid ka ieng jong ki paidbah.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ki nongkitkam shnong jong ka Dorbar Shnong Them Mawbah kiba la leit jurip ia kane ka jingker ki la aipor hapoh hynniew sngi ban weng noh ia kine ki jingker nar na ka lynti iaid kjat.Ka jingsieh ia ki nar ha lynti iaid kjat ka la pynlyngngoh lut ia ki paidbah nongleit nongwan namar ka jingbym don satia mano mano ruh ban kynthoh ia kane ka jingkyntur pud u trai ka Magic Cook sha lynti iaid kjat.
title: KER U TRAI MAGIC COOK ÏA KA FOOTPATH, PHAH JYNRAT KA DS THEM MAWBAH

content: Haba ka sngi ka la sep, ki briew ki ia mih ban leit sha ka iew janmiet ha Nan Polok. Hadien bun ju khang shuh ha ka por 5 baje janmiet kum ba ju long, ka phalor ka plie ia ki nongdie jingieid ban plie ia ki dukan jong ki ban pynkylla dur ia ka Nan Polok da ki jingthaba bad jingshai, ka bam ka dih lem bad ki jingput jingtem ban pynshongshit.Haba peit ia ki dukan, ngi lah ban Shem ia ki dukan bam bad kiwei kiwei ki ukn ba diebia ki mar ba bun jait lem bad ka jingdon ka rynsan ka put ka tem,bad ngi ai khublei ia ka MGMP namar kane. Hadien ka por 5 baje janmiet ki paidbah ki la sdang ban ia tuid sha kane ka jaka ban wad ia ki jaka ban ioh shong jahthait hajan ka rynsan  ban iohsngew ia ki aur jingrwai  katba kiwei pat ki iaid pyngngad sharum shneng ban peit ia ka jingitunnad k Nan Polok bad ban rung sha ki dukan ba don sawdong kane ka jaka naduh ba la plie paidbah ha ka 19 Tarik u kyllalyngkot.Kane ka iew ka plielad ia ka jingiadei hapdeng ki jaid bynriew bapher bapher bad  ka jingpynneh ia ka riti distur. Ym kum ha ka por mynsngi, kane ka iew janmiet ka wanrah iaka jingiadei lyngba ka put ka tem, ka bam ka dih bad ki mar ba shu shna hi.Lyngba une u bnai baroh shi bnai, la sakhi ia ka jingwan jong ki briew bapher bapher sha kane ka jaka. Ki la mad ia ki jingbam ki babang bad bashngiam, ki la peit bad thied ia ki tiar ki tar bad ki la peit iapmat ia ka jingitynnad jong ka jaka. Man ka ki dukan ki don la ka jong ka jong ka jingitynnad kaba pynpaw ia ka jingriewspah ka kolshor bad ki riti distur jong ngi.Ha kane ka iew miet, ka jingphai khmat kam long tang ha ka kamai kajuh hynrei ban don ka jingiadei kaba jan bad ki nongdie jingdie. Ka pynpaw ia ka mynsiem ha Meghalaya kum ha ka sngi iewbah ha kaba ki briew ki leit sha iew ym tang ban leit siew leit tda. Ka kren ka khana ka iaid shaid shaid hapdeng ki nongdie bad nongthied kaba wanrah ia ka jingiajan ha ka imlang.Ka iew ka hat kam da dei eh ka jaka ban ia sngewbha, ka dei ka rynsan ia ki nongsengkam lajong, ki nongrep, ki nongshna tiar ban ioh ban pyni ia ka sap ka phong jong ki. Ka jinglong jan ka ailad ia ki nongwan ban  ban bad leh sngewbha ia kaei ka ba ki lah ban ai kum ka bam ka dih, ki tiar ki tar bad ki mar rep ha ka dor ka ba tad ha kane ka iewHapdeng ka ia jong ka bor digital ka bym donkam ia ka jingiashem mar met, ka iew janmiet ha Nan Polok ka ieng kum ka ta ka ba ju long ban iashen bad iakynduh markhmat. Ki bahaiing hasem,ki lok ki jor bad wat ki nongwei ki iakynduh da ka jingsngewtynnad, ban iasam ym tang ia ki jingbam hynrei ia ki khana bad ka rkhie sngewbha. Haba sakhi ia kum kane ka jinglong jingman ka wanrai ia ka jingsngew long trai bad jingsngew long paralok ka long ka b bha ka ban beh noh ia ka jingsngew iapher jaid bynriew ka ban pynskhem ia ka jongiadei para briewHaba u bnai Lber u la wan, ka iew janmiet ka la jam sha u bnai bakhatduh. Ha ka jingiakren balyngkot bad ki nongpyniaid ka pynpaw ia ka jingthmu ban lehkmen ia kane ka jingjop da ki prokram bakyrpang. Na ka bynta kito ki ba kwah ban lait na ki jingbunkam ba man ka sngi, ka jingleit sha ka iew janmiet ha Nan Polok mynta u bnai phin mad ia jingkmen bad jingsngewbha.
title: KA JINGKONGSAN JONG KA ÏEW JANMIET: KA JINGKHMIH BNIAH ÏA KA ÏEW JANMIET HA NAN POLOK

content: : Ka Central Bureau of Communication (CBC), Tnat Information and Broadcasting, Sorkar India, Regional Office, (MT Region), Shillong ka la pynlong ïa ka Photo Exhibition & ka jingai jingtip kaba ar sngi halor ki nongïakhun jinglaitluid jong ka thain shatei lammihngi bad ka bam kaba tei ha Ramakrishna Mission Higher Secondary School, Mylliem.Ha kane ka exhibition la pyni ïa ka jingïakhun jinglaitluid jong ka India lyngba ka jingpyni ïa ki dur. Ka jingai jingtip ka thmu ruh ban kyntiew ïa ka bam kaba tei bad pyni ïa ki sienjam jong ka sorkar ban ïakhun ïa ka jingduna ka bam kaba tei da kaba kyntiew ïa ki rukom bam kiba tei.Ka DHEO, East Khasi Hills, Kong O Summer ha ka jingai jingkren jong ka, ka la batai sani shaphang ka bam tynrai na ka bynta ka jingtei ïa ka met, ka jingsan ka jabieng bad ka jingïakhun ïa ka jingduna snam (anaemia). Ka la ban jur halor ka jingkyntiew ïa ki jingtei met bad ka jingbam ïa ka bam kaba bha. Ka la ban jur ruh halor ka jingïadei jong ka bam bad ki jingpang bapher bapher bad ka rukom bam kaba dei. Ka la pynkut ïa ka jingkren jong ka da kaba pynshlur ïa ki khynnah pule ban dih shisien shi taiew ïa u dawai Folic Acid bad ïa u dawai Albendazole arsien ha ka shi snem khnang ban pynduh jait ïa ka jing duna snam.Ka Kong Icydora Nongrum, Principal jong ka skul ka la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh jong ka ïa ka CBC, Shillong kaba la pynlong ïa ka exhibition bad ka ong ba kane kan ïarap ban ai jinghikai ïa ki briew, bad khamtam ki khynnah pule, shaphang ka jinglenlade kaba khraw jong ki Nongïakhun jinglaitluid na ka bynta ka ri. Ka la ong shuh shuh ba lyngba ki dur ba la buh ha kane ka exhibition ki khynnah pule ki ïoh jingtip shaphang ki riewshlur ki bym shym la paw pyrthei jong ka thain shatei lammihngi kiba la nohsynniang sha ka jinglaitluid jong ka ri. Haba kren shaphang ka bam kaba tei, ka la kyntu ïa baroh ki khynnah pule ban pynneh ïa ka rukom bam kaba ryntih bad ban pynthikna ba ki bam kumba 5 jait ki bam ha ka shi sngi ba kynthup ïa ka carbohydrate, ki protein, ki shana dai, ki jingbam ba shna na ka dud, ki jhur jyrngam.La pynlong ïa ki jingïakop bapher bapher hapdeng ki khynnah pule jong ka skul ha kane ka prokram kaba ar sngi. La sakhi ruh ïa ka jingïashim bynta shitrhem ha ka jingïakop rwai, quiz, bad ka jingdro dur. La sam ïa ki khusnam sha ki nongjop ha ka jingïalang pynkut ba la pynlong mynta ka sngi.
title: LYNGBA KI DUR PYNTIP PAIDBAH KA CBC SHILLONG ÏA KI NONGÏALEH LAITLUID KA NORTH EAST

content: Shillong, March 5 : The East Khasi Hills District Superintendent of Police issued a public notice on March 5th, 2024, regarding traffic restrictions in anticipation of two major events in the district.Monolith Festival: Scheduled for March 7th-9th, 2024, at Mawphlang, East Khasi Hills District.22nd Annual General Meeting of the KJP Synod Sepngi: Scheduled for March 10th, 2024, at Laitryngew, Sohra.The notice anticipates an influx of vehicles from various districts due to these events, potentially leading to traffic congestion in Shillong and the surrounding areas.To manage traffic flow, heavy-loaded vehicles and trucks will be restricted from entering Mawphlang and Sohra for three consecutive days i.e March 8th, 9th, and 10th, 2024 from 6:00 AM to 11:00 PMEmergency service vehicles will be allowed access. Inconvenience caused is highly regretted.
title: HEAVY VEHICLES RESTRICTED FOR MONOLITH FESTIVAL AND KJP SYNOD

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) Sohiong Circle ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynsngew sha ki tyndong skhor jong ka Sorkar Jylla halor ki jingeh bad ki jingduna kiba iadei bad ka Sohiong Community Health Centre (CHC).Ki dkhot ka seng ba la lamkhmat da u President u Bah Purningstar Shabong ki la pynsngew ia kine ki jingduna jong kane ka jaka ai jingsumar ha ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingiakynduh ia ka Myntri, u Bah Shabong u la iathuh ba ka seng ka la pynsngew hakhmat ka Myntri ia ka jingud jingnam jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka thaiñ  Sohiong sha ka seng halor ka jingleh torti bad ka jingbym shimkhia jong ki nongtrei ka CHC kynthup ïa ki Nurse bad ki Doctor.“Katkum ka jingujor ba ngi la ïoh na ki paidbah, ki nongtrei ka CHC bunsien ki ju kyntait ban sumar ïa ki nongpang bad ki bthah ba kin leit sha kiwei pat ki jaka sumar watla ka dei tang ka jingpang kaba rit. Nalor kata, katkum ka jingujor jong ki paidbah, ki nongtrei ha kane ka CHC  ki ju mlien ban kren heh, kynhied bad kren dukhi ïa ki nongshim dawai bad ia ki paidbah kiba shah sumar ha kane ka CHC.  Kane ka jingleh jong ki nongtrei ka la ktah ïa ka jingsngew jong ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ Sohiong hi baroh kawei,” u la ong.U la kam ruh ba ki paidbah ki ju ud ba ki Doctor bad ki Nurse bad kumjuh ki lad  jingsumar kim ju biang ha kane ka CHC.“Kine ki jinglong jong ki nongtrei ha ka Sohiong CHC bad ka jingbym biang jong ki Doctor bad ki Nurse ka la pynlong  ïa ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ Sohiong baroh kawei  ban duh noh ka jingshaniah ïa kane ka CHC bad bun na ki paidbah ka thaiñ Sohiong kim banse ban leit wad sumar sha Mawphlang, sha Mairang bad sha kiwei kiwei ki jaka,” la kynnoh u Bah Shabong.Haba pynksan ïa kane ka jingkynnoh, une u nongïalam ka HYC u la kam ruh ba ka seng ha ka jingleit jurip kyndit ïa ka Sohiong CHC ha ka 14 tarik u bnai baladep ban lap ïa ka jingshisha halor ka jingujor bad ka jing ud jingnam jong ki paidbah ka thaiñ Sohiong, ka la lap shisha ïa ka jingduna jong ki nongtrei bad ka jingkren baheh ki nongtrei kaba long shisha katkum  ka jingud jing nam bad ka jing ujor jong ki paidbah na ka por sha ka  por.“Ngi la ïakren bad ka Myntri kaba peit ïa ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ba kan shimkhia ïa kane ka  jingeh kaba mih ha kane ka CHC Sohiong da kaba bthah ba ki nongtrei ba  kim dei ban pyni ïa ka jingdukhi ne lehmeng pyrshah ïa ki nongpang ne ki  briew kiba leit wad sumar ha kane ka CHC,” u la bynrap.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka seng ka la kyrpad ïa ka Myntri ba kan shim  khia ban pynbiang ki nongtrei da kaba thung bad thaw thymmai shuh  shuh ki Post ba dang duna kynthup ïa ki Doctor, ki Nurse bad kiwei  kiwei kiba long katkum ki kyndon ba la pruid dak da ka Indian Public  Health Standard (IPHS) khnang ba ka jingshakri jong ka CHC kan lah ban  pynjanai.“Ngi la ai jingmut ruh ba ka tnad ka koit ka khiah jong ka Sorkar ba kan shna noh da u Toll Free Helpline  Number kaba long katkum ka jingpruid dak ha ka Section 38 jong ka National Medical Commission Registered Medical Practitioner  (Professional Conduct) Regulation 2023 khnang ba kan pynsuk ïa ki paidbah ba kin ujor sha ka State Medical Council ne ka Ethics and  Medical Registration Board halor ka jingshah kren/leh tohmet jong  ki nongpang ne paidbah ha ki jaka sumar na ki por sha ki por,” u la ong.Ka seng ka la kyntu ruh ïa ka Myntri ba kan wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynbiang ïa ki tiar ai jingsumar ha kane ka CHC khnang ba kin long ki jingmyntoi ïa ki paidbah bad ban pynkhlaiñ ruh ïa  ka jingtreikam jong ka SMC ne ka EMRB khnang ba kan lah ban pynsted  bad pynkloi ïa ka jingtreikam haba don ka jingujor na ki paidbah.
title: PYNSNGEW KA HYC HA KA MYNTRI BA UD KI PAIDBAH ÏA KA JINGKREN HEH KI NONGTREI KA SOHÏONG CHC
