content: Ha kawei ka jingjia aksiden uwei u nongñiah jong kawei ka trok u la khlad noh hashen hadien ba u la leit tynrah nadien ka trok ha surokbah National Highway ha Mawdiangum.Kane ka la jia ha ka sngi Thohdieng ha ka por 4:15 baje eiei mynstep ha kaba kawei ka trok kaba la ñiah sted bha kaba don ïa u number AS 01 RC 1762 ka la leit ban tynrah beit nadien jong kawei ka trok kaba don ïa u number ML 11 A 1440 haduh ba u nongñiah jong ka trok kaba don ïa u Number AS 01 RC 1762 ba la tip kyrteng kum u Joynal Abdin Laskar na Assam u la sahkut shipor hapoh ka trok.Ki bor Pulit jong ka Nongpoh Traffic, mar mar ki la leit sha kane ka jaka ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bad ban sei ïa u nongñiah napoh ka trok bad pynkit mar mar sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh hynrei namar ka jingshitom kaba jur u la khlad noh na kane ka sla pyrthei.
title: ÏAP HASHEN U NONGNIAH HA KA JINGJIA AKSIDEN HA MAWDIANGUM

content: Ki khynnah skul kiba la pynkhreh bha ia lade kin sa leit ban thoh ia ka eksamin Secondary School Leaving Certificate  (SSLC) ba la pynlong da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) ka ban sdang naduh ka 4 tarik mynta u bnai, katba ka eksamin Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) ka la sdang naduh ka 1 tarik mynta u bnai.Katkum ka jingai jingkhein jong u Joint Director ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) u Bah M. Marbaniang, ki khynnah skul ki ban iakhun ia ka eksamin Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) mynta ka kynti ki don 55,189 ngut, ha kaba 23249  ngut ki dei ki shynrang bad 31940 ngut ki dei ki kynthei, ba kynthup lang ia ki Regular-1 bad Regular-2, ki Private, ki Non-Regular, Improvement bad Compartmental.Katba ha ka eksamin Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) ki don 28072 ngut kiba dei na ka Arts Stream, 3812 ngut na ka Science Stream, 2440 ngut na ka Commerce Stream bad 11 ngut ha  ka Vocational Stream.  Haba khein lang ia baroh ki khynnah kiba pule ia ka Class-XII kiba iakhun ia ka eksamin Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) ki don baroh 34,335 ngut ba kynthup lang ia ki Regular, ki Private-1 bad Private-2, ki Non-Regular, Improvement bad Compartmental.Ki Centre thoh eksamin ha Shillong Region ki don 91 tylli bad 68 tylli ha Tura Region na ka bynta ka Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) katba na ka bynta ka Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) ki jaka thoh eksamin ki don 67 tylli ha Shillong Region bad 41 tylli ha Tura region.Katkum kane ka jingai jingkheiñ jong ka MBoSE, la shem ba mynta u snem 2024 ba ka jingkiew ka nombor jong ki khynnah skul kiba iakhun ia ka eksamin Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) ka long 2,489 ngut, katba ha ka eksamin Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) ka la kiew da 2,329 ngut.
title: 55189 NGUT KI KHYNNAH SKUL BAN ÏAKHUN ÏA KA SSLC, 34335 NGUT ÏA KA HSSLC

content: MANA KA ECI ÏA KI SENG SAIÑPYRTHEI BAN BUROM ÏA KIWEI HABA KREN HA KI RYNSAN ÏALAP ELEKSHON: Da kaba peit ïa ki jingjia jong ki jinghiar ki jingai jingkren ha ki kam sain pyrthei ha ki elekshon ba dang shu long, ka Election Commission of India ka la bthah ïa baroh ki kynhun sain pyrthei ba kin bat ïa ka burom bad ban long kiba husiar ha ki jingai jingkren paidbah bad ruh ban kyntiew ïa ka jingai jingkren ha ki kam sain pyrthei katkum ‘ki mat’.Ka Commission ka la batai ruh ïa ki nongai jingkren bad ki kyrtong shaphang ki nuksa ba mynshuwa ïa kum kine ki jingpynkhein da kaba pyndonkam ïa ki rukom treikam ban kiar na ki kyndon MCC. Ka ECI kan peit ïa kano kano ka jingpynkhein ïa ka MCC katkum ka jingai jingmut kaba ryntih lang ïa baroh ban peit biang ïa ki jingai jingpyntip ban pyllait ha kaba ïadei bad ka por bad ki kam ha kane ka elekshon ban wan. Na ka bynta ka elekshon sha ka iing dorbar thawain Lok Sabha bad ka elekshon sha saw tylli ki Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain ha ki Jylla, baroh ki bynta bad ki jaka jong ki elekshon kin long ka nongrim ban peit ïa ki jingpynkhein.Da kaba pdiang ïa ka jingdonkam ban don ka jingryntih ha ka jinglaitluid ha ki jingkren bad ka jingryntih ha ka jingïaleh, ka jingai jingmut ka la ong ba ka Commission ka la shim ïa ka rukom treikam kaba jai jai naduh ki elekshon ba la dep, da kaba khmih lynti ba ka jingai jingmut jong ka kan wanrah ïa ka jingbahkhleih da ki kyrtong bad ki nongai jingkren. Ïa ki hukum ba la ai da ka Commission la saindur da ka jingpeit bniah ban pynthikna ba ym don ka jingktah kaba jur ïa ki kam khring nongthep vote ban ïa kaba tehlakam. Hynrei, ka jingthmu ban peit ïa ka jingai jingkren, da kaba pyndonkam ïa ki jingai jingtip MCC ha ka rukom kaba ryntih, kam dei ban wanrah ïa ka jingsngewthuh bakla ha kaba la leh biang kumjuh ha ki por ban wan. Shuh shuh, ka jingai jingmut ka la pdiang ïa ka jingkylla ha ki kam information technology bad ki rynsan social media kiba la wanrah ïa ka jingbym shai hapdeng ka por shuwa ka MCC bad ki 48 kynta ba dei ban ym ai jingkren, kaba la wanrah ïa ka jingpynsaphriang ïa ki jingkyntu ïa ki nongthep vote ha ki por bapher bapher.Ka jingai jingmut ïa ki kynhun sain pyrthei, ki kyrtong bad ki nongai jingkrenYm dei ban ai jingkyntu ha ka nongrim jong ka caste/ ki jingsngew pher jait bynriew jong ki nongthep vote. Ym dei ban pyrshang ïa kano kano ka kam kaba pynheh ïa kano kano ka jingïapher lane kaba wanrah ïa ka jingisih hapdeng ki briew lane kaba wanrah ïa ka jingïathut hapdeng ki caste/jait bynriew/ki kynhun katkum ka jingngeit/ ka ktien ka thylliej.Ki kynhun sain pyrthei bad ki nongïalam kim dei ban ai jingkren ba ïalam bakla ïa ki briew khlem da don ka nongrim ha ki jingkren jong ki. Ka jingkren pyrshah ïa kiwei kiwei ki seng sain pyrthei ne ki nongtrei jong ki kiba don nongrim ha ki jingkynnoh bym don nongrim ki dei ki ba hap ban kiar.Ym dei ban bein ïa kano kano ka bynta jong ka jingim shimet, ka bym don jingïadei bad ki kam paidbah, jong ki nongïalam ne ki nongtrei jong kiwei kiwei ki seng sain pyrthei. Ym dei ban kren ha ka rukom ban pynduh burom ïa kiba ïakhun pyrshah.Ym dei ban pyndonkam ïa kino kino ki jaka mane Blei ban ai jingkren shaphang ki kam jied nongmihkhmat. Ym dei ban don ki jingkren kiba bein ïa ka jingïadei jong ki nongmane bad ki Blei bad ym dei ban mana shaphang ka jingpynshitom ha ki Blei.Ki seng sain pyrthei bad ki kyrtong kin kiar na ki kam bad ki jingkren kiba ktah ïa ka burom jong ki longkmie.Ym dei ban pyllait ïa ki jingpynbna ba ïalam bakla ha ki media.Ym dei ban ai jingpynbna ha ka rukom jong ka khubor.Ym dei ban post lane pynsaphriang ïa ki social media post kiba bein ïa kito kiba ïaleh pyrshah lane ki post ki bym ïahap.Ka Commission ka la kyntu ruh ïa baroh ki seng sain pyrthei, ki nongïalam bad ki kyrtong ba kin bat ïa ka Model Code of Conduct bad ki bynta jong ka ain. La ban jur bha ba kano kano ka kam kaba pynkhein ïa ka MCC lane kaba pynhiar ïa ka kam khring nongthep vote kan long kaba shah pynshitom da ka Commission.Katto katne ki rukom pynkhein ïa ka MCC ba la ïohi ha ki elekshon ba la dep ki long kumne harumKa jingpyndonkam ïa ki ktien ki bym ïahap pyrshah ïa ki nongai jingkren jong kiwei kiwei ki seng sain pyrtheiKi jingkynnoh kiba bakla, ki bym lah ban batai shai, ki bym lah ban pynskhem, kiba bakla,Ki jingkren ar jingmut kiba ong ba yn don ka jingpynshitom na ki Blei / jingpynksan ïalade,Ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki social media post kiba bein ïa kiweiKa jingpyni ïa ki social media post ha ka rukom bym ïahap bad ka jingshisha da kaba thmu ban pynsaphriang ïa ka jingïalam bakla ne ka jingai ïa ka jingtip kaba bakla.Ki jingpynbna kiba ïalam bakla bad kiba mih ha ka rukom jong ki khubor kiba pynthut ïa ka jingryntih ha ki sngi shwa ban thep voteKa jingkren pyrshah shimet ïa ki nongïaleh pyrshah bad ka jingkren bein ïa ki kyrtong jong kiwei kiwei ki seng sain pyrtheiKa jingai jingtip ki Sorkar Jylla shaphang ki skhim jong ki ha ki jylla ba marjan ha kaba yn long elekshon ha ka por kaba biang bhaKi jingpyrshang ban khring ïa ki nongthep vote da kaba khot ïa ka jingkyntiew kyrteng ban ai ïa ki jingkular hapoh ki skhim ki bym don kaba long kum ka jingai bai sha ïa ki nongjied nongmihkhmat lyngba ki jingkular ki ba shu thokKa jingpyndonkam ïa ka kyrteng jong u kyrtong ban ai jingkren pyrshah ïa kano kano ka kynhun jong ki nongjied nongmihkhmatKi nongïalam jong ki seng sain pyrthei kiba la ithuh kum ki ‘nongai jingkren ba pawnam’ hapoh ka Section 77 jong ka Representation of the People Act, 1951, ki ju ai jingkren ha ki jingïalang ba heh. Ka long kaba donkam bha ban peit ïa kane namar ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) bad ki kyndon hapoh ka Ain ki ïahap iwei ïa iwei. Kumta, katba ka don ka jingïoh ïa ki bynta ba la wanrah hapoh ka Section 77, ki nongai jingkren ba pawnam ki don ruh ka jingbahkhlieh ban bat ïa ka burom ha ka por ba ki ai jingkren ha ki jingïalang.
title: YN LEH DA KABA TYNGEH ÏA KI JINGPYNKHEIÑ, ÏA KA MCC

content: Ka Shillong All Faiths Forum (SAFF) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la iakynduh kyrpang ha Archbishop’s House Laitumkhrah, Shillong ban iathir iatai hadien ba la mih ka jingkynnoh ba ka don ka jingbyrngem jong ki shitniam na ka Jylla Assam ban pynpra ia ki dur niam bad ia ki stashu ba la buh ha ki jaka pule ba la pyniaid da ki Balang Khristan ha ki shnong khapppud jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ka Jylla Assam ha ine ki khyndiat sngi ba ladepHa ka sngi Palei ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) Umden Area ba kynthup ïa ka RBYDSO, RBYF, HYC, HITO, AMKA bad ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Marmaiñ Area ki la ujor sha u Deputy Commissioner ka Ribhoi District u Arpit Upadhyay halor ka jingbyrngem ban wah ne buh ïa ka dur Jisu ne kino kino ki dur kiba pynpaw ïa ka ñiam khristan ha Sacred Heart Secondary School, Marmaiñ, Ribhoi District  kaba don ha hajan khappud ka Assam bad kumjuh ruh ki skul mishon ha kane ka thaiñ.U President ka Forum u Most Revd. Dr. Purely Lyngdoh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang u la iathuh ong, “ngi la iakren bad ngi la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka saiñpyrthei kaba jia ha Assam, ha Meghalaya bad ha ka ri India baroh kawei. Ka ri India ka dei ka ri kaba kdup ia kiba bun ki jaitbynriew bad ki jait niam hynrei ha kine ki sngi, ka lyer jong ka jingkylla ki wan ki la mih na ki jingkren, na ki kam kiba ki leh ki bym itynnat shuh, kiba sngewsih bad kiba pyniapait iapra ia ki briew bad kane ka la wanrah ia kaei kaei ka bym itynnat shuh ha ka ri India jong ngi.”“Ngi sngewsarong ia ka ri ba ka la nang kiew ha ki kam pynroi bapher bapher hynrei ha kawei ka liang ka jingiadei jong ki parabriew ki khate, ki pynhiardor noh ha ka ri India.  Ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka dei ka thaiñ kaba ki hynñiew tylli ki jylla ki im hapdeng ka jingsuk jingsaiñ hapdeng ka jingsuk bad ka jingialong kawei.  Hynrei mynta ngam lah ban ong ba ka la jan ka elekshon ne ba la wan ka lyer na kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ka ri India ne ba ka elekshon ka la jan ki mih ki kynhun ki bym kren buhrieh hynrei kiba pynpaw beit ia kiei ki jingdawa, ki jingthmu jong ki lyngba ka niam,” ong u President ka SAFF.“Kane ka long kaba sngewsih ka bym ju don ha ka jylla jong ngi hynrei mynta ngi ïohi ba ki la sdang ban wan kine ki jingkren ki jingdawa. Ka kynhun jong ngi ki nongialam niam bapher bapher ka SAFF ba kum ki nongshong shnong ha ka jylla Meghalaya ngi dei ban long kiba jaijai, ngi dei ban long kiba jynsur ka jingmut jingpyrkhat, ngim dei ban long kiba shongshit khlehbiej,” u la bynrap.Haba kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin long kiba husiar, u la ong, “ngi dei ban long kiba husiar. Ki khubor ki bym shisha kiba ngi ïohsngew nangne nangtai ngi dei ban long kiba husiar bad kiba peitngor bad ngin ialeh shitom katba ngi lah ba ngin ia im lang ha kane ka jylla. Ngi dei ban shim ia ki sienjam ba ngin pynsah ia ka jingsuk, ka jingsngewthuh jingmut bad ka jingialong kawei hapoh ka Meghalaya.”
title: KA ELEKSHON KA LA JAN KI MIH KI KYNHUN KIBA KREN ÏA KI JINGTHMU LYNGBA KA NIAM : SAFF

content: Uwei u briew ba la kynnoh ba u dei uba donkti ban shalan mar be-ain u la shah siat ïap ha ki shipai BSF jong ka Meghalaya Frontier ha ka miet sngi Thohdieng, katba uwei pat u nong Bangladesh u la mynsaw jur ha kane ka jingsiat kuli jong ki shipai BSF.U Asen M. Marak, uba la don kumba 40 snem ka rta, u la duhei ïa la ka jong ka jingim ha ka jingsiat kuli jong ki shipai BSF katba ki paidbah ki dang pyrshang ban patan ïa u na ka jaka ba la jia ka jingïasiat, kaba jngai kumba 300 mitar na khappud, ka bym pat ker sainar shiah.  Ïa uba la mynsaw, ki Pulit bad ki shipai BSF ki dang pynlong ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban tip kyrteng bad ïa ka jaka sah.Haba pynshisha ïa kane ka jingjia, ka Sub Divisional Officer (Civil) jong ka Sohra, ka Salon Verma ka la ong ba ïa kane ka kam mynta ka dang don hapdeng ka jingtohkit katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.  “Da lade hi ngan sa shimti ban tohkit ynda ka kynhun tohkit ka la wan phai ban wanrah ïa ki jingtip kiba bniah ba la ïohlum.  Ïa ka postmortem yn sa leh ha Sohra, bad hadien kata ka aiñ hi kan sa leh ka la jong ka kamram,” ong ka Verma haba ïakren bad u nongthoh khubor lyngba ka telephone.Kane ka la jia ha ha shnong Dalia hajan Shella, East Khasi Hills District ha ka por kumba 8 baje mynmiet, haba ki shipai BSF  kiba dang ïaid pahara ki la khang lynti ïa ka kynhun jong ki birew kiba thmu ban shalan tuh ïa ka shini, u piat bad ïa kiwei kiwei ki mar ha ka dor kaba rem sha ka ri Bangladesh.Ka shnong Dalia ka dei kaba la buhai shnong da ki Garo bad ka thymmei khubor ka ïathuh ba ki kam runar ruser ki ju jia bha watla kam pat ju don satia kano ka jingïatakhuh bad ki bor jong ka aiñ ha ki sngi ba la leit noh.Katkum ka jingai jingtip ba malu mala halor ka jingjia, u Heh Ophisar BSF uba shimti ïa kane ka kam u la ong ba kine ki jingjia ki ju jia manla ka por, hynnin ka sngi ha ka por kumba 300 ngut ki briew na India bad Bangladesh ki la ïatakhuh bad ki shipai BSF katba ki dang pyrshang ban pynpulom ïa ki kam khaïi tuh bad khnang ban pynjem ïa ki paidbhur ki shipai BSF ki la siat ar kuli  ha kaba u Asen Marak u la ïap.“Kumba 300 ngut ki briew na khappud ki la ïalum ban pynibor ïa ki shipai BSF. Katba ka kynhun ka dang ïatakhuh bad ki shipai BSF, sa kawei pat ka kynhun ka la shim kabu ban pynduh ïa ki sakhi satar da kaba patan ïa ki mar khaïi tuh ryngkat bad u Marak uba la mynsaw jur hadien ba la shah siat kuli bad khladnoh namar ka jingjur palat ka jingphlei snam,” ong u heh shipai BSF.Une u Heh shipai BSF u bym kwah ban pynpaw kyrteng ha ka jingïakren bad u nongthoh khubor lyngba ka telephone u ong ba ka don ruh ka video ba la ïoh ring kum ka sakhi halor kane ka jingjia ha ka shnong Dalia.“Ki shipai ki la kawang da ki bom pynsat khmat bad ka PAG (pump action gun) ban pynpra ïa ki paidbhur kiba la sdang ban pynibor.  Ki la pyndonkam da ki wait, ki tari bad da ki tiar pynmynsaw katba ki ïoh bad sdang ban ktah kti ruh wat ïa ki shipai. Dei na kane ka daw ba ki shipai kim banse ban siat pynma shwa shi kuli sha suiñ, bad haba ïohi ba kane kam pyntieng satia ïa ki paidbhur, ki shipai ki la siat biang sa shisien, kaba pynlong ïa u Marak ban mynsaw jur bad mar mar ki paidbah ki la paring noh ïa u bad kit ïa u sha shnong, bad khladnoh na ka jingmynsaw jur,” ong shuh shuh une u heh shipai BSF.
title: SHAH SIAT ÏAP UWEI UBA SUBA NONGKHAÏI TUH HA KI BSF HADIEN BA SHAH THOMBOR  HA KI BRIEW BYM ITHUH

content: Ki Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ki la iathuh ba ki la kem ia u Bah Storgy Lyngdoh uba dei u dkhot jong ka seng kieng atiar ba la shah khein beain ka Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) halor ka jingdonkti jong u ban sam ia ki shithi dawa ban lum pisa na ka bynta ka HNLC na ki nongkhaii heh saipan ka nongbah Shillong.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police (SP) ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi sha ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la ioh jingtip ha ka sngi thohdieng ba u Bah Storgy Lyngdoh u dei uba donkti ban sam ia ki shithi dawa pisa sha ki heh saipan ka nongbah Shillong.U SP u la iathuh ba katkum ka jingioh lum jingtip la ngeit ba u Bah Storgy u lah ban pyntieng kohtympan bad byrngem ruh ia ki nongkhaii heh saipan ba kin pdiang ia ki shithi dawa pisa. Ha ka jingbuddien jong ka tnat syntiat, la lap ba u Bah  Storgy u shong u sah ha ka shnong Mawlynrei, Khliehshnong, Shillong.Shuh shuh u SP u la iathuh, hadien ba la ioh jingtip halor kane, ki Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills ki la kem ia u Bah Storgy Lyngdoh na ka shnong Mawlynrei ha ka step sngi saitjain bad ioh kurup ruh ia kawei ka Bangladeshi SIM card na u.Katkum une u kyrwoh, u SP u la pyntip ba u Bah Storgy Lyngdoh u dei u dkhot jong ka HNLC bad uba don ruh ka jingiadei kaba iajan bha bad u Deputy Commander-in-Chief jong ka HNLC bad u dei ruh u PSO jong u A. Hazarika ba ju khot sin kum u Manbhalang Jyrwa, uba dei u Vice Chairman barim jong ka HNLC.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ia ka ejahar la rejistar ha Rynjah Police Station na ka bynta ban pynlong shuh shuh ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor kane ka kam.  Katkum ka jinglum jingtip jong ka tnat Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya, u Bah Storgy u dei uba donkti ha kiba bun ki kam runar bad uba la lait ruh da ka said na ka jingshah kem ha ki bor jong ka ain, la pyntip shuh shuh u SP.Ha ka por janmiet, ki Pulit ki la tian bishar ia u Bah Storgy ha kashari District and Session Judge, Shillong bad ka Kashari ka la aibor 10 sngi ia ki Pulit ban tohkit pyrshah ia u Bah Storgy Lyngdoh.
title: U STORGY LYNGDOH U DONKTI BAN SAM SHITHI DAWA PISA SHA KI HEH SAIPAN: SP EKH

content: Hadien ka jingjia ba itriem ha ka miet 20 tarik, Rymphang ha kaba ka la don ka jingïashoh ïadat kaba la poi ruh sha u pud ban sei tari bad ïadung, ki nongkitkam jong ka Dorbar Shnong Urkaliar ki la ïaid pahara ban pyntikna ba kan ym don shuh kaba kum kane ka jingjia hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong.Ki nongïalam jong ka Dorbar Shnong Urkaliar kiba la sdang ïa ka jingïaid pahara mynmiet naduh ka 24 tarik, Rymphang haduh mynta da ka jingsynran lang jong ki Pulit ka Nongmensong Police Out Post.Naduh ba la jia ka jingïashoh ïadat ha ka 20 tarik, Rymphang, ka Dorbar Shnong marmar ka la lum da ka jingïalang ha ka 24 tarik, Rymphang bad shim ruh da ka rai ban ym shah shuh ban die jingdie palat ïa ka 10:00 baje mynmiet shaneng bad ha kajuh ka por ka Dorbar Shnong ka la thaw ruh da ka Village Defence Party (VDP) bad la bthah ïa ki trai dukan ba ki dei ban pyndait ïa ki CCTV hakhmat ki dukan jong ki.U Secretary ka Dorbar Shnong Urkaliar Bah Samborlang Diengdoh ha ka jingïakren bad u nonglum khubor u la ïathuh hadien ka jingïalang kaba la long bad ka Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong RM KUrbah ka Dorbar Shnong ka la rai ban pynlong da ka jingïaid pahara hapoh ka shnong ha ka por mynmiet khnang ba pynthikna ba kan ym don shuh kano kano ka jingjia kaba sngewsih hapoh ka shnong ka thaw ha kaba ki longkmie bad ki rangbah ki la shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban peitngor ïa ka shnong ka thaw da ka jingsynran lang jong ki Pulit.
title: HADIEN KA JINGÏADUNG TARI, IAID PAHARA KA DS URKALIAR BAD KI PULIT

content: Ka Karbi (Mikir) Traditional Faith (Religion) Association (KTFA) ha ka sngi U Blei ka la pynshai ba kam donkti kti satia halor ki jingshah kynnoh ba ka don ka jingtah Poster ha ka shnong Marmaiñ, Ribhoi District, ka shnong kaba don ha khappud ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam.Kane ka jingpynshai jong ka KTFA ka long hadien ba u MLA ka Nongpoh u Bah Mayral Born Syiem dang shen u la rah ha Iing Dorbar halor ka jingshong syier jong ki paidbah ha ka thaiñ Marmaiñ halor ka jingkynoh ba ka don ka jingbyrngem jong ki kynhun kiba bthah ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka Sacred Heart Secondary School, Marmaiñ ban weng ia ki dur niam na ka skul.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President bad u Secretary ka KFTA, ka ong, hadien ba la ïohsngew na ka Social Media ki la pyrshang ban wad jingtip hapoh ka shnong bad ha ki jaka ba marjan hynrei kim shym la lap sabut eiei ruh em ba ka don ka jingtah poster hapoh shnong ne ha kano kano ka jaka.“Ngi sngewdei ban pynshai ba ka khubor ka long ban ïalam bakla bad ngi kyrpad ia ki nongshong shnong jong ka jylla baroh kawei ba kim dei ban sngewthuh bakla halor kane,” ong ka kyrwoh.Halor ka jingsaphriang jong ka Voice Mail, ki nongïalam ka KTFA ki la kam ki la pyrshang ban wad jingtip bad kim shym la lap ia kano kano ka sabut ba la don kum kata ka jingkren ha ka voice mail.“Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkynnnoh ba la phah weng ïa ki stashu na ki iingskul kam long kaba shisha bad ym shym la don satia kaba kum kata ka rai. Hynrei ha ka jingïalang ha kato ka sngi ka long tang ka jingïasyllok haba shit haba shai hakhmat ki paidbah kumno ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka jingngeit niam tynrai sha kine ki thaiñ,” la pynshai ka KTFA.Haba pynshai halor ka jingkynnoh ba don ka jingïadei bad ka seng Sanmilato Samatan Samaj na Assam, ka KTFA ka la pynshai ba kam don jingtip ne jingïadei eiei ruh em shaphang  ka SSS na Assam hynrei ka dei tang kaba la shu ïoh sngew na ka Voice Mail.Halor ki dur niam tynrai (Traditional Symbol), ka KTFA ka la kam ba kam don kano kano ka jingtuklar ne ka jinghukum ban phah weng, hynrei la shaniah ha ka bor jong u Syiem Hima Dumura (Doomora), kum u Syiem ban pynbeit ïa kane ka kam.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka KTFA ka kyntu ïa ki bor synshar ka Ribhoi District ba lada don ki jingpyndik, ki bor ka aiñ ki dei ban leh ïa kaba donkam bad kum ka kynhun ki kular ban ai ia ka jingïatrei lang bad ki bor pynïaid distrik bad ban ym ailad ïa kino kino kiba thaw jingkulmar hapoh ka shnong ka thaw.
title: DEI TANG KA KHUBOR LAMLER,  KYNTAIT KA KTFA BYM DONKTI BAN PYNSHONG SYIER HA MARMAIÑ

content: : Ka jingïalang jong ka Expert Committee ban khmihbniah biang ïa ka State Reservation Policy, Meghalaya kaba la thaw lyngba ka jingpynbna ka ha ka Notification NO. PER(AR) 49/2023/PT/3 ka 12 tarik u Nailur ,2023 hapoh ka jinglong chairman u Justice(Retired) Mool Chand Garg, ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïakynduh lang kaba nyngkong ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Ha kane ka jingïalang ki heh ophisar jong ka sorkar jylla ki la ïadonlang.Ha shwa kane na ka liang ka committee ka la pynlong ïa kiba bun ki jingïalang. Na ka liang u Chairman bad ki dkhot ki la leit ban jngoh ïa ka ophis jong ka Expert Committee kaba don ha Building jong ka Assistant Commissioner of Food and Safety, Lachumiere, Shillong.Ki dkhot jong ka committee ki la pynlong ruh ïa ka jingïalang ha kaba ka la don ka jingïalang kaba ki la ïasyllok halor ki kam kiba dei ban leh nangne shakhmat.Ïa kane ka committee la thaw ban khmihbniah ïa kane ka reservation policy kaba mynta hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.Ïa ka jingïalang ka ban long hadien pat kan dei ha u bnai Ïaïong jong une u snem, 2024.
title: LUM JINGÏALANG KA EXPERT COMMITTEE HA SIEN BA NYNGKONG

content: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ong ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla um don iktiar satia ban ai Sanad Rangbah Shnong ïano ïano ruh.Kane ka jingkynthoh jong ka KHNAM ka long halor ka jingïakynduh jong ka All Ribhoi Garo Headmen Association ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ban dawa ïa ka kam Rangbah Shnong.“Kum ban pyntip hangne ba u Myntri Rangbah um don satia ïa ka itkiar ban ai Sanad Rangbah Shnong ïano ïano ruh, namarba ka dei ka kamram jong ka Hima Mylliem bad ka KHADC. Dei pynsngew sha ka KHADC,” KHNAM ong u working president ka KHNAM u Bah Thomas Passah ha u kyrwoh.“Namar Kata, ngi kwah ban pynpaw ba kum kine ki jingdwa kin ktah ïa ka long jingman ka jaka bad ban kiar na kino kino ki jingtakhuh hapdeng ki jaidbynriew ha ki por ban sa wan, kum kine ki jingdawa ym dei satia ban pynsngap,” u la bynrap.U Bah Passah shuh shuh u la pynkynmaw ïa ka KHADC ba ka The Khasi Hills Autonomous District (Appointment and Succession of Syiem, Deputy Syiem, Electors and Rangbah Shnong of Mylliem Syiemship) Act 2007, Section 2 Sub Section (o) ka la kren shai ba ïa u Rangbah Shnong dei ban jied tang na ki jaidbynriew Khasi, bad ki bor ba dei peit ki dei ban bud ryntih ïa ki kyndon jong ka aiñ kiba la don lypa bad ban kiar mardor ban shu pynsngewbha ïa kine ki jingdawa.
title: U CM YM DON IKTIAR BAN RAI RANGBAH SHNONG IANO IANO RUH: KHNAM

content: : Ka North East Sunshine Trust (India) dang shen ka la phah ïa ka Detailed Project Report (DPR) sha ka Sorkar Pdeng ban sdang noh ïa ka jingtih Uranium ha Meghalaya.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Myntri Khynnah ka Department of Atomic Energy u Dr Jitendra Singh ha ka 26 tarik, Rymphang, 2024, ka Founder Trustee bad Chairperson jong ka NEST (I) ka Kong Elizabeth Mathews Nongbri ka la ong, “ïa ka Detailed Project Report ban sdang biang ïa ka projek tih Uranium ha Meghalaya la pynkhreh da ka kynhun jong ngi.”Ka Kong Nongbri ka ong, “ha ka 23 tarik, Naiwieng, 2023 ha ka National Ex-Servicemen Convention ha Kurukshetra, nga la ïakynduh ïa u Col Pravat Kumar Panda (Retd), Independent Director, Uranium Corporation of India Ltd (UCIL). U la wanrah ïa kane ka mat ban sdang biang ïa ka jingtih Uranium ha Meghalaya. Kumba phi tip, ka jingleh sorjamin ka Sorkar India ka lap ba u Uranium u don bun bha ha West Khasi Hills District jong ka Meghalaya. Ka jingshim nuksa ïa une u marpohkhyndew uba remdor ka long naduh khat hynñiew snem mynshwa hynrei kam shym la long kam satia, na ka daw ba ki don ki riewshim kaba kiba kawang maw ïa ka jingtrei shitom da kaba pynsngewthuh bakla ïa ki paidbah ba kin ieng pyrshah ïa kane ka jingthmu.  Ïa ka ophis jong ka UCIL la pynbor ban khang khyrdep noh Shillong. Ïa ka jingïasoi soskular hapdeng ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla ha u snem 2009 na ka bynta ban shimwai ïa ka jaka ha West Khasi Hills, la pyndam noh ha u snem 2016. La kheiñ antad ba u Uranium u bun bha, nalor uba u long uba remdor. Katba kiwei kiwei ki jylla kum ka Jharkhand ka la ïoh jingmyntoi na ka jingdon jong u marpohkhyndew ha ka jaka jong ki, ka Meghalaya ka shong halor u marpohkhyndew uba remdor hynrei kam lah ban ïoh jingmyntoi eiei ruh em.”Haba pyntip ba u Uranium u don kyrhai hapoh West Khasi Hills, ka kong Elizabeth ka la ïathuh ba ka NEST(India) kaba don ki briew ba ithuh ithaw ha ki shnong ki thaw bad ki stad ki jhad ban tih marpoh khyndew, ka lah ban pynurlong ïa ka kam tih Uranium hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ka dorkhas ba la phah da ka Kong Nongbri sha u Myntri Khynnah ka Sorkar Pdeng ka dei ruh kaba la saphriang ha ka Social Media.Ha ka ka dorkhas, ka Kong Elizabeth Nongbri ka la pynithuh ïalade ba ka dei ka Khasi bad ka dei ka nongtreikam jong ka BJP naduh u snem 2015. Ka la pynithuh ruh ba ka dei kaba ïohlok shipai bad ba kala bat ïa ki kam ba kongsan hapoh ka BJP Minority Morcha bad ruh kum ka National Executive Member.“Katto katne na kiba ithuh ithaw, kiba la trei hapoh ka tnat Soil & Conservation ka Sorkar Meghalaya, mynta ki dei ki dkhot jong ka kynhun jong ngi. Kine kin sa ïaleh ban ïoh ïa ka jingshaniah na ki paidbah khnang ban pynsdang ïa kane ka projek. Ki la kyrpad ruh ban ïalam sha ka jaka tih Uranium ka UCIL ha Jharkhand, khnang ba kin dup lah ban pynkhreh ïa ka jinglum jingtip ba kin dup ïoh ïa ka jingkyrshan na ki paidbah,” la ong ka Kong Nongbri bad bynrap, “ngi la leh bun ki kam kiba jwat ban ïakren bad ban ïakynduh ïa ki briew kiba dei ki kynhun bapawkhmat ban sdang biang ïa ka jingtih (Uranium.”Ka la kam shuh shuh ba ka ïoh ka kot jong ki paidbah lada pynsdang biang ïa kane ka kam kan kyntiew shikatdei eh ia ki.  Nalor kata, u marpohkhyndew uba remdor tam un ïarap ban pynurlong ïa ka jingangnud jong u Myntri Rangbah.“Ngi kyrpad namar kata, ban ailad katto katne ngut ki dkhot kynthei ka kynhun jong ngi, kiba dei ki Viksit Bharat Ambassador na ka jylla ai jait kmie ha Meghalaya, ban pyni markhmat ïa ka Policy Document and Framework for Execution ha u Myntri Rangbahduh bad ha ki ophisar jong ka UCIL ha New Delhi.Haba pyrshang ban pan jingpynshai halor kane, ka Kong Nongbri ka ong, “ngam lah ban kren eiei (halor kane) ïa mynta. Ngan sa kren ïa phi ha kawei pat ka por.”
title: THOH SHITHI KA NEST (INDIA) SHA KA SORKAR INDIA BAN TIH NOH ÏA U URANIUM NA MEGHALAYA

content: Ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia & Garo People ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingbitar ïa ka North East Sunshine Trust (NEST) India halor ka dorkhas ba ka la phah sha ka Sorkar India da ka jingkyntu ban pynim biang ïa ka kam ban tih noh ïa u Uranium na kane ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ka FKJGP ka la maham ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kam dei ban ailad ïa kum kine ki seng ba kin thaw jingkulmar hapoh ka Jylla.U General Secretary ka FKJGP Bah Eldie N. Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka kam tih Uranium ha Meghalaya ka dei ka kam kaba la pynkut naduh mynno namar ka jingpyrshah jur jong ki paidbah.U la maham ïa kane ka seng ba kam dei ban mushlia bad pynim biang ïa kane ka kam hynrei lym kumta ka FKJGP kam banse ban tuklar bad leh ïa kaba dei ban leh.“Ka FKJGP bad kumjuh ruh kiwei ki seng, kin ym ailad satia ïa ka jingtih Uranium ha Meghalaya. Long kat kaba long, kane ka dei ka kam ïap kam im jong ka jaidbynriew,” ula ong.
title: BITAR KA FKJGP ÏA KA NEST (INDIA) BA KYNTU BAN PYNIM ÏA KA KAM URANIUM

content: Ryngkat lang bad ka pyrthei baroh kawei, ka tnat Social Welfare ka Sorkar Jylla ka la ïashim bynta ban rakhe kyrpang ïa kane ka sngi da ka jingïatreilang bad ka State Hub for Empowerment of Women bad ka Meghalaya State Rural Livelihoods Society ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha State Convention Centre, Shillong.Ha kane ka sngi, ka tnat Social Welfare ka la pynkup burom ïa ki longkmie kiba don ïa ki sap kyrpang ha ka jingim jong ki.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. M Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba kane ka sngi ka dei rakhe namarba ngi la kynjoh ha ki thong bapher bapher ha ka jingim.“Ngi donkam ban rakhe lang kawei, ki longkmie ruh ha la ki ing ki sem, ki khynnah kynthei ruh ki rakhe ïa kane ka sngi kaba kyrpang namarba ka Sorkar baroh kawei ka ri India ryngkat bad ka phang pdeng jong kane ka sngi,” la ong ka Dr. Ampareen.Ka la ong shuh shuh ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la mang pisa shibun bha na ka bynta ki kynthei kaba kot T. 5271 klur.Ka la bynrap ba ngi hap ban pynthikna ba ki kynthei ki dei ban ïohlad ban ïashim bynta ha ki lad kamai jakpoh, ngi kyrmen ba ngin pynkhlain ïa ka ïoh ka kot kum ki longkmie bad ban pynskhem ïa u païa jong ka ing ka sem. Lyngba ki kynhun ïatreilang  ngin sa lah ban ïohi ïa ka jingïaid shaphrang jong ki kynthei ha ki liang bapher bapher.“Ka Sorkar kan sa bei jingïarap 18% na ki 5 hajar tylli ki jaka ai jingsumar ïa ki kynthei,” ka la bynrap. Ka Jylla Meghalaya ka la pynkhlaiñ ïa ki kynhun ïatreilang kiba trei tang da ki kynthei bad da ka lynti yn sa lah ban kyrshan jingïarap ïa kine ki kynhun ba kin nang kiew shaphrang.Ha kane ka sngi, la ïadon lang ka Chairperson jong ka Handicraft and Handloom ka Kong Santa Mary Shylla, u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Social Welfare u Pravin Bakshi bad kiwei kiwei.La sam ruh ïa ki khusnam sha ki kynthei kiba la pynpaw pyrthei ïa ki sap ki phong jong ki, ba kynthup ïa ka Nambi Jessica Marak (kaba long ka nongshet jingshet), ka Kong Kmoin Wahlang ka nongmareh marathon, ka Kong Bonifilia Shullai (nongïalehkai sports), ka Kong Sidalin Marbaniang (ka nongsengkam), ka Kong Ratna Rai bad ka Kong Pdiangsngewbha Pohti (ki nongseng ïa ki kynhun ïatreilang.La sam ruh ruh ïa ki kor suhjaiñ sha ki kynthei da ka tnat Superintendent of Training for Women in Need of Care & Protection, Social Welfare Department.
title: ÏOH BUROM KI LONGKMIE KIBA PAW HA KI SAP HA KA INTERNATIONAL WOMEN’S DAY

content: Ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court ka la pynjynsur ïa ki sngi set along sha ka 10 snem ïa uwei u briew uba la shah rai pynrem halor ka jingdonkti ban leh be-ijot ïa iwei i heprit kynthei ba dang 5 snem ka rta.Ïa u Rajingstar Thabah la kem halor ka jingujor da ka kmie jong ine i heprit sha ki Pulit ka Sohiong Police Outpost ha ka 3 tarik u Naiwieng, 2017.U Special Judge (POCSO), Shillong u la pynmih ïa ka rai bishar ha ka 11 tarik, Naitung, 2022, kaba rai set along shi jingim na ka bynta 18 snem bad phah siew ïa ka kuna kaba T. 20,000 hajar bad lada um lah ban siew ïa ka kuna un hap ban shong along sa lai bnai.  Ïa ka pisa ba la daiñ kuna la bthah ban siew sha i lanot.Ha ka rai bishar ba la pynmih ha ka 7 tarik Lber, haba shong bishar ïa ka Criminal Appeal, ka Division Bench kaba kynthup ïa u Chief Justice S Vaidyanathan bad u Justice W Diengdoh ka la ong, “halor kane, ïa ka Criminal Appeal la shah ha kane ka bynta bad ïa ka rai pynrem bad ban set along la pynmih da ka Ingbishar ha ka 08.07.2022 bad ka hukum ban set along la pynmih ha ka 11.07.2022, ba la pynmih da u Special Judge (POCSO), Shillong ha ka Special POCSO Case No.5 of 2018 la pynkylla ha kaba u nongshah mudui un shong along na ka bynta shiphew snem bad siew ïa ka kuna kaba T. .20,000 bad lada um siew ïa ka kuna un hap ban shong along sa lai bnai. Kumba la hukum da ka Trial Court, ïa ka kuna dei ban siew sha ka lanot, lada ym pat siew.”
title: SHA KA 10 SNEM PYNJYNSUR KA INGBISHAR ÏA KI SNGI SET ALONG ÏA UBA LEH BE-IJOT

content: : Ka North East Sunshine Trust (India) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la kam ba ka shithi kaba ïadei bad bad ka jingtyrwa ban sdang biang ïa ka kam tih Uranium hapoh kane ka jylla ka dang dei tang kaba dang shu pynkhreh bad kaba ym pat phah satia sha u Myntri Khynnah ka Department of Atomic Energy ka Sorkar India u Dr. Jitendra Singh.Kane ka jingpynshai jong ka NEST ka long hadien ba ka shithi ba ladep “thoh” ka la saphriang stet haduh katta katta ha ka social media bad shah kynthoh haban da biang ha ki kynhun kiba pyrshah ïa ka jingtih Uranium ha kane ka Jylla.Katkum ka shithi kaba 26 tarik, Rymphang 2024, ka NEST ka la tyrwa ban phah ïa ka Detailed Project Report (DPR) na ka bynta ban pynsdang biang ïa ka kam tih Uranium ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.“Sngewbha peit ïa ka shithi jong ngi…kaba 26 tarik Rymphang, 2024 ba la phah sha u Dr Jitendra Sing, Myntri Khynnah ka Department of Atomic Energy, ka Sorkar India. Ka jingthoh hajrong ka shithi ka dang dei tang kaba dang shu pynkhreh bad kaba dang thmu tang ban shu sdang shwa ïa ka jingïasyllok. Ka long kaba sngewsih ba ki briew ki bym tip ki la shim rai ha ka jingstad lajong, ba ïa ka kam laitluid jong ngi la pynsdang da ka seng jong ngi ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka projek bad pyrshang ruh ban pynmih paidbah khlem ka jingtip jong ka seng,” la ong ka Founder Frustee bad Chairperson jong ka NEST (I) ka Kong Elizabeth Mathews Nongbri ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ka Shillong Press Club (SPC).“Ngi ïohi ba ka long kaba donkam bad ka jingma kaba ap na kane ka projek bad la tyrwa ba dei ban bud ïa ki kyndon ban bishar bniah bin pa bin hapoh ka Sorkar Meghalaya. La pynshisha ba ka shithi ka dei tang kaba dang shu pynkhreh bad ym pat shym la phah sha u briew uba dei,” ka la ong bad pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngew babe lada ka shithi ba dang shu pynkhreh ka la pynmong ne ka la ktah ïa ka jingsngew jong ki paidbah.“Ngi panmap na ka bynta ka jingleh ba khlem pyrkhat da ki briew ki bym lah ban tip kiba la shim rai halade ban pynthohbria ïa ka kynhun jong ngi,”ka la pynkut.
title: KAM KA NEST BYM PAT PHAH ÏA KA SHITHI DAWA TIH URANIUM SHA U MYNTRI KA SORKAR INDIA

content: Ka jingbthei kaba khlain bor bha ka la mih na kawei ka ïing ka bym don shuh mano mano basah ha Them Iewmawlong ha ka sngi saitjain ha ka por kumba 10.30 baje eiei mynmiet.Ia ka jingsawa jong kane ka jingbthei kaba khlainbor bha la iohsngew ym tang ha ki shnong kiba don marjan bad ka thaiñ Motphran bad wat ki paidbah kiba sah shaduh Golflink.Ka kynhun lum khubor jong ka Batesi Tv kaba la poi sha kane ka  jaka ba la mih ka jingbthei kaba don hajan ka jaka ieng ki Bos Smit ka la lap ba ki tin, ki lyntang ba la ker ia ka ing ki la pra bad ki iit ruh ki la pait lyngkhot lyngkhai.Ki jaidbynriew Harijan kiba shong basah ha Them Iewmawlong ki la iathuh wat ki ing ki sem jong ki ruh ki la khih kumba khynñiuh u jumai uba jur bha ha ka por ba la jia kane ka jingbthei kaba khlain bor bha.Ki Pulit ka Bomb Squad bad ki Pulit ka nongbah Shillong tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane, ki la leit mar mar ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap ia ka daw tynrai halor kane ka jingbthei kaba la pynsuhjer bad pynmih niangkhriat ia ki briew kiba sah ha Them Metor.Uwei u briew u la mynsaw ha ka jingbthei kaba khlain bor bha bad ia une uba mynsaw la pynkit sha Woodland Hospital ban ioh ia ka jingsumar.Kat haduh ba la thoh ia kane ka khubor, ym pat lah satia ban tip, la ka jingbthei ka lah ban dei da u kynja bom IED ne uno uno u tiar pynbthei.Ia ka jingtip kaba bniah yn sa nang wanrah kham hadien ynda la ioh ia ka khubor kaba thikna na ka tnat Pulit.
title: BTHEI KA ÏING BYM SAH BRIEW SHUH HA THEM METOR, MYNSAW UWEI

content: U drok uba shongdor palat T. 300 klur la kurup da ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya hapoh ar snem la ïathuh u Director General of Police (DGP) Dr. LR Bishnoi bad ong ruh ba kane ka jingeh ka dei kaba khia bha namarba ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei kaba ïajan tam bad ka Golden Triangle.“Jan T. 300 klur u drok la ïoh kurup hapoh ki ar snem ba la leit noh.  Ha kine ki ar snem u drok uba shongdor 75 klur la ïoh kurup hapoh u snem 2022. Nangta sa 170 klur hapoh u snem 2023 bad sa 21 klur hapoh ki ar bnai jong u snem 2024,” la ong u Bishnoi ha ki lad pathai khubor.Haduh 26 kilo u drok la ïoh kurup hapoh ki ar snem. Kane ka kynthup ïa u drok ba 7.5 kilor ha u snem 2022, 16.3 kilor ha u snem 2023 bad jan 1 kilor u drok ba la ïoh kurup ha u bnai Kyllalyngkot-Rymphang 2024.Ka jingïohkurup ïa u Ganja ka la long haduh 4,750 kilo ha u snem 2024 (ba la ïoh kurup da ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi) na ka 1400 kilo ba la ïoh kurup ha u snem 2023 bad 3987 kilo ha u snem 2022.U DGP u la pynkup burom ruh ïa ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi halor ka jingïoh kurup ïa u Ganja ha ka sngi u Blei ha Lad Umsaw.“Ki Pulit ka Ribhoi ki la pynlong ka jingap shrip bad kurup 4750 kilo u Ganja bad ka jingwan rah ïa une u jingdih ka dei na ka jylla Tripura bad nangne la pynrung lyngba ka Meghalaya bad ngi la ïohkem ïa ki runar kiba donkti bad mynta kane ka case ka dang don hapdeng ka jingtohkit,” u la ong.Ka jingïoh kurup ïa ki dawai kuli Yaba ka la kiew bha ha kaba 19000 tylli ki kuli la ïoh kurup ha u snem 2022, haduh 60,000 tylli ki kuli la ïoh kurup ha u snem 2023 bad 2000 ki kuli la ïoh kurup ha u snem 2024.  Ka jingïoh kurup ïa kiwei pat ki dawai kuli jingdih pynbuaid ki long 16928 tylli ha u snem 2022, 32,298 tylli ha u snem 2023 bad 600 tylli ha u snem 2024.Ha ka sien banyngkong eh, ki Pulit ki la kurup ruh 14.2 kilo u jingdih Crystal Neth uba shongdor T. 1.5 klur.Shuh shuh, haduh 116 tylli ki NDPS case la rejistar ha u snem 2022 bad kane ka la kiew sha ka 189 ha u snem 2023 katba haduh 13 tylli ki case ladep ban rejistar ha ki ar bnai jong une u snem 2024.Palat 610 ngut ki briew ki la shah kem naduh u snem 2022 haduh u snem 2024. Na kine, 234 ngut kiba la shah kem ki long ha  u snem 2022, 355 ngut ha u snem 2023 bad 25 ngut ha u snem 2024. 10% na kiba la shah kem ki dei ki kynthei kiba donkti ban khaii drok.Kumjuh ruh, 19 ngut la ithuh kum ki briew kiba ïai mlien ban khaii drok, ha kaba 8 tylli ki case jong ka PITNDPS la phah sha ka kashari bad mynta ka Advisory Board kan sa shim ïa ka rai, la ong u Bishnoi.Haba pynpaw ïa ka jingisaitmet jong u dang dei ka kam kaba jwat bha ha Meghalaya, u DGP u la ong, “kane ka dei na ka daw ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka ïajan bha bad ka Golden Triangle. Mynshwa, ka dei ka lynti ïaid, hynrei mynta ka ka long ka pdeng khaii.”U la ong ba ka jingdon jong ki nongdih drok ha ka jylla ka la nang kiew bad kane ka la pynsngewkhia bha ïa kiba bun.“Ban ïakhun ïa kane ka jingisaitmet, ka tnat Pulit ka la wanrah da ki buit treikam kum ka jingpynshai paidbah khamtam eh hapdeng ki samla da kaba pynlong ïa ki jingpynshai paidbah ha ki skul, ki University bad ka jingïai thwet ïa ki nongkhaii drok ruh ka dang bteng,” la ong u Bishnoi bad bynrap ba ki nongkhaii drok ki dei kiba kiba ïai mlien bad bun na ki kynhun Gang na kiwei ki jylla ki don bynta lang ha kaba ki Pulit ka Meghalaya ki la ïakhun ban pynduhjait ïa ki.Shuh shuh u DGP u la ong, “ngi la pyndonkam ruh da ki technology ban kem ïa ki nongkhaii drok bad ka tnat CID ka la trei shitom ban pyndonkam da ka technology ban wad ïa ka jingdonkti jong ki nongkhaii drok. Ngi ju ïasam jingtip ruh bad ki jylla ba marjan khnang ban khanglad.”“Nalor kata, ngi la plie ïa ki Counselling Cells ban ïarap ïa ki lanot dih drok da kaba khot lang ïa ki bahaing hasem. U Myntri Rangbah u dei uba la ai mynsiem bha ban pyllait luid ïa ka Meghalaya na u drok bad ngin dang ïai bteng ban trei shtiom da kaba pyndonkam ïa ka social media,” u la bynrap.Ha kine ki ar snem ba la leit noh, haduh 28,000 bilor ka dawai jyrhoh la kurup ha u snem 2022,  88000 bilor ha u snenm 2023 bad kumba 112 bilor ha u snem 2024.Nalor ka pisa kaba T. 36 lak la ïoh kurup ha u snem 2022, T. 45.6 lak ha u 2023 bad T. 60,000 hajar ha u 2024. Ka jingïoh kuru ïa ki kali ha u 2022 ka long 67tylli, 157 tylli ha u snem 2023 bad 12 tylli ha u snem 2024.
title: 300 KLUR U DROK KURUP KI PULIT HAPOH AR SNEM, SHAH KEM 610 NGUT KI SNAR KHAÏI DROK

content: : Ïa ka met jong u Bah Kynsailin Kharphanbuh ba ju khot ieid Bahïit, uba shong basah ha Lummawbah, Block -3, Upper Shillong, uba la jah naduh ka 1 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por kumba 11:00 baje mynstep la lap na khrum ka jingkieng Umshyrpi ha ka sngi baar da ki paidbah hadien ba ka shnong ka la pynlong ka jingwad ïa une u rangbah naduh ka sngi kaba um shym la wan phai shuh sha la ing.Ki Pulit jong ka Jhalupara Out Post bad ka kynhun State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) ryngkat bad ki bahaing hasem ki la poi sha kane ka jaka ha ka por ba la sei ïa ka met jong u Bah Kynsailin.Haduh mynta, ym pat lah satia ban tip ïa ka daw tynrai halor kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih la une u rangbah u la shah pynïap dusmon.Na ka liang jong ki bahaing hasem ki la kyrpad ïa ki bor ka aiñ ban ym leh shuh ïa ka Post Mortem da kaba pynpaw ba kim don jingsuba eiei ba une u rangbah un shah pynïap.
title: LAP ÏA KA MET U BAH KYNSAILIN KHARPHANBUH NA KHRUM JINGKIENG UMSHYRPI

content: : Uwei u dkhot barim jong ka United Achik Liberation Army (UALA) bad arngut kiwei pat kiba donkti ban pynkhlaiñ biang ïa ka Garo National Liberation Army (GNLA) ba la kheiñ be-aiñ ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit.U Simsang K. Marak uba la 40 snem ka rta na Resubelpara u dei u dkhot barim ka UALA, la ïathuh u Superintendent of Police ka North Garo Hills u Bruno A. Sangma ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi baar “U (Simsang) u dei uba hakhmat eh ha kane ka kam. U dei ruh uba la shah thwet ha ki Pulit  Assam. Ka kashari na Assam ka la pynngat pyrshah ïa u ha ka MPWA bad ngin sa aiti ïa u sha ki Pulit ka Assam hadien ba ngi ladep tohkit ïa u ïa ki kam be-aiñ ha North Garo Hills,” u la ong.Arngut kiwei pat kiba la shah kem  ki dei kiba la ithuh kyrteng kum u T Sangma uba la 40 snem bad u Suresh Sangma 32 snem na Adogre, la ong u SP.Ka jingïohkem ïa kine ki lai ngut ka long hadien ba ki Pulit ka Kharkutta Police Station ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ka ejahar ha ka 24 tarik Rymphang.  Nalor kane, ka la don ruh ka shithi ba la thep ha ka social media ha ka 7 tarik, Rymphang kaba pyntip ïa ka jingpynkhlaiñ biang ïa ka GNLA.“Ngi la kurup ïa ki mobile phone na ka met jong ki, kiba la pyndonkam ha ki kam runar. Ki donkti ban dawa pisa T. 20,000 na uwei u lanot ha North Garo Hills,” la ïathuh u Sangma.Haba pynpaw ba ki Pulit kin dang kem shuh shuh ïa ki dkhot ha ki sngi ban sa wan, u SP u la ïathuh ba ki dang don sa kuimba 7-8 ngut ki dkhot ha kane ka kynhun bad ïa ngi ruh ngin ym pyllait suk hynrei ngin thwet tyngeh haduh ban da ïohkem.”Haba kylli, u Sangma u ong, “bun na ki tiar siat ba la buhrieh da ka GNLA la ïoh kurup ha Williamnagar.  Ïa mynta, ngim shym la ïoh kurup ïa ki tiar siat na ki,” u la bynrap.
title: SHAH KEM LAI NGUT KI DKHOT KA GNLA (R), THWET KI PULIT ïa KI DKHOT BA PHETRIEH

content: Ka Deputy Inspector General of Police (TAP) Kong Claudia Lyngwa ha ka sngi Baar ka la ong ba ka jingkhang ka dang plie na ka bynta ka jngïakren ïasuk ka Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC).Ka la ong ruh ba ki Pulit ki la lap sabut na ka Mobile Phone jong u dkhot ka HNLC ba la shah kem u Bah Storgy Lyngdoh ba u donkti ban dawa pisa na kiba bun ki briew.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka Kong Lyngwa ka la ong ba u Bah Storgy Lyngdoh uba la don bynta ha kynhun ïakren ïasuk jong ka HNLC u la shu rung tuh sha ka jylla Meghalaya na Bangladesh bad ula shah kem ha ki Pulit ka East Khasi Hills.“Kam don kano kano na ka liang jong ngi ba kane ka jingïakren ïasuk kam dei ban shu kut noh, ka dang dei ban ïai bteng bad ka jingkhang ka dang plie,” ka la ong.Haba kylli shaphang ki khubor kiba kam ba u Bah Storgy u la wan sha Meghalaya ban pyndem wait, ka DIG ka la ong, “u briew uba la leit phai sha Bangladesh ka pynpaw shai ba lada u kwah ban pyndem wait, u la dei ban sah ha Shillong katba ka HNLC ka dang ïakren bad ka Sorkar bad katkum ka jingïohi jong ngi, ka jingleit phai biang jong u sha ka ri Bangladesh bad wan phai biang na ka Bangladesh, kaei kaba pynpaw, nga ieh ha phi ban sngewthuh ïa kane.”Ka la ong, “kam don kano kano ka shithi dawa pisa ba u la phah sha ki briew na ka mobile phone jong u, hynrei ki don bun tylli ki mobile number kiba la peit bad ki dei kiba la dawa pisa na kiba bun ki briew.”Haba pynpaw ba ka jingtohkit kan dang ïai bteng, ka Kong Lyngwa ka la ong, “ka jingïakren ïasuk kan dang ïaid bad lada kino kino ki donkti ha ki kam be-aiñ khlempep ngin hap ban pynshitom ïa ki katkum ka aiñ.”Shuh shuh ka DIG ka la ïathuh ba katkum ka jingïoh jingtip ka HNLC mynta ka don sa tang 20-30 ngut ki dkhot.  “Hynrei, ngim lah ban ong ki tiar kiba kumno ki don hynrei kiba ngi tip ki don tang khyndiat tylli ki tiar siat,” ka la ong.Bun na ki briew kiba la ïohpdiang ïa ki shithi dawa pisa kim shym la ujor sha ki Pulit.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyrshang ban ïoh jingshaniah na ki paidbah ka Kong Lyngwa ka la ong, “ka kamram jong ngi ka long ban peitngor bad kano kano ka jingtip ba ngi ïohlum ngi pyndep mardor khnang ban ïoh ïa ka jingshaniah ki paidbah. Naduh ka por ba ka HNLC ka la mih ha Meghalaya, ki Pulit ki la trei shitom khlem shongthait. Ki Pulit ki la len ïa la ka jingim ha kane ka jingïakhun bad kumba ka long mynta nga ngeit ba phi ïohi ïa ka jingwan ki nongjngohkai pyrthei ka la kylla bha namarba ki Pulit ki la trei la ka jong ka kamram bad ki la len ruh la ka jong ka jingim.  Kane ka pynïoh jingshaniah na ki paidbah jong ngi.Ha kajuh ka por, ka DIG ka la maham ïa ki paidbah kiba noh synñiang ne kiba kyrshan pisa ïa ka HNLC ba shisien ka sngi kin ym lait satia na ki kynjri jong ka aiñ.
title: NA KA MOBILE PHONE U STORGY LAP SABUT KI PULIT BA DONKTI BAN DAWA PISA

content: a Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) lyngba ka Employment Monitoring Cell ka la phah dorkhas sha ka Meghalaya Public Service Commission (MPSC) halor ki katto katne ki jingujor ba la ioh na ki samla thep kam ha ki post bapher bapher bad katto katne ki mat ban pynbha bad pynwandur halor ka thung kam thung jam.Ha kaba iadei bad ka post Junior Divisional Accountant (JDA) hapoh ka Directorate of Account & Treasuries, Meghalaya katkum ka jingpynlait Advertisement,  ki don 69 tylli ki post kiba lait, hynrei ha ka por ba la mih ia ka result la iohi ba don tang 34 ngut. Halor kane, ka MPSC ka la pynshai ba la don tang 34 ngut kiba pas ia kane ka eksamin bad la khot interview tang ia kine 34 ngut. Haba kylli halor ka jingbym pas ki samla, u Secretary ka MPSC u la pynshai ba lehse ka dei ka pass mark ba heh ba la buh da ka Directorate of Account & Treasuries kaba pynlong ba ki samla kim shym lah ban pas namar haba ianujor bad kiwei kiwei ki tnad Sorkar ki buh ia ka Qualifying Marks tang 33 marks bad kiba wan shakhmat kin shah jied. Halor kane ka bynta ka Seng kan ia kynduh bad ka Directorate ban pynsngew ia kine ki jingeh jong ki samla.Halor ka kam Typist (Ordinary Grade) ha Meghalaya (Civil) Secretariat & Heads of Department ia kane ka kam la pynlait Advertisement ha u snem 2016 na bynta 36 tylli ki post hynrei haduh mynta ka dang sahteng wat hadien ba ladep pynlong ia ka eksamin bad Typing Test. Ka MPSC ka la pynshai ba ka la long kaba la khreh halor kane kam bad ban pynlait noh ki result hynrei ka dang ap tang ia ka Roster ba ka SAD Department kin phah. Ka Seng ka pynrem ia ka SAD Department ka bym shym la lah ban phah ia ka Roster haduh mynta bad pynsahteng ia kane ka kam. Ha kine ki sngi, ka Seng kan leit ujor sha ka tnad ba dei peit ban phah noh ka Roster bad ki samla ki ym shu ap sah.Halor ka jingsuki ka thungkam thungjam ba la pyniaid da ka MPSC na ka por sha ka por, ka Seng ka ju lap ba ki samla thepkam ki hap ban ap haduh 4-5 snem ba ka jingpynrung kan dep. Kane ka pynduhnong shibun ia ki samla kiba ap kam namar ka rta ruh ka nang iaid bad na ka liang ki samla kiba pas manla u snem ruh ki shu ap khlem don kano kano ka lad ban thep kam. Ka Seng ka la ai jingmut ba ia kino kino ki kam kiba pynbna paidbah (advertised) dei ban pyndep noh hapoh 1 snem na ka tarik ba la pynbna ia ka jinglait kam.Ka Seng ka la dawa ruh ba na ka bynta ki Grade ne Group B, C bad D dei ban pynduh noh ia ka Personal Interview. Ka Seng ka ju ioh ia ka jingujor manla ka por ba ka don ka jingbamsap ha ka thung kam thung jam bad ka jingleh shiliang ha ka por Personal Interview. Ka Seng ka sngewba kam don jingmyntoi ban don ia ka Personal Interview na bynta kine ki Grade ne Group. Wat ha ki kam Sorkar Pdeng (Central Government jobs) ia ka Personal Interview lah pynduh noh bad kiwei kiwei ki jylla ruh ki la bud ia kata, hynrei balei ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya haduh mynta ka dang leh ka Personal Interview halor kine ki post ne grade bad dei ban weng noh bad ka thung kam thung jam kan long kaba khuid.Ha kaba iadei bad ka Personal Interview na ka bynta ki Grade ne Group A, ka Seng naduh ki snem ba ladep ka la buh ia ka jingdawa ba ka Personal Interview ka dei ban long ha ki jingdon ki Camera ban lait na ka jinglehtuh jingleh shukor kumba la ju iohsngew na ki por sha ki por. Ka Seng ka pynsngew biang ka thungkam ka thungjam hapoh ka jylla ka dei ban long kaba khuid khnang ba ka jylla baroh kawei hi kan kiew.Halor kine ki mat, ka MPSC ka la pynshai ba ka shong ha ka mon jong ka Sorkar ban leh ia kine kiei kiei baroh bad na ka liang ka MPSC kam don kano kano ka jingpyrshah. Ka Seng ha kine ki khyndiat sngi kan sa buh ia ka jingdawa hakhmat ba Sorkar ban pynurlong noh ia ka jingdawa ka Seng.
title: TYRWA KA KSU ÏA KA MPSC BAN PYNDUH NOH ÏA KA PERSONAL INTERVIEW HA KA GRADE B,C,D

content: Ka tnat elekshon bad ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Balang ki la iasoi ia ka soskular iasngewthuh jingmut (Memorandum of Understanding) ban pyntreikam da ka Electoral Literacy Clubs (ELC) khnang ban pynrung kyrteng ia ki samla pule kiba la kynjoh 18 snem ka rta ba kin ioh ia ka Electoral Photo Identity Card (EPIC) shwa ba ka ri India baroh kawei kan leit sha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long shen.Ia ka MoU ba la iasoi da u Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) Jylla u Dr. BDR Tiwari bad u Director ka School Education and Literacy u Swapnil Tembe ka dei kaba la bthah da ka Election Commission of India (ECI) khnang ba ki samla kiba la kynjoh 18 snem ka rta ki dei ban ioh ia ka EPIC khnang ba kin ioh ia ka lad ban jied ia ki nongmihkhmat sha ka Parliament.“Ia kine ki ELC yn sa buh ha ki jaka pule Higher Secondary School bad ha ki College.  Ka jingthmu ban buh ia ki ELC ka dei kaba la slem bad ki dang treikam haduh mynta hynrei ki don pat katto katne ki bym treikam,” ong u Tiwari ha ka jingiakren  bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba iasoi ia ka MoU.U ong ruh hadien ka jingbthah jong ka ECI la pynbha ia ki katto katne ki kyndon jong ka MoU.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ki nonghikai kin dei ki Nodal Officer jong ki ELC. U Swapnil Tembe u la phah ia u kyrwoh sha ki khynnah skul ia ka jingangnud jong ka sorkar ban pynngewthuh ia ka synshar paidbah.“Ka khubor ka don ha ki lynnong kot bad ka dei ruh ka mat ba la kdew ha ka MoU,” u la ong.“Ngi la thaw ia ki Electoral Club mynba nga dang long u Deputy Commissioner saw snem kynthih bad nga dang kynmaw kyndiang haba ngi la thaw ia ki ELC ha ki District Level. Mynta, hadien ka jingiasoi ia ka MoU ngin pynthikna ban sa peitngor bha ia ka jingtreikam jong ki ynda la thaw ha ki Secondary School,” u la bynrap.“Kawei ka mat ba kongsan kaba la kdew ha ka MoU ka long ba ki khynnah skul kiba la kynjoh 18 snem ka rta ki dei ban don ia ka EPIC namarba nga kynmaw ba bun ki khynnah kiba la kynjoh 18 bad 19 snem ki dei ki bym pat don satia ia ka EPIC,” la ong shuh shuh u Tembe.
title: BUN KI SAMLA BYM PAT ÏOH EPIC, DA KA ELC THAW KA TNAT ELECTION HA KI SKUL BAD KOLEJ

content: : Hadien ka jingïoh jingtip kaba tikna halor ka jingdon ki briew kiba kit ïa u drok, ki Pulit ka ANTF East Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka sngi Baar ki la pynlong ïa ka jingpynap shrim ha surokbah National Highway ha Lumshnong bad ioh bat ïa kawei ka kali Maruti Suzuki Baleno kaba don u number AS-11-S-3488 ba la ñiah da u Ajamal Husen kaba dang wan na ki thaiñ Silchar, Assam.  Ha ka jingkhynra ki Pulit ki la lap hynñiew tylli ki synduk thep sabon barit kiba la thep da u drok.Hadien ba la dep tes la pynshisha ia u drok uba don ka jingkhia kaba 77 gram.Ki Pulit ki la kem noh ïa u nongñiah ïa ka kali u Ajamal Husen bad la kurup noh ïa u drok, ïa ka kali, kawei ka mobile phone, ka EPIC, ka Driving License, Pancard  bad Aadhar Card.La register case ruh ha Lumshnong Police Station bad la pynngat hapoh ki kyndon jong ka NDPS Act bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: KURUP DROK KI PULIT EJH, SHAH KEM U NONGNIAH KALI

content: : Ka tnat District Council Affairs (DCA) jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Balang ka la thaw da ka Komiti hadien ba ki Autonomous District Council (ADC) ki la ai jingmut sha ka Sorkar ban pyntreikam ia ka Meghalaya Building Bye Laws sha ki shnong nongkyndong jong ka Jylla.Kane ka jingai jingmut jong ki ADC ka long hadien ba u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bah Prestone Tynsong uba khmih ia ka tnat District Council Affairs u la khot da ka jingialang ia ki Autonomous District Council, ia ki ophisar ka tnat DCA bad ka tnat Revenue ban iathir iatai halor ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Meghalaya Buidling Bye Law da ka Meghalaya Urban Development Authority (MUDA) hapoh ki jaka kiba hap hapoh ka jingkhmih jong ka Municipal bad ki Autonomous District Council (ADC) ha ki Sheduled Area.Hapoh kane ka Komit ka ban khlieh da ka Secretary jong ka tnat Urban Affairs ka Kong Renette C. Sohkhlet yn sa kynthup lang ia ki dkhot jong ki lai tylli ki Autonomous District Council (ADC) bad ki tnat treikam bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar Jylla.U Symbud Myntri Rangbah Bah Prestone Tynsong haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang, u la ong, “ha u snem 2019, ngi dang ai shuh shuh ki Notification 2021 ba ngi la aiti ban pyntreikam ia ka Building Bye laws lyngba ka MUDA bad ki ADC.  La shaniah ha ka MUDA ban ai jingbit na ka bynta ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Building Bye Laws hapoh u pud u sam ka Municipal na ka bynta ki jingshna ia ki ophis, ki Hotel, ki Hospital bad kiwei kiwei ki jingtei kiba heh katba ia ki jaka kiba don shabar jong ka Munipal la aiti beit ha ki Autonomous District Council.”U la iathuh ba ka jingai jingmut jong ki Autonomous District Council ban pyntreikam ia ka Building Bye Laws sha ki shnong nongkyndong ka long namarba ka Jylla Meghalaya ka dei la lynti iaid jong u jumai bad ba la donkam ban don da ka aiñ ba pyrkhing ban tehlakam ia ka jingshna iing bad kino kino ki jingtei kiba heh.Shuh shuh u Myntri Rangbah u la iathuh ba ka jingialang ka la rai ban thaw ruh da ka Komiti ka ban khlieh da u Secretary jong ka District Council Affairs (DCA) Bah Cyril V. Diengdoh ka ban kynthup lang ia ki nongmihkhmat na ki ADC, na ka tnat Law, Revenue bad RTS khnang ban bishar bniah ia ka Indian Registration Act shwa ban pyntreikam hapoh kane ka jylla.“Ka jingrejister ia ki jaka ka dei kaba ngi hap ban bud ryntih katkum ka Indian Registration Act. Haba ngi bud ia kane ka Aiñ, ki don katto katne ki jingeh haba ki paidbah ki leit sha ki District Council ban pan ia ka Land Holding Certificate ne ka NoC ne kino kino ki dulir haba ki kwah ban pan ram na ki Bank hynrei haba ki leit rah ia kine ki dulir ba la ai da ki Autonomous District Council ki Bank kim pdiang satia.  Sa shisien ngi la iakren sani bad ngi la rai ban thaw ia ka Komiti ban khmih bniah biang ia ka Indian Registration Act, khnang ba ki kot ki sla ba la ai da ki Autonomous District Council dei ban ai jingithuh da kino ki shnat treikam bad ki Bank,” ong shuh shuh u Symbud Myntri Rangbah.
title: TYRWA KI ADC BAN PYNTREIKAM ÏA KA BUILDING BYE LAW SHA KI NONGKYNDONG, THAW KOMITI KA SORKAR

content: Ka tnat Social Welfare jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pan jaka na ki Dorbar Shnong kiba don ha kylleng ka jylla khnang ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan dup lah ban tei ia ki Rehabilitation Centre ban ai jingsumar ia ki samla kiba la shah teh mraw ha u drok.U Myntri uba khmih ia ka tnat Social Welfare Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang u la ong, ki Rehabilitation Centre kiba la peit hi da ka Sorkar ia mynta ki don hynriew tylli bad ki don ruh ki Foundation ba la pyniaid da ki kynhun shimet kiba la kyrshan jingiarap pisa da ka tnat Social Welfare.U la iathuh ruh ba ka tnat Social Welfare da ka jingiatreilang bad ka Mawlai Town Dorbar (MTD) kan sa tei ia ka Rehabilitation Centre ha ka shnong Mawlai ban ai jingsumar ia ki samla kiba la kut jingmut ban bthat noh ia u kynjri ba ki la shah teh mraw ha u drok.“Ngi kyntu ruh ia kiwei kiwei ki Dorbar Shnong ba kin sngewthuh ia kane ka jingeh da kaba ki ai jaka ne ai khyndew khnang ba ngin dup lah ban shna noh ia ki Rehabilitation Centre,” ong u Bah Paul.“Ha kaba iadei bad ka sohkhliang kaba kiba bun ki ong ba kam bit ban shna ia ki Rehabilitation Centre hapoh ki shnong ki thaw, hynrei ki Dorbar Shnong ki dei ban sngewthuh pat ba kine ki jingeh, kim jia tang hapoh ki san ne hynriew tylli ki shnong hynrei ka dei kaba la saphriang ha baroh kawei ka jylla.  Ngi donkam bha ia ki Dorbar Shnong ban ai jingkyrshan ia ka Sorkar bad ngin dup lah ban ai jingiarap ia ki samla kiba la ngop ha u drok,” la ong u Myntrt ka tnat Social Welfare.
title: BA JUR KIBA NGOP HA U DROK PAN JAKA KA SORKAR NA KI SHNONG BAN SHNA REHAB CENTRE

content: : Ka President jong ka ri India ka Droupadi Murmu ha ka sngi balang ka la pynkup burom da ka khusnam Sangeet Natak Akademi Awards (Akademi Puraskar) na ka bynta u snem 2022 bad 2023 sha ki 91 ngut ki riewpawkhmat kiba la paw pyrthei bha ha ka liang ka lariti ha ka jingialang pynkup burom kaba la long ha Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi.Na kane ka jylla Meghalaya, i Kong Helen Giri i la ioh pdiang ia ka khusnam Sangeet Natak Akademi na ka bynta u snem 2023 halor u synñiang u bynbei ba i la noh sha u sup u thiar jong ka put ka tem tynrai ha Meghalaya.La kha ia i Kong Helen Giri ha ka 7 tarik Rymphang, 1944, bad i dei ka longkmie kaba la trei shitom khlem shongthait ban kyntiew bad ban pynneh pynsah ia ka shad Khasi.  Kum kawei na ki nongrwai bapawkhmat jong ka All India Radio, Shillong, i Kong Helen Giri i la trei shitom ruh ban pynpawnam ia ki tiar tem tiar put u Khasi ha ka rynsan jong ka ri.  Kum ka nongrwai ha kylleng ki bynta ka ri India bad shabar ka ri India, i Kong Helen Giri i la ioh bha ia ka jingithuh na kylleng.I Kong Helen Giri ym tang ba i ju iashim bynta ha kiba bun ki prokram bad ki tamasa, hynrei i ju pynlong ruh ia ki tamasa ban pynpawnam ia ki jingrwai bad ki jingshad tynrai ha Meghalaya.  Lyngba kane ka jingtrei shitom, i la pynkhie im ia ka lariti bad ka kolshor, khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka riti ka dustur Khasi.  Shuh shuh, i la shimkhia ban ithuh ia ki Master Craftsmen kiba ju shna ia ki tiar tem tiar put Khasi.  Kane ka jingthrang jong i, ym tang kaba pynneh pynsah ia ka jingtrei bani jong ki nongshna tiar tem hynrei ka long ruh kum ka lad aikam ia ki briew kiba ju shna ia kine ki tiar.I Kong Helen Giri i dei iba la ioh pdiang ia ka khusnam Padma Shri halor ka jingnoh synñiang sha ka lariti bad ka kolshor jong ka Meghalaya ha u snem 2008.Ha ka jingsam ia kane ka khusnam la sakhi lang da u Myntri uba khmih ia ka tnat Culture, Tourism bad DoNER u G. Kishan Reddy, u Myntri Khynnah ka tnat Law & Justice (Independent Charge) bad Parliamentary Affairs and Culture u Arjun Ram Meghwal, u Secretary ka Ministry of Culture u Govind Mohan, u Chairman jong ka Sangeet Natak Akademi u Dr. Sandhya Purecha bad kiwei kiwei.
title: ÏOH KHUSNAM SANGEET NATAK ACADEMY I KONG HELEN GIRI NA KA PRESIDENT KA RI

content: Shillong, Lber, 7: Ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) ha ka sngi Palei ka la ot noh ia ka bording na ki longing kiba shong basah be-aiñ ha Maxwelton Estate hadien ka jingujor jong ka KSU Laban Circle ha ka sngi Balang ha u Chairman ka MeECL bad ha u Director ka MePDCL.Ka jingujor jong ka KSU ka long ba ki briew kiba sah beaiñ ha Maxwelton Estate ki tuh ia ka bording ilektrik bad dawa ba dei ban phah ot noh mardor.Mardor ka MeECL ka la phah ia ki nongtrei ha ka step sngi Palei ban khmih ia ka jingshisha hadien ba la ioh ujor na ka KSU.Ha ka jingjurip, ka MeECL ka la lap ba ka don shisha ka jingtuh bor ding ilektrik bad la lap ruh ba don ki longiing ba na uwei u meter ki ai bording sha 14 tylli ki iing, don kiwei kiwei pat kiba ai bording sha 4-5 tylli ki iing bad kumta ter ter.Na ka liang jong ka MeECL ka la ot bording lut ia baroh kine ki iing kiba tuh bording bad kin sa ai Notis ruh ia kine ki briew ha kine ki sngi ban shah daiñ kuna.Ka MeECL ka la lap ba ki don 27 tylli ki longiing kiba biang ia u Meter bording (20 postpaid bad 7 prepaid) bad kine ki ai pat sha kumba 50 tylli eiei ki iing (re-sale) kaba long beaiñ. Ka MeECL ka la ot ruh ia bording na kine ki 50 tylli eiei ki iing.Ka Seng ka ai jingiaroh bad ka sngewnguh shibun ia ka jingkitkhiah bad ka jingkloi jong ka tnad MeECL ban hiar jurip ban leh ia kaba donkam.Ka Seng kan sa leit ai dorkhas sa shisien ba kine ki briew ki ym ioh ban aplai ia ka bording khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang bad khlem ioh ia ka NOC na ka Dorbar Shnong bad ha kajuh ka por ruh ban pan jingpynshai ba kumne kine kiwei ki 27 tylli ki iing ki ioh ilektrik bording bad ki kot ki sla kaba kumno ki ai ban ioh, khamtam ia kiba leh prepaid connection kiba dang shu aplai dang shen.Lyngba une u kyrwoh, ka Seng ka kyntu ruh ia ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ban weng noh ia ki masi na kane ka jaka katkum ki kyndon aiñ kumba la kular hakhmat ka Deputy Commissoner ha 29 tarik u Rymphang, 2024. Lada ka SMB ka pynslem ka Seng kan pynlong da ka jingiakhih ha khmat Ophis jong ka SMB.
title: HAPOH 24 KYNTA, OT KA MeECL ÏA KA BORDING TANG SHU IOH JINGUJOR NA KA KSU

content: Ki jaidbynriew Garo kiba la im bad kiba la shong la sah ha ki 54 tylli ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Raid Marwet jong ka Hima Mylliem ha ka sngi Palei ki la ki la pan jingïarap na ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan tuklar lem hadien ba kawei ka kynhun sengbhalang ka la pyrshah ïa ka jingai Sanad long Rangbah Shnong sha ki jaidbynriew Garo kiba sah hapoh kane ka Raid kaba hap ruh hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Khasi Hills Autnomous District Council.U Adviser jong ka All Ribhoi Garo Headman Association (ARGHA) u Nickel R. Marak bad ka Serimina Marak ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ki la ïathuh ba ki la pynsngew ha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma halor kane ka jingpyrshah ban long Rangbah Shnong da ki Garo ha ki shnong ba la buhai shnong ki Garo ha Raid Marwet.Ki la ïathuh ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u la phah ïa ki ban leit ïakynduh ïa u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autnomous District Council (KHADC) ban pan jingpynshai halor kane, la, ki Garo kiba dei ki trai shnong hapoh kane ka Jylla Meghalaya ki don hok neem ban ïoh ïa ka Sanad ban long Rangbah Shnong ha ki shnong jong ka Raid Marwet ba la sah tang da ki jaidbynriew Garo.“Bun ki Garo kiba sah ha ki shnong hapoh ka Raid Marwet ngi la sah naduh ka por Phareng.  Mynshwa ki don tang ki Garo ym don satia ki Khasi bad mynshwa la ïathuh ïa ki Rangbah Shnong Garo hynrei ka don kawei ka kynhun sengbhalang kaba pyrshah ban ai Sanad.  Ngi dei ki trai shnong jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ngi la sah ha Raid Marwet naduh u snem 1905,” la ong u Nickel R. Marak.“Mynshwa ki ailad ba ngin pyndonnkam ïa ki muhor Rangbah Shnong hynrei ka don kawei ka sengbhalang kaba pyrshah, katba kiwei kiwei ki sengbhalang kim pyrshah satia haba ngi la ïakren bad ki halor kane,” ong u Nickel.U la ïathuh ba kane ka kynhun kan sa leit ban ïakynduh ïa u CEM ka KHADC ha ka taïew ban sa wan khnang ban ïoh jingpynshai halor kane ka mat,” u la ongU la ïathuh ruh ba kum ka kynhun ki la pan jingïarap na u MLA bad na u MDC ba kin kren lem halor kane ka kam bad ka District Council.
title: PAN JINGÏARAP KI GARO NA U CM BA MIH KA JINGDAWA BAN PYNDUH RANGBAH SHNONG

content: Uwei u rangbah briew na ka Jylla Assam u la ïap hapoh kawei ka kamra sah ha Hotel ha Shillong ha ka sngi Palei.U SP ka East Khasi Hills Rituraj Ravi u la ïathuh ba ki nongtrei ka Hotel Assembly kaba don ha Police Bazar ki la pyntip ba uwei na kiba sah basa um shym la mih satia napoh ka kamra bad mardor ki Pulit ka Sadar Police Station, ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong ki nongsakhi ki pynpait ïa ka jingkhang.Ïa ka met jong une uba ïap la ithuh kyrteng kum u Sijo Joseph uba la 47 snem ka rta uba dei na ka shnong Beltola Road, Guwahati.U SP u la ïathuh ba la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bad la lap ba ka dei na ka daw ba u Sijo u la dih shaba pud ïa ki dawai kuli.“Kam don kano kano ka dak ba pynsuba sniew.  Ïa ka met la phah leh post mortem. Ngi la pyntip ruh sha ki bahaing bad ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia ka dang ïaid shakhmat,” u la ong.
title: ÏAP U RANGBAH NA ASSAM HA HOTEL ASSEMBLY

content: : Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO) ha ka sngi Palei ka la pan jingpynshai na u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla uba khmih ïa ka tnat Soil and Water Conservation u Macruise N. Marak halor ka jingïoh ujor jong ka seng ba ki ophisar bad ki nongtrei ka tnat Soil and Water Conservation ki pyntrei hi ïa ki projek ne ki skhim bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla kum ka IWMP, ka AIBP, RKVY bad ka Nabard Loan.U President ka HITO Bah Donbok Dkhar ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba lyngba ki projek bad ki skhim kane ka tnat ka ju shna ïa ki Dam, ki nala ring um, ki kynroh, ki jingkieng ba long ban ïaid kjat bad ki jaka pynlang um, ki pung um bad kiwei kiwei.U ong ba la lap ba ïa kine ki kam la pyntrei hi da ki Ophisar bad ki nongtrei jong kane hi ka tnat treikam khlem da khot Tender ban ai ïa ki jingtrei sha ki Contractor ne  ki Supplier kumba la leh da kiwei kiwei ki tnat treikam jong ka Sorkar.“Ngi la ïoh pdiang bun tylli ki jingkyrpad na ki samla kiba la nang la stad ki bym donkam donkam kiba shu trei malu mala ïa ki kam Kontraktor halor ka jingpyntrei hi da ki ophisar bad ki nongtrei ka tnat Soil and Conservation,” ula ong bad bynrap, “kumno ka Sorkar ka shah ïa ka tnat Soil and Conservation ban aikam ïa la ki jong ki ophisar bad ki nongtrei watla kam don ka Engineering Wing ha ka tnat kynthup ka jingsuplai ïa ki mar bad leh kiar na ki Registered Contractors ne Supplier bad na ki nongtrei ba la tbit kumba la leh ha kiwei kiwei ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar.”“Ngi sngewthuh ba ki ophisar bad ki nongtrei jong ka tnat Soil and Water Conservation ki don bynta ban suplai bad ban jied nongtrei bylla ha la ka mon khlem da khot Tender ha ka rukom kaba dei khnang ban ailad ïa ki samla kiba la nang la stad ki bym donkam donjam.  La pyntip ruh sha ngi ba bun na ki nongbylla la wanrah ruh na shabar ki shnong ba la pyntrei ïa ka projek ha kaba la pynduhlad ïa ki nongtrei kiba la tbit jong ka thaiñ kaba long kum ka jingpynduh ïa ka kamai jakpoh,” la ong une u nongïalam ka HITO.
title: KYNNOH KA HITO BA TREI HI KI OPHISAR BAD NONGTREI ÏA KI PROJEK KA SOIL & WATER CONSERVATION

content: : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la aiti ïa ki shithi thungkam sha ki 425 ngut ki doktor ba dang shu rung kam thymmai bakynthup ïa ki Junior Specialist, ki Medical Officer bad ki Dental Surgeon kiba shakri ha ki jaka ai jingsumar bapher bapher ka Jylla.Ïa ki shithi thungkam la aiti ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha State Convention Centre, Shillong ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh bad u Myntri ka tnat PHE u Marcuise N. Marak.Haba ai khublei ïa kine ki doktor, u Myntri Rangbah u la kyntu ïa ki ban long kiba trei shitom ïa ka kam khnang ba kin dup lah ban ai ïa ka jingshakri bapaka ïa ka imlang ka sahlang.“Ïa ka jingthungkam la pynlong da ka Sorkar ha ka lynti kaba khuid. Phi don hangne namarba phi long kiba tbit bad phi la leh bha ïa ka eksamin,” u la ong.U Myntri Rangbah haba pynshai ïa ki jingeh halor ka jingthungkam ha ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar u la ong, “ngi la pynïakhlad ïa ka jingpynrungkam da kaba thaw ïa ka Board na ka bynta ka pule puthi bad ka koit ka khiah, kaba la pynsuk ban treikam. Ha ki snem baladep, ka jingthungkam ka long kaba suki bad ki don ki khep, ka shimpor wat haduh hynriew snem. Ka rai ban thaw la ka jong ka Recruitment Board na ka bynta ka pule puthi bad ka koit ka khiah ka long ban pynstet ïa ka jingthungkam bad ban pyndap kham kloi ïa ki kam ba thylli.”Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkhlaiñ ïa ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah, u Sangma u la ong, ha kaba ïadei bad ka Percentage, la buh hakhmat eh ïa ka Koit ka Khiah kaba long 8 percent na ka mang tyngka jong ka Sorkar. “Ka mang tyngka na ka bynta ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka dei kaba heh tam ha ka ri, namarba ngi angnud ban pynkhlaiñ bad ban pynthymmai ïa ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah,” u la bynrap.“Ki don ruh ki jingtynjuh kiba ap ïa ngi hakhmat, hynrei ngi hap ban ïakhun la ka long ha kano kano ka dur, ngin ïai bteng ban pynjanai ïa ka koit ka khiah ha ka jylla,” u la ong shuh shuh.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba la tei ïa ki Administrative Housing Unit ha kylleng ka jylla na ka bynta ki nongtrei jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah bad kiwei kiwei.  Ka jingshna ïa ki jaka treikam wat sha ki jaka ba kyndong tam jong ka jyllaka long ba ki nongtrei Sorkar kin dup lah ban ai jingshakri lang kumjuh.  “Ka Sorkar ka la shna da ka Complex ban pynsah lang ïa ki doktor, engineer, bad kiwei kiwei ki nongtrei sorkar hapoh kajuh ka tnum ing, u la ong.U Sangma u la ïathuh nalor ki District Headquarter ban sa shna ïa ki Administrative Housing Complex, yn sa shna ruh ïa kine ki ing sha ki jaka ba kyndong na ka bynta ki doktor, ki nurse bad kiwei kiwei ki nongtrei jong ka Sorkar.“Ngin ym lah ban shu pyntreikam noh mynta mynta ha baroh kawei ka jylla hynrei ka sorkar ka la kut jingmut ban sdang tei noh shen ïa ka Housing Complexe,” la ïathuh u Sanmga.U la pyntip ruh ba ha ki khyndiat snem ban sa wan, yn sa shna pynbha ïa ki PHC bad CHC kynthup ruh ïa ki Hospital.U la ïathuh ba ha ki khyndiat taïew ban sa wan, yn sa plie paidbah ïa ka Patient Management System ha ka jylla khnang ban peitngor ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ki nongpang kiba shah sumar ha ki jaka sumar bapher bapher ka jylla.“Ngi la leh ïa ka pilot project ha Ribhoi district bad ïa kane ngin sa leh ruh sha kiwei ki jylla,” la bynrap u Sangma.
title: 425 TYLLI KI SHITHI THUNGKAM AITI U MYNTRI RANGBAH KA JYLLA SHA KI DOKTOR

content: : U General Secretary ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ha ka sngi Balang u la plie paidbah ia ka Maitshaphrang Fitness Centre hapoh ka shnong Mawïongrim ia kaba la pynbit pynbiang da ka KSU Mawïongrim Unit.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, une u nongialam ka seng u la pynskhem ruh ia ki nongkitkam ba thymmai jong ka KSU Mawïongrim Unit na ka bynta ka samoi treikam jong u snem 2024-2027Ha ka jingplie ia kane ka jaka kilan met la sakhi lang u Vice President samla Biangbor L.Paliar, u Sports Secretary samla Eric Nongkynrih, u Assistant secretary ka Mawlai Circle u samla Donboklang Sawkmie, Assistant Finance Secretary samla Robert khongsit bad kiwei kiwei.Haba ai jingkren sha ki nongkitkam bathymmai jong ka shnat treikam ka KSU Mawiongim Unit u Samla Donald Thabah u la kren shaphang ka jingiohrung ki mynder lyngba ka shongkha shongman bad ka jingleh Benami ki trai ri trai muluk kaba pyniohlad ban buhai shnong bad ban khaii laitluid ha kane ka jylla.U la banjur ruh ia ka jingkynrei stet u drok ha manla ki kyndong kynshrot ha ki jaka ba don tang para Khasi bad ka lah ban dei ka jingleh jongno re kiba kwah ban pynngop ia ki samla Khasi ha une u jingdih ba shyrkhei khnang ba ki samla Khasi kin troiñ ha baroh ki liang.U la kyntu ruh ia ka Mawïongrim Unit ba ki dei ban peitngor bha ia ka iaid ka ieng ki mynder kiba ju iaid manla ka khyllipmat na ka surokbah kiba ym lah ban tip ioh ki dei kiba wan leh ki kam sniew laiphew jait ban pynsniew dur ia ka imlang ka sahlang ha kane ka Jylla.
title: PLIE KA KSU ÏA KA MAITSHAPHRANG GYM FITNESS CENTRE HA MAWLAI MAWNONGRIM

content: : Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit ha ka sngi Balang ka la pan jingshai na u Deputy commissioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District u Abhilash Baranwal uba dei u Chairman jong ka District AYUSH Society halor ka jingbym pyllait ia ki katto katne tylli ki posts kiba kynthup naduh ki post Ward Boy, Ward Girl, Sweepers, Cook, Chowkidar, Jamandar, Peon bad kiwei kiwei kiba la pynmih Aadvertisement da ka ophis DM&HO ha ka 15 tarik Rymphang 2024.Ka seng ka la pan jingshai bad la buh jingkylli hato kum kine ki Post yn set noh ne yn sa khot pat da kawei ka Advertisement.“Ka seng ka suba ba ka don ruh ka shithi na u Commissioner ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla ba la btah ia ki Deputy commissioner kiba long ruh ki Chairman jong ki District AYUSH Society ba kin leh ia kaba donkam ban pynbeit halor ka jingthepkam bad ia ka Notification ne Circular ym shym la pynmih paidbah ban ai jingpynshai halor katno tylli ki Posts lah bthah ban pyntip paidbah,” la ong ka seng.Halor kane ka jingpan jingshai, u Deputy commissioner u la ong ba un hap ban ia phylliew jingmut shwa bad u DMHO ka East Jaiñtia Hills District uba dei ruh u Member Secretary jong ka Society shwa ban shim ia kan kano ka rai.Ka seng kan buddien halor kane ka jingkhot thepkam khnang ba kan long kaba khuid khlem da don kano kano ka leh shilliang ha baroh ki Posts.
title: SUBA KA KSU BA SET KA SORKAR KATTO KATNE TYLLI KI POST HA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la pyllait paidbah ïa ka “Climate Adaptive Community Based Water Harvesting Project” ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha State Convention Centre, Shillong ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh bad u Myntri ka tnat Soil and Water Conservation u Marcuise N. Marak.Kane ka projek kaba T. 21 crore ka long ban shna ïa ki 532 tylli ki jaka pynlang um ha ka jingheh kaba 350 hecrate ka jaka, 2500 hectare kiwei pat ki jaka bad 12500 hectare ki tyllong um.Ka jingpyntreikam ïa kane ka projek kan pynthikna ïa ka jingpahuh jong ka um ha ki shnong ki thaw bad kumjuh ruh ban sam um sha ki lyngkha ki risai.  Kan pynmyntoi ïa ki 72,000 hajar ngut ki nongshong shnong, kynthup ruh ki tyllong um.Haba pynpaw ba ka jingkynshew um jong ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei kaba la ai jingïaroh da ka Ministry of Jal Shakti, ka Sorkar India, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “ka Meghalaya ka dei kaba nyngkong eh ka jylla ha ka ri ban pyntreikam ha kiba bun rukom ban kynshew ïa ka um.  Ka tnat PHE, ka tnat Water Resource bad ka tnat Soil and Water Conservation ki ïatreilang na ka bynta kiba bun ki projek, bad lada kheiñ kyllum lang kan kot kumba T. 8000 klur.”U la ong ba ki don bun tylli ki projek kiba la pyntreikam mynta bad kin dang don shuh shuh sa kiwei pat ki projek ki ban dang wan kiba thmu ban ïada, ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka um bad ïa ki tyllong um.U la ïathuh ba ha ka taïew ban sa wan yn sa buh mawnongrim na ka bynta ka projek sam um kaba heh ha New Shillong Township kaba kot T. 1600 klur.“Ngi la wanrah ïa kane ka projek ha kata ka rukom ba ka Shillong, New Shillong, Administrative bad ka Knowledge City kin ïoh pahuh ïa ka um na ka bynta 30-40 snem,” u la ong.Ka Phase-1 jong kane ka projek ka kynthup ïa ka jingshna ïa ki jaka pynlang um kaba kot T. 600 klur.U la ong ruh ba ha kane ka jingïalang mynta ka sngi, la ithuh ïa ki 36 tylli shnong kiba lah ban shna ïa ki jaka pynlang ïa ka um kaba kot T.7 klur ha kaba ïa ka pisa la pyllait sha kine ki shnong ban pyntreikam noh ïa kane ka projek.
title: 21 KLUR MANG KA SORKAR BAN SHNA 532 TYLLI KI JAKA PYNLANG UM BAD TYLLONG UM

content: : Bun ngut ki samla Khasi ki la mynsaw hadien ba ki la shah bom shah tied ha ka kynhun ki bar jylla kiba don kumba 30 ngut eiei.Kane ka la jia ha Keating Road ha ka step sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka por kumba 11:30 baje mynstep.Napdeng ki samla Khasi kiba shah bom shah tied saw ngut ki don hapoh Civil Hospital Shillong hapdeng ka jingshah sumar.Kine ki samla Khasi ki la ïathuh ba ka daw ka dei na ka jingjia ha ka miet sngi Thohdieng ha kaba ka don ka jingïatynrah Scooty para Khasi hynrei katba ki dang ïakren pynbeit ïa kane ka jingjia, ki bar jylla ha Keating Road ki la mih ban byrngem byrsit ba kim dei ban wan hylla ha shnong jong ki.Ha ka step kaba bud, kine ki samla Khasi ki la leit ban ïakren pynbeit biang ïa ka jingjia kaba jia mynmiet hynrei kumba 30 ngut eiei ki bar jylla ki la mih bad ki la rah da ki dieng ki siej bad kiwei pat ki tiar pynmynsaw ban bom naphang ïa ki.Katkum ka jingïoh jingtip, la ïathuh ba ki bar jylla kiba shong basah ha Keating Road ki la kynnoh ba dei ki samla Khasi kiba sdang nyngkong ban pynmih ïa ka huri hura.Haba ïakren bad uwei na ki, u la ong ba ka la don ka jingïania bad ka jingïashoh ïadat ha ka miet 8 tarik, Lber bad na ka daw ba ka don kawei ka kali kaba khang lynti ïa u para jong u bad kata ka kam kaba mynmiet u la ong ba ka la kut noh kumta hi.Hynrei ha ka step kaba bud pat u la ong ba ki samla Khasi ki ïa wan kumba 30 ne 40 ngut bad ki wad ïa u para jong u bad ha kata ka jingwan jong ki, ki la ong ba ki wan ban kren ïasuk hynrei ki la shoh pynban ïa u para jong u bad mynta u don hapoh Civil Hospital ba u la mynsaw bad dei hangta ba ka sdang mih ka huri hura.Kham hadien ki Pulit ki la wan poi sha kane ka jaka ban tem ïa ka jingïakynad hapdeng kine ki ar liang mamla.Na ka jingwad jingtip, la lap ba uwei na kiba la shah tangon ha ka por mynstep ha ha Keating Road , u dei u dkhot jong ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO).Halor ka jingshah shoh jong une u dkhot bad kumjuh ruh kiwei pat ki samla Khasi, u President ka HITO  Bah Donbok Dkhar u la leit jngoh ïa ki ha Civil hospital Shillong ban peit ïa ka jingmynsaw kaba ki la ngat ha ka jingshah thombor.U la ong ba ka HITO kan ym treh satia ban mudui ejahar namarba kim shaniah shuh ïa ki bor jong ka aiñ namarba la bun tylli ki ejahar ba la ujor hynrei ki ong ba kam poi shano shano ruh.U Bah Donbok u la ong ba mynta ka HITO kan peit aiu ka aiñ kan leh halor kane ka jingjia.
title: MYNSAW BUN NGUT KI SAMLA KHASI BA MIH KA JINGÏAKAJIA BAD KI BAR JYLLA HA KEATING ROAD

content: Ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo People (FKJGP) Central Body ha ka sngi Saitjai] kum shibynta ban pynshlur bad ai mynsiem ïa ka JETS 24×7, kaba dei kawei na ki kynhun kaba nyngkong tam ha ka jylla kaba dang shu ïoh shen ïa ka jingithuh na ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynïaid ïa ka kam kamai thuk thuk ha ka jylla, ka seng ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang pynkup burom ha ophis treikam kaba don ha Mawlai Kyntonmassar, ha kaba la ïa don lang ki nongïalam kiba hakhmat eh jong ka seng bad kumjuh ruh ki dkhot na ka JETS 24×7.Ha ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid da u President ka FKJGP Central Body Bah Dundee Cliff Khongsit u la maitphang ba kum ka seng kaba don ïa ka jing angnud ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot ha ka jylla bad ban pynshlur ïa ki khynnah samla ban ieng ha la ki jong ki kjat khnang ba kum ki trai ri trai muluk kin bat hi ïa u lakam jong ka khaii – pateng, ka dei ka kamram jong ka seng ban shim ïa kane ka sienjam ban pynkup burom kyrpang ïa ka JETS 24×7 kaba la trei minot khlem shongthait tad haduh ba kan da ïohpdiang ïa ka jingithuh na ka Sorkar ban pynïaid ïa ka kam kamai thuk thuk (Two wheelers) ha ka jylla.U Bah Dundee u la ong ruh ba ka long ka jingsarong ïa ka
