jaitbynriew ba ki khun samla ki la kotbor ban don ïa ka mynsiem ïakhun bad kiwei pat ki kompeni kiba wan ban seng kam ha kane ka jylla.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang pynkup burom na ka liang u General Secretary ka FKJGP Central Body Bah Eldie N Lyngdoh, u la ong ba kum ka jaitbynriew ka la dei ban bret noh shaba sep ka sngi ïa ki kyntien phlan duman kiba ong ba ki jaitbynriew jong ngi ki long kum ki tham kiba ïaleh ban tan uwei ïa uwei hynrei kum ka jaitbynriew ngin pyneh rngiew pat da kaba ngin long ki nongkyrshan bad nong aibuit ban kyntiew iwei ïa iwei.Ha kawei pat ka bynta u Senior Vice President jong ka seng u Bah Elton Cliff Warjri u la lyntu ïa ka JETS 24×7 ba kan long kaba peitngor ba ki nongleit jingleit kin ïoh ïa ka jingshngaiñ ha ka leit ka wan bad ha kajuh ka por ruh ban tehlakam na ki nongshim kabu kiba pyrshang ban khñiot dor na ki paidbah.Haba pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkmen bad sngewïoh mynsiem u Managing Director jong ka JETS 24×7 Bah Pynskhemlang W. Uriah u la ai khublei kyrpang ïa ka FKJGP Central Body kaba la ju ai lang ka kti ka mon ka kti kadiang na ka por sha ka por haba kum ka kynhun ka donkam ïa ki jingai jingmut jong ka seng.U la bynrap ruh da kaba ong ba kane ka dei ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ba kum ka kynhun kan ïoh ïa ka jingshah pynkup burom bad kum ka kynhun kan ïai pyrto shijunom bad kan ym klet ïa ka seng FKJGP ha kaba u la ong ruh ba kum ka kynhun hi kan ïaleh ban trei shitom ban pynïar ïa ka rukom treikam ban long kum ka jing plié lad plié lynti ïa ki khun samla jong ka jylla ha ka ïoh kam ïoh jam.
title: PYNKUP BUROM KA FKJGP ÏA KA JETS 24×7 BA PYNSHLUR ÏA KI SAMLA KHASI BAN KAMAI THUK THUK

content: U Arun Goel u la resaiñ noh kum u Election Commissioner jong ka Election Commssision of India (ECI) shwa ba ka Elekshon Lok Sabha kan long sa tang khyndiat bnai mynta u snem.Ka samoi treikam jong u Goel kan kut haduh u snem 2027.  Ïa ka shithi iehnohkam jong u Goel la pdiang da ka President ka ri ka Droupadi Murmu.Ïa kane ka jingiehnohkam jong u Goel ym lah satia ban tip ïa ka daw tynrai.“Katkum ka Clause (1) jong ka Section 11 jong ka The Chief Election Commissioner and other Election Commissioners (Appointment, Conditions of Service and Term of Office) Act, 2023, ka President ka sngewbha ban pdiang ïa ka shithi iehnohkam ba la phah da u Arun Goel,  u Election Commissioner naduh ka 9 tarik, Lber, 2024,” la ong ka Gazette Notification.Shwa  kane, u Anup Pandey u la resaiñ kum u Election Commisisoner ha u Rymphang bad mynta ka kynhun ba lai ngut jong ka Election Commission of India ka don sa tang ïa u Chief Election Commissioner u Rajiv Kumar.U Arun Goel u dei uba la don bynta bha ban pynkhreh ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha bad uba la leit jngoh ruh ïa kiba bun ki jylla hapoh ka ri ban pynkhreh ïa ka elekshon.Da ka jingiehnohkam jong u Goel, ka jingkitkhlieh mynta ban pynïaid ïa ka elekshon ka la hap ha ka tyrpeng jong u Chief Election Commissioner u Rajiv Kumar.U Arun Goel u dei u ophisar IAS barim na ka Punjab Cadre bad u la shimti kum u Election Commissioner ha ka 21 tarik, Naiwieng, 2022. U Goel mynshwa u la shakri kum u Secretary hapoh ka Ministry of Heavy Industry.Ka thymmei khubor ka ïathuh ba ka tarik ban pynbna ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha da ka Election Commission kan long la kumno kumno ha ka taiew ban sa wan.U Arun Goel uba la pyndep ïa ka M. Sc. ha ka Mathematics u la ïoh pdiang ïa ka Chancellors Medal of Excellence na ka bynta  ka jingpas bha First Class First bad thaw rekod ruh ha ki jingpule jong u ha Punjabi University.Da ka jingmynjur jong ka President ïa ka The Chief Election Commissioner and Other Elections Commissioners (Appointment, Conditions of Service and Term of Office) Bill, ka la pynkylla lut ha kaba ïadei bad ka kam ban thung ïa ki Election Commissioners ka ban sa treikam noh mardor.Katkum ka aiñ-rew, ka Committee ba la khlieh da u Myntri Rangbahduh u Narendra Modi, yn sa thaw ban peit bniah halor ka jingthung ïa ki Election Commissioners. Ka Committee ka kynthup ïa u Nongïalam ka Liang Pyrshah ha Lok Sabha bad ki Myntri Sorkar Pdeng ba la thung da u Myntri Rangbahduh.
title: SHWA KA ELEKSHON LOK SABHA, RESAIÑ U ARUN GOEL KUM U ELECTION COMMISSIONER KA ECI

content: Shillong, March 10 : The three days Monolith Festival, hosted by the Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council in collaboration with the Government of Meghalaya came to a close on the 9th of March 2024.Chief Guest, Conrad K Sangma, attended the Closing Ceremony along with the Tourism and Arts & Culture  Minister, Paul Lyngdoh, Chief Executive Member of the Autonomous District Council, Pyniaid Sing Syiem and besides other Executive Members including PN Syiem and Teibor Pathaw and many other Government officials and other Dignitaries.Speaking on the occasion and citing two young boys who are chana (gram) sellers at the festival Conrad K Sangma Said, “It is encouraging to see that there is a convergence of multiple exchanges where like these two boys, I am proud to see them earning their livelihood. This convergence brings out the unique aspects of the Khasi Culture in various forms whether it is in the form of music, textiles, cuisine, dance and many other unique cultural aspects.”In encouragement to the location in which the event was held, he said that the venue should not just hold the Monolith Festival but urged the stakeholders involved to ensure to hold daily markets at the 8 acre venue shocasing food, local indigenous vegetables and fruits, textiles and also performances showcasing the unique and rich culture and heritage.The Chief Minister also assured of support of the Government. He also lauded the various District Councils in the State in their new journey as they delve into the field of research where the State Government, starting from this year has given a research fund of Rs. 50 lakh to each District Councils.In relation to the research funding, Chief Minister further said, “This fund will increase annually so that the various District Councils can start their research  in various formats in written, video and many other means to document the unique cultural aspects of the different tribes in the state of Meghalaya.”CM also announced the rolling out of the CM’s Research Scholarship Program which is spearheaded by the Arts & Culture Minister, Paul Lyngdoh where the Government will support close to 50 researchers up to 3 lakh rupees per researcher/scholar annually to conduct research on the Culture and other historical aspects of the State. The selection process will go through a formed committee for screening of deserving candidates.Guest of Honour, Paul Lyngdoh, in his speech said, “ It is in events like the Monolith Festival that brings not just the Khasi community together but also converges, unites and highlights the unique identity of the Khasi people along with the rest of the world. I congratulate the efforts taken to make this festival happen and would like to support the vision of the KHADC to promote the Khasi Culture for it is Land, Language and Lineage which are the three cornerstones of our community of which we can pass it down strong and proud to our descendants.”In his speech Chief Executive Member, Pyniaid Sing Syiem thanked everyone for their contributions in making the Festival a huge success. He further mentioned that the KHADC is the custodian that protects the identity of the Tribal people in any state and this event is a celebration to showcase to the rest of the world the united and unique Identity of the Khasi People. He thanked the Karbi Anglong Autonomous district council for providing land in Diphu in the Karbi Anglong area for construction of a Guest house of the KHADC and urged the state government to support this initiative.
title: THIRD EDITION OF THE MEGHALAYA MONOLITH FESTIVAL CONCLUDES WITH GRAND SUCCESS

content: Shillong, March 9: Chief Minister, Conrad K Sangma, launched the My City Campaign, a community cleaning drive campaign and also unveiled the ‘Reimagining Streets’ initiative and also participated in a cleaning drive at Dhanketi on March 9, 2024.Addressing the gathering that had culminated at Moreau Institute of Integral Training (MIIT) after the cleaning drive from Dhanketi Parking Lot, Chief Minister, Conrad K Sangma, said that different groups, individuals and departments have been doing activities in their own capacity and there was a need to bring the efforts of everyone together. “This cleaning drive that we had today is something that we want to do every three months because our communities and our culture has been to keep our localities and villages clean,” he said and added that many villages and localities do it on their own without any support. “For the first time the government is taking this culture of us forward where funds will be provided every three months for this particular purpose,” he said. He also stated that this will first take place in every district headquarter slowly percolating to every village.The Chief Minister also said that the idea is not about the fact that one day will clean up the entire city or town but to bring about a change in the mind set of the people. “Every time we clean we have to start realising that we all have a role to play and let every citizen the rest of the days when the government is not sponsoring these cleaning drives take the responsibility to ensure that we keep our surroundings clean and litter free,” he said. He further said that the students and the youth have a great role in this campaign and said, “Youth when they take up a movement it can be very powerful.” He added that the larger goal is to mobilise the citizens of the state to keep the cities and towns clean.Further he said that the objective of the Reimagining Streets initiative is to make the streets walkable and said, “We have an ambitious plan to create 10-15 kilometres of walkable footpaths, broadening existing footpaths wherever possible, tiling and paving the footpaths to increase the overall connectivity to encourage walking among the citizens,” he said. He also highlighted some interventions like underground conduit for cables, painting of buildings, construction of footpaths etc to improve the aesthetic look of the cities. He also informed that the audience of the various programs and projects of the government to make the State and its cities, towns and villages clean, liveable and the best.The Chief Minister also distributed KickStart cheques to different community representatives and also released the Reimagining Streets Initiative Booklet during the occasion.College students,  members of the NCC and NSS, members of different Dorbar Shnongs and members of self-help groups were also present during the occasion.
title: CM KICKSTARTS ‘MY CITY’ CAMPAIGN

content: : Ka tnat Pulit ha ka sngi u Blei ka la pynbna ban ai khusnam shi lak tyngka ia kino kino ki briew kiba lah ban ai ia ka jingtip kaba bniah kaba lah ban ioh ksai na ka bynta ban iohkem ia kino kino ki briew kiba donkti ban pynbthei ia u bom IED ha Them Iewmawlong ha ka miet sngi Saitjaiñ.“Ka tnat Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills ka la pynbna ban ai khusnam T. 1,00,000 lak sha kino kino kiba lah ban ai ia ka jingtip kaba bniah kaba lah ban iohksai na ka bynta ban ioh kem ia kino kino ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam pyntriem bad ka kam runar.  Ia ka kyrteng jong ki nongai jingtip yn sa buhrieh kyrpang.  Ia ka jingtip lah ban phah sha ka Special Cell lyngba ka Call/Text/WhatsApp ha u mobile number 9366790273 lane lyngba ka email: specialcelLekh.m1p(i),” la ong u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Rijuraj Ravi ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.Ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka por kumba 10:30 baje mynmiet, u bom Improvised Explosive Device (I ED) u la bthei ha kawei ka ing tap tin bym don shuh ba shong basah kaba don ha Syndicate Bus Stand, Punjabi Lane, Them Iewmwlong.U SP u la pyntip ba ia u bom IED la buh hapoh ka tin.  Ka jingbthei, ia kaba la suba ba la pyndonkam da ki Gelatin Stick, la buh hapoh ka ing tap shiliang, kaba la pynjulor ia ki iit jong ki jingkhang iit jong ki ing kiba don markhap bad kane ka ing ba la jia ka jingbthei.Uwei u nongiaid lynti uba la ithuh kyrteng kum u Lakhan Singh u la mynsaw malu mala na ki bynta jong ka kjat namarba ka jingsied jong ki phngit ba la mih na ka jingbthei.“Ka kynhun kaba donkti ha kane ka kam runar ka dei kaba syriem kum ka jingbthei kaba la jia ha ki snem baladep ha kaba ka seng kieng atiar ba la kheiñ beaiñ ka HNLC ka la shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh. Hynrei, tad haduh ha kane ka kynti ba la pynmih ia kane ka khubor, ym shym la don satia kano kano ka kynhun ne ka seng kieng atiar ka ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh halor kane ka jingbthei,” la ong u SP.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ki Pulit ki la ujor da ka ejahar ba la rejistar Sadar Police Station na ka bynta ban pynlong shuh shuh ia ka jingtohkit hapoh ka Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act bad ka Explosive Substances Act.“Ki Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills ki la kut jingmut ban tohkit bniah bin pa bin ban iohkem ia kiba donkti bad ban tian bishar ia ki hakhmat ka aiñ,” ong shuh shuh u SP bad bynrap, “na ka bynta kane, ngi pan ka jingiatreilang na ki paidbah ioh ia ka jingjop.”
title: 1 LAK THONG KI PULIT ÏA KIBA AI JINGTIP SHAPHANG KIBA DONKTI BAN PYNBTHEI BOMB IED HA THEM METOR

content: Ka long ka jingmyntoi bad ka jingkyrkhu ïa ki khynnah ka FGEM Higher Secondary School Nongspung ha kaba ka ophis u Commandan 4th BN, MLP, Sohpian ha ka taiew baladep ki ai jingpynshai ha kaba ïadei kumno ban kiar na u drok bad ban pynsngewthuh ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam Pulit ba lait ha ka tnat PulitHa kane ka prokram kaba la long hapoh ka skul la pynïaid ïa ka jingïalang da u Principal Bah Kyrshan Marngar ryngkat ka jingïadonlang ki nonghikai bad ki khynnah skul. U Principal u la pdiang sngewbha ïa u Commandant uba la kloi ban ai jingpynsngewthuh sha ki khynnah skul.U Principal u la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewnguh ïa u Bah Syiem ba u la wanrah ka jingïadei kaba jan hapdeng ki paidbah lyngba ka Civic Action Programme bad kiwei pat ki prokram bapher bapher khamtam ban ai jingïarap ïa ki paid nongshong shnong kane ka thain khamtam ki baduk kiba don hajan kane ka ktem jong ka 4th MLP Bn, Sohpian.U Bah Lakador Syiem u la pynshai bniah shaphang jingsniew bad ka jingshyrkhei u drok lyngba ka Presentation halor ka Phang “Ill Effect of Drugs on Youths and Society” bad batai bniah shaphang ki lai jait ki drug, u Natural Drug, Semi Synthetic Drug bad u Synthetic Drug.“To ngin ïa ong em ïa u drug, to ngin kiar na ki kam sniew ban leh ïa ki kam babha namar nyngkong u pynsngewbang hynrei hadien u wanrah tang ïa ki jingbabe suba,” la ong u Bah Syiem.“Nga ruh nga dei u khynnah skul kum ma phi mynshwa nga long kumne dei na ki nonghikai, ki kmie ki kpa kiba la hikai ïa nga”la pynshlur u Bah Syiem ïa ki khynnah skul kiba la biang ka rta ban aplai ïa ka kam Pulit namar ha kane ka juk kyrduh kam Sorkar dei satang ha ka tnad Pulit ba bun ki nongkyndong ki dang ïoh kam Sorkar kaba dang lah ban ai kam da ki hajar ngut.
title: “KIAR NA KI KAM SNIEW KIBA WAN RAH KA JINGBABE BAD KA SNGEWSIH HADIEN”: BAH L. SYIEM

content: : Ka Synjuk Ki  Seng Longkmie Katholik (SKSLK) Archdiocese Shillong, Zone-II ryngkat ka pyrthei baroh kawei ka la rakhe kyrpang ïa ka sngi bakyrpang jong ki kynthei ne ka “International Women Day’s” ha ka sngi u Blei ha Divine Saviour’s Church, Nongthymmai Parish.La sdang ïa kane ka jingrakhe da ka Mass Bakhuid ba la pynmynta da u Lyngdoh Sad ka Jyllaniambah Shillng u Most. Rev. Victor Lyngdoh ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Parish Priest ka Nongthymmai Parish u Sohblei Augustine Kuttala uba dei u Spiritual Director jong ka Synjuk ki Seng Longkmie Katholik , Zone II.U Archbishop Victor Lyngdoh haba ai ïa ka sneng ka kraw sha ki Longkmie kiba la ïashim bynta ha kane ka lympung ba phra ba la buh ruh ïa ka mat puson kaba ong, “U Kpa jong ki u la ai bynta ïa ki khun kynthei bad ki hynmen shynrang,”  ïa kaba la sot na ka kitab u Job 42:15, u la pynpaw ba kane ka dei ka kam phylla jong U Blei ban pynkhraw ka long ba ki kynthei ki don ka bynta kaba khia tam ban ïa tynrong ïa ka kam ka khia ka shon jong ka ïing ka sem bad ka imlang ka sahlang.“Ka kynthei ka dei ka dohnud jong ka ïing ka sem bad u kpa u dei Khlieh ka ïing, sngewkmen pat ki kynthei ne ki longkmie ki ïalong ryngkat lang ym don bakhraw ne barit,” ong u Lyngdoh Sad.Ha kane ka sngi u Lyngdoh Sad u ong ruh ba ki longkmie ba mynta ki la paw bad kiew shaphrang wat ha ka imlang ka sahlang haba ïanujor bad ki shynrang la ha ka kam ka jam ki la kham tbit ki kynthei.“Ki longkmie ne ki kynthei ki dei ka jingaiei jong U Blei bad ki dei ban long borabor kiba nyngkong ban ïaroh ïa u Blei,” u la ong.Hadien ka nguh ka dem Blei ka la don ka jingïalang kaba lyngkot ba la pynïaid da ka Synjuk ba la lamkhmat da ka President jong ka Synjuk ka Kong Cathleen Pyngrope bad kumjuh ka jingïakob rwai da ka ktien U Blei ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki nongkitkam ka Synjuk ki Seng Longkmie Katholik, Central Body, ki seng longkmie na ki san tylli ki Parish ba kynthup ïa ka Pynthorumkhrah, Laitumkhrah, Nongthymmai, Nongmynsong bad Mawpat.
title: KA KYNTHEI DEI KA DOHNUD JONG KA ÏING KA SEM BAD NYNGKONG BAN MANE ÏA U BLEI : ARCHBISHOP VICTOR

content: Ki Nongialam jong ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) Central Body ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la leit ban iakynduh ia u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi ban pan jingpynshai halor kano ka daw ba ki Pulit ki la kem ia u Disciplinary Secretary ka seng u Bah Tarson Lymba.Ia u Bah Lymba, ki Pulit ki la kem ha ka miet sngi u Blei na ka shnong Dawki, West Jaiñtia Hills District tang hapoh 24 kynta ba la jia ka jingbthei u bomb IED hajan ka Syndicate Bus Stand ha Them Iewmawlong ha ka miet sngi Saitjain.U Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, u la pyntip ba ki Pulit ki la kem ia u Bah Ebakordor Nongpluh, 26 snem ka rta na Shillong bad ia u Bah Tarson Lymba, 58 snem ka rta na Dawki halor ka jinglap ksai ba ki dei kiba donkti ban pynbthei ia u bom IED hajan ka Syndicate Bus Stand ha Them Iewmawlong ha ka miet sngi Saitjain.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingiakynduh ia u Superintendent of Police, u Bah Sadon Blah u la ong, “u SP u la ong ba ka don ka jinglap ksai jong ki Pulit ba u Bah Tarson Lymba u donkti halor ka bthei bom ha them Metor. Ia mynta, ki Pulit ki la tian bishar ia u ha Kashari bad mynta ki dang pan bor na ka Kashari ban ioh set ha along ki Pulit (na ka bynta ban tohkit bniah).”Haba kylli, u Bah Sadon Blah u la ong, “u Bah Tarson u dei u dkhot  uba la rim bha ha ka seng bad uba la heh ka rta bad nga la ong shai ia u SP ba u Tarson kum u Disciplinary Secretary ka seng un donkti ha kane ka kam ka long ba ngim lah ban pdiang. Ngim kwah ban tuklar ia ka jingtohkit jong ki Pulit hynrei ngi pynsngew ba ngim lah satia ban pdiang namarba u dei u rangbah uba jaijai bad uba la rangbah ka rta bad uba la iatrei lang bad nga mynta la 20 snem.  Ba un (Bah Tarson) leh shongshit ia kano kano ka kam da kaba iaid ia ka lynti ka bym dei ngam lah pdiang bad ngam ju kham lap ia kata.”“Katkum ka jingsngew jong ka seng, ba u dkhot ka CEC un donkti ha kane ka kam pynbthei bom ka long kaba ngim lah ban pdiang,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Sadon.Ka tnat Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills District ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi u Blei ka la pynpaw ba ki dak ki shin na ka jingbthei u bom IED ha Them Iewmawlong ka iasyriem bha ia kaba la ju leh da ka seng kieng atiar HNLC hynrei ka bym shym la kam trai satia ia ka la bthei u bom IED ha them Iewmawlong ha kane ka kynti.“Naduh ba la bthei ki bom (IED) kylleng kylleng, bad kane kaba jia ha them metor ban shu kynnoh than tang ia kato ka seng (HNLC) bad ia u nongialam seng ka long kaba bakla namarba kane ka ishu them metor ka ladei lypa u shiah uba thar ha ki pyllew jong baroh kiba i donkam ban pynkynriah noh (ia kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong).  Ka tnat Pulit ruh ka dei ban leh homework namarba ka jingbitar jong u paidbah halor ka jingbym lah ban eiei jong ka sorkar ia ka them metor ka dei kawei ka daw. Mano ba donkti ban pynbthei bom ka dei ka kamram jong ki Pulit ban bud bniah bha ym tang ban shu pynlong sohpdung bad ban shu kem suk ia ki nongialam sengbhalang la ka dei na kano kano ka sengbhalang ruh,” la bynrap u President ka HNYF.U la ong ruh ba ka jingbitar jong kiba bun balang halor ka ishu them Metor ka long namarba ka Sorkar MDA ka la shu kut tang ha kaba thung ia ki High Level Committee hynrei ka kam kam poi shano shano ruh.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ba u Bah Tarson Lymba u dei uba sah ha ka shnong Dawki bad hadien ba la sdang ka jingiakren iasuk hapdeng ka HNLC bad ka Sorkar, dei u Bah Tarson uba la ialam ia ki ophisar ka Sorkar bad ka tnat Pulit sha ka shnong kaba don hajan khappud bad ka ri Bangladesh ban leit shaw ia ki dkhot ka HNLC.“Lada um don u Bah Tarson, ngin ym tip hi ruh ia kata ka shnong ba ngin leit shaw ia ki (nongialam HNLC) namarba ka dei ka shnong kaba don sha kyndong bha jong ka khappud. Naduh ka sngi nyngkong ba i (Bah Tarson) la iarap wat ha ki jingialang bad ki jingiakynduh ruh i don lang, balei yn len ia kata, i don lang beit. Ngi iakren ia khana lang beit bad kumba long ma nga ba nga donkti lang ha ka jingiakren iasuk, ma i ruh i don lang ryngkat bad ngim don bynta da kumwei pat,” la iathuh u Bah Sadon.
title: MAR ÏA SHAH KEM U DISCIPLINARY SECRETARY NA DAWKI, PAN JINGSHAI KA HNYF NA U SP

content: U Nongïalam jong ka All India Trinamool Congress u Mukul Sangma uba dei ruh u Myntri Rangbah barim ka jylla u la takrain tyngeh ïa ka Congress kaba la pynbna ban pynieng kyrtong na ki ar tylli ki Lok Sabha Seat ha Meghalaya.U Mukul u la kynthoh ruh ïa ka jingkren jong u Jairam Ramesh ba ka Trinamool Congress kam shym la ap hynrei ka la ïaid beit shakhmat ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ha ki 42 tylli ki Seat ha ka jylla West Bengal.“Ngi la ap la slem bad nga ngeit ba baroh ki ïohi bad ka ri baroh kawei ka peit ïa ngi bad ap da ka jingïaishah. Ka la don ka jingthmu ban sei tang uwei u kyrtong na ka INDIA Bloc ban pynthikna ba ngin ïatreilang kum kawei ka kynhun hynrei kane kam shym la urlong satia,” la ong u Mukul ha ka sngi u Blei.“Mynta lada ka Congress ka ong ba ka TMC kam ap bad ka la ïaid shakhmat ban pynbna ïa ki 42 ngut ki kyrtong ha West Bengal, nga ngeit ba ngin hap ban pynkynmaw ïa ka jingshisha ba ka Congress kam shym la shim ïa ka rai bad kaei kaba la ïakut,” u la ong.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka Congress ka la pyndkut ïa ka jingïateh, u Sangma u la ong, “kam long kaba shisha ba ki la ïaid shakhmat bad ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka Meghalaya. Ha Meghalaya, ki don tang ar tylli ki Seat. Na ki ar tylli, ka Congress ka ladep ïaid shakhmat ban pynbna la ki jong ki kyrtong.”
title: TAKRAIÑ U MUKUL SANGMA IA KA CONGRESS BA PYNÏENG KYRTONG MP NA SHILLONG BAD TURA

content: KaHynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC)-CEC lyngba une u kyrwoh ka phah ia ka khubor kaba shai sha baroh ki Agent jong ka Sorkar India ne ka Sorkar Jylla ba ki dei ban sangeh shisyndon ia kino kino ki jingthmu jong ki ban pyrkhat ne mutdur hi ruh ba kin khlong lane tih ia u Uranium na ka Bri U Hynniewtrep.“Kum ka Seng, ngi skhem ha ka nongrim bad ka jutang ba ngi lah khlei ba da leilei ruh em ngim shah ban khlong ia une u marpoh khyndew na kane ka Ri ka jong ngi. Kumba ngi ladep ban kren naduh ki sngi bad ki snem kiba ladep, haduh mynta ka kynti ruh ngi iaineh skhem ba ngi pyrshah jur ia kano kano ka jingpyrshang ban khyllie biang ia ka kitab tih Uranium napoh kane ka Ri ka jong ngi,” ong u President ka HYC Bah Roy Kupar Synrem ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei.“Ngi kren ruh da kaba shai ba kum ka seng bad ki dkhot jong ka baroh, ngi long kiba la kloi ban iakhun da kaba kano kano ruh ka lynti ban pynthikna ba ka Sorkar India ne ka Sorkar Jylla kin ym dei ban iohlad ban pyrshang pynim biang ia kane ka mat namar kan bha ba ngin iakhun mynta ban ia kaba ieh ban iap bad duhjaid ka Jaidbynriew lyngba kane ka  bij jong u Uranium,” ong u kyrwoh.“Ka Seng ka pynrem jur bad maham tyngeh ruh ia kato ka briew kaba kyrteng ka Elizabeth Nongbri bad ia kiwei ruh, ba kam dei ban pyrshang mushlia laplah ia kane ka kam iap kam im jong ka jaidbynriew. Lehse kane ka briew ka kwah ban sngewthuh (testing the waters) ia ka sur jong ki khun samla bad ki dkhot ka jaidbynriew bad hadien pat ka pyrshang ban len noh ia kaei kaba ka ladep ban thoh.  To tip tang kawei ba kum ki sengbhalang ne ki kynhun bapher bapher, ngi lah ban don ia shibun ki jingiapher ha ki lama ba ngi don, hynrei ngi long kawei ka jingmut bad ka jingthmu  bad “kata ka long ban iada bad pynneh pynsah bad khamtam eh ban ialeh khlem kynran dien na bynta la ka jaidbynriew,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: KA ELIZABETH NONGBRI KAM DEI BAN MUSHLIA LAPLAH ÏA KAM ÏAP KAM IM JONG KA JAITBYNRIEW: HYC-CEC

content: : U President jong ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) Bah Sadon Blah u la ong ba lada ka jingtohkit ki Pulit ka lap ba u Bah Tarson um don bynta eiei ha ka jingpynbthei bom IED ha Them Iewmawlong kaba la jia ha ka miet sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep, ka seng kan ym sngap jar satia halor kane ka kam.“Ka jingpyntyrha bad ka jingpynbitar kaba na ka por sha ka por namarba ym dei tang ia u Bah Tarson hynrei wat ka kali jong nga ruh ka la shah talasi arsien hapoh Bhoi khlem daw khlem nongrim,:” ong u Bah Sadon ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingiakynduh ia u U Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi ban pan jingpynshai halor kano ka nongrim ba ki Pulit ki la kem ia u Disciplinary Secretary jong ka HNYF-Central Body Bah Tarson Lymba.Ha ka miet sngi u Blei, ki Pulit ki la kem ia u Bah Tarson Lymba, 58 snem na ka shnong Dawki bad ia u Bah Ebakordor Nongpluh, 26 snem na Shillong.“Wat ki dkhot jong ngi na Nartiang bad na Lad Rymbai ruh ki shah phah wan mih sha Police Station. Ka long kaei kaei kaba ngim lah ban pdiang kum ka seng bad (ia mynta) ngin ap shwa kaei kaba lap ha  ka jingtohkit (ki Pulit) halor ka case jong i Bah Tarson,” la ong u Bah Sadon.
title: WAT KA KALI JONG NGA RUH KA LA SHAH TALASI LA AR SIEN HA BHOI: BAH SADON BLAH

content: Ki bahaing hasem ki la pynpaw ba kim lah satia ban pdiang ia ka jingshah kynnoh jong u Bah Tarson Lymba ba u dei uba donkti ha ka jingbthei u bom IED ha Them Iewmawlong ha ka sngi Saitjain ka taiew baladep ha ka por kumba 10:30 baje mynmiet.U Bah Bnai Syngkrem uba dei u pyrsa jong u Bah Tarson ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingiakynduh ia u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki nongialam ka HNYF u la  ong, “hynnin (sngi u Blei) ha ka por 12 baje mynsngi katba nga dang mut ban leit sait kali la poi ka phone na Dawki Police Station ba ki Pulit ki la phah wan u Bah Tarson sha Police Station bad mar mar ngi la leit synran lang sha Dawki PS bad lai ngut kiwei pat”“Ngi shong ha ka kali bad u bah Tarson u rung shapoh (Thanat) bad ki kylli jingkylli ia kane ka jingjia (ba bthei u bom IED ha Them Iewmawlong),” ong u Bah Syngkrem.U la ong ba ha kine ki ar lai sngi shwa ban jia ka jingbthei bom ha Them Iewmawlong, u Bah Tarson u don hapoh shnong.“Ngi la poi ha Dawki PS ha ka por 5:00 baje janmiet bad ngi la ap hapoh thanat tad haduh ka por 7:30 baje janmiet ynda la wan poi ki Pulit na Shillong.  Ki shong tang paramaki bad hadien kata, ki wan ong (ia u Bah Tarson) ba yn hap rah ia phi ban kylli jingkylli namarba phi don ha ka jingiakren iasuk (ka HNLC bad ka Sorkar),” ula ong.“Dei ha ka por kumba 10:30 baje ne 10:45 baje mynmiet ki Pulit ki rah ia u.  Ki Pulit ki shu batai tang ia ka jingbthei bom bad ban kylli jingiakyli namarba ma u ruh u dei uba don bynta ha ka jingiakren iasuk (ka Sorkar bad ka HNLC),” iathuh shuh shuh u Bah Syngkrem.Haba kylli, u la ong, “katkum ka jingiohi jong nga u Bah Tarson um don bynta eiei. Hynrei ia kaei kaei (kaba don shalyndet) ngim lah ban pynshisha. U trei u ktah hi kumba bylla ma ngi.  Kum u pyrsa nga sngew duhnong khlem da tip thikna ban shu kem ka long kaba eh. Haduh mynta ban pyshisha ia u ba u donkti ha kato ka bynta kam dei kaba suk bad ban shu pharep khlem daw.”
title: YM LAH PDIANG KI BAHAÏING ÏA KA JINGSHAH PHAREP U BAH TARSON LYMBA

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la shim ia ka sienjam bakongsan bha ban pyntyllun shakhmat da kaba buh mawnongrim na ka bynta lai tylli ki projek ba kongsan, ban shna ia ka New Shillong Water Supply Scheme, ka Land Reclamation Project ha Waste Processing and Disposal Site ha Marten, Mawlai bad ka jingshna ia ki Internal Roads hapoh ka New Shillong Township Land ha ka shnong Mawkhanu bad Mawpdang.Ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi lang da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba khmih ia ka tnat Pynroi Sor u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, u Myntri ka tnat PHE bad Soil & Water Conservation u Marcuise N. Marak, ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. M. Ampareen Lyngdoh, ki ophisar bad ki rangbah shnong.Haba kren ha kane sngi, u Conrad Sangma, u la ong ba ka New Shillong Water Supply Scheme kan long kawei na ki projek kaba heh tam ba la bei pisa da ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka dei ruh kawei na ki projek kaba la pyrkhat janai bha.Ban weng ia ka jingdawa um ha Shillong, ia ka New Shillong Water Supply Scheme yn sa pyntreikam da ka tnat PHE. Lyngba kane ka projek la thmu ban sam ia ka um kaba khuid sha New Shillong Township, ha ki shlem pule, ha ki ophis treikam bad ha ki laiphew ar tylli ki shnong kiba marjan.Da kaba khmihlynti ba ia kane ka projek yn shna pyndep hapoh 36 bnai, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “kane ka projek kan kot kumba T. 1600 klur ban pyntreikam bad ha kaba wat kaba nyngkong, yn sa pynlut pisa T.500 klur.Na ka bynta ban shna ia ki surok, u la ong, “ia kine ki surok yn sa shna ha ka shnong Mawkhanu ha ka jinglut kaba kot kumba T.185 klur. Katba ngi dang kren, ka projek kaba T. 380 klur ka la nang iaid ha ki bynta ka New Shillong, ha ka Knowledge City bad ha ka Administrative City.”Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshna ia ka Land Reclamation Project ha ka Waste Processing and Disposal Site kaba don ha Marten, u Sangma u la ong, “ia baroh ki jaboh jabaiñ yn sa pyndonkam biang.  Kumba la khmihlynti ba hapdeng ki 12-18 bnai, ngin sa lah ban ioh ia ka jingkylla dur ha Marten. Ngi khmihlynti ba tang shu pynkynriah ia ki jaboh jabaiñ, ka jingthmu jong ngi ka long ban pynkylluid ia ka jaka bad ban pynkylla ia ka jaka thehniut sha ka jaka kaba ki paidbah ki lah ban pyndonkam.”U la bynrap ba ia kane ka projek yn sa pyntreikam ruh ha kiwei kiwei ki district ban pynthikna ban pynlang shi jaka ia ki jaboh jabain.  U la ong ba ka Meghalaya kan sa kylla dur. “Ngin sa mang pisa kumba T. 10,000 klur ha ki saw snem ban sa wan ha Knowledge City bad ha New Shillong City.”U Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar  u la ong ba ka dei ka jinganngud kaba la slem jong ki paidbah ban iohi ia kine ki projek ba kin urlong noh bad kyrmen ban iohi ia ka jingkylla ha kane ka jylla ha ki 5 bad 6 snem ban sa wan.Halor ka jaka thehniut u Bah Dhar u la khot bad wer ia ki paidbah ban iatreilang namarba ka jaka thehniut kam dei tang ka ishu kaba ktah ha Shillong hynrei wat ia kiwei k iwei ki bynta jong ka jylla.
title: BUH MAWNONGRIM U CM BAN TEI ÏA KA NEW SHILLONG WATER SUPPLY SCHEME HA NEW SHILLONG

content: Ka seng kieng atiar Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council lyngba u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei da u General secretary cum Publicity secretary Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw u la pynrem jur ia ka jingkem jong ki Pulit ia u Bah Tarson Lymba da kaba shu pharep ba u dei uba donkti ha ka jingpynbthei ia u bom IED ha Them Metor.“Kane ka dei tang ka buit treikam jong ki Pulit haba kim iohksai ban kem iano iano ruh bad ong ruh ba u Bah Tarson u dei tang u dkhot uba don bynta ha ka miej jingiakren iasuk bad um dei satia u dkhot lane u nongkyrshan jong ka HNLC. U dei tang uba shu synran ia u Bah Sadon, u ksiang ha ka jingiakren iasuk.  Lada ki ksiang nongpyniasuk ki shah pynthud bad shah kem ha ki Pulit, mano shuh na ka kynhun yn dang don jingshaniah ia ka ain ne ia ka sorkar haba ka HNLC ka wan phai na ka bynta ka jingiakren iasuk? ong u Bah Nongtraw.“Ka paw shynna ba ka Sorkar ka la pynap shrip bad pyniap ia u Bah Cheris, u nongrahktien.  Ka long ka jinglehrain ia ki politishian jong ka Jylla Meghalaya kiba dei ki nongiada jong ka riti synshar paidbah, hynrei mynta ka Meghalaya ka la kylla long ka jylla kaba synshar da ki heh saipan bad pyniaid da ki nongsynshar heh spah. Kaba kham sngew lyngngoh ka long ba wat ia u Bah Ebakordor Nongpluh la kem halor kane ka jingjia.  Katkum ka jingioh jingtip jong ngi, u Bah Eba u dei tang u nongsyntiat jong ki Pulit,” la kynnoh ka HNLC.Haba pynpaw ba ka HNLC kam pyrshah satia ka jingsuk,  u Bah Nongtraw u la ong, “ka HNLC kam pyrshah satia ia ka jingsuk; ngim dei ki nongbanbein ban leh beiñ.  Lada don mano mano ba knieh noh ia ka khyndew ka shyiap jong phi, hato phi tharai ba kan don ka jingsuk. La palat 76 snem, ka India kam pat ju sakhi ia ka shongsuk, lymne kan ioh ia ka jingshongsuk. Ia ka jingsuk yn ym lah ban tei ha ka jingbymiaryngkat, ka jingshah khniot bein, ka jingsngew iapher, ka jingbym don ain, ne ka jingshet kylla namarba kam don ka jingsuk kaba shong nongrum ha ka jingleh bym hok, ka jingshet kylla, ka jingleh shiliang khmat, ka jingleh bym hok, lane ka jingleh donbor.”“Nga la pule ia ka hitori jong ka Bharat,……..ka histori jong phi, bad ka pynpaw ba phi dei ki nongpyniap briew, ki nongrung tuh, ki nongdakhol, ki nongtuh, ki nongrahbor, ki riew shukor, ki nongleh be-ijot bad ki runar.  Nalorkata,, phi la pynkheiñ ia ki soskular bad pynkhein ia ki jingiateh ha baroh ki Jylla synshar syiem.  Ka long pyrshah ia phi lada phi ialap ia ka shongsuk bad ka jingialeh ba khlem ia umsnam, ka hok bad ka synshar paidbah.  Ki politishian Hynniewtrep, kaba sngewsih, ki la shah pynthame, shah pynbiej bad shah pynbor ha ki nongshun jong ngi bad ha ki nongban bein, bad ki treika kum ki Agent bad ki tyngshop jong ka Sorkar India.  Ka jingphiah jong phi bad ka jingpyndonkam da ka polisi pyrshah ia ka ri jong ngi ka dei kaei kaei kaba phin hap ban siew da ka dor.  Ka hok ne da kaei kaei!” la kynthoh ka HNLC.“Phi la donkti ban siat iap bad ban pynmong ia ki dkhot jong ngi. Phi la pyniap ia u Bah Cheris, rahbor ia u Sibsing Syiem, pynbor ia u nongialam jong ngi u Wickliff Syiem ban ryngkangpar, set along bad pyntyrha ia baroh ki nongialam Hynńiewtrep kiba phim sngewtynnat.  Phi tharai ba ngi sheptieng bad ngin randien na phi, hynrei EM, ngin wan mareh sha Phi,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: KYNNOH KA HNLC BA SHU PHAREP KI PULIT ÏA U TARSON, U EBA U DEI U NONGSYNTIAT KI PULIT

content: Ka kashari District and Session Judge, East Khasi Hills District ka la aibor 10 sngi ia ki Pulit ban kin tohkit ia u Bah Tarson Lymba bad ia u Bah Ebakordor Nongpluh kiba la shah kem ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynbthei ia u bom IED ha jaka ieng Bos ha Them Iew Mawlong ha ka miet sngi Saitjain jong ka taiew baladep.U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District u Rituraj Ravi ha ka jingiakren bad kau la ong ba ka jingkem ia u Bah Tarson Lymba na Dawki bad ia u Bah Ebakordor Nongpluh na Malki ka dei halor ka jingioh sabut kaba khlain kaba pynthikna ba kine ki arngut ki dei kiba donkti ha kane ka jingpynbthei bom ha Them Iew Mawlong.U la ong ba kino kino ki briew kiba donkti ban iasylla ha kane ka kam runar ki Pulit kin hap ban kem bad ban tian bishar ia ki katkum ki kyndon jong ka ain.U la iathuh ruh ba ka tnat Pulit ka la thaw ia ka kynhun ka ban tohkit bniah na baroh ki liang halor kane ka jingjia bad pynlong ruh ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bha. “Ngi la pynkhlaiñ ia ka jingpahara ha baroh ki jaka kiba kongsan bad ha ki jaka kiba lah ban don ha ka jingma bad kumjuh ruh ha nongbah Shillong. Ngi dang wad shuh shuh ia ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam ruh,” la ong u Ravi.U la maham ruh ba ka tnat Pulit kan ym aili ia kino kino ki briew kiba thmu ban pynthud ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad ia ka jingshngaiñ jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong.
title: 10 SNGI AIBOR KA KASHARI ÏA KI PULIT BAN TOHKIT ÏA U TARSON BAD EBAKORDOR

content: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar Pdeng bad Sorkar Jylla ba ki dei ban tep noh ia ka mat tih Uranium hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya.“Hadien ba la iohi ia ka jingmih pyrthei biang ka kam tih Uranium ha ka jylla ha kaba kawei ka longkmie Khasi lyngba ka seng shimet ka la phah lane mut phah sha ka Sorkar Pdeng ban sdang biang ka jingtih Uranium, kum ka seng kaba la pyrshah ia ka jingthmu tih ia une u marpoh khyndew naduh ba sdang  ngi kwah ban pyntip sha baroh khamtam eh sha ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Sorkar Pdeng ba ngin iai pyrshah ia kane ka jingthmu bad ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka dei ban tep noh ia kane ka mat,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Working President ka KHNAM u Bah Thomas Passah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Ka jingsngapjar ka dei ka jingiamynjur namarkata kum ka seng ngi sngewba kan long kaba bakla lada ngi shu sngap ioh don kiba mutdur da kumwei pat ia ki nongrim kiba ka seng ka ieng. Ngi kyrpad ruh ia ki para Khasi jong ngi ba kim dei ban thang biang ia ka ding ba la lip,” u la bynrap.
title: KA SORKAR PDENG BAD JYLLA KI DEI BAN TEP NOH ÏA KA MAT URANIUM: KHNAM

content: Kawei ka jingjia kaba ishyrkhei ka la pynkyndit ia ki paitbah nongleit nongwan haba kawei ka jingkieng nar kaba heh ka la dkut kynsan ha ka por kumba 9:00 baje mynstep katba kawei ka Trok kaba don ia u number AS01 EC 8291 ka dang iaid lyngba na kane ka jingkieng.Kane ka jingkieng ka dei  kaba pyniasoh ia ka surok kaba leit sha ka shnong Mawkyrwat bad Nongshilong bad ka jaka ba kane ka jingkieng nar ka kdiah ar lyngkhot ka dei kaba la tip kum ka Wah Umchangkhar kaba hap hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum la iathuh ba kane ka trok ka dei kaba kit ia ki nar rod bad kaba mih na ka shnong Nongkasen ban leit pynhap sha ka shnong Rangblang.Ki nar rod ba la kit hapoh kane ka trok ki don kumba 20 ton eiei bad kaba sngewsih ka long shwa ba ka trok kan lait ban jam sha shiliang ha kum kane ka por ka jingkieng ka la dkut kynsan ar lyngkhot.Ha kane ka jingjia u nongniah jong ka trok u la lait thaw na ka jingmynsaw.Ka jingdkut noh jong kane ka jingkieng nar ka la buh jingeh haduh katta katta ia ki paidbah nongleit nongwan jong ka Eastern West Khasi Hills bad ka South West Khasi Hills.
title: DKUT KYNSAN KA JINGKIENG NAR HA WAH UMCHANGKHAR, HAP LANG KA TROK

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Ri Bhoi District ki la kem sa saw ngut ki briew ia kiba la suba ba ki dei kiba donkti ha ka jingbthei u bom IED ha Them Iewmawlong ha ka miet sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep.Ia kine ki briew ki Pulit ki la kem na ka thain Umsning ha ka miet lah sngi U Blei.Halor kane ka jingshah kem, ki Pulit ki la ioh ruh ban kurup ia ki tiar ki tar kiba la suba ba ki dei kiba pyndonkam ha ka jingpynbthei ia u bom IED bad kine baroh saw ngut ki dei na ka thain Umsning.Tang shu iohkem, ki Pulit ki la rah sha Nongpoh Police Station bad ban tian bishar ha Kashari District Session Judge Court ha Nongpoh, Ribhoi District.
title: SAW NGUT SHAHKEM KI SUBA DONKTI PYNBTHEI BOM IED HA THEM IEWMAWLONG

content: Ar tylli ki dukan,kawei ka dukan sha ba la buh de bad kiwei pat ki marbam bad kawei pat ka dukan kaba die ia ki juti, slipar bad kopi, ki la kylla dpei hadien ba ki thylliej ding kiba klang bha ki la bamduh ia kine ki ar tylli ki dukan ha ka miet sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka por kumba 12 baje shiteng miet.Kane ka la jia ha ka shnong Mawthong, kaba jngai 20 kilomitar eiei na Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills District.Kine ki ar tylli ki dukan ki dei ki jong ki shi kmie shi khun, kata, jong ka Kong Skola Wahlang bad u khun jong ka, u Bah Tanlin Wahlang. Baroh ar tylli ki dukan ki la kylla dpei bad la antad ba ka jingjulor ka la kot kumba T.2.50 lak.U Bah Tanlin u la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingjia ym shym la don mano mano ba mynsaw namarba ym don ba sah hapoh kine ki ar tylli ki dukan bad da ka jingkloi jong ki paitbah ban ai jingiarap, la lah ban tem ia ka jingklang jong ka ding ban pur sha kawei pat ka ïing kaba don marjan.
title: BAMDUH KA DING AR TYLLI KI DUKAN JONG KI SHI KMIE SHI KHUN HA MAWTHONG

content: Ka tnat Kam Pohiing jong Sorkar India ka la shna ia ki Rul na ka bynta ka ain Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019 ia kaba la pynmih paidbah ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei mynta ka taiew.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Sorkar India, la pyntip ba ka jylla Meghalaya kan ym hap hapoh ki kyndon ain  jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019 bad kyndon ain jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act, kin ym ktah ia ki jaidbynriew ritpaid riewlum kiba shong basah hapoh kane ka jylla Meghalaya.Ka tnat Kam Pohing ka la ong ruh ba Citizenship Amendment Act, kan ym treikam hapoh ki jaka ba hap hapoh ka Khyrnit Bahynriew jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India hynrei ka kam ka dang iaid shakhmat ban pynkhlain shuh shuh ia ki lai tylli ki Autonomous District Council kiba don hapoh kane ka jylla Meghalaya.Ka Citizenship Amendment Act, ka plie lad plie lynti ia ki katto katne ki jaidbynriew na ka niam Hindu, Sikh, Buddhist, Jain, Parsi bad ki Khristan kiba la wan na ka ri Bangladesh, Pakistan bad Afghanistan ban sah hapoh ka ri India ym palat ia ka 31 tarik u Nohprah, 2014 na ka daw ka jingshah banbein ha ka jingngeit niam jong ki, ki lah ban long ki nongshong shnong bapura jong ka Ri India, la pynshai ka MHA bad shuh shuh ka la ong ba yn ym shah ia kine ki phetwir ban shong ban sah ha ki jaka kiba dang hap hapoh ka Khyrnit Bahynriew.Ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019 kan ym ai syrnod ia baroh kine ki nongbuhai shnong ban long nongshong shnong khlem ki jingpynshisha bad ki sakhi sabut bapura. Baroh ki nongpan jingbit kin hap ban iaid lyngba ki kyndon bapher bapher bad ka sorkar kan da bishar bniah ia kawei pa kawei ka jingpan jingbit.Ka tnat Kam Pohing ka la pyntip ruh baka sorkar India ka la shimkhia ban iada ia ka hok bad ia ka jingbit jingbiang jong ki jaitbynriew ritpaid jong ka thain Shatei Lammihngi bad ban pynpoi ia ki song pynroi lyngba ka ‘Act East Policy’.
title: KA JYLLA MEGHALAYA KAN YM HAP HAPOH KI KYNDON AIÑ JONG KA CAA 2019: MHA

content: Ki Pulit ka East Khasi Hills bad ki Pulit jong ka Ri Bhoi District ki la lah ban pynpulom ïa ka jingthmu jong ki suba dkhot Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ban pynbthei sa uwei u bom IED ha Nongpoh hadien ba ki Pulit ki la ioh kem ïa ki saw ngut ki briew ba la suba ba ki dei ki nongkyrshan barieh jong ka HNLC.Ki saw ngut kiba la shah kem ha ki Pulit ki kynthup ïa u Damanbha Ripnar ba ju khot sin u Shall Lapang, u Robinis Ripnar, u Jill Tariang bad u Shining Nongrum bad baroh kine kiba la shah kem ki dei kiba na Ri Bhoi District.Kum ban pynkynmaw, ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka taiew baladep, u bom IED uba khlaiñbor bha u la bthei ha Them Iewmawlong, Shillong. Tang hapoh arphew saw kynta, ki Pulit ka East Khasi Hills ki la kem ia u Disciplinary Secretary jong ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front u Bah Tarson Lymba na Dawki bad ia u Bah Ebakordor Nongpluh na Mawlai, Shillong.U Superintendent of Police ka Ribhoi District Jagpal Singh Dhanoa ha u kyrrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ula iathuh ba ki Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills bad Ri Bhoi ha ka lah sngi U Blei kumba ha ka por 6:00 baje janmiet ki la ioh bat ïa kawei ka kali Bolero Pick-up kaba don ïa u nombar ML-12-3243 ba la ñiah da u Bah Damanbha Ripnar na surok Usmning-Mawhati.  Ha ka jingtalasi ïa ka Kali la ioh kurup ïa u bom IED lyngba ka kynhun Bomb Detection & Disposal Squad na Shillong ba la leh ha kata ka rukom ban lait na ki jingma jingmynsaw.La ïathuh ruh ba ka kynhun ki saw ngut ki nongkyrshan barieh jong ka HNLC ki la shah kem da ka jingthmu ban pynbthei ïa u bom IED ha Shillong bad Nongpoh. Ki Pulit ki la iathuh ba kine ki saw ngut ki la phla ba ki la thmu leh da ka jingbthah jong ka seng HNLC na Bangladesh.Ha ka jingiohkem ïa kine ki suba nongkyrshan barieh ka HNLC ki Pulit ki la ioh ban kurup 15 tylli ki Gelatin Sticks, 167 tylli ki nar lyngkhot (ba ju thep hapoh u bom IED, uwei u  Safety Fuse Wire, 3 tylli ki Non Electric Detonator, 5 tylli ki Mobile Phone, ka Bolero Pick-up kaba don ïa u number  ML-12-3243.Halor kane ka jingioh kurup ia ki tiar pynbthei bad ka jing iohkem ïa kine ki 4 ngut, ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi ki la register case ha Nongpoh Police Station da kaba pynngat hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Section 120 B/121 A Indian Penal Code (IPC), pule lang ruh bad ka Section 10/13/18 UA(P) Act bad ka 5/6 Explosive Substance Act.
title: SHAH KEM SAW NGUT KI NONGTREI BARIEH KA HNLC, KURUP KI PULIT ÏA KI TIAR TIAR PYNBTHEI

content: : Tang shi sngi hadien ba ka Sorkar India ka la pynmih paidbah ia ka Rule jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019, ka North East Students Organisation (NESO) kaba long ka shatri jong ki sengbhalang bapher bapher ka thain Shatei Lammihngi ha ka sngi Baar ka la thang ia ka Rule jong kane ka ain hakhmat ka ophis treikam jong ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) ha Lower Lachaumiere, Shillong.La lamkhmat ban thang ia kane ka Rule da u Chairman jong ka NESO u Bah Samuel B Jyrwa ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki nongialam ka Khasi Students Union (KSU), ki dkhot jong ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia and Garo Peoples (FKJGP) bad kiwei kiwei.“Lada ka Assam ka shah ktah suki suki kiwei ki bynta jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei kin shah ktah. Lada phi ong ba ngi don ia ka Sixth Schedule ha kane ka jylla, kumno pat ka jingjyllei jong ki bar jylla ka jur haduh katne katne.  Ka Sixth Schedule katkum ka jingiohi jong ngi ka khlem lah ban iada ia ka jingrung jong ki bar jylla bad kiba bun ki bynta jong ka Sor Shillong bad ki bynta jong ka khappud jong ka jylla la bun da kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew.  Lada kata ka Sixth Schedule ka lah ban iada, balei pat kam lah ban iada baroh shikatta. Dei halor kata ka nongrim ba ngi sngew ba ka CAA kan nang pynshlur shuh shuh ia ki mynder ri ba kin wan shapoh ka ri jong ngi,” ong u Bah Samuel ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Naduh u snem 1947 ba ka ri India ka la ioh ia ka jinglaitluid ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka la iai shah ba ki bar ri kin wan buhai shnong bad shong shnong bad kumjuh ruh ha u snem 1971 haba la khie ka thma ha ri Bangladesh da ki phew hajar bad da ki lak ki la rung shapoh ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi,” u la ong.“Ka Sorkar India da kaba leh kumne ka nang kwah shuh shuh ba ki bar ri kin long ki trai shnong, ki trai ri trai muluk hangne ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei, kaba long ka jingma ia ngi ki ritpaid ym tang ha ka jylla Meghalaya hynrei ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei,” la bynrap u Chairman ka NESO.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne ba ka NESO ka la mudui hapoh ka Iingbishar Supreme Court pyrshah ia ka jingpynlong aiñ ia ka CAA bad haduh mynta kane ka kam ka dang sah pohding hapoh ka Ingbishar.Haba kylli u la ong, “ka Sixth Schedule ka kren tang ia ka riti ka dustur, ka jingpynneh ia ka khyndew ka shyiap hynrei ka khlem kren ia ka jingrung jong ki briew kiba nabar.  Dei namarkata, ka Sixth Schedule kam pat biang kumba ka long mynta ban tehlakam ia ka jingwan rung jong ki briew kiba nabar.”“Ka jinglah ban tehlakam ia ka jingwanrung jong ki briew kiba nabar ka dei ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Sorkar Pdeng. Kumba ka long mynta ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security Act (MRSSA) ka Ingbishar High Court ka la pynsangeh bad ia ka ILP ruh ka Sorkar India ka khlem ai nalor ba la iai dawa mynta da ki phew phew snem,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Jyrwa.Halor ka jingpynslem jong ka Sorkar India ban ai jingmynjur ia ka Inner Line Permit ha Meghalaya, u Bah Jyrwa u la ong, “ka jingiajngai jong ki jaidbynriew ritpaid ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi naduh mynshwa na ka ri India ka dei ka jingleh jong ki hi naduh ka por ba ngi ioh ia ka jinglaitluid ngi khlem ioh ia ka hok jong ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi. Naduh ka sngi ba la ioh laitluid haduh kane ka khyllimat ba mynta kaei kaba ka Sorkar India ka la leh ia kaba bha ka ban long ka jingiada, ka jingkyntiew ia ka ktien ka thylliej, ia ka riti ka dustur bad ban iada ia ki jaidbynriew jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei, tang kawei ruh kam pat don ba kan leh. Kumno ngin ong ba ka Sorkar India ka la leh bha, ka khlem leh eiei ruh em. Dei halor kane ba kane ka jingpynjngai da nang jur nang jur hapdeng ki trai ri trai muluk ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi bad ka Sorkar India hapoh Delhi.”
title: THANG KA NESO ÏA KA RULE JONG KA CITIZENSHIP AMENDMENT Act, 2019 KA SORKAR INDIA

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la kren da kaba shai ba kan ym pdiang daleilei ruh em ia ka aiñ Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019 da kaba ñiew ba ka dei ka aiñ Iakjakor ba la wanrah da ka Sorkar India.Ki dkhot ka KSU ba la lamkhmat da u President samla Lambokstarwell Marngar ha ka sngi baar ki la iasnohkti lang bad ka North East Students Union (NESO) ban thang ia ka Rule jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019 hakhmat ka ophis treikam jong ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) ha Lower Lachaumiere, Shillong.“Ngi thang ia ka Rule jong ka CAA, ban pynkynnmaw ia ka Sorkar India ba dalelei ngim pdiang ia ka ain Iakjakor ba ka Sorkar India ka wanrah.  Kane ka dei ka buit aiu re ba ka Sorkar BJP ka thmu sha lyndet bad ka riehtngen ha ka shatri ba ka hap ban pdiang ia kita kiwei pat kiba don sha Bangladesh,  sha Afghanistan, sha Pakistan ba ki shah thombor (ha ka kyrteng ka niam) hynrei nga kren da kaba shai ba ka dang jur ka jingthombor jong ki heh paid ia ngi ki trai ri trai muluk ban ia ka jingshah thombor kita.  Kine ki daw kiba ka ai ka Sorkar India ki dei ki bym shongnia shong nongrim hynrei ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar India kumba ka paw ba ka kwah ban pynmadan ia ngi ki rit paid,” ong u President ka KSU Samla Lambokstarwell Marngar ha kajingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.U la ong ba ha ki sngi ban sa wan ka KSU bad ka NESO kin sa shong pyrkhat kiei ki lad ki sienjam ba kum ka seng bad ka NESO kin shim.“Ngi dang pyrkhat ba ka Sorkar India kan ai ia kita ki ain ki ban iada ia ngi ki trai ri trai muluk ha kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei hynrei ka jingpynlong aiñ ia ka CAA ka dei ka jingkhot sngewbha jong ka Sorkar India ia ki briew khamtam na ka ri Bangladesh.  Phi hap ban sngewthuh ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei kaba iajan tam bad ka ri Bangladesh bad na ka por sha ka por ka jingwanrung kyrthep bad wan rung laitlan sha kane ka jylla jong ngi bym don ki ain ki kanun,” ong u samla Marngar.“Ngi don tang 15 lak ha ka jingbun briew, lada ki wan ki Hindu tang 10 lak na ka ri Bangladesh ka jaidbynriew ritpaid jong ngi ka la kut,” ong une u nongialam ka KSU bad bynrap, “ngan pynkynmaw ha u snem 2019 ka CAB ka la long aiñ bad ha une ujuh u snem ka Ingdorbar Thawain jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ruh ka la mynjur ia ka Resolution ban dawa ia ka Sorkar India ba kan pyntreikam ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) hapoh kane ka jylla hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba ka Sorkar India naduh u snem 2019 haduh mynta ka dang pule sah ia ka Resolution. Kane ka pynpaw shai ba ka Sorkar India ka mut ban thombor biang ia ka jinglong ba kyrpang jong ngi,’ u la ong.“Ha ka mynnor, nga lah ban ong, ym dei ba ngi pyrshah ia ka Sorkar India, hynrei ngi hap ban kren ia ka jingshisha ia ka histori.  Ka jaidbynriew Hynñiewtrep ka iasnoh bad ka ri India lyngba ki ktang suloi ba la pynap bad pynkbum jubor.  Sa shisien pat, ym da ki ktang suloi, hynrei ka (Sorkar India) thombor da ki aiñ kiba khyllah khyllah pyrshah ia ka jingshong shngaiñ jong ngi ka jaidbynriew,” la kynthoh u President ka KSU.“Katkum kane ka ain (CAA 2019), kiba rung shwa ka 31 tarik, Nohprah, 2014 kim donkam ban pan kot pan sla bad pan ia ki jingpynshisha hynrei la pdiang sngewbha beit ia ki kum ki nongshong shnong bapura hapoh ka ri India baroh kawei. Ha,oid, ka Sorkar India, ka ong ba kane ka aiñ kan ym kynthup ia ki Schedule Area lait noh ha ki Non-Schedule Area, hynrei lada ka long kumno kumno ruh hynrei ka seng ka ju iohkem ia ki briew kiba wan rung shapoh ka jylla khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang. Ngi shem ba ki wan na ka jylla Assam,” bynrap u President ka KSU.“Katkum ka thup kyrteng ba la pynmih ha ka National Register of Citizens (NRC) da ka Sorkar Assam ki don palat 20 lak tam ne duna ki bym don kyrteng.  Kane ka pyni shai ba ha ka jylla Assam ka jur bha ka jingrung kyrthep ki mynder ri. Kane ka dei ka jingma kaba ap ym tang ia ka jylla jong ngi bad ka jylla Assam hynrei ia ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei,” u la bynrap.“Ka NESO bad ka KSU ka la ujor sha ka Supreme Court ia ka CAA bad mynta ka dang sah pongding hapoh ka Ingbishar bad ki lad ki lynti ngin sa nang pyrkhat halor ka jingpynlong aiñ ia ka CAA kaba long pyrshah ia ngi ki trai ri trai muluk.  Ngin sa shong ban pyrkhat bad ban pynsngew sha ka Sorkar Jylla ia kiei ki lad ki lynti ban tehlakam bad pyrkhing ioh lehse ki don kita ki poiwir kiba na ka jylla ki leit wad ia ka shatri ban long ki nongshong shnong bapura jong ka ri India bad kane ka jylla,” la ong u samla Marngar.Haba kylli, u la ong, “kan ym lah ba long hynrei ka long tang kumno ban pynthame bad ban ialam bakla hynrei kan don beit ka jingktah.  Lada ka ktah ia ka Assam kan ktah beit ia ka jylla jong ngi.  Kut ki bar jylla kiba wan rung beain ha kane ka jylla jong ngi ki dei beit na ka jylla Assam.  Peit ki nongtrei bylla kiba wan sha Meghalaya khlem ki kot ki sla.  Ki Kharbangla ki rung sha Meghalaya khlem ki kot ki sla bad bunsien ki ong ba ki dei na Assam.  Kine ki rung sha Assam tang ban ioh ia ki kot ki sla ba kin ioh buhai shnong hapoh kane ka jylla jong ngi.  Kita ki dei ki dak mynsaw kiba ap ia ka jylla jong ngi,” u la kynthoh.
title: NGIM PDIANG DALEILEI RUH EM ÏA KA AIÑ IAKJAKOR BA KA SORKAR INDIA KA WANRAH: PRESIDENT KSU

content: THOH KA HPC SHA U AMIT SHAH BAN TUKLAR ÏA KI JINGEH HA PUNJABI COLONY: Ka Harijan Panchayati Committee (HPC) ha ka sngi Baar ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing u Amit Shah da kaba kyrpad ba un tuklar lem halor ki kynrum kynram jong ka Them Metor da ka jingïatreilang  hapdeng ki lai kynhun, ka Sorkar Meghalaya, ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) bad ki kynhun bapher bapher.Ka Committee ka la kyntu ruh ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng ban phah tohkit halor ka jingbthei u bom IED dang shen ha jaka ieng ki Syndicate Bus kaba la pynsyier mynsiem thot thot ïa ki jaidbynriew bym dei riewlum kiba shong basah ha Them Iewmawlong.“Ngi kyrpad ïa phi ba phi tuklar lem halor ki kynrum kynram jong ka Punjabi Colony da ka jingïatreilang hapdeng ki lai kynhun bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya,” ong u Secretary jong ka HPC u Gurjit Singh ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Shah.U la ong ba ki jingeh ba ïadei ïa ki hok bad ki nongshong shnong ha Them Iewmawlong ïa mynta la kheiñ dewthala, bad da ka jingtrei shitom jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, ka Harijan Panchayat Committee bad kiwei kiwei ki kynhun ban poi sha ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut.“Wat hapdeng ki jingïalang kiba bun tylli bad ki jingïakren, ka kam kaba jwat ka dang shong per ha suiñ.  Watla ka jingkular ban tuklar da ka Sorkar India, kam shym la urlong satia.  Ngi don ka jingshaniah lada ka Sorkar Pdeng ka shimkhia ban pynkut noh ïa kane ka kam, ka dei ban long kaba suk,” ong u Singh.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka jingbthei bom dang shen ka dei ka jingpyrshang ban pynslem ïa ka jingstet ka kam, u Secretary ka HPC u la ong, “kane ka jingjia ym dei ban shu ieh kumto hynrei ka dei ka dak ka shin kaba ktah ïa ki jaidbynriew ritpaid kiba sah hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.  Ka jingkem ïa ki briew halor kane ka jingjia ka pynpaw ba ka dei ka jingpyrshang ban pynsyier mynsiem bad ka jingpyrshang ban pynkbum ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka Punjabi Colony.”“Ngi pynpaw hakhmat jong phi da ka jingsngewkhia ba ym don mano mano ruh na ka Sorkar Meghalaya, na u Myntri Rangbah ter ter ban pynrem ïa ka jingjia.  Ki nongïalam saiñpyrthei, ki ïai pynmih ïa ki jingkynthoh pyrshah ïa ki nongshong shnong ka Punjabi Colony khlem sangeh, ym shym la kren eiei wat shi kyntien ruh ne ban wan jngoh ïa ka jaka ba la jia ka jingpynbthei ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingbthei ne ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki longiing,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u Sing u la pyntip ba ka Delhi Sikh Gurdwara Management Committee, ka Shiromani Gurdwara Prabandhak Committee bad ka National Commission of Minorities, ka National Commission for Human Rights bad kiwei kiwei ki kynhun ki la wan jngoh ïa ka Punjabi Lane katba ki jaidbynriew Sikhs ki dang ïai bteng ban ïakhun na ka bynta ki hok ki jong ki.“Namarkata, ngi kyntu ïa ka Sorkar India, hapoh ka jingïalam jong phi, ban shimkhia bad ban shim rai mardor ïa kane ka kam. Ka long kaba kongsan ym tang ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah hynrei ban pynshitom ruh ïa kito kiba ju byrngem byrsit bad kiba pyntieng kohtympan ïa ki jaidbynriew bym dei riewlum. Ngi ngeit ba ka jingsuk yn sa lah ban wanrah da ka jingpynshitom pyrshah ïa ki nongleh kam bymman, ym ban ailad ïa ki jyrwit jyrwat ban shu buhrieh hapoh u shylliah,” u la ong.U la ong, “ki nongshong shnong ka Punjabi Colony kim kwah eiei hynrei tang ban ïoh shong suk shongsaiñ, ban noh synniang sha u sup u thiar jong ka imlang ka sahlang bad ka ïoh ka kot jong ka Jylla Meghalaya kumba ngi la leh mynta pateng la pateng. Ka jingsheptieng bad ka jingbym sngew shngaiñ ka la pynwit ym tang ïa ka bha ka miat jong ngi hynrei wat ïa ka roi ka party  ha ka jylla.”Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka dei ka kamram kong ka Sorkar Pdeng ban pyntreikam ïa ka aiñ ba ïada ïa ka hok bad ka jingshngaiñ jong ki nongshong shnong, la ka long na kano kano ka jaidbynriew.“Ka jingtuklar deipor jong phi ïa kane ka kam ym tangba kan pynthikna ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ki briew kiba sah ha Punjabi Colony hynrei kan long ruh ka khubor kaba khlaiñ pyrshah ïa ki jingumsnam bad ki kam thombor,” la ong ka HPC.
title: WAT U CM RUH YM PYNREM, YM DON BA WAN JNGOH ÏA NGI: GURJIT SINGH

content: U Chief Conservator jong ka tnat Forest u N. Luikham uba dei ruh u ophisar Indian Forest Services (IFS) u la pynkut noh ia la ka jong ka jingim ha u tyllai phasi ha ka ingsah ka jong u kaba don hajan ka Lady Keane College, Shillong.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la pyntip da u Superintendent of Police jong ka East  Khasi Hills District u Rituraj Ravi u la ong ba u Luikham u la phasi ialade ha ka por 7:30 baje mynstep.Tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane, ki Pulit ki la leit ban shimti noh ia ka met jong u bad ban pynkit sha Shillong Civil Hospital na ka bynta ban leh ia ka Post Mortem.U Luikham u dei uba la don kumba 50 snem ka rta bad u dei u ophisar IFS jong ka Batch 2003.
title: PHASI U CHIEF CONSERVATOR KA FOREST HA ÏING SAH HAJAN LADY KEANE COLLEGE

content: Ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynbna ia ki tarik ban pynlong ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha ha baroh kawei ka ri India.Katkum ka jingpyntip jong u Chief Election Commisioner (CEC) Rajiv Kumar, ka elekshon ha Meghalaya kan sa long ha ka 19 tarik u ÏAIONG 2024 ha ka Phase-I. Ka jingñiew ia ki Vote kan long ha ka 4 tarik u Jylliew 2024.U Kumar u la iathuh ba ka jingpynlong ia ka elekshon kan long haduh hynñiew bynta ha baroh kawei ka ri.  Ka Meghalaya kaba don ar tylli ki Seat ba kynthup ia ka Shillong bad ka Tura kaba hap ha ka Phase-I kan sa thep vote lang bad ki Jylla, kata, ka Arunachal Pradesh, Andaman & Nicobar Island, Andhra Pradesh, Chandigarh, Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu (DNH&DD), Delhi, Goa, Gujarat, Himachal Pradesh, Haryana, Kerala, Lakshadweep, Ladakh, Mizoram, Meghalaya, Nagaland, Puducherry, Sikkim, Tamil Nadu, Punjab, Telangana, Uttarakhand, Karnataka, Rajasthan, Tripura, Manipur, Chhattisgarh, Assam, Odisha, Madhya Pradesh, Jharkhand, Maharashtra, Jammu & Kashmir, Uttar Pradesh, Bihar & West Bengal.U CEC u la iathuh ba ki don 96.8 klur ngut ki nongthep vote ha ka ri India bad 49.7 klur ki dei ki shynrang bad 47.1 klur ki dei ki kynthei.U la iathuh ruh na napdeng kine ki don 19.74 klur ki nongthep vote kiba hapdeng ka rta 21 haduh 29 snem.Da ka jingpynbna ia ka tarik ban pynlong ia ka elekshon ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) ka la treikam mardor ha baroh kawei ka ri.
title: LOK SABHA ELECTION: 19 TARIK ÏAÏONG YN THEP VOTE HA MEGHALAYA, ÑIEW VOTE 4 TARIK JYLLIEW

content: Ki Pulit ka Ribhoi District kiba la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bha ha kaba ïadei bad ka Case kaba la rejister ha Nongpoh Police Station hapoh ka Section 120B/121A jong ka Indian Penal Code pule lang ruh bad ka Section 10/13/18 jong ka UA(P)Act bad ka section 5/6 Explosives Substance Act, ha ka sngi Balang ki la ïoh kurup kawei ka pistol, bun tylli ki Gelatin Stick, ki Detonator bad ki Ignition Fuses bad kawei ka lama jong ka seng HNLC bad kiwei kiwei ki jait tiar.Ka jingïoh kurup jong ki Pulit ïa kine ki lama bad ïa ki tiar pynbthei ka long hadien ka jingïalam lynti jong uwei na kiba la shah kem sha kawei ka ïing ba la buhrieh ïa kine ki tiar be-aiñ.Ki Pulit ki la ïathuh ruh ba ki dei kine kijuh ki nongtrei barieh kiba la pynher ïa ki lama jong ka HNLC ha ki snem baladep da ka jingbthah jong ki nongïalam ba phetrieh ka seng kieng atiar HNLC na Bangladesh.Kane ka kam runar ka la paw pyrthei hadien ba ki nongïalam ba la phetrieh sha Bangladesh ki la bthah ïa ka kynhun treikam barieh.  Nalor kata, la ai khusnam ruh da ka pisa bad kynthup ruh ïa ki kali ba thymmai sha kine ki nongtrei barieh ban pynbthei ïa ki bom IED, la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh ba u SP ka Ribhoi Jagpal Singh Dhanoa.Ka jingtohkit halor kane ka dang ïaid shakmat
title: KURUP KI PULIT KAWEI KA PISTOL, KI LAMA KA HNLC BAD KI TIAR PYNBTHEI

content: U Chief Conservator jong ka tnat Forest u N. Luikham uba dei ruh u ophisar Indian Forest Services (IFS) u la pynkut noh ïa la ka jong ka jingim ha u tyllai phasi ha ka ingsah ka jong u kaba don hajan ka Lady Keane College, Shillong.U Luikham u dei uba la don kumba 50 snem ka rta bad u dei u ophisar IFS jong ka Batch 2003.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la pyntip da u Superintendent of Police jong ka East  Khasi Hills District u Rituraj Ravi u la ong ba u Luikham u la phasi ïalade ha ka por 7:30 baje mynstep.Tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane, ki Pulit ki la leit ban shimti noh ïa ka met jong u bad ban pynkit sha Shillong Civil Hospital na ka bynta ban leh ïa ka Post Mortem.Ha ka por janmiet, ki bahaing hasem ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki nongtrei ka tnat Forest ki la leit ban shimti noh ïa ka met ba dang sah jong u Luikham na Civil Hospital, Shillong bad ban pynkit biang sha ka quarter kaba u ju sah shwa ban pynkit noh ïa ka met sha ka shnong Ukhrul, Manipur na ka bynta ka jinglehniam kaba khatduh.Haduh mynta ym pat lah satia ban tip ïa ka daw tynrai halor ka jingpynkut noh jong une u ophisar ïa la ka jong ka jingim.Tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad Kongkal Sangma ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah Donald P. Wahlang bad ki ophisar jong ki tnat treikam bapher bapher ka Sorkar Jylla kynthup ruh ki nongtrei jong ka tnat Forest ha ka por janmiet ki la leit sngewlem bad pyntngen ïa ki bahaing hasem halor ka jingkhladnoh kyndit jong u Luikham.Na ka liang jong u Myntri Rangbah haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang sngewlem u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih bad ong ruh ba ka jingkhladnoh jong u Luikham ka long ka jingduh kaba khraw ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya khamtam ïa ka tnat Forest bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki bahaing hasem bad ki paralok kiba ïajan eh bad u.
title: PHASI U CHIEF CONSERVATOR KA FOREST HA ÏINGSAH HAJAN LADY KEANE COLLEGE

content: Ka Meghalaya BJP Kissan Morcha ba la lamkhmat da u Bah Ralden Bryan Shabong bad u Bah Durut Majaw, ki la pynlong ia ka jingai jinghikai ha ka shnong Markasa, West Khasi Hills District bad sam ruh ia ki sSymbai jhur bad ki tiar kynshait sha ki nongrep.Ia kane ka jinghikai la pynlong khnang ban pyni, ban hikai, ban btin lynti bad ban pyntbit ia ki ha ka rukom rep jong ka juk ba mynta kaba lah ban iarap bad pynmih bun ki jingseisoh ba bun shah, ba pynduna ruh ia ka jingduhnong bad ka jinglehnohei bad pyniohnong kham bun ha ka liang ka rep ka riang jong kane ka shnong. Ia kane ka jingai jinghikai la pynlong ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Central Government Institute and Agriculture Scientists (CGIAS) da ka jingkyrshan jong ka  C.R.Projects bad ka Suraksha Medical Team.Da kane ka jingai jinghikai la shim ruh ia ki jingai jingmut na ki nongshong shnong jong kane ka thaiñ ia ka rukom synshar khadar kaba dei ruh ka mat treikam jong ka seng BJP kaba thmu ban lum bad ban wad bniah ia ki lad ki lynti na baroh ki bynta jong ka ri India ban pynmih ki rukom treikam rukom pyniaid kam ba pynhun ia ka jingkwah bad jingkhmih lynti jong ki paid nongshong shnong.Shwa ban pynsdang ia kane ka jingai jinghikai ka Meghalaya BJP Kissan Morcha ka la pynlong ia ka jingai jingsumar ei na ka bynta ki khynnah kiba hapoh ka rta kaba 15 snem ha ka shnong Umsaw bad la sam ruh ia ki khusnam sha ki nongjop bad la sam ruh ia ki sopti jersey.U Bah Shabong haba kren ha kane ka jingialang u la ong, “kine ki jingpynlong bad jingai jinghiai jong ngi ki long kum shibynta katkum ka mat treikam jong u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri uba iai trei shitrhem na ka bynta ka jingiaid shaphrang ka kam jong ki nongrep ha kylleng ka ri India.”
title: LAM LYNTI KA BJP KISSAN MORCHA BAN PYNTBIT ÏA KI NONGREP KATKUM KA JUK MYNTA

content: Ki samla kiba ju kamai jakpoh da ki thuk thuk shimet ban kit ia ki nongleit jingleit kylleng ka sor Shillong ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la iakynduh lang ha madan Malki, Shillong ban shim rai kumno ban leh nangne shakhmat hadien ba la mih ka jingkhanglad ban kamai be-ain khlem da ka ioh ia ka Permit bad siew Khajna sha ka tnat Transports jong ka Sorkar Jylla.Ha ka sngi Thohdieng u Commisisoner jong ka tnat Transports Bah E. Kharmalki ha ka jingiakren bad ki nongthoh khubor u la maham ia ki paidbah ba kin hap ban shim hi ia la ka jong ka jingkitkhlieh lada ki leit jingleit ne shong da ki Bike Taxi jong ka Rapido ne jong ki nongniah Scooty shimet bym pat ioh Permit na ka tnat Transports ka Sorkar Jylla.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President ka Ride to Serve Bah K. Nongkynrih u la ong, “ia ka jingkhein be-ain ngim sngew eiei namarba ngim dei ki khynnah kiba tuh na iing na sem bad nangne nangtai hynrei ka dei ka jaka kpoh jong ngi shimet bad ngi im da ka ki jong ki kti ki kjat.  Ngi baroh ngi la rai beit ban kamai.”“Ha ka taiew ban sa wan ngin sa leit ban iakynduh ia u Myntri ka tnat Transports ban iakren halor kane,” ong u Bah Nongkynrih.“Ngi la ai da ka jingthoh sha ka Sorkar naduh u snem baladep, hynrei haduh mynta ka Sorkar kam shym la jubab ia ka jingthoh,” u la ong.Ha ka 1 tarik, Nailur, 2023 ka Ride to Serve ka la aiti da ka shithi ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bah Prestone Tynsong ban ai Permit bad siew khajna khlem da pyniasoh bad ki Aggregator kiba don hapoh kane ka jylla.Haduh mynta, ka JETS 24×7 kaba don ia ka Permit ka dei ka Aggregator ba nyngkong eh ha Meghalaya ban shakri ia ki paidbah lyngba ki Bike Taxi.“Ka ophis u DTO ka la pyllait ia ka Permit hynrei ngi kiba kamai ynda ngi leit shim ia ka Permit ki ong ba ngi hap ban pyniasoh bad kiwei ki Kompeni. Ha ka jingthoh ba ngi la aiti ha u Myntri ka tnat Transports ngi la pynpaw ba ngi kwah ban siew ia ka Permit bad siew khajna lyngba ka Sorkar bad ngim kwah ban leit lyngba jong kino kino ki kompeni,” ong u Bah Nongkynrih bad bynrap, “ngi kwah ban long ki nongkamai shimet bad iohnong sha lade.”Haba kylli, u la ong, “ngim dei kiba kamai bad ka Rapido. Ngi kamai da ka Scooty shimet bad dei na kata ka daw ngi sa ieng Offline bad ngi khlem pyndonkam ia uno uno u App. Lada ngi siew ia ka bai permit bad ka khajna sha ka Sorkar ngi hap ban siew sa ia ka bai App sha ki kompeni namarba ki ohdor ia ka bai kamai shi khlieh briew.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Bah Nongkynrih, ki don 300 ngut tam kiba kamai shimet da ka Scooty.
title: NGIM DEI BA NGI TUH NGI THIEM NGI KAMAI LA KA HOK, ONG KI NONGKAMAI BIKE TAXI

content: Ka Directorate of Civil Defence & Home Guards, Meghalaya ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pyntip ba ka donkam ia ki Home Guards Volunteer ba la pyndep ia ka jingshah hikai pyntbit ban leit sha ka kamram ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha.U Divisional Commandant of Home Guard, Bah Paul H. Shylla ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la kyrpad ia ki Home Guards Volunteer kiba kwah ban leit sha ka kamram elekshon kin pyntip sha ka ophis jong ka Home Guards ha ki District jong ki marmar.
title: KHOT KA HOME GUARD ÏA KI VOLUNTEER BAN LEIT KAMRAM ELEKSHON

content: U Chief Electoral Officer jong ka Jylla u DR. BDR Tiwari ha ka 16 tarik u Lber, 2024 u la pyntip ba ki nongthep vote ha Meghalaya haduh une u snem 2024 ki don 22, 17,100 lak ngut ban rai ia ka lawei san snem jong ki kyrtong na Shillong bad na Tura ha ka eleshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik Iaiong, 2024.Ki nongthep vote shynrang ki don 10,94, 947 ngut, ki kynthei ki don 11,22,150 ngut bad 3 ngut ki Third Gender.Ha ka jingialang bad ki lad pathai khubor tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba ka Election Commision of India ka la pynbna ia ka tarik ban pynlong ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha, u Tiwari u la ong, ka jingkiew ki nongthep vote na u snem 2023 haduh kaba sdang jong ki ar bnai jong u snem 2024 ka long 55, 971 ngut.Ki nongthep vote ba dang shu pynrung kyrteng thymmai ha ka Electoral Roll, 2024 ki long, 56,909 ngut, ki Service Voter ki don 3835 ngut, ki nongthep vote ba duna dkhotmet ki don 11179 ngut, ki nongthep vote ba la kynjoh 80 snem ka rta shaneng ki don 23, 793 ngut bad 5 ngut ki Non Resident Indian (NRI).Ki Polling Station ki don 3512 tylli, ba kynthup 326 tylli ha ki jaka sor bad 3186 tylli sha ki jaka nongkyndong.Haba ai jingkheiñ ia ka jingpoi ki paidbah kiba thep vote ha Shillong bad Tura ha ki elekshon Lok Sabha ba la long ha u snem 2014 ki long 63.28 percent ha Shillong bad 79.14 ha Tura. Ha u snem 2019, ki nongthep ki long 65.48 percent ha Shillong bad 81.38 percent ha Tura.
title: 22,17,100 LAK NGUT KI NONGTHEP VOTE HA MEGHALAYA, AI JINGKHEIÑ U CHIEF ELECTORAL OFFICER

content: Tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba ka Election Commisssion of India (ECI) ka la pynbna ia ka tarik ba pynlong ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha, u District Election Officer jong ka East Khasi Hills District u la pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC ban mana ia kino kino ki briew ne ki kynhun ban rah pisa palat 50 hajar tyngka shaneng hapoh u pud u sam jong ka East Khasi Hills District.Katkum kane ka hukum, u DEO u la ong, “la ioh jingtip ba ki don katto katne ki briew kiba rah bun bha ka pisa ban thied ia ki nongthep vote ba kin ai ia ka vote bakordor jong ki sha u kyrtong.  Lada ailad kum ia kine ki jait kam, kan ktah ia ka jingiaid beit bad ka jingkhuid jingsuba ka elekshon Lok Sabha 2024 bad ka lah ban pynmih ia ka jingiakajia, ka jingiashoh iadat hapdeng ki paidbah, kaba lam sha ka jingthud jong ka shongsuk shongssain, ka jingduh ei ki mynsiem briew bad ki mar ki mata.”U DEO u la mana ruh ban pynlong ia ki jingiakhih kum ki jingshah thngan, ki proseshon, ki rally bad kiwei kiwei yn sa pynlong da ki katto katne ki kynhun bapher bapher hapoh ka district.La mana ban dro ha ki kynroh, ban tah poster ne kot kino kino ki jingthoh ba pynjah burom, ban pynieng ia ki cut-out, hoarding, banners ha ki jaka paidbah ne ha ki phyllaw ing jong ki paidbah khlem da ioh jingbit na ki trai iing bad ka jingioh jingmynjur na ka ophis u Deputy Commissoner.La mana ia ki seng sainpyrthei ne kyrtong ban buh ia ki banner ha surok ne ki jaka rung.La mana ban pynlong ia ki jingialang khlem da ioh jingbit na ka ophis u Deputy Commissoner bad na ki Rangbah Shnong.  La mana ban pyndonkam ia ki tiar jingpynsawa hapdeng ka por 10:00 baje mynmiet haduh 6:00 baje mynstep.Lada pyndonkam ia ki PA System/Loud Speaker khlem da ioh jingbit yn kurup noh mardor da ki bor synshar district.Yn ym shah ban pynlong ia ki proseshon bad ki rally khlem da ioh jingbit.Kane ka hukum kan treikam noh mardor tad haduh ban da kut ka jingpynlong ia ka elekshon.
title: MANA U DEO KA EAST KHASI HILLS BAN RAH PISA PALAT 50 HAJAR SHANENG

content: Ki thylliej ding barhem ki la pynkylla dpei ia kawei ka ing ha ka shnong Sohkynduh, ka shnong kaba hap hapoh ka thain Khatarshnong, Sohra, East Khasi Hills District.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum la iathuh ba kane ka la jia ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka por kumba 3:00 baje noh phai sngi.  Kane ka ing ka dei ka ing jong ka Kong Baralin Mawpat bad u Bah Phainal Phanbuh.Ka ding ka la ioh ban bamduh ia ka iing baroh kawei namarba ka dei ka ing tap tin shiliang bad baroh ki jingdon jingem hapoh ka iing ki la kylla dpei tang hapoh shikhyllipmat.Ha kane ka jingjia ym shym la don mano mano ruh ba mynsaw.
title: BAMDUH KI THYLLIEJ DING BA RHEM ÏA KA ÏING HA SOHKYNDUH

content: Arngut ki briew ba la shah kynnoh ba ki dei ki suba menshohnoh ki la shah bom shnong ha ki paidbhur ha ka shnong Mawthlong, East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Saitjain.Ia kine ki arngut la ïoh ban pyllait im da ki Pulit na ka kti jong ki paidbhur hadien ba ki la shah tangon haban da jem jai.Katkum ka jingioh jingtip na ki tyllong khubor la iathuh ba ha ka por kumba 11:30 baje mynstep, uwei u briew uba la 37 snem ka rta bad uwei pat uba la 20 snem ka rta, ki la shah kynnoh ba ki dei ki menshohnoh bad halor kane ka jingsuba ki paidbhur kiba don da ki spah ngut ki la kem bad bom shnong ïa ki.La iathuh haba ki Pulit na thanad Sohïong ki la ïoh ïa kane ka jingtip marmar ki la leit sha ka shnong Mawthlong ban pyllait im ïa kine ki ar ngut hynrei namar ba u paidbah ula bun palat, ki pulit SOT na Shillong ki la leit ban synran lang bad ki la ïoh ban pyllait ïa ki arngut na ka kti ki paidbhur.Ki Pulit ki la pynkit noh ïa kine ki arngut kiba la mynsaw jur sha Sohïong CHC bad kham hadien la pynkynriah noh ïa ki sha Shillong Civil Hospital.La ïathuh ruh ba ki pulit ki la register case halor kane ka jingjia bad kin sa pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.
title: BOM SHNONG KI PAIDBHUR ÏA AR NGUT KI SUBA MENSHOHNOH HA MAWTHLONG, EAST KHASI HILLS

content: Saw ngut ki rangiakura MMA ba kynthup ia u Johny Nongrum, u Moderkai S. Kharpuri, u David Ronghang, u Feathrel Massar bad ka Evadahun Shisha Rani ki la ioh khur ia ka jingjop ha ka rynsan iakura MMA kaba la tip kum ka Lastman Standing Fight Night-3 kaba la long ha ka 10 tarik, Lber, 2024 ia kaba la pynlong da ka Sunayana Entertainment ha nongbah Kolkalta, jong ka Jylla West BengalKa samla Evadahun Shisha Rani kaba mihkmat ia ka Legendary Warrior Combat Team ka la iohrah ia ka jingjop ha ka jingiakhun ha ka kyrdan Straw Weight Category, kynthup ruh u Feathrel Massar uba iakhun ha ka Feather Weight Category bad mihkhmat na ka Legendary Warrior Combat Team.Nalor kine, u Moderkai S. Kharpuri ruh u la ioh khur ia ka jingjop ha ka jingiakhun ha ka Middle Weight, Co-Main Event bad uba la mihkhmat na ka Lumshyiap Sports and Cultural Club.Kaba kham pynnoh mynsiem khyndiat ia kane ka kynhun ki nongiakura ka jylla ka long hadien ba u Johny Nongrum uba iakhun ia ka Main Event u la shah pynliem noh ha u nongiakhun pyrshah uba na ka ri Australia, u Shoshi Friendrich.Hynrei shwa kane, u Johny Nongrum u la shu jop ei da kaba suk ha ka Middle Weight hadien ba u nongiakhun pyrshah um shym la wan mih satia shalor rynsan.
title: JOP KA EVADAHUN RANI BAD SAW NGUT KI RANGÏAKURA MMA HA KA FS FIGHT NIGHT-3

content: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka la rai ban kyntu ia ka sorkar jylla ban weng noh ia ka jingpynbna jong u snem 2015, kaba la bthah ba ym donkam ban ioh ia ki laisen khaii napoh ki District Council.Haba jubab ia ka phang hapoh ka Dorbar Mang tyngka ha ka sngi Balang, u CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem u la ong ba ka jingpynbna kaba la pynmih ha ka por jong ka sorkar u Dr Mukul Sangma ka la shah ia ki kompeni kiba heh ba kin sdang ban trei ia ki kam ha shwa ba kin ioh ia ki laisen khaii napoh ki ADC ha ka jylla.“Ngi dang iai buddien ia kane ka kam bad ka sorkar jylla. Ngin sa kyrpad ia ka sorkar ba kan pyndam noh mardor ia kane ka jingpynbna,” u la ong.Na ka liang u CEM u la ong ba ka executive committee jong u ka la trei shitom ban nang pynkhlain ia ka ain Trading By Non-Tribal Regulations Act, 1954 ban iada ia ka ioh ka kot jong ki trai ri trai muluk.Ia kane ka phang la wanrah da u nongialam ka liang iatei u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne ban iatai halor ka im ka iap bad ka ioh kamai jakpoh jong ki briew kiba hab hapoh u pud u sam jong ka council.Halor ki kam ba iadei bad ki tourist taxi, u Bah Syiem u la ong ba ka council ka la dep khot ia ka jingialang bad ki tourist taxi jong ka Meghalaya ha u snem ba la dep ha kaba ia ka shithi la dep phah shapoh ka ophis u District Transport Officer (DTO) East Khasi Hills bad sha kiwei pat ki district ba kim dei ban ai ia ki permit sha ki bar jylla, kiba khlem pat ioh ia ki laisen khaii napoh ka council.Haba iadei bad ki kam jngohkai, na ka liang u CEM u la ong ba shen ka council bad ka sorkar jylla kan pynlong ia ka certification programme halor ki tour guide ban pynshlur ia ki briew na jylla ne na ki shnong ban sdang ia kane ka kam kaba aikam aijam na ka bynta ka jakpoh jong ki.U la ong ba ka Council ka la shim ruh ia ki lad ki lynti ba la iakynduh jingeh da ki nongrep bad bynrap ba ka Council ka ladep shna ruh ia ki iew die lang ha Mawryngkneng, Mawsynram bad ha Pynursla.
title: KYNTU KA KHADC ÏA KA SORKAR BAN PYNDAM NOH ÏA KA JINGPYNBNA BYM DONKAM LAISEN KHAÏI

content: Ka Seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ha ka sngi alei hadien saw sngi ka la kam trai ba ka dei ka kynhun kaba la pynbthei ïa u bom IED ha Them Iewmawlong ha ka miet sngi saitjain jong ka taiew ba ladep.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u  General secretary cum Publicity Secretary ka HNLC Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “ngi shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ka jingpynbthei bom IED ha them metor ha ka miet 9 tarik, Lber. Ka Budnar Shadow Squad (BSS), kaba treikum kum ka Special Forces jong ka HNLC, ka dei kaba la leh ïa kane ka kam.  Ka Sorkar MDA bad ka tnat Pulit ki kyndit ba ka kynhun jong ngi ka la leh ïa kane ka kam ha ka jaka ba khlaiñ ka jingpahara. Ngim don jingthmu ban pynmynsaw ïa ki paidbah ne ïa ki mynsiem ba luilui, namarkata ngi la kiar.  Ka Sorkar ka dei ban weng ïa ki pulit CRPF na them metor ban pynthikna ïa ka jinglaitluid ka leit ka wan jong ki paid u Hynñiewtrep na kane ka jaka..”“Namar ka jingbym suidniew ba la slem jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban pynkyñnriah ïa kine ki Harijan na kane ka jaka, ngim don lad shuh da kumwei pat sa tang ban shu pyni da ka bor. Kane ka dei tang ka jingpynkynmaw ba lada ka Sorkar kam lah ban ai jingïada ïa ka jaidbynriew jong ngi, ngi lah ban ïohi ba ka ri Hynñiewtrep ka lah ban poi sha u pud ka thma pohïing. Kano kano  ka jaidbynriew kaba buh jingma ïa ka ri Hynñiewtrep kan hap ban mad ïa ka jingeh.  Ka Sorkar ka dei ban pynkynriah noh ïa ki hapoh shi bnai ne mad ïa ka jingeh kaba khraw,” la byrngem ka HNLC.“Ki Pulit ki don ha ka thma bad ka jaidbynriew jong ngi, bad ngin ïada ïa la ka jong ka ri bad ïa ki paidbah la ka long ha kano kano ka dur. Haba ngi ïakhun na ka bynta ka daw, jong ka jaidbynriew, kynmaw ba ngim don eiei ban duh.  Ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Sorkar Jylla ka la shah pynïaid ïa ki bar jylla bad ki ophisar Pulit Khasi ki shah pynlong kum ki ‘sew beh.  Haba u ophisar bar jylla u phah wiar, ki wiar, haba u ong dait, ki dait. Haba u ong kaweh tdong, ki kaweh, haba u ong mih snam, ki mih snam na ka bynta ki bar jylla.  Hynrei, ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïada ïa ka jaidbynriew Hynñiewtrep na ka jingshah thombor bad ka jingshah pynlong sohpdung ha ka kti jong ki bar jylla, ne ki Pulit bar jylla, kim don bniat ne ka snam ban jaw,” la kynthoh ka HNLC.Haba kynthoh ïa ki arngut ki Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, ka HNLC ka la ong, “ïa u Bah Prestone bad u Bah Sniawbhalang la pyndonkam da ki nongïalam Garo kum u Mukul Sangma bad u Conrad K. Sangma kum ki nongbah saiñpyrthei, nyngkong hapoh ka Congress bad mynta hapoh ka NPP.  Ki ïasyriem kum ki kada kit blei thaw ha ka Phawar u Aesop.”“Ngi pdiang ïa ka jingdon kaba la slem bha jong ki jaidbynriew Harijan ha ka ri Hynñiewtrep.
