Ngim shym la ong ïa phi mih noh na ka ri Hynñiewtrep. Ka jingthmu jong ngi kam dei satia ban wanrah ïa ka jingsngew ïapher ne ka jingpyrshah. Hynrei, ngi kyntu ïa ki jaidbynriew Harijan ban pdiang ïa ka jingpynkynriah sha ka jaka ba la ai da ka Sorkar na ka bynta ki briew jong phi bad mih noh da kaba suk ba saiñ na them metor.  Ha ki snem baladep, ngi la siat ïap ïa u para jong phi, u Lal Singh, namarba ki kam runar jong u, kaba la pynmong ïa ka jingsngew jong ki jaidbynriew jong ngi,” la bynrap ka HNLC.“Kane ka dei ka khubor kaba shai ba kino kino ki bar jylla kiba buhai shnong hapoh ka ri Hynñiewtrep, ngi pdiang sngewbha ïa phi ban shong ban sah hangne, hynrei kiar na kaba kam trai ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap jong ngi, ban pyndonkam da ka bor, ban pynibor ne ban pyndom ïa ngi hynrei lym kumta phin mad ïa ka jingap kaba shyrkhei, kumba u nongtuh um lah satia ban long u trai,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: KAM KA HNLC BA PYNBTHEI IED KA BUDNAR SHADOW SQUAD HA THEM IEWMAWLONG

content: : Ka kynhun kaba don hynriew ngut ki dkhot jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Youth Congress (MPYC) ba la  ïalam da u President Bah Adrian Chyne Mylliem ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih ha baroh kawei ka jylla ban pyrshah ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019.Ha kane ka jingïakhih la sakhi ba tang 6 ngut ki samla jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Youth Congress (MPYC) ki la leit ban rah plakad hakhmat ka ophis treikam jong ka BJP ha nongbah Shillong ban pyrshah ïa ka jingpyntreikam jong ka Sorkar NDA ba la ïalam da ka BJP ïa ka CAA kaba la pynmih ïa ka Rule ha ka Lah sngi u Blei mynta ka taiew.U Bah Adrian ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba ka Congress ka ieng pyrshah ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka CAA ha ka ri baroh kawei shwa ban wan ka elekshon Lok Sabha khnang ban phiah arliang ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka ri ha ka kyrteng ka niam.Une u nongïalam ka MPYC u la pynrem jur ïa kane ka jingleh jong ka BJP bad ong ruh ba ki paidbah ka ri baroh kawei ki dei ban pyrshah jur ïa kane ka buit jong ka BJP.
title: PYRSHAH CAA 6 NGUT KI DKHOT CONGRESS HAKHMAT KA OPHIS BJP

content: Uwei u samla uba la tip kyrteng kum u Kyrshandame Talang, 29 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Mupliang, West Jaintia Hills District u la shah pyniap dusmon ha ki runar ki bym lah ban ithuh ha ka shnong Mosdai, kaba don markhap bad ka shnong Mukhla bad Myrjai bad ia ka met ba la shah sloit lyngkhuid la lap ha ka 12 tarik u Lber, 2024 najan ka lyngkha kaba don ha ka shnong Mosdai.Katkum ka ejahar ba la mudui sha ki Pulit jong ka Ummulong Police Beat House, West Jaintia Hills District da ka kmie ka Kong Lakmon Talang, ka la ong ba u khun jong ka, u Kyrshandame Talang ha ka 10 tarik u Lber, 2024 u la iadih kiad lang bad la ki paralok ha kawei ka dukan kaba don ha ka shnong Mosdai bad u la mih shwa marwei na dukan kiad khlem da iathuh ia la ki paralok.  Hynrei ha ka 12 tarik u Lber, 2024 la lap ia ka metiap jong u na ka lyngkha kaba jngai kumba 500 mitar na ka dukan die kiad.Ka Kong Lakmon Talang ka la kyrpad ia ki bor Pulit ban tohkit bniah bad ban thwet ia ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam bymman bad ban pynshitom ia ki katkum ka ain.
title: SHAH PYNÏAP DUSMON U BAH KYRSHANDAME TALANG HA KA SHNONG MOSDAI

content: Uwei u nongtuh uba ym shym la ithuh durkhmkat satia ha ka step phyrngap sngi Palei ha ka por 3:20 mynstep u la prong tuh ha kawei ka ing ha ka shnong Mawlai Phudmuri, khlem jingsalia wat haba ha phyllaw la pyndait da ka CCTV.Na phyllaw jong kane ka ing, une u nongtuh u la ïoh rong ei ïa u Battery kali bad lyngba ka CCTV la ïohi ba une u runar u la pyrshang shwa ban khynra ïa kiwei pat ki kali hynrei um shym la lah hynrei hadien u la leit rung ha kawei ka kali kamai bad ïoh rong ei ïa u battery kali.U nongñiah jong ka kali ynda u la khie thiah mynstep bad thmu ban leit kamai hynrei haba u la pyrshang ban pynim ïa ka kali kam shym la long satia bad ynda u la peit shapoh u la lap ba u Battery kali u la shah tuh.Kane kan long ruh kum ka khubor sha ki briew kiba ju set kali sha surok ne wat ha iing ba kin da phikir bha shwa ban set khnang ban lait na ka jingshah tuh ki tiar kali namarba ka jingjyllei jong ki nongtuh ha kine ki sngi ka long kaba shyrkhei bha.
title: DANG STEP PHYRNGAB PRONG U NONGTUH HA MAWLAI PHUDMAWRI

content: U Commissioner ka tnat Transport ka Sorkar Jylla Bah E. Kharmalki ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la maham ïa ki paidbah kiba ju shong da ki Rapido kin hap ban shim hi ïa la ka jong ka jingkitkhlieh namarba kane ka Kompeni kaba na Bengalore, Karnataka kam pat don satia ïa ka Permit ba la ai da ka tnat Transport ka Sorkar Jylla ban kit ïa ki nongleit nongwan hapoh kane ka Jylla Meghalaya.“Haduh mynta ki dang don tang ar tylli ki Aggregator kiba la ïoh Permit, ka JETS 24×7 bad ka NE Rider ban kamai da kaba kit ïa ki paidbah nongleit nongwan,” ong u Bah Kharmalki haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor.“Ka Rapido ka ïoh ïa ka Temporary License na ka bynta 6 bnai namarba ha kato ka por ka Aiñ bad ka Rule kam pat don bad mynta ïa ka Rule la pynbna paidbah bad ki la tip ba ka Rule ka la don bad ki la sdang ban aplai ïa ka Permit,” u la ong.“Ngi dang wad uei u briew uba pynïaid (ïa ka Rapido) bad ngin sa phah Show Cause Notice ïa u bad ban pynduh noh ïa u App jong ki.  Mynta u App jong ka Rapido u don lut ha ka kti jong ki paidbah ha ki Mobile Phone bad lyngba kane ka khubor  ki paidbah kin tip ba lada ki dang leit jingleit da ka Rapido kin hap ban shim hi ïa la ka jingkitkhlieh bad kano kano kaba jia eiei ïa ki kin hap ban kitkhlieh hi,” la maham u Commisioner Transports bad bynrap, “mynta ngi don ïa ki Aggregator ba la ithuh da ka aiñ kiba don ïa ki GPS Device kiba ngi lah ban tohkit shaei ki leit ki wan.”Haba kylli, ula pynshai ruh ba ka jingbym lah ban khanglad ïa ka Rapido naduh ki snem baladep ka long namarba ka Sorkar kam pat shna ïa ka Rule.Halor ka jingpynrung ïa ki nongniah thuk thuk hapoh ka Rapido u Commissioner ka tnat Transports u la ong, “ngi la ïoh jingtip halor kane bad ngin sa tih bniah kaei kaba jia bad lada donkam ngin hap ban mudui da ka ejahar bad ban pynshitom.”U la ïathuh ruh ba u la lum jingïalang ïa ki Aggregator ba kin ïoh pynrung briew kham bun bad ba ki paidbah kin dup tip ba ki don ki License Bike Taxi.  Ïa mynta kiba la ïoh permit kum ki Bike Taxi ki dei ban don ïa ka Number Plate rong stem bad ki hap ban da tah ïa ki Sticker Bike Taxi ha ki thuk thuk.  Ki dei ban don ruh ïa ka Mobile App. Ynda ki paidbah ki la tip shaphang ki Bike Taxi, ki Traffic Police bad ki Pulit Enforcement kin sa leh ka kamram. Kine ki kynhun ki dei ban don ïa ka Transport Permit ba ki lah ban kit ïa ki nongleit jingleit.“Ngin sa pyntip paidbah ba ki la don ki Aggregator kiba la ithuh da ka aiñ bad ngin sa ai notis ïa kito kiba shu ïaid beain bad lada ki kwah ban kamai jakpoh ki dei ban wan rejistar kum ki Aggregetor lane ki lah ban rejistar ïalade hapoh kine ki Aggregators kiba la don lypa,”u la ong.“Kino kino (kiba kwah kamai) ki lah ban ïoh ïa ka laisen, ki lah ban wan shakhmat ban ïoh laisen bad kito kiba ju mlien ban kamai be-ain ki lah ban pynïasoh noh ïalade bad ki Aggregator kiba la don lypa ban ïoh ïa ka laisen.  Hadien kata, hapoh 10 ne 15 sngi ngin sa pyni da ki kam ban leh pyrshah ïa kito kiba shu kamai beaiñ,” u la bynrap.“Ngim kwah ban pynduh jakpoh ïa ki briew, hynriew ka jingkamai jakpoh ka dei ban long da ka lynti kaba ki paidbah nongleit nongwan ruh ki dei ban shngaiñ,” u la ong.
title: KINO KINO KIBA SHONG DA KI RAPIDO KIN HAP SHIM HI ÏA KA JINGKITKHLIEH: COMMISSIONER TRANSPORT

content: : Ïa ka kot kaba la thoh da u Bah Daniel Stone Lyngdoh kaba la ai kyrteng, “Aiu ngin leh ha jingim ba tang shisien? la pyllait paidbah ha ka sngi Thohdieng ha phyllaw ing sah jong u Wickliff Syiem u Syiem Khynnah ka Hima Nongstoiñ ha ka shnong Rajai, Bangladesh.Ha kane ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid da u Romesh Juwel Sohlamar ha ka ktien Lyngngam, la sakhi lang da kiba bun ki Khasi bad kiwei kiwei ki jaidbynriew kiba shong basah ha ka ri Bangladesh kynthup ruh ïa i Meiieid Relimai Sohlamar iba la kynjoh 93 snem ka rta.U Bah Daniel u la thoh ïa kane ka kot ha ki 48 sngi ha jingïaid lynti jong u ha baroh kawei ka ri India bad ha ki ri kiba marjan bad ka Ri India.U nongthoh u la ïathuh, “ ïa kane ka kot la thoh da ka sur khot kaba U Blei U la kren ha ka mynsiem jong nga ba dei ban thoh ïa kane ka kot bad khlem ka jingkhot jong U Blei ym lah ban thoh bad ym ban pyndep ïa kane ka kot.  U Mynsiem jong U Blei U kren ba dei ban thoh ïa kane ka kot, Aiu ngin leh ha jingim ba tang shisien?”Bah Daniel u la  ïathuh ba ki don 8 tylli ki lynnong ha kane ka kot kaba khot bad wer ban tip aiu kum ki briew ngi dei ban leh haba ngi im tang shisien. “Ngin ym lah ban wan phai arsien ha kane ka sla pyrthei.  Ka kot ka ïathuh ba ka don ïa ki jubab kiba ngi dei ban leh,” u la ong.U nongthoh u la kyrken ba ka jingmih paidbah jong kane ka kot kan leit sha ka bai kot jong ki khynnah ki baduk kiba pule ha ki skul bad ki Kolej.U Bah Andrew Joel Sohlamar uba dei u Organising Secretary jong ka Bangladesh Indigenous People’s Forum (BIPK) bad u khun ba nyngkong jong u Wickliffe Syiem haba kren kum u kongsan ha ka jingpyllait paidbah ïa kane ka kot u la ong, “kane ka kot ka don ha ka ïa ki saw tylli ki bynta, ba kynthup ïa ka jingieid ïa ka niam ka rukom (Religion),  ka jingieid ri (Nationalism), ka jingieid ïa la ka jait ka kynja (Tribe) bad ka mynsiem riewshlur (Patriotism).”“La ngi don ha ki niam ki bapher bapher hynrei ka niam ka dei ban buh nyngkong ïa U Blei. Watla ngi don ha kino kino ki bynta jong ki Ri ka pyrthei ngi dei ban burom ïa ka Lama jong kata ka Ri kaba ngi don la ngi don ha India, ha Bangladesh, ha England bad ha kino kino ki Ri ngi dei ban burom ïa kata ka Ri kaba ka Lama jong kata ka ri ka kaweh. Ngi dei ban tip ïalade ba ngi dei na kano ka jaidbynriew bad kum ki Khasi kim dei ban klet ïalade ba ki dei ki Khasi bad ki dei ban ieid ïalade bad ki dei kiba ai jait sha ka kmie kaba dei ka kynthei bad u bym ai jaid sha ka Kmie um dei u Khasi.  Ki dei ban burom ïa ki riewkhraw ka jaidbynriew Khasi kum u Tirot Sing, u Kiang Nangbah, ka Phan Nonglait bad u Wickliffe Syiem kiba don ïa ka mynsiem ban ïada ïa la ka jaidbynriew ba ka pateng kaba mynta jong ki samla ki dei ban don ïa ka mynsiem riewshlur ba ki dei ban ïada ïa la ka jaidbynriew,” la ong u Bah Andrew
title: HA PHYLLAW ÏING U WICKLIFF SYIEM LA PYLLAIT ÏA KA KOT, “AIU NGIN LEH HA JINGIM BA TANG SHISIEN?”

content: U MLA ka BJP Bah Alexander L.Hek uba dei ruh u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla u dei uwei napdeng ki san ngut kiba pan ïa ka tiket na ka BJ ban aireng na Shillong parliamentary Seat.Ka party ka la phah ruh ïa ka kyrteng jong ki hynriew ngut ki nongpan tiket na Tura Parliamentary Seat sha ka Central Election Committee jong ka BJP.Haba pyntip ïa kane ha ka sngi Thohdieng, u State President ka BJP Rikman G. Momin u ong, “ngi ladep phah ïa ka kyrteng jong kine kiba pan tiket sha ki bor bahalor ka party. Mynta ka shong sa ha ka party ïano ka ibit ban pynieng kum ki kyrtong na Shillong bad na Tura.”Nalor u Bah Hek, u Momin u la ïathuh ba kiwei pat kiba la pan tiket ban aireng na Shillong Seat ki kynthup ïa ka Dr. Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait, u State President barim ka BJP Bah Ernest Mawrie, u President ka BJYM Bah Mewaker Lyngdoh bad ka Kong Sumitra Laloo.Na ka bynta ka Tura Seat, ki nongpan tiket ki kynthup ïa u MDC ba mynta jong ka Tura u Bernard N. Marak, ki MLA barim ba kynthup ïa u Winnerson D Sangma bad u K.C Boro, u MDC barim u Boston Marak,Ria Sangma bad u Thomas Marak.Haba kylli, u Momin u la ong, “ngim pat tip (lano kin pynbna ïa ka kyrteng jong kyrtong) hynrei ka thup kyrteng kaba lai kan sa mih noh shen.”Shuh shuh, une u nongïalam ka BJP u la ong ba ka party ka long kaba la pynkhreh ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon. Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka party ka la pynsdang ruh ïa ka jingïalap elekshon.
title: PAW KYRTENG U BAH AL HEK NAPDENG SAN NGUT KIBA PAN TIKET MP NA SHILLONG SEAT

content: The strawberry fields of Meghalaya beckon one and all as the state is all set to host the “Strawberry Festival” from April 5 to April 13 across the state which is in line with the state’s efforts to promote Agro- tourism.The festival is being held through a collaborative initiative by the Department of Tourism and Department of Agriculture and Farmers’ Welfare.It may be mentioned that the Directorate of Horticulture has undertaken large scale plantation of strawberry under various central and state programs.The harvest season for strawberry has begun and the vibrant strawberry fields in the villages of Syntung and Nohron in East Khasi Hills, Umktieh and Sohliya in Ri Bhoi, Baladinggre, Darechikgre, Durakantragre in West Garo Hills will organise the Strawberry Festival.The other attractions of the festival are strawberry picking at the farms, wine tasting, jam making, glamping in the strawberry fields, live music, cultural performances. Strawberry saplings will also be up on sale.With an intention to push for local business hubs in the rural areas, the festival will enhance the visibility of the State’s agro tourism potential.
title: STATE TO CELEBRATE LUSCIOUS STRAWBERRIES WITH “STRAWBERRY FESTIVAL”

content: Ka North East Students’ Organisation (NESO) ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka la ujor hakhmat ka Ïingbishar Supreme Court ka ri India pyrshah ia ka Rule jong ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act 2019 bad kyrpad ruh ia ka Ïingbishar Supreme Court ban pynmih da ka hukum kaba pynsangeh ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Rule jong kane ka aiñ.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ka NESO ka la ujor hakhmat ka Ingbishar Supreme Court ha ka 19 tarik, Nohprah, 2019 pyrshah ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019.Watla ia kane ka ain la pyllait ban pynjari ha ki jylla ba la shah kdup ha ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ba kynthup ia ka jylla Mizoram, Nagaland bad Manipur bad kumjuh ruh ha ki jylla ba hap hapoh ka Khyrnit Bahynriew ka Riti Synshar ka  Ri India ba kynthup 98% ha ka jylla Meghalaya, 70% ha ka jylla Tripura bad ha ki 8 tylli ki District jong ka jylla Assam hynrei ha ki 27 tylli ki District jong ka jylla Assam ym shym la pyllait satia.Ka NESO ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Chairman u Bah Samuel B. Jyrwa ka la ong ba kane ka la buh jingma ia ka thain Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei ha ki sngi ki ban sa wan.Ka NESO ka ong shuh shuh, na ka bynta ban iada ia ki jaidbynriew ritpaid ka thain shatei lammihngi kiba la shah ktah na ka jingwan rung kyrthep jong ki mynder ri na ka ri Bangladesh, la donkam ba ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act 2019 ym dei satia ban pyntreikam namarba kan nang pynsniewdur shuh shuh ia ka jinglong jingman jong ka thain Shatei Lammihngi.Ki nongialam jong ka North East Students Organisation (NES0) ha ka lah sngi U Blei ki la poi sha nongbah New Delhi hadien ba ka Ingbishar Supreme Court ka la buh sngi ban shong bishar ha ka 19 tarik, Lber 2024 ia ka mukotduma jong kane ka kynhun hadien ba ka la ujor ia ka jingpynlong aiñ jong ka Sorkar India ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019 bad pynmih ruh dang shen ia ka the Citizen (Amendment) Act Rules, 2024.Ia kane ka kynhun la lamkhmat da u Chairman u Bah Samuel Jyrwa ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Adviser ka NESO u Samujjal Bhattacharjya, u President ka Khasi Students Union (KSU Bah Lambokstarwell Marngar bad kiwei kiwei.Dang shen ki kynhun kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka NESO ki la thang ia ka Citizen (Amendment) Rules, 2024 ha baroh kawei ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi hadien ba ka Sorkar India ka la pynmih paidbah ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai.
title: UJOR KA NESO HA SUPREME COURT, KYRPAD BAN PYNSANGEH ÏA KA CAA, 2019

content: KAM DEI KA JINGPYNKUPBOR, ONG U BAH PALAShillong, Lber 17: U nongïalam ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala uba long u MP na Shillong u la ong ba ka jingshim rai jong ka National People’s Party (NPP) ban pynïeng da ka Dr. Ampareen na Shillong bad ka Agatha Sangma na Tura kam dei satia ka jingpynkupbor ïa ki kynthei hynrei ka dei namarba ka NPP kam don shuh da kawei ka lad.U Bah Pala u la ong ba ka Congress ka la leh kham bha ban ïa kino kino ki party haba kren shaphang ka jingai bor ïa ki kynthei.  U la ong ba ïa ka Women Reservation Policy la sdang da ka Congress bad ym da kiwei ki party.“Da kaba shu pynïeng da ki longkmie kum ki kyrtong na baroh artylli ki konstituensi nga tharai ba ka NPP kam don shuh da kawei ka lad naba ym don kiwei pat kiba la khreh ban ïakhun na Shillong.  Ki hap ban ïoh da kiwei.  Ki hap ban pynkylla ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong la palat 2 sien kumta nga tharai kam dei kaba la thmu ban pynkup bor ïa ki kynthei hynrei ba kam don da kawei pat ka lad,” u la ong.“Ka Agatha ka dei ka MP kaba mynta kumta ki khlem ai sha ka kynthei bad ki la dep ai lypa ïa ka mynshwa. Kumta phi peit ha kata ka laiñ ka Congress ka kham long ka seng kaba khambun ban pynkup bor ïa ki kynthei ban ïa kino kino ki party,” ong u Bah Pala.Lah ban pynkynmaw hangne ba ka NPP ka la pynïakhun da ka Myntri Sorkar bad ka MLA napoh ka East Shillong ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh na Shillong Parliamentary Seat.
title: BA PYNIENG KA NPP DA KA DR. AMPAREEN NA SHILLONG BAD KA AGATHA NA TURA

content: Ka la mih ka khubor mar syndep ka eksamin Secondary School Leaving Certificate ba bun ki khynnah kiba ialeh ia kane ka eksamin ki la shah shet pluk ha ka subject Social Sciences kaba khynthup ia ka History bad Geography mar 23 marks, ka Civics bad Economics pat mar 17 marks nalor ka 20 marks ka Internal Marks bad 4 marks pat ka Map katkum ka Blue Print ba la ai kopi da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) sha baroh ki skul ha u snem 2018.Hashwa jong u snem 2018, kata, naduh ka snem 2008, ka MBoSE ka la phiah ia ki jingkylli la ki jong ki jong ki subject ba ki khynnah ki dei ban jubab, kata, ki khynnah ki dei ban jubab beit ia ka History, Civics kiba hap ha ka Social Sciences-I bad ka Geography bad Economics kiba hap ha ka Social Sciences-II kin thoh la ka jong ka jong ka subject. Dei ha u snem 2018 ba ka MBoSE ka la pynkylla noh ba kin don noh ki jingkylli ban shu jied ki khynnah ia kiba dei (right answers) ne Multiple Choice Questions (MCQ) kiba kit shi mark (1 mark) kawei ka jingkylli bad ki Short Answer (SA) kiba kit 2 marks kawei ka jingkylli.Kitei ki jingkylli baroh ar jait dei ban khlehlang (mixed) ia baroh saw sobjek bad ki khynnah ki dei ban jied ne jubab tang 12 tylli na kawei-pa-kawei na kitei ki jingkylli.  Hynrei ki Long Answer (LA) pat ki khynnah ki dei ban jubab beit (mandatory) la ka jong ka jong ka subject, kata, mar lai tylli na ka History bad Geography bad mar ar tylli pat na ka Civics bad Economics.  Kane ka rukom leh kan kham pynsuk ne iarap ia ki khynnah ba kin ioh jied khnang ba ki lah ban kham pass bha.Haba phai pat sha jingkylli jong ka Social Sciences kaba mynta u snem 2024, ki jingkylli na ka Social Science-I (History bad Civics) u/ka nongset jingkylli um/kam da pynpher palat ne leh stad eh haduh katta katta lait noh katto katne. Hynrei ia ka Social Science-II (Geography bad Economics) u/ka la wanrah ka rukom set jingkylli kaba iapher bak-ly-bak na ka rukom set jingkylli kaba mynshwa (existing system). U/Ka la iaid lait ia ka nuksa jingkylli (sample questions) jong ka MBoSE ba dei ban kham bun ki jingkylli ban set na ka kot pule (Text book) jong ki khynnah bad tang khyndiat eh ki jingkylli dei ban pynpher tang ban ithuh ia ki khynnah ba proh jabieng (talented students).  Lada shu pynpher lut ia ki jingkylli, kata, ki set tang ia ki proh jabieng khlem pyrkhat shuh ia ki khynnah ba shu pdeng (average students) bad ki khynnah ba kham duna( below average students).Ha kamra class, kin don eh 10/15 percent ki proh jabieng katba 90/80 percent ki dei ki Average bad Below Average Students. Ki dei kine kein kiba kylla ‘langknia namar kim lah ban thoh ne jubab hi na la ka jingstad lade (common sense).  Wat lada set jingkylli thik na kopi ne na kot pule jong ki ruh, bun kim lah bad bun kiba phiel.  Katno tam lei lei lada pynpher ia ki jingkylli na kiba la ai. Hynrei, kiba kham shah ktah eh ha ka Social Sciences mynta u snem 2024 ki dei ki khynnah bym leit skul (private candidates) kiba ju shaniah ia ki jingkylli barim (previous question papers) bad ki shaniah ruh ha ki Help Book kiba ki thied na iew na hat (bazar notes). Kine kin long ki ‘langknia ba shyrkhei (worst affected victims) ia ka subject Social Science mynta u snem 2024.Nangne shakhmat, lada ka MBOSE ka kwah ban pynkylla ia ki rukom set jingkylli, ka dei ban ai jingtip (notify) sha baroh ki skul khnang ba kin tip ban hikai ia ki khynnah ha Classroom katkum kata ka Model jong ka rukom set jingkylli, ym ban shu set katba mon katba kwah.  Bun ki nonghikai ki dang hikai da ka rukom set jingkylli kaba rim (existing system) ha une u snem 2023 ba ladep namar ym pat don satia kano kano ka jingpyntip thymmai (new notification) ka ban pyniap noh (supercede) ia ka system kaba ju leh.Lada ka MBOSE ka iai mlien ban iaid lait ia ki kyndon (guidelines/criteria) ba ka la bthah hi, kata,kan kylla long ka nongpyniap ba jarjar (silence killers) namar kin nang jur shuh shuh ka jingpep skul (drop outs) shiteng por jong ki khynnah.Nalor ba ka Meghalaya ka la poi lypa sha trai (bottom) ha ka liang ka thoh ka pule ha ri India, nangne shakhmat kan sa kham hiar shuh shuh wat ia ka Bihar kaba dei ka Jylla kaba poi sha trai duh. Ym tang kumta, hynrei nangne shakhmat, bun ki skul ha sor bad wat ha nongkyndong ruh ki ban leit pyniasnoh (Affiliate) noh sha ka Central Board kum ka CBSE/ICSE, bad kiwei kiwei kumba pyniasnoh lem kiwei ki skul kum ka Pine Mount School, BK Bajoria, Army school nalor bun bah ki Central Schools kiba don ha ka Jylla jong ngi. Dei hangta kein ba ka lah ban ktah mationg ia ka burom ka ijot (prestige/credibility) jong ka MBoSE hakhmat ki ri India hi baroh kawei.
title: HATO, KYLLA ‘LANGKNIA KI KHYNNAH BA ÏALEH SSLC EXAM, 2024 HA KA SUBJECT SOCIAL SCIENCES?

content: Ki lai tylli ki sengbhalang ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la dawa ia ka Sorkar MDA ba la ialam da ka NPP ban kyntu ia ka Sorkar Pdeng ba kan pyllait pura ia ka jylla Meghalaya na ki kyndon jong ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019 bad Citizen (Amendment) Rules, 2024 bad ban pyntreikam noh mardor ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ban tehlakam ia ka jingwanrung jong ki poiwir sha kane ka jylla.Kine ki lai seng kiba kynthup ia ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC), ka Jaiñtia National Council (JNC) bad ka Confederation of Ri Bhoi People (CoRP) ki la phah da ka dorkhas sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K. Sangma ba un shimkhia ban tuklar halor kane ka jingdawa.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President ka HYC Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la ong, “ngi la kyntu ia u Myntri Rangbah ba un pynsngew sha ki tyndong skhor jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ba kan pyllait pura ia ka CAA, 2019 bad ia ka Rule ba la pynmih dang shen bad ban pyntreikam mardor da ka ILP ha ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei.”U la ong ba ka Ministry of Home Affairs, ka Sorkar India ha ka 11 tarik Lber, 2024 ka la pynmih ia ka Citizenship (Amendment) Rules, 2024 na ka bynta ban pyntreikam ia ki ain jong ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019.“Watla ia ka CAA, 2019 la pyllait ban pyntreikam ha ki jaka riewlum ka jylla, hynrei ha ka jingshisha ka Jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei kam hap hapoh ka Khyrnit Bahynriew jong ka Riti Synshar ka ri India.  Ki dang don ki jaka hapoh ka nongbah Shillong, ka nongbah jong ka jylla ha kaba ki kyndon ain jong ka Khyrnit Bahynriew kim treikam satia bad kumjuh da ki hajar ngut ki poiwir kiba shong basah,” la ong u Bah Synrem.“Ha kum kine ki khep, lada ki briew kiba sah ha kine ki jaka ki shim kabu ia ka jingbym treikam jong ka Aiñ ki lah ban rung sha kine ki jaka bad hadien kata kin sa aplai ban long nongshong shnong hapoh kane ka CAA, 2019, ha kata ka por kumno ka Sorkar Jylla kan khanglad ia ki ban ioh long ki nongshong shnong hapoh kane ka aiñ?  Hato ki don neem da kiwei pat ki lad ki lynti ban buddien ia ka jingdon jong kine ki briew kiba sah mynta hapoh kine ki jaka khnang ba yn dup lah buh jingkhein na ka bynta ki jingdonkam hadien habud,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u Bah Synrem u la ong, “ngi sngewkhia bha watla kiba bun ki jaka ha ka jylla la pyllait na ka jingshah kynthup ha ka CAA, 2019, ka Jylla kan shah ktah na ka jingwan tuid na kiwei ki jylla bad khamtam eh na ka jylla Assam. Ka jingbymdon kano kano ka ain kaba tehlakam ia ka jingrung jong ki briew kiba nabar shapoh ka jylla, ngi sheptieng ba ka jingpyllait na ka aiñ kan pulom bad ngi lah ban mad ia ki jingeh hadien habud na ka jingwanrung kyrthep jong ki briew kiba nabar shapoh ka jylla.”“Namarkata, ka lad jingiada kaba hakhmat eh ban tehlakam ia kane ka dei tang ka jingpyntreikam noh mardor ia ka ILP bad kumjuh ruh ban pyllait pura ia ki kyndon jong ka Citizenship Amendment Act ha ka jylla,” ong shuh shuh u Bah Synrem.
title: DAWA KI LAI SENG ÏA KA SORKAR MDA BAN PYLLAIT PURA ÏA KA CAA NA MEGHALAYA

content: Shillong, Lber, 18: Haduh 12 tylli ki tnum iing jong ka Seng Khasi Nongwar ki la mih shakhmat ban pynkhie im biang ïa ka Shad Suk Mynsiem hadien 50 snem.Kum ka shnong kaba u Lei Ryngkew U Lei Basa uba dang ri dang kdup dang sumar ia kane ka shnong, ka jingmih ki 10-12 tylli ki tnum iing Seng Khasi ban pynlong ia kane ka shad ainguh ai dem, lah ban ong ba ka dei ka kam shlur kaba da radbah bad kaba ai mynsiem lem ia kiwei pat ki tnat Seng Khasi.Ha kane ka jingpynkhie im biang ia ka Shad Suk Mynsiem, la wan ïashim bynta ki rangkynsai bad ki thei sotti na kylleng ka Bri Hynñiewtrep. U Riew Tymmen Riew San ka Seng Khasi Kmie u la ai ka duwai ka phirat ka nguh ka dem ha ka Ïing Seng ha ka por mysntep bad kum ka dak ba la wai ka shad la pynhiar Ïa ka lama Seng da u President ka Seng Khasi Kmie, Rgh O. Pyngrope. Shuwa kata la ïoh ruh ka jingkren ai khublei bad ai mynsiem na iwei na ki trai shnong iba la shim ka jingkitkhlieh bad kitkhia ban pynlong biang ïa kane ka Shad, I Kong Mira Dkhar.Ïa kane ka shad la ïoh ban pynlong lyngba ka jingïatreilang hapdeng ki dkhot ka Seng Khasi Nongwar, Seng Khasi Sohra Circle, Seng Khasi Kmie, Seng Khasi Mawlai, Seng Khasi Nongthymmai bad kiwei kiwei.Ïa ka shad la wan sakhi lem u Wahadar ka Shella Confederacy, U Swami Maharaj ka Ramkrishna Mission Sohra bad ki President ki Secretary, ki Rangbah bad ki longkmie na tnat Seng Khasi najan bad jngai.
title: HADIEN 50 SNEM PYNKHIE IM BIANG 12 TYLLI KI TNUM ÏING KA SENG KHASI NONGWAR ÏA KA SHAD SUK MYNSIEM

content: Ka National Health Mission ka Sorkar Meghalaya ha ka sngi baar ka la rakhe ia ka World TB Day 2024 halor ka phang, “Yes, we can end TB.”Ha ka jingrakhe ia kane ka sngi, la iashim bynta lang da u Ramkumar S Mission Director ka NHM  bad Secretary ka Health & Family Welfar, Dr. F. V. Kharshiing DHS, MCH&FW cum Joint MD, NHM, Meghalaya, Dr. J. Kharwanlang State Tuberculosis Officer bad Dr. B. Shanpru, District TB Officer East Khasi Hills, ki nongtrei jong ka R. P. Chest Hospital bad kiwei kiwei.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Ramkumar S u la ong ba ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla ki la buh hakhmat ia ka thong ban pynkut ia ka jingpang TB bad da kane ka thong la ai ia ka jingsumar kaba paka sha ki paidbah. U la ong ba dei ruh ban shimkhia bha ia ka jingpang TB bad ia kane ka jingpang yn sa lah ban pynkoit tang da ka jingsumar bapaka.U la iaiban ruh ba donkam ban leh test ia ki briew kiba shong basah ha ki shnong nongkyndong bad ha kajuh ka por u la khot bad wer ia ki nongialam jong ka Village Health Council, ki nongsumar dawai kynbat, ki jaka ai jingsumar ba kin pynthikna ban pynkut noh ia ka jingpang TB ha ka jylla bad ha ka ri.Ka State Tuberculosis Officer Dr. J. Kharwanlang ka la iathuh ba ki don 4974 tylli ki case jong ki briew kiba pang TB ha u snem 2022 bad 4812 tylli ki case ha u snem 2023. Ka jingleh test ia kiba suba don jingpang TB na ka bynta shi lak ka la kiew na ka 646 lak ha u snem 2021 sha ka 1433 lak ha u snem 2023. Ka bynrap, “watla ka jingleh test ia kiba suba don jingpang TB ka la kiew ar shah bad ka jingpyndonkam ban pyndonkam ia ka High Quality Diagnostic Tests, ka la hiar na ka 130 lak ha u snem 2022 sha ka 124 lak ha u snem 2023, kaba pyni ia ka jinghiar ka jingdon jong kiba pang TB ha ka jylla.”Ha kane ka sngi, la plie paidbah ruh ia ka C&DST Lab ka ban ai jingkyrshan ban lap bad ban sumar ia ka jingpang TB.Kum shi bynta ka jingpyntreikam ia ka National Tuberculosis Elimination Programme (NTEP), la plie ruh ia ki Regional Laboratory ha kylleng ka jylla.  Ha kine ki Lab la leh ia ka Culture and Drug Susceptibility Testing (C&DST) na ka bynta kiba don jingpang TB bad na ka bynta ki nongpang Drug-Resistant TB.
title: 4812 NGUT KIBA PANG TB HA MEGHALAYA, LA PLIE ÏA KA C&DST LAB HA RP CHEST HOSPITAL

content: Ka Ingbishar Supreme Court ha ka sngi Baar ka la buh sngi ban shong bishar haduh ka 9 tarik, Iaiong 2024 ia ka jingujor jong ka North East Students Organisation (NESO) ban pynsangeh ia ka Rule jong ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act 2019.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da ka Khasi Students Union (KSU), ka Ingbishar Supreme Court ka la iaiban ia ka rai ba la pynmih dang shen ban shong bishar la ka jong ia ka jingujor na ka bynta ka jylla Assam, ka Tripura bad ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi nalor kiwei pat ki jingujor ba la ioh pdiang na ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka ri India.Ka KSU ka la iathuh ruh ba ka Ingbishar Supreme Court ka la thung ruh ia u Ankit Yadav, uba dei u muktiar jong ka All Assam Students Union (AASU) bad ka North East Students Organisation (NESO) kum u Nodal Officer na ka bynta ki nongujor.  Ka Ingbishar ka la bthah ruh ia ka Sorkar India ban ai jubab halor kine ki jingujor shwa ka 9 tarik, Iaiong, 2024.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ki nongialam jong ka NESO ki la leit sha Delhi ban ujor halor ka jingpyntreikam ia ka  Citizenship (Amendment) Rule, 2024 bad kyrpad ia ka Ingbishar ba kan pynsangeh noh mardor ia kane ka Rule ba la pynmih dang shen da ka Sorkar India.
title: 9 TARIK ÏAIONG, 2024 YN BISHAR KA SC ÏA KA JINGUJOR KA NESO PYRSHAH ÏA KA CAA

content: Ribhoi, Lber 19 : Kum ka jingai burom bad ka jingpyrto ïa ki kam ba ki la shakri ha ka tnad Pulit hapoh ka jylla hadien ba ki la ioh ban kiew kyrdan, u Superintendent of Police ka Ri Bhoi, u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa mynta ka sngi u la pynkup burom ïa kine ki pulit da kaba pyndeng khlur hadien ba la ioh ban kiew kyrdan ha ka kam kaba ki trei kum ki pulit ka jylla.Ïa kane ka jingpyndeng khlur ne ka jingleh burom la pynlong ha ka ophis u Superintendent of Police ka Ri Bhoi ha Nongpoh, ha kaba u Superintendent of Police ka Ri Bhoi, u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa u la shim bynta kum u kongsan ban pyndeng khlur halor kane ka jingkiew kyrdan kitei ki pulit ha ryngkat ka jingdon lang kiwei ki Pulit officer ka Ri Bhoi.Nalor kito kiba la ioh ban kiew kyrdan, u Rubul Ali kum u Sub Inspector u la ioh kiew sha ka kuyrdan Inspector of Police, ki saw ngut ki head constable ba kynthup ïa u Mansih Chettri, Deepak Thapa, Amar Boro, and Suraj Gurung, ki la ioh ban kiew kyrdan sha ka kyrdan Sub Inspector bad ki Constable ba kynthup ïa u S. Arengh, I Narlong bad u C. Lyngdoh ki la ioh ba kiew kyrdan kum ki Head Constable.Ha kane ka jingpyndeng khlur ne pynkup burom, u SP ka Ri Bhoi, u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa u la ai khublie kyrpang ïa ki bad u ai ruh ka jingkitbok kitrwiang ïa ki ba kin dang kiew shaphang ha ka kam kaba ki shakri ba ki dang lah shuh shuh ban ai ka jingshakri kaba paka tam na ka bynta ki paidbah.
title: PYNDENG KHLUR U SP KA RI BHOI ÏA KI POLICE BA ÏOH KIEW KYRDAN HA RI BHOI

content: Ka Mary Our Help Training Centre (MOHTC) ka la kynjoh sha kawei ka sienjam ha ki rukom treikam jong ka ban pynïoh ïa ki lad jingmyntoi na ka bynta ki khynnah pule bad ki nongtrei da kaba plie ïa ka jaka thetkti kaba hapoh ka “The Project for the Provision of Water Supply System and Sanitation Facility” ba la bei tyngka da ka Japan Embassy ha India hapoh ka “ Grant Assistance for Grass-Roots Human Security Projects (GGP) kaba dei ka skhim kaba ai sngewbha bad kaba la sdang da ka sorkar ka ri Japan, ban ïarap ïa ka sorkar bad ki seng bhalang bym ïoh jingmyntoi ne ki non-profit organization ban pyntreikam ïa kiba bun ki jingdonkam kum ki tiar ki tar bad kiwei ki jingdonkam hapoh India.ïa kane ka prokram la pynlong ha ka sngi baar la plie da u Kodero Jiro, Counsellor of Economic Section, ka Japan Embassy ha India kum u kongsan ryngkat ka jingdonlang ka Kawato Akiko, Economic Cooperation Assistant of Japan Embassy ha India, ka Verma Yavanika, Project Coordinator of Grant Grassroot ka Japan Embassy ha India, ka Sr. Elizabeth George FMA, Provincial of Salesian Sisters, Shillong, ka Sr. Helen Puweiñ, President ka Bellefonte Community College bad ki heh ka tnat PHE Lumshyiap, Shillong.Kane ka jaka thetkti la plie da ka jingthmu ban pynbha ïa ka koit ka khiah ka khuid ka suba kaba long kaba donkam na ka bynta ki khynnah kynthei bad shynrang. Ha kane ka skhim la kynthup lang ruh ïa ki filter dih um bad ka jaka sait kti.U kongsan haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u la ong ba kane kadei ka jingïadei paralok hapdeng ki briew ka India bad ka Japan bad ka jingïateh kaban dang bteng ha ki sngi ban wan.Ka jingplie ïa kane ka jaka thetkti kaba thymmai ha Mary Our Help Training Center ka dei ka jingsakhi ïa ka jingtreikam kane ka centre ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki khynnah bad ka jingkiew ha ka pule puthi.
title: BEI PISA KA JAPAN EMBASSY ÏA KA MOHTC BAN SHNA JAKA THET KTI BA THYMMAI

content: Lai ngut ki briew ba kynthup arngut na ka shnong Mynsain bad uwei na ka shnong Nongbsap ki la shah rah tohkit ha ki Pulit ka Sohïong Out Post hadien ba arngut ki riewsniew ki la shah bom shnong ha ki paidbhur ha ka shnong Mawthlong ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep.Katkum ka jingpyntip jong u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi ki arngut lai ngut kiba la shah kem ha ki Pulit ha ka miet synnia Lah Sngi u Blei ki long u Skerling Pyrtuh, 39 snem na Mawthlong, u Traibor Lyngdoh, 30 snem na Nongbsap bad u Kyntiewnam Pyrtuh, 28 snem na Mawthlong.U SP u la ithuh ba ia kine ki lai ngut la pyllait noh ha ka por 12 baje mynsngi lyngba ka Bail Bond hadien ba ladep ka jingtohkit.“Ki Pulit ki la wan thwet hynnin mynmiet bad ki la rah arngut ki briew na ka shnong Mynsaiñ bad uwei na Nongbsap,” ong u Rangbah Shnong ka shnong Mawthlong Mynsaiñ u Bah Starwell Mawlong ha ka jingïakren bad u nonglum khubor hadien ba la wai ka dorbar.Ka Dorbar Shnong Mawthlong Mynsaiñ ka la lum da ka dorbar paidbah hadien ba ki Pulit ki la rah ïa kine ki lai ngut ki briew na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingjia ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ kaba ki Video ki la saphriang ha ka Social Media.“Ban kynnoh (ïa ki lai ngut) ba ki dei ki nongkynshoit ngim sngew ïahap.  Haba don ba hylla, ki paramarjan ki hap ban ai jingïarap hynrei ban kynnoh ba ki nongkynshoit ka long kaba bakla,” la ong u Bah Mawlong haba pynpaw ïa ka jingbym sngew ïahap hadien ba ki lai ngut ki briew ki la shah rah tohkit ha ki Pulit.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Rangbah Shnong, ki don lai ngut kiba donkti ha kane ka jingjia katba arngut kiba synran ki la shah kem ha ki paidbah bad uwei pat uba donkti ban ksih ïa ka riewkynthei u la leit phet. U la ïathuh ruh ba ki paidbah ki la pynjulor ruh ïa ka kali jong kine ki lai ngut.Haba ïathuh ïa ka jingjia kaba la lam sha ka jingbitar jong ki paidbhur ban bom shnong ïa ki arngut ki rangbah, u Bah Mawlong u la ong, “ngi ïoh jingtip ïa kane ka jingjia ba u don uwei u briew uba rung hapoh kawei ka ing u ksih, u khnoit bad u set na shyntur jong kawei ka riewkynthei kaba don san ngut ki khun bad u kurim ruh u la ieh um shym la sah lang shuh.”U la ïathuh ba kane ka riewkynthei ka la lait na ki tyrsim jong u runar da kaba dait ïa ka kti jong u bad ïoh ban pyrta jingïarap.  “Ki paramarjan tang shu ïohsngew ïa kane ki la pyntip sha nga u Rangbah Shnong.  Hynrei ynda la poi hangtei (ha ka jaka ba la jia) kato ka jingkynnoh menshohnoh ngim lah shuh ban bahkhlieh namarba ka jia ha khappud jong ka shnong (Mawthlong Mynsaiñ).  Ban ong ba ka jingjia la leh da ki nong Mawtlong ngam lah shuh ban pynshong nongrim namabar la ïakhleh lang ki paidbah kiba najan shnong,” la ïathuh u Bah Mawloong.“Ngi kum ki nongïalam shnong ngi la pyrshang ban pyllait ïa kito ki briew bad ngi la rah sha ingdorbar ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u Secretary Shnong, ki Rangbah Dong ban bishar ïa kane ka kam.  Hynrei namarba ki paidbah ki la bun da ki hajar ngut ngim lah shuh ban tehlakam namarba ki paidbah kim ailad shuh. Ynda la kham sngi leilei, ki la nang bun shuh shuh ki paidbah bad kum ki nongïalam shnong ngi la poi ha ka kut lad,” la ïathuh shuh shuh u Bah Mawlong.“Ngi la pyrshang katba lah hynrei dei tad haduh ka por ba la wan poi ki Pulit (la ïoh ban pyllait im ïa ki arngut) namarba ki paidbah ki kwah beit ban tangon ïa ki nongleh kam sniew,” ong u Bah Mawlong.“Ngi ka shnong ngi la leh katba lah ban ïada.  Ki paidbah ki la pynpra wat ïa ka Iingdorbar hynrei namar ka jingbun palat ki paidbah ki la ïoh bom bad shoh bad wat haba ki Pulit ki la ïaleh ban pyllait, hynrei ki paidbah ki knieh ban bom beit (ïa ki arngut)” u la ong bad bynrap, “lada ïa ki Pulit ruh ki paidbah kim ailad ma ngi leilei ki nongïalam shnong ha ka bor barit ngin lah leh aiu.”“Halor kane ka jingjia, ka shnong, ngim pdiang ba ka dei ka jingtharai menshohnoh. Ngim tip la u dei u nongtuh ne u nongbatbor namarba ngim ïoh shuh ban bishar. U la ïathuh ka jingjia ka dei ha ka por kumba 2:30 baje eiei,” u la ong.“Nga la pyrshang ban tem da ka lynti. Hynrei ngim tip la ka ain kan ailad neem ban thaw ïa ka jingbha,” u la bynrap.Haba kylli u la ong, “ngim pat shim ïa ka rai hynrei ynda la bishar bniah ngi kum ka shnong ngi la ai jingïarap ban ujor ejahar khnang ba ka lanot riewkynthei kan ïoh ïa ka hok.”
title: RAH TOHKIT KI PULIT ÏA LAI NGUT BA SHAH BOM SHNONG ARNGUT HA MAWTHLONG

content: U MLA ka VPP na North Shillong Constituency u Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la ong ba kum nongmihkhmat jong ki paidbah u la ïai kyntu ïa ki tnat treikam jong ka sorkar jylla kum ka tnat sam um ne ka PHE bad kumjuh ruh ka Shillong Municipal Board ba kin sngewbha ban trei minot namar ka kamram ka long ba dei ban ai ka jingshakri ka babha ïa ki paidbah khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ka umbam umdih.U la ong ba ka um ka dei ka jingim bad ka jingïap jong ki paidbah bad khlem ka um yn ym lah ban im hynrei khlem ka bam la kumno kumno dang ïa lah ban im katto katne.“Ki tnat kin ym dei tang ban ai daw ba ka dei ka por tyrkhong, hynrei ki tnat sorkar ki don ka bynta kaba khraw bad ki hap ban shim ruh ïa ka jingkitkhlieh, khamtam ha Sor Shillong la bun tylli ki Snem ngi la mad ïa kane ka jingeh lano kum ki Nongshong shnong, ngin ïoh ïa la ka hok, ki la dei jingshisha ban kham pynthikna ba ka um ka la dei ban kham pynbha, bad ki tnat kiba dei khmih ïa ka umbam umdih kum ka SMB bad PHE ki dei ban phah ki ba dei sha field ban peit khmih ba ki don ki jaka ba ka um ka shlei bad pahuh hynrei ki don pat ki jaka ba ki longïng ki hap ban thied ïa ka um,” ong u Bah Adelbert Nongrum.U la ong ba baroh ki paidbah ki tip shai bad ka tnat PHE kadei ban pynbiang ka Source bad ka Municipal ka dei ban pynbiang ka jingsam (Distribution) ïa ka um, kumta u la kyntu ba ki dei ban trei hok bad ban ïatreilang na ka bynta ka bit ka biang jong ki paidbah ym ban ïa kynnoh ïa kawei ka tnat ïa kawei pat ne ban ïa thet kti, ki dei ban pyndep hok la ka kamram bad ka deiti ka jingkitkhlieh.
title: KA TNAT PHE KA HAP KITKHLIEH, DON KI SHNONG BA SHLEI KAI KA UM, DON KIBA HAP SHU THIED: BAH ADELBERT

content: Sa uwei u briew u la shah kem ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingjia pynbthei bom IED hapoh ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai ha Them ïew Mawlong, ong ki pulit ha ka sngi Baar.Une uba la shah kem la tip kyrteng kum u Namphyrnai Lyngdoh Peiñlang uba la 21 snem ka rta na ka shnong Peiñlang.  La kem ia une u samla na Mairang, Eastern West Khasi Hills bad la wan ïalam noh sha Shillong ha ka lah Sngi u Blei.“Da ka jingïarap jong ki Pulit ka Mairang bad ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi, ngi la ïoh kem sa uwei uba la shah suba jur halor kane ka jingjia,” ong u SP ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi.U la ïathuh ba une uba la shah kem u donkti bha bad ki dkhot ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC).Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai, u Tarson Lymba uba la 58 snem ka rta, uba dei u nongïalam ka seng HNYF, u la shah kem napoh Dawki katba ïa u Ebakordor Nongpluh ba la 26 snem ka rta na Shillong na ka thaiñ Malki ha kaba ïadei bad katei ka jingjia shah pynbthei bom.Shuh shuh, ki Pulit ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai ki la pynpulom ïa ka kynhun barieh (Sleeper Cell) jong ka HNLC kaba la pyrshang ban pynbthei bom IED biang hapoh Sor Shillong bad Nongpoh.Kumba 4 ngut ki dkhot ka kynhun ki la shah kem napoh ka thaiñ Ri Bhoi district. Ia ki la ithuh kyrteng kum u Damanbha Ripnar ba ju khot sin u Shall Lapang, u Robinis Ripnar, u Jill Tariang bad u Shining Nongrum.Hadien kane, ka HNLC ha ka 14 tarik mynta u bnai, ka la kam ba ka la donkti ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingjia pynbthei bom IED ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai ha Them Metor, ha Them Ïew Mawlong bad ka aipor ruh shi bnai ïa ka sorkar jylla ban pynkynriah noh ïa ki 342 tylli ki longïng kiba sah hapoh ka Sweepers’ Colony.Haba kylli, u SP u la ong ba ki Pulit ki la pynkhlaiñ bha ïa ki bor pahara hapoh ka nongbah Shillong bad ha kylleng jong ka district.
title: KEM KI PULIT SA UWEI UBA SUBA DONKTI PYNBTHEI BOM IED HA THEM METOR ÏEW MAWLONG

content: Shillong, Lber 20 : Ka jingtrei borbah jong ka Green-Tech Foundation mynta u snem kan long da shisha ka khubor jingkyrmen ia u paitbah ka sor shillong bad khamtam eh ka khubor shaka sorkar ba lada don ka mon bad jingkithlieh yn ym don jingeh ban pyn kylla dur iaka Wah umkhrah bad ka Wah Umshyrpi ne ki wah ba jaboh hapoh ka Jylla watla lada kan shimpor ruh.Bad ia kata lah ban sakhi bha hadien ka jingwan hap u slap mynta ka step jong ka 20th March, 2024, ia ka jing lang bad shah khang lynti jong ki jaboh bad ki nuit ka lah nang ishyrkhei kaba lehse ym duna iaki 50 tons ei ei. Ia ia kine ki jaboh ka foundation kan sa kit noh Shen.Ka Green-Tech Foundation ka lah sdang bad dep ban pyni daki kam bad hiar hapoh Wah Umkhrah naduh ka 4th March, 2024, kata ha ki bynta ba sharum jong ka jingkieng Seng Khasi College da kaba buh daki ki ‘terminal point interceptor’ kynthup ia ki ‘Floating Barriers’ bad ki ‘Trash Plastic Wire Mesh’ ban khanglad iaka jingtuid jong ki nuit bad ki jaboh ban tuid sha pung umiam naduh.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba hadien ba ka GTF ka lah buh ia ki tei ki Terminal Point Inceptors, ha ka 9th March, 2024 ka kynhun ka lah hiar ban kit ban tong noh da ki phew tons u nuit da kaba pyndonkam da ki lieng, ki tyngsong, bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar ban pyndonkam trei bad ber ruh da ki dawai khniang ban lait na kino kino ki jingma haba pynkhuid.Ha 9th March 2024 ka GTF ka lah ioh ban kit Palat da ki 7 tons ki nuit kata tang hadien shi taiew ba lah ker kut ia ka jingtuid ki nuit bad ki jaboh.
title: DA KI SPAH TONS KHANG LYNTI KA GREEN-TECH IA KI NUIT KA SOR SHILLONG BAN TUID SHA PUNG UMIAM

content: Ki Pulit jong ka kynhun Anti Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) ka East Khasi Hills District ba la lamkhmat da ka Kong Sandra Nongdhar, MPS, hadien ba la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ha ka sngi Balang ki la iohkem ia ki arngut ki snar khaii drok na ka shong Happy Valley kaba hap hapoh ka Madanryting Police Station.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi, ki arngut ki snar khaii drok ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Joshua Khiangte Tripura uba la 36 snem ka rta na uba na ka nongbah Aizawl, Mizoram bad uba sah mynta ha ka shnong Damchhara, Tripura. Katba uwei pat u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Joel Tripura uba la 29 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Kachharichara, Damchhara, North Tripura.Na kine ki arngut ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup 11 tylli ki synduk thep sabon ba don ia u drok Heroin uba khia 139.98 gram, kawei ka Aadhar Card, kawei ka PAN Card, kawei ka Mobile Phone bad kawei ka kali Tata Sumo kaba don ia u nombar ML 05 N 0515.Ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh ka NDPS Act bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: SHAH KEM ARNGUT KI SNAR KHAÏI, KURUP KI PULIT HADUH 139.98 GRAM U DROK

content: Ban pynsah jingkynmaw ia ka jingiaid lynti kaba 46 snem jong ka seng, ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Mawlai Circle ha ka sngi Balang ka la aiti ia ka ïing ba ka seng ka la pynshna monsngewbha sha ka Kong Regina Jyrwa, ka longkmie kaba don khun 10 ngut bad kaba im kamai jakpoh da kaba shu bylla sngi ban pyndap pynbiang ia ka iing ka sem bad ia ki khun ki kti.Kaba sngewtynnad shuh shuh ka long ba ia ka jaka ba la shna ia ka iing kaba saw kamra la ai sngewbha da ka Kong Streamlet Kharbhih.Ia kane ka ing, la plie paidbah da u General Secretary jong ka KSU  Central Executive Council u samla Donald Thabah ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki nongïalam ka seng, ki nongïalam jong ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia and Garo Peoples (FKJGP), ki longkpa bad ki longkmie jong ka Block-X ka Mawlai Nongkwar, Shillong, u Rangbah Shnong ka Mawlai Nongkwar Bah M.Rumnong, Secretary shnong Bah Ezekiel, Vice President ka KSU CEC Biangbor Paliar uba dei ruh u President ka KSU Mawlai Circle bad kiwei kiwei.Ha ka khyllipmat ba ka Kong Regina ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ia ki jingleh bha jong ka KSU, ka la jaw da ki ummat kiba kmen bad ha kajuh ka por ka la ai khublei kyrpang eh ia ka Kong Streamlet kharbih kaba la ai sngewbha ia ka jaka ban shna ia ka nongrim iing.Ha kane ka sngi, ka KSU Shillong Mihngi Circle ka la noh synñiang da ki Laptop bad Computer sha ka skul jong ka Dorbar Shnong Nongmensong hapoh ka jingialam jong u Finance Secretary samla Khrawbor Kharkongor bad u Education Secretary samla Jeremaiah Pohthmi.Ka jingnoh synniang jong ka seng ka long ban iarap ia ki khynnah kiba pule ha kane ka skul.La pdiang ia kine ki jingai sngewbha na ka KSU synniang da ka Principal jong ka skul ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki nonghikai.
title: PYNSHNA ÏING KA KSU MAWLAI CIRCLE ÏA KA RIEWKYNTHEI KABA DON 10 NGUT KI KHUN

content: Shwa ba ka Jylla Meghalaya kan leit sha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik Iaiong, 2024, ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la iakynduh mawsiang hadien ba ki nongïalam bahakhmat na Ri Bhoi District ki la shim ia ka rai ban dkhat noh ia ka jingiadei kam bad ka party.Ki nongïalam ba hakhmat eh ka UDP ha Ri Bhoi kiba la rai ban mih noh na ka UDP ki kynthup naduh u President ka District u Bah Donbok Khymdeit uba long ruh u Working President jong ka UDP Central Body, Bah Raphael Massar Chief Adviser UDP Ri Bhoi District, Bah Rangkynsai R Makdoh  Adviser UDP Ri Bhoi District, Kong Queen Mary Rymbai Jt. Secretary UDP Women’s Wing State, Bah Biolkingstar Tmung Auditor UDP Ri Bhoi District, Bah Watson Kharkrang President UDP YW Umsning Circle, Bah Jeffrey Khymdeit Jt. Secretary UDP YW State, Bah Prosper Dorphang Secretary UDP YW Ri Bhoi District, Bah Rajes Lapang Working President UDP YW, Ri Bhoi District, Bah Richard Moksha Vice President UDP YW, Ri Bhoi District, Bah Kitdorius Dkhar Vice President UDP YW Ri Bhoi District, Bah Johny Marbaniang Finance Secretary UDP YW Ri Bhoi District, Bah Pril Sten Sports Secretary UDP YW Ri Bhoi District, Bah Moonstar Jarain Asst Secretary Sports Secretary UDP YW Ri Bhoi District, Bah Bishno Roy Dillar – E/C member UDP Ri Bhoi District bad ki Executive Member ka UDP Youth Wing Ribhoi ba kynthup ia u Bah Henry Mukhim, Bah Ribor Makdoh, Bah Kyrshan Lyngdoh, Bah Seibor Nongphlang, Bah Elevenson Makdoh bad ki dkhot ba kynthup ia u Bah K. Wonderful Khymdeit, Bah Ng. Rolling Mangu, Bah Browel Makdoh, Bah Wolman Sujai, Bah Billingstar Sylliang, Bah Kiswel Langi, Bah Lukas Lyngdoh, Bah Hetsing Lymphuid, Bah Bransis Shadap, Bah Wanphrang Shadap, Bah Shlur Khymdeit.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang, u Bah Donbok Khymdeit u la iathuh ba naduh kane ka sngi kim don jingiadei eiei shuh bad ka UDP bad kane ka jingshim rai ban iehnoh ia ka UDP kam don kano kano ka jingpyrshah ia ka party bad ka dei ka mon jong ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot.
title: PRA PHUM KA KTEM UDP HA RI-BHOI SHWA KA ELEKSHON MP, RESAIÑ LUT KI NONGÏALAM

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la kren diaw mynsiem halor ka jingbym kitkhia ki Politishian kiba don ha ka bor ban pyniaid ia ka synshar ka khaddar ban pyrshah ia ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019 bad ia ka Citizenship (Amendment) Rules, 2024 kaba ktah ia ka jinglong kyrpang jong ki jaidbynriew rit paid ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya bad ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi jong ka ri India.U General Secretary ka KSU samla Donald V. Thabah ha ka jingiakren iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang u la ong, “kam don ka jingshimkhia jong ki briew kiba don ha ka bor ban pyniaid ia ka synshar ka khaddar hynrei lada ngi peit ia kiwei kiwei ki jaitbynreiw lada ka iadei bad ki ishu jong ki jaidbynriew ki mih shakhmat.  Ngi iohi ba ki jaidbynriew Bodo ki iakhih ban dawa ia ka Bodo Territorial Council (BTC) bad ban dawa ban pynrung ka ktien Bodo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra, wat ki MP Bodo ruh ki la pynlong da ka jingiakhih hakhmat ka Parliament.”“Ngi iohi ia ka jingkulmar khappud hapdeng ka jylla Mizoram bad ka jylla Assam, ki MLA jong ka Mizoram khlem da khein ia ka Liang Synshar ne ka Liang Pyrshah ki hiar sha khappud hynrei lada don kino kino ki huri hura bad ki jingjia ha khappud, ki politishian jong ngi ki shu kut tang ha ka ktien, ki shu kren tang ha rynsan ialap elekshon,” la kynthoh une u nongialam ka KSU.“Ngi ju iohi ruh ba wat ha ki rynsan ialap elekshon kim ju kren hynrei ki kren pynban ia kaei kaei kaba ki shu iakynthoh bad kren bein iwei ia iwei. Kane ka long kum ka jingpang kaba ktah bha ia ka jaidbynriew jong ngi namarba ki nongialam jong ngi kim don ia ka jingkhlieh bad ka jingiohi jngai ba kin leh eiei khnang ba ka jaidbynriew jong ngi kan iai neh ha ka snap ba kyrpang jong ka, kaba ngi la long trai ha la ka jong ka khyndew ka shyiap la bun spah snem,” ong u samla Thabah.“Ka KSU, namar ka jingbym shimkhia bad ka jingbym lah jong ki nongialam bad ki nongmihkmat jong ka jylla, kam banse ban iatreilang bad kiwei kiwei ki kynhun ban mih shakhmat ban ialeh pateng la pateng bad ka KSU kan iai iakhun ban ioh ia ka jingdawa jong ka seng tad haduh ban da ioh ia ki jingdawa,” la pynpaw une u nongialam ka KSU.U la pynkynmaw ruh ba ka North East Students Organisation (NESO) ka la shong jingialang naduh u 2019 bad pynlong ruh ia ki jingpakhang shnong, ki jingthang tyngshop ban pyrshah ia ka jingwanrah ka Sorkar India ban pynbeit thymmai ia ka Citizenship (Amendment) Bill, 2019 bad ha une ujuh u snem ka NESO ka la ujor ha Ingbishar Supreme Court ban dawa ban dei ban pynduh pyndam noh ia ka CAB.“Ka don ka jingshong bishar shisien bad hynnin ka sngi ka la don biang hynrei ngi sngewkmen khyndiat ba ka Ingbishar Supreme Court ka la phiah noh ar bynta ia ki 327 tylli ki jingujor, kata, ia ki jingujor na ki jylla Rithor la ka jong ka jingujor na ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi la ka jong.“Ngi hun ba ngi iohi ia ka jingbishar namarba ha ka por ba la wanrah ia ka CAB ngi la sdang nyngkong eh na kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ia ka jingiakhih kaba jur bad ynda la mynjur ia ka CAA, 2019 ka jingiakhih ka la pur sha Rithor,” la pynkynmaw shuh shuh u samla Thabah bad bynrap, “ngi iohi ruh ba ia ki jingiakhih ba la pynlong ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka duna bha ka jingpathai khubor na Rithor bad nabar ri katba ynda pynlong ki jingiakhih sha Rithor wat ki lad pathai khubor nabar ri ki shimkhia bha.”Haba iathuh ia ka jingiapher ka jingdawa sha Rithor bad ka jingdawa ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi samla Thabah u la ong, “ka jingiakhih jong ki (sha Ri thor) ka iapher na ka jingdawa jong ngi bad ka jingtip jong ki briew shaphang ka daw tynrai ka jingiakhih jong ngi ka jah noh bad ka pynlong ba yn ym don batip ba ngi sdang ma ngi bad ki peit beit tang sha Rithor. Ka jingiakhih sha Rithor ka long ba kane ka aiñ kam long Secular namarba ha ka aiñ ym shym la kynthup lang ia kiba n aka niam Muslim kum  kita kiba shah banbein ha ka kyrteng ka niam kiba wan na ka ri Pakistan, Afghanistan bad Bangladesh.”“Ki don ruh ha Rithor kiba la kylli balei ba ym shym la kynthup ia ki phetwir Tamil na ka ri Sri Lanka bad kumta ter ter, hynrei ka jingiakhih ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kam dei namar ka Niam hynrei ka long namarba ha ki jylla jong ka thain thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ki trai ri ki long kiba rit paidbah haduh katta katta. Ngi ki khasi ngi don tang tang kumba 15 lak bad ka NESO ha ka jingujor ha Supreme  Court ka la dkew shai ba kane ka thain ka la mad jingeh bha ia ka jingshah thombor bad shah buhai shnong ha ki mynder bad dei na kata ka daw ba ka la dawa ban pyntreikam ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP),” la ong u nongialam ka KSU.“Lyngba ka jingwanrung kyrthep ki mynder ri bun ki bor synshar trai ri ki la duh noh ia ka jingsynshar shnong. Ngi iohi ba ka bor jong ki Dorbar Shnong ka la tlot haduh katta katta, ki don ruh ki jaka kiba teng teng la mihkhmat da ki bym dei ki riewlum. Kane ka jia sha Assam, bad ha Tripura bad ha ka thaiñ  Shatei Lammihngi,” u la ong.“Dei ban pynduh pyndam ia ka CAA namar ngi don ia ka khappud bad ka ri Bangladesh kaba jrong 4 hajar kilomitar tam ka dei kaba khappud basan ha ka jingjrong ha ka pyrthei. Ka jingheh paid ki briew ha Bangladesh ka poi haduh 16 klur bad tang ki Bangladeshi Hindu ki don haduh 1.6 klur. Ngi ki Khasi ngi don tang 15 lak ngut bad lada wan tang 20 lak ngut ban sah ha Meghalaya kaei ka ban jia ia ngi? la buh jingkylli une u nongialam ka KSU.Kum ban shu pyntip, ka Ingbishar Supreme Court ka la bthah ia ka Sorkar India ban ai jubab halor ki 327 tam ki jingjor na ka thain Shatei Lammihngi bad na Ri Thor pyrshah ia ka CAA bad buh sngi ruh ban shong bishar ia kane ka kam ha ka 9 tarik , Iaiong, 2024.
title: KA JINGPYRSHAH CAA HA NORTH EAST KA IAPHER SHA RITHOR: GS KSU

content: U President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) ha ka sngi Palei u la iathuh ba ka Congress ka la buh sngi ban thep kyrteng ha ka 25 tarik ha nongbah Shillong bad ha nongbah Tura.U Bah Vincent H.Pala un sa thep kyrteng ha Shillong katba u Saleng Sangma un sa thep kyrteng ha Tura na ka bynta ban iakhun ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, Iaiong, 2024.“Ngi la  buh ha kajuh ka sngi ha ka 25 tarik, Lber ban thep kyrteng ha Shillong bad ha Tura,” la iathuh u Bah Pala ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang bad ki nongialam ka Congress na ki District bad ki Block kaba la long ha Congress Bhavan ha ka sngi Palei.U la iathuh ba ka party ka la lum ia ki baroh ki District bad ki Block President, ia ki katto katne ki Secretary jong ka party ban pynsngew ia ki nongkren ki ban sa ai jingkren ha ki rynsan ialap elekshon ha ki Constituency jong ki.“Ka jingthmu ka long ban pynsngerwthuh ia ki nongkren ban batai ia ki kumno ban kren bad ym dei ban kren kulmar bad haba kren kulmar ki briew ki kyntait. Ngi la kyrpad ba kim dei ban kren kulmar bad ban beiñ ban khoh namarba ka Congress ka iapher na ki party riewlum.  Kiwei kiwei ki party ki lah ban kren katba ki mon ngi pat kum ka National Party ngi hap ban pyrkhat ia kaba mynta bad ia kaba lashai,” la ong u Bah Pala.U la iathuh ba shi bnai mynshwa, ka Congress ka la ai jinghikai ia ki District President, ia ki Block President bad ngi la ong ia ki ban kren da ka akor ka burom bad namarba ka dei ka National Election ki dei ban tip ruh ia ki jingkwah bad ki jingangnud jong ka Congress ban iarap ia ki nongrep, ban iarap ia ki nongtrei sorkar, ban iarap ia ki samla, ban iarap ia ki longkmie bad ban iarap ia ki khynnah pule bad kumta ter ter.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ba watla ka Congress kam pat pyllait ia ka Manifesto hynrei ki jingdonkam ban pynrung ha ka Manifesto ngin sa pynrung shen. “Nga dang shu wan phai na Delhi hynnin ka sngi Balang bad ngi la ioh ia ka Manifesto kaba ngin sa pynkylla ktien na ka Phareng sha ka Khasi bad ngin sa sam ia ki apil ba la leh da ka party ngi dang phah shon bad tang hapoh shitaiew ngin sa lah ban sam sha ki nongtrei ka party,” u la ong.
title: 25 TARIK LBER YN THEP KYRTENG U BAH PALA HA SHILLONG, U SALENG HA TURA

content: U President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala u la kam ba ka jingbym treh jong ka Congress ban iatreilang bad ka All India Trinamool Congress (AITC) ha Meghalaya ka dei na ka daw ba lada ki nongialam ka ATIC ki leit ban pyniasoh sha ka BJP, kan sa paw pat hadien habud ba dei hi ka Congress kaba phah ia ki nongtrei sha ka BJP.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei u Bah Pala u la ong, “ha kaba iadei bad ka jingiatreilang bad ka Trinamool Congress ym dei tang ma nga marwei ba shim ia ka rai. Ma nga bad u Bah Ronnie ngi la leit sha Delhi ban iakynduh ia ki nongialam ka TMC. Nalor kata, u Bah Charles Marngar, Bah Gabriel Wahlang, Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh bad u Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem ngi la shong jingialang bad ngi la pyrkhat bha lada ngi phah ia ki nongkyrshan jong ngi ban kyrshan ia ka TMC ha Garo Hills lashai pat lada ki (TMC) ki leit sha ka BJP, ka pyni ba ngi phah ia ki nongtrei jong ngi sha ka BJP, namarba ngi la tip shai ba ki heh ka TMC ki don ka jingiakren bad ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut bad ka BJP.”“Ka kamram jong ngi kum ki nongialam ka Party, ka long ban batai ia ki heh jong ngi ha Delhi ruh. Ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki nongialam ka TMC ha Shillong ka iapher bad ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ka TMC ha West Bengal,” la ong u Bah Pala.“Hangne (ha Meghalaya) kin sa pyniasoh bad bun kiba la khot ia ki briew jong ngi ban leit sha ka BJP. Ka jingiapher kam dei hapdeng jong nga bad u Dr. Mukul Sangma hynrei ka jingiapher ka long ba ngi ladep tip ba ki la thmu ban mih na ka TMC bad ha kawei ka sngi kin sa pyniasoh sha ka BJP. Balei ngin ngop ha kata ka jingriam jong ki. Kam dei ba nga iapher jingmut ma nga bad u Mukul,” la bynrap u Bah Pala.“Nga la lei nga la ong ia kine (nongialam ka Congress) khie leit khot ia u Dr. Mukul ban wan (phai biang sha ka Congress) bad nga kloi ruh ban ieh ia ka kam President jong ka party bad ngin ai (ia ka kam President) ha uno uno (u briew) uba u (Mukul) mon hynrei ma u (Mukul) hi u ong ba ka party Congress ka la hiar bad kam myntoi hi ruh ban phet na ka party Liang pyrshah sha ka party Liang Pyrshah bad dei ban ioh hi ia ka bor,” la kam u Bah Pala.Haba pynksan ba ka Congress kam salia lada don ha ka Liang Synshar ne Liang Pyrshah, u Bah Pala u la ong, “ngi pat haba ngi treikam paidbah ngim pyrkhat hi ruh ia kata ka Liang Pyrshah ne Liang Synshar bad lada ki paidbah ki bynshet ha ngi ia ka bor ban trei ngin trei katba lah la ngi don ha kano kano ka kyrdan.”
title: NGI LA TIP SHAI BA KI HEH KA TMC KI LA DON KA JINGÏAKREN BAD KA BJP; KYNNNOH U PRESIDENT KA MPCC

content: : Ka ophis u Commissioner of Customs (Preventive), Ministry of Finance, ka Sorkar India, ha ka sngi Palei ka la pyntip ba ka la pynjulor haduh 1019.490 kilo u Ganja bad 2.437 kilogram u drok Heroin uba shongdor T. 19.17 klur ba la kurup hapoh ka NDPS Act, 1985.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka ophis ophis u Commissioner of Customs (Preventive), Shillong ka la pyntip ba ka jingpynjulor ia u drok la leh ha ka 21.3.2024 da kaba shu thang ha ka ding da ka jingsakhi lang jong ka Drug Disposal Committee ba kynthup ia ki ophisar jong ka Customs bad DRI.Ka jingthang ia u Ganja bad u Drok la leh da ka ophis Customs da kaba pynthikna ba la buh bha bad pynjulor noh ia ki mar ba la ioh kurup khnang ba kan long kum ka jingai jingpynshai sha ki paidbah bad sha ka ri baroh kawei.Ka jingpynjulor ia u drok kan pynthikna ruh ba ka ri baroh kawei kan lait na ka jingshah teh mraw ha u drok.
title: THANG KA OPHIS CUSTOM ÏA U DROK UBA SHONGDOR T. 19.17 KLUR

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Ribhoi District ha ka sngi Palei ki la pyllait paidbah ia kawei ka video ba la ring dur ia ka jingiakren da ka mobile phone hapdeng u Military Commander ka seng kieng atiar Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) uba la tip kyrteng kum u Sanbor Pala bad uwei na kiba la shah kem ha ka jingioh kurup ia u bom IED ha Ribhoi dang shen.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police jong ka Ribhoi u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa, ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit halor ka case ba la register ha Nongpoh Police Station hapoh ka Section 120B/121A Indian Penal Code, Section 10/13/18 UA(P) Act bad ka Sec 5/6 Explosives Substance Act. Sa arngut ki briew ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit jong ka Ribhoi bad ha ka jingtohkit, ki Pulit ki la lap ba ka seng HNLC ka donkti ban pynngop ia ki samla kiba lui lui ban leh ia ki kam pyntriem da kaba buh hakhmat ia ka thong ban pyntyllun shakhmat ia ka jingdawa pisa.Ki Pulit ki la pynlong ruh ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap ksai la ki don ne em ki briew kiba la siew pisa sha kane ka seng kieng atiar bad ki Pulit ki la maham ruh ba lada kino kino ki briew ki don jingiadei kin shah kem bad shah tohkit bad yn pynngat beit hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Unlawful Activities Prevention Act.Shuh shuh u SP u la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la register case ha kaba iadei bad ka jingsieh ia ka lama jong ka seng HNLC ha surokbah National Highway ha Ribhoi District ha u Nailar, 2023 bad ia kane ka case la register ha Nongpoh Police Station hapoh ka Section 120B/121A jong ka Indian Penal Code bad ka Section 10/13 jong ka UA(P)Act.Ha kajuh ka por, une u heh Pulit ka Ribhoi u la iathuh ba ia ki kam runar jong ka HNLC la tohkit bniah lyngba ka Social Media bad na ka VO1P. U SP u la kyntu ia kino kino ki briew lada ki ioh phone call na ka HNLC  ki dei ban pyntip mardor sha ki Pulit bad ban khang noh ia ka dur bad ia u nombar ba la iakren. U SP u la ong ba la lada lap ia kino kino ki briew kiba don jingiadei bad ka seng HNLC yn kem bad ban pyngngat ha ki kyndon ain kiba eh.
title: PYLLAIT KI PULIT ÏA KA VIDEO BA BTHAH U MILITARY COMMANDER KA HNLC ÏA U DKHOT BAN PYNBTHEI IED

content: U President jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala u la kynthoh tyngeh halor ka jingkren jong u President ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) Bah Ardent M. Basaiawmoit ha kawei na ki jingialang ba ki Tymmen Basan ki donkti ban sam kiad.Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka shu ong ba ki Pastor kiba sam kiad bad kata ka lah ban wanrah ia ka jingsngew jong ka Balang baroh kawei hynrei ha ka jingshisha ka dei ban ong, ‘uei uta u Pastor, uei uta u Tymmen Basan uba leh, khnang ba ka Balang kan dup lah ban leh eiei ia uno uno uba leh. Ban shu ong u Tymmen Basan u sam kiad ka pyni ba baroh ka Balang ka sam kiad bad kam iahap,” la ong u Bah Vincent Pala ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei.“Ka VPP lada ka shlur ka dei ban ong uei uta uba leh khnang ba ma ngi ruh ngin don ka jingsngew shaniah hynrei ban shu ong u ong uta, u ong uta, ka long kamkai ki nongkren bad ka pyni ia ka sainpyrkhat jong ki,” la kynthoh u Bah Pala.“Ka sainpyrkhat jong ka BJP ka long ban kynnoh ia kiwei ki party bad dei tang ka BJP kaba hok. Ka Sainpyrkhat jong ka VPP ruh kajuh hi, tang (ma) ki bahok, baroh kiba tuh suda na kata ka daw kam iahap satia ha kane ka imlang ka sahlang jong ngi.  Ki dei ban iathuh mano ba leh khnang ba ngin sngewthuh ba ka jingkren jong ki ka long kaba dei. Hynrei ban shu ong ma nga u bahok, utei uba tuh dei ban da batai,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Pala.“Ngi sngewtynnat haba mih ki party kiba thymmai ba ki paidbah kin ioh jied hynrei mar ia mih la sdang noh ban kynnoh bad ngi sngewthuh lada tlot ka Balang bad ka imlang ka sahlang kan ym ktah tang hangne hapoh Meghalaya bad kan ktah ia baroh kawei ka ri India,” ong u Bah PalaHaba kynthoh ia ka BJP, u Bah Pala u la ong, “nga la ioh ia ki jingthoh ki breiw ki la sdang ban kren pyrshah ia ki Balang bapher bapher. Kane baroh ka dei ka saiñdur jong ka BJP ba ka la suhbuit naduh mynshwa ban kren pyrshah ia kiwei ki party, dei ban kren pyrshah ruh ia ki Balang bad ban kren pyrshah ruh wat ia ki nongialam Balang khnang ba ki briew kin duh jingshaniah bad ka imlang ka sahlang kan tlot bad kan tlot noh ka jaidbynriew. Kin ai sa u drok, kin ai sa ka kiad. Yn iohnong ki shimet ki armet, kan duhnong pat ka imlang ka sashlang. Kata ka dei ka jingma kaba ngi don kumba ka long mynta.”
title: KA SAIÑPYRKHAT JONG KA VPP KA LONG TANG MA KI, KI BAHOK, KYNTHOH U BAH VINCENT PALA

content: Ka seng Congress mynta ka don ha ka khim khait bad kam don pisa shuh ban leit ialap elekshon sha kylleng ka Ri hadien ba ka Income Tax Department ka la kurup ia ka Bank Account bad ka Party Fund jong ka.Ki nongialam jong ka seng Congress ba kynthup ia u President Rangbah u Mallikarjun Kharge, ka Sonia Gandhi , u Rahul Gandhi bad u Treasurer u Ajay Maken ki la kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ha  nongbah Delhi ban pynrem ia kane ka jingleh ka sorkar ba ialam da ka BJP bad ki la kynnoh ba ka BJP ka pyndonkam bakla ia ka Income Tax Department.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Rahul Gandhi u la ong ba mynta ka seng Congress kam don pisa shuh tang ban thied tiket ban shong rel ruh na ka bynta ki nongialam jong ka kiba leit ban ialap elekshon. U Rahul u la kynnoh ba ka jingleh jong ka sorkar ka dei beit ban khanglad ia ka seng Congress khnang ba kan ym ioh ban ialap elekshon.U Mallikarjun Kharge pat u la ong ba kane ka sorkar ba ialam da ka BJP ka la teh na kti ka kjat jong ka seng Congress khnang ba kan ym lah khih shuh. U Treasurer u Ajay Maken u la ong ba ka don 285 klur tyngka ka pisa jong ka seng Congress hapoh Account ia kaba kam lah shuh mynta ban pyndonkam, kan ym lah shuh ban pyndonkam na ka bynta ka Advertisement ne sha ki kam ialap elekshon.Ka Account jong ka seng Congress ka la shah kurup ha ka Income Tax dei hadien ba ka seng Congress kam shym la lah ban pynbiang ia ka jingkhein jong u snem 2018-2019,  ia kaba ki seng sainpyrthei ki hap ban ai jingkhein sha ka Income Tax manla u snem.
title: TANG KA BAI SHONG REL RUH YM DON PISA SHUH, KA SENG CONGRESS HA KA KHIM KHAIT

content: Uwei u nongtrei jong ka kompeni na ka jylla Uttar Pradesh la kynnoh ba u la shah rahbor na ki briew ki bym lah ban ithuh na Karukol Siju, South Garo Hills District, ong ki Pulit ha ka sngi Palei.Haduh mynta ym pat lah satia ban ioh jingtip shaphang u Akhilesh Chauhan, 50 snem ka rta uba la shah rahbor ha ka por mynstep ha ka 20 tarik Lber, la ong ki Pulit.U Chauhan u dei uba trei kum u Foreman bad kawei ka kompeni ba la tip kyrteng kum ka R.K. Singh Construction Company bad u dei uba trei ia kawei ka jingkieng ha surokbah National Highway-217 ha ka shnong Rongdik, ha Karukol kaba hab hapoh ka Siju police station.“Ka jingthwet ban lap dien ka dang bteng hadien ba ngi la ioh jingtip shaphang kane ka jingshah rahbor.  Ngi dang trei shitom ban lap dien ia u lanot,” ong u SP ka South Garo Hills u Shailendra Bamaniya.Haba iathuh katkum ka jingpyntip jong u Manager ka Compeny, u Bamaniya u la ong ba u Chauhan u la shah rahbor ha ki briew ki bym lah satia ban ithuh durkhmat kiba la rung jubor ha ka jaka trei ban wad umphniang diesel da kaba ai daw ba ka kali jong ki ka la lut umphniang.“U Chauhan katba u dang leit peit ia ka top buh umphniang diesel, u la jahrngai khlem iohi shu bad ki briew ki bym lah ban ithuh durkhmat ruh ki la jah lang,” u la bynrap.,Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ki Pulit ki la register case bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: SHAH RAHBOR U NONGTREI KA R.K. SINGH CONSTRUCTION COMPANY NA UP HA GARO HILLS

content: Shwa ba ka ri India baroh kawei kan leit sha ka Elekshon Lok Sabha sa tang khyndiat taiew, u Arvind Kejriwal uba long u Myntri Rangbah ka Delhi bad u nongïalam jong ka Aam Aadmi Party u la shah kem ha ka Enforcement Directorate halor ka jingkynnoh bamsap ha ka Liqour Policy.Ka Enforcement Directorate ka la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit halor ka jingbuhrieh ïa ka pisa bamsap kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingjia.U Kejriwal un long u Myntri Rangbah ba nyngkong eh ban shah kem naduh ba ka ri India ka la ïoh ïa ka jinglaitluid bad ka Aam Aadmi Party ka la pyntip ba u Kejriwal un dang ïai bteng ban bat ïa ka shuki Myntri Rangbah.Haba kren shabar ka iingsah jong u Myntri Rangbah ha ka sngi Palei, ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar Delhi ka Atishi ka la ong, “ngi la ïoh jingtip ba ka Enforcement Directorate ka la kem ïa u Kejriwal. Ka jingkem ïa u Kejriwal ka dei ka jingïasuhbuit da ka BJP bad u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi.Naduh ba la sdang ka jingtohkit halor kane ka Case naduh ar snem mynshwa, ka ED ne wat ka CBI kim shym la ïoh kurup satia wat tang shi tyngka ruh ha ka jingkhynra ba palat shi hajar sien ïa ki ing sah jong ki nongïalam ka AAP bad ki Myntri ka Sorkar Delhi.Haba pyntip ba ïa u Kejriwal ym pat rai pynrem, ka Atishi ka la ong ba ka party kan sa leit ujor hakhmat ka Ingbishar Supreme Court pyrshah ïa ka jingshah kem jong u Kejriwal. “Ki muktiar jong ngi ki la leit sha Ingbishar bad ujor halor kane bad ngin dawa ba ïa kane ka case dei ban shong bishar mynta hi ka miet,“ ka la ong.Ka kynhun jong ka ED ba kynthup ïa ki 12ngut ki Ophisar, ki la poi ha ingsah jong u Kejriwal da kaba rah lang ïa ka Search Warrant ha ka janmiet sngi Palei bad tohkit ïa u shwa ban kem.  Ïa ka mobile phone jong u bad jong ka kurim la kurup bad ïa ki data la shim na ki ar tylli ki Tablet bad na ki ar tylli ki Laptop hapoh ka ingsah jong u.Katba ki ophisar ka ED ki dang pynlong ka jingtohkit ïa u Kejriwal ha ingsah jong u, la pynap pahra ruh da ki Pulit ka Delhi bad ki pulit ka Rapid Action Force (RAF) bad kumjuh ruh ki Pulit CRPF.  Nalor kata, la pynjari ruh da ki jingmana shabar ka ingsah jong u katba ki nongkyrshan ka AAP ki dang ïalum shabar ka ing ban pyrshah ïa ka jingkem ïa u Kejriwal.Ka jingkem ïa u Kejriwal ka long tang hapoh shitaiew ba ka nongïalam jong ka BRS ka K. Kavitha ka la shah rah sha thanat ban shah tohkit halor ka Liquor Policy Case.  Hadien ba la kem ïa ka, u Kejriwal ha ka sien banyngkong eh, u la shah jer kyrteng kum u nongïasuhbuit halor kane ka case.
title: SHAH KEM U ARVIND KEJRIWAL HA KA ENFORCEMENT DIRECTORATE, KHIH WIN KA DELHI

content: Ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la dawa ia u President jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala ba un pynshisha halor ka jingkynnoh ba ka BJP ka kren beiñ ia ki Balang.“Ka jingkynthoh jong u nongialam ka Congress u Bah Vincent Pala pyrshah ia ka BJP ka dei ka bym nongrim bad khlem ka jingioh jingtip kaba tikna kaba long pynban kum ka jingialap election. Ka BJP Meghalaya ka dawa ia u Bah Pala ban ai kawei ka jingpynshisha bathikna halor ka jingbym burom jong ka BJP ia ki Balang Khristan lane u dei ban weng noh ia ka jingkren khlem da pynshong nongrim,” ong u kyrwoh na ka BJP.“Ka BJP Meghalaya ka la kdew bad pyni ia kiba bun kiei kiei kiba u Myntri Rangbahduh u la leh, ha kaba u la leit peit bad leit khmih ia ki ingmane bad iakynduh ruh ia ki nongialam Balang Khristan bad pyrto ruh ia ki kam babha ba la leh da ki nongialam jong ka party. Ka BJP ka pynkynmaw ia u Bah Pala ba kumno ha ki por jingleh kmen Khrismas la pynlong ia ki jingialang ha iingsah u Myntri Rangbahduh u Narendra Modi bad ia ki jingai jingkren jong u, ki jingiasoh ba sngewtynnat ia u Jisu Khrist bad ia ki jinghikai jong u. U Myntri Rangbah Duh u la ong ruh ba u Jisu Khrist  u la trei bad lum ban pynlong ia ka imlang sahlang kaba mar ryngkat, ba katjuh bad ba ai ia ka kajuh ka hok ia baroh. U la ban ruh ba kine ki jingtrei ne ki kam jong u Jisu Khrist ki long ki jingshai ba shat thaba na bynta ka roi ka par jong ka ri. La bynrap shuh shuh ba uno na ki nongialam Congress uba ju kren bad ai kum kine ki jingkren, ki jingkynpham jong u Jisu Khrist bad ia ka khubor Blei jong u? Kane ka long ka jingkylli ba ka seng ka kwah ba u Bah Pala un jubab,” la dawa ka BJP.Ka BJP Meghalaya ka pyni bad kdew ruh ba ha ki por lehkmen Khrismas ki nongialam jong ka Party ba kynthup ia u Bah A.L.Hek bad kiwei kiwei ki la pynlong ki jingleh kmen Khrismas na bynta ki khynnah bad kiba duna ha ka ioh ka kot, bad kane ka la pynsaphriang ia ka jingkmen jong kane ka samoi kylleng la kylleng, kaba long pyrshah bha ia ka jingthaw bad shna khana ba la kren kum u Bah Vincent Pala, la kynthoh ka BJP.U Nongai ktien ka BJP Meghalaya Bah Mariahom Kharkrang u la ong, “ka Congress ka la sngew tikna ba ka lad jingjop jong ka ka la nang troiñ bad hair arsut suki suki katba nang mih ki sngi bad ka BJP pat ka la nang kiew irat. Kum kine ki jingkynthoh ki dei tang ki buit bad ki lad ki lynti ban pynngeit, pynkohnguh ne ialam bakla ia u paidbah ban pyrshang ban ioh da ki vote sngewsynei ban ioh jingkyrshan.  Ki paidbah ki la iohi naduh ki por ba ladep bad kin jied bad kyrshan beit ia ka jingsynshar ba hok, kin kyrshan ia u kyrtong uba ka BJP ka la jied na ka bynta ka jingjied nongmihkhmat ka ban sa long shen.”
title: PYNSHISHA ÏA KI JINGKYNNOH BA NGI KREN BEIÑ ÏA KI BALANG, DAWA KA BJP ÏA U BAH PALA

content: Ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC) ka la bthah ia ka Meghalaya Power Distribution Development Corporation Ltd (MePDCL) ban siew bailutksan sha ki san ngut ki thei iap lok kiba la duh noh ia la ki jong ki kurim na ka jingshah bat ha ka bording elektrik kaba la jia ha ka shnong Manikganj, North Garo Hills District ha ka 25 tarik, Naitung, 2018.U Secretary ka Commission u la iathuh ba ka Commission kaba kynthup ia ki dkhot, Kong B Giri bad u Bah PJ.P Hanaman ki la shong bishar ia kane ka kam ha Tura naduh ka 19 tarik haduh ka 21 tarik Lber, 2024 ban pynkut noh ia kane ka case kaba iadei bad ka jingpynkhein ia ka hok longbriew ba la ujor hakhmat ka Commission.Ka Commission ka la lah ban pynthikna ba dei ban siew ia ka bailutkan ba kot T. 1, 00,000 lak na ka Meghalaya Power Distribution Development Corporation Ltd (MePDCL) sha ki san ngut ki thei iap lok ba ki kurim jong ki, ki la duhei ia la ka jong ka jingim na ka jingshah bat bording elektrik.Ia ka bailutksan la mang ha ka 11tarik, Rymphang, 2019 bad kane ka bailutksan ym pat shym la lah satia ban siew.  Dei lyngba ka jingshimkhia jong ka Commission, ki nongioh jingmyntoi, kiba dei na ka jylla Assam, la lah ban ithuh lyngba ki lad pathai khubor ba la pynmih ha ka jylla Assam bad ia ka pisa bailuktksan la lah ban siew sha ki thei iap lok ha ka 20 tarik, Lber, 2024 ha Tura.Ia ka bailutksan la siew sha ki lanot ba la shah bat bording la kyntiew sha ka T. 2, 50,000 lak naduh ka 22 tarik, Naitung, 2020.
title: PHAH SIEW BAILUTKSAN KA MHRC ÏA KA MEPDCL SHA KIBA ÏAP SHAH BAT BORDING

content: Ka kyrtong jong ka National People’s Party (NPP), Dr. M Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la thep kyrteng ban iakhun ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, Ïaiong mynta u snem.Ia ka Dr. Ampareen kaba dei ruh ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla la synran lang da ki nongkyrshan kiba la mih da ki hajar ngut ban ïaid kjat na ingsah jong ka na Laitumkhrah terter bad leit leh burom ia u mot sah nam jong u kpa jong ka, u Bah PG Marbañiang uba dei ruh u MP barim ka Shillong ha ki snem 1989 haduh 1996.Na Laitumkhrah, ka Dr. Ampareen bad ki nongkyrshan ki la hiar sa sha ophis treikam jong ka NPP ha Lower Lachummiere ryngkat ka khor ka khriam bad ka risa ka kynhoi.Ha ka por ba la thep kyrteng hakhmat u Returning Officer ha ophis u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills, ïa ka Dr. Ampareen la synran da u State President ka NPP Bah Prestone Tynsong, u National General Secretary ka NPP Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar kiba dei ki Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u President ka NPP East Khasi Hills Bah Gavin Mylliem, Bah Comingone Ymbon Myntri Sorkar,  Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh, Bah Wailadmi Shylla, Kong Santa Mary Shylla, Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem, Bah Fantin Lakadong, Bah Carnes Sohshang, nalor ki nongkitkam ka party kynthup naduh u Working President Bah Hamlet Dohling, Bah HM Shangpliang, u Secretary ka NPP East Khasi Hills Bah Aibor Tynsong bad kiwei kiwei.Ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba ladep thep kyrteng ka la ïathuh, naduh ka sngi ba ka party ka jied ïa ka kum ka kyrtong ka la leit jngoh kylleng ki Constituency ban lum jingïalang bad kynduh ruh ïa ki paidbah.“Nga sngewkmen ba haduh mynta ka sngi nga la dep ban leit jngoh ia baroh 36 tylli ki Constituency bad nga la ïoh ruh ïa ka jingkyrkhu na baroh ki Constituency jong ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat,” ong ka Dr. Ampareen.Haba kyntait ban kren eiei pyrshah ïa ki kyrtong kiba ïakhun pyrshah, ka Dr.  Amapareen ka la ong, “ai ba kiwei kin  kren katba ki mon hynrei kan ym pynsngew bad kan trei beit ïa ka kam ban poi sha ka thong.”Ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkmen ba ka ïoh mihkhmat kum ka kyrtong na ka NPP kaba iatreilang bad ka BJP kaba ialam ia ka Sorkar ha Delhi.U Returning Officer jong ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat u la pyntip ruh ba u Bah Peter Shallam u la thep kyrteng kum u kyrtong shimet ha kane kajuh ka sngi.
title: ELEKSHON LOK SABHA: THEP KYRTENG NYNGKONG EH KA  DR. AMPAREEN LYNGDOH BAD U BAH PETER SHALLAM NA SHILLONG SEAT

content: Ki Pulit ka South Garo Hills, ki la ïoh ban pyllait im ïa u Mechanic jong kawei ka kompeni shna surok, uba la shah rahbor ha ki runar kiba la aipor lai sngi ïa ka kompeni ban siew ïa ka pisa ba T.50 lak.Ïa une u mechanic la ïoh pyllait napdeng jong kawei ka khlaw. Une u mechanic u kyrteng u Akhilesh Chauhan ba na Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh.Une u mechanic ula shah rahbor na ka jaka shna jingkieng kaba don hajan ka shnong Karukom, Siju, South Garo Hills, myn ha ka miet 19 tarik mynta u bnai.Tang hadien katto katne kynta ba la rahbor, ki runar ki la telephone ïa ki bahaïing u Chauhan ha Uttar Pradesh bad dawa pisa  50 lak ban pyllait ïa u bad aipor ruh lai sngi ba kin aiti ïa ka pisa, k a ban kut mynta ka sngi.Ki Pulit ki la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra ha ka miet sngi Palei bad ki la lap ïa ka jaka rieh jong kine ki nongrahbor kaba don hapdeng jong ka khlaw, kaba jngai kumba 10 kilomitar na ka jaka ba rahbor.Ha kane ka jingkhynra, ki Pulit ki la ïoh kem arngut ki nongrahbor katba arngut pat ki la lait phet. Kine ki runar ki dei kiba ju don jingïadei bad ki kynhun kaikhlaw. Kiba shah kem ki kyrteng u Wilban M Sangma na Durabanda Songgital, South Garo Hills bad u Withmil S Marak na Upper Dosogre, South Garo Hills.Ki Pulit ki la register case pyrshah ïa kine ki arngut ha Siju Police Station.
title: PYLLAIT IM KI PULIT ÏA U MECHANIC BA SHAH RAHBOR NA SGH

content: Shillong, Lber, 22: Kawei ka kali Alto 800 Kaba don ia u number ML05 T 1313 kaba iaid “wrong side” na surok Kashari, najan ka DC ophis sha IGP Point ka la tynrah ia kawei ka kali Bolero Pickup kaba don ia u number ML05 AB 2210 ynda poi hakhmat ka SP Office.Kane ka la jia ha ki por 9 baje ne 9.30 baje mynmiet ka 22 tarik, Lber,2024.Ka kynhun lum khubor jong ka Batesi Tv kaba la lap ia kane ka jingjia, ka la sakhi ba ki don 3 ngut kiba shong hapoh ka kali Alto 800 uwei uba la mynsaw bad arngut ki la phet krad ialade bad ieh noh hapdeng surok ia ka kali bad ia u nongniah jong kane ka kali u bym shym la mynsaw eiei.Ha kane ka jingjia, arngut ki briew kiba shong ha ka kali Bolero kim shym la mynsaw eiei katba ki briew kiba shong ha ka kali Alto ki la buaid khawiang bad lap ruh u bilor kiad hapoh ka kali.La sakhi ba ka kali Alto ka la julor na u bumper bad ka iit ba nakhmat ka kali namar ka jingtynrah ka la long kaba jubor bha.Kat haduh ba la pynmih ia kane ka khubor ki Pulit ki la wan poi ha kane ka jaka ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah..
title: ÏAID WRONG SIDE KA KALI ALTO NA KASHARI SHA IGP POINT, SHAH SYLLAD KA BOLERO PICKUP

content: Arngut ki dkhot jong ka Garo National Liberation Council (Regroup) ki la ngat ha ka shrip jong ki Pulit ka East Garo Hills District katba ki dang leit shimti ia ka pisa ba ki la dawa na Rongjeng Reserve Forest ha ka sngi Palei.Kine ki arngut kiba la shah kem ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Predikson A. Sangma ba ju khot sin Ara, uba la 32 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Ambre A’ding, Rongjeng East Garo Hills bad uwei pat u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Setbingstar D.
