Shira ba ju khot sin Negro, uba la 33 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Nongchram Dekmik, East Garo Hills.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Garo Hills Bah S.A Rynjah u la pyntip ba ha ka 18 tarik, Lber, 2024 ki Pulit jong ka Rongjeng Police Station ki la ioh pdiang ia ka ejahar ba la kynnoh ba ki don ki briew kiba la kam ia lade kum ki dkhot ka GNLA (R) ki la telephone ia ki nongujor na u nombar bym lah ban ithuh naduh ka 15 tarik Lber, 2024 ban dawa pisa bad byrngem ruh ba lada kim siew ia ka pisa kin sa ngat ha ka jingeh.Lyngba kane ka ejahar ba la register ha Rongjeng PS hapoh ka Section 386/34 pule lang bad ka Section 16/184/20 jong ka U.A(P)Act ki la Pulit ki la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.Ha ka 21 tarik ki Pulit ki la iohkem shwa ia u Predikson A. Sangma ba ju khot sin Ara katba u dang leit shim ia ka pisa ba la dawa na ki nongujor na Rongjeng Reserve Forest. Ha kajuh ka por ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ia ka jingkhynra, ki la iohkem sa ia u Setbingstar D. Shira ba ju khot sin Negro na Rongjeng Sengma.  Ki Pulit ki dang iai bteng ruh ban iohkem sa ia kiwei pat ki dkhot jong kane ka kynhun kiba dang phetrieh na ka kti jong ki Pulit.U SP u la kyrpad ia ki paidbah ba lada ki ioh pdiang ia kino kino ki jingshah dawa pisa ki dei ban pyntip marmar sha ki thanat bad ia ki nongpyntip yn sa buhrieh noh ia ka kyrteng bad yn sa ai khusnam.
title: KATBA DANG LEIT SHIM ÏA KA PISA BA DAWA, SHAH KEM ARNGUT KI DKHOT GNLA (R)

content: Ka Organising Secretary jong ka Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP) East Khasi Hills District Kong Nibiang Sumer ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la kyntait ba ka ABVP kam don bynta eiei ruh em bad ka jingialum jong ki briew kiba kah durkhmat ba rah bad ki tiar pynmynsaw hajan ka Petrol Pump ha phyllaw ka skulbah North Eastern Hill University (NEHU), Shillong ha ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai.Kane ka nongialam jong ka ABVP ha ka jingiakren bad u nonglum khubor ka la dawa ruh ia ki nongialam jong ka North Eastern Hill University Students Union (NEHUSU), kata ia u Banpynbiang Riang bad ia u Mandor Diengdoh ban ujor sha ki Pulit lada ki lap shisha ba dei ka ABVP kaba phah ia ki briew kumba 40-50 ngut sha skulbah NEHU.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ha ka miet 21 tarik mynta u bnai ki Pulit SOT bad ka Mawkynroh Out Post ki la hiar sha skulbah NEHU hadien ba ki la ioh jingtip na ki nongialam ka NEHUSU halor ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba kah durkhmat bad kiba rah ia ki tiar pynmynsaw kiba ialum hajan ka Petrol Pump ha NEHU.Ka khubor ka la saphriang ha Social Media ba ki don kumba 40 ne 50 ngut ki briew ba la kah durkhmat bad kiba rah ia ki tiar ki tar pynmynsaw ki la rung ha skulbah NEHU ban thwet ia u Banpynbiang Riang bad ia u Mandor Diengdoh hadien ba kine ki arngut kiba dei ruh ki nongïalam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) la kynnoh ba ki la pynsangeh ia ka prokram kaba dei halor ka Indian Modern Literacy Language.  Ki nongialam ka NEHUSU ki la kam ba ynda la bishar bha ka dei ka Education Cell jong ka RSS.Ki Pulit kiba la leit sha kane ka skulbah kim shym la lap shuh ia ki briew ba kah durkhmat bad rah tiar pynmynsaw hynrei watla katta ki la peitngor bha ia ka jinglong jingman hapoh kane ka skulbah ban tem ia kino kino ki jingiakynad kiba lah ban mih ha kano kano ka por.Ka Kong Sumer ka la ong, “ha ka jingiakynduh ia ki nongialam ka NEHUSU kiba dei ruh ki dkhot ka HYC ngi shu kylli ia ki na kaei ka daw ba la pynsangeh ia ka prokram bad ki ong ba ka don jingiadei bad ka RSS. Kane ka prokram kam dei jong kiwei hynrei ka dei ka prokram jong ka Hindi Deparment hynrei ma ki pat ki pynmih ba ka don jingiadei bad ka RSS bad ba ka iadei bad ka niam Hindu. Ngi kwah ban tip balei ki Hindu kim lah seh ban long prokram?”Ka la kynthoh ruh da kaba ong, “ka jingkren jong u Banpynbiang Riang ha ka YouTube Channel ba la pynmih ha ka Batesi TV ka long thik kumba ong ba dei ma ngi kiba phah. Ngi dei tang ka seng ki samla pule bad haba ngi kwah jingpynshai ngi wan beit ha ka por mynsngi.”“Lada ki kynnoh ba dei ka ABVP kaba phah ia ki runar ki dei ban ujor sha ki Pulit hynrei ym dei ban shu kren tang ha ki lad pathai khubor. Ma ngi ruh ngi lah ban ai ujor sha ki Pulit.  Khot lang ia ki dkhot ka AVBP bad ia ki dkhot HYC ha Police Station bad sa peit ia ki Mobile Phone mano ba telephone ia kito ki runar ban wan ha skulbah,” ka la ong.Ka la ong ruh ba baroh ki briew ki tip bha ia ka jinglong jingman ha skulbah NEHU ba ym dei tang ha kato ka sngi ba ki don ki briew kiba kah durkhmat bad rah tiar pynmynsaw hynrei wat ha kiwei kiwei ki sngi ruh ka ju jia.“Tangba balei pat ha kato ka sngi ki (nongialam ka NEHUSU) ai da ka kyrteng jong ka ABVP? Lada ki don eiei pyrshah ki dei ban ujor beit da ka ejahar bad ngi lei ngi long kiba la kloi ban leh ia kata bad kim dei ki briew jong ngi,” la bynrap ka Kong Sumer.“Lada ki ong ba ka dei ka Secular University (ka skulbah bym iadon bynta eiei bad kano kano ka niam) hynrei balei pat ki pynmih ba dei ka Hindu ngim shah. Na kata ka daw, kito ki briew ki dei kiba sheptieng ia ka niam Hindu. Lada ki kwah ban pyniaid ia ka skulbah jong ki ngin wad ia ki briew jong ngi na ka skulbah ban weng noh bad kin pyniaid noh ma ki hi,” ka la ong.“Lada ki ong ba ym iadon bynta eiei bad kano kano ka niam hynrei balei kim shah ia kiwei pat ki seng ban pynlong prokram. Ka ABVP ka dei beit thik tang ka seng ki samla pule. Lada ki don jingwit ia ki nonghikai Hindu bad ia ki khynnah pule Hindu namarba kane kam dei ka NGO University hynrei ka dei ka Central University bad lada ki pharep kumta ia ngi ki dei ban ujor da ka case,” la ong shuh shuh ka Kong Sumer.
title: LADA KI PHAREP BA DEI KA ABVP BA PHAH ÏA KI RUNAR SHA NEHU UJOR SHA KI PULIT: NIBIANG SUMER

content: : Kumba 40 ngut ki dkhot jong kiwei kiwei ki party ha ka miet sngi Thohdieng ki la pyniasoh ialade bad ka seng Congress ha ka jingialang kaba la pynlong da ka Mawryngkneng Block Congress Committte ha ka shnong, East Khasi Hills District.Ia kine ki dkhot ba la pyniasoh thymmai sha ka Congress la pdiang burom da u President jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala uba long ruh u kyrtong jong ka Indian National Congress ban iakhun ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong Seat ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, Iaiong.U Bah Pala haba kren ha kane ka jingialang u la ong, “lada ngi wan ha ka por, ngin wanrah ia ki polisi khamtam eh na ka bynta ki samla. Palat lai klur kiba donkam ha ka shisnem hynrei ki briew jong ngi na ka por sha ka por kim iohkam. Ka Congress ka la trei shitom ban wad jingkheiñ bad ba ki samla jong ngi ki dei ban iohkam.”U la ong ba ka Congress ka la phaikhmat ruh sha ki longkmie hapoh kane ka jylla bad lada ka Congress ka wan ha ka bor, kan sa wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban iarap ia ki kynthei.“Nga kyntu ia phi ba phin shim ba kane ka elekshon kam dei tang ka elekshon jong u Bah Pala ne tang ka elekshon jong ka seng Congress. Ka elekshon ka dei ka kam iap kam im. Ka jaidbynriew jong ngi ka dei kaba ngim lah ban phiah da kaba ong une u Khasi, une u Garo bad une u Jaintia hynrei hapoh ka Meghalaya ngi ialong kawei. Lada ia phiah ka ioh ka kot ka ktah, ka pule ka puthi ka ktah bad kumta ter ter,” u la ong.“Ngin klet ia ka MDC, ngin klet ia ka MLA ngin iatreilang ha ka MP namarba ka ktah ha ka riti ka dustur, ka ktah ia ka kolshor jong ngi,” u la ong bad iathuh, “ha rilum Garo ka la don ka jingkylla namarba ki paralok kiba rim ki la wan phai biang sha ka Congress.“Ki shongshit ha kato ka por bad ki ong ban pynrem ia ka Congress ba bun ka bamsap hynrei ki la lap mynta ba kane ka sorkar ba mynta ym tang ba ka bamsap hynrei ka bamduh ruh. Nga kyrpad ia phi ban ngin phai biang sha ka Congress bad ngi lah ban shongshit ha ki por baladep hynrei mynta ngin phai biang ban ai jingkyrshan ia ka Congress bad ai jingkyrshan ia nga,” la kyrpad u Bah Pala.“Ma nga kum u MP nga lah ban don ki jingduna hangne hangtai,” u la bynrap.“Ka skhim kaba tang 15 klur ban pyndap ia ki 36 tylli ki Constituency kam dei kaba suk bad ong ruh ba mynta ka samoi san snem leiei haduh lai snem ki khlem ai ia ka skhim bad nalor ba la buh ka jingtyrwa wat shi tyngka ruh ym lah ban pyndonkam bad kane kam jia tang ia nga hynrei ia baroh ki MP hapoh ka ri India ki mad kumjuh,” u la bynrap.
title: NGIN KLET ÏA KA MDC BAD MLA, NGIN ÏATREILANG HA KA ELEKSHON MP: VINCENT PALA

content: Sa uwei u briew u la shah kem ha ki Pulit ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ halor ka jingdonkti ban pynbthei ïa u bom IED ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai ha Them Iew Mawlong.Haduh mynta kiba la shah kem halor kane ka jingjia ki long 4 ngut.“Ngi la kem kem ïa u briew uba saw mynta ka sngi ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynbthei bom.  (La ithuh kyrteng ïa u kum) u Sansharbha Makdoh 24 snem ka rta uba sah ha Umroi, Ri-Bhoi,” la pyntip u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills Rituraj Ravi ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Hynrei, ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia ka dang ïai bteng na baroh ki liang,” u la ong.Ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai, u Namphyrnai Lyngdoh Peinlang uba la 21 snem na ka shnong Peinlang u la shah kem na Mairang, Eastern West Khasi Hills bad la wanrah ïa u sha nongbah Shillong ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei. La lap ba u dei uwei na kiba shah suba donkti halor kane ka kam.U SP u la pyntip ba u Namphyrnai u don ka jingïadei bad ki dkhot ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC). Katkum ka jingong jong u, ki Pulit ki la raikut ban kem lut ïa baroh ki nongkam bymman kiba donkti ha ka jingïasylla, ka jingïasuhbuit, kiba donkti bei pisa.Dang ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai, ki Pulit ki la kem ïa u Tarson Lymba, 58 snem ka rta uba dei u nongïalam jong ka HNYF na Dawki katba ïa u Ebakordor Nongpluh 26 snem ka rta la kem na Malki, Shillong hadien ka jingjia bthei bom.
title: KEM KI PULIT SA UWEI UBA DONKTI HA KA JINGBTHEI BOM IED HA THEM IEWMAWLONG

content: Uwei u heprit uba dang 7 snem ka rta u khun jong ka Kong Bandari Shangpliang u la mynsaw jur namar ka jingleh torti jong ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) kaba la shu ieh khongreng ia ka jaka ba la buh ia u Transformer khlem ka jingker ha ka shnong Lempluh, Nongspung Syiemship.Kane ka la jia ha ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai katba une u heprit u dang mih ban ialehkai hajan une u Transformer.Halor kane ka jingjia, ka KSU Nongspung Circle ka la leit sha kane ka shnong bad noh synniang ia u khun jong ka Bandari Shangpliang kum ka jingiarap.“Nga dang don ha ing bad nga la phah leit lehkai ia u khun shabar, katba nga dang sait tiar nga shu ioh sngew kynsan ia ka jingbthei. Mar mar nga la mih shabar nga lap pynban ba u khun u la thiah lyndang ha madan bad ha ka por ba nga la leit shim ia u, ka bording ka la bret ia nga. Nga la pyrta jingiarap bad mar kumta la wan mih sa ki paramarjan ban ai jingiarap ia u khun jong nga,” la ong ka Kong Bandari.Na ka jingshah bat ha ka bording, une u heprit u la mynsaw na ki bynta jong ki shympriah kti, shympriah kjat bad na ki bynta jong ka shadem.Ki nongialam ka KSU ki la ong ba une u heprit u la mynsaw jur bad nalor ba u dei ruh na ka longing kaba kham duk kham kyrduh.“Ngi kyrpad ia ka Sorkar khamtam ia ka MeECL ban leh eiei namarba kane ka kam iap kam im bad ba une u heprit lyngba ka jingiarap jong ka sorkar un ioh ia ka met kaba koit kaba khiah,” la ong ki nongialam ka KSU.Ki la ong ruh ba ka seng ka la lap ruh ba kiba bun ki Transformer kiba don marjan bad shnong Lempluh ki dei ki bym ker sainar satia bad ym shym la buh bha ban iada ia ka iaid ka ieng jong ki paidbah bad la shu pyllait lyngkrang..“Ngi kyntu ia ka Sorkar ba kan shimkhia ba kan ym jia shuh kum kine ki jingjia. Manla u bnai haba wan ka Bill thang bording, ngi siew bad ngi pynbiang hynrei balei haba don kum kine ki jingjia ki khein sting bad ki shim sting kim don kano kano ka jingsuidniew bad kim pyrkhat ia ki mynsiem jong ki parabriew,” ki la ong.
title: BA TORTI KA MeECL HA LEMPLUH, MYNSAW U HEPRIT KI KTI, KA SHADEM BAD KI KJAT

content: “Lada uno uno ruh u mon ban wan nadien jong nga, ai ba un lenïalade, bad un rah ïa la ka diengphna…” Loukas 9:23.Ka pyrem ka wan ryngkat bad ka taïew jong ka jingshah shitom u Khrist bad ka dei ka aïom jong ka jingim bathymmai bad jingkyrmen. Ha kane ka aïom, ki Khristan kylleng satlak ka pyrthei ki rakhe ïa ka jingshah shitom u Khrist bad puson ruh halor ki jinghikai bad ka jingshahshitom u Khrist na ka bynta ki khun bynriew. Ha pyrshah jong ka jingther bomb kaba khlem sangeh jong ka Ri Israel ïa ka Nongbah Gaza bad ka jingkhie rasong ki kynhun shitniam Hindu ha India, to ngin ïapuson halor ka lynti jong ka diengphna bad kiei ki jinghikai ba ngi ïoh na ka.Halor ka jingther bomb ïa ka shnong Gaza, da ki million ngut ki nong Palestine ki la shem kordit bad ki la duh lut ïa ki jingdon jingem, ki kylla phetwir bad da ki phew hajar ngut ki la ïap. Kane ka dei ka jingpynïap dusmon ïa ki nongshong shnong ka shnong Gaza. Ha Ri India pat, ngi sakhi ïa ka jingkiew skong jong ki seng ne kynhun shitniam Hindu. Kumta ka long kaba kongsan ïa ngi ban bat skhem ïa ki jinghikai shaphang ka hok bad ka jingieid kaba u Jisu u la hikai ïa ngi. Bad ka lynti jong ka diengphna ka long ban ïengpyrshah ïa ka jingbymhok bad ka jingthombor da ka jingshemphang bad jingshlur.Ka lynti jong ka diengphna kam dei ban pynïashun hapdeng kawei ka kynhun bad kawei pat lymne kawei niam pyrshah ïa kawei pat ka niam. Hynrei ka dei ka lynti ban wanrah ïa ka jingïaburom kylliang bad ka diengphna ka dei ban pun lynti hapdeng ki jaitbynriew bad ban pynlong ïa pyrthei kaba dap da ka jingsngewlem bad jingsuk. Ñiuma, ka jingthaw ïa ka aiñ Healing (Prevention of Evil) Practices Act 2024, ha ka jylla Assam, lehse kan buh ïa ka jingmane blei ki Khristan ha ka jingeh bakhraw. Kane ka aiñ ka khang pyrshah ïa kino ki kambah kiba suba ba ki dei ki jingleh myntoi ne jinglehbyrtong da ka jingthmu ban pynkyllaniam jubor ïa ki briew? Ngi dei ban tip ba ka niam Khristan kam hikai ïa ki briew ban leh byrtong, hynrei ki Balang Khristan man la ka sngi ki ïaksaid bad ïakhun halor ki jingeh ba ki briew ki ïakynduh ha ka jingim. La ka long ki jingpang jingshitom, ka jingduk, ka jingdukha bad kiwei. Ka Balang lane ki nongsharai Balang ki ïasaid bad duwai ryngkat bad ki briew kiba donkam ïa ki jingduwai bad jingkyrshan jong ka Balang. Ka jingduwai ka dei ka lynti jong ka diengphna bad ka jingduwai ka ai jingtngen, ka ai jingkyrmen bad ka ai jingpynkhiah ïa kiba pang, kiba shah ïehnohbeiñ, ki mraw bad kiba shah thombor. Hynrei mynta ki jingduwai bad ki jingïasaid lyngba ki jingduwai na ka bynta kiba shemlanot, lehse ki lah ban shah khang bad shah pynshitom da katei ka aiñ.Wat la ka kynhun jong ki Khristan, ka Assam Christian Forum, ka la pynpaw ka jingpyrshah ïa katei ka Aiñ, hynrei ka jingbyrngem byrsit jong ki kynhun shitniam Hindu kiba byrngem ïa ki nongpynïaid skul Balang bad ka jingpyndik ïa kawei ka riewniam, ka la buh ïa ki nongtrei Balang ha ka jingsyier. Ka jingkthong bad jingbyrngem ïa ki skul Balang bad jingpyndik ïa ki nongtrei mission Balang ka long kum ka jingñiewpoh ïa ki Khristan. Ka jingpynshitom beiñ ïa ki Khristan bad ïa kiwei de ki ritpaid ha Assam bad kiwei ki Jylla, ka dei ban pynkhuslai bad pynduh thiah ïa ngi kiba shong ha ka Jylla Meghalaya. Hooid, ha  Meghalaya ym don ba pyndik ïa ki Khristan namarba ki bun paid, hynrei ka jingshah ñiew beiñ jong ki Khristan bad kiwei de ki ritpaid ha Assam bad shawei, ka dei ban ktah ïa ka mynsiem ïatiplem jong ngi kiba im ha Meghalaya. Kumta, kalynti jongka diengphna ka long ban ïakit ïabah lang ïa ka jingshitom bad kyrshan lem ïa kiwei kiba don hapdeng ki jingjynjar..Watla ka tynrai long jaitbynriew jongngi ki Khasi ka jngai bad ïapher bak lybak na kiwei pat, hynrei da ka jingshemphang bad ka jingkut jingmut jong ki riewstad bad ki dkhot jong ka Constituent Assembly ki la seng ïa ka Ri India baïar ha ka nongrim jong ka hok, ka jinglaitluid bad ka jingïalong mar ryngkat. Ka Riti Synshar ka ïada ïa ki hok jong ki nongshong shnong, khamtam eh jong ki rit paid bad ka pynlah ruh ïa uwei pa uwei ne kawei pa kawei ban imlaitluid hapoh ka Ri, khlem da ñiew tang ïa ka niam, ïa ka rongsnieh doh, ïa ka jinglong kynthei ne shynrang bad kumta ter ter. Hooid, ha ka por ba la thaw ïa ka Riti Synshar ki la don ruh ki lynti kiba dum ba ki nongthaw ki la dei ban ïaid lyngba bad ki la lah ban ai ha ki nongshong shnong ka Ri India ïa ka jinglaitluid, ka jinglong mar ryngkat bad ka hok. Kumta ma ngi ki long mynta ngi dei ban ïakhun na ka bynta ban pynneh ïa ka Riti Synshar bad ban pynïohbiang ha ki briew ïa kita ki hok. Kane ka dei ka lynti jong ka diengphna.Ka jingïatai halor ka Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) ka long kaba jwat bad kiba bun ki kynhun jaitbynriew bad ki seng ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewdiaw bad jingpyrshah jong ki ïa kane ka Aiñ. Kumta ka long kaba kongsan ban sngewthuh bad pdiang ïa ka jingartatien bad jingsheptieng jong ki kynhun kiba shem ba kane ka Aiñ ka pynkheiñ ïa ka hok longbriew manbriew bad ka ktah ïa ki rit paid trai ri (Indigenous people) bad ki Muslim.Haba phai pat sha ka thaiñ lam mihngi jong ka Ri India, ka Aiñ CAA ka nang sohkyrdot shuh shuh bad ka buh jingma ïa ki jaitbynriew trai ri kiba don ha kane ka thaiñ. Ym lah ban kheiñdew thala ïa ka jingma kaba ap ïa ki jaitbynriewtrai ri bad ki rit paid lada pyntreikam pura ïa kane ka aiñ. Nalorkata, ka CAA ka long kaba lah shilliang namarba kam kynthup ïa ki jaitbynriew trai ri kiba don ha Bangladesh, kum ki Khasi bad Garo. Ym lah ban len ba ki don napdeng ki Garo bad ki Khasi ha Bangladesh kiba dang bat ïa ka niamtynrai (kaba mut kim dei ki Khristan lymne ki Hindu). Kine ki lah ban mad ïa ka jingshah pynshitom beiñ ha ka Ri Muslim ha Bangladesh bad kin shem jingeh ban ïoh jaka rieh ne ban ïoh long nongshong shnong ha Ri India, ka Ri kaba ki kur jongki ki don namarba kim dei ki Khristan ne ki Hindu. Ka CAA ka long kaba lah shilliang namar ka khanglad ïa ki Khasi ne Garo ban phetrieh sha India.Nangta, ka CAA ka long pyrshah ïa ka hok longbriew manbriew bad ka lah shilliang, khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ki jaitbynriew Kuki-ZO bad ki Rohingya. Ka CAA ka khanglad ïa ki kynhun kiba shah lehbeiñ tam kiba dei ban ïoh ïa ka jingïada bad jingïarap. Kumba long ki Rohingya, ki jaitbynriew Kuki-Zo ruh ki mad ïa ka jingshah ban beiñ bad jingshah thombor ha ki bor shipai ka Ri Myanmar bad ki kylla phetwir. Kumta ki dei hok ban ïoh ïa ka jingïarap bad jingïada. Phewse, ka CAA ka khanglad ïa ki namar kam shym kynthup ïa ki nongshong shnong kiba phetwir na ka Ri Myanmar. Ka jingkhanglad bad jingkyntait ïa ki phetwir kiba luilui kiba phetrieh na ka jingshah thombor ka long ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka hok longbriew bad kam ïadei satia bad ki jinghikai jong ka lynti jong ka diengphna.Ka long kaba dei ban dawa jur ban pyndamnoh ïa ka CAA namarba ka long kaba lah shilliang bad ka pynkheiñ ïa ka hok longbriew manbriew. Lah ban thaw da kiwei pat ki aiñ kiba lah ban pynbeit bad ïarap ïa ki phetwir, khlem da ñiewtang ïa ki niam ne tynrai long jaitbynriew jong ki lymne ïa ka Ri kaba ki wan. Ki Aiñ kiba la thaw da ka jingsngewlem bad jingïatip lem ïa ki para briew kiba shem jynjar, kum ki phetwir bad kiwei, ki long kiba ïadei dur bad ka lynti jong ka diengphna, ka lynti kaba hikai ïa ngi shaphang ka jingieid, ka jingïatiplem bad ka jingkordor jong ka jingim briew.Hapoh la ka jong ka jylla, ka don mynta ka jingkynnoh ne jingkynthoh ba ka seng Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka pyndonkam palat pud ïa ka Bible na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki kam saiñ pyrthei. Hooid, ka buh ïa ka imlang sahlang, ka jingïatreikam bad ka synshar khadar ha ka jingma lada don kiba shim kabu ne pyndonkambakla ïa ka niam ne ki kot niam na ka bynta ban myntoi ki kam khaïi ne kam synshar jong ki ne wat ban pynïaid ïa ka jingimbriew. Ka long ruh ka jingpynjem daw ne jingpynhiar dor bad ka jingleh thala ïa ki jinghikai bakordor jong ki kot Bakhuid lada don kiba pyndonkam bakla.  Hynrei lyngba ki por ki nongsynshar lehdonbor ki la ju pyndonkam bakla ïa ki Kot Bakhuid ban pynksan ïa ki kam runar ne jingsynshar thombor jong ki. Ha kawei pat ka liang, ka lynti jong ka diengphna ka ïai pynkynmaw ïa ngi ba u Jisu u ïeng ryngkat bad u ïakhun na ka bynta kiba shah kyntait bad kiba shah ban beiñ. U ïasaid ban pynïoh bad pynurlong ïa ka hok bad jingshisha.Ban wanrah ïa ka synshar khadar kaba khuid, ka mut ba ngi long la kloi ban pynrem bad ban pynduh jait ïa ka saiñpyrkhat kaba pynkha ïa ka jingïasih bad jingïashun para briew, bad ngi dei ban sdang na ka kyrpong ïing la jong. Kane ka mut ruh ban ïeng na ka bynta kiba tlot bor bad ki rit paid bad ban thaw ïa ki aiñ ne ki policy ki ban kyntiew ym tang ïa la ka jong ka jaitbynriew, hynrei na ka bynta ban ïabit ïabiang lang baroh. Da kaba ngi leh kumne ka mut ba ngi ñiewkor bad bud shisha ïa ka lynti jong ka diengphna bad ngi lah ban thaw ïa ka imlang sahlang kaba shngaiñ bad kaba dap da ka jingkyrmen.Khatduh eh, ka lynti jong ka diengphna ka kren aïu ïangi mynta? Ha ki kyntien jong u Stanley J Samartha, “Ka Diengphna ka ïeng ha ka khep ba ka niam jong ka politic bad ka politic jong ka niam ki ïashem lang ban ïasylla pyrshah ïa uwei u briew, uba ïeng na ka bynta ka hok bad jingshisha. Ha ka jylli jong ka bamsap (ka lehbor, ka hangamei, ka thombor, ka mynsiem isih, jingle shilliang khmat) bad ka khwan myntoi shimet, u ne ka briew kiba hok ki lah ban shah pynshoi bad lada u ne ka, ki ïaineh ha ka jinglonghok bad jinglongkhuid, ki lah ban shah pynshitom bad shah pynïap. Uno uno ne kano kano kiba nud ban ïeng pyrshah ïa ki bor kiba thombor bad kiba nud ban sei madan ïa ki jaboh jabaiñ bad ka jingrunar jong kita kiba shong ha ka bor synshar, ka jingim jong ki ka kutnoh bad ki shah pynïap halor ka diengphna. Ka jingïap u Jisu halor ka diengphna ka dei ka jingshah shitom jong ka met, ka jinglen lade na ka bynta kiwei pat bad ruh ka dei ka jingpyndem jong u Trai Jisu ha ka mon jong u Blei.”
title: KA TAIEW KA JINGSHAH SHITOM U KHRIST: KA LYNTI JONG KA DIENGPHNA : KYRSOIBOR PYRTUH

content: : Ki lama thok ba la shna ha ka dur jong ka seng sain pyrthei Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka bym don satia wat tang ia ka shab jong u Prah ba shu thoh da u Marker Pen la teh da ki briew bym lah ban tip ha ka kynroh jong ka Civil Hospital Shillong.Ia kine ki lama thok ba shu shna tang ban pynthohbria ia ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ba la teh ha kynroh kane ka hospital, hadien ba la treikam ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC), la lap ha ka step Lah Sngi u Blei katba u nonglum khubor u dang iaid lynti nakhmat ka Civil Hospital, Shillong.Ia kine ki lama thok la lap ba la weng noh da ki bor synshar district tang hapoh katto katne por.U Nongaiktien jong ka VPP Dr. Batskhem Myrboh ha ka jingiakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la pynshai, ba kine ki lama thok kim dei satia kiba la phah teh da ka VPP bad ong ba kane ka dei ka jingleh jong ki briew kiba ka party kam lah satia ban tip.U la ong ruh, halor kane ka VPP kan sa ujor sha ki bor pyniaid jong ka tnat Elekshon ka jylla ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyrshang jong ki briew ban pynthohbria ia ka party khamtam ha kum kane ka por ba ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) ka dang treikam ha baroh kawei ka ri India namar ka jingdon jong ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik Iaiong, 2024.
title: HER KI LAMA THOK KA VPP HA KYNROH JONG KA CIVIL HOSPITAL, SHILLONG

content: U Vice President ka North Eastern Hill University Students Union (NEHUSU) u samla Estherson Sohtun u la shah ktah kti bad shah shoh ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ha ki briew ki bym dei ki trai jylla kiba lehkmen Holi hajan ka pung kaba don ha phyllaw jong ka skulbah NEHU, Shillong.,Marmar hadien kane ka jingjia, u Vice President ka NEHUSU u la ujor da ka ejahar sha ki Pulit jong ka Mawkynroh Out Post ba kin pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor kane bad ba kin kem ia kiba donkti.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba ladep leh ia ka Medical Check-up ha Civil Hospital, Shillong une u nongialam ka NEHUSU u la iathuh ba kane ka la jia ha ka por 12:30 baje mynsngi.U la iathuh ba ha ka jingiashoh, u la mong na ki bynta ki kti bad ka met bad nalor kata wat ka sopti phong jong u ruh ka la kad.“Nga sah beit ha (Hostel) NEHU bad nga dei ruh u Vice President ka NEHUSU. Dang step tang shu khie u telephone u nonghikai bad leit ai khublei Holi ia u. Tang dep nangta nga wan nga (iohi) ba don hajan ka pung (ha NEHU) ba don ka jingleh kmen bad ba wah ia ka Banner lehkmen Holi. Ngim don jingujor eiei ia ka jinglehniam Holi jongno re jongno, ka (ri India) dei ka ri ba ai laitluid ia ka jingmane Blei, ki bun ki jaidbynriew lane ki niam ki bapher bapher bad ki jinglehniam jongno jongno ngim ju pyrshah,” ong u samla Sohtun.“Hynrei haba ngi leit peit hangto (hajan pung) ngi iohi ba don katto katne ki bym dei ki khynnah pule ha NEHU khamtam ki don katto katne ngut kiba dei ki nongialam jong ka Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP). Ngi khlem leit da ka bor bad ngi khot da ki Security incharge ba kin leit iakren ban ym leh politik ha NEHU lyngba kine ki jinglehkmen,” u la ong.“Katba ngi dang leit iakren, u ong pynban ba ki Khasi ki pyrshah ia ka Holi, ki kwah ban shna ishu ha ka jingiapher jaitbynriew hapdeng ki Khasi bad kiba na Rithor bad don kiba ring video ban pynheh ia kane ka ishu nga knieh ia ka mobile phone jong u khynnah.  Hadien ba nga knieh ia ka mobile phone ki thombor ia nga,” la iathuh u samla Sohtun bad ong iathuh shuh shuh ba ka la mih ruh ka jingiapyni bor hapdeng jong u bad ki nongialam ka ABVP na NEHU.“Ia kiba (pule) ha NEHU ngim don kano kano ka jingujor bad baroh ki lah ban rakhe ia kano kano ka jinglehniam hynrei ki briew hi kiba wan nabar ban leh politik ha NEHU ngim ailad daleilei. Ngi khlem leit ban pynsangeh ioh ka jia ka jingkulmar,” ula ong.“Ban iashad ia lehkmen ngim don jingujor hynrei ban leh trai da ki briew kiba nabar hapoh kane ka ri ka muluk jong ngim ngin ym ailad,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ngim pyrshah ia kano kano ka seminar na ka NEHUSU hynrei kumba la leit ha kato ka sngi da ki nongialam ka HYC ki pyrshah ia ka jingwan jong ka RSS.Haba kylli u la iathuh ruh u la jer kyrteng ha ka ejahar ia ki briew kiba dontki ban ktah kti ia u
title: SHAH SHOH U VICE PRESIDENT KA NEHU HA KI BRIEW BA IALEH KMEN HOLI HA NEHU

content: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Bah Prestone Tynsong uba dei ruh u State President jong ka National Peoples Party (NPP) u la buh jingkylli ia kito kiba ju kynthoh da kaba ong, “hato naduh ba ka National Peoples Party ka la bat ia u lakam synshar hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya naduh u snem 2018 haduh mynta u snem 2024 ka la ju don neem ka jingpynthud bad ka jingkhang ban mane Blei laitluid hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya.”Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, u Bah Prestone u la ong ruh ba ka nongrim jong ka NPP ka long ban iada ia ki ritpaid bad ban pynneh pynsah ia ka riti ka dustur, ka jingngeit bad ka niam ka rukom.Kane ka jingpynshai jong u Bah Prestone ka long hadien ba ka la mih ka jingkynnoh ba ka BJP bad ka NPP ki dei hi kajuh ka party tang hadien ar sngi eiei ba ka High Command jong ka BJP ka la shim ia ka rai ban ym pynieng kyrtong satia ha Meghalaya hynrei ban kyrshan ia ki kyrtong ba la pynieng da ka NPP ba kynthup ia ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka ban iakhun na Shillong Parliamentary Seat bad ka Agatha Sangma na Tura Parliamentary Seat.“Ka jingkynnoh ba ka BJP ka dei ka NPP bad ka NPP ka dei hi ka BJP kam dei shuh kaba dang mynta hynrei ka dei kaba la jia mynta la bun tylli ki snem. Naduh u snem 2018 ha ka por ba ka NPP ka la sdang ban khie rasong bun bah ki jingpyntieng pynsmiej ba wat thep ia ka NPP namarba ka NPP ka dei hi ka BJP bad ynda ki la jop bad khamtam ynda ki ioh ban synshar ia ka Sorkar kin khang wat ia ki ingmane ruh bad kin ym shah wat ban pynlong ia ka jingmane Blei,” la kynthoh u Bah Prestone.“Kata ka dei ka jingkynnoh ha kato ka por. Hynrei lada phi phai kaei kaei kaba jia, u Blei uba stad, namar hadien ba ngi la ioh ban synshar naduh u 2018 haduh u 2023 nga kwah ban kylli ia kito ki nongkynnoh hato don mo ka por ba hapoh ka jingialam ka NPP ia ka Sorkar ka don mo kata ka jingpyrkhing, ka jingkhang, ka jingpynwit, ka jingpynthud ia ka jingmane Blei,” la buh jingkylli u State President ka NPP.“Ngi ieng ha ka nongrim ba ngin iada ia ki ritpaid bad ngi kwah ban pynneh pynsah ia la ka jong ka riti ka dustur, ka jingngeit bad ka niam ka rukom. Mynta ka kynti ka jingkynthoh jong ki babun balang ka long ba ka NPP ka mut ka BJP, ka BJP ka mut ka NPP hana namarba ka High Command jong ka BJP mynshi sngi ka la rai ban kyrshan ia ka NPP ha Shillong bad ha Tura Parliamentary Constituency,” u la ong.“Ngi pdiang sngewbha ia ka jingkyrshan ia ki kyrtong ka NPP ka bym don ruh ka jingbuh kyndon hangno hangno ruh. Ngi lyngngoh hapoh ka Jylla namarba ma ki (kyrtong) ruh ki la pan tiket na Shillong bad na Tura bad ngi nang pyrkhat ba la kumno kumno ruh ka BJP kan ialeh beit,” ong u Bah Prestone bad bynrap, “ia kata ngi ieh ha ka jingstad jong ki (BJP) lehse ka jingpyrkhat jong ka High Command (ka BJP) ka long kaba bha tam namarba ka NPP ka iatreilang hapoh ka National Democratic Alliance (ba la ialam da ka BJP).“Ha North East, lada phi ong ha Manipur ngi kyrshan ia ka MNF bad ha Nagaland ngi kyrshan ia ka NDPP ba ialam da u Neiphu Rio namarba ki don lang hapoh ka NDA,” la pynshai u Bah Prestone.“Ngim dei ban sngewthuh bakla haba ngi ai jingkyrshan ba ka riti treikam jong ka party ba ngin weng noh ia ka, em.  Kane ka nongrim jong ngi, kane ka tien phira jong ngi, ki agenda jong ka party NPP ka long ban iada, ban pynneh, ban pynsah ia ka riti dustur, ia ka niam ka rukom, naduh ka jingngeit bad ka jingmane Blei ki ritpaid ym tang ha Meghalaya hynrei ha baroh kawei ka ri India,” la bynrap shuh shuh u Bah Prestone.U ong ruh ba kum kine ki jingkynnoh ki ju jia bha ha ki por elekshon. “Nga kyrpad ia ki paidbah nongthep vote ba ki dei ban pynshong nongrim bad kim dei ban shu ngeit ia kum kine ki jait jingkynnoh kiba mih tang ha ki por elekshon,” la kyrpad u State President ka NPP.
title: HATO HAPOH KA JINGSYNSHAR KA NPP KA DON MO KA JINGKHANG MANE BLEI? PRESTONE TYNSONG

content: Tang hapoh ar sngi ba ka BJP ka la pynbna paidbah ban ym pynieng kyrtong ha Meghalaya ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik u Iaiong, 2024, ki nongkyrshan jong ka BJP na Ranikor Constituency, South West Khasi Hills District ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la mih shakhmat ban pynpaw ba kin ai jingkyrshan bapura ia u kyrtong ka Congress u Bah Vincent H. Pala.Ka jing ai jingkyrshan jong ki nongkyrshan ka BJP Ranikor Mandal ka dei ruh lyngba ka jingai jingbit bad ka jingiasngewthuh lang bad u MLA barim u Martin M. Danggo.Ki nongialam ka BJP na Ranikor kiba la wan sha kane ka jingialang ki kynthup ia u Bah German Nongsiang, Bah Manstudy Nongrem uba dei u CEM barim jong ka KHADC lem bad kiwei kiwei.Shuh shuh, tang hadien ar taiew eiei ba u MDC ka Congress na Mawkyrwat u Bah Carnes Sohshang lem bad ka kynhun ki la pyniasoh ialade bad ka NPP, mynta ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka sem jong ka Congress ha Mawkyrwat Constituency ka la syaid biang hadien ba u kyrtong ka HSPDP ha ka ilekshon MLA ba ladep u Bah Medalsing Lyngdoh lem bad ki nongkyrshan jong u ki la pyniasoh ialade sha ka Congress ha kaba la pdiang sngewbha ia ki da u President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala.Nalor ki nongkyrshan ka HSPDP bad BJP, la sakhi ruh ia ka jingpyniasoh jong u Vice President ka All India Trinamool Congress (AITC) ka Mawkyrwat Block Bah Kordor Kharlyngdoh bad ka kynhun jong u sha ka Congress.
title: ÏOH MYNSIEM U KYRTONG CONGRESS BA KYRSHAN KA BJP, TMC BAD HSPDP HA SWKH

content: Ribhoi, Lber 26 : Kum shi bynta ban wanrah ia ka jingiajan bad ia ithuh ithaw para samla pule Khasi, ka KSU RIST USTM Unit ha ka 25 Lber 2024 ka la pynlong ia “Ka 1st University sports meet 2024” ha kaba ki lai tylli ki skul bah hapoh ka Ri Khasi ba  kynthup ia ka KSU North Eastern Hills University Unit, ka KSU Mahatma Gandhi University bad ka KSU RIST- USTM unit ki la ia snoh kti lang ha kane ka Lympung.Ha kane ka sngi la don ki jingialehkai bapher bapher naduh ki football, volleyball, Basketball bad kiwei kiwei. Ha kane ka jing ialehkai kaba la sdang naduh ka por 8 baje mynstep la plie pyrda da u samla Johny Nongrum Sports Secretary KSU NKHD Unit , bad ha ka por 3 baje janmiet la  pynhap pyrda noh da u samla Donald V. Thabah, General Secretary KSU CEC ha ka jingiadonlang u samla Rapbor Nongrum Ex Finance Secretary KSU CEC ,u samla James H Mawphniang General Secretary KSU NKHD Unit lem bad kiwei kiwei.Haba ai jingkren na ka liang u samla James Mawphniang u la iathuh ba kiwei ki Jaitbynriew ki ju iatynjuh bor shabar jylla na bynta ka ioh kam ioh jam kumta u la kyntu ia ki Samla Pule Khasi ruh ba kim dei ban shu ap tang ia ki kam ki jam hapoh jylla lajong hynrei ki dei ban ialeh ban iatynjuh bor bad kiwei pat ki jylla da kaba leit wad kam wad jam sha kiwei pat ki jylla khamtam ban apply ia ki Central Recruitment kum ki Civil Services bad kiwei kiwei. Na ka liang u Samla Rapbor nongrum u la ai mynsiem ia ki samla pule jong ki lai tylli ki skulbah ba dei lyngba kine ki jait program ba ka Seng ka ju ai mynsiem barabor  ia ki samla pule ban iajuh iajan ha man ki bynta bad khamtam  ynda haba ki la pyndep ia ki jingpule kin bteng ia ki jingpule ne ki kam ki jam sha kiwei pat ki bynta lane shabar ka jylla hynrei kim dei pat ban klet ia la ka jong ka thymmei kaba ki don naduh ka ktien ka thylliej ka riam ka beit ka akor ka burom .Na ka liang u Samla Donald V. Thabah General Secretary ka KSU CEC u la pyn kynmaw ba ha u 25 tarik u Nailur 2019 u la pynskhem nyngkong ia ka KSU RIST-USTM Unit la pynskhem hapoh dukan sha  bad dei hadien 4 snem pat ba u la wan biang ban pynhap pyrda ia ka KSU Sports Meet jong ki lai tylli ki skulbah ha kaba ki la ioh pat ban pynlong ia ka program kaba heh hapoh ka kamra jong ka RIST-USTM, dei lyngba ka jing iaï shah bad ka jingtrei shitom la ioh pat ban long trai mynta ha ki University bapher bapher, u la pynkynmaw ruh ialade ha ka por ba u dang dei u samla pule jong ka skulbah NEHU lyngba ka shnat trei kam ka KSU ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang bad u samla Lambok Marngar ki la lah  ban pruid dak ia kiba bun ki jingdonkam kiba hap ban pynkylla ia ki jing thoh ha ka ba iadei bad ki jing donkam ha katei ka skulbah ban pynkylla ia ki kyntien nongwei sha ki kyntien trai Ri .
title: IA KYNDUH LANG KI LAI TYLLI KI SKUL BAH LYNGBA KA 1ST KSU UNIVERSITY SPORTS MEET HA SKUL BAH RIST-USTM.

content: Ki Pulit ka Rani Border Outpost ha ka sngi baar ha ka por kumba 9:30 mynstep ki la ioh jingtip ba ki don ki runar kiba kieng atiar hajan ka shnong Ranibari.Tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane, u In-Charge jong ka Rani Border Outpost ryngkat ki nongtrei jong u mar mar ki la leit kthong ia kine ki runar. Tang shu iohi ia ki Pulit, ki runar ki la synreit kuli hynrei na ka liang jong ki Pulit kim shym la pynphai kylla namarba ki don ki khynnah bad ki kynthei hajan kane ka khlaw.Ha ka jingbeh thong, ki Pulit ki la iohkem ia ki arngut ki runar kiba la ithuh kyrteng kum u Ajit Rabha uba la 18 snem ka rta bad ka Kavita Rabha kaba la 18 snem ka rta.Ha ka jingtohkit, kine ki arngut ki la phla ba ki dei kiba ju donkti ha ki kam runar ba la pyntbit bha ialade ha ka kam tuh kam thiem, kynthup ruh ban ot tuh ia ki Dieng Sal, ban tuh ia ki thuk thuk ar shaka bad ban tuh ia u kwai na ki bri ki bsah.  Nalor kata, ki Pulit ki la lap ksai ruh ba u nongialam jong kane ka kynhun ki runar u dei u Panah jong u Ajit Rabha, ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Rudra Rabha.Ki Pulit ki la ioh ban kurup ruh ia kawei ka suloi SBML bad u gunpowder ha ka jingkhynra ia ka ingsah jong u Ajit Rabha.Ki Pulit jong ka Ri-Bhoi haduh mynta ki dang pynlong ka jingkhynra ha kane ka khlaw hajan ka shnong Ranibari ban iohkem ia ki dkhot jong kane ka kynhun ki mentuh.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ki Pulit ki la rejigster case ha Khanapara Police Station hapoh ki kyndon jong ka ain ba iadei bad kane ka jingjia.
title: SHAH KEM U AJIT RABHA BAD KA KAVITA RABHA HA KI PULIT KA RANI BORDER OUTPOST

content: Saw ngut ki kyrtong kiba aireng ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong Seat ki la thep kyrteng ha ka sngi baar.Kine ki saw ngut ki long u Sitting MP ka Shillong Seat u Bah Vincent H. Pala na ka Congress, u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin uba ïakhun kum u kyrtong monlang ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA), u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon na ka VPP bad u Prof. Lakhon Kma uba ïakhun kum u Kyrtong Shimet.Kan long ruh ka kynti kaba u Bah Vincent H. Pala un ïakhun ban shah jied biang kum u MP ka Shillong Seat hadien ba u la mihkhmat la lai samoi kynthih naduh u snem 2009.Haduh mynta, ka jingthep kyrteng jong ki kyrtong ha Shillong Seat ka la kynjoh haduh san ngut kynthup ïa ka kyrtong ka NPP ka Dr. Amparen Lyngdoh kaba la thep kyrteng ha ka taiew baladep.Ha ki kynta ba kitei ki saw ngut ki kyrtong ki la thep kyrteng la sakhi ba kim shym la wan ïalam satia ïa ki nongkyrshan kumba ju long ha ki snem baladep namarba ka wanrah ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba jur ha nongbah Shillong.Ïa u Bah Pala la synran lang da ki nongïalam ba hakhmat ka Party kynthup ruh ki nongïalam jong ka Mahila Congress. Ïa u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin la synran lang da u President ka UDP Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, President ka HSPDP Bah KP Pangniang, ki MLA ka UDP bad katto katne ngut ki nongïalam bahakhmat.Ïa u Dr. Ricky la synran da ki MLA ka party ba kynthup ïa u Bah Adelbert Nongrum, Bah Brighstarwell Marbaniang, Bah Heavingstone Kharpran bad katto katne ngut ki nongïalam, katba ïa u Prof. Lakhon Kma la synran da ki nongkyrshan bad ki bahaing hasem.Katkum ka jingpyntip jong u Returning Officer ka Shillong Seat, ka Seng Congress ka la phah thep kyrteng ruh u Bah Manuel Badwar kum u Stand-by Candidate.
title: ELEKSHON LOK SABHA: THEP KYRTENG U BAH PALA, ROBERT JUNE, PROF. KMA BAD U DR. RICKY

content: Ka jingiohpang jong kawei ka longïing na ka shnong Riangmang, Eastern West Khasi Hills District hadien ba ki la bam ia ka doh sniang ba ki la thied na uwei u nongdie doh uba ju die doh hapoh shnong ka la pynlong ia ka shnong Riangmang ba kan tait shnong ia une u nongdie doh hadien ba ka Dorbar ka la rai pynrem ia u kum u nong aibih.Katkum ka jingiathuh u Bah Khotkupar Lyngdoh Nongum ha ka jingia kynduh jong u ia ki lad pathai khubor hadien khyndiat kynta ba u la ujor da ka ejahar na ka ophis u Superintendent of Police ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District pyrshah ia ka shnong Riangmang, u la ong, ba ka jingiohpang jong kita ki briew kiba bam ia ka doh ba u die ma u ka dei naduh ka 28 tarik u Rymphang 2024 bad hadien ka jingkempang ki la leit shim dawai na Mairang bad ki Doctor ki la iathuh ba ka jingpang ka dei na ka bam hynrei kine ki briew hadien kata ki leit shim dawai sa na u nong ai dawai bih.U Bah Khotkupar ula iathuh ba ha ka jingleit ia kynduh ia ki, kine ki briew kim shym la kynnoh ba u dei uba ai bih hynrei kyndit kynsan ha ka 22 tarik u Lber 2024 ka shnong Riangmang ka la tait shnong ia u.U Bah Khotkupar u la ong ruh ba u shaniah ha ki bor jong ka ain ba kan ai ia ka jingbishar kaba hok namarba u khlem leh kumba u la shah pharep ha ka shnong Riangmang ba u dei u nong aibih, u nong ai ksuid bad kiwei kiwei ki jingshah kynnoh.
title: MUDUI EJAHAR U BAH KHOTKUPAR BA SHAH TAIT SHNONG HA KA SHNONG RIANGMANG

content: U Kyrtong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) Dr Ricky AJ Syngkon ha ka sngi Baar u la kyntait war ba ka party ka dei kaba pyrshah ïa ka ktien Hindi.“Ngim pat ju pyrshah ïa ka jingkren Hindi.  Kane ka jingkynnoh ka dei tang ka buit saiñpyrthei da kiwei pat ki seng saiñpyrthei bad ngi pynrem jur kum ïa kine ki jingkynnoh,” ong u Dr. Syngkon haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien baladep thep kyrteng na Shillong Parliamentary Seat.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka VPP ka ieng ruh na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong bym dei riewlum kiba dei ki nongshong shnong bapura ka Meghalaya, u Dr. Syngkon u la ong, ba u don ka jingsngew skhem ba kine ki nongshong shnong ka jylla kin kyrshan ïa ka party ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha.“Ngi burom ïa ka jingnoh synniang jong kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew ki bym dei ki Khsi kiba la noh synniang shikatdei eh sha ka Jylla bad ki donkam ruh ka jingïada bad ka party kan pynthikna ruh ba yn ïada ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki bad ha kajuh ka por ngi hap ban ïada ïa ka Jylla na ki briew kiba leh beaiñ, na ki briew kiba wan rung beaiñ.  Kum ka party ngi sngewkhia wat halor ki hok  jong ki briew ki bym dei ki Khasi,” u la ong.Haba pynpaw ba u don ka thong ban jop ha ka elekshon, u Dr. Syngkon u la ong ba ka party ka la pynkhreh bha ban ïakhun ha ka elekshon.  Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka party ka la leit sha baroh ki 36 tylli ki constituency ha rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia.“Ma nga bad ka party ngin don ka jingkyrmen ban jop ïa ka elekshon namarba kat shaba ngi leit ngi ïoh ïa ka jingkyrshan kaba khlaiñ na ki paidbah bad ngi don ruh ka jingshaniah ha ki paidbah jong ki 36 tylli ki Constituency,” u la ong.U la kyntiat ruh ba ka party ka shim kabu ïa ka jaidbynriew.  “Ngim pat ju ong ïa kata, hynrei haba ngi leit sha u paidbah ngi kren kumno ban wanrah ïa ka synshar ka khadar kaba khuid ha ka jylla bad ban pynthikna ba ka hok kan ieng rasong, ban weng ïa ka jingduk jingkyrduh bad ki ishu kiba ngi ju ïakren nalor kaba ïada ïa ka hok jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka jylla,” u la ong shuh shuh.U Dr. Syngkon u la ong ba ka rai jong ka BJP ban kyrshan ïa ka NPP ka la pynpaw ïa ka dur ba shisha jong ki ar tylli ki party hynrei ki ieh pat ha ka jingstad jong ki paidbah ban shim ïa ka rai halor kane.
title: KA VPP KAM DEI KABA PYRSHAH ÏA KA KTIEN HINDI, ONG U DR. RICKY A.J. SYNGKON

content: : U kyrtong ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) Bah Robertjune Kharjarin ha ka sngi Baar u la ong ba dei tang ki seng saiñ pyrthei riewlum kiba lah ban kren ïa ki mat ki jura jong ki paidbah jong ka jylla ha ka rukom kaba dei.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba ladep thep kyrteng u Bah Kharjahrin u la ong ba un sa kren ïa ka mat ba ïadei bad ka jingdawa ban pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit, ka jingpynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi-Garo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka riti synshar ka Ri India, ka jingpynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingpahara ha shilynter ka khappud India-Bangla bad ha khappud ka Meghalaya-Assam bad kiwei kiwei de ki mat kiba hakhmat eh jong ka jaidbynriew.U Bah Kharjarin u la ong ba ka UDP kaba la ïatreilang bad ka Hill State People Democratic Party ka la ïoh bun ka vote ha ka elekshon Lok sabha ba ladep ha rilum Khasi. U la pynkynmaw bad pynpaw ruh ka jingkyrmen ba kane kan urlong biang mynta ka kynti khnang ba un ïoh ïa ka jingjop.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshim rai jong ka BJP ban kyrshan ïa ka NPP, u Bah Kharjahrin u la ong, “ngin kren beit da kaba shai, ki la ïatreilang ha Parliament la bun snem, ki la kyrshan lang ïa ka CAB, ki la leh lang bun ki kam, bad ngam sngew phylla ruh ba kin don ka jingïatreilang. Ai ba ki paidbah kin sa shim rai halor kata.
title: TANG KI PARTY RIEWLUM KIBA KREN ÏA KI MAT KI JURA KI PAIDBAH KA JYLLA: ROBERTJUNE

content: : U President jong ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) Bah KP Pangniang ha ka sngi Baar ula ong ba ïa ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) la thaw hapoh ka jingïalam jong u President barim ka UDP (L) Dr Donkupar Roy bad u President barim ka HSPDP u Ardent M. Basaïawmoit, uba ïalam mynta ïa ka VPP ka party kaba thymmai ha ka jylla.“Phi dei ban kylli ïa u Bah Ardent halor ka nongrim ba la pynkha ïa ka RDA ha u snem 2017,” ong u Bah Pangniang haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.U la ong, ka RDA ka kwah ban wanrah ïa ka jingïatylli hapdeng ki sengsaiñ pyrthei riewlum bad ban ïoh ïa ka jingkyrshan na ki paidbah ka jylla. “Da kaba buh jingmut ïa kane, ngi la rai ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka RDA,”  u la bynrap.Haba pynpaw ba ki paidbah ka jylla ruh ki shaniah ïa ka UDP bad ïa ka HSPDP, u Bah Pangniang u la ong, “baroh ar tylli ki party ki don ïa ka jingïoh vote kaba palat 3.35 lak bad ngi ngeit ba kane ka pyni shisha ba ki paidbah ki kwah ïa ngi ba ngin ïatreilang.”“Ngi kyrmen ruh ba ki paidbah kin dang ïai bteng ban kyrshan ïa ka RDA (ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha) kumba ki la leh ha u snem 2023,” ula bynrap.Shwa kane, u President ka UDP Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka UDP bad ka HSPDP kiba ïatreilang hapoh ka lama jong ka RDA ki don ka jingngeit skhem ban jop na Shillong Seat.“Ngin dang ïatrei shitom shuh shuh ha ki taiew ban sa wan shwa ka sngi thep vote. Ngi long kawei bad ka HSPDP bad ngi don ha kajuh ka rynsan ha kaba ngi ïatreilang na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki paidbah bad na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew,” u la ong.U la ong ruh ba ki ar tylli ki party ki ïasam ïa kajuh ka jingkitkhlieh ha ki rynsan ïalap elekshon na ka bynta u kyrtong ka RDA Bah Robert June Kharjahrin.Haba kylli, u Bah Lyngdoh u ong, ym don ba lah ban kynto ïa ka RDA ba kan sangeh noh ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon MP.“Ym don mano mano ruh ba lah ban ong ïa ngi weng noh na ka jingïakhun. Kano kano ka rai kaba ngi shim, ka dei beit na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong iwei pa iwei,” u la bynrap.
title: ÏA KA RDA LA THAW DA U DR. DONKUPAR ROY BAD U BAH ARDENT; ÏATHUH U BAH KP PANGNIANG

content: Ar tylli ki metiap jong bar jylla la lap ha ka janmiet sngi Balang ha ka shnong Ichamati bad Dalda kaba hap hapoh ka Shella Police Station, East Khasi Hills District.Kane ka la jia ryngkat, ha kane ka sngi ba ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la pynlong ia ka jingialang ha ka por mynsngi ban pyrshah ia ka Citizenship (Amendment) Rule, 2024.La suba ba ki runar ki la shim kabu ha kane kajuh ka sngi ban dkhat jubor ka jingim jong ki arngut ki bar jylla.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District u Rituraj Ravi, ki arngut ki bar jylla ba la suba shah pyniap ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Esan Singh bad u Sujit Dutta. Ia ka met iap jong kine ki arngut la lap na ka shnong Ichamati bad Dalda.U SP u la pyntip ba ki Pulit ki la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bad ia ka Post -mortem ym pat leh satia.Halor kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ka Sohra bad Shella bad kynthup ruh ki Pulit na Shillong ki la hiar sha ka shnong Ichamati bad Dalda kiba don ha khappud bad ka ri Bangladesh ban pynkhlaiñ ia ka jingpahara bad ban pynneh ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.Kumba ka long mynta, ka jinglong jingman ha ka shnong Ichamati bad Dalda ka la pynsyier mynsiem ia ki nongshong shnong khamtam ia ki bar jylla.Namar ka jingdon jong ka elekshon Lok Sabha, ki bor synshar ka Sohra Civil Sub-division ki lah ban pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC ban tem ia kino ki jingiakulmar bad ban pyrkhing ia ka leit ka wan, ka jingialum briew shi jaka bad ka jingrah ia ki tiar pynmynsaw.
title: LAP AR TYLLI KI METÏAP BAR JYLLA HA ICHAMATI, JIA RYNGKAT HA KA SNGI PYRSHAH CAA KA KSU

content: Khnang ban pynneh pynsah ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha khappud jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam namar ka jingdon jong ka Elekshon Lok Sabha, u Chief Secretary ka Jylla Bah Donald P. Wahlang, ha ka sngi Balang u la lum ka jingialang bad u Additional Chief Secretary ka tnat Home (Police) Dr. Shakil P. Ahammed, u Director General of Police Dr. Lajja Ram Bishnoi, u Commissioner and Secretary, ka tnat ERTS Sanjay Goyal, u Chief Electoral Officer Dr. B.D.R. Tiwari, bad ia ki ophisar jong ka tnat Election, u Secretary ka tnat Home (Police), u Inspector General (IG) ka Frontier Headquarters, BSF Meghalaya bad ia ki State Police Nodal Officer ba kynthup ia u M.K. Singh.Ha kane ka jingialang kaba la long ha Main Secretariat, Shillong, u Chief Secretary u la pan jingtip halor ki jinglong jingman ha khappud shwa ban wan ka elekshon Lok Sabha.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Joint Chief Electoral Officer ka Sorkar Jylla u la pyntip ba u DGP Dr. Lajja Ram Bishnoi u la pynsngew halor ka jingteh lam ia ka shongsuk shongsain ha ka jylla bad ha ki jaka khappud.U la iathuh ruh ba ka don ka jingiatreilang kaba jan bad ki Pulit ka Jylla Assam ban pynneh pynsah ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha khappud.La pyntip ruh ba ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ka la buh sngi ban pynlong ia ka jingialang Inter-State Border Meeting ha ka 3 tarik,Iaiong, 2024 bad ka Jylla Assam.“La iakren ruh halor ki lad ki lynti kumno ban peitngor ia ka jinglong jingman ha khappud, ban iada, ban kem ia ki nongthaw jingkulmar, ban khang ia ki khyrdop rung bad mih bad ia ki jaka khappud ba dang long laitlan, ban pynbna ia ka sngi tyrkhong kiad bad ka sngi shuti ba hap siew bainong, ka jingpyntreikam ia ki NBW bad kiwei kiwei,” la pyntip u Joint Chief Electoral Officer ka Sorkar Jylla.
title: BTHAH U CHIEF SECRETARY ÏA KI PULIT BAN PYNNEH ÏA KA SHONGSUK HA KHAPPUD MEGH-ASSAM

content: : U MLA ka North Shillong Constituency Bah Adelbert Nongrum ha ka sngi Baar u la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri ka tnat Bording ka Sorkar Jylla u Abu Taher Mondal da kaba kyrpad ban pynkynriah ia ka tarik ban khang ia ka jingiaid ki kali lyngba ka jingkieng Damsite ka ban sdang naduh ka 31 tarik Lber, 2024.Lyngba kane ka shithi, u Bah Adelbert u la kyntu ia u Myntri ba un pynkynriah ia ka sngi ban khang iaid kali na jingkieng Umiam sha ka 1 tarik, Iaiong, 2024 namar ka jingud jingnam jong ki paidbah kiba hap ban iaid lyngba kane ka jingkieng bad ba ka 31 tarik ka hap ruh ha ka sngi u Blei kaba dei ka sngi rakhe jong ki riewngeit Khristan ia ka Easter Sunday ne ka sngi Mihpat jong u Trai Jisu.“Ki la don ki paidbah kiba pynsngew sha nga kum u MLA ban pynpaw ia kine ki jingdawa hakhmat ka Sorkar bad nga kyrpad ruh ia u Myntri ka tnat Bording ba un pdiang ia kane ka jingtyrwa namarba ka jingpynkynriah ia ka sngi kan long tang na ka bynta shi sngi,” u la ong.U la kynthoh ruh ba ka jingshong synjor jong ka jingkieng Damsite ka dei hi ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar Jylla naduh mynshwa namar ka jingailad ia ki trok kiba kit palat 6 ton shaneng wat haba ka la tip shai ba ka jingkieng ka dei kaba la rim bha bad kaba ka jingim ruh ka la kut.
title: KYRPAD U MLA BAN PYNKYNRIAH SHA KA 1 TARIK ÏAIONG BAN KHANG ÏA KA JINGKIENG DAMSITE

content: U MLA jong ka North Shillong Constituency Bah Adelbert Nongrum ha ka sngi Baar u la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba khmih ia ka tnat Pynroi Sor Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar bad sha u Myntri ka tnat PHE u Marcuise N. Marak da ka jingkyrpad ba kin wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban weng ia ka jingkyrduh um ha ki shnong kiba dang hap hapoh ka North Shillong Constituency.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha ki arngut ki Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla, u Bah Nongrum u la iathuh ba kum u Nongmihkhmat paidbah u la ioh ka jingujor na ka Dorbar Shnong Jaiaw Pyllun, ka Riatsamthiah, Wahingdoh bad na kiwei kiwei de ki shnong kiba la mad ia ka jingkyrduh um ha kane ki sngi.“Nga kyrpad ia ka tnat PHE bad ia ka tnat Urban Affairs ba kin iatreilang khnang ba ki paidbah nongshnong kin ym mad ia ki jingeh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingkyrduh ka umbam umdih ha kum kane ka aiom ba rang tyrkhong ka bneng,” u la ong.U la kyntu ruh ba kin phah ia ki nongtrei ban wad ia ka daw tynrai halor ka jingkyrduh um bad ong ruh ba ki don ki jaka ba ka um ka shu shlei kai katba ki don pat ki jaka kiba mih duna bha ka um bad mad ruh ia ka jingtyrkhong.
title: JUR KA JINGKYRDUH UM HA NORTH SHILLONG, PYNSNGEW U MLA SHA KA SORKAR JYLLA

content: U nongialam jong ka Trinamool Congress u Zenith Sangma ha ka sngi Balang u la thep kyrteng na ka bynta ban iakhun ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Tura Parliamentary Seat ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik Iaiong, 2024.Ia u Zenith Sangma, la synran lang da u hymmen jong u, u Mukul Sangma bad kiwei kiwei ki nongialam jong ka Trinamool Congress.Haduh mynta, kiba thep kyrteng na Tura Seat ki long ka Sitting MP ka Agatha Sangma ka ban iakhun na ka National Peoples Party (NPP) bad u Saleng Sangma u ban iakhun na ka seng Congress.Ka BJP dang shen ka la rai ban ym pyniengkyrtong bad pynbna ruh ban ai jingkyrshan ia ki kyrtong ka NPP ha Shillong bad ha Tura.Ha Shillong Seat, kiba la thep kyrteng haduh mynta ki long ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba iakhun na ka National Peoples Party (NPP), u Sitting MP ka Shillong Seat Bah Vincent H. Pala na ka Indian National Congress (INC), u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin uba ïakhun kum u kyrtong monlang ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA), u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon na ka Voice of the Poeple Party (VPP) bad ki kyrtong shimet ba kynthup ia u Prof. Lakhon Kma, u Bah Peter Shallam.Kane long ruh ka kynti kaba u Bah Vincent H. Pala un ïakhun ban shah jied biang kum u MP ka Shillong Seat hadien ba u la mihkhmat la lai samoi kynthih naduh u snem 2009.Katkum ka jingpyntip jong u Returning Officer ka Shillong Seat, ka Seng Congress ka la phah thep kyrteng ruh u Bah Manuel Badwar kum u Stand-by Candidate.
title: THEP KYRTENG U ZENITH SANGMA BAN ÏAKHUN NA TURA PARLIAMENTARY SEAT

content: Ki shipai BSF jong ka 172 Battalion, Meghalaya kiba la pynlong ka jingpynap shrip ki la ïohbat ïa kawei ka kali kaba kit ïa ka shini ba la thmu ban khaii beaiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh bad kem ruh arngut ki nong India na khappud Kuliang kaba hap hapoh ka East Jaiñtia Hills District.Lyngba ka jingïoh jingtip kaba bniah, ki shipai BSF ki la ïohbat ïa ka kali kaba kit hduh 35,000 kilor ka shini katba ka dang wan na ka thaiñ Ladrymbai ban leit sha ka shnong Kuliang.Ha ka jingtohkit, u nongñiah bad u nongbud kim shym la lah satia ban pyni ïa kino kino ki dulir halor ka jingkit ïa ka shini.Ïa ka kali, ka shini bad kynthup ïa ki arngut kiba la shah kem la aiti noh sha tnat Custom ban leh ïa kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: KURUP KI BSF 35 HAJAR KILO KA SHINI, SHAH KEM ARNGUT

content: : Ki Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills District kiba la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ki la sdang ban lap ksai ia ki briew kiba donkti ban pyniap ia ki arngut ki bar jylla ha ka shnong Ichamati, kaba hap hapoh ka Sohra Civil Sub-division, East Khasi Hills District.“Ngi la ioh ksai halor ki katto katne ki briew kiba ngi suba ba ki dei kiba donkti ha ka kam bymman ha ka shnong Ichamati.  Hynrei, haduh mynta ngim pat kem satia iano iano ruh. Ngi dang pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ha lyndet ka jingthmu jong kane ka kam bymman,” ong u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District u Rituraj Ravi ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi palei.“Ngi kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin pynneh ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad ban burom ia ki kyndon jong ka aiñ,” la ong u SP.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ar tylli ki metiap jong bar jylla la lap ha ka janmiet sngi balang ha ka shnong Ichamati bad Dalda kaba hap hapoh ka Shella Police Station, East Khasi Hills District. Kine kiba la shah pyniap ki long u Esan Sing bad u Sujit Dutta bad ia ka met iap jong kine ki arngut la lap na ka shnong Ichamati bad Dalda.Kane ka la jia ryngkhat ha kane ka sngi ba ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la pynlong ia ka jingialang ha ka por mynsngi ban pyrshah ia ka Citizenship (Amendment) Rule, 2024.La suba ba ki runar ki la shim kabu ha kane kajuh ka sngi ban dkhat jubor ia ka jingim jong ki arngut ki bar jylla.Ia ka met jong kine ki arngut la leh ia ka post mortem ha Shillong Civil Hospital ha ka sngi palei.Ki ar ngut ki para jong ki ar ngut ki bar jylla kiba la shah pyniap ha Ichamati ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi palei katba ki dang ap ia ka jingleh Post Mortem ha Civil Hospital, Shillong ki la iathuh ba ki la ioh jingtip ia ka jingiaklumar ha iew Ichamati kaba la sdang ha ka por kumba 4:00 baje nohphai sngi hynrei ki la ioh jingtip ia ka jingkhlad kine ki arngut ka dei ha ka por premmiet.Uwei na ki para jong uba la shah pyniap u la iathuh ba u hymmen jong u, u dei uba ju bylla thep maw bad katba u dang thmu ban wan phai sha la ing bad ha shiteng lynti u la ngat pynban ha ka tyrsim jong ki runar kiba la tangon ia u haduh ba un da iap bad ia ka met jong u la lap narud surok.Halor kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ka Sohra bad Shella bad kynthup ruh ki Pulit na Shillong ki la hiar sha ka shnong Ichamati, ka shnong kaba don ha khappud bad ka ri Bangladesh ban pynkhlaiñ ia ka jingpahara bad ban pynneh ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.Kumba ka long mynta, ka jinglong jingman ha ka shnong Ichamati ka la pynsyier mynsiem ia ki nongshong shnong khamtam ia ki bar jylla.
title: LAP KSAI KI PULIT ÏA KI BRIEW KIBA PYNÏAP ÏA KI BAR JYLLA HA ICHAMATI

content: : U kyrtong shimet na ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency u Prof Lakhon Kma u la hiar sha sor Jowai ban ialap sha ki paidbah ia ki mat bad ki jingthmu jong u na ka bynta ka election MP Lok Sabha ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik Iaiong.Ia ka jingialang la pynlong ha Iawmusiang, Jowai ha ka 28 tarik Lber.U Lakhon Kma ha ka jingkren ula ong ka jingmih madan jong u ban iakhun ia kane ka ilekshon MP kadei halor ka nongrim ban wanrah ia ka jylla Meghalaya kaba thymmai kaba lait na ka jingsahdien, ka jingbamsap bad ruh ban rah ia ka jylla ha ka ioh ka kot bad kiwei kiwei.U la ong lada ki paidbah ki mon ban jied ia u kum u MP, ka mat kaba hakhmat kaba u buh ka long ban saindur thymmai i aka pule puthi hapoh ka jylla, un iakhun ban pynrung ia ka ktien Khasi hapoh ka Khyrnit kaba Phra jong ka Constitution ka ri khnang ba ki samla kin iohlad ban thoh ia ki exam bapher bapher da ka ktien Khasi nalor kiwei kiwei.Nalorkata ula ong, kane ka Election MP kam dei ban thaw ia ka EC hapoh JHADC, lane ban thaw sorkar hapoh Assembly hynrei ka dei ka election ban phah tang ia uwei hi u briew u ban rah ia ka jingeh bad ka sur jong ki 7 tylli ki district jong ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency.
title: KA ELEKSHON MP KAM DEI BAN THAW SORKAR HA JYLLA HYNREI BAN KREN HA PARLIAMENT: PROF. LAKHON KMA

content: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la rai ban ai jingkyrshan ia ki kyrtong jong kiwei ki seng saiñpyrthei ha ka Elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, Ïaiong watla ka party kam shym la lah ban pynïeng kyrtong ha kane ka kynti.U Working President ka KHNAM Bah Thomas Passah haba ïakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la ong ka daw ba ka party kam shym pynïeng ïa la u jong u kyrtong ka long namarba ka KHNAM ka kwah ban pynleit jingmut ha ka Elekshon MDC ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC).“Kam don jingmut bad ngi la don ka jingïakren ban pyrkhat tang na ka bynta ka elekshon MDC,” la ïathuh u Bah Passah.Haba kylli, “ngin sa pynlong shwa da ka jingïalang ha kine ki taïew ban sa wan na ka bynta ban shim rai ïano ka party kan ai jingkyrshan bad kum ka seng ngin hap hap ban peit shwa kiei ki mat treikam jong ki seng saiñpyrthei ne jong ki kyrtong ha kaba ïadei bad ki mat kiba ïatyngkhuh bad ka jylla khamtam kiba ïadei bad ki ritpaid riewlum.”“Ngi ladep ban pynlong shisien ïa ka jingïalang halor kane hynrei ngim pat rai pat shim rai ïano ngin ai jingkyrshan hynrei ha kane ka taïew ban sa wan, ngin sa pynlong jingïalang bad ngin sa shim ïa ka rai,” la ïathuh u Bah Passah.U la pynpaw ruh ba ka KHNAM ka kwah da ka Sorkar ka bym dei kaba synshar da ka Bharatiya Janata Party(BJP) hapoh ka Sorkar Pdeng namarba lada ka BJP kan dang ïai wan ha ka bor synshar, kan sa pyntreikam ïa ka Citizenship Registration Certificate Register, nangta sa ka National Population Register (NPR), sa ka National Register of Citizens (NRC) bad kine kin buh jingeh ïa ki ritpaid hapoh ka Ri India, u la bynrap.“Na ka bynta ka jingshngaiñ jong ngi, ngi hap ban pyntikna ba ngin ïaid da ka Sorkar ka bym don ka BJP,” u la ong shuh shuh.U la ïathuh ruh ba ki don ki seng saiñpyrthei kiba la phah shithi ban pan jingkyrshan hynrei ka party kam pat shim satia ïa kano kano ka rai.“Ngi hap ban pyrkhat bha nadong shadong hashwa ba ngin shim ïa ka rai,” u la ong.
title: RAI KA KHNAM BAN KYRSHAN ÏA KIWEI KI PARTY HA KA ELEKSHON LOK SABHA

content: : Ki Pulit ka Madanriting Police Station, ha ka Sngi Saitjaiñ ki la leit ban shimti ia kawei ka metiap jong kawei ka kynthei kaba la sahkut ha ki maw jong ka phud Umkhen kaba hap hapoh ka Dorbar Shnong Mawshbuit ha ka Dong Kharkamni.Ia kane ka metiap jong kane ka kynthei kaba la lyngkhuid, la lap na sharum ka Wei Thangdkhar, jong ka Wah Niamra, Mawshbuit da ki lai ngut ki khynnah rit kiba leit kai sha kane wah.Kine ki khynnah, tang shu iohi ia kane ka metiap da ka jingsheptieng ki la mareh bran bran ban leit pyntip sha ki nongialam shnong.Na ka liang jong ki nongialam shnong tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia, ki la pyntip marmar sha ki Pulit jong ka Madanryting Police Station.La suba ba kane ka kynthei ka dei kaba la shah rong ha ka umsaw na ka thaiñ ka Wah Umkhen.Katkum ka jinglap ki Pulit la sakhi ba kane ka briew kam don shuh ki jain phong ha ka met jong ka bad na ka liang jong u Rangbah Dong Bah Faster Field Nongdhar u la ong ba kane ka briew kam dei satia kaba napoh ka shnong Mawshbuit namarba kam shym la don ka jingjah briew hapoh ka shnong.Kat haduh ba la thoh ia kane ka khubor, ki Pulit ki la register case halor kane ka jingjia bad ka jingtohkit ka la iaid shakhmat.
title: LAP KI KHYNNAH ÏA KA METÏAP KYNTHEI BA LYNGKHUID NA WAH NIAMRA

content: Shillong, Lber, 30 : Ka Coordination and Welfare Committee (CWC) Shella Bholaganj Block kaba long ka kynhun ba la thaw da ki bar jylla ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la ujor sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma halor ka jingshah pyniap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla dang shen ha ka shnong Ichamati.Ha ka ujor ba la soi da u President ka CWC, Shella Block, Gopal Dey u la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ban kem mardor ia ki briew kiba donkti ban pyniap ia u Ishan Singh bad ia u Sujit Dutta ha Ichamati ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai bad dawa ruh ban aiti ia ka jingtohkit sha ka CBI/NIA, ban siew bailutksasn sha ki bahaing hasem jong kine ki arngut kiba la shah pyniap bad ban pynthikna ia ka jingshngaiñ jong ki bar jylla Hindi kiba buhai shnong ha Ichamati bad ha ki shnong bamarjan.Ka CWC ka la phah ruh ia kane kajuh ka jingujor sha u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri Narendra Modi bad sha u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing Amit Shah bad sha u Lat ka Meghalaya u Phagu Chauhan.Lyngba kane ka ujor, ka CWC, Shella Block ka la teipop ba dei ki dkhot runar jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) kiba la pyniap ia u Ishan Singh bad ia u Sujit Dutta.Haba buh jingkylli ia ki bor synshar, ka CWC ka la ong, “ka Ichamati, ka dei ka shnong kaba hap hapoh ka East khasi Hills District jong ka jylla Meghalaya kaba la pyllait na ki kyndon jong ka CAA namarba ka hap hapoh ka Sixth Scheduled, ka dei ruh ka jaka kaba ka Khasi Students Union ka la pynlong ia ka jingpyrshah ia ka CAA kaba lam sha ka jingshah pyniap jong u Ishan Singh bad u Sujit Dutta. Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka jinglong jingman kaba ngi mad ia ka jingim kaba syier bad ka jingartatien, ngi kwah ban buh jingkylli, kumno la ailad ban pynlong ia ka rally ha Ichamati? haba ka (Model) Code of conduct ka la treikam?”Ka CWC ka la buh jingkylli da kaba ong, “shano ki Pulit ki don haba ki dkhot jong ka KSU ki wan da ki kali ha Ichamati bad thombor ia ki bar jylla kaba wanrah ia ka jingkulmar bad ka jingsahh pyniap uwei u Bengali bad uwei u Adivashi kiba dei ki nongbylla kit maw.”“Hato ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei tang ka Sorkar tang jong kawei ka jaidbynriew? Hato ki bym dei ki riewlum kim dei ki nongthep vote/ki nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya? Hato ka Sorkar kam lah ban leh eiei pyrshah ia ki kynhun shitkhlieh ka Jylla Meghalaya.? Sa katno ngut ki ban duhei ia ka jingim ba ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Sorkar Pdeng kin iohsngew ia ka jingud jingiam jong ki bymdei riewlum ha Meghalaya? la buh jingkylli shuh shuh ka CWC.“Hato u kpa uba duhei ia la u jong u khun tang na ka daw ki runar ka KSU un ioh ia ka hok? la kylli shuh shuh ka CWC.Ka CWC ka la kam ba ka jingjia ka la jia hadien ba ka rally pyrshah ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act ba la pynlong da ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) bad kiwei kiwei ki sengbhalang ha Ichamati, katkum ki khubor jong ki lad pathai khubor.“Ka jingiaumsnam ha ka jingiakhih pyrshah ia ka CAA kaba ladep ka la jia ha ka shnong Ichamati kaba poi haduh u pud ba ki bar jylla kiba sah ha kane ka thain kim lah mutdur. Wat hadien ba la sakhi kum kine ki jingjia ha u snem 2020 ha ka jingiaumsnam ha Ichamati, balei ki bor synshar district ki dang ai jingbit ia ki kynhun ban pynlong ia ka rally ha kajuh ka jaka?” la kynthoh ka CWC lyngba u Gopal Dey.“Nga phah ia kane ka jingthoh sha phi ban dawa ia ka hok jong ki arngut kiba la khladnoh bad ki bahaing hasem jong ki bad baroh ki khun shynrang bad kynthei ka Meghalaya kiba shah ibeiñ ha kawei ka liang tang namarba kim dei na kajuh ka jaidbynriew heh paid. Nga phah ia kane ka jingthoh ban pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia jong nga halor ka jingjia ba dang shen jong ki briew ki bym dei ki riewlum ha Meghalaya. Ki ain bad ki kyndon ka jylla kiba la thmu ban iada ia ki trai jylla, hynrei ki la long pynban ki mawsiang ba iatakhuh ia ki nongshong shnong bar jylla. Bun tylli ki jingshah typyrkhing, bun tylli ki Rul, bun tylli ki ain (kiba treikam tang ia ki bar jylla ka Meghalaya) ki la buh jingeh ia ki bym dei ki trai jylla ban shong ban sah bad ban kamai kajih ha ka jylla, shah khanglad ha ka ioh ka kot, ka kamai kajih, ka jinglaitluid, bad wat ha ka jingim,” la kynnoh u Gopal Dey.“Sa kawei ka jingeh ba la mad da ki bym dei ki trai jylla ka dei ka jingbym don ia u nongmihkhmat. Ka sainpyrthei kaba dei beit thik tang ia ki trai jylla ha Meghalaya bunsien ka la khñoit ia ka sur jong ki bym dei ki trai jylla, ka la buh jingeh ia ki ban kren haba wanrah ia kino kino kino ki rai kiba ktah ia ka jingim jong ki,” kynnoh shuh shuh u Dey.“Shuh shuh, ki bar jylla kiba sah ha Meghalaya, bunsien ki mad ia ka jingshah ibeiñ bad shah kiar, kaba ktah pat ia ka jingim kaba mariaryngkat watla ki shong ki sah hapoh ka jylla. Kane ka jingshah ibeiñ ka lah ban ktah ha kiba bun rukom, kynthup ia ki ing ban shong ban sah, ka pule puthi, ki lad iohkam iohjam bad kaba kham shyrkhei ka dei ka jingduh ei ki nongkynti bad ka jingim. Ka long kaba donkam ban ithuh ia baroh ki nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya, khlem da kheiñ kyrdan riewlum, dei ban niew lang bad ban ai ia ka hok ba mar ia ryngkat,” ong shuh shuh u Dey.”“Namarkata, nga kyntu ia ki bor ba dei peit ba kin pdiang ia ki jingai jingmut khnang ban kan pynjanai ia ka im, ka shong ka sah jong ki bym dei ki riewlum ha Meghalaya da kaba kem mardor ia ki runar kiba donkti ban pyniap ia ki bar jylla khnang ba ka shongsuk shongsaiñ kan don hapoh ka Jylla. Lada ki bor pulit kim lah ban kem ia ki nongleh kam bymman hapoh shitaiew, ia ka jingtohkit dei ban aiti noh sha ka CBI/NIA,” la dawa ka CWC.“Dei ban pynthikna ba ki bym dei ki riewlum ki dei ban ioh jingiada na ki kam bymman bad ban iada na ki jingshah pynmynsaw bad na ki kam runar da ki kynhun shitkhlieh ka Meghalaya pyrshah ia ki ritpaid (bar jylla) jong ka jylla Meghalaya. Ban buh ia ka Permanent Security Outpost/ CRPF/ ne kino kino ki Para-military Camp ne Post ha ki jaka kum ha Bholaganj bad Ichamati,” dawa ka CWC.Ka CWC ka la kynnoh ba bun na ki sengbhalang naduh ba la pynkha ki dei kiba donkti ban pynphriang ia ka jingisih pyrshah ia ki bar jylla ritpaid ha Meghalaya bad niew ruh ia ki bym dei ki riewlum kum ki “Bar Jylla”. Ha kawei pat ka liang ne ka jingbym leh eiei jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka pynlong ia ki runar jong kynhun sengbhalang ban ngeit ba ki dei kiba kham halor jong ka aiñ. Namarkata, dei ban thaw ia ka aiñ kaba pyrkhing khnang ba ka Sorkar kam lah ban shu bret ia ka jingkitkhlieh bad ia ki nongleh kam bymman dei ban kem bad ym ba kin shu iai sah ha ki kot tang kum ki “runar bym ithuh durkhmat.”Ka CWC ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ban tem ia ka jingibeiñ bad ban wanrah ia ka jingialong kawei hapoh ka jylla khnang ba ki trai jylla bad ki bar jylla kin im suk im saiñ hapoh ka jylla bad ha kajuh ka por kane ka kynhun ka la dawa ban ai jingkyrshan bad ai jingiarap sha ki jaidbynriew bar jylla khnang ban kyntiew ia ka bha ka miat ka jong ki hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya.
title: TEIPOP KA CWC ÏA KA KSU HALOR KA JINGSHAH PYNÏAP ARNGUT KI BAR JYLLA HA ICHAMATI

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ka la bthah ia ki dkhot jong ka Coordination & Welfare Committee (CWC) Shella Bholaganj & Adjoining Areas ban mih markhmat ym ban shu jler bad jaw ummat kuratia hakhmat ka Sorkar bad ka pyrthei lyngba ki lad pathai khubor.“Ka jingpharep pyrshah ia ki dkhot ka KSU da kine ki poiei lyngba ka CWC ka pyni dak ba kine ki briew ki kob pyrshah ia ka KSU da kaba ialam bakla ia ki paidbah khlem ki sakhi satar kiba paka. Ka KSU ka kob ia uta u Gopal Dey ba lada u nud un wan mih markhmat bad ki dkhot ka seng ban pyni ia ki sabut ba u don halor ka jingkynnoh jingpharep jong u pyrshah ia ki samla ka seng. Mano uta u Gopal Dey?,” la byrthen ka KSU ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ lyngba u General Secretary u samla Donald V. Thabah.“Une u briew bad kiwei ki la mih ha ki lad pathai khubor ha u snem 2020 hadien ba ki jaidbynriew ki jong ki, ki la hiar thma kynsan ia ka jingialang pyrshah CAA bad dawa ILP jong ka KSU ha kaba da ki phew ngut ki dkhot ka seng ki la shah tied shah bom ha kine ki poiei da ki tiar ialeh tad haduh ba la pait ka khlieh bad lyngkien ka snam ha surok bad kumjuh ruh ka jingbthat jubor ia ka jingim ba kordor u Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta, u dkhot ka KSU Sohra Circle.  Halor ka jingujor ejahar bad pynher shithi sha u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, ha kaba ki poiei lyngba ki CWC ki la kynnoh laiphew jait ia ka seng bad ki paid Khasi.  Ka KSU ka pynsngew sha baroh kito ki poiei kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka CWC ba kin tyngkan la u thylliej ioh poi sha ka mynsaw namar ka seng kan ym shong kli kti bad sngap kuman ia ka jingber bih kine ki poiei nalor ba ki thom naphang ia ki Khasi trai Ri trai muluk,” la ong ka KSU.“Ka seng ka sngew ba lada kita ki poiei ka CWC ki sngew kutlad palat ha jylla Meghalaya ki dei ban leit phai noh mardor sha shnong trai jong ki, ka Bangladesh bad sa leh katba ki sngewmon ha ri lajong. Tangba katba ki dang sah ha meiramew u Khasi kan bha shibun ia ki bad ki jaidbynriew jong ki ban ym mushlia lane tuklar ia ki aiñ ki kanun Khasi, ka khyndew ka shyiap u Khasi, ka khaii pateng u Khasi bad ka iaid ka ieng u Khasi,” la ong ka seng.Ka KSU sa shisien ka pynsngew ba nalor ka jingdawa ia ka ILP, ka Article 371, ka jingpynkup bor shuh shuh ia ki District Councils ka dawa ruh ba ka Cut-off Date lane tarik ot kyrteng ia ki nongshong shnong ba pura ka jylla Meghalaya kan dei beit 24 tarik u Lber 1971 bad ia kito kiba wan kiew na East Pakistan/Bangladesh hadien kane ka tarik dei ban bret noh ia ki sha la ka ri, kata, ka Bangladesh.“Kyntang ia wai ka KSU ka kyntu ia ki para Khasi ba kin ym ngop lane shah ialam bakla ha ki khubor hamsaia ki poiei lyngba ki lad pathai khubor lane social media namar kane kan pynpait bad pharia ia ka Jaidbynriew rit paid Khasi. Ka buit sianti ki poiei ka long ban pyni ba ki shah thombor (playing the victim card) katba napoh napoh dei ma ki kiba sdang ban kynshoit ban thombor ia ki Khasi kumba dang shu jia shen ha Keatinge Road bad NEHU,” la ong ka KSU.“Kum ka Jaidbynriew ngi dei ban iatylli ban ia ryntih ha kum kane ka saw ka siaw ha kaba ka umsaw kaba shyrkhei ka ap ban tap lup ia ka Jaidbynriew rit paid Khasi.  Ka KSU kan ym ailad da leilei ruh em ia ki poiei shi sngi ban leit trai khlieh ha Ri Khasi. Kam pher lada shah bom shah tied, shah set along ne wat ban iap ruh, hynrei ki dkhot ka seng ki tur beit da ka jingshlur ban iada ia la ka jaidbynriew ba la suit la shor da u mynbarim,” ong shuh shuh ka KSU.“Ka KSU ka maham ba lada kata ka Meghalaya Minority Linguistic Development Forum kan pynlong jingiakhih ha Bri i Hynñiewtrep, ka KSU ruh kan iakhih lang halor ka jingshah pyniap klep bad jingshah thombor ki Khasi na ka por sha ka por ha ki bar jylla,” la ong u General Secretary ka KSU.
title: WAT SHU JLER BAD JAW UMMAT KURATIA HA HAKHMAT KA SORKAR, ONG KA KSU ÏA KA CWC

content: Ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo Peoples (FKJGP) ka la maham jur ïa u Gopal Dey uba kam ïalade ba u dei u General Secretary jong ka Coordination And Welfare Committee  na  Shella-Bholaganj, ba um dei ban kynnoh ïa ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) halor ka jingshah pynïap jong ki arngut ki barjylla ha ka shnong Ichamati.“Kane ka kam dei ka jong u hynrei ka dei ka kam jong ki Pulit ban wad ïa ka jingshisha,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Secretary General ka FKJGP (Seng Kmie) Bah Eldie N. Lyngdoh sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Ki Pulit haduh mynta kim pat lap mano kita ki briew ba pynïap ïa u dkhot ka KSU u Lurshai Hynniewta ne ïa uta u Pulit ba siat ïap ïa u Bah Cheristerfield Thangkhiew.  Ngi kwah ban buh jingkylli ruh shaei u (Gopal Dey) jah une u briew ha ka por ba shah pynïap u Bah Lurshai Hynniewta. Haba mynta u (Gopal Dey) dawa ban kem mardor ïa kita ki briew ba donkti ban pynïap ïa kine ki bar jylla u la dei ban dawa ruh ban kem mardor ïa kito ki riew thrang snam ba pynïap ïa u Bah Lurshai,” ong u kyrwoh na ka FJKGP.“Kum ka seng ngi maham ruh ba une u Gopal Dey um dei ba ai ding halor ka jingjia ha Ichamati. Lada une u briew u dang ïai bteng ban pynshit, ngi, kum ka seng FKJGP ngin mih paidbah ha ka 7 tarik, Ïaiong ka sngi ba kine ki poiei, hapoh ka shatri ka Meghalaya Linguistic Minority Development Forum ki mut ban shong kyllaiñ myngggor ha Khyndailad,” la ong ka Seng.“Lada ka Sorkar ka sngap ïa ki poiei ki mynder ka mut ka sur ka paid ka Bri u Hynñiewtrei ka la shah taplup noh bad ban pynim biang ngin shim da ki sienjam kiba tyngeh,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: WAT KYNNOH IA KA KSU, MAHAM KA FKJGP ÏA U GENERAL SECRETARY KA CWC

content: Shillong, Lber 31 : Ka Khasi Students’ Union ka long pdeng ia baroh lada ki leh pyrshah ia ka jingsngew jong u Paid ka Bri Hynñiewtrep ngin ym aili da leilei ruh, ong ka KSUKi tnat treikam bapher bapher jong ka KSU ha ka 31 tarik u Lber 2024 ka la leit ban pynai Shuti hi ia ki Bank bad kiwei kiwei kiba pynlong trei ha kane ka sngi kaba dei ka sngi kyntang jong ki Khun Kristan katta ka Easter Sunday.Ha kane ka sngi na ka liang jong ka KSU ka la lap ba jan baroh ki Bank ki pynlong trei khlem da burom ïa kane ka sngi kyrpang, ha katei ka jingleit jurip na ka liang ka KSU kala phah khang shi syndon ïa ki bank kiba plie. Ka Seng kala maham ruh ïa kitei ki Bank ba kim dei ban ïaleh pyrshah ne kheiñ dew thala ïa ki sngi kyrpang jong ki Khristan.Na ka Liang ka Seng ka pynpaw ba dei ka jing leh bym suidniew ka Sorkar MDA lane NDA ia ki paid riewngeit Kristan hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya. Katba ha kiwei pat ki jylla kum ka Manipur, Mizoram bad kiwei ki jylla shatei thaiñ lam mihngi ki ioh shuti ha kum kane ka sngi kyrpang, watla ka dei kata ka Financial year.Kane ka jingleit khang khyrdep jong ka KSU ia ki Bank ka kynthup naduh Mawiong, Mawprem, Stand Jeep, Garikhana, Upper Shillong, Mawkhar, Khyndai Lad, Barik, Malki, Laitumkhrah, Nongmensong bad ha kylleng ka Bri U Hynniewtrep hi baroh kawei.
title: BYM BUROM ÏA KA SNGI EASTER SUNDAY LEIT PYNAI SHUTI KA KSU ÏA KI BANK BAPHER BAPHER

content: Ki thylliej ding barhem ki lia bam duh ploiñ haduh ban da kylla dpei lut ïa ka iing jong u Bah Wanmon Pohshna kaba don ha shnong Kuliang, East Jaiñtia Hills District.  Kane ka la jia ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka por kumba 1.30 baje mynsngi.U Bah Wanmon u dei uba don san ngut ki khun kiba dang rit hynrei ha ka por ba ka ing ka la kem ding ym shym la don mano mano ruh hapoh ka ing kaba la bamduh ïa ka iïng baroh kawei bad ia ki tiar ki tar, ki mar rep, ki jaiñ ki nep kiba don hapoh ïing.U Bah Pohshna u la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar bad ia ki riew paidbah ba kin sngewha ban phaikhmat lem sha u ban iarap lem khnang ba un iohlad ban shna thymmai pat da kawei ka ïing ban shong ban sah.Ki dkhot kiba don ha ka Whatsap Group ‘Ka sur u Paidbah Elaka Narpuh’ ki la noh synñiang katba lah ban iarap lem ïa u Bah Pohshna uba la duhnoh ïa ka iingsah bad duhnoh ki jingdon baroh.
title: BAMDUH KI THYLLIEJ DING ÏA KA ÏING U BAH WANMON POHSHNA HA KULIANG

content: Ka eriong kaba jur kaba wanrah lang ia u lapbah bad ia u phria ka la syllad ia kiba bun ki bynta jong ka thain ribhoi sepngi khamtam ha ka thain Jirang kaba la mad ia ka jingjurlor na ka jingshah rat ki tnum iing bad ka jingjulor jong ki jingthung jingtep.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ioh lum, la iathuh ba ka shnong Umsaliang bad ka shnong Umsalani ki dei ki ar tylli ki shnong kiba la shah ktah jur bha haduh ba kawei ka longkmie kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Khuni Killing ka la mynsaw jur ha kane ka jingjia bad kumba 44 tylli ki longiing ki la shah ktah.U Block Development Officer ka Jirang C&RD Block u Dr. Pabitra R Hajong ha ka jingiakren bad u nonglum khubor u la pyntip ba kane ka la jia ha ka por kumba 4 baje eiei janmiet jong ka 31 tarik u Lber, 2024 kat haduh ba ki iing ki sem ki la shah rat lut bad ki dieng ki la khyllem ha surok bad kah ruh ïa ka lynti ïaid.Na ka liang jong u BDO lem bad ki Pulit jong ka Rani Border Out Post ki la leit mar mar sha kane ka jaka hynrei ki la sahkut ha lynti namar ka jingkhyllem jong ki dieng hapdeng surok.U BDO u la bthah ruh ïa ki nongshong shnong ban rieh shipor ha ki iing skul bad ha ki iing dorbar kiba don ha kane ka shnong khnang ban lait na u slap bad na ka lyer katba ka Sorkar ka dang pynkhreh ia ki lad jingïarap.Kat haduh ba la pynmih ia kane ka khubor, la ioh jingtip ruh ba ki dang don sa kiwei kiwei ki shnong kiba shah ktah jur ha ka jingsyllad ka eriong bad ka jinghap jong u phria kum ha ka shnong Nongrim Jirang.
title: SYLLAD KA ERÏONG HA JIRANG, MYNSAW KA LONGKMIE, JULOR 44 TYLLI KI ÏING

content: : Ha kawei na ka jingjia ïa tyngkhuh kali kaba la jia ha ka 31 tarik, Lber, 2024, ar ngut ki samla kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Khrawbor Pakma bad u David Sajem ki la duh ei ïa la ka jong ka jingim, hadien ba ka Scooty kaba ki shong kaba don ïa u number ML05 AB 5721, ka la leit tynrah ïa kawei ka kali Hyundai Eon bad ha kajuh ka por ka la leit tynrah pat sa ïa ka shaka jong kawei ka Trok.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum na ki bor Pulit, la iathuh ba kine ki arngut ki samla kiba dei na West Jaintia Hills ki la ngat ha kane ka jingjia ha ka por 3.30 baje janmiet katba ki dang iaid lynti ha surok Shillong By-pass kaba don hajan Tyndai Resort.Ka tyllong khubor na ki Pulit ka iathuh ba kane ka la jia tang namar ba ka Scooty ba la shong da kine ki ar ngut ki la thmu ban knieh ïaid shakhmat ïa kawei ka kali Hyundai Eon kaba don ïa u number ML 05 K 2600 ba la ñiah da u Bah B. Marbiangbor Thangkiew na Nongkseh, Upper Shillong bad ha ka jingpynher ïa ka Scooty ki la leit ban tynrah kylla ïa kane ka kali bad hadien kata, ka Scooty ka la leit ban tynrah sa ia ka shaka jong kawei ka trok kaba don ïa u Number ML 11 8622, ba la ñiah da u Iohbor Lapasam na ka shnong Shangpung, East Jaintia Hills  kat haduh ba kine ki ar ngut ki la shah iuh na ki bynta jong ka khlieh bad duh syndon ïa la ka jingim.Hadien ba ki Pulit ki la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit ki la rah noh ïa ka met jong kine ki ar ngut sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh ban pyndep ïa ka Post Mortem.
title: ÏAP HASHEN ARNGUT KI SAMLA NA WJH HA KA JINGTAKHUH KALI HA SHILLONG BY-PASS

content: Ka Jaintia Students Union (JSU) ka lah maham tyngeh ia u Gopal Deu bad ia ka Committee jong u ba kim dei ban pynshit lane kynnoh kulmar ia ki dkhot ka KSU ba ki dei kiba donkti ban pyniap ia ki ar ngut bar jylla ha ha Ichamati .“U Gopal Dey um dei ban shu kynnoh kulmar bad ka seng ka lah ong ba ki bor Pulit ki dei ban pynngat bad shitom hapoh ka aiñ ia u kum kine ki briew kiba kynnoh khlem ki sabut satar ba biang,” la ong ka seng ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President u Bah Jersom Shylla.“Lada jia eiei ia ki bar jylla la shu kynnoh beit ia ki dkhot sengbhalang na ka por sha ka por bad ka seng ka maham ruh ia u Gopal Dey ba um dei ban shu kynnoh khlem ka sabut bad ka kynhun tohkit ki Pulit ki la leh la ka kamram,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ka seng ka dawa ruh ia ki bor synshar distrik bad ia ka sorkar ba da leilei ym dei ban ailad ban pynlong jingialang ki ne ki kynhun poiei ka CWC namar kan nang pynshit ia ki dkhot ka jaitbynriew bad kan nang wanrah shuh shuh ia ka jingsngew pher jaitbynriew bad ia umsnam,”  la ong ka Seng.“Ka seng ka buh jingkylli ruh na ka Sorkar Jylla ba ia ki bar jylla thrang snam kiba dkhat bad pyniap ia ka mynsiem ba lui lui jong u samla Lurshai Hynniewta ha Ichamati, hato la iohkem neem ia ki bad haei lah set ia ki ?   Ka JSU ka lah dawa na ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban sei madan ia ka case bad ban pynpaw pyrthei ia kito ki bar jylla kiba dkhat bad pyniap ia ka jingim u samla jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
