title: SHAEI JAH KA COMMITTE U GOPAL DEY POR BA SHAH PYNIAP U SAMLA LURSHAI HYNÑIEWTA: JSU

content: : Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO) ha ka sngi u Blei ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills u SC Sadhu ban ym ai jingbit ïa ka Meghalaya Linguistic Minority Forum (MLMDF) kaba la pynbna ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih da kaba ïashong kyllaiñ myngor ha Khyndai Lad, Shillong.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u President ka HITO Bah Donbok Dkhar u la ong, ka seng ka pyrshah jur ban ai jingbit ïa ka MLMDF hapoh ka jingïalam u SK Choudhary, ban pynlong ïa ka jingïashong kyllaiñ myngor halor ka jingshah pynïap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla ha Ichamati, Shella.“Watla ka dei ka hok jong ki paidbah ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih, hynrei ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih kaba jaijai ha kum kane ka por ka lah ban nang aiding bad kan pynmih ïa ka jingsngew ïapher jaitbynriew ha ka jaka ka jong ngi,” ula ong.“Ngi kyntu ïa ki jaitbynriew ki bym dei Khasi ba ki dei ban sngewnguh ïa ka jingshisha ba ki paid Khasi kila ïai bteng ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka hok ka jongki mynta la palat 76 snem (1948-2024) ha kaba kila mad ïa ka jingeh na ka jingshah knieh ïa ka khaïi pateng bad ka kam saiñ hima sima ha ki briew kiba nabar bad na ka jingbym pynurlong ïa ka jingkular ka ri ïa ka jingïatehkular ha kaba ïadei bad ka Annexed Agreement hapoh jong ka jingbuh ïa ki kyndon jong ka Instrument of Accession kaba la ïasoi bad mynjur da ka sorkar India bad ki paid Khasi mynta la 76 snem,” ong u Bah Dkhar ha ka dorkhas ba la phah sha u DC.“Ka National Commission for Schedule Tribes (NCST) ha u ïaïong 2012 ka la phah ïa ka jingbthah ïa ka Ministry of Home Affairs bad Ministry of Tribal Affairs jong ka Sorkar India ban pynrung ïa ki kyndon jong ka Annexed Agreement ha ka riti synshar ka ri hynrei haduh mynta la kyntait ban leh ïa katei da ka Sorkar Pdeng bad Sorkar Jylla bad ki la pynlong kamkai ïa ka Article 338A jong ka riti synshar ka ri India,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Dkhar.“Ka jingbym pyndep ïa katei ka jingïatehkular ka la wanrah ïa ka jingbym shngaiñ ïa ki paid riewlum Khasi bad kumta ki ïai bteng ban pynlong ïa ki jingïakhih bad ban bteng ban ïakhun ha ka lynti jong ka ri synshar paidbah,” u la bynrap.“Ka HITO kam pyrshah ïa ka MLMDF ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih bad kadei ka hok lyngba ka riti synshar ka ri ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih kaba jai jai halor kano kano ka mat, hynrei lada ailad ba ka MLMDF ban pynlong ïa katei ka jingïakhih, ngi ki HITO ngi kwah ban pan jingbit lang ban ïalum ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih kaba jai jai ban dawa ïa ka hok halor ka jingshah pynïap u (L) Lurshai Hynñiewta ha katei kajuh ka sngi bad ka juh hi ka jaka kaba pynlong da ka MLMDF ha Shella, Sohra ne Shillong,” ong u Bah Dkhar.Haba pynrem jur ïa ka jingkynnoh ka CWC pyrshah ïa ka KSU, ka HITO ka la ong, “katba ki Pulit kim pat ïoh ïa ki sakhi sabut ka long kaba kloi eh ban kynnoh ba ki trai ri trai muluk ki la leh ïa ka kam thombor kiba la jia ha kylleng ka jylla pyrshah ïa ki jaitbynriew Bengali, ym lah ban tip ba ka lah ban dei ruh ka kam kaba la leh da kiwei pat ban pynjah burom ïa ka jaitbynriew Khasi, Jaiñtia bad ki Garo.
title: THOH KA HITO SHA U DC BAN YM AI JINGBIT ÏA KA MLMDF BAN ÏAKHIH HA KHYNDAI LAD

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) ka la rai ban pynlong ia ka jingiakhih ha ka 7 tarik, Iaiong, 2024 ha nongbah Shillong bad ther tyngeh ruh ïa ka Coordination and Welfare Committee (CWC) bad kynnoh ba kane ka kynhun ka la warnah ia ka jingïapher jaitbynriew halor ka jingshah pynïap ki arngut ki bar jylla ha Ichamati.Ha u kyrwoh, u President ka HNYF Bah Sadon Blah ula ong, “katba ki Pulit ki dang tohkit ïa kane ka jingjia, kumno ka Coordination and Welfare Committee ka la shu kdew kti beit da kaba pynïasnoh ïa ka KSU bad ka jingpynïap ïa u Isan Singh bad u Sujit Dutta.”“Ngi sngew ba ka dei ka jingpyrshang jong ki ban wanrah ïa ka jingïakynad pher jaitbynriew bad jinghuri hura kaba ngin ym ailad satia,” u la bynrap.U Bah Blah u la ther tyngeh ïa ka Meghalaya Linguistic Minority Forum (MLMF) namar ka jingai aiding da kaba pynbna paidbah ban pynlong ïa ka jingïashong kyllaiñ myngor halor ka jingshah pynïap kine ki arngut, kaba ha ryngkat bad ka CWC ki la shim ïa ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka jingïakynad jaitbynriew na ki kam bymman kiba shu jia ryngkhat.“Ka HNYF ka pyrshah jur ïa kano kano ka jingpyrshang jong kum kine ki kynhun ban aiding ïa ka jingïakynad jaitbynriew hapoh ka Jylla da kaba leh ïa ki kam sngew ïapher jaitbynriew ki bym donkam satia, ïa kiba ka jaitbynriew Khasi ka la ïai long kaba jai jai pyrshah ïa ka jingshah pynïap ki briew jong ngi la ka dei ha khappud, sha siat ïap ha ki BSF ne ka jingshah bomïap u (L) Lurshai Hynñiewta,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.“Ka jingthmu ban pynlong ïa ka jingshong kyllaiñ myngor da ka Meghalaya Linguistic Forum ka dei ka jingkob pylleiñ pylleiñ ym tang ïa ka HNYF hynrei ïa ki paid riewlum trai ka Jylla. Kumta, ngi la rai ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih ha ka 7 tarik ïaïong, 2024 pyrshah ïa ka jingkynnoh ba ngi ki paid riewlum ka Jylla ngi dei ki nongpynïap ïa ki bar jylla,” ong u President ka HNYF.
title: JINGJIA HA ICHAMATI: 7 TARIK ÏAIONG RAI ÏAKHIH KA HNYF BA PYNBNA ÏAKHIH KA MLMF

content: Bun tylli ki ïing briew ha ka thaiñ Ri Muliang, West Khasi Hills District ki la julor na ka jingsyllad jong ka erlangthari ha ka sngi u Blei bad ki shnong kiba la shah ktah ki kynthup ïa ka shnong Langpih, ka shnong Tynghor, ka shnong Umyiap bad kiwei kiwei de ki shnong kiba marjan ha kane ka thaiñ.Ka erlangthari kaba la wan ryngkat bad u slap kaba la neh kumba katto katne kynta ka la lied naphang ia ki tin sop ing bad jynrat ruh ia ki dieng ki siej bad ïa ki nar post ilektrik.Ha kane ka jingjia,  ki la don ruh katto katne ngut ki briew kiba la mynsaw bad kat haduh ba la pynmih ia kane ka khubor ym pat lah ban ioh jingkhein ia ki briew kiba la mynsaw.
title: JULOR BUN TYLLI KI ÏING HA KA THAIÑ RI MULIANG BA SYLLAD KA ERLANGTHARI

content: Ka United Hynñiewtrep Movement (UHM) ka la pynrem jur ia ka jingkynthoh bad jingkynnoh ba  khlem nongrim jong ka Coordination and Welfare Com-mittee (CWC) pyrshah ia ka KSU halor ka jingshah pyniap klep ki arngut ki bar jylla ha Ichamati ha ka janmiet jong ka 27 tarik, Lber, 2024.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President ka UHM Bah Charlie J Rani, u la ong, “ka seng ka maham jur ia ka CWC ban shu padiah  khlem nongrim ioh lyngba kane ka jingpadiah kulmar kane ka CWC kan poi pynban sha ka thma kaba heh.”“Ka seng ka sngew ban buh jingkylli na ka Sorkar Jylla hato kito ki mynder kiba shim ia ka jingim jong u Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta (bam kwai ha dwar U Blei) ki lah shah pynsajia neem katkum ka aiñ nalor ba la tip thikna ba dei ma ki kiba leh ia ka kam bymman. Hato ka Sorkar ka la iohkem neem ia u Vicky Dey uba la byrngem ia ka KSU kumjuh ia ka jaitbynriew Hynñiewtrep ban pyniap klep ia ngi,” la ong une u nongialam ka UHM.“U kyrwoh ba shai  lyngba ka UHM sha ki bar jylla bad khamtam kane ka CWC ba wat pynbor ia ngi ki dkhot ka jaitbynriew Hynñiewtrep ba ngin shim ia ki sienjam ba tyngeh lyngba kane ka jingtei pop ia ka KSU bad kumjuh ia ki  dkhot ka jaitbynriew jong ngi haba ka aiñ ka don ban bishar sngewbha wat padiah kulmar,” la maham u Bah Rani.Haba maham ia ka Meghalaya Linguistic Minority Forum (MLMF) ka UHM ka la ong “ka Meghalaya Linguistic Minority Forum ka dei ban sangeh mardor halor ka jingthmu ban shong kyllaiñ myngor ha Khyndailad namar kane kan  long pynban kumba theh umphniang ia ka ding ba dang klang mynta bad lada ka Sorkar kan ailad ia kum kine ki jingthmu jong ka MLMF kan sa poi sha ka jingiapher jaitbynriew bad kan sa mih ruh ka jingiapyni bor bad lada jia kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih lyngba kane ka Sorkar kan hap shim hi ia ka jingkit khlieh.”Ka Seng ka pynrem jur ia ka Sorkar Kmie halor ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) bad kumba ka jaitbynriew hi baroh kawei ka pyrshah kumta ka Seng ruh kan iai pyrshah ia kane ka aiñ iakjakor. Ka Seng ka dawa ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei ban shimkhia ia kane ka mat ban pynsngew ruh sha ki tyndong shkor jong ka Sorkar Kmie ba kam dei ban pyntreikam ia kane ka aiñ hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya ba ha ka jaka jong kane ka dei ban pyntreikam noh mardor ia ka Inner Line  Permit (ILP), ka jingpynrung ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India bad ban pynthikna ia u pud u sam uba biang.
title: MAHAM KA UHM ÏA KA CWC BAN YM PADIAH KULMAR ÏOH POI SHA KA THMA BA HEH

content: : Da ki phew tylli ki iing ki sem ha ka thaiñ Block II, Ri Bhoi District ki la shah punjulor ha ka erïong kaba la wan lynshop ha ka janmiet Sngi U Blei kumba ha ka por 4:00 baje janmiet.Katkum ka jingiohlum jingtip, la iathuh ba kane ka erïong bajur ka la lynshop ym tang ïa ki ïing ki sem ha ka thaiñ khappud Block II hynrei da ki phew tylli ki ing ki sem ha ka thaiñ Jirang ruh ki la shah pynjulor bad kumjuh ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka them Ribhoi.Ha ka thaiñ Block II kaba hap hapoh ka Raid Nongtung, lai tylli ki shnong ki la shah ktah bha ba kynthup ia ka Shnong Ummat-I, Ummat-II bad ka shnong Nongsder ha kaba 28 tylli ki ïing ki la shah pynjulor ha ka erïong erngit bad bun na ki longïing ki la kylla khlem ïing khlem sem.La iathuh shuh shuh ba nalor ka jingpynjulor jong ka eriong ia ki ing ki sem, wat ki jingthung jingtep ruh ki la shah pynjulor ha u Phria.U President jong ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong  Border Area ka Raid Nongtung u Bah Blikshon Sohtun u la iathuh ba ka jingwan lynshop kynsan ka erïong ka la ktah ïa kiba bun ki Longïing longsem kiba la shoing khlem ïing khlem sem namarba ka eriong erngit ka la pynjot pynpra ia ki ïing ki sem jong ki.Na ka liang jong ka Synjuk bad ki nongïalam shnong ki la kyrpad ia ki bor sorkar ba kin phah ban jurip mardor ïa ki longïing kiba shah ktah bad  ha kajuh ka por ban thaw lem ïa ki lad jingïarap sha ki lanot kiba la shah ktah ha ka eriong.
title: JYNRAT KA ERÏONG DA KI PHEW TYLLI KI ÏING HA BLOCK-2, RIBHOI

content: a Hynñiewtrep A`chik National Movement (HANM) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la ujor da ka ejahar sha u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills District pyrshah ia u Gopal Dey uba kam ialade kum u  President jong ka Coordination And Welfare Committee (CWC), na Shella-Bholaganj bad dawa ruh ia ki Pulit ban kem mardor ia u Gopal Dey.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Asst. Secretary ka HANM u Bah Wyraiwan Sohtun u la iathuh ba ka seng ka la mudui da ka ejahar pyrshah Gopal Dey halor ka shithi ba u la phah sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ka 29 tarik, Lber, 2024 uba kam ialade kum u President jong ka Coordination and Welfare Committee, Shella Bholaganj Block and Adjoining Area bad ong ruh ba ka seng kam lah satia ban pdiang ia ka jingteipop pyrshah ia ka KSU halor ka jingshah pyniap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla ha ka 27 tarik, Lber, 2024 ha ka shnong Ichamati.“Ngim don kano kano ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingphah ia ka shithi sha u Myntr Rangbah.  Manla ki nongshong shnong ki don ka hok ban pynpaw ia ki jingeh ki jong ki, hynrei katba ka tnat Pulit ka dang pynlong ia ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia bad kum kine ki jingkynnoh pyrshah ia ka KSU ka long ka bym lah satia ban pdiang bad kane kan wanrah ia ka jingbym iasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ki nongshong shnong ka jylla,” u la ong.“Namarkata, ki Pulit ki dei ban pynshitom ia u Gopal Dey halor kine ki jingkynnoh katkumk ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.   Ka Seng ka shaniah tylli ia ka ain bad ia ka tnat Pulit ha kaba ki nongleh kam bymman ki dei ban shah kem bad ban shah pynngat hapoh ki kyndon ain jong ka ri,” la bynrap u Bah Sohtun.U la ong ruh ba ka seng ka pynrem jur halor ka jingshah pyniap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Ishan Singh bad u Sujit Dutta ha ka shnong Ichamati ha ki runar.“Ngi kyrmen ba ka tnat Pulit kan ym pynslem ban lap ia ki runar kiba leh ia kane ka kam bymman lada dei mano mano ruh bad ai ba ka aiñ kan leh la ka jong ka kamram,” ong shuh shuh u nongialam ka HANM.“Ngi Kyntu ruh ia ka tnat Pulit ban kem ia ki briew kiba pynsaphriang ha ka Social Meidia ia ka shithi ba khlem don jingsoi kaba byrngem ia ka KSU, namarba kane ka shithi ka dei kaba la phah sha u President bad sha u General Secretary ka Khasi Students Union.  Ia ki briew kiba donkti dei ban kem bad ban pynshitom,” la dawa ka HANM.
title: MUDUI EJAHAR KA HANM PYRSHAH ÏA KA CWC HA U SP, DAWA BAN KEM ÏA U GOPAL DEY

content: U Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) Dr BDR Tiwari ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la lum jingïalang ïa ki nongïalam jong ki seng saiñpyrthei bapher bapher na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, ïaïong.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Dr Tiwari u la ïathuh, namarba ka aiom lyiur ka la wan, la bthah ïa ka tnat Pule Puthi bad ïa ka tnat Revenue and Disaster Management ba kin buh jingmut lypa ban long kiba la pynkhreh namarba bun na ki Polling Stations ki dei kiba yn sa buh ha ki skul.“Ngi kwah ban pynthikna ba ka leit ka wan kin ym shah ktah bad ki jaka rieh slap bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam dei ban pynbiang ha ki Polling Station (na ka bynta ka bit ka biang jong ki nongthep vote ha ka sngi thep vote),” u la bynrap.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka jingdon jong ki Polling Station ka la kiew na ka 3512 sha ka 3482 ha ka elekshon MLA ba ladep long ha u snem 2023.U la ong ba ka tnat ka la kut jingmut ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki paidbah bad khamtam ïa ki samla ba kin mih shakhmat ha ka sngi thep vote.“Na ka bynta ka bit ka biang jong ki paidbah ha sor bad kumjuh ruh ki samla ka dei ka jingshah tynjuh kaba khraw ha ka por elekshon.  Ngi la pyntreikam da ki lad ki lynti ha ki Booth Level bad bun na ki Polling Station ki duna bha ka jingpoi jong ki nongthep vote ha ka sngi thep vote, hynrei mynta ngi la shim da ka sienjam kumno ban leh katkum ka jingdon jong ki Polling Booth bad ki jingdon jong ki district. Ngi la ïatreilang bad ki dorbar shnong, ki skul, bad kiwei kiwei ki shlem ai jinghikai ban pynurlong ïa ka thong,”la ong u Tiwari.Ha kajuh ka por, u CEO u la pyntip ba ka Meghalaya nalor ba ka dei ka jaka ba kham jyrngam ki khlaw ki btap, ka Election Commission ka la rai ban pynlong ïa ka Green Election.“Mynta ka jinglong jingman jong ka suiñ bneng ka biang bha ban thung jingthung bad ngi la shim ïa ka rai ban pynlong ïa ka jingthung dieng khnang ban pynsah jingkynmaw ïa ka elekshon. Ha manla ki Polling Station, ngin sa thung ïa ki tynrai dieng bad ki ban ïoh thung ïa ki tynrai dieng kin dei ki nongthep vote shynrang bad kynthei kiba poi nyngkong eh ban thep vote ha ki Polling Station,” u la bynrap.
title: ÏAKREN U CEO ÏA KA TNAT PULE BAD DISASTER MANAGEMENT BAN YM SHAH KTAH KI POLLING STATION HA KA AIOM LYIUR

content: : Ka United Democratic Party (UDP) Amlarem Unit ka la khot bad wer ïa ki nongkyrshan jong ka UDP ba kin ïawer lem ïa ki paralok ba kin ym don ka jingsngew pher party hynrei ban ai jingkyrshan pura ïa u kyrtong ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik, Ïaiong.Ha ka jingïalang kaba la long dang shen ha ka shnong Pdengshakap u MLA ka UDP na Amlarem Constituency Bah Lahkmen Rymbui uba dei ruh u President u la kyrpad ban pynjop ïa u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin khnang ba kan pynsuk ban treikam ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam pynroi bapher bapher hapoh ka Amlarem Constituency.U MDC barim Bah Lamdibok Sumer uba long u Vice President jong ka UDP Amlarem Circle Unit bad u Bah Medling Swer uba long u Working President ki la pynsngew hakhmat ka jingïalang ïa ki thong treikam jong ka party bad kumjuh ruh ka jingpyntyllun ïa ki kam nangne shakhmat ban pynkhreh ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha.U Adviser jong ka UDP Amlarem Unit Bah Kolmen Pohshna u la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ka Amlarem Constituency ba kin ïasnohkti lang kumba la paw ha kine ki san snem ba ladep lyngba ka jingtrei shitom jong u MLA ban wanrah ïa ki song pynroi bad ban kyntiew ïa ka thaiñ ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingwanrah ïa ki Govt. LP School Building, ka umbam umdih, ka ïohkam ïohjam, ki lynti ki synkien bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam jong u paidbah.“Nga kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin klet ïa kino kino ki jingsngew party bad ban ai jingkyrshan pura kumba la bthah da u MLA khnang ba u kyrtong ka RDA un long u MP uba lah ban wanrah ki jingkylla ha ka Jylla hi baroh kawei,” u la ong.’“U Bah Robert June Kharjarin u dei u kyrtong uba dang thymmai bad u bym pat don ïa kano kano ka dak thohbria.U long u Candidate ba dang thymmai u bym pat don kano ka jingthoh bria,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ka RDA ka la jied ïa u kyrtong uba kynsai bad uba la don ka jingnang jingstad bad ka jingshemphang uba lah ruh ban ïasaid ïa ka khia ka shon jong ka jylla ha Parliament.”
title: KYRPAD KA UDP AMLAREM BAN KYRSHAN PURA ÏA U KYRTONG KA RDA HA KA ELEKSHON MP

content: : Kumba 40 pyrton ki Pulit ka Sorkar Pdeng kin sa wan poi ban pahara hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya na ka bynta ban pynthikna ba kan don ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka jingpynlong ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha 19 tarik mynta u bnai.ïa kane la ïathuh da u Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) u Dr BDR Tiwari, bad pyntip ba ka jylla ka la ïohpdiang kumba 40 pyrton ki bor pahara na ka Sorkar Pdeng.Na kine, kumba san pyrton jong ki Pulit CAPF ki ladep don lypa ha ka jylla, bad iathuh kiwei pat yn sa phah pahara katkum ka rukom pyrkhat kam kaba ladep pynbeit lypa.U Dr. Tiwari u la ïathuh ba baroh ki kam ladep ban pynbeit kiba la long katkum ka aiñ.“Ngi la shimkhia ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam khappud hashwa ban pynlong ïa ka elekshon.  Ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ka ladep ban pynmih ruh ïa ki jingbthah kiba donkam sha ki jylla kiba marjan jong ka jylla,” la iathuh u Dr. Tiwari.U la pyhntip, kumba long haduh mynta ki la don kumba ar tylli ki jingujor ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC).
title: 40 PYRTON YN PHAH KA ECI BAN PAHARA SHA MEGHALAYA HA KA ELEKSHON MP, PYNTIP U CEO

content: Ki Pulit ka nongbah Shillong ha ka janmiet jong ka sngi Baar ki la rah ban tian bishar ha Kashari jong u District and Session Judge, East Khasi Hills District ia ki arngut ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) South Khasi Hills District Unit hadien ba la kem ia ki na ka shnong Wah-U-Tim bad na ka shnong Saitsohpen, Sohra ha ka miet shiteng synnia jong ka sngi nyngkong.Kine ki arngut ki dkhot ka KSU kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Shanborlang Shati, 26 snem ka rta bad u Mesadapbor Skhembil, 26 snem ka rta ki la shah kem halor ka jingshah pyniap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla ha ka shnong Ichamati kaba la jia ha ka 27 tarik u bnai baladep kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Ishan Singh bad u Sudip Dutta.Na ka liang jong ka Kashari ka la aibor ia ki Pulit ban set along 7 sngi ia kine ki arngut ki dkhot ka KSU khnang ba ki Pulit kin dup lah ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.Katba ki Pulit ki dang rah ban tian bishar ia kine ki arngut ha Kashari, ki bahaing hasem ki la bud ban synran lang ia ki tad haduh ka khyllipmat ba la mih na Kashari.
title: 7 SNGI AI BOR KA KASHARI ÏA KI PULIT BAN TOHKIT ÏA KI 2 NGUT KI DKHOT KA KSU

content: Arngut ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) South Khasi Hills Unit ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit ka por shiteng synnia halor ka jingsuba ba ki dei kiba donkti ha ka jingshah pyniap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla ha ka shnong Ichamati ha ka 27 tarik u bnai baladep.Kine ki arngut ki dkhot ka KSU kiba la shah kem ha ki Pulit ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Shanborlang Shati 26 snem ka rta na ka shnong Wah-Utim bad u Mesadapbor Skhembil 26 snem na ka shnong Saitsohpen, Sohra.Hadien ba la kem ia kine ki arngut ha ka miet Lah Sngi u Blei, la set ha along jong ka Sohra Police Station bad ha ka step sngi Baar la wanrah noh sha Shillong bad la set ha Sadar Police Station na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit.Ki bahaing hasem ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor habar ka Sadar Police Station ki la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la wan kem ia kine ki arngut ki dkhot ka KSU ha ka por shiteng synnia kumba ha ka por 1:15 baje mynstep sngi Baar.Ki bahaing hasem ki la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la rah ia kine ki arngut ki dkhot ka KSU na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit.Kum ban shu pyntip, ki arngut ki bar jylla kiba la shah pyniap ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Ishan Singh bad u Sujit Dutta. Ia ki metiap jong kine ki bar jylla la lap ha ka por janmiet ha ka shnong Ichamati bad ha Dalda kaba hap hapoh ka Shella Police Station, East Khasi Hills District.Kane ka la jia ryngkat, ha kane ka sngi ba ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la pynlong ia ka jingialang ha ka por mynsngi ban pyrshah ia ka Citizenship (Amendment) Rule, 2024.Ka Coordination and Welfare Committee (CWC) Shella Bholaganj Block dang shen ka la la ujor sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma halor ka jingshah pyniap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla ha ka shnong Ichamati.Ha ka ujor ba la soi da u President ka CWC, Shella Block, Gopal Dey ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ban kem mardor ia ki briew kiba donkti ban pyniap ia u Ishan Singh bad ia u Sujit Dutta ha Ichamati ha ka 27 tarik bad dawa ruh ban aiti ia ka jingtohkit sha ka CBI/NIA lada ki Pulit ka Jylla kim lah ban kem ia ki nongleh kam bymman hapoh shitaiew, ban siew bailutksasn sha ki bahaing hasem jong ki arngut kiba la shah pyniap bad ban pynthikna ia ka jingshngaiñ jong ki bar jylla Hindu kiba buhai shnong ha Ichamati bad ha ki shnong bamarjan.Ka CWC ka la phah ruh ia kane kajuh ka jingujor sha u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri Narendra Modi bad sha u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing Amit Shah bad sha u Lat ka Meghalaya u Phagu Chauhan.Lyngba kane ka ujor, ka CWC, Shella Block ka la teipop ba dei ki dkhot runar jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) kiba la pyniap ia u Ishan Singh bad ia u Sujit Dutta.
title: KEM KI PULIT ARNGUT KI DKHOT KSU HALOR KA JINGSHAH PYNÏAP KI BAR JYLLA HA ICHAMATI

content: Ki nongialam jong ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front(HNYF) ER hapoh ka jing ia lam u samla Pynbiang Rymbai ki la leit ban ai da ka dorkhas hakhmat u Superintendent of Police ka West Jaintia Hills Bah C.Syrti halor ka ka jingshah pyniap dusmon jong u samla Kyrshandame Talang uba sah ha ka shnong Mupliang.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, u samla Kyrshandame Talang la shah pyniap ha ka 10 trik Lber ha khappud ka shnong Mukhla,Myrjai  bad ia ka met jong u la lap ha ka jaka kaba tip kum ka Moosdai bad ia kane la leh da ki riewthrang snam ki bym pat ioh kem haduh mynta mynne.Kine ki nongialam ka seng ki la pyntip ba u SP u la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki dang pynlong ia ka jingtohkit ban lap ksai ia kiba donkti ban pyniap ia u ne u samla.Ka Seng ka kyrpad jur ia u SP ban shimkhia ia kane ka kam khnang ba kum kine ki jait jingjia kin ym jia shuh hadien habud bad ka seng ruh ka pynrem jur ia ki riewthrang snam kiba dkhat jubor ia ka jingim u samla Kyrshandame.
title: ÏAKYNDUH KA HNYF ÏA U SP HALOR KA JINGSHAH PYNÏAP DUSMON U KYRSHANDAME TALANG

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths’ Council (HYC) ka la maham tyngeh ia ka ABVP, ka Students’ Wing jong ka BJP  bad ia ka World Organisation of Students and Youths (WOSY) ba kim dei ban pynlong ia ka skulbah North Eastern Hill University (NEHU) kum ka rynsan leh politik bad ban pynkha ia ka jingsngew iapher jaitbynriew hapoh kane ka skulbah.“La pyntip ia ngi ba ka ABVP kaba dei ka Students’ Wing jong ka BJP ka la pyrshang ban rung shapoh ka Campus da kaba pyndonkam ia ka kynhun kaba la tip kum ka World Organisation of Students and Youths (WOSY) bad ban pynlong ia ki prokram da ka jingiatreilang bad ka RSS kum kaba ladep pynsangeh dang shen da ka HYC.Ka jingrakhe ia ka lehniam Holi hapoh ka Campus da ka WOSY da ka jingiatreilang bad ki dkhot jong ka ABVP/RSS kam dei kaei kaei ruh hynrei ka dei tang ka jingpyrshang ban wanrah ia ka jingsngew iapher jaitbynriew bad ban leh politik ruh ha kajuh ka por.  Baroh shikatta ki snem, ki samla pule, ki nonghikai bad ki nongtrei jong ka NEHU ki ju pynlong ia ki tamasa bad kam ju don kano kano ka jingujor.  Hynrei ban rakhe ia ki tamasa da ka jingthmu ban wanrah ia ka jingsngew iapher jaitbynriew bad ban leh politik ka long kaei kaei kaba ka HYC kam lah ban pdiang,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Education Secretary ka HYC (CEC) Bah Enlang Sawian.“La pyntip ia ngi ba ym shym la ai jingbit ia ka WOSY ban pynlong ia ka prokram bad ban rakhe bad kijuh ki briew ki bym dei ki samla pule jong ka skulbah hapoh ka Campus bad ngi ai ka jingkyrshan bapura ia ka nongrim ba la shim da ki nongkitkam jong ka NEHUSU bad ngi pynrem ia ka jingleh jong kito kiba donkti ban ktah kti ia u Vice-President jong ka NEHUSU. Ngi kyntu ia ki bor Pulit ba kin kem ia ki briew kiba donkti ha ka jingiashoh iadat katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ bad ngi kyntu ruh ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka NEHU ban leh da kaba tyngeh ia ki nongpynlong ia ka prokram. Hynrei lym kumta, ka HYC kan shim hi da ki sienjam ban pynthikna ba u lanot un ioh ia ka hok bad ban pynthikna ruh ba ka skulbah ka dei ban leh da kaba tyngeh ia ki nongpynlong prokram,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Sawian.Ka HYC ka la kynnoh ruh ba ka ABVP ka la pyrshang ban rung ha NEHU Shillong bad ha Tura Campus da ka jingthmu ban pynphriang ia ka politik jingisih bad ban pynkha ia ka jingsngew iapher jaitbynriew da kaba pyndonkam ia ka WOSY namarba kam lah ban rung hi dalade, namarba ka kynthup ia u samla pule Bangladeshi kum u Jurak uba katkum ka jingioh jingtip jong ngi u dei uba don case ban jrong kti kynshleiñ/ktah kti.  Ka ABVP ka la pyrshang ban pynkupbor ia kine ki jaid briew ba la shah wohdong ban rung shapoh ka Campus bad ban leh politik jakhlia hapoh ka skulbah.“Ka HYC ka maham ia ka ABVP bad ia ka WOSY ba ki dei ban long kiba phikir bad ym ban pyndonkam ia ka NEHU na ka bynta ki Agenda politik bad ban pynkha ia ka jingsngew iapher jaitbynriew hapoh ka skulbah. Ngin ym shah ia ki briew ne ia ki kynhun kiba thmu ban pynjngut ia ka kyrteng jong ka NEHU bad ia ka jylla jong ngi baroh kawei namarba kum ka NEHU kam ju shah satia ia kum kine ki kynhun ban iashim bynta ha ki politik jong ki samla haduh mynta.  Ngi kwah ruh ban iohi ba ka status quo kan iai neh wat ha ki snem ki ban sa wan,” la ong shuh shuh ka HYC.“Ngi kyntu ia ki samla pule jong ka NEHU ban long kiba peitngor bad ban leh eiei khnang ban pynthikna ba ka skulbah ka dei ban long kaba laitluid na ki Political Agenda bym larkam jong kine ki ar jait ki kynhun ne ki briew,” la bynrap ka HYC.
title: WAT PYNKHA ÏA KA JINGÏAPHER JAITBYNRIEW BAD LEH POLITIKS HA NEHU, MAHAM KA HYC ÏA KA ABVP BAD WOSY

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) South Khasi Hills District Unit ka la wer ia ki dkhot bad ia ki kmie ki kpa jong ki dkhot ba kin mih paidbah lashai ka sngi Balang ban tur sha Sohra Police Station halor ka jingshah kem jong ki arngut ki dkhot ka seng ha ka por shiteng synñia ka Lah Sngi u Blei ha ki Pulit.U President ka seng  u samla Ribok Diengdoh ha u kyrwoh video ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Baar u la ong, “lashai ka sngi (Balang) hapoh 12 baje mynsngi ngan poi hapoh Sohra Police Station. Ki dkhot kiba shynrang mynsiem ki dei ban mih. Ki kmie ki kpa kiba sngewthuh ia ka jingshah nioñ beiñ ha kum kine ki jait briew ki dei ban mih nangne shakhmat.Lada phi lah ban pynthikna ba nga dei uba donkti bad u nongpyniap briew, pynthikna    lashai ka sngi. Phi dei ban pynthikna. Nga, nga dei u khun dap shynrang i mei bad ym shym la kha bad i mei im shym la sneng ia nga khie ma me ynda la heh la san khie leit pyniap briew,” la ong une u nongialam ka seng.“Kum u nongialam, nga dap da ka jingsngewkhia namar kaei kane kaba ngi, ngim sngewthuh shuh. Haoid ngi sngewthuh ba kane ka jingpynlong sohpdung jong ki Pulit ka dei beit ka jingjia ha Ichamati (Pynthaumdan). Ka jingong jong ki, ka dei kaba shu jler suda. Ka jingong jong ki ban shu shim jingkylli kam dei pat ba kin leit mynmiet myniong. Haei ju don ka aiñ ban leit kem mynmiet myniong ia ki briew. Kata nga kwah ban buh jingkylli,” la buh jingkylli shuh shuh une u nongialam ka KSU.Haba pynrem ia ki Pulit, u samla Ribok u la ong, “ka rukom kem jong ki (Pulit) ka long thik kum ia u lehnoh (namarba) 1:30 baje mynstep ki shu leit kem na iing.  Lada ym don briew ha ing, kin  shoh kin bom bad kin ong ba u pynap da ka tari kumba pynap u Bah Cheris. (Hato ka) long hi kata?”“Mar syn iohkem ia ki dkhot jong ngi arngut la pyllait ha ki lad pathai khubor katba ia kito ki briew ba la iohi pyllein pyllien da ka Video Clip ba ki shim ia ka mynsiem jong u Lurshai haduh mynta ngim ioh sngew ba kin pynpaw ia ka kyrteng ba katno ngut ki la kem.  Ban shu kynnoh kam dei ka kam kaba suk, bad lada phi donkam khot ia ngi, ngi kloi ban wan shapoh Thanat,” u la ong.“Naduh ka taiew ba ladep jong ka sngi Balang, sngi Palei, sngi Thohdieng, sngi Saitjain ka mobile phone jong ngi ka dang meh. Ha ka sngi Saitjain ngi dang don ha Sohra tad haduh ka lah Sngi u Blei ba ngi kiew Shillong. Hynrei balei ha kita ki lai sngi saw sngi phim lah ban phone ia ngi ban phah wan mih sha Thanat. Phi mut ban shu sylla ba ngi dei ma ngi kiba pyniap ia kita ki briew. bad nga lah ban ong ba lehse ioh dei ka kynja ishu ba ngi leit ban beh ia kito ki dkhar nongtrei jong ki Minister bad ban ong sa peit kaei ka ban jia phi mut ban leh da kumne. bad phi mut ban revenge bad buhnud buhnam ia ngi da kane ka rukom.Lada phi kwah ban tohkit ia ki khynah, ai da ka kot, khot ia ki shapoh thanat nga ruj nga kloi ban wan,” la ong u samla Ribok.“Ngim donkti ma ngi ha kata ka jingpyniap briew. Lada phi kwah ban kylli tohkit, kylli da kawei ka rukom, ym dei ban tan shiteng miet shiteng iong. Phi mut ba ki dei ki nongkyndong phin shu lehbeiñ ia ki ba kim tip ia ka ain. Hato ka ju don kata ka aiñ ban shu khot ia ki briew sha Thanat tang ban shim jingkylli kin da leit kem shi baje shiteng mynmiet ha ing,” la buh jingkylli une u nongialam ka KSU ia ka tnat Pulit.“Wat khang, haduh ba ngan da poi ha Sohra Police Station bad ngin iakren kaei ka ban mih bad kaei ka ban jia,” u la bynrap.“Lada phi mut ban shim jingkylli kumne kumtai kumno ka jia ha kato ka sngi, dei ban phah da ka kot bad phah wan mih ia ki (dkhot) shapoh thanat bad hynnin nga dang iohsngew ba ki (Pulit) ki leit hapoh 1:30 baje mynstep, ki wad ia nga, nga ngam dei ba nga tieng ba nga rieh hynrei nga beh la ka kam nga wan kiew sha shillong. Ngam shym la rieh bad nga pangmet haba ki khynah lajong kin shah  kem. Nga dei u nongialam, nga sngewthuh ban iohi ba ki bahaing ki iam nga ruh nga pang ka mynsiem,”  ong une u nongialam ka KSU.“Ki khynnah jong ngi ki dang bun kiba dang pule kan jia aiu ia ki?  Ka jingleit klas jong ki kam myntoi shuh lada phi pynngat Case. Ka kam ka jam kim ioh shuh. Mynta ngi, ngin pynthikna wat pynngat case ia kine ki khynnah katba phim pat pynthikna mano ba donkti ban pyniap ia kito ki briew da kaba shu tharai.  Ban shu ong u briew ba dei kita ki dei kita phin shu ngeit noh phi hap ban wad jingtip haduh ban da lap.  Phin da lap ia kita ki briew pynshitom katkum ka aiñ lada ki don kita ki briew kiba nud ban shim ia ka mynsiem briew.  Ngin sa ia peitkai ha kaei ka kyndon phi pynngat ia ngi bad lada phi, phim don ia ka sakhi kaba biang ngin sa ia peit kai. Na ka liang jong ka seng ngi don la ka iktiar ba ngin leh na ka bynta jong phi kiba shu thombor,” ong shuh shuh u Samla Ribok Diengdoh.Haba buh jingkylli ia ka tnat Pulit, u samla Ribok u la ong, “naduh ba iap u Lurshai Hynñiewta, saw snem kynthi ngi leit buh syntiew manla u snem kam ju don kano kano ka jingjia. Lada dei ma ngi kiba pyniap briew saw snem kynthih ngi la wan kam la jia kaei kaei ha kito ki sngi. Ngi tang shu dep ka kamram ngi la phet. Ngi kwah ia ki bor jong ka aiñ ba kin leh da kaba donkam ia ki briew kiba pyniap ia u Lurshai.  Hynrei mynta phin shu kynnoh ba dei ma ngi? Sangeh noh ka kem naduh lashai ka sngi nga la wan shapoh Sohra bad wat kem ia ki dkhot jong ngi. Lada phi kwah kylli jingkylli, kylli na kita kiba don bad kiba ia leit.”“Lada phi mut ban shim jingkylli kumne kumtai kumno ia ka jingjia ha kato ka sngi, dei ban phah da ka kot (hajir) bad phah wan mih ia ki shapoh Thanat bad hynnin nga dang iohsngew ba ki (Pulit) ki leit (kem) hapoh 1:30 baje mynstep.  Ki wad ia nga, nga ngam dei ba nga tieng ba nga rieh hynrei nga beh la ka kam nga wan kiew sha shillong,” u la ong shuh shuh.
title: MYNTA 12 BAJE MYNSNGI YN TUR KI DKHOT KA KSU SHA SOHRA POLICE STATION

content: Shillong, Ïaiong 3 : U President ka HYC Sohra Circle u Bah Cornerstone Sohtun u la khot la wer ia ki paidbah ba kin ia mih ryntih ha ka por 12 baje jong ka 3 tarik u ïaiong 2024 ban ia snohkti lang bad ka KSU ban tur sha Sohra Police Station kum ka dak ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingshah kem ki 2 ngut ki dkhot ka KSU kiba la shah kynnoh ba ki donkti ban pyniap ia ki 2 ngut ki bar jylla ha Ichamati.Ka HYC-Sohra Circle ka pynpaw ia ka jingbitar ban iohi ba ki Bor pulit ki kloi bha ban thwet bad kem ia ki dkhot jong ki Sengbhalang haba don kano kano ka jingjia. Ki kloi ruh ban pynkit ia jingshah kynnoh ha ki dkhot jong ki Sengbhalang ka Ri Lum Khasi-Jiantia lada jia ei ei ia u Mynder shisngi. Hynrei lada jia ei ei ia u Paradoh parasnam jong ngi, ki ialeh ban tem bad pynthynda katba lah. Ka jingkem ia ki dkhot ka KSU-Sohra shiteng miet shiteng synnia bad ban pynngat ia ki kloi lan ha ki kyndon ain watla khlem da don ki sabut satar kiba biang halor ka jingjia ha Pyntha Umdan (Ichamati) ka long kaei kaei ka ba ngim lah ban pdiang kum ki dkhot ka Jaidbynriew.Ki bor pulit ki leh klet bad kim leh ei ei haba u Vicky Dey u byrngem byrsit ia ki dkhot ka Jaidbynriew. Wat haduh mynta kim shym la lah satia ban kem ia une u briew. Ym dei ba kim lah hynrei ngi tip bha ba kadei namar ba kim ioh bor satia na ki bor ba halor ki jong ki ba kin kem. Hynrei ia ki jong ngi pat tang da ki katto katne kynta lane sngi ki kloi ban thwet bad kem tang ban pynhun ia ki bor ba halor ki jong ki.Kumta, kum ka Seng, ngi khot, ngi wer bad ngi kyntu ia baroh ki Nongshong Shnong ka Dong ka Thain Sohra ba kin ia mih ryntih lashai ka sngi, kumba lah khot lah wer da u Nongialam ka KSU South Khasi Hills, ba phin ia mih lang ryntih ban tur sha Sohra Police Station ha ka por 12baje nohphai sngi ban pynpaw sha ki bor pulit bad ka Sorkar ba kim dei ban leh mata madei ia ka lawei ki khun samla ka thain jong ngi da kaba pynngat ki case ba har rukom namar kan ktah ia ka lawei ka jong ki bad kumjuh ruh ban pynpaw ba kum ki nong shong shong ka dong ka thain ngi pynrem jur ia ka jingleh jong ki Pulit bad ki bor Sorkar ban shu pharep kulmar ia ki khun samla jong ngi, pynkut ka kyrwoh na ka HYC Sohra Circle.
title: WER KA HYC ÏA KI PAIDBAH BAN ÏA MIH RYNTIH BAN TUR SHA SOHRA POLICE STATION

content: U General Secretary ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) samla Donald V. Thabah ha ka sngi Palei u la kyntu ia ka sorkar ba kan ym pynjynjar bad pyntyrha shuh ia ki dkhot jong ka seng, hynrei lym kumta ka seng kam banse ban shim da kiwei pat ki sienjam kaba lah ban ktah ia ka shongsuk shongsain bad kaba lah ban ktah pat ia ki bor sorkar.Une u nongialam ka KSU  u la pynpaw ia kane halor ka jingkem jong ki Pulit ia ki arngut ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students Union, South Khasi Hills District Unit na ka shnong Wah-u-Tim bad na ka Shnong Saitsohpen dang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi halor ka jingshah pyniap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla ha ka shnong Ichamati ha ka 27 tarik u Lber.Halor ka jingphah dorkhas ka Vishwa Hindu Parishad (VHP) sha ka President ka Ri India ka Droupadi Murmu ban tuklar halor ka jingshah pyniap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla ha Ichamati bad kumjuh ruh ia ka jingdawa jong ka Coordination and Welfare Committee (CWC) Shella Bholaganj Block ia ka Sorkar ban kem mardor ia kiba donkti bad ka jingpynbna jong ka Meghalaya Linguistic Minority Forum (MLMF) ban pynlong ia ka jingiakhih shong kyllain myngngor ha Khyndai Lad, na ka liang jong une u nongialam jong ka KSU u la ong ba seng kan ym shong kli kti namarba lada ma ki, ki iakhih ia ka jingshah banbein jong ki parajait ki jong ki, ka KSU ruh kan hap  ban mih ban iada ia ka jingshah banbein jong ki paradoh ki parasnam la jong.Haba phah kyrwoh jingmaham sha ka VHP ha ka jingrakhe ia ka Sngi Kyrsiew Ri (Khasi National Awakening Day), u General Secretary ka KSU u la ong, “ngi, ngim ju tuklar ia ka kam jong ka VHP sha dewbah India, ka VHP ruh kam dei ban wan tuklar ia ki kam ki jam hapoh ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep. Ka VHP kam dei ka seng kaba long seng trai ri hapoh kane ka ri Khasi, ka dei ka Foreign Agency, ka Foreign Organsation bad kam dei ban tuklar eiei ha kaba iadei bad ka jinglong jingman ha kane ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep.”“Sa kawei ka kyrwoh ia ka VHP halor ka jingong ba ka peit ia baroh ki nongshong shnong India, hynrei kaba sngewphylla ka long ba ka VHP ka peit pynban ia kita ki mynder poiwir kiba wan buhai shnong kiba ioh ia ki kot ki sla lyngba ki kam buit tuh bad kam peit ia ngi ki trai ri trai muluk jong kane ka jaka. Kane ka pyni ia ka jinglong arsap jong ka VHP,” la kynthoh u samla Thabah.“Kaba khatduh ka khubor ia ka VHP, lada phi sngew ba phi don ia ka jingkitkhlieh ia ka jinglong jingman hangne hapoh ka jylla jong ngi, tehlakam shwa ia ki dkhot jong ki, kiba don hangne hapoh Shillong, kiba iaid rally mynshem snem hapoh Laban ha ka sngi u Blei kiba ieng hakhmat ka khyrdop jong ka Ingmane Grace Covenant Church bad ha Laban Presbyterian Church kiba hylla Jai Shri Ram, kiba hylla ia ki kyntien shitniam ban byrngem byrsit ia ki paradoh parasnam jong ngi kiba dang shong jingiaseng. Lada kam leh kumta, ka mut ba kane ka seng ka shu long tang na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jongno re jongno. Ka KSU kam tieng kam smiej bad kan ym ailad hi ruh ia kine ban wan pynduh mynsiem, ban thombor ia ki paradoh parasnam ki jong ngi,” u la ong shuh shuh.
title: KA VHP KA DEI TANG KA FOREIGN AGENCY, WAT WAN TUKLAR HAPOH KA BRI U HYNÑIEWTREP : KSU

content: : U General Secretary ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) samla Donald V. Thabah ha ka sngi Palei u la kynthah ia ki Politishian da kaba ong naduh ba ka Meghalaya ka la ioh ia la ka jong ka jylla, kam pat don wat tang kawei ruh ka ain kaba ka jylla ka la lah ban pynurlong hynrei ha kine ki sanphew snem lait noh tang ka aiñ Land Tranfers Act kaba la wanrah da u Martin N. Majaw.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, une u nongialam ka KSU u la ong, “naduh ba ngi dang ioh ia ka jylla, ki bun hi ki bym pat lah ban kren bad ki bym pat lah ban pynurlong hynrei lait noh sa tang u Bah Martin N. Majaw (bam kwai ha dwar u Blei) ba la lah ban wanrah ia ka Meghalaya Land Transfer Act, bad katto katne ngut ki riewsaiñ pyrthei.  Hynrei ha kine ki por leilei, ngi iohi ba ki Politishian jong ngi ki thiang tang ka ktien.  Lada ki kren ha ki rynsan paidbah, kin kren shaphang ka jingieid jaidbynriew hynrei ynda ki la jop, ynda ki la shong ha ki shuki, kaei kaba ki leh? Kata ka dei kaba ngi kum ki paidbah ngim dei shuh tang ban shu kylli, hynrei ngi la sngewthuh ba kum kine ki jait briew ki dei kiba long kumno. Ngim pat iohi ia kano kano ka kam kaba ki ai na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew jong ngi kan shong shngaiñ ne ba ki mynder ri kiba wan buhai shnong hapoh ka Bri u Hynniewtrep kin shah weng noh na kane ka jaka jong ngi.”U la iathuh ruh ba ka jingdawa jong ka KSU ka la sdang naduh ka por ba u Bah Banshan Sing Nongbet u dang long u President ka seng namarba ka jingbun palat ki mynder dei ban lap.“Ha ka Jylla Assam, mynshwa ka la don kawei ka aiñ Illegal Migrants Determination by Tribunal, 1983, hynrei ki ong ba kane ka ktah ia ka Citizenship Act, 1955, ka Foreigners Act, 1946 bad kiwei kiwei kaba long palat ia ka aiñ ka pynduh noh ia ka snap jong ka Illegal Migrants (Determination by Tribunal), Act, 1983. Lada ngi peit ia ka CAA ruh ka long palat ia ka aiñ bad kane ka ktah ia ka Foreigners Act, 1946. Haba ka All Assam Students Union ka pynlong ia ka jingiakhih ha Mangaldoi bad Darrang District da ka Anti-Foreigners Movement, ki la soi ha u snem 1985 ia ka Assam Accord kaba pdiang haduh mynta bad katkum ka Assam Accord u snem ot kyrteng (Cut-off Year) ka dei naduh ka 24 tarik, Lber, 1971 namarba dei hadien u snem 1971 ba da ki million ngut ki Bangladeshi bad ki Pakistani ki wan rung sha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi. Lada u snem ot kyrteng u treikam, ka mut, ba bun hi ki mynder ri bad ki bar jylla kin shah buh ha ki Detention Camp bad kin duh noh ia ka hok long nongshong shnong jong ka ri India,” la ong u samla Thabah.“Ka KSU ka dawa nyngkong ia u snem 1951 kum u snem ot kyrteng, hynrei ha ka por jong u Bah Paul Lyngdoh hadien ka jingiakren bad ki nongsynshar shnong bad ki nongsynshar Hima ha kato ka por, ki la pdiang noh ia u snem ot kyrteng ha u snem 1971. Haduh kine ki sngi, ka KSU ka ieng beit ha ka nongrim ba u snem ot kyrteng un dei beit ha ka  24 tarik, Lber, 1971,” u la ong bad bynrap, “lada ka Sorkar ka aidaw da kumne bad da kumtai ka dei ban pynpaw paidbah ia ka jingiapher ha ka jingbunbriew ha ka khanasamari jong u snem 1951, 1971 bad u 1981.”“Lynga ka jingiapher ka jingroi ki bar jylla ha kane ka jylla, ngi lah ban sngewthuh shai ba ka jingwan rung kyrthep jong ki mynder ri ka jur bha. Lada ngi peit ia ka jingkharoi ki nongshong shnong ha ka khanasamari 2001 ruh ka kiew haduh 27%, kaba heh tam ha India bad kaba heh tam ban ia ka National Average. Ki riewshemphang ki ong ba kane ka  dei ka bym lah ban long ba ki kynthei kin shu kha khun palat ban poi haduh 27%. Ka Sorkar lada ka nud ba kam don shisha ka jingktah ka dei ban pynpaw paidbah ia ka jingiapher ka jingkharoi ki nongshong shnong jong ki bar jylla jong ka khanasamari 1951, 1971 bad 1981,” la ong shuh shuh une u nongialam ka KSU.
title: IENGSKHEM KA KSU BA U SNEM 1971 UN DEI U SNEM OT KYRTENG ÏA KI MYNDER HA MEGHALAYA

content: Ka Khasi Students Union kaba la rakhe ia ka Sngi Kyrsiew Ri (Khasi National Awakening Day) ha ka 4 tarik, Iaiong, ka la teh ia ki banner ba dawa ban pyllait na along ia ki arngut ki dkhot jong ka seng kiba la shah kem dang shen na ka shnong Sohra, ka jingpyrshah ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) bad ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingtih Uranium na kane ka jylla bad ka jingdawa ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP).U General Secretary ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) samla Donald V. Thabah ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba ka Seng ka la thmu ban pynlong ia kane ka jingrakhe ha Khliehriat, East Jaiñtia Hills District hynrei namar ka jingbym shah jong ki bor synshar ka East Jaiñtia Hills namar ka jingtreikam jong Model Code of Conduct (MCC) na ka jingdon jong ka Elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai, kumta ka KSU kam shym la pynlong shuh ia ka jingrakhe ia kane ka sngi Kyrsiew ri ha ka shnong Khliehriat.“Ki dkhot ka KSU ki la leit ban pan jingbit na u Deputy Commisisoner ka East Jaiñtia Hills ha kaba u la phah sha u Chief Electoral Officer. U CEO u la ong ba um don jingpyrshah eiei lada ki bor synshar district ki ai jingbit.  Ki bor synshar district ki la shu pyntip tang da ka ktien ba kin ai jingbit hynrei ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ka la pyntip ba ym lah shuh ban ai jingbit da kaba aidaw ba ka don ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC).”“Haba ki ai ia kata ka daw kam leilei bad na ka liang jong ngi, ngi wad ia kiwei ki lad ki lynti kumno ban pynsngew lyngba ka Social Media sha ki paidbah ia ka jingdonkam jong kane ka Sngi Kyrsiew Ri. Kane kam dei ka jingtheh um pja ia ngi hynrei ha ki snem ki ban wan, ngi sa bteng ia ki prokram kiba pher bapher kiba kham heh ha kane ka sngi kaba kyrpang.  Ha kata ka por, ngin ong beit ba wat ai daw bad la shem snem kam don ka elekshon bad ngi, ngin iaid beit shakhmat bad ka prokram.”Haba kylli, u la ong, “kane kam dei shuh kaba dang thymmai, haba don kano kano ka jingjia, naduh ki snem kiba mynshwa ngi la tip ka kynhun kaba shah pynlong sohpdung ka dei ka KSU, ki ban shah kem nyngkong kin dei beit ki dkhot ka KSU. Kano kano ka jingjia kaba don ka jingiatakhuh hapdeng ki mynder bad ki Khasi lane tengteng ngim tip ioh dei para mynder ruh ngi tip thikna ba ka kynhun kaba shah pynlong sohpdung ha ka Sorkar ka dei beit ka KSU.”“Kam pher lada ki leh kumta hynrei ma ngi ruh ngi ieng ha ka nongrim bad hynnin ka sngi ngi la leit ban tud bad ki dkhot jong ngi ruh khamtam kito kiba shah khynra na ing ki la leit haba phi wan khynra na ing phim ioh, kem mynta. Hynrei ka jingkylli ka long, haba la leit ban aiti kumto hynnin hynrei balei kim kem. Kata ka dei ka jingkylli kaba da ki million sien ia ka tnat Pulit,” la kynthoh une u nongialam ka KSU bad bynrap, “phi leit khynra ia u Reebok Diengdoh na ing phim ioh, shiteng synnia phi leit khynra, hynrei ynda u la leit aiti mynsngi mynshai ban aiti hi phim kem. Hato ka jingthmu jong ki ym dei ban kem hynrei ban leh da kumwei ruh kata ka dei kawei kaba ma ngi, ngi hap ban puson.”Hynrei watla katta ka seng ka la shim da ka rai ban pynlong noh da ka lympung ialehkai Maitshaprang Khasi League Basketball, kaba la long ha madan ialehkai Basketball ha Mawlai Nongpdeng.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingbym ioh ban pynlong ia kane ka jingrakhe mynta ka sngi, General Seceretary ka KSU u la ong ba ki bor sorkar kim dei ban ai daw ha u snem u ban sa wan.
title: KA SNGI KYRSIEW RI: DAWA KA KSU BAN PYLLAIT ÏA KI DKHOT BA SHAH KEM

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit ha ka sngi Palei ka la rakhe ia ka Sngi Kyrsiew Ri (Khasi National Awakening Day) ha Khliehriat hakhmat u mot ba la tei pynsahnam ia u Woh Kiang Nangbah.Ha kane ka sngi, la iashim bynta lang da ki dkhot jong ki sengbhalang bhapher bapher ba kynthup ia ka FKJGP, HNYF, AJYWO, ki seng jong ki nongñiah kali kamai.Ka KSU ryngkat bad ki paralok sengbhalang ki la thang ruh da ka ding ia ka kopi jong ka Citizenship (Ammendment) Rule, 2014.Kum shi bynta ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah bajur halor ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar ban wanrah ia ka lynti Rel sha East Jaiñtia ka seng ka la sam ruh ia ki kot lyngkdop ba la pynkhreh da ka lad pathai jong ka seng sha ki paidbah ha KJhliehriat ban pynsngewthuh ia ki paidbah kumno kan ktah ia ka thain bad ka jylla hi baroh kawei.
title: HAKHMAT U DURMOT U WOH KIANG NANGBAH RAKHE KA KSU ÏA KA SNGI KYRSIEW RI

content: Ka Mawkasiang Marvels bad ka Seng Samla Mawlong Nongpdeng ki la long ki ar tylli ki kynhun kiba la ioh rah ia ka nam lahduh ha ka Maitshaphrang Khasi League Basketball Tournament, 2024 ba la pynlong da ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) kum shi bynta ka jingrakhe ia ka Sngi Kyrsiew Ri (Khasi National Awakening Movement) kaba la long ha ka 4 tarik, Iaiong, 2024 ha madan ialehkai Baskesball ha Mawlai Nongpdeng.Ka Mawkasiang Marvels ka la iohrah ia ka nam lahduh hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka Dubakh C da 62 la 29 Basket katba ka Seng Samla Mawlai Nongpdeng ka la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka KSU Mawprem Circle da 41 la 40 Basket.Ia ka nam player of the Match ha ka liang jong ki kynthei la iohrah da ka samla Nazarine Nongneng na ka Mawkasiang Marvels katba ia ka nam player of the Match ha ka liang jong ki shynrang la iohrah da u samla Steven Lamare na ka Seng Samla Mawlai Nongpdeng.Ia kane ka lympung ialehkai la plie pyrda da u General Secretary ka KSU Seng Kmie u samla Donald V. Thabah uba la long kum u kongsan ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki nongialam bad ki dkhot jong ka KSU.
title: MAITSHAPHRANG KHASI LEAGUE: LAHDUH KA MAWKASIANG MARVELS BAD SSMN

content: : Kum ka jingpynneh pynsah ia ka riti ka dustur bad ka jinglong tynrai hapoh ka Raid Margnar kaba hap hapoh ka Hima Mylliem, kane ka Raid ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynlong ia ka lehniam tynrai kaba la tip kum ka tongdoh paidbah jong ki khun ki hajar ha ka Pung Mawthlen.Ia kane ka tamasa tong dohkha kaba ju pynlong manla u snem da u Syiem jong ka Raid Marngar ryngkat ki Longsan ki Mansan la pynlong shuwa da ka nguh ka dem blei kumba la ialam da ki longshuwa ki manshua, ha kaba shuwa ki khun ki hajar kin hiar sha ka pung ban tong ia ki dohkha kiba ka Raid ka ki ju theh dohkha shisien shisnem khnang ba ki khun ki hajar kin kmen kin risa haba pynlong ia kane ka tamasa kaba shi sien shisnem.Ha ka por mynstep, u Syiem ka Raid Marngar, u Paiem Richard Syiem ryngkat ki Longsan ki mansan ki la pynrngad ia ka um na kane ka pung bad ai nguh ai dem da kaba knia da ki syiar khnang ba ki khun ki hajar kin lait na ka jingma jingmynsaw haba ki la hiar sha ka pung ban ia tong doh.Da ki hajar ngut ki paidbah, naduh ki longkpa, ki longkmie, ki samla samhoi bad ki heprit ki la ia hiar ryngkat ka kmen ka risa ban ia tong dohkha ha kane ka pung.U Paiem Richard Syiem u la iathuh hadien kane ka tamasa tong dohkha, ka Raid kan sa pynlong sa ia kawei pat ka jinglehniam kaba la tip kum ka ‘Beh Huleng” ha kaba ki riewrangbah ki beh ia ki Shrieh Huleng ha khlaw bad hadien ba la ioh pat kin sa wanrah sha ka ingsad ka ingsunon ban pyndep ia ka niam ka rukom.
title: PYNNEH KA RAID MARNGAR ÏA KA LEHNIAM TONG DOHKHA HA PUNG MAWTHLEN

content: Ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ioh sei ia ka metiap jong uwei u shynrang briew uba la antad ba u la don kumba 25-30 snem ka rta na ka kshaid Thup Thup, kaba don hajan ka shnong Wei-Mynsier kaba hap ha Eastern West Khasi Hills District.Katkum ka thymmei khubor ba la iohlum, la iathuh ba ha ka por ba la ioh sei ia ka metiap la lap ba la teh da u tyllai na ryndang jong une u lanot bad ia u tyllai la teh lang ha u maw uba don hapoh um bad na ka met jong une u lanot la lap ia kawei ka torchlight kaba rit.Ia ka metiap la pynkit noh sha Tirot Sing Memorial Civil Hospital, Mairang bad haduh mynta ym pat lah ban tip la une u briew u dei uei bad u sah ha kano ka shnong bad ka jingtohkit jong ki Pulit halor kane ka jingjia ka dang iaid shakhmat.  Na ka liang jong ki Pulit ki kyrpad ruh ia kano kano ka longing kaba jah briew ha ka thain Eastern West Khasi Hills kin sngewbha ban leit peit ia kane ka met ba la buh ha Civil Hospital, Mairang.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne ba katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Sordar ka shnong Wei Mynsier ia ka metiap la lap da ki briew kiba leit khat shyiap na kane ka wah ha ka 3 tarik u Iaiong 2024.
title: SHAH PYNÏAP U RANGBAH DA KABA TEH TYLLAI HA U MAW BAD SHAH BRET SHA WAH

content: : Ka surok ba la shna lyngba ka Smart City Project ha ka shnong Lachumiere ka la shu pynsah umdum ïa ki babun balang hadien ba la siang pynban da ka dewbilat ym shuh da ka surok rong kumba long naduh ki por barim.Kane ka surok ka dei kaba ju ïaid kali na shadien jong ka ophis jong ka Meghalaya Public Service Commission (MPSC) bad kiwei kiwei ki ophis kiba bun kiba don sha kane ka liang. Hapdeng jong ka surok ka la don ruh ka skul All Saint Higher Secondary School kaba bun ki paidbah ki ju sngewtynnad ban phah skul ïa ki khun. Lyngba kane ka surok la ju ïohi naduh ki por barim baroh ba ki kmie ki kpa kiba wan shaw skul ïa ki khun bunsien ki ju ïoh ban ïeng kali ban ïaid kylluid khlem da kyrkieh namar ki sngewshngaiñ ba lait ban ïaid napoh ka surokbah.Kumba ngi sakhi pat halor kine ki sngi kiba mynta ka jingshngaiñ ka la duh noh namar ba ym ïoh shuh ban ïaid kali na kane ka surok bad bunsien haba wan shaw skul ne leit trei ophis ki la hap ban ïeng kali hapoh surokbah MG Road, IGP Point bad ka jingtieng jingsmiej ka la pynlong ïa kiba bun halor shuh shuh ka jingjia jong ka jingbun kali kaba la pynlong kum ka jingkhapngiah kali (Traffic jam), la ong u Bah Banshai Marbaniang bad u Bah Churchill Syiemlieh kiba dei ki dkhot jong ka Meghalaya Awaken Concern Citizens (MACC) ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.Ka la wanrah ïa ka jingsngewsih kaba khraw ïa ki paidbah haba ki ïaid lynti halor ka leit ka wan manla ka sngi napoh ka surok bah bad ruh khamtam ïa ki kmie ki kpa kiba hap ban phikir bad husiar khamtam haba phai katkum kapor ba dei ban leitbuh skul ne shaw skul manla ka sngi haduh teng teng ba kim lah ban poi halor kapor ba biang namar ka jingjur jong ka jingkhapngiah kali (traffic jam) kaba la pynlong ka jingbymshngaiñ ïa ki paidbah khamtam ki khyllung khynnah, la ong kine ki arngut ki rangbah.Ka jingwanrah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban pyntreikam da kaba pynbha ïa ka surok ha kaba sdang ki paidbah ki dang mut ba yn dang kham pynheh pynïar ïa ka surok bad ruh ban pynduna na bynta ka jingkhapngiah kali hapdeng manla ka sngi. Bun ki paidbah kimlah ban tip mano ba pynbha ban pyntreikam ïa katei ka surok bad ki dang mutdur hi ba kalong beit napoh jong ka tnat sorkar lyngba ka PWD road, hynrei ynda ïohi pat ha kine ki sngi kiba bynta ym shym patlah ban pyntreikam ha ka ban pyndep ïa ka watla hadien ba la slem naduh ki snem shakhmat ba la pyntyllun. Shuh shuh nalor kata ynda haba ïohi ba nalor ka surok rong la pynkylla ban siang noh pynban da ka dewbilat bad ba dang pynrit shibun nalor ka surok kaba la long shisha kum ka jingïuhroit ïa ka hok jong ki paidbah Nongshong shnong da kaba pyrshang ban pyntieng pynsmiej bad ruh ban ym ailad shuh ban ïaid kum ka surok paidbah.Lyngba ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka surok ka la wanrah bun ki jingeh ïa ki paidbah kum ki nongtrei sorkar, ki longkmie longkpa ba wan shaw skul bad kumjuh haduh ki skul bad ki ophis sorkar ba bun.Ki jingjia kiba la mih kilong ka jingïeng kali ka bymbiang shuh haduh la hap ban ïeng pathar tang namar ba ym banse ban beh kloi ïa ka kam katkum ka por ne haduh wat ban leit shaw skul khyllung khynnah ruh kumjuh. Ka jingwanrah ban dang heh dang ïar ka jingkhapngiah kali hapoh Shillong khamtam hapoh Lower Lachumiere kaba long ka shnong kaba bun ki ophis treikam sorkar bad ka jaka pule ruh kumjuh.Nalor kata shuh shuh ka jingduna ki lynti ïaid kjat namar ka jingrit ki surok ïaid kali ka dang pynlong syier mynsiem ïa kiba bun balang khamtam lada dei ki riew tymmen bad ki khyllung khynnah kiba hap ban ïaid manla ka sngi. Kane baroh ka la pynlong ban wanrah ïa ka jingmut jingpyrkhat bym banse ïa ngi ki briew kiba ñiah kali kat haduh ban ïaid kulmar khlem da salia shuh wat ban pynkheiñ nalor ki Rraffic Rules.Ka daw kaba pynlong ïa ngi ba ngi hap ban kren ïa kane ka mat kaba long ka bynta kaba kongsan namar ba ngi dei ban ïoh ïa ka Sorkar kaba biang ban ai ka jingshakri kaba pura ïa ngi kum ki paidbah Nongshong shnong jong ka Jylla bad kaba ngi dei ban sngewthuh ba kano kano ka bynta kaba ngi pyndonkam hangne ha sla Pyrthei ka long ka bynta ba kordor jong u paidbah bad ym tang katta nalor kumjuh ba ngi long ruh ki paidbah kiba don halor ka bor kaba long ka Hok ban ïeng bad jied ïa U ne ka Briew ki ban leit ban long ki Nongmihkhmat halor ka kyrdan na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka jingdonkam jong ki paidbah ym ban shu leit hylla ne put turoi sharum shaneng haduh ban da poi u pud ban shu leh lyndet ïa ki paidbah tang namar ka jingsngewheh kum u Kynrad nalor duh khlem da pyrkhat bad kynmaw shuh ïa ka kyrdan halor ka jingshakri paidbah.Ka Meghalaya Awaken Concern Citizens kumba ka pyrshang ban kren bad sakhi kum ki nongshong shnong kiba ïeng ban shakri halor ka bha ka miat jong ka imlang sahlang ngi kyntu jur ïa ka Sorkar Jylla lada dei na ka tnat jong ka PWD (Roads) ne lyngba kano kano ka department kiba shimti ban pyntreikam ïa kane surok ladei shisha ban pynbha katkum ka surok kaba dei ban ïaid kali bad ban buh ruh ïa ki nala tuid um kiba biang bad ha ryngkatlang ka lynti ïaid kjat paidbah kumba ka dei ban long bad ban donkam shuh shuh ha ka ban pynheh pynïar nalor kaba rim ym pat da kaba pyrshang ban buhrieh shadien da kaba pynjah bad pynrit kham palat ban ïa kaba long naduh ki por ba la leit.Lada sngap bad sngewthuh kane kan long ka jingbha da kaba wanrah ka jingsngewshngaiñ ïa ki paidbah bad ruh ka jingsuk mynsiem halor kiba bun kiba donkam bad ban dang pynduna ruh ia ka jingkhapngiah kali ha surok kaba la wanrah mynta manla ka sngi lyngba ki jaka bapher bapher jong ka Shillong bad kumjuh haduh kine ka sngi shapoh Lower Lachumiere.
title: SAHKUT SHITENG KA JINGSHNA ÏA KA SUROK SMART PROJECT HA LOWER LACHUMIERE

content: Ka Kashari jong u District and Session Judge, West Jaintia Hills District ha ka 3 tarik mynta u bnai ka la rai pynrem ban set along shi rta jingim ia ki ar ngut ki nongpyniap briew. Kine ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Salbinal Nangbah bad u Belting Tyngkra.Ha ka 6 tarik, Jymmang, 2014, ki bahaing hasem ki la ujor da ka ejahar ha Nartiang PIC halor ka jingshah pyniap jong u Bah Prodic Nangbah ha ki lai ngut ki briew kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Chalbinal Nangbah, u Salbinal Nangbah bad u Belting Tyngkra. Ia ka case la reistar ha Jowai Police Station hapoh ka Section 302/34 IPC bad ia ka jingtohkit bad ka jingpynngat kyndon la leh da u SI C. Lamare.Hadien shiphew snem ka jingiakhun ban ioh ia ka hok ka Kashari jong u District and Sessions Judge, ka West Jaintia Hills District, Jowai ka la rai pynrem ban set along shi rta jingim ia u Salbinal Nangbah bad ia u Belting Tyngkra na ka shnong Mynkrem bad dain kuna T. 5000 hajar marwei halor ka jingdonkti ban dkhat jubor ia ka jingim jong u Prodic Nangbah na ka shnong Mynkrem ha u Jymmang, 2014.Katba ka jingbishar ka dang iaid, uwei na kiba la shah mudui uba la tip kyrteng kum u Chalbinal Nangbah ula khladnoh ha ka 6 tarik, iaiong, 2017.Ka Kashari ka la hukum ban siew bailutksan T. 300,000 lak sha ki bahaing hasem jong u lanot uba la shah pyniap.
title: SHI RTA JINGIM RAI SET ALONG KA KASHARI ÏA KI AR NGUT KI NONGPYNÏAP BRIEW

content: Thik ha ka por 12 baje mynsngi ka sngi Balang ki nongialam ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Seng Kmie bad ki nongialam ka KSU South Khasi Hills District Unit ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki bahaing hasem ki la tur paidbah sha Sohra Police Station hadien ba ki Pulit ki la kem ia ki arngut ki dkhot jong ka seng ha ka por shiteng synnia jong ka sngi Baar na Wah-u-Tim bad na Saitsohpen.Kine ki arngut ki dkhot ka KSU South Khasi Hills District Unit ki la shah kem halor ka jingshah pyniap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Ishan Singh bad u Sudip Dutta ha ka shnong Ichamati ha ka 27 tarik Lber.Ki Pulit ki la syrtap ia ka Sohra Police Station hadien ba u President jong ka KSU South Khasi Hills District Unit u samla Reebok Diengdoh u la pynbna ba ka seng kan tur paidbah ha kane ka sngi.Shwa ba ki nongialam jong ka KSU Seng Kmie ba kynthup ia u Rueben Najiar President jong ka KSU South Khasi Hills District Unit u samla Reebok Diengdoh kin rung sha phyllaw jong ka thanat kumba shiteng kynta eiei ka la mih ka thma ktien hadien ba ki Pulit ki la pakhang lynti ia ki nongialam ka KSU hadien ba kim shym la shah satia ban rung paidbah hapoh ka phyllaw jong ka thanat.Hadien ka jingiakren, ki bor synshar district ha ryngkat ki Pulit ki la shah tang ia katto katne ngut ki nongialam ka KSU ban rung shapoh thanat ban iakren katba kiba bun ki dkhot ki la ap shabar.Katba ki nongialam ka KSU ki dang don shapoh thanat, ki paidbah shynrang bad kynthei ki la hylla bad risa ha khyrdop jong ka thanat.Kane ka jingtur paidbah jong ka KSU sha Sohra Police Station ka long ban pan jubab na ki Pulit halor ka jingshah kem jong ki arngut ki dkhot ka seng bad ha kajuh ka por ka KSU ka la kyntait ia ka jingshah pharep ba ki dkhot jong ka seng ki dei kiba donkti ban pyniap ia ki arngut ki bar jylla ha ka shnong Ichamati.Ha ka sngi Baar, tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba u President ka KSU South Khasi Hills District Unit u la khot bad wer ban mih paidbah ban tur sha Sohra Police Station, na ka liang jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) Sohra Circle ka la ai jingkyrshan ia kane ka jingkhot jingwer jong ka KSU bad kyntu ruh ia ki paidbah ka thain Sohra ban mih paidbah lang ha kane ka sngi.Ia ka khubor kaba bniah kaba mih na ka jingiakren hapdeng ki nongialam ka KSU bad ki bor Pulit yn sa nang wanrah shuh shuh kham katto katne por.
title: HADIEN SHITENG KYNTA KA THMA KTIEN, KHOT IAKREN KI PULIT ÏA KI NONGÏALAM KA KSU

content: : Ka Kong Pandora Diengdoh, kaba dei ka Kmie jong u President ka KSU, South Khasi Hills District Unit ka la iathuh ba ha ka miet shiteng synnia ka sngi Baar ba ki Pulit ki la leit khynra ia ka ingsah jong ki ha ka shnong Laitryngew, ki la kyndar ia ka jingkhang iing khlem kren wat shi kyntien ruh bad iathuh ruh ba ka jingkyndar ia ka jingkhang jong ka iing la sngew kumba kin shu rat noh wat ia ka ïing.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang hadien ba la mih na Sohra Police Station, ka Kong Pandora ka la ong, “ki (Pulit) wan sha ing ha ka por shi baje, shi baje tam (eiei). Nga iohsngew, hynrei ban khyllie ia ka khmat ngam lah. Nga iohsngew ia ka jingwan ki kali, nga iohsngew ia ka jingiaid ki briew sha phyllaw ing ruh bad sha kyndong ki ia ieng. Ki (Pulit) tied ia ka ing, nga sngap, nga la pynshah skhor bha.  U khun shynrang u khie u kren, ka khun kynthei ka hylla, ka mai, wat plie ia u briew ba khlem kren.”“Lada ym kren u khun jong nga ruh ki (Pulit) la mut ban shu rat ia ka jingkhang. Ki (Pulit) rung ha ing arngut ne lai ngut. Nga iohsngew ba ki phah tbeh bording. Ki rung sha kamra thiah, sha painkhana ruh ki phah tbeh bording tangba ym don bording. Tangba la don u nongieng u nongap sha kyndong ruh,” la iathuh ka Kong Pandora.Haba kylli, ka la ong, “ha,oid ki (Pulit)wan wad ia u Reebok. Ynda la ki la phet nga la shu duwai Blei ba u dang ieid ia nga. Un (Reebok) leit don ha ing haleh tip shuh kin ialeh kumno, ioh ki leh kumba leh ia u Bah Cheris. Nga lei nga la tieng eh ha kato ka miet.”“Ki (Pulit) kylli, (ngi) ong ba u don sha Shillong. Ki kylli haei u sah haei u don. Kato ka para ka ong ba ynda i leit jingleit i shait leit sah sha iing ki paralok. Ynda ki (Pulit) la mih nangta ki ong ia ngin ia leit sha Shillong.
title: KI WAN KYNDAR ÏA KA JINGKHANG LA KUM BAN RAT ÏA KA ÏING RUH, ONG KA KMIE U PRESIDENT KSU

content: Ki shipai BSF jong ka 181 Battalion kiba la pynlong ia ka jingkhynra ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki Pulit ka Meghalaya, ha ka sngi Baar ki la ioh bat lai tyli ki kali kiba kit ia ka shini ba la thmu ban khaii beain sha ka ri Bangladesh.Halor kane ka jingjia, lai ngut ki nong India ki la shah kem najan khappud ka shnong Gasuapara kaba hap hapoh ka South Garo Hills District.Lyngba ka jingioh jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat, ki shipai BSF bad ki Pulit ki la pynlong ia ka jingtalsi kali hajan Gasuapara bad iohbat ia kine ki lai tyli ki kali kiba kit palat 70,000 kilo ka shini.Ha ka jingtohkit, ki lai ngut ki nongniah kali kim shym la lah ban pyni ia ki dulir kiba biang ban kit ia kane ka shini.Ia ka shini ba la ioh kurup la aiti noh sha ki Pulit jong ka Gasuapara ban leh ia kaba donkam.Tang hapoh lai bnai jong une u snem, ki shipai BSF ki la ioh kurup kumba 1188 ton ka shini ia kaba la thmu ban khaii beain sha ka ri Bangladesh lyngba ka khappud jong ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: 70 HAJAR KILO KA SHINI KURUP KI BSF NA KHAPPUD SGH SHAH KEM LAI NGUT

content: Kawei ka kali Gypsy jong ki Pulit kaba pynieng ha Mawlai Police Station, Shillong ka la julor hadien ba ki runar ki bym lah ban ithuh durkhmat ki la kawang da u petrol bom ia kane ka kali ha ka step phyrngap sngi Balang.U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills, Rituraj Ravi ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la pyntip ba kane ka la jia ha ka por kumba 2:40 baje mynstep ha kaba san ngut ki runar bym lah ban ithuh ki la rung shapoh ka jaka pynieng kali ha Mawlai Police Station bad kawang da u petrol bom ia ka kali Gypsy kaba don ia u nombar ML02-0194 kat haduh ba ka kali ka la kem ding bad julor.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la register case ha Mawlai Police Station hapoh ka Section 120B/307/427/436/34 Indian Penal Code bad pule lang bad ka Section 3 jong ka Explosive Substances Act, 1908 bad ka Section 4 jong ka Prevention of Damage to Public Property Act, 1984.U SP u la pyntip ba ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: JULOR KA GYPSY KI PULIT HA MAWLAI PS BA KAWANG PETROL BOM KI RUNAR

content: Ka samla Tyngkle Grace Iawrot ka nongrwai kaba don ia u ryndang uba syiang na ka thain Mawsynram ha ka sngi Baar ka la ioh rung sha ka Grandfinale jong ka rynsan iakop pynisap kaba la tip kum ka India’s Talent Fight kaba la long ha nongbah New Delhi.Ka samla Tyngkle Grace Iawrot ka dei tang ma ka, kaba la ioh ioh rung sha ka jingiakop rwai Solo ka ban hap aireng bad ki nongrwai batbit na kylleng ka ri India kiba la poi sha ka jingiakhun phainal.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka Executive Commitee jong ka All Meghalaya Dancers Association ka ai khublei kitbok kitrwiang ia ka samla Tyngkle Grace Iawrot bad buh jingduwai kyrpang ruh ba kan poi sha ka thong jong ka jingjop.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ba ia kane ka jingiakop rwai ba la iashim bynta da ka samla Tyngkle Grace Iawrot yn sa pyni paidabh ha ka Channel 9XM TV.
title: RUNG KA SAMLA TYNGKLE GRACE ÏAWROT SHA KA GRAND FINALE INDIA’S TALENT FIGHT

content: U Assistant Secretary ka KSU, Seng Kmie Samla Reuben Najiar u la ong haba don kino kino ki jingjia, ki dkhot ka KSU ki long dieng shaiñdoh.  Ki Pulit lada kim lah ban kem iano iano ki kem beit thik tang ia ki dkhot ka KSU tang ban pynkut noh ia ka Case jong ki, lehse ba kin ym shah pynbor nalor.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang hadien ba la mih na Sohra Police Station, u samla Najiar u la ong, “ngi pynlong ia ka jingialang (ban pyrshah ia ka) Citizenship Amendment Act, hadien ka jingthang ia ka Rule jong ka CAA, ki dkhot ki la mih noh na kato ka jaka (Ichamati) bad wan phai noh.  Ka don kata ka jingjia ba shah pyniap ki arngut (ki bar jylla), halor kata ka bynta ngi ki dkhot ka seng ngim don kano kano ka jingtip.  Ka jingpharep ki bor Pulit bad na kiwei kiwei ki kynhun shit niam ba ngi donkti ma ngi, kata, ka long tang kaei kaei tang ban pynjah burom ia ka seng.”U la iathuh ha ka por ba dang sdang (ka jingiakren) la don uwei na ki heh Pulit ka rukom kren jong u kaba kham khor. Ngi wan hangne ban iakren ngi da ka akor ka burom, ba phin kren tohmet ia ngi, ngim lah ban shah. Ka la mih ka jingiapynphai nia bad  ngi la mut ban mih noh na ka jingialang bad ngi la ong ba lada uto u heh Pulit u dang don ha ka jingialang, ngin ym treh ban iakren, ngin ia mih noh shabar..  Hadien kata, ki Pulit ki la phah noh ia u ban mih shabar,” la iathuh une u nongialam ka KSU.“Katba dang don ka seng (KSU) kiwei (kiba nabar) kim lah ban wan tuklar shapoh ka ri ka jong ngi,” u la ong.“Ki Pulit ruh khlem da ioh ia ka sabut kaba biang ki shu kem ia baroh ki dkhot ka seng,” u la bynrap.Haba iathuh ia ka jingiakren kaba mih bad ki Pulit ka Sohra Police Station, u samla Najiar u la ong, “ki Pulit ki ong ba ki wad ia ka jaka. Ngim shym ong ba ngim don hangto (ha Ichamati) hynrei ngi don ia ka jingialang hynrei tangba ngi don ia ka jingialang bad kata ka jingjia, ka jia, kam mut ba phi lah ban shu pharep ia ngi.  Hato kano ka sakhi sabut kaba khlaiñ kaba phi lah ban ong ba ngi dei ma ngi. Hadien kata, ki Pulit ki pynshai ba ki kem ia kine ki arngut ki samla ba ki suba ba ki donkti bad ki lah ruh ban dei tang ki nongsakhi ruh ia kata kim lah ban batai bad ia kata kin dang tohkit kin sa tip.”“Ia kata ka jingkren jong ki (Pulit) ngim lah ban pdiang. Haba phi la kem bad pynngat ha ki kyndon jong ka aiñ bad mynta phi pyllait ia ka kyrteng jong ki bad phi pyllait ia ka jaka sah jong ki, hato ha ka por ba shah pyniap u Lurshai Hynñiewta ki Pulit ki pyllait ia ki kyrteng jong kito ki dkhar? Katno ngut ki kem, ngi, ngim tip bad haba ki don ki Video Clip ruh hynrei ngim don jingtiphalor kata. Ka jingtohkit ka iaid haduh katno ym don ba tip. Balei ia kiwei pat phi buhrieh, katba ia ki dkhot jong ka seng ki pynpaw pyrthei. Hato lada ki lap hadien ba kim don eiei hato ki Pulit kin mih shakhmat ban ia ka jingkular ban pynshai,” la buh jingkylli une u nongialam ka KSU.“Dei ha kum kine ki jingjia, ba kum ka seng ngim lah shuh ban shu iai sngap kumne ngi hap ban wan pan jingpynshai na ki bor pyniaid.  Ki Pulit ki batai ba ia ka kyrteng la pyllait na ka ophis u Superintendent of Police. Nga kwah ruh ban kren ia ka ophis u Superintendent of Police, ki (dkhot ba la shah kem ka KSU) dei tang ki nongshah suba bad phim lah ban pyllait ia ka kyrteng jong ki. Lashai la shi sngi ka kam ka jam jong ki pat hato kan bah khlieh ka Sorkar lada ki lap ba kim donkti eiei,” u la ong.“Sa kawei ki pynpaw ba ki dei ki dkhot jong ka seng, kata, ka pyni ba ka dei ka jingbthah jong ka seng kaba phah pyniap ia kita ki arngut. Ka jingleh jong ki Pulit bad ka jingbatai jong ki Pulit ba ki dei ki dkhot jong ka seng ka long kum ka jingpynthoh bria ia ka kyrteng jong ka seng,” u la kynthoh.“Da kaba pynthohbria ia ka kyrteng jong ka seng, ki samla Khasi kiba don sha kylleng ki jaka bad sha kiwei kiwei ki jylla kaei ka ban jia ia ki da kaba pynpaw kyrteng kumta. Ka jingleh jong ki Pulit ka long ban wanrah ia ka jingsngew iapher jaidbynriew hapdeng ki jong ngi bad jong kiwei pat. Kata ka dei kaba ngi la iakren bad na ka liang jong ki Pulit ki la kubur ba ka jingleh jong ki ka long kaba bakla ba ki la kum pynpaw kyrteng,” u la ong shuh shuh.“Ka jingiakren kam da dei eh kaba shong nongrim ba ki lah ban pyni ia kita ki sabut kiba biang ba haoid ngi ngi donkti, ngi la kren da kaba shai ba lada donkam ia kino kino ki dkhot ka KSU kren ha kaba shai, ngi kloi ban wan haba ngi khlem leh ia kano kano ka kam,” u la ong.U la ong ruh ba ki dkhot ka KSU kim dei ki lehnoh hynrei ki dei tang ki samla pule bad ki don la ka jong ka ing ka sem bad kyntu ruh ia ki Pulit haba ki donkam ia ki dkhot ka Seng ki long kiba kloi ban wan shakhmat ha kano kano ka por.“Lada ka ia ka jingiateh mynta ka sngi ki (Pulit) dang pynkheiñ, ngi ruh ngim banse ban shim da kawei ka sienjam.Ngi, ngim lah ban tuklar ia ka jingtohkit jong ki Pulit. Kumba ki ong ba ki kem ia kine ki arngut tang ban shu tohkit ba lehse ki don ha kato ka jaka bad ba ka Mobile Location ruh ka don hangto. Ngi ong ba ngi don ha kato ka jaka ba ngi pynlong ia ka jingialang, khlempep, kan pynpaw ba ngi don ha kato ka jaka.  Ngi la kren da kaba shai ba lada phim lap ia kino kino ki sabut kiba khlaiñ lait noh ia u Tower Location bad phim dei ban kem ia kino kino ki dkhot jong ngi bad na ka liang jong ki, ki ong ba kin burom ia kata, hynrei ki dang ap pat ia ka hukum kaba najrong,” la iathuh u samla Najiar.Haba kylli, u samla Najiar u la ong, ba u SDPO u batai ba lada lap ba kine ki arngut kim don eiei ha kane (ka jingjia) ma u hi un mih shakhmat ban pynshai sha ki paidbah ba kine kim don bynta eiei.“Ngi ngeit ba kum u rangbah briew un bat ia kata ka kular jong u bad lada khlem pynngat kyndon, ma u un sa mih shakhmat ban pynshai sha ki paidbah.  Balei ngi nud ban wan, namarba ngi tip ba ngim don eiei halor kane ka bynta (ban pyniap ia ki arngut ki bar jlla), ngi khlem leh eiei ia kane ka kam. Dei halor kata ka nongrim ba ngi la pynsngew ha ki bor Pulit ba lada ki Pulit ki dang iai kem shi iai kem kumne shiteng miet shiteng synnia bad ban pynjynjar ia ki longing longsem, ia ki kmie ki kpa, ban pyntieng pynsmiej ia ki baroh, na ka liang ka seng, nangne shakhmat ngin ym iakren shuh bad lehse ngin shim da kiwei kiwei ki sienjam,” ong shuh shuh u Samla Najiar.
title: HABA DON KINO KINO KI JINGJIA KI DKHOT KA KSU KI LONG DIENG SHAIÑ DOH, ONG U NONGÏALAM KA KSU

content: Ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ha ka sngi Balang ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang bad baroh ki Jylla/Union Territory ban peit ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ka shongsuk shongsaiñ, ka jingtehlakam ïa ki kam beaiñ, ka jingkurup bad ka jingpeit bniah ïa ki jaka khappud hapdeng ki jylla bad ki jaka khappud jong ka ri ha kine ki elekshon Lok Sabha bad ki elekshon sha ki iing dorbar thaw aiñ ha ki jylla 2024 khnang ban don ka jingjied nongmihkhmat kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih. Ka jing thmu jong kane ka jingpeit lang ïa ki kam ka dei ban wanrah lang ïa baroh kiba ïadon bynta ha kine ki kam ha kawei ka rynsan ban don ka jingïatreilang kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih hapdeng ki ophisar jong ki jylla/UT ba marjan ha ryngkat ki kynhun Sorkar pdeng kiba ïada ïa ki jaka khappud.  Ka Commission, ka la peit bniah ïa ki bynta ba kongsan kiba ïadei bad man ka jylla/UT.Kane ka jingïalang ba la ïalam da u Chief Election Commissioner, Rajiv Kumar ha ryngkat ki EC, Gyanesh Kumar bad Sukhbir Singh Sandhu ka dei kaba la wan ïashim bynta lang da ki ophisar na ki Jylla / UT bad ki kynhun Sorkar Pdeng kiba ïada ïa ki jaka khappud.U CEC Rajiv Kumar ha ka jingai jingkren jong u, u la ban jur halor ka jingkut jingmut ka Commission ban don ka jingjied nongmihkhmat kaba hok, kaba ryntih, kaba lait na ki jingkulmar bad ki jingkhring ïa ki briew ha ki rukom bym ïahap, bad u la kyntu ïa baroh kiba ïadon bynta ha kane ka kam ba kin ïatrei lang ban bat ïa ka burom jong ka kam jied nongmihkhmat bad pynthikna ïa ka jingïakhun kaba ryntih. U la bthah ïa ki Jylla / UT ba kin pynthikna ba man u nongjied nongmihkhmat u ïoh ban pyndonkam ïa la ka hok khlem ka jingtieng ne ka jingshah byrngem. U CEC Kumar u la kyntu ïa baroh ki Jylla / UT bad ki kynhun ban pynkylla ïa ka ‘jingkut jingmut’ jong ki sha ki ‘kam’ na ka bynta ka kam jied nongmihkhmat kaba hok, kaba laitluid, kaba lait na ki jingkulmar bad ki jingpyntieng.Ki bynta ba kongsan ba la ïakren ha kane ka jingïalang ki kynthup ka jingdonkam ban kyntiew ïa ka jingïatreilang hapdeng ki Jylla / UT; ka jingkyrshan na ka bynta ka jingwanrah ïa ki CAPF ba la pynbiang na ka bynta baroh ki Jylla / UT; ka jingkyrshan na ka bynta ka leit ka wan ki dkhot CAPF ha ki Jylla / UT ba don ha ki jaka khappud; ka jingithuh bad ka jingpeit ïa ki jaka ba don jingma kiba lah ban ktah ïa ka kam jied nongmihkhmat; ki sienjam ban peit ïa ki jingïathut hapdeng ki jaitbynriew kumba la ïohi na ki por ba la leit, bad ka jingpeit bniah ban tehlakam ïa ki kam beaiñ na ki jaka khappud. Ka Commission ka la ban jur halor ka jingkongsan jong ka jingpeit bniah ïa ka jingtehlakam ïa ka jingpynkit ïa ki mar beaiñ kum ki jingdih pynbuaid, ki suloi bad ki jingpynbthei na ki jaka khappud jong ka ri. Ka la bthah ban peit ïa ki jaka ba rung bad mih ka kyiad bad ka pisa ha ki jaka khappud, ka jingtehlakam ïa ka jingthung ïa u kynja ha katto katne ki jylla.Ka Commission ka la peit biang ïa ka jingkyrshan na ka Indian Air force bad ka tnat pynher liengsuin ha ki jylla ban pynpoi ïa ki kynhun pynlong elekshon sha ki jaka ba jynjar ban poi ha 11 tylli ki jylla kum ka Arunachal Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, Maharashtra. La bthah ban pynbiang ïa ki jingpynshngaiñ ban ïada ïa ki nongtrei seng saiñ pyrthei bad ki kyrtong katkum ka jingsngewthuh ïa ka jingma, khamtam ha ki jylla kum ka Chhattisgarh bad Jammu & Kashmir. La ïakren ruh shaphang ki jingkulmar ba dang shen ha Manipur bad ka jingktah jong kane ïa ka jingpynlong ïa ka jingjied nongmihkhmat kaba ïaid beit ha kaba ka Commission ka la bthah ban ai jingïarap ïa ki briew kiba la hap phet na la iing bad ban pynthikna ba ki ïoh lad ban shim bynta ha ka kam jied nongmihkhmat.Kine ki long ki jingbthah kiba ïadei bad ka Aiñ bad ka Shongsuk Shongsaiñ, ki jaka talasi ha ki jaka khappud hapdeng ki jylla bad ki jaka khappud jong ka ri ban don ka jingpeitngor kaba bniah, ka jingïasam jingtip hapdeng ki distrik ba marjan shaphang ki runar bad ki nongpynkulmar, ka jingkhang ïa ki jaka khappud hapdeng ki jylla ban ïada na ka jingthep vote beaiñ ha ki 48 kynta shuwa ka jingthep vote, ki jingïalang ba man ka por hapdeng ki bor distrik kiba hap hapoh ki jaka khappud, ka jingpynkhlaiñ ïa ki jingïaid pahara da ki pulit ha ki distrik ba don ha ki jaka khappud, ki jingbuh shuh shuh ïa ki jaka talasi ha ki jaka ba biang ha ka jingïatreilang bad ki jylla ba don ha ki jaka khappud, ka jingkhang ïa u pud u sam jong ki jylla ha ka sngi thep vote, ki Excise Commissioner jong ki Jylla / UT khappud ki hap ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshisha jong ki permit, bad pynlong ïa ki talasi ïa ki dukan die kyiad khamtam ha ki distrik khappud, ka jingwan buh ha ka por kaba biang ïa ki atiar bad ka jingpyntreikam ïa ki Non- Bailable Warrant, ka jingpynshitom ïa ki runar, kiba donkti ha ki kam pynkulmar ha ki por jied nongmihkhmat, ka jingpynbiang ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ki nongtrei seng saiñ pyrthei / kyrtong katkum ka jingsngewthuh ïa ki jingma.Ka jingpeit ïa ka rukom pynlut pisa:  Ka jingtehlakam ïa ka jingïaid ka kyiad, ka pisa, ki drok lyngba ki jaka khappud hapdeng ki jylla bad ki jaka khappud jong ka ri, ka jingpynkhlaiñ jong ka jingpeit ïa ki jaka talasi ha kaba la pynbiang ruh ïa ki CCTV Camera, ka jingtalasi lang da ki bor pulit, excise, transport, GST bad Tnat forest, ka jingpeitngor ha ki jaka pynher helicopter, ki kad liengsuin, ki steshon bus bad ki steshon rel, ka jingpynshitom ïa kito kiba pynïaid beaiñ ïa ka kyiad bad ki drok; tehlakam ïa ka jingpynïaid ïa ka kyiad lieh, ka jingpeit ïa ki jaka ba pynïaid bha ka kyiad, ka pisa, ki drok bad ki mar ba ai ei.Ki jingbthah ïa ki Kynhun Sorkar Pdeng: Ka jingpeit bniah ïa ka jaka khappud hapdeng ka India bad Myanmar da ka Assam Rifles; khappud India Nepal da ka SSB khamtam ha ki jaka ba suk ka rung ka mih sha Nepal; ka khappud India bad Bangladesh bad ka khappud ha ka thaiñ sepngi da ka BSF; ka khappud India bad China da ka ITBP, bad ki jylla ba khappud ïa ka duriaw da ka Indian Coast Guard.Ka Assam Rifles kan pynlong ïa ki jingïakynduh na ka bynta ka jingïatreilang bad ki pulit jylla, CAPF, bad kiwei kiwei.Ka SSB kan peitngor ïa ka jaka khappud bad ka Nepal bad Bangladesh ban tehlakam ïa kano kano ka kam beaiñ, khamtam ha ki 72 kynta shuwa ka por ba la buh ban thep vote.Pynthikna ka jingsngewthuh ki CAPF ïa ki jinglong jingman ha ka jingïatreilang bad ki bor pynïaid shnong.Ka jingpynbiang ïa ki jaka talasi ha ka jingïatreilang bad ki pulit jyllaKi Chief Secretary, DGP, Principal Secretary (Home), Pr Secretary (Excise), Chief Electoral officer bad State Police Nodal Officer jong baroh ki Jylla / UT, ki khliehduh jong ki Kynhun Sorkar Pdeng kiba trei ha ki kam ïada ïa ki jaka khappud kum ka Border Security Force, Assam Rifles, Sashastra Seema Bal, Indo Tibetan Border Police bad Coast Guard ha ryngkat ki khliehduh jong ka CRPF, Central CAPF nodal officer, Additional Secretary MHA bad ki nongmihkhmat na ka Tnat Ïada Ri bad Tnat Rel ki la ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïalang.
title: BTHAH KA ECI ÏA KI CHIEF SECRETARY BAD DGP BAN PYNÏAID BEIT ÏA KA ELEKSHON LOK SABHA

content: : Ka Kashari jong u Session Judge, ka West Jaintia Hills District ha ka 28 tarik, Lber, 2024 ka la rai pynrem ia u Aloi Suiam da kaba phah set along shi jingim hadien ba la lap ia ki sakhi ki sabut kiba biang ba u dei uba donkti ban pyniap briew ha ka shnong Saphai ha ka 29 tarik, Nailur, 2005.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of PoliceWest Jaiñtia Hills u la pyntip ba ha ka 6 tarik, Nailur, 2005 ki Pulit ki la ioh pdiang ia ka ejahar ba la mudui da u (L) Linus Sumer u kpa jong uba shah pyniap u (L) Rishanki Biam halor ka jingkynnoh ba u Aloi Suiam u la pyniap ia u khun jong u ha ka 29 tarik, Nailur 2005 ha ka shnong Saphai.Ia ka case la rejistar ha Jowai Police Station hapoh ka Section 302 Indian Penal Code (IPC) bad ia ka jingtohkit la bynshet ha u SI B Singh.Khatduh iawai, ha ka 28 tarik, Lber, 2024 ka Kashari jong u Sessions Judge, West Jaintia Hills District, halor ka jingpdiang ia ki sakhi sabut, ka la lap ba u Aloi Suiam u dei uba donkti ban pyniap briew bad pynngat ia u hapoh ka Section 302 IPC na ka bynta ban set along shi rta jingim.Ka Kashari ka la hukum ruh ia u Aloi Suiam ban siew ia ka bailutksan kaba T. 300,000 lak sha ka ing ka sem jong u lanot.
title: SHI RTA JINGIM RAI SET ALONG KA KASHARI ÏA U ALOI SUÏAM BA PYNÏAP BRIEW HA SAPHAI
