content: Ka Sengbah ki Nongshat Nongkheiñ ka Bri Hynñiewtrep u Hynñiewskum hakhmat ka longhok ba tynrai ha ka sngi Balang ka la pynlong ia ka nguh Blei ka dem Blei kaba shi sien shi snem ha ka shlem treikam kaba don ha ka shong Bañiun, Upper  Shillong.Katkum ka jingiakren bad u dkhot ka seng u Rgh Teibor Roy Khonglam ba la seng ia ka Sengbah ki Nongshat Nongkhein ha ka 21 tarik, Naiwieng 1982 bad ka nguh Blei ka Dem Blei kaba mynta ka sngi, ka dei pat kaba ha kum kane ka sngi ha u snem 1983 ba ka Sengbah ka shim ia ka sien jam ban pynlong ia la ka nguh Blei dem Blei kaba nyngkong eh jong ka.Nalorkata u Rgh Teibor u la pyntip ba ka Sengbah ka ju pynlong ruh ia ka ksan rngiew ia ki riew tymmen riewsan.Haba iadei bad ka nguh Blei dem Blei kaba mynta ka sngi, la ju sdang nyngkong da ka suit lama, kaba long kum shibynta ka jingkhot ka jingpyrta ia ki Blei ba kin wan ban hiar, ba kin ai ia ka kyrkhu ka kyrdoh, khnang ba ka seng kan ioh ia ka bor Blei ban pyndep ia ki kam ki jam kumba la seng.Kumta ha kane ka suit lama la pyndep ia ka niam ka rukom da u President u Rgh Pranshon Jala da kaba u la iapan nakhmat u Kynrad ia ka kular ka jutang kaba hok, khnang ba kan neh kan skhem ka jutang hapdeng u briew bad u Blei.Hadien ba la dep ka nguh ka dem ka ladei pat ka pali ban pynher ia ka lama jong ka seng ba la kyntiew da u Treasurer ka Sengbah u Dr M. Blah.Ka bynta kaba ar ka dei ka knia ka khriam halor ka duwan ka dupat, kaba hangne la pyndonkam ia artylli ki syiar kawei dei ka syiar kynthei bad sa uwei pat dei u  syiar shynrang. Ia ka syiar kynthei la pyndonkam ban nguh ban dem ia ka meiramew ban khot ban pyrta ia ki Blei ba kin wan ryngkat bad hangne ruh ia ka lehniam lem bad ia ka jingknia manla u snem la pyndep da u President.Hadien kane u Vice President ka Sengbah u la shim pat ia ka bynta ban pyndep ia ka knia ka khriam sa ha u syiar shynrang kaba long kum ka dak ka nguh ka dem ia ki ryngkew ki basa, ba long ki nongker ki nongda ne kum ki shipai Blei kiba ker ba da ia u khun bynriew na baroh kiei kiei kiba thmu ban wan pynjot ban pynsniew ia u khun bynriew.Nalor kane la pynbud pat sa ia ka dwai um kaba mut ka jingpynshong Blei pat ia ka um bad ia kane ka kam la pyndep ia ka da u Organising Secretary ia kaba la ju sam paidbah ruh ba kin ioh ban rah rneng pat sha la iing ban pyndokam kum ban sum ban sleh ban sait ban khlieng bad dih  ban bam, bud pat sa ka jingdwai khaw ne ka jingpynshong Blei ia u  ban ioh ban ia bam  khyndiat khynsoit u ban long u khaw eh u khaw khlain ban ia rah sha la iing bad ban ia thep ha la i pla  ban long kum u nongiada ia u khun bynriew.Ka khubor kaba u Rgh Teibor u kwah ban sam lem sha ki parakur ki kur parakha kiba dang bat dang ksoh rydin ha la ka niam hok kaba tynrai hi ka long kumba ka kyntien kaba ong ka hok kaba tam, kaba kum ka Sengbah ka ju kwah ba kane ka thong kan janai ha la ka jong bad bym dei ruh ruh ban klet ia la ka jong ka tynrai namar hangne shong ka hok.
title: PYNDEP KA SENGBAH KI NONGSHAT NONGKHEIÑ IA KA NGUH BLEI HA BAÑIUN

content: Shillong, April 7 : The Mystery of the Cave is a book written by Dr Glenn C Kharkongor (Chancellor, MLCU) and translated into Khasi by Patricia Mukhim (Editor, The Shillong Times) with illustration by Careen J Langstieh (Associate Professor of Practice, Community Centre for Arts, Craft and Culture, MLCU) and published by MLCU Press. The book – which was launched last year during the Shillong Literary Festival 2023 – was launched at Mawmluh, a place which served as a source of inspiration for the story of the book, on April 5th 2024.To commemorate the launch of the book, a program was conducted at the Conference Hall of the Monolith Restaurant, Mawmluh, where dignitaries namely Patricia Mukhim, Careen Langstieh, Mr P. Kharwanlang (Sirdar, Mawmluh), Dr. Larilin Kharpuri (Dean Research and Publication, MLCU), Dr Iadonlang Tyngsong (Additional Registrar, MLCU), members representing the Mawmluh Tourism & Allied Activities Cooperative Society (MTAACS) and executive member of the community were present at the event.Teachers and students from Ram Krishna Mission Higer Secondary School, Nabon Sawian Memorial Presbyterian Secondary School and Roban Sing Memorial Lower Primary School attended the program which was hosted by Dr Iadonlang Tyngsong.The program began with a welcome speech by Dr Larilin Kharpuri who briefed everyone about the purpose of the program and also explained the significance of the book launch as it is related to the cave located in Mawmluh.This was then followed by a speech by Patricia Mukhim who informed that the idea for the book was inspired by the cave at Mawmluh and the presence of stalagmite in the cave had helped determine the onset of Meghalayan Age. She went on to state that, “The book is a fictional story of exploration which also contains information concerning elements and species found inside the Cave along with illustrations that will help students visualize what they look like”.She encouraged the students to explore the cave with their teachers under the guidance of a guide so as to get a better understanding about their surroundings. “Many of the local residents know little about their surrounding compared to visitors from outside who know a whole lot more; this makes it important for us to take the initiative to learn about the environment we live in so that we can educate others to respect our surroundings and prohibit them from littering”, she added.Thereafter, a brief story-telling session was conducted by Careen J Langstieh who narrated the story about Mewan and Iba from the first few pages of the book and showed them illustrations contained in the book which sparked curiosity and engaged the students.Mr P. Kharwanlang (Sirdar, Mawmluh) then gave a speech on behalf of the community as he thanked the representatives of MLCU for the initiative of publishing a book that not only educates but inspires children to appreciate the beauty and importance of caves while also emphasizing the importance of educating others who visit our cave to preserve cleanliness.The book was then distributed to the teachers from the 3 respective schools, members of MTAACS and executive members of the community.
title: MLCU LAUNCHES “THE MYSTERY OF THE CAVE” INSPIRED BY MAWMLUH’S RICH HISTORY

content: Ka jaka ba buh ia ki pipe um plastik jong ka tnat PHE kaba don ha ka shnong Lumshyiap, Shillong hajan ka jaka thang metiap brierw jong ka Seng Khasi, ka la kem ding ha ka noh phai sngi jong ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka por kumba 3:45 ne 4:00 baje eiei.  Ka jingpluh jong ka ding ka la long kaba ishyrkhei bha kat haduh ba ka la pynher syrngiew ruh ia ki briew kiba sah marjan bad kane ka jaka namarba ka lyer ruh ka jur bha ha kane ka sngi.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong ki dkhot ka Seng Samla Shnong Lumshyiap kiba ju iaid pahara sha jaka ka jaka ba kham kynjah bad kaba kham long pajih na ka shnong, ki la ong ba ka jingpluh jong kane ka jaka ba ju buh ia ki pipe um plastik jong ka tnat PHE la suba ba ka lah ban dei ruh na ka jingthang khlaw kaba ju jia khah khah ha kane ka bynta kaba don markhap bad ka ‘law syiem.Kat haduh ba la pynmih ia kane ka khubor ym pat lah satia ban ioh jingkhein ia ka jingjulor.  Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ki kali pynlip ding jong ka tnat Fire and Emergency Services (F&ES) tang shu ioh jingtip ia kane ka jingjia ki la leit marmar ban tem ia ka jingklang jong ki thylliej ding barhem.Ki Pulit ruh ki la wan poi ha kane ka jaka ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia.Ia ka khubor kaba bniah ngin sa wanrah shuh shuh kham hadien.
title: ISHYRKHEI KA JINGPLUH DING KA JAKA PYNLANG PIPE UM KA PHE HA LUMSHYIAP

content: : U Director General of Police (DGP), ka Jylla u Dr. L. R Bishnoi u la iaroh ia ka jingtrei shitom jong ki Pulit ka East Khasi Hills halor ka jingiohkem ia ki nongkhaii drok ha nongbah Shillong.Ha kane ka jingkhynra, ki bor Pulit ki la ioh kem saw ngut ki snar khaii drok bad ioh kurup ruh ia u drok uba shongdor T. 1 klur ryngkat bad ka pisa kaba T. 45,000 hajar.Haba pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingma kaba ap ia ki samla na ka jingkharoi jong ki nongkhaii drok, u DGP u la pynrem ruh ia ki snar khaii drok kiba pynap shang khawiah ia ki samla ban im kyrni ha ka jingdih ia u drok.  U la iaroh ia ka jingtrei shitom miet la bad sngi ban khynra ia kine ki nongleh kam bymman bad kular ruh ban pyndkut ia ka jingkhaii drok sha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.U DGP u la ong ba ka jingioh kurup ia une u drok uba shongdor T.1 klur ka pynpaw shai ba ka jingpynrung ia u drok sha kane ka jylla ka long kaba shyrkhei bha.
title: KURUP KI PULIT KA EKH ÏA U DROK BA SHONGDOR 1 KLUR, IOH KEM 4 NGUT KI SNAR KHAÏI DROK

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) North Khasi Hills District Unit lyngba ka Education Cell ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka shlem ai jinghikai El Elyon Institute kan pynlong ïa ka Free Coaching Class na ka bynta ki samla pule ba dang ap ïa ka result Class-12 bad kiba la pyndep ïa ka Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) ba kin pynkhreh ïa ka Common University Entrance Test (CUET) Under Graduate (UG) ban pynïaid da ka National Test Agency (NTA) kane ka CUET-UG kan dei ka sien kaba nyngkong ba la NTA kan pynïaid ïa kane ka exam.Ha ki snem ba ladep ka NTA ka la pynlong ïa ka exam CUET na ka bynta ki Post Graduate ki samla pule ki hap ban pas ïa ka CUET-PG ba kin ïoh rung klas ha ki skulbah bapher bapher la ka dei ha jylla Meghalaya ne shabar jylla kumta ka KSU ka sngewdei ban shimkhia ïa kane ka mat khnang ba ki samla jong ngi kin ïoh rung klas wat shabar jylla ruh.Ka El Elyon Institute ka dei ka shlem ai jinghikai kaba ai jinghikai bapher bapher ïa ki samla hapoh ka them Ri Bhoi.Kane ka lad ban ai ka jingshakri sha ki samla pule ka thaiñ jong ngi lyngba ka jingai jinghikai ei ïa ki samla ban pyntbit ïalade ban thoh ïa ka Exam CUET kaba yn pynïaid da ka NTA kaba long ka Exam kaba kongsan ha shwa ba ki samla jong ngi kin rung sha ki kyrdan kiba kham shaneng ha ki jingpule (Academic).Kane ka sienjam ba ka KSU ka shim ka long ruh ban pynshlur ïa ki samla pule ba kin lah ban pynkhreh khambha ha kiwei pat ki eksamin ha ki kyrdan ba kham shaneng ha ka pule puthi.Ka plie lad ïa baroh ki samla ba kin mih shakhmat ban pynkhreh ïa ka exam CUET na ka bynta ki samla ban rung klas na ka bynta ka Under Graduate ka pdiang sngewbha ïa ki samla na ka dong ka thaiñ Ri-Bhoi bad kumjuh ki samla pule jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi na kiwei ki District ha kaba ki lah ban shim bynta da ka online class.Ki Form na bynta kane ka Free Coaching CUET- UG la pyllait naduh ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai bad kan kut haduh ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai bad ïa ki jingai jinghikai yn sdang naduh ka 22 tarik, Ïaiong 2024 bad ka por kan long naduh 3:00 baje haduh 5:00 baje janmiet manla ka sngi ha Nongpoh.Ka seng ruh ka dawa ba ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla kan pynbun ïa ki Examination Centre hapoh ka jylla ha manla ki District Headquarters na ka bynta ka jingsuk bad ka bit ka biang ki samla pule ka jylla.Ïa ki jingtip ba khambniah phi lah ban telephone ïa kine ki number phone +91 9366172780 lane +91 9383145301 lane +91 9612056636.  Ngi kyrmen lyngba kane ka sienjam kan wanrah ïa u soh u thiang na ka bynta ki Samla jong ngi, la pyntip u Chairman ka Education Cell ka KSU, NHKD u samla Banjoplang Maring.
title: IATEH KA KSU BAD KA EL ELYON INSTITUTE BAN AI JINGHIKAI EI ÏA KI SAMLA BAN ÏAKHUN CUET-UG

content: : Ka long ka kabu ksiar ïa ki khynnah kiba don ïa ka sap ha ka phutbol jong ki Shnong ba hap sha ka thaiñ Pomlakrai, Nongkrem,Laitkor, Smit  hadien ba ka PFR Football Academy kaba long kawei ka shlem ai jinghikài football ka la ïoh ban plie sa kawei ka shlem ai jinghikai haka shnong Mawpynthih East khasi Hills.Kane ka jingwanrah jong ka PFR Football Academy ïa katei ka Shlem ai jinghikai phutbol ha katei ka shnong kan ïarap shibun ki shnong ba marjan ha kaba ki kmie ki kpa kila ïohlad ban phah ïala ki jong ki Khun ha katei ka Center ba kham jan ym shuh ban wan shaduh sha sor.La plie ïa katei ka shlem ai jinghikài football hynnin ka Sngi Saitjain (6 tarik, ïaïong, 2024) jong ka taïew ba ladep, bad ki Khynnah kiba wan pynïasoh ki don kumba 60 ngut tam .Hashuwa ban sdang plie pyrda ïa katei ka shlem la ïoh ban pynlong  ïa ki jingïalehkai exhibition, ha kaba saw tylli ki kynhun ki wan ban ïashim bynta na katei ka Shnong ba Marjan ha ryngkat bad ka kynhun phutbol ka PFR  ha kaba ïa ka namlahduh ha katei ka jingïalehkai la ïoh rah daka Nongkynrih FC hadien ba pynliem ïa ka PFR reserved Football team da 1-0 kol.La plie ïa kane ka shlem ai jinghikai da u samla Samla Franky Kharumnuid – President ka Academy ha ka jingïadon ryngkatlang ki Coach, Bah Mickson, Robin bad Amrit.Nalor kane, la pyllait ïa ka jersey da u Coach ba dei khmih ha Mawpynthih- u Bah Mickson, katba ïa ka bynta ban pyllait ïa ki tiar pyndonkam haba lehkai da u Secretary ka Dorbar Shnong Mawpynthih ryngkat ki nongkitkam ka Mawpynthih SC.
title: PYNKHA KA PFR FOOTBALL ACADEMY ÏA KA SHLEM HIKAI HA KA SHNONG MAWPYNTHIH

content: Shillong, ïaïong 07: U MLA jong ka North Shillong Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la kam ba ka Advertisement ba la pynmih da ka tnat Pulit ka Jylla na ka bynta ban khot rungkam ka long kaba be-aiñ bad kam ruh ba ka dei kaba long markhongpong bad ka Office Memorandum kaba la pynmih ha ka 3 tarik, Rymphang, 2022.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u Bah Nongrum u la ong ba ka jingpynmih da ka tnat Pulit ïa ka Advertisement rungkam na ka bynta ki 2938 tylli ki post kaba la pynkynriah na ka 1 tarik sha ka 8 tarik Ïaiong, ka long kaba beain bad long markhongpong namarba ka Upper Age Limit na ka bynta ka post Constable ka long 21 snem bad 27 snem na ka bynta ka post Sub Inspector.U la pynkynmaw ba ka Sorkar ka la pyndem ïa ka jingdawa jong u ban pynjlana ïa ka rta thungkam ïa ki trai jylla na ka 32 snem sha ka 37 snem mynba ka Meghalaya ka la rakhe ïa ka jingdap 50 snem ka jingïoh jylla bapura.Halor kane, u Bah Adelbert u la ïathuh ba u la ïakynduh ruh ïa ka Secretary jong ka Central Recruitment Board ka Mary GT Sangma ban pan jingpynshai halor kano ka nongrim ba la pynmih ïa ka Advertisement kaba long markhongpong ïa ka Office Memorandum kaba la pynmih ha u snem 2022.“Kane kam dei ka jingïohnong tang jong ka Constituency jong nga marwei hynrei na ka bynta ki khun samla jong ka jaidbynriew,” ula ong.“Haba nga la kylli, ka (Secretary) la ong ba ka dei lyngba ka tnat Pulit. Kane ka pynpaw ba ka ïatakhuh bad ka Office Memorandum kaba la pynmih ha u snem 2022,” u la bynrap.“Namar ka jingdon jong ka Model Code of Conduct, nga la shu ïakren ïa u Home Secretary lyngba ka telephone bad nga la buh ka jingkylli bad ka jubab ka long ba la leh ïa kane lyngba ka Revise Uniform Guide Line. Nga la ong kumno phi pynkheiñ ïa ka Rule bad ki Norms lyngba ka OM kaba 3.2.22 kaba kren shai ba la pynmih da ka tnat Personel. U Ophisar u ïathuh ba la pynkhreh bad ka kam ka dang ïaid shakhmat. Nga la ong, kumno pat phi pynmih ïa ka Advertisement haba phi dang pynkhreh. Kane ka long kaba be-aiñ bad kane ka paw ba ka Sorkar MDA kam dei na ka bynta ki samla hynrei ka dei kaba pyrshah ïa ki samla,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Nongrum.“Kane ka long ka jingpynduh noh ïa ka hok ban im bad ban pynduh ïa ka hok ki khun samla. Nga la ai jingmut khlem pynslem ba ki Ophisar ki dei ban pynmih mardor lyngba ka jingpynbeit (Corrigendum) ban pynbeit ïa kane ka jingbakla khnang ba ki khun samla kin ym duh ïa la ka jong ka hok,” la ïathuh u Bah Nongrum.
title: KA ADVERTISEMENT KHOT RUNG KAM PULIT KA LONG MARKHONGPONG BAD KA OM 2022 : ADELBERT NONGRUM

content: Kumba 527 ngut ki khynnah na kylleng ki district jong ka Jylla ki la iashim bynta ha ka jingwad khynnah ïalehkai lane ka Talent Hunt Program kaba hap hapoh ka Khelo India Rising Talent Hunt (KIRTI-MyBharat).Ïa kane ka prokram ba la pynlong ha Sports Authority India (SAI) Training Centre, Shillong la sdang ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei yn sa pynkut noh ha ka sngi Balang mynta ka taiew.Ki jingïalehkai ki kynthup ïa ka Athletics, Boxing bad ka Football. Ki khynnah kiba wan ïashim bynta ha ka jingïalehkai Athletic ki don 141 ngut, 55 ngut ha ka Boxing bad 331 ngut ha ka Football.Ka jingthmu jong ka tnat ïalehkai jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ka long ban ithuh ïa ki sap kyrpang jong ki khynnah bad ban ai jinghikai pura ïa ki lyngba ka jingdon ïa ki jaka ïalehkai kiba paka namar ka jingangnud ka long ban sei ïa ki khynnah ïalehkai ki ban paw haduh ki lympung ïalehkai shabar ri kum ha ka Olympic bad kiwei kiwei ki rynsan ialehkai.Ha kane ka sngi la sdang da ka jingpynrung kyrteng ïa baroh ki khynnah kiba la wan sha kane ka prokram ha la ki jong ki rta ki jong ki, hadien la bud sa ka jingthew jingkhia, ka jingthew ïa ka rynïeng bad kumjuh ia kiwei ki test, nalor ka jingpynmareh, ka jingkynthih, ka jingkawang bol da dien (back throw), ki jingïalehkai phutbol, boxing bad athletics.U  Assistant Director jong ka SAI, STC, Shillong u T.S Chavhan u la pynpaw ba kane ka prokram ka dei lyngba ka jingshim khia da ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs jong ka Sorkar Pdeng na ka bynta ban ithuh ïa ki sap ïalehkai ba kyrpang jong ki khynnah khnang ban ai jinghikai ïa ki lyngba ki jaka ïalehkai kiba paka bad ba kin ïoh pat ïa ka lad ban mihkhmat ïa ka ri India ha ki lympung ïalehkai shaba ri.Ïa kane ka prokram la pynlong ha kylleng jong ka ri India. Ki khynnah kiba don ïa ki sap ba kyrpang ha ki jingïalehkai kin sa shah khot sha ki prokram ai jinghikai ki ban long ha ki shlem ai jinghikai jong ka SAI.
title: TALENT HUNT PROGRAM: 527 NGUT POI KI KHYNNAH SHA KA JINGJIED ÏA KI SAP IALEHKAI HA SAI TRAINING CENTRE

content: Uwei u rangbah na ka shnong Klew, Ri Bhoi District u la duhei ia la ka jong ka jingim katba u dang thmu ban leit khwai sha ha wah Umñiuh Khwan hajan ka Union Christian College (UCC), hadien ba u la ngam jyllop bad khlad noh tang hadien ba u la ioh ban pyllait im ia la u jong u khun.Ia une u rangbah la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Mahamsing Sten, 38 snem ka rta bad kane la jia ha ka sngi u Blei.  Ia ka met jong une u rangbah la ioh ban sei noh ha ka step Lah Sngi u Blei da ka kynhun State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) bad ka jingiarap lem jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum la iathuh ba ki don phra ngut baroh kiba thmu ban leit khwai dohkha ha Umñiuh Khwan bad kawei ka lieng kaba shong saw ngut ki briew ka la lait bad ka lieng kaba shong u Bah Mahamsing ka dang don hapdeng bad namar ka jingjur shaba palat ka lyer kane ka lieng ba ki shong ka la ngam shapoh um.Ha kane ka jingjia, katkum ka jingiathuh jong ki briew, la ong ba une u rangbah hadien ba la ngam ka lieng ha um da shilliang kti u rah ia la u khun shajrong ka sla um bad hadien ba u la lah ban pyllait im ia u khun u la ngam jyllop ialade bad duh syndon ia la ka jong ka jingim.
title: NGAM JYLLOP U KPA HADIEN BA LA PYLLAIT IM ÏA LA U KHUN HA UMÑIUH KHWAN

content: : Ka Voice of the Poeple Party (VPP) ha ka sngi baar ka la mudui pyrshah ia u nongialam jong ka National Peoples Party (NPP) Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ha u Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) ka Jylla halor ki jingkynnoh jong u pyrshah ia ka VPP ba ka dei kaba thaw jingkulmar ha ki jingialang jong ka National Peoples Party (NPP).Ha  ka jingmudui ba la soi da u Election Agent Bah Danny Langstieh, ka VPP ka la ong ba kine ki jingkynnoh jong u Bah Pyniaid ki long ha ka 6 tarik bad ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai katba u dang kren ia ka rynsan ialap elekshon na ka bynta ka NPP ha Rynjah, East Khasi Hills District bad ha Umsning, Ribhoi DistrictKa VPP ka la mudui ruh halor ka jingshoh bad ktah kti da ki briew kiba don ha ka jingialang jong ka NPP pyrshah ia ki riewpaidbah tang namarba ki pyrta ia ka shab jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP).Ha kajuh ka por, ka VPP ka la pynpaw ruh ba katkum ka jingioh jingtip da ki nongtrei jong ka party, ba ka lah ban don ka jingpyrshang ban tuklar ia ka jingiaid beit ka jingpynlong ia ka elekshon ha ka jylla khamtam ha rilum Jaiñtia da ki nongshim kabu.“Ka lah ban don ruh ka jingthep tuh ia ka vote lada ki Polling Official kim long kiba peitngor bad kiba kut jingmut ban pynthikna ba ka elekshon kan long kaba khuid kaba suba,” ong ka VPP ha ka mudui sha u CEO.“Ka party ka kyntu jur ia phi ban shim ia ki lad ki lynti ban pynthikna ba ka jingpynlong ia ka elekshon kaba khuid bad suba kam dei ban shah pynthud bad ba ki nongthep vote ki dei ban ioh lah ban thep ia ka vote ka jong ki khlem kano kano ka jingsheptieng bad ba ka jingthep tuh ia ka vote kam dei ban jia,” la bynrap shuh shuh ka VPP.
title: MUDUI KA VPP PYRSHAH ÏA U BAH PYNÏAID SING SYIEM HA U CEO

content: Katto katne ngut ki nongkyrshan jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ki la shah rah sha Thanad ha ki Pulit ka Ribhoi District hadien ba ki la pynthud ia ka jingialang da kaba pyrta ha u prah, ha u prah katba ka Kyrtong jong ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka dang ai jingkren halor rynsan ha ka jingialap elekshon ha ka shnong Umsning ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei.Ha kum kane ka por, nalor rynsan ka Dr. Ampareen  ka la ong sha ki briew kiba pyrta prah shi prah ba kin leit phai noh sha la iing bad hadien ba la mih ka jinghuri hura ki Pulit ki la rah noh ia ki sha Thanad.Shwa kane, na ka liang jong ka Dr. Ampareen ka la kyntu ïa ki nongkyrshan jong ka Voice of the People Party ban leit noh sha iing namarba kane ka lah ban wanrah ka jinghura hura ha kane ka jaka.
title: RAH KI PULIT SHA THANAD ÏA KI NONGKYRSHAN VPP BA HURI HURA HA UMSNING

content: Ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Regional Democratic Party (RDA) ha ka sngi Baar ka la pyllait paidbah ïa ka Election Manifesto bad ka jingsmai ban buddien na ka Sorkar Pdeng ïa ka jingdawa ban pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP), ka jingpynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka Eighth Schedule bad ban pynkut noh ïa ka jingïakajia pud bad ka jylla Assam.Ki 25 tylli ki mat ba la bsut ha ka Manifesto la pyllait paidbah da u President ka UDP u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh da ka jingkulr ban pynkhlain ïa ki Autonomous District Councils (ADC) bad tyrwa ïa ka Sorkar ban khot biang sha ka jingïakren ïasuk ïa ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC).Ka RDA ka la pynieng da u President barim jong ka HYC u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin kum u kyrtong ha Shillong Seat ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 mynta u bnai.Shuh shuh ha kane ka Manifesto, ka RDA ka la kular ruh ban pynkupbor ïa ki samla da kaba wanrah ïa ka Youth Policy bad ka Sports Policy bad ban pynshlur bad kyrshan ïa ki riewïalehkai sports, ki nongrwai nongtem, ki tyngshop ki puron bad ban khyllie pat sha ka jingbha ïa kito kiba la ngop ha ki jingdih ba pynbuaid kum u drok bad kiwei kiwei bad yn kyrshan radbah ïa ki jaka ha kaba la ai jingsumar ïa ki Rehabilitation Centres.Ka RDA ka la kular ban shimkhia ïa ka jingpyntreikam ka polisi bhah kam kaba 44 % na ka bynta ki post Group C & D ha ki ophis bad jaka trei kam jong ka Sorkar Pdeng, ka jingbhah kam 100 na ka 100 ïa ki trai ri trai muluk na ka bynta ki kam Contractual ha ki ophis sorkar, ka polisi thungkam (Reservation Policy) ha ki jaka trei ki riew shimet ne kompani shimet, ka jingnang ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo kum kawei na ki kyndon na ka bynta ki nong aplai ïa ki kam ka Sorkar Pdeng.Nalor kine, ka RDA ka la kular ban bishar bniah biang halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka National Education Policy (NEP), ka CUET, ka Three Language Formula, ka jingïoh bhah ki samla ha ki Higher and Technical Education, ban kyrshan ïa ki nongrep bad ban wanrah ïa ka Agricultural Research Centre hapoh Meghalaya.“Ban teh lakam ïa ka jingrung kyrthep ki mynder ri, ka RDA baroh kawei kynthup ïa u kyrtong MP jong ngi, u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin, ngin ïai buddien ban pynbor ïa ka Sorkar India ba kan pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ha ka jylla Meghalaya bad pakhang ïa ka jingthep vote armaloi bad ka jing rejistar ïa ki nongwei ne mynder ki bym don hok ban thep vote, ka jingker sainar shiah ïa ki jaka khappud bad ka jingwan rah ïa ka Police Border Wing,” la ong shuh shuh ka jingkular elekshon.Halor ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ka RDA ka la pynpaw ba la donkam ban plie lynti ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk hapdeng ka Sorkar bad ka kynhun kieng atiar HNLC ne kiwei kiwei pat ki kynhun lehnoh ha ka jylla.  Ban pynkhlain shuh shuh ïa ki bor Pulit ha manla ki distrik jong ka jylla da kaba thaw buit thymmai bad pyndonkam ïa ki tiar bad teknoloji kiba katkum kane ka juk stad kaba mynta. Ka RDA kan shim khia ruh ban kyntu ïa ka sorkar kmie ban thaw da ka Special Force ban tuklar halor ki kam khaii drok ha ki thain khappud.Shuh shuh ka RDA ka la pynpaw ruh ba la donkam kyrkieh ban pynbeit noh ïa ka thup jong ki ST bad SC ha Meghalaya, ka jingshna ïa ka Tribal Legislators National Forum, ban pyrshah ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Uniform Civil Code (UCC), ki ain kiba pakhang ïa ka jingpynkylla niam bad ban wanrah ïa ki ain kiba khlain ban pynshitom ïa kito kiba lehbein ne ban bein ïa ki paid riewngeit Kristan bad kiwei ki kynhun, ban thawlad thawlynti halor ka jingseng ïa ka Khasi Cultural Institute ïa kaba yn peit, khmih bad pynïaid da ka Seng Khasi bad Sein Raij kum shibynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka jingngeit tynrai bad yn trei minot ruh ban pynïoh ïa ka kyrdan ritpaid (Minority Status) sha ki dkhot jong ka Seng Khasi bad Sein Raij, ban pynsah nam pynsah kyrteng ïa ki riewkhraw ïaleh laitluid ka ri kum u Tirot Sing, u Kiang Nangbah, u Pa Togan Sangma, Ka Phan Nonglait, u Sngapsing Syiem bad kiwei kiwei, donkam ban pynrung ïa ki lynnong shaphang jong ki ha ki kot NCERT, ban  pynsngew ïa ka Sorkar India ba kan ym pyntreikam ïa ka Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) ha baroh shilynter u pud u sam jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad yn pynpaw ïa ka jing pyrshah kaba jur halor kano kano ka jing pyrshang ban pynbor halor kiba bun ki ishu kum ka ktien ka thylliej (imposition of Hindi Language), ka niam ka jingngeit (One Nation, One Religion), ki riti dustur (One Nation , One Culture) bad ruh kiwei kiwei de ki polisi treikam kiba pyntroin bad pynsyier ïa ki jaitbynriew ritpaid ha ka Ri India, ban shimkhia ruh halor ka bha ka miat jong ki paid Khasi bad Garo kiba shong basah ha Bangladesh.Ka RDA ka la tyrwa ruh ban kham pynkhlain shuh shuh ïa ka jingtreikam jong ki Ophisar Sorkar kum ki IAS, IFS bad IPS, donkam ban pynthikna ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka don la ka long ka cadre, ym kumba ka long mynta, ha kaba ngi dang hap lang hapoh ka Assam-Meghalaya Cadre.Halor ka synshar ka khadar kaba khuid, ka RDA kan shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban wanrah ïa ki ain pyrshah bamsap kiba khlain bor, ki polisi kiba wanrah ka rukom treikam kaba shai, yn thaw lad ruh ban buh ïa ki Monitoring Committee ha man ki distrik ki ban khmih halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka MP skhim bad projek bapher bapher jong ka sorkar.“Donkam ban pynskhem shuh shuh ïa ka jinglong ‘Welfare State’ jong ka Ri India. Namarkata, dei ban pynkhlain ïa ki kompeni sorkar (Public Sector undertakings), ban pynheh shuh shuh ïa ka Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) jong ki kompeni, bad ban pynskhem ïa ka hok halor ka ïoh ka kot bad ka bha ka miat hapoh ka imlang sahlang. Ban Ban pynthikna ba ki nongshong shnong kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhot met kin ïoh ïa la ki hok katkum ka ain Rights of Persons with Disability Act kum ka hok halor ka koit ka khiah, ka kamai kajih, ka pule dangle, ka synshar khadar bad kumta terter bad yn shim kam ruh halor ka jingpynïoh ïa ki jaka bad ki tiar ïalehkai bad kilan met na ka bynta jong ki. Ka RDA kan thaw lad kumno ban pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam jong ki jaka sumar kum ki Health Centre, PHC, CHC, Civil Hospital, NEIGRIHMS bad kiwei pat. Yn shim kam ruh halor kiwei pat ki mat ban kyntiew ïa ka koit ka khiah kum ka jingpynïoh dawai ei ïa ki nongshong shnong kiba hap hapoh ka kyrdan BPL, ki longkmie ba armet bad ruh ki tymmen ki kro, ka jingpynïoh ïa jaka sumar nongpang ki ba jan bad kiba paka, ka health insurance kaba kham paka, ka jingkyntiew ïa ka jingdon ki kali kit nongpang bad kumta terter,” la pynpaw ka kular elekshon jong ka RDA.Halor ka khyndew ka shyiap, ka RDA ka la kular ban pynlong ïa ka jingwad bad pule bniah halor ka jingktah jong ki ain ka Sorkar Pdeng kum ka Land Act, ka Forest Act bad ka MMDR Act ïa ka long ka man jong ki riewlum. Ka la kular ban pynkhlain shuh shuh ïa ki ain ban ïada ïa ka mariang bad pyrshang ruh ban pynurlong ïa ki Sustainable Development Goal (SDGs) kiba long ki thong jong ka United Nations. Ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingpyrshang ban khlong ïa u mar pohkhyndew Uranium ha ka jylla Meghalaya ka long ka mat kaba hakhmat eh ha ka thup treikam jong ka RDA. Ka RDA ka kyrshan pura ïa ka jingbhah ïa ki seat na ka bynta ki kynthei ha Parliament bad ruh ha Dorbar Thaw Ain jong ka jylla bad kan shim kam ruh ban pynthikna ba ïa kane yn pyntrei kam noh mardor da ka sorkar. Yn shim khia ruh ban kyntiew ïa ka jingïoh jingmyntoi jong ki kynthei na ki skhim bapher bapher jong ka sorkar bad yn buddien ruh na ka por sha ka por halor ka jing pyntrei kam ïa kine ki skhim. Kum ka kynhun, ngi sngewdei ruh ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka dei ban kyntiew ïa ka bhah jong ka na ka bynta ka jing siew sha ki Asha, ki Aganwadi bad ruh kito kiba trei kum ki nongshet ja hapoh ka skhim Mid-day Meal kum shi bynta ban kyntiew shuh shuh ïa ka ïoh ka kot ka jong ki kynthei kiba trei ïa kine ki kam.“Ka jingthrang bad jingangnud jong u kyrtong jong ngi, u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin ban buh ïa ka ophis treikam jong u MP ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency ha ka nongbah Shillong na ka bynta u paidbah.  Da kaba shim kabu ïa ki bor jingstad teknoloji, yn pyllait paidbah ruh ïa ka e-mail Id bad u nombor whatsapp ban ai ha ki paidbah nongshong shnong ïa ka rynsan ban ai jingmut bad ai buit ïa u MP khnang ba un ïoh pynjanai ïa la ka rukom treikam,” la pynpaw ka jingkular na u Kyrtong u Bah Kharjahrin.
title: ELECTION LOK SABHA: 25 TYLLI KI MAT KULAR ELEKSHON PYLLAIT KA RDA

content: Ka Kashari jong u Session Judge, West Jaiñtia Hills District u NA Khan ka la rai pynrem kaba phah set along 10 snem ïa u Riang Najiar, 71 snem ka rta uba donkti ban leh be-ijot ïa i khun kynthei lajong iba la 9 snem ka rta ha u snem 2008.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police, West Jaintia Hills u la pyntip ba une u kpa runar u la leh be-ijot ïa la ka jong ka khun kaba la duh noh ïala ka jong ka kmie ha ka por ba dang kha ïa ka.Ïa ka case la rejister ha Jowai Police Station hapoh ka Section 376 Indian Penal Code bad ïa ka jingtohkit bad pynngat kyndon la shimti da ka WPSI Kong O. Tyngkan.Nalor kaba rai pynrem, ka Kashari ka la hukum ruh ïa une u kpa runar ban siew ïa ka bailutksan kaba T. 3,00000 lak sha ka lanot.
title: 10 SNEM RAI SET ALONG KA KASHARI ÏA U KPA UBA LEH BE-IJOT ÏA KA KHUN LAJONG

content: : U Bah Bashemlad Ryntathiang uba sah ha mawlai syllaikariah ha ka 8 tarik u Iaiong, 2024 u la ujor da ka ejahar sha ki Pulit jong ka Pasteur Beat House hadien ba ki briew ki bym lah ban tip ki la rongtuh ia ka Scooty NTORG kaba don ia u nombar MLO5-W-9942 na ka thain Polo ha ka 7 tarik Iaiong, 2024 ha ka por kumba 11:00 baje mynmiet.Ha kane ka ejahar u Bah Bashemlad u la iathuh ba katba u dang leit sha iew Polo ban thied dawai, ki don katto katne ki briew kiba pan jingpruid ban thang sikret bad tang hadien kane u la kyllon khlem tip briew shuh. Hadien ba u la tip briew ha ka sngi kaba bud u la poi sha Nongpoh bad ong ruh ba um kynmaw eiei shuh ia ka jingjia bad kumno u poi sha Nongpoh bad nalor kata u la pyntip ruh ba nalor ka Scooty, ki runar ki la tuh ruh ia ka pisa na ka met jong u.
title: UJOR U TRAI BA SHAH TUH KA SCOOTY NTORG NA ÏEW POLO

content: : Uwei u nongbylla bar jylla uba la tip kyrteng kum u Arjun Rai 52 snem ka rta u la khladnoh ha NEIGRIHMS Hospital, Shillong hadien ba u la mynsaw jur na ka jingshah thombor ha ki runar ha ka sngi Balang ha ka por kumba 11:15 baje mynstep ha ka dong Umsohkhlur ha Mawlai Mawroh.U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la register case halor kane ka jingjia bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat ban ithuh ia ki nongleh kam bymman.U Rangbah Shnong ka Mawlai Mawroh Bah HBR Lyngdoh u la ong, “ka long kaei kaei ka jingjia kaba sngewsih bad ka la jia ha ka por mynstep kaba ngim poi pyrkhat ba kan jia kumne bad ki shu wan ki briew kiba ym ithuh wat ki paramarjan ruh kim lah ban ithuh dur mano ba dei.  Ki shu rung shapoh, ki shu kylli mano ba dei nongtrei bym dei ki Khasi ki shu tied shu bom bad hadien kata ki la phet noh.’“Ngin dang hap ban buddien hi khnang ba kum kine ki jingjia kin ym jia shuh hapoh ka shnong jong ngi,” u la ong.Haba kylli, ula iathuh ba katkum ka jingioh jingtip jong ki nongkitkam shnong, kine ki runar ki dei kiba wan da ka kynhun kumba 6 ngut.  “Ki la kah ia la ka durkhmat bad ki shu kylli beit shapoh bad tang kata hi ym lah ban ithuh mano ba dei,” u la bynrap.“Na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Shnong ka pynrem bad ka pyrshah ia kane ka jingleh kum ki riewbiej ki riewkhlaw, ban shu wan, shu tied bad shu bom khlem da tip mano ba dei bad mano bym dei. Ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewsih bad ngim kwah ba kum kine kiei kiei kin dang wan jia shuh shuh hapoh ka shnong,” la ong u Bah Lyngdoh.Haba kyntu ia kino kino ki briew kiba pyrshah ia ka jingwanrah nongbylla bar jylla hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong, u la ong, “wan shakhmat, kylli kaei kaba phi donkam bad lada phi kwah kylli jingkylli iano iano ruh wan da ka lynti kaba dei hynrei ban shu wan bad ban shu leh kumne ka buh jingsyier ia ka jaidbynriew jong ngi kiba don shabar ka jylla jong ngi. Lada kiwei ki iohi ia kane ka jingjia lyngba ka Social Media kaei ka ban ktah ia ki briew shabar jong ka shnong jong ngi.
title: ÏAP U NONGBYLLA BAR JYLLA BA MYNSAW JUR NA KA JINGSHAH TANGON HA KI RUNAR HA MAWLAI MAWROH

content: : Ka Executive Committee jong ka High Court of Meghalaya Bar Association (HCMBA) ka la pynrem jur halor ka jingshah byrngem jong ki arngut ki Muktiar ba pawkhmat ha ka nongbah Shillong ha ki katto katne ki runar lada ki iai bteng ban iasaid na ka bynta ki mukotduma jong ki nongwad jingiarap bad ban iashim bynta ha ka jingmudui jong ki nongwad jingiarap.“La pynkhlain ia ka jingbyrngem da kaba thep ruh ar tylli ki kuli (pistol) hapoh ka shithi,” ong u President ka HCMBA u C. Chakravarty.Ki dkhot jong ka Association da kawei ka sur ki la pynpaw ba kane ka dei ka jingtuklar ia ka jingtreikam jong kine ki arngut ki Muktiar ym tang ba ka pynkheiñ ia ka hok katkum ka riti synshar bad kiwei kiwei ki hok longtrai hynrei ka dei ka jingleh donbor ia ka nongrim jong ka juk shai.“La shim rai da kawei ka sur halor ka jingshah byrngem jong kine ki arngut ki Muktiar da kaba pynrem jur ha ka kyrteng jong ka Association ryngkat ka jingkular sha baroh ki Nongiasaid aiñ jong kane ka Association kin don beit ha syndah jong ki ha kum kane ka por kaba eh,” la ong ka Assocation.
title: SHAH BYRNGEM KI MUKTIAR DA KABA ÏOH PDIANG AR TYLLI KI KULI PISTOL HA KA SHITHI

content: : U MLA jong ka Voice of the People Party na North Shillong Constituency Bah Adelbert Nongrum ha ka sngi Balang u la kyntu ia ki paidbah nongkyrshan jong ka party ba kin long kiba jaijai bad kin ap ia ka por haduh ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai, kaba dei ka sngi thep vote, ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah.Kane ka jingkyntu jong une u nongialam ka VPP ka long hadien ba ki la mih ki jingshah shoh shah dat bad shah kem jong ki briew kiba pyrta ia ka shab jong ka VPP ha ki jingialang ialap elekshon jong ka National Peoples Party (NPP) kiba la jia ha kylleng ki rynsan ialap elekshon ha kine ki khyndiat sngi.Halor ka jingjia ha ka shnong Jaiaw ha ka janmiet Lah Sngi u Blei mynta ka taiew, u Bah Adelbert ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “jait ba ka wan jia hapoh ka Constituency jong nga, nga te ngam ngeit ba kan don ka jingshisha halor kata ka jingkulmar, hynrei kane ka dei ka rukom jong ka politik bad ka jingialehkai ba jakhlia kaba kiwei ki ngeit. Ka VPP ka ngeit ha ka Clean Politics. Ngi la pynlut mynta la jan shi snem naduh ba la pynkha ia ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ban pynshai bad ban pynsngewthuh kumno phin iashim bynta ha ka sainpyrthei bad kaei ka kamram jong phi kum ki nongthep vote.”“Ha,oid, ngi la pynrung kyrteng lada dei ba ki don kyrteng hapoh ka party, ka Identity Card bad ngin ym lah ban ong da kumwei pat. Nga pynrem ia kane ka jingjia bad ngam tip mano ba donkti bad kum kine ki jingjia kim dei ban don na kano kano ka party ne na kano kano ka liang jong kawei ka party kam dei ban don ka jingpynthud ia kiwei pat ki party haba dang iaid ka jingialap elekshon,” u la ong.“Ha ka politik ki (mih) beit ki jingjia bapher bapher bad kum u riewpaidbah ngim tip lada don neem ka jingshisha ba phin kynnoh ia ka VPP bad kiwei kiba kyrshan ia kiwei pat ki party ki lah ban leit pyrta kumjuh ha ki jingialang ba ngi pynlong na ka VPP (hynrei) ngin ym lah ban pynshisha ba ki dei ki briew jong kita ki party namarba ym don jingpynshisha namarba ma ki (NPP), ki ladep ban phah kem. Ai ba ka ain kan leh la ka jong ka kamram (bad) ngin sa tip ia ki jingshisha,” u la bynrap.“Kum u nongmihkmat na ka VPP ngim ngeit ia kum kine hynrei ngi kyntu kynpham ia kiba ieid kiba thoiñ ba kane ka dei ka por elekshon ngin ym leh shongshit hynrei ngin long borabor kiba shitrhem bad ngin ri borabor ia ka akor ka burom bad lada ka dei shisha ba ki don bynta kita ki briew kiba kyrshan (ia ka VPP) hynrei kumba nga ong haduh mynta ngam pat lah ban pynshisha bad ka party kam pat lah ban pynshisha ba ki dei ne kim dei hynrei lada ki dei, nga ong tang katne katba ka jingialap elekshon ka dang iaid lehse ha ka jingdom ka jingbitar ia kita ki nongsynshar baroh shikatta ym lah ban tip.  To long kiba jaijai ap ia ka por kaba kham khraw kaba phin pynpaw pyrshah ia kita kiba phi dei ban pyrshah ka dei ha ka 19 tarik (mynta u bnai),” la kyntu u MLA ka VPP ia ki nongkyrshan.“Hynrei kine kiba kynnoh beit imim peitpeit ia ngi kum ka VPP nga ong ka dei ka dak jong ka jingkutlad kaba ki iohi ba ym i donlad shuh. Kiei kiei kin sa paw ia ki jingshisha baroh.  Ngi don la ka jong ka hok katkum ka riti synshar paidbah ban pynpaw da kaba iam, da kaba rkhie bad da kaba hylla. Kum ha kane ka ri laitluid ngi dei ban pdiang ia kane.  Hynrei lada ngi sngap ia ka jingkren beiñ bad ka jingkynthoh jong kiwei pat ha ka jingialap elekshon haduh ba ki la shu kren beit tang ia u Bah Ardent Basaiawmoit u President jong ka VPP katba ki klet noh ia la ka jong ka nongrim bad ki pynsawa jur ia ka politik bad ki pynjah noh pat ia ka sur jong ka polisi,” la kynthah u Bah Nongrum.Haba kylli, u la ong, “ngin ym lah ban rung ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong kiwei, hynrei ka jingmut jingpyrkhat ka dei ka jaka rieh kaba skhem tam jong ka jinglaitluid longbriew.  Ki paidbah ki la dom ki la bitar bad ki la kthang na kawei ka Sorkar sha kawei ka Sorkar ngim iohi ia kiei kiei ki dak jingkyrmen khamtam ki khun samla bad lehse ka lah ban dei ka daw ba ki sngewthuh ba dei sa tang u Prah (VPP) ba lah ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla ha kane ka jylla jong ngi bad kaba pynlong ia ki ban pynpaw ia kane ka jingkmen, ka jingkyrmen ruh.”
title: LONG KIBA JAIJAI, PYNPAW ÏA KA JINGPYRSHAH JONG PHI HA KA 19 TARIK, KYNTU U BAH ADELBERT

content: : Ar ngut ki briew ki la khlad noh hashen ha kawei ka jingjia ba sngewsih hadien ba kawei ka trok kit dohkha ka la kylla ha surok Shillong-Jowai ynda poi ha ka shnong Mawblei, Shillong. Kane ka la jia ha ka step sngi Balang katba kane ka trok ka dang wan na ka thaiñ Smit.  U nongniah jong kane ka troko u lait im na ka jingjia ba sngewsih.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong ki briew kiba la sakhi ia kane ka jingjia ki la pyntip ba ka jingkylla khongpong jong ka trok kaba don ia u number AP16 TS-9689 ka dei na ka daw ka jingphiel jong ka Break.Khnang ban lait na kino kino ki jingjia ba sngewsih ia ki mynsiem briew, la iathuh ba une u nongniah jong ka trok u la pynkylla khongpong ia kane ka trok bad ki ar ngut kiba la khladnoh hashen ka dei ha ka por ba ki la kynthih shabar na ka kali bad ki shah ban kylla ha kane hi ka trok katba ia u draibar uba la lait im na kane ka jingjia la rah noh sha Civil Hospital, ShillongTang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia, ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team (SRT) jong ka Fire and Emergency Service (F&ES) marmar ki la leit mar mar sha Mawblei bad iarap sei ia ka met iap jong kine ki ar ngut.Tad haduh ba pynmih ia kane ka khubor ym lah ban ioh ia ka jingtip kaba tikna la kine kiba iap ki dei naei bad kumjuh ruh ia u nongniah jong ka trok.
title: KHLAD HASHEN 2 NGUT KI BRIEW BA BAN KA TROK HA MAWBLEI, LAIT IM U DRAIBAR

content: Shillong, ïaïong, 10: U Returning Officer jong ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat u SC Sadhu u la pan jingpynshai na ka Voice of the People Party halor ka jingujor ba la ioh pdiang ha ka sngi Baar halor ka jingpynthud jong ki nongkyrshan ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ia ka jingialang ialap elekshon jong ka National Peoples’ Party (NPP) ha Jaiaw, East Khasi Hills District.Ha ka jingpang jingpynshai, u Returning Officer u la ong ruh ba katkum ka jingioh ujor, ki nongkyrshan ka VPP ki la pyrta slogan bad kane ka pynwit ia ka jingialang bad la hap ban pynsangeh shwa ka por.U Returning Officer u la ong, da ka jingpynbna ia ka General Election sha ka Lok Sabha-2024 da ka Election Commission of India ha ka 16.03.2024, ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) ka la treikam mardor naduh ka 16.03.2024.Haba kdew ia ki kyndon jong ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) u Returning Officer u la ong, “ki kyndon jong ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) na ka bynta ki seng saiñpyrthei bad ki kyrtong ki kdew shai ba, “ki seng saiñpyrthei bad ki kyrtong ki dei ban pynthikna ba ki nongkyrshan jong ki kim dei satia ban pynwit ne ban pynthud ia ki jingialang bad proseshon ba la pynlong da kiwei kiwei ki party. Ki nongtrei ne ki nongkyrshan jong kawei ka seng saiñpyrthei kam lah ban thaw jingkulmar ha ki jingialang paidbah ba la pynlong da kawei pat ka seng saiñpyrthei da kaba buh jingkylli da ka ktien ne da ka jingthoh ne da kaba sam ia ki kot lyngkdop jong ki party ki jong ki. Ia ki proseshon ym dei ban pynlong da kawei ka party ha ka jaka ba don ka jingialang ba la pynlong da kawei pat ka party. Ki poster ba la pynmih da kawei ka party ym dei ban weng da ki nongtrei jong kiwei pat ki party.”“Mynta, namarkata, da kaba ailad ia phi ba phin tip, la bthah ia phi ba phin jubab ha lane shwa ka 12 tarik, Iaiong, 2024 ba balei yn ym lah ban pynshitom ia phi hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Model Code of Conduct,” la ong u Returning OfficerHa kajuh ka por, u Returning Officer u la pan jingpynshai ruh na ka VPP halorka jingpynkheiñ ia ka Model Code of Conduct katkum ka jingioh pdiang ia ka ujor halor ka jingpyndonkam ia ka Social Media ban shna ia ki khubor thok pyrshah ia ka kyrtong jong ka National Peoples Party (NPP) lyngba ka YouTube Video ba la thep ha ka 3 tarik, Iaiong, 2024.U Returning Officer u la bthah ia ka VPP ban phah ia ka jubab ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai.
title: PAN JUBAB U RO NA KA VPP BA SHAH PYNTHUD KA JINGÏALANG JONG KA NPP HA JAÏAW

content: Shillong, ïaïong, 11: Ka Kashari Special Judge POCSO, East Jaintia Hills District ka la rai pynrem da kaba phah set along hynñiew snem ia u Emlang Dkhar halor ka jingdonkti ban leh be-ijot ia kawei ka khynnah kynthei kaba dang hapoh 18 snem ka rta.Ki Pulit kiba la ioh pdiang ia ka jingujor ejahar ki la register case ha Khliehriat Police Station hapoh ka Section 376 IPC pule lang bad ka Section 6 jong ka POCSO Act.  Ia ka jingtohkit la bynshet ha ka WPSI Kong M. Marbaniang. Hadien ba ladep tohkit la pynngat kyndon ia u Emlang Dkhar ha ka 17 tarik, Rymphang, 2015, la pyntip u Superintendent of Police ka East Jaiñtia Hills u Giri Prasad M. ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.Ka Kashari kaba la shong bishar ka la lap ba u Emlang Dkhar u dei uba donkti ha kane ka kam runar bad rai pynrem da kaba phah set along ryngkat ka jingdaiñ kuna kaba T. 20,000 hajar hapoh ka Section 376 IPC bad shiphew snem hapoh ka Section 6 jong ka POCSO Act bad daiñ kuna T. 20.000.
title: 7 SNEM BAD 10 SNEM RAI SET ALONG KA KASHARI ÏA U NONG LEH BE-IJOT

content: Ka Khasi Jaintia Churches Leaders Forum (KJCLF) la kyntu ïa ki kyrtong kiba ïakhun ïa ka elekshon ba smai ba kin shakri ïa ki paidbah da ka jingkhuid bad kaba lait na ka jingbamsap.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Secretary ka KJCLF Rev Dr EH Kharkongor, u la ong, “kum ki nongshnong ka dei ka jingkitkhlieh jong ki nongthep vote ban ïashim bynta ha ka jingjied nongmihkhmat sha ka Ingdorbar Thawain ka Jylla bad ha ka Parliament khnang ban dup lah ban rai ïa ka lawei jong ka ri jong ngi lyngba ka Sorkar ba la thaw bad ka ban ai ai ka jingshakri sha ki paidbah.  Ka elekshon Lok Sabha 2024 ka la hajan bad ka jingkyntu ïa ki nongthep vote ka long ban khie sa shisien pat ban jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat da ka jingshai, ka jingshlur.”“Ha ka elekshon jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ kaba la long ha u snem baladep ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya ki la pynpaw ïa la ka jong ka mon pyrshah ïa kito kiba mihkhmat ha ka kyrteng ka niam, kiba khim jingmut, jingïaumsnam bad kiwei kiwei ki rukom ba pynmong.  Hynrei, ka long kaba sngewsih ban ïohi ïa ki riewshimet kiba pyrta da ka pisa, ka kyrdan bad ka bor ki la pynhiar dor ïa lade sha ka kyrdan ba shah tehmraw haba ki tyrwa ïalade ne shah thied ha ki nongkhaii mraw sainpyrthei kiba ïapein bad ki briew bad kiba pynsawa ïa ki manifesto kum ki jingdie ha ki jaka iew.  Ki politishian bad ka Sorkar ki la kylla bamsap ha ka rukom long ka jong ki.  Ka bamsap, ki kam runar, ki jingïaumsnam bad ki jingbyrngem. La wanrah da ki aiñ kiba pynmong, ïa ka hok katkum ka riti synshar bad ki hok la shah pynduh, la ailad ïa ka jingïasih khlem da lah ban tehlakam,” ong u Secretary ka KJCLF.Ka KJCLF ka kyntu ïa ki nongshong shnong ba kin don ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ban pyndonkam ïa ka hok thep vote jong ki ha ka sngi thep vote bad ban rai da ka mynsiem jingïatiplem kaba khuid, da ka jingshlur bad ka jingshemphang ba ngi kwah ïa ka jingkyrmen na ka bynta ka babha bad kaba thymmai.“Ka Forum ka pynrem jur ïa ki kam ïaumsnam bad ki jingïasih bad ka khot bad wer ïa ki nongmihkhmat paidbah ba kin smai  ban ïada ïa ka riti synshar ka ri bad ban shakri ïa ki paidbah na ka bynta ban noh synniang sha ka Sorkar kaba lait na ka bamsap bampong bad ka bym leh donbor hynrei bad ban wanrah ïa ka jingïadei kaba jan hapdeng ki nongshong shnong khnang ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: ELECTION LOK SABHA: RAI DA KA MYNSIEM JINGÏATIPLEM HA KA SNGI THEP VOTE, KYNTU KA KJCLF

content: Ka Shillong All Faiths Forum (SAFF) kaba ïeng na ka bynta ka shongsuk shongsaiñ, ka jingïasngew shipara bad ka hok, ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingshah pynïap dang shen ki bar jylla ha ka shnong Ichamati bad ha Mawlai Mawroh.Katkum ka kyrwoh khubor ba la pynlait da u secretary u Rev. Fr. Richard Majaw u la ong, ka SAFF ka banjur bad ka kyrpad ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ, ka jingïasngew shipara hapdeng baroh ki jaitbynriew kiba sah ha ka jylla bad ba kin kiar na kino kino ki kam kiba wanrah ïa ka jingisih bad ki jingïaumsnam.”“Katba ngi dang ïaid sha ka jingïashim bynta ha kane ka ilekshon sha ka Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai, ngin pynneh ïa ka jinglong kaba jai jai bad kiba pyrkhat ïa ka suk ka saiñ. Ngi kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar bad ki bor synshar Sorkar ban ïada ïa ki nongshong shnong bad ban ïada na kum kine ki jingjia ïaumsnam hapoh ka jylla,” u la ong“Ngin ïasnohkti lang ha ki jingduwai khnang ba ngin lah ban im ha ka suk ka saiñ bad kum shipara,” ong u Secretary ka SAFF.Ha kajuh ka por, ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka la pynpaw ba kum ka party kaba burom ïa ka Riti Synshar jong ka Ri India bad ïa ki nongrim jong ki aiñ ka pynrem jur ïa ka jingpynïap im im peit peit ïa uwei u nongbylla misteri bar jylla ha Mawlai Mawroh dang shen.“Mano mano ruh kim donhok ban shim ïa ka mynsiem jongno jongno. Ka hok ban im ka dei ka hok longbriew manbriew jong uwei pa uwei u briew la u dei na kano kano ka jaitbynriew, ka jait ne ka niam bad ïa kane ka hok la pynskhem ha ki aiñ satlak ka pyrthei bad ka Ri,” ong u nongaiktien ka VPP Dr. Batskhem Myrboh.“Ngi kyntu namarkata ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynthikna ba ka aiñ ka dei ban treikam bad ba kiba donkti kin ïoh ïa ka jingpynshitom katkum ki kyndon,”  u la ong bad bynrap, “kane ka jingjia ka la pynjah burom shikatdei eh ïa kane ka jylla jong ngi kaba la bna nam namar ki kam pynkheiñ aiñ bad ki kam bamsap ba la leh da kito kiba don ha ka bor.”
title: PYNREM KA SAFF BAD KA VPP BA SHAH PYNÏAP U MISTERI HA KI RUNAR HA MAWLAI MAWROH

content: Ka Voice of the People’s Party (VPP) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la mudui da ka ejahar sha u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District halor ki jingshah pynjah burom jong ka party ha ka rynsan Social Media kaba la saphriang haduh katta katta.Ha ka ejahar ba la soi da u Election Ageng jong ka VPPP Bah Danny Langstieh uba dei ruh u Finance Secretary u la pyntip ba ki don ki video Clips lane ka Video Interview ba la pyllait ha ki lad pathai khubor kiba paw lyngba ka YouTube bad ka kyrteng ka News Video Interview kaba la ong “Ka ilekshon kam dei ban wanrah ka jingïapher niam ba la ong da uwei u nongïalam niam” bad ha ka jingkynthoh ha kane ka Youtube Channel ka long ha ka kyrteng jong @jsyiemliehmaduh413 kaba la kynthoh, `Ha u prah me phadar” bad ha kawei pat ka jingkynthoh kaba la kynthoh da uwei uba ai kyrteng da @FahvasFahva-me7yk kaba la kynthoh, “Ha u prah noh me doh lap sngew mat.”Na ka liang jong ka VVP,  ha ka jingmudui ejahar ka la pynpaw ba da kaba buh ïa kine ki jingkynthoh ha ki rynsan paidbah, ka la pynjah burom bad ka la pynpohdor ïa ka ‘The Voice of the People Party’ baroh kawei bad lah ban kdew bad kum kine ki jingkynthoh pynrem ka la pynjah burom, ka la wanrah ruh ia ka khana sniew ba la kynthah beit beit ïa ka kyrteng kaba bha jong ka VPP hapoh ka jylla.Ka VPP ka la ong ba kine ki jingkynthoh ha kine ki Youtube Channel ka la pynsniew dur ïa ka seng sainpyrthei kaba la paw ha ka jylla bad ia kane ka jingujor la mudui khnang ban pynrung noh kyrkieh hapoh ka First Information Report hapoh ki kyndon aiñ jong ka Indian Penal Code, 1860 bad kumjuh ruh hapoh ka Information Technology Act, 2000 lane ha kine kino ki aiñ kiba ïadei bad kane ka kam.U Bah Langstieh u la ong shuh shuh ba ka party ka la kyrpad ba ki Pulit ba kin shim kam noh kloi bad ban kem ïa ki runar bad ban pynshitom katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.Ka VPP ka la phah kopi ruh ia kane ka ejahar sha ka Cyber Crime Branch Office, Secretariat Hills Shillong,  sha u Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) ka jylla bad sha u Commissioner and Secretary ka tnat Election.
title: MUDUI EJAHAR KA VPP PYRSHAH ÏA KIBA PYNJAH BUROM ÏA KA PARTY HA KA SOCIAL MEDIA

content: S: Ki shipai BSF ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la ïaid pahara ha nongbah Shillong shwa ba ka Jylla Meghalaya kan leit sha ka ilekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka jingïaid pahara jong ki shipai BSF ka long ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha East Khasi Hills District hadien ba arngut ki bar jylla ki la shah pynïap dang shen ha ka shnong Ichamati ha ka 27 tarik u bnai ba ladep bad uwei u nongbylla misteri bar jylla u la shah pynïap ha Mawlai Mawroh mynta ka taïew.Nalor kata, hadien ba la mih ki pynwit ha ki jingïalang da ki nongkyrshan jong kiwei ki party, ki bor synshar District ki la phah  pahara da ki Pulit ha ki jaka ba pynlong ïa ki jingïalang khnang ba kin ym mih kino kino ki jingjia ba sngewsih.Uwei u ophisar Pulit u la ïathuh ba ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingïaid pahara ki shipai BSF ka long ban wanrah biang ïa ka jingshaniah ki paidbah bad ban tem ïa kino kino ki jingjia.Ha kane ka sngi, ki shipai BSF ki la ïaid kjat naduh SP’s Office ter ter shaduh Laitumkhrah bad Rynjah. Kane ka jingïaid pahara ki shipai kan dang bteng haduh ka sngi thep vote.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ha ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai, ka ing jong ka MDC ka NPP na Umsning Constituency ka Kong Macgalyne Sawkmie Mawlong ha ka shnong  Mawlein Mawkhan, Sohkyndur, Ribhoi District bad u maw uba la kawang da ki runar u la lait salit na ka khlieh jong ka Kong Macdalyne katba ka dang ieng ban kren phone ha phyllaw ïing.
title: SHWA KI SNGI THEP VOTE ÏAID PAHARA KI SHIPAI BSF HA SHILLONG

content: Ka National Peoples Party Womens Front Meghalaya State Unit ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynrem jur ïa ki runar kiba donkti ban kawang maw ïa ka ingsah jong ka MDC ka NPP na Umsning Constituency ka Kong Macdalyne Sawkmie Mawlong ha ka janmiet 10 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka shnong Mawlein Mawkhan, Sohkyndur, Ribhoi District.Ki Pulit kiba la ïoh kurup ar tylli ki maw napoh ka ing sah jong ka Kong Magdalyne bad lap ruh ba ki jingkhang iing ki la pait.Ka President jong ka NPP Womens Front Meghalaya State Unit Dr. Jasmine M. Lyngdoh ka la ong, “kum ki longkmie  ki dap da ka jingsngewkhia haba ïohsngew ïa ka jingjia kaba pynsyier ïa ngi ban ïatrei na ka bynta ki kam elekshon ha kaba ki don ki briew kiba la kawang da ki maw ïa ka ingsah jong ka Working President ka Kong Magdalyne Sawkmie Mawlong shwa ba kan leit sha ka jingïalang.  Hynrei da ka jingïada jong u Blei donbok ba im shym la mynsaw.”“Ngi pynrem jur ïa kane ka jingjia. Ngi kwah ban ïathuh ïa ki nongshong shnong ha kane ka jylla ba ngim lah ban ïaleh da kaba shu pynmynsaw ïa kiwei ne ngim lah ban ban ïaleh ïa ka elekshon da kaba pyntieng ne da kaba pynsyier ïa kiwei. Kane ka dei ka ri synshar paidbah, ngi don ïa ka hok ban jied ïa ki briew lajong, ngi don ka hok ba ngin trei ha ka por elekshon bad ngi don ruh ïa ka hok ba ngin sngewshngaiñ ha la ki jong ki shnong ki thaw lajong,” la ong ka Dr. Jasmine.“Ka NPP Womens Front ka pynrem jur ïa kane ka jingjia bad ngim kwah shuh ba kine ki jingjia kin wan jia ha ka por ba ngi dang pynkhreh na ka bynta i kyrtong jong ngi i Dr. Ampareen. Ngi sngew sarong ba i dei ka longkmie ban ïakhun ïa ka elkeshon bad ngi sngew sarong ba i long iba shlur ban shim ïa kane ka lyngkor ban leit sha ki shnong ki thaw ban pan ïa ka jingkyrshan na ki nongshong shnong,” ka la ong.“Ngi kwah ba ki briew kin sngewthuh ba ki dei ban long kiba jaijai bad ba kin ailad ruh ïa kiwei ba kin don ïa kata ka hok ba kin leit thep ïa ka vote bad ba kin jied ïa ki nongïalam katkum ka jingkwah jong ki,” la kyntu ïa kane ka nongïalam jong ka NPP Womens Front.Ka Kong Macdalyne haba ïathuh ïa ka jingjia ha ka janmiet 10 tarik ka la ong, “katba nga dang kren phone ha phyllaw ing ha Umsning hapdeng katto katne minit ba nga ieng ka la don kata ka jingher ki maw najan ka khlieh jong nga bad mar kumta nga kyndit khamtam ïa nga ka longkmie wat ha phyllaw ing (lajong) ruh kam don shuh ka jingshngaiñ.  Nga la mareh bad ki dang don ki nongïalam hapoh ïing nga dap da ka jingher syrngiew, ka jingtieng kaba khraw ba kum kane ka por wat ha ka ingsah lajong ruh kam don shuh ka jingshngaiñ.”“Nga sngewnguh ïa u Blei dei ma U, Uba ïada bad lymda dei ba ma U ba ïada nga la mynsaw na ka bynta jong ka khlieh.  Kine ki briew ki dei kiba la suhbuit lypa. Nga da sngewkhia shisha lada mynta ka jia ïa nga lashai hadien habud kan jia ïano re ïano.  Ngi dei ki longkmie, ki kmie, ki hymmen, ngi don ki hymmen ki para bad nga kyntu jur ïa ki longkmie ban ïamih ha kane ka jylli jong ka saiñpyrthei ban mih shakhmat bad khamtam na ka party jong ngi, ngi don i Dr. Ampareen kum ka longkmie ngi sngewkmen bad ngi sngewshngaiñ ba ki longkmie ki don ban saiñdur lang ïa ka imlang ka sahlang,” ka la ong.“Ha kane ka por ba ngi leit na ka liang jong ka party ngi leit da ka mon sngewbha, ngi leit da ka jingieid bad da ka jingsngewthuh jingmut bad ngim dei ba ngi leit ban pynïashun bad pynïashrut ïano ïano bad ngim tip ïa kita ki riewbymman kiba shim kabu ha kano ka dur bad halor  kano ka rukom ïa ka kynthei ki wan da ki tiar pynmynsaw ban pynjulor ïa ka ing,” la ong shuh shuh ka Kong Macdalyne.“Ngi shu sheptieng kum ki longkmie haba ngi leit ngi wan kaei ka ban jia hadien ngi ngim tip.  Nga kum ka longkmie nga iengskhem ba ngin don ha ka jylli jong ka saiñpyrthei ngi ieid ban shakri.  Haba ngi shakri ïa ki parabriew, ngi shakri ruh ïa U Blei, Ngi shim kynta ïa kane ka kam, (namarba ka dei ka) kam kaba bha,” ka la ong.Haba kylli, ka la ong,” na ka liang jong nga, ngam kynnoh hi ruh ïano ïano.  Katba ka dang ïaid ka jingtohkit jong ki Pulit ngam pat lah ban ong ïano bad mano ngi ieh ïa ka jingstad ka tnat Pulit.”Ka President barim jong ka NPP Womens Front Kong P. Nongpluh haba bynrap halor kane, ka la ong, “kum ki nongtrei party ngi sngewkmen ba i Kong Ampareen i la lah ban kit ïa ka lyngkor. Ka jingkit jong i ïa kane ka lyngkor ngi ïohi pat ba ka jingkynthoh pyrshah ïa i ka long kaba isaitmet. Kum ki longkmie ngim lah ban pddaing ban shu kren katba mon ma ki.  Ym shym la pynbor ïa ngi bad ngi don la ka jong ka nongrim lajong ban ieng ha ka party bad ngi kyrpad ïa kito kiba ju mlien ban pyndik ha ki jingïalang jong kiwei sngewbha wat wan pyndik ïa kiwei. Ngi kyrpad ïa ki nongbud kiba ieid ïa ngi ba kim dei ban khluit kumba khluit kiwei namarba lada ka party jong ngi ruh ka khluit kan poi sha kaba mynsaw namar ban shu leit pynwit ha manla ki jaka ba long jingïalang kiwei bad ban shu leit hylla ma phi ngim lah ban pdiang namarba ka jingleh jong ki ka long kaba isaitmet bad ba ngim lah ban pdiang.”
title: NGIM LAH BAN ÏALEH ÏA KA ELEKSHON DA KABA PYNTIENG, PYNSYIER ÏA KIWEI : DR. JASMINE LYNGDOH

content: Ka jingpynsaphriang khubor lamler ha ka Social Media da ki briew kiba kwah ban pynthut ïa ka shongsuk shongsain, ka la wanrah ïa ka jingisih ha ka imlang sahlang bad kaba la ïalam bakla ruh wat ïa ki bor jong ka aiñ ban kem pathar wat ïa kiba lui-lui.Kane ka la jia ha nongbah Shillong, ha kaba ki Pulit ki la kem ïa uwei u samla Khasi na iingsah jong u na Laban ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka taiew baladep hadien ka jingshah shoh jong ki arngut ki samla bar jylla ha kane kajuh ka sngi ha ki briew ki bym lah ban tip ki dei kiei.Kane ka jingkem jong ki Pulit ïa une u samla Khasi ka dei ruh hadien ba ki don ki briew kiba la pynsaphriang ïa kawei ka dur ba uwei u bar jylla u la ïap da kaba tynsad lang ïa ki jingthoh kaba ong, “ïap uwei u bar jylla na ki ar kiba shah shoh ha kane ka sngi,’ katba ka dur pat ka dei metïap ba dang pynkhreh ban rah leit onthang ïa uwei u rangbah bar jylla uba la ïap na ka jingpang.Ym tang katta, ki Pulit ki la rah ban tian bishar ïa une u samla Khasi bad pan bor na ka Kashari ban set byndi ha along ki Pulit na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit, hynrei tang ha ka sngi kaba bud, kata hynnin ka sngi Saitjaiñ, namar ka jingbym lap sabut eiei pyrshah ïa une u samla Khasi, ki Pulit ki la pyllait noh ïa une u samla hadien ka jingpynshisha da uwei na ki samla bar jylla uba la shah shoh ha ka sngi Palei jong ka taiew baladep ba u samla Khasi um dei satia uba ïadon bynta ban thombor ne ktah kti pyrshah ïa u.Halor kane ka jingkem pathar jong ki Pulit khlem ki sakhi ki sabut kiba biang ïa ki samla Khasi tang shu jia kano kano ka jingshah shoh ki bar jylla, ka KSU Laban Circle ha ka sngi u Blei ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewbynñiaw halor kane ka jingleh shiliang khmat jong ka tnat Pulit.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u General Secretary ka KSU Laban Circle u samla Jason Laloo u la ïathuh ba ha ka jingbuddien ka seng ka la lap ba ka jingjia kam long kaba shisha. “Ngi la kynduh ïa uwei u khynnah uba ïakajia na ki arliang mamla bad (ngi lap) ba ka dei beit tang ka jingbym ïasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ki arliang mamla.  Ka KSU ka la kynduh ïa ki Pulit bad ki ong ba kim lah ban pynshai bad hadien shi sngi ïa ka ejahar la mudui bad u lanot u ong um shym la ujor ejahar satia.”U lanot u la shu ïathuh tang ïa ka jingjia bad ha kano ka dur ki (Pulit) la pynkylla ïa ka sha ka ejahar, ong une u nongïalam ka KSU.“Na ka liang jong ngi, ngim sngew ïahap ïa kaba ka tnat Pulit ka la leh,”  u la ong bad ïathuh, “ki kyndon (Section) ba ki Pulit ki la thep ki dei ki bym sngewïahap namar hapdeng ka jingjia barit jong ki arliang mamla la thep haduh hynriew tylli ki Section bad ka Section kaba sngewphylla eh ka dei ka Section 307 bad 364. Kine ki jait Section ki bym sngewïahap.”“Ïa ngi ki samla Khasi kiba sah ha Laban ba kin shu leh donbor lane kin shu iuh bad kheiñ beiñ ïa ngi ngim lah ban pdiang bad une u khynnah (Khasi) u dei uba dang shu dep leh ïa ka eksamin Class-12.  Uto u khynnah (bar jylla) ba shah shoh u la leit sha ing bad ym don jingujor bad ki Pulit ki la leit iit  khnang sha ing bad phah wan sha Thanat bad u la ai ïa ka Written Statement bad ki la phah wan ïa u (khynnah Khasi) bad kem ïa u bad rah sha Sadar Police Station,” u la ong.“Ngi lyngngoh bad lehse ka dei tang ka buit sainti (jongno re jongno).  Ïa kine ki khubor ngim pdiang bad ka wanrah tang ïa ka jingïapher jaidbynriew bad ka tnat Pulit ka dei ban buddien.  Lada ïa ka jaidbynriew Khasi ki lah ban leit wad na ing bad tohkit kumno ka jia ka long beit da ka bor ban ujor ejahar ban ïoh daw ban kem ïa ki khynnah Khasi ha Laban.  Mynta ka shong ha ki Pulit ban wad ïa kine ki jait khubor bad ki jait dur,” la bynrap u samla Laloo.Haba ïathuh ïa ka jingbym leh eiei ka tnat Pulit haba shah shoh uwei u samla Khasi ha ki bar jyllla kiba don da ka kynhun kumba 15-20 ngut, une u nongïalam ka KSU u la ong, “ha kine ki taiew baladep kumba saw san sngi ka don ka jingjia ha Laban. Uwei u khynnah Khasi u la shah shoh ha ki bar jylla kiba wan da ka kynhun kaba don 15-20 ngut. Ha kato ka miet, ngi la ïoh ïa ka phone call bad ngi la leit mih.  Ka tnat Pulit kam shym la shimkhia ban leit wad ne ban leit iit ïa kita ki briew kiba shoh ïa u samla Khasi. Ka long kaei kaei kaba sngew noh shilliang bha bad ngim lah ban pdiang ïa kata.  Ïa u lanot bar jylla ki leit wad naduh na ing ba kin ïoh kem ïa ki samla Khasi katba ha ka jingjia kaba 4-5 sngi mynshwa kim leit iit  bad ki shu kwah banwanrah sha ka miej jingïakren bad ban don ka jingshong suk shongsaiñ.”“Ngi sngewsih lada ma ngi ki trai muluk ngi shah banbeiñ.  Kaei kaei kaba jia ïa ki Khasi jong ngi ki (Pulit) kwah beit ban don ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad lada bakla ma ngi ki shu noiñ beiñ katba ïa ka jingleh jong kiwei ki jaidbynriew kim peit ïa kata,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh u la kren bynñiaw haba ki dkhot ka seng ki leit wad jingtip na ki Pulit haba don ki jingshah shoh jong ki khynnah Khasi ka jubab ka long ba ki Pulit ki ap ïa ka hukum kaba wan najrong.“Kaei kata ka hukum ba wan nalor. Hato ki Officer Incharge hangne ba la pynkhamti kim lah ban shim ïa ka rai ba kin leh ïa ka kamram lajong. Balei kin hap ban ap ïa ka rai na ki bor bahalor. Mano kita ki bor ba nalor? Ka long kaei kaei kaba ngim lah ban pdiang kum ka jaidbynriew.  Ka KSU kam lah ban pdiang bad lada ka dang ïai jia kumne ngi hap ban mih madan ban ïapynibor bad ki Pulit,” u la ong.Ha ka jingïakren bad u samla bar jylla uba shah shoh ha ki briew bym ithuh, u la ong ba ha ka sngi ba la kut eksamin katba u dang ïaid lynti ban leit phai sha la iing, ki don ki khynnah kumba 2-3 ngut kiba wan pyrshah sha u bad ktah kti ïa u.U la ïathuh ba kine ki runar ki la ïalam ïa u sha Harisabha bad shoh ïa u ha kane ruh ka jaka.“Uba shah kem (khynnah Khasi) u dei u paralok jong nga bad um dei satia uba donkti ban shoh ïa nga,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ruh u la lait da ka said na ki tyrsim jong ki runar da ka jingïarap jong ki paidbah.“Hadien ba nga la phet noh sha  ing, ki Pulit ki la wan sha ing ki kylli katto katne ki jingkylli bad ki ïalam sha thanat.  Haba ki la kylli nga shu ïathuh ïa kaei kaba la jia,” u la ong.
title: KEM KI PULIT KHLEM NONGRIM ÏA U SAMLA KHASI NABA SHAH SHOH U BAR JYLLA, DIAW KA KSU

content: Ka Shad Suk Mynsiem  kaba lai sngi jong ka Seng Khasi Kmie,  kaba ju long manla u snem ka la sdang ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ  ha kaba  saw spah tam ki nongshad shynrang bad kynthei ki la iuh kjat ha ka lympung shad ha Weiking, Jaïaw.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba kane ka shad ban ainguh aidem ïa u Blei Trai Kynrad u Nongthaw u Nongbuh, la ju pynlong manla u snem bad ha kane ka kynti ka dei artad ka jingshad kaba 113 snem.Ïa ka Shad Suk Mynsiem la ju pynlong nyngkong ïa ka ha ka shnong Mawkhar, ïa kaba la kynriah noh pat sha ka lympung Weiking bad kaba la ïaid neh syndon tad haduh kine ki sngi.Ïa kane ka shad la sdang shwa na iing Seng na Mawkhar ha kaba ka kynhun ki duhalia ki la tem ïa ka ksiang lumpaid bad hadien kane ka la don pat ka jingdwai kaba la lamkhmat da u Vice President ka Seng Khasi Kmie Rgh P.D Nongrum katba ïa ka jingïalang la pynïaid da u Asst Secretary ka Seng Khasi Kmie Rgh Païa B Synrem.Hadien kane, ki nongshad  ki la mih na iing seng ban ïaid kjat sha lympung  Weiking bad shwa ban sdang ïa ka shad ka kmen, la pynlong shwa ïa ka nguh ka dem, ka dwai ka phirat da u Chairman jong ka kynhun u Tymmen  U San ka Seng Khasi Kmie Rgh Skor Jala.Hadien ba la pyndep ïa ka nguh ka dem, u President jong ka Seng Khasi Kmie Rgh O. Pyngrope u la shim ïa ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka lama jong ka seng Khasi bad pynbud pat sa ïa ka shad ka kmen.Kane ka shad kaba lai sngi lynter ka dei kaba la paw bad bna nam kum kawei na ki la riti  kaba nylla jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep u Hynñiewskum, kaba long kum ka dak ban ainguh aidem ïa la u Blei Trai Kynrad halor ki jingkyrkhu ba u la theh sei bad ba Un ïai theh sei ïa ka kyrkhu ka kyrdoh sha u khun bynriew.
title: SDANG KA SNGI NOH KJAT SHAD SUK MYNSIEM KA SENG KHASI KMIE HA LYMPUNG WEIKING

content: Ka Voice of The People’s Party (VPP) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la mudui da ka ejahar ha u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District halor ki jingshah pynjah burom jong ka party ha ka rynsan Social Media.Ha ka ejahar ba la soi da u Election Agent ka party u Bah Danny Langstieh uba dei ruh u Finance Secretary jong ka VPP u la pyntip ba ka la don ka jingshna ia ka Facebook Account/ Page ba la ai kyrteng “Ardent Miller. -I-9856622858” da ki briew ki bym lah ban ithuh bad ka kyrteng jong u Admin jong ka Page la tip kum u “Satan Ba Pawnam”.  Ha kane ka Facebook Account/Page la pynmih ia ka jingkynthoh kaba ong, “Ka Sur u Myndie ïa ka Ri ka jaitbynriew.”U Bah Langstieh u la ong ba ka party ka la lap ba ki don katto katne ki briew bym lah ban ithuh ki la kynthoh ” HA U PRAH” ha ki khubor jingpyntip ïapbriew ha ka rynsan Social Media nangta ha ki lad pathai khubor jong ka Batesi TV, T7, bad kiwei.Une u Election Agent u la ong ba da kaba pynmih kum kine ki jingkynthoh bad da kaba buh ha ka rynsan Social Media ha ki rynsan paidbah ka la pynjah burom bad ka la wanrah ia ka dak kaba sniew pyrshah ïa u President jong ka The Voice of the People Party uba dei ruh u dkhot jong ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly bad lah ban kdew ruh ba kine ki jingkynthoh bad ki jingpynmih lyngba ki jingthoh la leh da ka jingthmu ban pynjah burom, ka pynmynsaw pynsniew bad pyniashun thlong mluh thlong sying, kaba la ktah mationg bad ka la pynsaphriang bakla ia ki jingpyntip sha ki paidbah kiba bun.Ha ka ejahar, u la ong ba kine ki jingkynthoh ha ka Facebook Account/Page bad ki khubor jingpyntip iapbriew ka la long ka jingpynkheiñ ia ki kyndon bad ka la pynjah burom ia ka dur ka dar jong u nongmihkhmat bapaw bad u nongmihkhmat jong ki paidbah khamtam jong ka Voice of the People Party baroh kawei bad dei ha kane ka nongrim ba la mudui da ka First Information Report hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Indian Penal Code, 1860 bad hapoh ki kyndon ka Information Technology Act, 2000 bad kiwei pat ki aiñ.“Kumta nga kyrpad ia ki bor jong ka aiñ ban pynshitom ia ki runar kiba la pynjah burom ia ka VPP katkum ki kyndon jong ka ain,” ong u Bah Langstieh ha ka ejahar.Ia kane ka ejahar ka VPP ka la phah kopi ruh sha ka Cyber Crime Branch Office, Secretariat Hills Shillong, sha u Chief Electoral Officer ka Jylla bad sha u Commissioner and Secretary jong ka tnat Election.
title: HA KA KYRTENG U BAH ARDENT SHNA FACEBOOK PAGE THOK KI BRIEW, UJOR EJAHAR KA VPP

content: Haduh 1634 ngut ki nongshad shynrang bad kynthei ki la iashim bynta ha ka Shad Suk Mynsiem kaba lai sngi kaba la kut noh ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei.  Na kine, 813 ngut ki nongshad ki dei ki shynrang bad 821 ngut ki dei ki kynthei.Ki nongïalam jong ka Seng Khasi, Kmie ki la pynpaw ba donkam ban ïaid katkum ka juk mynta hynrei ym dei ban klet pat ïa ka jinglong tynrai namar lada klet, ka jingim jong u briew kam don jingmut.Ha kane ka Shad Suk Mynsiem kaba 113 snem ba la pynlong da ka Seng Khasi Seng Kmie ha lympung Weiking la sakhi lang da ki byllien ngut ki paidbah na kylleng ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep u Hynñiewwasa.ïa kane ka Shad Suk Mynsiem kaba lai sngi la pynlong manla u snem da ka Seng Khasi, Kmie kum ka dak ban ainguh aidem ha U Blei Trai Kynrad halor ki jingkyrkhu ba u la theh sei bad ruh ba un ïai theh sei sha u khun bynriew.U Vice president ka Seng Khasi Seng Kmie u Bah BS Rumnong haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la ong, wat hapdeng ka jingther jong u slap naduh ka sngi U Blei, hynrei ki nong shad shynrang bad kynthei ki la ïa tuid sha lympung Weiking ban iashim bynta ha ka jingshad.“Kum ba ju long manla u snem, ka jingiashim bynta ki nongshad ka ïai kiew bad mynta u snem wat hapdeng ka jingther u lap bah, u phria bad lyer ba jur bad ka jingsniew ka suiñ bneng, kane kam shym la pynduh mynsiem ïa ki nongwan shad bad ïa ki nongwan peit kai,” la ong u Rgh BS Rumnong.U la ong, “ka Shad Suk Mynsiem kadei ka khubor ban don ka jingngeit kaba bha ha baroh ki khep bad ban kmen ka mynsiem ïa kaei kaei kaba u Blei Trai Kynrad ula theh.”
title: 1634 NGUT KI NONGSHAD SHYNRANG BAD KYNTHEI HA KA SHAD SUK MYNSIEM

content: U Bah Estar Lyngdoh uba dei u Kurim jong ka Kong Ebina Kharbani, ba shong basah ha ka shnong Nonglait, Eastern West Khasi Hills District u la jahrngai naduh ka 9 tarik, Iaiong, 2024 hadien ba u la mih na la ing naduh kane ka sngi.Ka Dorbar Shnong Nonglait tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane, ka la lum kyrkieh ia ka dorbar ha ka 10 tarik Iaiong, 2024 bad ka la rai ban pynlong ia ka jingwad shnong ha ka 11 tarik Iaiong, 2024 hynrei ym shym la lap dien satia ia u Bah Estar Lyngdoh uba la don mynta la 63 snem ka rta.Kumta ha ka 11 tarik, Iaiong, 2024 ka Dorbar Shnong ka la iarap ban mudui da ka ejahar ha ki Pulit jong ka Mairang Police Station da ka jingkyrpad ia ki Pulit ban wad lem ia u Bah Estar uba dang jah rngai haduh kine ki sngi.Katkum ka jingpyntip jong ki bahaïing hasem, la iathuh ba u Bah Estar u don ia ka durkhmat kaba lieh, saw sniehdoh,  u phong da ka sopti thohlieh, jyrngam, ka sopti shirt ronglieh, ka jaket potoi saw iong, ka patlun tracksuit rong iong, u kup da ka tupia saiwul rong jyrngam bad u phong da ki slipar rongiong.  Une u rangbah u dei uba don ia ka rynieng kaba jrong 5 phut 3 inshi.Ki bahaïing hasem ki la kyrpad ia kino kino kiba iohi ne lap ia u Bah Estar ba kin sngewbha ban pyntip ha u mobile no 6009597161/8787405568.
title: JAH RNGAI U BAH ESTAR LYNGDOH NA KA SHNONG NONGLAIT

content: : Kawei ka longkmie bad ki arngut ki khun ki la shah tait shnong ha ka Dorbar Shnong Lumlakhait, West Jaiñtia Hills District halor ka jingkynnoh ba ka dei kaba don Taro.Kane ka longkmie kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Kong Meloris Dhar ka la shah tait shnong bad ki ar ngut ki khun shynrang.Ha ka ejahar ba la mudui sha u Superintendent of Police ka West Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka taiew baladep, ki arngut kiba soi kyrteng ha ka ejahar ba kynthup ïa u Thermonki Susngi na ka shnong Nartiang Mudop bad u Diamond Dhar na ka shnong Lumlakhiat ki la kynnoh da kaba pynpaw, “ka Dorbar Shnong ba la ïalam da u Waheh Shnong u Bah Edward Shadap bad u Secretary Shnong u Bah Tisis Phira ki la ai ka jingmynjur ha u Risaw, 2023 bad ha ka 5 tarik, Ïaiong, 2024 ban tait shnong ïa ki lai ngut ki briew kiba kynthup ïa u Biktor Dhar, Balen Dhar bad ïa ka Meloris Dhar.”Ka jingmudui ka la pyntip shuh shuh, “ki la byrngem byrsit ïa ka ing ka sem bad ïa ka kur ka jait Dhar bad kim shah shuh ban leit trei leit ktah bad ban rep lyngkha ruh.”“Ngi kyrpad ïa ka ophis ba donburom jong phi ba phin sngewbha ban shimkhia ïa kane, khnang ba ngin ïoh biang ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka iing ka sem bad ha ka shnong ka thaw ruh kumjuh,” la kyrpad ki nongujor ïa u SP.Ha ka jingïakren bad u nongthoh khubor, u khun jong ka Kong Meloris Dhar u la ïathuh ba ka Dorbar Shnong Lumlikhait ka la pynmih ïa ka hukum ban beh shnong nyngkong eh ha ka 9 tarik Risaw, 2023 halor ka jingkynnoh don Taro tang namarba ki don ki briew kiba la ïohpang hapoh ka shnong Lumlikhait.U la ïathuh ba ha kane ka dorbar, ki la don ruh ki nongshong shnong kiba la ktah kti ïa ka kmie jong u hynrei da ka jingïada jong ki dkhot ka Village Defence Party (VDP) ka Kong Meloris ka la shu lait da ka said na ka jingshah bom shnong.  Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ruh ba ki nongshong shnong ki la byrngem ruh ban thang wat ïa ka ing ka sem.“Ha kato ka por (ba la pynmih ïa ka hukum ban tait shnong ha u snem 2023) ngim shym la ujor sha ki bor jong ka aiñ bad ngi shu ïakren bad ki bor jong ka shnong hynrei katba nangïaid ki sngi ki pyneh beit ïa ka rai.  Hadien kata, la pynlong biang ïa ka dorbar ha ka 5 tarik Ïaiong, mynta u snem bad ki la ïakren ïa kane ka kajuh ka mat bad ki la shim ïa ka rai ban tait shnong,” ong u khun jong ka Kong Meloris.Ka Meloris Dhar, ka la ïathuh ba ka Dorbar Shnong kam shah satia wat tang ban rah eiei na la ing hadien shitaiew tam ba la mih na shnong ban leit sah noh sha ka shnong Namdong.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka dorbar shnong ka la byrngem ïa i mei ba im bit shuh ban leit rep leit riang, wat ban shong ban sah hapoh iing.Shuh shuh u la pyntip hadien ba la mudui ïa ka ejahar ha Jowai Police Station ki Pulit ka Saitsama Out Post ki la leit sha Lumlakhiat ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit.“Nga pynrem jur ïa kane ka kam bad ngim pdiang namarba u rangbah shnong kim don ka bor ban leh kumta (tait shnong). Ngi la rai ban ïakhun beit haduh ba kut,” u la ong.Kane ka ing ka sem ka la ujor ruh sha ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission ban tuklar lem halor kane ka kam bad ban pynïoh ïa ka hok jong ki kum ki nongshong shnong.
title: SHAH TAIT SHNONG KA LONGKMIE HA KA DORBAR SHNONG LUMLAKHAIT BA SHAH KYNNOH DON TARO

content: Hadien ka jingiakynduh lang jong ki ar parti jong ka NDA myn ha u bnai lber ba la dep hangne ha Shillong, ki nongkitkam jong ka BJP na baroh ki distrik Jong ka 1- Shillong Constituency ki la trei minot bad shitrhem khnang ban pynioh jingjop ia ka paralok jong ka ka NPP na ka Shillong Lok Sabha Seat.Haduh kumba shiphew hajar ngut ki dkhot ne nongtrei shitrhem kiba la trei minot tyngeh ban pyntikna ba ka jylla jong ngi kan ioh bhah ban ioh nongmihkhmat ha ka sorkar NDA ba ialam da u Narendra Modi, ka sorkar kaban sa wanphai biang haka sien kaba lai kaba la iathuh lypa da ki nongpeitngor ha kine ki khyndiat bnai ba la dep.Katba ka jingialap elekshon ka la nang jan sha ka sngi ban jied iaki nongmihkhmat ka jingshitrhem bad jingthrang ban pynlong kum ki jingialang ka la nang rhem nang rhem. U nongmihkhmat ka BJP u Bah Sanbor Shullai i la pynlong bun tylli ki jingialang ha Kench’ s Trace, Laban bad Cantonment Area, da kaba kyntu iaki nongbud ban thep bad shon ha ka shap jong ka kot mynta kynti kumban kyrshan ia u Modi.Shuh shuh la iohi ia ka kong Priyambada Blah kaba dei ka vice president jongka ST Morcha bad ka Kong Eunesscy Khyriem kaba long ka Gen. Secretary ki la leit ban ialap elekshon na bynta k Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ha Nongrang bad Thangmaw ha Eastern West Khasi hills. La don Lang ruh ka heh duh na ka distrik ka kong Wanpynbiang Nongtariang bad u Bah Pranes Nongrang bad ka kong Sunita Swer bad kiwei kiwei ruhLa sahkhi ruh ia ki jingialang ha ki san tylli ki mandal  ba hap ha Ri- Bhoi distrik ba peit da u bah Sen Thabah um u distrk president bad la iohi ruh iaka jingbun jong ki nong wan sngap, ha ri lum Jaintia  ruh la pynlong shibun ki jingialang hapoh ka jngialam u distrik president u bah Commanderful Sana lem bad ki nongtrei ba shitrhem ka distrik. U bah David Kharsati  uba dei u dkhot ka national council bad u bah Wankitbok Pohshna ub dei u state general secretary ki la iadon lang ban pynshngain bad ai mynsiem ha ki jingalang.Ka OBC Morcha ruh ka la don bynta Lang ha kaba ka la pynlong jingialang ha Nongpoh, ba la ialam da u Maneshwar Singh, ha kaba la don ryngkat ka kong Dell Nonglait ka general secretary ka East Khasi hills bad president ka OBC u Arun Kumar. U President ka BJP Kisan Morcha u bah Ralden V Shabong ula don ryngkat ban ai ka jingkyrshan iaka kyrtong jong ka NDA.Kum ban pyni ne pynkynmaw  iaka jingtrei jongka  BJP Mahila morcha ba la ialam da ka kong Susuki Pariat bad ka BJYM  ba la ialam da u Mewanker  Lyngdoh kiba la trei shitom bad trei shitrhem khlem shongthait ban wad jingkyrshan na ka bynta ka candidate.Ka BJP Mahila Morcha  bad ka kynhun ruh ki la trei shitom ha kaba ki la leit ialap elekshon ha man la ki thliew iing ha Shillong bad ha kiwei ki jaka ruh.Ha ba peit iaka jingtrei minot jong ki kynhun, ki nongialam, ki nongtrei mon sngewbha jong ka seng BJP ha Meghalaya la sngew tikna ba ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kan rah ia ka jingjop mynta ka kynti bad  mynta kynti BJP bad ka kynhun NDA kan tam iaka 400 ngut ki dkhot ha iing Dorbar Thawaiñ.
title: NANG RHEM KA JINGIALALAP ELEKSHON KA DR. AMPAREEN NA KA JINGIARAP KA BJP MEGHALAYA

content: Ki thylliej ding barhem ha ka sngi baar ki la bamduh ia ki ar tylli ki iing ha ka shnong Mawiong Umjapung Nongneng Block-A.  Kane ka la jia ha ka por kumba 8:00 baje mynstep.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum la iathuh ba ka ding ka la sdang shwa na ka iing jong ka Kong Twintina Nongneng bad pur pat sha ka ing kaba don markhap bad ka iing jong ka Kong Risuk Wanshnong.Baroh ki jingdon jingem ha kine ki ar tylli ki iing ki la kylla dpei bad kaba phylla tang ka Bible kam shym la iingkhong wat tang khyndiat ruh.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki trai ïng jong kine ki ar tylli ki la iathuh ba ka jingpluh jong ka ding ka la lah ban dei na ka jingkem ding u Metre Box.Ha kane ka jingjia, ym shym la don mano mano ruh ba mynsaw hynrei lait noh tang ka jingjulor jong ki jingdon jingem.Ka Kong Twintina bad ka Kong Risuk ki la kyrpad ia ki bor Sorkar ba iarap lem ia ki ha kum kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih.U Rangbah Shnong ka Mawiong Umjapung u Bah A. Kharkongor u la ong tang shu ioh jingtip ia kane ka jingjia na ka liang jong ki nongkitkam ka Dorbar Shnong ki la leit marmar sha kane ka jaka ban iarap ia kine ki lanot kiba la mad ia kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih.U la ai khublei ruh ia ki nongtrei jong ka tnat Fire and Emergency Services (F&ES) kiba la poi biang por ban pynlip noh ia ka ding shwa ba kan pur shuh shuh sa sha kiwei pat ki iing kiba don markhap.Na ka liang jong ki Pulit tang shu ioh jingtip ki la leit ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia.
title: BAMDUH KI THYLLIEJ DING AR TYLLI KI ÏING HA MAWIONG UMJAPUNG, KHLEM ING KA BIBLE

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ha ka sngi Baar ka la mudui sha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba peit ïa ka tnat Kam Pohing Bah Prestone Tynsong halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki Pulit ki la pyndonkam bakla ïa ka itkiar bad ka jingkem khlem nongrim da ki Pulit ka Laban.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u  President jong ka KSU Laban Circle u samla Reuben Najiar u la kynnoh ba ka rukom treikam jong ki Pulit ha Laban bad ka tnat baroh kawei ka long kaba noh shiliang ka tarajur, ba khlem nongrim, leh bym hok khamtam ïa ki Khasi kiba hap ban mad ïa ki jingshah leh shiliang bad shah pynmong ha ki kti jong ki nongbat aiñ.“Ka Union ka kwah ban kyntu ïa phi ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynjanai ïa ki rukom treikam jong ka tnat Pulit ha ka Jylla namarba ka jingpyndonkam bakla da ki Pulit ïa ka iktiar ha ka Jylla ka la long shaba palat liam.  Ban pynbeit ïa kine donkam ïa ka jingtrei shitom jong ki bor sorkar, ki kynhun sengbhalang, ki kynhun bapher bapher bad ka imlang ka sahlang.  Ki bor jong ka aiñ ki dei ban bat ïa ka aiñ, ban ïada ïa ki hok longbriew bad ban long ki nongïada ïa ka hok jong ki nongshong shnong,” u la ong.U la maham, “nangne shakhmat, ka Union kan ym lah shuh ban shu sngap kum ïa kine ki jingshah leh bym hok pyrshah ïa ki Khasi bad ïa ki dkhot ka KSU bad lada kum kine ki jingleh khlem nongrim kin dang ïai bteng, ka
