jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka tnat Pulit ka lah ban jia ha kano kano ka por.”U samla Najiar u la ong ba ka rai ban phah ïa kane ka dorkhas ka long hadien ba ka la jia ka jingïashoh kaba rit hapdeng ki ar kynhun jong ki khynnah shynrang (kiba hapdeng ka rta 16-20 snem) ki bym dei ki riewlum bad ki bym dei ki Khasi ha ki bynta jong ka thaiñ Laban tang halor ka kam pan pisa kylliang/knieh.  Ki ïa ithuh bha bad ki dei ruh shi paralok.Hadien ka jingïashoh, ki la ïasuk hi paramaki bad baroh arliang manla ki la leit phai noh sha la ki jong ki ing ki sem.  “Hynrei, kaba pynkyndit, ki Pulit jong ka Laban Police Station ki la leit hi sha ki ingsah jong uwei na ki khynnah bym dei Khasi bad phah wan ïa u sha thanat bad hadien ba la pynbor ïa u ban ujor da ka ejahar pyrshah ïa kawei pat ka kynhun ki khynnah Khasi.  Une u khynnah um kwah ban ujor ejahar namarba ki ïadei shiparalok hynrei ki Pulit ki la ïai pynbor ïa u.  Ha ka por janmiet, ki Pulit ki la khot hajir ïa ki khynnah Khasi sha thanat, bad tang shu poi ha thanat la kem ïa ki bad wat hadien ba ki bahaing hasem bad ki dkhot ka Union ki la ïai tohkit halor ka jingshahkem, ki (Pulit) la kyntait ban ai jubab bad la bthah pynban ban leit kylli na u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills,” u la ong.U samla Najiar u la ong, shipor ka la don ka jingpynphriang ïa ka khubor lamler bad ka dur ha Whatsapp ba katto katne ki briew ki la shah dung tari ha Laban bad khladnoh hynrei ka dur ka dei pynban jong uwei u briew uba la khlad noh dang khyndiat sngi.Ki Pulit ki la kem ïa ki arngut ki khynnah Khasi halor ka case jong ka Laban PS Case No. 21 (04) of 2024 bad ki kyndon ba la pynngat pyrshah ïa ki tang namar i daw iba rit ki long ka Section 307 (thmu ban pynïap), Section 364 (rahbor da ka jingthmu ban pynïap), Section 325 (ba thmu ban pynmynsaw) bad kiwei kiwei ki kyndon hapoh ka Indian Penal Code.“Ka rukom kaba ki Pulit ka Laban ki la shim halor kane ka jingjia bad kem lah ban ong ba ka dei kaba long shiliang bad kaba wanrah ïa ka jingsngew ïapher jaidbynriew,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ka paw kumba ki Pulit ki pyndonkam ïa ka buit pharia ban pynlong ïa kiwei ki jaidbynriew ban ieng pyrshah ïa ki Khasi bad ban pyndik ïa ki nongshong shnong trai jylla Khasi hapoh ka thaiñ,” u la ong.U la pyntip ruh ba arngut ïa ki khynnah Khasi la pyllait ha ka sngi kaba bud, ha ka 13 tarik, Ïaiong, 2024 da ka Kashari namarba ki jingkynnoh ki long ki bym shong nongrim.Haba ïaiban ïa ka jingpyrshah ba pyndonkam ïa ka bor da ki Pulit pyrshah ïa ki trai jylla, u samla Najiar u la ong ba ka Union ka kwah ban pan jingpynshai halor ki rukom treikam jong ka tnat Pulit, ka banyngkong, halor kane ka jingjia balei ki Pulit ki hap ban da pynbor ïa u briew ban mudui ejahar bad la ïohi ruh ïa kane bunsien haba don ki jingjia pyrshah ïa ki bymdei ki Khasi, khamtam pyrshah ïa ki dkhot ka Union ha kaba ki Pulit ki ïaid shakhmat ban pynkhreh da ka ejahar pyrshah ïa ki dkhot ka seng.U la ong ba ki don ruh ki jingjia ha Laban ha kaba 2-3 ki Khasi kiba shah shoh ha ka kynhun kaba don 10-15 ki bym dei ki Khasi hynrei kiba dei na ka jaidbynriew Muslim ha Laban ha ka 6 tarik, Ïaiong, 2024 hynrei ki Pulit halor kane ka jingjia kim shym la shimkhia eiei ban kem ïa kiba donkti wat haba la pynpaw ïa ka kyrteng bad ïa ka jaka sah jong ki briew kiba donkti ban shoh ïa ki Khasi.“Kane ka pynpaw shai haduh katno ka jingtreikam shiliang khmat da ki Pulit pyrshah ïa ki trai jylla bad ki don bun tylli ki jingjia lada ïathuh lut hangne,” u la ong.Haba kynnoh ïa ki Pulit ba ki shu kem da ka bor ïa ki Khasi, u samla Najiar u la ong, “…ki dkhot jong ka Union haba ki buh jingkylli, ka jubab ka long beit borabor ba, ‘ka wan na ki bor ba najrong.  Ka Union ka kwah ban buh jingkylli, mano kine ki ‘bor ba najrong.”.  Hato ki dei ki heh Pulit, lehse u SP/DGP ne ki Myntri na ka Sorkar Jylla ne Sorkar Pdeng ne kino kino ki kynhun shitniam/riewshimet kiba ïasylla pyrshah ïa ki Khasi bad ïa ka Union.”Kaba pynlong ban pynpaw ïa kine ki daw hangne, ka long, ka Union ka la lap haba uno uno u Khasi u shah rah ban tohkit lane shah kynnoh ba donkti ha kano kano ka jingjia, ki Pulit kin kylli borabor lada uta u briew u don jingïadei neem bad ka Union bad lada u dei u dkhot ka Union, un shah kem khlem da peit ïa ka jingjia.“Ka balai, ka Union ka kwah ban kylli, balei ki Puit kim shym la leh eiei pyrshah ïa kito kiba pynphriang ïa ki khubor lamler shaphang u briew uba shah dung tari ha Laban uba la pynphriang ïa ki kyntien jingïasih bad pynthud ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha Laban kaba don ïa ki nongshong shnong khleh jaitbynriew ne hato ki Pulit ki don sha ka liang jong ki bym dei ki Khasi pyrshah ïa ki Khasi namarba kumba la kdew ïa ka jingjia haneng, ka jingshah kem jong ki khynnah Khasi tang halor i daw barit ka pynpaw shai ïa ka jingthrang snam jong ka tnat Pulit pyrshah ïa ki Khasi,” u la ong.U la ong shuh shuh, ‘lada ki dkhot ka Union ki pynpaw ïa kino kino ki jingthoh/dur ha ka Social Media pyrshah ïa ki Pulit ne ïa ka Sorkar, ki la shah khot mar mar ha ka Cyber Crime Cell bad shah pyndik katba ha kane ka jingjia, balei ki Pulit ki sngap jar.  Na ka por sha ka por, ki dkhot ka seng bad ka jaidbynriew Khasi baroh kawei ki la long ki sohpdung kum ha kine ki jingshah leh bym hok, ki jingleh shiliang khmat da ki Pulit bad kiwei kiwei.
title: UJOR KA KSU SHA U DY. CM BA KEM KI PULIT KA LABAN ÏA KI SAMLA KHASI KHLEM NONGRIM

content: Ka kynhun ki samla wadkam ha ka sngi baar ki la iakynduh ia ka Secretary jong ka Central Recruitment Board (CRB) ka tnat Pulit ka Mary TG Sangma ha PTS, Mawlai Mawroh ban pan jingpynshai halor ka Revised Guidelines ba la pynmih da ka tnat ha kaba iadei bad ka rta rungkam ha ka tnat Pulit.Kane ka kynhun ki samla ba la lamkhmat da ka nongtrei mon sngewbha ka samla Barilang Pyngrope ki pynpaw ba ki kwah ba ka rta rungkam hapoh ka tnat Pulit dei ban pynshong nongrim katkum ka Office Memorandum (OM) jong u snem 2022.Katkum ka Office Memorandum (OM) jong u snem 2022, ka Sorkar ka la pynkiew ia ka rta rungkam na ka 27 snem sha ka 32 snem bad na ka 32 snem sha ka 37 na ka bynta ki Schedule Tribes, na ka bynta ka jingpynrungkam ia ki nongaplai kam ha ki kam hapoh ki tnat treikam bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar Jylla.Hynrei ka tnat Pulit ha ka jingpyllait ia ka Advertisement ha ka 6 tarik Lber, ka la kdew ba ha  ka jingpynrungkam yn sa leh katkum ka Revised Uniform Guidelines na ka bynta ka jingthungkam Pulit ha ka tnat Pulit jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ba la pynmih ha ka 1 tarik, Nohprah, 2023.Katkum kane ka Revised Guidelines, ka rta rungkam la buh na ka bynta ka post Unarmed Branch (UB) Sub Inspector ka long 21 snem haduh 27 snem kat haduh ka 1 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024 katba na ka bynta ka post UB Constable kum ki nongñiah kali, Fireman, MPRO Operators bad kiwei kiwei ka rta rungkam ka dei ban long naduh 18 snem haduh 21 snem.  La pynjlan ia ka rta rungkam haduh san snem na ka bynta ki nongthep kam kiba dei na ki ST/SC/OST.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingiakynduh ia ka Secretary jong ka CRB, ka samla Barilang Pyngrope ka la iathuh ba la pyntip ba ka CRB kam dei satia ka tnat kaba lah ban pynmih ia ka jingpynbeit ha kaba iadei bad ka rta rungkam.Ka la iathuh ba la bthah ban leit iakynduh ia ki bor ba dei peit jong ka tnat Personnel ka Sorkar Jylla ban dawa ia ka jingpynbeit halor ka Revised Guidelines.Katkum ka jingong jong ka, ka tnat Pulit ka la shu pynbeit kynsan kynsan ia ka rta rungkam khlem da pynmih ia ka jingpynbna kaba thymmai na ka tnat Personnel.Ki post kiba lait hapoh ka tnat Pulit ki long 2968 tylli, ba kynthup 76 (UB Sub Inspector), 720 (Unarmed Branch Constable), 195 (Fireman), 53 (Driver Fireman), 26 (Mechanic), 205 (MPRO operator) 56 (Signal/BN operator), 1494 (Armed Branch Constable/ Battalion Constable/MPRO GD/Constable Handyman) bad 143 (Driver Constable).
title: BA PYNRIT ÏA KA RTA THUNGKAM PULIT PAN JINGPYNSHAI KI SAMLA WADKAM NA KA CRB

content: : U MLA ka BJP na South Shillong Constituency Bah Sanbor Shullai ha ka sngi Baar u la ong ba lada ka Kong Ampareen bad ka Agatha Sangma ki ioh rah ia ka jingjop, ngin ioh ki nongmihkhmat Kristan kiba khlaiñ ha ka Sorkar. Namar lada baroh arngut kin ioh rah iaka jingjop ki lah ban rah bad ban kren naka bynta ka bha ka miat kaba iadei bad ki Kristan, namar ki don bynta lang bad ka sorkar.  Ka Jinglong pyrshah Kristan daka liang  pyrshah kan  tlot lada baroh arngut kin Shah jied na Meghalaya.U Bah Sanbor ba la mihkhmat bunsien u la ong ba ki nongmihkhmat ne MP na kiwei pat ki Seng kin nym lah ban leh shibun kiei² ha ka iing dorbar thawaiñ ka ban don la kumno² 400 ngut ki dkhot kat kum ka jingwad bad lum jingtip jong ki tyllong wad jingtip. Ban phah da ki nongmihkhmat na ka seng Congress ne na ki seng riewlum kan pynlehnohei ne pynduh jingmyntoi haduh 5 snem ia ki paidbah.U nongmihkhmat na ka BJP u la kynthoh jur ia kiwei pat ki seng  saiñ pyrthei kiba la ju kynthoh iaka BJP ha ki rynsan.U Bah Shullai u la ai jingmut ruh ia ki paidbah khamtam iaki samla bad iaka imlang sahlang ba kiwei ki seng saiñ pyrthei ki la shu pyntieng kohtympan ban dup ioh ia jingkyrshan ha Meghalaya.Ngi dei ban iaid shaphrang bad puson bha ha ka ioh ka kot, ym ban pyn pharia iaka imlang sahlang jong ngi. Lada ki nongjied nongmihkhmat ki kwah iaka Shillong ban don beit ha ka jingsuk ki dei ban pynmih la ki Sur ha ka 19 tarik  u iaiong, 2024, u la ong.Khlem ka jingshong suk yn nym don ka jingiaid shaphrang ha ka ioh ka kot ka jylla . Ka Shillong ka dei ka jaka ba don ka lad ban kiew rasong ha ka IT ha kane ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi bad kan iarap ia bun ki samla bala dep pule ban ioh kam.  U paidbah u dei ban sngewthuh ba khlem ka jingshong suk shong shngaiñ  ym lah ban kyntiew iaka ioh ka kot. Da ka jingkyrshan naka jylla bad ka sorkar pdeng, ngin ieng tylli lang bad nym shah ba ki jingsniew kin wan ha ka jylla jong ngi,” ong u Bah Sanbor Shullai.U Bah Sanbor u la ong ruh ban pharia ia ka vote hapdeng ka NPP bad Congress kan ai jingmyntoi tang ia ki kyrtong Jong ki seng riewlum namar kin ym don sur ne lah leh eiei ha ka dorbar  ba bun da ki kyrtong ka NDA. U la pynkynmaw ruh ba kiba bun ki nongialam BJP ha ka jylla jong ngi ki dei ki kristan ba shitrhem bad ngin kren bad ieng na ka bynta ka jingbha jong ki kristan . ” Ngi kut jingmut ba ngin iada iaka jingdonkam jong ki paid Kristan, ki Seng Khasi, Sein Raij bad baroh kiba shong ba sah hapoh ka jylla Jong ngi,” ong u Bah Sanbor.
title: KA JINGJOP KI KYRTONG KA NPP KAN AI JINGMYNTOI ÏA KI KRISTAN HAPOH KA NDA : BJP

content: U Deputy Commissioner (Election) bad District Election Officer jong ka East Khasi Hills Distrirct u SC Sadhu ha ka hukum ba la pynmih ha ka sngi Balang u la bthah ïa baroh ki skul, ki kolej bad ki ITI ba la pynïaid da ki kynhun shimet bad ka Sorkar kiba don hapoh ka jylli jong ka nongbah Shillong kin hap ban khang khyrdep ha ka sngi Palei namarba kan dei ka sngi kaba ki nongpynïaid elekshon kin mih na nongbah Shillong.Katkum kane ka hukum, u Deputy Commissioner u la bthah ïa u District School Education Officer (DSEO) ka East Khasi Hills District bad ïa baroh ki Principal/ki Registrar bad ki bor pynïaid jong ki shlem pule ba kin pyntreikam mardor ïa kane ka hukum.
title: PYNBNA SHUTI U DC (ELECTION) ÏA KI SKUL HA SHILLONG

content: U MDC barim jong ka Umsning Bah Donkupar Sumer ha ka sngi Balang u la mudui da ka ejahar pyrshah ïa u CEM barim ka KHADC u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit, uba mihkhmat mynta ïa ka Nongkrem Constituency, halor ka jingkynnoh ba u donkti ha ka jingthung, shukor, soi thok bad pyndonkam bakla ïa ka pisa ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingthied ïa ka jaka na ka bynta ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC).Ha ka ejahar ba la mudui ha Lumdiengjri Police Station, u Bah Sumer u la ong, “da kaba burom, la pyntip hangne ba u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit u donkti ban tuh, shukor, soi thok bad pyndonkam bakla ïa ka pisa katba u dang long u Chief Executive Member jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council bad sei ïa ka pisa paidbah ha ka jingthied jaka na ka bynta ka council.”“Nga long u Executive Member jong ka Council ha kata ka por, bad, namarkata, kine ki jingshisha kiba nga tip. Nga don ïa ki sakhi sabut kiba biang ban pynshisha ïa kane bad kiba la nga tynsat lang kum ka jingpyntip ïa phi,” u la ong.Une u nongïalam jong ka National People’s Party (NPP) u la kynnoh ba u Bah Basaïawmoit um shym la ïohbor na ki Executive Member jong ka Council ban ïasoi ïa ka ‘sale deed’ bad rejistar ïa ka Sale Deed.“U (Bah Ardent) shu soi ïa ka soi dulir bym treikam tang ban pyni ïa ka jaka ba la shim bad sei ïa ka pisa T. 35,25,039 na ka Accounts jong ka Council. Ngi ïoh jingtip hadien ba ka dulir ka dei tang ka kot non-judicial kaba T. 10. Ïa ka ‘sale deed’ ym shym la regjistar ne siew ïa ka Stamp Duty.  Namarkata, ka dei ka dulir bym treikam ka bym dondor eiei hakhmat jong ka aiñ, bad u la soi ïa ka khlem da ïoh bor tang ban ïoh sei ïa ka pisa paidbah.  Haduh mynta, ka Council kam shym la lah satia ban kam trai halor ka jaka ba la thied bad ka la hap ban pynlong ophis ha kawei ka lyngkhot jaka ba la ai sngewbha da ki trai khyndew,” u la ong.“Ka jingsoi thok ba la leh da u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit shuh shuh ka paw shai na ki jingshisha haba ka Notice kaba Dated July 15, 2022 la phah da ka Council na ka bynta ka jingsorjamin, u trai jaka Bah Nolipstar Lyngdoh bad u Ardent ki kam ba ki ladep soi ïa ka ‘sale deed’ katba u trai jaka u kam ba um shym la ïoh lut ïa ka pisa bad namarkata, um lah satia ban aiti ïa ka jinglong trai ïa ka khyndew.  Kane ka dei ka sakhi na ka jingbuh jingthoh jong ka jingïalang kaba la long ha ka 22 tarik, Naitung, 2022 jong ka,” la bynrap u Bah Sumer.Shuh shuh, une u EM barim ka KHADC u la ong da ka jingthmu shalyndet ban ïoh sei ïa ka pisa, u Bah Basaïawmoit u la wengkam ïa ki 7 ngut ki nongtrei halor ka nongrim ba ka Council kam don pisa hynrei u la thung bujli 12 ngut da ki briew lajong.“Namarkata, nga kyrpad ïa phi ban shim khia halor kane ka kam khnang ba un Bah Ardent un ym lait suk halor ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa ka pisa jong ka Council bad ki paidbah,” la bynrap shuh shuh ka ejahar.Katba u MDC ka NPP na Rambrai-Jyrngam Bah Bajop Pyngrope ha ka sngi Balang u la byrngem ban mudui ejahar pyrshah ïa u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit halor ka jyrsieh bamsap na ka jingthied jaka ïa ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills mynba u dang long u Chief Executive Member (CEM).
title: UJOR EJAHAR U MDC BARIM ÏA U CEM BARIM KA KHADC HALOR KA JINGTHIED JAKA HA MAWKYRWAT

content: U Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) ka Jylla u BDR Tiwari u la wer ia ki nongshong shnong ka Jylla Meghalaya ba kin mih paidbah lashai ka sngi Thohdieng ban leit sha ki Polling Station na ka bynta ban pyndep ia ka la jong ka kamram jied nongmihkhmat ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha, 2024.Ka jingthep vote, kan sdang naduh ka por 7:0-0 baje mynstep haduh ka por 4:00 baje janmiet.Ha  ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Dr. Tiwari u la pyntip ba hapoh Meghalaya ki don ar tylli ki Seat, kata, ka Shillong Seat kaba don haduh 36 tylli ki Constituency bad ka Tura Seat kaba don 24 tylli ki Constituency.U CEO u la pyntip ba ki kyrtong kiba iakhun ha kane ka kynti ki don baroh shi phew ngut, hynriew ngut na Shillong Seat bad 4 ngut na Tura Seat.Ha Shillong Seat ki kyrtong kiba aireng ki long u Sitting MP ka Congress Bah Vincent H. Pala u ban iakhun na ka bynta ban shah jied biang ha ka sien kaba saw hadien ba u la mihkhmat kum u MP naduh u snem 2009.  Kiwei pat ki kyrtong ki long ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba long ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla  ka ban iakhun na ka National Peoples Party (NPP), u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon na ka Voice of the Poeple Party (VPP), u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin na ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA). Katba arngut ki kyrtong shimet ki long u Prof. Lakhon Kma bad u Bah Peter Challam.Na Tura, ki kyrtong ki ban aireng ki long ka Agatha K. Sangma kaba long ka Sitting MP jong ka NPP ba mynta ka Tura.  Ki saw ngut kiwei pat ki long u Saleng A. Sangma uba iakhun na ka Congress, u Zenith Sangma na ka All India Trinamool Congress (AITC) bad u Labenn Ch. Marak.Katkum ka jingai jingkheiñ jong ka Election Commission of India, ki nongthep vote ha Meghalaya ki don baroh 22,26,567 lak ngut.  Ha  Shillong Seat, ki nongthep vote ki don 14,00,411 lak ngut.  Ki shynrang ki don 6,837,66 lak ngut, ki kynthei ki don 7,16643.  Ki Service Voter ki don 2481 ngut.Ha Tura Seat, ki nongthep vote ki don 8,26,156 lak ngut.  Ki shynrang ki don 4,157,51 lak ngut, ki kynthei ki don 4,10404 lak ngut.Ki Trangender ki don lai ngut, arngut na Shillong Seat bad iwei na Tura Seat.Haba khein lang ia ki nong thep vote shynrang ha ka jylla Meghalaya ki don baroh 10,99,517 lak ngut bad ki kynthei ki don 11,27,047 lak ngut.
title: LASHAI KA SNGI YN RAI KI 22 LAK TAM KI NONGTHEP VOTE IA KI MP NA SHILLONG BAD TURA

content: : Ki nongtrei ha ka tnat elekshon ba kynthup naduh ki Returning Officer, ki Assistant Returning Officer, ki Zonal Magistrate, ki Sector Officer, ki Pulit pahara bad kiwei pat ki nongtrei ki la mih lang khrui na madan Polo, Shillong ban leit sha manla ki Polling Station bapher bapher kiba don ha kylleng ki Constituency jong ka East Khasi Hills.Kine ki  nongtrei kin peit ia ka jingiaid beit iaid ryntih ha ka jingiathep Vote ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban long ha ka Sngi Thohdieng bad sdang naduh ka por 7:00 baje mynstep bad kut haduh ka por 4:00 baje janmiet.Ka jingñiew ia ki Vote kan long ha ka 4 tarik, Jylliew 2024.Khnang ban pynthikna ba ki nongpyniaid ia ka elekshon kin poi biang por sha ki Polling Station bad ba kin ym sahkut ha ka dheng kali kaba jur ha nongbah Shillong kaba ju jia manla ka sngi, u Deputy Commissioner (Election) uba long u District Election Officer ula pynbna da ka shuthi tang ia ki skul, ki kolej, ki ITI kiba don ha Shillong.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Chief Electoral Officer ka Jylla u Dr. BDR Tiwari, la sakhi ia ki nongpyniaid elekshon kiba la hap ban shong da ki lieng ha wah Shella ban poi sha ki shnong kiba don ia ki Polling Station ba kham kyndong ba kynthup sha Kalatek A bad B bad sha Kamsing Polling Station kaba hap hapoh ka Amlarem Civil Subdivision.Shwa kane, ka tnat Election ka la phah ia ki nongtrei ban leit rung sha ki ing ki sem ba don tang ki tymmen ki kro bad kiba duna dkhotmet ba kin thep ia ka vote. Kane ka long ka thong jong ka tnat Election ban ym iehnoh ia ki nongshong shnong kiba dei hok ban ioh thep ia ka vote bakordor ba kin jied ia la u/ka nongmihkhmat sha ka dorbarbah Lok Sabha mynta ka kynti.
title: SHONG LIENG KI NONGPYNÏAID ELEKSHON BAN POI SHA KI POLLING STATION BA KYNDONG

content: : Ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC) ha ka sngi Palei ka la pan jubab na ka Sorkar Jylla halor ka jingshah thang im lai ngut ki briew na ka jylla Assam ha East Garo Hills District ha ka sngi Balang.U Secretary ka Commission u la bthah ia u Director General of Police (DGP) ka Jylla ba un phah ia ka kaiphod shim kam (Action Taken Report) hapoh shi bnai naduh ba la ioh pdiang ia ka hukum.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, lai ngut ki briew ba la suba ba ki dei ki nongtuh kali na ka jylla Assam ki la shah thang im ha ka khlaw kaba don ha East Garo Hills District ha ka step sngi Balang bad ki Pulit ki la ïathuh ba ka la don ka jingsuba ba ka lah ban dei ka kynhun jong ki nongtuh kali kiba la leh ïa kane ka kam bymman.Arngut na kine kiba la shah thang im ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Zahidul Islam bad u Jamor Ali.“Imat kane ka dei ka kam tuh kali bad ka kynhun ki nongtuh,” ong u SP ka East Garo Hills Bah SA Rynjah ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.U la ïathuh ba u Zahidul Islam u dei uba ju donkti ban tuh kali na Dudhnoi bad Krishnai bad u dei ruh uba don case NBWA pyrshah ïa u ha Krishnai PS. Katba u Jamor Ali u dei uba donkti ban tuh masi bad don case ha Matia PS, Assam.U SP u la ïathuh ba ha ka sngi Baar ki la ïoh ïa ka jingujor ba shu pyntip ba u Jamor Ali (35snem) ryngkat lang bad u nongñiah u  Noor Ahmed bad u  Zahidul Islam (25 snem) ki la mih na ka la ïing ha ka janmiet Lah Sngi u Blei ban wan sha Meghalaya.Ka khubor ïa ka ïathuh kine ki briew na Assam ha ryngkat bad u nongñiah jong ka kali ba ki shim wai, ki la shah pynïap bad shah thang ha Rongmil haduh ba ym lah shuh ban ithuh ia ka durkhmat, kaba jngai kumba 15 kilomitar na Rongjeng, East Garo Hills.Ïa kine ki metïap ba ladep thang la tep ha kawei ka thliew ha ka thaiñ Rongmil.
title: BA SHAH THANG IM LAI NGUT KI BRIEW HA EGH, PAN KAIPHOD KA MHRC NA KA SORKAR

content: Kumba 50.23 percent ha Shillong Seat bad 46.67 percent ha Tura ki paidbah ki la leit ban thep ia ki vote ki jong ki ha ka sngi Thohdieng haduh ka por 1 baje nohsngi.Ia kane la pyntip da u Chief Electoral Officer ka Jylla Dr. BDR Tiwari.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma uba long ruh u National President jong kaNational People’s Party (NPP) u la mih na la ing bad ñiah hi ia ka kali ban leit sha Polling Station ha Tura bad ieng ha u laiñ ban ap ia ka pali jin haduh kumba lai kynta eiei ban ioh thep ia ka vote.U Myntri Rangbah uba la poi ha Walbakgre Polling Station ha ka por 6:30 mynstep u la hap ban ap ia la ka pali ban pyndep ia la ka jong ka kamram ban jied nongmihkhmat na Tura Parliamentary Seat.Shuh shuh u Conrad Sangma u la iathuh ba u la pyllait ia ki Pulit pahara jong u, ia u nongñiah kali bad ia ki nongtrei kiba ju don ha syndah jong u khnang ban ailad ruh ba kin dup iohlad ban leit thep ia ka vote.“Haba nga la poi ha Polling Station ha ka por kumba 6:30 baje mynstep, ki don lypa kumba 200 ngut ki briew kiba ieng laiñ ha Polling Station. Kane ka pyni ia ka khubor kaba bha ba ki paidbah ki iashim bynta ha ka jingthep vote ban jied  nongmihkhmat,” u la bynrap.Ka MP ba mynta ka Tura kaba long ruh ka kyrtong jong ka NPP ka Agatha Sangma ka la poi ha Walbakgre Polling Station ha ka por 7.30 baje mynstep ban thep ia la ka jong ka vote.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka Agatha Sangma ka la ong, “ngi sakhi ia ka jingmih ryntih jong ki paidbah bad ka jingbun ki paidbah kiba ieng ha u lain lada ianujor bad ka elekshon Assembly, kane ka pyni ia ki dak ki shin kiba bha. Nga pynshlur ia ki paidbah ba kin pyndonkam hok ia la ka jong ka iktiar. Ngi sngewnguh ruh ia ki paidbah kiba wan ban thep ia ka vote.”Ka jingthep vote ha ka Phase-1 jong ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka la long ha ki 102 tylli ki Constituency ha kylleng ka ri India naduh ka por 7 baje mynstep bad ka ban kut haduh ka por 4 baje janmiet.
title: 50.23 PERCENT HA SHILLONG, 46.67 PERCENT HA TURA POI KI NONGTHEP VOTE HADUH 1 BAJE  NOHSNGI

content: Ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC) ha ka sngi Palei ka la pan jubab na u Director General of Police ka Jylla halor ka jingshah tait shnong jong kawei ka longkmie ha ka Dorbar Shnong Lumlakhait, West Jaintia Hill District.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Secretary ka Commission, kane ka jingshimkhia jong ka Commission ka long hadien ba kane ka jingjia ka la mih ha kawei na ki kotkhubor Khasi ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai.“Ka Commission ka la phah ia ka notis sha u Director General of Police, Meghalaya, ba un phah ia ka kaiphod kaba bniah hapoh 15 sngi,” la ong u Secretary ka Commission.Ka Kong Meloris Dhar ka la shah tait shnong ha ka Dorbar Shnong Lumlakhait, West Jaiñtia Hills District halor ka jingkynnoh ba ka dei kaba don Taro.Arngut kiba soi kyrteng ha ka ejahar ba la mudui sha u Superintendent of Police ka West Jaiñtia Hills District ba kynthup ïa u Thermonki Susngi na ka shnong Nartiang Mudop bad u Diamond Dhar na ka shnong Lumlakhiat ki la kynnoh da kaba pynpaw, “ka Dorbar Shnong ba la ïalam da u Waheh Shnong u Bah Edward Shadap bad u Secretary Shnong u Bah Tisis Phira ki la ai ka jingmynjur ha u Risaw, 2023 bad ha ka 5 tarik, Ïaiong, 2024 ban tait shnong ïa ki lai ngut ki briew kiba kynthup ïa u Biktor Dhar, Balen Dhar bad ïa ka Meloris Dhar.”Ka jingmudui ka la pyntip shuh shuh, “ki la byrngem byrsit ïa ka ing ka sem bad ïa ka kur ka jait Dhar bad kim shah shuh ban leit trei leit ktah bad ban rep lyngkha ruh.”“Ngi kyrpad ïa ka ophis ba donburom jong phi ba phin sngewbha ban shimkhia ïa kane, khnang ba ngin ïoh biang ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka iing ka sem bad ha ka shnong ka thaw ruh kumjuh,” la kyrpad ki nongujor ïa u SP.Ha ka jingïakren bad u nongthoh khubor, u khun jong ka Kong Meloris Dhar u la ïathuh ba ka Dorbar Shnong Lumlikhait ka la pynmih ïa ka hukum ban beh shnong nyngkong eh ha ka 9 tarik Risaw, 2023 halor ka jingkynnoh don Taro tang namarba ki don ki briew kiba la ïohpang hapoh ka shnong Lumlikhait.U la ïathuh ba ha kane ka dorbar, ki la don ruh ki nongshong shnong kiba la ktah kti ïa ka kmie jong u hynrei da ka jingïada jong ki dkhot ka Village Defence Party (VDP) ka Kong Meloris ka la shu lait da ka said na ka jingshah bom shnong.  Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ruh ba ki nongshong shnong ki la byrngem ruh ban thang wat ïa ka ing ka sem.
title: BA SHAH TAIT SHNONG KA LONGKMIE HA LUMLAKHAIT, PAN JUBAB KA MHRC NA U DGP

content: : Kawei ka nongthep vote Third Gender ka la thep ia ka vote lajong ha Khliehshnong-A ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Kane ka Third Gender ka la iathuh ba ka la mih na Shillong ban mihkhmat ia ki Third Gender hynrei namarba ka dang aplai ia ka kyrteng ban iohrung kum ka nongthep vote Third Gender ha ka Electoral Roll, ka la hap ban thep ia ka vote ha ka jaka thep vote jong ki Shynrang.
title: LOK SABHA ELEKSHON: THEP VOTE KA THIRD GENDER HAKHLIEHSHNONG A

content: Ka ONYX na ka liang jong ki shynrang bad ka Dubakh-A ha ka liang jong ki kynthei ki long ki ar tylli ki kynhun ialehkai ban iohrah ia ka nam lahduh ha ka Maitshaprang Khasi League Basketball Tournament ba la pynlong da ka Khasi Student Union.Ha ka jingiakhun phainal kaba la long ha ka sngi Palei, ka ONYX ka la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka Dubakh da 76-70 basket ha ka liang jong ki shynrang.Ha ka jingiakhun ha ka liang ki kynthei ka Dubakh-A ka la lah ban pynliem noh ia ka Dubakh-B da 51-36 basket.Ia kane ka lympung ialehkai kaba long ha madan Basketball ha Mawlai Nongpdeng la pynhap pyrda da u President ka KSU u samla Lambokstar Marngar uba la long kum u kongsan.Ha kane ka jingiakhun ki nongjop ki la ioh rah khur ruh ia ka song pisa kaba T. 40 hajar ryngkat ka trophy bad ki kynhun ba wan baar ki la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba T. 30 hajar ryngkat ka trophy.Ia ka Most Valuable Player na ka liang ki shynrang la iohrah da u Meban Shadap na ka kynhun ONYX bad na ka liang ki kynthei la ioh khur da ka Larihun Warjri na ka Dubahk-A.
title: LAHDUH KA ONYX BAD DUBAKH-A HA KA MAITSHAPHRANG KHASI LEAGUE

content: : U President jong ka All India Trinamool Congress (AITC) ka Baghmara Block u Mejoline S. Marak u la ujor sha u Returning Officer jong ka Tura Lok Sabha Parliamentary Constituency halor ka jingpynsaphriang ia ka khubor lamler ba shu shna thok ha ka Letter Head jong u Dr. Mukul M. Sangma uba dei u MLA jong ka 41-Songsak (ST) Constituency uba mihkmat ia ka All India Trinamool Congress.“Kine ki jingleh ki long tang ka jingthmu ban ialam bakla ia ki paidbah nongthep vote ha ka Lok Sabha Elections 2024, ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik, Iaiong, 2024. Nga la ioh jingtip ba la pynphriang ia kane ka khubor lamler ha ka kyrteng u Dr. Mukul M. Sangma ia kiba la pynphriang da u Mr. Aldo A. Sangma, u MDC (Nominated) jong ka National People’s Party bad kiwei kiwei,” la ong u Marak ha ka ujor.Ha kajuh ka por, u President ka AITC Baghmara Block u la phah ruh ia kane kajuh ka ujor sha u Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) ka Jylla u Dr. BDR Tiwari.
title: UJOR KA AITC BAGHMARA BA SHNA THOK ÏA KA LETTER HEAD U DR. MUKUL SANGMA

content: Ka Jylla Meghalaya ka la sakhi ia ka jingpoi ki nongthep vote ha baroh ki Polling Station kaba kot 76.60%.Katkum ka jingai jingkheiñ jong u Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) u Dr. BDR Tiwari, ka jingpoi jong ki nong thep vote ha Shillong Parliamentary Seat ka long 73.78 persen, katba ha Tura ka long 81.37 persen.“Kane ka dei ka jingioh jingkheiñ bapura ha ka jingpoi ki nongthep vote,” la ong u Dr. Tiwari.Ha u snem 2019, ka jingthep vote jong ki paidbah ka long 71.42 persen ha Shillong bad ha Tura 81.38 persen.Ha ka elekshon MLA jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ  ka jylla kaba la long ha u snem 2023 ka jingpoi jong ki nongthep vote ka long 86.81 persen.Ha Shillong Parliamentary Seat :  Ha ki san tylli ki Constituency ka West Jaiñtia Hills ka jingpoi jong ki nongthep vote ka long 73.86 persen, ha ki ar tylli ki Constituency ka East Jaiñtia Hills ka long 77.56 persen, ha ki san tylli ki Constituency ha Ribhoi ka long 74.45, ha ki 17 tylli ki Constituency ka East Khasi Hilla ka long 71.85 persen, ha ki ar tylli ki Constituency ka Eastern West Khasi Hills ka long 77.78 persen, ha ki lai tylli ki Constituency ka West Khasi Hills ka long 72.80 persen, ha ki ar tylli ki Constituency ka South West Khasi Hills ka long 79.52 persen.Ha Tura Parliamentary Seat: Ha ki saw tylli ki Constituency ka North Garo Hills ka long 80.84 persen. Ha ki lai tylli ki Constituency ka East Garo Hills ka long 79.60 persen. Ha ki khatwei tylli ki Constituency  ka West Garo Hills ka long 81.38 persen. Ha ki lai tylli ki Constituency ka South West Garo Hills ka long 84.15 persen. Ha ki lai tylli ki Constituency ka South Garo Hills ka long 81.09 persen.
title: ELECTION LOK SABHA : 73.78 PERSEN POI KI NONGTHEP VOTE HA SHILLONG, 81.37 PERSEN HA TURA

content: Ka South Shillong Constituency ka la paw kum ka Constituency kaba poi duna tam ki nongthep vote kaba long tang 58.36 percent ha ka Elekshon Lok Sabha kaba la long ha ka sngi Thohdieng na Shillong Seat.Katba ka Ranikor Constituency ka la paw kum ka Constituency kaba poi bun tam eh ki nongthep vote kaba kynjoh haduh 80.55 percent.Ka South Shillong Constituency ka dei kaba la mihkhmat da u Bah Sanbor Shullai na ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) katba ia ka Ranikor Consituency la mihkhmat da u Bah Pius Marweiñ uba long u MLA jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP).Ha Tura Seat, ka South Tura ba la mihkmat da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Sangma ka dei kaba poi duna bha ki nongthep vote kaba long tang 69.60 percent, katba ka Rajabala ka dei kaba poi bun tam ki nongthep vote kaba kynjoh haduh 87.85 percent.
title: POI DUNA KIBA THEP VOTE HA SOUTH  SHILLONG, BUN EH HA RANIKOR

content: : Tang hapoh arphew saw kynta ba u Pator barim jong ka Sumer Patorship, East Jaiñtia Hills District u Bah Remington Paslein u la kam ba ka don ka jingthep vote tuh ha Pala Polling Station kaba hap hapoh ka Sutnga Saipung Constituency ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha kaba la long ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai une u rangbah ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la phah da ka jingujor sha u Deputy Commisisoner jong ka East Jaintia Hills District u Abhilash Baranwal da ka jingkyrpad ban tohkit bniah lyngba ka CCTV ba la pyndait hapoh ka Polling Station khnang ban lap ia ka jingthep vote tuh kumba u la kynnoh.Ha ka ujor u sha u Deputy Commisisoner u Bah Pasleiñ u la ong, “nga kyrpad ia phi hakhmat ka burom jong phi ba phin sngewbha ban phah tohkit ia ka CCTV footage kaba don hapoh ka Pala Polling Station kaba hap hapoh 5-Sutnga Saipung Constituency, East Jaiñtia Hills District.”“Namarba ha kane ka sngi thep vote jong ka 1-Shillong (ST) Parliamentary Constituency jong ka Lok Sabha, kata, ha ka 19 /04/2024 ba don ki biew ba pyyndonkam bad leh donbor ban thep ia ka vote jong kiwei pat ki briew.  Kumta, nga la wan ban dawai ia ka hok jong nga na ka office ba donburom jong phi ba phin sngewbha ban phah tohkit ia ka CCTV footage khnang ban lap ia ka jingshisha, katkum ba nga la dawa,” la ong u Bah Pasleiñ.Ha ka sngi Thohdieng, u Bah Pasleiñ u la kam kam ba u la sakhi da la ki jong ki khmat ia ka jingthep vote tuh ha Pala Polling Station.Haba pyntip ia kane ka jingjia sha u nonglum khubor lyngba ka telephone, u Bah Pasleiñ u la kam ruh ba wat haba la pyndait ia ka CCTV hapoh kane ka Polling Station hynrei ka jingthep vote tuh ka la iaid beit shakhmat naduh ba u la poi ha kane ka Polling Station ka por 9 baje mynstep ban thep ia ka vote.Shuh shuh u la kam ruh wat haba u la iakren bad u Presiding Officer bad ia u Rangbah Shnong ban pynsangeh ia kane ka jingthep tuh ia ka vote jong kiwei hynrei kim shym la sngap satia bad kynnoh ruh ba u Rangbah Shnong u ong ba kam shym la mih kano kano ka jingkulmar.Halor kane, u Bah Pasleiñ u la iathuh ba u la ujor lyngba ka telephone sha u Deputy Commissioner (Election) uba dei ruh u District Election Officer (DEO) ka East Jaiñtia Hills District u Abhilash Barwanwal khnang ban pynsangeh ia ka jingthep vote tuh ha kane ka Polling Station.Haba pyrshang ban kylli na u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Jaintia Hills u la pyntip lyngba ka SMS ba u la phah tohkit ha u Sector Officer ban ioh ia ka kaiphod kaba bniah.
title: UJOR U PATOR BARIM KA SUMER HA U DC, KYRPAD BAN TOHKIT NA KA CCTV BAN LAP SABUT

content: Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la beh seng ia u dkhot jong ka State Executive Committee (SEC) Bah Avner Medon Pariat halor ka jingkren pyrshah ia ka party.U Bah Pariat, uba la iakhun pyrshah ia ka MLA jong ka East Shillong Constituency ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka elekshon MLA jong ka Ingdorbar Thawain ka Jylla na ka tiket jong ka VPP, u la shah kynnoh ba u la kren pyrshah ia ka party  da kaba iaroh ia kawei pat ka seng saiñ pyrthei ha ka rynsan Social Media.U Chairman jong ka Disciplinary Committee u Dr. Kara H. Chen ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Bah Pariat ula pyntip ba ka jingshim jong ka party ia kane ka sienjam ka long halor ka jingkren pyrshah jong u ia ka party kaba pyntroin ia ka jingtrei shitom ban pynkhlain ia ka party.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, u Bah Avner Pariat u la phah ia ka shithi iehnoh kam sha ka VPP ia kaba la phah ruh sha ki lad pathai khubor.Ha ka shithi iehnohkam u Bah Pariat u la pyntip ba un ym leit pyniasoh sha kano kano ka seng sain pyrthei ia mynta shipor.
title: BEH SENG KA VPP ÏA U BAH AVNER MEDON PARIAT NABA KREN PYRSHAH ÏA KA PARTY

content: Lai ngut ki samla Khasi kiba shong basah ha ka shnong Thangskai, East Jaintia Hills District ki la mynsaw hadien ba ki la shah kawut lathi ha ki shipai Border Security Force kiba ju ap pahara ha jingkieng ha ka shnong Sonapyrdi.U General Secretary jong ka Khasi Students Union, East Jaintia Hills District u Bah KS Suchiang ha ka jingiakren bad u nonglum khubor jong ka Batesi Tv lyngba ka telephone u la iathuh ba kane ka la jia ha ka por 9 baje mynmiet jong ka sngi u Blei ka 21 tarik u Iaiong, 2024 katba ki dang mih na Thangskai ban leit sha ka shnong Shymplong.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong une u nongialam ka KSU, napdeng ki lai ngut kiba la shah kawut lathi ha ki shipai BSF arngut ki la kham mynsaw jur.Nalor kata, kine ki shipai BSF ba la kynnoh ba ki la buaid khawyiang ki la pynjulor ruh ia ki ar tylli ki kali ba la shong da kine ki samla Khasi.U Bah Suchiang u la iathuh ba kine ki samla ki la leit ujor da ka ejahar ha ki Pulit jong ka Lumshnong Out Post hynrei na ka liang jong ki Pulit ki la ong pynban ia kine ki lanot ba kin pyrkhat bha shwa ba kin mudui ejahar ia ki shipai BSF.U la ong ruh ba ka seng kan iai dawa ia ka sorkar ban pynkynriah noh mardor ia ki shipai BSF na Sonapyrdi sha khappud khnang ba ki paidbah nongshong shnong kin ym kylla sohpdung na ka por sha ka por na ka jingpynibor ba palat pud jong ki shipai.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka KSU kan sa shong jingialang ha ka 23 tarik u iaiong, 2024 ha ophis treikam ha Lad Rymbai bad ban dawa ia ka Sorkar ba kan dei ban weng noh mardor ia ki shipai BSF na Sonapyrdi.
title: MYNSAW LAI NGUT KI KHASI BA KAWUT LATHI KI BSF, SHAH PYNJULOR AR TYLLI KI KALI

content: : Ki samla wadkam ka jylla ba la lamkhmat da ka samla Barilang Pyngrope ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la leit ban iakynduh ia u Secretary jong ka Personnel & A.R. Department u Bah Cyril V. Darlong Diengdoh ban pan jingpynshai ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynrit ia ka rta thungkam ha ka tnat Pulit.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, dang ha ka taiew baladep, ki samla wadkam ki la leit ban iakynduh ia ka Secretary jong ka Central Recruitment Board ka Mary TG Sangma hynrei ka la bthah ia kine ki samla ban leit iakynduh ia u Secretary jong ka Personnel & A.R. Department ka Sorkar Jylla ba kin ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah.Dang shen ka tnat Pulit ka la pynbna ïa ka jingpyllait 2938 tylli ki post hapoh ka tnat Pulit.  Ha kane ka jingpynbna, la pyntip ba ka rta rung kam na ka bynta ka post Constable ka long 21 snem bad 27 snem na ka bynta ka post Sub Inspector.Ka Samla Barilang Pyngrope kaba la lamkhmat ia kane ka kynhun ki samla ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka la ong ba ka jingiakynduh ia u Secretary ka Personnel & A.R. Department ka long beit halor ka jingpynbeit bad ka rta rungkam bad ia ka jingpynbna na kane ka tnat treikam jong ka sorkar hadien ba la pynmih ia ka Advertisement ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai.“Ka jingkylli kaba mih mynta ka long kumno ka Jingpynbna kam pat mih bad ka dang don hapdeng ka jingpynkhreh katba ka Advertisement pat ka dang iaid. Ngi dang beit da ki jingkylli halor kane. Kane ka jingai jubab na ka Sorkar ngim lah shuh ban sngewthuh. Ngi sngew hi ba kane ka sorkar ka pyrshah ia ka jingkiew jong ki samla,”ka la ong.Ka la ong ruh ba kumno ka jingkhot Advertisement na ka bynta ka jingpynrungkam ka la jan kut katba ia ka jingpynbna haduh mynta ka sorkar kam pat lah ban pynmih.Shuh shuh ka la ong ba ka Sokar ka la dei ban pyrkhat lem ia ki samla namarba ki la shah ktah ha ka khlam COVID-19 kaba la lynshop ha ka jylla ha u snem 2020 bad 2021.Uwei na ki samla wadkam u la iathuh ba ka jingdawa jong ki ka long ba ka Sorkar kan kyntiew ia ka rta thungkam haduh 30 snem.
title: PAN JINGPYNSHAI KI SAMLA WADKAM NA KA TNAT PERSONNEL HALOR KA RTA RUNGKAM PULIT

content: U trai jong ka Saw Aiom Restaurant u Bah Shanbor Sohtun ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la mih shakhamt ban pynshai halor ka jingthaw jingklumar jong ki Khar Metor hapoh ka Restaurant kaba la jia ha ka miet sngi saitjain jong ka taiew baladep.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Shanbor u la ong tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia marmar u la pyntip sha ki Pulit ha kaba ki la rah noh ia ki Khar Metor bad ia uwei u nongtrei jong ka Restaurant sha thanat.U la iathuh ba ynda la poi ha thanat ki khar Metor ki la siew noh ia ka bai dih kyiad kaba ki la dih hapoh ka Restaurant bad ki Pulit ki la pyllait noh ia u nongtrei jong ka Restaurant.Ha ka janmiet sngi Saitjaiñ ka la mih ka jingiakynroi bad ka jingiaktah kti hapdeng ki 4 ne 5 ngut ki khar Metor bad ki Khasi hadien ba ladep iadih iabam ha kawei ka Restaurant kaba kyrteng ka Saw Aiom Restaurant kaba don ha Iewduh, ha basa sohsaw kaba la long trai da u Bah Shanborlang Sohtun.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Manager jong kane ka Restaurant u Shiv Kumar Singh, la ong ba kine ki ar kynhun ki la iasdang shwa ban ia kynroi hapoh ka Restaurant bad la ong ruh hadien ki la ia mih na Restaurant ki la ia thaw jingkulmar bad ban ia pyni bor sa shabar  bad donbok da ka jingwan poi noh ki Pulit la lah ban tem ia ka jingkulmar.Hynrei ka khubor kaba  la saphriang ha ka social media la kynnoh ba dei ki kharmetor  kiba la thaw jingkulmar  hynrei ia kane ym pat lah satia ban pynthikna nangno nangno.
title: HA THANAT SIEW KI KHAR METOR ÏA KA BAI DIH KYIAD HADIEN BA ÏAKAJIA HA RESTAURANT

content: Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP), khyndiat sngi hadien ba la kut ka election Lok Sabha hapoh ka jylla, ka la peh da u Prah ia ar ngut ki kyrtong MLA kiba iakhun ha ka election MLA kaba la long ha u snem 2023 bad ia uwei na ki nongialam na Mairang Constituency.Ki ar ngut ki kyrtong MLA kiba la shah beh seng ha ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep ki long u Bah Avner M. Pariat uba iakhun na ka East Shillong Constituency, u Bah Shanlang Warjri uba iakhun na Mairang Constituency bad ia u Bah Kherup Sing Thabah uba dei u nongkitkam na Mairang Constiuency.Ia ka shithi beh seng la soi da u Chairman jong ka Disciplinary Committee jong ka party u Dr Kara H Shen bad da u Secretary ka Disciplinary Committee u Bah Grossper Ryntathiang, ka long hadien ka jingbthah jong ka State Executive Committee (SEC) jong ka party.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha kine ki lai ngut, ka Party ka la kynnoh ba kine ki lai ngut ki la kren pyrshah ia ka seng.U Bah Avner Pariat ha kajuh hi ka sngi ba u la shah beh seng u la phah ia ka shithi iehnohkam sha ka party.
title: HAPOH SHI SNGI BEH SENG KA VPP ÏA AR NGUT KI KYRTONG MLA

content: Ar ngut ki khynnah kynthei na ka shnong Wahsiej, ki la ngam jyllop ha kawei ka wah ba la tip kyrteng kum ka thwei Breimeirit, ha Wah Rilang, South West Khasi Hills District kaba jngai kumba 7 kilometre tam eiei na Mawkyrwat.Ka tyllong khubor ba la iohlum na ki Pulit, ka iathuh ba kane ka la jia ha ka sngi u Blei ha ka por kumba 2:00 baje ne 2:30 baje nohphai sngi katba kine ki ar ngut ki khynnah kynthei ki dang ia ingi ha thwei Breimeirit, Wah Rilang.Ia ki ar ngut ki khynnah kynthei kiba la ngam jyllop la tip kyrteng kum ka Shabakmenlang Wanniang, 16 snem ka rta bad ka Aishabankmen Thongni, 14 snem ka rta.Haba tohkit ha kane hi ka jaka, la ong ba halor ka jingiap jong ki ym don ka jingsuba sniew ïano iano ruh bad na ka liang ki bahaiing hasem ki la kyrpad ban pyllait ia ka Postmortem ha kaba ka kong Y.R. Mawlong, Additional Deputy Commissioner, South West Khasi Hills District ka la ai ia ka jingmynjur.Ia ka met basah jong kine ki ar ngut la aiti noh sha ki bahaiing hasem ba kin pyndep ia ka jinglehniam bakhatduh.
title: NGAM JYLLOP ARNGUT KI KHYNNAH KYNTHEI HA THWEI BREIMEIRIT, WAHSIEJ

content: : Arngut ki briew ki la shah kem ha ka sngi Baar halor ka jingdonkti ha ka jingshah pynïap jong ki bar jylla ha Ichamati bad ha Mawlai Mawroh.Katkum ka thymmei khubor ba la ïoh na ki Pulit, ïa uwei la kem na Mawlai bad uwei pat na Nongthymmai.“Ïa uwei la ïohkem ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingjia shah pynïap briew ha Ichamati bad uwei pat la kem halor ka jingjia ha jingshah pynïap briew ha Mawlai Mawroh ,” ong u heh Pulit.Ha ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai, arngut ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ki la shah kem halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki donkti ha ka jingshah pynïap ba dang shen jong ki nongbylla bar ylla ha Ichamati, East Khasi Hills.Kine ki arngut la ithuh kyrteng kum u Shambor Shati (26 snem) bad u Meshadap Sohpen kiba dei ki dkhot jong ka KSU South Khasi Hills District.Ha ka 27 tarik, Lber, arngut ki briew ki la kynnoh ba ki la shah bom haduh ban da ïap ha ki runar ha Ichamati. Kine ki dei kiba la ithuh kyrteng kum u Isan Singh bad u Sujit Dutta. Kine ki arngut ki dei ki nongbylla ha jaka tih maw.  Ïa ka met jong ki la lap na Ichamati bad na Dalda ha kajuh ka sngi.Katkum ka ejahar ba la mudui da ki bahaing hasem jong kine ki arngut ki lanot, ka jingshah pynïap ka la jia ha ka por ba la don ka jingpyrshah ïa ka CAA ha Ichamati.Ha ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai, sa uwei u nongbylla uba la tip kyrteng kum u Arjun Ray (52 snem ka rta) u la duhei ïa la ka jong ka jingim na ka jingmynsaw jur hadien ba ma u bad arngut kiwei pat ki nongbylla ki la shah thombor ha ki runar ha Mawlai Mawroh.Ki Pulit ki la pyntip ba katto katne ngut ki runar bym pat lah ban tip ki la thombor ïa ki lai ngut ki nongbylla misteri bar jylla kiba trei bylla ha kawei ka ing ha Mawlai Mawroh.
title: KEM KI PULIT ARNGUT KI BRIEW BA SHAH PYNÏAP KI BAR JYLLA HA ICHAMATI BAD MAWROH

content: : Kawei ka kali Auto Rickshaw kaba don ïa u nombar ML10-C-8814 bad kawei ka kali Thar kaba don ïa u nombar ML05-AB-0028 ki la julor bad pra phrom hadien ka jingshah rat ha kawei ka ka trok kaba don ïa u nombar NL01-N-5423 ha ka shnong Sumer Umbang, Ribhoi District ha ka 15 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 3:45 baje ne 4:00 baje janmiet.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Bah Dapbor Syiemiong uba ñiah ïa ka kali Thar u la ong ba ki don lai ngut ki briew kiba shong hapoh ka kali Auto Rickshaw ba kynthup ïa u Bah Gentleman Thangkhiew, u Bah Donboklang Sumer bad u Bah Skhemlang Kshiar uba la mynsaw bad uba dang don mynta hapdeng ka jingshah sumar ha Civil Hospital, Shillong.Katba lai ngut kiba shong ha ka kali Thar ki long u Bah Dapbor Syiemiong uba ñiah ïa ka kali uba lait thaw na ka jingmynsaw bad arngut kiwei pat kiba la mynsaw ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kujm ka Kong Saniti Dkhar bad ka Kong Karen Dkhar.Ha ka jingshah rat ha kane ka trok, ka kali Thar ka la leit rung jluk ha kawei ka dukan kaba don hakhmat surok kaba khang khyrdep.Ïa kane ka jingjia la sakhi ruh da kawei ka longkmie ba die dukan ka Kong Ridahun Dkhar.“Ngi la ujor da ka ejahar ha Umïam Police Station,” ong u Bah Syiemiong bad ïathuh katba ki dang ieng ban thied jingthied, kynsan kynsan la wan kawei ka trok kaba tynrah ïa ka kali nadien haduh ba ka kali ka la rung shapoh kawei ka dukan.“Donbok ba hapoh ka dukan ym don briew namarba ki khang dukan hynrei lada dei ba ki plie ki briew hapoh dukan ki la mynsaw bad donbok ba ïada u Blei ngi la shu mynsaw malu mala,” u la ong.“Kaei kaba ngi shem na kane ka jingjia, ka long ka jingkhlem akor jong ki nongñiah trok. Ngi ïohsngew ruh na ki paralok parajor ba khamtam sha kine ki thain ba ki ñiah khlem akor bad kaei kaba ki leh ruh kim ju siew bailutksan bad shim jingkitkhieh ïa kiba shah tynrah kum ïa ki briew ne ïa ki kali. Ki long laitlain,” la ïathuh u Bah Syiemiong bad pyntip ba ki Pulit ki la shimkhia halor kane kam bad ban register case namarba kim (trai trok) treh ban siew ïa kiba mynsaw.“Ha kato ka sngi donbok ba ka (trok) tynrah shwa ïa ka kali jong ngi bad lada tynrah nyngkong ïa ka Auto Rickshaw kan jin da la don ka jingkhlad briew bad ba u Blei u dang ïada kiba don hapoh ka kali Autorickshaw hynrei uwei u dang don ha Civil Hospital u la shitom jur bad uwei pat u la mih na Hospital,” ula ong shuh shuh.“Nga kyntu ïa ki bor jong ka aiñ ban shim khia halor kane namarba ki trok ki long khlemakor shaba palat,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ba katkum ka jingïoh jingtip ba ïa ka trok la shim wai da ka French Transport Company. “Ki (Manager jong ka French Transport Company) wan ban kren hynrei ka rukom kren ka long bym suidñiew. Kaei kaei kaba jia ka long ka bym itynnat,” la ïathuh shuh shuh u Bah Syiemiong.U la ïathuh ba u Manager jong ka kompeni ha ka jingïakynduh hynnin ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la shu phah kam da ka Insurance hynrei um shym la ïakren eiei halor ka jingmynsaw jong kine ki hynriew ngut.“U nongñiah u la buaid bad u don bad u handyman.  U Handyman u phet beit naduh kato ka sngi bad u dang wan mynta ka sngi sha Police Station hynrei u nongñiah u la phet naduh kato ka sngi ba ladep jia bad ynda ngi la wan na civil hospital la ong ba la phah leh Medical Test ïa u bad ngi la kylli na ki Pulit ki ïathuh ba u nongñiah jong ka trok u la buaid,” la bynrap ka Kong Karen Dkhar.
title: LAIT THAW 6 NGUT KI BRIEW BA RAT KA TROK ÏA KA AUTO RICKSHAW BAD THAR HA SUMER UMBANG

content: U MLA jong ka North Shillong Constituency Bah Adelbert Nongrum ha ka sngi Baar u la dawa ïa ka Sorkar MDA ba la ïalam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ba kan shimkhia mardor ban pynkynriah noh ïa ki jaidbynriew Harijan kiba shong basah ha them Iewmawlong watla ka jingdawa ban pynkynriah noh ïa kine ki briew ka la kynjoh mynta la san snem tam.Kane ka jingdawa jong une u MLA ka VPP ka long hadien ba ka la mih ka jingïahuri hura hapdeng ki jaidbynriew Harijan bad ki Khasi hadien ba la shoh khawyiang bad kyntait ban siew ïa ka pisa ïa kaba ki la siew hadien ha Police Station.“Ngam lah ban shu peit bad ban shu sngap ïa ka jingjia ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai ha Saw Aiom Restaurant ha kaba ki nongshong shnong kiba nongshongwai ha Them Iewmawlong ki thmu ban pynmih jingkulmar kaba lehse ka lah ban mih binag ka jingkulmar kumba la jia ha u snem 2018,” ong u Bah Nongrum ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor lyngba ka video.“Kine ki nongshong shnong jong ka them Iewmawlong kumba ngi la ïohi lyngba ka  Social Media ka jingthmu jong ki ka dei ban dihei bad bam-ei ha kane ka Restaurant  bad ki thmu ban pynibor bad ban leh donbor ha kane ka jylla jong ngi, ka jaka jong ngi kaba ngim lah shah bad nga ai khulei ïa ki Pulit kiba la poi shwa ka por kiba la tem shwa ban mih ïa ki jingïakynad,” u la ong.’ “Ka tnat Pulit kam dei ban shu kut noh tang ban tem, ka tnat Pulit kaba dei ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsain. Ka tnat Pulit ka dei ban pynthikna ba ka aiñ ka long salonsar ïa baroh bad kam dei ban don ka jingleh shiliangkhmat tang ïa kawei ka jaidbynriew bad kane kan wanrah ïa ka jingshaniah ha ka tnat pulit,” u la bynrap.“Nga kwah ban pynkynmaw ba kine ki jingjia, ki jia na ka por sha ka por bad ki lah ban dei ki jingjia kiba rit hynrei kaei kaba khraw ka shong ha iei iei ibarit,” la kynthoh u Bah Nongrum.Haba phah ïa u kyrwoh sha ka Sorkar MDA u Bah Nongrum u la ong, “ka MDA-II kaba dei ruh ka MDA-I, san snem ki la ïakhun ïa kane ka kam hynrei ki la phiel ha baroh ki liang bad kane ka pynpaw ïa ka jingbym shimkhia, ïa ka jingbym kitkhlieh jong kita kiba kam ïalade kum ki nongïalam. Kaba sngewsih ka long ba la pynsahteng ban pynkynriah ïa ki nongshongwai na katei ka jaka kat shaba ki dei namarba ka jingdonkam kum u MLA nga kwah ban pynpaw ym dei ba nga isih ne ba nga shun namarba ka jinglong jingman ha ka koit ka khiah kam don ka long kaba itieng ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ki nongshong shnong bad ka katei ka ladei kawei na ki slum kaba don hapoh dohnud ka sor shillong kaba ngim ym lah ban pdiang.  Nga kwah pynkynmaw ba dei ka Sorkar ka dei ban shim jingkitkhlieh kaba la pynslem. Nga kwah ban pynkynmaw ïa ka sorkar ba mardor ka dei ban pynkynriah noh kham kloi ïa ki paralok kiba shong ha katei ka jaka bad bym dei ban shu kular tang ïa ka ktien na kawei ka snem sha kawei pat ka snem bad mynta la palat san snem kaba long ka jinglehraiñ kaba khraw bad ka pyni ïa ka jingbym larkam jong ka Sorkar kat haduh ba ka Ingbishar High Court badonburom ka la hap ban tuklar.“Ka Ingbishar High Court badonburom ka la tuklar ïa kiba bun ki kam bad kane ka pynpaw ba ka iktiar synshar jong ka Sorkar ba ïalam da ka NPP ka dei ka Sorkar kaba tlot. Ka don ka sorkar hynrei kam don pat ka jingsynshar. Ka Sorkar ka dei ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh namarba ka la pynslem ban pynkynriah ïa ki nongshong shnong (Harijan) namarba mynta ha ka jaka ba kan (Sorkar) long ka nongweng ïa ki jingeh ka kylla long pynban ka nongthaw jingeh da kaba buh ïa ki jingker nar ban khang ïaid ïa ki kali (ha Thew Iewmawlong) kaba wanrah ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba shyrkhei kaba la ktah haduh ïa kiba heh haduh kiba rit, khamtam kito ki VIP kam ktah eiei namarba ki set kyllut bad ki kah matlah ki khmat,” la kynthoh u Bah Nongrum.U la ong ba ki jingker nar ha them Iewmawlong ka la ktah bha ïa ka jingkhapngiah na ka jingdheng kali kaba shyrkhei naduh Anjalee, Khyndai Lad, Motphran bad ym don ba ïohi ym don ba ïohsngew namarba kiba don ha ka bor ki leh kyllut. “Kane ka dei ruh ka daw ba ka Sorkar kan hap ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh,” u la ong.
title: KI HARIJAN KI DEI TANG KI NONGSHONGWAI, PYNKYNRIAH MARDOR NA THEM IEWMAWLONG: BAH ADELBERT

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Baar ka la kynthoh pyrshah ia ka Sorkar halor ka jingbym pynshitom ia ki jaidbynriew Harijan halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki dei kiba thaw jingkulmar ha Saw Aiom Restaurant, Iewduh, ha ka miet 20 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah ha ka sngi Baar sha ki lad pathai khubor lyngba ka video u President ka seng Bah Stevenson Raymond Khyriem u la kynthoh ba lada dei ia ki Khasi, ki Pulit kin jin da la leit kem wat shiteng synnia na ing bad kynthoh ruh ba ka Sorkar ka shu pynleh khun khatduh ia ki jaidbynriew Harijan.U la ong ruh ba ka seng ka pynrem jur halor kane ka jingjia bad ka seng ka dawa ba dei ban pynshitom ïa kine ki jaidbynriew Harijan kiba la la ju leh donbor na ka por sha ka por ban thaw jingkulmar.Ka seng ka la dawa ruh ïa ka Sorkar ba dei ban weng noh ïa ki Harijan na Them Iewmawlong kiba la long mawjynthud bad wanrah tang ïa ki jingkulmar na ka por sha ka por.“Ka seng kam lah ban shu shong klikti bad ba kam kwah ruh ba ka jingiakhih beh khar Metor kan jia biang kumba la jia ha u snem 2018,” u la ong.Une u nongialam jong ka HNYF East Khasi Hills u la ong ruh ba ha Them Iewmawlong ki ju mih bunbah ki kam sniew naduh ka ka jingkhaii drok bad kiwei pat ki kam.Ka HNYF ka la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar MDA 2 ba ka dei ban shimkhia noh  mardor ïa kane ka kam ym ban shu sngap mynthi.
title: JINGJIA HA SAW AÏOM RESTAURANT: LADA DEI ÏA NGI KI KHASI, LA WAN KEM SHITENG MIET: HNYF

content: : Kawei ka samla kaba la 26 snem ha ka 20 tarik Ïaiong, 2024 ka la mudui da ka ejahar sha ki Pulit jong ka Rynjah Police Station halor ka jingshah leh be-ijot ha ki saw ngut ki khynnah kiba ka la kam ba ki dei kiba don kumba 20 bad 21 snem ka rta.Katkum ka ejahar ba kane ka samla ka la mudui sha ki Pulit, ka la ïathuh ba kane ka la jia ha kawei ka jaka ha nongbah Shillong ha u bnai Nailur, 2023 bad ïa ka video ba ki la ring dur ha ka por ba ki la leh be-ijot ïa ka ki la pynsaphriang ha ka rynsan Social Media shwa ka elekshon Lok Sabha kaba dang dang shu dep long shen.Kane ka samla ka la phla ba ka ïa ithuh ithaw bha ïa uwei napdeng kine ki saw ngut lyngba ka jingïalehkai PubG  bad ha u bnai Nailur, 2024 une u paralok jong ka, u la khot sngewbha ïa ka sha ing bad da ka jingshaniah ïa la u jong u paralok ka la leit sha ïing jong u khlem suba sniew eiei ïa ka jingmut sniew barieh jong u.Ka la ïathuh ba dei ha kum kane ka por ba ma u bad lai ngut ki paralok ki la khleh da u jingdih pynbuaid ha ka umsoh bad ai dih ïa ka kat haduh ba kam tip briew shuh ïalade.  Ha kum kane ka khyllipmat ba ma u, bad ki lai ngut ki paralok ki la shim kabu ban leh be-ijot ïa ka da kaba jingring video ïa kane ka kam pohjait kaba ki la leh pyrshah ïa ka long ryngieng jong ka.Ka la pyntip ruh ba kam shym la tip eiei ba kine ki saw ngut ki la leh be-ijot ryngkat ka jingring video ïa ka hynrei dei tad haduh ba kin da pynphriang ïa kane ka video ha Social Media mynta u bnai Ïaiong, 2024 ka la ïoh jingtip ba ki la leh ïa kane ka kam pohjait.Kat haduh ba la thoh ïa kane ka khubor, ki Pulit ki la ïohkem ïa ki lai ngut kiba donkti ha kane ka kam bymman bad mynta ki dang thwet sa ïa uwei pat uba dang phetrieh.
title: LEH BE-IJOT SAW NGUT KI KHYNNAH ÏA KA SAMLA, PYNSAPHRIANG SA KA VIDEO

content: : Arngut ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) kiba la shah kem ha ki pulit ha ka sngi baar ki la shah tian bishar ha Kashari jong u District and Session Judge ka East Khasi Hills District ha ka nohphai sngi jong ka Sngi Balang.U Superintendent of Police (City) Pankaj Kumar Rasgania u la pyntip kine ki arngut ki dkhot ka KSU kiba la shah kem ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Cleenstar Shabong, 27 snem ka rta uba sah ha Nongthymmai Pohktieh, Lane-5, Shillong. La kem ïa u halor ka case ba la rejistar ha Shella Police Staton halor ka jingshah pynïap jong u Sobir Dutta ha Ichamati.U SP (City) ka la aibor ban set ha along jong ki Pulit haduh 7 sngi khnang ba kin ïoh pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.“Nalor kane ka case, u Cleenstar Shabong u donkti ruh ha ki 10 tylli ki case bymman, ha kaba la pynngat kyndon pyrshah ïa u tang ha kawei ka case.Katba ha kaba ïadei bad ka case ba la rejistar ha Mawlai Police Station halor ka jingshah pynïap jong u Arjun Ray ha Mawlai Mawroh ki Pulit ki la kem u Gary Rinaldy Mawlieh, 25 snem ka rta uba sah ha Mawlai Mawroh Kseh.U SP (City) u la pyntip ba ka Kashari ka la aibor ban set haduh 12 sngi ha ka along ki Pulit khnang ba kin ïoh pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bad ha kajuh ka por u la pyntip ba u Gary Rinaldy Mawlieh u dei uba donkti shuh shuh sa ha ki 3 tylli ki case bymman, ha kaba la pynngat kyndon pyrshah ïa u ha ki ar tylli ki case.Ka jingtohkit pyrshah ïa kine ki arngut kiba la shah kem kan dang ïaid shakhmat ban ithuh bad ban ïohkem shuh shuh sa ïa kiwei pat kiba donkti ha kine ki jngjia, la ïathuh u SP (City).Ha ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai arngut ki dkhot ka KSU South Khasi Hills Unit ba kynthup ïa u Shambor Shati bad u Meshadap Sohpen ki la shah kem halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki dei kiba donkti ha ka jingshah pynïap jong ki arngut ki nongbylla tih maw ha Ichamati, East Khasi Hill.Haduh mynta kiba la shah kem ki long saw ngut, kata, lai ngut halor ka jingjia ha Ichamati bad uwei halor ka jingjia ha Mawlai Mawroh.
title: PYNGAT KYNDON KI PULIT ÏA 2 NGUT KI DKHOT KA KSU, 12 SNGI & 7 SNGI AIBOR KA KASHARI BAN TOHKIT

content: : Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ha ka sngi Balang ka la maham ïa ka sorkar ba kam dei shuh ban dang aiding da kaba kem ïa ki dkhot jong ka seng ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshah pynïap jong ki arngut ki bar jylla ha ka shnong Ichamati bad uwei u nongbylla misteri ha Mawlai Mawroh.U Issan Singh bad u Sudip Dutta ki la shah pynïap klep ha Ichamati bad Dalda ha ka 27 tarik, Lber katba u  Arjun Ray u la shah bom pynmynsaw ha ki runar ha ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai bad khladnoh ha NEIGRIHMS Hospital namar ka jingmynsaw jur.Haduh mynta, ki Pulit ki la kem haduh saw ngut ki dkhot jong ka KSU halor kine ki jingjia.Haba kynthoh halor ka jingshah pynïap jong u Lurshai Hynniewta ha Ichamati, u President ka KSU samla Lambokstarwell Marngar ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “ha ka por ba la shah pynïap u Lurshai Hynñiewta shano ki jah kita kiba donkti ban pynïap ïa une u samla. La shu ong ba la kem katta ngut hynrei ym tip shaei ki set bad ym ju pat ïohi hi ruh wat ïa ka dur ka dar bad kumba ïoh jingtip wurwur werwer kiba bun kiba donkti ban pynïap ïa u Lurshai ki la jah bad ki la phet shaei ngim tip.  Kane ka dei ka jingphiel jong ka Sorkar ba kan ym lah ban ai ïa ka jingbishar kaba hok.”“Pylleiñ pyllein kat kato ka jingjia ha Ichamati bad phi la ïohi lyngba ki video ki (bar jylla) rah da ki tiar ki tar hynrei ïa ki samla Khasi kynthup ïa ki dkhot ka KSU tang na ka jingsuba la shu tan bad shu pharep bad la pyngnat ha ki kyndon aiñ bapher bapher. Kam pher bad kam leilei ngim shym la rit mynsiem,” u la ong.“U kyrwoh na ka seng baroh kawei sha ki samla ka KSU kylleng ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep, to long skhem, long rangbah katba ki (Pulit) nang pyntyrha ngin nang khlaiñ bad katba ngi dang lah ban ïaishah ngin ïaishah beit.  Ynda la theh shi theh petrol ka Sorkar ai kan mat sa sngewthuh hi bad ba ka Sorkar kumno kan pynlip ïa ka ding,” la maham u President ka KSU.“Nangne shakhmat lada ka (Sorkar) dang ïai pyntyrha shi pyntyrha, ynda la kut ka jingïaishah jong ngi ruh ka por kan sa batai ïa kiei kiei baroh.  Ïa ki jingshah kynnoh bad shah pharep borabor ngi la shu ïai sngap bad ïaishah baroh shikatta. Ki don ki Agency jong ka Sorkar ba tang shu jia eiei ki la shu peitkhmat beit tang ïa ki dkhot jong ka KSU, ym tang ïa ki dkhot ka KSU hynrei la shu mareh ban kem ïa ki samla Khasi hynrei lada jia kano kano ka jingshah thombor jong ki Khasi ka aiñ ka pyrla ka noh shiliang,” la kynthoh u samla Marngar.“Lada ka Sorkar ka kwah ban ïalehkai bad ka kwah ban aiding ïa ki khun samla hapoh ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep, kita kiba bat ïa u lakam jong ka synshar ka khadar ki hap ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh. Kum ka seng ngi la ïaid lynti la 46 tylli ki snem bad kine ki jingjia kim long shuh kiba thymmai bad kam shym mut haba ngi kren ïa ki ishu bapher bapher kiba ktah ïa ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew bad khamtam kiba ktah ïa ki samla ha ka pule puthi kam shym mut ba phin shim ba ngi long ki diengpynkiang ban shu kynnoh kut ki jaitkam ba la jia,” u la ong.“Ngi sngewthuh ba ki (Pulit) ju pynngat ha ki kyndon ain bapher bapher ïa ki dkhot ka KSU haba don kino kino ki jingjia hynrei ka seng ka kwah ban ong lada ka Sorkar ka dang tak shi tak ha kine ki sngi ki ban wan ka Sorkar ka dei ban sngewthuh kaei ka ban sa jia nangne shakhmat.  Ngim shym la bamja khluit ïa kano kano ka kam, ngim shym la kwah ban pynmih ïa kano kano ka huri hura hynrei ngi ïohi ba ka Sorkar ka khot sngewbha ban mih ki kynrum kynram hapoh ka jylla baroh kawei,” la bynrap u nongïalam ka KSU.
title: BTENG KA JINGSHAH KEM KI DKHOT KA KSU, MAHAM U PRESIDENT ÏA KA SORKAR BAN YM AIDING

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Shillong Traffic Police (STP) ha ka sngi Balang ki la talasi kyndit ïa ki thuk thuk ar shaka ha IGP Point ki bym don ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang, ïa ki nongñiah ki bym don laisen, ïa ki thuk thuk kiba pyndait da ki Modified Silencer.Ka jingtalasi ïa kine ki thuk thuk ar shaka ka long hadien ba ka tnat Pulit ka la ïoh ujor halor ka larlar shaba palat jong ki nongñiah ar shaka kat haduh ba ka ju pynwit haduh katta katta ïa ki nongñiah kali bad ïa ki nongñiah ar shaka kiba ïaid ha la ka jong ka lynti katkum ka aiñ.Ha kane ka jingtalasi, ki Pulit ki la lap ïa ki thuk thuk bakynthup naduh ki Motor Bike bad ïa ki Scooty ki bym don ïa ka Registration Certificate, ki bym siew ïa ka Insurance, ki bym pyndait ïa ki Number Plate HSRP bad ïa kiba pyndait da ki Modifief Silencer.Ki Pulit ki la shu daiñ kuna ryngkat ka jingmaham ba kim bit satia ban pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon jong ka Motor Vehicle Act.U Superintendent of Police (Traffic) u K. Prasad ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ïathuh ba ha ka jingtalasi kali kaba ar sngi kynthih ki Pulit ki la ïoh lum haduh 2 lak tam na kaba dain kuna ïa ki nongpynkheiñ aiñ bad ong ruh ba ka tnat Pulit kan dang ïai bteng manla ka sngi ban talasi ïa ki thuk thuk ar shaka.
title: TALASI KI PULIT ÏA KI AR SHAKA HA IGP POINT, 2 LAK TAM ÏOH LUM KUNA

content: Ki nongïalam jong ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front, East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Balang ki la mudui da ka ejahar ha Sadar Police Station pyrshah ïa ki katto katne ki Kharmetor ba la kynnoh ba ki la thaw jingkulmar ha Saw Aiom Restaurant kaba don ha Iewduh ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha ka ejahar ba la soi da u President u Bah Stevenson Khyriem bad u Educational Secretary u Bah Orister Mawlong ki la kam ba ki katto katne ki Kharmetor ki la thaw jingkulmar ha kane ka Restaurant bad kyntait ruh ban siew ïa ka bai bam bad wanrah pynban da ki kynhun ki Kharmetor ban thombor ïa ki Khasi bad pynthud ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka imlang ka sahlang.Ka seng ka la dawa ïa ka tnat Pulit ban kem ïa kiba donkti bad ban pynshitom katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: JINGJIA HA SAW AÏOM RESTAURANT: DAWA KA HNYF BAN KEM ÏA KI KHARMETOR BA THAW JINGKULMAR

content: Haduh 340 tylli ki kuli siat liengsuiñ bym pat pynbthei bad saw tylli ki synduk thep kuli ki Pulit ki la ioh ban kurup na kawei ka khlaw ha South Garo Hills ha ka step sngi Palei.Ia kine ki kuli, la ioh kurup da ki Pulit jong ka Chokpot na ka jaka ba la tep hapoh khyndew hadien ba ki la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah na ka tyllong jingtip kaba thikna ba ki don ki synduk thep kuli ba la buhrieh da ki suba lehnoh ha kawei ka jaka khlaw ha ka shnong Chibokgre kaba hap hapoh ka Chokpot Police Station, South Garo Hills District, la iathuh ki Pulit.Mar mar, ki Pulit ba la lamkhmat da u Sub Divisional Police Officer ka Chokpot ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Circle Inspector ka Sadar, u Officer incharge jong ka Chokpot, u Incharge ka BDDS bad lai ngut ki Pulit langrut ki la leit sha kane ka jaka ha ka por kumba 1:15 baje mynstep ban pynlong ia ka jingwad ia ki kuli suloi ba la buhrieh bad dei tad haduh ka por kumba 3:27 baje mynstep ki Pulit ki la lap ia kine ki kuli na ka khlaw Chikbokgre.Ia kine ki kuli ba la kurup la rah noh sha thanat. Ka jingtohkit mynta ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: 340 TYLLI KI KULI SIAT LIENGSUIÑ KURUP KI PILIT HA SOUTH GARO HILLS

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Lumdiengjri Traffic branch kum shi bynta ban tehlakam ia ki ar shaka kiba pynkheiñ ia ki kyndon jong ka Motor Vehicle Act, ha ka sngi Palei ki la pynlong biang ia ka jingtalasi ia ki thuk thuk ar shaka ha Rilbong Point.Kane ka dei ka sien kaba lai ba ki Pulit ki la pynlong ia ka jingtalasi mynta ka taiew.Ki Pulit ki la talasi naphang ia ki nongñiah thuk thuk ar shaka ki bym don laisen, ia ki thuk thuk kiba pyndait da ki Modified Silencer bad khamtam ia kito kiba shu pyndait da ki Number Plate ba la shna hi bad kiba pyndait da ki Number Plate kiba rit bha bad ia kiba la weng noh ia ka Number Plate HSRP.Ka Shillong Traffic Police (STP) ka la ban jur ia ki nongniah ar shaka ba ki dei ban da phikir bha haba ñiah bad ba kim dei ban pynkheiñ ia ki kyndon jong ka Motor Vehicle Act, bad kim dei ban shu tur rakrak namarba ki surok ha nongbah Shillong ki long kiba khapngiah bha bad kiba dap da ki kali khamtam naduh ka por mynstep haduh ban da miet.Shuh shuh ki Pulit ki la maham ba kin dang iai pynjur shuh shuh ia ka jingtalasi ia ki thuk thuk ar shaka manla ka por namar ka jingioh kongujor na ki paidbah ba ki don bun ki ar shaka kiba ju mlien ban pynher bad kiba ju tur rak rak hapdeng surok bad na kyndong kynshrot bad kane ka la buh jingma ia ka jingim jong ki nongiaid nongieng.
title: WAT JU RAK RAK BAD PYNHER STED, MAHAM TYNGEH KI PULIT ÏA KI AR SHAKA

content: U Vishal Pandey uba dei u trai jong ka dukan Mobile Store JS Enterprise kaba don ha Laitumkhrah, Shillong kaba don markhap bad ka Laitumkhrah Police Station, ha ka sngi Baar mynta ka taiew u la mudui da ka ejahar ha ki Pulit jong ka Laitumkhrah Police Station ban pyntip ba ha ka 22 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por kumba 4:30 baje janmiet kawei ka Mobile iPhone kaba don ia u IMEI Number 35035561-9769676 ka la shah tuh napoh dukan.Ia ka jingshah tuh jong kane ka Mobile Phone la ioh ring dur lut nadong shadong lyngba ka CCTV Camera ba la pyndait hapoh kane ka dukan ha kaba la lah ban iohi shynna wat ia ka dur jong ki lai ngut ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam runar.Tang shu pynmih ia kane ka khubor ha ka YouTube Channel jong ka Batesi Tv, hapoh khyndiat kynta ki la don ki briew kiba la pyntip halor ka jingshah tuh na ka dukan jong ki.Ka kynhun lum khubor jong ka Batesi Tv kaba la leit ban iakynduh markhmat bad ki trai jong ka dukan kiba la ngat ha kane ka apot kaba la tip kyrtteng kum ka Esmasa Collection kaba don ha Laitumkhrah pyrshah bad ka Post Office kaba la long trai da ka Kong Koridian Wahlang.Ha jingiakren bad u Bah Joe Wahlang uba dei u khun jong ka Kong Koridian Wahlang u la iathuh ba ka jingshah tuh ka la jia ha ka 17 tarik Ïaïong, 2024 ha ka por 3:45 noh phai sngi bad u la iathuh ba kine ki lai ngut nongtuh ki dei kijuh ki briew kiba donkti ban tuh ia ka Mobile iPhone na ka dukan die mobile JS Enterprise kaba don ha Laitumkhrah.Na ka dukan Esmasa Collection ki lai ngut ki snar nonglute ki la tuh ia ki shatri ia kiba la lap da u trai uba la shu ai jingsneng ba kim dei shuh ban dang mlien ban tamti tamjat ia ki mar ki mata da kaba shu lute.
title: NA CCTV ÏOHI KYNDIANG ÏA KI SNAR NONGTUH KIBA TUH TIAR NA KI DUKAN

content: Ka NEEPCO Tribal Employees’ Welfare Association (NTEWA) ryngkat bad ka NEEPCO Women Welfare Association (NWWA), ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka jingkawang petrol bomb da ki runar ia ka kali jong ki Pulit kaba synran ia ka kali jong u Director (Personnel) Maj Gen RK Jha, AVSM(Retd.) ha ka miet sngi Balang ha ka thaiñ Demthring, kaba hap hapoh ka Madanrting Police Station.Katkum ka thymmei khubor ba la iohlum la iathuh ba kane ka la jia ha ka por kumba 7:25 baje katba ka kali kaba synran ia u Maj. Genl. Jha uba dang mih na ophis ban leit sha la iingsah kaba don ha Laitkor.La iathuh ba kane ka kali ba la shah kawang petrol bomb ka dei ka kali Thar kaba shong da ki Pulit kiba synran ia u Director (Personel) ka NEEPCO.  Mar mar, ki briew kiba don hapoh kane ka kali, ki la kloi ka pynlip noh ia ka ding.“U Maj. Gen. R.K Jha u dei uba don burom bad uba sngewrit, naduh ba u la trei ha NEEPCO, u dei uba ju trei shitom ban wanrah ia ki song pynroi jong ka NEEPCO bad kumjuh ruh ia ki skhim pynroi, kynthup ia ki projek ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka thain Shatei Lammiihngi.  U Maj Gen RK Jha (Retd.) u dei uba ju peit ruh na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki nongtrei riewlum jong kane ka thain bad kumjuh ruh jong ka nongbah Shillong,” ong kine ki ar tylli ki kynhun jong ki nongtrei ka NEEPCO ba la soi da u General Secretary ka NETWA u Bah Bobby V. Kharlyngdoh bad ka General Secretary jong ka NWWA ka Nikita Bareh.“Ngi pyrshah jur ia kane ka kam bymman kaba ktah ia ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya. Ngi kyntu ia ki bor synshar ba kin shimkhia mardor bad ban kem mardor ia ki nongleh kam bymman,”la ong shuh shuh kine ki ar tylli ki kynhun.
title: PYNREM KA NTEWA BAD NWWA BA SHAH KAWANG PETROL BOMB KA KALI BA SYNRAN ÏA U DIRECTOR KA NEEPCO

content: Ki nongialam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council, Seng Kmie ha ka sngi Palei kiba la ioh ujor, ki la leit jurip ia kawei ka jaka kaba la kylla Slum ha lyndet jong ka Them Iewmawlong kaba don ha khappud jong u pud u sam jong ka Shillong Cantonment Board (SCB) bad ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB).Ha kane ka jingjurip, ka seng ka la sakhi da la ki jong ki khmat ba ki briew ki shong ki sah ha kane ka Slum da kaba shu shna da ki iing tap shiliang bad ha kawei ka ïing kaba la shna ha ka jingheh ba tang 10 phut la shna ing ar lai kyrdan bad sah palat 20-30 ngut.“Hadien ba ngi la ioh ia ka jingujor na ki paidbah ba tang shu la kem dum bun ki briew (kiba sah ha kane ka slum) ki mih ban tyrwa drok ha surok. Ngi la ioh ujor ba ki bun kiba sah be-ain kiba ngim tip bad don kiba ong ba ki dei ki Ronghiya Muslim. Kane ka jaka ka dei kaba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Shillong Cantonment Board, ong u President ka HYC Bah Roy Kupar Synrem ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Tang ha ine i jaka barit, ym lah satia ban mutdur hapdeng ka sorkar ba kin don ki longing 90 haduh 100 ing. Kine ki briew, haba ngi tohkit, kim dei ki nongshong shnong jong kane ka jylla. Kim don wat ia ka EPIC, ki wan na kiwei ki jylla jong ka ri India,” u la ong.Ha  ka jingtohkit jong ka seng ia ki briew kiba sah ha kane ka jaka, ki la kam ba ki wan na ka Jylla Assam bad na Uttar Pradesh.“Ki la pynlong kum ka Slum.  Ka long long kum kawei ka Colony bad ka shnong ka barit jong kine ki phetwir, ki poiei kiba la pynlong kum ka jaka shongshngaiñ ha kane ka ri jong ngi,” u la ong.U la ong ruh ba ka seng kam kwah ba na kane ka jaka kin mih shibun ki jingma bad ki jingjia kiba lah ban lam sha ki jingjia ba sngewsih. “Kine ki briew kim don ia ki kot ki sla bad lada ki leh ia ki kam runar ngi thikna ba ki Pulit kin ym lah ban wad ia ki,” la ong shuh shuh u President ka HYC.Kaba kham phylla shuh shuh ka long haba ki dkhot ka HYC ki la tohkit ia kine ki briew, ki la phla ba kim shym la iohbor nangno nangno hynrei la ai wai da ki katto katne ki Harijan kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong bad hadien ka jingjia ha Them Iewmawlong ha u snem 2018 ym shym la shim shuh ia ka bai wai.Haba kynthoh ia ka jingbym iohi khmat jong ka Shillong Cantonment Board, u Bah Synrem u la ong, “kane ka jaka ka hap hapoh ka Shillong Cantonment Board hynrei kumno ka Cantonment kam tip ba ki don 90 haduh 100 tylli ki longing bad jingdon jong ki briew da ki spah ngut kim shym la leh eiei ia kiba sah ha kane ka jaka. Ngin sa leit ban iakynduh ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka Shillong Cantonment Board ban pynthikna ba dei ban weng ia kine ki briew na kane ka jaka.”“Ngi iohi ba ka Shillong Cantonment Board tang shu tampud sha ka jaka jong ka, ka la kloi ban pynpra bad ban shim ia kino kino ki sienjam ban pynpra ia ki jingtei hynrei kaba lyngngoh ka long ba ia kine ki jingtei hapdeng ka sor kam shym la pynpra bad ban beh ia ki briew kiba shong be-aiñ ha kane ka jaka. Ka jingdon jong kane ka Slum kaba isaitment haduh katta katta hapdeng jong ka sor Shillong kan wanrah ia ka jingbudnam bad ka jingpynthohbria ia ka sor Shillong,” u la bynrap.U la iathuh haba ka seng ka la tohkit ia kiba sah ha kane ka Slum naei ki ioh ban ring ia ka bording, ki la phla ba ki ring ia ka bording na kawei ka ing kaba la ioh ring ia ka bording ban pyndonkam lang ha ki 90-100 tylli ki ïing.“Ka jingkylli ka long ba ka MeECL ka leh aiu halor kane. Sha ki nongkyngdong tang shu lap ia ki paradoh parasnam jong ngi kiba slem ban siew ia ka bai thang bording ki kloi ban leit ot ia ka bording hynrei ia kine ki briew kiba shong hangne, ia kiba ma ngi kiba hap ban siew ia ka bai thang bording, ngi hap ban bah lang ia ka jingkit kaba ka MeECL ka iakynduh ba kim lah ban siew ia ka ram ka shah jong ka, hynrei ngi sngewkyndit ha kane ka jaka pat ki (MeECL) ai ei ia ka bording da ki phew phew snem,” la kynthoh u Bah Synrem.“Kaba lyngngoh ka long ba kine ki briew ki ong ba ki la sah hangne da ki phew snem.  Ka jingkylli ka long ba ka Sorkar, ka Shillong Cantonment Board, ka MeECL ki leh aiu halor kine?  Balei ka Sorkar ka matlah bad kam iohi ba kum kine ki briew ki don hangne?” la buh jingkylli u President ka HYC.U la ong ba ka seng kan sa leit ujor sha ka Shillong Cantonment Board bad ban dawa ba ka dei ban buh jingkhein ia baroh ki briew kiba sah be-aiñ ha kane ka Slum bad beh noh shisyndon bad bynrap ba ka seng kan sa leit ujor sha ka MeECL bad ban dawa ba ka dei ban ot noh ia ka bording ba la ai sha kine ki briew.“Lada ka Shillong Cantonment Board kam leh eiei, ngin sa leit ban iakynduh ia ka Sorkar ba kan leh eiei halor kane namarba kine ki briew kin buh jingma ia ka jylla jong ngi,” ula ong bad iathuh shuh shuh, “ha ka por ba ngi rung ha kane ka jaka, tang shu iohi ia ngi, kiba ju mlien ban die drok ki phet na kane ka jaka. Ngi sngewthuh ba kane ka jaka ka dei ka ktem die drok bad ka ktem jong ki kam sniew kiba jia ha kylleng ne hajan kane ka jaka. Ia ka kyrteng jong ki (suba nongdie drok), ngi la ioh bad ngin sa buddien lyngba ka tnat kaba peit ia ka jingkhaii drok be-aiñ khnang ba ki nongkhaïi drok kim dei ban iohlad ban sah ha kane ka jaka.Haba kylli, u la iathuh ba ki briew kiba sah beain ha kane ka slum, ki dei kiba shu im da kaba tam bilor, tam tin jot katba ki don pat ki shynrang kiba trei bylla, trei misteri bad don ruh kiba kam ba ki dei kiba trei ha Municipal bad ha ki dukan.
title: MIH KA SLUM HA LYNDET KA THEM IEWMAWLONG, 20-30 NGUT KIBA SAH HA KA ÏING BA HEH TANG 10 PHUT

content: Ka Sports Cell jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la pynpaw ia ka jingkyndit hadien ba ka la ioh jingtip ba ka Directorate of Sports & Youth Affairs jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la jied haduh 7 ngut ki khyllah jait napdeng ki 12 ngut ki nongialehkai Basketball ki ban mihkhmat ia ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka Basketball National School Games ka ban long ha Haryana.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Chairman ka Sports Cell, Khasi Students’ Union, samla Eric A. Nongkynrih, ka seng ka la ong, ha ka thup ki nongialehkai la jied tang 5 ngut ki trai jylla katba ki 7 ngut ki dei kiba nabar, kata ki bym dei ki Khasi ne Garo.“Kane ka jingleh shiliang khmat jong ka Sorkar Jylla ia ki khynnah lehkai Khasi ka wanrah ia ka jingkylli hato ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka dei ban kyntiew ia ki Khasi (Khynriam, Pnar, Bhoi, War, Maram & Lyngngam) bad Garo ne ban ai rynsan ban kyntiew ia kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew bym dei trai shnong,” la buh jingkylli ka KSU.Ka Sports Cell jong ka KSU ka pynrem jur ia kane ka jingleh beiñ bad jingbym kheiñ snep ka sorkar Meghalaya ia ki khynnah Khasi kiba don sap ban thrang ban ia lehkai basketball. Ka KSU ka buh jingkylli hato ka Meghalaya ka rhah tang ban ioh ka nam jop da kaba wanrah da ki nongialehkai ba nabar ne ka thrang ban kyntiew ia ki khynnah ka jylla khnang ba kin kiew shuh shuh ha ki jingialehkai bapher bapher, ong u kyrwoh na ka KSU.“Kane ka jingleh thurmur ka sorkar kan pynduh mynsiem bad pynduh lad ia bun ngut ki samla kiba angnud bad don sap ban ialehkai ia ka Basketball.  Ka Sports Cell ka kyntu ia ki khynnah Khasi ban ym duh jingkyrmen wat haba la shah leh meinah ha ka Sorkar Jylla namar ka seng kan iai wad ki lad ki lynti ban ai rynsan ia ki bad kumjuh ruh ban peit pyrman ba kin ym duh ia ka hok ka jong ki na ka Sorkar,” pynkut u kyrwoh.
title: 7 NGUT KI KHYLLAH JAIT JIED KA SORKAR BAN MIHKHMAT HA KA BASKETBALL NATIONAL SCHOOL GAMES HA HARYANA

content: Ka jingialang ban thawlad ban ioh ka jingiatreilang kaba jan hapdeng ka India-France -Meghalaya halor kiba bun ki tnad treikam khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka Sports Training, Coaching, Talent Identification, Sports Tourism bad ban nang pyniaid shakhmat ki jingiajan ki jingiapynbeit ha kiwei kiwei ki tnad treikam ka la long bad u Chargé de mission/Cooperation officer, Consulate General of France, Kolkata u Samuel Bouchard bad u Commissioner and Secretary jong ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs ka Sorkar Jylla u Dr Vijay Kumar D. Sports ha Main Secretariat, Shillong ha ka sngi Balang.Ha kane ka jingialang la sakhi lang da u Working President jong ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) Bah John F Kharshiing, u Adviser Sports Bah Lanu Ignatius.Ha ka jingiakren, u Samuel Bouchard u la ai jingkyrmen ba ka Sorkar France ka don ka jingthrang ban don ka jingiatreilang kaba jan ha ki tnad treikam bapher bapher bad ki kloi ban pynlong ki jingiakren ban ioh ka  (joint collaboration) ha ka Talent Identification, Training, Coaching bad katto katne ki jingialehkai kum ka Athletics, Archery, Aquatics, Basketball Badminton bad katto katne ki contact Sports,  kum ka Boxing, Judo, karate, taekwondo, bad Football, Gymnastics, Table Tennis, Lawn Tennis, Shooting,  Weightlifting, Wrestling bad kiwei kiwei khamtam namar ka jylla Meghalaya ka don hapoh ka jingpynkhreh ban pynlong ia ka National Games lehse ha u snem 2026.Utei u heh na ka Ri France u la ai ksai bad khot sngewbha ia ki bor (joint delegation) pyniaid na ka  Meghalaya State Olympic Association bad Department of Sports ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban leit hi sha France ban ioh ki jingiateh ki jingiapynbeit kiba kham bniah khamtam ha ki katto katne ki kam kilan met.La don ka jingiakren kaba bniah bha ha kaba la pyntip ia u heh ka Ri France halor ka jingpyrshang kaba kyrpang bad ka sien nyngkong hapoh Ri India da ka jylla Meghalaya ban sei ki sap jong ki samla lyngba ka talent Identification, Elite Pathway Program (EPP) bad ka Super Elite Pathway Program (SEPP) ia kaba la pyntreikam lang da ka MSOA bad DSYA hapoh ka jingkhmih u Ian Campbell OLY na Ri Australia ia kaba u heh na ka ri France u la pynpaw ka jingsngew ban iatreilang khnang ban ioh ban wad ia ki sap ha kylleng ki kyndong skul jong ka jylla.Hadien ka jingiakren kaba jrong la mynjur ban pruid dak ia ki thong (draft framework of objectives) na ka bynta ban sngewthuh kumno ban iaid shakhmat ha ki jingiatreilang ( joint collaboration on sports) ha ki kam kilan met bad ban phah ia katei ka jingaijingmut sha ka Sorkar Meghalaya ba kin ioh ban nang pyniaid pynbit pynbiang bad ban pynjanai ia ki jingiateh hapdeng ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ki bor ka Ri France.
title: THAWLAD KA SORKAR MEGHALAYA BAN KYNTIEW ÏA KA SPORTS DA KABA ÏATREILANG BAD KA FRANCE

content: Uwei u rangbah Garo u la shah kem hajan khappud Assam-Meghalaya ha ka shnong Dudhnoi bad ka pisa thok.Ïa une u rangbah Garo la tip kyrteng kum u Songsakar Golbin Momin (30 snem ka rta), uba dei u nongshong shnong jong ka East Garo Hills District, Meghalaya.Ki paidbah ha iew Damra, Dudhnoi ki la ïathuh ba ki la bat ïa u Momin ryngkat bad ki lut pisa thok katba u dang pyrshang ban thied kwai. Hadien kane, ki la aiti noh ïa u sha ki Pulit.Ïa ki lut pisa 500 thok la kurup noh da ki Pulit kiba don haduh T. 1,41,000 lak.
title: RYNGKAT KI LUT 500 THOK SHAH KEM U RANGBAH GARO HA ASSAM

content: Uwei u nongialam jong ka kynhun ki Gang uba la tip kyrteng kum u Rudra Rabha u la pynkut ia la ka jong ka jingim ha ka byndi ha Khanapara Police Station ha ka step sngi Thohdieng.Ia u Rudra Rabha la pynngat hapoh ka Section 379/401/511/307/34 IPC pule lang bad ka Section 27 (2) jong ka Arms Act ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police jong ka Ribhoi u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa u la pyntip ba ki Pulit ki la rah ban tian bishar ia u Rudra ha Kashari ha ka 25 tarik mynta u bnai ha kaba ka Kashari ka la aibor ia ki Pulit ban set along san sngi kynthih na ka bynta ba kin ioh tohkit bniah pyrshah ia u.Ha ka jingtohkit, u Rudra Rabha u la phla ha ki Pulit ba u la buhrieh ia kawei ka suloi shna hi ha kawei ka khlaw bad  ialam ruh ia ki pulit ban leit shimti ia ki tiar siat sha ka jaka ba u la buhrieh.U Superintendent of Police u la iathuh ba ia ki tiar siat la kurup da ki Pulit na kawei ka jaka khlaw ha ka shnong Ranibari ha ryngkat ka jingdon jong ki nongsakhi.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ba hadien ba la pyndep ia ki jingtohkit ha ka jaka ba la ioh kurup ia ki tiar siat ia u Rudra la ialam biang sha Khanapara Police Station ha ka por 1.05
