baje mynstep jong ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai bad la set ia u ha ka along jong ka Khanapara PS namarba ka Rani Jirang Border Out Post kam don satia ia ka along.Hynrei ha ka 26 tarik Iaiong, ha ka por kumba 4:00 baje mynstep, u nongap pahara uba dang don ha ka kamram u la lap ia u Rudra Rabha ba u la phasi ia lade ha along jong ka Khanapara Police Station da kaba pyndonkam ban teh da ki jain ha ki nar jong ka along ia kiba u la tar na ka jain siang thiah, la iathuh shuh shuh u SP.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, u Executive Magistrate ba la phah da ka ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi District u la shimti ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Medical Officer ha kaba la ring dur lyngba ka video bad shondur ruh ia ka jingjia hapoh kane ka along.Shuh shuh u SP u la pyntip ba la register biang ia ka Case ha Nongpoh Police Station haph ka Section 304 (A) IPC bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: PHASI ÏALADE U NONGIALAM KI GANG HA ALONG KI PULIT KHANAPARA PS

content: Ka Jaiñtia National Council (JNC) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ban weng noh ia ka Check-post jong ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) na Sonapyrdi bad ban pynkynriah ia ki sha khappud jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District bad ka ri Bangladesh.Ha ka dorkhas ba la aiti ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba peit ia ka tnat Kam Pohing Bah Prestone Tynsong, ki nongialam jong ka Council ki la dawa ia ka Sorkar ban pynkhlaiñ ia ka Anti-Infiltration Check Gate ha East Jaiñtia Hills District.Kane ka jingdawa jong ka seng ban pynkynriah ia ki shipai BSF na Sonapur ka long hadien ba ki la mih ki jingjia bapher bapher bad ki jingshah pyndik ba laiphewjait jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong ha ki shipai BSF.“Ngi dawa ia ka Sorkar ban pynkynriah lut sha khappud ia ki Check Post jong ki shipai BSF kiba don ha ha Sonapyrdi, Umbluh, Dona kaba ki shipai ki ju pynlong ia ki jingtalasi kali manla ka sngi,” ong u President ka JNC Sambormi Lyngdoh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingiakynduh ia u Bah Prestone.“Ki shipai BSF kim shym la lah ban pyndep ia la kamram ba la bynshet ha ki.  Kim shym la lah ban ai jingiada ia ki paidbah kiba im ba sah ha ki shnong khappud na ka jingprongtuh jong ki nong Bangladesh kumba la sakhi ia ka jingshah pyniap ba dang shen hajan ka shnong Umkiang ha kaba u Bah Sylvanus Dhar u la duhei ia la ka jong ka jingim bad dang shen ki nong Bangladesh ki la kawang da ki maw ia ki nong India bad pynsaphriang ia ka jingjia ha ka Social Media.  Ki shipai BSF kim shym la lah ban tehlakam ia ka jingrung beain jong ki mynder na ka ri Bangladesh shapoh ka District ban leh ia ki kam runar,” la ong u Bah Sambormi.Ka la pyntip ruh halor ka jingioh ujor na ki nongshong shnong ha kaba ki ju iathuh ba ki shipai BSF ki rung sha ki shnong ki thaw ban talasi naphang ia ki kali bad tang ki trai shnong kiba shah pynlong sohpdung ha ki shipai BSF.“Dang shen ha ka shnong Sonapyrdi ha ka 20 tarik, Iaiong, 2024 ki shipai BSF ki la shoh pynmynsaw ia ki lai ngut ki samla na ka shnong Thangskai bad Lum Tongseng bad pynjulor ruh ia ki kali jong ki,” u la ong.Ka Seng ka la kyrpad ia ka Sorkar ban pynkynriah mardor ia ki shipai BSF sha khappud khnang ban tehlakam ia kino kino ki jingjia kiba lah ban mih hadien habud.Shuh shuh u Bah Sambormi u la iathuh ba ka jingdawa ia ka Sorkar ban pynkhlain ia ka Anti-infiltration Check Gate  ha East Jaiñtia Hills ka long namar ka jinglaitlan ha khyrdop talasi mynder (Entry-Exit Point) kaba don ha Ratacherra.“Ngi la iakren bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ban pynkhlaiñ ia ka jingtalas ha ki Entry-Exit Point ha East Jaintia Hills khnang ban khanglad ia ka jingrungtuh jong ki mynder ri ha ka por mynmiet.  Namar ka jingbym don jong ki Pulit kiba iaid pahara ha ka por mynmiet ia ki nongrung beain ym shym la lah satia ban iohkem,” ula ong.U la ong ba ka jingrung kyrthep jong ki mynder ri shapoh ka East Jaiñtia Hills District kan wanrah ia ka jingkylla ha ka jingbun briew bad kan ktah ruh wat ia ka iohkam iohjam jong ki trai shnong namar ka jingpyntreikam dang shen ia ka Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) hapoh ka ri bad kane kan buh jingman shuh shuh ia ki nongshong shnong trai jylla lada ki mynder ri na ka ri Bangladesh kin dang iai bteng ka jingrung beain shapoh ka District.
title: DAWA KA JNC ÏA KA SORKAR JYLLA BAN WENG ÏA KA CHECK-POST KI BSF NA SONAPYRDI

content: Uwei u Transformer uba don ha Lumshatsngi (Bishnupur) u la bthei bad kem ding kynsan ha ka step Lah Sngi u Blei ha ka por kumba 10:00 baje mynstep.Ka jingklang jong ki thylliej ding hapoh ka jaka ba la buh ia u Transformer ka la pynher syrngiew lut ia ki nongshong shnong bad ki paidbah kiba shong basah marjan bad kane ka jaka ba la buh ia u Transformer.Ki bor pyniaid shnong tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia, ki la pyntip noh marmar sha ki bor ba dei peit jong ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) ban phah pynlip ia ka bording khnang ba kan ym mih kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih bad ha kajuh ka por la pyntip ruh sha ki Pulit jong ka tnat Fire and Emergency Service (F&ES) ba kin pynlip ia ka ding kaba klang.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum la iathuh kam shym la don satia kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih na ka jingbthei bad ka jingkem ding jong une u Transformer.
title: BTHEI BAD KEM DING U TRANSFORMER HA LUMSHATSNGI

content: : Kawei ka trok kit jri kaba don ïa u Number JK05-H-0666 ka la kem ding kynsan ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei katba ka dang ïeng harud surokbah National Highway Fourlane ha ka shnong Jyntru, Ri Bhoi District.Kane ka la jia ha ka por kumba 2:00 baje noh phai sngi bad katkum ka jingïathuh jong u nongñiah jong kane ka trok la ong ba ia ka daw jong ka jingkem ding ka kali ym pat lah satia ban tip bad la shu suba ba ka lah ban dei na ka jingthud jong ki Wire ne ka Short Circuit.Ha kane ka jingjia u nongbud jong ka trok u la shu mynsaw malu mala katba u nongñiah u la lait thaw na ka jingmynsaw hadien ba u la mih kloi kloi napoh ka trok.Tang hapdeng katto katne por, ki Pulit jong ka tnat Fire and Emergency Service (F&ES) Ribhoi District ki la wan poi ha kane ka jaka ban pynlip ia ka ding kaba la klang ishyrkhei bha ha surok.Ka jingklang ba shyrkhei jong ki thylliej ding ka la pynher syrngiew lut ia ki nongleit nongwan kiba la sakhi ia kane ka jingjia.
title: KYLLA DPEI KA TROK NA KA JINGBAMDUH KI THYLLIEJ DING HA JYNTRU, RIBHOI DISTRICT

content: : Ka Shillong Traffic Police (STP) kaba la pynlong ia ka jingtalasi ia ki kali bad ki thuk thuk ar shaka naduh ka 22 tarik haduh ka 28 tarik, Iaiong, 2024 ha kylleng ki bynta jong ka Sor Shillong ka la iohlum pisa na ka jingdain kuna kaba kot T.6,78,00 hajar namar ka jingbun jong ki briew kiba pynkheiñ ia ki kyndon jong ka aiñ ñiah kali lane ka Motor Vehicle Act.U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills Rituraj Ravi ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei u la pyntip ba ha kine ki hynñiew sngi ba ki Pulit ki la pynlong ia ka jingtalasi kali, ki la lap ba ki don haduh 684 tylli ki jingpynkheiñ ia ki kyndon ñiah kali, kata, kum ka jingñiah kali ha ka por ba la buaid khawyiang, ka jingpyndait ia ki Modified Exhaust Pipes ha ki thuk thuk bad kiwei kiwei.Ka Shillong Traffic Police (STP) ka la kyrpad ruh ia ki paidbah ba kin long kiba phikir bha haba ki ñiah kali bad ban bud pyrkhing ia ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.U SP u la pyntip ba ka tnat Pulit kan sa nang iai bteng ban pynlong ia ka jingtalasi ia ki kali bad ia ki thuk thuk ar shaka khnang ban pynthikna ba ka jingñiah kali bad thuk thuk long kaba shngaiñ ha ki surok.
title: BA BUN KI NONGPYNKHEIÑ AIÑ ÑIAH KALI, 6 LAK TAM ÏOH LUM KUNA KA STP

content: Ka Hynniewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynkynriah beit thik tang ia ki 195 tylli ki longïing sha ki Quarter ba la shna da ka Sorkar Jylla, namar katkum ka jinglap jong ka seng lyngba ka jubab RTI ba la ioh pdiang na ka Shillong Municipal Board (SBM) ki 147 tylli ki longïing kim dei satia kiba trei ha ki tnat treikam bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar.Kane ka jingdawa jong ka seng ka long hadien ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la rai ban shong ia ka jingialang kaba khatduh bad ki nongmihkhmat jong ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HYC) ha ka 7 tarik, Jymmang, 2024 ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynkynriah ia ki briew kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President jong ka Hynniewtrep Youths Council Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la iathuh ba wat u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bah Prestone Tynsong uba dei ruh u Chairman jong ka High Level Committee ruh u dang pyrkhat ba ki 342 tylli ki longing ha Them Iewmawlong ki dei ki nongtrei jong ka Municipal.“Ka jingiakynduh jong ngi ia u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka long ba ka Sorkar na ka por sha ka por ka pynmih ia ito i kyntien ba ong, ‘342 tylli ki longing’ yn sa pynkynriah na Them Iewmawlong sha kano kano ka jaka ba ka Sorkar ka ladep ban mang kyrpang bad yn shna ruh ia ki jaka sah ban ai sha kine ki 342 tylli ki longiing,” ong u Bah Synrem.“Ka Seng naduh kaba sdang ka ieng halor ka nongrim ba ka Sorkar ka lah ban jaka sah ne ki Quarter ia ki nongtrei jong ka ngim don jingeh, hynrei ngi la pynpaw naduh kaba sdang, ba kito ki briew kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong ki bym dei ki nongtrei jong ka Sorkar, ka Sorkar kam dei ban dei ban ai ia ka jaka, namarkata, kan long be-aiñ,” la ong u Bah Synrem.U la iathuh katkum ka jubab RTI ba la ioh na ka Shillong Municipal Board, ka pynpaw ba ki don tang 195 tylli ki longiing kiba trei hapoh ka Municipal bad ha kiwei kiwei ki tnat treikam jong ka Sorkar katba 147 tylli kiwei pat ki dei kiba shu trei Security Guard, ki nongshong dukan, ki nongtrei nongsngewbha, ki nongialam niam bad ki bym dei satia ki nongtrei hapoh ki tnat treikam jong ka Sorkar.“Kaba lyngngoh ka long ba ynda la iakren bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u pynpaw ia ka jingsngew lynngoh ba kine ki 342 tylli ki longiing ki dei ki nongtrei jong ka Municipal bad ha kiwei kiwei ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar. Haba ngi pynpaw ia ka RTI ba la ioh na ka Municipal u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew lynngoh namarba katkum ka Affidavit ba ka Shillong Municipal Board ka la phah sha ka Ingbishar High Court ba ki 342 tylli ki longing ki dei ki nongtrei jong ka Municipal,” la iathuh u nongialam ka HYC.“Ka jingkylli ka long mano ba thok mynta,” la buh jingkylli u Bah Synrem.“Katkum ka RTI ba ngi pan na ka Municipal bun na ki Colunm ba ki shu ieh suda bad kim iathuh ba ki (342 tylli ki longing ki trei haei haei), don pat kiba la thoh Private Service, don kiba la thoh Religious and Social Worker. Kane ka mut ba kim dei ki nongtrei jong ka Sorkar. Lada ka Municipal, hakhmat u Symbud Myntri Rangbah bad hakhmat ka Ingbishar ka ong ba ki 342 tylli ki longing ki dei ki nongtrei jong ka Sorkar katba ha ngi pat ki jubab ba ki 147 na ki 342 tylli kim dei satia ki nongtrei sorkar.,” la iathuh shuh shuh u nongialam Seng.“Ngi la kren da kaba shai lyngba ka jingthoh lada ai jaka ia kiba shu shong thap ngin ym ailad daleilei ruh,” la maham une u nongialam ka HYC.U la iathuh ba u Symbud Myntri Rangbah un sa khot jingialang ia ki ophisar jong ka Shillong Municipal Board bad ia ka tnat Pynroi Sor ban pan jingpynshai ba haei ka bakla, la ka bakla ka Affidavit ba la ai jubab da ka Municipal hapoh ka Ingbishar lane ka bakla ka RTI ba ka Municipal ka ai jubab sha ka Seng.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ba ka Seng ka la dawa hakhmat u Symbud Myntri Rangbah nangne shakhmat lada lait kam hapoh ka Shillong Municipal Board dei ban khot da ka Advertisement.
title: U DY.CM U DANG MUT BA KI 342 ÏING HA THEM ÏEWMAWLONG KI DEI KI NONGTREI MUNICIPAL

content: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba peit ia ka tnat Kam Pohing Bah Prestone Tynsong ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la bthah ia u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District u SC Sadhu ba un khot jingialang ia ka Shillong Cantonment Board, ia ka tnat Pulit bad ia kiwei kiwei pat ki tnat treikam na ka bynta ban iakren sani ha kaba iadei bad ka jingmih ka Slum ha Lum Surve, ha lyndet Them Iewmawlong.Dang shen ka HYC kaba la leit jurip ia kane ka Slum ka la lap ba ki don palat 80 tylli ki iing kiba la shna beain da ki poiwir kiba wan nabar ka jylla bad ring tuh ia ka bording.  Shisngi hadien kane, ki nongtrei jong ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) ki la leit ot noh ia ka bording jong kine ki longing bad lap ruh ba dei na ka dukan Ajmera Marbles ba la sam be-aiñ ia ka bording sha kine ki ing ba don ha kane ka Slum.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka HYC ba la lamkhmat da u President Bah Roy Kupar Synrem ka la aiti da ka jingthoh ban dawa ia ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban weng noh ia ki briew kiba sah beain ha kane ka Slum.“Ngi la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla bad u la bthah ia u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ba un khot da ka jingialang ia ka Shillong Cantonment Board, ia ka tnat Pulit bad ia kiwei kiwei pat ki tnat treikam khnang ban iathir iatai halor ka jingmih jong ka Slum,” la ong u Bah Synrem ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Ka jingdawa jong ka seng ka long ban weng beit ia ki briew kiba sah beain ha kane ka jaka (jong ka Cantonment) kaba dang don hapdeng ka jingialeh mukotduma namarba na kane ka jaka ki mih ki kam sniew, ki kam runar bad ki kam khaii drok bad ngi sngewkhia bha haduh katta katta ia ka jingdon jong kine ki briew,” u la ong.“Lashai ka sngi (Baar) u DC un sa khot jingialang ha ka por 3:00 baje nohsngi ia ka Shillong Cantonment Board, ia ka tnat Pulit bad ia kiwei kiwei pat ki tnat treikam,” la iathuh u Bah Synrem.“Ngin ap katto katne por namarba ngi kwah ba kine ki briew ba sah beain kin mih na kane ka jaka. Lada ki bor Sorkar kim shimkhia da lade hi ngin hap ban leit weng ia kito kiba beain. Ia mynta ngin ap ap shwa ia ka jubab ba ioh na ka Cantonment bad na Sorkar,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Synrem.
title: ISHU POIWIR HA LUM SURVEY: BTHAH U DY. CM ÏA U DC BAN ÏAKREN ÏA KA SCB BAD PULIT

content: : U Deputy Commisioner jong ka East Khasi Hills u SC Sadhu ha ka sngi Baar u la pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC kaba mana tyngeh ia kino kino kiba wiang ding ia ki khlaw ki btap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka East Khasi Hills.“La pyntip ba ki la don bun ki jingjia pluh ding ha kiba bun ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka East Khasi Hills District.  Namarkata, la lap ba ka jingmlien ban wiang ding ia ki khlaw ki btap ka la ktah shikatdei eh ia ki sawdong sawkun jong ka mariang kaba pynmih ia ka lyer jaboh bad kaba pynjulor ia ki jingthung jingtep, ki khlaw ki btap, bad kaba buh jingma ruh ia ki briew bad ia ki nongkynti jong ki paidbah,” la ong u DC ha ka hukum.“Namarkata, da kaba pyntreikam ia ka itkiar ba la pynkupbor hapoh ka Section 144 CrPC, bad ban iada ia ka jingim bad ia ki jingdon jingem bad ban iada na kino kino ki jingjia ba sngewsihi, la pynjari ia kane ka hukum kaba mana ban thang ia ki phlang, ia ki dieng ki siej bad kiwei kiwei, ha ki khlaw ki btap bad ha ki jaka phla, ha ki Park, ha ki jaka thung jingthung, ha ki jaka shrah bad ban thang ia ki khlaw, ha ki jaka kiba hap hapoh ka East Khasi HIlls Distirct.  Namar ka jingdonkam kyrkieh, kane ka hukum kan treikam mardor tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.
title: PYNJARI U DC DA KA SECTION 144 CrPC BAN MANA ÏA KIBA THANG KHLAW

content: Ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka thaiñ 4mer Shiteng, Upper Shillong ki la her mynsiem hadien ki la iohi ia ka jingpur ki thylliej ding barhem shajan ki ingsah jong ki na ka khlaw kaba don markhap.Ki paidbah ki la iathuh ba ka jingkem ding ka la sdang na Sohbir naduh ka sngi u Blei bad dei tad haduh ka step sngi Baar ha ka por kumba 11:30 baje mynstep ba ka ding ka la sdang ban pur shajan sha kane ka shnong ha kaba ki paidbah ki la hap ban mih na la ki jong ki iing ki sem ban pynlip ia ka ding.Namar ka jingpaswut kaba jur jong ka lyer bad na ka jingrang tyrkhong jong ka suiñ bneng, ki thylliej ding la pur stet bha.Shwa ba ka ding kan pur sha ki ing jong ki briew, ki Pulit bad ki kali pynlip ding jong tnat Fire and Emergency Services ki la wan poi biang por ban tem ia ka jingkhlang jong ka ding shwa ban mih kino kino ki jingjia ba sngewsih.Ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, katto katne ki bynta jong ka khlaw Golflink ha surok kaba mih na Golf Club sha Polo.Ki jingpluh jong kane ka khlaw baroh arliang surok ka la pynmih ruh ia ka tdem jaboh kaba la pynsuhsat haduh katta katta ia ki nongleit nongwan kiba iaid lyngba na kane ka law bniap.Da ka jingkloi jong ki Pulit CRPF la lah ban pynlip noh ia ka ding kaba la klang shwa ba kan pur sha ki ing bad ki dukan kiba don hajan kane ka khlaw.
title: PUR KI THYLLIEJ DING NA SOHBIR SHA KHLAW 4MER SHITENG, HER MYNSIEM KI PAIDBAH

content: Na ka daw ka jingkiew palat jong ka jingshit kaba la ktah ïa ka jylla baroh kawei, ka sorkar ka la pynmih ïa ka hukum ba bthah ïa ki skul ba kim dei ban shah ïa ki khynnah ban mih shabar ne ban pynlong ïa ki prokram shabar ki skul.Katkum ka kyrwoh na u Director ka School Education and Literacy ka Jylla u Swapinil Tember IAS u la ong ba ki prokram bad ki sports ym shah ban pynlong na ka daw jong ka jingkiew palat ka jingshit ha kine ki sngi, ki skul ki dei ban don ka um kaba biang ha ki skul khnang ba ki khynnah, ki nongtrei bad kiwei kin ïoh ban dih ïa ka sngi lada ki sngewtyrkhong.La bthah ruh ïa ki khynnah skul ban wanrah ki bilor um ban dih, ki ORS ne ka um sohjew.La bhah ruh ïa ki khynnah ba kim dei ban shah sngi naduh ka por 12 baje nohphai sngi haduh ka 3 baje janmied ki khynnah kim dei ban mih bad ban kiar na ka jingshah sngi. Ïa ki khynnah dei ban phah pyndonkam da ki tupia bad ki shatri haba ki wan bad mih na ki skul.La bthah ruh ba ki khynnah kim dei ban ïaid da ki kjat lane ha ki jaka ba don ka jingshit ha madan skul. La bthah ruh ba kadei ban don ka jingïatreilang bad ki bor pynïaid skul bad ki bor sorkar khnang ba ki khynnah skul kin lait na kino kino ki jingeh bad ki jingïohpang.La bthah ïa ki bor pynïaid skul ban don ka jingïatreilang ba ki bor sumar kiba don hajan ki skul khnang ban pynlong ïa ki khynnah kiba lait na ka jingïohpang.
title: WAT PYNLONG SPORTS, BTHAH KA DSEL ÏA KI SKUL NA JINGSHIT KYRANG KA SNGI

content: Ar tylli ki kali kiba la pynieng ha phyllaw jong ka Police Reserve, Jowai, West Jaintia Hills District ki la shah wiang ding ha ki briew kiba ym lah ban ithuh ha ka step sngi Baar.Kine ki artylli ki kali kiba la shu julor ki long ka Bus jong ki Pulit kaba don ia u Number ML-02-1873 bad kawei pat ka dei ka kali Gypsy shimet jong uwei u Pulit.Ha kane ka jingshah wiang ding, ka kali Gypsy ka la ingkhong lut katba ka Bus ka la julor tang na ki bynta ba shakhmat.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit ban lapdien ia kiba donkti ha kane ka kam.
title: SHAH WIANG DING AR TYLLI KI KALI HA POLICE RESERVE, JOWAI, INGKHONG KA  GYPSY

content: Tang hapoh 24 kynta ba ki nongïalam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ki la leit jurip kyndit ïa ka Slum ba la sah be-aiñ da ki poiwir ha ka jaka jong ka Shillong Cantonment Board (SCB) kaba don ha lyndet jong ka Them Iewmawlong, ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) ka la phah ïa ki nongtrei ban ot noh ïa ka bording na ki ïing ba la shu ring tuh ha kane ka jaka.Katba ki nongtrei jong ka MeECL ki dang jynrat lut ïa ki waïar elektrik na ki ing tap shiliang ha kane ka Slum, la synran lang da ki Pulit bad ki CRPF.Ki don kumba 86 tylli ki ïing ba la shna beaiñ da ki poiwir kiba kam ba ki dei na ka jylla Assam bad don ruh kiba wan na ka jylla Uttar Pradesh. Ka jingring tuh ïa ka bording ka la jia mynta da ki phew snem namarba ym shym la don mano mano ruh ba ïohi ïa ka jingmih jong kane ka Slum hapdeng ka sor Shillong.Tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba la jynrat ïa ki waïar elektrik, nongtrei jong ka MeECL ki la lap ba dei ka dukan Ajmera Marbles kaba la ai tuh ïa ka bording sha ki ing jong ki poiwir. Tang shu lap, ki nongtrei ki la ot noh ïa ka laiñ ba la ai bording sha ki ing jong ki poiwir.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President ka HYC Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la ong ba ka MeECL ka dei ban thung da ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap ïa kiba donkti ban ai tuh ïa ka bording sha ki iing tap shiliang jong ki poiwir la ka long ïa ki longing kiba ai tuh ïa ka bording ne ïa u Lineman ne u Meter Reader.“Lada lap ba ki don bynta lang ban ai tuh ïa ka bording ka MeECL ka dei ban shimkam halor ki briew kiba donkti,” u la ong.“Ngi ai khublei ïa ka jingshimkhia jong ki ophisar ka MeECL tang shu mih ka khubor halor ka jingjurip jong ngi hynnin ka sngi mynta ka step ki la wan ot ïa ka bording jong kine ing ba la ring tuh.  Ngi sngewsih ban ong ba ki bor sorkar ki kyndit bynriew tad ynda ba ma ngi kum ka seng ngi pyni ïa ki jingduna jong ki hynrei ha ka jingshisha kam dei shuh ka kamram jong ngi ban dang kyntu ïa ki ban leh la ka jong ka kamram,” u la ong.U la kyntu ïa ka MeECL ba nangne shakhmat ba kumno kim lah ban ïohi da ki spah tylli ki iing ki tuh ïa ka bording. “Katkum ka jingïohi jong ngi, ngi lap ba kine ki briew ki ring ïa ka bording na ki Meter.  U Meter Reader uba ka MeECL ka phah ban shim jingkheiñ ïa ka bai thang bording hato u leh aiu,” la buh jingkylli u President ka HYC.“Ngi la ïoh ban ïakren bad u SDO (Revenue) uba peit ïa kane ka jaka jong ka MeECL ha kaba ngi la buh jingkylli balei u Meter Reader um lah ban peit ïa ka jingring tuh ïa ka bording ne ki ai laiñ tuh sha kane ka jaka. Ngi la kyntu ïa u SDO (Revenue) ba u dei ban shim kam ïa u Meter Reader namarba ngim tip ïoh ba u Meter Reader ne Lineman ka MeECL ki don bynta lang ha kaba ai bording ne ki don jingïohnong eiei lyngba ka jingai bording sha ki spah tylli ki longïing hangne,” la ong u Bah Synrem.U la ïathuh ba tang shu ïoh jingtip ha ka por mynstep ba ki briew jong ka MeECL ki don ha kane ka jaka ki la leit marmar.“Ynda ngi la wan ha kane ka jaka, ngi la ïakren bad ki ophisar jong ka MeECL ba dei peit ïa ka Vigilance Cell ngi lap ba kine ki briew ki la don naduh ka por mynstep ban ot ïa ki waïar kiba tan bording sha kane ka jaka. Kane ka pyni shai ba ka don ka jingïatreilang ne ka jingïasuhbuit hapdeng ki briew kiba tip bha ïa kane ka kam. Ka MeECL ka dei ban thung ïa ka jingtohkit ban tip lada don shisha ki briew kiba ïadon bynta ha ka jingring tuh ïa ka bording dei ban pynshitom ïa ki katkum ka aiñ.Hadien kane, ki nongïalam jong ka HYC ki la leit ban ïakynduh sa ïa u Chief Executive Officer jong ka Shillong Cantonment Board (SCB) ha kaba u la pyntip ba hapoh ka Cantonment Board ki don ar tylli ki bor kiba peit ïa ki lyngkhot jaka ba kynthu ïa ki jaka jong ki shipai bad ka Defence Estate Officer kaba don ïa ka ophis ha Guwahati, Assam.“Ka Defence Estate Officer ka dang don hapdeng ka jingïakhun mukotduma ban beh ïa ki briew kiba sah be-aiñ ha u pud u sam jong ka Cantonment,” u la ong.
title: OT KA MeECL ÏA KA BORDING HA HA SLUM BA SAH KI POIWIR, DAWA TOHKIT KA HYC

content: Ki runar ki bym lah ban ithuh durkhmat ki la kawang da u petrol bomb ha ka ingsah jong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba peit ïa ka tnat Pynroi Sor Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ha Nongmynsong ha ka miet sngi Palei.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, u Bah Dhar u la mudui da ka ejahar, la ong ki Pulit ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat ban ïohkem ïa ki runar kiba donkti ha kane ka jingkawang petrol bomb, la ïathuh ki Pulit.U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills Rituraj Ravi ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ïathuh ba dalade hi u la leit jurip ïa ka iing jong u Bah Dhar kaba la shah kawang petrol bomb bad ngi la pynlong ka jingtohkit.U la ïathuh ba ki runar ki la kawang ïa u petrol bomb na shiliang surok bad leit dei ïa ka mala kaba hajrong jong ka ing.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jingjia kam shym la don kano kano ka jingjulor.Hadien kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingap pahara ha ka ïing jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka tnat Kam Pohing u Bah Prestone Tynsong bad ha kiwei kiwei ki ophis ba kongsan jong ka Sorkar.Ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai, ki runar ki la kawang da u petrol bomb ïa ka kali kaba synran ïa u Director (Personel) ka NEEPCO ha surok Demthring.U SP haba pynshai halor kane, u la ïathuh ba ki runar ki la kawang da ka jaiñ jot ba la thang ym da u petrol bom ïa ka kali kaba synran ïa u Director (Personel) ka NEEPCO.  U la pyntip ba ki Pulit ki la register case bad ka jingtohkit ka la ïaid shakhmat ban lap  ïa kiba donkti.U SP  u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka jylla ba kim dei ban shim ïa ka aiñ ha ki kti lajong hynrei ban ïatreilang bad ka tnat Pulit kaba dang pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba dang ïaid shakhmat bad ban bud ruh ïa ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: KAWANG PETROL BOMB KI RUNAR ÏA KA ÏINGSAH U DY. CM HA NONGMENSONG

content: Ki Pulit ka East Khasi Hills District ki la kem sa ïa u dkhot jong ka Khasi Student’s Union (KSU) Central Body u samla Osternic Marbaniang, 34 snem ka rta halor ka jingshah pynïap jong ki ar ngut ki bar jylla ha ka shnong Ichamati ha ka 27 tarik, Lber, 2024.Ki Pulit ki la kem ïa une u nongïalam ka KSU ha ka nohphai sngi jong ka sngi Saitjaiñ na ingsah jong u na Jaïaw Laitdom halor ka case ba la register ha Shella Police Station hapoh ka Section 302/34 Indian Penal Code (IPC) ha kaba u Ishan Singh bad u Sobir Dutta ki la shah pynïap ha ka shnong Ichamati.Ka Kashari ka la aibor ïa ki Pulit ban set along haduh 6 sngi na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit pyrshah ïa u.U kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills Rituraj Ravi u la ong, “shuh shuh, ngi kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ. Kino kino ki runar kiba pyrshang ban pynthud ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ kin shah pynshitom katkum ka aiñ.”Tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane, ki dkhot ka KSU ki la tur sha Sadar Police Station hynrei ki Pulit ki la khang noh ka khyrdop bad pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingpahara ïoh ba ka mih kano kano ka jingkulmar.Katba ki Pulit ki dang mih na phyllaw ka Sadar PS ban kit da ka kali ïa u samla Ostarnik Marbaniang sha Civil Hospital, Shillong na ka bynta ban leh ïa ka Medical Check-up la sakhi ruh ba ki dkhot ka KSU ki la leit synran lang tad haduh ka khyllipmat ba ki  Pulit ki la rah ïa une u nongïalam ka seng ban tian bishar ha Kashari jong u District and Session Judge, East Khasi Hills District khnang ban pan jingbit ban set along na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.Haduh mynta ki Pulit ki la kem haduh saw ngut ki dkhot jong ka KSU halor ka jingshah pynïap jong ki arngut ki nongbylla tih maw ka shong Ichamati, East Khasi Hills kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Ishan Singh bad u Sudip Dutta. Ki bahaing hasem jong kine ki arngut kiba la shah pynïap ha ka jingmudui ejahar sha ki Pulit ki la teipop ïa ka KSU.Ha ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai ki Pulit ki la kem shwa ïa arngut ki dkhot ka KSU South Khasi Hills Unit ba kynthup ïa u samla Shambor Shati bad u samla Meshadap Sohpen na Sohra.  Nangta, ha ka sngi Baar mynta ka taiew, ki Pulit ki la kem sa ïa u samla Cleenstar Shabong na ka shnong Nongthymmai Pohktieh, Lane-5, Shillong.  Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, ki Pulit ruh ki la kem ruh ïa u samla Gary Rinaldy Mawlieh, na Mawlai Mawroh Kseh halor ka jingshah tangon jong u nongbylla misteri bar jylla ha ki runar ki bym lah ban tip kat haduh ba u la khladnoh ha NEIGRIHMS Hospital.U Superintendent of Police (City) Pankaj Kumar Rasgania u la pyntip ba u Cleenstar Shabong u donkti ruh ha ki 10 tylli ki case bymman, ha kaba la pynngat kyndon pyrshah ïa u tang ha kawei ka case.Katba ha kaba ïadei bad ka case ba la rejistar ha Mawlai Police Station halor ka jingshah pynïap jong u Arjun Ray ha Mawlai Mawroh, u SP (City) u la pyntip ba u Gary Rinaldy Mawlieh u dei uba donkti shuh shuh sa ha ki 3 tylli ki case bymman ha kaba la pynngat kyndon pyrshah ïa u ha ki ar tylli ki case.Ka Kashari ka la aibor ïa ki Pulit ban set along haduh 7 sngi ïa u Cleenstar khnang ba kin ïoh pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah katba ka Kashari ka la aibor ïa ki Pulit ban set along 12 sngi ïa u Gary Rinaldy ban pynlong shuh shuh ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.
title: SHAH KEM U DKHOT KA KSU CENTRAL BODY BA SHAH PYNIAP KI BAR JYLLA HA ICHAMATI

content: Ki Pulit ka Umkiang Patrol Post, East Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka por kumba 8:00 baje mynstep kiba la pynlong ia ka jingpynap shrip ha Rattachera Check Post ki khynra naphang ia ki kali kiba iaid lyngba kane ka khyrdop talasi.Ha kane step, ki Pulit ki la iohbat ia kawei ka trok Mahindra pick-up ka bym don nombar kaba shu thoh A/F bad na kane ka kali ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup ïa u drok uba khia 900 gram bad uba shongdor haduh T.7.2 klur.Ha ka jingkhynra ia ka kali, ki Pulit ki la lap ia kawei ka top plastik rong ïong kaba 50 liter, la suba ba lah ban thep eiei hapoh ka top bad ka jingtalasi la lap pynban ia u drok ba la song bha hapoh ki 84 tylli ki synduh thep sabon rong stem bad rong soh.Hadien ba la leh test hakhmat ki nongsakhi la pynshisha ba u dei u drok Heroin.Ki Pulit ki la kem ïa u nongñiah jong ka kali uba la tip kyrteng kum u Nehtinmang Haokip, 36 snem ka rta na ka shnong M. Songgel, Churachandpur District, Manipur.  Ha ka jingtohkit jong ki pulit, u nongñiah u la phla ba ïa u drok la wanrah na Churachandpur, Manipur bad thmu ban pynpoi sha nongbah Shillong.Ki Pulit ki ka kem noh ïa u nongñiah kali bad kurup noh ïa u drok, ïa ka kali Mahindra Pickup bad kawei ka mobile phone.  Ki Pulit ki la register case bad pynngat hapoh ki kyndon aiñ NDPS Act bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat.
title: 900 GRAM U DROK BA SHONGDOR 7.2 KLUR ÏOH KURUP KI PULIT KA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS

content: : Ka Expert Committee on the State Reservation Policy, Meghalaya kaba la shong ia ka jingialang ha ka wat kaba ar ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la rai ban pynmih da ka jingpyntip paidbah ban iasyllok/pan jingmut/jingkynthoh halor ka State Reservation Policy.Ka Expert Committee ka la rai ruh ban sa pynlong ia ka jingpynsngew paidbah ha Shillong bad ha kiwei kiwei ki distrik lane ha kino kino ki jaka katkum ka jingshim rai jong ka Committtee hadien ba la ioh pdiang ia ka jingkynthoh/jingai jingmut na ki kynhun bapher bapher.Ka jingialang kaba bud yn sa pynlong biang ha u bnai Jymmang, 2024.Ka Sorkar ka la thaw ia ka Expert Committee on the State Reservation Policy lyngba ka Notification NO. PER (AR) 49/2023/Pt/3 Dated the 12th September,2023 ba la khlieh da u Justice (Retd.) Mr. Mool Chand Garg kum u Chairman bad ki dkhot ki kynthup ia u Justice (Retd.) Dr. Satish Chandra, u Prof. D.V. Kumar, u Prof. Chander Shekhar bad u Prof. Subhadip Mukherjee.
title: RAI KA EXPERT COMMITTEE BAN PAN JINGKYNTHOH NA KI PAIDBAH HALOR KA RESERVATION POLICY

content: : Ki nongïalam jong ka Green Tech Foundation (GTF) ba la lamkhmat da u Chairman Bah H. Bansiewdor Nonglang kiba la ïoh ujor na ki paidbah ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la leit jurip ïa ka wahduid ha ka shnong Nongrimbah, Laitumkhrah kaba ba la tip kyrteng kum ka wah Thangsniang.Ha ka jingleit jurip, ki nongïalam ka Foundation ki la sakhi ba uwei u riewshimet (bym pat lah ban tip kyrteng) u la siang da ka dewbilat halor ka wahduid ba pynïasoh bad ka phyllaw iing.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Nonglang u la ong, “kane ka jingtei ka long kum ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka Standing Order ba la pynmih da ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court ha u snem 2019. Hadien kane, ka Iingbishar ka la bthah ruh ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynmih ïa ki aiñ kiba khlaiñ na ka bynta ban ïada ïa ki jingkyntur pud sha ki wah bad mana ruh ban tei kino kino ki jingtei ba pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.”“Ngi kynmaw ba ha kato ka por ka la mih ka Meghalaya Water Bodies Reservation and Conservation Guidelines 2023. Kane ka jingtei mynta ka la pynkheiñ ïa ka Section 3 Clause A, Clause B ter ter jong kane ka Guidelines,” la ong u President ka Foundation.“Na ka liang jong ka Foundation ngin ym ailad. Ngi ladep phah ïa ka dorkhas sha ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board, sha ka Shillong Municipal Board ba kin leh eiei halor kane ka jingtei bad ngi la ujor ruh sha ki bor synshar distrik ba hapoh ka Section 133 CrPC, 1973 dei ban pynsangeh ïa kane ka jingtei bad ban pynpra noh,” la ïathuh shuh shuh u Bah Nonglang.La sakhi ba ka jingsiang da ka dewbilat ïa ka bynta jong ka wahduid ka dei kaba pynïasoh bad ka phyllaw jong ka ing mala kaba don hajan kane hi ka wahduid.“Lada ka building ka don hangne, ngi sngewthuh ba ngi donkam ïa ka jingkieng ban rung ban mih bad ban leit ban wan ki kali. Hynrei ban kam trai ïa ka wah daleilei ruh em ngin ym lah ban pdiang.  Kane ka dei ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka Solid Waste Management Rules, 2016 bad ngi la ïohi ïa ka jingjaboh ka long mynta kumno,” u la ong bad bynrap, “nalor kata wat ïa ka Construction and Demolition Waste Rules, 2016 ruh ka la pynkheiñ.”Haba ïathuh ba ka Foundation ka la pyntip ruh sha ka Dorbar  Shnong shwa ban tuklar ïa ka jingsiang dewbilat najrong ka wahduh, u Bah Nonglang u la ong, “kum ka kynhun ngi burom bha ïa ki Dorbar Shnong haba ngi trei ïa kano kano ka kam. Halor kata ka nongrim ngim shym la leh lyndet ïa ki bor synshar shnong bad ngi lah phah jingtip bad ïa ki jingthoh ruh ngi la phah bad ai kopi ba ïa kane ka kam ngi hap ban shim kam.”“Kum ka Independent Body bad kum ka Environmental NGO daleilei ruh ngim lah ban pdiang ïa kane.  Dei halor kata ka nongrim kaba ngi ieng ban ïada ïa ki khlaw ki btap, ki um ki wah, wat pyrshang ban kam trai ïa ki wah, wat pyrshang ban khang lynti ïa ki wah, (namarba) ka dei ka nongkynti u paidbah.  Ngam tip ka dei (ka ing) ka jongno bad ngim tip mano ba long trai, hynrei haba ka mih kum kane ka jingtei kaba pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon kum ka kynhun ngi hap ban tuklar,” la ïai ban u Bah Nonglang.“Kane ka long ka khubor ïa kiba bun ki jingtei kiba bun ha sor Shillong. (Lada) phi pyrshang ban khang lynti ïa ki wah, phi pyrshang ban knieh jubor ban kam trai ïa ki wah da leilei ruh ngin ym lah ban pdiang,” u la bynrap.Haba pyntip ba ka Foundation ka la wad jingtip na ka Shillong Municipal Board, u Bah Nonglang u la ong, “nga la pyrshang ban wad jingtip bha halor kane shwa ba ngin phah ïa ki dorkhas.  Ngi la wad jingtip na ka Municipal la kane ka jingtei ka dei neem jong ka Smart City Project, hynrei ki (Municipal) ong, em. Lada ka dei jong ka Smart City ruh daleilei ngim lah ban pdiang kum kane ka jingtei.”“Ki nongshong shnong, ki ïathuh mar syn wan u slap uba jur ka jaboh ka la sahkut hangto.  Kaba thut mynta kam dei tang kane ka jaka bad ngi hap ban sngewthuh kan shlei um hangne bad naduh nangtei nakhmat kan sa sdang shlei um shaduh shathie sharum. Halor kata ka nongrim ka Foundation ngi kwah ba phin sangeh noh ïa ka jingtei bad ngim banse lada kine ki dorkhas ba ngi la ujor sha ki bor badei peit ngim ïohi kam eiei ngi hap ban kiew sha Ingbishar High Court bad ngi hap ban rah ruh ïa kane ka case sha ka National Green Tribunal (NTG) bad ngin ym sngap bad ngin ym ailad ïa kine ki jingtei kiba long ha kane ka dur,” la byrngem shuh shuh ka GTF.
title: BYRNGEM KA GTF BAN MUDUI HA HC BAD NGT BA TAP DEWBILAT ÏA KA WAHDUID THANGSNING HA LAITUMKHRAH

content: Arngut ki khynnah ialehkai phutbol jong ka jylla bakynthup ïa u heprit Mebanpynshngaiñ Khyriem bad u heprit Mangpaka Nongkynrih kiba dei ki rangialehkai jong ka PFR Football Academy, Shillong ki la shah jied na Meghalaya ban iashim bynta ha ka U-13 Final Selection Trial jong ka Reliance Foundation Young Champ ka ban long hapoh Navi, Mumbai Maharashtra naduh 3 tarik Jymmang haduh 7 tarik Jymmang, 2024.Napdeng ki 25 ngut ki khynnah jong ka jylla kiba la poi sha ka Final Round jong ka Meghalaya Zone, u Mebanpynshngaiñ Khyriem bad u Mangpaka Nongkynrih ki long arngut ki khynnah kiba la shah jied na kane ka Meghalaya Zone ban leit ïa ka Final Selection Trial jong ka Reliance Foundation Young Champ ha ka U-13 Category kaba long ruh ka Trial kaba khatduh ha shwa ba kin ïoh rung shapoh ka Football Camp jong ka Reliance kaba don ha nongbah Mumbai.Ha kane ka Final Trial ki don 56 ngut ki khynnah na kylleng ki jylla bapher bapher jong ka ri India kiba la shah jied bad napdeng ki 56 ngut katkum ka jingïoh jingtip ka long tang 16 ngut ki khynnah jong ka ri kin ïoh ban don hapoh ka National Camp jong ka Reliance Foundation Young Champ.U President jong ka PFR Football Academy Bah Franky Kharumnuid ula ong ba ka Academy ka dap da ka jingsngewkmen kaba khraw hadien ba ka la ïoh ïa ka khubor ba u Mebanpynshngaiñ Khyriem bad u Mangpaka Nongkynrih kiba long ki khynnah jong ka Academy ki la shah jied kane ka jylla ban leit ïa ka Final Selection Trial jong ka Reliance Foundation Young Champ ka ban long ha nongbah Mumbai.U la ong ruh ba kane ka jingshah jied jong ki ka dei lyngba ka jingtrei shitom jong ki Coach kata ka Kong Nylla Mery Wahlang bad kumjuh u Bah Tyngshaiñ Kharlyngdoh kiba la lah ban saiñdur ïa ka sap ka phong ka jong ki bad kumjuh ruh ka jingai mynsiem jong ki kmie ki kpa jong ki.U la bynrap ruh ka jing shah jied ka jong ki napoh ka jylla kalong ruh ka jingai mynsiem ïa kiwei ki khynnah kiba don hapoh ka Academy ba kin trei shitom ba kin poi sha kum kane thong.Ka Academy ka phah ïa ka jingkitbok kitrwiang ïa u Mebanpynshngaiñ Khyriem bad u Mangpaka Nongkynrih ba kin lah ban pynni ïa ka sap ha kane ka Trial watla kam long kaba suk ïa ki ban ïoh rung hapoh ka National Camp jong ka Reliance namarba ki hap ban ïakhun ban pynni ïa ka sap jong ki bad ki 56 ngut ki khynnah jong ka ri.U Bah Kharumniud u la ong ba kum ka Academy ka ngeit skhem bad ka kyrmen ba kine ki arngut ki khynnah kin lah ban ïalehkai bha ban poi sha ka thong.Ka Academy ka aiñguh nyngkong ïa U Blei Uba la plielad plie lynti ïa kine ki khynnah namar ka ngeit ba kiei kiei baroh ki dei ki jingpynïaid jong U Blei.
title: SHAH JIED KI KHYNNAH KA PFR-FA HA KA FINAL SELECTION TRIAL KA RELIANCE FOUNDATION YOUNG CHAMP HA MUMBAI

content: : U MDC ka BJP na Tura u Bernard N. Marak ha ka sngi u Blei u la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ban pan jingpynshai halor ka jingpyntrei jong ka ARSS Company ïa ka surok Dawki.“Ngam banse ba pan jubab na phi halor ki kam jong ka Company ba la don dak sniew-ARSS, kumba nga la ïoh jingtip ka dei kaba don dak sniew bad kaba la shah kyntait namar ka jingpyntrei torti ïa ka surok Dawki ha ka jylla,” ong u Marak.“Kumno (kane ka company) ka pyntrei sa ha rilum Garo bad mano ba aiti ïa ka kam sha ki bad halor kiei ki kyndon?  Ki trok Dumper jong kane ka Company ki dei kiba la ngat ha kiba bun ki jingjia aksiden ha rilum Garo ha kaba bun na ki lanot ki la mynsaw jur, dang shen kawei ka la jia ha ka por shiteng sngi jong ka Sngi u Blei.  Mynta ka nohphai sngi, kawei ka samla ka la mynsaw na ki bynta jong ka kjat bad mynta ka dang don ha ka jingshah sumar ha Tura Civil Hospital,” la ong u Marak.“Ki trok Dumper ki la ngat ha ki ar tylli ki jingaksiden ha ka MDC Constituency jong nga tang hapoh khyndiat por bad mynta ka sngi ha ka por shiteng sngi ka la jia hajan ka ophis MBOSE.  Kane ka dei ka jingjia aksiden kaba ar kaba tynrah da ka trok Dumper ha kaba ka khynnah kaba dang 14 snem ka la mynsaw jur na ki bynta jong ka kjat,” bynrap u Marak.“Halor ka jingdon jingïadei bad ka ARSS, nga dawa jur ban shimkam bad ban pynsangeh ïa ki jingtrei jong ki bad ïa baroh ki jaitkam bad ban pynshitom ïa kiba donkti halor kane ka aksiden,”la dawa une u MDC ka BJP.U la pan jubab ruh da ka jingthoh ba kumno kane ka company ba la shah ai dak iong ka dang ïohkam ha rilum Garo.“Da kaba buh sharud ïa ki kam pynroi ha rilum Garo, ka jingmang pisa da ka Sorkar Pdeng ym dei satia ban ai sha ka company ba la don dak sniew.  Namarkata, nga kyrpad mardor ban leh eiei, ai ba ki kam ba la shim da ka ARSS Company dei ban pynsangeh mardoh bad ka jingïaid ruh jong ki trok, khamtam ka jingïaid ki trok Dumper ha ka por mynsngi dei ban pyrkhing ha ki jaka sor,” ong shuh shuh u Marak.
title: NA U CM PAN JUBAB U MDC KA TURA BA AIKAM ÏA KA ARSS COMPANY HA RILUM GARO

content: : Ka KSU East Jaiñtia Hills District Union (EJHDU) ha ka sngi Balang ka la ujor sha u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills u A. Baranwal pyrshah ïa ki karkhana pynmih dewbilat halor ka jingbym pynmih ïa ki khubor lait kam (Advertisement) ha ki lad pathai khubor ha jylla Meghalaya ba manla ka por.Ka seng ka lap ba kiba bun ki kam kiba lait ha kine ki karkhana la pyllait sha kiwei pat ki kot khubor kiba dei na kiwei pat ki jylla kum sha Bihar, Assam bad kiwei kiwei.Kane ka jingleh jong kine ki karkhana ka pynbitar ïa ka seng bad ka pyni ba kim burom bad kheiñ snep satia ïa ki trai ri trai muluk ha ka liang ka ïohkam ïohjam.“Kane ka jingleh kine ki karkhana pynmih dewbilat ba don ha ka thaiñ East Jaiñtia Hills District hi baroh kawei ka pyni shai ba ki kwah tang ban kjit ïa ka spah mariang ka jong ngi khlem da sngewlem tang khyndiat ruh ïa ki bapli ki samla jong ngi kiba la pyndep ïa ki kyrdan pule bapher bapher bad kiba long tbit (Qualified) ban trei ha kata ka kam kaba dei hi ka laiñ pule jong ki,” ong ka KSU.Ka seng ka dawa na u DC bad la kyntu ba ki dei ban tuklar ïa kane ka kam bad kim dei ban ïaid lait ban pynmih ïa kano kano ka kam ha ki lad pathai khubor ka jylla.Ka seng ha kane ka sngi ka la pynpaw ruh ba kan sa wanrah ïa ka job fair ha ka thaiñ East Jaiñtia ha kaba kine ki karkhana kin hap ban thep kam ïa ki samla ka thaiñ ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka bor district lada long kaba lah.Haba ïakren halor kane ka phang, u DC u la ong ba un ai da ka jingthoh sha baroh ki cement plant ba don hapoh district ban ïakren ïa kane ka kam.
title: UJOR KA KSU SHA U DC BYM PYNMIH KI KARKHANA DEWBILAT ÏA KI ADVERTISEMENT LAITKAM HA KI KOT KHUBOR

content: Kawei ka kali Sorkar ka la ingkhong hadien ba ka la wiang ding ha ki runar ki bym lah ban ithuh durkhmat ha ka miet sngi Palei hajan ka ophis Water Resources ha Dhankheti, Shillong.Kane ka kali Bolero kaba don ïa u nombar ML01-A-0175 jong ka tnat Water Resources ka la shah wiang ding katba dang pynieng ha phyllaw jong kane ka ophis, la ïathuh ki Pulit.Na ka jingbamduh jong ki thylliej ding kane kali ka julor.  La suba ba ki runar ki la kawang da u petrol bomb, la ïathuh shuh shuh ki Pulit.Ki Pulit ki la register case halor kane ka jingjia bad ki Pulit ki la pynlong ka jingthwet kaba jur ban ïohkem ïa kiba donkti.Ha ka miet sngi Balang la ïoh jingtip ba ki runar ki la kawang Petrol Bomb ha ka ktem sah ki Pulit Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF).U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills Rituraj Ravi ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei u la ïathuh ba watla ki Pulit kim shym la ïoh pdiang ïa ka jingujor hynrei ki la lap ïa ki lyngkhot bilor ba la pait harud surok bad la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u SP, haduh mynta ki don ym duna ïa ka hynñiew tylli ki jingjia kawang petrol bomb ha kylleng ka sor Shillong.  “Ka jingtohkit ka la ïaid shakhmat bad ngin pynthikna ba ki nongkam bymman kin ngat ha ki kynjri jong ka aiñ,” la ong u SP.Mynta ka taiew, ki runar ki la kawang petrol bom hakhmat ka Shillong Sadar Police Station bad ha Rynjah Police Station.  Ym tang katta, ki runar ki la kawang petrol bom ruh ïa ki kali ba la pynieng ha phyllaw jong ka ophis Meghalaya Government Construction Corporation Limited (MGCC) ha Rilbong.  Ki kali ki la shu lait thaw na ka jingkem ding namarba u petrol bom um shym la bthei.Shwa kane, ki runar ki la kawang petrol bom ïa ki kali ba la pynieng ha Jowai Police Reserve ha kaba kawei ka kali Gypsy jong u nongtrei ka la ingkhong katba kawei ka kali Pulit ka la shu julor tang na ki bynta ba shakhmat.Tang hapoh u bnai Iaiong haduh mynta  ki jingshah kawang petrol bomb ki la jia ha Mawlai Police Station, nangta ia ka kali ba synran jong u Director (Personel) ka NEEPCO ha Demthring, ka jingshah kawang petrol bom ka iingsah u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ha Nongmynsong.Haduh mynta, ki Pulit kim shym la ïohkem satia ki briew kiba donkti ban kawang petrol bom kylleng ka sor Shillong ïa ki ophis treikam ka Sorkar.“Ngi la rejistar ejahar bad ka jingtohkit ka la ïaid shakhmat.  Watla kam pat don kano kano ka jingjulor ne ka jingmynsaw,” la ong u SP.U SP u la ïathuh ba ka tnat Pulit ka la pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingïaid pahara kylleng ka Sor Shillong ha ka por mynmiet khnang ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.
title: SHAH KAWANG PETROL BOMB KA KALI KA TNAT WATER RESOURCES HA DHANKHETI

content: : Ki ophisar jong ka ophis Headquarters Preventive, Customs, North Eastern Region, Shillong  kiba la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah ki la pynap shrip ha surok Silchar-Jiribam ha ka 29 tarik, Ïaiong, 2024 hadien ba ki la ïoh jingtip ba ki don ki briew kiba rah ïa u drok.Ha kane ka jingpynap shrip, ki ophisar ka ophis Customs ki la ïoh bat ïa ki arngut ki briew na ka thaiñ Kashipur ha surok Silchar-Jiribam bad ïoh kurup haduh 2.270 kilo u dawai Methamphetamine uba shongdor 2.23 klur.Ïa kine ki arngut la kem hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act, 1985.  Ka jingtohkit ïa kine ki arngut mynta ka dang ïaid shakkhmat.Ka ophis Customs ka kyntu ruh ïa kino kino ki riewpaidbah ban jingtip shaphang ki jingkhaii tuh ïa ki mar rem dor, ïa ki lut pisa thok, ki ksiar bad kiwei kiwei ki kam bymman ha kaba ïa ki kyrteng jong ki nongai jingtip yn buhrieh noh bad yn ai ruh ïa ka khusnam.
title: 2.270 KILO U DAWAI METHAMPHETAMINE BA SHONGDOR 2.23 KLUR KURUP KA OPHIS CUSTOMS

content: : Ki Pulit ka East Jaiñtia Hills District kiba la pynlong ka jingtalasi kai ha surokbah National Highway-6 ha ka sngi Balang ha ka por kumba 5:30 baje janmiet ki la pynsangeh ïa kawei ka kali Maruti S-Presso (Tourist) kaba don ïa u nombar ML04-B-6638 bad na kane ka kali ki Pulit ki la ïoh ban kurup ïa u drug Heroin bad ki dawai kuli beaiñ.Ki Pulit ki la ïathuh ba ki la ïohbat ïa kane ka kali katba ka dang wan na ki thaiñ Kalaiñ, Assam bad ki don hynñiew ngut ki briew bashong hapoh kane ka kali.Ha ka jingtalasi ïa ka kali, ki Pulit ki la lap ïa kawei ka bek plastik kaba la buhrieh hapoh ka Seat jong u nongñiah kali bad ynda la plied la lap ïa ka synduk thep sabon kaba don ïa u kynja powder rong sawbyrtem ïa uba la suba ba u dei u Drug Heroin uba khia 9.9 grams.Shuh shuh ki Pulit ki la lap ruh sa kawei ka plastik rong iong ba la thep 24 song ki dawai kuli Nitrajepam tablet ba don 10 tylli ki dawai kuli bad kiba khia 2.4 gram.Ki Pulit ki la kem noh ïa u Jowel Dkhar, 20 snem ka rta na ka shnong Moolamanoh, East Jaiñtia Hills District bad register case pyrshah ïa u ha Lumshnong Police Station.
title: 9.9 GRAM U DROK KURUP KI PULIT KA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS, SHAH KEM UWEI

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ka la ïaiban ïa ki bor ba dei peit ban kyndang ïa ki poiwir kiba sah be-aiñ ha Lum Survey kaba don mar pyrshah bad ka Fire and Emergency Station, Iewduh, Shillong.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills District, sha ka Defence Estate Officer, Guwahati Circle, Narangi Military Station bad sha u Chief Executive Officer (CEO) ka Shillong  Cantonment Board (SMB) ka seng ka la  pyntip ba ka jingjurip ha ka 25 tarik u bnai baladep ka la lap ba ki don kumba 80-100 tylli ki longiing kiba sah ha kane ka jaka khlem ka jingïoh jingbit na ka Cantonment Board lane na kino kino ki bor ba dei peit.Ka seng ka la ong ba kane ka jaka sah ka long kaba isaitmet na ka bynta ka nongbah Shillong bad ka Jylla baroh kawei.“Ngi la ïoh jingtip ba kane ka jaka ka dei ka ktem jong ki kam runar ruser kum ka jingkhaii bad shalan ïa u drok hapoh nongbah  bad ka jaka rieh tngen jong ki poiwir kiba wan na kiwei kiwei ki ri,” la ong ka seng ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u President u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem bad u General Secretary u Bah Rhembor G. Saibon.Hadien ba ka seng ka la ïoh jingtip na u CEO ka Shillong Cantonment Board ba kane ka jaka ka dei kaba hap hapoh ka jingkhmih jong ka Defence Estate Officer, Guwahati bad ka don ruh ka bynta jong ka jaka kaba don hapdeng ka jingïaleh mukotduma.“Ha ka jingtohkit jong ngi, ngi la lap ki don lai tylli ki mukotduma ba dang sah pohing ha ka Kashari u District Judge, Shillong ha kaba ïadei bad ki Eviction Notice ba la ai sha ki lai ngut ki briew, kiba shong iing ha ka jaka (kaba heh kumba 200 haduh 500 sq. ft. kawei), hapoh ka Section 5 jong ka Public Premises (Eviction of Unauthorised Occupants) Act, 1971 da ka Estate Officer, Guwahati. Ngi la ïakynduh ruh ïa uwei u briew uba la ïoh ïa ka notis bad uba la ujor da ka mukotduma pyrshah ïa ka jingïoh Eviction Notice bad u la pynshai ha ngi ba ka lyngkhot jaka kaba dang sah pohding ka jingïaleh mukotduma ka dei ka jaka kaba rit bad kam dei satia ka jaka kaba heh ba la shna be-aiñ ïa ki ing tap shiliang da ki poiwir.  Namarkata, ka jingkylli ba kane ka kam ka long ka jingkheiñ dewthala kam don satia bad ka jingkyndang ïa kiba sah be-aiñ lah ban leh da ki bor ba dei peit ha ki jaka bym don ka jingïaleh mukotduma,” la ong ka seng.“Namarkata, ngi dawa ïa ka jingpynshai bad ban tip ïa ka jingshisha bad ban pynstet ïa ka kam halor ka jingujor jong ngi ïa ki briew kiba sah be-aiñ, ngi kyntu ïa phi ba phin pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit dalade ha kane ka jaka ryngkat bad ngi bad ki nongmudui mukotduma ba la kdew haneng, hapoh shi taiew naduh mynta ka sngi, khnang ban dup lah ban kyndang ïa kiba sah be-aiñ na kane ka jaka,” la ong shuh shuh ka seng.“Lymda kumta, ngin ym don lad shuh da kumwei pat hynrei ngin leit ban leit pynshisha hi da lade ryngkat bad ki nongmudui mukotduma da ka jingsakhi lang jong ki lad pathai khubor na ka bynta ka jingtip jong ki paidbah,” la ong ka seng.
title: SHITAÏEW AIPOR KA HYC BAN KYNDANG ÏA KI POIWIR BA SAH BE-AIÑ HA LUM SURVEY

content: : U Rangbah Kur jong ka Kur Mawlong Bah Harison Mawlong u la pynshai ba ka Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar ka la ïoh jingtip ba don ka don ka jingïajied nongkitkam sopsop khlem ka jingtip ki Rangbah Kur ne ka Kur baroh kawei kumba la paw ha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 20 tarik, Rymphang, 2024 ba ka Kur ka la jied ïa ki nongkitkam ba thymmai ha ka 10 tarik Rymphang, 2024.“U Rangbah Kur Bah Harison Mawlong uba la long u Rangbah Kur la kumba 40 snem tam bad dei satang ma nga marwei ba dei u Kñi, baroh ki la khlad lut.  Ka kur ka pynpaw ba ka khubor ka long kaba bakla bad pynthohbria ïa ka Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar,” ong u Bah Harison ha u kyrwoh.U la pyntip ba ka Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar ha ka 28 tarik Jymmang 2017 ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid da u Rangbah Kur (L) Ephrain Mawlong ha kaba la shim ïa ka rai naduh ka 28/05/2017  shakhmat ba ki nongkitkam jong ka Kur yn jed noh da ka jinghiar pateng katba dang don ki Kñi kin long beit ki Kñi ki nongpynïaid kur baroh kum ka riti pynïaid u Khasi hyndai bad kan sa hiar hà ki Pyrsa bad kumta terter sa ki pyrsa ksiew, pyrsa miaw.  Kum ka Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar kane ka sngi la weng noh ïa ka jinglong Secretary Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar barim u Bah Rangshanbor Mawlong namarba u dang dei tang u pyrsa ksiew hakhmat ki Kñi kiba bun bad ka Mawlong Mawmih/Krang ka la jied thymmai noh ïa u Bah Johhny Mawlong uba dei u pyrsa trai jong u (Late) E.K Mawlong bad la pynskhem ïa u da ka Dorbar Kur paidbah kaba la long ha Mawmih ha ka 19/09/2019.  La nang pynskhem shuh shuh ïa ki nongkitkam jong ka Kur da kaba rejistar hapoh ka DC Office, Shillong ha u snem 2023 naduh u Rangbah Kur, Secretary Kur bad ki Executive Members.Ha kane kajuh ka jingïakynduh lang jong ki para Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar ki pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur ïa ka jingleh jubor jong u Secretary kur barim Bah Rangshanbor Mawlong ban leh ki kam khlem ka jingtip ka kur bad ban ym burom ïa ka jing pynkheiñ Secretary Kur jong u da ka rai u paidbah Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar. Kumta halor kane ka jingleh jong une uba kam Secretary kur ka pynlyngngoh ba kumno u nud ban khot ïa ka Dorbar Kur sopsop khlem ka jingtip jong ka Dorbar Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar bad  khlem ka jingdon lang jong u Rangbah kur u Bah Harison Mawlong uba long sa tang ma u Kñi Rangbah uba dang don haduh mynta.Ka Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar  ka pynrem jur ïa kum une u ba kam Secretary u dang dei tang u kyrdan pyrsa ksiew u lah ban ïaid lait ïa ka dorbar kur, ka kur ka dap da ka jingpyrshah ba khraw bad pynrem ba kumno u briew u bym don jingithuh da ka Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar , u nud ban leh donbor  bad ban khot ïa ka dorbar kur khlem ka jingtip lang jong u kñi Rangbah.Ka Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar ka maham ba ym dei ban pynkulmar ïa ka kam Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar ka don hapdeng ka suk ka saiñ bad ka maham ba ym dei mano mano ban mushlia lane pynsniew ïa ka kam Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar.Ka Kur ka pynpaw ba katkum ki kyndon  treikam jong ka Kur Mawlong Mawmih & Krang Mawkhar, ïa ka kam nongïalam kur ki dei ban bat beit ki kñi ym dei da ki pyrsa ksiew, lada ki kñi kim don shuh kan sa hiar ha ki pyrsa nangta ter ter sa ki pyrsa ksiew pyrsa miaw. Kane ka jingleh jong une u pyrsa ksiew ka pawshai ba um burom shuh ïa ki kñi bad u la pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon treikam  jong ka kur, la ong shuh shuh u Rangbah Kur Bah Harison Mawlong.
title: PYNSHAI KA KUR MAWLONG MAWMIH & KRANG MAWKHAR

content: Ki Pulit ka East Jaiñtia Hills District kiba pynlong ïa ka jingtalasi bad khynra ïa ki kali ha Ratacherra Out Post ha  surokbah NH-6 ha ka step sngi Baar ki la ioh ban kurup ïa u drok uba shongdor T. 1.1 klur na kawei ka kali kaba don ïa u nombar ML05 X 7741.Ki Pulit ki la iathuh ba ha ka jingtalasi bad jingkhynra na ka la lap ïa ki song kiba la suba jur ba la thep ia u drok bad ha ka jingtalasi la lap ia u drok Heroin uba khia 136 grams.  Ka dor ïew jong une u drok ka la poi T. 1.1 klur.Ki Pulit ki la kem noh ïa ki lai ngut ki briew kiba la donkti ban rah ïa u drok kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Tazirul Sheik, na ka shnong 20 Fersakandi, West Garo Hills uba dei ruh u nongñiah jong ka kali, u Binod Baro na Ukhura, Kamrup District, Assam bad u Abdul Mukit na Shiberchak, Badarpur, Karimganj District, Assam.Ki Pulit ki la kurup ïa ka kali bad lai tylli ki Mobile Phone.
title: KURUP KI PULIT EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS ÏA U DROK HEROIN BA SHONGDOR 1.1 KLUR

content: : Arngut ki briew kiba la shah kynnoh ba ki dei kiba ki donkti ha kaba thmu ban leh be-ijot ïa kawei ka samla kynthei kaba la don kumba 17 ne 18 snem ka rta ha kawei ka shnong kaba don ha ka thaiñ Nongthliew, kaba hap hapoh ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District, ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la shah bom shnong haduh ban da jem jai ha ki paidbah nongshong shnong.Kane la jia ha ka por kumba 12:00 baje mynsngi bad u Sordar Shnong u la ioh jingtip ha ka por kumba 1:30 baje noh sngi.U Sordar Shnong ha ka jingïakren bad ki nonglum khubor u la ong, “kine ki arngut ki la ktah kti ïa ka samla kynthei bad ka don ruh ka dak na ryndang (jong ka kynthei) ïa kaba ki thmu leh be-ijot ne ki thmu pynïap ïa kata ngim tip.  Ki la don ki paidbah kiba la ïoh ïa kane bad ki la beh bad iohbat (ïa kine ki arngut). Ki paidbah ki la pyntip sha nga kum u Sordar Shnong.”U la ïathuh ba ha kaba nyngkong, la rah ïa kine ki arngut ha ka ing jong ka samla bad phla ruh ba ki arngut ki shynrang ki la thmu ban leh be-ijot ïa ka da kaba pynap da ka tari.“Kum u Sordar Shnong uba don jingkitkhlieh, ngi la ïalam noh ïa kine ki arngut sha Dorbar Hall jong ka shnong khnang ba ngin pyllait ïa ki na kano kano ka jingjia kaba sniew ïa kine ki arngut,” la ïathuh u Sordar.U la ïathuh ba ki paidbah na ki shnong kiba marjan tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ki la wan poi hapoh ka shnong.  “Ki riew rangbah jong ka shnong ki la pyrshang katba lah ban ïada ïa kine ki arngut ban ym jia kaei kaei kaba sniew ïa ki bad ngi la pyntip ruh sha ki bor jong ka aiñ (Pulit).  Ki Pulit ki la wan poi hapoh shnong hynrei ki paidbhur ki la thombor bad kim shah satia ïa ki Pulit ban tur shajan,” la ïathuh shuh shuh u Sordar Shnong.U la ïathuh, katba u dang ïakren bad ki Pulit, ki paidbhur ki la nang wan tur ban ym ailad satia ban pyllait im ïa ki arngut.“Katba ngi dang ïakren (bad ki Pulit) namar ka jingbun shaba palat ki paidbhur ngim shym la lah ban tehlakam. Ki paidbhur ki la pynpait wat ïa ka jingkhang nar (jong ka Community Hall).  Dei haba ki paidbhur ki la ioh rung shapoh ka Dorbar Hall ngim shym la lah shuh ban tehlakam ïa kane ka jingjia,” ïathuh u Sordar.U la ong ruh ba kum ka shnong ka la pyntip ba ka tnat Pulit kan phah kham bun ki bor Pulit hynrei namar ka jingduna jong ki  Pulit ki paidbhur ki la bom la shoh hakhmat jong ki Pulit (ïa ki arngut).Haba kylli, u la ïathuh ba kine ki arngut hadien ba ladep bamja sngi ki la mih na ka jaka trei bylla bad ym tip satia shaei ki leit.  U don ruh uwei u rangbah uba trei bylla lang bad uba sakhi ïa ka jingjah jong kine ki arngut na jaka trei hynrei tad haduh ban da poi ha u pud ba kin da shah bom shnong, la bynrap u Sordar Shnong.Hadien kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la pynkit noh ïa kine ki arngut kiba la mynsaw jur sha Tirot Sing Memorial Civil Hospital, Mairang.Uwei napdeng kine ki arngut u la khladnoh ynda poi ha Civil Hospital, Mairang, katba ïa uwei pat uba dang lait im la pynkynriah noh sha Shillong Civil Hospital ban ioh jingsumar.La ioh  jingtip ba uba khladnoh u dei u rangbah uba la don 36 snem ka rta bad u don 6 ngut ki khun.Ki bahaiñg hasem ki la ïathuh ba ki paidbhur kim shym la ailad satia ban ïakren pynbeit hadien ba la rah ïa ki arngut sha Dorbar Hall bad nalor kata ki paidbhur ki la tangon ïa ki arngut hakhmat jong ki.
title: TANGON KI PAIDBHUR HAKHMAT KI PULIT ÏA ARNGUT KI SUBA DONKTI LEH BE-IJOT ÏA KA SAMLA, ÏAP UWEI

content: U Myntri ka tnat Bording ka Sorkar Jylla u Abu Taher Mondal u la leit jurip ïa ka Myntdu Leshka Hydro Project ka jaka pynmih bording kaba don ha West Jaiñtia Hills District ha kaba la synran lang da u u Director ka Meghalaya Power Generation Corporation Ltd (MePGCL) Bah R. Majaw bad ki heh jong ka MePGDCL.Ka jingleit jngoh ïa ka jaka pynmih bording ka long ban sngewthuh katno ka pynmih bording mynta na kane ka jaka bad ban peit ïa ka jingdonkam bad ka jingïakren ba kumno ban pynbha ïa kane ka bynta kaba nyngkong bad ïa ka jingtrei yn sa pyndep ha ka 15 tarik u Jylliew 2024.Ha kane ka jingïalang kaba la long ha ka sngi Thohdieng la shem ba ka don kawei ka jingeh hapoh ka jaka pynmih bording Power House ba kam don ïa ka signal ban kren mobile, dei na kane ka daw ba la ai jingmut ban thied ïa ki kor phah jingtip VHF Sets hapdeng ka jaka pynmih bording bad ka jaka pynlang um ka dam.Ha kane ka sngi u Myntri kam bording u la leit ban jngoh ruh ïa ka dam bad ban peit ïa ka jingtrei ban pynbha ïa ka bad u la ban jur ba dei ban da trei sani ïa ka kam bad ïa kane ka jingtrei la pyntrei da ka M/S. Multi Tech Engineers.Kane ka jingleit jngoh jong u Myntri ka long ban pynthikna ïa ka rukom pynmih bording kaba biang na ka Leshka Project.
title: LAP U MYNTRI BORDING BYM DON NETWORK HA POWER HOUSE KA LEAHKA HYDRO PROJECT

content: Shillong, April 30: Sawmer SC grabbed full honours against Nongthymmai SC in what was their last outing of the Shillong Premier League 2023, winning 2-1 at the SSA Stadium at First Ground, Polo, here today. Shining Nongdhar (11’) and Rheadolf N Daloi (30’) scored for Sawmer in the first half, while Rabi Hansda (67’) pulled one back for Nongthymmai in the second. The last goal happened to be the 100th of SPL 2023.Both sides had gained promotion to the SPL from the First Division, which Sawmer won last season ahead of second-placed Nongthymmai. Playing with the elite clubs in the SPL was a big step up (though Sawmer have been in the SPL before for one season in 2018).Sawmer end with 6 points, their other win coming against Ryntih SC, while Nongthymmai finish on 3, having beaten fellow strugglers Nangkiew Irat. Today’s win moves Sawmer up to sixth place but Nangkiew Irat (also 3 points) still have two games to go, so they can still be overtaken.After a fairly languid start to the match, Shining scored from outside the box following a move from the right flank.Team mate Mark Austin Wanswett then saw his effort denied a few minutes later by a full-blooded dive by Nongthymmai goalkeeper Akash Thapa.Half an hour into the match, Sawmer counterattacked following a Nongthymmai free-kick and Lamshaphrang Kurbah delivered a through ball for Rheadolf, who timed his run perfectly behind two defenders. From just outside the box, he flicked the ball into the bottom corner of the net to double Sawmer’s lead.Nongthymmai’s only real effort in the first half came in the 45th minute when Y Gopi Singh clattered the crossbar.His team were more aggressive in the second half, with Andyson Lapang missing out twice, first with Sawmer keeper Pyrshang Dkhar pushing a shot on target away and then a long-range effort scooted just over the bar.Rabi finally got one to stick, although his shot from a nice move through the defence came off the horizontal before crossing the goal line.By this point Sawmer were looking a little nervous and their passing a little more erratic. However, they dug into their reserves and held off Nongthymmai for the remaining minutes and gratefully welcomed the final whistle when they could breathe a sigh of relief.Tomorrow Nangkiew Irat will take on Shillong Lajong FC at 3:15pm.
title: SHILLONG PREMIER LEAGUE 2023: SAWMER END SEASON WITH VICTORY OVER NONGTHYMMAI

content: : Uwei na ki nongshah mudui uba dang dei u khynnah uba dang hapoh 18 snem ha ka por ba la jia ka jingkynnoh shah leh be-ijot ïa kawei ka samla hadien ba la pynsaphriang ïa ka video ha ka WhatsApp, u la ujor ejahar kylla pyrshah ïa kane ka samla ha Rynjah Police Station.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills Rituraj Ravi ha ka sngi Baar, la ïathuh ba une u khynnah u la kynnoh kylla ba u la shah leh khlemakor ha kane ka samla.U SP u la pyntip ba ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh ka POCSO Act bad Indian Penal Code bad ka jingtohkit mynta ka la ïaid shakhmat.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, kane ka samla kaba la don kumba 26 snem ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai ka la mudui da ka ejahar sha ki Pulit ka Rynjah Police Station halor ka jingshah leh be-ijot ha ki saw ngut ki khynnah kiba la don kumba 20 bad 21 snem ka rta.Katkum kane ka ejahar kane ka samla ka la ïathuh ba kane ka la jia ha kawei ka jaka ha nongbah Shillong ha u bnai Nailur, 2023 bad ïa ka video ba ki la ring dur ha ka por ba ki la leh be-ijot ïa ka ki la pynsaphriang ha ka Social Media shwa ka elekshon Lok Sabha kaba dang dang shu dep long shen.Kane ka samla ka la phla ba ka ïa ithuh ithaw bha ïa uwei na pdeng kine ki saw ngut lyngba ka jingïalehkai PubG bad ha u bnai Nailur, 2024 une u paralok jong ka, u la khot sngewbha ïa ka sha ing bad da ka jingshaniah ïa la u jong u paralok ka la leit sha ing jong u khlem suba ïa ka jingmut sniew barieh jong u.  Dei ha kum kane ka por ba ma u bad lai ngut ki paralok ki la khleh da u jingdih pynbuaid ha ka umsoh bad ai dih ha ka kat haduh ba kam tip briew shuh ïalade. Dei ha kane ka khyllipmat ba ma u, bad ki lai ngut ki paralok ki la shim kabu ban leh be-ijot ïa ka ryngkat bad ka jingring video ïa kane ka kam pohjait.
title: UJOR KYLLA SA U KHYNNAH ÏA KA SAMLA BA SHAH LEH BE-IJOT HA KI SAW NGUT

content: : Ka kynhun ki samla wadkam ha ka sngi Baar ki la byrngem ban ujor sha Ingbsihar Meghalaya High Court lada ka Sorkar Jylla kam lah ban pynbeit ïa ka jingdkoh ha ka rta rungkam ha ka jingthungkam ha ka tnat Pulit.Kane ka kynhun ki samla wadkam ba la lamkhmat da ka samla Barilang Pyngrope ki la aiti ïa ka dorkhas ha u Secretary ka tnat Home (Police) u Bah Cyril V. Diengdoh.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la aiti ïa ka dorkhas, ka samla Barilang ka la ong, lada ka Sorkar kam lah ban pynbeit ïa ki jingduna ba ki la kdew, kim banse ban leit ujor sha ka Ingbishar.Ka la ong ba ka jingkwah jong ki samla wadkam ka long ba ka rta rungkam ha ka tnat Pulit ka dei ban long katkum ka Office Memorandum (OM) jong u snem 2022.Kane ka samla ka la ong hadien ba la ïohi ba ka sorkar ka la buh ïa ka Revised Guidlines khlem da pynmih ïa ka Notification, mardor ki samla wadkam ki la mih shakhmat ban pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah halor kane da kaba leit pynsngew sha ki bor ba dei khmih bad sha ka tnat Kam Pohing.
title: BA PYNRIT ÏA KA RTA THUNGKAM PULIT, BYRNGEM KI SAMLA BAN UJOR SHA ÏINGBISHAR

content: Ki Pulit ka East Jaiñtia Hils District kiba la pynlong ia ka jingtalasi ia ki kali ha Ratacherra Infil Check Post, East Jaintia Hills District ha ka sngi baar, ha ka por kumba 10:00 baje mynmie, kawei ka Bos Night Super jong ka MTC kaba don ia u nombar ML-03-0216 ka la shah pynsangeh bad shah talasi.U Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaintia Hills District, u Giri Prasad M. ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u iathuh ha ka jingtalasi, ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup ia u drok bad ia ki dawai kuli na uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Mizazur Rahman Barbhuiya uba sah ha Kachudaram, Part-II, Silchar, Cachar District, Assam.Na ka met jong u Barbhuiya, ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup ia u drok ba la thep ha ki 25 tylli ki synduk thep sabon uba shongdor 2.1 klur, 3720 tylli ki dawai kuli Nitrazepam Tablets bad kawei ka Mobile Phone.Ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh ka NDPS Act bad la kem noh ia une uba donkti bad ka jingtohkit mynta ka la iaid shakhmat.“Da ka jingkyrshan jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Meghalaya bad u Director General of Police, Meghalaya, kane ka dei ka jingiohkem drok kaba heh duh ha ka sien kaba ar hapoh lai sngi,” la ong u Prasad.
title: KURUP KI PULIT KA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS ÏA U DROK BA SHONGDOR T.2.1 KLUR

content: Ka jingther jong u lapbah bad u phria ryngkat ka lyer kaba jur ha ka sngi Baar ka la wanrah ia ka jingtwa khyndew bad ka jingkhyllem jong ki diengheh bad ki diengrit ha ki bynta jong ka surokbah National Highway-6 ha East Jaintia Hills District.Kane ka jingtwa khyndew ka la jia ha ka por kumba 5:00 baje bad ha kane ka jingjia kam don kano kano ka jingjia kaba sngewsih.Kane ka jingtwa khyndew bad jingkhyllem jong ki dieng ka la jia ha ka shnong Sonapyrdi hajan ka Chek-post jong ki shipai BSF ha kaba ki dieng kiba khyllem ki la ban ia ki katto katne tylli ki trok bad kiba la julor.Kane ka jingjia ka la wanrah ruh ka jingdheng kali ha kane ka surok bah.
title: THER U LAPBAH BAD U PHRIA HA EJH, KHYLLEM KI DEINGBAH HA NH-6

content: Ka Defence State Office, Guwahati ka la kular ban sa phah ia ka kaiphod kaba bniah halor ka jingleh sorjamin ia ki poiwir kiba sah be-aiñ ha Lum Survey, Shillong hadien ba ki bor synshar jong ka East Khasi Hills District ki la rai ban leh eiei pyrshah ia ki kam sniew kiba mih na kane ka jaka sah be-aiñ ki poiwir.Ia kane ka jingkular la khlei da ki nongmihkhmat jong Defence State Office ha ka jingialang kaba la khot da u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District u SC Sadhu ha ka sngi balang.Ka jingkhot jingialang jong u DC ia ka Defence State Office ka long halor ka jingujor jong ka Hynniewtrep Youths Council (HYC) sha ka Sorkar halor ka jingdon jong ki poiwir kiba sah beain ha Lum Survey ha lyndet ka Them Iewmawlong.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Sadhu u la iathuh ba ki nongmihkhmat jong ka Defence State Office ha Guwahati ki la wan mihkhmat ha ka jingialang bad ki la iasam jingtip bad ia ki kam ba kin sa leh ha kaba iadei bad ka jaka ha Lum Survey.“Ki (DSO) la kular ban sa iasam ia ki jingtip.  Ngin sa bishar bniah khnang ba ki jingtip ba bniah kin iarap ia ngi ba ngin dup lah ban shim rai hadien,” la ong u Sadhu.Ha kaba iadei bad ki mukotduma ba dang sah pongding hapoh ka Iingbishar u Sadhu u la pyntip, “ha kaba sdang ka la don ka jingialeh mukotduma halor kane ka jaka bad la pynksan (ia ka jinglong trai) jong ka Defence State Office.”U la ong ynda ka Defence State Office ka la phah ia ka Eviction Notice, katto katne ki briew, kiba sah hangto, ki la leit sha Iingbishar bad ka Ingbishar ka la pynmih da ka hukum (Stay Order) ba ka jingkyndang (ia ki poiwir) ka dei ban long katkum ka ain.U la iathuh ba jingbishar kaba dang shu dep long shen ka la long ha u bnai Nohprah, 2023 bad ka Ingbishar ka la buh sngi biang ha ka 27 tarik, Jymmang ban shong bishar halor kane ka kam.Haba kylli, u DC, u la ong, “ia mynta, (ym shym la leh ia ka jingsorjamin) namarba kane ka kam ka la don hapoh ka Ingbishar bad ka Ingbishar ka la buh sngi ha ka 27 tarik Jymmang ban pynmih ia ka rai.  Ka long kum ka jingkheiñ dewthala bad ngin ym pat leh ia ka jingsorjamin ia mynta.  Hynrei kin (DSO) phah ia ka kaiphod kaba bniah namarba ki ladep leh ia ka jingsorjamin.”Shuh shuh, u Sadhu u la iathuh ba ki bor synshar District kin sa shimkhia ban leh eiei pyrshah ia ki kam runar ruser kiba ju mih na Lum Survey.  “Ngin sa iatreilang bad u SP jong ka East Khasi Hills na ka bynta ban ioh ia kaiphod halor ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha kane ka jaka khnang ba ngin dup lah ban leh eiei ia kino kino kiba pynkhein ia ki kyndon ain bad ka shongsuk shongsaiñ,” ong u Sadhu.U la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingialang la thaw ruh ia ka Joint Committee ba kynthup na ka ophis u DC, ka Defence State Office, ka tnat Pulit bad ka Municipal Board.  U la iathuh ba la phah tohkit hapoh shitaiew ha ki bor Pulit khnang ban pynshisha ia ki jingsniew kiba mih na ka jaka sah ki poiwirHalor ka jingkynnoh ba ka jaka sah ki poiwir ha Lum Survey ka dei ka ktem die drok, u DC u la iathuh ba u dang ap ia ka kaiphod na ki Pulit bad hadien ba ladep ban pynshisha yn sa shim ia ki lad ki lynti ban pynduhjait ia ki kam sniew.
title: KULAR KA DEFENCE STATE OFFICE BAN AI KAIPHOD SHA U DC HALOR KIBA SAH BEAIN HA LUM SURVEY

content: Ki runar ki bym lah satia ban ithuh durkhmat hynnin ka miet shiteng synñia ki la kawang da ki Petrol Bomb hakhmat ka khyrdop jong ka Sadar Police Station bad ka Rynjah Police Station bad ïa ka ophis Meghalaya Government Construction Corporation Limited (MGCC) kaba don ha ka thaiñ Rilbong.U Chowkidar uba ju ap ha ka ophis MGCC ha ka jingiakren bad u nonglum khubor jong ka Batesi Tv ula ïathuh ba ki runar ki la wan da ka Scooty bad katkum ka video na ka CCTV jong ka ophis MGCC la sngewthuh ba dei ha ka por 11:39 baje mynmiet ka sngi baar ba la kawang da u petrol bom sha ka jaka ba la pynieng ïa ki kali ha phyllaw jong ka ophis.Ha kane ka jingjia, ki ar tylli ba la pynieng ha phyllaw jong ka ophis ki la lait thaw na ka jingkem ding.Ki Pulit tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane, ki la leit mar mar sha ka ophis MGCC bad shimti noh ïa ki lyngkhot bilor ba la pait ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit.
title: SHAH KAWANG PETROL BOMB AR TYLLI KI POLICE STATION BAD KA OPHIS MGCC

content: Ki bor Pulit ki la pynkhlaiñ ia ka jingpahara ha Shillong bad sha ki district bapher bapher ka jylla hadien ba ki la jia ki jingshah kawang petrol bom ha ki nongkynti ka Sorkar bad kynthup ia ki Police Station.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District u SC Sadhu u la ong, “ha ka jingshisha ia kane ladep iasyllok hynnin mynmiet bad u SP.  Ngi la pynkhlaiñ ia ka jingpahra khamtam ha ka por mynmiet.”U la iathuh ba u SP u la pynkhreh da ka buit ban iakhun pyrshah ia ki jingpynthud ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.“Ngi la iakren ia kaei kaba ngi dei ban leh bad ia ki lad ki lynti ban ithuh ia kiba donkti bad ngin sa pyntip,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u DC u la pyntip ba la pynmih ia ka jingbthah bakyrpang sha baroh ki tnat treikam jong ka Sorkar bad sha ki ophis Sorkar.“Ngi ladep pyntip sha baroh ki tnat ba kin long kiba peitngor bad ba kin iada ia ki nongkynti jong ka sorkar, khamtam eh ban ym buh ha ki jaka paidbah bad ia ki kali sorkar.  Ngi la pynkhlain ia ka jingpahara bad ngi kyrmen ba ha ki shi sngi ar sngi ngin sa lah ban tehlakam ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ,” u la bynrap.
title: BA JIA KI JINGKAWANG PETROL BOMB, PYNKHLAIÑ KI PULIT ÏA KA JINGPAHARA

content: : Ka tnat PWD (Roads) ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pan da ka jingthoh na ka Green Tech Foundation (GTC) na ka bynta ban pynpra noh ïa ka jingtei ba la siang dewbilat halor ka Wah Thangsniang, ha ka dong Nongrimbah, Laitumkhrah, Shillong.U Chairman jong ka Foundation, Bah H. Bansiewdor Nonglang ha ka jingïakren bad u nonglum khubor hadien ka jingïakynduh ïa u Engineer jong ka tnat PWD (Raods) ha ka sngi Balang u la ïathuh ba la ïoh jingtip ba ka jingtei ka dei ka jong ka tnat PWD (Roads) bad katkum ka jingïakren la sngewthuh ka la don ka jingsorjamin hapdeng ka PWD, ka Meghalaya Pollution Control Board, Shillong Municipal Board bad kiwei kiwei ki tnat.U la ïathuh ba ka Foundation kan sa pynkhreh ban leit aiti da ka jingthoh sha ka tnat PWD (R) lashai ka sngi Palei.“Kumba ngi la ong naduh kaba sdang ba ngin ym ailad ïa kane ka jingtei bad kum ban pynkynmaw biang ba ka jingtei ka pynkheiñ ïa ka Standing Order ba la pynmih da ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court ha u snem 2019 bad ka la pynkhein ïa ka Section 3 Clause A, Clause B jong ka Meghalaya Water Bodies Reservation and Conservation Guidelines 2023.  Ka la pynkheiñ ruh ïa ka Solid Waste Management Rules, 2016 bad ïa ka Construction and Demolition Waste Management Rules, 2016,” la ong u Bah Nonglang.U la ong ba ha ka jingïakynduh ka Foundation ka la dawa ba dei ban pynpra beit bad ïa ka jingtei la mang pisa hi da ka tnat PWD (R). “Ki la ong ïa ngi ba kin pynpra beit ïa ka jingtei bad ki donkam pat ïa ka jingthoh na ka Foundation,” u la bynrap.“Ka la mih ruh ka jingkren nangne nangtai ba ha Sor Shillong ki bun kum kine ki jingtei kiba la tap ïa ka wah. Sangeh noh shisyndon namarba ka Green Tech Foundation nangne shakhmat kan sa sdang ban leit jurip ïa kita ki jingtei,” ong u Bah Nonglang.“Wat pynshlur ba ka jingtei ha Wah Thangsniang kan pynshlur pat ïa kiwei pat ki jingtei halor ki wah ka Sor Shillong,” la maham u Bah Nonglang.
title: BAN PYNPRA ÏA KA JINGTEI HA WAH THANGSNIANG, LAITUMKHRAH, PAN JINGTHOH KA PWD NA KA GTF

content: : Ar tylli ki trok Dumper jong kawei ka Company kaba don ha ka shnong Bokmagre, Tura, West Garo Hills District ki la shah wiang ding ha ki riew shim kabu.Ki Pulit ka Aramaile Police Station ki la ïoh jingtip halor kane ha ka por kumba 3 baje mynstep sngi Balang.Marmar ki Pulit ki la pyntip sha ki Pulit ka tnat Fire and Emergency Services (F&RS) kiba la poi biang por ban pynlip ïa ka ding kaba la sdang ban klang ha ki ar tylli ki trok.Ki Pulit kiba la poi ha kane ka jaka ki la lap ba ki ar tylli ki trok ki dang kem ding.Hadien ba la lah ban tem ïa ka jingklang jong ka ding, la shem ba kawei ka trok kaba don ïa u nombar ML08-G- 9499 ka la ingkhong, katba kawei pat ka trok kaba don ïa u nombar ML08-G-1181 ka la ingkhong tang na ki bynta ba shakhmat.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingjia ki Pulit ki la register case bad ki la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap ksai ïa kiba donkti ha kane ka kam.
title: THANG KI RUNAR ARTYLLI KI TROK DUMPER KA COMPANY HA BOKMAGRE, TURA, JULOR KAWEI

content: Ka kynhun ki Pulit ka Search and Rescue Team (SRT) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la ioh sei ïa ka met ïap jong u Prabodh Brahma uba la ngam jyllop Katba u dang jngi ha ka thwei Jingkieng Nar kaba don ha lynti ïaid kjat u David Scott ha Mawphlang ha ka sngi Thohdieng ha ka por kumba 2.20 baje noh sngi.U Prabodh Brahma u dei u samla pule jong ka National Institute of Fashion Technology (NIFT), Shillong u la duhei ïa la ka jong ka jingim hadien u la ngam jyllop ha kane ka thwei katba ma u lem bad saw ngut ki paralok ki la leit jngi ha kane ka thwei.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum, la ïathuh ba u Brahma u la leit ïaid kjat bad ka kynhun jong ki samla pule ka NIFT sha lynti David Scott bad dei ynda la poi ha kane ka thwei ma u bad ki paralok ki la ïa jngi bad kumno re kumno une u samla ula ngat pynban ha ka sni jong ka jingïap.U Prabodh Brahma u dei na ka shnong krokrajhar, Assam bad ki Pulit ki la pynkit noh ïa ka met jong u sha Shillong Civil Hospital na ka bynta ban leh ïa ka Postmortem shwa ban aiti sha ki bahaïing hasem ban pyndep ïa ka jinglehniam bakhatduh.
title: NGAM JYLLOP U SAMLA PULE NIFT HA THWEI JINGKIENG NAR, MAWPHLANG

content: Defending champions Mawlai SC ended the round robin stage of the Shillong Premier League 2023 in second place following a whopping 6-1 victory over Nangkiew Irat SC at the SSA Stadium at First Ground, Polo, here today.Felix Lalruatsanga (7’) gave Nangkiew Irat an early lead but it was one way traffic after that with goals for Mawlai by Fullmoon Mukhim (29’P), Romarius Laban (36’), Kevin Rymbai (65’), Donlad Diengdoh (68’), Pynbha Suting (73’) and Mark G Shabong (87’).This was the last match of the league stage of the tournament, with Mawlai ending on 16 points, just behind Rangdajied United FC’s 18. Shillong Lajong FC and Langsning FC follow in third and fourth positions on 15 points each, with Lajong in front based on head-to-head.The eagerly awaited semifinals will now follow next week. Rangdajied will meet Lajong in the first knockout fixture on 7 May before Mawlai face Langsning in the second semi on 8 May. Both matches will begin at 3:15pm and be held at the SSA Stadium.Nangkiew Irat stunned the opposition when a chipped ball forwards was not dealt with by the defence, opening up the way for Felix to score low past Mawlai goalkeeper Lambhamiki Lamare.However, Nangkiew Irat are the least prolific scorers in SPL 2023 – they have averaged just one goal per game and this continued today.They were not too happy when Mawlai were awarded a penalty when Abhishek Verma was adjudged to have cut down Reformer Pale in the box. Fullmoon, wearing the captain’s armband today, stepped up to take the shot and aimed it past Shambu Mistry, with the goalkeeper guessing the correct way but he was nowhere near the ball.The big man made two excellent saves in the 33rd minute to deny Donlad but the defence was poor from that point on, letting Mawlai get behind them with ease.Romarius tapped in a cross from the right flank in the 36th minute after his team had missed two similar opportunities in the few minutes before that.That left Mawlai leading 2-1 and the scoreline remained that way until 20 minutes into the second half when a defensive mistake allowed Kevin to slot in for Mawlai’s third goal of the day.Three minutes later the ball was given away to Baiaikara Swer and he laid it on for Donlad to take a running shot to make it 4-1. And just five minutes after that, Pynbha Suting, who had just come on as a substitute a short while before, took a left-footer out of the blue that came in off the woodwork to increase Nangkiew Irat’s misery.The final nail in the coffin saw Shambu guilty of a hopeless giveaway minutes from the final whistle and that allowed Mark, another substitute, to score.Nangkiew Irat thus end a terrible season dead last in the standings with just 3 points from a win against Sawmer SC. They are tied with Nongthymmai SC on points but the latter have head-to-head advantage.Given the short amount of time available to hold the SPL this season and the subsequent reduction to a single leg format, it was decided before the league began that there will be no relegation this year, which would be a relief for Nongthymmai and Nangkiew Irat as they will have an opportunity to come back stronger when SPL 2024 begins in a few months time.
title: SHILLONG PREMIER LEAGUE 2023: MAWLAI STEAMROLL NANGKIEW IRAT TO TAKE 2ND PLACE

content: Ka Jylla Meghalaya ka dei kaba wan baar ha ka ri India ha ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba ioh ïa ka jingpang bampong ne Cancer bad katkum ka jingwad bniah jong ka Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR), ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba ioh pang bampong ha Meghalaya ka long, ki shynrang iwei na ki san ngut bad ki kynthei ka long iwei na ki khyndai.Ïa kane la pyntip da ka Head of Department jong ka Oncology Department ka Civil Hospital Shillong ka Dr Anisha Mawlong ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.Ka Dr. Mawlong ka la ïathuh, ha Naiwieng bad u Nohprah 2023, ka Oncology Department ka la pynlong ïa ka jingwad bniah ha ki 11 tylli ki District ka Jylla Meghalaya ban eksamin ïa ki paidbah khnang ban lap ïa kiba don ïa ka jingpang bampong.“Na ki 11 tylli ki District, tang 1093 ngut kiba wan shakhmat ban shah eksamin bad napdeng kine la lap ba 15 ngut ki don ïa ka jingpang bampong bad 71 ngut ki dei kiba hap ban eksamin bniah ha Shillong Civil
