Hospital,” la ïathuh ka Dr. Mawlong.“Hadien ba la eksamin bniah ïa ki 71 ngut ha Shillong Civil Hospital, la lap ba napdeng kine, 40 ngut ki don jingpang bampong bad lada kheiñ kyllum lang napdeng ki 1093 ngut kiba la wan phah eksamin paidbah (Screening), 55 ngut ki don jingpang bampong,” la ïathuh ka Dr. Mawlong.Ka Dr. Mawlong ka la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei ban sheptieng hynrei ban wan shakhmat ban phah eksamin, shisien ha ka lai snem khnang ban lap kloi ïa ka jingpang.“Lada ngi lap kham kloi ïa ka jingpang ka jingsumar kan long kaba suk bad kito kiba don ka jingpang kin ioh ïa ka jingkoit  ha ka por kaba biang,” la bynrap ka Dr. Mawlong.Ka la ïathuh ba ka Jylla Meghalaya ka dei kaba wan baar hapoh ka ri India ha ka jingdon jong kiba iohpang bampong bad pyntip shuh shuh ba ka Meghalaya ka wan banyngkong ha ka ri India ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba ioh pang bampong na ka jingkyrni ban dih bad ban bam duma.“Katkum ka kaiphod jong ka ICMR ngi tip ba ka Meghalaya ka wan baar napdeng ki Jylla hapoh ka Ri ha ka jingbun kiba ioh pang bampong ha kaba ki shynrang ka long 227.9 ngut  na ki 1 lak ngut ki nongshong shnong bad ki kynthei 118.6 ngut na ki 1 lak ngut ki nongshong shnong,” la ong ka Dr Anisha bad bynrap ba ka Meghalaya ka la wan banyngkong napdeng kiba iohpang bampong na ryndang.Ka Dr. Mawlong ka la ïathuh ba ka jingpang bampong ka la sar ym tang ha ki jaka sor hynrei ka la pur ruh wat sha ki shnong nongkyndong jong ka Jylla bad ïathuh ruh ba ka jingpang Hypertension bad Diabetes ki dei ki jingpang kiba pynïap briew jarjar nalor ba ka jingpang bampong ruh ka dei ka jingpang kaba pynïap jar jar ïa ki nongshong shnong ha kane ka jylla.Ïa mynta ka Jylla Meghalaya ka don ar tylli ki jaka sumar ïa ki briew kiba ioh ïa ka jingpang bampong ba kynthup ïa ka Shillong Civil Hospital bad ka North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS), Hospital.Katkum ka jingathuh jong ka Dr. Mawlong, ka Cancer Wing ha Civil Hospital, Shillong kaba don 90 tylli ki jingthiah shen kan sa ioh ïa ka Machine Linear Accelerator bad ka Bracket Therapy ban sumar ïa ki briew kiba ioh ïa ka jingpang bampong.Ka la ïathuh, nalor ki tiar sumar ïa ka jingpang, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pyntreikam da ka Meghalaya Cancer Prevention and Early Detection Mission bad lyngba kane ka mishon la ju pynlong ïa ki jingleh eksamin ïa ki paidbah ha ki bynta bapher bapher ka jylla ban lap bad ban sumar biang por ïa ki nongpang ba la ithuh ba ki don ïa ka jingpang bampong.
title: 55 NGUT KIBA ÏOH JINGPANG CANCER HA KA SCREENING TEST HA KI 11 TYLLI KI DISTRICT HA U 2023

content: U lapbah uba jur u la ther ha ka sngi u Blei ha ki kylleng ki bynta jong ka jylla Meghalaya.U lapbah u la sdang ban hap ha ka por kumba 10:00 baje tam eiei ha nongbah Shillong kat haduh ba ki lynti ki syngkien kin la shlei da ka um na ka jingset jong ki platik bad ki jaboh jabaiñ ïa ki nala rit bad ki nala heh.Shwa ba ban ther u lapbah lapsan ka suiñ bneng ka la dum hi ngaiñ.  Ki briew ki la shong rit mynsiem ha la ïing namar ka jingtied u pyrthat bad ka jingthaba ka leilieh ka la long kaba ishyrkhei bha.Kumba ha ka por 10.30 baje mynstep ka eriong ka la beh kynsan bad ka la jynrat haduh 20 tylli ki ing ha ka shnong Mawlynrei, Shillong bad pynkhyllem ruh ïa u nar post elektrik.U Rangbah Shnong ka Mawlynrei Bah Ornel Pyngrope u la ïathuh ba ki iing kiba la shah pynjulor ha kane ka eriong ki don 20 tylli ha ka por ba la leit jurip da ki nongkitkam shnong.U Bah Pyngrope u la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jingshah lynshop ha ka mariang kam shyn don kano kano ka jingjia basngewsih ne kano kano ka jingktah ïa ki briew bad u la ong ba ka shnong kan dang jurip ban lap ïoh dang don shuh ki ing kiba la shah pynjulor.Ka jingjur jong u slap ka la wanrah ruh ïa ka jingshlei um hapdeng surok Lachaumiere mar pyrshah ka Ophis DIPR, Shillong ha kaba la sakhi ba ki kali ki la hap ban ïaid napdeng ka um kaba la shlei hapdeng surok.Ha ka por kumba 11:00 baje tam eiei u slap uba jur u la ther ha ka thaiñ Mawnai bad ki shnong kiba don marjan kiba hap hapoh ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District bad nalor kata ki la shah lynshop ruh ha u phria.Ka jinghap jong u phria ka long kaba jur haduh katta katta haduh ba ki tnum iing ki la satah da u phria bad ki tnum kali ruh kumjuh.Nalor kata, ki don ruh ki tnum iing kiba la pei na ka jinghap jong u phria.Kane ka jingap jong u phria ka la pynjulor ruh ïa ki mar rep ha kane ka thaiñ namarba bun na ki nongshong shnong ki dei kiba dang im ha ka rep ka riang.Ïa ka jingduh jingsep ha ka shnong Mawnai ym pat lah satia ban ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah kat haduh ba thoh ïa kane ka khubor.Ka thymmei khubor ka ïathuh ba ki bor synshar jong ka East Khasi Hills District ki la phah ïa ki briew jong ka sorkar ban leit ban jurip halor kane ka jingshah pynjulor ha ka mariang.U phria uba jur u la hap ruh sha ki bynta jong ka thaiñ Pynursla, Mawsynram, Rambrai, ki bynta ka shnong Kynshi bad Sohra.
title: LIED KA ERÏONG ÏA KI ÏING HA MAWLYNREI, LYNSHOP U PHRIA ÏA KI MAR REP BAD KI ÏING HA MAWNAI

content: : Ka Dorbar Shnong Wahsiej, Maharam Syiemship, South West Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka taiew baladep ka la pynkup burom ia u Heprit Elambok Dkhar, 13 snem ka rta kum u riewshlur halor ka kam shlur ba u la leh da kaba pyllait im ia kawei ka khynnah samla kaba kyrteng ka Saphibanroy Thongni (15 snem ka rta) na ka jingngam jyllop ha Wah Rilang ha ka 21 tarik Iaiong, 2024.Ha ka 21 tarik Iaiong 2024, ka shnong Wahsiej ka la iam briew hadien ba ar ngut ki khynnah samla, kata, ka Shabakmenlang Wanniang (16 snem) bad ka Aishabankmen Thongni (14 snem) ki la ngam jyllop noh ha kawei ka thwei ha Wah Rilang, kaba ki khot ka thwei Breimeirit katba ki dang ia jngi.Nalor kane, ka Dorbar Shnong Wahsiej ka la pynkup burom Riewshlur ruh ia uwei u rangbah, u Bah Lambok Thongni uba la jngi bad leit sei hi marwei ia kitei ki ar tylli ki metiap.Ha kane ka jingjia, ka Saphibanroy Thongni kaba dei ka hymmen trai jong ka Aishabankmen Thongni ka la noh lang shapoh thwei ban iarap ia la kajong ka para, hynrei ka la shah tan lang hapoh um, hynrei donbok ba la wan lap da utei u Heprit Elambok Dkhar uba la jngi shapoh um bad pyllait im ia ka.Nalor ka Dorbar Shnong Wahsiej, kiwei pat kiba la pynkup burom ia u Heprit Elambok ki kynthup ia ka Seng Samla Shnong Wahsiej, ka Social Economic Life and Development (SELD) Committee jong ka Jingiaseng Samla Balang Presbyterian Wahsiej, ka Iatreilang Village Organisation, ka Wahsiej Sports Club, Wahsiej Govt LP School, ka Banrikynti LP School, bad ka Church of God LP School.Ha kane ka sngi la iadonlang u Deputy Commissioner jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, Bah T. Lyngwa kum u kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingiadonlang ka Kong A. Sawkmie, SI Mawkyrwat Police Station, bad kumjuh ruh ki ophisar napoh District Child Protection Office, District Social Welfare Office bad Block Development Office, Mawkyrwat.
title: KULAR U DC BAN PYNÏOH NATIONAL BRAVERY AWARD ÏA U HEPRIT ELAMBOK DKHAR

content: Kawei ka samla kaba dang pule ha ka Civil Engineering ha Shillong Polytechnic, Shillong kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Diana Dimre Ch Marak, 24 snem ka rta ka la pynkut noh ia ka la jong ka jingim da kaba sdien phasi ialade da ka jaiñ Gamsha ha ka grill jingkhang iit jong ka Girls Hostel ha ka mala kaba nyngkong.Kane ka samla ka dei na ka shnong Upper Babupara, Tura, West Garo Hills District.  Kane ka la jia ha ka step Lah Sngi u Blei ha ka por kumba 2:00 baje mynstep.Ia kane la lap da u Chowkidar uba peit ia ka Hostel kaba sah ki samla pule kynthei ha Shillong Polytechnic hadien ka jingwiar bad ka jingjlew jong ki ksew ha ka step Lah Sngi u Blei ha ka por kumba 2:00 baje mynstepU Chowkidar uba ju ap pahara ia ka Girls Hostel u Bah Khrawkupar Suchiang ha ka jingiakren bad u nonglum khubor ka Batesi Tv u la iathuh ba u la kyndit naba ioh thiah hadien ba u la iohsngew ia ka jingjlew bad ka jingwiar jong ki ksew u la mih shabar ban peit hynrei kumba iuh tdong bseiñ, u la lap pynban ha ka mala kaba nyngkong ba ka samla Diana ka la sdien phasi pynban ialade.Marmar u Bah Khrawkupar u la pyntip noh ia kane ka jingjia sha ka Warden jong ka Girls Hostel ka Kong Pynjainailang Garod ha kaba ka la pyntip pat sha ki Pulit jong ka Mawlai Police Station.Ia ka met ba dang sah jong kane ka samla ki Pulit ki la pynkit noh sha Shillong Civil Hospital na ka bynta ban leh ia ka Postmortem shwa ban aiti noh sha ki bahaing hasem ban pyndep ia ka jinglehniam bakhatduh ha Tura.U Director incharge Principal jong ka Shillong Polytechnic Bah WL Warjri u la pynpaw ka jingsngewsih halor kane ka jingjia namarba ka dei ka sien banyngkong eh ba kan wan jia kum kane ka jingjia bym poi pyrkhat ha kane ka shlem pule.“Nga pynpaw ia ka jingsngewsih kaba khraw na ka liang jong nga bad na ka liang jong ka Institute ban duh ia ka mynsiem bakordor ha kane ka rukom ka long ka jingkthang kaba khraw.  Ngim poi pyrkhat balei ine i khynnah i leh haduh katne ialade. Lada i don kano kano ka jingeh ba i shem ha ka jingshisha i la dei ban iathuh ia ngi, ia i Warder lane ia nga. Hynrei ngi la shu jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ngi sngewsih haduh katta katta,” ong u Bah Warjri.“Ngi phah ia ka khubor sngewlem sha ki kmie ki kpa bad ki bahaing hasem kiba don jingiadei bad ine i khynnah,” la bynrap u Bah Warjri.
title: DA KA GAMSHA PHASI KA SAMLA PULE CIVIL ENGINEERING HA SHILLONG POLYTECHNIC

content: Ka Hynniewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Chief Executive Officer (CEO) ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ban dawa ba dei ban weng noh ia ka jaka bret niut ha Motphran, Shillong.Ka seng ka la pynksan ia kane ka jingdawa da kaba pyntip ba ha ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai ki dkhot ka seng ki la leit jurip ia ka jaka bret niut ba la buh da ka Shillong Municipal Board ha Motphran hadien ba la ioh ia ka jingujor na ki paidbah ba bun balang.Ha ka jingjurip ka seng ka la lap ba kane ka jaka bret ñiut ym tang ba ka pynmih ia ka jingsma iwtung kaba ktah ia ka koit ka khiah jong ki nongleit nongwan hynrei ka la kylla long ka jaka die bad jaka dih drok jong ki briew kiba ju pyndonkam ban leh ia kine ki kam sniew haba shit bashai.Katkum ka dorkhas ba la aiti ha u CEO ka Municipal ba la soi da u Vice President Bah Francis G. Mawlong ka seng ka la pyntip ba kine jingdih drok ki jia wat ha ka por mynsngi bad pyntip ruh ba ka seng ka la ioh bat ia ki briew kiba dang dih drok ha kane ka jaka ha ka sngi ba la leit jurip.“Ka jingdon jong ka jaka bret niut ym tang ba ka long ka jaka kaba shngain ia ki nongdih drok ha ka jaka ba iohi lut ki paidbah nongleit nongwan hynrei ka pynlong ia ka Motphran kum ka Marten, ia kaba yn ym lah satia ban pdiang bad kaba dei ban pynrem da baroh namarba ia ki jaboh jabaiñ la shu ieh lyngkrang bad saphriang ha surok kaba don hapdeng jong ka sor,” la ong ka dorkhas na ka seng.“Namarkata, ngi dawa ba dei ban weng noh mardor ia kane ka jaka bret ñiut bad ban pynkhuid pynsuba noh mardor ia kane ka jaka hynrei lym kumta ngim banse ban weng hi noh dalade,” la maham ka seng.
title: KYLLA JAKA DIH DROK KA JAKA THEHÑIUT HA MOTPHRAN, PHAH WENG KA HYC ÏA KA MUNICPAL

content: Ka kynhun ialehkai na ka jylla Maharashtra ha ka liang jong ki shynrang bad ka kynhun ialehkai na ka jylla Rajasthan ha ka liang ki kynthei ki la iohrah ia ka nam lahduh ha ka 4th Senior Roll Ball Federation Cup ba la pynlong da ka Meghalaya Roll Ball Association (MRBA) ba la iashim bynta da ki 11 tylli ki kynhun jong ki shynrang bad ki kynthei na ki jylla bapher bapher jong ka ri India.Ha kane ka lympung ialehkai kaba ar sngi ba la pynlong ha Basketball Court jong ka St. Anthonys Higher Secondary School, Laitumkhrah Shillong kaba la kut noh ha ka sngi u Blei la pynhap pyrda da u Working President jong ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) Bah John Kharshiing uba la long kum u kongsan bad uba la sam ia ki khusnam sha ki kynhun kiba la jop ha kane ka lympung ialehkai.Ha kane ka jingiakhun phainal, ha ka liang jong ki kynthei, ka Tamil Nadu ka la wan ha ka kyrdan kaba baar bad ka Assam ka la wan ha ka kyrdan kaba lai.Ha ka liang jong ki shynrang, ka Jharkhand ka la wan ha ka kyrdan kaba ar bad ka Rajasthan ka la wan ha ka kyrdan kaba lai.
title: 4TH SENIOR ROLL BALL FEDERATION CUP: LAHDUH KA RAJASTHAN BAD MAHARASHTRA

content: : Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Cuncil (HYC) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la ioh bat kumba 15 haduh 20 ngut eiei ki nongdih drok na ka thain Polo ter ter shaduh Demseiñïong katba ki dang iadih pynleiñ pynleiñ ia u drok ha ki jaka paidbah.Napdeng kine ki 20 ngut ki nongdih drok, mar shiteng ki dei ki bar jylla bad bad kiwei ki dei ki jaidbynriew na kane ka jylla.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President ka HYC Bah Roykupar Synrem u la ong hadien ba ka seng ka la ioh ia ka jingujor ba ki don ki nongdih drok kiba ju mlien ban dih paidbah ia u drok, ka seng marmar ka la leit ban bat bad ai jingsneng ia ki da kaba phah bat skhor.U la ong ba ka jingbat jong ka seng ia ki nongdie drok ka long ban ai jingsneng ba kim dei shuh ban dih drok ha ki jaka paidbah.U la ong ba ka seng kan sa leit sha kiwei ki jaka hapoh ka Sor Shillong ban pyntikna ba kim dei ban dih ha ki jaka paidbah.Ha kajuh ka por, u la kyntu ia ki kmie ki kpa, ia ka Sorkar bad ki Dorbar Shnong ba ki dei ban shim ia ki sienjam ban tehlakam ia kane ka jingjyllei jong ki nongdih bad ki nongdie drok ha ka jylla.“Ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban buh ia ki Rehabilitation Centre kaba lah ban iarap ia ki briew kiba duna ka kamai kajih khnang ba kin lah ban lait na kane kine ki jingdih kiba sniew,” la kyntu u nongialam ka HYC ia ka Sorkar.
title: KUMBA 20 NGUT KI NONGDIH DROK ÏOHBAT KA HYC NA POLO HADUH DEMSEIÑÏONG

content: Lai ngut ki briew ba la suba jur ba ki dei kiba donkti ban pyniap dusmon ia uwei u rangbah uba la tip kyrteng kum u Pynskhemlang Lyngkhoi (27 snem) na ka shong Nongbah Marshillong, kaba jngai tang kumba 3 kilomitar eiei na Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills District ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit.Lai ngut ki briew kiba la shah kem ki long u Paul Andrew Lakiang na ka shnong Mawkyrwat, u Michael Wanniang na shnong Marshillong bad u Ricky Paul Snaitang na shnong Nonglang, kiba hap hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District.Kum ban shu pyntip, ha ka 2 tarik, Iaiong, 2024 ki paitbah nongshong shnong ki la lap ia ka metiap jong u Bah Pynskhemlang Lyngkhoi kaba don ia ki dak mong na ki bynta jong u ryndang, ka kti kamon bad kiwei de ki bynta jong ka met, na kawei ka jaka hajan ka pynthor kba ha Riatthawlong, kaba hap hapoh ka shnong Mawkyrwat bad kaba dei ruh ka lynti iaid kjat ban leit sha shnong Marshillong.Ki Pulit la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bad haduh mynta ki la ioh kem lai ngut ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam pyniap briew bad ka jingtohkit ka la dang iaid shaphrang.Ki Pulit ki la nang buddien shuh shuh ia kane ka jingjia ban iohkem lut ia baroh kiba donkti.
title: SHAH KEM LẠI NGUT KIBA SHAH SUBA BA PYNÏAP DUSMON U RANGBAH RIATTHAWLONG

content: U Myntri ka tnat Disaster Management ka Sorkar Jylla Bah Kyrmen Shylla ha ka 6 tarik, Jymmang, 2024 u la iathuh ba ka jingther jong u Lapbah, u phria bad ka jingbeh kyrthep jong ka erïong ha ka janmiet sngi U Blei ka 5 tarik Jymmang, 2024 ka la pynjulor haduh 483 tylli ki iing bad palat 29 tylli ki Community and Rural Development Block ki la shah ktah hapoh ka Jylla myghalaya baroh kawei.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba katkum ka jingkheiñ ba la ai da ka State Disaster Management Authority, la pyntip ba artylli ki iingskul ki la shah jynrat ha Eastern West Khasi Hills bad kawei ka tnum jong ka iingmane ka la shah rong ha Wapung, East Jaiñtia Hills.Ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba la shah ktah ha kane ka jingwan hap u phria, u slap bad ka erïong, ka la kot sha ka 949 ngut ha baroh kawei ka Jylla.U Myntri u la iathuh ba ka SDMA ka pyntip ba lai tylli ki C&RD Block kiba la shah ktah ha ka jinglynshop ka erïong bad u slap uba jur ki long ka Mawryngkneng, ka Mawkynrew bad ka Mawphlang Block.U la ong ba ha Mawryngkneng Block, kawei ka Shnong ka la shah ktah na ka eriong bad haduh 21 tylli ki iing ki la shah pynjulor. Katba ha Mawphlang Block ka la mad ïa u lapbah uba la pynjulor ïa lai tylli ki Ïing.Shuh shuh u la pyntip ba katkum ka kaiphod jong ka SDMA  la shem ba ka jingpynjulor kaba jur eh ka long ha Eastern West Khasi Hills na ka jinglynshop jong u u phria bad ka jingwan ka erïong eriong ha kaba haduh 14 tylli ki shnong ki la shah ktah bad haduh 69 tylli ki iing ki la shah pynjulor kynthup ruh artylli ki iingskul ki la shah pynjulor ha ka erïong bad u phria. U la ïathuh ba haduh 413 ngut ki briew ki la shah ktah ha kane ka District bad haduh 50 hectare ki jaka rep ki la shah pynjulor.Ka Nongstoiñ Block ruh ka la shah ktah jur bha ha u phria bad ka erïong ha kaba haduh 52 tylli ki iing ki la shah pynjulor bad haduh 250 ngut ki briew kila shah ktah.Katba ha Mawshynrut Block, ka erïong ka la lynshop jur ha kawei ka shnong bad ki don haduh 11 tylli ki iing ba shah pynjulor bad 57 ngut ki briew kila shah ktah.Ha West Jaintia District ka la mad ïa ka jinglynshop jong ka erïong bad artylli ki Block kiba la shah ktah ha ka jingwan ka eriong bad kine ki dei ka Thadlaskeiñ bad Amlarem Block. Ha Thadlaskeiñ, 2 tylli ki Shnong kila shah ktah bad 4 tylli ki Ïing kila shah pynjulor katba ha Amlarem pat, tang kawei ka shnong ka la shah ktah bad kawei ka Ïing kala shah pynjulor.Ha East Jaiñtia Hills District, u lapbah u la wanrah ïa ki jingjulor ha ki artylli ki Block ba kynthup ïa ka Wapung bad Saipung Block.  Ha Wapung Block, kawei ka Shnong ka la shah lynshop jur eh bad 2 tylli ki Ïing bad kawei ka Ïingmane ki la shah pynjulor bad 18 ngut ki briew kila shah ktah.Ha Saipung Block, tang kawei ka Ïing ka la shah pynjulor bad 7 ngut ki briew kila shah ktah. Ïa ki briew ba shah ktah la pynkynriah noh sha ki ïing jong ki bahaïing hasem.Ha rilum Garo, ka jinghab phria kaba jur eh ka dei ha Baghmara Block, South Garo Hills bad ha kane ka thaiñ, haduh 282 tylli ki Ïing ki la shah pynjulor hynrei ha Chokpot pat, ka la syllad ka erïong haduh ba 10 tylli ki Ïing ki la shah pynjulor bad 42 ngut ki briew ki la shah ktah.Ka SDMA ka la bthah ïa baroh ki District Disaster Mangement Officer ban shim ïa ki sienjam ban leit ai jingïarap ïa ki briew kiba shah ktah.Na ka liang jong u Myntri Rangbah Conrad Sangma u la iathuh ba u la bthah ia ki bor synshar distrik ba kin phah ia ki lad jingiarap bad ban sam ia ki tin sop iing sha ki longing ba la shah ktah.“Katkum ki kyndon la shah ban sam ia u khaw bad ki marbam. Ngi la pynkylla ia ki kyndon bad mynta ki Deputy Commissioner, khlem ka jingpan jingmynjur na ka Sorkar ki lah ban sam wat ia ki tin sop ing,” ong u Sangma.
title: PALAT SHI HAJAR NGUT SHAH KTAH KI BRIEW NA KA ERÏONG HA MEGHALAYA, JULOR 483 TYLLI KI ÏING

content: : Da ki spah ngut ki samla pule ka Jylla Meghalaya kiba ïakhun ïa ka eksamin National Eligibility Cum Entrance Test (NEET), UG  ba la pynlong da ka National Test Agency (NTA), ha ka sngi u Blei, ki la shu kylla langkñia tang na ka daw ka jingbakla jong ka jingkylli.Ha Ribhoi District, napdeng ki 63 ngut ki samla pule kiba ïakhun ïa ka National Eligibility Cum Entrance Test (NEET), UG ki  la ïam kthang tang shu mih na ka jaka thok eksamin namar ka jingbym lah shuh ban pyndep ïa ka jingthoh tang na ka daw ka jingthurmur ha kaba sam ïa ki jingkylli kiba ïakhun ïa kane ka eksamin.Ka jingthurmur ban sam ïa ki Question Paper lyngba ka National Testing Agency (NTA) ka la paw pyrthei ha ka sngi u Blei ha kaba ki samla pule ki la leit thoh ïa ka eksamin ha Alpha English Higher Secondary School kaba dei kawei na ki Code Centre ba la jied da ka National Testing Agency (NTA).Katkum ka jingïathuh jong ki samla, la ong, ba la sam haduh ar tylli ki jingkylli sha ki samla pule ba la thoh ïa ka eksamin NEET-UG, kata, kawei ka Question Paper kaba wan na ka State Bank of India bad kawei pat kaba wan na ka Canara Bank.  Dei hadien shi kynta shiteng ba la ïaid ka jingthoh ïa ka eksamin ki bor ba dei peit ïa ka Centre ki la ïoh jingtip ba kawei napdeng ki ar tylli ki jingkylli ki dei kiba bakla bad bun na ki samla ki kum pynlut ïa ka por ban jubab pyndep shuwa ïa ka jingkylli kaba bakla bad ki hap ban thoh biang da kawei, ha kaba ki la ïoh por sa tang shi kynta shiteng na ka por ba ki ïoh ban thoh lai kynta katkum ka por ba la buh.Halor kane ka jingshah ktah jong ki samla pule na kine ki kam thurmur ka NTA, ki kmie ki kpa lem bad ki samla pule ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la ïakynduh lang ha ka ophis treikam jong ka Principal ka Alpha English Higher Secondary School, Nongpoh ka Kong W.K Blah ban dawa ba dei ban ailad biang ïa ki samla kiba shah ktah ban thoh thymmai ïa ka eksamin jong ka NEET.Ka Kong Blah ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ka la ïathuh ruh ba kane ka jingbakla ha kaba sam ïa ki jingkylli ka dei ka jingbym ïoh ïa ka jingpynshai kaba bniah na ka NTA kaba ki la pyrshang ban ïakren bad ki nongmihkhmat ka NTA, hynrei dei tad hadien shi kynta shiteng ba ka eksamin ka la ïaid ki la ïoh ban ïakren bad u Director jong ka NTA, u Vijay Kumar ba ki la ïoh jingtip ba kawei nadpeng ka jingkylli ki samla kim donkam ban thoh ïa ka.Ka la ïathuh ruh ba dei ha ka janmiet sngi u Blei ha ka por 8.30 baje eiei ki kmie ki kpa ki la wan ujor halor kane ka jingbakla sam ïa ki jingkylli.“Ha ka jingïakren bad ki kmie ki kpa ngi la bthah ba kin phah da ka dorkhas ryngkat ka jingsoi ïa ka kyrteng jong ki samla pule kiba shah ktah bad ban kyrpad na ki bor ba dei peit ka NTA ban ailad biang ïa ki samla ban thoh ïa kane kajuh ka eksamin,” la ïathuh ka Kong Blah.Ym tang katta, ha West Jaiñtia Hills da ki spah ngut ki samla pule kiba la leit thoh ïa ka eksamin ha St Mary’s Mazzerello Higher Secondary School, Jowai kaba dei kawei na ki Code Centre mynta ka sngi ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki kmie ki kpa ki la tur sha kane ka skul ban pynpaw ïa ka jingbitar halor ka jingbakla ka rukom ai ïa ki Question Paper ha ka eskamin NEET.Ki samla kiba ïakhun ïa ka eksamin ki la kynnoh ba ka don ka jingleh thurmur ha ka jingpynïaid eksamin naduh ka rukom ai ïa ki Question Paper bad ka jingshim ïa ki Admit Card.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, ki samla kiba ïakhun ïa kane ka eksamin ki la phah da ka jingthoh u Controller jong ka NEET lyngba ka Centre bad la phah kopi ruh sha u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla ba un tuklar lem halor kane.
title: NA KA JINGBAKLA KA JINGKYLLI, KYLLA LANGKÑIA KI SAMLA BA THOH EXAMINATION NEET-UG

content: Ia ka Integrated Command & Control Center (ICCC) ba la pyntreikam hapoh ka Shillong Smart City Project ba la bei pisa da ka Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs, ka Sorkar India yn sa pyndep noh shen.Ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la bei pisa T. 151.77 klur na ka bynta ban shna pyndep pura ia ka ICCC hynrei ym kumba la paw ha ka Social Media kaba kdew ba yn pynlut T. 150 klur na ka bynta ban pyndait haduh 300 tylli ki CCTV.Ia kane la pyntip da u Executive Director jong ka Shillong Smart City Project u Vijay Kumar ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha  ki lad pathai khubor.Ia ka ICCC la pyntreikam, PAN City, hapoh ka Shillong Smart City project ba kynthu ia ka ICCC Building, ka ICCC Platform bad kiwei kiwei ki Software, Data Centre (DC) bad ka Radio Frequency Network (RF NW).Nalor kine ki tiar bakongsan, ka nongbah Shillong kan sa sakhi ruh ia ka jingpyndait ia ki kor ki bor ba kynthup ia ki CCTV Camera (na ka bynta ka jingpeitngor bad ka jingpyniaid beit ia ki kali)-368, Emergency Call Box (ECB)-42, Public Address System (PAS)-58, Variable Message Displays (VMDs)-20, Street Lights (LED/Smart Lights ba don ia ki Light Point Controller, LPC)-300, Public Wi-Fi Hotspots-60, GPS based Vehicle Tracking na ka bynta ka Solid Waste Management (SWM) Vehicles-50, bad ka Smart Bins-200.Ka ICCC kaba dei ka jabieng na ka bynta ka jingpyntreikam ia ki kor ki bor technology kan long kum ka pdeng na ka bynta ka Surveillance, Data Processing, Emergency Response Coordination bad ka Smart City Application.
title: PYNDAIT CCTV CAMERA HA SHILLONG, 151.77 KLUR BEI PISA KA SORKAR INDIA

content: : U MLA jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) na Mawryngkneng Constituency u Bah Heavingstone Kharpran ha ka sngi Baar u la ai sngewbha da ki tiar ialehkai ia u heprit Samborlang Rynjah uba la bna nam mynta kum u Junior Martinez hadien ba ka sap ap kol jong u ka la saphriang stet haduh katta katta ha ka social Media.Shwa ban aiti ia kine ki tiar ialehkai u Bah Kharpran u la kitbok kitrwiang ia u heprit Samborlang ba un dup lah ban iaineh ha kane ka sap ialehkai phutbol tad haduh ba un da la heh ka rta khnang ba kan long ka lad kamai jakpoh na ka bynta jong u.U la ong ruh ba kum u MLA un sa pynsngew sha ki bor sorkar ban iarap ia u heprit Samborlang na ka bynta ban kyntiew shuh shuh ia u sap ialehkai phutbol kaba u Blei u la ai kyrpang ha u.
title: ÏOH MYNSIEM U HEPRIT SAMBORLANG RYNJAH BA AI SNGEWBHA U MLA DA KI TIAR ÏALEHKAI

content: : Ka jingialang jong ka High Level Committee bad ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) ha ka sngi Baar ki la shim ia ka rai ban iakynduh biang ha ka 7 tarik, Jylliew, 2024 na ka bynta ban shim ïa ka rai ba khatduh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynkynriah ïa ki 342 tylli ki longïing na Them IewMawlong.Ia kane ka rai la shim ha ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid da u Chairman jong ka High Level Committee Bah Prestone Tynsong uba dei ruh u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba khmih ia ka tnat Kam Pohing.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang, u Bah Prestone ula ong, “ha kaba khatduh, mynta ka sngi ngi la ïakren ïa ki katto katne ki mat ba kongsan kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkynriah ïa ki longing na Them Metor. Namar hap sngewthuh shisien ba ngi la rai ban pynkynriah ka mut ka dei kaba shirta, kumta ngi la ïakren ïa katto katne ki mat bad ki (HPC) la pyni ba ki long kiba kloi”.U pyntip  ba ka HPC ka la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan ailad ïa kiba kin leit ïakren ïa kaei kaba mih na kane ka jingïalang bad ki briew kiba sah ha Them Metor hashwa ba kin wan biang sha ka jingïalang kaba khatduh halor kane ka kam.“Hadien ka jingkyrpad jong ka HPC ngi la rai ban ai por sa shibnai ba kin leit bad ïasyllok bad ïakren bad ki longïing bad ha ka 7 tarik Jylliew, ngin sa ïakynduh biang bad ngin sa shim ïa ka rai kaba khatduh.”U la pyntip ruh ba u Director ka tnat Urban Affairs bad u Chief Executive Officer (CEO) ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ki la shong bishar bad pynthikna mynta ïa ka jubab RTI jong ka SMB ba la ai sha ka HYC ba ong ba ki don tang 194 ngut ki nongtrei Sorkar napdeng ki 342 tylli ki longïing kiba don ha Them Metor.Kane ka la mih hadien ka jingdawa jong ka HYC ban shu kyndang ïa ki 148 tylli ki ïing kiba shong beaiñ ha Them Metor, Them ïew Mawlong katkum ka jingshem na ka RTI.U Chairman u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka dang ap ïa ka tnat Urban Affairs bad ka SMB ba kin pyndep ïa ka jingbishar ha ka ban pynthikna ïa kane ka RTI.U la ong ba namarba ka don ka jingpluh ding kaba shyrkhei ha ki snem kiba mynshwa kumta namar kane ka jingjia, u Director ka Tnad Urban Affairs ha u snem 2008 bad 2009 ula ai jingbthah ïa ka MUDA ban pynlong biang ïa ka survey ba thymmai ha ka jingïadonlang kito ki longïing ha Them Metor, ïa kaba kila dep leh.“Kumba nga ong, haba pynshong nongrim ïa ka RTI ba jubab da u CEO ka SMB, ngam pat lah ban ong eiei ïa mynta namar ka MUDA bad Director ka Urban Affairs ki dang shong bishar ban pynthikna ïa ka RTI,” bynrap u Chairman.Haba kylli, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla kam lah ban kynthup lang ha ka ban ai jaka sah ïa ki briew ba shu shong beaiñ haba pynbeit ïa kane ka kam kaba la sahteng la slem bha.Ha kajuh ka por, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ka Sorkar ka la ïeng skhem ha ka rai ban pynkynriah ïa ki 342 tylli ki longïing na Them Metor, Them ïew Mawlong.
title: ISHU THEM IEWMAWLONG: 7 TARIK JYLLIEW YN SHIM RAI KHATDUH KA SORKAR BAD HPC

content: : U samla Kevinstrong Lawriniang uba la ioh ban bat ia ka kyrdan kaba nyngkong eh ha ka result Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) ha u snem 2021, mynta ka kynti ruh u la ioh rung biang sa ha ka Top 10 jong ka result Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) Science Stream ia kaba la pynna da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) ha ka sngi Balang.Ha ka jingiakren bad u nonglum khubor ka Batesi Tv uba khmih ia ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District u samla Kevin ula iathuh ba mar iadep pule ia ka Class-X u la bteng ia ka jingpule ha St.Anthony’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong ha ka Science Stream hynrei namar ka jingban jong ka jingpang um banse ban leit phai noh sha la shnong bad ban bteng pat ia ka jingpule ha Mairang Presbyterian Science College.Da ka jingbteng jong u samla Kevinstrong ia ka jingpule ha kane ka College ka la pynlong ruh ia ka Mairang Presbyterian Science College, Mairang ban thaw ia ka rekod kaba nyngkong eh ba ka College kan ioh rung ha ka Top-10 ha ka result HSSLC mynta u snem.U samla Kevinstrong uba la ioh distinction ha baroh ki sobjek bad ioh khur 454 mark.U la iathuh ruh ba um pat nang ban ban rai shano un bteng ia ka jingpule namarba un hap ban iakren shwa bad la ki bahaing hasem bad kum u samla uba wan na ka longïing ka baduk ba kyrduh um nud ban pynpaw ia kaba u angnud ioh ba ki bahaing hasem kim lah ban kyrshan ia u.
title: WAT HAPDENG KA JINGSHAH PUID & KHLEM LEIT TUTION IOH RUNG U KEVINSTRONG HA KA TOP 10 HSSLC

content: : Ki Pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills kiba la trei borbah miet la bad sngi ban iakhun thma pyrshah ia ka jingwan rung u drok shapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya, hapoh shiphew sngi ki la ioh ban kurup ia u drok ba shongdor haduh 15 klur tyngka.Ha ka step sngi Balang, ki Pulit ka Lumshnong Out Post katba ki dang pynlong ia ka jingtalasi ia ki Bos Night Super ki la ioh kurup ia u drok na ki lai ngut ki nongleit jingleit kiba shong ha ki ar tylli ki Bos Night Super kiba mih na Silchar, Assam ban leit sha Guwahati.Na kine ki lai ngut ki nongleit jingleit, ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup 40 tylli ki synduk sabon ba la thep ia u drok Heroin ba shongdor T. 3.6 klur, 9.031 kilo u Ganja bad 4 tylli ki Mobile Phone.Ia kine ki lai ngut kiba la shah kem ha ki Pulit bad ba la register hapoh ki kyndon jong ka NDPS Act la ithu kyrteng kum u Amzad Hussain Laskar, 18 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Rajnagar, Cachar, Assam, u Monib Hussain Basker 18 snem ka rta uba sah ha Bangram, Cachar, Assam bad u Chamir Hussain Barbhuiya uba sah ha Silchar, Cachar, Assam.Kane ka dei ka jingioh kurup drok ba bun tam ha ka sien kaba san tang hapoh shiphew sngi, la iathuh ki Pulit.
title: HAPOH 10 SNGI, KURUP KI PULIT EAST JAIÑTIA ÏA U DROK BA SHONGDOR HADUH 15 klur

content: : Ka Laban Bengalee Boy’s Higher Secondary School, Laban mynta ka kynti ka la ioh hat-trick ha ka jingioh bat ia ka kyrdan banyngkong ha kaba eksamin Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) Science Stream ba la pynbna da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) ha ka sngi Balang.Ka jingioh hat-trick jong kane ka skul dei lyngba u samla Sohan Bhattacharjee uba la ioh ia ka kyrdan banyngkong eh ha ka Top 10.Ka Laban Bengalee Boy’s Higher Secondary School, ka la bat ia ka kyrdan banyngkong naduh u snem 2022, 2023 bad mynta u snem 2024.  Nalor u samla Sohan Bhattacharjee uba la ioh ia ka kyrdan banyngkong, ka skul ka la ioh khur haduh lai tylli ki kyrdan ha ka Top Ten, kata, ka samla Anikey Pattanayak ha ka kyrdan kaba saw bad u samla Ahijit Deb ha ka kyrdan kaba phra.Ha kane ka kyrdan Top Ten, u samla Gordon Kupar Nongbri na St. Edmunds Higher Secondary School, Shillong u la ioh bat ia ka kyrdan kaba ar, katba arngut ki samla pule jong kane ka skul ba kynthup ia u samla K. Vansangpuii u la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba hynriew bad u samla Edward Pohlong Lamare ha ka kyrdan kaba khyndai.Ka St. Anthony’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong kaba ju ioh khur lut ia ki kyrdan ha ki snem ba la leit noh hynrei mynta u snem, la sakhi ba tang lai ngut ki khynnah ki la ioh rung ha ka Top Ten, kata u samla Ar Meker Marpna u la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba lai, ka samla Amebaaihunsha Kharbhih ha kyrdan kaba saw bad ka samla Rilaakor Lamare ha ka kyrdan kaba san.Ka North Liberty Higher Secondary School, Mookyrdop-Jowai mynta u snem ka la sakhi ba arngut ki samla pule ki la ioh rung ha ka kyrdan kaba hynriew lyngba u samla Weibha Nongtdu Lakiang bad ha ka kyrdan kaba hynñiew lyngba u samla Joshavia Onan Paswet.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne ba u samla Weibha Nongtdu Lakiang ha ka eksamin SSLC jong u snem 2022  u la wan ha ka kyrdan 4th Position ha ka thup Top-20.Ka Sacred Heart Boy’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong ka la ioh rung ha ka kyrdan kaba khyndai lyngba u samla Freddy Lyngkhoi bad ka Mairang Presbyterian Science College, Mairang ha ka sien banyngkong eh ka la ioh rung ha ka Top Ten lyngba u samla Kevinstrong Lawryniang uba la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba shiphew.U samla Kevinstrong Lawryniang u dei uba la ioh bat ia ka kyrdan First Ten ha ka Top-20 ha ka result SSLC, 2021 mynba u dang pule ha St. Thomas Higher Secondary School, Mairang.Kiba iakhun Regular bad Non-Regular ki long 3,766 ngut katba kiba pas ki long 3,210 bad ka pass percentage ka long 85.24.
title: IOH HAT-TRICK KA LABAN BENGALEE BOY’S HA KA RESULT HSSLC SCIENCE STREAM, 2024

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) lyngba ka Education Cell ka phah ïa u kyrwoh ai khublei sha baroh ki paradoh para snam na kylleng ka ri khasi kiba la ïoh ïa ka result HSSLC Commerce bad Science Stream ba la pynbna da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) ha ka sngi balang.“Ka jingkhublei ba kyrpang ruh ka leit sha kito ki samla kiba la ïoh kheit ïa u soh ka jingjop da kaba wan  kham shakhmat ha ki kyrdan bad ha ki subject ba ki pule. Ka jingïoh ban kheit jong phi ïa u soh ba thiang ha kane ka kynti ka long ka jingkmen ym tang ïa phi shimet hynrei ïa ka ïing ka sem, ka shnong ka thaw, ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew hi baroh kawei,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Chairman ka Education Cell ka KSU.Ka Seng ka da sngew sarong shikatdei eh ban ïohi ba ki khun samla ka jaitbynriew ki wan shakhmat ha ka jingpule jong ki, namar ka jingnang jingstad, ka jingtip jingshemphang ka dei ka atiar ba khraw ban ïada, ban pynneh pynsah bad ban kyntiew ïa ka ri bad jaitbynriew ha baroh ki liang.“Ka seng ka kitbok kit rwiang sha kito ki samla ki bym shym la poi sha ka thong ha kane ka kynti, ba kim dei ban duh jingkyrmen, pynban,  ba kin nang ïai trei shitom ba kin lah ban leh bha ha kawei pat ka kynti bad ba kin kynmaw ba ka jingshahrem kam dei ka lad ba khatduh hynrei ba kan long u mawjam sha ka thong jong ka jingjop,” la ai mynsiem ka seng.Ka Seng ka kitbok kitrwiang sha baroh ki samla ki ban sa ïoh ïa ka result HSSLC Arts Stream bad ha ka SSLC ha kine ki sngi ki ban sa wan ba kin ïoh ban kheit ïa u soh ka jingkmen u ban long ka jingsarong ïa ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew hi baroh kawei.Ka Seng ka kyntu ruh sha ki samla kiba la ïoh ïa ka resol bad kumjuh ki ban sa ïoh, ba ki dei ban jied bha ïa ki bynta kiba ki dei ban pule, khnang ba kan ym sepei bad kan long kaba kham janai katba nang san ha ka jingpule.Kyntang ïawai ka Seng ka buh ia ki jingduwai sha baroh ki paradoh parasnam ba kin ïoh ïa ka met kaba koit kaba khiah kumjuh ba kin ïoh ïa ka bor jabieng kaba khlaiñ, ba kin kiew ha baroh ki liang khamtam ha ka jingpule kaba kin nang iai bteng shuh shuh.
title: PHAH KYRWOH AI KHUBLEI KA KSU ÏA KI SAMLA PULE KIBA PASS BHA HA KA HSSLC COMMERCE BAD SCIENCE

content: : Ki runar bym lah ban ithuh, ki la thang da ka taïar kali hapdeng ka surok PWD ha ka shnong Umsning, Ribhoi District ha ka step phyrngap sngi Balang.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Superintendent of Police ka Ri-Bhoi u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa, kane la jia ha ka por kumba 3 baje mynstep.Na ka liang ki Pulit ka Umsning PS tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ki la leit ban pynlip ïa ka ding bad ban weng noh ïa ka taïar kaba la ing hapdeng surok bad ki Pulit mynta ki la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit.
title: DANG STEP PHYRNGAP THANG TAÏAR HAPDENG SUROK HA UMSNING

content: Ka St. Mary’s Girl Higher Secondary School, Shillong ka la long ka skul kaba la ioh ia ka kyrdan First Ten ha ka resol Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) Commerce, 2024 ba la pynbna da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) ha ka sngi balang.Na kane ka skul, ha ka thup Top Ten, ka samla  Ferry Filarisha Wann ka la ioh ia ka kyrdan First Ten, katba ka samla  Alphi Clarissa Warjri ka la ioh ia kyrdan ba khyndai.Ka St. Anthony’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong ka la ioh saw tylli ki kyrdan, kata, u samla Raj Paul ha ka kyrdan kaba ar, ka samla Pinky Kumari ha ka kyrdan kaba lai, ka samla Nearlina Bani Nongbri ha ka kyrdan kaba saw bad u samla Ishuah Kharsohtun ha ka kyrdan kaba san.Ka Laban Bengalee Boy’s Higher Secondary School ka la ioh ar tylli ki kyrdan, kata, u samla Pongkoch Dutta ha ka kyrdan kaba lai bad u Imazul Haque Laskar ha ka kyrdan kaba phra.Ka St. Edmund’s Higher Secondary School, Shilong ka la ioh ar tylli ki kyrdan, kata, u samla Ryan Surong Myrthong ha ka kyrdan kaba saw bad ka samla Sneha Paul ha ka kyrdan kaba hynriew.Ka Don Bosco College (Hr. Secondary Section) Tura ka la ioh ia ka kyrdan kaba lai lyngba u samla Aditya Prasad, ka Shillong College Higher Secondary Education, Shillong ha ka kyrdan kaba hynñiew lyngba u samla Dicky Nongpluh bad ka Alpha Higher Secondary School, ha ka kyrdan kaba shiphew lyngba u samla Jagjot Sing Nongtdu.Kiba iakhun Regular bad Non-Regular ki long 2,411 ngut katba kiba pas ki long 1,935 bad ka pass percentage ka long 80.26.Ha ka Vocational Stream kiba iakhun ki long 11 ngut, ki shynrang kiba pas ki long hynñiew ngut bad ki kynthei saw ngut. Ka percentage ka long 100%.
title: PAW KA ST. MARY’S GIRL HSS, ÏOH FIRST TEN KA FERRY FILARISHA WANN HA KA HSSLC COMMERCE

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Bomb Detection and Disposal Squad (BDDS) ha ka sngi Balang ki la kurup noh ia u bomb u bym pat bthei ha kawei ka jaka ha ka shnong Mawlynrei, Shillong.La lap ia une u bomb  uba jrong 3.5 inshi diameter katba ki misteri ki dang tih paia ia ka nongrim ha kane ka jaka.Ka jaka ba la lap ia une u bomb ka dei ka jaka jong ki riewshimet bad ki Pulit ki la buh noh ia une u bomb ha ka jaka kaba shngain katba ka kynhun ki Pulit ka Bomb Detection and Disposal Squad ki dang pynlong ia ka jingbishar kaba bniah.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi u la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit ha kaba iadei bad ka jingioh kurup ia une u bomb na kane ka jaka.
title: KATBA DANG TIH NONGRIM ÏING, LAP KI MISTERI IA U BOM HA MAWLYNREI

content: Nongstoiñ, 8 Jymmang: Kum shi bynta ban pynsuk ïa ki paidbah ka thaiñ Nongstoiñ ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingtest ïa ki jingpang kiba laiphew jait kiba baroh shi katta ki paidbah ka thaiñ ki hap ban leit sha Shillong bad sha kiwei de ki jaka sha bar ka Jylla, ban phah test ïa ki jingpang, na ka liang jong u Dr. Andystar Syiemlieh, MBBS (RIMS), MD (AIIMS, Biochemestry) u la wanrah bad plie syndon da ka Lab lane ka Immaculate Diagnostic Care hapoh Nongstoiñ.Kane ka Lab kadon hapoh ka Dong Themïew jong ka shnong New Nongstoiñ ha ka surok ban leit sha ka shnong Pyndengrei ha lad ban leit sha ka ophsi jong ka tnad PHE bad hapoh jong kane ka Lab lah don ki kor kiba bha kiba kynsai kiba katkum ka juk stad saïan kaba mynta ban test ïa ki jingpang jong ki briew bad lah ruh ban ïoh ïa ka report na kane hi ka Lab, ka ban pynsuk ia ki paidbah ba kim da donkam shuh ban leit shaduh sha Shillong bad sha jngai.u Dr. Andystar Syiemlieh u ba dei peit ïa kane ka Lab u la ïathuh ba haduh mynta na katei ka Lab la lah ban leh ïa ji jingtest snam kiba haduh 48 jait bad kumjuh ban leh test ï aka umpynjhieh bad u la ong ruh ba un sa nangwanrah shuh shuh ïa ki tiar ban test sa ïa kiwei de ki jait jingpang katkum ka jingdawa bad jingdonkam bad u la ong ruh ba kador n aka bynta ka jingle test ka long kaba bit bad kotbor ïa baroh.
title: DA KA LAB PLIE U DR. ANDYSTAR SYIEMLIEH HA NONGSTOIN BAN LEH ÏA KI JINGTEST SNAM BA LAIPHEW JAIT

content: : Ki bor synshar jong ka East Khasi Hills kiba la hiar jurip ia ka jaka sah beain ki poiwir ha Lum Survey ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki nongmihkhmat ka Defence Estate Officer, Guwahati, bad ki dkhot ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ki la lap ba kiba bun na ki briew kiba sah ha kane ka jaka ki dei kiba wan na ka ri Bangladesh.Kane ka jingkynnoh ka la mih na ki lai ngut ki briew kiba shong dukan ha Lum Survey, kiba dei ruh ki briew kiba dang ïakhun da ka mukotduma ban kam trai ïa kane ka jaka kaba ki la shna dukan.Kine ki lai ngut kiba iakhun mukotduma ki la synran lang ha ka jingjurip jong ka Ophis u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills District bad ka Ophis u Defence Estate Officer, Guwahati ha ka jingïadon ryngkat ki Ophisar ka Shillong Municipal Board, ka Shillong Contonment Board, ka Meghalaya Urban Development Agency bad ki nongïalam ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council.Na ka liang ka Municipal ka la lum kyrteng ïa baroh ki briew kiba la kynnoh shna iing be-aiñ ha kane ka jaka bad la lap ba ki don haduh 80 tylli ki iing tap shiliang. Nalor kata, la lap ba 40 tylli ki ing ki la khang tala shwa ban don kane ka jingjurip.La kynnoh ba bun na kine ki briew ki dei ki Muslim kiba kam ïalade ba ki dei kiba wan na Assam, Uttar Pradesh bad kiwei kiwei ki Jylla ka Ri.Kane ka jingjurip ka la wan jia hadien ka jingdawa jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ban kyndang ïa baroh ki ïing ba shna be-aiñ ha Lum Survey.Halor kane, shen u Magistrate un sa aiti noh ïa ka kaiphod sha u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills ba un leh ïa kaba donkam.“Ki briew jong ka bor Disrict kila pynlong ïa ka jingsorjamin bad ki la shim jingkheiñ ïa ki longïing bad ki lap ba ki don palat 80 tylli ki iing ba shong be-aiñ ha kane ka jaka ba hap hapoh ka Defence Estate Office. Ngi sngewnguh ïa u DC ba u pynlong ïa kane ka jingjurip shuwa shi taïew ba ngi ai por,” ong u President ka HYC Roy Kupar Synrem ha ka jingïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor.U la ong bun na ki briew ba sah beaiñ ha kane ka jaka ki dei na Assam, Uttar Pradesh bad kiwei kiwei ki Jylla.“Ngin ap mynta ïa ka kaiphod ka ban aiti da u Additional Magistrate sha u DC,” ong u Bah Roykupar.“Ngi ïeng skhem ha ka nongrim ba lada kim lah eiei pyrshah ïa kine ki Ïing be-aiñ wat hadien ka jinglap ïa ka jingshisha na ka jingjurip, kan pynbor ïa ngi ban shim ïa kane ka kam ha la ka kti da kaba kyndang ïa kine ki briew bad lada mih kano kano ka huri hura, u Deputy Commissioner bad ka DSO kin hap ban shim ïa ka jingbahkhlieh,” la maham u Bah Synrem.
title: BUN KI POIWIR NA BANGLADESH KIBA SAH HA LUM SURVEY LAP KI BOR DISTRICT BAD DEO

content: Katba nangmih ki sngi ka jingkharoi jong ki nongdih drok kam long shuh tang ha sor Shillong hynrei u drok u la rung wat sha ki shnong nongkyndong jong ka Jylla.  Ka jingkharoi jong ki nongdih drok ka la wanrah ia ka jingjyllei ki kam sniew ha ka thain Mawkyrwat kat haduh ba ka la pynsyier mynsiem ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong namar ka jingjyllei ki kam runar ruser bad ki kam tuh kam thiem.Ha ka janmiet sngi Balang, ki dkhot jong ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO), South West Khasi Hills District Unit ryngkat ka jingiatreilang jong ki Zone bad ki Unit hapoh ka jingialam jong u President ka seng u Bah Paullius Thyrniang ki la hiar ban khynra ha iew Mawkyrwat ha kaba ki la iohbat haduh san ngut ki samla kiba la im kyrni ban dih drok.Na ka met jong kine ki san ngut, ki dkhot ka seng ki la ioh kurup ia u drok, u Ganja, ka pisa bad ki thyrnia injek.Hadien ba la ioh bat ia kine ki nongdih drok ka Seng ka la aiti noh sha ki Pulit jong ka Mawkyrwat Police Station ba kan leh ia kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka NDPS Act.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u samla Paullius thyrniang u la ong ba kane ka dei tang ka jingsdang bad ka seng kan dang iai pynjur ban pynlong ia ka jingkhynra na ka por sha ka por.U la kyntu ia ki bor Pulit ba kin shimkhia halor kane bad u la kyntu ruh ia ki kiwei de ki sengbhalang, ki Seng Kynthei, ki bor synshar shnong ba kin iatreilang khnang ban rat dyngkhong ia kine ki jingsniew hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District.
title: KHYNRA KA HITO HA ÏEW MAWKYRWAT, ÏOH BAT SAN NGUT KI NONGDIH DROK

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) kaba peit ruh ia ka khia ka shon jong ki rangli ki juki, ha ka la pynshna da ka ing bapaka ia kawei ka riewkynthei ha ka shnong Rangbalang, South West Khasi Hills District ia kaba la aiti noh ha ka sngi Palei.Kane ka riewkynthei ka dei ka Kong Angelina Sangriang kaba shong basah ha ka shnong Rangbalang Umsaitriew, South West Khasi Hills District bad kaba don arngut ki khun.Ka Kong Anjelina nalor ba ka long ka briew kaba duk bad ka la shah iehbein ha la u jong u kurim bad ka la shong la sah tang ha iwei i ing ba la jot rathai bad ha ka por slap ka um ka rung shapoh ka ing.  Namar ka jingshah iehnoh bein ha la u jong u kurim, kane ka riewkynthei ka la ioh ia ka jingpang ha ka bor jabieng.Ki dkhot ka KSU hadien ba ki la lap ia kane ka longiing, da kawei ka jingmut ki la shim ia ka rai ban noh synniang ia kane ka long iing da kaba pynshna ia ka iing.La shna ia ka ing kaba bha da ka jingshimti jong ka KSU Nobosophoh tad haduh ban da pyndep pura.Ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Education Secretary ka KSU Sengkmie u samla Pynkmenlang Sanmiet uba la long kum u Kongsan, ha kane ka sngi ka seng ka la pynkup burom ia ki san ngut ki samla na ka shnong Rangbalang, kiba la pas bha ha ki eksamin bapher bapher da ka khusnam Maitshaphrang Award. Ka jingai khusnam ka long kum ka jingpynshlur ba kin nang leh bha shuh shuh ia ki jingpule ki jong ki.La sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi da u President jong ka Hill Farmer Union u Bah Commander Shangpliang uba la long kum u Symbud Kongsan, u President ka KSU SWKHDU u samla Forwardman Nongrem, u President ka KSU Mawkyrwat Circle u samla Rutherford Lyngdoh, ki Sordar Shnong bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.
title: PYNSHNA ÏING KA KSU ÏA KA RIEWKYNTHEI HA KA SHNONG RANGBALANG, SWKH

content: Ki nongiakhun kti ka jylla Meghalaya kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Meghalaya Arm Wrestling Association ha ka 3 tarik, Jylliew 2024, kin sa mih na kane ka nongbah Shillong ban leit iashim bynta ha ka lympung iakhun kti kaba la tip kum ka National Arm Wrestling Championship 2024, ka ban sa long ha Nagpur Maharashtra ha ka 6 tarik haduh ka 10 tarik u Jylliew 2024.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong ki nongialam jong ka Association, ki nongiakhun kti ki ban sa leit iashim bynta ha kane ka lympung ki don haduh 83 ngut ba kynthup ia ki Sub-junior, Junior, Youths, Senior, Master, Grantmaster bad ki Para-Atheletic Specially Abled.Na kine ki nongiakhun, ki Kynthei ki don 40 ngut, ki shynrang 43 ngut, uwei u Referee bad 2 ngut ki Official.Ki nongiakhun kiba jop na kane ka lympung kin shah jied ban iakhun sa ha ka World Level ka ban sa long ha ka ri Maldova ha u bnai Nailar 2024.Ka Prisca Pyngrope kawei na ki thei iakhun kti ha ka kyrdan Para-Atheletic Specially Abled ka la iathuh ba kane ka dei ka sien banyngkong eh ba kan leit iashim bynta ha kane ka lympung iakhun ka ban sa long ha ka jylla Maharashtra.“Nga la shu iashim bynta ha ka marathon, Wheel Basketball bad kane ka dei ka sien kaba nyngkong ba nga kwah ban iashim bynta ha ka Arm Wrestling,”la ong ka samla Prisca.Haba kylli ka la ong, “wat lada ngam jop ruh hynrei nga kmen ba nga la ioh ban mihkhmat ia ka jylla lajong. Ngan pyrshang ban iakhun beit.”
title: HA KA NATIONAL ARM WRESTLING C’SHIP YN LEIT ÏAKHUN KTI KI DKHOT JONG KA MAWA

content: Ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynkynriah ïa ka Petrol Pump kaba don mynta ha Anjalee Point, da kaba ai bujli ia jaka ha ka thaiñ Upper Shillong ha ki bynta jong ka 5mer, Upper Shillong kaba dei ka jaka jong ka tnat Animal Husbandry & Veterinary and ka Sorkar Jylla, ka la pynlong ïa kiba bun ban ïeng pyrshah ia ka jingthmu.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, ka Federation Of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo People (FKJGP) Upper Shillong Circle, ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Upper Shillong Circle bad ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar Shnong Upper Shillong Circle ha ka sngi Palei ki la shong jingïalang ban ïamir jingmut halor kane ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President ka FKJGP Upper Shillong Circle, samla Kitbok Nongphlang u la ong ba ka seng kam pyrshah ia ka jingai jaka ban pynriah ia ka petrol pump, hynrei ka jingpyrshah ka long ia ka jingai jaka, kaba la heh shaba palat kaba la kot haduh 13,500sq ft.U la ong ruh ba ka jingai ka Sorkar da ka jaka kaba heh ka long kumba ka leh shiliang ha kaba ïa ki trai ri trai muluk la shu kyndang khlem da ai kano kano ka bailutksan katba ïa ki bar jylla la pynlong kum ki khun khatduh bad kynnoh ruh ba kane ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar ka don eiei sha lyndet.
title: MIH KA JINGPYRSHAH BA THMU PYNKYNRIAH ÏA KA PETROL PUMP NA ANJALEE SHA 5 MER

content: : Ka Meghalaya Trader Fresh Vegetables and Ginger Association (MTFVGA) kaba long ka shatri jong ki saw tylli ki kynhun ba kynthup ia ka Khasi Jaiñtia Food Vegetables Association (KJFVA), ka Shiliang Um Trader Farmers Association (SUTFA), ka Ïewduh Khasi Pnar Association ( IKPA) bad ka Fresh Green Ginger Association (FGGA) Ri Bhoi ha ryngkat ka jingsynran jong ki nongïalam ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo People (FKJGP) Agriculture Cell ha ka sngi Palei ka la leit ban pynsngew ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Bah Prestone Tynsong halor ki jingeh ba ki iakynduh na ka por sha ka por ha kaba ïadei bad ka kam khaïi ïa ki mar rep ha ki bynta bapher bapher ka jylla.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingiakynduh ia u Symbud Myntri Rangbah, u President ka Meghalaya Trader Fresh Vegetables and Ginger Association (MTFVGA) Bah Bristar Mawthoh, u la ong ba ka jingsniew shaba palat jong ka surok National Highway-6 ha East Jaiñtia Hills District ka la pynlong ïa ki kali kit mar rep ban sahkut da ki sngi ha surok kat haduh ba ka la wanrah shibun ki jingeh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynpoi ïa ki mar rep sha kiwei pat ki bynta ka jylla.Nalorkata, u la ong ruh ba ka jingshah bat ki kali kit mar rep ha shi lynter ka surok Ratacherra ka la ktah shibun bad kaba la pynduhnong ïa ki namarba bun ki jhur ki pyut noh shuwa ba kin poi sha ki jaka ba dei ban poi.U la ong ba ka jingbuh ia ka khyrdop ha ki bynta bapher bapher ka la ktah ïa ki nongrep ha kaba kim ïoh ban shuh ban kit ïa ki mar rep ha ka por kaba biang.U la pyntip ruh ba u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la shimkhia ïa kane ka kam ha kaba u la kular ruh ban shong jingïalang bad ki tnat bapher bapher ka Sorkar ha kine ki sngi ki ban sa wan.
title: JOT RATHAI KA SUROK NH-6, PYUT KI MAR REP HA KALI, UJOR KI NONGKHAÏI SHA U DY. CM

content: Ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU), Delhi Unit ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la pynkup burom ia ka Kong Sibbi Passah halor ka jingïoh ïa ka khusnam Padma Shri na ka President jong ka Ri India.Ia kane ka jingpynkup burom la lamkhmat da ka President ka seng ka Samla Marbiang Khongwir bad u Vice President u samla Donboklang Pohrmen.Ka Kong Silbi kaba la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ia ki dkhot ka KSU kiba la leh burom ruh ia ka, ka la sneng la kraw ia ki da kaba ong, “Da leh tipsngi bad nang iai minot.”“Nga da sngewheh ka mynsiem haba nga don ha Delhi kum ban shu ong noh ban iohi ia ki khun ki kti lajong kiba wan iakynduh ia nga ngam sngew kynjah. Nga kitbok kitrwiang ba phin nang iaid shaphrang,” la ong ka Kong Silbi ia ki dkhot ka KSU.“Haoid, ngi la iabeh ia ka jingang jingstad bad lada phi don haei haei ruh phim dei ban klet ia kaba u longshwa u la buh khamtam ha ka ktien ka thylliej. Lada phi pule ia ka English ne ka Hindi hynrei kynmaw ban ieid ia la ka jong bad haba phi iakren paramaphi phim dei ban iakren da ka (ktien) jong kiwei,” ong shuh shuh ka Kong Silbi.
title: “DA LEH TIPSNGI BAD NANG ÏAI MINOT” SNENG KA KONG SILBI PASSAH ÏA KI DKHOT KA KSU DELHI UNIT

content: Ka President jong ka ri India ka Droupadi Murmu ha ka sngi Palei ka la pynkup burom da ka khusnam Padma Shri ia ka Kong Silbi Passah ha ka liang ka Arts ha ka jingialang kaba long ha New Delhi.Ka Kong Silbi Passah kaba dei ka nongshong shnong jong ka Riatsamthiah, Shillong, ka dei ruh ka nonghikai ha ka sobjek Hindi ba la shongthait, ka Resource Person jong ka Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan bad ka Directorate of Educational Research & Training bad kaba ai jingiarap ia ka SCERT bad ka DERT, ha kaba iadei bad ka jingai jinghikai ia ki nonghikai ha kiba bun ki liang.La kha ia ka Kong Silbi Passah ha ka 3 tarik, Lber 1952 bad ka la pyndep ia ka Bachelor ha ka Hindi bad ka la shakri kum ka nonghikail Hindi ha Khasi Jaintia National Government Upper Primary School, Mawkhar Shillong ha u snem 1982. Ban kyntiew ia ka ktien Hindi ka ju iashim bynta ruh ha ki Radio Programme, halor ka phang “Hindi Lesson”, ba ju pathai da ka All India Radio Shillong.  Ha u snem 2005, ka la trei hapoh ka Central Institute of Hindi (Agra) na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ia ka Hindi- Khasi Contrastive Grammar.Ka Kong Silbi nalor ba ka long kaba ieid bha ia ki sur jingrwai tynrai, ka ju leit ban iashim bynta ha kiba bun ki prokram ba ju pynlong da ka tnat Arts and Culture kaba ju iatreilang bad ka North East Zone Cultural Centre ha kylleng ka ri India.Nalor kata, ka dei ruh ka kynthei Khasi ba nyngkong eh ban thoh ia ka skit ha ka ktien hindi ia kaba la ai kyrteng ka “Hindi Bhasha Hamari Rashtra Bhasha Hai” ba la pyni paidbah ha ka Doordarshan Kendra Shillong. Dang shen ka la ialam ia kynhun ban iashim bynta ha ka jingshad tynrai ha ka “Adi Shaurya Parv Parakram ka”, 2023.Kum ka jingithuh ia u synniang u bynhei ba ka la noh sha u sup u thiar jong ka imlang ka sahlang, ka Kong Silbi Passah ka la ioh pdiang ruh ia ka khusnam District Certificate of Honour na ka sorkar Jylla ha u snem 2001, na ka Seng Khasi, Seng Kmie Honorary Award ha u snem 2008; ka State Award ha u snem 2005; ka People’s Choice Award NETV ha u snem 2005; ka National Award for teachers ha u snem 2006; ka Jeebon Roy Award ha u snem 2008; ka Khasi Jaintia Welfare Award ha u snem 2009; ka International Gold Star Award ha Bangkok ha u snem 2010, ka Seng Samla Seng Kmie Honorary Award ha u snem 2011; ka Lady of Hope (Cape Town South Africa) ha u snem 2012; U Tirot Sing Award for Art and Literature Meghalaya ha u snem 2014; ka Youth Affair Award ha u snem 2019; ka 4th Northeast Unsung Heroes Red Carpet Social Award ha u snem 2021 bad ka Sangeet Natak Academic Award ha u snem 2021.
title: PYNKUP BUROM KA PRESIDENT DA KA KHUSNAM PADMA SHRI ÏA KA KONG SILBI PASSAH

content: : Ki dkhot ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ba la lamkhmat da u President Bah Roy Kupar Synrem ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la iohbat saw ngut ki kynthei bad  18 ngut ki shynrang bar jylla ba la kynnoh ba ki dei kiba ju mlien ban im kyrni ha ka jingdih ia u drok.Ia kine ki 22 ngut, ki dkhot ka seng ki la ioh bat ha ka jingkhynra ha ka Parking Lot ka Meghalaya Urban Developement Authority (MUDA) ha Khyndai Lad, Shillong.Nalor u drok ba la thep ha ki 32 tylli ki tyndong ba la ioh kurup na kine ki 25 ngut ki nongdih drok, ki dkhot ka HYC ki la ioh kurup ruh ia u Ganja, ki thyrnia Injek bad ka Dendrite.Ki dkhot ka HYC ki la pynjulor ia u drok, ia u Ganja, ia ki thyrnia injek bad ia ka Dendrite da kaba shu thang da ka ding bad maham ia kine ki nongdih drok ba kim dei shuh ban dang mlien ban dih drok ha ki jaka paidbah.U Vice President ka HYC Bah Donboklang Kharlyngdoh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba uwei na pdeng ki 18 ngut ki shynrang u la phla ha ki dkhot ka seng ba u dei uba ju donkti ban pyniaid nuti ia ki kynthei ha Khyndai Lad.“Ngi la maham ia une u khynnah bad ym tang ia ki nongdih drok ba ka imlang ka sahlang kam pat lah ban pdiang ia ki haduh mynta ba phin leh kum sha ki ri nongwei,” la iathuh u Bah Kharlyngdoh.Haba kylli u la iathuh, ba u don uwei u nongdih drok uba ju lum lang ia ki nongdih drok ban leh ia kine ki jait kam.  U la ong ruh ba ka seng ka la ioh ban kurup kham bun u drok na kawei ka kynthei bar jylla kaba la 24 snem ka rta bad iathuh ruh ba ka seng ka la iohbat ia ki nongdih drok naduh Keatinge Road ter ter bad na Parking Lot MUDA.U la ong ruh ba ka seng hi kam don jingshaniah shuh ia ka tnat Pulit namarba katba ki nang kem, katta nang kharoi ki nongdih drok.“Lada ngim kyndit bynriew kum ka imlang ka sahlang, ka nongbah Shillong hapoh 10 snem kan sa kylla kum ka Zombie City,” u la ong.“Lada ki (Pulit) lah ban khylliap lama ia ki seng lehnoh balei ym lah ban pynduhjait noh shisyndon ia ki snar khaii drok ha Shillong. Ngi kum ka kynhun ngi hap ban sumar ioh don eiei sha lyndet.  Ngi lap bad ngi sakhi wat ki briew jong ka ain ruh ki don kiba dih bad kiba pyndon kam ia u drok,” la kynthoh une u nongialam ka HYC.“Ngi kwah ban kren da kaba shai ia ka Sorkar khamtam ia ka tnat Pulit, sngewbha wat leh kamkai namarba kum ka jaidbynriew ngi tieng thot thot,” u la ong.U la iathuh ba ka jingbym aiti jong ka seng ia ki nongdih drok ba la iohbat sha ki bor Pulit ka long namarba tang  shi miet armiet ki la lait na along katba kiba iohbat ia ki nongdih drok ki hap ban leit hajir hakhmat ka Kashari na ka sngi sha ka sngi.“Lada ka Sorkar ka ieid ia ka pateng kaba mynta bad ka ban sa wan, snggewbha leh eiei. Ka Sorkar ka dei ban shimkhia ban don la ka jong ka Rehabilitation Camp namarba ki don napdeng kiba im kyrni ha u drok ki la kwah ban kylla,” u la ong.U la iathuh ruh ba ka seng kan nang pynjur shuh shuh ia ka jingkhynra ban bat ia ki nongdih drok ha kylleng ka sor Shillong ha ki sngi ki ban dang wan.
title: 4 NGUT KI KYNTHEI, 18 NGUT KI SHYNRANG NONGDIH DROK, BAT KA HYC HA PARKING LOT MUDA

content: U Ambassador Ri France sha India Thierry Mathou ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la leit jngoh ia ka Lawkyntang bad ia ka Heritage Village kaba don ha ka shnong Mawphlang, East Khasi Hills District.Ia u Mathou la synran lang da u Consul General ka ri France ha Kolkata u Didier Talpain ryngkat ka jingdon lang jong u Myntri ka Hima Mawphlang u Bah S Sohliya, u Chairman ka Grand Council of Chiefs of Meghalaya bad Adviser ka Federation of Khasi States Bah John F Kharshiing, u Secretary General jong ka North East Sports Association (NESA) uba long ruh u Chairman jong ka SPIKAP, u Bah Tambor Lyngdoh, u nongseng ka Mawphlang Sustainable Tourism Societies bad Bah D. Lato uba dei u Tourism Officer.Na ka liang jong ka Hima Mawphlang ka la pdiang sngewbha ia kine ki kynrem ki lyndan na ka ri France lyngba u Myntri S. Sohliya bad kiwei ki dkhot jong ka Hima bad la synran lang  ia ki da u Bah Tambor Lyngdoh uba dei  u nongseng jong ka Mawphlang Sustainable Tourism Societies (MSTS).U Bah Tambor Lyngdoh u la ai sngewbha ia u Ambassador Thierry Mathou da ka kot Collection of Knowledge on Khasi Herbal Plants, Stories and Ooems  kaba u la pynmih paidbah.Hadien kane kine ki kynrem ki lyndan ki la leit jngoh sa ia ka Mawphlang Dam kaba ju bsa um ia ka Sor Shillong baroh kawei.Ha kane ka jaka u Bah John Kharshiing u la ai ia u Ambassador Thierry Mathou bad ia u Counsel General u Didier Talpain ia ka kot “The Khasi States – A Brief Historical Timeline – 1771 to 2017.”Kine ki kynrem ki lyndan ki la dap da ka jingkmen ban iohi ia kane ka spah meiramew bad ban ioh ban iaid hapdeng ka lyer kaba khuid bha kaba la pynshlur ia ki ban iaid kjat katto katne por hapdeng ka jingshoh biej ia ka jingitynad ka Law Lyngdoh Law Kyntang Mawphlang bad ka Mawphlang Dam.Hadien ba wanphai sha sor Shillong ki la leit ban iakynduh sa ia u Chief Secretary  jong ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Donald Wahlang ryngkat ka jingiadon lang jong u Commissioner and Secretary ka Sorkar Jylla u Dr Vijay Kumar D, ha kaba ki la iasyllok sani bha halor kiba bun ki phang treikam bad la ioh jingiakren ruh halor kumno ban ioh ka jingiatreilang ha ki kam kilan sports.
title: KHRING KA JINGBNA NAM KA HERITAGE VILLAGE HA MAWPHLANG ÏA I AMBASSADOR KA FRANCE

content: Shillong, Jymmang, 11: Ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynmih ia ka jingpynbna ba la thung ia ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang kum ka Director General of Police (DGP) ba thymmai jong ka Jylla lyngba ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih da ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Sorkar Jylla.Katkum ka jingpynbna ba la soi da u Secretary jong ka tnat Home (Police) ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Cyril V.D. Diengdoh, la pyntip ba napdeng ki kyrteng jong ki Ophisar IPS ba la mynjur da ka Empanelment Committee jong ka Union Public Service Commission (UPS) ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha ka 2 tarik Jymmang, 2024 bad na ka bynta ka jingpyntip paidbah, u Lat ka Jylla  u la mynjur ban thung ia ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang, ka Ophisar IPS na ka Batch jong u snem 1992 kaba bat mynta kum ka Director General of Civil Defence & Home Guards, Shillong kum ka Director General of Police ka Jylla Meghalaya na ka bynta ka samoi treikam kaba ar snem, kata naduh ka 20 tarik u Jymmang, 2024 haduh ka 19 tarik u Jymmang, 2026.
title: THUNG KA SORKAR DA KA KONG IDASHISHA NONGRANG KUM KA DGP BA THYMMAI

content: Kawei ka kali kamai Local Taxi kaba don ia u nombar ML05-D-4866 ka la kem ding kynsan hapdeng surokbah National Highway-44 katba ka dang wanphai na ka jingleit buh ia ki nongleit jingleit sha Umroi Nongrah, Ribhoi District.Kane ka la jia ha ka por kumba 12:00 baje shiteng sngi jong ka Sngi Saitjaiñ ha kaba u nongñiah jong ka kali u la lait na ka jingjia ba sngewsih hynrei lait noh tang ka jingduhnong jong u trai ka kali kaba la kem ding bad ingkhong hapdeng surok.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum la iathuh ba hadien ba la wan phai na ka jingleit buh ia ki nongleit jingleit sha Retreat Centre ha Umroi Nongrah, u nongñiah jong ka kali u Bah Tyngshaiñ, 26 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Mawblang Ribhoi District u la pynlip noh ia ka Engine bad shwa ban poi ha surokbah National Highway-44 katba u dang pyrshang ban khyrwait ia u shabi ban pynim biang ia ka Engine hynrei kynsan kynsan ka kali ka la kem ding.Da ka jingwan poi jong ki Pulit ka Fire and Emergency Services la lah ban pynlip noh ia ka jingklang jong ka ding.  Ki Pulit ki la tan noh ia kane ka kali sha Umroi PIC na ka bynta ban leh katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: KEM DING KA KALI LOCAL TAXI HAPDENG SUROK BAN LEIT SHA SHILLONG AIRPORT

content: Ki dkhot ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Mawshynrut Circle ba la lamkhmat da  Assistant Organising Secretary u samla Korbar Marthong bad ki dkhot ki la ioh bat ia kawei ka kali Pickup kaba don ia u nombar AS18 AC 6193 kaba dap smam da ki barjylla katba ka dang wan na ka jylla Assam bad kaba la rung lyngba ka Infiltration Check-gate kaba don ha ka shnong Aradongnga, West Khasi Hills District.Ki dkhot ka seng kiba la tohkit ia ki bar jylla ki la iathuh ba ki dang thmu ban leit trei sha ka shnong Ummulong, West JaintiaHaba pan ia ki kot ki sla kine ki bar jylla kim don satia wat tang ban pynshisha ba ki dei ki nong India bad mar mar na ka liang jong ki nongialam jong ka seng ki la pynphai noh ia ki bar jylla bad ia ka kali kaba wan rung beaiñ sha ka jylla khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang.Ka seng ka la ther tyngeh ruh ia ki bor Pulit kiba ap pahara ha Infiltration Check Gate kaba shu pyllait laitlan khlem da peit bniah ia ka jingrung jingmih jong ki bar jylla bad ka seng ka la maham tyngeh lada ka dang lap nangne shakhmat ka seng kam banse ban buh hi noh ia ka Infiltration Check Gate ha ki jaka ba ju rung bad mih ki bar jylla.
title: NA INFILTRATION CHECK GATE ARADONGNGA RUNG LAITLAN KI BAR JYLLA, MAHAM KA KSU

content: Ribhoi, Jymmang 12 : Uwei u rangbah u la duh noh ïa la ka jong ka jingim hadien ba u la shah pynïap dusmon harud lynti jong ka shnong Erpakon, ka shnong kaba ha hapoh Ri-Bhoi District.  Ia une u rangbah uba la thiah lyngktar harud lynti hapdeng ka jinglyngkien jong ka snam  na ki bynta jong ka skhor la lap da ki nongshong shnong.  Kane la ka jia ha ka 11 tarik u Jymmang, 2024 ha ka por kumba 8 baje mynmiet.Ia une u rangbah uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Kyrmen Lyngdoh Nonglait  uba la 38 snem ka rta uba shong basah ha ka shnong Erpakon la pynkit noh Civil Hospital Nongpoh ban ioh ïa ka jingsumar hynrei namar ka jingphlei shaba palat jong ka snam ki doctor ki la pynbna ba u la khlad noh na kane ka sla pyrthei.Ha ka jingïakren bad u rangbah shnong u Bah Michael Thongni bad u Bah Bah Lambor Kharshilot, ki la pynpaw ba kim shym la lah satia ban batai mano ba donkti ban tied klep ia une u rangbah kat haduh ba un da khladnoh na kane ka sla pyrthei.Na ka liang jong ki bahaiing ki la ujor da ka ejahar ha Nongpoh Police Station bad ki la kyrpad ia ki Pulit ba kin pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap dien ia kiba donkti ha kane ka kam runar.Ïa ka met jong u Bah Kyrmen la rah noh sha NEIGRIHMS Hospital Shillong na ka bynta ban leh ïa ka post mortem shwa ban aiti noh sha ki bahaing hasem ban pyndep ia ka jinglehniam bakhatduh.
title: ÏAP U RANGBAH BA SHAH TIED KLEP HA SHNONG ERPAKON, THWET KI PULIT ÏA KI RUNAR

content: : Saw ngut ki briew ki la mynsaw bad uwei u khladnoh ha ka jingsyllad jong kawei ka trok kaba don ïa u nombar ML05 R 9977 katba ka dang wan na ka thaiñ Mawryngkneng.  Kine ki saw ngut ki la mynsaw hadien ka trok ka la rat ïa ki lai tylli ki kali shwa ba kan leit rat sa ïa kawei ka dukan kat haduh ba la julor ynda poi ha Sawlad hajan Madanryting,Shillong.Kane ka la jia ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka por kumba 9:44 minit mynmiet.Ha kane ka jingjïa, u nongbud jong ka trok ïa uba la tip kyrteng kum u  Shujumuddin Skeik, 34 snem ka rta u la khlad noh hadien.Ïa u Shujumuddin Skeik la pynkit noh sha Civil Hospital, Shillong ban leh ïa ka post mortem hashwa ban aiti sha ki bahaing hasem.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ïohlum la ïathuh ba la shu antad ba ka jingsyllad jong kane ka trok ïa kine ki lai tylli ki kali ka lah ban dei ba u nongñiah jong ka trok u Sanam Ali uba dei na Goalpara District, Assam um lah shuh ban tehlakam shuh ïa u lakam kali kat haduh ba ka ka la wanrah ïa kane ka jingjia basngewsih.Namarba ka trok ka la sahkut ha ka dukan, ym shym la lah shuh ban sei ïa ki briew kiba don hapoh ka trok bad marmar ki Pulit ki la pyntip noh ïa ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team (SRT), Shillong ban ïarap sei ïa ki briew kiba la sahkut da kaba ot noh ïa ki bynta ba shakhmat jong ka trok.
title: RAT KA TROK LAI TYLLI KI KALI BAD ÏA KA DUKAN HA SAWLAD, KHLAD U NONGBUD TROK

content: Ki dkhot ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Mawshynrut Circle ba la lamkhmat da u Assistant Organising Secretary u samla Korbar Marthong ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la ïoh bat ïa kawei ka kali Pickup kaba don ïa u nombar AS18 AC 6193 kaba dap smam da ki bar jylla katba ka dang wan na ka jylla Assam bad kaba la rung lyngba ka Infiltration Check-gate kaba don ha ka shnong Aradongnga, West Khasi Hills District.Ha ka jingtohkit, ki bar jylla ki la ïathuh ba ki dang thmu ban leit trei sha ka shnong Ummulong, West Jaiñtia bad haba ki dkhot ka seng ki la pan ïa ki kot ki sla na kine ki bar jylla kim don satia wat tang ban pynshisha ba ki dei ki nong India bad marmar ki dkhot ka seng ki la pynphai noh ïa ki bar jylla bad ïa ka kali kaba wan rung beaiñ sha ka jylla khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang.Ka seng ka la ther tyngeh ruh ïa ki bor Pulit kiba ap pahara ha Infiltration Check Gate da kaba kynnoh ba la shu pyllait laitlan khlem da peit bniah ïa ka jingrung jingmih jong ki bar jylla.Ka seng ka la maham tyngeh lada ka dang lap nangne shakhmat kam banse ban buh hi noh ïa ka Infiltration Check Gate ha ki jaka ba ju rung bad mih ki bar jylla.
title: BAT KA KSU ÏA KI BAR JYLLA BA RUNG LAITLAN NA INFILTRATION CHECK-GATE ARADONGA

content: Ka PynChe ba kynthup ia ka Lamerphylla Kharsati, ka Maya Ika Lamar bad ka Dalarympei Kharmawphlang ki la pynlong ia ka prokram kaba la tip kum ka “Kilometre Zero” kaba khring ia ki briew kiba don ia ka sap shna, ka sap dro, ka jingpynneh pynsah bad ka shet ka tiew.Ia kane ka prokram la pynlong ha Linsamer Farms, Kydemkulai, Ribhoi District ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep.Kane ka prokram ka pyni kumno ngi lah ban ioh ia ki jhur ki jhep bad kiwei dei da kaba kheit ia ki sla ki kynbat na khlaw ba  don ha Linsamer. Ka pyni kumno ruh ba ngi lah ban pynduna ia ka Carbon Footprint jong ngi bad ha kajuh ka por ruh ban rah burom ia ka jingiadei hapdeng ka mei mariang bad ka sap ka phong.La lamkhmat ia ka prokram da ki nongshet ba pawnam, Chef Ahme bad Chef Dalarympei bad ki nongshim bynta ki la ioh ban mad ia ki jhur, ki kynbat ba bun jait kiba pynphuh pynphieng ia ka Linsamer Farms.Ki nongshim bynta ki la iohlad ruh ban shim bynta ha ki kam pynpyngad jingmut (therapeutic art activities) ba la ialam da ka Maya-ika bad ki la ioh ban pynpaw ia ki jingsngew bad pyni la ki sap ki jinsngew jong ki ha ka Mural-making bad ruh ha kaba ki la ioh ruh ia ki Seed Papers ban thung kum ka dak jong ka jingpynthymmai bad jingkylla da kaba ki bret noh ia ki jingeh jingshon jong ki.
title: KA SAP SHNA, SAP DRO BAD SHET JINGBAM TYRAI HA KA “KILOMETRE ZERO”

content: Wat hadien hadien shi taiew ba u Bah Kerlang Sohtun, 47 snem ka rta uba shong basah ha Lumshatsngi ha lyndet jong ka Sankardev College, Shillong u la jah na la iing naduh ka 5 tarik, Jymmang, 2024 hynrei haduh kane ka kynti ym shym pat la lap ksai satia ia une u rangbah.Ki bahaiing hasem ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la pan jingiarap na ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team (SRT) ka tnat Fire and Emergency Services ban wad ia u Bah Kyrmen bad kane ka kynhun lem bad ki Pulit ki la sdang ban wad naduh ka por 9:00 baje mynstep hynrei haduh kane ka kynti ym shym pat la lap satia.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong ki bahaiing, la ong ba u Bah Kerlang Sohtun u khun jong ka Kong Medency Sohtun la iohi khatduh ia u ha Last Stop, Laban.Ka kynhun SRT ka la sdang ia ka jingwad bniah naduh ka thain Last Stop haduh sha jingkieng Umshyrpi ter ter ia ka wah kaba don ha Maxwell Estate ha ryngkat bad ki pulit bad haduh ba thoh ia kane ka khubor ym shym la iohi dak eiei ban lap ia une u rangbah.
title: KHLEM LAP KSAI KI PULIT SRT ÏA U RANGBAH BA JAH NA LUMSHATSNGI

content: The Directorate of School Education & Literacy (DSEL), Government of Meghalaya recently launched its first ever campaign on setting up of School Nutrition (Kitchen) Garden (SNG) by observing a bag-less day on 29April, 2024 under the theme:. This initiative was aimed at ensuring 100% presence of SNGs in schools serving PM POSHAN Meals erstwhile Mid-Day Meal in the State. This scope is further explained by the Director, DSEL, Shri Swapnil Tembe, to have a positive impact on the supplementation of meals being served under the Scheme by improving the nutritional status of students and also to educate and culminate the ever thriving students a healthy, sustainable and mindful eating habit. Moreover, the practice of gardening teaches the students’ teamwork and also makes them aware about the horticulture prospects.A month before the observation of this day, all schools were given directions to make preparations in respect of identification of space and resources. In the absence of space, which is the case in most of the urban schools, they were advised to use pots and planters. The SDSEOs were asked to collaborate with line departments to arrange logistics. In various districts, the Horticulture department and Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK) came forward to provide the seeds and saplings. In many other places, community participation was witnessed where the parents and guardians came together to make fences for the kitchen garden.On the day of observation, the entire team of PM POSHAN went to different schools. Even the DCs, BDOs and SDSEOs joined the events in their respective places. It was a day which saw establishments of over 3000 SNGs in our schools. From around 9% of SNGs present during 2023, the figures have now increased to 40% and continues to grow every day. The department is committed to continue their efforts to achieve 100% coverage of SNGs in our schools and expressed gratitude to all the stakeholders who participated and played a key role to achieve this massive increase in SNGs.
title: SCHOOL NUTRITION GARDENS IN SCHOOLS GO UP FROM 9% TO 40% IN ONE DAY

content: Ki bahaiing hasem jong u Bah Kyrmenskhem Lyngdoh Nonglait, 39 snem uba la khladnoh na ka jingshah tied klep, ki la kynnoh ba dei uwei u bar jylla donkti ban leh ia kane ka kam runar ha ka sngi Saitjain jong ka taiew baladep ha ka por 7:30 eiei mynmiet.Mar ia tip ia kane ki bahaïing ki la pynkit noh ia u Bah Kyrmenskhem sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh bad hadien katto kattne por une u rangbah u la khladnoh namarba la jur palat ka jingmynsaw.Ha ka Sngi u Blei la pynkit noh ia kamet jong une u rangbah ha NEIGHRIMS Hospital, Shillong ban leh ia ka postmortem. Une u rangbah u la ieh noh shadien saw ngut ki khun bad ia ka kurim ka Kong Esmilinda Snaitang.Ha ka jingiakren bad u Bah Batskhem Lyngdoh Nonglait uba dei u hymmen u Kyrmenskhem Lyngdoh Nonglait u la iathuh ba u hymmen jong u la shah shoh shah tied ha ka sngi Saitjain ha uwei u bar jylla uba ki ju khot u Raju uba trei ha kawei ka hotel kaba don ha ka shnong Erpakon.U Bah Seiborlang Lyngdoh Nonglait uba dei u Vice President jong ka kur Lyngdoh Nonglait u la pynrem jur ia kane ka jingleh jong une u bar jylla uba la bthat jubor ia ka jingim jong u Bah Kyrmenskhem bad u la kyrpad ia ki bor jong ka ain ba ka dei ban pyngngat ha ka kyndon ain kaba eh khnang ba u runar uba donkti un ioh ia ka jingshah pynsajia.
title: KYNNOH KI BAHAÏING BA DEI U BAR JYLLA UBA TIED KLEP ÏA u U BAH KYRMENSKHEM HA ERPAKON

content: U District Magistrate jong ka East Khasi Hills District u SC Sadhu ha ka sngi Balang u la pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC ha East Khasi Hills District baroh kawei ban mana ia kino kino kiba buh ia ki khyrdop khrong pisa.Katkum kane ka hukum, u District Magistrate u la iathuh ba u la ioh jingtip ba ki don ki trok kit mawshun kiba iaid na Umdud sha surok Zero Point, kaba dei ka surok kaba mih sha Majai Land Custom Stations (LCS), kiba la shah pynsangeh ha ki nongshong shnong ka Majai.  Ki nongkhaii ki la mynjur ban sangeh shipor ia ka jingiaid jong ki trok tad haduh ban da iapynbeit da kumwei pat hapdeng ki ar kynhun, kata, ka Dorbar Shnong Majai bad u Syiem jong ka Hima Sohra.“Ka don ka jingkhrong pisa beain lyngba ka khyrdop jong u Syiem ka Hima Sohra na ki trok kit mawshun kiba iaid  lyngba ia ka Majai Land Custom Station ha ka dor T. 400 na kawei ka trok bad kane ka la lam sha ka jingmih ka jingiakulmar.  Ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la ieng ha ka nongrim ban wanrah ia ka “Zero Tolerance” Policy pyrshah ia ka jingkhrong pisa beain da ki Toll/Check Gate ne ban khrong pisa jubor na ki trok kiba iaid lyngba ki surokbah National Highways, ki surok State Highways bad ki Major District Roads jong ka East Khasi Hills,” la pyntip u Sadhu.“Ka jingpynieng ia kine ki Toll/Check Gate beain bad ia ki jingker ban khrong pisa jubor ka la pynwit ia ka leit ka wan bad ka la wanrah ia ka jingbym suk jong ki nongiaid lynti bad ka lah ruh ban wanrah ia ka jingjia aksiden ha surok. Namarkata, ban khanglad ia kano kano ka jingkulmar kaba lah ban mih, la mana tyngeh ban buh ia ki khyrdop khrong pisa (Toll/Check Gate) bym shym la ioh jingbit bad ban khrong pisa jubor ha shilynter ki surokbah National Highway, ki surok State Highway bad ki Major District Road jong ka East Khasi Hills,” la mana u District Magistrate“Kino kino kiba pynkheiñ ia kane ka hukum kin shah pynshitom katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ. Namar ka jingkyrkieh jong ka kam, ia ka hukum la pyntreikam noh mardor tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat,” la pyntip u Sadhu.
title: MIH KA KHYRDOP KHRONG PISA HA MAJAI, PYNJARI U DC DA KA SECTION 144 CRPC

content: Ka Indian Institute of Management (IIT) Guwahati ka la ai jingmut ia ka Sorkar Jylla ban khlong noh ia ka rong ba la siang ha jingkieng Damsite bad ban siang bujli noh da ka dewbilat.Ia kane la pyntip da u Myntri ka tnat Bording u Abu Taher Mondal ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei bad iathuh ruh ba ka jingmaramot ia ka jingkieng ha Damsite ka la iaid shakhmat.U Mondal u la iathuh ruh ba la khmihlynti ban pyndep ia ka jingshna ia ka jingkieng Damsite la kumno kumno ha kaba kut jong u bnai Naitung lane ha ka taiew banyngkong jong u bnai Nailar, mynta u snem 2024.“Ka jingmaramot ia ka jingkieng ka la iaid shakhmat,” u la ong bad iathuh ba dang ha ka taiew baladep u la leit jngoh ia ka jingpyntrei ia ka jingkieng Dam.“Hadien ba ngi la iasyllok bad ka IIT ka la ai jingmut ban siang noh da ka dewbilat na ki katto katne ki daw (technical reasons). Mynta ngi hap ban khlong noh ia ka rong ba ladep siang mynshwa. Ngin hap leh ia kane katkum ka jingai jingmut jong ka IIT,” u la ong.“Ynda ngi la siang da ka dewbilat, kan kham shimpor ban rkhiang bad ngin hap ban ap sa kumba 28 sngi tad haduh ba ka dewbilat kan da rkhiang bha,” u la ong bad iathuh ba ka jingsiang ia ka dewbilat kan long shwa na kawei ka liang bad sa na kawei pat ka liang.“Ka jingthmu hi ka long ban siang beit da ka rong bad nangta yn sa shna pyndep ia ka jingkieng.  Ngi hap ban leh noh marmar namarba kane ka kam kaba kyrkieh bad ki paidbah kiba leit ba wan lyngba ka surok na ka jingkieng Damsite ki la iakynduh jingeh shikatdeh ei bad ngin pyrshang ban shna pyndep katba lah,” la bynrap u Mondal.“Ngin pyrshang ban shna pyndep ha ka taiew bakhatduh u bnai Naitung lane ha ka taiew banyngkong u bnai Nailar,” u la ong shuh shuh.Katkum ka jingong jong u Mondal, la khmihlynti ba ka jingkieng kan shan haduh 20 snem nangne shakhmat bad ka Sorkar kan hap ban peitngor bha ynda ladep maramot ia ka jingkieng.Haba kylli u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar Jylla, ka tnat PWD ka la wad ruh ia ki lad ki lynti ban shna noh da ka jingkieng kaba thymmai.“Ia ka jingpynbeit yn sa aiti sha ka NHIDCL bad kan sa shimrai khatduh halor kane,” u la ong.
title: AI JINGMUT KA IIT GUWAHATI BAN SIANG DA KA DEWBILAT HA JINGKIENG DAMSITE

content: Ka jingther jong u lapbah lapsan kumba theh na ktang uba la neh haduh saw kynta ha ka sngi Palei u la pynshlei ia ka Wah Umkhrah bad ka Wah Umshyrpi kiba dei ki ar tylli ki wah bakongsan kiba tuid lyngba ka dohnud jong ka sor Shillong ban pyndap ia ka pung Umiam kaba ju bsa ia ka bording sha ki phew lak tylli ki longïing ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.U slap u la hap ha ka por 12.24 baje noh sngi khlem sangeh tad haduh ka por 4:54 baje janmiet.Ka jingther jong u lapbah lapsan ka la pynshlei um ha kylleng ki shnong jong ka sor Shillong.Ka jingshlei jong ka Wah Umkhrah ka la pynkylla pung ia ka surok ha Mawlai Nongpdeng ha lyndet ka Seng Khasi College kaba pyniasoh ia ka surokbah National Highway, kat haduh ba ki kali kim lait shuh ban iaid namarba ka um ka la tap kumba 3 phut tam eiei ia ka surok.La sakhi ba ki kali kiba wan na ka  surokbah National Highway kim lah shuh ban rung sha ka surok shnong jong ka Mawlai Nongpdeng na ka daw ba ka um ka la khang lynti syndon sbak ia ka surok.Watla ka um ka la kiew bha ha Wah Umkhrah, hynrei la iohi pat ba ki ing shong briew kiba don ha shilynter jong ka rud wah kim shym la shah ktah satia na kane ka jingshlei jong kane ka wah.Ha Demseiñiong ka jingshlei jong ka Wah Umshyrpi ka la pynslei ia ka surok ha kaba ka la wanrah ia ka jingthud  ha ka leit ka wan.Ha surok Lower Lachaumiere mar pyrshah bad ka ophis DIPR ka la shlei hapdeng surok kat haduh ba la pynthud ia ka leit ka wan jong ki kali saw shaka bad ki thuk thuk ar shaka.La sakhi ruh ba ki khynnah skul bad ki paidbah kim banse ban iaid napdeng ka um kaba la lang hapdeng surok hapdeng ka jingther jong u lapbah lapsan uba jur ban leit sha ki jaka ba ki thmu.Kane ka jingther jong u lapbah ka la pynkulmar hi thlim ia ki Pulit pyniaid kali kiba la pyrshang bad trei shitom ban pyllait ia ka jingdheng kali kaba jur ha kane ka sngi namar ka jingsahkut jong ki kali.Haba wad ia ka daw, la iathuh ba ka jingshlei um ha kane ka bynta jong ka surok ha Lower Lachaumiere ka dei na ka  jingsahkut jong ki jaboh jabaiñ ha ka nala rit ba ka um ka dei ban tuid sha ka nala heh kaba don markhap bad kawei ka dukan die sha.Nalor kata, la sakhi ruh ba ka surok Smart City ba la shu ieh khongreng ha lyndet jong ka ophis DIPR bad nakhmat ka Shillong Press Club ka la shlei da ka um bad uwei u rangbah briew uba iaid lynti u la mynsaw na ki bynta ka khohsiew hadien ba
