u la ur hapoh ka thliew na ka jingbym poi pyrkhat katba u dang iaid lynti.Ha Them Iewmawlong, ka jingshlei jong ka um ka la pynkulmar thlim ia ki nongiaid lynti, ia ki nongthied nongpet, ia ki nongñiah kali bad ia ki nongkitnong.Ka jingshlei jong ka um hapdeng surok kaba la rung ruh wat sha ki dukan kiba don hakhmat surok ka dei hi na ka daw ka jingleh sih shaba palat jong ki nongshong dukan kiba bret pathar ia ki jaboh jabain ha nala.U nonglum khubor uba la ioh ban shondur ia kane ka jingshlei um ha Them Iewmawlong u la lap ba ki jaboh ki jabaiñ bad ki plastik kiba la satah baroh shikatta ha surok ki la per halor ka um kaba la pynshlei ia ka surok baroh kawei da ka um kaba la pynsuhsat pat ia ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan bad ka rah ka rong.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum, la iathuh ruh ba ha kane ka jingther jong u lapbah lapsan ka kynroh jong ka Bormanik College ha Laimer, Upper Shillong, ka la twa kynsan ha ka por 3:30 baje eiei noh phai sngi.Na ka jingtwa jong ka kynroh, ka khyndew bad u nar post ba la pyndait ia ki cable wire ki la hap hapdeng surok bad khang syndon sbak ia ka surok ha Pyrda Nongskeh, Upper Shillong.La ioh jingtip ruh ba ka jingther jong u lapbah lapsan ha kane ka sngi ka la pynshlei um ia ka phyllaw jong ka Hubert Memorial Higher Secondary School, Umpling, Shillong ha kaba ka um ka la khang lynti syndon sbak ia ki khynnah skul kiba la sahkut hapoh skul khlem lait satia ban leit phai sha iing.Katkum ki dur ba la shon da ki paidbah ba la phah sha u nonglum khubor la sakhi ba ka phyllaw jong kane ka skul ka la shlei lut da ka um kaba la kylla kum ka pung.Ka jingbteng jong u slap ban ther khamtam ha ki kynta ba la wai skul ka la wanrah ia ka jingdheng kali kaba jur bad bun ki khynnah skul ki la sahkut ha skul tad haduh ka por janmiet 4 baje tam eiei.
title: 4 KYNTA THER U LAPBAH HA SHILLONG, SHLEI UM KI SUROK, PER KI PLASTIK, BILOR HA THEM ÏEWMAWLONG

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ha ka sngi Palei ka la dawa ïa ka Sorkar ba kan pynbiang ïa ki tiar ki tar kiba ïadei bad ka jingpynlong ïa ka eksamin Central University Entrance Test (CUET).Ka seng ka la pyntip ba ki samla ki la hap ban ieng laiñ daki kynta namarba kam don kano kano ka jingbthah ba paka ba kin leit sha ki jaka thoh eksamin.“Ka jingkulmar jingmut ka la pynsuhsat shuh shuh namarba ha ka Admit Card ba la ai da ka NTA la kdew ba ka jaka thoh eksamin ka dei ha NEHU Cluster Building; hynrei ka NEHU ka la buh ar tylli ki jaka thoh eksamin ha Non-Science bad Science Cluster Classroom, khlem da ai ka jingpyntip kaba thikna sha ki samla pule ha kano ka Hall ba ki dei ban leit thoh ïa ka eksamin.  Ka jingpynslem ban pynlong ïa ka eksamin ha ka sobjek English na ka dw ka jingbym treikam jong ka Biometric System, ka la pynlong ïa ki samla pule ban ieng shah slap bad thyngngian para ma ki, kaba lam shaduh u pud ba ki don ki samla kiba la ïapler bad kiba la donkam ban ïoh jingsumar kyrkieh,” la pyntip ka seng ïa ka jingjia ha ka sngi Balang ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u Chairman jong ka Education Cell ka KSU u samla Pynkmenlang Sanmiet bad u Secretary u samla Shelkitbok Kharbani.“Ka long kaba sngewsih ba ka por thoh eksamin kaba la buh ha ka por 3:00 baje noh sngi hynrei ki samla pule ki dang ïoh ban rung sha ka jaka thoh eksamin haduh ka por 5.15 baje janmiet tad ynda ka NEHU ka la ïoh ktien na ka NTA ban pynlong ïa ka eksamin khlem da pynlong shuh ïa ka Biometric Registration,” la pyntip shuh shuh ka seng.“Kine ki sakhi ki pynpaw shynna ka jingbym pynkhreh da ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka skulbah ban pynlong kat ïa kane ka eksamin, khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingtehlakam ïa ka jingïalum lymbung,” la ong ka seng.Ka Seng ka la kynthoh ruh ba ka jingpynslem ïa ka por ban pynsdang ïa ka eksamin, da kaba pynieng ïa ki samla pule ha u lapbah lapsan, ka donkam ban pynbeit mardor ïa ki rukom treikam kiba janai.“Namarkata, ka seng ka kyntu ba phin shimkhia mardor ïa kine ki jingjia ba kin dei shuh ban dang jia ha ki por ki ban sa wan. Kine ki kynthup naduh kaba pynbiang ïa ki tiar ki tar, kum ki jingbthah, ka jingpynbiang ïa ki jaka thoh eksamin, ka jingpyntreikam pura ïa ka Biometric Systems, bad ban pynïaid beit ïa ka eksamin ha ka rukom kaba dei,” la ong ka seng bad bynrap, “dei ban pynbiang ïa ki bor pahara ban peit ïa ka jingïalum briew bad ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ki nongïaleh eksamin.”
title: PHAH TUKLAR KA KSU HA KA SORKAR ÏA KI JINGTHURMUR KA EKSAMIN CUET HA NEHU

content: Ka ïingbishar jong u Sessions Judge ka West Jaiñtia Hills District hadien ka jingbishar kaba khatduh ïa ka mukotduma halor ka jingshah pynïap u  Bah Trebor Hinge ha ka shnong Nangbah, ka la rai pynrem ïa u Ram Dhar da kaba set along shi rta jingim.Katkum ka khubor ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka West Jaiñtia Hills u la ïathuh ba kane ka la jia naduh ka 11.02.2015 ha kaba la register case pyrshah ïa u Ram Dhar halor ka jingkynnoh donkti ban pynïap dusmon ïa u Bah Trebor Hinge. La register case ha Jowai Police Station hapoh ka Section 302 IPC ba la shimti da u SI S. Pariat.Ha kane ka jingrai pynrem ïa u Ram Dhar, ka ïingbishar ka la hukum ba un siew ïa ka kuna kaba T. 5000 hajar bad la hukum ban siew bai lutksan T. 3 lak sha ki bahaïing jong uba la khladnoh.
title: RAI KA ÏINGBISHAR BAN SET ALONG SHI JINGIM ÏA U NONGPYNIAP BRIEW

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ha ka sngi Palei ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma ban dawa ba dei ban thung da ka jingtohkit hadien ba la mih ki kynrum kynram ha ka jingpynlong ïa ka eksamin Central University Entrance Test (CUET) ha skulbah North Eastern Hills University (NEHU) ha ka sngi Balang.“Dei ban thung da ka jingtohkit ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingbym kitkhlieh, ka jingbymsngew briew, ka jingmih ka kynrum kynram ha ka jingpynlong ïa ka eksamin CUET ha skulbah NEHU ha ka 15-05-2024. Ki nongtrei bad ki ophisar kiba wanrah ïa kane ka jingbakla bym lah ban map shuh bad kaba la pynsuhsat ïa ki samla pule ka jylla Meghalaya ki dei ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh namar ka jingbym kitkhia ïa ka kamram. Ka Sorkar ka dei ban pynthikna ba kum kine ki jingjia kim dei shuh ban dang jia nangne shakhmat,” la ong ka seng ha ka dorkhas ba la phah sha u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ba la soi da u Asst. Education Secretary u Banpynbiang Riang bad u Joint Secretary u Mandor Diengdoh.Ka seng ka la dawa ruh ïa ka Sorkar ban thung da u Nodal Officer ha ka jylla uba la lah ban ïatreikam bad ka National Testing Agency (NTA).Nalorkata, ka seng ka la dawa ruh ban buh da u Helpline Number ban ïarap ïa ki samla pule kiba ïakhun ïa ka eksamin CUET.  “Ka Sorkar ka dei ban ïakren bad ka NTA ba kam dei shuh ban dang don ka jingleh thurmur nangne shakhmat,” la bynrap  ka seng.“La pyntip ruh sha ngi ba ki don katto katne ki Papers ba la jied da ki samla pule kiba jah ha ka Admit Card. Ngi kwah ba ïa kane ka jingjia dei ban tih bniah mardor khnang ba kan ym pynkulmar jingmut ïa ki samla pule,” la ong ka seng.“Namar ka jingpynlong ïa ka eksamin CUET ka jylla khlem da pynkhreh bha, bun na ki samla pule kim shym la lah ban leh bha na ka daw ki jingthurmur ha ka rukom pynïaid.  Ngi kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan pynthikna ba ki shlem pule ha Meghalaya ki dei ban don ïa ki tiar ki tiar khnang ba ki samla pule kin dup lah ban pas ïa ka eksamin CUET,” la bynrap ka seng.
title: DAWA KA HYC BAN PYNSHITOM ÏA KI OPHISAR BA MIH KA JINGTHURMUR HA KA EKSAMIN CUET

content: Ka Lympung Ki Seng Kynthei (LSK) ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkmen halor ka jingthung jong ka Sorkar ia ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang, IPS kum ka kynthei ba nyngkong eh ha ka shuki Director General of Police (DGP) ka Jylla.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka President jong ka Seng ka Kong Theilin Phanbuh ka la ong, ba ka seng ka pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkmen namar ka jingjied ia ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang ka pynpaw shai ba ki kynthei ki lah ban trei ia ka kam kaba eh bad ban iakhun ruh ia ki jingtynjuh, lada ailad bad plie jingkhang lem na ka bynta jong ki.“Ngi ai khublei kyrpang ia i Kong Idashisha Nongrang bad ngi kyrmen ba in jop ha ki jingialeh,” la ong u kyrwoh.
title: KMEN KA LSK BA THUNG DGP KA SORKAR DA KA KONG IDASHISHA NONGRANG

content: Shillong, May, 16: The Williamnagar Division of the Public Works Department (Roads) conducted a spot inspection on May 14th of the bridge over Chibok River on L051 connecting Nengmandalgre to Daribokgre. This inspection was prompted by a recent complaint by a non-government organisation to the Executive Engineer of Williamnagar Division.The inspection team thoroughly examined the Substructure works like Pile cap, Pier shaft, Abutment shaft, Pier cap, Abutment cap and Superstructure works like Girder, Cross Girder, and slab. The inspection report confirmed that there were no cracks observed on any of the structures, and the overall works are reported to be in good condition, making the bridge safe for public use.Regarding the reported bitumen patches, the inspection team concluded that they were not intended to cover up cracks. Instead, they appear to be isolated instances of liquid bitumen which have spilled during transportation of material.The inspection also reaffirmed the overall good condition of the bridge and its safe utilization by the public.
title: BRIDGE OVER CHIBOK RIVER DECLARED SAFE AFTER INSPECTION

content: Ki dkhot jong ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) South West Khasi Hills District kiba la hiar khynra ha ïew Mawkyrwat ki la ïoh bat 18 ngut ki briew kiba la im kyrni ban dih drok bad kumjuh arngut ki snar nongkhaïi drok.Hadien ba la ïoh kurup ïa u drok, ïa ka pisa, kynthup ruh ïa ki thyrnia injek bad ïa u Ganja, ka seng ka la thang da ka ding.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President ka seng Bah Polius Thyrniang u la ong ba ha kane ka jingkhynra kaba ar sien ka seng ka la ïoh bat haduh 18 ngut ki briew kiba ju kyrni ban dih ïa u drok kynthup ruh ïa ki nongkhaïi.U la ïathuh ruh ba kine ki briew kiba ju mlien ban dih drok ki la thaw da ka kynhun ïa kaba ym lah ban tip la ki thmu sha kaba bha ne sha kaba sniew hynrei kum ka seng hi kan ym tieng bad rat dyngkhong syndon kum kine ki jingdih kiba long ka daw jong ka jingjot ki longïing longsem, ka shnong ka thaw bad ka imlang ka sahlang.ïa ki 18 ngut kiba la shah bat, ka HITO ka la aiti ha ka Dorbar Shnong Mawkyrwat ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong ki nongïalam ka Seng Samla Shnong Mawkyrwat bad ki Village Defence Party  (VDP).“Ïa ki tiar ki tar ba la ïoh kurup na ki briew ba la ïoh bat la rai paidbah ban shu thang beit ha ka ding,” ong u President.“Ka rai jong ngi kum ka seng kam dei ka jingkut, hynrei nangne shakhmat ngin dang pynjur shuh shuh ki jingkhynra khnang ban rat dyngkhong syndon ïa u drok na ka South West Khasi Hills District baroh kawei,” ong u Bah Thyrniang.
title: KEM KA HITO 18 NGUT KI NONGDIH DROK BAD 2 KI NONGKHAÏI, THANG ÏA KA PISA BAD U DROK

content: Ka Kashari jong u Sessions Judge ka West Jaiñtia Hills District ka la rai pynrem ïa u Kyrshanlang Sungoh na ka shnong Mookhap hadien ba la lap ïa ki sakhi sabut ba u donkti ban batbor kynthei.Kane ka la jia naduh u snem 2010 bad ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh ka Jowai Police Station hapoh ka Section 376  Indian Penal Code (IPC) bad ïa ka case la bynshet ha Women Police Sub Inspector ka Kong O. Tyngkan ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit.Hadien ka jingbishar ba khatduh ïa kane ka mukotduma, ka Kashari ka la rai pynrem ïa u Kyrshanlang hadien ba la lap ïa ki sabut kiba biang bad hukum ruh ban set along haduh hynñiew snem ryngkat ka jingdaiñ kuna kaba T. 5000 hajar  bad lada um lah ban siew ïa ka kuna yn sa pynjlan ïa ka jingset along sa shibnai.Ha kajuh ka por ka Kashari ka la hukum ïa u Kyrshanlang Sungoh ban siew ïa ka bai mynraiñ khmat kaba T.5 lak sha ka lanot kaba la shah leh be-ijot.
title: RAI KA KASHARI BAN SET ALONG 7 SNEM ÏA UBA LEH BE-IJOT HA WJH

content: : Ka Joint Action Committee Namchiang Narpuh (Tongseng shaduh Ratacherra), East Jaintia Hills, ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka jingleh kuman jong ka National Highway Authority of India (NHAI) ban maramot ia ka surokbah National Highway-6 kumba ka la kular.U Chairman jong ka JAC u Bah Lasting Pala ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “ka jingbym leh eiei jong ka Sorkar ban pynbha ia ka surok ka la pynjynjar ia ki nongleit nongwan namarba ka jingsniew jong ka surok ka la long shaba palat pud.”“Kaba sngewthamula ka long ba ka NHAI ka siang rong tang ha ki bynta jong ka surok ba dang bha bad ieh pat ia ki thliew ki syiar ha shilynter jong surok. Kane ka jingleh kane ka NHAI ka long tang ban ioh sei ia ka pisa (bill),” la kynnoh ka JAC.“Bunsien ki paidbah nongleit nongwan khamtam ki bapang ba shitom ki sahkut ha ka dheng kali ha ka thain Tongseng shaduh Umkiang, Ratacherra khamtam ha ki bynta jong ka Mandir da ki bun bun kynta. Ka jingdheng kali ka dei na ka daw ka jingiaid jong ki kali kit mawshun, kali kit dewiong kiba kit palat pud bad dei kine kiba long daw jong ka dheng kali ha shilynter jong ka surok NH-6,” la ong ka JAC.“Ka JAC ka kyntu ia ka Sorkar/NHAI ban maramot noh ia ka surok NH-6 hapoh shitiew hynrei lym kumta ka JAC kan lum paidbah ha surok bad ban pakhang syndon ia ka surok,” la maham ka JAC.“Ka JAC ka la maham ruh ia ki trok ki dewiong/mawshun ba kim dei ban pynkheiñ ia ka hukum ba la pynjari da ka Ingbishar Supreme Court da kaba kit palat pud nangne shakhmat.  Lada ka JAC ka lap ia ki trok kiba kit palat pud kan shim ia ka sienjam da kaba mih paitbah ban kem naphang ia ki trok kit dewiong/mawshun kiba pynkhein aiñ bad ban aiti syndon ia ki sha ka bor jong ka aiñ ne wat ban ujor da ka ejahar,” la byrngem ka JAC.
title: BYRNGEM KA JAC NAMCHIANG NARPUH BAN PAKHANG ÏA KA SUROK NH-6

content: Uwei u samla na ka thaiñ nongstoiñ u bym shym la kwah ban pynpaw kyrteng ne pyni durkhmat u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih kaba jur halor ka jingbym shimkhia bad kheiñ snep jong ki Technician kiba dei peit ïa ka E-ray bad kiwei hapoh ka Nongstoiñ Civil Hospital ïa la ka kam ban wan shapoh hospital ha don ki jingjia ba kyrkieh.Une u samla u la phla ba ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai u la ïakynduh ïa ka jingjia aksiden kali ha ka surokbah Nongstoiñ-Riangdo ha kaba la pynkit noh marmar ïa u sha ka Nongstoiñ Civil Hospital bad u la ong ruh ba ki doktor ki la ïaleh shitom ban ai jingsumar kyrkieh ïa u, hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba ha kane hi ka sngi ki nongtrei kiba dei peit ïa ki kor E-ray kim shym la don hapoh ka Hospital bad na ka liang jong ki doktor ki la telephone ban phah wan ïa ki nongtrei hynrei naduh ka por 1:00 baje noh sngi haduh ka por 4 baje janmiet kim shym la poi satia bad ki doktor kim banse ban phah noh ïa une u samla sha Shillong ban ïoh ka jingsumar kaba paka.Une u samla u la kyntu ruh ïa ki bor bahalor jong ka Nongstoiñ Civil Hospital ba kin kitkhia bad leh eiei pyrshah ïa ki nongtrei ki bym kheiñ snep ia la ka kam khnang ban lait na kino kino ki jingjia kiba sngewsih ïa ki briew bad ia ki nongpang khamtam ïa ki duk ki suk.
title: LAP U SAMLA BA AKSIDEN BYM KHEIÑ SNEP KI TECHNICIAN KA NONGSTOIÑ CIVIL HOSPITAL

content: Ka Sports Authority India (SAI) Training Centre, Shillong ha ka sngi Ba-ar ka la pynlong ïa ka prokram wad khynnah ïalehkai ba kynsai lane ka Talent Identification Program kaba hap hapoh ka Khelo India Rising Talent Hunt (KIRTI-MyBharat), ha Shillong Public School.Ha kane ka prokram (2nd Assessment Camp) kaba tang shi sngi la ïashim bynta da 199 ngut ki khynnah kiba na katei ka skul ha ki ar tylli ki jingïalehkai kata ka Athletics bad Football.Kane ka long ka sien ba ar ba pynlong ïa katei ka prokram bad kham hashwa ha u Ïaïong mynta u snem la pynlong ha SAI Training Centre kaba ha NEHU ha kaba la wan shim bynta da kumba 527 ngut ki khynnah kiba na kylleng ki district jong ka Jylla ha ki jingïalehkai Athletic, Boxing bad Football.Katkum ka jingpyllait khubor da katei ka shlem ai jinghikai la ong ba ki la don 88 ngut ki khynnah kiba iashim bynta ha ka Athletic kynthup ia 53 ngut ki shynrang bad 35 ngut ki kynthei. Katba ha ka Football ki la don 111 ngut ki khynnah kynthup ia 102 ngut ki shynrang bad 9 ngut ki kynthei.Ka jingthmu jong ka tnat ïalehkai jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ka long ban ithuh ïa ki sap ba kyrpang jong ki khynnah bad ban ai jinghikai pura ïa ki lyngba ka jingdon ïa ki jaka ïalehkai kiba paka namar ka jingangnud hi ka long ban sei ïa ki khynnah ïalehkai ki ban paw haduh ki lympung ïalehkai shabar ri kum ka Olympic bad kiwei.Ha kane ka sngi la sdang da ka jingpynrung kyrteng ïa kitei baroh 199 ngut ki khynnah ki khynnah kiba la wan sha kane ka prokram ha la ki jong ki rta ki jong ki, hadien la bud sa ka jingthew jingkhia, jingthew ïa ka rynïeng, kumjuh kiwei ki test, nalor ka jingpynmareh, jingkynthih, jingkawang bol da dien (back throw) bad jingïalehkai phutbol.
title: HA SHILLONG PUBLIC SCHOOL WAD KA SAI ÏA KI KHYNNAH BA DONSAP HA KA SPORTS

content: :  Ki runar ki bym lah ban tip ki la jynrat bad tuh bun tylli ki Diengphna napoh ka Lum Jingtep jong ka Balang Catholic kaba don ha Tura, West Garo Hills.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum na ki Pulit, la ïathuh ba ki runar ki la jynrat haduh 19 tylli ki diengphna ba shna da ki nar na ki lum jingtep bad pynjulor haduh 15 tylli.Ki Pulit ki ïathuh ba kane ka la jia ha u Lum Jingtep ka Cathedral Parish kaba don ha R.C Road, Tura marjan ka ïng Bishop.Ki Pulit ki ïathuh ba ki runar ki la ieh noh ia kiwei pat ki diengphna ba la shna da ki dieng lyntang. Halor kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la ïohpdiang ïa ka ejahar bad ka jingtohkit mynta ka la ïaid shakhmat.Ha ka jingtohkit ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup 8 tylli ki diengphna nar na ka jaka buh tiar jot ha Chandmari, Tura.Ki briew kiba trei ha kane ka jaka ki la pyntip ba arngut ki samla shynrang ki la wan da ka kali Auto Rickshaw bad ki la weng ïa kine ki diengphna barim ban bujli da kiba thymmai.
title: JYNRAT KI RUNAR ÏA KI DIENGPHNA HA LUM JINGTEP KA BALANG KATHOLIK HA TURA

content: U Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la kdew ba ka long kaba donkam ban khanglad bad ban pynsangeh ha ki Entry Point ïa ka jingwanrung jong u drok bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdih pynbuaid sha ka Jylla Meghalaya.“Nga la pynsngew ïa kane ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba peit ïa ka tnat Kam Pohing ba ngi donkam ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ki bor pahara ha ki Entry Point. 70% na ki jingdih pynbuaid kiba rung sha Meghalaya u wan lyngba ka East Jaiñtia Hills District  bad dei ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingpeitngor ha kane ka district,” ong u Bah Paul ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Baar.“Hynrei kata kan urlong ynda la pyndep ïa ka jingthungkam ha ka tnat Pulit kumba 3000 ngut kin sa rung kam ha ka tnat Pulit bad 500 ngut ki Volunteer ha ka tnat Home Guard.  Dei tang kane ka lad kaba ngi lah ban khanglad ïa ka jingwan rung jong u drok,” u la ong.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka Meghalaya ka dei kaba duna tam ha ka jingdon jong ki bor Pulit ha ka ri baroh kawei.Haba pynpaw ba ka Sorkar ka ladep pynbna thma ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa u drok, u Bah Paul u la ong, ha ka jingshisha ki don bun ki jingïohkem, bun tylli ki case ba la sei madan bad bun ki nongpynkheiñ aiñ ki la shah pyngngat kyndon kaba pyni ba ka Sorkar ka la leh shisha ïa ka kamram bad nalor kata bun tylli ki lad ki lynti kiba ka Sorkar ruh ka ladep pynbna“Dang shen, bun kiei kiei kiba la jia ki dei kiba buhrieh, hynrei la lah ban sei madan da ka jingtreikam jong ki Puit bad da ka jingïohkem ïa ki nongpynkheiñ aiñ ba la pynngat hapoh ka PITNDPS Act, 1988, ha kaba ki case mynta ki dang don ha ka lynti ban shim rai bad ban phah ruh sha ka Advisory Board, ka ban sa shong shen tang shu weng ïa ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC).  Kane ka pynshisha ba la lah ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki nongpynkheiñ aiñ lada ki dei ki briew kiba donkti ban shalan lane lane lada dei ïa ki briew kiba ju dih ïa ki jingdih pynbuaid,” u la ong.“Ka thup kyrteng ba la mynjur bad ba la phah sha ka Advisory Board phin sa ïoh ïa ki briew ki ban sa shah pynngat ha ki kyndon aiñ namar ka jingkhaii beaiñ ïa ki jingdih pynbuaid bad kane kan ïarap shikatdei eh ïa ngi ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingisaitmet jong u drok,” u la bynrap.Haba u Bah Paul u la ong, “lada phi kynmaw ïa ka PITNDPS la wanrah ha u snem ba ladep.  Ki Case ïa ki nongpynkheiñ aiñ bunsien ladep pynngat bad kine ki briew ngin pynthikna ba kin ngat ha ki kyndon jong kane aiñ.U la ïathuh shuh shuh ba ka tnat ka la tyrwa ruh ban thung ïa u Mission Director ba thymmai jong ka DREAM project namarba u Director ba mynta u bunkam palat ha ka tnat Kam Pohing.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba ka tnat Social Welfare marwei kam lah satia ban treikam bad ban pynduna ïa ka jingjyllei ki nongdih drok hynrei kane ka donkam ïa ka jingïatreilang na ka tnat Pulit, ïa ki kynhun treikam ka Sorkar bad ïa ka imlang ka sahlang khamtam eh na ki nongïalam Niam bad na ki Dorbar Shnong.“Ka jingeh mynta ka long ba ngim pat ïoh jaka ban buh ïa ki Centre, bad ka jingpynssngewthuh paidbah ka dang ïaid shakhmat,” u la bynrap.Haba kylli, hato ka shonghok neem ïa ki kynhun seng ban bat ïa ki nongdih drok, u Myntri u laong, donkam ban ïoh ïa ka jingïatreilang na ka imlang ka sahlang bad ïa ki dorbar shnong la kyrpad ba kin trei la ka jong ka kam da kaba buh ïa ki Deaddiction bad ki Rehabilitation Centre ha ki shnong ki thaw.“Ngi la khot ïa ka jingïatreilang jong ki shnong ki thaw. Ngi ladep pynbna thma pyrshah ïa u drok bad ngi kyrpad ïa ki dorbar shnong ban ai jaka na ka bynta ban buh ïa ki Deaddiction bad ki Rehabilitation Centre namarba ka Centre kaba mynta la shna ha Mawlai,”la ong u Bah Paul.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingduna pisa, u Bah Paul u la ong, “kane ka dei na ka daw ba la pynbna ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha bad ka jingbym don ka Sorkar ba pura ha Delhi. Tang shu wan ka Sorkar thymmai kaba shimti ha Delhi, ngin sa ïakren bad ka Union Home Ministry.”
title: 70% U DROK UBA RUNG SHA MEGHALAYA U WAN LYNGBA KA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS : PAUL LYNGDOH

content: Haduh 18,422 hajar ngut ki samla pule ki la rejistar kyrteng ialade na ka bynta ban iakhun ia ka eksamin Common University Entrance Test (CUET) ha ki 26 tylli ki Center kiba don ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya hadien ar snem ba la pyllait ia ki na kane ka eksamin.Kine ki 18,422 ngut ki samla kiba la regjister kyrteng ialade ban iakhun ia kane ka eksamin ki long 8,535 kiba iakhun ha Shillong, 4,269 ngut kiba iakhun ha Jowai bad 5,618 ha Tura. Ia ka online exam la buh sngi ban pynlong ha ka 21 tarik, 22 tarik bad 24 tarik Jymmang, 2024 katba ia ka offline exam la buh sngi ban pynlong naduh 15 tarik haduh 18 tarik, Jymmang, 2024.Ki jaka thoh eksamin ki don 12 tylli ha Shillong, katba ka Jowai ka don 5 tylli bad ka Tura ka don 9 tylli.Ia kane ka eksamin la pynlong da ka National Testing Agency (NTA) da ka jingiatreilang bad ka Sorkar Jylla na ka bynta ban pynbeit ia ki jaka thoh eksamin.  La khmihlynti ba ka jingpynbna ia ka result jong ka CUET 2024, kata, lyngba ka Online bad Offline Mode kan long ha ka 30 tarik Jylliew, 2024.
title: PALAT 18 HAJAR NGUT KI SAMLA KIBA ÏAKHUN EKSAMIN CUET HA MEGHALAYA

content: Ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Mynriang, kaba hap hapoh ka Mawryngkneng C&RD Block, East Khasi Hills District kaba don markhap ka Ri Bhoi District bad ka West Jaiñtia Hills District ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew diaw halor ka jingduhnoh ka jingkieng doi doi ha Wah Umtung kaba dei ruh kawei na ki jingkieng kaba la rim bha.Kane ka jingkieng doidoi ha Wah Umtung ka dei kaba pynïasoh ïa ka lynti ïaid sha Ri Bhoi District kum sha ka shnong Thadrang, Khyndewso, Mawlansnai bad Bhoirymbong bad kane ka jingkieng ka dei kaba ki paidbah nong shong shnong ki ju pyndonkam khamtam ha kaba leit iew leit hat kum sha iew Mawlasnai bad ban leit rep leit riang namarba bun kiba don ki jaka rep kum ki pynthor kba bad kiwei kiwei ki jaka rep.Ka jingduh noh ïa kane ka jingkieng ïaid kjat ka la buh jingeh bha ïa ki paitbah kiba ju pyndonkam ïa kane ka jingkieng bad nalor kata ka buh jingma ruh ban ïaid lyngba khamtam ha ka por lyiur ha kaba ki nongïaid lynti ki hap ban shu snoh ha ki sainar.Ka jingpyndonkam ïa kane ka jingkieng ka long ba ki paidbah ka shnong Mynriang kim don lynti ïaid da kawei pat watla ka don ka surok napoh ka wah Umtung kaba la pyntrei da ka skhim Mahatmat Gandhi National Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGS) hynrei ïa kane ka surok ki paidbah ki ïohlad ban pyndonkam tang ha ka por tlang barit ka um.“Ïa mynta leilei kane ka jingkieng kam long shuh ban ïaid namarba la la duh lut satang ki nar ba sah khongreng,” ong u Secretary Shnong jong ka shnong Mynriang u Bah JJ Lyngkhoi da kaba kyntu ïa ki bor Sorkar ba kin ïarap lem ban maramot noh ïa kane ka jingkieng khnang ba kan pynsuk ïa ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan.“Kum ka shnong baroh shikatta ngi la sumar bha ïa kane ka jingkieng, ngi la maramot ruh manla ka por hynrei namarba ka jingjulor ka la long shaba palat kumta kum ka shnong ngim ïohlad shuh ban sumar. Kum ka shnong ngi ka buh bun tylli ki jingthoh ha ka Sorkar bad ha ki bor ba dei peit ba kin thaw ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynïoh skhim na ka bynta ban maramot ïa kane ka jingkieng hynrei haduh mynta ngim pat ïoh jubab eiei,”la ong u Bah Lyngkhoi.“Ngi la buh jingthoh ruh sha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ba kan ïarap ban wadlad ban pynrung ïa ka skhim khnang ban pynbha ïa kane ka jing kieng. Ka jingïarap ba khaduh ba ngi la ïoh ban maramot ïa kane ka jingkieng ka dei ha u snem 2021-2014 lyngba u MLA barim ka Mawryngkneng Constituency u Bah David A Nongrum ha ka jinglut kaba kot T.50.000 hajar lait nangta ngim ïoh shuh ïa kino kino ki jingïarap,” la ïathuh u Secretary ka shnong Mynriang.Katkum ki dak ki shin, kane ka jingkieng mynta ka shu sah sa tang ka shynrong.“Kum ki nongshong shnong ka shnong Mynriang ngi kwah ba kane ka jingkieng kan ieng biang sa shisien hynrei ngim kotbor shuh namarba ka jinglut kam dei shu long tang ba malu mala,”  ong u Bah Lyngkhoi bad bynrap, “ngi kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar ba kan thawlad ban ïarap lem ïa ka shnong Mynriang bad ngi kyntu ïa ki nongmihkhmat ba kin peit lem ïa ngi ba ngin lah ban maramot ïa kane ka jingkieng namarba ngi kwah ban pynneh pynsah ïa kane ka jingkieng ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki matti jong ki menbarim bad ym ban shu sah sa tang ha ki jingïathuh khana.”
title: JOT KA JINGKIENG DOIDOI WAH UMTUNG, HAP SHU SDIEN KIBA ÏAID LYNTI NA U SAINAR

content: : Capricci Cinema, in collaboration with Anna Films Shillong, is thrilled to announce the unprecedented release of the critically acclaimed Garo film Rapture, directed by the visionary Dominic Megam Sangma, across more than 100 theatres in France.This landmark event marks the first time a film from Meghalaya, India, has achieved such widespread distribution in French cinemas, highlighting a significant milestone in the global recognition of Garo cinema. Produced by Anna Films Shillong, Rapture has captivated audiences worldwide with its poignant storytelling and striking cinematography, delving into the deep cultural and spiritual realms of the Garo community.Dominic Megam Sangma’s direction brings a unique and authentic voice to the forefront of world cinema, and this extensive release in France is a testament to the universal appeal and artistic excellence of his work.Capricci Cinema is also proud to announce that Rapture has received a prestigious label from the GNCR (Groupement National des Cinémas de Recherche), a collective of arthouse exhibitors.This recognition will enable us to obtain greater distribution and visibility for the film, ensuring it reaches an even wider audience. Following the initial phase, a further 64 cinemas will be showing the film over the next few weeks and we hope to add many more.
title: CAPRICCI CINEMA ANNOUNCES THE HISTORIC FRENCH RELEASE OF GARO FILM “RAPTURE”

content: Ka Kashari Session Judge, West Jaintia Hills District, ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai ka la pynioh ia ka hok jong u Bah Lang Pale uba la shah pyniap ha ka 17 tarik, Rymphang, 2008 ha u Herman Shylla.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police jong ka West Jaintia Hills la pyntip ba ki Pulit ki la register case ia kane ka jingjia ha Jowai Police Station hapoh ka Section 302/34 IPC bad ia ka jingtohkit la bynshet ha u Sub Inspector M. Myrboh ha kaba u la pynngat kyndon ia u Herman Shylla hapoh ka Section 304 Indian Penal Code (IPC).Ka Kashari ka la rai pynrem ia u nongleh kam bymman da kaba set along haduh 10 snem bad sa 2 bnai ban bteng ia ka jingshah set along.Nalor kata, ka kashari ka la hukum ban siew bailutksan 3 lak tyngka sha ki bahaing hasem jong u lanot, Bah Lang Pale.
title: 10 SNEM RAI SET ALONG KA KASHARI ÏA U HERMAN SHYLLA BA PYNÏAP ÏA U LANG PALE

content: Ka Ophis u Syiem ka Hima Sohra ka la rai ban khang khyrdep noh ïa ka surok kaba pynïasoh na ka shnong Umdud shaduh Zero Point hadien ba u District Magistrate jong ka East Khasi Hills District u SC Sadhu ha ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai u la pynjari da ka hukum ban phah khang khyrdep ïa ka khyrdop khrong bai musur jong ka Hima Sohra.Ha ka dorkhas ba ka ophis u Syiem ka Hima Sohra ka la phah sha u Superintendent ka Majai Land Custom Station, East Khasi Hills ka la pynpaw ba ka jingkhrong bai musur kaba T.200 shi kali na ka bynta ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka surok na Umdud sha Zero Point da ka Hima Sohra bad ka Dorbar ka dei kaba la aibor da ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court lyngba ka hukum bashipor ha ka 13 tarik Ïaiong, 2022 kaba la bthah ruh ba dei ban pynbha ïa ka surok.“Wat ka Division Bench jong u Chief Justice Sanjib Bannerjee bad u Justice W. Diengdoh ha ka hukum ba la pynmih ha ka 2 tarik, Jylliew, 2022 ka la ïaiban ïa ki jingshisha ba ka Hima Sohrra ka la ïoh ïa ka bor ban lum ïa ka bai musur, namarkata la kyrshan da ka hukum jong ka Single Bench kaba la pynmih ha ka 13 tarik, Ïaiong, 2022 bad kam shym la tuklar satia bad ka hukum ba shipor,” ong u Syiem ka Hima Sohra ha ka dorkhas.“Hynrei ka hukum ba la pynmih da u District Magistrate ban mana ïa ka Hima Sohra ban khrong ïa ka bai musur kumba la aibor da ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court, kata, da ka Single bad ka Division Bench ka long ka jingkheiñ dewthala ban pynpohdor ïa ka hukum jong ka Ingbishar bad namarkata ka rai jong ka Hima Sohra bad ka Dorbar ka long ban shu khang noh mardor ïa ka surok ïoh ka long kum ka jingpynkheiñ aiñ,” la ong shuh shuh u Syiem ka Hima Sohra.U Syiem u la ïathuh ba ka jingpynmih hukum ban khang noh ïa ka surok ka la long ruh hapdeng ka jingïakajia ha ka shnong Majai kaba ka Hima Sohra ka la pyrshang ban sngew bad sngap ïa ki jingeh kham kloi katba lah khnang ban poi sha ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut.“Namarkata, ban kiar na kino kino ki jingpynthud ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka shnong Majai la donkam ban khang noh ïa ka surok khnang ba kan pynjem ïa ka jingïakynad kaba mih na baroh ki liang,” ong shuh shuh u Syiem.U Syiem u la ïathuh ruh ba ka Hima kan sa pan jubab na u Kontraktor ba la bynshet ban maramot ïa ka surok katkum ka jingmynjur, katba balei pat la ïoh ujor ba kam shym la don satia ka jingmaramot ïa ka surok katkum ka ujor ba la ïoh na ki nongshong shnong ka Majai.“Ka rai ban khang khyrdep ïa ka surok kan ïai bteng tad haduh ba ka Writ Petition jong ka WPC No. 144 jong u snem 2022 kaba dang sahteng ha Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court kan da pynbeit ïa kane ka kam ha kaba ïadei bad ka jinglong jingman jong ka surok bad la ka jingkhrong bai musur ba la ai jingbit kan long na baroh ka khyrdop rung bad khyrdop mih lane da kumwei pat.  Tad haduh ban da pynbeit da kumwei pat da ka Ingbishar Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court u Syiem ka Hima Sohra bad ka Dorbar kin un ym tuklar eiei,” la ïathuh shuh shuh u Syiem.Kino kino ki briew kiba don jingwit halor kane ka hukum ba la pynmih ban khang khyrdep ïa ka surok da ka Hima Sohra bad ka dorbar ki lah ban leit ujor sha ka Ingbishar lane sha ki bor ba dei peit, la bynrap shuh shuh u Syiem.
title: SHIM RAI KA OPHIS U SYIEM SOHRA BAN KHANG ÏA KA SUROK UMDUD SHA ZERO POINT

content: Ka kynroh jong ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ ba thymmai ka Jylla ha ka shnong Mawdiangdiang, New Shillong Township ka la twa ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Kane ka la jia tang hadien ar snem ba u tnum pyllun (Dome) jong kane ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ bathymmai u la khyllem ha ka 22 tarik, Jymmang, 2022.U nonglum khubor uba la leit jurip u la lap ba kane ka kynroh ba la twa ka la hap sha ka surok jong ka jaka ki riewshimet.La lap ruh ba ki nongtrei ki la kyndang da ka puhshilum ia ki jingker bad ki paia jong ka kynroh ba la twa kumba shiphew phut tam ne duna eiei shwa ban tei noh da ka kynroh kaba thymmai.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma uba la ioh jingtip ha ka sngi Thohdieng halor kane ka jingjia na u Lamphang jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla u Thomas Sangma marmar ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la leit jurip ia ka kynroh ba la twa ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki ophisar ka tnat PWD.U Conrad u la iathuh ba ka jingtwa jong ka kynroh ba la shna da ka Assembly Secretariat kam don jingiadei eiei bad ka jingshna ia ka Building jong ka Ingdorbar Thawain da ka tnat PWD.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Myntri Rangbah ba ki Ophisar ka tnat PWD ki dang pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap ia ka daw tynrai halor ka jingtwa jong kane ka kynroh.U la pyntip ruh ba ka kynroh ba la ker ia u pud u sam jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka dei kaba ladep shna naduh ar snem mynshwa bad bynrap shuh shuh ba ka jingtwa ka kynroh ka dei na ka daw ka jingtwa ka khyndew bad pynshai ruh ba ka jingtwa jong ka kynroh kam don jingktah eiei ruh em ia ka jingshna ba dang iaid shakhmat ia ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla.
title: TWA KA KYNROH ASSEMBLY HA MAWDIANGDIANG HADIEN AR SNEM BA TWA U DOME

content: Ki riewngeit ka Balang Presbyterian Umdihar, Ribhoi District ki la iam pangnud hadien ba ka Ingmane ka la shah prong ha ki runar ki bym lah ban ithuh durkhmat ha ka miet sngi Thohdieng bad kiba la pynjot ïa ki tiar ki tar jong ka ïingmane.Ki longkmie jong ka Jingïaseng Kynthei bad ka Christian Endeavor Society, ki nongkitkam jong ka Committee ka Balang Presbyterian Umdihar ki la iam kthang halor kane ka jingjia namraba ki tiar ki dei kiba la thied bad noh synñiang da ki longïing baduk sha ka iingmane bad sha ka miej jingkhawai u Trai.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ïoh lum, la ïathuh ba ki runar ki la kyndang jubor ïa ka jingkhangïit da ki nar bad ynda ki la iohrung shapoh ki la leh dusmon ïa ki tiar kyntang jong ka ïingmane bad rong ruh ïa ka pisa Jingkynshew ba la noh da ki paidriewngeit jong ka Balang, ki khiew syntiew bad katto katne ki tiar ba pyndonkam na ka bynta ka jingïaseng kyrpang.Kane ka jingshah prong tuh ha kane ka ïingmane kam dei shuh ka sien banyngkong hynrei ka dei ka jingshah prongtuh kaba la jia kumba 3 ne 4 sien.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Tymmen Basan R.B Shadap u la ïathuh ba ki la don ki briew kiba la telephone ïa u mynta ka step sngi Saitjaiñ ha kaba ki la ïathuh ba la don kiba kyndang ïa ka ïingmane bad ïa ki tiar ki tar la pharia lut sha madan.“Ngi tang shu ioh jingtip, kumta hi marmar na ka liang ki nongïalam bad ki nongsharai Balang ngi la leit sha ïingmane ban peit ïa ka jinglong jingman bad ka jingleh dusmon ki runar,” ong u Bah Shadap.U la pyntip ruh ba kane kam dei ka sien ba nyngkong, hynrei ka la ju jia na ka por sha ka por ha ki snem ba la leit noh.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Bah Shadap, ha ki por ba la leit noh, ka la don ka jingshah tuh ki tiar ba rit ba ria ha kaba kum ki nongsharai Balang ki la shu sngap bad ki la iohkem ruh ïa ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam hynrei ha kane ka kynti ba mynta kum ki nongïalam bad ki nongsharai Balang kim lah shuh ban shu sngap namarba kane ka jingjia ka la kham pher ka rukom kyndang bad rung jubor da kaba pyndonkam da ki nar bad pynpra lur ïa ki tiar ki tar bad rong ruh ïa ka synduk jong ka Bible Society ba ju lum ki jingïaseng Kynthei, ki jingïaseng Khynnahrit manla ka sngi u Blei.“Nalor kata, ki la pynpait pynpra bad tuh ruh ïa ka pisa bad wat ki duli ba la khang tala ki la kyndang jubor da ki kynja nar bad bret ruh baroh ïa ki jinglum jingkynshew sha madan,” u la ong.Kaba sngew lyngngoh ka long ba wat ïaki khiew syntiew baroh bad ki tiar ki tiar ba ju pyndonkam ha kaba shakri Blei ki la shim bad rong lut bad wat ki khuri dih waiñ ba ju dih ki Pastor haba ai sakramen ki runar ki la ronglut baroh.Ka Balang Presbyterian Umdihar ka la pynrem jur bad dap da ka jingsngewkhia halor kane ka jingjia bad mynta ka Balang ka la shaniah ha ka Dorbar Shnong ban leh ïa kaba donkam ban ujor sha ki bor jong ka aiñ halor kane ka jingjia bad ban pynlong ka jingtohkit bad ban thwet ïa ki runar ba donkti ha kane ka kam.
title: PRONG KI NONGTUH HA ÏINGMANE PRESBYTERIAN UMDIHAR, TUH ÏA KA JINGKYNSHEW BAD KI TIAR ÏINGMANE

content: : Ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynmih da ka notis ba la phah sha ka Sorkar Jylla bad sha kiwei kiwei ki bor ba dei peit ban ai jubab halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki don ki jingbym ryntih ha ka rta thungkam ha ka tnat Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya.Halor kane, ka kynhun ki samla wadkam ba la lamkhmat da ka samla Barilang Pyngrope ki la leit ujor da ka Writ Petition sha ka Iingbishar.Ka Iingbishar ha ka sngi Thohdieng, kaba la pdiang ia ka jingpynsngew jong u L. Ngahaka u nongsaidaiñ jong ki nongujor, ka la pynmih ia ka notis.U Muktiar jong ka Sorkar u Bah ZE Nongkynrih ka la pdiang ia ka notis ha ka kyrteng jong baroh ki nongshah ujor.Ka Iingbishar ka la buh sngi ha ka 23 tarik myntau bnai ban shong bishar ia kane ka kam.
title: PAN JUBAB KA ÏINGBISHAR NA KA SORKAR HALOR KA RTA THUNGKAM PULIT

content: Ka Kur Malngiang ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynkup burom ia ka samla Eulalia Autruina Malngiang kaba la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba ar ha ka rynsan iakob thei bhabriew kaba la tip kum ka Miss Global International Ambassador kaba la long ha ka ri Nepal ha ka 1 tarik u Iaiong, 2024.Ia kane ka rynsan iakob ba la iashim bynta da ki thei bhabriew kiba la wan mihkhmat na ka ri Phillipines, Sri Lanka, Malaysia, Nepal bad kiwei kiwei ki ri la pynlong da ka Global Model India.La phiah ia ki nongiashim bynta ha kane ka rynsan iakob kaba san sngi lynter ha la ki jong ki kyrdan ba kynthup ia ki khynnah rit, ki samla lud, ka kyrdan Miss bad Mrs.Ha ka jingpynkup burom ia ka Eulalia Autruina Malngiang la sakhi lang da u nongialam jong ka seng Congress u Bah Emmanuel Badwar uba la long kum u Kongsan, u Bah Janai Nongkynrih uba la long kum u Symbud Kongsan bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.Ka Samla Eulalia haba kren ha kane ka sngi pynkup burom ka la ong, “ka jingiaid lynti kam long kaba suk, hynrei lada phi ngeit halade bad phi trei shitom phin sa lah ban ioh kheit ia u soh jong ka jingjop.Ka la iathuh ba ka la sdang ia ka jingiaid lynti sha ki rynsan iakob thei bhabriew ha ka por ba ka la pyndep ia ka SSLC.“Dei i mei jong nga, iba la ai mynsiem ba ngan iakhun ia ka Miss Cherry Blossom. Ki don ki synran iakob kiba la nga jop ki don kiba ngam shym la jop bad dei lyngba kine ki jingshah rem kiba la pynlong ia nga ba ngan trei shitom shuh shuh,” la ong kane ka samla.Ka la iathuh ruh ba kam shym la poi pyrkhat ban ioh phong ia ka pansngiat Miss Global International Ambassador ha ka kyrdan baar ban pynliem ia kiwei kiwei ki thei samla na kiwei pat ki ri kiba iashim bynta ha kane ka rynsan iakob.“Haba phi don ka jingshaniah halade, ngeit bad pynurlong ia ka jingphohsniew bad phin sa ioh ia ka jingjop,” ka la bynrap.
title: WAN BAAR KA EULALIA AUTRUINA MALNGIANG HA KA MISS GLOBAL INTERNATIONAL AMBASSADOR

content: Ka Thiar Lyngwiar Dpei Society (TLDS) ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Khasi Department jong ka St. Anthonys College, Shillong ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynkup burom ia ka Kong Silbi Passah kaba la ioh pdiang ia ka khusnam Padma Shri dang shen na ka kti jong ka President ka ri India ka Droupadi Murmu ha New Delhi.Ha kane ka jingialang la pyllait paidbah ruh ia ka kot kaba la thoh da u Dr. Rev. Fr. Ioannis Warpakma ba la ai kyrteng ‘Paradigms of conflicts in the work of H.W Sten,’ da ka Prof. Streamlet Dkhar kaba la long kum ka Kongsan ha kane ka sngi ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.Ka Thiar Lyngwiar Dpei Society ka la pynlong ruh ia ka jingkynmaw burom ia ki arngut ki nongthoh bakhraw jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi, kata, ia u Pahep Rabon Sing Kharsuka, ia kaba la ai jingkren da u Dr. Sylvanus Lamare bad halor ka jingim jong u Pahep Radhon Sing Berry ba la ai jingkren da ka Prof. Bakhiamon Rynjah.Ka Prof. Streamlet haba ai jingiaroh ia ka Kong Silbi Passah, ka la ong, “i Kong Silbi i la ioh bun tylli ki khusnam ha ki snem ba mynshwa bad i long ka briew kaba sngewrit ban pynrit ialade. I long ka briew kaba trei shitom bad kaba kloi ban iarap ha kano kano ka por ba donkam.”Haba kynthoh khyndiat halor ka jingpyllait ia ka kot jong u Dr. Rev. Fr. Warpakma ka Prof. Streamlet ka la ong, “kum u Scholar nalor ka kam kum u Principal i la aipor ban wad bniah. Ka long ka burom ia nga kum ka nonghikai jong i, namarba ka jingtrei shitom jong i, i da pyni ba ym dei ban da ioh Degree hynrei ka dei ka jingieid ia ka Litereshor ha ka ktien Khasi. Watla i pas na ka English Department hynrei i la wan sha ka Khasi Department. Ngi da sngew burom ia phi Phadar ba na kane ka jingwad bniah ka jong phi, kan da ai jingmyntoi shibun eh kiba pule ia ka Khasi Literashor.”“Ka dei kaba nyngkong eh napdeng ki jingwad bniah ba la ioh ia ka Degree ban pynshongnia bad pynshong nongrim ia ka sengnia ka jong i halor ka Psycho-Analysis,” la ai jingkynthoh ka Prof. Streamlet.Ka la pynkynmaw ruh ba dei u Prof. HW Sten uba la sdang nyngkong eh ia ka Khasi Department ha NEHU bad kane ka shnat treikam dei da ka jingtrei jong u bad kiwei pat ki Professor. “Nga la long ka samla pule banyngkong eh jong ka Khasi Department bad nga la ioh shibun ki symboh  jingstad na u Prof. Sten. Ka jingaiti lut jong i, ha ka kam hikai, ban kyntiew ia ka Department bad khammtam eh ban wanrah ia ka Literary Criticism,” la bynrap ka Prof. Streamlet.Ka la iathuh ba ki lai tylli ki kot jong u Prof. HW Sten kiba u Dr. Rev. Fr. Warpakma u la wad bniah ki long, ‘ka samla na nongkyndong,’ ‘ka mahadei’ bad ka “kwah bymjukut.
title: PYNKUP BUROM KA TLDS ÏA KA KONG SILBI PASSAH, PYLLAIT PAIDBAH KA KOT U FR. IOANNIS WARPAKMA

content: The Meghalaya Football Association has completed screening in the zones that will host the group stage of the inaugural Meghalaya State Youth League.The tournament, a long-held dream for the association, will be held in two age categories, for U-14 boys and U-16 boys. The zonal stage will be held in West Garo Hills, West Jaintia Hills, West Khasi Hills and East Khasi Hills on a home and away format, with quarterfinals, semifinals and a grand final to bring the tournament to a fitting conclusion.Uniquely for the MFA, this statewide tournament will not be held between clubs but between affiliated district associations, 20 of which are to take part in the inaugural edition. The idea behind this is to use this tournament as a platform to select the youth teams that go on to represent Meghalaya at the national level.It will also present the young footballers with a stepping stone to club-level senior football and give Meghalaya one of the strongest football structures in the country.The age screening was conducted by the MFA in Garo Hills on 14 May and in the other three zones on Saturday. The association is hopeful of a launch date in June with matchdays scheduled largely on Saturdays so as not to interfere with the players’ studies.
title: UNIQUE MFA U-14 & U-16 FOOTBALL TOURNAMENTS TO LIKELY BEGIN NEXT MONTH

content: MEGHALAYA HOSTS IKCA SELECTION TRIALS FOR THE CANOE SLALOM WORLD CUP, 2024:  Meghalaya proudly hosted the Indian Kayaking Canoeing Association (IKCA) selection trials at Whitewater Village in Shillong on May 18 and 19. These trials were essential in forming the Indian team for the 2024 ICF Canoe Slalom World Cup and Kayak Cross events, crucial qualifiers for the Paris 2024 Olympic Games.Over 25 athletes from across India, including strong contingents from Madhya Pradesh, Karnataka, and Meghalaya, competed fiercely. The event underscored Meghalaya’s growing prominence in the sport of canoe slalom, as it provided an ideal setting for this high-stakes competition.In the K1 women’s category, Elizabeth Vincent from Meghalaya secured 3rd place. In the Kayak Cross, Elizabeth Vincent from Meghalaya achieved 1st place.In the K1 men’s category, Batskhem Nongbak finished in 6th position, Pynshngaiñ Kurbha finished in 8th position, Manbhalang Kharkrang finished in 9th position.In the C1 men’s category, Indra Sharma from Meghalaya finished in 6th position.These athletes will now represent India on the global stage, aiming to qualify for the canoe slalom events at the Paris 2024 Olympics.Hosting the 2024 ICF Canoe Slalom World Championships trials is a significant milestone for Meghalaya, showcasing its capability to host world-class sporting events and its dedication to promoting water sports. The selected Indian team will now compete against the world’s best, gaining invaluable experience and honing their skills for the international arena.This event highlights Meghalaya’s importance in India’s sporting landscape and marks a crucial step for the nation’s athletes as they strive for Olympic success.
title: WINNERS TO REPRESENT INDIA IN THE WORLD CUP, A CRUCIAL QUALIFIER FOR PARIS OLYMPICS, 2024

content: Ki runar ki bym lah ban ithuh durkhmat ha ka miet shiteng synñia ka sngi u Blei ki la prong jubor hapoh ka jaka kynshew pisa jong ka State Bank of India, kaba don ha Umïam, ICAR, Ribhoi District.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ïohlum, la ïathuh ba kane ka la jia hadien ba ki runar ki la shim kabu ïa ka jingdum jong ka miet bad ki la prong jubor hapoh kane ka Bank da kaba pynkdiah ïa ki nar jingkhang iit na ka jingkhang ba shadien jong ka Bank da ka jingthmu ban lute ïa ka pisa kaba don hapoh kane ka Bank.Hynrei ha ka jingpyrshang ki nonglute kim shym la lah satia ban pynpait ïa ka duli (drawer) ba la thep ïa ka pisa.La ïathuh ba la lap ïa kane ka jingjia ha ka step Lah Sngi u Blei ha ka por ba ki nongtrei jong ka SBI, Umïam Branch ki la poi sha ophis.  Tang shu lap ïa kane ka jingjia, mar mar ki la pyntip noh sha ki Pulit jong ka Umïam Police Station na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit.Tang hapoh khyndiat por la wan poi sa ki Pulit ka Crime Branch ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor kane ka jingjia.
title: PRONG KI RUNAR HA SBI, UMÏAM BRANCH, KHLEM LAH PYNPAIT ÏA KA DULI BUH PISA

content: Ka Mawlai Town Dorbar (MTD) kaba la iakhun thma pyrshah ia ka jingrung jong u drok shapoh ki shnong bapher bapher kiba hap hapoh ka jylli jong ka shnong Mawlai, mynta ka kynti ka la lah ban pynkylla thymmai biang ia ka jingim jong ki 30 ngut ki samla kiba la im kyrni ha ka jingdih drok ha ki snem ba la leit noh da kaba ai ia ka jingiasyllok manla ka sngi mynta la jan 6 bnai tam eiei ha ka training centre jong ka North Eastern Security Academy (NESA) kaba don hakhmat ka surok VIP Road ha ka shnong Mawkynroh-Umshing, Shillong.Khnang ban pyntyllun ia kane ka kam, ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la lamkhmat da ka National Poeples Party (NPP) ka la ai jingiarap T. 6 lak ha ka sien kaba nyngkong kum ka jingiarap kaba nyngkong bad ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka Sorkar Jylla ka la theh jingiarap sa T. 15 lak ha ka sien kaba ar sha ka Mawlai Town Dorbar kaba la kot mynta sha ka T. 21 lak.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare ka Sorkar Jylla Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka Mawlai Town Dorbar (MTD) kan dei ka kynhun kaba nyngkong eh ha ka jylla ban ioh ia ka jingkyrshan pisa na ka Sorkar na ka bynta ban pynbha biang ia ka jingim jong ki samla kiba la ngop bad kiba la im kyrni ha u drok.U la iathuh ba ka jingai jingkyrshan pisa ia ka MTD ka long ban ai bai, ban pynbiang ia ka jaka sah bad kiwei kiwei de ki jingdonkam.“Da da ka jingpyllait pisa mynta ngin nang pynjur shuh shuh ia ka jingpyrsahng ban weng bad ban rat dyngkhong ia ki jingsniew jong u drok na kane ka jylla jong ngi,” la ong u Bah Paul.Haba kylli, u Myntri u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la thmu ban shna ia ka Rehabilitation Centre ha ka jaka ba don ka Tribal Research Institute (TRI) ha Mawlai Nongkwar ia kaba yn sa pyntreikam pura ynda la pynkynriah ia ka ktem sah jong ki Pulit CRPF sha ka shnong Mawdiangdiang kaba la iaid mynta shakhmat.“Ka jaka ka la heh (ha Tribal Research Institute) bad ym tang ia ka Mawlai hynrei (ka Rehabilitation Centre) kan jan bha ruh ia ka Jaiaw, Mawprem na ka bynta ban sumar ia ki briew kiba kwah ban lait noh na ki jingshah teh kynjri ha u drok,” la iathuh u Bah Paul.U la pyntip ruh ba haduh mynta dei tang ka Mawlai Town Dorbar kaba la ioh ia ka jingiarap pisa na ka Sorkar ban pynbha biang ia ka jingim jong ki briew kiba la ngop ha drok bad ha kajuh ka por u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar ka la iatreilang bad kumba 10 tylli ki kynhun ban iakhun pyrshah ia u drok lyngba ka prokram Drud Reduction Elimination and Action Mission (DREAM).
title: 21 LAK ÏARAP KA SORKAR ÏA KA MTD BAN PYNBHA ÏA KA JINGIM KIBA LA KYRNI HA U DROK

content: Ka Director General of Police ba thymmai jong ka jylla ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang kam shym la kyntait satia halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki don ki Pulit kiba khrong pisa na ki trok ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka jylla.Ha  ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka Kong Nongrang kaba la shimti ia ka shuki DGP ha kane ka sngi, ka la ong ruh ba ka jingleh tang jong uwei ne ar ngut ka la pynjah burom ia ka tnat Pulit, hynrei ia ka jylla hi baroh kawei.Halor kane ka DGP ka la ong ba kan sa shim ia ka sienjam kaba tyngeh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingkhrong pisa jong ki Pulit na ki kali.Kum shi bynta ban wanrah ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ hapoh ka jylla baroh kawei  bad ba ki samla kin ym shah ialam bakla da kaba pyniasoh sha ki seng kieng atiar, ka Kong Nongrang ka la pynpaw ba ki Pulit ki donkam ia ka jingiatrei lang jong ka imlang ka sahlang.Ka jingdon jong ki Pulit kam dei ban pynthut lane ban pynwit ia ki paidbah hynrei ka long ban ai ka jingshakri ia ki paidbah.Ka Kong Nongrang ka la ong ruh ba shisien ha ka shitaiew kan don ka Open House ne ka jingialang bad ki paidbah kiba kwah ban kynduh ia ka, kata, lehse ha ka sngi Palei naduh ka por 11:00 baje mynstep haduh ka por 2:00 baje noh sngi tangba ki dei ban da ai jingpyntip shwa ia ka sngi.Ka la ong ruh ba kum ka Ophisar ba hakhlieh duh jong ka tnat Pulit kan sa shimkhia ban peit ia ka jingkiew ka jingshah thombor jong ki kynthei bad ki khynnah bad khamtam ruh ka jingshngaiñ jong ki kynthei.Shuh shuh ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingroi stet jong u drok hapoh kane ka jylla bad kumjuh ruh halor ka jingkylla ktem dih drok jong ka nongbah Shillong bad ha kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ka jylla.Kum ka khliehduh jong ka tnat Pulit, ka Kong Nongrang ka la iathuh ruh ba ka tnat Pulit jong ka Jylla ka don ka jingiatreilang kaba jan bha bad ki tnat treikam jong ka Sorkar India ban khanglad bad tehlakam ia ka jingshah thok pisa ki paidbah lyngba ka Cyber Crime.Ka la iathuh ba ka Cyber Crime hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya kam pat iahap bad kiwei de ki jylla bad dei halor kane ka tnad Pulit ka la phah ia ki Pulit ban leit shah hikai pyntbit ha kane ka kam.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdheng kali ha Sor Shillong ka kong Nongrang ka la pynpaw ba kane baroh ka dei na ka jingbym shna pynheh shuh ia ki surok ha nongbah Shillong da ki phew snem naduh ba ka Meghalaya ka la ioh ia la ka Jylla.Ka la ong ba ha ki 15 snem mynshwa ba ki kali ba la rejistar hapoh ka ophis District Transport Officer (DTO) kam pat kot satia haduh shi spah tylli ha ha ka shi snem hynrei mynta tang ha ka shi sngi ki kali ba la register kim duna haduh 10 tylli.
title: MAHAM KA DGP BAN LEH DA KABA TYNGEH ÏA KI PULIT BA KHRONG PISA NA KI TROK

content: Ki nongialam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki bahaing hasem ha ka sngi u Blei ki la leit ban aiti ia ki arngut ki samla kiba la im kyrni ha u drok ha Alive Again Foundation, Rehabilitation Centre kaba don hajan ka sor Guwahati, Assam.Kine ki arngut ki samla ki dei kiba la shah bat ha ki dkhot ka HYC ha ka 17 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka jingkhynra ia ki nongdih drok ha Motphran.U Vice President jong ka HYC u Bah Donboklang Kharlyngdoh ha u kyrwoh u la ong, “haba ka seng ka iakhun pyrshah ia u drok, ka isih ia u drok hynrei kam isih pat ia ki nongdih drok.”“Hadien ba ngi la ioh ban iasyllok bad ki bahaing hasem ngi la ialam noh ia ki anrgut ki samla sha ka jaka sumar kaba don hajan Guwahati, Assam,” u la ong.Ia ka kynhun jong ka seng, la lamkhmat da u Vice President u Bah Donboklang Kharlyngdoh bad u samla Francis G. Mawlong, u Secretary u samla Isaac Basaiawmoit, u Chief Organising Secretary u samla John Lyngdoh bad kiwei kiwei.“Ka seng nalor ki jingkhynra kan pyrshang ruh ban iakren bad ban iasyllok bad kine ki khun samla ryngkat ki bahaing hasem ba kin wadlad wad lynti ban buh ia ki ha ki jaka sumar bad na ka liang ka seng kan iarap ruh kat i bor barit na ka bynta ban thawlad ba ki khun samla ka jaidbynriew ki ioh ia ki lad sumar bad kin lait na ka jingpang kyrni dih drok,” u la ong.Haba kynthoh ia ka Sorkar une u nongialam ka seng u la ong, “ka Sorkar ka la pynlut pisa hynrei ban iakren na ka bynta ban tei ia ka lawei jong kine kiba la ngop ha ki jingdih kiba sniew ka aidaw.”Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka Sorkar ryngkat ki MLA ki dei ban shimkhia halor kane ka kam khnang ban wanrah ia ka Rehabilitation Centre ba la pyniaid da ka Sorkar ha nongbah Shillong khnang ba kan pynduna ia ka jingjyllei jong ki samla kiba la ngop ha u drok.
title: NGI ISIH ÏA U DROK, NGIM ISIH ÏA KI NONGDIH DROK, ONG U VICE PRESIDENT KA HYC

content: Ia ka met jong u Bah Ron Cooper Massar la lap ha ka sngi Baar na wah Umïam kaba la per ha sla um hadien ba u la jah naduh hynnin ka Lah Sngi u Blei ha ka por kumba 4:00 baje mysntep katba u dang mih na la ing ban leit iaid kai step.U Bah Ron uba trei kum u Junior Engineer ha ka tnad Water Conservation, Shillong u dei uba shong basah ha ka shnong Umroi Jaïaw Pdeng kaba hap ha ka Umroi PIC, Umïam Police Station.Halor ka jingjah jong une u rangbah ki bahaing hasem ki la ujor da ka ejahar ha Umroi PIC.Ia ka met jong u Bah Ron la sei na ka wah da ka jingïarap ki Pulit bad ki nongshnong shnong ha kaba la pynkit noh sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh ban pyndep ïa ka postmortem.Ki Pulit ki dang pynlong ruh ïa ka jingtohkit watla ki la suba ba u ïap na ka jingngam jyllop khnang ban tip ïa ka daw jong ka jingshisha.Na ka liang jong u Bah Lister Massar uba dei u para jong u Bah Ron, u la ong ba kum ka ing ka sem kim don satia ia kano kano ka jingsuba ba u shah pynïap bad ki shu ngeit ba ka lah ban dei ka jingbakla ba u la kum ur sha wah.U la iathuh ruh ba hymmen jong ki, u dei u briew uba bha bad uba ym pat don dak sniew ha ka imlang ka sahlang bad kum  u rangbah u dei uba ju mlien ban mareh step.
title: NAJAN DWAR KSUID LAP ÏA KA MET U JUNIOR ENGINEER KA WATER RESOURCE

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Anti Narcotic Task Force ka East Jaintia Hills District ha ka 21 tarik u Jymmang, 2024 ki la ioh ban kurup ia u drok uba shongdor haduh 5.5 klur hadien ba la iohkem ia ki snar nongkhaii drok kiba wanrah ia u drok shapoh kane ka jylla Meghalaya.Ka tnat Pulit ka la pyntip ruh ba hapoh ki 30 sngi, ki Pulit ki la ioh ban kurup ia u drok uba shongdor haduh 20 klur.Katkum u kyrwoh ka tnat Pulit, la pyntip ba na ki snar nongkhaii drok la ioh ban kurup 58 tylli ki synduk thep sabon ba la thep ia u drok uba shongdor 5.5 klur.Kane ka jingioh kurup jong ki Pulit ia une u drok ka la jia tang hapoh 24 kynta ba ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang ka la shimti kum ka Director General of Police ba thymmai jong ka Jylla.
title: KURUP KI PULIT KA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS ÏA U DROK BA SHONGDOR 5.5 KLUR

content: Ka Director General of Police (DGP) ba thymmai jong ka jylla ka kong Idashisha Nongrang ka la pynmih da ka jingpynbna paidbah ba naduh ka 30 tarik, Jymmang, 2024 kan ïakynduh ïa ki nongshong shnong ka jylla ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingeh ba ki mad.Ka sngi Palei kan long ka sngi ba ka Kong Nongrang ka la buh ban ïakynduh ia ki riewpaidbah, kata, naduh ka por 11:00 baje mynstep haduh ka por 2:00 baje noh sngi hapoh ka Police Headquarter, Shillong.“Nga pynshlur ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong ban shim ïa kane ka kabu ban ïathir ïa ki jingeh/jingdonkam ba ki ïakynduh markhmat bad nga bad kiba kwah ban wan ïakynduh kin hap ban pyndap ïa ki kyrteng ha phalor jong ka ophis treikam jong ka DGP naduh ka por 10:00 baje mynstep haduh ka por 11.45 mynstep,” ong ka DGP ha u kyrwoh.
title: MANLA KA SNGI PALEI YN KYNDUH PAIDBAH KA DGP

content: Ki riewngeit jong ka Balang Presbyterian ha ka shnong Mupliang ki la iam kthang hadien ba ki thylliej ding barhem ki la bamduh bad pynkylla dpei ia ka ïingmane jong ka Balang Presbyterian ha ka shnong Mupliang, West Jaiñtia Hills District.Kane ka la jia ha ka step phyrngap sngi balang ha ka por kumba 2:00 baje mynstep bad la suba ba ka jingkem ding jong kane ka Ingmane ba dang shu dep shna dang khyndiat snem ka lah ban dei na ka jingthud jong ki waiar bording elektrik.U dkhot jong ka Komiti Balang u Bah P. Ryngkhlem ha ka jingiakren bad u nonglum khubor jong ka Batesi Tv u la iathuh ba ka jingjulor jong kane ka Ingmane ka la kot kumba T.1.5 klur eiei.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ba kum ki bor pyniaid Balang ki la pyntip sha ki Pulit jong ka tnat Pynlip ding, hynrei namarba ka ophis jong ka Fire and Emergency Services Station ka don shaduh Jowai, kumta ka la shimpor bad katba kin da poi ha ka shnong Mupliang ka ding ka la bamduh ia ki jindon jingem jong ka iingmane baroh kawei.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Bah Ryngkhlem, ka Balang Presbyterian Mupliang ka don kumba 800 tam eiei ki riewngeit kiba dei ki dkhot jong ka Balang.
title: ÏAM KTHANG KI RIEWNGEIT KA BALANG PRESBYTERIAN BA BAMDUH KA DING ÏA KA ÏINGMANE HA MUPLIANG

content: U Controller of Examinations jong ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) Tura Bah T.R Laloo ha ka sngi Balang u la pyntip ba ka jingpynbna ïa ka result jong ka Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) bad ka Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) Examinations, 2024 (Arts) Stream kan long ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai ha ki kynta long  trei.Ïa ka Result Booklet lah ban peit na ka Website jong ka MBOSE,,  www.meghalaya.shiksha, www.results.shiksha bad.
title: 24 TARIK YN PYNBNA RESULT SSLC BAD HSSLC (Arts)

content: Ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) ka 200 Battalion kiba la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah, da ka jingïatreilang bad ki Pulit ka Meghalaya ki la ïoh kurup ïa ka shini bad ïa u kwai na khappud Rongra, South Garo Hills District.Ha ka jingkhynra ki shipai BSF bad ki Pulit ki la ïoh ban kurup 7,050 kilo ka shini bad 6,050 kilo u kwai tyrkhong na kawei ka ingjah kaba don hajan ka khappud.Ïa ka shini bad ïa u kwai la aiti noh sha ki Pulit ka Rongra Out Post na ka bynta ban leh ïa kaba donkam.
title: KURUP KI PULIT BAD BSF ÏA KA SHINI BSD U KWAI

content: Ka Khasi Authors’ Society (Ka Seng ki Nongthoh Kot Khasi) kan pynlong ïa ka Dorbar Pyllun bad ka jingïathir jingmut halor ka phang, “” ha ka 25 tarik Jymmang, 2024 naduh ka por 10:30 baje mynstep ha Arts & Culture Hall, Shillong.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u General Secretary ka KAS u Dr. R.P. Kharshiiing, u la pyntip, ba ha kane ka Dorbar yn pynsngew ïa ka kaiphot treikam jong ka seng, ka jingïakren ban nang pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ka jingdawa ban pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India bad ka jingïathir jingmut para nongthoh na ka bynta ban nang pynbha shuh shuh ha ka kam thoh kot.Kumta lyngba kane ka jingpynbna ïar, ka KAS ka kyrpad ïa ki para nongthoh kiba dei ki dkhot ka seng ba kin sngewbha ban poi lang sha kane ka Dorbar, kynthup ïa ki dkhot kiba don ha ki shnat bapher bapher hapoh ka Bri u Hynñiew-Trep.
title: KA DORBAR KI NONGTHOH KOT KHASI HA KA 25 TARIK JYMMANG

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Umsning Circle ba la lamkhmat da u President u samla Lester Nongbet ka la leit ban kynduh bad aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Manager jong ka State Bank of India, Umsning Branch halor ka jingbym treikam tikna jong ki ATM.Ka seng ka la shim ia kane ka sienjam hadien ba ka lap ia ki jingdkoh jong ki ATM ban shakri ia u paidbah ba iadei bad ka jingheh jong ka shnong ba ka SBI Umsning Branch ka  hap ban khmih ba kynthup ia 260 tylli ki shnong bad ka jingbun ki nongshong shnong.Ki ATM ba jan tam na Umsning ki kynthup ia ki ATM ha Nongpoh bad Umiam ba jngai haduh da ki 30 kilomitar bad 22 kilomitar.Shuh shuh ka jingbym lah  ban shakri pura ka ATM ha Umsning ha ka rukom ba dei ia u paidbah bad ka ktah ia ki paidbah kiba wan na jngai kiba hap ban pynlut ia ka bai kali hynrei ki shem pynbna da ki ATM bym treikam.Ka seng ka la ai por lai sngi hynrei lym kumta ka la byrngem ban khang tala syndon ia ka Branch ha Umsning.
title: 3 SNGI AI POR KA KSU ÏA KA SBI UMSNING BRANCH BAN PYNBIANG ÏA KI ATM

content: : U District Magistrate ka East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Palei u la pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC ban khang pyrshah ïa ka jingïaid rally hapoh ka East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi ñiew vote jong ka elekshon Lok Sabha 2024 ha ka 4 tarik, Jylliew. 2024.“Ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad ban tem ïa kino kino ki huri hura ha ka sngi ñiew vote, la mana ban ïaid proseshon bad pyrta slogan hapoh ka jaka ñiew vote tad haduh ba da dep ñiew lut ïa ki vote bad pynbna ïa ka result,” ong u District Magistrate.Ym shah ban pyndonkam ïa ki tynghun pynsawa bad ban leh kmen da kino kino ki seng saiñpyrthei ne ki kyrtong hapoh ka jaka ñiew vote.  La mana ban ym shah ban rah dieng, lathi, tiar siat, ïaid proseshon ne ïalum briew hapoh shi kilomitar na ka jaka ñiew voteLa mana ban thang bom pataka ha surok ne ha ki jaka paidbah ha ka sngi ñiew vote.“Ym shah ban ïaid rally jingjop da kino kino ki kyrtong ne ki seng saiñpyrthei hadien ka jingpynbna ïa ka result hapoh u pud u sam jong ka East Khasi Hills District.  Yn ym shah palat arngut ki briew ban synran ïa u kyrtong ba jop ne ïa u/ka nongmihkhmat ba la ïoh jingbit ban pdiang ïa ka ‘certificate of election’ na u Returning Officer,” la ong u District Magistrate.Ha ka  jaka jong ka Counting Hall, yn shah tang ïa ki briew kiba don ïa ki ID Card/Car Pass ba la ai da u District Election Officer, East Khasi Hills District, ba kin rung shapoh.  Ym shah satia ban rah mobile phone ne camera hapoh ka jaka ñiew vote.Kane ka hukum kan treikam noh mardor tad haduh ka por 4.00 baje janmiet jong ka 6 tarik jylliew.
title: MANA U DC BAN ÏAID RALLY HA KA SNGI ÑIEW VOTE HA EKH, PYNJARI SECTION 144 CrPC

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la bthah ba ka Tribe Certificate ka dei kaba donkam na ka bynta ki shnong kiba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingai ïa ka syrnot Scheduled Castes bad Scheduled Tribes ha Meghalaya.Kane ka long katkum ka jingpynbeit ïa ka SI 7 jong ka Guidelines na ka bynta ka jingpdiang bad kyntait ïa ki aplikeshon ban ai ïa ka syrnot Scheduled Castes bad Scheduled Tribes ha ka jylla Meghalaya ba la pynmih lyngba ka Office Memorandum ha ka 19 tarik, Lber, 2014.Haba pyntip halor kane ha ka sngi Palei, u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong, “kane ka long na ka bynta ki aplikehson ban ai ïa ka syrnot SC/ST ha ka jylla Meghalaya, ha kaba, nalor kata kaei kaba la pynrung ha ki kyndon na ka bynta ka jingpdiang bad ka jingkyntait ïa ki aplikeshon, ngi la pynrung sa kawei ka kyndon kaba ong: kawei na ki mat ba la  buh yn kynthup ïa ka Number 4 (kane ka dei kaba la bynrap) Tribe Certificate na ki bor ba dei peit ïa ki jaka kiba hap hapoh ka KHADC ka dei kaba donkam.”“Kane kam kynthup ïa baroh watla na kane ka Tribe Certificate ka dei ka dulir kaba shong aiñ ba la ai da ka KHADC.  Namarkata, kino kino kiba pynrung kyrteng ïalade ne kiba kam ne kiba kwah ban pynrung kyrteng bad ban ïoh ïa ka syrnot ST ki dei ban da ïoh shwa ïa ka Tribe Certificate ba la ai da ka KHADC katkum ki kyndon,” u la bynrap.Katkum ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih halor kane, mynta yn pule noh kum ‘7”.Ki dulir ba la kdew hapoh katkum ki jingdonkam ban dei ban aiti ki long: (a) Caste Identity  i. Caste Certificate jong u kpa/kmie bad ka jingpynshisha ba don jingïadei. (ii) Ka Kopi jong ka dulir khyndew barim kaba kdew ïa ka kyrteng jaidbynriew ha ka dulir. (iii) Kano kano ka dulir sorkar kaba pynshisha ka jaidbynriew.  (iv) Ka Tribe Certificate na ki bor ba dei peit jong ki jaka ba hap hapoh ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ki dei kiba donkam.”
title: HAP ÏOH SHUWA ÏA KA TRIBE CERTIFICATE NA KA KHADC SHUWA BAN APLAI SYRNOT SC/ST

content: : Ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court ha ka sngi Palei ka la shong bishar ïa ka ujor ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkynnoh ba ka don ka jingbym ryntih ha ka rta rungkam ha ka jingthungkam ha ka tnat Pulit.Ha ka jingshong bishar, u Additional Avocate General ka Sorkar u T. Yangi ba la synran lang da ka Government Advocate ka Kong Z.E. Nongkynrih, ki la pyni ïa ki katto katne ki dulir, khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad Meghalaya Police  Act,  2010,  bad ïa ka Office  Memorandum  kaba la pynmih ha ka 01.05.2024,  kaba la shim tang katto katne bynta na ka  Office  Memorandum  ba la pynmih ha ka 03.02.2022, kaba kdew ïa ka rta rungkam.”Ka Iingbishar ka la bthah ïa u AAG ban buh jingthoh halor kane da ka Affidavit, lashai.Ka jingshong bishar kan sa long biang haduh ka 28 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka kynhun ki samla ba la lamkhmat da ka nongtrei monsngewbha ka samla Barilang Pyngrope ki la ïakhun na ka bynta ban pynbeit ïa ka rta rungkam jong ka tnat Pulit bad ka Office Memorandum (OM) jong u snem 2022, kaba pynjlan ka rta rungkam na ka 27 snem sha ka 32 snem bad na ka bynta ki Schedule Tribe, naduh ka rta 32 haduh 37 snem ha ki kam bapher bapher ka Sorkar.Hynrei, dang shen la pynmih ïa ka Advertisement da ka tnat Pulit ha ka 6 tarik Lber, da kaba pynrung ïa ki kyndon bapher bapher, kaba kdew ba ka rta rungkam kan long tang naduh 21 snem haduh 27 snem na ka bynta ka post Unarmed Branch (UB), Sub Inspectors bad 18 snem haduh 21 snem na ka bynta ka post UB Constable, bad sa san snem ka rta ba la pynjlan ïa ki nongthep kam ST/SC/OST.Kane ka kynhun ka la leit ujor sha ka Ingbishar lyngba ka Writ Petition.Ha ka taiew baladep, ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court ka la phah da ka notis sha ka Sorkar Jylla bad sha kawei kiwei ki tnat treikam ban jubab halor kane ka kam ba la kynnoh ba ki don ki jingryntih ha ka rta rungkam ba la buh na ka bynta ka jingthungkam ha ka tnat Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya.
title: 28 TARIK MYNTA U BNAI BUH SNGI KA HC BAN BISHAR ÏA KA UJOR HALOR KA RTA RUNGKAM HA KA TNAT PULIT

content: U Menangmankhraw Kharkongor na ka St. Anthony’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong bad u Gaurav Bharali na ka St. Edmunds Higher Secondary School, Shillong ki la long ki arngut ki khynnah skul ban pas ha ka kyrdan banyngkong eh ha ka Top Ten jong ka result Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (Arts Stream) ba la pynbna da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education ha ka 24 tarik u Jymmang, 2024.U Manangmankhraw bad u Gaurav ki la ioh mar 468 marks.Na ka St. Anthony’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong kiwei pat ki khynnah skul kiba la poi ha ka kyrdan Top Ten ki long  u Zephaniah Banphiralang Nongbri bad Risalanaki Laloo ha ka kyrdan kaba 9. Na ka St. Edmunds Higher Secondary School, Shillong kiwei pat kiba la rung ha ka kyrdan Top Ten ki long u Hamekhrawbok Kharshiing ha ka kyrdan kaba san bad Emiheisakiru L. Thubru ha ka kyrdan kaba 9.Nangta sa arngut ki khynnah skul jong ka Don Bosco College (higher secondary section) Tura ki la ïoh ïa ka kyrdan kaba ar bad kaba lai, kata, ka Tanisha Das bad u Salseng Marak.Na ka St. Marys Higher Secondary School, Shillong, ka Naaz Bashar ka la ïoh ïa ka kyrdan kaba saw bad ka Sneha Ghosh ha ka kyrdan kaba khyndai.Kiwei pat ki khynnah skul kiba la rung ha ka kyrdan Top Ten ki kynthup ïa u John Vianney Lyngdoh na ka St. John Bosco Boys’ Hr. Sec. School, Sohra uba la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba 6, u Fredrique Gweneth Ryngkhlem na ka North Liberty Higher Secondary School, Mookyrdoop-Jowai ha ka kyrdan kaba 7, ka Rimika Esther Dkhar na ka Laban Bengalee Girls’ Higher Secondary School, Shillong ha ka kyrdan kaba 8, u Kyrmenlang Nongrum na ka Village Durbar Higher Secondary School, Swer ha ka kyrdan kaba 8, ka Pynbhashisha Nongbri na ka Auxilium Girls’ Higher Secondary School, Shillong ha ka kyrdan kaba phra bad ka Monkynjailin Syngkon na ka St. Dominic’s Higher Secondary School, Mawkyndeng ha ka kyrdan kaba 10.Haba khein lang ïa ka jingpas jong ki khynnah ha une u snem 2024 kiba ïakhun kum ki Regular bad ki Non-Regular ka long 79.76 percent.Ka jingpas jong ki khynnah ha ka eksamin HSSLC ka long 79.76 percent.  Ha u snem ba ladep ka jingpas ki khynnah ka long 80.30 percent.Katba 21,833 hajar ngut na ki 27,374  hajar ngut ki khynnah skul na ki 251 tylli ki skul ki la pas ha ka eksamin HSSLC kaba la long ha ki 105 tylli ki Centre.Ha ka eksamin HSSLC, ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District ka la paw kum ka district kaba bun tam ki khynnah kiba pas kaba long 92.32 percent katba ka South Garo Hills ka dei kaba duna tam kaba long tang 56.30 percent.
title: MAR 468 MARK ÏOH U MENANGMANKHRAW BAD U GAURAV HA KA TOP TEN, HSSLC (ARTS)

content: Sa shisien, ka Sherwood School, Tura, West Garo Hills ka la long ka skul kaba don ha kyrdan kaba hakhlieh duh ha ka jingpynbna ïa ka Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) ba la pynbna da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBOSE) ha ka sngi Thohdieng.U Anuj Chetry na ka Sherwood School, Tura u la long u lahduh ha ka result SSLC mynta u snem da kaba ïoh 575 mark.Katba ka Aleytheia Syiemlieh na St Margaret’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong kaba la ïoh 574 mark ka la wan ha ka kyrdan kaba ar bad u Congenial Kharsahnoh na Christian Academy, Shillong uba la ïoh 571 u la ïoh ha kyrdan kaba lai.Laiphew saw ngut kiwei pat ki khynnah na ki skul bapher bapher ki la ïoh rung ha ka thup Top-20 jong ka result SSLC mynta u snem.Haba bishar ïa ka result jong ka SSLC ha baroh kawei ka jylla, ka jingpas jong ki khynnah ka long 55.80 percent haba ïanujor bad u snem baladep kaba long 51.93 percent.Tang 30,207 hajar na ki 54,134 hajar ngut ki khynnah skul na ki 679 tylli ki skul ki la pas ïa ka eksamin SSLC kaba la long ha ki 157 tylli Centre.Ka West Jaintia District ka dei ka District kaba bun tam ki khynnah skul kiba pas kaba long 78.34 percent katba ka North Garo Hills ka dei ka District kaba duna tam ki khynnah kiba pas kaba long tang 23.88 percent ha ka eksamin SSLC.
title: RESULT SSLC : U ANUJ CHETRY HA KA KYRDAN NYNGKONG HA KA TOP 20, BAAR KA ALEYTHIA

content: : Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la rai ban ym shah shuh ïano ïano ruh ban sah miet ha ki dukan ha Iewduh.Ka KHADC ka la shim ïa kane ka rai hadien ba ka la ïoh pdiang ïa ka jingujor ba ki dukan ha Iewduh ki la kylla long ki ingbasa jongno re jongno.La shim ïa kane ka rai ha ka jingïalang ba la mihkhmat da u Syiem jong ka Hima Mylliem u Ainam Manik Syiem bad ki nongïalam jong ka Hynniewtrep Iewduh Association (HIA).Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem ula ïathuh ba ka jingïalang ka la rai ba ki dukan ha Iewduh ki dei ban khang noh naduh ka por 10:00 baje manla ka miet.U la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba sah beain ha Lum Survey, kiba la shah kyndang ha ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ha ka sngi Palei.“Ban khanglad ïa ki briew kiba sah miet ha ki dukan ba don ha Iewduh, ka jingïalang ka la rai ban ym shah shuh ïano ïano ruh ban sah ha ki dukan,” ong u Bah Pynïaid.U la kubur ba ki don katto katne tylli ki dukan kiba buh da ki briew ban sah miet ha la ki dukan na ka bynta ban peitngor ïa ki dukan, ïoh ki shah kyndang ha ki runar kiba shim kabu ïa ka jingdum jong ka miet khamtam na ka jingjyllei shaba palat ki nongtuh nongthiem.“Ïa ki briew kiba la ïoh jingbit ban sah miet ha ki dukan, ka Council ka la rai ban phah mih noh ha lane shwa ka 1 tarik Jylliew 2024,” la ïathuh u CEM.U CEM u la pynbna ba ka jingïalang ka la rai ban phah 10 ngut ki Pulit Enforcement jong ka District Council na ka bynta ban ïarap ïa ki Pulit jong u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem ban pahara manla ka miet khnang ban lait na ka jingshah tuh bad shah prong ki dukan ha Iewduh.“Ngi la shim ïa kane ka rai na ka bynta ban tehlakam ïa ki kam runar ruser kiba lah ban jyllei ha Iewduh naduh,  ka khalai, ka jingjyllei u drok bad kiwei kiwei ki jingsniew. Na ka liang jong ka Executive Committee kan sa pynmih da ka hukum sha ka Hima Mylliem ban pynthikna ba kan ym don shuh ka jingsah miet jong ki briew ha ki dukan ha Iewduh,” la bynrap u CEM.
title: RAI KA KHADC BAN YM SHAH SHUH BAN SAHMIET HA ÏEWDUH

content: Shillong, Jymmang, 24: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la sam ïa ki Certificate bad ïa ki Identity Card sha ki nongsumad dawai Khasi.Ka jingsam ïa ki syrnot sha ki 24 ngut ki nongsumar dawai Khasi kiba la ithuh da ka Council ka long katkum ka KHADC (Protection and Promotion of Khasi Traditional Medicines) Act 2011.“Ka ri jong ngi ka bun bha ki nongsumar tynrai hynrei ki don ruh kiba shu pynbud tynneng ïa kiwei.  Kane ka jingithuh jong ka District Council ban pynkupbor ïa phi ban nang pyntbit shuh shuh ïalade bad ha kajuh ka por ban ïai bteng ïa ka rukom sumar tynrai dawai Khasi ha kane ka jylla,” la ong u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem haba kren ha ka jingïalang kaba lyngkot.
title: ÏOH SYRNOT BAD ID CARD KI NONGSUMAR DAWAI Khasi na ka KHADC

content: Ha kawei ka jingjia kaba pynsyier mynsiem ia ka imlang ka sahlang, uwei u rangbah uba la 35 snem ka rta ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Amison Muruh u la shah pyniap ha ka 23 tarik Jymmang ha ka por kumba 7:00 baje janmiet ha la ing sah lajong kaba don ha ka shnong Umtasor Mawdkhar, Ri Bhoi District.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum la iathuh ba une u rangbah u la shah pyniap da kaba shah thlieh da ka kynja tiar banep nadien ryndang.U Rangbah Shnong jong ka shnong Umtasor Mawdkhar u bah M. Mukhim, u la iathuh ba u la ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ha ka por 7.30 baje bad mar mar u la pyntip sha ki Pulit jong ka Nongpoh Police Station kiba la wan poi ban pynkit noh ia ka met jong une uba la khladnoh sha Nongpoh Civil Hospital na ka bynta ban leh ia ka post-mortem examination.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki dang pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban iohkem ia kiba donkti ha kane ka kam bymman.
title: SHAH PYNÏAP U RANGBAH HA LA ÏING HA UMSASOR MAWDKHAR, RIBHOI DISTRICT

content: Ki Pulit ka Sadar Police Station ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la ïoh tam ïa ka shynrong khlieh briew kaba shah rong ha ka um na ka nala ha Oakland Road, Shillong.Ïa kane ka shynrong khlieh la lap nyngkong da ki nongïaid lynti kiba la pyntip mar mar sha ki Pulit bad kiba leit tohkit bad ban shimti noh ïa kane ka shynrong khlieh ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.Hadien ba la lap ïa ka shynrong khlieh, ki Pulit ki la lap sa ïa ki shyieng Lbong bad ka Krung na ka nala jong ka shnong Bivar Road, Shillong.Ia ki lyngkhot met la kitnoh sha NEIGRIHMS ban leh ïa kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon ain.U Superintendent of Police (SP) ka East Khasi Hills Rituraj Ravi haba pyntip halor kane ka jingjia, u la ong, ïa kane ka shynrong khlieh la lap ha ka 22 tarik Jymmang bad mar mar la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bad ka jingwad shuh shuh ïa ki lyngkhot met ha ka thaiñ.U pyntip ba ha ka sngi kaba bud ka kynhun Pulit ka la ïoh tam pat sa ïa ka shyieng Lbong ba la kem pyut napoh ka nala jong kane hi ka thaiñ bad ha ka 24 tarik pat la lap sa ïa ki shyieng Krung hadien ka jingwad kaba slem bha.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u SP, ki Pulit ki suba ba kane ka metiap ka lah ban dei jong u shynrang briew.Halor kane, ki Pulit ki la register case ha Sadar Police Station hapoh ka kyndon 302 IPC bad ka jingtohkit mynta ka la ïaid shakhmat.
title: LAP KI PULIT ÏA KA SHYNRONG KHLIEH SHYNRANG NA OAKLAND ROAD

content: Kawei ka jingjia kaba kham phylla kaba la jia ha ka shnong Nongkynrih, West Jaintia Hills Dist ha kaba 11 tylli ki masi ki la shah rong tuh ha ki runar ha ka miet sngi Palei. Kine ki masi ki dei ki jong ka Kong Manosha Suchiang bad u Bah Moina Nangbah.Ka khubor ba la ioh na u General Secretary jong ka Hill Farmer Union u Bah Alfondbirth Kharsyntiew uba la phah ruh ryngkat bad ki Video sha ka Batesi Tv ki la iathuh ba ki runar ki la wan ha ka por shiteng miet ban plie ia ka sem bad rong tuh ia baroh ki masi na ka sem.Hadien ba la ioh jingtip ba ki Masi ki la shah tuh, ki nongrep ki la pyntip sha u Waheh Shnong jong ka shnong Nongkynrih uba la pyntip wut wut sha ka Synjuk ki Waheh Shnong bad kyrpad ia ki shnong ba marjan ban bat ia baroh ki kali kit Masi namarba ka don ka jingshah tuh masi na shnong jong u.Da ka jingiatrei lang jong ki shnong ba marjan, la iathuh, ba ki runar ki la pyllait biang ia ki masi ha shiteng lynti bad ia ki masi la lap da ki khynnah shnong kiba la ialam biang ia ki sha ka sem.Mar ia ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ki Nongialam jong ka Hill Farmers Union Central Body bad ki nongialam na West Jaintia Hills District ki la leit bran bran ban ai mynsiem ia ki nongrep kiba mad ia kane ka jingjia.
title: 11 TYLLI KI MASI RONG TUH KI RUNAR NA SÉM KI NONGREP HA KA SHNONG NONGKYNRIH

content: Shillong, May 25 : Meghalaya is expected to face particularly severe weather conditions, with isolated extremely heavy rainfall likely from the night of 26 May upto 28 May. The heavy downpours could lead to flooding in low-lying areas and disrupt daily activities.The Indian Meteorological Department (IMD) has reported a significant weather development over the East Central Bay of Bengal, where a depression has intensified into a deep depression. Moving North-North-eastwards at a speed of 15 kmph over the past six hours, the system now poses a serious threat to coastal regions.IMD officials predict that the deep depression will continue to move nearly northwards and is likely to intensify into a cyclonic storm by this evening. Further intensification into a severe cyclonic storm is expected by the morning of May 26, 2024, over the northwest and adjoining northeast Bay of Bengal. The storm is forecasted to cross the Bangladesh and adjoining West Bengal coasts between Sagar Island and Khepupara by the midnight of May 26, 2024, with wind speeds of 110-120 kmph, gusting up to 135 kmph. Meghalaya may experience wind speeds of 40-50 kmph, gusting up to 60 kmph on May 27.STATE GOVERNMENT ISSUES ADVISORY:The State Government urges residents to remain vigilant, ensure that emergency kits are prepared, and avoid unnecessary travel during this period and stay updated with the latest weather reports.In light of the imminent weather threat, authorities emphasize the importance of preparedness. Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for cyclones provide essential guidelines for emergency responses.Here are some key do’s and don’ts to ensure safety:DO’s: Before cyclone: Ignore rumours, stay calm, and avoid panic. Keep mobile phones charged for connectivity and utilize SMS. Stay informed through radio broadcasts, television updates, and newspapers. Safeguard documents and valuables in waterproof containers. Secure your house, conduct necessary repairs, and prevent loose sharp objects. Ensure livestock safety by keeping animals untied.During and After Cyclone:If Indoors: Switch off electrical mains and gas connections. Keep doors and windows shut. If your house is unsafe, evacuate early before the cyclone's onset. Listen to radio updates and rely only on official warnings. Consume boiled or chlorinated water for safety.If Outdoors: Avoid entering damaged buildings. Watch out for broken electric poles, wires, and other hazards. Seek shelter in a safe location as soon as possible. Always consult ANM, ASHA, or the village First Aid team before taking any medicine.
title: SEVERE WEATHER ALERT FOR MEGHALAYA : HEAVY RAINFALL AND CYCLONIC STORM EXPECTED
