content: : Ka Indian Meteorological Department (IMD) ka la maham lypa ba ka jinglong ka jingman jong ka suiñbneng kan don ka jingther jong u lapbah uba jur bha naduh ka miet 26 tarik haduh ka 28 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka IMD ka la maham ba ka la don ka jingkylla ha ka jinglong jingman jong ka suiñbneng bad ka jingbeh ka lyer kit slap ha ki bynta jong ka East Central na ka duriaw Bay of Bengal bad sha ka North-North-Eastward ha ka jingsted kaba 15 Km/ph.Na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya ka IMD ka maham ba ka lyer kit slap kaba stet haduh 40-50 kmph ha ki hynriew kynta ban sa wan bad kaba la antad haduh 60 kmph kan lynshop ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai.Ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya ki dei ban peitngor bad ban phikir bha hashwa ban wan ka erïong.  Ka IMD ka la kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kim dei ban shah ialam bakla ha ki khubor lamler bad ki dei ban wad ki lad ai jingtip lyngba ki Television, ki lad pathai khubor bad kiwei.La bthah ruh ia ki paidbah ban pynlip ia ki tiar bording bad ka Gas. Khang bha ïa ki jingkhang bad ki khalki, lada ki ïing ki long ki bym shngaiñ kiar noh na ki ha shwa ban sdang ka jingwan ka erlangthari. Kiar na ka rung ha ki jingtei ki ïing ba la sniew, peitbha ïa ki post ding ilektrik kiba la sdang ban khyllem, ki waiar, leit wad ki lad jingïarap katba lah, kynduh barabor ïa ki ANM, ASHA bad ïa ka kynhun ka First Aid ha shwa ban dih dawai.
title: MAHAM KA IMD ÏA KI PAIDBAH KA MEGHALAYA BAN PYNKHREH KA JINGKHIE ERIONG

content: Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingthurmur ka rukom pynlong ia ka eksamin NEET ha Jowai bad ha Nongpoh, ki samla pule kiba thoh ïa kane ka eksamin ha Jowai bad Nongpoh ba dang shu dep ki don ym duna ïa ka san spah ngut bad kane ka jingthurmur ka rukom pynïaid ka la pynduh mynsiem ïa ki khynnah kiba thoh ia ka eksamin NEET.Halor kane ka JSU bad ka KSU ryngkat bad ki khynnah pule kiba thoh ïa ka eksamin NEET ki la phah da ka shithi ujor sha ka National Testing Agency (NTA) bad sha ka Sorkar Jylla ban pan jingshai ha ka rukom pynïaid eksam ha kine ki artylli Center hynrei mynta lah kumba ar taïew tam ym pat ïoh ïa ka jubab na ka NTA bad kane ka buh ïa ki khynnah ha ka jingdum haduh mynta.Ha ka jingïalang ba dang shu dep ban pynlong ha Jowai ba la don lang ki khynnah pule kiba thoh ia ka eksamin NEET, ki kmie ki kpa ryngkat bad ki nongïalam ka JSU bad KSU na West Jaiñtia Hills District Unit ka lah mih ka sur jingpynrem jur ïa ka Sorkar Jylla namarba sha kiwei ki jylla kum ha ka jylla Telangana bad sha kiwei ki jylla ki ïoh ïa ka jubab na ka NTA halor ka jingthurmur ka rukom pynlong ïa ka eksamin NEET kaba ladep hynrei ka Sorkar Meghalaya kat haduh mynta kam pat ïoh jubab na ka NTA kumta kane ka kynhun hapoh ka jingïalang ka dawa da kaba tyngeh ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba ka dei ban ïakren bad ki heh ka NTA na Delhi halor ka kaiphod kaba ka la phah napoh ka jylla bad ka NTA ka dei ban jubab kloi namar ka result jong ka NEET kaba mynta u snem ka lah jan ban mih.
title: KA SORKAR JYLLA HADUH MYNTA KAM PAT ÏOH  JUBAB NA KA NTA HALOR NEET, ONG KA JSU BAD KSU

content: : U Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District u SC Sadhu u la khot da ka jingïalang ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ban ïasyllok ha kaba iadei bad ki briew kiba sah beaiñ ha jaka jong ka Cantonment kaba don hajan ka Fire and Emergency Service Station ha Lum Survey, Shillong.Ha kane ka jingïalang la khot lang ia u Superintendent of Police (SP), Chief Executive Officer ka Shillong Cantonment Board, na ka Defence Estate Officer, Guwahati, ia u Secretary ka Meghalaya Urban Development Authority, ia u Chief Executive Officer ka Shillong Municipal Board bad ia ki nongialam ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC).Ha ka sngi saitjaiñ, ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC) ka la bthah ia u Chief Secretary jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban ai ia ka kaiphod kaba bniah halor ka jingshah pynpra ki ing tap shilliang jong ki briew kiba sah beaiñ ha Lum Survey.Ka MHRC ka la bthah ia u Chief Secretary ban phah ia ka kaiphod babniah ha lane shwa ka 30 tarik mynta u bnai. Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ha ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai, ki nongïalam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ki la shah pynngat ha ki kyndon aiñ ha ki bor Pulit tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba ki la leit ban pynpra ïa ki ïing jong ki briew kiba sah beaiñ ha Lum Survey.Ki Pulit ki la register case ha Sadar Police Station pyrshah ïa u President ka HYC u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem, u Vice President Bah Donbok Kharlyngdoh, u Assistant General Secretary Isaac Basaïawmoit bad kiwei pat ki nongialam bad ki dkhot kiba ym lah ban tip kyrteng.Ka jingtohkit halor kane ka kam ka dang ïaid shakhmat.
title: BA SHAH KYNDANG KI BRIEW BASAH BÉ-AIÑ HA LUM SURVEY KHOT JINGIALANG U DC KA EKH

content: Ka Khasi Author Society (KAS) ka la pynkhreh ban pynmih paidbah ïa ka Dictionary Khasi-Khasi-English ïa kaba ka jaidbynriew Khasi-Pnar kan sa ïoh shen.“Ka jingïaid shaphrang ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka Khasi-Khasi-English Dictionary ka dei projek kaba la bei tyngka da ka tnat Arts and Culture ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC).  Kane ka projek ka la ïaid mynta lai snem,” ong u President ka KAS u Dr. DRL Nonglait ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.“Ngi la thmu ban pyndep hapoh lai snem hynrei ka kam ka dei kaba ïar bad lehse sa tang hapoh shisnem ngin sa lah ban pyndep ïa kane ka kam,” u la ong“Ngin sa buh ïa ki Phonetic Signs ki ban ïarap ïa ki nongpule ban kynnoh ïa ki kyntien Khasi. Kane kan dei ka banyngkong eh ba ka jaidbynriew Khasi kan pynmih. Ngin sa lah ban pyndep ïa kane sa hapoh shi snem,” la ïathuh u Dr. Nonglait.“Ngi don kumba khatar ngut ki dkhot jong ka Research Team ba la khlieh da i Prof Badaplin War kum ka Chief Supervisor bad i Dr. Barika Khyriem na ka  Department of Linguistic, NEHU kum ka Joint Supervisor. Ngi kyrmen ba kane ka Dictionary kan sa weng lut ïa ki jingspeldak, ki jingïasnoh kyntien, ki jingkynnoh,” la ong shuh shuh u Dr. Nonglait.“Ha ka jaidbynriew ngi don ïa ki ktien tnat kum ka ktien Pnar, Lyngngam, Jirang bad kiwei kiwei kiba don la ki jong ki rukom spel dak.  Ka ktien pdeng kan long katkum ka Dictionary ba ngin sa pynmih ha ki khyndiat snem ki ban sa wan,” la bynrap u Dr. Nonglait.
title: PYNKHREH KA KAS BAN PYNMIH ÏA KA DICTIONARY KHASI-ENGLISH

content: Ka Khasi Author Society (KAS) ka la rai ban buddien ïa ka jingdawa ban pynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India tang shu thaw ïa ka Sorkar ba thymmai ha Delhi hadien ka jingñiew vote jong ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 4 tarik, Jylliew, 2024.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka dorbar ba shisien shisnem ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u President ka KAS u Dr. DRL Nonglait, u la ong, “ngi la ïakren ban pynjur ïa ka jingïakhih paidbah halor ka jingdawa ban pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra da kaba leit pynshai paidbah sha ki shnong jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep bad tang shu thaw ïa ka Sorkar thymmai ha Delhi ngin sa leit buddien biang ïa ka jingdawa.”U la ïathuh ba ka KAS ka ladep aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ban dawa ïa ka Sorkar ba kan pynlong ktien Sorkar (Official Language) bapura ïa ka Ktien Khasi bad ka English kaba la don lypa namarba haduh mynta ïa ktien Khasi katkum ka Meghalaya Language Act, 2005 la buh tang kum ka Officiate Official Language.Haba kylli, ula ong, “ka jingleit jong ngi sha Delhi ka la dei ha ka por ba la jan kut ka (samoi treikam) jong ka Sorkar. Ngi dang pyrkhat ba lada ka Sorkar Jylla ka khlaiñ ban dawa ka dei ka por kaba biang hynrei ngi ïoh ïa ka rukom pyrkhat kaba pynsngew da ki katto katne ba ka jingleit jong ngi sha Delhi ka dei kaba la jan kut (ka samoi treikam) jong ka Sorkar.”“Ka jingshisha ka long ba ka Sorkar kam pat kloi ban wanrah ïa ka Aiñ Rew (Bill) ban pynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khynrnit Baphra.  Ka jingleit sha Delhi ka dang dei tang ka jingsdang, ngin dang ïai leit na ka por sha ka por. Mynta kaba ngi donkam ka long ban pynkhlaiñ ha ka jylla ban leit sha ki shnong ki thaw ban ai jingpynshai paidbah.  Ka jingïakren jong ngi (ha ka dorbar) ka long ba ka ktien ka long ka kynroh kaba skhem jong ka jaidbynriew.  Ngi dei ban ïoh ha kawei ka sngi ïa ka jingithuh (ïa ka ktien Khasi) ha ka Khyrnit Baphra.  Ynda la wan ka Sorkar bathymmai, lada la donkam, ngin sa ïathuh wat ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih,” la ong shuh shuh u President ka KAS.U Dr. Nonglait u la ïathuh ba ka jingïalang ka la ïakren ba ki nongthoh kin jied ïa ki phang kiba ka imlang ka sahlang ka ïakynduh ha kine ki sngi kum ka jingjyllei jong u drok, ka jingjyllei jong kiba shah ktah na ka jingpang HIV/AIDS, ka jingjyllei ka jyrsieh bamsap kaba ki paidbah ki ïakren sharum shaneng hynrei kaba eh pat ban pynshisha ïa ki.  Ka kyrduh kam kyrduh jam, ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa ki mobile phone bad kiwei kiwei.  “Ki nongthoh ki don la ka jong ka bynta ban pynphalang ïa kine ha ki jingthoh jong ki,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ngi don ïa ki nongthoh kiba ïadei bad ka jinglong jong ka sawdong sawkun jong ka mariang, ka histori, ka imlang ka sahlang, ki kam lehnoh kumba ngi ïohi ha ki snem baladep bad ki nongthoh ki dei ban pynphalang ïa kine.  Kiei ki jingeh bad ki nongthoh kin sa lah ban thoh ïa ki jingthoh ha ka dur jong ka sawangka, ka parom, ka poitri ban ïarap ïa ki Dorbar Shnong bad ki Hima bad ïa ka Sorkar jylla ban pynthymmai ïa ki polisi treikam.”Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba ka KAS mynta ka dang pynkhreh ban shna ïa ka ophis treikam jong ka Society ha ka jaka ba la ai sngewbha da ka Sorkar ha Tribal Research Institute (TRI) ha Mawlai kaba heh kumba 5,400 sqft lyngba u Myntri ka tnat Arts and Culture u Bah Paul Lyngdoh.U la pyntip ruh ba ka KAS kan sa don biang ïa ka lympung jingïalang ban rakhe ïa ka Thomas Jones Day ha Mawkyrwat, ka sngi ka thoh ka tar ha ka 11 tarik, Nailur, ha Shillong bad ka jingrakhe ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap u Soso Tham ha ka 19 tarik, Nohprah ka ban sa long ha Nongpoh.Ha ka dorbar, ka KAS ka la pynlong ruh ïa ka jingsngap jar kaba ar minit ban kynmaw burom ïa ki dkhot kiba la khladnoh naduh u snem 2022-24 kiba don kumba 10 ngut.Ha  kane ka sngi, ka KAS ka la pdiang sngewbha khat hynriew ngut ki nongthoh kot ba thymmai na Jaiñtia, Ribhoi, West Khasi Hills, South West Khasi Hills bad na Eastern West Khasi Hills bad ïa ki nongthoh kot ba la rangbah bad kiba dang samla, ki nonghikai kolej bad kiba trei ha ki kam bapher bapher.Ka KAS ka la pynkup burom ruh ïa kiba la ïoh ïa ka kyrdan Ph.D ba kynthup ïa u Dr. Walter Thabah, ka Dr. Doris B. Byrsat bad u Dr. B. L Nongbri, kynthup ruh ïa ka Kong Silbi Passah kaba la ïoh ïa ka khusnam Padmashri na ka Sorkar India dang shen.
title: TANG SHU THAW KA  SORKAR THYMMAI HA DELHI YN BUDDIEN BIANG KA KAS ÏA KA KTIEN KHASI

content: Ki Pulit ka Sadar Police Station ki la khot hajir ïa u President ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) Bah Roy Kupar Synrem ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynngat kyndon ha ka MMPO namar ka jingleit pynpra ïa ki ïing sah beaiñ ki poiwir ha Lum Survey dang shen.Ha ka notis ba la soi da u Sub Inspector BS Sangma jong ka Sadar Police Station la bthah ia u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem la bthah ba um dei ban pep na ka jingshah khot hajir hynrei lym kumta un ngat ha ka jingshah kem.Ha kane ka shithi khot hajir ki Pulit ki la buh ruh ia kiba bun ki kyndon, kiba kynthup ba kim dei shuh ban thaw ki jingkulmar hadien habud. Kane ka jingkhot hajir ka la bthah ruh ba ka HYC kam dei ban byrngem byrsit lane ka jingthaw kulmar ha ki bynta jong ka thanad Pulit, ki dei ban ïatreilang bad ki Pulit ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingtohkit bad kim dei ruh ban pynjot ne pynjah ïa kino kino ki sakhi ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka Case.Kum ban shu pyntip, hadien ba ka HYC ka la leit ban pynpra ïa ki 80 tylli ki ïing beaiñ ha Lum Survey u Deputy Commisioner jong ka East Khasi Hills u la pynngat ha ki kyndon bapher bapher jong ka IPC bad ha ka aiñ Meghalaya Maintenance of Public Order (MMPO) da kaba kynnoh ba kane ka dei ka kam beaiñ ba la shim ïa ka aiñ ha ka kti.Ka HYC ka la leit ban kyndang ïa kine ki ïing beaiñ ha ka sngi Palei jong ka taiew baladep hadien ba la ka ap kumba artaiew na ka jingpan por jong ka Sorkar kan lum shwa ia ki jingtip ba thikna ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jaka.Ha ka taiew ba ladep u DC u la khot da ka jingïalang ka ban long mynta ka Lah Sngi u Blei ban ïakren halor ka jaka sah ki poiwir ha Lum Survey da kaba khot lang ïa u CEO ka Shillong Municipal Board, Shillong Cantonment Board, ki nongmihkhmat na ka Defence Estate Officer, Guwahati bad ïa ka HYC hynrei la pyntip noh ba ïa kane ka jingïalang la pynsangeh noh.
title: KHOT HAJIR KI PULIT ÏA U PRESIDENT KA HYC BA PYNPRA ÏA KI ÏING HA LUM SURVEY

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla kaba la ïoh ïa ka jingbthah kaba bniah ban shim ïa ki lad jingïada na ka jingwan lynshop jong ka eriong Remal naduh ka miet 26 tarik Jymmang, 2024 bad ka ban dang bteng haduh ka 28 tarik Jymmang, 2024 ka la bthah ïa ki Deputy Commissioner jong ki District bapher bapher ka Jylla ba kim dei satia ban thiah hynrei ki dei ban long kiba peitngor baroh arphew kynta.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la kut ka jingïalang pyrkhat kam, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar ka long kaba la pynkhreh ban ai jingïarap ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka jylla lada jia kino kino ki jinglynshop kiba wan na ka bor jong ka mariang na ka daw ka jingwan iuhkjat jong ka eriong Remal.U la kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka Jylla ba kim dei ban khih khuslai hynrei ki dei ban ai ka jingïatreilang bad ki tnat treikam bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar Jylla, la ka long ha ki shnong ki thaw bad ha ki district.U la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar ka la pynkhreh lypa ïa ka song pisa ban ïarap ïa kino kino ki briew kiba ngat ïa ki jingtwa khyndew, twa ki ing ki sem bad kiwei kiwei ki jingjia ha ki 24 kynta ki ban sa wan.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah, ki district ki ban shah ktah bha na ka jingwan lynshop ka eriong Remal ki long ka West Jaintia Hills, ka South West Khasi Hills, East Khasi Hills bad ka Eastern West Khasi Hills.Haba kylli, u la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la don lypa T. 20 klur ka pisa ha kti ban ai jingïarap ïa kino kino kiba ngat ha ki jingjia kiba sngewsih katkum ka jingmynjur jong ki Deputy Commissioner.“Tang shu phah ïa ka jingmynjur (na ki DC) ka Sorkar kan mang noh mardor ïa ka pisa,” u la ong.Halor ka jingdon ki dieng ba la rim kiba buh jingma ïa ka leit ka wan bad ka jingim jong ki paidbah, u Bah Prestone u la ong ba ka tnat Forest ka dei kaba peit ïa kine.  “Ha Meghalaya, ki bun ki jaka khlaw, kiba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jong ki Syiem, ki Raid. Ïa kane, ngin hap ban ïashong pyrkhat lang bad ki kynhun bapher bapher ban ïakren sani bha shwa ban pynngat ïa ki dieng kiba buh jingma,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba ym tang ka tnat PWD, ka Municipal bad ka Urban Affairs kiba hap ban shim jingkitkhlieh ïa ka jingshlei um ki surok ha kylleng ka sor Shillong hynrei ka dei ka jingkitkhlieh lang jong ki paidbah.“Ngi ladep ithuh ïa ki jaka ba ju jia khah khah ka jingshlei um bad tang shu kut ka jinghap slap, ka tnat PWD bad ka Urban Affairs bad ka Shillong Municipal Board yn sa shna pynbna noh mardor ïa ki surok bad ïa ki nala,”u la ong.Ha  kaba ïadei bad ka jingai shuti ïa ki skul, u Bah Prestone u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka la ieh beit ha ka jingstad jong ki Deputy Commissioner ban ïasyllok bad ki Sub-Divisional School Education Officer (SDSEO).
title: PEITNGOR KA SORKAR JYLLA BA WAN LYNSHOP KA ERÏONG REMAL, BTHAH ÏA KI DC BAN YM THIAH

content: : Uwei u samla na ka shnong Japorigog jong ka jyla Assam ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Ranjit Das u la duhei ia la ka jong ka jingim hadien ba u la ngam jyllop katba u dang jngi ha wah Umtrew kaba don ha ka thain Byrnihat, Ri Bhoi District.  Kane ka la jia ha ka 26 tarik, Jymmang, 2024 ha ka por kumba 5:00 baje haduh 6:00 baje janmiet.Ka thymmei khubor ba la iohlum ka la iathuh ba une u samla u la leit kai sha wah Umtrew bad la ki paralok namarba ka dei ruh ka sngi U Blei ha kaba ki nongjngohkai pyrthei ki ju smat bha ban leit leit jngi ha kane ka wah.Ka jingngam jyllop jong une u samla ka la jia katba u dang jngi bad la ki paralok hynrei syndet syndet ha ka por kumba 5:00 baje eiei haduh 6:00 baje janmiet ka um ka la kiew kynsan bad une u samla lem bad ki paralok ki la pyrshang ban mih noh napoh ka wah hynrei ha kum kane ka por u Ranjit Das um shym la lah satia ban poi sha ryngkew tad haduh ba un da khlad noh watla ki paralok ki la pyrshang ban iarap pyllait im ia u.Tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ka Byrnihat Police Outpost bad ki bor Pulit ka Search and Rescue Team ki la leit bran bran sha wah Umtrew hynrei namar ka jingdum jong ka miet kim shym la lah satia ban sei ia ka met.Ia ka met jong une u samla, la ioh ban sei ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ha ka por kumba 11:00 baje mynstep ka kynhun jong ka SRT ka la ioh ban sei ia ka met jong u Ranjit Das bad pynkit noh sha Nongpoh Civil Hospital na ka bynta ban leh ia ka post-mortem.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.
title: ÏAP U SAMLA NA ASSAM BA NGAM JYLLOP HA WAH UMTREW, BYRNIHAT

content: Ki nongïalam ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la ai jingmut ïa ka Director General of Police (DGP) ka jylla ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang ba ka tnat Pulit kan thaw noh da ka kynhun kaba kyrpang ne Special Team jong ki Pulit kiba la tip bha shaphang ki kyndon jong ka NDPS Act khnang ba lada ki Pulit ki ïohkem ïa ki snar khaii drok, ynda la poi hakhmat ka Iingbishar, ki nongïasaid aiñ kin ym ïoh daw ban ïasaid na ka bynta ban pan jamin ïa ki snar khaii drok.Shwa ban pynsngew ïa ki mat kiba ïadei bad ka jingjyllei jong u drok ha ka jylla ka HYC ka la pynkup burom ruh ïa ka Kong I. Nongrang ha ka jingïakynduh ha kamra treikam jong ka ha Police Headquarter, Shillong.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Synrem u la ïathuh ba ka DGP ka la pyntip ba ka Sorkar Jylla mynta ka dang don hapdeng jingpynkhreh ban thaw ïa ka kynhun ki Ophisar Pulit ba kyrpang ne ka Special Team ki ban tohkit beit thik tang ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïohkem ïa u drok katkum ka NDPS Act.“Ngi la ai jingmut ïa ka DGP, ba ngi la lap ba ka jingpynshitom ïa ki briew kiba don bynta ha kaba die ïa u drok bad ngi ïohi na ka por sha ka por ba ki Pulit ki kurup ïa u drok uba shongdor da ki klur tyngka hynrei ngi lap ba kine ki briew kiba shah kem ki shah pyllait noh napoh ka Ingbishar namarba bunsien ka rukom tohkit ïa ka jingkem ïa ki nongkhaii drok ka bakla ne kam ïaid katkum ki kyndon jong ka NDPS Act. Ki Investigating Officer bad ki nongsaid aiñ ka Sorkar kim ïaid katkum ka NDPS Act, kiba shah kem ki lait jamin noh,” u la ong.“Ka DGP ka la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar ka dang pynkhreh ban thaw ïa ka Investigation Team ne ka kynhun tohkit jong ki Pulit Ophisar ki ban tohkit beit thik halor ki case ka NDPS Act,:” la ïathuh u Bah Synrem.“Ngi la ai jingmut ïa ka DGP ba ka tnat Pulit ka hap ban trei shitom bad ban trei dukhi ban pynthikna ba ka jingwanrah ïa u drok na kiwei pat ki jylla bad na kiwei pat ki ri kam dei ban long kaba suk ban rung hapoh Shillong bad ha kiwei ki bynta jong kane ka jylla Meghalaya,” ong u Bah Synrem.“Kumba ngi tip, ka Jylla Meghalaya kam pynmih hi ïa u drok, u drok uba poi ha nongbah Shillong bad ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya u dei uba poi na kiwei pat ki jylla bad na kiwei pat ki ri,” u la ong.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ka dei ka lynti ïaid jong ki nongkhaii drok katkum ba la paw ha ki lad pathai khubor na ka jingïohkem jong ki Pulit na ka por sha ka por ïa ki nongkhaii drok, une u nongïalam ka HYC u la ong, “ka East Jaiñtia Hills District kaba ka surokbah National Highway ka ïaid lyngba ban pynpoi sha kiwei ki jylla jong ka ri ngi ïohi ba ka jingïohkem ïa u drok ka long kaba bun. Ym tang ha East Jaiñtia Hills, hynrei wat surok lyngba ka Ribhoi District, kine ki dei ki ar tylli ki lynti kiba lehse u drok u ïaid lyngba sha kane ka jylla jong ngi.”“Ngi la ai jingmut ïa ka tnat Pulit ban tehlakam ïa ka jingwanrung jong u drok sha kane ka Jylla jong ngi da kaba ïatreilang bad kiwei ki Agency ne ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar Jylla ne jong ka Sorkar India ban pynthikna ba u drok uba dei ban poi ha Shillong um dei ban poi,” la ïathuh u Bah Synrem.“Ka DGP ka la pynthikna ba ka tnat Pulit kan trei borbah ba ka jingwanrah ïa u drok sha kane ka jylla jong ngi kan long kaba jynjar haduh katta katta bad ba ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam kin shem jingeh,” u la ong shuh shuh.U Bah Synrem u la ïathuh ba ka seng ka la pynkynmaw ïa ka DGP ïa ka section 317 jong ka aiñ Bharatiya Nyay Sanhita 2023 kaba kdew ba kino kino ki briew kiba thied ïa ki tiar ba uwei pat u briew u shu tuh, kin ngat ha ka jingshah pynshitom.“Ngi la ai jingmut ïa ka tnat Pulit ba kan ai jingpynshai paidbah halor kane ka aiñ khnang ba ki briew kin ym thied ïa ki tiar ba wanrah da ki nongdie drok kiba shu tuh na la ki jong ki ing ki sem,” u la bynrap.U la ong ba ka seng ka la pynpaw hakhmat ka DGP ba ka long kaba kloi ban ïatreilang bad ka tnat Pulit, ka Dorbar Shnong namarba ka seng kam kwah ban ïohi ïa ka jingjyllei ïa ka jingdih drok ka bym jia shuh tang ha sor Shillong hynrei u drok u la rung wat sha ki shnong nongkyndong.“Kaba ngi sheptieng ka long ïoh ba u drok u pynduhjait ïa kane ka pateng kaba mynta ka ban buh jingma ïa ka pateng ka ban sa wan. Shwa ba kata kan jia, ba ka jinglaitlan bad ka jingïohmon ban die ïa u drok kan kut noh ha kane ka pateng jong ngi mynta.
title: AI JINGMUT KA HYC ÏA KA DGP BAN THAW DA KA SPECIAL TEAM KI OPHISAR PULIT BA TIP BHA ÏA KA NDPS ACT

content: : Ka dorbar  shnong Erpakon ka la kyntait mardor ban iashim bynta ha ka jingialang ne ka Peace Meeting ba la khot da u Deputy Commissioner jong ka Ribhoi District ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei.Ka jingkhot jong u Deputy Commissioner ia kane ka jingialang ka long ban pynneh ia ka shongsuk shongsain ha ka shnong Erpakon hadien ka jingshah pyniap jong u Bah Kyrmen Lyngdoh Nonglait dang shen.Na ka liang jong u Deputy Commissioner u la khot ruh ia ki nongmihkhmat na ka dukan bam R.N. Sharma Hotel, ia ki trai iing bad ia ka Dorbar Shnong ban iathir iatai halor ka jingjia kaba la wanrah ia ka jingiap jong u Bah Kyrmen Lyngdoh Nonglait, ha kaba la kynnoh ba u la shah pyniap ha uwei u nongtrei jong ka dukan bam R.N. Sharma Hotel.Ka jingkyntait jong ka Dorbar Shnong Erpakon ka long ba ka la ieng skhem beit halor ka nongrim ban beh lut ia baroh ki bar jylla napoh ka shnong bad ban mana ruh ba kim bit shuh ban dang trei bylla ne leh ia ki kam khaii pateng hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Erpakon.Shwa kane, ka Dorbar Shnong, ba la ialam da u Rangbah Shnong u Bah M. Thongni bad u Secretary u Bah Lambor Kharshilot, ki la pynlong ia ka jingialang ha ka por mynstep ban iathir iatai halor ka jingkhot iakren jong u Deputy Commissioner, hynrei ka jingialang ka la rai beit da kawei ka sur ban ym leit iashim bynta satia ha ka jingialang.
title: PYNNEH BEIT KA DS ERPAKON ÏA KA RÃI BAN BEH ÏA KI BAR JYLLA, KYNTAIT ÏA KA JINGÏALANG U DC

content: U Bah Phurly Suting uba la 52 snem ka rta na ka shnong Umtasor, Ri-Bhoi District uba la shahkem ha ki Pulit ha ka 23 tarik Jymmang, 2024 halor ka jingsuba ba u dei uba donkti ban pynïap ïa uwei u samla ha iing sah jong u haka shnong Umtasor da kaba pom da ka wait nadien ryndang, u la khladnoh ha ka kti ki Pulit hadien ka jingshitom kaba la ktah ïa ka bor pyrkhat pyrdain.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ha ka miet jong ka 23 tarik u Jymmang, 2024 uwei u rangbah uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Amison Muruh uba la 35 snem ka rta na ka shnong Umtasor u la shah pyniap da kaba shah mait nadien ryndang da ki kynja tiar ba nep haduh ba un da mynsaw jur bad khlad noh na kane ka sla pyrthei.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la kem noh ïa u Bah Phurly Suting ha ka 24 tarik Jymmang, 2024.Katkum ka jingpyntip jong u Superintendent of Police ka Ri-Bhoi u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa, la iathuh hadien ba la kem ia u Bah Phurly Suting, ha ka jingtian bishar, ka Ingkashari jong ka Ribhoi District ka la aibor ban set lai sngi ha ka along jong ki Pulit na ka bynta ba kin ioh pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.  Hynrei ha ka 25 tarik u Jymmang, 2024 u Bah Phurly Suting u la sdang leh kulmar bad pynpaw ia ki dak ba don jingpang ha ka bor pyrkhat.  Ha kane hi ka sngi, ki Pulit ki la pynkit noh ïa u sha Nongpoh Civil Hospital ban ioh ka jingsumar hynrei na ka liang jong ki doctor ki la phah rah noh sha MIMHANS, Shillong namar ka jingpang kaba ktah ïa ka khlieh hynrei shuwa ban poi ha ka jaka sumar la pynbna ba u Bah Phurly u la khladnoh.Ia ka met jong u Bah Phurly Suting la pynkit noh sha ka jaka buh metiap ha Civil Hospital, Shillong ban leh ïa ka post mortem bad ringdur da ka jingsakhi lang da u Magistrate na ka ophis u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi, u Medical Officer jong ka Civil Hospital, Shillong da kaba bud ryntih ia ki kyndon jong ka National Human Rights Commission.Halor ka jingkhladnoh jong u Bah Phurly, ki Pulit ki la register ia ka UD Case ha Umiam Police Station ha ka 26 tarik, Jymmang, 2024 bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat.
title: SHWA BAN POI SHA JAKA SUMAR KHLADNOH UBA SUBA DONKTI BAN PYNÏAP ÏA U RANGBAH HA UMTASOR

content: Ka kynhun State Disaster Response Team ba la lamkhmat da u Sub Inspector M.A Thubru ha ka 27 tarik u Jymmang, 2024 ki la leit ban pyllait im ia ki phra ngut ki briew na kawei ka iing mala kaba don ha ka shnong Lumparing, Shillong na ka daw ka jingtwa jong ka khyndew hajan kane ka iing.Katkum u kyrwoh bad ki dur ba la phah da ka tnat Civil Defence and Home Guard lyngba u Divisional Commandant of Home Guards, Shillong bad Public Relations Officer jong ka Directorate of Civil Defence & Home Guards u Bah PH.  Shylla, la iathuh ba kane kajuh ka kynhun ka la hiar sa sha Bivar Road ryngkat bad ki Pulit ka tnat Fire & Emergency Services bad ki nongtrei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board ban pyllait im ia ki briew kiba sah ha Bivar Road, Shillong hadien ka jingtwa jong ka kynroh.  Ha kane ka jingjia, ia uwei u briew uba la mynsaw la pynkit noh sha Hopsital da ki paidbah nongshong shnong.Ha kawei pat ka jingjia, ha Rilbong ka kynhun State Disaster Response Team ba la lamkhmat da u Sub Inspector S. Dkhar, ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki nongtrei ka tnat Forest ki la ot noh ia ki dieng ba la buh jingma ia ki jingim jong ki briew.  Ka kynhun State Disaster Response Team ka la pyllait im ruh sa 14 ngut ki briew kiba sah ha ki jaka kiba ju jia khah khah ki jingtwa khyndew.Ha ka 27 tarik u Jymmang, 2024 ka kynhun State Disaster Response Force ka la pynkhuid ia ki dieng ba la khyllem ha Springside School ha ka shnong Malki, Shillong.Shuh shuh, namar ka jingwan lynshop jong ka eriong Remal ha West Jaintia Hills, ka Quick Reaction Team jong ka tnat Civil Defence and Home Guards District ba la lamkhmat da u Sub Inspector Y. Challam ha ka step 28 tarik u Jymmang, 2024 ki la pynkhuid noh ia ki synrum jong ki ding kiuba khyllem ha ka shnong Dulong kaba la pynwit ia ka leit ka wan jong ki kali bad kiba la buh jingma ia ka jingim jong ki paidbah bad ki nongiaid nongieng.Ka Quick Reaction Team jong ka tnat Civil Defence and Home Guards, West Jaintia Hills ki la pynkynriah ia ki dieng ba la khyllem ka shnong Khimusiang, Jowai.Ha Tura, ka kynhun State Disaster Response Team ka la iarap ia ki bor synshar district ban pynkhuid ia ki synrum jong ki ding kiba la shah pynkhyllem ha ka eriong ha Members’ Hostel Junction, Tura ha ka step 28 tarik u jymmang, 2024 bad kumjuh ruh kane ka kynhun ka la pynkhuid ruh ia ki dieng kiba la ngat ha ki sainar elektrik hajan Gandrak Dare ,Upper Chandmary ,Tura.Ha kawei pat ka jingjia, ka kynhun State Disaster Response Team ba la lamkhmat da u Inspector S.A Marak ryngkat bad ki nongtrei jong ka tnat Forest ki la lah ban weng ia u dieng uba la khyllem hajrong ka iing ha Lower Balsanang,Tura bad ha kane ka jingjia ym shym la don satia kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih.
title: PYLLAIT IM KI SDRF BAD CD&HG ÏA KI BRIEW NA KI ÏING BA JIA KI JINGTWA KHYNDEW HA SHILLONG

content: Ka jingwan lynshop jong ka eriong Remal kaba la sdang naduh ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai kaba la neh haduh ka 28 tarik mynta bnai ka la dkhat jubor ïa ka jingim jong uwei u briew ha ka shnong Sutnga Weilong, kaba hap hapoh ka Wapung C&RD Block, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Ïa une uba la khladnoh la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Ohimonmi Nongtdu, 27 snem ka rta.  U Bah Nongtdu u la khladnoh na ka jingtwa ka kynroh kaba la ban ïa ka iing ha ka dong Wailong, Sutnga kaba la jia ha ka por kumba 5:00 baje mynstep sngi Baar.Kane ka iing kaba la julor na ka jingtwa ka kynroh ka dei jong ka Kong Rati Nongtdu.Katkum kaiphod ba la pyllait da ka Executive Director jong ka Meghalaya State Disaster Management Authority (MSDMA) ha ka sngi Baar, la pyntip ba saw ngut ki briew ki la mynsaw na ka jingtwa ka khyndew harud ka surok Mawlai Bypass kaba hap hapoh ka Mawlai C&RD Block ha ka sngi Baar.  Ki saw ngut kiba la mynsaw ki dei ki misteri kiba dang ïohthiah ha ka iiing sher dara ba la jia ka jingtwa ka khyndew.  Ïa kine ki saw ngut la pynkit noh sha NEIGRIHMS Hospital na ka bynta ban ïoh ïa ka jingsumar. Katba uwei pat uba la mynsaw na ka jingtwa ka kynroh ha Bivar Road bad la pynkynriah noh sha Woodland Hospital ban ïoh jingsumar.Ka kaiphod ka la pyntip ruh ba 1222 ngut ki briew ki la shah ktah na kane ka jingwan lynshop ka eriong ha ka jylla baroh kawei kata naduh ka 26 tarik haduh ka 28 tarik mynta u bnai bad 233 tylli ki ing ki la shah pynjulor, 79 tylli ki shnong ki la shah ktah na kane ka jingsyllad ka eriong bad 10 tylli ki jingtei ki la julor ba kynthup ïa saw tylli ki skul, ka surok PWD, ka surokbah National Highway-6 bad ar tylli ki mobile Tower.La ïoh jingtip ruh ba ka don ka jingtwa khyndew ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka jylla.  Ka jingtwa khyndew kaba jur ka la jia ha Sonapyrdi Tunnel bad ki nongtrei jong ka National Highway Authority of India (NHAI) ki la trei shitom ban pynkhuid ïa ka khyndew.Ha West Garo Hills, ka eriong ka la syllad ïa ka shnong Rongkhon kaba hap ha Rongram Block. Ki dieng ki la khyllem bad ki nongtrei jong ki tnat PWD (R) bad ka tnat Forest ki la trei shitom ban pynkhuid ïa ka khyndew.Ha South West Khasi Hills, ka eriong Remal kaba la lynshop ha ka 27  tarik mynta u bnai ha ka shnong Mawten kaba  hap hapoh ka Mawkyrwat C&RD Block ka la pynjulor ïa kawei ka ing.Ka eriong ka la  lynshop ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ha ka shnong Dombah kaba hap hapoh ka Mawthadraishan C&RD Block bad kawei ka ing ka la julor malu mala.Ka kaiphod ka la pyntip ruh ba hynriew ngut ki briew ki la duh noh ïa ka ing ba la kem ding na ka jingshah pom ha ka leilieh bad shah lied ha ka eriong, khyllem ki dieng, dkut ki waïar elektrik ha ka shnong Rongrong Bolsongchok kaba hap hapoh ka East Garo Hills kaba la jia ha ka sngi Baar.Ka nongbah Shillong ka la sakhi ïa ka jingther jong u lapbah uba jur naduh ka Lah Sngi u Blei kaba la pynshlei um ïa ki surok bad ka um ka la rung wat sha ki thliewiing jong ki briew.Ha 4th Furlong u Tower Mobile Phone u la khyllem ha ka miet Lah Sngi u Blei bad pynjulor ruh ïa ka painkhana jong kawei ka ing.Ka leit ka wan jong ki briew bad ki kali ka la ktah na ka daw ka jingshlei um ha ka step sngi Baar namarba ka surok ha Langkyrding-Nongmensong ka la shlei da ka um na ka daw ka jingtheh khyndew ha ka nala ba ju tuid ka um bad ka jingshlei um ka surok ha Mawlai Nongpdeng kat haduh ba ka um ka la rung haduh ka thliew iing jong ki briew.
title: SYLLAD KA ERÏONG REMAL, ÏAP UWEI, MYNSAW 5 NGUT, JULOR 223 KI ÏING, SHAH KTAH 1222 NGUT KI BRIEW

content: : Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la rai ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingdon jong ki Village Defence Party (VDP) ban rat dyngkhong ïa ka jingjyllei jong u drok bad ki jingdih pynbuaid ha ka jylla Meghalaya.Ïa kane ka rai la shim ha ka jingïalang kaba la pynïaid da u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Baar ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki Ophisar na ka tnat Kam Pohing, Social Welfare bad bun tylli ki NGO kiba don bynta ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa u drok.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Paul u la ong ba la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ban bishar ïa ka jingïaid lynti jong ka Drug Reduction Elimination and Action Mission (DREAM), ki kam ba la leh bad ban peit kumno ban pyndap ïa ki jaka ba suda ha kaba ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingjyllei jong u drok.Haba kylli kiei ki lad ki lynti ba la shim ban tem ïa kane ka jingeh, u Bah Paul u la ong, “kawei na ki jingïathir ka long halor ka jingpynthymmai bad ka jingpynkhlaiñ ïa ki Village Defence Party khamtam ban wad bniah ïa ki jaka ba jur bha ka jingjyllei ki nongdih drok kynthup ïa ka nongbah Shillong.”“Kawei ka jingeh kaba pynsngewkhia bha ïa ngi ka dei ka jingdonkam ban pynlong ïa ki prokram ban pynshai paidbah.  Ngin ym kwah ban ïohi ba ka DREAM kan shu long tang ka kam jong ka sorkar.  Ka long kaba donkam ban pynduna bad ban rat dyngkhong ïa ka jingjyllei jong u drok bad ki jait jingdih pynbuaid, ngi donkam ban pynïaid ïa ka jingïatreilang jong ki shnong ki thaw,” u la ong.U la pyntip ba ha ki ar tylli ki jingïalang bad ki Dorbar Shnong, ka la mih ka jingmynjur na kiba bun ba ki Shnong ki dei ban ïatreilang ban ithuh bad ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingjyllei jong u drok.“Ha ka jingïakren mynta ka sngi, ngi la kham pynleit jingmut bad ngi la kham phaikhmat ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdon jong ki VDP ha ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei,” u la ong.U Myntri shuh shuh u la bynrap, “kawei na ki jingduna ïa mynta ka long ba ki Dorbar Shnong ki sngew ba kim shym la shah pynkupbor bad na ka bynta ki katto katne wat ban wad ne ban don bynta ha kaba shimti ïa uba shah kynnoh bad ban ujor pyrshah wat ha thanat ka long ka kam kaba eh na ka bynta jong ki.  Kane ka dei kawei ka bynta. Ngi la pyrkhat ruh ba ka jingïatreilang na ki shnong lyngba ki VDP kan long ka kam kaba paka bad ngin pynthymmai ïa ka jingdon jong ki VDP ha kylleng ka jylla.”Haba kdew katkum ka aiñ, u Myntri u la ong ba ka kamram bad ka jingtreikam jong ki VDP ka kynthup ïa ka jingïatreilang bad ki bor Pulit ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ, lada donkam ruh ban pahara ha ki shnong ki thaw na ka bynta ban khanglad ïa ki kam tuh kam thiem, ki kam runar ruser bad kiwei kiwei ki kam be-aiñ ban ïada ïa ki jingim briew bad ïa ki nongkynti bad ban khanglad shwa ban jia kino kino ki kam bymman.“Namarkata, u drok u hap hapoh u pud treikam jong ki VDP,” u la ong bad bynrap ba ki VDP kin sa ïoh ïa ki jinghikai kiba bniah ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingjyllei jong u drok.“Ngn sa khot shen ïa ka jingïalang jong ki dorbar shnong da kaba sdang shwa na nongbah Shillong,” la ong u Myntri.Haba kylli, u Bah Paul u la ong, “kam long satia kaba dei ban kynnoh ba ka Sorkar kam shym la ai jingkyrshan, ngi la ai jingkyrshan palat 9 tylli ki Deaddiction Centre bad ki jingsumar ki la ïaid shakhmat bad ka nuksa kaba dang shen ka dei ka Mawlai ha kaba ki nongïalam shnong ki la wan shakhmat ban ïarap ïa ki nongdih drok hynrei baroh ki jingdonkam kum ka bam ka dih, ka shong ka sah, ka jingïasyllok la bei pisa da ka Sorkar lyngba ka tnat Social Welfare.Ha kajuh ka por, katkum ka Meghalaya AIDS Control Society (MACS), ka la leh ïa ka jingwad bniah ha ki phra tylli ki district bad kumba 3100 ngut ki nongdih drok ki ngat ha u khñiang jingpang HIV/AIDS.
title: 3100 NGUT KIBA DIH DROK KI NGẤT HA KA JINGPANG HIV/AIDS, YN PYNKHLAIÑ KA SORKAR ÏA KI VDP

content: Shillong, Jymmang 29 : Ka long ka khubor kaba bha bad kaba sngewtynnad na bynta ki khun samla pule jong ka jylla haba ka tnad Ministry of Education, Government of India ka la pynbna ha ka sngi Balang jong ka taïew ka 29 tarik u Jymmang 2024, ba ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka jylla Nagaland kim donkam ban leh ïa ka Common Unversity Entrance Test (CUET) 2024.Ha ka jingpynbna halor kane, u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la thoh ha ka X da kaba ong, “Ka long ka jingkmen na bynta ki samla pule ba ka test na ka bynta ka admission na ki college kiba hapoh ki Central University ha jylla Meghalaya ki la lait noh na bynta kune u snem scholastic year.”Ka shithi na u Gopal Kumar, Under Secretary jong ka sorkar pdeng, Ministry of Education ka la ong kumne, “La bthah ïa nga ban pyntip shaphi ba ka UGC ka la shim ïa ka rai  halor ka jingkyrpad, ba la ailad ïa ki college hapoh ka jylla ban pdiang ïa ki admission kumba la ju leh ha kip or ba la dep bad kim donkam ban shim ïa ka CUET na bynta u snem 2024-25.”
title: PYLLAIT KA SORKAR PDENG ÏA KA MEGHALAYA BAD NAGALAND NA KA CUET 2024-2025

content: : Ka kynhun ki Pulit ka Home Guards & Civil Defence (CD&HG) ba la lamkhmat da u Sub-Inspector F. Lamare, ki la pynkynriah ia u dieng uba la ban ia ka kali bad ia ka iing jong u Bah Welson Shiangshai ha ka shnong Pamrakrai.U Divisional Commandant of Home Guards, Shillong bad PRO ka Directorate of Civil Defence & Home Guards Meghalaya Bah PH Shylla, u la iathuh ba ka Quick Response Team, kaba don ha Khliehriat naduh ka por 11 baje mynmiet sngi Baar ki la ioh ia ki jingpyntip halor ki jingjia haduh ka por 8 baje mynstep bad marmar ki la poi sha ki jaka ba la jia ha ka por 9 baje mynstep.  Ia ki dieng la weng noh mardor tang hapoh khyndiat kynta.U Bah Siangshai u la ai khublei ia ka kynhun CD&HG na ka bynta ka jingkloi ban ai jingiarap.Ha Tpeppale, West Jaiñtia Hills ka Quick Response Team ba la lamkhmat da u Sub-Inspector Y. Challam ki la hiar sha ka shnong Tpeppale ban pynkynriah ia ki dieng kiba la ngat ha ki waiar elektrik bad buh jingma ia ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah.Tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane, ka kynhun QRT ryngkat ki nongtrei jong ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) bad ka tnat Forest ki la pynkynriah ia ki dieng bad ia ki waiar elektrik.Da ka jingtrei shitom kaba la neh ar kynta la lah ban pynkynriah ia ki waiar bad ia ki dieng khlem da pynjulor ia ki nar post elektrik bad pynthud ia ka jingsam bording.Ha rilum Garo kaba la shah ktah na ka ering Remal, ka kynhun SDRF ki la leit ai jingiarap mar mar kylleng ki bynta jong k Division.  Da ka jinglamkhmat jong u Sub Inspector B. D Sangma, ka kynhun SDRF ka la ot ia ki dieng  kiba la khyllem ha ki sainar elektrik ha surok kaba poi sha college of Community Science, Central  Agricultural University,Sangsanggre,Tura ha ka sngi Baar.Ha Matchakolgre, Tura, ha ka sngi Baar, ka kynhun SDRF ba la lamkhmat da u Sub-Inspector B.D. Sangma, ka la pynkhuid ia ki dieng kiba la ngat ha u nar post elektrik bad ha ki waiar ha.Ha ka sngi Baar ka kynhun ba la lamkhmat da u Sub-Inspector B.D. Sangma ki la ot ia ki dieng kiba buh jingma ia kawei ka ing ha Babupara, Tura khnang ban pynthikna ba kiba sah hapoh ka ing kin ym mad ia ki jingjulor ha ki sngi ki ban sa wan.Ia mynta ka kynhun ka dang weng ia ki dieng kiba la khyllem ha Tura Civil Hospital.Ka kynhun Civil Defence & Home Guards (CD&HG) bad ka State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) ki la iai bteng ban trei shitom na ka bynta ban pynthikna ia ka jingshngaiñ jong ki paidbah da kaba ai jingiarap kyrkieh tang shu ioh jingtip.
title: BAN U DIENG ÏA KA KALI BAD ÏA ka ÏING HA PAMRAKRAI, ÏARAP KI CD&HG BAD SDRF

content: : Ka jingjia ki jingiap jyllop, khamtam ki samla, la ioh jingtip ba ki la jia ha shilynter jong ka Wah Umtrew ha Byrnihat, Ri Bhoi District. Dang shen, uwei u samla uba la 26 snem ka rta ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Ranjit Das na ka jylla Assam u la duhei ia laka jong ka jingim hadien ba u la ngam jyllop ha kane ka wah ha ka 26 tarik u Jymmang, 2024 na ka jingkiew kynsan jong ka um. Kane ka la jia namarba ka Meghalaya Electricity Corporation Limited (MeECL) ka la pyllait ia ka um khlem da pyntip paidbah ia ka jingmaham ban pyllait ia ka um.Ka wah Umtrew ka dei kaba khring bha ia ki nongjngohkai na ka jylla Meghalaya bad na ka jylla Assam, khamtam ha ki bnai lyiur.  Hynrei ka jingjia kaba la jia dang shen ka dei na ka daw ba ka MeECL kam shym la ai shwa ia ka jingpyntip khnang ban maham ia ki nongjngohkai pyrthei bad ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong shwa ban pyllait ia ka um.Ki nongpyniaid shnong ba kynthhup ia u Amit R. Marak bad u Romen Ronghang, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor kine ki jingjia bad kynnoh ruh ia ka MeECL ka bym shym la ai lypa ia ka jingmaham kumba ka ju leh ha ki por kiba la dep.Ha ki por ba mynshwa, ka MeECL ka ju ai lypa ia ki jingmaham ban pyllait ia ka um hynrei mynta ka kynti kam shym la ai satia ia ka jingmaham kaba lam sha ka jingduhei jong ki mynsiem briew kiba la ngam jyllop hapoh um.
title: BYM MAHAM LYPA KA MeECL BAN PYLLAIT UM, ÏAP EI U SAMLA HA WAH UMTREW

content: Arngut ki snar khaii drok kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Sumit Kumar Sinha, uba la 39 snem ka rta na ka shnong  New Majai, Bholaganj, East Khasi Hills bad u Rabindra Deka, uba la 27 snem ka rta na ka shnong  Khatarobori, Bhurbandha, Marigaon, Assam ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit jong ka Anti Narcotic Task Force ka East Jaiñtia Hills District katba ki dang wan na ka jylla Assam ban leit sha Shillong.Ki Pulit ki la ïathuh hadien ba ki la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah bha ki la pynlong ïa ka jingpynap shrip bad ki Pulit ka Traffic Branch jong ka Khliehriat Police Station ha ka miet sngi Baar ha Khliehriat bad dei ha ka por  kumba 1: 00 baje mynstep sngi Balang ki la ïoh bat ïa kawei ka kali bad ha ka jingkhynra ki Pulit ki la lap ïa ki dawai Yeba Tablets kiba khia  191.88 gram.Ki Pulit ki la Register Case pyrshah ïa kine ki ar ngut ki briew hapoh ki kyndon jong ka aiñ NDPS Act bad ka jingtohkit mynta ka la ïaid shakhmat.
title: KEM KI PULIT ÏA U SNAR KHAIÏ DROK BAR JYLLA UBA SAH HA NEW MAJAI, BHOLAGANJ

content: Shillong, Jymmang, 29: Ka KSU hadien ba ka la iohi lyngba ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi ba ka sorkar ka thmu ban phah pyniasoh noh ia baroh ki colleges ka jylla sha ka Williamson Sangma State University, ka pynpaw ia ka jingsngew kyndit namar ka sorkar ka khlem iathuh eiei hato ka la dep ia syllok ne em bad ki nongpyniaid bad samla pule colleges ka jylla halor kane ka rai. Kane ka rai ka dei kaba ktah ia ka im ka iap ki samla pule bad donkam ia ka sorkar ban ia syllok shwa bad baroh ki riewpaidbah khamtam ki nongpyniaid college, ki nonghikai, ki kpa ki kmie, ki samla pule bad ki seng bapher bapher ha shwa ban shim ia kum kane ka rai.Ka sor Shillong ka dei ka nongbah jong ka jylla bad ka KSU ka sngew ba ki bor ba dei khmih bad pyniaid ia ka pule puthi ki dei ban don ha Shillong ban pynsuk ia baroh lang.Ka KSU ka pynkynmaw ia ka jingjia ha u snem 2005 ha kaba ka la don ka jinghuri hura kum ka jinglait tuh ki kot jingkylli bad ka jingbym poi ki kot jingkylli (ha sector 1) kaba pynlong ia ka seng ban dawa regional administrative office jong ka MBOSE ha Shillong kaba la poi haduh u pud jong ka jingiakyad kaba jur ha kaba da ki phew ngut ki samla Khasi kynthup ia ki dkhot ka KSU ki la shah kem bad mynsaw jur ha ki jingiakhih. Ka jingwan jong ka Regional Office ka MBOSE ha Shillong ba khlieh da u Executive Director ka la iarap shibun ia ki samla ba pule ha ki colleges bapher bapher.Kyntang ia wai ka KSU ka pynsngew ba kumba 70% ki colleges ki don ha ka thain Mihngi jong ka jylla kata ha ka Bri U Hynñiewtrep, kan ym iahap ban iasoh (affiliate) bad ka University kaba don sha kawei pat ka thain kaba jngai na ka nongbah bad ka sorkar kan hap pynshai paidbah bha haba ka shim kum kine ki rai ban lait na ka MBOSE 2.0, ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u General Secretary ka Khasi Students’ Union u samla Donald V. Thabah.
title: DAWA JINGPYNSHAI KA KSU NA KA SORKAR BA PHAH PYNÏASOH ÏA KI KOLEJ SHA KA WILLIAMSON SANGMA STATE UNIVERSITY

content: Ka Committee on Government Assurances jong ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly, ba la lamkhmat da u Chairman Bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, ryngkat bad ki dkhot ba kynthup ia ki arngut ki MLA, Bah Gabriel Wahlang bad u Bah Matthew B Kurbah, ha ka sngi balang ki la leit ban jurip ia ka karkhana Mawmluh Cherra Cements Limited (MCCL) ha ka shnong Mawmluh, Sohra.Ki dkhot ka Committee ki la iakren ruh bad ki Ophisar jong kane ka karkhana ba la pyniaid da ka Sorkar, ia kaba ka Sorkar ka la rai kut ban khang khyrdep noh.Ka Managing Director jong ka MCCL, Kong W.A.M. Booth, u Chief General Manager jong ka MCCL Bah K. Lyngdoh bad kiwei pat ki ophisar jong ka karkhana ki la iashim bynta lang ban pynsngew ia ki jingeh jong ka karkhana hakhmat ki dkhot ka Committee.Ha ka jingialang, u Chairman jong ka Committee ula pynpaw ba kam don shuh ka jingkyrmen ia ka karkhana ban dang pynim biang sa shisien na kiba bun ki daw, kynthup ruh ka jinglut kaba jur ban pyniaid ia ka karkhana.Ki dkhot ka Committee da kawei ka sur ki la mynjur ban phah ia ka jingai jingmut sha ka Sorkar ban pynkylla ia kane ka karkhana kum ka Museum bad ia ki jaka sah jong ki nongtrei ka MCCL kum ka Resort, khnang ban plie lad ia ki nongtrei ba kin pyniaid ia ka Resort bad ia ka Mesuem.  U la bynrap, da kaba pynkylla ka phyllaw sha ka jaka jngohkai pyrthei, yn sa lah ban lum ia ka khajna.“Ngi tip ba ka sorkar ka kwah ban pynduh noh ia kane ka karkhana bad ban khangdam bad ban pynpra..hadien ba la peit bniah ia ka jingitynnat jong kane ka jaka bad iohi ia ki jaka sah bad ki ing jong ka MCCL, nga sngewsih ban pynpra ia ka,” la ong u Chairman.U dkhot ka Committee Bah Matthew B. Kurbah u la iathuh ba u la don ka jingiadei bad ka MCCL naduh u snem 1999-2000 bad u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewdiaw halor ka jingkhang khyrdep ia ka karkhana bad ia ka jingduhkam duhjam jong ki nongtrei.  U la mynjur ia ka jingtyrwa jong u Chairman, da kaba ai jingmut ba ia ka khana pateng jong kane ka karkhana yn sa lah ban iasam sha ki paidbah lyngba ka jingpynkylla sha ka Museum, bad ba ki nongtrei kin dup lah ban pyniaid biang sa shisien ia ki kam hapoh kane ka karkhana.Haba pynpaw ia ka jingsngewsih halor ka jingkhang khyrdep ia ka karkhana u dkhot ka Committee Bah Gabriel Wahlang u la pynpaw ia ka jingkyrmen ba ka Sorkar kan sas lah ban pynkhreh ia ka song jingiarap ka ban sa pynmyntoi na ka bynta ki nongtrei jong ka MCCL.
title: YN PYNKYLLA ÏA KA KARKHANA MCCL KUM KA MUSEUM, KI QUARTER KUM KA RESORT

content: : Saw ngut ki briew la suba ba ki la duhei ia la ka jong ka jingim hadien ba ki la shah tep im na ka jingtwa jong ka khyndew ha ka shnong Nongpriang, kaba hap hapoh ka Sohra Civil Sub-division, East Khasi Hills District.Ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team (SRT) tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia mar mar ki la leit sha kane ka shnong ban iarap sei ia ki briew kiba la sahkut ha ka jingtwa jong ka khyndew kaba la tep im ia ki briew kiba don hapoh ka ing, la iathuh ki Pulit.Ka thymmei khubor ba la iohlum ka iathuh ba ki briew kiba la shah tep im ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum Phisar Nongrum 75 snem, Kynmaw Syngai 70 snem, Benti Riahtam 60 snem bad Master Lumlang Riahtam 16 snem.
title: SHAH TEP IM SAW NGUT NA KA JINGTWA KA KHYNDEW HA KA SHNONG NONGPRIANG, EKH

content: : Uwei u nongrep na ka shnong Mookalangi Lapangap,West Jaintia Hills District ia uba la tip kyrteng kum Bah Tellmi Talang uba la 31 snem rta la suba ba ula shah pynïap dusmon ha ki runar kiba ym lah satia ban tip katba u dang don ha ka jaka rep kaba don ha khappud jong ka jylla Assam bad ka jylla Meghalaya.Ia ka met jong une u nongrep kaba la thiah lyngktar la lap ha ka step 30 tarik, Jymmang, 2024 ha ka jaka rep ha Khlieh Ladaw.Katkum ka khubor ba la ioh lum na u waheh shnong jong ka shnong Lapangngap u Bah Bah Deimon Lyngdoh ula iathuh ba une u nongrep ha ka step 29 tarik Jymmang, 2024 ula leit sha lyngkha ha ka por kumba 5:00 baje bad hadien ka jingbym poi iing ki bahaiing ryngkat bad ka shnong ki la leit wad ia u sha jaka rep hynrei la lap pat ia ka met jong u ha ka step kaba bud.Halor kane ka jingjia u waheh shnong ula pyntip sha ki Pulit jong ka Saitsama Outpost bad mar mar ki pulit ki la leit ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit bad ban pynkit ia ka met sha Jowai Civil hospital Ialong ban leh ia ka Post Mortem.Na ka liang jong ki bahaiing hasdem bad ka dorbar shnong ki la suba ba ia kane ka kam dusmon la leh da ki nongshun kiba nabar shnong bad katkum ka khubor la iathuh ba une u nongrep u don ki dak ki shin mong ha ki bynta ka shyllang khmat, na khlieh, na lyngkdong bad na shyntur.
title: SUBA SHAH PYNÏAP U NONGREP NA KA SHNONG LAPANGAP HA LYNGKHA HA KHAPPUD ASSAM

content: U Vice President jong ka  Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) Bah Donboklang Kharlyngdoh ha ka sngi Palei u la leit hajir hakhmat ki Pulit ka Sadar Police Station hadien ba ki Pulit ki la pynngat Case pyrshah ïa ki nongïalam jong ka HYC halor ka jingleit pynpra dang shen ïa ki iing jong ki briew kiba sah beaiñ ha Lum Survey.Ïa u Bah Kharlyngdoh la synran lang da u President u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem bad katto katne ki dkhot jong ka seng.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la mih na thanat hadien ar kynta duna eiei, u Bah Kharlyngdoh u la ong, “ka jingshah khot hajir jong ki dkhot ka seng ha ki Pulilt ka long kumba pynthymmai ïa ka laisen ieid jaidbynriew.U la ong, “ka jingleit hajir jong u ka long ban ai ka jingïatreilang bad ki Pulit ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingjia ha ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynpra ïa ki ing sah be-aiñ jong ki briew ha Lum Survey.”Haba buh jingkylli ïa ka Sorkar Jylla halor ka jingshah khot hajir na ka jingleit pynpra ïa ki iing ba la sah beaiñ da ki poiwir u Bah Kharlyngdoh u la ong, “hato (ka long) beaiñ (ïa) u nongleit shna ing ha jaka jong ki briew ne (ka long) beaiñ (ïa) u nongleit pynkhuid ïa ki nongshna ing ha ka jaka ki briew?  Hato ka long beaiñ ïa uba thmu ban pynkhuid bad ban rat dyngkhong ïa u drok ne long ka beaiñ ïa kito kiba thmu ban leit khot biang ïa ki briew na Assam kumba la kynnoh da ki nongdih drok kiba la shah kem ha ka seng ban wanrah biang ïa u drok ha Lum Survey.”“Dang kham lah kaba shah khot be-aiñ ba ieid ïa ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew ban ïa ki nongbat aiñ kiba arsap ki ban kylla long ka jingtim ïa ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew ïa ka pateng ba mynta bad kaba lashai,” u la bynrap.U President Bah Roy Kupar Synrem haba bynrap halor kane, u la ïathuh ba ka jinglap jong ka seng ïa ka jaka sah jong ki poiwir ha Lum Survey ka dei ka pdeng ban pynïaid iew ïa u drok ha nongbah Shillong.U la ïathuh ruh ba kane ka mih hi na ka shyntur jong ki nongdih drok kiba ka seng ka la ïohbat ha ka jingkhynra ïa ki nongdih drok ha kine ki taiew ba la leit noh.
title: KA JINGLEIT HAJIR HA THANAT KA LONG KUMBA PYNTHYMMAI ÏA KA LAISEN IEID JAIDBYNRIEW : VP HYC

content: : Ka jingther jong u lapbah lapsan na ka jingwan lynshop jong ka eriong Remal ha East Jaiñtia Hills District ka la pynshlei um ia ka surokbah National Highway-6 bad pyndkut ruh ia ka surok ha ka shnong Lumshnong..Ka jingbteng jong u slap ban ther ha ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ka la pynjulor ia ka surok kaba hap hapoh ka Elak Nongkhlieh.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum na ki nongshong shnong kiba lang ryngkat bad ki video, la sakhi ba ka eriong Remal ka la pynpra ia ka surok ha ka shnong Shnongrim bad pyntwa ia ka khyndew hapdeng surok ha ka shnong Tongseng.Da ki spah tylli ki kali ki la sahkut na kane ka jingtwa khyndew hapdeng ka surok bad ka jingpra jong ka surok kaba la buh jingma ia ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah.Ki nongtrei jong ka tnat PWD (R) ki la leit mar mar ban pynkhuid ia ka khyndew bad na ka liang jong ka tnat PWD (R) ka dang wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban kumno ban shna pynbha shipor ia ka surok kaba la pra ha ka shnong Shnongrim khnang ban pyllait ia ki kali kiba sahkut hapdeng surok.
title: PRA KA SUROK SHNONGRIM, TWA KA KHYNDEW HAPDENG SUROK TONGSENG

content: U Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills u S.C Sadhu uba dei ruh u Returning Officer (R) jong ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la lum jingialang ia ki nongialam jong ki seng sainpyrthei ka jylla ban iakren ha kaba iadei ka jingpynkhreh ia ka sngi ñiew Vote ka ban long ha ka 4 tarik u Jylliew, 2024Ki seng saiñpyrthei kiba iashim bynta ha ka jingialang ki long ka National People’s Party (NPP), ka Voice of the People’s Party (VPP), ka United Democratic Party (UDP, ka Indian National Congress bad kiwei kiwei.Haka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang, u MLA jong ka VPP na Mawlai constituency u Bah Brighstarwell Marbaniang u la iathuh hadien ka jingkyrpad jong ki seng saiñpyrthei na ka liang jong u Deputy Commissioner (DC) u la mynjur ban pynjari ia ka Section 144 CrPC tang ha ka jaka niew Vote, kata, ha Polo bad ha ki jaka marjan hynrei ym ha baroh kawei ka East Khasi Hills District.U la ong ba u Deputy Commissioner u la pdiang ia ka jingkyrpad jong ka VPP ban weng ia ka mat kaba san jong ka Section 144 CrPC kaba khang ban mih bad ban iaid paidbah ha ka sngi niew vote hapoh ka East Khasi Hills District.“Ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewtynnad ba u Deputy Commisioner u la mynjur ba ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Section 144 CrPC kan treikam tang ha jaka niew votes bad ha ki jaka marjan,” u la ong.U la iathuh ruh ba u DC u la pyntip ba un sa pynmih biang ia ka jingpynbna paidbah la kumno kumno ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei jong ka taiew ban sa wan.“Ngi kyrpad ia ki paidbah haba ki mih, ki dei ban long kiba jaijai namarba ioh ka pynthud ia ka shongsuk shongshngaiñ bad ban long kiba donakor,” la kyrpad u MLA jong ka VPP.U Working President ka NPP u Prof. Don War uba mihkhmat ia ka NPP u la iathuh ba ka jingialang bad u Returning Officer ka long ban pynsngew ia ka jingpyrshah jong ki seng saiñpyrthei ban pynjari ia ka Section 144 CrPC ha ka sngi ñiew vote kaba khang ban iaid paidbah.U la iathuh ba baroh ki sengsain pyrthei ba kynthup naduh ki nongmihkhmat ia ki kyrtong shimet ki la pynsngew ha u Returning Officer ba kam iahap satia ban pynjari ia ka Section 144 CrPC ha baroh kawei ka East Khasi Hills.“Ngi la pynsngew ha u DC ba ka sngewiahap ban pynjari ia ka Section 144 CrPC ha ka jaka niew vote ha Polo hynrei kam iahap pat ban pynjari ia ka hukum ha baroh kawei ka District,” u la bynrap.U la iathuh shuh shuh ba u DC u la pan na ki seng saiñpyrthei lada u/ka kyrtong jong ki seng kiba jop na kaei ka lynti ki iaid ha kato ka sngi.
title: WENG U DC ÏA KA SECTION 144 CRPC HA EKH, YN PYNTREIKAM TANG HA KA JAKA ÑIEW VOTE

content: Ki nongialam jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) South West Khasi Hills District Unit ha ka sngi palei ki la iakynduh ia ka Director of Health Services (MI) ka Dr. F.V. Kharshiing ban iakren halor ki mat kiba iadei bad ka koit ka khiah ha South West Khasi Hills District bad hapoh ka Mawsynram C&RD Block, East Khasi Hills District.Ha kajuh ka por ka seng hapoh ka jingialam jong u President u samla Forwardman Nongrem ka la banjur hakhhmat ka DHS (MI) ha kaba iadei bad ka jingthungkam Contractual palat 50 ngut hapoh ka Civil Hospital Mawkyrwat khlem da khot ia ka Advertisement hashwa ban thep ha ki post bapher bapher.Ka KSU lyngba ka jingthoh ba la aiti ha ka Director ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kabajur halor kane ka thungkam thungjam khlem da iaid ia ki kyndon ba la buh ha kaba ka la pynduh jingshaniah ia ki samla thepkam thepjam napoh ka District.Ka seng ka la dawa na ka Director ba ka dei ban shimkhia bad pynbeit halor kane ka mat thungkam thungjam hashwa ba ka seng kan shim da kiwei pat ki sienjam .“Ngi kyntu ia ka ophis ba ka dei ban pynbeit halor kane ka bynta da kaba pyllait ia ka Advertisement bad khot Interview khnang ba ki samla kin ioh ia ka lad ban iakhun ia ka interview. Ngi kyntu ruh ia ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban phah noh ia baroh ki post sha ka DSC ne MPSC ym ban buhrieh ia ki ha kane ka Civil Hospital khnang ba ka DSC ne ka MPSC kin ioh ban pyllait ia ka Advertisement bad ban khot ia ka interview khnang ba ki samla kiba dei hok ban iohkam kin ioh rung kum ki nongtrei hapoh ka Civil Hospital,” la ong ka seng.Na ka liang jong ka Director of Health Services (MI) ka la kular ba kan bthah ia u District Medical and Health Officer (DM&HO) South West Khasi Hills District ban ai jingtip ia baroh ki Post kiba lait hapoh ka Civil Hospital Mawkyrwat sha ka DSC ne MPSC khnang ba kin ioh pynbna noh mardor ia ka Advertisement bad ban pyndam noh ia ki nongtrei kiba rung na kyrpong ing.Ka seng ka pynsngew ruh hakhmat ka Director ban pynbha bad maramot ia ka Mawsynram PHC, ban shna kham stet ia ka Jyllep bad Mawhiang Sub Centre ia kaba la phah ban ai jingmynjur na ka bynta ban mang pisa lyngba ka PMABHIM, ban kyntiew ia ka Ranikor CHC sha ka First Referral Unit (FRU) CHC da kaba pynbiang ruh ia u Pharmacist ba thikna bad ka X-ray Machine hapoh kane ka CHC bad ban pynsted ha kaba iadei bad ka Pediatric Ward hapoh ka Civil Hospital Mawkyrwat.
title: DAWA KA KSU ÏA KA DHS (MI) BAN DA PYNMIH ADVERTISEMENT HABA THUNGKAM CONTRACTUAL

content: Shillong, May, 31: A review meeting was held on Friday by the Minister of Revenue and Disaster Management Kyrmen Shylla which was attended by Sanjay Goyal, IAS, Commissioner & Secretary, M. War Nongbri, IAS, Secretary, Revenue and Disaster Management department, and other government officials from SDMA.The focus of the meeting was on detailed review of various aspects of disaster management, particularly in connection with the recent Cyclone Remal and its aftermath. Discussions centered around the extensive damages caused by the Cyclone, including landslides and heavy rainfall that severely affected all districts of Meghalaya.Key points addressed during the meeting included : The extent of the losses including landslides, house damage, road and communication disruption, flooding etc incurred by the public of Meghalaya due to the disaster, the specific areas and infrastructure that suffered significant damage, the immediate and ongoing relief efforts being conducted.The meeting underscored the actions takes by various responders including SDMA, SDRF, Deputy Commissioners, the three line departments, the MeECL. These agencies have been instrumental in the relief process, providing timely assistance to those affected and working tirelessly to restore normalcy in the disaster-stricken areas.The Minister was also apprised of the preparedness measures, actions taken by State Emergency Operations Center, Districts, using Common Alerting Protocol (CAP) in dissemination of warnings/alerts, Emergency Response Support System (ERSS) all warning apps of government of India.He further emphasized the need for continued vigilance and preparedness to mitigate the impacts of such disaster in the future.The minister apprised of the ongoing search & rescue efforts at Nongpriang, relief measures and restoration works in all the districts. He will also make a visit to Nongpriang under Shella-Bholaganj C&RD Block on June 1, 2024.
title: MEGHALAYA REVIEWS CYCLONE REMAL AFTERMATH, MINISTER TO VISITS NONGPRIANG ON JUNE 1ST

content: U Myntri ka Sorkar uba khmih ia ka tnat Revenue bad Disaster Management u Bah Kyrmen Shylla ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la hiar sha ka shnong Nongpriang, Sohra Civil Sub-Division ban leit sngewlem halor ka jingkhlad noh ki saw ngut na ka ka jingtwa khyndew ha ka iing sah jong ki kaba la jia ha kine ki khyndiat sngi.La synran ia u Bah Kyrmen Shylla da u MLA ka Sohra u Bah Gavin Mylliem.U Bah Kyrmen Shylla lehse u lah ban dei u Myntri sorkar ba nyngkong eh ha Meghalaya u ban hiar sha ka shnong Nongpriang, ka shnong kaba ap ban iaid kjat kumba ar kynta eiei.Ia ka met jong ki saw ngut kiba la khlad noh kata u Bah Phisar Nongrum, ka kong Benti Riahtam, u Bah Kynmaw Sungai bad u Lumlang Riahtam la thang ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ryngkat ka jingiam briew kaba shyrkhei ha kane ka shnong.U Bah Kyrmen u la aiti ruh ia ka song pisa ba 4 lak sha ki bahaing hasem jong kine kiba la khladnoh.
title: HIAR U MYNTRI SORKAR SHA NONGPRIANG BAN LEIT SNGEWLEM IA KI SAW NGUT

content: Shillong, Jylliew, 01: Lai ngut ki khynnah rit ki la khladnoh na kane ka sla pyrthei katba kiwei pat ki dang don mynta hapdeng ka jingshitom kaba jur na ka jingbam ia u tit khlaw ha ka shnong Saphai, kaba hap hapoh ka Laskeiñ C&RD Block, West Jaintia Hills District.U Superintendent of Police ka West Jaintia Hills Bah Chemphang Syrti u la iathuh ba lai tylli ki longiing na ka shnong Saphai, West Jaintia Hills District ki la kem pang hadien ba ki la bam ia u tit buid.  Ia ki dkhot jong kine ki longiing la pynkit noh sha MCH hospital, Jowai da ki bahaing hasem na ka bynta ban ioh jingsumar.U la iathuh ba ka longing ba nyngkong ba la kempang ka dei na ka iing jong ka kong Jumonlang Suchiang 43 snem ia kaba la pynkynriah noh sha NEIGHRIMS Hospital ryngkat bad u khunrit uba dang 10 bnai kiba don mynta hapdeng ka jingshitom kaba jur.U Khun jong ka, u heprit Wansalan Suchiang 14 snem bad u heprit Kitlangki Suchiang  10 snem bad ka khun kynthei ka heprit Riwanka Suchiang 8 snem ki la khlandoh ha MCH Hospital, Jowai.U SP u la ong ba ka longing kaba ar kaba la kem pang ka dei na ka iing jong Ribaitki Shadap, Shanmi Shadap bad Sah Shadap  kiba dang don mynta hapdeng ka jingshitom kaba jur bad dang shah suumar MCH Hospital Jowai.Ka longing kaba lai ba la kem pang ka dei na ka ing u Bah Over Sutnga, ka Anna Suchiang bad Niwanshwa Kanai bad kine ruh ki don mynta hapdeng ka jingshitom kaba jur bad ki dang shah sumar ha MCH Hospital Jowai.
title: ÏAP LAI NGUT KI KHYNNAH HADIEN BA SHITOM JUR NA KABA BAM TIT HA KA SHNONG SAPHAI

content: : Ka la don ka jingiam briew  ha ka shnong Nongpriang ha ka por ba ki kynhun iarap ki la ioh ban sei ia ki met iap kiba la shah tap tyllep ha ka jingtwa khyndew kaba la ban  ia ki ar tylli ki iing ha kane ka shnong. Ka dei ka jingjia kaba pynsngewsih kthang ia ki nongshong shnong baroh namarba ha kajuh ka sngi ki don haduh saw ngut ki nongshong shnong kiba la iap ha kane ka jingshah lynshop ha ka bor mariang.U nonglum khubor jong ka Batesi Tv uba la leit sha ka shnong Nongpriang, u la ioh ban sakhi ha ryngkat ka jingring dur naduh ba ki kynhun iarap ki la sdang ia ka kam jong ki haduh ba kin da ioh sei ia baroh ki metiap kiba la shah tap tyllep ha ka khyndew kaba rben.La iohi ha kane ka Video ba ka jingiakhun ban sei ia ki metiap kam long kaba suk, nalor ba ki hap kraid ia ka khyndew tang da ki mohkhiew, la iohi ruh ba ki kynhun iarap ki hap ban pyntyllun ia ki mawbah tang da ka bor met jong ki namarba kim shym  la lah ban wanrah ia ki tiar ki tar kiba donkam namar ka jinglong riat palat kane ka shnong.Ka kynhun jong ka Search and Rescue Team, ka State Disaster Response Force, ki pulit ka Sohra Police Station ha ryngkat ka jingiarap kaba radbah jong ki nongshong shnong, ki la trei shitom thop naduh dang step haduh ka nohphai sngi jong ka sngi thohdieng ka 31 tarik u Jymmang 2024 tad haduh ban da lap ban sei ia baroh ki metiap kiba sahkut shapoh.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw biang sa shisien ba ha ka step phyrngab jong ka 30 tarik u Jymmang 2024 ha ka por 2 baje eiei, ar tylli ki iing ki la shah tap tyllep ha ka jingtwa khyndew ha ka shnong Nongpriang.  Ha kane ka jingjia ki la don saw ngut kiba la duh ei la ka jingim ba kynthup ia u bah Phisar Nongrum bad lai ngut na kajuh ka longiing kata ka kong Benti Riahtam , u lok jong ka u bah Kynmaw Syngai bad u khun jong ka u bah Lumlang Riahtam.Ha kajuh hi ka step kata ha ka 30 tarik u Jymmang la ioh ban sei ia ka met jong u bah Phisar Nongrum, ha ka step kaba bud kata ka 31 tarik u Jymmang la ioh ban sei sa ia ka met jong u bah Lumlang Riahtam bad khatduh eh shuwa ban dum ka bneng la ioh ban sei sa ia ka met jong ki shi kurim kata u bah Kynmaw Syngai bad ka kong Benti Riahtam, la ioh ban sei ia ka met jong ki kaba don marsyndah ha kajuh ka jaka.Hadien ba la lah ban  sei ia baroh ki metiap, ka la don ka jingia khublei mar kylliang hapdeng ki kynhun iarap jong ka sorkar bad ki nongshong shnong namarba dei lyngba ka jingiatrei shitom lang jong ki nongshong shnong la lah ban pyndep ia kane ka kam.Kum ka dak ka jingsngewlem halor kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih,  ka sorkar ka la pynbna ba kan ai jingiarap 4 lak tyngka marwei sha kiba haijng hasem jong kine kiba iap. Ki la don shibun ki kynhun kiba la pynpaw ka jingsngewlem halor kane ka jingjia kaba sngewsih, na ka liang ka Batesi Tv ruh ngi phah ka jingsngewlem sha kiba haiing hasem jong baroh kito kiba la khlad noh ha kane ka jingjia ka bym poi pyrkhat.
title: KA JINGIAM BRIEW HA KA SHNONG NONGPRIANG NA KA JINGTWA KHYNDEW

content: Da ka jingthrang ban rat dyngkhong ia u drok u jingdih ba sniew uba la sdang ban suh thied bha hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills, u MLA ka Mawkyrwat u Bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la lum da ka jing iakynduh lang ba kynthup ia ki Rangbah Shnong bapher bapher, u Syiem ka Hima Maharam Paiem Niandro Syiemiong, u MDC ka Mawkyrwat u Bah Carness Sohshang, u Bah Robatjone Kharjarin u ba dei u nongiasaid aiñ kynthup ia ki Seng Longkmie, ki Seng Samla Shnong bad baroh ki sengbhalang kiba don hapoh South West Khasi Hills District kum juh ruh ki kynhun Balang.Ha kane ka sngi la rai ban aiti da ka jingthoh hakhmat ka Sorkar Jylla bad ban kyntu ia ka Sorkar kan buh noh ia ka jaka ai jingsumar kum ka Rehabilitation Centre bad kiwei kiwei de ki jingdonkam hapoh ka district na ka bynta ki lad jingsumar ia kiba la ngop bad im kyrni ha u drok.
title: LAMKHMAT HI U MLA BAN RAT DYNGKHONG ÏA U DRUG HA SWKH

content: Shillong, Jylliew, 01: Ka jingiakhun pyrshah ia ki jingsniew ba laiphew jait khamtam eh u drok ha ka thaiñ Mawkyrwat ka la tyrha har bad mynta ka kynti ha ka sien ba nyngkong baroh ki Sengbhalang kiba don hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District, kata, ka KSU, HYC, FKJGP, HITO & HANM ki la iatreilang ryngkat bad ki bor shnong ka Mawkyrwat naduh ka VDP, Seng Samla Shnong, bad Seng Longkmie hapoh ka shatri jong ka Joint Action Committee on Social Organisation (JACSO) da ka jingthmu ban rat dyngkhong syndon ia u drok bad kiwei pat ki jingsniew, da kaba sdang nyngkong na Mawkyrwat.Hashwa ban pynbna paitbah sha ka pyrthei ia ka jingsdang treikam ka JACSO, ki bor shnong ryngkat ki sengbhalang baroh ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la pynlong ia ka jingkhynra drok bad khynra kyiad ha baroh kawei ka iew Mawkyrwat, hynrei la ioh kurup noh tang ia ki kyiad ba kynthup ia ka kyiad pyrsi bad kyiad phareng, hyrnei ki nongdie drok bad ki nongdih drok ki la phet iap lailum laiwah tang mar ia iohi ia ka jingkhynra.Hadien ka jingkhynra, la ai jingkren da u Chairman ka JACSO, Bah JF Iawphniaw, u GS ka KSU Mawkyrwat Cirle bad Secretary JACSO, samla Plosbor Kharjahrin, u Vice President ka Seng Samla Shnong Mawkyrwat, Bah Skhembor W. Nongrum, u President ka HANM SWKHD, Bah Lambokstar Marwein bad u President ka HITO SWKHD, Bah Paul Thyrniang.
title: BAN ïAKHUN PYRSHAH ïA U DRUG TYLLI KI SENGBHALANG HA MAWKYRWAT

content: : U nongialam ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) samla Lambokstar Marngar ula ong ba ka seng kam lah ban sngewthuh ia ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar ban pyniasoh ia baroh ki kolej bad ka Capt. Williamson Sangma State University kaba don ha West Garo Hills.Ha ka jingiakren bad ka Batesi Tv u samla Lambokstarwell Marngar, ula ong ba ka seng kam kwah ban don ka kynrum kynram kumba la long ha u snem 2005 kaba la don ka jingdkoh ha ka rukom treikam ka MBOSE ha Tura.U la ong ba ka rai ba la shim da ka sorkar ka long kaba syndet syndet khlem da don ka jingiasyllok bad ki nonngpyniaid jong ki kolej ha kane ka jylla.Katkum ka jingong u bah Lambokstar, “ha ka jingsngewthuh jong ngi, ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar ka long ba ioh lehse ka jingmih ka CUET eksam bad lada ki kolej ki ba don ha ka jylla ki iasoh noh bad ka Williamson State University kin lait na ka CUET eksam.”U la ong ba ka sorkar ka pheil ha baroh ki bynta namar ba ha ka jaka ba kan pynshlur bad ai mynsiem ia ki samla ba kin iakhun ia ka eksam bapher bapher ban shut ia ka jabieng jong ki, hynrei ka khein sting bad kam shym la shim ia ki lad ki lynti ban btin ia ki samla pule ban kyntiew ia ki sha ka kyrdan halor khnang ba kin lah ban iakhun pyrshah bad kiwei pat ki samla pule na kiwei pat ka jylla.Haba iadei bad ka CUET, ka seng ka pynshlur ia ki samla ba kin iakhun beit hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba ka sorkar kam shym la lah ban pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam.U la bynrap ba ka sorkar kam lah ban shu thet kti, namar kiwei ki jylla ki la pynkhreh shaid shaid ia ka CUET, hynrei katne snem ka sorkar ha kane ka jylla balei kam shym la lah ban pynbiang ban pynsuk ia ki samla.Halor ka rai ka sorkar ban pyniasoh ia ki kolej bad ka Capt. Williamson State University u bah Lambokstar, ula ong na ka liang ka seng , ha shwa ba kan shim ia kano kano ka sienjam ba khatduh, kan sa leit ban iakynduh ia ki Principal bapher bapher ban twad jingmut halor ka jingsngew jong ki.“Ynda ngi la lah ban lum thup ia ki jingai jingmut bad ki jingpysnngew ki kolej ngin sa shong pyrkhat ban pynsngew ia ka sorkar,”u la ong.
title: KA KSU KAM KWAH SHUH BAN MIH KI KYNRUM KYNRAM KUMBA LA JIA HA U 2005: LAMBOKSTAR MARNGAR

content: : Arngut ki snar khaii drok ki la shah kem ha ki shipai BSF jong ka 193 Battalion ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.Ki shipai BSF kiba la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ha ka jingpynap shrip ha surok ha ka jaka ba dang hap hapoh ka Ranikor Police Station, South West Khasi Hills District ki la ioh bat ia kawei ka kali Alto kaba dang thmu ban hiar sha khappud hajan ka shnong Ranikor.Ia kine ki arngut kiba la ithuh kyrteng kum u Joydeep Paul bad u Nabajit Sen, kiba sah ha East Khasi Hills DistrictHa ka jingtalasi ia ka kali, ki shipai BSF ki la ioh kurup 2,469 tylli ki dawai kuli Yaba bad 10 gram u drok Heroin.Ia u dawai kuli Yaba, ia u drok bad ia kine ki arngut ki snar khaii drok ba la iohkem la aiti noh sha ki Pulit jong ka Ranikor Police Station na ka bynta ban pynngat ia ki ha ki kyndon jong ka NDPS Act.
title: NA KHAPPUD KA SHNONG RANIKOR SHAH KEM ARNGUT KI SNAR KHAÏI DROK HA KI SHIPAI BSF

content: Shillong, Jylliew, 02: U MDA ka Tura u Bernard N. Marak uba long ruh u Vice President ka BJP ha ka sngi u Blei u la dawa ban thung mar dor ïa ka jingtohkit halor  ka jingtrei torti jong ka kompeni kaba shna ïa ka P.A.Sangma stadium.Ka kompeni kaba shna ïa ka P.A Sangma Stadium ka dei ka kompeni bymlarkam namarba kane ka dei ka sien kaba ar, ba ka kynroh ba la shna thymmai jong ka Stadium kan khyllem tang hapoh shi bnai baladep shna pura, ong u Bernard Marak ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.U Marak u la ong, bun ki jingorpait ba lah ban ïohi ha ka Swimming Pool bad hakhrum jong ka Stadium ba la shna thymmai. Haba ka kynroh banyngkong ka la kyllem, la ujor da ka ejahar hynrei ki Pulit kim shym la leh eiei pyrshah ïa ka kompeni bad mynta ha ka sien kaba ar ka kynroh ka la khyllem biang hadien ka jingther jong u lapbah uba jur.“Ka jingkhyllem ba manla ka por jong ka kynroh shisien ka sngi kan sa wanrah ïa ka jingjia ba sngewsih ïa ki mynsiem bakordor kiba shong basah hapoh ka dong.  Ki paidbah ki sheptieng bha tang shu jur u lapbah.  Ïa ka kynroh ba la shna da ki maw-it bad ym da ka kynroh kaba skhem wat haba la tip shai ba ka khyndew ka dei ka khyndew saw.  Ïa ka jingujor yn sa phah sha ka Ministry tang shu thaw ïa ka sorkar thymmai ha Delhi,” ong u Marak.U la ong ba ka lad kaba biang tam ba ïada na ka jingkhyllem ka kynroh ka long sa tang ban shna da ka kynroh kaba skhem ban ïada na ka jingshong synjor ka khyndew kaba lah ban wanrah shuh shuh ïa ka jingpynjulor ïa ka jingtei bad ïa ki nongshong shnong ba sah markhap.Ïa ka jingtrei torti dei ban pynsangeh noh mardor bad dei ban thung da ka jingtohkit khnang ban ïada na kine ki jingjia kiba shisien ka sngi kin sa wanrah ïa ki jingjia ba sngewsih.  Ki nongshong shnong ki shepting ïoh ba ka wan jia ka jingjia kaba lah ban jia ha ki sngi ki ban sa wan lada ki bor ba dei peit kim lah ban peitngor ïa ka jingtrei torti, la ong shuh shuh u Marak.
title: KHYLLEM KA KYNROH PA SANGMA STADIUM, DAWA TOHKIT MARDOR U MDC KA BJP

content: Ym tang ki kyrtong, hynrei wat ki 22 lak tam ngut ki paidbah nongthep vote kiba la pyndep ia la ka jong ka kamram ban leit thep ia ki vote ki jong ki ha ki Polling Station bapher bapher jong ka jylla ki la suhkpoh suh snier namarba ka sngi niew ia ki vote na ka bynta ka Elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha ka 4 tarik u Jylliew, 2024.Katkum ka jingai jingkheiñ jong u Chief electoral Officer (CEO) ka jylla ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, ki paidbah kiba leit thep vote ha ki Polling Station ha Shillong ki long 10,33,249 ngut bad 6,72,286 ngut ha Tura.  Na kine, 3884 ngut ki dei ki nongthep vote ba hap leit ia ki kamram elekshon, 2345 ngut ki dei ki nongthep vote ba la kynjoh ia ka rta kaba la 85 snem shaneng, 2272 ngut ki dei ki nongthep vote ba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet, 7413 tylli ki Postal Balllot na ki General Voters bad 2381 tylli ki Postal Ballot jong ki Service voters.Ki kyrtong kiba la aireng na Shillong Seat ki long u Sitting MP jong ka Congress u Bah Vincent H. Pala, ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba iakhun na ka NPP, u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin uba iakhun na ka UDP ba la pynieng da ka Regional Democratic Alliance, u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon uba iakhun na ka VPP bad sa arngut ki kyrtong shimet ba kynthup ia u Prof. Lakhon Kma bad u Bah Peter Shallam.Katba ki kyrtong kiba aireng na Tura Seat ki long ka Sitting MP jong ka NPP ka Agatha K. Sangma, u Saleng K. Sangma uba iakhun na ka Congress, u Zenith Sangma na ka TMC bad u Laben Ch. Sangma uba iakhun kum u kyrtong shimet.U CEO u la pyntip ba ka jingniew ia ki vote kan sdang naduh ka por 8 baje mynstep.  Ki don 369 tylli ki miej niew vote ha ki 7 tylli ki Districts na ka bynta ka Shillong (ST) PC bad 244 tylli ki miej niew vote na ka bynta ki 5 Districts jong ka Tura (ST) PC.Ia ka Mawlai Constituency yn niew haduh 9 sien namarba ka dei kaba bun tam ha ka jingdon jong ki nongthep vote.
title: 22 LAK KI NONGTHEP VOTE KIN RAI ÏA KA LAWEI KI KYRTONG NA SHILLONG BAD TURA

content: Ka Overseas Nursing Job Fair kaba la long ha u snem 2023 ka la long kaba jop hadien ba 27 ngut ki samla kynthei kiba pule Nursing na kane ka jylla Meghalaya ki la shah jied ban sdang noh ia ka lynti iaid kaba thymmai na ka bynta ban leit trei sha ka ri Japan hadien ba ki la pyndep ia ka jingshah hikai.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma u la leit ban iakynduh kyrpang ia ki arngut ki samla kynthei kiba la don sha ka ri Japan ban shakri kum ki Nurse ha ka Kobe Kaisei Hospital, Kobe, Japan. Kine ki arngut ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum ka samla La-i-kyrmen Khardesaw bad ka samla Jenisha Lyngdoh.Ki don haduh 27 ngut ki samla kynthei kiba la pynrung kyrteng hapoh ka NAVIS na ka bynta ka language training bad ka cultural immersion ha Bengaluru. Na kine, 25 ngut ki la pas ia ka N4 bad ia ka N5 examination tang ha ka sien kaba nyngkong bad ki la ioh pdiang ruh ia ka jingtyrwa rung kam.San ngut ki Nurse ki la ioh pdiang ia ka Visa bad arngut ki la leit sha ka ri Japan ha ka 27 tarik, Jymmang, 2024.   Sa kiwei pat ki dang ap ia ka Visa.  Haduh 14 ngut ki Nurse ki la shah thungkam ha ki hospital bapher bapher jong ka ri Singapore lyngba ki Agency bapher bapher bad kin sa ioh ban rungkam hapoh 3 bnai.Ka Sorkar ka la iasoi ia ka Dulir jingiasngewthuh jingmut bad ki saw tylli ki Kynhun ha ka 7 tarik Nohprah, 2023 ban ai jinghikai na ka bynta ka ktien ka thylliej bad ban pynrungkam ia ki samla ka Jylla Meghalaya ha ka ri Japan, United Kingdom, Singapore bad ha United Aram Emirates.Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la plie lad ia ki samla lyngba ka “Skills Meghalaya” Scheme, ha kaba ka la iarap pisa ruh mar T. 50,000 hajar lyngba ka Meghalaya State Skill Development Society (MSSDS). Lyngba kane, ka sorkar ka la buh hakhmat ia ka thong ban pyniohkam lai spah ngut ki Nurse ha ki snem ki ban sa wan.
title: 27 NGUT KI NURSE NA MEGHALAYA KIN LEIT TREI HA JAPAN BAD SINGAPORE, LEIT AI MYNSIEM U CM

content: Ki dkhot ka Hynniewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO) ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki dkhot ka Seng Samla Shnong Mawkyrwat (SSSM) ha ka step phyrngab Lah Sngi u Blei ha ka por 7:00 baje mynstep ki la ioh bat ia uwei u rangbah ia uba la suba ba u dei u snar nongkhaii drok hapoh ka shnong Mawkyrwat ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Khrawbok Namlein hadien ba kine ki ar tylli ki kynhun ki la trei shitom naduh dang saw tyngab ban ap ktem ia une u nongkhaii drok.Na ka met jong u Khrawbok, uba ju khot sin ruh da u Pylliaw, la ioh kurup ia u drok bad ia ki thyrnia injek ki bym pat pyndonkam.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ki nongialam ka HITO ki la iathuh ba ki la buddien bha la bun bun bnai ia ka iaid ka ieng jong u Khrawbok hadien ba ki la ioh jingtip ba u dei uwei na ki snar khaii drok.Ki la iathuh ruh ba ha kane ka sngi, shwa ban iohkem ia u, ki la buddien naduh ka por 4 baje mynstep hadien ba la ioh jingtip ba u la mih na iing ban leit buh ia u drok, hynrei namar ka jingshalak bad ka jingstad buit ka jong u ban kylliang kali kawei hadien kawei pat ym shym la ioh satia ban bat ia u ha ka por kaba biang.Na ka liang jong ka seng ka la aiti noh ia u Khrawbok sha ka dorbar shnong Mawkyrwat ban tian bishar ia u, bad hadien kane la rai ban phah ia u sha ka jaka ai jingsumar khnang ba un lait noh na kine ki kam sniew kiba u ju leh baroh shikatta.
title: ÏOH KEM ÏA U SNAR KHAÏI DROK, NADUH DANG SAW TYNGAB KTHONG KA HITO BAD SSSM

content: Ki nongialam jong ka Jaintia Students Union (JSU) ha ka lah sngi u Blei ki la iakynduh ia ka Director General of Police (DGP) ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang bad kyrpad ruh ba kan pynkhlaiñ ia ka jingtreikam jong ki Pulit khamtam ha ki shnong khappud jong ka rilum Jaintia.Ki nongialam ka seng ki la aiti ruh ia ka dorkhas ha ka DGP.Kawei na ki mat kiba hakhmat eh ba ka seng ka la kdew ha ka dorkhas ka long ban pynkhlain ia ki Border Police Outposts namar ka jingmih ki huri hura na ka por sha ka por ha khappud bad ka Jylla Assam namar ka jingshah pyndik jong ki Khasi Pnar ha ki paidbah ka jylla Assam.“Ki la jia bun ki jingshah pyndik bad ki jingshah pyniap ki briew jong ngi ha ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Assam kiba sah ha khapppud ka rilum Jaintia,” la pynpaw ka seng ha ka dorkhas.Ka JSU ka la kyntu ia ka DGP ban buddien ia ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar ba pynkha ia ki Border Police Outposts ha ki hynniew tylli ki jaka ba kham mih ki jingiakajia, bad kynthup ruh ha ka shnong Mukroh, Khanduli bad ha ka shnong Langpih.“Ngi ai jingmut ba phin shna pynbna ia ki jingtei ha kine ki Outpost, khamtam ha ka shnong Mukroh bad ha Khanduli. Ka jinglong jingman jong kine ki Outpost ka long kaba isangsot bad ki don ruh ki Outpost ba la shu tap tang da ki tin bad kane ka buh jingma ia ka jingim jong ki Pulit bad nalor kata, wat ka jaka ba don ka Outpost ruh kam dei satia ka thanat bapura,” la ong ka JSU.Ka Shnong Mukroh bad ka shnong Khanduli ki dei ki ar tylli ki shnong ba ki ju mih bunsien ki jingiakajia hapdeng ki nongshong shnong jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka jylla Assam.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ha u Naiwieng, 2022, hynriew ngut ki brirew, ba kynthup san ngut na Meghalaya bad uwei u Pulit pahara khlaw ka Assam, ki la iap ha ka jingsynreit kuli ki Pulit Assam ha ka shnong Mukroh.Ka JSU ka la kyrpad ia ka DGP ban pynkhlain ia ka Anti-Narcotics Task Force ha rilum Jaintia, da kaba pynpaw ba kane ka thain ka dei kawei na ki lynti iaid ba kongsan jong u drok shapoh ka jylla.Shuh shuh, ka seng ka la kyrpad ia ka DGP ban iarap lem ia ki samla kiba don ka jingangnud ban rungkam ha ka tnat Pulit bad ai jingmut ban pynlong ia ka Physical bad Written eexamination ha Jaintia Hills khnang ban pynduna ia ka jinglut jingsep jong ki samla wadkam.Ka seng ka la ai jingmut ruh ban buh ia u Women Helpline (WHL), ban treikam baroh 24 kynta khnang ban iarap ia ki kynthei bad ki khynnah kiba iakynduh ia kino kino ki jingeh bad ki jingshah thombor ha ka jingim jong ki.Namar ka jingjyllei ki kam khrong pisa, ka JSU ka la pynsngew ha ka DGP ia ka jingmih ki khyrdop khrong khajna kiba ktah ia ki nongrep bad ia ki kali kamai.
title: ÏAKYNDUH KA JSU ÏA KA DGP, KYRPAD BAN PYNKHLAIÑ ÏA KI PULIT HA KHAPPUD KA RILUM JAIÑTIA
