content: San ngut ki khun kynthup ia ka kmie ki la kem pang bad la pynkit mar mar sha Hospital hadien ba ki la shitom jur na kaba bam ia u tit khlaw uba buid ba ki la kheit na kawei ka khlaw kaba don ha ka shnong Saiden, Ribhoi District.Kine ki San ngut ki dei na kajuh ka longiing ki kynthup ia ka kmie ka Kong Larita Syiemlieh, u Wanphrangsngi Syiemlieh 23 snem ka rta, Daniki syiemlieh 16 snem ka rta, Larikynti Syiemlieh 14 snem ka rta bad u heprit Da-u-rajied Syiemlieh uba dang 3 snem ka rta.La iathuh ruh ba arngut napdeng jong ki, ki don hapdeng ka jingshitom kaba jur khamtam ka kmie.Mynta kine ki san ngut ki dang don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar ha Bethany bad ha Civil Hospital NongpohKatkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum la iathuh ba kane ka la jia ha ka sngi u Blei ha ka por ba ka kmie bad ki khun ki dang bamja miet ha ka por kumba 10 baje mynmiet. Dei ha ka por shiteng miet ba baroh saw ngut ki la shitom jur na ka jingbam ia u tit khlaw uba buid ha ka por ba ki dang bamja miet.
title: BA BAM ÏA U TIT BUID, POI HOSPITAL KA KMIE BAD KI KHUN NA KA SHNONG SAIDEN

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla da ka jingsngew sarong ka la pynbit pynbiang ïa ka jingpyllait ïa ka kot opng u nongthoh ba la ïoh khusnam u Dr. Kynpham Sing Nongkynrih, ia kaba la ai kyrteng, ‘The Distaste of the Earth, ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Meghalayan Age-The Store ha Connaught Place, New Delhi.Ha kane ka sngi, napdeng kiba la shah khot sngewbha, la sakhi lang da u Commissioner and Secretary jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya u Dr. Vijay Kumar, ka Editor jong ka Penguin Random House India ka Shubhi Surana bad kiwei kiwei ki nongthoh kot.U Dr. Kynpham u la ai khublei ïa kiba la shah khot sngewbha kiba la don bynta ha kane ka prokram kaba kyrpang bad u la ong ba ka kot kaba u la thoh halor ka “The Distaste of the Earth’ kan ailad ïa ki nongpule ba kin pynleit jingmut shaphang ka jingïadei bad ka mariang, ka jingkitkhlieh iwei ïa iwei pat bad ia ki jingangnud kaba mih nalade.U Dr. Vijay Kumar haba kren ha kane ka jingialang, u la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ka jingnoh synniang u Dr. Nongkynrih.Haba phai sha ka Meghalayan Age- The store, u la ong, “nga long uba kmen ba ngi la lah ban shna ïa kane ka jaka na ka bynta ka Art, Craft, Literature, Music. Kiba bun ki kam ki la jia hangne bad kane ka la pynlong ïa baroh kiba kmen bad kiba sngew sarong.”U Ambassador jong ka France, lyngba u Dr. Vijay Kumar u la phah ia ka jingai khublei ïa u nongthoh halor kane ka kam kaba khraw.Ha kane ka janmiet la sdang sa ka tem ka put da u Benedict Skhemlang Hynñiewta, kaba la pynshong shit ïa ka jingïalang, kaba la pynkut da kaba soi ïa ki kot bad kiba la iashim bynta ki la ïoh ka lad ban kynduh ïa u Dr. Kynpham Sing Nongkynrih bad ki la ïoh ïa ki kopi jong kane ka kot kaba thymmai ba dang shu pyllait.ïa u Dr. Kynpham Sing Nongkynrih, la kha ha ka shnong Sohra bad u dei u nongthoh ba la paw ha ka poetry, prose, bad ki drama ha ka ktien Khasi bad English.Ka kam kaba dang thymmai ka dei ka “The Distaste of the Earth,” kaba kynthup ruh ïa ki kot ban dang pynmih kum ka Epic Novel Funeral Nights (Westland/And Other Stories), The Yearning of Seeds: Poems (HarperCollins), Time’s Barter: Haiku bad Senryu (HarperCollins), bad ka Around the Hearth: Khasi Legends (Penguin).Ki kam u Dr. Nongkynrih ki la paw ha ka jingshon kum ka Planet, The New Welsh Review, PEN International, The Literary Review, The Oxford Anthology of Writings na kane ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi ka ri India bad kiwei kiwei.
title: PYLLAIT U DR. KYNPHAM NONGKYNRIH ÏA KA KOT ‘THE DISTATE OF THE EARTH’

content: Ka elekshon Lok Sabha kaba la long ha u snem 2024 ka la pynkyndit thret ia kiba bun balang ban tip ba ka iing ka sem jong u Purno A. Sangma (bam kwai ha dwar u Blei) kaba ju mihkhmat ia ka Tura Parliamentary Seat la 47 snem kynthih ka la mad ia ka jingshah rem ha kane ka kynti ha ka sien kaba nyngkong eh.Ia ka Tura Parliamentary Constituency la mihkhmat nyngkong eh ha u snem 1971 da u KK Marak uba la jop na ka tiket jong ka All Party Hill Leaders Conference. Hadien san snem, kata ha u snnem 1977 ia ka Tura la mihkhmat da u Purno Agitok Sangma na ka Indian National Congress haduh u snem 1984.  Hadien kane, naduh u snem 1988 haduh u snem 1990 u Purno u la wan phai sha ka jylla ban iakhun ia ka elekshon MLA ha kaba u la jop bad shah jied kum u Myntri Rangbah uba saw jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.  Ha u snem 1989 ka Congress ka la sei bujli da u Sanford Marak uba la long u MP ha u snem 1989 bad 1991.  Sa shisien biang u Purno A. Sanmga u la jop ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha naduh u snem 1991 ter ter haduh u snem 2005 kum u kyrtong jong ka seng Congress, kum u kyrtong jong ka Nationalist Peoples Party bad kum u kyrtong jong ka All India Trinamool Congress hapdeng kine ki snem.Hadien ka jingwan phai biang sha ka jylli jong ka sainpyrthei ha ka Jylla u Purno u la jop biang kum u MLA ha u snem 2008 bad dei ha une u snem ba ka ing ka sem jong u Purno A. Sangma ka la pynieng da ka Agatha Sangma ha ka elekshon shiteng samoi kaba la jop na ka tiket jong ka Nationalist Peoples Party.  Ha u snem 2009, ka Agatha ka la jop biang ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha tad haduh u snem 2014.  Ha u snem 2014 u Purno A. Sangma u la iakhun biang ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha naduh u snem 2014 haduh u snem 2016 bad u la khladnoh na kane ka sla pyrthei ha ka 4 tarik, Jymmang, 2016.  Ha u snem 2016, ia ka Tura Seat la mihkhmat sa u Conrad K. Sangma uba long u khun shynrang jong u Purno A. Sangma naduh u snem 2016 haduh u snem 2019 na ka National Peoples Party.Ha ka elekshon MLA kaba la long ha u snem 2019, u Conrad K. Sangma u la wan phai noh sha ka jylli jong ka sainpyrthei bad ha une u snem ka NPP ka la pynieng biang ia ka Agatha Sangma ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha kaba la mihkhmat ia ka Tura Parliamentary Seat haduh u snem 2024 bad ha kane ka kynti ba la pynlong ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha ha u snem 2024 ka Agatha ka la shah pynrem noh ha u kyrtong jong ka Seng Congress u Saleng A. Sangma.
title: HADIEN 47 SNEM MAD KA ÏING U PURNO SANGMA ÏA KA JINGSHAH REM HA KA ELEKSHON MP

content: : Ka National Democratic Alliance (NDA) kaba la lamkhmat da ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ka la lah ban jop 293 seat, katba ka kynhun INDIA ba la lamkhmat da ka Indian National Congress ka la jop 232 Seat ha ka Parliament kaba don 543 Seat ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ba la ñiew vote ha ka sngi Baar.Kiwei pat ki seng sainpyrthei barit bad kynthup ïa ki kyrtong shimet ki la jop 18 Seat.Katkum ka jingkheiñ ba la ai da ka Election Commision of India (ECI, ka BJP ka la jop 240 seat, ka Congress 99 seat, ka Samajwadi Party 37 seat, ka All India Trinamool Congress 29 seat, ka Janata Dal (United) – JD(U) 12 seat, ka Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam 22 seat, ka Telugu Desam 16 seat, ka Shiv Sena (Uddhav Balasaheb Thackrey) 9 seat, ka Shiv Sena 7 Seat, ka Lok Janshakti Party(Ram Vilas) 5 seat, ka Communist Party of India (Marxist) 4 seat, ka Yuvajana Sramika Rythu Congress Party 4 seat, ka Aam Aadmi Party  3 seat, ka Jharkhand Mukti Morcha 3 seat, ka Nationalist Congress Party Sharadchandra Pawar 7 seat, ka Rashtriya Janata Dal 4 seat, ka Indian Union Muslim League 3 seat, ka Janata Dal (Secular) 2 seat, ka Communist Party of India 2 seat, ka Rashtriya Lok Dal  2 seat, ka Jammu & Kashmir National Conference 2 seat, ka Communist Party of India (Marxist-Leninist) (Liberation) 2 seat, ka Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi 2 seat bad kiwei kiwei party ki la jop mar 1 seat. Ki kyrtong shimet kiba jop ki long 7 ngut.Ka BJP ka la kam ban thaw biang ia ka Sorkar ha ka sien kaba lai da ka jingiatreilang bad ki paralok kiba ka iatreilang.
title: ELEKSHON LOK SABHA 2024: 293 SEAT JOP KA NDA, 232 SEAT KA INDIA BLOC

content: Ki thylliej dieng barhem ki la pynkylla dpei ia kawei ka ing ba dang shu dep shna jong ka Kong Isila Kshiar ha ka shnong Pahamrïoh Them ha ka step phyrngap sngi Balang kat haduh ba ki jingdon jingem hapoh ka iing baroh kawei ki la kylla dpeiKane ka la jia ha ka por 3:20 baje eiei mynstep bad katkum jingtip ba la ïoh lum la ïathuh ba ka iing jong ka Kong Kong Isila Kshiar ka la kem ding kynsan na ka bynta jong ka iing shetja bad ïa ka daw jong ka jingsdang jong ka ding hapoh ka ïing ym shym la lah satia ban tip.Ka la ïathuh ba ha ka por ba ka iing ka la kem ding kam shym la don satia ha iing namarba ka leit ban sah ha ka jaka bylla jong ka bad u don tang u khun shynrang uba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet uba dang thiah lyngngai ha kawei ka kamra thiah hynrei u la ïoh ban mih noh na kamra thia hadien ba ka ding ka la klang.Tang shu iohsngew ia kane ka jingjia, ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka Pahamriioh ki la pyrshang ban ïarap pynlip ïa ka ding hynrei namar ka jingklang jong ki thylliej ding kim shym la lah ban leh eiei tad haduh ban da poi ka kali pynlip ding, hynrei baroh ki jingdon jingem ki la ingkhong khaid bad kylla dpei lut.U Secretary Shnong Bah Donroy Kshiar u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih halor kane ka jingjia bad kum ka shnong ruh ka la pyrshang ban ai jingïarap bad rai ruh ban pynshna biang ïa ka iing kaba thymmai. U la kyrpad ruh ïa ki bor ba dei peit kynthup ia ki nongmihkhmat ba kin phai khmat lem ban ïarap ïa ka longiing jong ka Kong Isila Khsiar kaba mad ïa ka jingduhnoh ïa ka ing ka sem.
title: BAMDUH KA DING ÏA KA ÏING HA PAHAMRÏOH THEM, LAIT IM U KHUN

content: Ki shnat treikam jong ka Khasi Student Union kiba la rakhe ïa ka sngi pynneh mariang (World Environment Day) ha ka sngi Balang ki la thung haduh 1050 tylli ki tynrai dieng ha kylleng ki shnong ha ri Khasi bad Jaiñtia.Ka Environment Cell jong ka KSU ka sngewkhia shikatdei eh halor ka jingkylla jong ka mariang khamtam ka suiñ bneng ha kine ki sngi. Ka jingduna u slap, ka jingshit kyrang bad kiwei ki jingkylla ka ktah bha ïa ka jingim ki briew hangne ha pyrthei. Ha Ri Khasi ka jingshit kyrang lyngba ka Global Warming ka pynjur ïa ka jingmih jynhaw um ha kaba ki um ki wah ki tyrkhong kloi kaba ktah pat ïa ka jingduna ha ka umbam umdih, ka rep ka riang bad ka jingtyrkhong ki shnong ki thaw, ong u kyrwoh na ka KSU ba la phah da u Environment Secretary u samla Shiningstar Kharbihkhiew.Ka jingduna sa u slap ruh ka dang pynshyrkhei shuh shuh ïa ka jingkyrduh um. Kumta donkam ban pynim biang ïa ka mariang da baroh ki nongshong shnong ka jylla da kaba pyrkhat thymmai ha ka rukom sngew ïa ka mariang, kata ban pynkhie im biang ïa ka bad ban pynkhlain shuh shuh ïa ka khnang ban shgaiñ ka lawei ka Ri, la ong u kyrwoh.Ha kane ka sngi, ka KSU Umpung Unit ryngkat ki khynnah skul bad ki nonghikai skul ki la thung ïa ki tynrai dieng ha ka shnong Umpung, South West Khasi Hills District. Kane ka Unit ka la thung kumba 100 tylli ki dieng.Ka KSU Upper Shillong Circle ryngkat ka KSU Sawmer Unit ha ka jing don ryngkat ki Self Help Group na ka shnong sawmer bad ka skul Sawmer Presbyterian Secondary School sawmer ki la thung 50 tylli ki tynrai dieng.Ka KSU Thangrain Unit, West Jaintia Hills District ka la thung 100 tylli ki tynrai dieng hapoh ka shnong Thangrain.Ka KSU Laban Circle ka la thung 400 tam tylli ki tynrai dieng ha khlaw Riat Laban bad ha ki skul kiba don hapoh Laban Pyllun ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u Rangbah Shnong ka Kynjat phutbal Bah Shepher Wahlang, u Secretary Shnong jong ka Madan & Riat Laban Bah Rupert G. Marbañiang ha kaba la sam ruh ïa ki tynrai dieng sha ki katto katne ki skul kiba don hapoh u pud treikam ka Laban Circle.Ka KSU Mawlai circle ka la thung ïa ki tynrai dieng kumba 300 tynrai ha ka shnong Umrynjah ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka Umrynjah Secondary School ba la sakhi lang da u Secretary jong ka School Managing Committee u Babu K. Thangkhiew, u Secretary ka shnong Umrynjah Bah L.kharshiing bad kiwei kiwei.Ha East Jaiñtai Hills ka KSU lyngba ka Environment Cell ryngkat bad ka shnong Rymbai lem bad ka tnat PHE ki la thung 100 tylli ki tynrai dieng hajan tyllong um ka shnong Rymbai ka jaka kaba kyrteng Phe Phe.Shwa ban thung ïa ki tynrai dieng, la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ba lyngkot ba la ai jingkren na u SDO ka tnat PHE East Jaintia Hills, na u Rangbah Shnong ka Rymbai bad na u samla Phanuel Tongper Environment Secretary KSU EJHD.Ka KSU ka la ïathuh ba ka sa ïai bteng ha kane ka taiew ban thung shuh da ki spah tylli ki tynrai dieng ha kaba ki tnat treikam jong ka seng ha kylleng ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep kin sa leh ïa kane ka bynta.
title: THUNG KA KSU PLAT 1050 KI TYNRAI DIENG HA KYLLENG KA BRI U HYNNIEWTREP

content: Hadien 15 snem ba u Bah Vincent H. Pala u la mihkhmat kum u MP na ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat ha kane ka kynti ba mynta hadien ka jingmih pyrthei jong ka Voice of the People Party u la shah pynliem noh ha u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon uba la tam kput haduh 3,71,910 vote.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne ba u Bah Vincent H Pala u la jop nyngkong eh kum u MP jong ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat ka long ha u snem 2009 na ka seng Congress bad u la long ruh u Myntri Khynnah uba khmih ia ka tnad Water Resources bad ka tnat Minority Affairs hapoh ka Sorkar United Progressive Alliance ba la ialam da ka Congress ha Delhi.Hadien kane, ha u snem 2014 u Bah Vincent H Pala u la shah jied biang kum u MP ha ka sien kaba ar bad kumjuh ruh ha u snem 2019 u la jop ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha ha ka sien ka balai.Dei tad ha ka election Lok Sabha kaba la long ha u snem 2024 u Bah Pala u la shah pynliem noh ha u kyrtong jong ka Voice of the People Party u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon.
title: MARSIEN MIH PYRTHEI KA VPP SHAH PYNLIEM U BAH VINCENT PALA HADIEN 15 SNEM

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths’ Council -Central Executive Council (HYC-CEC), ha ka sngi Balang ka la pynlait paidbah ia ka jingrwai ‘Bei Rymaw’, kaba khot ia u khun bynriew ban iada ia ka mei mariang.Ka jingrwai ka long ha ka sur kum ka jingkyrsiew thiah ia ka imlang sahlang ba kan shim la ka bynta ban sumar ia ka mariang.Ia kane ka jingrwai la thoh da ka nongthoh jingrwai bapaw ka Bri Hynñiewtrep, ka Kong Amabel Susngi, da kaba iarwai lang bad ka samla Kong Bahun Marweiñ. Ka jingrwai bad ka music video ka pyni bad ka kren ruh ia ka jingitynnad ki ranab lum bad ki them ka ri Khasi, kiba ym ju iohi koit ha kiwei pat ki jaka ka pyrthei.U President ka HYC, Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la ong, “haba ngi peit ia ka sawdong sawkun jong ngi, ngi sakhi ba ia ki wahduid la pynjaboh, ia ki khlaw la tan bad ia ka mei mariang la pyntngit. Kum ka seng ngi dap da ka jingsngewkhia kaba khraw ban kren ia kane ka mat bad ngim lah ban peit, hynrei ngi sngew ba ka don ka jingkhot ia ngi ban iawer ia baroh ban leh eiei ban iada ia ka mei mariang. Kane ka jingrwai, namar kata, ka khot ia ki paradoh parasnam ban pynkut noh ia ka jingleh thurmur ia ka mariang”“Ka jingleh beiñ leh khoh ia ka mariang ka dei kaba lah ban wanrah ia bun ki jingmynsaw, kumba ngi lah iohi ha ka jingjulor ba la wanrah da ka erlangthari ‘Remal’ dang shen. Ka jinghap noh jong ka khyndew bad wat ka jingduhnoh ia ki mynsiem briew ha ka jylla jong ngi bad ruh ha kiwei pat ki jaka, ki dei kiei kiei kiba ngi dei ban sngewthuh. Lada ngi ailad ia ki jingpynjulor, kata hi shisien ka sngi kan kyrtoh kylla bad kan wanrah ia ka jingsyier ia ka jingim,” u la ong.Ka jingpynlait paidbah ia kane ka jingrwai ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki kaitor bad ki nongthaw jingrwai, ka dei kum shi bynta ban rakhe iaka jingdap 10 snem jong ka HYC ka ban long ha ka 17 tarik, Naitung, kaba dei ruh ka sngi ba la seng ia ka.Ka jingkyrmen ka long ba ki briew kin sngap iaki kyntien jong ka jingrwai ba la thoh bad rwai ha ka ktien Pnar bad ktien Khasi Sohra.Ka Kong Amabel Susngi kum ka nongthoh ia ka jingrwai ka la ong, “ka khubor kaba don ha kane ka jingrwai ka long beit ban iawer ia baroh ban pyrkhat khia ia kane ka kam ban iada ia ka mariang. Ka jingpyndonkam ia ki jingtem tynrai kum ka Duitara, ka Ksing shynrang, ka Padiah bad ka Bom, ka thew ruh shaphang ka rukom im ka jaitbynriew Hynñiewtrep kaba iajan bha bad burom bha ia ka mariang. Ka jingpyrshang jong ka HYC, namarkata, ka long kaba dei por bha.”Ia kane ka jingrwai la pynbit pynbiang da ka kynhun Summersalt. Ka kynhun Summersalt ka la thoh shibun tylli ki jingrwai kiba kren ia ki mat kiba ktah mationg ia ka imlang sahlang da kaba khot bad wer ia ka jaitbynriew ban im adkar ryngkat ka jingkit khlieh.Ka jingrwai “Bei Rymaw’, ka dei namar kata ka jingiatrei lang hapdeng jong ka kynhun bad kiwei kiwei ki nongrwai ban kren ia ka jingshisha bad pynsngew ia ka jingdonkam ban iada ia ka jingai kaba U Blei U la ai ia ka ri Khasi bad Jaiñtia.
title: ‘BEI RYMAW’ KA JINGRWAI KABA KHOT ÏA U KHUN BYNRIEW BAN ÏADA ÏA KA MARIANG

content: Ka jingbym phaikhmat jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance ba la lamkhmat da ka National Peoples Party ban shna noh ia ka surok Nongpoh, Umden, Sonapur kaba la jot bad kaba la pynsuhsat haduh katta katta ia ka leit ka wan haba pang ba shitom bad ka rah ka rong jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka them Ribhoi, ka Kong Bindas Syiem marwei ka la tur ban leit shong shah thngan hakhmat ka ophis Main Secretariat ha ka sngi Palei.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ka Kong Bindas Syiem ka la iathuh ba ka jingshim ia kane ka rai ban shong shah thngan hakhmat ka Main Secretariat ka dei namarba ka sorkar ka la leh meinah bad leh matlah mynta la 15 snem kynthih ban shna ia ka surok Nongpoh, Umden, Sonapur kaba la jot haduh katta katta.Ka Kong Bindas Syiem ka la iathuh ba kan bteng beit ban shah thngan hakhmat ka Secretariat manla ka sngi tad haduh ba ka Sorkar kan da shna pynbna ia kane ka surok.Haba iathuh ia ka daw kaba pynlong ia ka ban mih shakhmat ka Kong Bindas ka la ong, “ialade ruh nga la mad, haba ngi pang ngi shitom ha iing ha sem, ngi la mad ia ka jingeh namar ka jingsniew palat ka surok, wat ki marjan marpa ruh ki la mad jingeh. Ka don ka paralok jong nga, kaba sah marjan bad ka shnong jong ngi, i don i khun ksiew iba pang jur bha bad ha ka por ba la pynkynriah na Umden PHC sha Nongpoh Civil Hospital, namar ka jingsniew palat jong ka surok u pipe jong u tyndong lyer (Oxygen) u la dkut .”Shwa ban shong shah thngan, ka Kong Bindas ka la iathuh ba ka la pan jingbit na ka ophis jong u Deputy Commisioner ka East Khasi Hills District hynrei na ka liang jong u DC ula phah pynban da ka jingpynshai ba pyntip ba ka Sorkar ka la mang ia ka skhim na ka bynta ban shna ia ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur.“Haba nga pan jingbit ban shong shah thngan, ka ophis u DC ka phah pynban da ka jingpynshai ba ka Sorkar ka la mang ia ka skhim ban shna ia ka surok. Ngam kwah ia ka jingpynshai hynrei nga kwah ia ka jingai jingbit,” la iathuh ka Kong Bindas.
title: 15 SNEM JOT KA SUROK NONGPOH-UMDEN-SONAPUR, HAKHMAT SECRETARIAT SHAH THNGAN KA KONG BINDAS SYIEM

content: Ka Kong Bindas kaba la sdang ïa ka jingshah thngan ha ka por 12:00 baje mynsngi ha ka sngi Palei ka la ïathuh ba ka la sdang ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingtlot jong ka met ynda la poi ka por 9:00 baje mynmiet.Ka la ïathuh ba kat haduh ka por 9:00 baje mynmiet ki doktor kim pat shym la wan leh satia ïa ka Medical Checkup ban peit ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ka koit ka khiah jong ka Kong Bindas Syiem.“Ïa mynta hi kam pat don eiei kaba pynshitom bad kaba ktah ïa ka met jong nga, nga long hi kumne kumba nga long, ka don tang khyndiat ka jingtlot haba kam don ka bam (ha ka met) hynrei haduh mynta kam pat don ka jingshitom,” ka la ong.“Haba nga wan shah thngan, nga khlem mut ban shu pynlong kum ka drama. Nga wan ban shah thngan da kaba khuid bad ngan shah thngan hi ruh shisha,” la bynrap ka Kong Bindas.Ka la kyrpad ruh ïa ki paralok kiba leit ai mynsiem ïa ka ban ym rah jingbam ne bam jingbam hapoh ka dara ba ka shong shah thngan ha Parking Lot hajan ka ophis Addl. Secretariat, Shillong.
title: SDANG BAN KA JINGTLOT ÏA KA KONG BINDAS HADIEN 9 KYNTA

content: Ki Pulit ka Ribhoi ha ka sngi Balang ki la ioh ban pyllait im ia ki lai ngut ki rangbah na Ri-Bhoi kiba la shah rah bor ha ki runar ha ka jylla Assam katba ki dang thmu ban leit thied puh shilum JCB.Kine ki lai ngut ki la lait im lyngba ka jingujor jong ka Kong Kirit Dohtdong sha ki Pulit ka Ribhoi hynnin ka sngi Baar ba u kurim jong ka ryngkat ki ar ngut ki paralok jong u, ki la shah rahbor ha ki runar.Ka Kong Kirit Dohtdong na ka shnong Mawlang Ri-Bhoi ka la ujor sha ki Pulit ba u kurim u Bah Ïohborlang Kharsati ryngkat ki paralok ïa kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Kostarwell Shylla na Lumdaitkhla Bhoirymbong bad u Samsul Ali na Byrnihat ki la leit sha Guwahati ban leit thied puhshilum JCB, hynrei dei ha ka por 4:00 baje eiei janmiet ka la ïoh ka phone call na u kurim ba ma u bad ki paralok ki la shah rahbor ha ki runar bym lah ban ithuh bad dawa pisa haduh 7 lak tyngka ban pyllait biang ïa ki.Mar mar ki Pulit ka Ri-Bhoi mynta ka sngi Balang ha ka por 9:00 baje eiei mynstep ki la hiar sha Nalbari District, Assam hadien ba ka jaka pyni ba da u kurim jong ka Kong Kirit u don bad na ka liang ki Pulit ki la pyntip ruh sha ki Pulit jong ka Nalbari DistrictDei ha ka por kumba 3:30 baje noh phai sngi la ïoh jingtip lyngba u Officer Inchagre jong ka Mukulmua Police Station ba ki la ïoh ban kem ar ngut ki briew kiba suba ba ki dei kiba donkti ha ka jingrahbor  ba kynthup ïa u Samsul Hoque bad u Abdul Aziz kiba dei na Nalbari District, Assam ryngkat kawei ka kali Ignis rong Blue ka bym don registration number kaba ki la pyndonkam.Ha ka jingtohkit jong ki Pulit, u Samsul Hoque bad u Abdul Aziz ki la phla ba dei ki dei kiba donkti ban rahbor bad ki la ai ruh ïa u number phone jong uwei pat uba donkti ha kane ka kam.  Mar mar ki Pulit ki la buddien ïa u number phone hadien ba ka jaka ka pyni ba u don ha Tihu National Highway ha kaba ki la pyntip noh sha Tihu Police Station ban leh ïa kaba donkam.Hadien kumba katto katne por ki Pulit ki la ïoh jingtip ba ki lai ngut kiba la shah rahbor ki la kynthih najrong ka kali ba ki shah rahbor, hadien ba u runar ba ñiah ïa ka kali u la pynphai biang shadien ïa ka kali namar ka jingdon jong ki Pulit kiba la pynap shrip ha surok.Ki Pulit ki la rah noh ïa ki lai ngut sha thanat, hynrei ki runar ba la rahbor ki la ïoh ban phet krad na katei ka jaka bad ki Pulit ki bteng ban pynlong ia ka jingthwet kaba jur ban ïohkem ïa ki runar.
title: SHAH RAHBOR LAI NGUT KI RANGBAH NA RI-BHOI ÏOH PYLLAIT IM KI PULIT

content: ïa ka met jong ki ar ngut ki nongbylla tih dewïong na Ri Bhoi District, kiba la shah tep im ha ka jingtwa ka khyndew kaba la set sbak ïa ka krem tih dewïong ha Tinsuki, Assam la lap ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ hadien ka jingwad ïa ka met jong ki haduh khatsaw sngi kynthih.Kum ban pynkynmaw hangne, ki arngut ki nongbylla kiba la shah tep im ha ka jingtwa ka khyndew katba ki dang leit bylla ha ka krem dewïong ha Tinsokia, Asssam ki kynthup ïa u Phingal Umbah 24 snem na ka shnong Shnah Tyrkhang bad uwei pat la tip kyrteng kum u John Nongrum 39 snem na ka shnong Umsohlait ha kaba dang shen ki la ngat ha kane ka apot kat haduh ba ki la duh syndon ïa la ka jingim.Kane ka la jia ha ka 24 tarik u bnai baladep ha ka por kumba 12 baje mynsngi. ïa ka met jong ki arngut ki nongbylla la ïoh sei da ka jingtrei shitom jong ka kynhun National Disaster Response Force (NDRF) bad ka State Disaster Response Force (SDRF).Ha ka jingïakren bad u Superintendent of Police ka Ri Bhoi District u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa u la pynthikna ba la lap shisha ïa ka met jong ki ar ngut  bad haduh mynta ka met jong ki ka dang don sha sha ka jaka ba la twa khyndew bad ki bahaïing kin sa leit ban shimti ban wan kit noh sha la shnong.U la ong ruh ba ki bor Pulit ka Ri Bhoi kin sa ai jingïarap ban leit synran ïa ki bahaïing na ka bynta ban leit shimti ïa ka met jong ki ar ngut ki nongbylla khnang ban pynpoi shaduh sha ka shnong jong ki.Ha ka jingïakren bad kawei na ki bahaïing jong uba la ngat ha ka apot twa khyndew, ka Kong Olida Mukhim ka la ïathuh ba ki la ioh jingtip ba la lap ïa ka met jong ki ar ngut bad na ka liang ki bahaïing ki dang pynkhreh ban leit sha katei ka jaka na ka bynta ban shimti ïa ka met ba dang sah jong ki ar ngut ki lanot.Ka la ong ruh da ka jingïarap lem ki bor Pulit na Ri Bhoi ki kyrmen ban leit lang sha ka jaka ba la ïoh set ïa ka met khnang ban lah ban pynpoi suk ïa ka met ba dang sah jong ki ar ngut sha ka shnong kaba ki sah.
title: ÏOH SEI ÏA KA MET KI AR NGUT NA RI BHOI BA TWA KHYNDEW HA KREM DEWÏONG HA ASSAM

content: Shillong, Jylliew 09: Ka jingwan jong ki missionary sha kane ka thain shatei lam mih ngi kala long shisha kaba ai jingmyntoi shi katdei eh ia ki riew lum jong kane ka thain ha kiba bun ki liang. Haduh mynta mynne ruh ka jingnoh synniang jong ki ka dang iai bteng.Ka jingdon jong ka jingiasyllok ki salesian of Don Bosco ha ka jylla jong ngi ruh ka long ka jingtrei kam ba jar jar hynrei kaba iarap pat khamtam eh ia kiba duk ba rangli bad ka jingdon jong ki khynnah ba duna ha ki dkhot met.Ha u snem 1989 ka kynhun ki salesian of Don Bosco hadien ka jinglap ia ka jingdon bun ki khynnah jem shyieng hapoh ka shnong Mawlai kila seng noh ia ka Caring for Children with Disabilities kaba don shadien jong ka Theological College hapoh ka jingpeit u Rev Father CM Jose.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingai dawai jem shyieng ki don ki doctor kiba la shu wan ban trei khlem jingsiew hynrei kila shu wan ban iarap ban ai jingsumar ia ki khynnah kiba don ka jingshitom bad ia kane ka medical camp la ju ynlong man u bnai kata ka sngi u Blei ha ka taiew ba nyngkong jong u bnai.Ia kane ka jaka ai dawai jem shyieng ka burom baroh ka leit sha kito kiba don ia ka mynsiem ban iarap bad khlem da jer kyrteng kila long kiba la kloi ban ai ka kti kamon bad ka kti kadiang ban pynlong ia kane ka jaka ai dawai ba kan long kumba ka long haduh mynta.Hadien ka jinglap ba ki dang don shibun ki long iing hapoh Mawlai kiba shu long pdeng ka jingduk bad ka jingkyrduh bad da ka mynsiem ban kyntiew ia ka pule puthi sha ki khynnah kiba wan na ki long iing baduk, ha u snem 2003 hapoh ka jingialam u Rev Father Mathew George kila seng noh sa ia ka skul na ka bynta ki khynnah baduk ba rangli khlem da don kam jingsiew ia kaba la tip kum ka Caring Literacy Programme, bad kane ka jaka ka don ha Sacred heart Boys Lower Primary skul ha Mawlai Phudmuri, Shillong.Ia kane ka skul haba ki khynnah skul ki wan kim donkam satia ban siew bai skul bad namar ba kam pat don ia la ka jong ka skul building, na ka liang ki father ki pynlong skul hadien ba la wai ki khynnah skul Lower Primary jong ka Sacred Heart, Mawlai.Ka Batesi TV kala ioh jingtip ba ki khynnah skul ynda kila dep ka jingpule na kane ka shlem ai jinghikai mynta hapoh ka jingpeit u Rev Father CM Jose ynda kila leit skul shawei ruh u iarap ban siew bai skul bad kyrshan ruh ia ki ha ka bai klas bad shibun bha kiba ioh kam ha ka jingim ka jong ki.Haba kylli ba naei ki ioh pisa ban kyrshan ia kine ki khynnah u Rev Father CM Jose u la iathuh ba u la ioh ia ka jingnoh synniang na ki para father, ki riew shimet bad kumjuh ruh kiba ha iing ha sem jong u.Ha kawei pat ka liang kala long shisha ka jingkyrkhu ba khraw na ka bynta ki paidbah kiba duk bad ba rangli kiba ym kot bor ban shna iing sha sem, hynrei da ka jinglong ba la kloi u Rev Father CM Jose u la lah ban iarap ia kiba duk ba suk da kaba pynshna iing ei ia 24 tylli ki long iing ha Nongkohlew.Ia kane ka dong ba shong basah kine ki 24 tylli ki long iing la jer kyrteng kum ka dong Don Bosco bad kane ka don mar pyrshah bad ka ranap lum ba jyrngam bha bad kane ka jaka long shisha kaba itynnad bha.Man kawei pa kawei ka long iing, na ka liang u Father ula ai ia ka pata ha ka kyrteng jong kine kiba ioh bynta bad kane ka shnong kala biang ruh halor ka jingdonkam ba man la ka sngi kum ka umbam umdih bad kumjuh ruh ka bording electric.Ban poi sha kane ka dong u Father u la hap ban pynlut ruh sa ban shna surok ka ban pynsuk ia ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan, hynrei haba phai sha ki nongmih khmat kam shym la don satia kiba long la kloi ban iarap na ka bynta ka surok bad la shu leh beit na ka bor jong u Father.Ban pyntikna ba kine ki briew ba kin pyndonkam hok ia kine ki iing ba la pynshna u father Jose bad ka shnong kila iateh kular ba kine ki trai iing kim lah ban die noh ia ka jaka ne ia ka iing hynrei ban aiti biang sha u father Jose lada kim kwah sah shuh khnang ban ioh ai pateng sha kiwei de kiba donkam.
title: DA KI KAM BA JAR JAR ÏARAP KA SALESIAN OF DON BOSCO ÏA KIBA DUK BA KYRDUH

content: U MDC barim jong ka Mylliem Constituency u Bah Sounder Strong Cajee u la khladnoh ha Bethany Hospital, Shillong ha ka sngi U Blei.U Bah Sounder u dei u President barim jong ka Federation of Khasi-Jaiñtia and Garo People (FKJGP) bad uba don bynta ban seng ïa ka seng saiñpyrthei People’s Democratic Movement (PDM), kaba la jop 3 ngut ki MLA ha ka elekshon ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ kaba la long ha u snem 1998.U dei u para jong u MLA bad MDC barim jong ka Mawlai Constituency u Bah Founder Strong Cajee bad u Pakhynnahduh jong u President ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit uba dei u MLA jong ka Nongkrem Constituency.U Bah Sounder u la ïakhun teng ïa ka elekshon MLA na South Shillong bad na Mawkyrwat Constituency ha ki snem ba ladep hynrei um shym la jop.Haba phah ïa u kyrwoh sngewlem, u President ka FKJGP u Bah Dundee C. Khongsit u ong ba ka FKJGP ka pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih kaba khraw halor ka jingkhladnoh kyndit jong u nongïalam barim ka FKJGP ba la pynkha ha u snem 1989.U la pynkynmaw ruh ïa u synñiang u bynhei jong u Bah Sounder bad ong ruh ba une u nongïalam ba la khladnoh u la rah bun tylli ki mat kiba ïadei bad ka jingrung kyrthep ki mynder bad u la pynbor ïa ki Autonomous District Councils (ADC) ban pynthikna ba ki bym dei ki riewlum kim dei satia ban ïoh trei ïa kino kino ki kam khlem da ïoh shwa ïa ka Trading License.“Ka jingkhladnoh jong u, ka la long ka jingduh kaba khraw ïa ka jaidbynriew Khasi baroh kawei,” ong u Bah Khongsit.Tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih, u MLA jong ka South Shillong Constituency Bah Sanbor Shullai u la phah ïa u kyrwoh sngewlem sha ka kurim bad sha ki khun jong u Bah Sounder ba U Blei Un pyntngen ïa ki ha kum kane ka por ba u lyoh badum u la tap ïa ka ing ka sem baroh kawei.U MLA ka Pynthorumkhrah Constituency Bah AL Hek u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih da kaba ong, “ka jingkhladnoh kyndit jong u ka la pynkynmaw ïa nga ïa kito ki sngi ba ngi la ïathir ïatai ban seng ïa ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia and Garo People, ka kynhun kaba peit ïa ka bha ka miat, ban ïada ïa ka hok jong ki trai jylla, Khasi, Jaintia bad Garo ka Jylla Meghalaya.”“U Bah Sounder u la long u President bad ma nga kum u General Secretary jong ka FKJGP, Central Body. Ngi la ïaid kylleng ki kyndong kynshrot jong ka jylla Meghalaya da kaba buh hakhmat ïa ka thong ban peit ïa ka bha ka miat, ban ïada ïa ka hok jong ki trai jylla ritpaid. Nga la ithuh ïa u la bun bun snem, u dei u briew uba bha bad uba la leh bun ki kam na ka bynta ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya,” la ong u Bah Hek.“Ngan ïaid kynmaw ieid ïa u Bah Sounder.  Nga duwai ruh na ka bynta jong phi Meban Donnam Saiborne bad Lapynhun Shisha Saiborne bad ïa kito kiba don ka jingïadei kaba jan bad u Bah Sounder,” la bynrap u Bah Hek.
title: KHLADNOH U BAH SOUNDER STRONG CAJEE, PHAH KYRWOH SNGEWLEM U BAH AL HEK, BAH SANBOR

content: U Myntri Rangbah duh ka ri u Narendra Modi u la bam smai ha ka sngi u Blei ryngkat bad ki 72 ngut ki Myntri ha ka Sorkar khleh khaw lang jong ka National Democratic Alliance (NDA) ba la ialam da ka BJP.Ki 30 ngut ki dei kiba don hapoh ka kynhun Myntri, kumba 5 ngut pat ki dei Myntri ba ioh peit laitluid ia ki tnat treikam (Indipendent Charge) bad 36 ki dei ki Myntri Khynnah. Ia ka jingbate kam yn sa pynbna noh shen hapoh shi sngi ne ar sngi.U Modi, uba la dap 73 snem ka rta un sa ïalam ïa ka Sorkar khleh khaw lang ha ka samoi treikam kaba lai kata naduh u snem 2014 hadien ba u la pynkhllem ïa ka Sorkar United Progressive Alliance (UPA) ba ia lalam da ka Congress kaba la bat ia u lakam synshar la kumba 10 snem.U Modi un dei u un dei u Myntri Rangbahduh ban shimti haduh lai sien hadien u Jawaharlal Nehru uba la ïoh ban bam smai haduh lai sien lai wat kum u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri.U Modi u la jop ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Varanasi Constituency da kaba ïoh kumba 1.5 lak vote.Ha ka jingialang bam smai ba la pynlong ha Rashtrapati Bhavan ka President Droupadi Murmu ka la pyntian smai ïa u Modi bad ïa u Rajnath Singh, ia u Amit Shah.  Ka khubor ka iathuh ba u Nitin Gadkari ruh u la shah pyntian smai lang ha kane ka sngi kynthup ruh u JP Nadda, Shivraj Singh Chouhan, ka Nirmala Sitharaman, u S. Jaishankar, bad u Manohar Lal Khattar ki la shah pyntian smai lang ha kane ka sngi.Kiwei kiwei kiba la shah pyntian smai ki kynthup ïa u HD Kumaraswamy na ka Janata Dal (Secular), u Khattar, u Lalan Singh bad kiwei kiwei.Katba u Narendra Modi u dang pynkhreh ïa ka jingbam smai kum u Myntri Rangbahduh ka Ri ha ka sien kaba lai, ki jingïamutdur mano ban ïoh ïa ka shuki Myntri ka la jur bha mynta.Lada dei ban ïakren ïa ka jingïoh shuki Myntri na ki Jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi, ha kane ka kynti ba mynta, imat tang lai ngut kin ïoh ïa ka shuki, kaba long jan mar shiteng na kaei kaba ïoh ha ka Sorkar Modi 2.0.Katkum ka khubor, u MP ka Lok Sabha na Dibrgarh, Assam u Sarbananda Sonowal, u MP ka Rajya Sabha bad u Press Advisor jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam Patriba Margherita, ki dei kiba la thikna ban ïoh ïa ka shuki Myntri.Nalor kine, u Kiren Rijiju, MP ka Lok Sabha na Arunachal Pradesh West, u lah ban shah kynthup lang ha ka kynhun Myntri bathymmai, ong ka khubor.Baroh kine ki MP ki la leit ïashim bynta ha ka jingkhot dihsha ha ïingsah jong u Modi shuwa ka jingïathaw Sorkar kaba la long mynta ka janmiet.
title: BAM SMAI U NARENDRA MODI BAD 72 NGUT KI MYNTRI, LAI NGUT ÏOH BAT SHUKI MYNTRI NA NORTH EAST

content: Ka Kong Bindas Syiem ha ka sngi U Blei ka la phah ia u kyrwoh sha ki tyndong skhor jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba ialam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ba ka long kaba kloi ban weng noh ïa ka jingshah thngan kaba khlem pud sngi tang lada ka ioh ia ka jingkular da ka jingthoh na u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Conrad K Sangma lane u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba peit ia ka tnat PWD (Roads)  ban shna noh mardor ïa ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ka Kong Syiem ka la ong, lada ka Sorkar ka kwah ba kan weng noh ïa ka jingshah thngan ba khlem pud sngi u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba khmih ïa ka PWD Bah Prestone Tynsong lane u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K Sangma ki dei ban ai da ka jingkular da ka jingthoh ban pyntrei noh ïa kane ka surok kumba nga la dawaKa la ong ruh ba ka jingbym pdiang ïa ka jingkular jong u MLA ka Nongpoh Constituency u Bah Mayral Born Syiem bad na u Executive Engineer ka PWD (Roads) Nongpoh Division ka long ba ka kwah beit ba ka jingkular kaba tikna ka dei ban wan na ka kti jong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba khmih ia ka tnat PWD ne na u Myntri Rangbah.“Lada ngam ïoh ia ka jingkular da ka jingthoh na ka kti jong ki, ngan ym ngeit bad ngan ym pdiang da leilei ruh,” ka la ong.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, ka Kong Bindas Syiem ka la sdang ia ka jingshah ia ka jingshah thngan ba khlem pud sngi ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai hakhmat ka khyrdop Main Secretariat.  Tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ki Pulit ki la ialam noh ia ka sha Parking Lot, kaba don hajan ka ophis Additional Secretariat, Shillong ban bteng ia ka jingshah thngan watla u Deputy Commisisoner ka East Khasi Hills District um shym la ai jingbit satia ban pynlong ia kane ka jingiakhih.Naduh ka sngi nyngkong, la sakhi ia ka jingtuid jong ki kynhun bapher bapher bad ki sengbhalang, kynthup ruh ia u MLA ka Nongpoh Constituency Bah Mayral Born Syiem ba la leit ai mynsiem ia ka Kong Bindas bad kyrpad ruh ia ka ban weng noh ia ka jingshah thnganHa ka miet shiteng synnia ka sngi Saitjaiñ, ki Pulit ba la lamkhmat da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi ki la leit sha ka jaka shah thngan jong ka Kong Binda da ka jingthmu ban rah ia ka da ka bor da kaba aidaw ban leit leh ia ka Medical Checkup.Ia kane ka jingthmu jong ki Pulit la pynpulom noh da ka jingtuklar jong ki paidbah kiba synran ia ka Kong Bindas ha kane ka jingshah thngan.
title: KLOI KA KONG BINDAS BAN WENG KA JINGSHAH THNGAN TANG LADA ÏOH JINGKULAR NA U CM NE MYNTRI PWD

content: Uwei u nongñiah trok u la shah pynïap dusmon ha ka shnong Mukhla Umsuwe, West Jaiñtia Hills District kaba don mar pyrshah bad ka Petrol Pump.Ïa ka met jong u nongñiah trok la don ïa ki dak ki shin ba shah dung ha ki bynta jong ka khlieh bad ha kiwei de ki bynta jong ka met la lap na kawei ka khlaw ha ki bynta ka Ladmukhla Umsuwe mar pyrshah bad ka Pnar Service Station.Ki Pulit hadien ba la ïoh jingtip ki la leit ban shimti na ka bynta ban pynkit noh ïa ka met ïap sha Jowai Civil Hospital, ban ïoh leh ïa kaba donkam.Ha ka jingwad bniah la tip kyrteng ïa une uba la shah pynïap kum u Bah Sambun Dkhar uba ñiah ïa ka trok kaba don ïa u nombar NL-01AC-6175.U Bah Sambun Dkhar u la shah kem teng ha ki Pulit halor ka jingkynnoh ba u dei uba donkti ban pynïap briew ha u snem 2023.
title: SHAH PYNÏAP DUSMON U NONGÑIAH TROK HA LADMUKHLA UMSUWE, WJH

content: : U MLA ka Congress na Gambegre u Saleng A. Sangma uba la shah jied dang shen kum u MP ka Lok Sabha un sa resaiñ kum u MLA ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei mynta ka taiew.U Saleng u la shah jied kum u MP ba thymmai ka Tura Parliamentary Constituency hadien ba u la jop pyrshah ïa ka Sitting MP ka Agatha Sangma kaba long ka kyrtong jong ka NPP.Katkum ka riti synshar jong ka ri, u nongmihkhmat paidbah um lah ban bat ïa ka kam kum u MP bad u MLA ha kajuh ka por.Hadien ka jingresaiñ jong u Saleng kum u MLA, kan sa don ka elekshon shiteng samoi ha Gambegre Constituency.Ka Congress kaba la jop 5 ngut ki MLA ha ka elekshon sha ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla ha u snem 2023 mynta ka don sa tang saw ngut ki MLA ha ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla kaba don 60 ngut ki dkhot.
title: YN RESAIÑ NOH U SALENG SANGMA KUM U MLA KA GAMBEGRE CONSTITUENCY

content: Hapdeng ka jingtlot jong ka met, ka Kong Bindas Syiem ka la kyntait banl leit sha Hospital hadien ba ka la shong shah thngan khlem pud mynta la san sngi kynthih ban dwa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan shna pynbha ia ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur.Ha ka nohphai sngi jong ka Lah Sngi u Blei mynta ka taiew, la sakhi ba ki doktor bad ki nongtrei ka tnat ka koit ka khiah lem bad ki bor synshar jong ka East Khasi Hils District ki la wanrah lypa ia ka kali Ambulance ban pynkit noh ia ka Kong Binda sha Hospital, hadien ba ki doktor kiba la eksamin ki la shem ba ka Blood Pressue ha ka met jong ka Kong Bindas ka la hiar bha.Ki doktor ki la iathuh ba ka Kong Bindas Syiem ka la kyntait ban leit sha Hospital wat hadien ba ki la shem ba ka met jong ka, ka la tlot shaba palat.Ka Kong Bindas ka la wah ruh hakhmat ka ïing sher dara ba ka shong shah thngan khlem pud sngi ha Parking Lot kaba don markhap bad ka opphis Additional Secretariat ia ka jingthoh kaba ong,
title: HIAR KA BP KA KONG BINDAS SYIEM, KYNTAIT ÏA KA JINGKHROH KI DOKTOR BAN LEIT SHA HOSPITAL

content: U MLA jong ka Mawhati Constituency Bah Charles Marngar uba dei u ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la leit jngoh ia ka Kong Bindas Syiem, ka nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Mawlong Nongtluh, Ribhoi District kaba dang bteng ia ka jingshah thngan kaba khlem pud sngi ha Parking Lot kaba don markhap bad ka ophis Additional Secretariat, ha Shillong.Ka Kong Bindas Syiem ka la sdang ia ka jingshah thngan ba khlem pud sngi naduh ka por 12:30 baje mynsngi ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai ban pyrshah ia ka jingbym shna pynbha ka Sorkar ia ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur kaba la pynsuhsat haduh katta katta ia ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan, ha ka rah ka rong bad khamtam eh ia ki bapang ba shitom.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Charles Marngar u la ong ba u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong uba khmih ia ka tnat PWD (Roads) da lade hi u la kren ban shna pynbha noh ia ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur hynrei haduh mynta kane ka jingkular ka shu sahteng khlem da poi shaei shaei ruh.U la iathuh ba ka jingslem ban wan jngoh ia ka Kong Bindas ka long namarba u bunkam ha kaba iadei bad ka jingwanrah ia ka met jong ki arngut ki nongbylla tih dewiong na Ribhoi kiba la khladnoh ha ka jingtwa khyndew ha ka krem tih dewiong ha Tinsukia Assam.“Kum uwei na ki nongmihkhmat na Ribhoi ngam lah ban shu sngap, namar ban shim kata ia kane ka rai ban shong shah thngan kam dei ka kam kaba suk,” u la ong bad bynrap ba ka jingshah thngan ka Kong Bindas ka dei ka rai rangbah ym tang na ka bynta ialade hynrei na ka bynta ki paidbah babun balang jong ka them Ribhoi.Haba kylli, u la ong, “ka don ka jingkthang mynsiem kumba long ine i kong lada ki jingkular kim long kam namarba na ka liang jong u Myntri uba peit ia ka tnat PWD u la kren bad pynbang hi da lade, hynrei katkum ka jinglap ka jingshem pat kam long kam.”“Ia ka jingsahdien ngim lah ban len jong kane ka surok da ki phew snem ba ngin iakren tang hapoh ka Nongpoh Constituency, hynrei wat ha ka Constituency jong nga (Mawhati Constituency) peit ka surok Mawrong ka jingjot ka bym long shuh ban iakren.  Naduh ki bnai tlang ki la kular ban leh, hynrei haduh mynta kim pat leh eiei. Ka surok Umtrai, u Myntri ba peit ia ka tnat PWD ha u snem baladep u la phah ia u Engineer bad la leh nadong shadong la thew la woh bad la leh ia ka Estimate hynrei haduh mynta ym pat leh eiei.  Dang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi, ki paidbah ha ka Constituency jong nga, ki phah ia ki dur ki dar ba ki kali ki kylla khongpong,” la iathuh u Bah Marngar.“Ia ki jingdonkam hapoh ka Constituency ngi ladep pynsngew sha ka Sorkar, hynrei ban jubab ia kane lehse kaei ka jingeh jong ka sorkar lada dei ia ka surok ngi kwah ba ka tnat PWD kan jubab bad kiwei kiwei ki tnat ruh kin jubab.  Lada iakren, ki jingkular ha ka por elekshon ki jingkular kiba heh bad kiba khraw hynrei hadien ka elekshon kham niar ban iohi ban jia ia kaei kaba la kular,” u la ong.
title: TANG HA KA POR ELEKSHON KI JINGKULAR KIBA HEH, SANGAH U MLA MAWHATI ÏA KA SORKAR

content: Ki dkhot ka Hynniewtrep Youths Council ha ka sngi Palei ki la pynpait ïa ka tala ba la teh kynjri ïa khyrdop jong ka paiñkhana paidbah kaba don ha Parking Lot hajan ka ophis Additional Secretariat, Shillong.Kane ka paiñkhana paidbah ka dei kaba la peit bad pynïaid da ka Sulabh International hadien ba la shna lyngba ka Corporate Social Responsibility Scheme jong ka Antrix Corporation Ltd na Bangalore kaba dei ka shnat treikam jong ka Sorkar.La lap ba ïa kane ka paiñkhana ka la khang tala shwa ka por ba ka Kong Bindas Syiemlieh kan poi ban shong shah thngan ha Parking Lot.Ïa ka tala jong ka paiñkhana la pynpait ha ka por kumba 8:45 baje mynmiet khnang ba ka Kong Syiemlieh kan ïoh ban pyndonkam na ka bynta ban leit pynjhieh bad ban leit paiñkhana katba ka dang shong shah thngan ha Parking Lot.
title: PYNPAIT KA HYC ÏA KA TALA KA PAIÑKHANA HAJAN ADDL. SECRETARIAT

content: Ki kynhun bapher bapher kiba la leit ban ai mynsiem ha ka sngi Palei ïa ka Kong Bindas Syiem kaba la shong shah thngan ha Parking Lot hajan ka ophis Additional Secretariat, Shillong ki la takraiñ tyngeh ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ïalam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP) kaba la leh meinah bad leh matlah ïa ka jingjot rathai jong ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur.U President ka HYC Bah Roy Kupar Synrem ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “kaba sngewsih ka long ba ïa kane ka surok kaba jngai kumba 58.16 kilomitar la shu ieh bein mynta da ki phew snem. Ka long kaba sngewsih ban tip ba na ki san snem sha ki san snem ki ban sa wan ki nongmihkhmat ki ïai kular bad ki ïai kren ïa ki ktien pynbiej ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka Nongpoh Constituency.  Lymda dei ba i Kong Bindas i mih shakhmat ban shah thngan sha Shillong ban pynbor ïa ka Sorkar ban shna ïa ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur namar bun tylli ki shnong kiba shaniah ïa kane ka surok.”“Ngi la ïoh jingtip ba ki don ki briew kiba shitom jur ha ka thaiñ ha kaba kim long shuh ban kit ha ki kali sha Nongpoh bad sha Shillong namar ka jingsniew shaba palat jong ka surok bad la shu hap ban shu kit ïa ki sha ki Hospital kiba don ha Assam,” u la ong bad bynrap, “don ruh ki khep ba ki nongshong shnong ki hap ban mad ïa ki jingjia kiba sngewsih namarba ka kali kaba ki shong ka jynjar ban pynpoi wat ha ki jaka ai jingsumar.”“Phim dei ban sngewdiaw bad ban duh mynsiem namarba ka HYC, kan don ryngkat ha syndah jong kane ka jingïaleh jong phi,” la ai mynsiem u President ka HYC ïa ka Kong Syiem.Haba kynthoh ïa ka Sorkar u la ong, ‘lah biang katto ka jingthok jingshukor jong phi na kawei ka por sha kawei ka por da kaba pynbiej ïa ki nongshong shnong ba luilui.  Khatsan tylli ki snem phi la pynbiej ba yn shna noh ïa kane ka surok hynrei katkum ka jingïoh jingtip ba ngi ïoh wat ki kot ki sla kiba paw ka long ba wat tang ïa ka pisa ruh ym pat mang na ka bynta ban shna ïa kane ka surok. Ka jingkylli, ka long ba kaei kata ka jingkular jong phi.  Phi ïoh aiu da kaba shu thok ïa ki paidbah, katba tang ka pisa ym shym la mang.  Ngi pynrem jur ïa kum kine ki nongmihkhmat, ngi pynrem jur ïa ka sorkar ka bym sngap ïa ka jingud jingnam jong u paidbah.U President ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO) Bah Donbok Dkhar ula ong, “ngi kyntu ïa ka Sorkar  hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Conrad K. Sangma ba un shim ïa kane ka sienjam kaba kyrpang. Kano kano ka ishu kaba la dawa da ki nongthep vote dei ban pynbiang.  Mynta ki dang wan shong hangne, peit ïoh ba kan poi ka por ba kin wan shong ha khyrdop iing jong phi.”“Ngi kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba kam dei shuh ban dang pynjrong ïoh ba ka ding kan nang klang.  Ngi kyntu ïa u MLA (Nongpoh Constituency) ba un buddien lem ïa kane ka kam. Ngi kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ban klet noh ïa ka jingsngew politik hynrei sdang noh ïa ka lynti kaba phi dei ban ïarap,” ula ong.U Working President ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) Bah Thomas Passah u la ong, “ngi hap ban kylli ïa u Myntri Rangbah, lada ka long kumne la 15 snem ïa ka Road Tax la shu shim kai.”“Phim dei ban sngew marwei, ngi don lang ban kyrshan ïa phi nadien ha kane ka jingïaid lynti jong phi. Ngi bun ki shynrang ngi duna ki rangbah. Marwei i mih ban kren bad ban pynsngew ïa ka jingeh jong kiba bun balang.  Ka surok kam dei tang ha phyllaw iing jong i hynrei ïa ka shnong baroh kawei,” ula ong.“Ngin peit kai haduh katno sngi ba ka Sorkar kan pynshong ïa ine i kong ha surok. Ngin peitkai haduh katno ka Sorkar ka don ïa u dohnud maw. Ngi khmihlynti ba kane ka sienjam ba i kong Bindas i la shim, khamtam na Ribhoi in ïoh ïa ka jingkyrshan ha ka jingïaid lynti marwei,” u la ong.U Finance Secretary jong ka State Executive Committee ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) Bah Danny Langstieh u la ong, “ha ka riti synshar jong ka ri India hapoh ka Article 19 (1) A, B ka shah ïano ïano ruh ban pynlong jingïakhih da ka jingjaijai khlem rah atiar.”“La 15 snem ka la ïaid khlem shna ïa ka surok (Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur), hynrei, dang mynta katto katne sngi, baroh ngi tip ba ka khang ka surok MES bad ka surok Goraline. Kato ka surok hapoh sor ka dei kaba dang bha hynrei ki shna pynheh na ka daw aiu ngim tip. Hynrei kine ki surok, ngam tharai ba kan sniew kumba ka long ka surok ha Umden kat haduh ba ki kali  Fou Wheel ki ïaid,” la kynthoh u Bah Langstieh.“Ha ki sngi ki ban wan, lada jia kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih mano ban kitkhieh. Kan kitkhlieh ka Sorkar? la buh jingkylli une u nongïalam ka VPP.“Ngi kyrpad ïa u Deputy Commissioner ba un ai jingbit ïa i (Kong Bindas) ba in pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih pyrshah hapoh ka Article 19 (1) a, b jong ka riti synshar ka ri,” u la ong.Ki nongshong shnong ki ïathuh ba ka kham jan ïa ki paidbah ban pynkit ïa ki nongpang na ka shnong Marmaiñ sha Assam bad ïa kaba leit kit sha Nongpoh bad sha Shillong.
title: BA LEH MATLAH ÏA KA SUROK NONGPOH-UMDEN-SONAPUR TAKRAIÑ KI KYNHUN ÏA KA SORKAR MDA

content: U Chief executive Officer (CEO) ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ha sngi Thohdieng u la ujor da ka ejahar pyrshah ïa ki briew kiba donkti ban lum pisa beaiñ ha ka kyrteng jong ki nongdie madan.Ha ka ujor ba la phah sha u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi, u CEO u la ong, “ngi la ïoh jingtip ba ki la don ki briew bym lah ban ithuh kiba la lum pisa da ka receipt kaba thok ha ka kyrteng jong ka SMB, na kiba shong dukan ha madan, ha kaba ka Town Vending Committee (TVC) lyngba kane ka ophis mynta ka la leh katkum ki kyndon jong ka Meghalaya Street Vending (Protection of Livelihood and Regulation of Street Vending), Scheme 2023.’“Kum ka jingpyntip sha phi, kam shym la don kano kano ka Registration Fee kaba la shim da ka TVC. Na ka liang ka ophis ka la ïohpdiang ïa ka jingujor na ka Meghalaya & Greater Shillong Progressive Hawkers & Street Vendors Association (MGSPHSVA),” ong u CEO.
title: UJOR U CEO KA SMB BA LUM PISA BE-AIÑ KI RUNAR NA KI NONGDIE MADAN

content: U MP ba thymmai ka Tura Parliamentary Constituency u Saleng A. Sangma na ka Indian National Congress (INC) ha ka sngi Palei u la leit ban ïakynduh ïa u President jong ka All India Congress Committee (AICC) u Mallikarjun Kharge ha nongbah Delhi ban ai khublei ïa u.Ha ka jingïaid lynti rta ha ka saiñ pyrthei u Saleng A Sangma uba la kynjoh mynta la 45 snem u la jop nyngkong ïa ka ilekshon MLA ha u snem 2008 na ka Congress na Dalamgiri, ka Constiuency barim.Ha ka ilekshon 2013 u la shah pynduh tiket bad u la ïakhun kum u kyrtong shimet bad u la jop biang kum u MLA Gambegre, ha u snem 2018 u la jop biang kum u MLA na ka Nationalist Congress Party (NCP) bad u snem 2023, hadien ba kam don shuh ka NCP ha Meghalaya u la pynïasoh biang bad ka party Congress.Ha kane ka MLA ilekshon 2023, ha Garo Hills la jop sa tang ma u marwei kum u MLA na ka party Congress, kum ka party ka la pynïeng ïa u kum u kyrtong MP ban ïakhun na Tura Parliamentary Seat bad ha kane ka jngïakhun u la pynrem ïa ka Agatha K Sangma kaba long ka Sitting MP ba la mihkhmat la lai sien kynthih ia ka Tura.
title: LEIT IAKYNDUH U SALENG ÏA U NONGÏALAM KA CONGRESS HA NONGBAH DELHI

content: : Ka tnat Social Welfare ka sorkar jylla Meghalaya ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka Home (Police) bad ki bor pynïaid District jong ka East Khasi Hills District, ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ïa syllok halor ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingjyllei jong u Drok ha kaba ha kane ka jingïalang ka la don ruh ka jingthaw ïa ki Village Defence Party (VDP) ha ka jingïadonlang ruh ki MLA bad ki MDC bad ki Dorbar Shnong jong ka Greater Shillong Area kaba la pynlong hapoh State Convention Centre, Shillong.Haba pynïaid ïa ka jingïalang u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u la khot ïa ka jingïatreilang jong ki nongshong shnong ha ka ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingkynrei jong u drok. U la banjur halor ka jingdonkam ban pynim bad ban thaw thymmai ïa ki Village Defence Party (VDP) naba ki dei ka nongrim ba kin peit bad ban khang lad ïa ki kam beaiñ hapoh ki kam shnong.Na ka liang u Myntri u la kyntu ïa kiba ïashim bynta ba kim dei ban ngeit ïa ki khubor ba la pynmih hapoh ki social media hynrei ba kin donkti ban wanrah ka jingkylla hapoh ka imlang sahlang. U la kyntu ruh ïa ki nongshong shnong ïa ka jingdonkam ban wanrah ïa ka sawdong sawkun kaba bha khamtam ïa ki khynnah bad ki samla pule.Ha kane ka jingïalang la donlang u Bah Vivek Syiem, Spl. Superintendent of Police (CID), Meghalaya uba la batai halor ki kam ba la shim da ki Village Defence Party ha ka ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa u drok. Katba Dr. Bethabra Decruse, Project Director Meghalaya AIDS Control society ha ka jingpynshai ka la batai halor ka Harm Reduction Programme for People Who Inject Drugs (PWID).Kane ka prokram ka dei ruh kum ka jingsdang jong ka prokram Drug Reduction Elimination & Action Mission (DREAM) kaba la pyllait paidbah ha u bnai Jylliew jong u snem 2023 kaba la thmu ban pynlong ïa ka jylla kaba lait na ka jingpyndonkam ïa u drok.Ha kane ka jingïalang la donlang u Shakil P. Ahammed, Additional Chief Secretary, u Sampath Kumar, Principal Secretary, Social Welfare Department, u Bah I. W. Ingty, Secretary, Social Welfare, ka kong Idashisha Nongrang, Director General of Police, Meghalaya nalor kiwei pat.U Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong, “mgi la pyrshang ban ithuh ïa ki katto katne ki jaka kiba donkam ban shimkhia ha kaba ïa kane la lah ban leh da ka jingkyrshan jong kiba bun ki dorbar shnong.”U la ong ha ka jingïalang bad ki 76 tylli ki dorbar shnong jong ka nongbah Shillong la rai ban sdang shwa ia ka jingkynrei ka jingpyndonkam ïa u drok.“Kumta ha kane ka jingïalang kaba la sdang mynta ka sngi la ïa rai ban thaw ïa ki Village Defence Parties (VDP), kiba long kiba biang bha ban ïakhun ïa kine ki kam runar kiba la sdang ban kynrei sha ki thaiñ nongkyndong kaba la sdang ban saphriang bad ha kane ka jingïalang la rai ba kiba bun ki dorbar shnong kin sdang ban pynkhreh ba thaw ïa ki VDP,” ong u Myntri.U la ong ba ha kaba sdang yn hap ban khmih bniah biang ïa ki kyndon kiba bun kiba la thaw ha u snem 2008, kumta ka la long kaba donkam ban pynthymmai biang ïa ki kyndon kaba long katkum ka jinglong jingman kaba mynta.“Ngi la shim ïa ki jingai jingmut jong ki dorbar shnong bad la buh por kumba 3 taïew haduh shibnai eiei ha kaba kin sa aiti ïa kiba bun ki jingtyrwa na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ki jingpynthymmai kiba la mynjur, bad hadien kane kiba bun ki dorbar shnong kin sdang ban thaw ïa ki VDP, ki ban ïarap ïa ki pulit bad kumjuh ruh ïa ka sorkar ha ka ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa u drok naduh ki shnong.“Ngi la rai ruh ba ki kopi jong ki aiñ kum ka PIT NDPS yn sa sam sha kine ki dorbar shnong bad ngin sa shim ïa ki jingai jingmut jong ki khnang ban lah ban pynbha ïa kine ki aiñ bad ki kyndon,” ong u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare.U la ong ruh ba la shim ka rai ban jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat ba kynthup ïa ki MLA bad MDC jong baroh kawei ka jylla ha kaba kan don ka jingïasyllok ha kaba yn lah ban pyntreikam bha ïa ka DREAM project.
title: NA SHILLONG YN SDANG KA SORKAR BAN IAKHUN THMA ÏA U DROK, YN PYNKHLAÏN ÏA KI VDP

content: Ka Kong Bindas Syiem ka longkmie na ka shnong Mawlong Nongtluh Ribhoi district kaba la don lai ngut ki khun, ka la pyneh beit triang ban weng noh ïa ka jingshah thngan kaba khlem pud sngi wat hadien ba u Executive Engineer ka tnat PWD (Roads) Nongpoh Division u la wan pynshai ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkular jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban shna noh ïa ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur.Ha ka nongphai sngi ka sngi Thohdieng u Executive Engineer ka tnat PWD (Roads) Nongpoh Division da lade hi u la wan poi ha ka jaka shong shah thngan ka Kong Bindas Syiem ha Parking Lot, kaba don markhap bad ka ophis Additional Secretariat, Shillong.U Executive Engineer ka tnat PWD (Roads) Nongpoh Division u la pynshai ha ka Kong Bindas ba ka Sorkar ka la pynkhreh ïa ka Detailed Project Report ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkhreh na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur.Hynrei ka Kong Bindas ka la pyneh beit triang da kaba ong, “ngan ym lah ban shu sangeh noh ïa ka jingshah thngan kumba nga ladep rai katba ngam pat ïoh ïa ka jingkular kaba biang na ka Sorkar ka ban pynthikna ba kan mang pisa na ka bynta ban shna noh ïa ka surok.”Watla u Executive Engineer u la pynshai ba ka mang tyngka na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka surok yn sa ïoh, hynrei ka Kong Bindas ka la pynphai ktien da kaba ong, “nga la thait ban sngap ïa ka jingong ban sa ïoh shi ban sa ïoh. Kata ka dei ka jingshisha namarba da ki phew snem ngin sa ïoh beit, ïai shah beit. Kata ka kyntien ïaishah, kata ka kyntien ïai ap, na ka liang jong nga, ka la kdang nga la ngiah. Katba ngam pat ïoh ïa ka jingkular kaba thikna na ka liang jong nga ngan ym pat weng daleilei ruh em ïa ka jingshah thngan jong nga.”U la pynpaw ruh ha ka Kong Bindas ba ynda ka tnat PWD (Road) ka la ïoh ïa ka jingmynjur un sa wan biang sha Shillong ban pyni ha ka khnang ba kan weng noh ïa ka jingshah thngan kaba ktah ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ka kum ka kynthei.Hynrei ka Kong Bindas ka la phai ktien, “ym leilei Sir, na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong u paidbah, na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong u paidbah bad na ka bynta ka hok jong u paidbah, ym leilei, kumba nga ong lada ngan ïap hangne ruh ym leilei, kumba nga kwah ban ïoh ïa ka hok jong u paidbah.”Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Executive Engineer ka tnat PWD (Roads) Nongpoh Division u la ïathuh katkum ka jingong jong u Bah Prestone Tynsong uba long u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba khmih ïa ka tnat PWD (Roads) ha shwa ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka treikam noh ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) ka jingthmu ban shna ïa ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur ka sahkut noh.“Ïa ki kot ki sla ba ngi la ai ka la biang hynrei mynta ka shong sa tang ha ka jingai jingmynjur,” u la ong.Shwa kane, hadien ba ka jingshah thngan jong ka Kong Bindas Syiem ka la kynjoh palat ïa ka 24 kynta ki doktor bad nos ki la poi ha ka jaka shah thngan ban thew ïa ka Blood Pressure bad ban peit thuh ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ka met jong ka Kong Bindas.Ka Kong Bindas ka la sdang ïa ka jingshah thngan kaba khlem pud sngi naduh ka por 12:30 baje mynsngi ha ka sngi Palei  bad kaba dang bteng kat haduh mynta ba la thoh ïa kane ka khubor ha ka por 10:00 baje mynmiet sngi Thohdieng.Bun ki kynhun sengbhalang na them Ribhoi ki la wan sha nongbah Shillong ban leit ai mynsiem ïa ka Kong Bindas ha kane ka jingdawa ban dawa ïa ka Sorkar ba kan thaw ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynïoh ïa ka mang pisa na ka bynta ban shna noh ïa ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur.
title: HA JAKA SHAH THNGAN KA KONG BINDAS WAN POI U EE PWD (ROADS) NONGPOH DIVISION, KYNTAIT BAN WENG KA JINGSHAH THNGAN

content: U Nongïalam ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit u la kyntu ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma ban peit shwa ïa ka kper jong la jong kaba don shadien ïing ha shwa ba un tuklar bad ki kam jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Haba pynrem ïa ka jingkren jong u Sarma ba dei na ka daw jong ka niam kaba la treikam hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya ba ka la wanrah ka jingrem jong ka NDA ha ka Lok Sabha ilekshon kaba dang shudep, u Bah Basaïawmoit u la ong, “Kane ka dei ka khubor kaba nga kwah ban phah sha u Himanta Biswa Sarma, uba dei u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Assam, uba la ju mlien ban kren ïa ka bym dei bad kaba bakla ba u dei ban peit shwa ïa la ka jong ka kam bad ruh ba un sumar bha ïa la ka jong ka kper jong u kaba don sha lyndet ïing. Um don hok ban tuklar ïa ki kam jong ka jylla Meghalaya ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka parliamentary election kaba dang shudep.”“Hapoh ka ri kaba synshar paidbah kum ka India, ki paidbah ka Meghalaya ki don ka hok ban jied ïa uno uno u briew katba u dang dei u nongshong shnong jong ka ri India bad uba long uba bit dor ban long u kyrtong. Ki nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya kim dei shuh kiba dang kyllung ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat, bad ki tip bha ïa ki agenda bad ki mat treikam jong ki seng saiñ pyrthei ba kin shim bynta ha kane ka election. Bad kum ki nongshong shnong jong kane ka ri kaba synshar paidbah ngi don ka hok ban jied ïa kano kano ka party kaba ngi kwah,” u la bynrap.Haba ong ba ki Balang hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya kim ju donkti hapoh ki kam saiñ pyrthei, u Bah Basaïawmoit u la ong, “Kum ka kynhun ne ki shnong ngin jied ïa ka party ne u kyrtong kiba ngeit hapoh ka riti synshar jong ka ri India, kiba burom ïa ki kyndon jong ka riti synshar jong ka ri India, kiba ngeit ha ka jingngeit niam kaba laitluid bad ka party kaba ïada ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki kynhun rit paid. Namar kata phim lah ban khmih lynti ba kum ki khristan, ban vote ne jied ïa u ne ka briew, kiba dei na ka party kiba ïeng pyrshah ïa ka riti dustur jong ka ri India, kiba long ka daw jong ka jingma ïa ki rit paid jong ka ri bad kane ka dei ka hok jong baroh ki nongshong ban shim ka rai.”“Namar kata nga pynrem jur ïa kane ka jingkren jong u Sarma kaba ym don ka jingshisha, kaba khlem nongrim bad kaba long pyrshah niam. Ka jingkren jong u ka long ban ïalam bakla ïa ki paidbah bad ban wanrah ïa ka jingbym shongsuk shongsaiñ hapoh ka ri. Nga thikna ba kiba bun ki jingkren jong u ki la wanrah ka jinglehraiñ ïa ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Assam bad ka la ktah bha ruh ïa ka jingsngew jong ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya,” ong u nongïalam ka VPP.
title: KA JINGKYNNOH U HIMANTA KA LONG KUM KA JINGTHMU BAN WANRAH ÏA KA JINGÏAPHER NIAM: ARDENT

content: Ka Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (TRAI) ka la ïoh jingtip ba ki don ki riewshim kabu da kaba phah ïa ki jingpyntip lyngba ka WhatsApp, ki SMS, da kaba phone sha ki riew paidbah ba kam ïalade ba ki dei ki nongtrei jong ka TRAI da kaba shna thok ïa ki kot ki sla jong ka ophis.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane na ka liang jong ka TRAI ka pynshai ba kine ki jingleh baroh ki long beaiñ namar kiba phone ne kiba phah ïa ki jingthoh ki da ong ba ïa ka numbar jong ki lah ban shah pynduh noh bad la ong ba lada kim jubab ïa ka mobile number jong ki kin kut noh da kaba bthah ruh ba kin buh ha ki mobile jong ki ïa ki website kiba sniew.Halor kane ka TRAI ka pynshai paidbah bad ong ba kam ju phone ne ong ïano ïano ruh ban ong ba kin pynduh ïa ka mobile number jong ki, ne ban phah kano kano ka jingpyntip, na ka liang jong ka TRAI ka khlem aibor ïano ïano ruh ba kin phone sha ki nongpyndonkam mobile ïa kum kine ki jaitkam.Kumta, lada don kano kano ka jingphone lada don kiba kam ba kidei na ka TRAI ban byrngem ban ot ïa ka mobile number, ïa kane dei ban shim ba ka dei ka jingleh ban thok ban shukor ïa ki riew paidbah da ki riewshim kabu.Ban ïada na kane ka jingshah shim kabu jong ki riew sniew ïa ki paidbah, la bthah ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong ba kin ujor sha ka “cybercrime” bad la bthah ïa ki paidbah ruh ba kin ujor sha ka tnad phah jingtip jong ka Department jong ka  Telecommunication’ Sanchar Saathi platform.Ïa kane ka jaka ban ujor lah ban leit sha ka.  Kane ka long ban pynshisha ïa ka jingshah shukor, lane ki dei ban ujor sha u numbar phone ban ïarap ïa ki paidbah ha u numbar “1930” lane leit ruh sha ka website jong ka cybercrime ha ka.
title: KA TRAI KAM JU BTHAH ÏANO ÏANO RUH BAN PYNDUH NOH ÏA KI NUMBER PHONE

content: : Uwei u rangbah ba la tip kyrteng kum u bah Bronly Pariong 56 snem, u khun jong u (L) Bah Ka Sohshang na ka shnong Tiehsaw (Tiehsawbah) Myrïaw Syiemship, u la jah rngai naduh ka 5 tarik mynta u bnai bad um shym pat la wan phai satia sha ïing.Halor ka jingjah rngai, ka Kong Aibi Syiem ka la ujor da ka ejahar da kaba kdew ba u Bah Bronly u la mih na la ïng naduh ka 30 tarik Jymmang 2024 ha ka por 6 :00 baje mynstep ha kaba u la ong ba un leit trei bylla sha ka shnong Lawmei East Khasi Hills District.Hynrei, ha ka 1 tarik mynta u bnai Jylliew ki la ïoh jingtip na ki bahaïing jong u kiba don ha Lawmei, ba um shym la wan poi satia ha katei ka shnong bad haduh mynta kim shym tip satia shaei u don.La ong ruh ba u Bah Bronly u don ïa ka met ka phad kaba biang briew, ki khmat kiba biang, u shñiuh u ba ïong bthuh, ki bniat kiba biang, u don ka jingjrong kumba san phut, u phong da ka tupia rong ping dum, ka jaket rong grey, ka patlun ïong, u phong ruh da ki slipar ba rong jyrngam.U ju mlien ban dih kyiad, dih duma, u kren da ka ktien Khasi bad u dei ruh na ka niam Khristan.Lada don kino kino kiba lap ne ïakynduh ïa u, kin sngewbha ban pyntip sha ki Police Station kiba marjan.
title: JAH RNGAI U RANGBAH NA SHNONG TIEHSAW

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) Seng Kmie ba la lamkhmat da u General Secretary Bah Isaac Basaïawmoit ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la bteng ban khynra bad ban kem ïa ki nongdih drok naduh ka por 7:00 baje mynmiet ha Ïewduh bad Motphran ter ter shaduh Bhoi Stand.Ha kane ka jingkhynra, ki dkhot ka seng ki la ïoh bat kumba 12 ngut ki nongdih drok bad na ka met jong kine ki nongdih drok ka seng ka la ïoh kurup ïa ki thyrnia injek bad ïa u drok.Hadien ba ladep kurup ïa ki thyrnia injek bad ïa u drok, kumba ju leh manla ka por ka seng ka la sneng bad ka la kyntu kynpham ïa kine ki samla ba kin kiar noh na kane ka jingim kyrni ha u drok bad ha kajuh ka por la phah wan mih ruh ïa ki sha ka ophis treikam jong ka seng ryngkat bad ki kmie ki kpa.Ki dkhot ka seng ki la thang pynjulor ruh ïa ki thyrnia injek bad ïa u drok da ka ding.U Bah Isaac u la ong ba ka seng kan sa nang ïai bteng ka jingkhynra ïa ki nongdih drok wat hapdeng ki jingtynjuh kiba bun.
title: KHYNRA KA HYC HA ÏEWDUH, ÏOH BAT 12 NGUT KI NONGDIH DROK

content: Shillong, Jylliew 10: Ar ngut ki briew ki la mynsaw bad uwei u la khladnoh hashen hadien ba ki scooty kaba ki shong ki la iatakhuh hajan ka skul step by step ha Barik, Shillong. Kane ka la jia ha ka por kumba shiphew shiteng mynmiet ha ka 10 tarik, jylliew, 2024.Ha kane ka jingjia, kawei ka kynthei kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Lisa Pradhan kaba la 34 snem ka rta ka la mynsaw katba u kurim jong ka u Devendra Nayak uba la 38 snem ka rta u la lait thaw khlem mynsaw eiei. Kine ki shikurim ki dei ki nongjngoh pyrthei kiba na ka jylla west bengal kiba dei kiba shong ha ka scooty kaba don ia u nomber ML 05-AA-8256 kaba la shah tynrah ha ka scooty kaba don ia u nombar ML05-Y-1286 ha kaba uba uwei na kiba shong ha kane ka scooty ia u bym pat lah satia ban tip kyrteng u la khlad hashen katba uwei pat u paralok jong u pat uba la mynsaw jur la tip kyrteng kum u Bishal Mandal uba la 20 snem ka rta uba sah ha Demsein̈īong, Shillong.Ia kine kiba la mynsaw ha kane ka jingiatakhuh kali la pynkit noh ha ka Ambulance 108 sha Shillong civil hospital ban ioh ia ka jingsumar.
title: ÏAP UWEI, MYNSAW AR NGUT BA ÏATYNGKHUH KI SCOOTY HA BARIK, SHILLONG

content: Ka Hima Sutnga Youth Federation (HSYF)O ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan pynmih da ka hukum kaba bthah ia ka Cosmos Cement Limited ban sangeh noh mardor ka jingpynjot bad ka jingpynjulor ia ki khlaw ki btap kiba don hapoh ka jylli jong ka Elaka Sutnga ha East Jaintia Hills District.U President ka Federation u Bah Nangbha Nongtdu ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha Shillong Press Club ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la iathuh ba ka jingheh jong ka khlaw kam duna ia ka 2-3 kilometer kaba la tip kum ka Bthar, kaba hap ha ka shnong Umthe, Umkboh, Tongspo bad Umshngain.“Kum ki paidbah ngim kwah ban shim ia ka ain ha ka kti namarkata kum u President ka HSYF nga kyrpad ia ka Sorkar Jylla bad ia ki bor ba dei khmih ba kin khang noh ia ka Cosmos Cement Ltd,” la ong u Bah Nangbha.U la kynnoh ba kane ka Kompeni ka la pom ia ki dieng, ka la dih tih khyndew, tih ia ki maw ki shyiap bad khlong ruh ia u mawshun na ka khlaw hapoh ka Elaka Sutnga.  U la kynnoh ruh ba ia ka Cosmos Cement Limited la ai jingbit da u Acting Doloi ban pyntrei ha kane ka khlaw kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka Elaka Sutnga.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka Dorbar jong ka Elaka Sutnga kaba ladep lum ka la shim ia ka rai ban ym shah shuh ban tih ia ki marpoh khyndew hynrei kumba ka long mynta kane ka kompeni ka dang bteng ban pynjot ia ki khlaw ki btap hapoh kane ka khlaw.
title: BA AI JINGBIT U ACTING DOLOI, LEH TRAI KA COSMOS CEMENT LTD ÏA KA KHLAW HA ELAKA SUTNGA

content: Ki Pulit ka Ribhoi District kiba la buddien ia ki jingioh shithi dawa pisa jong kiba bun ki briew, ki la iohkem ia ki lai ngut ki dkhot jong ka Sleeper Cell ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) kiba donkti ban treikam sop sop ha shnong Mawhati-Umroi, Ri bhoi District bad ha nongbah Shillong.U Superintendent of Police ka Ribhoi District u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Baar u la pyntip ba ia kine ki lai ngut la iohkem ha ka jingkhynra ha ka lah sngi U Blei.Ia ka Sleeper Cell jong ka HNLC la khlieh da u Cyfrank Paul Pariat, 25 ka rta na ka shnong Ummat, uba bat ia ka kyrdan Self Styled Commander jong ka HNLC, la ong u SP.“Ma u, (Cyfrank Paul Pariat) bad ka kynhun ki la sam bun tylli ki shithi dawa pisa ha ka kyrteng jong ka HNLC bad byrngem ruh ia kiba bun ki briew ban siew ia ka pisa ba la dawa lym kumta kin mad ia ka jingeh,” la bynrap shuh shuh u SP.Ki Pulit ka Special Team jong ka Police Headquarter bad Ribhoi District Executive Force (DEF) ha ka jingkhynra ha ka lah sngi U Blei ki la iohkem ia u Cyfrank Paul Pariat, bad arngut ki dkhot, kata, u Kitbok Mujai, 23 snem ka rta na ka shnong Ummat, Ribhoi Distirct bad u Barnabas Lyngdoh, 49 snem ka rta na ka shnong Khyndewsoo, Ribhoi District.U SP u la pyntip ba kine ki lai ngut ki dei kiba ju donkti ban pynrung dkhot, ban lum pisa na ka bynta ka seng HNLC kaba la shah ñiew beain hapoh ka Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act ki la leit sha ka ri Bangladesh ha u snem baladep ban ioh jinghikai pyntbit.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ki Pulit ki la register case ha Umiam Police Station hapoh ka Section 120B/506 Indian Penal Code bad ka Section 10/13/17/18 jong ka Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act bad ka jingtohkit mynta ka la iaid shakhmat ban lap ksai shuh shuh ia ki briew kiba lah ban dei ki dkhot ne kiba don jingiadei bad ka seng HNLC.“La kyrpad ia ki paidbah ba kim dei ban ngop ha ki jingshah dawa pisa beain jong ka HNLC bad ba kin pyntip marmar sha ki Pulit lada don kino kino kiba dawa pisa be-aiñ,” la kyrpad u SP ka Ribhoi.
title: SHAH KEM U SELF STYLED COMMANDER KA HNLC BAD ARNGUT KI DKHOT HA KI PULIT RIBHOI

content: Ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC) ka la khot hajir ia u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills u Rituraj Ravi ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai ha kaba iadei bad ka jingjia ha ka miet shiteng synñia ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai ha kaba u SP ryngkat bad ki Pulit ki la leit rung ha ka jaka shah thngan ka Kong Bindas Syiem ha Parking Lot kaba don markhap bad ka ophis Additional Secretariat, Shillong.Ka Commission ka la pan ruh ia ka kaiphod kaba bniah halor kane ka jingjia na ka Director General of Police (DGP) ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ka jingshimkhia jong ka Commission ka long hadien ba u Bah Enlang Sawian uba dei u nongsaid-aiñ bad ha kajuh ka por u nongialam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) u la ujor sha ka Commisson halor kane ka jingjia.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ka Voice of the People Party ba la lamkhmat da u MLA ka Mawlai Constituency Bah Brighstarwell Marbaniang ka la leit ujor ha u Inspector General of Police (Law and Order) halor kane ka jingjia.Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ba la lamkhmat da u Working President Bah Thomas Passah ka la aiti da ka jingthoh ujor sha u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah DP Wahlang ba un tuklar ia katei ka jingjia namarba ki paidbah ki la duh ia ka jingshaniah na ka tnat Pulit.Ka KHNAM ka la dawa ruh ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban pynkynriah kam noh mardor ia u Rituraj Ravi na East Khasi Hills District.
title: PAN KAIPHOD KA MHRC NA KA DGP, KHOT HAJIR ÏA U SP KA EKH

content: Ki nongtrei ka tnat Pule Puthi kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka All Meghalaya SSA Non-Teaching Staff Association ki la ai por 15 sngi ia ka Sorkar Jylla bad kumjuh ruh ia ka tnad Pule Puthi ba kin pyntreikam noh ia ka jingsiew tulop ba thymmai hynrei lym kumta ki la byrngem ban mih paidbah sha surok ban pynlong da ka jingiakhih.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka President jong ka Association ka Kong Jennifer J. Synrem ka la ong, lada jia ba ka Sorkar kam lah ban pyntreikam noh ban siew ia ka tulop ba thymmai kin sa shim da kiwei pat ki lad ki lynti ba tyngeh pyrshah ia ka Sorkar.Ka la ong ba kane ka jingdawa jong ka Association ka long halor ka jingdor jong ki mar ki mata, ki marbam mardih ha iew ha hat kat haduh ba ka ktah ia ka pla iarong namar ka jingrit ka tulop kaba ki ioh mynta.U General Secretary ka Association Bah Barikupar Mylliemngap u la kyrpad ia baroh ki nongtrei kiba don sha kylleng ki district ka Jylla ba kin long kiba la pynkhreh ban mih paidbah lada ka Association khot pynlong ia ka jingiakhih ba jaijai katkum ka riti synshar paidbah ha kano kano ka por.
title: DAWA KI NONGTREI HA KI SKUL SSA ÏA KA SORKAR BAN SIEW TULOP THYMMAI

content: : Ka Khasi Students Union, South West Khasi Hills District ryngkat ka KSU Mawkyrwat Circle ka la sei madan da ka jubab RTI ia ka jyrsieh thungkam thungjam sopsop hapoh ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ha South West Khasi Hills District, kata, ha ki Sub-Centre, ki PHC, ki CHC bad ha Mawkyrwat Civil Hospital.Katkum ka jubab RTI ba la ioh pdiang da ka KSU na ka ophis DHS, Shillong bad na ka ophis District Health and Medical Officer (DM&HO) South West Khasi Hills, la lap ba ki don haduh 112 tylli ki post ba la shu thung khlem da khot ia ka Advertisement bad khlem da pynlong ia ka interview.Ha ka jingiakren ha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Baar, u President ka KSU South West Khasi Hills District samla Forwardman Nongrem u la iathuh ba katkum ki jingtip lyngba ka jubab RTI, ki don haduh 51 tylli ki Officiating Post, 54 tylli ki Casual Post bad 7 tylli ki Non-Sanction Post, ha ki jaka sumar bapher bapher hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ka la shu thung sopsop khlem da pynbna paitbah bad khlem da khot interview, kaba la ktah haduh katta katta ia ka hok jong ki samla wadkam wadjam ba la nang la stad hapoh ka district.“Ka seng ka pynrem jur ia kane ka jingleh jong ka tnat ka koit ka khiah da kaba thungkam khlem da bud ia ki kyndon bad shen ka KSU kan sa ujor ia kane da ka jingthoh ha ki bor ba dei peit bad ban dawa ba ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ka dei ban pynbeit mardor ia kane da kaba weng ia kine ki post bad ban pynbna paitbah lyngba ki Advertisement,” la ong u President ka KSU.
title: SEI MADAN KA KSU ÏA KA JYRSIEH THUNGKAM SOPSOP HA KI JAKA SUMAR HA SWKH

content: Ka long kaei kaei kaba pynsyier mynsiem ia ki paidbah nongleit nongwan bad khamtam eh ha kum kane ka por ba ki jingsniew ki la nang kynrei bha namar ka jingjyllei jong u drok.Ha ka janmiet sngi Baar mynta ka taiew, ki dkhot jong ka Hynniewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ryngkat bad ki bor synshar jong ka Dorbar Shnong Lawmali, Shillong ki la ioh bat ia ki nongkhaïi drok kiba thep ruh ia ki tiar pynmynsaw.Ha ka jingkhynra ha ka Lawmali, ha ka ka por 9:30 baje mynmiet, ki dkkhot ka HYC ki la ioh bat haduh 15 ngut ki nongdie bad ki nongdih drok.Na ka met jong ki katto katne ki nongdie bad nongdih drok, ki dkhot ka HYC ki la ioh kurup na ki pla jong ki ia ki tiar pynmynsaw kum ki tari, ki khurat nar bad u nar rot.Nalor kine ki tiar pynmynsaw, la ioh kurup ruh ia u drok, ia ki tyndong ba thylli ba ju pyndonkam ban pyndep ia u drok, ia u Ganja, bad ia ki thyrnia injekshon.Ha ka jingtohkit da ki dkhot ka HYC, kine ki ki nongdih drok ki phla ba ki ju leit tuh ia ki nar jot na kylleng ki bynta ka sor Shillong ha ka por 3:00-3:30 baje dang step phyrngab.Ynda ladep lum shi jaka ia kine ki jingdih pynbuaid ka HYC ka la thang noh da ka ding bad bthah ia kine ki nongdih drok ban wan mih sha ka ophis treikam jong ka seng ryngkat bad ki bahaing hasem khnang ba ka seng kan ai ia ka sneng ka kraw ba kin lait noh na ka jingim kyrni ha u drok.
title: RYNGKAT KI TIAR PYN MAWSAW KURUP KA HYC BAD KA SHNONG LAWMALI NA KI NONGDIH DRUG

content: : Ka Kong Bindas Syiem, ka longkmie na ka shnong Mawlong Nongtluh, Ribhoi District kaba la shong shah thngan khlem pud sngi ha Parking Lot kaba don markhap bad ka ophis Additional Secretariat, Shillong ha ka sngi Baar mynta ka taiew ka la weng noh ia ka jingshah thngan bad leit phai sha la ing da ka jingsuk mynsiem hadien ba ka la ioh jingkular da ka jingthoh na ka Sorkar Jylla.Ka jingweng noh jong ka Kong Bindas Syiem ia ka jingshah thngan, ka la jia tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba peit ia ka tnat PWD (Roads) u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la khot iakren ia kane ka longkmie ha Main Secretariat ha ka sngi Baar hadien ba ka jingshah thngan ka la kynjoh sha ka sngi kaba san.Ka Kong Bindas ka la sdang ia ka jingshah thngan ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 12:30 baje mynsngi ban pyrshah ia ka jingleh meinah bad leh matlah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ia ka jingjot rathai ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur kaba la pynsuhsat haduh katta katta ia ka leit ka wan, ka rah ka rong jong ki paidbah bad khamtam eh ia kiba pang ba shitom.Kane ka longkmie ka la weng noh ia ka jingiakhih hadien ba ka Sorkar ka la khlei ia la ka jong ka jubanlak da kaba phah ruh da ka jingthoh ban shna noh ia ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur.Katkum ka jingthoh ba la phah da u Secretary ka tnat PWD (Roads) ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah KK Mawa, la pyntip ba ka surok Nongpoh-Umden-Sonapur kaba jrong 59.00 kilomitar la tyrwa ban pynrung hapoh ka  NES1DS (Roads) bad PMGSY0-III.U Secretary ka PWD (Roads) u la pyntip ba ia ka surok na Nongpoh sha Umden kaba 20 kilomitar la tyrwa ban pynrung hapoh ka NESIDS (Roads) ban sa bei pisa da ka Ministry of DoNER ha ka jingmang pisa kaba kot T52 klur.“Ha u Lber, 2024, ka Ministry of DoNER ka la buh hakhmat eh ban shna noh ia ka surok naduh Nongpoh sha Umden kaba jrong 20 kilomitar. Kane ka projek ka la sahteng na ka daw ka jingpynbna ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha bad ka jingtreikam jong ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC). Ka Detailed Project Report (DPR) ka dang don ha ka jingpynkhreh bad ia kaba yn sa phah sha ka tnat Planning ha kaba kut mynta u bnai bad ka tnat Planning kan sa phah ia ka DPR sha ka Ministry of DoNER  lyngba ka NEC Secretariat ba kan mang pisa,” la pyntip u Secretary ka tnat PWD (Roads).Shuh shuh, u Secretary u la pyntip ba ka jingbteng ban shna sa ia ka surok naduh Umden sha Byrnihat bad ha ki shnong ba marjan ba kane ka surok ka iaid lyngba sa 39 kilomitar la tyrwa ban pynrung hapoh ka PMGSY-III ha ka jingmang pisa kaba kot antad kumba T. 50.95 klur. Ia ka jingtyrwa (proposal) la thep ha ka Online Management, Monitoring and Accounting System (OMMAS) jong ka PMGSY.“Ka jingialang jong ka Empowered Committee hapoh ka Ministry of Rural Development, Sorkar India na ka bynta ban mang pisa ia kane ka skhim la khmihlynti ba kan urlong noh shen.  Kine ki dei ki ar tylli ki projek ba ladep shimkhia, hapoh une u snem 2024,” la pyntip shuh shuh u Secretary ka tnat PWD (Roads).
title: HADIEN 5 SNGI PYNKUT NOH KA KONG BINDAS ÏA KA JINGIAKHIH

content: : Ka kynhun ki nongialehkai Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) ka jylla Meghalaya kiba don hapoh ka kynhun jong ka Tribal Combat Academy (TCA)  ba la ai jinghikai da u samla Babit Kharsahnoh kaba don ha Madanrting, Shillong ki la wanrah burom ia ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka lympung ialehkai Mixed Martial Arts North East Zone kaba la long ha Siliguri naduh ka 7tarik haduh ka 9tarik mynta u bnai ba la pyniaid da ka All India Mixed Martial Arts (AIMMA) bad ba la kyrshan da ka Global Association of Mixed Martial Arts (GAMMA).Ha kane ka lympung iakura, ki dkhot jong ka Tribal Combat Academy ki la jop ia ka takma ksiar, takma rupa bad takma rnong.Ha ka jingiakhun jong ka kyrdan Striking MMA Gold u samla Rishanskhem P. Lipon u la jop ha ka Title Belt 58 Kg ha ka kyrdan Junior, u Alvin Kharkongor u la ioh khur ia ka takma Rupa jong ka kyrdan 35 Kg ha ka kyrdan Cadets, ka samla Barishisha Nongkhlaw ka la ioh khur ia ka takma Rupa jong ka 49 Kg ha ka kyrdan Junior Girls, u Vincent Marboh u la ioh khur ia ka takma Rupa jong ka 62 Kg ha ka kyrdan Junior.Ka samla Emillia Susngi ka la ioh khur ia ka takma Rnong jong ka 49 Kg ha ka kyrdan Junior Girls, u David Lalrinmawia u la iohkhur ia ka takma Rnong jong ka 70 Kg ha ka kyrdan Senior Men.Haba phai pat sha ka jing iakhun jong ka Pro Amatuer MMA u Brock Star Papang u la long u Champion jong ka Title Belt 77 Kg ha ka kyrdan Senior Men, u Thangoulian Manlun u ioh ia ka takam Rupa jong ka 70 Kg ha ka Senior Men.
title: RAH U BROCK BAD RISHANSKHEM ÏA KA CHAMPION TITLE BELT MMA NE ZONE, ÏOH TAKMA KI NONGÏAKURA KA TCA
