content: : U MLA jong ka Voice of the People Party na North Shillong Constituency u Bah Adelbert ha ka  sngi Balang u la mudui sha u Secretary jong ka Lok Ayukta halor ka jingsuba ba ka don ka jyrsieh bamsap ha ka Sobhagya Scheme ha u snem 2023.Namar ka jingbym don jong u Chairman ka Lok Ayukta, u Bah Adelbert u la aiti ia ka jingujor ha u Secretary ka Lokayukta u Bah Rapthap halor ka kyndon 13 (1) A Prevention of Corruption Act 1998.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Bah Adelbert ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la mang T. 156 klur ia ka jylla Meghalaya na ka Saubhagya Scheme bad la jied ruh ar tylli ki kompeni ba kynthup ia ka Satnam Global Infra Project Limited, New Delhi bad ka Onycon Enterprise, Mumbai ban pyntreikam ia ka skhim ha u snem 2018.U Bah Adelbert u la pynpaw ia ka kaiphod CAG halor ka Sobhagya Scheme jong u snem 2023 u ladep ban rah hakhmat ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ jong ka Jylla bad u la pyrshang ruh ban iatai hynrei u Lamphang um shym la ailad satia katkum ka Rule 241.Shuh shuh u Bah Adelbert u la ong ba kane ka jingujor sha ka Lokayukta ka long ban rat ryngkhong ia ka jyrsieh bamsap bampong hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya bad bynrap ruh ba kane ka pisa ka ktah ia ka pla tyngka jong u paidbah.
title: MUDUI U MLA KA VPP HA KA LOKAYUKTA ÏA KA JYRSIEH BAMSAP SOUBHAGYA SCHEME

content: Dang hapoh khyndiat sngi ba kawei ka nongpang ka la ujor halor ka jingbym shimkhia jong ki Nurse kiba shakri hapoh ka Nongpoh Civil Hospital, mynta ka kynti sa ka Kong Bindas Syiem ka la pynpaw ia kane kajuh ka jingleh bym suidniew jong ki Nurse hapoh kane ka hospital.Ka Kong Bindas Syiem hadien ba ka la weng noh ia ka jingiakhih da kaba shong shah thngan khlem pud ha Shillong mynta la san sngi eiei hadien ba ka la leit phai sha la iing ka la kem pang ha shiteng lynti tang shu poi ha Umsning bad mar mar la pynkit noh ia ka sha Nongpoh Civil Hospital ban ioh jingsumar namar ka jingtlot ha ka bor met.Hynrei kum ka nongpang ka la mad pynban ia ka jingbym kitkhia jong ki bor ai jingsumar jong ka Nongpoh Civil Hospital Nongpoh ia ki nongpang.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka Kong Bindas Syiem ka la iathuh, mar ia poi ha Nongpoh Civil Hospital, ka la khie tlot bha ha ka bor met bad shiteng miet ka la donkam kyrkieh ia ki Nurse ne Doctor namar ka jingbym iaid bha jong ka dawai Drip.  Katba ka nongap ka la leit khot ia ki Nurse kiba don ha kamram hynrei kim shem la plie satia ia ka jingkhang bad kim shym la wan peit satia ia ka Kong Bindas watla ka la khie tlot. La iathuh ba ki Nurse ki la wan peit ia ka jinglong jingman jong ka Kong Bindas haduh ka por 6:30 baje mynstep.Ka Kong Bindas ka la iathuh ruh ba ym tang ma ka, kaba la mad ia kane ka jingbym shimkhia jong ki nongsumar ha Nongpoh Civil Hospital hynrei ka don ruh sa kawei ka longkmie ka Kong Ibanjalin Marbaniang na Kyrdem Kulai kaba la kham shitom jur bha kaba la donkam bha ia ki Doctor bad ki Nurse ha ka por shiteng miet bad watla ki la phah khot ia ki Nurse hynrei ym don satia ba wan khmih ne wan ai dawai ia i tad haduh ka por mynstep.Shuh shuh ka Kong Bindas ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewdiaw halor ka jingbym kitkhia jong ki nongtrei ka Hospital ia ki nongpang katba ka tulop ki ioh beit thik thik manla u bnai.Namar kane ka jingbym kitkhia jong ki nongai jingsumar ka Kong Bindas ka la iathuh ba kan sa leit wad jingsumar noh sha kiwei pat ki Hospital namar ka jingbym sngewhun ia ka rukom sumar ha Nongpoh Civil Hospital.
title: UJOR KA KONG BINDAS SYIEM ÏA KA JINGBYM SHIMKHIA KI BOR KA NONGPOH CIVIL HOSPITAL

content: Ki nongkyrshan jong ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ki la tyrwa da ka kyrteng jong ka Dr. Metabh Chandee A. Sangma ka kurim jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma bad ia ka kyrteng jong u James K. Sangma ban pyniakhun ha ka elekshon shiteng samoi na Gambegre Constituency.Kane ka la wan tang hadien shi sngi ba u Saleng A. Sangma u la aiti ia ka shithi iehnohkam kum u MLA jong ka Congerss na Gambegre Constituency sha ka Assembly Secretariat hadien ba u la jop ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Tura Parliamentary Seat kaba dang shu dep long shen.U Saleng u la pynrem ia ka Agatha K. Sangma kaba dei ka para kynthei jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla da kaba ioh palat 1.55 lak vote.Ka thymmei khubor na ka party ha ka sngi Balang ka la iathuh ba ka la don ka jingdawa na ki nongtrei jong ka party ba ka dei ban pynieng da ka Dr. Metabh Chandee lane da u James K Sangma, uba dei u MLA barim ka Dadenggre  Constituency, kum ki kyrtong ha ka elekshon shiteng samoi ka ban sa long ha Gambegre.
title: TYRWA KA NPP DA KA KURIM U CM BAD U JAMES K. SANGMA BAN ÏAKHUN NA GAMBEGRE

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la ai jingmut halor ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ka State Reservation Policy ban ïasam marbiang na ka bynta ki lai tylli ki jaidbynriew-Khasi, Jaiñtia bad Garo jong ka jylla.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha ka Expert Committee on the State Reservation Policy ba la lamkhmat da u Justice (Retd.) u MC Garg, ka KSU ka la ong, ki jingai jingmut ki long da kaba bishar bha ïa ka jinglong jingman ha ka jingbun paid, ka ïoh ka kot, ka pule puthi bad kumjuh ruh ïa ka jinglong jingman ha ka jingsngew pher hapdeng ki paid Khasi bad Garo. Ka KSU ka la pynwandur ïa kine ki jingai jingmut da kaba ngeit skhem kan ym pynsngewsih ne pynduh nong ïano ïano ruh hynrei kan wanrah malu mala ïa kata ka hok ba dei ban ïoh da ki trai ri trai muluk jong baroh kawei ka jylla.“…katkum ka khanasamari 2011 ka Jylla Meghalaya ki jaidbynriew Khasi bad Jaiñtia ki don kumba 14.1 lak ngut bad tang ki Garo ki don palat 8.21 lak.  Namarkata, kane ka pynpaw shai ba la donkam ban pynbeit ïa ka State Reservation Policy khnang ban pynthikna ba ka don ka jingïabiang lang hapdeng ki jaidbynriew Khasi-Jaiñtia bad Garo,” la ong ka KSU.Ki san tylli ki mat kiba ka KSU ka la ai jingmut sha ka Expert Committee ka long, (i) katkum ka Reservtion Policy kaba la treikam naduh u 1972, ka jingbhah thungkam na ka bynta ki Khasi-Jaiñtia ka long 40 na ka 100 bad ïa ki Garo ka long 40 na ka 100. Ïa kaba sah 20% pat la mang 5% sha kiwei pat ki ST bad SC katba kaba 15% pat ka dei na ka bynta baroh kiba sah ha Meghalaya khlem da kheiñ jaidbynriew. Ka KSU ka buh hakhmat ka Sorkar ba ladei ban pynbeit noh khyndiat ha ka rukom bhah ïa ka thungkam thungjam namar ka jaidbynriew Khasi ka kham heh paid bad ïa ka jaidbynriew Garo. Kumta ka ai jingmut ba na ka 100%, dei ban mang noh 50% ïa ki Khasi (Khynriam, Pnar, Bhoi, War, Maram bad Lyngngam), hynrei to ai ba ka jong ki paid Garo kan neh kumjuh kata 40%. Kaba sah pat, kata 10%, yn phiah noh 5% sha kiwei pat ki ST/SC ka jylla bad 5% pat kan dei ka bym mang ïano ïano ruh hynrei kaba plie ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong ka jylla.(ii). Ka KSU ka ïohi ba ka jylla Meghalaya la bynta ha ki ar thaiñ, kata ka Garo Hills kaba bun paid ki Garo bad ka Khasi-Jaiñtia Hills kaba bun paid da ki Khasi (Khynriam, Pnar, Bhoi, War, Maram bad Lyngngam). Kumta ha kaba ïadei bad ka thungkam ha ki District Level, ka KSU ka ai jingmut ba shu buh lada ym don Khasi ba thep kam ha ki post ba lait ha Garo Hills, ka mut 90% dei ban mang beit ïa ki Garo. Kumjuh ruh ha Khasi-Jaiñtia Hills lada duna ki Garo ba thep kam ha ki post ba lait ha ki districts Khasi bad Jaiñtia, 90% dei ban mang beit noh sha ki Khasi-Jaiñtia.(iii). Ka KSU ka ai jingmut ruh ba lyngba ka Reservation Policy bad ka Roster System ba thymmai ym dei shuh ban phaidien (retrospective) sha ki jingduna ïohkam jong kano kano ka jaidbynriew hynrei ban ïaid beit sha khmat (prospective) katkum ka bhah ba la mang thymmai.(iv). Kawei ka mat ba ka KSU ka sngewdei ka long halor pule puthi ha ka Secondary Level ha ki skul bapher bapher. Kane ruh kumjuh kum ka mat kaba ar hi ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingphiah ïa ka jylla ha ki ar bynta. Ka KSU ka ai jingmut ba lada hap ban khamtam kyntiew shuh shuh ïa ka pule puthi khamtam ha thaiñ nongkyndong donkam ban mang beit 100 na ka 100 ïa ki kam hikai sha ki Garo ha Garo Hills bad 100 na 100 ïa ki Khasi-Jaintia ha Khasi bad Jaiñtia Hills.(v). Kawei ka mat kaba pyntyrha eh ïa ki samla wad kam wad jam ka dei kata kaba ki ong ka Backlog Reserved Vacancies. Ka KSU ka sngewdei ban hap ban pynduh noh ïa kane ka rukom namar ka ktah ym tang ïa ki samla wad kam hynrei wat ïa ka rukom treikam ka Sorkar Jylla. Kum ban shu ai nuksa lada ki Khasi-Jaiñtia kim lah ban pyndap ïa la ka 50% ha ki kam kiba lait, ïa kine ki kam kiba sah ym dei ban rah kum ka Extra Percentage sha ki Advertisement kam kiba hadien. Kumjuh ruh lada ki Garo kim lah ban pyndap pura ïa ka 40%, ïa ki % ba sah ym dei ban pynkylla plus % sha ki Advertisement kam kiba hadien. Hynrei ïa kito ki kam kiba ym lah ban pyndap pura la ka dei ka bhah ki Khasi-Jaiñtia ne jong ki Garo, dei ban khot Advertisement bad pynlong eksamin biang da kaba thymmai bad bud ïa ki kyndon ka Reservation Policy ba thymmai kata 50:40.
title: 50% ÏA KI KHASI-JAIÑTIA 40% ÏA KI GARO HA KA BHAH THUNGKAM, AI JINGMUT KA KSU SHA KA EXPERT COMMITTEE

content: Ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) kaba la phah ïa ka jingai jingmut sha ka Expert Committee on State Reservation Policy ha ka sngi Palei ka la ai jingmut ban mang 50% ïa ka Bhah Thungkam na ka bynta ki jaidbynriew Khasi bad Jaiñtia.Ha ka shithi ba la aiti sha ka Committee, u President ka KHNAM Bah Pyndapborthiaw Saibon u la ong ba ka jingai jingmut ka long ruh ba 80% dei ban ai sha baroh ki lai tylli ki jaidbynriew Khasi, Jaiñta bad Garo da kaba pynshong nongrim katkum ka Merit.U Bah Saibon u la ong ba katkum ka Para 1 jong ka Policy, ïa ka bhah kyrpang dei ban shim katkum ka jingbun briew jong ki lai tylli ki jaidbynriew hapoh ka Jylla, kata hapdeng ka jingbunbriew ki Khasi bad Jaiñtia bad Garo.“Katkum ka Khanasamari 2011, ki jaidbynriew Khasi bad Jaintia ki don ym duna 5, 78, 918 lak ngut ka jingbun briew ban ïa ki jaidbynriew Garo bad kane ka jingïapher kan kiew haduh 9,49,756 lak ynda la pyndep ïa ka jinglum khanasamari kaba bud.   Namarkata, dei ban shim katkum ka ka jingïapher ha ka jingbun briew haba peit ïa ka bhah kyrpang,” la ong u Bah Saiborn.“Lane, ban kiar na ka jingïashrut hapdeng ki jaidbynriew ritpaid kiba shong hapoh ka jylla, lah ban mang 80% ïa baroh ki lai tylli ki jaidbynriew (Khasi, Jaiñtia & Garo), da kaba pynshong nongrim katkum ka Merit.  Kane ka pynneh ïa ka kyndon jong ka ‘Maintenance of Efficiency in the Administration’ katkum ba la kdew ha ka Para 1 jong ka Policy,” ong u Bah Saiborn bad bynrap, “lane, 50% dei ban bhah tang sha ki jaidbynriew Khasi bad Jaiñtia.”Ka KHNAM ka la ai jingmut ba dei ban pyndam noh ïa ka kyntien  “Autonomous State” na ka Para 1 jong ka State Reservation Policy 1972, namarba ïa ka jylla Meghalaya la pynbna kum ka jylla Meghalaya bapura ha ka 2 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 1972.Ka la kdew ruh ba la donkam ban pynbeit thymmai ha ka Para 2 jong ka Policy da kaba pyndam noh ïa ka kyndon kaba rah shakhmat ïa ki kam ba lait thylli. Da kaba rah shakhmta ïa ki kam ba thylli ka long pyrshah ïa ka jingthmu jong ka Policy ban pynbeit ïa ka Administrative Duties katkum ba la kdew ha ka Para 1 jong ka Policy. Namarkata, hadien ka kyntien ‘Then such vacancies will be available to other’, ïa baroh kawei ka Para 2 jong ka Resolution la dei ban pyndam lut ploiñ.Ka party ka la ong, ha ka Office Memorandum jong ka 28tarik Jymmang, 1974 ka plie lad ïa ki nongthep kam kiba nabar ka jylla ban thep ïa ki kam ba thylli ba la mang kyrpang ïa ki Garo.  Kum ïa kane ka kyndon ym dei satia ban ailad la ka long ha kano kano ka rukom khnang ban pynthikna ba ki nongshong shnong ka jylla kin ïoh jingmyntoi na ka Policy.Ka la ong ba ha ka Office Memorandum kaba 18 tarik, Nohprah, 1972 ka ailad ïa ka bhah kyrpang ïa ki post ha ki District level, ha kaba kiba mynta kim shym la shah pynkynriahkam shabar ka district hadien ba la shah thungkam, dei ban don ïa ka Combined Reservation kaba 80% jong ki post na ka bynta ki Garo, Khasi-Jaintia ha ka jaka ba mang kyrpang la ka jong mar 40% na ka bynta ki Garo bad Khasi-Jaintia.“Ïa kane ruh dei ban pynbeit thymmai da kaba kdew shai ba ki post ha ki district level ha kaba kiba mynta kim lah ban shah pynkynriah kam shabar jong ka district hadien ba la shah thungkam, 80% ka bhah kyrpang dei ban mang na ka bynta ki Khasi-Jaintia ha rilum Khasi bad rilumj Jaintia bad 80% ka bhah kyrpang dei ban mang kyrpang ïa ki Garo tang ha rilum Garo,” la pynpaw ka shithi na ka KHNAM ba la aiti sha ka Expert Committee.Katkum ka KHNAM, ïa mynta, ki district level posts ha Garo Hills la shu pyndap beit tang da ki jaidbynriew Garo katba ha Khasi bad Jaiñtia Hills Districts ki jaidbynirew Garo ki ïohlad ban thepkam lang bad ki jaidbynriew Khasi-Jaiñtia.Ka party ka la ong ba ïa ka State Reservation Policy 1972 dei ban pyntreikam ruh ha ki Semi-Government Department/Corporations/Prganized Private Sectors/Private Establishment khnang ban plie ïa ki lad ïohkam na ka bynta ki samla ha ka jylla.Shuh shuh, ka party ka la pynsngew ruh ïa ka jingdonkam ban pynthikna ba ka Policy ka thmu tang na ka bynta ka Bhah Thungkam hynrei ym na ka bynta kiwei pat ki jingthmu.“Ha ki snem ba la leit noh, ïa ka State Reservation Policy 1972 la pyntreikam wat ha ka jingïoh rung ban pule ha ki kyrdan kiba kham shalor, khlem ka jingïoh jingbit kaba thikna. Namarkta, la ai jingmut ba ïa kane ruh dei ban pynbeit noh mardor da kaba kdew shai ba ka State Reservation Policy 1972 ka thmu tang na ka bynta ka bhah thungkam bad ym na ka bynta kiwei pat ki jingthmu,” la ong ka KHNAM.“Ngi kwah ban kdew shuh shuh, na ka daw ka jingïapher ki jingsngew ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ka SRP 1972 na kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew, ka lah ban mih ka buit ban shu pynslem kai da kine ki jaidbynriew.  Namarkata, la ai jingmut ba ïa kane ka kam dei ban pyndep noh kham kloi katba lah,” la bynrap shuh shuh ka KHNAM.
title: AI JINGMUT KA KHNAM BAN BHAH 50% ÏA KI KHASI-JAIÑTIA HA KA RESERVATION POLICY

content: Ka High Commission of India kaba don ha nongbah Dhaka, Bangladesh ka la pan jubab na u Deputy Commisioner jong ka East Khasi Hills u Sibhi Chakravarthy Sadhu ban pynshisha ïa ka jinglong nongshong shnong jong ka East Khasi Hills bad ïa ka jinglong nong India jong u Bah Onil Talang uba shong basah ha ka shnong Pyrdiwah kaba hap hapoh ka Raid Mukertilla, Pynursla Civil Sub Division uba la shah kem ha ki shipai Border Guard of Bangladesh (BGB) ha ka 8 tarik u Nohprah, 2021  katba u dang thmu ban leit sum ha Wah Umngot ha ka por shiteng sngi.Une u rangbah haduh mynta u dang shah set ha along Sylhet District Jail ha ka ri Bangladesh mynta la jan ar snem shiteng.Kane ka jingpan jubab da ka High Commission of India ka long ban shimkhia na ka bynta ban ïakren bad ki bor synshar jong ka ri Bangladesh khnang ban ïoh pyllait noh ïa u Bah Onil Talang, ba la antad ba u la don mynta la 56 snem ka rta, na ka along na Sylhet District Jail bad ban wan phai biang sha la ka jong ka ri bad sha la ki bahaiing hasem.Ka jingshimkhia jong ka High Commission of India ka long hadien ba u Bah Joannes JTL Lamare uba long u nongtrei mon sngewbha na ka shnong Kynton-U-Mon, Nongkrem, East Khasi Hills District u la phah da ka jingthoh ha ka 23 tarik Jymmang, 2024 sha u Myntri ka tnat External Affairs ka Sorkar India u Dr. S. Jaishankar ba un tuklar lem halor kane ka jingshah kem khlem nongrim jong u Bah Onil Talang ha ki shipai ïada khappud jong ka ri Bangladesh.
title: AR SNEM TAM HA SYLHET DISTRICT JAIL SHAH SET U RANGBAH KHASI BA SHAH KEM NAJAN WAH UMNGOT

content: : U Bah Joannes JTL Lamare uba long u nongtrei mon sngewbha na ka shnong Kynton-U-Mon, Nongkrem, East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Palei u la ujor sha ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC) ba kan shimkhia ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkynnoh ba ki Pulit ka Dawki Police Station ki la phah dait da ki ksew ïa u Bah Sulin Suting hadien ba ki Pulit ki la rah ïa u sha thanat.Ki Pulit ka Dawki Police Station ki la kem ïa u Bah Sulin Suting uba la don kumba 70 snem tam uba shong basah ha ka shnong Pyrdiwah kaba hap hapoh ka Raid Mukertilla, Pynursla Civil Sub Division ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai.U Bah Joannes Lamare ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u la ïathuh ba ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC) ka la shim Sou Moto halor kane ka jingjia namarba ka jingpynkheiñ jong ki briew kiba bat ïa ka aiñ ïa ka hok longbriew manbriew.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ha ka jingai jingujor sha ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission, une u nongtrei monsngewbha u la dawa ba ki Pulit kiba donkti ha kane ka kam ki dei ban ngat ha ka jingshah pynshitom.
title: BA SHAH DAIT KSEW U RANGBAH HA THANAT DAWKI, UJOR U BAH JOANNES SHA KA MHRC

content: Ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court ha ka sngi Palei ka la aipor hynriew taiew ïa ka Sorkar Jylla bad ïa ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) ba kin ïapynbeit noh ka kam ba la sahteng ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkynkynriah ïa ki 342 tylli ki longing na Them Iew Mawlong.Ka hukum ba la pynmih da u Justice W Diengdoh ka la ong, “ki nongsaidaiñ kiba mihkhmat na ki arliang mamla ki ladep aiti ïa ka jingïakren ïapynbeit kaba la ïaid shakhmat hapdeng ki ar kynhun ïa kaba shipor yn ailad lada jia ba ka mih biang kano kano ka jingïapynbeit, kane ka kam kan ym long satia kaba seisoh.  La pdiang ïa jingkyrpad ban aipor hynriew taiew.  Ïa ka jingkyrpad la shah.  Ïa kane ka kam la buh sngi.”Dang shen ha ka 31 tarik, Jymmang, ka HPC ka la pan por sa ar bnai ban jied ïa u President ba thymmai na ka bynta ban bteng ïa ka jingïakren bad ka Sorkar Jylla ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkynriah.Kane ka la wan shwa ba kan don ka jingïalang bakongsan ba la buh sngi ban long ha ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai, hapdeng ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka HPC na ka bynta ban shim syndon ïa ka rai kaba khatduh halor kane ka kam.U Secretary ka HPC u Gurjit Singh ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba peit ïa ka tnat Kam Pohïing Bah Prestone Tynsong ha ka 31 tarik, Jymmang, u la ong, “nga phah ïa kane ka jingthoh da ka jingkyrpad ïa ka Sorkar ban buh pynkynriah noh ïa ka jingïakynduh jong ngi kaba la buh ban long ha ka 7 tarik Jylliew, ha kaba ïadei bad ki nongshong shnong jong ngi ha Harijan Colony, Bara Bazar, Shillong.”“Kane ka long kaba sngewsih ban pyntip ba u President jong ngi u Billu Singh u la khladnoh dang shen.  Ha kum kane ka jingsngewsih na ka jingkhlad noh jong u, ïa mynta ngi dang bunkam bad ka ing ka sem jong u ban pynkhreh ïa ka jinglehniam bakhatduh katkum ka dustur jong ki Sikhs bad ka jingleh donburom khatduh ha ingsah jong u ha Shillong bad ha ka shnong jong u ha Punjab,” la bynrap u Singh.U Singh ha ka shithi, shuh shuh u la ong, ba kin sa pyndep ïa ka jingjied ïa u President ba thymmai jong ka Harijan Panchayat Committee bad ban rejistar ïa ka komit kaba thymmai ha ka ophis jong u Registrar of Societies.“Kane ka kam kan shim por kumba ar bnai ban pyndep lut ïa ki kam nadong shadong ban wad ïa u briew uba la kham rangbah ban mih bujli ban shakri ha ka seng jong ngi bad ïa ki briew jong ngi na ka bynta bun bun snem.  Ban pyndep ïa kane ka kam, bad ban pynthikna ba ki nongïalam ba thymmai kin long kiba la pynkhreh ban ïakren bad ka sorkar, ngi donkam ïa ka por. Ngi sngewnguh shikatdeh ei ïa ka jingsngewthuh jong phi ha kum kane ka por kaba eh,” la bynrap u Singh ha ka shithi.
title: ISHU THEM ÏEWMAWLONG : 6 TAÏEW AI POR KA ÏINGBISHAR ÏA KA SORKAR BAD HPC BAN ÏAPYNBEIT

content: 4: Ka heprit Nafisabeth D. Syiemlieh, kaba dang pule ia ka Class-IX ha Byrwa RMSA Secondary School, kaba dei ka khun jong u Bah Werson Diengdoh bad ka Kong Pranty Mary Syiemlieh na ka shnong Byrwa, Ribhoi District ka la shah jied ban mihkhmat kum ka Youngest Scientist na Ribhoi District ha ka Yuvika Programme.Ka heprit Nafisabeth ka la shah jied ban iohrung sha ka Yuvika Programme ka long lyngba ka jingiashim bynta ka jong ka ha ka Online Quiz Game jong ka Yuvika Programme kaba la long ha u bnai Lber, 2024.Lyngba ka jingshah jied ban mihkhmat ia ka Ribhoi District, ka heprit Nafisabeth ka la iohlad ban leit iashim bynta ha ka Yuvika Programme kaba ar taiew kynthih kaba la long ha North East Space Application Centre, (NESAC) Umiam, Ribhoi District, naduh ka 12 tarik haduh ka 24 tarik u Jymmang, 2024.Ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students Union, North Khasi Hills District Unit tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane, ha ka janmiet sngi Palei mynta ka taiew ki la leit sha ingsah jong ka heprit Nafisabeth ban pynkup burom ia ka hapoh ka jingialam jong u General Secretary u samla James Mawphniang ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki dkhot ka KSU Umiam Circle bad ki dkhot jong ka KSU Byrwa Unit.
title: WANRAH NAM KA KHYNNAH NA RIBHOI KABA SHNA ÏA U ROCKET, KYRSHAN KA BAF

content: Ka Phudmuri Presbyterian Higher Secondary School, Mawlai Phudmuri ka la jam sha u mawmer ka jingdap 125 snem ha ka jingïaid lynti ban bsa ïa ki umpohliew jingstad bad ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la rakhe ïa ka Quasquicentennial ha ka rukom kaba iphuh iphieng.Ha kane ka jingrakhe la ïa don lang u Bah Prestone Tynsong, Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Sorkar Jylla kum u kongsan, u MLA Mawlai Bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang, MDC Mawlai Bah Teiborlang Pathaw, Bah HM Shangpliang u Adviser ka tnat Pule Puthi, u Bah M. F. L Mawlong President ka Managing Committee ka Phudmuri Presbyterian HSS, Bah S. W Nongbri, Secretary ka Managing Committee, ki nonghikai, ki kmie ki kpa bad kiwei kiwei.Haba ai jingkren u Bah Prestone u la pynpaw ba u ieng na ka bynta ka tnad pule puthi jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban ai khublei ïa ka Phudmuri Presbyterian HSS,  kaba la jam shaduh une u mawmer uba la jngai bha.“Mynta la kumba 5 ne 6 snem, na ka liang ka sorkar ngi la pyrshang ban nangpynkhlain shuh shuh ïa ka pule puthi. Namarba ngi ïohi ba dei kane ka bynta kaba donkam tam, ym tang ha ka jylla Meghalaya, ym tang ha ka ri India, hynrei ha satklak ka pyrthei bad ka pule puthi ka dei u thied snam jong ka ri, ka jylla, ka shnong, ka balang bad ki longiing ki longsem ruh,”“Dei na kane ba ngi pynheh ïa ka mang tyngka na uwei u snem sha uwei pat u snem, ha ka mang tyngka jong u snem 2023-24, kaba mut mynshem snem ngi buh ïa ka mang tyngka kaba 3166 klur bad nga sngewbha ban pyntip ïa phi ba ha ka mang tyngka ba mynta u snem 2024-25, ngi la kyntiew ïa ka mang tyngka sha ka 3538 klur tyngka,” u la bynrap.Haba shu kren ïa kitei ki jingkhein, sngewsuk bha ban ong ba ngi ïoh 3500 lane 3100 klur bad mynta la kumba 6 snem tam, ngi kyntiew khnang bangin nanglah ban pynkhlain haba ïa dei bad ka jinghikai, ban ai jinghikai ïa ki nonghikai ba kin lah ban ai ïa ki jinghikai ba janai (quality) ïa ki khynnah skul, kiban ïa ryngkat dor bad kiwei jylla ne ki nongbah kiba paw hapoh ka ri India baroh kawei, ong u bah Tyngsong.U ong ruh, kawei na kita, ka sienjam kaba ngi la shim ka dei ka Mission Education, ban kyntiew ïa ki skul ha ki jingtei bad kiwei, la ki dei ki skul sorkar ne kiwei ki skul. U ïathuh ruh ba ki la sdang ban ai bun ki jingtei (building) ba thymmai na ka bynta ki skul primary.Kawei pat ka bynta ka dei ka Meghalaya Teacher’s Information Management System, kaba ki kwah ban kham pynbit pynbiang ïa ki teknologi, ka jingangnud jong ka sorkar ka long ban kyntiew pynbha ïa ki nonghikai, kaba la pynlong ïa ka sorkar ban pynbor ïa ki nonghikai ba ki dei ban leit ïa ka training, namar haba ki pass ïa ka training, ka jinghikai ïa ki khynnah, ym donkam shuh ban batai mano mano lyngba ka training kaba ki ki ïoh kin ai ïa ki khynnah skul ki jong ki ïa ki jinghikai kiba biang pura.Shwa kane ban pyniphuh iphieng ïa ka jingrakhe la don ka jingshad na ki nonghikai, na ki khynnah pre primary section, kumjuh ka jingrwai na ki kmie ki kpa, na kiba la pass na kane ka skul bad kiwei kiwei.Ha ka jingpynkut ïa ka jingrakhe u Bah Prestone bad kiwei ki la pyllait ïa ka Souvenir jong ka skul.
title: DAP 125 SNEM KA PHUDMURI PRESBYTERIAN HR.. SEC. SCHO BAN BSA ÏA KI UMPOHLIEW JINGSTAD

content: U Superintendent of Police (SP) ka East Khasi Hills District, u Rituraj Ravi (IPS), uba la paw khubor ha kine ki sngi na ka daw ka jingthmu ban rah da ka bor ïa ka Kong Bindas Syiem na jaka shah thngan ha Additional Secretatiat sha Hospital ha ka miet 8 tarik mynta u bnai, u la shah pynkynriah kam da kaba un shimti noh kum u Commandant jong ka 6th Battalion ha Umran.Ha jaka jong u, yn wan shimti biang da u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger(IPS) uba la ju long teng u SP ka East Khasi Hills District.Lah ban kdew hangne ba u Ravi, u la shah ujor na kiba bun ki liang ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingleit jong u shiteng miet ban rah Medical Check-up jubor ïa ka Kong Bindas Syiem ha ka por ba ka pynlong da ka jingshah thngan ba khlem pud sngi hajan Additional Secretariat. Halor kane ka jingleh jong u ka tnad Pulit ka la shah pan kaiphod ha ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC) bad u Ravi u la shah khot hajir ha ka Commission ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai.Nalor u Ravi la don ruh kiwei pat ki heh Pulit kiba shah pynkynriah kam kiba kynthup ïa u Vivek Syiem (IPS) uba ju bat kum u SP, CID, uba la kiew kyrdan noh kum u Assistant Inspector General of Police (Law& Order).U heh duh ki Pulit ban shah pynkynriah kam u dei u Mukesh Kumar Singh (IPS) uba long u Inspector General of Police (Law& Order) bad un shimti noh kum u Inspector General of Police, Commandant General Civil Defencen and Home Guards.U Jerry F.K Marak, IPS, Inspector General of Prisons, Shillong u la shah pynkynriah noh kun u Commandant, 2nd MLP Bn, Goeragre, West Garo Hills, Tura ha ka jaka jong u Bah Bashanborlang J. Laloo, MPS u ban shimti noh kum u Commandant ki SF-10, Shillong.U Bah Herbert G. Lyngdoh, IPS Superintendent of Police, Anti-Infiltration Directorate, Shillong un shimti noh kum u Commandant, 1st MLP Bn, Mawiong ha ka jaka jong u Pawar Swapnil Vasantrao, u ban shimti noh kum u Superintendent of Police, North Garo Hills District, Resubelpara. U Bah Shri Lakador Syiem, IPS, Commandant, 4th MLP Bn, Sohpian u la shah pynkynriah kam noh ban shimti kum u Principal, Police Training School, Umran ha ka jaka jong ka Mary G T. Sangma, IPS, ka ban shimti noh kum ka Superintendent of Police, Anti-Infiltration Directorate, Shillong.Kiwei pat ki Pulit kiba la shah pynkynriah kam ki long u Pankaj Kumar Rasgania, IPS, Superintendent of Police, City, Shillong kan shimti noh kum ka Superintendent of Police (Sadar), Shillong. U Abraham T. Superintendent of Police, North Garo Hills, Resubelpara un shimti noh kun u Superintendent of Police, West Garo Hills, Tura. U Ringrang T G. Momin, MPS, Superintendent of Police, F&ES, Tura, un shimti noh kum u Superintendent of Police, CID, Shillong ha jaka u Bah Vivek Syeim. U Bruno A Sangma, MPS, Commandant, SF-10, Shillong un shimti noh kum u Superintendent of Police, F&ES, Tura.
title: SHAH PYNKYNRIAH KAM U SP EAST KHASI HILLS, WAN PHAI BIANG U BAH SYLVESTER NONGTNGER

content: Ka Seng HNLC ka la ong ba ki lai ngut ki briew kiba  la shah kem ha ki Pulit jong ka Ribhoi halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki dawa pisa ha kyrteng ka HNLC, ki dei kiba shong kiba sah ha Block 2, ka jaka kaba don ha ka jingïakajia pud hapdeng ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka jylla Assam.Ki Pulit ka Ribhoi District ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka taïew, ki pyntip ba kine ki lai ngut kiba shah kem ki long u Cyfrank Paul Pariat, 25 snem, na Ummat, u Kitbok Mujai, 23 snem na Ummat bad u Barnabas Lyngdoh, 49 snem na Khyndewso. Ki Pulit ki kynnoh ba kine ki donkti ban sam ïa ki shithi dawa pisa jong ka HNLC ryngkat ruh ka jingbyrngem briew.Katkum ka jingpyllait khubor u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw, General Secretary-cum-Publicity Secretary ka HNLC ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la ong ba kine ki lai ngut ki dei kiba la long ka jingshngaiñ bad jingïada na ka bynta ki paidbah kiba shong ba sah ha Block 2 na ka jingwan thombor da ki Pulit Assam, na ka jingshah knieh ki jingthung jingtep ha ki Kaikhlaw Karbi, ka jingshah khrong khajna bad kiwei kiwei de ki kam shah thombor.Ka Seng ka pynpaw ruh ka jingsngew lyngngoh balei ba katba shah kem ki dkhot ka HNLC la kynnoh beit ba ki dei ki nongdawa pisa jubor, ki riewbymman, katba ka tnad Pulit ka pyllait suk ïa ki briew la jong kiba donkti ha ki kam bamsap, kam dawa pisa ha surok nalor ba kam don ka jingtreikam kaba khuid ha ka rukom pyndonkam ïa ka pisa kumba ka phla da heh Pulit hi, u Bah  GK Ïangrai.Ha kane ka jingpyllait khubor, ka HNLC ka la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingtreikam ba runar jong ki Pulit kumba la mih khubor ha kine ki sngi ha kaba uwei u rangbah ba la 70 snem ka rta u la shah pyndait da u ksew ha Dawki Police Station.Shuh shuh ka HNLC ka la ong ruh ba hapdeng ka jingsngew kmen ba la shimti da ka longkmie Khasi ïa ka kam DGP, hynrei ka la ong ba ka seng ka artatien ba kane kan ai ïa ka jingshakri na ka bynta ki trai ri trai muluk, ïoh ka shah pyniaid ban shakri na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew.
title: KI LẠI NGUT KI DKHOT KA HNLC BA SHAH KEM KI ÏADA ÏA KI PAIDBAH HA BLOCK-2: SAIÑKUPAR NONGTRAW

content: Ka seng Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ka la phah ka jingai jingmut sha ka Expert Committee kaba khmih ïa ka bhah kam bhah jam jong ka jylla ne ka State Reservation Policy 1972 ha kaba ïa kane ka jingai jingmut la phah sha u Bah L K Diengdoh u ba dei u Secretary jong ka Committee.Ha ka jingthoh ba ka la phah ka la ong ba na ka liang ka seng ka kwah ban ai jingmut bad ki jingpyni ha kaba ïadei bad ka Expert Committee halor ka Meghalaya State Reservation Policy bad lyngba kane ka jingthoh la kyrmen ba ka kan don ka jingpynkylla bad ka jingpdiang ïa kane ka jingai jingmut jong ka seng kaba dei ruh na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki trai ri trai muluk ha ka jylla.“Ngi don ka jingai jingmut ba lada ka Hon’ble Supreme Court ka bat ïa ka sub-classification jong ki ST/SC ka dei kaba long aiñ hapoh ka riti synshar ka ri, kumta halor kane ka nongrim jong ka jingbun paid ki Khasi-Jaiñtia, ka bhah kam ka dei ban long 50%, ki Garo ki dei ban ïoh beit 40% bad kiwei ki kynhun ST dei ban ai beit 3% ka bhah kam. Lada ka sub-classification jong ki ST/SC ka long kaba beaiñ katkum ka jingai jingmut jong ka Hon’ble Supreme Court, kumta ngi don ban ai jingmut ba kadei ban long noh 93% ka bhah kam sha ki ST jong ka jylla, 2% sha ki SC bad 5% dei ban ïeh ha ka unreserved category,” ong ka HYC.Ka la ong ruh ba ha ki kam ha ki District level ka la ai jingmut ba ka combined reservation na ka bynta ki ST dei ban pynneh. Ka bhah kam kadei ban kyntiew sha ka 93% na ka bynta ki ST jong ka jylla ha ki District, 2% sha ki SC bad 5% sha ka unreserved category.Ka HYC ka la ong ruh ba ka Meghalaya State Reservation Policy ka la kynthup lang ïa ki ST bad SC hapoh kawei ka kyrdan, ha kaba kiwei ki ST bad SC la kynthup lang na ka bynta ka 5% reservation. “Ngi ai jingmut ba kane kadei kaba beaiñ bad ngi dei ban ong ba ïa kane dei ban pynduhnoh bad ba ka reservation na ka bynta kiwei ki ST bad SC jong ka jylla dei ban long 3% sha kiwei ki ST bad 2% sha ki SC ha ka jaka jong ka combined 5% reservation,” bynrap ka seng.Ka la ai jingmut ruh ba dei ban don ka jingbhah kam na ka bynta ki kam casual, contractual bad non-permanent employee kiba trei hapoh ka jaka pule sorkar bad kiwei lada ka por kadei palat ban ïa ka 30 sngi bad lada ka don ka lad ban pynthymai ïa ka por jong ka kam.Ka la pynpaw ruh ba kane ka Reservation policy kaba mynta kam bhah kam hapoh ki Scientific services bad post. Kumta ka la dei ban batai ïa ka jingmut jong ka Scientific service bad ki post.Ki kyndon hapoh ka Policy kaba thoh ‘carry-forward’kum ka nuksa lada ki reserved Category-A ym lah ban thep kam ha ka por ba thungkam ha ka snem ba la buh, kumta kano kano ka percentage kaba sah napoh ka Category-A dei ban pyndap da ki kyrtong napoh ka reserved Category B ne C kaba long katkum ka jingshemphang bad jingnang jingstad.Ka bhah ha ki post bad ki jingshakri kaba hapoh ka ‘Public Undertakings and Government Aided Institutions’ dei ban pynneh. Ka kyntien “Government Aided Institutions” kaba khlem batai hapoh ka Policy donkam ban batai bha. Lada ki skul kum ka SSA, ADHOC bad Deficit la kynthup hapoh ki jaka pule ba ïoh jingïarap na ka sorkar, kumta la sngewdei ban ai jingmut ba 93% ka combined reservation na ka bynta ki ST, 2% na ka bynta ki SC bad 5% na ka bynta ki unreserved category kidei ban ai katkum ka jingtyrwa hapoh ka recruitment.Ka seng ka la ai jingmut ruh ba ka sorkar kadei ban thaw da ka aiñ ba kyrpang na ka bynta ka reservation jong ki nonghikai kiba hikai ha ki jaka pule sorkar bad kiba ïoh jingïarap na ka sorkar ha ka jylla. Lada ka sorkar ka thaw la ka jong ka aiñ na ka bynta ka reservation ïa ki nonghikai, la sngew dei ban ai jingmut ba ka dei ban long 93% ka combined reservation na ka bynta ki ST, 2% na ka bynta ki SC bad 5% na ka bynta ki unreserved dei ban bud.“Ngi don ban ai jingmut ba kane ka Job Reservation Policy kaba mynta ym dei ban pyntreikam ne pynjlan na ka bynta ki reservation haba ïadei bad ki admission ha ki jaka pule bad na ka bynta kito kiba pule kham shajrong shabar jylla ha ka bhah kam jong ka jylla. Shuh shuh ngi don ka jingai jingmut ba ka sorkar jylla kadei ban thaw da ka aiñ la ka jong na ka bynta ki reservation hapoh ki admission ha ki jaka pule. Lada ka sorkar kan thaw la ka jong ka aiñ ngi don ban ai jingmut ba 93% ïa ka combined reservation na ka bynta ka ST, 2% na ka bynta SC 5% na ka bynta ki unreserved kadei ban bud,” ong ka HYC.
title: 93% ÏA KI RIEWLUM HA MEGHALAYA AI JINGMUT KA HYC HA KA STATE RESERVATION POLICY

content: Ka jingniah kali khlemakor bad ka jingpynher stet shaba palat jong ki nongniah kali ka dei kawei na ki daw kaba ju wanrah bunsien ia ki jingjia kiba sngewsih khamtam ha ka surokbah National Highway-6 ha Ri Bhoi District.  Ha kawei ka jingjia ha ka Sngi Thohdieng ha ka por kumba 1:00 baje mynstep ar ngut ki mynsiem briew ki la duh ei ia la ka jong ka jingim tang na ka daw ka jingpynher sted bad niah khlem akor shaba palat jong u nongniah kali.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum na ki Pulit jong ka Ribhoi District la iathuh ba u nongniah jong kawei ka kali kamai kaba don ia u number ML05 N0174 kaba mih na Shillong ban leit sha Guwahati u la pynher stet haduh katta katta kat haduh ba u nongniah um lah shuh ban synshar u la kam bad leit tynrah beit ia u Divider jong ka surok bah bad thung khongpong sha shilliang surok.Ki Pulit ki la iathuh ba ha kane ka kali ba la ñiah da u Bah George Kharkongor na ka shnong Nongrah ki ruh sa lai ngut kiwei pat ki nongleit jingleit ia kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Banrap Marboh na ka shnong Mawlynrei, East Khasi Hills, u Bah Frick Kharkongor na ka shnong Nongrah, East Khasi Hills lem bad u Leuwis Kharkongor na ka shnong Lapalang, East Khasi Hills.Ki riew paidbah kiba la sakhi ia kane ka jingjia, ki la pynkit noh ia kine kiba mynsaw sha Nongpoh Civil Hospital na ka bynta ban ioh ia ka jingsumar kyrkieh, katba ia u Bah Banrap Marboh uba la thiah lyngktar ryngkat ka jinglyngkien jong ka snam bad ha ka jingbym tip briew shuh la pynkit noh da ki Pulit, ha kaba ki doctor jong ka Civil Hospital Nongpoh, ki la pynbna ba u ladep khlad lypa.Shuh shuh, ka khubor na ki Pulit ka la iathuh ruh ba ki doctor ka Civil Hospital Nongpoh ki la pyntip ba u Bah Leuwis Kharkongor u dei uba shu mynsaw malu mala katba u Bah Frick Kharkongor u dei uba la kham jur ka jingmynsaw bad la pynkit noh ia u sha Civil Hospital Shillong na ka bynta ban ioh ia ka jingsumar kaba kham bha.Kham hadien, ki Pulit ki la ioh jingtip ba u Bah Frick Kharkongor ruh u la khlad noh ha Civil Hospital Shillong namar ka jingjur shaba palt ka jingmynsaw.Halor kane ka jingjia, Pulit, ki la rah noh ia ka kali sha thanad Nongpoh na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit bad ruh ban pyndep ia ki jingdonkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka ain.
title: ÏAP ARNGUT KI RANGBAH HA SUROK NH-6 BA ÑIAH KALI KHLEM AKOR BAD PYNHER STET U NONGNIAH KALI

content: : Kumba 600 ngut ki samla pule Graduate bad Post Graduate ki la shah pynkup burom ha ka 5th Convocation jong ka jong ka ICFAI University Meghalaya kaba la long ha State Convention Centre, Shillong ha ka sngi Thohdieng ha kaba la sakhi lang da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma, u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u Rakkam A. Sangma,  u Chancellor Lt General (Dr) Arvinder Singh Lambha bad ka Vice Chancelor Dr Alicia Gatphoh bad kiwei kiwei ki kynrem ki lyndan.Ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah bad ki kynrem ki lyndan ki la sam ia ki khusnam General Proficiency Award, Under Graduate bad Post Graduate Merit Certificate bad ia ki khusnam sha ki samla pule kiba la ioh ia ka takma ksiar bad takma rupa ha ki jingpule ki jong ki.U Myntri Rangbah  haba kren sha sha ki samla pule kiba la pyndep ïa ki jingpule ha ki Course bapher bapher ba la tyrwa da ka University, u la ong ba ka Convocation ka dei ka khyllipmat kaba batai ïa ka jingim ki samla pule bad bynrap ba ki samla ki dei ka bor ba khlaiñ duh bad ruh ka jingtynjuh ïa kano kano ka Jylla ne ka Ri.“Ka India ka dei ka Ri kaba kiew sted bha ha ka ïoh ka kot bad ki University bad ki jaka pule kila ïatrei ryngkat ryngkat ban saiñdur ïa ki samla ba kin don bynta ha ka jingkiew shakhmat ka ïoh ka kot da kaba shim kabu ïa ki lad ki kabu kiba donkti ha kane ka jingkiew ka ïoh ka kot,” ula ong.U la pyntip ruh ba ki samla ki dei kiba kongsan bha ha ka jingkiew ka ïoh ka kot ha Meghalaya bad u Myntri Rangbah ula kren bniah bha halor ki katto katne ki prokram jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka kam jngohkai, IT bad kiwei kiwei ha kaba ki samla ki dei ïa kiba la phaikhmat duh.U Myntri Rangbah ula kyntu ruh ïa ki samla ba kin long kiba angnud ban sengkam lyngba ki buit ba ki don bad bynrap, “Phaikhmat sha ki lad sengkam da ki buit ba phi don, ka Sorkar ka long tang ka nongplie lad plie lynti ym ka nongñiah ïa ka kali jong ka ïoh ka kot”.
title: 600 NGUT ÏOH DEGREE KI SAMLA PULE KA ICFAI UNIVERSITY, PYNKUP BUROM U CM

content: : Ki nongtrei jong ka tnat Pule Puthi kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka All Meghalaya SSA Non-Teaching Staff Association (AMSSANTSA) ki bym hun ïa ka jingkular jong Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u Rakkam A. Sangma ha ka jingïakynduh ïa u ha sngi Thohdieng, ki la pynban ban ïaid beit shakhmat ïa ki prokram jingïakhih hadien ba la kut ka jingaipor kaba 15 sngi ïa ka Sorkar Jylla.Ïa kane la pynbna da u General Secretary ka AMSSANTSA u Bah Barikupar Mylliemngap hadien ka jingïakynduh ïa u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u Rakkam A Sangma ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.U Bah Barikupar ula ong ba ha ka jingkynduh, u Myntri u la kular ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan sa shimkhia ïa ki iingdawa jong ki hynrei watla katta ruh um shym ai satia ka jingkular ban leh eiei halor ka jingdawa ban kyntiew ïa ka tulop.U la ong ba u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u la khot ïakren hadien ba ka Seng ka la aipor 15 sngi ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban kyntiew noh ïa ka tulop katkum ka jingtyllun jong ka por namar ka jingrem shaba palat ki marbam mardih bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam ba manla ka sngi.“Ha ka jingïakren u Myntri u la ong ba un sa shimkhia ïa ki jingdawa jong ngi hynrei ngim hun namarba ngi khlem ïoh ïa ka jingkular kaba pynhun mynsiem ïa ngi, namarkata, ngin ïaid beit shakhmat ïa ki prokram jingïakhih hadien ba kut ka jingaipor kaba 15 sngi ïa ka Sorkar Jylla,” la pyntip u Bah Barikupar.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka AMSSANTA kan shong kyrkieh ïa ka jingïalang jong ka Executive Committee ban shim rai kum kiei ki jingïakhih kiba ka Association kan sa pynbna ha ki sngi ki ban wan.
title: BYM HUN ÏA KA JINGKULAR U MYNTRI SORKAR BYRNGEM ÏAKHIH KI NONGTREI SKUL SSA

content: : Ka Joint Action Committee, Narpuh kaba kynthup ka shnong Umkiang, Ratacherra, Dona Skur, Dona Umbluh, Pyrtakuna, Kuliang, Borsara, haduh Tongseng, East Jaiñtia Hills District ka la rai ban pynlong da ka jingpakhang surok kaba khlem buh por ia ka surokbah National Highway-6 kata naduh Tongseng shaduh Malidor.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President ka JAC Narpuh u Bah L. Bareh u la pyntip ba kane ka jingpakhang ia ka surokbah NH-6 kan sdang naduh ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 7:00 baje mynstep bad ka JAC kan shah ban iaid tang ki kali kit nongpang, ki kali ba kit ia ki bor pahara bad ki kali jong ki nongthoh khubor, katba ïa kiwei kiwei ki kali ka JAC kan ym shah satia ban iaid.“Ka JAC ka la shim ïa ka rai kaba tyngeh ban pynlong ia ka jingpakhang surok kaba khlem buh por ia kaba yn sa weng tad haduh ba ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba ka NHAI/ NHIDCL kan shna pyndep ïa ka surok bad ban maramot bha ïa ki thliew ki syar kiba la long kum ki krem ki kroh ha shilynter ka surokbah NH-6 ha ka thaiñ  Namchiang ha Narpuh bad kumjuh bad shna ïa ki nala tuid um kiba paka,”ong u kyrwoh.Ka JAC ka la kyntu ïa baroh ki paidbah nongshong shnong, ia ki  nongleit nongwan ba kin iasnohkti lang ha kane ka jingpakhang surok namar ka jingleh kuman bad ka jingleh bym khein snep jong ka Sorkar ia ka thaiñ Namchiang ban shna pynbha ïa ka surokbah NH-6.
title: BYM KHEIÑ SNEP KA NHAI, KHLEM PUD SNGI YN PAKHANG KA JAC NARPUH ÏA KA NATIONAL HIGHWAY-6

content: Ka Meghalaya State Education Commission (MSEC) ka la phah ïa ka kaiphod (interim report) ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkyntiew ïa ka tulop jong ki nonghikai skul Adhoc Upper Primary School.Ïa kane la pyntip da u Secretary ka Meghalaya Upper Primary School Teachers Association (MUPSTA) u Bah S. Lamare ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.U la ong ba ka Association shen kan sa buddien bad ban peit ha kano ka rukom ka Sorkar kan pyntreikam ïa ka kaiphod.U Bah Lamare u la ong ba ki nonghikai skul Adhoc ki dei kiba la shakri la slem bha bad ki don ruh katto katne ki nonghikai kiba la khladnoh ki bym shym la ïoh jingsiew bad kiba la noh ka rta ki hap ban shu im khlem kano kano ka jingïoh jingmyntoi.U la ong ba naduh ki snem 1993-94 ïa ki skul Adhoc ha ka jylla ym pat shym la kyntiew sha ka kyrdan Deficit System.“Ngi sngewnguh ïa kaei kaba ka Commission ka la leh bad ngin sa buddien halor kane,” la ong u Bah Lamare.Haba pynpaw ba ka kam bad ka jingsiew ka dei ban long markatjuh u Bah Lamare u la ong, ba ka tulop kaba ki nonghikai skul Adhoc ki ïoh ka dei ban long kaba mar ïaryngkat bad ka tulop kaba la siew ïa ki nonghikai skul Sorkar ne ïa ki nonghikai jong ki skul Deficit.“Ngi la ïoh jingtip ba ka MSEC ka ladep phah ïa ka kaiphod sha ka Sorkar bad ïa mynta ngim pat shim rai eiei ban pynlong ïa ki jingïakhih,” u la ong.Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la thaw ïa ka MSEC ha u Naitung jong u snem baladep ïa kaba la khlieh da ka Prof. Sherwin May Sungoh na ka Department of Education, NEHU kum ka Chairperson ban ai jingmut sha ka Sorkar ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingeh jong ki skul bad ki kolej, ka tulop nonghikai skul bad kolej, ka jingtreikam jong ki School Managing Committee bad kiwei kiwei.Ha ka jingïalang ka MUPSTA ka la pynkup burom ruh ïa u President barim jong ka seng u Bah Kenneth Shadap uba la shakri mon sngewbha la bun bun snem kum u nongïalam jong ka Association bad uba la noh synniang shikatdei ban trei na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki nonghikai skul Adhoc Upper Primary.
title: DEP AITI KA MSEC ÏA KA KAIPHOD KYNTIEW TULOP KI NONGHIKAI UP ADHOC SHA KA SORKAR

content: : Ka jingther jong u slap uba jur ha South West Khasi Hills ha ka sngi Sajtiaiñ ka la wanrah ia ka jingtwa khyndew ha ki hynñiew tylli ki longïing ki la shah ktah ha ka ïing ba ki shong ki sah.U District Disaster Management Officer (DDMO) jong ka South West Khasi Hills District Dr. E.S. Lynshiang, u la ïathuh ba ki longïing kiba la shah ktah haduh mynta ki don baroh 12 tylli ki longïing kata 9 tylli na Mawkyrwat C&RD Block bad 3 tylli ha Ranikor C&RD Block.U iathuh ba ki shnong kiba la shah ktah ha ka jingtwa khyndew ki long ka shnong Mawkhlaitngap, Manad, Lummawbah bad ha Mawpud. La antad ba ka jingtwa ka khyndew kaba la ktah ia kine ki longïing ka la jia ha ka por kumba 1:00 baje mynstep ha ka 15 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha kawei pat ka jingjia, la iathuh ba ka la don ruh ka jingshah ktah jong ki lyngkha kba bad ka jingtwa ka surok ba dei ïaid na Tynnai sha Mawbidong.La ïathuh ba ha kine ki jingjia ym shym la don mano mano ba mynsaw ne jingjia ba sngewsih, la ong u Dr. Lyngshiang.
title: SYLLAD U LAPBAH HA SWKH, SHAH KTAH 9 TYLLI KI ING HA MAWKYRWAT BAD 3 TYLLI HA RANIKOR

content: Ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) jong ka 110 Battalion ha ka sngi Thohdieng mynta ka taiew ki la ioh kurup ia ki dawai ba la song bha ha ki synduk bad ia ki mobile phone kiba shongdor 73 lak tyngka ia kiba la thmu ban shalan beain sha ka ri Bangladesh da ki snar nongkhaii na khappud jong ka East Khasi Hills District.Hadien ba la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah, ki shipai BSF ki hiar sha rud ka wah Khasimara ha kaba ki la lap ia kine ki dawai bad ki mobile phone ba la shong bha ha ki synduk.  Ia kine ki mar khaii tuh la aiti noh sha ka ophis Custom ban leh ia kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka ain.Ha kawei pat ka jingkhynra, ki shipai BSF jong ka 200 Battalion da ka jingiatreilang bad ki Pulit ka jylla Meghlaay ki la ioh kurup 10 hajar kilo ka shini ba la buhrieh ha kawei ka ingjah kaba don ha khappud jong ka shnong Rongra, South Garo Hills.
title: KI DAWAI, MOBILE PHONE BAD SHINI BA SHONGDOR 77 LAK KURUP KI BSF NA KHAPPUD

content: : Ki Pulit ka Anti-Narcotics Task Force (ANTF) ka East Khasi Hills kiba la pynlong ia ka jingtalasi ia ki kali ha ka step Lah Sngi u Blei, ki la ioh ban kurup 454.32 gram u drok Heroin hajan Madanriting Police Station na ki arngut ki kynthei Manipuri kiba shong ha kawei ka kali Tourist.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills Bah S. Nongtnger la iathuh ba ia kine ki arngut ki snar khaii drok kynthei la ithuh kyrteng kum ka Tinkhonei Haokip, 37 snem ka rta bad kawei pat kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Mongkim Haokip, 53 snem ka rta kiba sah ha ka shnong New Keithelmanbi, Senapati, ManipurKi Pulit ki la kem noh ia kine ki arngut bad ka jingtohkit mynta ka dang iaid shakhmat hadien ba la register case hapoh ka Section 21(c)/29 jong ka NDPS Act ha Madanriting Police Station.
title: SHAH KEM ARNGUT KI KYNTHEI MAIPURI, KURUP KI PULIT 454.32 GRAM U DROK

content: : Ka All India Garo Union (AIGU) ka la phah ïa ka jingai jingmut halor ka Reservation Policy sha ka Expert Commitee ban pynneh ïa ka ‘Status Quo.”Ha ka dorkhas ba la phah ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, ka Union ka la kyntu ban kiar na kano kano ka jingpynbeit thymmai (ïa ka Reservation Policy) namarba kan pynmong ïa ka jingsngew jong ki jaidbynriew Garo.“Lada jia ba ka don kano kano ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ka Policy, kan pynmong haduh katta katta ïa ka jingsngew jong ki Garo, bad ka ban ym long na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ïa ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei.  Ka lah ruh ban mih ka jingïakhih paidbah.  Namarka, na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki paidbah ba bun balang, dei ban pynneh beit ïa ka ‘Status Quo”, la ong  President ka AIGU u Elbarth Marak.Ka Union ka la ong ba ka Reservation Policy ka dei kaba long markatjuh bad kaba la wanrah ruh ïa ka jingmyntoi naduh u snem 1972.“Ïa mynta ka jingïabhah hapdeng ki jaidbynriew bapher bapher ha ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei kaba long markatjuh bad lada ka don kano kano ka jingpynbeit thymmai yn lah ban pdiang da leilei ruh em,” la bynrap ka AIGU.Ka la bynrap shuh shuh ba ka jingdawa ban khmih biang ïa ka Policy ka dei kaba la wanrah da ki nongpyrta shla jong ki seng saiñpyrthei na ka bynta ki jingmyntoi politik, da ka buit ba kam ba kam don ka jingïaryngkat bad ban ym burom shuh ïa ki paid Garo.
title: WAT PYNBEIT THYMMAI ÏA KA RESERVATION POLICY ÏOH MIH KA JINGÏAKHIH PAIDBAH: AIGU

content: Ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) ka 200 Battalion ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki Pulit ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka jingkhynra ha ka sngi u Blei mynta ka taiew ki la ioh ban kurup haduh 19,000 hajar kilo ka shini ia kaba la thmu ban shalan be-aiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh ba la buhrieh ha kawei ka ingjah kaba don hajan khappud ha ka shnong Rongra ha khappud jong ka South Garo Hills District.Ia ka shini ba la ioh kurup la aiti noh sha ki Pulit jong ka Rongra Police Station ban leh ia kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka ain.
title: 19 HAJAR KILO KA SHINI BA THMU SHALAN BEAIÑ SHA BANGLADESH ÏOH KURUP KI BSF

content: Ka Muaythai Association of Meghalaya ka la pdiang burom da ka jingsarong ia ki khynnah shynrang bad kynthei kiba la leit ban iashim bynta ha ka National United Muaythai Championship ba la pynlong da ka All Assam Armatuer Muaythai Championship and Pro Fight Night 2024 ha Laxmibai Institute Physical Tapesia, AssamHa ka jingialang pdiang burom kaba la long ha ka shnong Demseniong, Shillong ha 15 tarik, Jylliew, 2024 la sakhi lang da ki nongialam jong ka Muaythai Association of Meghalaya bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.Ki nongjop ha kane ka National United Muaythai Championship ki la shah jied ban leit iashim bynta  ha ka Sub Junior, Junior, shynrang bad kynthei ha ka Muaythai Fight Armatuer Under-23 bad kaWaikru jong ka lympung iakura kaba la tip kum ka “Youth IFMA WORLD Muaythai Championship” ka ban sa long ha Thailand, Bangkok naduh 26 tarik, Nailur, haduh ka 4 tarik, Risaw, 2024.Ka Muaythai Association of Meghalaya ka ai khublei kyrpang ia ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba ka ophis jong ka Directorate of Sports and Youth Affairs, ia ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association kiba ju iarap ban kyntiew ia ka jingiakura Muay Thai bad ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh shikatdei eh ia ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association kaba la ai jingithuh ia ka jingiakura Muay Thai, bad kaba la pynrung ia kane ka jingiakura ha ka Meghalaya Games ka ban sa long ha West Jaintia Hills Distrirct ha u snem 2025.
title: JOP KI NONGÏAKURA MUAY THAI NA MEGHALAYA HA KA NATIONAL UNITED MUAYTHAI C’SHIP

content: : Uwei u rangbah uba la tip kyrteng u Suku Mejar, 40 snem ka rta uba shong basah ha Down-Gate, Nongpoh, Ribhoi District u la pynkut noh ïa la ka jong ka jingim ha u tyllai phasi ha kawei ka ïing jah kaba don sha trai jong ka ing mala kaba don ha Nongpoh.Une u rangbah u dei uba la don saw ngut ki khun bad uba ju trei bylla sngi katba ïoh bad namar ba um shym la sah lang bad ki khun mynta la bun bun snem u la thiah kat haba lap ka miet.Dei tad ha ka por kumba 10 baje mynstep ki paidbah kiba ïaid najan kane ka ing, ki la lap ïa ka met jong u Bah Mejar uba la sdien phasi ia lade da u tyllai phasi  bad mar mar ki la pyntip noh sha ki bor pyniaid shnong bad kumjuh sha ki Pulit jong ka Nongpoh Police Station.Ia ka met jong u Bah Suku Mejar la shimti noh da ki Pulit ban pynkit sha Nongpoh Civil Hospital ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit.
title: HA U TYLLAI PHASI PYNKUT U RANGBAH ÏA LA KA JINGIM HA NONGPOH

content: Ka Hynniewtrep Youths’ Council Seng Kmie ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la phah biang sa hynriew ngut ki samla kiba la im kyrni ha ka jingdih drok ban ioh jingsumar ha ka ALIVE AGAIN FOUNDATION, ka Rehabilitation Centre kaba don ha ka jylla Assam.U Vice President jong ka HYC Bah Donboklang Kharlyngdoh u la iathuh ba u don ruh uwei na ki samla ba la im kyrni ban dih drok ba la wan aiti da ka Seng Samla Mawryngkneng ban phah sumar ha kane ka ka Rehabilitation Centre kaba don ha ka jylla Assam.  Nalor une uwei, ki don pat sa san ngut kiba na kane ka nongbah Shillong kiba ka seng ka la phah sumar ha ka ALIVE AGAIN FOUNDATION.U la iathuh ba ka seng naduh ka sngi ba ka la pynbna ban iakhun pyrshah ia u drok, ki dkhot jong ka seng kim shym la shongthait hynrei ki la leit sha kylleng ki jaka ym tang ban khynra ne thang ia u drok hadien ba la kurup na ki nongdih drok hynrei ka seng ka la sneng la kraw bad la phah ruh ia kine ki samla sha ki Rehabilitation Centre hadien ba la ai jingmynjur na ki bahaiing hasem jong kine ki samla.
title: SHA REHAB CENTRE, ASSAM PHAH SUMAR KA HYC ÏA 6 NGUT KI SAMLA KYRNI DIH DROK

content: Ki paidbah nongleit nongwan lyngba ka surok Nongstoiñ-Maweit, ha ka sngi Balang ki la sahkut ha surok kumba katto katne por namar ka jingjur shaba palat ka jingtwa khyndew bad ka jingkhyllem jong ki dieng ha kane ka surok khamtam hajan ka shnong Risiang West Khasi Hils District.Kane ka surok Nongstoiñ-Maweit ka dei ka surok kaba dang pyntrei da ka Dhar Construction Company bad na ka jingther jong u slap mynta la katto katne sngi ka la nang pynsynjor shuh shuh ïa ka khyndew bad kaba la wanrah ruh ia ka jingtwa khyndew sha surok kat haduh ba ki paidbah nongleit nongwan ki la mad ia ka jingsyrtok.Ka thymmei khubor ba la ïohlum ka ïathuh ba kham hadien katto katne ki kor puh shilum jong ka Dhar Construction Company ki la wan poi ban pynkhuid ïa ka khyndew khnang ban khat ia ka khyndew kaba la twa hapdeng surok.
title: TWA KA KHYNDEW, KHYLLEM KI DIENG HA KA SUROK NONGSTOIÑ-MAWEIT

content: U President jong ka Shillong Sports Association (SSA) Bah Banteidor ha ka sngi Balang ryngkat bad ki nongkitkam jong ka Shillong Sports Association (SSA) ki la hiar jurip ia ka madan First Ground, ha Polo na ka bynta ban peit bniah thik pa thik ia ka jinglong ka jingman jong kane ka madan  bad ia baroh ki bynta jong ka madan bad ia ka stadium kum shibynta ban buddien ia ki kam kiba dang sah teng bad ki bym pat lah  ban pyndep satia.U Chief Engineer ka State Sports Council (SSC) ka Jylla Meghalaya ryngkat u Kontrator ba la pyntrei ia ka madan Artificial Turf jong ka madan First Ground ki la kular ia u President bad ia baroh ki dkhot jong ka SSA, ba kin sa shimkhia ban maramot bad ban pynbha lut noh ia baroh ki bynta jong kane ka madan ialehkai phutbol.Ha kaba iadei bad kane u Bbah Banteidor u la pynpaw ruh ba kane ka jingjurip ba mynta ka sngi kan ym kut tang  ha ka jingwan buddien hynrei ka Shillong Sports Association kan sa ai ruh da ka jingthoh sha ka sorkar.Kane ka jingjurip ia kane ka madan ialehkai phutbol ka la jia ryngkhat ruh ha kane ka kynti ba ka jingther jong u lapbah ka lyiur u la pynjulor ia ka madan ialehkai ia kaba la dei ban maramot.
title: JURIP KA SSA ÏA KA FIRST GROUND HA POLO, KULAR U CE BAD CONTRACTOR BAN SHNA PYNDEP

content: Ka Kong Martina Pohshna na ka shnong Kuliang, East Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka sngi Palei ka ujor da ka ejahar pyrshah ïa ki shipai BSF da kaba kynnoh ba ki thombor ia u kurim bad jrong kti ruh ia ka khun kynthei ha ka miet sngi Balang.Ia ka ejahar la register case ha Umkiang Patrolling Post.Kumba la paw ha ki video, la sakhi ba ki shipai BSF ki la thombor ki la kren bad byrthen ruh da ki ktien sih tien sang bad rah ruh da ki tiar pynmynsaw.Ha ka ejahar ka Kong Martina ka la iathuh ba ha ka sngi Balang ha ka por 11.30 baje mynmiet lai ngut ki briew kiba khlem phong Uniform bad kiba la kam ialade ba ki dei ki shipai BSF ki la wan kynjat da ka bor ïa ka jingkhang bad pynpait ruh ïa ka jingkhang jong ïing bad nalor kata, ki sdang ban ktah kti ïa u kurim jong ka u Bah Shanroi Lyngkhoi, ki la patan ïa u shabar bad ki la bom la shoh haduh ba la kdiah ki shyieng krung.“Ngi la pyrshang ban iada ïa u kurim hynrei ngim lah ban iakhun namar ki la thombor shaba palat bad hadien kane ki shipai ki phet noh na ïing jong nga,” la iathuh ka Kong Martina ha ka ejahar bad bynrap, “sa kumba ha ka por 12.30 baje mynstep ki la wan biang haduh khatsan ngut bad ki la thombor biang ïa u kurim jong nga.  Ki la patrong bad jrong kti ruh ïa ka khun kynthei jong nga kaba dang 15 snem ka rta.  Ma nga kum ka kmie nga la pyrshang ban iada ïa la ka jong ka khun hynrei ki la kynjat pynban ïa nga haduh ba  nga la pang lut ka met ka phad bad ki la set ïa ka shyntur jong ka khun jong nga haduh ba la pang ka shyntur,” la iathuh ka Kong Pohshna.“Hadien kane ki la pynap da ki suloi ïa ngi bad byrngem ruh ban siat da ki suloi.  Ngi la kyrpad bad ong sngewbha wat siat ïa ngi, hadien kane ki la byrngem ïa ka khun jong nga ba kin sa peitkai lada ka wan sha Umkiang.  Hadien kine kiei kiei ngan sa tip tikna ba ki dei shisha ki shipai BSF,” la bynrap shuh shuh ka Kong Pohshna.Ka Kong Martina ka la kyntu ïa ki Pulit ban kem ïa ki shipai BSF kiba donkti ban thombor ia ka ing ka sem jong ka bad ban pynshitom katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: KHEIÑ KI SHYIENG KRUNG U RANGBAH BA THOMBOR KI BSF ÏA KA ÏING HA KULIANG

content: Ka HYC Central Body lyngba u President u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem ka la lap ba ka la don ka jyrsieh kaba khraw bha ha kaba iadei bad ka jingthied ia ki tin sopiing da ka sorkar lyngba ka tnat kaba dei peit bad kumta halor kane ka seng ka la dawa ïa ka sorkar ba kadei ban phah pynphai noh ïa ki “Corrugated Aluminium Roofing Sheet” ne ki tin sopiing ba la aiti sha ki C&RD Block ha ka jylla.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Synrem u la ong ba ka seng ka la phah ia ka dorkhas sha u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad Sangma, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u Bah Prestone Tynsong bad sha u Myntri ka tnat Housing u Marcuise N Marak ha kaba ka la ïathuh ba ka la ïohpdiang ïa ki jingkhñium halor ki jinglong jingman jong kine ki ‘Aluminium Roofing Sheets” ba la sam sha ki C&RD Block bad ba la dep ruh bna sap sha ki katto katne kiba ïoh myntoi ha Khasi-Jaiñtia Hills.“Ngi la leit ban tohkit halor kane bad la leit jngoh ruh ïa ki katto katne ki C&RD Block ban pynshisha bad ha kine ki jingleit ngi la lap ïa ka jinglong pohdor bad ka jingbym bha jong kine ki tin sopiing ba la thied da ka Directorate of Housing, Meghalaya, Shillong bad ba la sam da ka Supplier ba la tip kum ka ‘Hariana Iron Works Pvt. Ltd, Kolkata, West Bengal’, kaba um ju khaïi ne shna ne sam ïa ki tin sop ïing ne roofing sheet kumba la pynpaw hapoh ka profile jong ka kompeni,” ong u Bah Roy.U la ong ba katkum ka jingtip ka seng, ka Directorate of Housing ka la buh ïa ka order bad kawei ka kompeni ban sam ïa ki Corrugated Aluminium Roofing Sheet ha AA3105H18 Alloy jong ka 8 Feet ka jingjrong (Length), 800MM ka jingïar (Width) bad 0.45MM ka jingrben kumba ju leh.Ka jingrben kaba 0.45MM kadei kaba biang na ka bynta ki tin ba bha haba la sam sha kiba ïoh myntoi, hynrei ha ka jingtohkit ka seng bad ki jingujor ba la ïohpdiang ka jingrben ki tin ba la sam da katei ka kompeni ka long tang kumba 0.25MM bad kadei kaba pohdor bad kam long ruh kaba bit ban shna sem ki jingri,” ong ka HYC.Namar kata ka seng ka dawa badei ban pynphai ïa ki tin ba la sam da ka ‘Hariana Iron Works Pvt. Ltd, Kolkata, West Bengal’ sha kiba bun ki C&RD Block ha ka jylla bad dei ban pynsangeh noh mardor ïa ka jingsam ïa ki.Namar kane ka kam ka kynthup ïa ka jingpynlut ka pisa paidbah, kumta dei ban pynlong ka jingtohkit, dei ban shimkam pyrshah ïa Director, Directorate of Housing, Government of Meghalaya, Shillong kiba dei ki nongthied (Buyer) bad kino kino ki ophisar kiba donkti halor kane, bad ïa ka kompeni ‘Hariana Iron Works Pvt. Ltd, Kolkata, West Bengal’ dei ban buh dak ïong ïa kino kino ki kam hadien habud bad ka sorkar jylla, dei ban shimkam pyrshah ïa ki Block Development Officer (s) ne kino kino ki ophisar hapoh ki C&RD Block ba ki la pdiang ïa kane ka kam ban sam ïa ki tin bad kiwei kiwei.“Lada kam don kano kano ka jingshimkhia ba mardor kan pynbor ïa ka seng ban shim da kiwei ki lad ki lynti halor kane ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa ka pisa u paidbah,” ong u President ka HYC Sengkmie u Bah Synrem.
title: THAD MADAN KA HYC ÏA KA JYRSIEH THIED TIN SOPÏING KA TNAT DIRECTORATE OF HOUSING KA SORKAR JYLLA

content: U MP ba marwei ka seng NPP uba mihkhmat sha Rajya Sabha u Dr WR Kharlukhi ha ka sngi Palei u la ujor pyrshah ïa u YouTuber uba la kynnoh bamsap halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Members of Parliament Local Area Development Scheme (MPLADS).Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Kharlukhi u la ong ba u long uba kloi ban pdiang ïa kino kino ki jingtohkit bad un iehnoh ruh ïa ka kam MP lada lap ïa kano kano ka kam bamsap ba la shem ha kaba pyntreikam ïa ka MP skhim ka jong u.“Nga ujor bad ka cyber crime police station pyrshah ïa u YouTuber ‘RS Kharbani’ halor ka jingkynnoh ba nga la bamsap bad ba ka don ka jingbam sap ha kaba pyntreikam ïa ka skhim MP,” u la ong.“Lada mano mano ki don ki sakhi bad lada mano mano ki wan bad kin leit ai sha ki lad pathai khubor ba nga la shim ïa ka pisa, nga dalade ngan thoh sha ka sorkar bad ban pan da ka jingtohkit CBI bad nga kloi ruh ban leit sha Along, phi lah ban leit sha ki shnong, lada ki ong ba lada kane ka kam kaba khlem pyndep da maki, lane kiba la pyntrei da ki briew jong u Dr Kharlukhi, bad ngan iehnoh hi ha kane ka sngi kum u MP,” ong u MP da kaba ai ruh ka jingmaham ba un pan da ka bai mynraiñ khmat pyrshah ïa ka jingpyrshang da mano mano ban pynjah burom ïa u.“Nga long uba shai bad nga don 3 tylli ki bank account. Nga long uba kloi ïa kano kano ka jingshah khynra da kano kano ka aiñ ne ka law enforcement agency,” u la bynrap.U Kharlukhi u la ong ba kane ka jingkynnoh ka la wan ruh ha ka por ba u la jan shong thait na ka kam saiñ pyrthei. “Nga lah jan dap 40 snem ha ki kam saiñ pyrthei bad ngan sa shongthait noh shen bad kum kine ki mih kumta nga sngewdei ban pynshai namar nga long uba kloi ïa kano kano ka jingtohkit ha kano kano ka por,” u la ong da kaba kdew ruh ba un sa shong thait hadien ba u la dap 70 snem ka rta.Halor ki kam jong ka MP scheme jong u, u State President barim ka NPP u la ong ba u la sdang ban ïoh ïa ka MP scheme na ka bynta u snem 2022-2023 namar kam shym la don kano kano ka skhim kaba la ai ha ka por ba syllad ka khlam Covid. Ha katei ka por u ai ka jingmynjur ïa ki skhim sha ki nodal officer (deputy commissioner), ha kaba kin phah ïa kajuh sha ki block development officer (BDOs) ban pyllait ïa ka fund sha ki nongïoh myntoi ba kynthup ïa ki Dorbar Shnong bad ki seng.Hynrei kane ka rukom treikam ka la kylla na ka bynta u snem 2023-2024. Ha ka jaka jong ka rural development department ha Delhi, ïa ka skhim la pyllait beit da ka parliament sha ki district officer bad sha ki BDO, u la ong.Haba ong ba kam don kano kano kaba buhrieh, u Bah Kharlukhi u la ong ba u la pyntrei pura ïa ka pisa T. 5 klur ba la mang hapoh ka MP scheme na ka bynta u snem 2022-2023 katba ka skhim jong u snem 2024, ka dang poi mynta sha ki nongïoh myntoi. Ka jingpynslem ka long na ka daw jong ki general election sha ka Lok Sabha, kaba dang shudep kut dangshen.Haba kylli, u MP u la ong ba ha ka jingïohi jong u ïa ki Social Media ka long, “Ki dei ki pukni kiba bam tang ïa ka doh pyut.”
title: MUDUI U MP RAJYA SABHA PYRSHAH ÏA U YOUTUBER BA KYNNOH BAMSAP HA KA MP SCHEME

content: : Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha ka Director General of Police (DGP) ka jylla ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang da kaba ban weng noh ïa ka khyrdop Check-Gate jong ki shipai BSF ha jingkieng Sonapyrdi, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u General Secretary ka KSU-EJH samla KS Suchiang u la ong, ba ka don jong ki shipai BSF ha shilynter ka surokbah NH-6 ka long kaba beaiñ namarba ka jingthmu ka long ba ki shipai BSF ki dei ban ïada ïa u pud u sam bad ban khanglada ïa ka jingwanrung kyrthep jong ki mynder na ka ri Bangladesh sha India.Ha ka dorkhas, ka seng ka la pyntip ruh ba ki shipai ki shu shong jubor ha ka jaka jong ki riewshimet nalor ba pyndik ruh ïa ki paidbah na ka por sha ka por.Ka seng ka la kyrpad ïa ka heh Pulit jong ka Jylla ban weng noh mardor ïa ki shipai BSF kiba buh ïa ka Check post ha jingkieng Sonapyrdi, ha ka shnong Dona Umbluh bad ha Ratacherra.Halor kine ki jingjia, ka KSU ka la ïathuh ba ki la don jingujor sha u Deputy Commisioner bad sha u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District hynrei kam poi shano shano bad kum ka seng ka don ïa ka jingsngewsyier na kane ka jingleh klumar jong ki BSF ha ka thaiñ khamtam ïa ki paidbah kiba shong ba sah ha shnong Sonapur, Rattacherra bad Hingaria.Ka KSU ka la kyntu ruh ïa ka DGP ban buh shuh shuh ïa ka jaka talasi mynder ne ka Anti-Infiltration Check Gate ha ka shnong Tongseng khnang ban tehlakam ïa ka jingwan rung kyrthep beaiñ jong ki mynder na ka ri Bangladesh sha ki karkhana pynmih dewbilat kiba don ha East Jaiñtia Hills District namarba ka Anti-Infiltration Check Gate kaba don ha Umtyra kam lah satia ban tehlakam ïa ka jingwan rung jong ki mynder ri.Ka Seng ka la kyrpad ruh ban buh ïa ka tnat jong ki Pulit pynïaid kali ha East Jaiñtia Hills khnang ban weng ïa ka jingdheng kali.
title: DAWA KA KSU BAN BUH ANTI-INFILTRATION CHECK-GATE HA TONGSENG, PHAH WENG ÏA KI BSF NA SONAPYRDI

content: : U MP ka Rajya Sabha u Dr WR Kharlukhi ha ka sngi Palei u la kam ba ka daw kaba kongsan shalyndet ka jingshah rem ka National People’s Party (NPP) ha ka Lok Sabha elekshon ba dang shudep na Tura bad Shillong Seat ka dei namar ka “State Reservation Policy” bad ym dei na ka daw ka jingkyrshan jong ka BJP.U la ong ba kan bha ïa ka party ban rem ha ka election na ka bynta ka jingdonkam ka jingïalong kawei jong ka jylla.U Dr. Kharlukhi uba dei ruh u State President barim jong ka NPP Meghalaya State Unit u la maham ruh ba ka dei ka dak kaba sniew na ka bynta ka jylla lada ïa ki election la jop na ka daw ka jingshah thngan ba dawa ban khmih biang ïa ka bhah thungkam thungjam ne ka job reservation policy.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Dr. Kharlukhi u la ong ba ka NPP ka la ïakhun bad ka lyer jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ha Khasi-Jaiñtia Hills bad ka lyer jong ka Congress ha thaiñ Garo Hills ha kine ki Lok Sabha election ba dang shudep.“Ha baroh artylli ki lyer ngi la rem namar jong ka state reservation policy. Sha kane ka liang jong ka Khasi-Jaiñtia Hills, ki kwah ka jingkhmih biang bad ki peit sha ngi kumba ngi long kiba pyrshah bad sha ka liang jong ka thaiñ Garo Hills, kim kwah ban khmih biang bad ki peit ïa u Myntri Rangbah kum uba kwah ban pynbiang ïa ka jingdonkam jong ka Khasi Hills,” u la bynrap da kaba ong, “Hynrei nga ai ka jingïaroh shisha ïa u Myntri Rangbah naba ki don ki por ha ki kam saiñ pyrthei, na ka daw ka jingïatylli jong ka jylla, kan kham bha ba ngi rem ha ka election hynrei kum u statesman, phi hap ban rai kaei kaba dei.”“Ha ka por ba jur bha kane ka jingïakhih kaei kaba u Myntri Rangbah u la leh, u la khot ka jingïalang bad u la hap ban mynjur ban khmih biang namar ha ka jingïohi jong u, haoid satang da kane ka lynti bad nga tharai ka la ktah ïa u sha kawei ka liang bad ka la ktah pat ïa sha kane ka liang,” u la ong.“Lada ïa kane ka election la jop lyngba ka saiñ pyrthei kaba khuid ne clean politics, haoid ka dei kaba bha. Nga kren sha kane ka liang Khasi Jaiñtia Hills, bad nga khlem kren sha ka liang ka Garo Hills. Hynrei lada ïa ka election la jop namar ka jingshong shah thngan ban khmih biang ïa ka reservation policy, nga ong ïaphi ba dei ka dak kaba sniew bad ymdei ban khuslai namar ngin sa ïoh kheit biang ïa u soh bad nga tharai ngi dang ïaibteng ban im ban ïohi ïa ki soh jong ka jingtrei shitom. Kane kadei ka jingïohi jong nga. Ka Clean politics haoid, nga tharai ka la dei ka por ba ki briew kim dei ban shim pisa ha ka por election ka dei ruh kaba bha, hynrei lada ka long da kawei pat ka lynti ka long ka dak kaba sniew na ka bynta ka jylla,” u la ong.Haba kylli, u MP ka Rajya Sabha u la ong ba katkum ka jingïohi jong u ka NPP ka khlem rem namar ka rai kyrshan ba pura jong ka BJP ïa ka party.“Katkum ka jingïohi bad jingkheiñ jong nga kam dei ba ka BJP ka kyrshan ïa ngi. Ngam ngeit ïa kata. Balei nga ong namar ha u snem 2016 ym tang ka BJP kaba kyrshan ïa ngi wat u Tribal Affairs Minister u leit ïalap election bad nga, bad u Myntri Rangbah u la jop la jan 2 lak bad u la pynkheiñ ïa ka record ha Garo Hills,” u la bynrap.
title: KA NPP KA REM HA KA LOK SABHA NA KA STATE RESERVATION POLICY, KAM U MP KA NPP

content: : Ka jingther jong u lapbah lapsan ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ka la wanrah ïa ka jingjulor jong ki surok bad ki lynti ki syngkien ha kiba bun ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Amlarem Civil Sub Division, West Jaiñtia Hills District.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum na u Chief Adviser jong ka Synjuk Waheh Shnong, Amlarem Bah Kolmen Pohshna, ki paidbah ka nongshong shnong jong ka War Jaiñtia, Amlarem Sub Division baroh ki la mad jingeh ha ka leit ka wan, ka leit iew leit hat namar ka jingjur shaba palat u slap ka la wanrah ïa ka jingtwa ka khyndew bad ka jingjot jong ki surok naduh ka shnong Kharkhana shaduh Amlarem, naduh Sankhat – Lumsohrmen – Muktapur shaduh Amlarem bad kumjuh naduh Amlanai – Laremshyiap – Amsohrhong – Trangblang shaduh Amlarem bad kumjuh ka ktah ruh naduh Amkoi – Kudengrim – Nongbareh – Khonglah – Padu Bah shaduh Amlarem.U Bah Pohshna ula ïathuh ruh ba naduh u bnai Ïaiong haduh u bnai Jylliew ki don 8 tylli ki shnong kiba la duh ïa ki Transformer bad haduh kine ki sngi kim pat ioh ïa ka bording khamtam ha kum kane ka por ba ki khynnah skul ki don hapdeng ka jingïaleh eksamin shiteng snem bad nalor kata wat ka trei ka ktah jong ki nongshong shnong ruh ka don jingthud namar ka jingbym don ka bording.“Ka Amlarem Sub Division ka don ïa ki shnong kiba ju siew tista ïa ka bai thang bording hynrei kaba sngewsih pat ka don ka jinglip bording khah khah manla u snem ha  ka por lyiur bad ngim ju ioh bording thikna da kaba biang ban pyndonkam ha ka trei ka ktah bad ka pule puthi,” u la ong.“Ngi la leit ban ïakren bad u Engineer jong ka MeECL Jowai bad kumjuh ruh ïa u Superintendent Engineer MeECL, West Jaiñtia Hills ba kin weng lem ïa kane ka jingeh kaba ki paidbah ki ïa kynduh ha War Jaiñtia hynrei lym kumta ngim banse ba ngin ïakhih paidbah ban wad ki daw balei ba pynduh bording khah khah ïa ka Amlarem Sub Division. Lada kim lah ban pynbiang ïa ka bording ngim banse ban leit da ka sur u paidbah ban tih bad wad bniah ïa ki daw namar katkum ki juk mynta ngi donkam eh ïa ka bording ha kino kino ki kam,” u la ong.U Bah Pohshna u la kyrpad ïa u Engineer, SE MeECL West Jaiñtia Hills bad SDO MeECL Amlarem Sub Division ba kin shimkhia kloi ban wad ki lad ki lynti ban pynioh Transformer ïa ki shnong ki bym pat ioh Transformer bad iynbïang ia ka bording ha ki shnong namarba ki Waheh Shnong jong ka War Jaiñtia, Amlarem Sub Division ki dei kiba ju iatreilang bad ka MeECL ban pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam la ka long ha kino kino ki bynta.
title: PYNJULOR U LAPBAH ÏA KI SUROK BAD DUH BORDING HA AMLAREM CIVIL SUB-DIVISION

content: : Ka War Jaiñtia Students Union ha ka sngi Balang ka la ujor sha u Sub Divisional Officer ka Amlarem Civil Sub-division halor ka jingpynap ki shipai BSF da ka jingker ha surok lad Muktapur-Psadwar.Ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u President u samla J. Lajong u la ong, namar ka jingdon ka jingker jong ki shipai BSF ka la pynsyier mynsiem ïa ki paidbah kiba shong basah ha khappud khamtam ïa ki kynthei khynnah kiba ïaid lyngba ïa ka jingker.“Namarkata, kum ka seng kaba don jingkitkhlieh, ngi kyrpad ïa phi ban shimkhia ïa kane ka mat da kaba ïakren bad ki bor bahalor jong ka tnat shipai BSF khnnag ba ki paidbah kin ïaid lynti da ka jingshngaiñ,” la ong ka seng.Ka Seng ka la kyntu ruh ïa u SDO ba un tuklar lem halor kane ka jingdawa da kaba phah weng noh ïa ka jingker bad ban dawa ruh ïa ki shipai BSF ba kin sangeh noh mardor ban pyndik ïa ki nongïaid nongieng.Ha kajuh ka por ka WJSU ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Executive Engineer jong ka MePDCL, Jowai ban pynstet noh ïa ka jingpynpur ïa ki waïar elektrik kaba la pynsahteng da ka ophis naduh Lad Darrang shaduh Dawki PHC lyngba surokbah National Highway.Ka seng ka la pyntip ruh ba ka Jio Company ba la long trai da u Mukesh Ambani ka la pynieng ïa ki nar post elektrik ha shilynter ka surok naduh Lad Darrang shaduh Dawki PHC.
title: PYNAP JINGKER KI BSF HA SUROK MUKTAPUR-PSADWAR, UJOR KA WJSU SHA U SDO

content: : Ka shnong Huroi kaba don ha ki bynta khappud jong ka East Jaintia Hills District bad ka ri Bangladesh ka la shah ktah haduh katta katta ha ka jingshlei um na ka jingther jong u lapbah uba jur ha kine ki khyndiat sngi.U Waheh Shnong jong ka shnong Huroi u Bah Golden Marbaniang u la iathuh ba kane ka jingshlei um ka la jia ha ka 15 tarik mynta u bnai bad bun tylli ki iing ki la shah tap ha ka um bad ha kajuh ka por u la iathuh ba ia ki briew la pynkynriah sha ki jaka ba kham shngain bad kiba lait na ka jingshlei um.Une u nongialam shnong u la iathuh ba ka jingshlei um ka jia tang na ka daw ka jingbym don ki jingiada ia ki wah duid bad u la kyntu ia ka sorkar bad ia ki nongmihkhmat ka thain ban shna ia ka kynroh ka ban iada na ka jingshlei ha ki bynta ba sharum jong ka shnong.Shuh shuh u la pynkynmaw ruh ba ka shnong Huroi ka ladep aiti da ka dorkhas sha ka Sorkar ban shimkhia lem na ka bynta ban shna ia ka kynroh ka ban iada na ka jingshlei jong ka um.
title: TAP KA UM ÏA KI ÏING HA KA SHNONG HUROI NA KA JINGTHER U LAPBAH BAJUR

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K. Sangma, ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la plie paidbah ïa ka Malangkona Police Outpost ha West Khasi Hills.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba peit ïa ka tnat Kam Pohing Bah Prestone Tynsong, u MLA R Momin, ka DGP jong ka Jylla ka Kong Idashisha Nongrang, u MDC Bah Gigur Myrthong bad ki ophisar na ka tnat Pulit.Ïa ka Malangkona Police Outpost la pynkha ha u snem 2019. Lyngba ka mang tyngka kaba T. 17.5 la la lah ban pynieng ïa ka ing treikam jong ka Out post ba la shna hapoh ka Police Infrastructure Renovation Fund (PIRF) scheme ha ka shnong Malangkona kaba hap hapoh kha Mawsynrut Civil Sub-Division.Haba kren kum u kongsan u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba ka jingshngaiñ bad ka jingïada ïa ki paidbah jong ka jylla ka dei kaba kam kaba hakhmat eh jong ka Sorkar.Kane ka dei ka jingdawa kaba la slem jong ki paidbah ka shnong Malangkona ban don ïa ka Police Outpost.  Kane ka shlem treikam jong ka Police Outpost ba thymmai kan phah ïa ka khubor kaba khlaiñ ba ka jingshngaiñ bad ka jingïada jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka dei kaba kongsan, la ong u Sangma.U la ong ba ha kiwei ruh ki jaka kiba don ki jyrwit jyrwat ha kylleng ka jylla yn sa buh ïa ka Police Outpost ban pynthikna ba ki nongshong shnong kin ïoh jingïadaShuh shuh u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ruh ba ka jingdon jong ka Outpost ha kane ka thaiñ kaba don hajan jong ka khappud jong ka Jylla Assam kan pynshngaiñ ïa ki paidbah ba kin ïoh ïa ka jingïada ban ban khanglad na kino kino ki jingjia basngewsih.“Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la ïakren bad ka Sorkar Assam ban ïapynbeit noh ïa ki jaka ba don ka jingïakajia pud bad ngi dang pyntyllun shakhmat ban pynbeit noh sa ki hynriew tylli ki jaka ba don ka jingïakajia pud,” u la ong.U la ong ruh ba ka Sorkar ka tip bha ïa ki jingeh ba la mad da ki paidbah kiba im ha ki shnong khappud bad u la kular ba ka Sorkar kan leh ïa kaba bha tam ban weng ïa ki jingeh.U la pyntip ruh ba ka Malangkona Police Outpost kaba thymmai ka dei kaba la shna lyngba ka bhah pisa jong ka PIRF kaba la mang sha ki Superintendents of Police ba kin ïoh kham bun ka pisa ha kaba kin dup lah ban pyndonkam ha kaba maramot, ban shna iing thymmai ha ki District Level khlem da donkam shuh ban ïoh jingmynjur na ka Sorkar Jylla.U Sangma u la ïaroh ïa ki paidbah ka Malangkona kiba la wan shakhmat ban ïarap ïa ka Sorkar ban trei kum ki nongbylla bad ban ïarap ruh ïa ki tiar ki tar.“Kane ka dei ka nuksa kaba kongsan tam ha ka imlang ka sahlang ban ïatreilang bad kan long ruh ka khubor kaba bha ha ka jylla.  Nga kwah ban pynshlur ïa kiwei kiwei ki shnong haba ki wan kum kine ki projek, ki paidbah ki dei ban wan shakhmat,” la ong u Myntri Rangbah.
title: SHNGAIÑ KI PAIDBAH KA MALANGKONA BA LÀ PLIE PAIDBAH ÏA KA POLICE OUTPOST

content: : Ka jingther jong u lapbah bajur naduh ka miet sngi Thohdieng jong ka taiew baladep haduh ka step Sngi u Blei mynta ka taiew ka la wanrah shibun bah ki jingjot bad jingjulor ha kiba bun tylli ki shnong ha South West Khasi Hills District, kata, naduh ki ïing ki sem, ki lynti synkien bad kumjuh ruh ki surok na ka jingtwa jong ka khyndew ha kiba bun ki jaka.Katkum ki jingtip ba la ioh lum, la iathuh ba tang ha ka shnong Mawbidong ki la don haduh san tylli ki ïing kiba la shah pynjot, lai tylli ha ka shnong Manad, kawei ha ka shnong Lummawbah, ar tylli ha ka shnong Mawpud, kawei ha ka shnong Sarin bad kawei ha ka shnong Mawkhlaidngap bad na kine ki jingjia, kumba 70 ngut eiei ki paitbah nongshong shnong ki la shah ktah.Ka khubor ba la ioh lum ka la iathuh ba watla ka jingshah pynjot jong ki ïing ki sem ka la jur bha na ka jingtwa khyndew bad ka jinglied ka eriong ia ki ïing ki sem hynrei kam shym la don pat kano kano ka jingjia basngewsih.Shuh shuh la iathuh ruh ba ki ar tylli ki lynti iaid kjat ba la shna na ka skhim MGNREGS ha ka shnong Sarin bad ha ka shnong Mawpud ki la shah pynjot na ka jingther jong u lapbah.  Ka surok Mawrap-Mawsain ruh ka la dkut noh na ka jingtwa jong ka khyndew ha kawei ka jaka harum ka shnong Jerlang, kaba jngai kumba 17 kilomitar eiei na Mawkyrwat.Katkum ka jingiathuh u Myntri Shnong jong ka shnong Mawbidong, u Bah Tanlum K. Kharai la ong ba ka surok Photjaud-Manad, kata, naduh na Tynnai ter ter haduh haduh ka shnong Mawbidong, ka la jot lut na ka jingtwa khyndew bad kumjuh na ka jingksam thliew jong ka um slap ha ki babun ki jaka jong ka surok.
title: JULOR KI ÏING KI SEM BAD KA SUROK PHOTJAUD-MANAD NA KA JINGTHER U LAPBAH

content: U Myntri Khhynnah ka sorkar pdeng ba dei khmih ia ka tnat Dewiong bad ki Par, Satish Chandra Dubey u la ong ba ka skhim PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi ka dei ka dak jong ka jingbteng jong ka jingkut jingmut jong u Myntri Rangbah Duh Narendra Modi na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki Nongrep.Ha ka jingai jingkren ha ka prokram ba la pynlong ha ICAR, Umiam ha ka sngi Baar ban pyni ia ka jingpyllait u Myntri Rangbah Duh ia ka bynta ba thymmai jong ki jingsiew hapoh PM Kisan Samman Nidhi lyngba ki lad digital, u Dubey u la ong ba yn sam kumba T 20,000 klur hapdeng 9 klur 26 lak ngut ki briew ba dei ban ioh jingmyntoi ha kylleng ka ri. U Myntri u la ong ba ha kane ka bynta kaba mynta, yn sam T 33.86 klur hapdeng 1,20,815 ngut ki nongrep jong ka Meghalaya. Haduh mynta, la phah T 432.36 klur sha ki bank account jong 1,46,758 ngut ki nongrep jong ka Meghalaya, la ong u Myntri.U Dubey u la ong ba ka PM Kisan Samman Nidhi ka dei kawei na ki nuksa jong ka jingieng skhem u Myntri Rangbah Duh na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki nongrep bad u la kynmaw ia ka por ba la pyllait paidbah ia kane ka skhim da u Myntri Rangbah Duh, Narendra Modi ha u snem 2019 bad ba kumno kane ka la ai jingiarap ia palat 11 klur ngut ki nongrep tang ha ka bynta kaba nyngkong. Naduh katei ka por, la pynlong ia kum kine ki prokram na ka por sha ka por ban pyllait ia ki bynta jong ki jingsiew sha ki nongrep kiba donkam jingiarap.U la ong ba ha kine ki shiphew snem ba la dep, ka Sorkar, na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki nongrep, ha ryngkat ka jingkyntiew ia ka mang tyngka na ka bynta jong ki, ka la shim ruh ia ki sienjam ban wanrah ia ki skhim bapher bapher ban pynkupbor ia u budlum jong ka ioh ka kot jong ka ri kiba long ki nongrep.U la pyntip ia ki nongrep kiba la wan iashim bynta ha kane ka sngi ba ka Sorkar ka la kyntiew ia k MSP jong ki mar rep bapher bapher ban ai jingmyntoi ia ki. U la batai shuh shuh shaphang kiewi kiwei ki skhim jong ka Sorkar kiba la iarap ia ki nongrep. Ka Sorkar ka la ban jur ruh halor ka jingkyntiew ia ka kam rep organic ha kylleng ka ri, la ong u Myntri.U la ban jur ruh ba ki nongrep ki don ka bynta kaba kham khraw ha kaba iadei bad ki jingthmu kum ka vocal for local, ha kaba ki pynbiang ia ki mar rep jong ki sha kiwei kiwei pat ki bynta jong ka ri. U la ai jingsngewnguh ruh ia ki nongrep kiba la wan mih paidbah ban iashim bynta ha kane ka prokram.U Myntri u la iakren ruh bad ki nongrep ha kaba u la iakren shaphang ka jingpynthikna ia ka jingpynpoi ia ka pisa na ka PM KISAN khlem kano kano ka jingthut bad u la bthah ia ki bor ba dei peit ha ka jylla ba kin weng ia kano kano ka jingeh ba ki nongrep ki iakynduh. U Myntri u la sam ruh ia ki mar rep kum ki jingkynshait dawai, ki pump bad ki kor phut niut sha kito kiba dei ban ioh ia kine.U Myntri Rangbah Duh ka ri Narendra Modi mynta ka sngi u la pyllait ia ka bynta kaba 17 jong ka PM-KISAN kaba kot sha ka T 20,000 klur bad u la ai syrnot ruh ia palat 30,000 tylli ki self-help group kiba tip kum ki Krishi Sakhi ha Varanasi. Ka Lat jong ka jylla Uttar Pradesh, Anandiben Patel, Myntri Rangbah ka Uttar Pradesh, Yogi Adityanath, Myntri Sorkar Pdeng ba dei khmih ia ka Tnat Kam Rep, Shivraj Singh Chouhan bad kiwei kiwei ki Myntri Sorkar Jylla ki la iadonlang ha kane ka sngi.
title: NA KA PM KISAN 33.86 KLUR YN SAM SHA KI SHILAK NGUT KI NONGREP JONG KA MEGHALAYA
