content: Ki Pulit ka East Khasi Hills District ki la syrtap ha phyllaw jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court hadien ba la ïoh pdiang ïa ka email byrngem ban buh bomb hapoh kane ka Iingbishar kaba don ha dohnud ka sor Shillong.Kane ka dei ka sien ka baar ba ka Meghalaya High Court ka la ïoh pdiang ïa ka jingbyrngem buh bomb lyngba ka email.Kum kane kajuh ka jingbyrngem ka la jia teng ha ka 6 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ha kaba ki runar bym lah ban tip ki la phah lyngba ka email da kaba byrngem ban pynbthei bom hapoh ka phyllaw jong ka Iingbishar.Uwei na ki heh Pulit u la ïathuh ba tang shu ïohpdiang ïa kane ka email ba la phah sha ki bor ba dei khmih jong ka Iingbishar, marmar ka tnat Pulit ka la phah ïa ka kynhun Bomb Squad bad ïa ki ksew hynrei ynda la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra ym shym la lap eiei satia.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, ki Pulit ki la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap ksai ïa kiba donkti ban phah ïa kane ka email byrngem ban pynbthei bom.
title: IOH PDIANG KA MEGHALAYA HIGH COURT ÏA KA EMAIL BYRNGEM BUH BOMB

content: Ki runar na ka Jylla Assam kiba wan kawei ka kali Scorpio ronglieh ka bym don ia u registration number ban rahbor ia uwei u nongniah trok ki la ngat pynban ha ka shrip ba la pynap da ki Pulit jong ka Ribhoi District ha ka sngi Baar.Ia kine ki saw ngut ki runar la tip kyrteng kum u Pradip Gogoi na Dibrigarh, u Tulian Phukan na Lakhimpur, u Pranjal Gogoi na Tinsukia bad u Deep Das na Bugaghat, Assam katba u nongniah trok uba la shah rahbor u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Preenchand Kumar Mali bad ka trok kaba u ñiah ka dei kaba don ia u number JH02-AK-9061.U Additional Superintendent of Police jong ka Ribhoi District u Bah Banraplang Jyrwa, ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ka la shimpor naduh ka por 4:00 baje janmiet ban kthong ia kine ki runar bad ïohkem haduh ka por 6:00 baje janmiet.“Na ka jingïoh ujor na ka por sha ka por ba ki don ki jingshah lute jong ki trok ha surokbah National Highway ngi ju pynlong ka jingtalasi ia ki kali.  Mynta ka sngi, hadien ba ki Pulit ki la ïoh jingtip ba ki don saw ngut ki runar kiba la pyndonkam da ka Kali Scorpio ronglieh ban rahbor ia uwei u nongniah trok ngi la pyntip sha ki Pulit ka Umsning bad ka Umiam Police Station.  Ha ka jingshah kthong ha ki Pulit ki runar ki la khynñiat noh ia u nongñiah shabar ka kali bad phet krad ialade tang ban lait na ka kti jong ki Pulit,” la iathuh u Addl. SP.Ki Pulit ki la pynap shrip ha Umsning ban ïoh bat ia kine ki runar hynrei ki runar ki la lait phet na kane ka jaka ba la pynap da ki Pulit bad kumjuh ruh ha Saiden ka jaka ki Pulit ki la pynap shrip bad tad ynda la poi ha Nongpoh ba ki Pulit ki la hap ban siat kuli pyntieng sha suin ha kaba la ïohkem ia ki runar ynda ki la kynthih na ka kali ban rung sha khlaw ynda poi ha Nongpoh Dowgate.Ia u nongniah jong ka trok ba la pyllait im da ki Pulit la pynkit noh sha Hospital bad ki Pulit ki la pynlong mynta ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor kane ka jingshah rahbor jong une u nongniah trok.Ki saw ngut ki runar ki dang don haduh mynta ha ka kti jong ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi kiba dang pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor ki kam dawai pisa bad kumjuh ruh ban lap ksai la ki dang don neem sa kiwei kiba iadonkti lang ha kane ka kam dawa pisa ha surokbah National Highway ha Ri Bhoi.
title: RAHBOR KI RUNAR ÏA U NONGÑIAH TROK HA NH-6, NGAT HA KA SHRIP KI PULIT RIBHOI

content: : Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka la mudui da ka ejahar pyrshah ïa u u Rakkam A Sangma uba dei u Myntri Sorkar na ka NPP kaba ïalam ia ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance halor ka jingkynnoh ba u la kren ki kyntien pynshit ne isih jaitbynriew ha ka por ba u la ïalap ïa ka ilekshon Lok Sabha.Ïa kane ka ejahar la ujor da u Finance Secretary ka VPP Bah Danny Langstieh ha kaba la aiti sha u Superintendent of Police (SP), ka East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Baar.U Bah Langstieh u la kynnoh ba ha shwa ka jingpynlong ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha, 2024, ka la don ka video clip kaba la saphriang ha kaba la ïohi bad ïohsngew ba u Myntri ha ka por ba u kren ha ki jingialang ialap elekshon u la pynmih ïa ki kyntien ba la kynnoh beit pyrshah ïa ka VPP bad kane ka jingkynnoh ka long ba kane ka party kan pynjot, pynïap, kan ñion bad pynjah noh ïa kawei ka jaitbynriew bad kane ka long kaba bakla jur, ka bym shisha bad ka bym dei.“Haba kren ïa kum kine ki bym don jingkitkhlieh, ba pynshit bad isih ym tang ba kadei kaba bakla bad kaba beaiñ hynrei ka long ruh kaba ma namarba kan ïalam sha ka jingbym shongsuk shongshngaiñ bad ka ban lam sha ka jingïashrut jaitbynriew, bad jingïaumsnam,” la pynpaw ka VPP ha ka ejahar.Haba phai sha ka jingbishar ka Supreme Court of India haba ïadei bad ki kyntien wanrah jingisih, u Bah Langstieh u la ong, “ha ka hukum kaba dangshen halor ka mukotduma jong Ashwini Kumar Upadhyay vrs Union of India & Ors, ka Supreme Court ka la pynpaw ba lada ka don kano kano ka jingkren isih ha kano kano ka jaka bad kano kano ka jingleh ka ban lam sha ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon 153A, 153B bad 295A bad 505 jong ka IPC etc, dei ban shim kam suo motu ban register case watla kam shym la don ka jingmudui hynrei ka jingshim kam katkum ka aiñ kan ïaid.”“Hynrei watla kam don ka jingshim kam na phi ïa ka tarik ba la pynmih ïa kane ka kyntien isih, ma nga kum u nongshong shnong ba don jingkitkhlieh bad u dkhot ka VPP nga kyrpad jur ïa phi ban leh ïa kaba donkam pyrshah ïa u Myntri Sorkar bad nga kwah ban kdew ba ha kajuh ka Case, ka Supreme Court ka la pynkut ba lada ka don kano kano ka jingbym leh eiei katkum ba la bthah, yn kheiñ kum ka jingkheiñ dewthala (contempt of Court) bad yn shimkam kylla pyrshah ïa ki Ophisar kiba leh bym suitñiew ia kane ka kam,” u la bynrap.U nongïalam ka VPP u la ong ba ka long ka sakhi ba ka jingkren ba la kren da u Myntri Myntri ki long kaba pynshit bad kiba aiding ban kyntiew, pynshlur, bad ka jingïasih hapdeng ki kynhun riewlum bad ki jaitbynriew hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka jingbym shonghok ban pynneh ïa ka jingsngew shipara hapdeng ki kynhun bapher bapher bad kan ktah ïa ka jinglong bajai jai jong ki paidbah.“Namarkata, nga kwah ban wanrah ïa ka jingshimkhia jong phi halor kine ki jingkren ba pynshit, ban kyntu ïaphi ban shim da ka kam kaba tyngeh, bad ba uba pynkheiñ u dei ban shah pynshitom katkum ki kyndon hapoh ka 153A, 153B bad 505 jong ka IPC bad kiwei pat ki kyndon kiba don jingïadei bad ka aiñ,” la dawa ka VPP.U Rakkam A Sangma, u dei u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla uba khmih ïa ka tnat Pule Puthi, ka Border Areas Development Department bad ka General Administration Department, ha ka lah sngi u Blei u la kyntait ba u la kren ïa ki kyntien pynshit jaitbynriew ha ki rynsan ialap ilekshon ha rilum Garo.
title: MUDUI EJAHAR KA VPP ÏA U RAKKAM SANGMA HALOR KI VIDEO BA KREN PYNSHIT JAITBYNRIEW

content: Ki Pulit ka Special Cell jong ka East Khasi Hills District kiba la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ha ka por janmiet sngi Baar ki la ïohbat ïa kawei ka taksi kamai ha IGP Point, Shillong ha ka por kumba 5:00 baje.Na kane ka taksi kamai ki Pulit ki la ïohkem ïa kawei ka kynthei bar jylla kaba rah haduh 1,776 tylli ki dawai kuli Yaba ba la ñiew ba ki dei ki jingdih pynbuaid kiba long be-aiñ.Hadien ka jingtohkit ba malu mala, ki Pulit ki la pyllait noh ïa ka kali bad ïa u nongñiah kali kamai u bym don kti eiei.Kane ka kynthei bar jylla ka la phla ba ka la kiew da kane ka kali kamai najan ka khyrdop jong ka Shillong Civil Hospital da ka jingthmu ban hiar ha Khyndai Lad.Ki Pulit ki la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bad pynngat hapoh ki kyndon jong ka NDPS Act.
title: HA IGP POINT, KEM KI PULIT ÏA KA SNAR KHAÏI DROK, KURUP DAWAI KULI YABA

content: : Da ki spah ngut ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka thaiñ Narpuh ki la shet ja hapdeng ka surokbah National Highway-6 ban pynsdang ia ka jingiakhih da kaba pakhang khlem pud sngi ia kane ka surok naduh ka step sngi Balang.Ki paidbah na Tongseng, Kuliang, Pyrtakuna, Umkiang, Donaskur, Donaumbluh, Ratacherra, Malidor ki la mih sha surok bad khanglad ïa baroh ki kali kiba pyrshang ban ïaid lyngba ka surok National Highway-6.Ki Waheh Shnong, kumjuh ruh ki dkhot kiba don ha ka shatri jong ka JAC bad ki paidbah ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingleh mynthi jong ka National Highway Authority of India (NHAI) bad ka Sorkar Jylla halor ka jingsniew jong ka surok bad ong ruh ba kin ïai bteng beit ïa ka jingpakhang surok ba khlem pud sngi tat haduh ba ka Sorkar bad ka NHAI kin da shna bad maramot bha ïa ka surok.U Chairman jong ka JAC, Bah Lasting Pala u la ong ba ki paidbah ki la ngiah hi shoiñ ïa ki jingkular kai jong ki bor synshar ka East Jaiñtia Hills District bad ka NHAI kiba shu kut tang ha ka ktien katba ka kam pat ka jngai.Ka jingjot jong ka surokbah National Highway-6 ka la pynsyrtok wat ïa ki paidbah na kiwei ki jylla kiba iaid lyngba kane ka surok.Katba ki paidbah ki dang ialum hapdeng surok u Block Development Officer (BDO) jong ka Lumshnong C&RD Block Bah L.Kharmon u la hiar sha Ratacherra bad ïakynduh ïa ki nongïalam jong ka JAC bad u kubur ruh ba ka surok ka la sniew shaba palat bad ong ruh ba na ka liang jong ka NHAI ka la sdang ïa ka jingmaramot ha kane hi ka sngi, hynrei watla katta ruh na ka liang ki nongïalam ka JAC bad ki paidbah ki la pyneh bad ong ba kin ym lah ban weng da leilei ruh ïa kane ka pakhang surok tat haduh ban da dep ka jingmaramot ïa ka surok.Ia kane ka jingïakhih ba la pynlong da ka JAC, la ai jingkyrshan da ka Jaiñtia National Council, ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council Narpuh Circle, ka Voice of the People Narpuh Circle bad ka East Jaiñtia Hills Truck Owners and Transporters Association.
title: SHET JA KI PAIDBAH HAPDENG SUROK NH-6, EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS, SDANG KA PAKHANG SUROK KHLEM PUD SNGI

content: Ka Meghalaya Editors’ and Publishers’ Association (MEPA) ha ka sngi Balang ka la leh burom ïa ar ngut ki nongpathai khubor ka jylla kiba la ïoh khusnam ha ka ri India, kata, ïa ka Kong Alicia Bakor Phanwar bad ka Kong Princess Giri Rashir ha ka jingïalang kaba kyrpang kaba la long ha Shillong Club, Shillong.Ha kane ka jingleh burom, ka MEPA ka la ai sngewbha ïa baroh ar ngut ki nongïoh khusnam da ka memento bad ka shithi ai burom.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka Kong Alicia Bakor Phanwar, 26 snem ka rta ka la ïoh pdiang ïa khusnam ENBA Gold Award for Best News Producer ha ka 30 tarik Lber, 2024. Ka dei kawei na ki nongpathai khubor ba dang khynnah tam kaba trei kum ka Shift Newsroom Supervisor ha ka India Today TV.Ka Kong Princess Giri Rashir ka la ïoh ïa ka khusnam Ramnath Goenka Award for Excellence in Journalism ha ka 19 tarik Lber, 2024. Mynta ka trei kum ka nongpathai khubor na Meghalaya ïa ka East Mojo.Ïa kane ka jingïalang leh burom ba la pynïaid da ka Treasurer jong ka MEPA ka Kong  Banda Blah la sakhi lang da u President Bah R Monarch Shabong, u Vice President u Rajib Choudhury, ka Adviser Kong Patricia Mukhim u General Secretary ka MEPA u Bah John W. Thabah bad ki nongthoh khubor ka jylla.Ha kaba kren ha kane ka sngi, i Kong Phanwar ka la ai khublei ïa ka MEPA namar kane ka jingleh burom bad ong ruh ba ka Meghalaya ka dei ban ïoh jaka ha ki lad pathai khubor jong ka ri India ha kaba ïadei bad ki mat bad ki jinglong jingman kiba ka jylla ka don.Ka Kong Rashir ka la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa ka MEPA namar ka jingai burom kyrpang ïa ka jingïoh khusnam bad ka la ong ruh ba ka dei ka kamram ki nongpathai khubor ka Meghalaya ban sei ïa ki mat kiba ïadei bad u paidbah ka jylla khnang ba kita ki mat kin poi sha ka jingtip jong ki lad pathai khubor ha ka ri India baroh kawei.
title: LEH BUROM KA MEPA ÏA KA ALICIA BAD PRINCESS BA ÏOH PDIANG KHUSNAM

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Balang ka la ai jingmynjur ban thung ia ka Kong Iamonlang M. Syiem kum ka Chairperson ba thymmai jong ka Meghalaya  State Commission for Women (MSCW) hadien ka jingiehnohkam jong ka Chairperson barim ka Kong Phidalia Toi.Ka la shimpor ia ka Sorkar da ki bnai ban wad briew na ka bynta ban thung ha ka shuki Chairperson.Ka jingbym lah  jong ka Sorkar ban pynbna ia ka Chairperson ba thymmai ka dei namar ka jingtreikam jong ka Model Code of Conduct (MCC) hadien ba ka Election Commission of India (ECI) ka la pynbna ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha dang shen.Ka jingthung jong ka Sorkar ia ka Kong Iamonlang Syiem kum ka Chairperson ba thymmai jong ka Meghalaya State Commission for Women ka long hadien ba ka la shem ia kane ka longkmie kaba dei ka nonghikai ba la shongthait jong ka Deparment of Sociology ka St. Edmunds College, Shillong ka dei kaba la tbit ban ai jingshakri kum ka Chairperson barim jong ka Meghalaya State Commission for the Protection of Child Rights ia kaba la ai jingmynjur da ka Kynhun Myntri ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha ka 19 tarik u Jylliew, 2024.
title: SHIMTI KA KONG ÏAMONLANG SYIEM KUM KA CHAIRPERSON KA WOMEN’S COMMISSION

content: Ki dkhot jong ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO), Shillong City ha ka miet sngi Palei ki la ioh bat saw ki shynrang bad kawei ka kynthei ba la suba ba ki nongkhaii bad nongdih drok ha Khyndai Lad, Shillong.Katkum ki video ba la ring hi da ki dkhot ka HITO bad ba la phah sha ka Batesi Tv, la sakhi ba ki la ioh ban kurup ia ki tari rit, ki screw driver, ka khaiñshi, 11 tylli ki tyndong rit thylli ba ju thep ia u drok, saw tylli ki tyndong ba dap da u powder rong soh ba la suba ba u dei u drok, 7 tylli ki thyrnia injekshon bad u Ganja.Hadien ba la ioh bat ia kine ki suba nongkhaii bad nongdih drok, ki dkhot ka seng ki la pyntip noh sha ki Pulit ban leh ia kaba donkam bad kumjuh ruh ban kurup noh ia ki tiar kiba ka seng ka la na kine ki briew.Ka jingpynap shrip jong ki dkhot ka HITO, Shillong City ka long hadien ba la ioh jingtip ba ki ju don ki nongkhaii drok kiba ju leit da ki thuk thuk ar shaka ban pynpoi ia u drok ha Khyndai Lad.U General Secretary jong ka HITO Shillong City Bah Balajied Jyrwa ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la kyntu ia ki Pulit ba kin long kiba peitngor bha khamtam eh ha ka por mynmiet namar ka jingkynrei ki kam sniew ha ka thain Khyndai Lad ka jur bha haduh katta katta.Ha ka jingtohkit da ki dkhot jong ka seng, ki nongdih drok ki la phla ba ki thied ia u drok na uwei u briew uba ju khot sien u Boit bad ia ki thyrnia injek ki ju ioh na ki jaka sumar ia ki nongdih drok kiba don ha nongbah Shillong bad wat na ka Hospital sorkar.
title: U DROK, TARI BAD THYRNIA INJEK KURUP KA HITO NA KI NONGDIH DROK HA KHYNDAI LAD

content: U Wanbok Lyngdoh Mawphlang bad ka Marqueenless Ramsiej ki la long ki arngut ki lahduh ha ka jingiakop mareh thong jong ka 5th Shillong 10K Run, ba la pynlong da ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association, ha ka step 22 tarik Jylliew, 2024.Ka jingpynlong ia kane ka jingiakob mareh ka long kum shi bynta ban rakhe ia ka International Olympic Day, ia kaba la ju rakhe manla u snem ha ka 23 tarik Jylliew kaba dei ka sngi ba la pynkha ia ka International Olympic Committee ha u snem 1894.Ha kane ka jingiakob mareh ha ka liang jong ki shynrang, u Iwelljohn Ramsiej u la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba ar bad u Sainkupar Jyrwa u la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba lai.Ha ka liang jong ki kynthei, ka Balasiewdor Pathaw ka la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba ar bad ka Ivanjilin Khongwir ka la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba lai.Ha ka jingiakob mareh jong kiba la 50 snem ka rta ha ka liang jong ki shynrang u Bah Badon Tham u la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba nyngkong, katba u Bah Swonding Mawlong bad u Bah Laurence Pariong ki la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba ar bad kaba lai.Ha ka liang jong ki kynthei, ka Kong Ralinda Marbaniang ka la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba nyngkong, katba ka Kong Smarless Marwein ka la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba ar bad ka Kong Ibameri Shullai ka la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba lai katba ka Kong Kmoin Wahlang kaba la kynjoh ha ka rta kaba 70 snem eiei ka la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba saw.Ia kane ka jingiakob mareh la kaweh lama da u Assistant Director jong ka Department of Sports and Youth Affairs, u bah Paia B. War Nongbri, ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u General Secretary ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association u Bah Finely L Pariat bad kiwei kiwei.
title: LAHDUH U WANBOK L. MAWPHLANG BAD MARQUEENLESS RAMSIEJ HA KA 5TH SHILLONG 10K RUN

content: Khnang ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshai bad ka jingïaid ryntih ka jingpynlong ïa ki eksamin lyngba ka National Testing Agency (NTA), ka tnat Higher Education, hapoh ka Ministry of Education ka la thung ïa ka High-Level Committee jong ki riewshemphang ki ban ai jingmut halor ka jingpynkylla ha ka rukom treikam ban pynlong ïa ki eksamin, ka jingkyntiew ïa ki Data Security protocol, ka jinglong bad ka rukom treikam jong ka National Testing Agency (NTA).Ïa ka High Level Committee la khlieh da u Dr. K. Radhakrishnan kum u Chairman uba dei ruh u Chairman barim jong ka ISRO bad Chairman ka BoG, IIT Kanpur.Ki dkhot ki kynthup ïa u Dr. Randeep Guleria uba dei Director barim jong ka AIIMS Delhi, u Prof. B J Rao uba dei u Vice Chancellor jong ka Central University of Hyderabad, u Prof. Ramamurthy K uba dei u Professor ba la shongthait ka tnat Civil Engineering, IIT Madras, u Pankaj Bansal u nongsenglang jong ka People Strong bad dkhot ka Board – Karmayogi Bharat, u Prof. Aditya Mittal uba dei u Dean Student Affairs ka IIT Delhi bad u Govind Jaiswal uba dei u Joint Secretary jong ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar India kum u Member Secretary.Ki kam ba kane ka komiti ka peit ki long  halor ka jingpynkylla ha ka rukom treikam ban pynlong eksamin, ban peit pura ïa ka rukom pynlong eksamin bad ban ai jingmut kumno ban kham pynseisoh bad pynïaid ryntih ïa ka kam bad ban tehlakam ïa kano kano ka jingbakla, ban peit bniah ïa ki Standard Operating Procedure (SOP)/Protocol jong ka NTA bad ai jingmut kumno ban pynkhlain ïa kine ki mat  /protocol ha ryngkat ka rukom peit ïa ki kam ban pynthikna ïa ka jingbud ïa ki kyndon ha baroh ki kyrdan.Ban peit ïa ka jingkyntiew ïa ki Data Security protocol, ban peit ïa ki kam Data Security ba la don lypa bad ki Protocol jong ka NTA bad ai jingmut kumno ban kyntiew shuh shuh ïa kine, ban peit ïa ki Security Protocol ba la don lypa ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingbuh ïa ki jingkylli bad kiwei kiwei ki kam na ka bynta ki eksam bapher bapher bad ban ai jingmut kumno ban pynkhlain shuh shuh ïa ka kam, ban peit ïa ka jinglong bad rukom treikam ka National Testing Agency, ban ai jingmut shaphang ka jinglong bad ka rukom treikam ka National Testing Agency (NTA) ban pyntreikam ïa ki jingai jingmut ba ai ha ka thup (i) bad (ii) bad ban batai shai ïa ki kam ki jam bad ki jingbahkhlieh jong ki nongtrei ha baroh ki kyrdan bad ban peit ïa ka rynsan ai jingujor jong ka NTA ba don mynta, wad ïa ki bynta ba lah ban kham pynbha bad ai jingmut kumno ban kham pynseisoh ïa ki kam.Kane ka Komiti kan ai ïa ka kaiphod jong ka sha ka tnat hapoh ar bnai hadien ba la pynmih ïa kane ka jingpynbna bad ka Komiti ka lah ban shim ïa ka jingïarap jong ki riewshemphang ha ki kam bapher bapher ban ïarap ha kane ka kam.
title: THUNG KA MINISTRY OF EDUCATION ÏA KA KOMITI KI RIEWSHEMPHANG BAN ÏAID BEIT KA EKSAMIN NTA

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit hynnin ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la aiti da ka jingujor ha u Additional Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills u  Bah G. Warjri halor ka jingthombor jong ki shipai BSF ia ka longiing jong ka Kong Martina Pohshna ha ka shnong Kuliang ha ka 19 tarik mynta bnai ha ka por shiteng synñia.Ha ka jingujor, ka seng ka la dawa ban pynshitom katkum ka aiñ ia ki BSF ba donkti ban leh da kaba tyngeh.Hadien ba la mih na kamra u ADC, ki dkhot ka seng ki la leit jngoh ia u Bah Shanroi Lyngdoh Lyngkhoi u kurim jong ka Kong Martina uba la shah shoh ha ki BSF uba dang thiah pang ha Civil Hospital Khliehriat uba la mynsaw jur na ki jingorpait ki shyieng krungKa KSU ka la pynrem jur ia ki BSF kiba leh donbor ia ki paidbah ha ka shnong Kuliang ha ka por shiteng synñia da kaba shoh bad bom ia ki kynthei khynnah bad ia ki rangbah khlem map shuh kaba ju jia na ka por sha ka por.Kane ka jingleh donbor kine ki BSF kam dei shuh ka sien ba nyngkong hynrei la bunsien. Ki paid nongshong shnong ka Sonapyrdi, Huroi Umkiang ki la ujor bunsien sha kiba dei khmih naduh u SP bad u DC, hynrei kine ki khlem leh eiei bad ka shu kut khlem seisoh, la ong ka seng.Kane ka la pynlong ia ka Seng ba la lamkhmat da u General Secretary Bah KS Suchiang, Asst GS Pynshai Kupar Dkhar ban leit ujor sha ka Director General of Police (DGP) ka jylla ban leh eiei ban pynkynriah ia kine ki BSF kiba ha Sonapyrdi bad kiba don ha surokbah NH-6 ha khappud jong ka shnong Dona Umbluh bad Ratachera namar ka jingdon jong ki ha kito ki jaka kim lah satia ban tehlakam ia ka jingwan rung tuh ki khar Bangladeshi sha ka jylla.Kum ban pynkynmaw ka seng ka la dep iakren bad u Bah Prestone Tyngsong uba dei u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla uba khmih ia ka tnat Kam Pohiing hynrei kam shym la poi shaei shaei ruh ka kut tang ka kular.Ka seng ka nang iai buddien ia kane ka jingleh donbor ki shipai BSF ia ki paidbah bad ka khmih lynti ba ka DGP kan leh ia kaba dei tam.Lada kam urlong ka jingdawa pynkynriah ia ki BSF na kitei ki jaka, ka seng kan sa pyrkhat da kawei ka sien jam.
title: DAWA KA KSU ÏA U DC KA EJH BAN TUKLAR ÏA KA JINGTHOMBOR KI BSF ÏA KA LONGÏING HA KULIANG

content: : Saw ngut ki nongkhaii drok ki la shah kem bad u drok na ki ar tylli ki jaka ha nongbah Shillong ha ka sngi SaitjaiñÏa u Ram Singh 29snem bad u Vijay Singh 20 snem kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong, la kem  da ki Pulit ka Anti Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) East Khasi Hills ryngkat bad ki Pulit jong ka Mawlai Police Station na ISBT, Mawiong, la ong ki Pulit.Na ka met jong kine ki arngut, ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup 9 tylli ki synduk thep sabon ba la thep ïa u drok uba khia 110.32 gram, ar tylli ki mobile phone bad kawei ka Scooty Aprilia bym don ïa u Registration Number.  Ïa kine ki mar, la kurup noh da ki Pulit.Ha kawei pat ka jingkhynra, ki Pulit ki la ïohkem ïa kawei ka kynthei kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Evanjrlyne Thongni na Lapalang, Lummarboh bad u John Robert Kharmyndai na Nongmynsong.  Ïa kine ki arngut la kem na Demthring kaba hap hapoh ka Madanrting Police Station.Na kine ki arngut ki Pulit ki la kurup ïa kawei ka synduk thep sabon ba la thep ïa u drok uba khia 11.43 gram, ar tylli ki mobile phone bad kawei ka Scooty (ML05-L-7620).
title: SHAH KEM SAW NGUT KI SNAR KHAIÏ DROK KYNTHUP KAWEI KA KYNTHEI

content: Ka lympung iamir jingtip la pynlong ha Sngap Sing College ban rakhe ia ka lyngkhuh 183 snem jong ka jingwan iuhkjat u Thomas jones ha Ri Khasi ba la pynkhreh da ka shnat Mawkyrwat jong ka Khasi Authors’ Society. U nongmihkhmat sha Dorbar Thawain Jylla, u Bah samlin Lyngdoh Tongkhar u la long u kongsan ha kata ka sngi rakhe bad u kren mardor halor ka jingdonkam kyrkieh ban ioh ka jingithuh ia ka ktien Khasi ban kynthup ha ika Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India.Ki riewtbit ba la wer ban kren halor u Thomas Jones ki kynthup ia u Pastor G P L Kadew bad Lyngdoh Ioannis War Pakma ki ba la pynkheh ki jynthoh halor ki phang ba la aiti ban kren ha kata ka sngi rakhe. U Pastor Kadew u la kren sani halor ka mynsiem sngewlem jong u Thomas Jones ia ki Khasi ki ba la shah thombor ha ka sorkar Bilat.U la kdew ba kumno u Thomas Jones u la kyntiew ia ka imlang sahlang jong ki paidbynriew Khasi khamtam ha ka kamai kajih bad ka pule dangle, namar ba u ngeit ba ka ba ialap ia ka khubor babha jong ka balang Khristan kan urlong tang lada ki kam sngewlem ki ktah ia ka dohnud jong ki paidbah.Kumta u la adkar ban hikai niam bad kham khluh ban hikai ha ka trei ka ktah ban kamai kajih bad ban hikai ia ka jingnang jingstad kum ka atiar ban kyntiew ia ka jingim briew ha ka imlang sahlang. U Lyngdoh Ioannis War Pakma u la sot na ki nongthoh ba pawnam jong ka jaitbynriew Khasi ban phalang ia ka iitkhmih jong ka jaitbynriew lyngba ka jynthoh jong ki, khamtam ki symboh pyrkhat jong u Myllung Soso Tham, Rabon Sing Kharsuka bad kiwei kiwei.U Lyngdoh Pakma u la ban jur halor ka aiom ksiar kum ka pharshi ka ba phalang ia ka jinglong briew ba bha ha ka ba iadei bad ki parabriew ha ka imlang sahlang. Ka kynhun Iong Lajong ka la rwai sngewphieng halor ka lungkhuh snem u Thomas Jones  kum ka dak ban nguh burom ia ka nam jong u kum u nongshem ia ki dak thoh Khasi.
title: RAKHE KA KAS ÏA KA LYNGKHUH BA 183 SNEM KA JINGWAN ÏUHKJAT U THOMAS JONES HA RI KHASI

content: U Chairperson jong ka National Commission for Protection of Child Rights (NCPCR) u Priyank Kanoongo u la bthah ïa ka Sorkar Meghlaya ban sorjamin ïa baroh ki ‘Madrasa’ ne ki skul niam Muslim kiba don ha Meghalaya bad ban pynthikna ba ki khynnah kiba pule ha kine ki skul ki dei ban leit pule ruh ha ki skul kiba don ha ka jylla.U la bthah ruh ïa ka Sorkar ban jingmyntoi ïa ki 360 ngut ki khynnah kiba im bad u khñiang jingpang HIV/AIDS.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, u Kanoongo ula ong, “kane ka dei kaba ima. Ngi la kyrpad ïa ki bor khmih ban leh sorjamin ïa baroh ki skul Madrasa kiba dn ha Meghalaya bad ban pynrung skul ïa baroh ki khynnah namar katkum ka Article 21 (a) jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri, baroh ki khynnah ki don ïa ka hok ban ïoh leit skul tad haduh ka rta ba 14 snem bad wat ka Sorkar Jylla ka hap ban ai sha ki ïa kane ka hok ban ïoh leit skul”.“Ki Madrasa kim dei ki skul hynrei ki dei ki jaka ai jinghikai kot niam. Nga la mad ïa kawei ka jingjia, ha kaba nga la kren ïa uwei u khynnah ha ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka jingleit sha Ampati ha u bnai ba la dep, uba dang wanphai na ka Madrasa, kumta ula ïathuh ïa nga ba u la pule ïa kaba ïadei bad ka niam. Nga lah kylli kaei kaba u kwah ban long ynda ula heh, ula ong ba um kwah ban long kum kino kino ki doctor ne nongïasaid aiñ hynrei u dang pynkhreh ïalade na ka bynta ka ‘Akirat’ kaba mut ka jingim hadien ka jingïap, u dang pynkhreh ïalade ïa ka sngi jong ka jingshah tian bishar. Kane ka long kaba sngewkyndit bad nga la pyni ïa katei ka video ha ki bor kiba dei khmih.”Halor kane u la ong ba ka tnat kaba dei khmih kam don jingtip eiei shaphang ka jingdon ka Madrasa ha ka jylla.“Ngi lah kyrpad ïa ka tnat pule puthi ban khmih bniah bad ban pynrung ïa kitei ki khynnah ha kine ki skul khnang ba ki khynnah ki lah ban ïoh ïa ka hok ka jong ki ban pule puthi kumba la pynkupbor ha ka Article 21 (a) jong ka riti synshar ka ri India,” ong u Kanoongo.U Chairperson ula ïathuh ba u ladep ban bthah ïa ka tnat Pule Puthi bad ka Ministry of Tribal Affairs ban pynbun ïa ki Hostel na ka bynta ban kynthup ïa ki khynnah ki bym shym la leit skul ha ka jylla.“Ngi lah kyrpad ïa ka tnat Labour ban pynbiang ïa ka jingai baibam ïa ki khynnah kiba la pyllait na ki jaka kiba la pyntrei bylla ïa ki,” ong u Kanoongo.U ong halor ka kam kaba ïadei bad ki khynnah kiba ïoh ïa ka jingpang HIV ka la sdang ban bun bha ha ka jylla Meghalaya.“Kumba 364 ngut ki khynnah ki la shah ktah na ka jingpang HIV. Ngi la kyrpad ïa ka tnat Women & Child Development ban khmih bniah ïa ki jingjia baroh bad lada lah ban ai da ka jingïarap na ka song tyngka lyngba ka Section 45 jong ka JJ Act, khnang ba kin lah ban ïoh ïa katei ka jingmyntoi halor ka jingdonkam ïa ka pisa.U la ong ba ka Meghalaya ka don palat 8,000 ngut ki briew kiba la heh la san kiba don ïa ka HIV.Namar ka jingshah thombor pyrshah ïa ki khynnah, u Chairperson u îathuh ba ula dep ban kyrpad ïa ki bor ban thung ïa ka ophisar Pulit kynthei ha ki Police Station ki ban trei kum ki Child Welfare Police Officer.“Nga la rah ïa katei ka mat ha ka jingïalang ba ka Commission ka la ïohi ba ka la don ka jingthombor ha ki katto katne ki Police Station khamtam haba ka la don ka jingthombor ruh ïa ki khynnah kynthei, ha kitei ki jaka jong kitei ki Police Station ngi la sakhi ba kim shym la don bun ngut satia ki Pulit kynthei kumta ka long kaba donkam ban buh noh ïa ki,” ula ong.“Ngi la kyrpad ban ai jinghikai ïa ki Child Welfare Committee bad ban ai jinghikai ïa ki da kaei kaba la pynkhreh lypa da ka NCPCR ban ïada na kum kitei ki jait jingjia.”U Kanoongo u la ong ba ka Commission ka la shimkhia ruh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpun khun ki khynnah kynthei kiba dang rit ka rta hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.“Ngi la ïatai sani bha halor kane bad ngi lah bthah ïa ka sorkar jylla bad ai jingmut kumno ba kan ïaid ha kaba ïadei bad katei ka kam, da kaba ïakren bad ka imlang sahlang, ban ïakren bad ki dkhot jong ka Council bad ban pynlong ïa ki jingïalang pynsngewthuh paidbah lyngba ki Self-Help Group,” ula ong.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba NCPCR ka la rai ban ïatreilang bad ki lai tylli ki Autonomous District Council (ADC) na ka bynta ban ïada ïa ka hok ki khynnah ha Meghalaya.“Ngin ïatreilang bad ki ADC ban pynlong ïa ki jingpynsngewthuh paidbah shaphang ka POCSO Act bad ban ïada na ka jingpun khun ha ka por ba dang samla lud,” ong u Kanoongo.“Ngin pynlong ïa ki jingïalang bad ki workshop bad kumjuh ruh ki prokram ïasyllok bad ki ADC. Kumta ha kane ka financial year, ngin pynlong ïa ki workshop bad ki lai tylli ki District Council haba ïadei bad ki hok jong ki khynnah,” u la ong.U Kanoongo u la ong ba ka commission ka ïoh ka jingpynthikna na ka sorkar ha kaba shen kan sa sdang ban thung noh ia u ne ka Chairperson jong ka State Commission for Protection of Child Rights (SCPCR).Shuh shuh ka NCPCR ka la kyntu ïa ka sorkar ban pynlong ïa ka jingleit jurip ïa baroh ki khynnah kiba duna ha ki dkhot met kiba don ha ka jylla.“Ki la don haduh 4000 ngut ki khynnah kiba duna ha ki dkhot met kaba la ïoh katkum ka jingkheiñ na ka tnat Pule Puthi. Ngi la kyntu ïa ki ban pynïasoh ïa kane ka jingkheiñ, ban buh ha ka rukom kaba dei ïa ka data bad ban pynlong ïa ka jingleit jurip ïa baroh ki khynnah ba duna ha ki dkhot met ha ka jylla,” u la ong.Ha kajuh ka por u Chairperson ka NCPCR u la kyntu ïa ki pulit ka jylla ban long kiba peitngor halor ka jingdon ki 731 tylli ki pharmacy ha ka jylla, kiba die ïa ki dawai Schedule H bad Schedule X, kiba don ïa ki psychotropic substance khlem da ïoh ka prescription kaba dei.
title: BTHAH KA NCPCR ÏA KA SORKAR MEGHALAYA BAN JURIP ÏA KI SKUL MADRASA BA PYNIAID KI MUSLIM

content: Ki nongïalam ka HYC Sohïong Zone hapoh ka jingïalam u Bah Purning Star Shabong, ki la shah khot hajir ha ki Pulit jong ka Sadar Police Station ha ka sngi Baar.Ki nongïalam ka Seng hadien ba ki la mih na thanad, ki la ïathuh ba ka daw ba ki la shah khot hajir ka dei halor ka jingmudui ejahar da uwei u rangbah uba la aikam ïa ki bar jylla ban trei ha Sohïong, namarba ki dkhot jong ka Seng ki la leit ban khynra ïa kine ki nongbylla ki bym don ia ki kot ki sla kiba biang bad kiba ym shym la ïoh jingbit na ki bor synshar shnong.U Bah Shabong, u la ïathuh ba ha kane ka ejahar la kynnoh ruh ba ki dkhot jong ka HYC ki la shoh la dat ïa kine ki bar jylla.Hynrei u Bah Purning u la ïathuh ba ki dkhot jong ka seng kim shym la ktah kti ïa ki nongbylla bar jylla hynrei ki la leit tang ban talasi ïa ki kot ki sla.
title: LEIT HAJIR KI NONGIALAM KA HYC SOHÏONG HAKHMAT KI PULIT KA SADAR PS

content: Shillong, Jylliew 26 : Katkum ka khubor kaba la ioh lum na ka website jong ki pulit ka jylla kaba ki la thep ha ka website ha ka 25 tarik u Jylliew 2024, kine ki dei ki kam runar bad ki kam pyntriem kiba la jia ha kylleng ka jylla.U bah Satisfyway Lyngwa u la ujor ejahar sha ki pulit pyrshah ia uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Daniel Lyngdoh Mawphlang bad u la kynnoh ba ha ka 21 tarik u Jylliew 2024 u la tuh ia ka ar shaka jong u kaba don ia u Registration number ML-05W 3944 kaba u la pynieng ha Motphran.U Thangkhanlal Lupho u la ujor ejahar sha ki pulit ba hapdeng ka miet jong ka 21 bad 22 tarik u Jylliew , ki nongtuh ki runar ki bym lah satia ban tip ki la rong tuh ia ka thuk thuk jong u kaba don ia u Registration number MN-01 AM 9968 na ka phyllaw iing jong u kaba don ha Fire Brigade, Motinagar-Shillong.Ka kong Hamlen Sukhlain ka la ujor ejahar sha ki pulit ba ha ka 22 tarik u Jylliew ha ka por lai shiteng janmiet , ka la lap ba ki nongtuh ki la prong tuh ha iing jong ka kaab don ha ka shnong Sutnga Mission, East Jaintia Hills bad ki la rong tuh ia ka pisa 50 hajar tyngka bad ia ki jingdeng ksiar kiba shongdor kumba 4.5 lak tyngka.Ha ka step jong ka 24 tarik u Jylliew 2024, u Waheh Chnong jong ka Thadmukoh kaba hap ha West Jaintia Hills District u la pyntip sha ki pulit da ka ktien ba u la lap ia uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Sam Lyngdoh ba u la thiah iap lyngktar hajan ka iing sah jong u kaba don ha ka shnong Thadmukoh. Ha kane ka jingjia, u bah Kyrmen Lyngdoh u la ujor ejahar sha ki pulit ba da kaba kynnoh ba ia u Sam Lyngdoh la pyniap da ka lok jong u ka kong Sanli Lamare.
title: KI JINGSHAH TUH BAD KI KAM PYNTRIEM HA KYLLENG KA JYLLA

content: San ngut ki briew ki la shah kem ha ka sngi Balang halor ka jingdonkti ban khyrwit da ki dieng ia kawei ka kynthei ha kawei ka shnong ha West Garo Hills District.Kane ka la jia ha ka shnong Teksragre kaba hap hapoh ka Dadenggre Civil Sub-division ha ka por shiteng sngi ka sngi Baar, la iathuh u Superintendent of Police ka West Garo Hills u Abraham T. Sangma.Ki Pulit ki la shimkhia marmar tang shu iohi ia ka lyngkhot video ba la saphriang ha ka social media, ba la ring dur ia ki lai ngut ki rangbah kiba la sympat khlem jingisynei ia kawei ka kynthei da ki siej watla ka la lynñiar bad panmap.“Ha kaba sdang, ngi la kem shwa arngut bad mynta ka janmiet, ngi la kem sa lai ngut kiwei pat.  Kine ki san ngut ki dei kiba donkti ban kawut khlem jingisynei ia ka kynthei,” ong u Abraham haba pyntip ba ia kine kiba donkti yn sa tian bishar ha Kashari lashai ka sngi Palei.U la pyntip ba yn sa kem shuh shuh ia kiba donkti ynda la tohkit na ka kynthei, kaba mynta ka dang don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar.Haba kylli, u SP u la iathuh ba la phah ruh da ka jingpyntip sha u Nokma jong ka shnong halor kane ka jingjia.  U la ong ba kane ka jingjia ka dei kaba don jingiadei bad ka kam iing kam sem.  “Hynrei, watla katta ngin dang hap ban tih bniah halor kane,” u la ong.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka Meghalaya State Commission for Women (MSCW) ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewsih bad ka jingsngew kyndit ia ka jingtangon khlem jingisynei ia ka kynthei ha ka shnong Teksragre, West Garo Hills bad pynrem jur ruh ia kane ka jingjia.Ka Commission ka la shim Suo Moto ruh halor kane ka jingjia bad ha ka por shiteng sngi jong ka Sngi Balang ka Vice Chairperson jong ka Meghalaya State Commission for Women bad ki dkhot ki la leit ban iakynduh ia u Superintendent of Police jong ka West Garo Hills ban tohkit bniah halor kane ka jingjia ha kaba u la pyntip sha ka Commission ba ki Pulit ki la kem ia kiba donkti.Ia ka shithi halor kane ka jingjia la phah lyngba ka email sha ka ophis jong u Superintendent of Police jong ka West Garo Hills, la pyntip ka Commission ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.Ka Commission ka la pyntip ba kan sa leit ban iakynduh ia ka lanot bad ban buddien ruh ia kane ka jingjia na ka bynta ban  leh ia kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: KHLEM JINGISYNEI SYMPAT KI RANGBAH DA KI DIENG ÏA KA KYNTHEI HA GARO HILLS, SHAH KEM 5 NGUT

content: Ka ophis Customs (Preventive) North Eastern Region kaba la ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingkhaïi drok ka la pynjulor da kaba thang da ka ding ïa ki jait drok ba la ïoh kurup ha Assam, Manipur, Meghalaya bad MizoramKatkum u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ki jait drok ba la pynjulor ki long 12.48 kilo u drok Heroin, 45.27 kilo ki dawai kuli drok Meth/Yaba, 5804.78 kilo u Kynja bad 66728 bilor ki dawai jyrhoh ba don Codeine kiba kot palat T. 167.47 klur.Ïa kane ka kam la leh ha ka rukom kaba shngaiñ bad ka bym ktah ïa ka mariang da kaba pynthikna ba kine ki mar ba pynsniew yn ym ïohlad ban pynïaid iew shuh.Kane ka jingai jingtip jong ka tnat Customs (Preventive) North Eastern Region ka long kum shi bynta ka jingrakhe ïa ka International Day Against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking lyngba ki prokram ai jingtip bad ki kam ban pynjulor ïa ki jait drok ba la ïoh kurup.Ka tnat Customs ka la pyntip ruh ba ka la pynlong ïa ki jingpynsngewthuh paidbah bad ka jingpynjulor ïa ki jait drok ba la ïoh kurup ban pyni shuh shuh ïa ka jingkut jingmut ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ka jingpyndonkam bad ka jingshalan ïa u drok.Shi taiew mynshwa, ka tnat Customs ka la pynlong ïa ki jingpynsngewthuh ha Kendriya Vidayalaya GC, Agartala, ha Government Boys Higher Secondary School, Dhubri bad ha Govt. Chawnpui High School, Aizawl da ka jingthmu ban ai jingtip ïa ki khynnah skul shaphang ki jingma kiba wan na ka jingpyndonkam ïa u drok, ka jingkongsan ban im ka jingim kaba koit ka khiah bad ka jingkiar ïa ki drok.Ka tnat Customs ka la pynlong ïa ki jingpynshai paidbah ha KRIPA Foundation De-Addiction Centre for Children, Shillong bad ha New Hope De-addiction cum Counselling Centre, Shillong ha ka 25 tarik bad 26 tarik mynta u bnai.Ïa ki kamram bad ki sienjam jong ka tnat la pyni bad ka la don ruh ka bynta bad ka Dr. Jasmine M Lyngdoh, Clinical Psychologist bad Director, Routes, Shillong ka la ai jingkren shaphang ka jingktah na ka jingdih drok, ka jingdih kyiad bad ka la ai jingmut ruh shaphang ki lad ki lynti ban lait na kane ka jingkyrni.La sam ruh ïa ki tiar ïalehkai sha ki nongpang ban kyntiew ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ki.Ka tnat Customs ka ieng skhem ban ïada ïa ka imlang sahlang na ki jingma kiba wan na ka jingpyndonkam bad jingshalan ïa ki jait drok da kaba pynlong ïa kine ki prokram ai jingtip bad ka jingpynduh ïa ki jait drok.  Ka tnat Customs ka thmu ruh ban pynduna ïa ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki jait drok bad ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki sienjam ha kylleng ka pyrthei ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ki kam khaïi drok.
title: 12.48 KILO KI JAIT DROK BA SHONGDOR 167.47 KLUR PYNJULOR KA TNAT CUSTOM

content: U Chief Executive Member (CEM) barim jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District (KHADC) Bah Teiñwell Dkhar uba dei ruh u MDC jong ka Shella Constituency u la khladnoh na kane ka sla pyrthei ha ka sngi Balang.U Bah Teiñwell uba la don 62 snem ka rta u la jop nyngkong kum u MDC ka Shella constituency ha u snem 2004 bad bteng ia ka jinglong nongmihkhmat ka Shella haduh ki sngi khatduh  na ka jingban ka jingpang kaba la neh katto katne por.Ha ki saw samoi kyntih ba u la long kum u MDC, u Bah Teinwell u la bat kum u Lamphang jong ka Ïingdorbar Thawaiñ ka KHAD, kum u nongïalam ka Liang Ïatei bad kum u Chief Executive Member.U Nongialam ka UDP Bah Titostarwell Chyne u la ithuh ba ïa ka met ba dang sah jong u Bah Teiñwell yn sa pyndep ia ka jinglehniam bakhatduh ha ka sngi Thohdieng mynta ka taiew ha ïing sah jong u ha ka shnong Mawlong, Sohra  Civil Subdivision.Ka Executive Committee jong ka KHADC kum ka jingsngew burom ia u Bah Teiñwell, ka la pynbna ban ai shuti shiteng sngi ha ka 28 tarik mynta u bnai ha baroh ki ophis treikam jong ka Council.Na ka liang jong u Chairman ka KHADC Bah Lamphrang Blah, kumjuh ruh u Deputy Chief Executive Member (Dy. CEM) Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem ki phah ïa ka jingsngewlem sha a kurim bad sha ki khun ki kti kumjuh  sha ki bahaïing hasem jong u Bah Teiñ.
title: KHLADNOH U CEM BARIM KA KHADC BAH TEIÑWELL DKHAR

content: Haduh 610 ngut ki briew kiba la shah kem na ka jingdonkti ban khaïi drok uba shongdor kumba T. 300 klur ha Meghalaya ha kine ki ar snem ba la leit noh.Ïa kane la ïathuh da u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka jingkren jong u ha ka jingïakynduh lang ki nongshong shnong ne ka multi-stakeholder symposium ba la pynlong da ka Drug Reduction Elimination & Action Mission (DREAM) kum ka dak ka jingrakhe ïa ka International Day against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking ha ka sngi Balang. Ha kane ka snem ka phang jong ka jingïakren ka dei, “The evidence is clear: invest in prevention”.Halor kane haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka dang don bun ka kam ban leh bad dei halor kane ba balei ka sorkar jylla ka la rai ban pynïasnohkti lang ïa ki nongïalam shnong ban iarap lang ïa ki pulit ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa kane ka thma u drok.Kaei kaba duna naduh mynshwa kadei ka jingbym ïashim bynta lang jong ki nongïalam shnong. Wat la ka la don hynrei ka duna bha bad ka jingïasyllok bad ki shnong ki thaw bad ba kin don bynta lang ha ki kam thaw aiñ, ha kaba kane ka long kaba donkam ïa ka sorkar ruh ban don ki nongïalam ki ban ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ki pulit khnang ban lah ban pyntreikam ïa ki aiñ ki ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa u drok,” u la ong.“Kum ka nuksa, ka PITNDPS, kam lah ban treikam lada ym don ka jingïasnoh kti lang jong ki nongïalam shnong ne ki shnong ki thaw, bad dei halor kane ba ki dorbar shnong la kyrpad ba kin wan shakhmat ban ai jingmut na ka bynta ban thaw ïa ki Village Defence Party (VDP),” u la bynrap.U Bah Paul u la ong ba ka jingthaw bad pynim biang ïa ki VDP kan sa long shen hadien ba ka sorkar ka la lum ïa baroh ki jingai jingmut na ki dorbar shnong ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka Act kaba thew ïa ka jingthaw ïa ki VDP.“Ngi dei ban lum lang ïa baroh ki jingai jingmut hapoh u ne u bnai,” ong u Bah Paul.Kumba ka long mynta ki don tang 11 tylli ki VDP kiba dang treikam hapoh Nongbah Shillong, ong u Bah Lyngdoh da kaba bynrap, “Kiba bun ki shnong kim don ïa ki VDP hynrei da ka jingwan ïashim bynta ha kane ka symposium, la ïohi ba ka long kaba ai mynsiem bad la khmih lynti ïa ki ba kin thaw ïa ki VDP ka ban ïaid lang bad ka aiñ.”U Bah Paul u la ong ba ka donkam ka jingïarap pisa ïa kine ki dorbar shnong khnang ba kin lah ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ki VDP bad ïa ki volunteer jong ki.
title: SHAH KEM 610 NGUT KI NONGKHAIÏ DROK HAPOH AR SNEM, 300 KLUR KYNJOH KA JINGKURUP ÏA U DROK

content: Ka Petroleum Dealers Association, Meghalaya (PDAM) ha ka sngi Balang ka la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kin dei ban long kiba phikir bha ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdon ka Ethanol ha ka umphniang Petrol.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President ka seng Bah Kenedy C. Khyriem u la ïathuh ba naduh u Rymphang, 2022 ka Sorkar India, lyngba ka Ministry of Petroleum ka la wanrah 10% ka Ethanol ba la khleh ha ka Petrol ha ka ri.  Mynta ka Sorkar ka la sdang ban khleh haduh 20% ka Ethanol ha ka umphniang Petrol.Kumba ka Ethanol ka dei ka Hygroscopic ha ka rukom long jong ka, ka kjit ïa ka um.  Da kane ka rukom ka pynmih ïa kawei pat ka rukom long ba thymmai kaba pynmih jingeh ha ki kali.U la ong ba Dealers Association ha kylleng ka ri baroh kawei ka la ieng pyrshah ïa ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar wat lada don tang khyndiat eh ka um ha ki Tanky jong ki kali ne ha ka top buh pynlang umphniang, kan pynmih ïa ka jingeh.  Hynrei ka Sorkr ka la shna ïa kane ka petrol bad die ïa ka Ethanol ba la khleh lang ïa ka umphniang Petrol.Ïa ka jingpynshai paidbah halor ka jingkhleh ïa ka Ethanol bad ka umphniang Petrol la pynlong ha baroh kawei ka ri ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki nongpyndonkam petrol ba kin tip shaphang ki jingeh bad kumnoh ban phikir bha ïa ki tanky jong ki kali ban ym pynieng ïa ki kali, ki scooter, bike ha ki jaka ki bym biang.Khamtam leilei ha ka por lyiur, ki paidbah ki dei ban set bha ïa ki kali, ki scooter bad ki bike ha ki jaka kiba lait na u slap, khamtam eh ki ar shaka bad ban pynthikna ba dei ban da tap bha ïa ki tanky theh petrol khnang ba ka um kan ym ïoh rung shapoh.U Bah Khyriem u la ong ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingwanrah ïa ka Ethanol ba la khleh ha ka umphniang Petrol, ki nongpynïaid jong ki Petrol Pump ki ju pynkhuid ïa ki Underground Tank bad pynthikna ruh ban ym don um ha ka umphniang.  “Shuh shuh, ngi ju khmih bniah ruh manla ka sngi ïa ka Storage Tank ban pynkhuid.Hynrei watla katta, khamtam ha Meghalaya kaba dei ka jaka kaba jur bha u slap, ka um kan rung beit sha ki tanky jong ki kali, khamtam ha ki thuk thuk ar shaka.“Hynrei kaba sngewsih haba don kino kino ki jingjia khamtam ha Meghalaya, ha ka por ba jur bha u slap, lada kum kine ki jingjia ki wan jia, ki trai/nongtrei jong ki Petrol Pump ki shah teipop ba ki khleh da ka um ha ka umphniang petrol bad die pat ïa ka.  Ki la don bun ki jingjia haba ki trai jong ki Petrol Pump ki la shah pynbor ban siew ïa ka bailutksan, kane ka long ka bym lah satia ban pdiang,” u la ong.“Namarkata, na ka Petroleum Dealers Association, Meghalaya, ngi kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin long kiba phikir halor kine ki jingjia nangne shakhmat,” la ong u Bah Khyriem.
title: 10% LA KHLEH ÏA KA ETHANOL HA KA PETROL, KYNTU KA PDAM ÏA KI PAIDBAH BAN PHIKIR ÏA KI KALI

content: Shillong, Jylliew 26: U Bah Shanborlang Pakynteiñ uba dei u nongshong shnong ka 3rd Mile Umlyngka Upper Shillong u la leit ban ujor sha u CEO ka Shillong Municipal Board halor ka jingkiew ka bai lum khajna na ki kali kiba don hapoh ka Ïew Mawlong.Ha ka shithi jingujor u Bah Pakynteiñ u la ong ba ha ka 25 tarik mynta u bnai hadien ba u la pynïeng ïa ka kali shimet jong u kaba don u nongbar ML 05 X 4850 ha 3rd Mile Stand Ïewmawlong ha ka por kumba 5 baje janmied haduh ka por 9:48 , bad hadien ba u la pynïeng ïa ka kali u la leit ban sam ïa ki baby diaper sha ki dukan bad u la ong ba kane ka kam kaba u la trei ka dei kaba u la leh mynta la kumba 3 bnai, bad u la ju trei teng kum u nonglum khajna ïa ki kali ha Stand Mawprem.Ha ka jingujor u la pyntip ruh ba hadien ba u la dep ban die ïa ki baby diaper bad hadien ba u la poi sha ka jaka pynïeng kali la don uwei u khynnah uba la ong ba dei ban siew T. 200/- bad hadien ba u la dep siew ïa katei ka pisa bad pan ïa ka slip/voucher utei u khynnah um shym la ai ha kaba na kane ka la mih ka jingïania bad utei u khynnah uba peit ïa katei ka jaka ïeng kali bad hadien ba la kylli balei ba la lum palat ïa katei ka bai khajna ïeng kali u tei u khynnah u la ong ba ka bai pynïeng kali kadei T.40 shi kynta hynrei ha kiwei pat ki jaka ki la lum tang T.20/- shi kynta na ka bynta ki kali private bad ki saw shaka hynrei ha 3 Mile Stand Ïewmawlong ki shim haduh T.40/- shi kynta kaba dei ka dor kaba heh bha.Kumta halor kane u tei u Rangbah u la kyrpad ïa ka jingtuklar lem jong u CEO ban shim khia ïa kane ka kam kaba dei ban long ruh kham kloi katba lah. U la ong ruh ba hadien ba la jia kane ka kam shah shim palat pud ka bai ïeng kali u la kynduh ruh ïa ki pulit ha kaba ki la ai jingmut ba dei ban leit ujor sha ki bor badei peit.
title: 200 TYNGKA KHRONG BAI ÏENG KALI HA PARKING LOT, ÏEW MAWLONG, MUDUI U SAMLA SHA U CEO KA SMB

content: : Ka Meghalaya Lokayukta ka la pdiang ïa ka jingai jingujor jong u MLA ka Voice of People’s Party (VPP) ka North Shillong Constituency Bah Adelbert Nongrum uba la ujor pyrshah ïa ki shiphew ngut ki ophisar ka Sorkar Jylla ha kaba la kynnoh ba ka don ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa ka pisa jong u paidbah ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Saubhagya scheme.U Bah Nongrum u la ujor hapoh ka Section 13(1) (a) jong ka Prevention of Corruption Act, 1988 pyrshah ïa ki shakri sorkar kiba don ha ka bor ha u snem 2018.Ka Meghalaya Lokayukta ka la phah ktien ruh sha ki nongshah ujor ba la buh sngi ban shong bishar ïa kane ka jingujor ha ka 23 tarik, Naitung, 2024 ha ka por 2:00 baje noh sngi.“Namarba ki jingkynnoh ha ka jingmudui ba la ujor beit halor ka kaiphod jong u Comptroller and Auditor General of India (CAG) ïa kaba la phah sha ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly, ïa ka notis ryngkat bad ka kopi jingujor la phah ruh sha u Commissioner and Secretary, Meghalaya Legislative Assembly,” la ong ka hukum ba la pynmih da u Chairperson ka Meghalaya Lokayukta u Bah Bhalang Dhar.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ka jingujor ka long pyrshah ïa u Chief Secretary barim, u Additional Chief Secretary (Power) Chairman cum Managing Director (CMD) barim jong ka MeECL bad ïa ki ophisar barim jong ka MePDCL ba kynthup ïa u Director (Distribution), Chief Engineer (Distribution), Chief Engineer (Rural Electrification), Company Secretary, Chief Accounts Officer/Deputy Chief Accounts Officer, Additional Chief Engineer (Material Management) bad Additional Chief Engineer (Planning & Design).Ïa ka jingujor la shim katkum ka kaiphod jong u Comptroller and Auditor General of India halor ka Social and Economic Sectors na ka bynta u snem kaba kut haduh ka 31 tarik, Lber, 2022.
title: PDIANG KA LOKAYOKTA BAN BISHAR ÏA KA JINGMUDUI U MLA KA VPP HALOR KA SAUBHAGYA SCHEME

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Anti-Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ba la lamkhmat da u Deputy Superintendent of Police (Crime) u Bidhan Bhattacharjee ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei ki la ïoh kurup ïa u drok uba khia 164.99 gram na ki lai ngut ki snar khaïi drok.Lai ngut kiba la shah kem ha Umtyra ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Sahin Hussain Laskar na ka shnong Nagdirgram, Cachar Assam, u Rofiqul Alom Laskar na ka shnong Harsinghpur Nagdirgram, Cachar Assam, ka Mamta Sinha na Simgiri, Chibitabicha, Cachar Assam bad ïa ka Maya Gwala ba la sin kyrteng kum ka Puchki kaba sah ha Pynthorbah Shillong, ki Pulit ki la kem na Khliehriat katba ka dang ap ban shimti ïa u drok ba la wanrah da kine ki lai ngut.Ki Pulit ki ïathuh ba ka Maya Gwala ka dei ka snar khaïi drok kaba la shah kem teng ha u snem 2023 ha ki Pulit Khliehriat bad kiba la register case ïa ka hapoh ki kyndon 21(b)/29 NDPS Act 1985. Mynta ka kynti ka la shah kem biang ha ka sien kaba ar ha ki Pulit ka Khliehriat.Kine ki lai ngut kiba rah ïa u drok ki la shong da kawei ka kali Hyundai Venue kaba don u nombar AS-01-EJ 8977 kaba wan na Silchar.  Ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ka jingpynap ktem ki la ïoh bat ïa kane ka kali ha Umtyra bad ha ka jingkhynra ki la lap ïa u drok ba la thep ha ki khatsan tylli ki synduk sabon.  Hadien ba la leh tes la pynshisha ba u dei u drok heroin.Ha ka jingtohkit, ki lai ngut kiba la shah kem na Umtyra ki la phla ba ïa u drok ki la thmu ban aiti ha kawei ka briew kaba kyrteng ka Maya Gwala ba ju sin kyrteng kum ka Puchki kaba dang ap ha Khliehriat.Ki Pulit ki la register case pyrshah ïa ki saw ngut ha Khliehriat Police Station bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat.Ki Pulit ki la kurup noh ïa u drok, ïa ka kali bad ïa ki mobile phone na kine ki saw ngut.
title: SHAH KEM KA SNAR KHAÏI DROK NA PYNTHORBAH HA KI PULIT KA KHLIEHRIAT PS

content: : Ka Kong Rosetta Mary Kurbah, kaba bat kum ka Secretary jong ka tnat Community & Rural Development, Fisheries bad kiwei kiwei ki tnat ka la shah pynkynriah ban shimti biang ha ka sien kaba ar kum ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District, Shillong.Katkum kane ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei da u Secretary ka tnat Personel & AR (A) ka Sorkar Jylla Bah Cyril VD Diengdoh, u S.C Sadhu uba dei u Deputy Commissioner ba mynta jong ka East Khasi Hills District, u la shah pynkynriah kam ban shimti noh kum u Secretary jong ka tnat Community & Rural Development, tnat Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Veterinary, tnat Water Resources Department bad kum u Director jong ka Community & Rural Development.U Abhilash Baranwal uba dei u Deputy Commissioner ba mynta jong ka East Jaintia Hills District u la shah pynkynriah kam ban shimti kum u Deputy Commissioner jong ka Ri-Bhoi District, katba u S. Awastni, uba dei u Deputy Commissioner ba mynta jong ka South Garo Hills District ula shah pynkynriah ban shimti kum u Deputy Commisioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District, katba u Pilot R. Marak, uba dei u Additional Deputy Commissioner ba la kham slem jong ka South Garo Hills District un peit ia ka kam kum u Deputy Commissioner, South Garo Hills District tad haduh ba da pynbna da kumwei pat.Nalor kine, katkum ka jingpynbna la pyntip ba u Sampath Kumar, uba dei u Principal Secretary ka tnat Health & Family Welfare bad kiwei kiwei un treikam ruh u Principal Secretary jong ka tnat Forests & Environment.U Bah F. R. Kharkongor uba dei u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Afts & Culture Department bad kiwei kiwei un treikam ruh kum u Commissioner & Secretary jong ka tnat Animal Husbandry & Veterinary.U Pravin Bakshi uba dei u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Food Civil Supplies & Consumer Affairs un treikam ruh kum u Additional Chief Executive Officer jong ka Invest Meghalaya Authority (IMA) hapoh ka tnat Planning bad ka tnat Investment Promotion & Sustainable Development.U V.K. Mantri uba bat kum u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Information & Public Relations bad kiwei kiwei un treikam kum u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Education, ka tnat Mining & Geology bad kum u Deputy Chief Executive Officer jong ka Meghalaya Basin Management Agency (MBMA) hapoh ka tnat Planning bad ka tnat Investment Promotion & Sustainable Development.U Dr. Joram Beda uba bat kum u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Soil & Water Conservation bad kiwei kiwei bad kum u Registrar jong ki Societies la pyllait noh ia u na ka kam kum u Registrar jong ki Societies.Ka Kong R.C Sohkhlet kaba bat kum ka Secretary jong ka tnat Tourism, ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs la pyllait noh ba kan treikam kum ka Secretary jong ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs.U R.P Marak uba bat kum u Secretary ka tnat Mining & Geology bad kum u Commissioner of Transport un treikam kum u Director ka Mineral Resources.  La pyllait noh ia u ban treikam kum u Commissioner ka tnat Transport.Ka Kong Isawanda Laloo kaba bat kum ka Secretary jong ka tnat Agriculture & Farmer’s Welfare bad ka Director jong ka Sports & Youth Affairs kan treikam ruh kum ka Secretary jong ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs bad kum ka Director jong ka tnat Urban Affairs.  La pyllait noh ia ka ban treikam kum ka Director jong ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs.U D.D Sangma uba bat kum u Additional Secretary jong ka tnat Mining & Geology, ka tnat Health & Family Welfare bad ka Chief Minister’s Secretariat un treikam ruh kum u Commissioner ka tnat Transport.La pyllait noh ia u ban bat kum u Additional Secretary ka tnat Health & Family Welfare bad na ka Chief Minister’s Secretariat.U R.Chitturi uba bat kum u Joint Secretary ka tnat Finance bad kiwei kiwei un treikam ruh kum u Joint Chief Executive Officer ka Invest Meghalaya Authority (IMA) hapoh ka tnat Planning bad ka tnat Investment Promotion & Sustainable Development.Ka M. Chandra, kaba bat kum ka Joint Secretary jong ka tnat Planning, Investment Promotion & Sustainable Development Depaftment bad kiwei kiwei kan treikam ruh kum ka Joint Secretary ka tnat Agriculture & Farmer’sU D. D Shira, uba bat kum u Joint Secretary ha ka tnat Animal Husbandry & Veterinary Department bad kiwei kiwei un treikam ruh kum u Director jong ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs.U P.K. Boro uba bat kum u Joint Secretary jong ka tnat Urban Affair bad u Director ka tnat Urban Affairs bad kiwei kiwei la pyllait noh ia u ban treikam kum u Director ka tnat Urban AffairsU S.M.A Razi uba dei u Commissioner & Secretary uba peit ia ka tnat Public Health E-ngineering, tnat Education bad kiwei kiwei un peit ruh kum u Commissioner & Secretary jong ka tnat Secretariat Administration.  La pyllait noh ia u na ka kam kum u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Education.U Gunanka D.B uba dei u Joint Secretary uba peit ia ka tnat Planning, Investment Promotion & Sustainable Development Department bad kiwei kiwei un treikam ruh kum u Joint Secretary jong ka tnat Agriculture & Farmer’s Welfare.
title: YN SHIMTI BIANG KA KONG RM KURBAH KUM KA DC EKH HA KA SIEN BAAR

content: : Ka kynhun State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) kiba la bteng ban wad ïa u Sidharth Chhetri, 16 snem ka rta uba la shah rong ha ka umsaw katba u dang jngi ha wah Urkaliar ha ka sngi u Blei.Une u khynnah u la shah rong ha ka umsaw kaba la wan kynsan na ka jingther jong u slap ha ka sngi u Blei ha wah Urkaliar.Kat haduh ba la pynmih ïa kane ka khubor ym pat lap satia ïa ka met jong u Sidhrath watla ka kynhun SDRF ki la pyrshang ban wad ha ki bynta jong ka wah Umkhrah hajan ka jingkieng kaba don markhap bad ka ktem sah jong ki CRPF naduh ka sngi U Blei haduh mynta ka Lah Sngi U Blei kaba la neh la 24 kynta.U Krishna Chhetri uba dei u kpa jong u Sidharth u la ïathuh ba u khun jong u, u la leit jngi bad lai ne saw ngut paralok ha ka Wah Umkaliar hynrei namar ka jingther u slap ka umsaw ka la wan kynsan bad ka la rong ïa u lem bad ïa uwei u paralok.U ïathuh ba ïa une u paralok la ïoh ban pyllait noh da ki briew kiba don hajan ka wah.
title: YM PAT LAPDIEN KI SDRF ÏA U KHYNNAH UBA SHAH RAH UMSAW HA WAH URKALIAR

content: : U Director ka Tourism Bah Cyril VD Diengdoh ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la bthah ïa ka All Khasi Meghalaya Tourist Taxi Association (AKMTTA) ba kan ai jingkheiñ ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingwan rung jong ki kali kamai Tourist nabar ka jylla kiba wan rung sha ka Jylla Meghalaya baroh shisnem.Kane ka jingbthah jong u Director ka Tourism ïa ka AKMTTA ka long hadien ba ki la leit ban pynsngew ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshah ktah na ka jingphah kamai shisien shitaiew da ka tnat Tourism ka Sorkar Jylla ïa ki Bos STEMS ban kit ïa ki nongjngohkai pyrthei kiba wan kai sha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President jong ka AKMTTA Bah Ricaldinus Dohling u la ïathuh ba ka jingphah kamai jong ka tnat Tourism da ki Bos STEMS kiba ju kit ïa ki khynnah skul ka long na ka daw ba ki Bos jong ka Meghalaya Tranports Corporation (MTC) ki la sniew.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka seng kan sa lum ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah lyngba ki paradkhot khnang ban ïoh ïa ka jingkheiñ kaba thikna halor ka jingwan rung jong ki kali kamai Tourist na Assam bad na kiwei kiwei ki jylla sha kane ka jylla Meghalaya manla ka sngi shwa ba ka Sorkar kan dup lah ban shim ïa ka rai ban khanglad noh ïa ki kali kamai Tourist nabar ka jylla ba kin ïalam ïa ki nongjngohkai pyrthei sha ki jaka jngohkai kiba don ha kylleng ka jylla Meghalaya.“Ha u snem baladep ngi la kyrpad ïa u Myntri ka tnat Tourism Bah Paul Lyngdoh ba un sngap lem ïa ka jingud jingnam jong ngi namarba ka jingrung kyrthep shaba palat jong ki kali kamai Tourist kiba wan nabar ka jylla ka la ktah haduh katta katta ïa ka kamai kajih ka jong ngi,” la ïathuh u Bah Dohling.Haba kylli, haduh katno ka jingwan ki kali kamai Tourist kiba nabar ka ktah, u Bah Dohling u la ong, “shispah na ka shispah ka ktah bha ïa ngi na ka jingkamai jong ngi.  Ngi ladep ïakren ruh bad ka Sorkar ban khang noh ïa ki kali kamai Tourist ban ïalam sha ki nongjngohkai pyrthei sha ki jaka jngohkai hynrei haduh mynta kane kam shym la poi shaei shaei ruh.”Shuh shuh u la ong, “u Director u la kular ïa ngi ban buh noh kawei ka Information Centre ha Kad Liengsuiñ Guwahati khnang ba ki nongjngohkai pyrthei kiba kwah ban wan sha Meghalaya kin ïoh ïa ki jingtip kiba bniah ha kaba yn sa buh ruh ïa ki mobile number jong ki nongñiah kali kamai Tourist na kane ka jylla Meghalaya,” ong u Bah Dohling.U la ïathuh ruh ba kaba kham pynhun ïa ka seng ka long ruh ba u Director u la kular ba ka tnat Tourism kan sa ai jinghikai kyrpang ïa ki nongñiah kali kamai Tourist ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdonakor, ban ym dih duma hapoh kali bad kiwei kiwei de ki jingai jinghikai.“Ngim lah ban len ba ki don ki nongñiah kali kamai Tourist kiba dih duma wat hapoh kali, kane ka ju pynwit bha ïa ki nongjngohkai pyrthei,” u la ong.
title: PAN JINGKHEIÑ U DIRECTOR TOURISM NA KA AKMTTA ÏA KI KALI KAMAI TOURIST NABAR JYLLA

content: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ha ka sngi Baar ka la mudui da ka ejahar pyrshah ïa u nongïalam ka BJP halor ka jingkynnoh bym shong nongrim ïa ki kam kiba ïadei bad ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ha ka ejahar ba la aiti sha u Officer in-charge ka Cyber Crime, u Working President ka KHNAM Bah Thomas Passah u la ong ba u Ashwini Upadhyay, uba dei u nongsaidaiñ bad u nongïalam ka BJP, ha ka video ba la saphriang ha ka social media, ki jingkynnoh ki long kiba lamler, kiba ïalam bakla bad kaba kham kongsan eh ka long ba ka phah ïa u kyrwoh ba ïalam bakla sha ka ri baroh kawei ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam jong ka jylla Meghalaya.“Ki jingkren da u riewshimet ba la kdew haneng kan wanrah ïa ka dur kaba bakla ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingtreikam jong ka jylla hakhmat ka ri baroh kawei bad kan buh jingma wat ïa ka jingim jong ki nongshong shnong ka jylla kiba pule/ba trei bad ba shong basah ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka ri.  Namarkata, ngi buh ïa kane ka jingujor pyrshah ïa u khnang ban leh eiei katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ,” la ong u Bah Passah.Ka ejahar ka la kdew ruh ruh ïa ka jingkren jong u Ashwini Updhyay ba la kynnoh, “ka ingdorbar thawaiñ, ka sorkar, bad ka Iingbishar kim treikam satia ha jylla Meghalaya. Dei ka Balang kaba synshar ïa ka jylla baroh kawei, bad ki nongïalam Balang ha ka jylla ki pynïaid ïa ka jylla.  Ba, ki Hindu ki la hap ban mih bad ym shym la shah ïa ki ban mane ïa ka niam jong ki hapoh ka jylla.  Ba, ki Pulit kim treikam bad kim leh eiei ha ka jylla.  Ba, ki sengbhalang ki dei tang ki kynhun jong ki nongtuh bad ki nongdawa pisa.  Ba, ki lad pathai khubor ha ka jylla kim treikam.”
title: UKOR KA KHNAM HA KA CYBER CRIME PYRSHAH ÏA U NONGIALAM KA BJP U ASHWINI UPADHYAY

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ha ka sngi Baar ka la ujor hakhmat ka Meghalaya Lokayukta pyrshah ïa ka Directorate ka Housing halor ka jingkynnoh ba don ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa ka pisa u paidbah da kaba thied ïa ki tin sop iing Aluminium kiba jem, ïa kiba la sam sha ki community & Rural Development Block (C&RD) ha kylleng ka rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia.Ka HYC ka la kyntu ïa u Lokayukta ban bthah noh mardor ban phah pynphai noh ïa baroh ki Order jong ki tin sop iing ba la pynpoi da ka Hariana Iron Works Pvt Ltd sha ki C&RD Block bapher bapher ka jylla bad ban pynsangeh noh mardor ban sam ïa ki tin sop ïing.Ha ka ujor, ka HYC ka la kyntu ruh ba dei ban thung ïa ka jingtohkit ba laitluid ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingthied bad sam ïa ki tin sop iing ba tad dor bad ba kito kiba donkti ki dei ban shah pynshitom katkum ka aiñ pyrshah ïa ka Director ka Housing lane ïa kino kino ki ophisar kiba donkti ban thied ïa ki tiar kiba tad dor bad ban thung ïa u Nodal Officer ban leit tohkit bad ban pynshisha ryngkat bad ki nongujor ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingsam ïa ki tin sop ïing ha kylleng ki C&RD Block ha rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia.Katkum ka dorkhas, u President ka HYC Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la ong ba ka jingujor jong ka seng ka long hadien ba la ïoh pdiang ïa kiba bun ki jingujor ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingtaddor jong ka tin sopiing (Corrugated Aluminium Roofing Sheet) ba la ai sha ki C&RD Block bapher bapher kiba don ha kylleng ka jylla Meghalaya, khamtam eh ha rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia.“Namarkata, da kaba shimkhia ïa kine ki jingujor, ka HYC-CEC ka la leit jurip ha ki katto katne ki C&RD Block ba ka Hariana Iron Works Pvt. Ltd., Kolkata, West Bengal ka la pynpoi ïa ki tin sop ïing.  La lap ba ki tin sop ïing (Aluminium Roofing Sheets) ba la pynpoi kim long satia katkum ka jingbthah da ka Directorate of Housing, Meghalaya,” u la ong.“Ka hukum ka la kren shai ba ki tin sop ïing AA3105H18 Alloy, 8 Feet Length, 800MM Width, bad kiba ka jingrben ka dei ban long 0.45MM.  Hynrei, ynda la leit tohkit, kine ki tin sop ing la lap ba ka jingrben ka long tang hapdeng 0.25MM haduh 0.28MM,”  u la ong. bad bynrap ba ka Directorate of Housing ka la bthah ban thied ïa ki tin sop ing kiba rben 0.45MM, khnang ba kin long kiba neh slem ban sop ïa ki tnum iing.”Shuh shuh u President u la kynnoh ba ka kompeni ba pynpo ïa ki tin sop ïing ka Hariana Iron Works Pvt. Ltd., Kolkata, West Bengal, kaba la ïoh kontrak kam dei satia kaba don jingtip thikna shaphang ki tin sop iing, kaba hap ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban pynpoi ïa ki mar ki bym kot katkum ka jingbthah.“Kane kan buh jingma wat ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong kito ki nongïoh pdeng kiba shaniah ha kine ki tiar,” u la bynrap.
title: PYRSHAH ÏA KA DIRECTOR KA HOUSING MUDUI KA HYC HA KA MEGHALAYA LOKAYUKTA

content: Ka North-Eastern Hill University (NEHU) ha ka sngi Baar ka la pynbna ia ka result jong ka elekshon ba la jied ia ki nongkitkam ba thymmai jong ka North Eastern Hill University Students Union (NEHUSU) na ka bynta ka samoi treikam jong u snem 2024-20225.Ia ka kyrteng jong ki nongjop kiba iakhun ia ka elekshon la pynbna da ka Office jong ka Election Commission ha kaba u samla Sandy Sohtun, u samla pule 4th na ka Adult & Continuing Education department, u la shah jied kum u President, u samla Rikideiburom Rabon u samla uba dang pule 2nd Semester na ka Envionmental Science u la shah jied kum u Vice President, u samla Toniho S Kharsati na ka Law Department u la shah jied kum u General Secretary, ka sala Eva Kordor Kharshandi na ka English department ka la shah jied kum ka Assistant Secretary, u samla Ymphaidien Sutong na ka IT Department u la shah jied kum u Finance Secretary.Shuh shuh kiwei pat ki samla kiba la shah jied kum ki nongkitkam ki kynthup ruh ia u  samla Ymphaidien Sutong kum u Finance Secretary, u samla Banskhemlang Marwein kum u Academic Secretary, u samla Sooki Syrti kum u Sports Secretary, ka samla Edna Callista Kharsyntiew kum ka Socio & Cultural Secretary ka samla Naphisabet Marwein kum ka Publicity Secretary bad u samla Bashankur Buhroy kum u Editor.
title: PYNBNA KA NEHU ÏA KA KYNHUN KI NONGKITKAM KA NEHUSU 2024-2025

content: U Dr. Ricky Andrew Jones Syngkon bad u Saleng Sangma, ki arngut ki MP jong ka Lok Sabha na Meghalaya ki la bam smai ha ka sngi Baar kum ki dkhot jong ka Lok Sabha.Kine ki arngut ki la bam smai da ka ktien Phareng ha ka kyrteng U Blei. Hynrei ka don ka jingïapher pat ha ka jingpynkut ïa ka jingbamsmai. U Dr. Ricky, u la pynkut da kaba ong “Thank you…Khublei Shibun and Mithela” katba u Saleng pat u la pynkut da kaba ong, “Save Constitution” lane “Ïada ïa ka riti synshar” da kaba rah ia ka kopi jong ka Riti Synshar ha ka kti.Kine ki arngut ki la shim smai ryngkat bad kiwei pat ki MP ba pawkhmat jong ka ri India ba kynthup ïa u Rahul Gandhi, MP ka Congress na Rae Bareli, u Akhilesh Yadav MP ka Samajwadi Party, ka Supriya Sule ka MP ka NCP (Sharad Pawar), ka Mahua Moitra ka MP jong ka Trinamool Congress na West Bengal bad kiwei kiwei.Ha kane ka jingbam smai jong u MP jong ka Shillong Seat, la synran lang da u President ka VPP Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit, u Bah Brightstarwell Marbañiang MLA ka Mawlai kiba la shong ha ka Parliamenterian Gallery jong ka Lok Sabha bad la don lang ruh ki bahaïing hasem u Dr. Ricky.Ha kajuh ka por ka ri India kan ïohi ba ha ka sien kaba nyngkong eh hadien bun bun snem ban don ka elekshon ban jied ïa u Speaker jong ka Lok Sabha, namar ba ka NDA ka la rai ban pynïeng ïa u Om Birla, uba long u Speaker ruh jong ka Lok Sabha kaba ladep. Katba na liang ka INDIA Bloc, ki la rai ban pynïeng ïa u Kodikunnil Suresh, MP ba la rim tam jong ka Lok Sabha.
title: BAM SMAI U DR. RICKY AJ SYNGKON BAD U SALENG SANGMA KUM KI MP KA LOK SABHA

content: : Ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) ha ka sngi Baar ka la ai jingmut ba dei ban don noh da ka Combined 80 Percent Reservation na ka bynta ki jaidbynriew Khasi-Jaiñtia bad Garo khnang ban khanglad ïa ka weng ïa ka jingshah shiliang jong kano kano ka jaidbynriew.Ha ka dorkhas ba la phah sha ka Expert Committee on the State Reservation Policy, u President ka HSPDP Bah KP Pangniang u la ong ba la donkam ban khmih bniah biang ïa ka Reservation Policy ba la pynmih ha ka 12 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 1972  na ka bynta ka jingïabiang lang ha ka ïohkam ïohjam jong ki jaidbynriew bapher bapher ka jylla.“Ka party ka sngewdei ban don noh ka jingbhah kaba mar 40% +40%  kaba long 80% na ka bynta ki jaidbynriew Khasi-Jaiñtia bad Garo khnang ba kan wanrah ïa ka jingïakhun kaba pynhun lang hapdeng ki jaidbynriew Scheduled Tribe jong ka jylla (kata) ki Khasi, Jaiñtia bad Garo, bad ba kan weng ruh ïa ka jingshah leh shiliang jong kano kano ka jaidbynriew,” ong u Bah Pangniang.Da kaba kdew ïa ka Office Memorandum kaba la pynmih ha ka 18 tarik Nohprah 1972 kaba ïadei bad ka jingmang kyrpang ha baroh ki kam ba lait ha ki District Level , u President u la ong, “ka party ka ai jingmut ba dei buh 90% na ka bynta ki nongthep kam trai shnong ha ki district bapher bapher ka Meghalaya, da kaba buh jingkynmaw ruh ba ka jingthungkam ha ki district ka rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia ka dei ban long beit thik tang ïa ki ar tylli ki jaidbynriew, kata, tang ïa ki Khasi bad Jaiñtia, katba ka jingthungkam ha rilum Garo ka dei ban long beit thik tang ïa ki Garo.”“Ha ka para 2 jong ka Resolution kaba ong, “lada don ka jingduna ha ki nombar jong ki Scheduled Tribes bad Scheduled Caste dei ban rah noh shakhmat ha ka sien thungkam jong u snem uba bud bad ban pyndap ïa ka jingthungkam ha uta u snem lane kam dei ban palat ïa ka shisnem.  Ka Party ka la ai jingmut ba dei ban pyndam noh ïa kane rukom leh.U Bah Pangniang u la ïathuh ba ka party ka la tyrwa sha ka Committee ban khmih bniah biang ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka State Reservation Policy ha kaba bhah ïa ki Seat pule.“Naduh ba la pynkha ïa ka Jylla Meghalaya, ka State Reservation Policy kaba la pynmih ha ka 12tarik Kyllalyngkot, 1972, ïa ka percentage la pyntreikam ruh na ka bynta ka bhah pule na ka bynta ki Khasi, Jaiñtia bad Garo khlem da don ïa ka kyndon  kaba khlem kdew shai eiei ha ka Reservation Policy. Namarkata, ka party ka sngewdei ban khmih bniah wat ïa kane ruh ka bynta,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh u President ka HSPDP u la ong namarba kane ka mat ka long kaba kyllaiñ, ka Sorkar ka dei ban da bishar sani thik pa thik bad ban shim khia bha khnang ba kan ym ktah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ hapoh ka jylla baroh kawei.“Nalor kine ki jingai jingmut ba la kdew haneng, ka party ka kyrmen ruh ba un mih u soh uba bha na ka jingai jingmut jong ka Committee ba la thaw da ka Sorkar,” u la ong.
title: PYNDAM NOH ÏA KA 40-40% KI KHASI, JAIÑTIA, GARO, AI JINGMUT HSPDP SHA KA EXPERT COMMITTEE

content: Ka Shad ñiam Behdieñkhlam kaba ju long shisien shisnem jong ka Seiñ Raij Jowai ka la kut noh hapdeng ka jingiphuh iphieng ba la ïa shim bynta da ki khun ka Seiñ Raij Jowai ha ryngkat ka shad ka kmen bad ka put ka tem.Ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi lang da u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K. Sangma, u Myntri ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrtei Bah Paul Lyngdoh, ki MLA ba kynthup ïa u Bah Shanbor Shullai, Bah Wailadmiki Shylla, Kong Santa Mary Shylla, ki MDC, u Deputy Commissioner ka West Jaiñtia Hills Bah B.S. Sohliya, u Superintendent of Police Bah C. Syrti, ki ophisar Sorkar ryngkat ka jingdonlang u President ka Seiñ Raij Jowai Bah H. Toi, u General Secretary Bah A. Sumer nalor kiwei de.Ïa kane ka shad ñiam Behdieñkhlam kaba la khot ruh kum ka ‘saw sngi lai miet’ la pyndep ïa ki jinglehñiam naduh ka nguh ka dem, ka suit ka shor, ka jingpyndep ïa ka Siang ka Pha, ka jingleit rah ïa ka Symbood Khnong, ka Khnong Blai, ki Deiñkhlam, ka bam tyngkong, bad kiwei de ki kam ñiam kam rukom ba la pyndep da u Dolloi ka Elaka Jowai, u Langdoh, u Pator bad ki Waheh Wasan.Baroh ki Rot kiba la wan pynpoi ha kane ka sngi pynkut hapoh ka Syiem Aitnar ki don haduh 14 tylli, ïa kiba la shna kyrpang da ki dong bapher bapher hapoh ka Kmai Raij kumjuh na ka Seiñ Ummulong, ka Seiñ Raij Shillong nalor kiwei de.Mynta u snem ha ka jinglehniam naduh ka por mynstep ka la don ka Bam Tyngkong ha ïing Langdoh, ka kynting khnong ka Loompyrdi ha ïung Langdoh, ka Sympat ïung, katba haka por nongphai sngi kaba dei ka bynta ba kongsan jong ka lehñiam la pynhiar ïa ka Deiñkhlam, ka Kymbood Khnong, ka Khnong Blai bad ki rong ki rup kiba don 14 tylli la pynpoi ha pung ka Syiem Aitnar da ka jingsakhi lang jong ki hajar ngut ki nongwan peitkai kiba dei na kylleng ka Ri Khasi Jaiñtia.U Conrad K. Sangma haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen ban wan sakhi lang ïa kane ka shad Behdieñkhlam ha ka sien kaba lai, ula pynsngew ruh ba ka jylla Megha laya ka long kaba riewspah bha ha ka riti ka dustur jong u barim bajah.
title: KUT KA BEHDIEÑKHLAM KA SEIÑ RAIJ JOWAI. POI 14 TYLLI KI ROT HA PUNG ‘SYIEM AITNAR’

content: Ki shnat treikam jong ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ha ka sngi Balang ki la leit ban khang khyrdep ïa ki ophis treikam bad ki Bank ha rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia namar ka jingbym burom ïa ka lehniam Behdeiñkhlam da kaba pynlong trei ha kane ka sngi shuti ba la pynbna da ka Sorkar.Ki dkhot ka KSU ki la leit khang khyrdep ïa ki ophis treikam kiba don ha sor Shillong bad khapsor namar ka jingbym burom ïa ka sngi lehniam Behdieñkhlam.Kane ka jingpynsangeh treikam bad ka jingphah khang noh ïa ki ophis treikam ka kynthup ïa ki Bank, ki Post Ophis, ki Ophis jong ki kompeni kiba don naduh ki thaiñ Mawlai kynthup ïa ka Ophis FCI Mawroh, shaduh Lumdiengjri, Motphran bad shaduh ki thaiñ Khyndai Lad, Laban, Laitumkhrah, Malki, Nongthymmai , Nongmensong bad kumjuh ruh sha kiwei pat ki Shnong ka Nongbah Shillong.
title: KHANG KHYRDEP KA KSU ÏA KI BANK BAD OPHIS SORKAR BYM BUROM ÏA KA BEHDIENKHLAM

content: Ka North East Small Finance Bank (NESFB) ka la pynbna ban pynrung kam ïa ki briew kane ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi hapoh kane ka Bank kumba 200 ngut ha u Nailur 2024.Kane ka jingkhot thung kam kan long ha kine ki shnat treikam, Guwahati, Lakhimpur, Nalbari, Tezpur, Jorhat, Diphu, Dibrugarh, Kokrajhar, Kamrup, Shillong, Siliguri, Agartala bad  Aizawl. Kane ka long ba ka bank kan ai kam ai jam ha kane ka thaiñ.Ha kane ka jingkhot thung kam kaba nyngkong ka jingkhot thung kam kan long na ka bynta ki ar tylli ki kyrdan ha baroh kitei ki shnat trei kam ki long “Relationship Officer – Assets” bad “Relationship Officer – Liabilities” kin kham pynshlur ïa kiba la pass degree bad kiba la trei teng laisnem ha ki kam bank.Ka thong jong ka NESFB ka long ban kyntiew kumno ban kynshew pisa, ban pynmih ki lad ïohkam ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot ha North East bad ka Bank ka don ka jingthmu ban pynbun ïa ki nongtreikam jong ka bad kaba kham kyrpang ka long ïa ki samla na kato ka jaka.U Satish Kumar Kalra, MD bad CEO ka NESFB, la ong ba u burom ïa ka sap ka phong ba ki samla kane ka thaiñ ki don bad ki don ruh ïa ka sorkar ka kyrpang ban trei ha ki kam katkum ka thong ka jong ki kaba long ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot bad kane ka long ka thong kaba kin sa pyntreikam ha kine san snem ban wan.
title: PYNTIP KA NESFB BAN PYNRUNG KAM 200 NGUT HAPOH KI KAM BANK HA NORTHEAST

content: : Ka jingkilan met ha ka sien kaba khathynriew hapdeng ki shipai India bad Mongolia lyngba ka Joint Military Exercise Nomadic Elephant ka la sdang ha ka sngi Balang, ha Foreign Training Node, Umroi.  Kane ka jingkilan met kan long naduh ka 3 tarik haduh ka 16 tarik mynta bnai.Ki shipai ka India kiba ïashim bynta kin long kumba 45 ngut kiba la mihkhmat da ka Battalion jong ka Sikkim Scouts ha ryngkat bad ki shipai bad ki bor pahara na kiwei pat ki shnat katba ki shipai ka Mongolia ki la mihkhmat haduh 150 ngut ki Quick Reaction Force Battalion.Kane ka kilan met Nomadic Elephant ka dei ka jinghikai kaba la ju leh manla ka snem da ka ri India bad Mongolia. Ha ka edition kaba dang shudep mynshem snem la pynlong ha Mongolia u bnai Naitung, 2023.Ïa ka jingsdang kane ka kilan met la shimbynta da u His Excellency u Dambajavyn Ganbold, Ambassador ka Mongolia sha India bad u Major General Prasanna Joshi, General Officer Commanding 51 Sub Area ki shipai ka India.Ka jingthmu kane ka kilan met ka long ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ki shipai baroh artylli ki ri ban ïakhun ïa ki kam lehnoh ha kine ki jaka kaba hab ruh hapoh ka Sub Conventional kaba ha ka Chapter VII jong ka United Nations.Ïa kane ka kilan met yn pynleit jingmut ha ki kam khynra kaba la tip ka semi-urban bad ki kam kiew lum. Ki kam kilan met ki kynthup ïa ka jingkhynra ïa ki kam lehnoh, ka Establishment jong ka Joint Command Post, ka Establishment jong ka Intelligence & Surveillance Centre, ban pynthikna ba kan don ka jinghikai ha ka kam shong ïa ki lieng ïapom, ha ki jaka hiar ki jaka liengsuiñ, ka jingpynrung ïa ki Drones bad ki Counter Drone System napdeng kiwei. La ong ba u Major General Gyanbyamba Sunrev, u Chief jong ki General Staff ki shipai ka ri Mongolia u ban shim bynta ha sngi kut ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai, 2024 ha ryngkat bad u Lieutenant General Zubin A Minwalla, General Officer Commanding 33 Corps ki shipai India.Kane ka kilan met kan pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingïatreilang hapoh ki kam ïada ri, kaba kynthup ïa ki jingïakren jingïadei paralok hapdeng kine ki artylli ki ri.
title: KILAN MET NOMADIC ELEPHANT KI SHIPAI KA RI INDIA BAD KA RI MONGOLIA

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC), Education Cell  kum ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap kaba 10 snem ki jingïaid lynti kan pynlong ïa ka Tur Shaphrang Academic Award, 2024 ha ka 17 tarik mynta u bnai.Kane ka jingai khusnam kan long na ka bynta ki samla pule ka jaitbynriew Hynñiewtrep napoh ki skul ka jylla Meghalaya kiba wan ha ka kyrdan Top 10 bad kiba ïoh 85% shajrong ha ka class x bad XII ha ka SSLC, HSSLC, CBSE, bad ICSE u 2024.Ki kot ba dei ban pynpoi ki dei ka Marksheet, Admit Card, Registration Card, Certificate, Passport size Photo, bad contact number ki khynnah ne ki bahaïing.Na ka bynta ka jingtip kaba bniah ki lah ban telephone hapoh ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai Naitung ha ki number  u Bah Enlang Sawian Education Secretary 7005624948, Bhaboklang Shohshang Assistant Education Secretary number 9862667315 bad Banpynbiang Riang Education Secretary number 8131925487.
title: YN SAM KHUSNAM KA HYC ÏA KIBA PAS HA KI EKSAMIN

content: Ka jingiakop rwai “Sur Kynud Niam, Season -2” ba la pynlong da ka DBMNTV ka la poi sha ka bakut da ka Grand Finale ha ka janmiet 3 tarik Naitung,  ha Don Bosco Youth Centre Laitumkhrah ha kaba la shim bynta da ki 10 ngut ki heprit, ki samla lud bad samla rangbah kiba la shah jied ban rung Final na ki 47 ngut kiba la shah jied ha ka Blind Audition bad ba la wan ban iakhun ha kane ka jingiakop rwai Sur Kynud Niam, Season-2, ka Rynsan iakop Rwai Sur Niam ha ka Ktien Khasi.Na ki 10 ngut ki nongiakhun ha kane ka janmiet, u Samla Kit Kupar Nongsiej u la wan banyngkong bad u la ioh ia ka khusnam bad ka buskit 35 hajar tyngka. U samla Franky Nongbri u la wan ba-ar bad ioh ia ka khusnam bad buskit 15 hajar tyngka bad ka Tia Vanezza Kurbah ka la rah ia ka nam ba-lai ryngkat ka khusnam bad ka buskit 5 hajar tyngka.U Bah Ronnie Wahlang, MCS, Additional Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills, u la long u kongsan ban sam bad pynkhamti ia ki khusnam bad buskit sha baroh ki nongiashim bynta bad ha ki nongjop ha kane ka jingiakop final, Sur Kynud Niam, Season-2.Ha ka jingkren lyngkot ha kane ka janmiet, u Bah Ronnie Wahlang, u la iaroh ia ki sap ki phong bakynsai ba kine ki 10 ngut ki nongrwai ki la sei hakhmat ki kmie ki kpa bad ki paidbah ha ka lympung ia kop rwai. U la kyntu bad ai mynsiem shuh shuh ia ki samla ban tur shakhmat ban pynroi bad pynjanai ia ki sap ki phong jong ki. U la iaroh kyrpang eh ia ki kmie ki kpa kiba la theh la ka buit ka bor ban kyrshan bad ban pynshlur ia ki khun ban pynpaw pyrthei ia ki sap jong ki.Khlem da tyngkai ia ki kyntien, u Bah Ronnie u la ther da ki ktien jali jaum ia ki matti bajanai jong u Rev Fr Michael Makri, Director, Don Bosco Youth Centre bad u managing director ka dbmntv uba la pynlut ia ka bor met bad bor jabieng ban kyntiew ia ki sap jong ki samla ha baroh ki liang. U la iaroh ia ka bort rei shitom jong  Rev Phadar Makri uba la kyntiew ia ka Don Bosco  Youth Centre sha ka kyrdan International Standard na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ki samla jong ka Meghalaya.U Rev Phadar Michael Makri u la ai ka jingkhublei sngewnguh ia baroh kiba la don bynta bad snoh kti ha kane ka lympung kaba la poi sha ka Grand Finale kaba shongkun mynta ka janmiet.  U la ai ka jingngewnguh bakyrpang ia ki nongialam ka seng Salesian jong ka Shillong Province kiba la kyrshan borbah man la ka por ia ki jingleh jingkam baroh ba ka Youth Centre ka pyntrei kam ban kyntiew ia ki samla ka jylla baroh kawei. U la ong ruh ba ka jingthmu jongki ba ki pynlong ia kum kitei ki jingiakop ka long ban khring ia ki samla ban pyndonkam ia ki sap jongki ha ki kam ba iohjingmyntoi bad ban lait na ki jingsniew kiba la shyrkhei ha ka imlang sahlang namar ban pynbun ia ki jingriaw niam ha ki rynsan social media bad ban ai ka rynsan ia ki khynnah bad ki samla ki ba don sap ban mih sha khmat.
title: RAH U KITKUPAR, FRANKY & TIA VANEZZA HA KA GRAND FINALE SUR KYNUD NIAM
