content: : The Meghalaya Cricket Association has revealed its 28-member shortlist for the BCCI 2024-25 domestic season.The state team will be involved in two prestigious tournaments – the multi-day Col CK Nayudu Trophy from 13 October and the one day U-23 Men’s State A Tournament from 15 December.The MCA, following the recommendation of the ad hoc selection committee, has shortlisted 28 players for the season ahead based on their 2023-24 domestic record and their performances in selection matches that were held recently.Meghalaya were runners-up in the 2023-24 Col CK Nayudu Trophy plate group, finishing second only to Nagaland. Manish Sharma and Abhishek Kumar were electrifying with the ball, claiming 45 and 40 wickets respectively, and they have both been included in the list for this season as well. Some players have also been promoted from the U-19 team, such as Shavian Blah, who took 26 wickets in the Cooch Behar Trophy last season.The MCA will conduct selection-cum-preparatory camps before the U-23 tournaments one month prior to the start date and, in the meantime, the players have been advised to stay fit in practice and training and to update the MCA on their progress.MCA U-23 Men’s shortlisted players for 2024-25:Bipin Kumar Ray, Kush Agarwal, Indranil Chakravarty, Rohit Kumar Yadav, Agreas Cham Cham Sangma, Ronnie G Sangma, Gulgul Sangma, Gilseng Momin, PM Santhosh, Kevin Sanjeev Christopher, Aman Kumar, Navin Kumar Ray, Rurav Agarwal, Chandra B Thapa, Raghav Magotra, Jangrik Marak, Gavineal Marpna, Josiah Momin, Banialam Mylliemngap, Joydeepan Deb, Abhishek Kumar, Bharat Gurung, Swastic Chettri, Shavian Blah, Manish Sharma, Sachin Kumar, Thunun Marak, Avinash Rai.
title: 28-MEMBER SHORTLIST FOR U-23 MEGHALAYA MEN’S CRICKET TEAM REVEALED

content: : Ki Pulit ka Anti-Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Palei ki la ïohkem hynriew ngut ki suba nong khaii drok na ka shnong Mawiong, Shillong kaba hap hapoh ka Mawlai Police Station.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District, ki hynriew ngut kiba la shah kem ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Shanborlang Khongwir, 32 snem ka rta uba sah ha Mawlai Mawiong, u Bringson Kharumlong, 35 snem ka rta uba sah ha Mawlai Mawtawar, u Kitboklang Nongsiej, 29 snem ka rta uba sah ha Mawlai Umrynjah, u Return Dhar uba la 40 snem ka rta uba sah ha Mawlai Nongmali-III, u Wanlambok Lyngdoh, 25 snem ka rta uba sah ha Mawpat bad u Richard Marbaniang 24 snem ka rta uba sah ha New Nongstoiñ.Na kine ki hynriew ngut ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup san synduk u drok uba khia 64.1 gram, hynñiew tylli ki mobile phone, T. 1,29,000 lak ka pisa, kawei ka kali Maruti car 800 kaba don ïa u nombar ML 05 E 8363 bad kawei ka thuk thuk Yamaha R15 bike kaba don ïa u nombar ML05 AC 9261.
title: SHAH KEM 6 NGUT KI SUBA NONGKHAÏI DROK, KURUP KI PULIT 64.1 GRAM U DROK, 1.29 LAK KA PISA

content: Ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ba la shah kheiñ be-aiñ ha ka Sorkar ha ka sngi Palei ka la maham tyngeh ïa u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ban pyndam noh mardor ïa ka jingpynbna (Notification) ba la pynbna Raid ïa ka shnong Majai.“Ka jingpynshai jong u Bah Pynïaid Syiem ha ki lad pathai khubor ka dei tang ka jingïalam bakla.  Haba ka tyngab ka kyntait ban pynhap shilyngkhot ka doh na ka shyntur jong ka, u myrsiang da ka jingshalak u ong ïa ka, “ynda wan u slap bad kan don ka jingshlei um, hangno phin riehtngen? Phin sa ïap lada phi shong sah hangto halor u dieng,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u General Secretary-cum-Publicity Secretary ka HNLC u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw.“Phi ju mlien ban thok, bad baroh ki riewsaiñpyrthei ki ju long kumta.  Kaba sngewsih ka long ba ki paidbah ki wad ïa ka hok na ki katto katne ki nongkam bymman kiba pynlo   ng ïa ki briew jong ngi ban duk tasam.  Ka Sorkar NPP, la ha KHADC bad ha ka Jylla, ki pynlong ïa ki paidbah ka shnong Sohra ban ïakynduh jingeh na ka jingthngan bad pynkylla khongpong ïa ka jingim jong ki.  Ha ka jaka ban kyntiew ïa ka Sohra sha ka District, la khang khyrdep pynban ïa ka MCCL bad la pyrshang ban pynlong ïa ki paidbah jong ngi kiba khlem kam khlem jam bad ki nongshong shnong bym larkam,” la kynthoh ka seng.“Ka HNLC ka maham ïa u CEM ba u dei ban pyndam noh mardor ïa ka jingpynbna (Notification) ba la pynmih dang shen ban pynlong ïa ka shnong Majai kum ka Raid, hynrei lym kumta.  Ïa ka shnong Majai la bat lakam da ki heh saipan jong ki bar jylla bad ki ‘Ingkhong shyllangmat’. Ka jingpynmih dang shen ïa ka jingpynbna ka la pynkmen haduh katta katta ïa ki bar jylla kiba sah ha Majai, kiba la leh kmen da kaba thang bom pakata bad ka shad ka kmen,” ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.“Ki paidbah Hynñiewtrep ki la ngiah ïa ki jingshukor ki riewsaiñ pyrthei bad ka jingthok ka Sorkar.  Ki samla ki kwah ban ieng ha la ki jong ki kjat bad ban weng ruh ïa la ki jong ki jingeh, hynrei ka Sorkar ba ïalam da ka NPP ka knieh noh ïa ki kam jong ki bad ki kam barit baria, da kaba pynkupbor ïa ki bar jylla ha ka khih ka kamai.  Ka jingkhang  khyrdep ïa ka karkhana dewbilat bad ka jingkhang ïa ki kam khaii barit da kaba die shyiap bad maw ka la ktah ïa ka khih ka kamai.  Wat hapdeng ka jingïakhun da ka Hima bad u Syiem ban ïarap da kaba ailad ïa ka jingkhaii mawshun sha Bangladesh, ka KHADC ka wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki nongkhaii bar jylla,” la kynnoh ka HNLC.“Bun na ki samla jong ngi kim donkam donjam watla ki don ïa ka kyrdan pule kaba heh, namarba ka Sorkar kam shym la lah ban plie ïa ki lad aikam na ka bynta jong ki.  Ka pule puthi ha kane ka ri ka dei kaba ïaleh pyrshah dalade. Ka dei ka pule puthi bymman namarba phi siew bad phi pynlut ha kaei kaei kaba phim lah ban pyndonkam pat hadien.  Namarkata, bun na ki samla ki leh ïa ki kam khaii drok namarba kam don ka lad ka kabu kaba plie ïa ka ïohkam ïohjam. Ki samla ki pep skul noh shiteng por  bad ki phai sha ka jingim ban leh kam bymman.  Ka pule puthi ha kane ka ri ka pynmih kham bun kiba biej ban ïa ki bastad.“Lada ki samla ki ïakhih na ka bynta ka hok, ka Sorkar ka khot ïa ki da ki nongpynkulmar shnong bad ki nongïaleh pyrshah.  Ki pyrshang ban pynjot ïa ka lawei jong ki samla jong ngi, kaba syriem ïa ka jingïakhih ha Tiananmen Square protest ha China.  Hato phi kwah ban ïohi ïa ka jingisih bad ka jingïaumsnam ha Sohra bad ha ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep baroh kawei? Hato phi kwah ba ngin hikai ïa ka jingisih bad ka jingïaumsnam ïa ki samla kumba leh ka RSS bad ka BJP ki hikai ïa ka jingisih bad ka jingïaumsnam ban thang ïa ki kot bakhuid jong kiwei ki jaitniam, ki ingmane bad ki skul?  Wat pynbor ïa ngi ban hikai ïa ka jingisih. Wat iehnoh ïa ki samla jong ngi ha Sohra ha ka jingmong.  Nga maham ïa phi bad ïa ka Sokar ba kan ym don kano kano ka bor kaba lah ban khñiot noh ïa ka mynsiem jong ki bad phim don ruh ka suloi heh ban pynïap ïa ki,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: BYRNGEM KA HNLC ÏA U CEM KA KHADC, DAWA BAN PYNDAM ÏA KA JINGPYNBNA RAID ÏA KA MAJAI

content: Ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team jong ka tnat Fire and Emergency Services na Shillong kiba la ioh ia ka jingpan jingiarap na ki Pulit jong ka Umsiang Out Post ki la hiar sha ka shnong Umsiang, ha kaba ki la ioh sei ia ka met jong uwei u nongsharai masi ia uba la tip kum u Sofikul Ali uba la 35 snem ka rta na ka shnong Kahi Kuchi, kaba hap hapoh ka Kamrup District, Assam.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum, la iathuh ba une u nongsharai masi uba dei u nongshong shnong jong ka jylla Assam u la ngam jyllop katba u dang pynjam na shiliang sha shiliang ia ki masi lyngba ka wah Umsiang ha ka 24 tarik Jylliew, 2024.Hadien kane ka jingjia, ka kynhun State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) na ka Jylla Assam kam shym la lap satia ia ka met jong une u nongsharai masi wat hadien arsngi ba ki la wad, kumta ki la pyntip sha ki Pulit jong ka Umsiang Out Post ha kaba ki la pan jingiarap na ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team (SRT) jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.Dei lyngba ka jingiarap jong ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team (SRT) na ka Jylla Meghalaya ki la lap ia ka met jong u nongsharai masi hapoh ka 2:00 baje noh sngi ka sngi Saitjaiñ hadien ba ki la sdang ia ka jingngam um naduh ka por 10:30 baje mynstep.Hadien kane, ia ka met jong une u nongsharai masi la aiti noh sha ki bor Pulit jong ka Jylla Assam na ka bynta ban leh katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: ÏOH SEI KA SRT ÏA KA MET U NONGSHARAI MASI HADIEN AR SNGI BYM LAP KI SDRF ASSAM

content: Kumba 50 ngut ki briew ki la poi shah sumar ha Tirot Sing Memorial Civil Hospital, Mairang hadien ba ki la kem pang na kaba bamja ha ïing ïap briew kaba ha ka sngi Thohdieng ha ka shnong Nongdom, Eastern West Khasi Hills District.Ia kine kiba la kem pang la pynkit noh sha Civil Hospital, Mairang ha ka por janmiet sngi Thohdieng sa mynta ka sngi Saitjaiñ.Ka thymmei khubor ba la iohlum ka la iathuh ruh ba nalor kine ki 50 ngut tam ki dang don ruh kiba la leit shah sumar sha kiwei pat ki Hospital, kata sha Myriaw PHC bad sha Nongstoiñ Civil Hospital, West Khasi Hills District.Kat haduh ba la thoh ia kane ka khubor ym pat lah ban ioh jingkhein lut haduh katno ngut kiba la kem pang na ka jingleit ing iap briew ha Nongdom.U Medical Superintendent jong ka Tirot Sing Memorial Civil Hospital, Mairang u la iathuh ba ki nongpang kiba wan thiah pang ki dei kiba ioh ia ka jingpang prie bad pynhiar, khie suh bad la ong ruh ba ka jingpang ka dei na ka jingbam ia ka bam ba la sniew bad don ruh napdeng kiba la kem pang kiba la kham jur ka jingshitom ha kaba la la hap ban ai Oxygen.U Sordar jong ka shnong Nongdom, u la iathuh ba ki bor Sorkar tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ki la leit leit mar sha ka iing iap briew ha ka shnong Nongdom ban leh test ia ka um bad shim nuksa ruh ia ka bam khnang ban pynlong ia ka jingleh tes kaba bniah ban lap ia ka daw ka jingkem pang ki nongleit sngewlem ha ing iap briew.
title: POI HOSPITAL KUMBA 50 NGUT TAM KIBA LEIT SNGEWLEM HA ÏING ÏAP BRIEW HA NONGDOM

content: : Ki Pulit ka kynhun Anti-Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) ka East Khasi Hills District kiba la ïoh jingtip halor ka jingdon jong uwei u khynnah uba dang 10 snem ka rta uba tyrwa die ïa u drok ha ka thain Lower Jail Road, Shillong ha ka Sngi Saitjaiñ ki la hiar sha kane ka jaka bad leit shimti noh ïa une u khynnah ha ka por kumba 3:30 baje noh sngi.Ïa u drok ba la thep ha ki 16 tylli ki tyndong platik barit uba don ka jingkhia kaba 17.31 gram la ïoh ban kurup ruh na une u khynnah.Kat haduh ba la pynmih ïa kane ka khubor ki Pulit ki dang pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban tip bniah ïa kiba donkti ban phah tyrwa die ïa u drok ha une u khynnah.
title: TYRWA DROK U KHYNNAH BA DANG 10 SNEM HA LOWER JAIL ROAD

content: Ki bar jylla ki la mih lut na ka shnong  Erpakon hadien ka jingshah pynïap jong u Bah Kyrmen Lyngdoh Nonglait. Kane ka jingpyndem jong ki bar jylla, ka long hadien ba Dorbar Shnong baroh kawei ka la rai ban ym shah shuh ïa ki bar jylla ba shong ban sah ne seng kam seng jam hapoh ka jylli jong ka shnong Erpakon, ka shnong kaba don ha Ribhoi District.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, ka Dorbar Shnong Erpakon ka la rai ban ym shah shuh ïa ki bar jylla ban shong ban sah ne ban sengkam sengjam hadien ba u Bah Kyrmen Lyngdoh Nonglait u la duh noh ïa la ka jong ka jingim hadien ka jingshah tangon da ka kynja lyntang ha ka 11 tarik, Jymmang 2024, ha uwei na u nongtrei ka R.N Sharma Hotel ïa uba la tip kyrteng kum u Raju RajbharÏa u Raju la kem da ki Pulit jong ka Ri Bhoi halor kane ka jingjia.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, u Rangbah Shnong ka Erpakon Bah M. Thongni bad u Secretary Shnong Bah Lambor Kharshilot ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong ki nongïalam shnong ki la ïathuh ba ki ladep ban pynmih da ka hukum naduh ka 21 tarik, Jymmang 2024 ban kyrpad ïa baroh ki bar jylla kiba shong ba sah hapoh ka shnong bad khamtam kiba trei ha R.N Sharma Hotel ba ki dei ban mih noh mardor namar ka shnong ka la pynbna ba kam kam don shuh ka jingbah khlieh.Ka Dorbar Shnong ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la lum biang ïa ka Dorbar Pyllun ha ka shnong Erpakon ha ka jingdon lang jong ki trai ba aiwai ïa ka RN Sharma Hotel.Ki la pynpaw ruh ba ka Dorbar Shnong ka dap da ka jingsngewkmen ba ka jingïalang ka la long kaba seisoh hadien ba ki bar jylla ki la mih noh hapoh ka shnong bad hadien ba ki bar jylla ba shongwai ha RN Sharma Hotel ki la mih lut napoh shnong naduh ka 13 tarik Jylliew. ïa kane ka la pyntip da ki trai jaka bad ki la pynpaw ruh ka jingkmen ba ha kane ka shnong mynta la don satang para Khasi.Kum ka shnong ka la ai khublei ruh ïa ki paidbah, ki kynhun sengbhalang kiba ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka shnong bad ki la pypaw ruh kum kine ki jingjia kim dei shuh ban dang jia kaba ktah ïa ka shonguk shongsaiñ jong ki paidbah hapoh ka shnong.
title: NA KA JINGSHAH PYNÏAP U BAH KYRMEN L. NONGLAIT, MIH LUT KI BAR JYLLA NA SHNONG ERPAKON

content: Ka Synjuk Nongsynshar Shnong Par Umkhen jong ki lai District ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la shim ïa ka rai ban pynlong da ka jingïalang paidbah ha ka 6 tarik, Naitung, 2024 ha jingkieng Umkhen Thadrang halor ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynkynriah noh ïa ka jaka thehñiut Marten na Mawlai sha ka shnong Nonghali ha u lum Sohlait ba jngai tang kumba 100 mitar eiei na ka Wah Umkhen.Ki don kumba 15 tylli ki shnong kiba don ha syndah ka wah Umkhen bad lada ka Sorkar kan wanrah ïa kane ka jaka thehñiut ha lum Sohlait kan wanrah ïa ka jingjaboh jong ka wah bad ka jingshah ktah jong ki shnong kiba don ha syndah jong ka wah Umkhen.Halor kane ka daw, ka Synjuk ka la ieng pyrshah ïa ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar“Namar lada wanrah ïa ka Marten ha kane ka jaka ka Wah Umkhen kan sa duh noh ka jingitynnad jong ka bad kan long ka jingjaboh ïa ka wah Umkhen kham palat ban ïa ka wah Umkhrah. Halor kane ka Synjuk ka sngewkhia jur ha kaba ïadei bad kane jingthmu jong ka Sorkar,” ong u President ka Synjuk Bah Super Rngaid.“Lyngba une u kyrwoh, ka Synjuk ka kyntu ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong kiba don hapoh ka Synjuk kin shimkhia ban pyllait por khnang khnang ban ïashim bynta ha jingïalang paidbah ka ban sa long.  Ngi kyntu ruh ïa ki Dorbar Shnong ban shimkhia bad ban mih ryntih ban pyni ïa ka jingpyrshah ïa ka Sorkar. Ka Synjuk ka khot sngewbha ruh ïa ki sengbhalang kiba don ka jingsngewkhia ban ïa snohkti lang khnang ba ngin lah ban jop ïa kane ka jing angnud jong ngi,” u la ong.U Bah Rngaid u ïathuh ba ka jingpynlong ïa ka jingïalang paidbah ka long namarba ka Sorkar kam shym la sngap ïa ka jingdawa jong ka Synjuk watla bun ki jingthoh ba la ai ha ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar kiba ïadei bad kane ka kam.“Haduh mynta ka Sorkar kam shym la sngap ïa ka jingdawa jong ka Synjuk,” ong u President jong ka Synjuk.
title: BA THMU PYNKYNRIAH KA SORKAR ÏA KA MARTEN SHA NONGHALI, PYRSHAH KA SNSPU

content: Ka 6th Installation Ceremony jong ka Rotary Club Shillong Heritage kaba la long ha ka 29 tarik Jylliew, 2024 ha City Hut Dhaba ka la pynskhem ia u Vikash Chokhani kum u President, u Anupam Choudhury kum u Secretary bad u Prashant Goenka kum u Treasurer na ka bynta ka samoi treikam jong u snem 2024-2025.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang da u Secretary jong ka Salesian Provincial Conference South Asia u Rev. Fr (Dr). John Parankimalil uba la long kum u Kongsan bad uba dei ruh ha kajuh ka por u Secretary jong ka All India Don Bosco Education Society, New Delhi, nangta de ki dkhot jong ka Club bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.Ka Rotary Club Shillong Heritage ka ju leh ia kiba bun ki kam trei mon sngewbha ha ka imlang ka sahlang bad dang shen ka la buh ia ka Skill Development Centre ha Jyoti Sroat Inclusive School,Shillong.
title: THUNG KA ROTARY CLUB SHILLONG HERITAGE ÏA KI NONGKITKAM BA THYMMAI

content: Ka jingther u lapbah ka lyiur naduh ka sngi u Blei uba dang bteng haduh ka Lah Sngi U Blei ka la wanrah ia ka jingtwa khyndew ha kylleng ki district jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Kat haduh ba la pynmih ia kane ka khubor, ka Batesi TV ka la ioh lum ia ki khubor kiba iadei bad ki jingjia twa khyndew ha ki ar jaka, kata, ha ka shnong Tiehsaw ha surok Nongstoin-Shillong Highway ha kaba wat ki kali heh ruh kim lait shuh ban iaid lyngba na kane ka surok. Ki nongtrei jong ka tnat PWD (Roads) tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane, ki la rah da ka kali puhshilum ban khat ia ka khyndew kaba la hab hapdeng surok khnang ban weng ia ka jingdheng kali na ka daw ka jingtwa jong ka khyndew.Sa kawei pat ka jingtwa khyndew ka la jia ha ka surok Lawbyrtun-Rngikseh kaba hap hapoh ka Mawthadraishan Community and Rural Developement Block, Eastern West Khasi Hills.  Ka kynhun jong ki ophisar ka Block ki la leit ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.Ha rilum Garo, ka khyndew ka la twa ha ka bynta jong ka surok Ringrey-Gandrak-Chitoktak ha kaba ka kynhun State Disaster Response Force ka la leit ban pynkhuid ia ka khyndew khnang ban pyllait ia ki kali kiba la ngat ha ka jingdheng kali hapdeng surok.Ha ka shnong Akkongre, ka jingtwa jong ka khyndew ka la khynniat jubor ia kawei ka kali sha khap surok bad ha kane ka jingjia kam shym la don kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih.Ha ka kyntoit Deran kaba don hajan ka shnong Chitoktak, Tura kawei ka ing ka la shah pynjulor na ka jingtwa jong ka khyndew.
title: TANG AR SNGI BA THER U LAPBAH JUR KA JINGTWA KHYNDEW KYLLENG KA MEGHALAYA

content: Ka jingiai ther jong u lapbah lapsan naduh ka sngi u Blei bad bteng haduh ka Lah Sngi U Blei ka la wanrah ia ka jingjot bad ka jingsniew bad pra lut khait jong ka surok kaba pyniasoh naduh Ishyrwat ter ter shaduh ka shnong Umpling, Nongrah, Lapalang, Rynjah bad ia ka surok New Shillong.Kane ka jingjot jong kane ka surok ka dei na ka daw ka jingtuid jong ka um slap kaba la khoh lut ia ka rong surok bad ia ka khyndew kaba la pynmih ia ki thliew ki syar kat haduh ba ka la pynsuhsat ia ki kali ban iaid lyngba na kane ka surok.Ka kynhun lum Khubor jong ka Batesi TV kaba la leit jurip ia kane ka surok ka la lap ba ka jingjot jong ka surok ka la pynsyrtok ia ka leit ka wan jong ki kali bad khamtam eh ia ki thuk thuk ar shaka.Ka kynhun lum khubor ka la lap ruh ia uwei u rangbah uba da la ka mon sngewbha katba u dang wan phai na ka kam bylla u la iarap ban kdew lynti ia ki kali ban kiar na ka thliew kaba la mih hapdeng jong ka surok.
title: PRA LUT KHAIT KA SUROK HA ISHYRWAT, NGAM KI KALI HAPDENG KI THLIEW

content: : Ban pyniaid ia ki jingiatreilang hapdeng ka ri Japan bad ri India khamtam ha ka jylla Meghalaya,  ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei, u President ka Meghalaya Sports Association Bah John F. Kharshiing u la leit sha New Delhi ban iakynduh kyrpang ia u First Secretary (PR & Culture) ka Embassy jong ka ri Japan u Kobayashi Takashi bad ia ka Third Secretary ka Hakamata Maho.Kane ka jingiakynduh ka long ban thaw ia ki lad iatreilang ha ki kam bapher bapher ha ka Sports, Tourism bad Culture.Ha ka jingialang, ki ophisar ka Japan ki la ong, kumba long mynta ka ri Japan bad ka ri India ki la don ka jingiatreilang kaba jan hapdeng kiba bun ki kam ha kiba bun ki jylla ri India bad ki long kiba kloi ban nang pyniar ia kine ki jingtip sha ka jylla  Meghalaya ban nang pyniajan ki rukom iadei lyngba ka Culture bad ka Cherry Blossom Festival ka long kawei na ki lad treikam lang, kumjuh ha ka Tourism bad ki kam ialehkai Sports bad khamtam eh ban thaw ia ki lad ki lynti ban pynshlur ia ka jingnang ban kren ia ka ktien Japanese kum shibynta ban plie ki lad iohkam iohjam sha ka ri Japan na ka bynta ki samla ka jylla Meghalaya.Ki longheh ka ri Japan ki la mynjur ban pyniakynduh ia ki kynhun bapher bapher baroh ar liang halor kitei ki mat iakren ban pyniajan ka jingiatreilang kaba kham jan hapdeng ka ri Japan bad ka jylla Meghalaya India.
title: PYNÏAR U PRESIDENT KA MSOA ÏA KA JINGTREILANG BAD KI OPHISAR KA JAPAN

content: : Ka jingther jong u lapbah uba la neh la kumba katto katne sngi ka la wanrah ïa ka jingtwa khyndew kaba shyrkhei ha ka step Lah Sngi u Blei hapoh ka shnong Umlieh, West Khasi Hills District.Katkum ka jingïathuh u Sordar Shnong u Bah E.B Marngar, la ong ba ka jingtwa jong ka khyndew ka la jia ha ka por kumba 6.30 baje mynstep.Ha kane ka jingtwa jong ka khyndew, kawei ka ïing dewbilat ka la shah tap ha ka khyndew bad ka surok Umlieh-Mawlangsu ka la shah khang lynti bad sahkut ka leit ka wan bad kumjuh kawei ka kali maruti Van ruh ka la shah tap ha ka khyndew hynrei donbok ba ym shym la don mano mano ba mynsaw namarba ha kane ka por ki briew kim pat don satia hapoh jong katei  ka ïing ne ha ka kali.Kane ka iing ka dei jong u Bah Onisha Wahlang bad ka kong Miansidaris Lyngkhoi, katba ka kali ka dei ka jong u Bah Derik Nongphud na ka shnong Umlieh.
title: SHAH TAP LUP KA ÏING, KALI BAD SUROK HA KA JINGTWA KHYNDEW HA UMLIEH, WKH

content: : Ka jinglong jingman jong ka  Sub Centre kaba don ha Umsih, Puksora, South West Khasi Hills District ka la long kaba sangsot haduh katta katta hadien ba la lap ba ka don ka jingpei um kaba long kumba mih ka umpohliew hapdeng ka kamra ha kane ka SubCentre.Kaba kham pynlyngngoh shuh shuh ka long ba ym dei tang ka jingtei barim kaba jaw um hynrei wat ka Building thymmai kaba dang shu dep shna ruh ka la jaw um bad ki jingkhang ruh kim da long bha ban khang.Kane ka jingpei um jong ka Sub Centre ka pynlong ia ki nongtrei ba kim biang shuh ha ka rukom ai jingsumar ia ki nongwan shim dawai, kumjuh ruh ban sah ha kane ka jaka hynrei ka la pynwit bad ktah ruh ia ka jingtreikam pura jong kane ka Sub Centre.Ha ka jingleit jurip jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Ranikor Circle la lap ia kine ki jingshisha bad ka seng ka kyntu ia ka Engineering Wing jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah bad kumjuh ruh ia u District Medical and Health Officer (DM&HO) jong ka South West Khasi Hills District ban phah peit bad phah maramot mardor khnang ba kan ym buh jingeh ia ki nongtrei ba dei ban sah ha kane ka jaka bad khamtam eh ia ki nongshim dawai na kane ka jaka sumar.
title: MIH KA UMPOHLIEW HAPDENG KAMRA KA HEALTH SUB-CENTRE HA UMSIH, SWKH

content: : U MP jogn ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) na Shillong Seat u Dr Ricky AJ Syngkon ha ka Lah Sngi  U Blei u la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng ban tuklar lem na ka bynta ban shna pynbha ïa ka surokbah National Highway-06 ha East Jaiñtia Hills District bad kiwei ruh ki surok ha ka jylla.Ha ka dorkhas ba la aiti ha u Myntri ka tnat Road Transport & Highway u Nitin Jairam Gadkari ha ka 1 tarik Naitung, u Dr Syngkon ula ong, “nga kyrpad ïa ka ophis jong phi ban sngewbha tuklar bad shim mardor ïa ki sienjam ba donkam halor kane ka kam khnang ba kan weng ïa ka jingeh jong ki paidbah ka Jylla ba la kdew haneng”.U MP ula ong ba ka NH-06 ka dei ka surok ba kongsan bha kaba ïaid lyngba ka Jylla Meghalaya, Assam, Tripura bad Mizoram kumta ka la donkam ban pynbha noh ïa ka.Ka surok NH-06 ka pynïasoh ïa ki sor kiba kongsan ha ki saw tylli ki Jylla ba kynthup ïa ka Jorabad, Shillong, Jowai, Silchar, Aizawl, Agartala bad kut hajan ka khappud India-Myanmar.U la ong ba ki bynta jong ka surok kiba hap hapoh ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ka dei kaba la jot rathai bha khamtam ha ki bynta naduh Jowai haduh Ratacherra ha kaba ki nongleit nongwan ki hap ban mad ïa ka jingsohsat tang na ka jingsniew ka surok.“Ka jinglong jingman ka la nang sniew shuh shuh ha ka por lyiur bad ki briew ki ju sahkut da ki sngi ha surok ban poi sha ka jaka ba ki thmu ban leit. Kane ka la ïaid la katto katne snem bad ka la wanrah ïa ki jingeh ba khraw na ka jingduh kamai kajih bad wat ka jingduh ki mynsiem briew,” ula ong.
title: HAKHMAT U MYNTRI SORKAR PDENG KYRPAD U MP KA SHILLONG BAN SHNA PYNBNA ÏA KA NH-06 HA EJH

content: Ki nonghikai skul SSA kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka All Meghalaya SSA School Teachers Association (AMSSSATA) ha ka sngi Baar ki la ap da ki kynta ban ïoh ïakynduh ïa u Myntri ka tnat Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma ban pynsngew ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdawa ban kyntiew noh ïa ka tulop jong ki nonghikai skul SSA kaba khlem pynkiew shuh mynta la phra snem kynthih.U President jong ka Association Bah Peter Thyrniang ha ka jingïakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la ïathuh ba u Myntri u la shah skhor ïa ki jingdawa jong ka Seng bad u la kular ba un sa rah hakhmat ka Kynhun Myntri na ka bynta ban ïathir ïatai shwa ban shim ïa kano kano ka rai.Ha ka dorkhas ba la aiti ha u Myntri, ka AMSSASTA  ka la kdew ba ka jingpynkiew tulop ka la long nyngkong eh ha u snem haduh u snem 2017 bad naduh u snem 2018 ka Sorkar kam shym la pynkiew shuh ïa ka tulop jong ki nonghikai skul SSA.“Ngi la shakri ha ki skul SSA la palat arphew snem bad ngi la noh synñiang sha u sup u thiar jong ka pule ka puthi nalor kiwei pat ki kam ba la bynshet ha ngi. Namar ka jingkiewdor jong ki marbam mardih, ngi kyrpad ban kyntiew ïa ka jingsiew tulop kaba long shispah na ka shispah,” la pynpaw ka Association ha ka dorkhas.U Bah L. Marngar u la ïathuh ba ka Association ka la pynsngew ruh ha u Myntri ha kaba ïadei bad ka hukum jong ka Supreme Court na ka bynta ki nonghikai kiba pas ïa ka eksamin Diploma in Elementary Education ba la pynlong ha ki snem ba ladep da ka National Institute of Open Schooling ba kin ym shah ktah na kane ka hukum.“Ki don da ki phew hajar ngut ki nonghikai SSA kiba la pyndep ïa ka eksamin D.El.Ed. ki ban shah ktah lada pyntreikam salonsar ïa ka hukum jong ka Supreme Court naduh ki snem kiba mynshwa. Ka jingkyrpad jong ngi ka long ba ka Sorkar ka pyntreikam ïa ka hukum shakhmat ym shadien,” ong u Bah Marngar.
title: AP KI NONGHIKAI SSA DA KI KYNTA HA SECRETARIAT BAN ÏAKYNDUH ÏA U MYNTRI KA TNAT PULE PUTHI

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Mendipathar Police Station ki la iohkem ia lai ngut ki snar nonglute na ka jylla Assam kiba donkti ban lute pisa da kaba pynap suloi ia ki riewpaidbah ha North Garo Hills District bad kane ka kynhun ka dei kaba ju donkti ban leh ruh ia ki kam pyntriem ha khappud jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam.Kine ki lai ngut ki snar nonglute kiba la don mynta ha ka kti jong ki Pulit ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Sunil Boro bad u Sahadev Basumatary, katba u Turti Basumatary u dei uba la leit ban pyndem hi hakhmat jong ki Pulit da kaba aiti ruh bad kawei ka pistol lem bad ar tylli ki kuli ki bym pat pynbthei.Ki Pulit mynta ki dang pynlong ia ka jingthwet kaba jur ban iohkem sa ia u  Kaltu Rabha uba donkti lang ha kane ka kam lute.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police jong ka North Garo Hills, u Pawar Swapnil Vasantrao, la iathuh ba ha ka janmiet 18 tarik Jylliew 2024 saw ngut ki runar ki bym lah ban ithuh durkhhmat kiba shong da ka Aprilia Scooty kaba don ia u nombar AS18J-0181 bad ka Bajaj Pulsar 220 (black) kaba don ia u nombar AS18 E-7925 ki la lute pisa 80 hajar na ki riewpaidbah bad ioh khung ruh ar tylli ki mobile phone bad ki simcard.Ha kane hi ka janmiet ki nongshong shnong jong ka Beldongpara, Goalpara, Assam ki la ioh bat ia ka Scooty Apprillia bad ia ka thuk thuk Pulsar 220 (black) kaba don ia u nombar AS 18 E 7925 ha ka shnong Beldonpara hynrei, ki  snar nonglute ki la lait phet da ka said na ki paidbah.Ha ka 19 tarik, Jylliew, 2024 ki lanot kiba kylla sohpdung ha ka kti ki nonglute ki la mudui da ka ejahar ha ki Pulit ia kaba la register case ha Mendipathar Police Station hapoh ka Section 392 Indian Penal Code (IPC) bad ka Sec. 25 (IA) (IB) Arms Act.Tang shu ioh pdiang ia kane ka ujor, ki Pulit hapoh ka jingialam jong u DSP, Special Operation jong ka North Garo Hills District Executive Force ki la khynra ia kawei ka jaka riehtngen ha khappud jong ka jylla Assam ha ka 24 tarik, Jylliew, 2024 ha kaba ki la iohkem ia u Sunil Boro, 33 snem ka rta uba shong basah ha shnong Upper Borgum, Goalpara District, Assam bad kurup ruh ia ka Scooty kaba don ia u nombar ASI8J-0181 kaba u la pyndonkam ban leit lute bad kiwei pat ki paralok ba la tip kyrteng kum u Kaltu Rabha, u Turti Basumatary bad Sahadev Basumatary ki la lait phet da ka said na ka kti jong ki Pulit.Ha ka 1 tarik, Naitung, 2024 u Turti  Basumatary, uba sah ha ka shnong Buglamari, Goalpara District, Assam u la leit ban pyndem hi dalade hakhmat jong ki Pulit ka North Garo Hills Police ryngkat bad kawei ka pistol lem bad ar tylli ki kuli ki bym pat pynbthei.Da ka jingialam lynti jong u Turti Basumatary ki Pulit ki la iohkem sa ia u Sahadev Basumatary na ka shnong Tikrikilla, West Garo Hills.Ki Pulit mynta ki dang pynlong ka jingthwet kaba jur ban iohkem sa ia u Kaltu Rabha uba dang don mynta ha ka jingphetrieh.
title: NGAT LAI NGUT KI SNAR NONGLUTE NA ASSAM HA SHRIP KI PULIT, DANG PHETRIEH UWEI

content: Katto katne ngut ki Myntri jong ka Hima Mylliem ki la ujor sha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council halor ka jingkynnoh leh sop sop jong u Syiem u Pa’iem Ainam Manik Syiem ha kaba ïadei bad dulir pynskhem khyndew jong ka Iew Mylliem rim, Hima Mylliem bad ka jingbym lum ïa ka Executive Dorbar bad ïa ka Dorbar Pyllun jong ki Bakhraw Batri ban pyntip paidbah halor ka pisa kaba kot T.5,58,30,451 klur ba la ïoh na ka jingsiew bailutksan da ka Sorkar ban pynheh ïa ka surok Shillong-Dawki.Shwa kane, ki Myntri ki la phah sha ka KHADC ïa ka ujor banyngkong ha ka 21 tarik, Risaw, 2023 bad ïa ka jingbishar kam arliang manla la pynlong ha ka sngi Baar ba la pynbeit da u Dy.CEM ka KHADC uba khmih ïa ka tnat Elaka u Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem ban tohkit bniah halor kine ki jingujor jong ki Myntri pyrshah ïa u Syiem.U Myntri B.N Shanpru ha ka jingïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor u la kynnoh ba ka jingleh kyrkieh jong u Pa’iem Ainam Manik Syiem ban ai dulir pynskhem khyndew ïa ka Raid Mylliem khlem da ïoh jingbit na ka Dorbar Hima Mylliem ka long ka jingleh donbor bad ka jingdie be-aiñ ïa ka khyndew Hima kaba la kdew shai ha ka Rule 2 (37) jong ka Administration of Mylliem Syiemship Rule, 2015 bad ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka kyndon 7 (e) jong ka Mylliem Act, (Mylliem Syiemship Act, 2007 bad ïa ka Rule 12 jong ka Administration of Mylliem Syiemship Rules, 2015.U la ïathuh ruh ba ha ka jingujor kaba nyngkong sha ka KHADC, la mudui pyrshah ïa u Syiem Ainam hapoh ka Section 7 (c) bad 7 (e) jong ka ‘The Khasi Hills Autonomous District (Appointment and Succession of Syiem, Deputy Syiem, Electors and Rangbah Shnong of Mylliem Syiemship), Act, 2007 bad katkum ka aiñ jong ka Sorkar Pdeng kaba ïadei bad ka Right to Fair Compensation and Transparency in Land Aquisition, Rehabilitation and Resettlement Act, 2013.“Ka jingujor pyrshah ïa u Syiem bad ïa ki katto katne ngut ki Myntri ka long ba ngi ïohi ïa ki kam bad kim long kiba ïahap bad ka riti ka dustur bad ka synshar ka khadar. Ka jingujor ka long ruh halor ka jingpynduh bai rneng ïa ki Myntri da u Syiem kaba paw ruh kum ka jingleh donbor. Ngi sngewsih ban ïathuh ba ka jingsynshar jong u Syiem Ainam ka long palat na kaba palat liam namarba ïa ka dorbar ruh um ju khot tikna bad katkum ka rul ba dei ban khot shisien shisnem hynrei kata ruh um ju khot,” u la ong.“Ka jngkheiñ jingdiah ha ka Hima dei ban ai shisien shisnem hynrei mynta la hynriew snem u Syiem um pat ai jingkheiñ wat tang shisien ruh.  Kane ka dei kaba sngewsih tam namarba ïa ngi la jied da ki Kur bad ngi mihkmat ha ka Hima ban tip ïa ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka pisa pilaiñ bad ïa ki rukom treikam hynrei ïa kata ruh ngim don jingtip namarba ym don jingkheiñ jingdiah namarba um (Syiem ju khot ïa ka dorbar,” la ong shuh shuh u Myntri Shanpru.“Ha kaba ïadei bad ka khyndew ka shyiap, ka long kaba sngewsih ba u Syiem u leh khlem da khot ïa ka Executive Dorbar bad ka Dorbar Pyllun khamtam ïa ki kam kiba heh kiba ïadei bad ka Mylliem bad kiwei kiwei kiba ngi la ujor. U leh khlem ka jingpyntip lang. Ha ka jingshisha kane ka dei ka ri synshar paidbah, ka synshar lang bad ngi dei ban tip lang haba leh ïa kano kano ka kam hynrei u leh khlem kano kano ka jingpyntip lang ïa ngi,” ong u Myntri Shanpru.“Ka jinglum jinglang kam ju don hynrei na ka liang jong u Syiem u shu pynsngewtynnat tang ïa kito katto katne ban pyntyllun ïa ka kam.  Ngi la aiti ka jingujor bad ka shong ha ka KHADC kaei ka ban bishar bad kan sa don biang sa kawei pat ka jingbishar kam bad ngin ïai ap biang ïa kata.  Ïa ka ujor ngi la kdew ruh katkum ka rul jong ka Mylliem Act. Ngi kyrmen ba kane kan ym shlem shuh,” u la ong.Kiwei pat ki Myntri ki la bynrap ruh da kaba ong, “halor ka jingioh pdiang ïa ka bai lutksan na ka liang jong u Syiem u dei ban tip kham bha namarba u dei u Syiem uba synshar ha ka Hima.   Hadien ba la ioh ïa ka bailutksan na ka bynta ka Raid Mylliem um shym la pyntip ïa ka Dorbar baroh kawei bad ïa ka rai la shu shim hi tang da u Syiem bad ki katto katne ngut ki Myntri.  Kino kino ki jaka kiba hap hapoh ka Raid ka dei hi ka synshar ka khadar jong ka Hima.”
title: UJOR KI MYNTRI SHA KHADC BYM WANRAH U SYIEM HA KA DORBAR PYLLUN BA ÏOH ÏA KA BAILUTKSAN 5.58 KLUR

content: Ki dkhot jong ka Synjuk ki Nongñiah Taxi Sor bad Khapsor ba la lamkhmat da u Bah Pynsuk Youroi bad kynthup ruh na ka Jets 24×7 ba lamkhmat da u samla Pynskhem Uriah ki la leit ban khang tala ïa ka ophis treikam jong ka Rapido ha Malki, Shillong ha ka sngi Baar.Ka jingleit khang tala ïa ka ophis treikam jong ka Rapido ka long halor ka jingkynnoh ba ka kompeni Rapido ka shu treikam be-aiñ hapoh kane ka jylla khlem ka License kaba biang da kaba knieh noh ïa ka pliangja jong ki trai jylla kiba la ïoh License kum ki Aggregator ban kamai da kaba kit ïa ki nongleit jingleit ha Shillong bad kiwei kiwei ki jaka jong ka jylla.“Kum ki Aggregator kiba la ïoh laisen ka pynsngewsih ïa ngi ba ngi hap ban ïakhun bad kiwei pat ki bym don laisen. Ïa ka laisen ngi la ïoh naduh u bnai Ïaiong, 2023. Naduh ba ngi ïoh laisen, ki (Rapido) dang kamai be-aiñ ha ka jylla jong ngi. Ha ka jingshisha ïa ka jingujor ngi la phah shaduh u Myntri ka tnat Transports ha u Risaw, 2023 hynrei haduh mynta ka Sorkar kam shym la leh eiei la jan dap shi snem,” ong u samla Uriah.“Kum ki local start-up ngi shem jynjar bha ban ïakhun bad ki Aggregator be-aiñ. Ka Rapido haba ka khot ïa ki nongñiah thuk thuk ban kamai kam ju pan ïa ka Permit bad ïa ka Police Verification,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka jingkhang tala ïa ka Rapido ka long ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ki nongleit nongwan kiba leit jingleit da ki thuk thuk kamai ar shaka.“Ngi kyrpad ïa ki nongñiah thuk thuk ban kamai, kumba ma ngi baroh ngi don ïa ka hok ban kamai jakpoh tangba ngi dei ban ïaid da ka lynti kaba dei,” la kyrpad u samla Uriah uba dei ruh u Managing Director jong ka JETS 24×7.U la ong ba lada ki don ki kompeni kiba shu kamai beaiñ kan ktah bha haduh katta katta ïa ki Aggregator kiba ka Sorkar hi ka la ai ïa ka laisen.Hadien, kane Synjuk ki Nongniah Kali Sor bad Khapsor ki la leit ban ïa kynduh ïa u Executive Member jong ka KHADC uba peit ïa ka tnat Labour u Bah Victor Rani.U General Secretary jong ka Synjuk u Bah Pynsuk Youroi u la ïathuh ba ka Synjuk kaba don ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor  ka jingjyllei jong ki bar jylla kiba niah ïa ki taksi kamai, ka seng ka la dawa ïa ka District Council ban pynsahngeh noh ka jingai Labour License sha ki bar jylla bad u la ïathuh ruh ba ka Synjuk ka ladep pynsngew ïa kane ka mat jingdawa sha ka Council la ar snem mynshwa mynba u Bah Titortarwell Chyne u dang long u Chief Executive Member jong ka Council ha kaba u la kubur ba ladep ban pynsangeh ïa ka jingai Labour License, katba na ka liang jong ka Synjuk ka lap ba katba nang mih ki sngi ka jingjyllei jong ki bar jylla kiba niah ïa ki taksi kamai ka la nang kiew.
title: KHANG TALA KA JETS 24×7 BAD KI NONGÑIAH TAKSI KAMAI ÏA KA OPHIS TREIKAM JONG KA RAPIDO

content: : Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ka la maham tyngeh ïa kino kino ki riewshimet bad kino kino ki kynhun kiba pyndonkam bakla ïa ka kyrteng, ka shab bad ïa ka kyrteng jong ki nongïalam barim jong ka KSU.“Ngi la ïoh jingtip ba don ki riewshimet bad ki kynhun kiba la leh bad thmu pyndonkam bakla ïa ka kyrteng ka seng, ka shab ka seng bad ka kyrteng ka nam ki nongïalam barim ka seng na ka bynta ka myntoi shimet jong ki. Ka seng ka maham tyngeh ïa kum kine ki briew bad ki kynhun ba lada ki leh tamti tamjat ban pyndonkam bakla na ka bynta ka nam ka burom malade kan ym artatien wat ban pyni da ka bor met ruh pyrshah ïa ki,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u General Secretary ka KSU u samla Donald V. Thabah.Ka KSU ka kyntu ïa ki khun ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep ban ym shah ïalam bakla bad shah pynthame ha kino kino ki briew lane kynhun bad wat ki sengbhalang kiba leh mynleh ieid jaidbynriew tang na shynrong hynrei napoh napoh pat ki dei tang ki dalal jong ki bor Sorkar, ïarmangkalai bad mynder ri.“Kine ki kynhun ki dei kita ki suri kup snieh langbrot kiba leh ieid jaidbynriew tang ban ïoh nam bad ban pynjah kyrteng ïa ka KSU kaba la ieng skhem triang la 46 snem mynta ban long ka kynroh kaba skhem jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi. Ki paidbah ki lah ban sakhi ruh ba lada don kino kino ki mat kiba ka KSU ka ju shim na ka bynta ka bha ka miat u paid Khasi, kine ki kynhun ki ju mih kynsan kynsan ha kum kita ki por ban shim pat ïa kiwei ki mat tang ban pyntlot noh ïa ki mat kiba la shim ka KSU (overshadow).  Ki paidbah ki lah ban bishar ba lada leh eiei ka KSU wat tang ki mat kiba rit ruh, ki dkhot kin shah kem beit khlem daw kumba la paw ba haduh mynta san ngut ki dkhot ka seng ki dang shong sajia ha byndi kiba kynthup ruh wat ïa ar ngut ki nongïalam na ka CEC. Hynrei ki dkhot jong kum kitei ki seng kim ju shah kem ha ki bor Pulit kaba pyni ba lehse ïoh don kaei kaei (nexus) sha lyndet,” la kynthoh ka KSU.“Kyntang ïa wai ka KSU ka maham biang ba ym bit ban leh kino kino ki kam kiba ïa dei bad ka seng KSU kaba mynta bad mynshwa lane bad ki nongïalam ba mynta bad mynshwa khlem da ïoh jingbit na ka CEC jong ka KSU,” la ong u kyrwoh.
title: MANA KA KSU ÏA KINO KINO BA PYNDONKAM BAKLA ÏA KA KYRTENG JONG KA SENG

content: : Ka Press Information Bureau, Ministry of Information & Broadcasting, ka sorkar Pdeng, Shillong ka la pynlong ïa ka Vartalap, ka Media Workshop ha kaba ïa kane la pynlong hapoh ka jingïatreilang bad ka tnat Meghalaya Police halor ki 3 tylli ki Criminal Laws ‘Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita’ (BNS), ‘Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita’ (BNSS) bad ka ‘Bharatiya Sakshya Adhiniyam’ (BSA) jong u snem 2023 ha Shillong. La ong ba kine ki aiñ kin sdang ban treikam naduh ka 1 tarik jong u bnai Naitung mynta u snem.Ha ka jingkren u Deputy Inspector General of Police (Eastern Range) Davis NR Marak ula ong ba kine ki aiñ la pynwandur bad la pyntreikam da ka sorkar hadien ba la khmih bniah bha bad ki aiñ runar kiba don mynta ha kaba kane kan nang pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ki aiñ ba la don lypa.U la ong ba kine ki aiñ ba thymmai kin long ka jingïarap ha kaba ïadei bad ka criminal justice system jong ka ri. U la ong ba kine ki aiñ ba thymmai kin ïarap ruh ïa ki nongshong shnong ha kiba bun ki liang. U la ong ba ka Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS), ka pynleit jingmut halor ka Nyaya ne ka hok bad dei halor kane ba ka jingpynkylla ïa ka kyrteng ka thew sha ka jingpynshitom kaba long hapoh ka IPC ne ka Nyaya ha ka BNS.U DIG u la ong ba ïa kine ki aiñ la shim lyngba ka Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanita 2023 ne ka BNSS kaba la bujli ïa ka CrPC.Haba batai shaphang ka Bharatiya Sakshya Adhiniyam, u Marak u la ong ba ka Indian Evidence Act la pyntreikam naduh u snem 1872 bad la pyndonkam da ki katto katne ki jingpynkylla hynrei ïa ka lEA kam shym la kren halor kane ha ki snem ba la dep. Kane ka aiñ kaba thymmai ka Bharatiya Sakshya Adhiniyam, 2023 ne ka BSA ka ai ka lad ban pyni ïa ki sakhi bad kiwei pat ki jingdonkam.Ha kane ka jingïasyllok la pynïaid da u Ratul Barua, u News Editor barim ka Meghalaya Guardian and Communication Manager jong ka tnat Forest ka Assam. La donlang ka kong Patricia Mukhim, Editor ka The Shillong Times, Vivek Syiem, IPS, Assistant Inspector General of Police, Shillong, Khalid Khan, Additional Advocate General, Meghalaya, R L Blah, bad Anita Nongkhlaw.
title: PYNSHAI KA PIB ÏA KI NONGTHOH KHUBOR SHAPHANG KI LAI TYLLI KI AIÑ KAM BYMMAN BA THYMMAI

content: : Ka Education Cell jong ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ha ka sngi Baar ka la phah ïa ka shithi sha ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Mazel Lyngdoh halor ki mat kiba ïadei bad ka bhah pule doktor MBBS kaba ju mang da ka Sorkar Jylla na ka bynta ki samla pule manla u snem.Ha ka shithi ka seng ka la pan jingshai na ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ïa ka jingdon ki Seats jong ki samla pule doktor ba ju phah da ka Sorkar Jylla sha ki jaka pule bapher bapher kylleng ka Ri India.Na ki daw ba ju sakhi ha ki snem ba ladep, ka KSU ka la kyntu ïa ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ba lada jia ba ki samla kiba dei ki Khasi ne Garo, lada ki ïoh ban rung lane ki kynjoh ban poi sha ka Open Category, kum ïa kita dei ban pynrung beit sha ka Open Category, khnang ba kiwei ki samla na ki Reserved Categories ruh kin ïoh bynta lang ban rung ha ki Categories ba la bhah kyrpang ïa ki, la ong ka seng ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u Education Secretary u samla Pynkmenlang Sanmiet.Ka Seng, ka la ai jingmut ruh ïa ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah, ba lada don ki samla hadien ba ki la pas ïa ka NEET exams, lada ki poi sha ka kyrdan ban ïoh rung sha ka All India Quota, kum ïa kita ruh dei ban ailad khnang ba kin don shuh shuh ki samla na ka jylla ki ban ïohlad ban leit pyntbit ha ka kam doktor.Ka seng ka la ban jur ïa ka Sorkar ba ka jingpynbeit ïa kane ka bhah ban ïoh leit pule Doktor ka dei ban long kaba shai, kaba khuid, ba suba, bym don jingleh shiliang ne shah liang bad ym dei ban buhrieh ïa ki jingshisha, hynrei dei ban long haba shit haba shai kaban pynhun lang ïa baroh.Ka Seng, ka wer bad ka kyrpad ïa ki shnong ki thaw, ki Hima ha kylleng ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep ban ym ai kot pynshisha lane Residential Certificate ïa ki bym dei ki paradoh parasnam, namar kane ka ktah ïa ka bhah leit pule ba la mang kyrpang ïa ki samla trai ri jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep.Kum kane ka jingjia, ka la jia teng ha u snem ba ladep, ha kaba ka seng ka hap ban ieng pyrshah bad dawa pynduh bad weng syndon ïa uwei u bar jylla uba kam ba u dei u trai tri.“Na ka bynta ka bha ka miat bad ka jingmyntoi ki samla ka ri, ka seng lyngba une u kyrwoh ka kyrmen skhem ba ka jingpynbeit ban phah leit pule doktor ïa ki samla ka r,i kan long kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih ha baroh ki liang bad kan nym don ka jingbuhrieh la ka long ha kano kano ka liang, ong ka dorkhas.Ka Seng ka kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba kam dei ban pdiang kulmar ïa ki kot ki sla jong ki bar jylla kiba mlien ban ïalam bakla bad ruh kiba kam ba ki dei ki nongshong shnong jong kane ka jylla tang ban ïoh bynta ha ka bhah leit pule doktor kaba dei hok tang ïa ki samla pule trai ri.
title: PAN JINGKHEIÑ KA KSU NA KA MYNTRI SORKAR ÏA KA JINGDON KI SEAT PULE DOKTOR SHABAR KA JYLLA

content: : Ar tylli ki kali rit kiba dei ruh ki kali shimet bad kawei ka kali Bolero Camper kiba ju pyndonkam da ki nongtrei jong ka Joint Stock Industrial Association Vozrozhdenie (JSIAV) kaba dei ka kompeni kaba dang pyntrei ïa ka surok Nongstoiñ-Wahkaji ki la ïingkhong na ka jingshah wiang ding ha ka step sngi Palei ha ka jaka sah jong ki nongtrei jong ka Kompeni kaba don ha ka shnong Ladweitang, Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills Distirct.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Manager ka JSIAV, la ong ba kane ka la jia ha ka por kumba 4:00 baje mynstep ha kaba ki nongtrei ki shu ïohsngew tang ïa ka jingpah jong ki kali kiba la shah wiang ding bad u la ïathuh ruh ba ki la don ki nongtrei kiba la pyntip mar mar ïa u sa kawei ka kali puhshilum kaba don ha ka surok Nongstoiñ-Mawkyrwat hajan ka jingkieng Kynroh ka la shah wiang ding.U Manager u la ïathuh ruh ba ka jingjulor jong ki kali ha kane ka jingshah wiangding ka la kot palat klur tyngka bad na ka liang jong ka kompeni ka ladep ujor da ka ejahar ha Nongstoiñ Police Station.
title: SHAH WIANG DING KI KALI KA KOMPENI KABA SHNA ÏA KA SUROK NONGSTOIÑ-WAHKAJI

content: U MDC ka BJP na Tura Constitunecy u Bernard N. Marak ha ka sngi Palei ula ujor sha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong uba peit ïa ka tnat District Council Affairs (DCA) da kaba kynnoh ba ki Municipal ki la pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon jong ka Fifteen Finance Commission.Ha ka ujor u Marak u la ong, “ki Municipal ki la pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon jong ka Fifteen Finance Commission bad ïa ka rai jong ka (Fifteen Finance Commission) Co-ordination Committee ba la pynkha ha ka 2 tarik, Rymphang, 2024 kaba la rai ba u CEM un khot ïa ka jingïalang ban ïathir bniah halor ki Plan/Project, ki jingtyrwa bad ki kam ban pyntyllun shakhmat ha kaba pyntreikam ïa ka Fifteen Finance. Ki Chief Executive Officer (CEO) jong ki Municipal kim shym la wan mih sha ka jingïalang kaba la buh ban long ha ka 27 tarik Jylliew, ha kamra jong u CEM, ïa kaba lah ban ñiew kum ka jingbym burom ïa ka ophis jong u CEM bad ki bor ba dei peit jong ka GHADC. La i kumba ki Municipal ki klet noh ba ki treikam hapoh ki jaka kiba hap hapoh ka Sixth Scheduled.“Ki kyndon jong ka Finance Commission bad ki rai jong ka Co-ordination Committee la pynkheiñ bad ym ñiewkor satia da ki Municipal. Ka rai kaba la shim ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha ka 2 tarik, Rymphang, 2024 bad ha ka 8 tarik, Jymmang, 2024  ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam pisa jong ka Fifteen Finance Commission la pynkheiñ da ki Municipal namarba ki la phah ïa ki jingtyrwa bad pyntreikam katto katne ka pisa khlem ka jingtip jong ka GHADC kiba long pyrshah ïa ki kyndon.  Ka Co-ordination Committee ka la rai ba ki katto katne ki kyndon ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka pisa bad mardor ïa ka shithi la phah da u Director ka tnat Urban Affairs hynrei haba tohkit na ka GHADC, ym don wat uwei ruh uba tip shaphang ka pisa kaba ladep ban pyntreikam da ka Municipal,” la kynnoh u Marak.“Ka jubab RTI ka la pynpaw ba ïa ki projek ladep ban pyntreikam khlem ka jingtip jong ka GHADC bad haba ïa ki jingshisha la phah sha ka GHADC, u CEM jong ka GHADC u la khot ïa ki CEO jong baroh ki Municipal kiba pyntreikam ïa ka pisa hapoh ka Fifteen Finance Commission na ka bynta ki Urban Local Bodies ban wan sha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai, hynrei ym don satia uwei ruh uba wan mih. Kane ka long ka jingbym burom ïa ka shuki jong u CEM,” la ong shuh shuh u Marak.U la ïathuh ba ha ka 8 tarik, Jymmang, 2024 la rai ba ki Urban Local Bodies (ULB) kin pynlong ïa ki jingïalang bad ki nongmihkhmat na ki ADC hapoh ki jaka sor bad ha kyrdan jong u CEM/Dy. CEM. U CEM u la shimkhia ban khot ïa ka jingïalang ban ai ïa ki jingtip kiba bniah halor ki Plan/Project, ki jingtyrwa bad ki jingpyntyllun shakhmat ïa ki kam katkum ki kyndon hynrei ki CEO ki la kiar ban wan sha ka jingïalang.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba la rai da ka Co-ordination Committee ba ka tnat Urban Affairs bad ki MDC jong ki jaka sor kin pynkhreh ïa ki kam katkum ba la bthah.  “Ym don kawei ruh ka ban bud da ka Municipal kaba la pyntreikam ïa ka Fifteen Finance ha ka jaka jong ka tnat Urban Affair.  Ki Municipal ki ladep phah ïa ka jingtyrwa khlem ka jingïasyllok bad ki MDC jong ki jaka sor bad shwa ban ïasyllok bad ka GHADC. Ïa ka jingtyrwa la leh da ki Municipal Board kiba namar ka Schedule Area.  Katto katne ki projek ki dei kiba shu ïasyriem dur katba kiwei pat ki dei kiba palat na kaba la mang.  Ki paidbah ha ki jaka sor kin ym ïoh jingmyntoi na kane,” u la ong.“Namarkata, nga la thoh ïa ka shithi khyndiat sngi mynshwa sha u Director (Boro) bad ïa ka kopi la phah ruh sha phi lyngba ka email hynrei haduh mynta ym pat ïoh jubab satia,” la ong u Bernard.“Nga kyrpad ïa phi ban shimkhia halor kane ka kam da kaba pyndam noh mardor ïa ki jingtyrwa ba la phah da ki Municipal Board ba khlem ka jingïasyllok bad ki MDC na ki jaka sor bad ka GHADC bad ban pynsangeh lut ïa baroh ki jingsiew pisa ïa mynta tad haduh ban da ïa pynbeit,” la kyrpad u MDC ka Tura ïa u Myntri ka tnat DCA.
title: KYNNOH U MDC KA TURA BA PYNKHEIÑ KI MUNICIPAL ÏA KI KYNDON KA 15TH FINANCE COMMISSION

content: : Ki Pulit ka Anti infiltration Directorate ba la lamkhmat da u Incharge Bah Olde Syiemlieh ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki nongtrei na ka tnat Labour ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi thohdieng ki la hiar sha ka thaiñ Sohra ban jurip ia ki jaka ba don ki nongbylla bar jylla kum ha ki Institute, ki Hotel, ki Guest House, ki Resturant bad kiwei kiwei.Ka jinghiar tohkit da ki Pulit jong ka Anti infiltration Directorate ka long kum shi bynta ban pyntikna ba ki briew kiba nabar ka jylla kiba wan trei bylla hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya la ki dei neem ki nong India bad ki dei neem kiba ladep ban leh ia ka Registration hapoh ka ophis jong ka tnat Labour.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingjurip, u Inspector of Labour Bah Medonsamlem Dkhar u la ong ba ka jingjurip ia ki kot ki sla jong ki nongbylla bar jylla ka long ban pyntikna ba kino kino kiba wan trei bylla sngi sha ka jylla Meghalaya ki dei ban don ia ka Labour Registration bad ruh ban peit na bynta kito kiba ladep ban Register la ki pynthymmai neem ia ka Registration jong ki hadien ba lah kut ka por.Kumba ka long mynta, ha ka jinghiar jurip ki Pulit bad ka tnat Labour ki la lap ba bun na ki trai shnong kiba aikam ia ki nongbylla bar jylla ki dei kiba biang lut ki kot ki sla.
title: SA HA SOHRA KHYNRA NONGBYLLA BAR JYLLA KI PULIT KA ANTI-INFILTRATION DIRECTORATE

content: : Ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ba la shah kheiñ be-aiñ ha ka Sorkar ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la takraiñ ïa ka tnat Pulit jong ka jylla kaba la khot hajir ïa ki nongïalam sengbhalang ban tohkit halor kaba jingdon jingïadei bad ka seng.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u General Secretary cum Publicity Secretary ka HNLC Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw u la ong, “haba u Champion Sangma, u DSP barim bad katto katne ki Pulit ki la phet noh na ka kam Pulit bad leit pynïasoh bad ka GNLA, ngi shem ba ka Sorkar lymne ka tnat Pulit kin khot hajir ïa ki Ophisar Pulit.  Hato ka long mo kaba dei ïa ka tnat Pulit ban shu khot hajir ïa u President jong kano kano ka seng haba katto katne ki dkhot jong ki kynhun sengbhalang ki leit ban pynïasoh bad ka HNLC da la ka jong ka mon?U la kam ruh da kaba ong, “haoid, ki lah ban don ki dkhot ha ki sengbhalang, kiba don jingïadei bad ngi, hynrei kata kam mut pat ba baroh kawei ka seng, u President lane u General Secretary kin ïadon bynta lang.  Ma ngi, kum ka kynhun, ngin ym len lada uno uno u dei u dkhot bapura, la ki dei na ki sengbhalang lane ki dei ki riewshimet.”“Kum ka nuksa, u Tarsan Lymba um dei uba don bynta ban pynthei ïa ki bom IED, hynrei ka Sorkar ka kem ïa u khlem kino kino ki sakhi satar.  Haba ki Pulit ki kem jubor khlem ki sakhi sabut, ka lah ban ktah ïa ka bor pyrkhat pyrdaiñ bad ka jingshah ktah kaba slem ha uta u briew,” u la ong.Shuh shuh, u nongïalam ka HNLC u la ong ba ki don ki khep haba ki Pulit ki kem ïa uba shu suba ba u dei u dkhot ka HNLC,  u don u pud ba lam sha ka jingïap jong ka kurim jong na ka daw ka heart attack bad uta u briew u mad ïa ka jingbym biang shuh ka bor pyrkhat pyrdaiñ.“Kaei kaba jia, haba ki Pulit ki kem bad kynnoh bymhok ïa u nongbsa ïa ka ing ka sem? Katba ka HNLC ka lah ban pynphai kylliang da kaba shu rahbor ne da kaba shu pynïap ïa kiba suba ba ki dei ki nongsyntiat ki Pulit, ma ngi, kum ka seng, ngi kiar na kita ki kam khlem da ïoh ïa ki sakhi sabut kiba biang,” u la bynrap.U Bah Nongtraw u la ong, ha ka jaka ban shimkhia ïa ka jingjyllei jong u drok, ka tnat Pulit bad ka Sorkar i kumba ki pynsyrwa kai da kaba kynnoh bad kem ïa ki samla.  Ka jingjyllei jong u drok ha ka imlang sahlang jong ngi, i kumba ka dei shi bynta ka skhim kam bymman jong ka sorkar.  U drok u pynjot ïa uba dih shimet bad ïa ka imlang ka sahlang, namarba u pynjot ïa ka imlang sahlang jong ngi. Ka paw kumba ka Sorkar ka kham sngewdei ban bret ïa ka pisa ha ki jingeh ban ïa kaba weng ïa ki jingeh, ka imlang sahlang jong ngi ka la shu shah ieh na kaba kynthih na kawei ka ding sha kawei pat.U la kynnoh shuh shuh, “ka jingkhynra ba dang shen jong ka HYC, ha kaba u samla la phla ba u la pyndonkam ïa u drok ba la ïoh na uwei u Pulit ka kynhun SWAT, ka pynpaw shynna ïa ki tynrai ba la khaii ïa u drok. Ka pynpaw ruh ba ka jingshalan beaiñ ïa u dewiong ba donkti da ki Ophisar heh kyrdan ka Sorkar, bad u Myntri Rangbah, u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ki dei ki nongkhaii drok bad ki Kingpin.”
title: TAKRAIÑ KA HNLC ÏA KA TNAT PULIT HADIEN BA SHAH KHOT HAJIR U PRESIDENT KA HNYF

content: Ka  Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) ha ka kynti ka la pynkhreh ban pynlong biang sa ia ka 3rd Sohra Half Marathon kaba 21 kilomitar ha ka 14 tarik, Nailur, 2024.“Kane ka Half Marathon ka long ha ki lai bynta na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ki kam shangkai pyrthei, ban khring ia ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong kiba bun bad ka jingiakob mareh ka dei kaba la mynjur bad ai laisen da ka Athletic Federation of India (AAI),” la iathuh u Working President jong ka MSOA Bah John Kharshiiing ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.U la pynshai ruh sha ki paidbah, khamtam sha ki kmie ki kpa, ba la phia ia ka rta na ka bynta ki nongiashim bynta ha ka jingiakob mareh, kata, kiba 16 snem, 17 snem shaneng katba kiba dangrit ka rta kim lah ban shim bynta ha ka ki jingiakob mareh.U la iathuh ba kin bun bha ki nongiashim bynta ki ban sa wan nabar ka ri India mynta ka kynti.“Ka jingangnud jong ngi ka long ba kane ka marathon kan long kum ka Boston Marathon, kaba khring da ki phew hajar kiba ia shim bynta na kylleng ka pyrthei,” ong u Bah Kharshiing.U la pynpaw ruh ba ka MSOA ka la ai jingkyrshan ia kiba leit ialehkai shabar lyngba ka “Yes Meghalaya Program”.U General Secretary jong ka MSOA Bah Finely Pariat, u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la mynjur ia ka mang tyngka ha ka iakob mareh kaba 5k, 10k bad ia ka 21k bad la kyntiew ruh ia ka khusnam da ka song pisa na ka 1 lak sha ka 2 lak tyngka.Ka jingiakob mareh kan don ha ka kyrdan bapher bapher bad kum ka dak jingpynshlur ia kiba 60 snem kiba pyndep ia ka jingiamareh kaba 21k jong kiba 50 snem shaneng yn ai da ka khusnam song pisa, ym donkam ban jop, hynrei sha kiba pyndep ia ka jingiamareh kaba 21k.Ia ki khusnam da ka song pisa la kyntiew pynheh lut ha ki kyrdan mareh ki bapher bapher, u la ong.Ha ka 14 tarik, Nailur, 2024 yn sa khang ia ka surok ha ka por ba pynlong ia ka jingiakob mareh ha Sohra.
title: SA KA 3RD SOHRA HALF MARATHON YN PYNLONG KA MSOA HA KA 14 TARIK NAILUR, 2024

content: Ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) ka la pyntip ba ka jingpynkhreh ia ka 6th Meghalaya Games ka ban pynlong ha West Jaintia Hills District ka la iaid shaid shaid shakhmat.“Lai sien ngi ladep wan sha Jaintia Hills ban jurip ia ka jaka. Kaba nyngkong ngi la iakynduh ia ki District Sports Officer bad ngi la khmiih ban peit ia ka jingpynkhreh ban pynlong ia ka Meghalaya Games kaba hynriew,” la ong u Working President ka MSOA Bah John F. Kharshiing.“Ngi sngewkmen hadien ba ngi ladep leit ar sien na ka liang ka ophis MSOA ngi la iakynduh ia ki DSO bad ngi la iasyllok bad ka West Jaintia Hills District Sports Association, ryngkat bad ki 25 tylli ki Association ha kaba ngi la jurip bad ngi sngewkmen ban lap ba ha West Jaintia Hills District ki don bun ki Hall kiba lah ban pynlong ia ki jingiakob ialehkai bapher bapher. Ka kabu ka long ba kine ki Hall ki iajan kawei ia kawei bad kabym da donkam eh ban ia iaid jngai, naba ka jngai eh ka dei 1 kilomitar tam,” la iathuh u Bah Kharshiing.“Ngi khmih lynti ba kin don 25 tylli ki jait jingialehkai (Discipline) ha kane ka Meghalaya Games kaba mynta,”u la ong.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ia ka 6th Meghalaya Games yn sa pynlong ha u snem 2025.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jinglut jingsep ka MSOA ka khmih lynti ba kan kham duna ia kaei kaba la pynlut ha Tura kaba la kot T. 23 klur.U General Secretary ka MSOA Bah Finely Pariat u la pynpaw ba dei ban kynmaw ba kane ka dang dei tang ka jingialehkai jong ki District bad ba ym dei ban khmihlynti than ba kiei kiei kin long kiba biang pura.
title: PYNKHREH KA MSOA BAN PYNLONG ÏA KA 6TH MEGHALAYA GAMES HA WEST JAIÑTIA HILLS

content: U Deputy Commissioner, ka West Jaiñtia Hills District ula pynbna paidbah ba ka 2 tarik jong u bnai Naitung, 2024 kan dei ka sngi shuti ha baroh kawei ka District kum shi bynta na ka lehñiam Behdieñkhlam jong ka Seiñ Raij Jowai.Kumta la bthah baroh ki jaka treikam sorkar, ki Revenue, ki Magisterial Court bad kumjuh ruh ki jaka pule puthi kiba don hapoh u pud u sam jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills District kin khang khyrdep ha kane ka sngi.
title: PYNBNA U DC ÏA KA SHUTI BEHDIEÑKHLAM HA WJH

content: Over 425 nursing personnel and faculty members from across Meghalaya participated in a two-day intensive workshop on OT Nursing, organized by NEIGRIHMS’ Continuing Nursing Education (CNE) Cell from 27– 28June 2024.The workshop kicked off with a message from Director I/C, Dean & HOD Obstetric & Gynae Prof. Dr. A. Santa Singh. He highlighted the critical role nurses play in the often tense and fast-paced environment of the operating theatre. “Nurses are vital members of a multidisciplinary team working with cutting-edge technology,” Dr. Singh stressed. “Staying updated and making quick decisions are crucial in this setting. Proper shift handovers and meticulous instrument counts before and after surgery are essential to prevent errors.”Dr. C. Daniala, Medical Superintendent, delved into the complexities of advanced surgical techniques. He discussed the use of endoscopic, laparoscopic, and radiological procedures involving C-arm machines, which emit radiation. Dr. Daniala emphasized the importance of safety protocols to protect the health of staff working in operating theatres.The workshop also featured a keynote address by Dr. V. Connerstone Wann. Dr. Wann emphasized the specialized nature of OT nursing. “Nurses working in the OT require specific training to assist surgeons effectively in their respective specialties,” he explained. “Rotation to other wards may not be feasible due to the advanced skills needed.”A major highlight of the event was the launch of the “OT Nursing Procedure Manual.” This comprehensive manual, spearheaded by the CNE Cell under the supervision of Chief Nursing Officer Smt. R. Khonglah, is a collaborative effort by experienced OT nurses, infection control nurses, and the CNE Cell itself. Led by Smt. Irene A. Nongtraw (Nursing Superintendent OT cum CNE Cell Chief Co-ordinator & Chief Editor) and Smt. Greenita Syiemlieh (Asst CNE Co-ordinator & Editor), the manual was validated by heads of all surgical disciplines and is grounded in evidence-based research.The workshop provided participants with in-depth knowledge of essential OT practices. Interactive hands-on activities on both days further enhanced their learning, focusing on nurses’ responsibility to create a safe, patient-cantered surgical environment.This workshop at NEIGRIHMS serves as a testament to the ongoing commitment to excellence in nursing care. By equipping nurses with the latest knowledge and skills, the CNE Cell is empowering them to deliver the best possible care to patients undergoing surgery.
title: NEIGRIHMS HOSTS SUCCESSFUL STATE-LEVEL OT NURISNG WORKSHOP

content: : Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit ha ka sngi baar ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ban pyrshah ia ka jingioh No Objection Certificate (NoC) da ki katto katne ki briew ban shna pynbha ia ka jaka mane blei ha ka jaka Sorkar.Kane ka jaka ba la thmu ban tei ia ka jaka mane blei ka don hapoh u pud u sam jong ka District Court, Khliehriat bad ha syndah ka ophis Deputy Commissioner.Ia ka dorkhas la aiti da ka seng ha u Deputy Commissioner hapoh ka jingialam jong u General Secretary u Bah Kwilnis Suciang.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka seng ka la iathuh ba ha ki snem ba ladep ka dei tang ka jaka mane blei ki nongtrei surok kaba tang shipor hynrei hadien ba kine ki nongtrei surok ki la leit phai noh kane ka jaka mane blei ka la iai bteng da ki katto katne ki bar jylla ki la tei beaiñ ia ka jaka mane blei.La pynpra noh ia kane ka jaka mane blei ha ki snem ba ladep namarba ym shym shym la ioh jingbit na ki bor sorkar.Ka Seng ka la iathuh ba haduh mynta ka dang don ka jingker sawdong da ki tin ia ia ka jaka mane blei bad la ioh jingtip ruh ba mynta ki bar jylla ki la ioh jingbit kumba 500 sq feet bad ki dang pan sa 250 sq feet ban shna sa ia ka jaka leit bar.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ia kane ka jingtei jaka mane blei ha ki jaka sorkar ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynmih da ka Office Memorandum (OM) ha u snem 2010 katkum ka Special Leave Appeal (Civil) no 8516 of 2006 ba la rai da ka Supreme Court. Lyngba kane ka Sorkar ka la shna ia ka polisi ba ia ki jaka mane blei lah ban shim wai ha kaba yn hap ban siew shisien siew 25 percent katkum ka dor iew jong ka khyndew lane 494 tyngka shi square feet kaba yn bthah bad ban pynbeit da ka tnat Revenue jong ka Sorkar Jylla.Hynrei katkum ka Office Memorandum la thoh shai ruh ba ia ka polisi kan treikam tang haduh u snem 2006 kaba mut ia ki jingtei ba palat une u snem la dei lupa kiba la long beaiñ katkum ka para 5.“Ka jingdon lypa ka jaka mane blei mynta da ki snem ka la pynkheiñ lypa ia ka ain namar ka jingdon jong ka dei ka bym ioh jingbit bad kaba la pynkheiñ ia ka Meghalaya Public Premises Unauthorised Occupation Act 1980,” la ong ka KSU.Ka seng ka la banjur ia u Deputy Commissioner ka la ban jur ba ia ki jaka Sorkar hi ym dei ban ai jaka ban tei ia kino kino ki kynhun niam halor ka nongrim ba ka lah ban wanrah ia ka jingñiew shiliang bad ka jingbym sngewthuh jingmut.Ka seng ka maham ba lada ia kane ka jingtei ia ka jaka mane blei ka iaid shakhmat ka seng kan sa khot ia kiwei pat ki riewshimet ne ki kynhun ba kin pan noh ia ki jaka kiba dei jong ka Sorkar bad ban tei ia la ki jong ki iing ne ki jaka mane jong ki hapoh East Jaintia Hills District.Na ka liang jong u Deputy Commisisoner u la mynjur ban pynsangeh shwa ia kane ka jingthmu bad ban dang wad kham bniah halor kane ka kam na ka Sorkar.Ka Seng ka la maham ba daleilei ym bit ban ai jingbit ban tei ia ki jaka man blei ha ki jaka Sorkar kiba dei ki ‘Public Premises’ bad ka Seng kan iai buddien ruh halor kane.
title: PYRSHAH KA KSU BAN SHNA PYNBHA ÏA KA JAKA MANE BLEI HA JAKA SORKAR HA KHLIEHRIAT

content: : Ki Pulit jong ka Nongstoiñ Police Station ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taïew baladep ki la kem ïa u Albertstar Nongphud, 43 snem ka rta uba la phetrieh hadien ka jingthang ïa la ka jong ka ïing, ïa ki tiar ki tar, ki jaiñ ki nep bad wat ïa ki kot skul jong ki khun.Ia une u kpa runar ki Pulit ki la ïoh kem na Nongstoiñ.Ki Pulit ki la ïathuh ba une u briew u la leh ïa kane ka kam bymman ha ka 5 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka shnong Phudumbah Sepngi, West Khasi Hills.Ki la ïathuh ba ha ka por 1:00 baje mynstep, une u briew u la sei ïa ki tiar ki tar na ïing ba bret lut sha phyllaw ha kaba u la wiang ding ïa ki. Hadien kane u la thang sa ïa ka ïing kaba ma u bad ka kurim lem bad ki khun ki ïa shong ïa sah.Ki bahaïing hasem jong ka kurim, ki la mudui da ka ejahar ha ki Pulit bad ia kpa runar ki Pulit ki la tian bishar ha kashari kaba la ai jingbit ia ki Pulit ban set ïa u hapoh ka Judicial Custody na ka bynta ban ioh pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.
title: KEM KI PULIT ÏA U KPA UBA THANG ÏA KA ÏING BAD ÏA KI KOT SKUL JONG KI KHUN

content: Ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo Peoples  (FKJGP) East Jaiñtia Hills ka la pynrem jur halor ka jingshah pyniap jong ki saw ngut ki briew ha kaba ia ka met ba la teh ia ki kti da u tyllai la lap ha lyndet jong ka iew Umpleng ha ka step sngi Saitjaiñ.Napdeng ki saw ngut, lai ngut kiba la shah pyniap ki dei kiba la ithuh kyrteng kum u Ravi Rai, 23 snem ka rta na ka shnong Elam, Mechipradesh, Nepal, u Rajesh Rai, 26 snem na ka shnong Dharan Sunsari, Koshi Anchal, Nepal bad u Nasar Kyndait, 33 snem na ka shnong Dkhiah East Pohshnong, East Jaiñtia Hills District.“Ngi pynrem jur halor ka jingshah pyniap dusmon jnog u Nasar Kyndait bad lai ngut ki bar jylla ha kine ki khyndiat sngi da ka jingleh riewkhlaw da ki katto katne ngut ki riewthrang snam bym lah ban ithuh,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President u Bah D. Sumer bad u General Secretary u Bah Emlang Sutnga.Kum ka seng kaba peit ia ka bha ka miat ka seng kam lah ban pdiang da leilei ruh ban pyniap bein kum ki mrad bad lada dei shisha ba ki jingkynnoh katkum ba iohi  ha ki lad pathai khubor ba ki saw ngut la suba ba ki lah ban dei ki nongdie drok lane ki nongdih drok ha ka jingsngew hi ba lada dei kumba kynnoh ruh ym dei ban leh riewkhlaw hynrei dei ban ai jingsneng da ka rukom kaba dei bad pyni ha ka rukom ba dei ban im, ong u kyrwoh.“Lada shem ba ki tuh ki thiem ruh dei ban ai sha ki bor jong ka aiñ hynrei ym ban shim ia ka ain ha kti lajong bad ban thaw ruh ki lad ki lynti ban kin wanphai biang sha ka imlang sahlang kaba bha,” ong u kyrwoh na ka Seng.Ka seng ka la dawa ia ki bor jong ka aiñ ba ki dei ban thwet tyngeh khnang ba kin ym lait suk na ki kynjri jong ka aiñ.
title: DAWA KA FKJGP BAN PYNSHITOM TYNGEH ÏA KIBA PYNÏAP ÏA KI SAWNGUT HA UMPLENG

content: : Ar sngi hadien ba ka Khasi Student Union (KSU) ka la pynieng ïa ka khyrdop Inner Line Permit (ILP) ha surokbah NH-6 ha ka shnong 20 mer, Pahammawleiñ Ri-Bhoi District, ka khyrdop ka la shah pynpra noh ha ka step sngi Baar bad ki banner ruh ki la shah thang.Ka KSU ka la kynnoh ba ïa kane ka kam la leh da ki Pulit jong ka Ribhoi District.U General Secretary jong ka KSU u samla Donald V. Thabah ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong katkum ka jingïoh jingtip jong ka seng na ki riewpaidbah, ki Pulit ki la kyndang da ka puhshilum ïa ka khyrdop ILP ba la pynieng da ka KSU ha ka por kumba 11:00-11:30 baje mynstep bad ynda ladep pynpra ïa ka khyrdop la thang lut ïa ki nadong shadong ïa ki tum ki tam.Ka KSU ka la pynïeng ïa khyrdop ILP ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ba la lamkhmat da u President rangbah u samla Lambokstarwell Marngar President bad u General Secretary u samla Donald Thabah.  Ha kane ka sngi, ki dkhot ka seng ki la pynlong ruh ka jingtalasi naphang ïa ki kali jong ki riewpaidbah kiba wan na kiwei kiwei ki jylla kum ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka ILP halor ka jingleh kuman ka Sorkar Pdeng ban mynjur ïa ka ILP ha Meghalaya bad ka jingbym lah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban pyntreikam ïa ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security Act (MRSSA) ban tehlakam ïa ka jingrung bad ka jingmih laitlan jong ki mynder.
title: KYNNOH KA KSU BA PYNPRA KI PULIT ÏA KA KHYRDOP ILP HA 20 MER, PAHAMMAWLEIÑ

content: Ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students Union, (KSU) Shillong Mihngi Circle ha ka sngi Baar ki la pynlong ka jingkhynra Work Permit ïa ki bar jylla kiba trei ha JN Complex, Polo, Shillong.Ha ka jingkhynra ba la lamkhmat da u President ka KSU Shillong Mihngi Circle u samla Sonstar Nongkhlaw, la lap ba haduh 252 ngut ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba la wanrah da u Kontraktor ki dei ki bym don satia ïa ka Work Permit.Katba ki dkhot ka KSU ki dang talasi ïa ki kot ki sla jong ki nongbylla bar jylla, la wan poi kyndit u Magistrate ryngkat ki ophisar na ka tnat Labour bad ki Pulit na ka tnat Anti-Infiltration Directorare.  Katba u Kontraktor um shym la wan mih satia.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, ka KSU Nongthymmai Circle ba la lamkhmat da u General Secretary u samla Ribansing Nongrum ka la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra ïa ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba trei bylla ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka shnong Nongthymmai ha kaba la lap ba bun ki dei ki bym don satia ïa ka Work Permit.Ki don haduh 191 ngut ki nongbylla ïa kiba ka KSU ka la phah leit phai noh sha ka jaka ba ki wan hadien ba la lap ba kim don satia wat ïa ki kot ki sla kiba baing.Hadien ba la phah song ïa ki tiar ki tar, u Kontraktor u la pynbiang hi ïa ka Bos ban kit ïa kine ki nongbylla bar jylla ban leit buh shaduh ka shnong Khanapara kaba don markhap bad ka jylla Assam.Ym tang ha nongbah Shillong, ka KSU Mairang Circle ba la lamkhmat da u General Secretary u samla Robin Nongrem ka la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra ïa ki nongbylla bar jylla ha kaba la lap ba ki don arngut ki bar jylla kiba kam ba ki trei ha Post Office hynrei kim shym la trei satia ha ka shnong Mairang hynrei ki trei shabar ka shnong Mairang katba ki shong wai ha Mairang.Ka Seng ka la maham ruh ïa ki trai iing ba ki dei ban beh ïing noh ïa kine ki bar jylla mar mar bad ruh ka seng ka la ai por tang shi sngi ïa kine ki bar jylla ba ki dei ban mih noh na Mairang khlem da pynslem.Ka seng kan bteng ban khynra na phang ïa ki bar jylla kiba wan shong thap ha Mairang bad ka la kyntu jur ïa ki nongïalam shnong ba kin peit ngor bad ba kim dei satia ban shu ailad ïa ki bar jylla ban shong thap khlem ki jingdonkam hapoh ka shnong.
title: 252 NGUT KI NONGBYLLA BAT KA KSU ÏA KI BAR JYLLA KIBA TREI HA JN STADIUM, POLO

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha ka sngi Balang ula iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la mudui da ka ejahar pyrshah ia ki briew kiba donkti ban khynra Work Permit naphang ia ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba trei bylla ha kylleng ka nongbah Shillong.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba kino kino ki riewshimet lane ki kynhun bapher bapher kim lah satia ban pynlong ia ki jingkhynra nongbylla bar jylla bad kim lah ruh wat ban shim ia ka aiñ ha ka kti hynrei lada ki don eiei ki dei ban pyntip sha ki bor jong ka aiñ.“Lada ki lap eiei, ki dei ban pyntip sha ki bor jong ka aiñ ba kan leh la ka jong ka kamram,” u la ong.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students Union na ki shnat treikam bapher bapher ki la khynra naphang Work Permit na ki bar jylla kiba trei bylla ha ki bynta bapher bapher ka nongbah Shillong.Ha ka sngi Baar ki dkhot ka KSU ki la pynlong ka jingkhynra Work Permit ïa ki bar jylla kiba trei ha JN Complex, Polo, Shillong ha kaba ka la mih ruh ka jingkynnoh ba ki dkhot ka seng ki la ktah kti ia ki nongtrei.Ha ka jingkhynra ba la lamkhmat da u President ka KSU Shillong Mihngi Circle u samla Sonstar Nongkhlaw, la lap ba haduh 252 ngut ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba la wanrah da u Kontraktor ban trei ha JN Complex, Shillong ki dei ki bym don satia ïa ka Work Permit.Katba ki dkhot ka KSU ki dang talasi ïa ki kot ki sla jong ki nongbylla bar jylla, la wan poi kyndit u Magistrate ryngkat ki ophisar na ka tna  Labour bad ki Pulit na ka tnat Anti-Infiltration Directorare. Katba u Kontraktor um shym la wan mih satia.Ym tang ha Shillong, ka KSU ka la pynjur ruh ia ka jingkhynra Work Permit wat ha ki shnat treikam bapher bapher kiba don ha rilum Khasi bad Jaintia kaba dang bteng haduh mynta.Halor kane, ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC) ka la shim sou moto halor ka jingshah shoh jong ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba trei na ka bynta ka jingshna pynbha ïa ka J.N Complex, Shillong ha ka sngi Baar.Ka Commission ka la phah ruh da ka notis sha u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District ba un ai jubab kaba bniah halor kane ka jingjia hapoh ar taiew.
title: SAW TYLLI KI EJAHAR MUDUI KI PULIT ÏA KIBA KHYNRA WORK PERMIT, ÏATHUH U CM

content: Ka rynsan ban jied ia ki thei bhabriew ne ka Miss Meghalaya bad Miss Teen Meghalaya 2024 ka la khring ia kiba bun bah ki thei samla, ha kaba palat 40 ngut kila wan ban pyrshang ha ka rynsan ban jied ia kiba biang tam, kaba la long ha Hotel Vivanta Khyndailad ha ka 6 tarik Naitung, 2024.Ka lahduh jong ka Miss Meghalaya 2024 kan phong ia ka pansngiat ka Miss Universe Meghalaya bad kan ioh rung beit sak sha ka rynsan iakhun ka Miss Universe India 2024. Katba kaba wan baar bad balai kan mihkhmat ia ka jylla ha ka Miss Northeast 2024, kaban long ha sor Itanagar, Arunachal Pradesh.Ha kajuh ka por, ka lahduh jong ka nam Miss Teen Meghalaya 2024 kan ioh rung beit sha ka jingiakop jong ka Miss Teen Diva 2025, kaban long ha sor Jaipur, Rajasthan. Ka Miss Meghalaya Organisation (MMO) ka la pynthikna ba ki thei samla kiba jop, kin ioh ia ka rynsan kaba paka ban pyni shuh ia ka sap ka phong jongki ha ka rynsan jong ka ri bad ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher.Ka Miss Meghalaya ka dei ka rynsan kaba nyngkong ban plie lad ia ki thei samla ha kane ka jingiakop ban ioh iashim bynta ha ka Miss Universe India.Ka jingiakhun kaba kut jong ka Miss Meghalaya bad Miss Teen Meghalaya 2024 kan long ha LARITI Multipurpose Hall ha ka 3 tarik Nailar 2024.
title: PALAT 40 NGUT PYRSHANG KI THEI DAIT RIAM NA BYNTA KA MISS MEGHALAYA

content: : Ka Kynhun Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Balang ka la mynjur ïa ka jingtyrwa ban pyntreikam ïa ka skhim jong ka Sorkar Pdeng na ka bynta ban ai jingkyrshan pisa ïa ki koidi ki baduk kiba shah set ha ki along bapher bapher ka jylla.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma u la ïathuh ba kane ka dei ka skhim jong ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla la shu pyntreikam ïa ka pisa bad ka jylla kam donkam eiei ban siew shi naïa ruh namarba ïa ka pisa la siew lut nadong shadong da ka Sorkar India.“Kane ka skhim ka thmu beit thik tang ïa ki koidi kiba wan na ki longiing kiba duk, kiba dang shah set along bad ki bym don pisa ban pan jamin khnang ba kin dup lait noh na ka jingshah set along ne ban ïakhun ïa ki mukotduma,” ula ong.“Ngi la pynkhreh ïa kane mynta la khyndiat bnai bad mynta ngi long kiba la khreh ban pyntreikam noh bad la mynjur ruh mynta ka sngi da ka kynhun myntri ban pyntreikam ïa kane ka skhim,” la ïathuh u Myntri Rangbah.
title: DA KA PISA KA SORKAR PDENG YN KYRSHAN ÏA KI KOIDI BADUK BAN ÏAKHUN MUKOTDUMA

content: Iwei i Mei ieid iba la tip kyrteng kum i Kong Phip Lyngdoh iba la 76 snem ka rta iba shong basah ha ka shnong Diwon ka shnong kaba don ha ka thaiñ Umden, Ribhoi District i la jah rngai khlem wan phai shuh sha la ing naduh ba i la mih na la ing ha ka por 10 baje mynstep jong ka 8 tarik Naitung, 2024.Watla ki bahaing hasem ki la pyrshang ban wad nadu ka sngi ba la i la jah hynrei kim shym la lap dien satia bad kumta ki la pyntip noh ka dorbar shnong halor kane ka jingjia.U Bah Sterling Khymdeit uba dei u Secretary jong ka shnong Diwon u la ïathuh ba tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia, baroh shisngi la pynlong ïa ka jingwad shnong bad haduh mynta ym pat lap dien satia ia ine i meiieid.U la ïathuh ruh ba ki bahaing hasem ha ka 10 tarik Naitung, 2024 ki dang iai bteng ban wad ia ine i meiieid bad ong ruh ba lada ym lap satia, kin sa leit ujor da ka ejahar sha ki bor PulitKa Khun kynthei jong i mei ieid kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Kong Them Lyngdoh, ka la iathuh ba ha ka por ba i meiieid i la mih na la ing i sem da ka jaiñ kyrshah rong Blue bad i phong da ka sopti rong rong lieh.
title: JAH I MEIIEID PHIP LYNGDOH NA KA SHNONG DIWON, RIBHOI DISTRICT

content: : Sa lai ngut ki Nurse na ka jylla Meghalaya ki la shah jied ban leit trei sha ka ri Japan hadien ba ki la pyndep ïa ka jingshah hikai pyntbit ïa ka ktien Japanese lyngba ka Chief Minister Global Program.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la pynbna ba kine ki lai ngut ki Nurse ki la poi sha ka ka ri Japan dang shen.Lyngba ka CM Global Program, ïa ki Nurse yn sa bynta ban phah trei ha ki hospital bapher bapher bad ki Care Home kiba don ha ka ri Japan.Haba pyntip ïa kane ha ka X, u Conrad u la ai khublei kyrpang ïa kine ki lai ngut ki Nurse.“Nga sngewkmen ban pyntip ba sa lai ngut ki Nurse na ka jylla Meghalaya, ka Shishalapyntngen Lartang, ka Luanda B. Sangma bad ka Baniewkor Mukhim ki la poi sha Japan lyngba ka Chief Minister Global Program,” la pyntip u Myntri Rangbah.Ka jingjied ïa ki Nurse ka long lyngba ka Overseas Nursing Job Fair kaba la long ha u snem baladep ha nongbah Shillong.Lyngba kane ka Job Fair arphew hynñiew ngut ki Nurse na kane ka jylla ki la shah jied ban sdang ïa ka jingïaid lynti sha Japan hadien ba ki la pyndep ïa ka jingshah hikai pyntbit ban nang bad ban kren ïa ka ktien Japanese.Kane ka jingplie lad jong ka Sorkar ïa ki samla ka long ban pynïoh ïa ki lad ïohkam ïohjam bad ban ïarap ba kin nang kham tbit shuh shuh ïa ka kam kaba ki la angnud ban trei.Kum shi bynta jong ka “Skills Meghalaya” scheme, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la bei pisa ruh T. 50,000 hajar na ka bynta kawei ka Nurse lyngba ka Meghalaya State Skill Development Society (MSSDS). Kane ka jingai jingkyrshan ka long ban ïarap shuh shuh sa haduh 300 ngut ki Nurse ha ki snem ki ban sa wan.Ïa ka jingai jinghikai la pynlong da ki 10 ngut ki nonghikai Japanese ha NAVIS.  Wat hapdeng ki jingshah tynjuh kiba bun ban nang ïa ka ktien kaba thymmai, ki samla kiba angnud ban trei ïa ka kam Nurse ki la ïohmad ïa kawei pat ka jingim kaba thymmai sha kawei pat ka ri.
title: SDANG KI 3 NGUT KI NURSE NA MEGHALAYA ÏA KA JINGIM BATHYMMAI HA KA RI JAPAN

content: Ki bahaïing hasem ki la leit ban kam trai ïa ki lai tylli ki metïap napdeng ki saw ngut kiba la shah pynïap dusmon ha kaba ïa ki metïap la lap ha lyndet ka iew Umpleng, East Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka step sngi Saitjaiñ.Hadien ba la pyndep ïa ka postmortem ha Civil Hospital, Khliehriat, ki Pulit ki la aiti noh sha ki bahaïing hasem ban pyndep ïa ka jinglehniam bakhatduh hadien ba ki la leit kam trai ïa ka met jong u Ravi Rai, 23 snem ka rta na ka shnong Elam, Mechipradesh, Nepal, u Rajesh Rai 26 snem na ka shnong Dharan Sunsari, Koshi Anchal, Nepal bad ïa ka met jong u Nasar Kyndait, 33 snem ka rta na shnong Dkhiah East Pohshnong, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Katba sa ïa ka met jong uwei ym pat shym la don satia ban kam trai haduh mynta.Halor kane ka jingshah pynïap dusmon jong kine ki saw ngut ki Pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ki la register case ha Khliehriat Police Station bad ka jingtohkit halor kane ka dang ïaid shakhmat.Kum ban shu pyntip, ki Pulit jong  ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la leit ban shimti ïa ki saw tylli ki met ïap kiba la shah pynïap dusmon bad ïa ki met jong ki la lap ha lyndet jong ka iew ha ka shnong Umpleng.Ïa ki metïap jong ki saw ngut la teh la khum lang na ki kti da u tyllai bad la pom dusmon ruh ïa ka met jong ki da ki tiar ba nep na ki bynta ka khlieh bad ryndang.Ka jingshah pynïap jong kine ki saw ngut ka long kaba ishyrkhei haduh katta katta.Ïa ka met jong kine ki saw ngut la lap da ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnng Umleng ha ka step sngi Saitjaiñ ha kaba la pyntip noh sha ki Pulit jong ka Umpleng Anti Dacoity Camp.Hadien kane, ki Pulit ryngkat bad ka kynhun CSU, Mobile Forensic Crime Scene Unit bad u Magistrate ki la leit sha ka jaka ban ba la lap ïa ki metïap ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bad hadien ba ladep lum ïa ki sakhi satar la pynkynriah noh ïa kine ki metïap sha Civil Hospital Khliehriat ban leh ïa ka Postmortem.U Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills u la pyntip ba la thaw ïa ka Special Investigation Team (SIT) ban ïarap lem ïa u Investigating Officer (IO) na ka bynta ban pynlong ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor kane ka jingjia khnang ban lap ksai ïa kiba donkti ha kane ka runar kaba la pynkyiuh bad pynher mynsiem lut ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka jylla.
title: SHIMTI KI BAHAÏING LAI TYLLI KI METÏAP NAPDENG SAW NGUT KIBA SHAH PYNÏAP DUSMON HA UMPLENG

content: Ki Pulit ka jylla kim pat lah satia ban ïohkem ïa ki riew bymman kiba donkti ban pynïap dusmon ïa ki saw ngut ki briew ha kaba la lap ïa ki metïap ha ka shnong Umpleng, East Jaiñtia Hills District.U Addl. SP Bah Banraplang Jyrwa ha ka sngi U Blei u la pyntip ba haduh mynta la lah ban ithuh tang ïa ki lai ngut kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Ravi Rai (23) na ka shnong Elam, Mechipradesh, Nepal, u Rajesh Rai, 26 snem na ka shnong Dharan Sunsari, Koshi Anchal, Nepal bad u Nasar Kyndait (33) na ka shnong Dkhiah East Pohshnong, East Jaiñtia Hills District.U la ïathuh ba ki Pulit ki la rejister da ka Criminal Case ha Khliehriat Police Station.“Ka jingtohkit haduh mynta ka dang ïaid shakhmat,” ong u Addl. SP.Ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, ki paidbah ka shnong Umpleng ki la lap saw tylli ki metïap ba la shah pynïap dusmon ha kaba la teh lang ïa ki kti da u tyllai bad la pom dusmon da ki kynja tiar ba nep na ka met.Halor kane ka jingjia ki Pulit ki la thaw ruh da ka Special Investigation Team (SIT) ban ïarap ïa u Investigating Officer (IO) uba shah pynkhamti ban tohkit halor kane ka jingjia.
title: DA KA CRIMINAL CASE LA REGISTER KI PULIT BA SHAH PYNÏAP DUSMON SAW NGUT HA KA SHNONG UMPLENG
