content: Shillong, July 08 : Kum uwei na ki nongshong shnong uba don ka jingkithlieh na ka bynta ka thain Ri-War, u bah R Monarch Shabong na ka shnong Umniuh Tmar uba dei ruh u Editor jong ka kot khubor jong u ‘Rupang’, u la thoh sha u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma ban pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingtuid ei ki khyndew sboh na ki thain khappud ka thain Ri War sha ka ri Bangladesh.U la pynkynmaw ba naduh u snem 1990 ka Ri War Mihngi Development Council ka la ia kren bad ka sorkar lyngba ka tnat Soil and Water Conservation ban tei da ki kynroh ha ki bri ki bsah jong ki briew khnang ba ka khyndew kan ym tuid ei sha Bangladesh. Ha katei ka por ka sorkar ka la mang pisa ruh ban pyntyllun ia kane ka kam hynrei mynta kane ka jingthmu ka sorkar kam shym la poi shano shano ruh.Une u rangbah u la phah ia kane ka jingthoh ka dei namarba ka jingtuid ka khyndew sboh kam dei tangba ka ktah ia ki jingthung jingtep hynrei ka ktah bha ruh ia ka jinglong jingman ka suinbneng namarba ka jingshah rat ki dieng ki siej, ka pyntyrkhong ia ka mariang bad ka jingshit ka sngi ruh ka nangjur bad nalor kata ka pyntyrkhong ruh ia ki tyllong um.U Bah Shabong u la pynskhem shuh shuh ia kane ka jingthoh jong u da kaba bsuh lang ia ka kaiphod ba la pynmih da ka ka Indian Institute of Technology, New Delhi ia kaba la wad bniah da u Ravi Raji bad u Manabendra Saharia bad ha kane ka kaiphod kaba pyni ia ka jingshah ktah kiba bun ki jylla, la pyni ruh ba ka East Khasi Hills ha kane ka jylla jong ngi ka dei kaba shah ktah eh.Ha kane ka kaiphod ka pyni ba ka jingduh ia ka jingkhyndew ha ka shisnem ka long haduh 164. 52 Million ton ha ka shi hektar ha ka shisnem. Kumta u la kyrpad ia u Myntri Rangbah ba un shimkhia ia kane ka kam da kaba ia kren ruh bad ka sorkar India ba kan wad ia ki lad ki lynti kumno ban khanglad ia ka jingtuid ei ki khyndew sboh sha Bangladesh.
title: DA KI MILLION TON HA KA SHISNEM , TUID EI KI KHYNDEW SBOH NA EKH SHA BANGLADESH

content: Ka Employment Monitoring Cell jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei ka la leit ban iakynduh ia u Chairman jong ka Meghalaya Public Services Commission (MPSC) ban pan jingpynshai halor ka jingpynmih result jong ka post Statistical Officer ha ka tnat Animal Husbandry and Veterinary (AH&Vety).Kane ka jingdawa jong ka seng ka long hadien ba la iohi ba ka MPSC ka la jied ia arngut ki samla, uwei na ka thup Khasi-Jaintia bad uwei na ka thup Garo katkum ka jingpynbna (notification) ba lah pyllait ha 27 tarik, Jylliew, 2024.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Information & Publicity Secretary jong ka KSU u samla Pynshai Rani u la ong, “kaba sngewlyngngoh ka long ba katkum ka Advertisement ba la pynmih ha ka 14.12.2020 pat, ka jinglaitkam ka dei tang na bynta kawei ka post bad ia kane la pynskhem biang da ka jingpynbeit (Corrigendum) ba la mih ha ka 14.09.2022 kaba dei ban long thik tang ia kawei ka post na bynta thup Khasi-Jaiñtia.”“Ka MPSC ka la pan bor ban ai jingpynshai halor kane ka bynta bad na ka liang jong ka seng ka la maham ba ym pat dei ban thung ia kane ka Post katba ym pat ioh ia ka jingpynshisha halor kane ka kam,” la ong u kyrwoh.
title: PAN JINGPYNSHAI KA KSU NA KA MPSC HALOR KA POST STATISTICAL OFFICER, AH&VETY.

content: : Ki nongialam jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Mawlai Circle kiba la ioh ia ka jingud jingnam na ki paidbah kiba ju pyndonkam manla ka sngi ban iaid na ka surok kaba pyniasoh na Mawtawar-Mawsiatkhnam-Umrynjah, ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la hiar jurip ia ka jinglong jingman jong kane ka surok kaba la jot rathai bad kaba la buh jingeh ia ki paidbah nongleit nongwan.Ka seng hapoh ka jingialam jong u President u samla Biangbor Paliar ki la leit ban iakynduh ia u Executive Engineer ka National Highway Bye-pass Bah J. Tariang ban pynsngew halor ka jingsniew shaba palat jong kane ka surok kaba long u budlum jong kiba bun ki shnong kiba ka surok ka sam lyngba shaduh Shillong Airport ha ka shnong Umroi.Ha ka jingiakren bad ka Batesi Tv u samla Biangbor Paliar u la kyntu ia u MLA bad ia u MDC jong ka Mawlai Constituency ba kin buddien lem halor ka jingkular jong u Executive Engineer halor ka jingmang pisa 10 klur ban shna pynbha ia ka surok sa kumba 10 kilometer.
title: TUKLAR KA KSU BYM SHIMKHIA KI NONGMIHKHMAT KA MAWLAI ÏA KA JINGJOT KA SUROK

content: : Ki dukan jong ki bar jylla ki la shah khynra Trading License bad Labour License ha ka thaiñ Polo ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ha ki bor ba dei peit jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB), Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC), tnat Food Safety, tnat Labour ryngkat ka jingsynran jong ki dkhot ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia and Garo Peoples (FKJGP.Ha kane ka jingkhynra, bun tylli ki dukan jong ki bar jylla ki la shah khang khyrdep namar ka jingbym pynthymmai shuh ia ka License ba ki la ioh na ka Shillong Municipal Board bad na ka District Council wat hadien ba la kut ka por.  Ki don ruh ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba la shah hukum ba kin sangeh ka treikam treijam namarba kim don satia ia ka Labour License.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ki nongialam jong ka FKJGP ki la ong, ba katkum ka Meghalaya Identification, Registration of Migrant Workers Act, 2020 ka la kdew shai ba kino kino kiba aikam ia ki nongbylla kiba nabar ka jylla ki dei ban pynrung kyrteng ha ka tnat Labour.Ki la ong ruh ba kin sa leit ban iakynduh ia u Chief Executive Officer (CEO) jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ban buddien halor ka jingbym patiaw jong ki bar jylla ban pynthymmai ia ka Trading License wat hadien ba ka por ka la kut.Ki Pulit Enforcement jong ka KHADC ki la hiar ban khynra ia ki Trading License bad Labour License ha ka shnong Demseiñiong bad ha Nongmensong kiba dei ki shnong kiba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Council.La lamkhmat ia ka kynhun jong ki Pulit Enforcement da ka License Officer ka KHADC Incharge ka East Khasi Hills District u Bah Refreshal Shabong bad u Additional Superintendent ka tnad Enforcement jong ka KHADC u Bah H. Syiemlieh.Ha ka jingïakren bad u Bah Refreshal Shabong u la iathuh ba ka jingkhynra laisen ha kane ka sngi ka dang long tang ia ki dukan jong ki bar jylla kiba don ha ka shnong Demseiñiong bad u la iathuh ba ia mynta um pat lah ban ai ia ka jingkheiñ ba thikna katno tylli ki dukan jong ki bar jylla kiba don bad ki bym don ia ka Trading License.
title: SHAH KHANG KHYRDEP BUN TYLLI KI DUKAN BAR JYLLA HA KA JINGKHYNRA LAISEN HA POLO

content: Ka Delimitation Committee ba la thung da ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha u bnai Risaw, 2023 khatduh iawai ka la aiti ia ka kaiphod ha u Deputy Chief Executive Member (Dy.CEM) u Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem ha ka ophis treikam jong u ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei.Ia ka kaiphod, la aiti da ka Delimitation Committee ba la khlieh da u Chairman u Bah Strawell Kharsyiemlieh uba dei u nongbishar ba la shongthait jong ka District Council Court ryngkat bad ka jingsakhi lang jong ki dkhot ka Committee.U Bah Kharsyiemlieh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba um pat lah ban iathuh bniah halor ka kaiphod ba la aiti sha ka Executive Committee.  U la ong ba ka kamram jong ka Delimitation Committee ka long tang ban shu pyniaryngkat ia ka jingdon jong ki nongthep vote ha 29 tylli ki Constituency hynrei ym ban phiah satia ia ki Constituency.Ka Delimitation Committee ka la pynlong ia ka jingpynsngew paidbah ha kyllleng ki jaka ha ki District jong ka rilum Khasi ban pan jingmut na ki paidbah bad na ki kynhun bapher bapher ha kaba iadei bad kane ka kam.Na ka liang jong u Bah Pynshngaiñ u la iathuh ba ka Executive Committee kan sa iathir iatai shwa halor kane ka kaiphod ba la ioh pdiang bad lada ka Executive Committee ka la hun yn sa rah sa ha ka Dorbar Lyiur jong ka Ingdorbar Thawain ka Council ka ban sdang naduh ka 10 tarik Naitung, 2024.
title: AITI KA DELIMITATION COMMITTEE ÏA KA KAIPHOD SHA U DY. CM KA KHADC

content: Ka jingbym lah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban pyntreikam ia ka Work Permit bad ia ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security Act (MRSSA) bad ka jingsahteng ban ioh ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ki shnat treikam jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei la pynlong ia ka jingkhynra naphang ia ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba wan trei beaiñ hapoh ka Bri Hynñiewtrep khlem ka Work Permit kaba dei ka Aiñ Sorkar Jylla.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Information & Publicity Secretary jong ka KSU u samla Pynshai Rani ula iathuh ba mynta ka kynti, ka KSU Mawlai Circle ha ka jingkhynra, ka la lap haduh 177 ngut ki bar jylla kiba trei beaiñ hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Mawlai.Ia kane ka jingkhynra Work Permit ba la ialam da u General Secretary u samla Eddie Robin Malngiang la lap ba baroh ki bar jylla kim shym la don ia ka Work Permit bad kaba kham sngewlyngngoh ka long ba kim shym la don wat tang ka EPIC ruh ban pynshisha ba ki dei ki nong India.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, ka KSU Mawprem Circle ba la lamkhmat da u President u samla Aristone Thabah ka la khynra ia ki jaka trei bylla ha kiba bun ki bynta jong ka thaiñ Mawprem baroh kawei.Ha ka jingkhynra, ka seng ka la lap ba ki don haduh 100 tam ki mynder na ka ri Nepal bad ki bar jylla na ka jylla Assam, Uttar Pradesh bad Bihar ki bym don ia ka Work Permit bad ki jingpynshisha.Kine ki ar tylli ki tnat treikam jong ka KSU ki la phah song noh ia ki tum ki tam bad phah mih noh na shnong Mawlai bad na ka shnong Mawprem da kaba phah leit phai sha la ka jong ka shnong.
title: 177 NGUT HA MAWLAI, 100 TAM HA MAWPREM LAP KA KSU BA TREI BE-AIÑ KI NONGBYLLA BAR JYLLA

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) Mawryngkneng Circle ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar ban pynkynriah ïa ka Marten ha ka shnong Nonghali, East Khasi Hills District,Ka seng lyngba u kyrwoh na u Vice President ka HITO Sengkmie Bah Shaniah Nongrum bad u President ka HITO Mawryngkneng Circle Garry S. Marboh ka la ong, ‘lada ka Sorkar ka lah ban pynshisha ba ka jingwanrah ïa ka Marten ha Nonghali kam don jingktah katkum ki kyndon Environmental Laws ka seng kan pdiang hynrei lada ki ïaid lait katkum ki kyndon, ka seng kan nym shong kli kti.’“Ngi pdiang ïa ka roi ka par hynrei lada kata ka roi ka par kan ktah pat ïa ki nongshong shnong bad khamtam ïa ka Wah Umkhen ngim lah ban pdiang.  Kum ka seng ngi pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah ïa ka jingthmu ka Sorkar lyngba ka tnad Urban Affairs ban pynkynriah ïa ka Marten ha ka shnong Nonghali.  Ka seng ka dawa, haba ka sorkar ka kwah ban leh ïa kaba donkam ka dei ban da twad jingmut shwa khnang ba kan nym jia kano kano hadien,” la ong u kyrwoh.Ka seng ka la pynpaw ba ka kyrshan ïa ka jingïalang paidbah ka ban long ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai bad lada jingïalang kan long katkum ka rai bad ka sur jong u paidbah lada ha kano kano ka sur ka ba u paidbah u rai.Ka seng ka kyntu ruh ïa ka Sorkar ba kam dei ban bamja khluit namarba kane ka jaka kaba ka la thmu ban buh ïa ka Marten ka don markhap bad ki jaka rep bad ka don ha syndah jong ka Wah Umkhen bad kan ktah ruh ïa ki dohum dohwah kiba im ha ha ka wah.
title: PYRSHAH KA HITO BA THMU PYNKYNRIAH KA SORKAR ÏA KA MARTEN SHA NONGHALI

content: U Bah Deimaya Lang Siangshai uba dei u Editor jong ka Kotkhubor Mawphor, ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la shah jied kum u President ba thymmai jong ka Shillong Press Club (SPC) ha ka elekshon ba la pynlong da ka Directorate of Information and Public Relations (DIPR) ka Sorkar Jylla.Katba u Bah Dominic Savio Diengdoh uba long u trai jong ka lad pathai khubor T7 News Channel u la shah jied kum u General Secretary khlem da don mano mano ruh ba ïaleh pyrshah, katba u Bah Gershome Hat uba dei u Editor jong ka Kotkhubor u Peitngor u la shah jied kum u Treasurer.Ki dkhot ka Shillong Press Club kiba la poi ban ïashim bynta ha ka jingïathep vote ki long 164 ngut na ki 188 ngut.Ha ka jingniew ïa ki vote shikynta hadien ba ladep ka jingthep vote, u Bah Deimaïalang Siangshai u la jop da kaba ïoh khur 91 vote, katba u Bah Jeo Thangkhiew bad u Bah Raphael Warjri kiba ïakhun pyrshah ki la ïoh khur mar 67 vote bad 6 vote.U Bah Gershome Hat uba la ïoh 113 vote da kaba pynliem ïa u Bah Martin Nongkhlaw uba la ïoh khur 50 vote.U Director jong ka DIPR, u Malthus Sangma, u la aiti ïa ki syrnot sha kine ki lai ngut kiba la jop ha kane ka elekshon.Ha kajuh ka por u  la ai khublei ïa baroh ki nongthoh khubor baroh kiba la ïatreilang na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa kane ka elekshon kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih.
title: SHAH JIED U BAH DEIMAÏALANG SIANGSHAI KUM U PRESIDENT BA THYMMAI KA SHILLONG PRESS CLUB

content: Ka Dorbar Shnong Umkiang, ka sngewkhia halor ka jingbym shimkhia jong ka tnat MeECL ban pynïoh da u Transformer uba thymmai hapoh ka Dong Pahar Umkiang.Ha ka jingshisha ki nongshong shnong hapoh kane ka  Dong ki la shong dum khlem bording kumba ar bnai tam ei ei, kata naduh ka 20 tarik, Ïaiong, 2024, na ka daw ka jingsniew jong u Transformer uba don hapoh ka Dong Pahar Umkiang.U Waheh  Shnong Bah Lasting Pala, marmar u la pyntip sha ki bor ba dei peit, kata, sha ka ophis jong u SDO bad Engineer jong ka MeECL kaba don ha ka shnong Moowakhu, Khliehriat, East Jaintia Hills District, halor kane jingeh kaba kine ki nongshong Shnong ka Dong Pahar ki ïakynduh.Na ka por sha ka por u Waheh Shnong u la ju pynkynmaw ïa ki ophisar shaphang kane ka jingjia ne ka jingduhnoh u Transformer, hynrei ka jubab ba la ïoh ka long ba ki ladep ban pyntip sha Shillong (Head Quarter), hynrei haduh mynta ym shym la ïoh ïa ka jubab na ka bynta ban ïoh ïa u Transformer bathymmai na ka bynta Dong Pahar Umkiang.“Kane ka jingleh bym suitniew jong kane ka MeECL, ka la pynjynjar ïa ki nongshong shnong ban shong haba dum khlem jingshai wat lada dei ka hok ban ïoh jingshai bad ka long ruh kum ka jingiehbeiñ ïa ngi kiba sah sha kyndong ne ka thain khappud,” ong u Bah Pala.“Sa shisien ngi kyrpad ïa ka MeECL ban ai noh da u Transformer uba thymmai khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa ki nongshong shnong ne ki nongpyndonkam bording,” la ong u kyrwoh.
title: AR BNAI TAM SHONG DUM KA DONG PAHAR UMKIANG BA LA SNIEW U TRANSFORMER

content: : Ki ophisar bad ki nongtrei ka Raj Bhavan ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang sngewlem ha Raj Bhavan, Shillong ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih halor ka jingkhlad ba khlem pat dei por ka Suman Chauhan, ka khun jong u Lat ka jylla Meghalaya, u Phagu Chauhan, kaba la khlad noh na kane ka pyrthei ha kane ka step sngi Thohdieng ha AIIMS, New Delhi.Ïa kane ka jingïalang la ïalam da u Principal Secretary sha u Lat u Harish Chandra Chaudhary, IFS ha ka jingdonlang u Chief Electoral Officer, u Dr. B. D. R. Tiwari, IAS.Ka la don ka jingsngap kaba ar minit ban kynmaw ïa kane ka mynsiem kaba la khlad noh.Hadien ba ka la ïathoh shong kurim bad u Gyanendra Singh Chauhan, ka (L) Smti Suman Chauhan, ka la leit phah sumar na ka jingpang Bampong ha kine ki 3 bnai ba la dep. Ïa ka jinglehburom ba khatduh ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ hapoh ka shnong jong ka kaba ha Prayagraj (Allahabad), Uttar Pradesh.Ka la iehnoh shadien ïa la ka kurim, u khun bad kawei ka khun kynthei.
title: KHLAD KA KHUN KYNTHEI U LAT KA JYLLA, SNGEWLEM KI NONGTREI KA RAJ BHAVAN, SHILLONG

content: Ki kmie ki kpa kiba la ïap noh ka jingïatiplem ki la bret ïa la i jong i khun iba dang shu kha ha surok shnong Bakur Khliehshnong, West Jaiñtia Hills District.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police, West Jaintia Hills, la ïathuh ba la lap ïa i khunlung ha ka 2 tarik, Naitung, 2024 ha ka por kumba 11:00 baje mynstep.  Ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kim shym la lap dien satia ïa ki kmie ki kpa jong i khunlung.Ki Pulit ki la register case ha Dawki Police Station hapoh ka Section 94 BNS, 2023 bad ïa ka metïap jong i khunlung la buh ha Ïalong Civil Hospital hadien ba ladep leh ïa ka post mortem.U SP u la pyntip, lada ki kmie kpa lane ki bahaing hasem jong i khunlung kiba kwah ban kam ïa ka metïap ki lah ban wad jingtip na ki Pulit ka Dawki  Police Staton da kaba telephone ha ki nombar: 9402303222/9862370673 bad ha Jowai PCR No: 9774065467/03652220782.
title: LAP ÏA I KHUNLUNG BA DANG SHU KHA BA LA KHLADNOH HA BAKUR KHLIEHSHNONG

content: : Ka Labour Party, ba la lamkhmat da u Keir Starmer, ka la jop kput ha ka general election da kaba ïoh 412 (+211) Seats katba ka Conservative Party jong u Myntri Rangbah u Rishi Sunak ka la hiar sha ka jingjop ba tang 121 (-250) tylli ki Seats ha ka Iingdorbar House of Commons kaba don 650 ngut ki dkhot.Ka Labour Party ka la jop 35% bad ka Conservatives party ka la jop 24%. Ka Labour party ka la tam da 20 points ïa ka Conservatives ha ka jingïathep vote.Hadien ka jingjop jong ka Labour, u Syiem Charles III, u la thung ïa u Starmer kum u Myntri Rangbahduh ba thymmai jong ka ri U.K.Haba kren sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka ri ha Downing Street hadien ba la pynbna ba un shimti kum u Myntri Rangbahduh ba thymmai jong ka ri, u Starmer u la ong, “ki kam jong ngi ki long kiba kyrkieh bad ngin sdang noh mynta.  Hynrei wat aratien, ngin tei thymmai ïa ka ri Bilat,”  u la bynrap.U Keir Starmer uba la don mynta 61 snem ka rta, un long u Myntri Rangbahduh ba thymmai jong ka ri Bilat kaba long kawei na ki khyndiat tylli ki ri ha ka pyrthei kaba dang pynneh ïa ka jingsynshar Syiem.Ha Yorkshire, u Sunak, u la jop ïa ka jingïakhun na Richmond seat, bad shim jingkitkhlieh ruh halor ka jingshah rem ka party.  Ki nongpeit pyrman ki ong ruh ba ka sainpyrthei jong u Sunak ka don mynta ha ka jingartatien namarba katkum ki dak ki shin ki pynpaw ba u lah ban shah rem wat ha ka Seat lajong ruh.U Sunak u la ai khublei ïa la ki jong ki nongkyrshan bad ong ruh ba un sa iehnoh ïa ka jinglong nongïalam ha ka Party.U Sunak, 44 snem ka rta, u la long u Myntri Rangbahduh uba khynnah tam jong ka ri Bilat bad uba nynkong eh napdeng ki bym dei ki dohlieh. U la shimti ïa ka kam Myntri Rangbah jong ka Bilat ha u bnai Risaw, 2022 hadien ka jinghiar shuki jong ka Myntri Rangbahduh barim ka Liz Trust.
title: JOP KPUT KA LABOUR PARTY HA UK, KUT NOH KA JINGLONG PM U RISHI SUNAK HA RI BILAT

content: U BJP National President u Jagat Prakash Nadda u la thung ïa arngut ki co-incharge bathymmai na ka bynta ka jylla Manipur, Mizoram, Meghalaya, bad Nagaland.Ïa u Dr Ajeet Gopchade la thung kum u co-incharge na ka bynta ka jylla Manipur, ha kaba kane kan wanrah ka jingkylla bad ka jingshimphang ban pynurlong ïa ka jingthmu jong ka BJP ha ka jylla.Ha kajuh ka por ïa u Devesh Kumar, MLC, un shimti kum u co-incharge na ka bynta ka Mizoram, kaba la banjur ïa ka jingthmu jong ka jingaiti ka BJP ban pynïar ïa ki dienjat jong ka BJP ha kane ka thaiñ.Katba ha Meghalaya bad Nagaland, la aiti ha u Anil Antony ban shimti ïa ka bynta kum u co-incharge, bad ai ïa ka kam ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka BJP ba kan lah ban pynkhlaiñ ka jingïatehlok bad ki nongshong shnong.La ong ba kane ka jingpynbna kan long kaba dei ban treikam noh mardor ha kaba kine ki co-incharge ba thymmai kin trei ïa ka bynta jong ka lawei ka party bad khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam election ha kine ki jylla bapher bapher.
title: BYNSHET KA BJP HA U ANIL ANTONY BAN PEIT ÏA KA MEGHALAYA BAD NAGALAND

content: Saw ngut ki briew ki la shah pynïap dusmon ha ka rukom kaba ishyrkhei bha hapoh ka shnong Umpleng, East Jaiñtia Hills ha kaba ia ki kti ki kjat la teh da u tyllai bad nalor kata la lap ruh ia ki dak pom tari ha ka met jong kine ki saw ngut.U Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u  la ïathuh ruh ba uwei na kine kiba la shah pynïap u dei uba la ithuh kyrteng kum u Ravi Rai, 23 snem ka rta bad uba dei u khun jong ka Devi Rai uba shong basah ha ka shnong Pastha Elam jong ka ri Nepal.Katba uwei pat u dei u Khasi-Pnar ïa uba la tip kyrteng kum u Nasar Kyndait, 33 snem ka rta na ka shnong Dkhiah East Pohshnong. Sa arngut kiwei pat ki dei na ka jaidbynriew Nepali ia kiba ym pat lah satia ban ioh kyrteng.U SP u la pyntip ba ka tnat Pulit ka la thung da ka Special Investigation Team (SIT) ban ïarap ïa u Investigating Officer (IO) na ka bynta ban pynlong shuh shuh ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor ka jingshah pynïap jong kitei ki saw ngut ki briew ha kaba ïa ka met jong kine ki saw ngut ba la teh da u tyllai na ki kti la bret ha kawei ka jaka kaba don ha lyndet jong ka iew Umpleng ha East Jaiñtia Jaiñtia Hils District.U la ïathuh ba ki Pulit jong ka Umpleng Anti-Dacoity Camp ki la ïoh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha ka por 7.30 baje mynstep ba la pyntip ba ki don saw tylli ki metïap jong ki briew ki bym lah ban ithuh ba la lap ha lyndet jong ka iew Umpleng.Mar mar, ki Pulit ki la leit sha ka jaka ba lap ïa ki metïap ha kaba ki la shem ba la teh ïa ki kti da u tyllai bad lap ïa ki dak ot ha ka met jong ki saw ngut ïa kaba la ngeit ba ki la shah pynïap bad hadien kane ki Pulit ki la pyntip sha ka Crime Scene Unit, sha ka Mobile Forensic Crime Scene Unit bad sha u Majistor ban leit pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong ki nongsakhi ban lum ïa ki sakhi satar bad ban pyndep ïa ki jingdonkam katkum ka aiñ.Hadien kane, ïa ki saw tylli ki metïap la pynkit noh sha Civil Hospital Khliehriat na ka bynta ban leh ïa ka post mortem.Shuh shuh ka thymmei khubor ka la ïathuh ba kine kiba shah pynïap la suba ba ki dei kiba nongdie bad ki nongdih drok namar na ka jaka ba la lap ïa ka metïap jong ki, ki Pulit ki la lap ruh ïa ki thyrnia injek.
title: SHAH PYNÏAP DUSMON UWEI U PNAR BAD LAI KI NEPALI HA UMPLENG, EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS DISTRICT

content: Ka Khasi Students Union, CEC ryngkat ka KSU North Khasi Hills District Unit ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ba la lamkhmat da u President u samla Lambokstar Marngar bad u General Secretary u samla Donald Thabah ki la hiar sha ka thaiñ Ri Bhoi ban pyni bor ia ka Sorkar Jylla da kaba pynïeng ïa da ka khyrdop ILP ha ka shnong 20 Mer Pahammawleiñ, ha surokbah National Highway-6 ha Ri Bhoi.Ki dkhot ka seng ki la talasi naphang ïa ki kali bad ïa ki bar jylla kiba wan rung shapoh ka jylla ban tohkit ia ki kot ki sla bad pynphai kylla ruh ïa ki bar jylla ki bym don ia ki kot ki sla kiba biang.Tang shu ïoh jingtip ia kane, ki Magistrate bad ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi ki la hiar ban leit ïakren ïa ki nongïalam jong ka KSU halor ka jingpynïeng ïa ka khyrdop ILP.Hadien kane, ki dkhot ka KSU ki la leit jurip ruh ïa ka Facilitation Centre ba la tei da ka Sorkar ha Umling ha kaba la lap ba kane ka khyrdop talasi mynder kaba la pynkylla kum ka jaka leh test Covid-19 ka la kylla long ka iingjah bad ka ktem riehtngen jong ki riewsniew.U samla Lambokstarwell ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, ka KSU ka ladep ban dawa ruh ban pyntreikam ïa ka ILP bad ban pyntreikam ïa ka aiñ MRSSA ban khanglad na ka jingwan rung beaiñ ki briew kiba na shabar, hynrei kumba long haduh kine ki sngi, ka sorkar ka leh sting bad leh bym suidñiew kumta ka seng kam banse ban pynieng pynïeng noh ïa kane ka khyrdop ILP.“Kane kam dei ka sien ka banyngkong ba la pynïeng ïa ka khyrdop ILP da ka seng bad la bunsien ngi la pynïeng ïa kine ki khyrdop ILP. Ka daw ka long ban tehlakam na ka jingwanrung kynthep ki briew kiba nabar khlem da don ki kot ki sla kiba paka. Ka KSU ka dawa mardor na ka Sorkar India ba ka dei ban ai noh ïa ka ILP ban pyntreikam ha ka jylla bad kumjuh ruh ka sorkar Meghalaya ka dei ban pyntreikam noh ïa ka MRSSA ha ka jylla bad lada ka Sorkar ka dang buhteng, ka seng kan dang bteng ban buh kum kine ki kyrdop na ka bynta ban tehlakam na ka jingwan rung kynthep ki briew kiba na shabar ka jylla.Ha kaba iadei pat bad ka Facilitation Centre, u President ka KSU u la ong ‘kan myntoi aïu ba ka Sorkar kan tei ïa ka Facilitation Centre ha Umling kaba ym lah pat ban pyntreikam bad ka long tang ka jingpyrsyrwa ïa ka pisa u paidbah da ki klur tyngka.”U la kynthoh ruh ba ka jingdon jong ka Anti-Infiltration Check Gate jong ka Sorkar ha ka shnong Byrnihat ka long tang kum ka shynrong ba khlem jabieng namarba ka jingtalasi ïa ki kali bad ia ki briew kiba nabar ka jylla ka shu long kaba malu mala bad ka bym da pyrkhing satia.
title: PYNIBOR KA KSU ÏA KA SORKAR, PYNIENG KHYRDOP ILP HA 20 MER, TALASI NAPHANG ÏA KI KALI

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Balang ka la rai ban pynbeit ïa ka dor jaka ha New Shillong township (NST) Phase-II bad ha ka thaiñ Mawkhanu.“Ngi la buh katto katne ki jaka kaba don na ka bynta jong ngi bad katto katne ki jaka kiba don kiba dang lait thylli mynta ka sorkar jylla ka la pynbeit ïa ka dor na ka bynta kiwei pat ki tnat bad ki tnat ka Sorkar Pdeng bad kiwei ki Private Sector, khnang ba ngin dup lah ban pynmih khajna,” ong u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Mynta da ka jingkiew ka dor, kaba nyngkong, ngi sngew ba ka long kaba dei ban thaw katto katne ki polisi bad katto katne ki Base Rate halor ka nongrim ba ngin lah ban ai ka jaka sha ki Agency bapher bapher bad baroh kine kin long da ka jingai wai ka ban neh slem bad ïa ka dor ladep ban buh bad ka dor ka ïapher na ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Sorkar Pdeng bad sha ki Private Sector, bad ki la don ki dor kiba la dep ban buh. Ka daw kaba kongsan ba la rai da ka kynhun myntri mynta ka sngi ka long ban buh ïa ka dor kaba skhem,” ula ong.“Lada baroh kine ki hap hapoh kajuh ka jaka, kadei ban don ka dor nyngkong kaba heh ba ka sorkar ka lah ban kamai na kane ka jingai wai ïa ki jaka,” u la bynrap.
title: MYNJUR KA SORKAR ÏA KA DOR BAI JAKA HA NEW SHILLONG BAD MAWKHANU

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla sngi Balang ka la rai ban khang khyrdep noh ïa ka Meghalaya State Housing Board  (MSHB) bad ban pynlut pisa haduh T. 7.42 klur na ka bynta ban siew ïa ka Voluntary Retirement Scheme (VRS) sha ki 18 ngut ki nongtrei jong ka Board.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma, ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u la ong, “kumba phi tip ba kane ka dei ka kam kaba la sah pongding la slem bha bad bun na ki nongtrei ha ka Housing Board ki la kyrpad ban leh kham kloi ïa kane.  Namarkata, la wanrah ïa kane ka mat ïatai mynta ka sngi bad ka kynhun Myntri ka la mynjur ïa ka jingtyrwa ban khang khyrdep noh ïa ka MSHB bad ban siew ïa ka VRS sha ki 18 ngut ki nongtrei jong ka Board.”Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Myntri Rangbah ka jinglut pisa ban siew ïa ka VRR sha ki nongtrei kan kot kumba T.7.42 klur.Haba kylli kaei ka daw ba ka Sorkar ka la shim ïa kane ka rai, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “namarba kam da don shuh ka jingtreikam hapoh ka Housing Board kumba ka long mynta.  Ka la dei ruh ka jingdawa kaba la slem bha.  Ha ka jingshisha, la jan shiphew snem lada ngam bakla ha kaba ki don ruh ki khep ba ki nongtrei kim ïoh tulop thikna namarba ka dei ka Independent Board. Dei halor kine ki daw kaba la pynlong ïa ki nongtrei ba ki kwah ba ka Board kan khang khyrdep noh bad halor kata ka nongrim la shim ruh ïa kane ka rai.“Ïa ka Housing Board la thaw da kaba shim ram na ka HUDCO bad na ka LIC bad kine ki long ha ki snem 1988-89 bad mynta la jan baroh ki tnat treikam bad kiwei kiwei ki riewshimet ruh ki lah ban thaw ïa ki lad ban ïoh ïa ka ram.  Namarkata, ka jingtreikam jong kane ka Board kam don shuh,” u la ong.Haba kylli, hato ka Sorkar kan shim kum kane kajuh ka sienjam ïa kiwei pat ki PSU kim bym treikam shuh ha ka jylla, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “haoid ngi hap ban shong bad ban ïathir ïatai bad ban khmih bniah.  Haba ngi ïohi ba ki don ki jingtynjuh ba haba shwa ba ngin shim ïa ka rai ngi khot ïakren lang ïa ki kynhun sha ka jingïalang ban ïatai sani bha.”
title: RAI KA SORKAR JYLLA BAN KHANG KHYRDEP NOH ÏA KA MEGHALAYA STATE HOUSING BOARD

content: I Meiieid Kmoiñ Wahlang iba long kawei na ki nongiamareh Marathon na ka shnong Shngimawleiñ South West Khasi Hills District iba la don mynta 76 snem ka rta ba la paw bha ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya bad ha ka ri India da ka mynsiem kaba sngewkmen i la pan jingkyrshan na ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka jylla ha shwa ba in leit iashim bynta ha ka jingiakob mareh marathon ka ban sa long ha ka ri Australia.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei i Meiieid Kmoiñ Wahlang i la khublei ia u Bah Binning Lyngkhoi uba long u nongprat lynti ha ka jingmareh marathon bad kumjuh ia kiwei pat ki riewrangbah kiba ju don ryngkat bad i haduh kine ki sngi.Ha kane ka kynti, i meiieid Kmoiñ Wahlang i la kyrpad ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka jylla Meghalaya ba kin buh jingduwai lem na ka bynta jong i khnang ba kan ym don kano kano ka jingshah pynthud bad ka jingshah pynwit naduh ka sngi ba in sa mih na la ing ban leit sha Australia bad ban wan phai ruh da ka met kaba koit ba khiah.Kum ka longkmie na ka thaiñ nongkyndong kaba duna ha ka jingnang jingstad bad ha ka ioh ka kot, i meieid Kmoiñ Wahlang i la kyrpad ruh ia ki paidbah kiba lah ban ai jingiarap ha kino kino ki bynta namarba ka jinglut jingsep ha kane ka kynti ruh ka long kaba bun.
title: SHWA BAN LEIT MAREH MARATHON SHA AUSTRALIA PAN JINGKYRSHAN I MEIÏEID KMOIÑ

content: Ki Pulit jong ka East Jaintia Hills District ha ka sngi Palei ki kem ia uwei u briew ba la suba ba u dei uba donkti ha ka jingshah pyniap jong ki saw ngut ki briew ha kaba ia ki metiap la lap ha ka shnong Umpleng, East Jaintia Hills District ha ka step 6 tarik Naitung, 2024.Halor kane ka jingshah pyniap jong ki saw ngut ki briew, ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh ka Section 103/3 (5) jong ka BNS bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat ban iohkem sa ia kiwei pat kiba donkti ha kane ka jingjia.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, napdeng ki saw ngut kiba la shah pyniap, lai ngut ki dei kiba la ithuh kyrteng kum u Ravi Rai, 23 snem ka rta na ka shnong Elam, Mechipradesh, Nepal, u Rajesh Rai, 26 snem na ka shnong Dharan Sunsari, Koshi Anchal, Nepal bad u Nasar Kyndait, 33 snem na ka shnong Dkhiah East Pohshnong, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Katba ia uwei pat uba dang don haduh mynta ha ka jaka buh metiap ha Khliehriat Civil Hospital, ym pat don satia ban kam trai mano mano ruh.
title: SHAH KEM UWEI BA SHAH SUBA DONKTI BAN PYNÏAP ÏA KI SAW NGUT HA UMPLENG

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Umiam Police Station, Ribhoi District ha ka 5 tarik mynta u bnai ki la kem ia ki arngut ki dkhot jong ka Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ba la tip kyrteng kum u Kynsaijun Thabah ba ju khot sin Kynsai, 32 snem ka rta, uba sah ha Umlyngka, Kynton Block-II bad ia u Sanborlang Rapsang ba ju khot sin Sanbor, 38 snem ka rta uba sah ha Mawlai Umjajew, East Khasi Hills District.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police jong ka Ri-Bhoi District u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa, u la iathuh ba ha ka jingtohkit jong ki Pulit ia ka case ba la register ha Umiam Police Station hapoh ka Section 120B/506/384/511 IPC pule lang bad ka Section 10/13/17/18 UA (P), Act, saw ngut ki briew ki la shah kem ia kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Cyfrank Paul Pariat, Kitbok Mujai, Barnabas Lyngdoh bad u PWanpynshngai Dympep.Ha ka jingtohkit, u Cyfrank Paul Pariat u la phla ba u la leit shah hikai pyntbit sha Bangladesh bad u Kynsaijun Thabah na ka bynta shi bnai, kata, ha shiteng jong u bnai Naitung, 2023 haduh Nailar, 2023 bad hadien ba la pyndep ia ka jingshah hikai pyntbit ki la wan phai noh sha la ing.U SP u la iathuh ba ha ka 5 tarik, mynta u bnai ia u Kynsaijun la kem bad ha ka jingtohkit u la pha ba u dei u dkhot jong ka HNLC bad u la leit ban shah hikai pyntbit na ka bynta shi bnai bad u Cyfrank Pariat. Shuh shuh u la phla ruh ia ka kyrteng jong uwei uba don bynta lang ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Sanborlang Rapsang uba la iarap ban kdew ia ka lynti iaid ban poi sha Bangladesh ha u snem baladep.Shuh shuh u SP u la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la kem ia u Sanborlang ha ka sngi Palei halor kitei ki kyndon ba la pynngat bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat ban iohlum shuh shuh ia ki jingtip kiba bniah.
title: SHAH KEM ARNGUT KI DKHOT HNLC, UWEI NA UMLYNGKA, UWEI NA MAWLAI UMJAJEW

content: Ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo People (FKJGP) Central Body ka pynrem jur ia ka jingkren laplah bad jingkren khyllung khynnah jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ban ong ba ‘Ym donkam Work Permit ha Meghalaya’ na ka bynta ki bar jylla kiba wan ban bylla sha ka jylla hynrei da kaba shu tap eit miaw ba ki dei tang ban shu pynrung kyrteng ha ka tnad Labour.Ka seng ka buh ka jing kylli, hato u Conrad Kongkal Sangma kum u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla um tip mo ba ia ka Inter-State Migrant Workmen (Regulation of Employment and Conditions of Service) Act, 1979 (Work Permit) ka dei ka aiñ kaba ladep ban pynjur bad pyntreikam naduh ka 28 tarik, Naitung, 2011.Ka FKJGP ka sngew ba lada kat uta u khlieh nong synshar jong ka jylla um pat tip bha wat ia ki aiñ kiba la don lypa kum ka jaitbynriew bad kum ka jylla kumno ngin dang shaniah ha kum kitei ki nongialam kiba pyrshang ban ialam bakla ia ki paidbah tang namar ka jing kwah ban ailad bad ban iada iaki mynder kiba wan rung kyrthep sha kane ka jylla ka jong ngi na ka bynta ka jing myntoi ha ka saiñ pyrthei ban pynlong Vote Bank da ki mynder na ka bynta ban skhem ka shuki lajong, ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President u Bah Dundee C. Khongsit.Kum ka seng ngi dang khmih lynti ba lyngba ka jingpynkup bor jong u paidbah ba kita kiba don ha ka bor synshar kin shakri ia ka jaitbynrtiew bad ia ka jylla hi baroh kawei phewse wat ia ki aiñ kiba la don lypa ruh ki dang pyrshang ban pynjah klep, sa katno tam lei ban pynurlong bad ban bud dien sha Nongbah Delhi ia kata ka Resolution ba la dep ban mynjur ha ha ïing dorbar thaw aiñ jong ka jylla kum ka Inner Line Permit (ILP), Ka jingpynrung ia ka ktien khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka riti synshar jong ka Ri India, ong u kyrwoh.Shuh shuh halor ka jingong jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ba ki sengbhalang kim donhok ban talasi kot ia ki nong bylla bar jylla, ka FKJGP ka buh ka jingkylli hato kita ki Anti-Infiltration Check Gate kin shu long tang ki khyrdop lum khajna jongno re jongno bad kita ki Labour Inspectors ba la thung ha manla ki Block kin shu pynsyrwa kai ia ka pisa jong ka Sorkar da kaba shu shim tulop ei khlem da treikam satia, la kynthoh une u nongialam ka seng.Ka Sorkar jylla ka dei ban tip bad sngewthuh shai ba kata ka jing register Case saw tylli pyrshah ia ki dkhot sengbhalang kan ym pyntieng pynsmiej satia hynrei ki dkhot jong ka FKJGP kin iai long ki nongpeit pyrman ban khanglad ia ki mynder ban rung laitluid sha kane ka jylla jong ngi bad ki kynroh jong ki along kin nym pynduh mynsiem satia hynrei ki long ki jingai mynsiem ia ki dkhot jong ki sengbhalang bad kine baroh ki pyni bad pynpaw shai ba kam don ka jingshimkhia na ka liang jong ka Sorkar ha kaba iadei bad ka ishu mynder, u la ong.“Kyntang iawai ka FKJGP ka bthah ia baroh ki shnat treikam jong ka seng kiba don ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei ban bteng beit ia ka jing khynra mynder khnang ba kan long ka jingiada ia ka jaitbynriew na ka jing shah tyllep bad na ka bynta ka jing shngaiñ ki pateng ki ban sa wan,” la pynkut u kyrwoh.
title: HATO U CM UM TIP ÏA KA INTER-STATE MIGRANT WORKMEN (REGULATION OF EMPLOYMENT AND CONDITIONS OF SERVICE) ACT, 1979: FKJGP

content: Shillong, 11 Naitung : Ha kane ka juk jong ka teknoloji kaba mynta, ki rynsan Social Media kum ka Youtube, ka Instagram, ka Facebook, ka X bad kiwei pat ki rynsan Social Media ki la plie lad shisha ia kiba bun ki samla bad ki hep kiba rit ba kin ioh pynpaw ia ka sap ka phong jong ki bad ym tang katta hynrei ka dei ruh kawei na ki lad kamai kaba ki lah ban kamai pisa katkum ka jinglah jong ki ban khring ia ki paidbah kiba peit.Na kane ka jylla jong ngi, ki la mih bun ki samla kiba la pyrshang katba don la ka buit ka sap ban khring ia ki paidbah lyngba ka jinglah jong ki ban pyni ia kata ka sap jong ki la ka long ha ka rwai ka siaw, ka put ka tem, ka ialeh biria bad kumta ter ter. Hynrei kim shym la poi pyrkhat pat ba ka sorkar kan phai khmat sha ki bad ban ithuh ia kata ka sap kaba ki don.Dei ha ka 11 tarik u Naitung , 2024 ba ka sorkar ka la pyni ia ka dak ka jingithuh ia kata ka sap kaba ki samla jong ngi ki don, da kaba ka pyllait paidbah ia ka Hello Meghalaya Content Creators Award 2024 lyngba ka jingiatreilang hapdeng ka Meghalaya Grassroot Music Project bad ka Hard Rock Café.U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, u Myntri ka tnat jngohkai pyrthei u bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u Chief Secretary u bah Donald P Wahlang ki la pyllait ia ka jingsdang ia ka Hello Meghalaya ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Lariti Performance Centre kaba don ha Mawkasiang.Ha kane ka sngi la ai khusnam ia ki Content Creators lane kita ki riew donsap kiba lah ban sei ia ka sap jong ki lyngba ka jingring dur bad ia ka khusnam la phiah ha la ki jong ki jong ki bynta da kaba pynshong Nongrim ia ka jingmut jong ka Video kaba ki la pynwandur.Ia ka khusnam Best Social Change Influencer lane ka khusnam kaba wanrah ia ka khubor jong ka jingkylla ha ka imlang sahlang la ioh rah da u Jr. Storyteller Lyndon. Ia ka khusnam Best Green Influencer lane ka khusnam kaba ia dei bad ka jingpynneh pynsah ia ka mariang la ioh rah da ka Green Tech Foundation, ia ka khusnam Emerging Influencer of the Year la ioh rah da ka Warimeki Lyngwa, ia ka khusnam Best Food Influencer kaab pyni shaphang ka bam lane ka rukom shet rukom tiew la ioh rah da ka Triyan Babilsi.Nangta ia ka Best Traveller Influencer ne ka khusnam na ka bynta kito kiba shang kylleng ki jaka ban pyni ia ka jingitynnad ka jylla la ioh rah da ka Grace Marbaniang bad u Akkim Tito A Momin. Ia ka khusnam Best Lifestyle Influencer lane kiba pyni shaphang ka riam ka beit la ioh rah da ka Pema Leilani Ward Kyndiah. Ia ka Best Comedy Influencer lane kiba leh ia ki kam biria la ioh rah da ka kynhun jong ka Chi-iung.Na ka bynta ka Fashion Influencer pat la ioh rah da u Dr.Kham Chyrmang, khusnam Best Makeup Influencer la ioh rah da ka Rachel Anne Nongkhlaw, Best Music Influencer la ioh rah da u Wanjop Sohkhlet, Best Viral Influencer lane ka khusnam na ka bynta kito ki Video kiba sted bha ban saphriang paidbah la ioh rah da ka kynhun jong ka Biria Shillong.Infotainment Influencer la ioh rah da u Yowanmi Myria na ka Channel Technology Khasi. Na ka bynta ka Best Health and Wellbeing Influencer lane ka khusnam na ka bynta kito kiba pynphriang ia ka khubor shaphang ka koit ka khiah lyngba ka jingkilan met la ioh rah da ka Dapalei Stacy Warjri katab ia ka khusnam Best Podcaster pat la ioh rah da u Ferdinand Rani ia uba la ju tip kum u Code Freeman. Baroh ki nongioh khusnam ki ioh rah ruh ia ka song pisa kaba mar 25 hajar tyngka.
title: YM POI PYRKHAT KI SAMLA BA KA SORKAR KAN ITHUH IA KA SAP JONG KI HA KA BAN IA RING DUR

content: Ki nongïalam jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Sengkmie ba la lamkhmat da u President u samla Lambokstarwell Marngar, u General Secretary u samla Donald Thabah ryngkat bad kiwei pat ki nongïalam ki la leit tur sha Sadar Police Station shuwa ban kynjatshai ka bneng tang shu ïoh jingtip ba ki Pulit ki la leit kem shiteng synñia ïa u President jong ka KSU Nongthymmai Circle u samla Eric Nongkynrih.Ka jingshah kem jong u President ka KSU Nongthymmai Circle ka la jia ruh tang hapoh khyndiat kynta hadien ba u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K. Sangma u la pyntip lyngba ki lad pathai khubor ba ki Pulit ki la pynngat saw tylli ki mukotduma ïa ki kynhun kiba leit ban khynra Work Permit ïa ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba trei ïa ka Project ha madan Polo.Ki Pulit ki la kem  ïa u samla Eric na iing sah jong u na Nongthymmai bad ka daw ka jingshah kem jong une u nongïalam ka KSU Nongthymmai Circle ka dei halor ka jingkhynra Work Permit jong ka KSU ïa ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba trei bylla ha ki thain Nongthymmai.Ki Pulit ki la rah ïa u samla Eric sha Sadar Police Station bad ki la bat kumba shi kynta eiei hapoh thanat hynrei namar ka jingleit tur ki nongïalam ka KSU sha Sadar, ki Pulit ki la pyllait noh kham hadien.Halor kane ka jingshah kem jong u samla Eric, ki nongïalam jong ka KSU Nongthymmai Circle ki la shong jingïalang kyrkieh ha ka step sngi Palei ban ïapyrkhat sani halor kane ka kam.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Vice President jong ka KSU Nongthymmai Circle u samla Richard Mawkhiew u la pynrem jur ïa ki Pulit namarba ka jingleit kem ïa u nongïalam jong ki ha ka por shiteng miet la kumba leit kem ïa ki lehnoh.U la ong, lada ki Pulit ki donkam ban pan jingshai eiei na ki nongïalam jong ka KSU ki la dei ban khot mynsngi mynshai ym ban leit kem ïa u briew ha ka por shiteng synñia.U General Secretary jong ka Circle u samla Riban Nongrum u la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar bad ïa ka tnat Pulit ba kim dei ban pyntyrha   ïoh ba ka ding kan klang.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ha kine ki sngi, ki shnnat treikam jong ka Khasi Students Union ki la pynlong ka jingkhynra Work Permit bad Labour License na ki nongbylla bar jylla ha kylleng ki bynta jong ka nongbah Shillong.
title: SHITENG SYNÑIA KEM KI PULIT KA SADAR PS ÏA U PRESIDENT KA KSU NONGTHYMMAI CIRCLE

content: Ka Dorbar Dong Demseiñïong ka la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingkhynra laisen khaïi da ka FKJGP Shillong City hapoh ka shnong ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai.U Rangbah Dong ka Dorbar Dong Demseiñïong Bah Anthony Nongkynrih ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei u ïathuh ba ka Dorbar kam don jingtip halor kane ka kam ba la leh da ka FKJGP bad kum kine ki jaitkam ba la leh da kano kano ka seng ka long ka bym lah pdiang hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Dorbar bad kine ki jait kam ki lah ban wanrah ka jingbym shongsuk shongshngaiñ.U Bah Nongkynrih u la ong ba ha katei ka sngi ha ka por kumba 1:00 baje haduh ka 2:00 baje noh sngi ïa kane ka jingkhynra la ïoh jingtip da ki katto katne ki nongshong shnong.  Haba ki dkhot ka Dorbar ki la poi ha katei ka jaka ha kaba ki dkhot ka FKJGP ki don bad haba kylli na ki shaphang kitei ki kam bad ka jingthmu jong ka jingkhynra bad ba ki dukan ki la hap ban khang noh, ka la don ka jingïania ha katei ka jaka bad na ka liang u Secretary ka Seng Samla Demseiñïong ruh u la shah ktah kti.Kumta halor kane ka Dorbar ka pynrem jur ïa kane ka jingktah kti ki dkhot katei ka seng ïa u dkhot ka seng samla ha kaba kane yn ym lah satia ban pdiang.“Namarkata ngi phai sha ki bor pynïaid district ban shim ïa ki kam kiba donkam khnang ba kum kine ki jaitkam kim dei ban jia shuh hadien habud na ka bynta ki jingïada ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong,” ong ka kyrwoh na u Rangbah Dong.
title: KYNNOH KA DEMSEIÑIONG BA KTAH KTI KI DKHOT FKJGP ÏA U SECRETARY KA SENG SAMLA

content: Ka Chithi kaba dei ka phlim thymmai na rilum Jaintia kaba la pynbit pynbiang da ka Kong Simi Khongtiang bad la pynmih da u Fourness Dhar na ka Anthill Productions bad ka Cornelia Dkhar. Ia kane la phlim la pyni paidbah ha District Library Auditorium, Jowai ka ban kut haduh ka 23 tarik u Nohprah, 2023 bad nalor kata kane ka phlim ka la ïoh jingiaroh bha na kiba bun ki nongpeit ha ki jaka ba la dep pyni paidbah ia ka, namar ba ka iadei bad ka juk kaba mynta ha kaba bun ki samla ki bym sngewthuh iaka jingkordor ka longing longsem bad ban tehsong ia ka akor ka burom jong ka iing.Ka Kong Simi Khongtiang ka la pyntip ba ha u snem thymmai yn sa pyni paidbah ha nongbah Shillong.
title: LA PYNI PAIDBAH IA KA PHLIM CHITHI HA JOWAI

content: Shillong, Nohprah 21 : Ka Khasi Students’ Union ba la lamkhmat da u President, Samla Lambokstarwell Marngar, Reuben Najiar (Asst. General Secretary) bad Manly Nongpluh (Finance Secretary) ha ka janmiet jong 21 tarik u Nohprah 2023, ka la leit kynduh kyrkieh ia i Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, Cabinet Minister i/c Health Department, Government of Meghalaya halor ka thung kam thung jam ha NEIGRIHMS kaba la mih bun tylli ki jingkynrum kynram.Kat kum ka jinglum jingtip jong ka Seng, ka shem ba na bynta ka post jong Record clerk, kumba 15 tylli eiei ki jingkylli ki dei ha ka ktien Hindi bad kane hi ka long kaba pynduh nong ia ki samla Khasi ba la pynkhreh bad thoh ia ka eksamin na bynta kane ka post. Kane ka rukom buh jingkylli ka la iaid lait na ki kyndon ba la buh da ka eksamin kaba dei ban long ha ka ktien phareng (English). Shuh shuh ka Seng ka la ioh khubor ruh ba ki bor pyniaid jong ka NEIGHRIMS ki kwah ban pynmih noh mardor ïa ka result jong ka eksamin watla ym pat lah ban pynshisha ia ki kot ki sla jong ki nongïaleh ïaka eksamin bad wat hapdeng kiba bun kine ki kynrum kynram. Kane ka jingleh jong ki bor pyniaid ka NEIGRIHMS ka pynartatien ia ka Seng ba ioh lehse ka don eiei sha lyndet.Ka Seng ha ka dorkhas jong ka, ka la pynpaw ruh ia ka jinglynngoh halor ka eksamin jong ki Nursing Officer ba la pynlong lyngba ka NORCET -5 examination ba ladep ha kine ki khyndiat bnai, ha kaba ki don 194 tylli ki post na bynta ki nurse bad na kine 175 tylli ki post ki la leit sha ki shynrang kiba wan na kiwei pat ki jylla bad tang 17 ngut ki kynthei. Kumba ju long hi ha kiwei kiwei ki medical institute ka ratio jong ki kynthei bad shynrang ka dei 80:20 hynrei yn da phai pat sha NEIGRIHMS ka kylla khongpong bad kine kiba laioh ia ka kam, kim shym la don ia kano kano ka experience (practical) namar ba ka NEIGRIHMS kam sym pan ia kata bad kane kan buh jingeh ia ki nongshah sumar kiba wan ban sumar ia lade ha katei ka jaka.Ka Seng ka iai ban biang ruh halor ka Grade B bad C post ba la pynlong da ka agency ba nabar ba tip kyrteng ia ka kum ka HLL, ba bun na ki samla Khasi ki ngat ban thoh eksam sha Guwahati, Jorhat, Dibrugarh bad Delhi. Kane ka la buh jingeh shibun bah ia ki samla kiba duna ia ka jingioh jingkot bad ka Seng ka lap ruh ba bun na ki samla Khasi kim shym la lah ban leit thoh ia ka eksamin jong ki.Ka Seng ka buh jingkylli ba balei ba ka NEIGRIHMS kam lah ban pynlong hi ia ka eksamin kam bad ka hap ai sha ka agency kum ka HLL bad ka NORCET bad lyngba kine ngi iohi ba bun tang ki briew na kiwei pat ki jylla kiba ioh kam, lehse ka lah ruh ban long ba ki bor pyniaid kiba ha khmat jong ka NEIGHRIMS ki kwah ban pynrung ia ki briew na ki jylla ki jong ki.Ka Seng ka kyntu ia ka Sorkar jylla ba kan khmih bad bishar bha halor kane ka bynta bad kyntu ba nangne shakhmat ka NEIGHRIMS ka dei ban pynlong hi ia ka eksamin bad ym dei ban shu ai pateng ha kiwei pat.Na ka liang jong i Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh i la kular ban shim khia halor kine ki mat ba ktah ia ki samla wad kam wad jam jong ka jylla.
title: PYRSHAH KA KSU HALOR KA EKSAMIN THUNG KAM THUNG JAM HA NEIGRIHMS

content: Shillong, Nohprah 21 : Ka Khasi Students’ Union lyngba ka Education Cell hadien ba ka la ioh ïa ka jingujor na ki samla pule ka jylla ki ban ïakhun ïa ka ekamin CSIR NET exam 2023 ka ban long ha ka 26, 27 bad 28 tarik u Nohprah 2023, kiba hap ban leit ïakhun ïa kane ka eksam shabar jong ka jylla kum sha Jorhat bad Dibrugarh.Ka seng mynta ka sngi ka 21 tarik u Nohprah 2023, ha ka jingïalam u samla Richest Malngiang bad u samla Shelkitbok Kharbani Assistant Education Secretary CEC ka la leit ban ïa kynduh ïa u Education Minister jong ka sorkar jylla u Rakkam A Sangma ha ka ophis treikam jong u ha Secretariat. Ha kane ka sngi la don ryngka ruh u Adviser ka myntri pule puthi ka sorkar jylla u Bah Himalaya Shangpliang.Ka seng ha kane ka jingïakynduh ka la ïoh ban ïakren bad pynpaw halor kane ka jingeh jong ki samla pule ki ban ïakhun ïa kane ka eksamin, hadien ka jingiakren bad ki nongïalam ka seng, na ka liang jong u Myntri ka pule puthi u la kular ba un shimkhia mardor ïa kane ka kam, bad ha khmat jong ki nongialam ka seng hi u la phone sha u Senior Director National Testing Agency (NTA) ban khmih bniah ïa kane ka kam bad ban pyntikna ba ki samla pule ka jylla ki dei ban ïoh thoh ïa kane ka eksamin hapoh ka jylla la jong.
title: UJOR KA KSU HA U MYNTRI PULE PUTHI HALOR KA EKSAMIN CSIR NET 2023

content: : Ki nonghikai hapoh ka jingïalam ong u MLA ka VPP na Mawlai Constituecy u Bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang ha ka sngi Palei ki la ïathuh ba ka jingïakhun mukotduma ha Supreme Court ka dang ïaid mynta hapdeng ki nonghikai bad ka Sorkar ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynmih ïa ka jingpynbna kaba khang ïa ki nonghikai ban ïashim bynta ha ka jylli jong ka saiñpyrthei.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Marbaniang u la pyntip ba ha u snem 2022, ki nonghikai ki la ujor sha ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court pyrshah ïa ka Sorkar hadien ba ka la pynmih ïa ka jingpynbna ba la khang ïa ki nonghikai ban ïashim bynta ha ka saiñpyrthei.U Bah Marbaniang u la ong hadien ba ka Sorkar ka la pynmih ïa kane ka jingpynbna, ki nonghikai ki la pyrshang ban ïakynduh markhmat ïa ka Sorkar ban pynshai bad ban batai bad kumjuh ruh ban dawa ïa ka Sorkar ba kan weng noh ïa kane ka jingpynbna hynrei ka Sorkar kam shym la sngap satia ïa kane ka jingkyrpad.“Ngi la ïoh ïa ki jingkren jong u Myntri Rangbah uba ong lada ki nonghikai ki pyrshah ïa ka jingbthah jong ka Sorkar ki lah ban mudui sha ka Ingbishar bad kane ka la pynlong ïa ngi ban ujor sha ka Ingbishar Meghalaya Court ha kaba ka Ingbishar ka la pynksan ïa ngi,” la ïathuh u Bah Marbaniang.U Bah Marbaniang u la ong, hadien ba ka Single Bench ka la pynksan ïa ki nonghikai, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la ujor sha ka Division Bench ha u snem 2023 bad sa shisien ka Ingbishar ka la pynksan biang ïa ki nonghikai.“Ha u snem 2023, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la leit ban tied ïa ka jingkhang jong ka Ingbishar Supreme Court bad ka jingshong bishar banyngkong eh ka la long ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai bad ka mukotduma ka dang ïaid shakhmat ha Supreme Court” u la bynrap.U la ong ba ka mukotduma kam dei satia hapdeng u riew shimet pyrshah ïa ka Sorkar hynrei ka dei ka mukotduma hapdeng ki nonghikai jong ka Jylla Meghalaya pyrshah ka jingpynbna jong ka Sorkar.“Kum ki nonghikai, ngi ruh ngi don ka hok ban thep vote, ka hok ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon bad ban kitkam ha ki seng saiñpyrthei bad lada ki leit katkum ka histori jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ki don bun ki nonghikai kiba la ïakhun ïa ki elekshon  bad ki la jop bad ki la noh synñiang shikatdei eh sha ka roi ka par jong ka jylla,” la ong u Bah Marbaniang.Shuh shuh u la ong ba kane ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Sorkar Jylla kan pynthikna ba ki pateng ki ban sa wan kin ïoh ïa ka lad ban ïakhun ïa ki elekshon.U la bynrap ba ka kyndon jong ka UGC ka ong, “kum shi bynta ka kam ba ngi trei, ka dei ka kamram jong ngi ban hikai bad ban tynrong ïa ka jingkitkhlieh,”“Tang hadien ka jingpynmih ïa ka Service Book da ka Sorkar Meghalaya, ka jylla ka la shim kylliang na ka Jylla Assam ka bym khang satia ïa ki nonghikai hynrei dei tang hapoh khyndiat snem ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la wanrah ïa ka aiñ kaba khang ïa ki nonghikai ban ïashim bynta ha ka saiñpyrthei,” u la bynrap.
title: KUM KI NONGHIKAI, NGI DON KA HOK BAN THEP VOTE, BAN ÏAKHUN ELEKSHON: BRIGHSTARWELL MARBANIANG

content: : Ka shnong Kharang, kaba hap hapoh ka Mawkynrew Community and Rural Development Block ha ka sien kaba ar kan sa pynlong biang ia ka jingiakob ñiah kali bulbering na ka bynta ka kynhun jong ki shynrang bad ka kynhun jong ki kynthei.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u General Secretary jong ka Kharang Sports and Social Welfare Club (KSSWC) Bah Badonnam Kharbihthai u la iathuh ba ia kane ka jingiakob niah kali bulbering yn sa pynlong ha ka 20 tarik, Kyllangkot, 2024.Ka khusnam na ka bynta ki shynrang kan long T. 30 hajar ia ka kynhun lahduh, T. 20 hajar ia ka kynhun kaba wan baar bad T. 10 hajar ia ka kynhun kaba wan balai.Katba ka khusnam na ka bynta ki kynthei ka long, T. 10 hajar ia kiba iohrah ia ka nam lahduh, T. 5 hajar ia kiba wan baar bad T. 3 hajar ia ka kynhun kaba wan balai.Kan sa don ruh ka khusnam ba kyrpang ban ai sha ka kali bulbering kaba la shna itynnat ha kane ka jingiakob.
title: PYNIM KA SHNONG KHARANG ÏA KA NIAH KALI BULBERING, KA JINGÏALEHKAI KI KHYNNAH

content: Ka Bouncer Association of Meghalaya ha ka sngi Palei ka la pynkut noh ïa ka Shillong Arm Fight 2023, All India Arm Wrestling Championship kaba ar sngi lynter kaba la long ha u Soso Tham Auditorium ha kaba la iashim bynta da ki nongïalehkai na kylleng ka Ri.Ia kane ka rynsan iakob iakhun kti ba la pynlong da ka People’s Federation of Arm Wrestling India (PFAWI) ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka Bouncer Association of Meghalaya (BAM) lem bad ka Treilang Welfare Society (TWS) da ka jingkyshan jong ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs jong ka Sorkar Jylla la sakhi lang da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma.Ha ka result jong ka jingiakob ki shynrang, u Dipankar Mech na Assam u la ïoh khur ïa ka nam Champion of the Champions, katba ha ka liang jong ki kynthei la ioh rah da ka Yogesh Choudhury na Haryana.Ha kane ka jingiakob la pynïakhun ruh ïa kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhot met ha ka sitting category ha kaba u Hubert L. Nonglait u la jop ia ka kyrdan banyngkong, u Graham Jones Kharbani ia ka kyrdan kaba ar bad u Name Nangsan Kupar K.Warjri ha ka kyrdan ba lai. Ha ka standing category u Johnborlang Pyngrope, u Nihi Lamare bad u Marelad Kanai ki la ioh khur ïa ka jingjop. Kiwei pat ki nongjop ki long u Daniel Nongkhlaw, u Hubert Paliar bad u Banshanlang Terang ha ka jingiakhun kaba 55 kilo. U Nilay Sankar, u Razedul Ali bad u Revel Born Star Snaitang ha ka kyrdan kaba 65 kilo. U Deepankar Mech, u Jackson Lyngdoh bad u Alexion Roy Mylliem Umlong ha ka kyrdan kaba 75 kilo; u Tridip Medhi, u Alan S Marbaniang bad u Kishore Chettri ha ka kyrdan kaba 85 kilo. U Bakham Maian Khongwir, u Banbatjuban Khongwir bad u Ishan Kashyap ha ka kyrdan kaba 85 kilo shaneng.Haba phai pat sha ka liang jong ki kynthei, ka Angelis Kharumnuid, ka Airikmen Shabong bad ka Milartita Lyngdoh Nongbri ki la jop ha ka kyrdan kaba 50 kilo. Ka Bandarika Kharkongor, ka Senebi Syngkli bad ka Angel Mary Mylliem Umlong ki la jop ha ka kyrdan kaba 55 kilo.  Ka Wandalin Syiemiong, ka Payal Bhommik bad ka Olivia Dkhar ha ka kyrdan kaba 60 kilo. Ka Margareth Pathaw, ka Aiboklin Rina bad ka Yimri Jagoi ki la jop ha ka kyrdan kaba 65 kilo. Ka Yogesh Chaudhury, ka Soram Rani bad ka Ribasuk Lyngdoh Mawphlang ki la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba 65 kilo shaneng.
title: ALL INDIA ARM WRESTLING C’SHIP: LAH DUH U DIPANKAR MECH BAD KA YOGESH CHOUDHURY

content: Ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit ha ka sngi Palei ka la mih ban ieng pyrshah halor ki jingkren jong u MP ka TMC u kalyan Banerjee pyrshah ïa u Vice President u Jagdeep Dhankar hapoh ka Parliament bad katba u Kalyan Banerjee u MP uba mihkhmat ïa ka TMC u dang pyrthuh bud ïa u Vice President bad u Rahul Gandhi u nang ring dur hangta.Ki dkhot ka BJP da kawei ka sur ki la pynrem ïa kane ka kampoh jong ka TMC.U nongai ktien ba khmat jong ka BJP Meghalaya u Bah Mariahom Kharkhrang u la ong “ngi ïalum hangne ym dei tang kum ka dak jong ka jingpyrshah ïa kaei kaba la jia, hynrei ban pynsngew ha u Vice President jong ka ri India baroh kawei ba ngim sngewïahap bad kane ka jingjia. Baroh ki don ka mon laitluid ban kren na bynta lade hynrei ngi dei ban kynmaw ïa kawei,ba ngi dei ban don nongrim ban kren da ka jingkitkhlieh bad ym ban shu kren klumar ne pyrthuh bud kumba ju leh ka liang pyrshah naka por sha ka por.”“Ka jingthmu jong ki MP ka Liang Pyrshah ban kren bein ïa u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri ka pynlong ïa ki dkhot ban kren tam pud ha kane ka kynti. Ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki ka lah poi shaduh u pud ba kim sngewthuh shuh ban pynïapher ïa ka jingpyrshah bad ka jingpynthohbria bad kane ka pynlehrain ïa ka ri hi baroh kawei, haduh ba la i thamula ban peit ne ban sngap,” la bynrap u Bah Kharkhrang.
title: THER KA BJP MEGHALAYA PRADESH ÏA KA TMC BA PYNHIAR DOR ÏA U VICE PRESIDENT

content: : Ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Palei ka la ong ba ym pat don satia mano mano ruh ba ngat biang ha u khñiang jingpang COVID ha ka jylla ïa mynta.Ka Myntri ha kane ka sngi ka la lum jingïalang ïa ki Ophisar jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ban ïapyrkhat halor ka jinglong jingman ha ka ri hadien ba u khñiang jingpang COVID u la sdang ban sar ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka ri.“Kumba ka long mynta, ka World Health Organization ka la pynbna ba la mih pyrthei sa uwei u khñiang jingpang ba thymmai.  Watla ïa une u khñiang jingpang ba thymmai la lap naduh kaba sdang jong une u snem hynrei la shem ba na ki dak ki shin um long uba khlaiñbor,’ la ong ka Myntri.Da kaba pynpaw ba ki paidbah kim dei ban sheptieng, ka Myntri ka la ong ba ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka la peitngor bha lyngba ka Integrated Disease Surveillance Program jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah.Hynrei, na ka liang jong ki bor ba dei peit ïa ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ki la ai jingmut, ha kum kine ki por ba la dei ki aiom lehkmen ba ïalum briew, ki paidbah ki dei ban deng da ki Mask haba ki leit shano shano, ban thet ïa ki kti, bad ban bud ïa ki kyndon ïada katba lah.  Kito kiba don ïa ki jingpang kum ka hypertension, diabetes, kidney bad kiwei kiwei, ki dei ban shim lypa ïa ki lad jingïada lada ki ïoh ïa ka jingpang baiong khlieh suhkhriat.
title: DENG ÏA KI MASK HA KI JAKA PAIDBAH, BTHAH KA MYNTRI KA KOIT KA KHIAH

content: U Bah Ronaldstone Syiem uba dei u Corespondent jong ka Kotkhubor The Shillongtimes na West Khasi Hills District u la khladnoh na kane ka sla pyrthei ha ka step Sngi Thohdieng ha Woodland Hospital, Shillong hadien ba ka jingshitom ka la ban ïa u mynta la katto katne bnai.U Bah Ronald u dei u khun  jong  ka Kong Rakhelda Syiem bad u Bah Kresmohon Diengdoh na ka shnong Mawkhlam-Nongpyndeng .La kha ïa u Bah Ronald ha ka 6 tarik, Nailar, 1986 bad  u shong u sah ha ka shnong Upper New- Nongstoiñ bad la ka kurim ka Kong Ba-ailang Lyngdoh Nonglait lem bad u khun shynrang ba marwei.U dei uwei napdeng ki nongthoh khubor uba la paw bad ih bha ha kane ka kam bad u la don bynta shibun ban noh synniang ha ka imlang sahlang lyngba ka kam pathai khubor kaba u la shakri mynta la palat 14 snem.Na ka liang ka Journalist Association of West Khasi Hills (JAWKH) ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih kthang halor ka jingkhlad kyndit jong une u dkhot bad u para nongthoh khubor napoh ka District kaba la long shisha ka jingduhnong  kaba khraw ïa ka kynhun ki nongpathai khubor jong ka District bad ka Jylla hi baroh kawei.Ka Association ka phah ïa u kyrwoh sngewlem sha ki bahaiing hasem, sha ka kurim bad sha u khun ba ai ba u Blei un pyntngen ïa ki khamtam ha kum kane ka por ba u lyoh badum u la wan kah ïa ka ïing sem ka jong ki.Ki bahaing hasem ki la pyntip ba ka jingleit ontep donburom ïa ka met ba dang sah jong u Bah Ronal kan long ha ka 24tarik mynta u bnai ha u lum jingtep ka Balang Presbyterian Nongpyndeng ha ka por 2.30 baje nohphai sngi.Ka Shillong Press Club bad ka kynhun ki nongthoh khubor na Ribhoi District ki pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih kaba kthang tang shu ïoh jingtip halor ka jingkhladnoh jong u Bah Ronaldstone Syiem.Ha u kyrwoh  sngewlem ba la phah sha ka kurim jong u Bah Ronald, ka Kong Baailang Lyngdoh Nonglait, ka Shillong Press Club bad ki nongthoh khubor ka Ribhoi District ki la ñiew tang ruh ïa u synniang u bynhei ba u Bah Ronald u la noh sha u sup u thiar jong ki lad pathai jingtip naduh ba u la sdang ban trei kum u nongthoh khubor jong ka Kotkhubor Kynjatshai bad ha All India Radio la palat 15 snem.
title: KHLADNOH U BAH RONALD U NONGTHOH KHUBOR KA THE SHILLONG TIMES

content: Ka Meghalaya Body Building and Fitness Federation ka la phah ia u kyrwoh ai khublei sha ki nongjop kiba la mihkhmat ia ka Association sha ka World Fitness Federation Mr. and Ms. India 2023 kaba la long ha nongbah Jaipur, Rajasthan naduh ka 15 tarik haduh ka 17 tarik, Nohprah, 2023.Ha kane ka rynsan iakop pyni dohksah ba la pynlong da ka World Fitness Federation (WFF) Rajasthan ka samla Whitney Maqueen Lyngdoh Mawphlang kaba la long ka lahduh ha ka Women’s Sports Model Category bad ioh khur takma rupa ha ka Bikini Model Category, katba ka samla Sawakani Lakiang ka la ioh khur ia ka takma rupa ha ka Women’s Sports Model Category bad ia ka takma rnong ha ka Bikini Model Cateory.Ha ka liang jong ki shynrang, u Vivian Pajuh u la ioh khur ia ka takma rupa ha ka Men’s Bermuda Beach Model Short category, u Ebenesar Khongsit u la ioh khur ia ka takma rnong ha ka Men’s Body Building Fitness Category, u Wanraplang Thubru u la ioh khur ia ka takma rnong ha ka Men’s Body Building Super Body Category, u Pyndapbor Dkhat u la ioh khur ia ka takma rnong ha ka Men’s Body Building Junior Category, u BadonKupar Kharbhih u la ioh rung ha ka kyrdan bahynriew ha ka Men’s Body Building Athletic Category lem bad u Lalremmawia Sangma.
title: ÏOH TAKMA KA WHITNEY, SAWAKANI BAD KIWEI HA KA WFF MR & MS INDIA 2023

content: Ka BJP Mahila Morcha ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la rakhe ïa ka Christmas bad khynnah ba la ri bad sumar da ka Gods Dream Home kaba don ha ka shnong Pynthorbah ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah AL Hek uba long ruh u MLA jong ka BJP. u Chief Spokesperson jong ka BJP u Bah M. Kharkrang, ka President jong ka Mahila Morcha ka Kong Sukhi Pariat bad kiwei kiwei ki nongkitkam jong ka party.Ha kane ka jingrakhe la pynlong ïa ka jingduwai kaba kyrpang na u Pastor Crosslin Marbaniang bad la sam ruh ïa ki jingai sngewbha sha ki khynnah kiba la ri ha kane ka ing ri khunswet.Ha kajuh ka por, ka BJP Youth Wing, BJYM ka la rakhe ïa ka Christmas ha Reid Chest, TB Hospital Shillong ha kaba ki nongïalam jong ka seng ki la ïakynduh ruh ïa ki nongthiah pang, ki bahaiing bad ïa ki nongtrei jong kane ka jaka ai jingsumar.U President ka BJYM, u la ïasyllok bad wad jingtip ïa ka jingduna ba ki nongpang ki ïakynduh na ka por sha ka por.“U Myntri Rangbahduh jong ka ri u Narendra Modi bad u National President ka BJP u J.P Nadda ki don ïa ka jingthmu ban buddien halor ka jingbuh ïa ki Awareness Program bapher bapher ban pynduh tyllong ïa ka jingpang Tuberculosis lyngba ka TB Mukt Bharat Abhiyan shuwa u snem 2025,” la ong u nongïalam ka BJYM.U la kyrpad ïa ki nongpang ba kin wad jingtip shaphang ka skhim kaba la ai sha ki briew kiba don ïa ka jingpang TB ïa kaba la tip kum ka Nikshay Poshan Yojana Scheme kaba lah ban ai jingïarap ïa ka jingtei ka koit ka khiah ïa ki briew ba don ïa ka jingpang TB.Ha kane ka sngi, ka BJP Schedule Tribe (ST) Morcha ka la pynlong ïa ka jingrakhe bad ki khynnah baduk ha Anganwadi Centre, Shillong cantonment da ka jingsakhi lang jong ka ST Morcha State General Secretary ka Kong Euneescy Khyriem, ka Vice President  ka Kong Priambada Blah bad ka ST Morcha Shillong City President ka Kong Wanpynbiang Tariang.La sam ruh ïa ki jingai sngewbha bad ïa kiwei pat ki jingai sngewbha ba ki khynnah kin dup lah ban pyndonkam ha ka pule puthi.
title: RAKHE KA BJP ÏA KA CHRISTMAS BAD KI KHYNNAH BA LA RI DA KA GOD’S DREAM HOME

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) ha ka sngi baar ki la aiti da ka dorkhas ha u Director jong ka tnat Pynroi Sor ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah E. Kharmalki ban kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar ba kan ithuh ïa u Motphran kum u mot sahnam.“Ïa une u mot sahnam la tei na ka bynta ki 26 ngut ki rangbah Khasi (Labour Coprs) kiba la len lade ban leit ïashim bynta ha ka thma bah ba nyngkong ha ka ri France ban kit ïa ki tiar siat, ki suloi bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar ba donkam jong ki shipai Phareng bad la plie ïa une u mot sahnam ha u snem 1927,” la ong ka seng ha ka dorkhas.“Ka Seng ka sngew ba dei ban ïada bad ban pynneh pynsah ïa une u mot sahnam da ka aiñ ban kynmaw burom ïa ka jingaiti lut jong ki rangbah Khasi ha ka thma bah Banyngkong,” ong ka dorkhas bad bynrap, “ngi kyrpad ïa ka tnat Pynroi Sor ba kan pynbna ïa u Motphran kum ka jingtei u menbarim hapoh ka Meghalaya Heritage Act, 2011 and Regulation, 2012.
title: DAWA KA HANM ÏA KA SORKAR BAN ITHUH ÏA U MOTPHRAN DA KA AIÑ

content: Ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar Shnong Nongthymmai Pyllun, Shillong kaba la shong pyrkhat kam ha kine ki sngi ba ladep ka la rai ban kyntu ïa ka Khasi Hills Autonmous District Council (KHADC) ha kaba ïadei bad ka Delimitaion of MDC Constituency ban ap shuwa shipor bad ban ïa ïoh ban mir jingmut lang khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa baroh lang.“Katkum ka jingsngewthuh ba ka don ka jingthmu ban wanrah ïa ka jingphiah bad pynbun Constituency lyngba ka Review Committee on Sixth Schedule ka ban wanrah ha kane ka Dorbar Tlang jong ka Parliament, kumta ngi sngewdei ban da ïa pyrkhat bha ïa kane ka kam khnang ba kan ym wanrah ïa ki jingeh hadien habud,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President ka SNSNP u Bah Bantylli L. Narry.“Ka Synjuk ka kyrshan tyngeh bad ai mynsiem ïa ka jingdawa ki ASHA ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkiew ïa ka tulop jong ki.  Ka kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba kan kham pynkloi ïa kane ka kam namar ngi sngewthuh ïa ka jingkordor ka jingtrei jong ki,” la ong ka Synjuk.Ka Synjuk ka la shim ruh ïa ka rai ban weng noh na ka jinglong dkhot na ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar Shnong ka Bri U Hynniewtrep (SKNSBH) tad haduh da ïoh ïa ki nongkitkam ba pura bad kiba la ïoh ïa ka jingpynkupbor na ki Dorbar Shnong jong ki.“Kumta ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka kam ka kyntu bad pynpaw sha ka sorkar ne kino kino ki bor synshar ba ha kano kano ka kam ba ka SKNSBH ka shim rai ka Synjuk kan ym lah ban pdiang khlem da ïoh ban ïa puson bad rai lang,” la ong ka Synjuk.
title: KYRPAD KA SNSNP ÏA KA KHADC BAN AP SHWA SHIPOR ÏA KA JINGPHIAH CONSTITUENCY

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Cornad Kongkal Sangma ha ka sngi Baar u la ïathuh ba ka Kynhun Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la mynjur ban ym kheiñ satia ïa ki nongaplai kam kiba la heh rta hapoh ka Department of Textiles.Naduh u snem 2015, ka Department of Textiles ka la pynsangeh ïa ki jingthungkam bad ïa ki eksamin.  Kane ka la wanra jingeh khamtam ïa kito kiba la pyndep ïa ki jingshah hikai pyntbit jong ka Sericulture & Handloom Sector, kï la ïoh baibam ruh na ka Sorkar. Wat hapdeng ka jingpyndep pura ïa ki jingpule bapher bapher, ki nongaplai kam ki la hap ban shu ap sah ïa ki jingshah thungkam, ïa kaba yn hap ban leh katkum ka jingbishar bniah.Haba kren halor ka mat, u Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ruh ba jingpynbeit ïa ka jingsahteng ban thungkam ka la jia naduh u snem 2015.  Ban weng ïa kane ka jingeh, ka Kynhun Myntri ka la rai ban pynlong ïa ki eksamin, da kaba ailad ïa ki nongaplai kam kiba la pyndep ïa ki jingshah hikai pyntbit ha ki jaka pule ba la ïoh jingithuh da ka tnat ki lah ban aplai ïa ka kam.  Ïa ka jingthungkam yn leh da ka lynti kaba pyrkhing bha.Ka jingeh kaba mih mynta ka long ba 115 na ki 196 kiba la pyndep ïa ka jingshah hikai pyntbit ki dei kiba la palat ka rta thungkam.  Da kaba wanrah ïa ki kyndon kiba kyrpang, ka Kynhun Myntri ka la shim ïa kawei ka rai ban ym kheiñ shuh ïa ka rta jong kito kiba la palat ka rta thungkam hapoh ka Department of Textiles.La khmihlynti ba kane ka rai kan plie ïa ka jingkhang na ka bynta ki nongthepkam kiba la don jingtbit kiba la ïai ap khmihlynti ban ïoh rung kam hapoh ka tnat.U Myntri Rangbah u la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingkyrmen ba kane ka sienjam kan pynmyntoi ym tang ïa ki nongaplai kam kiba la heh ka rta hynrei kan pynkylla dur ruh wat ïa ka Department of Textiles.
title: MYNJUR KA SORKAR BAN YM KHEIÑ ÏA KA RTA KIBA LADEP PYNTBIT BAN RUNGKAM HA DEPARTMENT OF TEXTILES

content: : Ka Kynhun Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Baar ka la mynjur ïa ka Captain Williamson Sangma State University Amendment Bill (Ordinance), kaba plie lad ban pynïar ïa ki jingpule hapoh kane ka University.Kane ka jingpynbeit thymmai ka long ban pynrung ïa ki kyndon jong ka University Grants Commission (UGS) kiba ïadei bad ka State University.Ïa ka Captain Williamson Sangma State University, kaba long ka skulbah banyngkong eh jong ka Jylla Meghalaya, la plie paidbah ha ka 14 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2023, da u Myntri Rangbah Conrad Sangma. Ïa kane ka skulbah la suit la shor ha ka kyrteng jong u Myntri Rangbah banyngkong eh jong ka Jylla Meghalaya, ïa kaba la sdang nyngkong eh tang kum ka Technical University, da kaba plie ïa ki jingpule ha ki lain bapher bapher.Ban weng ïa ki jingeh ki ban sa wan ha ki snem kiba hadien ka Kynhun Myntri ka la shim da ka rai ban pynkylla noh sha ka skulbah pura jong ka jylla.
title: BSUT KA SORKAR DA KI KYNDON KA UGC HA KA CAPT. WILLIAMSON SANGMA STATE UNIVERSITY

content: : Ka tnat Kam Pohing jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi baar ka la pynmih ia ka hukum lyngba u Secretary Bah Cyril VD Diengdoh ban pynkynriah kam ia u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaintia Hills District u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa kum u Superintendent of Police jong ka Ri-Bhoi District, katba ia u Giri Prasad M. uba dei u Superintendent of Police ba mynta jong ka Ri Bhoi District la pynkynriah kum u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaintia Hills District.Kane ka jingpynkynriah kam ia u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa na East Jaiñtia Hills District ka la iatakhuh lang bad ka hukum ba la pynmih da ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court kaba la pynmih ha ka sngi baar kaba la bthah ia ka tnat Kam Pohing bad ia ka ophis u Director General of Police (DGP) ban pynkynriahkam mardor ia u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa halor ka jingbym lah jong u ban tehlakam ia ka jingtih dewiong be-aiñ ha East Jaintia Hills District.Ka Iingbishar ka la shim ia kane ka rai hadien ba la shong bishar ia ka PIL No. 2/2022 kaba iadei bad ka jingujor Suo Motu halor ka kam tih dewiong beaiñ ha ka jylla.  Ka Iingbishar ka la pynpaw ba Jagpal Singh Dhanao la pyntip ba ula shakri ha East Jaintia Hills naduh u snem 2021, bad kumta u la dei ban tip bha ha kaba iadei bad ka jinglong jingman hapoh ka district.“Ka 19th interim report ka pynpaw ba u Dhanoa um lah ban tehlakam ha kaba iadei bad kane ka kam beaiñ,” la ong ka Iingbishar.  Ka Iingbishar ka la ailad ruh ia ka Sorkar Jylla ban ai jubab halor ka 19th Interim Report bad ia mynta ka Iingbishar kam shim satia ia ki sienjam bad ki jingpynkhein kyndon.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynkynriah kam, u C.V.S Reddy, uba dei mynta u Deputy Inspector General of Police (WR), Tura u la shah pynkynriah kum u Deputy Inspector General of Police, CID, Shillong, u Siddharth Kumar Ambedkar uba dei u Superintendent of Police, East Garo Hills District u la shah pynkynriah ban shimti kum u Commandant, 5th MLP Bn, Samanda, u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa uba dei u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaintia Hills District u la shah pynkynriah kum u Superintendent of Police jong ka Ri-Bhoi District.  U Giri Prasad M, uba dei u Superintendent of Police jong ka Ri-Bhoi District u la shah pynkynriah ban shimti kum u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaintia Hills District, Khliehriat.Saw ngut ki ophisar IPS kiba la pyndep ia ka jingshah hikai pyntbit ha SVP, NPA, Hyderabad, ba kynthup ia u Naman Kumar la thung kum u Sub Divisional Police Officer (SDPO), Raksamgre, u Dewansh Pandey, kum u Sub Divisional Police Officer (SDPO), Amlarem, u Ishan Gupta kum u Sub Divisional Police Officer (SDP0), Dadenggre bad u Ashish kum u Sub Divisional Police Officer(SDPO), Sadar, Shillong.U Bah Stephen A. Rynjah, uba dei u Superintendent of Police, Anti Infiltration Directorate, Tura  la shah pynkynriah kam kum u Superintendent of Police, East Garo Hills District, u Billy Graham Marak, uba dei u Commandant jong ka 5th MLP Bn, Samanda u la shah pynkynriah kum u Superintendent of Police, Anti Infiltration Directorate, Tura, u Bah Banraplang Jyrwa, uba dei u Additional Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaintia Hills u la shah pynkynriah kum u Deputy Commandant jong ka 6th MLP Bn, Umran.  U Bah Baniateilang Diengngan uba dei u Deputy Commandant jong ka 6th MLP Bn, Umran u la shah pynkynriah kum u Additional Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaintia Hills.U Bah Gilbert Amrstrong Lyngdoh Marshillong, uba dei u Assistant Commandant jong ka 3rd MLP Bn, Sahbsein u la sahh pynkynriah kum u Assistant Commandant jong ka 4th MLP Bn, Sohpian, katba u Nawab Thorem uba dei u Deputy Superintendent of Police, CID, Shillong u la shah pynkynriah kum u Deputy Superintendent of Police, Anti Infiltration Directorate, Shillong.
title: SHA RIBHOI DISTRICT PYNKYNRIAH KA TNAT KAM POHÏING IA U SP KA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS

content: Shillong, Nohprah 19 : Ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) kaba long ka shatri jong ka UDP bad HSPDP ha ka sngi baar ka la pynbna paidbah ban pynieng da u nongïalam barim ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin kum u kyrtong ha ka Elekshon Lok Sabha 2024 na Shillong Parliamentary Seat.Ia kane ka rai, la pynbna da ka RDA hadien ba wai ka jingialang kaba la long ha nongbah Shillong.U chariman ka RDA Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba u Bah Rorbertjune un iakhun ha ka shab jong ka Bom.
title: DA U BAH ROBERT JUNE KHARJAHRIN SEI KA RDA BAN ÏAKHUN ELEKSHON MP

content: Ka tnat Kam Pohing (Political) jong ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba u Chief Secretary u Bah DP Wahlang ka la pyntip ha kaba iadei bad ka rai jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam u Himata Biswa Sarma bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Meghalaya u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Assam halor ka ishu ia pynbeit pud kaba la long ha ka 30 tarik, Nailar, 2023, u Lat ka Jylla u la pynjlan ia ka por ban phah ia ki kaiphod sorjamin sha ka Sorkar Jylla da ki lai tylli ki Regional Committee haduh ka 31 tarik mynta u bnai.
title: HADUH 31 TARIK NOHPRAH, AI POR KA SORKAR ÏA KI RC BAN PHAH KAIPHOD

content: : Ka tnat Kam Pohing jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi baar ka la pynmih ia ka hukum lyngba u Secretary Bah Cyril.V.D.Diengdoh ban kyntiew kyrdan ia ki Ophisar IPS hapoh ka Jylla ka ban treikam naduh ka 1 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024.Katkum kane ka hukum, lai ngut ki ophisar IPS kiba la shah kyntiew sha ka kyrdan Deputy Inspector General of Police ki long u Dr Raghvendra Kumar M.G, u Ramesh Singh bad ka Kong Claudia Anne Lyngwa.U Dr Raghvendra Kumar M.G un shimti kum u Deputy Inspector General of Police (WR), Tura katba ka Kong Claudia Anne Lyngwa kan shimti kum ka Deputy Inspector General of Police (TAP), Shillong.Arngut kiwei pat ki ophisar ISP kiba la shah kyntiew kyrdan ki long u Jerry F.K Marak u ban dang bteng ban bat kum u Inspector General of Prisons, Shillong bad ka Jubi G.Momin, kan dang bteng kum ka Superintendent of Police, Anti Infiltration Directorate, Shillong.San ngut kiwei pat ki Ophisar IPS kiba la shah kyntiew kyrdan ki long u Priyanshu Pandey, u Deepak Kumar Palecha, u Bah Herbert G Lyngdoh u ban dang bteng kum u Superintendent of Police, Anti Infiltration Directorate, Shillong, ka Mary Gnora T. Sangma, ka ban dang bteng kum ka Principal jong ka Police Training School, Umran, u Bah Vivek Syiem, u ban dang bteng kum u Superintendent of Police, City ka East Khasi Hills, Shillong.Lai ngut ki ophisar IPS kiba la shah kyntiew kyrdan ki long u Pawal Swapnil Vasantrao, u Pankaj Kumar Rasgania bad u Vikash Varma.  Da kane ka jingkyntiew kyrdan, u Pawal Swapnil Vasantrao un shimti kum Commandant jong ka 1st MLP Bn, Mawiong, Pankaj Kumar Rasgania un shimti kum u Superintendent of Police, CID, Shillong u Vikash Varma, un shimti kum u Superintendent of Police, SCRB, Shillong.
title: SHIMTI U R. MUTHU BAD U DP MARAK KUM KI IGP, KA KONG CA LYNGWA KUM KA DIG

content: Ka Meghalaya Education Commision ha ka sngi Balang ka la pan jingmut na ka Meghalaya State Olympics Association (MSOA) shaphang ka jingkynthup ia ka jingialehkai Sports ha ka pule puthi na ka bynta jingmyntoi ki khynnah bad ki samla pule.U Working President jong ka MSOA, Bah John F. Kharshiing, uba la iashim bynta ha ka jingiaphylliew jingmut ba la pynlong da ka State Education Commission ha DERT Annexure Conference Hall, Shillong u la pynpaw ba ka jingthmu ka long ban kyntu ia ka commission ban pyrkhat lang kaei ba kin lah ban leh na ka liang jong ki ban pynshlur ka jingkiew ka Sports lem bad ka pule puthi.  Kane ruh ka lah ban pynroi ka jingshim bynta ba bun, naduh ki khynnah ba dang 6 snem shaneng haduh kiba heh.U Bah Kharshiing u la pyni da ka Presentation kaba la ai kyrteng, “Education and Sports: A Balanced Approach” bad kren ruh shaphang ka jingdonkam jong ka Sports ban tei ia ka met, ka pyrkhat pyrdaiñ bad ki jinglongbriew ba tei ia u briew shimet. U Bah Kharshiing u la banjur ia ka jingdon ka Meghalaya Sports Policy, 2019 bad Meghalaya Youth Policy, 2021.U Bah Kharshiing, u la ai kopi ia ka Presentation bad ka Meghalaya Sports Policy, 2019 sha ka Chairperson jong ka Commission ka Professor SM Sungoh kaba dei ka Head jong ka Department of Education, North Eastern Hill University ha ka jingdon lang jong ki dkhot ka Commission.U Working President ka MSOA, u la buh hakhmat ka Education Commission ia ki mat ban pynbiang ki jaka lehkai ba biang bad ban tip la ki skul aiu kiba biang ia ki jaka ialehkai, ka jingshim bynta ban lap ki khynnah don sap ha ka Sports ka jylla, jingthung kam ia ki Coaches ba la biang ka kyrdan jingtip, ka jingdon jong ki ‘physical education Teachers’ na ka bynta baroh ki 15,000 skul ha Meghalaya, ka jingdon ki Sports Specialist & Professionals, ki Sports Psychologist, ki Physiotherapist, ki Masuers, ki Sports Hostels, ki Olympians na ka bynta ka Sports Science center, ka jingdon jong ki sports schools ha manla ki district, ban ai Sports Marks ia ki nonglehkai ba dang pule, ka bhah kam kyrpang na ka bynta kiba jop khusnam, ka jingkiew ha ka song pisa, ka jingpynbeit ia ka Sports University Acts, ka por ba la buh khnang na ka bynta sport ha ki skul, ka Health Checkup ba shisien shiteng snem lyngba ka MHIS ia ki khynnah skul, ka jingpynurlong ki Sports Program, jingwad bniah ia ka rukom leh ki ri Scandinavian kiba la lah ban pynheh pynsan ia ki khynnah ban triem ha ka pyrkhat pyrdain bad ka jingai khusnam lyngba ka YESS Meghalaya na ka bynta ki skul Clubs bad Districts, lyngba YESS Meghalaya program lah ban pynshlur ki jait jinglehkai Sports ba kan khring ia ki khynnah bad ki kmie ki kpa ban shim ia ka Sports kum ka lad kamai ja kpoh.Ka Prof SM Sungoh, ka la ai khublei ia ka MSOA na ka bynta ka Presentation bad ong ruh ba ki mat ba la iathir iatai ha kane ka sngi kan sa rah sha ka Committee ba dei peit ia kane ka phang bad hadien katan yn sa phah ia ki jingai jingmut sha ka Sorkar Jylla.
title: PAN JINGMUT KA EDUCATION COMMISSION NA KA MSOA BAN KYNTHUP ÏA KA SPORTS HA KA PULE PUTHI

content: Ka Sohlap Shella Ecotourism Cooperative Society Ltd (SSECSL) kum shi bynta ka jingrakhe ïa ka National Energy Conservation Day ka la pynlong ïa ki prokram ba kyrpang kum ka jingpynshlur bad ai mynsiem ïa ki paidbah ka thaiñ Shella ban ri bad sumar ïa ka mei mariang bad ïa ka jingitynnad kiba don sawdong jong ka khnang ba kan long ka jingkyrkhu na ka bynta ki pateng ki ban sa wanHa kane ka sngi ka Society ka la pynlong ïa ka prokram kum ka Strength Challenge, Trekking cum Camping bad E-Cycle Show Case kiba long kum ki nuksa ban pynshlur ïa ki paidbah ban pyndonkam.Ka society ka ai khublei kyrpang ruh ïa ki riew rangbah jong ka shnong kiba la wan ban ai mynsiem, u Acting Wahadadar ka Shella Confederacy u Bah Komen Laitmon bad kumjuh juh ïa u Bah Benny Warjri uba la long u Resource Person ha kane ka sngi kynthup ruh ïa ka Shangkai Tours and Travel bad Sabdat Club kiba long ki Synjuk ban ïasnohkti lang ban pynlong ïa kane ka prokram. Kane ka long katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Secretary jong ka Sohlap Shella Ecotourism Cooperative Society Ltd u Bah Bansynshar Ora.
title: PYNSNGEWTHUH KA SSECSL BAN PYNNEH PYNSAH ÏA KI SAWDONG SAWKUN KA MARIANG

content: Ka BJP Meghalaya Mahila Morcha ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynrem jur ïa ka jingshah pynïaid lyngkhuid kawei ka kynthei riewlum ha ka shnong Belgavi, Karnataka.U National President jong ka BJP u Jagat Prakash Nadda u la pynrem ur ïa kane ka kam runar bad thung ruh ïa ka Fact Finding Committee kaba san ngut ki dkhot ban leit jurip ha ka jaka ba kawei ka kynthei riewlum ka la shah pynïaid lyngkhuid. La bthah ïa ka komiti ban phah kham kloi ïa ka kaiphod sha u National President jong ka party.Ka State President jong ka Meghalaya BJP Mahila Morcha ka Kong Sukhi Pariat ka la kynthoh halor kane ka jingjia da kaba ong, “ka Meghalaya BJP Mahila Morcha ka pynrem jur ïa kane ka jingleh riewkhlaw pyrshah ïa ka kynthei riewlum.
