Kane ka kam riewkhlaw pyrshah ïa ka burom jong ka kynthei ka long pyrshah ïa ki kyndon jong ki riewshai bad ka long kaba pangnud ïa ki nongshong shnong ban pyrkhat, ka paw shai ba ki kynthei ki long ki bym donbor ha ka jylla ba la synshar da ka Congress.”“Ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh namarba ka pynshlur ïa kum kine ki runar bad kiba don ïa ka jingmut jingpyrkhat kaba dang dum, ki nongleh kam bymman ki dei ban shah tian bishar hakhmat ki bor jong ka aiñ bad ka hok ka dei ban ieng rasong,” la bynrap ka Kong Pariat.“Ngi dkhot kynthei jong ka BJP, ngim lah ban pdiang kum ïa kine ki jingjia kiba mynta ki long tang ki nongsoi ha ki manla ki jylla ba la synshar da ka Congress. Ka party jong ngi kaba kyntiew sha ka shukit President jong ka ri ïa ka kynthei riewlum bad jied ruh ïa u riewlum kum u Myntri Rangbah jong ka jylla,” ka la ong.“Ha kawei pat ka liang, ngi don ki seng saiñpyrthei kum ka Congress kiba don ïa ka jingkhim jingmut ha ka pyrkhat pyrdaiñ ba ki kynthei bad ki riewlum kim don jingshngaiñ ha ki jaka kiba hap hapoh ka jingsynshar jong ki. Nga kyrpad ïa ki paid nongthep vote ba kin ai jingsneng ïa ka Congress ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha.  Kumba u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi u ong, “Congress Mukt Bharat, ka ri India kaba laitluid na ka Congress, ka dei ban urlong,” ka la pynkut.
title: SHAH PYNÏAID LYNGKHUID KA KYNTHEI RIEWLUM HA KARNATAKA, KA LONG KA JINGLEHRAIÑ, ONG KA BJP MEGHALAYA

content: U President jong ka Meghalaya Retired Deficit School Teachers Assocation (MRDSTA) u Babu E.D Nongsiang ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la ong ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ïalam da ka National People’s Party (NPP) kam dei ban khanglad ïa ki nonghikai ba kin ïashim bynta ha ka saiñpyrthei ne wat ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon lada ka Sorkar Jylla hi kam pat lah ban pynbiang lut ïa baroh ki jingsiew jingtda kumba ka leh ïa ki shakri Sorkar. “Kumba ka leh ka UGC hapoh NEHU ki shah ïa ki nonghikai ba kin ïakhun elekshon tangba ki hap ban shim shuti la kumno kumno shi snem, lada ki jop ki la leit sha ka kam nongmihkhmat bad lada ki rem ki leit phai biang sha University,” ong u Babu Nongsiang bad bynrap, “ngi ruh kham mynshwa ngi long kumta, lane, ka rul jong ka Sorkar kam ong shai ïa ngi ki nonghikai skul Deficit namarba ka baibam tymmen ruh ngim ïoh, ka siew ka tda ha ka pang ka shitom ruh ngim ïoh bad kiwei kiwei ruh ngim ïoh bad ngi ong ba dei ban shah. Ki shah baroh shikatto.”“Dei tang mynta ar snem ne lai snem eiei, ngi ïohi ïa kato ka aiñ kaba ym shah shuh ban ïaleh elekshon (ïa ki nonghikai). Lada kim pat lah ban pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam kumba ki pynbiang ïa ki nongtrei Sorkar, ka Sorkar ka dei ban shah ïa ki (nonghikai) ban ïaleh Elekshon namarba ki nonghikai ki dei hi ma ki, kiba hikai, kiba pyrkhat ïa kiei kiei na ka bynta ka jylla bad ka ri. Lada ki (nonghikai) ïashim bynta ha ki seng saiñpyrthei ruh kan biang bha,” u la bynrap.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ka Ïingbishar Meghalaya High Court lyngba ka Single Bench u Justice HS Thangkhiew ha ka 5 tarik, Nohprah 2022 bad kumjuh ka Division Bench ba kynthup ïa u Chief Justice Sanjib Banarjee bad u Justice W. Diengdoh ha ka 22 tarik Nailar 2023 ka la pyndam noh ïa ka hukum ba la pynmih da ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka 23 tarik Lber 2021 bad kumjuh ki kyndon ka Meghalaya State Education Policy 2018 kaba khang ïa ki nonghikai Kolej kiba hikai ha ki Aided Institution ne ki Kolej kiba ïoh jingïarap na ka Sorkar ba kin ïakhun ïa ka Elekshon ne ban shim bynta ne kitkam ha ki seng saiñpyrthei da ka jingujor mokotduma jong ka kynhun ki nonghikai ba kynthup ïa u Brightstarwell Marbaniang, u Dr. Batskhem Myrboh bad kiwei.Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la ujor sa sha ka Ingbishar Supreme Court hadien ba ka la shah rem arsien ïa ka mokotduma kaba la ujor pyrshah da ka kynhun ki nonghikai kolej ba kynthup ïa u Bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang bad kiwei pat, ka kashari jong ki arngut ki Nongbishar jong ka Supreme Court ka Justice Hima Kohli bad u Justice Ahsanuddin Amanulla ha ka 11 tarik, mynta u bnai, ki la shong bishar ïa kane ka mokotduma ha kaba u Bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang ruh u la leit ban sakhi da lade ïa ka jingshong bishar ïa ka mokotduma kaba ma u ryngkat kiwei pat ki para nonghikai kiba la shah ujor.Haba shong bishar kane, ka Kashari ka la rai ba ïa kane ka mokotduma yn shim bishar lang ryngkat bad kawei pat ka mokotduma na Kerela namar ka don ka jingïasyriem bad kane ka mokotduma ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la ujor pyrshah ïa ki nonghikai Kolej hadien ba ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court ka la pynksan ba ki nonghikai Bolej ki lah ban ïa shim bynta ha ka kam saiñ hima sima kata ban long ki dkhot jong ki seng saiñpyrthei.Ka Kashari ka la pynmih ïa ka hukumba ki nongshah shah ujor, kata, ka kynhun jong u Bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang ban File ïa ka Counter affidavit hapoh saw taiew.Shuh shuh ka Kashari ka la pynmih hukum, lada ki kwah ban File ïa ka Rejoinder Affidavit hapoh ar taiew hadien ba la dep ban File ïa ka Counter Affidavit.Ha kane ka jingïaleh mokotduma na ka liang jong ka Sorkar ki don 7 ngut ki Muktiar ba kynthup ïa u Advocate General u Amit Kumar, u Avijit Mani Tripathi, ka Rekha Bakshi, Aditya S. Pandey, ka Shaurya Sahay bad u Upendra Mishra. Katba na ka liang ka kynhun jong ki nonghikai la mihkhmat da ki san ngut ki muktiar ba kynthup ïa u Rajiv Kataria, ka Debjani Das Purkayastha, u H.R. Nath, u James Hitler Mawphiang bad ka Anu Gupta.Lah ruh ban kdew, katkum ka Code of Professional Ethics ïa ki nonghikai kolej ka University Grants Commission (UGC) ka pynshlur ba kin tynrong lem ïa ka khia ka shon ha ka imlang sahlang bad ban ïarap ha kaba kit lyngkor ha ka synshar khadar ne Public Office kaba u paidbah u bynshet.
title: KA SORKAR KA DEI BAN SHAH ÏA KI NONGHIKAI BAN IALEH ELEKSHON, ONG KA MRDSTA

content: : U President jong ka Meghalaya Retired Deficit School Teachers Association (MRDSTA) u Babu ED Nongsiang, ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew bynñiaw halor ka jingbym ïoh baibam tymmen jong ki nonghikai skul Deficit ynda ki la shongthait hadien ka jingshakri kumba 30 snem ban noh synñiang sha ka pule ka puthi bad sha ka jylla.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Jail Road Boys Higher Secondary School, Jail Road, Shillong u Bah Nongsiang u la ong, “ki don (ki nonghikai skul Deficit) napdeng jong ngi, kiba la shakri 29 snem, 30 snem wat haduh 35 snem hynrei ynda la shongthait kim ïoh eiei. Kane kam ïahap. Ngi tip ba u MLA lada u jop shi samoi ruh u la ïoh baibam tymmen, tang san snem u la ïoh baibam tymmen. Kam ïahap shuh ka rukom trei kaba tang 5 snem bad ka 30 snem.”“Ka sorkar ka ai ïa ki (MLA) namarba ki shna hi ïa ka aiñ ban ai ïalade, katba ïa ngi ki nonghikai kiba ïaksaid katno katno ruh ka eh,” u la ong.“Ngi kynmaw ha u 1996-1997, ka don ka Fourth Pay Commission, ki (Sorkar) mut pynduh noh (ban ai ïa ka Fourth Pay Commission) ïa ki nonghikai skul Deficit. Da ka jingïakhih, ngi la ïoh ïa ka Fourth Pay bad ka Fifth Pay Commission leilei ngi ïoh da kaba suk nabar ngi la ïakhih na shwa,” la ïathuh u Babu Nongsiang.Haba bynrap lang ïa kane, u Vice President jong ka Association u Babu Ronjit Marbaniang u la ong, “u Founder President jong ka Khasi Jaiñtia Deficit School Teachers Association (KJDSTA), Babu Teibor Shanpru, u dang im, mynta kumno ngin ieh ïa u. U dei uba la lamkhmat ban kyntiew ïa ka pule ka puthi, hynrei ngi sngewsih ban ong ba mynta ka pule ka puthi ka la hiar sha trai.”Da kaba pynpaw ïa ka jingbym shngaiñ ka lawei jong ki pateng ba mynta kiba kwah ban long nonghikai skul, u Babu Ron u la ong, ‘mynta kiba dei ban wan sha kam hikai, haba ki ïohi ïa ka “Security” ïa ki kam don, kam pynshlur ïa ki nonghikai kiba la tbit bad ban rung sha ka kam hikai skul bad kiba rung (sha ka kam hikai skul) ka long tang namarba kim ïoh kam. Ha ka juk mynta, ki kmie ki kpa kin ym phah ïa ki khun ki kti jong ki ban long ki nonghikai namarba ki ïohi ïa ka jingïaksaid jong ngi ka long kaba eh haduh katta katta,” bad bynrap, “ynda ngi la phong ïa kane ka juti kaba ngi la shongthait ngi sngewthuh bha.” “Ngi la ïakren bad ka Sorkar Jylla ïa ka baibam tymmen naduh ka por ba u Dr. Mukul Sangma u dang long u Myntri Rangbah. Haba ngi pynpaw ïa kane, u sngewsynei, u sngewsih. U ïam, haba u kynmaw ïa ka jingeh kaba ki nonghikai ki mad, khamtam ki kmie ki kpa jong u, kiba dei ki nonghikai.  Kane ka dei ha ka 11 tarik, Lber, 2015 ha Assembly,” la pynkynmaw u Babu Ron.“Kaba sngewsih kaba ngi hap kynthoh ruh ïa ki nongmihkhmat badonburom jong ngi, ki shakri 5 snem ki la ïoh ïa ka (penshon), hynrei ka tulop jong ngi kaba rit, eiei ruh ngim ïoh. Mynshwa leilei ka tulop Deficit kaba rit, hynrei da ka jingïakhun ka la shu biang, ngim don wat tang ban pynlang pisa ruh, wat ban ai ka jingnang jingstad ïa ki khun ruh ka shem (shitom). Ngi hikai ïa ki khun jong kiwei, katba ïalade patde kaba eh ngi mad. Ka dei kaba eh bha lada ki (Sorkar) kwah ba ka pule ka puthi kan kiew,” u pynpaw u Babu Ron.“Ka Sorkar ka dei ban weng ïa kine ki jingeh jong ki nonghikai. Ym dei ba ngi pyrkhat tang ïalade ba ngi kren kumne, hynrei ngi pyrkhat ïa ka pule ka puthi jong ka jylla baroh kawei. Ban kiew ka pule ka puthi, ngi donkam ïa ki nonghikai kiba tbit (ban rung sha ka kam hikai skul). Kita ki nonghikai kiba dei ban wan, kin wan kumno, haba tang ban ïoh tulop ruh hap mih sha surok, hap shah synreit um, hap shah shoh, hap shah bom, hap shah tied. Kita ki dei kiei kiei kiba ngi sngewsih ban kynthoh.  Ki nongthaw aiñ, lada kim lah ban shimkhia ïa ka pule ka puthi, ka jylla kan ym kiew lano lano,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ruh ba ki nonghikai skul Deficit ki la hap ban pynlong da ka jingïakhih ban ïoh ïa ka jingsiew DA.“Ka sorkar kam dei ban sngewthuh bakla ba ngi khlem noh synniang eiei. Ngim ïakren ïa ka (jingnoh synniang) sha ka Pla ïarong jong ka Sorkar, hynrei ngi kren ïa ka “Human Resources,” ngi la noh synniang shikatdei eh na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ka jylla. Kata ka dei kawei ka bynta kaba ka Sorkar ka hap ban pyrkhat bha. Lada ym don nonghikai kane ka jylla kan ym poi hangno hangno ruh,” la ong shuh shuh u Babu Ron.“Ngi kyntu ïa ka Sorkar, khamtam ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba bat ïa u shabi ban pynïaid ïa ka jylla,” u la bynrap.
title: KI MLA KI SHAKRI 5 SNEM KI LA ÏOH PENSHON, MA NGI PAT 30 SNEM NGIM ÏOH EIEI: BABU ED NONGSIANG

content: Kum ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka jingrakhe kynmaw burom ïa ka jingwan longbriew jong u Khunlung Jisu sha kane ka sla pyrthei, ka St. Joseph’s Church, Mawkhar Parish ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka Lam Jingshai Choir, ka Prayer Group, lyngba ka jingkyrshan ba ratbah ki Lyngdoh Sohblei jong ka Parish, ki pynlong ïa ka Christmas Carol mynta u snem ha ka sngi U Blei.Ha kane ka jingïaid Carol ka la long kaba kham kyrpang mynta u snem namar hapdeng ka jingïaid ha ki surok ha ryngkat ki jingrwai bad ki jingduwai ba riewblei ba ka jingwan u longbriew jong u Jisu Khrist ha ka dur jong u khyllung Jisu, un wanrah ka jingsuk, ka jingkmen bad ka bha ka miat bad khamtam eh ba ka jingngeit kum ki khun Khristan kan nangrhem bad khlaiñ shuh shuh.Ïa kane ka jingïaid Carol ka la long kaba kham phylla namar la don ka jingkit lang ïa ka Shyngoid hapoh ka kali, ka jingdon ki khynnah kiba riam kum ki Riewstad bad kiwei kiwei de ki jingpynitynnad.  La sdang ïa ka jingïaid Carol phyllaw jong ka ingmane bad ïaid ter ter sha Jaïaw Lansonalane, nangta sha Chapel Road, sha Jaïaw Pdeng nangta la pynkut biang ha Parish da ka jingïakmen lyngba ka Christmas Concert kaba lyngkot.La sdang ïa kane Christmas Carol da ka jingduwai na u Parish Priest  u Rev. Fr.  Teibor Lyngdoh bad la pynkut pat da ka jingduwai bad jingïadih sha lang.
title: SDANG KA ST. JOSEPH’S CHURCH DA KA CHRISTMAS CAROL BAN PYNKHREH ÏA KA RAKHE CHRISTMAS

content: : Ka tnat Food Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Palei ka la khot ïakren ïa ki nongïalam jong ka North East Petroleum Mazdoor Union (NEPMU) ban ïakren sani hadien ba kane ka kynhun ki nongñiah trok kit umphniang ki la byrngem ban sangeh ka jingwankit ïa ka Petrol bad Diesel sha Meghalaya naduh ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka NEPMU ka la shim ïa ka rai ban sangeh wan kit ïa umphniang Petrol bad Diesel hadien ba ki dkhot kiba la shah kem halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki donkti ban die tuh shiteng lynti ïa ka umphñiang kim pat lait satia na ka along ki Pulit haduh mynta mynne.Da kane ka jingïakren kaba la long ha ka sngi Palei ha Nongpoh, Ribhoi District, ka NEPMU ka la rai ban wankit biang ïa ka umphniang sha Meghalaya.Ïa kane ka jingïakynduh, la lamkhmat da u Additional Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills u Bah P.T Passah bad u Additional Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi u Bah M.B tongper katba na ka liang jong ka Mazdoor Union la ïalam da u General Secretary u Ramen Das bad na ka liang ka Petroleum Dealer Association of Meghalaya pat la ïalam da u Bah Kennedy C. Khyriem.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïakynduh, u Additional Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills u Bah PT Passah, u la ïathuh ba kane ka jingïakynduh bad ka Mazdoor Union ka la long kaba seisoh hadien ba ka Union ka la rai ban sangeh noh ïa ka jingïakhih da kaba byrngem ban sangeh wan kit ïa ka umphniang sha Meghalaya.U la ong ruh kane ka jingshim rai jong ka Mazdoor Union ban weng noh ïa ka jingïakhih ban sangeh wanrah umphniang sha Meghalaya, ka dei ruh hadien ba la pynpaw ïa ka jingeh ki paidbah bad ba la pynsngewthuh shai ba lada ki sangeh ban wan kit ïa ka umphniang kane ka wanrah ka jingeh kaba khraw ïa ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya.U la pynshai ruh da kaba ong, kumba ka Mazdoor Union ka la dawa na ka Sorkar Jylla ban pyllait along noh ïa ki dkhot ka Union kiba la shah kem halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki la die tuh ïa ka Umphniang ha shiteng lynti kumba la ïoh kem dang shen ha ka jingkhynra da ki Pulit ka Meghalaya bad kane ka jingdawa ka long kaba ym lah ban leh eiei da ka Sorkar namar ïa kane ka kam la shaniah ha ka ïingbishar badon burom ba kan ai ïa ka jingbishar kaba hok ba lada kita ki dkhot jongki kim don bynta kin sa lait hi na ka jingpynshitom kiba dei katkum ka aiñ.
title: WENG KA MAZDOOR UNION ÏA KA JINGÏAKHIH, KULAR BAN WANRAH PETROL BIANG SHA MEGHALAYA

content: U Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi u la kular ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya khnang ba kan dup lah ban kynjoh sha ka thong ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingthmu ban tei ïa Administrative City ha New Shillong Township ha ki san snem ban sa wan.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma uba la leit sha Delhi ban ïakynduh ïa u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri, u la ong ba u la pynsngew ha u Myntri Rangbahduh shaphang ki kam pynroi bapher bapher bad ïa ki prokram bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar.“Nga la aiti ïa ka kaiphod ba bniah bad nga la pyni ruh ïa ka Presentation ha u bad u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen ban ïohi ïa ki jingtrei bapher bapher kiba la urlong ha kane ka jylla bad u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen khamtam eh ba baroh ki kam pynroi ba la mang pisa na ka bynta ka jylla ha ki san snem ba la leit noh ka la nang kiew ar shah ha ki san snem ba ladep, kaba la jan kot lai shah na kaba ju long ha ki 5-6 snem mynshwa,” u la ong.U Sangma u la ïathuh ba u la pyntip ha u Modi ïa ki jingthmu jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ki thong bapher bapher ba la buh ban pyndep ha ki san snem ki ban sa wan.  “(Nga la) kyrpad ïa u Modi ban tuklar bad ban ïarap lem ïa ngi, ban kdew lynti ïa ngi bad ban kyrshan lem ïa ngi ba ngin dup lah ban kynjoh sha ka ka thong kaba ngi la buh ha ki san snem ki ban sa wan,” u la ong.“Nga la ïasam ruh bad u halor ka jingthmu ban don ïa ka New Shillong Township ha kaba ngi la thmu ban tei ïa ka Administrative City ba thymmai bad ka Secretariat ba thymmai bad nga la ïasam bad u ïa ka Plan bad ka Designs ba la shu leh malu mala bad pan jingkyrshan na u ban pynthikna ba ki projek kin nang tyllun shakhmat. U la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen ban ïohi ïa kine ki kam pynroi bad u la kular ruh katba lah ban ai jingkyrshan na ka liang jong u,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh, u Myntri Rangbah u la ïakynduh ruh ïa ka Myntri Pla Tyngka ka Nirmala Sitharaman bad kyrpad ïa ka ban kyntiew ïa ka jingbhah pisa bad ban ai tam ïa ka Externally Aided Projects (EAP) sha ka Jylla Meghalaya da kaba pynshong nongrim katkum ki kam ba ladep leh.“Nga la pyntip ïa ka shaphang ki projek bapher bapher kiba dang ïaid shakhmat lyngba ka bhah pisa ba ka Sorkar India ka ju ai jingkyrshan ïa ki jylla bapher bapher lyngba ka EAP bad ïa ki kam pynroi bapher bapher kiba la nang ïaid shakhmat,”  u la ong.“Ka Myntri ka la shah skhor bha bad ka la kular ban ïarap bad ban kyrshan ïa ngi.  Ngi khmihlynti ïa ka jingkyrshan jong ki bad na ka Tnat Pla Tyngka bad na u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri khnang ba ngin dup lah ban kynjoh ïa ki thong bapher bapher ba ngi la buh na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya,” u la bynrap.
title: PAN JINGKYRSHAN U CONRAD NA U MODI BAN TEI ÏA KI PROJEK THYMMAI HA NEW SHILLONG

content: U Bah Prestone Tynsong uba long u Symbud Myntri Rangbah jong ka Jylla u la takrain tyngeh ia ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) bad kynnoh ruh ba kane ka seng saiñpyrthei ka pynlong ishu politik ia ka jingshim rai jong ka sorkar ban ai jaka sa 1.4 akar na ka jaka jong ka Shillong Municipal Board ban pynkynriah ia ki briew kiba sah ha Them Iew Mawlong.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, u Bah Prestone u la kynnoh ba ka VPP ka la shu kynthoh khlem da tip ia ki jingshisha bad khlem tih bniah ia ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong.“Kito ki nongialam kiba wohnia ia ka rai ba la shim da ka Sorkar, ki lehkai politik. Ka dei ka jinglehkai politik. (Kumno ki kynthoh) khlem da tip ia ki jingshisha bad khlem da tip ia ka nombar jong ki briew kiba sah ha katai ka jaka (Them Iewmawlong,” ong u Bah Prestone.“Ngam kwah ban iapynphai nia, ngam kwah ban iapynlut kai ia ka por bad kine ki jait kam kaba ki kren,” u la bynrap.“Haba ngi ong ba ki donkam sa khyndiat ka jaka kaba heh 1.4 akar kaba mut ba ia kane ka jaka yn ym aiti sha kine ki briew (kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong) hynrei ban aiti sha ka Shillong Municipal Board.  Ka jaka, kam dei ka jong, hynrei ka jaka ka dei ka jong ka Municipal,” la pynshai u Symbud Myntri Rangbah.“Dei na kata ka daw ba nga ong, wat lehkai politic. Lada phi donkam ia ka jingpynshai, wan ban iakynduh ia nga bad ngan sa batai lut ia phi katba donkam,” ula ong.“Phim lah ban shu ialam bakla ia ki paidbah. Mynno ngi la ong ba ngin ai jaka ia ki?  Ia ka jaka yn ai sha ka Municipal bad ka Municipall kan sa leh kat kaba donkam ha kaba iadei bad ki nongtrei ki jong ka,” la pynshai shuh shuh u Bah Prestone.“Nga la iohi ia ka jingkren jong ki, lada ngim lah, dei ban aiti ia kane ka ishu sha ka VPP. Hato kin leh aiu haba kim tip eiei hi ruh wat ia u A bad u B ne kim don jingtip eiei, hynrei ki shu pyrshang tang ban ialam ia ki paidba nongshong shnong jong ka jylla,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ki paidbah ruh ki sngewthuh bha ia kata bad nga kyntu ia kine ki nongialam (jong ka VPP) ba kim dei ban sngewthuh bakla bad kim dei ruh ban ialam bakla ia ki paidbah.”
title: ISHU THEM IEWMAWLONG: TAKRAIÑ U BAH PRESTONE BA PYNLONG ISHU POLITIKS KA VPP

content: Shibnai tam mynshuwa ki Pulit pyniaid kali jong ka Lumdiengjri Traffic Police ki la hap ban maramot dalade hi ia ka surok GS Road ha Lumdiengjri marpyrshah bad ka thanat namarba ka la pynsuhsat ia ka leit ka wan jong ki kali kat haduh ba ka la wanrah ia ka jingdheng kali kaba jur namar ka jingsniew shaba palat jong kane ka surok.Ka tnat Pulit ka la phah ruh da ka jingthoh sha ka Sorkar Jylla da ka jingkyrpad ban phah maramot noh ia kane ka surok.Hynrei ka sorkar kam la sngap satia bad ka jingsniew jong kane ka surok mar pyrshah bad ka Lumdiengjri Police Station ka la nang sniew haduh katta kat haduh ba la paw sa ki mawria bad ka jingkhoh jong ka rong na ka jingpei jong ki pipe um.Ka jingkylli kaba mih mynta ka long, lada hapdeng sor Shillong ka Sorkar kam patiaw ban maramot ia ki surok ba kongsan tam ha ka leit ka wan, katno tam lei lei ia ki surok kiba sniew sha ki shnong nongkyndong.
title: PAW KI SHYIENG KI SHRUH KA GS ROAD HA LUMDIENGJRI, YM PATIAW KA SORKAR

content: Watla u Bah Bull Nongjop Lyngdoh u la khladnoh na kane ka sla pyrthei la 29 snem mynshwa hynrei ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) kam shym la klet noh ïa une u nongïalam barim jong ka seng uba la len lade bad uba la aiti ïa ka la jong ka jingim na ka bynta ki dawbah jong ka jaidbynriew.Ha ka sngi Palei, ka KSU ka la rakhe kynmaw burom ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap kaba 29 snem jong u Bah Bull da kaba leit buh syntiew hakhmat u durmot uba ka seng ka la shna pynsahkynmaw ha ka shnong Malki, Shillong.Ha kane ka sngi, la ïashim bynta lang da ki dkhot bad ki nongïalam jong ka KSU ba la lamkhmat da u General Secretary u samla Donald V. Thabah ryngkat lang bad ki bahaing hasem jong u Bah Bul kynthup i para kynthei, Kong Hana Lyngdoh.Ka KSU ka la pynmih ruh da ka jingthoh lyngkot shaphang ka jingim bad ki kam jong u Bah Bull u la leh mynba u dang im ha kane ka sla pyrthei kum u nongïalam baradbah jong ka KSU.U samla Donald Thabah haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang balyngkot u la pynkynmaw ïa ki kam radbah jong ka KSU mynba u Bah Bull u la shimti kum u nongïalam jong ka seng ha u snem 1983 haduh u snem 1990.U la ïathuh ruh ïa ka jingkren jong ki nongïalam ka All Assam Students Union (AASU) kiba ong ba u Bah Bull u dei shisha u nongïalam u bym lah shuh ban ïanujor badno badno ruh.“U Bah Bull Lyngdoh u la khladnoh dang ha ka rta kaba 42 snem. Ha shwa ba u khlad, u la im ïa ka jingim  basuhsat namarba ha ka jingïakhih pyrshah ïa ki Nepali ha u snem 1987 bad ka jingïakhih pyrshah ban wanrah ïa ka lynti Rel ha kane ka jylla ha u snem 1989, u Bah Bull u la shah pyntyrha, shah bom shah tied, shah pynsajia ha ki bor jong ka aiñ tad haduh ba ka met jong u kan da khrew. U la im ïa ka jingim kaba jynjar hynrei um sngew eiei, kaei kaba u la leh, ka la wanrah ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ka jaidbynriew,” la ong u samla Thabah.“Shibun tylli ki shnong Khasi kiba la dei ban kylla long ki shnong Nepali, kum ka shnong Mawlai, Mawprem bad Nengmensong, hynrei dei ka jingïakhun jong u (Bah Bull). Mynshwa ka Ribhoi ka dei kaba dang hap hapoh ka East Khasi Hills, ïa kaba la tip kum ka Ribhoi Subdivision bad ki poiei ki dawa ban pynkylla ïa ka Ribhoi Subdivision sha ka Gorkha Subdivision. Dei kane, kaba pynlong ïa ki nongïalam barim, kum u Bah Bull N. Lyngdoh, Bah Herlambok War, kim lah ban shah bad ki hap ban mih ban ïakhun haduh shisnem lynter tad haduh ba ki mynder ri kin da hap ban phet na ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep,” la ïathuh u General Secretary ka KSU.Haba pynpaw ba ka KSU ka la shah kynthoh laiphew jait ha kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew, u Samla Thabah u la ong, “kiwei ki jaidbynriew ki bym dei na ka jaitbynriew jong ngi, ki kynthoh, laiphewjait laiphew rukom bad ki kynnoh ym tang ïa u Bah Bull hynrei ïa baroh ki nongïalam ka KSU bad ïa baroh ki dkhot ka KSU. Ki kynnoh ba ngi leh donbor, pynïapher jaidbynriew, bad pynisih jaidbynriew, hynrei ngi kiba don hangne ha la ka jong ka khyndew ka shyiap ngi tip bha ïa kaei kaba ngi leh bad kaei kaba u Bah Bull u leh.”“Nalor ki nongshun jong ka jaidbynriew, ki don ki kruiñ kiba long ki nonglilam ïa ka jaidbynriew jong ngi, kiba pyndonkam ïa ka jinglong jong ka jaidbynriew jong ngi, ban ïa bishni, ban ïa peit matdong iwei ïa iwei bad shna ïa ki khana lamler pyrshah ïa ki nongïalam ka KSU, naduh ka por u Bah Michael Syiem, Bah Paul Lyngdoh haduh ka kane ka khyllipmat ba mynta,” la kynthoh une u nongïalam ka KSU bad bynrap, “ka jingthmu ba shapoh jong ki, kam dei ba ki sngewkhia ïa ka jaidbynriew lane ba ki sngewkhia ba ka KSU ka long kum u diengpynkiang ïa ka roi ka kiew, hynrei ka jingthmu jong ki ka dei ban pynhun ïa ki mynder ri kiba la thong da ki spah tyngka.”U la ong ba ha ki 45 snem ba ka KSU ka la ai jingshakri ïa ka jaidbynriew kam pat ju shet kylla ne ban randien na ka bynta ki dawbah ka jaidbynriew.
title: ONG KI NONGÏALAM KA AASU: U BAH BULL U DEI U NONGÏALAM BYM LAH BAN IANUJOR, ÏATHUH U GS KA KSU

content: Ka dorbar khynnah jong ka shnong Mawlat, East Khasi Hills District ha ka 4 tarik u Nohprah, 2023 ka la pynthymmai ia ki nongkitkam ha kaba u heprit Pynshngaiñ Khongjoh u la shah jied kum u Sordar Khynnah, u heprit Dayomi Suting kum u Asst. Sordar, ka heprit Darisha Kshiar kum ka Secretary, u heprit Jubandeipor Kshiar bad ka heprit Ribanjanai Kshiar kum ka Asst. Secretary, u heprit Headingson Khongjoh kum u Publicity Secretary, u heprit Dancel Kshiar kum u Sports Secretary, ka heprit Ibanshisha Khongjoh kum ka Education Secretary lem bad 7 ngut ki dkhot.Ha u kyrwoh khubor ba la phah sha kada u Sordar jong ka shnong Mawlat u Bah Maron Suting ryngkat bad ki video ba la ring hi, u la iathuh ba ia kane ka dorbar khynnah ha ka shnong Mawlat la sdang ha ka 22 tarik, Iaiong, 2016 bad la pynthymmai biang ha ka 4 tarik, Nohprah, 2023. U Bah Maron Suting u la pynpaw ba katkum ka jingshem jong u kum u Sordar jong ka shnong, ba kane ka dorbar khynnah ka long kaba donkam shisha khamtam eh ha kaba iadei bad ka khuid ka suba, ka pule ka puthi, ka jingialehkai sports bad khamtam eh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingiamir jingmut lem bad ka burom ka akor.
title: SHIM JINGKITKHLIEH KI HEPRIT KA MAWLAT ÏA KA JINGKHUID BAD KA PULE PUTHI

content: Watla ka elekshon sha ka Khasi bad Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council kam pat thikna haduh lano kan long hynrei ki nongkyrshan jong ka Hill State People Democratic Party (HSPDP) Nongstoiñ Unit ki la kwah eh ba ki nongïalam ba hakhlieh jong ka party kin jied noh ïa ki nongkitkam jong ka party hapoh ka Nongstoiñ Constituency.U Bah Ekstarly Lyngkhoi uwei na ki nongkyrshan baradbah jong ka HSPDP uba long ruh uwei na ki Volunteer ba hakhmat eh ha ka por jong ka jingïakhih Hill State ha ka jingïakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la ong, hadien ba ki nongïalam jong ka party ki la weng noh ïa baroh ki nongkitkam jong ka Nongstoiñ Unit ki nongkitkam ki la lum ïa ka jingïalang ha ka 27 tarik u bnai baladep ha Nongstoiñ hynrei na ka liang jong ki nongkitkam kiba la shah weng kim shym la khot satia ïa u ha ka jingïalang bad um tip satia kaei ka daw kaba kim shym la khot satia ïa u.Haba kylli, la u don jingtip neem kiei ki mat ba ki ïakren ha ka jingïalang, u Bah Lyngkhoi u la ong, “haduh mynta ngam pat tip satia kaei ka jingthmu jong ki haba ki lum ïa ka jingïalang. Ha ka jingshisha ki nongïalam jong ka Central Excecutive Committee (CEC) ka Party ki la dei ban shimkhia ban thung noh da ki nongkitkam kiba thymmai ha ka jaka jong kiba la shah weng bad ban pyntip ruh sha baroh ki nongïalam jong ka District na ka bynta ban ïatai ïathir sani bha kumno ban pynkhlaiñ biang ïa ka party hapoh Nongstoiñ Constituency kaba dei ka jabieng jong ka HSPDP naduh ka por ba ka jingïakhih dawa jylla ba pura ka la sdang.
title: STAIT KA HSPDP HA NONGSTOIÑ UNIT BA SHAH WENG KI NONGKITKAM

content: U Myntri ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Baar u la byrngem ban mudui da ka ‘Defamation Case’ halor ka khubor kaba kynnoh ba ka don ka jyrsieh bamsap kaba T.1300 klur ha ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Eco-Tourism Project ha East Garo Hills (EGH).Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Paul u la kyntait war ba kam don satia kano kano ka jyrsieh bamsap ha ka Eco-Tourism Project ha East Garo Hills bad ong ruh ba ka Rural eco-tourism Circuit Project ha Garo Hills ka dei kaba la mang pisa da ka North Eastern Council (NEC) ha u snem 2017 na ka bynta 12 tylli ki project, ha kaba 9 tylli ki dei ha East Garo Hills, kawei ha West Garo Hills bad ar tylli ha South West Garo Hills ha ka jinglut kaba kot T. 14.39 klur.U la ïathuh ba kawei kawei ka projek ka kynthup ïa ka jingshna ïa ka Traditional Dwelling Cottages ba don bad ka jingthiah, ka kamra shongkai, ka paiñkhana, ka jaka peitkai bad kiwei kiwei kaba kot T. 9.91 lak bad haduh mynta 955 na ki kam la lah ban trei pyndep.“Na ka T. 14.39 klur, haduh T. 1361.45 lak ladep siew sha ki Kontraktor ba pyntrei ïa ka kam ba la p yndep bad ki don pat ki kam kiba dang sah ban pyndep noh artat,” u la ong.U Myntri u la pyntip ba ki don bun tylli ki daw kaba pynslem ban pyndep ïa kine ki projek na ka daw ka jingdon jong ka elekshon shiteng samoi ha East Garo Hills, ka jingwan lynshop ka khlam COVID-19, ka jingpyrkhing ban leit ban wan jong ki nongbylla na ka daw u COVID bad ka jingbym don ki surok kiba biang ban poi sha ki jaka ba pyntrei nalor ka jingpynthud jong   u slap bad kiwei kiwei de ki daw.Na ka liang jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jyllla u Conrad K Sangma ruh u la kyntait war halor ka jingkynnoh ba ka don ka jyrsieh bamsap ha ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka song pisa kaba kot T.13 klur jong ka Eco-tourism Project“Haba kane ka khubor ka la mih, ka jinglap jong ki bad ki jingkheiñ ki dei kiba bakla suda bad ka khubor ka dei kaba la ïalam bakla nadong shadong. Ki jingkheiñ ki bakla.  Ka dei ka projek ba 13 klur bad ki don kumba 8-9 tylli ki jaka ba la shna ïa ka projek.“U nonglum khubor u dei ban da tih bniah bad ban da wad jingtip thikna shwa ban pynmih ïa kine ki khubor, bad ym dei ban shu ïalam bakla ïa ki paidbah,” u la bynrap.
title: BYRNGEM U MYNTRI BAN MUDUI ‘DEFAMATION CASE ’ ÏA KA JINGKYNNOH BAMSAP 1300 KLUR NA KA ECO-TOURISM

content: : U Nongaitkien ka BJP u Bah M. Kharkrang ha ka sngi palei u la ong ba kan long kaba bha palat lada u MLA ba la mihkhmat la hynriew sien kynthih ïa ka Pynthorumkhrah Constituency u Bah Alexander L. Hek uba long ruh u Myntri Sorkar un shah jied kum u kyrtong na Shillong Parliamentary Constituency na ka bynta ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha u snem 2024.“Lada mynjur ïa u Bah AL Hek, uba la long u MLA la hynriew sien kynthih, kan long kaba sngewtynnat palat,” ong u Bah Kharkhrang ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi thohdieng.Une u ophisar IPS barim u la ong ba ki nongïalam jong ka Party kim pat pan eiei halor kane.  “Namarkata, kam pat don satia kano kano ka kyrteng ban phah sha Delhi ïa mynta,” u la ong.U Bah Hek dang shen u la pynpaw, “ka shong ha ki nongïalam bahalor jong ka party ban shim ïa ka rai (ba ngan ïakhun ne ngam ïakhun).”Une u Myntri Sorkar u la phla ruh ba ki don lai ngut ki kyrtong kiba kwah ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon na Shillong.Haba kylli, u Bah Kharkrang u la ong, “kam dei ka kam sngewbha ban sei kyrtong, hynrei ngi hap ban peit la ngi don ne em ïa ki kyrtong kiba biang.”“Baroh ka long haba shai na ka bynta kiei kiei bad ngi kwah ban ïohi lada ngi ïoh ïa ka kyrtong kynthei. Ngim pat khang ïa ka jingkhang, ngi plie lut ïa baroh,” u la bynrap.Ha kajuh ka por, une u nongaiktien u ong shuh shuh ba ka party kan ym ïatreilang badno badno ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long.“Kan ym don kano kano ka jingïatreilang.  Ha ki elekshon ba ladep, ka BJP ka ïakhun beit (ïa ki elekshon) marwei,” u la ong.
title: KMEN KA BJP LADA MYNJUR KI NONGÏALAM BAN PYNIENG ÏA U BAH AL HEK HA KA ELEKSHON MP

content: U Working President ka UDP u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la ong ba ka UDP ka ladep ïaid sakhmat ban sei la u jong u kyrtong na ka bynta ban pynïakhun na Shillong Seat ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha, ka ban sa long ha u snem ban sa wan.“Ka lynti ban jied ïa u kyrtong kan long shi bnai ne duna ïa kata,” ong u Bah Paul ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka NPP ka la kyrshan ïa u kyrtong monlang ba la pynieng da ka UDP ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ha u snem 2019.U State President ka NPP, Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba ha u snem 2019 ka NPP ka la mynjur ban kyrshan ïa u kyrtong monlang ba la pynieng da ka paralok ba ïatreilang ha ka kynhun jong ka MDA, ka UDP, hynrei mynta ka kynti ka NPP kan sei la ki jong ki kyrtong bad kam shym la don kano kano ka jingïakren halor kane.Haba kylli, hato u President barim ka HYC u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin u dei ne em uba hakhmat eh u ban pan tiket, u Bah Paul u la ong ba u Bah Kharjahrin u ladei lypa uwei na kiba pan tiket bad uba la pynpaw ïa ka jingkwah ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon na Shillong Parliamentary Seat.“Kumba ngi la ïakren, kin don 3-4 ngut ki nongpan tiket bad nga tharai yn sa lah ban pyntip hapoh khyndiat sngi ne khyndiat taiew,” u la bynrap.Haba pyntip ba ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka elekshon MDC ka la ïaid shakhmat, u Bah Paul u la ong ba ka State Election Committee jong ka UDP ka la shong jingïalang bunsien halor kane ka kam.“Ngi lah ban pynbna ïa ka thup kyrteng banyngkong eh jong ki kyrtong la kumno kumno ha kaba kut jong u bnai Kyllalyngkot,” la bynrap u Bah Paul.
title: IAID SHAKHMAT KA UDP BAN WAD KYRTONG NA SHILLONG SEAT; ONG U BAH PAUL LYNGDOH

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ha ka sngi balang ka la kyrpad ïa u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare ka Sorkar Jylla ba un tuklar lem khnang ban pynthikna ba ki ophis treikam ka Sorkar Pdeng ki dei ban pyntreikam ïa ka jingbhah kam kaba 44% ïa ki Scheduled Tribes jong ka jylla.Ka HYC ka la dawa ruh ban thaw noh ïa ka Fast Track Courts khnang ban pynstet ïa ka jingpynkut ïa ki NDPS Cases bad ban pyntreikam ïa ka Prevention of Illicit Traffic in Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act, 1988 (PIT-NDPS Act).Ha ka shithi ba la aiti ha u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u President ka HYC u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la ong, “namarkata, ngi kyntu ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya ba kan shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynthikna ba ki ophis treikam ka Sorkar Pdeng/Institutions/Undertakings, bad kiwei kiwei kiba don ha ka Jylla Meghalaya ba ki dei ban bud bad ban pyntreikam ai ka Office Memorandums bad ïa kiwei kiwei ki jingbthah ba la pynmih da ka Sorkar India lyngba ka Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances and Pensions Department of Personnel and Training New Delhi, khnang ba ki samla riewlum kin ïoh lem ïa kane ka jingmyntoi.”U la ong ba katkum ka Office Memorandum No.360 1711 12004-Estt.(Res.) ba la pynmih da ka Sorkar India lyngba ka Ministry of Personnel, Public Grievances and Pensions, Department of Personnel and Training New Delhi, ha ka 5 tarik, Naitung, 2005; ka Office Memorandum kaba la pynmih ha ka 4 tarik, Naitung, 2007 bad ka Compendium of Intructions No. F.No.36011/1/2022-Estt.(Res-I) kaba 14 tarik, Risaw, 2022, ka Sorkar India la pynthymmai ïa ka bhah ban mang kyrpang ïa ki Scheduled Castes, Scheduled Tribes bad Other Backward Classes lada jia ba ka don ka jingthung kam ha ki post Group ‘C’ bad “’D’ khnang ban pynrungkam ïa ki samla na kane ka thaiñ.Katkum kine ki Office Memorandum bad ki jingbthah, ha ka jylla Meghalaya ka jingbhah kyrpang ka long tang 1 % ïa ki Scheduled Castes, 44% na ka bynta ki Scheduled Tribes bad 5 % na ka bynta ki Other Backward Classes.“Ngi ïoh jingtip ba bun na ki ophis ka Sorkar Pdeng kiba don hapoh kane ka jylla Meghalaya kim shym la bud katkum ka jingkdew ha ka Office Memorandum bad bun na ki samla riewlum ki la duh noh ïa la ka hok ban rungkam ha ki ophis ka Sorkar Pdeng na ka daw ka jingbym bud ïa kaba la kdew ha ka Office Memorandum,” ong  u Bah Synrem bad bynrap ba u Myntri u la kular ba un sa shimkhia ïa kane bad ki bor ba dei peit.Shuh shuh u Bah Synrem u la ong ba seng ka la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynthikna ka Fast Track Courts/Special Courts katkum ba la bsut hapoh ka DREAM Project, na ka bynta ban tian bishar ïa ki case hapoh ka NDPS Act dei ban leh kham kloi katba lah, khamtam ha East Khasi Hills District.“Ïa mynta ym don wat tang kawei ruh ka Special Courts ban tian bishar ïa ki case hapoh ka NDPS Act, namar kata ki jingtian bishar ki shu sah lyngkran da ki snem bad kane ka pynduh mynsiem khamtam ïa ki nongsakhi bad ïa ki paidbah ban ïarap ïa ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar ha kaba ïakhun pyrshah ïa u drok,” u la ong.U la ai khublei ruh ïa ka tnat Social Welfare kaba la pynbna paidbah ïa ka Drug Reduction, Elimination, and Action Mission (DREAM) ha ka 27 tarik, Jylliew, 2023 da kaba buh hakhmat ïa ka thong ban pynlong ïa ka jylla kaba lait, na u drok,” bad ong, “ka dei ka polisi kaba donkam, khlem pep, da kaba buh ïa ka thong ban rat dyngkhong ïa u jingdih ba sniew bad ban pynlong ïa ka jylla kaba lait na ka jingshah teh mraw ha u drok.  Hynrei kaba pynsngewkhia ïa ngi ka long ba kane ka Mission/Policy kam dei ban long tang kum ka dulir jong ka Sorkar kaba don tang ha ka kot sada hynrei ka bym lah ban pyntreikam katkum ka jingthmu.”Une u nongïalam ka HYC u la ïathuh ruh ba ka seng ka la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar ban pyntreikam ïa ka Prevention of Illicit Traffic in Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act, 1988 (PIT-NDPS Act).“Ngi kyntu ïa phi ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban kyndang naphang pyrshah ïa ki snar nongkhaïi da kaba kem bad pynngat kyndon ïa ki nongleh kam sniew/nongkhaïi, kiba la shah kem bun bun sien, hapoh ki kyndon jong ka PIT-NDPS Act,” u la ong.U la bynrap ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la thaw ïa ka Advisory Board katkum ka jingbthah jong ka PIT-NDPS Act, 1988 bad haduh mynta hadien ka jingai jingmut, tang 9 ngut ki briew kiba donkti ha ka jingkhaïi drok kiba la shah kem hapoh ki 3 snem.“Ngi kyrpad ïa ka tnat ba kan pynshitom pyrshah ïa ki nongpynkheiñ aiñ,” la ong u Bah Synrem.
title: BYM TREIKAM KA BHAH 44% ÏA KI ST HA KI OPHIS SORKAR PDENG, PHAH TUKLAR KA HYC HA SORKAR

content: Ka North Eastern Hill University Students’ Union (NEHUSU) ka la rai ban thaw da ka Gender Sensitization Committee hadien ba ka la don ka jingjia shah jrong kti jong ki kynthei hapoh ka skulbah North Eastern Hill University (NEHU).Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah ha ka sngi baar, u Finance Secretary ka NEHUSU u Mandor Diengdoh u la ong hadien ba ki khubor ki la poi sha ki paidbah, ki la don bun tylli ki jingjia kiba la kynnoh pyrshah ia u Nantu Das, uba bat kum u in-charge jong ka Security bad u Asst Director jong ka Sports Department, NEHU ha kaba ka shithi ujor ka la poi sha ka NEHUSU.U la ong, “hadien ba la bishar da ka NEHUSU ia ki jingujor la lap ba u nongleh kam bymman u donkti bunsien ban leh ia ki kam runar ha kaba ki lanot ki sheptieng ban kren na ka daw ba ki lehraiñ ban pynpaw ialade hakhmat ka pyrthei.”Hadien kane ka jingjia, u la ong, ki la don ruh ki jingujor na ki samla pule khamtam da ki Research Scholars kiba la kam ba u Guide jong ki,  u don kti ha ki kam pohdor.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka NEHUSU ka la ioh pdiang bun tylli ki jingujor na kiba bun ki samla pule, u samla Diengdoh u la ong, “ka NEHUSU ka sngewdei ban don ia ka jingpynsngewthuh ia ka longkynthei ka longshynrang hapoh ka skulbah na ka bynta ki samla pule, ki nonghikai bad ki nongtrei.”“Ka NEHUSU ha kaba iadei bad kane, kan sa pynlong ia ka jingpynsngewthuh lyngba ki jingiathir iatai, ki jingiathir nia bad khamtam eh ban thaw ia ka Gender Sensitization Committee ka ban shimkhia ia ki jingshah thombor, ka jingpynkheiñ ia ka jingmynjur bad kiwei kiwei de ki kam kiba iadei bad kine ki jait kam,” la ong u kyrwoh.“Bun ki jingjia kiba iadei bad ki jingshah jrong kti kin sa nang paw pyrthei ha kine ki sngi ki ban sa wan namarba ki samla pule ki la nang kham iohbor na ka jingioh jingkyrshan bad ka jingai mynsiem sha ki samla pule da ka Union,” u la ong.U la ong shuh shuh ba ka jingangnud jong ka Union ka long ban sngewthuh ia ka jinglong kynthei jinglong shynrang bad ba ka shlem pule ka dei ban long kaba shngaiñ.“Ka NEHUSU kaba mynta ka kut jingmut ban rat dyngkhong ia kine ki kam pohdor da kino kino ki nongtrei, ki ophisar ne ki nonghikai pyrshah ia ki samla pule,” la ong ka Union.
title: THAW KA NEHUSU DA KA KOMITI BAN BISHAR ÏA KI JINGSHAH JRONGKTI KI KYNTHEI HA UNIVERSITY

content: U Badonkupar Synnah u la pynshohbiej ia ki paidbah nongkyrshan, hadien ba u la lah ban khur ia ka jingjop ha ka kyrdan iakura jong ka light welterweight 60-63.5kg fight ha ka sngi kaba ar jong ka 7th Elite Men’s National Boxing Championship mynta ka sngi ha SAI Indoor Hall, Shillong.Kane ka lympung iakura ka ban kut ha ka 1 tarik u Nohprah, la pynlong da ka Meghalaya Boxing Association ha ryngkat ka Boxing Federation of India bad la kyrshan lang da ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs jong ka Sorkar Jylla.Ha kane ka sngi, u Synnah uba la iakhun pyrshah ia u Roopesh Shukla uba na Madhya Pradesh, u la khur ia ka jingjop hadien ba u la tam point bad ban pynhun ia ki paidbah nongkyrshan kiba la wan ban sakhi ia kane ka jingiakura. Te kumta u Badon u la long uba nyngkong eh na ki nongiakura ka Jylla ban jam sha kawei pat ka wat jingiakhun.Ha kane ka sngi kaba ar, la lah ban pynlong haduh 78 tylli ki bouts bad ki rangiakura na kylleng ka ri ki la khmih lynti ban ialehkai bha na ka bynta ban jam sha kawei pat ka wat jingiakhun bad ruh ban khur takma.Ha kane ka rynsan iakura la wan iashim bynta da ki khlur iakura jong ka ri, kynthup ia u rangiakura uba la khur ia ka takma ksiar ha ka South Asian Games u Sachin na Services uba la iakhun pyrshah ia u Vishal Kumar uba na Punjab ha ka 54-57kg featherweight bad u la lah ban khur ia ka jingjop da kaba tam point.U rangiakura uba la khur ia ka takma rupa ha ka Asian Championship 2019 u Ashish Kumar na Himachal Pradesh u la iakhun pyrshah ia u rangiakura na Manipur u Kingson ha ka featherweight. Hapdeng kane ka jingiakhun kaba iakhaid bha, hynrei u Kumar u la lah ban khur ia ka jingjop.Kiwei pat ki rangiakura ka Jylla (Meghalaya), ba kynthup ia u Kordor Marwein ha ka lightweight 57-60kg, u la shah rem ha u Aditya Nagar na Uttar Pradesh hadien ba u rephri u la hap ban pynsangeh noh ia ka jingiakhun ha ka wat kaba nyngkong. Kane ka jingpynsangeh ka la wan hadien ba u Kordor u la shah kura tyngeh ha utei u rangiakura uba na UP.Ha ka 48-51kg flyweight, u Khrawbok Marwein u la iakhun pyrshah ia u rangiakura uba na Bihar u Shiv Kant. Watla u la shah kura bad khyllem ha madan, hynrei u la pyrshang katba lah ban iakhun tyngeh bad ha kaba kut u la shah rem noh hadien ba u la shah tam point ha utei u rangiakura uba na Bihar.
title: PYNI U BADONKUPAR SYNNAH ÏA KA SAP KURA DA KA JINGJOP HA KA 7th ELITE MEN’S NATIONAL BOXING C’SHIP

content: : U Myntri Khynnah ba dei khmih ïa ka tnat Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, u Bhanu Pratap Singh Verma u la ïashim bynta ha ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra kaba la long ha ka shnong Tynring kaba hap hapoh ka Mawryngkneng Block jong ka  East Khasi Hills District, Meghalaya mynta ka sngi.Ha ka jingai jingkren jong u, u Myntri u la ong ba ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra, ka dei ka campaign ha kylleng ka ri ban ai jingtip khnang ban pyntreikam pura ïa ki skhim ka Sorkar India ha baroh ki jaka rilum, ki jaka nongkyndong bad ki jaka sor. U la kren shaphag ka thong jong ka Yatra kaba long ban ai jingtip ïa ki bynta ka imlang sahlang kiba shem jingeh kiba dei ban ïoh bynta ha ki skhim bapher bapher hynrei ki bym pat ïoh jingmyntoi na kine ki skhim.Ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la shim shibun ki sienjam na ka bynta ka roi ka par jong ki riewlum bad ka imlang sahlang ha ki jaka nongkyndong ha kine ki khyndai snem ba la dep bad ka la wanrah ïa ka roi ka par sha kine ki jaka. U Myntri Rangbah Duh, u Narendra Modi u niewkor bha ïa ka roi ka par kaba pura ha ka thain shatei lammihngi jong ka ri bad u la pynthikna ba ki briew na kane ka thain ki ïoh kham bun ki jingmyntoi na baroh ki skhim Sorkar. Ki jylla ka thain ki la ïoh mad ïa ka roi ka par kaba stet ha kine ki khyndai snem ba la dep haba ka Sorkar ka la peit bniah ïa ka jingkyntiew ïa ki lad ka leit ka wan bad ki jingdon jingem. Ka jingstet ka roi ka par ha kane ka thain ka pyni ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka peit bha ïa ka jingkyntiew ïa ki lad ka leit ka wan ha kane ka thain bad ka jingtei ïa ki surok bah ha ki jaka ba jynjar ban poi ruh. Na ka Look East Policy kaba rim, mynta la pyntreikam ïa ka Act East Policy.U Myntri u la sam certificate ïa khyndai ngut ki briew kiba ïoh jingmyntoi na ka Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana Gramin. Ha ka jingkren shaphang kane ka skhim, u Myntri u la ong ba ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka PMAY-G – ka skhim pynïoh iing ïa baroh – ka la pynurlong ïa ki jingangnud jong kiba duk ba suk ba kin don ka iing lajong. U Myntri u la kren shaphang ki jingkylla kiba la wan lyngba ki skhim jong ka Sorkar kum ka Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana, PM Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana, Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana, PM Awas Yojana (Rural), PM Ujjwala Yojana, PM Kisan Saman abad ka Kisan Credit Card.Ha ka jingkren shaphang ka Tnat Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, u Myntri u la ong ba kane ka Tnat ka trei borbah ban pynkupbor ïa ki MSME khnang ba kin kiew shaphrang ha ka rukom kaba ïaineh bad khnang ba kin ïahap bad ki jinglong jingman ha kylleng ka pyrthei. Ki longkmie na kane ka thain ki lah ban ïoh ki jingmyntoi na ki skhim jong kane ka tnat namar ka don ka subsidy kaba 33% na ka bynta ki briew na kane ka thain, la ong u Myntri.Ha ka jingkren shaphang ka skhim ba thymmai ba la plié paidbah da u Myntri Rangbah Duh ha ka 17 tarik u Nailur, ka Pradhan Mantri Vishwakarma Yojana (PMVY), u Myntri u la ong ba ka thong jong ka Sorkar ka dei ban kyntiew ïa ka jingim jong ki nongsaindur bad ki nongshna tiar bad ai ïa ki ka teknoloji ka ban pynkhlain shuh shuh ïa ki ba kin lah ban don bynta ha ki iew ha kane ka juk mynta. Kane ka skhim, kaba peit ïa 18 tylli ki jait kam tynrai, kan pynkup bor ruh ïa ki nongsaindur lyngba ka jingtip shaphang ki tiar katkum ka juk mynta, ka jingpynïaid iew, ka jingsngewthuh shaphang ki kam digital bad ki kam pisa bad ruh ka jingkyrshan jong ka jingïoh shim ram, kiba kyntiew ïa ka jinglah pynmih tiar jong ki bad kaba plié lad ban pynïaid iew ïa ki mar jong ki ha ka rukom kaba kham seisoh bad kaba kham ryntih, la ong u Myntri.Hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Myntri Rangbah Duh, ka India ka la kiew shaphrang ha baroh ki kam bad mynta ka don ha ka kyrdan kaba 5 ha ka ïoh ka kot ha kane ka pyrthei, la ong u Verma da kaba bynrap ba shen ka ri kan sa kylla sha ka ri kaba don ha ka kyrdan kaba lai ha ka ïoh ka kot.U Myntri u la ong ba la sdang ïa ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra da kaba shim ïa ka rukom treikam kaba pura ha ka jingïadon bynta ki tnat Sorkar India bad ki Sorkar Jylla ban pynthikna ïa ka jingïashim bynta jong baroh na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki briew jong ka ri bad khnang ban pynurlong ïa ka thong jong ka jingïoh ïa ka ri kaba la kiew shaphrang. U la kyntu ïa ki nongmihkhmat, ki ophisar bad kiwei kiwei ba kin ïashim bynta ha ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra ban ai jingtip ïa ki briew bad ban pynshlur ïa ki ba kin leit shim ïa ki jingmyntoi ba ki dei ban ïoh.U Myntri ka tnat Animal Husbandry and Veterinary jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Alexander Laloo Hek u la ong ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la wanrah shibun ki sienjam ba thymmai na ka bynta ka roi ka par jong ka Jylla bad ka ri baroh kawei. U la kyntu ïa ki briew ba kin shim ïa ki jingmyntoi na ki prokram bad ki skhim jong ka Sorkar. Ka Sorkar hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Myntri Rangbah Duh, u Narendra Modi ka dang ïaleh katba lah ban pynthikna ba ym don kano kano ka thain jong ka ri kaba sahdien, la ong u Hek.Ha shuwa kane baroh, u Myntri u la leit jngoh ïa ki stall ba la pynkhreh ha kane ka jaka. La don ruh ki prokram ‘Jan Bhagidari’ bapher bapher kum ka jingïathuh ki briew shaphang ki jingshem jong ki shaphang ki skhim Sorkar Pdeng, ka jingpyntreikam pura ïa ki skhim kum ka Ayushman Bharat, Jal Jeevan Mission, Jan Dhan Yojana, PM Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana, ODF Plus status, ki quiz competition, ka jingpyni ïa ka jingpynher drone, ki health camp bad kiwei kiwei. Kane ka prokram mynta ka sngi ka la khring bha ïa ki briew bad la pynlong ruh ïa ka jingbam smai ‘Sankalp Pledge”. Ki heh ophisar jong ka sorkar jylla ki la ïashim bynta ha kane ka prokram.
title: HALOR KA ROI KA PAR PYNTIP U MYNTRI KHYNNAH KA MSME HA KA VIKSIT BHARAT SANKALP YATRA HA TYNRING

content: Ka North Eastern Police Academy (NEPA) ha ka sngi baar ka la pynbam smai ia ki 377 ngut ki Ophisar Pulit kiba kynthup ia ki Deputy Superintendents of Police (Dy. SP) bad ki Sub-Inspectors (SI) kiba dei na ka Jylla Assam, Arunachal Pradesh, Mizoram, Tripura bad Nagaland.Kane ka jingpynbam smai ka long hadien ba kane ka kynhun ne 52nd Batch ki la pyndep pura ia ki jingshah hikai pyntbit.Na kine ki 377 ngut, 82 ngut ki dei ki Dy. SP bad 295 ngut ki dei ki SI, kata 331 ngut na Assam, 9 ngut na Arunachal Pradesh, 8 ngut na Mizoram, 21 ngut na Tripura bad 8 ngut na ka jylla Nagaland.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam u Himanta Biswas Sharma u la long u kongsan ha kane ka sngi.  U Director jong ka North East Police Academy, u Gya Nendra Pratap Singh u la pynbam smai ia ki ophisar kiba la pyndep ia ka jingshah hikai pyntbit ha NEPA.Ki bahaing hasem jong kine ki Pulit, ki Ophisar Pulit jong ka NEPA, Meghalaya, bad Assam ki la sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi ba la pynlong ruh ia ka passing out parade ba la shim salute da u Himanta Biswas Sharma.Haba kren kum u Kongsan u Himanta Biswas Sharma u la ai khublei ia ki Ophisar bad ia ka jingtrei shitom jong ka NEPA bad ia u Director u Gya Nendra Pratap Singh.  U la ong ba ka kam jong ki Pulit Ophisar ka long ban shakri ia ka ri bad ban noh ruh ia u synñiang u bynhei na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki paidbah ha ka imlang ka sahlang.“Ki ophisar kiba iashim bynta ha kane ka Passing Out Parade ki la plie lynti hi dalade ialade.  Ki la pyndep ia ka jingshah hikai pyntbit bad manla ka jinghikai ka long kaba kongsan namarba kan long ka jingmyntoi ban ai jingshakri ha ka ri,” u la ong.U Sarma u la iaroh ruh ia ka jinglen lade jong ka tnat Pulit ha ka ri baroh kawei bad pynpaw ruh ia ki kam ba ki la leh ban pynneh pynsah ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ, ban tohkit ia ki kam runar, ban iarap ruh ia ki paidbah haba wan kino kino ki jingshah lynshop na ki bor jong ka mariang.
title: BAM SMAI KI 377 NGUT KI DY. SP BAD SI KIBA LA PYNDEP ÏA KA JINGSHAH HIKAI PYNTBIT HA NEPA

content: Ka jingpynkhreh na ka bynta ban pyni nam ia ka jngriew spah jong ka riti dustur bad ka kolshor jong ka Bri u Hyniewtrep ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ha kane ka kynti ka la pynbna ba kan sa pynlong ia ka Monolith Festival ha ka shnong Mawphlang, East Khasi Hills District.Mynta ka jingpynkhreh ban shna bad ban maramot ia ki iing trep jong ki Hima bapher bapher ka la nang iaid shaid shaid ha Heritage Village kaba don ha Mawphlang.Halor kane ka jingthmu jong ka District Council, u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Chairman ka Ingdorbar Thawain ka District Council u Bah Lamphrang Blah bad u Executive Member ba peit ia ka tnad Larirti u Bah Victor Rani lem bad ki ophisar bad ki bor pyniaid ka Hima Mawphlang ha ka lah sngi U Blei ki la leit ban jurip ia ka jingpynkhreh ban pynlong ia kane ka tamasa.Ha ka jingjurip, la sakhi ba ka jingmaramot ia ki iing trep jong ki Hima bapher bapher ka dang iaid shaid namarba ki don ki iing trep kiba la sdang ban sator bad ban pra.La sakhi ia ka jingtap thymmai da u tynriew, ki phlang ban shna pynitynnad bad ka jingker da ki siej ia kaba la shna pynwan dur bha khnang ba kin khring bha ia ki nongwan jngoh kai pyrthei ki ban sa wan sakhi ha ka Monolith Festival ka ban sa long la kumno kumno ha u bnai Nohprah mynta u snem.Ha kane ka tamasa yn sa don ruh ka jaka ba kyrpang ia kaba la tip kum ka Children Park khnang ba ki khynnah khunlung kin ioh ban lehkai sngewbha ia kaba yn shna la ka jong na ka bynta ki kynthei bad ki khynnah shynrang.Ha jingjurip la sakhi ruh ia ka jingwan tuid jong ki nongjngohkai pyrthei nabar jylla sha ha Heritage Village bad la khmihlynti ba ka Komiti kaba peit ia kane ka tamasa kan sa buh tarik ban pynlong ia kane ka tamasa na ka bynta ban pynpaw pyrthei ia ka jingriewspah jong ka kolshor jong u Khasi.U Bah Pyniaid ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ka jingpynkhreh ia kane ka tamasa ka long naduh kaba maramot ia ki ing trep bad kumjuh ruh ban shna pynitynnat shuh shuh ia ki lynti iaid kjat.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Bah Pyniaid ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrrthei ka la mang pisa T.4 klur ia ka KHADC na ka bynta kane ka tamasa katba ka KHADC kan pynlut pisa nalade kumba 50 lak tyngka eiei.
title: YN BUH NAM KA KHADC ÏA KI DUR SHIPAI BA SHLUR JONG KI HIMA KHASI HA HERITAGE MUSEUM

content: Ki nongtrei Accredited Social Health Activist (ASHA) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la mih sha surok ban pynlong da ka jingïaid rally kaba jai jai kum ka jingpyrshah ïa ka jingkuman jong ka Sorkar Jylla halor ki jingdawa ba kynthup ruh ïa ka jingpynkiew ïa ka jingsiew bainong.Wat hapdeng ka jingther jong u slap, da ki spah ngut ki nongtrei ASHA ki la ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïaid paidbah kaba la pynkut ha madan Malki.Ka President jong ka Meghalaya ASHA Workers’ Union (MAWU) Kong Marajune Myrsing haba kren ha ka jingïalang ka la ong ba kan ym don kano kano ka jingpyndem lada ka Sorkar kam lah ban ai ïa ka jingkular ba la dawa da ki ASHA.Ki nongtrei ASHA ki la dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynkiew ïa ka jingsiew Honorarium na ka T. 2,000 sha ka T. 5,000Haba pynpaw ba ki ASHA ki don ka hok ban dawa, ka Kong Myrsing ka la ong, “ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka la pyndep ba ka bainong jong ki nongtrei ASHA ka long T. 5,000 hynrei ka tip ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka siew ïa ngi tang T. 2,000 kaba long tang T. 66 shi sngi.“Ngan pynkynmaw ruh ïa ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la siew ïa ngi da ka fxed honorarium kaba T. 2,000 hadien ba ka la pynduh noh ïa ka ABF/MBBS, ïa kaba ym shym la pynkhuid satia mynta la bun bun snem,” ka la bynrap.Shuh shuh ka kong Myrsing ka la ong ba ka Union kan sa shong jingïalang lashai ka sngi ban shim rai biang kumno ban pynlong ïa ki jingïakhih ha ki sngi ban dang wan.“Nga pynbna ba ïa ki peace rally ba la pynlong ha ki District la pynkut mynta ka sngi bad nangne shakhmat kan ym long shuh da ka peace rally hynrei da ka protest rally. Nga kyntu ïa ki dkhot jong ka Executive Committee ba kin ïashim bynta lang ha ka jingïalang ka ban long lashai ka sngi na ka bynta ban rai ïa ki jingïakhih,” ka la ong.Ka jingshakri ha ka koit ka khiah ha ki 7,000 tyllli ki shnong ka la shah  ktah na ka daw ka jingpynlong jong ki ASHA ïa ka jingïakhih kaba khlem pud sngi kaba la kynjoh mynta sha ka sngi kaba shiphew.Ha ka 15 tarik mynta u bnai, ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la pyni ïa ka Official Data halor ka jingsiew bainong ba la ai ïa ki nongtrei ASHA bad katkum kane ka Data ka pynpaw ba ka nongtrei ASHA na ka Kyrdem PHC ka la ïoh T. 82,000 kum ka “performance incentives” bad ka “regular honorarium” na ka bynta hynriew bnai.Katkum ka Official Data, bun na ki nongtrei ASHA ki la ïoh ïa jingsiew kaba long naduh T. 23,000 haduh  T. 82,000 ha ki hynriew bnai kata naduh ka 1 tarik Ïaiong, haduh ka 30 tarik, Nailur 2023 katkum ka tarik ba la siew sha ki Bank Account.Ka Dr. Ampareen ka la ong ba ka kyndit ban ïohi ba ki nongtrei mon sngewbha ki ïoh ïa ka jingsiew kaba heh.
title: NGI ÏOH JINGSIEW TANG 66 TYNGKA SHI SNGI, DAWA KI ASHA ÏA KA BAINONG KABA T.5 HAJAR

content: Ka Delimitation Committee ba la thaw da ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) kan sa pynlong da ki public hearing na ka bynta ki 23 tylli ki Constituency kum ka jingpynkhreh na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ka Delimitation Bill shwa ba ka elekshon jong ki Autonomous District Council kin long ha u snem ban sa wan.U Chairman jong ka Delimitation Committee u Dr S. Kharsyiemlieh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi thohdieng u la ong ba ha kine ki Public Hearing yn sa sngap ia ki jingpynsngew bad ki jingai jingmut jong ki paidbah na ki 23 tylli ki Constituency ki ban sdang naduh ka 21 tarik Naiwieng, haduh ka 15 tarik u Nohprah.U Dr. Kharsyiemlieh, uba long ruh u Nongbishar ba la shongthait jong ka District Council Court, u la ong ba ia ka public hearing na ka bynta ki ar tylli ki Constituency ka South West Khasi Hills, Mawkyrwat bad Langrin yn sa pynlong ha ka ophis jong ka district council ha Mawkyrwat ha ka 21 tarik Naiwieng, ha Mairang, Eastern West Khasi Hills ha ka 24 tarik Naiwieng, ha Shillong, East Khasi Hills (na ka bynta ka Sohryngkham, Mawkynrew, Nongkrem, Langkyrdem Laitkroh, Nongshken bad Mawsynram) yn sa pynlong ha ka 28 tarik Naiwieng, ha Sohra Civil Subdivision (na ka bynta ka Sohra bad Shella) yn pynlong ha ka 1 tarik, Nohprah, ha Nongpoh, Ri Bhoi (na ka bynta ka Jirang, Nongpoh, Mawhati, Umsning bad Umroi) yn pynlong ha ka 6 tarik Nohprah, ha Shillong (na ka bynta ka Mylliem, Laban-Mawprem, Nongthymmai, Laitumkhrah-Malki, Mawkhar-Pynthorumkhrah, Jaiaw, Mawlai, Mawphlang, Diengiei bad Nongspung-Sohiong) yn sa pynlong ha ka 13 tarik Nohprah, bad ha Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills (na ka bynta ka Nongstoiñ, Rambrai-Jyrngam bad Mawshynrut) yn sa pynlong ha ka 15tarik Nohprah.Kine ki public hearing kin sdang naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep haduh ka por 4 baje janmiet.“Ngi pdiang sngewbha ia ki jingai jingmut bad bad ki jingpynsngew na ki kynhun bapher bapher. Namarkata, ngi kyntu ia ki paidbah ba kin wan shakhmat ban iashim bynta ha kine ki jingpynsngew paidbah,” u la ong.Haba kylli, u Dr. Kharsyiemlieh u la ong, ia mynta ka Mawlai ka dei kaba don ia ki nongthep vote haduh 45,000 hajar tam bad ka Laban-Mawprem ka dei kaba duna tam ki nongthep kata, tang 12,000 hajar.U la iathuh ba ka jingthmu jong ka KHADC ia ka komiti ka long katkum ka jingthoh ba la ioh pdiang da ka council ia ka jingdonkam ban pynkynriah ia ki shnong na kawei ka Constituency sha kawei pat.
title: PAN JINGMUT KA KHADC NA KI PAIDBAH SHWA BAN PHIAH ÏA KI CONSTITUENCY

content: Ha ki lai sngi lynter ba la pynlong ia ka 2nd edition jong ka Kelvin Cinema Festival 2023, kata, ha ka 9, 10 bad ha ka 11 tarik u Naiwieng 2023 ha SoSo Tham Auditorium Shillong, la sakhi ia ki sap shna phlim jong ki khasi ba la pyni ha kane ka tamasa ba la bei pisa da ka Shankar Lall Goenka & Jeevan Ram Mungi Devi Goenka Public Charitable Trust ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Fraternity Art Cine Entertainment, Shillong.Ha kine ki lai sngi lynter la pyni haduh 12 tylli ki phlim kiba la shah jied na kylleng ka ri India bad napdeng kine ki 12 tylli, la pyni paidbah ruh ia ki lai tylli ki phlim lyngkot ba la shna ha ka ktien Khasi ia kiba la ai kyrteng kum ‘ka Pateng, ka Jyllop bad ka Gray.Ha ka sngi pynkut ia kane ka tamasa pyni phlim, la sakhi lang da ka Editor jong ka Kotkhubor The Shillong Times ka Kong Patricia Mukhim kaba la long kum ka Kongsan, ka Rima Das kaba dei ka National Awardee, kaba la long kum ka symbud Kongsan kiba la sam ia ki khusnam sha ki nongjop ha kane ka tamasa pyni phlim.Ia ka nam Best Film la ioh da ka ” Son of the Soil” ba shna da ka Akashnya Bhahabati, katba ia ka nbam Best Director la ioh da u Sankirang Khongwir uba la shna ia ka phlim, ‘Ka Pateng,’ ia ka nam Best Actor na ki shynrang la ioh da u Pynkmen Lyngdoh Mawnai uba la ak ha ka phlim “Ka Pateng bad Jyllop’, ia ka nam Best Actor na ki kynthei la ioh rah da ka Millo Sunka kaba la iashim bynta ha ka phlim ‘Noctural Burger,’ ia ka nam Best Cinematography la iohrah da u Bah El Dhar na ka phlim ‘Pateng,’ ia ka nam Best Sound Design la ioh da u Sukanya Bhawal na ka phlim ‘Ek Divas’ bad ia ka nam Best Editor la ioh rah da ka Reema Maya bad u Rohan Kapoor na ka phlim Noctural Burger.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah El Dhar bad u Bah Sankirang Khongwir ki la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen ba ki la shah jied ban ioh ia shim bynta ha kane ka tamasa pyni phlim bad ioh khur ruh ia ki khusnam. Ki la ong ruh ba lada don kum kine ki tamasa ki iohlad ban pyni ia ki phlim ba ki khun samla kiba don sap ha ka kam shna phlim kin dup iohlad ban pynpaw pyrthei ia la ka sap ka phong ba ki don.
title: PAW KA SAP SHNA PHLIM KI KHASI HA KA KELVIN CINEMA FESTIVAL 2023

content: : U Bah Robert June Kharjahrin uba la shakri la 20 snem kynthih kum u dkhot sengbhalang kata kum u dkhot barim jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) bad kum u nongïalam ba la shongthait jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la pynbna ba u dang don ka jingangnud ban bteng ïa ka jingshakri jong u ïa ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew lyngba ka sain hima sima.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingshah pynkup burom ha ka sngi ba la pynskhem ïa ki nongkitkam ba thymmai jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC), u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin ula ong, “lada ki nongïalam jong ki seng saiñpyrthei ki ibit ïa nga, nga la long uba la pynkhreh ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon MP.”Haba kylli, u la ong, “ha ka jingim jong nga, nga kham snoh sha ki Regional Party bad haba ngi pyrkhat ïa ki Regional Party, ka UDP bad ka HSPDP ki dei ki sengriewlum kiba la slem bad kiba la ïoh jingieid bad ïoh jingshaniah na ki paidbah bad kiba la noh ïa u synñiang u bynhei sha ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep bad sha ka jylla baroh kawei.”“Ngan tyrwa ïalade ban ïakhun na ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) bad kata pat ka shong ha ka jingibit bad ka shong ha ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut lang jong ki nongïalam.  Lada ha kano kano ka dur ruh, u synñiang u bynhei jong nga nangne shakhmat ngan shakri ïa ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew katba lah ei ngan noh lyngba ka sain hima sima,” ula ong.Dang shen ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) kaba la pynthymmai ïa ki nongïalam ba kynthup ïa u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh uba long u President ka UDP kum u Chairman bad u President ka HSPDP kum u Secretary ki la shim ïa ka rai ban ïakynduh biang sa shisien ban pyrkhat ha kaba ïadei bad u kyrtong monlang ban pynïakhun ïa ka elekshon MP sha Lok Sabha na Shilong Parliament Constituency ka ban sa long ha u snem 2024.Da kaba pynpaw ïa ka nongrim kaba la pynlong ïa u ban rung sha ka jylli jong ka saiñpyrthei, u Bah Kharjahrin u la ong, “kum u rangbah uba don ïa kata ka jingkitkhlieh bad kum u khun jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep uba thrang shisha ban ïohi ba ka jaidbynriew jong ngi kan don hapdeng kata ka jingïada kaba biang bad ngin don hapdeng kita ki jingkiew irat ha ki liang baroh nga la rai ban ïasnohkti ban ïashim bynta ha ka sainhima sima.  Nga ngeit skhem ba lyngba ka saiñhima sima ngin sa lah ban bteng ïa ka mishon kaba ngi la don ha ka mynsiem bad nga ngeit skhem ba ka jaidbynriew Hynñiewtrep kan ai ïa ka kti ka mon kti ka diang kaba ngin lah ban pynurlong ïa ki mat ki jura kiba ka jaidbynriew jong ngi bad ka jylla ka la angnud la slem bah,” u la bynrap.“Halor u pud u sam ngim lah ban len ba ngi donkam ïa ka jingpynbeit ïa ka North East Organisation Act  bad ïa ka Sixth Schedule, ka jingdawa ban pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka khyrnit Baphra, ka jingdawa ban wanrah ïa ka roi ka par ha ki liang baroh bad kum ka jylla jong ngi ngi donkam shibun na ka Sorkar India bad dei na kane ka daw ba ka la don ha ka jingmut ba ngan tyrwa ïalade ba ngan ïakhun ïa ka elekshon MP,”ula ong.“Kumba nga la pynïasoh ïalade bad ki kynhun Sengbhalang nga don tang kawei ka thong ban ïakhun na ka bynta ban ïada ïa ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew jong ngi pyrshah ïa ki nongshun kiba nabar bad bapoh jong ka jylla. Nga don ka jingangnud ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka jinglong bakyrpang jong ka jaidbynriew bad kumjuh ban kyntiew ïa ka jaidbynriew Hynniewtrep ka jylla ha ki liang baroh,” ula ong.“Da kata ka jingangnud bad da kata ka jingthrang ka la pynlong ïa nga ban neh ha ka kynhun sengbhalang la jan dap 20 snem nga la leh ha la ibor iba rit ban noh synñiang lyngba ka sengbhalang bad nga dang sngewthuh biang biang ba ki dang don shibun ki mat ki jura ïa kiba ngim pat lah lehse ban pynurlong ha kane ka kynti hynrei ka jaidbynriew ka donkam pat ïa ka jingïada da ka Inner Line Permit (ILP), ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap, ïa u pud u samla, ka jingpynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra bad kiwei pat ki mat ki jura kiba dang donkam shisha kum ka jaidbyniew jong ngi,” u la bynrap.Haba kynthoh ba ki MP kiba la mihkhmat ïa ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency kim shym la lah satia ban pynurlong wat tang ïa kawei ruh ka mat jingdawa na ka Sorkar India, u Bah Kharjahrin u la ong, “ngi dei ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti kumno ban pynbor ïa ka Sorkar India ba kan ai ha ngi ïa kita ki jngdawa jong ngi. Ha kine ki snem kiba ladep, ngin ym lah ban len ba kita ki nongmihkhmat ïa ka jaidbynriew Hynñiewtrep bad ïa ka jylla Meghalaya kim shym la lah ban pynurlong ïa ki mat ki jura.”
title: ELEKSHON MP : TYRWA U BAH ROBERTSON KHARJAHRIN SHA KA RDA KUM U KYRTONG MONLANG

content: KA SORKAR KA DEI BAN PYNKHLAIÑ IA KA NARCOTIC ACT: U MLA jong ka North Shillong Constituency u Bah Adelbert Nongrum ha ka sngi balang u la pynpaw ka jingpyrshah bad pynrem jur ia ki briew kiba donkti ban die pylleiñ pylleiñ ia u drok hajan ka Sweeper Lane mar pyrshah ka Bhutia Market ha ka lah sngi U Blei ia kaba la ioh ban ring video da ki nongleit nongwan bad pynsaphriang ha ka rynsan Social Media.“Nga pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah bad ka jingpynrem halor ka jingjia ha ka 6 tarik, Naiwieng 2023 halor ka jiingiadie iathied ha kaba iadei bad u drok haba shit haba shai la kum ba die kwai die sikret khlem don jingtieng ne burom shuh ha ka jaka kaba don mar pyrshah ia ka Bhutia Market hajan Sweeper’s Lane ha kaba nga ngeit ba baroh ngi la iohi ba ka la saphriang ha ki Social Media bad kane kan long ka thma pyrshah ia u drok,” ong u Bah Adelbert ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Nga ai ka jingiaroh ia ki briew jong ka aiñ kiba la pyrshang ban trei shitom na ka por sha ka por bad ngi sakhi ia ka jingioh kurup ia kine ki jingdih buaid na ki kali paidbah, na ki kali Sorkar ka ban wanlam ka jingduh jingshahniah balei ki jia kumne,” u la ong.“Ka Sorkar ka dei ban shim kyrkieh ia ka jingkit khlieh kumno ban pynkhlaiñ ia ka tnat Pulit bad ban pyntreikam da ka buit thymmai ban phong da ki riam ki ban nym pynithuh ialade ba ki dei ki briew jong ka aiñ (plain clothes) bad ban pynkhlain ia ka jingiaid syntiat (patrolling),” la ai jingmut u Bah Nongrum.“Ka Sorkar ka dei ban shim kyrkieh kloi kloi ban pynkhlaiñ ia ka Narcotic Act kaba long synjor kumba long mynta.  Hooid khlem pep kan dei ka jingiatreilang na baroh ki liang, hynrei ka Sorkar kum ka Kmie ka dei ban pyntreikam pyrkhing ban khanglad ia ka jingwan rung laitluid jong kine ki jingsniew sha kane ka jylla ka jong ngi,” u la bynrap.“Kan long lehnohei bad sepei lada ngi trei borbah napoh hynrei ka jingpyrkhing pat kam don, ki jingsniew kin nang ioh ban rung laitluid, kum ban pynkynmaw ha ki por jong ka Covid-19 ladon ka jingpyrkhing ia ki briew baroh shuwa ban rung sha ki jylla ban hap ban pyndep shuwa ia ki kyndon ha Byrnihat Entry Check–Gate bad lada ka Sorkar ka don ia ka jingkitkhlieh ia la ka jong ka jylla bad khamtam ka jingieid ia ki khun samla kan pyntreikam kumjuh na ka Entry Check-Gate Byrnihat, lym kumta kane ruh kan long kum kawei pat ka khlam ka ban ym lah ban ioh ia ka dawai ban pynkhiah,” u la ong.“Lyngba kane nga ngeit ba ngin lah ban pynduna, ngin lah ban tehlakam bad ban pynsangeh (reduce, control & stop), namar kumba ka long mynta ka jingkhaii bad ka jingdawa ka long laitluid,” la bynrap u Bah Nongrum.
title: PYNREM U BAH ADELBERT NONGRUM IA KI NONGDIE DROK HA SUROK HAJAN SWEEPER LANE

content: Ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) kaba long ka shatri jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) kan sa shong jingialang ha ka 7 tarik Naiwieng, ban iathir iatai halor ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha u snem ban sa wan.Ka thymmei khubor ka iathuh ba kine ki ar tylli ki seng saiñpyrthei kin sei tang uwei u kyrtong monlang ban pyniakhun na ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat.Ka UDP ka don mynta 12 ngut ki MLA bad arngut na ka HSPDP ha ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ kaba 60 ngut ki dkhot.  Kine ki ar tylli ki seng saiñpyrthei ki dei kiba iatreilang hapoh ka Sorkar MDA ba la ialam da ka NPP.Ka State Election Committee jong ka UDP kan sa iakynduh ha ka sngi baar shwa ban shong jingialang ha ka kynhun RDA.Ka khubor ba la iohlum la iathuh ba u President ka Khasi Author Society (KAS) u Dr DRL Nonglait bad u President barim ka HYC u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin ki pan tiket na ka UDP ban iakhun ia kane ka elekshon.
title: SHWA BAN SEI KYRTONG HA KA ELEKSHON MP, 7 TARIK YN SHONG JINGIALANG KA RDA

content: : Ki nongïalam ba hakhmat jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la leit ban ïa kynduh ïa u Director jong ka North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS)  ha kaba ïadei bad ka rai ban pynlyngkot ïa ka rta thepkam na ka 35 sha ka 30 snem ha ka kam Nursing Officer ba kane ka shlem ai jingsumar ha ka Advertisement ka la pynbna paidbah ha u bnai ba ladep.Ha  ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u General Secretary ka VPP, u Dr AJ Synkon ula ong ba ka jingïakynduh ïa u Director ka long beit ban wad ki daw ba la pynlyngkot ïa ka rta thep kam Nursing Officer.U la ïathuh, hadien ba ladep ban ïakren bad u Director u la pynpaw ba ka daw jong ka jingpynlyngkot ïa kane ka rta thepkam kam dei ka jingleh jong ka NEIGRIHMS hynrei ka dei beit ka hukum ba ka Sorkar Pdeng lyngba ka Ministry of Health and Family Welfare.U la ong ba hadien ba ka party ka la sngewthuh shai ba kane ka hukum ka dei kaba pynmih da ka Sorkar Pdeng na ka liang ka Party kan sa buddien ïa kane ka kam namarba kane ka rai kan ktah shibun ïa ki samla Khasi bad ki samla riewlum ha kylleng ka ri.U la ong ba ka party kan sa leit ban pynsngew sha ki tyndong skhor ka sorkar jylla ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka kam namarba donkam kum ka jylla ban pynmih ïa ka sur kaba tang kawei, kata, ba ka rta thepkam ka dei ban neh beit 35 kumba la ju ïaid baroh shikatta.
title: BA PYNRIT KA RTA THUNGKAM NURSING OFFICER, ÏAKYNDUH KA VPP ÏA U DIRECTOR NEIGRIHMS

content: Ka Khasi Student Union, Barrak Valley Circle kum shi bynta ban ithuh ithaw ia ki samla pule kiba dang shu wan thymmai na ka bynta ban bteng ia ka jingpule, ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep ka la pynlong ia ka prokram sam khusnam bad kumjuh ka jingpdiang burom ia ki samla khasi kiba sah ha Silchar, Assam.Ha kane ka sngi, ka seng ka la pynkup burom ia ki 45 ngut ki samla kiba la pas bha kiba wan na kylleng ka them Barrak Valley.La sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi, da u President jong ka KSU u Samla Lambokstar Marngar ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Assistant Secretary ka KSU u Samla Rueben Najiar bad ki dkhot jong ka Central Executive Committee, u Chairman ka Khasi Jaintia Village Development Council Bah Sebastian Pakyntieñ, u President jong ka Barak Valley Khasi Jaintia Welfare Organisation Bah Charles Rymbai, u General Secretary jong ka Barrak Valley Khasi Jaintia Welfare Organisation u Bah Wanbor Pdang bad kiwei kiwei.La pynphuh pynphieng ia kane ka jingialang da ki jingshad tynrai bad la pynlong ruh ia ka jingiakop Master Freshers bad Miss  Freshers ha kaba ia ka nam jop la iohrah da u Samla Hamjngai Bareh kum u Mr. Freshers bad ka samla Manisha Pohdweng kum ka Miss Freshers jong u snem 2023.
title: PDIANG BUROM KA KSU BARAK VALLEY ÏA KI SAMLA KHASI BA PULE HA SILCHAR

content: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha ka sngi Balang ka la rakhe ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap kaba 64 snem jong u Rev. JJM Nichols Roy uba dei u riewkhraw jong ka jaitbynriew khasi bad ia uba la ñiew ruh kum u Kpa jong ka Sixth Schedule.Shwa ban sdang ka jingrakhe kynmaw burom, u Chief Executive Member jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ryngkat ki Executive Member, ki MDC bad ki nongtrei jong ka Council ki la  buh syntiew ha u durmot jong u Rev. JJM Nichols Roy uba la tei sah pynkynmaw ha phyllaw jong ka District Council.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ia u Rev JJM Nichols Roy la kha ha ka 12 tarik, Jylliew 1884 bad une u riewkhraw jong ka jaitbyndriew Khasi u la khladnoh na kane ka sla pyrthei ha ka 1 tarik Naiwieng 1959.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Pyniaid Syiem u la ong, “ka jingiatylli hapdeng ki jaidbynriew riewlum bapher bapher ha ka thaiñ shatei Lammihngi jong ka ri India ka dei namar ka Sixth Schedule lane ka District Council kaba la aibor ba kin lah ban pynneh pynsah bad ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh lyngba ki kyndon aiñ bapher bapher ba ki MDC ki lah ban wanrah ka aiñ ka ban ithuh haduh kane ka pateng ba mynta.  Shibun bah ki jingmyntoi kiba ngi ioh da ka jingdon jong ka District Council.U la ong ruh, lada ianujor bad kiwei kiwei ki jaitbynriew, kiba bun ki jaitbynriew kim tip shuh naei ki wan namarba kim don ia ka aiñ ka ban iada ia ka jinglong bakyrpang jong ki hapoh ka riti Synshar jong ka ri India hadien ka jingioh jong ka ri India ia ka jinglaitluid. “Hynrei ka jaitbyndriew Khasi-Pnar ka dang lah ban tip naei ngi wan ngi mih, namarba la pynioh ia ka jingiada ba kyrpang hapoh ka riti synshar jong ka ri India lyngba ka Sixth Schedule kaba long ka stieh iada,” ula ong.
title: KYNMAW BUROM KA KHADC ÏA KA LYNGKHUH SNGI ÏAP KABA 64 SNEM U REV. JJM NICHOLS ROY

content: : Ka Meghalaya State Planning Board (MSPB) ha ka sngi Balang ka la bthah ïa ka tnad Kam Pohïing ka jylla, Transport, ïa ka tnad PWD bad ïa ka tnad Pynroi Sor ba kin ai jingmut bad ba kin thawlad ban weng ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba jur bha manla ka sngi ha sor Shillong.U Chairman jong ka Board, Bah Metbah Lyngdoh ha ka jingkren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang jong ka MSPB u la ong ki tnad bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar Jylla ki la ïatai sani bha ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdheng kali kaba baroh ki paidbah ki mad jingeh manla ka sngi.U la ong ruh ba ka bynta kaba kine ki tnad treikam kin ai jingmut ka long kumno ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti khnang ban lait na ka jingdheng kali. U la bynrap ba ka State Planing Board kam shym la buh por ïa kine ki tnad treikam ba kin phah ïa ki jingai jingmut hynrei la shu bthah ïa ki saw tylli ki tnad treikam jong ka Sorkar ba kin leh pynstet kham kloi ia kane ka kam.Ha kane ka jingïalang la rai ban khot ïa ka tnad Bording ban ai jingmut halor ka rukom pynpoi bording sha ki paidbah ka jylla.U Bah Metbah u la ïathuh ruh ba ki tnad Sorkar kiba la poi sha kane ka jingïalang ki kynthup naduh ki ophisar sorkar ka tnad Kam Pohing, PWD, PHE, Transport, Urban Affairs, Agriculture, Power, Water Resources, ka tnat Soil, Fisheries nalor kiwei kiwei.U la iathuh ba ka Board kan sa khot biang ïa ka jingïalang ban shong pyrkhat kam halor ki jingai jingmut na ki tnad bapher bapher khnang ba kin lah ban tip kumno ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa kane ka jingthmu.
title: BA JUR KA DHENG KALI HA SHILLONG, PHAH THAWLAD KA MSPB ÏA KA TNAT HOME, PWD BAD URBAN

content: Ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la pyntreikam ia ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security Act, 2016 ka la buh hakhmat ia ka jingthmu ban pynthikna ia ka jingshngaiñ jong ki nongshong shnong ka jylla da kaba bishar sani bha bin pa bin ia ki nongshong wai kiba sah ha kylleng ki bynta jong ka Jylla.Ka jingpyntreikam ia kane ka Aiñ kan iada ia ki riew shim kabu bad ia ki runar ban ioh jaka rieh hapoh ka jylla bad ban pyrkhing da ka aiñ na ka bynta ban khanglad ia ka jingrung kyrthep be-aiñ bad ki nongbylla ba wan trei be-aiñ kiba lah ban rung bad sah ha ki shnong bapher bapher.Na ka bynta ka jingpyntreikam ia kane ka aiñ, ka Sorkar da ka jingiatreilang bad ka NIC, Meghalaya ka la pynbna paidbah ia ka online application ha ka 8 tarik Nailur 2023 khnang ba ki nongshong shnong (trai iing/nongshong wai) kin dup lah ban pynrung kyrteng ialade da ka jingpynshisha na ki bor synshar shnong.Namarkata, baroh ki trai iing/ki nongshong wai kiba sah hapoh ki hynñiew tylli ki shnong, kiba kynthup ia ka shnong Nongrim Hills, Pohkseh, Nongrah, Nongmensong, Lapalang, Riat Laban bad Wahdienglieng la jied ha ka wat ka banyngkong, ba ki dei ban pynrung kyrteng ialade ha ka App lyngba ka website https://megrssa.nic.in ia kaba lah ban plie lyngba ki PC, Laptop, Tablet bad Smart Phone. Ki trai ing bad ki nongshong wai ki lah ban pynrung kyrteng ruh lyngba ka Mobile App da kaba shu sei (downloaded) na ka website ba la kdew.Ia ki kot ki sla ba donkam bad kiwei kiwei ki jingtip kiba bniah lah ban ioh na ka ophis jong ka Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills, Shillong bad na ki Rangbah Shnong jong kine ki shnong ba la kdew haneng.
title: BTHAH KA SORKAR ÏA KI TRAI ÏING BAD NONGSHONG WAI BAN PYNRUNG KYRTENG LYNGBA KA MRSSA

content: Nongstoiñ, Risaw 23 : Hadien ka jingïawad kaba haduh 18 sngi ïa u Bah Lostar Nongphud u ba la jah rngai naduh ka 4 tarik Risaw, 2023, kiba ha ïing ha sem ki la lap ïa ka metïap jong u ha ka sngi U Blei ka 22 tarik u Risaw 2023.Ïa ka met jong u Bah Lostar la lap ha kawei ka wahduid kaba don ha ka khlaw kaba la tip kum ka Mawthawphan kaba hap hapoh ka shnong Tiniang, West Khasi Hills District.Ki nongïalam shnong ki la pyntip sha ki pulit ka Nongstoiñ Police Station bad ki pulit ki la wan ban shimti noh ïa ka metïap ban leh ïa kaba donkam.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne ba u Bah Lostar Nongphud 40 snem ka rta na ka shnong Mawsiangbah u la jah rngai naduh ka 4 tarik Risaw 2023 katba u dang leit wad kseh na khlaw bad une u rangbah u dei ruh uba don ïa ka jingshitom khie ring kaba ju khie man ka por.
title: LA LAP ÏA KA METÏAP U RANGBAH BA JAH RNGAI NA MAWSIANGBAH

content: Ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong R.M. Kurbah ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka la pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC kaba mana ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei ban pyntuid ïa ki jaboh jaboh sha Pung Umïam da kaba pyntreikam ïa ka hukum jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court kaba la pynmih ha ka 3 tarik, Risaw, 2023 kaba bthah ban wanrah biang ïa ka jingkhuid jingsuba jong ka Pung Umïam da kaba pynthikna ïa ka jingkhuid jingsuba jong baroh ki wah kiba tuid sha kane ka pung.’“La lap ba ka  jingbret pathar ïa ki jaboh jabaiñ sha ka pung da ki nongleit jingleit, ki nongleit bam khana, ki nongdie dukan bad kiba buh ïa ki dukan paki dulan bad kiwei kiwei.  La sngewdei ba ka long kaba donkam ban khanglad ïa kine ki kam be-aiñ na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki paidbah,” la ong ka Hukum ba la pynmih da ka Deputy Commissioner.Namar Kata, ban pynthikna ïa ka jingkhuid jong ka pung bad ki sawdong sawkun, ka Deputy Commissioner ka la mana tyngeh katkum ka Section 144 CrPC ban pyntuid jaboh, ne ban pyntuid ruh ïa ka um jaboh sha pung Umïam na baroh ki jaka kiba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka East Khasi Hills District.“Namar ba kane kam ka long kaba kyrkieh, kane ka hukum kan treikam noh mardor ha baroh ki jaka ba la kdew hangne tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat,” la ong ka hukum na ka Deputy Commissioner.
title: PYNJARI SECTION 144 CrPC KA DC-EKH BA JUR KA JINGPYNTUID JABOH SHA PUNG UMÏAM

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Chief Secretary u Bah D.P. Wahlang, u Director General of Police ka Jylla u Dr. L.R. Bishnoi, ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong R.M. Kurbah bad kiwei kiwei ki heh ophisar ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka lah sngi U Blei ki la leit jngoh ïa ka ïing mala ki Singhania ba la pluh ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep ha Thana Road, Police Baar.Ïa ka ding la lah ban pynlip hadien 40 kynta ka jingïakhun jong ki Pulit ka tnat Pynlip ding bad ki bor shipai.Hadien ka jingjurip u Myntri Rangbah u la shong pyrkhat kam bad ki Ophisar halor kane ka jingjia.  U la bthah ruh ïa ki Ophisar ban ai kaiphod halor kane ka jingjia, kaba la dkhat ruh ïa kawei ka mynsiem briew.  U la bthah ruh ïa ki Ophisar ban sorjamin ïa ki jingshngaiñ jong kane ka ing mala bad ban wad ïa ka daw jong ka jingsdang ka jingpluh jong ka ding.U Myntri Rangbah u la pynpaw ka jingsngewlem ïa ka longiing longsem kiba la shah ktah ha kane ka jingjia.  U la ong ba kane ka jingjia kaba sngewsih ka la ktah bha namar ba ka la jia ha ka jaka iew kaba dei ka kad khaii, kaba khim, bad kaba buh jingeh wat ïa ki kali pynlip ding ban rung.  U la ong ba kane ka dei ka jingshah tynjuh kaba khraw bha, hynrei la jan baroh ki nongtrei jong ki tnat treikam bapher bapher, khamtam ka tnat Fire and Emergency Services, ki shipai, ki shipai suiñ, Assam Rifles, BSF, Pulit, ki bor synshar District bad ki paidbah ki la ïatreilang ban tem ïa ka jingpluh jong ka ding.U la ïaroh ruh ïa ki kynhun bapher bapher, kiba la pynthikna ba ka ding kan ym pur sha kiwei pat ki ing mala kiba don markhap bad sha ki ing shong briew.  U la ïathuh ba ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah yn sa lum halor kane ka jingjia khnang ban lap ïa ka daw tynrai  ka jingsdang jong ka ding.“Ngin sa peit bha halor kane ka kam bad ngin sa wanrah da ki lad ki lynti kumno ban tem bad ban kiar ïa kum kine ki jingjia ha ki sngi ki ban sa wan,” u la ong.U la ong ba kane ka ïing mala ka don bun tylli ki kudam bad dei
