na kane ka daw ka la buh jingeh bha ïa ki kynhun ai jingïarap watla ki la pyrshang katba don la ka buit bad ka bor ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingpur jong ka ding.U la ong ba ha ka jingïalang jong ka Kynhun Myntri ka ban sa long ha ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai, yn sa ïathir ïatai halor kane ka jingjia.Kane ka jingjia pluh ding ka la pynkynmaw ruh kumno ban shim ïa ki lad jingïada.  Ka Sorkar ka dei ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynthikna ba baroh ki ïing mala ha ka jylla ki dei ban don ïa ki tiar pynlip ding.
title: HA KA CABINET YN ÏAKREN KA SORKAR IA KA JINGPLUH KA ÏING MALA KI SINGHANIA HA THANA ROAD

content: WANRAH KA ILP, YN SA ÏA PEIT ÏA KA RAILWAYKa Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ka pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkmen halor ka jingshimkhia ka sorkar ban ia treilang lem ba ki nongialam niam ban rat dyngkhong ia u drok na ka jylla Meghalaya bad na ka Jaidbynriew Khasi. Ka seng ka sngew ba ka jingiatreilang hapdeng ka sorkar, ki nongialam niam, ki nongsynshar shnong bad hima bad kumjuh ruh bad ki seng treimon sngewbha ka dei ka dak ban pyni ia ka jingsdang ban ia khun pyrshah ia ka jingwan rung u droks sha ka jylla uba rung pat ha ki khynnah skul bad samla haduh ban da pynjot thiaw ia ka jingim ka jong ki bad kaba ktah kylla pat ia ka iing ka sem ka jong ki, ka s kawei. KHASISTUOngsuk shongsain bad ka imlang sahlang hi baroh UNIONKi nongialam ka KSU kiba kynthup ia u samla Lambok Starwell Marngar (President), samla Biangbor Paliar (Vice President), samla Donald V. Thabah (General Secretary) bad u samla Reuben A. Najiar (Assistant General Secretary) dang ha ka 6 tarik u Risaw 2023 ki la leit ban ia kynduh ia u Symbud Myntri Rangbah, u Bah Prestone Tynsong uba dei peit ruh ia ka kam pohiing ha iing treikam jong u. Ha kane ka jingiakynduh la iathir bad ia syllok janai bha halor ka jingbam pong u drok ia ka imlang ka sahlang bad kumno ban tehlakam ban pynduh jait shi syndon ia une u jingdih iakjakor. Ki nongialam ka seng ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew bynniaw halor ka jingsynjor ka ain ban pynshtiom ia ki nongkhaii drok ha kaba wat kito kiba la snar bha ha kane ka kam ki kloi ban lait na phatok. U samla Lambok u la pynsngew ruh ha u Bah Prestone ba ia ki nongdih hap khein kum ki nongpang bad ka donkam shibun eh ia ka sorkar ban seng ia ki jaka ai jingsumar lane kita ki Rehabilitation/De-addiction Centre ha man la ki shnong ha Sor Shillong. U samla Lambok u la pynsngew ruh ba u drok mynta u la ksam wat shaduh ki shnong barit sha nongkyndong.Kumta u la kyntu ba ka sorkar ka dei ban buh ia kine ki jaka ai jingsumar ha baroh ki thain naduh ki kyrdan District, Sub-Division bad Block.Ha kaba ia dei pat bad ki nongkhaii drok, ka KSU ka la ju lap bunsien ha man la ki shnong ki thaw ba haba ki dkhot ka seng lem bad ki nongsynshar shnong ki ju ioh kem ia kine ki snar khaii drok. la iohi ba tang da ki bnai lane taiew ki la lait na phatok bad ki la bteng biang ia kane kajuh ka kam. Ka la don ka khep ruh ha South West Khasi Hills, ha kaba u nongkhaii drok u la ujor ejahar kylla pyrshah ia ki dkhot ka KSU haba ki kem ia u. ka KSU ka la pynsngew ba lada ka ain NDPS ka dang iai tlot bad synjor kumba long mynta ka mut ka jingdih bad khaii drok kan kynrei palat shah namar ka jingtlot ka ain kan ai mynsiem shuh shuh ia ki briew ba na jylla bad khamtam kiba nabar jylla ba kin pynlong ia ka jylla kum ka ktem khaii bad dih drok. Ka jingrung u droks lyngba ki bar jylla ka shyrkhei bha lyngba ka jingiohi na ki lad pathai khubor haba bunsien kiba shah kem ki dei beit kiba na shabar kumba la sakhi ha East Jaintia Hills.Na ka liang u symbud myntri rangbah ba ka tnad pulit lem ba Ka tnad Social Welfare ki la ia treilang kumno ban the lakam ia ka jingdih bad khaii drok ha jylla. U Bah Prestone u la pyntip ba la pynkha ia ka Advisory Committee ka ban bishar ia ki nongkhaii drok bad ka jingpynshitom kan ym long shuh tang da ki taiew ne ki bhai hynrej wat da ki bun snem ruh. U la pyntip ruh ba ka sorkar kan sa ia syllok bad baroh ki nongialam seng treimon sngewbha, seng niam bad nongsynshar shnong ban pynduh jait ia ka jingdih drok ha jylla kaba la kylla sha ka jingbymshong shngain ka imlang ka sahlang lyngba ka tuh ka thiem, ka thok ka shukor bad ka lute.U President ka KSU la pynpaw ruh ba ka sorkar ka dei ban khot ia ki nongaikhubor ban sakhi lang bad pyni paidbah haba ka tnad pulit ka thang ia ki drok ba la ioh kem ha kaba une u myntri u la kular ban bishar ia kane ka jingdawa.Ki nongialam ka KSU ki la twad jingmut ruh halor ka MRSSA bad u Bah Prestone u la ong ba na ka liang ka sorkar jylla ka la ioh ia ka jubab na ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA), GOI halor kane ka mat. U Bah Prestone u la ong ba ka MHA ka la ai lad ia ka sorkar jylla ban pynbit pynbiang bha ia ka MRSSA ha shwa ban pyntreikam pura ia ka ha jylla. Ka KSU ka la buh jingkylli ruh halor ka mat Inner Line Permit hynrei u Bah Prestone u la jubab ba ka dang sahkut sah ha ka sorkar pdeng. Khatduh ka KSU ka la pynsngew ba ynda la pyntreikam pura ia ka ILP ha Meghalaya kumba long ha Arunachal Pradesh. Mizoram Nagaland bad Manipur, ka seng kan sa ia pynbeit bad ki paidbah bad sorkar halor ka mat railways.
title: THANG ÏA U DROK BA ÏOHKEM HA KHMAT KI NONGPATHAI KHUBOR : KSU

content: : Ka jingiapyni bor kaba la neh ar sngi kynthih hapdeng ki Pnar kiba sah ha ka shnong Lapangap, West Jaiñtia Hills District bad ki Karbi kiba sah ha West Karbi Anglong District ka la thanda hadien ba ki bor synshar jong ka West Jaintia Hills bad ka West Karbi Anglong ha ka sngi Palei ki la iakynduh markhmat ha ka shnong Lapangap ban pynkut noh ia ka jingiakynad hapdeng kine ki ar jaidbynriew kiba sah ha khappud jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ka Jylla Assam.Na ka liang jong ka West Karbi Anglong District la mihkhmat da ka Deputy Commissioner ka Krishna Baruah bad u Superintendent of Police u I. Barua katba na ka liang jong ka West Jaintia Hills la mihkhmat da u Deputy Commissioner u Bah B.S. Sohliya bad u Superintendent of Police u Bah Chemphang Syrti.Ha kane ka jingialang, ki Karbi ki la dawa ba dei ban phut noh ia ki tynrai dieng ba la thung ha ki lum Pynthor bad lada ki Pnar ki ailad ban phut ia ki dieng ka jingsuk kan wan biang bad ki Pnar kin ioh ban ot ia u kba ba ladep thung kynthup ruh ia u kba uba ki la rep ha Nongjrong.Ki bor pulit jong ka jylla Assam ki la kular ban ai jingiada ia ki Pnar haba ki leit ot ia u kba uba ki la rep ha Nongjrong bad na ka Liang jong u Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaintia Hills u la mynjur ia kane ka jingbuh kyndon jong ki Karbi bad la shim ia ka rai ban leit phut ia ki tynrai dieng lashai ka sngi Thohdieng.Ha kaba iadei bad kane u Waheh Shnong jong ka shnong Lapangap u Bah Deimonmi Lyngdoh u la pyntip ba un lum da ka dorbar paidbah ha ka por janmiet ban pynsngew hakhmat ki paidbah ia kane ka jingdawa jong ki Karbi, hadien ba u Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaintia Hills District u la pynpaw ba kan bha ban phut noh shwa ia ki tynrai dieng ban ia kaba duh noh ia u kba u khaw.Namar kane ka jingiakynad, ki nongrep jong ka shnong Lapangap ki la sangeh ban leit rep sha ki lyngkha ki risai bad na ka liang ki Karbi ruh ki la sangeh ban pyni bor biang ia ki Pnar ha Lapangap.
title: DAWA KI KARBI BAN PHUT ÏA KI TYNRAI DIENG NA LUM PYNTHOR, KULAR KI PULIT ASSAM BAN ÏADA ÏA KI PNAR

content: Ki pulit jong ka Khliehriat Police Station bad ka kynhun Anti Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ba la lamkhmat da u Addl. Superintendent of Police (ASP) u Bah Banraplang Jyrwa ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la ïoh kurup shibun ki dawai jyrhoh kiba  bun jait ba la khaïi be-aiñ da ki snar khaïi drok.  Ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup ruh ïa ki mashin shna drok. Arngut kiba donkti ban khaïi be-aiñ ïa kine ki dawai ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit.U Superintendent of Police ka East Jaiñtia Hils u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi U Blei u la ïathuh, ki Pulit ki la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba tikna bha na ki tnat syntiat ba u don uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Altaf Hussain, u la ïoh pdiang ïa u drok kiba dei ki dawai bad u la buhrieh ïa kine ki dawai ha kawei ka kudam buh tiar jong u kaba don ha Dkhiah, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Mar mar ki Pulit jong ka Khliehriat Police Station ryngkat bad ki Pulit ka ANTF East Jaiñtia Hills District ki la pynlong ka jingkhynra bad ïoh bat ïa u Hussain.Ha ka jingtohkit, u Altaf Hussain u la ïalam ïa ki Pulit sha ka kudam buh tiar jong u bad na kane ka kudam ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup haduh 9883 tylli ki bilor dawai jyrhoh Phensedyl. Da ka jingphla  jong u Hussain, ki Pulit ka Khliehriat Police Station ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad  ki Pulit ANTF, West Jaiñtia Hills ki la ïoh kem sa ïa uwei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Ratan Dkhar uba la phla ruh ba u don kawei ka karkhana barit ha ka ïing jong u ha Ummulong bad ha kane ka karkhana barit la khleh ïa ki dawai bad la ju shalan beaiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh.Na ka iing sah jong u Ratan Dkhar,  ki Pulit ki la ïoh ban kurup shuh shuh sa 600 tylli ki bilor dawai jyrhoh Elcodyl kiba don 100 ml ha uwei u bilor, 10 tylli ki bilor dawai Flavouring Agent kiba don 500 ml ha uwei u bilor, 11 bilor ki dawai ba la ai rong lane ki Food Colour kiba don 1 kilo ha uwei u bilor, 10 kilo ka dawai Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride (ingredient of Phensedyl), 1 kilo ka dawai Chlorphenirame Maleato (ingredient of Phensedyl), 7 tylli ki kot ba buh jingthoh (books on Pharmacology and Drug preparations), 34 tylli ki bilor dawai Phensedyl kiba don 100ml ha uwei u bilor bad 780 tylli ki bilor ba 100 ml, kiba thylli ban thep ïa ka dawai Phensedyl.Nalor kine ki dawai beaiñ ba la ïoh kurup, ki Pulit ki la ïoh ban kurup shuh shuh sa 46 tylli ki synduk kot ba la thep ïa ki dawai Phensedyl, shi synduk kot ki jingtap bilor, shi plastik ka dawai Phensedyl, kawei ka Bottling Machine ban khleh dawai, ar tylli ki Machine tylliat lane ki Sophisticated Machine na ka bynta ban shna ïa ki dawai.  Ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup ruh sa ïa ka pisa kaba T. 11, 790 hajar.Ha ka jingtohkit jong ki Pulit u Ratan Dkhar, u la phla shuh shuh ba dang doh sa ar ngut ki briew na ka jylla Assam kiba donkti ha kane ka kam khaïi dawai beaiñ, u Altaf Hussain, 32 snem ka rta, na ka shnong Badarpur, Karimganj Assam bad u Shahin Rahman, 32 snem ka rta na ka shnong Lathimara, Katogorah,  Assam kiba ju ïarap ban pynpoi beaiñ ïa ki dawai jyrhoh.Ki Pulit i la kem noh ïa kine ki ar ngut lem bad u Ratan Dkhar uba na ka shnong Ummulong, West Jaiñtia Hills District, uba la ai ïa ka kyrteng jaka ba shna dawai ha Dkhiah, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Ki Pulit ki la register case ha Khliehriat Police Station hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Section 22(c)/25/29 NDPS Act bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat ban lap dien shuh shuh ïa kiba donkti ha kane ka kam khaïi drok beaiñ.
title: NA KARKHANA HA UMMULONG KURUP KI PULIT EJH ÏA KI DAWAI BEAIÑ BA SHALAN SHA BANGLADESH, KEM 3 NGUT

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Mawiongrim Unit ka la byrngem tyngeh ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka Adsan Mahindra ba kam dei ban pyndonkam bakla ia ka kyrteng jong ka shnong Mawiongrim da kaba pynkylla sha ka kyrteng Barapani.Ka seng ka la ioh jingtip halor kane na ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Mawiongrim hadien ba ka Adsan Mahindra ka la pyllait ia kawei ka Advertisement ha ka rynsan Social Media bad kiwei kiwei ki lad pathai khubor da kaba pynpaw ba ka Adsan Mahindra ka don ha Barapani.Hapoh ka jingialam jong u President u samla Domayan Skhemiew ha ka sngi Palei ki la leit ban iakynduh ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka Adsan Mahindra bad dawa ba dei ban pyndam mardor ia ka Advertisement ba la shu pynkylla kyrteng khlem nongrim ia ka shnong Mawiongrim sha ka ‘Barapani.”Ka seng ka la pynpaw ba kane ka jingleh jong ka Adsan Mahindra ka la pynbitar ia ka Seng bad ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Mawiongrim bad na kane ka jingleh jong ka kompeni ka la ialam bakla ia kiba bun bad khamtam ia ki briew kiba nabar.Mar mar ka Seng ka la dawa ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka Adsan Mahindra kaba don hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Mawiongrim ban pynbeit noh mardor hapoh shitaiew hynrei lym kumta ka seng kam banse ban shim da kiwei pat ki sienjam ba tyngeh pyrshah ia kane ka kompeni die kali.“Ka Seng ka maham tyngeh ia baroh ki kompeni lane ia ki briew kiba ju wan leh ia ka khaii ka pateng hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Mawiongrim ba kim dei ban leh klumar lane ban pyndonkam bakla ia ka kyrteng jong ka shnong Mawiongrim ia kaba la buh bad la suit la shor naduh ki por u mynbarim,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u General Secretary ka KSU Mawiongrim Unit u samla Macdonald Jitem.
title: PYNKYLLA KYRTENG ‘BARAPANI’ KA ADSAN MAHINDRA ÏA KA MAWÏONGRIM, BYRNGEM KA KSU

content: Shillong, Nailur 18: Ka Singer and Dancer’s Association hapoh ka jingialam jong u samla Gabriel T Mawlong kum u President ka la pynkut noh ia ka Grand Finale jong ka Singing and Dancing Superstar-Season 1 kaba la long ha ka sngi saitjain jong ka taiew baladep ha Mission Compound, Shillong.Ki nongbishar ha ka jingiakop rwai ki long u khlur rwai jong ka Bollywood u Amit Paul uba long ruh u kaitor ba pawnam jong kane ka jylla Meghalaya bad u samla Wanjop Sohkhlet. Katba ki nongbishar ha ka jingiakop shad ki long u Samla Micky Paul Mawlong bad u Samla Phrangsngi Lyngdoh Mawphlang.Ha kane ka sngi u Amit Paul bad u samla Gabriel Mawlong ki la pyniap biej ia ki nongiashim bynta ha kane ka jingiakob da ki sur jingrwai na ki ryndang ba syiang ki jong ki.Ha ka jingpynbna ia ka result jong ka jingiakob rwai, ia ka nam lahduh la ioh rah da ka samla Clarincy Mary Lwai kaba la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba 50 hajar tyngka ryngkat bad ka syrnot, katba u samla Sunny bad u samla Ford Sohtun ki la iohrah ia ka kyrdan kaba ar ryngkat bad ka song pisa kaba 30 hajar tyngka lem bad ka syrnod bad ia ka kyrdan kaba lai la iohrah da u samla Fardy. C Nengnong uba la ioh pdiang ia ka song pisa kaba 25 hajar tyngka bad ki syrnot.Haba phai pat sha ka jingiakob shad, ia ka nam lahduh la ioh rah da ka kynhun ka Wansai Fusion kaba la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba 50 hajar tyngka, katba i heprit Insanylla Suting i la iohrah ia ka kyrdan kaba ar ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba 30 hajar bad i heprit Haphilakmen Lyngdoh iba la iohrah ia ka kyrdan kaba lai i la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba 25 hajar tyngka.La sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi, da u MDC jong ka Sohra Constituency u Bah Titostarwell Chyne uba la long kum u kongsan, u MLA jong ka Mawsynram u Bah Olan Sing Suiñ, bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.Ka Association ha kane ka sngi, ka la pynlong ruh ia ka jingpynkhalai nusi ha kaba ia ka First Prize la ioh da u serial No 11746, baar da u Serial No 57406 bad balai da u Serial No 131233.Ki nongpyniaid ki la pyntip ruh ba nongjop ia ka lucky draw ki la ban wan shim ia ki khusnam hapoh 30 sngi da kaba shu telephone ha u number 9366497955.
title: SINGING AND DANCING SUPERSTAR: SEASON- 1: LAHDUH KA CLARINCY MARY LWAI BAD KA WANSAI FUSION

content: Ka tnad Custom ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la iohkem ïa lai ngut ki snar nongkhaïi ksiar tuh na nongbah Shillong bad ïoh kurup ïa ki biskit ksiar bar ri kiba shongdor haduh 1 klur.Ka tnat Custom kaba la ioh jingtip kaba thikna halor ka jingkhaïi tuh ïa ki Biskit ksiar bar ri lyngba ka khappud India-Bangladesh na Meghalaya lyngba kawei ka kali na Guwahati, ki ophisar jong ka ophis u Commissioner of Custom Preventive (CCP), Shillong, ki la ïoh bat ïa kawei ka Mahindra XUV 500 ha ka step sngi Sajtiaiñ na Jhalupara, Shillong. Ha kane ka kali u don uwei u briew uba na Rangia, Assam watla u dei uba na West Bengal.U snar nongkhaii ksiar tuh, ha ka jingtohkit, ula phla ba ia ksiar bar ri la pynpoi na ka ri Bangladesh ka dang don bad u bad markumta ki Ophisar ka Custom ki la khynra bad ïoh kurup 14 tylli ki biskit ksiar ba la song ha ki artylli ki bek plastik.Kine ki biskit ksiar ki don ka jingkhia kaba 1632.450 gram bad ki shongdor 1,01,78,326 klur tyngka, ong u kyrwoh na ka CCP.Hadien kane, ki ophisar ka Custom ki la ïoh jingtip sa ïa uwei u briew uba donkti lang bad  uba la aiti ïa ki hynniew tylli ki biskit ksiar bad ha ka jingbuddien marmar, ki ophisar ka CCP ki la ïoh bat ïa une u briew na Jhalupara. Une ula phla ba u la leit shim ïa ki ksiar na kawei ka Kynthei ha ka dukan kaba don ha ïewduh, Shillong.Ha ka jingtohkit bniah ïa kane ka dukan, la ïoh ban kurup ïa ka pisa 9.5 lak tyngka kaba dei ka pisa ba la thied ïa kine ki biskit ksiar. ïa kane ka pisa ruh la kurup noh da ka Custom.Ha ka jingtohkit ïa kane ka Kynthei, la shem ba ïa kane ka ksiar la pynpoi tuh na khappud ka Indo-Bangladesh.Lai ngut ki briew ki la shah kem bad ka jingtohkit mynta ka dang ïaid shakhmat, ong u kyrwoh na ka CPP.Dang ha u bnai ladep, ki Ophisar ka CCP, Shillong ki la ioh kurup 5 tylli ki biskit ksiar kiba don ka jingkhia 582.70 gram, na uwei u briew hajan Jorabad. ïa une u briew la ïoh bat na kawei ka Maruti Car.Ïa ka ksiar la pynpoi na Bholaganj kaba don ha khappud Indo-Bangla. Ha ka jingbuddien marmar la hiar khynra ïa ka ïing ha Lumpariang, kaba dei ka jaka ba leit shim ïa kane ka ksiar, la ïoh kurup ïa ka pisa India ba T. 3.96 klur ïa kaba la ngeit ba ka dei ka pisa ba die ïa ka ksiar.Ka jingtohkit ïa kane ka jingjia ruh ka dang ïaid shakhmat.Ka CCP ka la iathuh ba ka tnad Custom ka la buh thong hakhmat ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki kam shalan beain ha khappud naduh ka jingkhaïi drok, sikret, ki mar jong ki mrad khlaw, ka pisa thok bad kiwei kiwei.Ka CCP ka la kular ruh ban buhrieh bha ia ka kyrteng jong ki nongai jingtip bad yn sa ai ruh bad ka khusnam kaba lait na ka jingsiew khajna sha ka Income Tax.
title: NGAT 3 NGUT KI SNAR KHAÏI KSIAR TUH NA SHILLONG, KURUP KI CUSTOM ÏA KI BISKIT KSIAR BA 1 KLUR

content: : Ka Hill State Peoples Democratic Party (HSPDP) ha ka sngi Baar ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma da kaba kyntu ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya ryngkat bad ki lai tylli ki Autonomous District Council (ADC) ba kin ym ailad ban pyntreikam ïa ka Uniform Civil Code (UCC) ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u President ka party u Bah K.P. Pangniang bad u General Secretary u Bah Panborlang L. Ryntathiang, ka HSPDP ka la ong, “ka party ka sngewkhia lada ka Sorkar Pdeng ka ïaid shakhmat ban pyntreikam ïa ka UCC ha ka jylla Meghalaya.  Ka party ka ieng ha ka nongrim, namarba ka Jylla Meghalaya ka don la ka jong ka jinglong ba kyrpang, ha kaba ïadei bad ki riti ki dustur, ki jingïoh pateng ha ka spah ka phew bad kiwei kiwei, ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka UCC kan pynjngut noh ïa ki kyndon bad ki jingïada ba la ai da ka riti synshar jong ka ri hapoh ka Article 29 bad 244 ryngkat bad ka Khyrnit Bahynriew.”
title: THOH KA HSPDP SHA KA SORKAR JYLLA BAN PYRSHAH ÏA KA UCC

content: Shillong, Nailur 14: Da kaba pyntreikam ïa ka Rules 16,17 jong ka Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (Regulation of Livestock Markets) Rules 2017 bad ka Rules 77, 80, 83 bad 84 jong ka Transport of Animals (Amendment) Rules, 2001, ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka la pynmih ïa ka jingbthah ban ym shah shuh ïa ki briew ba kin patan ïa ki syiar ha madan ne patan na ka khlieh bad na ki thapniang haba thmu ban pynïap na ka bynta ban bam doh.Yn ym shah shuh ban teh ïa ki syiar na ryndang, na ki kjat lane ki thapniang ne ban rah da khongpong.La bthah ruh ba ki sem bad ki ruh thep syiar dei ban shna da kiba ailad ïa ki syiar ba kin ïoh ban ieng, ban dem ha madan, ban pyiar ïa ki sner bad ban phai shadien ne shakhmat katkum ka jingsngewbit jong ki.  Dei ban kiar katba lah ban shu thynñian ïa ki syiar ha kawei ka sem ne ka ruh syiar.Dei ban shna ïa ka jingkhang kaba kham heh ban ailad ïa ki syiar ba kin rung ne mih, ka sem ne ka ruh kam dei ban long kaba khim, kaba lah ban pynmynsaw, ne ka pynjynjar ïa ki syiar.  Dei ban ai bam bad kham bun ka um haba donkam. Ki sem syiar ki dei ban don ïa ki jingshai kiba biang, ka pongshai bad ka jingïada na u slap, ka jingkhluit bad ka lyer khriat.Haba kit ïa ki syiar ha ki kali, dei ban pynthikna ba ki syiar ki dei ban long kiba koit ba khiah.  Ki ruh thep syiar haba kit da ki kali ki dei ban long kiba khuid bad kiba la synreit dawai shwa ban thep ïa ki syiar.Ki ruh thep syiar ki dei ban long kiba kylluid bad kiba biang ka pongshai.Ïa ki syiar dei ban pynbiang bad ki jingbam bad ka um shwa ban thep ïa ki ha ki ruh syiar na ka bynta ban pynkit sha kiwei ki jaka.Dei ban pynthikna ruh ba ïa ki syiar dei ban da set bha khnang ba kin lait na ka jingshah tuh.Ïa ki syiar ba la pynkit na kawei ka jaka sha kawei dei ban tah bad ka jingthoh, “CARE IN TRANSIT.”La bthah ruh ba ïa ki kali kiba kit ïa ki syiar dei ban bud pyrkhing ïa ki kyndon jong ka Transport of Animals Rules 1978 bad ka Transport of Animals (Amendment) Rules, 2001 bad 2009 khnang ban ïada na ka jinglehbeiñ bad ka jingjynjar jong ki syiar.
title: MANA KA DC BAN TEH ÏA KI SYIAR NA RYNDANG, NA KJAT, NA THAPNIANG NE RAH KHONGPONG

content: Ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla mar mar ka la phah pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah hadien ba la ioh jingtip ha ka lah sngi U Blei ba la lap ia ki ar tylli ki prek hapoh u dawai Capsule Amoxycilling ba la ai sha kawei ka nongpang kaba leit shim dawai na Pomlum PHC, East Khasi Hills District.Ka kynhun kaba kynthup ia u Senior Specialist ha ka Pharmacology bad u nongpeit ia ki dawai na ka MMDSL, kynthup ruh ia u Inspector of Drugs jong ka East Khasi Hills bad u Logistics Manager ki la leit mar mar sha kane ka PHC ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit.Kane ka kynhun tohkit, ka la lap ba ki ar tylli ki prek ba la thep hapoh u dawai Capsule, katkum ba la kam da kawei ka longiing ba shim dawai, u kham heh ban ia u snep dawai Capsule bad kane ka la pynsuba eiei halor kane ka jingujor jong ka nongshim dawai.Ia ki nuksa jong u dawai capsule la shim ruh na kiwei ruh ki dawai bad la shem ba kim shym la sniew ne don satia ki prek ne kino kino ki kynja tiar hapoh ki snep dawai.“Ngi la peit bniah la ka don shisha ne em ka jingujor ia une u dawai na kiwei kiwei pat ki jaka ai dawai.  Hynrei kam don satia kaba kum kata.  Watla, katta ngi la pynlong ka jingtohkit sa shisien ban pynthikna ba kum kine ki jingjia kim dei ban don,” ong u kyrwoh na ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah. “Ngi kyrpad ia ki paidbah ai ka jingiatreilang ha ka jingpyrshang jong ngi ban ai ia ka jingshakri kaba kham bha sha ki paidbah.  Ki paidbah ki lah ban pyndonkam ia u Helpline Number 14410 lada ki don ia kino kino ki jingujor halor ki dawai dashin bad kiwei kiwei, khnang ba ngin dup lah ban ai jingpynshai ia ki,’ la bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: LYNGNGOH KA KYNHUN TOHKIT BA JRONG U PREK BAN ÏA U SNEP DAWAI CAPSULE

content: PYNREM JUR ÏA WAHEH SHNONG, THANGSKAIKa Synjuk Waheh Shnong (SWS) East Jaintia Hills District, ha ka sngi thohdieng ha ka jingialang jong ka Executive Committee da kawei ka sur ka la rai ban pynrem jur ia u Waheh Shnong jong ka shnong Thangskai, East Jaintia Hills uba ai syrnot nongshongshong bapura (Permanent Residential Certificate) ia u wei u bar jylla u bym dei satia u trai ri trai muluk na ka shnong Thangskai, kat haduh ba ka syrnot ka la ktah wat ia ka bhah pule Doctor jong ki khun ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep.“Ka jingleh jong u Waheh Shnong ka shnong Thangskai, nalor ba ka la tuh ia ka bhah pule Doctor jong ki khun ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep, kane  kan sa ktah ruh ia ka jaitbynriew trai ri trai muluk ba rit paid jong ngi hadien habud. Kumta, ka SWS-East Jaintia Hills District, ka pynrem jur ia kane ka jingleh jong u Waheh Shnong,” ong u President ka SWS-EJHD u Ma Hambertus Nongtdu ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.U President ka synjuk, u la ong, “kane ka jingleh jong u Waheh Shnong, ka la wanrah ruh ia ka jingjahburom bad ka jingduh jingshaniah ia kiwei ki Waheh Shnong jong ka East Jaintia Hills District. Kumta, lyngba une u kyrwoh, ka Synjuk, ka la dawa ïa ka Dorbar Shnong Thangskai bad ïa ki bor sorkar kynthup ia ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC), ban pynduh pyndam noh shisyndon ia ka syrnot jong u bar jylla.”U kyrwoh u la ong shuh shuh ba ka Synjuk kam lah ban pdiang ia ka Shnong Thangskai kaba buh pynban ia ka Jaitbynriew ha ka jingeh bad ka jingma.  “Ka SWS-EJHD, mynta hi ka sngi lyngba une u kyrwoh, ka la rai ban kyntu bad ka pynkynmaw ia baroh ki Dorbar Shnong ne ia ki waheh Shnong ha East Jaintia Hills District, ba ki dei ban long kiba husiar bha ha kaba ai ia ki syrnot bapher bapher, khnang ba kane kan ym buh ia ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew ritpaid jong ngi ha ka jingeh hadien habud,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.Ka SWS-EJHD ka kyntu ruh ia ki bor Sorkar bad ruh ia kiwei kiwei pat ki bor ba ki dei ban da bishar bniah bha ia baroh ki syrnot na ki shnong ba la aiti sha ki bad ban pyntip wut wut sha ki Dorbar Shnong lada  don kino kino ki jait syrnot kiba i shankhmat.“Na ka bynta ka iap ka im jong ka ri bad ka jaibynriew ka Synjuk ka la rai ba nangne shakhmat yn shna noh tang kawei ka dur ka dar (format) na ka bynta ki syrnot bapher bapher ia kiba yn sa pyndonkam ryntih ha baroh ki shnong ha East Jaintia Hills District, bad kumba ka long mynta kane ka kam ka dang don hapoh ka jingbishar bniah jong ka SWS-East Jaintia Hills District,” la iathuh u kyrwoh.
title: DAWA KA SWS-EJH ÏA KA JHADC BAN PYNDUH PYNDAM ÏA KA PRC U BAR JYLLA

content: U Timothy Jones Dhar, u nonghikai ha ITI Shillong bad u Madhav Singh u nonghikai ia ka Sobjek Science ha Alpha English HS School ki long ki arngut na Meghalaya napdeng ki 75 ngut ki nonghikai na kylleng ka ri kiba la shah jied ban ioh pdiang ia ka National Teachers’ Award ha ka 5 tarik, Nailur, 2023 ha New Delhi.U Babu Dhar u dei uba tbit bha ha ka jinghikai shna kali ha ka ITI Shillong bad um shym la poi pyrkhat ba un shah jied ban ioh pdiang ia kane ka khusnam watla u trei minot thop manla ka sngi ha ka karkhana shna kali.Une u Babu u dei u Mechanic shna kali ha Jowai, West Jaintia Hills ha ki snem 1998. U la shah thung kum u Mechanic Motor Vehicle Inspector ha Shillong Industrial Training Institute, Rynjah naduh u snem 2013.“Nga sngewkyndit ban ioh ia kane ka jingithuh. Nga la pyrshang ban leh ia kaba bha tam ha ka kam ba nga trei kum u mekhanik ka long kaei kaei kaba ngam lah ban sngewthuh. Nga ju dwai ba ngan iai bteng ban ioh ia ka lad ban shakri bad ban hikai,” ong u Babu Dhar.U Babu Madhav, u dei u khun jong u Sidheswar Singh bad ka Champa Devi kiba sah ha Nongpoh. U la pyndep ia ka jingpule ha Ri-Bhoi bad u la pyndep ia ka M.Sc (Botany), B. Ed bad mynta u la jan pyndep ruh wat ia ka jingpule LLB.Ka President Droupadi Murmu kan sa pynkup burom da ka National Teachers’ Award 2023 sha ki 75 ngut ki nonghikai na kylleng ka ri ha ka jingialang ka ban sa long ha Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi ha ka jingrakhe ia ka sngi burom jong ki nonghikai.
title: U TIMOTHY JONES DHAR BAD U MADHAV SINGH, KIN ÏOH NATIONAL TEACHERS AWARD

content: Shillong, Nailur 01: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO) ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la dawa ïa ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District ban bishar bad ban pynduh noh ïa ki Trading Licenses jong ki bar jylla kiba la ïoh No objection Certificate (NOC) na ka R&R Colony Welfare Society, Rynjah.Ki nongïalam jong ka HITO ha ka jingïakynduh ïa u Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem ka la pan jingpynshai ruh halor ka jingai NoC da ka R&R Colony Welfare Society sha ki bar jylla ban ïoh ïa ka Trading License na ka bynta ban seng dukan ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong u pud u sam ka shnong Rynjah.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President ka HITO u Bah Donbok Dkhar u la ïathuh ba ka seng ka la ïoh jingtip ba ki don shibun ki bar jylla kiba la ïoh Trading License na ka R&R Colony Welfare Society.U la ïathuh ba ha u snem 2007, ka R&R Colony Welfare Society ka la pynmih ïa ka Resolution ba la soi lang da u MLA u Bah A.L Hek bad u MDC Bah Sanbor Shullai bad kane ka Resolution ka aibor ïa ka Society ban ai NoC ïa ki briew kiba sah ha kane ka Colony na ka bynta ban ïoh ïa ka Trading License.“Ka R&R Colony ka hap hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah ba la pynkupbor da ka Hima Mylliem bad dei namar kane ka jingai NoC da ka R&R Colony Welfare Society ka long kaba be-aiñ bad ka long pyrshah ïa ka Mylliem Act 2007 and Rules 2015 ba la mynjur da ka KHADC,” la ong u Bah Donbok.U la ïathuh ba ha ka jingïalang, ka Seng ka la dawa ïa u CEM ban thung ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah da kaba khot hajir ïa ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah ba kan pynshai kumno kane ka Society ka ïohbor ban ai NoC ïa ki briew kiba sah hapoh ka RR Colony.“U CEM u la ïaroh ïa ki sienjam ba ka HITO ka la shim bad shen ka Executive Committee jong ka District Council kan sa pynmih ïa ka jingpynbna ba ïa ka NoC yn lah ban ai tang da ka Dorbar Shnong jong ka Rynjah, ym da ka Society,” ong u Bah Donbok haba jubab ïa ka jingkylli ki lad pathai khubor.
title: DAWA KA HITO ÏA KA KHADC BAN PYNDAM NOH ÏA KI TL KA RR COLONY WELFARE SOCIETY

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) Seng Kmie lyngba u Secretary u Bah Lamsuk Langstang ka la pyntip paidbah ba ka seng ha ka Central Executive Committee (CEC) kaba la long ha ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai ka la shim ia ka rai ban weng kam noh ia u Assistant Secretary HNYF Seng Kmie u Bah Edward Thangkhiew, uba bashong basah ha Mawlai Umjajew,Shillong.“Kumta la kyrpad ia baroh kiba ju iadei kam bad u Bah Edward Thangkhiew ba ju khot u Eddy ba ka seng nangne shakhmat kan ym don jingkitkhlieh shuh bad ngin ym ithuh bad pdiang ia ka jingiadei kam u Bah Eddy ha ka kyrteng ka seng,” la ong u kyrwoh.
title: WENG KAM KA HNYF ÏA U ASST. SECY. U BAH EDWARD THANGKHIEW

content: : Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew lyngngoh halor ka jing bym pynrung ïa uwei ruh u trai jylla, kata, napdeng ki Khasi bad Garo, ha ka Expert Committe ban khmih bniah ïa ka  State Reservation Policy.“Ngi sngewlyngoh ruh ba tang uwei ruh u Khasi/Garo kim don ha kane ka Committee bad kumba paw baroh hi ki dei ki bar jylla. Ngi la khmihlynti ba ki jong ngi ruh kiba sngewthuh bha ïa ka Reservation Policy bad ïa ki 51 tylli ki lynti ïaid jong ka kin don lang ha kane ka Committee,” ong ka KHNAM ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor lyngba u Vice President Bah Thomas Passah.“Ngi sngewlyngngoh ruh bad khlem buh ïa kane ka Committee ban pyndep ka ki kam baroh.  Haduh mynta ngi ïohi ba ka Sorkar ka don ïa ka jingsheptieng ym ïa ka jingshimkhia ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdawa ban pynkylla noh ïa ka Reservation Policy,” la ong u kyrwoh.“Ka Sorkar mynta ka sngi ka la thaw ïa ka Expert Committee ban pule ïa ka State Reservation Policy bad ki dkhot jong kane ka Committee baroh ki dei lut ki bar jylla. Ka KHNAM ka pynpaw ïa ka jingbymïahap halor ka jingpyndonkam jong ka Sorkar ïa ka kyntien “STUDY RESERVATION POLICY” lane kaba mut kane ka Committee kan shu pule ïa ka Reservation Policy bad kan shu phah pat sha ka Sorkar ïa kaei kaba ki la pule bad shem,” la ong shuh shuh ka KHNAM.“Na ka liang ka KHNAM ha ka jingïalang jong ki seng saiñpyrthei kaba la long ngi la pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah ïa ka jingthaw ïa ka Expert Committee namarba ngi sheptieng ïoh ka shu pynslem ïa ka por, hynrei haba baroh ki la kwah da ka Expert Committee bad ka jingkwah jong kiba bun paid ka ieng. Ka rai hi ha kane ka jingïalang ka long ban pynkylla ïa ka Reservation Policy ym ban pule ïa ka. Na kata ka daw ngi shem ba kane ka Committee ka la ïaidlait na kaei kaba la ïa rai ha ka jingïalang,” la bynrap shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: LYNGNGOH KA KHNAM BYM PYNRUNG UWEI RUH U TRAI JYLLA HA KA EXPERT COMMITTEE

content: : Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ka la kynthoh tyngeh ia ka Sorkar Jylla kaba phah ia ki Pulit pahara ha khappud tang 10-15 ngut katba ia ki Karkhana pynjot mariang la pynbiang ia ki Pulit pahara haduh 50-60 ngut.“Ha kine ki khyndiat sngi, ngi iohi ba don ar jait ki Pulit ha kane ka jylla ka jong ngi. Ka kynhun Pulit kaba nyngkong ka dei jong kito ki Pulit kiba bom kput ia ki paidbah, ki Pulit shynrang kiba ktah kti bad bom dusmon ia ki longkmie, ki Pulit kiba don 50-60 ngut kiba ieng rasong ha ryngkat ki tiar ialeh kum ki Tear Gas bad ki Suloi ban iada ia ki Karkhana jong ki bar jylla bad kumjuh ruh ka kynhun Pulit kaba shah hukum ha ki heh bar jylla jong ka Topcem ban bom kput ia ki khun Hynñiewtrep.  Sa kawei pat ka kynhun Pulit ka dei kaba don ha khappud (Block 1 Area) Khanduli Sector. Kine ki Pulit ha khappud kiba don kumba 10-15 ngut kiba hap ban mareh na ki jaka ap pahara ban iada ia la ka jingim namarba ki tieng palat ioh shah lun maw bad shah siat da ki jri ha kita ki Karbi,” la ong u kyrwoh ba la phah u General Secretary ka HYC sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi u Blei.“Ki jingkylli kiba ngi kwah ban kylli na u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Jylla, ka long hato hakhmat ka Sorkar Jylla ka dang kham kor ki karkhana pynjot mariang ne khamkor u pud u sam bad ki khun Hynñiewtrep bashong basah ha Khappud?  Balei la buh Pulit tang 10-15 ngut ha Khanduli Sector hynrei da ki 50-60 ngut pat ban iada ia ki Karkhana pynjot mariang? Balei la ai hukum ia ki Pulit iada karkhana pynjot mariang ban pyndonkam Tear Gas, ban bom kput ia ki paidbah, ban phah ktah kti ha ki Pulit shynrang ia ki longkmie katba ym shym lah ai hukum pat ia ki Pulit ha khappud ban pyndonkam ia ki suloi ba ki bat ha ki kti ban iada ia u pud u sam ne ban siat Tear Gas ia kita ki Karbi kiba wan rung shapoh u pud u sam ka Jylla ha Lapangap?” la buh jingkylli ka HYC.“Ka Sorkar bad ka tnat Pulit ki dei ban jubab halor kine ki jingjia. Hato kine ki Pulit ki phet hi ba ki tieng iap bad ba duna briew ne namar ba kim ioh hukum na ki bahalor ban bom bad siat ia ki Karbi kiba thmu pyniap ia ki Pulit bad ki paidbah ha Khappud?  Balei ngi ong ba ki Karbi ki thmu pyniap ia ki Pulit bad ki khun Hynniewtrep ha Lapangap ka dei namar katkum ki Pulit Meghalaya, lada phi lun maw ne siat da ka jri kata ka ladei ka kam thmu pyniap briew bad ia kata ngi lap lyngba ka jingjia ba dang shen ha Tura ba shah lun maw ka Mini Secretariat, ki Pulit ki la thep ha ki kyndon thmu pyniap briew ia ki paidbah kiba don ha kato ka sngi. Lada ka Sorkar kam lah ban ai hukum ia ki Pulit ha khappud, te balei pat la ai hukum ban siat Tear Gas ia ki nonghikai, balei la ai hukum ban bom kput da ki lathi ia ki longkmie ha Lumshnong bad balei la ai hukum ban siat iap ia u (L) Cheristerfield Thangkhiew?” la buh jingkylli shuh shuh ka HYC.“Ngi dawa ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban phah da ki spah ngut ki Pulit ha man ki Border Out Post (BOP) bad ha ki Out Post (OP) ha ki khappud ha ryngkat ki tiar ialeh kiba biang bad nalor kata ka dei ban ai hukum noh mardor ia ki Pulit ba ki dei ban pyndonkam ia ki Tear Gas, ban kawut lathi bad siat ruh lada donkam ban iada ia u pud u sam bad ia ki paidbah ha khappud,” ong u kyrwoh.“Lada ka Sorkar kam nud ban phah Pulit da ki spah ha ki BOP bad OP ha ki khappud ha ryngkat ki tiar ialeh bad ka hukum kaba shai, na ka liang ka seng ngi dawa ba ka la bha ia ka Sorkar ba kan shu ai noh da ki tiar ialeh kum ki suloi, ki kuli bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar ia ki riewpaidbah ha khappud ba kin iada hi noh ia la ka khyndew ka shyiap bad ia la ka jingim namar kumba ka long mynta ym i shaniah ia ki Pulit ka Meghalaya,” la kynthoh ka seng.
title: AR JAIT KI PULIT HA KA JYLLA : PULIT IADA KARKHANA PYNJOT MARIANG BAD PULIT IADA KHAPPUD – HYC

content: Ki Pulit jong ka East Jaintia Hills District ha ka sngi baar ki la iohkem ia u Issei Sungoh na iing sah jong u na Dkhiah East, Lad Sutnga halor ka jingdonkti ban pynngop ia ki khynnah bad ia uwei u samla lud lyngba ka Facebook ban leit shim ia ka pisa kaba u la dawa na uwei u briew uba shong basah ha kawei ka shnong kaba hap hapoh ka jylli treikam jong ka Lumshnong Police Station.U kyrwoh khubor ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi balang da u Superintendent of Police ka East Jaiñtia Hills u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa, la iathuh, ‘ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai ki Pulit ki la ioh jingtip na uwei u nongshong shnong uba sah hapoh ka jylli treikam jong ka Lumshnong Police Station ba u la ioh ia kawei ka phone call na uwei u briew u bym lah satia ban ithuh uba la dawa pisa bad byrngem ruh ban leh eiei pyrshah ia u lymda u siew ia ka pisa ba la shah dawa.”“Ha ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai ki Pulit ki la pynlong ka jingbuddien ia u nongshah dawa pisa bad ha ka por kumba 3 baje eiei, katba u dang pynieng ia ka kali ha Dosti Hotel, Ladrymbai, arngut ki briew ki la rung jubor hapoh ka kali jong u.  Ha kum kane ka por, ki Pulit kiba la ap shrip lypa ki la iohbat ia kine ki argnut ki briew,” la iathuh u SP.Ia kiba la shah kem la ithuh kyrteng kum u Daruis Pakem, 19 snem ka rta na ka shnong Moolaitbri Sumer, katba arngut kiwei pat kiba la shah kem ki dang dei tang ki khynnah rit kiba dang hapoh 18 snem ka rta.U SP u la iathuh, ha ka jingtohkit, kine kiba la shah kem ha ki Pulit ki la phla ba ki shu pynlum ia ka pisa ha ka kyrteng jong uwei briew uba ki shu ithuh paralok lyngba ka Facebook.Ki Pulit ki la kynnoh ruh ba dei ma u, uba la telephone ia uba la shah dawa pisa bad la iathuh ruh ba u Issei Sungoh u la pyniadei paralok bad ki arngut kiba la shah kem lyngba ka Facebook bad bthah ruh ia ki ban leit shim ia ka pisa kaba u la dawa na u nongshah dawa pisa.U SP u la iathuh shuh shuh ba u Issei Sungoh u dei uba la shah kem teng ha ki Pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills halor ka jingdonkti ban pynbthei ia u Bomb IED ha Khliehriat Police Reserve ha u snem 2021 bad u la lait na along hadien ba u la ioh jamin na ka Ingbishar.Halor kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la register case ha Lumshnong Police Station bad pynngat hapoh ka Section 386/120-B jong ka Indian Penal Code (IPC) bad ka jingtohkit mynta ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: LYNGBA KA FACEBOOK SHAH PYNNGOP KI KHYNNAH HA UBA PYNBTHEI BOM BAN DAWA PISA

content: Kum shi bynta ka jingrakhe ia ka sngi ba la pynkha ia ka Indian Youth Congress (IYC), ka Meghalaya Pradesh Youth Congress (MPYC) ha ka sngi Balang ka la iashim bynta lang ban rakhe ia kane ka sngi, da kaba pynher ia ka lama jong ka Indian Youth Congress (IYC) ha ophis treikam jong ka seng ha Congress Bhavan, Shillong.U Vice President jong ka  Meghalaya Pradesh Youth Congress (MPYC) u Samla Banphira Basaiawmoit ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba ka jingrakhe ia kane ka sngi, kan long ban pynrung sha ki para samla ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya bad ha ka ri India baroh kawei ia ka mynsiem ban shakri ia ka imlang ka sahlang, ban kyntiew ia ka jylla Meghalaya ha baroh ki liang.U la ong ruh ba haduh mynta hi ka Congress ha kane ka Jylla Meghalaya ka dang khlain bad kum ka party ka donkam ban leh bun kiei kiei khnang ban ioh biang ia ka jingshaniah jong ki paidbah.Ha kajuh ka por u la ong shuh shuh ba ka jingleit phai biang jong u Rahul Gandhi kum u MP jong ka Lok Sabha kan nang pynkhlain shuh shuh ia ka seng Congress bad kan nang ai mynsiem shuh shuh ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong ha ka ri India.
title: KA JINGLEIT PHAI U RAHUL GANDHI SHA LOK SABHA KAN PYNMYNTOI ÏA KA CONGRESS: MPYC

content: U khlur ak phlim bapawnam jong ka Bollywood u John Abraham ha ka sngi Balang u la wan iuhkjat ha madan ialehkai jong ka Sports Authority of India (SAI), ha NEHU, Shillong ban iakynduh kyrpang ia ki khynnah ialehkai sports kiba la shah jied ha ka Super Elite Pathway Programme ba la pyniaid da ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association naduh ki bnai baladep.Ha kane ka sngi, la donlang ruh u Ian Campbell na ka ri Australia, kynthup ruh u President jong ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) u Bah John F. Kharshiiing bad kiwei kiwei. Ha ka jingiakren bad kine ki khynnah, u John Abraham u la iaroh ia ka sap ka phong kaba ki don bad ia ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) kaba la trei shitom da ki bun bun bnai ban wad ia ki khynnah kiba don ia ki sap ialehkai sports na kylleng ka jylla Meghalaya da ka jingai jingkyrshan jong ka Sorkar Jylla.
title: ÏAROH U JOHN ABRAHAM ÏA KI KHYNNAH KIBA SHAH JIED HA KA SUPER ELITE PATHWAY

content: Shillong, Nailar 17: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ka la rai ban khot ia ki samla pule kiba don ka mon ban wad jingtip shuh shuh shaphang ka riti ka dustur bad ka lariti jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi khnang ban buh jingthoh na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki longdien ka pateng ka ban sa wan.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi palei, u Chief Executive Member jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la iathuh ba ki don 17 tylli ki bynta ban wad jingtip shuh shuh bad ban tih bniah halor kane ka bynta.U la iathuh ruh ba ia kane ka kam la bynshet ha u Executive Member uba peit ia ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ka council da ka jingiarap ban bei pisa da ka ka sorkar Jylla.“Ngi la iakynduh ruh la ar sien kynthih ia u Myntri Rangbah Conrad Kongkal Sangma halor kane ka jingthmu bad ka la long ka jingiakren kaba seisoh ha kaba u Myntri Rangbah ruh u la kular ban bei pisa ia ka KHADC na ka bynta ban leh ia kane ka jingwad bniah halor ka riti ka dustur bad ia ka lariti jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi,” ong u Bah Syiem.“Ngi ladep nadong shadong.  Ngi ladep phah ruh ia ka jingtyrwa sha ka Sorkar Jylla na ka bynta ban mang pisa halor kane ka jingthmu,” u la bynrap.
title: HA KI SAMLA PULE YN PHAH TIH BNIAH KA KHADC ÏA KA LARITI KA JAIDBYNRIEW KHASI

content: Shillong, Nailar 12 : Ka Khusnam sah kynmaw ia ka Crystal Gayle Kharnaior la pynlong ha Raj Bhavan ha kaba u Lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan, u la long kum u kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Paul Lyngdoh.U Lat haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la kynthoh ba dei ban don ka shlem kaba shngaiñ na ka bynta ki barikor ba kin kyrsoi ia la ki sap tynrai bad ka Sorkar ka dei ban kyrshan ia ki jingpyrshang jong ka synjuk Riti Academy.U la ban jur ruh ba ki iktiar Sorkar Kmie ki lah ban theh ki jingiarap lada ka don ka jingtreilang na jylla da baroh ki briew naduh ki kynrem lyndan haduh ki riew paidbah.Ia ka khusnam sahkynmaw ia ka Crystal Gayle Kharnaior 2023 la ainam sha u Bah Ian Lyngdoh Nongkynrih na ka bynta ka kot kaba la u thoh halor ki jingkieng jri sha Ri-War kiba u la shem da ki spah tylli bad halor ka durim TV shi sngi Ha La Shnong (A day in the village) ba ju pyni barabor da ka Doordarshan Kendra.La ñiewkor shikatdei ia kine ki kam bakhraw jong u Bah Ian Lyngdoh Nongkynrih bad la bishar ba u donhok ban ioh ia kata ka nam ka burom.Kum shi bynta na ka jingrakhe sam khusnam, la pynbna paidbah ruh da u Bah Raphael Warjri, Khliehduh jong ka Synjuk Riti Academy ban kyntiewnam da ka khusnam sah kynmaw halor ki akhia rangbah ba dang shu khlad dang shen u Waheh S Quotient Sumer Award bad Rangbah Sumar Sing Sawian.Kum ka dak jong ka burom na ka bynta ka longiing longsem jong kita ki longiing la pynkup burom ia ka Kong Bijoya Sawian na ka liang ka longing longsem ki Kur Sawian, na ka bynta ba la kubur ia ka khusnam halor u Rangbah Sumar Sing Sawian bad ia ka Kmie ki khun Riwotki Laloo bad u khun rangbah Riquoma Rq Laloo na ka liang ka longiing longsem jong u Waheh S Quotient Sumer ba ki la kubur halor ka khusnam sahkynmaw.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, u Waheh S Quotient Sumer, u dei u radbah nongthoh bad u simpah simsong u bakhraw ka jingtip shaphang u Kiang Nangbah bad uba la long teng u dkhot jong ka Sahitya Akademi. Ia kine ki khusnam sahkynmaw ban kyntiewnam ia kita ki radbah jong ka thoh ka tar bad ka deiriti, la khmih lynti ban sa sdang naduh ka lyngkhuh snem ba nyngkong jong ki ban iai pyrto ia ki synñiang bakhraw ba ki la thehsei ha ka imlang sahlang.
title: ÏOH U BAH IAN A. L. NONGKYNRIH ÏA KA KHUSNAM SAH KYNMAW CYRSTAL GAYLE 2023

content: Shillong, Nailar 12: U nongialam jong ka Liang Pyrshah ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Titostarwell Chyne ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewsih halor ka jingbym kren pyrshah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ia ka kyntien ‘Village Council’ ba la pynrung ha ka jingpynbeit thymmai ia ka Khyrnit Bahynriew jong ka riti synshar ka ri India ha ka jingiakynduh ba dang shen ia u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi ha New Delhi.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Titos u la ong, “ha ka por ba la wan ka komiti ngi la pynpaw ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingpyndonkam ia ka kyntien, ‘Unrepresented Tribe’. Baroh ki kynhun ki pyrshah bad nga iohi ruh dang shen u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla bad ka kynhun Myntri ruh ki la iakynduh ia u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri India da kaba pynpaw ba ka Sorkar Jylla ruh ka pyrshah ia kane ka kyntien ‘Unrepresented Tribe’ bad nga la iohi ruh ba ka la don ka jingdawa ban kyntiew ia ki Seat ha ki lai tylli ki Autonomous Distirct Council (ADC).”“Hynrei nga don tang kawei, nga lyngnoh ba ka Sorkar Jylla kam shym la pynpaw ha ka jingiadei bad ka kyntien ‘Village Council’. Kane ka kyntien ka dei kaba ma ngi ki MDC jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous Distirct Council (KHADC) ngim hun satia ia kane namarba ka jingpynrung ia ka kyntien ‘Village Council’ kan pynduh noh ia ka jingtreikam jong ki Dorbar Shnong, kaba mut lada ngi don ia ki Village Council, ngin hap ban ialeh da ka elekshon bad ki riti ki dustur jong ngi ruh kin kylla lut hangta,’ u la ong.“Na ka liang jong ka Council ha ka por ba nga dang long u Chief Executive Member (CEM) nga la wanrah ia kawei ka aiñ ia kaba la tip kum ka Village Development Council (VDC) Act, bad ka jingthmu haba wanrah ia kane ka aiñ ka long kan urlong ka jingkwah jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ba ka don ka jingsynshar ha ki shnong ki thaw.  Ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar India ban wanrah ia ka Village Council ka long ba ki kwah ban don ka jingsynshar ha ki shnong ki thaw ha kaba ki skhim baroh kiba wan na ka Sorkar kin wan lyngba ki shnong ki thaw. Ha kajuh ka por, ki (Sorkar Pdeng) kwah ba kan don ka elekshon jied Rangbah Shnong bad ia ki Executive Member jong ki Village Council bad ki kwah ruh ba kan don ka jingmang bhah kyrpang na ka bynta ki kynthei,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Titos.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka riti dustur kam pat shah ia ki kynthei ban don bynta ha ki dorbar shnong, u Bah Titos u la ong, “phi iohi ba ki kynthei ki kwah ban don bynta ha ki komiti jong ki dorbar shnong hynrei ka riti ka dustur kam shah ba ki longkmie kin long dkhot ha ki Dorbar Shnong. Mynta kane ka dang dei tang ka jingiatai bad ngim pat lah ban ong ia kane bad ka riti ka dustur hi ka long ba ki kynthei kim lah ban iadon bynta ha ka dorbar shnong”.Haba kylli, u Bah Titos u la ong, ka District Council ka la buh ia ka kyndon ba ki kynthei ki lah ban long ki dkhot jong ki Village Development Council (VDC).  Ngi kwah ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei ban kyntu ia ka Sorkar Pdeng ba ha ka jaka ban buh ia ki Village Council dei ban don da ki Village Development Council.
title: KA KYNTIEN ‘VILLAGE COUNCIL’ KAN PYNDAM ÏA KA IKTIAR JONG KI DORBAR SHNONG: TITOS

content: Kawei ka longkmie kaba dang 21 snem ka rta kaba sah ha ka shnong Nongtraw, kaba hap hapoh ka West Khasi Hills District ka la duhei ïa la ka jong ka jingim hadien ba la suba jur ba ka la shah pyniap dusmon ha ki briew kiba ym pat lah satia ban tip haduh mynta.Katkum ka thymmei khubor ba la ioh lum na ki bor synshar shnong jong ka shnong Nongtraw la ong ba kane ka longkmie kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Bibimoris Lyngkhoi 21 snem ka la shah pyniap ha ka miet jong ka 5 tarik, Nailar, 2023 bad la iathuh ruh ba kane ka longkmie ka shong ka sah lang bad la u jong u kurim jong ka bad shuh shuh la iathuh ruh ba ha kane ka miet ki dang lang baroh arngut shikurim ha ing.La iathuh shuh shuh ba ha ka por kumba 12 eiei mynmiet u kurim jong kane ka longkmie u la leit khot bad pyntip sha la u hymmen ba ka Kong Bibimoris ka la khladnoh bad hadien ba ki bahaïing hasem ki la leit sha ka ïing sah ban leit peit ia kane ka longkmie ki la lap ia ki dak ki shin na ki bynta jong ka met jong ka kaba la pynsuba sniew halor ka jingiap jong kane ka longkmie.Na ka liang jong ki bahaïing ki la pyrshang ban tohkit na u kurim jong ka hynrei la ong ba u kurim u la pyrshang ban jubab da kumne kumtai bad kham hadien u la shu jah rngai bad phet krad noh na kane ka jaka bad ha kaba iadei bad katei ka jingjia ki bor pyniaid shnong jong ka shnong Nongtraw ki la pyntip noh ia kane ka jingjia sha ki Pulit kiba la hiar sha ka shnong Nongtraw ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap ia ka jingshisha.Ïa ka met jong kane ka longkmie la pynkit noh sha Nongstoiň Civil Hospital, ban pyndep ia ka post-mortem  bad kat haduh ba la pynmih ia kane ka kubor ym shym la tip satia ia ka daw jong ka jingiap kane ka longkmie bad ia u kurim ruh ym shym la lap satia naduh ba u la jah rngai.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh ka Section 302 jong ka Indian Penal Code (IPC) bad ka jingtohkit ban lap ia ka jingshisha ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: SUBA SHAH PYNÏAP KA LONGKMIE BA DANG 21 SNEM KA RTA HA NONGTRAW, WKH

content: Shillong, Nailar, 12 : Ka Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) lyngba u General Secretary cum Publicity Secretary ka seng u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw lyngba u kyrwoh ba la pynmih ka Facebook Post ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la byrngem ba ka lah ban weng noh na ka miej jingïakren iasuk hapdeng ka Seng, ka Sorkar Pdeng lem bad Sorkar Jylla na ka daw ba ka seng wat hapdeng ka jingïakren iasuk bad ka Sorkar ka la shah pyrkhing ban leit buh syntiew ha u lum jingtep jong u Bah Cheristerfield Thangkhiew ha ka lyngkhuh sngi iap ba ar snem jong une u rangbah uba long teng u nongialam barim jong ka seng.U Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw ha ka Facebook post, u la ong, “lashai ha ka lyngkhuh sngi iap ba ar jong u Bah Che, ka jingleit buh syntiew sha lum jingtep la pynbeit da ki bahaing ba kan long 2 baje janmiet, katba ka sorkar ka ai hukum ia ki briew jong ngi kiba don ha ka jingiakren iasuk ba ki dei ban leit buh syntiew dang 8 baje mynstep.”“Kane ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar ka pynbitar ia ka seng hi baroh kawei, ngim dei ki Pulit Meghalaya ne ki nongtrei sorkar jong ki ba kin teh ia ngi katba ki mon.  Lada ka long ha kane ka rukom ngin weng noh na ka jingiakren,” la bynrap u Bah Nongtraw.
title: BYRNGEM KA HNLC BA LAH BAN WENG NOH NA KA JINGÏAKREN ÏASUK BAD KA SORKAR

content: Shillong, Naitung 15 : La pynkup burom da ka Khusnam ba kynsai ia ki laingut ki khlur tiewdohmaw jong ka jylla, ba la pynbeit da ka Anuprerona, Riti Academy and Media Plus ha Soso Tham Auditorium, State Central Library, Shillong ha ka 15 tarik Naitung, 2023, kynthup ruh ia ki phra ngut ki khlur na jylla Assam. La pynphuh pynphieng ia kane ka sngi da u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, Myntri, Deiriti bad Mattithaw, bad Suwari ha kaba u la iaroh ia ki synjuk ba la pynlong ia kane ka kam ka ba dei ban pyrto ia u synñiang jong ki riewtbit kiba ka imlang sahlang kam da kynmaw shuh. U Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la kren bun kiei kiei kiba dei ban kyntiew ia ka mattithaw ha jylla, da kaba buhti da ki Khusnam ba kyrpang na ka bynta ka mattithaw bad ba la pynkylla kyrteng noh ia ka SICPAC sha ka Shlem Lariti. La pynkynmaw ruh ia ki por khynnah ha ka ba u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u ju kyndeh ban sngap ia ki jingrwai jong u Bah Tanbor, bad hadien kum u samla nongialam KSU u la kynmaw tympang ia u Bah Daminot J Wankhar bad Kong Adlyne Khonglam ki ba la rwai ha ka thup jingrwai jong ka seng, bad mynta ka kynti ki la ioh ia ka khusnam.La pynkupburom ia u Bah Tanbor Swer da ka Khusnam Rana Kharkongor bad da ka Khusnam Riti ia u Bah Daminot J Wankhar bad Kong Adlyne Khonglam, bad kiwei kiwei ki ba la shah pynkup burom na Assam da ka Khusnam Media Plus, ki ba kynthup ia u  Dr. Naren Hazarika, Sr. Journalist, Editor of Daily Daindeen Barta, Nang Anjana Gogoi, Advisor ka Dauboria Barta, Mr. Sukleswar Nath, Smt. Ushamoni Saikia, Smt. Alaka Bujar Baruah, School Teacher, Smt. Manju Hazarika, school teacher, bad Smt. Inu Sarma, Mr. Sajan Bhuyan.Ki kaitor bad duhalia ba la rwai ki sur bathiang ha katei ka sngi ki long ka kynhun thymmai ba la jer T Na U Bnai, ka Saphina Kharhunai bad Aanya Kharhunai, ki ksiew jong u Bah Rana Kharkongor, bad ki sur tympang jong u Bah Tanbor Swer bad Kong Adlyne Khonglam. Ki kynhun shad na jylla Assam ruh ki la ai ki jingshad tynrai kiba iphuh iphieng kynthup ia ka shad tynrai Bihu, ka ba la pawnam kylleng.Kum ban iai kynmaw ia u synñiang jong kita ki laingut ki khlur tiewdohmaw, la pyrto da ki kyntien shongsbai kumba la jer ainam kyrpang:Bah Tanbor Swer, phi dei u myllung thaw kyntien bad sur rwai Khasi tynrai bad ba mynta. Ha ka kam ba shitrhem jongphi ba la palat sanphew snem, la mih byllai ki sur rwai halor ka mariang, ki samla, ka longbriew manbriew, ka mynsiem ieid ri, sur riewblei bad ka jingim briew ha imlang sahlang. U Bah Tanbor u dei u kaitor ba la ithuh da ka shlem iktiar jong ka All India Radio bad la pynmih katto katne ki thup jingrwai, kynthup ruh kaba rwai byrngia ha rynsan paidbah ba kongsan ha jylla bad ha ka thaiñ. La pyrto ainam ia u synñiang bakhraw ha ka liang  ka surrwai surtem Khasi, da ki synrop riewtbit mattithaw kiba thrang ban pynkup burom iaphi, da ka Khusnam Sahkynmaw ha ka nam ka kyrteng jong U Bah Rana Kharkongor 2023Bah Daminot J Wankhar, phi dei u simpah simsong, u kaitor bad duhalia ba kynsai ha la ka jingtbit bad ki sur snah ba khia thew. Ki tien danda bad kyoh mynthi ha ki kyntien sur rwai ki long ki ba synlar, ba mynta bad ba ïahap tar bad ïadei dur lyngba ki por bad katto katne na ki jingrwai ki la ai mynsiem ban pynkylla dur bad kyntur shaphrang ka mynsiem saiñkylla ha ka imlang sahlang ha ka ba lah ban ñiew kum ki sur rwai suhsieng shirta. U myllung ba ju rwai bad thoh ha jylli riewpyrthei bad riewblei, la ha ka ktien tynrai Khasi bad ktien phareng; u Bah Daminot u dei u radbah damdar bad kaitor ba tyngshaiñ pura. La pyrto ainam ia u synñiang bakhraw ha ka liang ka pule dangle, ka thoh ka tar bad ka sur rwai sur tem, da ki synrop riewtbit mattithaw kiba thrang ban pynkup burom iaphi, da Ka Khusnam Kynsai Kordor 2023.Kong Adlyne Khonglam, i dei ka myllung, kaitor bad duhalia kynthei da ka surthiang snah ba kyndeh mynsiem bad shitrhem ha ki paidbah da ki sur bad kyntien shaphang ka jingim nongkyndong, ka sur tlem ha kut shadem bad ki sur baphuh baphieng ha ka imlang sahlang. Kum ka myllung, phi la thoh kot bad dei ka kaitor ba la ithuh da ka shlem iktiar jong ka All India Radio bad Doordarshan Kendra. La pyrto ainam ia u synñiang bakhraw ha ka liang  ka sur rwai sur tem Khasi, da ki synrop riewtbit mattithaw kiba thrang ban pynkup burom iaphi, da Ka Khusnam Kynsai Kordor 2023
title: KI KHUSNAM BAKYNSAI ÏA U BAH TANBOR SWER, BAH DAMINOT J WANKHAR BAD KONG ADLYNE KHONGLAM

content: Khliehriat, Naitung 15 : Ka jingialang iamir jingmut jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bad Assam ka long ha ka 15 tarik, Naitung, 2023 ha Holy Cross Secondary School Umkiang, East Jaintia Hills District, ban iakren halor ka jingiapynbeit pud hapdeng kine ki ar tylli ki jylla ha ka wat kaba ar.Ia ka jyllla Meghalaya la lamkhmat da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, ka MLA jong ka Saipung ka Kong Santa Mary Shylla, u Chief Executive Member ka Jaintia Hills Autonomous District Council  u Bah Thombor Shiwat katba ia ka Assam la lamkhmat da u Myntri ka tnat Forest u Chandra Mohan Patowary uba dei u MLA jong ka Dharmapur Constituency.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang da ki bor synshar District, ki ophisar na ki tnat treikam Sorkar bad ki nongialam shnong jong kane ka thain.U Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor,  u la pyntip ba ka shnong Baikam kaba don 37 ki longiing ka la pynpaw ba ka don ia ka jingangnud ban rung sha ka jylla Meghalaya bad u la ong ba ia kane ka jingdawa yn sa pynbeit ha kane ka kynti.
title: KWAH KA SHNONG BAIKAM BAN WAN SHA MEGHALAYA HA KA JINGÏAPYNBEIT PUD

content: Lai ngut ki mynder ri na ka ri Bangladesh kiba rung tuh shapoh u pud u sam jong ka ri India ha ka shnong Tishang Nongjri, Pynursla Civil Sub-division, East Khasi Hills District ki la shah kem ha ki paidbah jong ka shnong Tishang Nongjri, katba ki dang pom tuh ia ki dieng na ka khlaw shnong ban pynkie lyngba ka wah sha ka ri Bangladesh.Ha u kyrwoh ba ka Ri War Development Organisation (RWDO) ka la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, u President u Bah Tensing Khonglah, la iathuh ba ki mynder ri na ka ri Bangladesh ki ju rung tuh shapoh ka shnong Tishang Nongjri lyngba kawei ka thliew muri kaba heh bad nangne ki ju rung sha khlaw ban pom tuh ki dieng ki siej, ia ki dieng kwai, bad kiwei kiwei ki marrep.Ka seng ka la pyntip ruh ba kine ki mynder ri, ym tang ba ki pynjot dusmon ia ka jingthung jingtep, hynrei ki ju byrngem byrsit ruh wat ia ki trai shnong kiba trei sha ki bri ki bsa lada ki shlan ban beh thong ki. Shuh shuh ki nongshong shnong ki iathuh ruh ba kim ju nud ban leit sha bri sha bsa tang marwei lane ar ngut namarba ki sheptieng ia ki mynder ri na Bangladesh kiba ju wan rung tuh da ki kynhun ryngkat ki tiar pynmynsaw.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai  ka seng ka la leit ban iakynduh ia ki heh shipai jong ka tnat BSF ban iakren halor kane ka jingprong tuh jong ki mynder ri sha kane ka shnong.Ki shipai BSF ki la ai ka jingmynjur ban iatreilang bad ki nongshong shnong ryngkat lang bad ka seng na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ka shong shngaiñ ha ka thaiñ bad ban pyrkhing bha ia kane ka jingioh lad jong ki mynder ri ban wan rung tuh shapoh u pud u sam ka Ri India.U Nongialam ka RWDO u la iathuh, katba ki dang mih na ktem sah ki shipai BSF bad iaid lyngba ka jingker sainar ban leit phai noh sha la ing, ki la lap ia ki mynder Bangladeshi ba ki thmu ban rung tuh sha u pud u sam jong ka shnong Tishang Nongjri lyngba ka thliew muri ba don jingkieng.“Ngi la pyntip noh sha ki shipai BSF kiba don hajan kane ka jingkieng bad ynda ngi la iakren bad ki shipai BSF ki iathuh ha ngi ba ki don ki mynder Bangladeshi kiba tuh bad pom dieng sha pdeng khlaw ka bri Tishang Pungdiengïong,” u la ong.Ki dkhot ka seng ki la rung shapdeng khlaw ki la ioh kem ia ki lai ngut ki mynder ri kiba dang pom tuh ia ki dieng kwai, ki dieng met ia kiba ki la thmu ban pynkie lyngba ki wah kiba tuid sha Bangladesh.Hadien kane, ki shipai BSF ki la kem noh ia ki lai ngut bad kurup noh ia kine ki dieng bad lai tylli ki wait na ka kti jong ki mynderi Bangladeshi ha kaba la aiti noh sha ki Pulit ban leh ia kaba donkam.Ka Seng ka la phah ruh ka kyrwoh sha ka Sorkar Kmie lyngba ki shipai BSF ban pyndep noh kham kloi ia ka jingker sainar shiah bad ban buh noh da ki CCTV Camera ha ki thaiñ khappud khnang ban tehlakam ia ka jingwan rung tuh jong ki mynder ri Bangladeshi sha u pud u sam ka Ri India.
title: NA KI THLIEW MURI, RUNG TUH KI KHAR BANGLA SHA TISHANG NONGJRI, KEM 3 NGUT

content: Kum shibynta jong ka jingrakhe  ia ka sngi kyrpang jong ki nongri dohkha kaba la tip kum ka National Fish Farmers Day, ka tnat Fisheries jong ka Sorkar Pdeng, ka la pynlong ia ka Virtual prokram mynta ka sngi na ka bynta ki jylla bapher bapher jong ka Ri India ha kaba lah ioh ban plie da u Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng jong ka tnat Fisheries, Animal Husbandry bad Dairying kata U Parshottam Rupala ia ki projek kiba pher ba pher kiba iadei bad ka kam ri dohkha.Ha kane ka prokram, ha Mairang la ioh ban plie ia kawei na ki Fish Processing Unit jong ka seng treilang Y. Kharsyntiew SHG ha Umwiehsup, Mairang ia kaba la bei pisa na  ka skhim Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY) na ka bynta u snem 2021-2022 bad  ia kaba la pyn treikam da ka ophis jong u Superintendent of Fisheries, West Khasi Hills District, Nongstoin,Ha ka prokram ha Mairang, la sakhi ia ka jingiashimbynta jong u Superintendent of Fisheries ka West Khasi Hills District, Nongstoin, u Bah A. Laloo, kiwei kiwei pat ki nongtrei ka tnat Fishery, u Syiem Khynnah jong ka Hima Nongkhlaw, u Paiem K. M Syiemlieh, ki nongialam shnong lem bad ki paidbah ka thain.Ha kane ka Fish Processing Unit, lyngba ki kor ki bor katkum kane ka juk kaba mynta, yn lah ban pynmih tungtap ia kiba yn pyniaid ha ki iew ki hat bapher bapher ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei.Ka jingplie ia kane ka shlem pynmih tungtap ka long shibynta na ka jingpyrshang jong ka sorkar ban kyntiew shuhshuh ia ka ioh ka kot jong ki nongshong shnong kiba ia don bynta bad ka kam ri bad die dohkha ne kino kino ki marbam ba lah ban pynmih na ka dohkha bad la kyrmen ruh ba kiba kum kine ki jait skhim kin iarap shuh shuh ban ai kam ai jam ia ki nongshong shnong kiba don ia ka bynta kaba khraw ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot jong ka ri bad ka jylla.Kiwei kiwei pat ki bynta jong katei ka prokram ki kynthup ia ka jingkren lyngkot na i nongiohbhah na katei ka skhim, kata, i Kong B. Kharsyntiew, iba dei i President jong ka Y. Kharsyntiew SHG bad ka jingpyni nam ia ki tiar ki tar kiba pyndonkam ha ka ban pynmih tungtap.
title: LA PLIE ÏA KA JAKA PYNMIH TUNGTAP HA MAIRANG

content: Shillong, Naitung 4 : Shen ha ki khyndiat bnai ban wan kan sa mih ka phlim lyngkot kaba la ai kyrteng ‘Nongshun’. La ring dur ia kane ka phlim da u Bah Kamki Diengdoh bad u Elizer Bareh. Kiba ia shim bynta ha kane ka phlim ki long u Bah Albert Mawrie, u Hilarius Kharbihkhiew, Eva Mary Swer, Elizer Bareh bad kiwei pat.Ia kane ka phlim lyngkot la pynbit pynbiang da ka State of Mind Production ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki dkhot jong ka Hills People Collective. La pynmih lane Produce ia kane ka phlim lyngkot da i Kong Suzanne Syiem. Kiwei pat kiba ia don bynta ha kane ka phlim ki long u Bah Julius Basaiawmoit uba peit ia ka Sound , ka Naisha Tariang ba peit ia ka Set Design, ka Dari Khyriem ba leh ia ka Make up bad kiwei pat.
title: SHEN YN MIH KA PHLIM LYNGKOT KABA LA AI KYRTENG ‘NONGSHUN’

content: : Ka Jaiñtia Students’ Union (JSU) ka la pynpaw ka jingpyrshah kaba jur ïa ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar ban wanrah ïa ka lynti Rel ha rilum Jaiñtia. Ka jingpyrshah jong ka JSU ka long tang hadien khyndiat kynta ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la ïathuh ba ka la don ka jingsdang wad bniah ban pynsdang noh ïa ka lynti Rel haduh Khliehriat, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Ha u kyrwoh, ka JSU ka la dawa ïa u Myntri Rangbah ban wanrah da ki kam pynroi ba kyntiew ïa ka pule puthi, ki hospital, bad ki surok kiba bha ha rilum Jaiñtia bad ban pyntreikam ruh da ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) kaba long ka mat kaba hakhmat eh jong ka Sorkar.“Pyntreikam da ka ILP, shna da ki surok kiba bha, wanrah da ki skul kiba bha bad ki jaka sumar kiba bha, ngin sa lah ban pdiang ïa ka lynti ha rilum Jaiñtia,” la ong u kyrwoh“Ngi sngewthuh ba ka jingpynïasoh da ka lynti Rel ka wanrah bun ki jingmyntoi naduh kaba pynsuk ïa ka leit ka wan, ka jingkyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot bad ka pynïajan ruh ïa ka leit ka wan bad kiwei ki jylla hynrei ka jylla kaba rit kum ka Meghalaya kaba la buhai shnong kham bun da ki riewlum, ka donkam eh ïa ka Sorkar ban pyntreikam nyngkong shwa da ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ha ka jylla namarba kane ka jingthmu ka long ban pyrkhing da ka aiñ ka jingwanrung laitluid jong ki briew kiba nabar ban ïada ïa ka riti ka dustur jong ki trai shnong ha ka jylla, ïa ki marpohkhyndew bad ka jingbun briew jong ka thaiñ,” la bynrap ka JSU.U kyrwoh u la ong shuh shuh ba ka JSU kam len ïa ka jingshisha ba ka rilum Jaiñtia ka donkam ïa ka Rel.  “Ngi angnud ban pyntreikam shwa ïa ka ILP ban khang ïa ka jingwanrung be-aiñ jong ki briew kiba nabar bad ban phaikhmat shwa sha ka pule ka puthi, ka jingshna ïa ki jaka sumar kiba bha, ki surok kiba bha, ïa kiba ngi ngeit ba ki dei ki jingdonkam ba hakhmat eh jong ki paidbah ka thaiñ,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: NGIN SA PDIANG ÏA KA REL, PYNBHA SHWA ÏA KA PULE PUTHI, HOSPITAL, SUROK BAD PYNTREIKAM ILP – JSU

content: Hadien ba ka Khasi Hills Democratic Front hapoh ka jingialam jong u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem kum u Chief Executive Member ka la shimti ia ka Executive Committee kaba thymmai hapoh ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council na ka liang jong ka Khasi Students’ Union Central Body ha ka 28 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 ka la leit ban pynkynmaw biang ia ki mat jingdawa kiba ka seng ka la buh hakhmat ka Council naduh ki snem kiba mynshwa.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President ka KSU samla Lambokstarwell Marngar u la iathuh ba ka jingpynkynmaw ia ka Council ka long halor ka jingpyrshah jong ka seng ban khlong ia u Uranium, ka jingpynsngew jong ka seng ban pyrshah ia ka jingai No Objection Certificate sha ki bor shipai jong ka sorkar India bad kawei pat ka jingpynkynmaw ia ka council ka long ba kam bit horkit hordang ban ai jingbit ban shna ia ka lynti rel katba ka sorkar India kam pat pyntreikam ia ka Inner Line Permit hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.Une u nongialam ka KSU u la maham ruh lada ka KHADC ka iaid lait ia kine ki jingdawa ka seng kam banse ban pynlong da ki jingiakhih kiba tyngeh.
title: “EM ÏA U URANIUM”, PYNKYNMAW KA KSU ÏA KA EC THYMMAI KA KHADC

content: : Ka lympung ialeh Badminton kaba hynñiew ba la pynlong da ka East Khasi Hills District Badminton Association (EKHDBA) kaba la sdang naduh 29 tarik Jylliew 2023 ka la poi sha kaba kut ha ka 1 tarik Naitung 2023. Ki don baroh 120 ngut ki rang bad ki thei ialehhkai Badminton kiba la iashim bynta ha kane ka lympung.Ha ka kyrdan Under 13 Girls (Single) ia ka nam lahduh la iohrah da ka Asem Chanu Shivani, ha ka Under 13 boys (Single) la iohrah da u Haegan Diengdoh.Ha ka Under 15 Girls (Single) ka Netania T Tariang ka la iohrah ia ka nam lahduh katba ha ka Under 15 boys (single) ia ka nam lahduh la ioh rah da u Gavin Kharbuki,.Ha ka Mens Doubles u P. Joshi bad u Subadonbor pyngrope ki la long ki nongjop.Katba ha ka Men (Single) bad Women (Single) u Mohit Joshi bad ka Elsarica Umdorki la iohrah ia ka jingjop.Ha ka Under 17 Girls (Single) ka Sneha Chetri ka la long ka nongjop katba ha ka Under-19 boys (Single)  u Mohit Joshi u la long u lahduh.Ha ka Under 19 Girls (single) ia ka nam lahduh la iohrah da ka Angenora Monin bad ha ka Under 19 Boys Doubles u Pratham Majumdar bad u Raynell Kharbuki ki la long ki lahduh. Ia kane ka lympung la pynhap pyrda da u Project Director jong ka DRDA East Khasi Hills u Bah T. Passah uba la long kum u Kongsan.Ka East Khasi Hills District ka don kynrhai ki sap bad ki nongiatied Badminton kiba tbit bad kiba don jingkyrmen ban kiew shaphrang bad ban iaryngkat bad ki nongiatied badminton ha ka ri India.  Hynrei ban poi sha kata ka thong, ki nongiatied Badminton kiba donsap ki donkam ban ioh ia ki jinghikai kiba paka naduh ba ki dang lung. Kumta ka East Khasi Hills District Badminton Association ka angnud bad kut jingmut triang ban poi sha kata ka thong.Ha kajuh ka por pat ki don shibun bah ki jingeh bad ki jingeh kiba hakhmat eh ki long, ka jingbymdon ki jaka ialeh badminton ne ki Indoor sport facility kiba biang bad ka jingbymioh jingkyrshan pisa kaba pura.Wat ha kane ka lympung kaba mynta ruh ka Association ka la shem shitom khait ban pynlong ia kane ka jingiatied badminton namar ka jingbymdon ka ja ka kaba biang.Kumba ngi iohi ba ka jaka ialeh badminton kata ka Tirot Sing Indoor Stadium ha Lachumiere la dep pynpra na ka bynta ban tei ia ka Bhavan bad ruh ka JN Sports Complex ha Polo ruh ki dang pynpra bad tei thymmai kaba la ktah jur ia ka jingialeh sport ha ka Nongbah.Ñuma, da ka jingtrei shitom bad jingkyrshan jong ka Director Sports and Youth Affairs ka Sorkar Jylla ka Kong Isawanda Laloo la lah ban pynlong ia ka lympung kaba jop.Ka Association ka iai pyrshang ban wad ki lad ki lynti ban ioh ia ka jaka ialeh Badminton bad jaka hikai kaba paka, khnang ban lah ban pynlong ia ki jinghikai bad ki lympung iakop.Na ka bynta kane ka Association ka kyntu ia ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynioh shi lyngkhot ka khyndew ban tei ia ka Indoor Sport facility bad ka Association ka khot ruh ia ki nongkhaii, ki kompeni ban wan shakhmat ban iasnoh kti bad iatreilang bad ka Association ban kyrshan bad kyntiew ia ki nongiatied Badminton.
title: PAW KA SAP BATBIT KI RANG BAD KI THEI ÏALEHKAI HA KA LYMPUNG BATMINTON KA EKHDBA : PAN JAKA KA ASSOCIATION NA KA SORKAR

content: U President jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee u Bah Vincent H. Pala u la kam ba bun ki nongialam jong kiwei kiwei ki seng sainpyrthei ki la khroh ia u ban iakhun ia ka elekshon MP na Shillong Parliamentary Seat ka ban sa long ha u snem 2024.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 21 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 u Bah Vincent Pala uba long ruh u MP ba mynta jong ka Lok Sabha na 1-Shillong Lok Sabha Constituency u la ong, ba kumba u la iai neh bad ka Seng Congress naduh kaba sdang kumta ruh un iaineh bad kane ka seng sain pyrthei hynrei tang lada ka Congress ka beh hi ia u na ka party.“Ngam kwah ban iakren shapang u Mukul bad bun ki briew kiba la pyrshang khroh ia nga hynrei ngam dei uba tatdor.  Nga la sdang ia ka jingim kum u riewpaidbah bad ngam lah ban shu shah rong noh ha kano kano ka party. Ngan iaineh beit ha ka Congress bad ngan iaineh bad ka Congress tang lada ka Congress ka beh hi ia nga, kata, kan dei da kawei ka daw hynrei kam don kano kano ka daw ba ngan leit iakhun (na kiwei pat ki seng sainpyrthei),” ong u Bah Pala.“Ym don jingartatien, bun ki nongialam jong kiwei ki seng saiñpyrthei ki ju ong ia nga balei ngam iakhun na kane ka party, nga don bun ngut ki paralok MP, ki ong wan sha ka BJP, wan sha ka NPP hynrei ngam dei uba tatdor,” bynrap u Bah Pala.“Ngan iaineh kum u briew uba shisur shidur. Ngam sngew eiei lada nga rem ne nga jop ia ka elekshon bad ngan ym pyndem noh ia la ki jong ki hok, ngam ym pyndem ia ki nongrim lajong. Ngam ym leit sha ka NPP ne ngan iakhun na kiwei pat ki party.  Ngan iai neh beit bad ka Congress bad ngan iakhun (ia ka elekshon na ka Congress bad phin ai biang ka jingkyrshan ba ngan jop biang ha kane ka kynti,” ong shuh shuh u Bah Pala.
title: BUN KIBA LA WAN KHROH ÏA NGA, NGAM DEI UBA TATDOR, ONG U BAH VINCENT PALA

content: U Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ha ka sngi thohdieng u la sam bhah ia ki 10 ngut ki Executive Member jong ka Executive Committee hapoh ka jingialam jong u.U Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la bat hi halade ia ka tnat General Administration, Finance, Posting & Transfer, Establishment, Appointment bad kiwei kiwei ki tnat ki bym shym la aiti sha ki EM katba u Bah Pynshngaiñlang N. Syiem uba long u Dy. CEM u la ioh bat ia ka tnat Elaka Administration, Law & Legal Matters.Ka Kong Grace Mary Kharpuri ka la ioh bat ia ka tnat Market, (Council Market) bad kiwei kiwei ki Iew ba ka tnat Information Technology.  U Bah Victor Rani u la ioh bat ia ka tnat Arts and Culture, Health and Sanitation, Labour Clearance Certificate bad Fisheries.U Bah Gigur Myrthong u la shah pynkhamti kum u EM uba peit ia ka tnat Trade bad Enforcement Wing.U Bah Rangkynsai Kharbuki u la ioh bat ia ka tnat Council Building, Council Assets, Marriage and Divorce.Ka Kong Magdalyne Sawkmie Mawlong ka la ioh bat ia ka tnat Forest bad Town Committee.U Bah Teiborlang Pathaw u la iohbat ia ka tnat Land & Building Byelaws.U Bah Alvin Khyriem Sawkmie u la ioh ia ka tnat Revenue Collection bad Planning.U Bah Fantin J. Lakadong u la ioh bat ia ka tnat Taxation, Water Resource bad ka tnat Mines and Minerals.U Bah Carnes Sohshang u la ioh bat ia ka tnat Development bad Education.
title: SAM BHAH U BAH PYNIAID SING SYIEM ÏA KI EXECUTIVE MEMBER KA KHADC

content: Ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la rai ban ieh beit ha ka jingstad jong ki MDC ka party halor ka jingshah pynkhyllem ka Executive Committee ha ka National Peoples Party (NPP) da ka jingïatreilang bad ka Indian National Congress (INC).Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang bad ki MDC jong ka party, u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la ong ruh ba kam don satia kano kano ka rai ba ka UDP kan ym ïatrei shuh bad ka Sorkar ba la ïalam da ka NPP.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka jingkhyllem jong ka EC ba ïalam da ka UDP kan ym ktah satia ïa ka jingïadei bad ka NPP hapoh ka jylla.“Ngin sngap shwa nyngkong ïa ki daw kiba la pynlong ïa ki (NPP) ban wanrah ïa ka No Confidence Motion,” u la ong da kaba bynrap ruh ba ka party ka la shim rai ruh ban ieh ha ka jingstad jong ki MDC ban rai halor kane ka kam.Ka UDP ka dei ka paralok kaba kham kongsan jong ka NPP kaba iatreilang hapoh ka kynhun Meghalaya Democratic Alliance kaba bat ia u lakam synshar ha ka jylla. Ka NPP da ka jingai jingkyrshan jong ka Congress kaba shong ha ka Liang Pyrshah ka la pynkhyllem jraiñ ïa ka Executive Committee ba la ïalam da ka UDP lyngba ka No Confidence Motion ba la wanrah ha ka sngi sdang jong ka Dorbar Lyiur ka Council. U Bah Metbah u la ong ba ka UDP kam shym la poi pyrkhat ba ka NPP kan wanrah ïa ka No Confidence Motion pyrshah ïa ka Executive Committee ba ïalam da ka United Democratic Alliance (UDA).“Ngim lah shuh ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingthmu (halor ka jingwanrah ïa ka No Confidence Motion), namarba la shu wanrah kyndit bad ha ki saw snem ba la leit noh, ka EC ka la treikam beit jaijai khlem kano kano ka jingshah pynwit,” u la ong. “Nga kubur ba kin don borabor ki jingduna ha ka jingtreikam hynrei kam long kaba dei ban shu pynkhyllem ïa ka EC bad ban thaw ïa ka EC ba thymmai manla ka sngi.  Kaei kaba kham kongsan ka dei ka jingïakren bad ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ki dkhot jong ki seng saiñpyrthei bapher bapher kiba ïatreilang hapoh ka kynhun,” u la ong. Haba kylli, u Bah Metbah u la ong ba ka UDP kam lah ban sngewthuh shuh ïa ka jingïapynbeit hapdeng ka NPP bad ka Congress.U la ong ba ka Party shen kan sa rah ïa kane ka kam sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma, uba long ruh u Chairman jong ka Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA).
title: IEH KA UDP HA KA JINGSTAD KI MDC BAN RAI NABA SHAH PYNKHYLLEM KA EC HA KHADC

content: Kawei ka heprit kaba dang 12 snem ka rta na ka jaidbynriew Naga kaba sah ha kawei ka shnong ha West Jaiñtia Hills District kaba dang pule ha ka Class-VII ka la shah thombor ha uwei u runar uba la 31 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Mairang, Eastern West Khasi Hills District haduh ba kan da mynsaw.Kane ka heprit ka don mynta ha ka jingshah sumar ha NEIGRIHMS Hospital, Shillong.Ha u kyrwoh ba ka Rongmei Phwam, Shillong ka la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ba la soi kyrteng da u Chairman u K. Namgadai bad u General Secretary u Dr. Gaithoiliu Phaomei, la pyntip, ba kane ka jingjia, ka la jia ha ka 15 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 6 baje mynmiet ha kaba u runar u la leit rung hapoh ing katba kane ka heprit ka dang don marwei bad thombor ia ka longrynieng jong ka da ka jingthmu ban leh be-ijot bad pyrshang ruh ban dkhat jubor wat ia ka jingim jong ka.U kyrwoh u la pyntip shuh shuh ba ha kane ka jingshah thombor, kane ka heprit ka la mynsaw na ki bynta jong ka khmat ka diang, na u ryndang bad na ka kpoh.Ka Rongmei Phwam, Shillong ka la dawa ia ki bor jong ka aiñ ba kin kem mardor bad ban pynshitom ia u nongleh kam bymman katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.Ki Pulit kiba la ioh pdiang ia ka ujor ki la register case bad tian bishar ruh ia u nonglehkam bymman hadien ba la ioh kem ia u.
title: MYNSAW KA HEPRIT NAGA BA SHAH JRONG KTI BAD SHAH THOMBOR HA U RUNAR

content: Shillong, Jylliew 14: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ha ka sngi Balang u la iathuh ba ka Regional Committee kan sa leit ban sorjamin ia ki jaka ba don ha ka jingiakajia pud ha West Jaiñtia Hills District bad West Karbi Anglong District ha ka taiew ba khatduh jong une u bnai Jylliew, 2023 shwa ban phah ia ka kaiphod sorjamin sha ki Sorkar Jylla ha u bnai Nailar, 2023.Ka Regional Committee kaba la shong ia ka jingialang ha ka sngi Balang ha nongbah Shillong kan sa bishar bniah ia ki jaka ba iakajia pud ha Block I (Psiar-Khanduli) kaba don ha khappud jong ka West Jaintia Hills District bad ka West Karbi Anglong District.Ha kane ka jingialang la iashim bynta lang da ki Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaintia Hills District bad ka West Karbi Anglong District, ki dkhot jong ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council bad ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous District Council bad kynthup ruh ki nongialam shnong na ki ar tylli ki district jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam.Ha ka jingialang ba la pyniaid da u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar uba long ruh u Chairman jong ka Regional Committee na ka bynta ka West Jaiñtia Hills ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u Piyush Hazarika uba long u Myntri ka tnat Information and Public Relations ka Sorkar Assam, la mynjur ba ki dkhot jong ka komiti kin sa leit sorjamin lang ryngkat bad ki Myntri Rangbah jong ka Jylla Assam bad Meghalaya.“Ngim pat lah ban shim rai eiei halor ka jingiashim ne ka jingiaai, ia mynta ngi dang iakren tang ban leit sha ki shnong kiba don jingiakajia bad ban sngap ia ka sur jong ki paidbah khnang ban pynkut noh ia ki jingiakajia na baroh ar tylli ki jylla,” la iathuh u Bah Dhar ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Shuh shuh, ka Regional Committee ka la rai ban aiti ia ka kaiphod sorjamin sha ki Sorkar ha u bnai Nailar.  Shwa kane, ngin sa leit sorjamin shwa ia ki jaka ba don ka jingiakajia pud ha kaba kut taiew jong u bnai Jylliew lane ha kaba sdang jong u bnai Naitung, ryngkat lang bad ki Myntri Rangbah,” u la bynrap.Ka regional committee kan sa shong biang ia ka jingialang ha u bnai Naitung, la iathuh u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar.
title: HA KA TAIEW BAKHATDUH U JYLLIEW NE U NAITUNG YN SORJAMIN KA REGIONAL COMMITTEE SHA KHAPPUD

content: Ka Khasi Jaintia Fish Wholesaler and Retailer Association (KJFWRA) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la dawa ia ka Commissioner of Food Safety ka Kong R.M. Kurbah ban ai jingpynshai mynno bad hangno ba ka tnad ka la phah leh Test ban pynshisha ba ki dohkha ba la wanrah na shabar ka jylla ki dei kiba la injek da ka dawai Formalin.Kane ka jingdawa ka long hadien ba ki nongdie bad ki nongkhaii dohkha ki la iakynduh bad ki lad pathai khubor ha basa die dohkha ha Iewduh tang shisngi hadien ba ka Commissioner of Food Safety, ka la pynjari da ka hukum ban khang ia ka jingdie dohkha haduh 15 sngi hadien ba ka Ophis jong ka Commissioner of Food Safety ka la lap haduh 30 tylli ki dohkha ki dei kiba la test positive na ka jinginjek da ka dawai formalin kaba la ktah ia ka koit ka khiah jong ki paidbah.Ki nongkhaii bad ki nongdie dohkha ki la kren bynñiaw ruh halor kane ka jingpynmih hukum ryngkat bad ki kyndon ba kito kiba ialeh pyrshah kin ngat ha ka jingpynsajia da kaba shah set phatok haduh 7 snem kynthih ryngkat bad ka jingsiew kuna kaba T. 10 lak.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka seng ki nongdie bad ki nongkhaii dohkha ki la shim ruh ia ka rai ban leit iakynduh ia ka Commissioner of Food Safety khnang ban ioh ia ka jingshai kaba bniah halor kane ka bynta.U nongialam ka seng u Bah C. Wankhar, u la pynpaw ba ki dohkha kiba wanrah shapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya ki dei kiba wan na kylleng ki kompani na ka jylla Andhra Pradesh bad ia kine ki dohkha la ioh syrnot ruh na ka Sorkar Andhra Pradesh ha kaba la pynshisha ba kim dei satia kiba la injek da ka dawai Formalin.Namar kane, kane ka Seng bad ki nongdie dohkha kila rai ban leit iakynduh ia ka Commissioner of Food Safety mynta ka sngi ban ioh ia ka jingshai kaba bniah.
title: PAN JINGPYNSHAI KI NONGDIE DOHKHA ÏA KA HUKUM BA PYNJARI DA KA COMMISSONER OF FOOD SAFETY

content: Ka High Powered Committee jong ka Assembly Secretariat ha ka sngi Palei ka la shong ia ka jingialang ban iathir bad ban iatai sani ha kaba iadei bad ka jingbteng ban shna ia ka building jong ka Assembly bathymmai ha Mawdiangdiang.Ha kane ka jingialang kaba la long ha Taj Vivanta, Shillong, la iashim bynta lang da u Lamphang jong ka ling dorbar Thawain u Thomas A. Sangma, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma, ki Symbud Myntri Rangbah kiba kynthup ia u Bah Prestone Tynsong bad ia u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, ki MLA bad ki Ophisar na ki tnat treikam bapher bapher.U Thomas A Sangma ula pyntip ba ka High Powerd Committee jong ka Assembly Secretariat bad ki tnat treikam bapher bapher ki la mynjur ia ka jingtyrwa na ka bynta ban bteng biang ia ka jingshna ia ka Assembly ba thymmai ha ka wat kaba ar bad ia kane ka jingtyrwa yn sa phah sha ka Ministry of Development of North East Region (DoNER).
title: SHONG JINGIALANG KA HPC BAN BTENG KA JINGTEI IA KA ASSEMBLY HA KA WAT KABA AR
