content: : U President jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit ha ka 1 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 u la pynkut noh ia ka jingshah jingit kaba la neh haduh 221 kynta, kata hadien 10 sngi ba u la sdang ia ka jingshah jingit ba khlem pud sngi naduh ka 23 tarik u Jymmang, 2023 ban pynbor ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ialam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ba kan khmih bniah bad ban bishar bniah ia ka State Reservation Policy, 1972.Kane ka jingweng noh ia kane ka jingshah jingit ka long hadien ba ka Sorkar ka la phah da ka jingpyntip (Notification) halor ka jingthaw ia ka Expert Committee ka ban bishar thymmai ia ka Reservation Policy hapoh ka Jylla.Da ki hajar ngut ki paidbah ki la tuid sha ka jaka shah jingit u Bah Ardent ha Parking Lot kaba don markhap bad ka ophis Additional Secretariat, Shillong naduh ka por 2:00 baje nohphai sngi ban sngap ia ka jingpynbna kaba u Bah Ardent u la pynkut noh ia ka jingshah jingit kaba khlem pud sngi hadien ba ka Sorkar MDA ka la mynjur ban thaw da ka Expert Committee.
title: PYNTIAN JA KA KURIM ÏA U BAH ARDENT HADIEN KA JINGSHAH THNGAN KABA 221 KYNTA

content: Shillong 26 Jymmang : Ka Khasi Students’ Union lyngba ka Education Cell jong ka, ka la leit ban ia kynduh ia u Ambrose Ch Marak u Secretary jong ka tnat pule puthi ban ia kren bad ai jingthoh halor ka jingeh ba ki samla pule ki ia kynduh ha PGT College haduh ba kin hap ban ieng lain shiteng synnia ruh ban ap ia ka Form. Ka KSU ka la dawa ba dei ban pynjlan biang ia ka tarik ai Form bad ban pynbun ia ki Form khnang ba baroh ki samla pule kin ioh ban iakhun ban ioh pule ha katei ka College. U Ambrose Ch Marak u la kular ban leh kumta bad u la phone ruh wut wut sha ki nongpyniaid jong ka College ba ki ban pynbun ia ki Form.Ka KSU ka la ia kynduh ruh ia I Principal jong ka PGT College ba nangne shakhmat ki dei ban pyllait noh beit online ia ka Form katkum ka jingiaid jong ka juk. Ha kaba iadei bad ki Centres na ka bynta jong kito kiba hap ban thoh ia ka CUET, ka Seng ka lah dawa ban pynthikna ba ki samla Khasi ki dei ban ioh thoh beit ha Shillong namarba kumba ka long mynta kiba thoh eksam ia ka CUET ki hap ban thoh shabar jylla. Halor ka jingiatyngkhuh ki tarik ban thoh ia ka eksamin jong ka D.El.Ed bad ka B.Ed u Ambrose Ch Marak u la kular ban pynkynriah noh ia ka sngi bad yn sa pynbna paidbah ia ki sngi ba dei ban thoh eksamin. Kane ka long katkum ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u Education Secretary ka KSU u samla Pynkmen Sanmiet.
title: KYNDUH KA KSU IA U SECRETARY KA TNAT PULE PUTHI HALOR KI JINGEH JONG KI SAMLA PULE

content: U President jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit u la mynjur ban iashim bynta ha ka jingialang ba la khot da ka Sorkar Jylla ban iakren halor ka Reservation Policy hadien ba ka Sorkar ka la thaw thymmai biang ia ka Komiti ban iakren halor ka Reservation Roster System bad ia ka Reservation Policy.Watla u Bah Ardent lem bad ki nongialam jong ka VPP ki la mynjur ban leit sha ka jingialang ba la khot pynlong da ka sorkar hynrei ka jingshah thngan jong u Bah Ardent kan dang iai bteng tad haduh ba ka Committee kan shim ia ka rai ban bishar biang ia ka Reservation Policy.U Bah Brighstarwell Marbaniang uba long u MLA jong ka VPP u la pynbna ba lada ka jingiakren ba la khot da ka Sorkar kam poi shano shano ruh, ka party kan dang bteng ban pynlong ia ka jingiakhih paidbah.“Ngi dei ban ioh ia kaei kaba ngi dawa ban khmih bniah biang ia ka Reservation Policy,” ong u Bah Ardent haba kren ha ka sngi Baar sha ki paidbah bad ki samla pule kiba ialum sawdong ka jaka shah thngan ha parking Lot markhap bad ka ophis Additional Secretariat.“Ka party ka la rai ban leit sha ka jingkhot iakren bad ka sorkar ka dei ban mynjur ban khmih bniah ia ka Reservation Policy lym kumta ngan ym mih na kane ka jaka, ngan bteng ia ka jingshah thngan,” la bynrap u Bah Ardent.“Ka Sorkar ka kwah ba kane ka jingiakhih kan khluit noh bad lada ka don ka jingkhluit kan don ka jingkulmar bad lada ka kulmar ka dei ka Sorkar ka ban kmen. Ngin ym shah riam ha ka jingkwah jong ka Sorkar.  Ngi lah ban dom bad ban bitar ba u Bah Ardent u la shah thngan la phra sngi, hynrei ngin ym liat ha ka jingriam jong ka Sorkar,” ong u Bah Ardent.U la ong ruh watla ka Sorkar ka la khot iakren hynrei ka VPP kan ap ia kaei kaba mih na ka jingiakren lada ka jingiakren kam pynhun ngin bteng ia ka jingshah thngan.
title: MYNJUR U BAH ARDENT BAN ÏASHIM BYNTA HA KA KOMITI ÏATAI ÏA KA RESERVATION POLICY

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Nongpoh Circle hapoh ka jingialam jong u President u Bah John Lyngdoh ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei kaba la ioh ujor na ki nongthep kam, ka la leit ban pynsangeh mardor ia ka personal Interview thungkam ha ka ophis District Medical and Health Officer (DM&HO) Ri Bhoi District hadien ba ki nongthep kam na kylleng ki bynta jong ka them Ri-Bhoi bad na ka jylla ki la kynnoh ba la pynmih sop sop ïa ki kyrteng jong kiba la shah jied ban ïakhun ïa ka personal Interview khlem ka jingtip jong kiwei pat ki nongthep kam watla ki don bun ngut kiba la thep kam.Ka seng ka la kyntu ia ka ophis u DMHO ba ka dei ban ai jingpynshai halor kane ka bynta bad ban pynbeit ïa ki kynrum kynram ban pynsangeh shuwa ban pynlong ïa ka personal interview katba ym pat lah ban pynbeit ia kane ka kam.Katkum ka Advertisement ba la pynbna da ka ophis u DM&HO Ribhoi District ki don 8 tylli ki post ba kynthup kawei ka ka post Store Keeper, 6 tylli ki post Staff Nurse (PHC/CHC) bad kawei ka post Staff Nurse (RBSK).Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, kawei na ka samla thepkam jong ka post Staff Nurse ka la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia ba ka ophis jong u DMHO kam shym la ai jingtip ïa ki samla thepkam bad ia ki kyrteng jong kiwei pat ki samla kiba la shah jied ban ïakhun ïa ka personal interview ym shym la pynmih wat ha ka website.Ka la ong, “hynrei ka ophis u DMHO ka ladei ban pyntip naduh ba sdang bad dei ban pynmih da ki kyrteng, hynrei ka jingpynmih kyrteng tang 5 ngut ban ïakhun ïa ka Interview ha ka post Staff Nurse ha ophis u DMHO ka dei kaba la pynsuba sniew ïa baroh bad kam don jingmut ban pynlong Personal Interview,” bad bynrap, “na ka liang ki bor ba dei peit ki la pynshai ba ki la jied ïa ki 5 ngut ha ka personal interview lyngba ki Internal Marks bad mynta u dak jingkylli uba heh u mih ba kumno la shu jied na ka Internal Marks aiu haba khlem pat don ka jingpynïaleh eksamin.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong kane ka samla, ha Advertisement, ka ophis u DMHO ka la pan ïa kiba la trei kum ki Staff Nurse ha ka por Covid-19 bad kiba don jingtbit kumba lai snem bad kaba sngew lyngngoh pat ka long kumno ki nongthep kam kin don lypa ka jingtbit haduh 3 snem ban trei kum ki Covid Nurse haba u Covid-19 u wan lyngshop tang kumba 1 snem ne 2 snem duna.
title: PYNSANGEH KA KSU ÏA KA PERSONAL INTERVIEW HA OPHIS U DM&HO RI-BHOI

content: Ka Larisa LaminnaAdventist Higher Secondary School, Thadlaskein, West Jaiñtia Hills kaba la ioh khur 450 marks ka la long kaba nyngkong eh ha ka kyrdan Top 10 ha ka result Higher Secondary Leaving Certificate (Arts) ba la pynbna da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBOSE) ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Katba ka Avelyne Francisca Khriam na St. Edmunds Higher Secondary School, Shillong ka la poi ha ka kyrdan baar da kaba ioh khur 449 marks bad ka Deinamesha Hynniewta na St Anthony’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong ka la ioh khur 446 marks bad poi ha ka kyrdan kaba lai.Ha kawei pat ka liang, ka jingpas bha jong ki khynnah ha ka eksamin HSSLC ka long 80.30 percent. Ha u snem baladep, ka jingpas jong ki khynnah ka long 81.17 percent.Ki don 20,425 hajar ngut napdeng ki 25,434  ngut ki khynnah skul na ki 246 tylli ki skul kiba iakhun ia ka eksamin HSSLC kaba la long ha ki 105 tylli ki centre kiba la pas ha kane ka kynti.Ha kane ka kynti, ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District ka la paw kum ka district kaba bun tam kiba pas ha kaba ka percentage ka long 91.64 katba ka South Garo Hills ka paw kum ka district kaba duna bha kiba pas, kata, tang 49.23 percent.
title: WAN BANYNGKONG KA LARISA LAMIN HA KA RESULT HSSLC, ARTS STREAMS 2023

content: Uwei u nong China uba trei ha Dasu Hydropower Project ha Upper Kohistan ha Pakistan u la shah kem ha ki pulit hadien ba u la shah kynnoh ba ki nongtrei bylla kiba don ha katei ka jaka ba u kren beiñ blei. U la shah pynngat ha ki kyndon Section 295-C jong ka Pakistan Penal Code kaba dei ka kyndon ba u kren beiñ blei, la mudui pyrshah ïa u ha Komila Police Station da u Gulistan bad u Yasir kiba dei ki nongñiah kali.La pyntip sha ki pulit ba ki paidbhur ki la tur sha ka jaka sah jong ki nong China ha Barseen bad ki la don ruh ki kynhun kiba pynlong jingïakhih ha kawei na ki jaka trei jong ka Hydro Project, marsien ïoh ïa katei ka jingtip ki pulit ki la mareh wut wut sha katei ka jaka bad ki la lah ban tem ïa ka jingbitar jong ki paidbah.Hynrei la ïoh jingtip biang ba ha ka step kaba bud, bun bah ki briew ki la poi sha Komila bad ki la khang lynti ïa ka surok ban leitr sha Karakoram bad ki la pyrta pynrem ïa u nong China hynrei dei hadien ba ki pulit ki la kular ban kem ïa u, ki paidbah ki la pyllait noh ïa ka lynti. Ki nongïalam niam jong katei ka thaiñ ruh ki la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kin long jai jai.
title: SHAH KEM U NONG CHINA BA KREN BEIÑ ÏA U BLEI KI MUSLIM

content: Ka New York ka dei ka nongbah kaba riewspah tam ha ka pyrthei bad kane ka long katkum ka kaiphod ba la pynmih ha u 2023, ha nongbah New York ki don 3,40,000 ngut ki heh saipan kiba shong ba sah bad kane ka long katkum ka jinglap jong ka Henley & Patners. Hadien ka New York ka wan ka Tokyo kaba don 290,300 ngut ki heh saipan bud sa ka San Francisco Bay Area kaba don 285,000 ngut ki heh saipan kiba shong basah.Katkum katei ka kaiphod la ong ba ki don 97 tylli ki nongbah kiba don ha ka thup jong ka nongbah ba riewspah tam ba kynthup na ki ri Africa, Australasia, CIS, East Asia, Europe, Middle East, North Maerica, South Asia bad SouthEast Asia. Kham bun na ki nongbah kiba riewspah ki don ha US kiba don haduh saw tylli ki nongbah kata ka New York, Bay Area, Los Angeles bad Chicago. Ha China ki don ar tylli ki nongbah kata ka Beijing bad ka Shanghai.Ka London ka wan ha ka kyrdan kaba saw bad hangtei ki don 258,000 ngut ki heh saipan, bud sa ka Singapore kaba don 240,000 ki heh saipan, kham mynshuwa ka dei ka London kaba bat kum ka nongbah kaba riewspah tam hynrei mynta ka la hiar sha ka kyrdan kaba saw. Ka New York kaba don ïa ka kyrteng sin kum ka Big Apple ka kdup ïa ki 340,000 ngut ki heh saipan ne ki Millionaire, nangta 724 ngut ki Centi millionaire bad 58 ngut ki Billionaire.
title: KA NEW YORK KA NONGBAH KABA RIEWSPAH TAM HA KA PYRTHEI, KI SAH 340,000 NGUT KI HEH SAIPAN

content: Ka St. Anthony’s College ka la long ka kynhun ban iohrah ia ka nam lahduh ha ka lympung ialehkai basketball ba la pynlong da ka Seng Khasi College kum shi bynta ka jingrakhe ia ka Jubili Ksiar jong ka College kaba la sdang ha ka 17 tarik bad ia kaba la pynkut noh ha ka 19 tarik u Iaiong, 2023.Ka St. Anthony’s College ka la iohrah ia kane ka nam lahduh ha ka jingiakhun phainal pyrshah ia ka Seng Khasi College da kaba pynliem noh da 36 la 13 basket.Ki don 7 tylli ki kynhun ialehkai jong ki College kiba don hapoh ka Sor Shillong kiba la iashim bynta ha kane ka lympung ialehkai basketball kiba kynthup ia ka St Anthony’s C ollege, ka St Mary’s College, ka Lady Keane college, ka Synod College, ka St. Edmunds College, ka Shillong Commerce College bad ka Seng Khasi College.Ha ka sngi pynhap pyrda ia kane ka lympung ialehkai u Secretary jong ka Seng Khasi Kmie Mawkhar u Bah Highness Marbaniang u la long kum u Kongsan katba u Bah B.Rymnong u la long u Symbud Kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Principal ka Seng Khasi College u Bah W.B Rynjah, ki nonghikai bad ki samla pule.
title: LAHDUH KA ST. ANTHONY’S COLLEGE HA KA JINGÏALEHKAI BASKETBALL KA SENG KHASI COLLEGE

content: Ka jingioh lum pisa lyngba ka FASTag ha India ka la myntoi shisha bad tang ha ka shisngi kata ha ka 29 tarik u iaiong 2023 la ioh ban lum pisa haduh T.193.15 klur tyngka tang ha ka shisngi bad la ioh lum ia kane lyngba ki 1.16 klur ki FASTag. Naduh ba ka sorkar India ka la mynjur ha u rymphang 2021 ban pyntreikam ia ka FASTag la pynbun ia ki Toll Gate na ka 770 tylli sha ka 1228 tylli kynthup ia ki 399 tylli ki Toll Gate jong ki jylla. Haduh mynta ki la don 6.9 klur tylli ki kali kiba don FASTag bad kane ka la pynsuk shisha ia ki briew namarba ka por jong ki kam bam shuh ban ia siew bai rung bai mih ha ki jaka siew kiba la buh ha ki National Highway. Kane ka long katkum ka kyrwoh khubor na ka PIB, Shillong.
title: T.193.15 KLUR SHISNGI IOH LUM PISA NA KA FASTAG

content: Ka Joint Action Committee jong ki sengbhalang na rilum Jaintia kiba kynthup ia ka Jaintia Students Union, ka Jaintia Youth Federation bad ka East Jaintia Council ki la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Chairman jong ka Public Hearing halor ka jingthmu ban tei ia ka shlem pynmih bording Myntdu-Leshka Hydro Electric Project Stage-II khnang ba kan pynmyntoi ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u President ka JSU u Bah Jersom Jylla, u President ka JYF u Bah OL Tariang bad u President ka EJNC u Bah Sambormi Lyngdoh, ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) ka la ai jingmut ia ka Sorkar ba kano kano ka Agency bad ka Sorkar kin bujli ia ki jaka khlaw na West Khasi Hills District sha Jaintia Hills District namarba ki dang bun bylla ki jaka khlaw hapoh kine ki ar tylli ki district.Ka JAC ka la kyrpad ia ka Sorkar bad ia ka Agency ban pynrung kyrteng shwa ia ki trai jylla kiba la kham tbit kum ki nongtrei ha kino kino ki kam bad ba ka jingthmu jong kane ka projek kan long beit ban aikam aijam shwa ia ki trai ri trai muluk.Na ka bynta ki nongtrei ha ki kam kiba kham jwat (technical), ka JAC ka la kyrpad ia ka Agency ban ailad shwa da ki trai jylla bad lada ki trai jylla ki duna, ka Agency ka lah ban wanrah nabar ka jylla kiba don ia ki kot ki sla kiba biang badn ban pan jingbit na ka bynta ban aplai ia ka Labour License bad ia ka syrnot na ki bor ba dei peit.Ka projek ka dei ban pynmyntoi khamtam eh ia ki trai jylla bda ia ki paidbah jong ka West bad ka East Jaiñtia Hills District, la ong ka JAC.“Ngi kyntu ruh ia ka Sorkar bad ia ka Agency ban kynthup lang ia ka shnong Borghat hapoh ka Local Area Development namarba kan dei kawei na ki shnong ka ban shah ktah ynda la shna ia ka dam ha ki sngi ki ban sa wan,” la ai jingmut ka JAC.
title: KYRSHAN KA JAC IA KA JINGTHMU KA SORKAR JYLLA BAN TEI KA MYNTDU-LESHKA STAGE-II

content: Uwei u samla rangbah ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Jeffrey Syiemiong, uba la 27 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Mawprem, Shillong u la ryngkoh nalor ka jingkieng umtyngar shapoh wah ba jylliew jong kane ka jingkieng ha ka 10 tarik u Iaiong, 2023 ha ka por kumba hynriew duna janmiet.Kane ka jingkieng kaba don ha ka shnong umtyngar kaba long ka jaka kaba ki paidbah baleit ba wan ki ju sngewtynnat ban iengkai pyngngad hajan kane ka jingkieng.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong ki briew kiba don ha kane ka jaka ki la iathuh ba une u briew u la mih kynsan napoh ka kali Alto 800 Tourist Taxi kaba don ïa u number ML05 U 2320, kaba u shong lang bad ki arngut ki paralok jong u bad tang shu poi ha kane ka jingkieng u la ryngkoh kynsan najrong jingkieng.Ki paidbah ki la iathuh tang shu iohi ia kane ka jingjia, ki la pyrshang ban leit ai jingiarap ban khwai da u tyllai pynban une u samla u la kyntait ban khawoh ia u tyllai bad hadien kata la shu iohi ba u la ngam jyllop hakane ka wah kaba don hakhrum jong kane ka jingkieng bad jahrngai syndon khlem iohi shuh.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit kiba la ioh jingtip halor kane ki la leit sha kane ka jaka ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit bad ban pan jingiarap na ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team ban ioh sei ia une u samla na kane ka wah.Hadien ba lah poi ka kynhun search and rescue team ki lah ioh ban sei noh ia ka met une u samla ha ka por 9 duna mynta ka miet ha kaba u lah khlad noh na kane ka sla pyrthei.
title: NA JRONG JINGKIENG UMTYNGAR RYNGKOH U SAMLA

content: Ka shad suk mynsiem kaba ju pynlong shisien shi snem ha madan weiking da ka Seng Khasi Kmie, Mawkhar ka la kynjoh mynta ia ka jingdap kaba 112 snem kynthih. Kane ka shad suk mynsiem kaba lai sngi ka la poi noh sha kaba kut ha ka 10 tarik u Iaiong, 2023 ha kaba ki don haduh 1451 ngut ki nongshad shynrang bad kynthei kiba la iashim bynta ha kane ka lympung shad kaba la long ha madan Weiking, Jaiaw, Shillong. Katkum ka jingiathuh jong ki nongialam ka seng khasi Kmie, ki shynrang kiba la iashim bynta ha kane ka shad suk mynsiem ki long 723 ngut katba ki kynthei ki long 720 ngut. Nalor u Lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan uba long u kongsan, ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u Chief Executive member jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council u Bah Titostarwell Chyne, u MLA jong ka Mawlai Constituency u Bah Brightarwell Marbaniang, u Director General of Police ka Jylla u Dr. LR Bishnoi, ki ophisar ka sorkar jylla bad ki khun ki hajar kiba la wan na kylleng ki shnong jong ka bri u Hynniewtrep
title: 1451 NGUT POI KI NONGSHAD SHYNRANG BAD KYNTHEI HA KA SHAD SUK MYNSIEM

content: U Chairman jong ka Meghalaya State Planning Board uba long ruh u MLA ka Mairang Constituency, u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh hynne ka sngi u la ioh ban plie ia ka iing skul kaba thymmai  jong ka skul Tirot Sing Memorial Government Upper Primary School, Nongkhlaw ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Deputy Commissioner ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District, u Bah G. Kharmawphlang, u Syiem ka Hima Nongkhlaw, u Pa’iem P.M Syiemlieh, ka District School Education Officer ka West Khasi Hills District, ka Kong L. Syiemlieh, u Sub-Divisional School Education Officer ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District, u Bah J. Thyrniang, u Headmaster jong ka skul, u Bah W.Warjri, ki nongialam shnong, ki nonghikai, ki khynnah skul bad ki paidbah ka thain.Kane ka iing skul kaba thymmai ka kynthup ia ki 5 tylli ki kamra bad  la kyrmen ba ka jingplie ia kane ka iingskul kaba thymmai kan pynioh ia ka jaka pule bad hikai kaba kylluid bad kaba paka na ka bynta ki khynnah pule bad ki nonghikai  jong kane ka skul.Haba kren kum u kongsan ha kane ka prokram, u Chairman ka Meghalaya State Planning Board uba long ruh u MLA ka thaiñ, u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la ai khublei ia ki dkhot ka Managing Committee jong ka skul khamtam eh ia u Head Master na ka bynta ka  jingtrei shitom jongki kaba la wanrah ia u soh bathiang lyngba ka jingioh jong ka skul ia kane ka iing skul kaba thymmai bad u la ong ruh ba dang bun shuh kiwei kiwei ki ba dang dei ban leh kum shibynta ban kyntiew shuhshuh ia kane ka skul bad na ka bynta kata ka donkam ia ka jingiatreilang jong baroh ki nonghikai, ki kmie ki kpa bad ki tnat sorkar, u la ong shuhshuh.Ha ka jingkren ka jong u, u Bah Metbah u la kren ruh shaphang ka juk stad teknoloji bad u la kyntu ia ki khynnah pule ba kin shim ia kaba bha tam ba ka bor teknoloji ka don ban ai bad ruh ban husiar bad kiar raimaw raidieng  na ki jingsniew ba ka teknloji ka wanrah. U la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingkyrmen ba kane ka iingskul ia kaba la plie ha kane ka sngi kan iarap ban pynjanai shuhshuh ia ka pule dangle ha kane ka skul na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki nonghikai bad ki khynnah pule kumjuh.U Deputy Commissioner ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District, u Bah G. Kharmawphlang ha ka jingkren ka jong u kum u symbud kongsan, u la kren halor ka jingdonkam jong ki nonghikai ba kin peitthuh lypa ia ki sap bad talen ba kyrpang jong ki khynnah skul naduh ka por ba ki dang rit khnang ba kin ioh pynjanai shuhshuh iala ki sap ki phong ki jongki hadien habud la ka long ha ka pule puthi ne ki kam ialehkai  bad u la kyntu ruh iaki ba kin pynrung ha ka jingmut jong ki khynnah pule ia  ka mynsiem  iakhun jong u Tirot Sing Syiem uba long ym tang u  riewkhraw jong ka jaidbynriew hynrei wat hapoh ka Ri India hi baroh kawei.Kiwei kiwei pat kiba la kren ha kane ka sngi ki kynthup ia u Syiem ka Hima Nongkhlaw, u Pa’iem P.M Syiemlieh, i District School Education Officer ka West Khasi Hills District, i Kong L. Syiemlieh, u Sub-Divisional School Education Officer ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District, u Bah J. Thyrniang, u Headmaster jong ka skul, u Bah W.Warjri bad u Sordar jong ka shnong Nongkhlaw, u Bah K. Dkhar.
title: PLIE U BAH METBAH LYNGDOH IA KA IING SKUL BATHYMMAI JONG KA TIROT SING MEMORIAL GOVERNMENT  U.P. SCHOOL, NONGKHLAW

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha ka 19 tarik, Iaiong, 2023 u la hiar jurip ia ki madan ialehkai ha madan Polo, Shillong kiba dang don mynta hapdeng ka jingshna pynbhaTang shu poi ha Polo, u Myntri Rangbah u la leit jurip nyngkong eh ia ka madan ialehkai First Ground kaba dang maramot bad ka ban long kawei na ki madan ialehkai kaba bha ha kane ka jylla bad ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei.tHa kane ka jingjurip ba la synran lang ia u Myntri Rangbah da ki nongpyniaid jong ka Meghalaya Football Association, ki Engineer na ka State Sports Council, ki ophisar jong ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs ka Sorkar Jylla la iohi ba ka kompeni kaba shimti ban pynbha ia kane ka madan ialehkai ka dang pyntrei shaid shaid na ka bynta ban pynbit pynbiang ia kane ka madan khnang ba yn dup lah ban pynlong ia ka lympug ialehkai National Games bad kiwei kiwei de ki lympung ialehkai kiba heh ha ki snem ki ban sa wan.Hadien kane, u Myntri Rangbah u la leit jurip pat ia ka jingmaramot ia ka madan JN Complex ha kaba na ka liang jong ki bor ba dei peit jong ka kompeni kaba shimti ban shna ia kane ka madan ki la pyni ia ka jingdro bad ia ka dur ka dar ba la shna pynwan dur thymmai ha JN Complex ia ki jaka pynieng kali, ki jaka ialehkai bad kiwei kiwei de ki jingdonkam jong ki madan ialehkai ha kane ka juk kaba mynta.
title: JURIP U CONRAD SANGMA ÏA KI MADAN ÏALEHKAI BA DANG MARAMOT PYNBHA HA MADAN POLO

content: Ka jingtrei shitom jong ka sorkar jylla ban pynkylluid ia ka jingiaid jong ki kali ha Shillong ka la ioh jingiaroh na ki nongbishar ba kynthup ia u Justice Sanjib Banerjee, ba dei u Chief Justice, bad u Justice W. Diengdoh, ba dei u Nongbishar jong ka High Court ka Meghalaya. Ka iingbishar ka la ong ia kane ha ka por ba dang bishar ia ka Public Interest Litigation (PIL) jong i Bah Philip Khrawbok Shati halor ka jingkhapniah ki surok ka sor Shillong ha ka sngi palei bad ka iingbishar ka la peit ruh ia kaiphot halor kane ka jingkhapniah ba la phah da ka sorkar jylla.Ka iingbishar High Court ka la khmih bniah halor kane ka kaiphot kaba la pashat ia bun tylli ki jingai jingmut kiba kongsan, kiba long tang khyndiat por, kiba long tang shiteng por, bad kiba kham jlan halor ka jingkhapngiah ki surok iaid kali ha sor. Ka jingpyrshang jong ka sorkar jylla ban thied ia katto katne tylli ki bos ban kit ia ki khynnah skul ka la ioh jingiaroh na ka iingbishar. Haba la pyntreikam ia kane, la pyntikna ba ki kali jong ki riew shimet kim donkam shuh ban leiton lane leit shaw ia ki khynnah na ki skul. Ka iingbishar High Court ka la ithuh ia ka jingtrei shitom jong ka sorkar jylla, bad kham kyrpang eh halor ka jing kloi jong ka sorkar ban leh eiei halor kane ka kam.Ka sor Shillong ka la iakynduh jingeh ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingkhapniah ki surok kali ha Shillong, ba khamtam ha ka por long skul bad ki ophis bad ha ka por ba la wai. Kane ka jingkhapniah ka la long kaba la tip lypa namar ba man la ka sngi kumba 13 tylli ki kali thymmai bad 14 tylli ki thuk thuk thymmai ki nang mih, kat kum ka jingtip ba la ioh na ka tnad Transport ha u snem 2021. Halor kane, kumba 60% ki khynnah skul ki pyndonkam da ki kali jong ki riew shimet ban leit sha ki skul bapher bapher.Ban kham pynduna ia ka jingkhapngiah ha Shillong, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la pyllait paidbah ia ki bos banyngkong tam ha ka thain shatei lam mihngiSTEMS (Sustainable Transport and Efficient Mobility Society) haba la thied ia 30 tylli ki bos ha u bnai Kyllalyngkot, ha kaba ia kine ki bos la lah ban book lypa na ki jaka shong khamtam ia ki khynnah skul bad ki nongtrei ophis bad ruh kine ki bos ki don ia ki bor technology kum ki camera CCTV bad ka GPS-based tracking. Katkum ka jinglum jingkhein kawei ka bos ka lah ban bujil 15 tylli ki kali, kaba mut ba ha ki por ba thnem bha ka leit ka wan 30 tylli ki bos ki lah ban bujli 450 tylli ki kali. Kane kan lah ban pynduna iaka jingkhapngiah ki surok ha sor ShillongKa iingbishar High Court ka la ong “Kaei kaei kaba long ban ai jingiaroh ka dei ka jingkloi ban shim khia ia ka kam ha ka por kaba khim ban wanrah ia katto tylli ki bos na bynta ka jingleit on bad leit shaw ia ki khynnah skul bad ban pyntikna ba ki kali jong ki riew shimet kim donkam shuh ban leiton lane leit shaw ia ki khynnah skul na ki skul. Wat hapdeng  ka jingdon ki bos skul, ki kmie ki kpa ki kham sngew tieng ia ka jingshngain ki khun jong ki khamtam ki khynnah kynthei bad ki lah ban ym shahnia ia ki ban leit da ki bos ne kali kamai wat la ka long kaba shitom ia ki kmie ki kpa”.Ka sorkar jylla kala Kyntip ia ka high court ban shim ia kiwei kiwei ki lad  ban pynduna ia ka jingdheng kali, kaba kynthup ia ka jongshna ia ki surok bathymmai, ki jaka pynieng kali, ki lynti one way bad kiwei kiwei ki kyndon”.La pyllait paidbah ia ki bos ba hap iasam lang ha ki jaka sor na ka bynta ki nongleit nongwan da ka tnad Planning da ka jingthmu ban pynkylluid ia ki surok ha ki por long skul da 75% bad ban pynduna ia ka jingpynmih ia ka lyer CO2 da 72%.Haba kynthoh halor ka jingithuh ka iingbishar high court, u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K. Sangma, u la ong “Ba kum u Myntri ka tnad, nga sngewkmen ban iohi ba ka high court kala iaroh ia ka jingleh ka sorkar ban pyllait paidbah 30 tylli ki bos na ka bynta ki khynnah skul bad nongtrei ophis ha u bnai Kyllalyngkot mynta u snem. Ka jingmut ka sorkar jong ngi ban shim kabu ia ka jingiasam ia ki kali kamai ka lam sha ka jingpyntreikam ia kane ka skim ha kiba bun ki skul bad office kin iashonglang ha ki bos ba la thied da ka sorkar jylla. Ka duna bha ka jingpyndonkam ia ki bos skul, hynrei ha ka thain shatei lam mihngi, ka bos ba iasam lang jong sorkar jong ngi na ka bynta ki nongleit nongwan ha sor ka long kawei kaba nyngkong tam. Da ka jingdon ki CCTV/camera bad ki nongtrei ba la dep pynbeit, ngi khmih lynti ba kane ka rukom ym tang ba kan pynduna iaka jingdheng kali hynrei ruh yn pynthikna ia ka jingshngain jong ki khynnah kiba leit sha ki skul”.
title: AI JINGIAROH KA IINGBISHAR MEGHALAYA HIGH COURT IA KA SORKAR JYLLA HALOR KA JINGSDANG BAN PYNKYLLUID IA KA JINGIAID KALI HA SHILLONG.

content: Washington: Ki Nongïalam jong ka kynhun ki 7 tylli ki ri ba la tip kum ka “Group of Seven (G7)” ki la pynkhreh ïa ka kaiphod kaba pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia jongki halor ka jinglehdonbor jong ka China ha kaba ïadei bad ka khaïi pateng bad ka ïoh ka kot ha ka pyrthei. Kane ka long katkum ka jingïathuh jong uwei na ki dkhot ka America uba tip bha ïa ki jingïakren jong kine ki ri.Kata ka Kaiphod ïa kaba yn pyllait ha ka jingïalang ka ban sa long ha ka 19 haduh 21 tarik u Jymmang ha Hiroshima, Japan, la khmih lynti ba kan kdew lynti kumno kine ki 7 tylli ki ri ba lah kiew ha ka ïoh ka kot kin ïatrei lang ban ïaleh pyrshah bad khanglad ïa ka “jinglehdonbor ha ka khaïi pateng bad ka ïoh ka kot” da kano kano ka ri.La mang ban kynthup ha kane ka Kaiphod ïa ka “bynta ba ïadei beit thik tang bad ka China” ryngkat bad ki mat jingsngewkhia ha kaba ïadei bad “ka jinglehdonbor ha ka khaïi pateng bad ka ïoh ka kot ryngkat bad kiwei kiwei ki rukom leh rukom long jong ka China”, kane ka long katkum ka jingïathuh jong uta uta u dkhot.Kawei pat ka bynta kan kynthup ïa ka “jingkdew halor ka jingshngaiñ ha ka seispah (economic security) da kaba batai ïa ki atiar ban pyndonkam” ha kaba ïaleh pyrshah ïa ki buit sianti, kynthup ruh ïa ka jingïatreilang ki dkhot baroh. La khmih lynti ba kine ki Kaiphod kin kham pher na kiwei pat ki Kaiphod ba la pynmih da ki G7 ha ki por ba la dep.U President jong ka US u Joe Biden u la pynlong ïa ka China kum ka phangpdeng ha ka mat treikam kaba ïadei bad ki kam bar-ri, u da phikir bha ban tehlakam ïa ka jingïakob ba kan ym kylla long ka daw jong ka jingïakyn-ad, kynthup ruh ïa ka jingïadei bad ka Taiwan ka ri synshar laitluid.Ka kynhun G7, kaba kynthup ruh ïa ka Canada, France, Germany, Italy bad ka United Kingdom, ka don ka jingïadei bajan bha ha ka seispah bad ka China kaba dei ka nongshalan mar baheh tam ha ka pyrthei bad ka nongpynïaid ïew ïa ki kynhun khaïi jongki.
title: KYLLA SOHPDUNG KA CHINA HA KI 7 TYLLI KI RI

content: Ka Tnat Bar-ri jong ka China ka la pynmih ïa ka khubor ha ka 12 tarik u Jymmang, ba yn phah ïa ka Kynhun Kyrpang (special envoy) sha Ukraine bad Russia ha ka taïew ban wan kum shibynta na ka jingpyrshang jongka ban wanrah ïa ka jingïasuk ïabeit bad ban pynkut noh ïa ka thma hapdeng kine ki ar tylli ki ri.U nongaiktien jong ka Tnat Bar-ri, u Wang Wenbin u la ïathuh ba u Li Hui, uba dei u nongmihkhmat ba kyrpang jong ka China u ba khmih ïa ki kam kiba ïadei bad ki ri Europe (Eurasian affairs), u ba long teng mynshwa kum u Nongkit ‘tiensyiem (Ambassador) sha Moscow, un leit ïuh kjat ruh sha Poland, France bad Germany ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka kam.Ka China ka la ong ba ka ïengpdeng ha kaba ïadei bad ka jinghiarthma jong ka Russia ïa ka Ukraine, hynrei ka la pynbna bad kubur ba ka jingïadei hapdeng jong ka bad ka Russia kam don pud (”no limits”), ha kajuh ka por ka la kynnoh ba dei ka America (U.S.) bad ka Kynhun ki Ri Europe (NATO) kiba pynshit bad pynmih ïa kane ka jingïakyn-ad. Ka China ka la pynkhreh ïa ki kyndon soskular jingsuk na ka bynta ka Ukraine ïa kiba la kyntait mardor da ki traishnong, ki ba dawa ba ka jingïakut ban ïasuk kan wan tang lada ka Russia ka pynsangeh shisyndon ïa ki jingkyntur jongka bad kan weng noh ïa ki kynhun shipai jongka na u pud u sam jong ka Ukraine.Ha u bnai ba lah dep u Myntri Rangbahduh ka China, u Xi Jinping u la ïakren da ka phone bad u President ka Ukraine, u Volodymyr Zelenskyy, kum ka jingsdang ban ïa pynbeit da ka jingsuk.“Ka jingleit ïuhkjat jong u Nongmihkmat ka China ïa ki ri kiba don ka jingïadei bad ka jingïakyn-ad ka pyni shai kdar ba ka China ka kutjingmut ban wanrah ïa ka jingsuk bad jingkren da ka lynti ba dei,” la ong u Wang ha ka jingpyllait khubor jongu ha ka 12 tarik u Jymmang.“Ka China ka angnud ban ïada naka jingjur ka jingïakyn-ad,” laong u Wang.Ka jingleit ïuhkjat jong u Li ïa ki ri Europe kan sdang ha ka taïew ban wan tangba ym pat pyllait ïa ki jingtip ba bniah ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka kam.Mynshwa ka China ka ju kiar ban tuklar haba don kino kino ki jingïakyn-ad hapdeng ki ri ka pyrthei, hynrei mynta la ïohi ba ka pyrshang ban paw pyrthei kum kawei na ki ri Khlaiñbor hadien da ka jingtuklar jongka ban pynïasuk ïa ka Saudi Arabia bad ka Iran ha u bnai Lber ba dang shu dep, kaba la wanrah biang ïa ka jingïadei hapdeng kine ki ar tylli ki ri kaba la dkut naduh hynñiew snem kynthih. Ka China ka long paralok bha bad ka Moscow kumjuh ruh ka myntoi bha ha ka ïoh ka kot namar ka la kylla long ka nongthied ba radbah ïa ka umphniang bad ka gas hadien ba ka United States bad ki paralok jongka ki la sangeh ban thied naka Russia.Ka Beijing ka ñiew ïa ka Moscow kum ka paralok ha kaban ïengpyrshah ïa ka jingtuklar donbor jong ka U.S. ïa kiwei kiwei ki ri ha ka pyrthei. Ha kajuh ka por ruh kam treh ban pynrem ïa ka jinghiarthma jong ka Russia ïa ka Ukraine, ka da pyndonkam ïa ka iktiar jongka kum kawei na ki Ri ba long dkhot shijunom jong ka U.N. Security Council ban pynkiar na kino kino ki jingkynthoh lane jingpynshitom ïa ka Russia.U Wang u la kubur ruh ba u nongmihkhmat jong ka Communist Party, u Wang Yi bad u Nongaibuit ïada Ri jong ka U.S.(National Security Adviser), u Jake Sullivan ki la ïa kynduh ban ïakren syllok ha ka 10 bad 11 tarik u Jymmang ha Vienna, Austria. U Wang u la ong ba kine ki arliang mamla ki la ïoh “ban ïasyllok khuid mynsiem, sani bha, kiba don jingmyntoi bad ba pynkhlaiñ” ïa ka jingïadei ba neh bad ba khambha hapdeng ka China bad ka America.Ka jingïadei hapdeng ka China bad ka U.S. ka la blad bha ha u bnai Rymphang hadien baka America ka siat pynhab ïa ka Pla Lyer Khluit (balloon) ba la suba kum ka jingsyntiat tuh jong ka China da kaba her lyngba ka suiñbneng jongka Canada bad ka United States. Namar kane ka jingjia la pynsngeh ïa ka jingleit jngoh ïa ka Beijing da u U.S. Secretary of State, u Antony Blinken ïa kaba ym pat pynbeit shuh haduh mynta.
title: KA KYNHUN KYRPANG JONG KA CHINA SHA UKRAINE BAD RUSSIA

content: Shillong, Jymmang 17tarik, 2023: kum shi bynta ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot lyngba ki mat treikam ba thymmai, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma ryngkat ka Myntri ba dei peit ia ka kam rep ha ka Jylla ka Dr. M Ampareen Lyngdoh, ki la leit ban jurip ia ki jingpyntreikam ia ki projek ba pher ba pher ha ki katto katne ki jaka ha East Khasi Hills district. Ha kawei na kine ki jing leit jurip, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u la leit peit ia ka Tissue Culture Lab ha Bio-Resources Development Centre (BRDC) bad ia ka Kyrdemkhla Net house, kiba long kiba kongsan ha ka kam rep ha ka jylla.  Ha kane ka jingleit jurip ha ka Wellness & Food Testing Site hajan ka pharm BRDC, u Conrad Sangma u la iakren bad ki nongioh bhah na ka tnat tourism, bad u la shim khia ruh ia ka jingkyrpad jong ki ban kham pynbha ia ki jingshna na ka bynta ban pynkiew ia ka ioh ka kot lyngba kane ka tnat. Shuh shuh u la leit jngoh ruh ia ka jing pyntrei ia ka surok Laitkor Pomlakrai Laitlyngkot, na ka bynta ban nang pynsuk pynjan ia ki jaka lyngba ki surok.Ka BRDC’s Seed Secure Meghalaya project, ka buh ia ka thong ban pynkhlain ia ka jingpynmih ia ki symbai phan da ka ba pyndonkam ia ki lad ki lynti ki ba duna ka jingpyllut na ka bynta ban pynroi ia ka rukom thung phan ha ka thain. Kane ka kynhun ha kane ka shnat pynmih symbai ka la lah ban pynmih palat ia ka shi lak ki symbai ha ka shi snem, kaba tam bun ia kaba thmu ban pynmih. Kane ka rukom thung phan kan iarap ia ki nongrep ban lah ban pynmih kham bun ia ka jingmih ba ju ioh man ka snem.Haba jurip ia kine ki jaka thung phan u myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma u la bynrap, “nga da lyngngoh bad dap da ka jingkmen ban iohi ia ka jinglah ban pyntreikam ia kane ka projek hapoh ka Bio-Resources Development Centre, da ka jingiatreilang ki kynhun bapher, kan pynlong ia ka jylla kaba lah shisha ban kyntiew ia ka jylla ha ka kam rep.”U la pynshlur ruh ia ka jingdonkam ban wan rah ia ki buit thymmai ban iarap shuh shuh ia ki nongrep lait na ka seng kam lajong kaba hap hapoh ka projek PRIME.Da kaba shim khia ia ka jingkyrpad kiba pyntrei ia ki projek bapher ha ka liang ka kam jngoh kai pyrthei, ban pynbha ia ki jingtei bad jingshna, u Conrad K Sangma ym tang ba u la kular ban pynstet ia ka jingpyntreikam hynrei u la ai buit bad kyntu ruh ia ki ban pynmih kam na ka bynta la ki jong ki nongshong shnong ka thain ka kyntoit ba ki don, da ka ba pyntreikam ia ki kali bording ban pynshang ia ki nongleit jngohkai pyrthei bad ban die bam da ki kali ba la buh kyrpang.Ka jingpyntreikam ia ka surok Laitkor-Pomlakrai-Laitlyngkot East Khasi Hills district,  ka dei kawei na ki lad ki lynti jong ka sorkar jylla ban kyntiew ia ka thain, ha ka jingpyllut kaba 27.09 klur tyngka bad la thmu ban pyndep ha u bnai nohprah 2023 na ka bynta ka surok kaba jrong 11.52 km, la pyntreikam shaid shaid ia kane ka projek surok bad la khmih lynti ba kan pynsuk shibun ia ki nongleit nongwan bad kan pynjan sha ka NH-6 ban poi sha jylla Mizoram bad Assam, bad ka NH- 206 kaba pyniakynduh ia ka Guwahati bad Shillong. Kane ka surok kan long kaba iarap shibun ha ka ioh ka kot jong ka jylla bad kan pynduna ruh ia ka jingdheng kali kaba jur ha ki surok ha sor.
title: JURIP U MYNTRI RANGBAH KA JYLLA, U CONRAD K SANGMA ÏA KA PROKRAM BAD KI JAKA BAN HIKAI PYNMIH SYMBAI PHAN HA EAST KHASI HILLS DISTRICT

content: Ban kham pynsted shuh shuh ïa ka jingsam jingtip ïa ki khubor bapher bapher sha ki paidbah, ka Batesi TV ka la sdang ban pynmih ïa ki khubor ha ka Website jong ka. Ïa kane ka Website la pyllait paidbah ha ka 25 tarik u Jymmang, 2023 da u Managing Editor jong ka Batesi Tv u Bah Joe Thangkhiew ha ka jingïalang lyngkot kaba la long ha ophis jong ka Batesi TV kaba don ha Lachumiere, Shillong. Lyngba kane ka website ki paidbah kin ïoh kham kloi ïa ki khubor kiba jia ha kylleng ka jylla, ha kylleng ka ri bad kumjuh ruh ha kylleng ka pyrthei.
title: LA PYLLAIT PAIDBAH ÏA KA WEBSITE JONG KA BATESI TV

content: Ki pulit jong ka ANTF East Khasi Hills ki la leit ban khynra ha ka iing sah jong uwei u briew kaba don ha Upper Kench’s Trace, Laban bad ha kane ka jingleit khynra jong ki, ki la ioh kurup ïa ki drok kiba la buh ha ki khyndai tylli ki synduk sabon kiba don 110.2 kram u drok heroin, ki la ioh kurup 100 tylli ki tyndong rit kiba thylli, 5 tylli ki thyrnia injek bad kawei ka mobile phone. La rejistar Case ia kane ka jingjia katkum ka NDPS Act.
title: KEM NONGKHAÏI DROK KI PULIT NA KENCH’S TRACE, LABAN

content: U Superitendent of Police City u bah Vivek Syiem u la phah ia ka kyrwoh khubor ba ha ka 16 tarik u Jymmang ki pulit ki la ioh jingujor ba u don u briew uba kam ialade kum u ophisar jong ka tnat IB ka sorkar India uba thok pisa na ki paidbah da kaba thong ban ai kam ia ki ha Secretariat. U la bam ei ia ka pisa jong ki 38 ngut ki briew haduh 80 lak tyngka hynrei u khlem lah ban ai kam ia ki.Ka kyrwoh ka la ong ba ka don ruh ka ejahar ha Lumdiengjri Police Station pyrshah ia une u juh u briew bad ha kata ka ejahar la ong ba u la thong ban ai kam pulit ia ki samla bad ki bym pat lait ia ka Matrik ki hap ban siew shi lak tyngka bad kiba la pyndep ia ka matrik kin hap siew ha u San phew hajar tyngka. U nongujor u la pyntip ha ki pulit ba u la dep ban ai ia ka pisa 50 hajar tyngka ha u nongniah kali jong u ha Motphran.Utei u briew uba leh mynleh ialade kum u IB Ophisar u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Richard Tiplang Swer (39 snem ka rta), ki pulit ki la ioh kurup ia ka Bolero kaba don siren bad ka light VIP kane ka Bolero ka dei kaba don ia u Registeration nombar ML-05 Z 3007, ki la ioh kurup ruh ia ka laptop, ka mobile phone bad ki kot ki sla na iing sah jong u na Wahingdoh. La rejistar Case ha Mawlai Police Station bad la pynngat ha ki kyndon C/No. 45(05)2023 u/s 419/420 IPC r/w 66D IT Act and Lumdiengjri PS C/No. 71(05)2023 u/s 419/420 IPC.
title: SHAH KEM UBA THOK PISA NA KI SAMLA WAD KAM, BAM EI JAN KOT KLUR TYNGKA

content: Ka kynhun ki sim pukni kiba la wan dem la kumba ar taïew tam ha ka shnong Lad Demthring kaba don ha West Jaintia Hills District Pukni kyndit kynsan ki la hiar thma ïa ki dukan die doh kiba don harud surok bah Amlarem-Dawki namar ba la trei shaba palat ka jingtyrsaw bym ioh jingbam.Kine ki Pukni ki dei kiba la tip kum ki Himalayan vulture (Gyps himalayensis) bad kiba la ai jingiada da ki bor ba dei peit jong ka tnat Forest.Kane ka dei ruh ka sien kaba ar ba kine ki Pukni kin wan dem harud surok ha ka lad ban leit sha ka shnong Demthring, ka shnong kaba jngai tang katto katne kilometre na Jowai kaba don sha shilliang ka Wah Myntdu ka dei namar ka jingdon jong ka sem shohdoh.Ka jingdon jong kine ki Pukni ha kane ka jaka ka la khring ïa ki paidbah ban leit jngoh kai  khamtam ki nongshang suwari nabar ka Jylla kiba hiar ruh na ka kali ban leit shongdur bad ringdur bad ban bsa jingbam ruh ïa kine ki Pukni.Ha kine ki khyndiat sngi namar ka jingbiang ka bam, kine ki Pukni kim shym la tur satia sha ki dukan die doh hynrei tad ha ka 18 tarik, Iaiong, 2023 ki la tur puk ha ki dukan ban rong wat ïa ka doh ba la die ha ki dukan.Kine ki sim Pukni ki don haduh 38 tylli bad na ka liang ka tnad Forest ka la ai ka jingïada ïa ki na ki riew shim kabu bad ha kajuh ka por ka tnat Forest ka la kyntu ïa uwei pa uwei ban ai ka jingïada ïa kine ki sim namarba ki dei ki sim kiba la jan duhjait katkum International Union for Conservation of Nature, Red List Threatened Species.
title: NA DUKAN DIE DOH SNIANG TUH DOH KI PUKNI KIBA WAN DEM HA LAD DEMTHRING

content: U Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma ha ka Sngi Baar mynta ka taiew u la ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka dang bishar bniah ia ka jingtyrwa ban pynrung noh da ka Central Board of School Education Syllabus ha ki skul pule kiba don ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u la ong “ia mynta ngi dang bishar bniah ia ka jingtyrwa ban pdiang ia ka CBSE Curriculum khnang ban pynjanai ia ka pule ka puthi jong ki khynnah skul jong ngi ha kane ka jylla.”“Ym baroh hynrei tang ha ki katto katne ki bynta bad suki pa suki ngin sa nang jam shakhmat kumno ban wanrah ia ka pule ka puthi kaba bha na ka bynta ki khynnah skul,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh u la ong ba kane ka jingthmu ka long ban pynthikna ba ki khynnah skul jong kane ka jylla Meghalaya kin iaryngkat kyrdan ha ka pule ka puthi bad ki skul kiba don ha ka ri India baroh kawei.
title: DANG BISHAR KA SORKAR ÏA KA JINGTYRWA BAN PYNRUNG ÏA KA CBSE SYLLABUS HA MEGHALAYA

content: Ka shnong Mawtngam, South West Khasi Hills District ka dei kawei ka shnong ba la ju bna nam hapoh ka thain bad ha ki jingthoh kum ka shnong ba ju shong ju sah u Syiem ialeh laitluid pyrshah ia ki dohlieh kata u Sngap Sing Syiem. Kane ka shnong ka jngai kumba 20 km eiei na Mawkyrwat kaba dei ka Head Quarter jong ka District hynrei ka dei na kawei ka shnong bym pat lait kali.Dang ha kane ka snem kane ka shnong ka la ioh ia ka mang tyngka napoh ka Border Area Department ban shna ia ka surok na Nongeitser haduh Mawtngam hynrei kata ka mang tyngka ka dang lah ban pynpoi tang kumba 1200 metres eiei (1.2 km). Kumta, hadien ba la lap ba kane ka mang tyngka kan nym lah ban pynpoi surok sha kane ka shnong kumta na ka liang ka shnong Mawtngam, ka KSU South West Khasi Hills District bad ka KSU Mawkyrwat Circle lem bad ki katto katne ngut ki riew rangbah kim banse ban shim iaki sien jam ban leh hi noh da kaba ia synniang ban trei iaka surok kaba sah sa 1400 metres eiei (1.4 km)“Ngi la leh ia kane kum shibynta ban niew burom ia ka nam ka burom une u riewkhraw ka Jaitbynriew bad kum shibynta ban ia don bynta lang ban ia kit ia bah iaka khia ka shon ki paitbah nongshongshnong” – KSU.Watla lyngba ka mang tyngka ka sorkar lem bad kita ki jingsynniang na ka shnong, ki riew rangbah bad ka KSU la lah ban pom surok hynrei kam pat biang bad ka KSU ka dawa na ka sorkar ba kan siang rong bad ban mang tyngka ruh iaka surok sha Nongeitser.Ha South West Khasi Hills District ia ka 30 tarik u naiwieng la ju niew kum ka Sngap Syiem Day bad ka dei ruh ka sngi Shuti (District Holiday) hynrei haba peit ia kane ka shnong ka dang duna ha baroh ki liang bad tang ka seng kaba la leit sha kane ka shnong ban tei ia u mot sahnam jong une u Syiem la katto katne snem mynshwa.Kane ka long ruh kum ka nuksa ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban phai khmat lem sha ki thain nongkyndong bad khamtam eh sha kane ka shnong.
title: BA MANG PISA KA SORKAR TANG KUMBA 1.2 KM IA KA SHNONG U SYIEM IALEH LAITLUID KA HIMA MAHARAM, HAP TREI PYNDEP HI KA KSU, KA SHNONG BAD KI KATTO KATNE NGUT KI RANGBAH

content: Dasu (Khyber Pakhtunkhwa), Ïaïong: Uwei u nong China uba trei ha Dasu Hydropower Project ha Upper Kohistan ha Pakistan u la shah kem ha ki pulit hadien ba u la shah kynnoh ba ki nongtrei bylla kiba don ha katei ka jaka ba u kren beiñ blei. U la shah pynngat ha ki kyndon Section 295-C jong ka Pakistan Penal Code kaba dei ka kyndon ba u kren beiñ blei, la mudui pyrshah ïa u ha Komila Police Station da u Gulistan bad u Yasir kiba dei ki nongñiah kali.La pyntip sha ki pulit ba ki paidbhur ki la tur sha ka jaka sah jong ki nong China ha Barseen bad ki la don ruh ki kynhun kiba pynlong jingïakhih ha kawei na ki jaka trei jong ka Hydro Project, marsien ïoh ïa katei ka jingtip ki pulit ki la mareh wut wut sha katei ka jaka bad ki la lah ban tem ïa ka jingbitar jong ki paidbah.Hynrei la ïoh jingtip biang ba ha ka step kaba bud, bun bah ki briew ki la poi sha Komila bad ki la khang lynti ïa ka surok ban leitr sha Karakoram bad ki la pyrta pynrem ïa u nong China hynrei dei hadien ba ki pulit ki la kular ban kem ïa u, ki paidbah ki la pyllait noh ïa ka lynti. Ki nongïalam niam jong katei ka thaiñ ruh ki la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kin long jai jai
title: SHAH KEM U NONG CHINA BA KREN BEIÑ ÏA U BLEI KI MUSLIM

content: Ki nongialam ka KSU Central Executive Council hapoh ka jingialam da u President Rangbah jong ka, u Samla Lambokstarwell Marngar ha ka jingsynran lang u Samla Biangbor L.Paliar Vice-President KSU, Samla Pynshai Rani Publicity Secretary, Samla Pynkmenlang Sanmiet bad Samla Iashanborlang Mukhim ki Assistant Organising Secretary, ki la hiar sha nongbah Delhi ban pynskhem ia ki Nongkitkam ba Thymmai jong ka KSU Delhi Unit ha ka 29 tarik u Iaiong 2023 ha Meghalaya House New Delhi. Ha kaba ka Samla Marbiang Khongwir ka lah shah jied kum ka President bad u Samla Nicholas Chyrmang kum u General Secretary ryngkat lang bad kiwei kiwei ki para nongkit kam.Ha kane ka juh ka sngi ka la don ruh ka jing ia kynduh lang jong ki khun u Hynniewtrep kiba pule bad kiba trei ba ktah ha Nongbah Delhi naduh ki Longkmie ki Rangbah bad ki Samla halor ka phang pdeng “U Prew ka Imlang Sahlang ka Mationg ha ka lyngit ka por”, ha kaba la wan ban sakhi lang da u Bah Hamletson Dohling u nongialam barim ka KSU bad uba long mynta u nongaibuit jong u CM ka Jylla Meghalaya. Kane ka jingiakynduh lang ka long ruh shi bynta ban wanrah ia ka jingiaithuh, ka jingiatylli bad ka jingiajuh iajan kum ki paradoh parasnam kiba sah jngai na la ka Ri I Mei I Pa.La pyn shongshit ia kane ka jingialang da ka ka Jing Shad Tynrai bad ka Drama Lyngkot ha lor u Sier Lapalang kaba la pynbit pynbiang da ki Dkhot ka KSU Delhi.La pyn Shngaiñ bad sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi da ki Paralok Riewlum jong ka Thaiñ Lam Mihngi kiba shong ba sah ha Nongbah Delhi.
title: PYNSKHEM KA KSU CENTRAL EXECUTIVE COUNCIL IA KI NONGKITKAM THYMMAI KA KSU DELHI UNIT.

content: U khun ksiew trai jong u Mahatma Gandhi , u Arun Gandhi u la khlad noh ha ka 2 tarik u Jymmang 2023 ha Kolhapur ha Maharashtra. U Arun u la khlad noh ha ka rta kaba 89 snem namarba ka jingpang ka la ban la kham slem. Ka jinglehburom khatduh ia ka met jong u kan long ha ka Kolhapur , iathuh u khun jong u -u Tushar Gandhi. U Arun u dei u khun jong u Manilal Gandhi bad ka Sushila Mashruwala , la kha ia u ha Durban ha ka 14 tarik u iaiong , 1934. Kum u nongtrei mon sngewbha u dei uba bud ia ki dienjat jong u ‘parad jong u bad u ju pynlong bun ki jingiakhih ha ka dur jong ka Satyagraha.
title: KHLAD NOH U KHUN KSIEW TRAI JONG U MAHATMA GANDHI

content: Shillong: Mynnin ka sngi ka 30 tarik Ïaiong, ka Lum Jingthang Committee ka Seng Khasi Kmie, ka la pyndep ia ka jingpynkhuid paidbah ia u Lum Jingthang Briew, ba don ha Jaiaw.Kane ka jingpynkhuid ba shi sien shi snem la wan ban iashim bynta shitrhem naduh ki Rangbah, ki longkmie, longkpa, ki samla kynthei bad shynrang bad kumjuh ki khynnah rit, ha kaba ka jingpynkhuid ka long ia baroh ki sawdong ki sawkun bad ki kor shongthait ba la tei pynsah namda ki longiing longsem jong ki parakur parakha, kum ka dak ban kynmaw burom ia ki.U Kongsan ba la wan ban don lang ha kane ka sngi dei u MLA ka North Shillong Constituency, u Bah Adelbert Nongrum, uba ha ka jingkren ka jong u ula ong ba wat lada ka jylla ka don la ki jong ki jingngeit ka riti ka dustur, ka deiti, hynrei ka kamram hi ka long ban pynneh ban pynsah ia ka. Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba u dap da ka mynsiem kaba sngewkmen ia u Blei Nongbuh Nongthaw namar ba dei lyngba ka Seng Khasi kaba dang lah ban pynneh ban pynsah ia ki riti ki dustur bad ban pynithuh ia kane ka jaidbynriew ym tang ha kane ka ri, hynrei wat shabar jong ka ri.U Bah Adelbert u pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngew nguh ia ka Seng Khasi, kaba kam juh klet ba kan khot ne ban wer ia u ha man la ki kam kiba ka don, naduh ba u dang long kum u MDC, ha kaba ka jingkyrshan lem ka jong ki pat ka pynlong ia u ba mynta un da lah syndon ban kam ha ka jingim ban long haduh arsien lynter kum u MLA na kane ka Constituency.Ha kane ka sngi pynkhuid ia u lum jingthang, ka la don shwa ka jingialang, ha kaba la ioh ia ka jingkyntiew ia ka lama ka Seng Khasi da u Rgh. O. Pyngrope, Vice President Seng Khasi Kmie, nangta ka jingpynkup burom ia u Kongsan da kaba pynspong ia u.Hadien kane, la ioh pat ia ka nguh ka dem ka shat ka khein ka khnong ka bishar, ba la pyndep ia ka da u Chairman ka Komiti u Tymmen U San Seng Khasi Kmie u Rgh. Skor Jala, ha kaba u la sei ia ki kyntien ki nia ki jutang ban nguh ban dem ban kyrpad ban kyrpon ha U Blei Trai Kynrad ba un theh sei ia ka jingkyrkhu kaba dap miar ia baroh lang.Ha kane ka sngi ka Lum Jingthang Committee, ka la shim ruh ia ka bynta ban sam ia ki syrnot sah kynmmaw (momento) sha ki para kur parakha kiba la wan shakhmat ban iarap ban noh ia la u synniang u bynhei sha ka komiti, bad lyngba une u synniang u bynhei, la lah ban shna bad ban pynwan dur itynnad ia une u lum kyntang ba ju pyndep ia ka lehniam ba khatduh ia ki parakur parakha ynda haba ki la khlad noh na kane ka sla pyrthei.
title: LA PYNLONG IA KA JINGPYNKHUID IA U LUM JINGTHANG BRIEW HA JAIAW

content: Kan long ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ba ka rilum Garo kan pawkhmat ha ka result Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) 2023 ba la pynbna da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Katkum kane ka result, ka Sherwood Secondary SchoolT ura, ka la ioh rung ha ka kyrdan kaba nyngkong, ba lai bad ba hynriew.Ka Samridhya Das ka khynnah pule jong ka Sherwood School, Tura ka long kaba nyngkong eh ban poi ha ka kyrdan kaba nyngkong ha ka result jong ka Secondary School Leaving Certificate Top 20 ba la pynbna da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education ha ka 26 tarik, Jymmang, 2023.Kane ka khynnah skul, ka la ioh khur 527 marks bad ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Health and Physical Education bad Hindi.Ka Jyotipriya Bhattacharjee, na St. Margarets Higher Secondary School, Shillong ka la ioh ia ka kyrdan kaba ar da kaba ioh khur 570 marks bad ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Health and Physical Education bad Alternative English.Ha ka kyrdan kaba lai, lai ngut ki khynnah kiba ioh khur mar 564 marks ki kynthup ia ka Tanushree Acharjee na St. Margarets Higher Secondary School, Shillong kaba la ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Health and Physical Education bad Alternative English, u Ritam Deep Chowdhury na Sherwood School, Tura uba la ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Computer Science bad Hindi, katba ka Salrime M. Sangma na ka St. Xavier’s Secondary School Tura ka la ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Health and Physical Education bad Garo.Ha ka kyrdan kaba saw, u Ronggrik B. Sangnma na Aeroville Higher Secondary School, Tura u la ioh khur 562 marks bad ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Health and Physical Education bad Garo.Ha ka kyrdan kaba san u Kennedy Dondor Richmond Dunai na All Saints Diocesan Higher Secondary School u la ioh khur 560 marks bad ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Health and Physical Education bad Alternative English.Ha ka kyrdan ba hynriew, arngut ki khynnah ki la ioh khur mar 559 mark, ba kynthup ia ka Felisha Kurkalang na St. Dominic Savio’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong ka la ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Health and Physical Education bad Khasi, katba ka Sanskrita Karmakar na Sherwood Tura ka la ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Health and Physical Education bad Hindi.Ha ka kyrdan ba hynñiew, u Ansh Gurung na St. Anthony’s Higher Secondary School, shillong u la ioh khur 557 marks bad ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Computer Science bad Hindi.Ha ka kyrdan baphra, u Springfield Snaitang na Sib Sing Memorial Govt. Higher Secondary School, Nongstoiñ u la ioh khur 556 marks bad ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Electronics bad Khasi.Ha ka kyrdan ba khyndai, ka Sanida Emi Pakma na St. Mary’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong ka la ioh khur 555 marks bad ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Health and Physical Education bad Khasi.Ha ka kyrdan ba shiphew ki don lai ngut kiba ioh khur mar 554 marks kiba kynthup ia ka Sandra Marpna na Christian Academy, Shillong kaba la ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Health and Physical Education bad Khasi, ka Isabella Mawlong na Synod Higher Secondary School, Shillong kaba la ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Health and Physical Education bad Khasi, ka Pallavi Phenang (Private Institution) kaba la ioh distinction ha ka sobjek English, Mathematics, Science & Technology, Social Science, Health and Physical Education bad Assamese.Ha ka kyrdan ba khatwei, ki don lai ngut kiba ioh khur mar 553 marks ba kynthup ia ka Raina Pradhan na St. Margaret’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong, ka Lapynkhamti Kharkongor na Auxillium Girls Higher Secondary School, Shillong bad ka Reesa Ee Christine Suting na North Liberty Higher Secondary School, Jowai.Ha ka kyrdan ba khat-ar, ki don lai ngut kiba ioh khur mar 552 ba kynthup ia u Shourya Kumar Roy na Seven Set Higher Secondary School, Shillong, ka Nisha Kumar na St. Nanak Secondary School, Shillong, ka Amelari Kyrpang Puweiñ na Anderson Higher Secondary School, Nongstoiñ.Ha ka kyrdan ba khatlai, ka Sanikawan Challam na Q.C Springside English Secondary School, Jowai ka la ioh khur 551 marks.Ha kyrdan ba khatsaw, ki don arngut kiba ioh khur mar 550 marks ba kynthup ia ka Ladiangshisha Marweiñ na Leads Secondary School, Langkyrding, Shillong bad u Mendelson M. Langstang na North Liberty Higher Secondary School, Jowai.Ha ka kyrdan ba khatsan ki don hynriew ngut kiba ioh mar 549 marks kiba kynthup ia u Skhembait Langstang na Little Flower School, Shillong, ka Ganisha Chullet na Sacred Heart Girls’ Higher Secondary School, Shillong, u Dameiawanbha Khyriem na Christian Academy, Shillong, ka Iairi Dapynsuk Swett na St. Gabriel’s Higher Secondary School, Upper Shillon, u Mebaiaiskhem Lyngdoh Nongbri na St. Francis Secondary School, Smit, ka Hanika Barim na Myngken Christian Higher Secondary School, Bhoirymbong.Ha ka kyrdan ba khat hynriew, ka Shweta Sarma na St. Mary’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong ka la ioh khur 548 marks.Ha ka kyrdan ba khat hynñiew, ki don hynñiew ngut kiba la ioh khur mar 547 marks kiba kynthup ia ka Drishana Roy Choudhury, ka Sa I Nanghunbha Kharlukhi na Christian Academy, Shillong, ka Dakerlang Easther Wanswett Marweiñ na Synod Higher Secondary School, Shillong, u Nishan Talukdar na St. George Secondary School, Nongmensong, ka Emika S. Dkhar na Litter Star Secondary School, Lad, u Riktean M. Marak na Aeroville Higher Secondary School, Tura, u Shelim Islam na Bhaitbari Higher Secondary Shillong, Bhaitbari.Ha ka kyrdan ba khat phra ki don san ngut kiba ioh khur mar 546 marks kiba kynthup ia ka Sreyoshi Aich na St. Marys Higher Secondary School, Shillong, Sngewbhalang Jaraiñ na St. Thomas Higher Secondary School, Mairang, ka Saphirihun Lyngdoh na Alpha English Higher Secondary School, ka Joyarani Das na Jawaharlal Nehru Secondary School, Phubari, u Ragib Raonaq Abtahee na Janapriya Higher Secondary School, Bhalorbhita .Ha ka kyrdan ba khat khyndai ki don arngut kiba ioh khur mar 545 marks kiba kynthup ia ka Soma Biswas na Lady Keane Girls’ Higher Secondary School, Shillong bad ka Shraddha Thapa na Seven Set Higher Secondary School, Shillong.Ha ka kyrdan ba 20 ki don hynñiew ngut kiba la ioh mar 544 marks kiba kynthup ia u Adiel Johanan Surong na Government Boy’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong, u Vanlalrinchhani Sailo na Brookside Adventiset Higher Secondary School, Shillong, ka Yagna Lamsai na Seven Set Higher Secondary School, Shillong, ka Jessica Marweiñ na S. Ferrando Secondary School, Sawsymper, u Albin L. Marshyllong na St. Joseph Secondary School, Nongkasen, ka Dalamni Dauni Rymbai na KJP Synod Mihngi Higher Secondary School, Jowai bad ka Rilanaika Sari na North Liberty Higher Secondary School, Jowai.Ha kane ka kynti ka jingpas jong ki khynnah ka long 51.93 percent haba ianujor bad ha u snem baladep kaba long 56.96 percent.Tang 26,629 hajar ngut na ki 51,280 ngut ki khynnah na ki 656 tylli ki skul kiba la pas ia ka eksamin SSLC kaba la long ha 157 centre.Ka East Khasi Hills District ka la paw kum ka district kaba bun tam ki khynnah skul kiba pas kaba kot 73.87 percent katba ka South West Garo Hills ka la hiar haduh 26.73 percent ha ka jingdon jong ki khynnah skul kiba pas ia ka eksamin SSLC.
title: HA KA SIEN BANYNGKONG PAWKHMAT KA RILUM GARO HA KA RESULT SSLC TOP 20, 2023

content: Ka Myntri sorkar jong ka jylla ka Dr.Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la leit ban ia kynduh ia u bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit ha ka step jong ka 26 tarik u Jymmang ha ka jaka shah thngan jong u ha Parking Lot ka Additional Secretariat. Ha kane ka jingleit ia kynduh ka Ampareen ka la kyrpad ia u bah Ardent ba un sangeh noh ka jingshah thngan jong u kaba la iaid mynta la saw sngi namar ioh ka ktah ia ka koit ka khiah jong u hynrei u bah Ardent u la jubab da kaba pynsngew sha ka sorkar lyngba jong ka kong Ampareen ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynbeit thymmai noh ia ka Reservation Policy lym kumta un ym sangeh.
title: LEIT IA KYNDUH KA DR.AMPAREEN IA U BAH ARDENT, KYRPAD BAN SANGEH NOH KA JINGSHAH THNGAN

content: Ki nongialam jong ka Education Cell jong ka Khasi Students Union, Seng Kmie ha ka miet shiteng synñia sngi Thohdieng ha ka por 1:00 baje mynstep ki la leit jurip ia ka PGT College, Shillong hadien ba la ioh jingtip halor ka jingsah miet jong ki samla ha phyllaw jong kane ka College tang ban ioh ia ka Form na ka bynta ban ioh bteng ia ka jingpule Bachelor of Education.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ioh lum la iathuh ba ki samla ki la ieng lain lypa naduh dang step phyrngab hadien ba ki bor pyniaid jong kane ka College ki la pyntip ba ia ki Form yn sam tang 150 tylli ha ka 24 bad ka 25 tarik, bad sa 200 tylli ha ka 26 tarik u Jymmang, 2023.Na ka liang jong ki nongialam ka KSU ki la rai ban leit iakren bad ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdawa ban kyntiew ia ka jingdon jong ki Seat pule ha kane ka College namarba ia mynta ki Seat ki don tang 32 tylli.
title: SHITENG SYNNIA JURIP KA KSU BA SAH MIET KI SAMLA HA PGT COLLEGE, SHILLONG

content: Ka seng Hynniewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO)  ka la leit ban ujor sha Sadar Police Station ba ki don ki MLA kiba la jah rngai na la iing. Ha ka jingujor ba ka phah sha ki pulit, ka HITO ka la pyntip ba ki dkhot jong ka ki la leit wad sha iing sah jong ki MLA ha ki konstitwensi jong ki hynrei kim lap , kumta ki dkhot jong kane ka seng kiba don ha East Khasi Hills ki la leit wad sha iing sah jong ki kaba don ha Shillong hynrei kim lap.Ka HITO ka la leit sha iing sah u MLA ka Sohra u Bah Gavin Mylliem, sha iing sah u MLA ka Mawhati u Bah Charles Marngar, sha iing u MLA ka Ranikor u Bah Pius Marwein bad sha iing jong u MLA ka Mawsynram u Bah Ollan Sing Suin. Ha kane ka jingleit jong ki -ki la ioh iakynduh tang ïa u MLA ka Mawsynram katba ïa kiwei pat kim lap satia. Ki la kyrpad ïa ki pulit ba kin wad lem ïa ki khnang ba kin ioh ban ai ïa ka shithi ha kaba ïa dei bad ka Reservation Policy.
title: SHA THANAT LEIT PYNTIP KA HITO BA JAH RNGAI KI MLA NA LA IING

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union lyngba ka Education Cell CEC ka phah ïa ka jingkhublei ba kyrpang sha baroh ki samla pule kiba la ïoh ban kheit ïa u soh jong ka jingjop ha ka jingiakhun jong ki ïa ka SSLC, HSSLC Arts, Science, bad Commerce stream Examination 2023, Ka seng ka ai khublei khamtam sha kito ki samla khasi ki ba poi sha ka thup jong ka Top 10th bad Top 20th, ba ka jingtrei shitom jong phi bad ka jingioh jong phi ïa u soh uba bha ka long ka jingkmen, ka jingsarong bad ka jingkyrmen ïa ka jaitbynriew baroh kawei ha kum kine ki por ba ka jaitbynriew ka donkam ïa ki samla kiba stad ba shemphang ban ïada ïa ka jaitbynriew na ki thma ba jar jar u nongwei. Kumjuh ruh ka seng ka ai khublei kyrpang sha ki kmie ki kpa bad sha baroh ki Nonghikai kiba long ki ratbah ban kyrshan ïa ki samla pule ba kin ïoh ïa u soh jong ka jingjop.Lyngba kane ka kyrwoh ka seng ka pyntip ba kumba ka ju leh ha ki snem kiba la dep ba ka kloi ban ïarap ïa ki samla pule kiba dei ki paradoh para snam lada ki don jingeh ha kaba ïadei bad ka admission. Lada ki samla ki kynduh jingeh kin phone ha ki ne ki numbers harum:+91 84140 47191 (Pynkmenlang Sanmiet, Education Secretary CEC)+91 70050 00599 (Richest Malngiang, Asst. Education Secretary CEC)+91 93620 72048 (Shelkitbok Kharbani, Asst. Education Secretary CEC).
title: PYNTIP SHA KA KSU LADA YM IOH ADMISSION KI SAMLA KHASI

content: Ka dei ka sien banyngkong ba ka skul na ka thaiñ Sawsymper ka la lah ban pynmih ia ki khynnah skul ki ban ioh rung hapoh ka Top 20 jong ka result Secondary School Leaving Certificate ba la pynbna da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Kane ka khynnah ka dei kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Jessica Marwein kaba pule ha ka pule ha S. Ferrendo Secondary School, Sawsymper bad kaba la ioh rung ha ka kyrdan ba Top 20, kaba dei ka khun jong u Bah Arbiros Lyngdoh bad ka Kong Daiahun Marwein na ka shnong Kmawanrum.Ha kane ka sngi, na ka liang jong ka KSU Sawsymper Circle hapoh la jingialam jong u President u samla Belingstar Lyngkhoi ryngkat ka jingiadon lang jong u General Secretary ka KSU South West Khasi Hills District u samla Jiedskhem Nongsiej bad kiwei kiwei ki dkhot ka seng ki la leit jngoh ia kane ka skul ban ai khublei ia ki nonghikai bad ban ai mynsiem ruh ia kane ka khynnah kaba la kynjoh sha kane ka kyrdan watla ka la mih na ka skul ba kham kyndong.Ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka phah ia u kyrwoh ai mynsiem ia kiwei ruh ki khynnah skul jong ka đồng ka thain ba ki dei ban trei shitom namarba ym don kaei kaei ka bym lah lada ki don shisha ia ka mynsiem iakhun, ka jingminot bad ka jingtrei shitom.
title: KA SIEN BANYNGKONG IOH RUNG KA KHYNNAH SKUL KA THAIÑ SAWSYMPER HA KA TOP 20 SSLC

content: Da ki phew ngut ki riewpaidbah kiba shong basah ha Mawkynrew Constituency ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la tur sha ka iingsah jong u MLA ka Mawkynrew Constituency u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh hadien ba u President ka Voice of the People Party u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit u la shah jingit khlem pud sngi namar ka jingsngap jar jong ka sorkar Jylla halor ka jingdawa ban khot pynlong ia ka dorbar ba kyrpang jong ka Iingdorbar Thawain ban iathir sani bad ban pynbeit thymmai ia ka State Reservation Policy.Ia kane ka kynhun ki riewpaidbah la ialam da u convenor jong ka Voice of the People Party ka mawkynrew constituency u Bah Seiborlang Warbah.Namar ka jingbym iakynduh ia u MLA, u Bah Seiborlang Warbah u la shu ioh ban iakren lyngba ka Telephone da kaba kyntu ia u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh ba un kren lem halor ka jingdawa ban pynbeit thymmai ka Reservation Policy.U dkhot jong ka VPP Mawkynrew Constituency u Bah Khrawpyrkhat Mynsong, ha ka jingiakren bad u nonglum khubor jong ka Batesi TV u la ong, “kane ka long ka jingkyrpad jong nga sha baroh ki MLA Khasi,  mynta phi dang iohi tang ki jingjaw jong ki ummat, wat pynbor ba phin iohi ia ka jingjaw jong ka snam.”
title: MYNTA PHI DANG IOHI TANG KI JINGJAW UMMAT, WAT PYNBOR ÏA KA JINGJAW SNAM

content: Shillong Jymmang 26 :  U Superitendent of Police City u bah Vivek Syiem u la pyntip ba mynta ka sngi ha ka por 4 baje dang step kawei ka thuk thuk kaba la pynieng harud surok ha Jhalupara ka la kem ding bad haduh mynta ym pat lah ban tip la ka dei kaba shah thang ne ka dei ka jingjia pluh hi. Ka thuk thuk ka dei ka jong uwei na ki nongshong shnong ka Jhalupara bad u la dep ruh ban ujor ejahar halor kane ka jingjia.
title: KEM DING KA THUK THUK HA JHALUPARA, DANG TOHKIT KI PULIT

content: 1. U Shri Uttam Patra uba na NEIGRHIMS Mawdiangdiang , Shillong u la ujor sha ki pulit ba ha ka 24 tarik u Jymmang ha ka por 10 baje mynstep , ki Copper Pipes kiba shongdor T.1,60,000 tyngka ki la shah tuh na ka jaka trei jong u.2. Ka kong Angelica Lyngdoh Mawphlang ka la ujor sha ki pulit ba ha ka 20 tarik u Jymmang , ki runar ki la tuh ia ka shaka na ka kali jong ka kaba don ia u nombar ML -05Q 1016 kaba ka pynieng ha Umphyrnai , Lad Smit, Shillong.3. Ka Kong Riba Solonica Kharpran ka la ujor ejahar ha ki pulit ba ha miet 7 ne 8 tarik u Jymmang, ki runar ki la prongtuh ha ka dukan jong ka ha ka shnong Mawlali bad ki la tuh ia ki mar kiba shongdor kumba 7 lak tyngka eiei.4. U Ashok Das u la ujor sha ki pulit ba ha ka janmiet jong ka 21 tarik u Jymmang, ki runar ki la rong tuh ia ka Dumper trok jong u kaba don ia u nombar ML-05S 4141 na Bholaganj , Majai.5. U Donbok Myria u la ujor sha ki pulit ba ha ka 22 tarik u Jymmang , ki runar ki la tuh ia ki tiar kali na ka Dumper trok jong u kaba don ha ka shnong Ialong , West Jaintia hills.6. Ka Reliza Begum ka la ujor sha ki pulit ba ha ka 8 tarik u Jymmang , ki runar ki la prongtuh ha iing sah jong ka kaba don ha Newalgre ( WGH) bad ki la rong tuh ia ka sohshkor ksiar, ar tylli ki sati ksiar bad ka pisa T.7000 tyngka.
title: KI JINGSHAH TUH HA KYLLENG KA JYLLA

content: Shillong 26 Jymmang 2023: Ka State Tobacco Control Cell (STCC) jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ka la ioh jingithuh na ka World Health Organization (WHO) na ka bynta ka jinglah ban pynduna ia ka jingpyndonkam duma. Man la u snem, ka WHO ka ai jingithuh ia ki riew shimet bad ki kynhun ki ba lah ban wanrah jingkylla ha ka imlang sahlang da kaba pynduna ia ka jingpyndonkam duma. Ha une u snem ia ka khusnam WHO Director-South-East General’s Asia Region Award la ioh rah da ka State Tobacco Control Cell.Ka anti-tobacco campaign ban pyrshah ia ka jingdih duma ka la ioh shisha ia ka jingjop da ka jingïashim bynta da ki 4.9 lak ngut khynnah na ki 7,975 tylli ki skul ha ka jylla. La sakhi ia ka jingia shim bynta jong ki phew lak ngut ki khynnah pule ha ki campaign ba la dep pynlong ha ki bnai ba la dep. La lah ruh ban pynsngewthuh paidbah sha ki 3,500 tylli ki shnong ha khap sor, lyngba kine ki campaign kiba la pynlong ha kylleng. Haba khein kyllum, la sakhi ruh ia ka jingpynlong 7,388 tylli ki jingïaid paidbah ban pynsngewthuh ia ki paidbah halor ka jingma ka jingdih duma.U Myntri rangbah ka Jylla Meghalaya u Conrad K Sangma, u la ong, “Ngi dap da ka jingsarong ia ka Meghalaya’s State Tobacco Control Cell na ka bynta ka jinglah jong ki ban trei shitom haduh ban da ioh jingithuh bad ruh ia kane ka award na ka WHO. Kane ka jingioh ia kane ka award ka dei ka sakhi jong ka jingtrei shitom jong ka kynhun ban pynneh pynsah ia ki jinghikai bad ban pynsngewthuh paidbah ia ka jingkordor ka koit ka khiah. Kane ka jingioh khusnam na ka WHO kan nang pynshlur ia ngi ban kiar na ka jingpyndonkam duma, ban ioh ka lawei kaba phyrnai, kaba koit ba khiah na ka bynta ka Jylla hi baroh kawei.”
title: IOH KHUSNAM KA MEGHALAYA NA KA WHO BA LAH BA IAKHUN PYRSHAH IA U DUMA

content: U Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Titostarwell Chyne u la ïathuh ba ka Executive Committee jong ka Council kan sa phah da ka jingthoh sha ka ophis u District Transports Officer (DTO) ka East Khasi Hills District ban phah pyndam lut ïa ki Driving License jong ki nongñiah kali bar jylla kiba buh kali kamai bad ïa kiba ñiah kali kamai khlem da ïoh ïa ka Trading License bad ïa ka Labour License na ka District Council.Ka District Council ka la phah khynra naphang ha ki Pulit ka tnat Enforcement ïa ki nongñiah kali kamai bar jylla ha ki hynñiew tylli ki Zone hadien ka jingdawa jong ka East Khasi Hills Local Taxi Welfare Association na ka jingshah shoh pynmynaw jong ki arngut ki nongñiah kali kamai dang shen ha Khyndai Lad, Shillong ha ki san ngut ki bar jylla kiba la shah kem mynta ha ki Pulit ka Shillong Sadar Police Station.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Thohdieng, u CEM ka KHADC u la ïathuh, haduh mynta ka tnat Enforcement ka dang ai kaiphod tang na ki lai tylli ki Zone halor ka jingdon jong ki nongñiah kali bar jylla ki bym don ïa ka Labour Licence bad ïa ki kali kamai jong ki bar jylla ki bym don ïa ka Trading License.“Ki don hynñiew tylli ki Zone, hynrei haduh mynta ngi dang ïoh jingkheiñ tang na ki 3 tylli ki Zone,” ong u Bah Chyne.“Ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei jong ka taïew ban wan, ngan sa lum jingkheiñ katno tylli ki local taxi kiba ïaid khlem ka Trading License, ki nongñiah kali bar jylla kiba ñiah kali khlem ka Labour License, ïa baroh ki kali ba la ïoh registration number ba biang bad ngin sa thoh sha ka ophis jong ki DTO.  Kam lah ban long ban shu ïaid khlem ka laisen bad ngin sa shimkhia bha ïa kane ka kam. Ka ophis jong ki DTO ka dei ban pyndam ïa ki trai kali bad ïa ki nongñiah kali bar jylla kiba shu leh be-aiñ,” ong u Bah Chyne.“Mynta ka sngi, nga la bthah ïa ki nongtrei ban ym ai laisen ïano ïano ruh katba ngim pat pynmih ïa ka hukum,” u la ong.U CEM u la ong ba kito ki nongaikam ki dei ban da pyndap da ka Form bad ban shim ruh ïa ka jingkitkhlieh (Undertaking).  “Mynta nga la ai hukum ba dei ban shim ïa ka Residential Certificate jong ki nongñiah kali bar jylla khnang ban pynshisha ki wan nangno bad ki sah hangno,” u la bynrap.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Bah Chyne, haduh mynta ka tnat Enforcement ka dang ai jingkheiñ tang na ka thaiñ Red Cross, Laitumkhrah, Dhankheti, Malki, Barik Point, Polo, Golflink bad Nongmensong.
title: PYNDAM NOH ÏA KA LAISEN KAMAI JONG KI NONGÑIAH KALI BAR JYLLA KHLEM LAISEN: CEM KHADC

content: U Lat ka Jylla Meghalaya u Phagu Chauhan ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la mynjur ïa ka komiti kaba kynthup ïa baroh ki seng saiñpyrthei ban ïathir ïatai sani halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Reservation Roster System.Katkum ka jingpyntip ba la pynmih da ka tnat Home (Political) jong ka Sorkar Jylla, ïa kane ka komiti yn khlieh da ka Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. M. Ampareen Lyngdoh kum ka Chairperson bad ki 11 ngut ki  dkhot ki kynthup ïa u Zenith M. Sangma na ka All India Congress Committee (AITC), u Bah Himalaya M. Shangpliang na ka BJP, u Augstine Marak na ka Garo National Council (GNC), u Bah Methodius Dkhar na ka HSPDP, u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh na ka Congress, u Bah Pyndapborthiaw Saibon na ka KHNAM, u Dr. W. R. Kharlukhi na ka NPP, u Bah Renikton Tongkhar na ka UDP, u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit na ka VPP, u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah D. P. Wahlang bad u Commissioner & Secretary/Secretary jong ka tnat Personel & AR (B).Ki kyndon treikam jong kane ka komiti ka long ban shim rai ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Reservation Roster bad ban phah ïa ka kaiphod sha ka Sorkar Jylla hapoh 15 sngi naduh ka sngi ba la thaw ïa kane ka komiti.  Ka Komiti ka lah ruh ban pynrung ia kino kino ki dkhot ban ïashim bynta ha ki jingialang jong ka Komiti lada ka sngewdonkam.Ka jingthaw jong ka Sorkar ïa kane ka Komiti ka long hadien ba ki nongialam jong ka VPP bad ka KHNAM ki la phet jyndat na ka jingialang jong baroh ki Seng Saiñpyrthei ba la pynlong da ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai hadien ba ka jingïakren ka shu long beit thik tang ban pynshai halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Roster System khlem da ktah ïa ka Reservation Policy. Kum ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingkyrngah ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ïalam da ka National People’s Party (NPP) ban ïakren halor ka Reservation Policy ha kane ka jingialang, u President jong ka VPP u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit u la pynlong da ka jingshah jingit kaba khlem pud sngi naduh ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai ha Parking Lot kaba don markhap bad ka ophis Additional Secretariat, Shillong kaba la kynjoh mynta ka sngi Saitjaiñ sha ka sngi kaba san.
title: PYNBNA KA SORKAR ÏA KI 10 NGUT KI DKHOT SENG SAIÑPYRTHEI BAN ÏATAI HALOR KA RESERVATION ROSTER SYSTEM

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma u la leit ban ia shim bynta lang ha ka jingplie ia ka ïing Dorbar Bah ka Ri kaba la plie da u Myntri Rangbah Duh ka Ri u Narendra Modi ha ka 28 tarik u Jymmang, 2023.  Katei ka iing dorbar bah ba thymmai ka lah ban ngiam haduh 888 ngut ki dkhot jong ka Lok Sabha .“Kum uwei na kiba ioh ban sakhi lang ia kane ka sngi ba khraw, nga dap da ka jingkmen halor ka jinglah jong ka Ri jong ngi. U nongialam jong ngi, u PA Sangma uba dei ruh u Lamphang barim ka Lok Sabha, u la ju iohi lypa ia ka thain shatei lam mihngi ba kan don lang ryngkat ryngkat bad kiwei pat ki bynta jong ka Ri. Mynta ka sngi, nga sakhi ia ka jingplie ia kane ka projek sahnam, nga kynmaw ia ka jingiohi jngai bad ruh ia ka jingpyrshang borbah jong u. Ka jingangnud jong ka ri jong ngi ia ka synshar ba laitluid bad kaba kdup ia ka lawei kaba phyrnai ka la phalang lypa da kane ka Parliament ba thymmai. Ka dei ka jutang ia ka lynti iaid jong ka India bad ruh ka jingskhem jong ka ban ai ia ka synshar khadar kaba long salonsar ia baroh”,ong u Conrad Sangma.
title: SHIM BYNTA LANG U CONRAD K SANGMA HA KA JINGPLIE IA KA IING DORBAR BAH KA RI

content: Ka Seng Congress kaba shong ha ka Liang Pyrshah ka la buh 9 tylli ki jingkylli ïa ka jingsynshar ba la kynjoh 9 snem kynthih jong ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ïa ka ri India naduh ba ka la shimti ïa u lakam synshar ha u snem 2014.Ka Media Coordinator jong ka All India Congress Committee (AICC) ka Bobita Sharma kaba long ruh ka Vice President jong ka Assam Pradesh Congress Committee (APCC) ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha Congress Bhavan, Shillong, ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ka la pynbna sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka ri ba ki khyndai tylli ki jingkylli kiba ka Seng Congress ka la buh hakhmat ka BJP ki long, halor ka ioh kot ka kot, ka rep ka riang bad ki nongrep, ka bamsap bampong bad ka jingthungkam ïa ki briew kiba don jingiadei khlem da bishar ïa ka kyrdan pule, ka jingkyntur pud ka ri China sha u pud u sam jong ka ri India bad ka jingshong shngaiñ ka ri India, ka jingpyndonkam da ka saiñpyrthei ban pynkha ia ka jingia-isih ban ïoh jingmyntoi ha ka saiñpyrthei, ka jingsngap jar jong ka Sorkar NDA ba la ïalam da ka BJP ïa ka jingshah thombor ki kynthei, ki dalit, ki Schedule Caste, ki Schedule Tribe, ki Other Backward Classes bad ki rit paid, ka jingpyntroiñ ïa ki nongrim jong ka riti synshar jong ka ri bad ïa ki dorbar synshar paidbah ha kine ki khyndai snem, ka jingbuh da ki kyndon bapyrkhing ïa ki song jingiarap sha kiba duk bad ïa ki riewlum bad kaba khatduh eh ka Congress ka la buh jingkylli ruh halor ka jingkyntait ka sorkar ba la ïalam da u Narendra Modi ban siew bailutksan sha ki bahaing hasem jong ki 40 lak ngut ki briew kiba la duhei ïa la ka jong ka jingim na ka jingiabit ia u khniang jingpang Covid-19.
title: 9 TYLLI KI JINGKYLLI BUH KA CONGRESS ÏA KA JINGSYNSHAR BA 9 SNEM KA BJP HA RI INDIA

content: Ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewsih bad kaba la pynkyndit haduh katta katta ia kiba bun ban tip ba ia ki tiar ki tar jong ki jingdonkam kiba la mang na ka bynta ka Maternity & Child Hospital kaba don hapoh ka shnong Upper New Nongstoiñ West Khasi Hills District, la rah noh sha Civil Hospital, Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills District.Ia ka MCH Hospital ha Nongstoiñ la shna pyndep kumba 3 snem eiei ha kaba bun ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki la ap khmih lynti ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan plie noh ia kane ka Hospital hadien ba ka tnad ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la mang pisa ban thied ia ki tiar ba donkam ha kane ka Hospital ha u Naiwieng, 2022.Hynrei kaba sngewsih pat ka long ha ka 23 tarik Jymmang 2023 ar tylli ki trok ki la wan ïeng ha phyllaw jong kane ka Hospital ban kit noh ia ki tiar ki tar ai jingsumar ia kaba la lah ruh ban pyntikna ba ia kine ki tiar la rah bad pynkit noh sha ka Civil Hospital, Mawkyrwat South West Khasi Hills DistrictTang shu ioh jingtip, na ka ka liang jong ka Khasi Student Union (KSU)  West Khasi Hills District Unit ka la leit jurip marmar ia ka Hospital bad lap ba ka la don shisha ka jingpynkit noh ia ki tiar bad halor kane ka seng ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba ka dei ban wanrah thymmai noh ia ki tiar bad ban plie noh mardor ia kane ka Hospital kaba don ha Nongstoiñ.
title: SNGEWSIH KI PAIDBAH KA WKH BA SHAH KNIEH NOH KI TIAR BA LA MANG ÏA KA MCH, NONGSTOIÑ

content: U MLA jong ka Nongstoiñ Constituency  u Bah Gabriel Wahlang u la kyntu ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba ialam da ka National Peoples Party  (NPP) ba ka dei ban peit bad ban bishar bniah biang ia ka Reservation Policy, 1972 khnang ba kan ym don kano kano ka jingktah ia ka jylla lane ka ban wanrah ia ka jingsngew iapher jaidbynriew.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, u Bah Gabriel u la ong kum u nongmihkhmat ba la jied da ki paidbah ka Nongstoiñ constituency haba u kren ia kane ka mat, kam mut ba u kren tang na ka bynta ka Nongstoiñ Constituency hynrei u kren na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew baroh kawei.“Ha kine ki sngi ba nga dang don ha ka Workshop ha Mahali, Chandigarh, ngi don 27 ngut ki MLA bad ngi iohi ba ki don la ka jong ka jong ka jingsngewkhia halor kane.  Kam dei ba kim kwah ban kren hynrei ki don la ka jong ka jingsngew halor kane ka Reservation Policy,” ong u Bah Wahlang.Haba pynpaw ba ka jingkren jong u halor ka ishu jong ka Reservation Policy ka dei ka jingsngew shimet, u Bah Wahlang, u la ong, “kumba ki paidbah jong ka Nongstoiñ Constituency ki la jied ia nga, bad ha kajuh ka por haba nga kren mynta ngam shym la kren tang na ka bynta ka Nongstoiñ Constituency hynrei ka jingkren jong nga ka long na ka bynta ka jylla bad na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew baroh kawei.”U la pynpaw ruh ba ia kane ka jingkren jong u, bun ki paidbah kin sa kren, kin sa kynthoh bad kin sa kynnoh.“Ha kaba iadei bad ka Rervation Policy, la i donkam ban peit bniah, ban bishar bniah bad ban khmih bniah ba kan long kumno na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew jong ngi,”  la ong.U la iathuh ba u la pyrkhat bad puson bha shwa ban kren eiei halor ka Reservation Policy khnang ba kan ym ialam bakla hadien ba ki la don bun ngut ki briew kiba la telephone ia u halor kane ka ishu ha kine ki khyndiat sngi.“Ha ka por elekshon nga la kyrpad ia ki paidbah, to iarap lem ba ngan iadon ryngkat lang bad phi ha kiba bun ki bynta na ka bynta ka jingbha jong ka jaidbynriew jong ngi. Nga ngeit skhem ba U Blei u la don la ka jong ka bynta ban pynshai lem ia ngi ha kane ka Reservation Policy ba kin lah ban leh ia kaba bha tam ba ka jaidbynriew kan im bad kan ym don ha ka jingjynjar,” la bynrap u Bah Wahlang.Da kaba kyntu ia ki paidbah kin long kiba jaijai, u Bah Wahlang, u la ong, “ailad lem ia ngi kum ki nongmihkhmat ba ngin nang ioh ban tih bniah kham jylliew shuh shuh na ka bynta ka jingbha jong kane ka kam kaba ngi la iaid.  To ngin ia iaid ryngkat ryngkat bad ka jingngeit ha U Blei, ia kiei kiba ngi leh kin long na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew ka jong ngi.”
title: DONKAM BAN PEIT BAD BISHAR BNIAH ÏA KA RESERVATION POLICY KHNANG BAN YM DON JINGKTAH ÏA KA JYLLA : GABRIEL WAHLANG
