content: Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei ka la kyntait mardor ia ka jingkhot iakren jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba ialam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP) halor ka Reservation Roster System.Dang ha ka taiew baladep, u President ka VPP u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit u la kyntait ban pdiang ia ka jingpynrung dkhot hapoh ka komiti ba la khlieh da ka Myntri Sorkar ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ban iakren sani halor ka Reservation Roster System bad pynpaw ruh ba ka VPP ka ieng beit halor ka nongrim ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban pynbeit thymmai ia ka State Reservation Policy ym ban iakren tang halor ka Roster System.U MLA jong ka VPP u Bah Brighstarwell Marbaniang ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u la iathuh ba ka party ka la ioh pdiang ia ka shithi na ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka lah Sngi U Blei ha ka por kumba 11 baje mynstep ba la khot ia u Bah Ardent hadien ba la thung ia u kum u dkhot jong ka Komiti ban iathir iatai halor ka Reservation Roster System ba la khlieh da ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kum ka Chairperson.“Namarba ki la shu kynthup ia ka kyrteng jong u Bah Ardent ha ka Komiti na ka liang jong ka party ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynkhreh da ka shithi ban phah sha ka Sorkar ba u Bah Ardent u la kyntait war ban ia don bynta hapoh ka Komiti,” la iathuh u Bah Marbaniang.“Ka nongrim ka jong ngi, naduh banyngkong, ngi la ong ba ngim treh ban iakren bad ka Roster System ba ia kane ka Roster System la pynshong nongrim ha ka Reservation Policy kaba mynshwa kaba noh shiliang. Dei namar kata ka daw, na ka liang jong ngi, ngi ong ngim treh ban iadon bynta ha ka Komiti,” bynrap u Bah Marbaniang.Haba pynkynmaw ba ka VPP ka la pynrung ia ka Reservation Policy kum kawei na ki mat ha ka Election Manifesto jong ka party, u Bah Marbaniang u la ong, “ngi la leit sha ki paidbah bad ngi la ong, lada u paidbah u pynkup bor ia ngi, ngin peit bniah biang ia ka Reservation Policy.”“U Blei U ai ia ngi saw ngut ki MLA hynrei watla katta ruh ngin ym sngap bad ngi la pyrshang ban kren ruh wat ha Ingdorbar Thawaiñ bad kumba phi la iohi, ngim shym la iohlad. Ngi la pyrshang ban phah ia ka shithi (sha ka Sorkar) ban khot ia ka Dorbar Kyrpang ban iapyrkhat bad ban iatai halor ka Reservation Policy hynrei wat kata ruh na ka liang jong ka Sorkar ka long kuman kam leh eiei ruh em.  Dei namarkata ka daw ba ngin sa poi haduh une u pud,” la pynpaw u Bah Marbaniang.Halor ki 31 ngut ki MLA, u Bah Marbaniang u la ong, ka shong ha ki paidbah ban buh jingkylli ia ki. “Donkam ia ki paidbah ba kin buh jingkylli khamtam ia ki MLA jong ki seng saiñpyrthei kiba wat ha ka Manifesto ki la buh ia kane (Reservation Policy) hakhmat u paidbah ba ki ong ba kin peit bniah ia ka Reservation Policy hynrei haduh mynta kam pat don kiba wan shakhmat ban ong to ngin iatreilang ban pynurlong ia kane ka mat,” u la bynrap.
title: KYNTAIT KA VPP ÏA KA JINGKHROH KA SORKAR MDA BAN ÏAKREN HALOR KA RESERVATION ROSTER

content: U Dr.Andreas Dkhar u la khlad noh ha ka 27 tarik u Jymmang 2023 ha Super Care Hospital bad ia ka met kaba sah jong u la tep donburom ha ka 29 tarik u Jymmang 2023 ha Divine Savior Parish, Nongthymmai. U Dr. Andreas u la khlad katba u dang don ha ka kam jong u bad ha ka por ba u la khlad u bat kum u Additional Director Health Services in charge Civil hospital , Shillong.Ngin ia phai khyndiat shaphang ka jingiaid lynti jong u Dr.Andreas ha ka jingim jong u. La kha ia u Dr.Andreas ha ka 25 tarik u Nohprah 1965 ha ka shnong Malki. Kum u khynnah rit u la leit skul ha Little Flower ka skul kaba don ha Malki, u la pyndep ia ka PU Science na St.Anthony’s College , Shillong ha u snem 1984 bad hadien kane u la leit ban pule ia ka MBBS ha RIMS kaba don ha nongbah Imphal jong ka jylla Manipur.Hadien ba la pyndep ia ka jingpule MBBS, u Dr.Andreas u la trei nyngkong eh kum u doktor ha Nazareth Hospital, Shillong. Tang katto katne snem ba u trei ha Nazareth u la ioh ia ka kam sorkar , kum u nongtrei sorkar u la leit trei nyngkong eh ha ka shnong Sahsniang West Jaintia hills bad hadien kata sa sha Laitryngew ha ka thain Sohra.Katba u dang don ha ka kam , u la bteng ruh ia ki jingpule jong u ia ka PG Medicine bad ha katei ka por u la ioh ia ka Gold Medalist. Ter ter ha ka jingtrei jong u ia ka kam, u la kiew shaduh ka kyrdan Surgeon Superintendent jong ka Civil hospital, Shillong bad ha kajuh ka por u bat ruh kum  u Joint Director jong ka Health Services bad khatduh ha ka sngi ka jingiap u bat kum u Additional Director of Health Services. U Dr.Andreas u iehnoh shadien ia 3 ngut ki khun jong u kata i Dr.Ibanylla Mylliemngap iba dei i Dentist, i Dr. Wanbhanylla Mylliemngap MBBS bad I Iahunlang Mylliemngap iba dang don hapdeng ki jingpule jong i.Ka jingkhlad u Dr.Andreas ka long shisha ka jingduh kaba khraw ia ka jylla hi baroh kawei. Ka Myntri ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ka jylla ka Dr.Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la pynpaw ka jingsngew duhnong kaba khraw halor ka jingkhlad noh jong u Dr.Andreas. U Myntri sorkar barim uba ju peit ia ka tnat ka koit ka khiah u Bah A.L Hek u la pynkynmaw ia ki por Covid ba u ju ia trei ryngkat bad u Dr.Andreas bad u la ong ba u dei shisha u shipai uba shlur ha ka thma ba ka jylla ka iakhun pyrshah ia ka khlam Covid. Nangta ngi la ioh ruh ban ia kren bad ka Dr. Lana E Lyngdoh ka State Nodal Officer National Tobacco Control Programme East Khasi Hills, ka Dr.Ailancy Kharjana ka Joint Director of Health Services kaba dei ruh mynta ka Surgeon Superintendent jong ka Civil Hospital, Shillong.
title: LA TEP DONBUROM IA KA MET BA SAH JONG U DR. ANDREAS DKHAR

content: : Ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) jong ka 172 Battalion, Meghalaya ki la ioh ban pyllait im ia ki muid na khappud ka East Jaiñtia Hills, Meghalaya kaba don bad ka ri Bangladesh ia kiba la thmu ban khaïi beaiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh.Ki shipai BSF kiba ju pynlong ia ka jingtalasi ha Rattachera ki la pynsangeh ia kawei ka trok kaba wan na Kalain, Assam sha Umkiang.  U nongñiah jong ka trok ha ka jaka ban pynsangeh ia kali, u la ñiah stet pynban ban lait na ka jingshah bat ha ki shipai BSF.Ha ka jingkthong kaba jngai 10 kilomitar, ki shipai BSF ki la ioh bat ia kane ka trok hajan Petrol Pump, Umkiang.Ha ka jingtalasi, ki shipai BSF ki la ioh kurup 20 tylli ki muid ba la thmu ban khaïi sha ka ri Bangladesh katba u nongñiah jong ka trok u la phet krad lailum laiwah da kaba shim kabu ia ka jingdum jong ka miet.Ha kawei pat ka jingkhynra, ki shipai BSF jong ka 4Battalion ki la ioh ban kurup 17 tylli ki muid na Rongtilla ia kiba la thmu ban khaïi be-aiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh. Ia kine ki muid la aiti noh sha ki Pulit ban leh ia kaba donkam.U kyrwoh ba la phah da u PRO ka tnat shipai BSF Meghalaya u la pyntip ba ki shipai BSF, Meghalaya Frontier ki la ioh kurup haduh 1669 tylli ki masi/muid naduh u bnai Kyllalyngkot, 2023 na khappud.
title: ÏOH PYLLAIT IM KI BSF 37 TYLLI KI MUID BA THMU DIE BE-AIÑ SHA KA RI BANGLADESH

content: U MLA jong ka Nongstoiñ Constituency u Bah Gabriel Wahlang u ladep phah da ka jingthoh sha ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingthmu ban kit noh ia ki tiar napoh ka Maternity and Child Health (M&CH) Hospital Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills District sha Civil Hospital, Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills District.Kane ka jingphah jingthoh jong u MLA sha ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka long hadien ba u Mission Director jong ka National Health Mission u Ram Kumar u la phah da ka shithi sha u Medical Superintendent jong ka Nongstoiñ Maternity and Child Health, Hospital ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai ban phah pynkit lut ia baroh ki tiar ba la thied da ka National Health Mission na ka bynta ka Nongstoiñ Maternity and Child Health, Hospital sha ka Mawkyrwat Civil Hospital, South West Khasi Hills District khnang ban ioh pyntreikam pura noh ia ka Mawkyrwat Civil Hospital kaba la biang pura ia ki nongtrei ryngkat bad ka Labour Room/Operation Theater.Ha ka shithi, u Mission Director u la pyntip, ba ia ka Nongstoiñ Maternity and Child Health, Hospital yn sa ai da ki tiar kiba thymmai ha ka por kaba biang.  “Ia kane la mynjur da ka Executive Committee jong ka National Health Mission,” la pynpaw ka shithi na u Ram Kumar sha u MS ka Nongstoiñ Maternity and Child Health, Hospital.Halor kane, u Bah Gabriel, u la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba ka dei ban plie paidbah mardor ia kane ka Hospital ka ban long ka jingmyntoi na ka bynta ki paidbah jong ka West Khasi Hills District.
title: LADEP THOH U MLA SHA KA MYNTRI SORKAR BAN YM KIT ÏA KI TIAR NA MCH HOSPITAL, NONGSTOIÑ

content: Ka Garo Students’ Union ka la kynnoh ba ka jingiakhih Reservation Policy jong ka Voice of the People Party lane ka VPP ka dei tang ka kam politik. Katei ka sengbhalang na ri lum Garo ka la pynrem jur ia ka VPP da kaba kynnoh ba ka pynkylla politik ia kane ka mat hynrei kam shym la wanrah pat ia ka jingtip kaba shai bad kaba shisha sha ki paidbah. Ka kyrwoh khubor na katei ka seng ka la ong ba kane ka jingleh jong ka VPP ka lah ban pynkylla ia ka Meghalaya kum ka Manipur lane kham sniew shuh shuh ia ka Manipur ruh.Ka GSU lyngba ka kyrwoh khubor ba la soi da u Zikku Balgra N. Marak  uba dei u President ka la ong ba ka VPP kam shym la pyni sha ki paidbah ia ki jingkhein kiba biang ban pynshisha ia ka jingkam jong ka halor ka thungkam thungjam. Katei ka seng kam shym pdiang ia ka jingkynnoh ba ki Khasi ki shah lehbein bad shah leh shilliang khmat bad ka la ong ba kitei baroh ki jingkren lah ban sakhi la ki dei ne-em kiba shisha haba peit ia kiba paw tyngkrein shabar.Halor ka jingkam jong ka VPP ba ki samla Khasi ki kyrduh kam kyrduh jam, ka GSU ruh ka la ong ba ki samla Garo ki ngat ha kajuh ka apot bad ki kyrduh kam kyrduh jam bad kiba kham shem jingeh ha ka ioh kam lei ka la ong ba ki dei ki Garo. Ka GSU ka la ong ba ki Khasi lei ki long kum ki khun khatduh jong ka Meghalaya naduh ba ioh jylla lajong bad kata ka jingkynnoh jong ka VPP ba ki shah lehbein ka dei ka jingkynnoh kaba khlem nongrim.Halor kitei kiei kiei baroh , ka GSU ka la ong ba sngew donkam ban buh ia ki jingdawa jong ka hakhmat ka sorkar. Ka jingdawa kaba nyngkong ka long ba ka sorkar ka dei ban ai ka jingkhein kaba biang ba katno tylli ki kam ba ki Garo kim shym la lah ban pyndap ha kine ki 50 snem ba la leit noh, ka la dawa ba ki Garo ki dei ban ioh lut ia ki kam ba ki la duh naduh u snem 1972 haduh mynta katkum ka bhah jong ki, ka la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban sangeh lut ia baroh ki jingthung kam kat bym pat lah ban pyndap ia ki kam kiba dei ki bhah jong ki Garo.Shuh shuh ki la dawa ba lada ka sorkar ka kwah ban pynbeit thymmai ia ka Reservation Policy ka dei ban thung da u nongbishar ba la shongthait ka Supreme Court ban bishar bniah halor kane ka Reservation Policy bad ba kane ka Reservation Policy kam dei ban ktah ia kano kano ka jaitbynriew bad ba kam dei ruh ban ktah ia ka 40 la 40 kaba dei ka bhah kyrpang na ka bynta ki Khasi bad Garo.Katei ka seng ka la pynkut ia ka kyrwoh khubor da kaba ong ba lada ym pat lah ban thung kam lut ia baroh ki bhah ba ki Garo kim pat lah pyndap naduh u  snem 1972 haduh mynta ym pat dei ban ktah ia ka Reservation Policy bad lada ktah ia kane khlem pep kane ka seng kan leit sha iing bishar ban ioh ia ka bishar hok.
title: WAT PAT KTAH IA KA RESERVATION POLICY LADA PHIM PAT LAH BAN PYNDAP LUT IA BAROH KI KAM BA DEI KI BHAH JONG KI GARO (NADUH U SNEM 1972 HADUH MYNTA)

content: Ka komiti ba la khlieh da ka Myntri sorkar ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la shong ïa ka jingïalang ba nyngkong eh jong ka mynta ka sngi ka 29 tarik u Jymmang , 2023. Lait na ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) baroh ki seng saiñpyrthei ki la wan sha kane ka jingïalang kynthup ka GNC kaba la ïashim bynta da u Augustine Marak lyngba ka Video Conference.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang, ka Dr. Ampareen ka la ïathuh ba baroh ki seng saiñpyrthei kiba don ha ka jingïalang ki la mynjur da kawei ka sur ïa ka Roster System ba la pynkhreh da ka sorkar. Ka la ïathuh ba baroh ki rai bad ki jingai jingmut ba ki la pynsngew yn phah sha ka sorkar ba kan leh ïa kaba donkam.Ka Dr.Ampareen ka la pyntip ba baroh ki seng saiñpyrthei ki la hun ïa ka Roster System lait noh tang ka VPP ka bym don ha ka jingïalang. Ka la pan por na ka sorkar ba kan ailad shuwa ïa ka komiti ba kan sngap ïa ka jingpynsngew na ka liang jong ka VPP khnang ba kan long kaba mih na ka sur jong baroh.Ka la ïathuh ba kane ka komiti ka la kyrpad ruh ïa ka sorkar ba kan kynthup ïa ka Reservation Policy kum kawei na ki mat ban ïakren khnang ban ïoh ailad ïa ka VPP ruh ba kan pynsngew ïa ka sur jong ka bad ba kan pyni ïa ki mat jong ka sha ka komiti. Yn ailad biang ruh sa shisien ïa baroh ki seng saiñpyrthei ba kin pynsngew ïa ki mat jong ki halor ka Reservation Policy.Ha ka 31 tarik mynta u bnai kan don ka jingïalang ba la khot da u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ïa ki kynhun seng bhalang bapher bapher bad ha katei kajuh ka sngi ka Dr. Ampareen ka la pyntip ba kan don ruh sa kawei pat ka jingïalang jong ka komiti ha ka por 2:30 baje nohphai sngi bad sa shisien biang ka la wer ïa ka VPP ba kan wan ban ïashim bynta lang ha kane ka jingïalang khnang ba ka komiti kan ïoh ban sngap ïa ki jingpynsngew jong ka.
title: MYNJUR KI SENG SAIÑPYRTHEI ÏA KA ROSTER SYSTEM, YM TREH WAN JINGÏALANG KA VPP

content: Ha ka sngi jong ka jinglehniam khatduh ia ka met kaba sah jong u Dr.Andreas Dkhar, u Dr.Mukul Sangma ruh u la donlang. U Dr.Mukul u la ai jingkren ruh ha kane ka jinglehniam khatduh ia u Dr.Andreas, ha ka jingkren jong u, u Dr.Mukul u la iathuh ba u la ia ithuh ithaw bad u Dr.Andreas naduh ki por ba ki dang ia pule lang ha St.Anthony’s College bad nangta ki la ia pule bad sahlang ruh ha ka por ba ki pule doktor ha RIMS ha nongbah Imphal kaba don ha ka jylla Manipur.Naduh ki por ba ia dang pule bad haduh ki sngi kiba khatduh jong u Dr.Andreas, u Dr.Mukul u la ong ba ka jingialong paralok jong ki ka long kaba jan bha bad man ki por ba u sngew kwah ban tip shaphang ka koit ka khiah jong u nyngkong eh un khot beit tang ia u Dr.Andreas. U Dr,Mukul u la phla ba dei u Dr.Andreas uba pynshlur ia u ban rung sha ka kam sain hima sima. U la iathuh ba sa tang katto katne snem ba u Dr.Andreas un shongthait noh na ka kam bad kumta ka la don ruh ka jingiasyllok bad u ban phai khmat noh sha ka sain pyrthei hynrei kaba sngewsih pat ba u la khlad jyndat noh.
title: U DR.ANDREAS U DEI U PARALOK JONG NGA NADUH KI POR BA NGI DANG IA PULE LANG, ONG U DR.MUKUL

content: The Hynniewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO) from West Jaintia Hills District took out a rally to Meghalaya Secretariat on the 29th of May, 2023, seeking to meet the seven MLAs from Jaintia Hills.Around 20 to 25 HITO members were stopped by the police at the main entrance and were not allowed to enter.Speaking to the media, HITO leader from West Jaintia Hills, Wanbiang Pulang, stated that the seven MLAs from Jaintia Hills were absent from their residences in both Shillong and Jowai, thus forcing them to go and meet them at the Secretariat.Later, only two members were allowed to enter inside the Secretariat, and after a few minutes, they returned and informed that they could only meet the MLA from Raliang, Coming One Ymbon, as the others were not in the office.
title: HITO WEST JAINTIA HILLS TAKE OUT A RALLY TO SECRETARIAT.

content: Locals of West Khasi Hills were irked that the Medical Equipment meant for use at the Maternity and Child Health Hospital situated at Upper New Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills District has been diverted to Civil Hospital, Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills District.The Maternity and Child Health Hospital at Nongstoin was constructed over a period of three years and the locals were expecting the Government to inaugurate the Hospital after the Ministry of Health sanctioned the  funds for procuring the equipment for use in the Hospital in November 2022. It is however unfortunate that on the 23rd of May, 2023, two trucks arrived in the compound and removed the equipment that was there and transported it to the Civil Hospital at Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills District.As soon as the Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) West Khasi Hills District Unit, got information of the same, they rushed to the Hospital and confirmed that the equipment was indeed removed from the premises. The student body immediately demanded that the Government replaces the equipment and makes the Hospital functional at the earliest.
title: KSU WEST KHASI HILLS DEMANDS REPLACEMENT OF DIVERTED MEDICAL EQUIPMENT.

content: U Secretary jong ka tnat AH & Veterinary ha ka 30 tarik u Jymmang, 2023 u la pyntip ba katkum ka kaiphod ba la leh tes ha ka 28 tarik, Ïaïong, 2023 halor ka jingpynthikna ïa ka mih khñiang jong ka met ki masi (Lumpy Skin Disease) ha Meghalaya da ka National Institute of High Security Animal Disease (NIHSAD) Bhopal lyngba ka shithi No. F. No. 15-29/2019 NIHSAD/2, dated 12th May, 2023 bad kum shi bynta ban tehlakam ïa ka jingsaphriang jong u khñiang jingpang, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la pynbna ïa ka shnong Sumer, Mawlyngkhung, Umpyrdong-Umden, Umkon-Umden, Saiden-Nongpoh bad Jyntru-Nongpoh kiba hap hapoh ka Umsning C&RD Block ha Ri-Bhoi District bad ka shnong Rangthong kaba hap hapoh ka Mawkyrwat C&RD Block, South West Khasi Hills District kum ki shnong kiba la shah ktah u khñiang jingpang lane Lumpy Skin Disease (LSD) ha ki masi.
title: 6 TYLLI KI SHNONG HA RI-BHOI BAD KAWEI HA MAWKYRWAT KIBA DON ÏA KI JINGPANG MASI

content: Shillong, Jymmang: Ka Office jong Ka Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills District, ka  pyntip ba ka sorkar India ka ai por ïa ka sorkar Jylla ban pynbiang ryntih noh mar mar ïa ki Aadhaar jong ki longkmie kiba armet bad ki khyllung khynnah kiba dei ban ïoh ïa ka skhim jingbam ne ka “Special Nutrition Programme”. Baroh ki hap ban pynbiang ïa ki aadhar jong ki lym kumta kin duh ïa ki jingmyntoi ba ki ïoh na kane ka skhim.Ka jingdon jong ka Aadhaar Card ka long kaba donkam ruh na ka bynta ka skhim MGNREGA (skhim shispah sngi), MHIS (skhim ïarap siew bai dawai bad bai sumar), NFSA (khaw rashon) bad kumjuh ki kam kiba ïadei bad ki Bank, Scholarship (bai bam khynnah pule), NSAP (bai bam tymmen), LPG connection (ban ïoh gas ha ïing) mobile connection (ban ïoh sim card) kumta ter ter.Halor kitei ki lad jingïarap, ka Ophis jong Ka Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills District ka kyntu ïa baroh ba kin sngewbha ban leit mih sha ki jaka ba la pynbeit da ka Ophis jong ki Block Development Officer bad rah lang ïa ki kot kiba donkam kum ki Birth Certificate jong ki khun jong phi bad ka EPIC jong phi ban ïoh ban register Aadhaar.Lada ki khun ki kti jong phi kim pat don ïa ka Birth Certificate, kin sngewbha ban kit khia ban ïoh ïa ki Court Order kham kloi khnang ba ki CHC/PHC kin ïoh ban pynkhreh ïa ki Birth Certificate. La kyrpad ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong ka Distrik ba kin shim khia khnang ba ki ym duh jingmyntoi na ki skhim sorkar.
title: KI KHYNNAH RUH KI HAP DON AADHAAR BAN ÏOH ÏA KA SKHIM JINGBAM

content: Kumba 50 ngut eiei ki briew ki la kem pang kynsan ha Sohïong bad la suba ba ka jingkem pang jong ki ka dei namarba ka jingngat bih ha ka bam lane kata kaba ki ong ka Food Poisoning. Ki briew kiba kem pang ki dei kiba la bam ïa ka bam ha ka jingkhawai ïa ka jingrakhe Golden Jubilee jong ka Sohïong Presbyterian Secondary School. Kiba bun mynta ki don hapoh CHC Sohïong bad don ruh kiba leit ban shim dawai na kiwei pat ki doktor.Ban pyntikna ïa kane, ka Batesi Tv ka la ïoh ban ïakren lyngba ka telephone bad u Principal jong katei ka skul u Babu Remi Nongrang bad ha ka por ba ngi ïakren bad u, u la ïathuh ba ka don ka jingkem pang jong ki briew hynrei u dang don ha lynti ban leit sha CHC bad haduh mynta um pat lah ban batai eiei. Kiwei pat ki tyllong khubor ki la ïathuh ba u MLA ka Sohïong u bah Synsharkupar Lyngdoh Thabah ruh u la kem pang bad la pynkit ïa u sha Shillong.
title: KEM PANG KUMBA 50 NGUT HA SOHÏONG, SUBA BA DEI NA KA BAM KHAWAI

content: Da ki hajar ngut ki samla pule na ki skul bad ki kolej bapher bapher kiba don hapoh ka jylli jong ka Sor Shillong ha ka sngi baar ki la ïashim bynta ha ka jingïaid paidbah lane ka Hynñiewtrep Youths’ March ba la pynlong da ka Hynñiewtrep Youths’ Council (HYC) Central Body.Ka jinglum lang jong ka HYC ïa ki samla pule ban ïaid paidbah ha kane ka sngi ha nongbah Shillong ka long kum shi bynta ban ai jingkyrshan ïa u President jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) u Bah Ardent Miller Basaïawmoit uba dang bteng ïa ka jingshah jingit mynta la phra sngi kynthih ban pynbor ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba ïalam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ba kan bishar bniah biang ïa ka Reservation Policy.Ïa kane ka jingïaid paidbah la sdang nakhmat ka ophis treikam jong ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) Regional Office, Shillong bad ïaid ter ter na Lachaumiere, Barik Point, IGP Point bad la pynkut pat ha ka jaka shah thngan jong u Bah Ardent ha Parking Lot kaba don markhap bad ka ophis Additional Secretariat, Shillong.U General Secretary ka HYC u Bah Roy Kupar Symrem ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la kut ka jingïaid paidbah, u la ong, ka jingïaid paidbah da ki samla pule ka long ban ai mynsiem ïa u Bah Ardent bad ban pynbor ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban khmih biang ïa ka Reservation Policy kaba la pyntreikam la 51 snem mynshwa.“Ka Reservation Policy ka dei ka bih kaba ngi kum ka jaitbynriew ngi la kbum ha la ka shyntur mynta la sanphew snem kynthih ka la kylla long pynban ka jingpang kaba la bam ïa ngi napoh namar lada ngi peit ha ka lait kam lait jam ha kine ki sngi katno ngi shah leh beiñ bad kat haba lait ki kam kiwei ki jaitbynriew ki ïoh kam bun ka bhah katba ma ngi, ngi ïoh duna,” u la ong.
title: DA KI HAJAR SNOH KTI KI SAMLA HA KA HYNÑIEWTREP YOUTHS’ MARCH BAN KYRSHAN ÏA U BAH ARDENT

content: : Ka Anti Corruption League (ACL) ka la dawa na ka sorkar Meghalaya ba kan ithuh ïa ki Desi Muslim kiba shong basah ha ki them jong ka rilum Garo kum kita ki Other Backward Class (OBC) bad ki dawa ba ki dei ban ïoh ïa ka bhah kaba 4% ha ka ïoh kam ïoh jam. U General Secretary jong katei ka Seng u Kabir Mastopha u la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma ban pynsngew ïa ka jingdawa jong ki.Katei ka seng ka la pynpaw ba ka jingkyrshan ïa ka bhah ba la bynta na ka bynta ki Khasi, Jaiñtia bad Garo kumjuh ruh ïa kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew riewlum hynrei ki la ong ba ki don ruh ki don ïa ka hok ban ïoh bhah lang. U Kabir u la ong ba naduh ba ka Meghalaya ka ïoh ïa ka jylla lajong, ka jingdon ki nongshong shnong bym dei riewlum ka long 20%. U Kabir u la kam ruh ba ki Muslim kiba shong basah ha rilum Garo ki don bynta lang ha ka jingïakhun Hills State ha kito ki por.
title: DAWA SA KI DESI MUSLIM BAN ÏOH ÏA KA HOK ÏOH KAM KABA 4% KUM KI OBC

content: Ki Pulit ka Anti-Narcotic Task Force, East Khasi Hills ha ka 31 tarik u Jymmang, 2023 ki la ioh kem ia kawei ka nongkhaii drok ia kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Aiyesha Khatoon ba ju khot sin ka Pahari  na ISBT, Mawiong.Na ka met jong ka Aiyesha Khatoon ki Pulit ki la ioh ban kurup lai tylli ki synduk sabon ba la thep ia u drok Heroin uba khia 37.28 gram, kawei ka mobile phone.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh ki kyndon jong ka NDPS ha Mawlai Police Station.
title: KEM KI PULIT ÏA KA NONGKHAÏI DROK NA ISBT, MAWÏONG

content: Shillong, Jylliew, 01: Ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Palei ka la thaw da ka Expert Committee ka ban shong bishar thymmai biang halor ka Reservation Policy lane ka Bhah Thungkam Thungjam.Ia kane la pyntip da u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah Donald P. Wahlang ba la pynmih lyngba ka tnat Personel & A.R (B) ka Sorkar Jylla.Ka jingpynbna ka ong, “u Lat ka Jylla u sngewbha ban pynbna ia ka Expert Committee ka ban khmih bniah ia ka State Reservation Policy kumba la pynbna ha ka Resolution PER.222/71/138 ba la pynmih ha ka 12 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 1972.”“U lane ka Chairperson bad ki dkhot jong ka Committee kin kynthup ia ki stad ki jhad ha ka Constitutional Law, Economics, Sociology, Demographic Studies, bad kiwei kiwei ki bynta kiba iadei ia kiba yn sa pyntip da ka sorkar jylla,’ la ong ka jingpynbna.“Ka Expert Committee kan sa shong bishar biang ia ka State Reservation Policy da kaba shim ia ki jingai jingmut na baroh ki kynhun bad da kaba leit sorjamin sha baroh ki bynta jong ka jylla,” la bynrap ka jingpynbna na u Chief Secretary.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ka Sorkar ka la thaw ia ka Expert Committee shi sngi hadien ba ka Committee ba la khlieh da ka Myntri Sorkar ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kum ka Chairperson kaba kynthup ia baroh ki nongmihkhmat na ki Seng Sainpyrthei kaba la shong jingialang ha ka sngi balang ka la phah ia ka jingai jingmut sha ka Sorkar Jylla ban thaw ia ka Expert Committee ka ban shong bishar biang halor ka Reservation Policy.
title: THAW KA SORKAR JYLLA IA KA EXPERT COMMITTEE BAN KHMIH BNIAH HALOR KA RESERVATION POLICY

content: The opening ceremony of the Chief Minister’s State Level Inter-School Athletic Meet 2023 was held today at SAI, STC Shillong, NEHU Campus in which Isawanda Laloo, Director, Sports & Youth Affairs graced the event as the chief guest.A total of 818 athletes from all the districts of the State will participate in the three days event starting from 31May to 2June 2023.The chief guest encouraged the athletes to uplift the spirit of sportsmanship and she hoped that through the event the athletes can build friendships, maintain discipline, patience and the importance of endurance. “Sports are something which teaches lessons in the different aspects of life, what you learn on the track or on the field will be wonderful lessons in your life”, she said.The chief guest along with other dignitaries unfurled the flag to signal the opening of the meet.Others who were present in the programme were Working President of MSOA, John F. Kharshiing, Assistant Director Sports & Youth Affairs, P.B War Nongbri, and officials of Sports & Youth Affairs Department.
title: CHIEF MINISTER’S STATE LEVEL INTER-SCHOOL ATHLETIC MEET 2023 GOT UNDERWAY

content: Shillong, Jylliew, 01: U Superintendent of Police (F&ES), Shillong u la pyntip na ka daw ka jingjyllei shaba palat ki kam runar ruser bad ka jingshah tuh jong ki Cable ha nongbah Shillong, ka jingtreikam jong ka Landline bad ka Broadband ki la thud katkum ka jingiathuh jong ki bor ba dei peit jong ka Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) bad kan don ka jingbym treikam ia mynta shipor.Shuh shuh, la pyntip ba ia ki Landline Number ba la don lypa yn sa ai biang ynda la pynkylla sha ka FTTH (Fiber to the Home).Namarkata, na ka bynta ki jingdonkam ba kyrkieh, ki paidbah ki lah ban telephone ha ki Emergency Numbers ba thymmai, 1). Emergency Number (NERS): 112 bad 2). Tablet Number: 7640003646.
title: THUD KA LANDLINE BAD BROADBAND BA JYLLEI KA JINGSHAH TUH HA SHILLONG

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Border Dispute Redressal Forum (HBDRF) ha ka sngi Balang ka la ujor sha u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah Donald P. Wahlang halor ka jingpakhang lynti jong ki Karbi ia ki Khasi-Pnar kiba sah ha ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka thaiñ Block-I.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Chairman ka Forum u Bah Chandame Sungoh ba ki Karbi ki la pakhang ia ka surok ha ka shnong Myn-i Umpawiang, kaba hap hapoh ka thaiñ Khanduli bad ha ka thaiñ Mukroh kaba mih sha Mookoilum Tibin bad Inghinlanso.“Kane ka jingpakhang ki Karbi ia ka surok ka long ban pynsyrtok ia ki Khasi haduh ba kin pyndem hakhmat jong ki,” ong u Chairman ka Forum ha ka jingiakren bad u nongthoh khubor.“La shah tang ia ki shnong kiba hap hapoh Assam ba la sah da ki Khasi ban leit sha ki jaka iew, hynrei ki paidbah ka jylla Assam bad ki nongshong iew ha Assam kim ju thied shuh ia ki mar rep na ki Khasi.  Ki  mar rep ba ki Khasi ki ju pynmih ki long kum ki jhur, ki syiar, ki sniang, u khaw bad kiwei kiwei.  Kane ka jingkyntait jong ki briew na Assam ban thied ia ki mar rep ka la buh jingeh ia ka ioh ka kot jong ki Khasi ha kaba ki iakynduh mawsiang wat tang ban thied ia ki marbam ban pyndap ia ki jingdonkam ba manla ka sngi ia ka ing ka sem.  Nalor kata, ki Khasi ki iakynduh jingeh haba leit wad jingsumar sha Hospital kiba don ha Assam na ka daw ka jingbym iasngewthuh ha ka ktien ka thylliej,” la ong u Bah Sungoh.Ha ka dorkhas ba la phah sha u Chief Secretary ka Jylla, ka Forum ka la pyntip ia ki jingjia ha kaba ki Karbi ki la wiang ding ia ki iing trep bad hadien kata la ring video bad pynsaphriang ia ki video da kaba tei pop kylla ia ki shnong Khasi da ka jingthmu ban pynjah burom ia ki Khasi kiba sah ha Block-I.U la iathuh ba ka la don ka jingiakynduh hapdeng ki Deputy Commissioner bad Superintendent of Police jong ka West Karbi Anglong bad ka West Jaiñtia Hills District hynrei kane ka jingialang kam shym la lah satia ban weng ia ki jingeh.“Ka jingialang kaba la long ha ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai kam shym la lah ban shim ia ka rai namarba ki shnong jong ka Khanduli ki dang ap ia ka shithi na ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) ban pynpra noh ia ka khyrdop khrong khajna (Entry Tax Gate) ha Khanduli,” la iathuh u Bah Sungoh.Une u nongialam jong ka Forum u la pynpaw haba don kano kano ka sienjam ban iapynbeit ia kane ka jingiakynad kaba la neh da ki snem, ki Karbi ki ju mlien ban pynmih ia ki jingkulmar.“Ha u snem 1970-1971 bad 2002-2003 ka la don ka jingpyrshang ban iakren pynbeit noh ia ka jingiakajia pud, hynrei ki shnong Karbi ki la pynthud kat haduh ba ki nongshong shnong Khasi ki la hap ban phet sha ka shnong Barato,”la iathuh u Bah Sungoh.Ka Forum ka la kyntu ia u Chief Secretary ban tuklar mardor halor kane kam bad ban phah pynphai biang ia ka Block-I sha ka Jylla Meghalaya.
title: UJOR KA HBDRF SHA KA SORKAR BA KHANG LYNTI KI KARBI ÏA KI KHASI KIBA SAH HA BLOCK-I

content: : Ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) jong ka 4Battalion, Meghalaya  kiba ap pahara ha Border Out Post Pyrdiwah ki la ioh ban kurup ia ki jaiñ Saree kiba shongdor T.13 lak ia kiba la thmu ban shalan be-aiñ sha ka ri Baladesh lyngba ka khappud jong ka East Khasi Hills District.Ki shipai BSF ki la ioh kurup ia kine ki mar khaïi tuh katba ki snar nongkhaïi ki dang pyrshang ban jam sha shiliang jong u pud u sam ka ri Bangladesh.Ki snar nongkhaïi tang shu iohi ia ki shipai BSF ki la phet krad lailum laiwah bad iehnoh shadien ia ki mar da kaba shim kabu ia ka jingrben jong ka khlaw.Ha ka jingtalasi, ki shipai BSF ki la ioh ban kurup haduh phra song ki jaiñ na kane ka jaka.  Ia kine ki mar khaïi ruh la aiti noh sha ka tnat Custom ban leh ia kaba donkam.
title: KURUP KI BSF IA KI JAIÑ SAREE KIBA SHONGDOR 13 LAK NA KHAPPUD EAST KHASI HILLS

content: : Ka District Magistrate jong ka East Khasi Hills District, ka Kong RM Kurbah, ha ka sngi Palei ka la pynbeit thymmai da da ki Odd bad Even Number na ka bynta ki kali kamai, kata, ki STPS Bus, SSPTS-Maxi Cab bad ki local Taxi rong iong & stem) ban rung sha Khyndai Lad bad sha Motphran kiba long ki kad khaii kiba thnem bha ka leit ka wan bad thied ka pet jong ki paidbah.Ka jingpynmih ia kane ka hukum ka long namarba ka jingrung jong ki kali kamai sha kine ki ar tylli ki kad khaii ka la pynsuhsat haduh katta katta ia ki Pulit pyniaid kali bad buh jingma ruh ia ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah namar ka jingkhapngiah.Ka District Magistrate ka la pyntip ba ki kali kiba don ia u Registration Number uba kut ha  u 1,3,5,7,9 la shah ban iaid tang ha ki sngi Lah Sngi u Blei, sngi Balang, bad sngi Thohdieng, katba ki kali kiba don ia u Registration Number uba kut ha  u 0, 2,4,6,8 la shah ban iaid tang ha ki sngi Baar, sngi Palei bad sngi Saitjain. Kane ka hukum kan ym treikam satia ha ki sngi U Blei.Shuh shuh, manla kawei pa kawei ka kali ka dei ban don ia ka High Security Registration Plate (HSRP) bad ka kopi jong ka Registration Certificate dei ban pyni ha ka por ba don ka jingtalasi kali ha kano kano ka por.  Lada lap ia kino kino kiba ñiah ia ki kali da ki number plate ba la shna pynwandur katkum ka mon jong ki kin shah pynshitom katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ bad kynthup ruh ka jingpyndam noh wat ia ka laisen ñiah kali.Kane ka hukum kan kynthup ia ka jingbthah ba la pynmih da u Chief Executive Officer, Shillong Municipal Board ha kaba iadei bad ka jingiaid jong ki SSPTS-Maxi Cab katkum ka shithi No. SMB/PW/121/2013-14/230-34 ba la pynmih ha ka 30 tarik, Jymmang, 2023.Namar ka jingkyrkieh jong ka kam, kane ka hukum kan treikam noh mardor naduh ka 5 tarik Jylliew, 2023 tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.
title: DA KI ODD-EVEN NUMBER PYNBEIT KA DC ÏA KI KALI KAMAI BAN RUNG SHA KHYNDAILAD BAD MOTPHRAN

content: Ka East Khasi Hills Local Taxi Welfare Association (EKHLTWA) ka la kyntait mardor ban pdiang ïa ka hukum ba la pynmih da ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong RM Kurbah kaba la pynjari da ka hukum ïa baroh ki kali kamai ban pynïaid da ki Odd-bad ki Even Number, kiba kamai na Kashari Point ter ter sha Khyndai Lad bad haduh Motphran.Katkum ka hukum ba la pynmih da ka Deputy Commissioner ha ka sngi Palei, ki kali kamai, ki kynthup ïa ki STPS Bus, ki SSPTS-Maxi Cab bad ki local Taxi rong iong & stem kin sdang ban ïaid da ki Odd bad ki Even Number naduh ka 5 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, u Organising Secretary jong East Khasi Hills Local Taxi Welfare Association (EKHLTWA) u Bah Edison Suting ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor tang hadien khyndiat kynta ba ka DC ka la pynmih ïa ka hukum u la ong, “Kane ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar ïa ngi kiba kamai ha sor Shillong ka long kumba ngi dei ki mraw namar ba katkum ka jingpynmih ïa ka hukum ka long beit hakdak khlem kano kano ka jingpyntip bad khlem kano kano ka jingkhot ïasyllok lang ïa ngi ki nongñiah kali kamai jong ka East Khasi Hills bad ka long kaei kaei kaba ngim sngewtynnat namar ba phin ong ban khang ïa ngi ki nongñiah phi ladei ban khang shwa ïa ki nongtrei sorkar kiba ñiah kawei ka kali uwei u briew.”“Ym dei tang ma ngi kiba pyndheng kali ha surok wat ma ki (nongtrei sorkar) ruh ki pyndheng kali,” ong u Bah Suting bad kynnoh ruh ba ki kali jong ki nongtrei Sorkar ruh ki pyndheng kali ha surok namar ba ki pynieng ïa ki kali ha shilynter ka surok IGP bad ha shilynter ka surok ha Treasury, Lachaumiere.“Lada phi shu peit tang ïa ngi kiba ñiah kali kamai ngim sngew ïahap.  Ha ka jingshisha ki la dei ban khang ïa ki kali kiba wan kamai shane.  Kine ki kali kamai kiba wan nabar ki lah ban rung sha Khyndai Lad bad sha Motphran. Khang shwa ïa ki kali Assam ka Khyndai Lad kan sa kylluid,” la bynrap u Bah Suting.“Hynrei mynta la jyllei da ki kali Assam ngim ïoh kamai shuh, ka dei keiñ ba kan pyndheng kali ïa ka sor Shillong.  Jin lada ka Sorkar ka peit ïa kita, ngi kiba ñiah kali kamai ngi la lah ban kit hi ïa ki nongjngohkai pyrthei kiba wan nabar bad ka sor Shillong ruh kan kylluid,” u la ong.Haba kynthoh halor ka jingsiew khajna u Bah Suting u la ong, “ban shu khang hakdak kan pynduhnong ïa ngi katba ïa ka khajna lada slem tang shi sngi ban siew ruh ngi la shah daiñ kuna. Ka long kaei kaei ka bym sngewtynnat.”U la ïathuh ba ka Association kan sa shong da ka jingïalang ban ïa pyrkhat halor kane ka hukum ba la pynmih da ka Deputy Commisssioner ban shim ïa ka rai shwa ka hukum ba la pynmih da ka Deputy Commissioner kan treikam naduh ka 5 tarik  mynta u bnai.
title: KHANG SHWA ÏA KI KALI JONG KI NONGTREI SORKAR, UWEI U BRIEW KAWEI KA KALI

content: : Ka kynhun Pulit Anti-Narcotic Task Force jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki Pulit jong ka Lumshnong Police Station ha ka sngi Palei ki la ïoh kurup ïa u drok Heroin uba don ka jingkhia kaba 926.40 gram na kawei ka kali kaba don ïa u nombar AS-24-D-2838 kaba ka dang wan na ka thaiñ Kalain ban leit sha Guwahati, Assam.Ki Pulit kiba la pynlong da ka jingpynap shrip ha ka shnong Tongseng hajan ka HP Petrol Pump, ha surokbah National Highway-06 hadien ba ki la ioh jingtip na ki tnat syntiat ki la ioh bat ia katei ka kali ba la ñiah da u Abdul Aziz Barbhuiya , 35 snem ka rta uba sah ha ka shnong Hailakandi, Assam.Ha ka jingtalasi ïa kane ka kali ha ryngkat ka jingïadon lang jong ki nongsakhi, ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup 74 tylli ki synduk sabon ba la thep ïa u kynja powdar rong stem bad hadien ba la leh test ïa une u powdar la pynthikna ba u dei u drok Heroin.Na ka liang jong ki Pulit ki la kurup noh ïa ka kali, ïa u drok bad rah noh ïa utei u briew uba donkti sha thanat.
title: KURUP DROK KI PULIT KA EAST JAINTIA HILLS, SHAH KEM UWEI

content: Nongstoin Jylliew 02 : Ha ka 31 tarik u Jymmang 2023, ki pulit ki la ioh ia ka jingujor na kawei ka longkmie kaba shong basah ha ka shnong Umsaw – Myriaw Syiemship, West Khasi Hills District. Katei ka longkmie ka la ujor ba u khun jong ka, u la shah batbor ha uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Mebanrilang Syiem Shangoi uba dei na ka shnong Umsaw Mawlangsu. Kane ka jingshah batbor ka la jia naduh u snem 2022 hynrei ka kmie ka ioh jingtip tad haduh ka 29 tarik u Jymmang 2023 hadien ba u khun u la pyntip sha ka. Ki pulit ki la kem ia utei u briew bad mynta u don ha Shillong Jail.Hynrei katkum ki khubor kiba la ioh lum la iathuh ba hadien kane ka jingujor ejahar ki la don bun ngut kiba la wan mih shakhmat ban ujor pyrshah ia une u briew bad kumba ka long mynta ki la don haduh 20 ngut tam ki khynnah rit kiba la shah batbor ha u bad kiba bun na kiba shah batbor ki dei ki khynnah shynrang kiba hapoh ka 12 snem ka rta bad ki don ruh katto katne ngut ki kynthei.
title: SHAH BATBOR PALAT 20 NGUT KI  KHYNNAH HA U RANGBAH HA KA SHNONG UMSAW

content: Shillong, Jylliew 2 :  Hadien ba ka jingpang sniang jingpang masi ka la sar ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, U Deputy Commissioner jong kane ka District u bah T.Lyngwa u la lum jingialang ia ki seng jong ki nongdie doh masi nongdie doh sniang bad kumjuh ruh ia ki doktor mrad jong ka tnat Animal Husbandry and  Vetrinary ban ia kren halor kane ka mat.Hadien ba la iatai sani bha u DC u la bthah ia ki nongdie doh ba ki dei ban ot doh tang ia ki sniang lane ki masi ki bym don jingpang bad kan ym ktah satia ia ki paidbah lada bam ia ka doh jong ki masi ne ki sniang ki bym don jingpang. U la bthah ruh ia ki nongdie doh ba kin long kiba leh khuid bad kim dei shuh ban wah pathar ia ka doh hakhmat dukan jong ki namarba ka isait met ban peit.
title: KA JINGPANG KI MASI KI SNIANG KAM DON JINGKTAH IA KA DOH

content: Tura, Jylliew 03 2023  U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K Sangma hynne ka sngi u la shong ia ka jingialang bad ki 18 tylli ki sengbhalang nalor ki riew paidbah ha ka jingialang kaba la pynlong ha Tura, West Garo Hills.Ka jingthmu jong katei ka jingialang ka long ban pynshai bad ioh jingshai shuh shuh haba iadei bad ka Reservation Roster.Ha katei ka jingialang la wan ban donlang ruh naduh u Symbud Myntri Rangbah Bah Prestone Tynsong, nangta ka Myntri Sorkar, Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, Chief Secretary Bah DP Wahlang bad ruh u Bah HM Shangpliang MLA barim  bad kiwei kiwei nalor ki kynhun bad ki seng ba paw na rilum Garo kynthup naduh u Augustine Marak na ka GNC bad kiwei kiwei.Ki nongwan shim bynta ha katei ka jingialang ki ioh ruh ban pan jingshai shuh shuh haba iadei bad ka Reservation Roster bad ruh ban pyntikna ia baroh ki nongshim bynta ba kin sngewthuh shai ia ka bad ka jingmut jong ka.Hadien ka jingialang u Myntri Rangbah haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, Ha ka jingialang mynta ka sngi nalor ki Myntri Sorkar bad ruh u Chief Secretary bad ki ophisar ki la don kumba 18 tylli ki seng bad ki kynhun bapher bapher kiba la khot ban shim bynta ha kane ka jingialang. Ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingialang ka long ban pynsngewthuh bad pynshai kdar halor ka Roster System bad kumno ka treikam. Kumta hadien ba ki la iohi ia ka presentation, ki la mih bun ki jingkylli bad bun na ki la dep ban pynshai bad jubab bad bun ki dkhot ki la hun bad pdiang ia ka.  Kumta, ngin sa shong biang ha ka kynhun Myntri ban pyniaid ia ka kam shakhmat haba iadei bad ka Roster.
title: SHONG JINGIALANG U MYNTRI RANGBAH BAD KI SENGBHALANG GARO HA TURA

content: Ka  Estimate Committee, Meghalaya Legislative Assembly, hapoh ka jingialam jong u MLA ka Nongpoh u Bah Mayralborn Syiem kum u Chairman, ha ryngkat ka jingiadonlang ki dkhot jong kane ka Estimate Committee kata u Bah bah  Charles Marngar, u Remingtone G Momin,  Limison Sangma, ka Mianmi D Shira ryngkat ki nongtrei jong ka Assembly, ki la leit jngoh ia kawei na ki skul sorkar kata ka Rajkiya Pratibha Vikas Vidyalaya, kaba don ha Nai Basti, Kishan Ganj, New Delhi, ka jingleit jngoh  ia kane ka skul ka long ban sakhi da la ki jong ki khmat ia ka rukom pyniaid ia ki skul sorkar ha kane ka Nongbah.Katei ka komiti ka la lap ba ki skul sorkar ha Delhi ki long kiba la bit la biang bha , ki don naduh ki Digital Classroom, ki CCTV , ki Laptop, ki Library bad ki don ruh ki  School Health Clinic, ki don  haduh 20 tylli  ki School Clinic haduh mynta. Kawei ka clinic ka don iwei i ANM, iwei  Psychologist, iwei i MTW, bad uwei u Doctor, na bynta 5 tylli ki School Clinic.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, kane ka Committee ka la ioh ban leit jngoh ruh ia ka Mohalla Clinic. Ka Sorkar Delhi ka la dep ban buh haduh 521 tylli ki Mohalla Clinic. Kine ki Clinic pat ki dei na ka bynta ki paitbah nongshong shnong bad ki long ïing kiba duk, khlem siew dor eiei. Ha kine ki clinic ki ai ei ia ki dawai, ki blood test, ultra sound, ex-ray bad kiwei kiwei, bad na ka bynta ki jingshitom kiba kham eh, ki Doctor na kine ki Mohalla Clinic ki phah ia ki sha ki Hospital. Ha kine ki clinic ki don ki Doctor, ki Nurse, bad ki Pharmacist.
title: LEIT JNGOH KI DKHOT KA ESTIMATE KOMITI IA KI SKUL SORKAR HA DELHI

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union, Laban Circle  ka la leit ujor bad pynkynmaw sa shisien biang halor ka jingsahteng ban weng ia ki bar jylla ba ri masi be-aiñ ha Maxwelton Estate bad ha Lower Lumparing. Ka KSU ka la pynpaw ia ka jingbitar halor ka jingslem ki bor pyniaid ban weng ia kine ki bar jylla.Kine ki bar jylla kiba ri masi ha kine ki jaka kim shym don ia kino kino ki kot ki sla kiba biang bad ha kajuh ka por kine ki jaka ki hap hapoh ka Municipal area bad ym lah ban ri kino kino ki jingri. Ka jingdon jong kine ki bar jylla ha kine ki jaka ka pynjaboh ia ka mariang namar ki pyntuid ia ka jaboh sha ki nala bad sha ka wah. Bad ka jingsma kaba mih na kane ka jaka ka don jingma ia ka koit ka khiah jong ki paidbah, ong ka kyrwoh na ka KSU.Shuh shuh ka KSU ka la ong ba lada ki bor pyniaid ki dang pynslem ban kyndang ia ki, kan sa shim hi la ki jong ki sienjam ban weng ia kitei ki bar jylla. Ka kyrwoh ka la ong ba ka KSU kam kwah ba ka Maxwelton Estate ruh kan long kum ka Them Metor namar ba katba nangiaid ki sngi ki nangbun ki bar jylla kiba wan buhai shnong be-ain. Ka KSU ka la pyntip ruh ba ka Shillong Municipal Board ka la jubab ba ka la dep ban leit peit ia katei ka jaka bad shen kin sa pynmih ia ka hukum ban weng noh ia ki briew kiba ri masi be-ain ha ki jaka jong ka.
title: PYNKYNMAW BIANG KA KSU IA KA MUNICIPAL BAN WENG IA KI BRIEW KIBA RI MASI BE-AIN HA MAXWELTON ESTATE

content: Ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) ha ka sngi Balang ka la pyntip ha Ïingbishar Meghalaya High Court ba ka la pdiang ïa ka Blue Print ba la tyrwa da ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynkynriah ïa ki 342 tylli ki longïing jong ki Harijan kiba buhai shnong ha Them Ïew Mawlong sha ka jaka ba ju don ka ophis jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB), Bivar Road.Ha ka hukum ba la pynmih ki arngut ki nongbishar, kata, u Chief Justice ka Meghalaya High Court u Justice Sanjib Banerjee bad u Justice W. Diengdoh ka la ong, “na ka liang u Learned Advocate-General u la pyntip ba u la ïoh ïa ka kaiphot na u Nongïasaid aiñ jong ka Harijan Panchayat Committee ba ka la mynjur halor ki nongrim ïa ka Blue Print ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka ladep pynkhreh bad la pyntip ruh ba ki don katto katne ki jingpynkylla thymmai katkum ka jingai jingmut ha ki katto katne ki bynta.”“Namarba ka Sorkar Jylla ka dang peit sani ïa ki jingai jingmut ban pynkylla, kane ka jingshim bishar kan bteng biang hadien lai taïew bad kyrmen ba kane ka mat kaba la sahteng la slem bha yn sa lah ban pynkut noh,” ong ka hukum.Ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court ka la pyntip ba kan sa shong bishar biang ia kane ka mukotduma ha ka 3 tarik, Naitung 2023.U Secretary jong ka Harijan Panchayat Committee u Gurjeet Singh ha ka jingiakren bad ka Batesi Tv u  la pynpaw ba um pat lah ban iathuh kiei ki jingpynkylla ha ka Blue Print hynrei u la pyntip ba un sa ai jingtip tad ynda u Muktiar jong u, u la wan phai na Delhi.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ka Harijan Panchayat Committee ka la kyntait ïa ka Blue Print ba la wanrah da ka Sorkar Jylla hynrei ka la pan pynban da ka jaka kaba mar 200 square meter sha kawei pa kawei ka longïing jong ki 342 tylli ki rympei Ïing hapoh ka European Ward nalor kaba pynlut ruh ia ka bai shna ïing.Ha ka 31 tarik Nailar, 2022, ka Sorkar ka la pyntip ïa ka rai ban shna ïa ki ïing bun mala ha ka jaka kaba 2.5 acre, kaba dei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) na ka bynta ban pynkynriah ïa kine ki 342 tylli ki longïing na Them Iew Mawlong.Ha ka jubab ba hynriew sla ba la phah sha u Deputy Secretary jong ka Sorkar Jylla bad sha kiwei kiwei ki Tnad Sorkar, ka HPC ka la kynnoh ba ka jingtyrwa jong ka Sorkar ka dei ka bym pat biang pura bad ka bym ïahap satia.
title: PDIANG KA HARIJAN PANCHAYAT COMMITTEE IA KA BLUE PRINT BAN PYNKYNRIAH IA KI HARIJAN NA THEM IEW MAWLONG

content: Ka Estimate Committee jong ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly hapoh ka jingialam jong u Bah Mayralborn Syiem kum u Chairman ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong ki dkhot ka Committee kiba kynthup ia u Bah Charles Marngar, u Remington G. Momin, u Bah Limison Sangma, u Bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, ka Mianmi D. Shira, u Bah Wailadmiki Shylla, u Bah Damanbait Lamare ki la leit ban iakynduh ia ka Estimate Committee jong ka West Bengal Legislative Assembly hapoh ka jingialam u Dr.Supidto Roy kum u Chairman.Ha kane ka jingialang la iakren halor ka rukom treikam jong ka West Bengal Assembly bad la ioh ia ka kaiphod lyngkot na u Chairman jong ka Estimate Committee, West Bengal, uba la iathuh shaphang ki Medical College, ki Fly Over Bridge, ka Education System, Health Sector bad kiwei kiwei.U Chairman jong ka Estimate Committee ka Meghalaya Legislative Asssembly u Bah Mayralborn Syiem u la ai ruh ia ka kaiphod na ka jylla Meghalaya.Ka jingialang ka la long kaba seisoh bad ioh jingmyntoi shibun ha kaba lah iatai bad iashim bynta da baroh ki dkhot jong kine ki ar tylli ki Komiti na ka jylla Meghalaya bad na ka jyllla West Bengal.Na kane jingiakynduh lang bad ki jingleit jngoh jong ka Estimate Committee, na Delhi Assembly bad na West Bengal ruh kin sa phah ia ki kaiphod sha ka Sorkar bad kumjuh ruh ia ki jingai jingmut.Ha kane ka sngi kane ka Committee ka la iohlad ruh ban iakynduh ia u Lamphang jong ka West Bengal uba la pdiang burom ia baroh ki dkhot.Na ka liang u Chairman jong ka Estimate Committee, Meghalaya, u la ai ia ki kyntien ai khublei bad kyrkhu kyrdoh ia u Lamphang jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla West Bengal.
title: IAKYNDUH KI ESTIMATE COMMITTEE JONG KA ÏINGDORBAR THAWAIÑ KA MEGHALAYA BAD WEST BENGAL

content: Nongstoiñ, 7 Jylliew: Kum shi bynta ban iada ia ki khynnah skul bad ban lait na ka jingshah ktah ha ka jingshit kyrang ka sngi na ka liang jong ka Khasi Students’ Union, West Khasi Hills District ka la phah da ka dorkhas sha ka Sub- Divisional School Education Officer (SDSEO) Nongstoin ban phah sangeh ieng lain shwa shipor ia ki khynnah skul ha baroh ki skul.Na ka liang u President ka Seng u Bah Johnfisher Nongsiang, u la ong ba ka Seng kala ioh shibun ki jingujor na ki kmie ki kpa kiba sngew khuslai na ka bynta la ki jong ki khun namar ka jinglong shit kyrang palat jong ka suiñ bneng kaba la lam ruh sha ka jingioh pang ki khynnah.U la iathuh ruh ba ha kine ki sngi ki la don ruh ki khynnah skul kiba la kyllon katba dang ieng Assembly bad ki don ruh kiba la iohpang namar ka jingshit palat jong ka suin bneng.Namarkata, na ka liang jong ka seng ka kyntu jur ia ka SDSEO ba kan sngewbha ban shimkhia ban phah sangeh shwa ia ka jingieng Assembly ha ki skul namar kane ka lah ban ktah ia ka koit ka khiah jong ki khynnah skul.
title: THOH KA KSU SHA KA SDSEO BAN PHAH SANGEH IENG LAIN SHIPOR IA KI KHYNNAH SKUL BA SHIT KYRANG KA BNENG

content: Shillong, Jylliew, 08: Ki rang bad ki thei iakhun kti jong ka Meghalaya Arm Wrestling Association (MAWA) ki la ioh khur ia ki takma ksiar, rupa bad rnong ha ki ar tylli ki rynsan iakhun ha ka National Level Kata kaba la long ha Jammu & kashmir kaba la sdang naduh ka 22 tarik haduh 26 tarik Jymmang, 2023 bad ha Mathura, Uttar Pradesh kaba la long naduh ka 1 tarik haduh ka 4 tarik Jylliew, 2023.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da ka Publicity Secretary ka MAWA ka Kong Sumita Kshiar ka la pyntip ba ki nongjop kiba la iashim ha ka rynsan iakhun kti kaba la long ha Jammu & kashmir ki long u Alan Sun Marbaniang (Senior Category) 90 kilo uba la ioh khur ia ka takma Rupa (Left and Right), u Alexshon Roy M.Umlong (Master Category) 75 kilo uba la ioh khur takma ksiar (left and Right), u Everson Thangkhiew ha ka (Grand Master Category) 80 kilo uba la ioh khur ia ka takma ksiar (Left and Right), u Jackson Lyngdoh (Senior Category) 70 kilo uba la ioh khur ia ka takma rnong (Left Hand) bad takma Ksiar (Right Hand), u Daniel Nongkhlaw (Senior Category) 55 kilo uba la ioh khur ia ka takma ksiar (Left & Right), u Hubert Paliar (Senior Category) 55 kilo uba la ioh khur ia ka takma rupa (Left hand) bad takma rnong (Right Hand) bad nalor kata u Hubert Paliar u la iashim bynta ruh ha ka (Hearing impairment Category) 70 kilo bad ioh khur ia ka takma ksiar (Left & Right Hand), ka Maimai Laloo (Hearing impairment Category) 80 kilo kaba la ioh khur takma rupa (Left & Right Hand), u Banshanlang Terang (senior Category) 60 kilo uba la ioh khur takma rnong (Right Hand), u Banshanlang Terang (PIU Standing Category) 60 kilo uba la ioh khur takma Ksiar (Left and Right Hand), u Mathias Marbaniang (Senior Category) 80 kilo uba la ioh khur takma Rupa (Left hand), u Pynshemphang Mynsong 55 kilo (youth Category) 55 kilo uba la ioh khur takma Rupa (Left hand), u Kishore Chettri (senior Category) 85 kilo uba khur takma Rupa (right hand) bad takma rnong (Left hand), Bhakupar Kharkongor (Youth Category) 100+kilo uba la ioh khur takma Ksiar (left hand)Na ka liang jong ki kynthei, ka Margaret Pathaw (Senior Category) 65 kilo kaba la khur takma ksiar (Left and Right hand) katba ha ka (Master Category) 70 kilo ka la ioh khur takma ksiar (Left and Right hand), ka Senebi Syngkli (youth Category) 55 kilo kaba la ioh khur takma rupa (Left and Right Hand) bad kumjuh ruh ha ka (Senior Category) 55 kilo ka la ioh khur takma ksiar (Left and Right Hand), ka Ladapbiang Malieh (Youth Category) 70 kilo ka la ioh khur takma Ksiar (left hand) bad takma rupa (Right Hand), ka Melinda Mawlong (Senior Category) 55 kilo kaba la ioh khur takma rupa (Right Hand), ka Parkles Theolinda Lyngkhoi (youth Category) 55 kilo kaba la ioh khur takma rnong (Right Hand), ka Wandalin Syiemïong (Senior Category) kaba la ioh khur takma ksiar (Left and Right hand), ka Wenny Freeda Kharthangmaw (Junior Category) 60 kilo kaba la ioh khur ksiar (right hand) bad takma rupa (Left Hand), Airikmenlang Shabong (youth Category) 50 kilo uba la ioh khur takma rupa (right and Left Hand), ka Airikmenlang Shabong (Senior Category) 50 kilo kaba la ioh khur takma rnong (right Hand), ka Angelis Kharumnuid (Youth Category) 50 kilo kaba la ioh khur takma rnong (right hand) bad takma ksiar (Left Hand), ka Angelis Kharumnuid (Senior Category) 50 kilo kaba la ioh khur takma ksiar (right hand) bad Takma rupa (Left Hand), ka Angel Mary Mylliem Umlong Khun Syiem (Master category) 60 kilo kaba la ioh khur takma ksiar (Left and Right hand), ka Ibakyntiew Kharumnuid (Master Category) 60 kilo kaba la ioh khur takma rupa (Left & Right Hand).Ki official kiba la mihkhmat na ka jylla Meghalaya ha katei ka rynsan iakhun kti ki long u Maiñbor Khyriem, u Ricky Marweiñ bad u Khraw Kupar Lyngshing.Napdeng kitei ki nongjop ka Kong Magret Mathaw ka la ioh rah ia ka nam lahduh na ki lahduh, kata, Senior bad Master Categories. Kumjuh ruh ha kane ka kynti lyngba kane ka lympung ka Team Meghalaya ka la ioh ka nam lahduh (na ka liang ki kynthei) Women’s Team Champion category 2023.Haba phai sha ki nongjop kiba ia shim bynta sha Uttar Pradesh (1st – 4th June 2023) ka kyrwoh na ka kynhun MAWA ki long ka Bandarika Kharkongor kaba la ioh khur takma ksiar ha ka Senior Women’s 60 kgs Left Hand, takma ksiar ha ka Senior Women’s 60 kgs Right Hand, takma rnong ha ka Youth Girl’s 60 kgs Left Hand bad takma rnong ha ka Youth Girl’s 60 kgs Right Hand.Ka Mihsngewbha Rymbai ka la ioh khur takma ksiar ha ka Master Women’s 80 kgs Left Hand, takma rupa ha ka Master Women’s 80 kgs Right Hand, bad takma rnong ha ka Senior Women’s 80 kgs Left Hand.Ka Aiboklin Rina ka la ioh khur iaka takma ksiar ha ka Senior Women’s 65 kgs Left Hand, takma rupa ha ka Senior Women’s 65 kgs Right Hand.Ka Larityngkai Lawriniang ka la ioh khur ia ka takma rnong ha ka Senior Women’s 50kgs Left Hand/Ha ka liang jong ki shynrang u Shanborlang Siangshai u la ioh khur takma ksiar ha ka Para-Standing Men’s 70kgs Left Hand bad takma ksiar ha ka Para-Standing (HI) Men’s 70kgs Right Hand.U Banbatjuban Khongwir u la ioh khur ia ka takma ksiar ha ka Master Men’s 100 kgs Right Hand bad takma rupa ha ka Master Men’s 100 kgs Left HandU Alexander Lyngdoh u la ioh khur takma ksiar ha ka Para-Standing (HI) Men’s 80kgs Left Hand, bad takma rupa ha ka Para-Standing Men’s 80kgs Right HandU Aiboklang Paul Wanniang u la ioh ban khur takma rupa ha ka Senior Men’s 60 kgs Left Hand.Kine ki rang bad ki thei iakhun kti jong ka MAWA ki la ioh khur phra tylli ki takma ksiar, san tylli ki takma rupa bad saw tylli ki takma rnong. Baroh ki takma ba la ioh khur da ka MAWA ki long 17 tylli.Ki official bad Referee jong katei ka jingiakhun kti kiba la mih khmat na ka jylla Meghalaya ki long u Junestar Kharbuli, Rupert Wankhar, Sumita Kshiar bad u Nick Nonglyer kum u Referee.Ha kaba iadei bad kitei ki ar tylli ki rynsan ha ka National Levels, ki nongjop kynthup lang ia ki Officials bad referee ki la shah jied ban iashim bynta sa ha World Level 2023 ka ban sa long ha Kazakhstan ha u bnai Nailar, 2023.
title: YN MIHKHMAT KI RANG BAD THEI ÏAKHUN KTI KA MAWA HA KA WORLD LEVEL 2023 HA KAZAKHSTAN

content: Shillong, Jylliew 08 : U Lamphang ka ïing dorbar Thaw-Ain ka jylla u Thomas A Sangma u la ithuh ia u MLA ka seng Congress na Mylliem Konstitwensi u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh kum u nongialam jong ka Liang pyrshah naduh ka 8 tarik u Jylliew 2023, ia kane la pynbna da u Commissioner and Secretary jong ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly u Dr. Andrew Simon. Ki don lai tylli ki seng sainpyrthei kiba don mynta ha ka Liang Pyrshah kata ka seng Congress kaba don 5 ngut ki MLA , ka All India Trinamool Congress 5 ngut ki MLA bad ka Voice of the People Party kaba don 4 ngut ki MLA. U Lamphang u la ithuh ruh ia u MLA ka Congress na Gambegre Konstitwensi u Saleng A Sangma kum u Opposition Chief Whip.
title: U BAH RONNIE V LYNGDOH U NONGIALAM KA LIANGPYRSHAH, U SALENG A SANGMA U CHIEF WHIP KA OPPOSITION

content: Shillong, Jylliew, 08: Ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly ka la shah pynkup burom da ka khusnam ha ka Ministry of Parliamentary Affairs halor ka jingstet ban pyntreikam ia ka National eVidhan Application. Ka Meghalaya Assembly ka dei kawei napdeng ki khyndai tylli ki Legislative Assemblies jong ka ri kiba la pyntreikam ia kane ka Application.U Myntri Khynnah uba peit ia ka Parliamentary Affairs u Arjun Ram Meghwal u la aiti ia ka khusnam sha ka Meghalaya Assembly ha ka National Workshop on NeVA kaba la long ha Convention Hall, Ashok ha New Delhi ha ka 25 tarik, Jymmang, 2023.Ia ka khusnam la pdiang sngewbha da u Dapborlang Marwein uba long u Computer Programmer bad u Nodal Officer (NEVA), Meghalaya Legislative Assembly bad ka Kong Lawanda Lyndem kaba long ka Deputy Secretary jong ka Parliamentary Affairs Department, ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ha kajuh ka pork a Nodal Officer jong ka NeVA.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Sangma, bad ki Symbud Myntri Rangbah u Bah Prestone Tynsong bad u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ki la ai khublei ia ka kynhun jong ka NeVA bad ka IT Cell, Meghalaya Assembly na ka bynta ka jingtrei shitom jong ki ban pyntreikam ia ka NeVA.U Commissioner and Secretary jong ka Assembly Secretariat u Dr. Andrew Simons u la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ia ka Ministry of Parliamentary Affairs halor ka jingithuh ia ka jingtrei shitom jong ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly Secretariat.Haba kren ha ka jingpyllait paidbah ia ka NeVA project ha Assembly, u Dr. Andrew Simons u la pyntip ba ha ka 27 tarik, Lber 2020 la thung ia ka State project Monitoring Unit (SPMU) cum NeVA Implementation Committee ba la khlieh da u Chief Secretary ka Sorkar Jylla.Ia ka soskular iasngewthuh jingmut (MoU) la iasoi ha ka 30 tarik, Lber, 2020 hapdeng ka Ministry of Parliamentary Affairs, New Delhi, ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly bad ka House Committee for e-governance and general purpose ia kaba la thaw ha ka 20 tarik, Naiwieng, 2020.Ia ka Detailed Project Report (DPR) la mynjur da ka State project Monitoring Unit ha ka 21 tarik, Nailur, 2020 bad ia ka projek la pyllait paidbah ha ka jyllla ha ka 18 tarik, Lber 2021.U Commissioner and Secretary u la pyntip ba ia kane ka projek la bei jingiarap pisa da ka Sorkar India bad ka Sorkar Jylla kaba long 90:10.
title: ÏOH KHUSNAM KA ÏINGDORBAR THAWAIÑ KA JYLLA NA KA MINISTRY OF PARLIAMENTARY AFFAIRS

content: Shillong, Jylliew 8: U District Magistrate jong ka West Khasi Hill District u Bah Garod LSN Dykes ha ka sngi palei u la pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC, kaba khang bad mana pyrshah ïa ki briew lane ki kynhun ban kem bad tong dohkha da kaba pyndonkam da ki kynja dawai bad ban pynbthei bom ha shilynter jong ka wah Wahblei bad wah Khusang, kiba hap hapoh ka Mawshynrut Block, West Khasi Hills District.“Kane ka jingleh ka wanrah ïa ka jingpynjot ïa ki kynja ba im hapoh ki um, ki wah bad ka pynsniew ïa ki sawdong sawkun jong kine ki wah. Kumta lada lap ïa kiba ïaleh pyrshah yn pynshitom katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ,” la ong ka Hukum. Kane ka jingmana kan treikam noh mardor naduh ba la pynmih ïa kane ka hukum.
title: MANA U DC WEST KHASI HILLS BAN TONG DOHKHA HA WAHBLEI BAD WAH KHUSANG

content: Shillong, Jylliew, 08: Arngut ki runar ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit jong ka Laitumkhrah Police Station halor ka jingdonkti ban thombor ia ki arngut ki shijur katba ki dang leit iaid kai pyngngad ha ka janmiet sngi sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep ha ka khlaw.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District u Bah S. Nongtnger, la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la ioh jingtip na u Secretary Shnong ka shnong Risa Colony ha ka por 7:20 baje janmiet ba ki don ki runar kiba thombor ia kawei ka kynthei ha khlaw.Ka kynhun ki Pulit ka Laitumkhrah Police Station mar mar ki la leit sha ka khlaw bad lap ba kawei ka khynnah kynthei bad uwei u samla shynrang uba la 18 snem ka rta ki la leit iaid kai pyngngad sha khlaw ha kaba ki la shah khang kdong ha ki lai ngut ki runar. U SP u la pyntip, ki lai ngut ki runar ki la byrngem ia kine ki shijur ba balei ki wan iaid kai sha khlaw bad dawa ruh ba ki dei ban siew ia ka kuna. Arngut napdeng ki runar ki la ktah kti ia u shynrang, katba uwei pat u runar u la bat trait ia ka kynthei.U shynrang u la kyrpad ia ki runar ba kin pyllait noh ia ka kynthei bad kular ba un kohnguh ban leh kat ia kaba ki hukum hynrei ki arngur ki shijur ki la shah pynbor ba kin law lyngkhuid hakhmat jong ki. Ki runar ki la lute ruh na kine ki shijur. Katba ki arngut ki runar ki dang bteng ban shoh ia u shynrang, u la lait phet da ka said na ki tyrsim jong kine ki runar bad mareh bak bak sha jaka ba don ki iingbriew ha Risa Colony ban pan jingiarap bad kine ki lai ngut ki runar ki la jrong kti ia kane ka khynnah kynthei.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la register case ha Laitumkhrah Police Station Case hapoh ka Section 323 Indian Penal Code (IPC) read with Section 7/8/9/10/11/12 POCSO Act. Ha jingthwet kaba jur, ki Pulit ki la ioh kem ia ki arngut ki runar ha ka sngi Balang na Khliehshnong Malki. Mynta ki Pulit ki dang pynlong ia ka jingthwet kaba jur ban iohkem sa ia uwei pat u runar uba dang lait phet.
title: SHAH KEM ARNGUT KI RUNAR KIBA THOMBOR ÏA KI SHIJUR HA KHLAW, DANG THWET IA UBA LAIT PHET

content: Kum ka jingithuh bad ka jingai mynsiem,ka JETS 24×7 dang shen ka la pynkup burom ia ka samla Sandara Marpna, ka khynnah pule jong ka Christian Academy, Shillong kaba la ioh rung ha ka kyrdan ba shiphew ha ka Top 20 jong ka result Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) ba la pynbna da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE).Ia ka khusnam la aiti sha ka samla Sandara Marpna da u Managing Director ka JETS 24×7 u samla Pynskhemlang Uriah ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki nongialam ka JETS 24×7 kynthup ki bahaïing hasem jong kane ka samla.
title: PYNKUP BUROM KA JETS 24×7 ÏA KA SAMLA SANDARA MARPNA

content: Shillong, 9 Jylliew 2023 : Ka Ministry of New and Renewable Energy ryngkat ka jingiatrei lang bad ka Meghalaya Non-Conventional & Rural Energy Development Agency (MNREDA) ka la pynlong bun tylli ki rynsan ai jingshai ban rakhe ia ka sngi pynneh mariang. Katei ka rynsan ai jingshai ba la pynlong ha State Convention Centre, Shillong ka long ban ia sam ia ki jingtip kiba kham bniah kiba la iaid shakhmat bad ki nongshong shnong jong ka Meghalaya bad ruh ban pynshlur bad kyntu ban pyndonkam ia ki bor kiba mih na ka mei mariang kiba don ha ka jylla.Ki riewshemphang na ka Meghalaya Non-Conventional & Rural Energy Development Agency ki la ioh ban ai ka jingpynshai kaba bniah bha halor ki sienjam kiba la iaid shakhmat kumno ban pyndonkam ia ki bording kiba mih na ka mei mariang bad ruh ka jinglah jong ki ban treikam hapoh ka jylla.Na ka liang ki paidbah ki la ioh ruh ban sakhi ia ki prokram halor ka kolshor na ki nongshim bynta na ka jylla hi bud pat sa ka jingbatai kaba sani bha bad janai bha na I Kong Elizabeth Kharjana, Project Officer MNREDA.Kum shibynta jong ka jingrakhe, ki samla pule na ki saw tylli ki High School kynthup na  Brookside Adventist Higher Secondary School, St. George Higher Secondary School, Laban Assamese Girls Higher Secondary School, bad Bhanu Bhakta Nepali Pro Secondary School, kiba shim bynta ha ka jingiakob dro jingdro halor ka phang “Renewable Energy for a Better Tomorrow.”Ka jingtbit jong kine ki nongshim bynta ka pyni ia ka jingkhmih lynti jong ki samla pule halor ka jingdonkam ban don ia ka bording kaba khlem lut shuh. Katei ka prokram ka sakhi ruh ia ka jingpyni nam ia ki katto katne ki jait tiar kiba ym pat paw pyrthei, kaba ailad ia ki nongwan ban ioh ia phylliew jingmut khamtam haba iadei bad ka Solar Mission kaba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka wanrah ha kane ka kynti.Kitei ki jait tiar ki long ruh kum ka nongmuna jong ka jingpynkhreh jong ka sorkar kumno ban wanrah noh da ki bor jong ka mei mariang na ka bynta ban pynmih ia ka bording bad ruh kum ka jingpeitjngai lypa na ka bynta kawei ba kan ym shah ktah shuh.Ha ka jingialang la iohi ruh ia ki jingpyni nam halor kitei ki bor kiba lah ban ioh na ka mei mariang hapoh ka jingialam jong u Arup Chakraborty Junior Engineer, MNREDA, uba la pyni tiak ia bun ki lad ki lynti kiba lah ban myntoi na ka mariang ha ka jylla.Hadien kane ka la don ruh ka jingai jingpynshai na bynta ki rangbah shnong kynthup naduh  Sunny Hill, Lumdiengtri, Lama Villa, Jaiaw Langsning, Dymmiew, Lumkshaid, Mawprem, Qualapaty, Nongsohphoh, bad Laitumkhrah.Katei ka prokram ka kham pynleit jingmut ruh halor ka skim PM Kusum scheme bad ka Biogas scheme, u Arup Chakraborty bad u Assistant Director(Planning) ka MNREDA, u  Danseng M. Sangma kiba la pyni ia ki jingmyntoi kiba lah ban ioh.La ioh ruh ia ka jingbatai kaba bniah bha halor ka bording ba tan naka sngi (Solar Energy) ia kaba la pynshai da u Assistant Director (SOLAR) na MNREDA, u Rafikul Islam.  Na ka liang ka  Ministry jong ka New and Renewable Energy ka sorkar pdeng bad ruh na ka MNREDA  ki buh ka thong ban pynioh ia ka bording kaba khlem lut noh ne duh noh bad ruh ban pynshlur ban pyntreikam noh ha ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: MYNTOI KI PAID MEGHALAYA NA KI JINGHIKAI JONG KA  MINISTRY OF NEW AND RENEWABLE ENERGY BAD MNREDA

content: Ka Kong Rilinda Khmah ka kurim jong u Bah Roning Nongkynrih uba la duhei ia la ka jingim ha ka jingshah siat iap ha ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) ha ka miet 6 tarik Jymmang, 2023 ha ka shnong Mawshun, Pynursla Sub-Division, kam pat ioh jingiarap eiei ruh em na ka tnat shipai BSF watla ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pyntip dang shen ba kan sa iakren bad ka tnat shipai BSF ban siew ia ka bailutksan.Ki nongialam jong ka National Hynniewtrep People Federation (NHPF) kiba dap da ka jingsngewkhia halor kane ka jingjia ha ka sngi Palei ki la leit ban iakynduh ia ka kurim jong u Bah Roning Nongkynrih, ka Kong Rilinda Khmah kaba la iathuh ba haduh mynta ka Sorkar Jylla kam pat ai jingiarap eiei bad iathuh shem lanot ruh ia ka jingiakynduh jingeh ban pyndap pynbiang ia la ka ing ka sem naduh ba u kurim jong ka, u Bah Roning Nongkynrih u la khladnoh na kane ka sla pyrthei.U General Secretary ka NHPF u Bah Youbarlin Lyngdoh Sangriang u la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba ka dei ban iarap ia ka longing jong ka Kong Rilinda Khmah da kaba aikam hynrei ym da kaba shu siew bailutksan da ka pisa khnang ba kan dup lah ban bsa, ban pynheh pynsan bad ban pynnang pynstad ia ki arngut ki khun kiba dang rit kiba la duhnoh ia la u jong u Kpa.U la phah ia ka kyrpad sha ki paradoh parasnam kiba don ia ka mynsiem sngewlem ban noh jingiarap katba lah ei ia ka ïing ka sem jong ka kong Rilinda Khmah kaba sah ha ka shnong Nongkynrih, Raid Nongkynrih.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, Ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) ki la kem ia lai ngut ki shipai kiba donkti ban synreit kuli ia ka trok kaba lam sha ka jingiap jong u Bah Roning Nongkynrih ha Mawshun.Kine ki lai ngut ki BSF ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u head constable Moni Singh, u Constable Sengel Singh bad u Constable Kdam Kishore. Kine ki lai ngut ki dei kiba don ha ka sngi kaba jia ka jingther kuli. Ha kajuh ka por, ka tnat shipai BSF ka la sospon ia u Moni Singh uba siat haduh 3 kuli na ka suloi SMG Barreta bad lah phah ia u sha BSF Headquarter ryngkat ka hukum ba um dei ban mih khlem da ioh jingbit.
title: LAH SHI BNAI KYNTHIH YM PAT ÏOH BAILUTKSAN KA KURIM U BAH RONING NONGKYNRIH

content: Ka Khasi Jaintia Fish Wholesaler and Retailer Association (KJFWRA) ha ka sngi  Thohdieng ka la leit ban iakynduh ia ka Commissioner of Food Safety ka Kong R.M Kurbah ban pan jingpynshai halor ka jingphah leh Test ban pynshisha ba ki dohkha ba la wanrah na shabar ka jylla ki dei kiba la injek da ka dawai Formalin.Ha ka jingiakren bad ka Batesi Tv hadien ka jingiakynduh ia ka Kong R.M Kurbah, u Bah C. Wankhar uba long u nongialam jong ka KJFWRA u la iathuh ba ka Commissioner of Food Safety ka la bthah ba dei ban da leh test shwa ia ki dohkha kiba la wanrah nabar jong ka jylla shwa ban pynrung sha basa die dohkha ha Iewduh kum ka jingpynthikna ba kine ki dohkha kim dei satia kiba la khleh da ka dawai injek Formalin.U Bah Wankhar ula iathuh ba ha ka jingiakren bad ka Kong Kurbah, la shah ban wanrah tang ia ki dohkha na ka jylla Assam namarba tang na kane ka jylla Meghalaya yn ym lah satia ban pyndap ia ka jingdonkam jong u paidbah.“Ki la kular ia ngi, ba manla ka 15 sngi ba la wanrah ki dohkha na ka Jylla Andhra Pradesh, yn hap ban leh test da ka Food Safety.  Ngi ruh ngi la rah ia ka syrnot kaba la phah na Andhra Pradesh kaba pynshisha ba ki dohkha kim dei kiba la injek dawai Formalin,” u la ong.U la iathuh lada jia ba ka Food Safety ka lap ba ki dohkha kiba wanrah na Andhra Pradesh kiba la injek dawai Formalin ka shong ha kane ka tnat ban pynshitom watla ha ka syrnot ba la phah na ka jylla Ahdra Pradesh la pynshisha ba kam don ka jinginjek dawai Formalin.“Ngi kloi ban iatreilang bad u paidbah, ngi kloi ban iatreilang bad ka Sorkar na ka bynta ka jingkoit jingkhiah jong u paidbah.  Nangne shakhmat ngi la pynpaw hakhmat ka DC lada ki lap eiei ia ki dohkha ba la leh test ngi kloi wat ban pynphai noh ia ki dohkha,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ba ka Commisioner of Food Safety ka la ailad ia ki nongdie dohkha ban die tang ia ki dohkha kiba wan na ka jylla Assam.Haba kylli, u la iathuh ba ka Association kan shong shwa da ka jingialang shwa ban shim ia ka rai halor ka jingai jingbit jong ka Commissioner of Food Safety ban die tang ia ki dohkha kiba wanrah na ka jylla Assam.
title: MANLA KA 15 SNGI YN LEH TEST KA FOOD SAFETY ÏA KI DOHKHA BA WAN NABAR JYLLA

content: Ka Confederation of Ri Bhoi People (CORP) Western Zone mynnin ka sngi balang ka la pynkupburom ia u samla Banpynshngainlang Thangkhiew uba la pass ia ka eksam klas XII Arts 2023 jong ka Meghalaya Board of School Education ha ka kyrdan basaw ha ka thup top ten.Ha kane ka sngi u Bah Gershome Hat Vice President ka CoRP Sengkmie lem bad kiwei ki dkhot ka Jirang Circle ki ai jingkren kyntu kynpham bad kitbok ia u samla Pynshngainlang bad un nangkiew shaphrang ha ki jingpule ha ki snem ban wan ban poi sha kliar ka nam bad ka burom.U Bah Hat ula ong, ka jinglehbha jong u ha ka eksam klas XII wat hapdeng bun ki jingeh ka wanrah burom ia ka iing ka sem ka shnong ka dong Ri Bhoi sepngi bad ka District baroh kawei.Kumta na ka liang ka seng CoRP ka la pynkup burom halor ka jinglah jong u ban leh bha ia ka eksam klas XII kum ka dak ban ai mynsiem bad pynshlur ba un iai bteng bad minot ha ki jingpule da ka mynsiem tip briew tip blei bad kyntu ban kiar na ki jingmlien ba sniew kiba lah ban pynjot ia ka jingim ki khun samla bad ka kyrmen ba lyngba kane ka jingjop jong u ban wan shakhmat eh kan ai mynsiem lang ia kiwei ki khynnah pule ka thain ba kin nangtrei shitom bad minot ha ki jingpule ha ki snem ban wan ban wanrah burom ia ka shnong bad ka thain Ri Bhoi Sepngi.
title: PYNKUP BUROM KA CORP ÏA U BANPYNSHNGAINLANG BA PASS TOP TEN

content: Ka Social Foresty Division, East Khasi Hills District ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka ophis u Syiem ka Hima Sohra lem ka Dorbar Shnong Mawrah, ha ka 09 tarik u Jylliew, 2023, ki la pynlong ia ka prokram rakhe sngi pynneh mariang ha ka jaka jngohkai ba itynnad bha kaba don ha Rangkylliaw ha katei ka shnong Mawrah da kaba buh thong ban pynjyrngam da kaba thung kham bun ki dieng ki siej ha katei ka jaka jngohkai.Ha ka jingïalang la ia donlang da ka Kong H. Lato, District Forest Officer, IFS, Social Foresty Division, East Khasi Hills Sohra Range, u Pa’iem Marremdor Syiem uba dei u Paiem Khynnah ka Hima Sohra, ki ophisar, ki Myntri ka Hima, ki nongialam shnong ka shnong Mawrah, Swer, ki khynnah skul lem ki nonghikai ryngkat ki nongshong shnong.Katei ka jaka jngohkai ka dei kaba la pynitynnad da ki jingshna ia ka jingkieng iaid kjat, ki jingker, ki lynti ïaid kjat, ki mawbynna nalor ka jingitynnad mariang kaba la don lypa ha kane ka jaka. Ka thong jong kane ka prokram ka long ban ïakhun pyrshah ia ka jing-pyndonkam plastic ha ki sawdong sawkun ka mei mariang da kaba pynsngewthuh janai sha ki nongshong shnong ban long ka nuksa.Hadien ka jingïalang la don ka jingthung dieng ha katei ka jaka da ki riewkhmat kiba la don ha ka jingïalang bad ia shim bynta ruh da ki nongshong shnong bad ki khynnah skul. Ka tnad Forest lyngba ka Kong H Lato ka la pynpoi ruh ia ki pla thep tiar thep tar bad sam sha ki nongshong shnong kum ka sienjam ban kiar na kaba pyndonkam plastic.Halor kane ka jaka jngohkai, u Secretary ka Dorbar Shnong Mawrah, u Bah Dibarstar Khongrymmai u la ong ba ka dei lyngba ka skhim MGNREGA ha ki san bad hynriew snem kiba la dep ba la lah ban shna ia kine ki jingkieng bad jingker ha katei ka jaka ha Rangkylliaw kaba lah ban iohi bad jngohkai ia ka thaiñ Khatarshnong baroh kawei nalor kiwei pat ki jaka.U la ong ba ki dang donkam shibun ki lad jingiarap ban kyntiew shuh ia kane ka jaka jngohkai bad ba kan long ka lad kamai ia ki nongshong shnong.
title: YN PYNJYRNGAM ÏA KA JAKA JNGOHKAI HA RANGKYLLIAW, MAWRAH, BUH THONG KA SFD, EKHD BAD HIMA SOHRA

content: Ka Deputy Commissioner kaba long ruh ka Chairperson jong ka District Disaster Management Authority, East Khasi Hills District ka la pynmih ia ki lad jingiada namar ka jingwan jong ka aiom lyiur.Ki nongshong shnong ki dei ban long kiba phikir ban iada ialade namar ka jingshlei um ka lah ban jia hadien jong u lapbah khamtam ha ki jaka kiba harud jong ki wah bad ki wahduid.Kiar na kaba jam ia ki wahduid , ki nala bad ki wah haba don ka jingshlei um.Wat tur ne niah ia ki kali haba don ka jingshlei um bad kiar na ki post elektrik ban lait na ka jingshah bat ha ki bor elektrik.La kyntu ia ki khynnah skul ban kiar na kaba jam ia ki wahduid bad ki wahbah ha ka por ba jur slap. La kyntu ruh ia ki nongwan jngoh kai pyrthei ban kiar na ka ba tur sha ki wahduid, ki wah bad ki kshaid.Lada don kano kano ka jingjia, ki paidbah ki lah ban pyntip da kaba phone sha ka District Emergency Operations Centre ha u nombar 0364- 2225289/2502094 bad ruh ka State Emergency Operations Centre ha u nombar 0364-2502098.Shuh shuh ka DDMA ka la bthah ia ki paidbah ba ki dei ban husiar bad ban kiar na ka ‘leilieh haba don shabar na la iing bad ban lait na ki jingmynsaw.Da khmih ia ki jingpynbna kiba iadei bad ka suinbneng haba phi hap ban leit sha kino kino ki kam ki jam shabar na la ka iing ka sem. Lada phi iohi ba don u slap, u phria, ka lyer, u pyrthat bad ka ‘leilieh shong shwa hapoh iing la kumno kumno kumba 30 minit.Wat ju leit shabar na ki iing ha ka por ba sniew ka suinbneng khamtam ban leit trei leit ktah ha lyngkha, leit pynbam phlang ia ki jingri, leit khwai dohkha, leit king lieng lane mih leit jingleit.Haba u tied u pyrthat, shong hapoh ki jaka rieh ba shngaiñ. Kiar na ki jingtei ba dei da ki nar bad ki jingtei ba tap da ki tin bad ki nar. Ki jaka rieh ba shngain ki kynthup ia ki iing ki sem, ki ophis, jaka iew hapoh ki iing ba skhem bad ki kali kiba don ki tnum ba eh ryngkat bad ki jingkhang iit ba la khang bha.Lada jia ba phi don habar ha ka jaka ba thylli ka bym don kano kano ruh ka jaka rieh ba shngain, kynriah mar mar na ki jaka ba long kynjang kum ki jaka lum, jaka ba long riat bad ki kliar lum.Lada jia ba phi don ha ka jaka ba thylli bym don iing don sem, ialeh ban kiar na ka jingma kloi katba lah.Kan bha shibun ban wad jaka rieh ha ka jaka ba long them bad da pynthikna ba kata ka jaka kan ym shlei um lada jia ba jur u slap.Ka jingieng u shñiuh hadien ryndang ryngkat bad ka jingsngewsmiej ka lah ban dei ka dak ba kan pom ka ‘leilieh bad u pyrthat.Ialeh kloi lan ban mih sha ryngkew bad jngai na ki pung, ki bir, ki nan bad kiwei kiwei ki jaka ba lang um.Kiar na kino kino ki sainar lane ki mar kiba lah ban par ka ding elektrik (telephone, sainar bor ding elektrik, jingker nar, ki sainar ba pynpur hajrong, ki lynti rel, ki kor khyrwait da ka lyer bad kumta ter ter), ki dieng bad ki kliar lum.Ki juti jri bad ki shaka kali kim lah ban iada na ka ‘leilieh bad u pyrthat.Lada phi ia don shi kynhun bad lap kynsan u slap, u phria, ka lyer, ka ’leiIlieh bad pyrthat, phi dei ban ia saphred bad pyniajngai iwei na iwei pat khnang ban pynduna ia ka jingma bad jingmynsaw.Wat ju leit shabar na ki iing ha ka por ba sniew ka suinbneng khamtam ban leit trei leit ktah ha lyngkha, leit pynbam phlang ia ki jingri, leit khwai dohkha, leit king lieng lane mih leit jingleit.Lada phi don ha ka jaka ba long khlaw, rieh hatrai ki dieng ba lyngkot lane kiba long sanium.Kiar na ka jingpyndonkam ia ki phone ba pyndait sainar bad kiwei kiwei ki mar elektrik ki ba lah ban khring ia ka ding ‘leilieh. Tangba ka long shngain ba phin pyndonkam ia ki phone bym pyndait sainar (cordless/mobile) wat haba sniew bha ka suinbneng.Kiar ban shong ha ki kali bym don jingtap ne jingda kum ki thuk thuk, ki kali ialehkai golf bad kiwei kiwei. Kiar na ki jingtei ne ki jaka bym don jingda kum ki shyngkup iing, ki jaka shong jngoh jingialehkai (sports arenas) –kum ki jaka tied golf, jaka iaidkai pyngngad bad ki madan ialehkai. Kumjuh ruh kiar na ki jaka ba don um kum ki pung, ki nan, ki bir, jaka jngi bad ki rud duriaw.Da khmih ia ki jingpynbna kiba iadei bad ka suinbneng haba phi hap ban leit sha kino kino ki kam ki jam shabar na la ka iing ka sem. Lada don ka jingbatai lypa lane jingmaham ba lah ban hap slap, phria, lyer, ‘leilieh bad pyrthat, sangeh shwa ban leit lane ban trei ia ki kam shabar ki iing ki sem.Haba don slap, phria, lyer, ‘leilieh bad pyrthat , kiar na ka jingpyndonkam lane ban shong ha ki kali bym don jingtap ne jingda kum ki thuk thuk, ki kali kit ialehkai golf bad kiwei kiwei.Pynthikna ban kiar na ki jingtei ne ki jaka bym don jingda kum ki shyngkup iing, ki jaka shong jngoh jingialehkai (sports arenas) –kum ki jaka tied golf, jaka iaidkai pyngngad bad ki madan ialehkai. Kumjuh ruh kiar nan a ki jaka ba don um kum ki pung, ki nan, ki bir, jaka jngi bad ki rud duriaw.Hiar na ki thuk thuk lane ki kali ba pyndonkam ha ka rep ka riang kiba lah ban khring ia ka ding ‘leilieh bad pyrthat.Lada phi dang king lieng lane dang jngi, ialeh ban kiew sha ryngkew kloi katba lah bad wad jaka rieh ba long shngain.Haba jur u slap, ka lyer, u phria, ka ‘leilieh bad pyrthat, shongkhop hapoh ka kali jong phi haduh ban da wan poi jingiarap lane haduh ban da jem ka suinbneng (ka tnum kali kan iada iaphi lada phim ktah iaka da ka kti jongphi ia ka bynta ba shapoh): dei ban khang pynkiew ia ki iit kali bad pynieng ia ka kali jngai na ki dieng bad ki sainar elektrik.Kynriah na ki jaka ba long khlaw (khamtam ki khlaw kseh) sha ki jaka bym don jingwit. Namar ki khlaw ki lah ban pluh lada pom u pyrthat bad ka ‘leilieh.Lada don kano kano ka jingjia, ki paidbah ki lah ban pyntip da kaba phone sha ka District Emergency Operations Centre ha u nombar 0364-2225289/2502094 bad ruh ka State Emergency Operations Centre ha u nombar 0364-2502098.
title: KI JINGMAHAM KA DISTRICT DISASTER MANAGEMENT AUTHORITY NA KA BYNTA KA JINGJUR SLAP

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la thaw da ki Rule ban pynkhlain ia ki bniat jong ka The Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act, 1985, namarba ka Section 64 (a) jong kane ka aiñ ka ai laitluid ia kino kino kiba pyndonkam ia u drok kin lait suk na ki shrip jong ka aiñ.U Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka 12 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 u la lum da ka jingialang ba la iashim bynta da ki heh ophisar jong ka tnat Pulit, na ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah, na ka tnat Social Welfare, na ka MIMHANS, na ka tnat CID bad na ki tnat treikam bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar Jylla.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka jingthaw ia ka Rule ka long hadien ba la iohi ba ka jingwan rung jong u drok sha kane ka jylla Meghalaya ka la long shaba palat liam bad katkum ka jingioh jingkhein naduh u snem 2019 ka jingdon jong ki nongpyndonkam ia u drok ka la kiew bha ha kane ka jylla bad ruh ha ki 5 tylli ki district jong ka jylla la ithuh kum ki jaka ba ka jur bha ka jingpyndonkam ia u drok.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ba lyngba ka DREAM project ia kaba la pynbna paidbah ha u snem baladep, la mynjur ia ka draft policy ban pyllaitluid ia ka Jylla Meghalaya na u drok.Lyngba kane ka mishon, u Mission Director bad ka kynhun jong u, kin iarap ia ka Sorkar ban iatreilang bad ki tnat treikam bapher bapher bad nalor kata la mang ruh 5 klur tyngka na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ki jingpynshai bad ki jingpynsngewthuh sha ki paidbah kumno ban iakhun thma pyrshah ia ka jingjyllei jong u drok.“Kane ka dei ka aiñ kaba kongsan ia kaba ym shym la pynrung haduh mynta ia kaba la tip kum ka Prevention of Illicit Traffic in Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act, 1988 (PITNDPS).  Haduh mynta, ngim pat lah ban pynrung ia ki kyndon jong kane ka aiñ namarba ngim pat lah ban thaw ia ka Advisory Board ,” ong u Bah Paul.“Hynrei mynta ka sngi, u Nongbishar ba la shongthait jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court u S.
