Pande  uba long ruh u Chairman jong ka State Consumers Council u la ai ia ka jingmynjur ban shimti kum u Cchairman jong ka Advisory Board,” iathuh u Bah Paul.“Tang shu mynjur u Chairman jong ka Advisory Board ban shimti kum u Chairman ka jingkhang ka la plie ia ngi ban pyntreikam pura ia kane ka aiñ ba kongsan,” ong u Bah Paul.U la pyntip ruh ba katkum kane ka aiñ, kino kino ki briew kiba ju don dak sniew kum ki nongkhaii drok lane ki briew kiba ju don bynta ha ka jingkhaii drok, la ki dei kiba rit ne kiba heh, kin shah pynngat hapoh kane ka aiñ bad kin hap ngat ha ka jingshah set along kaba 3 bnai bad kaba lah ban pynjlan haduh shi snem kynthih.“Lada ki sngew ba ka jingshah set along ka long kaba be-aiñ, ki lah ban kyrpad ia ka Board da kaba ai da ka jingthoh ba balei kim dei ban shah set bad balei kim dei ban shah pyllait,” la ong u Bah Paul.Ha kane ka jingialang, la iakren ruh ban pynkhlaiñ ia ka Narcotic Cell kaba don mynta tang lai ngut ki Pulit Ophisar.  Ka jingialang ka la rai ban kyntiew ia ka jingdon jong ki Pulit khnang ba yn dup lah ban ai jingshakri bad ban tehlakam ia ka jingjyllei jong u drok.Lyngba ka DREAM project, baroh ki Deaddiction Centre yn pyndonkam kum kawei ka rynsan ban ioh ia ka jingkheiñ ba thikna bad ban ithuh ia ki briew kiba dei hok ban ioh jingsumar ha kaba ia ki kyrteng ban buhrieh noh bad ki jingkheiñ bapura kin don lut bad ka Sorkar.
title: THAW KA SORKAR ÏA KI RULE BAN PYNKHLAIÑ ÏA KI BNIAT JONG KA NDPS ACT, 1985

content: Ka ophis jong ka Food Commissioner ka Sorkar Jylla haduh mynta ka dang iai bteng ban leh test ia ki dohkha khnang ban lap la ka don ne em ka jinginjek da ka dawai Formalin khnang ba ka dohkha kan ym pyut.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 12 tarik u Jylliew, 2023, ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong R.M. Kurbah ka la iathuh ba ka jinginjek dawai Formalin ia ki dohkha kam shym la sdang na kane ka Jylla Meghalaya hynrei ka la sdang na kiwei pat ki jylla jong ka ri India.Ka la iathuh ba ka jingkhang ban die ia ki dohkha ka la sdang shwa na ka jylla Assam bad hadien kata, hadien ba ki Ophisar jong ka tnat Food Safety ki la lap ia ka jinginjek dawai Formalin ha ki 30 tylli ki dohkha ba la shim nuksa la hap ban pynjari mar mar da ka kyndon kaba khang ban die ia ki dohkha haduh 15 sngi kynthih.“Namarba ngi sngewthuh ba ka dei ka iap ka im jong ki nongbam, ngi la pynmih ia ka jingpynbna ha ka 8 tarik u Jylliew bad ngim shym la ap haduh ban da ioh ia ka kaiphod na ki 100 tylli ki dohkha ba la shim nuksa.  Mar mar ngi la shim ia ki lad jingiada ban ym die shuh ia ki dohkha na ka bynta 15 sngi,” la ong ka Kong Kurbah.“Ngi sngewthuh ba ki nongkhaii bad ki nongdie dohkha ki duh ia ka kamai kajih hynrei ki dei ban sngewthuh pat ia ka iap ka im, bad haduh mynta kam shym la don kano kano ka jingleh be-aiñ na ka liang jong ki ba kin die la ka die ia ki dohkha wat hadien ba la khang,” ka la ong. Haba kylli, ka Kong Kurbah ka la ong, “hadien ka 15 sngi, ngin sa leit sha Khliehiew ban peit biang bad lada ka don ka jinginjek dawai Formalin yn ym pat shah satia ban die ia ki dohkha.”
title: DANG BTENG KA JINGLEH TEST ÏA KI DOHKHA BAN LAP ÏA KA JINGINJEK DAWAI FORMALIN

content: Ha kiba bun ki jingdonkam, ka jylla jong ngi ka hap ban shaniah beit ia ki mar ki mata kiba wan nabar jylla la ka long ha u khaw , ki marbam bapher bapher bad wat ka doh ruh. Ia kane lah ban sakhi tang ha kine ki shisngi ar sngi ba la leit noh ba kumno ki briew jong ngi ki khih pisa lynga bym don dohkha namar ba ym shah ban wanrah nabar jylla ba ka don kata ka jinginjek dawai Formalin.Ngi la ioh ban ia kren bad ka Director of Fisheries kaba bat ruh ha kajuh ka por kum ka Chief Executive Officer FFDA ka Kong A.L. Mawlong. Ha ka jingiakren bad ngi, ka la iathuh ba kane ka jylla ka donkam dohkha kumba 32,000 metric ton ha ka shisnem hynrei na jylla lajong ngi lah ban pynmih tang 19,373 metric ton tam kaba duna nangta hap ban shaniah nabar jylla.Ka Kong Mawlong ka la iathuh ba ha u snem 2022-2023 ka jingwanrah dohkha nabar jylla ka long 15,067 metric ton tam. Ka District kaba lah ban pynmih bun tam ki dohkha na kane ka jylla ka dei tang ka Ampati kaba lah ban pynmih haduh 5,260 metric ton ha ka shisnem.Ngi ju iohi ba ka sorkar ka pynshlur ia ki paidbah ba kin ri dohkha bad ka ai ruh ia ki skhim ba kin shna pung dohkha, haba ngi kylli bniah halor kane ka Kong Mawlong ka la iathuh ba ki don ki skhim jong ka sorkar jylla bad ki don ruh ki skhim jong ka sorkar pdeng.Ia ka skhim ba ka sorkar jylla ka ai la ju tip kum ka Meghalaya State Aquaculture Mission bad ha kane ka skhim ka sorkar jylla ka ai 1,50,000 (shi lak san phew hajar tyngka) na bynta ka pung kaba heh 10 hajar square phut bad na kane ka shi lak shiteng, 60 % yn bei pisa ka sorkar jylla, 25% ki hap lut hi ki nongioh ia ka skhim bad 15% pat ki hap ban siew da ka ram bad ki hap ban pyndep hapoh ka san snem.Ka skhim kaba wan na ka sorkar pdeng pat ka dei kaba la tip kum ka Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana , na kane ka scheme ki ai 1,24,000 (shi lak ar phew saw hajar tyngka) na ka bynta ka pung kaba heh 10 hajar square phut. Ha kane ka skhim, 60% ka pisa ka ai ka sorkar, 40% pat hap pynlut hi nalade..
title: 32 METRIC TON KA JINGDAWA DOHKHA HA MEGHALAYA, PYNMIH KA JYLLA TANG 19 METRIC TON TAM

content: Shillong, Jylliew, 14: U Chairman jong ka Regional Committee na ka jylla Assam u Piyush Hazarika u la kynnoh ba dei ki runar kiba ju thaw jingkulmar ha khappud jong ka thaiñ Block-I, kaba don ha khappud jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills bad West Karbi Anglong.Ia kane, u Hazarika u la pynpaw ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang banyngkong eh jong ka Regional Committee kaba la long ha nongbah Shillong ha ka sngi balang.Haba kylli, hato kine ki runar ki dei neem na ka jylla Assam, u Hazarika, u la ong, “ki runar kin dei beit ki runar, ngim lah ban ong la ki dei na Assam ne na Meghalaya bad ngi lah ban ong ba kim dei satia ki briew jong ngi bad kumno phin ithuh ia kita ki runar da kaba shu shong nangne hynrei ki paidbah ka jylla Assam ki dei kiba don ka jingiaieid bad ka jingiadei kaba jan bad ki paidbah ka Meghalaya bad nga ngeit ba ki paidbah ka Meghalaya ruh ki don ka jingieid ia ki paidbah ka jylla Assam”.Halor ka jingjia ha ka shnong Khanduli, u Hazarika u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia bad ong, “ngim dei ban don ka jingiakajia hynrei ngi dei ban don ka jingiadei kaba jan bad ki paidbah ka Meghalaya.  Ki paidbah na ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ka Assam ki im hapdeng ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad ka sorkar jong ngi bad ki Myntri Rangbah ruh ki angnud hi tang ia kata.”Dang shen, ka la mih ka jingiakynad kaba jur hapdeng ki Karbi bad ki Pnar ha ka shnong Khanduli, West Jaintia Hills District kat haduh ba ka la jia ka jingiapynibor kaba mar kylliang.“Ngim don kano kano ka daw bad ki paidbah ka Meghalaya.  Ngi don ka jingiadei kaba jan bad ka Meghalaya bad ngi burom ruh ia ki paidbah ka Meghalaya bad ia ki paidbah jong kiwei kiwei ki  jylla ha ki jylla jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi,” ong u Hazarika.
title: DEI KI RUNAR KIBA THAW JINGKULMAR HA KHAPPUD, KAM U PIYUSH HAZARIKA

content: Mawkyrwat Jylliew 14 : Kat kum ki jingtip ba la ioh na ka Indian Meteorological Department bad namar ka jingjur u slap u ban neh haduh ka 18 tarik u bnai Jylliew 2023 bad uba lah ban neh, u Deputy Commissioner uba long ha kajuh ka por u Chairman ka District Disaster Management Authority, South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat u la Maham ia ki nongshong shnong kiba shong ba sah ha shilynter ki rud wah bad ki shnat wah kiba don ha South West Khasi Hills District kum ka Rilang , Umngi bad kiwei kiwei ba kin long kiba husiar bad ban pyntip sha kine ki nombar harum lada don kino kino ki jingjia.
title: KA JINGMAHAM IA KI NONGSHONG SHNONG BAN LONG HUSIAR NAMAR KA JING JUR SLAP

content: Ki nongri masi khem dud kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka East khasi Hills District Milk Union ha ka 14 tarik Jylliew 2023, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew bitar halor ka jingpynmih hukum jong ka Sorkar ba yn ym shah shuh ban die ia ka dud masi na ka daw ka jingpang at snieh noh ha ki masi ia kaba la tip ruh kum ka Lumpy Skin Disease, khlem da ia phylliew jingmut shwa bad ki nongri masi bad ha kajuh ka por ruh khlem da leh shwa ia ka test ba ka long kaba bit neem ban dih ia ka dud masi ha shwa ban pynmih ia ka hukum katba ia ka dohkha la leh shwa ia ka test bad la pynmih ia ka hukum ban khang die ia ka dohkha.Ka tnat Animal Husbandry and Veterinary lyngba u Secretary u Dr. Manjunatha C. ha ka 11 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 ka la pynmih da ka jingpynbna paidbah ba la khang ban die ia ka doh bad ia ka dud masi na ka daw ka jingpang at sniehnoh ha ki masi.Ki nongri masi khem dud ki la pynpaw ba kane ka jingpynbna kaba khlem da ia phylliew jingmut ka la wanrah ia ka jingduhnong kaba khraw ia ki nongri masi namarba ha ka shisngi ki hap ban aibam bad ban bsa ia ki masi da ki hajar tyngka lada duna ki masi ba ki ri hynrei lada dei ia kiba ri kham bun ki masi ka la ktah da ki lak tyngka ka jingduhnong.Ki la iathuh ruh ka dud kaba ki khem ki dei na ki masi kiba koit ba khiah ym na ki masi kiba don jingpang namar ba ka masi kaba pang kam lah hi ruh wat tang ban pynmih ia ka dud.
title: BITAR KI NONGRI MASI KHEM DUD BA KHANG DIE DUD KA SORKAR KHLEM PHYLLIEW JINGMUT

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha ka sngi balang u la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri ka Ministry of Education, Skill Development and Entrepreneurship u Dharmendra Pradhan da kaba kyrpad ban tuklar lem halor ka jingeh ba ki samla pule ka Jylla Meghalaya ki la mad namar ka jinghap leit thoh eksamin Central University Entrance Test (CUET) shabar ka Jylla hapdeng ka jingpyntip kaba khim bha ka por.Ha kane ka jingthoh, u Myntri Rangbah u la kyrpad ia u Dharmendra Pradhan ba un bthah ia ka National Testing Authority (NTA) ba kan pynbeit kyrkieh ia kane ka kam.“Nga kwah ban pyntip sha phi ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la ioh pdiang shibun ki jingujor na ki samla pule ka Jylla Meghalaya halor ka jingpynngat thoh eksamin CUET shabar ka Jylla kum ha Ranchi, Jharkhand, Jorhat, Dibrugarh, Kolkata bad sha ki Jylla ba shathie jong ka ri India,” ong u Conrad Sangma ha ka shithi.U la pyntip ruh ba ki Admit Card ki dang poi sha ki samla pule ka Jylla ha ka step 14 tarik Jylliew, 2023 ba kin ialeh ia ka eksamin CUET ha ka 16 tarik Jylliew 2023, ba ka jingaipor ka la khim shaba palat ia ki samla pule ba kin pynkhreh ia ki jingdonkam ban leit sha ki jaka thoh eksamin nalor kaba wad ia ki jaka sah sha ki Jylla ba ki hap ban thoh eksamin.U Conrad ula ong ba kum kane ka jingpynbeit jong ka NTA ka la pynduhlad ia ki samla pule ka Jylla Meghalaya ba kin ioh ia ka kabu ban bteng ia ki jingpule ha ki Central University kiba don ha kylleng ki Jylla ka Ri.U la pynkynmaw ba ka Jylla Meghalaya ka ladep kyrpad mynshwa ia ka NTA ban buh ia ki CUET Centre ha baroh ki 12 tylli ki District ka Jylla Meghalaya ki ban long ha ki jaka pule kiba don lut ia ki jingdonkam baroh ha kaban lah ban pynlong ia ka eksam CUET.U Myntri Rangbah u la kyrpad ia u Dharmendra Pradhan ba un tuklar da kaba bthah ia ka NTA ba kan pynbeit kyrpang ia ka jaka thoh eksamin na ka bynta ki samla pule ka Jylla Meghalaya.
title: PYNHER SHITHI U CONRAD SHA DELHI BAN PHAH TUKLAR IA KA JINGEH KI SAMLA PULE HALOR KA CUET

content: Ha kawei na ki jingjia basngewsih kaba la pynsuhjer ia ki marjan marpa bad ia ka shnong ka thaw baroh kawei ha ka shnong Mawlai Nongmali, Shillong ka Kong Amanda Lyngdoh Nonglait ha ka sngi Palei ka la mudui da ka ejahar sha ki Pulit jong ka Mawlai Police Station halor ka jingiap kyndit jong ka hynmen jong ka, ka Kong Steffanie Lyngdoh Nonglait kaba la 30 snem eiei ka rta.Katkum ka ejahar, ka Kong Amanda ka la pyntip sha ki Pulit ba ka la ioh ia ka khubor halor ka jingkhlad jong ka hynmen hapdeng ka por 8.45 duna bad 9:00 baje eiei mynmiet ha ka sngi balang ia kaba la leit pyntip hi da u kurim jong ka Kong Steffanie halor kane ka jingjia u Bah Trophius Nongbri.Ka kong Amanda ka la pynpaw ruh ha ka ejahar ba kum ka ing ka sem kam lah satia ban pdiang ia kane ka jingkhlad kyndit jong ka kong Steffanie namarba ka dei ka briew kaba don hapdeng ka met kaba koit ba khiah.Ki bahaing hasem kiba dap da ka jingsngewsih marmar ki la leit sha ing sah jong ka Kong Steffanie ha kaba ki la kam ba ki la lap ia ki dak ki shin ha ka bynta jong u ryndang bad kum ka ing ka sem ki la suba jur ba ia kane ka kam bymman la leh hi da u kurim u Bah Trophius Nongbri.Shuh shuh ka Kong Amanda ka la pyntip ha ka ejahar ba ka Kong Steffanie ka dei kaba dang pun ruh ia i khunlung iba dang hapdeng ka rta kaba 2 ne lai bnai.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la kem noh ia u Bah Trophius Nongbri bad ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia ka dang iaid shakhmat. Na ka liang jong ki bahaing hasem ki dang ap ban ioh shimti noh ia ka met na NEIGRIHMS Hospital hadien ba la pyndep ia ka jingle post mortem.
title: MUDUI EJAHAR KA PARA BA SUBA SHAH PYNÏAP KA HYNMEN HA LA U KURIM HA MAWLAI NONGMALI

content: Ka Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement ha ka 15 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 ka la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba long ruh u Chairman jong ka Regional Committee na ka bynta ka West Khasi Hills da kaba kyntu ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan pynsngew sha ki tyndong skhor jong ka Election Commission of India pyrshah ia ki briew kiba sah ha Langpih kiba bat ar tylli ki EPIC , kawei na ka jylla Meghalaya bad kawei na ka Jylla Assam.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u General Secretary jong ka Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement u Kyllang Thongni u la kynnoh ba ki briew kiba sah ha ki thaiñ khappud khamtam ki bym dei ki Khasi ki dei kiba don ia ka EPIC jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ka Jylla Assam bad dei halor kane ka daw ba kan jwat bha ka jingiapynbeit pud hapdeng ki ar tylli ki Sorkar ban pynkut noh ia ka jingiajia pud kaba la neh mynta la san phew snem kynthih ha ka thaiñ Langpih. “Ngi la dawa ia u Chairman jong ka Regional Committee ban shimkhia da kaba pynsngew ia kane ka kam sha ka Election Commission of India bad ban thung ruh da ka jingtohkit khnang ban lap ia ka jingshisha khnang ba ia ka jingkajia pud ha ka thaiñ Langpih yn dup lah ban weng noh mardor,” la ong u Bah Thongni.
title: KYNTU KA HANM ÏA KA SORKAR BAN UJOR SHA KA ECI ÏA KIBA BAT EPICS MEGH-ASSAM HA LANGPIH

content: Ki Pulit ka kynhun Anti Narcotic Task Force ka East Khasi Hills District ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki Pulit jong ka Rynjah bad Laitumkhrah Police Station kiba la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ha ka janmiet jong ka sngi palei ki la ioh kem ia ki ar ngut ki snar khaii drok kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Eldikinstar Sohtun bad u T. James Seiminthang na ka shnong Nongshiliang kaba hap hapoh ka Rynjah Police Station, Shillong.Na ka met jong ki, ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup 40 song ki synduk thep sabon ba la thep ia u drok heroin uba khia 423.09 gram, ar tylli ki mobile phone, kawei ka motor bike kaba don ia u nombar ML 05 R-5271, kawei ka PAN Card bad kawei ka EPIC.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District u Bah S. Nongtnger, la pyntip ba ki Pulit ki la register case ha Rynjah Police Station bad pynngat hapoh ka Section 21(b)/21(c)/25/29 NDPS Act bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat.U SP u la iathuh ba ha ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingioh kurup ia u drok, ki Pulit ki la bteng ban pynlong ia ka jingkhynra ha ka step jong ka sngi thohdieng da ka jingialam jong u Eldikinstar Sohtun sha iing sah jong u kaba don ha Mawpat, ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup kawei ka suloi shna hi (Country Made Revolver),  7 tylli ki kuli 0.22 bym pat pynbthei, 6 tylli ki kuli .38 bym pat pynbthei, uwei u kuli ba la pynbthei, san tylli ki kuli jong ka suloi 12 bore, kawei ka mobile phone, ka pisa T.2 lak, kawei ka suloi Air Gun, ar tylli ki kali Mahindra Thar, kawei ka kali Maruti Zen, kawei ka kali Maruti 800 bad kawei ka kali Chevrolet Beat.
title: KURUP KI PULIT ÏA KA PISTOL REVOLVER NA ÏING U NONGKHAÏI DROK NA MAWPAT

content: : Kakynhun ialehkai jong ka Ribhoi District ha ka liang jong ki shynrang ka la ioh khur ia ka nam lahduh da kaba pynliem noh ia ka kynhun ialehkai na West Jaintia Hills District da 4 -0 kol ha ka lympung ialehkai phutbol jong ki khynnah skul ia kaba la tip kum ka  Chief Minister’s State Level Under-12 Years Football Tournament kaba la long ha madan ialehkai jong ka Sports Authority of India, STC Shillong.Ia kane ka lympung ialehkai phutbol jong ki khynnah skul ba la pynlong da ka Director of Sports and Youth Affairs, ka Sorkar Jylla la pynkut noh ha ka Sngi Thohdieng ha kaba la pynhap pyrda da ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong Rosetta M. Kurbah kaba la long kum ka KongsanHa ka jingiakhun ha ka liang jong ki kynthei, ka kynhun ialehkai jong ka West Khasi Hills District ka la ioh rah ia ka nam lahduh da kaba pynliem noh ia ka kynhun ialehkai jong ka East Jaintia Hills District da 4- 3 kol lyngba ka jingiashut tie breaker.Ha kane ka sngi la sam ia ka khusnam Best Goal Keeper ha ka liang jong ki shynrang ba la iohrah da u Subhrata Rabha na North Garo Hills katba ia ka nam Best Player la ioh rah da u Shamiki Myrchiang na West Jaintia Hills.Ia ka nam Best Goal Keeper ha ka liang ki kynthei la iohrah da ka Larishisha Dkhar na East Jaiñtia Hills District katba ia ka nam Best Player la iohrah da ka Nazareen D. Sangma na West Khasi Hills District.
title: LAHDUH KA WEST KHASI HILLS BAD RI-BHOI HA KA CMSL U-12 FOOTBALL TOURNAMENT, 2023

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) Seng Kmie mynta ka janmiet sngi Thohdieng ka la pyllait paidbah ia ki Jersey Football jong ka PFR Football Academy Women’s Players ki ban sa iashim bynta ha ka Women’s League Tournament ba la pyniaid da ka Shillong Sports Association (SSA).Ia kine ki Jersey la pyllait paitbah da u Sports Secretary ka HYC u Bah Franky Kharumnuid ha madan Malki, Shillong.U Sports Secretary u la sneng la kraw bad ai mynsiem ia kitei ki thei ialehkai ba kin trei shitom hashwa ba kin leit iashim bynta ha katei ka Tournament khnang ba kin dup poi sha ki kliar jong ka nam.U la ai mynsiem ruh ba kin pyndonkam hok ia ka sap kaba u Nongbuh Nongthaw u la ai sha ki, ha kajuh ka por u la kyntu ruh ia ki, ba kim dei ban klet pat ia ka pule puthi.Ia ki Jersey la pyllait paidbah ar tylli, kawei na bynta ka jingiakhun ha la iing (Home) da ka rong Blue katba kawei pat shabar na la iing (away) da ka rong Stem.Kane ka long katkum u kyrwoh ba la pyllait da u Assistant Sports Secretary u Yodahunki Shylla.
title: PYLLAIT PAIDBAH KA PFR FOOTBALL ACADEMY WOMEN’S PLAYER ÏA KI JERSEY

content: Shillong, Jylliew 16 : Ka jingther jong u lapbah bad ka jingbeh kyrthep jong ka eriong eriong ha kine ki 9 sngi ba la leit noh ka la wanrah ia ka jingiap ei jong uwei u rangbah ha Ribhoi District bad haduh 186 tylli ki ing ki la shah pynjulor.Ia kane la iathuh da ka Executive Director jong ka State Disaster Management Authority ka Kong Matsiewdor War Nongbri haba ai jingkhein halor ka jingshah ktah jong ki 79 tylli ki shnong na ka jingther jong u lapbah lapsan ha kylleng ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei. Ka Kong Matsiewdor ka la iathuh ruh ba ha kine ki jingjia, haduh 2777 hajar ngut ki briew ki la shah ktah na ki jingshlei um, ki jingtwa khyndew.  Naduh ka 8 tarik haduh ka 16 tarik u Jylliew, 2023, la ioh jingkhein ba ki don haduh 3 tylli ki jingri jingdub kiba la iap ha kine ki jingwan lynshop jong ki bor ka mariang.Ha kine ki 9 sngi, ki district kiba la mad ha ka jingwan lynshop jong ki bor ka mariang ki long ka North Garo Hills, ka West Khasi Hills, ka East Khasi Hills, ka South West Khasi Hills, ka East Jaintia Hills, ka West Garo Hills, ka South West Garo Hills bad ka Ri Bhoi District.Ka la iathuh ruh lyngba ka Common Alerting Protocol (CAP) la pyntip sha ki paidbah lyngba ki SMS na ki Mobile Company khnang ba kin dup husiar lada jia ka jingther u lapbah uba jur kumba ka IMD ka ladep ai jingmaham lypa ba kan don jingther jong u lapbah uba jur ha East Khasi Hills, West Khasi Hills bad ha Jaintia Hills.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong ka Kong Matsiewdor, kawei ka ing ka la pluh ha West Khasi Hills, kawei ka jingshah pom leilieh bad kiwei pat ki dei ki jingshah pynjulor na ka jingbeh kyrthep ka eriong bad ka jingtwa khyndew.Ka jingtwa khyndew kaba jur ka la jia ha Sonapur tunnel ha surokbah NH-6 kaba hap hapoh ka Lumshnong C&RD Block bad ha riat Rngain ha surokbah Shillong Dawki NH-40.“Katkum ka jingmaham jong ka IMD, kan don ka jingther jong u lapbah uba jur ha 17 tarik bad ha ka 18 tarik ha South Garo Hills, East Garo Hills, South West Khasi Hills, West Khasi Hills, East Khasi Hills, West Jaintia Hills bad ha East Jaintia Hills. Ia kine ki jingmaham ladep pyntip lypa bad ngi la pynkhreh lypa ia ki lad jingiada,” la ong ka Kong Matsiewdor.Shuh shuh ka la pyntip ba ka SMDA ka la shong jingialang bad ki ophisar jong ka Geological Survey of India ban pynthikna ba yn dup lah ban iada lypa lada jia kano kano ka jingtwa khyndew. “Ka GSI kan hap ban tih bniah bad kan sa lum jingtip ia ki jaka kiba ju jia khah khah ka jingtwa khyndew,” ka la bynrap.Ha kaba iadei bad ki dieng kiba la rim ha kylleng ka jylla, ka Kong Matsiewdor ka la iathuh ba ki Deputy Commissioner ki la peitngor bha bad ki la pyntip ruh ba kin sa ai jingtip kumno ban leh.Ka la kyrpad ruh ia ki paidbah ba kin thep (download) ia ka Sachet App ban ioh jingtip marmar halor kino kino ki jingmaham kiba iadei bad ka jinglong jingman jong ka mariang hapoh ka jylla.
title: ÏAP UWEI, JULOR 186 TYLLI KI ÏING NA KA JINGTHER U LAPBAH, TWA KHYNDEW BAD SYLLAD ERÏONG

content: Ka Executive Committee ba la ialam da ka United Democratic Party ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ka la khyllem jraiñ ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei hadien ba ka National People’s Party (NPP) ka la wanrah da ka No-confidence Motion ba la ai jingkyrshan lang da ki MDC jong ka Seng Congress.U Chairman jong ka Council u Bah Lamphrang Blah uba la pdiang ia ka No Confidence Motion u la pynbna hapoh ka Ingdorbar ba ka Executive Committee ba la ialam da u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne ka la khyllem hadien ba ki 17 ngut ki MDC ki la kyrshan ia ka No-confidence motion pyrshah ia u.Ia ka No Confidence Motion ba la wanrah da u MDC jong ka Rambrai Jyrngam Constituency u Bah Bajop Pyngrope la kyrshan da ki 11 ngut ki MDC jong ka NPP bad 6 ngut na ka Seng Congress.U Chairman jong ka Council u la pynbna ba ia ka elekshon na ka bynta ka shuki Chief Executive Member  yn sa pynlong ha ka sngi Baar.U la pyntip ruh ba ka jingthep kyrteng kan long hapoh ka kamra treikam jong u Secretary ka Legislative bad ka jingbishar ia ki kyrteng kan long hi mynta ka sngi ka Lah Sngi U Blei.Tang hapoh khyndiat kynta, u MDC jong ka Sohryngkham Constituency u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la thep kyrteng ban aireng na ka bynta ka shuki CEM.Shwa kane, u Bah Titostarwell Chyne haba kren hapoh ka Ingdorbar u la kynnoh ba ka No Confidence Motion ba la wanrah pyrshah ia u ka dei ka jingshet kylla jong ka NPP ia ka UDP.
title: JRAIÑ KHYLLEM KA EC U BAH TITOSTARWELL CHYNE HA KHADC, KYNNOH BA SHET KYLLA KA NPP

content: Ka jingiai ther jong u lapbah lapsan ha ki bynta jong ka East Jaintia Hills ka la wanrah ia ka jingtwa khyndew kaba khlem sangeh hakhmat ka Tunnel kaba don ha surokbah National Highway-6 jong ka shnong Sonapyrdi kaba pyniasoh ia ka jylla Meghalaya bad ia kiwei pat ki jylla jong ka thain Shatei Lammihngi.Da ki hajar tylli ki kali ki la sahkut da ki kynta ha kane ka jingtwa khyndew kat haduh ba ki la hap ban shu shong beit hajuh ban ap ia ki lad jingiarap na ki bor synshar District kiba la phah da ki kali puhshilum ban khat ia ka ktieh kaba la sahkut hapdeng surok.Ha kane ka jingtwa jong ka khyndew kaba la sdang naduh ka 14 tarik haduh ka 19 tarik u jylliew, 2023, la sakhi ruh ba kawei ka trok ka la sahkut hapdeng ka ktieh kaba la tuid hapdeng surok ryngkat bad ki maw kiba heh.
title: BTENG KA JINGTWA KHYNDEW HAKHMAT KA TUNNEL SONAPYRDI, SAHKUT KA TROK HA KA KTIEH

content: U Bah Titostarwell Chyne uba long u MDC jong ka Sohra Constituency uba la shah pynhap noh na ka shuki Chief Executive Member jong ka Khasi Hills Autononomous District Council ha ka lah Sngi U Blei u la kynnoh pyrshah ia u Chairman jong ka Council u Bah Lamphrang Blah da kaba ong ba ka rukom pyniaid ia ka dorbar ka long ka jingleh donbor.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Chyne u la ong, ‘kane ka dei ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka ha kaba ka List of Bussiness ladep sam lut sha ki dkhot jong ka ÏING, nangta kaba kongsan eh ka long ban mynjur ia ka Mang Tyngka kaba ladep pynkhreh.”“Ha kano ka nongrim la shu iaid beit sha ka No Confidence Motion,” la buh jingkylli u Bah Chyne.“Ha ka jingshisha kum u Chairman u dei ban pyndep nyngkong eh ia ki kynta jingkylli bad ban pyndep shwa ia ka List of Bussiness bad sa wanrah ia ka No Confidence Motion hadien. Hynrei kaba pynlyngngoh ia nga ka long ba mynta ka sngi la shu leh bor namarba khlem pyniaid ia ka List of Bussiness kumba ka dei ban iaid,” u la ong.“Kane kam dei ka Dorbar Kyrpang.  Lada dei ka dorbar kyrpang na ka bynta ka No Confidence Motion ngin iakren beit tang ia kata. Hynrei ka jingpynstet ka i kumba ki tieng,” la kynthoh u Bah Chyne bad bynrap, “nga la kylli na kiba kham hashwa ia nga, ki ju ong ba ka No Confidence Motion ka wan hadien ynda ladep ka List of Bussiness.”“Kumba ka long mynta ka buh jingeh, namarba ka la wan shwa ka elekshon ban jied ia u Chief Executive Member ba thymmai.  Ynda la jied ia u CEM ba thymmai yn wanrah biang ia ka Mang Tyngka?  Hato kata ka dang don lynti, ka dang don aiñ, ka dang don rukom kum kata ban pynsangeh shwa ia ka List of Bussiness bad ban wanrah shwa da ka No Confidence Motion?” la kynthoh shuh shuh u Bah Chyne.
title: KYNNOH U BAH TITOS BA SHU LEH DONBOR U CHAIRMAN KA ÏINGDORBAR KA KHADC

content: Ka National Peoples Party (NPP) kaba iatreilang bad ka Indian National Congress (INC) ban knieh kynthet ia u lakam synshar na ka kti jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ha ka 19 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 ka la thaw thymmai da ka kynhun kaba la tip kum ka Khasi Hills Democratic Front ka ban ialam ia ka Executive Committee kaba thymmai ha Khasi Hills Autononomous District Council.U MDC jong ka NPP na Sohryngkham Constituency u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, ba ka kynhun Khasi Hills Democratic Front ka don mynta 18 ngut ki MDC ba kynthup ia 12 ngut ki MDC na ka NPP bad 6 ngut na ka Congress.Ia ka Khasi Hills Democratic Front yn khlieh da u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem kum u Chairman, u Bah Pynshngaiñlang N. Syiem kum u Vice Chairman, u Bah Teiborlang Pathaw kum u Secretary bad u Bah Carness Sohshang kum u Asst. Secretary.“Katkum ka AD Rules, kumba la pynbna da u Chairman (hapoh ka Iingdorbar) ba kan don ka jingthep kyrteng na ka bynta shuki Chief Executive Member ngi ladep ban thep kyrteng, kawei ka thup la tyrwa da u Bah Bajop Pyngrope bad la kyrshan da u Bah Carnes Sohshang katba kawei pat ka thup kyrteng la tyrwa ia ka kyrteng jong nga kum u Chief Executive Member ba thymmai da u Bah Batskhem Ryntathiang bad la kyrshan da u Bah Fantin Joseph Lakadong,” la iathuh u Bah Pyniaid.U la iathuh ba hadien ka jingbishar ia ki kot ki sla ba la thep kyrteng da u Secretary ka Legislative la shem ba ki biang lut nadong shanong.Kumba ka long mynta, la ioh jingtip ba na ka liang jong ka UDP bad ka kynhun kim shym la thep kyrteng satia ban iakhun ia ka shuki CEM.Haba kylli, u Bah Pyniaid u la ong ba ka thong kum ki MDC ka long ban kyntiew shwa nyngkong eh ia ka District Council.U la kam ruh ba ka NPP ka la don ia ka jingbunpaid naduh mynno ban shimti ia ka EC kaba thymmai hapoh ka Council hynrei dei namar ka jingjynsur mynsiem jong ka NPP la ailad ia ka UDP la saw snem kynthih bad mynta pat ka la dei ka por ia ka NPP ban shimti noh tang shi snem ia ka EC ba thymmai.Haba pynksan ia ka jingiatreilang hapdeng ka NPP bad ka Congress ha Khasi Hills Autonomouos District  Council u Bah Pyniaid u la ong, “hapoh ka District  Council ka long laitluid, kano kano ka kynhun kaba ialam ia ka Executive Committee ka lah ban iatreilang bad kano kano ka kynhun.  Ha ka Jylla ka kyndon treikam ka don la ka jong katba ha ki District Council ki don la ka jong.”
title: DA KA KHASI HILLS DEMOCRATIC FRONT THAW KA ka NPP-CONGRESS BAN ÏALAM ÏA KA EC THYMMAI HA KHADC

content: U Bah Titostarwell Chyne uba long u MDC jong ka Sohra Constituency uba la shah pynhap noh na ka shuki Chief Executive Member jong ka Khasi Hills Autononomous District Council ha ka lah Sngi U Blei u la kynthoh tyngeh ia ki MDC jong ka National Peoples Party bad ia ki MDC jong ka Indian National Congress da kaba ong ba ka jingwanrah ia ka No Confidence Motion pyrshah ia u ka dei tang ka jingrhah bor haduh ba kim salia shuh wat ia ka nongrim lajong.Kane ka drama saiñpyrthei ha Khasi Hills Autononomous District Council ka la jia phra bnai shwa ki lai tylli ki Autononomous District Council (ADC) kin sa leit sha ka elekshon MDC ka ban sa long ha u snem 2024.Kaei kaba la jia ha ka saiñhima sima ha Khasi Hills Autononomous District Council ka la buh ia u paidbah ha ka shaiong bad ka lyngngoh, namarba ha ka Ïingdorbar Thawain jong ka Jylla ka National Peoples Party ka la iatreilang bad ka United Democratic Party, katba ka Indian National Congress ka dei kaba shong ha ka Liang Pyrshah.Hynrei ka jingiatreilang jong ka National Peoples Party  bad ka Indian National Congress ban pynkhyllem ia ka Executive Committee ha District Council ba la ialam da ka United Democratic Party ka long kaei kaei kaba buh ia u paidbah ha ka umdum bad khamtam eh ia ka UDP.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la pynkut shwa shipor ia ka Dorbar Lyiur, u Bah Titostarwell Chyne u la buh jingkylli da kaba ong, lada hapoh ka Sorkar Jylla ka Congress ka kyntait ban don bynta lang bad ka NPP namarba ka dei kaba iatreilang bad ka Bharatiya Janata Party, katba ha District Council pat kam bit BJP mo?“Ha ka sainpyrthei kaei kaei ruh kaba lah suda ban long.  Ki shim beit ba kaei kaba ki leh ka biang beit,” la kynthoh u Bah Chyne.Haba kylli, u iathuh ba ki don ki MDC ki bym don hapoh ka Executive Committee ki la pynsngew ia ki jingeh ki jong ki ha ka jingialang jong ka United Democratic Allaince (UDA) ha kaba na ka liang jong ki MDC ruh ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewhun hadien ba ki la ioh jingpynshai.“Haba la mut hi ia kaei kaei ka ban pynsniew ki mih hi ki daw,” la kynthoh u Bah Chyne.
title: HA JYLLA KA CONGRESS KAM ÏATREILANG BAD KA NPP, KATBA HA DISTRICT COUNCIL KAM BIT BJP? TITOSTARWELL CHYNE

content: U MDC jong ka Indian National Congress na Mylliem Constituency u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka jingai jingkyrshan jong ka Indian National Congress ia ka National Peoples Party ban ialam ia ka Executive Committee kaba thymmai ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ka long ban pyllait na ka jingpynjari da ka jingsynshar u Lat hapoh ka Council.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, u Bah Ronnie u la kynthoh pyrshah ruh ia u Chief Executive Member ba la shah pynhiar shuki jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council u Bah Titostarwell Chyne da kaba ong ba ka jingkren jong u ka long khyllung.U la pynksan ruh ba ka jingiatreilang hapdeng ka INC bad ka NPP ka dei kaba la shim rai hi da ka Party ym tang ma u marwei shimet.“Ngi pyrkhat ia ka Council, lada ngim ai jingkyrshan ia ka NPP kan wan ka  jingsynshar u Lat. Kan kham bha ba ngi ai jingkyrshan ban lait na ka jingsynshar jong u Lat,” u la ong.“Lada jia ba kan wan ka jingsynshar u Lat bad mynta kan wan sa ka jingpynbeit thymmai ia ka Khyrnit Bahynriew, baroh khoit ki don hakhmat, lada ngim don bynta ha ka jingpynbeit thymmai, ioh ba ki wanrah ha Parliament ia ka Amendment, lada ka wan ka jingsynshar u Lat mano ban peit ia ka bha ka miat jong ka khyndew ka shyiap, ka riti ka dustur, hato kan ym ktah?  Dei halor kata ka nongrim ba ngi shim ia ka rai ban ai jingkyrshan lada ki wanrah ia ka jingpynbeit thymmai hapoh ka Parliament ia ka Khyrnit Bahynriew ngin iadon bynta ban ai jingmut bad ia kiba iahap ngin kyrshan bad ia ki bym iahap ngin pyrshah,” la pynshai u Bah Ronnie.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingbate shuki, u Bah Ronnie u la ong, “ngi ieh ha u CEM, namarba ma ki (NPP) ki don 12 ngut bad ma ngi (Congress) ngi don 6 ngut. Ka shong ka jingstad jong u CEM. Lada ngi don ne ngim don hapoh ka EC ruh ngin peit ba ka District Council bad khamtam eh ia ka jingkordor bad ka jingkongsan jong ka Khyrnit Bahynriew.”
title: LADA DON KANO KANO KA PARTY KABA BUH SHWA ÏA KA JAIDBYNRIEW HAKHMAT, NGI KLOI BAN ÏATREILANG: CONGRESS

content: Shillong Jylliew 19 : Ha ka sngi ba u shah pynkhyllem noh na ka shuki Chief Executive Member (CEM) ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ( KHADC) u Bah Titos W. Chyne u la takrain tyngeh ia ki para MDC kiba shet kylla ia u. “Lada para nongmihkhmat dang ia shet kylla sa ia u paidbah lei katno tam, katno sien phin shet kylla ia ki, hangne tang hapoh 30 ngut dang ia shet kylla sa ia u paidbah lei katno sien phin shet kylla” ong u Bah Titos ha ka jingkren jong u hapoh iing Dorbar.U la kren siat ruh ia ki paralok kiba ha syndah jong u kiba la shet kylla ia u bad u shim ba kane ka jingleh jong ki ka long kumba ki doh nakhmat ki dung pat nadien. “ Ki paralok kiba nga ieid tam, kiba nga la theh lut mynta ki dung ia nga nadien. Nga duwai ba u Blei un pynkylla ia ka dohnud jong ki paralok ki bym don shuh ia ka jingiatip lem, ka jingiatiplem jong ki ka la iap mynta ka sngi hangne, nga u briew ngam lah ban leh eiei hynrei nga la pyndep la ka kamram” bynrap biang u bah Titos.U la kyntu ruh ia u CEM u ban sa shimti thymmai ba un shim ia kane ka jingshah shet  kum ka jinghikai bad ba un long uba husiar namarba kita kiba doh ki lah ban dei ki ban dung nadien. “Wat shaniah iano iano ruh, kin sa dung ia phi nadien” kyntu u bah Titos ia u CEM ba thymmai u ban sa shimti, u la ong ba uta u CEM ba thymmai ruh  u dei u paralok ba ia jan jong u (khlem da pynmih kyrteng).Halor ka jingkylla ha ka sainpyrthei, u Bah Titos u la pynpaw ka jingsngewlyngngoh ba u MDC na Mylliem uba dei u nongialam ka Liang Pyrshah ha ÏING Dorbar Thaw-ain ka Jylla uba pyrshah ia ka NPP hynrei ha KHADC pat u ai ka jingiatreilang bad ka NPP. Ha katei ka por u MDC ka Mylliem u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh u la ieng joit naba shong bad u la ong ba kata ka jingkren jong u Bah Titos ka dei ka jingkynthah shimet ia u.Hynrei u Bah Titos u la pynphai nia da kaba ong ba ka dei ka jingshisha kaba ym lah ban buhrieh hynrei u la pynkut noh ia ka jingkren halor kane ka mat da kaba ong , “Nga khlem mut ban pynmong ia phi hynrei nga shu kren ia ka jingshisha khnang ba u paidbah un tip ka mut aiu kane ka politik hangne”, pynkut u Bah Titos.
title: LADA PARA NONGMIHKHMAT DANG SHAH SHET KYLLA , SA ÏA U PAIDBAH LEI KATNO TAM – TITOS

content: Shillong, Jylliew, 19 : Arngut ki briew kiba shong ha kawei ka thuk thuk ar shaka ki la mynsaw jur katba uwei pat u la khladnoh hashen ha ka jingiatakhuh ki thuk thuk ha jingkieng Chimesengre. Kane ka la jia ha ka lah sngi u blei ha ka por kumba 1:00 baje nohphai sngi.Katkum u kyrwoh na ki Pulit, la iathuh ba kawei ka thuk thuk Pulsar Bike kaba don ia u nombar AS02-G-0343 ba la ñiah da u Jahangir (25snem) uba sah ha Uttar Samarali, South Salmara, Assam bad uba shong lang hadien ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Minarul Islam (26snem) Sukchar District, Dhubri Assam ki dang thmu ban leit sha Garobadha. Ha kane ka por, kawei ka thuk thuk kaba don ia u nombar ML14-8862 ba la ñiah da u Dechrang T. Sangma (23snem) uba sah ha Damalgre uba dang wan na Garobadha u la iatakhuh bad ka thuk thuk ba la shong da kitei ki arngut ynda poi ha jingkieng Chimesenggre.Ha kane ka jingjia, ki arngut ki la mynsaw jur. Ki nongtrei ka EMRI-108 kiba la wan poi ban ai jingiarap, ki la pyntip ba u Dechrang T Sangma u la khladnoh hashen.Ia ki arngut kiba la mynsaw jur la pynkit noh mar mar sha Tura CHC ban ioh jingsumar, katba ia ka met jong u Dechrang T. Sangma la pynkit noh sha ka jaka buh metiap ha Ampati DM&HO.
title: ÏAP HASHEN UWEI, MYNSAW JUR ARNGUT BA ÏATAKHUH PARA THUK THUK HA CHIMESENGRE

content: Shillong Jylliew 19 : Ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) ryngkat ka ARMS PT/EDGE 10 SPORTALITY, da ka jingiatrei lang bad ka Department of Sports & Youth Affairs ka Sorkar Jylla, ka la pynbna ïa ka jingsdang ban pyntreikam noh ia ka Elite Pathway Training 2nd Camp, kaba la long ha ka 17 bad 19 tarik mynta u bnai Jylliew ha JN Stadium, Polo Shillong.Ka thong jong kane ka prokram ka long ban pynkylla ïa ka rukom pynmih ïa ki nongialehkai na kane ka thaiñ kata da kaba sdang ban hikai, pyntbit ïa ki naduh ba dang rit bad buddien haduh ba kin da pura. Kane ka Elite Pathway Program ka long ruh ka bynta ba kongsan jong ka STAR Program, kaba la pynmih da ka Sorkar Jylla bad pyntreikam pat da ka Edge10 Group, ka kynhun na Australia ryngkat ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association, ban wad bad pyntbit ïa ki riew donsap kiba don ha ka jylla.Ha kine ki sngi la donlang ruh u Sampat Kumar, IAS, Principal Secretary, Program Implementation & Evaluation Department ka Sorkar Jylla nalor u Ian Campbell, u rangïalehkai Olympic uba la dep ban mihkhmat ïa ka Australia ha ka 1980 Olympics. Nalor kine la donlang ruh u Bah John F Kharshiing, Working President ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association, Bah P.B. War Nongbri, Assistant Director jong ka Department of Sports and Youth Affairs, kiba la pashat lang katto katne ki mat bakongsan. Katba na ka liang u Bah P. Laloo, Joint Secretary ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association bad Kong Isawanda Laloo, Director ka tnad Sports and Youth Affairs, ka Sorkar Jylla ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen ryngkat ka jingkyrmen ba katei ka jingïatrei lang bad ka EPP kan wanrah ïa u soh ka jingjop.Na ka liang u Bah John F. Kharshiing haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang u la pynpaw ka jingkmen ban sakhi ïa ka Elite Pathway Program na bynta ki nongïalehkai ka Meghalaya. Kane ka prokram da ka jingïatreilang ka MSOA bad ka Edge10 Group, ka la plie lad plie lynti ban lap ïa ki riew donsap bad kumno ban pyntbit ïa ki nongïalehkai. Kane ka prokram ka long kum ka jingsdang jong ka jingkyrmen na bynta ki nongïalehkai ba dang khie da kaba plie ïa ka lad ba kin ïoh ïa ki jingkilan met kiba paka ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki nonghikai kiba kynsai.Na ka liang u Ian Campbell ha ka jingkren, u la ong ba kane ka jylla nalor ba ka don ïa ka mariang kaba ithiang u lap ba ki don bun ki riewdonsap kiba dang khie. “Hadien ba nga la dep ban peit ïa palat 14,500 ngut ki nongïalehkai lyngba ki jingïalehkai ba harukom ha baroh kawei ka jylla, nga sdang ban sngewhtuh ïa ka jingbun ki riewdonsap kaba don ha ki. Ka jingtbit, ka jinglah kaba la don lypa ha ki, ka pyni ïa ka jingkyrmen na ka bynta ka lawei,” u la ong da kaba pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewnguh ïa u Working President ka MSOA bad ka kynhun kiba la shaniah ha u ban pyniaid ïa kane ka kam shakhmat ban lap ïa ki nongialehkai kiba kynsai bad kiba don ka jinglah ba kin kiew shuh shuh ha ki kam ïalehkai ba bunjait.Lyngba ka EPP ki la don haduh 14,500 ngut ki khynnah kiba la wan ban pyni ïa ka jingtbit jong ki ha kylleng ki bynta jong ka jylla bad na kine ki la don haduh 200 ngut ei ei kiba la shah jied na ka bynta kane ka program.Kine ki nongïalehkai ki don mynta ha ka prokram ba shisnem kaba la phiah ha ki ar bynta kaba kynthup ïa ki jinghikai pyntbit ba ai da ki coach bad ruh ka jingpeitngor kaba man ka taiew ban peit ïa ka jingtbit kaba ki don.
title: PYNKUPBOR KA ELITE PATHWAY PROGRAM (EPP) ÏA KI NONGIALEHKAI KA MEGHALAYA BAN KIEW HA KI KAM IALEHKAI

content: U MDC jong ka National Peoples Party na Sohryngkham Constituency u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la shah jied kum u Chief Executive Member ba thymmai jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ha ka 20 tarik Jylliew 2023 ha ka ïingdorbar thawain jong ka Council.Ki MDC na ka Liang Synshar bad ka Liang Pyrshah ki la ai khublei kitbok ia u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem bad kyrmen ba un nang lah ban trei kham bha ia ka jingbit jingbiang bad ka jingmyntoi jong ka Council.U BahPyniaid un ialam ia ka Executive Committee bathymmai hapoh ka shatri jong ka Khasi Hills Democratic Forum ryngkat ka jingiatreilang ka NPP kaba don 12 ngut ki MDC bad ka Congress kaba don 6 ngut ki MDC.
title: SHIMTI U BAH PYNIAID SING SYIEM KUM U CEM BA THYMMAI JONG KA KHADC

content: Hadien ba la ioh jingtip halor ka jingiai wan poi jong ki nongtrei bar jylla kiba trei bad ka Kompani Spaika kaba dang pyntrei mynta ia ka surok Nongstoiñ-Rambrai-Kyrshai, ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Student Union West Khasi Hills District, ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ka la pynlong ia ka jingtalasi ia ki kot ki sla jong ki nongbylla kane ka Kompani.Ha ka jingtalasi, ki dkhot ka KSU ki la lap ba ki don kumba 20 ngut eiei ki nongbylla bar jylla ki bym don ia ki kot ki sla kiba biang bad na ka liang jong ka Seng ka la phah ba kin leit phai noh bad ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka la maham ia ka Kompani ba lada ka warah ia ki nongtrei ka dei ban da pyntikna ban pynbiang shwa ia ki kot ki sla.Ki dkhot ka KSU ki la kam ruh ba ki don ar ngut ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba la sdang ban mushlia ia ki kynthei Khasi bad na ka liang jong ka Seng ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki nongialam ki la phah weng kam noh ia ki ar ngut ki bar Jylla bad maham tyngeh ia ki nongbylla bar jylla ba ki dei ban trei beit thik tang ia ka kam lajong ym ban wan mushlia ia ki kynthei Khasi.
title: MAHAM KA KSU ÏA KI ki NONGBYLLA BAR JYLLA BAN YM MUSHLIA ÏA KI KYNTHEI KHASI

content: Kum shibynta jong ka jingpyrman halor ki kam iada mariang bad ka jingpyntreikam ia kiba bun ki ain iada mariang kiba kynthup ia ka ain Environment Protection Act bad ka ain Biodiversity Act, ka ophis jong u Range Forest Officer, Mairang Range ha ryngkat ka jingsynranlang jong ki bor pulit ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District ha ka 16 tarik u Jylliew 2023 ki la leit ban jurip ia ki kam thang rnga beain ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka distrik bad ha kane ka jingleit jurip la lap ia ka jingthang rnga beain, ka jingkhaii bad kit rnga beain ha kiba bun ki jaka khamtam ha ki thain Sohjarang bad Pathar Lyndan na ka bynta ban pynpoi sha ki kharkana kiba don ha Ribhoi distrik.Ha kane ka sngi la ioh ruh ban pynpra noh ia katto katne ki jaka thang bad ki  jaka ha kaba la lumthup ia u rnga beain bad la ioh ruh ban kurup ia u rnga ba la thang beain.Wat hapdeng kiba bun ki diengpyngkiang kiba ka ophis ka iakynduh na ka por sha ka por, ka ophis jong u Range Forest Officer, Mairang Range lyngba ki snem, ka la iaibteng ban pynlong ia ka jingjurip bad jingkhynra ia kiba kum kine ki jaitkam beain.Kane ka ophis ka kyntu ruh ia ki nongialam shnong ka thain ba kin iatreilang ryngkat ryngkat bad ka tnat Forest ban pakhang ia kiba kum kine ki kam pynjot mariang bad u Range Forest Officer ka Mairang Range u la ong ruh ba ka ophis kan iai bteng ban pynlong ia ki prokram pynshai paidbah halor kiba bun ki ain iada mariang naka bynta ki paidbah jong ka dong ka thain.
title: LEIT JURIP KA TNAT FOREST ÏA KI JAKA THANG RNGA BEAIÑ HA EASTERN WEST KHASI HILLS DISTRICT

content: U Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem uba la shah jied thymmai kum u Chief Executive Member jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ha ka sngi baar u la kren lyngba ka telephone ia u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous  Council (KAAC) u Dr. Kuliram Ronghang ban ym pynwit ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong kiba sah ha khappud kiba hap hapoh ka Raid Nongtung, Hima Khyrim.Haba ai jingkren hapoh ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ kum u CEM ba thymmai jong ka Council u Bah Pyniaid u la ong, ka Council kan sa buddien ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdawa ban pynrung noh ia ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka ri India.U la ong ruh ba ka Executive Committee kaba thymmai kan sa buddien ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynrung ia ki kyndon kiba thymmai kiba pyniohnong ia ka District Counicl ha ka jingpynbeit thymmai ia ka Khyrnit Bahynriew kaba dang don mynta hapoh ka Ministry of Home Affair, ka Sorkar India.“Ngin sa lah ban pynurlong ia kine baroh, dei tang da ka jingiatreilang.  Nga kyrmen skhem ba ki dkhot ka Liang Ïatei kin ai ka jingiatreilang khamtam ha ki mat kiba ktah im im peit peit ia ka jaidbynriew jong ngi,” la bynrap u Bah Pyniaid.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingeh jong ki paidbah kiba sah ha ki shnong khappud kiba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ia kaba la pynsngew da u MDC jong ka Mawhati bad u MDC jong ka Umroi, u Bah Pyniaid u la ong, “ngi la iohi ba ka Sorkar MDA ka la pyndep ia ka jingiapynbeit pud ha ka wat kaba nyngkong bad ka sorkar Assam ban pynbeit ia u pud u sam bad ia ki kynrum kynram bad mynta ka jingiapynbeit pud ka la poi sa sha ka wat kaba ar.”U la iathuh ba katkum ka jingai jingmut jong u MDC ka Mawhati, shen ka Executive Committee kan sa hiar sha ki shnong khappud kiba don hapoh ka Raid Nongtung ban sngap ia ki jingeh ba ki paidbah ki iakynduh ha khappud khnang ba ka jingiapynbeit pud kan ym long ka jingduhnong ia ki Hima bad ki shnong.
title: LYNGBA KA TELEPHONE KREN U BAH PYNIAID ÏA U CEM KA KAAC BAN YM PYNDIK ÏA KI PAIDBAH HA KHAPPUD

content: Ka Regional Committee na ka bynta ka Ribhoi District kan sa shong ia ka jingialang banyngkong eh ha ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai ban iathir iatai ia ka jingpynbeit ia u pud u sam ha ka wat kaba ar na ka bynta ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka thaiñ Block-II kiba don hapdeng ka jingiakajia pud bad ka Jylla Assam.Ia kane la iathuh da u MLA/MDC jong ka Mawhati Constituency u Bah Charles Marngar ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang.U Bah Charles Marngar uba long ruh u dkhot jong ka Regional Committee na ka bynta ka Ribhoi District ba la khlieh da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u la ong, “ha ka jingshisha ka jingialang jong ka Regional Committee ka dei ban long ha ka 16 tarik, hynrei na ka liang jong u Chairman ka Committee u Bah Prestone Tyngsong u la pyntip ba la pynkynriah noh ia kane ka jingialang sha ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai na ki daw ki bym lah ban kiar.”“Kum uwei na ki dkhot jong ka Regional Committee, nga la kren da kaba shai ba lada long kumno kumno ruh ngan don beit bad u paidbah.  Ka sur jong u paidbah kan dei ka sur ka jong nga kaba ngan rah hapoh ka Regional Committee,” la ong u Bah Marngar. “Kumba ngi la ieng naduh kaba sdang ba ngin ym ailad ba ngin duh ia ka khyndew ka shyiap, kata ka dei ka nongrim.  Ka nongrim jong ka synjuk ki rangbah shnong kaba ngi iatreilang ha khappud, kata ka dei ka nongrim jong nga bad ngan ym lah ban kylla na kata,” u la iai ban.
title: KA SUR U PAIDBAH KAN DEI KA SUR JONG NGA HAPOH KA REGIONAL COMMITTEE: CHARLES MARNGAR

content: U MDC jong ka Indian National Congress na Mawhati Constituency ha ka Sngi Balang u la shah jied kum u Deputy Chairman ba thymmai jong ka Ïingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Khasi Hills Autonomous  District Council.Kane ka jingshimti jong u Bah Marngar ia kane ka shuki, ka long hadien ba u MDC ka NPP na Mawsynram Constituency u Bah Alvin Sawkmie u la hiar shuki shwa ban shimti kum u Executive Member ha ka Executive Committee la ialam da u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem kum u Chief Executive Member (CEM).U Bah Charles Marngar u la jop suk ia kane ka shuki khlem kano kano ka jingialeh pyrshah.Ha ka sngi Baar, u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem uba la shah jied kum u Chief Executive Member  u la phah ia ka thup kyrteng jong ki 9 ngut ki Executive Members sha u Lat ka Jylla Meghalaya u Phagu Chauhan ban ai jingmynjur.Kane ka thup kyrteng jong ki Executive Member ka kynthup ia u Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem uba long u CEM barim bad u MDC jong ka Congress u ban shimti kum u Deputy CEM bad u MDC ka Congress Mawkyrwat Constituency u Bah Carness Sohshang. Katba ki shuki EM kiba sah la bhah sha ki MDC jong ka NPP.Napdeng kine ki khyndai ngut, hynriew ngut ki Executive Member ki dei kiba la don teng hapoh ka Executive Committee kaba rim ba la ialam da u CEM barim u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne kiba kynthup ia u Bah Gigur Myrthong, ka Kong Grace Mary Kharpuri, ka Kong Macdalyn Sawkmie Mawlong, u Bah Rangkynsai Kharbuki, u Bah Teiborlang Pathaw bad u Bah Victor Ranee.Ki ar ngut ki khmat thymmai kiba la ioh rung hapoh ka Executive Committee kiba dei hi na ka NPP ki kynthup ia u MDC jong ka Mawsynram u Bah Alvin K Sawkmie bad u MDC jong ka Laitumkhrah-Malki u Bah Fantin Joseph Lakadong.
title: SHAH JIED U BAH CHARLES MARNGAR KUM U Dy. CHAIRMAN BATHYMMAI KA KHADC

content: Ka State Election Committee (SEC) jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ha ka 21 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 ka la pynbna paidbah ban pynieng ia u Dr. Ricky AJ Syngkon kum u Kyrtong MP ha ka elekshon sha ka Ingdorbar Thawain Lok Sabha na 1-Shillong Parliamentary Constituency ka ban long ha u snem 2024.Ia kane la pynbna da u General Secretary jong ka VPP u Dr. Cara Chen ha ka jingialang bad ki lad pathai khubor kaba la long ha Conference Hall jong ka MLA Hostel, Shillong.U Dr. Chen u la iathuh ba ka State Election Committee jong ka VPP kaba la long ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai hadien ka jingiathir iatai sani bha ka la mynjur ia ka kyrteng jong u Dr. Ricky A.J“Kum ka seng sainpyrthei, hadien ba ngi la rung sha ka jylli iakhun, la ngi jop ne ngi rem kam da shong eh ha ka jingdon jong ki MLA hynrei ka shong ha ki paidbah ban ai ia ka rai,” la bynrap u Dr. Chen.Haba kylli, Dr. Chen u la ong ba ka VPP kan iaid beit la ka jong ka lynti bad kan ym iatreilang bad kano kano ka seng sainpyrthei namarba ka party ka kwah ban shahniah beit ha ka jingkyrshan jong ki paidbah.U la iathuh ba ka VPP ka la ioh pdiang bun tylli ki aplikeshon bad don ruh kiba la leit iakynduh markhmat dalade hi ia u President ka paty u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit ban pynpaw ka jingangnud jong ki ban iakhun ia ka elekshon MP na ka tiket jong ka VPP. Shuh shuh u la pyntip ba kiba la aplai tiket ki don arngut kiba kynthup ia ka Dr. Bahunlang L. Tron kaba long ka Assistant Professor jong ka PGT College, Shillong bad uwei pat u dei u Prof. Lakhon Kma uba hikai ha NEHU, Shillong.
title: U DR. RICKY AJ SYNGKON KUM U KYRTONG MP NA SHILLONG PARLIAMENTARY CONSTITUENCY

content: Ka Sorkar Meghalaya ha 12 tarik mynta u bnai ka la pynmih ia ka jingpynbna kaba la pyntip ba kito kiba la kynjoh ia ka rta kaba la 70 snem shajrong kin ym lah shuh ban dang iohkam bad ban shah thungkam biang ha ki tnat treikam jong ka Sorkar Jylla khnang ban pynryntih ia ka cut-off age lada don kano kano ka jingaikam lane ka jingthungkam sa shisien pat.“Baroh ki Departments/Agencies jong ka Sorkar Jylla kum ki Society, Corporation kiba don ia ki briew kiba la shah thungkam ne ia kiba la thungkam biang bad kiba la palat 70 snem ka rta dei ban weng noh mardor,” la ong ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih da u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah D.P Wahlang.
title: KHANG KA SORKAR BAN AI KAM BIANG ÏA KIBA LA 70 SNEM SHANENG HA KI TNAT SORKAR

content: Ka Christian Academy School, Shillong kaba la kynjoh mynta sha ka jingiaid lynti kaba la 30 snem kynthih ha ka Sngi Balang ka la pynkum burom ia ki khynnah pule jong ka skul kiba la pass bha ha ka eksamin Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) 2023 bad ha ka eksamin jong ka Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) 2023, Arts, Science bad Commerce ba la pynbna dang shen da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education.Ha kane ka jingpynkup burom kaba la long ha U Soso Tham Auditorium, la pynkup burom kyrpang ia ki lai ngut ki khynnah pule jong kane ka skul kiba wanrah burom ia ka skul da kaba ioh rung ha ka Top 20 jong ka result Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) 2023 kiba kynthup ia ka Sandara Marpna ha ka kyrdan 10 Position, u samla Damelawanbha Khyriem ha ka kyrdan kaba 15 bad ka Sa-i-Nanghunbha Kharlukhi ha ka kyrdan kaba 17.Ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi lang da u Associate Professor jong ka Department of Botany ka Union Christian College u Dr. Jim P. Marak uba la long kum u Kongsan ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u President ka School Managing Committee u Bah Cheiwonstar Kharkrang, ki Pastor, ka Principal jong ka skul ka Kong Fidaline W. Chyne, ki nonghikai lem bad ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah skul.
title: 30 SNEM IAID LYNTI KA CHRISTIAN ACADEMY, PYNKUP BUROM IA KI KHYNNAH SKUL

content: Ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la kyrpad ia ka Sorkar ba kan weng lut pyrshah ia ki mukotduma leh kam bymman ba la rejistar pyrshah ia ki nongialam bad ia ki dkhot khnang ban dup lah ban pyntyllun shakhmat ia ka jingiakren iasuk.Ka Seng ka la rah ia kane ka mat jingdawa ha ka sien shong iakren iasuk kaba baar kaba la long bad ki ksiang ba la thung da ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla.Ha kane ka jingialang, la mihkhmat da u ksiang ba la thung da ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Peter S. Dkhar (Retd IAS) bad u Advisor jong ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) Northeast u A.K. Mishra (Retd IPS), bad hynñiew ngut ki dkhot jong ka seng HNLC ba kynthup ia u Vice Chairman u Bah Manbhalang Jyrwa, u Political Secretary u Bah Aristerwell Thongni, u Foreign Secretary u Bah Phrangkupar Diengdoh bad ki PSO ba kynthup ia u Bah Rymphang Marweiñ, Bah Storgy Lyngdoh, Bah Aiborlem Marbangiang bad u Bah Raymond Lapang.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u ksiang ba la thung da ka HNLC u Bah Sadon K. Blah uba long ruh u President ka HNYF, u la ong, “ngi la iathir iatai mynta ka sngi halor ka jingdonkam ban plie ia ka jingkhang iakren iasuk ka ban tyllun shakhmat bad (ban leh ia kane) ka Sorkar ka dei ban weng lut ia baroh ki jingpynngat mukotduma leh kam bymman pyrshah ia ki nongialam ka HNLC bad ia ki dkhot.”U la ong ba ka seng ka la kyrpad ban map lut ia baroh ki mukotduma ba la mudui pyrshah ia ki nongialam ka seng bad ia ki dkhot da ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla.Ka don tang kawei ka mukotduma ba la rejistar bad ba la pynngat kyndon da ka National Investigation Agency (NIA) pyrshaj ia ki nongialam ka Seng kiba kynthup ia u Chairman u Bah Bobby Marweiñ bad ia u General Secretary-cum-Publicity Secretary u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw.U Bah Sadon u la pyntip ba ki nongmihkhmat na ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) bad ka Sorkar jylla ki la pynpaw ba kane ka kam kan shimpor la kumno kumno shitaiew ia ka sorkar ban pyrkhat khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka jingmap ei ia baroh ki mukotduma.U la pyntip ba ha kane ka jingiakren ki lai liang mamla, ka Sorkar ka la tyrwa ia ki katto katne ki jingai jingmut.  “Mynta ka sngi, ngin sa shong jingialang ban iakren halor ki jingtyrwa ba ngi la ioh na ki bor Sorkar bad shen ngin shong ia ka jingialang ban shim ia ka rai bad hadien kata ngin saphah jingtip sha ki bad ma ki ruh kin sa ai jingpyntip sha ngi,” la bynrap u Bah Sadon.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka HNLC kam pat warnah ia ki Political Agenda sha ka miet jingiakren u Bah Sadon u la ong, “kane ka dei namarba ngi dang ap nyngkong eh ia ka jingkhang ba kan plie shwa ba ngin pyntyllun shakhmat ia ki political agenda ki bym lah ban shu pyndep noh tang hapoh shisngi ne ar sngi.  Haba nga ong ia ka jingkhang kaba dang donkam ia ka jingiakren halor ka political agenda ka long ba baroh ar tylli ki sorkar ki dei ban pdiang ia ka jingmap ei ia ki jingpynngat kam bymman bad ban weng lut ia baroh ki mukotduma la ha kano kano ruh ka dur kaba ki lah ban leh na ka liang jong ki khnang ba ngin dup lah ban iaid shakhmat.
title: KUBUR KA MHA BAN BISHAR ÏA KA JINGDAWA BAN MAP NOH ÏA KI MUKOTDUMA KA HNLC

content: Ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka thaiñ Umkyllaiñ kaba don kham harum ka sor Nongstoiñ ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ki la lap ia kawei ka metiap kaba la per ha ka jaka pynlang um ne ka check dam kaba don ha ka wah Umkyllaiñ kaba hap hapoh ka shnong Urkali West Khasi Hills District.Mar mar ki paidbah ki la pyntip ia kane ka jingjia sha ki nongïalam jong ka shnong Urkali kaba la pyntip noh sha ki pulit jong ka Nongstoiñ Police Station kiba la leit ban pyndep ia ki jingdonkam katkum ka ain.Ka thymmei khubor ba la iohlum na ki Pulit ka la iathuh hadien ba la peit bniah ia kane ka metiap la lap ba ka dei jong uwei u rangbah uba la phet na Civil Hospital Nongstoiñ ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Starsis Langrin, uba la 34 snem ka rta na ka shnong Shallang Sohbar, West Khasi Hills.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ha ka 21 tarik u Jylliew 2023, ha ka por kumba 9:30 baje mynmiet une u rangbah u la phet na Civil Hospital Nongstoiñ hadien ba la wan buh ia u da ki bahaiing ban phah sumar.Ki Pulit ki la pyntip ba la leh ruh ka Post Mortem ban lap ia ka daw halor ka jingiap jong une u rangbah ha katei ka jaka.
title: LAP METIAP NA WAH UMKYLLAIN, DEI U RANGBAH BA PHET NA CIVIL HOSPITAL NONGSTOIÑ

content: Uwei u samla ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Jeffreywell Pohdweng u la mynsaw na ki bynta jong ka khlieh hadien ba arngut ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) ba la kynnoh ba ki la buaid khawiang, ki la kawut lathi ia u bad ia ki lai ngut ki paralok jong u ha ka miet sngi U Blei ka 25 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 ha Lad Umsyiem.  Ia ki lai ngut la tip kyrteng kum u Bajop Surong, uba la 25 snem ka rta, u Wanborlang Sumer uba la 18 snem ka rta bad u Charly Mukhim uba la 14 snem ka rta.Ka kynhun lum khubor jong ka Batesi TV tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ka la hiar sha ka shnong Umsyiem ban tih bniah ia ka daw kaba la pynlong ia ki shipai BSF ban bom dusmon ia ki nongleit nongwan kiba thmu ban leit sha Dawki.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong kine ki saw ngut, ki shipai BSF ki la pynthut ia ki briew kiba thmu ban leit sha Dawki bad dei na kane ka daw ba ka la mih ka jingiahylla jong ki riew paidbah ia ki BSF. Kham katto katne por, ki paidbah ki la nang ialum lymbung ha surok bad tur sha ka ktem sah jong ki shipai BSF kaba don hajan Umsyiem.Dei ha kum kane ka por ba ki shipai BSF ki la pyntieng ia ki paidbah da kaba siat bun kuli sha suin.  La iathuh ruh ba ki paidbah kiba dap da ka jingbitar ia ka jingpynibor jong ki shipai BSF ia ki trai shnong ki la kawang da ki maw ia ka ktem jong ki shipai BSF.Ka Khasi Student Union hapoh ka jingialam jong u President u samla Lambokstarwell Marngar tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ki la hiar mar mar ban iakynduh ia ki saw ngut ki samla kiba la shah kawut lathi ha ki shipai BSF.
title: SIAT KULI SHA SUIÑ KI BSF BA MIH KA JINGÏAKYNAD BAD KI PAIDBAH HA LAD UMSYIEM

content: Ka Ingdorbar Thawain jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous  District Council ha ka Sngi Saitjaiñ ka la mynjur da ka Official Resolution ban phah ka jingthoh sha ka National Law Commission kum shi bynta ban pyrshah ia ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar National Democratic Alliance (NDA) ba la ialam da ka seng Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ban pyntreikam noh ia ka aiñ Uniform Civil Code (UCC) ha ka ri India baroh kawei.U Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous  District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid  Sing Syiem haba wanrah ia kane ka mat hapoh ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka u la ong ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ban pyntreikam noh ia ka Uniform Civil Code ha ka ri India, kan ktah bad kan pynduh pyndam ia ki riti ki dustur, ki ain tynrai, ka ain shongkha shongman, bad ka hok ban mane Blei laitluid.Ha ka jingiatai halor kane ka mat, la iashim bynta da u Nongialam ka Liang Pyrshah u Bah Titostarwell Chyne, u MDC shusieh Bah Bindo M. Lanong bad u Deputy Chief Executive Member u Bah Pynshngain N. Syiem.
title: PYRSHAH KA KHADC ÏA KA UNIFORM CIVIL CODE, YN THOH SHA KA NATIONAL LAW COMMISSION

content: Ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan thung da ka jingtohkit halor ki jingleh donbor jong ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) katkum ka “Commissions of Inquiry Central Act” bad ruh ban weng noh ia ki shipai BSF na ki jaka paidbah bad ban pynthikna ba kin don tang ha u Zero line jong ka khappud jong ka ri.“Ka jingjia ha Lad Umsyiem ha kaba ki shipai BSF ki la bom lathi bad pynmynsaw ia ki paidbah wat haduh ban da siat kuli sha suiñ ha ka 25 tarik u Jylliew 2023 kam dei shuh ka sien ka banyngkong ha kaba ngi la sakhi ia ka jingleh donbor jong ki BSF. Dang ha ki khyndiat sngi la don ki riew paidbah ba la shah siat iap ha ki shipai BSF. Lada ka Sorkar Jylla kan dang iai leh jem halor ka jingleh donbor jong ki shipai BSF kin dang don ki ban dang duh ei ia la ka jingim,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Working President ka KHNAM u Bah Thomas Passah.“Ka dei ka kamram jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban peit ia ka shongsuk shongsiañ ha ka jylla bad ki shipai BSF kim lah ban tam ia u pud lane ban knieh ia ka iktiar jong ka Sorkar Jylla. Kane ka jingleh jong ki shipai BSF ka pynpaw ia ka jingbymkheiñ snep jong ki ia ka ikitar jong ki bor synshar district bad ia ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka long kaba beaiñ, bad ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei ban mudui da ka ejahar pyrshah ia ki shipai BSF katkum ka Section 147, 148, 323, 353, 427 jong ka Indian Penal Code (IPC),” la bynrap u kyrwoh.“Ha ka 10 tarik, Naitung, 1987 ka Sorkar Jylla ka la thung da ka Inquiry Commission halor ka jingpynklumar bad ka jingbom lathi bad ka jingsiat pathar jong ki shipai BSF ha Baghmara.  Te lada ka don ka jingthombor da ki shipai BSF ha ki thaiñ Khasi ruh ka Sorkar ka dei ban shim ia ki juh ki sienjam ym ban leh shilliang,” la dawa ka KHNAM.
title: DAWA THUNG JINGTOHKIT KA KHNAM BA LEH DONBOR KI BSF ÏA KI PAIDBAH HA UMSYIEM

content: Ka jingpynmih jong ka Commissioner of Food Safety, Meghalaya ka Kong RM Kurbah ia ka jingpynbna ha ka 24 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 ba la weng noh ia ka jingkhang ban wanrah ia ki dohkha nabar ka jylla ka la pynkmen haduh katta katta ia ki nongdie bad ki nongkhaii dohkha kiba don hapoh ka lama jong ka Khasi Jaiñtia Fish Wholesaler and Retailer Association kiba ju im kamai jakpoh manla ka sngi ha basa die dohkha ha Iewduh.Hynrei hapdeng kane ka jingkmen, ki nongdie bad ki nongkhaii dohkha ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew bynñiaw na ka jingbym ai kaiphod mardor jong ka tnat Fisheries wat hadien ba ladep leh test ia ki dohkha kiba wanrah nabar ka jylla khnang ban pynthikna ba kim dei satia kiba la injek da ka dawai Formalin.Ia ki dohkha ba wanrah nabar jylla la leh test da ki Ophisar na ka tnat Fisheries ha khlieh Iewduh ha ka sngi Baar.Uwei na ki nongialam jong ka Khasi Jaiñtia Fish Wholesaler and Retailer Association u Bah C.W. Wankhar ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ki ophisar ka tnat Fisheries ki la pyntip ba kin sa ai ia ka kaiphod ba ladep leh test kham hadien sha ki nongkhaii bad ki nongkhaii kiba ju thied ia ki dohkha kiba wan nabar ka jylla kin sa leh ia kaba donkam ynda ki la iohpdiang ia ki kyndon na kane ka tnat.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Bah Wankhar, ki dohkha ba la leh test ki dei kiba wanrah na Andhra Pradesh bad ia kiwei kiwei ruh ki dohkha ba la wanrah nabar ka jylla.“Lada ka slem palat ka jingai kaiphod, ka dohkha kaba la wanrah nabar ka jylla ngin hap ban pynphai noh bad ngim lah ban ap sah haduh ar ne lai sngi ban shu buh sah ia ka dohkha,” u la ong.“Ka jingkwah jong ngi ka long ba kin (tnat Fisheries) leh test mynta bad kin ai noh ia ka kaphod mynta hi. Shisien ki la leh kumta bad ha ka sien kaba ar ngim tip shuh katno sngi ka shimpor ban ai ia ka kaiphod,” la bynrap u Bah Wankhar.Ki nongdie dohkha ki la ong ruh ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban sngewthuh ia ka jingeh jong ki nongdie bad ki nongkhaii dohkha namarba ban pynslem ia ka kaiphod ba ladep leh test kan buh jingeh ia ki.“Dei ban leh test beit hangto hangto kumba leh ka Food Safety khnang ba ngin ym duhnong,” la kyrpad ki nongdie dohkha.Ki la pynpaw ruh ba ka jingpynmih jingpynbna da ka Commissioner of Food Safety ka shu long kynsan bad khlem da kdew la yn leh test manla ka sngi lane yn leh shisien lano.
title: SAH UMDUM KI NONGDIE DOHKHA BYM AI KAIPHOD KA TNAT FISHERIES ÏA KI DOHKHA BA LADEP TEST

content: Saw ngut ki briew ki la mynsaw jur na ka jingpom jong u pyrthat ia kawei ka ing trep ha ka shnong Umsohlait, Ribhoi District bad kane ka la jia ha ka lah sngi U Blei katba u slap u dang jur bha ha ka por kumba 2 baje nohphai sngi.Ha kane ka jingjia, baroh ki jingdon jingem hapoh kane ka ing bad kynthup ruh ia ki mar rep jong ka Kong Christina Mynsong ki la ingkhong lut ploiñ.Ka Kong Christina Mynsong ha ka jingiakynduh bad ka Batesi Tv ka la iathuh ba ki saw ngut kiba la mynsaw ha kane ka jingpom u pyrkhat ia ka ingtrep jong ka, ki kynthup ia u khun jong ka uba la 11 snem ka rta ryngkat bad iwei i khunlung ba dang 4 snem ka rta bad uwei pat uba la 30 snem ka rta.  Ha kane kajuh ka jingjia, u para kynsi jong ka ruh uba la 20 snem uba don ha ing ha kane ka por u la ngat lang ha ka jingmynsaw na kane ka jingpom u pyrthat ia kane ka iing.Ia u khun jong ka Christina Mynsong uba la 11 snem la pynkit sha Nazareth Hospital, Shillong ban ioh jingsumar, katba lai ngut kiwei pat ki dang don mynta hapdeng ka jingshah sumar ha Civil Hospital, Shillong.Ka Kong Christina ka la kren bynñiaw halor kane ka jingduh noh ia la ka jong iing ka sem bad ia ki mar ki mata bad ki mar rep kiba don hapoh ka iing ha kane ka jingjia.Ka la iathuh ba tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ka la leit mareh bran bran sha la ing hynrei tang shu iohi ba ka ing ba ka la kem ding bad ingkhong lut ka la kyllon ha madan hapdeng ka jingkem tlot.“Tang shu iohi ba ka ïing ka la kem ding nga la pyrkhat nyngkong eh ia u khun tip kan jia aiu. Hynrei donbok ba nga dang iohi biang ia u khun wat hapdeng ka jingmynsaw,” ka la ong bad bynrap, “dei ka jingiarap jong ki para shnong ba la lah ban pynkit ia kiba mynsaw shane sha Shillong.”Ka la iathuh ruh ba ka don pisa ha lade tang T.1200 ban siew ia ka bai Ambulance bad ong ruh ba kam tip shuh kumno kan leh nangne shahkhmat namarba kam don pisa wat tang shi naïa ha pla ban siew ia ka bai sumar jong u khun hapoh Hospital.“Nga shahniah beit tang ha U Blei ba Un pyniaid ia ka jingim jong nga,” ka la ong.
title: INGKHONG KA ÏING TREP NABA POM U PYRTHAT HA UMSOHLAIT, MYNSAW JUR SAW NGUT

content: Shillong, Jylliew 27: Ha ka 24 tarik u Jylliew 2023 , ka Synjuk ki Seng Samla Shnong (SSSS) ka la jied ia ki nongkitkam ba thymmai jong ka kiba hap hapoh ka Shillong City. Ia ka jingialang jied nongkitkam la pyniaid da u President jong ka Central Body u Bah Vanshan Buhphang ryngkat u General Secretary u Bah Ricky Pathaw. Ha kane ka sngi la batai lyngkot ruh shaphang ki mat treikam jong katei ka seng da u Chairman ka South West Khasi Hills u Bah Wallambok Syiemiong. Ka jingialang ka la long ha Lamavilla Community Hall.Ki nongkitkam ba thymmai jong ka SSSS Shillong City ki kynthup ia u Bah Pynshaibok Diengdoh kum u Chairman, u Bah Symper Ryntathiang kum u Working Chairman, u Bah Samuel Biam kum u Vice Chairman, u Bah Vivian R Kharkongor kum u General Secretary, u Bah Khraw Mynsong kum u Assistant Secretary lem bad kiwei pat ki nongkitkam kumjuh ruh ki Executive Member.
title: JIED NONGKITKAM THYMMAI KA SSSS SHILLONG CITY

content: Da ki spah ngut ki dkhot jong ka Hynniewtrep Youths Council ha ka sngi balang ki la rah da ki plakad ha phyllaw jong ka State Convention Centre ban pyrshah ia ka Meghalaya Tourism Development Corporation Limited, kaba la pynjlan ia ka jingthungkam sa hynriew bnai ia u Puranjan Das kum u Chief General Manager jong ka Meghalaya Tourism Development Corporation Limited hadien ba u la shongthait na ka kam.Ka seng ka la pynlong ia kane ka jingiakhih shwa ban sdang ka Board Meeting jong ka Meghalaya Tourism Development Corporation Limited ha State Convention Centre.Na ka liang jong u Chairman ka Meghalaya Tourism Development Corporation Limited u Bah Sanbor Shullai bad u Managing Director u Bah Cyril V. Diengdoh kiba la khot iakren ia ki nongialam ka seng ki la pynpaw ba ka jingpynjlan ia ka jingshakri jong u Puranjan Das kum u Chief General Manager jong ka Meghalaya Tourism Development Corporation Limited ka dei namarba ka dang don ka Model Code of Conduct.U General Secretary ka HYC u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ka seng kan ap tad haduh u bnai Nailar, 2023 ba ka Meghalaya Tourism Development Corporation Limited kan khot noh da ka Advertisement na ka bynta ka post u Chief General Manager kumba la kular da u Chairman jong ka Meghalaya Tourism Development Corporation Limited hynrei lada kane ka tnat treikam jong ka Sorkar kam kheinkor ia ki jingkular ka seng kam banse ban pynlong da ki jingiakhih kiba tyngeh.
title: HADUH U NAILAR, 2023 AIPOR KA HYC ÏA KA MTDC BAN SANGEH AIKAM ÏA U PURANJAN DAS

content: Ki nongialam jong ka Meghalaya Asha Workers Union ha ka sngi Balang ka la aiti da ka jingthoh ha ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ban dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan kyntiew noh ia ka jingsiew Honorarium kaba tang ar hajar shi bnai.Ka President jong ka MAWU ka Kong Mira June Myrsing ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ka la ong ba ka Union ka la dawa ruh ia ka Sorkar ban ai jingsumar ei ia ki Asha la ka long na ka MHIS lane na kano kano ka skhim ba ka Sorkar  ka lah ban ai. Ha kajuh ka por ka Union ka la dawa ia ka sorkar ban thaw da ka rule kaban iada ia ki Asha na ka jingshah wengkam khlem kano kano ka daw kaba biang.
title: DAWA KA MAWU ÏA KA SORKAR BAN KYNTIEW ÏA KA JINGSIEW JONG KI ASHA

content: Ka Indian National Congress (INC) ka la kam ba ka jingkhyllem jogn ka Executive Committee ba la ialam da ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ha Khasi Hills Autonomous  District Council (KHADC) ka dei ka jingiashrut hi hapdeng National People’s Party (NPP) bad ka United Democratic Party (UDP).U President jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) u Bah Vincent H. Pala ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi balang u la ong ba ka jingai jingkyrshan jong ka seng Congress ia ka NPP ban ialam ia ka Executive Committee kaba thymmai ha Khasi Hills Autonomous  District Council (KHADC) ka dei na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki paidbah khamtam eh ha kaba pynneh pynsah ia ka khyndew ka shyiap, ka riti ka dustur.Nalorkata, u la ong shuh shuh ba kane ka jingai jingkyrshan ia ka NPP ka dei halor ka nongrim ba ka Sorkar BJP ka la thmu ban wanrah ia ka Amendment Bill jong ka Khyrnit Bahynriew  ha Parliament.“Shwa ban rah ha Parliament donkam ia ka jingai jingmut na ki Autonomous District Council (ADC) bad na ka Sorkar Jylla.  Dei na kane ka daw kaba pynlong ia ka Congress ban ai jingkyrshan ia ka NPP khnang ban dup lah ban iada ia ka jingpyntlot bor ia ka Khyrnit Bahynriew,” u la bynrap.
title: KA JINGKHYLLEM KA EC HA KHADC DEI KA JINGÏASHRUT KA NPP-UDP : VINCENT PALA

content: Mairang, Jylliew 21 : Ha kawei naki jingjia kaba sngewsynei 5 ngut ki briew na kajuh ka ing kynthup ia lai ngut ki khun, ka kmie bad u kpa kila Kem pang bad poi sha Hospital tang namar ba ki la kum bam ia u tit uba kim ithuh.Kane ka la jia mynta ka sngi ka 21 tarik u Jylliew 2023 haka shnong Wahliewlong, ka shnong kaba hap ha Mawthadraishan Constituency bad katkum ka jingiathuh u Admitstar Marwein u kpa jong ki lai ngut ki khun uba la kem pang naka jingbam tit u la ong ba ka kurim jong u ka Kong Delphina Pariong kala leit kheit ia u tit hynnin ka sngi ka 20 tarik u Jylliew 2023 bad kala shet pat hynne mynstep. U Bah Marwein ula iathuh ba hadien ba kila dep bam ia une u tit ba la shetlang bad u phan kila sdang ban Suh, Prie bad kieng ka khlieh bad kumta la rah noh ia ki baroh san ngut sha Pariong PHC ban ioh ia ka jingsumar hynrei kham hadien la pynkynriah noh ia ki sha Tirot Sing Memorial Civil Hospital, Sangshong, Mairang ban ioh ia ka jingsumar kaba kham paka.U Bah Marwein u la iathuh ruh ba kaba la pynlong ia ka kurim jong u ban shet ia une u tit bym ithuh kadei hadien ba kala dep ban bam im shwa ia u bad namar ba um don jingktah eiei kala shet jyntah hynrei khlem poi pyrkhat pat ba kin kem pang bad ula iathuh ba mynta ba kila don ha ka jaka ai jingsumar ma u bad 3 ngut ki khun kila iohbor katba ka kurim jong u ka dang tlot.
title: NAKA JINGBAM IA U TIT BYM ITHUH KEM PANG & POI HOSPITAL 5 NGUT NA WAHLIEWLONG, MAWTHADRAISHAN

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisastion (HITO) ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha u Assistant Director jong ka tnat Programme Implementation & Evaluation, 3Secretariat Nokrek Building, Lower Lachaumiere, Shillong ban dawa ba dei ban pynsangeh mardor ka jingthungkam Peon ia kawei ka thei Garo kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Jenny. G. Momin halor ka nongrim ba kane ka jingthungkam ka dei kaba shu leh be-aiñ khlem da pynbna paidbah ia ka jinglait thylli jong ka kam bad ruh ka jingiaid lait ia ki kyndon thungkam.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President jong ka HITO u Bah Donbok Dkhar u la kynnoh ba kane ka jingthmu thungkam ia kane ka thei Garo ka dei lyngba ka jingbthah da ka shithi kaba la thoh da u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla u Marcuise N. Marak sha u Director jong ka tnat Programme Implementation & Evaluation, 3Secretariat Nokrek Building, Shillong ha ka 18 tarik, Jymmang, 2023 da ka kdew ia ka nongrim ba kane ka thei Garo ka dei kaba wan na ka longing kaba duk bad kaba dei tang ma ka, kaba kit lyngkor ia ka ing ka sem baroh kawei hadien ba ka jingkhladnoh jong ka kmie ha u snem 2021.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka seng ka la dawa ia kane ka tnat treikam ba kam dei satia ban thungkam ia ka Jenny G. Momin ha ka kam Peon hynrei kane ka tnat ka dei ban iaid katkum ki kyndon thungkam.U Bah Donbok Dkhar u la byrngem ruh lada kane ka tnat treikam jong ka Sorkar kam sngap ia kane ka jingdawa, ka seng kam banse ban leit ujor sha Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court.“Ngim don jingwit eiei ia ka nongaplai kam hynrei ka ladei ban iaid da ka lynti kaba dei. Ban shu leh sopsop tang namarba ki don jingithuh ngim sngew iahap satia,” la ong u Bah Donbok Dkhar.“Ha ka shithi ba la thoh da u Marcuise N. Marak la pynpaw ba (ka Jenny G. Momin) ka wan na ka longing kaba duk, hynrei, ym tang ma ka, da ki hajar ngut ki longing kiba duk. Lada aikam ia kane kawei, ia kiwei ruh dei ban ai lang kumjuh,” ula ong.U la iathuh ba ka seng ka la dawa ba dei ban pynbna ia ka jinglait kam da kaba khot Advertisement bad ban pynlong ruh da ka eksamin thungkam katkum ka lynti jong ka aiñ.Haba kynthoh ia u Marcuise N. Marak uba pyndonkam bakla ia ka iktiar kum u Myntri Sorkar, u Bah Donbok Dkhar u la ong, “kane ka jingleh ka dei kaba long be-aiñ bad ngi kwah ban pan jingpynshai na ka Sorkar ba balei une u Myntri Sorkar u leh donbor kumne wat haba u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad Kongkal Sangma u ladep ong ba ka thungkam thungjam ka dei ban long kaba khuid ba suba hynrei balei ka dang jia sa kumne.”“Ngin sa peitkai ia ka National Peoples Youth Front (NPYF) kaba dei ka shnat treikam ki Samla jong ka National Peoples Party (NPP) la ka nud neem ban kynthoh pyrshah ia u Myntri Sorkar lajong lane ia ki MLA jong ki halor kine kam leh sop sop,” la kynthoh u Bah Donbok Dkhar.“Ngin pyrshah beit ia ka bamsap bad ai ba uba dei hok ban ioh u dei ban ioh,” u la bynrap.
title: KYNDANG KA HITO HA 3RD SECRETARIAT BA PHAH THUNGKAM U MYNTRI SORKAR ÏA KA THEI GARO

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla kaba la shong ia ka jingialang pyrkhat kam lane ka Review Meeting halor ka jingkhyllem jong ka kynroh ha PA Sangma Stadium, Tura ha ka step sngi palei ka la lap ba kane ka jingjia ka dei na ka jingsahkut jong ka nala um kaba don marsyndah bad kane ka kynroh.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha u kyrwoh video ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi thohdieng u la iathuh ba katkum ka kaiphod tohkit ba la aiti da ki Engineer bad u Contractor ki la pyntip ba ka jingsahkut jong ki synrum jaboh hapoh ka nala ka dei namar ka jingshna ia ka Indoor Stadium kaba la mang pisa T. 70 klur eiei.“Ki don ar tylli ki bynta jong ka jingshna ia ka Stadium, kawei ka bynta ka dei ka jingshna ia ka madan ialehkai phutbol kaba la mang pisa kumba T. 50 klur kaba ladep ba la jia ka jingtwa ka kynroh.  Kawei pat ka bynta kaba ar jong ka Stadium ka dei ka jingshna ia ka Indoor Stadium ba la mang pisa T.70 klur eiei. Ka jingtrei ka la sdang bad ka la iaid shakhmat. Dei na ka jingshna ia ka Indoor Stadium ba ka nala ka la sahkut da ki synrum kaba la pynlong ia ka um ban ym lait shabar kat haduh ba ka kynroh ka la twa,” ong u Myntri Rangbah“Ka kynroh, ha ka jingtohkit, ba la bud na ka Drawing la shna katkum ka jingdonkam ba ladep buhdak,” u la ong.U la iathuh ruh khnang ban iada ia ki High Mast lane ki jingpynthaba jingshai hapoh ka madan ialehkai phutbol ki bym shym la ngat satia ha ka jingjulor la pynhiar noh khyndiat khnang ban iada na kano kano ka jingjulor kaba lah ban jia ha ki sngi ki ban sa wan.Na ka liang jong ka Sorkar ka la thung ruh da ka jingtohkit Majistor lane ka Magisterial Enquiry halor ka jingtwa jong kane ka kynroh.
title: DEI KA JINGSAHKUT KA UM HA NALA KABA PYNKHYLLEM ÏA KA KYNROH KA P.A. SANGMA STADIUM

content: Shillong Jylliew 23 : Ka Kong Phidalia Toi ka la pyntip ba kan sa iehnoh ia ka kam Chairperson jong ka Meghalaya State Commission for Women (MSCW) hadien ba ka la mih ka jingiashrut bad u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Paul Lyngdoh.Ha ka jingiakren bad ka Batesi Tv ha ka sngi thohdieng ka Kong Phidalia Toi, ka la iathuh ba ka la ioh jingtip halor ka jingshah weng jong ka na ka shuki Chairperson jong ka Meghalaya State Commission for Women (MSCW) tang na ki lad pathai khubor bad hadien ar tylli ki kyrwoh khubor ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka Sorkar ka la pan jingpynshai na ka lyngba ka Show Cause Notice.Ka la ong, tang hadien ba ka la phah ia ka jingpynshai sha ka Sorkar, hadien katto katne por kan sa iehnoh ia kane ka shuki da kaba iasyllok shwa bad ka nongsaid-aiñ jong ka.“Hadien ba ka Commission ka la phah ia ka jingpynshai, u (Bah Paul Lyngdoh) u dang iai leh kuman da kaba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ia ka bymshisha.“Ngam kwah shuh ban iatrei lang ha kum kane ka kynrum kynram namarba kane ka jingiashrut kan wanrah tang ia ka jingbymsngewtynnat bad nga ngeit ba kan jin da la bha ba ngan mih noh na ka bynta ka jingbha jong ka Commission bad ka bha ka miat jong ki kynthei.  Ngan hap ban resaiñ bad ngan hap ban shim ia ka rai kumno ban leh ynda nga la iasyllok shwa bad ki Muktiar jong nga,” la ong ka Kong Phidalia Toi.Haba kynnoh ba u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la pyndonkam bakla ia ka itkiar kum u Myntri Sorkar, ka Kong Phidalia Toi ka la ong, “peit kaei kaba u Myntri u la leh nga tharai ba ka dei jingpyndonkam bakla ia ka iktiar bad nga shim ia kane kum ka jingpyniapher, ka jingñiew shiliang bad ngan sa peit kaei kaba ngan sa leh hadien kane.”
title: YN RESAIÑ NOH KA KONG PHIDALIA TOI KUM KA CHAIRPERSON JONG KA MSCW

content: Ka Khasi Hills Democratic Front hapoh ka jingialam jong u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem kum u Chief Executive Member kaba dang shu shimti ia ka Executive Committee kaba thymmai hapoh ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ka la rai ban pynlong biang ia ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka jong ka Council ka ban sdang naduh ka 24 tarik haduh ka 28 tarik u Jylliew, 2023.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Thohdieng u Bah Pyniaid u la ong ba ha kane ka dorbar yn sa wanrah ruh ia ka Rule kaba la tip kum ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council Service Amendment Rules 2023 ban pynbeit thymmai ia ka rta rungkam jong kino kino ki nongthepkam ka ban long beit 37 kumba leh da ka Sorkar Jylla.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ba ka Executive Committee kan wanrah ruh ia ka jingpynbeit thymmai ba nyngkong eh ha Khasi Hills Automous District (Protection of Khasi Traditional Medicine) 2023 bad ia ka Bill kaba iadei bad ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Members Pension Bill kaba dei ka Repeal Bill, 2023 ka Executive Committee ka la rai ban pynsangeh shwa shipor ban bishar bniah bin pa bin da ka Select Committee.U la pyntip ruh ba ka Executive Committee jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ka la shim ia ka rai ban pan jaka na ka Sorkar Jylla ha New Shillong na ka bynta ban pynkynriah noh ia ka ophis treikam jong ka District Council na ka jaka treikam kaba don mynta.“Kumba ka long mynta kane ka jaka treikam ka la khapngiah shaba bha bad ka la pynwit bha ia ka jingtreikam jong kiba bun.
