Kumba phi tip ka KHADC ka don lai tylli shnat treikam ba kynthup ia ka Executive, ka Legislative bad ka Judiciary,” u la ong.U la iathuh ba kane ka jingthmu ban pan jaka na ka Sorkar ha New Shillong ka long ban pynsuk ia ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan hadien habud.Ka Executive Committee ka la rai ban bteng ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Trading by Non-Tribal Regulation Act ban khynra ia ki bar jylla kiba wan khaii hapoh u pud u sam jong ka KHADC, la ka long ia ki nongkhaii kiba rit ne kiba heh bad ki bym don ia ka Trading License yn shu phah khang lut ia ki jingtreikam jong ki.“Kane ka EC kan long kaba pyrkhing bha ia ki jingkhynra ia ki bar jylla kiba wan leh ia ki kam khaii pateng ki bym don ia ki kot ki sla kiba biang bad ki bym burom ia ka Council ban pan ia ki laisen,” u la bynrap.
title: YN KYNTIEW KA KHADC ÏA KA RTA APLAI KAM HADUH 37 SNEM KA RTA

content: Ka Executive Committee ba la ialam da ka Khasi Hills Democratic Front ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka la shim ia ka rai ban shimkhia bha ia ka jingeh jong ki paidbah ha khappud kiba iakynduh jingeh na ka jingiakajia pud hapdeng ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ka Jylla Assam kiba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka KHADC.Ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Assam ki la pyndep ia ka jingiapynbeit pud ha ka wat kaba nyngkong bad mynta ka kynti la pynsdang sa ia ka wat kaba ar hadien ba la thaw biang ia ki Regional Committee ban iapynbeit sa ia ki hynriew tylli ki jaka kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingiakajia pud.“Na ka liang jong ngi, tang shu dep ka Dorbar Mang Tyngka ngi don ka jingthmu ban leit jngoh ia kito ki shnong kiba shah pynwit ha ka leit ka wan, kiba shah pynthud ha ka leit rep leit riang, ka kam khaii bad kiwei kiwei bad kiba shah pynthud ha ki kam pynroi,” u la ong.“Khnang ban tip ia ki bor kiba wan pynthud, tad ynda la iakynduh ia ki nongshong shnong ngin sa ioh jingshai namarba haduh mynta ngim pat ioh jingshai bha,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ha ka sngi ba la jied ia u CEM ba thymmai, ngi la ong ba daleilei ruh em kane ka EC ba thymmai kan ym ailad ia ka Sorkar Assam lyngba ki bor synshar district ba kin pynwit bad ba kin pynshongsyier ia ki paidbah ha khappud.”“Nga kwah ban phah ia u kyrwoh uba shai sha ki paidbah ha khappud ba kane ka EC bathymmai kan long ka jingshngain na ka bynta jong ki.  Baroh ngi don ka jingsngewkhia ia kane ka kam bad ngin nym ieh ia ki briew kiba sah ha khappud kiba iakynduh ia ki jingeh,” la ai mynsiem u Bah Pyniaid ia ki paidbah kiba sah ha ki shnong khappud.
title: RAI KA KHADC BAN SHIMKHIA BHA ÏA KA JINGEH KI PAIDBAH HA KHAPPUD MEGH-ASSAM

content: Ka Regional Committee na ka bynta ka Ribhoi District ia kaba la khlieh da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah Bah Prestone Tynsong kum u Chairman ka la rai ban iakynduh bad ka Regional Committee na ka jylla Assam ha u bnai Naitung, 2023 ban iathir iatai sani ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynbeit ia ki jaka kiba don hapdeng ka jingiakajia pud ha khappud ka Jylla Assam bad ka them Ribhoi, kaba dang hap hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u la ong ba ka jingialang kan iakren ia ki shnong kiba don ha ka jingiakajia pud, kata, ha ka shnong Deshdomrea, Borduar, Nongwah-Mawtamur bad ha ka thain Block-2.Haba kylli, u Bah Prestone u la iathuh ba ki kyndon iakren jong ka Regional Committee ki dei hi kijuh kumba la long ha ka jingiakren pynbeit pud ha ka wat kaba nyngkong.“Ngi la iakren ruh halor ka jingdawa jong ki paidbah jong ka thain Block-2 ban pynphai noh ia ki jaka sha ka Jylla Meghalaya.  Ngi don ia ki dulir bad ngin sa iakren,” u la ong.U la ong ruh ba ka jingkylli halor ka jingmih ki jingiakajia pud ha ka thaiñ Block-1 bad Block-2 kam don satia hynrei ka jingdawa ka long ban pynioh biang ia kine ki jaka katkum ka Notification ba la pynmih ha u snem 1951 ba la pynmih da ka Sorkar Assam.“Ka jingiakren jong ngi ia ka Block-1 bad Block-2 ka long ba kin (Sorkar Assam) pynphai biang sha ka Jylla Meghalaya khamtam ia ki shnong kiba kham bun ki nongshong shnong ki dei ki doh ki snam jong ngi,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Prestone.
title: HA U NAITUNG, YN SHONG JINGIALANG KA RC NA MEGH-ASSAM BAN ÏAPYNBEIT PUD

content: Ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi U Blei ka la pynshai ba ki dawai ba la bret ha Marten ha ka 29 tarik u bnai baladep ki dei kiba la kut por na ka daw ka jingbym ïoh ban pyndonkam na ka jingwan lynshop ka khlam jingpang COVID-19.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da ka Director of Health Services (MI) ka la ong ba kine ki dawai ba la bret ha Marten, Mawïong, Shillong ki dei kiba la sniew.Ïa kine ki dawai la pan katkum ka jingdawa jong ki district bapher bapher bad ki jaka sumar kiba don kylleng ka jylla.Kine ki dawai ki dei kiba ïoh bad sam sha ki jaka sumar kiba don ha ki District.Ïa ki dawai ba la ïoh la buh ha Central Medica Store khnang ban sam haba don ki jingdawa ba kyrkieh.Hynrei na ka daw ka jingwan lynshop jong ka jingpang khlam COVID-19, kine ki dawai la sahkut ha Central Medical Store bad kam shym la don shuh kano kano ka jingdawa.“Ki dawai ki dei kiba la sniew na ka daw ka jingbym lah ban pyndonkam na ka jingwan lynshop ka jingpang khlam COVID-19.  Ïa ki dawai kiba la sniew la donkam ban bret noh khnang ban pynkylluid ïa ka jaka buh dawai kaba wanrah ïa ka jingkhapngiah ynda la wanrah ban buh ïa ki dawai kiba thymmai,” la ong u kyrwoh na ka DHS (MI).Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, u Pharmacist in-charge jong ka Central Medical Store Directorate Health Services (MI) u la pyntip  lyngba ka shithi kaba dated May 27, 2023 ba la donkam ban bret noh mardor ïa ki dawai ba la sniew, ong u kyrwoh. Ïa ka kyrteng jong ki dawai ba la sniew la mynjur da ki bor ba dei peit.U Assistant Drugs Controller, Directorate of Health Services (MI) lyngba ka shithi kaba dated June 19, 2023 u la pyntip sha u Pharmacist in-charge jong ka Central Medicine Store ban bret noh ïa ki dawai kiba la sniew da ka jingaibor jong ki bor ba halor, la bynrap u kyrwoh.U Pharmacist in-charge u la pyntip sha ki bor ba dei peit ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingbret noh ïa ki dawai ba la sniew ïa kaba la sdang naduh ka 29 tarik Jylliew, 2023, ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.Ha ka 29 tarik, Jylliew, 2023 da ki lak tylli ki dawai ba la sniew kiba kot da ki klur tyngka la theh sha jaka theh ñiut ha Marten. Ka jingbret ïa ki dawai kiba la sniew ka la paw pyrthei hadien ba ki nongïalam jong ka Meghalaya Awaken Council Citizens (MACC) ki la buddien ïa ki kali jong ka Shillong Munipal Board (SMB) kiba kit ïa ki dawai kiba sniew, katba ki dang wan na ka thaiñ Polo. ,
title: “KI DAWAI BA LA BRET SHA MARTEN KI DEI KIBA LAH SNIEW,” PYNSHAI KA DHS (MI)

content: : Lai ngut ki snar khaii drok ba kynthup ïa arngut ki Khasi ïa kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Ronand Kyndiah na Sngithiang Lower Mawprem bad u Daniel Syiem na Lower Mawprem bad uwei pat u Manipuri ïa uba la tip kyrteng kum Thokchom Naba Singh na ka shnong Kangmong, Imphal West, Manipur ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit ka Ri-Bhoi District halor ka jingdonkti ban pynïaid iew ïa u drok.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da ki pulit ka Ribhoi District, ha ka janmiet sngi thohdieng ki pulit ki la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah ba ki don lai ngut ki briew kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Ronand, u Daniel bad u Naba Singh ki la ïakynduh ha kawei ka Farm House ha ka shnong Lumkeni, Umran, Ri-Bhoi ban pynïaid iew ïa u drok.Hadien ba la ïoh jingtip, ki pulit kiba la pynap shrip ha lad surokbah NH-06 Umsning Bypass ryngkat bad ki pulit ka Umsning Police Station ki la ïoh bat ïa kawei ka kali Alto rong iong kaba don ïa u nombar ML05-K-0314 ba la shong arngut ki briew. Ki Pulit ki pynpaw ba kine ki arngut ki la ïathuh ba ki kyrteng kum ku Ronand Kyndiah bad u Daniel Syiem na Shillong. Nalor kata, ki Pulit ki la ïathuh ba ki la bat noh ïa kine ki arngut hadien ba ki la kyrngah ban ïathuh ïa ka jaka ba la buhrieh ïa u drok.Ha ka jingtohkit ki la kynnoh ba u Naba Singh uba donkti ban khaii ïa u drok u la hiar sha Guwahati. Mar mar ki Pulit kiba la pynap shrip ha hajan Byrnihat Out Post ki la ïoh bat ïa u Naba Singh.Shuh shuh ka jingtohkit ïa kine ki lai ngut, ki la phla ba ki la buhrieh ïa u drok ba la song bha hapoh ka Farm House kaba don ha ka shnong Lumkeni, Umran.Ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki Pulit ka Ribhoi District kiba la ïalam da ki ksew na ka K9 Dog Squad jong ka CID ki la pynlong ka jingkhynra ïa ka Farm House. Ki ksew ki la ïoh sma dien ïa kawei ka synduk nar ba la suba ba la thep ïa u drok.  Hadien ba la lied ïa ka synduk nar, la lap ïa ki 70 tylli ki synduk thep sabon kiba la thep ïa u powdar rong soh bad hadien ba la leh test la pynshisha ba u dei u drok Heroin.Katkum ka jingïathuh ki Pulit, u drok ba la ïoh kurup na ki 70 tylli ki synduk thep sabon u shongdor 5 klur tyngka. Ki Pulit ki la kurup noh ïa ka kali Maruti Alto bad 4 tylli ki Mobile Phone.Ka tnat Pulit jong ka Jylla Meghalaya lyngba ka jingbthah jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma bad hapoh ka jingkhmih jong u Director General of Police (DGP) u Dr. LR Bishnoi ka la ïakhun thma pyrshah ïa ka kam khaii drok ban pyllait luid ïa ka jylla na u drok.
title: BUHRIEH KI NONGKHAÏI ÏA U DROK BA SHONGDOR 5 KLUR HA FARM HOUSE, KEM KI PULIT 3 NGUT

content: Ka Meghalaya Upper Primary School Association (MUPSTA) ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka la iakynduh ia u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma ban pynsngew ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdawa ban kyntiew kyrdan Deficit System ia ki 844 tylli ki Adhoc Upper Primary Schools ha ka Jylla.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President jong ka MUPSTA u Bah Kenneth Shadap u la ong, “ka sorkar MDA kaba rim ka ladep pan ia ka jingtyrwa na ki 844 Adhoc Upper Primary Schools ban kyntiew sha ka kyrdan Deficit System lyngba ka shithi No. EDN/172/2006/69 dated Shillong the 7th February/2019 bad DSEL/EL/GB/Misc/16/2010/Pt.1/221 dated 18.03.2019 bad mynta ka sngi ruh ngi la iakren hi halor kane kajuh ka ishu bad u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi.U Bah Shadap u la iathuh ba ka jingioh tulop shi bnai jong ki nonghikai Adhoc ka long kaba rit bha ba kin pyndap pynbiang ia la ka ing ka sem bad don ruh napdeng jong ki nonghikai ki bym kot bor wat tang ban siew bai skul ia la ki khun ynda ki ladei ka por ban bteng ia ki jingpule kiba kham shajrong.U la bynrap, la kumba arphew snem ba ka Sorkar kam shym la ai jingiarap (non-recurring grant-in-aid) sha ki skul Adhoc kum ka maintenance grant, ka infrastructure renovations, ka jingai Uniform ia ki khynnah bad kiwei kiwei kumba la ioh jingmyntoi da ki skul SSA.“Ngi kyntu ia u Myntri uba peit ia ka tnat Pule Puthi ba un shimkhia ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyntreikam  ia ka jingtyrwa ban kyntiew kyrdan Deficit System ia ki skul Adhoc khnang ban pyntreikam lang kumjuh ia ka jingsiew tulop katkum ka kam ba la trei,” u la bynrap.U Bah Shadap u la pyntip ruh ba ha ka jingialang, ka seng ka la pynsngew ha u  Myntri ba ki skul Adhoc ki iakynduh jingeh ruh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingthungkam khamtam ynda la shongthait bad khladnoh ki nonghikai na ka daw ba la bthah ban thung ia ki nonghikai kiba la pyndep ia ka Meghalaya Teachers Eligiblity Test (MTET) ha ki skul Adhoc. “Ki don katto katne ki skul Adhoc ki bym pat lah satia ban thung nonghikai thymmai la jan palat shi snem ha ki post kiba thylli tang na ka daw ba kito kiba la pas ia ka MTET kim shym la thep satia ia ka kam.  Katba ki don pat kiba thep ia ka kam bad kiba la biang ka kyrdan pule hynrei ki dei bym pat pyndep ia ka MTET.  Namarkata, ngi la kyrpad ia u Myntri ba un bishar bniah halor kane bad ban ai ka jingpynjynsur khyndiat ia ki skul Adhoc ha kaba thungkam ia ki nonghikai ki bym pat pyndep ia ka MTET.
title: BUDDIEN KA MUPSTA NA KA SORKAR HALOR KA JINGKYNTIEW KYRDAN DEFICIT ÏA KI SKUL ADHOC

content: Shillong, July 3 : U Superintendent of Police East Khasi Hills District u Bah S. Nongtnger u la pyntip ba ha ka 3 tarik u Naitung ha ka por 12 baje baje eiei mynsngi, ka la don ka jingbthei kaba jam ha kawei ka iing ha Lumkynsai, Smit bad ha kane ka jingjia uwei u rangbah uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Pynsuklang Khongwir (38 snem ka rta) u la iap hashen.Ha ka kyrwoh khubor u SP u la pyntip ba ka jingbthei ka long kaba jur  bad ki kamra kiba don ha ka mala kaba ha trai duh jong ka iing ki la julor. Ha ka jingtohkit ki pulit ki la lap ba u Bah Pynsuk u dei u briew uba don jingshitom bad u hap ban shu thiah beit ha jingthiah. Ar bnai mynshuwa u dang shah puid ba u don jingpang ha u budlum.U SP u la ong ba kiba haiing hasem ki la ithuh ba u la pyrshang ban pyniap ialade la arsien. Ki pulit pynlip bom bad ka kynhun jong ka Crime Scene Unit ki la wan poi ha katei ka jaka bad ki la lum la lang ia ki tiar kiba donkam kiba lah ban iarap ha ka jingtohkit. Ka jingtohkit halor katei ka jingjia ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: U RANGBAH BA ÏAP NA KA JINGBTHEI HA SMIT U LA PYRSHANG BAN SHIM JUBOR LA KA JINGIM LA ARSIEN

content: Ka Khasi Students Union South West Khasi Hills District Unit ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki nongialam na ki phra tylli ki shnong bad ki nongialam jong ki seng samla shnong kiba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka district ha ka lah sngi U Blei ki la pynsngew hakhmat u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare u Bah Paul Lyngdoh halor ka jingbym larkam jong ka Anti-Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) jong ka South West Khasi Hills District namarba haduh mynta kane ka kynhun pulit kam pat ju kem satia wat tang uwei ruh u nongkhaii ne wat ia u nongdih drok hapoh kane ka district.U President jong ka KSU-SWKHDU u Bah Forwardman Nongrem ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “ngi la pynsngew halor ka jingbym larkam jong ka Anti-Narcotic Task Force jong ka South West Khasi Hills namarba ngim pat ju iohi ba kane ka tnat Pulit kan kem wat tang uwei ruh u nongkhaii ne wat ia u nongdih drok ha Mawkyrwat. Kiba bun hi la kem da ki dorbar shnong, ki seng longkmie, ki seng samla bad ki sengbhalang.”“Ngi la kyrpad ia u Myntri ba un pynthikna ba ka ANTF kam dei ban shu don tang ka kyrteng bad ka dei ban pyndep ia la ka kamram ba la bynshet ban tehlakam ia ka jingjyllei jong u drok ha ka thaiñ Mawkyrwat,” u la ong.U la iathuh ruh ba ka seng bad ki phra tylli ki Dorbar Shnong ki la aiti ruh ia ka dorkhas sha ka tnat Social Welfare ban dawa ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban plie noh ia ka Rehabilitation Centre ha Mawkyrwat na ka daw ka jingjyllei jong ki samla kiba la im kyrni ha u drok ha kaba bun ki dei kiba wan na ki longing kiba duk khnang ban dup lah ban wanrah biang ia ki sha ka jingim kaba thymmai.“Na ka liang jong u Myntri ula pynpaw ba un sa iakren ia kane ka jingdawa bad ki bor synshar ka South West Khasi Hills District,” la ong u Bah Nongrem.“Kawei pat ka mat kaba ngi la pynsngew ka long haba ngi la tip ba u briew u la shah kem na ka jingpynthikna ba  u dei uba dih drok hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba kam ju don ka jingbuddien (mandatory follow-up procedures) na ka bynta jong ki. Teng teng ki samla ba la shah kem ynda la lait na along ki la leh biang ia kijuh ki kam,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ngi la ai jingmut ba dei ban buddien kum ia kine ki briew khnang ban pynthikna ba kan ym jia shuh bad ba kita ki briew kin kylla noh kaba mut.”“Ngi bna ba ka don ka District Level Committee on Drug Abuse bad ngi la iakren (bad u Myntri) ba dei ban thaw biang ia ka District Level Committee on Drug Abuse bad ba u Deputy Commissioner u dei ban long u Chairman, u District Social Welfare Officer un dei u Member Secretary bad kynthup lang ia ki samla shnong. Ngi la kyrpad ruh ia ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban pynmih ia ka jingpynbna na ka bynta ki kyndon ki ban batai ia ka kamram jong ka District Level Committee on Drug Abuse ban leh ia kata ka bynta,” la bynrap u Bah Nongrem.“Ngi kwah ba ka Sorkar kan aibor ia ki shnong ba kin iakhun pyrshah ia ka jingkynrei jong u drok da kaba pynmih ia ka jingpynbna kum ka Village Level Committee on Drug Abuse khnang ba ki shnong kin dup lah ban pyndep ia kata ka bynta,” ula ong.
title: KA ANTF-SWKH KAM PAT JU KEM WAT TANG UWEI RUH U NONGKHAÏI NE WAT UBA DIH DROK: KSU

content: Ka JETS24x7 ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ban dawa ia ka Council ba kam dei shuh ban dang ai Trading License ia kiwei pat ki Taxi Aggregator da kaba pyntreikam ia ka kyndon 3A (1) (b) jong ka United Khasi Jaintia Hills District (Trading by Non-Tribals) Regulation, 1954 (As Amended).Ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u Managing Director u Samla Pynskhemlang W. Uriah, la ong, “ka JETS 24X7 ka dei ka thup pyniaid ia ki thuk thuk ar shaka na ka bynta ki paidbah nongleit nongwan ha ka jylla bad ka thong jong kane ka shlem ka long ban plie lad ia ka aikam aijam ia ki samla Khasi ha ka jaitbynriew ka jong ngi bad ka thong ka jong ngi ka dei ban “Kyntiew Ia la ki Jong” ha ka ktien nongwei ka dei “Uplift Our Own”.“Ka jingseng ia ka JETS 24×7 ka long ban ai jingshakri ia ki paidbah da kaba pyniaid da ki thuk thuk lyngba ka Mobile Application App hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya bad ia ka JETS la ithuh da ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ngi la ioh ruh ia ka license na ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba ka Transport Department,” la ong ka dorkhas.“Lyngba kane ka shithi ngi kum ka JETS 24×7 ngi wanrah ia kane ka jingthoh ha ka miej ba donburom jong phi ia ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingai Trading License ia kino kino ki bar jylla lane ki Company kiba nabar kiba thmu ban ioh ia ka License ban pyntreikam ia ki kali kamai da kaba pyndonkam ia ka internet (Taxi Aggregator ). Ka jingkhang pyrshah ka jong ngi ka long katkum ki kyndon jong ka United Khasi Jaintia Hills District (Trading by Non-Tribals) Regulation, 1954 (As Amended), Section 3A (1) (b) kaba ong, 3A. Conditions for granting or refusing a license:(1) In granting or refusing a license under this Regulation, the License Officer or any Officer when duly authorised by the by the Executive Committee, shall take into consideration the following matters according to the circumstances of each case, namely: (b) Whether there is any tribal who carries on the same trade or is willing to carry on such trade for which the application of license is made,” la pynksan ka JETS24x7 halor ka jingdawa.“Kum ka jylla ngi la don lypa ia ki ain ban iarap ia ngi ha ka jingialeh ha ka khaïi pateng hynrei ka shong pat ha kito kiba don ha ka bor bad ngi shaniah skhem ha ka Executive Committee bathymmai hapoh ka jingialam i Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ba kan ym aild ia ki ki kompeni kiba nabar namar kumba ka long mynta ngi la don ma ngi ki trai ri trai muluk ban trei ia kane ka kam kum ki Bike Taxi Aggregator ba nyngkong eh ha ka jylla Meghalaya,” la ong kane ka kynhun.“Ngi kyrpad ruh ia ki nongshong shnong jong ka jylla ba ka por ka ladei ia ngi ba ngin sdang ban pynkylla noh ia ka saiñ pyrkhat pyrdaiñ lada ngi kwah ban iohi ba ka jylla kan roi kan par bad ba kan tyngshaiñ nangne shakhmat da kaba ngin kyrshan ia la ki jong,” bynrap ka JETS24x7. Ka JETS 24X7 ka la pynpaw ruh ba ka jingdawa ban khang pyrshah ia ka jingai Trading Licence katkum ka aiñ kan long ka jingkyrkhu ia ki samla wadkam wadjam.
title: DAWA KA JETS 24×7 ÏA KA KHADC BAN YM AI LAISEN ÏA KI TAXI AGGREGATOR NABAR JYLLA

content: Da kaba buh hakhmat ia ka thong ban pynneh ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka thain Block-II, u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC), u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem bad ki Executive Member ha ka lah sngi U Blei ki la leit jngoh ia ka Raid Nongtung kaba hap hapoh ka Block II. Ka jingleit jngoh ia kane ka Raid, ka long ban pynthikna ba ki paidbah nongshong shnong kin im hapdeng ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.Ia u Bah Pynïaid bad ia ki Executive Member la pdiang sngewbha da u Avijit Kro, uba long u dkhot jong ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC), ryngkat bad ki ophisar jong ka Council.  Kane ka kynhun ka la hiar sha ka shnong Ummat shwa ban leit jngoh ia ki Mawbah ki 12 Kur jong ka Raid Nongtung, kaba long ka jaka ba kyntang ba ju pynlong ia ki jinglehniam na ka bynta kiba la iap.Ki Executive Member jong ka KHADC kiba la synran lang ha kane ka jinghiar jurip ki kynthup ia u Deputy CEM u Bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem, u Chairman jong ka Council u Bah Lamphrang Blah, u Deputy Chairman u Bah Charles Marngar, ki Executive Member ba kynthup ia u Bah Rangkynsai Kharbuki bad u Bah Teibor Pathaw.  Ki nongialam shnong na ki shnong bapher bapher ruh ki la wan synran lang ha kane ka sngi.Haba pynpaw ia ka jingthmu jong ka Council, u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem u la iathuh ba ka Council ka angnud ba ki paidbah kiba sah ha ka Raid Nongtung kin pynneh ia ka shongsuk shongsain bad ia ki jingtei u mynbarim kiba don ha kane ka thaiñ.  U la ong ruh ba ka District Council ka dei ka nongri nongsumar ia ka khyndew ka shyiap, ia ka riti kaba la hiar pateng na ki longshwa.  Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka Council ka la thmu ruh ban pynneh pynsah ia ki Mawbah ki 12 Kur ha Raid Nongtung, kiba don hapoh ka shnong Ummat. U Bah Pyniaid u la kyntu ruh ia ki nongialam shnong, khamtam ia ki Khasi bad ki Karbi kiba sah ha kane ka thaiñ ba kin iatreilang ban pynneh ia ka shongsuk shongsainShuh shuh u Bah Pynïaid u la pyntip ba ka KHADC bad ka KAAC ki la iatreilang ban wanrah ia ka shongsuk shongsain ha kane ka thaiñ.Da ka jingpynsdang ia ka jingiakren pynbeit pud ha ka wat kaba ar hapdeng ka sorkar Assam bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka ban sa long shen ha Block II, ka Council ka khmihlynti ba kane ka jingiakren kan long kaba seisoh.  Ka Council ka la ioh pdiang ruh ia ki jingai jingmut na ki nongialam shnong bad na ki dkhot kiba don hapoh ka Regional Committee.  U Bah Pyniaid u la kular ba ia baroh ki jingai jingmut na ki paidbah yn sa shimkhia naba ma u, kum u CEM bad u Dy. CEM ki dei ki dkhot jong ka komiti iapynbeit pud ba la thung da ka Sorkar ia kaba la khlieh da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong kum u Chairman.
title: HIAR JURIP U CEM BAD KI EM KA KHADC ÏA KA BLOCK II, KYNTU ÏA KI KHASI BAD KARBI BAN ÏA SHONGSUK

content: Shillong, Naitung 3 : Ki dkhot ka KSU Shillong Mihngi Circle ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka 3 tarik ki la leit ban ia kynduh ia ki bor pyniaid ka North East Institute of Ayurveda & Homeopathy (NEIAH) hadien ba ki la ioh jingtip ba ka director jong kane ka skulbah ka la thep kam jubor ia kawei ka briew na Uttar Pradesh kum ka Contractual Attendant.Ki dkhot ka seng hapoh ka jingialam u President u Bah Sonstar Nongkhlaw ki mana ia kane ka skulbah ba ka dei ban weng noh mardor ia katei ka briew kaba nabar bad dei ban thep beit da ki Khasi ha ki kam contractual baroh.Ki dkhot ka seng ki la mana ruh ba ym dei ban pynskhem (regularise) jubor ia kino kino ki bar jylla ba trei contractual ha NEIAH.Ka seng ka la maham lada ki bor pyniaid jong ka NEIAH khamtam ka Director kim weng kam ia ka bar jylla, ka seng kan sa shim da ki sienjam kiba tyngeh.
title: PHAH WENG KA KSU ÏA KA NEIAH BA THUNGKAM KONTRAK ÏA KA BAR JYLLA NA UTTAR PRADESH

content: Kum shibynta ban kyntiew ia ka kam pule puthi lyngba ka jingpyndonkam ia ki bor teknoloji, ka ophis jong ka Block Development Officer, Mairang C&RD Block, Mairang mynta ka sngi ka la pynlong ia ka prokram sam M-Tab hapoh ka skhim Chief Minister’s Digital Learning Aid Scheme sha ki khynnah Class XI jong u snem 2022-2023 ia kaba la pynlong ha St. Thomas Higher Secondary School, Mairang ha kaba u Bah  Metbah Lyngdoh uba dei u Chairman jong ka Meghalaya State Planning Board bad ruh u MLA ka thain u la long kum u Kongsan ha ka jingsynran lang jong u Deputy Commissioner ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District, u Bah G. Kharmawphlang uba la long kum u symbud kongsan.Ha kane ka prokram la sakhi ruh ia ka jingdonryngkat jong i BDO ka Mairang Block, i Dr L.R Hynniewta, u Sub- Divisional School Officer, Mairang, u Bah J. Thyrniang, kiwei kiwei pat ki nongtrei sorkar, ki nonghikai bad ki khynnah pule jong ki skul bapher bapher jong ka Mairang Block.Haba kren kum u kongsan ha kane ka prokram, u shongknor jong ka Meghalaya State Planning Board uba dei ruh  u MLA ka thain, u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la ong ba ki khynnah pule ki long ka lawei jong ka imlang sahlang bad kumta ki dei ban trei minot ban ia ryngkat bor bad ki khynnah pule na kiwei pat ki bynta jong ka pyrthei ha ka rukom pyndonkam ia ka jingstad teknoloji ha ka pule puthi kaba man ka sngi ka jong ki bad u la kyntu ruh ia baroh kiba ia sakhi lang ia kane ka prokram ba kin pdiang ia kiei kiei kiba bha ba ka bor teknoloji ka wanrah ha ka imlang sahlang .U Bah Metbah u la ong ruh ba ka long ka kabu kaba khraw ia ki khynnah pule ba kin iohpdiang ia kiba kum kine ki lad jingiarap kiba ka sorkar ka ai khlem kano kano ka jingsiew pisa bad ha kane ka prokram, u Bah Metbah u la kren ruh shaphang ka jingkyrduh kam kyrduh jam kaba long kawei na ki mat kaba donkam bha ban iatai ha ka ri bad ka jylla bad ula kyntu ruh ia baroh ba kin ym khmih lynti tang ia ki kam sorkar hynrei ba kin thawlad ia kiwei pat ki rukom kamai jakpoh.Katba, u symbud kongsan, kata u Bah G. Kharmawphlang uba long u Deputy Commissioner ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District, u la kyntu ia ki khynnah pule kiba la iohpdiang ia ki M- Tab ha kane ka sngi ba kin pyndonkam hok iaki na ka bynta ban kyntiew shuhshuh ia ka pule puthi ka jong ki.La sam ruh ia ki khusnam sha ki nongjop ha ka jingiakob dro jingdro bad jingiakob thoh poitri, kiba la pynlong kum shibynta jong ka jingrakhe ia ka sngi pynneh mariang kaba la long mynta u snem.
title: SAM M-TAB SHA KI KHYNNAH SKUL KA MAIRANG BLOCK

content: Ki nongialam ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Laban Circle ha ka sngi Palei ki la leit ban iakynduh ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka Longkmie Gas Agency kaba don ia ka shlem treikam ha Laban Last stop, Shillong hadien ba ka seng ka la ioh shibun ki jingujor na ki paidbah ka thaiñ Laban halor ka jingioh duna ki tyndong lyer shet jingshet ne LPG Cylinder ha ka shi snem.Hapoh ka jingialam jong President u Samla Reuben Najiar bad u General Secretary u Samla Jason Laloo ka seng ka la pynsngew sha ki bor pyniaid jong ka Longkmie Gas Agency ia ki jingujor ba la ioh na ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ Laban ha kaba iadei bad ka jingioh duna ia ki tyndong lyer shet ha ka shi snem, kata, tang 10 tylli ha ka shi snem.Na ka liang jong ka seng ka la wad jingtip bad ka la lap ba ki Gas Agency ki dei ban pynbiang ym duna 12 tylli ki tyndong lyer shet ha ka shi snem.Ka seng kaba la pynlong ia ka jingleit khynra ha ka 13 tarik u Jymmang, 2023 ia ki dukan die sha bad ja ban peit ia ka khuid ka suba, la lap ba ki dukan ki ju pyndonkam ban shet da ki tyndong lyer Domestic LPG Cylinder kaba long pyrshah katkum ka aiñ.Halor kane, ka seng ka la pan jingpynshai na ki bor pyniaid jong ka Longkmie Gas Agency kaba la pynsngew ruh ia ki jingeh ba ki shem bad kular ruh ban pynbit pynbiang ia ki jingduna kaba ki paidbah ki mad bad ha kajuh ka por ki la pynshai ba kam don kano kano ka jingdie tuh ia ki tyndong lyer jingshet.Ka Seng ka la maham tyngeh ia ka Longkmie Gas Agency ba kam dei ban pynduna ia ki tyndong lyer shet jingshet ban pynpoi sha ki longïing jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka thaiñ Laban.
title: MAHAM KA KSU ÏA KA LONGKMIE GAS AGENCY BAN YM PYNDUNA LPG CYLINDER SHA KI PAIDBAH

content: Ban pynthikna ia ka jingshngaiñ jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong kiba bam ia ki dohkha ba la wanrah nabar ka jylla Meghalaya ka Assistant Commissioner jong ka ophis Food Safety ka Kong DBS Mukhim ha ka sngi Palei ka la hiar jurip ia ka Basa die dohkha ha Iewduh bad ban leh ruh ia ka test khnang ban lap la ka dang don neem ia ka jinginjek dawai Formalin ha ki dohkha.Ka Kong DBS Mukhim ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba ladep leh test ia ki dohkha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki nongialam ka Khasi Jaiñtia Fish Wholesaler and Retailer Association (KJFWRA) ka la iathuh ba hadien ba la leh test ia ki dohkha ka la pynthikna ba ki dohkha ba la die ha Iewduh ki dei kiba shngaiñ ban bam bad watla katta ka la iathuh ba na ka liang ka ophis jong ka Food Safety ka la rai ban shim nuksa katto katne tylli ki dohkha ba ladep leh test ha Iewduh ban leh test biang ha Laboratory jong ka Food Safety.Shuh shuh ka la iathuh, ka ophis jong ka Food Safety ka la rai ban buh da ki nongtrei jong ka tnat Fisheries ba kin leh test manla ka sngi ha Khlieh Iewduh ia ki dohkha kiba la wanrah nabar ka jylla bad lada lap ba don ka jinginjek dawai formalin ia ki dohkha yn ym shah satia ban die ha iew.
title: LA SHNGAIN BAN BAM ÏA KI DOHKHA NABAR JYLLA, PYNTHIKNA KA FOOD SAFETY

content: Ka jingther jong u lapbah bad ka jingbeh kyrthep jong ka eriong ha kine ki sngi ba la leit noh ka la wanrah ia ka jingiap ei jong ki mynsiem briew bad da ki hajar ngut ki paidbah ki la shah ktah.Ia kane la iathuh da ka Executive Director jong ka State Disaster Management Authority ka Kong Matsiewdor War Nongbri haba ai jingkhein halor ka jingshah ktah jong ki 199 tylli ki shnong na ka jingther jong u lapbah lapsan ha kylleng ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei.Kane ka jingioh jingkheiñ thymmai halor kine ki jingjia ha kylleng ka jylla ka long hadien ba ka tnat Disaster Management ka la shong ia ka jingialang pyrkhat kam lane ka Review Meetiing ha ka 30 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 ba la pyniaid da u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Kyrmen Shylla.Ka Kong Matsiewdor ka la iathuh ruh ba ha kine ki jingjia, haduh 13, 682 hajar ngut ki briew ki la shah ktah na ki jingshlei um, ki jingtwa khyndew.  Naduh ka 1 tarik haduh ka 30 tarik u Jylliew, 2023, la ioh jingkhein ba ki don haduh 27 tylli ki jingri jingdub kiba la iap ha kine ki jingwan lynshop jong ki bor ka mariang.Ka la iathuh ruh ba haduh mynta arngut ki briew ki dang jah rngai, 7 ngut kiba mynsaw bad 27 ngut ki mrad kiba la iap.138 tylli ki ing ki sem kiba la shah pynjulor, 182 tylli kiba la julor malu mala, 31 tylli kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingtohkit bad 30 tylli ki jingtei ki la shah pynjulor.Ha kine sngi, ki district kiba la mad ha ka jingwan lynshop jong ki bor ka mariang ki long ka North Garo Hills, ka West Khasi Hills, ka East Khasi Hills, ka South West Khasi Hills, ka East Jaintia Hills, ka West Garo Hills, ka South West Garo Hills bad ka Ri Bhoi District.U Myntri ka tnat Disaster Management u Bah Kyrmen Shylla u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar lyngba ka tnat Disaster Manangement ka la siew ia ka bailutksan kum shi bynta ban iarap ia ki longing kiba mad ia ki jingjia ba sngewsih khamtam ia kito ki longing kiba la jia ka jingshah pom pyrthat ha kine ki sngi ba la leit noh.U la iathuh ba ka jingsiew bailutksan ka long ruh wat sha ki mrad kiba la iap na ka jingshah pom pyrthat.U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar ka la shim rai ban pynher da ki Drone ban tohkit ia ki jaka kiba shah ktah na ka jingshlei um ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka jylla khnang ban ioh ai jingiarap kyrkieh ia ki paidbah ha ka por ba donkam.
title: 13 HAJAR TAM KI PAIDBAH KIBA SHAH KTAH NA KA JINGTHER LAPBAH, 199 TYLLI KI SHNONG BA SHAH KTAH

content: Da ki lak tylli ki dawai kuli, ki drip bad ki jait dawai bym lah ban tip ha ka sngi Palei la lap ba ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka la kit da ki borni ban leit bret sha Marten.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u President ka Meghalaya Awakening Concern Citizen (MACC) u Bah Banshai Marbaniang kaba iaid ryngkat bad ka Awaken India Movement (AIM), katba ki dang iaid lynti ha ka por premmiet ha kane ka sngi, ki la lap saw tylli ki kali jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) kiba kit ia ki dawai bad ynda la buddien la lap ba la leit bret ia kine ki dawai ha Marten.U Bah Marbaniang u la iathuh ba la lap ia kine ki dawai ba la song ha ki byrni la sei na ka Medical Store kaba don hajan ka Ganesh Das Maternal & Child Health Hospital, Shillong bad la pynkit ha ki ar tylli ki kali jong ka Municipal.“Ngim lah ban tip na kaei ka daw ba la bret ia kine ki dawai.  Kane ka dei kaba ngim lah satia ban pdiang daleilei ruh em bad ngi hap ban pan jingpynshai na ka ophis District Health & Medical Officer (DM&HO) bad na ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah,” ong u Bah Marbaniang.“Ban shu bret kai katne lak tylli ki dawai kan buh ia ki paidbah ha ka umdum.  Ngin hap ban buddien ia kane bad ngin hap ban pan jingpynshai wat na ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla, ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh,” la ong u Bah Marbaniang.U la kren bynñiaw ruh ban iohi ba la shu bret ei ia kine ki dawai sha Marten katba sha ki jaka ai jingsumar ha ki District ki paidbah kim ioh satia wat tang ia ka dawai ba la mynjur da ki doktor.Haba kylli, ula ong, “ngim lah ban tip hynrei ka Sorkar ka dei ban ai jingpynshai, ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka dei ban ai jingpynshai.  Ki dawai kiba dei ban poi sha ki PHC, CHC hynrei mynta la bret sha Marten.  La shu thied kai ia ki dawai katba ki paidbah tang ia ka dawai ruh kim ioh.  Ngi sngew ba ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka dei ban ai jingpynshai halor kane.”U la ong ruh ba lada kine ki dawai ki dei kiba la kut noh ka por ban pyndonkam (expired) bad lada la aiti sha ki PHC bad CHC dei ma ki hi kiba hap ban thang noh lada ym lah ban pyndonkam shuh namar ba la kut ka por ban pyndonkam.Da kaba kynnoh ba kane ka jingbret kai da ki lak tylli ki dawai ka dei ka jingpynsyrwa kai ia ka pisa u paidbah bad ka don ruh ka bamsap, u Bah Marbaniang u la ong, “ia ki dawai la thied da ka pisa u paidbah.  Lada ia ka pisa jong ka Sorkar la shu pyndonkam ban thied dawai bad ban bret noh shipor ka long shisyndon ka bamsap. Ngim lah ban pdiang bad ngin buddien tad haduh ba ngin da ioh ia ka jingshai kaba pura ban tip ia kaei ka daw kaba la pynlong ia ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ban bret ia ki dawai sha Marten.”“Lada donkam ngin sa wad da ka RTI, nga ngeit skhem ba ka sorkar kan ym lah ban buhrieh bad lada ka Sorkar  ka buhrieh ka mut ba ka Sorkar ka buhrieh ia ka pisa u paidbah shano re shano ba ngim lah ban tip,” u la bynrap.
title: DA KI LAK TYLLI KI DAWAI SHU BRET KA HEALTH DEPT. SHA MARTEN, KYNNOH KA MACC BA DON KA JYRSIEH BAMSAP

content: Ka Central Executive Council (CEC) jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la iathir bad iatai sani bha halor ka Reservation Policy bad ka Roster System shwa ban aiti ia ki jingai jingmut sha ka Expert Committee ba la thung da ka Sorkar Jylla.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang, u General Secretary ka party u Dr. Jemino Mawthoh u la ong, “kum ka party ngi la shimkhia bha ia kane ka kam namarba ym tang kiwei kiwei ki kynhun kiba kwah ban khmih bniah biang ia ka Reservation Policy.”“Ngi la bsuh ruh ia kane ka mat ha ka Election Manifesto ha ka elekshon ba ladep bad hadien kata ngi la shong jin kumba 12-13 sien ki jingialang ban iathir kumno ban ai jingmut halor ka Reservation Policty bym pat khmih bniah mynta la 51 snem kynthih,” la ong u Dr. Jemino.“Ngi la ioh ia ki jingai jingmut na ki Legal Expert, ki Scholars bad ki Social Scientist kumno ban pynwandur ia ka Reservation Policy bad ka Roster System khnang ba ki jaidbynriew ha kane ka jylla kin ym shah ktah. Ngi kwah ban pynwandur ha kata ka rukom bad ngi kwah ba ka Sorkar lada ka pynwandur kan ym don ka jingleh shiliaing bad kan long kaba pdiang hun da baroh ki jaidbynriew kiba shong basah ha kane ka jylla,” la bynrap u Dr. Jemino.U la iathuh ba hadien ba la iathir sani, “ki don phra tylli ki jingshem kiba yn sa ai jingmut sha ka Expert Committee ba la khlieh da ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh bad shwa ban leh ia kata, ngi la wanrah shwa hakhmat ka CEC jong ka party.  Hynrei ki dang don katto katne ki bynta kiba ka CEC ka la ai jingmut ba kan bha ban pynkylla katto katne.”“Ka CEC ka la aibor ha ka Core Committee jong ka UDP ban leh ia kaba donkam na ka bynta ban bsuh ia ki jingai jingmut jong ka CEC ha kane ka sngi.  Kane ka ishu kam dei ka ishu basuk, ngi hap ban iathir iatai bha na baroh ki liang.  Halor kine ki jingai jingmut yn sa rah shwa sha ka Core committee ka ban shim por sa tang ar ne lai sngi bad hadien kata ngin sa phah sha ka Sorkar,” la bynrap u Dr. Jemino.Ha kajuh ka por, u General Secretary ka UDP u la iathuh ba ka CEC ka la rai ban wanrah katto katne ki jingpynkylla thymmai ha ka Riti Treikam jong ka Party shwa ba ka party kan pynlong ia ka General Council ha ka 29 tarik Naitung 2023 hadien ba ka samoi treikam jong ka CEC kaba mynta ka la kut.“Ka jingjied ia ki nongkitkam kan long 29 tarik Naitung 2023 bad ngi la jeid ia ki dkhot jong ka Nomination Committee ki ban sa pyniaid ia ka elekshon,” u la bynrap.
title: KHMIH BNIAH KA UDP ÏA KA RESERVATION POLICY BAD ROSTER SYSTEM SHWA BAN AI JINGMUT SHA KA SORKAR

content: : Da ka sienjam ban bud ia ka thong USD 10 Billion ha shwa u snem 2030, ka Sorkar Jylla hapoh ka jingialam jong u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma ki la jam shakhmat na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ki kam jngohkai pyrthei kaba antad ba ka lah ban aikam haduh kumba 50,000 ngut ha ka shisnem bad nohsyniang ruh haduh 4.1%  sha ka Gross State Domestic Product (GSDP) jong ka Jylla.Ia ki kali, u Myntri Rangbah u la pyllait paidbah ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u Myntri ka Tnat Tourism  ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Paul Lyngdoh bad kumjuh ruh u Dr. Vijay Kumar D. Commissioner and Secretary ka tnat Tourism Department, ka Kong Renette C. Sohkhlet kaba long ka Secretary jong ka tnat Tourism ka Sorkar Jylla.Kane ka sienjam ka long ban pynbiang ia ka jingbun ka jingtuid ki nongwan jngohkai sha kane ka jylla kiba kwah ban ioh ia ka jingshakri kaba paka, ka leit ka wan kaba kham aram haba ki leit sha ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei. Katei ruh kadei shi bynta ban pynbiang na bynta kito ki nongwan jngohkai kiba pynkhreh ban pynlut shibun ka pisa la ka long ha ki jaka bad ha ka leit ka wan haba ki wan ban shangkai pyrthei sha kane ki jylla. Hynrei, hadien ba la wad bniah na ki paidbah bad ruh na ki Tourist Operators bad ka tnad Tourism la lap ba nalor ka jingdon ki kali ban leit ki nongjngohkai ka Meghalaya ka duna bha ka jingdon ki kali kiba biang na bynta kito ki nongjngohkai pyrthei kiba kham bit kham biang nalor ki nongniah kiba donburom naka bynta ban kyntiew shuh shuh ia ki kam jngohkai pyrthei ha ka jylla.Dei na kane ka daw ba ka sorkar jylla ka la pyllait paidbah da ki kali kit nongjngohkai pyrthei kiba paka na bynta ki nongseng kam lajong kiba iadei bad katei ka bynta.U Myntri Rangbah haba  kren ha ka jingialang u la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen kaba khraw bad ong, “Ngi dap da ka jingkmen ban ioh pyllait paidbah ia ka PRIME Tourism Vehicles Scheme, kaba dei ka sienjam shakhmat ban kyntiew ia ka kam jngohkai pyrthei. Da kaba pynbiang ia ki kali pura ryngkat ki nongniah kiba don burom bad ba la tbit bad buh hakhmat eh ia ka jingshngaiñ jong ki nongshong, ngin ai ka jingshakri kaba paka kaba ki nongwanjngohkai kin sah kynmaw ia ka jingwan jong ki. Kane ka sienjam ym tang ba kan kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot jong ka jylla hynrei kan pynkup burom shuh shuh ia ki nongseng kam lajong bad ruh ia ki nongniah kali kiba la tbit kumta kane kan kyntiew lut ha baroh ki liang.”U Bah Paul Lyngdoh haba bynrap halor kane u la ong, “haba ngi pyllait paidbah ia kine ki kali, ngi sdang ruh ia ka lynti ka jingkyla ban pynlong ia ka Meghalaya kum ka Jylla kaba paka tam eh na bynta ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei. Lyngba kine ki kali kiba kham biang, ym tang ba ngi ai kamai hynrei ngi plie lad plie lynti ruh na bynta ka kam kamai na ka jingitynnad ka mei mariang bad ruh ki paidbah Meghalaya.”Lyngba kane ka skhim, ka Sorkar Jylla ka kyrshan pisa haduh mar shiteng ka dor kali ha ka jingmang pisa kaba 6 klur tyngka. Kane ka jingkyrshan pisa ka kynthup haduh 90 persen ka jingsiew ba nyngkong ka dor kali (down payment) kaba pyntikna ba ki nongioh jingmyntoi kin ioh ia katei ka kali kaba la paka da kaba siew shwa tang 1 lak tyngka ka bai seng ne down payment. Nalorkata la siew tam ruh 20 persen ka jingsiew kaba man u bnai ban pynsuk ia ka jingtreikam. Kane ka skim ka thmu ruh ban pynbiang shuh shuh ia ka jingdonkam ki nongwan jngohkai kiba kham bit kham biang la ka long naduh ki kali, ki nongniah kiba tbit, ki nongialam kai, ban suk wai kali ha ka dor sorkar bad ruh ban thaw pat ia ki lad kamai.Kum ka jingsdang kaba iaid tang shi bnai katei ka skim ka la ioh pdiang ia ka jingtyrwa kaba haduh 600 ngut kiba kwah ban pyntreikam ia katei ka prokam jong ka sorkar. Hynrei ha kaba sdang la jied shwa tang 47 ngut lyngba ka jingbishar kaba bniah da kaba peit shwa ia ka jingtbit jong ki halor ka kam jngohkai bad tip ia ka lynti bad ka leit ka wan kaba shngain kaba kum ki nongniah ki donkam ban tip. Na ka liang ka tnad ka pynlong ruh ka jingai jinghikai na bynta jong ki khnang ba kin sngewthuh kumno ban buh shwa hakhmat ia ka jingshngain jong ki nongshong..Nalorkata, ka sorkar kala pyndait ruh da ki GPS ha kitei baroh ki kali ban suk ban buddien ia ki lada jia ba don kano kano ka jingjia ba kyrkieh. Ka PRIME Tourism Vehicle Scheme, jong ka tnad Tourism ka sorkar jylla kala sam ruh ia ki life jackets, first aid box bad ruh ki jingialehkai sha ki nongpyniaid ia ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei kiba don ia ki jingialehkai ha um. Ka la don ruh ka jinghikai da kaba treilang bad ka Tour Operators na ka bynta ki nongking lieng bad ruh ki jinghikai ban pyllait im bad ruh ka CPR na ka bynta kito kiba wan sha ki jaka jngohkai kum sha  Shnongpdeng, Sohra, Darrang, Dawki, Umsyiem, bad kiwei.
title: PYLLAIT KA MEGHALAYA ÏA KI KALI PRIME TOURISM BAN KYNTIEW ÏA KI KAM JNGOHKAI PYRTHEI

content: Ka Myntri ka tnad ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba la iashim bynta kum ka Kongsan ha ka rynsan, “The Economic Times’ Best Healthcare Brands 2023 kaba hynriew kaba long ha nongbah Delhi.Haba kren ha ka jingialang, ka Myntri ka la kren halor ka bynta ban pyntikna ba ki nongioh jingmyntoi kin suk ban ioh ia ka jingsumar bad ruh ha ka dor kaba bit ha ki shnong ki thaw.Ha kane ka jingialang la iashim bynta lang ruh da u Joint Secretary ka tnad ka koit ka khiah jong ka Sorkar India u Vishal Chuahan, u Dr. K. Madan Gopal uba mihkhmat na ka National Health Systems Resource Centre jong ka tnad ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Pdeng nalor kiwei kiwei ki ophisar bad ki kynrem lyndan.Da kaba pynpaw ia ka jingkmen haba kren ha ka jingialang, ka Dr. Lyngdoh ka la ong, “nga ai ka jingiaroh ia ka ET Edge kaba la pynlong ia kane ka lympung ha ka sien kaba hynriew jong ka Doctors Day Conclave.”Lyngba kane ka sienjam kaba la wanlam lang ia ngi baroh hangne, kan iarap pat ba ngin treilang ban iasam ia ki jingtip bad ruh ban pyni ia ka jingtbit na ka bynta ban pynwandur shuh shuh ia ka jingshakri ha ka koit ka khiah. Ka jingkylla kaba pura ka sah mynta sa ha ka jingiatrei lang bad ruh kum kawei ka bor.  Nga dap ruh da ka jingkmen ban sakhi ia ka jingkynduh lang jong ki riewshemphang kiba la tbit ha kane na bynta ban pynkylla dur ia ka koit ka khiah ha ka ri jongngi.”Ka Dr. Lyngdoh ka la bynrap, “ka jylla Meghalya ka la pyntreikam ia ka rukom ai jingsumar kaba peit lut nadong shadong na bynta ki nongshong shnong kiba don ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher ha ka ioh ka kot.  Ka bynta kaba ngi buh hakhmat ka long ruh ban pynleit jingmut ym dei eh tang ha ka jingai jingsumar hynrei khamtam eh ban iada lypa bad ruh ban pynsgewthuh bad pynshai ia ki.  Lyngba ka Meghalaya Health and Insurance Scheme, ka jylla ka pyrshang ban pynpoi ia ki jingmyntoi sha baroh ki bynta jong ka imlang sahlang.  Ka Meghalaya ka dei kawei na ki jylla ha ri India kaba la don la ka jong ka jingpeitngor ia ka heh ka san jong ki heprit lane ka Early Childhood Development Mission, kaba la pyllait paidbah ha u 2021, kaba buh thong ba ki heprit kin ioh ia ka jingsumar kaba paka, ka bam ka dih bad baroh ki jingdonkam haba ki dang don ha kitei ki rta.  Ka Meghalaya ka dei ka jylla kaba dang 51 snem bad ngi hap ban lum kham bun ki jingtip na kum kine ki rynsan.”Haba iaroh ia ka jingtrei borbah jong ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah, ka Myntri ka la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen kaba khraw halor ka sienjam jong ki. Ka shim ruh ia ka kabu ban ai khublei ia baroh ki doktor kiba tei borbah bad aiti lut ialade bad ka iing ka sem na bynta ka koit ka khiah jong ki nongpang.Haba phaidien halor ka jingktah jong ka khlam COVID-19, ka Myntri ka la ong ba baroh ka dei lyngba ka jingshlur bad aiti lut met bad mynsiem jong ki nongtrei ka that ka koit ka khiah.Nalor ka jingai khusnam, ka la don ruh ka jingiasyllok bad ka rynsan iatai halor ka phang pdeng kumno ban ioh ia ka jingsumar kaba paka katkum ka juk mynta tangba ha ka jinglut kaba kham duna da kaba pyndonkam ia ki jingtip da ka jingiarap jong ka Artificial Intelligence ban lah pyntreikam pura ia kitei ki thong hapdeng ka jingkyrduh ka pla tyngka bad ka jingeh ban wanrah ka jingkylla.
title: IAROH KA DR. AMPAREEN LYNGDOH ÏA KI NONGTREI KA KOIT KA KHIAH HA KA ‘THE ECONOMIC TIMES BEST HEALTHCARE BRANDS 2023′.

content: Khliehriat, Naitung 1 : Hadien ba la ioh jingtip kaba tikna ba ka don kawei ka kali Santro kaba wan na Umkiang ban leit sha Khliehriat kaba kit ia ki kynja drugs. Ki pulit ki la pynap shrip ha Umtyra bad ki la ioh bat ia kane ka kali kaba don ia u Registration number TR04-A-0254.Ki don saw ngut ki briew hapoh kane ka kali kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Amit Mog , u Rajesh Kumar, u Babu Mog bad u Sanjit Debarma, kine baroh saw ngut ki dei kiba na Tripura.  Na kine la ioh kurup 51.03 kilo u Ganja, 5 tylli ki mobile phone bad  ka pisa 13,540 tyngka. Ki pulit ki la kurup ruh ia kane ka kali.
title: 50 KILO U GANJA KURUP KI PULIT NA KA KALI SANTRO HA UMTYRA

content: Nongpoh, Naitung 1 : Da ki spah ngut ki paidbah bad kynthup ki kali paidbah mynta ka sngi ki la sahkut ha ka surok na Bhoirymbong sha Kyrdem, ka dei hadien ba kawei ka Trok kaba kit ïa ka puhshilum (Excavator) ka la kylla bad ka la khanglad ïa ka ïaid ka ieng jong ki paidbah ka thaiñ Kyrdem ha Ri Bhoi District.Kane ka jingjia ka la jia mynta ka sngi ka 1 tarik u Naitung 2023 ha ka por 12 baje mynsngi, ha kaba kawei ka trok kaba wan na ka thaiñ Kyrdem bad kaba kit ïa ka kali Puhshilum ka la kylla hajan kawei ka jingkieng ba la tip kum ka jingkieng Umket kaba don hajan ka wah Umtung bad da ka jingkylla kane ka trok ka la wanrah jingeh ïa ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan ba kim lah shuh ban ïaid na katei ka surok ba la khanglad na ka jingkylla katei ka trok.Katkum ki  jingtip ba la ioh halor kane ka jingjia ym shym la don mano mano ba mynsaw bad lait noh ka jingshah ktah ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan bad khamtam mynta ka sngi kaba dei ka sngi ïew Umroi, bun na ki paidbah kiba leit sha katei ka ïew ban siew ban tda na kane ka iew kaba shisien shi taiew ha ka thaiñ Umroi. Ki kali kamai ki la hap ban shu ïa kylliang ïa ki nongleit nongwan hadien ba ki kali kim lah shuh ban ïaid lyngba katei ka surok ba la khang sbak da katei ka trok kaba la kylla hapdeng surok.Halor kane ka jingjia, ki bor pulit na Khapmara PIC tang mar ïa ioh jingtip ki la phah ïa ki bor pulit ban tohkit halor katei ka jingjia bad khamtam ban thaw ki lad ki lynti ban weng noh ïa katei ka trok na katei ka jaka.
title: KYLLA KA TROK KIT PUHSHILUM HA UMTUNG

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ha ka sngi baar ka la kyrpad ia ka Law Commission ban ai jingmut ia ka Sorkar Pdeng ba kan ym pyntreikam ia ka Uniform Civil Code (UCC) ha Meghalaya.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Member Secretary jong ka Law Commission, u President ka HYC u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin u la ong, “ngi kwah ban ai jingmut ia ka Commission ba kan ai jingmut ia ka Sorkar Pdeng ba kan ym pyntreikam ia ka UCC ha Meghalaya namarba kan pynjngut bad kan bujli ia ki riti ki dustur kiba la don lypa, kan pynjngut noh ia ki kyndon jong ka Sixth Scheduled bad ia ka iktiar jong ki Autonomous District Councils, kan pynkheiñ ia ka jingiasam ia ka bor treikam hapdeng ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ki Sorkar Jylla bad kan tuklar ruh ia ki kam kiba iadei bad ki niam.”“Shuh shuh, ngi ai jingmut ia ka Commission ba kan ai jingmut ia ka Sorkar India ba kan iarap ia ki Autonomous District Councils ha Meghalaya ha ka jingkyrshan pisa bad kiwei kiwei de ki lad jingiarap bad ban ialam lynti ha kaba pynlong aiñ ia ki aiñ bapher bapher,” la bynrap ka seng.U Bah Kharjahrin u la ong ba ki ADC ha Meghalaya ki hap hapoh ka Sixth Scheduled jong ka riti synshar ka ri India  ki dei kiba la pynkup bor ban shna aiñ halor ka shongkha shongman, ka jingioh pateng ia ka spah ka phew, ka riti ka dustur ba kynthup ia ka jinghiar pateng, ka jingting khun, ka jingpynryntih ia ki kam kur bad kiwei kiwei ki aiñ.  La jan palat 72 snem ka jingdon jong kine ki ADC ha Meghalaya, tad haduh mynta ki la pyndep ia la ka kamram ban iada bad ban pynneh pynsah ia ki riti ki dustur jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi-Jaiñtia ha kaba iadei bad ki aiñ.Ki riewlum ritpaid ka jylla ki dang don ka jingshahniah ha kine ki ADC bad ki dang iai kwah ban shah synshar da ki riti ki dustur bad ki jingngeit kiba la don lypa. Ki riewlum ritpaid ka Meghalaya ki pyrshah jur ia kano kano ka jingthmu jong kano kano ka bor kaba thmu ban pynjngut noh ia ki riti ki dustur kiba la don lypa ha kine ki rilum naduh hyndai hynthai.“Namarkata, ngi lah ban ong ba ki riewlum ritpaid ka Meghalaya ki da pyrshah jur ia kano kano ka jingpyrshah ban wanrah ia ka Uniform Civil Code namarba ym tangba kan pynjngut hynrei kan bujli noh wat ia ki riti ki dustur kiba la don lypa ha ka jylla,” u la ong.“Ka Jylla Meghalaya ka la don lypa ia ki aiñ kum ka shongkurim, ka jingiapyllait san shyieng, ka jingioh pateng, ka jingting khun bad kiwei kiwei bad ia kine la pyntreikam bad la pdiang ruh da ki paidbah jong ka Jylla.  Lada ka Parliament jong ka ri India ka wanrah ia ka UCC, kan pynkheiñ ia ka jingiasam bor hapdeng ka Sorkar Pdeng bad Sorkar Jylla katkum ba la kdew ha ka riti synshar ka ri India ia kaba yn ym lah satia ban pdiang,” la ong ka Seng.Haba pynpaw ba ka India ka dei ka ri kaba kdup ia ki jaitniam bapher bapher, ka HYC ka la ong ba katkum ka riti synshar ka ri India ka dei ban ai jingiada ia kawei pa kawei ka jait niam.  Ka Meghalaya ka dei ka jylla ha kaba bun ki nongshong shnong ki dei ki Khristan bad ki don ruh ki briew kiba dang bat ha la ka niam tynrai ryngkat bad kiwei kiwei pat ki jait niam kum ki Hindu, ki Muslim bad kiwei kiwei.“Ngi sngew ba ka dei ka kamram jong kano kano ka Sorkar ban burom ia kawei pa kawei ka jaitniam da kaba ailad ia kine ki jait niam ba kin bud ia la ki jong ki rukom ngeit bad ym ban bujli noh da ki kyndon kiba don katkum ka Uniform Civil Code,” u la ong.U la bynrap ba ka riti synshar ka ri ka kyntiew ia ki riti ki dustur bapher bapher, ia ki jaitniam bad ia ki jait ktien bapher bapher.  Ka dei ka jingsngew jong ngi ba ki polisi kum ka UCC kin wanrah jingkulmar bad donkam ban kyntait beit mardor.  Shuh shuh ka 21st Law Commission of India hadien ba la bishar sani bha ha kaba iadei ba ka jingpynthymmai ia ka Family Law ha ri India ka la aiti ia ka kaiphod ha u Nailar, 2018 bad ka la ai jingmut ba ka Uniform Civil Code kam da long eh kaba donkam lane kaba dei beit ban pyntreikam,” u la ong.
title: THOH KA HYC SHA KA LAW COMMISSION BAN AI JINGMUT ÏA KA SORKAR INDIA BAN YM PYNTREIKAM ÏA KA UCC

content: Shillong, Naitung, 05: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Laban Circle ha ka sngi balang ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha u Divisional Forest Officer (DFO) ka East Khasi Hills halor ka jingsah be-aiñ ki bar jylla ha Mahadev Khola.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka seng ka la pynpaw ba katkum ka jingwad bniah jong ka Seng la lap ba ka Forest Department ka la ai jaka sha ki riewngeit Hindu ban shna ia ka Mandir ha Mahadev Khola ha u snem 1923 bad ka jingai jaka ka long beit thik tang ban lehniam bad ym ban buhai shnong.“Hynrei ha ka jingleit jurip na ka liang ka Seng la lap ba ki don haduh 30-40 tylli ki longiing kiba nabar jylla bad bun tylli ki dukan ki bar jylla ba sah khlem ki kot ki sla. Kaba kham ishyrkhei ia kane ka jaka ka long ba ki Dorbar Shnong kim lah leh eiei namarba ka dei hapoh ka jingpeit ka Tnad Forest bad ki briew kiba nabar jylla ki ioh ban rung ban mih katba mon khlem don kano kano ka jingpyrkhing,” ong u kyrwoh na ka Seng.“Ki jaboh na ki thliew iing ruh la lap ba ki pyntuid beit sha ka wah bad ia ka jaboh la shu bret pathar khlem ñiewkor ia ka mei mariang.  Kane ka jaka ka long kum kawei na ki ktem jong ki nongdih drok bad bun tylli ki jingjia shah tuh sha lute ki ju jia na ka por sha ka por,” la kynnoh ka seng. “Na ka liang u DFO u la pan por ba un leit jurip bad ban pynmih ia ki briew kiba sah beaiñ,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: BA SAH BE-AIÑ KI BAR JYLLA HA MAHADEV KHOLA, MUDUI KA KSU HA U DIVISIONAL FOREST OFFICER

content: Ka Meghalaya Awakening Concern Citizens (MACC) ha ka sngi balang ka la pan jingpynshai na ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingbret jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ha ka 29 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 da ki lak tylli ki dawai ha jaka theh ñiut ha Marten, Shillong.Dang shen ka DHS (MI), Shillong ka la pynshai ba ka jingaiti sha ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ban bret noh ia ki dawai ba la sniew ia kiba la lum thup ha Central Medical Store, Shillong ka dei namarba kine ki dawai ki dei kiba la sniew namar ka jingbym ioh ban pyndonkam na ka jingwan lynshop jong ka jingpang Covid-19.U President jong ka MACC u Bah Banshai Marbaniang ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, “namarba ngim hun ia ka jingpynshai jong ka DHS (MI) ngi la wan ban pan jingpynshai na ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ha kano ka rukom la mang pisa ban thied ia ki dawai.  Hynrei ka Myntri ka la ai jubab ba ki dawai ki dei kiba la sniew na ka jingbym iohlad ban pyndonkam ha ki snem ba ka jylla ka la shah lynshop ha ka jingpang khlam Covid-19.”“Ngin iai dawa ban ioh jingpynshai ia ka thup kyrteng jong ki dawai ba la bret (sha Marten) namarba ka Drugs and Cosmetic Act, 1940 bad ka Drugs and Cosmetic Rules, 1945 ka ong ba ia ki dawai kiba la sniew yn hap ban pynphai sha ki kompeni kiba don ia ki jaka bret bad kin hap ai bujli da kiwei katkum ka Memonrandum of Understanding (MoU) ba la iasoi da ka Sokar bad ki Kompeni kiba pynpoi ia ki dawai kiba kumno ngim lah ban tip haduh mynta,” u la ong.“Ha ka jylla jong ngi ki don tang 8 tylli ki CHC bad 113 tylli ki PHC, 532 ki Sub-Centre. Ngi shem ba ia ki dawai ba la bret balei ym lah ban pynpoi sha ki CHC, ki PHC bad ki Sub-Centre.  Bun ki thaiñ nongkyndong kim don dawai, ki ud ki nam ba kim don doktor,” u la ong.“Ngi shim ba ka (jingbret ia ki dawai) ka dei ka jingpynsyrwa kai ia ka pisa u paidbah. Kata ka dei kaba ngi hap ban pynpaw.  Ka myntri ka la ong ba kan sa phah ia ka kaiphod bad katno ka pisa la mang ban thied ia ki dawai ngim pat tip,” la bynrap u Bah Marbaniang.“Ka Myntri ka la pyntip ia ngi ba ka dang ap ia ka kaiphod na ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah bad hapoh shitaiew ynda la ioh ia kaiphod kan sa ai kopi lang sha ngi bad ka kaiphod kaba ngi kwah ka dei ban long kaba shai,” u la ong.U la kam ruh ba ka jingbret ia ki dawai ha Marten kan buh jingma ia ki shnong kiba don sharum jong kane ka jaka theh ñiut bad ia ka shnong Mawiong namarba ka jingsma kaba mih na ki dawai ba laiphew jait kan ktah ia ka koit ka khiah bad ia ki nongrep kiba don sharum ka Marten.
title: BYM HUN ÏA KA JINGPYNSHAI KA DHS (MI), PAN JINGPYNSHAI KA MACC NA KA HEALTH MINISTER

content: Hadien ka jingbteng jong ki Karbi ban thombor ia ki Pnar jong ka shnong Khanduli, West Jaiñtia Hills District kiba leit rep kba, rep soh ha ki thaiñ Khappud bad kiba khang ia ki Pnar ban mih na khanduli ban rung sha ki jaka bashong basah da ki Karbi. Ka Khasi Students Union, Namdong Unit ka la talasi naphang ia ki kali kamai bad ia ki kali jong ki riewshimet ban khanglad ia ki Karbi kiba leit iew sha ka shnong Khanduli.Ka Seng ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang ka la pynpaw ba kane ka jingtalasi ia ki kali ka dei namar ka jingshah leh donbor jong ki Pnar ha ki Karbi ha kine ki khyndiat por ba la leit noh.Ka Seng ka kyntu ruh ia baroh ki nongshong shnong jong ka thaiñ bad ia baroh ki Waheh Shnong ba kin iasnohkti lang bad ka Seng ban ym ailad ia ka jingmih jingrung bad ban khaii pateng bad ki Karbi tad haduh ba ka jingsuk kan wan hapdeng ki Karbi bad ka shnong Khanduli.Ka Seng ka la maham ruh ba lada don kiba ialeh pyrshah kin hap shim hi ka jingkitkhlieh. “Na ka liang jong ka Seng kan iai don ha syndah bad ka shnong Khanduli khamtam haba ki mad kum kine ki jingeh,” la ong u kyrwoh.
title: TALASI KA KSU NAMDONG UNIT ÏA KI KALI KIBA KIT ÏA KI KARBI BAN LEIT ÏEW

content: Ki nongialam jong ka Hill Farmer Union (HFU) Pynursla Block ha ka sngi Balang ka la leit ban iakynduh ia ka Myntri ka Rep ka Riang ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ban pynsngew halor ka jinghiar dor jong ki marrep bad ka jingkiewdor jong ki marbam mardih kaba la ktah haduh katta katta ia ki nongrep.Ha ka jingiakren bad u President jong ka seng, u Bah Vishal Khongshei u la iathuh ba ka jinghiar dor jong ki mar rep kum u synsar, ki soh bad ki jhur ka la ktah shikatdei eh ia ki nongrep. Ha kajuh ka por ruh ki la kyntu ruh ia ka Sorkar ban pynbha ia ka iew kaba don ha khappud khnang ba ki nongrep na ka thain Pynursla kin iohlad ban pyniaid iew ia ki mar rep ki jong ki.U la iathuh ruh ba na ka liang jong ka Myntri ka la kular ban shimkhia ia ki mat ba ka seng ka la pynsngew ha kaba ka Myntri ka la buh sngi ha ka 10 tarik u Naitung, 2023 yn sa iathir iatai sani halor kane ka mat.Katkum ka dorkhas ba ka seng ka la aiti sha ka Myntri ka la kyrpad ia ka tnat ka Rep ka Riang ban pynkhie im biang ia ka rep Sohniamtra ha ka thain Riwar, ban buh ia ki karkhana thaw jingbam (Food Processing Industry) na ki jait soh bapher bapher kiba mih na ka thain Riwar kum u Soh Phan, Soh Trun bad kiwei kiwei, ban iarap pynsngew lem sha ka Sorkar ia ki jingeh jong ki nongrep synsar namar ka jinghiar dor shaba palat haba ianujor bad kiwei pat ki snem ba la leit noh, ban iarap ia ki nongrep ban pyniaid iew ia ki mar rep kiba don ha khappud da kaba shna ia ki iew kumba ka long ha ki por ba mynshwa.
title: KIEW DOR KI MARBAM, HIAR DOR KI MAR REP, PYNSNGEW KA HFU SHA KA SORKAR

content: Ka jingap khmihlynti kaba la slem jong ki nonghikai skul SSA ban ioh ia ka tulop Arrear ka la wan urlong ha kane ka kynti hadien ba u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma u la pyntip sha ka Meghalaya SSA School Association ba ka tnat Pla Tyngka jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pyllait ia ka tulop Arrear kaba T.12.44 klur antad kaba dei ka First Installment na ka bynta ka Financial Year jong u snem 2016-2017.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor lyngba ka Video, u President jong ka Meghalaya SSA School Association u Bah Aristotle Rymbai u la iathuh ba ha ka 3 tarik u Naitung, 2023 ka Sorkar Jylla la phah ia ka Sanction Order sha baroh ki District da kaba bthah ba kin phah ia ka pisa sha ki Personal Account jong ki nonghikai SSA.Shuh shuh u la iathuh, ha kaba iadei bad ka tulop, u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u la pyntip ba ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ka Sorkar Jylla kan sa pyllait ia ka pisa tang na ka bynta u bnai Iaiong bad u bnai Jymmang, 2023 ha ka taiew ban sa wan katba ha kaba iadei bad ka tulop kaba sah jong u bnai Jylliew yn sa pyllait kham hadien.
title: 12.44 KLUR PYLLAIT PISA KA SORKAR BAN SIEW ÏA KA TULOP ARREAR KI NONGHIKAI SSA

content: : Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha ka sngi balang ka la lumlang ia ki Syiem, ki nongmihkhmat jong ka Federation of Khasi States (FKS), ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar ka Bri u Hynniewtrep (SNSBH) bad ia ki sengbhalang kiba kynthup ia ka KSU, ka FKJGP, ka HNYF bad ia ka HYC ban pynsngew halor ka Resolution ba ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ jong ka District Council ka la shim rai dang shen ha ka 24 tarik, Jylliew, 2023 ban pyrshah ia ka jingpyrshang jong ka Sorkar National Democratic Alliance (NDA) ba la ialam da ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ban pyntreikam ia ka Uniform Civil Code (UCC) ha baroh kawei ka ri India.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang, u Deputy Chief Executive Member (Dy.CEM) jong ka Council u Bah Pynshngain N. Syiem u la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingialang la rai ban pyrshah beit ia kane ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar NDA kaba don la ki jong ki jingthmu ban iuhroit ia ki hok bad ia ki riti ki dustur. “Da kawei ka sur, ngi la rai ban pyrshah,” la iathuh u Bah PN Syiem.Haba ai nuksa ia ka jingbym mushlia jong ki Phareng haba ki wan synshar ia ka ri India bad ia ka rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia, u Bah PN Syiem ula ong, ‘shwa ka jingwan jong ki Phareng, ka riti ka dustur, ka shim kur shim jait, ka khyndew ka shyiap, ki lum ki wah, ka um, ki khlaw ki btap ka neh ka jinglong trai jong ngi.  Wat ha ka por ka Sorkar Phareng kaba khlainbor kam lah wat ban ktah ia u pud u sam jong ngi bad kam lah ban pynduh ia ki riti ki dustur jong ngi,  “Hadien ka jingleit noh ki phareng, na ka liang jong ki Hima Khasi, ngi buh syndon da ka Standstill Agreement ka First Version kaba ngi ong tang ka Defence, Currency, Communication bad kiwei kiwei kin dei jong ka Indian Dominion,” u la ong bad bynrap, “hynrei hadien ba la soi ia ka Instrument of Accession bad Annex Agreement (IOA& AA) ha ki kyndon jong ka jingiasoi ngi la kren shai, ka khlaw ka btap, ka khyndew ka shyiap bad kiwei kiwei kin dei ka jong ngi wat ka bishar ruh.”“Watla ka don kano kano ka aiñ jong ka Indian Dominion lane jong ka Assam ha kato ka por ban aibor ia ngi ban pynjanai bad ban pyllait na kino kino ki aiñ Sorkar Jylla ne Sorkar Pdeng ki bym iadei bad ngi bad kiba ktah ia ka riti ka dustur jong ngi.  Ngi ieng ha kata ka nongrim bym dei ban ktah ia ki dustur jong ngi, bad ka Article 242 jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India ka kren shai ba ka bor synshar (Administration) haba iadei bad ki jaka riewlum ka dei ban long beit katkum ki kyndon jong ka Sixth Schedule,” u la ong.“Hooid ngi sngewsih hadien ka jingpynbeit thymmai ia ka Sixth Schedule ngi lah tlot bor khyndiat, ngin ym iakren ia kata hynrei ban wanrah ia ka UCC ka long pyrshah ia ka histori, ka riti synshar bad ia ka riti ka dustur jong ngi. Ngi pyrshah ia ka jingpyntreikam ia kane (ka UCC) bad ia kane ngi la iakren lang mynta bad ngi la Draft ia ka Explanatory Note kaba ngi kyrshan ia ka nongrim kaba skhem,” la iathuh shuh shuh u Bah Syiem.
title: KA NDA KA DON LA KI JONG KI JINGTHMU BAN ÏUHROIT ÏA KI RITI DUSTUR JONG NGI : P.N. SYIEM

content: Shillong, July 06 : Ka phlim Rapture, kaba la pynmih da u nongshna phlim bapawnam ka jylla u Dominic Megam Sangma, ha ka sien kaba ar, ka la shah jied ban pyni ha ka Locarno Film Festival, Switzerland ha ka jingiakop na kylleng ka pyrthei ha Concorso Cineaste del Presente Section, ka ban sdang naduh ka 2 tarik haduh ka 12 Nailar.Ia kane ka phlim ba la thoh bad ba la direct hi da u Sangma, ka kyrteng tynrai ka dei, ‘Rimdogittanga’ kaba jrong 127 minit.Kane ka phlim ba la pynmih da ka India, China, Switzerland bad Qatar ka la iohlad ban pyni ha ki tamasa pyni phlim bapawnam, kum ka Film Bazaar, Tokyo Talents (producer), bad BoostNL ha u snem 2019 bad Berlinale Talents (director) bad La Fabrique du Cinema ha u snem 2020.Ka Rapture ka la ioh pdiang jingiarap pisa na ka Hubert Bals Fund – Script Development and Vision Sud Est – Production Fund ha u snem 2019. Ha u snem 2022, ka la shah jied ban ioh ia ka khusnam Doha Film Institute – Post-production Fund.Katkum ka jingpynwandur jong u Sangma, kane ka phlim ka iathuh shaphang ka jingngeit biej bad ka jingsheptieng ha kaba ka jingphohsniew bad ka jingshisha ka don ia ka khana shaphang kawei ka shnong kaba ju mih ka jingsawa na meira-wew manla ka saw snem lyngba ka jingiathuh jong uwei u khynnah.U nongshna ia kane ka phlim u ong, “ka jingrongnoh ka mih na ka jingsngew jong u shaphang ka jingsheptieng namarba u don ka jingpang byrie ha ki khmat.  Kum u khynnah, nga la mad ia ka jingtieng shaphang ki nongrahbor ia ki khynnah kiba ju shang kylleng ka shnong ha ka por mynmiet.  Ym don kaei kaei ruh kaba nga sheptieng eh ban ia ka jingdum jong ka miet. Manla ka miet, ki nongshong shnong ki ju pahara ia ka shnong.”U la sakhi ruh ia kawei ka jingjia basngewsih halor ka jingshah bom shah tied jong uwei u bar shnong tang na ka daw ka jingshah kynnoh ba u dei u nongrahbor ia ki khynnah.“Kane ka la ktah bha ia nga kum u khynnah, kaba bet ia u symbai jong ka jingiapher hapdeng ‘ki’ bad ‘ngi’.  Da ka jingrongnoh, nga kwah ban pyndam noh lane ban kah noh ia u lain hapdeng ‘ki’  bad ‘ngi’, u la bynrap.Kane ka phlim ka la shah jied ruh ban ioh pdiang ia ka The Green Pardo Award, ka khusnam ba la pynmih ha u snem 2022 ban rakhe shaphang ki phlim kiba iadei bad ka jingpynneh pynsah, ka mariang bad ka jingiadei bad ki jingthaw ba im.U Director jong ka Locarno Film Festival u la jied 10 tylli ki Feature phlim bad ka prokram jong ki phlim lyngkot, ba la pynbna paidbah kum ka World lane ka International Premiere ha ka festival’s official sections, kaba kdew shaphang ka jingiadei hapdeng u briew bad mariang.U Sangma u dei uba la pyndep ia ka Graduate na ka Satyajit Ray Film bad Television Institute (SRFTI), India, ha kaba u la pyntbit bha ialade ha ka Direction bad Screenplay Writing. Shwa ban ngam sha ka pyrthei shna phlim ula seng ia ka kompeni pynmih phlim, ka Anna Films, u la trei shipor bad ka National Film and Development Corporation Ltd (NFDC) haduh ar snem.Ka phlim jong u, ba la ai kyrteng Ma.Ama ka la long ka phlim Garo ba nyngkong eh ban jop ia ka National Award, kynthup ha ka “Best Cinematography Award” ha ka 22nd Shanghai International Film Festival ha u snem 2019.U la long u nongbishar ha kiba bun ki tamasa pyni phlim ha ka ri bad u dei ruh u Guest Faculty ha ka Film and Television Institute, Itanagar. U la long uwei napdeng ki nongseng ia ka Kelvin Cinema Festival bad u Artistic Director jong ka tamasa ba la pyni ia ki phlim lyngkot ha ka ri.
title: SHAH JIED KA PHLIM RAPTURE NA KA BYNTA “WORLD PREMIERE” HA 76 LOCARNO FILM FESTIVAL 2023

content: : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la ïathuh ba ka don ka jingtih bniah ban pynsdang noh ïa ka lynti Rel sha East Jaiñtia Hills District. Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Myntri Rangabh u la ong ïa ka projek shna lynti Rel Byrnihat-Shillong la hap ban pynsangeh noh na ka daw ka jingmih ki jingpyrshah kiba bun na ki kynhun bapher bapher.“Ka la don ka jingïakren bad ka Sorkar Pdeng ba ka pisa kaba la mang na ka bynta ka projek shna lynti Rel Byrnihat-Shillong la hap ban kdat noh bad yn sa bhah noh sha ki projek na ka bynta kiwei pat ki zone lane sha kiwei pat ki bynta jong ka jylla ban plie ïa ka lynti Rel,” ula ong.U la ong, “ka la don ka jingtih bniah ha East Jaiñtia Hills na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka lynti Rel kaba poi haduh ka shnong Khliehriat. Kata ruh ka shong ha ka jingïakren bad ki nongïalam shnong bad ki paidbah ryngkat bad ki kynhun bapher bapher.”U Sangma u la ong, ba ka Sorkar India kan ym lah ban shu ap sah namarba ka lah ban shu pyndam noh ïa kane ka projek shna lynti Rel kaba pynpoi haduh Shillong bad ïa ka pisa yn sa ai noh sha kiwei pat ki Zone lada ka lad ka plie.
title: PHAIKHMAT KA SORKAR BAN SHNA ÏA KA LYNTI REL SHA EJH BA PYRSHAH IA KA LYNTI REL BYRNIHAT-SHILLONG

content: Ka ophis jong ka Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills District, ka la kyrpad ia baroh ki paidbah kiba ladep shondur Megha Health Insurance Scheme (MHIS) ne Smart Card jong ka East Khasi Hills District ba kin pyniasoh ia u Aadhaar Number bad ka MHIS Card.Ka MHIS ka la sdang ha u snem 2013 bad naduh kato ka por, ka la ai jingmyntoi ia ki paidbah jong ka District bad ka jylla hi baroh kawei da ka jngiarap ha kaba siew lang ia ka bailut baisep haba leit shah sumar sukher ha ki hospital khamtam ia ki briew kiba duk jong ka district.Kane ka skhim mynta ka la ai jingiarap haduh T. 5,30,000 kawei kawei ka longing.  Ki don da ki hajar ki longing kiba lah ioh jingmyntoi na kane ka skhim.  Hynrei mynta kim lah shuh ban ioh ia ka jingmyntoi na ka skhim lada kim pyniasoh (link) ia u Aadhaar bad ka MHIS Card.“Kumta la kyrpad ia phi baroh ryngkat lang ki bahaing hasem jong phi kiba la don ia u Aadhaar Card bad ka MHIS, ba phin wan shakhmat ban pyniasoh ne link ia u Aadhaar bad ka MHIS (smart card) jong phi khnang ba phin ym duh ia ki jingmyntoi jong ka skhim.  La kyrpad ba phin wan noh kloi bad ba phin ym dier than shuh khnang ba phi lah ban ioh jingmyntoi ha ka por ba biang,” ong u kyrwoh na ka Deputy Commissioner ka Kong R.M. Kurbah.“Ngi don ka jingkitkhlieh ia phi bad ia ka longing longsem jong phi bad ngi kwah ban iarap ia phi khnang ba ma phi bad ki bahaing jong phi phin ioh ia ki jingmyntoi kiba dei ka hok jong phi,” bynrap u kyrwoh.“Phi lah ban leit sha ki ophis jong ka Block ne ha ki CHC/PHC ba don hajan jong phi ban pyniasnoh (link) ia ka MHIS bad ka Aadhaar card,” ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: PYNÏASOH ÏA U AADHAAR BAD KA MHIS BAN ÏOH ÏA KI JINGMYNTOI: DC EAST KHASI HILLS

content: : Ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la sdang ia ka conclave kaba ar sngi halor ka phang kabadonkam bha kaba  iadei bad ka jingkylla jong ka suiñ bneng, ‘Nature Solves : A New Framework for Our Sustainable Future” hapoh la lama jong ka G20 Summit kaba la pynlong da ka sorkar India.U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K. Sangma u la ai ia ka jingkren ba kyrpang sha ki nongmihkhmat na ki Ri bapher bapher kiba kynthup na  ka United Nations, na ka ri Mexico, Sri Lanka, Kenya, France, Nepal, USA, Bangladesh, Italy, Germany, South Africa, Brazil, Maldives, Rome bad ruh ki kynhun kum na ka World Economic Forum, SEWA India, ASCON India, South African BRICS Youth Association (SABYA), TERI India, nalor kiwei ki ban shim bynta lang ban iatai halor ka phang kaba iadei bad ka jingkylla jong ka suin bneng.Ha ka jingplie ia kane ka lympung la sakhi lang da u Chief Secretary jong ka Jylla u Bah D.P. Wahlang,  ka Eenam Gambhir, Joint Secretary (G20), Ministry of External Affairs, Government of India,  Kong Laetitia Bruce Warjri, Head of Communications and Outreach, Observer ResearchFoundation, India,  Samir Saran, Chair, T20 Secretariat; Member, T20 India Core Group, bad  President Observer Research Foundation, Indiaa bad ka Aparna Roy, Fellow, Lead, Climate Change and Energy, Centre for New Economic Diplomacy, Observer Research Foundation, India.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, ‘Kane ka rynsan ka ailad iangi ban pynkynmaw ia ki paidbah ba ka jingkylla ka suinbneng kadei kaba shisha bad ka la jia mynta hangne hakhmat jongngi. Ngi dei ban tip ia ka jingshisha halor kane ka bynta. Ka sorkar ka la tip ia kine ki jingjia baroh bad kumta ka wanrah ia ki sienjam kumno ban pyniabiang lang. Mynta ka sngi haba ngi ialum lang ha Meghalaya nga kwah ban ong ba ki paidbah ka Meghalaya ki don ka jingiadei kaba jan bha bad ka mariang, bad ki long kiba la kyrkhu ruh ban ioh ia ka mei mariang kaba don laiphewjait ki jingphylla ha ka ia kiba ngi dang ri bad sumar haduh mynta mynne ia ka mei mariang.Ka pyrthei mynta ka don hapdeng ka khim khait da ka jingwan jong kine ki jingkylla ka mariang, ka jingpynsyllen ia ki khlaw, ka jingduh noh ki khlaw ki btap bad ki jingdon ha ka mariang, bad khamtam ka jingjur ki jingpynjaboh ia ka mariang. Kumta kine kiei kiei baroh ki dawa iangi ba ngin pynleit jingmut bad pynkylla ia ka rukom pynleit jingmut ha ka jingiakhun ban pynneh ia ka.Lyngba ka Centre of Excellence project, ngi khmih lynti ban pynlong man u snem ia ka jingkynduh lang ban ailad ia ki paidbah ba kin iasyllok bad iatai halor ki mat kiba iadei bad ka jingkylla ka suinbneng bad kiwei kiwei ki mat ba ktah ia ka mei mariang. Kumta, da kaba treilang, ngin sa lah ban don ha ka lynti jong ka lawei kaba don jingkyrmen kaba ka jingstad jong ka mei mariang kan btin lynti ia ngi bad ka bor jong ka jingiatrei lang kan iarap iangi ban jam shakhmat.Haba bynrap lang, u Chief Secretary ka Jylla, Bah D.P. Wahlang u la ong, “Naduh kine ki khyndiat phew snem ba la dep, ngi la sakhi ïa ka jingkylla kaba suki ha ka jinglong jingman jong ka mariang. Kum u khynnah rit, Nga kynmaw halor ka jingdon bun kyrhai ki soh ñiamtra ha shnong, hynrei mynta ki la duna shibun namar ka jingkylla ha ka suiñ bneng. Kane ka pynkynmaw halor ka jingdonkam ban shimkhia mardor ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa kane ka jingkylla sted ha ka suiñbneng bad ka jinglong jingman ha ka mariang.U la ong ruh ba na ka liang ka sorkar Meghalaya hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Myntri Rangbah ka la shim ïa ki sienjam ba tyngeh ban ïakhun pyrshah bad ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka jinglong jingman ha ka mariang. Kawei na kine ki sienjam ka dei lyngba ka Payment for Ecosystem Service (PES) program, ïa kaba la dep lypa ban pyntreikam haduh palat 50,000 hectare na ka bynta ki jingthung jingtep. Kane ka sienjam ka pynapw halor ka jingkut jingmut ka jong ngi ban lah ban pynneh ïa kane ka jingpyrshang bad ban pynneh pynsah ïa kiei kiei kiba don tynrai ha ka mariang.Nalor kata u la ong ruh ba ki samla ki don ïa ka bynta kaba kongsan na ka bynta ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa kane ka jingkylla ha ka mariang hapoh ki shnong ki thaw ki jong ki. Ka dei lyngba ka jingsngewtynnad, ka jingkut jingmut bad ka jingtrei borbah ka ba ngin lah pat ban wanrah ïa ka jingkylla kaba don jingmut. U la ong ruh ba ka wanrah ïa ka Centre of Excellence for Natural Resources Management ka long kaba kongsan na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka jingkylla kaba khraw halor kane ka bynta.U la ong ruh ba kum ki nongshong shnong ki don ïa ka bynta kaba hakhmat eh na ka bynta ban pynneh ïa ki jingpyrshang barim.Ka Lawkyntang ne Sacred Groves ka la mihkhmat ïa ka jylla ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynneh pynsah ïa ka mariang ïa kaba la pynshong nongrim katkum ka jingnang jingtip bad ka kolshor jong ki mynbarim, kata ha ka jaka kaba ka jingheh kaba haduh kumba 10,000 hectare ha kumba 100 tylli ki jaka, kata nalor palat 150 tylli ki khlaw shimet kiba kdup haduh kumba 2,500 hectate ha ka jylla ïa kine ki jaka la pynneh pynsah da ki nongshong shnong ka jylla.Na ka liang ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la pyntreikam ruh lyngba ka ‘Green Meghalaya program,’ kaba ai khusnam sha ki shnong kiba lah ban pynneh pynsah bad ai jingïada ïa ki khlaw ki btap. Lyngba kane ka prokram, ka jingthmu ka long ban sumar bad pynneh pynsah ïa kumba 2 lak hectare ki jaka khlaw na ka bynta kine ki san snem ki ban wan. Na ka liang ka sorkar ka la trei ruh khlem shongthait ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingkylla ha ka suiñbneng lyngba ka ‘State Action Plan on Climate Change 2.0’.Ha kane ka rynsan iatai kaba ar sngi halor ki sienjam ba thymmai ban ioh ia ka lawei kaba don jingkyrmen, ki paidbah kim dei ban klet ba ki briew ruh ki dei ki nongda nongker bad nongsumar ia kane ka planet kaba la pynkupbor ia ki ban sumar naka bynta ka pateng ban sa wan kadei ka kamram jong ngi baroh ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban leh ia ka.Ka sorkar Meghalaya ka don ka jingkyrmen ba lyngba kane ka jingkynduh lang kan long kum ka jingpynkyndit bynriew, bad ka jingshim ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban trei na ka bynta ki kam ki ban pynkhie im biang ia ka mariang. Da kaba leh kumta, baroh kin lah ban thaw ia ka pyrthei kaba ka mariang bad ki khun bynriew ki lah ban ban shong ban sah lang da ka jingsuk jingsaiñ.
title: KA G20 SUMMIT HA MEGHALAYA: UNVEILING ‘NATURE SOLVES’ – A NEW FRAMEWORK FOR OUR SUSTAINABLE FUTURE

content: Jowai, Naitung 6 : Ki nongialam ka KSU Namdong Unit ha ka jingialam u President Samla Kitbok Lang Lamare ki la leit ban hiar biang mynta ka miet ban leit jurip ia ka CHC Namdong ha ka por ba lip ka light ha katei ka thain bad ka la lap ba haduh mynta kane ka CHC ka hap ban shong hapdeng jong ka jing dum.U President ka Namdong Unit, u la ong ba kane ka CHC ka la long kum ka sem ki mrad, namar ba ka jing pynkha khun ruh lah isynei hap ban shu tbeh da ki mombati bad ki torch light, haba kumne kan jia aiu ia ka jingim briew, hato ban sumar briew ka long mo hapdeng ka jing dum. Ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka la kheiñ dew thala ia kane ka CHC ka jong ngi khlem da shim khia ia ki jing pynsngew ka seng ha kaba iadei ban pynbha ia ki solar panel bad lane ban buh da ka Generator kumba la ai jingmut da ka seng ha kine ki khyndiat taiew kiba lah dep, u la bynrap.Ka KSU kam lah ban shu peit da ki khmat ia kane ka jingeh kiba kane ka CHC ka hap mad, lada ka tnat ba dei peit kam shim khia ngin hap ban pyrkhat da kumwei pat.
title: HA KA JINGDUM HAP THIAH KI NONGPANG, SHEM JINGEH KI DOCTOR KI NURSE BAN AI JINGSUMAR

content: Ki nongialam jong ka Tour Guide Association of Meghalaya (TGAM) ha ka sngi palei ki la iakynduh ia u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ban kyntu ia ka District Council ba ka dei ban pyrrkhing ia ka jingtreikam jong ki Tour Guide Operator kiba nabar jylla ban treikam hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Council.Ha ka jingkren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President jong ka TGAM, Bah Ialamphang Lyngdoh u la ong ba kane ka jingpynsngew sha ki tyndong skhor jong ka Council ka long namar ka jingsdang ban jyllei jong ki Tour Operator kiba wan nabar jylla ban treikam hapoh u pud u sam ka Council khlem da kynjoh ktien sha ki Tour Operator trai ri trai muluk kiba im kamai jakpoh na kane ka kam.Ka seng ka la shem ba kane ka jingtreikam jong ki Tour Operator kiba nabar jylla ka la ktah bha ia ki samla trai ri trai muluk kiba sengkam lajong khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka jingkyntiew ia ki kam jngohkai pyrthei hapoh ka jylla.
title: DAWA KA TGAM ÏA KA KHADC BAN PYRKHING ÏA KI TOUR GUIDE NABAR JYLLA

content: U Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ha ka sngi palei u la pynbna ba ka Council kan ai baibam ne ka Scholarship sha ki Research Scholar kiba wan shakhmat ban tih bniah ha kaba iadei bad ka synshar ka khadar, ka riti ka dustur bad ka jinglong jingman jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi.Ha jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah pyniaid u la ong ba kane ka jingthmu jong ka Council ka long ban pynriewspah ia ka jingtip halor ka riti bad ka dustur jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi namar kumba long haduh mynta ym pat don satia kino kino ki kot kiba la wad bniah halor kine ki bynta kiba ka Council ka lah ban pyndonkam lada don ka jingkulmar ha ka rukom synshar ka khadar.U la iathuh, ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka Executive Committee ka la bynshet ha u EM i/c ka tnat Pule Puthi u Bah Carnes Sohshang ban pyntyllun shakhmat ia kane ka kam bad ia ki kyndon yn sa pynbna kham hadien khnang ba ki Research Scholar kin ioh ia ka baibam kumba ka Council ka la pynbna.
title: KULAR KA KHADC BAN AI SCHOLARSHIP ÏA KIBA TIH BNIAH SHAPHANG KA RITI DUSTUR KHASI

content: U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger uba la leit jurip ia ka jingshah wiang ding jong ki kali ha Laitumkhrah Police Station, u la iathuh ba ka jingiakajia hapdeng ki arliang mamla ka la sdang shwa na surok ha ka miet jong ka sngi palei bad kane ka jingiakajia ka la bteng ruh wat hadien ba ki arliang manla ki la poi ban ia mudui ejahar mar kylliang haduh Police Station.Ha kane ka jingjia, ki kali ba la pynieng ha phyllaw jong ka Laitumkhrah Police Station ba kynthup ia kawei ka kali Gypsy Pulit kaba don ia u nombar ML02-0238 ka la shah wiang ding katba ka kali Tourist kaba don ia u nombar ML05-Y-9977 ka la shah pynjulor na ka jingshah kawang maw bad kawei ka thuk thuk ar shaka kaba don ha kane kajuh ka jaka ka la julor malu mala.Shwa kane, u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger lem bad u SP (City) Bah Vivek Syiem ki la shong jingialang bad ki Ophisar Pulit jong ka Laitumkhrah Police Station ryngkat lang bad ka MLA jong ka Laitumkhrah Constituency ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba long ruh ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u MDC ka Laitumkhrah-Malki u Bah Joseph Fantin Lakadong ban iakren sani halor kane ka jingjia kaba la pynkyndit ia baroh ki nongshong shnong ka nongbah Shillong.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Nongtnger u la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la register case halor kane ka jingjia bad ka jingtohkit kan sa iaid shakmat shwa ban kem ia ki briew kiba donkti ha kaba wiangding ia ki ar tylli ki kali ba la pynieng ha phyllaw jong ka Laitumkhrah Police Station.Ha kajuh ka por u la kyntait ruh ia ka jingkynnoh ba ki Pulit kiba don ha ka kamram hapoh ka thanat kim shym la pdiang satia ka ejahar ba la mudui ha ka miet 6 tarik Naitung, 2023.“Ka jingkajia ka dei kaba rit, ka don ka jingiakajia sha surok bad ym dei hapoh thanat hapdeng ka kynhun jong ki Khynnah Khasi bad kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew.
