Ynda la poi hapoh thanat ban ujor ejahar ki sdang ban iakajia paramaki bad ki aireng ruh wat ia ki ophisar kiba don ha ka kamram hapoh thanat,” ong u Bah Nongtnger.U la iathuh hadien ba u Officer In-charge  u la bthah ba kin ujor da ka ejahar, kawei ka kynhun ka la ujor ia ka ejahar katba kawei pat ka la kyntait ban ujor ia ka ejahar bad na ka liang jong u Ophisar u la batai katba lah namarba ki la kyntait ban ujor ejahar.“Hadien ki wan bun ki briew kiba ngim lah ban batai, shiteng ki rung shapoh bad shiteng ki ieng shabar.  Katba ka dang don ka jingiakren pynbeit shapoh, kiba ieng shabar ki la thang ia ki kali,” la iathuh u Bah Nongtnger.Haba kylli, hato ki Pulit ki la ithuh neem ia kiba donkti, u SP u la ong, “ngi la ithuh ia ki katto katne bad ia ka case ladep rejistar bad ki Pulit kin sa pynlong ka jingtokit.”U la ong ruh ba ka tnat Pulit ka la pyrshang katba lah ban tehlakam ban pynneh ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad ong ruh ba ym shym la khmihlynti ba kane kan mih ka jingjia kaba heh haduh katne.Halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki Pulit CRPF ki la kawut lathi, u SP u la ong, “kito ki khynnah kiba don hangne hynin mynmiet ki pyrshang ban knieh ia ki suloi jong ki CRPF bad ki CRPF ki don ka hok ban iakhun bad ki CRPF ki ladep la ka kamram bad ki la mut ban leit phai noh sha jaka sah lajong.  Hadien ba la mih ki Ophiar jong ngi nangne (Thanat) ki la pyniasuk bad ki CRPF ki la leit noh.”
title: NA KA JINGÏASHOH SHA SUROK, POI ÏAKAJIA SA HA POLICE STATION, PYNSHAI U SP

content: Ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba long ka MLA jong ka Laitumkhrah Constituency bad ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la bthah ia ka tnat Pulit ba kan pynlong da ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor ka jingjia ha ka miet sngi Palei kaba lam shaduh u pud ba ki kali ba la pynieng ha phyllaw jong ka Laitumkhrah Police Station ba kynthup ia kawei ka kali Gypsy jong ki Pulit kaba don ia u nombar ML02-0238 ka la shah wiang ding katba ka kali Tourist kaba don ia u nombar ML05 Y-9977 ka la shah pynjulor na ka jingshah kawang da ki maw bad kawei ka thuk thuk ar shaka kaba don ha kane kajuh ka jaka ka la julor malu mala.Ban tip bniah ia kane ka jingjia, ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, ryngkat bad u MDC ka Laitumkhrah-Malki Constituency u Bah Joseph Fantin Lakadong ha ka sngi thohdieng ki la leit jurip ia ka Laitumkhrah Police Station bad shong jingialang ruh bad u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger, u SP (City) Bah Vivek Syiem bad kiwei kiwei ki Pulit ophisar jong ka Laitumkhrah Police Station.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor kane ka MLA jong ka Laitumkhrah ka la pynrem jur ia kane ka jingjia bad iathuh ruh ba ka la bthah ia ka tnat Pulit ban register case halor kane ka jingjia bad ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah khnang ba ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam ki dei ban ngat ha ki kynjri jong ka ain.“Nga la ladep bthah ia ki Pulit ba kim dei ban shah kum ia kine ki jingjia. Haba la lap ba phi thang ia ki kali phi hap ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh.  Ki Pulit ki dang pynkhreh ia ka kaiphod namarba u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba peit ia ka tnat Kam Pohing u la bthah ia ki Pulit ban tehlakam ia ka jingjia bad pan ruh ia ka kaiphod khnang ban dup tip ia ka daw tynrai,” la bynrap shuh shuh ka Dr. Ampareen.“Ka Laitumkhrah ka dei ka shnong kaba tip briew tip aiñ bad ngin ym shah ba kin leh kumne.  Ngi la ong ia ki Pulit ba kin pynlong ia ka jingtohkit katkum ki lynti jong ka aiñ,” la ong ka Dr. Ampareen.Ka la ong ruh ba katkum ka jingtip, ka jingiakajia ka la jia ha ka por mynmiet bad ka jingiakren ruh ka long hapdeng ka jingbym biang ka khlieh.  “Ha ka jingshisha manla ki Police Station ki dei ban rah medical test (ia kiba iakajia) lada ka jia kumne.  Ka jingiadih iabam ka long kaba sngewsih. Haba phi wan da u paidbhur ban iakren ha ka por mynmiet, kam don jingshai.  Ngi dei ban peit ba kane ka kam ka dei ban kut noh hangne,” la bynrap ka Dr. Ampareen.Shuh shuh ka la ong ba kum ka shnong Laitumkhrah kam kwah ba kiba nabar kin pyndik ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ hapoh ka shnong.
title: BTHAH KA DR. AMPAREEN ÏA KI PULIT BAN TOHKIT ÏA KA JINGJIA HA LAITUMKHRAH PS

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit, ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la dawa ia ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) ba kam dei satia ban ai No objection Certificate (NoC) sha ka North-east Frontier Railway (NFR) ne sha ka Sorkar ban pynpoi ia ka lynti Rel ha Khliehriat, East Jaiñtia Hills District katba ka Sorkar kam pat lah ban wanrah ia ki aiñ kiba khlaiñ kiba iada na ka jingwan tuid kyrthep jong ki briew kiba nabar sha ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka seng ka la pynpaw ba kan sa aiti da ka jingthoh sha ka Council ha ka taiew ban sa wan namarba ia mynta ka dang don hapdeng ka shuti Behdeinkhlam.Kane ka jingpyrshah jong ka seng ka long shisngi hadien ba u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K. Sangma u la pynbna ba ka lah don biang ka jingthmu ban wanrah ia ka lynti rel ha ka thain East Jaiñtia Hills District.“Ka jingthmu jong ka seng ban pynsngew sha ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council ka long halor ka nongrim ban kyntu ia ka Council hi baroh kawei ba kan pyrkhat rangbah bad ban ym ai NoC ia ka NFR kaba dei ban khmih ia kane ka projek. Ka seng ka banjur ia ka District Council kaba long ka stieh iada jong ka jaidbynriew ka dei ban pyrkhat sani bha halor kane ban nym ai satia ia ka NoC. Ka seng ka khmihlynti ba ki nongialam bad ki nongmihkhmat jong ka JHADC kin dei ban don kajuh ka sur halor ka lynti Rel,’ ong u kyrwoh na ka seng ba la soi da u President ka KSU-East Jaiñtia Hills u Bah Streamly N. Suchen.Ka seng ka la aiti ruh da ka jingthoh sha ka Sorkar lyngba u Deputy Commisisoner u Abhilash Baranwal ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah jong ka seng ban pynpoi ia ka lynti Rel ha East Jaiñtia Hills District.“Ka seng ka iengskhem halor kane ka mat katba ym pat don ki ain kiba khlain ban iada ia ngi kum ka jaidbynriew ritpaid, ka jingiakren halor ka lynti Rel kan sangeh shwa. Ka seng, naduh u snem 1988 ka la pyrshah ia kane ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar ban iuhroit ia ka jaidbynriew bad kan iai pyrshah katba ka Sorkar kam pat pyrkhat thymmai ban wanrah ia ki ain kiba khlain ban iada ia ngi,” ong u kyrwoh“Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, ka Sorkar ka la pyrshang ban pyntrei ia kane ka project na Tetelia sha Byrnihat hynrei ka seng ka la pynpulom ia kane ka jingthmu da kaba pyrshah jur bad pynsangeh ia kane ka projek ha u snem 2016,” u la ong.Ka seng ka kyntu ruh ia ki Dorbar Shnong, ia ki paidbah bad khamtam ia ki MLA bad MP ba kin iatreilang halor kane ka kam bad bynrap ruh ba ka seng kan nang iai buddien ia kane ka kam bad shim ruh ki lad ki lynti ban pynshai sha u paidbah halor ka jingma kiba ap lada wan ka lynti Rel.“Ka seng ka sngew ban pynpaw ruh sha ka Sorkar ba kam dei ban kyrkieh ia ka lynti Rel hynrei ban wanrah shwa ia ka roi ka par sha ki paidbah ka thain naduh ka surok, ka koit ka khiah, ka pule ka dangle bad kumta ter ter,” la bynrap u kyrwoh na ka seng.
title: DAWA KA KSU ÏA KA JHADC BAN YM AI NoC BAN SHNA LYNTI REL HA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS

content: Kum shi bynta ban lum jingtip bad ban wad bniah halor ka jinglong jingman jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong ha khappud khamtam ha ka thain Langpih ka Regional Committee na ka bynta ka West Khasi Hills ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la lum ia ka jingialang bad ki nongshong shnong jong ka thaiñ kaba la long hapoh Tyrsem Hall jong ka ophis u Deputy Commissioner ha Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka Committee ba la lamkhmat da u Bah Paul Lyngdoh kum u Chairman la donlang ruh ki dkhot jong ka Committee kiba kynthup ia ki MLA, kata, u Bah Renikton Tongkhar, u Remington G Momin, u MDC u Bah Bajop Pyngropre, ki ophisar, ki nongsynshar shnong bad ki Sengbhalang.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang u Bah Paul u la iathuh katkum ka jingioh lum jingtip jong ka Committee lyngba kane ka jingialang, ki don haduh 41 tylli ki shnong Khasi bad ki shnong Garo kiba pynpaw ba ki kwah beit ban don hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya katba 9 tylli ki shnong ki dei kiba kwah ban leit sha Assam.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba ka Committee shen kan sa pynlong ruh ia ka jingjurip lang bad ka Regional Committee na ka Jylla Assam khnang ban tip kham bniah ia ka jinglong jingman ha ki shnong khappud jong ka thain Langpih.
title: 41 TYLLI KI SHNONG KA THAIÑ LANGPIH KIBA KWAH BAN DON HA MEGHALAYA, 9 TYLLI SHA ASSAM

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka lapynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingshah shoh bad shah pyniap jong ki Khasi ha ki mynder na ka por sha ka por ha jylla Meghalaya khamtam ha sor Shillong, ka sor ba la syrtap da ki mynder nongwei.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi thohdieng da u General Secretary ka KSU, u samla Donald V. Thabah u la ong, “ka KSU ka kwah ban pynkynmaw ia ki parari halor ki jingjia kiba man ka por ha kaba ki mynder ki ju thombor ia ki Khasi khlem kano kano ka daw.”“Dang ha u 2020, ki mynder Bengali ki la pyniap dusmon ia u Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta ha Pyntha Umdan kaba la pynsmiej ia baroh ki paidbah Khasi kiba sah sha kito ki thaiñ. Ha u 2021 ter ter, ki mynder ki la pyniap dusmon ia u Phershanroy Myrthong ha Golf Links bad ki la bom iap ia u Elias L Nonglait ha Them Bijoy. Ki la bun ruh ki jingshah shoh ki Khasi kum ha Nongmensong, ha Rilbong, ha 4th Furlong bad shawei shawei.  Dang shen ar ngut ki samla Khasi kiba dang kamai jakpoh ha Khyndailad ki la shah bom shah tied da ki tiar pynmynsaw ha ki dkhar ba la shongshit khawiang,” ong u kyrwoh.“Ka KSU ka la ioh jingtip ruh ba mynnin ka miet (Sngi Palei) ka huri hura ha Laitumkhrah ka mih namar ka jingjrong kti khlem daw jong ki dkhar ia ki khynnah Khasi. Kaba sngewphylla ka long haba ki CRPF ki la wan, ki ai jingiada pynban ia kine ki dkhar bad tied lathi naphang ia ki Khasi. Halor kane ka jingjia mynnin, ka seng ka dang iai lum shuh ki jingtip ban ioh ia ka jingshisha kaba la poi haduh uto u pud,” ong u General Secretary ka KSU halor ka jingjia ha ka Laitumkhrah ha ka miet sngi Palei.“Kine ki jingjia kiba khah khah ki la pynkynmaw ia ka KSU ia ki por kiba la leit kum ha ki phew snem 70, 80 bad 90 ha kaba ki dkhar ki thom naphang ia ki Khasi da ka jingthmu ba pynlong ia ki Khasi ban phetwir noh na Shillong. Ka KSU ka bthah ia ki nongialam Jaidbynriew jong ki dkhar bapher bapher ba ki dei ban tehlakam ia ki briew jong ki, lym kumta ka KSU kam banse ban shim biang da ki sienjam kumba ki nongialam ka seng ki la shim ha kito ki por kum ka Anti-Foreigners’ Movement.  Lada ka seng ka hap ban shim ia kita ki sienjam, kine ki jaidbynriew lem bad ka Sorkar kin hap ban bah khlieh lada jia eiei kaba sngewsih,” la maham u General Secretary ka KSU. “Ka KSU ka kyntu ruh ia baroh ki para Khasi ban long kiba la khreh namar kane ka jingleh ki dkhar ka dei ka buit ban pyntreikam ia ki jingthmu ki jong ki, kiba ki la pun naduh ki por mynshwa,” u la bynrap.
title: SNGEWKHIA KA KSU HALOR KA JINGSHAH THOMBOR BA KHAH KHAH KI KHASI HA KI MYNDER

content: Mawkyrwat, ‘Naitung 07: Ka South West Khasi Hills District Badminton Association ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka ophis u District Sports Officer, South West Khasi Hills District mynta ka sngi ka la plie pyrda ia ka lympung ialehkai badminton kaba la tip kum ka ‘9th South West Khasi Hills District Badminton Championship 2023’ (SWKHDBC) hapoh ka Mawkyrwat Indoor Stadium, South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba u Bah Pius Marweiñ, MLA ka Ranikor Constituency u la long kum u Kongsan.Kiba la wan iashimbynta ha kane ka jingïalehkai ki don baroh 101 ngut naduh ki hep rit, ki samla, ki rangbah bad kumjuh ruh ki longkmie.Haba kren kum u Kongsan, u Bah Pius Marweiñ, MLA ka Ranikor Constituency u la pynpaw ka jingaikhublei na ka bynta kane ka association kaba la pynlong ia kum kane ka lympumg ialehkai kaba long kum shibynta ba ki khynnah rit, ki samla bad kiba la heh la san kin ioh ban ia kilanmet khnang ba kin ioh ka met kaba koit ba khiah. Ha kajuh ka por u la ong ruh ba ki jingialehkai ha kine ki sngi kim long shuh tang ki jingpynbyrngia ia ki shimet ne ia ki nongpeit kai hynrei ka la long kawei na ki bynta ban ai kam ai jam na ka bynta kito kiba nang ban pyndonkam hok ia ka sap kaba U Blei U la ai ha ki.Namarkata, u la ai mynsiem ia ki ‘rang bad ki ‘thei ialehkai ba kim dei ban shu ialehkai tang ban pynlut kai ia ka por, hynrei ki dei ban buh ha ki ia ka thong ban poi sha kiwei pat ki kyrdan kata ban kiew na ka distrik sha ka state bad kumjuh ruh wat ha ka National Level.Kiwei pat kiba iadonlang ki long ka Kong Y.R. Mawlong, MCS, Additional Deputy Commissioner, South West Khasi Hills District, u Bah R.R. Lyngkhoi, Myntri Shnong Sohkhyllam bad kiwei de ki riew rangbah.U Bah H.S. Diengdoh, President jong ka South West Khasi Hills District Badminton Association u la pyniaid ia ka jingialang bad ka Kong Nemoralda Nongrum, Treasure jong ka South West Khasi Hills District Badminton Association pat kaba la ai ki ktien khublei.
title: LA PLIE PYRDA IA KA 9th SWKHD BADMINTON C’SHIP 2023 HA MAWKYRWAT

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) East Jaintia Hills District Unit ka la pynpaw bad kren shai katba ka Sorkar kam pat lah ban wanrah da ki ain, ban tehlakam ia ka jingrung kyrthep jong ki poiwir, kum ka ILP lane kat bym pat ioh ia ka ILP ka aiñ ka ban iada ia ka jaidbynriew na ka jingshah tyllep noh na ki mynder kan nym pdiang ia ka lynti Rel.“Ka Seng ka buh ha khmat ia ka jing iada ba paka ia ka jaidbynriew bad ha ka jingsngewthuh jong ngi lada wan ka lynti Rel kan pynsuk ia ki poiwir ban wan buhai shnong ha ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep lada ngim don ia ki ain iada ba biang, kum ka ILP,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President ka HYC East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit, u Bah Presios Pale.“Ha kaba iadei ba ka jingkyntiew ia ki lynti iaid (Transportation), ka Seng ka ai jingmut ia ka Sorkar India bad ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya ba ki dei ban shna noh da ka surok saw laiñ (Four lane ) naduh Ratachera shaduh Umiam (Damsite) khang ba kan pynsuk ban kit ia ki mar ki mata bad ia ki briew kiba leit jingleit,” ong ka seng.“Ka Seng ka kyntu ia baroh ki MLA, ki MDC, ia ki Daloi , ki Waheh Chnong, ki Sengbhalang bad ia ki paidbah ka rilum Jaiñtia ba ngin ieng tylli lang kawei ban pyrshah ia ka lynti Rel kat bym pat ioh ia ka ILP.  Ngi dawa ia ka Sorkar India bad ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya ba kin pyntreikam noh ia ka ILP kaba dei ka lad jingiada ia ka jaidbynriew Hynniewtrep jong ngi,” ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: KAT BYM PAT ÏOH ÏA KA ILP NGIN YM PDIANG ÏA KA LYNTI REL HA JAIÑTIA HILLS : HYC

content: U Pope Francis, ha ka sngi saitjain ka 8 tarik Naitung, 2023 u la thung ia u Fr. Ferdinand Dkhar uba la 59 snem ka rta, uba bat mynta kum u Administrator jong ka Jyllaniam Jowai, Meghalaya, kum u Bishop ba thymmai jong ka Jowai.Ia kane, la pynbna da u Archbishop jong ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki riewniam, bad sha ki paidriewngeit jong ka Balang Catholic da kaba pyntip ba u Apostolic Nuncio sha India u Most Rev. Leopoldo Gerelli u la pyntip ba u Pope Francis u la thung ia u Reverend Father Ferdinand Dkhar kum u Bishop ba thymmai jong ka Jylla Niam Jowai ha ka 8 tarik Naitung, 2023 ha ka por 3:30 baje nohphai sngi.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ia u Fr. Ferdinand Dkhar la kha ha ka shnong Ïongkaluh, Jowai, ha ka 26 tarik, Rymphang, 1962.  Hadien ba u la pyndep ia ka jingpule ha Minor Seminary, Upper Shillong, u la bteng ia ka jingpule ia ka Philosophy ha Christ King College bad ia ka Theology ha Oriens Theological College, kiba hap hapoh ka jylli jong ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong.La pynkyntang Lyngdoh Sohblei ia u Fr. Ferdinand Dkhar ha ka 23 tarik, 1994 ha Jowai.  U la shakri kum Dean of Studies ha Minor Seminary Upper Shillong ha u snem 1994 bad 1995 bad hadien kane u la shah thung kum u Assistant Parish Priest jong ka Annunciation Church, Namdong naduh u snem 1995 haduh u snem 2000.  Nangta, u la trei ruh kum u Assistant Parish Priest naduh u snem 2000 haduh u snem 2002 bad kum u Parish Priest naduh u snem 2002 haduh u snem 2007 ha ka Parish Church of the Holy Spirit, Ummulong.  Ka jingshakri jong u kum u nongsharai mynsiem ka la bteng hadien ba u la shah thung pat kum u Parish Priest jong ka Annunciation Church bad kum u Principal jong ka High School ha Namdong naduh u snem 2007 haduh u snem 2009.  Hadien kane, la thung ia u kum u Procurator jong ka Jyllaniam Jowai naduh u snem 2009 haduh u snem 2021 bad naduh u snem 2021 haduh mynta u la bat ia ka kyrdan kum u Diocesan Administrator jong ka Jyllaniam Jowai.Ka khet jong ka Jyllaniam Jowai ka la sah thylli hadien ba u Bishop Victor Lyngdoh u la shah jied ban shimti noh kum u Archbishop ba thymmai jong ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong ha ka 28 tarik, Nohprah, 2020. U Fr. Ferdinand Dkhar u dei u Bishop balai jong ka Jylla Niam Jowai bad hashwa kata ia kane ka Jylla Niam Jowai la sharai da u Bishop Vincent Kympat naduh u snem 2006 tad haduh ka jingkhladnoh ha u snem 2011 bad hadien kata, la shimti pat sa u Bishop Victor Lyngdoh naduh u snem 2011 haduh u snem 2020.Ia ka Jylla Niam Jowai la pynkha ha u snem 2006 hadien ba la phiah na ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong bad ka don 1,20,275 ngut ki riewngeit Catholic, 23 tylli ki Parish, 30 ngut ki Lyngdoh Niam, 41 ki riewniam, 83 ngut ki riewniam Sister bad 313 tylli ki shlem ai jinghikai ha ka pule puthi.
title: THUNG U POPE FRANCIS IA U FR. FERDINAND DKHAR KUM U BISHOP THYMMAI KA JOWAI

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla  u Conrad K. Sangma, ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la plie paidbah ia ka National Law University (NLU) ha Temporary Campus kaba don ha Mayurbhanj Complex, Shillong.Ha ka jingplie ia kane ka skul pule aiñ la sakhi lang da u Chief Justice jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court u Sanjib Banerjee, u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u Rakkam A. Sangma, u Vice Chancellor jong ka University, u Prof Indrajit Dube bad kiwei kiwei.U Myntri Rangbah haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u la ong ba ka long kaba donkam ban buh jingthoh bad ban pynlong aiñ ia ki riti ki dustur jong ki riewlum.  U la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingangnud jong u ba ka NLU kan long ka Center of Excellence na ka bynta ban wad bniah halor shaphang ki jingpynlong aiñ ia ki riti ki dustur jong kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka ri India.U Sangma u la pynkynmaw ba ka jingdon jong ka NLU kan wanrah ia ka jingkylla ha ka jingpule ia ka aiñ bad ka jingwad bniah ha Meghalaya.  U la iathuh ruh ba ki jingeh kiba iadei bad ka rukom pyntreikam ia ka aiñ hapoh ka jylla ba la palat san phew snem na ka daw ka jingbym don ki shlem pule kiba paka ban ai jinghikai, bad ban tip shaphang ka aiñ.  U la ong ba ka jingdon jong ka NLU kan pynthikna ba kane ka shlem pule kan ai jingmyntoi shikatdei eh ia ki samla pule aiñ bad kiwei kiwei de ki lad jingshakri.U la pynpaw ka jingkyrmen ba ka NLU kan long ka shlem pule kaba wanrah ia ki lad jingtip kiba thymmai, bad ban wad bniah. U la iathuh ba ki jingpule ha kane ka skulbah ki long halor ka Business Administration, ka Policy Research, bad ka Data Sciences kiba la kynthup lang bad ka Aiñ, ka ban iarap ia ki samla pule ban dup lah ban iakhun pyrshah ia ki jingeh ki ban sa wan.Ha kajuh ka por, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka por ka ladei ban pynrung ia ka Smart Technology ha ka pule puthi namarba kane kan pyniasoh bad ka saiñ jingtip shabar ka pyrthei ka ban iarap ia ki samla pule ba kin ioh jingtip shuh shuh halor ka phang pule ka jong ki.Ka Sorkar ka la bei pisa T. 25 crore ban shna ia ki jingdonkam jong kane skulbah ha ka Temporary Campus, ha kaba T. 19 klur ladep ban pyndonkam.U Chief Justice jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court u Sanjib Bannerjee haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la ong, ba ka jingplie ia ka National Law University (NLU), kan pynmyntoi ia ki samla pule ban tip shaphang ki aiñ bad ki riti ki dustur jong ki riewlum ha kane ka thaiñ.U la ong ruh ka NLU ka la buh hakhmat ia ka thong ban ka jingpule shaphang ka aiñ da kaba pynrung ia ki lain pule kum ka Data Science bad ka Artificial Intelligence ha ki lynnong pule.U Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi, u Rakkam A. Sangma u la ong ba ka jingdon National Law University (NLU) kan pynkylla dur ia ka lawei pule jong ka jylla.  U la ong ruh ki samla pule kin ioh ia ki tiar jinghikai bad ki saiñ jingtip ki ban pynproh ia ki jabieng khnang ba kin dup lah ba noh synñiang sha u sup u thiar jong ka ka pule ka puthi shaphang ka aiñ ha ka Jylla.Haba pynpaw ba ka bynta kaba kongsan jong ka Kashari ka long ban pynioh ia ka hok sha ki paidbah, u Rakkam, u la ong, “ka NLU kan sa pynkhreh ban pynmih ia ki Muktiar kiba tbit ki ban long ki nongiasaid na ka bynta ki paidbah, ki ban pynioh ia ka hok bad ban iada ruh ia ka hok jong ki paidbah.”“Da kaba ai jinghikai shaphang ka aiñ bad ka jingngam jylliew ban sngewthuh ia ka aiñ, ka NLU kan sa pynkup bor ia ki samla pule ban long ki nongpynkylla dur ia ka imlang ka sahlang,” u la ong.
title: URLONG KA JINGANGNUD KI SAMLA PULE LAW, PLIE U CM ÏA KA NATIONAL LAW UNIVERSITY

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Meghalaya u Conrad K. Sangma ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Chief Justice jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court u Sanjib Banerjee ki la plie paidbah ia ka shlem treikam ba thymmai jong ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.Ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi lang da ka Myntri kaba peit ia ka tnat Ain jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u Rakkam Sangma, ki nongbishar jong ka High Court bad kiwei kiwei.Ha kane ka shlem treikam ba thymmai ba la tei ha ka jinglut kaba kot 45 klur tyngka ka don ia ka Auditorium, ka jaka shong jong ki nongsaid ain bad kiwei kiwei de ki kamra na ka bynta ka treikam ka treijam.Haba kren ha jingialang, u Conrad K. Sangma u la ai khublei ia ki jingtrei shitom kaba la lah ban tei ia kane ka building kaba thymmai. U la ong ba kane ka shlem treikam ka dei kaba la shna kyrpang ban buh ia ki kot kiba ai jingtip shaphang ka aiñ kiba iadei bad ka jingai ia ka hok sha ki paidbah.U la iaroh ruh ia ka Meghalaya High Court kaba la long ka nongiada ia ki nongrim jong ka hok, ka jingtreikam kaba shai bad ka jingpynioh ia ka hok sha baroh.U la iathuh ba ka Sorkar ka la buh hakhmat ia ka thong ban pyndep lut ia baroh ki jingshna hapoh ka jylla.  U la iathuh ba ka jingmang pisa ha ki snem baladep ka long ban pynjanai bad ban kyntiew kyrdan ia ki government LP bad UP schools, bad ia ki Higher Education.Haba iathuh ia ka thong jong ka Sorkar halor ka pule ka puthi, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, ba ka jingmaramot, ka jingshna pynbna bad ka jingtei thymmai palat 2500 tylli ki LP & UP School kin sa nang wan ha kine ki sngi bad ki snem.Kane ka jingshimkhia ka long ban pynjanai ia ka pule ka puthi bad ban ai sha ki khynnah skul ia ki lad jingpule kiba bha ha baroh kawei ka jylla.Ka jingtheh pisa jong ka Sorkar ban shna ia ki skul ka long ban pynkhlaiñ ia ka thymmei jong ka pule ka puthi ha ka jylla.  Da kaba shna ia ki shlem pule kiba bha bad ka jingdon jong ki tiar pule, ka sorkar ka la angnud ban ailad ia ki khynnah skul ba kin dup kynjoh sha ka thong kaba ki la pynlut ia ka jingim jong ki ha ka pule puthi.U Chief Justice jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court u Sanjib Banerjee, u la pynkynmaw ba ka shlem treikam kaba thymmai kan pynjanai ia ki jingtreikam jong ka bishar ka khadar.
title: PLIE U MYNTRI RANGBAH ÏA KA SHLEM TREIKAM BATHYMMAI JONG KA ÏINGBISHAR HIGH COURT

content: : Lai tylli ki metiap jong ki lai ngut ki briew, ba kynthup ia kawei ka kynthei, la lap na kawei ka ing ba dang shna jong ka Institute of Science and Bio Resource (ISBR) ha ka shnong Umsawli, New Shillong Township ha ka janmiet sngi U Blei.Ia kine ki lai ngut, la ithuh kyrteng kum ka Kong Sheba Kharbani (40 snem) kaba trei kum ka cleaner, u Bah Rupert Donbor Dohtdong (43 snem), bad u Blackstar Kharkrang (30 snem). Kine ki lai ngut ki dei kiba sah ha Mawlai Phudmawri.La lap ia kine ki metiap na kane ka jaka, hadien ba la mih ka jingsma na kane ka iing ha kaba ki paidbah ki la pyntip mar mar sha ki bor pyniaid shnong jong ka shnong Umsawli.Ia ka met jong ka Kong Sheba la lap na kawei ka kamra katba ia ka met jong ki arngut kiwei pat la lap na kawei ka kamra.Ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ka jingtohkit, ki la lap kine ki lai ngut ki la bam ia u tit buid ba ladep shet uba ki la kheit na ka khlaw kaba don hajan.  Ki Pulit ki la lap ruh ia u tit baladep shet ha u khiew ha kawei na ki kamra.Hadien kane, ka kynhun ki Pulit jong ka Crime Scene Unit ki la leit mar mar sha kane ka jaka ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.Ia ka met jong kine ki lai ngut la pynkit noh sha NEIGRIHMS Hospital ban leh ia ka post-mortem bad ki Pulit ki la register case ruh halor kane ka jingjia.
title: ÏAP LAI NGUT HA ISBR, UMSAWLI, SUBA BA DEI NA KA JINGBAM ÏA U TIT KHLAW

content: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la ong ba kan sa tih bniah naduh tynrai ban lap ia ki buit sianti jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynbeit thymmai (Amendment) jong u snem bad ia ka Roster System.“Ka jingialang jong ki seng sainpyrthei halor ka reservation policy kaba la long ha ka 31 tarik, Jymmang, 2023 ha Conference Room, Main Secretariat ka la shim ia ka rai ba baroh ki seng sainpyrthei kin phah ia ki jingai jingmut ba shongnia ba pynksan hapoh 15 sngi.  Ka KHNAM ka ladep aiti ia ka jingai jingmut lyngba ka shithi No. KHNAM/CEC/2023-24/RP 31 tarik, Jymmang, 2023. Hynrei kaba sngewsih ban tip ka long ba katkum kaba paw ha ki lad pathai khubor ka Myntri jong ka tnat Aiñ ka ong ba ‘ym pat don satia kino kino ki seng sainpyrthei kiba phah ia ki jingai jingmut haduh mynta” la ong u Working President ka KHNAM u Bah Thomas Passah ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei.“Kane ka long kum ka jingpynkhein ia ka rai ba la shim ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha ka 31 tarik, Jymmang, 2023 bad ka long ruh ka lynti ka bym dei.  Ka jingpyrshang ban pynslem ia ki mat ba kongsan jong u paidbah kam dei shuh kaba dang thymmai bad ngin ym sngewphylla.  Ha ka jingialang jong ki seng sainpyrthei ka KHNAM, UDP, HSPDP, VPP bad ka INC ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew ba ladei ban khmih bniah biang ia ka Reservation Policy 1972 kaba la rim shaba palat, hynrei kumba ka paw namarba ia kane ka kam la rah sha surok bad la jan baroh ki sngap jar ban iakren ia ki mat kiba donkam,”  la ong u kyrwoh.U Bah Passah u la ong, “ha ka jingialang jong ki seng sainpyrthei ngi la pynpaw ia ka jingsheptieng ba ka Expert Committee kan sa shu long tang ka buit ban pynslem bad ka ban pynsuki ia ka jingthmu ban khmih bniah ia ka Reservation Policy bad kumba ka paw mynta ka jingsheptieng jong ngi ka long shisha kaba dei.  Hadien palat shi bnai hadien ka 31 tarik, Jymmang, 2023, ki kam ki la iaid suki kum ka mattah ia kaba ngim lah satia pdiang daleilei.”“Ngi la iai pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Roster System shadien da ka Sorkar. Ha ki jingialang ba bunsien, ka Sorkar ka la pyrshang ban ialam bakla ia ki seng sainpyrthei bad ia ki paidbah.  Hynrei ha ka jingpynbna ba dang shen ia ka result kam Pulit ba la pynbna ha ka 28 tarik, Jylliew, 2023 la iohi ba 41.63% (420) ki Khasi-Jaintia ki la shah jied bad 46.18% (466) ki Garo ki la shah jied bad kane ka pynpaw ba ka result la pynbna da kaba pynshong nongrim ia ka Roster System kaba treikam shadien. Namarkata, ngi iaiban ba ka Office Memorandum ba thymmai kaba la pynmih ha ka 14 tarik, Jylliew, 2023 ka dei ka Roster jong ka Backlog ba la buhrieh namarba ia ka Data la shim naduh u snem 1972 lyngba ka Roster Register,” u la bynrap.“Katkum ka jubab RTI ba la ioh pdiang na ka Personnel Department, Sorkar Meghalaya ha ka 5 tarik, Naitung, 2023, ngi la ioh jingtip ba ym pat don kawei ruh ka tnat treikam kaba la pynsdang ban buh ia ki Roster Registers. Namarkata, ka jingkylli ba shong ain ka ong ha kano ka rukom ka Sorkar ka lah ban pyntreikam ia ka roster system khlem ka Roster Register. Haba kylli, hato ka Office Memorandum kaba 14 tarik, Jylliew, 2023 ka la kdew ne em ia u bnai bad u snem ba la sdang ban pyntreikam ia ka Roster. Kumba ka paw, ka Sorkar kam shlan satia ban jubab,” la kynthoh u Working President ka KHNAM.
title: ISHU RESERVATION POLICY: NGIN SA TIH NADUH TYNRAI BAN LAP ÏA KI BUIT SIANTI JONG KA SORKAR: KHNAM

content: Ka District Magistrate jong ka East Khasi Hills ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka la pynmih da ka hukum hapoh ka Section 144 CrPC da kaba bthah ia baroh ki dukan, ki dukan die jingbam, ki restaurant bad ki dukan die tiar ba ki lah ban plie tang haduh ka por 10 baje mynmiet.“Na ka daw ka jingjia ha kylleng ka nongbah Shillong kaba lam sha ka jingthud jong ka shong suk shongsaiñ khamtam ha ka por mynmiet bad kum kine ki jingjia ki lah ban pynthud, buh jingma ia ki nongleit nongwan bad ia ki jingim briew, namarkata la donkam ban shim ia ki lad ki lynti ban iada ia ka jingim jong ki paidbah bad ban pynneh ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ hapoh ka nongbah,” ong ka District Magistrate ka Kong R.M. Kurbah.“Katkum ka itkiar ba la pynkup ha nga hapoh ka Section 144 CrPC la pyrkhing ban plie ia ki dukan, ki dukan die jingbam, ki Restaurant bad ki Enterprise hapoh ka nongbah Shillong tang haduh ka por 10 baje mynmiet. La mana ban dih ia ki jingdih pynbuaid bad ban leh ia ki kam be-aiñ hapoh ki kali, ban pynheh sur jingrwai hajan ki skul, ki jaka mane Blei, hajan ki Hopsital bad ha ki shnong ki thaw hadien ka 10 baje mynmiet,” ong ka hukum na ka District Magistrate.Kino kino kiba pynkhein ia kane ka hukum kin shah pynshitom hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Section 188 jong ka Indian Penal Code.Kane ka hukum kan treikam noh mardor naduh ka 12 tarik, Naitung, 2023 tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.
title: TANG HADUH 10 BAJE MYNMIET YN SHAH PLIE ÏA KI DUKAN, DUKAN BAM, RESTAURANT, ENTERPRISES HA SHILLONG

content: Ki bor ba dei khmih jong ka tnat Forest ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka step lah sngi u Blei ki la kyndang bad pynphra naphang ia ki dukan ba la pynlong iew shipor ha madan Umdiengpung, kaba don ha 7 Mer Upper Shillong.U General Secretary jong ka San Shnong Youth Welfare Organisation (SSYWO) u Bah Lionel Nongkhlaw ha ka jingiakren bad ka Batesi TV u la kynthoh ba kumno ka tnat Forest ka kloi ban kyndang ia ki nongshong dukan ha Umdiengpun ba la ai jaka hi da ka Sorkar ban pynlong iew hadien ba ka jylla ka la mad ia ka jingshah lynshop ha ka jingpang khlam COViD-19 ha ki snem ba la leit noh.Ha kajuh ka por ula buh jingkylli ruh ba kumno ka tnat Forest kam shym la nud ban kyndang ia ki bar jylla kiba sah beaiñ ha Mahadev Khola hadien ba ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) dang shen ka la ujor sha ka tnat Forest.Ki nongshong dukan, ki la iathuh ba ka tnat Forest kam shym la ai jingtip satia shwa ban phah pynpra ia ki dukan kiba don ha Umdiengpun bad ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi ba ki nongtrei jong ka tnat Forest ki la ioh ban pynpra ia ki san tylli ki dukan tap shiliang bad bthah ruh ia kiwei ki nongdie dukan ba kin pynpra hi ia la ki jong ki dukan shwa ban shah pynpra da ka bor.
title: PYNPRA KA FOREST ÏA KI DUKAN HA UMDIENGPUN, KYLLI SA KA SSYWO ÏA KIBA SAH BE-AIÑ HA MAHADEV KHOLA

content: Ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong Rosetta Mary Kurbah ka la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka Sor Shillong ba kin ïatreilang bad ki bor synshar District ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynjari ïa ka hukum ban khang ïa ki dukan bad ïa ki dukan die jingbam ha kylleng ka nongbah Shillong naduh ka por 10:00 baje mynmiet.‘Ngi la ïoh bun ki jingujor ba ki don bun ki jingjia ha kylleng sawdong ka nongbah Shillong.  Ngi la sakhi bun ki jingïashoh ïadat, ngi lap ba ki briew ki shongkai ha ki kali bad ka tem pynheh sur jingrwai bad kane ka pynthud bha ïa kiba bun balang,” ong ka Kong Kurbah ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi baar.“Hadien ka 10:00 baje mynmiet, ban ïaid ha surok bun kim sngew shngaiñ shuh.  Namarkata ngi hap ban shim ïa kane ka rai ba hadien ka 10 baje mynmiet ki paidbah ki ladei ban leit phai noh sha la ing,” ka la ong.Haba kylli, “u don u pud ba ngi hap ban pyrkhat tang ban ailad ïa kino ki briew kiba lah ban plie ïa ki dukan hadien ka por 10 baje mynmiet.”“Ki jingjia kiba la jia ha sor Shillong kim long satia kiba shngaiñ bad hadien ka 10 baje shaneng ka leit ka wan kam shngaiñ satia.  Ki Pulit jong ngi kin ym lah ban don lut sha manla ki kyndong kynshrot jong ka Sor Shillong ban tehlakam ïa ki jingjia,” la ong ka Kong Kurbah.“Ïa ngi kiba hap ban peit ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ngi hap ban bishar bniah ïa kum kine ki jingjia bad balei ki briew ki kwah ban leit shang kai mynmiet, ngi hap ban pynshong nongrim. Lada ngim khang ïa ki dukan tad haduh ka por 10 baje mynmiet kum kine ki jingjia kin ym jia khah khah,” la bynrap ka Kong Kurbah.Halor ka jingkhñium jong ki nongdie dukan khamtam ha ka thaiñ Khyndai Lad ïa ka jingpynmih hukum, ka Kong Kurbah ka la ong, “kam dei ka jingpynshitom, hynrei ka dei namarba  ngi sngewkhia ïa kiba la rangbah, ïa kiba la khie samla namarba la jyllei shaba palat ki kam runar kiba ladep jia. Ki kam runar ki la nang kiew bad ka jingjyllei jong u drok ruh ka jur bha bad ki jingjia kiba sniew ki ju jia ynda la miet.”“Ngi kwah ban khanglad ïa kine ki jingjia bad dei na kane ka daw ba ngi la pynmih ïa kane ka hukum bad ynda la kham thanda ngin sa peit,” la ong shuh shuh ka Kong Kurbah.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkem ïa ki briew kiba donkti ha ka jingjia ha Laitumkhrah Police Station, u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Bah S. Nongtnger ula ong, “san ngut ngi la kem bad ki dang don mynta hapdeng ka jingshah tohkit bad ngim pat pynngat kyndon eiei namarba ngim pat pyndep ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.  U Investigating Officer (IO) u dang leh ïa la ka kamram.”
title: 10 BAJE MYNMIET LEIT PHAI NOH SHA ÏING, KI JINGSNIEW KI JIA YNDA LA MIET: DC

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la shim ia ki sienjam kiba tyngeh pyrshah ia ki Coke Plant be-aiñ da kaba bud ryntih ia ka hukum ba la pynmih da ka iingbishar Meghalaya High Court.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Joint Secretary to the Government of Meghalaya, Forest and Environment Department, la pyntip ba naduh u bnai Nohprah 2022 la leh tyngeh da kaba khang tala ia ki Coke Plant be-aiñ bad ka jingiai bteng ban pynpra naphang ia ki pajwa saiñ dewiong ka la iaid shakhmat khnang ban pynthikna ba kin ym lah shuh ban dang bteng ia ki jingtreikam sa shisien.  Ka jingpynpra ia ki Coke Plant ka la bteng haduh u bnai Iaiong, 2023 kum shi bynta ban rat dyngkhong ia ki jingtei kiba be-aiñ.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, ki bor synshar jong ka West Khasi Hills District ki la pynbthei ia ki atoskhana bad pynpra ruh ia ki pajwa saiñ dewiong jong ki Coke Plant kiba don ha Shallang lyngba ka hukum jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court.Lyngba ka jingbthah jong ka Sorkar bad da ka hukum jong ka Ingbishar High Court, la pynmih ia ki hukum ban kem naphang ia kiba donkti ha lyndet kine ki kam be-aiñ.   Namarkata, ka jingpynpra ia ki atoskhana bad ia ki jingtei jong Coke Plant ba long be-aiñ ka la sdang naduh ka 8 tarik, Naitung, 2023.  Haduh lai tylli ki atoskhana ladep ban pynbthei haduh ka 10 tarik, Naitung, 2023 bad la buh thong ban pyndep ia kane ka kam haduh ka 20 tarik, Naitung, 2023.Bun ngut ki briew kiba donkti ban tei be-aiñ ia kine ki Coke Plant beaiñ la dep ithuh bad la iohkem.Ki sienjam batyngeh jong ka Sorkar ka long ban pynpra beit naphang ia ki jingtei be-aiñ.Ka Sorkar kan iai bteng ban bat ia ki kyndon jong ka aiñ bad ban pynneh ia ka jingjyrngam jong ka mei mariang ha ka jylla na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki nongshong shnong.  Ka jingrat dyngkhong ia ki Coke Plant ka long kum u mawjam ban kynjoh sha ka thong ban pynneh pynsah ia ka jingjyrngam jong ka mariang bad ka jingtyngkai ia ki um ki wah jong ka thaiñ.Ka Sorkar ka kyntu ia baroh ki nongshong shnong, ia ki nongialam shnong bad ia ki kynhun bapher bapher ban ai jingkyrshan da kaba iatreilang bad ki bor synshar ha ka jingpynpra ba dang iaid shakhmat ia ki coke plant beaiñ bad ha kaba kem ruh ia kiba donkti ha ki kam be-aiñ.
title: 3 TYLLI KI COKE PLANT BE-AIÑ BA LA PYNPRA, DANG BUN KI BAN SHAH PYNPRA HADUH 20 TARIK, NAITUNG

content: Shillong, Naitung 10 : Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Laskeiñ Circle ha ka 10 u Naitung 2023 hapoh ka jingïalam u President ka Circle samla Javelin Shadap Manner, ryngkat ka jingdon lang u President ka KSU West Jaintia Hills District Unit u Laitphar Syngkrem kila leit ban ïakynduh ïa ka Director of Health Service (MI) Shillong ban pynsngew ïa ki jingduna ba bun hapoh ka Laskeiñ CHC kata naduh ki Doctor bad ka jingbymbiang ki dawai da shin.Ka seng kala ïoh lad ban pynsngew halor ka jinglehmon palat ki nongtrei jong katei ka jaka sumar, bad ka jingkhein sting jong ki. Kumta na ka liang ka seng kala ïoh ban ïakren sani bha bad ka Director ha kaba ïadei bad kine ki jingeh bad ka DHS bad la kular ban shimkhia mardor bad ban pynbeit noh ïa kine ki jingeh jong ki paitbah katei ka thaiñ kiba donkam jingïarap shisha na katei ka jaka ai sumar sorkar.Na ka liang ka seng ruh kala kyrpad ïa ka Director ba kan leh kham kloi ïa kane ka kam bad lada jia ba kane ka jingdawa kam urlong satia, ka seng kam banse ban shim pat da kawei pat ka lynti na kham tyngeh, pynkut ka kyrwoh.
title: LEHMON BAD KHEIÑSTING KI NONGTREI KA LASKEIÑ CHC BAD BUN KI JINGDUNA : KSU WJHDU

content: Na ki 365 ngut ki phetwir nong Manipur kiba wan phet rieh sha Meghalaya na ka daw ka jingiakynad ha ka jylla Manipur kaba la sdang ha u bnai Jymmang, mynta ki don sa tang 77 ngut kiba dang sah ha kane ka Jylla khamtam ha nongbah Shillong, la iathuh ka Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills ka Kong R.M. Kurbah.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi ba-ar, ka Kong Kurbah ka la pyntip ba katkum ka jingkheiñ ba la ïohlum kiba sah mynta ki long satang 77 ngut katba kiwei pat ki la leit phai noh bad don ruh kiba leit sha kiwei ki jylla jong ka Ri.“Na kiba wan phet rieh bad sah shipor ha nongbah Shillong ki la leit sha Aizawl, sha Delhi, sha Bangalore bad katto katne pat ki la leit phai sha Manipur,” ka la ong.Bun na kiba la wan phet rieh sha kane ka jylla ha ka por ba don ka jingkynad ki la ïoh jaka sah ktem shipor ba la pynbiang da ka Evangelical Baptist Convention Church bad da ka Chin Baptist Association.U Additional District Magistrate, Bah Ronnie Wahlang haba ai jingtip halor ka jingwad jingtip ia ka jingdon jong ki phetwir naduh kaba sdang jong u bnai Jymmang, u la ong, ha ka jingkynduh bad ki bor shnong ryngkat ki Pulit la ban pynbeit ba kin lah ban leit phai da kaba suk ba sain sha ki jaka ba ki kwah ban leit.“Ia mynta hi, ki don sa tang 77 ngut ki briew kiba dang sah ha Shillong bad bun na ki, ki leit sah bad ki bahaiing hasem, bad ki paralok bad ruh don ruh kiba dang pule ki la ioh jaka sah ha ki Hostel namar ki dang kwah ban bteng ïa ka jingpule jong ki hangne ha Shillong,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ruh ba u Dy.SP u la leit hi dalade mynta ka sngi baar ban iakynduh ïa ki bor pynïaid jong ka CDA bad CBCC ban pyntikna la ki dang don ne em ki briew kiba dang sah ha ki jaka sah shipor.“Hynrei ka kaiphod kaba ngi ïoh na u Dy. SP ka long ba ym don shuh. Kumta kine ki 77 ngut ki long katkum ka jingai jingkhein ba la ai ma ki hi bad ki jingtip baroh shaphang kitei ki briew ki don lut bad ngi hangne naduh ki number phone bad ngi dang ïai bteng ban buddien ïa ki la ki don ne em kino kino ki jingeh ba ki kynduh la ka long jaka sah, ban ïoh jaka pule, jaka sah ne kino kino ki jingeh ba kin pyntip khnang ban pyntikna ba kin ïoh ban im da kaba suk kaba saiñ.”U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills, Bah Sylvester Nongtnger haba bynrap lang, u la ong na ka liang jong ki Pulit hapoh ka jingïalam jong u DGP dang shen ki la pynlong ka jingkynduh lang hapdeng ki Meitei bad ki Kuki bad kyntu ba kin pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsain katba ki dang sah ha Shillong.U ong ruh ba ki Pulit ki kular ruh ban ai ka jingïada ïa baroh arliang kynhun lada donkam. Ki bor synshar distrik ki la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewnguh ïa ka Dorbar Shnong Lapalang kaba naduh ba sdang ba wan phetwir na ka jylla Manipur ka la ai jingïarap da ki marbam.
title: SA TANG 77 NGUT KI PHETWIR NA MANIPUR KIBA DANG SAH HA SHILLONG, ÏATHUH KA DC

content: Ki bor synshar jong ka East Jaintia Hills kiba la pyntreikam ia ka hukum jong ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court, ha ka 12 tarik, Naitung, 2023 ki la pynbthei naphang ia ki Coke Factory ba la shna beain ha East Jaintia Hills District.Nalor kaba pynbthei ha ban da lko hi phom ia ki Atoskhana, ki bor synshar district ki la pynpra ruh wat ia ki pajwa sain dewiong khnang ba kiba donkti ban pynieng beain ia kine ki karkhana sain dewiong kin ym iohlad shuh ban shna thymmai da kiwei pat.Kane ka jingpynbthei ia ki karkhana sain dewiong kan dang bteng haduh ka 20 tarik, Naitung, 2023.Ha ka sngi baar mynta ka taiew, u Joint Secretary jong ka tnat Forest and Environment ka Sorkar Jylla u la pyntip ba naduh u bnai Nohprah 2022 la leh tyngeh da kaba khang tala ia ki Coke Plant be-aiñ bad ka jingiai bteng ban pynpra naphang ia ki pajwa saiñ dewiong ka la iaid shakhmat khnang ban pynthikna ba kin ym lah shuh ban dang bteng ia ki jingtreikam sa shisien.  Ka jingpynpra ia ki Coke Plant ka la bteng haduh u bnai Iaiong, 2023 kum shi bynta ban rat dyngkhong ia ki jingtei kiba be-aiñ.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, ki bor synshar jong ka West Khasi Hills District ki la pynbthei ia ki atoskhana bad pynpra ruh ia ki pajwa saiñ dewiong jong ki Coke Plant kiba don ha Shallang lyngba ka hukum jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court.Lyngba ka jingbthah jong ka Sorkar bad da ka hukum jong ka Ingbishar High Court, la pynmih ia ki hukum ban kem naphang ia kiba donkti ha lyndet kine ki kam be-aiñ.   Namarkata, ka jingpynpra ia ki atoskhana bad ia ki jingtei jong Coke Plant ba long be-aiñ ka la sdang naduh ka 8 tarik, Naitung, 2023.  Haduh lai tylli ki atoskhana ladep ban pynbthei haduh ka 10 tarik, Naitung, 2023 bad la buh thong ban pyndep ia kane ka kam haduh ka 20 tarik, Naitung, 2023.Bun ngut ki briew kiba donkti ban tei be-aiñ ia kine ki Coke Plant beaiñ la dep ithuh bad la iohkem.
title: PYNBTHEI KI BOR SYNSHAR ÏA KI COKE PLANT BE-AIÑ HA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS

content: Ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ha ka sngi balang ka la dawa ïa ka Sorkar/Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ba kan weng noh mardor ia ka jingpynjari  ia ka Section 144 CrPc ka ban sdang mynta ka sngi naduh ka por 10 baje mynmiet ba la mana tyngeh ia ki dukan, ki dukan die jingbam, ka jingtem pynheh sur jingrwai ha ki kali ha kylleng ka nongbah Shilllong.“Ngi dawa jur ba ka Sorkar/DC kan weng noh ia kane ka hokum wut wut bad lada kim weng ngin pynlehrain ia u Myntri Rangbah/NPP/UPD/HSPDP/BJP (Sorkar Meghalaya) ha ka iing kashari,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Working President ka KHNAM u Bah Thomas Passah ha u kyrwoh la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Ka jingpynjari 144 CrPC da ka DC, East Khasi Hills District ha sor Shillong bad ban khanglad ia ki paidbah ban plie dukan hadien ka 10 baje mynmiet ka dei ka jingphla bad ka jingkubur jong ka sorkar jylla bad ka tnat pulit kam lah bad kam long kaba tbit ban tehlakam ia ki jinghuri hura bad ban wanrah ia ka shongsuk shongsain ha ka jylla. Kane ka jingpynbna jong ka DC ka pyrta jam ba ki shnat pulit kim long kiba tbit bad kim lah ban iada ia u paidbah. Ka sorkar ka kwah ba set ia ki paidbah ha ki iing ki jong ki, ban don ka shongsuk shongsain, lada ha kane ka rukom te wat ki lehnoh ruh ki lah hi ban wanrah ka shongsuk shongsain balei ngi donkam pulit?” la buh jingkylli ka KHNAM.“Ka KHNAM ka pynrem jur ia kane ka lynti khawpud kaba ka shorkar ka la shim. Na ka daw ka jingkyrduh kam bad ban pyrshang ban ieng hala ki kjat bad ban kyrshan ban bsa ia la ka iing ki paidbah ki pyrshang ban trei miet da kaba plie dukam bam ban bsa ïa ka iing ka sem wat la ka dei ha khyndailad lane ha Laitumkhrah lane ha kiwei kiwei ki jaka. Mynta tang na ka daw kita kiba buaid miet bad ba pynklumar bad namar ba ka tnat Pulit kam lah ban teh lakam, ka long mo kaba shongnia ban shu phah khang dukan ia baroh bad ban pynbor ia ki ban thiah khlem bam,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.“Kaba kham kongsan ka long balei la phah khang tang ia ki dukan jong ki rit ki ria ki dukan die marbam, balei khlem phah khang pat ia ki pup/disco ki jaka ia dih buaid? Hato lada bamja harud surok ha khyndailad lane Laitumkhrah shipliang ka pynbuaid mo?” la kynthoh ka KHNAM.“Ka 144 Crpc bad ka jingpynbor ia ki dukan ban ym plie hadien ka 10 baje mynmiet ka dei ka jingpyrshang jong ka Sorkar ban khanglad ia ki paidbah ban kamai ban bsa bad ban pynim ia la ka iing ka sem bad kane ka jingkhanglad jong ka sorkar ka dei ka jingpynkhein ia ka hok jong ki paidbah kaba la aibor da ka Artikil 21 jong ka riti synshar ka ri India kaba kdew shai, “Article 21, which clearly states that right to livelihood is an integral part of the Right to life. If one’s Right to livelihood would be deprived, then it means that we are taking that person’s Right to life” ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: WENG NOH MARDOR ÏA KA HUKUM NE NGIN PYNLEHRAIÑ ÏA KA SORKAR MDA HA ÏINGKASHARI: KHNAM

content: Khliehriat, Naitung 12 : Ka Seng FKJGP-East Jaintia Hill mynta ka sngi ka la leit ai da ka Memorundum sha u Conrad K. Sangma, Chief Minister jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya MDA-II lyngba u Deputy Commissioner ka East Jaintia Hill. Ka Seng ka pynpaw ka jingpyrshah jur ia ka rai ka Sorkar MDA II ban wanrah ia ka lynti rel hapoh East Jaintia lyngba ka Khliehriat bad horkit hordang ka seng kan ym pdiang da leilei ruh ia kane.Ngi iohi ba ka sorkar ka pynbiej ruh da kaba ong ba ia mynta kan wanrah tang ia ki rel kitmar, hynrei ha ka jingsngew jong ka seng lada ailad ia ka rel kit mar kan eh aiu ia ka sorkar ban pynwan syndon hadien da ka rel kit briew ne ka passenger train, ki paidbah kim dei ban sngewthuh bakla ba da ka jingwan ka lyntiu rel kan don ka jing hiardor ha ki marbam mardih, peit ka nuksa sha thain Garo la don lypa ka Railway hynrei ki dor jong ki marbam ki long kumjuh hi bad peit sa ka East Jaintia ka la don shibun ki Cement plant hynrei dang kham remdor ka cement hapoh ka Jylla ban shabar ka Jylla bad tang katno ngut ki trai Jylla kiba ioh kam ha ki Cement plant na ka 80% ka Agreement, ki paidbah ki dei ban pyrkhat shwa tang na kine, ka jingwan ka lynti rel kam dei ban pynmyntoi ia ki paidbah ka Jylla hynrei kadei ka plan ba sha lyndet ka ban pynmyntoi bad pynhun tang ia uwei arngut. Na ka liang jong ka FKJGP-EJH ka kwah ban ai jingmut sha ka sorkar jylla kata, ban klet shwa ia ka lynti rel bad pynbha shwa ia ki surok lynti syngkieng kiba la don lypa bad kiba la jot rathai shaba palat namar ba halor kitei ki mat ruh ka seng kala dep pynsngew da ki phew sien lyngba ki jingthoh bapher bapher hynrei bunsien ka sorkar kam ju sngap bad ki bor district kim ju shimkhia.Ka jingpyrshah hi jong ka FKJGP-EJH ia ka lynti rel kadei halor ka nongrim ba ka Jylla jong ngi kam pat don ia ki aiñ ba biang bad ba skhem ban iada ia ka jaitbynriew jong ngi bad lada wan kane ka lynti rel kan buh jingma ia ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew jong ngi lyngba ka jing shah thyllep ha ki heh paid bad halor katei ka nongrim katba ym pat don ki aiñ ban iada iangi ki khianpaid hynniewtrep ngim pat lah ban pdiang ia ka Railway Project hapoh ka bri u Hynniewtrep baroh kawei , u kyrwoh ba shai sha ka Sorkar MDA-II hapoh ka jingialam u Conrad K Sangma kum u CM pyntreikam shwa ia ka ILP bad hadien kata kan sa pyrkhat ia ka lynti rel bad lada ka sorkar ka leh da ka bor bad lada jia eiei ka sorkar ka hap hi ban bahkhlieh pynkut ka Kyrwoh na ka FKJGP-EJH.
title: PYRSHAH KA FKJGP-EJH IA KA LYNTI RAILWAY HAPOH EAST JAINTIA

content: Ki MDC jong ka Khasi, Jaiñtia bad Garo Hills Autonomous District Council ha ka sngi balang da kawei ka jingmut ki la iakren sani bha ban pyrshah halor ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar India ban pyntreikam ia ka Uniform Civil Code (UCC) ha baroh kawei ka ri India.Ha jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang, u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la iathuh, baroh lai tylli ki Autonomous District Council (ADC) ki la shim ia ka rai da kawei ka jingmut ban ieng pyrshah ia ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar India ban pyntreikam ia ka Uniform Civil Code (UCC) ha Meghalaya bad ha kajuh ka por u Bah Pyniaid u la iathuh ba ki lai tylli ki Autonomous District Council (ADC) kin sa phah da ka Resolution ha ka 14 tarik mynta u bnai sha ka Law Commission bad sha ka sorkar India ban pynpaw ia ki nongrim kiba shai halor ka jingpyrshah ia ka UCC.U la iathuh ba watla ki lai tylli ki Autonomous District Council ka jylla kim pat ioh ia kano kano ka jingthoh na ka Law Commission hynrei ki la shim hi da ka rai ban phah jingthoh sha ka Commission ban pyrshah ia ka UCC.“Nalor ka jingthoh ban pyrshah ia ka UCC, ka Resolution ba ngin phah sha ka Law Commission ka long ruh ban ai jingai jingmut sha ka Commission, ba balei ki Autonomous District Council bad ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka jylla Meghalaya ki pyrshah jur ia ka UCC,” la ong u Bah Pyniaid.U Chairman jong ka High Power Committee ka GHADC u R.K. Sangma u la ong ba ka Garo Hills Autonomous District Council (GHADC) ka ladep mynjur da ka Resolution ban pyrshah ia ka UCC hadien ba ladep lum jingialang ia ki sengbhalang bad ki Nokma bad ha kine ki jingialang la shim ia ka rai ban pyrshah beit ia ka UCC.
title: DA KAWEI KA JINGMUT PYRSHAH KA KHADC, JHADC BAD GHADC ÏA KA UNIFORM CIVIL CODE

content: U MP ka Shillong Lok Sabha Constituency u Bah Vincent H. Pala u la pan jingpynshai na u Myntri uba dei khmih ïa ka tnat Fisheries bad Animal Husbandry & Dairying ka Sorkar India u Parshottam Rupala halor ka jingpang at sniehdoh kaba saphriang bha ha ki Masi ha ka ri India bad ha ka Jylla Meghalaya.U Bah Pala u la wanrah ruh ka jingkylli ha ka Dorbar jong ka Parliament, haduh katno tylli ki masi ba la ïap haduh mynta bad ka jinglut jingsep na kane bad ka jingai pisa ïa ki nongri masi na ka bynta ka jinglutksan ha ki jylla bad ha Meghalaya.Haba ai jubab halor kane, u Parshottam Rupala u la ong, “ka tnat Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying, Sorkar India ka tip shaphang ka jingpur jong ka jingpang Lumpy Skin Disease (LSD) ha ka ri. Ka tnat ka dang shim ïa ki sienjam ba donkam ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki Jylla/UT ban tehlakam ïa kane ka jingpang, kaba kynthup ïa ka jingïarap pisa bad ka jingïarap ha ki kam Technical. Ka jingïarap pisa ïa ki Jylla/UT ka long katkum ka jingdonkam hapoh ka Assistance to State for Control of Animal Diseases (ASCAD) ban thied ïa ki Dose jong ki dawai tika Goat Pox Vaccine ban ai dawai tika na ka bynta ka jingpang Lumpy Skin Disease (LSD).”U la ong, “ki kynhun jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ki la leit ruh sha ki Jylla/UT ba shah ktah ban ai jingbatai shaphang ki rukom pynbeit ïa kane bad ban ai jingïarap Technical. Ki rukom treikam bad ki jingai jingmut ban tehlakam ïa ka LSD kiba kynthup ïa ka jingai dawai tika, ka jingsumar bad ka jingpeit ki dei kiba la sam sha ki jylla/UT ban pyntreikam ban tehlakam ïa kane ka jingpang da kaba buh ïa ka por.  Ka jingpur jong ka jingpang ka dei kaba la tehlakam ha kaba mynta don 6584 tylli ki case kiba dang ïaid shakhmat.  Palat 11.57 klur tylli ki mrad ki dei kiba la ïoh dawai tika haduh mynta bad kane ka jingai dawai tika ka dang ïaid shakhmat. Ki jingtip shaphang ka pisa ba la pyllait/mynjur la ai sha ki Jylla/UT na ka bynta ki snem 2022-23 bad 2023-24 bad ïa ki jingtip shaphang ka jingai dawai bad ka jingïap ki jingri ha ki jylla la ai ha ka Annexure -1 bad 2.”“Ka jingïap jong ki masi naduh u Naitung 2022 haduh mynta ka long 2,00,001 ha kaba ka jingantad ïa ka jinglutksan ka long T. 30,000/- ïa manla ki masi katkum ki jinglong – NDRF. Ka tnat kam don kano kano ka skhim ban ai jingsiew na ka bynta ka jinglutksan ki nongri jingri namar ka jingïap na ka Lumpy Skin Disease (LSD). Katkum ki jingtip ba la ïoh ki jylla Maharashtra, Karnataka ki la ai bai lutksan ïa ki nongrep/nongri jingri kiba la duh ïa ki jingri namar ka LSD. Shuh shuh, kumba la ïoh jingtip na ka tnat Kam Pohiing, ki sorkar jong ki jylla ba shah ktah ki lah ban ai jingïarap na ka State Disaster Response Fund (SDRF) kaba la pynbiang ïa ki katkum ka jingai jingmynjur ka Sorkar India shaphang ki tiar bad ki rukom treikam,” la ïathuh u Rupala.“Ka kam ri jingri ka hap hapoh ka jingpeit jong ki Sorkar jylla bad ki dawai ba donkam ki don ha ki hospital veterinary/dispensary jong ki jylla/UT. Ym don ka skhim jong ka Sorkar Pdeng kaba pynbiang dawai sha ki jylla/UT ban pynkoit na kum kine ki jingpang. Hynrei, ki tnat Animal Husbandry and Dairying, ka tnat Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ki la pynkhreh ïa ki rukom ai jingsumar bad ki la sam ïa kine sha ki jylla/UT ban ai jingsumar bad tehlakam ïa ka Lumpy Skin Disease.  Haduh mynta la lap ba ka dawai tika goat pox vaccine ka treikam pyrshah ïa u khniang jingpang LSD bad ïa ka pisa ban thied ïa ki dawai tika goat pox la pynbiang ïa ki jylla / UT hapoh ka ASCAD,” la bynrap u Rupala.La pynbiang ka jingïarap pisa ïa ki Jylla/UT katkum ka jingdonkam hapoh ka Assistance to State for Control of Animal Diseases (ASCAD) ban thied ïa ki dawai tika Goat Pox Vaccine ban ai dawai tika pyrshah ïa ka jingpang Lumpy Skin Disease (LSD).  Palat 11.57 klur ki jingri ki dei kiba la ïoh dawai tika haduh mynta bad kane ka jingai dawai tika ka dang ïaid shakhmat, ïathuh shuh shuh u Rupala.
title: PAN JINGKHEIÑ U BAH VINCENT PALA NA KA SORKAR PDENG BA PANG AT SNIEH DOH KI MASI

content: Mairang, Naitung 27 : Kum shibynta ban bud ryntih ia ka hukum ba la pymih da ka Iingshari High Court ba donburom jong ka jylla Meghalaya na ka bynta ka PIL No. 2 jong u snem 2021 kaba ha ka 26 tarik u Jymmang mynta u snem, u District Magistrate ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District u la pynmih hukum hapoh ka Section kaba 144 jong ka CrPC kaba pakhang ia ka jingbuh ne jingwah pathar ia ka doh khlem kano kano ka jingda, jingtap ne jingker da ki nongdiedoh kiba ju diedoh hapoh ka distrik.Katkum u District Magistrate, ka jingbuh bad jingwah pathar ia ka doh da ki nongdiedoh ka lah ban wanrah ia ka jingjaboh jong ka doh lyngba ki pumpum bad ka lah ruh ban pynsniew ia kadoh kaba lah ban wanrah kylla ia ki jingpang sha ki nongbam ia ka bad la pynmih ruh ia kane ka hukum kum shibynta ban pynthikna ba la lehbah bad leh thikna ia ka rukom ot bad buh doh da ki nongdiedoh bad ka rukom ri ia ki mrad da ki paidbah kiba ju ri ia ki, kaba kynthup ruh naduh ka rukom kit rukom bah ia ki mrad ban ri lane ban bam doh.Kino kino napdeng ki nongshongshnong kiba shah ktah ha katei ka hukum ki lah ban leitmih sha ki bor ba dei khmih halor kane ka bynta, bynrap shuh shuh ka hukum jong u District Magistrate
title: YM SHAH BAN SHU WAH HABAR KHLEM DA BUH JINGDA IA KA DOH HA KI DUKAN DIE DOH HA EWKHD

content: Shillong, Naitung 28 : Hadien ka jingjop ka jingshalan ia u sohniamtra (Khasi Mandarin) ha u snem ba la dep, ka tnad ka Rep ka Riang bad Farmer’s Welfare jong ka Sorkar bad kumjuh ruh ka Meghalaya Basin Management Agency (MBMA) dang shen ka la plie ia ka lad khaii kaba haduh 1.3 ton u sohtrun sha ki ri Middle East. Kane ka long shi bynta jong ka jingpyrshang ban weng noh ia ka jingiajngai hapdeng ki nongrep bad ki iew bar ri kiba heh. U sohtrun na Meghalaya la die ha kylleng ki dukan heh jong ka Dubai, Kuwait, Sharjah bad kham kongsan ka long ba bun na ki nongrep jong ngi, ki la ioh ban mad mynta ia u soh ka jingtrei shitom, kata palat arshah ka dor kaba ki ju die baroh shi katta.Katei ka jingpyrshang ka la wanrah bad long ruh ka jingiarap ia ki nongrep ban ioh ia ka iew kaba neh bad kaba biang kaba pyniasoh lang bad ka iew ha ka ri. Dang ha u snem ba la dep, kumba 40 ton u sohtrun la dep ban shalan sha kawei ka jaka shalan soh kaba don ha Karnataka bad nangtei pat kin sa shalan sha ki ri Europe bad ki iew jong ka North America.Mynta u snem, katei kajuh ka jaka shalan ka la lah ban pynmih ruh sa kawei ka jaka treikam da ka kali ne ka mobile processing unit, ha Umdihar IVCS, Ri Bhoi District khnang ban dup lah pynmih kham bun bad kumta haduh 23 ton u sohtrun la lah ban pynmih da katei ka unit tang ha ka taiew ba nyngkong jong ka jingtreikam jong ka.Kitei ki processing unit ki donkam ia u sohtrun ba khia shi kilo shaneng bad kim pdiang ruh ia ki sohtrun kiba rit. Kumta ha ka por kheit soh, baroh kawei ka jaka rep la kheit lut ia ki na ka bynta ban die bad kumta tang ia kiba heh pat la lah ban buh na ka bynta ban die (Grade A) sha kitei ki processing unit.Kumta kane ka la pynlong pat ia ki nongrep ban sah shibun ki sohtrun kiba kham rit (Grade B). Namar ba kadei ka aiom ba u sohtrun u la ih, kumta ia kitei kiba kham rit la die noh ha ka dor kaba kham tad bad katba lah dor. Ban iarap na ka bynta kine ki soh kiba rit, na ka liang ka sorkar ka la wad shuh ki lad ki lynti kumno ban pyniasoh bad ki nongdie bad kumta dang shen ka la ioh ban iatehlok bad ka  Reliance Retail store kiba don ha kylleng ka nongbah Guwahati ban die ia kitei ki soh na Meghalaya. Kumta, da katei ka sienjam, ki nongrep mynta ki la ioh ban die ha ka dor kaba heh arshah na ka dor kaba ki ju die.Lah ruh ban kdew hangne ba u sohtrun na kane ka jylla u jur bha ha ka jingdon ka shini (brix value of 16-18) bad kham duna ka jingjew. Ia kitei ki sohtrun ha ka jylla la ju rep khlem pyndonkam da kino kino ki kynja dawai, bad kane ka pynlong ban pynduna ia ka jingdon ki kynja khniang ha u soh.Dei na kane ka daw kaba pynlong ia ki ban lah ban pyniaid iew wat sha ki iew kiba heh shabar ri bad ruh ha ki iew ha ka ri. Hynrei, baroh shi katta pat ia ka iew la bat da ki nongkhaii pdeng lane kita ki middlemen kiba ju ohdor bha ia ki nongrep da kaba siew lypa ia ka mar rep shwa ban kheit ia u soh. Kumta ki nongrep namar kim donlad ban khaii shabar bad donkam ka pisa ha shwa ban kut ka samoi bad ruh shwa ka samoi long skul da ka jingbym banse ki la shim lypa ia katei ka pisa ba ju ai kitei ki nongkhaii pdeng.Hadien ba la iohi ia ki jingeh ba ki nongrep ka jylla ki mad, na ka liang ka sorkar jylla ka la trei borbah ban plie lad plie lynti khnang ban pynsuk ia ki paidbah ha ki shnong ki thaw. Kine ki jingpyrshang suki suki ki sdang ban wandur. Ka sorkar ka la trei borbah ruh ban lum lang ia ki nongrep bad thaw ia ki kynhun jong ki nongrep ne kita ki Farmer Cooperative ne ki Farmer Producer Organisation (FPO) ha baroh kawei ka jylla bad mynta ki la don palat 350 tylli ki kynhun kiba la dep ban thaw ha kine ki lai snem ba la dep. Na ka liang ka tnad ka Rep ka Riang ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka MBMA ki la kyrshan ia kine ki kynhun khnang ba ki lah ban mihpli lane knieh noh ia ka jaka jong ki nongshim kabu ne kita ki middlemen khnang ba kin lah ban kham pynmih kham bun bad pyniaid iew shuh shuh.Kum ban shu kdew, ha ka sien phah kaba nyngkong la phah haduh 1.3 ton u Sohtrun sha ki ri Middle East da ka ‘Silchang Dimrimbri Palwa Adling IVCS’ na East Garo Hills District. Kane kadei ka sien kaba nyngkong ba ki nongrep da kawei ka sur ki trei lang ban sdang ia ka jingkhaii shabar ri bad kane ruh ka la urlong da ka jingkryshan lang jong ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka MBMA.Da ka thong ban kyntiew shuh shuh ia ka iew ka hat na bynta u sohtrun na kane ka jylla, ka sorkar kan pynlong ia ka tamasa sohtrun ha Delhi. Kane ka tamasa kan sa long hadien ba la dep ka jingrakhe Independence Day bad kan plie lad ruh ia ki nong Delhi ban ioh mad ia u sohtrun ba mih na ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: IAID IEW BHA U SOHTRUN NA MEGHALAYA SHA DUBAI, KUWAIT BAD SHA KIWEI PAT KI RI

content: Ka Meghalaya College Teachers’ Association (MCTA) ka la rai ban ‘boycott’ ne ban ym shim klas ha ka First Semester kum ka dak ban pyrshah ïa ka jingleh bym suidñiew jong ka North Eastern Hill University (NEHU) ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshim rai ban pyntreikam noh ïa ka National Education Police (NEP), 2020 ha ka Jylla.Ïa kane ka rai la shim ha ka jingïalang bakyrkieh jong ka Association kaba la long ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.Ha u kyrwoh, ka MCTA ka la ong, “(ngi) pynrem jur ïa ka jingeh dohnud, ka jingbym don jingsngew bad ka jingleh mutlop da ki bor pynïaid jong ka NEHU, khamtam u Vice Chancellor, ban khynñiat beit shakhmat ban pyntreikam ïa ka NEP 2020 khlem ka jingmynjur jong ka Academic Council.”Ha ka jingïalang ba kyrkieh ba la shu pynlong Online ha ka 29 tarik mynta u bnai, hadien ka jingïathir ïatai kaba bniah halor ka jingdon jingsgngew jong ki bor pynïaid ka NEHU khamtam eh u Vice Chancellor, Prof Prabha Shankar Shukla, la rai da kawei ka sur ban pynlong ïa ka Non Cooperation Movement pyrshah ïa ka NEHU da kaba sangeh shim klas ha ka First Semester jong ka FYUP, la ong ka Assocation.“Namarkata, la pyntip hangne sha baroh ki dkhot jong ka MCTA, naduh ka 1 tarik, Nailar, 2023, tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat, baroh ki dkhot ki dei ban ‘boycott’ ïa ki klas jong ka First Semester.  Shuh shuh, la bthah ïa ki dkhot ban kyntait ïa baroh ki jingshah pynkhamti kam kiba ïadei bad ka jingpyntreikam mardor ïa ka NEP 2020,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka 3rd bad 5th Semester, ki klas kin long beit kumba ju long khlem kano kano ka jingpynthud. Namarkata, la bthah ïa ki dkhot ba kin leit shim ïa ki klas bad ban pyndep ïa ki lynnong kot katkum ka por ba la buh, la bthah u kyrwoh.Shuh shuh ka MCTA, ka la pynpaw, “ngi sngewthuh ïa ki jingtynjuh ba kane ka rai ba la shim kan buh jingeh, hynrei, kumba ka long ha ki por ba la leit noh, phi la aiti na ka bynta ki kam jong ka Association, ka long kaba donkam eh ba ngin ïa tylli lang kawei khnang ban pynthikna ba ki shlem ai jinghikai jong ngi kin ïoh ïa ka burom bad ruh ban ïada ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki kynhun bapher bapher, khamtam eh ki samla pule.”
title: RAI KA MCTA BAN ‘BOYCOTT’ ÏA KI KLAS HA KA FIRST SEMESTER BA PYNTREIKAM KA NEHU ÏA KA NEP-2020

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) West Jaiñtia Hills District ka la maham tyngeh ia ki dkhot jong kawei ka kynhun kieng atiar kaba la tip kum ka United People’s Front of Karbi Longri (UPFKL) kiba thmu ban pyntieng pynsmiej ia ki Khasi-Pnar kiba shong basah ha ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka thaiñ Block-1.“Hadien ba ka jingmih ha ki lad pathai khubor ba ka don, ka KSU, West Jaintia Hills District Unit ka phah ia une u kyrwoh khubor sha ki paradoh parasnam kiba don ha ki jaka bad ia baroh kiba shong basah markhap bad ka jylla Assam ba kim dei ban tieng bad ban shong  syier, ka Seng kan long kaba la kloi ban ai ia ka jubab ia kita ki Kaikhlaw kiba thmu ban wanrah ka jingpyntieng bad ban iuhroit ia ka hok ka kynti ki paid Khasi-Pnar kiba sah ha Block-1,” ong u kyrwoh na u Publicity Secretary ka KSU West Jaiñtia Hills District Unit u samla Juhhi Tariang.Ka Seng ka kyntu ia ki paradoh parasnam ban kin iaid kin ieng kumba ju long baroh shikatta bad ban kamai kajih laitluid ha la ka jong ka khyndew lajong.Ka Seng ka Maham ruh ia  UPFKL lada ka kwah ban iatyngkhuh ka Seng ka la long kaba la pynkhreh ban  mih ha madan thma.  “Lada jia eiei ia ki doh ki snam ki jong ngi kiba shong ha kitei ki jaka ka Sorkar Assam bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya ki dei ban shim ka jingkitkhlieh,” la bynrap u kyrwoh na ka Seng.
title: BYRNGEM KYLLA KA KSU ÏA KA UPFKL LADA PYNTIENG PYNSMIEJ ÏA KI KHASI-PNAR HA BLOCK-I

content: : Ka Meghalaya Lokayukta, Shillong ha ka 28 tarik u bnai ba ladep ka la pynmih ia ka hukum ba la pynngat hapoh ka kyndon Prevention of Corruption Act, 1988 (as amended) ia u Chief Executive Member (CEM) barim jong ka Garo Hills Autonomous District Council (GHADC) u Denang T. Sangma bad ia ki MDC barim kiba kynthup ia u Augustine R. Marak, u Brilliant R. Sangma, u Dipul R. Marak, u Kurosh M. Marak, u Winnison Ch. Marak, u Dolly K. Sangma, u Bhupen Hajong, u Sukaram K. Sangma.Nalor kine ki  9 ngut, ka Meghalaya Lokayukta ka la pynngat kyndon ruh ia u Secretary jong ka GHADC u Hewingson A. Sangma bad ia ki arngut ki Kontraktor kiba kynthup ia u Sanjay A. Sangma bad ia u Dolrish  D. Sangma.Kine ki la shah pynngat kyndon halor ka jingkynnoh donkti ha ka jyrsieh bamsap hadien ba u President jong ka Human Rights and Anti-Corruption Youth Power of India (HRACYPI) u Kingstone Bolwari Sangma u la mudui pyrshah ia ki sha ka Meghalaya Lokayukta.Ha ka hukum ba la pynmih da u Chairperson jong ka Meghalaya Lokayukta u Bah Bhalang Dhar, la bthah ia u Director of Prosecution ban phah ia ki case record sha u Public Prosecutor jong ka West Garo Hills, khnang ban ioh pynsdang noh ia ka jingtian bishar ha ka Special Court jong ka West Garo Hills.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Sngi Balang, u Kingstone u la pyntip ba ha u snem 2021 u la mudui pyrshah ia u MLA ba mynta jong ka NPP na Mahendraganj Constituency u Sanjay A. Sangma bad ia kiwei pat halor ka jingbym trei pyndep ia ka projek  ban shna ia ka Member Hostel ha Tura kaba kot T.6,01,31,100.00 klur bad ia kane ka pisa la bhah lyngba ka Special Assistance jong ka Central Plan Scheme na ka bynta u snem 2015-2016 ha kaba ka Ministry of Finance ka la pyllait ia ka pisa kaba kot T. 100.71 klur kum ka Grant-in-Aid sha ka GHADC ban shna ia ka Schedule Tribe Areas.U la iathuh, ka Lokayukta kaba la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit ba malu mala nyngkong eh ka la lap tyngkreiñ ia ki jingduna ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ia kane ka projek bad mar mar la bthah ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.“Hadien ba la ioh ia ka jingbthah na ka Lokayukta u Anil Sangma, MPS (Rtd.) uba dei u dkhot jong ka Inquiry Wing jong ka Lokayukta u la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bad phah ruh ia ka kaiphod tohkit sha ka Lokayukta bad katkum ka jinglap na ka kaiphod tohkit, ka Lokayukta ka la pynngat kyndon ia ki MDC ba la kdew kyrteng haneng, ia ki kontraktor bad ia ki nongtrei jong ka GHADC,” la ong u Kingstone. Hadien ba la ioh ia ka jingpynngat kyndon bad ia ka kaiphod tohkit ba la phah da u Inquiry Wing jong ka Lokayukta, ka Special Court, Tura ka la pynmih ia ka hukum ban shong bishar noh ia kane ka kam ha ka 29 tarik, Nailar, 2023.
title: HA KI KYNDON BAMSAP PYNNGAT KA LOKAYUKTA ÏA U CEM BAD ÏA KI MDC BARIM KA GHADC

content: : Ka Jaiñtia Students Movement (JSM) ha sngi balang ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma lyngba u Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills District u Bah B.S. Sohliya hadien ka jingmih pyrthei jong kawei ka kynhun kieng atiar ha Karbi Anglong.Ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u President u Bah L.S. Rymbai bad u General Secretary u Bah R. Dkhar, ka JSM ka la kyntu ïa u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ban ïakren bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma ban pynthikna ïa ka shongsuk shongshngaiñ jong ki Khasi-Pnar kiba shong basah ha ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka thaiñ Block-I.“Ka JSM kan ym shong kli kti ban shim da kino kino ki sienjam kiba tyngeh lada ka United People’s Front of Karbi Longri (UPFKL) ka khrong pisa lane ka pyndik ïa ki Khasi-Pnar kiba sah ha Block-1,” la ong ka dorkhas na ka Seng.Ka Seng ka la pyntip ruh ba ha u snem 1951 na ka bynta ban pynsuk ïa ka synshar ka khadar, ïa ka Block-I & II kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka Jowai Civil Sub Division ba mynshwa la pynngat sha ka United Mikir Hills, District da u Lat barim ka Jylla Assam bad na ki daw ki bym lah ban tip, ym shym la shim shuh ïa ka rai ban pynphai biang ïa ka Block-I & II sha Meghalaya, haba la pynkha ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ïa ka Jylla bapura ha u snem 1972.“Naduh u snem 1951 ki jaidbynriew Pnar ki ju mad ïa ki jingshah pyndik balaiphewjait bad ki ngat ruh ha ki jingshah pynshitom ha ka kti jong ki riewbat aiñ lane ha ka kti jong ki lehnoh Karbi kat haduh ba kin da mad ïa ka jingim kaba syrtok bad dei halor kane ka daw ba ki pynim ïa ka jingïai dawa ban pynphai biang ïa ki shnong jong ki sha ka Jylla Meghalaya,” la ong ka Seng.“Kumba phi ladep tip, ha u snem 2004, da ki spah ngut ki Pnar ki la kylla phetwir sha Sahsniang kaba hap hapoh ka Laskeiñ C&RD Block, West Jaiñtia Hills District namar ka jingsheptieng ïa la ka jong ka jingim na ka jingshah pyndik ha ki lehnoh Karbi, kiba pynshitom da kaba dawa pisa bad siat ïap ïa ki Pnar tang na ki daw barit baria,” la pynkynmaw ka Seng ïa ki jingshah lehbeiñ ki Pnar ha ki snem ba mynshwa.Ban pynksan shuh shuh ïa ka jingdawa, ka Seng ka la pyntip ruh ba ki Pulit ka Jylla Assam dang shen ki la ïoh kem ïa arngut ki dkhot jong ka United People’s Front of Karbi Longri (UPFKL) ha West Karbi Anglong District.“Ka lah ban long ba kane ka kynhun kieng atiar ba thymmai ki Karbi kan leh ïa ki kam pyntriem sa shisien da kaba dawa pisa na ki Pnar kiba sah ha  Block-I bad kiwei kiwei ki jait jingpynshitom ba har rukom khnang ba ki jaidbynriew Pnar kin ym nud ban pynsngew ïa ki jingdawa ban wan phai sha Meghalaya kumba la leh da ka kynhun kieng atiar Karbi kaba mynshwa.
title: PHAH TUKLAR KA JSM HA U MR SHWA BAN SHAH PYNTRIEM KI PNAR HA KI LEHNOH KARBI

content: Khliehriat, Nailar 2 : U Executive Engineer jong ka ophis PWD Khliehriat u Bah M. Kharnaior ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Waheh Shnong ka shnong Sutnga u  Bah Eban Sutnga bad  u Assistant Waheh Shnong na Jalaphet Bri Sutnga u Bah Moin Dkhar ha ka 2 tarik u Nailar, 2023 ki la hiar jurip ïa ka surok kaba la sniew bad buh jingma ïa ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan.Ha kane ka jingjurip, la synran lang da ki dkhot jong ka Jaiñtia National Council (JNC) Jalaphet Unit hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Vice  President u samla Phrangsngi Chyrmang.Kane ka surok kaba don hajan ka jingkieng Syrbang ka dei kaba dang hap hapoh ka Elaka Sutnga bad kumba ka long mynta ka dap da ka khyndew ktieh kaba hap halor bad ki don ruh ki maw kiba heh harud ka surok kiba lah ban hap ha surok ha kano kano ka por.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ha kine ki sngi ba la leit noh, ka JNC ka la aiti da ka jingthoh da kaba kyrpad ïa ka ophis PWD, Khliehriat ban leit jurip noh kloi ïa kane ka surok khnang ba ka tnat PWD ruh kan wad kloi ruh ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynkhuid noh ïa ka khyndew ktieh ban lait na kano kano ka jingajia ba sngewsih.Na ka liang jong u Executive Eeginner u la kular ban shimkhia ïa kane ka kam da kaba phah ïa ki nongtrei ban pynkhuid ïa ka khyndew ktieh khnang ban pynsuk ïa ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan.
title: AP JINGMA KA JINGSNIEW SUROK HAJAN JINGKIENG SYRBANG, SUTNGA

content: Ka United Hynñiewtrep Movement (UHM) Central Executive Council ka la maham tyngeh ia ka tnat Forest jong ka Sorkar Jylla ba kam dei ban shu leh donbor ia ki trai jylla kiba die jingdie harud surok ha ka thain 7 Mer, Upper Shillong.Ha u kyrwoh ba la soi da u President u Bah Charlie J. Rani bad u Secretary u Bah Teibor Shadap, ka seng ka la pynpaw ia ka jingbitar hadien ba ka la ioh ia ka jingujor na ki nongshong dukan kiba shong die jingdie ha ka jaka ba dang hap hapoh ka tnat Forest ha 7Mer Upper Shillong.“Ka seng kaba la iakynduh ia ki nongshong dukan ka la sngap thuh ia ka jingshem lanot bad ka jingshah ñiew beiñ jong kine ki nongshong dukan kiba im da kaba kamai mynstep bad bam da miet, ba ha ka por ba wan lynshop ka jingpang khlam Covid-19 ia kane ka jaka la ai sngewbha da ka tnat Forest ban pynlong iew ban die ia ki mar rep bad kumjuh ruh kiwei kiwei ki kam kiba iadei bad ki marbam mardih. Hadien ba kine ki paradoh parasnam ki la ioh jaka hangne kim banse ban pyllait noh ia ki dukan ba ki shong baroh shikatta namarba ka shem jingeh ban pynmih bai wai khlem da ioh plie ia ki dukan ki jong ki ha ka por ba la wan lynshop ka jingpang khlam Covid 19, hynrei da ka mynsiem ba kmen ki lah ioh jingkyrmen lyngba ka jingiohlad ban shong ha kane ka iew ba dei ka jaka jong ka tnat Forest, hynrei kaba pynsngewsih ia ki pat ka long ba shu syndet syndet khlem kano kano ka jingthoh na ka liang ka tnat Forest ki shu byrngem beit ban rat naphang ia ki dukan kiba ker dara hangto. Ka jingkylli kaba ka seng ka buh ia ka tnat Forest ba ka jingmut aiu ban buh ia kato ka jaka hangto kaba shu long thylli ha ka jingshisha ka dei ban ailad khamtam haba ki paradoh parasnam jong ngi ki ioh ban kamai jakpoh nangto khamtam ha kum kane ka por ba ka jingkyrduh kam kyrduh jam jong ki paidbah ka lah jur shaba palat, bad daleilei ka seng kan ym ailad ia kum kine ki jingleh donbor jong ka Sorkar ia la ki jong ki paradoh parasnam jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep Hynñiewskum jong ngi,” ong u kyrwoh.“Lyngba une u kyrwoh ka seng ka maham tyngeh ia ka tnat Forest ba kam dei ban leh donbor kumne ia kine ki nongshong dukan hangne bad lada ka don ka jingthmu ban shna ne leh eiei ia kane ka jaka katkum ka jingdonkam jong ka tnat kan hap ban pynioh jaka ia kine ki nongshong dukan hangne kata ruh kaba long ka jaka kaba paka lym kumta ka seng kan sa shim da ki sienjam ba tyngeh,” la dawa ka UHM.Ka seng ka buh ruh ka jingkylli ia ka tnat Forest ba ka dei ban kyndang noh mardor ia ka jaka mane blei jong kiwei pat ki niam ba la tei be-aiñ ha Mahadev Khola bad kumjuh ruh kiwei kiwei ki jaka ba lah tei be-aiñ ha ki jaka jong kane ka tnat.U kyrwoh u la pyntip ba ka seng kan sa wad jingtip da ka RTI ia kiba bun ki jaka jong ka tnat Forest bad lada lap ba don ki jingpyndonkam bakla ia ki jaka jong ka da kino kino ki riewshimet ka seng kam banse ban shim da ki sienjam ba tyngeh kata da ki jingiakhih bad wat kat haduh ban da poi shaduh sha High Court.
title: MAHAM KA UHM ÏA KA TNAT FOREST BAN YM LEH DONBOR ÏA KIBA DIE DUKAN HA 7 MER

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Laban Circle ha ka sngi Palei ka la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Principal Chief Conservator of Forest (PCCF) and HoFF u R. S. Gill, ban dawa ia ka tnat Forest ba ka dei ban kyndang naphang ia ki briew kiba shna ing be-aiñ ha ka jaka jong ka tnat Forest ha Mahadev Khola.Ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u President u samla Reuben Najiar bad u Secretary u samla Jason Laloo, ka seng ka la aiti ruh ia ka jingthoh ba ka tnat Forest ka la ai jingbit tang ban shna ia ka Temple ha ka 5 tarik, Nohprah, 1923.“Ka jingai jingbit ka la kren shai, “bym dei ban shna ia ki ing ki sem, lane ban pynkylla sha kino kino ki bynta ia ka jaka lane ia ka temple ba la tyrwa khlem da ioh jingbit,” la pynpaw ka seng ia ka jingthoh ba la kdew ha ka jingai jingbit.“Ka Seng ka la kwah ban pynpaw ba ki briew kiba sah be-aiñ ha Mahadev Khola ki la nang kharoi ha kine ki khyndiat snem bad kam don kano kano ka jingpeitngor namarba ka dei ka jaka jong ka tnat Forest bad ka Dorbar Shnong ruh ka pynpaw ba kam don bor satia halor ka Mahadev Khola.  Ia ki ing dewbilat, ki ing basa, bad ki dukan la shu shna khlem da ioh jingbit na ki bor ba dei peit. Ia ki jakhlia bad ki jaboh la shu pyntuid beit beit sha ka wah duid kaba don hajan kaba la pynjngut bad pynjaboh ia ka wah baroh kawei,” la pynpaw ka Seng.“Ha kane ka jaka, la sakhi ruh ia ki jingjia ba har rukom, ki kam tuh kam thiem bad kane ka jaka ka la kylla long ka ktem jong ki briew kiba ju im kyrni ha u drok bad ka la pynsyier mynsiem ruh wat ia ki trai shnong kiba ju iaid lynti bad ia kiba sah marjan bad kane ka jaka,” la pynpaw shuh shuh ka Seng.Ka Seng ka la pynkynmaw ruh ha u PCCF, ba ka ladep aiti ia ka dorkhas ha ka 5 tarik u Naitung, 2023 sha u Division Forest Officer, East Khasi Hills (T) Division, Shillong u I.A Mathuram.Ka seng ka la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingpyrshah ha ka dorkhas hadien ba la lap ba ki briew kiba sah ha Mahadev Khola ki la aplai na ka tnat Forest ban pynkylla ia kane ka jaka sha ka jaka sah briew.“Ngi pyrshah jur ia ka aplikeshon bad ka tnat Forest kam dei satia ban pdiang hynrei ka dei ban kyndang naphang ia ki briew kiba sah beain bad ban pynduh pyndam shisyndon ia ki jingtei beain khlem da pynslem namarba ka Mahadev Khola kan kylla long ka jaka rieh tngen jong ki briew kiba wan nabar,” ong u President ka Seng ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingiakynduh ia u PCCF.Shuh shuh u la ong, “lada ka tnat Forest ka ai jingbit ban pynkylla shnong ia ka Mahadev Khola, namar kata, ka dei ban ai jingbit ruh ia ki trai jylla ban shna iing ha ki khlaw jong ka tnat Forest.”Ha kaba iadei bad kane, u Principal Chief Conservator of Forest (PCCF) u la iathuh sha ki nongialam ka KSU ba ka jingsorjamin bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat bad lada donkam ban kyndang ia ki briew kiba sah beain ha Mahadev Khola ka tnat Forest kan sa pan jingiarap na ka ophis ka Deputy Commissioner bad na ka ophis u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District.
title: PAN JINGBIT KI BAR JYLLA NA KA TNAT FOREST BAN PYNKYLLA SHNONG ÏA KA MAHADEV KHOLA

content: : Ka Seng Samla Mawlai Pyllun (SSMP) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynkup burom ïa ki samla pule kiba pas bha, ïa ki Rangbah Shnong, ki nongïalehkai Sport, ki Engineer PWD, ïa ki nonglum khubor bad kiwei kiwei kiba shong basah ha jylli jong ka shnong Mawlai, ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Shillong Polyntechnic, Mawlai Kynton Massar.Ki don 21 ngut ki samla pule kiba la shah pynkup, ba kynthup ïa ki 16 ngut kiba pas ha ka eksamin SSLC bad 5 ngut ha ka HSSLC ha kaba ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ki Momento ryngkat bad ka song pisa.  Ka jingai khusnam ka long tang ïa ki samla pule kiba ïoh 85 percent ha kine ki ar tylli ki eksamin.Katba ïa ki Rangbah Shnong ka Seng Samla ka la pynkup burom tang ïa kiba la shakri la palat 15 snem ïa ka kam. Kiba la shah pynkup burom ki kynthup ïa u Rangbah Shnong jong ka Nonglum u Bah SD Khongwir, u Rangbah Shnong jong ka Mawdatbaki u Bah BR Kharmujai, u Rangbah Shnong ka Umjaiur u Bah Klose Khyriem, u Rangbah Shnong jong ka Mawkynroh-Umshing u Bah Longshai Nongkhlaw bad u Rangbah Shnong barim jong ka Mawlai Umthlong u Bah K. Mylliem.Ha kane ka sngi la pynkup burom ruh ïa ka samla Dapalei Warjri kaba long ka nongseng kam lajong bad ïa u samla Pynshngain Kharbuli uba dei u nongshad.U DC (Custom), North East Region u Bah Spencer Mylliem haba kren kum u kongsan u la pyrto ïa ki samla kiba la trei shitom bad kiba la pas bha ha ki jingpule bad u la ai khublei ruh ïa ka Seng Samla kaba la pynlong kum ïa kane ka jingïalang ban ai mynsiem ïa kiba bun balang kiba la shah pynkup burom ha kane ka sngi.“Nga sngewkmen ba phi khlem shah pynthame ha ki kam sniew bad phi la lah ban pas bha,” ong u kongsan ïa ki samla pule kiba don ha ka jingïalang.“Naduh mynta ba phi dang pule phi dei ban wad jingtip lypa shaphang ki eksamin UPSC, MCS, IAS, IPS, IFS, kumta ter ter.  Wat ap haduh ba phin da pas ïa ka Graduate lane ka Post Graduate, wad jingtip lypa, khnang ba phin dup buh lypa ïa ka thong ban ïakhun ïa kine ki eksamin kiba kongsan,” la ong u Bah Spencer Mylliem.“Mynta ka juk, phi suk bha ban wad ïa ki jingtip bapher bapher namarba phi don ha kti ïa ka Internet kiba ai ha phi ïa ki jingtip ba laiphew jait,” u la bynrap.U Paiem Ainam haba kren kum u Kongsan u la kular ban pynurlong ïa ka jingangnud jong ka Seng Samla Mawlai Pyllun kaba la pynsngew sha ka ophis jong ka Hima ban pynïoh ïa ka madan ïalehkai na ka bynta ki samla hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Mawlai.Shwa ka jingpynkup burom bad ka jingsam khusnam, ki nongmihkhmat jong ka Meghalaya AIDS Control Society (MACS) ki la ai jingpynshai ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingsaphriang jong ka jingpang HIV-AIDS bad ha kajuh ka por la ai jingpynshai ruh halor ka jingshyrkhei jong ka u drok.Kiwei kiba la don ryngkat ha kane ka sngi ki kynthup ïa u Paiem Ainam Manik Syiem kum u symbud kongsan, u President ka SSMP u Bah Samuel Biam, u Samran S. Syiem, ki nongïalam Sengbhalang bad kiwei kiwei.
title: PYNSHLUR KA SSMP ÏA KI SAMLA PULE BAD NONGÏALEHKAI DA KABA AI KHUSNAM

content: Shillong, Naitung 17 : Hadien 30 snem ba la ngam sha ki lawbah lawsan jong ka ri Bangladesh, jngai na la ka ri baieid, ki nongialam jong ka seng kieng atiar Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) kiba la wan poi sha ri Khasi na ka bynta ka jingiakren iasuk bad ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla, ha ka 17 tarik u Naitung, 2023 ki la iohlad ban leit buh syntiew hakhmat u dur mot jong u Syiem ka Hima Nongkhlaw u Paiem Tirot Sing uba don ha madan Iewrynghep, Shillong ha ka jingrakhe ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap kaba 188 snem jong une u khlaiwait ka jaidbynriew Khasi.Ha ki kynta ba ka kynhun jong ka seng HNLC ba la ialam da u Vice Chairman u Bah Manbhalang Jyrwa ki  leit buh syntiew hakhmat u durmot jong u Syiem Tirot Sing, la synran lang da ki nongialam jong ka Khasi Students Union ba la lamkhmat da u samla Lamboktarwell Marngar, ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front ba la lamkhmat da u Bah Sadon Blah, ka Hynniewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisaton ba la lamkhmat da u
