Bah Donbok Dkhar bad ka East Khasi Hills Local Taxi Welfare Association ba la lamkhmat da u Bah Wandonbok Jyrwa.U President ka KSU u Samla Lambokstarwell Marngar haba kren ha ka jingialang ba lyngkot, u la ong, “ban kynjoh sha ka rynieng ka ryniot  jong ki riewkhraw kam shong-eh ha ka rta hynrei ha ki kam kiba ngi trei na bynta ka ri bad ka jait bynriew .”“Kum ka pateng mynta, ngim dei ban kylli mano ban trei ia ka kam jong ka jait bynriew, hynrei ka shong ha ka mon ba jwat jong ki khun samla jong ka jait bynriew.  Ngim dei ban shu long tang ki nongwoh kjat ha ka rynsan jong ki Social Media, hynrei ngi donkam ban mih shakhmat ban leh eiei na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ka imlang ka sahlang,” la ong u Samla Marngar.Une u nongialam ka KSU u la ther tyngeh ia ka Sorkar Jylla da kaba ong, “pynduna ka jingpynpah sairen hynrei dei ban pynjur ia ki kam hapoh Secretariat khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi ia ka jaitbynriew namar kumba long mynta ngi lah kynjoh palat 50 snem ha ka jingioh ia ka jylla bapura katba ki aiñ ki kanun ban iada ia ka ri ki dang duna.”
title: HADIEN 30 SNEM ÏOH LEH BUROM KA HNLC ÏA KA SNGI ÏAP U TIROT SING HA RI KHASI

content: U MLA jong ka Mawryngkneng Constituency Bah Heavingstone Kharpran ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai u la leit ban iakynduh ia u Director jong ka NEIGRIHMS, Shillong u Dr. Nalin Mehta ban iakren halor katto katne ki mat kiba iadei bad ki samla pule.Ha kane ka jingiakynduh, u Bah Heavingstone u la pan ka jingynshai na u Director ka NEIGRIHMS halor ka rukom thungkam thungjam ha kane ka jaka sumar jong ka Sorkar Pdeng.Na ka liang jong u Director u la pynpaw ba ka jingthungkam hi ka long beit thik katkum ki kyndon ba la buh ka Sorkar India ryngkat ka Reservation ruh ka long Pan India.U Director u la pynpaw ruh ba mynta kan ym don shuh ka Personal Interview hynrei ka jingthungkam kan long beit thik halor ka Entrance Exam ba ki khynnah ki thoh bad ia ki Advertisement ruh yn pynmih na ka por sha ka por.U MLA u la pynsngew ia ka jingangnud ba ka NEIGRIHMS Hospital, kan pynlong ia ka Free Health Camp ha kylleng ka Mawryngkneng Constituency ia kaba u Director u la ai ka jingmynjur.U la pynpaw ruh ba ha ka thungkam thungjam u kham kwah hi ia ki khynnah kiba sah ha ki shnong ba marjan jong kane ka jaka sumar ia kaba u Director ruh u la pynpaw kajuh ka jingsngew.U Bah Kharpran u la kyntu ia ki khynnah samla jong ka Constituency kiba kwah rung kam ha kane ka jaka sumar ba kin durut bad ban khreh kot bha ban pynkhreh ia ki eksamin kiba ka NEIGRIHMS Hosital, ka pynlong bad ba kin buddien ia ki Advertisement laitkam ha kane ka jaka sumar.
title: HALOR KA THUNGKAM PAN JINGPYNSHAI U MLA KA MAWRYNGKNENG NA U DIRECTOR KA NEIGRHIMS

content: Shillong, Naitung 17 : Ki pulit ka East Khasi Hills ki la leit khynra ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka nongbah Shillong kum ha Motphran, Paltan Bazar, Mawblei, Nongrim Hills, Ïew Laitumkhrah, Mawlonghat, Urkaliar, Upper Shillong, Polo, Mawbah , Jhalupara bad Upper Mawprem. Ha kane ka jingleit khynra jong ki, ki la ioh ban kurup haduh 1,12,097 ml ka kyiad phareng bad 7,74,000 ml ka kyiad pyrsi.Ki pulit ki la leit khynra ruh ha Khyndailad bad ki la ioh kem 15 ngut ki thei die met bad la pynngat ia ki hapoh ki kyndon ain jong ka Immoral Trafficking Pevention Act. Ka kyrwoh na u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger ka la pyntip ruh ba ki pulit ki la khynra bad sngi bad miet ban lap ia ki briew kiba buaid ha ka por niah kali, kiba niah thuk thuk khlem helmet, bad kiba tah iit iong ha ki kali jong ki. Ki la don haduh 277 tylli ki kali kiba shah bat bad ka kuna ba kla ioh lum na ki -ka long 2,36,500 tyngka.
title: SHAH KEM 15 NGUT KI THEI DIE MET NA KHYNDAILAD

content: Ka PFR Football Academy kaba long kawei na ki shlem ai jinghikai ia ki khynnah ha ka jingialehkai phutbol, ka la shah khot sngewbha ban iashim bynta ha ka Under-15 Gold Cup National Football Championship ka ban sa long naduh 21 tarik haduh 23 tarik Naitung, 2023 ha West Bengal.Haba ia kren bad u President jong ka Academy, u Bah Franky Kharumnuid u la ong ba kum ka Academy ka dap da ka jingkmen kaba khraw hadien ba kane ka Academy ka la ioh ia ka jingithuh wat haduh ki nongpyniaid kiba na shabar ka jylla lyngba ka jingshah khot ban iashim bynta ha kane ka lympung National Level kaba long kawei na ki rynsan kaba ki khynnah jong kane ka Academy kin ioh ia ka lad ban pyni ia ka sap ka phong jong ki ha ka National Level.U la ong, kan ruh ka jingai mynsiem ia ki khynnah haba ki ioh ia ka lad ban ialehkai ia ki lympung ialehkai shabar na ka jylla namar dei ha kum kine ki lympung kiba heh kaba ki khynnah kin sngewthuh kumno ba kin nang lah ban trei shitom ban pynjanai ialade na ka bynta ban pynlong ia kane ka jingialehkai kaba ki ieid kum ka lad jingkamai jong ki ha ki khyndiat snem ki ban sa wan.Ia kane ka kynhun yn ialam da u Bah Tyngshainlang Kharlyngdoh kum u Head Coach bad u Bah Franky Kharumnuid kum u Team Manager.Kane ka kynhun ka mih na ka Meghalaya ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai.Na ka liang jong ka Management ka kitbok kit rwiang ia kane ka kynhun bad kyrmen ba kin ioh kheit ia u soh jong ka jingjop ha kane ka lympung.
title: SHAH KHOT KA PFR FA SHA KA U-15 GOLD CUP NATIONAL FOOTBALL CHAMPIONSHIP HA WEST BENGAL

content: Ka Jaintia Students Union, Khliehriat Circle hapoh ka jianglam jong u President u samla Livingson Sama, u General Secretary u samla Ajoymenson Lyngdoh ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u Vice President u samla Winson Salahe bad ki dkhot ka seng ha ka 19 tarik u Naitung, 2023 ki pyndam ia ka jingthoh Civil Hospital ha Khliehriat halor ka daw ba kane ka hospital kam pat don satia ia ki kor ki bor ban ai jingsumar kaba paka sha ki paidbah jong ka East Jaintia Hills District.Shwa kane, ka seng ka la iakynduh ia u District Medical & Health Officer bad ia u Medical Officer ban pan jingpynshai halor ka jinglong jingman jong ka Hospital ha Khliehriat kaba dang shu dep kyntiew kyrdan sha ka Civil Hospital Khliehriat ha u snem 2022 hynrei phewse ka seng ka lap da la jong ki khmat ha ka jingleit jurip ba kane ka hospital ka dang sahdien wat hadien ba lah dep pynkiew kyrdan.Ki dkhot jong ka seng kiba la dap da ka jingbitar ban iohi ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la shu iehbeiñ ia ka East Jaintia Hills District wat hadien ba la ioh ia ka distrik bapura la 12 snem kynthih pynban ka Sorkar kam shym la shimkhia ban pynbiang ia ki jaka sumar.Ki nongialam ka JSU ki la ong ruh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka ioh kham bun ka khajna na ka East Jaintia Hills District hynrei haba phai sha ki kam pynroi kane ka district ka dei kaba sahdien ha kiba bun ki liang.Halor kane, ka seng ka la shim ia ka rai ban pyndam shuwa ia ka kyrteng “Civil Hospital ” katba ka Sorkar kam pat lah ban pynbiang ia ki kor ki bor bad ia ki jingsumar kiba paka hapoh kane ka Hospital paitbah namar ha kiba bun ki khep ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki hap ban leit wad jingsumar sha Jowai Civil Hospital kat haduh ba ka la buh jingeh ia ki paidbah namarba ka lynti iaid ka long kaba jngai.
title: PYNDAM KA JSU ÏA KA KYRTENG CIVIL HOSPITAL HA KHLIEHRIAT BYM PAT BIANG KI KOR JINGSUMAR

content: Ki bor synshar jong ka West Khasi Hills, ki ladep pynpra ïa ki Atoskhana jong ki 13 tylli ki coke plant beaiñ kiba don hapoh u pud u sam jong ka District bad hapoh  30 sngi la buh thong ban pynpra lut ïa ki 57 tylli ki coke plant beaiñ mynta ka kynti.Ïa kane la pyntip da u Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Khasi Hills District ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi baar.U DC u la pyntip ba ki bor synshar District ki la ioh kem haduh hynriew ngut ki briew kiba dei ki trai jong kine ki Coke Plant beain ïa kiba la register case hapoh Shallang Police Station hapoh ka Section 188/34/379/120BIPC bad ka Sec 15 Environment (Protection)Act, Sec 3 jong ka Explosive Substances Act bad Sec 51(1), Benami Transaction (Prohibition) Act, 2016.Kine ki 6 ngut ki kynthup ïa u Youdishthra Bham na Assam, u Ashish Arya na Guwahati Assam, u Khrawbok Rongrin na Shallang, u Hopeful Nongtdu na Rymbai Synrang, East Jaiñtia Hills, u Yaman Bansal na Beltola, Guwahati Assam bad u Eras Dkhar na Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills.U DC u la pyntip ba ki Atoskhana jong ki coke plant beaiñ ba ladep pynpra ki don ha Nonglangpar (Kyllonmathei) kiba don ha ki co-ordinate (i) 25.5220613, 90.9035105 (ii) 25.5224573, 90. 8992605 (iii) 25.5201515, 90.9032912 (iv) 25.5185800, 90.9041877 (v) 25.5174384, 90.9062416 (vi) 25.5128946, 90.9028738 (vii) 25. 5138295, 90.9038863 (viii) 25.5146504, 90.9051718 (ix) 25.5146671, 90.9067402 (x) 25.5177594, 90.9006992 (xi) 25.5191951, 90.9023759 (xii) 25.5214483, 90.9009416 bad (xiii) 25.5212888, 90.8993075.Kum ban shu pyntip, ki don 57 tylli ki coke plant beaiñ hapoh ka thaiñ Shallang bad ki bor synshar District, ki ladep ban khang tala ïa kine ki karkhana saiñ dewiong naduh u Nohprah 2022 hadien ka jingbthah jong ka Meghalaya High Court.U la pyntip ba ha u bnai Rymphang haduh u bnai Ïaiong 2023, ki bor synshar District ki la pynpra lut ïa ki jaka saiñ dewiong bad ia ki pipe kiba pynïasoh bad ki Atoskhana jong kine ki karkhana beaiñ ban pynthikna ba kin ym lah shuh ban dang treikam.Shuh shuh u la pyntip, katba ki bor synshar District ki dang ap ïa ka kaiphod na ka Committee ba la thung da ka Sorkar, kaba kheiñ ba diah halor ka jingdon jong u dewiong ha kine ki karkhana (Audit Committee on Source of Coal), ki bor synshar District ki la khang tala haduh saw tylli ki karkhana kiba don ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang (Valid CTE, CTO) bad kine ki kynthup ïa ka M/s Shemphang Riangshiang, Pyndeng Jalong, Doranggri, Shallang, M/s Rilyngngam cok Industries, Kyllon Mathei, Shallang, M/s M.D. Coke Industries bad M/s Carbochem India kiba don ha ka shnong Nongdakong, Shallang.Hadien ba ïoh jingmynjur na ka Sorkar Jylla hapoh ka jingïalam bad jingkhmih jong u Bah H.K. Thabah, MCS, Additional Deputy Commissioner, I/c Mawshynrut Civil Sub-Division, la thaw ïa ka kawei ka kynhun kaba kynthup ïa ki Gazetted Police Officer, Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board, District Commerce bad Industries na ka bynta ban pynpra bad pynbthei noh ïa ki Atoskhana jong ki 57 tylli ki karkhana saiñ dewiong beaiñ kiba la shna khlem ka Consent to Established (CTE).La pynjari ruh da ka Section 144 CrPC kaba la pynmih ha ka 11 tarik Natiung, 2023 ban khang pyrshah ïa ka ïaid ka ieng jong ki paidbah ne kino kino ki kynhun hapoh ka jingjngai kaba 1 kilometer na ka jaka ba don ki karkhana saiñ dewiong beaiñ. La kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah ba kin ïatreilang bad ki bor synshar District katba kane ka kam ka dang ïaid.
title: 13 TYLLI KI COKE PLANT BEAIÑ BA LADEP PYNPRA HA WEST KHASI HILLS, SA 44 NA KI 57 TYLLI

content: Ki nongtrei jong ka EMRI-108 ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei ki la aipor ia ka Sorkar Jylla haduh u bnai Risaw, 2023 ba kan pynkiew noh ia ka jingsiew tulop bad ban ai ruh ia kiwei kiwei ki jingmyntoi, kum ka shuti, ka Medical Insurance bad ka Provident Fund (PF).Kane ka sien kaba lai ba ki nongialam jong ka Meghalaya EMRI Workers Union (MEMRIWU) kin pynsngew ia ki jingdawa sha ki tyndong skhor jong ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh hadien ba ka la shimti kum ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Adviser jong ka MEMRIWU, u Bah Roypar Kharraswai u la ong, “naduh u bnai Jylliew ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynkut noh ia ka kontrak bad ka kompeni GVK, ia ka EMRI-108 la pynkhamti sha ka National Health Mission, Meghalaya ban pyniaid shipor naduh u Naitung haduh u Nailur, 2022 hynrei mynta la mih sa u bnai Naitung, 2023, kaba long shi snem kynthih, hynrei ka Sorkar kam pat lah satia ban shim rai eiei halor kane.”Haba pynpaw ia ka daw kaba pynlong ia ka Union ban pynsngew ia ki mat jingdawa sha ka Sorkar, u Bah Kharraswai u la ong, “naduh ba ka NHM, Meghalaya ka la shimti ban pyniaid ia ka EMRI-108, ngim ju ioh shuh ia kino kino ki jingmyntoi kata, naduh ka shuti, ka Medical Insurance bad ka Provident Fund.  La shi snem kynthih ngim ju ioh shuh ia kine ki jingmyntoi.  Watla ki kam ki iaid beit naduh ba la shimti da ka NHM hynrei ka jingsiew tulop ka long kaba rit bad nalor kata ki jingmyntoi kiba ngi dei ban ioh ngim ju ioh shuh.”Haduh mynta ki don 250 ngut ki nongtrei jong ka EMRI-108 kiba trei ha baroh kawei ka Jylla ban ai jingiarap kyrkieh ia ki paidbah haba ki iakynduh ia kino kino ki jingjia kiba donkam jingiarap kyrkieh.U Bah Kharraswai u la iathuh ba ka Union ka la pynsngew ia ka jingpynkiew tulop hakhmat u Managing Director jong ka NHM ha ki bnai Naiwieng, Nohprah bad Kyllalyngkot hynrei u MD u la pan por ban sa pynkiew ia ka tulop hadien katto katne bnai.Nalor ka jingdawa ban pynkiew ia ka tulop, u Bah Kharraswai u la iathuh ba ka Union ka la pynsngew ha ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ha kaba iadei bad ki jaka sah ne ki Quarter jong ki nongtrei ka EMRI-108 kiba la jot, ki bym don wat tang ka bording, kiba la jaw um ka sad bad kiba buh ha ka  jingmynsaw ia ki nongtrei.U la iathuh ba ka Union ka kwah ban leh ia ki Refresher Traning ia ki nongtrei kiba dang wan thymmai kumba ju leh mynshwa manla ka hynriew bnai hynrei naduh ba la shimti da ka NHM kane ka jingai jinghikai kam ju don shuh mynta la jan shi snem kynthih.Haba kylli, u Bah Kharraswai u la ong, “ngi kwah ia ka Sorkar ba kan shimti hi noh ia ka EMRI-108 namarba ka Sorkar ka la ai jingkyrshan pisa haduh 90 percent.  Mynta la 11 bnai naduh ba ka NHM ka la pyniaid ki kam ki iaid beit bad ngi shem ruh ba kam don jingeh eiei ia ka Sorkar ba kan pyniaid hi ia kane ka kam.”“Watla ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka la pynpaw ba ka Sorkar ka shem jingeh ban leh ia kita, hynrei ngi la iakren ruh lada ngin shu long tang kum ki nongtrei bashipor mynta la 15 snem kynthih ka shem jingeh shibun ban trei ia ka kam nalor ba ka jingsiew tulop ka long kaba rit. Ngi kyrpad ia ka Sorkar ba la kumno kumno ka dei ban pynjanai noh ia kane ka kam namar kiba bun na ki nongtrei jong ngi ki shem jingeh.Ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ka la iathuh ba kum  ka Sorkar kan sa iakren bad ka NHM ha kaba iadei bad ki jingdawa ba ka MEMRIWU namarba ka Sorkar hi kan ym lah ban shim ia kano kano ka rai na ka daw ba ki nongtrei ka EMRI-108 ki dei ki nongtrei jong ka Kompeni ym ki nongtrei sorkar.Ka la iathuh ruh ba kan iakynduh biang ia ki nongialam ka MEMRIWU ha u bnai Risaw, 2023 ban iakren halor ki jingtyrwa bad kumjuh ruh ban iada ia ka kam jong ki nongtrei ynda la shimti thymmai da kiwei pat ki kompeni ia ka EMRI-108.
title: DAWA KI NONGTREI EMRI-108 ÏA KA SORKAR BAN PYNKIEW NOH ÏA KA JINGSIEW TULOP

content: : Ka Catholic Association of Shillong (CAS) ha ka sngi Palei ka la khot bad wer ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka nongbah Shillong bad kumjuh ruh ia ki parabangeit jong ka Balang Catholic bad ia ki parabangeit jong ki kynhun jait niam bapher bapher ban iashim bynta lang ha ka Peace Rally na ka bynta ka jingsuk ha ka Jylla Manipur ka ban sa long ha ka 5 tarik mynta u bnai naduh ka por 10:00 baje mynstep ka ban sdang na madan Iewrynghep bad ban pynkut ha Don Bosco Mini Stadium, Laitumkhrah, Shillong.U President ka Association u Bah J.A. Lyngdoh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ha kane ka sngi, yn sa pule ia ka dorkhas ban sa phah sha ka President jong ka ri ka Droupadi Murmu lyngba u Lat ka Jylla Meghalaya u Phagu Chauhan ba kan tuklar lem halor ka jingiaumsnam bad ban wanrah biang ia shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka Jylla Manipur.“Lai bnai kynthih ki sngi ki la iaid naduh ba la jia ka jingiaumsnam ha ka jylla Manipur. Palat 50 hajar ngut ki briew ki la im khlem ing khlem sem, palat 10 hajar ki iing ki la shah pynjulor bad shah wiang ding.  Palat 500 tylli ki jaka mane Blei ki la shah pynjot pynpra.  Da ki spah ngut ki mynsiem briew ba luilui ki la duhei ia la ka jong ka jingim na ka jingiaumsnam.  Wat ia kiba pang ba shitom, ki riewtymmen, ki khynnah bad ki kynthei ruh ym shym la map.  Ia ki kynthei la pyniaid lyngkhuit hakhmat u paidbhur,” la ong u President ka CAS.“Ka jingiakynad jaidbynriew kam dei shuh ka jingjia kaba dang thymmai ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi hynrei ka jingiakynad kaba la jia naduh ka 3 tarik, Jymmang, 2023 ka la kham palat ban ia ki jingjia kiba ladep,” u la ong.“Ngi duwai ba ka jingsuk kan wanphai biang ha ka jylla Manipur.  Ngi la lum ia u synñiang ban phah sha ki lanot kiba sah ha ki ktem sah shipor,” la ong u President ka CAS.“Haba jia kum kine ki jingiaumsnam ngim lah ban shu sngap jar bad ban shu long tang ki nongpeit kai. Ngi hap ban kren eiei ia ka jingisih, ia ka jingiashun niam, ka jingpynjulor bym don shuh ka mynsiem iatip lem ia ki ing ki sem bad ki mar ki mata bad ka jingthwet ban dkhat jubor ia ki jingim briew,” ong u Bah JA Lyngdoh.“Namarkata, ngi kyntu ia ki kynhun bapher bapher ha ka jylla Manipur ba kin wan sha ka miej jingiakren iasuk. Ai ba ki nongialam kin sdang ia ka jingiakren. Dei tang kane ka lad kaba ngi khmihlynti ban sdang thymmai biang sa shisien pat.  Ngi donkam ia ka jingsuk, ngi kwah ia ka jingshongsuk shongsaiñ,” u la bynrap.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ngi khot bad wer ia ki nongshong shnong kiba ieid ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ban iasnohkti lang ha ka jingiaid rally ba jar jar na ka bynta ka jingsuk ha ka jylla Manipur, ong shuh shuh u Bah Lyngdoh.“Ngin sa pynlong ka jingduwai kaba kyrpang ha kane ka sngi na ka bynta ka Jylla Manipur bad ngi la khot ruh ia kiwei ki jait niam bapher bapher ban iashim bynta lang ha kane ka sngi,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ngi kyrpad ia ki nongiashim bynta ban kiar katba lah ban rah ia ki jingthoh ha ki plakad bad ki banar ia ki jingthoh kiba ai ding bad kiba kynshoit.”Ka CAS ka la pyntip ruh ba ki nongiashim bynta ha ka rally ki lah ban pynieng ia ki kali ha phyllaw ka St. Edmunds School, St. Edmund’s College, Monreau Institute of Integral Training, Holy Cross Father, Brookdene, Loreto Convent School, ha phyllaw ka Ingmane Cathedral bad ha madan phulbol, ha Christ King College, St. Anthony’s College, Shillong, ha phyllaw ka St. Marys School, ha phyllaw ka St. Margaret’s School.
title: WER ÏA KI PAIDBAH SHA KA PEACE RALLY HA SHILLONG

content: Ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo People (FKJGP) ha ka sngi Palei ka la ia kynduh ia u Myntri ka tnat Animal Husbandry u Bah Alexander L. Hek ban pynpaw ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar ban ai jaka ha Upper Shillong na ka bynta ban pynkynriah ia ka Petrol Pump na ka thaiñ Anjalee.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President jong ka FKJGP Upper Shillong Circle u samla Kitboklang Nongphlang ula ong ba ka seng ka la ioh jingtip ba ka la don ka jingleit jurip sop sop hapdeng ki ophisar ka tnat Veterinary bad ki trai jong ka Petrol Pump kaba don ha Anjalee ia ka jaka kaba don ha Upper Shillong.U la ong ba ka seng kam pyrshah ban pynkynriah ia ka Petrol Pump sha kawei ka jaka hynrei ka seng kan ieng pyrshah ban ai jaka ha Upper Shillong namarba ka seng ka sngew ba ka dang donkam ia ka tnat Animal Husbandry and Veterinary ban tei ia ki ophis na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ka kam ri jingri ym ban ai jingmyntoi ia ka Petrol Pump.Haba kylli, u samla Kitbok u la iathuh ba u Myntri ka tnat Animal Husbandry and Veterinary u la iathuh ba ia kane ka kam la peit hi da ka tnat Urban Affairs kaba la shu bthah ia ka tnat Animal Husbandry and Veterinary ban pynpeit jaka ha Upper Shillong.Ula ong ba ka seng kan sa buddien ia kane ban pynthikna ba ki bar jylla kim dei ban ioh jaka khamtam ha Upper Shillong bad ong ruh ba ka seng ka sa iakynduh ia u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah.
title: THMU AI JAKA KA SORKAR HA US ÏA KA ANJALEE PETROL PUMP : PYRSHAH KA FKJGP

content: Ka Jaiñtia Students Union (JSU) ha ka sngi Palei ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha ka Myntri  jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ban pyntip halor ka jingbyrngem  byrsit jong ki jaidbynriew Karbi ia ki Pnar kiba shong basah ha ka thain Block-I da kaba maham ba kim dei ban thaw ia kino kino ki kynhun sengbhalang ha kane ka thaiñ.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President ka Seng  u samla Trebor R. Suchen u la iathuh ba ka seng ka la kyntu ia ka Myntri ba kan pynsngew ia kane ka jingshah byrngem jong ki Khasi-Pnar kiba sah ha ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Block-I sha ki tyndong skhor jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ba un dup iakren bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam khnang ban pynneh ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka thain Block-I.Ha kajuh ka por, ka seng ka la pynsngew ha kane ka Myntri ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ia ki jingduna jong ka Khliehriat Civil Hospital.U President ka JSU Khliehriat Circle u Bah Livingson Sama u la ong kumba ka long mynta kane ka Hospital kaba don ha East Jaintia Hills District ka dang don bun ki jingduna naduh ka um bam umdih, ki dawai ki dashin bad kiwei kiwei ki jingduna.U la iathuh ba ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la pyntip sha ka Seng ba kan sa leit jurip ia kane ka Hospital ha ka 15 tarik u Nailar, 2023 ka sngi ba kan leit pynher ia ka lama lairong jong ka ri ha kane ka district ha ka jingrakhe ia ka sngi laitluid jong ka ri.Shuh shuh ka seng ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan plie biang ia ka Centre thoh Eksamin jong ka Meghalaya Service Public Commission (MPSC) ha sor Jowai khnang ban pynsuk ia ki samla aplai kam jong ka West bad ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka leit ka wan bad kan weng ruh ia kino kino ki jingeh ba ki nongaplai kam ki iakynduh ha ka bai kali.Kane ka jingdawa jong ka Seng ka long hadien ba ka Sorkar ka la khang khyrdep ia ka jaka thoh eksamin khlem da ai ia kino kino ki daw kiba biang.
title: MANA TYNGEH KI KARBI ÏA KI PNAR BAN THAW ÏA KA KYNHUN SENG HA BLOCK-I

content: Ki Pulit ka Shillong Sadar Police Station ki la iohkem ia uwei u snar nongtuh uba donkti rung jubor ha kawei ka ing ha Umsohsun, Shillong ha kaba u la bom klep bad lute ia kawei ka longkmie kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Kong Janaki Toi, 70 snem ka rta.Kane ka la jia ha ka sngi Sngi Saitjaiñ, 29 tarik u Naitung, 2023 ha ka por kumba 6:45 baje janmiet ha kaba une u runar u la phut jubor ia ka sati ksiar na kti, bad lute ruh ia ka ATM Card bad ia ka Mobile Phone.U Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh Shillong Sadar Police Station hapoh ka kyndon 452/326/392 Indian Penal Code.Ha ka jingtohkit, la lap ba uwei u briew uba sah ha Mawblei uba la suba ba dei uba donkti ha kane ka kam runar.Ha ka sngi baar mynta ka taiew, ki Pulit ki la leit khynra ia ka ingsah jong utei u runar bad ha ka jingtohkit, u la phla ba u dei uba donkti ha kane ka kam runar bad iathuh ruh ba ia ka sati ksiar u ladep die lilam sha uwei u Bania ha Mairang.Mar mar ki Pulit ki la hiar sha Mairang ban kurup ia ka sati ksiar na ka dukan u Bania bad ia u runar uba donkti la kem noh mardor bad la tian bishar ia u ha Kashari.
title: KEM KI PULIT ÏA U NONGLUTE BAD TIED KLEP ÏA KA LONGKMIE HA UMSOHSUN

content: Ka Khusnam ban ainam ia ka jingtbit ha ka shet jingbam jingdih bad ka akor sam bam sam dih ba tip kum ka India’s Most Prominent Food & Hospitality Awards-2023 la sam sha palat sawphew ngut ki riewtbit ha ka shet ka tiew bad ka jingnang ban burom ia ki para briew ha la ki shlem aibam aidih.Ia kane ka khusnam la ainam da ka Merit Awards Market Research Pvt Ltd sha baroh ki riewtbit ba la shah jied kyrpang ha ka kam shet kam tiew, kam pynbiang bam pynbiang dih bad kaba nang ban burom ia ki nongbam nongdih.Na ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka Ri India la ioh tang artylli ki jylla, Assam bad Meghalaya kiba kynthup ia ka Aiti Belti Trattoria na Shillong bad ka Khorikaa Restaurant na Guwahati. U kongsan ha kane u dei u nongshet ba pawnam tam ha Ri India u Sanjeev Kapoor ba la don ryngkat ruh ki kynrem lyndan na ki shlem shna jingbam jingdih ba kongsan ha Ri India.Ia kine ki khusnam la jied kyrpang halor ka jingtbit ban shet ban tiew, ba bang ba shngiam ka bam ka dih, ba khuid suba, ba pnah ban khring ia ki briew da ka akor burom bad kiwei kiwei ki jingtbit kyrpang ha ka liang ka jingiadei bad ka die jingbam jingdih. Ka Khusnam kum ka basa bam ba biang tam na jylla la ioh pdiang da u Bah Balawanpynskhem Suting, ba ju sin kum u Bah Richie na ka bynta ka basa Aiti Belti Trattoria na Khyndailad, Shillong ha ka 1 tarik Nailar, 2023 ha nongbah Delhi.
title: ÏOH KHUSNAM KA DUKAN DIE JADOH KA AITI BELTI TRATTORIA

content: : Ka Dorbar Shnong Lawsohtun ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills ka Kong Rosetta M. Kurbah halor ka jingdawa ban pyrkhing da ki kyndon ïa ka Mahadev Khola bad ban khanglad ïa ka jingklun jaka da ki briew kiba wan nabar jylla.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Rangbah Shnong ka Lawsohtun u Bah Harrybirth Rynjah ula ïathuh ba ka Dorbar Shnong ka la pyntip hakhmat ka Deputy Commissioner ba ka Mahadev Khola kam hap satia hapoh u pud u sam jng ka Dorbar Shnong Lawsohtun hynrei ka hap hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka tnat Forest.“Naduh ki por mynshwa ka Mahadev Khola ka pawnam bha ha ka jingjyllei ki kam sniew bad kane ka dei namar ka jingbym don ki kyndon ban pyrkhing ïa ka jingbuhai shnong jong ki briew kiba wan nabar ka jylla” la ong u Bah Harrybirth.U la ïathuh ba ka Mahadev Khola ka don shabar jong ka wah Umjasai bad ka khlaw ka btap bad ka long kaba donkam bha ban pyrkhing ïa ka jingwan buhai shnong bad ka jingtei ïa ki jait jingtei be-aiñ ban lait na ka jingpynjakhlia ïa ka wah ne ïa ka khlaw.U Rangbah Shnong u la ong ruh ba ka Dorbar Shnong ka pyrshah jur ïa ka jingkwah jong ki nongpeit ïa ka Mahadev Khola ban pynkylla sha ka jaka sah briew ha kane ka jaka namar katkum ka jingïateh ha ki snem baladep, la ai jaka tang ban tei ïa ka Mandir ym ban pynlong ïa ka jaka sah briew.Haba kylli, u Bah Rynjah u la ïathuh ba ka Deputy Commissioner ka la kular ban shimkhia ïa kane kam bad ïathuh ruh shen kan sa don ka Joint Committee ban pynbeit ïa kane ka kam bad ka la pyntip ruh lada donkam yn sa khot lang ïa ka dorbar shnong Lawsohtun ban ïakren ha kane ka jingïalang.Ha ka sngi Palei, ka Khasi Students Union, Laban Circle ka la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Principal Chief Conservator of Forest (PCCF) u RS Gill da kaba dawa ba dei ban kyndang naphang ïa ki ing ba la tei be-aiñ ha Mahadev Khola.Tang hadien katto katne kynta, ki dkhot ka seng bad ki ophisar jong ka tnat Forest ki la leit jurip ruh ïa ki ing ba la shna be-aiñ ha Mahadev Khola.
title: DAWA KA SHNONG LAWSOHTUN ÏA KA DC BAN KHANG LAD ÏA KA JINGKLUN JAKA HA MAHADEV KHOLA

content: : Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka ai jingkyrshan bha halor ka jingdawa jong ka KSU ban beh noh ïa ki briew kiba sah beaiñ ha Mahadev Kola.“Na ka liang ka jong ngi ruh ngin phah ka jingthoh sha u Principal Chief Conservator of Forest (PCCF) bad u Myntri ka tnat Forest halor kane ka kam,” ong u Working President ka KHNAM u Bah Thomas Passah ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Thohdieng.‘Katkum ki khubor lah ïohi ba kine ki poiwir ki la leit ban pan jingbit na ka tnat forest ban ailad ïa ki ban pynlong shnong noh ïa kane ka jaka jong ka tnat Forest. Ka Sorkar kam dei ban pdiang ïa kum kane ka jingthmu bad kan long ruh kaba beaiñ lada ai namar kan long ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka Land Transfer Act bad ïa ki aiñ khlaw jong ka Sorkar Jylla.  Lada ka tnat khlaw ka ïaid shaid shaid ban weng ïa ki dukan kamai ja kpoh jong ki khasi ha ki thaiñ 7Mer kumno pat kan ailad ïa ki poiwir ban kam trai bad leh trai ïa ka khlaw,” ong u kyrwoh.“Ka khubor kaba shai ka dei ba ka Sorkar kan hap ban leh da kaba tyngeh ïa kum kine ki jingkyntur pud jong ki poiwir,” la pynkut u kyrwoh.
title: KYRSHAN KA KHNAM BAN BEH NOH ÏA KIBA SAH BEAIÑ HA MAHADEV KHOLA

content: Shillong, Nailar, 5 : Ka Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih bad ka pynrem ruh ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya haba ïoh ïa ka khubor ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka shim sting halor ka jingjia ha ka shnong Mukroh.“Ka S.K Pukan (Retd) Commission of Inquiry kaba la thung kyrpang ban wad bniah halor ka jingjia ha Mukroh, ha kaba 5 ngut ki Khasi bad uwei u Forest Guard ka Assam ki la khlad noh ha ka jingïakynad ha Mukroh,” ong u kyrwoh na u Working President ka KHNAM u Bah Thomas Passah.“Katkum ka jingbatai jong kane ka Commission ka ong ba wat hadien ba ka commission ka ladep khot ïa ka hearing ha ki bnai ba ladep ha Assam, kam pat don kano kano ka jingai jingthoh na ka liang ka sorkar Meghalaya haduh kine ki sngi. Ki jingthoh kiba ka Commission ka la ïoh pdiang la long tang na ka liang ka Sorkar Assam, ki bor District bad Pulit ka Assam bad na ki riewpaid bah na Assam,” ong u kyrwoh.“Kane ka Commission ka la khot biang ïa ka Hearing ha ka 7  tarik, Nailar, 2023, ha ka por 10:00 baje mynstep ha Assam House Shillong, bad katkum ka Notis ka Commission ka la bthah ruh ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya lyngba ka Sorkar Assam ban wanrah bad pynbiang ïa ka kaiphod, ïa ki kot ki sla bad ki sakhi ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingjia. Kane ka Commission ka la kyntu ruh ïa baroh kiba thmu ban ai jingtip/jingthoh ba kidei ba leh ïa kaba donkam khnang ba ïa ka jingbishar kan long kaba bniah.  Ngi sngew ba ka dei ka kamram jong ka Sorkar ban ïarap lem ïa ki Khasi ki jong ngi kiba na ka shnong Mukroh kiba lah ban ai jingtip lane kiba long ki sakhi ha katei ka jingjia, namar ïoh tang na ka jingduk jingkyrduh lane ka jingbymtip kan pyndkoh ïa ka jingbishar kaba hok,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh na ka KHNAM.“Ngi la ïohi ïa ka jingïohbor bad jingleh shlur jong ki Karbi ha ki thaiñ khappud ha kaba ha Khanduli ki la pynieng ïa ka khyrdop lum khajana ha Khanduli bad haduh u pud ba ki la byrngem ia ki paidbah Pnar jong ngi ba kin ym bit ban thaw kynhun lane seng, haba ïa lade ki la thaw da ka seng lehnoh kumba la paw lyngba ki lad pathai khubor,” la ong u kyrwoh bad bynrap, “ka jingshah bthah jubor jong san tylli ki mynsiem briew ha Mukroh ha ka 22 tarik u Naiwieng 2022, hynrei ka long kaba sngewsih ban ïohi pat ïa ka jingkloi ban pjah na ka liang ka Sorkar bad baroh kiba la ïa pynpaw ïa ka jingpynrem bad jingbitar halor kane ka kam.”“Lada ka Sorkar Jylla kan dang sngapjar ha kane ka jingkhot ka Commission ha ka 7 tarik Nailar, 2023 kan long kaba sngewsih ïa ngi lang baroh bad kaba ai mynsiem pat ïa ki Karbi ba kin leh katba mon bad pynïap ïa kat kiba ki kwah,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: 7 TARIK KA JINGBISHAR ÏA KA JINGJIA HA MUKROH HA ASSAM HOUSE SHILLONG

content: Shillong, Nailar 05: Da ki hajar ngut ki riewngeit jong ki Balang bapher bapher bad ki jaidbynriew bapher bapher  ki la ïashim bynta lang ha ka jingïaid paidbah ba jarjar ba la pynlong da ka Catholic Association of Shillong (CAS) ban kyntu ïa ka President ka ri India ka Droupadi Murmu ba kan tuklar lem ban pynkut noh ïa ka jingïaumsnam ha ka Jylla Manipur kaba la neh mynta la lai bnai kynthih.Ïa kane ka jingïaid rally kaba la sdang na Madan Iewrynghep la lamkhmat da u Archbishop ka Jylla Niambah Shillong u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh, ryngkat ka jingsynlang lang jong u Bishop ka Jylla Niam Nongstoiñ u Most Rev. Wilbert Marweiñ, u Bishop Elect jong ka Jyllaniam Jowai u Bishop Ferdinand Dkhar, kynthup ruh u dkhot jong ka KJP Assembly Synod Sepngi u Rev. W.C. Khongwir, u Bishop Purely Lyngdoh uba mihkhmat ïa ka Church of North India (CNI), u President ka Meghalaya Christian Leaders Forum (MCLF) u Rev. Himanshu Christian, u Executive Secretary jong ka Presbyterian Church of India (PCI) u Rev Lalrinkima, u  Executive Secretary jong ka Achik Baptist Krima XII, Shillong u Pastor R. Jakrikra R. Marak, u Bah H. Nongspung uba mihkhmat ïa ka Church of God, Ecclesia, u Secretary jong ka Khasi Jaiñtia Christian Leaders Forum (KJCLF) u Rev Dr. E. Kharkongor bad kiwei kiwei kiba la ïashim bynta ha ki jingduwai ha kane ka sngi.La sakhi ruh ïa ki nongïalam jong ki seng saiñpyrthei bapher bapher kiba la ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïaid paidbah ba kynthup ïa ka nongïalam jong ka NPP ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba long ruh ka Myntri Sorkar, u nongïalam ka Congress Legislature Party (CLP) u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh uba long u Nongïalam ka Liang Pyrshah, u State President ka All India Trinamool Congress u Bah Charles Pyngrope uba long ruh u MLA jong ka Nongthymmai Constituency, u MLA ka BJP na South Shillong Constituency u Bah Sanbor Shullai, u MLA ka Voice of Peoples Party (VPP) na North Shillong u Bah Adelbert Nongrum, u Bah Alexander L. Hek uba long u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla, u MLA ka Jirang Constituency u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun, u MLA ka Mawhati Constituency u Bah Charles Marngar bad ka MLA jong ka Sutnga-Saipung Constituency ka Kong Santa Mary Shylla.Ki jaidbynriew na ka Jylla Manipur kiba sah ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya ki la ïashim bynta lang ha kane ka jingïaid paidbah ba jar jar. Ki khynnah skul kiba la ïashim bynta ha ka jingïaid paidbah ki la rah ïa ki plakad kiba thoh, “sangeh noh ka jingïaumsnam ha Manipur”, “ka khmat namar ka khmat kan shu pynmatlah ïa ka pyrthei’ “ka jingsuk mynta, ka jingsuk lashai, ai ba ngin ym pynngam jyllop ïa ka pyrthei ha ka jingsngewsih” “to ngin kdup ïa ka jingitynnat jong kawei pa kawei ka lariti bad ka jingngeit ban pynkha ïa ka jingsuk” “sangeh noh ka thma”.Ki nongïalam jong ki kynhun niam ki la shim bynta lang ha ki jingduwai ha ka jingïalum lang ha Don Bosco Mini Stadium bad hadien kane, la pynbud sa ka jingpule ïa ka dorkhas ban phah sha ka President jong ka ri India lyngba u Lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan.“Ngi jaw ummat namar ka jingduh noh jong ki mynsiem bakordor, ka jingshah pynjulor ki jaka mane blei bad ki shlem ai jinghikai. Ngi sngewsih ruh ban tip ba ki bor sorkar ki la pyndonkam bakla ïa ka bor ka iktiar ban thombor ïa kiba jaidbynriew ba luilui ha Manipur, khlem da ïoh ïa kano kano ka jingshah pynsajia,” ong ka dorkhas sha ka President ka ri ba la soi da u President ka CAS u Bah J.A. Lyngdoh bad u General Secretary u Bah Barnabas Nangbah.“Kum ki nongshong shnong ba don jingkithlieh jong kane ka ri, ngi dawa ïa ki nongleh kam bymman ba dei ban pynshitom. Ngi kyntu ba phin tuklar da kaba bthah ïa baroh ki bor ka aiñ ban ai jingïada ïa ki paidbah ha kane ka ri bad ïa ki Commission bapher bapher kum ka Human Rights Commission bad kiwei kiwei ki Commissions na ka bynta ka jingïada ïa ki kynthei bad ki khynnah, na ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla, bad ban shim khia ïa baroh ki jingkhia kiba la jia ha ka jylla Manipur,” la bynrap ka dorkhas.“Ngi kyrmen bad ngi ngeit ba lyngba ka iktiar jong phi yn ym lah ban pynsngapjar ïa kum kine ki jingjia kiba pynphlei snam ïa ka ri bad ngi duwai ruh ba phin leh eiei noh mardor khnang ba kan long kum u kyrwoh jong ka jingsuk da kaba shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban ïada ïa ka jingim jong ki paidbah bad ïa ki jingdon jingem, ban pynïoh biang ïa ka hok longbriew manbriew bad ban wanrah ïa ka jingïatylli katkum kaba la pynkupbor da ka aiñ jong ka ri, ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India, dei ban pynïoh ïa ka hok bad ka hok ka dei ban ieng rasong,” la ong shuh shuh ka dorkhas.Ka CAS ka la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewsih halor ka jingshah thombor jong ki kynthei ha kaba la sloit lyngkhuid wat ïa ki jaiñ bad la leh be-ijot ïa ki, la thab, la kynjat, la pynïaid lyngkhuid hakhmat u paidbhur bad la leh be-ijot ruh ïa ki kumba la sakhi ha ka rynsan social media.Ka CAS ka la kynthoh tyngeh ïa ki briew kiba don ha ka bor khamtam ïa ki bor pulit kiba shu long tang ki nongpeit kai na ki kali ïa ki jingïaumsnam bad ban ailad ïa ki paidbhur ban pynhiardor ïa ka longryngieng jong ka kynthei bad ban dkhat jubor ïa ka jingim u khun shynrang uba 19 snem ka rta bad ïa u kpa ha surok katba ki dang pyrshang ban ïarap ïa ki lanot (khun kynthei jong ka ri) na ka jingshah thombor ha ki paidbhur.“Kane ka jingïaumsnam ka dei ruh ka dak ka jingshah thombor jong ki Khristan ha kaba palat 249 tylli ki ingmane ki la shah pynjulor ha Imphal Valley jong ka Jylla Manipur,” la pynpaw ka dorkhas bad bynrap, “kum kane ka jingthombor da ka jingisih ka la ktah ïa baroh ki shynrang, ki kynthei bad ïa ki khynnah bad nalor ka jingduhnoh ïa ki ing ki sem.“Ki bor synshar kim shym la lah satia ban ïada ïa kiba luilui bad ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka Jylla. Ngim lah khlem da pynrem jur ïa kum kine ki kam ïaumsnam ba shyrkhei ha ka jylla Manipur,” ong shuh shuh ka dorkhas.Shwa ban pynkut ïa ka jingïalang, ka Synjuk ki Kynthei Katholik ki la pynlong ruh ïa ka jingthang mombati na ka bynta ki mynsiem ba la khladnoh kiba la duhei ïa la ka jong ka jingim ha ka jingïaumsnam ha ka Jylla Manipur kaba la neh mynta la lai bnai kynthih.
title: BAN WANRAH JINGSUK HA MANIPUR, SNOHKTI KI KYNHUN NIAM HA KA SILENT PEACE RALLY KA CAS HA SHILLONG

content: Ribhoi, Nailar 5 : Ki Pulit jong ka Ribhoi District ki la iohkem ia ki hynniew ngut ki Garo kiba donkti ban lute ia ki ar tylli ki jaka tylliat maw, kawei kaba don ha Umduba bad kawei ha Umnowe Killing kaba hap hapoh ka  Khanapara Police Station, Ri Bhoi District.Kine ki ar tylli ki jaka tylliat shoh maw ki la shah lute ha ka  kynhun ki runar kiba la kieng atiar bha ialade ha ka 22 tarik u Jymmang, 2023, bad ha  ka 11 tarik u Naitung,  2023. Na kine ki ar tylli ki jaka, kane ka kynhun ka la ioh lute kumba T. 85,400 hajar ka pisa na Umduba plant bad T. 1,90,000 na Umnowe Killing plant. Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh ka Sections 395, 398, 397, 402, 506, 458, bad 34 jong ka Indian Penal Code ha Khanapara Police Station.U Superintendent of Police jong ka Ri Bhoi u Giri Prasad u iathuh ba ka tnat Pulit ka la thaw ia ka Special Investigation Team ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bad ban lum ia ki sakhi sabut na kine ki ar tylli ki jaka bad ban ithuh durkhmat ruh ia ki runar kiba donkti ha kane ka kam bymman.Da ka jingtrei shitom, ka Special Investigation Team ka la iohkem ia ki hynniew ngut ki briew kiba sah ha ka shnong Umduba ia kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Kandil Marak, u Rechi Momin, u Wilsh Marak, u Robert Momin, u Marus Marak, u Bimod Marak bad u Collin Marak.Ha ka jingtohit, ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup ruh ia ki tiar siat bad ia kiwei kiwei ki tiar ba la pyndonkam da kane ka kynhun ki nonglute kiba kynthup ia kawei ka suloi rifle ba la shna hi, ar tylli ki pistol ba la shna hi, 4 song u gunpowder, kawei ka Air gun, 12 tylli ki tupia, ka jain ba la pyndonkam ban thep ia u gunpowder, 9 tylli ki sopti shipai, 9 tylli ki patlun shipai, 10 tylli ki jain tap khmat, 8 tylli ki juti but shipai, 3 tylli ki pla, kawei ka muja rong lieh bad kawei ka pla ba iong.
title: SHAH KEM 7 NGUT KI SNAR NONGLUTE NA UMDUBA, KURUP KI PULIT RIBHOI ÏA KI TIAR SIAT

content: U District Magistrate jong ka West Khasi Hills District u Bah Garod LSN Dykes ha ka sngi baar u la pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC ba la mana ban ialum briew hapoh ka jingjngai kaba 1 kilomitar ha ka jaka ba don ki karkhana saiñ dewiong beaiñ ha Kyllonmathei, Shallang, West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka hukum, u District Magistrate ula pyntip ba la bthah ban pyndep ia ka jingpynpra ia ki Coke Plant be-aiñ ba la shna khlem jingbit hapoh ka District lyngba ka hukum, Order Memo No NDG 304/2020/Pt11/79-A dt. 02/02/2023 bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la mynjur ban pynpra ia ki atoskhana jong ki Coke Plant beaiñ hapoh ka District lyngba ka shithi , letter FOR 2/202/302 dr.4/7/2023; bad ia ka jingbthah ban pynpra ia ki Coke Plant beaiñ hapoh ka District yn pyntreikam naduh ka 7/7/2023.“Kam long kaba shngaiñ ba ki briew ki bym shym la iohbor ban rung ne ban iaid sha ki jaka ba don ki Coke Plant be-aiñ ha ka por ba pynpra,” la ong u District Magistate ha ka hukum.“Namarkata, da kaba pyntreikam ia ka iktiar ba la pynkup ha nga hapoh ka Section 144 CrPC la mana ia kino kino ki riewshimet ne ki kynhun ba khlem ioh jingithuh ban tur hapoh ka jingjngai kaba 1 kilomitar na ka jaka ba don ki Coke Plant be-aiñ ha Kyllonmathei, Shallang, West Khasi Hills District,” la mana u District Magistate.Kane ka hukum kan treikam noh mardor tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.
title: MANA U DC KA WKH BAN ÏALUM BRIEW SHA KI JAKA BA DON KI COKE PLANT BE-AIÑ HA SHALLANG

content: Shillong, Naitung 12 : Ka Meghalaya Aroma Mission ka la kylla long kaba jop ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynmih ia ki jingthung aroma hapoh ka jingialam jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya. Naduh ba la sdang ha u snem 2019 kane ka sienjam la lah ban pynkylla ia kine ki mar rep (aromatic plants) sha ki mar kiba seisoh ban kyntiew halor ka jingpynmih ia ki mar rep kiba neh, ha ryngkat ka thong ban kyntiew arshah ia ka kamai kajih jong ki nongrep bad ban kyntiew ia ka jinglong jingim ka jong ki.Ha ka jingleit jurip sha kawei na ki jaka treikam jong ka Aroma Mission ha Byrwa, Ri-Bhoi District ha ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma ha ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Gunanka D.B. IFS Executive Director, INRM, u  Arpith Upadhyay, DC Ri-Bhoi District bad ka Kong Isawanda Laloo, IAS, Secretary ka tnat ka rep ka riang, u Comrad u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewhun halor ka jingseisoh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynmih ia kine ki mar rep kynthup ia ki mar umphniang nalor ki jingthung kiba lah ban ialeh pyrshah ia ki kynja khniang.Ka Aroma Mission ka lah ban pynmih ia ki khatlai jait ki umphniang ba kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka kynhun jong ki seng kynthei. Kine ki mar umphniang ki dei kiba la ioh lyngba ki jingthung bapher bapher kum ki Citronella, Lemon Grass, Turmeric, Vetiver, Winter Green, Geranium bad kiwei pat. Lah ban kdew ba kine ki phlang ki lah ban im wat ha ki jaka kiba long kumno kumno ruh, kata ha ki jaka kiba kiwei pat ki jait jingthung ki kham shitom ban mih. Nalor kata ka jingdon ia ki tynrai kiba rben ka iarap shibun ban tan um napoh khyndew bad kiba iarap ruh na ka bynta ka jingtwa jong ka khyndew.Haba ai ka jingkyrshan kaba pura halor kane ka sienjam, na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u la pynthikna sha ki paid nongrep kiba don bynta ha kaba rep ia kine ki jait jingthung (aromatic plant) halor ki lad jingiarap ban kyntiew ia kane ka bynta. U la pynshlur ruh ia ki ba kin pynthikna halor ka lawei jong ki bad na ka bynta ka jingseisoh kaba neh ha kane ka kam, ka ban pynmyntoi ia ki nongrep bad ia ka ioh ka kot jong ka jylla. Nalor kata u Myntri Rangbah u la ban jur ruh halor ka jingkut jingmut jong ka sorkar ban ai ka jingiatreilang hapdeng ki kynhun seng na ka bynta ban kyntiew shuh shuh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynmih ia ki mar ki mata lyngba kine ki mar rep.Ban kyntiew shuh shuh ia ka jinglah jong ka Byrwa unit, u Conrad K Sangma u la pynbna halor ka jingiarap shuh shuh na ka liang ka sorkar na ka bynta ban thied ia ki kor ki bor ne ki machine.Ka Meghalaya Aroma Mission ka don ia ka bynta kaba khraw ha ka ban kyntiew ia ka jingrep ia ki aroma ha ka jylla bad ioh ruh ia ka jingjop kaba khraw. Haduh kumba 3,000 ngut ki nongrep ha ka jylla kaba kdup ia 500 hectare ki jaka bym shym la pyndonkam shuh la ai jingkyrshan hapoh jong kane ka mission. Shiphew jait ki mar rep aroma ki dei kiba man bha ha Meghalaya bad ia kiba la rep, bad lyngba kane ka mission ka don ruh ka jingthmu ban nang pyniar shuh shuh ia ka jaka rep sha ka 1000 hectare. Ki jingthung kum ki Wintergreen, Lavender, Damask Rose, bad Wild Marigold la shim ba ki dei kiba kongsan tam hapoh jong kane ka mission.Ka jingphaikhmat jong ka sorkar Meghalaya ha kaba iadei bad ka Aroma Mission ka long nalor kane kane ka kam rep, khnang ban pynkhlain ia ki jaka treikam bad ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot ha kane ka bynta. Shi bynta jong kane ka sienjam la lah ban thaw haduh 130 tylli ki kynhun Self-Help Groups (SHGs) kiba aibor ia ki nongrep ha kaba iadei bad ka jingrep bad ka jingpyniaid iew ia kine ki jingthung aroma. Nalor kata la lah ruh ban thaw ia ki cooperative societies na ka bynta ban shim ia ki sienjam ban iatreilang hapdeng ki nongrep kiba don bynta ha kaba rep ia kine ki jait mar rep aroma.Ka Aroma Mission ka la lah ban pynmih haduh 4 metric ton, kaba la noh synniang shibun ha kaba iadei bad ki jingtreikam jong ki karkhana kiba iadei bad kine ki mar rep. Lyngba kane ka sienjam haduh 3000 ngut ki nongrep ki la ioh ia ki jingmyntoi lyngba kane bad kaba la kyntiew ruh ia ka jinglong jingim ka jong ki ha kaba iadei bad ka liang ka ioh ka kot.
title: SEISOH KI SIENJAM KA MEGHALAYA HALOR KA JINGREP IA KI MAR REP AROMA HAPOH JONG KA ‘AROMA MISSION’

content: Ki bor synshar jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District kiba la pyntreikam ia ka hukum jong ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court ha ka sngi balang ki la pynpra da kaba shu pynbthei bom ia ki ar tylli ki Coke Plant ba la shna beaiñ ha East Jaiñtia Hills District.Katkum ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District u Abhilash Baranwal, ia ki ar tylli ki Coke Plant beaiñ lane ki karkhana sain dewiong ba la shu tei beaiñ la pynpra namar ba kim shym la ioh ia ka Consent to Establised (CTE) na ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control  Board (MSPCB).Ki ar tylli ki Coke Plant ba la shna beaiñ ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum ka M/s Halari Coke Plant bad ka M/s Shauryansi Coke, Wah Samsier, Elaka Sutnga. La pynpra ia ki ar tylli ki Coke Plant beaiñ hapoh ka jingpeit jong u Additional Deputy Commissioner ka East Jaintia Hills u Bah J. Shylla, kynthup ruh ki nongmihkhmat na ka ophis u Superintendent of Police ka East Jaintia Hills, na ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control  Board (MSPCB) bad na ka District Commerce and Industries Centre.Ia kine ki Coke Plant beaiñ la pynpra da kaba pynbthei da ki bom. Ia ka M/s Halari Coke Plant la pynbthei ha ka por 12:00 baje mynsngi katba ia ka M/s Shauryansi Coke, Wah Samsier, la pynbthei ha ka por 3:30 baje nohphai sngi.Ha ka jingpynbthei ia kine ki ar tylli ki karkhana saiñ dewiong ym shym la don mano mano ruh ba mynsaw bad ka jingpynbthei ia ki Coke Plant beaiñ kan dang iai bteng.
title: AR TYLLI KI COKE PLANT BE-AIÑ PYNPRA KI BOR SYNSHAR KA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS DISTRICT

content: Shillong, Naitung 12 : Ka HYC Shella Area Unit mynta ka sngi ryngkat lang bad ki paidbah ka Shnong Shella bad ki Shnong ba Marjan bad ka jingdon lang u General Secretary HYC u Bah Roy Kupar Syrem ka la pynlong ia ka Jingialang Paidbah ha ryngkat ka rah ia ki Dongmusa hapoh Shnong Shella ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor ka jingthut jong ka bording elektrik ha kine ki sngi kiba lahdep tad haduh mynta ruh kumjuh. Ha kine ki taiew kiba lahdep ki nongshong shnong ki hap ban mad ia ka jingdum bad jingbym ioh bording elektrik da ki bun bun sngi bad tad haduh mynta ruh ka jingdon ka bording elektrik kam pat biang bha.Hadien ba ka Seng ka lah phah jingthoh sha ki bor badei peit ha kine ki sngi kiba lahdep ban dawa ba dei ban weng noh ia kane ka jingeh ki paidbah mardor hynrei ki jingpynsngew bad jingdawa ki shu long leh nohei namar ym don ba pynsngap ia ki jingud. Kane kam dei ka sien ba nyngkong hynrei lah jan man u snem tang shu poi ka por slap ki nongshong shnong ki hap ban shong ha ka jingdum da ki sngi bad ki taiew. Watla ia kine ki jingeh lah pynsngew ha ki bor ba halor ban thawlad thawlynti lah jan ma u snem hynrei I kumba ki bor ba dei peit kim khein snep satia.Kumta, ka Seng ha ryngkat ki paidbah kam banse ban pynlong Ia kane ka prokram ia khih lyngba ka Jingialang Paidbah ha ryngkat ki dongmusa bad kumjuh ruh ban thang ia ki tyngshop jong ka MePDCL bad jong ka Sorkar MDA-II.Ha kane ka sngi lahdon ki Nongialam ka Seng na ka Unit ha ryngkat ki Nongialam na ka Sengkmie ba kynthup ia u Samla Rangbah Roy Kupar Synrem, General Secretary bad kiwei kiwei. La ia don ryngkat ruh ki Nongialam bad ki Riew Rangbah ka Shnong Shella bad khamtam eh ki paidbah jong ka Shnong Shella bad ki Shnong ba Marjan.Shuwa ban thang tyngshop lah don ka Jingialang kaba lyngkot ha kaba lah ioh ki jingkren na u Headman ka Shnong Shella Bah Readerforce Sarubai uba lah kyntu ia ka Seng ban shimkhia lem ban pynsngew ia ka jingeh ki nongshong shnong sha ki bor ba halor bad u lah pyntip ruh ba na ka liang jong u, u long ba lah kloi ban iatreilang bad ka Seng halor kane ka mU Bah Roy Kupar Syrem, GS HYC u lah pynpaw ba I kumba ka MeECL bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya ki kwah ba ki nongshong shnong ka dong ka thain kin leit phai biang sha ka juk jong ka Jingdum haba ka pyrthei baroh kawei ka beh sha ka Jingshai. Kane ka jingeh ki nongshong shnong kam dei kaba thymmai hynrei na ka por Sha ka por lah ju pynsgew ha ki bor ba dei peit hynrei ym shim lah iohi ia ka jingkylla na kane ka jingeh. U lah pynpaw ba ka Seng kan nym shongthait hynrei kan buddien bad iai pynsgew ia kane ka jingeh ki nongshong shnong bad lada ki bor ba halor kim sngap ka Seng kan sa shim da kiwei pat ki sienjam ba kham tyngeh.
title: SHONG DUM KA SHNONG SHELLA, HAP THANG DA KI DONGMUSA KUM KI POR BYM PAT DON BORDING ELEKTRIK

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la pynkup burom ia ki khynnah skul kiba la wan shakhmat ha ka eksamin ba la pynlong da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) ha ka ‘Meghalaya Education Symposium’ ryngkat ka jingsakhi jong u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u  Rakkam A. Sangma ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Shillong International Centre for Performing Arts and Culture (SICPAC).Ka ‘Meghalaya Education Symposium’ ka dei ka sienjam jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban kyntiew ia ki jaka pule puthi bad ha kane ka prokram la iashim bynta lang da ki Myntri Sorkar kiba kynthup ia ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh bad u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u nongai buit jong ka tnat Pule Puthi u Bah H. M. Shangpliang, u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Pule Puthi u Pravin Bakshi bad kiwei kiwei.U Myntri Rangbah haba kren ha kane ka jingialang u la ong ba kane ka rynsan ka long ban iamir jingmut halor ki jingkylla kiba kongsan ia kiba ka Sorkar ka la shim ha kaba iadei bad ka jingtreikam jong ka tnat Pule Puthi. “Ngi la ioh ia ka jingkyrkhu lyngba ki samla pule kiba dei ban ioh ia ka kabu kaba bha tam, kata ym tang ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynkhlaiñ ia ka thymmei jong ka pule puthi bad ban kyntiew ia ka jinglong jingman jong ki ha baroh ki liang,” u la ong.“Ngi la thaw ia ka Youth Policy ka ban aibor ia ki samla bad ka Sorkar ka la shim ia ki sienjam ban kyntiew kumba 2000 tylli ki skul Lower bad Upper Primary. Kumjuh da kaba mang pisa T. 920 klur ban tei ia ki  39 tylli ki Eklavya Model Residential Schools (EMRS) kum shibynta ban kyntiew ia ka pule puthi,” u la ong.“Da kaba mang na ka bynta khyndai tylli ki kolej ha baroh kawei ka jylla kan pynthikna ba ki samla kin ioh ia ka pule puthi kaba biang ha ki thain nongkyndong, ka jingpynioh ia kajuh ka kabu na ka bynta baroh. Ha ka jingpyrshang ban kyntiew ia ka pule puthi lyngba ka Digital, ngi la sam kumba 26,000 tylli ki Digital Tablet sha ki samla khynnah skul na ka bynta u snem 2021-22,” la bynrap u Sangma.“Na ka liang ka Sorkar ka angnud ban kynthup ia ki jingai jingmut bad ki jingmynjur lyngba ka jingpynlong ia ka ‘education symposium’ ban iai bteng ban kyntiew ha ka liang ki jingpule kiba kham shalor.  Nga ai khublei ia ki samla kiba stad kiba wan shakhmat ha ki eksamin ba la pynlong da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education,” la bynrap u Sangma.U Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u Rakkam A. Sangma haba kren pdiang, u la ong, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la phaikhmat halor ki kam pynroi bad kum ka jylla ka la iaid ha u mawjam uba kham shakhmat. Lyngba ki jingthmu jong kane ka thong ban kyntiew shakhmat ia ka jylla shibun ki sienjam la lah ban shim, kata kum ha kaba wanrah ia ki University, ka jingplie ia kiba bun tylli ki kolej bad ka jingpynbha ia kiba bun ki iingskul kiba la rim.Ka Myntri ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh, ka la pynpaw ia ka jingdonkam ban kyntiew ha ki bynta bapher bapher ha ka liang ka pule puthi. “Nga sngewkmen shibun ban ioh ia ka kabu ban ieng na ka bynta ka lawei ka jylla jong ngi bad ban pynpaw ia ka jingsngew sarong halor ka jinglah ka jong ki ka ban pynurlong ruh ia ka jingangnud bad ka jingkyrmen ka jong ngi. Ka long kaba donkam ba ka jingtreikam ha ka liang ka pule puthi ka jong ngi kan kyntiew ia ki samla pule ym tang ha ka liang ka jingpule hynrei ruh ban pynpaw ia ki sap ki phong ki jong ki khnang ba kin lah ban ia aireng ha kane ka pyrthei jong ka jingialeh. Ka pule puthi ka dei ka thong ban wanrah ka jingkylla ia ka lawei jong ka jylla Meghalaya. Ngi khmih shakhmat ban iatreilang na ka bynta ban kyntiew bad pynbha shuh shuh ha ka liang ka pule puthi ha ka jylla ka jong ngi.”Ka “Meghalaya Education Symposium 2023” ka la long kum ka rynsan kaba don jingmut na ka bynta ban iamir jingmut lang ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang hapdeng ki nongialam, ki riew shemphang ha ka liang ka pule puthi nalor ki kynhun kiba ia don bynta. Kane ka plielad ruh ban iamir jingmut halor ki jingshem bad ki sienjam ban kyntiew ia ka pule puthi ha ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: PYNKUP BUROM U CM IA KI KHYNNAH SKUL BA WAN SHAKHMAT HA KA EKSAMIN MBOSE

content: Da ki phew ngut ki dkhot bad ki nongïalam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council  (HYC) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la tur kyndit sha ophis Main Secretariat ban pynrem ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ialam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ka bym shym la lah satia ban pynioh ia ka jingdawa Inner Line Permit (ILP), ban pynrung ia ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra.Haba pynrem jur ia ka jingpynbna u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ba ka Sorkar ka la phaikmat mynta ban pynpoi ia ka lynti Rel ha Khliehriat, East Jaiñtia Hills District, ki dkhot ka seng ki la pyrta shla da ka sur kaba jam, “No ILP, No Railway.”Ka seng ka la buh jingkylli ruh ia ka Sorkar halor ka jingpynslem ban pynrung ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka riti synshar ka ri India bad ha kajuh ka por ki dkhot ka seng ki la pynrem jur ia u MP ka Shillong u Bah Vincent H. Pala halor ka jingai jingkyrshan ban pynpoi ia ka lynti Rel ha Khliehriat, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Ki bor Pulit hapoh ka jingialam jong u Superintendent of Police (City) bad u Additional District Magistrate u Bah Ronnie Wahlang tang shu ioh jingtip ia kane ka jingtur kyndit jong ki dkhot ka HYC sha Secretariat ki la leit mar mar ban pynsngewthuh ia ki nongialam ba kin ym ialum paidbah hakhmat ka khyrdop jong kane ka ophis treikam bakongsan jong ka Sorkar khnang ba kan ym pynthud ia ka leit ka wan jong ki kali kiba iaid lyngba nakhmat ka surok jong ka Main Secretariat.Ki dkhot ka HYC ki bym shym pynsngap ia ka jingkyrpad jong ki bor synshar District, ki la shong kyllaiñ myngngor syndon hakhmat ka khyrdop jong ka Main Secretariat.Ha kane ka por, katba ka kali kaba kit ia u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba peit ia ka tnat Kam Pohïing u Bah Prestone Tynsong ka dang thmu ban rung sha Secretariat, ki dkhot ka seng ki la pyrta shla, “No ILP, No Rest”. Kat haduh ba la thoh ia kane ka khubor ha ka por 1:45 baje nohsngi, ki dkhot ka seng kim shym la khih satia na kane ka jaka bad ki la rah da ki plakad ban bteng ka jingpyrta ia ki sur pynrem ia ka Sorkar MDA.
title: “NO ILP, NO RAILWAY,” TUR KYNDIT KI DKHOT KA HYC SHA OPHIS MAIN SECRETARIAT

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Lumdiengjri Police Station ha ka sngi thohdieng ki la khot hajir ia u Working President jong ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Movement (HNYM) u Bah Donlang Nongbri halor ka jingkren jong u ha ka jingialang paidbah kaba la long ha ka 23 tarik Naiwieng 2022 ha ka shnong Mukroh, West Jaintia Hills District da kaba ong ban seng kynhun lehnoh hapoh ka Jylla namar ka jingbitar ïa ka sorkar jylla ka bym shym la la shimkhia ia ki jingjia ha ki shnong khappud kat haduh ba ka la wanrah ia ka jingduhei ki mynsiem briew hadien ka jingshah siat iap jong ki san ngut ki paidbah ka shnong Mukroh ha ki ktang suloi jong ki Pulit ka Jylla Assam.Kane ka jingshah khot hajir jong u Bah Donlang Nongbri ka la jia tang hadien shitaiew tam ba u President ka seng u Bah Louis Dohtdong u la shah khot hajir ha ki Pulit jong ka Lumdiengjri Police Station halor ka jingkynnoh ba ka Secretariat ka dei ka krem ki mentuh.Hadien ba la mih na jingshah khot hajir ha ki Pulit, u Bah Donlang ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u la kubur ba u la kren ia kine ki kyntien ba la thmu ban seng kynhun lehnoh.“Ka dei tang ka jingkren bitar ia ka jingbym ler jong ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka tnad Pulit ban ai jingiada ia ki paidbah kiba sah ha ki shnong khappud,” u la ong.U Bah Louis Dohtdong haba bynrap halor kane, u la ong, ka Sorkar kam dei satia ban shu pynlut kai ia ka por ban khot hajir ia ki sengbhalang sha ki Police Station hynrei ka dei ban pyndep la ka kamram da kaba phah ia ki Pulit ban ai jingiada ia ki paidbah ha ki shnong khappud kiba mad ia ki jingshah pyndik ba laiphew jait ha ki Pulit bad ha ki Karbi kiba sah ha ka Jylla Assam.
title: BA ONG, THMU SENG KYNHUN LEHNOH, KHOT HAJIR KI PULIT ÏA U WP KA HNYM

content: Shillong, Naitung 15 : U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K.Sangma u la pynlong ka jingleit jurip ïa ka thaiñ Khatarshnong Laitkroh C&RD Block ban khmih halor ka jingseisoh jong ki kam pynroi. Kane ka jingleit jurip ka kdew ruh halor ka jingkut jingmut jong ka sorkar ban kyntiew ïa ka thaiñ bad ban pynkup bor ïa ki nongshong shnong ha ka liang ka roi ka par.Kane ka jingleit jurip ka long ruh ban pynleit jingmut ha kaba ïadei bad ki jaka ba la pyntrei lyngba ka skhim Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA) hapoh Laitmawsiang bad Laitsohpliah.U CM u la ïamir jingmut ruh ba ki nongtrei Job Card, ki  Self Help Groups (SHGs) kumjuh bad ki Village Organizations (VOs) kiba la ïa don ryngkat lang ha baroh kitei ki ar jaka, kiba la pynpaw ruh halor ka jingkut jingmut ban pynïaid shakhmat ïa ki jingtreikam na ka bynta ka roi ka par.Ka jingïamir jingmut ka pynpaw ruh halor ka jingdonkam jong ka skhim MG?NREGA bad ka jingjop kaba ki la ïoh hapoh ki shnong ki thaw, kaba pynskhem ruh halor ka jingkut jingmut jong ka sorkar halor ka roi ka par bad ka bha ka miat jong ki paid nongshong shnong.Na ka liang u CM u la pynpaw ruh halor ki sienjam jong ka sorkar Meghalaya na ka bynta ka shnong Laitryngew da kaba ong; “Ka jingphaikhmat ka jong ngi ka long ban pynkylla dur lyngba ka jingpyntrei ïa ki projek bad ïa ki sienjam ki ban kyntiew ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ki nongshong shnong. Kane ka kynthup halor ka jingbuh ïa ka jaka ïalehkai na ka bynta ki khynnah ne ka ‘children’s park’ bad ka jaka kilan met ne gym hapoh ka kper jong ka krem Cave park khnang ban pynshlur ïa ki nongshong shnong ha ka liang ka koit ka khiah.Nalor kata ngi la kut jingmut ruh ban aibor shuh shuh ïa ki kynhun seng hapoh ka shnong ne Village Organisations (VOs) da kaba pynïoh ha ki ïa ki kor ki bor bad kiwei pat ki jait tiar kiba lah ban pynmih ïa ki tiar ki tar pynsahnam bad ruh ban kyntiew ïa ka kam jngohkai pyrthei.Lah ban kdew ba ngi la ai ka jingmynjur na ka bynta ka jingshna ïa ki lieng, ki jaka pynïeng kali, ki paiñkhana, bad ki lynti ïaid kjat hapoh kane ka park.”Nalor kata u la ong ruh; “Ka jingïoh mynsiem lyngba ka jingseisoh jong ka jaka jngohkai ha Umiam ne ka Umiam Viewpoint, ka thong ka jong ngi ka long ban kyntiew bad pynbha ha kaba ïadei bad ki dukan hapoh TynamMasi Viewpoint ka ban khring bad pynsngewtynnad ïa ki nongwan shangkai pyrthei.Nalor kata ngin kyntiew ruh ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingshna jingbuh sahnam bapher bapher ka ban kyntiew shibun ïa ka kam jngohkai pyrthei.”Haba kren sha ki nongshong shnong bad ki dkhot jong ki Self-Help Groups hapoh Laitsohpliah, U Conrad K. Sangma u la ong bad ha kine ki 45 tylli ki snem naduh ba la ïoh ïala ka jong ka jylla, la lah ban kyntiew ïa ka jingdon jong ki SHG jong ki kynthei sha ka 5000 tylli ha kaba la lah ruh ban pynïoh ïa ka jingïarap pisa kaba kot sha ka 30-35 klur. Hynrei, ha kine ki 5 snem ba la dep ka sorkr MDA hapoh ka jingïalam jong ka National People’s Party la sakhi ïa ka jingkiew shakhmat lyngba ka jinglah ban thaw shuh shuh ïa kumba 45,000 tylli kiwei pat ki kynhun SHG ha ryngkat ka jingpynïoh ïa ka jingïarap pisa kaba kot sha ka 500 klur ban kyrshan ïa ki jingtreikam ki jong ki.Nalor kata u la ong ruh na ka liang ka sorkar ka la shimkhia ruh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkyrpad jong ki nongshong shnong ban weng ïa ki jingeh kaba ïadei bad ka jingkyrduh um hapoh ka thaiñ, bad lyngba ka  Sohra Water Supply scheme, la mang T.48 klur khnang ban lah ban pyntrei noh shen ïa ka projek pynïoh um.Lyngba ka National Rural Livelihood Mission la lah ban thaw haduh 44,067 ki Self Help Groups (SHGs), kaba la aijingmyntoi ïa haduh kumba 427,195 tylli ki longïing. Nalor kata la kyntiew shuh shuh sha ka 4,607 tylli ki Village Organizations (VOs) bad haduh  39,571 ki SHG ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ka jingïarap pisa kaba kot baroh sha ka T. 171.56 klur. Ki VOs ruh ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ka jingïarap kaba kot sha ka T.192.34 klur.
title: JURIP U CM IA KI KAM PYNROI HA KHATARSHNONG, LAITKROH C&RD BLOCK

content: ka Khasi Jaiñtia Church Leaders’ Forum (KJCLF) ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la ong ba ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Uniform Civil Code (UCC) kan lam sha ka jingshah rat dyngkhong jong ka dustur ai jait kmie jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi.Ha u kyrwoh, u Secretary jong ka Forum u Rev. (Dr.) Edwin H. Kharkongor u la ong, baroh ki kynhun jaidbynriew bad ki niam tynrai ki don la ki jong ki jingmut jong ki ban pdiang bad ban leh ha kaba iadei bad ka shongkha shongman, ka pyllait san shyieng, ka jingioh bhah bad kiwei kiwei, katba katto katne ki jaidbynriew ki don la ki jong ki jingiapher.“Namarkata, kam long kaba dei ban shu pyntreikam ia ka Uniform Civil Code ha baroh kawei ka ri,” la ong u Rev. Kharkongor.“Ha ki jaidbynriew Khasi jong ka Meghalaya, kan long kaba ma shikatdei eh, namar ha ka jingaijait bad ka riti ka dustur  lada pyntreikam ia ka Uniform Civil Code kan wanrah jinglyngngoh bad kan pyndam syndon ia ka jingai jait kmie hapdeng ki Khasi,” u la bynrap.“Ia mynta, ban peit katkum ba ka 21st Law Commission of India dang shen ka la ong ba ka Uniform Civil Code (UCC) kam pat da donkam than lane kaba la kwah lang da baroh ha kum kane ka por,” u la ong, bad bynrap, ban pyniaid beit shakhmat ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ka UCC pyrshah ia ka mon jong ki paidbah ha ka ri, kan pynpaw ia ka jinglong amriang bad ka jingbym pyrkhat bha jong ka Sorkar kaba bat mynta ia u lakam synshar.
title: KA JINGPYNTREIKAM ÏA KA UCC KAN PYNDAM SYNDON ÏA KA AI JAIT KMIE KI KHASI – KJCLF

content: Ka North Korea kam ju sangeh ïa ki jingpynlyngngoh jong ka ïa ka pyrthei salonsar. Ka jingshisha ka long ba kane ka ri ka khang ïa ka jingwanrung ki nongjngohkai pyrthei, bad phin nym ïohi hi ruh ïa ki dur jong kane ka ri ha ka Instagram, wat la kata ruh, don ki khep ba ki ju lait klep ki jingtip shaphang kane ka ri.Ïa kane ka ri la ñiew kum ka ri kaba khang khyrdep ïa kiba nabar ri, ym don jingsngew phylla ïa kata haba ka don bun tylli ki aiñ kiba pyntriem shyrkhei. Ka Bor Synshar ka knieh lut ïa ki hok jong ki nongshongshnong jong ka ri bad pynjari da ki aiñ khyllah ba pyrkhing. Kham mynshwa ngi la ïohsngew ïa ka khana kumno ba ka lok jong u Kim Jong Un ka hap ban bud ïa ki kyndon ba pyrkhing, mynta pat ngi wan rah ka jingtip shaphang katto katne tylli ki aiñ khyllah ka North Korea ïa kiba phin nym poi pyrkhat satia:.Ki nongshongshnong jong ka North Korea ki lah ban shahset byndi lada ki peit ïa ki phlim bad tem ïa ki jingrwai nongwei na bar ri. Ha u snem 2015, u nongsynshar donbor jong ka North Korea u Kim Jong-un u la hukum ban pynjot bad pynduh lut ïa baroh ki cassette tapes bad ki CD jong ki jingrwai ba la adong pyrshah khnang ban tehlakam ïa ka jingsngaptuh da ki briew. Lah ban shah rai pynïap lada peit ïa ki phlim na America lane ban pynphriang ïa ki phlim awria. Don tang lai tylli ki channel TV ha North Korea, bad baroh ki prokram la pynïaid katkum ka jingbthah ka Sorkar.Ki nong North Korea kim lah ban ïakren telephone shabar ri namar ban leh kumta ka dei ka kam bymman. Katkum ki jingtip ba la ïoh lum, ha u snem 2007 la siat ïap ïa u trai jong kawei ka karkhana ha North Korea hakhmat 150,000 ki briew hadien ba la pharep ïa u ba u kren telephone shabar ri lyngba ki 13 ki phone kiba u pyndait hakhrum jong ka karkhana jong u.La kheiñ ba ym tieng burom ïa u Nongïalam lada jia ba ïohthiah katba dang don jingïalang bad u Kim Jong-un bad lah ban rai pynïap ïa kita kiba ïohthiah. Katkum ki jingtip ba la ïoh, ha u snem 20015, la siat ïap hakhmat 100 ngut ki briew da ka tup siat eroplen ïa u Myntri Ïada Ri jong ka North Korea, u Hyon Yong-chol namar ba u ïohthiah katba u dang ïakynduh bad u Kim Jong-un.Lada don mano mano ba leh kam bymman ha North Korea, ka jingpynshitom kam hab tang ïa uta lane kata u/ka nongleh, hynrei wat ki Kmie Rad Kpa Rad, ki Kmie ki Kpa bad ki khun ki kti jong kita ki nongleh kin shah pynshitom lang. La pynmih ïa kane ka aiñ khnang ba ki nongleh kam sneiw kin nym phet na ki byndi ba ki shah set.Baroh ki kynthei bad shynrang ki lah ban khapsñiuh tang ha ki 28 tylli ki rukom khap ba la ai jingbit da ka Sorkar, 18 rukom ïa ki kynthei bad 10 rukom ïa ki shynrang; lada adong pyrshah ïa kiwei pat ki rukom khap nalor kine ba la ai jingbit. U Nongïalam jong ka North Korea u Kim Jong Un u la pynmih ïa kane ka aiñ ha u snem 2013, katba um shym kynthup ïa ka rukom khapsñiuh jongu ha kata ka thup ki kyndon namar u kwah ban pynlong kyrpang ïalade bad ym don hi ruh ba nud ban pyrthuh bud ïa ka rukom khapsñiuh jongu. La khmih lynti ba ki kynthei kiba lah shongkurim ki dei ban khap kham lyngkot ïa u sñiuh jongki bad kiba dang samla ki lah ban ieh kham jrong.Ka Sorkar North Korea ka la pynkylla ïa ki kyndon ïalehkai basketball. Nuksa, ka rukom thep basket ba la tip kum ka “slam dunk” ka long 3 points, ymdei 2 kumba ju long, ki rukom thep basket ba 2-point ha ki lai minit ba khatduh kin long noh 8 point. Kumjuh ruh lada ym lah ban thep basket 3 sien pyrshang thep yn shah khate 1 point.U Nongïalam jong ka North Korea u Kim Jong-un u kwah tang ïa ki briew kiba bit ba biang tam, kiba riewspah bad kiba don iktiar ba kin shong kin sah ha ka Nongbah Pyongyang jong ka North Korea. Kum kita ki briew ki dei ban ïoh jingbit kyrpang ban ïoh shong ha ka Nongbah.Ki khynnah skul ki hap ban siew ïa kador jong ki miej bad ki shuki ba ki pyndonkam! Ïa kata ka jingsiew ym shym kynthup ha ka bai skul jongki.Ha North Korea, la ñiew ba ka Bible kadei ka dak jong ka dustur bad deiti ki ri sepngi namarkata la khang ban pyndonkam ïa ka namar kan pynkylla ïa ki paidbah. Lakem bad pynïap ïa kawei ka kynthei Khristan namar ba ka sam paidbah ïa ka Bible. Ha u snem 2014, la kem bad set patok san bnai ïa u Jeffrey Fowle, u nong America uba leit jngohkai ïa ka North Korea, tang namar ba u klet ïa ka Bible jongu ha ka kamra sum jong kawei ka jaka bam kaba kyrteng ka Chongjin Sailor’s Club.La khang ïa ki nong North Korea ban pyndonkam ïa ki iPhone, ki TV lane ki laptop komputar! Ki nongshongshnong ha kane ka ri ki tip tang khyndiat shaphang ki tiar elektronik bad teknoloji, namar ka aiñ jong ka ri ka buhrieh bun kiei kiei ki jingtip ha kane ka phang.Lada phi dei u nongjngohkai pyrthei yn shah ban rung shapoh kane ka ri hadien ka jingtalasi ba pyrkhing bad bniah bha da ki briew ka Custom ïa ki thup jingrwai jingtem, ki phlim bad ki kot ki sla kiba phi rah bad phi.La ngeit ba don kumba 2 lak ngut ki nong North Korea kiba shahset byndi. Kine ki dei kiba shahkem halor ki jingpharep ba ki don kti ha ki kam bymman ba ïadei bad ka saiñ hima saiñ sima. Lada uno uno u leh kam bymman ba ïadei bad ka saiñ hima saiñ sima, la set slung lang ïa ki ba ha-ïing jongu baroh. Lada jia ba u ïoh phet tuh na byndi, yn pynïap lut ïa baroh kiba ha-ïing hasem jongu. 40 na ka 100 jong kito kiba shah set slung ha kita ki byndi ki ïap naka daw bym biang ka bam ka dih. Bun na kita ki koidi i kumba la phah pyntrei katkum ki kyndon ba shongnia, pynban bunsien ki  hap trei shitom haduh ban da ïap syndon.Ka North Korea ka don la ka jong ka Almanak ba ïapher na kaba ju pyndonkam da ka pyrthei baroh ïa kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Juche calendar. Kane ka almanak ka sdang naduh 15 tarik u Ïaïong 1912 kaba dei ka sngikha jong u nongïalam pynkhih pyrthei baieid eh jong ki, u Kim Il Sung.Ka North Korea ka ju pynlong ïa ki elekshon bad baroh ki nongshongshnong kiba lah 17 snem shaneng ka rta ki hap ban shimbynta beit ha ki elekshon, tangba ki elekshon kim long kiba laitluid. Ha man kawei pa kawei ka elekshon ki nongjied ki don tang kawei ka lad ban jied. Ka jingmih nangta ka long ba 100 na ka 100 ki nong Korea ki jied ïa u nongïalam baieid jongki.U Kim Il Sung, u nongïalam ba nyngkong eh jong ka North Korea hadien ka jingïakhih ki communist revolution, uba la ïap la slem bah, hynrei dang ñiew hi ïa u kum u nongïalam jong kari. Dei na kata ka daw ba u khun jongu bad mynta u ksiew jongu ki la shimti kum ki nongsynshar jong ka ri.Ka long mar khongpong ban tip ba ka ri kaba pyrkhing bha ha kiei kiei baroh kam ju don jingeh ha kaba ïadei bad ki kynja jingdih pynbuaid. Kalong be-aiñ ban pyndonkam, die lane buh ïa u Kynja ha North Korea. Wat la kata, u Kynja u mih kynrei bad laitluid bha harud ki surok, kumta lada don mano mano ba kwah ban shim kabu ki lah ban leh da kaba suk jai jai.Baroh ki nong North Korea kiba im hapoh ka jingsynshar jong u Kim Jong-un ki dei ban smai ba kin shaniah skhem bad kohnguh beit ïa u, ia ki ba ha-ïing hasem jongu bad ïa ka ri. Lada don ka jingsuba ba ñiewbeiñ ïa ka ïing ka sem u Kim, ka Sorkar North Korea ka ñiew ïa kata kum ka jingbeiñ Blei ïa kaba dei ban pynsaja tyngeh. Kane ka aiñ ka treikam ruh ïa baroh kiba wan buhai shnong ha North Korea bad ïa ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei na bar ri. Lada suba ba don ka jingma lane jingñiewbeiñ kan ïalam beit sha ka jingshahset along lane wat shaduh ka jingshahpynïap. Don bun kiba tip shaphang ka jingjia ïa uwei u khynnah skul na American u ba kyrteng u Otto Warmbier. Uta u khynnah u la leit sha North Korea ryngkat bad kawei ka kynhun jngohkai pyrthei, u la shah kem noh ka kad liengsuiñ Pyongyang namar ba u pyrshang ban tuh ïa kawei ka dur antor (billboard) kaba don ha ka kamra hotel ba u sah. La set ïa u Warmbier hapoh along, la pyllait ïa u hapdeng ka jingkhrew bad u la khladnoh tang hadien katto katne por ha u bnai Jylliew 2017.Phi lah ban lyngngoh balei ki nong North Korean, kim phet noh na la ri haba ki hap ban shah khum ha kum kita ki aiñ ba pyrkhing. Ka daw ka long ba kim lah. La mana tyngeh ïa ki nong North Korea ba kim dei ban mih sha bar ri, lada don mano mano ba jam shabar u pud u sam jong ka ri khlem da biang ki kot ki sla yn siat ïap beit ïa ki da ki shipai pahara. Ka jingpynsaja ba kordit sat kan hab ha kito kiba pyrshang ban phet ne rieh na ka jingsynshar donbor jong u Kim, bad kaba thikna hi kadei ka jingshah pynïap.Ka Sorkar North Korea ka peit pyrman bha ïa kino kino ki nongjngohkai pyrthei kiba wan rung hapoh ka ri. La buh nongsynran ïa man uwei pa uwei u nongjngohkai pyrthei ban don naduh kapor ba wan haduh ban da leit phai noh. Lada don mano mano ba iehnoh ïa ka kynhun ba ïawan lang lane ba pyrshang ban ïakren ïa khana bad ki trai shnong, yn kem beit ïa kum ïa kita. Ryngkat bad kine ki jingpyrkhing, ïa ki nongjngohkai pyrthei la ïalam tang sha ki jaka bad ki lynti ba lah dep jied lypa.Baroh ki nong North Korea ki hap ban rung ha ka kam shipai. 10 snem na ka bynta ki shynrang bad 7 snem ïa ki kynthei.Ki nong North Korea ki hap ban mad ïa ka jingpynlip bording man la ka miet namar ka jingkyrduh bording hapoh ka ri. Donkam ban ïoh jingbit shwa ban pyndonkam ïa ka bording elektrik bad ka long be-aiñ ban buh ha ïing ïa ki kor pynkhluit jingbam (microwave).
title: 21 TYLLI KI AIÑ KA NORTH KOREA KI BAN PYNSUH JNANG ÏA PHI

content: New Delhi, Nailar : U Balvant Parekh ïa uba la ju tip kum u Fevicol Man jong ka India, u dei uwei na ki heh spah ha India bad ka jingdon jingem jong u mynta ka poi haduh 88,000 klur tyngka. Hynrei ka jingïaid lynti jong u Parekh kam dei satia kaba suk, u la trei ruh kum u Peon jong kawei ka kompeni bad um don jaka sah bad u hap ban sah ha ka sem dieng jong uwei u paralok jong u.La kha ïa u Parekh ha Mahuva, ka sor kaba don ha Bhavnagar District jong ka Gujarat. Naduh ba u dang rit u Parekh u ju kwah bha ban long nongkhaïi kumba ju leh ki nong Gujarat hynrei ki kmie ki kpa jong u ki kwah ba un long nongïasaid aiñ. Kumta la phah pule ïa u sha Government Law College ha Mumbai. Ka por ba u dang leit pule ka dei ruh ka por ba u Mahatma Gandhi u dang ïakhih bha bad u ruh u la ïa snohkti lang ha ka jingïakhih Quit India Movement.U kpa jong u Parekh u kwah ba u Parekh ruh un long kum u parad jong u ba un long u nongïasaid aiñ. Kumta hadien ba la pyndep ïa ka jingpule u la sdang ban trei kum u nongïasaid aiñ hynrei tang katto katne por u la sangeh noh namarba um sngewtynnad namarba u lap ba bun kaba u hap ban thok ban shukor ha ka jingïasaid jong u. U la shong katto katne por khlem kam khlem jam bad u la ïathoh shongkurim ïa ka Kantaben. Khnang ban lah pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam ha ïing u la leit trei kum u Peon ha kawei ka kompeni khaïi dieng bad ma u bad ka lok ki sah ha ka sem dieng jong uwei u paralok jong u.U Parekh u dap tang da ki jingpyrkhat kumno ba un seng noh la ka jong ka kam ka jam bad khatduh u la ïoh ïa ka lad ban leit sha Germany bad dei na Germany u la ïoh ïa ka buit kumno ban seng kam lajong. U la pynïaid ïa ki kam jong ka kompeni Hoechst ha India hynrei ha u snem 1954 u la seng ïa ka kompeni lajong ka Parekh Dyechem Industries kaba pynmih ïa ki tiar kiba pyndonkam ha ka jingthaiñ jaiñ.Ha katei ka por um pat nang ban ai kyrteng kumno ïa ka kompeni jong u hynrei dei ha u snem 1959 u la ai kyrteng da ka Pidilite, u la pynmih ïa ka Fevicol bad kiwei pat ki dawai pyndait bad ki dei ki misteri dieng kiba pyndonkam bha ïa ki mar jong u. Nyngkong u don tang kawei ka dukan jong ka Fevicol Pedilite Industries. Hadien kata u la pynmih ïa ka Feviquick bad ïa ka M-Seal bad kitei ki dei kiba ïaid ïew bha tad haduh ba mynta u la kylla long uwei na ki 45 ngut ki heh spah tam ha India.
title: U BRIEW UBA THIAH HA SEM DIENG MYNTA U DEI U HEH SPAH HA INDIA

content: Ka Balang Catholic ha Meghalaya ka la pyrshah bad pynpaw ia ka jingbym sngew iahap halor ka jingtyrwa ban pyntreikam ia ka Uniform Civil Code (UCC) ha ka ri India.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha ka Law Commission of India, New Delhi  ha ka sngi Balang, la soi da u Arcbishop ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong u Most. Rev. Victor Lyngdoh, u Auxiliary Bishop ka Jylla Niam Tura u Most Rev. Jose Chirackal, u Bishop ka Jylla Niam Nongstoiñ u Most Rev. Wilbert Marweiñ bad u Bishop Elect ka Jylla Niam Jowai, u Most Rev Ferdinand Dkhar.“Ngi sngewnguh shikatdei ei ia U Blei ba ngi long ki nongshong shnong jong ka ri India.  Ngi long kiba donbok ban don ia ka riti Synshar jong ka ri India kaba iada ia baroh ki nongshong shnong ha ka ri.  Ngi don ha ka ri kaba burom ia ka jingiatylli wat hapdeng ka jingiapher bad ngeit ruh ba ka India ka dei ka ri kaba burom ia ki jait Niam.  Ka dei ka ri kaba shah ban don la ki jong ki aiñ halor ka shongkha shongman, ka jingpyllait san shyieng, ka jingioh pateng, ka spah ka phew bad kiwei kiwei.  Hynrei ka jingpynbna paidbah ba la pynmih ha ka 14 tarik, Jylliew, 2023 da ka Law Commission of India ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ia ka UCC ka dei kaba pynsngewkhia bha ia ngi,” la pynpaw ka Balang ha ka dorkhas ba la phah sha ka Law Commission.Ka Balang Catholic ka la kdew ruh lai tylli ki mat ban pyrshah haba pyntreikam ia ka UCC ha ka ri.“Ki aiñ kiba mih na ka jingdon jong ki riti ki dustur, ki jingngeit bad ki jingleh jingkam kiba iadei bad ka jingngeit niam yn ym lah satia ban leh shiliang lane ban pyndam noh da kaba wanrah ia ka UCC.  Ngi pynpaw ka jingpyrshah kaba jur ba ki jingngeit, ki riti ki dustur bad ka tynrai jong ‘kawei ka niam’ yn pynjari ha kiwei pat ki jingngeit lyngba ka UCC. Ka Article 25 ia ki kynhun niam ka hok ban pyniaid la ki jong ki kam,” ong ka dorkhas.“Hapoh ka riti Synshar jong ka ri India (Article 341, 342 bad ka Sixth Schedule) la shna ia ki kyndon ba kyrpang ban pynkupbor ia ki jaidbynriew riewlum.  Ka jingpynrung ia ka UCC kan pynjot syndon ia ki hok kyrpang bad ia ki jingmyntoi ba la ai sha ki jaidbynriew riewlum,” la bynrap ka dorkhas.“Haba ka 21Law Commission ha u snem 2018 ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew ba ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Uniform Civil Code kam da dei eh kaba donkam haduh katta katta lane kaba da kwah da baroh ha kum kane ka por, namarkata, kaei ka jingkyrkieh jong ka Sorkar pdeng ba ka kwah ban pyntreikam noh ia ka UCC,” ong shuh shuh ka dorkhas.
title: THOH KA BALANG CATHOLIC HA MEGHALAYA SHA KA LAW COMMISSION BAN YM PYNTREIKAM ÏA KA UCC

content: Kathmandu, Nailar : U MP jong ka Nepali Congress na Kathmandu u la Sunil Sharma u la shah kem namarba u la pyni da ki kot ki sla kiba thok ha kaba ïadei bad ka kyrdan pule jong u. U Sharma u la shah kem ha ka sngi hat majai jong ka taïew ha ka Central Investigation Bureau (CIB) jong ka Nepal Police. U nongaiktien jong ki pulit ka Nepal u Deputy Inspector General u Kuber Kadayat u la ong ba u MP jong ka Morang-3 konstitwensi u la shah kem namarba u la pyni da ki kot ki sla kiba thok ïa ka kyrdan pule jong u.U Sharma uba pynïaid ïa kawei ka Hospital u la shah pynngat kyndon ruh 7 snem mynshuwa namarba la lap ba u don da ki kot ki sla kiba thok. Ka Nepali Congress kaba don ha ka liang synshar ka pyrshah halor ka jingshah kem jong u. “U la shah kem namarba u dawa ba u Myntri ka tnat kam pohïing bad tnat pla tyngka ba u dei ban risaiñ noh halor ka jingkhaïi ksiar tuh” ong u MP ka Nepali Congress u Arjun Nar Singh KC.“Kumno 7 snem mynshuwa ki pulit ki la sangeh noh ïa ka jingtohkit katba mynta pat ki la khyllie biang” u la ong. U Sharma u dei uba ju kren pyrshah bha ïa u Myntri ka tnat kam pohïing u Narayan Kaji Shestha kumjuh ruh ïa u Myntri ka tnat pla tyngka u Prakash Sharan Mahat bad u la kynnoh ba ki donkti ha ka kam khaïi ksiar tuh.U Sheastha u dei u MP jong ka seng CPN (Maoist Center) katba u Mahat pat u dei u MP jong ka Nepali Congress. Ha ka 18 tarik u Naitung, ki pulit ki la ïoh kurup haduh 100 kilo ka ksiar najan Kathmandu Airport. U sharma u la ong ba kat katei ka ksiar ym lah ban khaïi na Hong Kong sha Kathmandu lada khlem ka jingïadonkti lang u Myntri sorkar. Hadien ba u la shah kem, ka CIB ka la pyntip sha u Lamphang jong ka ïing Dorbar ba un dang shah tohkit katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: SHAH KEM U MP KA NEPAL, KYNNOH BA PYNI DA KI KOT KI SLA KIBA THOK ÏA KA KYRDAN PULE JONG U

content: Ha ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ki nongialam jong ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ba la shah kheiñ be-aiñ ha ka Sorkar kiba la wan iuhkjat sha ka Jylla Meghalaya na ka bynta ka jingïakren iasuk bad ka Sorkar ki la iohlad ban rakhe ia ka sngikha kaba 36 snem jong ka seng ne ka Raising Day ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ha ka jaka sah ka jong ki ha Inspection Bungalow (IB) jong ka MeECL, Ribhoi District.Ha ka khyllipmat ba la pynher ia ka lama jong ka seng, ki nongialam ki la rwai ruh ia ka jingrwai ieid ri, ‘Ri Khasi, Ri Khasi’ bad shim ruh ia ka salute da ka jingialam jong u Vice Chairman ka seng u Bah Manbhalang Jyrwa, u Political Secretary u Bah Aristorwell Thongni, u Foreign Secretary u Bah Phangkupar Diengdoh, ki arngut ki PSO kiba kynthup ia u Bah Storgy Lyngdoh bad u Bah Aiborlang Marbaniang.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang da ki nongialam jong ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) ba kynthup ia u Bah Sadon Blah uba long u ksiang jong ka Seng HNLC ban iakren iasuk bad ka Sorkar.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ki nongialam ka seng, ha ka sngi u Blei kim shym la pynsngap wat ia ka jingpyrkhing jong ka Sorkar hynrei ki la leit ban buh syntiew ha u lum jingtep jong u General Secretary barim jong ka seng u Bah Cherish Starfield Thangkiew ha Lawmali ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki bahaing hasem bad ki dkhot jong ki seng bapher bapher bad aiti ruh ia ka lama jong ka seng sha ki bahaing hasem.
title: HA SIEN NYNGKONG HADIEN 36 SNEM RAKHE KA HNLC ÏA KA RAISING DAY HA RI KHASI
