content: Ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap 25 snem, ka Seng Samla Mawkhar ka la buh hakhmat ïa ka thong ban pynlong ïa ka jingpynsngewthuh sha ki samla jong ka shnong Mawkhar bad ïa ki shnong kiba marjan kumno ban pyllait na ka shrip jong u drok.Kane ka sienjam jong ka Seng Samla ka long ruh ban ïarap kino kino ki para samla kiba la im kyrni ha ka jingdih u drok bad kiba dang angnud ban kylla noh sha ka jingim kaba thymmai.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, u President ka Seng Samla Mawkhar u Bah Daniel Syngai u la ong, “ngin sa pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ban pynsngewthuh sha ki para samla ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai bad mynta ka kynti ngi la wanrah ruh ïa u Tenzing Tsering uwei na ki Ayurveda Practitioner uba la sah ha New York, uba shong basah mynshwa ha Mission Compound, Shillong ban ïarap ïa ki samla kiba la ngop ha u drok ban ïoh binag ïa ka jingim ba thymmai tang da kaba dih da ki dawai kynbat.”Ïa kane ka jingpynshai paidbah ka Seng Samla ka la ïatreilang bad ka NRE Pageant India Pvt. Ltd hapoh ka jingïalam jong u President u Bah Ransom Sutnga bad ka National Director ka Kong Eldora Lyngdoh.“Nga la ïoh jingtip kiba don haduh 3 lak ngut kiba la ngop ha u drok ha kane ka Jylla,” la ong u Tsering bad bynrap, “km u briew uba la shong la sah ha kane ka jylla nga dap da ka jingsngewkhia halor kane ka khubor.  Hynrei ka don pat ka lad bad ka kabu ban pyllait luid ïa kito kiba im kyrni ha u drok lada ki don ka jingangnud nalade ban ïoh biang ïa ka jingim ba thymmai.”“Ki don ki dawai kynbat kiba nga la pyndonkam ban sumar ïa ki briew kiba la im kyrni ha u drok ha New York bad lada ki briew ha kane ka jylla kiba la ngop ha u drok ki kwah ban ïoh biang ïa ka jingkoit nga long uba kloi ban ïarap ïa ki,” la ong u Tsering.Haba kyllli, u Tsering u la ong ba um don jingthmu ban plie ïa kano kano ka jaka ai jingsumar ha kane ka jylla hynrei u la ong ba u long pat uba kloi ban ïarap lada ki briew ki donkam ïa u ha kano kano ka por.Ka Seng Samla Mawkhar ka lap ïa u Tsering dei lyngba ka jingïakren jong ka Kong Eldora Lyngdoh ha ka Facebook ha kaba u la pynpaw ïa ka mon ba u long uba kloi ban ïarap ïa ki samla kiba la ngop ha ka jingdih drok.
title: WANRAH KA SSM DA U AYURVEDA PRACTITIONER NA NEW YORK BAN IARAP ÏA KIBA LA KYRNI DIH DROK

content: Shillong, Nailar, 14: Da kaba buh hakhmat ia ka thong ban iarap ia ki khynnah rit bad ia ki kynthei kiba donkam ia ki jingiarap ba kyrkieh ha kylleng ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei, ka tnat Social Welfare jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka 14 tarik u Nailar, 2023 ka la mynjur ban pynkha 14 tylli ki post ki ban pyntyllun ia ka jingpyntreikam jong ka Child Helpline Service lyngba u Nombar 1098 khnang ba ki khynnah rit kin dup lah ban telephone ia une u nombar haba ki mad ia kino kino ki jingeh ha ka jingim ka jong ki bad ha kajuh ka por la pynbna paidbah ruh ia u nombar 181 ban ai jingiarap ia ki kynthei haba iakynduh ia kino kino ki jingeh.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Myntri jong ka tnat Social Welfare u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka jingpynkha thymmai ia ki 14 tylli ki post hapoh kane ka tnat treikam ka long hadien ba ka tnat Social Welfare lyngba ka Juvenile Justice Care and Protection Act 2015, ka la pyntreikam ia ka Child Helpline Services hapoh ka Vatsaliya Scheme ha u snem 2019 hynrei ka jingpyntyllun ia ka kam ka long beit tang da uwei u briew.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, ki post kiba la pynkha thymmai ki kynthup ia kawei ka post IT Supervisor, 10 tylli ki post Call Operator, kawei ka post Multipurpose Staff bad ar tylli ki post Security Guard.
title: U NOMBAR 1098 BAN ÏARAP ÏA KI HEPRIT BAD 181 ÏA KI KYNTHEI, PYNBNA KA SOCIAL WELFARE

content: Lai ngut ki briew ki la duhei ia la ka jong ka jingim hadien ba kawei ka trok ka bym pat lah satia ban ioh ia u registration number ka la thung khongpong sha kawei ka riat kaba jylliew haduh 300 mitar eiei ynda poi ha Lad Mawkhap, kaba hap hapoh ka Pynursla Civil Division, East Khasi Hills District. Katkum ka jingtip ba la ioh lum la iathuh ba kane ka la jia ha ka 7 tarik u Nailar, 2023 ha ka por kumba 12 baje mynmiet katba ki san ngut ki briew kiba shong ha kane ka trok ki la mih na Pynursla ban leit sha Laitlyngkot ban phah shna ia kane ka kali kaba la don jingthud ha ka Gear Box.  Hynrei da ka jingsniew bok, ynda la poi ha Lad Mawkhap, kane ka kali ka la tyllun shadien bad hap syndon jrain sha riat.U samla Bansiew Khongkliam uba la lait im ha ka jinghap jong kane ka trok uba sah ha ka shnong Phlangshlain bad uba dang don mynta hapdeng ka jingshah sumar ha Shillong Civil Hospital u la shu par dohiap na trai ka riat hapdeng ka jingmynsaw tad haduh ba un da poi sha surok.Saw ngut kiwei pat kiba shong lang hapoh ka trok ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u samla Yomiki kharshandi, uba la 20 snem ka rta uba dei u nongniah jong ka trok bad uba sah ha ka shnong Lyngiong, u Bah Kyndaiborlang Kurbah, na ka shnong Kseh Mawnai, u Bah Banpeitlang Marbaniang, na ka shnong Nongshken Mawdang bad u Bah Welbokstar Sohlang na ka shnong Kseh Mawnai.Ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team (SRT) jong ka tnat Fire and Emergency Service, (F&ES) Shillong tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia ki la leit mar mar ban leit ai jingiarap ia kine ki lanot.  Kat haduh mynta, kane ka kynhun ka dang ioh sei tang ia ka met jong ki lai ngut kiba la khladnoh katba uwei pat u dang jah rngai haduh mynta.
title: HAP KA TROK HA RIAT LAD MAWKHAP, PYNURSLA, ÏAP 3, LAIT IM 1, JAH RNGAI 1

content: Shillong, Nailar 7: Ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team (SRT) jong ka tnat Fire and Emergency Services (F&ES) Shillong ka la lapdien sa ia u Bah Yomiki Kharshandi uba dang lait im na ka jinghap jong kawei ka trok ha riat Mawkhap, Pynursla Civil Sub-division hadien ba lai ngut ki paralok jong u ki la khladnoh hashen bad uwei pat uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bansiew Khongklian u la lait im da kaba par dohim dohiap na trai jong ka riat haduh ban da poi shajrong surok.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills District, u Bah S. Nongtnger la iathuh ba ha ka miet sngi u Blei kawei ka trok kaba don ia u nombar ML05 G 9528 ba la niah da u Yomiki kharshandi, 20 snem ka rta kaba kit 12 tylli ki muid, ka la sniew kynsan tang shu poi ha Langkyrdem katba ka dang wan phai na Pynursla ban leit sha Laitlyngkot.Ynda la poi ha Khoh-yiar hajan ka khongdong surok ha Mawkhap ha surok National Highway-40, kane ka trok ka la sniew bad tyllun shadien bad hap syndon jraiñ sha riat.Ki Pulit kiba la ioh jingtip ia kane ka jingjia ki la leit mar mar ban leit ai jingiarap ha kaba la lap ba u Bah Bansiew Khongklian na ka shnong Phlangshlain u la par dohim dohiap na trai ka riat haduh ban da poi tiap shajrong surok katba ia u bah Yomiki kharshandi la lap da ka kynhun SRT ba u dang im bad shu thiah lyngktop hapdeng ka jingmynsaw jong ki kjat.Lai ngut kiba la khladnoh ha kane ka jinghap jong kane ka trok ki dei kiba la ithuh kyrteng kum u Kyndaiborlang Kurbah na Kseh Mawnai, u Banpeitlang Marbaniang na Nongshken Mawdang bad u Welbokstar Sohlang na Kseh Mawnai.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia ki pulit ki la register case ha Pynursla Police Station.
title: LAP KA SRT BA DANG IM U NONGÑIAH BA HAP KA TROK HA RIAT MAWKHAP, PYNURSLA

content: Shillong, Nailar, 14 : Ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya lem bad ka Meghalaya Athletic Association ka la pynbna ban pynlong biang ha ka sien kaba ar ia ka Sohra International Half Marathon kaba 21 kilomitar ka ban sa long ha ka 30 tarik u Nailur, 2023.Ki nongialam jong ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association, kynthup ruh na ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs bad ka Meghalaya Athletic Association ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 14 tarik u Nailar, 2023, ki la iathuh ba ka tarik ba khatduh ban pynrung kyrteng ha kane ka jingmareh marathon ka long haduh ka 12 tarik u Nailur, 2023.Ka jingthmu haba pynlong ia kane ka marathon ka long ban khring ia ki nongjngohkai pyrthei sha kane ka jylla Meghalaya khnang ban kyntiew ia ka iohkam iohjam jong ki paidbah.Ki nongpyniaid ki la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingmareh marathon kaba don lai bynta ka ban sdang na ka shnong Laitsohpliah haduh Mawsmai, ki kynthup ia ka jingmareh kaba 21 kilomitar, 10 kilomitar bad kaba 5 kilomitar.Ka khusnam na ka bynta ki Elite group ka long 1 lak tyngka ia kiba wan nyngkong, 70,000 hajar ia kiba wan baar bad 50,000 hajar ia kiba wan balai.
title: 1 LAK KA KHUSNAM ÏA KI LAHDUH HA KA 2ND SOHRA INTERNATIONAL HALF MARATHON

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Assistant Education Secretary u Samla Richest Malngiang ha ka lah sngi U Blei ki la ïakynduh ïa u Vice Chancellor jong ka skulbah NEHU u Prof. Prabha Shankar Shukla  ban pan jingpynshai ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Four Years Undergraduate Programme jong ka National Education Policy-2020.Ha ka jingïakren, ka Seng ka la dawa ïa u khliehduh jong ka skulbah NEHU ba u dei ban ai ïa ka jingpynshai kaba kham janai khnang ban weng ïa ka jingsah umdum jong ki Kolej bad ki samla pule ki bym pat lah ban sdang ïa ki klas na ka daw ka kynrum kynram ba mih na ka National Education Policy (NEP).Ka seng ruh ka la kren shai ba ka pyrshah ban pyntreikam ïa kane ka policy lyngba ka Hybrid Mode bad ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka la dawa ba lada dei ban pyntreikam ïa ka Four Years Undergraduate Programme (FYUP) ruh dei ban pyntreikam salonsar lane lada pyntreikam da ka System kaba rim ruh dei ban long salonsar.U Vice Chancellor ha ka jingïakren u la ong ba shen ka University kan sa shong pyrkhat bad ka tnad Pule Puthi jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban ïakren janai halor kane ka NEP.Ka seng ka la dawa, hadien kane ka jingïakynduh, ka jingpynshai ka dei ban mih ba lada yn pyntreikam ïa ka system ba thymmai ne kaba rim khnang ba ki samla pule kin ym shah ktah ha ka jingslem ban sdang ïa ki klas jong ki, bad lada jia ba kin ïaid shakhmat ïa ka system ba thymmai ka University ha ryngkat lang bad ka Sorkar Jylla ki dei ban ïarap bad kynpham lem ïa kito ki College ki bymkotbor ban pyntreikam ïa kane ka FYUP khnang ba ki samla pule ha kito ki College kin nym shah ktah.Ka Seng ka la ïakren halor ka jingeh jong ki samla pule kiba dei na ka jaidbynriew Khasi kiba pule ha Manipur University hadien ka jingïakynnad bad jingïaumsnam, ki don mynta hapdeng ka khim khait ban leit phai ban ïoh bteng ïa ka jingpule.  Halor kane, ka Seng ka la dawa ïa ka skulbah NEHU ba kan pdiang kyrpang ïa kine ki samla pule hapoh skulbah NEHU ban bteng ïa ka jingpule jong ki na ka Semester kaba ki dang pule mynta lane ban pynrung thymmai ïa ki naduh ba sdang.U Vice Chancellor, ha ka jingïakren, u la mynjur ban peit bniah ïa kane bad kular ruh ban ïarap ïa kine ki samla pule bad kumjuh u la kyrpad ïa ka KSU ba kan phah kyrpang ïa ki kyrteng bad ka jingtip ba kham bniah khnang ba un ïoh ban ïakren bad ki Deans jong ka Board of School Studies, NEHU la yn pdiang ïa ki kum ki khynnah pule thymmai lane ban ailad ïa ki ban bteng naduh ka Semester ba ki don mynta.Ka Seng ka phah ruh ïa u kyrwoh sha ki samla pule ba kin phah ïa ki jingtip ba kham bniah sha ka Seng da kaba phah ïa ka kyrteng, ka Course Contents, Registration Number bad ki Department ba ki pule khnang ba ka KSU kan ïoh ban phah ïa ki kyrteng sha ki bor pynïaid jong ka NEHU.
title: KA KYNRUM KYNRAM NEP-2020: PAN JINGPYNSHAI KA KSU NA U VC KA NEHU

content: Shillong, Nailar 08 : Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council, Central Body ha ka 8 tarik u Nailar, 2023 ka la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ka sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma ban dawa ia ka sorkar ba ka dei ban plie ruh ia ka Shillong Campus ynda la pynsdang ia ka Captain Willamson A. Sangma University ha Tura, West Garo Hills District.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President ka Seng u Bah RobertJune Kharjahrin u la iathuh ba ka seng ka la pynsngew ruh ha u Myntri halor ka jingrem shaba palat ka bai skul hapdeng ki skul ba la pyniaid da ki riewshimet ne ki Private School bad ki skul kiba ioh jingkyrshan pisa na ka sorkar.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ruh ba ka Seng ka la dawa ruh ia ka sorkar ban buh noh ia ki jaka thoh eksamin Central University Entrance Test ha manla ki district jong ka jylla bad ba ka Sorkar ka dei ruh ban ai jingkyrshan pisa ia ki Kolej na ka bynta ban pyntrekam ia ka National Education Policy 2020.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, ki nongialam jong ka HYC Ribhoi Sepngi Circle ruh ki la aiti ia ka dorkhas ha u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi halor ka jingdawa ban pyntreikam noh ia ka Patharkhmah Model Degree College.
title: DAWA KA HYC ÏA KA SHILLONG CAMPUS YNDA LA SDANG KA CAPT. WA SANGMA UNIVERSITY

content: Nongstoin, Nailar 8 : Lai ngut ki briew kiba la kah bha ia la ka jong ka durkhmat ha ka step synnia jong ka 7 tarik u Nailar, 2023 ki la leit ban thang duamon ia ka trok dumper bad ia kawei ka transit mixer jong ka kompani na Russia ka VozrozHdenie kaba dang pyntrei mynta ia ka surok na Nongstoin sha Wahkaji.Katkum ka tyllong khubor ba la ioh lum la ong ba ki lai ngut ki runar kiba la kah dur bha ki la rung jubor ha ka ktem jong kane ka kompani ha ka shnong Mawthungkper ha ka por kumba 1:30 baje mynstep bad thang ruh ia ki kali jong ka kompeni bad jia ryngkhat ba ha kane ka por uwei u nongniah jong ka trok dumper uba thaih hapoh jong ka u la lait im da ka sait.La ong ruh ba ki runar ki la wan ha ryngkat ki klong petrol lem bad ki pla byrni kiba la thmu ruh ban pynjot bad pynjulor ia ki mar ki mata jong ka kompaniHa kaba iadei bad kane ki Pulit ki la register case bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat ban iohkem ia kiba donkti.
title: WIANG DING KI RUNAR ÏA KA TROK DUMPER BAD TRANSIT MIXER HA MAWTHUNGKPER

content: Shillong, Nailar 08 : Ka North East Slow Food and Agrobiodiversity Society bad ka Meghalaya Basin Management Authority ha ka 8 tarik, Nailar, 2023 ki la lum lang ia ki nongrep na rilum Khasi bad Jaintia ban pynsngewthuh halor ka jingiadei hapdeng ka rep ka riang jong u khun bynriew bad ka meimariang bad halor ka jingpynneh pynsah ia ki khlaw ki btap hapoh ka Community Led Landscape Management Project ia kaba la pynlong ha Soso Tham Auditorium, Shillong.La plie ia kane ka jingiathir iatai da u Gunaka DB, uba dei u Joint Secretary jong ka Sorkar Jylla bad ha kajuh ka por u Executive Director jong ka Meghalaya Basin Development Authority bad Member Secretary jong ka BRDC bad SCSTE.Ki nongiashim bynta ha kane ka jingiathir iatai ki kynthup ia ki Agroecolocy Learning Cirlce na ki shnong bapher kiba ju im kamai jakpoh da ka rep ka riang khlem da pyndonkam ia ka dawai sboh.
title: PYNI NAM KI NONGREP ÏA KI SYMBAI JINGTHUNG BAN REP KHLEM AI DAWAI SBOH

content: Ribhoi, Nailar 8 : Ki dkhot jong ka Ribhoi Youth Federation bad ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia and Garo Peoples, Umsning Circle ha ka 8 tarik, Nailar, 2023 ki la ioh bat haduh 9 ngut ki bar jylla kiba rung tuh sha ka jylla Meghalaya ban leit trei bylla siang rong khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang.Kine ki 9 ngut ki bar jylla ki dei kiba wan na ka jylla Assam lyngba ka Kali Tata Mobile kaba don ïa u number AS11-EC-0412 kaba don ia ka jingthoh ha ka iit kali ‘ ON PWD Duty’.  La kynnoh ruh ba kine ki nongbylla bar jylla ki la rieh ïa lade hapoh kane ka kali da kaba kah ïa lade da ki kynja kor ba pyndonkam ha kaba siang rong ïa ka surok.Ia kine ki bar jylla, la aiti noh sha ki Pulit jong ka Umsning Police Outpost ban pynlong ka jingtohkit bad ban pynphai biang ia ki sha ka jaka kaba ki wan.
title: RUNG TUH KI BAR JYLLA SHA MEGHALAYA HA KA KALI BA THOH ‘ON PWD DUTY’

content: Khliehriat, Nailar 08 : Ki nongshong shnong jong ka Elaka Narpuh, East Jaintia Hills district ha ka 8 tarik u Nailar, 2023 ki la pynlong da ka jingiakhih ban pynpaw pyrshah ia ka jingbym lah jong ka National Highway Authority of India  bad ka Sorkar Jylla ban shna pynbha ia ka surok National Highway-06 kaba la jot rathai bad kaba la buh jingeh ia ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan bad ka rah ka rong.Ki paidbah hapoh ka jingialam jong ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Narpuh Circle bad ki Waheh Shnong jong ka Elaka Narpuh ki la ia mih paidbah ryngkat bad ki plakad bad ki jingthoh kiba pynrem jur ia kane ka jingleh bym suidniew jong ka National Highway Authority of India  bad ka sorkar jylla da kaba ialum lang ha ka khyrdop khrong khajna jong ka National Highway Authority of India  kaba don ha Lumshnong.
title: ÏAKHIH KI PAIDBAH KA ELAKA NARPUH HA KHYRDOP KA TOLL GATE BA JOT KA SUROK NH-6

content: Shillong, Nailar 09: Ki nongialam jong ka Lympung ki Seng Kynthei (LSK) ha ka sngi Balang ki la iakynduh ia u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ban pynsngew ha u ia ka jingkwah jong ka kynhun ba ka por ka la ih bad katkum ka jingtyllun jong ka shalyntem ki por, ki kynthei ruh ki dei ban iadon bynta lang tang kum ki dkhot jong ka Executive Committee ha ki Dorbar Shnong.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ka President jong ka Lympung ki Seng Kynthei ka Kong Theilin Phanbuh, ka la ong, “ngi la pynsngew ha u CEM ban leh eiei katba shah ka aiñ namar ba kane lehse ka long kaba dang thymmai bad lehse ki don ruh ki Dorbar Shnong kiba la kynthup ia ki kynthei ha ki Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong hynrei kiba bun hi mynta ki dang duna.”Kane ka jingpynsngew jong ka Lympung ki Seng Kynthei ka long ba ka District Council kan pynmih da ka jingbthah sha ki Dorbar Shnong ki bym pat don ia ki kynthei kum ki Executive Member ba kin pynrung ia ki hapoh ka EC jong ka Dobar Shnong.“Ngi sngewdonkam ba kan long ryntih namar ba ki kynthei ki kham sngewthuh ia kino kino ki jingeh, da kaba iadon lang, ia pyrkhat lang bad iarai lang ban wanrah ia ka jingmyntoi, ka jingbit jingbiang bad ka jingbha hapoh ka shnong ka thaw,” la ong ka Kong Phanbuh.Haba kylli, ka President jong ka Lympung ki Seng Kynthei ka la ong, “hooid ka dei ka dustur naduh hyndai hynthai ba ki Kynthei kim lah ban iadon bynta ha ka Dorbar hynrei phi hap ban peit pat katkum ka jingiaid jong ka por ba la idonkam ban iadon bynta lang bad ban iatreilang namar ba ki kam haba iatreilang hapdeng ki shynrang bad ki kynthei ka wanrah ia ka jingbha.”Ia mynta, ka Lympung Ki Seng Kynthei, ka don 31 tylli ki Unit jong ki Seng Kynthei na ki shnong bapher bapher.  Hynrei ki don pat ki shnong ba ki dkhot ki Seng Kynthei kim pat ioh rung kum ki dkhot jong ki Executive Member jong ki Dorbar Shnong hynrei lait noh tang ha ki katto katne ki Dorbar Shnong.Ka Adviser jong ka LSK ka Kong P.Lyngdoh, haba bynrap halor kane ka la ong, “ngi la iohi bun, da ka jingiatreilang jong ki kynthei hapoh ki Dorbar Shnong ka la wanrah jingmyntoi shikatdei eh.”“Ka jingkwah jong ngi ka long tang ban kren ia ka bha ka miat jong ki kynthei bad ia ka imlang ka sahlang bad ngim shym iakren ba ngi kwah ban long Rangbah Shnong namarba ngi ki kynthei ngi sngewthuh ia ka bor lajong, ka dor lajong. Ngi kwah tang ban don ha ki Executive Committee jong ki Dorbar Shnong ba ngin iarai lang, ban iohi lang bad ban kdew lang khamtam ha kito ki shnong ki bym don ia ki Kynthei ha ki Executive Committee jong ki Dorbar Shnong,” la bynrap ka Kong Lyngdoh.
title: NGIM KWAH LONG RANGBAH SHNONG, NGI KWAH TANG BAN LONG DKHOT HA KA EC JONG KI DORBAR SHNONG:LSK

content: Shillong, Nailar 09: Ka Hynñiewtrep Border Dispute Redressal Forum (HBDRF) ha ka sngi Balang ka la pynpaw ba ka kwah ba ia ka kaphod tohkit jong ka Enquiry Commission ba la thung da ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Assam ban tohkit halor ka jingshah siat iap jong ki hynriew ngut ki briew ha ka shnong Mukroh kaba la jia ha ka 22 tarik u Naiwieng, 2022 dei ban aiti sha ka Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) lane sha ka National Investigation Agency (NIA).“Ngi kwah ba ia ka kaiphod tohkit dei ban aiti sha ki Central Agency jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ki bym don ka jingiashah liang la ka long sha ka CBI lane sha ka NIA,” ong u Secretary ka Forum u Bah Thomas Passah ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la thung ia ka Enquiry Commission ba la khlieh da u nongbishar ba la shongthait jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court u Justice T. Vaiphei katba ka Sorkar Assam ruh ka la thung la ka jong ka Enquiry Commission ba la khlieh da ka nongbishar ba la shongthait jong ka Ingbishar Guwahati  High Court ka Justice Rumi Kumari Phukan.Haba pynpaw ka jingsngew lyngngoh ia ka jingkhot jong ka Enquiry Commission ba la thung da ka Sorkar Assam ia ki nongai sakhi na ka Jylla Meghalaya, u Bah Chandame Sungoh u la ong, “la lai sien laiwat ka (Enquiry Commission na ka jylla Assam) la khot.  Ka Meghalaya ngi ioh jingtip ba ka la thung la ka jong ka Enquiry Commission bad ki la leh ruh la ka jong ka jingtohkit ba la khlieh da u Justice T. Vaiphei.”“Na ka liang ka Assam katkum ka jingtip ba la ioh ka la ai sha ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sokar Meghalaya kam treh ban iashim bynta.  Ka pynsah ia ngi ha ka umdum ba kumno kajuh ka jingjia kin don ar tylli ki Enquiry Commisison. Ka Sorkar Assam ngi tip ba kan pynksan beit la ka jong ka nia,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ki briew jong ngi kiba mad ia ki jingjia, kumno kin ioh ia ka hok ba ki dei ban ioh. Kata ka dei ka jingkylli ba ngi kwah ban buh ia ka Enquiry Commission. Kam ju don ka rukom ba ar tylli ki Enquiry Commision kin shong bishar ia kajuh ia ka kam.”Haba kynnoh shuh shuh ia ka Sorkar Assam kan pynksan beit la ka jong ka nia, u Chairman jong ka Forum u la ong, “ha ka jingtokit jong ka Sorkar Assam ki don lai tylli ki daw ba ka pynieng la ka jong ka nia. Nyngkong eh, ngi iohi ba ka Mukroh ka la shah pynhap hapoh ka Jrikyndeng Police Station, West Karbi Anglong.  Kane ka pyni shai kdar ba la kam jubor ia ka Mukroh sha Assam. Kaba ar, ka jingjia baroh ka dei na ka jingtuh dieng jong ki Khasi-Pnar na Karbi Anglong, Assam. Kaba lai, ka jingshah siat, ka jia tang na ka daw ka jingker kut jong ki paidbah ia ki Pulit bad ia ki nongpahara khlaw ka Sorkar Assam da kaba rah ruh ia ki tiar pynmynsaw bad ban iada ialade kim (Pulit) banse ban siat.”
title: JINGJIA HA MUKROH: DA KA NIA NE CBI KWAH KA HBDFRF BAN BISHAR ÏA KA KAIPHOD TOHKIT

content: Shillong, Nailar 09 : Ka Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement ka la dawa ia ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ba kan thaw noh da ka ain kaba pyrkhing ia ki thei khasi kiba ioh tnga da ki briew kiba nabar ka jylla.Ka seng hapoh ka jingialam jong u President u Bah Lamphrangsngi Kharbani ha kane ka sngi, ka la pynkup burom ruh ia u Chief Executive Member jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem halor ka jingshimti jong u ia kane ka shuki kum u khliehduh jong ka Council.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 9 tarik u Nailar, 2023 u Bah Lamphrang u la iathuh ba ka seng ka la pynsngew ruh ha u Chief Executive Member ia ki mat ki bapher bapher kiba ktah ia ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew bad ha kajuh ka por u la iathuh ba ka seng ka la kyrpad ia ka District Council ba kan bthah ia ki Hima, ki Raid bad ki Shnong ba kin pynmih da ki adong kiba khanglad ia ki thei khasi ban iashongkha khleh bad kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew kiba dei nabar jong ka jylla namarba kane ka ktah ia ka khaii ka pateng bad ka ioh kam ka iohjam jong ki trai ri trai muluk.
title: KWAH KA HANM BAN PYRKHING DA KA AIÑ ÏA KI THEI KHASI BA ÏOH TNGA BAR JYLLA

content: Shillong, Nailar, 03: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO), West Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka sngi baar hapoh ka jingialam jong u President u Bah Wanbiang Pulang ka la ujor ha u Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills u Bah BS Sohliya bad ban dawa ruh ba dei ban khang khyrdep ia ka iew die Masi bad Muid ha ka shnong Mookyndur.Ka seng hadien ba ka la wad bniah ia ka jingmih kynsan jong kane ka iew kaba pynpoi ia ki Masi bad ki Muid nabar ka jylla ka la lap ba ki nongpyniaid ki shu leh mynleh ban pynbiang ia ki kot ki sla hynrei katkum ka jinglap jong ka seng kane ka iew die Masi bad Muid ka long kaba be-ain namarba ym don satia ki doktor kiba pynshisha ba ki Masi bad ki Muid kiba wan nabar ki dei kiba la ioh injek tika.Ka seng ka la kam ba ka la ioh jingtip ba ia kine ki Masi bad ki Muid la shalan sha ka ri Bangladesh khlem ki kot ki sla bad ha kajuh ka por ka la kynnoh ba u trai jong ka iew u la pynkheiñ ruh ia ka rule 47 haduh 56 jong ka Animals Transport Rules 1978.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka seng ka la phah ruh ia ka kopi jingujor sha ka tnad Pulit, sha ka tnad Veterinary, sha ka Land Custom, sha ki shipai Boder security Forces bad sha u Chairman jong ka Animals Welfare Board of India, New Delhi ban leh ia kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon ain.Shuh shuh na ka liang jong ka seng ka la iathuh, ba ki paidbah ki ju ujor manla ka por ia ka jingbret pathar ia ki Masi bad ki Muid kiba la iap ka kynrei bha bad ki nongri jingri kiba don marjan bad katei ka iew kim sngew shngain shuh namar ka jingdon jong kane iew kat haduh ba ka la pynartatien ia kiba bun balang.
title: DAWA KA HITO ÏA U DC-WJH BAN KHANG ÏA KA ÏEW DIE MASI BAD MUID HA MOOKYNDUR

content: Shillong, Nailar 09 : Ka All Tamil Nadu Students’ Association (ATSA) hapoh ka jingialam u  Vishnuram P (President), u Rajarajacholan (Joint Secretary), u Gideon Bala Singham (Treasurer) bad u Ragu (Advisor) ki la wan na Tamil Nadu ban iakynduh ia ki nongialam ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ha Shillong ban iasyllok halor shibun ki mat kiba ktah ia ki paid trai shnong ha North East bad ha South India.Ki nongialam ka ATSA ki la pynsngew ia ka jingeh ki paid Tamil bad kiwei ki paid Dravidian hapoh ka ri India bad kumjuh ki nongialam ka KSU ki la pynsngew ia la ki jingeh bad ki diengpynkiang ia ka Jaidbynriew Khasi.Kine ki ar seng ki la iasyllok ruh halor ka jingshah iuhroit ki nong Northeast bad nong South India la ka dei ha ki aiñ sorkar pdeng ki bapher bapher kum ka jingpynbor ban pyndonkam ia ka ktien Hindi bad ka jingshah buhai shnong ha kiwei pat ki Jaidbynriew la ka dei ha Meghalaya lane ha Tamil Nadu. La ia kren bniah ruh kumno ban wad lad wad lynti ban iada ia ki trai ri trai muluk ha Tamil Nadu bad Meghalaya, ban kyntiew ha ka liang ka pule ka puthi bad ka ioh ka kot.Na ka liang kine ki ar seng ki la rai ba nangne sha khmat kin iatreilang ha kaba iadei bad ki mat ki jura kiba ktah ia ka bha ka miat bad ka iap ka im ki paid trai shnong ha Northeast bad ha South India.Ka ATSA ka la kular ruh ban iarap ia ki samla pule Khasi kiba don ha Tamil Nadu lada ki shem kano kano ka jingeh.Ha shwa kane ka ATSA ka la ia kynduh ruh ia ki nongialam ka Naga Students’ Federation (NSF) ha Guwahati bad kine ki seng ki la shim kijuh ki rai ban iatreilang nangne sha khmat pynkut ka kyrwoh na u General Secretary ka KSU u Samla Donald V. Thabah.
title: YN ÏA TREI LANG KA ATSA BAD KA KSU

content: Shillong, Nailar 10: Ka kynhun jong ka executive committee (EC) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) mynta ka sngi ka 10 tarik u Nailar 2023 ka la leit ban jurip ia ka Khasi Heritage Village kaba don ha Mawphlang khnang ban lap ïa ki jingduna kiba don ha kane ka jaka na ka bynta ban ïoh pynkhreh ban pynlong biang ïa ka tamasa kaba la tip kyrteng ka Monolith Festival ha u bnai Nohprah 2023.Ia kane ka kynhun la ialam da u Chairman ka Khasi Heritage Village Management Committee u Bah Victor Rani ha ryngkat ka jingdon lang ki Executive Member (EM) ka KHADC, u Lamphang ka KHADC u Bah Lamphrang Blah, ki ophisar ka konsil bad na ki tnat sorkar jylla.Ha kane ka jingleit jurip ka KHADC kala rai ban pynlong biang ia kane ka tamasa ba pawnam ka Jylla bala tip kum ka Monolith Festival, kaba la pynsangeh mynta la 7 snem eiei, ha Khasi Heritage Village, kaba don ha Mawphlang.Ia kane ka tamasa la pynlong kum shi bynta ban khring bha ia ki nongshangkai pyrthei na satlak ka pyrthei bad ban pynim nam ia ka jingriewspah ha ka riti, dustur bad kiwei kiwei de.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingjurip, u Chairman ka KHADC Bah Lamphrang Blah ula ong ba ka rai ban pynlong biang ia ka Monolith Festival ka dei kaba la leh da ka jingthmu ban pyni nam sha ka pyrthei ia ka spah jong ka Jaidbynriew Khasi ha ka Riti Dustur, ka Deiti Tynrai bad ki jingdon jingem jong u men barim.U Bah Lamphrang ula ong ba kane ka tamasa ban pynlong mynta u snem kan iapher bha bad ki tamasa ba la dep pynlong, namar ka Sorkar MDA ba la ialam da u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma, kan ai jingkyrshan ia ka Council ha kaban pynlong ia kane ka tamasa ha kata ka rukom ban kyntiew ia ka riti dustur bad ka jingpyni ia ki tynrai jong ka Jaidbynriew Khasi.Ka tamasa Monolith la pynlong khatduh ha u Risaw 2016 ha Khasi Heritage Village, Mawphlang. Hynrei, namar ka jingiakynduh ia ka jingeh ha ka pisa pilain, ka KHADC kala rai ban pynsangeh shuwa ia kane ka tamasa.Ka thong ba hakhmat eh jong ka KHADC ban pynlong biang ia kane ka tamasa ka long ban pyninam ha kajuh ka rynsan ia ka spah jong ka Jaidbynriew Khasi haba phai sha ka riti dustur, ka dei tynrai bad ka jingdon jingem ki men barim.
title: KA MONOLITH FESTIVAL HA U BNAI NOHPRAH 2023

content: Shillong, Nailar 11 : Tang iwei arngut kiba pyrshah hynrei baroh ki Principal, ki nonghikai, ki samla pule bad ki college hapoh ka jylla kila mynjur ban iaid beit shakhmat ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ka National Education Policy (NEP) 2023. Ia kane la kam da u Vice Chancellor (VC) ka skulbah North Eastern Hills University (NEHU) u Prof. Prabha Shankar Shukla bad ula ong ba ka jingpyntreikam ia ka NEP kan wanrah ka jingmyntoi ia ki khun samla ka jylla Meghalaya.’“Haduh mynta ngam pat ioh jingthoh na ki Principal jong ki College ba ki pyrshah ban pyntreikam ia ka NEP 2023 hynrei ki don tang iwei arngut ngut kiba pynpaw ba kim sngewiahap ban pyntreikam ia ka NEP” la ong u Prof. Prabha Shankar Shukla.U Prof. Prabha Shankar Shukla ula ong ba kum u VC ka NEHU um don bor ban khot ia ki nongialam ka MCTA ban iakren halor ka jingpyrshah jong ki ban pyntreikam ia ka NEP naduh mynta u snem bad na ka liang ka MCTA ruh kam don bor ban pyrshah ia ki College ban pyntreikam ia ka NEP.Ula ong ba kum u u VC ka NEHU ula lum shibun ki jingialang bad ki Principal jong ki College, ki nonghikai, ki samla pule bad ki sengbhalang hynrei haduh mynta ka MCTA kam shym la wan shakhmat ban iakren halor ka jingpyrshah jong ki ban pyntreikam ia ka NEP.“Nga kloi ban iakren bad ka MCTA lada ki wan shakhmat hynrei haduh mynta kim shym la wan hynrei dei tang ki Principal, ki nongialam sengbhalang ba kynthup ka KSU, HYC, FKJGP bad ki samla pule ka NEHU kila wan ban iakren bad nga bad baroh kila ia mynjur ban iaid beit ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ka NEP naduh mynta u snem” ula ong.U VC ula ong ba ka NEHU ka kloi ban iarap ia ki College ban pyntreikam noh ia ka NEP  2023 namar kane kan wanrah ka jingbha bad ka jingmyntoi ia ki khun samla ka Meghalaya bad dei namar kane baroh kila mynjur ia ka NEP.
title: TANG 1 NE 2 NGUT KIBA PYRSHAH IA KA NEP 2023, VC NEHU

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba kan pynstet ban shna ia ka Drug Reduction Elimination and Action Mission (DREAM) Draft Policy.Ka seng kaba la buh hakhmat ia ka thong ban iakhun pyrshah ia ka jingjyllei shaba palat jong u drok hapoh ka East Jaiñtia Hills District bad ha ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District  u Abhilash Baranwal kaba kynthup ia ki jingai jingmut kumno ban iada ia ki khynnah bad ia ki samla na u drok.Ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ka dei kawei na ki distrik kaba jur bha ka jingkynrei bad jingwan tuid jong u drok na shabar.Ha ka jingiakynduh ia u Deputy Commissioner, ka seng ka la ai jingmut ba la dei ban pynjur ia ka jingai jingpynshai halor ka jingma jong u drok sha ki skul khnang ba ki khynnah rit bad ki samla kiba dang khie dang san kin kiar na u drok. Ka seng ka la ai jingmut ia u DC ban khot da ka jingialang ia baroh ki kynhun bapher bapher ban iamir jingmut bad pynurlong ia kane ka thong.Ka seng ka la ai jingmut ruh ba dei ban pynsdang noh ia ki jingai jingpynshai (awareness program) ha manla ki skul kiba don hapoh ka district manla ka step shwa ban long skul.Ka Seng ka la kyntu ruh ia ki bor synshar District ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ia ki bor pahara bad ba ka tnat Pulit kan iatrei lang ryngkat bad ki Seng Samla Shnong, ki Dorbar Shnong khnang ban pynduh jait ia ka jingjyllei jong u drok.“Na ka liang u Deputy Commissioner u la pdiang ia ka jingiatreilang bad shen un sa wad shuh shuh ia ki lad ki lynti kumno ban iada ia ki khun samla na u drok,” la pyntip ka seng ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.Ban ioh ia ka jingiatreilang jong ki Dorbar Shnong, ka seng ka la pynpaw ruh ba kan sa iakren ruh bad ki Dorbar Shnong bad ban jied ia ki shnong ban buh ia ka Community Gym kaba long kum shi bynta ka sienjam ban pynkiar ia ki samla na u drok.  “Ka Community Gym kan long ba ki tiar ialehkai ki dei ban don ha manla ki shnong bad ka seng kan sa iakren bad ki Sports Club jong ki shnong ban wad ia ka iing bad jaka ban buh ia tiar ialehkai,” la pyntip ka seng.Kane ka seinjam kan iarap ia ki khun samla ban pynleit jingmut ha kaba kilan met bad ban pynklet ia ki ban ngop ha ki jingsniew ba bun rukom, la bynrap ka KSU.Ka Seng ka la ai jingmut ruh ban buh ki “De-addiction After Care Rehabilitation Centre” bad ka seng ka la pyntip ba kan sa shimti ban wad jaka bad ban pynsngewthuh sha ki shnong ban pdiang ia kane ka jingtyrwa.Shuh shuh ka KSU ka la kyntu ruh ba ki paidbah kin iatreilang ryngkat bad ka Sorkar Jylla lem bad ka seng ban rat dyngkhong ia u drok bad ban ym khim jingmut ne tieng haba wan ki jingbha bad ki jingkylla.
title: DAWA KA KSU ÏA KA SORKAR JYLLA BAN PYNSHNA PYNSTET ÏA KA DREAM DRAFT POLICY

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba ka tnat (Home) Police ka la pynmih ia ka jingpynbna ba pynkynriah kam ia ki ophisar Pulit ha ki distrik ka rilukm Garo.Katkum ka jingpynbna, lyngba ka jingmynjur jong ka Civil Services Board (CSB), u Vivekanand Singh Rathore, IPS (RR 2012) uba long u Superintendent of Police jong ka West Garo Hills la pynkynriah kum u Commandant jong ka 3rd MLP Bn, Sahbseiñ  hadien ka jingpynkynriahkam ia u Kamakhya Prasad, MPS.U Shailendra Bamaniya, IPS (RR 2016) uba long u Superintendent of Police jong ka North Garo Hills u la shah pynkynriah ban shimti kum u Superintendent of Police jong ka South Garo Hills hadien ba la pynkynriahkam ia u Abraham T. Sangma, MPS.U Dr. Dara Aswaghosh, IPS (RR 2018) uba long u Superintendent of Police jong ka Traffic, Shillong ula shah pynkynriah ban shimti kum u Commandant ka 2nd MLP Bn, Goeragre hadien ka jingpynkynriahkam ia u Bruno A. Sangma, MPS.Lyngba  ka jingai jingmynjur jong ka Police Establishment Board (PEB), u Abraham T. Sangma, MPS uba long u Superintendent of Police jong ka South Garo Hills u la shah pynkynriah kam ban shimti kum u Superintendent of Police jong ka West Garo Hills hadien ka jingpynkynriahkam ia u Vivekanand Singh Rathore, IPS.U Bruno A. Sangma, MPS uba long u Commandant jong ka 2nd MLP Bn, Goeragre u la shah pynkynriah kam ban shimti kum u Superintendent of Police jong ka North Garo Hills hadien ka jingpynkynriahkam ia u Shailendra Bamaniya, IPS.U Kamakhya Prasad, MPS uba long u Commandant jong ka 3rd MLP Bn, Sahbseiñ u la shah pynkynriah kam ban shimti kum u Superintendent of Police, Traffic, Shillong hadien ka jingpynkynriahkam jong u Dr. Dara Aswaghosh, IPS.
title: SHIMTI U K. PRASAD KUM U SP (TRAFFIC), PYNKYNRIAH KAM ÏA KI OPHISAR PULIT HA GARO

content: U Bah Metbah Lyngdoh mynta ka kynti u la shah jied biang ha ka sien kaba ar ban bteng kum u nongialam ba rangbah duh jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP) na ka bynta ka samoi treikam jong u snem 2023-2026.Ia ki nongkitkam la pynskhem ha ka General Council jong ka UDP kaba la long ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha ophis treikam jong ka party ha nongbah Shillong.Kiwei pat ki nongkitkam jong ka party kiba la shah jied ha kane ka sngi ki long u Dr. Jemino Mawthoh kum u General Secretary, ki Working President ba kynthup ia u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, Bah Titostarwell Chyne, Bah Nujorki Sungoh, Bah Lahkmen Rymbui, Bah Donbok Khymdeit, Bah Renikton Tongkhar, u Rikman Sangma bad u L.C. Momin.Ki vice president ki kynthup ia u Bah Allantry F. Dkhar, Bah Process T. Sawkmie, u Bah Shitlang Pale bad u Bah Mayral Born Syiem.Katba ki Secretary ki long u Bah Lasky Rymbai, Bah Jambor War, Bah Balajied Rani, Bah Mitchel Wankhar, Bah Winning Sungoh, Bah G.G. Bung Snaitang, Dr. Aman War, Bah Teinwell Dkhar bad u Bah Monarch Shabong.Ki Joint Secretary ki long u Bah Ryngkat Lyndem, u Bah Sunshine Makri, u Bah Anvil Lyngdoh bad u Bah Tirot Sing Suchiang, Finance Secretary Bah Michael War, Joint Finance Secretary Bah Markynsai Khongwit bad Treasurer Bah Beyondstar Kurbah.Ha kane ka jingialang, la pynskhem biang ia ka Kong Pretty Kharpyngrope kum ka President jong ka Womens Wing bad ka Kong Wandashisha Rynjah kum ka General Secretary.Nalor kine ki nongkitkam la jied ruh ia  u Bah Kyrmen Shylla kum u President jong ka Youth Wing bad u Bah Balajied Synrem kum u Secretary, katba u Bah Olan Sing Suin u la shah jied kum u President jong ka Farmers Wing, u Bah Synshar Lyngdoh Thabah kum u General Secretary bad u Bah Reminton Pyngrope kum u Joint Secretary.La thung ruh ia u BG Momin kum u Advisor jong ka party.Ka Party ka la shim ruh ia ka rai ba ia ki dkhot na rilum Garo yn sa thung ynda la pyndep pynlong ia ka jingialang bakyrpang ka ban sa long shen.
title: SHIMTI BIANG U BAH METBAH LYNGDOH KUM U PRESIDENT RANGBAH KA UDP

content: Ka Jaintia Student Union, Khliehriat Circle hapoh ka jingialam jong u President u Bah Livingson Dkhar Sama ki la iakynduh ia ka Myntri ka tnad ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr.  Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka jingleit iuh kjat jong ka ha Khliehriat ha ka 15 tarik, Nailar, 2023.Ka Myntri ryngkat ki dkhot ka seng kiba la leit jurip ia ka Khliehriat Civil Hospital ki la iakynduh ruh ia ki nongtrei jong kane ka hospital kynthup ia ki doctor bad ia u District Medical & Health Officer jong ka East Jaintia Hills District.Ha kajuh ka por, ki dkhot ka seng ki la pynsngew ia kiba bun ki jingduna ha kane ka jaka ai jingsumar bad na ka liang jong ka Myntri ka la kular ban shna pynheh ia kane ka Hospital khnang ba ki paidbah kin ioh ia ka jingsumar kaba janai.
title: JURIP KA DR. AMPAREEN ÏA KA KHLIEHRIAT CIVIL HOSPITAL, KULAR BAN SHNA PYNHEH

content: Hynñiew ngut ki dkhot jong ka National Liberation Council of Nongkyndong ba la pynkha da ki samla na rilum Khasi bad Jaintia da ka jingthmu ban hiar thma ia ka Sorkar bad ban leh ia ki kam pyntriem ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit jong ka Jylla ha ka 16 tarik u Nailar, 2023.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor da u Deputy Inspector General of Police (Eastern Range), Meghalaya, Shillong u Davis Nestel R. Marak, la iathuh ba ki Pulit jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ki la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat halor ka jingmih pyrthei jong kane ka kynhun kieng atiar kaba la sdang ban thied ia ki tiar siat, ban dawa pisa jubor, ban pynrung dkhot bad ban leh ia ki kam pyntriem.Une u heh Pulit u la iathuh ba ki tnat syntiat ki la ioh ia ka khubor kaba thikna ba kane ka kynhun kieng atiar ba thymmai ka la iatreilang bad kiwei pat ki kynhun kieng atiar na ka jylla Nagaland bad la thmu ruh ban phah pyntbit ia ka kynhun ba nyngkong eh sha ka Jylla Nagaland ha ka 17 tarik u Nailar, 2023.Lyngba kane ka jingioh jingtip, ka tnat Pulit ka la pynlong ia ka jingkhynra kaba jur ha ka step jong ka 16 tarik u Nailar, 2023 bad hynniew ngut ki dkhot ki la ngat ha ka kti jong ki Pulit na ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka Eastern Range ba kynthup ruh ia uwei u khynnah uba dang hapoh 18 snem ka rta uba la shah kem na East Khasi Hills District.Halor kane, ki Pulit ki la rejistar da ka criminal case  ha Crime Branch Police Station, Eastern Range, Shillong hapoh ki kyndon bapher bapher jong ka Indian Penal Code bad hapoh ka Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act.Kine kiba la shah kem ki kynthup ia u Self Styled Chairman, u Commander in Chief, u General Secretary bad ki Area Commander jong ka West Khasi Hills, ka Jaintia Hills, ia ki nongpynrung dkhot , ia u nongbuh jingtip jong kane ka kynhun bad sa lai ngut kiwei pat ki dkhot jong kane kynhun.Ha ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap dien ia ki jaka riehtngen jong ki dkhot kane ka kynhun, ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup ruh ia ki tiar ba donkam ba kynthup ruh ia ki mobile phone bad kiwei kiwei ki kot ki sla.Haduh mynta ki Pulit ki dang pynlong ka jingthwet kaba jur ban iohkem ia ki dkhot jong kane ka kynhun bad ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingmih pyrthei kane ka kynhun kieng atiar ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: MIH KA SENG KIENG ATIAR THYMMAI NLCN, SHAH KEM 7 NGUT KI NONGÏALAM & DKHOT

content: Hadien ba ka Regional Committee jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Assam ki la pan ia ka kaiphod halor ka jingangnud jong ki paidbah ka shnong Baikam ban iasnoh bad ka Jylla Meghalaya, ha ka 16 tarik u Nailar, 2023, u Block Development Officer na ka liang jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad u Circle Officer na ka liang jong ka Sorkar Assam, ki Khasi Pnar kiba sah kane ka shnong kaba hap sha ka Jylla Assam da kawei ka sur ki la pynpaw hakhmat kine ki nongmihkhmat Sorkar ba ki angnud ban pyniasoh ialade sha ka Jylla Meghalaya ha ka jingiapynbeit pud hapdeng ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Assam ha kane ka wat kaba ar.Ha u kyrwoh, ka Secretary jong ka Shnong Baikam ka la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingialang, ki Khasi Pnar shynrang bad kynthei kiba shong basah ha kane ka shnong da kawei ka sur ki la rai ba ki kwah ban pyniasnoh bad ka jylla Meghalaya hynrei lait noh tang ki katto katne ngut kiba kwah ban pyniasoh bad ka Jylla Assam.Kane ka nongialam shnong ka la kyntu ia u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Meghalaya ba un shimkhia ia kane ka jingkwah jong ki Khasi Pnar ba ka sorkar Meghalaya kan kdup ia ki kum ki nong shong shnong bapura jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.
title: DA KA VOICE VOTE RAI KI PAIDBAH KA BAIKAM BAN ÏASNOH BAD KA MEGHALAYA

content: Ryngkat lang bad ka ri India hi baroh kawei ha Eastern West Khasi Hill’s District ha ka 14 tarik u Nailar 2023 ka la rakhe kynmaw burom ia ki lai ngut ki martyr jong kane ka  district kiba la len lade bad aiti ia la ka jong ka jingim ban iada ia ka ri na ka kti jong ki nongshun.Ki lai ngut ki martyr kiba la kynmaw burom ha kane ka sngi, ki long u Bah Eldrin Lyngdoh Nonglait uba sah ha ka shnong na Kynshi Bangla uba dei u Pulit Constable jong ka 3rd MLP Battalion uba la khlad na ka jingshah pynbthei bom IED bad shah siat ha ki suba lehnoh Garo National Liberation Army (GNLA) ha u snem 2014, nangta u Bah Riphinstone Lyngdoh Kynshi na ka shnong Langtor uba dei u Pulit Constable jong ka 3rd MLP Battalion uba la khladnoh na ka jingshah siat ha ki suba lehnoh Achik National Volunteer Council (ANVC) ha u snem 2002 bad u Bah Donbor Nonglait na ka shnong Nonglait uba dei u Pulit Constable ka Special branch uba la khlad na ka jingshah siat ha ki suba lehnoh Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ha u snem 1996.
title: KYNMAW BUROM KA SORKAR JYLLA ÏA KI 3 NGUT KI MARTYR KA EWKH

content: Shillong, Nailar, 16: Ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ka jingwad ban lap dien ia u Bah Rishad Sing Kharmutee uba la jah rngai na Iewduh ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai, ki la lap ia ka met jong u na nala ha Boucher Road, Shillong ha ka sngi baar.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills, u Bah S. Nongtnger, la iathuh, ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai, ha ka por 2:00 baje nohphai sngi, ki Pulit ki la ioh pdiang ia ka jingujor ha Cantonment Beat House na u Bah Teiborlang Kharmutee, 38 snem ba u hynmen jong u, u Bah Rishad Sing Kharmutee uba sah ha Mawdiangdiang, Shillong, u la jah naduh ka 11 tarik, mynta u bnai ha ka por 5:00 baje janmiet bad la iohi khatduh ia u ha jaka ieng Bos Tynring ha Iewduh.“Mar mar, la pynlong ka jingwad ia u briew ba la jah hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Cantonment Beat House bad ha ki jaka kiba marjan hynrei ym shym la lap dien satia. Ki Pulit ka Police Control Room ki la phah ia kane ka jingtip sha baroh ki OC bad IC jong ka District bad ha ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei bad sha ki jylla ka ri India ryngkat bad ka dur jong u briew uba jah ha kane kajuh ka sngi,” la ong u Bah Nongtnger.Ha ka 14 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por kumba 8:40 mynmiet, ki Pulit ka Cantoment Beat House ki la ioh jingtip na Shillong Sadar PS ba ha ka por kumba 5:45 baje janmiet la lap ia kawei ka metiap na nala ha Boucher Road, Shillong. Mar mar la pynkit ia ka met sha Civil Hospital, Shillong ban pynithuh bad ban leh ia ka post mortem examination. Ha kane kajuh ka janmiet, ki bahaing hasem ki la pynshisha ia ka met iap ba u dei u Bah Rishad Sing Kharmutee.Ha ka 15 tarik mynta u bnai, la tohkit bad leh Post Mortem ia ka met iap ha Shillong Civil Hospital, Shillong.Ka Post Mortem examination ka pynpaw ba kam don kano kano ka dak mong shabar ka met bad shapoh jong ka met.  Kam shym don ruh ka jingshah khlong ka khmat katkum ba la pynmih ha ki katto katne ki lad pathai khubor, la iathuh u SP.“La lap ba u Bah Rishad u don ia ka jingpang ha u klongsnam bad ia ki nuksa la phah sha ka FSL ban pynlong ka jingtohkit. La register case ia kane ka jingjia ha Shillong Sadar Police Station bad ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap shuh shuh ia ki jingshisha ka dang iaid shakhmat,” la iathuh u SP.
title: NA NALA HA BOUCHER ROAD LA LAP ÏA KA MET

content: Sa uwei u nongialam jong ka seng kieng atiar National Liberation Council of Nongkyndong ba dang shu pynkha thymmai, u la shah kem ha ki Pulit na Iewduh ha ka step 17 tarik, Nailar, 2023.Une uba la shah kem u la kam ialade ba u dei u self-styled Area Commander jong ka East Khasi Hills District, ong ki Pulit.Ka jingiohkem jong ki Pulit ia ki dkhot ka NLCN ka la kiew sha ka 11 ngut ba kynthup ruh ia uwei u khynnah skul uba dang 16 snem ka rta uba dang pule ha ka Class-10, la iathuh ki Pulit.U Heh Pulit u la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la pynlong ka jingthwet kaba jur ban ioh kem lut ia baroh ki dkhot jong kane ka seng kieng atiar bathymmai.Ia kine kiba la shah kem, ki Pulit ki la tian bishar ha ka Kashari ha ka 17 tarik u Nailar, 2023 bad ki Pulit ki la pan por ruh na ka Kashari ban set ha along ki Pulit khnang ba kin ioh pynlong shuh shuh ia ki jingtohkit kiba kham bniah.
title: NA ÏEWDUH KEM KI PULIT SA UWEI U AREA COMMANDER KA NLCN

content: U Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar uba long Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla bad u Chairman jong ka Regional Committee na ka bynta ka West Jaintia Hills u la iathuh ba ia ka khyrdop khrong khajna lane ka Entry Tax Gate ba la pynieng da ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council la weng noh na ka shnong ha ka 16 tarik u Nailar, 2023.U Bah Sniawbhalang dhar u la pynbna ia kane ha ka jingleit sorjamin jong ka Regional Committee na ka bynta ka West Jaintia Hills District bad ka Regional Committee na ka bynta ka West Karbi Anglong District ba la ialam da u Pijush Hazarika uba long u Myntri ka sorkar Assam.Ki nongialam jong ka Regional Commmitee ki pynlong ruh ia ka jingialang bad ki nongialam jong ka Dorbar Shnong Khanduli ha madan ialehkai ha ka shnong Khanduli bad hadien kane, la pynlong pat sa ia ka jingialang bad ki paid Karbi ha Police Border Outpost ka Assam, ha Khanduli.Ha ka jingialang ki nongialam jong ka Dorbar Shnong Khanduli, ki la aiti ia ka dorkhas halor ki lai tylli ki mat jingdawa, kata ban weng shisyndon ia ka Entry Tax Gate jong ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council kaba la pynieng mynta dang kumba saw bnai eiei ha ka shnong Khanduli, ban weng noh ia ki Pulit Assam ha ka jaka ba la buh ia kane ka khyrdop khrong khajana bad ban weng ia ka Police Camp jong ka Jylla Assam na Khanduli.Hadien  kane ka jingialang, ki nongialam jong ka Regional Committee ki la hiar jurip haduh u Zero Point jong ka Khanduli kaba dang hap hapoh u pud jong ka West Jaintia Hills District.Hadien ka jingjurip ia kine ki ar tylli ki jaka, ki nongialam jong ki Regional Committee ki la pynlong sa ka jingialang bad ki nongmihkhmat na ki jaidbynriew Karbi bad ki nongialam jong ki sengbhalang kiba kynthup ia ka Karbi Students Association, ka Socheng Amreng Border Development Committee, ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council bad kiwei kiwei.
title: KAM U DY. CM BA LA WENG ÏA KA ENTRY TAX GATE KA KAAC HA KHANDULI

content: : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ryngkat u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ha ka sngi Palei ki la iashim bynta ha ka ‘8th Annual General Meeting’ jong ka All Jaiñtia Muster Roll Workers & Labour Union, Central Executive Committee (CEC) ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Union of Cook cum Helpers PM Poshan, Meghalaya, Jowai kaba la long ha Madan Kawang, Ummulong.Da ki phew spah ngut ki  nongtrei Muster Roll ha ki tnad sorkar bapher bapaher, ki nongshet ja sngi Mid Day Meal, ki Misteri bad baroh ki nongbylla sngi kiba don hapoh ka East bad West Jaiñtia Hills District ki la iashim bynta ha kane ka lympungbah.U Myntri Rangbah haba kren ha kane ka sngi kum u Kongsan u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen ban ïadon bynta ha kane ka sngi leh burom ka AJMW&LU ïa u.   U la ong ka jingwan khnang mynta ka sngi kum ka Sorkar ka long ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki nongtrei Muster Roll bad ong ruh ba ka jingpoi jong u sha ka kyrdan Myntri Rangbah ka dei lyngba ka jingpynïaid jong U Blei kaba u khlem poi pyrkhat ïa kane namar ha u snem 2018 um shym la long u MLA.Hapdeng ki jingïaid lynti jong ka Sorkar hapoh ka jingïalam ka NPP naduh u snem 2018 ka la ïa kynduh shibun ki jingeh, hynrei ka Sorkar kam shym la kynran dien ha ka rukom treikam naduh ka kynhun Myntri sha ki MLA, na ki Chief Secreatary sha u IAS ophisar, na ki MCS sha ki Engineer tad haduh ki nongrep bad ki khun samla bad kane ka Sorkar ka long ïa baroh naduh kiba heh haduh kiba rit, ong Myntri Rangbah.U la pynsngew naduh ki snem kiba la leit na ka liang u Bah K. Pariat bad u kiba ju ïakren ïa ka jingeh kaba ki nongtrei Muster Roll ki ïa kynduh, kumjuh ïa ki nongshet ja sngi ha ki skul wat ha ka por ba um pat long u Myntri Rangbah.  Hynrei naduh u snem 2018 ha ka jingïalang ka kynhun Myntri ha ka sien kaba ar la shimkhia ïa kane jingeh jong ki Muster Roll ban pynïoh noh ïa ka tulop kaba manla u bnai kumba ïoh lem kiwei bad ban kyntiew ïa ka tulop manla u snem.U la ong ruh ki paidbah ki tip khambha ïa ki kam ba kane ka Sorkar ka la leh bad ha kane ka kynti ka Sorkar hapoh ka jingïalam ka NPP ka la ïoh ban wan biang ha ka bor namar ka jingshañiah jong u paidbah. “Hooid ki don shibun ki jingshah kynthoh hynrei kum ka Sorkar kan ïai trei na ka bynta ka jingbha jingmiat jong ka jylla hi baroh kawei da kaba wanrah ïa ka jingkylla ha kine ki sngi ban wan,” u la ong.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka dorkhas ba la aiti da ka AJMW&LU u Myntri Rangbah u la kular ban pyntreikam kat ka bor jong u na ka bynta ki mat jingdawa, wat lada ym lah ban pyntreikam ïa baroh.Kum ka dak ka jingburom ïa ka Sorkar halor ka jingleh bha ïa ki jingdawa, ka Seng ka la pynkup burom ïa u Myntri Rangbah bad kumjuh ïa u Symbud Myntri Rangbah bad ïa ki nongïalam ka seng kiba la trei shitom met bad mynsiem ban pynïaid beit pynïaid ryntih ïa ki kam ba bha jong ka seng.U Myntri Rangbah  u la pynkup burom ruh ia u samla uba wan na ka longiing jong ki Muster Roll uba wan ha ka kyrdan kaba shakhmat ha ka eksamin SSLC mynta u snem.U Adviser jong ka seng u Bah Khroo. L. Pariat u la kyrpad hakhmat u Myntri Rangbah ba un ïarap ïa ki khun jong ki nongtrei bylla sngi ba ka Sorkar kan pynïoh lem ïa ka bhah kumba 10 percent ha ka rukom tungkam thungjam bad ka bhah pule puthi.U la kyntu ruh ia ka Sorkar kan ai jingïada ïa ki wah kiba doh hapoh ka Ri-Lum Jaiñtia kum ka wah Kupli, Myntdu, Myntang bad ka Myngngot khang ba yn ïoh ïa ka umbam kaba khuid ba suba. La pynshong kun ïa kane ka sngi da ki jingrwai bad ki jingshad tynrai.
title: DAWA 10% KA BHAH THUNGKAM BAD KA BHAH PULE ÏA KI KHUN JONG KI NONGBYLLA SNGI

content: Hadien ba ka Karbi Anglong Student Association (KSA) ka la kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi ba ki Regional Committee jong ka Sorkar Assam bad Meghalaya ki la leit ban ia kynduh ha ki thain khappud jong ki ar-tylli ki Jylla ha Khanduli ha ka 16 tarik u Nailar 2023, ki nongialam ka KSA ki la byrthen ba kan long kum ha Manipur lada ki duh noh ia ki jaka ki puta kiba ki kam ba ki dei ki jong ki.“Na ka liang ka Seng ngi kwah ban pynpaw ba ki paradoh parasnam ki jong ngi kim dei ban duh ia ki jaka ki puta kiba dei ka hok ka kynti ka jong ki, ngi kren shai ba shi inshi ngim kwah ki jong kiwei bad shi inshi ngim dei ban duh ia ki jaka ki puta ki jong ngi,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Publicity Secretary ka KSU West Jaintia Hills Unit u Samla Juhhi Tariang.“Ka sorkar Meghalaya ka dei ban shimkhia ia ka jingbyrthen ka KSA halor ka kam ia pynbeit pud namar ki ong ba kin pynkylla kumba jia ha Manipur.  Ngi pdiang sngewbha bad ngi long kiba la kloi ban tyngkhuh bad ngim shym la bythen hynrei lada ki sdang hi ngim dei ki matlah bad ki kyllut,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.“Na ka liang ka Seng kan iai don barabor bad ki nongshong shnong kiba don ha ki thaiñ khappud bad lada jia ei ei kiba sdang kin hap ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh,” la ong u Kyrwoh na ka KSU.
title: NGI PDIANG SNGEWBHA BAD NGI LONG KIBA LA KLOI BAN ÏA TYNGKHUH : KSU WJH

content: Ka Expert Committee jong ka tnat District Council Affairs ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynphai biang sha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous Districti Council haduh 8 tylli ki Bill lane ki Aiñ Rew, kata, 7 tylli na ka tnat Elaka bad kawei pat ka dei ka Clan Bill.  Ia kane la pyntip da u Chief Executive member jong ka Khasi  Khasi Hills Autonomous Districti Council u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingiakynduh ia u Lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei, u Bah Pyniaid u la iathuh ruh ba ka Executive Committee jong ka ka Council ka la ai khublei kyrpang ia u Lat ka Jylla halor ka jingai jingmynjur ia ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District (Establishment, Managagement and Control of Markets) (Second Amendment) Regulation, Act, 2021 ba la mynjur da ka iingdorbar Thawain ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ha u snem 2021.“Na ka liang jong ka Executive Committee kan sa shong noh mardor ban peit ia ki jingduna halor kine ki Bill shwa ba ngin phah biang sha ka tnat DCA ban ioh ia ka jingmynjur na u Lat ka Jylla,” u la ong.
title: PHRA TYLLI KI AIÑ-REW PYNPHAI BIANG KA DCA SHA KA KHADC

content: Uwei u rangbah uba la 38 snem ka rta, ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Shanbor Surong, u khun jong u (L) Bah Teibor Lyngdoh Marshyllong u la jah rngai ha ka 17 tarik, Nailar, 2023 katba u dang mih iing ka Nia Kha na Patarim, Mawlai Nongkwar ha ka por 2:00 baje mynstep ban leit phai sha la ing sah ha Jaiaw Pdeng, Shillong.Ha ka ejahar ba la ujor da ki bahaiing hasem sha ki Pulit jong ka Mawlai Police Station, ki la pyntip ruh ba ki la pyrshang ban telephone ia u ha u nombar 7638944245 hynrei  um shym la shim satia ia ka phone.“Ngi la pyrshang ban telephone ia i Kha jong ngi, i la iathuh ba i (Bah Shanbor) la mih na ing jong i ha ka por 2:00 baje mynstep,” la iathuh ki bahaiing.“Hynrei ha ka por 9:00 baje mynstep ngi la ioh pdiang ia ka phone call na ka mobile phone jong i (Bah Shanbor) hynrei la kren pynban da uwei u briew uba la ioh khar ia ka mobile phone na Mawlai Nongkwar Patarim. Ngi la leit shim noh ia ka mobile phone na uba la iohtam bad ngi la pyrshang ban wad ia u hymmen jong ngi hynrei haduh kane ka khyllipmat ngim shym la lap satia ia i,” la ong iathuh shuh shuh ki bahaiingLa pyntip ruh ba u Bah Shanbor Surong u phong da ka sopti T-Shirt rong iong, ka patlun Jeans rong blue bad ka sandal. U don ia ka jingjrong kaba saw phut shiteng eiei, ka sniehdoh kaba lieh bad ka dak sohkhliang na ka liang khmat ka mon.Ki bahaïing hasem ki la kyrpad ruh ia kino kino kiba iohi ia une u rangbah kin pyntip lyngba u Mobile Phone: 8219449850.
title: JAH U BAH SHANBOR SURONG KATBA DANG MIH NA MAWLAI NONGKWAR SHA JAÏAW PDENG

content: Shwa ba ki ar tylli ki Regional Commmittee jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Assam kin leit sorjamin ia ki jaka kiba don hapdeng ka jingiakajia pud ha ka jingiapynbeit pud jong ka wat kaba ar, ka Boundary Committee jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous Council (KHADC) ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la lum lang ia baroh ki khlieh nongsynshar jong kine ki jaka kiba don hapdeng ka jingiakajia pud.Ka jinglum jong ka KHADC ia kine ki Syiem jong ki Hima bad ia ki khlieh nongsynshar Raid ka long ban pynsngewthuh janai ba kin dup pynsngewthuh pat sha ki paidbah jong ki shnong kiba don ha ka jingiakajia pud ba kin pynpaw beit da kawei ka sur kaba shai ba kin iai neh hapoh ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ki shnong kiba don ha ka jingiakajia pud hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad ka Assam ki long ka shnong Desh Domria kaba hap hapoh ka Hima Mylliem, ka shnong Borduar kaba hap ha ka Hima Nongspung bad hima nongkhlaw, ka shnong Nongwah-Mawtamur kaba hap ha ka Hima Sohiong bad ha ka Hima Jirang, ka shnong Langpih kaba hap hapoh ka Hima Nongmynsaw bad ka Block-II kaba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam ka Raid Nongtung jong ka Hima Khyrim.U Deputy Chief Executive Member (Dy. CEM) ka Council u Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang u la ong ba ka Council ka la kyntu ia ki Syiem bad ia ki nongsynshar jong ki Raid ba kin pynsngewthuh shai ia ki paidbah ba kin dup mih ryntih ha kano kano ka por ba ki nongialam jong ki Regional Committee na ka jylla Meghalaya bad na ka jylla Assam ki leit ban sorjamin bad ban pynpaw paidbah ia ka mon jong ki ban don beit hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: SHWA BAN HIAR KI RC SHA KI JAKA ÏAKAJIA PUD, LUM KA KHADC ÏA KI BOR HIMA

content: Saw ngut ki dkhot jong ka seng kieng atiar ba thymmai ka ‘National Liberation Council of Nongkyndong (NLCN)’ ba la shah kem na rilum Jaiñtia la wanrah sha nongbah Shillong ha ka sngi thohdieng bad la tian bishar ïa ki ha Kashari.Haduh mynta ki Pulit ki dang pynjur ïa ka jingkhynra ha kylleng ka rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia ban ïohkem lut ïa ki dkhot jong kane ka kynhun.U Deputy Inspector General of Police (Eastern Range) u Davis NR Marak u la ong ba kam shym la don shuh kano kano ka jingïohkem ïa ki dkhot kane ka kynhun haduh mynta.“Dei tang kine ki saw ngut kiba la ïohkem na Jowai, la wanrah bad la tian bishar ha Kashari mynta ka sngi,” u la ong.Ka Kashari ka la aibor ban set ha along ki Pulit na ka bynta shiphew sngi. Haduh mynta, ki don baroh 11 ngut ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot jong ka NLCN kiba la shah kem.  U Marak u la ïathuh, ïa kine kiba la ïohkem la wanrah sha Shillong na ka bynta ban pynlong shuh shuh ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.Arngut bad kynthup ruh ïa kawei ka kynthei bad uwei u dkhot ba la wanrah na Jowai sha Shillong mynta ka sngi ki la kem pang bad poi sha Hospital.U DIG u la ïathuh ba kane ka kynthei ka la kam ba ka la armet mynta la lai bnai hynrei ynda la leh test la lap ba kam shym la long satia kumta.  Namarkata, ki doktor ki la hap ban bat shwa ïa ka ha Hospital na ka bynta ban khmih bniah.Shuh shuh u DIG u la ïathuh ba ka jingthwet haduh mynta ka dang ïaid shakhmat ban ïohkem ïa kiwei pat ki dkhot. “Ngi dang khmihlynti ban ïohkem shuh shuh sa katto katne ngut ha ki sngi ki ban sa wan bad kata kan jia tang hadien ba ngi la lah ban tohkit bniah ïa kine kiba la shahkem,” ong u DIG.U la ïathuh ba u Investigating Officer bad ka kynhun ki dang bunkam ban rah sha Hospital ban leh ïa ka medical checkup bad ban tian bishar ïa kine kiba la ïohkem ha Kashari..“Ïa mynta hi ka jingtohkit kaba janai kam pat sdang satia,” u la bynrap.U DIG u la ong ba ka tnat Pulit jong ka Jylla ka dang pyrshang ban wad bniah la ka NLCN ka don jingïadei neem bad kano kano ka kynhun kieng atiar na ka jylla Nagaland.“Ngam pat lah ban ong la kan dei ka NSCN.  Ki (NLCN) la ïakren bad ki katto katne ngut ki dkhot (ha Nagaland) hynrei na kano ka kynhun, ïa kata ngin dang hap ban tih bniah.  Ngin sa pyrshang ban wad bniah kano ka kynhun kaba dei shisha namarba ka NSCN ka don bynta ki kynhun bad ngin hap ban wad bniah la ka dei ka NSCN lane kiwei kiwei pat ki kynhun bad ïa kata ngin dang hap ban tih bniah bin pa bin,” u la ong.Shuh shuh, u DIG u la ïathuh ba ka tnat Pulit kan pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah la kane ka kynhun kieng atiar ba thymmai ka don jingïadei ne em bad u Bah Joannes Lamare uba dei u nongtrei mon sngewbha uba la shah kem ha u snem 2021, halor ka jingkynnoh ba la pan jingïarap na ka NSCN-IM ban thaw ïa ka seng kieng atiar kaba thymmai ha Meghalaya.Ïa u Bah Lamare ki Pulit ki la kem katba u dang wan phai na Hebron Camp jong ka NSCN kaba don ha Dimapur.“Ïa mynta, ngim pat lah ba ong, la u don jingkti ne um don kti eiei.  Ngim pat lap sabut hynrei ha ka jingtohkit lada ngi ïoh ksai ngin sa tih bniah ïa kane ruh ka bynta.  Ngi la buh jingmut bha ïa kane ka bynta namarba u (Bah Lamare) la shah kem hadien ba la wan phai na ka jylla Nagaland,” la ong u DIG.Ha kajuh ka por, ka tnat Pulit jong ka Jylla ka la pyntip ruh ïa ka jingmih pyrthei ka NLCN sha ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA).“Haoid, ngi la pyntip sha ka MHA namarba ha kano kano ka por haba ngi register case hapoh ka Unlawful Activities Prevention Act, ngi hap ban pyntip sha ka MHA hapoh shi bnai,” la ïathuh u DIGHa ka sngi Balang mynta ka taiew, hynñiew ngut ki dkhot jong ka (NLCN) bad kynthup ïa uwei u khynnah skul uba dang 16 snem ka rta ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit jong ka Jylla.Ki Pulit ki la ïoh jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ba ka NLCN ka la ïatreilang bad kiwei pat ki kynhun kieng atiar na ka jylla Nagaland bad la thmu ruh ban phah pyntbit ïa ka kynhun ba nyngkong eh sha ka Jylla Nagaland ha ka 17 tarik, Nailar, 2023.Lyngba kane ka jingtip ba bniah, ka tnat Pulit ka la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra kaba jur ha ka step jong ka 16 tarik u Nailar, 2023 bad hynniew ngut ki dkhot ki la ngat ha ka kti jong ki Pulit na ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka Eastern Range ba kynthup ruh ïa uwei u khynnah uba dang hapoh 18 snem ka rta uba la shah kem na East Khasi Hills District.Halor kane, ki Pulit ki la rejistar da ka Criminal Case hapoh ka Crime Branch Police Station, Eastern Range, Shillong bad pyngnat ha ki kyndon bapher bapher jong ka Indian Penal Code (IPC) bad hapoh ka Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act.Kine kiba la shah kem ki kynthup ïa u Self Styled Chairman, u Commander in Chief, u General Secretary bad ki Area Commander jong ka West Khasi Hills, ka Jaiñtia Hills, ïa ki nongpynrung dkhot, ïa u nongbuh jingtip jong kane ka kynhun bad sa lai ngut kiwei pat ki dkhot jong kane kynhun.Ha ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ban lap dien ïa ki jaka riehtngen jong ki dkhot kane ka kynhun, ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup ruh ïa ki tiar ba donkam ba kynthup ruh ïa ki mobile phone bad kiwei kiwei ki kot ki sla.
title: KAM KA DKHOT KYNTHEI KA NLCN BA LA ARMET LA 3 BNAI, LAP KI DOKTOR BA KHLEM ARMET

content: Ia ka met jong uwei u rangbah uba la 38 snem ka rta, ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Shanbor Surong, uba la jah rngai naduh ka 17 tarik, Nailar, 2023 katba u dang mih na iing ka Nia Kha na ka shnong Patarim, Mawlai Nongkwar ha ka por 2:00 baje mynstep ban leit phai noh sha la ing sah kaba don ha Jaiaw Pdeng, Shillong la lap ia ka met jong u ha ka 21 tarik u Nailar, 2023 na riat Sonapani.Ia ka met jong u Bah Shanbor Surong la lap hadien ba uwei u Pulit Home Guard uba ap pahara ia kawei na ki Power House jong ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited kaba don ha Lumkshaid u la iohi ia kawei ka metiap kaba per ha sla um ha Sonapani ka por kumba 11:00 baje mynstep.Mar mar une u Pulit Home Guard u la pyntip noh sha ki bor Pulit, ha kaba ki Pulit jong ka Lumdiengjri Police Station ki la leit ban shimti noh ia kane ka met jong u Bah Surong. Ki bahaing hasem kiba la wan poi ha Sonapani ki la pynshisha ba ka met iap ka dei ka jong u Bah Shanbor Surong. Hadien ba la sei ia ka met na wah, ki Pulit ki la pynkit noh ia ka met iap sha Shillong Civil Hospital, na ka bynta ban leh ia ka post-mortem khnang ban lap ia ka daw tynrai halor ka jingiap jong u Bah Shanbor Surong hashwa ban aiti sha ki bahaing hasem na ka bynta ban pyndep ia ka jinglehniam kaba khatduh.
title: NA RIAT SONAPANI LAP KI PULIT ÏA KA MET JONG U BAH SHANBOR SURONG

content: Da kaba buh hakhmat ïa ka thong ban pynsuk ïa ki paidbah ban poi kham kloi sha ki jaka ba ki thmu ban leit namar ka jingdheng kali kaba shyrkhei ha nongbah Shillong, ka JETS24x7, ïa kaba la seng da ki katto katne ngut ki samla Khasi ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pyllait paidbah ïa ki thuk thuk ar shaka (e-scooty) ban kamai da kaba pyndonkam ïa u Mobile App.Ïa ki e-scooty bad e-Auto la kaweh lama da ka Editor jong ka Kotkhubor The Shillong Times, ka Padmashree Kong Patricia Mukhim kaba la long ka Kongsan ryngkat ka jingdon lang jong u President ka Shillong Press Club (SPC) u Bah David Laitphlang, u Managing Director ka JETS24x7 u samla Pynskhemlang Uriah bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.Ka Kong Patricia Mukhim haba kren kum ka Kongsan shwa ban pyllait ïa u Mobile App bad kaweh lama ka la ong, “nga dei ka briew kaba nyngkong eh ba ngan phaikhmat ïa kum kine ki jingai jingshakri.  Haba ngi leit jingleit shabar bad haba ngi slem ban leit phai sha la ka jaka sah ngi shu khot ïa ki Uber ne Ola ngi la ïoh.  Hynrei balei keiñ ngim ïoh ïa kano kano ka kam Aggregator hangne (ha Meghalaya) ba ngin suk ma ngi ki paidbah khnang ba kan ïarap ha baroh ar liang.  Kine (JETS24x7) kin ïoh kamai bad ngi ruh ngin ïoh ka jingsuk bad ka don ka ruh ka jingshngaiñ lada don kine ki thuk thuk ar shaka.”Ka la pynshlur ruh ïa ki nongpynïaid jong ka JETS24x7 ban ïakren bad ki bor Sorkar haba pyntyllun ïa kane ka jingai jingshakri sha ki paidbah.“Ka Sorkar ka dei ban shakri ïa u paidbah. Kam dei kaei kaei kaba ngi hap ban leit nguh leit dem. Ngi hap pyni ha ki (Sorkar) ba ngin leh ïa ka bussiness.  Phi dei ban don ïa ka jingtyrwa kaba biang. Ka Bussiness Model kaba biang, ka Revenue Model kaba biang.  Ynda la biang lut nadong shadong balei kin pynjynjar ïa phi,” la ong ka Kong Patricia.Haba kyntu ïa kane ki samla kiba pynïaid ïa kane ka shlem ai jingshakri, ka Kong Patricia ka la bynrap, “phi dei ban don ruh hakhmat ïa ka thong bad kaba kongsan ka long ka jingtrei shitom.  Kane ka jingim kaba mynta kam dei shuh ka jingim kaba suk kum mynshwa. Mynshwa ki wan wad na ing ban ai kam, hynrei mynta ka la poi ka jingeh. Ngi ïohsngew ruh ba u Myntri Rangbah u ong ba ngim lah shuh ban ai kam, ka Sorkar kam lah shuh ban seng kam.  Kaba ngi lah mynta ka long ba ngin trei da lade na ka bynta ïalade.”“Ngi sngewkmen ba phi don ïa kane ka jingthmu bad ka thong ban long Aggregator kaba nyngkong eh ha Meghalaya.  Nalor ka jingïakhun bad kiwei pat ka dei ban don ruh ka jingsngewthuh kaba jylliew ha ka rukom pynïaid ïa ka bussiness,’ la ong shuh shuh ka Kong Patricia.“Ngi kum ki nongthoh khubor ngi long kiba kloi ban kyrshan ïa phi ha kiei kiei kiba bha kiba phi pyrshang ban leh.  Ngi  kwah ban iohi ba ki samla kin trei ïa ka kam hynrei ym ban shu leit dawa pisa na manla ki dukan, na ki kontraktor namar kane ka jingleh kan pynhiar dor ïa ka jaitbynriew jong ngi bad ïa ka Jylla jong ngi. Lada ngi trei minot, U Blei ruh Un kyrkhu, ka spah ruh kan wan hi,” la ai mynsiem shuh shuh ka Kong Patricia.U Managing Director, samla Pynskhemlang u la ïathuh ba ïa ka JETS24x7 kaba la bsut ruh ïa ka tien phira, “kyntiew ïa la ki jong” ka dei kaba la sdang ha u Ïaiong, 2022. “Ban poi haduh kane ka khyllipmat, ka la shim por ïa ngi haduh shisnem tam. Ka jingmih jong ka JETS24x7 ka dei na ka daw ka jingbym ïohkam ïohjam,” la ong une u samla.“Kum ki samla haba ngi peit ïa ka jylla kaba la ïaid lynti la 51 snem hynrei haduh mynta ngim pat don ka Aggregator na kane ka Jylla.  Kum ka kynhun ngi la ïatrei shitom, miet la bad sngi bad nga sngewkmen lyngba ka jingïatreilang ngi la lah ban pynurlong ïa kane ka jingthmu,” u la ong.“Ngi kyrmen skhem ba kane ka jingshakri kaba ngi ai kan long ka jingïohnong ïa ki paidbah, ïa kiba donkam ïa kane ka jingshakri. Katba ngi lah ngin ai ïa ka dor kaba pynhun ïa ki nongpyndonkam. Da ka jingkyrshan jong ki nongshong shnong ka Jylla ngin dup lah ban pyntyllun ïa kane ka jingshakri ha ki snem ki ban nang tyllun nangne shakhmat,” u la bynrap.Da kaba pynpaw ïa ki jingshah tynjuh kiba ap hakhmat namar ka jingdon jong ki Kompeni kiba nabar ka jylla kiba la ïaid kham shakhmat ha ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka teknoloji, u samla Uriah u la ong, “ngi donkam ïa ka jingkyrshan lem jong ki paidbah ba ngin dup lah ban ïaineh ha kane ka kam namarba ki bun ki kompeni kiba nabar ka jylla kiba la kham kiew shakhmat ha ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka teknoloji bad kiba la kham ïar ka jingshakri da ki snem ki snem.”U la ïathuh ba ym slem shuh ka JETS24x7 kan sa pyllait paidbah sa ïa ki Scooty bad ki Auto Rickshaw kiba ïaid da ka petrol ban kham pynjanai shuh shuh ïa ka jingshakri.
title: MIH KA JETS24x7 BAN PYLLAIT ÏA KI PAIDBAH NA KA DHENG KALI DA KI THUK THUK AR SHAKA

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council ha ka sngi baar ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Chairman jong ka Meghalaya Public Service Commission (MPSC), ban dawa ba dei ban pynbna noh ia ka result jong ka post Assistant Engineer ha ka tnat Community and Rural Development.Ha ka shithi ka seng ka la pynpaw ba ka MPSC ka la khot aplikeshon na ka bynta ki post bapher bapher lyngba ka Advertisement No. MPSC/ADVT-54/1/2020-21/70 ha ka 14 tarik, Nohprah, 2020.“Ha ka Serial No. 7 jong ka Advertisement, la khot aplikeshon ban pyndap na ka bynta ki 35 tylli ki Posts jong ki Assistant Engineer ha ka tnat Community and Rural Development hapoh ka Meghalaya Rural Engineering Services (MRES). Lyngba ka Notice No. MPSC/Ex-C/22/2021-2022/102 kaba la pynmih ha ka 3 tarik, Lber, 2023, la pyntip sha baroh ki nongaplai kam ba ka Written Examination kan long ha ka 18 tarik, Lber, 2023 ha ki ar tylli ki Centre, kata, ha Shillong bad ha Tura. Katkum ka jingioh jingtip jong ngi, ia kane ka eksamin la pynlong ha ka sngi bad ha ka por ba la buh na ka bynta palat shi hajar ngut ki nongaplai kam bad ia ka eksamin la pynlong da kaba pyndonkam ia ki OMR sheets,” la ong ka Seng ha ka shithi ba la soi da u General Secretary jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths’ Council (HYC), Central Executive Council u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem.“Hynrei, la palat san bnai ki la iaid naduh ba ladep pynlong ia ka eksamin na ka bynta ki post ba la kdew haneng hynrei haduh mynta ka Commission kam pat shym la pynbna satia ia ka result jong ka written examination. Ha ka jingshisha, ka jingpyndonkam ia ka OMR sheets ha ki eksamin bapher bapher ka la pynstet ia ka kam bad ka jingpynkhreh ia ka resulut ka la kham kloi bad ka pynduna ruh wat ia ki jingbakla.  Hynrei ha kane kane ka jingpynslem ia ka result jong ka Witten examination da ka Commission ka la pynmih bun ki jingartatien halor ka jingkhuid jingsuba ha kaba pyndep ia ka jingthungkam bad kumjuh ruh kaba la ktah shikatdei eh ia ki nongthep kam la ka long ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat bad ha ka ioh ka kot. Ka jingpynslem shuh shuh kan wanrah shuh shuh ia ki jingeh ia ka jingpalat ka rta thepkam jong kine ki nongaplai kam ha ki por ki ban sa wan,” la kynthoh ka Seng.“Namarkata, ngi dawa jur ia ka Commission ba ka dei ban shimkhia ban pynbna noh ia ka result jong ki nongaplai kam kiba pas ha ka Written examination bad ban khot ruh mardor ia ka interview na ka bynta ki nongaplai kam bad ban pyndep noh mardor ia ka jingthungkam hapoh ka por kaba biang hynrei lym kumta, ngim donlad shuh da kumwei pat hynrei ban shu pynlong beit da ki jingiakhih pyrshah ia ka Commission,” la byrngem ka seng.“Ngi kyrmen bad ngi kyntu ia phi kum u Khlieh jong ka Commission ban shimkhia lem ia kane ka jingdawa ba shongnia na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki samla bad ka jylla baroh kawei,” la bynrap ka Seng.
title: SAN BNAI YM PAT PYNBNA KA MPSC ÏA KA RESULT ASST. ENGINEER HA KA TNAT C&RD

content: Ki Pulit ka Jylla ki la ioh kurup ia ka Register ba la thoh ia ki kyrteng bad ia ki jingtip kiba bniah jong ki dkhot ba la pynrung ha ka National Liberation Council of Nongkyndong (NLCN), ka kynhun kieng atiar ba dang shu seng thymmai.Ka tyllong khubor ba la iohlum ha ka lah sngi U Blei, ka la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup ia ki kot ki sla ba donkam bad kynthup ia ka Register kaba don ia ki kyrteng ba palat 100 ngut ki briew ba la pynrung kum ki dkhot ha kane ka kynhun hadien ka jingiohkem ia uwei na ki nongialam jong kane ka kynhun.Ki Pulit ki la pynlong ruh ka jingkhynra ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia ban ioh kem ia ki dkhot jong kane ka kynhun kiba la paw kyrteng ha ka Register.Haduh 11 ngut ki dkhot kynthup ruh 4 ngut ki nongialam jong ka NLCN ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit.  Ia kine, la wanrah sha nongbah Shillong bad la tian bishar ha Kashari, kaba la aibor ia ki Pulit ban set ha along ki Pulit 8-10 sngi na ka bynta ban pynlong shuh shuh ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah. Arngut ki dkhot kynthup ia kawei ka kynthei ki la kem pang bad don mynta ha Hospital.Ha ka taiew baladep, hynñiew ngut ki dkhot jong kane ka kynhun ki la shah kem na ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka East Khasi Hills kynthup ia uwei u khynnah skul uba dang pule ia ka Class-X. Kine kiba la shah kem ki kynthup ia saw ngut ki nongialam, kata u self-styled Chairman, u Commander-In-Chief, u General Secretary bad ki Area Commander jong ka West Khasi Hills, u Area Commander jong ka Jaiñtia Hills, nongpynrung dkhot bad nongbuh jingtip bad lai ngut ki dkhot.Ka NLCN ka la iateh lok bad kiwei pat ki kynhun kieng atiar na ka jylla Nagaland bad thmu ruh ban phah hikai pyntbit ia ki dkhot ba nyngkong eh sha Nagaland ha ka 17 tarik, Nailar, 2023. Ia ka NLCN la pynkha ha Eastern Range (Khasi bad Jaiñtia Hills) da ki samla na rilum Khasi-Jaiñtia da ka jingthmu ban hiar thma ia ka Sorkar bad ban leh ia ki kam pyntriem da kaba thied ia ki tiar siat bad ki tiar pynbthei, ban dawa pisa, ban pynrung dkhot, ban phah hikai pyntbit ia ki dkhot, ban thaw ia ki ktem riehtngen bad ban iasylla ban leh ia ki kam pyntriem.Ki Pulit ki la rejistar da ka criminal case ha Crime Branch Police Station, Eastern Range, Shillong, hapoh ki kyndon aiñ bapher bapher jong ka Indian Penal Code (IPC) bad ka Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act (UAPA). Ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ia ka jingkhynra ia ki jaka sah jong ki nongialam kane ka kynhun ki la ioh kurup ia ki tiar ba donkam bad ia ki mobile phone kynthup ruh ia ki kot ba donkam.Ka NLCN ka la buh thong ban pynrung dkhot palat 1500 ngut, ia kiba yn phah hikai pyntbit sha ka jylla Nagaland. Haduh mynta, ka NLCN ka ladep pynrung palat 100 ngut ki dkhot.Ia ka NLCN la pynkha ha u snem baladep hynrei ka jingpynrung dkhot ka la sdang naduh ar bnai mynshwa. Ka thong jong ka NLCN ka long ban pynkhlaiñ ia ka bor treikam palat ban ia ka HNLC kaba la shah kheiñ be-aiñ.
title: KURUP KI PULIT KA JYLLA ÏA KA REGISTAR PYNRUNG KYRTENG ÏA KI DKHOT KA NLCN

content: Ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia & Garo People (FKJGP) Seng Kmie ha ka sngi baar ka la phah leh tes ha Pastuer Institute, Shillong ia ka um ba la shim nuksa na ki shnong bapher bapher bad na ki kor um sorkari kiba kiba don hapoh ka jylli jong ka Sor Shillong ia kiba la sam da ka tnat Public Health Engineering (PHE) bad ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB).Ia ka um, la rah sha ka tnat Food & Safety kaba don ha Pastuer Institute, ha Lawmali ban phah leh tes khnang ban pynthikna la ka um ka long ne em kaba bit ba ki paidbah kin pyndonkam kum ka umbam umdih bad ha ka shet ka tiew, ha ka sum ka sait.U President ka seng u Bah Dundee C. Khongsit ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u la iathuh ba ka jingphah leh tes ia ka um hadien ba la shim nuksa na ki shnong bapher bapher ka long hadien ba ka seng ka la ioh ia ka jingujor na ki paidbah nongshong shnong kiba la pynpaw ba ki don ka jingsngewsyier, ka jingartatien ban dih ia ka um ba la sam da ka tnat PHE bad ka Municipal.U la iathuh ruh ba ka jingphah leh tes ia ka um kan sa long ruh wat ha ki District bapher bapher jong ka Jylla khnang ban pynthikna ba ka umbam umdih jong ki paidbah ka dei ban long kaba shngaiñ.U la ong ka ka jingphah leh tes ka long ar bynta, khnang ban lap ba ka um ba la sam da ka tnat PHE bad ka Municipal ka don ne em ia ki khñiang jingpang bad ka jingbun than ka Iron.“Lada ka jingleh tes ka lap ba ka um kam long satia kaba bit ban pyndonkam, ka Sorkar ka dei ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh bad lada ka sorkar kam leh katkum ka jingdonkam, ka seng kam banse ban shim da kawei pat ka sienjam,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba ka seng ka dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan thaw noh da ka Water Policy.
title: ARTATIEN KI PAIDBAH BAN DIH ÏA KA UM PHE BAD SMB, PHAH LEH TEST KA FKJGP

content: Shillong, Nailar 23 : Ki bahaing hasem ryngkat bad ki nongialam jong ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front, East Khasi Hills District Unit ba la lamkhmat da u President u Bah Bless Dkhar ha ka 23 tarik, Nailar, 2023 ki la leit buh syntiew ha u lum jingtep jong u Balajied Dkhar ha ka lyngkhuh kaba 23 snem ka jingkhladnoh jong u ha ka jingshah siat iap ha ki Pulit, ha ka 23 tarik, u bnai Nailar ha u snem 2000.Na ka liang jong ki dkhot ka Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council kiba dang don mynta ha kane ka jylla na ka bynta ka jingiakren iasuk bad ka Sorkar ki la phah rah ia u syntiew uba don ruh ia ka shab jong ka seng lyngba ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front.U Kpa jong u Balajied Dkhar, u Bah E.S. Ajar u la pynkynmaw ia ki sngi kiba u khun jong u, u Balajied Dkhar u la shah siat iap ha ki Pulit bad iathuh ruh ba wat ka jingtohkit ka la lap ba ka dei ka Fake Encounter bad da ka mynsiem kaba sngewkhia u la ong ruh ba balei ki Pulit kiba don da ki phew ngut kim shu kem pynban la shu siat iap ia ki.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, u Balajied Dkhar, kynthup ruh ki arngut ki nongialam jong ka KSU, kata, u Samla Dawanbiang Shullai uba dei u Asst. Finance Secretary jong ka KSU Central Body bad u Samla Rocky Shylla uba dei u Sport Secretary jong ka KSU Wahthapbru Unit ki la shah siat iap ha ki Pulit ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka 23 tarik, Nailar ha u snem 2000, ha ka shnong Nongshiliang, Shillong katba ki dang ia shongkai ha kawei ka ïng bad u Balajied Dkhar uba ju khot sien u Hepkhoit uba dei u dkhot jong ka HNLC. Ki Pulit ki la siat iap ia kine ki lai ngut da ka jingsuba ba ki dei ki dkhot jong ka kynhun lehnoh NSCN-IM.
title: KI PULIT KI DON DA KI PHEW NGUT BALEI KIM SHU KEM, HYNREI KI SIATÏAP: E.S. AJAR

content: Shillong, Nailar 23: Iwei i khynnah skul iba dang pule ha ka Class KG ha Laitumkhrah Presbyterian Higher Secondary School, Shillong i la lait thaw na ka tyrsim jong ki nongrah bor bar jylla kiba la leit pan jingbit na ka Principal jong ka skul ban pyllait noh ia i da kaba shu thok shu lamler ba ka kmie jong ine i heprit ka don hapdeng ka jingshitom.Katkum ka tyllong khubor ba la ioh na ki Pulit, la iathuh ba ha ka por 3.30 baje nohphai sngi, ki Pulit ki la ioh jingtip na ki kmie ki kpa jong ine i khynnah skul ba ha ka 23 tarik u Nailar, 2023 ha ka por kumba 12.30 baje nohphai sngi, arngut ki briew kiba dei ki bar jylla ki la rung Laitumkhrah Presbyterian Higher Secondary School ban pan jingbit na ka Principal ban ialam noh ia ine i khynnah sha ing da kaba aidaw ba ka kmie ka la phah leit shaw noh namar ba ka don hapdeng ka jingshitom.Shuh shuh la iathuh ba ka Prinicipal bad ka Nonghikai kim shym la pyllait satia ia ine i khynnah namarba kim shym la ithuh satia ia kine ki arngut ki bar jylla.Mar mar ki bor pyniaid skul ki la telephone sha ka kmie jong ine i khynnah ban phah shaw noh ia ine i khun jong ka.Ka tyllong khubor ka iathuh ruh ba mynta hi ka sngi, ki bor pyniaid skul ki la iathuh uwei  khynnah skul uba dang pule ha ka Class-6 u lait phet da ka said na ka kti jong ki runar kiba la thmu ban rahbor ia u katba u dang leit phai sha la ing.Halor kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la pynlong ka jingtohkit bad ka jingthwet kaba jur ban iohkem ia ki runar kiba donkti.
title: LAIT THAW I KHYNNAH SKUL KA LAITUMKHRAH PRES. HSS NA KA TYRSIM KI NONGRAHBOR BAR JYLLA
