content: Shillong, Nailar 24 : Ka Deputy Commissioner cum Chairman District Rural Development Agency, East Khasi Hills District Shillong ka la pyntip ba kum shibynta na ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar India ban ai jingiarap ia ki 20,535 ngut ki nongshongshnong kiba don kyrteng ban ioh jingmyntoi lyngba ka bhah jong ka skhim shna ïng PMAY-G, bad ba yn lah ban pyllait noh ia ka pisa sha baroh ki nongioh skhim (beneficiaries) khnang ba kin lah ban pyndep noh ia ka jingshna ia ki ïng  jong ki hapoh u bnai Lber (March 2024).Ka DC ka la kyrpad ia baroh ki nongpyniaid shnong jong ki Shnong kiba hap hapoh ka East Khasi Hills District, khamtam kito ki shnong ha Nongkyndong, ba kin shim ia ka thup (list) jong ki nongioh skhim (beneficiary) ka shnong jong kiba ioh ia kane ka skhim na ki Block Office (BDO) bad ba kidei ban pynbiang ia ki Bank Account, ki Aadhaar card bad ban pyntikna ruh ba kin pyniasoh (Link) ia u Aadhaar nomber bad ki Bank account jong ki ha ki bank ba ki don, khnang ba kan ym don kano kano ka jingthut ynda la pyllait ia ka Pisa sha ki account jong ki khnang ba kin lah ban shna pyndep ia ki ïng jong ki ha ka por ba lah buh.
title: 20,535 KIBA IOH SKHIM SHNA ÏNG HA EAST KHASI HILLS

content: Shillong, Nailar 23: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la pan jingpynshai na ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha kaba iadei bad ka bhah pule MBBS jong ka Jylla Meghalaya lyngba ka State Quota.“Ka KSU ka la ioh jingtip ha kaba iadei bad ka bhah pule MBBS jong ka jylla Meghalaya lyngba ka State Quota, la don bun kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew kiba ioh rung ha ka Open Category.  Na ki 14 ngut kiba la shah jied ban leh Screening, don tang lai ngut ki trai ri lane ki riewlum katba 11 ngut pat ki dei na kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew bym dei riewlum,” la ong ka seng ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang.“Ka seng ka la ioh jingujor ruh ba lehse kitei ki 11 ngut kim dei na ka jylla Meghalaya hynrei ki dei ba na jylla Assam. La don jingsuba ruh ba ki ioh ia ki kot ki sla na ka shnong Ampati, South West Garo Hills. Halor kane ka kynrum kynram, ka KSU ka pan jingpynshai na ka Sorkar Jylla hato kitei haneng ki dei kiba shisha ne kumno. Ka KSU ka dawa ruh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei ban pyni paidbah ia ki Aadhar Card bad EPIC jong kitei ki 11 ngut la ki dei neem ki nong Meghalaya bad kumjuh ruh na ki kolej aiu ba ki pyndep ia la ki jingpule,” la dawa ka KSU.“Ka Open Category ka dei na ka bynta baroh ki nong Meghalaya kynthup ruh ia ki Scheduled Tribes ka jylla bad bunsien, bun ngut ki Khasi ki ju ioh ban rung ha kane ka thup kaba plie lad plie lynti pat ia ki kiwei ki para Khasi ban rung na ka Khasi-Jaiñtia Category. Katei ka jingioh rung khlieh da ki samla pule ba suba ba dei na shabar ka jylla kan pynduh lad ia 11 ngut pat ki samla Khasi bad Garo kiba thrang ban ioh pule MBBS,” la ong ka Seng.“Sa kawei pat ka mat kaba ktah jur bha ia ka jylla bad khamtam ia ki samla ba dang shu dep pule Medical kiba dei na jylla ka dei halor ka jingkhot ia ka Walk-in-Interview da ka Sorkar Jylla ia 170 ki kam Contractual kiba dei ia ki post Medical & Health Officer (70 tylli) bad ki post Specialists (100 tylli). Ka seng ka sngew namarba ki dei ki kam kiba hap hapoh ka Sorkar Meghalaya kumta ka dei ban plie lad shwa ia ki trai shnong ka jylla ym ban plie kyllum lang ia baroh ki nong India bad ia kito kiba na ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi,” la dawa ka Seng.“Ka seng ka la buh jingkylli hato balei ym ailad ban long da ka eksam ban pyniaid da ka Meghalaya Medical Recruitment Board? Ki don bun ngut ki samla na jylla kiba la pyndep ia la ki jingpule ha ka laiñ Medical bad katei ka jinglait haduh 170 tylli ki kam kan ailad ia ki ban thep ia kitei ki kam lada mang beit tang ia ki nong Meghalaya hynrei sngew thamula ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka plie pynban ia ka lad aikam aijam sha baroh ki nong India.  Hato ka Health Department jong ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei jong ka Jylla ne ka dei ka tnad Sorkar Pdeng?  Ka KSU ka dawa na ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban pynbeit mar mar ia kane ka kam bad kyntu ia ka ba ka dei ban long ka nongaikam ia ki trai Jylla ym ia ki Bar Jylla,” la ong shuh shuh ka Seng.
title: TANG 3 NGUT KI TRAI JYLLA, 11 NGUT NA ASSAM KIBA ÏOH PULE MBBS NA KA STATE QUOTA KA MEGHALAYA

content: Ki Pulit ka nongbah Shillong ha ka sngi palei ki la register case bad kem noh ia u nongñiah Scooty uba la tynrah ia uwei u khynnah skul uba pule ha ka Class-XI ha St. Edmund’s Higher Seconcondary School, Shillong katba u mih na Anton Hall ban jam sha shiliang surok kaba don markhap bad ka Dos Bocso Technical School, Shillong.U Superintendent of Police (City) ka East Khasi Hills District Bah Vivek Syiem ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba kane ka la jia ha ka por 10.55 baje mynstep ha kaba u nongñiah ia ka Scooty (bym don registration plate) uba kit lang ia u paralok u la tynrah ia utei u khynnah skul hadien ba la ñiah stet bha ia kane ka thuk thuk ar shaka.Ia u khynnah skul uba la mynsaw, la pynkit mar mar da ki paidbah sha Woodland Hospital da ka local taxi.Ki Pulit kiba la wan poi ha kane ka jaka ki la bat noh ia u nongñiah Scooty bad ia uba shong lang bad phah leh medical check-up Woodland Hospital namar ba kine ki arngut ruh ki la mynsaw.U SP u la iathuh ba ki doktor ki la bat noh ia u khynnah skul hapoh Hospital ban ai jingsumar namar ba ka kjat ka mon ka la paitdoh bad mynsaw ruh na ki bynta jong ka khlieh.La pyntip ruh ba ki bahaïing hasem jong une u khynnah skul ki la pynkynriah noh ia u sha GNRC Guwahati ha kaba mynta u la don ha ka jingtip briew.
title: SHAH KEM U NONGÑIAH SCOOTY UBA TYNRAH ÏA U KHYNNAH SKUL HA LAITUMKHRAH

content: PYRSHAH KI PAIDBAH ÏA KA PUBLIC HEARING KA TOPCEM BAN PYNHEH ÏA KA CCP: Ka jingpynsngew paidbah lane ka Public Hearing jong ka Meghalaya Cement Ltd jong ka Topcem Thangskai, ka la ïaid beit shakhmat hapoh Hall jong kane ka karkhana pynmih dewbilat hadien ba ki paidbah kiba pyrshah ïa kane ka jingpynsngew paidbah ki la pynjulor naphang ïa ka ingdara, ïa ki shuki, ki miej bad ïa kiwei kiwei tiar ba la buh ban pynlong ïa kane ka jingïalang ha ka sngi Palei.Naduh ka por 11:00 baje mynstep thik, ki paidbah kiba pyrshah ïa ka jingpynsngew paidbah ka Topcem kiba rah ryngkat bad ki plakad ki la wan poi ha khyrdop jong ka karkhana bad ha kane ka por ka la sdang ka jingïapynibor bad ki Pulit kiba la ap pahara hakhmat kane ka khyrdop.Hapdeng ka jingïakhun bad ki Pulit, ki paidbah ki la ïohlad ban rung shapoh ka jaka pynlong jingïalang bad pynpra naphang ïa ka ingdara bad ïa ki miej ki shuki.Namarba la mih ka jingpynibor jong ki paidbah bad ki dkhot jong ki sengbhalang, ki Pulit ki la hap ban siat pynbthei da ki bom pynsat khmat ne Tear Gas bad kawut lathi naphang ïa ki paidbah.  La lap ba ki don napdeng jong ki paidbah kiba la mynsaw na ka jingsiat Tear Gas jong ki Pulit bad ha ka jingïatur paidbah ban ïoh rung sha ka jaka pynlong Public Hearing.  Kawei ka longkmie ka la mynsaw na ka kti, don ruh kiba la mynsaw na kjat, na met.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang, ki nongpynïaid ka kompeni ki la pynshai halor ka jingthmu jong ka Meghalaya Cement Ltd (Topcem) haba pynheh ne pynïar ïa ka Cement Clinkerisation Plant kaba na ka 2600 TPA (0.858 million MPTA sha ka 4500 TDP (1.485 million TPD lem bad ka 10MW CPP bad ka 9.5 MW WHRS, ha shnong Thangskai bad pynshai ruh ïa ki bynta kiba ïadei bad kane ka projek.Ha kane ka jingpynsngew paidbah ba la pynlong hapoh ka Hall jong ka kompeni la ïa don lang ki Ophisar jong ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board (MSPCB), u Additional Deputy Commissioner ka East Jaiñtia Hills District u Bah G. Warjri bad katto katne ki trai shnong kiba kyrshan ïa kane ka Public Hearing.U Bah Warjri ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “ha kane ka Public Hearing, ngi la ïoh ban pynsngew ha kaba ïadei bad kine ki kam ka kompeni halor ka jingthmu jong ka. Ngi la ïohsngew ïa ka jingpynsngew na ka liang ka kompeni bad hadien kata ngi la khot ïa ki briew ba kin ai kano kano ka jingpynsngew kat kaba ki don katkum ka jingsngew jong ki.  Katto katne ki la wan ban ai jingkren bad ngi la buh rekod lut baroh.”U la ong ïathuh ruh ba um don jingtip eiei halor ka jingpyrshah jong ki paidbah namarba u shu wan sha kane ka jingpynsngew paidbah kumba la bthah da u Deputy Commissioner bad u shu pyndep ïa la ka kamram bad ong ruh ba katba dang pynlong ïa ka jingïalang la shu ïohsngew ïa ka jingpynthei ïa ki bom tear gas shabar.Ki paidbah bad ki Sengbhalang kiba pyrshah ïa kane ka Public Hearing ki la ong, “wat hadien ba la pynpra da ki paidbah bad ki sengbhalang ïa ka ingdara, hynrei ki (kompeni) la pynlong sopsop ïa ka Public Hearing hapoh Community Hall jong ka kompeni bad ki Pulit pat ki la shoh la tied ïa ki paidbah shabar khlem da ailad ïa ki paidbah kiba pyrshah ba kin rung shapoh ka jingïalang.”“Ïa kane ka Public Hearing la shu pynlong shapoh ha kaba tang katto katne ngut ki trai shnong ki don. Baroh kiba ïashim bynta ki dei tang ki nongtrei jong ka kompeni bad ki bahaïing hasem jong ki,” la kynnoh ki paidbah.Ki la ong ba ki paidbah bad ki sengbhalang kiba pyrshah kim lah satia ban pdiang ïa kane ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar bad kynnoh ruh ba ka dei ka Public Hearing kaba la shu pynlong sopsop.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendeng of Police ka East Jaiñtia Hills District u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa, u la pyntip hadien ba ki paidbah ki la pynpra ïa ka ingdara, da ka jingïakren hapdeng ki bor synshar district, ki ophisar na ka Meghalaya Pollution Control Board, ki bor pynïaid shnong bad ki nongpynïaid ka Kompeni ïa ka jaka pynlong public hearing la pynkynriah noh sha ka Hall jong ka Kompeni.“Ha ka por 2:00 baje nohphai sngi, ki paidbah ki la tur biang sha ka jaka ba la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ban pynthud ïa ka jingïalang. Wat hapdeng ka jingkyrpad ba la bun bun sien, ki paidbah ki la nang khie bitar bad thaw jingkulmar.  Ki la kawang da ki maw kat haduh ba ka la buh jingma ïa ka jingim jong ki paidbah, ki nongsynshar district bad ki Pulit.  La pyrshang ban pynpra ïa ka jingïalum paidbah. Khyndai ngut ki Pulit ki la mynsaw ha kane ka jingjia,” la ïathuh u SP.Ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh Lumshnong Police Station hapoh ka Section 143/144/145/148/152 jong ka Indian Penal Code (IPC). Ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia ha kane ka sngi ka dang ïaid shakhmat.
title: MYNSAW KI PAIDBAH, 9 NGUT KI PULIT HA KA PUBLIC HEARING

content: Hapdeng ka jingïapynibor hapdeng ki paidbah bad ki bor Pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ban ïoh rung sha ka jaka ba la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang pynsngew paidbah ba la pynlong da ka Meghalaya Pollution Control Board na ka bynta ka Meghalaya Cement Ltd (Topcem) haba pynheh ne pynïar ïa ka Cement Clinkerisation Plant kaba na ka 2600 TPA (0.858 million MPTA sha ka 4500 TDP (1.485 million TPD lem bad ka 10MW CPP bad ka 9.5 MW WHRS, ha ka shnong Thangskai ha ka sngi palei.La sakhi ruh ba ki don napdeng ki nongtrei bar jylla jong ka kompeni Topcem kiba la kynshoit ne pynshit ïa ki Pulit ban phah tangoh bad ban kawut lathi naphang ïa ki nongïakhih da kaba pynmih ruh wat ïa ki tien sih tien sang pyrshah ïa ki nongïakhih.Kane ka jingleh khlemakor jong ki nongtrei bar jylla ka Topcem ka la pynbitar shuh shuh ïa ki paidbah bad ki la byrngem ruh ba kin ujor da ka ejahar pyrshah ïa kine ki bar jylla kiba kren khlemakor da ka ktien sih ktien sang.La ïohsngew ruh bad la ïoh rekod ha ka camera ba kine ki bar jylla ki la kynshoit ïa ki Pulit ba kin shoh kin dat naphang ïa ki paidbah da kaba ong ‘Maro Maro Sale……….”
title: MARO MARO SALE…..” KYNSHOIT KI NONGTREI BAR JYLLA KA TOPCEM ÏA KI PULIT

content: Ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ha ka sngi palei ka la kyrpad ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong ban bud ryntih ïa ki kyndon jong ka Rule 4 jong ka Solid Waste Management Rules, 2016.Ha ka jingpynbna, ka Municipal ka la pyntip ba ki paidbah ki dei ban pynïakhlad ïa ki jaboh ha ki lai bynta, kata kiba pyut, ki bym pyut bad ki tiar jaboh ba mynsaw ha ki borti bret jaboh bad ban aiti ïa ki jaboh ba la pynïakhlad sha ki kali ba la buh kyrpang ban lum sha manla ki shnong.Dei ban da song bha ïa ki jingsop ba ladep pyndonkam kum ki Diaper, Sanitary Pads bad kiwei kiwei, ha ki pla ba la ïoh na ki jaka shna lane na ki nongpynmih ïa kine ki tiar lane ban da song bha ïa ki jingsong bad ban thep bha ha ki borti ba la buh kyrpang ban bret ïa ki tiar ba rkhiang lane ki tiar ki bym pyut.Ban pynlang la ka jong ïa ki tiar shna iing bym long shuh ban pyndonkam bad ban bret katkum ki jingbthah ba la pruiddak ha ka Construction and Demolition Waste Management Rules, 2016;Yn ym shah ban shu bret pathar, ne thang lane ban tep ïa ki jaboh ba leit bar da ki briew ha surok, ha ki jaka paidbah lane shabar ki phyllaw ing lane ban shu pyntuid sha ki nala bad sha ki wah duid.Ki nongdie madan ki dei ban da buh ïa ki borti ban pynlang shi jaka ïa ki jaboh ba la bret na ki jingbam, ïa ki pliang pastik ne kot, ki jingsong, ki jingbam ba la bret, ki soh, ki jhur bad kiwei kiwei bad dei ban aiti ïa kine ki jaboh ba ladep pynlang sha ki kali ba la buh kyrpang ban lum.Ka Municipal ka la bthah ruh ïa ki Hotel bad Restaurants ba ki dei ban pynthikna ban pynïakhlad ïa ki jaboh na jaka buh bad ban aiti pat sha ki kali kit ñiut.Shuh shuh, ban pyntreikam ïa ka thong kaba kynjoh shi spah na ka shispah ban pynlang ïa ki jaboh, la pyntip paidbah ba naduh ka 1 tarik, Risaw, 2023 ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) kan sangeh noh mardor ban lum ïa ki jaboh ba la shu pynlang shi jaka bad lada lap ïano ïano ki bym pynïakhlad ïa ki jaboh naduh ka jaka lum kin shah daiñ kuna hangto hangto katkum ki kyndon jong ka Meghalaya SWM Bye Laws 2020.Ka jingdaiñ kuna kan long na ka por sha ka por ba la pynkheiñ ïa ki jingbthah.
title: YN SANGEH LUM KA SMB ÏA KI JABOH BA SHU THEP KYLLUM HAJUH NADUH U RISAW, 2023

content: U Myntri Rangbahduh ka Ri u Narendra Modi ha ka jingai jingkren ha ka bynta kaba 104 jong ka Mann Ki Baat u la ai jingïaroh ïa u Bah Brian D Kharpran Daly na Meghalaya na bynta ki jingnoh synniang jong u ha kaba ïadei bad ki krem ki kroh ha Meghalaya. U Bah Brian u la trei da kaba minot thop da ki snem ban wad bad ban pynsaphriang jingtip shaphang ki krem ha Meghalaya.“Nga dap da ka jingkmen ban ïathuh ïa phi shaphang u Bah Brian D. Kharpran. U dei uba sah ha Meghalaya bad u don ka jingsngewtynnad ïa ka Speleology. Kane ka mut ka jingpule shaphang ki krem.” U Modi u la ong ruh ba u Bah Brian u la sdang sngewtynnad ïa kane ka kam hadien ba u la pule katto katne tylli ki kot bad u la pyrshang nyngkong ïa kane ka kam ha u snem 1964 ha ka por ba u dang long u khynnah skul,” ong u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri.U la ong sha ki nongsngap ba ha u snem 1990, u Bah Brian bad ki paralok jong u ki la seng ïa ka kynhun bad lyngba kane ka kynhun, ki la sdang ban wad ïa ki krem ka Meghalaya ki bym pat paw pyrthei.“Katba dang ïaid ka por, u Bah Brian bad ka kynhun jong u ki la lap palat 1700 tylli ki krem ha Meghalaya bad ki la kyntiew ïa ka jylla Meghalaya ha ki kam kiba ïadei bad ki krem ha kylleng ka pyrthei,” la bynrap u Modi.U la ong ruh ba ka Meghalaya ka don ki krem kiba jylliew bad kiba jrong tam ha India.U la ïaroh ruh ïa u Bah Kharpran bad ka kynhun jong u na ka bynta ki jingpyrshang jong ki ban peit ïa ki jinglong jingman jong kine ki krem.“U Bah Brian bad ka kynhun jong ki, ki la lum jingtip shaphang ki jingim kiba don ha kine ki krem ki bym ïohi ha kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ka pyrthei.  Nga ïaroh shisha ïa ki sienjam jong kane ka kynhun.”U Modi u la kyntu ruh ïa ki nongsngap ba kin leit sha Meghalaya bad ban leit sakhi da la ki khmat ïa kine ki krem.
title: PAWNAM KI KREM KA MEGHALAYA LYNGBA U BAH BRIAN D. KHARPRAN, ÏAROH U NARENDRA MODI

content: Ka Kynhun Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la mynjur ïa ka Expert Committee ka ban khlieh da u Justice (Retd) Mool Chand Garg kum u Chairman. U Justice (Retd) Mool Chand Garg  u dei u nongbishar ba la shongthait jong ka Madhya Pradesh High Court.Ki dkhot jong ka Expert Committee kiba tip shaphang ki aiñ jong ka ri ki long u Justice (Retired) Dr. Satish Chandra uba dei u nongbishar barim jong ka Allahabad High Court bad u President barim jong ka Custom, Excise and Service Tax Appellate Tribunal.Kiwei pat ki kynthup ïa u Prof D.V Kumar na ka Department of Sociology, NEHU, Shillong kum u Expert Member ha ka Sociology, u Prof. Chander Shekhar na ka Department of Fertility and Social Demography, Indian Institute of Population Sciences, Mumbai kum u Expert Member ha ka Population Studies bad u Prof Subhadip Mukherjee uba long u Assistant Professor jong ka Economics and Public Policy ha IIM, Shillong kum u Expert Member ha ka Economics.Ki kyndon treikam jong ka Expert Committee ka long ban khmih bniah ïa ka Reservation Policy bad ban ai ïa ki jingkynthoh. Lada donkam, kane ka komiti kan hap ban lum ruh wat ïa ki kynhun bapher bapher bad ban leit jurip ruh ïa ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka Jylla khnang ban ïoh na ka jingai jingmut na kiba bun balang.La bthah ïa ka Expert Committee ban aiti ïa ka kaiphod sha ka Sorkar Jylla hapoh 12 bnai.Ïa ka Expert Committe la thaw hadien ba ka Komiti kaba kynthup ïa baroh ki seng saiñpyrthei la thaw ha ka 25 tarik, Jymmang, 2023 ban ïakren halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Reservation Roster system.Ha ka jingïalang bad ha ka jingïathir ïatai, ka Committee ka la ai jingmut sha ka Sorkar ban thaw ïa ka Expert Committee ka ban khmih bniah ïa ka State Reservation Policy.Ka Sorkar ka la pynmih ïa ka jingpynbna ba la thaw ïa ka Expert Committee ban khmih bniah ïa ka State Reservation Policy, ha kaba ki riewshemphang ki long kiba tbit ha ka Constitutional Law, Economics, Sociology bad Demographic Studies.Ïa ki dkhot jong ka Expert Committee la bynshet ban wad ha Search Committee ba la khlieh da u Chief Secretary hadien ba la pynmih ïa ka jingpynbna ha ka 13 tarik, Jylliew, 2023.
title: KHLIEH U JUSTICE (RETD) GARG KUM U CHAIRMAN KA EXPERT COMMITTEE BAN KHMIH BNIAH ÏA KA RESERVATION POLICY

content: Ka heprit Chevinia Lyngdoh, 13 snem ka rta  kaba sah ha Mawlai Mawiong kaba la long ka nongjop ha ka sur kynud Season-I ba la pynlong dang shen da ka Don Bosco Media Network bad mynta ka kynti ka la ïohrah ïa ka nam lahduh ha ka Vocal Star UK ha ka kyrdan jong ki nongïashim bynta kiba dang hapoh 18 snem ka rta.Kane ka heprit kaba dei ruh ka Brand Ambassador jong ka DBMN hynnin ka miet sngi Saitjaiñ ka la jop ïa ka rynsan ïakob rwai Vocal Star Competiton kaba la long ha ka ri United Kingdom ha ka kyrdan kiba hapoh 18 snem ka rta.Da kane ka jingjop, kane ka heprit ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen ka bym lah ong shuh.Na ki daw ki bym lah ban kiar, kane ka heprit kam shym la ïoh ïa ka Passport ha ka por kaba biang ban leit ïashim bynta ha ka rynsan ïakop rwai kaba la long ha ka ri United Kingdom hynrei da ka jingïarap jong ka DBMN ka heprit Chevinia watla kam shym la ïohlad ban ïashim bynta ha ka Offline Category bad la shu phah ïa ki jingrwai jong kane ka heprit ban ïashim bynta ha ka Online Category.Ha ka jingpynïaid jong ka Vocal Star UK kane ka heprit ka la ïoh shibun ki points da kaba kheiñ ïa ki Viewers Vote ha ka Grand Finale bad ha kaba kut jong ka jingïakob, ka heprit Chevinia la ïohrah ïa ka khusnam kum ka lahduh.Ka Don Bosco Media Network ka sngewsarong na ka bynta ka heprit Chevinia bad ka pynshlur ruh ïa kiwei pat ki heprit bad ïa ki khynnah samla ban ïashim bynta ha ki jingïakob rwai bapher bapher ban ïoh kheit ïa u soh jong ka jingjop la ka long tang hangne ha ri la jong ne ha ki rynsan ïakop shabar ki ri jong ka pyrthei.
title: LAHDUH KA CHEVINIA LYNGDOH HA KA JINGÏAKOP RWAI KA VOCAL STAR UK

content: Ka Joint Action Committee jong ka Khasi Jaintia Fresh Vegetables Ginger Trader Association (KJFVGTA) ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei ka la leit ban iakynduh ia u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ban pan jingpynshai halor ka jingpynbeit thymmai ia ka aiñ Khasi Hills District Autonomous District (Establishment Management and Control of Market) (2Amendment,) Regulation Act 2021.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Chairman jong ka Committee u la iathuh ba kum ki nongkhaii kim pat shai bha halor kane ka Aiñ jong ki nongrep ba la shna da ka District Council halor ka jingbym shah shuh ban dang ot kilo ia ki mar rep.U la ong ruh ba ki nongkhaii ki don bunbah ki jingeh bad iathuh ruh ba kin sa ai da ka jingthoh kaba biang ban pynpaw ia ki jingeh jong ki nongkhaii sha ka KHADC khang ba ka Council kan dup shimkhia ia ka jingeh jong ki nongkhaii.“Ka jingeh ki nongkhaii lada ym shah shuh ban ot kilo ka long namar ba tengteng ki nongrep ki thep lang ia ki marrep kiba  pyut bad babha hynrei ngi ki nongkhaii ngi hap ban shim la ka shim, hynrei lada ym shah shuh ban ot kilo, kan buh jingeh ia ki nongkhaii kiba hap ban jied bad buh briew ban jied,” u la ong.Hynrei na ka liang ki nongkhaii ki kwah ban don ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut bad ki nongrep.La iathuh ba Chief Executive Member jong ka  KHADC u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la kular ban shimkhia ban peit lang ruh ia ka jingeh jong ki nongkhaii.Uwei na ki nongkhaii ia uba tip kyrteng kum u Bah Henry Dkhar u la takrain tyngeh ia ka Hills Farmer Union (HFU) da kaba ong, ba kam dei satia ban mushlia ha kaba iadei bad ka kam hapdeng ki nongkhaii bad ki nongrep namarba kane ka ktah hi ia ki nongrep salonsar.U la ong ba ki nongkhaii ki kwah ban iashai hi tang bad ki nongrep lada ot ne ym ot kilo shuh ia ki marrep bad ia kane ka kam yn sa iakren pynbeit hi da ki nongkhaii bad ki nongrep hynrei ym da ki nongrep kiba shong ha ka shuki.
title: BYM SHAI KA AIÑ OT KILO, PAN JINGPYNSHAI KA KJFVGTA NA KA KHADC

content: Ki Pulit ka Saitsama Police Out Post kiba hiar sha ka shnong Lapangap, kaba don ha khappud bad ka Jylla Assam ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit hadien ba la ioh jingtip ba ki Pulit ka Jylla Assam ki la thaw ktem ha u pud u sam jong ka shnong Lapangap ki la hap ban randien noh namar ka jingshah kthong ha ki paid Karbi ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep.U Superintendent of Police ka West Jaiñtia Hills u Bah C. Syrti haba pynshai halor ka jingmih ki khubor ha ka rynsan social media, u la ong, “ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka kynhun Pulit jong ngi ka la leit tohkit hadien ba la ioh jingtip ba ki Pulit Assam ki la shna ktem ha kane ka jaka kaba ki paid Karbi ki la kam ba ka dei kaba hap hapoh ka Jylla Assam katba ki nongshong shnong ka Lapangap ki la kam ba ka dei kaba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.”U SP u la iathuh ruh ba ki paidbah na ka liang jong ka Jylla Assam ki la mih paidbah bad dawa ia ki Pulit Meghalaya ba ki dei ban phaidien sha ka jaka ba ki wan namarba kane ka jaka ka dei kaba dang hap hapoh ka Jylla Assam.“Ki paidbah ki la sdang khih bitar bad kawang da ki maw bad siat ruh da ki jri siat sim ban pynher krad ia ki Pulit.  Namarba kam don satia kano kano ka dak kaba pyni kano ka liang kaba dang hap sha ka Jylla Assam bad kano kaba hap sha ka Jylla Meghalaya, ka kynhun Pulit ki hap ban randien sha ka jaka ba ki wan bad kim shym la pynibor khnang ban kiar na kino kino ki jingjia ba sngewsih,” la iathuh u SP.“Ki paidbah na ka liang jong ka Assam ki la ieng beit hajuh khlem da khih da kaba kam ba ki don sha ka liang jong ka Jylla Assam bad sangeh noh ban beh ia ka kynhun Pulit jong ngi.  Hadien ba la pyntip sha ki Pulit Assam, mar mar ki la wan poi sha kane ka jaka bad hadien kata la lah ban tem ia ki paidbah.  Ha kajuh ka por, ki Pulit ki la tem ruh ia ki paidbah na Meghalaya ba kim dei satia ban tur sha ka jaka ba don ka jingiakajia,” la iathuh u SP.
title: HAP PHAIDIEN KI PULIT MEGHALAYA BYM TIP ÏA U PUD KA MEGHALAYA HA LAPANGAP

content: Shillong, Nailar 28: Ka Hynniewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization, West Jaintia Hills District ha ka Lah sngi U Blei, hapoh ka jingialam jong u President u samla Wanbiang Pulang ki la leit ban tah da ki jingthoh ha kylleng ka sor Jowai bad ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka West Jaintia Hills District ban mana ia baroh ki dukan Hardware kiba die ia ka dewbilat ba kim bit shuh ban die ia ka dewbilat ba la pynmih da ka Topcem tad haduh ban da lah ba pynbeit ia ki jingkulmar kiba jia ha ka 24 tarik, Nailar, 2033 ka sngi ba la pynlong ia ka jingpynsngew paidbah jong kane ka karkhana pynmih dewbilat.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ka HITO ka la shim ia kane ka sienjam hadien ba arngut ki nongtrei bar jylla jong ka Meghalaya Cements Limited, kaba pynmih ia ka dewbilat Topcem ki la kynshoit ia ki Pulit ban kawut lathi naphang ia ki paidbah kiba pyrshah ia ka jingpynlong ia ka jingpynsngew paidbah.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, ki nongialam jong ka Jaintia Students Union (JSU) ki la dawa ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka karkhana Meghalaya Cements Limited ba dei ban beh kam shi syndon ia ki arngut ki nongtrei bar jylla kiba donkti ban kynshoit ia ki Pulit ban kawut lathi naphang ia ki paidbah ha ka sngi ba la pynlong ia ka jingpynsngew paidbah kaba la long ha ka 24 tarik, Nailar, 2023.Ki nongialam ka seng ki la pynpaw ruh ba kim hun satia ba ki bor pyniaid jong kane ka karkhana kin shu weng shipor ia ki na ka kam bad kajuh ka por ka seng ka la maham ruh ia ki bor pyniaid lada kine ki arngut ki bar jylla kin dang trei hapoh kane ka karkhana kan sa mih ka jingsngewsih bad ka jingiapher jaidbynriew.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka seng ka la pynsngew ruh ha u Deputy Commissioner ha kaba u la kular ba un sa thoh sha ka Home bad ka Political Department jong ka Sorkar Jylla halor kane ka jingdawa jong ka seng.
title: MANA KA HITO BAN DIE ÏA KA DEWBILAT TOPCEM HA WJH, PHAH BEH KA JSU NA MEGHALAYA

content: : Ki nongialam jong ki ar tylli ki Regional Committee na ka bynta ka West Khasi Hills, kata, na ka Jylla Meghalaya ba la khlieh da u Bah Paul Lyngdoh kum u Chairman bad na ka Jylla Assam ba la lamkhmat da u Chandra Mohan Patowary ki la shim ia ka rai ban sa leit sorjanmin ia ki jaka kiba don hapdeng ha ka jingiakajia pud ha ka thain West Khasi Hills hadien ba la kut ka Dorbar Lyiur jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ka Jylla Assam.U Bah PauL Lyngdoh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang jong ka Regional Committee kaba la long ha nongbah Shillong ha ka lah sngi U Blei u la ong, “ki Regional Committees na ka bynta ka West Khasi Hills-Kamrup Border Sector ki la rai ban pynduna ia ki jingeh jong ki shnong kum shi bynta ka jingiapynbeit ia u pud u sam ha kane ka Sector.”Ka jingialang ka long ban pyniakhlad la ka jong ia ki shnong ki bym don ka jingiakajia pud bad ki shnong kiba don ha ka jingiakajia pud.Haba ki lad pathai khubor ki la pyrshang ban kylli bniah halor ki shnong, na ka liang jong kine ki arngut ki nongialam ka Committee ki la kyntait ban iathuh bniah.U la ong ki Deputy Commissioners bad ki MDC ynda la pyndep ia ka jingbishar kaba pura kin sa synran lang ia ki dkhot jong ka Committee ban leit jngoh ia ki shnong hadien ba la kut ka Dorbar Lyiur ha kaba kut jong u Nailur mynta u snem.U Chairman jong ka Kamrup District Border Sector u Chandra Mohan Patowary u la ong, dei tang da ka jingiakren sngewthuh jingmut yn sa lah ban iapynbeit ia ki jingiakajia ha Langpih Sector.
title: HADIEN KA DORBAR LYIUR YN LEIT SORJAMIN KI REGIONAL COMMITTEE ÏA KA LANGPIH SECTOR

content: Ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) jong ka 193 Battalion kiba la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah ki la ioh ban kurup ia ki jaiñ Saree kiba shongdor T. 42 lak ia kiba la thmu ban shalan tuh sha ka ri Bangladesh lyngba ka khappud jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ki shipai BSF ki la ioh kurup ia kine ki jaiñ ba la thmu ban khaii tuh na khappud jong ka shnong Barmanbari, East Khasi Hills District, ha kaba ki la lap ba la buhrieh ia ki song jong kine ki jaiñ Saree ha kawei ka ing bym pyndonkam shuh ha khappud.Tang shu ioh jingtip, ki shipai BSF ki la pynlong ka jingkhynra bad ioh kurup ia kine ki jaiñ.Ia kine ki jaiñ la aiti noh sha ka Ophis Custom ban leh ia kaba donkam.
title: KURUP KI BSF ÏA KI JAIÑ SAREE KIBA SHONGDOR 42 LAK NA KHAPPUD EAST KHASI HILLS

content: Shillong, Nailar 31: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la  ong ba u MLA jong ka South Shillong Constituency u Bah Shanbor Shullai bad u MLA jong ka Pynthorumkhrah Constituency u Bah AL Hek kim don ia ka bor ban thung Rangbah Shnong.“U Bah Shanbor Shullai bad u Bah AL Hek kim don ia ka bor ban thung Rangbah Shnong, lada ngi peit katkum ki kyndon aiñ ba la don, namarkata ka KHADC ka dei ban pan jingshai na kine ki ar ngut ki MLA halor ka jingai bor jong ki ia u bar jylla ban long Rangbah Shnong bad ban ai No Objection Certificate (NoC),” ong u Working Presiden ka KHNAM-CEC ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi palei.“Lyngba ka jingleit khynra trading License jong ka seng HITO ha ki thain Rynjah ka long kaba sngewlyngngoh ban iohi ba ka KHADC ka ai Trade License ia ki bar jylla lyngba ka NOC ba la soi da u bar jylla uba la kam ia lade kum u Rangbah Shnong jong ka RR Colony,” la ong ka KHNAM.Katkum ka “The Khasi Hills Autonomous District (Appointment and Succession of Syiem, Deputy Syiem, Electors and Rangbah Shnong of Mylliem Syiemship) Act 2007” ka la batai shai kdar ba u Rangbah Shnong “ka mut u Khasi uba la shah jied da ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong kaba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Hima Mylliem, bad dei tang u khasi uba lah ban long u Rangbah Shnong”. Ka long kaba shai ba u bar jylla um lah ban long Rangbah Shnong katkum kane ka aiñ, la bynrap u kyrwoh.Ngi kwah ban buh jingkylli ia ka KHADC, halor kano ka nongrim la pdiang ia ka NOC ba la soi da u bar jylla kum u Rangbah Shnong? Kane ka pynpaw ba ka KHADC hi ka pynkhein ia ka ain jong ka Hima Mylliem bad la shu ai thurmur ia ka Trade License lyngba ki NOC ki bym biang tang ban biang mano re mano shimet, la kynthoh ka KHNAM.“Na kawei kapor sha kawei pat la lap ia ka jingshim sting jong ka Council haba ai ia ki Trade License bad kam don ka jingpyntreikam hok ia ka Trading by Non-tribal 1954,” ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: U BAH AL HEK BAD U BAH SANBOR KIM DONBOR BAN THUNG RANGBAH SHNONG: KHNAM

content: Ka Ranikor Area Farmers Association (RAFA) ha ka sngi palei ka la leit pynsngew sha ki tyndong skhor jong u Deputy commissioner ka South West Khasi Hills Distirct u Bah T. Lyngwa halor ka jingshah pynjot ki marrep ha ki Hati khlaw kaba la jia la bun sien bad kaba wanrah ia ka jingduhnong kaba khraw ia ki nongrep jong ki shnong kiba don ha ka thain Ranikor.Kane ka seng ki nongrep ba la lamkhmat da u President u Bah  Michael Donald Lyngdoh bad u Secretary u Bah Kyrmen Kharryja ha ka jingiakren bad u Deputy Commissioner, ka la kyrpad ia ki bor sorkar ban beh noh ia kine ki mrad khlaw namarba ka jinghiar thma jong ki Hati khlaw ka buh jingma ruh wat ia ka jingim jong ki briew kiba leit sha ki lyngkha ki risai.Kine ki nongialam ki la iathuh ba u Deputy Commissioner u la kular ban shimkhia ia kane ka jingpynsngew jong kane ka kynhun ki nongrep khnang ban iada ia ki jingthung jingtep bad ia ki mynsiem briew.Ha kajuh ka por, ka seng ka la ai por ia ki bor sorkar ban pynkynriah noh mardor ia ki hati khlaw sha kiwei pat ki jaka hynrei lym kumta ka seng kan ym shim jingkitkhlieh lada jia eiei.
title: BA PYNJOT KI HATI KHLAW ÏA KI MAR REP PYNSNGEW KA RAFA HA U DC

content: Ka Kynhun Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la mynjur ban thung ïa u Secretary bapura jong ka Meghalaya State Council of Technical Education (MSCTE) bad ïa u Executive Chairman jong ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBOSE).Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ïathuh ba la thung ïa u Secretary bapura jong ka MSCTE da kaba pynshong nongrim ba ki skul Polytechnic ki la don ha ki district, kynthup ha Shillong, Tura bad Jowai bad sa saw tylli kiwei pat kiba yn dang shna thymmai.“Ka Additional Director ba mynta jong ka Directorate of Higher Technical Education ka A. Ali kan sa shongthait noh shen bad la rai ha ka jingïalang ba kan sa long ka Secretary ba nyngkong eh jong ka MSCTE na ka bynta 24 bnai,” ka la ong.Ka Myntri ka la pyntip ba ka kynhun Myntri ka la mynjur ban thung ïa u CP Marak, uba long u Indian Forest Officer ba la shong thait kum u Executive Chairman jong ka MBOSE na ka bynta 12 bnai.Ka la ïathuh ruh ba ka kynhun Myntri ka la pdiang bad mynjur ban pynkylla ïa ka kyrteng jong ka Captain Williamson Sangma Technical University sha ka Captain Williamson Sangma State University.“Baroh ki tnat treikam ki la ïohi ïa kane ka jingtyrwa bad la sngewdonkam ban wanrah ka jingpynkylla bad ngin sa rah ïa ka Bill ha Ingdorbar Thawaiñ,” ka la bynrap.Ha kajuh ka por, ka Kynhun Myntri ka la mynjur ïa ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ka Meghalaya Judicial Service Rules, 2006 bad ïa ka Meghalaya Higher Judicial Services Rules, 2015.“Ka jingtyrwa ban pynbeit thymmai ka long ban weng ïa ki kyndon ha ka jingthungkam ïa ki Judicial Officers da ka commission bad hadien ba la wanrah ïa ka jingpynbeit thymmai, ka jingthungkam kan long beit da ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court.  Shuh shuh, ïa ka kyntien ba paw Gauhati High Court, yn bsut noh da ka kyntien High Court of Meghalaya. Ka jingpynbeit thymmai ka la tyrwa ruh ba pynkylla ïa ka rukom ai kyrdan ïa ki Judicial Officers katkum ka jingbthah jong ka Iingbishar Supreme Court,” ka la ong.
title: MYNJUR KA KYNHUN MYNTRI ÏA U SECRETARY BAPURA KA MSCTE, U CP MARAK KUM U HEH KA MBOSE

content: : Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Wapung Unit hadien ba ladep phah ia ka ujor sha ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC), ha ka sngi balang, ka la ujor sa sha ka Meghalaya state Pollution Control Board (MSPCB) ban khang kyrdep noh ia ka Abhi Coke Pvt ltd.Ka Seng hapoh ka jingialam jong u President u Samla Deiniwan Lyngdoh bad u General Secretary u samla Shwari Ryngkhlem GS ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Asst. Secretary ka KSU East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit u u Samla Pynshai Kupar Dkhar ki la aiti ia ka jingujor ha u Chairman ka MSPCB.Ha  u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Publicity Secretary ka KSU Wapung Unit u samla Shibaitlang, ka seng ka la kam ba ka lap ba ka jingdon ka Abhi Coke Private Limited kam don jingmyntoi eiei ia u paidbah hynrei ka wanrah pynban ka jingma suda ia u paidbah.Ka Seng ka lap ruh  ba kane ka karkhana ka la pynkheiñ ia ki ain ki kyndon jong ka EIA 2006 ha ka jingpynmih ia u Coke.Ka Seng ka la ong, ba katkum ka EIA 2006 kane ka karkhana Coke ka dei ban pynmih ia u Coke tang 25,000 metric ton ha ka shisnem hynrei ka la pynmih ym duna ia ka 36,000 metric ton ha ka shisnem. Ka Seng kam shongthait ban iaid shaphrang ban dawa ban khang khyrdep ia kane ka Abhi Coke Pvt ltd, ong u kyrwoh.Ha kajuh ka por, ka Seng ka la dawa ia u Chairman ka MSPCB ba dei ban  tohkit bha lyngba ka ophis jong ki ia kane ka karkhana Coke bad kumjuh ruh katkum ki kyndon jong ka EIA.“Ka seng kam shongthait ban iaid shaphrang katba kane ka karkhana Coke kam pat khang khyrdep lada shim por da ki snem ruh ka seng kan ieng skhem ha ka nongrim ba u paidbah un ioh ban im suk ban ioh ban ring mynsiem da ka lyer kaba khuid,” ong u kyrwoh.“Ka Seng ka dap ruh da ka jingsngewphylla ba ki briew jong kane ka karkhana coke ki la tyrwa ia ngi da ka bai bnai lada ngim iaid shaphrang”.  Ka kyrwoh kaba shai sha ki briew kane ka karkhana coke phim lah ban thied ia ngi da leilei ruh ngin ieng skhem ha ka nongrim baskhem bad ngim shongthait ban iaid shaphrang ban dawa lada shim por da ki snem ruh.Ka Seng ka kyrmen skhem ba ha kawei ka por ngin sa ioh ia ka jingjop ba u paidbah un ioh ban im suk ban ioh ruh ban ring ia ki lyer ba khuid, pynkut u kyrwoh.
title: KYNTAIT MARDOR KI NONGIALAM KA KSU ÏA KA PISA BA TYRWA DA KA ABHI COKE PVT LTD

content: Ki Pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District, ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la registar case pyrshah ïa ki briew kiba donkti ban kynshoit ïa ki bor Pulit katba ki dang tem ïa ki paidbhur kiba la pynthud ïa ka jingpynsngew paidbah kaba la long ha ka sngi palei ha Thangksai.U Superintendent of Police ka East Jaiñtia Hills, u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa, ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, u la ong, “ha ka 24 tarik ha ka por ba la pynlong ïa ka jingpynsngew paidbah hapoh ka jaka jong ka M/s Meghalaya Cements Limited, Thangskai ka la mih ruh ka jingïapynibor hapdeng ki Pulit bad ki paidbah, hynrei ka Video kaba pyni halor kane ka jingjia ka la mih paw lyngba ka Youtube, jong ka Batesi Tv, ha kaba la ïohi ïa ki katto katne ngut ki briew kiba pyrta da ki kyntien kynshoit.”Ki Pulit ki register case hapoh Lumshnong Police Station hapoh ka kyndon 153B/503/504/506 Indian Penal Code (IPC) bad ka jingtohkit halor kane ka la ïaid shakhmat.U SP u la pynpaw ruh lyngba u kyrwoh ba ka tnat Pulit jong ka jylla ka khmih na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka jingsuk hapdeng ki jaidbynriew bad kano kano ka jingpyrshang ban kynshoit bad pynshit yn pynngat ha ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: LA REGISTER CASE KI PULIT BA KYNSHOIT KI ARNGUT KI BAR JYLLA

content: Ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ba la shah kheiñ be-aiñ ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la pynrem jur ïa ka jingpyndonkam palat ki Pulit ïa ka bor pyrshah ïa ki paidbah kiba ïakhih, ban pyrshah ïa ka jingpynïar ïa ka karkhana pynmih dewbilat ha Thangskai, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, u General Secretary-cum-Publicity Secretary ka HNLC u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw u la ong, “ka HNLC ka pynrem jur ïa ka jingleh jong ki Pulit, ba la ïalam da u SP bar jylla.  Ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa ki marpoh khyndew da ki karkhana bad ki karkhana saiñ dewïong ka la pynjaboh ïa ka um bad pynjaboh ruh ïa ka mariang.”U la ong ba ka HNLC ka ïaiban ba la donkam ban pynkut noh ïa ka jingïakajia hapdeng ki jaidbynriew u Hynñiewtrep.“Ngi sngew ïalade kum ka ri kaba la shah khñiot beiñ haba mad ïa ka jingshah phiah bad shah synshar ha ka sorkar, ïa kaba la bat lakam da ki briew ki bym dei ki khun u Hynñiewtrep. Ki nongshun ki long kiba sian, namarkata, ka ladei ka por ïa u Hynñiewtrep ban sangeh noh ïa ka jingïasyndong kti bad ka jingïapyndonkam bakla iwei ïa iwei pat, khamtam eh ki Pulit Hynñiewtrep ki dei ban ïada ïa la ki briew jong ngi ym ban pynmynsaw tang ban pynsngewbha ïa ki kynrad jong ki bad ïa ki nongkhaii kiba nabar ka jylla,” la ong u Bah Nongtraw.
title: PYNREM KA HNLC BA PYNDONKAM PALAT PUD KI PULIT ÏA KA BOR PYRSHAH ÏA KI NONGÏAKHIH

content: Da ki spah tylli ki kali kiba wan na kylleng ki jylla jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ban iaid lynti na ka surokbah National Highway-6, ha East Jaiñtia Hills District ki la sahkut ha ka dheng kali na ka jingtwa biang ka khyndew hakhmat ka Tunnel ha ka shnong Sonapur, ha ka sngi SaitjaiñKa jingtwa jong ka khyndew bad ki maw ka la jia ha ki kynta ba u lapbah uba jur u la ther ha kiba bun ki bynta jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad ki kali kiba wan na ka jylla Tripura, Mizoram bad Barak valley ki la shah khang sbak ha kane ka jingtwa khyndew.La sakhi ruh ba ka don ka kali kaba la sahkut ha kane ka jingtwa khyndew hakhmat kane ka krem ba la shna kyrpang ban iaid ki kali.Kat haduh ba la thoh ia kane ka khubor, ki nongtrei jong ka National Highway Authority of India (NHAI) ki la pynkhuid bad khat ia ka khyndew bad ka ktieh khnang ban pyllait ia ki kali kiba iaid lyngba kane ka surok.U Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District u la pyntip, hadien ba la pynkhuid ia ka khyndew bad ia ka ktieh, la pyllait biang ia ki kali ban iaid na kane ka surok.La bthah ruh ia ki nongñiah kali ba kin long kiba iaishah bad ym ban kyrkieh bad ha kajuh ka por ruh ban long kiba phikir bad kiba husiar haba iaid lyngba kane ka surok.
title: SHAH KHANG LYNTI KI KALI NA KA JINGTWA KHYNDEW HAJAN KA TUNNEL SONAPUR

content: Da ka jingshimkhia jong u MDC ka Mawkhar Pynthorumkhrah Constituency u Bah Pynshngain N. Syiem, ka Dorbar Shnong Lum shyiap ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ 2023 ka la ioh ia ka trok kit ñiut ba la pyllait paidbah ha ka jingialang kaba lyngkot ha Taxi Stand Lumshyiap.U Bah Pynshngaiñ Syiem uba long ruh u Deputy Chief Executive Member (Dy. CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) uba la long kum u Kongsan ha kane ka sngi, u la iathuh ba ia kane ka trok kit niut la bei pisa ban thied da ka District Council lyngba ka Tied Grant jong u snem 2020-21 na ka Finance Commission.Ha ka jingot ribbon ia kane ka trok kit niut, la sakhi lang da u Rangbah Shnong u Bah Phira Khongphai, u Secretary Shnong u Dr Khampher Phawa, ki nongkitkam jong ka Executive Committee, ka President jong ka Seng Kynthei ka Kong Marylin Pathaw, u President ka Seng Samla u samla Khrawpyrkhad Mynsong lem bad ki paidbah nongshong jong ka shnong Lumshyiap.U Bah Pynshngaiñ Syiem haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la pynpaw ba ka jingpynioh jong u ia kane ka trok ban kit ia ki ñiut na ki thliew ing jong ki nongshong shnong Lumshyiap ka long hadien ba ki nongialam ka shnong ki la pan jingiarap na u namar ba ka kali kaba rim kam lah shuh ban treikam hadien ba ka la don kumba 11 snem tam eiei. U la kyntu ia ki nongpyniaid ia kane ka kali ba kin pyndonkam hok katkum ka jingdonkam bad ban ban ym pyndonkam bakla lane na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi shimet jongno re jongno.
title: LYNGBA KA KHADC PYNÏOH TROK KIT ÑIUT U MDC ÏA KA SHNONG LUMSHYIAP

content: U Assistant General Secretary ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) u Bah Edward Thangkhiew ha ka sngi saitjaiñ u la phah ia ka shithi iehnoh kam sha u President jong ka HNYF, Central Body Bah Sadon Blah naduh mynta ka sngi na ki daw shimet bym lah satia ban kiar.“Ngam don eiei ban pyrshah ne kano kano ka jingiapher jingmut iano iano ruh hynrei tang ka jing khublei bad kitbok kitrwiang ia phi bad ka seng jong ngi ka HNYF ba phin nanglah ban ai ka jingshakri kaba khambha ia ka Bri u Hynñiew trep baieid jong ngi bad lada don kano kano ka jingiarap nga kloi ban ai ka kti kamon ka kti kadiang ha kaba iadei bad ka seng,” ong u Bah Thangkhiew.
title: IEHNOHKAM U BAH EDWARD THANGKHIEW KUM U ASST. GS KA HNYF

content: Ha kawei na ki jingjia kaba pynlynngngoh ïa kiba bun balang, ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya kiba don kumba 15 ngut bad kiba ap pahara ha ka shnong Lapangap kaba don ha khappud jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bad Assam, ki la shah kthong ha ki jaidbynriew Karbi ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.Ha ki video ba la saphriang ha ka rynsan Social Media, la ïohi ba ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya katba ki dang pahara ha kane ka jaka ki la shah kthong ha ki jaidbynriew Karbi kat haduh ba ki la hap ban phet kham sha jngai khnang ban lait na kino kino ki jingjia ba sngewsih.U Waheh Shnong jong ka shnong Lapangap haba ïakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la pynshisha ruh ïa kane ka jingjia kaba la jia ha kane ka shnong kaba don ha khappud.La iohi ruh lyngba ka Video ba ki Pulit ka Jylla Assam ki la poi ban iakren bad ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya ha kaba ki la kyntu ba kim dei ban ailad ïa ki Khasi Pnar ban tur sha ka jaka ba shong basah ki Karbi bad na ka liang jong ki Pulit ka Meghalaya ki la pyneh ba ong ruh ïa ki Pulit Assam ba kin tehlakam ïa ki Karbi ba kim dei ban tur sha ka shnong ba shong basah ki Khasi Pnar.Ka jingïakynad hapdeng ki Khasi-Pnar bad ki Karbi ha ka shnong Lapangap ka la jia hadien ba la kynnoh ba ki jaidbynriew Karbi ki la jynrat naphang ïa ki tynrai dieng ba la thung da ki Pnar ha u Lum Moo Pyrdet Pynthor ban pynskhem ïa ka jinglong trai ïa kane ka jaka.Hadien ba la mih kane ka jingïakajia hapdeng ki Khasi Pnar bad ki Karbi, ka tnat Pulit jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills ka la pynap pahara da ki Pulit ha kane ka jaka ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ manla ka sngi.U Waheh Shnong u la ïathuh ba ki Karbi kiba don da ki phew ngut ki la rah da ki dieng bad kawang da ki maw bad siat ruh da ki jri ïa ki Pulit ka Saitsama Out Post kiba ap pahara ha ka shnong Lapangap.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka Dorbar Shnong ka la shong jingïalang kyrkieh ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u Superintendent of Police ka West Jaiñtia Hils u Bah C. Syrti, u Additional SP, u Inchage jong ka Saitsama Police Outpot, u MDC jong ka Pynthor-Mukroh Constituency u Bah Arboi Shadap ban ïakren halor kane ka jingjia mynta ka sngi.U la ïathuh ba ka Dorbar Shnong ka la pynpaw ba kan sa pynsngew ïa kane ka jingjia bad ïa ka jingbuh ktem jong ki Pulit Assam ha u Lum Umshyrngat uba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Lapangap.“Ngi la rai ban sa pynsngew sha u Deputy Commissioner ban phah weng noh ïa ka Camp jong ki Pulit Assam ha u Lum Umshyrngat namar ba ka dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Lapangap. Ngin ïaishah bad ki bor synshar District bad lada kim leh eiei ngim banse ban pynpra hi da ka bor shnong,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba ka Dorbar Shnong ka la pynpaw hakhmat u SP ba dang donkam shuh shuh ïa ki Pulit ban pahara ha khappud jong ka Shnong Lapangap khnang ban ai jingïada ïa ki paidbah kiba leit trei sha ki bri ki bsa ha ka por mynsngi mynshai.
title: KTHONG KI KARBI ÏA KI PULIT MEGHALAYA HA LAPANGAP, KAWANG MAW, SIAT DA KI JRI

content: Ha kawei na ki jingjia kaba pynlynngngoh ia kiba bun balang, ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya kiba don kumba 15 ngut bad kiba ju ap pahara ha ka shnong Lapangap kaba don ha khappud jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bad Assam, ki la shah kthong ha ki jaidbynriew Karbi ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.Ha ki video ba la saphriang ha ka rynsan Social Media, la iohi ba ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya katba ki dang pahara ha kane ka jaka ki la shah kthong ha ki jaidbynriew Karbi kat haduh ba ki la hap ban phet kham sha jngai khnang ban lait na kino kino ki jingjia ba sngewsih.U Waheh Shnong jong ka shnong Lapangap haba iakren bad ka BatesiTV u la pynshisha ruh ia kane ka jingjia kaba la jia ha kane ka shnong kaba don ha khappud.Ka jingiakynad hapdeng ki Khasi-Pnar bad ki Karbi ha ka shnong Lapangap ka la jia hadien ba la kynnoh ba ki jaidbynriew Karbi ki la jynrat naphang ia ki tynrai dieng ba la thung da ki Pnar ha u Lum Moo Pyrdet Pynthor ban pynskhem ïa ka jinglong trai ïa kane ka jaka.Hadien ba la mih kane ka jingiakajia hapdeng ki Khasi Pnar bad ki Karbi, ka tnat Pulit jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills ka la pynap pahara da ki Pulit ha kane ka jaka ban pynneh ia ka shongsuk shongsaiñ manla ka sngi.
title: SAPHRIANG KA VIDEO BA KTHONG KI KARBI ÏA KI PULIT MEGHALAYA HA LAPANGAP

content: Ki Pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka sngi balang ki la ïohkem ïa u briew uba donkti ban bei tyngka ia ki nongkhaii ban thied ïa u drok uba long u jingdih ba la kheiñ be-aiñ. Ïa une u Jehangir Alom uba sah ha Lakhimpur, Assam la ïohkem da ka jingïarap lang jong ki Pulit ka Jylla Assam.U Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa, ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, u la ïathuh ba ki Pulit kiba la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bad ka jingbuddien kaba bniah ha kaba ïadei bad ka case ba la rejister ha Khliehriat Police Station hapoh ka Section 21(c)/29 jong ka NDPS Act, ha ka 30 tarik, mynta u bnai  la ïohkem ïa u Jehangir Alom na Lakhimpur bad la wanrah sha Khliehriat bad la tian bishar ha Kashari.“Lah ban pynkynmaw, ha ka 19 tarik, Jylliew, 2023, ki Pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills ki la ïohkem ïa ki arngut ki snar nongkhaïi drok ïa kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Biaklian Guite bad ïa u Imliakum Longkumer, na BMS Fuel Station, Nongsning, katba ki dang shong da ka kali Tata winger kaba don ïa u nombar NL-07-T-0815 ha kaba la ïoh kurup ïa u suba drok Heroin uba don ka jingkhia kaba 2.738 Kg na ka kali,” la ïathuh u SP.Katkum ka jingai jingtip jong u SP, kiba la shah kem ki long u M. Tuanbiaklian Guite (32 snem) uba sah ha Churachandpur, Manipur, u Imliakum Longkumer (40 snem) uba sah ha – Dimapur, Nagaland bad u Jhangir Alom (34 snem) na Lakhimpur, Goalpara, Assam.Na kine kiba la shah kem ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup ar tylli ki mobile phone, ka pisa T. 2500 bad kawei ka kali Tata Winger NL-07-T-0815.
title: KEM KI PULIT KA EJH NA ASSAM ÏA U NONGBEI TYNGKA ÏA KI NONGKHAÏI DROK

content: U Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem u la phah da u kyrwoh uba shai sha ki thei Khasi ba ka jaiñkyrshah jong ki kam dei ban long ka jaiñkyrshah kaba ïada ïa ki poiei shi sngi.Ïa kane, u Bah Pynïaid u la kren lyngba ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi palei ha ka jingleit ai khublei jong ka Hynñiewtrep Ïewduh Association (HIA) ïa ka Council kaba la shimkhia ban peitngor ïa ka jingjyllei jong ki bar jylla kiba die madan khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang ha Ïewduh bad ha G.S Road. “Ha ka jingleit jong ngi mynshi sngi, ngi la lap ba ki don ki nongshong iew ki bym dei na ka jaidbynriew Khasi ki la die jingdie harud surok khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang,” u la ong.“Ka jingleit jong ngi ha kato ka sngi bad ynda la kylli ïa ki kot ki sla kim don. Nga shu kwah ban kren shai, baroh kiba khaïi khlem ki kot ki sla khamtam kito ki bym dei ki Khasi kim lah ban khaïi khlem ka Trading License ba la ai da ka District Council,” la ong u Bah Pynïaid.“Kaba sngewsih, kaba ngi ïohi pat ïa ki thei Khasi jong ngi, ynda ladep ban khynra ki mih shakhmat ban kam ïa kine ki dukan.  Kane kaba la pynkhia jingmut bha ïa ngi bad kaba nga kwah ban kren shai bad maham ïa ki thei Khasi jong ngi ba kim dei ban long kita ki thei Khasi ban phong ïa ka jaiñkyrshah namarba ka jaiñkyrshah Khasi ka dei ka jaiñkyrshah kaba da ïa ka burom ka akor bad ka long kawei kaba pyni ïa ka jingriewspah jong ka riti ka dustur ha ka riam ka beit. Ngam kwah ba kane ka jaiñkyrshah kaba da ïa ka burom ka akor jong ngi ki kynthei Khasi kan long ka jaiñkyrshah kaba da ïa ki khar poiei shi sngi. Kata ka dei ka khubor ka tyngeh na ka liang jong ka District Council,” la maham u Bah Pynïaid.Haba kylli, u CEM u la ïathuh ba ki bar jylla ki bym don ïa ka laisen khaïi haduh mynta kim pat wan mih satia sha ka ophis jong ka Council.“Ngi la phah ïa ki Pulit Enforcement bad nga la bthah ïa u Superintendent ba un ai ïa ka kaiphod haduh ba ki (nongkhaïi bar jylla) kiba wan shane bad ngin sa peit kaei kaba ngi dei ban leh. Haduh mynta, lada ki leh pyrshah ïa kata ngim banse ban shim da kawei pat ka lynti,” u la ong.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingleit jurip ïa ka Ïewduh dang shen, u CEM u la ïathuh ba ka District Council ka la thaw ruh da ka Komiti kaba peit thik ïa ka jingshngaiñ hapoh Ïewduh bad ïa ki shnong bamarjan bad ïa ka jingkhuid jingsuba.Ïa kane ka komiti la khlieh hi da u CEM bad ki dkhot ki kynthup ïa ka EM i/c Market ka Kong Grace Mary Kharpuri, u EM i/c Health and Sanitation ba peit ruh ïa ka Solid Waste Management u Bah Victor Ranee, u Addl. DC Bah Ronie Wahlang, na ka tnat Pulit la pynrung dkhot ïa u Sector Officer u Bipul Das, na ka tnat Pynroi Sor bad ki Rangbah Shnong jong ki hynriew tylli ki shnong ba ker sawdong ïa ka Ïewduh, u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem bad ki Myntri ba peit ïa ka iew.Ka nongïalam jong ka Hynñiewtrep Nongiew Association ka Kong Victoria Marweiñ hadien ka jingïakynduh ïa u CEM jong ka KHADC ka la ong, “ha kato ka sngi, ba kin mih da ki kynthei Khasi ba kin kren da kato ka rukom ka dei ka jingkren laplah jong ki namarba kim tip ïa ka jingshisha ba ka District Council ka leh bad ka Dorbar ka trei.”“Ka District Council haduh mynta ka trei na ka bynta jong ngi ki Khasi ym dei na ka bynta kiwei ki jaidbynriew,” la ong ka Kong Marweiñ.“Kato ka jaka (naduh Bimola ter ter shaduh Motphran) kam dei ka jaka jong ka Municipal ka dei jong ka Hima Mylliem. Lada ong ba ka dei ka jaka jong ka Municipal, ki dei ban pyni ïa ki kot ki sla, ïa u pud u sam.  Ba phin kynthoh ïa ka District Council bad ïa ka Hima Mylliem ngi ki seng ngin ym aili ïa kito kiba pynthohbria ïa ka ri Khasi jong ngi,” ong shuh shuh ka Kong Marweiñ.“Phin shu leh Benami, lane phin shu kam ïa ka jong ki briew hynrei ynda khynra Trading License ki mih da ki Khasi hangto, kito ki bar jylla hangto ki dei kiei? Ki nongtrei jong phi? Pynshisha, u dei u bahaing ne u lok jong phi ne u khun jong phi? Phin shu kam kat ïa kaba don kam lah ban long,” la kynthoh ka Kong Marweiñ.“Ki khun Khasi jong ngi, tang ban die wai dong kim ïoh, hynrei ki (bar jylla) ki ieng hangto ki die alu muri, ki die aiu aiu mano ba kyrshan ïa ki? Lada don ka jingjia hapdeng u bar jylla bad u Khasi, shah kem u khynnah Khasi.  Kum ka longkmie Khasi nga pynrem ïa kito ki jait jinglong. Kum ka longkmie phi dei ban long kum ka longkmie ban mih na ka bynta  ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew. Ki longkmie lada ki long ha kato ka rukom ka ri bad ki khun jong ngi shano kin leit? Ki khun shynrang jong ngi, ki dei ki waitlam, ma ngi ngi dei ka stieh ban ïada ïa la ka ri ym dei ba ngin shu ïaid ruma,” la bynrap ka Kong Marweiñ.
title: KA JAIÑKYRSHAH KI THEI KHASI KAM DEI BAN LONG KA JINGÏADA ÏA KI POIEI: CEM KHADC

content: Ka Executive Committee jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la maham da kaba tyngeh ïa u Self Styled Rangbah Shnong jong ka Them Rynjah ba la ju tip mynshwa kum ka Refugee & Rehabilitation Colony kaba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam treikam jong ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah, ba um bit shuh nangne shakhmat ban dang ishu ïa ka No Objection Certificate sha ki briew ki bym dei ki Khasi kiba sah ha Rynjah ban ïoh ïa ka Trading License bad ka Labour License na ka ophis jong ka District Council bad wat ïa ka Election Photo Identity Card na ka Ophis ka Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills District.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem u la ong, “lada lap nangne shakhmat un sa bthah ïa u Secretary jong ka District Council ban mudui da ka ejahar sha ki Pulit.”Ïa ka rai la shim hadien ba la soi ïa ka resolution da u EM in-charge Trade barim u Bah Sanbor Shullai, bad u MLA ka Pynthorumkhrah u Bah AL Hek bad u Headman jong ka Relief & Rehabilitation Colony u Ushanta Kumar Das ha u snem 2007. Kane ka kam ka la poi sha ka miej jong ka executive committee ba la ïalam mynta da ka NPP ha KHADC.“Lada kata ka resolution ba la mynjur ha u snem 2007 ka pynkheiñ ïa ki riti ki dustur jong ka jaidbynriew ritpaid, ngin sa leh da kaba tyngeh.  Ngan sa bthah ïa u Secretary jong ka Council ban ujor da ka ejahar pyrshah ïa u self-styled Rangbah Shnong halor ka jingai NoC na ka bynta ka trading license, ka labour license ne kino kino ki kot ki sla ne wat na ka bynta ban ïoh ïa ka EPIC. Kaei ka ban jia lada ki briew kiba nabar ki ïoh ïa ka EPIC bad ki ïoh ïa ka hok ban thep vote hangne.  Kane kan knieh noh ïa ka hok jong ngi.  Namarkata, ngin hap ban leh da kaba tyngeh halor kane ka kam,” la ong u Bah Pynïaid.
title: LADA DANG ISHU NoC U SELF STYLED RS KA RR COLONY, YN MUDUI FIR KA KHADC

content: : Ka Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew khia bad pyrshah halor ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar BJP ban pynlong ïa ka ri India, “Kawei ka Ri, kawei ka Election” (One Nation, One Election) da kaba ong, ba kane ka dei tang ka buit poh bad ka atiar ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jinghikai bad nongrim Hindutva ban pynlong ïa ka ri India kum ka ri ka ban don tang kawei ka niam Hindu.“Ka jingtyrwa jong ka BJP ban pynlong ïa ka ri India, “One Nation, One Election,” la donkam ban iathir sani halor kine ki buit poh ba shalyndet jong kane ka seng saiñpyrthei.Ka HNLC ka sngew ba kane ka jingthmu ka dei ban pynkylla ïa ka ri India na kata ka ri synshar paidbah kaba laitluid sha kata ka ri synshar ki blei ka ban aibor ïa kita ki jinghikai ne saiñpyrkhat Hindutva bad ban seng nongrim ïa ka Hindu Rastra,” ong u General Secretary-cum-Publicity ka HNLC u Bah Sainkupar Nongtraw ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Ki jingpyrshang ban wanrah ïa ka rukom treikam ban phai khmat tang sha kawei ka nongrim, da kaba leh bym suidniew ïa ka nongrim ka jingdon jong kiwei pat ki jait niam ne ban long ki bym ïashah ïa kano kano ka niam ha ka jingsynshar Sorkar.  Kane ka jingsngew ka pynmih ïa ki jingkylli ha kaba ïadei bad ki ‘Fundamental Values’ kiba pynkhlaiñ ïa ka riti synshar paidbah ka Ri bad ka jingïada ïa ki hok jong ki jaidbynriew rit paid,” la ong ka Seng.“Hynrei dei ban kynmaw kawei ba ka ri India ka dei ka ri ba ïasoh lang da kiba bun ki Jylla ne ki hima kumba la kdew ha ka Article 1 jong ka Riti Synshar ka ri bad kaba ïasyriem ruh kumba long ka United States. Ka India ka kynthup ïa kiba bun ki jylla bad ki it ki Hima kiba pynïasoh sha ka bad don ruh kiba la shu shah pynïasoh jubor.Kumta kane ka jingthoh ka long halor ka nongrim ban wanrah ka jingpynshai halor ki jingsngew diaw jong kiba bun ki seng saiñpyrthei, ki sengbhalang, ki riewshimet namarba kane ka jingthmu khlempep kan ktah ïa ka jingsynshar paidbah jong ka ri,” la ong u kyrwoh na u Bah Nongtraw.“Kane ka jingtyrwa ka la pynlong ïa kiba bun ban sngewkhia namarba kan ktah jur ïa ka synshar khadar jong ka ri. Kiba bun ki pynpaw ba kane ka jingthmu ka long ban bat ïa ka bor tang nalor, ban pynduna ïa ki nongmihkhmat bad ban pyntlot bor ïa ki seng riewlum ne seng trai ri ba kin ym donbor shuh ban dang ïasaid ha ki ïingdorbar khamtam ban khñiot ïa ka sur jong ki rit paid.  Kane, suki-pa-suki kan ktah ïa ka jingïoh ïashim bynta ne jingïaryngkat ki nongmihkhmat na ki jaidbynriew bapher bapher kiba don ha ka ri. Ki khrawpyrkhat bad ki riewsaid aiñ ki pynpaw ba ka ri kaba ïaid bad bun ki jaidbynriew kum ka India ka donkam ban phiah ïa ka jingsynshar khnang ban ïoh ïadon bynta ryngkat lang da baroh ki jaid niam bad ki jaidbynriew bapher bapher,” la bynrap u kyrwoh na ka HNLC.“Ka HNLC ka sngew ba kane ka buit ban wanrah ïa, ‘Kawei ka Ri, Kawei ka Election” ka long kum ki shaka kali ban pyntyllun bad pynurlong ïa kata ka saiñpyrkhat Hindutva kaba thmu ban pynlong ïa ka ri India kum ka ri kaba don tang kawei ka niam Hindu. Namar ka jingthmu ka long suki suki ban pynkhlaiñ ïa kane ka buit poh ban pynduh pyndam ïa ka jinglong laitluid ka India ha kaba ngeit  ha kano kano ka niam ne ka jingsynshar ba laitluid khlem da ñiew ïa kano kano ka niam. Kane ka la pynlong ïa kiba bun ban buh ka jingkylli halor ki hok longtrai jong ka jingsynshar paidbah ka ri bad  ka jingïada ïa ki rit paid,” ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: PYRSHAH KA HNLC ÏA KA JINGTYRWA KA BJP BAN PYNLONG KAWEI KA RI, KAWEI KA ELEKSHON

content: U Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem ha ka sngi palei u la kren da kaba shai ba ka District Council kan ym ithuh satia ïa kino kino ki Self Styled Rangbah Shnong kiba buhai shnong hapoh ka Refugee Rehabilitation Colony ïa kaba la tip mynta kum ka Them Rynjah.Ka District Council ka la pynskhem ïa ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih da ka Ophis jong u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem naduh ka 1 tarik, Rymphang, 2019 ba ïa ka Refugee Rehabilitation Colony, Rynjah la jer kyrteng kum ka Them Rynjah ka ban long ruh kawei na ki dong kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah.“Naduh ka 1 tarik, Rymphang, 2019 lyngba u Acting Syiem jong ka Hima Mylliem Pa’iem Ainam Manik Syiem la pynmih ïa ka jingpynbna ïa u pud synshar jong ka shnong Rynjah. Haba ngi phai ïa u pud synshar, kane ka jingpynbna na ka Hima Mylliem, ïa ka Refugee Rehabilitation Colony la kynthup lang hapoh ka jingsynshar jong ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah,” la ong u Bah Pynïaid ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi palei.“Ka KHADC ruh ka la pynskhem ïa ka jingpynmih  ïa ka jingpynbna da ka Hima Mylliem” la ong u Bah Pynïaid bad bynrap, “ïa ka Refugee Rehabilitation Colony la pynskhem ruh da ka kyrteng Them Rynjah.”“Halor ka jingpynbna, la bthah ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong kiba sah ha Refugee Rehabilitation Colony, Rynjah lada ki donkam ïa kino kino ki syrnot, lada ka long ïa ka Labour License, Trading License, Residential Certificate bad kiwei kiwei ki syrnot ki dei ban shim na u Rangbah Shnong ka Rynjah.  Ngi la ïohi ba bun kiba la leit sha ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah ki bym dei ki jaidbynriew Khasi kiba sah ha Refugee Rehabilitation Colony,” u la ong.Ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah ha kane ka sngi, ka la ïakynduh ruh ïa u Chief Executive Member ban pan jingpynshai halor ka jingpaw ha ki lad pathai khubor ba ki bar jylla ki ïoh ban leh ïa ka khaïi ka pateng ha Iew Rynjah da ka syrnot ba la ai da Society napoh ka Refugee Rehabilitation Colony ban pan ïa ka Trading License na ka KHADC.“Ha jingkhynra jong kawei ka sengbhalang ha iew Rynjah ïa ki dukan bar jylla dang shen, la lap ba ki don ki shithi ba la soi naduh u snem 2007-2008. Nga ruh ngam pat ïohi ïa kata. Na ka liang jong ka Executive Committee ba mynta, ngi kwah ban pyntip sha baroh ki paidbah ba ka Refugee Rehabilitation Colony ka la hap hapoh ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah. Nga kyntu ïa ki bym dei ki Khasi lane wat ïa ki Khasi ba kin bud ïa ka riti synshar shnong synshar thaw ba la pynkup hapoh ka United Khasi Jaiñtia Hills Appointment and Succession of Chief and Headmen Act, 1959. Kumjuh ruh hapoh ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah kaba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Hima Mylliem, ka Hima ka la don la ka jong ka Aiñ (Hima Mylliem Act, 2007). Hapoh kane ka Aiñ la kren shai u bym dei na ka jaidbynriew Khasi um lah ban kam ïalade kum u Self Styled Headmen ban ai syrnot bad ban leh ïa kane katai,” la pyntip u CEM.“Ngim don jingithuh ïa ki briew kiba shnong ha kane ka dong Them Rynjah ba kin kam ba ki dei ki Rangbah Shnong. Ngi ithuh beit ïa ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah, ïa u Rangbah Shnong, ïa ki Rangbah Dong Rynjah ba ka Dorbar Shnong ka la pynkupbor ïa ki,” la pynshai u CEM.U la ïathuh ruh ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingai syrnot bad kiwei kiwei ki dulir, ka KHADC kan pynskhem ban shim tang ïa ki syrnot ba la ai da ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah. “Ngin ym pdiang ïa kino ki jait syrnot na ka liang jong ngi,” la pynskhem shuh shuh u CEM.U la ong ruh ba kaba ïadei bad ka lehniam leh rukom jong ki jaidbynriew bym dei Khasi, ka KHADC kam don eiei ban tuklar katba ïa ka riti pynïaid shnong yn ym shah daleilei ruh em ban rejistar da ka Society hapoh ka Society Act.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba ka Council haduh mynta kam pat ïohi ïa kino kino ki kot ki sla ba la ai da ka Society kum ka No Objection Certificate naduh u snem 2007-2008.“Lada don kiba pynkheiñ ïa kane ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih da ka Hima Mylliem bad ba la pynskhem da ka District Council ngin pynshitom katkum ka aiñ,” la maham u CEM ka KHADC.U Rangbah Shnong ka Rynjah u la ong, “Halor ka Trading License ngi la ïakren bad ka District Council na ka por sha ka por bad baroh ki bar jylla kiba khaïi hapoh shnong kim lah ban ïaid lait khlem da ïoh ïa ka NoC na ka shnong bad ka jingbit na ka KHADC.”Haba kylli, u la ong, “ngim tip haduh katno tylli ki bar ylla kiba la ïoh ïa ka Trading License hynrei haduh mynta mynne kiba rejistar ha ha Rynjah bad ha Them Rynjah ki don da ki spah tylli.”Halor ka Society jong ka RR Colony, u Rangbah Shnong u la ong, “ïa ka jingtreikam jong ka Society ngim khang namar ba ka dei ka Society kaba la rejistar bad kaba la rim bha. Ka Dorbar shnong Rynjah kam don jingkhang ïa ka jingtreikam jong ka Society hynrei ha kaba ïadei bad u pud u sam bad ka khaïi ka pateng baroh ki dei ban wan hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah. Lada ki treikam kum ka Society ngim don jingwit hynrei kaba donkam ka long ba kin hap pyntip sha ka Dorbar Shnong ïa kaei kaba ki hap ban ïaid.
title: NGIM ITHUH ÏA KI SELF STYLED RANGBAH SHNONG KIBA BUHAI HA RR COLONY: KHADC

content: Ka National People’s Party (NPP) kaba bat ïa u lakam synshar ka la rai ban pynïakhun kyrtong na Shillong bad na Tura Parliamentary Seats ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha u snem ban sa wan.Ïa kane la pyntip da u State President ka NPP u Dr. WR Kharlukhi uba long ruh u MP ka Rajya Sabha MP. U la ong ba ka party mynta ka kynti kan ym kyrshan ïa u kyrtong monlang ban pynieng na Shillong Parliamentary Seat. “Ngin pynieng la ki jong ki kyrtong (na baroh ar tylli ki Seats) bad ngi kyrmen ba ngin jop ïa ka elekshon,” ong u Dr. Kharlukhi ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Ïa mynta, na Tura Parliamentary Seat la mihkhmat da ka Agatha A Sangma kaba long ka MP jong ka NPP katba na Shillong la mihkhmat da u nongïalam ka Congress u Bah Vincent H. Pala. U Dr. Kharlukhi shuh shuh u la ong ba ka party kam pat shim rai ban sei kyrtong na ka bynta ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat.“Mynshwa ngi ju sei ïa u kyrtong monlang hapdeng ka UDP bad ka NPP hynrei ka result kaba mih ka long beit kumjuh. Mynta ka kynti, ngin ong, to ngin ïa pynieng la u jong u kyrtong khnang ba ngin pyrshang bad ban jop ïa ka elekshon.  Balei ngin don tang kawei ka MP ha Lok Sabha, balei ym don ar ngut ki MP ha Lok Sabha,” u la bynrap.Haba kylli, hato ka party ka la rai ne em ban ai tiket ïa u Nongaitktien ka BJP u Bah Himalaya Shangpliang uba long ruh u MLA barim ka Mawsynram Constituency, uba la rai ban pynïasoh shen bad ka NPP, u Dr. Kharlukhi u la ong, “ngin peit shwa, nga dang shu ïohi ïa kata, (ba un pynïasoh bad ka NPP) tang ha ki lad pathai khubor bad lada ka kam ka la urlong, ngin sa shim ïa ka rai.” Da kaba pynpaw ba ka NPP ka don tang khyndiat ngut ki MLA ha rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia, u State President u la ong ba ka NPP ka la ïoh bun bha ka vote share ha ka elekshon MLA 2023.“Lada ngi peit ba ngin jop ïa ka seat (Shillong)…palat 3 lak ngut ki nongthep vote ki la jied ïa ka NPP.  Kata kaba donkam,” u la ong bad bynrap ba watla ka don lehse kano kano ka jingïashrut hynrei na ka bynta ka NPP ‘ngin sa ïa peit ïa ka result.”Halor ka ishu khappud, une u MP jong ka Rajya Sabha u la ong ba ka Sorkar MDA ka la pyrshang katba lah ban ïakren pynbeit ïa u pud u sam. “………..namarba kam dei tang mynta, hynrei ka jia naduh ka por ba la pynkha ïa ka Meghalaya, la donam ban ïa/pynbeit khnang ba ki paidbah kiba sah ha khappud kin shongsuk shongsaiñ.  Na kata ka daw ki la thaw ïa ki Regional Committee, kin sa shong bad kin sa leh ïa kaba bha tam,” u la ong.Katkum ka jingong jong u, lada ïa ka jngïakajia pud ha Arunachal Pradesh lah ban pynbeit, balei yn ym lah ha Meghalaya. “Dei ban lah ha Meghalaya ruh. Ngin pyrshang ban weng ïa kane ka jingeh na ka bynta ki paidbah ba kin shong suk shongsaiñ,” u la bynrap.
title: ELEKSHON LOK SABHA: RAI KA NPP BAN PYNÏAKHUN KYRTONG NA SHILLONG BAD TURA

content: Shillong, Nailur 01: Ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la rakhe kynmaw burom ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi kha kaba 76 snem jong u Purno A. Sangma uba long u nongseng ïa kane ka seng saiñpyrthei ha ka jylla.U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kin bud ïa ki dienjat jong u kpa jong u, uba long uwei na ki riewsaiñpyrthei ba pawkhmat na kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi haduh mynta.Haba kren ha ka 7th P A Sangma Memorial Lecture ba la pynlong da ka NEHU, Tura Campus bad ka P.A Sangma Foundation ha District Auditorium, Tura ban kynmaw burom ïa u Purno Sangma ha ka lyngkhuh sngi kha jong u, la sakhi lang da u Editor-in-Chief jong ka lad pathai khubor The Print, u Shekhar Gupta kum u nongai jingkren ba kyrpang.“U Purno u la long u nonghikai, u nongïalam ba shisha uba la hikai ïa ngi bad uba la ïalam lynti ïa ngi (ki khun jong u) ban leh ïa kaei kaba ngi dei ban leh ha ka jingim, khamtam ha ka saiñpyrthei, kaba mut, ba ngi dei ban buh shwa ïa ki paidbah ha khmat bad ban pynthikna ba kano kano ka rai kaba ngi shim ka dei ban long na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong ki paidbah ka jylla bad na ka bynta ka ri,” ong u Sangma.U la ong shuh shuh ba u PA Sangma u dei u briew uba ïohi jngai.  U ba kren halor ki nongrim bad kum u Lamphang barim jong ka Lok Sabha, ka kyrteng jong u kan ïai sah kynmaw jurom.“Ngi peit ïa ki mawnongrim, ngi peit ïa kane ka Auditorium ba la tei da ma u ha snem 1988, bad ngi kynmaw, ba dei u PA Sangma uba la shna.  Kine ki dei tang ki jingtei lane ki bynta ba u la tei. Hynrei, ki nongrim bad ka saiñpyrkhat jong u kaba u don ka long ban noh synñiang sha u sup u thiar kaba u don na ka bynta ki briew jong ngi,” u la ong.U la kyntu ïa ki paidbah khamtam ïa ki samla ba dang khie dang san ban tip shaphang ka jingim jong u PA Sangma ïa ki jinghikai bad ïa ki nongrim.“Kiba bud ïa ki jinghikai jong u, kin kynmaw ïa u bad kin bud ïa ki dienjat jong u, ki dienjat ka jingieid ïa la ki jong ki briew, ha ki dienjat jong u, u ïai bat ïa la ka nongrim, bad uba buh shwa ïa ka ri hakhmat, ïa ki paidbah ha khmat. Nga ngeit ba kine ki dei kiba nongrim ki bym lah shuh ban mih bujli,” u la bynrap.U Shekhar Gupta haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang u la ong, ba u PA Sangma u la khladnoh dang kloi na kane ka sla pyrthei bad ki dang bun ki kam kiba u dang dei ban leh na ka bynta ki paid riewlum ha ka ri India. U la pynkynmaw ruh ïa ka sien mynba u la wan ha kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kum u nongthoh khubor ba dang khynnah ha ki snem 1980, bad ïathuh ruh ba u la leit jngoh kylleng ki jaka ha kane ka thaiñ bad ha Meghalaya hynrei wat tang shisien ruh um pat ju leit iuhkjat ha Garo Hills watla u la don ha Shillong.“U dei uba paw, uba donbor, uba pawbha hapoh ka ri, bad ym pat don napdeng jong ngi ban ïohi ïa u PA Sangma kum u nongïalam jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi lane kum u nongïalam jong kawei ka jaidbynriew riewlum, u nongïalam jong ki Garo,” u la ong bad bynrap, ka jingkhladnoh jong u PA Sangma ka la long ka jingduh kaba khraw ym tang ïa ka Jylla Meghalaya hynrei ïa ka ri India baroh kawei.
title: LADA NGI IEID ÏA U PURNO SANGMA, NGIN BUD ÏA KI DIENJAT BAD ÏA KI NONGRIM JONG U, ONG U CONRAD SANGMA

content: U MLA jong ka Pynthorumkhrah u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek uba long ruh u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla  ha ka sngi thohdieng u la ong ba u dei u nongshong shnong jong ka Refugee Rehabilitation Colony bad u ïoh ruh ïa ka Residential Certificate na ka RR Colony Welfare Society.“Lada (ka KHADC ka kwah) nga long uba kloi ban ai jingpynshai bad nga dei u nongshong shnong jong ka RR Colony bad ïa ka Residential Certificate la ai sha nga da ka RR Colony Welfare Society,” ong u Bah Hek ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Kane ka jingkren jong u Bah AL Hek ka long hadien shi sngi ba ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la kyntu ïa ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ban pan jingpynshai na ki arngut ki MLA ka BJP, kata na u Sanbor Shullai (uba long u EM in-charge Trade ha u snem 2007) bad na u Bah AL Hek, halor kano ka bor ba ki la thung Rangbah Shnong da u bym dei u Khasi bad aibor ia kiba buhai shnong ha RR Colony ban pynïaid la ka jong ka synshar ka khadar.Kane ka la jia ruh hadien ba ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) ka la lap ba la ai ïa ka Trading Licence da ka KHADC halor ka NOC ba la ai da ka Society jong ka RR Colony ba la soi da u Rangbah Shnong bym dei u Khasi.U Chief Executive Member jong ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem u la maham da kaba tyngeh ïa ka RR Colony Welfare Society ba kam donbor eiei ruh em ban ai ïa ka No-objection Certificate (NOC) lane ka Residential Certificate sha ki bym dei ki Khasi kiba buhai shnong ha kane ka jaka.Haba kylli, u Bah Hek u la ong, “ngim lah ban leh eiei shaphang kata lada ka District Council ka ithuh tang ïa ki Dorbar Shnong (ym ïa ka Welfare Society).”“Ngam lah ban ong la ka (RR Colony) hap ne em hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah. Hynrei katkum ka jingsngewthuh jong nga, mynshwa ki tyrwa ban don hapoh ka Dorbar Shnong Umpling hynrei ki kyntait namarba ki ong ba ka dei ka ktem sah ki phetwir. Hadien kata, ki la ïakren ruh ban hap hapoh ka Rynjah, hynrei ki la shah kyntait.  Shaei kin leit bad ki la thaw la ka jong ka Welfare Society ban ïada ïa la ki jong ki nongshong shnong,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ka long thik kum ka Jail Road Welfare Society, ka Oakland Welfare Society, ka Bivar Road Society hynrei ki dei pat ki nongshong shnong jong ka jylla Meghalaya.”“Lada nga dei u nongshong shnong jong ka RR Colony, balei ngan hap ban shim ïa ka Residential Certificate na Golflink. Kata ka bym lah ban long,” u la bynrap.
title: NGA ÏOH ÏA KA RESIDENTIAL CERTIFICATE NA KA RR COLONY WELFARE SOCIETY, ONG U BAH AL HEK

content: Shillong, Nailur 01: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la byrngem ban khang khyrdep ïa ki Bank bad ki shlem kynshew pisa, lada kim lah ban ai jingithuh ïa ki dulir khyndew ba la ai da ka Council katkum ka KHAD (Regulation and Administration of Land) Act, 2021.Ïa kane ka rai la shim ha ka jingïalang ba la khot pynlong da u Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem bad ki nongmihkhmat na ki Bank bapher bapher bad ki Bank shimet kiba treikam hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Council.Kane la jia hadien ba ka KHADC ka la ïoh pdiang ïa kiba bun ki ujor na ki riewpaidbah kiba la kynnoh ba ki Bank bad ki shlem kynshew pisa ki la kyntait ïa ki aplikeshon shim ram pisa tang namarba ki kyntait ban ithuh ïa ki dulir khyndew ba la ai da ka Council katkum ba la pynkupbor da katei ka Aiñ, ba la ai jingmynjur ruh da u Lat ka Jylla.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem u la ong, ba la bthah ïa u Deputy Secretary in-charge Land ban pynmih noh mardor ïa ka “Circular” ne ka jingpyntip bad ban ai kopi ruh ïa ka KHAD (Regulation and Administration of Land) Act, 2021 sha baroh ki Bank bad ki shlem kynshew pisa khnang ba kin bud ïa ki jingbthah nangne shakhmat.“Ngi la kren da kaba shai ha ka jingïalang hadien ba la pynmih ïa ka “Circular” shaphang ka Aiñ, lada kano kano ka Bank ka dang ïai bteng ban kyntait ïa ka Loan Application ban ym ithuh ïa ki dulir khyndew ba la ai da ka Council, ngin sa leh ïa kaba donkam katkum ka Non-Tribal Regulation Act, bad ban khang khyrdep syndon kum ïa kita ki Bank,” u la ong.U Bah Syiem ula ïathuh ba kane ka aiñ ka la kren shai ba ki dulir khyndew ba la ai da ka Council dei ban ai jingithuh da kino kino ki bor kynthup ruh ïa ki Bank bad ki shlem kynshew pisa jong ki riewshimet.U la ong ba u Land Recording Officer u dei uba la pynkupbor ban ai ïa ka No Objection Certificte na ka bynta ka Mortgage and Land  Valuation Certificate bad ïa ka Non-encumbrance Certificate. “Namarkata, kumba la pynkupbor da ka aiñ, ngin ym ailad ïa ki Bank ba ki kyntait ïa ki Loan Applications jong ki briew jong ngi,” u la bynrap.Katkum ka jingong jong u, kane ka Aiñ ka la long ruh ka jingkyrkhu ïa ki paidbah khamtam ïa kito kiba kwah ban pynskhem ïa ka jinglong trai halor ka khyndew ka shyiap lajong. Ka KHADC ka la wanrah ruh la ki jong ki dor na ka bynta ka jingrejistar ïa ki jaka.
title: BYRNGEM KA KHADC BAN KHANG KHYRDEP ÏA KI BANK KIBA KYNTAIT ÏA KI DULIR KHYNDEW KA COUNCIL

content: Shillong, Nailur 03 : Ha u snem 2009, ka KSU ka la wad lyngba ka RTI katno ngut ki non tribal kiba leit pule MBBS na ka bhah Meghalaya naduh u snem 1991 haduh 2009 ki la wan phai ban shakri ia ka jylla.Katkum kane ka RTI, la shem ba napdeng ki spah ngut, tang 3 ngut kiba trei ha Meghalaya la ong ka kyrwoh na u Bah Donald V Thabah, General Secretary, Khasi Students’ UnionHa ka 23 tarik u Nailar 2023 ka KSU ka la pynmih kawei ka kyrwoh khubor halor ka jingshah pynrung ki bar jylla ha ka Screeening list jong ka bhah pule MBBS ha kaba ka seng ka la ioh jingtip ba bun ngut ki Non-Tribals ki ioh rung ha ka thup Open Category ki dei ki bym biang ki kot ki sla ban pynshisha ba ki dei ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya. Hadien kane ka sorkar jylla lyngba ka tnad ba dei peit ia ka koit ka khiah, ka la kular lyngba ki lad pathai khubor ba kan sa bishar bniah ban pynshisha la kita ki samla pule ki dei shisha ne em ki nong Meghalaya.Kyndit kynsan ha ka 1 tarik u Nailur 2023, la pynmih ia ka thup jong ki samla pule ban ioh leit pule MBBS lyngba ka bhah sorkar bad la shem ba kitei kijuh ki bym dei Khasi kiba don ha ka Screening List ki la shah jied ban leit pule lyngba ka bhah Open Category. Kane ka la pynshaiong ngaiñ ia ki paidbah bad bun ngut ki la ujor sha ka KSU. Hadien kane ka KSU ka la wad jingtip bniah halor ki kot ki sla jong kitei ki bar jylla bad ka la ioh ruh ki kot ki sla lyngba ki nongujor RTI halor katei ka phang. Ka KSU lyngba kitei ki jingtip ka pynbna ba katei ka rukom jied samla pule jong ka sorkar jylla ka long kaba bakla shibun, kaba iuhroit ia ka hok jong ki samla pule kiba dei ki trai jylla ym tang ki Khasi hynrei wat ia ki Non-Tribals kiba sah ha jylla bad kaba shuleh buittuh bad leh donbor da mano re mano.Ka KSU ka la lap shibun bah ki jingduna ha kaba ia dei bad ka thup Open Category. La shem ba ki kot ki sla jong ki 9 ngut ki bar jylla kiba shah jied ki long kiba duna haduh katta katta bad kiba ishan khmat ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingshisha (authenticity).Katkum kawei na ki kyndon ka sorkar jylla, ki samla pule ki dei ban don ki Permanent Resident Certificate (PRC) na ka jylla, hynrei ka KSU ka la shem ba bun ngut kitei ki bar jylla kim shym la don ka PRC kaba pura, hynrei ki thep (submit) pynban da ki Provisional Permanent Resident Certificate (PPRC) kiba treikam tang 3 lane 12 bnai. Kaba mut ba lada kut kita ki 3 bnai lane 12 bnai kitei ki briew kim dei shuh ki nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya. Shuh shuh la shem ruh ba bun bha na kitei ki PPRC ki la kut ka por (invalid). Ka jingkylli ka long ba kumno ka tnad Health ka pdiang ia kum kitei ki kot ki sla ki bym shong khia? Ki kot ki sla ki bym don hok ban pdiang kum kita ki syrnod ba shisha ban kam ba ki dei ki nong Meghalaya.Ki don ruh katto katne napdeng kitei ki 9 ngut kiba khlem submit ruh ia la ka Birth Certificate. Kiba thep pat ia ki Birth Certificate la shem ba ki dei ki Certificate kiba dang shu ioh shen na ka jylla khamtam na ka thain Garo Hills. Katkum ka rukom kino kino kiba apply Birth Certificate hadien shi bnai shaneng ba kha ia ki, ki hap ai bad ka Court Order. Kane ka kyndon ka treikam ia baroh kynthup ia ki Khasi. Hynrei jan baroh kitei ki bar jylla ki thep ia ki Birth Certificate ki bym don wat tang ka court order kaba buh ia ka jingkylli kumno la issue ia ki Birth Certificates khlem ki Court Orders.Ka birth certificate jong uwei u samla pule uba kyrteng u Md Mahmadul Islam la ioh ha u snem 2012 ban pyni ba udei u nong Meghalaya. Kane ka certificate ruh kam don court order. Hynrei kaba kham i kynsha ka long ba ha kata ka syrnod la kha ia u ha u snem 2003 hynrei ka tarik registration pat ka dei ha u snem 2002. Hato lah seh ban shna certificate lypa 1 snem shwa ban kha ia u briew kumba la iathuh lypa ba ia une u briew yn sa kha ha u snem ban wan.Uwei u samla pule u thep da ki kot ki sla ba na Bihar bad Rajasthan kynthup ia ka Birth Certificate hynrei une u samla u ioh ia ka PPRC na ka shnong Thangskai, East Jaintia Hills kaba pynlyngngoh ha kano ka nongrim ba la ai PPRC na Thangskai.Haba la bishar bniah pat ia 3 ngut ki bar jylla kiba don ha thup Waiting List jong ka Open Category la shem ba uwei na kine ruh um biang ki kot ki sla ban pynshisha ba u dei u nong Meghalaya.Tang na kitei ki jingshem haneng la paw shai ba wat ki bar jylla kiba dei na Meghalaya ruh ki la duh noh ia ka kabu ban pule MBBS lyngba ka bhah sorkar nalor ki Khasi.Ar ngut ki Khasi kiba ioh ba nyngkong bad ba ar ha ka Khasi-Jaintia Category ki dei ban ioh rung ha ka thup Open Category ha ka kyrdan ba 6 bad ba 7 hynrei ki la shah kynthup pynban ha ka thup Khasi-Jaintia Category. Kane ka jingleh jong ka sorkar ka pynduh noh ia ka hok jong ar ngut pat ki Khasi kiba don ha ka Waiting List jong ka Khasi-Jaintia Category. Ka Open Category kam dei ka General Category ha kaba yn ioh tang ki Non-Tribals, hynrei ka ktien Open hi ka la batai shai ba baroh lada dei ki Tribals ne Non-Tribals ki lah ban ioh rung ha kane ka thup katkum ka Merit.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, ha u snem 2020 ka la don ka jingleh buit tuh ka tnad Agriculture ban thep ia ki Khasi ha ka thup Khasi-Jaintia Category haba ki marks ki jong ki ki ia hap ban rung ha ka Open Category ban leit pule B.Sc. Agri. Ka KSU ha une u snem ka la leit ban pynsngew ia u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh uba dei u Agriculture Minister ha kato ka por bad u Bah Banteidor u la bthah mar mar ia ki ophisar ki jong u ban pynbeit ia kine ki jingbakla bad la thep ia kita ki samla pule Khasi ha ka Open Category.Mynshem snem ka bhah pule MBBS jong ka Meghalaya ka dei 87, hynrei ka Health Minister ka ong ba ka jylla ka la ioh bhah shuh shuh sa 10 tylli kaba pynkiew na ka 87 sha ka 97. Lada bishar pat ia ka ka MBBS quota list kaba mynta don tang 92 ngut ki samla ba shah jied.
