Shaei jah sa 5 tylli ki seats?Kine ki kynrum kynram baroh ba la lap da ka seng la shem ba ki long ki jingleh donbor bad thombor ia ki trai jylla naduh ki Khasi, ki Garo bad ki Non-tribals kaba pynduh ia ka hok ka jong ki ban leit pule MBBS lyngba ka bhah sorkar. Ka pyni ruh ia ka jingthurmur ka sorkar bad ki ophisar jong ka kaba ktah ban pynjot ia ka lawei ki trai jylla. Ka KSU ka maham tyngeh ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynbeit mardor ia kine ki kynrum kynram lym kumta ka KSU kan hap ban shim da ki sienjam kiba tyngeh ban dawa ia ka hok jong ki samla pule Khasi.
title: SHAH PYNDUH ARNGUT KI SAMLA KHASI BAN RUNG HA KA OPEN CATEGORY MBBS – KSU

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ka la byrngem ban weng noh ia ka jingiakren iasuk bad ka Sorkar halor ka jingshah khot hajir u General Secretary-cum-Publicity Secretary u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw hakhmat ka Kashari watla ka jingïakren ïasuk ka dang iaid shakhmat.Ka HNLC ka la dawa ruh ïa ka Sorkar ban weng noh ïa baroh ki jingpynngat kyndon ïa ki nongialam ka seng bad ong ruh ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban tyrwa ïa ka jingmap hynrei lym kumta ka HNLC ka lah ban weng noh ïalade na ka miej jingïakren ïasuk.“Ka HNLC ka pynrem jur ïa ka sienjam ba la shim dang shen da ka Sorkar Jylla, khamtam ïa ka jingpynbna paidbah ban khot hajir ïa u Bah Sainkupar Nongtraw, u General Secretary ka HNLC sha Kashari wat hapdeng ba ka jingïakren ïasuk ka dang iaid shakhmat,” ong u Bah Sainkupar Nongtraw ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi U Blei.“Kane kam dei shuh ka sien banyngkong ba ki nongïalam ka HNLC kynthup u Chairman bad u Finance Secretary, ki la shah khot hajir hapdeng ka jingïaid ka jingïakren ïasuk.  Kum kane ka jingleh ym tang ba ka pynartatien ïa ngi ban shaniah ïa ka Sorkar hynrei ka lah ruh ban ktah ïa ka jingpyrshang ban wanrah ïa ka jingïapynbeit,” ula ong.“Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la dawa ba ngan don lang ha ka jingïalang da kaba buh por ïa ka 30 tarik Nailur, katba ka Ministry of Home Affairs ha kawei ka liang, ka la pynkylla sohpdung ïa baroh ki nongïalam barangbah ka HNLC ba kin wan mih hi dalade,” ula ong.“Ka HNLC ka la ban jur ba baroh ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot ba ehrang kin ym wan shakhmat tad haduh ba la pynurlong ïa ki jingdawa ka seng. Ngi kyntu ruh ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakren bad ka kynhun ba la ai jingbit da ka HNLC Central Executive Committee ba la ïalam da u Vice Chairman,” u la ong.“Ngi dawa ba dei ban weng noh ïa baroh ki jingpynngat kyndon ïa ki nongïalam ka HNLC bad ban tyrwa ïa ka jingmap noh ïa ki. Khlem kine ki sienjam ba donkam, ki nongïalam jong ngi kin ym lah ban ïashim bynta ha ka jingïakren ïasuk. Haba ngi la aibor ïa u Vice Chairman bad ka kynhun ban mihkhmat ïa ki sha ka jingïakren, ka jingbym shimkhia jong ka Sorkar ka la sdang ban paw shai.  Lada kane ka dang ïaibteng, ngim ym don lynti pat da kumwei hynrei ban weng noh na ka jingïakren ïasuk,” la iai ban une u nongialam ka HNLC.U Bah Nongtraw u la ong, kumba ka paw, ym shym la don ruh kawei ka Peace Accord ne ka jingïateh kular ïasuk ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihng ka ban treikam, laitnoh tang ka Mizo Accord.“Wat ka Instrument of Accession, kaba ka Sorkar jong phi ka la leh jubor ïa ka Bri jong ngi 76 snem mynshwa, ym pat shym la pyntreikam kumba ka long. Nalor kata, wat ia ka Standstill Agreement ba la ïasoi hapdeng ka Sorkar India bad ka Federation of Khasi States la shu pynkheiñ. Halor kitei ki nongrim, hato phi lah ban khmih lynti ïa ngi ba ngin ïa bteng ban shaniah ïa ka sorkar?” ula ong.“Lada ka sorkar ka pyni ïa ka mon ban pynurlong ïa ki jingdawa ki jong ngi, kaba long kumjuh bad ka rukom leh jong ka sorkar India ha ka jingphiah ïa ka Jammu bad Kashmir, kumta ngi lah ban pdiang ban ai ka jingshaniah ïa ki bor sorkar. Ha ka 5 tarik, Nailar 2019, ka Parliament jong ka ri India ka la pynbna ba la pynsangeh ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Article 370 ha Kashmir. Hadien 86 sngi, ha ka miet jong ka 31 tarik u Risaw 2019 ka la phiah noh ïa ka Kashmir,” ong u Bah Sainkupar.“Lada ka sorkar ka pyni ïa katei kajuh ka nongrim ban phiah noh ïa ka jylla Meghalaya bad ban pynbna ba ka Hynñiewtrep kan dei noh la ka jong ka jylla ha ka por kaba la buh kumba la leh ïa ka Kashmir, kumta ngin lah ban ai ka jingshaniah ïa ka sorkar. Ha kum kane ka khyllipmat, ngin ym donkam ïa kano kano ka jingkyrshan pisa ne kaba phi ju kdew kum ka “Rehabilitation Packages” na ka bynta ka HNLC,” u la ong.“Kane ka jingïai bteng ban thombor ïa uwei pa uwei u nongïalam ka HNLC lyngba ka jingai notis ka dei ban ïoh ka jingshah kynthoh kaba khlaiñ na baroh ki liang hynrei ha kajuh ka por ngi kwah ban kren shai ba ngim tieng ïa ki aiñ kiba thombor ne ïa ka jingiap bad ngin ïai bteng ïa ka jingïaleh ka jong ngi khlem da pyndem ïa ka nongrim. Ka jingtieng kam ju don ha ka rukom treikam jong ka seng bad ka jingïakhun ka jong ngi ban rah atiar ka long kaba shong nongrim ha ka histori jong ka jingïakhih jong ngi,” ong u Bah Nongtraw.Shuh shuh ka jingkhang ne banned da ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) ïa ka Islamic Research Foundation (IRF) hapoh ka Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act (UAPA) 1967 ka long kaei kaei kaba donkam ban kdew. Katei ka jingkhang ka la paw ba ka long kaei kaei kumba la kam da u Zakir Naik uba la kynnoh ba ki heh ophisar jong ka sorkar India ki la ïakynduh ïa u ban ailad da kaba suk ban ïaid ban ïeng bad ban weng ïa baroh ki case. Ka long kaba hap ban kdew ba u Zakir Naik ula shah khang pyrshah ha kiba bun tylli ki Ri. Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynngat kyndon ka sorkar India ïa ka HNLC hapoh ka aiñ UAPA hapoh u pud u sam jong ka MHA, kumta kane ka la pynmih ïa ka jingkylli kaba kongsan, lada ka Sorkar u Modi ka lah ban pynjem ha kaba ïadei bad u Zakir Naik, balei ym shym la leh lang ïa kane kumjuh ïa ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot jong ka HNLC, kiba dang ïashim bynta ha ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ka sorkar?, la buh jingkylli ka seng.“Ka HNLC ka ïengskhem ha ka nongrim ban pynurlong ban don ïa ka jingsuk kaba shirta bad ka jingpynbeit ïa ka kam saiñ pyrthei. Ngi kyrmen skhem ba ka Sorkar kan khmih bniah biang ïa ka rukom trei na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka jingmynjur lang da baroh,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: BYRNGEM KA HNLC BAN WENG NA KA JINGÏAKREN BA JUR KA JINGSHAH KHOT HAJIR KI NONGÏALAM

content: Kumba hynñiew ngut ki dkhot Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organization (HITO) ki la shah kem hadien ba ki la kawang maw ia ki Pulit bad ki Magistrate kiba khanglad ia ki ban tur paidbah sha Secretariat ha ka lah sngi U Blei.Kane ka la jia hadien ba u President ka HITO u Bah Donbok Dhar u la shah khot hajir ha u investigation officer (IO) ha Sadar Police Station ha kaba iadei bad ka case ba la register pyrshah ia u ha u bnai Naitung hapoh ka Section 171 bad 34 IPC bad ka Section 105 jong ka MP Act kaba iadei bad ka jingphong Uniform iong da ki dkhot ka HITO.  Ki Uniform iong ki dei kiba iasyriem ia ki Uniform ba la phong da ki Pulit Special Operation Team (SOT).Ki Pulit ki la hap ban kawut lathi bad kawang da ki stun grenade hadien ba ki dkhot ka HITO kiba don da ki spah ngut ki la sdang ban kawang da ki maw ia ki pulit katba ki dang tur da ka bor sha Secretariat.Ha kane ka jingiapynibor, u Deputy Superintendent of Police (Dy.SP) u la mynsaw.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger u la iathuh, ha ka jingshisha, u Investigation Officer (IO) u la khot hajir tang ia u President jong ka HITO ban leit mih sha Sadar Police Station hynrei ia une u nongialam ka seng la synran da ki spah ngut ki dkhot.“Hooid, ngi la shah ban rung shapoh thanat tang 5-6 ngut na ki, katba kiwei pat ki la ap shabar ka phalor.  Hadien ba ngi la shim ia ki jingkren jong u, ma u ryngkat bad kiwei pat la pyllait ba kin mih noh na thanat,” ong u Bah Nongtnger.“Haba ki la mih nangne, ngi sngewthuh ba ki kwah ban tur sha Secretariat ban leit kawang ia ki plakad ba ki la rah. Tang shu tip ia kata, la khanglad ia ki hakhmat ka Ophis DC da ki Magistrate bad ki Pulit,” u la ong.“Tang shu poi ha kane ka jaka, ka jingiapynibor ka la nang jur, ki dkhot ka HITO ki la kawang da ki maw ia ki Pulit bad ia ki Magistrate bad pynibor ruh wat ia ki Pulit kynthei bad ki la kawang maw ruh wat ia u Dy.SP uba la mynsaw malu mala.  Haba ngi iohi ia ka jingpynibor ngi la hap ban kawut lathi bad siat Tear Gas,” u la bynrap.U SP u la pyntip ba ia mynta ki don 6-7ngut ki dkhot ka HITO kiba la shah kem.Haba kylli,u la ong, “ka jingkhot hajir ka dei namarba ki phong da ki Uniform rong iong khlem ka jingioh jingbit. Dei na kata ka daw ba la register case bad la khot hajir ia u President sha thanat ban shim ia ka jingai jubab jong u.”
title: SHAH KEM 7 NGUT KI DKHOT HITO BA PYNIBOR BAD KI PULIT HAKHMAT DC OFFICE

content: Ka Kashari jong u Sessions Judge, West Jaintia Hills ka la pynmih da ka hukum ban set along haduh 10 snem kynthih ia u Dri Phawa hadien ba la lap ba u donkti ban leh beijot ia kawei ka khynnah rit ha kawei ka shnong ha West Jaiñtia Hills District.U kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka West Jaintia Hills District, u la iathuh ba ha ka 26 tarik, Jymmang, 2001 ka kmie jong kane ka khynnah rit ka la ujor da ka ejahar ha u Officer In-Charge jong ka Jowai Police  pyrshah ia u Dri Phawa uba sah ha ka shnong Myrjai da kaba kynnoh ba u la leh be-ijot ia ka khun jong ka ha ka 23 tarik u Jymmang, 2001.Ki Pulit ki la register case ha Jowai Police Station hapoh ka Section 376 Indian Penal Code (IPC).  Ia ka jingtohkit la bynshet ha ka ASI W. Vaichei. Hadien ka jingtohkit, ka Investigating Officer ka la pynngat kyndong ia uba la shah kynoh donkti ha ka Section 376 IPC.Ha ka 31 tarik u Nailar, 2023 ka Kashari jong u Sessions Judge, West Jaintia Hills hadien ba la pynshong nongrim ia ki sakhi ki sabut ba la ioh lum, la lap ba u Dri Phawa u donkti ha ka kam runar bad la rai ban set along ia u halor  ka jingpynkhein ia ka Section 376 IPC.
title: 10 SNEM HUKUM SET ALONG KA KASHARI ÏA UBA LEH BE-IJOT ÏA KA HEPRIT

content: Ka Kashari jong u Session Judge, West Jaiñtia Hills District ka la hukum ban set along shi jingim ia ki lai ngut ki runar kiba donkti ban dkhat jubor ia ka jingim jong u Bah Lobi Chullet ha ka 1 tarik, Jylliew, 2006 ha kawei ka jaka ba la tip kum ka  “Ait Shrieh’ ha ka shnong Thadsning.Kine ki lai ngut ki dei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Shem Langstang, u Tharki Langstang bad u Hiarki Langstang.U kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills District u la iathuh, ha ka 2 tarik, Jylliew, 2006 u Bah Barley Chullet, uba dei u para jong u Bah Lobi Chullet u la mudui da ka ejahar ha Jowai Police Station pyrshah ia u Shem Langstang, u Tharki Langstang bad ia u Hiarki Langstang halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki dei kiba donkti ban dkhat jubor ia ka jingim jong u Lobi Chullet ha ka 1 tarik, Jylliew, 2006 ha “Ait Shrieh”, ThadsningKi Pulit ki la register case ha Jowai Police Station hapoh ka Section 302/201/34 Indian Penal Code (IPC). Ia kane ka case la shimti ban tohkit da u SI C.Lamare. Hadien ka jingtohkit, u Investigating Officer (IO) u la pynngat kyndon pyrshah ia kine ki lai ngut hapoh ka Section 302/201/34 IPC.Ha ka 30 tarik u Nailar, 2023 ka Kashari kaba la shong bishar halor kane ka jingjia, da kaba pynshong nongrim katkum ki sakhi sabut ka la rai pynrem ia u Shem Langstang, Tharki Langstang bad ia u Hiarki Langstang halor ka jingdonkti ban dkhat jubor ia ka mynsiem briew hapoh ka Section 302 IPC.
title: SHAH SET ALONG SHI JINGIM 3 NGUT KI NONGPYNÏAP BRIEW HA RILUM JAIÑTIA

content: KaHynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) Central Executive Council (CEC) ka la pynrem jur ia ka jingleh jong uwei u pulit uba phong jain iong uba kah dur ialade, uba lah bret da u Stun Grenade ha kawei na ki dukan jong ka longkmie Khasi.“Katkum ka jingiohi lyngba ki video ba la saphriang kaba pyni ba une u Pulit u lah kawang ia u Stun grenade (tear gas) hapoh kane ka dukan kaba don ha Parking Lot mar pyrshah jong ka SBI Main Branch mynta ka sngi,” ong u kyrwoh da u General Secretary ka seng u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem.“Kane ka jingleh jong une u pulit I kumba u don jingthmu ban shim ia ka jingim jong kiba don hapoh jong kane ka dukan kiba kynthup ia ki trai dukan bad ia ki nongwan bam. Shu donbok ba ha kane ka dukan kim shym lah pyndonkam ia ki tyndong shet (LPG Cylinder) hynrei te ka lah jia kaei kaei kaba sngewsih  kat ban poi sha ka jingiap ruh ia kiba don hapoh kane ka dukan,” ong u kyrwoh.“Na ka liang ka Seng ngi dawa ba dei ban pynshitom ia une u Pulit bad ia ki ophisar ki bym shym la lah ban teh lakam ia ki pulit lajong. Ha ka jingshisha haba pyndonkam ia ki tear gas dei ban da antad tang ban pynpra ia ki paidbah ym ban leit kawang sha ki dukan sha jong ki riew shimet. Ka Sorkar kadei ban pynlong da ka jingtohkit kaba laitluid la utei u pulit u bret ia utei u bom da ladae hi lane la don ki ophisar kiba aibor ia u ba un leh ia katei ka kam beain,” ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.“Ngi dawa ruh ba ki bor pulit bad ki bor synshar district ki dei ban pynshai naei ki ioh ia ka bor ba kin leit kawang ia kum kine ki tiar pynbthei hapoh ki dukan jong ki riew paidbah ki bym don bynta eiei bad ka jingjia ia kulmar. Ka Sorkar ka dei ban leit siew bai lutksan mardor ia ki trai dukan bad kumjuh ruh ka dei ban ai bai dawai ia kiba mynsaw ha katei ka dukan,” dawa ka seng.
title: PYNREM JUR KA HYC ÏA KI PULIT BA KAWANG STUN GRENADE HA DUKAN DIE SHA

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council, Umiam Circle, ba la lamkhmat da ki nongialam jong ka Circle ba kynthup ia u President bad u General Secretary bad ki dkhot, ha ka janmiet lah sngi U Blei ki la ioh bat ia artylli ki kali, kata, ka Force Traveller bad ka kali Sumo, kiba shong da ki barjylla kumba 25 ngut kiba wan na ka jylla Assam da ka jingthmu ban leit trei bylla ha karkhana Topcem Cement, Jaintia Hills bad kiwei kiwei ki jaka jong ka Sor Shillong.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President ka HYC- Umiam Circle u Shinestar Kharpan, la ong, “ha ka jingtohkit da ki dkhot ka seng, la lap ba kine ki briew kim don satia ia ki kot ki sla kiba biang ba kin wanrung bad trei bylla hapoh ka Jylla jong ngi hynrei sngew lyngngoh ba kumno ki lait ban wan iaid lyngba ka Infiltration checkgate kaba don ha Byrnihat, Ri Bhoi District. Kumta, lah pynphai kylla noh ia kine ki kali ha ryngkat ki briew sha ki jaka kiba ki wan da ka jingmaham ruh ba kim dei ban wan khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang.”“Ngi pynrem jur ia kane ka jingleh jong ki pulit kiba ap ha katei ka Gate bad ngi kyntu ia kiba kidei ban shimkhia bad pyndep hok ia la ka kamram kaba lah bynshet ha ki. Kane ka jingleh jong ki ka lah pat ban buh jingma ia ngi kum ka Jaidbynriew,” u la ong.“Na ka liang ka Seng ngin iai long kiba phikir bad peit pyrman bha bad pynlong ruh ka jingtalasi kaba khah khah khnang ba ngin ioh ban khanglad ia ka jingrung jingmih ki poiei ki poiwir ha kane ka Ri kaba ieid ka jong ngi nangne shakhmat ruh,” ong u kyrwoh.
title: ÏOH BAT KA HYC HADUH 25 NGUT KI BAR JYLLA BA THMU LEIT TREI SHA KARKHANA TOPCEM

content: Ki riewshim kabu ki bym don shuh ia ka mynsiem iatiplem na ka bynta ka jingkhuid jingsuba jong ka mei mariang, ki la bret dusmon ia ki jaboh ha rud surokbah Mawiongrim harum kawei ka jaka theh khyndew kaba don hajan ka Petrol Pump.Ia kane la lap da ka kynhun lum khubor jong ka BatesiTV ha ka 4 tarik nailur, 2023 bad hadien katto katne por la wan poi sa u Bah Nicholas Kharnami ba ju khot sin da u bah Manik ha kaba u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor kane ka jingleh dusmon jong ki riew shim kabu ban pynjaboh ia ki surok bad ia ki lynti ki syngkien.Na ka liang jong u Rangbah Dong ka Block-2 jong ka shnong mawiongrim, u Bah Rebelson Suchiang u la ong ba ka shnong kan wad ia ka jingtip kaba bniah ia kiba donkti lyngba u Bah Manik shwa ban shim da kawei pat ka sienjam.
title: JUR KA JINGBRET JABOH DUSMON KI RIEWSHIM KABU HA SUROKBAH MAWÏONGRIM

content: : Ka seng kieng atiar ba la shah khein be-ain, ka Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ha ka lah sngi u Blei ka la pynkynmaw biang ia ka jingdawa na ka Sorkar ban weng lut ia baroh ki Case ba la pynngat ia baroh ki nongialam ka seng kumba la leh da ka Sorkar Nagaland ia ka NSCN (IM) ha u snem 2002.“Ka Sorkar kam dei ban shet kylla lane ban ialam bakla ia ka HNLC.  Ngi khmihlynti ia ka Sorkar ba kan weng shwa nyngkong eh ia ki mukotduma, kumba la leh da ka Sorkar Nagaland ha u snem 2002. Lada ka Sorkar Nagaland ka lah ban leh ia kane, balei ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka tieng ban bud ia kane kajuh ka lynti?” la buh jingkylli u General Secretary-cum-Publicity Secretary ka HNLC u Bah Sainkupar Nongtraw ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.Haba shim ia ka jingkren jong u Bah Prestone Tynsong uba long ruh u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba bat ia ka tnat Kam Pohing, kum ka ‘political nonsense’ ne ka jingkren bym don jingmut, u Bah Nongtraw u la ong, “ha ka jingkren jong u Bah Tynsong ha kaba iadei bad ka jingphah ka Kashari ia ka shithi khot hajir ia nga kum u General Secretary, ka paw shai ba ki ktien ba u kren ki dei tang ki jingkren bym don nongrim.  Ka jingkylli kaba mih ka long: mano ba don ia ka bor ban thung ia ki nongbishar jong ka Supreme Court bad ka High Court? Ka bor ban map ia ki seng kieng atiar ka shong ha ka Sorkar Jylla.U la ong ba ha kiba bun ki ri, dei u khlieh synshar jong ka jylla ne u khlieh synshar jong ka sorkar, kum u President ne Myntri Rangbahduh, kiba don ia ka bor ban map.Ha kawei pat ka liang, ka kamram jong ka Ingbishar ka long ban shong bishar bad pyndonkam ia ka aiñ ym ban ai jingmap.U Bah Nongtraw u la ai da ka nuksa kaba iadei bad ka NSCN (IM), tang hadien ba ki nongialam Naga ki la rung sha India ban iashim bynta ha ka jingiakren iasuk ha u snem 2002, ka sorkar Nagaland ka la weng lut ia baroh ki mukotduma pyrshah ia ki.  Haba peit ia kiei kiba la jia, mano ba don ia ka bor ban map ei noh ia ka Mizo National Front?“Lada u Bah Tynsong u buh jingkylli ia ki kam runar ba pyntriem, ka jingong jong u ka iatakhuh bad ka jingkren jong u Myntri Rangbah, ki ophisar ka MHA bad u AK Mishra uba long u ksiang nongpyniasuk.  Ka jingong jong u Bah Prestone ba ka kam bymman ka dei beit ka kam bymman, ka iatakhuh bad ka jingngeit ba ka lah ban don ka jingiapher ha ka jinglong jong ki kam bymman bapher bapher,” u la ong.Haba kynnoh ba ka dei tang ka buit ban pynap shrip ia ki nongialam ka HNLC, u Bah Nongtraw u la ong, “lada u Bah Tynsong u pynksan ba ka dei tang ka kam ba ju leh da ka Kashari, hato kane ka mut ba lada u Chairman bad u General Secretary ki ioh ia ka hukum shah kem (arrest warrant), ka Sorkar kan ym lah ban tuklar namar ka jingiaphiah ia ka bor hapdeng ka bor synshar ka Jylla bad ka Kashari?  Lada ka Sorkar hi kam lah ban leh eiei, ka paw ba ka dei ka jingpynap shrip ba la pynap lypa.”
title: DAWA KA HNLC BAN WENG LUT BAROH KI CASE KUMBA LEH KA SORKAR NAGALAND ÏA KA NSCN (IM)

content: Shillong, Nailur 04 : Ka Khasi Students’ Union, Mawlai Circle ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Samla Biangbor Paliar, President, KSU Mawlai Circle sha ki lad pathai khubor la ong ba hadien ba ka seng ka lah ioh jingtip, ba ka don ka jingiakynad hapdeng ki dkhot kawei ka seng bhalang bad ki pulit hapoh ki thaiñ Khyndailad ha kaba la sakhi ia ka jingpynibor jong ki Pulit.Ha kane ka jingpynibor ki pulit, ka la don ka jingleh palat jong ki bor pulit ha kaba ki lah thombor khlem kheiñ snep shuh ia ki kynthei briew kiba die dukan hapoh ka jaka pynieng kali jong ka MUDA ha pyrshah ka SBI ophis hajan Khyndailad, la batai ka kyrwoh.Kane ka jingthombor ki pulit da kaba kawang ia u Bom pynsat khmat hapoh ka dukan diesha wat hapdeng ba kitei ki longkmie ki lah khang khyrdep ia ka dukan ka jong ki. Kane ka jingleh jong uwei u pulit phong jaiñ iong kaba lah ban iohi bad ba la saphriang lyngba ki kor ring dur (Video), ka dei ka jingthmu ban pynmynsaw ia kitei ki ar ngut ki kynthei briew kiba dei napoh ka shnong Mawlai Mawtawar, Umjalimut bad kane ka jingleh utei u pulit kadei ym tang ka jingleh kput lane leh rhah hynrei ka dei ka jingthmu wat ban shim ia ka jingim ka jong kitei ki kynthei briew ki bym don bynta eiei ha ka jingklumar kaba mih ha ki thaiñ Khyndailad mynne ka sngi. la ong shuh shuh ka kyrwohKa Seng ka pynrem jur ia kane ka jing thombor ki pulit ki bym shym la don ka mynsiem jingisynei shuh wat ia ki kynthei briew, ka Seng ruh ka dawa ba ki bor ba halor ki dei ban pynshitom mardor ia ki pulit kiba donkti ha katei ka jingthombor.Shuh shuh ka seng ka ikyndit ia ka jingleh khlaiñ bor ki pulit ia la ki doh ki snam hapoh sor Shillong, hynrei katba ki pynrit bad pyndem tdong pat ha ki thaiñ khappud, pynkut ka kyrwoh na ka Seng.
title: PYNREM KA KSU MAWLAI CIRCLE ÏA KA JINGKAWANG BOM PYNSATKHMAT KI PULIT HAPOH DUKAN SHA.

content: : Khatlai ngut ki nonghikai kiba hikai ha ki skul bapher bapher jong ka jylla ki la shah pynkup burom da ka khusnam State Award ha ka jingrakhe ia ka sngi kyrpang jong ki nonghikai ha ka ri India baroh kawei bad kynthup ruh ia ka sngi kha jong u President barim ka ri India u Dr S. Radhakrishnan.Ia kine ki nonghikai la pynkup burom ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha U Soso Tham Auditorium, Shillong ha ka 5 tarik u Nailur, 2023 da u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma.Kine ki 13 ngut ki nonghikai kiba la shah pynkup burom ki long ka Principal jong ka Laban Assamese Girls’ Higher Secondary School ka V. Dipali Sharma Rao, ka Kong Belinda Kharsati kaba dei ka Head Teacher, jong ka Pomlahier Lower Primary School, u babu Sising Ryntong uba hikai kum u Assistant Teacher, New Nongstoin ‘B’ Government Lower Primary School, u Babu Apborsing L. Mawlong uba hikai kum u Assistant Teacher ha Tirot Sing Memorial Government Upper Primary School, Nongkhlaw, u Babu Kwirin Diengdoh, Headmaster, Mawsaw Government Upper Primary School, Mawkyrwat, ka Kong Ewanmidaka Mukhim kaba hikai kum ka Assistant Teacher jong ka Government Girls’ Higher Secondary School, Jowai, u Babu Ribait Oo Pde u Assistant Teacher jong ka Tep Kyndait Government Upper Primary School, Tuber Kmaishnong, u Babu Golak Chandra Medhi, u Assistant Lecturer jong ka Jirang Government Higher Secondary School, New Jirang, u Babu Babansing Ch. Sangma u Head Teacher jong ka Rongreng Baiza Government Lower Primary School, u Babu Wilton Marak u Headmaster jong ka Daram Government Upper Primary School, u babu Frederick R. Sangma u Headmaster jong ka Dobasipara Upper Primary School, u Babu Manoj Kumar Prasad, u Assistant Teacher jong ka Montfort Centre for Education, ka Mirabella G. Sangma kaba dei ka Head Teacher-Cum Secretary jong ka Chengkompara Nokat Government Lower Primary School bad u babu Nozmul Arefin uba long u Vice Principal jong ka Baghmara Government Higher Secondary School.Ha kane ka sngi, u kongsan u la pyllait paidbah ia ki projek bapher bapher jong ka SSA ba kynthup ia ka website jong ka Samagra Shiksha Abhiyan, ka PM e-Vidya Meghalaya bad kiwei kiwei.Nalor kine, ki 13 ngut ki nonghikai kiba la ioh ia ka State Award, la pynkup burom ruh ia ki 36 ngut ki nonghikai kiba la ioh ia ka District Award bad ia ka Special Award jong u snem 2023.Ki 36 ngut ki nonghikai na kylleng ka jylla kiba la ioh ia ka District Award ki long na East Khasi Hills, ka Dr. Careen E.G Marbaniang ka Assistant Teacher jong ka Mawkhar Christian Higher Secondary School, Shillong na ka bynta ka Secondary Section, u Babu Wallamkupar Lynrah, u Assistant Teacher jong ka Mawsiatkhnam Prebyterian Upper Priamry School (SSA) na ka bynta ka Upper Primary Section bad ka Kong Dafrit Nongkynrih, ka Assistant Teacher jong ka Tynring Govt. Lower Primary School, Tynring na ka bynta ki Lower Primary Section.Ia ka Special Award 2023 (Inclusive School) la ai sha Kong Berrilang Nongrum, ka Special Educator jong ka Mary Rice Centre for Special Education, Laitumkhrah, Shillong. Katba u Dilip Kumar Mangar na St. Anthony’s Higher Secondary School, Shillong bad ka Miniefer Syiemlieh na KJP Girls’ Higher Secondary School, Shillong kiba la ioh ia ka khusnam Best Scoutmaster and Guide Captain 2023.
title: ÏOH STATE TEACHER’S AWARD 13 NGUT KI NONGHIKAI HA KA TEACHER’S DAY

content: Shillong, Nailur, 05: Ka jingialang ba nyngkong jong ka ‘Play to Learn’ Summit la pynlong ha Shillong ha ka sngi baar kaba pyni ia ka bynta ba kongsan jong ka jingialehkai na ka bynta ban tei ia ka jingim ba pura jong ki khynnah.Ia kane ka jingialang la pynlong da ka sorkar Meghalaya, Meghalaya Early Childhood Development Mission (MECDM) bad ka Meghalaya Health Systems Strengthening Project (MHSSP) ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Sesame Workshop India Trust ryngkat ka jingkyrshan jong ka SBI Foundation bad ka Indian Institute of Banking & Finance.Ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la wanrah ia ka jingtreikam jong ka Early Childhood Development Mission (MECDM), kaba long ruh ka sienjam treikam eh kaba nyngkong ha ka ri. Ka thong kaba ha khmat jong kane ka sienjam treikam ka long ban pynlong ia ki khynnah kiba biang pura da kaba ai ia ki jingkyrshan kiba donkam ha ka jingim khynnah jong ki: naduh ka por ba dang pun ia ki haduh ba kin da dap phra snem ka rta. Ki nongioh myntoi kiba lah ban ioh myntoi na kane ki long kito kiba sumar ia ki khyllung, ki khyllung kiba naduh ka 0 haduh 8 snem ka rta (kynthup ruh ia kito kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhot met) ki longkmie ba armet bad kiba dang ai buin. Kane ka Mission kan pyrshang ban pynkylla ia ki Anganwadi Centers sha ki ECD Center khnang ba lah ban ai jingkyrshan ba pura ia ki khynnah, kynthup naduh ka jingai ia ki jingbam ba tei, ka jingiairap ban hikai ia ki na ka bynta ba kin heh kin san pura, ba kin ioh ka jingmut jingpyrkhat kaba khlain bad nang ban tip kiei ba kiei ba ki dei ban leh ha kaba iadei bad ki para briew bad ha kaba iadei bad ka jingsngew jong ki, bad kumno ba kin lah ban tip shaphang kiei ki jingdonkam ba kin lah ban leh bha ha skul bad ha ka jingim.Shuh shuh, ka don ruh ka sienjam treikam kaban phai khmat ruh sha ki bynta ban wanrah ia kiei kiei kiba iadei bad ka ECD ba lah ban leh ha shong ha thaw bad ha ki iing ki sem. Ki lah ban long ba, ki seng iarap lade jong ki kynthei bad ia ki kpa ba kin ioh ia ki jinghikai khnang ba ki lah ban long kum ki nongai jingiarap sha ki nongpeit ia ki khynnah bad ba kin lah ruh ban hikai ia ki nongpeit ia ki katto katne ki bynta ba ki lah ban leh ha iing ban kyntiew ia ka jingsngewthuh jong ki khynnah ia ki phang bapher bapher bad ban tei ia ka khynnah ha ka rukom kaba pura.Kum shi bynta jong kane ka sienjam treikam, ka Sesame Workshop India, da ka jingiarap na ka MHSSP, ka ai ia ki jinghikai kiba iadei bad ki kam tehnical bad kumjuh ruh ban wanrah ia ki sienjam treikam ban kyrshan ia ka ECD Mission ha kaba iadei bad ka jingsaindur bad ka jingwanrah ia ka rukom treikam ba paka jong ka ECD khnang ba kiei kiei kiba mih na ka jingtrei ka ECD mission ka jylla kan long kaba bha tam. Ka Sesame Workshop India kadei kawei  na ki shnat kaba long kum ka nongialam kaba paw bha ha ka pyrthei bad kaba wanrah ruh ia ki buit treikam thymmai kiba iadei bad ka jingai jinghikai ia ki khynnah ba kan long kaba iahap bha bad ka jinghikai kumjuh ruh bad ha kaba iadei bad ka jingsngewthuh ia kiei kiei kiba la hikai, bad kaba la paw bha ruh ha ka long ka shnat kaba la lah ban paw ha kaba iadei bad ka jinghikai ba la ai sha ki nongpeit ia ki khynnah bad kumjuh ruh ia ki khynnah ha India bad ha baroh kawei ka pyrthei.Haba ai ia ka khubor lyngba ka video sha ki nongpyniaid jong ka lympung jingialang, U Conrad Sangma, u myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya u la ong, “Nga ngeit skhem ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdonkam jong ka por ban ialehkai na ka bynta ban hikai ia ki khynnah naduh ki por ba ki dang rit. Ka Meghalaya Early Childhood Development Mission kadei ka sienjam treikam kaba phai khmat ha kaba iadei bad kumno ban tei ia ka jingheh jingsan jong ki khynnah ha ki snem ba ki donkam ba kin heh kin san.” U la ban jur ruh da kaba kren shaphang ki dak ki shin kiba lah ban iohi lyngba ki jingpynheh pynsan bad jingsumar jong ki kmie ki kpa ha ka rukom kaba bha tam bad ka jinghikai jong ki khynnah lyngba ki jinghikai kiba wanrah jingkmen ia ki khynnah, bad ban bynrap ruh ia kane da kaba ai ia ki jingbam tei met bad ka jinghikai ia shibun kiei kiei kiban tei ia ka bor pyrkhat ki khynnah.U Sangma u la pynpaw ruh shaphang ki sienjam treikam kiba bun tylli ba la shim da ka sorkar, bad ka jingthmu jong kine ki baroh ka long ban kyntiew ia ka Meghalaya sha ki kyrdan ba shalor khnang ba ka jylla kan long kum kawei na ki 10 tylli ki jylla kiba ha khlieh ha ka ri. U la kyntu ia baroh kiba iadon bynta lang ha kine ki kam ba kin pyntreikam ia ka ECD katkum ka sienjam treikam ka mission, da kaba peit ia ka kum kawei na ki lad babha tam ban saindur ia ka lawei jong ki nongshnong shnong kiba dang rit.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u myntri ka tnad Social Welfare, ka sorkar Meghalaya u la ong, “Ha kum kane ka por ba ngi iadonlang hangne mynta ka sngi ha ka jingialang jong ka ‘Play to Learn’ Summit, ka long shisha kaba sngewktah haduh katta katta ban don ka jingiatreilang hapdeng ka Meghalaya Early Childhood Development Mission, Sesame Workshop India Trust, bad kiwei kiwei ki shnat kiba iatrei paralok lang. Ka jingialehkai ka long kaba kit jingmut bha; kadei ka lad ka lynti ban tei ia ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki khynnah bad ban lah ban thaw ia ka lawei ba phyrnai na ka bynta ka Meghalaya.”U Sampath Kumar, Principal Secretary, ka sorkar Meghalaya, u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew jong u, da kaba ong, “Ka jinglong jong ki khynnah hi ka long ba ki sngewtynnad ban ialehkai bad ka long kaba donkam ba ngi dei ban ithuh bad tip ia ka bynta jong ka jingdonkam ka jinglehkai na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ka jingheh jingsan jong ki khynnah ha ka rukom kaba pura. Ka sorkar Meghalaya ka ieng skhem ha ka jingtrei ba radbah jong ka ban wanrah ia ki lad treikam treijam ban noh synniang sha kata ka jingangnud ban ioh ia ki jinghikai kiba bha tam ban kyntiew ia ki khynnah naduh ka por ba ki dang rit.”Ha kajuh ka rukom, ka Sesame Workshop India ka la iatreilang ryngkat ryngkat bad ka tnad Social Welfare Department ban leh ia ka “Learn Play Grow” ha ki 4 tylli ki district ka Meghalaya.  Lyngba ka jingkyrshan ba la ioh na ka SBI Foundation naduh ka snem 2020, kane ka sienjam treikam ka la ai jingmyntoi ia ki 90,000 ngut ki khynnah ha ki 3000 tylli ki Anganwadi Centres da kaba ai jinghikai ia ki nongtrei Anganwadi ban ai ia ki jinghikai kiba phai khmat sha ki khynnah, ki jinghikai ba la ai lyngba ki jinglehkai, ki jinghikai pule, bad kiwei kiwei ki lad ai jinghikai kiban iarap ban tei pura ia ka jingheh jingsan jong ki khynnah ha baroh ki liang naduh ka por ba dang rit ha baroh kawei ka jylla.U Sanjay Prakash, Managing Director, SBI Foundation, u la iaroh ia ka jinglong ba kyrpang jong ka jinghikai lyngba ka jingialehkai bad u la ong ba kadei ka bynta ba kongsan ha ka jingheh jingsan jong ki khynnah naduh ka por ba ki dang rit. U la ong, “Ka SBI Foundation ka sngew sarong bha ia ka jingtrei ba shitrhem jong ka ia ka jylla Meghalaya bad sha ka sorkar mynta la palat 3 snem ryngkat bad ki shnat ba iatreilang kum ka Sesame Workshop India ban pynskhem ia ka ECCE ha ka jylla. Ngi la aiti lut sha ka jylla bad ngi pyntikna ba ki jingmut jingpyrkhat ba lung jong ki khynnah kiba pule ha ki anganwadi centre kin ioh ia kiei kiei kiba bha tam ha ka jingim bad kine ki khynnah kin nang heh nang san bad kin nang stad lyngba ki jingpule ha ki primary bad ki jingpule secondary bad ki lah ban noh synniang sha ka jingkiew ka roi ka par jong ka India hadien habuh.”U Tusharendra Barpanda, Head- Professional Development Centre, Eastern Zone, Indian Institute of Banking & Finance U ong, “Ngi ngeit ba ka jingheh jingsan ba pura jong ki khnnah ka long kaba donkam tam bad ka bynta ba hapdeng jong kiei kiei baroh, bad ka IIBF ka sngew sarong ban ai jingkyrshan ia kine ki sienjam ba la shim na ka bynta ki khynnah naduh kiba dang rit ha Meghalaya. Nga sngew skhem ba ka jingbteng jong ka jingtreikam lang jong ngi kan lah ban thaw ia ki buit bad ki lad ba thymmai ban ai jingkyrshan ia ka jingpyrshang jong ka sorkar Meghalaya ban kyntiew ia ka jinghikai lyngba ka jingialehkai ha Meghalaya.”Ka Sonali Khan, Managing Trustee, Sesame Workshop India Trust ka la ban jur, “Ka jingiatehlok bad ka sorkar Meghalaya, ka SBI Foundation bad ka IIBF ban kyrshan ia ki kam kiba iadei bad ka early childhood development ha ka jylla Meghalaya kadei kaei kaei kaba khraw na ka bynta jong ka Sesame Workshop India. Nga iohi ia ka jingmyntoi bad ka jinglah jong kane ka rynsan ba kan long kum ka rynsan kaban wad bniah ia shibun kiei kiei, ban pyrkhat thymmai ia ki kam ba bha bad ban wanrah ia ki buit thymmai. Ka Sesame Workshop ka la wanrah ruh ia ka jinghikai ia ki khynnah lyngba ki jingpynlehkai ha kylleng ka pyrthei mynta la palat ia ka 50 snem bad la lah ruh ban iohi ia ki jingkylla. Ka shong sa tang ha ngi kum ki briew kiba la heh la san kiba dei ki nongri nongsumar, ba ngi dei ban wanrah ia ki jinghikai lyngba ki jinglehkai na ka bynta ban tei ia ki khynnah ha ka rukom kaba pura.”Naduh ba la pyllait paidbah, ka ECD Mission ka la lah ban pynlong ia ki jingialang ha ki block ne ki “block conventions” ha ki 10 tylli ki block jong ka jylla, ban ai jinghikai ia ki nongialam shnong bad ki nongtrei kiba ha khmat eh, bad kumjuh ruh ia ki nongtrei sorkar shaphang ka jingdonkam jong ka Early Childhood Development ne ka jingheh jingsan ba bit ba biang jong ki khynnah naduh ki por ba dang rit, bad ban khot ban wer ia ki shnong ki thaw ba kin trei na ka bynta ban pyniaid ia ki kam jong ka ECD Mission ha ka rukom kaba paka tam. Ka bynta treikam kaba kham kyrpang bha jong kine ki jingialang ka long ka jingiatreilang jong ka shnong ka thaw. Ngi pynpaw ba ka rukom treikam jong ka ECD ka long kaba la iatrelang da kiba bun tnad bad ki shnat bad ka jing donkam ban ioh ia ka jingiatreilang khnang ba kane ka mission kan long kaba lah ban poi sha ka thong. Sa kawei pat ka bynta ba kyrpang jong kane ka mission ka long ban ka phai khmat bha sha ki nongialam shnong bad ka jingiashim bynta jong ki tnad treikam bapher bapher; kum ka tnad Social Welfare, Health & Family, Education, Meghalaya State Rural Livelihoods Society (MSRLS) bad ka State Rural Employment Society (SRES). Ka Mission ka iohi ba ka jingjop kan shong eh lada ka don ka jingsngewtrai jong ki shnong ki thaw ia kane ka kam, kaba kynthup naduh ia ki nongialam shnong bad haduh ki iing ki sem.Kat haduh u bnai Nailur, ka ECD Mission ka la lah ban pynmih ia ki jingthoh kiba iadei bad kumno ban pyniaid ia ka kam jong ka Mission ia kaba yn sa sam sha ki shnong ki thaw jong ka Meghalaya khnang ba yn lah ban iarap ia ki briew, ki nongialam shnong bad ki kynhun treikam shnong jong ki Seng Iarap lade ne ki self-help group, ba ki lah ban pyniaid ia ki kam jong ka ECD. Ka Mission ia mynta ka dang iaid sha kmat na ka bynta ban ai ia ki jinghikai na ka bynta ki Master Trainers ha ki Cluster Level. Ha ka 24 tarik u bnai Nailar, 2023 la dep ban ai training ia ka kynhun ba nyngkong, da kaba ai jinghikai ba kham bha shuh shuh ia ki lady supervisor, ki cluster coordinator, ki ASHA facilitator, ki Cluster resource persons, Gram Sevaks/Sevikas, Anganwadi workers, ASHAs, Community Gender Health Activists (CGHAs), ki nonghikai skul, ki nongri nongsumar ia ki khynnah (ki kmie, ki kpa bad kiwei kiwei ki nongri nongsumar ia ki ha iing) ki dkkhot jong ka Self Help Group bad ka Village Organizations (VO) khnang ba yn lah ban ai jinghikai ia kiwei pat ki dkhot kiba iatreilang kiba hap lang ha kajuh ka thup, bad ban sdang ruh ka jingai jinghikai ia ki nongtrei kam shnong bad ki nongialam shnong. Ka bynta kaba kham hadien ka long ban sdang noh ia ki jingtreikam kiba kongsan jong ka ECD Mission ha ki shnong ki thaw: ki kam ha ki Anganwadi  Centres, kiei kiei kiba lah ban leh ha iing ha sem ia kaba lah ban leh da I nongri nongsumar, bad ban pynlong ia ki lympung ha ki shnong ki thaw ban ai jinghikai bad rung ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki dkhot ka shnong ka thaw.Kane ka lympung jingialang ka pynpaw ia ka jingdonkam ba dei ban bsut lang ruh ia ki rit dustur bad ki rukom leh ia kiei kiei katkum ki khana pateng khang ba yn lah ban pynmih ia ki jingthoh ne kino kino ki lad ai jinghikai na ka bynta ka ECCE khnang ba kin long kiba iahap had ka National Curriculum Framework (NCF, Oct 2022) bad ka Education Policy 2020 ba thymmai. Lyngba ki jingiaphylliew jingmut la iakren ruh shaphang kiei kiei kiba la lap bad kiba don ia ka jingpynshisha ha kaba iadei bad ki sienjam treikam ban nang kham kyntiew shuh shuh ia ki sap ki phong jong ki khynnah, ka kamram jong ka shnong ka thaw ban ia don bynta ban ai jinghikai katkum ki riti dustur, bad ban ai ki jinghikai kiba long lyngba ki jinglehkai katkum ba la shem ia ka jingbit jingbiang jong kine ki jingleh katkum ka jingwad bniah. Kane ka lympung jingialang ka pyni ia ki kam jong ka ECD Mission, bad ka jingnoh synniang jong ki shnat kiba kyrpang kiba iatreilang kum ka Sesame Workshop India ha kaba pyniadei bad ki jinghikai kiba dei katkum ki jinglehkai kiba iahap ruh bad ka National Curriculum Framework (NCF) bad NEP 2020. La kren ruh ha kaba iadei bad ki nongri nongsumar ne ki nongpeit nongjngoh ia ka bynta ba kyrpang jong ki ban ai jingkyrshan ia ka jingialehkai jong ki khynnah da kaba buh ia ka jaka lehkai kaba shngain, ai ia ki ia ki tiar ki tar kiba suk ban ioh, bad pyrshang ban pynlong ia ki khynnah ba ki lah ban lehkai hi da lade bad ban pynlong ia ki ba kin long kiba pyndonkam ia ki buit jingstad jong ki.
title: KA MEGHALAYA EARLY CHILDHOOD DEVELOPMENT MISSION KA PYNTIP SHAPHANG KA ‘PLAY TO LEARN’

content: Ka President ka ri India, ka Droupadi Murmu ha ka sngi baar ka la pynkupburom da ka khusnam sha ki nonghikai na kylleng ka ri ha ka jingïalang ba la long ha Vigyan Bhavan, New Delhi ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka sngi kyrpang jong ki Nonghikai.Na jylla Meghalaya, u Babu Timothy Jones Dhar bad u Babu Madhav Singh ki la ïohpdiang ïa ka khusnam National Teachers’ Award 2023 na ka President.U Babu Timothy Dhar u dei uba hikai ïa ka Mechanic Motor Vehicle ha Government Industrial Training Institute, Rynjah, Shillong. Ha ki 25 snem ba la leit, u Babu Dhar u la ai jinghikai ha ka Advanced Practical Training wat hapdeng ki jingduna kiba don. U la pyndonkam ïa ka jingsaiñdur thymmai jong u bad ki sap ha ka rukom ai jinghikai jong u.Namar ka mynsiem aiti jong u, ka la plie ki lad ïohkam ïohjam ïa kiba shah hikai ha u ha ki kompani bapher bapher  kiba ïadei bad ki kam kali bad ki karkhana ba don ha ka jylla bad shabar ka jylla. Ka jingnohsynniang jong u ka long shisha kaba dei ban ai jingïaroh namar ki jingai jinghikai jong u ka la ïarap ïa ki samla pule ban poi sha ka jingjop.  Katto katne na kiba la shah hikai ha u ki la ïoh ïa ki kyrdan ba hakhmat ha ki eksam All India Trade Test. U la ïohpdiang ruh ïa ka khusnam Kaushalacharya ha u snem 2019-20. U long u briew uba ïaishah bad uba shai ka jingmut jingpyrkhat bad um ju randien na ki jingeh. Ha u Babu Dhar kiba shah hikai ki lap ïa u kum u nonghikai ba shisha.U Madhav Singh, u dei u nonghikai Science ha Alpha English Higher Secondary School, Ri Bhoi, Meghalaya bad u la pynpaw ka jingkmen jong u halor ka jingïohpdiang ïa kane ka khusnam.U Babu Singh u dei u Resource Person ha ka National Children’s Science Congress bad u don bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka Science hapdeng ki khynnah.  Kum u nongpynïaid ïa ka Green Club, u la pynlong ïa ki prokram ïada mariang, u la thoh ruh ïa ka kot ha ka sobjek Health Education, u la ïoh ïa ka khusnam ‘State Best Teacher’ ha u snem 2021.  U Babu Singh u la ong ba kane ka jingjop ka long kaba kyrpang bad u la ai jingsngewnguh ïa baroh.“Nga dap da ka jingsngewkmen, ha ka sngi kaba nga la ïohpdiang ïa ka khubor ba ngan sa ïoh ïa ka khusnam National Teachers’ Award 2023, nga la lung mynsiem bha.  Nga ai nguh ïa u Blei na ka bynta kane ka jingjop bad nga aiti ïa kane ka Khusnam sha ki kmie ki kpa jong nga, i Principal, Vice- Principal, ki nonghikai, ki paralok ba ïatreilang, ki khynnah pule jong nga, ki para nongshong shnong jong nga (Nongpoh), Ri Bhoi Distrik bad ïa baroh ki briew jong ka jylla Meghalaya na ka bynta kane ka jingithuh ba nga la ïoh bad dei namar baroh ki briew jong ka Jylla.”Haba kren shaphang ka jingïaid lynti jong u kum u nonghikai, u Babu Singh u la ong ba baroh ka la sdang naduh u snem 2000 ha ka por ba u dang shu pyndep ïa ki jingpule Kolej.Haba kren shaphang ki bynta ba ïalam sha ka jingjied ïa ka kam nonghikai, u la ong, “Hadien ba nga la pyndep ïa ka B.Sc na Sankardev College, Shillong nga dang ap ïa ka result jong nga ha u snem 2000.  Hadien iwei na ki nonghikai jong nga i la hap ban leit pule B.Ed na R.B.P Secondary School Nongpoh, kumta nga la hap ban leit ïarap ïa i shi snem. Hadien kata i Malvin Passah iba pule lang bad nga, iba dei i Pastor mynta, i la kyrpad ïa nga ban wan hikai ha Alpha English Higher Secondary School Nongpoh ha u snem 2001 bad kumta ngam shym sngewthuh kaei kaba jia, bad nga la bteng ïa ka kam hikai ha kajuh ka skul Alpha English Higher Secondary School Nongpoh haduh mynta.”“Naduh ka por haba nga dang long u khynnah pule, u Deputy Commissioner jong ka Ri Bhoi Distrik u K.N. Kumar u la sdang ban pynlong ïa ka Science Exhibition bad ki jingïakop ha u snem 1992-93 bad kum u khynnah pule jong ka skul R.B.P Nongpoh nga la don ka jingsngewtynnad ïa ki Science Exhibition naduh kata ka por.  Haba nga la shah thung kam kum u nonghikai nga la ïarap ïa ki khynnah pule jong nga ban shna ïa ki Science Model bad ba kin sngewtynnad ïa ka sobjek Science. Nga sngewnguh ïa ka State Council of Science, Technology and Environment kaba la ïarap ba ngan don ka rukom pyrkhat kaba don nongrim ha ka science bad nga pyrshang ban leh kumjuh ïa ki khynnah ba nga ai jinghikai,” u la ong.Ka jingthmu jong ka National Teachers’ Award ka long ban rakhe ïa ka jingnohsynniang ba kyrpang jong ki nonghikai ha ka ri bad ka jingmut hadien ka khusnam National Teachers’ Award ka dei ban rakhe ïa ka jingnoh synniang ba kyrpang jong ki nonghikai ha ka ri bad ban pynkup burom ïa kito ki nonghikai, kiba la trei met bad mynsiem, ban kyntiew ïa ka pule puthi bad ïa ka jingim jong ki shah hikai jong ki.Manla ka khusnam ka kit lang bad ka syrnot, ka song pisa ba T. 50,000 hajar bad ka takma rupa.Ha ka jingai jingkren jong ka ha kane ka sngi, ka President jong ka India, ka Droupadi Murmu ka la ong ba ka jingïoh jinghikai ha ki por ba dang sdang ka pule puthi ka long kaba kongsan bha ha ka jingim jong ki briew. Ka la ong ba bun ki nonghikai ki kren shaphang ka ‘Three-H formula’ na ka bynta ka jingkiew shaphrang kaba ryntih ha ki khynnah ha kaba u H ba nyngkong u dei u ‘Heart’, u H ba ar u dei u ‘Head’ bad u H ba lai dei ka ‘Hand’. Ka la ong ba u ‘Heart’ u ïadei bad ka jingsngewlem, ki nongrim ba khlain, ka jingkhlain jong ka jinglong bad ka jingithuh ïa kaba bha. Ka la ong ba ka ‘Head’ lane ka jabieng ka ïadei bad ka jingkiew ka jingmut jingpyrkhat, ka jinglah pyrkhat sani bad ka jinglah pule bad ba ka ‘Hand’ ka ïadei bad ka jingtbit ban leh ïa ki kam bapher bapher kiba ïadei bad ka bor met.
title: PYNKUP BUROM KA PRESIDENT KA RI ÏA U BABU TIMOTHY BAD BABU MADHAV DA KA NATIONAL TEACHER’S AWARD

content: Shillong, Nailur 06: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la kynnoh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pyndonkam bakla ia ka 171 Indian Penal Code (IPC) tang ban pynkbum ia ki Hynñiewtrep bad ong ruh ba ka jingkhot hajir ba dang shen ia u President ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO) u Bah Donbok Dkhar halor ka jingpyndonkam ia ka Uniform rong iong, ka dei ka jingleh donbor jong ka Sorkar.“Hynrei ka HITO ka khlem phong ia ki jaiñ iong da ka jingthmu ban thok lane ialam bakla ia ki paidbah lane ia ka Sorkar bad katkum kaba ngi la iohi ha ki Social Media la ar snem mynta ngim tharai ba ka HITO ka phong ia ki jaiñ kiba iasyriem bad ki jain ba phong ki briew Sorkar haba ngi peit ia ki Batch lane kino kino ki dak jong ka sopti ka HITO ka phong. Namar kata ngi iohi ba ka Sorkar ka la pyndonkam bakla ia ka IPC 171 tang ban pynkbum ia kiba kren namar ki Hynñiewtrep bad ka dei ka jingleh donbor jong ka Sorkar,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da ka KHNAM lyngba u Vice President u Bah Thomas Passah.“Ka sorkar kam pat lap lane shem lane khlem pat don kano kano ka jingujor ba ka HITO ka la leh ia ka kam be-aiñ namarkata ka jingpynngat ha ka IPC 34 ruh ka long kaba bakla,” la ong u kyrwoh.“Haba ngi peit ia ki jain iong ba phong da ka HITO ngim iohi ba ki long kum ki Uniform Pulit namar khlem don ia ki Batch lane ki dak ki shin ha ka sopti kaba ia syriem bad ki Uniform Pulit  namar kata ka jingshah pynngat jong ka HITO ha ka Section 105 jong ka Meghalaya Police Act 2010 ruh ka long kaba bakla,” ong shuh shuh u Kyrwoh.Haba kynthoh halor ka jingjia ba dang shen, ka KHNAM ka la ong, “lada phai sha ka jingjia ha ka 4 tarik Nailur 23, ka long kaba sngewsih ba ki bor jong ka aiñ kim pyrkhat shuh ia ki paidbah kiba iaid lynti, kiba niah kali ki bym bna eiei ruh. Shano ka jingkitkhlieh jong ki bor Pulit kiba dei ban iada ia ki paidbah bad wanrah ia ka shongsuk shongsain. Katkum ki Video kaba la paw ka jingleh baheh, ka jingtim sih jong ki Pulit ha ka 4 tarik Nailur 2023 ym i kop ba ki dei ki briew jong ka aiñ bad la sngewdei ban ong ba dei ban pynngat ia kine ki Pulit ha ka kyndon IPC 171 namar ki shu phong ia ka Uniform Pulit hynrei ki treikam beaiñ ban pyntieng bad pynsmiej ia ki paidbah.”“Naduh ka 7 tarik Rymphang 2011 la pynbna ia ka Meghalaya Police Act, 2010 bad ka Section 73 (2) Chapter XII, ka batai ba ka Sorkar Jylla hapoh lai bnai na ka jingtreikam jong kane ka aiñ ka dei ban shna ia ka “Police Accountability Commission” ka ban peit ia ki jingujor jong ki paidbah halor ka jingleh donbor jong ki Pulit.  Ka jingkylli kaba mih ka long ba naduh u snem 2011 balei ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka khlem shym la thung lane pynbna ia kane ka Commission.  Hato kane kam dei ka jingailad jong ka Sorkar lane kiba bat ia ka Sorkar hi ban leh katba mon?  Lada peit katkum kane ka Meghalaya Police Act 2010 ka dei ka Sorkar kaba pynkheiñ kyndon da kaba khlem thung ia ka Police Accountability Commission katkum ka jingbthah jong ka Section 73(2) jong kane ka aiñ,” la kynthoh ka KHNAM.“Ka hok ban pyrshah ban buh jingkylli paidbah bad ban pynbor ia ka Sorkar ban jubab ka dei ka Fundamental Political Rights jong ki paidbah kaba wan beit na ka Article 19 jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India bad kano kano ka sorkar kam lah ban shu pyndonkam da ki bor Pulit ban knieh noh ia kane ka hok,” ong u kyrwoh.“Ka jingmlieh jong ki Pulit ban shu kawang Tear Gas lada dei ia ki nonghikai ne ia ki sengbhalang ka long kaba ngi hap ban pynrem bad ka pynpaw ia ka jingbymlah jong ki bor Pulit ban treikam ha ka lynti jong ka aiñ.  Ka Secretariat ka dei ka jaka paidbah bad ka jingpynjari ia ka Section 144 CrPC ha kane ka thaiñ ka long ka jingleh donbor, lada ki Party kiba synshar ki tieng ioh wan ki paidbah ban hylla bad dawa ia la ka hok ha Secretariat kan bha ia ki ban ym iakhun elekshon hi ruh hynrei ai kin peit ia la ka jong ka iing ka sem,” kynthoh ka KHNAM.
title: KA SORKAR KA PYNDONKAM BAKLA ÏA KA 171 IPC TANG BAN PYNKBUM ÏA KI 7TREP : KHNAM

content: Ka Shillong Club Ltd kaba la pyniaid da ki bar jylla kam don satia ia ka laisen khaii na ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) katkum ka Trading by Non-tribal Regulation 1954.“Naduh u snem 1924 la aiwai ia ka Golf Course sha ki bar jylla.  Kaba sngew lyngngoh ka long ba la aiwai khlem buh por (perpetual lease) kaba la long kumba kane ka jaka ka ladei jong ki bar jylla lane la pyniaid da ki bar jylla haduh kine ki sngi bad mynta ngi iohi ba ka la don ka jinglum ia ka bai rung (Entry Fee) na ki Khasi kiba wankai ha kane ka jaka kaba la poi da ki lak shi taiew,” ong ka KHNAM lyngba u kyrrwoh ba la phah da u Vice President u Bah Thomas Passah.“Kum ka seng ngim sngewiahap ba u bar jylla un pyniaid ia ka khyndew ka shyiap u Khasi bad ban shim pisa kylla na ki Khasi hi,” bynrap u kyrwoh.“Ki lai tylli ki Dorbar shnong kiba don ha kane ka thaiñ ki dei ban shimkhia ia kane ka kam ban khanglad ia ka jinglong trai ki bar jylla ia ka Golf Course. Kan long ei ka jingkyrkhu lada yn aiti ban pyniaid da ki samla Khasi kiba la tbit lyngba ki Self Help Group,” bynrap u kyrwoh.“Ngi dawa jur ia ka KHADC ba kan shimkhia kum ia kine ki briew kiba pynkhieñ ia ki aiñ ka Council,” ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: KA SHILLONG CLUB LTD. KAM DON LAISEN KHAÏI NA KA KHADC, KYNNOH KA KHNAM

content: Ka North Eastern Hills University Students Union (NEHUSU) ka la aipor tang shiphew sngi ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka skulbah NEHU ba kin bishar thymmai noh ia ka Grading System ba la pyntreikam hapoh kane ka skulbah.Ka NEHUSU ka la byrngem ruh ban bteng biang ia ki jingiakhih kiba tyngeh lada ki bor pyniaid jong kane ka skulbah kim sngap ia kane ka jingdawa.Da ki phew spah ngut ki samla pule jong kane ka skulbah ki la iashim bynta ha ka jingiaid proseshon na khmat ka Central Library bad pynkut hakhmat ka ophis treikam u Vice Chancellor ka NEHU u Prof. P.S. Shukla ban pynsngew ia kane ka jingdawa.Ki samla pule ki la dawa ia ki bor pyniaid ka NEHU ban shong bishar thymmai ia ka Grading System namar la shem ba kane ka Grading System ba ai da kane ka skulbah ka dei kaba rit tam haba ianujor bad kiwei ki skulbah kiba don ha ka Ri.Ha kane ka sngi, ki samla Pule ki la dawa ban pynsangeh shwa ia ka result jong ka 2nd Semester kat bym pat pyntreikam ia ka Grading System bad ban bishar bniah biang ia ka result jong ki Semesters katkum ka Grading System. Ki samla pule ki la dawa ia u Vice Chancellor ba u dei ban hiar shuki namar ka jingmynthi ia ki jingdawa.
title: 10 SNGI AI POR KI SAMLA PULE NEHU BAN BISHAR THYMMAI ÏA KA GRADING SYSTEM

content: : U MLA barim ka Mawsynram u Bah Himalaya Muktan Shangpliang ha ka sngi palei u la ong ba ka post Adviser na ka bynta ka tnat Pule Puthi ka dei kaba tyrwa hi da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u Bah Prestone Tynsong.U la kynnoh ba kane ka long hadien ba u State President ka BJP u Bah Ernest Mawrie u la phah pynsangeh ïa u MLA ka Pynthorumkhrah Constituency u Bah A.L. Hek uba long ruh u Myntri Sorkar ban phah ïa ka shithi sha u Myntri Rangbah ba la mynjur ïa ka kyrteng jong u Bah Shangpliang bad u Bah M. Kharkrang ban aikam. Hynrei u Bah Mawrie u la kyrpad pynban ban pynrung da ka kyrteng jong u bad ban phah sha u Myntri Rangbah.“Ka shuki Adviser la tyrwa hi ïa nga da u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u bah Prestone Tynsong. Kine ki arngut ki rangbah ki la kylli la nga la ïoh ne em kano kano ka post? Nga la ong em. Mar mar ki la ong ba phi lah ban leit shim ïa ka shithi thungkam lashai,” la ïathuh u Bah Shangpliang ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Une u MLA barim u la ong ba u la kyrpad ïa u Bah Mawrie ban phah ruh ïa ka kyrteng jong ki saw ngut ki MLA barim bad ïa ka kyrteng u ophisar IPS barim sha u Myntri Rangbah ban mynjur na ka bynta ki katto katne ki kam hynrei um shym la leh eiei satia.“Kaba kham pynlynngoh, haba nga la ïoh ïa ka shithi ba la thung kum u Adviser, u Bah Hek u la telephone ïa nga ban phah wan sha ka kamra jong u bad ynda nga la leit sha kamra u la ai khublei ïa nga bad kylli kumno phi ïoh ïa ka shithi thungkam, mano ban mynjur ïa phi, nga la ong ba nga ïoh na u Myntri Rangbah,” u la ong.U Bah Shangpliang u la ïathuh ba u Bah Hek u la phla ba dei u Bah Mawrie uba la bthah ïa u ban pynsangeh ban phah ïa ka shithi jingmynjur ïa ka kyrteng u Bah Shangpliang bad u Bah Kharkrang sha u Myntri Rangbah.“U Bah Hek u la phla ïa kaei kaei kaba nga kyndit haduh  katta katta..ba u Bah Hek u ladep mynjur ïa ka kyrteng jong nga bad u Bah Kharkrang ha ka shithi DO na ka bynta ban aikam bad ïa ka shithi la phah sha u Myntri Rangbah.  Kum ka jingsngew burom, u Bah Hek u la telephone ïa u Bah Mawrie bad ong nga la phah ïa kawei ka shithi sha u Myntri Rangbah da kaba mynjur ar tylli ki kyrteng- u Bah Shangpliang bad u Bah Kharkrang – na ka bynta katto katne ki kam. U Bah Mawrie u la ong ba un pynsangeh shwa bad ong ap ngan da wan sha ka kamra jong phi. Mar mar u Bah Mawrie u la leit sha ka kamra u Bah Hek bad ong ba un tar shisyndon ïa ka shithi ba la mynjur ïa ka kyrteng jong nga.  Phi lah ban kylli na u Bah Hek ban pynshisha ïa kane.  Hadien kata, u Bah Hek da ka jingbym banse namar ka jingkyrpad jong u President ka party u la hap ban tar ïa ka shithi bad hap ban mynjur da ka kyrteng u Bah Mawrie,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Shangpliang.“Kumno phi lah ban shet kylla?  Kane ka dei ka jingleh bym hok, kane ka dei ka jingshet kylla. Haba nga la kyrpad ïa u ban mynjur ïa ki san ngut ki kyrteng napdeng jong ngi sha u Myntri Rangbah na ka bynta ki katto katne ki post, hynrei ïalade pat u la leit na kyrpong iing ban phah tar ïa ka shithi ha u Bah A.L. Hek bad phah pynrung bujli da ka kyrteng jong u. Mynta ka shong sa ha u Bah Mawrie bad u Bah Hek ban pynshai namar ba ïa kane la ïathuh hi da u Bah Hek ha nga,” la bynrap u Bah Shangpliang.
title: DEI U CONRAD BAD U BAH PRESTONE KIBA TYRWA ÏA KA KAM ‘ADVISER’ ÏA NGA : BAH SHANGPLIANG

content: Ka Meghalaya Estimate Committee jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la hiar sha South West Khasi Hills District ban jurip ïa ka jingtei ïa ka Industrial Training Institutes (ITI) kaba don hapoh Shnong Sakwang, South West Khasi Hills District. Ïa kane ka ITI la tei ha ka jingmang pisa kaba T.7 klur tyngka lyngba ka ESDI Scheme jong ka Sorkar India.Lah ban kdew ba ha kane ka Industrial Training Institutes (ITI) yn sa ïoh ban pynrung ïa ki 5 jait ki jait jinghikai na ka bynta ki samla jong ka dong ka thaiñ kata ha ka Surface Embroidery Trade (SET), ki Wiremen, ka Office Assistant and Computer Programme (OACP), Multimedia Animation & Special Effect (MA&SE) bad ka Driver-cum-Mechanic (DcM).Ha ka jingjurip jong ka Meghalaya Estimate Committee ïa ka ITI ha shnong Sakwang, la lap ba kane ka jingpyntrei ka la long 100% ha ka jingtei hynrei lyngba ka jingïathuh jong ka Director Employment and Craftsmen Training, Shillong kaba sah mynta ban pyndep ka long sa tang ïa ka um bad kumjuh ruh ïa ka bording.Kumta na ka liang u Bah Mayralborn Syiem, MLA ka Nongpoh Constituency uba dei u Chairman jong ka Meghalaya Estimate Committee u la buh ka jingkyrpad na ka bynta ka PWD (Building) ba kam dei ban pynsah teng hynrei ka dei ban leh noh ïa kaba donkam da kaba phah jingthoh sha ki ar tylli ki tnad ophis kata sha ka PHE bad sha ka MePDCL khnang ba yn lah ban pynbiang ha ka por kaba dei bad ba ka jingthmu ban pynïaid shakhmat ïa kane ka jaka ai jinghikai ïa ki samla kan long kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih.Ïa kane ka komiti la lamkhmat da u Bah Mayralborn Syiem, MLA ka Nongpoh Constituency uba dei u Chairman jong ka Meghalaya Estimate Committee ryngkat ka jingsynrang ki katto katne ki MLA kata u Bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, MLA ka Mawkyrwat, u Bah Adelbert Nongrum, MLA ka North Shillong, u Bah Wailadmiki Shylla, MLA ka Jowai, ka Miani D. Shira, MLA ka Ampati, u Reminton G. Momin, MLA ka Rambrai, u Bah Damanbait Lamare, MLA ka Umroi bad u Arbinstone B. Marak, MLA ka Selsella Constituency.Kiwei pat kiba ïadonlang ki long ka Kong Anita Kharpor, Director Employment and Craftsmen Training, Shillong, ka Kong Y.R. Mawlong, MCS, Additional Deputy Commissioner, South West Khasi Hills District, u Bah D. Mawlein, Deputy Superintendent of Police, South West Khasi Hills District, u Myntri Shnong Sakwang, u Bah S. Kharjahrin, ki ophisar napoh ka PWD (Building), lem bad kiwei de.
title: HUN JRUT KA ESTIMATE COMMITTEE BA LADEP TEI PURA ÏA KA ITI HA SAKWANG, SWKH

content: Ka jingïalang jong ka Jylli Pyrkhat Kam (JPK) ka Seng Khasi Kmie, kaba la long ha ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai ka la ïatai sani bha halor ka jingmih jong kawei video kaba dang shen halor ka phang ‘Hato ka jaitbynriew Khasi ka dei kaba kyrpang’ da ka YouTube Channel kaba la ai kyrteng ‘Na Rympei U Hynñiewtrep’.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, na ka liang ka Seng Khasi Kmie, ka kren shai ba kam don kano kano ka ban pynpaw ïa ka jingkren shimet jong uno uno u briew, hynrei ka Seng ka sngewkhia ïa ka jingpyndonkam bakla jong u/ka Youtuber  ban pyndonkam ïa ki dur ki dar jong ka Seng Khasi, khamtam ïa ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa ka Lama jong ka Seng bad ïa ki dur lehniam ha u Lum Sohpetbneng uba kyntang, la ong u General Secretary ka Seng Khasi Kmie, Mawkhar Shillong u Bah Hainess Marbaniang.“Ka Seng Khasi ka ïeng ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka niam ka rukom, ki riti ki dustur bad ka tynrai jong ka jaitbynriew halor ka nongrim jong ka ‘Tip kur tip kha – tip briew tip Blei’ bad ban  ‘Ieid ïalade bad burom ïa kiwei’  bad  kum kine ki jingleh bym don jingkitkhieh,  barabor, ki don ïa ki jingthmu ba sniew ha lyndet bad ki wanrah ïa ka jingshah ïalam bakla ïa ka jaitbynriew hi baroh kawei da ka jingthmu ban pharia ïa ka,” ong u kyrwoh.“Ka Seng Khasi namar kata, lyngba une u kyrwoh, ka pynrem jur ïa kum kine ki jingleh sianti bad kyntu ïa u ne ka riewshim kabu ban pyndam noh mardor ïa baroh ki dur ki dar kiba dei jong ka  Seng Khasi, ïa kaba la pyndonkam ha katei ka video bad maham tyngeh ba kum kine ki jingpyndonkam bakla kin ym dei ban jia shuh ha ki por ki ban dang wan,” bynrap u kyrwoh na ka Seng Khasi Kmie.
title: PYNREM KA SENG KHASI BA PYNDONKAM U YOUTUBER ÏA KI DUR HA YOUTUBE CHANNEL

content: : U Myntri ka tnat Sam Bording ka Jylla u Abu Taher Mondal ha ka sngi thohdieng u la ong ba ka Preliminary Report ba la ai da ka Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Guwahati ka pynpaw ba ka jingkieng ha Pung Umïam ka dang shngaiñ bad donkam ban bujli tang ha ki Bearing jong ka jingkieng khnang ban pynjlan ïa ka jingskhem jong ka jingkieng.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Mondal u la ong ba ka IIT Guwahati ka ladep pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bniah ïa ka jingkieng ha Pung Umïam bad ka tnat mynta ka dang ap sa ïa ka kaiphod.“Katkum ka preliminary report, ki la ïathuh ba ka jingkieng ka dang shngaiñ bad tang ïa ki Bearing jong ka jingkieng la donkam ban pyndait bujli noh da kiba thymai. Ngi la thied na ka kompeni kaba shna ïa kine ki Bearing bad la aiti sha ka kynhun kaba ju trei ïa kine ki jait kam ban pyndait ïa ki bearing,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ba ladep thaw ïa ka Joint Committee hapdeng ki Engineers jong ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) bad ka Public Works Department (PWD) ban bishar ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshna pynbha ïa ka jingkieng ha Pung Umïam.“Shen kin sa phah ïa ka kaiphod halor kane ban ïathir ïatai sani para ma ngi bad lehse yn sa rah ruh ha ka Kynhun Myntri kumno ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka kam,” u la ong.U Myntri u la ong ruh ba yn sa pynbna paidbah ïa ka tarik ha ki sngi ban maramot ïa ka jingkieng lane ban bujli ïa ki Bearing.“Ha ki sngi ba la pyndait bujli ïa ki bearing yn hap ban pynsangeh ïa ka jingïaid kali bad yn ym shah satia ïa kino kino ki kali ban ïaid lyngba la kumno kumno haduh 8 kynta eiei.  Hadien ka 8 kynta, yn shah tang ïa ki kali rit ban ïaid lyngba na ka jingkieng bad ha ka sngi ba la pynhiar ïa ka jingkieng, yn ym shah ïa ki kali ban ïaid lyngba na ka jingkieng. Hadien ba la pynhiar ïa ka jingkieng ha ka jaka ba la pynshong bha yn sa ailad pat ïa ka jingïaid kali kumba ju long,” la ïathuh u Myntri bad bynrap ba ha kine ki kynta, yn ym shah ïa ki kali ban ïaid lyngba na ka jingkieng.
title: 8 KYNTA YN YM SHAH IAID KALI HA KA SNGI BUJLI ÏA KI BEARING HA JINGKIENG KA PUNG UMÏAM

content: : Ka tnat Sam Bording jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la shim ïa ka rai kaba eh bha ban pynduna ïa ka jingduhnong ha ka Aggregate Technical & Commercial (AT&C).Ïa kane la pyntip da u Myntri ka tnat Sam Bording u Abu Taher Mondal ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Thohdieng.“Ngi la bishar bniah bha halor kane ka mat bad nga lah ban ong ïa phi ha une u snem mang tyngka, ka la don ka jingduna khyndiat na ka jingduhnong ha ka AT&C. Ngin sa pyrshang ban peit ban kynjoh sha ka National Average kaba dei ka kam kaba jwat bha,” la ong u Myntri.U la ong ba ka jingkiew ka AT&C ha rilum Garo ka lah ban kiew hynrei, ‘ka dei pat ka kamram jong ngi ban pynduna kham kloi katba lah.”Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingsam bording ha ka jylla baroh kawei, u Mondal u la ong, ka jylla mynta kam duna shuh ha ka bording watla ha ka jingshisha ka ri baroh kawei ka mad ïa ka jingkyrduh bording bad wat ka jylla bamarjan ruh ka mad ïa kane kajuh ka jingeh.“Ïa mynta hi ngi biang. Ngi la rai ban pynlip bording tang 2 kynta ha ki jaka sor bad ha ka jylla baroh kawei ka jingpynlip bording kan long beit 3 kynta. Hooid, ki don katto katne ki bynta lane katto katne ki jaka, ka jinglip bording ka lah ban tam ïa ka por kaba la buh hynrei ka jingpynlip bording ka dei namarba ka don ka jingmaramot hynrei ka jingpynlip bording kan long beit 2 kynta ha ki jaka sor bad 3 kynta ha kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ka jylla,” u la ong.Ha kajuh ka por u Myntri u la pyntip ba ka Sorkar ka la buh thong ban pyndait da ki waïar ba sop jri ha ki jaka ba jur bha ka jingshah tuh ka bording “Ka la don ka jingthmu ha ka jaka ba la jur shaba palat ka jingtuh bording, yn pyndait noh da ki waïar sop jri khnang ban pynduna ïa ka jingduhnong,” u la bynrap.
title: BA JUR PALAT KA JINGSHAH TUH BORDING, YN PYNDONKAM KA MEECL DA KI WAÏAR SOP JRI

content: : Ka ophis District Tuberculosis Officer, East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la pynbna paidbah ïa ka Ni-Kshay Mitra Project ha East Khasi Hills District kaba dei ka prokram sam jingbam teimet sha ki nongpang TB ba la ai jingkyrshan da ka kynhun ‘Doctors For You’ ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Reid Provincial Chest Hospital Hall, Shillong da ka jingsakhi lang jong ka Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong R. M. Kurbah kaba la long kum ka Kongsan.Ka kynhun ‘Doctors For You’ ka dei ka kynhun trei mon sngewbha kaba ai jingkyrshan ïa ki 100 ngut ki nongpang TB na East Khasi Hills District da ki jingbam teimet ïa kiba la ai jingïarap da ka MYLAN Pharmaceuticals Pvt. Ltd, Bangalore.Kum ban shu kdew hangne, ïa ka NI-KSHAY MITRA la pyllait paidbah da ka President ka ri India hapoh ka Pradhan Mantri TB Mukth Bharat Abhiyan ha ka 9 tarik, Nailur, 2022. Lyngba ka NI-KSHAY MITRA la buh thong ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki nongpang da ki jingbam teimet, ka jingkyrshan ha kaba ai ïa ki jinghikai bad ka jingsumar.Ka jingwanrah ïa kane ka prokram ka long kum shi bynta ka jingïakhun jong ka ri India ban pynurlong ïa ka “Pradhan Mantri TB Mukth Abhiyaan”, kaba thmu ban pynduna ïa ka jingdon jong ki nongpang TB hapoh ka ri India shwa u snem 2025.Lyngba kane ka prokram la ai jingkyrshan ruh ïa ki nongpang TB ba kin pdiang ïa ki lad jingïarap lyngba ka Corporate Social Responsibility khnang ban ïoh ïa ka jingsumar haduh ban da koit, ban ïoh ïa ka jingïatreilang ha ki shnong ki thaw bad ban pynurlong ïa ka thong ban rat dyngkhong ruh ïa ka jingpang TB.Ka jingai jingkyrshan ïa ki nongpang hapoh kane ka thong ka long ban ai jingsumar ei, ban ai dawai ei.Ka Kong R. M. Kurbah haba kren ha kane ka sngi, ka la ai khublei ïa ka kynhun ‘Doctors For You’ kaba la shim ïa kane ka sienjam ban kyrshan jingïarap ïa ki nongpang hapoh ka distrik bad pynpaw ruh ba kane ka projek kan pynurlong ïa ka thong ban rat dyngkhong ïa ka jingpang.Ka la kyntu ïa ki nongpang kiba don ha kane ka sngi, ba kin dih tista ïa ki dawai dashin bad ban bam ïa ki jingbam tei met khnang ba kin ïoh biang ïa ka met kaba koit ba khiah.U State Tuberculosis Officer u Dr M. Mawrie u la aiti ruh ïa ka Ni-kshay Mitra Certificate sha ka Kong R. M. Kurbah, Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills District.
title: KYRSHAN KA ‘DOCTOR FOR YOU’ DA KI JINGBAM TEI MET ÏA KI 100 NGUT KI NONGPANG TB

content: Ka Synjuk Waheh Shnong East Jaintia Hills District ka la pynpaw ia ka jingbitar halor ka jingbym maramot jong ka Sorkar Jylla ia ka surok National Highway-6 bad ia ka surok Sutnga-Saipung kiba la sniew shaba palat pud kum ba long mynta.Ha ka Executive Committee kaba la long ha Community Hall, Khliehriat West, ka Synjuk ka aipor tang ar taiew ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan maramot ia kine ki ar tylli ki surok kiba long u budlum jong ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah ka rilum Jaintia.Ha u kyrwoh ba la pyllait da u President ka Synjuk u Ma Hambertus Nongtdu, u la pynpaw ba ka surok National Highway-6 lei lei naduh Soomer, West Jaintia Hills haduh Malidor, East Jaintia Hills ka la jot rathai haduh katta katta ha kiba bun ki bynta. Kumba ka long mynta, ha kiba bun ki bynta jong kane ka surok, la dap sa tang ki thliew, ki pung um baheh bad barit kiba la pynjynjar shikatdei eh ia ka leit  ka wan jong u paidbah.“Ka Surok NH-6, ka dei tang ma ka, ka budlum jong ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah na kylleng ki jylla ha ka ri India, khamtam eh ia kiba na Northeast India. Hynrei kumba ka long mynta, kane ka surok, ka la buh ia ki paidbah nongleit nongwan baroh ha ka jingjynjar trah bad ruh ha ka jingma kaba khraw na ka jingdheng kali, ka jingsniew kali hapdeng surok, na ka jingshem lanot kiba pang ba shitom bad ruh na ka jinglah ban mih ki jingjia ba sngewsih na ka jinghap ban iaid lyngba lane kiar ia ki thliew ki pung um kiba heh hapdeng surok,” ong u Ma Hambertus Nongtdu.“Kaba phylla ka long ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka tip bha ia rukom long jong ka surokbah NH-6  bad jong ka surok Sutnga-Saipung, tangba tip don aiu shalyndet kaba pynlong ia ka Sorkar ban shu sngap jar khlem leh eiei halor ka jingjot jong kine ki ar tylli ki surok tad haduh mynta ka sngi. Kane ka jingkuman jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei ka jingibeiñ bad ka jingkheiñ poh ia ki paidbah bad khamtam eh ia kiba na East Jaintia Hills kiba hap ban mad ia ki jinglanot manla ka sngi namar ka jingsniew shaba palat ka surok,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.U President ka Synjuk u la pynkynmaw, ha ka 2 tarik, Nailar, 2023, ki nongialam ka SWSEJHD, ki ladep iakynduh kyrpang bad aiti ruh ia ka dorkhas ha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma bad kawei na ki mat ba hakhmat eh kaba la iakren hakhmat jong u, ka long ban maramot noh kloi kloi ia ka surok NH-6 bad ia ka surok Sutnga-Saipung ha kaba u Myntri Rangbah ruh u la kular hakhmat ka synjuk ban leh kloi ia kata.“Hynrei, mynta la tam shibnai ym don ba dak eiei ruh em ban maramot ia kine ki surok, khamtam ia ka surokbah NH-6 kaba long u thied snam jong kiba bun ki jylla ha ri India. Kane ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar Jylla, ka la pynbitar ia ka Synjuk bad ia u paidbah jong ka East Jaintia Hills  kat haduh ba ka synjuk ka la hap ban shim ia ka rai kaba tyngeh ia mynta,” bynrap shuh shuh u President ka synjuk.Lyngba une u kyrwoh khubor, ka SWSEJHD, ka phah ia ka khubor kaba shai kdar sha ka Sorkar jylla da kaba ai por hapoh ar taiew thik naduh ba la pynmih ia kane ka khubor ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei ban maramot noh ia kine ki surok.“Lada jia ba ka Sorkar Jylla kam leh eiei ia kine ki ar tylli ki surok, ka Synjuk, kan sa shim da kawei pat ka rai kaba tyngeh bha ban pynpei shkor ia ka Sorkar Jylla bad lada mih kano kano ka jingjia ka bym sngewtynnat, ka Sorkar Jylla kan hap ban shim hi ia ka jingkitkhlieh,” la byrthen ka Synjuk.
title: AR TAÏEW AI POR KA SWS-EJHD ÏA KA SORKAR

content: Da kaba buh hakhmat ia ka thong ban iakhun thma pyrshah ia ka jingjyllei ka jingkhaii u drok ha ka ri baroh kawei, khamtam eh ha ka thain Shatei Lammihngi ka ri India, ka Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI) Guwahati, Zonal Unit ka la ioh kurup 47 kilo (4,70,000) ki dawai kuli Methamphetamine kiba shongdor palat T. 47 klur ha ka iew khaii tuh.Arngut ki briew ki la shah kem bad shah pynngat hapoh ki kyndon jong ka NDPS Act 1985.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da ka Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI) Guwahati sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, la iathuh, lyngba ka jingtip kaba bniah ba la ioh na ki tnat syntiat, ki ophisar jong ka DRI, ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki FGT ka BSF, Silchar Sector ha ka miet jong ka sngi Palei ki la ioh bat ia kawei ka trok kit dewbilat ha Digarkhal Toll Gate, Cachar District, Assam.Ha ka jingkhynra ia ka trok, la lap ia ki 47 tylli ki song ba la thep 4,70,000 tylli ki dawai kuli Methamphetamine.  Ia une u drok la shalan tuh sha India na Myanmar lyngba ka khappud Indo-Myanmar shwa ban pynpoi sha kiwei kiwei pat ki  jaka.Haduh une u snem 2023, ka DRI ka la ioh kurup palat 2800 kilo u drok Heroin, Methamphetamine bad Ganja ha kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kiba shongdor palat  T. 199 klur bad iohkem haduh 28 ki briew kiba donkti ban khaii tuh ia kine ki jingdih pynbuaid.
title: 47 KILO KURUP KA DRI ÏA KI DAWAI KULI METHAMPHETAMINE BA SHONGDOR PALAT 47 KLUR

content: KaNorth East Indigenous Peoples’ Forum (NEPIF), Shillong Chapter ba kynthup ia ka seng FKJGP, RBYF bad HNYF, kaba la shong jingialang ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai ka la rai ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur ia ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar National Democratic Alliance (NDA) ban pynkylla kyrteng noh ia ka ‘INDIA’ sha ka ‘BHARAT’.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor lyngba u Nongaiktien ka NEIPF, u Bah Dundee C Khongsit, ka Forum ka sngew ba ka kyntien ‘Bharat’ ka dei kaba mih na ka Sanskrit bad ka dei kaba don jingiasnoh bad ka niam Hindu. Ka sngew ba kane ka jingthmu ka dei tang ka buit ban tyllep ia kiwei pat ki niam kiba don ha kane ka Ri. Ka Ri India ka dei ka ri kaba iakhleh bun ki Jaidbynriew bad bun tylli ki Niam bad ngi ngeit ba ka jingpynkylla ia ka India sha ka Bharat kan sa ktah jur ia kane ka jinglong ba kyrpang jong ka Ri India.Ha kane ka jingialang, ka Forum ka la rai ruh ban pyrshah jur halor ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Uniform Civil Code (UCC) hapoh ka Jylla bad ka thain Shatei Lam Mihngi ka Ri bad ka don jingsngew ba kane ka sienjam jong ka Sorkar Pdeng kan sa ktah jur ia ki rit paid bad ki riewlum ha ka kolshor, ka jinglong tynrai, ka riam ka beit bad kiwei kiwei, ha kaba ka por kan sa poi ba kin ym sngew trai shuh iala ka jong ka Ri.Halor ka jingjyllei jong u drok, ka NEIPF, ka la iatai sani bha bad ka la rai ban dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan pyntreikam noh ia ka Prevention of Illicit Traffic in Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances, (PIT- NDPS) Act 1988 ha ka jylla ban rat dyngkhong ia une jingdih pynbuaid uba pynjot ia ki samla, ki iing ki sem bad ka imlang sahlang.“Ngi la sakhi ia ka jingkiew ki kam sniew khamtam ki kam tuh kam thiem ha manla ki shnong ki thaw. Ki kam tuh kila jia manla ka sngi ha manla ki shnong haduh ba ki paidbah kila hap thiah siar ialade ha ka miet ka iong. Ka daw hi ka dei namar ba bun ki nongtuh ban ioh thied droks. Ka por kan sa poi ba lada kim ioh tuh shuh da kaba suk, kin sa poi sha u pud ban rah da ki tiar bad rung jubor sha ki thliew Iing. Kaba sheptieng eh ka long ba suki suki, kane ka kam droks ka lah ban pynkha ia ki kynhun nongkhaii kiban sa pyndonkam da ki kor ki bor ka juk ban lah pyniaid iew ia u droks,” ong u kyrwoh.Ka NEIPF ka dawa ruh ban pynkha noh da ka tnad ba pura jong ka Anti Narcitics Task Force (ANTF) kumba long ka SB, CID ha Jylla, ka ban khlieh da u Heh Ophisar ba bat ia ka kyrdan Inspector General (IG) ka ban peit thik tang ia ki kam khaii drok ha ka Jylla.“Ka Jylla ka la don ia ki Anti Narcotics Task Force (ANTF) ha manla ki District ka Jylla bad ia kine ki kynhun la khlieh da ki Superintendent of Police (SP), kiba iakhun ia u drok ha la ki jong ki jong ki District hynrei ka Jylla ka la donkam da ka tnad ba pura jong ka ANTF ka ban pyniaid na Headquarter ka tnad Meghalaya Police,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: PYRSHAH KA NEIPF BA THMU PYNKYLLA KA SORKAR NDA ÏA KA KYRTENG “INDIA’ SHA KA “BHARAT”

content: Ki nongialam jong ka Jaiñtia Students Union (JSU) ha ka jingiakynduh ia ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka la dawa ba ka Sorkar kam dei satia ban ailad ia u Ayush Kumar ban ioh pule MBBS na ka bhah pule jong ka Jylla ha ka open Category.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka JSU seng kmie bad ka JSU Khliehriat Circle ryngkat lang bad ki nongialam jong ka shnong Thangskai ki la iakynduh ia ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh bad aiti ruh da ka shithi ujor ia ka Sorkar halor ka jingpynrung kyrteng ia u Ayush Kumar ha ka thup pule MBBS.Na ka liang jong ka Myntri ka la ong ba ka Sorkar ka pdiang ia ki kot ki sla kaba la phah na ka Ophis u Deputy Commisioner ka East Jaiñtia Hills District bad la shem ba u Ayush Kumar u la ai da ka Permanent Residential Certificate (PRC) kaba u la ioh na ka ophis u Deputy Commisioner ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ha u snem 2021 bad ka Myntri ka la  ong ruh dei ban pan jingshai ban ujor ha u Deputy Commisioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District halor ka jingai Permanent Residential Certificate (PRC) ia une u bar jylla.Ka seng ka la dawa na ka Sorkar ba da leilei ym dei ban ailad ia u Ayush Kumar ban leit pule MBBS namarba katkum ka jingtip ba um dei satia u nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Thangskai bad ka seng ryngkat lang bad ki nongialam shnong kin sa leit ban kynduh ia u Deputy Commisioner ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ban tih bniah halor ki kot ki sla jong u Ayush Kumar bad lada shem shisha ba une u bar jylla u leh thok ka seng kan ym ailad ia u bad na ka liang ka Sorkar ka dei ban pynduh shi syndon ia ka seat MBBS ia u.Ka seng ka phah ruh ia u kyrwoh uba shai sha baroh ki nongialam shnong jong ka rilum Jaintia bad sha baroh ki nongialam shnong ka Bri u Hynniewtrep ba kim dei shuh ban ai syrnot lane kino kino ki No Objection Certificate ia ki bar jylla khlem da tih bniah la kine kiba pan syrnot ki dei hok ne em ban ioh ia ki kot na ki Dorbar Shnong.
title: DAWA KA JSU ÏA KA SORKAR BAN YM AILAD ÏA U AYUSH KUMAR BAN ÏOH PULE MBBS

content: Ka North East Indigenous Peoples’ Forum (NEPIF), Shillong Chapter kaba kynthup ia ka seng FKJGP, RBYF bad HNYF, kaba la shong jingialang ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai ka la pynthymmai ia ki nongkitkam jong ka Forum ba kynthup ia u Chairman Bah Wellbirth Rani, Vice Chairman Bah Bipul Thangkhiew, Vice Chairman Bah Kitboklang Nongphlang, General Secretary  Bah Sadon K. Blah, Asst Secretary Bah Eldie Newton Lyngdoh bad Bah Augustine Sten, Joint Secretary Bah Wanpher Wahlang bad Bah Shanbor Rapsang, Spokeperson Bah Dundee C Khongsit.
title: SHIMTI U BAH WELLBIRTH RANI KUM U CHAIRMAN KA NEIPF, SHILLONG CHAPTER

content: On September 11, 2023, troops from the BSF Meghalaya, in a joint operation with Meghalaya police, successfully rescued 67 cattle near the international border of East Khasi Hills and West Jaintia Hills. These cattle were intended to be smuggled into Bangladesh.Acting on specific information, the troops of 193rd Battalion BSF carried out a coordinated operation with the Meghalaya police. They seized 37 cattle, which were concealed in a jungle area near the bordering village of Kamarphil in East Khasi Hills, with the intention of smuggling them into Bangladesh. The seized cattle were subsequently handed over to the Police Station Dangar for further necessary action.In another operation, troops of 4th Bn and 193th Bn BSF Meghalaya also seized 30 cattle near the International border, while being smuggled to Bangladesh.
title: BSF MEGHALAYA RESCUED 67 CATTLE ON INTERNATIONAL BORDER

content: Ka jingpyrshang jong ki shipai suiñ Indian Air Force (IAF) ban kyntur pud shabar na u pud u sam jong ka ktem sah lajong ka pynbitar lep ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka dong Khliehshnong, Rngi Shyllong, kaba dang hap hapoh ka Nongkrem Constiutuency.Ka kynhun lum khubor jong ka BatesiTV ha ka sngi baar ka la sakhi ba ki shipai suiñ ki la kyntur pud sha surok PWD da kaba tih thliew thymmai ban pynieng paia markhap bad ka khyrdop kaba rim ban rung sha ka jaka jngohkai pyrthei ha Lum Shyllong.La lap  shuh shuh ba ki shipai suiñ ki ladep pynieng ruh ar tylli ki païa bad tih ruh ia ka thliew muri kaba heh da ka puh shilum.Na ka liang jong u MLA ka Nongkrem Constituency u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit ha kane ka step ryngkat lang bad ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka Rngi Shyllong ki la leit tur sha kane ka jaka ban dawa ia ki shipai suiñ ba ki dei ban pynsangeh noh mardor ia kane ka jingkyntur pud.U Wing Commander jong ka Indian Air Force (IAF) ka Eastern Air Command (EAC), uba la wan mihkhmat na ka liang jong ki shipai suiñ,  u la kular ban pynsangeh noh mardor ia kane ka jingtrei bad ha kaba iadei bad kane ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong Rosetta Mary Kurbah ka la rai ban sa khot iakren halor kane hapdeng ka tnat PWD, ka tnat shipai Suiñ bad ka Dorbar Shnong Rngi Shyllong.
title: TIH PAÏA KI SHIPAI SUIÑ SHABAR KA KHYRDOP HA RNGI SHYLLONG, PYRSHAH KI PAIDBAH

content: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) Central Executive Council (CEC) ha ka sngi baar ka la ujor sha u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC)  u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ba un tuklar halor ka jingtreikam jong ka Shillong Golf Club khlem ka Trade License.“Na ka liang ka seng ngi pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor ka jingtreikam jong ka Shillong Golf Club khlem ka Trade License. Kumba la paw paidbah ba kane ka Club ka la sdang ruh ban lum ia ka bai rung (entry fee) na ki paidbah bad haba ka la don ka jinglum pisa na ki paidbah ngi sngewthuh shai ba kane ka ladei ka khaïi. Katkum ki aiñ jong ka Council kane ka Club ka ladei ban don ia ka Trade License bad ki dkhot lane ki nongtrei jong kane ka Club ki dei ban siew ruh ia ka Professional Tax sha ka Council,” ong ka KHNAM ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u Working President u Bah Thomas Passah bad u General Secretary u Bah James M.A Neng.“Ngi pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewlyngoh ba la aiwai  ia kane ka jaka sha kane ka Club naduh u snem 1926 bad la aiwai ruh khlem buh por kaba lah ban wanrah pat ka jingsynjor ka jong long trai u Khasi halor ka khyndew Khasi. Ngi kyntu ia ka Council, kum ka nongbat ia ka khyndew ka shyiap ban tuklar lem ia kane ka kam,” ong ka dorkhas“Kan long kaba kham sngewtynnad bad ai mynsiem ba ia kane ka Club ladei ban pyniaid da ki Khasi suda lane ban seng da ki Self Help Group (SHG) lyngba ki lai Dorbar Shnong kiba don sawdong kane ka jaka khnang ba kan plie lad ia ki samla ki jong ngi kiba iai tyrha na ka jingkyrduh kam,” la bynrap ka dorkhas.“Lada ngi bud ryntih ia ki dkhot (section) jong ka Trading by Non-Tribal Regulation 1954 ka Section 3A sub section kaba (a) haduh (f) bad kiwei kiwei ruh ki kyndon kiba la don lypa ha kane ka Regulation ngi la sngewthuh ba ym lah shuh ban ai laisen wat lada ki aplai ruh.  Ngi kyntu ia phi ban sngewbha ban tuklar ia kane ka kam khnang ba ngin lah ban khanglad ia ka jingpynkheiñ aiñ ki bar jylla bad ruh ia ka jinglait ei jong ka pisa ka Council,” ong shuh shuh ka dorkhas.
title: DAWA KA KHNAM ÏA KA KHADC BAN TUKLAR ÏA KA JINGTREIKAM KA SGC KHLEM KA TRADE LICENSE

content: : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma la maham ba ki College kiba la ïoh jingithuh na ka skulbah North Eastern Hill University (NEHU) ki lah ban shah ktah lada kim lah ban pyntreikam noh ïa ka National Education Policy (NEP) 2020.“Ka jingrejistar ne ka jingïoh jingithuh na ka Central University ka lah ban shah ktah.  Kine ki jingshah ktah kin don beit hynrei kin ym jia noh mynta mynta, kam dei ka jingpyntieng kohtympan hynrei nga sngew ba hadien 4-5 snem haba ki leit ban pynthymmai ka jingïoh jingithuh, nga thikna ba kane ka kyndon kan wan jia bad ka jingkylli ruh kan sa mih ha kata ka por, ong u Sangma ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi baar.Kane ka jingmaham jong u Myntri Rangbah ka long hadien shi sngi ba ki nonghikai jong ki 22 tylli ki College kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Meghalaya College Teachers’ Association (MCTA) ki la rai ban ym weng ïa ka Non-Cooperation Movement (NCM) kaba dang bteng haduh mynta pyrshah ïa ka jingkyntait jong u Vice Chancellor jong ka skulbah NEHU ban weng noh ïa ka Jingpynbna (Notification) ba la pynmih ha ka 12 tarik Naitung 2023, kaba kyntu ïa ki College ba la ïoh jingithuh da ka NEHU ki dei ban pyntreikam noh mardor ïa ka NEP naduh ka Academic Year jong une u snem 2023.U Myntri Rangbah u la kyntait ban kynthoh eiei halor kane kam da kaba aidaw ba um don ïa ki jingtip kiba bniah bad u ha kane ka khyllipmat.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka Jylla ka la ïaid shakhmat ban pyntreikam ïa ka NEP, u Sangma u la ong, “yn ym lah shuh ban phaidien halor kane.”U la kyntu ïa ki nonghikai bad ïa ki College ba kin wan shakhmat ban ïathir ïatai sani halor
