kane ka mat bad ka Sorkar Jylla.“Ngi lah ban ïakren ïa ki jingeh kiba phi don, lehse ki jingeh ba phi ïohi kin dei tang ki jingeh kiba donkam ban pynshai ne donkam ka jingïasyllok lang.  Ki don katto katne ki jingbym ïasngewthuh jingmut hynrei ngin hap ban pynshai ïa kita,” u la bynrap.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka long kaba kloi ban ïakren bad ka MCTA halor ka jingsngew jong ki.“Sa shisien nga pdiang sngewbha ïa ki. U Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ngi, u long uba kloi ban ïakynduh lada donkam. Nga ruh nga long uba kloi ha kano kano ka por lada phi donkam ïa ka jingpynshai. Ngi don hangne ban pynshai,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh u Sangma u la ong ba u ladep ïakren bad kiba bun ki Principal bad bun na ki, ki la pynpaw ba ki kwah ban ïaid shakhmat ban pyntreikam ïa ka NEP bad ka Sorakr ka la kular ruh ban kren ïa ki lad jingïarap lada donkam.Ha kajuh ka por, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba kam don satia kano kano ka jingbei pisa na ka Sorkar Pdeng ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka NEP.“Ka Sorkar ka lah ban ïarap ïa ngi ha kiba bun ki rukom (hynrei) kam don kano kano ka kyndon kaba kdew shai na ka Sorkar ban ong ba ngin ai katne ka pisa ban pyntreikam ïa ka NEP,” u la ong.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la ïarap ïa baroh ki jylla la ka long ha kaba shna ïa ki kamra klas ha ki College bapher bapher, la ka long ban ai jinghikai bad kiwei kiwei.
title: ISHU NEP 2020: KI COLLEGE KI LAH BAN DUH JINGITHUH NA KA NEHU, MAHAM U CONRAD

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Narpuh Circle ha ka sngi baar hapoh ka jingialam u Phanuel Tongper ka la hiar marmar sha shnong Donaskur Elaka Narpuh, East Jaiñtia Hills hadien ba ka la ioh khubor halor ka jingjia shah pyniap dusmon jong kawei ka longkmie kaba kyrteng ka Priskila Suchiang, 45 snem ka rta ha ki suba khar Bangladesh kaba la jia ha ka lah sngi U Blei ha ka por kumba 11:00 baje mynstep.Ka KSU lyngba une u kyrwoh, ka la ong ba kane ka longkmie kaba don ar ngut ki khun ka dei kaba ju khaïi lyngba ki jaka khappud bad ka Bangladesh bad uwei u Khar Muslim.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong ki trai shnong, kane ka longkmie lem bad u khun shynrang ki la mih ban iaid da ka kjat haduh ban da poi ha kawei ka ïing trep kaba katei ka longkmie kajuh shongthait.Hynrei une u khun jong ka u la ong ia la ka kmie ba kan shong shiphang bad ma u un leit wad lynti ban pynpoi ia ki mar, hynrei hadien ba ula wanphai sha kajuh ka jaka ula shem pynban ba ka kmie jong u ka la thiah lyngktar ha madan ha ryngkat ka jinglyngkien jong ka snam.Ha kaba kum kane ka por la ong ba une u khun u la pyrta lyniar bad mareh ban pyrta briew, bad na ka liang ki nongshong shnong ruh ki la wan poi bran bran ha kaba la lap ba ia ka met jong ka ba la mait dusmon da ka wait ia ka durkhmat bad na ki kti ki kjat lyngkhot lyngkhot.La ong ba kane ka rukom pyniap ka long kaba itriem shisha kumba la iathuh da ki trai shnong. Halor kane ka jingjia na ka liang ka KSU kam lah khlem da pynpaw ka jingsngewsih bad sngewbitar ia katei ka jingleh dusmon ki khar Bangla pyrshah ia kane ka longkmie bad ka pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewlem ia kitei ki arngut ki khun, u shynrang bad ka kynthei kiba la duh noh ia la ka kmie baieit ha ki kti ki riew thrang snam.Na ka liang ka seng ka maham ruh ia kito ki briew trai shnong jong kito ki thaiñ kiba ia khaïi pateng bad ki khar Bangla ba kin long kiba husiar nangne shakhmat.Ka KSU ka maham ruh ba ki trai shnong kim dei ban pynjuh ia kitei ki khar bangla ban ialam shapoh shnong poh thaw watla ki ia dei ha kam khaïi pateng.Shuh shuh kane ka jingjia shah pyniap jong kane ka longkmie ka la jia ha khappud ka India bad Bangladesh, kata ha ka jingjngai kaba tang kumba 2 kynta lynti na shnong Donaskur.Hadien kane ka jingjia ia ka met jong katei ka longkmie la shimti noh da ki pulit ban rah sha Khliehriat ban leh ia ka post morterm.Ha kajuh ka por ka Seng ka kyntu jur ia ki bor Pulit ban pynlong ka jingthwet ban lapdien ia kitei ki riew thrang snam bad ban pynshitom tyngeh katkum ka aiñ.
title: SUBA BA SHAH PYNÏAP KA LONGKMIE NONGKHAÏI HA KI KHAR BANGLA HA DONASKUR, EJH

content: Shillong, Nailur, 12: Ka Kynhun Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi baar ka la rai ban pyndam noh ïa ka jingïasoi da ka Sorkar barim bad ki kompeni ban shna ïa ka shlem pynmih bording jong ka Kynshi Stage-I bad ka Upper Khri Stage-I bad Stage-II.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang Kynhun Myntri u la ong, “la rai ban pyndam noh ïa ki ar tylli ki shlem pynmih bording ba la ïasoi mynshwa da ka Sorkar Jylla. Kawei ka dei ka Kynshi Stage-I bad kawei pat ka dei ka Upper Khri Stage-I & II Hydro Electrical Project (HEP).”“Kine ki ar tylli ki projek ki dei kiba la ïasoi bad ki kompeni shimet hynrei na ka daw ka jingbym don pisa ban pyntrei ïa kine ki projek bad na ka jingkiew shaba palat ka dor bad ka jingshimpor jong ki kompeni ban pyntrei ïa kine ki projek, ka Kynhun Myntri ka la rai ban pyndam noh ïa kine ki projek.”“Hynrei ka Sorkar bad ka tnat ba dei peit kan sa wad da kiwei pat ki kompeni ba thymmai lane da kijuh ki kompeni kiba rim  na ka daw ba ka dor trei kam ïahap shuh bad ka jingwan ki teknoloji ba thymmai na ka bynta ka Pump Storage bad kiwei kiwei ki jingshna lah ban pyndonkam bad ruh ka jingpynlang ïa ka um yn lah ban pyllait na kawei ka projek bad yn pyndonkam pat sha  ka bynta ba sharum jong ka wah na ka bynta kawei pat ka projek kumba ka long ha ka Upper Khri Stage I bad Stage-II.”“Ïa kine ki projek donkam ruh ban pynkylla bad namar kata ka Sorkar bad ka tnat ba dei peit kin sa pyrkhat halor kane bad ngi kyrmen ruh shen yn sa lah ban khot noh ïa ka Expression of Interest (EoI) ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa kine ki projek ha ka dur kaba thymmai,” la bynrap u Sangma.Haba kylli, u Sangma u la ong, ka dor jong ka Upper Khri projek ka la poi haduh T. 9 shi Unit bad ka Kynshi ka long T. 8 shi Unit, kiba ym ïahap satia.“Lada mynta ngi thied ïa ka bording ha ka dor T.2 haduh T. 6 namar ka jingjur ka jingdawa ka dor kan poi T. 8-9 haba ngi tip ba ka dor jong ka projek kan ailad ïa ngi ban thied ïa ka bording ha ka dor T. Rs 8 kaba la long lypa ka bym ïahap,” u la ong.
title: PYNDAM KA SORKAR MDA ÏA KI JINGÏASOI BARIM BAN SHNA ÏA KA KYNSHI STAGE-1 BAD UPPER KHRI STAGE-I BAD II

content: Shillong, Nailur, 12: Ka Kynhun Myntri ha ka sngi Baar ka la rai ban thaw ïa ka State Water Informatics Centre, Meghalaya ha kaba ka tnat Water Resources kan long kum ka Nodal Department lane ka tnat kaba peit ïa kane ka Centre.“Ka thong kaba hakhmat eh jong ka State Water Informatics Centre (SWIC) kan treikam kum ka Agency ban lum jingtip shaphang ka um ha ka jylla ha ki rukom bapher bapher la ka dei ïa u slap, ka jingdon ka um ha ki wahduid, ha ki tyllong um, ha ki umpohliew bad kiwei kiwei bad ban peit thuh ïa ki baroh shisnem bad ban ai jingtip sha ki tnat ba dei peit kum ka tnat PHE, ka tnat Soil & Water Conservation, ka tnat Agriculture, ka tnat Disaster Management bad kiwei kiwei khnang ba kin buh jingtip thik pa thik,” la ïathuh u Myntri Rangbah.Ka jingthaw ïa ka SWIC ka long kum ka jingbthah jong ka Ministry of Jal Shakti ka Sorkar India.Nalor kine, ka Kynhun Myntri ka la ïathir sani ruh ïa ki lai tylli ki Ordinance ïa kiba hap ban mynjur da ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla. Kine ki lai tylli ki Ordinance la ïathir ïatai ha ka dur jong ki Amendment Bill ne kum ka Bill bad ïa kiba yn sa rah ha ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ.Ka Ordinance kaba nyngkong ka long halor ka jingpyndam noh ïa ka Rajit Lal University Act, 2011.Kaba ar, ka dei halor  ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ka Meghalaya Goods and Service Tax, 2017.“La wanrah ïa kine ki jingpynbeit thymmai katkum ka rai ba la shim da ka GST Council ïa kiba yn hap ban pyntreikam da ki Sorkar Jylla bad manla ki Sorkar Jylla kin hap ban pynbeit thymmai ïa ki kyndon jong ka GST Act jong ka Jylla katkum ka jingpynbeit ba la wanrah da ka GST Council,” ong u Sangma.Ka Ordinance kaba lai ka dei halor ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ka Meghalaya Medical Council Amendment Bill 2023 bad ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ka National Law University of Meghalaya Bill, 2023.
title: THAW KA SORKAR JYLLA ÏA KA STATE WATER INFORMATICS CENTRE

content: Shillong, Nailur, 12: Ka Kynhun Myntri ka la mynjur ban thaw ïa ka Engineering Wing hapoh ka Police Headquarter, Shillong ka ban peit ïa ki jingtei bad ki jingshna jong ka tnat Pulit ha kylleng ka jylla.“Ka tnat Pulit ka dei kaba don bun tylli ki jingtei ha baroh kawei ka jylla namar kata ban ailad ïa ka tnat Pulit ba kan sumar ïa ki ingsah, ki ophis treikam bad kiwei kiwei ki jingtrei, la i donkam ban don ïa ka Engineering Wing namar ka jingbym don jong ka Engineering Wing, ka tnat kam ym lah ban bud ïa ki kyndon bapher bapher kiba kham bam por bad kiba hap ban don bynta lang da ki Agency bapher bapher ban leh naduh i kam iba rit wat tang ban shu maramot ïa ka kamra sum ne ban maramot ïa ka thanat ne ka ktem sah,” ong u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Ïa kine ki kam mynta yn sa peit da ka Engineering Wing bad ha u snem baladep ngi la rai ban mang pisa bad ban kynshew pisa hapoh ka jingpeit jong ki Superintendent of Police bad ki Deputy Commissioner ha manla ki District khnang ba kin dup lah ban pyndonkam ïa ka pisa mardor na ka bynta ki kam maramot ïa ki jingtei ha ki District Level,” u la ong.“Da kane ka jingmynjur, la ailad ïa ka tnat Pulit ban peit ruh wat ïa ki jingdonkam jong ki Pulit ha ki District,” u la ong.
title: YN THAW IA KA ENGINEERING WING HA POLICE HEADQUARTER

content: Ka All Jaiñtia Youth Welfare Organisation (AJYWO) Central Body bad ka AJYWO – East Jaiñtia Zone ka la aiti da ka dorkhas sha ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ban pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor ka jingthmu ban pynpoi ia ka lynti Rel ha East Jaiñtia Hills District.Ha ka dorkhas ba la soi da u President ka AJYWO East Jaiñtia Zone, u Bah Heatermoon Ryngkhlem bad u Secretary General ka AJYWO Central Body u Bah Reachingson Siangshai la ai kopi ia ka dorkhas sha ki arngut ki MLA jong ka District, kata, sha u Ma Kyrmen Shylla uba dei u Myntri jong ka Sorkar MDA bad ka Kong Santa Mary Shylla kaba dei ka MLA jong ka Sutnga Saipung Constituency.“Kumba long kiwei kiwei ki sengbhalang bad u paidbah jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills, bad u paid ka Bri u Hynniewtrep, ka AJYWO ruh, ha kawei ka sur ka pyrshah jur ïa ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar jylla ban wanrah lynti rel ha ka District, halor ka nongrim jong ka jingbym pat pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) tad haduh mynta ruh ha ka jylla, kumba la leh lang ha kiwei pat ki jylla jong ka thaiñ shatei lam-mihngi ka ri India, ïa kaba ka sorkar jylla ka la shim ïa rai ha Ingdorbar Thawaiñ, naduh u snem 2019, ban pyntreikam ïa ka na ka bynta ban ïada ïa ki trai ri trai muluk rit paid jong ka jylla, hynrei kaba la shu leh lyndet mynta da ka sorkar jylla bad sorkar pdeng,” ong U Heatermoon Ryngkhlem, President ka AJYWO-East Jaiñtia Zone.“Ka Jylla Meghalaya ka dei ka jylla kaba rit tam ha ka ri India, kaba dei ka ri ka muluk trai jong ki jaitbynriew riewlum barit paid tam, bad ba dang sahdien tam ha baroh ki liang, kaba don mynta hapdeng ka jingma kaba khraw na ka jingshah tyllep ha kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew heh paid na ri thor India, kiba la ïawan rung ïawan mih, ïawan shong ïawan sah, ,ïawan trei ïawan ktah, ïawan kamai ïawan kajih katba mon ha ka jylla khlem da don ka aiñ kaba pyrkhing bha ban tehlakam ïa kane, kaba la ktah bad buh shisha ha ka jingma kaba khraw ïa ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew rit”, bynrap bïang u Bah Ryngkhlem.“U Bah Ryngkhlem u la bynrap shuh shuh da kaba ong ba, ym lah ban len, ba ka jaitbynriew jong ngi mynta ka don ha ka jingma kaba khraw, bad ba kane ka pateng kaba mynta ka lah ban dei ka pateng kaba khatduh eh lehse ka ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban ïada ka jaitbynriew rit paid jong ngi lym kumta yn nym don shuh lehse mano mano ruh em ban leh ïa kata. Kumta lada ma ngi kiba mynta, ngim ïatrei mynta hi ban ïada ïa ka jaitbynriew lajong mano pat bad lano ka jingshongsuk shongshngaiñ bad ka jingim laitlud jong ka Jaitbynriew ha la ka jong ka ri wat lada duk da kyrduh ruh ka kham kor shi katdei eh ban ïa ka roi ka par ka ban tuh noh ïa kita baroh na ngi.”“Ka East Jaiñtia Hills, ka dei ka district kaba rit, kaba don tang 1,22,939 tam ngut ki trai shnong kat kum ka PPF, 2011 Census. Tang lyngba jong ki surok ka la long lypa ka District kaba la shah jan shah tap tyllep da ki briew kiba nabar ka jylla, kaba la ktah mynta haduh katta katta, ïa ka ïoh ka kot, ka khaïi ka pateng bad wat ïa ka jingbun paid bad ruh ïa ka jingshongshngaiñ jong ki trai shnong bad sa katno tam lada ka lynti rel kan wan” bynrap u kyrwoh.“Lada ka lynti rel kan wan, kan plie lad shuh shuh ïa kiwei ki jaidbynriew heh paid, na ri thor ri India ban wan rung wan mih, wan shong wan sah bad ruh wan kamai kajih bad wan trei wan ktah katba mon shapoh jong ka District ka ban sa ktah shuh shuh ïa ka ïoh kam ïoh jam jong ki trai trai shnong khamtam ïa kito kiba don truck bad ïa baroh kito kiba im jaka kpoh na ki truck. Wat ki mar rep trai ri trai muluk ruh kin sa shah ktah jur namar kiba kum kita kin sa wan rung suk lyngba katei ka lynti rel na kiwei pat ki jylla, “ la bynrap u Secy. General ka AJWYO Sengkmie u Bah R. Siangshai.Ka AJYWO ka ai jingmut sha ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan pynleit jingmut ban wanrah ïa kiwei ki kam pynroi ba donkam kyrkieh eh ha ka District, kum kaba pynbha ïa ki jaka ai jingsumar ïa ka koit ka khiah, kaba pynshna ïa ki surok ban pynïashnoh ïa ki thaiñ nongkyndong, kaba wanrah ïa ka Government Secondary, Higher Secondary School bad ka Government College, kaba wanrah ïa ka District Auditorium cum Library, kaba maramot wut wut ïa NH-6 ba la isangsot mynta bad ban wanrah da ka surokbah sawlaiñ (Fourlane) naduh Damsite, Ri Bhoi District haduh Malidor East Jaiñtia Hills District bad kiwei kiwei de ki kam pynroi pynpar ba donkam kyrkieh.
title: PYRSHAH JUR KA AJYWO BAN WANRAH ÏA KA LYNTI REL HA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS

content: Shillong, Nailur 14: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) bad ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) ha ka sngi palei ki la rai da kawei ka sur ban ïatreilang ryngkat ryngkat na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ki shnong kiba hab hapoh ka Block II kaba don ha ka jingïakajia pud.Ïa kane ka rai la shim ha ka jingïalang kaba la long hapdeng u CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem bad u CEM ka KAAC u Dr. Tuliram Ronghang ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u MP ka Karbi Anglong u Horen Singh Bey.Ha kane ka jingïalang la ïashim bynta lang da ki Executive Member na baroh ar tylli ki Autonomous Councils.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang, u Bah Pynïaid u la ong ba ka KHADC bad ka KAAC  ki la rai ban ïatreilang ryngkat ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ hapdeng ki ar jaitbynriew kiba sah ha khappud.U Bah Pynïaid u la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingshah pyndik jong ki paid Khasi kiba sah ha ka thain Block II.“Naduh mynnin, nga ladep pynsngew ha u CEM ka KAAC halor kane kam bad kyrpad ruh ïa u ban tuklar lem khnang ba ki Khasi-Pnar kin ym shah pyndik khamtam haba ar tylli ki sorkar jylla ki dang don ha ka lynti ban ïapynbeit ïa ka jingïakajia pud,” u la ong.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdawa ban pynphai biang ïa ka Block II sha Meghalaya, u CEM ka KHADC u la ïathuh ba ïa kane ka kam ki ar tylli ki Sorkar ki dang don hapdeng ka jingïakren.“Namarkata, ki ar tylli ki district council ki la rai ban ïatreilang.  Ngin sngap ïa ka sur jong ki paidbah na baroh tylli ki jaidbynriew shwa ba ngin ai ïa ki jingai jingmut jong ngi sha ki regional committee jong ki ar tylli ki jylla,” u la ong.Ha kajuh ka por, u Bah Pynïaid u la ïathuh ba ki ar tylli ki District Council ki la rai ban ïatreilang ban pynneh bad ban kyntiew ïa ka kolshor bad ki jingteinam u menbarim jong ki ar tylli ki jaidbynriew.
title: MYNJUR KA KAAC BAD KHADC BAN PYNNEH ÏA KA SHONGSUK SHONGSAIÑ HA BLOCK-II

content: Shillong,  Nailur 14: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka dang ap ktien na ki heh nongïalam jong ka seng kieng atiar ba la kheiñ be-aiñ ka Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ban shim rai kumno ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk.“Ngi dang ap ktien na ki (HNLC).  Tang shu ïoh ïa ka jubab, ngin sa rai kumno ban ïaid shakhmat,” ong u Sangma ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Kumba nga la ong ha kum kine ki jingïakren, ngi donkam ban pynthikna ba kan don ka jingkhih lang na baroh ki liang.  Baroh ki kynhun ki dei ban don bynta lang ha ka jingïakren.  Namarkata, katba ngi dang jam shakhmat ïa ka jingïakren ki don ki katto katne ki bynta, katto katne na ka liang jong ki bad katto katne na ka liang jong ngi bad ngi dang bishar ïa kata,” u la ong.“Ngi la phah ktien sha ki baroh lyngba ki ksiang jong ngi bad ngi dang ap ïa ka jubab na ka liang ka jong ki,” u la bynrap.Haba kylli, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ki Case ba la pynngat da ka NIA pyrshah ïa ki nongïalam ka HNLC ki dei kiba rim.“Ka dei ka kam kaba la ïaid shakhmat, bad kam dei ka bynta jong ka sorkar jylla, ka dei ka kam jong ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ngi ladep phah jingtip ruh sha ki bad na kata ka daw balei nga ong katba ka jingïakren ka la ïaid shakhmat ha ki bynta bapher bapher bad ki kyndon bapher bapher bad ki jingïakren bapher bapher ki lah ban long bad ki kynhun bapher bapher na ka Sorkar Pdeng, na ka Sorkar Jylla bad na ka liang jong ki bad ngin sa bishar kumno ban ïaid shakhmat,” u la ong.“Hynrei kumba nga la ong, ka lynti ïaid bad ki kynhun bapher bapher ruh ki hap ban ïadon bynta lang, ngi donkam ban pynshai na baroh ki liang bad kane kan sa nang ïaid shakhmat,” u la ong bad bynrap, “hooid ka dei ka kam kaba khia bad ngi la pynsngew ruh sha Delhi.”Dang shen, ka HNLC ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingïoh shithi khot hajir ïa u General Secretary u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw ha ka Kashari jong u Judicial Magistrate. Kane ka seng kieng atiar ka la dawa ïa ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban ai ka jingmap ei ïa baroh ki nongïalam ka seng, hynrei lym kumta ka seng ka lah ban weng noh ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk.Ha ka 4 tarik Nailur 2023, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba peit ïa ka tnat Kam Pohing u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka ladep phah ktien sha ki nongïalam ka HNLC ba ki kwah u Chairman u Bah Bobby Marweiñ bad u General Secretary u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw ki dei ban don ha ka jingïakren ïasuk ka ban sa long.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka bol mynta ka don ha ka kti ka HNLC bad ka Sorkar ka dang ap ïa ka jubab na ki, shwa ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka jingïakren kaba la ïaid shakhmat.
title: DANG AP KTIEN KA SORKAR NA KI HEH HNLC SHWA BAN BTENG ÏA KA JINGÏAKREN ÏASUK

content: Shillong, Nailur 14: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la ong ba ka jingïakajia pud kaba la sah pongding da ki phew snem hapdeng ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ka Jylla Assam yn sa lah ban pynkut tang da ka jingïakren bad ka jingïathir ïatai hynrei ym da ka thma.Kane ka jingkren jong u Myntri Rangbah ka long hadien ba ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Laban Circle ka la byrngem ban khang khyrdep ïa ka Karbi Hemtun (Guest House) lada ki jaidbynriew Karbi bad ka Sorkar Assam ki dang ïai bteng ban kyntur pud be-aiñ bad ban pyndik ïa ki paid Khasi-Pnar kiba sah ha West Jaiñtia Hills District.Ïa ka Karbi Hemtun la plie paidbah lang da u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha ka sngi balang.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u  Sangma u la ong ba ka thma kan ym pynmih soh eiei ruh em.“Ngi don ha India bad hooid, ngi hap ban trei bad ban ïasyllok halor kane ka kam bad ban im hapdeng ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.  Kine ki dei ki jingtynjuh, ki dei ki jyrwit jyrwat kiba ngi hap ban bishar hynrei yn ym lah ban weng ïa kine ki jingeh da ka lynti jong ka thma.  Ban weng ïa ki jingeh dei tang lyngba ki jingïasyllok bad ki jingïakren, da ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut bad ka jingshahniah bad namarkta ngi donkam ban pynthikna ba ngi dei ban tei ïa ka jingshahniah bad ki paralok ba marjan jong ngi, ban sngewskhem ha ki jingïakren bad ha ki kyndon ïakren, ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti kiba ngi lah ban ïa sngewthuh lang iwei ïa iwei pat bad ha kum kine ki khep ba kham kongsan, kine ki jingshahniah ki dei ban don,” u la ong.“Namarakata, lashai lada phi kwah ban buh ïa ka Meghalaya House ha Assam ne ha Guwahati bad lada don mano mano ba ong phim lah ban leh kumta, ngam tharai ba kata kan dei ka lynti kaba bha,” u la bynrap.“Hooid, ngam ong ba kam don ka jingsngewkhia, ki don ki jingsngewkhia hynrei ban weng ïa kine ki jingeh, ka thma kam dei ka lynti.  Ngi donkam ban ïatreilang ban tei ïa ka jingshahniah bad ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut na ka bynta ban pyntyllun shakhmat bad kata ka dei ka khubor kaba mih hynnin ka sngi (ha ka jingplie paidbah ïa ka Karbi Hemtun),” la ong u Sangma.Ha kajuh ka por, u Sangma u la pyntip ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam bad Meghalaya kin sa buh tarik ban pynthikna ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïakren pynbeit pud ha ka wat kaba ar, ha ki khyndiat sngi ki ban sa wan.
title: DEI TANG KA JINGÏAKREN YM DA KA THMA KABA LAH BAN BAN WENG ÏA KA JINGÏAKAJIA PUD: CONRAD

content: Arngut ki snar khaii drok ia kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Lorence Zomuanpuia, 32 snem uba sah ha Assam Bazar, ARC, Shillong bad u Lalmalsawa, 36 snem uba sah ha Hunthar veng, Aizawl, Mizoram ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District halor ka jingdonkti ban wanrah be-aiñ ia u drok sha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.U Kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Jaiñtia Hills u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa u la iathuh, ha ka step sngi thohdieng ki Pulit ki la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ba ki ar tylli ki kali Tourist kiba wan na Mizoram ki la kit ia ki tiar khaii be-aiñ.Mar mar, ki Pulit ka kynhun Anti-Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) ryngkat bad ki Pulit jong ka Umtyra Check gate bad ka Khliehriat Police Station ki la pynlong ka jingtalasi ia ki kali ha ka shnong Nongsning hapoh ka jingialam jong u Addl. Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaintia Hills u Bah Banraplang Jyrwa.U SP u la iathuh, dei ha ka por kumba 8:30 baje mynstep ki Pulit ki la bat ar tylli ki kali. Ha ka jingtalasi ia ka kali banyngkong (Tata Sumo ML-05-M-1597) ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki nongsakhi, la lap saw tylli ki synduk thep sabon ba la thep ia u powdar rong stem uba khia 43.33 gm, bad ha ka jingtalasi sa ia ka kali kaba ar (Tata Sumo MZ-01-K-3872), la ioh kurup 44 tylli ki synduk thep sabon ba la thep ia u powdar rong soh uba don ka jingkhia kaba 516.43 gm, haba khein lang u drok ba lah ioh kurup mynta ka step u long 559.76 gmsHa ka jingtohkit bad eksamin la pynshisha ba u powdar u dei u drok heroin. Ia u drok ba la ioh kurup la song bad la kurup hakhmat ki nongsakhi.Ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup ruh T. 2,200 ka pisa bad ar tylli ki mobile phone.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh ki kyndon jong ka NDPS Act ha Khliehriat Police Station bad ka jingtohkit halor kane ka dang iaid shakhmat ban lap ksai sa ia kiwei pat kiba donkti lang ban pynpoi ia u drok sha kane ka jylla.
title: KURUP 48 SYNDUK U DROK HEROIN BA SHONGDOR 5.5 KLUR HA EAST JAINTIA HILLS

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit ha ka sngi palei ka la rai  ban pynlong da ka jingiakhih paidbah da kaba thiah hapdeng surokbah National Highway -6 ha Khliehriat kaba dei ka Headquarter jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District.Ia kane ka jingiakhih yn pynlong ha ka 25 tarik mynta u bnai naduh ka por 10:00 baje mynstep haduh 4:00 baje janmiet.U kyrwoh ba la phah da u Publicity Secretary, u samla Hamewanpynhun Ryngkhlem u la ong, “la shim ia kane ka rai hadien ba ka National Highway Authority of India (NHAI) kam shym la patiaw ne sngap ia ka jingdawa ka seng ha ka wat ba nyngkong jong ka jingiakhih ha khmat ka Toll Gate ha Lumshnong ha ka 8 tarik, Nailar, 2023.”“Ka jingiakhih ha kato ka sngi kaba la wan ia shim bynta naduh ki Rangbah shnong jong ka thaiñ Elaka Narpuh lem bad ki paidbah ba bun. U Manager Technical jong ka NHAI u Biswa Jyoti Lahkar u la kular ban pyndep ia ka jingmarmot ia ka surok hapoh hynriew taïew kaba mut un sdang naduh ka 09/08/2023, hynrei kata ka hynriew taïew ka la jan kut, hynrei ym don dak eiei.Dang ha kine ki khyndait sngi ka seng ka la hiar shaduh Ratachera ban jurip, la lap pynban ba ka surok ka la nangjot rathai katba nangmih ki sngi. Kane ka long ka jingkular kai bad kular thok jong ka NHAI.  Dei halor ka jingleh bymsuid ñiew ka NHAI kumjuh ka Sorkar ka la pynlong ruh tang ka jaka iaid na surok ym don jaka shuh ia ki paidbah. Ym don ba nud shuh ban mih iaid kai sha surok.  Por slap da ka ktieh, por rang da u pumpum.  Sangsot shisha ia u paidbah, kat shaba leit ka jingsahkut kali, ki paidbah shisha ki la mad kthang,” la ong u kyrwoh.Lyngba une u kyrwoh ka seng ka khot bad wer ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District baroh kawei bad ia kiwei kiwei ki paralok sengbhalang ban iasnohkti lang ha ka jingiakhih ba jaijai da kaba thiah hapdeng surokbah.“Ka long shisha ka jinglehraiñ kaba khraw ia ka Sorkar Jylla ha khmat ki saw tylli ki jylla ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi kum ka Mizoram, Tripura, Manipur bad Assam, namar kane ka surok bah ka dei kaba pyniasoh bad kine ki jylla,” ong u kyrwoh.
title: HA SUROK YN THIAH KI DKHOT KA KSU BA KUMAN KA NHAI BAN SHNA ÏA KA NATIONAL HIGHWAY-6

content: : U Bah Gloucester Nongbet uba long uwei na ki kaitor ba pawnam jong kane ka jylla Meghalaya un long uwei napdeng ki 84 ngut ki riewdonsap ha ka ri India ki ban ioh pdiang ia ka Sangeet Natak Akademi Amrit Awards ha ka jingrakhe ia ka Azadi Ka Amrit Mahotsav.Ia kane ka khusnam yn sa sam da u Vice President jong ka ri India u Jagdeep Dhankhar.Kine ki 84 ngut ki riewdonsap ki dei kiba la kynjoh ia ka rta kaba la 75 snem.U Bah Gloucester Nongbet yn sa ioh pdiang ia ka Sangeet Natak Akademi Amrit Award halor ka jingnoh synniang jong u sha u sup u thiar jong ka rwai ka siaw tynrai ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.La kha ia u ha ka 8 tarik Naitung, 1938 ha Shillong, East Khasi Hills District.U Bah Nongbet u la sdang ban rwai ia ki jingrwai sur tynrai naduh ka rta kaba dang khynnah.  U la shongthiat kum u Ophisar IRS na ka Department of Customs, ka Sorkar Meghalaya.U Bah Nongbet u dei uba ju ieid bha ia ki jingrwai sur tynrai, u nongthoh bad u nongshna jingrwai, u nongrwai bad uba la pyntbit bha ialade ban them Duitara kaba long kawei na ki jingtem tynrai kaba paw bha hapdeng ka jaidbynriew Khasi.U la thoh bad shna ruh da ki spah tylli ki jingrwai shaphang ka mariang, ki jingrwai ieid ri bad ki jingrwai mane Blei.U dei uba la ioh ia ka kyrdan ‘A’ grade jong ka All India Radio bad Doordarshan.Ha ki snem ba mynshwa u ju rwai kylleng ka jylla bad sha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka ri. U la thoh bun tylli ki Script na ka bynta ki jingialehkai Thiatar bad ki phlim Khasi bad u la iashim bynta ruh ban ak ha ka phlim Khasi kaba la ai kyrteng, Sha Ba Sep Ka Sngi bad katto katne kiwei pat.
title: DA KA SANGEET NATAK AKADEMI AMRIT AWARD YN ÏOH PDIANG U BAH GLOUCESTER NONGBET

content: : Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la kyntu ia ki ar ngut ki MLA jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ban kren halor ka jingjot rathai ka surok National Highway-6 ha ka Dorbar Synrai kaba la sdang mynta ka sngi.“Ki nongmih khmat jong ka District kim dei ban sngap jar haba kat kane ka jingeh ki paidbah ki ia kynduh,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Publicity Secretary, u samla Hamewanpynhun Ryngkhlem.“Ngi kyntu ia phi ki Nongmihkhmat baroh jong ka ïingdorbar thawain ka jylla bad khamtam ia arngut ki nongmihkhmat ka thain naduh u Bah Kyrmen Shylla uba long u MLA ka Khliehriat Constituency bad ka Kong Santa Marry Shylla kaba long ka MLA jong ka Sutnga Saipung Constituency.  Ki MLA jong ngi kin hap ban kylli jingkylli na ka Sorkar lynba u Myntri ka tnat PWD u Bah Prestone Tynsong balei ka NHAI ka ioh leh mon haduh katne bad ruh ban wanrah ruh da ka Call Attention Motion ia kane ka mat ha iingdorbar thawain ka jylla khnang ba ki paidbah jong ka thain kin tip ia ka jingshisha,” ong u kyrwoh.
title: KYNTU KA KSU ÏA U BAH KYRMEN BAD KONG SANTA BAN KREN HA ASSEMBLY ÏA KA JINGJOT KA SUROK NH-6

content: Ka Sorkar India ka la shim ia ka sienjam ba nyngkong eh ban pynshlur ia ki kynthei ban iashim bynta ha ki jingiakob mareh bad mynta u snem 2023 ka la pynlong ia ka jingiakop mareh kaba la tip kum ka Khelo India Women’s League.Ka Meghalaya Athletic Association ruh ha ka lah sngi U Blei, ka la pynlong da ka jingiakop mareh kaba la iashim bynta tang da ki kynthei, kaba la sdang na phyllaw jong ka Sport Authority of India kaba don ha Nehu. Ia kane ka jingiakop mareh la kaweh lama da ka Kong Bansaralin Dhar kaba dei ka Internatinal Athletes and Asian Medalist kum ka Kongsan ryngkat ka jingdon lang u Secretary ka Meghalaya Athletic Association u Bah Finely Pariat.Ha kane ka jingiakop mareh ha ka jingjngai kaba 5 kilometer bad 3 kilometer la ia shim bynta haduh 30 ngut ki kynthei.Ki nongjop ha ka jingiakop mareh na ka bynta 5 kilometer, ia ka nam ba nyngkong la iohrah da ka Barisha Khymdeit ryngkat ka song pisa ba 2500 tyngka kaba la ioh ruh ia ka takma ksiar, katba ka Melibad Kro kaba la wan baar ka la ioh ia ka song pisa kaba 1500 tyngka bad takma rupa bad ha ka kyrdan kaba lai la iohrah da ka Medaroi Biam kaba la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba 1000 tyngka bad ka takma rong.Ha ka jingiakob mareh kaba 3 kilometer ia ka nam lahduh la iohrah da ka Bethyne Grace Makri kaba la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba 2500 tyngka bad ka takma ksiar, ka Barihun Kharjahrin kaba la wan baar ka la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba 1500 tyngka bad ka takma rupa bad ka Anrisha Klein kaba la wan balai ka la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba 1000 tyngka bad ka takma rnong.
title: KHELO INDIA WOMEN’S LEAGUE: KHUR TAKMA KSIAR KA BARISHA KHYMDEIT BAD BETHYNE GRACE MAKRI

content: Shillong, Nailur 13 : Ka Khasi Students’ Union – Laban Circle ha u kyrwoh na u Samla Jason Laloo General Secretary, KSU Laban Circle ka kwah ban ai ka khubor kaba shai sha ki jaitbynriew Karbi bad kumjuh ruh ia ka  Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) bad sha ka Sorkar Assam ba kin sangeh  noh shi syndon ia ka jingleh donbor ka jong ki ia ki paradoh parasnam kiba don ha khappud da kaba pyndik na ka por sha ka por da ka jingkyntur pud sha ka jylla Meghalaya, ka jingkhrong khajna beaiñ ia ki kali mar rep jong ki nongshong shnong jong ka jylla, ka jingbyrngem byrsit da ki seng lehnoh ki Karbi bad ka jingleh donbor ki bor pahara bad ki pulit Assam ia ki paid Khasi.Katkum ki jinglum khubor jong ka Seng la iathuh ba u Myntri Rangbah jong ka Jylla Assam, u Dr. Himanta Biswa Sarma un wan hiar lashai ka sngi u 13 tarik u Nailur 2023 sha Shillong ban plie ia ka Karbi Hemtun House kaba don ha Laban pyrshah ka Pinemount School, Shillong bad ban buh ia u Mawnongrim na bynta ka Hostel ba 100 jingthiah na ka bynta ki samla pule.“Ka Seng kam shim la pynthud ia ka jingtei jong ka Karbi House hangtei ha Laban, namar ngim shim long ka jaitbynriew kaba bishni bad ban pyndik ia ka jingdonkam jong kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew riewlum namar ngi long ka jaitbynriew kaba Tip Briew Tip Blei, hynrei ha kajuh ka por ngim shim lah ban shu sngap jar lada ki paradoh parasnam ki jong ngi pat ki shah pyndik ha ki paid bynriew Karbi” lah ong ka kyrwohTe kumta ka Seng ka maham jur ia ki paid bynriew Karbi bad ka Sorkar Assam ba kam dei ban kyntur pud sha ka jylla Meghalaya bad kam dei satia ban pyndik ia ki Khasi ba sah ha West Jaintia Hills District, lem kumta ka Seng kan shim da ka sienjam ban khang khyrdep ia ka Karbi House ha Laban bad pyndik kumjuh ia ki jaitbynriew Karbi kumba ki pyndik ma ki ia ki Khasi, pynkut ka kyrwoh.
title: BUROM MAR KYLLIANG ÏOH MIH KA JINGIAKYNAD HAPDENG KI KARBI BAD KI PAID KHASI HA SHILLONG

content: Ki paidbah ka shnong Nongtyngur ha ka sngi thohdieng ki la ioh kem ia uwei u Khar Bangladesh uba wan rung tuh sha Ri Khasi da ka jingthmu ban leh ia ki kam sniew.Hadien ka jingkem ia une u Khar Bangladesh ki bor pyniaid shnong Nongtyngur ki la aiti noh sha ka KSU Nongtyngur Unit ban bishar bad ban leit aiti sha ki bor Pulit khnang ba une u Bangladesh un shah pynshitom katkum ki Lyndon aiñ.Ka KSU Nongtyngur Unit bad ka KSU South Central East Circle ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki bor shnong Nongtyngur ki lah leit aiti noh ia utei u Khar Bangladesh sha ki Pulit ka Pynursla, East Khasi Hills.Ka jing ioh kem ia utei u Khar Bangladesh ka dei tang hadien ar-sngi hadien ka jingshah pyniap dusmon kawei ka longkmie Khasi na ka shnong Donaskur, East Jaintia Hills ha uwei u nong Bangladeshi uba lah pyniap ia ka ha kawei ka jaka khlaw bad pharia lyngkhot lyngkhai ia ka met naduh ki kti ki kjat bad ot ruh ia ka ryndang bad kane ka jingjia ka la pynpar ñiang khriat lut ia ki paidbah kiba sah ha shilynter ki Khappud BangladeshKa KSU Nongtyngur Unit ka dawa ia ki bor Pulit ban pynshitom tyngeh ia u nong Bangladesh uba rung tuh da ki jingthmu ban leh ki kam sniew ym ban shu pynlait suk kumba lah leh na kawei ka por sha kawei ka por, ong u kyrwoh na u General Secretary ka KSU Nongtyngur u samla Melajied Khongbuh.
title: ÏOH KEM KHAR BANGLADESH KI PAIDBAH NONGTYNGUR

content: Ka Joint Action Committee Wapung C&RD Block, kaba kynthup ia ka Dorbar Shnong Wapungskur bad Dorbar Shnong Wapungshnong, ki la pynpaw ia ka jinglyngngoh bad pan jingpynshai na ka sorkar halor ka jingpynkynriah jyndat biang jong  ka Sorkar ia ka ophis treikam bashipor jong ka Wapung C&RD Block na Wapungskur sha Khliehriat khlem ki daw kiba biang bad khlem ka jingkynjoh ktien ia ka Joint Action Committee Wapung C&RD Block, ia ka Dorbar Shnong Wapungskur bad ia ka Dorbar Shnong Wapungshnong, kiba la iadon bynta naduh ba sdang bad haduh ba wanrah ia ka Wapung C&RD Block na Khliehriat sha ka thaiñ Wapung.Ha ka jingshisha kumba long mynta, namar bym pat dep ka jingshna ia ka ophis treikam bapura jong ka Wapung C&RD Block ha ka jaka kaba ka shnong Wapungskur bad shnong Wapungshnong ki la ai sngewbha sha ka Sorkar Jylla, la rah shwa shipor ia ka ophis treikam bashipor jong ka ophis ha kawei ka iing kaba don ha ka shnong Wapungskur ha u Lber, 2022. Naduh utei u snem haduh ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai katei ka ophis ka treikam ha katei ka jaka bad iing ha kaba ai ia ka jingshakri ia u paidbah jong ka block.Hynrei kyndit ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai la lap ba ia kane ka ophis treikam la rah biang sha ka Khliehriat khlem da pyntip sha ka JAC, Wapung C&RD Block lane sha ka Dorbar Shnong Wapungskur bad ka Dorbar Shnong Wapungshnong.Ha kajuh hi ka sngi ba la rah ia ki tiar ki tar jong ka ophis treikam, ki nongialam jong ka JAC Wapung C&RD Block, ki la pyrshang ban wad ia ka daw  da kaba pyrshang ban telephone ia u Block Development Officer (BDO) ba dei peit ia ka Block, hynrei u khlem shim satia ia ka phone bad la wad jingtip biang ruh da kaba kylli lyngba ka whatsapp hynrei ia kata ruh u khlem jubab satia.Ka JAC ka la pynpaw ka jingpynkynriah ia kane ka ophis treikam sha Khliehriat ka pynsuba jur ba imat ka don kaei re kaei sha lyndet halor kane ka jingleh jong ka sorkar.Kumta khnang ba ka JAC Wapung C&RD Block, ka Dorbar Shnong Wapungskur bad ka Dorbar Shnong Wapungshnong bad u paidbah  kin dup shai kdar, la dawa ba ka sorkar lane kino kino ki bor ba dei peit ia kane, kin hap ban ai ia ka jingpynshai kaba shai kdar halor kaei ka daw ba la rah biang mynta ia ka ophis treikam bashipor jong ka Block sha Khliehriat.Ka JAC Wapung C&RD Block kan ym shong kli kti da leilei ruh em  hynrei kan iai buddien tad haduh ba kane ka kam kan da shai kdar bad ban wanrah biang ia ka ophis treikam bashipor jong ka Wapung C&RD Block ha Wapungskur, ka jaka ha kaba ka ophis treikam ba pura jong ka block kan don katkum ba la pynbna da ka sorkar.Ia u kyrwoh la pyllait da u Secretary ka JAC Wapung C&RD Block, u Ma Hercules Mutyen, u Waheh Shnong ka Wapungskur u Ma Deolangki Dkhar bad u Waheh Shnong jong ka Wapungshnong u Ma Kduplang Ryngkhlem.
title: PAN JINGPYNSHAI KA JAC WAPUNG C&RD BLOCK BA PYNKYNRIAH ÏA KA OPHIS TREIKAM BASHIPOR SHA KHLIEHRIAT

content: U National President ka National Peoples’ Party (NPP) u Conrad Kongkal Sangma uba long ruh u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ha ka sngi balang u la bthah ïa ki nongïalam ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka party shwa ban poi ka elekshon Lok Sabha.U Sangma u la pynmih ïa kane ka jingbthah ha ka jingpynrung dkhot ïa u MLA barim ka Mawsynram u Bah Himalaya M Shangpliang, uba la mih noh dang shen na ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki nongïalam ka party ba kynthup ïa u Bah Prestone Tynsong bad u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar u Chief Adviser jong ka Sorkar u Bah D.D. Lapang.Haba pdiang sngewbha ïa u Bah Shangpliang sha ka NPP, u Sangma u la ong, “nga kyrmen ba ngin sa lah ban ïoh jingmyntoi shikatdei eh na ka jingwan pynïasoh u Bah Shangpliang kum u nongïalam bad ki nongkyrshan jong u, kan pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka party.”U Myntri Rangbah u la ïaroh ruh ïa u Bah Shangpliang kum u ophisar ba la shongthait uba la don bun ki jingtbit bad kum u MLA barim uba la noh synñiang shikatdei eh hapoh ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla.Da kaba kyntu ïa ki nongkyrshan ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka party u Sangma u la ong, “kum u National President, nga kwah ban kyntu ïa u State President ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka party ha ki Unit, ki Block, ki Committee bad kiwei kiwei ki tnat treikam.”“Ngi don mynta sa tang hynriew bnai bad ka ladei ka por ban trei shitom. Ngi dei ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka party,” u la bynrap.Shwa kane, u Bah Shangpliang u la ong ba ka jingpynïasoh jong u sha ka NPP ka dei namarba ka Meghalaya ka la nang kiew irat kum ka jylla ha ka ri hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Conrad K Sangma.Mynta ka sngi, nga kular ban trei na ka bynta ka party da ka jingkhuid bad ka jingleh hok bad ban shakri ïa ki paidbah jong ka jylla katkum ka jingkotbor ka jong nga, u la ong.U la ïathuh ba palat lai hajar ngut ki dkhot ki la mih noh na ka BJP bad ban pynïasoh bad ka NPP ha Mawsynram ha ka sngi baar.
title: MAR ÏARUNG U BAH H.M. SHANGPLIANG, PHAH PYNKHLAIÑ U CONRAD ÏA KA NPP SHWA KA ELEKSHON MP

content: : Ki Pulit ka Anti Narcotic Task Force (ANTF), East Khasi Hills da ka jingïarap jong ki nongkitkam shnong ka Umpling ha ka sngi baar ki la ïohkem ïa ki arngut ki snar khaii drok ïa kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Wantei Manbha Lyngdoh, 24 snem ka rta bad u Freddy Bantei Dhar 29 snem ka rta.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police, East Khasi Hills, Shillong u Bah S. Nongtnger u la ïathuh, ha ka jingtalasi ïa kine ki arngut ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki nongsakhi, ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup 1.13 gram u u drok Heroin, 417 tylli ki tyndong thylli, 39 tylli ki thyrnia injekshon bym pat pyndonkam, ar tylli ki mobile phone, kawei ka kali Tata Intra Pick-up kaba don ïa u nombar ML 05 Z 9479.Ki Pulit ki la register case ha Rynjah Police Station hapoh ka Section 21(a)/27(a) jong ka NDPS Act.
title: ÏARAP KA SHNONG UMPLING ÏA KI PULIT BAN ÏOHKEM ÏA KI NONGKHAÏI DROK

content: : U Myntri Rangbah ka Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Meghalaya u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka sngi balang ki la ïakynduh markhmat ha nongbah Shillong ban ïakren halor ka jingïapynbeit pud bad rai ruh ban pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ shwa ban pynlong ïa ka jingjurip sha ki jaka ba ïakajia pud ha u bnai Risaw mynta u snem.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang, u Sarma u la ong, “ngi la shong jingïalang bad ngi la shim rai ba ngin pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ bad lyngba kane, ngin sa leit sorjamin sha khappud khnang ba kane ka jingjurip kan ym pynmih ïa kano kano ka jingïakynad lada ma ngi baroh arngut ki Myntri Rangbah ki leit sorjamin bad hadien ba ngi la wanphai kan mih pat ka jingïakynad bad ki paidbah kin teipop kylla ïa ngi.  Namarkata, ngi kwah ban pynneh shwa ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.”“Ynda la ïohi ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ, ngin sa leit sorjamin bad ngin sa ïasyllok ruh bad ki paidbah kiba sah ha khappud.  Haba ngi leit sha Langpih, ki don bun ki tamasa. Namarkata, ngi kwah ban leit ruh sha Karbi Anglong bad sha West Jaiñtia Hills  bad ban ïohi ïa kine kijuh ki tamasa,” ula bynrap.U Myntri Rangbah ka Assam u la ong ba u kwah ban don shwa ka jingïakynduh bad ban sa leit jngoh ïa ka khappud ha u Risaw.“Nga kwah ban leit ha u bnai Risaw. Lada u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u la lah ban wan sha Guwahati ha ka taiew banyngkong jong u Risaw, ngin sa lah ban leit la kumno kumno ha ka taiew baar jong u Risaw,” ula ongHa ka jingïapynbeit pud ha ka wat kaba ar, ki arngut ki Myntri Rangbah ka Assam bad Meghalaya ki la thaw ïa ki regional committee ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti, ki ban weng ïa ki jingeh ha ki hynriew tylli ki jaka ba ïakajia pud ka Meghalaya bad Assam.Haba kylli, u Sarma ula ong, “kumba ngi la ïathuh, kine ki hynriew tylli ki jaka ki dei kiba kham jwat namarkata ki regional committees ba la khlieh da ki briew bala kham rangbah na baroh ar liang, ki la trei shitom ban leit jngoh ïa kito ki jaka manla ka por bad ngi ngeit ba baroh yn sa lah ban pynbeit da ka jingïasuk bad ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut.”U Myntri Rangbah ka Assam u la kyntait ban jubab ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdawa ban pynphai biang ïa ka Block I & II da kaba ong, “wat kylli ïa ki jingkylli kiba heh mynta namarba ka dang dei tang ka jingïakynduh jong ngi arngut.”U Sarma u la kular ba ki ar tylli ki Sorkar Jylla kin sa leh katba lah ban weng ïa ki jingeh bad ki jingïakajia ha khappud ban pynhun lang ïa ki paidbah na ka jylla Assam bad Meghalaya.Shwa kane, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba kane ka jingïakynduh kaba mynta ka sngi ka dei tang ka lynti ban ïathir ïatai kumno ban ïarap ïa ki ar tylli ki jylla ban poi sha ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut.“Kam don kano kano ka rai bad ngin sa nang ïai bteng ban ïakynduh na ka por sha ka por,” ula ong haba ai khublei ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam, ïa u CEM ka KAAC bad ïa u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Meghalaya, uba khlieh ïa ka regional committee na ka bynta ka Jaiñtia Hills.
title: HA U RISAW YN HIAR JURIP U CONRAD BAD HIMANTA ÏA KI SHNONG KHAPPUD MEGH-ASSAM

content: Ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai ka la mynjur ban shna ia ka Health Sub-Centre ha ka shnong Jyllep bad ha ka shnong Mawhiang kiba hap hapoh ka Mawsynram C&RD Block.Kane ka jingshimkhia jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei hadien ka jingiakynduh jong ka seng ia ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka 26 tarik, Iaiong, 2023 da kaba pynsngew ruh ia kiba bun ki mat jingdawa nalor ka jingpynsngew ban shna noh ia ka Health Sub Centre ha ka shnong Jyllep bad ha ka shnong Mawhiang.Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU), South West Khasi Hills District ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor lyngba u President u samla Forwardman Nongrem, ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh bad ka jingai khublei ia ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla bad khamtam eh ia ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba la shimkhia ban sngap ia ka jingeh ba ki paitbah ka thain ki iakynduh jingeh.“Ka seng ka sngewkmen shikatdei eh hadien ba ngi la ioh jingtip ba ka tnad ka Koit ka khiah jong ka sorkar jylla ba la khlieh da ka Dr. Ampareen ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai ki la mynjur ban phah shna noh ia kine ki artylli ki Health Sub Centre. Kum ka seng, ngi khmihlynti ba ka Sorkar kan pyndep noh kham kloi ia ki jingdonkam ban phah shna noh ia kine ki Sub Centre khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi ia ki paitbah jong kine ki ar tylli ki shnong bad ki shnong kiba marjan,” ong u kyrwoh.Ka Seng ka kyntu ruh ia ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ban jurip lem ia ki CHC bad ia ki PHC kiba don ha South West Khasi Hills District bad ha Mawsynram.  Ngi kyntu ia ka Myntri ban jurip kyrkieh khamtam ia ka Civil Hospital ne ka 100 Bedded CHC kaba don ha Mawkyrwat khnang ban lap ia ki jingduna hapoh kane ka Hospital naba ka seng ka ladep pynpaw teng ia ki jingduna ha kane ka hospital kum ka jingduna ki doktor, ki specialist bad kiwei kiwei ki post ba donkam.
title: MYNJUR KA HEALTH DEPARTMENT BAN SHNA ÏA KA HEALTH SUB-CENTER HA JYLLEP BAD MAWHIANG

content: : Da ka jingkmen kaba khraw ka Jylla Niam Jowai ka khot ka wer ïa baroh ki paid U Blei sha ka jingpynkyntang Lyngdoh Sad ïa u Rev. Fr. Ferdinand Dkhar ha ka 1 tarik Risaw, 2023 ha Church of the Holy Spirit Parish Ummulong, West Jaiñtia Hills ha ka por 10:00 baje Mynstep.U Archbishop jong ka Jyllañiambah Shillong u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh un long u Kongsan ha ka riti lehniam pynkyntang Lyngdohsad ryngkat ka jingïasynran lang ki Bishop jong ka thaiñ Shathie Lammihngi.La kha ïa u Rev. Fr. Ferdinand Dkhar ha ka 26 tarik Rymphang, 1962 ha ka shnong Ïongkaluh , East Jaiñtia Hills. U dei u khun Phrangsngi na ki 10 ngut ki khun jong u Ma Edwin Kyndait bad ka Kong Philomina Dkhar. La Pynkyntang Lyngdoh Sohblei ïa u ha ka 23 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 1994.Na ka bynta ki kali kiba wan sha ka jingpynkyntang Lyngdoh Sad ha katei ka sngi, ïa ka jaka pynieng kali la pynbeit kumne: ïa kiba wan na East & West Khasi Hills bad Ri Bhoi District kin hap rung na Lad-Deinthare ban rung sha shnong Moodymmai. Kin sa don ki Volunteer ban pyni lynti.Ïa kiba wan na ka Parish Amalarem bad ki thaiñ War-Jaiñtia, kin rung beit na Lad-Demthring ban poi sha Moodymmai. Kin sa don ki Volunteer ban pyni jaka parking.Ïa kiba wan na Parish Namdong, Parish Mynsngat, Parish Ïongchwiat ba ki thaiñ Nongjngi kin rung na ki lad ka shnong Wahïajer ban pyni da ki Volunteer ha Wahiajer.Ïa kiba wan na thaiñ Jowai, East & West Jaiñtia Hills, kin rung na lad CHC Ummulong. Kin sa don ki Volunteer hangta ruh.Ïa kiba don Car-pass ki dei ban tah ïa ki sticker khamtan ki kali jong ki Phadar bad Sister bad la kyrpad ruh ïa baroh ki kali ba wan jingïaseng ban teh da ki lama lieh khnang ban pynsuk ïa ki Volunteer ban pynïaid ïa ki kali, la ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Media In-Charge Jowai Diocese u Fr. Ebormitre H Lamare.
title: WER KA JOWAI DIOCESE SHA KA JINGPYNKYNTANG BISHOP ÏA U FR. FERDINAND

content: Ka jingïakop khwai dohkha ha pung Pamphyrnai West Khasi Hills, ka la wanrah pynban ïa ka khubor ba sngewsih, ha kaba tang na ka daw ka jingsahkut jong ka kali bad ka jingbym poi sha ka jaka sumar ha ka por ba biang, kawei ka longkmie ka la kha khun hapoh ka kali bad tang hadien katto katne por i khunlung i la khlad noh na kane ka sla pyrthei.Kane ka la jia ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep ha kaba ki rawon na kylleng ki jaka ki la tuid sha ka jaka ïakop khwai ha Pamphyrnai. Ka thymmei khubor ba la ioh lum ka la iathuh, hadien ba la pynbna ïa ka tiket khalai nusib bad ioh kali ha ka por 2:00 baje nohphai sgi, ka shilynter jong ka surokbah National Highway kaba don harud jong ka pung ha Pamphyrnai, ka la shlei da ki paidbah bad ki rawon kiba la mih sha surok bad kane ka la wanrah ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba la neh da ki bun bun kynta haduh da kem iong rein.Ka jingsahkut ki kali kiba ïaid lyngba kane ka surok ka la pyngbitar ruh ia ki nongleit nongwan kiba la sahkut da ki bun kynta hapdeng surok. La iathuh ruh ba ka jingdheng kali ka dei ruh namar ka jingshlei da ki kali ha baroh arliang ka surok.  Kumta ki kali kiba mih bad leit sha Nongstoiñ ki la sahkut lut. Kine ki kali kim dei tang jong ki riew shimet bad ki kali kamai, hynrei wat ki kali Pulit, ki kali jong ki ophisar sorkar bad khamtam ki kali kit nongpang ruh ki la ngat ha kane ka dheng kali.Kaba kham sngewsih eh ka long ïa ka jingjia ïa kawei ka longkmie ba armet, lem bad ki bahaïing kiba don ha kawei ka kali Tourist rong lieh kaba thmu ban leit sha jaka sumar. Hynrei naduh Nongspung kane ka kali ka la shu ieng sah hajuh bad ar ngut ki rangbah kiba don hapoh kali ki la mih ban ïakren bad ki rawon ban pyllait lem hynrei ki la shah kren heh pynban.Da ka jingbym banse ki la hap ban ïaid kjat naduh Nongspung bad leit ïakren ïa ki Pulit kiba don ha Pamphyrnai ban ïarap pyllait ïa ka kali ban poi sha jaka sumar. La iatuh ba ynda la poi ha ka shnong Khyllem Tiehsaw, ka longkmie ka la kha ïa i khun i khun shynrang bad tang hadien katto katne por i khunlung i la khlad noh. Kane ka longkmie mynta ka don hapdeng ka jingshitom bad ka dang shah sumar ha Holy Cross Hospital, Mairang.Kane kam dei shuh ka sien banyngkong ba ki kali kin ngat ha ka jingdheng kali ha Pamphyrnai hynrei manla ka por haba don ka jingpynïakop khwai ka ju jia kumne.Ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ka jingbun briew bad ki kali ka la long ar shah bad lai shah ïa kaei kaba ju long baroh shikatta. Dei na kata ka daw ka jingsahkut ka leit ka wan ka la long kaba jur bha bad ka la neh ruh da ki bun bun kynta haduh da dum syndon ka suiñ bneng.
title: KHLAD I KHUNLUNG BA KHA HAPOH KALI BA SAHKUT DA KI KYNTA HA KA DHENG KALI HA PAMPHYRNAI

content: Ka East Jaintia Hills Truck Owner & Transporter Association (EJHTO&TA) ka ai jingkyrshan kaba pura ia ka Synjuk Waheh Shnong East Jaintia Hills District, ia ka Khasi Students’ Union-(KSU) Narpuh Circle bad ia ka Jaintia Students’ Movement –Eastern Region halor ka jingaipor khatduh ia ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan maramot noh wut wut ia ka  surok National Highway-6, kaba la sniew mynta shaba palat pud.“Ka surokbah NH-6 ka dei u thied snam ym tang jong ka jylla Meghalaya, hynrei jong kiwei pat ki jylla ha thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi jong ka Ri India. Ka jingsniew palat jong kane ka surok ym tang ba ka la ktah ia ki paidbah nongleit nongwan, hynrei ka la buh ruh ha ka jingma kaba khraw bha ia ki kali bad khamtam eh ia ki mynsiem ba kordor, kiba dei iaid lyngba jong kane ka surok”, ong u President jong ka EJHTO&TA u Bah Kyrshan Dkhar.“Ka surok, ka nam te National Highway, tangba ka kam pat tang kum ka surok shnong ruh ym ikop”. U paidbah ia mynta u la sah ha ka umdum namar ngim tip don aiu sha lyndet, kat haduh ba ki bor sorkar ba dei peit ia kane ka surok ki la shu ieh beiñ shisha haduh katne katne, i kumba ki paidbah ba don kali ki khlem siew ia ki khajna surok, kat haduh ba ki kali naduh kiba heh haduh kiba rit tam bapli kim long shuh ban iaid lynti lyngba jong kane surok,” ong u Bah Kyrshan Dkhar.“Ki paidbah baroh ia mynta ki la bitar bha halor ka jinglong jingman jong ka surok NH-6. Kumta na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki paidbah, ha kaba iadei bad ka jingsniew palat jong ka surok, ka EJHTO&TA, ka dawa ia ka Sorkar Jylla haduh ka Sorkar Pdeng ba ki dei ban maramot noh mardor ia kane ka surok,” bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: KYRSHAN PURA KA EJHTO&TA ÏA KA SWSEJHD, KSU BAD JSM ÏA KA JINGDAWA BAN MARAMOT ÏA KA NH-6

content: Ka jingkhladnoh jong i khunlung ba dang shu kha jong kawei ka longkmie kaba la ngat ha ka jingdheng kali da ki bun kynta ha ka shnong Pamphyrnai ha ka 17 tarik, Nailur, 2023 na ka jingpynlong ia ka jingiakob khwai ka la pynlong ia ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council North, West Khasi Hills District bad ia ka Ri Khasi Sepngi Federation ba kin pynrem jur ia ki paidbah bad ia ki rawon ki bym don shuh ka mynsiem sngewsynei parabriew.Kine ki ar tylli ki sengbhalang ki la dawa ia ki trai kiba pyniaid ia ka jingiakop khwai dohkha ba ki dei ban siew ia ka bailutksan sha ka longing kaba la mad ia ka jingjia basngewsih bad ki la pynrem jur ruh ia ki bor synshar district ba ha kano ka rukom bad ha kano ka kyndon ki ai jingbit ia ki nongpyniathong khwai dohkha ha kaba wat ia ka surok National Highway-44E ha kane ka sngi la iohi kumba ka dei ka Parking lot jongno re jongno.Shuh shuh kine ki ar tylli ki seng ki la pynrem jur ruh ia ka jingiadon bynta lang jong u Pulit ha ka Uniform ha ka por ba don ka jingiakhalai nusib bad ki la dawa ruh na ki bor synsahr district ban khang shwa ia ka jingiakop khwai dohkha hapoh ka District.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, ka jingïakop khwai dohkha ha pung Pamphyrnai West Khasi Hills ha ka 16 tarik, Nailur, 2023, ka la wanrah pynban ïa ka khubor ba sngewsih, ha kaba tang na ka daw ka jingsahkut jong ka kali bad ka jingbym poi sha ka jaka sumar ha ka por ba biang, kawei ka longkmie ka la kha khun hapoh ka kali bad tang hadien katto katne por i khunlung i la khlad noh na kane ka sla pyrthei.Kane ka la jia ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep ha kaba ki rawon na kylleng ki jaka ki la tuid sha ka jaka ïakop khwai ha Pamphyrnai. Ka thymmei khubor ba la ioh lum ka la iathuh, hadien ba la pynbna ïa ka tiket khalai nusib bad ioh kali ha ka por 2:00 baje nohphai sgi, ka shilynter jong ka surokbah National Highway kaba don harud jong ka pung ha Pamphyrnai, ka la shlei da ki paidbah bad ki rawon kiba la mih sha surok bad kane ka la wanrah ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba la neh da ki bun bun kynta haduh da kem iong rein.Ka jingsahkut ki kali kiba ïaid lyngba kane ka surok ka la pynbitar ruh ia ki nongleit nongwan kiba la sahkut da ki bun kynta hapdeng surok. La iathuh ruh ba ka jingdheng kali ka dei ruh namar ka jingshlei da ki kali ha baroh arliang ka surok.  Kumta ki kali kiba mih bad leit sha Nongstoiñ ki la sahkut lut. Kine ki kali kim dei tang jong ki riew shimet bad ki kali kamai, hynrei wat ki kali Pulit, ki kali jong ki ophisar sorkar bad khamtam ki kali kit nongpang ruh ki la ngat ha kane ka dheng kali.
title: DAWA SIEW BAILUTKSAN KI SENGBHALANG ÏA KI NONGPYNÏAKOB KHWAI HA PAMPHYRNAI SHA KA LONGKMIE

content: Shillong,  Nailur 14: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la buh jingkylli halor ka jinglyngkot shaba palat ka Dorbar Synrai jong ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla ka ban sdang ha ka sngi Thohdieng.“Lashai la 15 tarik, Nailur, 2023 kan sdang ka Dorbar Synrai jong ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ ka jylla. Ka jingbuh por tang san sngi ban pynlong dorbar ka pynpaw shai kdar ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka kwah ban kiar ia ki jingkylli kiba bun kiba ktah ia ka jylla baroh kawei,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Working President ka KHNAM-CEC u Bah Thomas Passah ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Ngi kwah ruh ban buh ka jingkylli halor kano ka nongrim ka Business Advisory Committee (BAC) ka buh tang san sngi, kan bha ba ynnai pynlong dorbar hi lada ka dei kumne tang san sngi. Ka dorbar kaba ladep ruh ka lyngkot bha bad kane ruh kajuh hi, lada ka long ha kane ka rukom ka la shongnia ban iakren ia ki mat ki jura ha ki surok ym shuh ha Iingdorbar,” u la ong.“Ka KHNAM ka pynrem jur ia kane ka Sorkar khappud bad ka Sorkar leh donbor,” la kynthoh ka KHNAM.“Ha kine ki san sngi ngin khmihlynti ban don ban kylli ia u Myntri Rangbah halor ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) bad sa haduh katno kan shimpor ia ka Sorkar Pdeng ban mynjur noh ia ka ILP kumba la dawa da ki 60 ngut ki MLA ha u snem 2019, lada ym don ba kren kan dang pynskhem ia ka jingmut ar maloi jong ki nongmihkhmat halor ka ILP,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: BUH JINGKYLLI KA KHNAM BA PYNLONG DORBAR SYNRAI TANG 5 SNGI

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la takrain tyngeh ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba ialam da ka National Peoples Party kaba la bthah ia u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Jaintia Hills District u Abhilash Baranwal ban khot iakren ia ki nongialam jong ka KSU halor ka jingkhang khyrdep ia ka khyrdop khrong khajna ne ka Toll Gate jong ka National Highway Authority of India kaba don ha ka shnong Lumshnong, East Jaintia Hills District.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ka KSU ka la khang tala ia kane ka khyrdop khrong khajna jong ka National Highway Authority of India naduh ka 8 tarik, Nailar, 2023 hadien National Highway Authority of India kam shym la maramot satia ia ka surokbah National Highway-6 kaba la jot rathai bad pynsuhsat ia ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u General Secretary jong ka KSU u samla  Kwilniss S. Suchiang u la kynthoh da kaba ong, ‘kumno u DC u khot iakren halor ka Toll Gate, katba ha kaba iadei bad ka jingsniew jong ka surok, um kren eiei.”Ka Seng ka la khot bad wer ruh ia kiwei ki paralok sengbhalang bad ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka East Jaintia Hills District ba kin ai jingkyrshan ia kane ka jingiakhih jong ka seng khnang ba kan wanrah ia ka jingmyntoi jong ki babun balang.Ka Surok National Highway-6 ka dei ruh kaba pyniasoh ia ki katto katne ki jylla ha ka thain shatei lammihngi jong ka ri India.U General Secretay ka KSU East Jaintia Hills District Unit u la iathuh ba ka seng la rai ban pyniaid beit shakhmat ia ka jingiakhih da kaba thiah ha surok ha ka 25 tarik, Nailur, 2023 kum ka dak ka jingbitar ia ka sorkar jylla bad ia ka National Highway Authority of India (NHAI) ki bym shym la shimkhia ia ka jingdawa ban shna pynbha ia ka surokbah National Highway-6 ha East Jaintia Hills District kaba la jot rathai haduh katta katta.Shwa kane, kata, ki nongialam jong ka KSU ki la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong uba bat ruh ia ka tnat PWD (Roads) jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban phah maramot noh mardor ia kane ka surok kaba la long ka jinglehrain ym tang ia ka district hynrei wat ia ka jylla baroh kawei.U samla  Kwilniss Suchiang u la iathuh ba u Bah Prestone u la iathuh ba ka National Highway Authority of India (NHAI) ka la kular ban sa shna pynbha ia ka surok National Highway-6 ha kaba kut jong u bnai Nailur ne ha kaba sdang jong ka taiew ba nyngkong eh ka taiew baar jong u bnai Risaw mynta u snem 2023.
title: KUMNO KA SORKAR KAM LEHRAIÑ BAN KHOT ÏAKREN HALOR KA TOLL GATE, LUMSHNONG: KSU

content: Ka Khasi Students Union, East Jaintia Hills District Unit ka la aiti da ka jingthoh sha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong uba bat ruh ia ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Sorkar Jylla ban dawa ba dei ban weng noh mardor ia ki shipai BSF kiba buh ia ka khyrdop talasi kali ha Sonapyrdi.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, u General Secretary ka KSU u samla  Kwilniss S. Suchiang u la iathuh ba u Bah Prestone u la kular ban shimkhia ia kane ka jingdawa bad ong ruh ba un sa bthah ia u Superintendent of Police ka East Jaintia Hills District ba un sa phah da ka jingthoh sha ka tnat shipai BSF ban weng noh mardor ia kane ka khyrdop talasi kaba long u mawjynthud ia ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah lyngba ka surokbah National Highway-6.Ka seng ka la pynpaw ruh ba ka jingdon ka khyrdop talasi beain jong ki shipai BSF ka la pyndik haduh katta katta ia ki nongleit nongwan ha surokbah National Highway-6.“Ha ka 2 tarik, Lber, 2023 shi kynhun ki shipai BSF kiba don ha ka kamram ki la shoh ia uwei u khynnah skul na ka shnong Huroi katba u dang leit sha iing. Kane ka jingjia, ka la pynher mynsiem ia ki paidbah bad im hapdeng ka jingsyier mynsiem,” ong ka seng ha ka dorkhas ba la aiti sha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah.Ha kajuh ka por, ka seng ka la dawa ruh ia ka sorkar buh shuh shuh sa kawei ka Anti Infiltration Check Gate ha ka shnong Tongseng khnang ban tehlakam ia ka jingwanrung tuh jong ki mynder ri na ka ri Bangladesh sha u pud u sam jong ka ri India lyngba ka khapppud jong ka East Jaintia Hills District.“Dang shen kawei ka longkmie Khasi-Pnar ka la shah pyniap dusmon ha ki runar ba prong tuh na ka ri Bangladesh ha ka shnong Donaskur,” la ong ka Seng.Ka seng ka la dawa ruh ia ka Sorkar ban buh noh mardor ia ka Traffic Branch ha East Jaintia Hills District ka ban peit bad ban pyniaid ia ki kali ha kane ka distrik.Ka seng ka la ong ba ka jingbym don ka Traffic Branch, ka la wanrah ia ka jingdheng kali, kaba jur bad buh jingma ruh ia ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah bad ki khynnah skul.
title: PHAH WENG KA KSU ÏA KA KHYRDOP TALASI BE-AIÑ KI SHIPAI BSF HA SONAPYRDI

content: Uwei u rangbah uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Khrawkupar Phawa 30 snem ka rta na ka Shnong Sohmynting u la khlad hashen hadien ba ka trok kaba u niah kaba don ia u nombar AS 01FC 8513 ka la thung baji hajan ka jingkieng Moo ha Iawmusiang, Jowai. Kane ka la jia ha ka miet sngi U Blei.Ka jaka ba kane ka trok la thung baji, ka dei ka jaka ba ka surok ka long khongdong bha bad ka don hajan ka Challam-Syngkon Petrol Pump kaba dei ka bynta jong ka surok Shillong-Jowai.Shwa ba ka trok kan thung baji, ka la leit tynrah ruh ia kawei dukan shna tyre hynrei donbok ba kam don satia kano kano ka jingjia basngewsih namarba hapoh kane ka dukan ym shym la don satia mano mano ruh ha kane ka khyllipmat.Ki Pulit ka West Jaintia Hills kiba la ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia, ki la leit iarap ban sei ia ka met jong u Bah Khrawkupar napoh ka trok ha ka por kumba 2.30 baje nohphai sngi.
title: ÏAP HASHEN U RANGBAH NA SOHMYNTHING BA THUNG BAJI KA TROK HA JINGKIENG MOO

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la kyrpad ïa ki MLA ba kin kren eiei hapoh ka Dorbar Synrai jong ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla halor ka jingïohlad jong ki 8 ngut ki bar jylla ban ïoh rung pule MBBS na ka bhah jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ha ka open category watla ki pynshisha tang da ka Provisional PRC.“Mynshem bnai ha ka por ba la pynmih ïa ka thup ki samla pule ba ïoh bhah ban leit pule MBBS, la shem ba ha ka Open Category, ki don kumba 8 ngut ki bar jylla kiba ïoh ban rung ha kane ka Category.  Lyngba ki jingwad bniah bad ka RTI, ka seng ka la shem ba kine ki 8 ngut ki bar jylla ki khlem pynbiang ki kot ki sla ban pynshisha ba ki dei ki nong Meghalaya ba pura. Katkum ka kyndon jong ka tnad DHS, baroh ki samla pule ki dei ban ai ïa ka Permanent Resident Certificate ban pynshisha ba ki dei ki nong Meghalaya, hynrei la shem pat ba katto katne na kitei ki 8 ki khlem ai ïa ka PRC hynrei ki ai pynban da ka Provisional PRC kaba treikam tang 3 lane 6 lane 12 bnai.  Ka KSU ka sngewdei ba ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ ka dei ban ïatai bha khnang ban lah ban khanglad ïa kine ki 8 ngut ki bar jylla bad kumjuh ban lah pynduh jait syndon ïa kum kine ki jingjia ha ki snem ban wan,” ong ka KSU ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da ka IT & Publicity Cell sha ki lad pathai khubor.Ka KSU ka la ïaroh ïa u MLA jong ka Nongpoh Constituency uba la rah hakhmat ïa ka mat ILP ban ïoh jingshai na ka Sorkar.“Ban pynkynmaw ka mat ILP lane Bengal Eastern Frontier Regulation 1873 ka dei ka mat dawa kaba la rim bha bad kaba dang im bad khluit haduh mynta. Hashwa ban ïoh ïa ka jylla, ka United-Khasi Jaiñtia Hills District Council ka don ïa kane ka kyndon aiñ ILP bad wat naduh ki por ba synshar ki phareng ka Bri U Hynniewtrep ka don ïa ka ILP hynrei naduh ba ïoh ïa ka jylla riewlum, ka ILP ka jah kum kawei na ki aiñ kane ka jylla thymmai. Ka KSU ka kyntu ïa baroh 60 ngut ki nongmihkhmat ba ki dei ban ïatai sani shuh shuh kumno ban pynurlong ïa ka jingdawa ILP ki paidbah bad kumno ban pynbor ïa ka sorkar pdeng ban ai noh mardor ïa ka ILP sha ka Meghalaya bad ym ban shu pynsahteng da kaba ai daw ba dang bishar. Haba ïa ka Manipur lah ban ai da kaba suk balei pat ka eh ban ai ILP ïa ka Meghalaya,” la ong ka Seng.Ka seng ka kyntu ruh ïa baroh 35 ngut ki MLA Khasi ba ki dei ban ïa kren ruh ïa mat ban ïoh rung ka ktien Khasi ha ka 8th Schedule. Ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ bad ki paidbah ki dei ban ïoh jingshai ba balei tad haduh mynta khlem pat lah ban pynurlong ïa kane ka jingangnud.Haba pynsngew halor ka jingjyllei jong u drok, ka seng ka la ong, “ka seng ka kyntu jur ïa baroh 60 ngut ki MLA ba ki dei ban ïa tai sani bha halor kane ka mat bad wad lad kumno ban teh lakam ïa ka jingrung kyrthep u drok ha ka jylla bad kumjuh ruh ban thaw aiñ kiba pyrkhing bad ba khlaiñ bor ban pynshitom ïa ki nongkhaïi drok khnang ban lah kum shi bynta ban khanglad ïa ka jingkhaïi bad dih drok ha jylla. Lada ki nongmihkhmat ki khein sting ka mut kan ym slem shuh bad ka jylla Meghalaya kan long kum ka Phillipines, Colombia, Mexico bad kiwei ki thaiñ kiba la shah lynshop ha ki kam sniew lyngba u drok.”“Ka jingpyrshang khah khah ka North East Frontier Railways ban wanrah ïa ka lynti rel ha Ri Khasi ka la pynbitar ïa uba bun balang.  Lyngba ka rel, la sngewthuh shai ba ki bar jylla ki mynder ri kin ïoh rung suk ban buhai shnong hapoh jylla. Ka KSU ka sngewdei ba ka iing ka dei ban ïatai halor kane ka mat bad ba dei ban khanglad beit ïa ka lynti rel ban wan shane tad haduh ynda la ïoh ïa ka aiñ ILP ha jylla, ha kata ka por yn sa ïa pynbeit pat halor ka jingwanrah ïa ka rel sha Ri Khasi,” la pynpaw ka KSU.Halor ka jingeh ki paidbah kiba sah ha khappud, ka KSU ka la ong, “ki paid Khasi na ka por sha ka por ki shah thombor bad shah pynïap ha ki thaiñ khappud ha ki bor sorkar Assam bad kiwei kiwei ki kynhun.  Naduh ka jingshah siat ïap ki 4 ngut ki Khasi ha Langpih, ka jingshah pynïap dusmon u Bah Tyngshaiñ Mukhim ha Block II, ka jingshah siat ïap haduh 5 ngut ki Khasi ha Mukroh bad ki jingshah pyndik ba dang shen ha Khanduli bad Lapangap. Lada ki 60 ngut ki MLA kim ïatai ïa ka mat khappud hapoh iing dorbar thaw aiñ kan pyni ba ki khein sting ïa kane ka mat bad kumjuh ruh ba kim khein snep ïa ki paidbah ba sah ha khappud. La donkam ban pynbeit kyrkieh noh kumno ban ai jingïada ïa ki paid Khasi kiba sah ha khappud ban lait na ka jingshah thombor khah khah ha ki pulit Assam, ki lehnoh bad runar Nepali bad Karbi,” bynrap u kyrwoh na ka Seng.Ka KSU ka kwah ruh ïa baroh ki MLA ban ïathir halor ka National Education Policy (NEP) kumjuh ruh ïa ka jingslem ban sdang ïa ka Shillong Medical College bad ka jingkyntiew kyrdan ïa ki baroh ki Polytechnic Insititutes sha ki Engineering College kiba pura. Kumjuh ruh ka jingbymdon ka State University ka la ktah bah ïa ki samla pule ka jylla kiba thrang ban bteng shuh shuh ïa ki jingpule. Ka KSU ka kyntu ruh ïa ka Iingdorbar thawaiñ ban ïatai ruh halor ka mat ban wanrah ïa ka Central Agricultural University hapoh Kyrdemkulai kaba la sahteng naduh u snem 2010.Ka seng ka la dawa ruh ïa ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ban wad lynti noh marmar ban weng ïa ki briew kkiba sah ha Them Iew Mawlong namar kane ka mat ka la sahteng da ki bun bun snem.  “Lada ka sahteng kumne ka mut kine ki briew ki la sngewbaheh shuh kumba la jia ha kine ki khyndiat bnai ha kaba kine ki runar kharmetor ki la rah da ki tiar ïaleh ban shoh pynmynsaw ïa ar ngut ki draibar taksi kiba dei ki Khasi ha Khyndai lad,” la ong u kyrwoh.
title: KYNTU KA KSU ÏA KI MLA BAN KREN HA ASSEMBLY BA ÏOH BHAH PULE MBBS PHRA NGUT KI BAR JYLLA

content: Khliehriat, Nailur 19 : Ki nongialam shnong bad ki dkhot jong ka Khasi Students Union East Jaintia Hills District Unit ki la pynpaw ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingkyrpad jong ka National Highway Authority of  India ban shah plie noh ia ka khyrdop khrong khajna lane ka Toll Gate kaba don ha Lumshnong, East Jaiñtia Hills District ia kaba la khang tala da ka Khasi Students Union, East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit katba ym pat shna pynbha ia ka surokbah National Highway-6.Ha ka jingialang ba la pyniaid da u Additional Deputy Commisioner jong ka East Jaintia Hills u Bah G. Warjri, ki nongmihkmat jong ka National Highway Authority of  India kim shym la wan mih satia sha kane ka jingialang.Ka seng ka ïeng skhem ha ka nongrim, katba ka jingpynbha surok kam pat dep, ka National Highway Authority of  India kam pat lah ban plie satia ia kane ka khyrdop khrong khajna. Na ka liang u Adll. Deputy Commisisoner u la pynpaw ba un sa phah ia ka rai ba la shim ha kane ka jingialang sha ka National Highway Authority of  India bad sha ka Sorkar.
title: KYRPAD KA NHAI BAN SHAH PLIE NOH ÏA KA TOLL GATE HA LUMSHNONG, PYRSHAH KA KSU

content: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa u MLA jong ka Mookaïaw Constituency u Bah Nujor Sungoh uba la rah ïa ka mat ha ka Dorbar Synrai jong ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ ban pynduh noh ïa ka Personal Interview ha ki kam Sorkar ha ka kyrdan Grade IV.“Ka seng naduh ki snem ba la leit noh ka ladep ai ïa ki jingthoh kiba shai bad kiba shong-aiñ sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ban dawa ban pynduh noh ïa ka Personal Interview na ka Grade B,C bad D jong ki kam Sorkar bad ngi la pynshai ruh ba wat ka Sorkar India bad ki 23 tylli ki jylla bad 8 tylli ki Union Territories ha ka ri India ki ladep ban pynduh ïa ka Personal Interview, hynrei haduh mynta ka Sorkar ka sngap jar jar,” ong u Working President ka KHNAM u Bah Thomas Passah ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Ka jubab jong u Myntri Rangbah mynta ka sngi kam pynhun ïa ngi kum ka seng bad ka khlem pynhun ïa u MLA badonburom u Bah Sungoh lane ïa kiwei kiwei ki Nongmihkhmat jong ka iingdorbar Thawaiñ ka jylla.  Katkum ka jubab kaba u Myntri Rangbah u la ai ba 50/50 % la bhah na ka bynta ka Written Test bad ka Personal Interview.  50% ka la plie lad bha ïa ki briew ba don ha ka bor ban tuklar lane mushlia ïa ka ïohkam ïohkam hok jong ki samla,” ong u kyrwoh.“U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ruh ba la pynlong ïa ka Personal Interview ban peit ruh ïa kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam ha ki Candidate, ka jingkylli kaba ladei ban kylli ïa u Myntri Rangbah ha Iingdorbar ka long,  kiei kita ki jingdonkam kiba hap ban peit tang lyngba ka Personal Interview haba thungkam Sweeper lane kiwei kiwei ki kam Grade04? Ka jingshisha ka long ba ïa ka personal interview donkam tang ha ki jait kam kiba donkam ban peit ïa ka Personality jong u/ka kyrtong,”la bynrap u kyrwoh.“U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ruh ba ka don ka jingduhnong bad jingïohnong ruh lada ym don personal interview shuh. Ladei ban kylli na u Myntri Rangbah ba kiei kita ki jingduhnong lada pynduh noh ïa ka personal interview, namar kumba ngi la thoh sha ka Sorkar ngi la batai shaikdar ba lada pynduh ïa ka personal interview ka jingïohnong kan long ba kito kiba dei hok ban ïoh kam kin ïoh.  Ka por jong ka Sorkar kan ym sepei.  Ka pisa ka Sorkar kan ym sepei.  Ki samla kiba aplai kam kin ïoh jingkyrmen.  Ki briew kiba mlien ban pan pisa ban pynïoh kam kin ym ïohlad shuh ter ter ka jingduhnong lada pynduh personal interview ka long tang ïa kiba don ha ka bor namar kin ym ïohlad shuh ban leh shiliang lane leh politik ïa ka hok jong ki samla,” la ong u Bah Passah.“U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ruh ba ka Sorkar ka dang peit bniah ïa baroh ki bynta jong ka rukom thungkam bad kan shimpor. Kine baroh ki dei tang ki jubab ban pynjlan ïa kaei kaba la donkam ban leh noh. Ngi tip shai ba ki bynta kiba donkam ha ka jingthung kam Sorkar kadon tang saw tylli kita ki long; ban pyllait Advertisement.  Ki samla kin pyndap Form ban aplai.  Ban pyllong ïa ki Test bad ban jied ïa kiba la shah jied.  Ngi sngewthuh balei u Myntri Rangbah u kwah ban pyni ba ka kam ka long kaba jrong bad ba khongwaiñ bha namar kam long satia kumta,” la kynthoh ka KHNAM.“Ka seng ka long kaba kloi ban ïathir bad u Myntri Rangbah halor kane ka mat bad lada u jop u Myntri Rangbah ngim ym dawa shuh hynrei lada ka ieng ka nia jong ngi ka Sorkar ruh ka dei ban leh noh mardor ïa kane ka jingthmu babha.  Ka Seng kan sa shim ïa la kijong lad ki lynti ban pynthikna ba ka Srkar kan pynduh noh ïa ka personal interview,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.
title: YM HUN KA KHNAM ÏA KA JUBAB U MYNTRI RANGBAH HA ASSEMBLY ÏA KA PERSONAL INTERVIEW

content: Ki Pulit tang hapoh 48 kynta ki la iohkem ia ki arngut ki briew kiba la suba ba ki dei kiba donkti ban dkhat jubor ia ka jingim jong u Bah Wiliam Nongrum, 36 snem ka rta uba dei na ka shnong Khanduli.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Bah S. Nongtnger, la pyntip ba ha ka miet sngi baar ha ka por 11:00 baje mynmiet la ioh jingtip ba uwei u briew u la thiah lyngktop hapdeng ka jingbym tipbrirew harud surok Laitkor.Marmar ki Pulit ki la leit sha kane ka jaka bad lap ia uwei u briew uba la thiah hapdeng ka jinglyngkien jong ka snam hapoh ka phyllaw jong kawei ka karkhana shna kali kaba dei jong u Bah Farid Mukhim ha Laitkor Mawrie, Lumheh.Hadien ba la tohkit bniah, la lap ba ki don ki dak mong ha ki bynta jong ka khlieh jong u briew bad i kumba u la iap. Hadien ka  jingsuba ba u la iap, la pyntip marmar sha ka kynhun Crime Scene Unit ban wad ksai bad ia ki sakhi na kane ka jaka kaba une u briew u la iap.  La lap ruh ia uwei u lakam ñiah kali ba la suba ba la pyndonkam ban leh ia ka kam runar bad ia uwei u bitor um bad shiteng bilor ka kyiad la kurup noh na kane ka jaka.Ha ka step sngi Balang, ia ka met jong une u rangbah la pynkynriah noh sha NEIGHRIMS Hospital, Shillong.  Ki bahaïing ki la wan kam trai bad ban pyntip ba u lanot u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u William Nongrum 36 snem ka rta na ka shnong Khanduli.Hadien ba la pyndep ia ki jingdonkam katkum ka aiñ, la aiti noh ia ka met sha ki bahaïing hasem ban pyndep ia ka jinglehniam bakhatduh.Ki Pulit ki la registered case ia kane ka jingjia ha Madanrting Police Station hapoh ka Section 302 IPC bad arngut ki suba donkti ki la shah kem hapoh 48 kynta.
title: SHAH KEM ARNGUT KIBA SUBA DONKTI BAN PYNÏAP ÏA U RANGBAH NA KHANDULI HA LAITKOR

content: Ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya kiba dang iai bteng ban iakhun thma pyrshah ia u drok, ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai ki Pulit ki la ioh jingtip na uwei u nongniah kali Tata Sumo shaphang kawei ka pla ba ishankhmat ba la iehnoh hapoh ka kali Tata Sumo jong u da ki arngut ki nongshong kali.Ha kane ka pla, ynda la khura ha Madanrting Police Station la lap haduh 21 tylli ki synduk thep sabon kiba la thep ia u drok Heroin uba khia 253.53 gram bad katto katne ki jaiñ.U  Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills District u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger u la iathuh ba une u drok u dei uba shongdor palat 2 klur tyngka.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingioh kurup ia u drok, ki Pulit ki la register case ha Madanrting Police Station hapoh ki kyndon jong ka Section 21(c)/29 NDPS Act. Ki Pulit ki la pynlong ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bad ka jingthwet kaba jur ban iohkem ia ki snar khaii drok.
title: KURUP KI PULIT IA U DROK BA SHONGDOR 2 KLUR TYNGKA

content: Ka seng kieng atiar ba la shah kheiñ be-aiñ Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ha ka sngi palei ka la rakhe ia ka ‘martyr’s day’ kum ka jingai burom ia ki nongialam bad ia ki dkhot ba ehrang jong ka seng kiba la len lade ban iakhun pyrshah ia ka jingdakhol jubor bad khñiot beiñ jong ka India.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, u General Secretary cum Publicity Secretary jong ka HNLC u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw u la ong ba u Sambor Mawthoh ba ju khot sin u Dengdeng u la don ha ka jaka kaba kongsan tam ha ka pakit ki mynnor jong ka HNLC.U la duhei ia la ka jingim kum u dkhot jong ka HNLC ha ka jingiather kuli bad ki pulit ka Meghalaya ha ka  21 tarik Nailur 1994 ha Jaiaw. Kum ka jingithuh ia ka jinglenlade jong u, ka HNLC ka la pynbna ia kane ka sngi kum ka Martyrs’ Day jong ka seng, ong u Bah Nongtraw.U la ong ba ka HNLC ka ju buh jingthoh ia baroh ki dkhot bad ia ki nongialam kiba la aiti lut ia la ka jong ka jingim na ka bynta dawbah ka ‘ri Hynñiewtrep.“Ka snam ba la phlei da kine ki samla kiba shlur kam shym la long lehnohei, kumba ka HNLC ka angnud ban pynthikna ba ka jingiakhun jong ngi kan long shi bynta jong ka histori,” ong u General Secretary bad bynrap, “kane ka sngi bakongsan ka dei ka jingrakhe bad ka jingaiburom ia ki nongialam ba shlur bad ia ki dkhot kiba la len lade ha ka jingiakhun ba khlem shongthait pyrshah ia ka jingdakhol bad ka jingkhñiot beiñ ka India.  Ka dei ka sngi kaba kyrpang ban ai burom ia kito kiba iakhun khlem jingsheptieng na ka bynta ka hok bad ka jingangnud jong ki briew jong ki.  Ka jingaiti bakhlaiñ, ka jinglen lade bad ka jingiakhun ba khlem thait ban wad ia ka hok bad ka jinglaitluid.  Ha kane ka sngi, ngi shim ia kane ka khyllipmat ban kynmaw burom ia ka jinglen lade jong ki bad ngi pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewnguh shikatdei ei na ka bynta ka jingaiti lut bad ka jingshlur.”U Bah Nongtraw u la ong ruh ba ka jingpynkha ia ka HNLC la pynshong nongrim halor ki hok jong ka pakit ki mynnor.“Bun ngut ki samla ki la pyniasoh bad ka HNLC, kiba la pynkhreh ban thoh biang sa shisien ia ka Histori,” u la ong.U la ong ba kam pat ju don kano kano ka jingiakhih ba khlem iaumsnam ha ka historiKatkum ka jingong jong u, ka jingiakhih ba khlem iaumsnam kan ym treikam daleilei lymda ki nongkhñiot beiñ kim don ia ka mynsiem iatiplem.“Ai ba mynsiem jong kito ki khlawait ba la khladnoh kin ioh ia ka jingjahthait bymjukut, bad ai ba ka kyrteng jong ki kan nang iai bteng ban ai mynsiem ia ki pateng ki ban sa wan ban ieng pyrshah ia ka jingshah leh bym hok bad ka jingshah khñiot beiñ.  Ka jingrakhe ia ka Martyrs Day ka pynkynmaw biang ia ka kam kaba ki la leh, ka kyntu ia ngi ban pyntyllun shakhmat ia ki jingangnud jong ngi bad ban ym kyrkieh ban kthong ia ka hok bad ka jinglaitluid na ka bynta ka ri Hynñiewtrep,” ong u Bah Nongtraw.
title: BUN NGUT KI SAMLA KI LA RUNG SHA KA HNLC, KI PYNKHREH BAN THOH BIANG SA SHISIEN ÏA KA HISTORI : SAINKUPAR

content: Ka jingbym pat aiti jong ka tnat PWD ia ka building jong ka Block Institute of Teacher’s Education (BITE) bad ka Residential School kiba don ha ka shnong Byndihati, East Jaiñtia Hills District sha ka tnat Pule Puthi ka la pynlong ia kine ki shlem pule kum ki iing jah bad ki ktem leh kam sniew jongno re jongno.Ka Khasi Student Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit lyngba ka Education Cell ha ka sngi baar ka la hiar jurip ia ki building BIET bad ia ka Residential School kiba don ha ka shnong Byndihati ban lap da la ki jong ki khmat shwa ban pynsngew sha ki bor ba dei peit jong ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla.Ha ka sngi palei, ka seng hapoh ka jingialam jong u Publicity Secretary u samla Hame Ryngkhlem bad u Assistant Organising Secretary u Samla Chibait Rymbai ki la leit ban iakynduh ia ka Director jong ka DERT ka Kong K. R Manner ban pan jingpynshai halor ka jingbym lah ban plie noh ia ka building BITE bad ka Residential School ha ka shnong Byndihati.Ka Seng ka la ioh jingtip ba ia ka building BITE ba la shna khnang ban pyntbit ia ki samla pule kiba thmu ban long nonghikai ka sdang naduh u snem 2012 bad la sdang ban shna ia ka ha u snem 2015.  Ka seng ha ka jingjurip ka la lap ba ka building ka la shu sah khongreng haduh mynta bad kane long ka daw ba ka PWD kam pat aiti ia kane ka Building sha ka Directorate of Educational Research &Training (DERT) ban pyntreikam pura.Kumba la ioh jingtip da ka seng, ka jingbym pat treikam ia kane ka shlem ai jinghikai ia ki nonghikai ka long na ka daw ba ka tnat PWD (Buildings) kam pat ioh ia ka Bill kaba kot kumba 3 klur tam na ka Sorkar.  “Kaei kaba pynglyngngoh ia ka seng ka long ba ia kane ka Building ka ladap phra snem hynrei ka Sorkar ka dang sngap mynthi halor kane ban pyllait noh ia ka Bill,” la ong ka seng.“Kaba sngewlyngoh pat sha kiwei ki distrik kiba don ka jaka pyntbit ai jinghikai DIET ki la ioh ka jingiarap da ki 15 klur tang na ka bynta ban maramot bad kane ka pynlyngngoh ia ka seng ba kumno ka Sorkar ka leit shiliang ia ka bhah bad ia ka East Jaintia Hills pat la ieh khunswet watla ka building ka la don phra snem pura.  Kane ka pyni ba ka Sorkar kam patiaw satia ia ka bha ka miat jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka pule puthi,” la bynrap u kyrwoh na ka Seng.“Ka Seng ka kyntu ia ki Nongmihkhmat bad ia ka Sorkar ba kam dei ban leh shiliang. Na ka liang ka Director ka la batai ruh ba kitei ki building ki dei tang na bynta ka Block Institute of Teachers Education (BITE) bad lada ioh ia ka mang tyngka kaba pura yn sa lah ban pynkylla sha ka District Institute of Teachers Education (DIET) jong ka District,” la iathuh ka Seng.Ka Seng ka la pyntip ruh ba ka Residential School Building ka la kylla iing jah bad shu iehshrah bad ka long kumba pynseiei kai ia ka pisa jong u paidbah.  “Ngin sa leit ban iakynduh ia ki bor ba dei khmih halor ka Residential School ban pan jingpynshai halor ka jingbym lah ban pyntreikam ia ka Residential School haduh mynta,” ong ka seng.“Ka Director ka la kular ban leit jurip ia ka jinglong jingman jong kane ka Building ha kine ki sngi ban wan bad ka la kular ruh ban phah pynkloi noh ia ka tnat PWD (Building) ban aiti noh ia kane ka Building sha ka DERT khnang ban pyntreikam noh ia ka,” la pynkut ka seng ia u kyrwoh.
title: BYM PAT AITI KA TNAT PWD, SAH KHONGRENG KA BUILDING BITE BAD RESIDENTIAL SCHOOL
