content: : U Myntri Rangbah barim ka Jylla u Dr. Mukul Sangma ula ngat ha ka jingshah dawa ban siew bai mynraiñ khmat kaba 20 klur tyngka hadien ba u la kynnoh ia u Henry Lalremsanga ba u dei u “kingpin’ khaii drok ha ka Dorbar Synrai jong ka Iingdorbar Thaw Ain ka Jylla.Nalor kata u Lalremsanga ha ka Legal Notice u la dawa ia u Sangma ba u dei ban panmap ruh hapoh 7 sngiU Lalremsanga uba na Mizoram bad uba long ruh u Chairman jong ka 2B’s Group of Companies, u la dawa ia u Sangma ban siew ia kane ka bai pynmynrain bad ban panmap hapoh ka 7 sngi lem kumta un mudui da ka mukotduma Criminal bad Civil suit pyrshah ia u ha Supreme Court.Ia ka ‘Legal notice’ la phah da u Bah K Kharmawphlang & Associates, Advocate and Legal Consultant jong u Henry Lalremsanga.Kane ka ‘Legal Notice’ ka kdew halor ka jingkynnoh bym shong nongrim bad jingpynhiar dor ia ka longryngieng jong u Lalremsanga hapoh ka Dorbar Synrai jong ka Iingdorbar Thaw Ain bad ka jingkren sha ki lad pathai khubor kiba mih paidbah ha ka 19 tarik bad 20 tarik Nailur, 2023.Ka Legal Notice ka la pynpaw ba kine ki jingkynnoh ki la saphriang kylleng bad la buh jingma ia u Lalremsanga shimet bad ha ki kam kiba u trei.Shuh shuh la pynpaw ba Lalremsanga ula shah kem khlem nongrim ha u snem 2013 haba iadei bad ka jingkurup ia ki dawai ba shalan watla u don ia ka laisen ban shalan ia ki dawai. Ka Kashari Special Court NDPS Act, Patiala House Court, New Delhi ka la pynkut ia kane ka mukotduma da kaba pynskan ba ki duna shaba palat ki sakhi sabut ki ban pynshisha ia ka jingpynkheiñ aiñ jong u Lalremsanga.Ka Legal Notice ka kdew ruh ba ka jingkynthoh pynjahburom, bym don jingpynshisha ka la pynsngewsih kthang ia u Lalremsanga, ia ka iing ka sem jong u bad ia ki kam ba u trei shabar ka ri bad kane ka jingkynthoh ka la ktah ia ka jaidbynriew Mizo hakhmat ka pyrthei bad ong ruh ba u Lalremsanga u la pynpaw ba kine ki jingshah kynnoh ba pynhiardor ki dei kiba la pynmih khnang tang ban myntoi ha ka sainpyrthei.U Lalremsanga u la dawa ba dei ban sangeh shisyndon ban pynmih ia kino kino ki jingkren bym shonghok bad ia ki jingkynthoh ban pynjah burom ia ka longrynieng jong u.Shuh shuh, u Legal Consultant jong u Lalremsanga u la ong ba ka ‘Legal Notice’ kan dei ka kabu bakhatduh ban pynbeit ia ki jingleh bakla kaba la pynjah burom ia ka ijot jong u.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, u Mukul Sangma ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la ong ba un ap ia ka Legal Notice bad un sa peit halor kaei ka kyndon ain ba la phah sha u.“Ka jingkren jong nga hapoh ka Iingdorbar ka dei tang ka jingai jingmut ia u Myntri Rangbah hynrei dei u Myntri Rangbah uba la rah ia kane ka kam shabar jong ka Iingdorbar. Ha ka jingshisha u (Henry Lalremsanga) ladei ban phah ia ka Legal Notice sha u Myntri Rangbah,” ong u Mukul Sangma.
title: 20 KLUR DAWA BAI MYNRAIN KHMAT U HENRY LALREMSANGA NA U MUKUL, DAWA PANMAP HAPOH 7 SNGI

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) West khasi Hills bad ka Dorbar Shnong Rwiang, ha ka sngi thohdieng ki la khang tala ïa ka shlem treikam jong ka karkhana Ferro Alloy kaba don ha Rwiang namar ka jingsuba shah rahbor jong kawei ka longkmie ha u nongtrei jong kane ka karkhana uba dei u bar jylla.Ka HYC bad ka Dorbar Shnong ki la shim ïa kane ka sien jam halor ka jingjah jong kawei ka Longkmie ïa kaba la suba jur ba ka shah rahbor ha uwei u nongtrei ka karkhana.Katkum ka tyllong khubor na ki Pulit la iathuh ba kane ka longkmie kaba la jah ka dei na ka shnong Riwiang naduh ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai.  Ki Pulit ki la ïathuh ruh ba ki bahaïing hasem ki la mudui da ka ejahar halor kane ka jingjah jong kane ka longkmie.Ki Pulit ki ïathuh ba ki bahaïing hasem ki suba jur ba kane ka longkmie ka la jah bad uwei u briew ba kyrteng u Mridul Boro, uba trei ha ka Shakhambari Ferro Alloy Company, Rwiang.U Rangbah Shnong u la ïathuh ba ha ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai ka dorbar shnong ka leit ban khang tala ïa kane ka karkhana halor ka nongrim ba ki bor pynïaid kim shym la lah ban teh lakam ïa la ki jong ki nongtrei.Ka dorbar shnong ka la buh kyndon ba ki bor pynïaid kim lah ban plie ïa ka karkhana, katba kim pat lah ban wan ïalam noh ïa kane ka longkmie bad ïa une u briew.  Hynrei la kynnoh ba ka karkhana ka la kyndang noh ïa kane ka tala ha ka sngi kaba bud, kata ha ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai.Hadien ba la lap ïa ka jingleh donbor jong ka kompeni, ka Dorbar Shnong ka la kyrpad ïa ka HYC West Khasi Hills ban tuklar bad ban ïarap lem ïa ka Dorbar Shnong ban khang tala ïa kane ka karkhana.U President ka HYC Samla Lumlang Kharsyiemlieh u la ong ba ka shnong ka la kyrpad ïa ka Seng ban ïarap bad ka Seng ka ai ka jingkyrshan ba pura ïa ka Dorbar Shnong bad maham ia ka kompani ka dei ban wan ïalam shuwa ïa ka longkmie ba la jah, lym kumta kan ym ïohlad satia ban plie biang ïa ka karkhana.Ka HYC ka la maham jur ruh ïa ki bor pynïaid ka kompeni ba kim dei ban plie ne kyndang ïa ka tala katba kim pat lah ban pynurlong ïa ki kyndon ba la buh.
title: BA SUBA SHAH RAHBOR KA LONGKMIE HA U BAR JYLLA, KHANG TALA KA HYC ÏA KA KARKHANA HA RWIANG

content: Shillong, Nailur 21 : Ka Jaiñtia National Council ba la lamkhmat da u General Secretary ha ka sngi palei ka la hiar sha ka shnong Byndihati bad ha ka shnong Umtyra ban leit jurip ia ki ar tylli ki project ba ladep shna hynrei ki bym pat plie paidbah haduh mynta mynne kiba kynthup ia ka jingshna ia ka Residential School bad ka Teacher’s Training Centre kaba lah neh da ki bun bun snem.Ka Sorkar ka la mang pisa ban pyntrei ia ka Residential School ha u bnai Risaw, October 2015 bad la lah ruh ban shna pyndep ia ka building katkum ka por ba la buh hapoh 24 bnai bad kumjuh ruh ka Teachers training Centre la mang pisa ha u snem 2016 bad la shna pyndep katkum ka por ba la buh hynrei haduh mynta ia kine ki ar tylli ki projek ym pat shym la lah satia ban pyntreikam ne ban plie paidbah ia ki.Ha ka jingjurip, ka seng ka lap ba ki iit bad ki jingkhang ki la pait lut bad la lap ruh ba ki jingkhang iit ki la shah lied bad ka building baroh kawei ka dap sa tang da ki bilor kyiad. La lap ruh ba kine ki ar tylli ki shlem ai jinghikai ki la kylla long pynban kum ki ktem jong ki nongleh kam sniew bad kane kan buh jingma haduh katta katta ia ki paidbah kiba iaid lynti najan kane ka jaka.Khnang ban pynkyndit bynriew ia ka Sorkar, ka Seng ka la phah syndon da ka video ba la ringdur ia kine ki ar tylli ki jingtei khnang ba ka sorkar kan dup iohi hi da la ki jong ki khmat ia kine ki jingshah pynjulor.
title: DA KA VIDEO PYNI SAKHI KA JNC ÏA KA SORKAR ÏA KA JINGJULOR KI PROJECT HA EJH

content: : Kumba 100 ngut ki nongrep jong ka Krang Circle ki la ïashim bynta ha ka jingai jinghikai ba la pynlong da ka Khasi-Jaiñtia Farmers’ Association (KJFA) Krang Circle ha ka shnong Krang ha ka sngi Balang.Ki nongai ai jinghikai ki long ka Horticulture Development Officer jong ka Mawphlang Block ka Kong Salva Buhroy bad Assistant Technology Manager (ATMA), Sohïong Block ka Kong Nisha V. Kharjana ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u Horticulture Inspector, Mawphlang Block u Bah T. MawlongKa Kong Salva ka la ïasyllok bad ki nongrep halor kumno ban rep ïa u Soh Kiwi uba remdor bha, uba suk ban rep bad uba ïadei bha bad ki jaka khriat kum ha Sohïong, Nongthliew,  Krang bad ha kiwei kiwei ki jaka kiba khriat. La hikai ruh ban rep jhur Sohmynken ha ki iing plastik ban ïoh kheit kham bun bad lah ban ïoh plastik ha ka dor Subsidy na Horticulture hi bad kumno ban rep Soh Plom ha ki buit ba kham bha ban ïoh soh kham bha bad kham bun.Ka Kong Nisha ka ai jingbatai kaba shai bad kaba bniah bha ïa ka rukom rep kba ban lait na ka jingduhei ba kem jingpang, bam khniang bad ka rukom ba kham bha naduh ki symbai ban thung bad ban sara janai bha ha pynthor ryngkat ka jingdonkam ka um bad ka sboh ba la pyndonkam.Ka la kyntu jur ban pyndonkam suki suki da ki Bio-Fertilizers (sboh ñiut)  ha ka jaka jong ki Chemical Fertilizers (sboh dawai phareng) kiba la lap ba ki don jingma ïa ka jingkoit jingkhiah u briew bad wat ïa ki khñiang kiba pynbha ïa ki jingthung jingtep kiba don ha ka khyndew.Ka la ai jinghikai ruh kumno ban shna ïa ka sboh 18 sngi da ki nongrep ha la ki shnong bad ki jaka rep ban ïarap ban ïoh sboh lade bad kham pynduna na jinglutksan ban thied shi thied sboh.Ïa kane ka jingai jinghikai la ïarap da ka Meghalaya Farmers’ Commission (MFC) ban kyntiew ïa ki nongrep ban tip ïa ki buit rep bathymmai.
title: PYNTIP KA TNAT HORTICULTURE SHA KI NONGREP BA KA SHNONG KRANG KA ÏAHAP BHA BAN REP SOH KIWI

content: Ka ophis jong u District Medical and Health Officer (DM&HO) South West Khasi Hills District, bad ka Mawkyrwat Civil Hospital ryngkat ka jingiatrei lang bad ka National Prevention for Control of Blindness and Visual Impairment, Meghalaya kin sa pynlong ia ki jingsumar khmat ia ki briew kiba don jingpang khmat kiba la kynjoh ia ka rta kaba la 50 snem bad kumjuh ruh yn pynlong ia ka Screening na ka bynta kito pang khmat.Ia kane ka screening yn pynlong ha ka 3 tarik, Risaw, 2023 ha Civil Hospital, Mawkyrwat, 10 tarik u Risaw, 2023 ha Ranikor Community Health Center (CHC), 17 tarik u Risaw, ha Mawthawpdah Primary Health Center (PHC) bad ha ka 31 tarik u Risaw ha Wahkaji Primary Health Center (PHC).Baroh kine ki jingsumar khmat ei kin sdang ha ka por 10 baje mynstep.
title: YN PYNLONG IA KA EYE CAMP HA SOUTH WEST KHASI HILLS DISTRICT

content: Arngut ki samla lud na ka thaiñ Mawngap, East Khasi Hills District ïa kiba la tip kyrteng kum u  Wanboklang Kurbah, 20 snem ka rta na ka kyntoit Traw Saitkhlieh bad ka Phibankyntiew Sun, 18 snem ka rta na Marbisu ki la jah rngai na la ïing naduh ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai.U samla Wanboklang u la jah rngai ha ka por 5:30 baje janmiet bad la ïohi khatduh ïa u ha surok By-Pass ha Traw Lwai. Ki bahaing hasem ki bym shym la lap dien satia ki la ujor da ka ejahar sha ki Pulit jong ka Mawngap Out Post bad ki la kyrpad ruh ba lada don kino kino kiba ïohi ïa u Wanboklang kin telephone ha u nombar 9612679072.Katba ka samla Phibankyntiew ka la jah rngai ha ka por 4:00 baje eiei janmiet.  Hadien ba ki bahaïing hasem kim shym la lap dien satia wat hadien ba la wad kylleng ka shnong ka thaw, ki la ujor da ka ejahar ha Mawngap Out Post. Ki bahaïing ki la kyrpad lada don kino kino kiba ïohi ïa kane ka samla kin sngewbha ban telephone ha u nombar 9612952398.Hapdeng ki jingsngewsih kthang bad ki jingjawummat ki bahaïing hasem ki la kyrpad ïa kine ki arngut ki samla lud ba kin wanphai noh sha la ing.Kat haduh ba la pynmih ïa kane ka khubor, kine ki arngut kim pat shym la wanphai satia sha la ïing. “Naduh mynshisngi (20 tarik Nailur 2023) ha ka por ba la wai skul naduh ba la wan sha iing, ngi la telephone na iing. Ha kaba shisien ngi dang ïoh ban ïakren bad naduh ka por 5:30 baje watla ngi la pyrshang ban ïakren lyngba ka telephone ngim shym la ïoh shuh ban kren ïa i.  I khlem kren ïano ïano ruh, i shu wan beit shu leit beit,” ong ki bahaing hasem jong samla Phibankyntiew Sun.“Ngi la leit wad sha Marpna bad shaduh Mairang, ngim lap satia. Ngi la kylli kut ki dukan hynrei ym don satia ba ïohi,” la ong ka hymmen jong ka Phibankyntiew. “Ngi la leit wad ruh sha Damsite ruh ngim lap satia,” ka la bynrap.“Ngi kyrpad, ba in wan noh sha la ing bad lada i don kano kano ka daw ruh in ïathuh kein ïa ngi ki hymmen ki para bad khamtam ïa i kmie. Ka la pynkulmar ïa ngi ha ïing hasem namar ba na kano ka daw ruh ngim tip i shu leit bad mynta ngin ïawad shano ruh ngim tip bad ka mobile phone ruh ka la lip,” la ong shuh shuh ki bahaïing.“Ngi dap da ka jingsngewsih.  Ka la pynkulmar ïa ngi ha ïing. Kat shaba phi don, sngewbha seh ieid wan noh sha ing lada ma nga kum ka hynmen nga kren wan noh sha iing,” la kyrpad ka hymmen ïa la ka para.“Ngi kyrpad ïa kino kino kiba ïohi sngewbha ba kin pyntip ïa ngi ki bahaing hasem. Phibankyntiew, lada phi don shano shano ruh, wan phai noh seh,” la kyrpad u Mama da ka jingjaw ummat.U la ïathuh ba kane ka pyrsa jong u, ka leit beit sha skul kumba ju long bad wan phai ruh sha iing ynda la wai skul hynrei kaba pynlynngoh pat ïa ka ing ka sem ka long ba ka samla Phibankyntiew ka la shu jah la ka jah na la ïing khlem tip satia ïa kino kino ki daw.
title: JAH RNGAI ARNGUT KI SAMLA LUD NA KA THAIÑ MAWNGAP, ÏAM KTHANG KI BAHAÏING HASEM

content: I Bah Justine Sohphoh ryngkat bad ka Kali kaba don ia u nombar ML05-Y-7258, iba shong basah ha Riat Laban Kynjatphutbol Block-A, i la jah naduh ka 16 tarik u Nailur 2023 ha ka por kumba 6:00 baje janmiet eiei ha ka por ba i dang thmu ban wan phai na Tura sha Shillong.Ki bahaiing hasem ki la kyrpad ia kino kino kiba iohi lane kiba lap ia i, kin sngewbha ba kin ai jingtip da kaba shu telephone ha u Nombar: 9863389561 bad 7005696258.
title: JAH I BAH JUSTINE SOHPHOH KATBA DANG THMU BAN WANPHAI NA TURA SHA SHILLONG

content: U Rikman Momin ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la shah thung kum u State President ba thymmai jong ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit hadien ba ka samoi treikam jong u State President barim u Bah Ernest Mawrie ka la kut.Ia kane la pyntip da u National General Secretary & Headquarter Incharge ka BJP u Arun Singh ha ka shithi thungkam.“U National President ka BJP u Jagat Prakash Nadda u la thung ia u Rikman Momin kum u State President ka Meghalaya, BJP,” ong u kyrwoh.“Ka jingthungkam kan treikam noh mardor,” la bynrap u kyrwoh.U Momin u dei ruh u BJP National Council Member bad u la iakhun teng ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Tura Parliamentary Constituency ha u snem 2019.Kane kan dei ruh ka sien banyngkong eh ba ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit kan ioh ia u State President na rilum Garo.
title: SHIMTI U RIKMAN MOMIN KUM U STATE PRESIDENT BATHYMMAI KA BJP MEGHALAYA

content: : “Ka jingtur thma jong ki Karbi ïa ki paidbah Pnar jong ka shnong Lapangap da ki jri siat sim bad ki khnam ki ryntieh ka pynpaw shai ïa ka jingkwah jong ki Karbi ban ïa umsnam,” ong ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi baar lyngba u Working President u Bah Thomas Passah.“Ha kine ki sngi ba ladep na ka liang jong ki Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya bad Assam ki la kyntu ïa ka shongsuk bad wat ki Deputy Commissionere bad Superintendent of Police na baroh arliang ki la kyrpad ïa ka jingshongsuk. Hynrei ka jingbym kohnguh jong ki Karbi ka lah ban pynbitar ïa u paid Khasi baroh hi,” ong u kyrwoh.“Katkum ka jingtip ba la ïohlum da ka KHNAM, kiba bun ki Karbi kiba wan ban pynklumar bad thombor ïa ki Pnar jong ngi, ki bym dei kiba sah ha ki thaiñ khappud, hynrei kiba dei ki nongshongshnong jong ki shnong kiba don shajngai na ka khapppud bad kine ki Karbi kiba la wansah shipor ha khappud la ai jaka sah bad bsa bam da ki Karbi kiba sah ha khappud bad ka jingthmu jong kine ka dei hi ban hi pynmynsaw ïa ki paradoh parasnam jong ngi,” la kam ka KHNAM.“Ka jingïoh lad jong ki paidbah Karbi ban leh donbor kumne ka dei namar ka jingtlot ki Pulit Meghalaya ha khappud.   Kum ban shu pynkynmaw dang shen, ki Karbi ki la beh krad wat ïa ki Pulit da ki jri siatsim. Ki bor Pulit, ka kamram ka jong ki ka dei ban ïada ïa ki paidbah na ka jingmynsaw bad lada donkam dei ban pyndonkam da ka bor katkum ka aiñ,” la ong ka KHNAM ha u kyrwoh.“U Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohiing dang ha ka Dorbar Synrai ba dang shu dep shen u la ong ba ki Pulit kin hap ban pyndonkam da ka bor lada ki ïohi ba ka don ka jingma ïa ki mynsiem briew bad ki tiar paidbah.  Te haduh u khnam bad ka ryntieh ki la pyndonkam ki Karbi te kam pat dei seh ïa ki Pulit ban leh ïa kaba donkam ne ki aiñ Pulit ha sor bad ha khappud ki ïapher mo?” la buh jingkylli ka KHNAM.“Lada ka Sorkar kam leh eiei halor kane ka jingjia bad lada ki paidbah kin hap ban tur hi sha Block-1 ban ïada ïa la ki hymmen ki para, ngi kyrmen ba ka Sorkar kam khanglad.  Ngi kyntu ïa ka Meghalaya Karbi Association (MKA) ban ïatrreilang na ka bynta ka shongsuk bad ka jingshngaiñ ki paidbah ha Block-1,” la pynkut u kyrwoh.
title: KA JINGTUR THMA KI KARBI ÏA KI PNAR HA LAPANGAP KA PYNPAW BA KI KWAH ÏA UMSNAM: KHNAM

content: Shillong, Nailur 27 : Ka seng Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement lane ka HANM ka dei ka seng kaba la suit la shor ha ka 26 tarik u Nailur 2008 bad mynta kane ka seng ka la iaid lynti sha u mawmer ba 15 snem. Ki 15 snem ki jingiaid lynti kim long kiba suk, ki nongialam bad ki dkhot jong kane ka seng ki la iaid lyngba ki rai eh rai dam bad bun ki shiah kiba thar ha ka jingim jong ki.Ki don ki khep ba ki dkhot jong kane ka seng ki hap ban shong phatok da ki taiew bad da ki bnai, u President rangbah jong kane ka seng u bah Lamphrang Kharbani u la shong phatok la bunsien kumjuh ruh kiwei pat ki nongialam bad ki dkhot ki la shong phatok namar kiba bun ki mat ba ki iakhih na ka bynta ka Ri bad ka jaitbynriew.Ka HANM ka la rakhe ia ka jingdap 15 snem jong ka ha ka 26 tarik u Nailur, 2023. Shi bynta kum ka jingrakhe ia ka jingdap 15 snem ka HANM ka la ioh ban plie ia ka ophis ba pura jong ka kaba don ha ka shnong Mawkasiang , New Shillong . U kongsan ha kane ka sngi u dei u Myntri ka Hima Mylliem u bah K. Langstieh katba u Symbud kongsan pat u dei u Myntri M. B. Kharlukhi. Ha kane ka sngi u kongsan u la pyllait paidbah ruh ia ka Ambulance jong ka seng HANM ka ban ai jingshakri ia ki paidbah ha ka pang ka shitom.Haba kren ha ka jingialang kaba lyngkot, u Myntri Langstieh u la ai jingiaroh ia ka seng HANM namarba ka dei ka seng kaba ieng ha ka nongrim ban iada ia ka khyndew ka shyiap bad u pud u sam. U la ong ba ka Hima Mylliem ka dei ka Hima kaba don bun ki jaka ia kajia pud bad ka Assam bad u kyrmen ba lyngba ka jingiatreilang ka HANM bad ka Hima lah ban iada ia ka khyndew ka shyiap bad ia ka hok longtrai ia ki jaka puta.U Myntri Kharlukhi pat u la pynpaw ba ka them metor ka dei kawei na ki mat kaba ym tang ki sengbhalang hynrei baroh ki kwah ban pynkynriah noh ia ki briew kiba sah hangtei bad ia kane u la ong ba ka Hima Mylliem ka la leh la ka kamram da kaba aiti ia ka jaka sha ka sorkar bad kyrmen ba ka sorkar kan leh ia kaba donkam.
title: HAPDENG KI JINGIAID LYNTI KIBA EH, DAP 15 SNEM KA JINGSHAKRI KA HANM IA KA JAITBYNRIEW

content: Ka jingiakynad hapdeng ki jaidbynriew Karbi bad ki Khasi-Pnar ka la khie biang ha ka sngi Baar ha ka shnong Lapangap, West Jaiñtia Hills District hadien ba ki Karbi ki la pyndonkam ban siat pyntieng da ki khnam ia ki Khasi-Pnar.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum la iathuh ba uwei u Pulit pahara ha ka shnong Lapangap u la shu lait thaw salit na ka jingshei jong u khnam ba la siat da ki Karbi.Kane ka jingiakynad ka la jia ha kawei ka jaka rep kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Tahpat ha kaba ki Karbi kiba la suba ba ki don da ki spah ngut ki la pynthud ia ki Khasi-Pnar kiba leit rep ha Tahpat naduh kine ki khyndiat bnai baladep.Dang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi, ki Karbi ki la siat da ki jri siat iap ha kaba uwei na ki nongshong shnong u la mynsaw ha kane ka jingjia.Katkum ki video ba la ioh da u nongthoh khubor na ki paidbah ka shnong Lapangap la sakhi ia ka jingiapyni bor markylliang ha kaba ki Khasi-Pnar ki la pynphai kylla da kaba siat ia ki Karbi da ki jri sait sim.  Nalor kata, la sakhi ruh ia ki Karbi kiba kieng atiar da ki Khnam bad ka Ryntieh.  La sakhi ruh ba uwei u samla Karbi u la mynsaw haba u maw u la shei na ki bynta jong ka shyllangmat.Kane ka jingiakynad hapdeng ki Karbi bad ki Pnar ka la jia na ka por sha ka por watla ka Sorkar Assam bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya ki la pyrshang ban iakren pynbeit ia u pud u sam na ka bynta ka wat kaba ar ha kane ka kynti.Dang ha ka 26 tarik u bnai baladep, ki Pulit ka Saitsama Out Post ki la shu lait thaw da ka said hadien ka jingshah kthong ha ki Karbi ha ka shnong Lapangap.  Kane ka jingjia, ka la pynbitar lep ia ki Khasi-Pnar kiba sah ha Lapangap ha kaba jingiakynad ka la nang kynton shuh shuh katba nang mih ki sngi hapdeng kine ki ar jaidbynriew kiba sah ha khappud ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ka Jylla Assam.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingjia mynta ka sngi Baar, u Waheh Shnong jong ka shnong Lapangap u Bah Deimonmi Lyngdoh ha ka jingiakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la iathuh katba ki nongrep jong ka shnong Lapangap ki dang leit jngoh ia la ki lyngkha  kynsan kynsan la mih ki Karbi kiba la ap ktem da kaba rieh lypa ha ka lawbnap bad siat ia ki nongrep Khasi-Pnar da ki jri siat sim bad da ki khnam.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Waheh Shnong, la suba ba ki Karbi ki la ap ktem lypa naduh mynstep kham pajih na pynthor bad ha ka por ba ki Khasi-Pnar ki la hiar sha ki jaka rep ki la shah siat pynban da ki jri siat sim bad kane ka la pynmih ia ka jingiakynad kaba la neh naduh dang step haduh ban da kem iongreiñ ka bneng.U Waheh Shnong u la iathuh ba uwei na ki Pulit pahara ka Saitsama Out Post  ula shu lait salit na ka jingshei jong u khnamba la siat da ki Karbi.Kane ka jinghiar jong ki Pulit ka Saitsama Out Post ka long ban tehlakam ia kano kano ka jingiakynad hapdeng ki Karbi bad ki Khasi-Pnar bad na ka liang jong ki Pulit Assam ruh mar mar ki la hiar ban tem ia ka jingkynad khnang ban ym mih kano kano ka jingjia kaba sngewsih ha ka jingialeh ki arliang mamla.
title: NADUH DANG STEP AP KTEM KI KARBI ÏA KI PNAR HA LAPANGAP, SIAT KI KARBI DA KI KHNAM

content: : U Pulit langrut uba ju synran ban pahara ia u Additional Judge jong ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court, u la dkhat jubor ia la ka jong ka jingim da ka suloi ha ka sngi Balang.Ia une u Pulit langrut uba la tip kyrteng kum u Chiran Musharry Armed Branch Constable/2297 u dei uba dang don ha ka kamram pahara naduh mynnin ka miet sngi Baar, ong u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger.Ia u Musharry la lap ba u la thiah iap hapdeng ka jinglyngkien ka snam ha ka por 6.30 baje mynstep.Ia ka met jong une u Pulit langrut la pynkit noh sha Shillong Civil Hospital ban leh ia ka Post Mortem shwa ban aiti noh sha ki bahaing hasem na ka bynta ka jinglehniam kaba khatduh.Ki Pulit ki dang pynlong ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor kane ka jingjia.
title: SIAT IAP IALADE U PULIT PAHARA ÏA U ADDT. JUDGE KA MEGHALAYA HIGH COURT

content: Ka Khasi Author Society (KAS) mynta ka kynti ka la rai ban leit pynsngew sha ki tyngdong skhor ka Sorkar National Democratic Alliance (NDA) ba la ialam da ka BJP ban dawa ia ka jingpynrung ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India.U President ka KAS u Dr. D.R.L. Nonglait ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi balang u la ong, ‘ban shu pynsngew lyngba ki lad pathai khubor tang hangne kam don jingmut hynrei ngi la rai ban pynlong da ka jingialang paidbah ha Jantar Mantar, New Delhi ha ka 30 tarik mynta u bnai.”“Ban shu iaksaid tang ha rilum Khasi-Jaiñtia kam poi shano shano ruh. Naduh ki snem 2017-18 ngi la pynlong ia ka rally paidbah, ki jingpynshai ha ki District ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep bad ha kylleng ki jaka. Ka Sorkar Jylla ruh ka la shimkhia bad ha u bnai Naiwieng, 2018 ka Sorkar ka la rai ban kyntu ia ka Sorkar India ban pynrung ia ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra,” u la ong“Ka jingpynlong ia ka jingialang ha Jantar Mantar ka dei ka jingdawa ba shonghok kumba la kular da ka Riti Synshar ka ri India ha ka Article 29 kaba ong, ‘kano kano ka kynhun bynriew kaba shong hapoh ka ri India kaba don ia ka ktien, ka kolshor bad ki dak thoh la ka jong kiba kyrpang ki don ia ka hok ban pynneh bad ban pynsah.  Kane ka Article ka ai jingkular ba ngin ioh ia ka jingithuh na ka Riti Synshar namarba haduh mynta ngim pat ioh,” la ong u Dr. Nonglait.“Ha kiwei kiwei ki bynta ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka jingiatreikam bad ka Khasi Author Society (KAS) ka la ai ki jingiarap kat kiba ngi donkam.  Mynta kane ka kam ka don ha Delhi, ngim tip haduh katno ka Sorkar Jylla ka lah ban pynkohnguh, pynsngewthuh, pynngeit ia ki nongialam jong ka Sorkar ha Dehi ban pynrung ia ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra,” la bynrap u Dr. Nonglait.U la iathuh ruh ba ka KAS kaba la lamkhmat mynta la 40 snem ban dawa ia ka jingpynrung ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra ka la sngewdei ban pynlong noh da ki prokram jong ka Society ha Delhi ha kaba yn sa pynlong ia ka National Seminar halor ka phang ‘Ka Ktien, ka Litereshor bad ka Kolshor Khasi.’Ki nongiashim bynta ha ka National Seminar ka ban long ha ka 29 bad ka 30 tarik mynta u bnai kin long ki riewshemphang  na nongbah Shillong bad na kiwei kiwei pat ki nongbah jong ka ri India baroh kawei, kum na Delhi, Pondicherry, Hyderabad, Bangalore bad na kiwei kiwei ki jaka.“Ngi khmihlynti ba kane ka jingialang kan long kaba jop,” la ong u Dr. Nonglait bad bynrap ruh ba ka jingpynlong ia ka National Seminar ka dei ka jingiatreilang hapdeng ka KAS bad ka Hynñiewtrep Delhi Association (HDA) kaba  trei na ka bynta ka bha miat jong ki Khasi kiba trei bad pule ha Delhi.Ha ka sngi banyngkong jong ka seminar u MP ka Shillong u Bah Vincent H. Pala un sa long u Kongsan katba u Lamphang jong ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ ka KHADC u Bah Lamphrang Blah un sa long u Symbud Kongsan nalor ka jingiadonlang jong ki dkhot sengbhalang bapher bapher na kane ka jylla.Ha ka sngi kaba bud, u Myntri ka tnat Arts and Culture u Bah Paul Lyngdoh un long u Kongsan katba u Bah Alexander L. Hek un sa long u symbud Kongsan.“Ngi kyntu ia kiba sah ha Delhi, kiba trei bad kiba pule ba kin iashim bynta lang ha kane ka National Seminar kaba ar sngi bad ngi kyntu ruh ia ki paid Khasi kiba leit donkam sha Delhi ban iashim bynta lang,” u la ong.
title: SHA DELHI YN LEIT DAWA KA KAS ÏA KA SORKAR INDIA BAN PYNRUNG ÏA KA KTIEN KHASI HA KA 8th SCHEDULE

content: Ka jingïakhun bad ka jingïakynad hapdeng ki Khasi kiba sah ha ka shnong Lapangap, West Jaiñtia Hills District bad ki Karbi kiba sah ha West Karbi Anglong District, Assam ka la bteng biang mynta ka sngi Balang.Naduh mynnin ka sngi baar, ki Karbi bad ki Pnar kiba la ïapynibor markylliang da kaba siat da ki jri siat sim.  La sakhi ruh lyngba ki video ba la ïoh ring ba ki Karbi ki la pyndonkam wat da ki khnam bad ka ryntieh ban siat pyntieng ïa ki Pnar.Ym tang ki shynrang, hynrei wat ki kynthei Pnar ruh ki la synran lang ïa ki shynrang ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki Karbi da kaba siat da ki jri siat sim.Nalor kata, ha ka por shiteng sngi, kawei ka iing trep buh marrep jong ki Pnar ka la shah wiangding ha ki Karbi.  Ki Pulit Assam bad ki Pulit ka Saitsama Police Out Post kiba la poi sha Lapangap ban tem ïa ka jingïakynad ki la shu long tang ki nongpeitkai ïa ka jingsiat jri hapdeng ki Karbi bad ki Pnar.Hynrei hadien katto katne ki Pulit Assam ki la siat da ki Tear Gas sha ki Pnar kiba dang mareh ha ka jaka rep ha Tahpat khnang ban pynpra ïa ki Pnar kiba mih kynthei bad shynrang ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki Karbi.U Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills u Bah B.S Sohliya u la ïathuh ba ïa kane ka jingïakynad la lah ban tehlakam hadien ba la phah ïa ki Magistrate bad ki bor Pulit ban tem ïa ka ka jingïakynad na baroh ar liang.“Ka jaka ka dei kaba hap hapdeng ka jingïakajia pud ïa kaba yn sa shim rai da ka Regional Committee, hynrei ieh shwa ïa kata sharud.  Ka jingshisha hi ka long ba kane ka jaka ka dei ka nongkynti jong ki paidbah ka Lapangap bad ki la im da ka rep ka riang ha kane ka jaka,” la ong u Bah Sohliya ha ka jingïakren lyngba ka telephone.U Superintendent of Police ka West Jaiñtia Hils u Bah C. Syrti u la ïathuh ba la phah ïa ki Pulit na ka Jylla Meghalaya ban leit pahara bad ban tem ïa ka jingïakynad hapdeng ki Karbi bad ki Khasi.U la ïathuh ba la phah ar kynhun ki Pulit hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Deputy Superintendent of Police (Dy.SP) bad u Sub Inspector ban pynthikna pynneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha shilynter ka khappud.“Ka dei tang namarba ki jaka rep ki don ha khappud, bad ka kamram jong ngi ka long ban ïada ïa ki,” u la ong.Ki nongshong shnong ka Lapangap kiba im kamai jakpoh da ka rep ka riang, ki la kren bynñiaw ïa ka jingleh dusmon jong ki Karbi kiba jynrat naphang ïa u sying bad mait da ka wait ïa u jyntang kba uba la khie lung kat  haduh ba ka la wanrah ka jingduhnong kaba jhor ïa ki Pnar ha Lapangap.Dang ha ka taiew baladep, ka Dorbar Shnong ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills ban pan da ki bor pahara na Delhi ha ka shnong Lapangap khnang ban ïada ïa kano kano ka jingthmu jong ki Karbi ban pynjulor ïa ki mar rep.Ha u Nailar mynta u snem, ki Pulit ka Meghalaya ki la shah kawang da ki maw bad shah siat ruh da ki jri siat sim ha kane kajuh ka jaka ba la jia ka jingïakynad.  Ki Pulit ki la hap ban randien khnang ban lait na  kino kino ki jingjia ba sngewsih.Kum ban shu kdew hange, ka jingujor ba nyngkong sha u Deputy Commissioner ka West Jaiñtia Hills  ka long ha u bnai Naitung hadien ba shikynhun ki Karbi ba la synran lang da ki Pulit Assam ki la pynjulor ïa ki hajar tylli ki tynrai dieng ba la thung ha Tahpat ba la pynïoh lyngba ka Meghalaya Basin Development Authority (MBDA).
title: SHAH WIANG DING KA ÏING TREP BUH MARREP KI PNAR HA TAHPAT, SIAT JRI LANG KI KYNTHEI PNAR HA KA JINGIAKYNAD BAD KARBI HA LAPANGAP, SIAT TEAR GAS KI PULIT ASSAM

content: Shillong, Nailur 28 : Ka KSU lyngba u kyrwoh na u General Secretary, Khasi Students’ Union ka pyntip ba ki dkhot ka KSU WJHDU kin hiar sha Lapangap ban kyrshan ia ki paradoh parasnam kiba shah pyntyrha ha ki paid Karbi kiba kam jubor ia ki lyngkha kba ki Khasi.Ki paid Khasi kumba ju long naduh ki por hyndai hynthai ki ju rep riang ha la ki jaka kiba kham pajih na la ka shnong ka thaw. Kumjuh ruh ha Lapangap ki paid Khasi ki sah ha ki shnong hynrei ki jaka rep ba long nongkynti ma ki ki ju don sha pajih kum ha pdeng khlaw.Pynban ki Karbi ki la shim kabu da kaba kam ba ki lyngkha kba ki Khasi ki hap hapoh u pud u sam ka Assam. Mynshwa ha ka por ba ki Khasi ki leit thung ia u kba, ym don ba pyndik hynrei da la dei ka por ban ot ia u kba, ki paidbhur Karbi ki la siat da ki jri bad ki khnam ia ki nongrem Khasi. Ka KSU ka ai jingiaroh ia ki nongshong shnong ka Lapangap kiba ieng rangbah ban iada ia la u pud u sam.Ka KSU ka kyntu ia ki bor sorkar ka Meghalaya ban ai jingiada bad synran ia ki nongrep Khasi ba kin ioh ban leit ot ia u kba ba ki la thung shitom. Na ka liang ka KSU kan don ryngkat bad ki paid Khasi-Pnar kiba sah ha Lapangap bad kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ka khappud Meghalaya-Assam bad ka KSU kan ym ai ailad wat tang shi inshi ruh ka jaka jong ka Bri U Hynñiewtrep ba kan tuid sha Assam.Kyntang ia wai ka KSU ka kyntu ia ki paid Karbi bad bor sorkar Assam ban long kiba adkar bad ban ym pyndik ia ki paid Khasi kiba leit sha la ki lyngkha. Ka KSU kam kwah ia ka jingiakynad para riewlum hynrei kam lah ruh ban shu peit haba ki paradoh parasnam ki shah thombor na ka por sha ka por.Ka Lapangap, Mukroh, Khanduli, Langpih, Sabuda, Umwang, Moolber, Moojem, Psiar, Khatkasla bad kiwei kiwei ki shnong Khasi ki hap hapoh ka Meghalaya bad ka KAAC bad sorkar Assam kim dei ban kam trai ia ki.
title: KI KHASI-PNAR KI DONKAM BAN LEIT OT ÏA U KBA NA LA KI LYNGKHA HA LAPANGAP – KSU

content: U Vice Chairman jong ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) u Sufiyan A. Hazarika uba ju khot sin u Manbhalang Jyrwa ha ka sngi Palei u la phah ïa ka shithi iehnohkam, ba la pdiang da ka Central Executive Committee (CEC) ka HNLC.Ha ka jaka jong u, ka HNLC ka la thung bujli da u Bah Teimiki Laloo, Vice Chairman ba thymmai jong ka HNLC.Kane ka jingresaiñ jong u, ka la wan jia ha ka por ba ka jingïakren ïasuk ka dang ïaid shakhmat hapdeng ka HNLC ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ka Sorkar Jylla.“Ngi sngewkmen ban pyntip ba u Sufiyan A. Hazarika, ba ju tip kum u Manbhalang Jyrwa, u la phah ïa ka shithi iehnohkam jong u, kaba ngi la pdiang halor ka jingsngew parabriew,” ong u General Secretary-cum-Publicity Secretary ka HNLC u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Kum ka jubab, ka CEC ka la thung bujli ïa u Teimiki Laloo kum u Vice Chairman ba thymmai na ka bynta hynriew bnai,” u la bynrap.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka jingiehnohkam jong u Bah Jyrwa kan ym ktah lane pyntlot ïa ka bor jong ka seng, u Bah Nongtraw u la ong, “ki nongrim ba ïaineh jong ngi kin ïaineh khlem jingkylla, khlem da kheiñ ïa ka jingkylla ha ki nongïalam.”“Ngi kyrmen ba ki paidbah Hynñiewtrep jong ngi kin ïai burom ïa u Bah Manbhalang Jyrwa kum parabriew,” u la ong.Ka HNLC ka la kyntu ruh ïa ka Sorkar ban kiar na kaba pyndonkam bakla ïa u Bah Jyrwa watla u la iehnohkam hynrei ban buh hakhmat ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk.“Shuh shuh, ngi kyrmen ba ka Sorkar kan kiar na kaba pyndonkam bakla ïa ka jingresaiñ jong u Bah Jyrwa hynrei ban buh hakhmat ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk.  Ka jingiehnohkam jong u Bah Jyrwa kam dei ban pynthud ïa ka lynti jong ka jingïakren ïasuk,” ong u Bah Nongtraw.U la bynrap ba ka kynhun kaba la bynshet ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk yn sa ïalam da u Vice Chairman uba thymmai, u Bah Teimiki Laloo.
title: RESAIÑ KYNDIT U  MANBHALANG JYRWA HAPDENG KA JINGÏAKREN ÏASUK KA HNLC BAD SORKAR

content: : Ka Ïingbishar Meghalaya High Court ka la hukum ïa ka National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) ban shna noh mardor ïa ka surokbah National Highway-6  kaba la jot rathai.“Ka Ïingbishar kam kwah ban tip ïa ka jingïaphah shithi hapdeng ki ophisar ka NHAI lane ka jingthoh kaba bthah ïa ki Kontraktor, kaei kaba kongsan ka long lano ka kam kan sdang bad lano yn pyndep ban pynlong ka surok kaba pynsuk ïa ka leit ka wan ki kali bad namarkata, ban shna pyndep da ka surok kaba skhem,” ong ka Division Bench ba kynthup ïa u Chief Justice u Sanjib Banerjee bad u Justice B. Bhattacharjee ha ka hukum ha kaba shong bishar ïa ka PIL halor kane ka kam.Ka NHAI ka la phah ïa ka Affidavit ha ka 27 tarik Nailur, da kaba pynpaw ba u Regional Officer jong ka NHAI uba don ha Guwahati u la dep leit jngoh ïa ka surok ha ka 16 tarik Nailur.Ïa ka jingbthah jong u Regional Officer la buh jingthoh halor ka jingleit jngoh jong u ïa ka surok ha ka 16 tarik Nailur.Ka la ong ba ladep pynmih ïa ka jingbthah kaba janai ha ka 19 tarik Nailur 2023 sha uwei na ki Kontraktor bad ïa u Project Director jong ka NHAI ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban shna noh mardor ïa ka lynter jong ka surok NH -6 naduh Jowai shaduh Ratacherra.Ka Bench ka la kdew ruh halor ki shithi kiba ïadei bad ki ar tylli ki jaka ba jur tam ka jingsniew ka surok ha sor Khliehriat bad hajan ka Tunnel ha Sonapyrdi.Ka Iingbishar ka la lap ruh ba kam pat don satia kano kano ka dak ban maramot ïa ka surok ha shwa ka 15 tarik Risaw 2023 bad ban shna pynbha ïa ka surok ha ka lynter kaba jrong 57 kilomitar ïa kaba yn pyndep shwa ka 15 tarik Naiwieng 2023.“La khmihlynti ba ïa ka pisa dei ban pyllait na ka bynta ka jingtrei ka ban sdang noh manla ka sngi,” la ong ka hukum.Ka Ingbishar ka la bthah ïa u nongmudui bad ïa ka NHAI ba kin pynpaw ïa ki kam ba la pyntrei haduh mynta.La bthah ruh ïa u Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ban phah ïa ka kaiphod halor ka jingpyntrei ïa ka kam ha Sor Khliehriat bad shabar ka sor Khliehriat haduh ka bynta ba shathie jong ka shnong Lumshnong.Ka Ïngbishar ka la buh sngi ban shong bishar biang ïa kane ka kam ha ka 5 tarik Risaw 2023.
title: HUKUM KA HIGH COURT ÏA KA NHAI BAN SHNA NOH MARDOR ÏA KA SUROK NH-6

content: Ka jingbym kohnguh jong u Sordar ka Elaka Laitlyngkot ïa ka jingbthah jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka la pynlong ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka dong Nongthymmai-Lumthangding ban shong khlem Rangbah Shnong mynta la shi snem saw bnai eiei.Ki nongshong shnong ba la lamkhmat da u Rangbah Shnong barim, u Bah Tarcius Dkhar na ka por sha ka por ki la phah da ka jingthoh sha ka District Council ba kan tuklar halor kane bad ka Council ruh ka la bthah bunsien ïa u Sordar ka Elaka Laitlyngkot u Bah Allenson Shabong ban pynlong ïa ka elekshon ne ka dorbar ban jied Rangbah Shnong hynrei u la leh bym suidñiew satia ïa kane ka jingbthah jong ka Council.Ha ka sngi palei, ka kynhun ki nongshong shnong ki la leit ban ïakren bad u Deputy Chief Executive Member (Dy. CEM) ka KHADC u Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem uba peit ïa ka tnad Elaka Administration ba un tuklar mardor ïa kane ka kam bad ïa ka jingleh bym suidñiew jong u Sordar ïa ka jingbthah jong ka Council.U Bah Tarcius Dkhar u la ïathuh hadien ba ka samoi treikam jong u kum u Rangbah Shnong ka kut ha u snem 2022, la pynlong ïa ka Dorbar ban jied Rangbah Shnong thymmai hynrei u Sordar uba la pynïaid ïa ka dorbar u la kam pynban namar ka jingmih ar kyrteng na ka bynta ka kam ba la tyrwa da ki paidbah kumta yn hap ban pynsangeh noh shwa ïa ka jingpynlong elekshon.
title: SAITLAH U SORDAR LAITLYNGKOT ÏA KA JINGBTHAH KA KHADC BAN PYNLONG ELEKSHON RS

content: Ka jingiakren pynbeit pud na ka bynta ka wat kaba ar hapdeng ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Assam ha ka kyrdan Myntri Rangbah kan sa long lashai ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha State Guest House, Khanapara, Guwahati, Assam. Kane ka jingialang kan sa long ha ka por 1:00 baje nohphai sngi.Ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Assam ki la thung ia ki Regional Committee ki ban sor jamin ia ki hynriew tylli ki jaka kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingiakajia pud ha ka jingiapynbeit pud ha ka wat kaba ar.Ha ka wat kaba nyngkong, ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Assam ki ladep iakren pynbeit ia ki hynriew tylli ki jaka ba don hapdeng ka jingiakajia pud, kiba kynthup ia ka Hahim, Gizang, Tarabari, Boklapara, Khanapara-Pilingkata bad ka Ratacherra.U Myntri Rangbah ka Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha ka 29 tarik Lber 2022, ki la iasoi ia ka dulir iasngewthuh jingmut hakhmat u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Ri u Amit Shah ha New Delhi, ban pynkut noh ia ka jingiakajia pud kaba la neh jin haduh 50 snem kynthih hapdeng kine ki ar tylli ki jylla.Sa hynriew tylli ki jaka kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingiakajia pud ki ban iakren pynbeit ha ka wat kaba ar ki long ka Langpih, Borduar, Nongwah-Mawtamur, Desh Doomreah, Block 1 & Block II bad ka Psiar-Khanduli.Dang shen u Himanta Biswa Sarma uba la wan iuhkjat ha nongbah Shillong u la iakynduh kyrpang ia u Conrad Sangma tang hapoh shikynta ban iakren khyndiat na ka bynta ban buh ia ka sngi iakynduh halor kane ka jingthmu.
title: HA KA WAT BAAR YN ÏAKREN PYNBEIT PUD U CONRAD BAD HIMANTA HA KHANAPARA

content: : Ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba ka tnat Arts and Culture ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la aiti ia ka dulir khyndew sha ka Khasi Author Society (KAS) ha ka lympung iathir nia kaba la long ha YMCA, New Delhi, na ka bynta ban shna ia ka shlem treikam jong ka Society ha Tribal Research Institute, Mawlai, Shillong ha ka jaka kaba heh 5.40 hajar square feet.Ia kane ka dulir khyndew, la aiti da u Myntri ka tnat Arts and Culture ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba la long kum u Kongsan ha u President ka Society u Dr. D.R.L. Nonglait hadien ba la iasoi hapdeng ka tnat Arts and Culture bad ka Khasi Author Society.Ha kane ka jingaiti ia kane ka dulir, la sakhi lang da ki Myntri Sorkar ba kynthup ia u Bah Alexander L. Hek, ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, ki MLA kiba kynthup ia u Bah Renikton L. Tongkhar bad u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, u Lamphang jong ka Ïingdorbar Thawain ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Lamphrang Blah, ki MDC, ki MLA barim ba kynthup ia u Bah Lambor Malngiang bad u Bah Samlin Malngiang, ki dkhot ka KAS, ki nongialam jong ki sengbhalang bapawkhmat ha ka Jylla Meghalaya bad ki Khasi kiba pule bad kiba trei ha nongbah New Delhi.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh haba kren kum u Kongsan ha ka jingiathir nia kaba ar sngi ba la pynlong da ka Khasi Author Society halor ka phang, “ka ktien, ka Litereshor bad ka Kolshor Khasi,” ia kaba la pynkut noh mynta ka sngi Saitjaiñ, u la ong, “ki don lai tylli ki ‘K’kiba pynksan bad pynithuh ïa ka snap jong ngi kum ka jaidbynriew. Ka Khyndew, , ka Ktien bad ka Kur, ki dei ki lai tylli ki bynta kiba pynlong ia ngi ki trai ri trai muluk. Lada ngi duh noh ia ka ktien, hangno shuh ngin long kum ka jaidbynriew, lada ngi duh noh ia ka Kur hangno shuh ngin long kum ka jaidbynriew bad lada ngi duh noh ia ka khyndew, hangno shuh ka jinglong trai jong ngi ia la ka jong ka ri.”Ka Khasi Author Society ka la pynlong ia kane ka jingiathir nia kaba ar sngi ha New Delhi kum ka sienjam ban pynsngew sha ki tyndong skhor jong ka Sorkar India halor ka jingdawa ban ithuh noh ia ka Ktien Khasi bad ban pynrung ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India kaba la long ka jingdawa kaba la kynjoh mynta la saw snem kynthih jong ki paidbah ka jylla Meghalaya.“Nga ngeit ba u Blei u don ka saiñdur, U don ka saiñ Blei na ka bynta ka ri ka jong ngi. Lada kam long kumta, kan ym lah ban long ba ki dohlieh na kawei pat ka dewbah, ki pyrkhat ban mih na Wales bad ban poi sha Sohra ha ka snem 1841.  Naduh Jammu shaduh Gujarat ter ter ki don 96 klur ki Hindu. Sharum jong ngi, ka Ri Bangladesh ka dei ka ri kaba phra kaba don ia ka jingbun briew tam ha ka pyrthei ka don 15 klur ki Muslim. Hapdeng jong ki 96 klur bad ki 15 klur, kumno ka jaidbynriew kaba tang 15 lak ka la neh ka la sah ka la iaksaid bad ka dang im haduh kat mynta, lada kam dei ba ka don ka saiñdur jong U Blei. Ka kyntien ka ong, haba U Blei U don ka saiñdur, u donkam patde ia u briew ban iasnoh kti lang bad kata ka bynta,” u la bynrap.“Ka jingpynrung ia ka ktien jong ngi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra ka dei ka bynta jong ngi ba ngin pyndep ia kaei kaba U Blei U la sdang,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Paul.“Ngi don hangne ban pynneh, ban pynsah ia la ka jong ka snap kum ka jaidbynriew,” la bynrap shuh shuh u Bah Paul.“Ai ba ngin pynthikna ba ka jaidbynriew jong ngi kaba dei tang ma ka na ki Austro-Asiatic Languages kaba dang im ha ri India, ngi donhok shibun bha ba ngin iohi ba ka Ktien jong ngi kan rung ha ka riti synshar jong ka ri India,” ong u Bah Paul.“Kumba ngi la lah ban pynlong ia ka Ktien Khasi kum ka Associate Language ha ka Jylla ngin shim sa shisien jam ban ioh ia ka jingithuh hapoh ka riti synshar ka ri India. Lada kane ka ri ka jong ngi ka ngeit ha ka jingiatylli hapdeng ka jingiapher ka (Sorkar India) dei hok ban ai ia ka jingithuh ia ka ktien jong ngi, ka Ktien kaba la rung hapoh ka Kolkata University naduh ka snem 1900.
title: 5.40 HAJAR SQ.FT AI JAKA KA SORKAR JYLLA ÏA KA KAS HA TRIBAL RESEARCH INSTITUTE, MAWLAI

content: : Ka tnat Tourism jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynkupburom da ka khusnam ia ka Tourism Promoter Treking Society (TPTS) Wahkhen, ka kynhun kaba lamkhmat ban pynpawnam ia u Mawryngkhang kum ka jaka jngohkai pyrthei ha ka shnong Wahkhen tang da kaba shna ia ka lynti iaid kjat da ki siej ha shiteng riat ban sam ia ka lynti iaid ban poi sha u Mawryngkhang.Ia ka khusnam la pynkhamti ha u Babu Kular Khongjirem da u Myntri ka tnat Tourism ha ka jingrakhe dang shen jong ka Jylla ia ka World Tourism Day ha State Convention Centre, Shillong hadien ba ka Indian Responsible Tourism ka la ithuh ia ka jingshna ba kham phylla ha ka shnong Wahkhen.Ia kane ka lynti iaid kjat ha shiteng riat la shna da ki kti ha ka 14 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2017 da ki katto katne ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Wahkhen ki riewtbit ha ki kam shna jingshna da ki siej.Ka thong ba hakhmat eh jong kane ka Society ka long ban kyntiew ym tang ia ki kam jngohkai pyrthei ha ki jaka nongkyndong hynrei ban plie ruh ia ki lad aikam aijam na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong lyngba ki kam jngoh kai pyrthei.Kane ka kynhun ka la bei lut nadong shadong nalade hi ia ki jinglut jingsep ban shna ia ka lynti iaid kjat da ki siej ha shiteng riat.Ka Society kam ioh jingiarap wat shi naia ruh na ki tnat sorkar lane wat na kino kino ki nongmihkhmat ban iarap ha kaba shna bad maramot ia ka jaka jngohkai pyrthei ha shiteng riat.Ka lynti ba la pynjingkieng da ki siej ban poi sha u Mawryngkhang ka dei kaba la shna da ki nongshong shnong kiba long ki dkhot jong ka Society ki bym don jingnang jingstad kum kita ki Engineer lane ki Architect hynrei kiba don pat ka jingtbit nalade bad kiba don ia ka sap kaba kham pher.
title: AI KHUSNAM KA TNAT TOURISM ÏA KA TPTS BA PAWNAM U MAWRYNGKHANG HA WAHKHEN

content: Ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Assam ki la rai ban weng noh ia ki Pulit kiba ap pahara ha ki jaka ba don hapdeng ka jingiakajia pud ha shilynter jong ka Meghalaya bad ka Assam.Ia kane ka rai la shim ha ka jingialang pynbeit pud ha ka wat kaba ar hapdeng u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Meghalaya u Conrad Kongkal Sangma bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma kaba la long ha Khanapara, Guwahati ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong ki nongmihkhmat na ki Regional Committee ba la khlieh da ki Myntri Sorkar ka Meghalaya bad Assam.Ki arngut ki Myntri Rangbah ki la shim ia ka rai ban iapynbeit shwa ia ki 3 tylli ki jaka kiba don hapdeng ka jingiakajia pud napdeng ki 6 tylli.  Nalor kata, u Conrad bad u Himanta ki la rai ruh ban ai por haduh ka 31 tarik Nohprah, 2023 ia ka Survey of India bad ia ki ophisar jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bad Assam ban pyndep ia ka jingithuh ban phiah ia u pud u sam ha ki 6 tylli ki jaka ia kajia pud ba ladep iapynbeit ha ka wat kaba nyngkong ia kaba ladep iasoi ia ka Memorandum of Understanding da ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Assam ha ka 29 tarik Lber, 2022 ha Delhi ba la sakhi lang da u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Ri u Amit Shah.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ba ma u bad u Himanta kin sa leit sorjamin ia ka Khanduli-Psiar kaba hap hapoh ka thaiñ Block-I ha ka taiew basaw jong u bnai Risaw kata hadien ba la kut ka lehniam Puja.Kane ka jingialang ka la rai ruh ban weng noh ia ki Pulit Meghalaya bad Pulit Assam na ki jaka ba don ka jingiakajia pud bad ban buh bujli da ki Pulit CRPF khnang ba kan ym don kano kano ka jingleh shilliang.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingjia ha ka shnong Mukroh ha ka 24 tarik Naiwieng, 2022, ki arngut ki Myntri Rangbah ki la rai ban kyrpad ia ka Sorkar Pdeng ba kan phah tohkit da ka Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) bad ban register ia ka Case ym ha Guwahati ne Shillong hynrei shabar jong kine ki ar tylli ki jaka khnang ba ka jingtohkit kan long ka bym leh shiliang.U Himata, u la iathuh ba la rai ban pynkut noh ia ki Judicial Inquiry ba la thung da ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Assam.“Ngi la shim ia kane ka rai hadien ba ki paidbah na ka Jylla Meghalaya kim shym la leit mih satia ban ai sakhi hakhmat ka Judicial Inquiry ba la thung da ka Sorkar Assam bad ki paidbah  na Assam kim shym la leit mih satia ban ai sakhi hakhmat ka Judicial Inquiry ba la thung da ka Sorkar Meghalaya halor kane ka jingjia,” u la bynrap.Ka jingïakren ha kane ka sngi ka la long kaba seisoh bad bthah ruh ïa ki Regional Committee ba ki dei ban shimkhia ban wanrah ïa ka jubab kaba hun hapdeng ki paidbah kiba shong basah ha khappud ka Meghalaya bad Assam.Halor ka jingshah thombor jong ki Khasi-Pnar ha ka thaiñ Lapangap na ka liang ki arngut ki Myntri Rangbah ki la ong ba kin sa bthah ia u Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills u Bah B.S. Sohliya bad ia ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Karbi Anglong ka Krishna Paul ba kin iapynbeit halor kane kam bad lada jia ba dang mih kano kano ka jingiakynad na ka liang jong ki Regional Committee kin sa shimkhia ban pynbeit ïa kane ka kam ban pyneh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ khamtam ba ki Khasi-Pnar kin ioh ban kheit ïa ki mar rep bad ia u kba uba ki la thung.
title: RAI KA SORKAR MEGH-ASSAM BAN AITI HA KA CBI ÏA KA JINGJIA HA MUKROH, YN WENG ÏA KI PULIT NA KHAPPUD

content: Ka Khasi Author Society kaba la lamkhmat ban pynkhih ia ka jingdawa ban ioh jingithuh ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India, ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pynlong da ka jingiakhih kaba jai jai ha Jantar Mantar, New Delhi.Ia kane ka jingiakhih bajaijai jong ka KAS, la kyrshan lang da ki kynhun bad ki sengbhalang bapher bapher na rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia bad ki Myntri Sorkar ba kynthup ïa u Bah Paul Lyngdoh bad ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, bad kiwei ki riew rangbah bapaw kum i Bah Hamletson Dohling, Lambor Malngiang, Samlin Malngiang, Lamphang Blah, Teibor Pathaw, Raynold Kharkamni, Banri Lyngwa bad ki sengsaiñpyrthei bapher bapher.Ki nongkren ha kane ka jingialang ki la pynpaw ba ka Ktien Khasi ka ladei hok ban ïoh rung ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar jong ka Ri katkum ka Article kaba 29.Kane ka jinglamkhmat jong ka KAS ban pynlong da ka jingiakhih kaba jaijai ha New Delhi ka long ka buit ba thymmai kaba ym pat ju leh mynno mynno ruh bad dei halor kane ka nongrim ba ki Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla ki la iashim bynta lang ha kane ka jingiakhih.Ki nongïalam jong ki Sengbhalang, ba kynthup ia ka KSU, FKJGP, HYC, HANM, JSU bad CoRP ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingkyrmen ba kane ka jingtylli lang hapoh kawei ka sur kan pynurlong ia ka jingangnud ba ka Ktien Khasi kan rung noh ha ka Khyrnit Baphra ka riti synshar ka ri India.Ka Jantar Mantar ka la sawa ruh da ka sur jingrwai, Khynriam u Pnar u Bhoi u War u dei u paid Khasi baiar ha ka nohphai sngi ba la pynlong ia ka jingiakhih kaba jar jar.Ki dkhot ka Hynñiewtrep Delhi Association bad ki Khasi kiba trei bad pule ha New Delhi ki la ai jingkyrshan da ka jingiashim bynta lang ha kane ka jingiakhih jong ka KAS.Ha nongbah Shillong, ka KSU ka la teh ia ki banner kylleng ki jaka paidbah ban pynpaw sha ka Sorkar Pdeng ia ka sur jingdawa jong ka jaidbynriew Khasi ban ithuh noh ia ka Ktien Khasi.
title: PYNKHIH KA KAS ÏA KA JINGDAWA HA DELHI BAN ÏOH JINGITHUH ÏA KA KTIEN KHASI HA KHYRNIT BAPHRA

content: : U President jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) u Bah Ardent M. Basaïawmoit u la ong ba ka party kumba ka la shim rai ha ka jingïalang jong ka State Executive Committee ka la bthah ïa baroh ki MLA jong ka party ba ki dei ban pyntreikam ïa ka MLA Scheme ha ka lynti kaba shai bad ba ki dei ban ai jingkheiñ sha u paidbah kumno la pynlut pynsep ïa kane ka skhim ba la mang.Kane ka jingbthah kan long ïa ki lai ngut ki MLA jong ka party, u Bah Adelbert Nongrum, u Bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang, u Bah Heavingstone Kharpran bad kynthup ïa u Bah Ardent M. Basaïawmoit, ha kaba ki hap ban kohnguh ïa kane ka jingbthah jong ka party.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang pynshai paidbah ïa ka nongrim jong ka party bad ruh ban pynrung dkhot kaba la pynlong ha ka shnong Lawbah, kaba hap hapoh Mawsynram Constituency ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, u Bah Ardent u ong, lada kino kino ki MLA ka party ba kynthup ïa u ruh lada ki ïaid lait na kane ka jingbthah ka Party kan pynduh tiket beit ha ka elekshon MLA ka ban long biang ha u snem 2028.U la kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah ba ki dei ban ai da ka jingtip kaba shai ba ka MLA scheme ne kino kino ki kam pynroi kiba wanrah da u MLA kam dei satia ka kam leh isynei jong u hynrei ka dei hok ka bhah ba ki dei ban ai sha u paidbah kumba la mang da ka Sorkar.
title: KI MLA KA VPP KI BYM AI JINGKHEIÑ ÏA KA MLA SCHEME KI LAH BAN SHAH PYNDUH TIKET

content: : Da ki phew hajar ngut ki riewngeit jong ka Balang Catholic na ka Jylla Niam Jowai, Nongstoiñ bad na ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong ki la sakhi lang ha ka jingpynkyntang Lyngdoh Sad ïa u Rev. Fr. Ferdinand Dkhar, DD uba la shah thung dang shen ban shimti kum u u Lyngdoh sad bathymmai jong ka Jowai Diocese.Ïa u Fr. Ferdinand la pynkyntang kum u Lyngdoh Sad ba pura ha ka sngi U Blei ha Church of the Holy Spirit, Parish Ummulong, West Jaiñtia Hills da u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh, u Archbishop jong ka Jyllañiam Bah Shillong uba la pynmynta ïa ka jinglehniam jong ka Mass Bakhuid.Ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi lang da u Apostolic Nuncio sha India bad Nepal u Arcbishop Leopoldo Gerelli, ki Archbishop bad ki Bishop jong ki Jyllaniam ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi, ki Lyngdoh Sohblei, ki riewniam bad ki paid U Blei.Nalor kine, la sakhi lang ruh da ki nongïalam saiñhima sima jong ka jylla ba kynthup ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u  Conrad Kongkal Sangma, u MP ka Shillong u Bah Vincent H. Pala, ki Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla, ki MLA, ki MDC bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, la kha ïa u Rev. Fr. Ferdinand Dkhar ha ka 26 tarik Rymphang, 1962 ha ka shnong Ïongkaluh – East Jaiñtia Hills. U dei u khun phrangsngi na ki 10 ngut ki khun jong u Ma Edwin Kyndait bad ka Kong Philomina Dkhar. La pynkyntang Lyndoh Sohblei ïa u ha ka 23 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 1994.Ha ka por shiteng sngi, la pynlong sa ka jinglehniam mane Sakramen ha kaba u Bishop Ferdinand Dkhar u la ai ïa ka kyrkhu kyrdoh lyngba ka Sacrament sha ki paid u Blei kiba ïalum sawdong jong ka duwan ka dupat.Katba ha ka por nohphai sngi la pynlong ïa ki prokram leh burom ïa u Bishop Ferdinand Dkhar naduh ka Prayer Dance na ka St. Mary Mazzarello Convent, Jowai, ka shad pliang na ka Synjuk Kynthai, Jowai Diocese, ka Choir Piece na ka Bl. Joseph Nardini Seminary, Ummulong bad  jingshad tynrai na ka Jowai Diocese Catholic Youth Movement, katba ïa ki kyntien ai khublei la ai da u Chancellor jong ka Jowai Diocese, u Fr. Martin Shylla.
title: SAKHI U APOSTOLIC NUNCIO BAD KI BISHOP KA NORTHEAST HA KA JINGPYNKYNTANG LYNGDOH SAD ÏA U FR. FERDINAND DKHAR

content: Jowai, Risaw 05 : Ki nongialam jong ka seng ki samla pule ka Khasi Students Union, East Jaintia Hills District Unit ki la pynpaw ka jingsngew khia halor ka jingbym iasnoh kti lang jong baroh ki nongniah kali kiba ju iaid lyngba na ka surok national highway-6 ha East Jaintia Hills District, ki bym burom lem ia ka jingkyrpad ka seng, kaba la buh ka jingkyrpad ban sangeh ban iaid kali ha ka por mynmiet kata naduh ka por 7 baje mynmiet haduh ka por 5 baje mynstep.U General Secretary ka KSU East Jaintia Hills District, u Bah K.S. Suchiang, u la ong ba kane ka jingkyntu ia baroh ban sangeh ban niah kali la lap ba ki don bun na ki nongniah kali ki bym treh ban iasnoh kti lang bad ka seng, namar ki don tang shi pawa kiba la iasnoh kti lang bad ka seng ki bym iaid kali shuh ha ka por mynmiet, kane ka paw ba imat ki nongniah kali ki sngewtynnad, ki kmen beit ban iaid watla ka surok ka sniew bad jot rathai.Ha ka jingshisha ka seng ka kwah eh ba baroh ki paidbah kin suk ha ka leit ka wan da kaba iaid na ka surok kaba bha ba miat bad ka seng ka ju sngap ruh ia ki jingud ki paidbah kiba iakynduh jingeh ha ka leit ka wan bad ka seng ka la shim ruh ia ka sienjam ban pynlong da ka jingiakhih, hynrei balei pat ki paidbah khamtam kiba niah kali kim treh pat ban ia shim bynta lang haba ka seng ka kyntu bad kyrpad ban sangeh ban niah kali ha ka por mynmiet ban long kum ka dak ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingleh bymsuidniew ka NHAI bad ka Sorkar Jylla u la ong.Shuh shuh utei u nongialam ka seng, u la ong ba kane ka jingkyrpad jong ka seng ban nym iaid kali ha ka por mynmiet ka la kut noh ha ka 2 tarik Risaw 2023 ha ka por 5 baje mynstep bad ka la dap shi taiew kynthih, kata naduh ka 25 tarik u nailur.Hapoh kine ki shi taiew la ong ba ym shym la don kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih ne ka huri hura bad tang kawei kaba pynpyrkhat ia ka seng ka dei namar ka jingbym ia shim bynta ryntih ki nongniah kali ban sangeh ban iaid kali ha ka por mynmiet.U la ong ba ka seng hi kan sa shong pyrkhat biang halor kane ka jinglong jingman ka surok NH-6, kawei ba ka seng ka kwah ka dei ba ki paidbah bad ki nongniah kali baroh kin sngewbha ban ai mynsiem lem ia ka seng da kaba iasnohkti lang bad ka seng ha kano kano ka por.Kumba long mynta, ka surok national highway ha East Jaintia Hills District, khamtam ha ka thain Narpuh ka la buh jingma bad buh jingeh bha ia ki paidbah nongleit nongwan, ka jingdheng kali ruh ka jur bha ha katei ka thain na ka daw ka jingsniew palat ka surok. Ka NHAI kam dei ban shu maramot, hynrei ban siang rong biang noh namar ka bneng ka la shah ban leh kumta.
title: KA JINGBYM IASNOH KTI LANG KI NONGNIAH KALI KA PAW IMAT KI SNGEWTYNNAD BAD IAID HA KA SUROK NH-6 KABA LA JOT RATHAI : KSU-EJHDU

content: : Kumba saw ngut ki briew ki la mynsaw ha ka jingbthei kaba la jia ha kawei ka dukan die marjot ha Keating Road, Shillong ha ka sngi U Blei.Kane ka la jia ha ka por kumba 1:00 baje nohphai sngi. Napdeng ki saw ngut kiba la mynsaw, ar ngut ki dei ki nongtrei jong kane ka dukan die marjot katba arngut kiwei pat ki dei ki briew kiba shong hapoh kawei ka dukan khap shñiuh kaba don markhap bad kane ka dukan die marjot.Ki Pulit ryngkat bad ki Pulit ka tnat Fire and Emergency Service ba la synran lang da ki Pulit ka Bomb Squad bad ki ksew jong ka K-9 ki la leit mar mar sha kane ka jaka ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.U Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger ha  u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ïathuh ba ka jingbthei ha ka dukan die marjot ha Keating Road ka la jia katba ki nongtrei ki dang pyrshang ban pied ïa ki tyndong ai rong ryngkat bad ka jingdih duma.
title: BTHEI KI TYNDONG AI RONG HA KUDAM DIE TIAR JOT HA KEATING ROAD, MYNSAW 4 NGUT

content: Amlarem, Risaw 06: Hadien ka jingud jingnam jong ki Khynnah skul bad ki nong shong shnong ka thaiñ ka Khasi Students Union War Jaintia Circle (KSU) ha ka sngi Thohdieng hapoh ka  jingialam u General Secretary samla Lurman Talang bad kiwei, ryngkat ka jingsynran lang ki nongialam  ka West Jaintia Hills Distric Unit ba la lamkhmat da u General Secretary u samla Leningrad Tariang ki la leit ban jurip ia ka skul sorkar Sohkha Goverment Higher Secondary School bad ha ka jingjurip la lap ba  ka skul kam don ia u nonghikai Chemistry.Ynda lah tohkit bniah ka seng ka lap ba ka dei na ka daw ka jing pynkylla ka sorkar  ba ki nonghikai kin hap ban  pyndep ia ka B.Ed bad ba u nonghikai uba dei peit ia ka subjek ula leit ban bteng ia ka jingpule katkum ka jingbthah ban pyndep shwa katkum ka kyndon.Hynrei kaba sngew lyngngoh ka long ba ka sorkar kam shym la lah ban thung bujli ia katei ka post wat hadien ba lah dep khot ban thep ia katei ka kam kaba lait.Kaba pynsngew lyngngoh shuh shuh ia ka seng ka long ba naduh u bnai Lber kane ka skul kam don ia u Nonghikai Chemistry bad ka buh jingeh haduh katta katta ia ki samla pule jong kane ka skul.Ka Seng ka dap da ki jing sngewbitar  haba ka jia kumne ia ki samla pule kiba thrang ban poi sha khmat ha baroh ki liang khamtam lei lei mynta ka lah dei sa ka por ba kin thoh ia ka eksamin Pre-Selection bad  ka Selection bad ruh  ban pynkhreh sa kiwei pat ki eksamin. Na ka liang jong ka seng kan iai buddien halor kane ka kam.Ka Seng ka la kren shai ba lada kine ki Khynnah pule jong kane ka skul kim lah ban ioh ia ka jinghikai kaba biang kumno ka sorkar Kan pyrkhat na ka bynta ka jong ki?Ka sorkar ka dei ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh bad ban wad ki lad ki lynti khnang ba ki khynnah pule kin ioh ia ka jinghikai kaba tikna shwa ba kin pynkhreh ia lade ban thoh ia ki Eksamin ki jong ki.
title: NADUH U LBER YM DON NONGHIKAI CHEMISTRY KA SOHKHA GOVERMENT HS SCHOOL

content: : Hapdeng ka jingtwa khyndew bad ka jingshlei um kaba jur ha ka jylla Sikkim, 26 ngut ki samla pule na kane ka jylla Meghalaya ki la wan poi suk poi saiñ sha la ka jong ka jylla.Kine ki 26 ngut ki samla ki dei kiba pule ha Himalayan Pharmacy Institute bad arngut ha Sikkim Manipal Institute of Technology ha Majitar, East Sikkim ki la wan poi tiap ha Inter State Bus Terminus, Mawiongrim, Shillong ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ha ka por kumba 6:45 baje janmiet hadien ka jingïaid lynti kaba 24 kynta eiei naduh ba ki la mih na Sikkim ha ka por 5 baje janmiet sngi thohdieng.Kine ki samla pule ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh shikatdei eh ïa ka Sorkar Jylla kaba la shimkhia ban pynpoi suk poi saiñ ïa ki sha la ing ha kum kane ka khep ba ki la mad ka jingeh bad ki jingsyier mynsiem ba ki don sha jngai na la iing.Da ka jingshimkhia jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, ki bor synshar jong ka jylla Sikkim ki la pynbiang san tylli ki kali ban pynkynriah ïa kine ki 26 ngut ki samla pule kiba sahkut ha Majitar, Sikkim tad haduh ban da pynpoi ha Siliguri bad na Siliguri la leit shaw da ka Bos kaba la pynpoi suk ïa ki haduh Shillong.“Kumne ngi la poi suk sha la iing, ka long kaei kaei kaba kyrpang eh kaba ki (Sorkar Sikkim) la leh na ka bynta jong ngi. Ngi ainguh ïa ki bad ngi ngeit ba U Blei un ïai theh ki jingkyrkhu ïa ki bad ngin duwai ruh na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong jong ka jylla Sikkim kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingjynjar bad nga kyrpad ïa iwei pa iwei ba kin ai mynsiem bad ban kynmaw lem ïa ki ha ki jingduwai,” la ong ka samla Barihunshisha Lyngdoh, kawei na ki samla pule jong ka Himalayan Pharmacy Institute ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ISBT.Haba kylli, ka la ïathuh ba ka jingtwa khyndew na ka jingther jong u lapbah uba jur ka la sdang naduh ka 4 tarik mynta u bnai  ha ka por kumba 2 baje mynstep eiei.“Hajan ka Sikkim Manipal Institute of Technology ka jingtwa khyndew ka la sdang bad ha ka College jong ngi ruh ka la sdang hynrei kam pat da long than haduh katta katta kumba long sha kiwei kiwei ki jaka,” la bynrap kane ka samla pule.“Ngim don Network, ngim don bording ngim don um bad ngi la shu pyntip sha u Myntri Rangbah badonburom jong ngi lyngba ki MLA. Da ka jingïarap jong ki, ngi la ïoh ban telephone ïa u Myntri Rangbah bad kumta hi mar mar ki la phah wan shaw ïa ngi,” ka la ong.“Ngi syier palat, namar ban pyntip sha la iing ngim ïoh lad. Ngi la shu duwai namarba ngi don hapdeng ka jingsyier mynsiem,Ka ïathuh ruh ba ka Sorkar ka la pynbiang naduh ki kali bad ka bam ka dih bad ka um katba ki dang don ha lynti ban wan phai sha Shillong.Ka la ïathuh ba ka kali kaba kit ïa ki samla pule ka la hap ban ïaid na kawei pat ka surok kaba kham jrong namarba ka surok kaba kham lyngkot ka leit ka wan ka la shah pynjulor ha ka jingshlei um. “Hynrei ngi la ïaid da kaba suk, kam don satia kano kano ka jingjia katba ngi dang don ha lynti,” ka la bynrap.Ka samla Sharon Papang ka la bynrap, “mar syn jia kumto, ngi la pyntip sha la ing hynrei ha kato ka por ka mobile network kam long, ka internet ruh kam long, ka bording ruh kam don. Ha kato hi ka khyllipmat ngim khlem ïoh ban pyntip ïa ki (bahaiing hasem) hynrei suki suki ngi la ïohlad ban pyntip pat sha la iing.  Ki kmie ki kpa jong ngi, ki ai mynsiem beit ïa ngi, ki ong ynnai tieng.”Da kaba pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewnguh ïa U Blei Uba la ri bad sumar ha kum kane ka khep ba ki don hapdeng ka jingsyier mynsiem ka samla Sharon Papang ka la ïathuh shuh shuh, “manla ka miet shwa ba ngin thiah ngi ju pynlong jingduwai, ngi ai mynsiem iwei ïa iwei watla kane ka jingjia ka la jia hynrei U Blei jong ngi U ïai don ryngkat beit bad ngi bad Um ju iehnoh hi ruh ïa ngi, wat lada ngi jngai na la ing ruh.”“Ngi ki samla pule jong ka Himalayan Pharmacy Institute bad ka Sikkim Manipal Institute of Technology ruh ngi pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh bad ngi ai khublei haduh katta katta ïa ka Sorkar Jylla kaba la pynsuk ïa ngi naduh Sikkim ban pynbiang ïa ki kali naduh Sikkim haduh Siliguri bad naduh Siliguri shaduh shane sha Shillong. Mynmiet ruh ki la pynbiang ïa ka bam bad ngi  ai khublei namarba ka jingïaid lynti jong ngi ka long kaba shngaiñ bad ngim don shuh kano kano ka jingsheptieng,” la pynpaw  kane ka samla bad kiwei de ki samla pule ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.
title: POI SUK KI 28 NGUT KI SAMLA PULE MEGHALAYA NA SIKKIM BA KITKHIA KA SORKAR JYLLA

content: Shillong, Risaw, 07: Ki shipai BSF kiba ap pahara ha khappud ka jylla Meghalaya, ha ka sngi thohdieng ki la ïoh kurup ïa ki dawai bad ïa ki jaiñ sari kiba shongdor palat T.17 lak katba ki runar ki dang thmu ban shalan be-aiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh.Ki shipai BSF jong ka 172 Battalion kiba la ïoh jingtip na ki tnat syntiat, mar mar ki la pynlong ka jingpynap shrip ha khappud jong ka Hingaria East Jaiñtia Hills District ha kaba ki la ïoh kurup ïa ki dawai ba la buhrieh ha khappud ïa kiba la thmu ban shalan be-aiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh.Ki shipai BSF ki la ïoh kurup ruh ïa ki jaiñ Sari katba ki runar ki dang shalan be-aiñ sha Bangladesh na khappud.  Ïa kine ki mar ba la ïoh kurup la aiti noh sha ka ophis Custom ban leh ïa kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.Ha kawei pat ka jingpynap shrip, ki shipai BSF jong ka 4th Battalion Meghalaya, ki la ïoh kurup ïa ki jaiñ Sari na khappud jong ka East Khasi Hills, Meghalaya, ïa kiba la thmu ban khaïi be-aiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh.
title: KURUP KI SHIPAI BSF ÏA KI DAWAI BAD JAIÑ SARI NA KHAPPUD

content: Ar phew hynñiew ngut ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya kiba leit pilkrim sha Jerusalem ki la sahkut ha Bethlehem na ka daw ka jingïapynibor hapdeng ka ri Palestine bad ka ri Israel.U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Conrad K. Sangma ha ka rynsan X u la pyntip ba u la ïakren bad ki bor badei peit jong ka Ministry of External Affairs ba kin pynthikna ban ai ka jingïada ïa ki nong Meghalaya bad ba kin wan phai biang sha la iing da kaba suk ba saiñ.“Nga la ïakren bad ka Ministry of External Affairs ban pynthikna ba kin ïoh jingïada ha lynti ban wan phai sha la iing. Nga la bthah ïa u Meghalaya Resident Commissioner ha New Delhi ban ai jingïarap sha ki nongleit pilkrim,” la ong u Sangma.La ïathuh ba kine ki nongleit pilkrim ki don hapdeng ka jingshngaiñ bad mynta ki don ha Indian Embassy ha Tel Aviv.Ka jinglong jingman ha Middle East ka la nang sniew ha kine ki khyndiat taiew na ka daw ka jingïapynibor bad ka jingïakynad hapdeng ka Israel bad ka Palestine. La bthah ïa ki nongleit pilkrim ban shong hapoh ki jaka shah ban kiar na kaba leit shane shatai hynrei lait noh tang ha ki khep ba donkam kyrkieh eh.Ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la peitngor bha ïa ka jingjia ha ka ri Israel bad kan ai jingïarap katba donkam na ka bynta ki nongleit pilkrim.Namar ka jinglong jingman ha ka ri Israel, ka Sorkar ka la pynmih ïa ka jingbthah da kaba kyrpad ïa baroh ki nong India kiba don ha Israel ba kin long kiba peitngor, bad ban wad ïa ki lad jingïada katkum ka jingbthah jong ki bor synshar.  Sngewbha ban long kiba phikir, kiar ban ïaid haba ym donkam bad shong ha ki jaka kiba shngaiñ.  Na ka bynta ki jingtip m sngewbha ban peit ïa ka Israeli Home Front Command website () lane ïa kino kino ki jingbthah ba la pynmih da ki jingthoh.Lada don kino kino ki jingdonkam ba kyrkieh, sngewbha ban telephone sha ngi ha nombar +97235226748, lane shu phah kyrwoh ha ka email:. Ki nongtrei ka Embassy kin sa ïarap ïa phi na ka bynta ki jingbthah kiba bniah.
title: SAHKUT KI NONGLEIT PILKRIM NA MEGHALAYA HA BETHLEHEM BA KHIE KA THMA PALESTINE-ISRAEL

content: U lyoh uba dum u la tap ia ka shnong shnong Pynthorlangteiñ kaba hap hapoh ka Thadlaskeiñ Block,West Jaiñtia Hills District hadien ba saw ngut kiba dei shi ïing shisem ki la khladnoh na kane ka sla pyrthei na ka jingtwa ka khyndew kaba la jia ha ka step jong ka sngi u Blei.Kine ki saw ngut ki kynthup ia u kpa jong ka ïing u Bah Biangki Phawa 29 snem ka rta, ka kmie ka Kong Pynjanai Ryngkhlem 25 snem ka rta, ar ngut ki khun u heprit Edyfy Ryngkhlem 5 snem ka rta bad i heprit Iwadaroi Ryngkhlem 3 snem ka rta.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum la iathuh ba kane ka longïing ka dei kaba ju im kyndoi jakpoh tang kum ki nongshoh maw-ria.Ki trai shnong ki la iathuh ba ki la ïohi ïa kane ka jingjia ha ka por kumba 5:30 baje mynstep bad marmar ki la leit ban ai jingiarap ban iohsei ïa ki saw ngut kiba la shah tep im ha ka khyndew.U Mama jong kane ka longïing Bah Hermon Rynkhlem u la pynpaw ïa ka mynsiem kaba dap da ka jingsngewsih bad ka jingsngewkhia halor kane ka jingduh ïa la ki baieid bathoiñ ha kum kane ka jingjia bym poi pyrkhat na ka jinglyngshop jong ki bor ka mariang.U Bah Ryngkhlem u la kyntu ïa ki bor Sorkar ba kin shimkhia ban leh ïa kaba donkam halor kane ka jingduh jong ki ïa kine ki saw ngut ki mynsiem briew bad iathuh ruh ba u kpa jong kane ka longïing u long tang kum u nongshna mawit bad u nongshoh mawria ryngkat bad ka kmie ha kaba ki ju ïalam lang ia la ki khun ynda la wai skul u khun shynrang manla ka sngi.Ïa ka met jong kine ki saw ngut yn sa tep ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ha u Lum jingteng ka Balang Presbyterian, Pynthorlangteiñ.U Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills District u Bah B.S. Sohliya u la bthah mardor ïa u Block Development Officer (BDO) jong ka Thadlaskeiñ C&RD Block ban leit ai ïa ka song jingïarap pisa sha ki bahaïing kiba don jingïadei bad ki saw ngut ki mynsiem kiba la khladnoh ha ka jingtwa khyndew ha ka shnong Pynthorlangteiñ.Ka ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner ka la mang 16 lak tyngka sha kane ka longiing.ïa ka met jong kitei ki saw ngut ladep sei bad la pyndep katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ, ong u kyrwoh khubor ba la phah na ka ophis treikam jong u Deputy Commissioner.
title: ÏAP SAW NGUT SHI ÏING BA SHAH TEP IM NA KA JINGTWA KHYNDEW HA PYNTHORLANGTEIÑ

content: U MP ba marwei ka Rajya Sabha na Meghalaya u Dr. WR Kharlukhi lem bad ki 26 ngut ki nongleit Pilkrim na Meghalaya ki la jam na khappud jong ka Bethlehem, Jerusalem sha Egypt.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad Sangma u la ong, “kane ka jingpynkynriah ka dei ka jingjop lyngba ki jingtrei shitom jong ka Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) bad ka Indian Diplomatic Mission. Ki nongshong shnong na ka jylla Meghalaya, kiba la sahkut ha ka jingkhie kynsan ka jingïaleh thma hapdeng ka Israel-Palestine, mynta ki la poi sha Egypt.”“Ngi kham ïoh mynsiem khyndiat ban tip ba la pynthikna ba ki (nong Meghalaya) ki la rung sha Egypt, bad ban pynthikna ba ki nongshong shnong jong ngi kin ym jia eiei kaba sniew.  Ki jingmut jingpyrkhat bad ki jingduwai jong ngi kin don ryngkat ha ka jingïaid lynti jong ki bad haduh ba kin da wan phai suk sha la iing,” u la ong.Haba ïakren lyngba ka telephone na Tel Aviv, uwei na ki nong Meghalaya uba sah ha Israel u la ong, “ngim leilei hynrei ka thma ka la nang jur.  Ki shipai ki la nang ïoh knieh biang katto katne ki shnong na ki kynhun kieng atiar, bad lehse sa tang katto katne por baroh kin sa long biang kumba ju long.  La bthah ïa ngi ban shong khop hapoh iing bad ban rieh ha ki jaka kiba shngaiñ, bad baroh ki nongshong shnong ki la bud ïa ki jingbthah da ki bor sorkar.  Ki nong Meghalaya kin hap ban ïaid lynti da ka jingsynran jong ki shipai lyngba ka Suez Canal kaba shimpor haduh 10 kynta.”Ka jingïakynad ka la sdang hadien ba ki lehnoh na ka ri Palestine ka Hamas ha ka step jong ka Sngi Saitjaiñ, ki la ther da ki namding ïa ka ri Israel bad ïa ki jaka sah jong ki Jew na ka Gaza Strip ha ka sien banyngkong eh naduh u bnai Jymmang mynta u snem.Hapdeng kane ka jingjia kaba shyrkhei ha Israel, ki 27 ngut ki nong Meghalaya ki la hap ban shong rieh khop ha Bethlehem.  Kine ki 27 ngut ki dei kiba leit pilkrim riewblei sha Jerusalem na Shillong, kiba la mih naduh ka 9 tarik, Nailur.  Mynta ki dang sahkut ha Bethlehem, hapdeng ka jinglynga mynsiem ïoh ba ka jingïaleh thma kan nang jur ha kane ka thaiñ.Halor kane ka jingjia, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la ïatreilang ryngkat bad ka Ministry of External Affairs ban pynthikna ba kine ki 27 ngut kin wan phai biang sha Meghalaya da kaba suk ba saiñ.
title: KITKHIA KA MEA, JAM KI 27 NGUT KI PILKRIM NA MEGHALAYA NA KHAPPUD JERUSALEM SHA EGYPT

content: 10 KYNTA ÏAKHUN KI PULIT, DA KI FIRE BALL BAN PYNLIP IA KA DINGKi thylliej ding kiba rhem ki la bam shngiam bad pynkylla dpei ïa ki jingdon jingem ha ka ïing mala jong ki Singhania ha Thana Road, Police Bazar ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.Ïa ka jingkem ding jong kane ka ing ym pat lah satia ban tip ïa ka daw tynrai hynrei ki Pulit ki la pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit ban lap ïa ka jingsdang jong ka ding kaba la lam shaduh u pud ba ki jingdon jingem kiba don hapoh kane ka iing mala kin kylla dpei tang ha ka shikhyllipmat.Ka jingpluh jong kane ka ïing mala ha Thana Road markhap bad ka Payal Cinema, ka la jia ha ka por kumba 1:15 noh phai sngi. Ki thylliej ding ba itriem ki la klang hapoh ka ïing baroh kat haduh ba ki Pulit pynlip ding jong ka tnat Fire and Emergency Services (F& ES) ki la ïakhun naduh ka por nohphai sngi tad haduh ba la thoh ïa kane ka khubor ha ka por 10:00 baje mynmiet.La ïohi ruh ïa ka tdem kaba la kiew arsut sha suiñ wat haduh ka por 10 baje mynmiet katba ki bor Pulit ka tnat pynlip ding bad ki bor Shipai ki la ïakhun ban tem ïa ka jingklang jong ka ding kaba la neh da ki bun bun kynta.Na ka jingklang jong ka ding la ïohsngew ruh ïa ka jingbthei kaba mih na kane ka jaka ba la jia ka jingpluh ding.  Ki kali pynlip ding jong ka tnat Fire and Emergency Services (F&ES) tang shu ïoh jingtip ki la pynher kum ki khnam ïa ki kali pynlip ding ban pynpoi kloi khnang ban tem ïa ka jingklang jong ki thylliej ding hapoh kane ka ïing ïa kaba la ïathuh ba don ka dukan ba la tip kum ka Janata Furniture bad ka kudam lum thup ïa ki jaiñ bad kiwei kiwei de ki tiar.Ha ki kynta ba ki kali pynlip ding ki la rung sha surok Thana Road, ki Pulit pynïaid kali jong ka Shillong Traffic Police (STP) ki la khang lut ïa ki kali ban rung sha Khyndai Lad. Kane ka la wanrah ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba jur ha jylli jong ka nongbah Shillong naduh ka por nohphai sngi haduh ka por janmiet.Ka Deputy Commissioner ka Kong RM Kurbah lem bad ki Magistrate kynthup ruh u Superintendent of Police, ka East Khasi Hills u Bah S. Nongtnger bad kiwei kiwei de ki heh Pulit ki la hiar jurip ïa kane ka jingjia.U Superintendent of Police, ka East Khasi Hills u Bah S. Nongtnger u la pyntip ruh ba ha kane ka jingjia uwei u briew u la duh ei ïa la ka jong ka jingim hynrei kat haduh ba la thoh ïa kane ka khubor ki Pulit kim pat lah satia ban ïathuh ïa ka kyrteng jong une uba la khladnohBan tem ïa ka jingklang ki thylliej ding, ki Pulit ki la hap ban pyndonkam da kaba kawang da ki File Ball.  Nalor kata, la sakhi ruh ba wat haduh ka por mynmiet ki kali pynlip ding bad ki Pulit ki dang ïakhun ban kynshait um ïa ka jingklang jong ka ding.Ki bor shipai ki la hap ban wanrah ruh da ka kali Pynlip ding lajong ban pyndonkam da kaba synreit da u Foam (Sboh) ban pynlip ïa ka ding hynrei watla katta namar ka jingjur shaba palat jong ka ding ki shipai ki dang durut tyngeh ban pynlip ïa ka ding kaba dang rhem shapoh jong ka ïing.Ïa ka thylliej ding kiba rhem hapoh ka dukan jong u Amit Singhania ym pat lah satia ban tehlakam watla ki Pulit pynlip ding ki la pyrshang ban ïakhun na kiba bun ki jaka ban ïoh pynlip noh ïa ka ding.Haba kylli, la ïathuh ba ki Kali Pynlip ding ki la leit bad wanphai bun kylla ban pynlip ïa ka ding.  Ka jingkhapngiah jong ka surok ka long ruh ka daw kaba pynthut ïa ka jingïaid beit sak sak jong kine ki kali.  Ki Pulit ki la hap ban tan da ka um na Pung Nan Polo (Ward’s Lake) ka jaka ba kham jan ban pynpoi kham kloi ïa ka um sha ka jaka ba jia ka jingpluh ding ha Thana Road.Kat haduh ba la pynmih ïa kane ka khubor, ym pat ïoh jingkheiñ satia haduh katno ka jingjulor, ka jingsdang jong ka ding bad ka jingdon jong kiba mynsaw.
title: BAM SHNGIAM KI THYLLIEJ DING ÏA KA ÏING MALA KI SINGHANIA HA THANA ROAD, POLICE BAZAR

content: : Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit lyngba ka Education Cell ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ujor da ka jingthoh sha u Director jong ka School Education and Literacy (SEL) u Swapnil Tembe bad sha ka Director jong ka Educational Research and Traning (ERT) ka Kong R.S Manner ka jingpynjot dumon jong ki briew ïa ka Residential School bad ïa ka Block Institute of Teachers Education (BITE) ba la shna da ka tnat Pule Puthi ha ka shnong Byndihati, East Jaiñtia Hills District.Ka Seng ka la ujor ruh halor ka jingbym don nonghikai Science ha Rymbai Governement Secondary School  bad ka jingbym pyntreikam ïa ki ar tylli ki jaka pule kiba don ha Byndihati, kata, ïa ka Residential School bad ka Block Teachers Training Institute.Ka seng kaba la ïoh ujor na ki paidbah, ha ka jingleit jurip ka la lap shisha ba ym don nonghikai ha ka Sobject Science ha Rymbai Govt Secondary School la kumba shi snem eiei bad ka seng ka lap ruh ba kane ka skul ka la khapngiah ki kamra kals namar ka jingbym biang ka building bad kiwei kiwei de ki jingdonkam kum ka Science Laboratory, ka Computers Lab bad ki ki nonghikai pura namarba bun na ki nonghikai ki dei kiba shu hikai shipor.Ka KSU lyngba ka Education Cell ba la lamkhmat da u Asst. Education Secretary u samla SanTomba Bamon ka la ai jingmut ïa u Director ban kyntiew kyrdan ïa ka Rymbai Govt Secondary School sha ka Higher Secondary School namar kumba long mynta kane ka skul ka dei tang ma ka, ka Secondary School jong ka Sorkar ha baroh kawei ka East Jaiñtia Hills.Na ka liang jong u Director u la pyntip ba ïa ka jingkyntiew kyrdan yn hap ban ïashong pyrkhat bha bad ka seng ka la pynsngew ba ka dei tang kane hi kawei ka skul ba la bei da ka Sorkar Jylla bad la i donkam bha ban kyntiew ïa ka sha ka kyrdan Higher Secondary SchoolShuh shuh ka seng ka tip ruh ba ki don ki sobjek kiba ym don nonghikai pura bad kiba hap ban shim kylliang beit da ki para nonghikai jong ka skul.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka Residential School bad ka jaka pule pyntbit ïa ki nonghikai ba la shu ieh lyngkrang khlem da ka pyntreikam satia mynta la phra snem eiei, ka seng ka la ïakren ha u Director jong ka DSEL bad ka DERT ban khmih biang bad ban ïakren bad ka Sorkar Jylla ban pyntreikam noh namar kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa ki khun samla ka thaiñ naduh kiba pule bad ha ka ïohkam ïohjam.Ka seng ka la buddien ruh ïa ka jingiehshrah ïa ka Residential School bad ïa ka Block Institute of Teachers Education (BITE) ba don hapoh ka District bad ruh la ïoh jingtip ba ka tnat ba dei peit ka dang ïaleh ban ïoh pisa ban pynbha bad tei biang ïa ki khamtam na ka pisa ba la mang da ka Sorkar Pdeng.Haba ïadei bad ka BITE ka seng ka la ïoh jingtip ba ïa kane ka projek ym shym lah ieh shrah hynrei ka dang don hapdeng ka jingpynkhreh ban pyntrei noh hadien ba ka tnat PWD ka la aiti sha ka tnat Pule Puthi.  Shuh shuh ka seng ka la kyrpad ïa ki bor ba dei peit ba kin leit jurip ïa kine ki ar tylli ki Building bad ban tip haduh katno ka jingduhnong shwa ban shna pynbha khnang ba ka jingtei kan nym long kaba sepei.Kane ka projek ka dei na bynta ka Block Institute of Teachers Education bad ka seng ka ka la dawa ba dei ban kyntiew kyrdan noh mardor sha ka District Institute of Teachers Education(DITE) khnang ba kan long ka jingïohnong ïa ka district hi baroh kawei.Shuh shuh ka seng ka la pynsngew ruh ha kaba ïadei bad ka National Institute of Open Schooling (NIOS) bad halor kane, ka seng kan sa phah da ka jingthoh sha u Regional Director  khnang ba ki nongshong shnong jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District kin ïoh jingmyntoi bad kan long ruh ka jingmyn toi ïa ki khynnah skul kiba la pep skul shiteng por ban bteng biang ïa ki jingpule ki jong ki.
title: UJOR KA KSU SHA KA DSEL BA PYNJULOR KI RIEWDUSMON ÏA KA RESIDENTIAL SCHOOL BAD BITE

content: Shillong, Risaw, 14: Ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) jong ka 172 Battalion Meghalaya ha ka sngi thohdieng ki la pynpulom ïa ka jingthmu jong ki runar ban shalan tuh 56 tylli ki masi na khappud jong ka Jylla Meghalaya hapoh ki 48 kynta ba la leit noh.Ïa kine ki masi la thmu ban shalan beaiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh lyngba ka khappud jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills.Ki shipai BSF kiba la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah, ki la pynlong ka jingap ktem bad ïohbat ïa kawei ka kali ha jingkieng Sonapur, East Jaiñtia Hills. Katba ki shipai BSF ki la aidak ban pynsangeh ïa ka kali, hynrei u nongñiah u pynher pynstet ïa ka kali sha surok ban leit sha ka shnong Umkiang. Ha ka jingïabeh thong, ki shipai BSF ki la ïoh khang kdong ïa ka kali bad kurup noh ïa ki masi. Katba u nongñiah jong ka kali u la phet krad ïalade da kaba shim kabu ïa ka jingrben jong ka khlaw bad ka jingdum jong ka miet bad iehnoh shadien ïa ki masi bad ïa ka kali.Haduh 35 tylli ki masi ba la thyngian hapoh ka kali ba la kurup da ki shipai BSF la aiti noh sha ki Pulit jong ka Umkiang Out Post ban leh ïa kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ. Ha kawei pat ka jingpynap ktem, kane ka kynhun shipai ka la ïoh kurup 21 tylli ki masi ïa kiba la buhrieh ha kawei ka lawbniap ha khappud da ka jingthmu ban shalan be-aiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh.
title: PYNPULOM KI BSF ÏA KA JINGTHMU BAN SHALAN TUH ÏA KI MASI SHA BANGLADESH
