content: Ka Red Ribbon Club bad ka NSS, Sohra Government College, ryngkat  ka jingïatreilang bad ka Meghalaya AIDS Control Society(MACS)lem bad ka Regional Blood Centre, Pasteur Institute,Shillong ki la pynlong ïa ka Awareness-cum-Voluntary Blood Donation Camp hapoh ka Sohra Government College Campus ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha kane ka prokram ka SDO(Civil)Sohra Civil Sub-Division,  ka Hema Nayak, ka la long ka kongsan ryngkat ka jingssakhi lang jong u SDPO Sohra u Bah P.M.Syiem,  SDM & HO,Sohra, Dr.G.Swett, Medical Officer, Regional Blood Centre, Pasteur Institute, Shillong Dr.B.Passah, AD Youth) Meghalaya AIDS Control Society,Shillong, Kong L.Nongpyiur, A.D (Voluntary Blood Donation) Kong L.M.Shullai nalor u Principal , ki nonghikai bad ki nongtrei jong ka College lem bad ki samla pule jong ka College.Shwa kane la ka Kong L.M.Shullai ka la ai jingpynshai halor ka jingdonkam ka jingai snam mon sngewbha ban ïarap ïa kito kiba donkam ha ki khep ba kyrkieh.Ki don khatphra ngut kiba la wan shakhmat ban noh synñiang ïa la ka snam bad kynthup katto katne  ngut ki nonghikai bad ki nongtrei jong ka Govt. Sohra College nalor ki samla pule.
title: AI SNGEWBHA ÏA KA SNAM BAN ÏADA ÏA KI MYNSIEM HA KI KHEP BA DONKAM EH : RRC

content: U MDC ka BJP na Tura u Bernard N. Marak u la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ban bthah ïa ka Executive Committee ba la ïalam da NPP ha Garo Hills Autonomous District Council (GHADC) ba kan sangeh noh mardor ban kheiñ ïa ka BJP kum ka Liang Pyrshah bad ban ïasam marbiang ïa ka bhah jong ka Tied bad Untied Grants ha ki Constituency ba la mihkhmat da ki MDC ki bym dei na ka NPP.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Myntri Rangbah ha ka sngi u Blei, u Marak u la ong, “nga kyrpad ïa phi ba phin shimkhia ïa kane ka kam bad ban bthah ïa ka Executive Committee jong phi ba phin sangeh mardor ban ñiew ïa ka BJP kum ka Liang Pyrshah bad ban ïasam marbiang ïa ka Basic Grants (Tied bad Untied) khnang ba ki paidbah kin ïoh ïa ki jingmyntoi.U la kynnoh ba ka Executive Committee ba ïalam da ka NPP ha GHADC ka la bhah tang 15 lak sha ka Tura Constituency nalor ba ka dei ruh ka Constituency ba la mihkhmat da u Myntri Rangbah.“Nga dei u MDC ka BJP bad ka NPP kaba ïatreilang bad ka BJP ha Delhi bad ha ka jylla hynrei ha GHADC, ka NPP ka la leh shiliang khmat ïa ka BJP ha baroh ki jait kam wat ha kaba sam ïa ki song pynroi ba la mang da ka Sorkar BJP na Delhi lyngba ki Rural Local Bodies (RLBS) hapoh ka Fifteen Finance Commission (XV FC),” ong u Marak.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka Tura Constituency ka dei ka Constituency kaba heh napdeng ki Constituency kiba hap hapoh ka jylli jong ka GHADC bad kaba don kham bun ki nongthep vote, u Marak u la ong, “ka jingleh shiliang khmat da ka Executive Committee ba la ïalam da ka NPP ka la pynduhnong haduh katta katta ïa ki paidbah jong ka Tura ïa ki song jingïarap ba la mang da ka Sorkar Pdeng.”Shuh shuh u la  kynnoh ba ka Work Order ba la ai da ka GHADC ka long kaba rit ha kaba la mang pisa tang T.15 lak  bad kane ka long jingpynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon jong ka XV FC.“Ka jingai duna shaba palat ïa ka bhah ka dei ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka hok katkum ka Riti Synshar Paidbah jong u nongmihkmat ba la jied da u paidbah namar ba ka pynduhnong ïa ki paidbah jong ka Constituency ba u mihhmat,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ka Tura ka dei ka Seat kaba kongsan bad ka don palat 30 tylli ki shnong bad nga kwah ban ïaiban ba ki paidbah ki dei ban shah pynduh ïa ka hok.  Ka Tura Constituency ka la shah pynduhhok ha ki por ba ladep bad ka la ïoh tang T.10 lak na ka Tied bad Untied Fund na ka Executive Committee barim ba la ïalam da ka NPP.“Namarkata, nga kyrpad rit ïa phi ban bthah ïa ki MDC jong phi ha GHADC ban sam marbiang ïa ka bhah. Kaba ar, phin kyrpad ban pyllait ïa ka song pisa kaba ladei ban siew sha ka GHADC da ka Sorkar Jylla na ka jingïoh lum khajna bad kiwei kiwei namar ba na ka GHADC ka la nang ngam mynta hapdeng ka jingdapram hynrei haduh mynta la 31 bnai kam pat lah satia ban siew wat ïa ka tulop sha ki nongtrei.  Nga kyrpad ïa phi ban siew ruh ïa ka bhah thung dieng ba la ai sha ka Jylla ha ki lai snem ba ladep lyngba ka jingmynjur ba la ïasoi da ka ANVC bad ka ANVC-B namarba la mang kyrpang ïa ka tnat Forest jong ka GHADC, ym sha ka jylla. Pyllait noh mardor ïa ka bhah ba la ïoh lum khajna na ka Motor Vehicle Taxes sha ka GHADC namar ba haduh mynta ka Sorkar Jylla kam pat pyllait ïa ka pisa da ki snem,” la ong shuh shuh u Marak.
title: SHAH KHEIÑ LIANG PYRSHAH KA BJP HA GHADC, BITAR U BERNARD BA ÏOH BHAH KA TURA TANG 15 LAK

content: : Ka seng ki nongdie madan ka Meghalaya & Greater Shillong Progressive Hawkers and Street Vendors Association ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih bad ka jingsngewlem ïa ka longiing jong ki Singhania kiba la duhnoh ïa ka iing namar ka jingbamduh jong ka ding ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladepKa Seng ka pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewlem ïa ki bahaiing sem jong uba la khlad ha kane ka jingpluh ding kaba shyrkhei.“Ka Seng ka pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewdiaw bad ka jingpyrshah kaba jur ïa ki jingkynthoh bad ki jingkynnoh jong ki katto katne kiba ong ba ki nongdie madan ki khang lynti ïa ki kali pynlip ding bad kumta ka ding ka ïohlad ban bam shngiam ïa ka iing. Ka Seng ki nongdie madan kam lah ban pdiang ïa kum kine ki jingkynnoh ki bym shongnia,” la ong u General Secretary ka Seng u Bah Shane Thabah ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Ha ka jingshisha ka seng ki nongdie madan ka la kyntu ïa ki bor shnong ne ki bor synshar distrik ba ki dei ban da ïitkhmih ïa ka jinglong jong ka Sor Shillong mynta halor ka jingtei thurmur ïa ki iing ki sem bad ban pynlong ka jingjurip kaba bniah halor ka rukom shna ïa ki iing ki sem bad ki dukan paki dulan. Ban thaw ïa ka kynhun jurip kaba laitluid ban jurip halor ka jingshngaiñ jong ki iing, ki jingtei iing bad ki dukan paki dulan kiba don ha Khyndai Lad bad kylleng ka Nongbah,” la ong ka Seng.“Ka Seng ka pynpaw shai kdar ba ha kine ki phew snem ba la leit noh la pynjot ïa ka Sor Shillong da ka jingrhah spah bad jingkhwan myntoi shimet bad ki nongkhaii, ki riewshimet ki leh katba mon haba ki tei ïa ki iing bad kiwei ki jingtei kim salia ïa ki aiñ ki kyndon bad pylleiñ pylleiñ ki pynkheiñ ïa ki. Ki bor ba dei khmih ruh kim pushe ne kitkhia,” la kynnoh ka Seng.Haba pynkynmaw ïa ki jingpluh ding kiba la la jia ha ki khyndiat snem ba la leit noh, ka seng ka la ong, “kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba dang shen kawei ka ïingmane ha Qualapaty ka la pluh bad ingkhong khait bad ar ngut ki mynsiem briew ki la shu duh ei.  Ha kane ka jingjia ki kali pynlip ding kiba heh kim shym lah satia ban rung sha ka jaka namar ka jingrit jong ka surok ïaid kali. Kajuh ka jingjia pluh ding ka la jia ha ki khyndiat bnai ba la lah ha kaba ka skul KJP Girls Higher Secondary School ha Mission Compound ka la ingkhong bad ha kane ruh ki kali pynlip ding kim lah satia ban poi haduh ha shen namar kim lait ban rung namar ba khim palat ki surok.”“Ha ka jingshisha ha ka jingpluh ka iing ha Khyndai Lad ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki nongdie madan bad ki dkhot jong ka Seng ki la lum marmar ïa ki mar ki mata jong ki bad khang mardor ïa ki jingdie. Ki la mareh ruh sha ka jaka ba pluh ban ai ka kti ka jingïarap watla ki dei ban buh ïalade ha ka jingma.  Kumta ki nongdie madan kim shym la khang lynti, pynban ki la ai ka kti jong ka jingïarap,” la pynshai ka seng.Ka Seng ka kloi ban ïatrei lang bad ki bor synshar distrik bad ka Sorkar ban tei bad ban pynlong ïa ka Sor Shillong kaba shngaiñ bad kaba burom kylliang.
title: HA KA SNGI BA PLUH KA ÏING MALA KI SINGHANIA SHAH KYNNOH KI NONGDIE MADAN HA KHYNDAI LAD BA PYNWIT ÏA KI KALI PYNLIP DING

content: Ki nongshet ja sngi ha ki skul bapher bapher jong ka Jylla kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Union of Cook cum Helpers PM POSHAN Meghalaya (UCCHPM Poshan) ki la byrngem ban sangeh treikam lada ka Sorkar Jylla kam siew ïa ka bainong hapoh une u bnai Risaw.Ka President jong ka Union ka Kong Banalis Syiem ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ka la ong, “ka Sorkar Jylla ka la kular ban siew ïa ka Honorarium kaba 6 bnai hynrei haduh mynta ka Sorkar kam pat siew eiei hynrei ka dang siew tang na ka bynta lai bnai.  Hynriew bnai ngi la trei hynrei ngim pat ïoh jingsiew eiei nalor ba ka jingïoh bainong ka long kaba rit.”“Ngi dang ïoh ïa ka jingsiew jong u bnai Ïaiong, Jymmang, Jylliew bad kaba sah ka long naduh u bnai Naitung, Nailar bad Nailur ter ter haduh mynta kim pat siew. Hynrei ha ka jingïakren, ki ong ban siew baroh hynriew bnai hynrei ka pisa kaba ki siew ka long tang  na ka bynta lai bnai,” la ïathuh ka Kong Syiem.“Lada ka Sorkar kam siew hapoh une u bnai Risaw, ngi la shim da ka rai ban sangeh shwa ka jingleit shet ja sngi ha ki skul,” la ong ka Kong Syiemlieh.“Daei ki khun jong ngi kin bam haba ngim ïoh bainong?  Ngin bsa da kaei ïa ki khun ki  kti? Lada ka Sorkar kam siew dep ïa ka bainong jong ki bnai kiba ngi ladep trei, ngi la rai ban sangeh leit shet ja sha ki skul, tad haduh ba ka Sorkar kan da siew shwa ïa ka bainong,” ka la ong.Naduh 15 tarik, Nohprah ka Sorkar Jylla ka la kyntiew ïa ka jingsiew Honorarium na ka T.100 spah sha ka T.1000 hajar, katba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka siew bainong T.900 spah. Ha ka shi bnai ki nongshet ja sngi ki ïoh bainong T.2000 hajar. Kaba kham sangsot ka long ba ki nongshet ja sngi ha ki skul ki ïoh bainong tang ka bynta 10 bnai, katba ha ka shuti tlang kim ïoh jingsiew eiei ruh em haduh ar bnai tam.“Ngi kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar Jylla bad ïa u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi namarba ngi ladep phah ïa ka jingthoh ba un pynkiew ïa ka jingsiew Honorarium bad ban siew bainong na ka bynta 12 bnai hynrei ym tang na ka bynta 10 bnai.  Hynrei haduh mynta ka Sorkar Pdeng kam shym la patiaw satïa ïa ka jingkyrpad jong ngi,” la ong ka Kong Syiemlieh.“Ngi kyrpad ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad Kongkal Sangma ba un ïakren bad u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri Narendra Modi ïa ka khia ka shon jong ngi ki nongshet ja sngi ha ki skul nalor ka jingsiew ka barit, ki pynthud pat ïa ka rukom siew bainong ïa ngi ki nongshet ja sngi ha ka jylla baroh kawei,” la kyrpad kane ka nongïalam jong ka Union.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong ka Kong Syiem, kiba bun ki nongshet ja sngi kim shym la ïoh ïa ka pisa kaba ju pynpoi beit ha ka Bank Account jong ki. “Haba ngi buddien, ngi lap ba bun na ki nongshet ja sngi khamtam ha them Ribhoi ka pisa kam poi satia ha ka Bank Account jong ki hynrei ka poi pynban sha ka Account jong ki skul bad sha ka Account jong ki nongpeit skul.  Na kaei ka daw ngim tip. Ngi sngewkhia haduh katta katta ïa kane,” ka la bynrap.“Balei ki nongshet ja sngi, kim don hok seh ba ka bainong lajong kan poi ha ka Bank Account lajong? Lada ma ngi, ngi ïoh, katba kiwei pat kim ïoh, ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewsih,” ka la ong.“Ngi kyrpad ïa ki nonghikai bad ïa ki nongpeit ba kin ïatreilang bad ki nongshet ja sngi ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingsiew ïa ka bainong,” la ong shuh shuh ka Kong Syiem.Ka la khot bad wer ruh ïa ki nongshet ja sngi ha ki skul bapher bapher jong ka Jylla ba kin ïashim bynta lang ha ka jingïakhih lada ka Sorkar kam siew ïa ka bainong kaba ki dei hok ban ïoh.
title: BYRNGEM SANGEH TREIKAM KI NONGSHET JA SNGI HA KI SKUL LADA YM SIEW BAINONG KA SORKAR

content: Ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar Shnong Par Umkhen, kaba hap ha ki lai tylli ki distrik, kata, ka East Khasi Hills, ka Ri-bhoi bad ka West Jaiñtia Hills kiba pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor ka jingthmu jong ka tnat Pynroi Sor ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynkynriah ia ka Marten na Mawiong sha u Lumsohlait ha ka shnong Nonghali.Ka Synjuk ka la shim ia kane ka rai ha ka jingialang jong ki nongsynshar shnong ka Par Umkhen kaba la long ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep.Ha u kyrwoh khubor ba la phah sha ka Batesi TV, ka Synjuk ka la dawa ia ka tnat Pynroi Sor ba ka dei ban pynsangeh noh mardor ia ka jingthmu ban pynlong ia ka jingpynsngew paidbah (Public Hearing) bad maham ruh lada ka Sorkar ka iaid pyrshah ia ka mon jong ki paidbah na ki 20 tylli tam ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Par Umkhen kin pynlong da ki jingiakhih kiba tyngeh.“Ngi dap da ka jingsngewkhia kaba khraw hadien ba ngi la ioh jingtip ba ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba ka tnat Pynroi Sor ka la don ka jingthmu ban pynkynriah noh ia ka Marten na Mawiong sha ka shnong Nonghali ha u Lumsohlait,” la ong ka Synjuk.“Ki shnong kiba pyndonkam ia ka wah Umkhen, ngi dap da ka jingsngewkhia namar katkum ka jingtip kaba shai lyngba ki dkhot kiba la poi ha kane ka jaka bad kiba la leit peit ia kato ka jaka ki iathuh ba ka jaka (ban pynlong jaka thehniut) ka don ha syndah jong ka Wah umkhen.  Haduh mynta mynne, ki don ki nongshong shnong hapoh ka Par Umkhen kiba shong ha syndah jong ka Wah Umkhen ki pyndonkam ia ka um ban rep ban riang bad ban sum ban sait, wat ban dih ruh ki pyndonkam ia ka Umkhen,” la bynrap ka Synjuk.“Ngi iohi ba kane ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar ban wanrah ia ka Marten sha Nonghali kan ktah haduh katta katta ia ki shnong kiba marjan,” ong ka Synjuk.Ha ka jubab ba ka Synjuk ka la ioh na ka Sorkar Jylla, la iathuh ba ka tnat Pynroi Sor ka la pynkhreh ia ka Environemental Impact Assessment (EIA) bad ia ka Environmental Management Plan (EMP).  Ka Sorkar ka dang don mynta ha ka jingpynkhreh.bad lada ngi peit pat ia ka jingthmu ngi ioh ba mynta ki thmu ban wanrah beit ha Nonghali.  Kane kan ktah ia ka Umkhen kaba ngi pyndonkam lut baroh..Ka Synjuk ka la rai ban phah da ka jingthoh sha sha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar uba peit ruh ka tnat Pynroi Sor ban pynkut noh shisyndon ia ka jingthmu ban wanrah ia ka Marten ha Nonghali.Shuh shuh ka Synjuk ka la shim ia ka rai ban pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah jong ki shnong kiba kynthup ia ki 20 tylli tam ki shnong ba pyndonkam ia ka Wah Umkhen ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah jur ia ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar.
title: THMU KA SORKAR BAN PYNKYNRIAH ÏA KA MARTEN SHA NONGHALI, PYRSHAH KA SNSPU

content: : Ka samla Chivalry Lartang ka la long ka lahduh ban ioh phong ia ka pansngiat Miss Shillong, 2023 katba ka Genevieve Pala ka la ioh phong ia ka pansngiat lahduh ha ka rynsan jingiakob Miss Super Mom 2023 ba la pynlong da ka Fashion Society Shillong, kaba rakhe ruh ia ka jingiaid lynti kaba 40 snem.lKa samla Rachel Rimeiaka Jyrwa ka la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba ar bad ka samla Rebecca Nongkhlaw ka la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba lai ha kane ka rynsan iakob Miss Shillong, 2023.Katba ka Jessica Nongkynrih ka la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba ar bad kaMary Saleen Lyngdoh Mawphlang ka la jop ia ka kyrdan kaba lai ha ka jingiakob Miss Super Mom 2023.Ki nongbishar ha kane ka rynsan iakob ki long ka Wanisha Lyngdoh, u Batista C Lyngdoh, u Bah Fedrick R. Kharkangor bad ka Kong Evarihun Warjri.Ia ka khusnam sha ki nongjop ia ka jingiakob Miss Shillong, Miss Super Mom bad Subtitle Winners la bei da u MDC jong ka Sohryngkham Constituency u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem, katba ia ki jingai sngewbha sha ki nongjop ha ka jingiakob Miss Shillong la bei da ka Rap’s Departmental Store, ka Saree Palace bad ka Haute Lingerie.Ka Chivalry Lartang kaba la long ka lahduh ha ka Miss Shillong ka la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba T.1,00,000, ka Rachel Rimeiaka Jyrwa ka la ioh khur T. 75,000 bad ka Rebecca Nongkhlaw ka la ioh khur T. 50.000Ka Genevieve Pala  kaba la long ka lahduh ha ka Winner of Miss Super Mom ka la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba T. 50,000, ka Jessica Nongkynrih ka la ioh khur T. 30,000, ka Mary Saleen Lyngdoh Mawphlang ka la ioh khur 20,000.Baroh ki nongjop kiba la ioh ia ka nam subtitle ki la ioh pdiang mar T. 5000 hajar.Ia ka nam Miss Beautiful Skin la ioh rah da ka Rachel Jyrwa, Miss Beautiful Hair da ka Rimika Dkhar, Miss Beautiful Eyes la ioh da ka Rebecca Nongkhlaw, Miss Beautiful Smile da ka Kelly Marriane Nongbri, Miss Catwalk da ka Cafilia Namika Sylliang.
title: KA CHIVALRY LARTANG KA LAHDUH MISS SHILLONG, KA GENEVIEVE PALA KA LAHDUH MISS SUPER MOM

content: 6: Ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la lap shibun ki jingduna ha jaka sumar kaba don ha Nongmensong ha ka jingleit jngoh dalade ha ka lah sngi U Blei.Ïa ka Myntri la synran lang da u MDC ka Malki-Laitumkhrah Constituency u Bah Fantin J. Lakadong, ka Director jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. R Ally, ka ka DM&HO ka Dr. Shakina Lyngdoh bad ki nongkitkam jong ka Dorbar Shnong Nongmensong lem bad ki ASHA.Kumba ka long, ha baroh ki dong jong ka nongbah Shillong ka don kawei ka jingeh na ka jingshah ktah ha u drok, ha kajuh ka rukom ha Nongmensong ruh ki shnong ki ïakynduh ïa kane kajuh ka jingeh.Ka jingai tika ïa ki khynnah ha ka shnong Nongmensong ka long tang 57 percent bad kane ka jaka ai jingsumar kaba don ha Nongmensong ka dei kaba la tip kum ka Wellness Centre kaba peit ruh ban ïada ïa ki jingpang kiba ïabit.Ha ka jingïalang kaba lyngkot, ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka la ïamir jingmut kumno ban ïada na ka jingpang Tuberculosis (TB) ban lait ka jingïapur sha kaba kham heh da kaba ai jingpynshai sha ki paidbah ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki paidbah ba ka jingpang TB ka dei kaba lah ban sumar bad ban pynkoit tang lada ki nongpang ki dei kiba dih tista ïa ki dawai dashin.
title: KA JINGPANG TB KA DEI KABA LAH BAN PYNKOIT LADA DIH DAWAI TISTA : DR. AMPAREEN

content: Ki shipai BSF Meghalaya jong ka 181 Battalion kiba ap pahara ha khappud ki la ioh ban pyllait im 70 tylli ki masi na khappud ia kiba la thmu ban khaii be-aiñ sha ka Ri Bangladesh.Ki shipai BSF kiba la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah ki la ai jingtip sha ki Pulit jong ka Meghalaya Police ban ap ktem ha khappud jong ka shnong Silbari, South Garo Hills ha kaba ki la ioh ban kurup 22 tylli ki muid. Ia kine ki muid la aiti noh sha ki Pulit ban leh ia kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.Ha kawei pat ka jingkhynra, ki shipai BSF jong ka 193 Battalion bad 172 Battalion ki la ioh kurup 48 tylli ki masi ba la thmu ban khaii be-aiñ sha ka ri Bangladesh lyngba ka khappud jong ka East Khasi bad ka East Jaiñtia Hills.
title: IOH PYLLAIT IM KI BSF HADUH 70 TYLLI KI MASI BAD KI MUID NA KHAPPUD

content: Ka Myntri jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la kyntu ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka jylla ba ki dei ban kitkhia hi dalade ialade ban leit phah leh Test ha ki jaka sumar kiba don hajan kum ki PHC, CHC, lada ki don ia kano kano ki jingpang khie shit ha ka met namar ba ha kine ki khyndiat taiew mynta u bnai ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka la lap ba ha ki bynta rithor jong ka rilum Garo ka jingpang khie shit ne ka Dengue ka jur bha.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, ka Dr. Ampareen ka la iathuh ba naduh ka 3 tarik haduh ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah hadien ba la leh Test ia ki 25 ngut ki nongpang kiba ioh ia ka jingpang khie shit, la lap ba ki don 6 ngut kiba long Positive.  Nangta, ha ka jingleh test ha ka 4 tarik mynta u bnai ia ki 22 ngut ki briew, la lap ba na kine, ki don sa 9 ngut kiba long Positive.Ka Myntri ka la iathuh ruh ba ka jingpang Dengue ka la dkhat noh ia kawei ka mynsiem briew ha rilum Garo ha kine ki khyndiat sngi hadien ka jingai jingsumar ha Tura Civil Hospital.“Hadien ba ngi la leh Test, ka pynpaw ba ka jingioh ia ka jingpang Dengue ka la hiar na ka 9 tarik bad haduh hynnin ka sngi Palei ki don sa tang 2 tylli ki Case.  Ki paidbah kim dei ban sngewthuh bakla ba kane ka dei ka jingpang COVID.  Ka jingpang Dengue ka dei na ka jingdait skaiñ.  Namarkata, ki paidbah ki dei ban phikir bha ban pynkhuid ia ki sawdong sawkun jong ka iing ka sem khnang ban pynduna ia ka jingkharoi jong ki skaiñ bad ki pyrjong,” la ong ka Dr. Ampareen.“Lada ioh jingpang shit ka bym hiar, kan bha (ia ki nongpang) ban leit marmar sha ka Testing Facility kiba don ha ki PHC, CHC namar ba ngi la pynbna paidbah ia ki Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) ne ki kyndon ba ki (nongpang) hap shim lada ki ioh ia ka jingshit kaba kham kiew,” ka la ong.“Kine ki case ki la kham hiar ha rithor sawdong jong ka jylla jong ngi.  Hynrei lada ki paidbah ki ioh ia ka jingpang khie sht ka bym hiar kan bha ban ki leit marmar sha ki Hospital kiba don hajan ban phah leh Test mardor khnang ban iada ialade,” la kyntu ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ia ki paidbah.“Ngi la iakren ia ki Block Development Officer (BDO) ba ki dei ban shimkhia ia kane ka kam bad ban peit ba u khñiang jingpang Dengue un ym pur ha kane ka jylla,” la iathuh ka Dr. Ampareen.Haba kylli, ka Dr. Ampareen, ka la iathuh ba ha East Khasi Hills District ka jingpang Dengue kam pat ktah satia.Lada ka jingshit kam hiar, hap ban retest biang. Kane kam don jingiadei eiei bad ka jingpang covid.Sha ki bynta Rithor jong ka rilum Garo, ka jingpang Dengue ka la kiew bha.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah, haduh mynta ki don 139 ngut kiba ladep leh Test bad na kine, tang 44 kiba long positive.  Ha ka jingleh test hynin ka sngi Palei ia ki 7 ngut, sa tang ar kiba long Positive.
title: SYLLAD KA JINGPANG DENGUE HA KI BYNTA RITHOR KA RILUM GARO, ÏAP UWEI

content: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka la pan jingiarap na ka World Bank ban weng ia ka jingjaboh ha ki san tylli ki distrik kiba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Council.U Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Council u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem, u la iathuh ba ka Council shen kan sa phah ia ka Detailed Plan of Action ban pyntreikam ia ka Solid Waste Management Programme, katkum ka Solid Waste Management Act, 2020 na ka bynta ban ioh jingkyrshan pisa na ka World Bank.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka KHADC bad ki ophisar jong ka World Bank ki la shong jingialang pyrkhat kam ha ka lah sngi U Blei.“Ngi la kyrpad ia ka World Bank ba kan ai jingiarap naduh kaba pynshai sha ki paidbah ban shna ia ki Resource Recovering Centres (RRC) ki ban iarap ban lum lang shi jaka ia ki jaboh jabaiñ ki bym pyut bad kiba pyut ha ki shnong ki thaw bad ha ki distrik,” ong u Pyniaid ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Kane ka thong ka long ban wanrah ia ka jingkhuid jingsuba.  Ngim kwah ban pynkhuid ia ki jaboh jabaiñ tang na ki shnong lajong bad ban leit bret bad pynjaboh ia kiwei pat ki jaka,” u la ong.U CEM u la iathuh ba ka World Bank ka la kyrpad ia ka KHADC ban leh pynstet noh mar mar ha kaba iadei bad kane ka kam, bad ong, “ka World Bank ka ladep mang lypa ia ka bhah pisa. Namarkata, ngi hap ban aiti shwa ia ka Detailed Plan of Action kumno ban pyntreikam ia ka Solid Waste Management Programme jong ka Council hapoh une u bnai.”Halor kane, u Bah Pyniaid u la ong ba ka Council ka la rai ban iatreilang bad ki dorbar shnong ban pynsngewthuh ia ki paidbah ha ki shnong, ha ki Hima bad ha ki distrik khnang ba ki paidbah kin dup sngewthuh kumno ban lum shi jaka ia ki jaboh jabaiñ khnang ba ym pynjaboh ia ka mei-mariang kynthup ruh ia ki um ki wah. Ia ka jingpynshai paidbah yn sa pynlong ha ki skul bapher bapher bad ha ki Kolej kynthup ruh ha ki jaka iew.Shuh shuh, u la iathuh ba ka Council ka la rai ban ithuh ia ki katto katne tylli ki jaka ban pyntreikam ia ka Pilot Project da kaba shna ia ki RRC.Ia mynta, ka RRC ka dang don tang ha Mawlai Mawroh ha kaba ia ki jaboh jabaiñ ba la lum na ki thliew iing jong ki nongshong shnong ban pyniakhlad ia kiba jaboh kiba pyut bad ki bym pyut. Lyngba ka RRC yn sa pyntreikam biang ia ki tiar kiba dang iaid kam bad kumjuh ruh ban shna sboh na ki jaboh.“Lada ngi jop ha kaba pyntreikam ia ka Pilot Project ha ka RRC kan pynduna ia ka jingtheh jaboh ha Marten bad kumjuh ruh kan kham pynduna khyndiat ia ka jingbret jaboh ha kane ka jaka,” u la bynrap.U CEM u la ong ba ka Council shen kan sa buh ruh da ka dor na ka bynta ka bai lum ñiut bad ban thaw ruh ia ki kyndon ban daiñ kuna pyrshah ia kino kino kiba pynjaboh ia ka mei mariang bad bynrap, “kane kan pynthikna ba kan iada ia ki wah bad ia ki tyllong um.”U la ong ba ka Wahumkhrah bad ka Umshyrpi ki dei ki ar tylli ki nuksa kiba la shah pynjaboh na ka daw ka jingbym lah ban tehlakam ia ka jingbret jaboh pathar.“Ka Executive Committee bathymmai ka la kyrpad ruh ia ka World Bank ban shna ia ka Waste Processing Plant. Kane kan kham shimpor khyndiat,” u la ong.Haba kylli, shaphang ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar ban shim jaka na ka bynta ban pynlong jaka thehñiut, u Bah Pyniaid u la ong, “ka Sorkar lada kam kren shai balei ka donkam ban wad jaka, mano ban mynjur ban ai ia ka jaka.”Ha ka sngi Baar, ka KHADC bad ka World Bank kin sa leit jurip ruh ia ka Wah Umkhen, ia ka shnong Umpling, bad Pynthorumkhrah, ia ka RRC ha ka shnong Mawlai Mawroh bad ia ka jaka thehñiut ha Marten.
title: PAN JINGÏARAP KA KHADC NA KA WORLD BANK BAN PYNTREIKAM ÏA KA SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT HA KI 5 DISTRICT

content: Kum shi bynta ka jingrakhe ia ka jingdap 50 snem lane ka Golden jubilee ka Meghalaya Board of School Education ha ka Sngi Balang ka la pynlong ia ka Inter School Choir Competion halor ka phang “Celebrate the past, Embrace the present and Rise to the Future” kaba la long ha U Soso Tham Auditorium, Shillong, ba la iashim bynta da ki 8 tylli ki skul na East Khasi Hills District bad ki nongbishar ha kane ka jingiakop rwai ki long u Bah B. Latam, ka kong P. Warjri bad u Bah W.Nongsiej.Ha kane ka jingiakop rwai ia ka nam lahduh la ioh rah da ka Synod Higher Secondary School ryngkat kaba la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba 30 hajar tyngka, ka St.Mary’s Higher Secondary School kaba la wan baar ka la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba 20 hajar tyngka bad ka Kiddies Corner Higher Secondary School kaba la wan balai ka la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba 15 hajar tyngka.La sam ia ki khusnam sha ki nongjop da u Executive Chairman jong ka MBOSE u C.P.Marak uba la long kum u Kongsan ha kane ka sngi, ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Joint Director MBOSE Shillong u Bah Macdonald Marbaniang, ki nonghikai na ki skul bapher bapher, ki kmie ki kpa bad ki khynnah skul.Ka Synod higher secondary school kaba long ka kynhun lahduh ha kane ka rynsan iakob ka la shah jied ban leit rwai ha ka 19 tarik risaw 2023 ha Tura ha ka sngi pynhap pyrda ia kane ka jingrakhe dap 50 Snem jong ka MBOSE.
title: LAHDUH KA SYNOD HSS HA KA JINGÏAKOB RWAI DAP 50 SNEM KA MBoSE

content: Ki paidbah nongrep kiba shong basah ha ka thain Block II, haduh mynta ki dang mad ia ka jingeh na ka daw ka jingpynieng khyrdop khrong khajna da ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) da kaba oh khajna T. 7 hajar bad 8 hajar tyngka na ki marrep ba kynthup ia u Synsar bad u Sying.Ia kane la pyntip da u President jong ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Border Area Raid Nongtung, u Bah Blik Sohtun ha ka jingiakynduh ia u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Bah Sohtun, ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) ka la pynieng kumba 5 tylli eiei ki khyrdop khrong khajna, kata, ha ka shnong Jatalong, Sabuda, Umjaknieh, Madan Umwang bad ha ka shnong Mawsladieng.U Bah Blik Sohtun u la iathuh ba ka Synjuk ka ladep ban pynsngew ia kane ka jingeh sha ka District Council bad na ka liang jong u Bah Pyniaid marmar u la telephone ia u Chief Executive Member jong ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) halor ka jingdon jong kine ki khyrdop khrong khajna bad na ka liang jong ka Synjuk mynta ki la shanniah beit ha ka KHADC ban leh eiei halor kane.U MLA jong ka Mawhati Constituency u Bah Charles Marngar uba long ruh ha kajuh ka por u MDC u la iathuh ba kum u nongmihkhmat ba ki paidbah ki la phah ia u sha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u ladep pynpaw ia ka jingsngewhun namar ba ha ka thain Block-II kam ju don shuh ka jingshah pynthut jong ki paidbah Khasi bad halor ka jingpynieng ia ki khyrdop khrong khajna da ka KAAC, na ka liang jong u Bah Charles u la iathuh ba u ladep ban pynsngew ia kane hapoh ka Ingdorbar Thawain jong ka Jylla.
title: 8 HAJAR SHI PICK UP, KHRONG KHAJNA KA KAAC NA KI NONGREP KHASI HA BLOCK II

content: U Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la byrthen ba ka Executive Committee jong u kam salia ban hiar shimiet shimiet sha Block-II lada ki paid Khasi kiba sah ha kane ka thaiñ kin dang iai mad ia ki jingshah pyndik ba harrukom ha ka Sorkar Assam.Ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ka la sdang ban wan phai biang ha ka thain Block II hadien ka jingiakynduh hapdeng ki nongmihkhmat na ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council bad ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council dang shen ha nongbah Shillong ha u bnai Nailur mynta u snem.U Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, ‘lada ki dang don kiba pynwit ia ki Khasi kiba sah ha kane ka thain na ka liang jong ka Executive Committee kam salia ban hiar shiteng miet sha Block II.”Kane ka jingbyrngem jong u Bah Pyniaid ka long hadien ba ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Border Area (SRSBA), Raid Nongtung ki la iakynduh ia u Bah Pyniaid na ka bynta ban ai khublei hadien ba ka thain Block-II ka la mad biang sa shisien ia ka shongsuk shongsain khlem da don shuh ka jingshah pyndik.
title: NGIM SALIA BAN HIAR SHITENG MIET SHA BLOCK II, LADA SHAH PYNWIT KI KHASI: CEM KHADC

content: : Ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la rai ban leit sorjamin hi dalade ban lap ia ki jingduna jong ki jaka sumar paidbah ha ka thain War Jaintia hadien ba la ioh ia ka jingujor na ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council War Jaintia Council ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) War Jaintia Council ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha ka Myntri ka tnad ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ban dawa ia ka sorkar ban kyntiew kyrdan bad ban maramot noh ia ka Primary Health Centre kaba don ha ka shnong Pdengshakap, ha Jaraiñ bad ha ka shnong Dawki bad kumjuh ruh ia ka State Dispensary kaba don ha ka shnong Padu bad ia ka community Health Center (CHC) kaba don ha ka shnong Nongtalang kaba hap hapoh ka Amlarem Civil sub-division.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President jong ka seng u Bah u Tohmondiam Mukhim u la ong ba ka seng ka la lap ba ki don shibun ki jingduna haba ki dkhot jong ka seng ki la leit ban wad jingtip bad leit jurip ia kine ki jaka ai jingsumar kiba dang hap hapoh ka Amlarem Civisl Sub-division.U Bah Mukhim u la iathuh ba ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ka la kubur ban shimkhia ia kane ka jingpyngew jong ka seng bad ha ka 14 tarik mynta u bnai Risaw, 2023 kan sa leit sorjamin hi dalade ia ka jinglong jingman jong kine ki jaka ai jingsumar khnang ban lap da la ki jong ki khmat.
title: BUN KI JINGDUNA HA KI JAKA SUMAR KA WAR JAIÑTIA, YN HIAR  TOHKIT KA DR. AMPAREEN

content: Hadien lai snem duna ba u Myntri Robert Feller Kharbuki na Lawmei uba mihkhmat sha ka Hima Mylliem u la khlad noh na kane ka sla pythei, ka kur Kharbuki ha ka 13 tarik u Risaw, 2023 ka la ioh ia u Myntri uba thymmai uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Zubestar Kharbuki u ban mih bujli na ka bynta ka kur.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ka Kur Kharbuki, ha ka Dorbar Kur kaba la long ha ka shnong Lawmei ha ka 19 tarik, Nailar 2023, da kawei ka jingmut bad da ka jingiahun lang baroh kiba la wan sha ka Dorbar, ka la jied ia u Bah Zubestar Kharbuki ba un mih pateng kum u Myntri jong ka Kur Kharbuki, Lawmei.Da ka jingsakhi lang jong ka Kur Kharbuki na Lawmei, ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka ophis jong u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem ka la pynkhamti da ka Sanad kum ka jingpynskhem ia u Bah Zubestar Kharbuki kum u Myntri jong ka Kur Kharbuki, Lawmei bad ban ithuh noh ia u kum u Myntri bathymmai jong ka Kur Kharbuki ban mihkhmat sha ka Hima.Ka Hima Mylliem ka la ai jingithuh ia u Myntri Zubestar Kharbuki katkum ka riti ka dustur bad ruh katkum ki kyndon ka aiñ, “The Khasi Hills Autonomous District (Appointment and Succession of Syiem, Deputy Syiem, Electors and Rangbah Shnong of Mylliem Syiemship) Act, 2007 bad ka Admistration of Mylliem Syiemship Rule, 2015.“Phi dei ban bud bad ban kohnguh ia ki hukum bad ki jingbthah na kane ka Dorbar u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem ha baroh ki kam katkum ka riti, ka dustur bad ka Aiñ kiba la mih ne ban dang iai pynmih n aka por sha ka por kiba iadei bad ka Hima Mylliem,” ong ka Sanad ba la pule da u Syiem jong ka Hima Mylliem.“Phi dei ruh ban iatreilang bad ka Dorbar u Syiem Hima Mylliem ha baroh ki kam. Ladas hem ba phi pynkheiñ ia kitei ki kyndon u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem bad ka Dorbar u don ka hok ban weng noh ne pynsangeh ia phi na ka jinglong Myntri,” la pynkynmaw shuh shuh u Syiem ha ka Sanad bad bynrap, “borabor phin ri ia ka iktiar ba la pynkuup ha phi da ka burom na ka bynta ialade bad ia ki kur ki jait lajong.”Na ka liang jong u Rangbah Kur bad u Secretary jong ka Kur Kharbuki u Bah Highborn Kharbuki, haba pynithuh ia u Bah Zubestar Kharbuki hakhmat u Syiem jong ka Hima Mylliem ki la pynpaw hadien ka jingkhlad noh jong u Myntri Robert Kharbuki kam long kaba suk satia ban ioh ia u Myntri uba thymmai hynrei da kawei ka sur ka Dorbar kaba la long dang shen ka la jied ia u Bah Zubestar Kharbuki kum u Myntri ba thymmai jong ka Kur.U Paiem Ainam Manik Syiem hadien ba la pynkhamti ia ka sanad ha u Bah Zubestar Kharbuki haba kren ha kane jingialang u la kyntu ia u Myntri Kharbuki ba um dei ban leh klet ia ka kur bad ia ki kyndon pyniaid ia ka synshar ka khadar hynrei u dei ban burom bad ban kohnguh ia ki hukum bad ki jingbthah kaba mih na ka dorbar jong u syiem ka Hima Mylliem.U Myntri Zubestar Kharbuki, ha ka jingiakren bad ki nongthoh khubor u la ong ba un ai ka jingiatrei lang sha baroh ki Bakhraw Batri jong ka Hima bad khamtam eh bad u Syiem jong ka Hima Mylliem.
title: HADIEN LAI SNEM DUNA, SHAH JIED U BAH ZUBESTAR KHARBUKI KUM U MYNTRI KA KUR KHARBUKI

content: Shillong, Risaw 13 : Ka KSU ha ka 9 tarik u Risaw 2023 ka la ai da ka dorkhas sha u Chief Engineer ka PWD Roads ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingtei pandal na ka bynta ban leh niam Puja ha surok ba dei peit jong ka PWD namar kane ka wanrah ia ka jingkhapniah, jingdheng kali bad ka jingbym sngewtynnad ban iaid lyngba ki pandal ia ki bym shim dei niam Hindu.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka bynta na ka liang jong ka Office jong ka Deputy Commissioner, ba la lam khmat da i Kong D. Kharshiing iba dei peit ia ki thaiñ Laban ila khot ka jingialang kaba kyrkieh ha 13 tarik u Risaw, 2023 ha Laban Police Station. Ha kane ka jingialang ba la lam khmat da i Kong D. Kharshiing ladon ki nongialam jong ka Laban Puja Committee bad Central Puja Committee, ki nongialam Shnong jong ka Dorbar Shnong Laban, ki members jong ka Office PWD, u Officer In-Charge jong ka Laban Police Station u N. Khan bad ki nongialam jong ka KSU Laban Circle ba la lamkhmat da u President Reuben Najiar bad u General Secretary Jason Laloo.Ha kane ka jingialang na ka liang ka KSU Laban Circle ka la pynsngew ia ka jingujor ka jong ki halor ka jingbym iahap ban shna bad kyntiew pandal nalor ka surok PWD ba pyndonkam lut ki paidbah.Na ka liang jong ka Laban Puja Committee ka la mynjur ia ka jingai jingmut jong ka Seng ba nym shna shuh ia ki Pandal ha ki surok bad shuh shuh ki la kular ruh ban pynbun ia ki volunteers ki jong ki ba kan ym pynkhapniah ia ka surok ka synkein bad ban peit ban khmih ba ka jingleh niam kan iaid beit iaid ryntih khlem pynthud iano iano ruh.Na ka liang ka Seng ka la buh ruh ia ka jingmaham ia ki nongialam jong ka Puja Committee ba ka nyngkong ki dei ban peit ia ka jingkhuid ka jingsuba ha ki jaka lehniam ka jong ki bad ym dei ban Bret pathar ia ki nuit sha surok bad ha shnong ha thaw, ba kim dei ban pynheh jingrwai palat ban ia ka por ba lah buh na ka liang jong ka Deputy Commissioner. Bad kaba kham kongsan ba kin batai ia ki para riewniam Hindu lyngba ki lad pathai khubor ne ha kano kano ka rukom kaba ki sngew dei ban leh ba ym bit ia ki riew lehniam ne ki paidbah ba wan peit ne leh Puja ba kin dih buaid bad pynhuri hura ha ki Shnong ki thaw ha ka por Puja. Kane ka long ba ka Seng ka ju lap man ba dei Puja ba ki don katto katne ngut ki ba ju shim kabu ha ka por Puja ban iashoh iadat bad pynhuri hura ruh ha ki shong ki thaw bad kumjuh ruh bunsien ki aksiden ha ki por mynmiet ki ju jia man la kapor namar ka jingdih buaid palat ki briew ba wan Puja.
title: MYNJUR KI PUJA COMMITTEE HA LABAN BAN NYM SHNA PANDAL HA SUROK PWD HADIEN KA JINGUJOR KA KSU LABAN CIRCLE

content: Ki Pulit jong ka kynhun Anti Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) jong ka East Jaintia Hills District ha ka sngi Baar ha ka por kumba 6:00 baje mynstep ki la ioh kurup ia u dawai Amphetamine (Cryrstal Meth) uba khia 1.017 kilo uba shongdor haduh T.1.15 klur shi kilo ha ka iew khaii beaiñ.Ki Pulit ANTF jong ka East Jaintia Hills District, kiba la pynlong ia ka jingtalasi ia ki kali ha surokbah National Higwhway-06 ha ka shnong Nongsning ki la iohbat ia kawei ka Bos Night Super kaba don ia u nombar AS01-LC-6216 kaba dang wan na Aizawl, Mizoram.Ha ka jingtalasi, ki Pulit ki la bat noh ia u Joseph Hmangaih Zula (46 snem ka rta) halor ka jingsuba ba u dei uba donkti ban rah beaiñ ia kine ki dawai kuli.Ia une uba la shah bat, bad ia ki tiar jong u la kurup noh da ki Pulit katkum ki kyndon jong ka NDPS Act, bad ia ka plastic ba la thep ia u dawai Amphetamine uba khia 1.017 kilo..Ha ka jingtohkit lyngba ka jingleh Test, la lap ba u dei u dawai Amphetamine (Crystal Meth).U dawai Crystal Meth u dei u drok  uba khlainbor bha bad u shongdor haduh 1.15 klur shi kilo ha ka iew khaii ha ka iew beain.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Cornad Kongkal Sangma u la ai khublei bad iaroh ia ka tnat Pulit kaba la iohkem ia ki snar khaii drok.U Director General of Police, Meghalaya, Dr. L. R. Bishnoi, u la ai khublei ia u Superintendent of Police bad ia ka kynhun jong u kiba la pynlong ia kane ka jingiohkem ia u snar khaii drok.Halor kane, ki Pulit ki la register da ka criminal case bad kem noh ia u Joseph Hmangaih. Ka jingtohkit halor kane ka dang iaid shakhmat lap ksai sa ia kiwei pat kiba donkti.
title: 1.017 KILO U DAWAI AMPHETAMINE BA SHONGDOR 1.15 KLUR KURUP KI PULIT NA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit lyngba ka Education Cell ha ka sngi Baar ka la phah ia ka shithi sha u Regional Director jong ka National Institute of Open Schooling (NIOS) kum shi bynta ban wanrah bad pynshai sha ki paidbah halor ka sienjam jong ka Sorkar Pdeng khamtam na bynta kito ki briew kiba lah iehnoh shiteng por ia ka pule puthi na ka daw ka jingbym kot bor bad ruh na kiwei pat ki daw.Ka seng ka don ia ka jingthmu ban pynkylla dur ia ki briew lyngba ka pule ka puthi bad ka seng ka la shim iakane ka sienjam ban iohi ia kata, ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Education Secretary ka Seng u Samla Emmon Chyrmang.Ha ka dorkhas ba la phah sha u Regional Director ka NIOS ka seng ka la kyrpad ruh ban pynlong ia ka Awareness Program lane ki Roadshows kumba leh lem ha kiwei ki district bad ruh ban pynshlur ia ki paidbah ka thain ban pynrung kyrteng ha kane ka shlem ai jinghikai.Ka seng ka khmihlynti ba ki bor ba dei peit kin ioh pdiang ia kane ka shithi ba la phah da ka seng bad ruh ban peit lem sha ka thain East Jaintia hi baroh kawei.Ka seng kan sa phah kopi ruh ia kane ka dorkhas sha ki bor ba dei peit jong ka NIOS Shillong Centre, sha ka DSEO, sha u DC bad ruh sha ki District Mission Coordinator ka NIOS bad sha u Director of School Education and Literarcy  ba kin buddien lem.Ka seng lyngba ka dorkhas ka la dawa ruh ban buh ruh ia ki Examination Centres ha ka district khnang ba kiba iakhun ia ka eksamin ba la pynlong da ka NIOS kin kham suk ha ka leit ka wan.
title: KYRPAD KA KSU ÏA KA NIOS BAN BUH ÏA KI SHLEM THOH EKSAMIN HA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS

content: Ka Seng Samla Catholic Mawkynrew Parish kum shi bynta ban khring ia ki paidbah sha ki jaka jngoh kai pyrthei ha ka thaiñ Mawkynrew kan pynlong da ka Sohphlang Festival ba shisngi bad ruh ban pyni nam ia ki jingbam tynrai ba ka dong ka thain ka pynmih.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Nongaibuit jong ka Seng Samla ka Parish u Bah Carmel Lyngdoh u la pynpaw ba kane ka tamasa bam Soh Phlang kan dei ha ka sien ba nyngkong eh ban sa pynlong ha kane ka jylla.U Bah Pynbianglang Kshiar uba long u President jong ka Seng Samla Parish Mawkynrew u la pynpaw ba ia kane ka tamasa yn pynlong ha ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai phyllaw jong ka Holy Cross School, Mawkynrew.Ka jingthmu ban pynlong ia kane ka tamasa ka long ruh kum shibynta ban kyntiew ia ki nongrep Soh Phlang jong ka thain kum ha ka shnong Mawleiñ, Pingwait nalor kiwei pat.
title: DA KA SOH PHLANG FESTIVAL YN PYNLONG KA SSCMP, BAN KYNTIEW ÏA KI NONGREP

content: Ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong RM Kurbah ka la thung da ka Magisterial Enquiry ne ka jingtokit majistor halor ka jingpluh jong ka iing mala ki Singhania ha ka 14 tarik mynta u bnai ha Thana Road, Khyndai Lad kaba long ruh ka kad khaii kaba ju thnem da ki nongdie bad ki nongthied hynrei kaba khapngiah ha ka leit ka wan.U Sanjay Goyal uba long u Commissioner & Secretary uba peit ia ka tnat Revenue Disaster Management jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba ka Deputy Commissioner ka ladep thung ia ka jingtohkit majistor bad la khmih lynti ba ia ka kaiphod yn sa aiti hapoh ka 10 sngi.Ia kane ka jingtohkit yn khlieh da u Additional Deputy Commissioner ban tih bniah ia ka daw tynrai halor ka jingsdang jong ka ding kaba la pynkylla dpei ia ka ïing jong ki Singhania ha Khyndai Lad.U Goyal u la iathuh ruh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la rai ban pynlong da ka jingtohkit ban lap haduh katno tylli ki ïing Sorkar bad ki ïing jong ki riewshimet kiba la kynjoh sha ka rta kaba 50 haduh 70 snem ki long kiba shngain haba jia kum kine ki jingjia ki bym poi pyrkhat.U la ong ba ka Sorkar kan sa wad ia ka Professional Agency ka ban peit bad ka ban sa bishar bniah ia ka jinglong jingman jong ki ïing mala jong ki paidbah kiba la rim bad ki ïing jong ka Sorkar khnang ban iada lypa lada jia ba wan lynshop kano kano ka jingjia kaba sngewsih ha ka khyllipmat bym poi pyrkhat.
title: THUNG DA KA DC DA KA MAGISTERIAL ENQUIRY BA PLUH KA ÏING MALA KI SINGHANIA HA KHYNDAI LAD

content: Ka jingjyllei jong ki bar jylla kiba khaïi bad kiba trei be-aiñ ha kylleng ki district kiba dang hap hapoh u pud treikam jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka la pynlong ia ka Meghalaya Peoples Labour Union (MPLU) ban leit ujor ui Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ha ka sngi Baar.Katkum ka jingujor jong ka Union, ka jingseng kam beain bad ka jingioh trei laitluid jong ki bar jylla ki long kum ha Byrnihat, ha EPIP, ha 13 Mile bad ha baroh kawei ka Raid Marwet kaba hap ha Ribhoi District, ha ka shnong Shallang ha kaba ha ki karkhana sain rnga dewiong la tyllep da ki bar jylla ki bym don ia ki kot ki sla kiba biang, ha Ichamati, ha Kalibari, ha Majai bad ha baroh ki shnong khappud jong ka South West Khasi Hills district, ha Borsora, ha Cherragoan bad ha Bagli, kiba hap hapoh ka West Khasi Hills.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka Union hapoh ka jingialam jong u General Secretary u Bah B. Basaiawmoit ka la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ban kyrpad ia ka District Council ban khynra naphang ia kine ki jaka ba ki bar jylla ki trei laitluid khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang bad pynpaw ruh ba ka Union ka long kaba kloi ban ai ka jingiatreilang bad ka Council ha kaba iadei bad kane ka bynta.
title: MUDUI KA MPLU HA KA KHADC BA JYLLEI KI BAR JYLLA KIBA KHAÏI BAD TREI BE-AIÑ

content: Da kaba buh hakhmat ia ka thong ban kyntiew ia ka sap ka phong ialehkai jong ki khynnah ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya, ka Lynti jam Football Centre ka la pynbna paidbah ban pynlong ia ka lympung ialehkai phutbol kaba la tip kum ka Sunfeast Football Cup 2023. Ia kane ka lympung ialehkai yn sa pynsdang naduh ka 26 tarik haduh ka 31 Tarik Risaw, 2023 ha madan Mawlein Mawkhan kaba don ha Ribhoi District.U President jong ka Lynti jam Football Centre, u Bah Sumarlang Swer u la iathuh ba ha kane ka lympung ialehkai yn plie lad ha ki ar bynta, kawei na ka bynta ki khynnah skul bad kawei pat na ka bynta khynnah kiba ialehkai na ki Club. Ia kane ka tournament yn pynlong na ka bynta ki heprit shynrang kiba hapoh ka rta kaba 13 snem bad na ka bynta ki kynthei ha ka rta kaba hapoh 16 snem.
title: PLIE LAD KA SUNFEAST FOOTBALL CUP 2023 ÏA KI KHYNNAH ÏALEHKAI PHUTBOL KA MEGHALAYA

content: Ka kynhun Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Balang ka la mynjur ïa ka Meghalaya Street Vendors (Protection of Livelihood and Regulation of Street Vending) Scheme 2023, bad lyngba kane ka kyndon yn peit ïa ka bit ka biang jong ki nongdie madan bad ha kajuh ka por yn peit ba ka ki nongdie madan kin ym pynwit ïa ki nongiaid lynti, ïa ki kali, ïa ka jingkhapngiah ki lynti iaid kjat.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba long u Myntri bad u Nongaiktien jong ka Sorkar Jylla u la iathuh ba lyngba kane ka skim, ka sorkar kan sa sorjamin ban lum jingkhein ia ka jingdon jong ki nongdie madan khnang ban lap ïa ki nongdie madan kiba ladep ïoh jingithuh bad ki nongdie madan ba shu wan die kumto shisien lano.U la pyntip ba ki nongdie madan ki dei ban don ïa ka EPIC ba la ai da ka tnad Election jong ka Ri, ki don ïa ki syrnot ba pynshisha ba ki dei ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya na ka bynta lai snem.“Ki nongdie madan ki dei ban long kiba la shong die madan harud surok ha kato ka jaka kaba duna eh ruh na bynta 6 bnai bad ba kin don ruh ïa ki Trading Licence kiba biang ha ki jaka ba hap shabar jong ka Shillong Municipal Board,” la iathuh u Bah Paul.Ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka rai ka long hadien ba ka sorkar ka la ïoh pdiang ïa ki jingai jingmut na kiba bun la ka long naduh ki Autonomous District Council, na ka KSU, na ki Rangbah Shnong bad na ka synjuk ki nongdie madan bad kiwei kiwei ki kynhun.U la pyntip ruh ba ka Sorkar kan sa phah sorjamni ïa ki nongdie madan bad pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka kam. U ong ruh ba kane kan kynthup ruh wat ïa ka jingjied ïa ki jaka hangno ban shah shong die madan bad hangno ba yn ym shah.U la iathuh ba ka Sorkar kan sa shim ïa ka rai ban buh da ka jaka die jingdie na ka bynta ki nongdie madan bad ka iew na ka bynta jong ki. Shwa kane, u Myntri u la pyntip ba ka jingpynrung kyrteng kan shim por sa katto katne por bad kan sa bud pat sa ka jingpeit ïa ki jaka ban buh ïa ki jaka ban shong ki nongdie madan.U la ïaiban ruh ba ki lynti ïaid kjat jong ki paidbah kim dei da leilei ban shah ba yn pynlong ki jaka iadie iathied.“Ngin sa jied ïa ki jaka ban die madan ka ban ym ktah ïa ki leit ka wan jong ki kali, ïa ki paidbah ba ïaid ba ieng bad ki ban ym pynthut ïa ka suk ka sain lane ban ym don ka jingkhapngiah.”
title: MYNJUR KA SORKAR ÏA KI KYNDON DIE MADAN, YN THAW DA KA VENDING SCHEME BAN YM PYNWIT ÏA KA LEIT KA WAN

content: Ka Naga Students’ Union (NSU) Shillong, ka Angami Elders’ Forum (AEF) Shillong, ka Angami Students Union (ASU), Shillong, bad ka NEHU Students’ Union kynthup ruh ka Naga Students of NEHU (NSNEHU) ki la shahniah beit ha ka jingtohkit jong ki Pulit ka Tura Police Station ïa ka jingshah pynlaw lyngkhuid jong uwei u samla pule dang shen hapoh ka hostel jong ka NEHU Campus, Tura.Ha ka jingïalang ba la don lang da ki nongmihkhmat na ka North-Eastern Hill University (NEHU), ba kynthup ïa u Prof. S.R. Joshi, u Registrar, ka Prof. Lucy Zehol, u Chairman jong ka Fact Finding Committee la bynshet ban tohkit ïa katei ka jingjia ha NEHU Tura Campus.Kine ki kynhun ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingbym poi jong u Vice Chancellor ka NEHU sha ka jingïalang, watla u Lat ka Jylla u la bthah ban shong jingïalang kyrkieh halor kane ka jingjia.Ha ka jingïalang, la pyntip ba u Vice Chancellor u ladep mudui da ka ejahar ha Tura Police Station ha ka 14 tarik mynta u bnai, bad kitei ki kynhun ki la aiti beit ïa ka jingshaniah ha ki bor jong ka aiñ ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh da kaba pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor ka jingjia ba dang shen.Kane ka jingshimkhia jong ki bor pynïaid ka skulbah ka dei kawei na ki mat jingdawa ba la pynsngew da ka Naga Students’ Union (NSU) Shillong ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai.Halor ka jingkyrpad jong ka NSUS, ka Angami Elders’ Forum Shillong, ka Angami Students Union Shillong, ka NEHU Students’ Union, bad ka Naga Students of NEHU, lai tylli ki jingthoh yn aiti da ka NEHU da ki bahaing hasem jong u samla pule uba la kylla long u lanot lane sha ki nongmihkhmat jong u.Ki lai tylli ki jingthoh ki long, ka kopi jong ka ejahar ba la ujor da u Vice Chancellor sha ki Pulit ka Tura ha ka 14 tarik, mynta u bnai, ka kopi jong ka kaiphod ba la lum da ka Internal Fact Finding Committee halor kane ka jingjia bad ka jingkular jong u Vice Chancellor ka NEHU ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti, ban pyrkhing mardor ïa kino kino ki kam pohdor ba pynisaitmet da kaba pyntreikam ïa ka UGC Anti-Ragging Laws, bad ka jingpyntip lano ki Pulit kin ai ïa ka kaiphod tohkit.Kitei ki kynhun ki la pynpaw ruh ba ki don ka jingshaniah ha ki Pulit jong ka Tura Police Station bad ha ki bor pynïaid jong ka skulbah NEHU khnang ba ka kynhun kaba donkti ban leh ïa ki kam be-aiñ ki dei ban ngat ha ki kyndon ba tyngeh jong ka aiñ.Ki la kyrpad ruh ïa ki bor pynïaid jong ka NEHU bad ïa ki Pulit ka Tura ba kin pynstet ha kaba tohkit ïa kane ka jingjia khnang ban pynïoh kham kloi ïa ka hok jong u lanot.
title: DEP UJOR EJAHAR U VC BA SHAH PYNLAW LYNGKHUID U SAMLA PULE NEHU HA HOSTEL TURA CAMPUS

content: Ki nonghikai jong ki skul Deficit kiba la shongthait na ka kam hikai skul kiba la thaw ïa ka shatri Meghalaya Retired Deficit School Teachers Association (MRDSTA) ha ka sngi Balang ki la aiti da ka jingthoh ha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ban buddien halor ka jingdawa ïa ka baibam tymmen ne Pension kaba ki dei ban ïoh katkum ba la mynjur da ka 5th Pay Commission.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President jong ka Association u Bah E.D Nongsiang u la ïathuh ba ki don kumba 2000 ngut ki nonghikai jong ki skul Deficit ha ka Jylla baroh kawei, kata na rilum Khasi, Jaiñtia bad na rilum Garo kiba la shongthait na ka kam bad kiba ap khmih lynti ban ïoh ïa ka baibam tymmen na ka Sorkar kaba kim pat ïoh satia haduh mynta mynne.U Bah Nongsiang u la ïathuh ba kane ka jingdawa ban ïoh ïa ka baibam tymmen ka la kynjoh mynta la kumba 50 snem hynrei haduh mynta ka Sorkar Jylla kam pat shim ïa kano kano ka sienjam ban pyllait ïa ka song pisa.“Jan baroh ki Jylla ki siew ïa ka baibam tymmen sha ki nonghikai skul hynre ha ka jylla Meghalaya la pynduh ïa ki nonghikai skul ba la shongthait ban ïoh ïa kane ka jingmyntoi,” ong u Bah Nongsiang.“Ka jingdawa ban ïoh ïa ka baibam tymmen ka dei kaba la slem bad ka don ruh ka jingkular na ka Sorkar ban siew ïa ka baibam tymmen hynrei haduh mynta kam pat leh eiei. Ngi la aiti biang da ka jingthoh kum ka jingpynkynmaw ïa u Myntri Rangbah,” u la ong.U Myntri Rangbah u la pyntip sha ki nongïalam ka Association ba un sa khot ïa ki ophisar jong ka tnat Pule Puthi ban ïathir ïatai sani halor ka jingsiew baibam tymmen sha ki nonghikai skul Deficit.Haba kylli, u la ong, “ka jingdawa ka dei kaba la don la jan sanphew snem lane shwa jong kata. Ngi ruh ha kine ki 20-30 snem ngi la ïai dawa shi dawa naduh ka por ba ngi dang shakri kum ki nonghikai ruh ngi la dawa hynrei kam poi shano shano ruh.  Mynta ngi la shongthait bad ngim ïoh eiei shuh na ka Sorkar.  Lada u Myntri Rangbah u sngewsynei lem ïa ngi ki nonghikai, lehse un sa leh eiei na ka bynta jong ngi kumba u la kular ba un sa khot ïathir ïatai shwa ïa ki ophisar.Ha kane ka jingïakynduh ïa u Myntri Rangbah ki don ruh ki nonghikai skul Deficit kiba la shongthait kiba la wan khnang na rilum Garo ban pynsngew ïa kane ka jingdawa hakhmat jong u Myntri Rangbah.
title: 50 SNEM ÏAKHUN KI NONGHIKAI SKUL BAN ÏOH ÏA KA BAIBAM TYMMEN NA KA SORKAR

content: Ka Kur Kharbuki  na ka thain Mawpat bad Umsning ha ka sngi Balang ki la ieng pyrshah ïa ka jingai Sanad jong u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem ban pynskhem ïa ka jinglong Myntri jong u Bah Zuberstar Kharbuki bad ki la byrngem ban pynlong da ka jingshah thngan hakhmat ka ophis treikam jong ka Ophis u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem lada u Syiem um pyndam noh mardor ïa ka jinglong Myntri jong u Bah Zuberstar Kharbuki hapoh ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai.Ïa u Bah Zuberstar Kharbuki la pynskhem kum u Myntri jong ka kur Kharbuki da u Syiem jong ka Mylliem Mylliem u Pa’iem Ainam Manik Syiem ha ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai da kaba pynkhamti ruh ïa ka Sanad jinglong Myntri jong ka Kur Kharbuki.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President jong ka Kur Kharbuki Bah Diprilang Kharbuki u la kynnoh ba ka jingleh jong u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem ka dei ka jingsynshar donbor namar ba ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai Risaw ki la buh ïa ka dorkhas ban pyrshah hynrei na ka liang u Syiem ha ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai u la aiti syndon noh da ka Sanad ha u Bah Zuberstar Kharbuki ban pynskhem ïa ka jinglong Myntri jong u.U Bah Cornilius Kharbuki u la pynpaw ba ka Seng Kur Kharbuki na ka shnong Lawmei ka shu leh donbor ïa ka kam jied Myntri wat hadien ba la don ka jingdawa ban pynlong da ka elekshon bad u la kynnoh ruh ba ki la shu leh sop sop bad ha ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai la pynskhem ïa u Bah Zuberstar Kharbuki kum u Myntri na Lawmei ban mihkhmat sha ka ophis jong u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem na ka Kur Kharbuki.U Bah Krinson Kharbuki uba dei na ka thain Umsning Ri bhoi District u la pynpaw ba u Syiem u dei ban pyndam noh mardor ïa ka jinglong Myntri jong u Zubestar Kharbuki hapoh ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai Risaw hynrei lym kumta ka kur Kharbuki na Umsning bad na Mawpat kim banse ban dawa ïa ka hok da kaba leit shong shah thngan shynrang bad kynthei hakhmat ka ophis treikam jong u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem ha Mawkhar.
title: PYRSHAH BA PYNSKHEM MYNTRI ÏA U BAH ZUBESTAR, BYRNGEM SHAH THNGAN HA OPHIS U SYIEM MYLLIEM

content: : U Myntri ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la pynphai nia sha ka STIEH da kaba ong, “manla ka sngi ka dei ka sngi khuid sngi kyntang bad kam dei satia tang kawei ka sngi ka sngi khuid katba kiwei pat ki sngi jong ka taiew ki dei ki sngi bym khuid.”Kane ka jingpynphai nia jong u Bah Paul ka long halor ka jingpyrshah jong ka seng Saiñdur Tipkur Tipkha Ehrngiew Hynniewtrep (STIEH) ban pynkut ïa ka tamasa Shillong Cherry Blossom ha ka sngi U Blei, kata ha ka 19 tarik, Naiwieng, 2023. Kane ka tamasa kan sa long ha madan Kurkalang, Bhoirymbong naduh ka 17 tarik Naiwieng haduh ka 19 tarik Naiwieng, kaba hap ha ka sngi U Blei.“Manla ka sngi ka dei ka sngi khuid bad ka sngi kyntang bad kam mut ba ki briew ki long khuid bad ngeit Blei tang ha kawei ka sngi jong ka taiew katba kiwei pat ki sngi ki long ki bym khuid,” la pynphai nia u Bah Paul.Katei ka tamasa kaba ka sorkar ka pynkhreh ban pynlong shen ha u bnai ban wan la khmihlynti ba ki nongwan kai na kylleng ki bynta jong ka pyrthei kin poi  sha ka shi lak ngut eiei.Ha kitei ki sngi ka Sorkar ka la pynbna ruh ba kin don bun ki nongtem ba pawnam na shabar nalor ki nongtem nongput kiba kynsai na kane ka jylla.
title: MANLA KA SNGI DEI KA SNGI KHUID, PYNPHAI ÑIA KYLLA U BAH PAUL ÏA KA STIEH

content: Shillong, Risaw 19: U President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala ha ka sngi Palei u la ong ba ka Congress kam don jingwit ban ïatreilang bad kino kino ki seng saiñpyrthei hynrei lait noh bad ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP).U Bah Pala u la pynpaw ïa kane halor ka jingkylli ba ka Congress ka la ai jingkyrshan ïa ka Executive Committee (EC) ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ba la ïalam da ka National People’s Party (NPP) watla ka dei ka B-team jong ka BJP. Ïa ka Sorkar MDA ba la ïalam da ka NPP la kyrshan da ka BJP.Ka NPP ka la pynkylllem ïa ka EC ba la ïalam da ka UDP ha KHADC da ka jingkyrshan jong ka Seng Congress.“Ki seng saiñpyrthei kin ym pyndonkam tang na kawei ka liang hynrei kin pyndonkam na kiba bun ki liang bad ka jingïatreilang jong ngi ha District Council ka long namarba ki ïashrut pamaki (ki paralok ka MDA-ka UDP bad NPP) bad ngi pyrkhat sani lada ka wan ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ka Sixth Schedule bad lada ka NPP ka kyrpad ïa ki nongïalam jong ngi ngi pyrkhat balei ngin shu ieh ïa la ka jong ka ‘jaidbynriew’, ngi ruh ngi don ka hok ban ai ïa ki jingsngew halor ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ka Sixth Schedule. Palat ne duna, ki don kumba 6 tylli ki jingpynbeit thymmai kiba kham heh ha ka Sixth Schedule. Dei ban buh  jingmut ruh ba ka District Council hi ka dei kaba ïada ïa ka lariti, ka riti ka dustur bad ïa ka thymmei jong ki riewlum ritpaid bad ïa ki jaka ki puta jong ki bad kine ki ishu ha District Council ki ïapher na ki ishu ha ka Jylla, namarkata, ngim don jingwit ban ïatreilang bad kano kano ka seng saiñpyrthei, hynrei lait noh bad ka BJP,” la ong u Bah Pala ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai  khubor.U Bah Pala u la ïathuh ruh ba ka rai ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka EC ba la ïalam da ka NPP ha KHADC la shim hadien ka jingïasyllok kaba bniah bad ki nongïalam ha Delhi.“Ki (nongïalam na Delhi) ong ba ngim don jingwit eiei ban ïatreilang bad kiwei kiwei ki seng saiñpyrthei namarba lada ngi ïatreilang bad ki, kam mut ba ngin shah tyllep pat ïa ka saiñpyrkhat jong ki bad ngin ïai bteng ban ïaineh beit bad ka saiñpyrkhat jong ka Congress,” u la ong bad bynrap, “kiwei kii lah ban ong katba ki kwah ban ong hynrei ka jingshisha hi ka long ba ka BJP  kam don satia ha District Council bad kaba ar, ngi hap ban buh shwa ïa ki mat ki jura jong ka jaidbynriew hakhmat.  Ïa ka District Council la pynkha hapoh ka Khyrnit Bahynriew. Lada ngi shu ieh lut tang ha ki, ka UDP bad ka NPP kin ym pyrkhat than shaphang kane hynrei ngi hap ban pyrkhat sani bha ïa kane ka kam kaba khia.Shuh shuh, une u MP ka Congress na Shillong u la pyntip ba ïa ka Bill ba la pynbeit thymmai jong ka Sixth Schedule la wanrah ha Rajya Sabha ha u snem 2019.“Nangtei kin sa phah ïa kane ka kam sha ka Committee ka ban sa leit jurip sha baroh ki Jylla kiba pyntreikam ïa ka Sixth Schedule. Ka Sorkar Jylla ka ladep ai ïa ki jingai jingmut. Mynta, ka dei pat ka bynta jong ki ban pynrung ïa ki jingai jingmut jong ka Jylla lane jong ka District Councils (hynrei lym kumta) ngam tharai ba yn dang sah eiei shuh lait sa tang ban shu pynbeit thymmai ïa ka Sixth Schedule ka ban shim por tang 2-3 sngi (ban pyndep ïa ka kam),” u la ong.Katkum ka jingong jong u, kaba sah mynta ka long sa tang ban wanrah ïa ka Bill ban ïathir ïatai hapoh ka Parliament.U Bah Pala u la pynpaw ruh ba katkum ka jingsngewthuh jong u, ka BJP ka kwah ban pynbeit thymmai ïa ka Sixth Schedule kaba treikam ha ki 11 tylli ki ADC ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi bad kynthup ruh ha ka jylla Meghalaya.“Kiwei ki jylla ruh ki kwah ïa kane namarba kan plie lynti ban ïoh kham bun ki song pynroi bad ban kyntiew ïa ka jingdon jong ki Seats.  Ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka ladep pynpaw ïa ka jingdonkam ban pynbeit thymmai ïa ka Sixth Schedule,” u la bynrap.
title: NGIM DON JINGWIT BAN IATREILANG BAD KIWEI KI PARTY LAIT NOH ÏA KA BJP: VINCENT PALA

content: Shillong, Risaw 19: U President jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) Bah Vincent H. Pala ha ka sngi Palei u la ïathuh ba ka party ka la long kaba la pynkhreh na ka bynta ka elekshon Lok Sabha bad ka elekshon MDC, ki ban sa long u snem 2024.“Ngi long kiba la pynkhreh ban leit sha ka elekshon lada dei ba ka long ha u bnai Rymphang lane lada ka long ha kano kano ka por. Kane ka shong ha Sorkar Jylla kumno ban pyntip,” ong u Bah Pala haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka lympungbah State Youth Congress Convention ba la pynlong da ka Meghalaya Pradesh Youth Congress (MPYC) ha nongbah Shillong.U la ong ba ka party kan sa phah da ka jingthoh sha baroh ki Block ba kin pynstet noh marmar ban phah ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong ki ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka elekshon sha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council bad sha ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council.“Ïa kane ka kam ngin sa sdang naduh ka lah sngi U Blei ka ban sa wan. Ha ka jingshisha ka jingpyntyllun ïa ka kam ka ju long naduh u Naiwieng bad ïa ka thup kyrteng la ju pynmih paidbah ha u Nohprah bad ngin sa pynbna ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong tang shu pyntip ïa ka tarik ban pynlong ïa ka elekshon,” la ong u Bah Pala bad bynrap ba kan ym don kano ka jingpynkylla bad ba ka State Election Committee (SEC) bad ki District Election Committee (DEC) kin sa shong ban phah ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong.U la ïathuh ruh ka rukom ban jied ïa ki kyrtong kan long hi kumjuh na ka bynta ka elekshon MP bad MDC.Haba kylli, hato kin don neem ki MDC jong ka Congress kiba la pynkhreh ban leit pynïasoh sha kiwei ki party, u Bah Pala ula ong, “ngam don jingtip eiei halor kata namarba u MDC na Mairang um shym la wan sha ka jingïalang (kaba la long dang shen). Ngam lah ban ong eiei lada mano mano kin leit pynïasoh (sha kawei pat ka party) namarba ka aiñ Anti-Defection (ha ki district council) kam treikam satia.”“Ngam lah ban ong lada iwei ne arngut kin mih noh na ka party hynrei ka jingshisha ka long bun kiba la pyntip ïa nga ba ki kwah ban wan pynïasoh sha ka Congress shwa ka elekshon,” u la kam bad ïathuh ba ki don bun ngut ki nongïalam na rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia bad kynthup ruh na rilum Garo kiba la pynpaw ïa ka jingangnud ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon na ka seng Congress.Une u nongïalam ka Seng Congress u la kam ba ki don ruh ki MLA, kiba lah ban aplai tiket na ka bynta ka eleshon MDC. “Ka Party kam don jingwit eiei lada ka aiñ ka shah ïa ki MLA ban ïakhun (ïa ka elekshon MDC),” u la ong.“Dei tad ynda ka kam ka la ïaid shakhmat shwa u Nohprah, ngin sa sngewthuh katno ngut ki kyrtong ba ngin pynïakhun na ka bynta ka elekshon MDC,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh, u Bah Pala u la ong ba ka jingaiti ïa ka tiket na ka bynta ka elekshon MDC kan shong beit ha ka rai jong ki Block namar ba kam don kano kano ruh ka jingtuklar na ka High Command na Delhi.“Ka shong beit ha ka jingstad jong ki Block, ïano kin tyrwa bad ïano kin mynjur kum ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka elekshon MDC.  Uno uno u dkhot jong ka party u don ka hok ban pan tiket.  Lada ym don kyrtong, kino kino kiba kwah ban pynïasoh bad ban pan tiket ki lah ban leh ïa kata bad ngin ym don jingkhang satia ïa kaba kum kata,” u la bynrap.
title: PYNKHREH SHAID SHAID KA CONGRESS SEI KYRTONG HA KA ELEKSHON MDC BAD LOK SABHA

content: Shillong, Risaw 23: Ka Meghalaya Pensioner’s Association (MPA) ha ka sngi Palei jong ka taïew ba la dep ka la pynlong ïa ka jingpynsngewthuh paidbah halor ka shongkha khynnah bad ka jingeh kaba mih na kane.Ki nongai jingkren ha kane ka jingïalang pynshai bad pynsngewthuh kaba la long ha Balawan College, Umsning, Ribhoi District ki long u Dr. Sandor RL Nongbri bad ka Kong Naphibanmer Laso.Kine ki arngut ki nongkren ki la ong ba katkum ka jingtih bniah la lap ba ka jingshong kha khynnah ka jur bha ha ki jaka sor bad kumjuh ruh wat ha ki nongkyndong.Ki la ai jingmut ïa ki kmie ki kpa ba kin long barabor kiba ïajan bad la ki jong ki khun ki kti bad ban ïasyllok bad ki khun manla ka sngi ha kaba ïadei bad ka kam shongkha shongman khlem kano kano ka jinglehraiñ khnang ba ki khun ki kti kin ym shah ïalam bakla ha ka ïaid ka ïeng ha la ki jong ki paralok. Ki kmie ki kpa ki dei ban peit thuh bha ïa ka ïaid ka ïeng jong ki khun ki kti bad ban ïasyllok lang bad ki manla ka por.Ki kmie ki kpa ki dei ban buh jingduwai ïa ki khun manla ka sngi ba ki khun kin ym jam sha u pud u bym dei ha ka rta kaba dang rit.Ban ïarap ïa ki khun samla ban ïoh ïa ki jinghikai kiba thikna ha ki skul bad ki kolej bad ban pynbeit ïa ki jingïathir nia ha ki skul bad ki kolej na ka por sha ka por khnang ba ki khun samla kin dup sngewthuh ban lait na kine ki jingshah riam ha ka shrip jong ka shongkha dang ha ka rta kaba khynnah bad ban lait ruh na ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ki aiñ shongkha shongman.Ha kane ka sngi, la ïashim bynta lang da ki samla pule shynrang bad kynthei, ki rangbah bad ki longkmie bad kynthup ruh ki dkhot jong ka Meghalaya Pensioner’s Association.
title: JUR KA SHONGKHA KHYNNAH HA SOR BAN HA NONGKYNDONG: NONGTIH BNIAH

content: Shillong, Risaw 23: Ki shipai jong ka 4th Battalion Meghalaya ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la pynpulom ïa ka jingthmu jong ki snar khaïi ban shalan tuh ïa ki muid na khappud jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills District sha ka ri Bangladesh.Ha ka jingpynap shrip, ki shipai BSF ki la ïoh pyllait im 93 tylli ki muid.Hadien ba la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat, ki shipai BSF ki la pynlong da ka jingpynap shrip ha khappud bad ïoh pyllait im ïa kine ki 93 tylli ki muid ïa kiba la buhrieh ha kawei ka lawbniap hajan khappud da ka jingthmu ban shalan tuh ïa ki sha Bangladesh.Ïa kine ki muid la aiti noh sha ki bor Pulit ban leh ïa kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: 93 TYLLI KI MUID ÏOH KURUP KI BSF BA THMU SHALAN TUH SHA BANGLADESH

content: Jowai, Risaw 23 : Ki nongïalam ka seng Jaiñtia Student Union (JSU) Khliehriat Circle ki la ïoh lad ban ïakynduh ïa u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ryngkat ka jingdonlang u MLA ka thaiñ uwei na u myntri ka jylla ma Kyrmen Shylla.Na ka liang ka seng lyngba ki nongïalam jong ka ki la ïa kynduh ïa u myntri ha ka sngi ba u leit plie ïa ka jingkieng ïaid kjat ha ka shnong Sahksaw bad na ka liang ka seng ki la ai da ka dorkhas sha u myntri u Bah Paul Lyngdoh kaba ki la ai jingmut sha ka sorkar ban ai bhah bad ai bynta lang ïa ka East Jaiñtia ban ïoh shna ïa ka ïing sah bad sumar (Rehabilitation Centre) ïa kiba kyrni dih droks namar ka District East Jaiñtia ka dei kawei na ki jaka ba kham kynrei kiba dih droks.La pynsngew ba ka dei ruh ka District kaba jur ka jingrung jingmih u droks shapoh ka jylla bad ka seng ka la pynsngew ba ka East Jaiñtia ka dei hok ban ïoh ïa kane ka shlem ai jingsumar ïa kiba kyrni droks khamtam ïa ki khun samla ka thaiñ ba kin lait na une u jingdih pynbuaid uba ïalam bakla ha ka jingim jong ki.Na liang u Myntri ka Sorkar uba peit ïa ka tnat Social Welfare u la shim khia ïa kane ka jingai jingmut ka seng bad u la bthah ïa ki bor peit bor khmih ban wad jaka kaba biang paka ban ïoh buh kum kane ka shlem hapoh ka thaiñ, pynkut ka kyrwoh..
title: BA JYLLEI KI NONGDIH DROKS, LAH DONKAM BAN DON KA REHABILITATION CENTRE HA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS ONG KA JSU

content: Ka Khasi Jaiñtia Christian Leaders Forum (KJCLF) ka pynshai ba ka Forum kam don ka jingpyrshah ïa ka jingpynlong ïa ka tamasa Shillong Cherry Blossom da ka Sorkar Jylla, hynrei ka Forum ka kwah ban pynskhem bad kren shai ba ka sngi U Blei ka long ka sngi ka Bakhuid bad kyntang na ka bynta ki riewngeit Khristan bad ki Balang.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Secretary jong ka Forum u Rev. Dr. EH Kharkongor, u la ong ba ka Forum ka khmihlynti ba kine ki tamasa kin ïaid beit ïaid ryntih khlem don kano kano ka jingpynwit bad ka jingpynthut, khnang ba kane kan long ruh kaba kyntiew ïa ka jingshongsuk shongshngaiñ ha ka Jylla.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne ka JAC ka kynthup ïa ki seng na Ri-bhoi District, kata, ka Meghalaya People United Front (MPUF), Ri-Bhoi Youth Organization (RBYO), United Hynniewtrep Movement (UHM), Saiñdur Tipkur Tipkha Ïeng Ehrngiew u Hynñiewtrep (STIEH) bad ka Meghalaya People’s Social Organization (MPSO) ki la dawa ïa ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei jong ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan pynkynriah noh mardor ïa ka sngi ban pynkut ïa ka tamasa Shillong Cherry Blossom kata, ha ka 19 tarik, Naiwieng, 2023 kaba hap ha ka sngi u Blei, ka ban sa long ha madan Kurkalang, Bhoirymbong, Ribhoi District.Kine ki kynhun ki la maham ruh lada ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei kam sngap ïa kane ka jingdawa, ki dkhot jong kine ki kynhun kin rah da ki plakad bad lada ka mih kano kano ka jingkulmar ka Sorkar hi ka hap ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh.U Myntri ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei Bah Paul Lyngdoh haba pynphai nia halor kane ka jingpyrshah jong kine ki kynhun u la ong, ‘baroh ki sngi ki dei ki sngi kiba Khuid,’ bad ong ruh ba ka Sorkar kam shym la pynbor ïa ki paidbah ne ïano ïano ban leit sha kane ka tamasa.
title: KA SNGI U TRAI KA LONG KA BAKHUID BAD KYNTANG NA KA BYNTA KI KHRISTAN : KJCLF

content: KaJaiñtia National Council (JNC) ha ka sngi U Blei ka la dawa ïa ki Myntri Sorkar, kiba long ruh ki MLA jong rilum Jaiñtia ban ïakren na ka bynta ban pan ïa ki song pynroi ym ban ïakren ïa ka lynti Rel.“Ngi kyntu ïa ki Myntri Sorkar na rilum Jaiñtia ban pynpaw ïa kane ka mat hapoh ka jingïalang Kynhun Myntri, bad ban kren ruh shaphang ka jingbym don ki kam pynroi ha ka East Jaiñtia Hills District naduh ka jingjot rathai jong ka surok, ka jingbym treikam jong ki skul sorkar, ka jingduna ha ki hospital Sorkar, ka jingbym urlong shuh ka jingdawa ban pynïoh ïa ka College Sorkar bad kiwei kiwei ha ka jaka ban ïakren ïa ka ishu lynti Rel,” la ong u President ka JNC u Bah Sambormi Lyngdoh ha u kyrwoh.Kane ka jingdawa jong ka seng ka long hadien ar sngi ba u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Comingone Ymbon uba long ruh u MLA ka Shangpung Constituency u la pynpaw ba u pdiang ïa ka jingtyrwa jong ka Sorkar ban wanrah ïa ka lynti Rel ha East Jaiñtia Hills District.Haba pynpaw ïa ka daw na ka Seng ka la pyrshah ban wanrah ïa ka lynti Rel hapoh ka thaiñ, u Bah Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka Jaiñtia Hills District Autonomous Council (JHADC) haduh mynta ka la phiel ban thaw ïa ki aiñ ki ban khanglad ïa ki briew kiba nabar ka jylla kiba leh ïa ki kam khaii pateng hapoh ka thaiñ bad ban pynkupbor ïa ki Dorbar Shnong khnang ban tehlakam ïa ka jingrung kyrthep jong ki mynder ha ki shnong.U la ong, ha kaba ïadei bad kane, lada ailad ban wanrah ïa ka lynti Rel, khlem artatien ka jingkharoi jong ki briew kiba nabar kiba wan sha rilum Jaiñtia kan nang kiew. Namarkata, ki trai shnong ritpaid ki don ka hok ban pyrshah ïa kum kata ka projek.“Ngi ngeit skhem da ka jingwan jong kine ki projek lynti Rel kan ktah ruh wat ïa ki shnong ki thaw ha ki nongkyndong, ïa ki khlaw ki btap, ïa ki lum ki wah ba ki paidbah ki ju shahniah kum ka jingim ba manla ka sngi.  Ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ka dei kawei na ki District kaba don bun tylli ki karkhana bad da ka jingwan jong ka lynti Rel kan pynmyntoi ïa kine ki karkhana bad ka jingkylli ka long hato ki nongkhaii trai jylla kin ïoh jingmyntoi ne em na kane,” u la ong.Da kaba pynpaw ba ka Rel kan pynmyntoi tang ïa kiba nabar, u President ka JNC u la ong, “ki nongwan shong thap be-aiñ kin nang jyllei, ka jingïashongkha khleh kan nang jur khamtam sha ki jaka nongkyndong kaba la nang kiew. Ngi ngeit skhem ba kan pynkha ïa ki jingeh bad ngi dang kwah ban pynneh pynsah ïa la ka riti ka dustur bad ïa ka thymmei.  Kaei ka ban jia ïa ki pateng ki ban sa wan.”Haba pynpaw ba ka district ka donkam eh nyngkong ïa ki kam pynroi ym ïa ka lynti Rel, u Bah Lyngdoh u la ong, “ka JNC ka kwah ban buh jingkylli lada ka Sorkar ka don pisa da ki klur ban wanrah ïa ka lynti Rel hynrei balei pat ka Sorkar kam lah ban wanrah ïa ka College? Ar tylli ki Residential School hapoh ka district la shu ieh lyngkrang hato phi pyrkhat kumno.”U la maham ruh ba ka JNC ka la pynkhreh ban shim da ka sienjam ba tyngeh lada ka Sorkar Jylla kam sangeh noh ban phohsniew ïa ka lynti Rel ban pynpoi sha East Jaiñtia Hills.
title: KI MYNTRI SORKAR NA RILUM JAIÑTIA KI DEI BAN PAN DA KI SONG PYNROI YM DA KA LYNTI REL : JNC

content: Shillong, Risaw 24: Ki nongialam jong ka Kur Kharbuki na ka shnong Lawmei, ki la pynshai ba u Syiem jong ka Hima Mylliem u Paiem Ainam Manik Syiem um shym la leh donbor satia ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynkhamti ia ka Sanad ha u Bah Zuberstar Kharbuki ban shimti kum u Myntri ba thymmai jong ka Kur Kharbuki.Kane ka jingpynshai jong ka Kur Kharbuki na Lawmei ka long hadien ba ki nongialam jong ka Kur Kharbuki na ka thaiñ Mawpat bad na ka shnong Umsning ki la mih shakhmat ban pyrshah jur ia ka jingai sanad bad ki la ai por haduh ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai ia u Syiem jong ka Hima Mylliem ban pyndam noh mardor ia ka jingai Sanad ha u Bah Zuberstar Kharbuki hynrei lym kumta kin pynlong da ka jingshah thngan hakhmat ka ophis treikam jong u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem kaba don ha Mawkhar, Shillong.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da ka Kur Kharbuki, ki nongialam jong ka Kur Kharbuki ki la ong ba ka jingkynnoh pyrshah ia u Syiem jong ka Hima ba u shu leh donbor ka dei tang ka jingkynnoh ka bym don nongrim namar ba ka jingjied ia u Bah Zuberstar Kharbuki ban shimti bujli kum u Myntri jong ka Kur Kharbuki ka long da ka jingiahun lang na baroh ki kur Kharbuki kiba la iashim bynta ha ka Dorbar Kur kaba la long ha ka 19 tarik, Nailar mynta u snem.
title: U PA’IEM YM SHYM LEH DONBOR BAN AI SANAD ÏA U BAH ZUBERSTAR KHARBUKI : KUR KHARBUKI

content: Ka tnat Arts and Culture jong ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba ka jingpynbna ba la pynmih da u Commissioner and Secretary ka tnat Arts and Culture ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah F. R Kharkongor, ka la pyntip ba ha kaba pyntreikam ia ka iktiar ba la pynkupbor hapoh ka Section 3 (1) (2) jong ka Meghalaya Heritage Act 2012, ka Government Meghalaya ka la tyrwa ban pynbna ia ki ar tylli ki jaka (Archaeological Sites) ha East Khasi Hills kum ki “Protected Sites.Kine ki ar tylli ki jaka ki kynthup ia ka Archaeological Site kaba don ha ka shnong Myrkhan kaba hap hapoh ka Mylliem Block, East Khasi Hills bad ki mawbynna (Megalith Monument) kiba don ha ka shong Rynghep, Nongkseh, East Khasi Hills.“Kino kino ki jingujor halor kane ka jingpynbna, lada don, ka Sorkar kan pdiang hapoh lai phew sngi naduh ba la pynmih paidbah ia kane ka jingpynbna,” la ong ka jingpynbna na u Commissioner and Secretary ka tnat Arts and Culture ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah Kharkongor.
title: TYRWA KA TNAT ARTS AND CULTURE BAN ITHUH KUM KI “PROTECTED SITES” AR TYLLI KI JAKA HA EKH

content: Uwei u rangbah briew ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Lahbor Khongngai 40 snem ka rta uba dei na ka shnong Wahlong, East Khasi Hills District kaba don sharum jong ka shnong Sohra u la shu mynsaw ei kha-ma-kha hadien ba u la shah thombor bad shah tied da u tyrnem ha ki briew khlem kano kano ka daw.Ia une u rangbah uba la mynsaw la pynkit noh sha Shillong Civil Hospital mynnin ka miet sngi baar hadien ba u la shah thombor ha ka por kumba 10:00 baje mynmiet.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Bah Lahbor, la ong ba kane ka la jia tang hadien ba ka kurim jong u ka la hylla ia kine ba kin ym kren da ki tien sih tien sang hadien ba la suba ba ki dei kiba la shoh khawyiang.U la iathuh shuh shuh, tang namarba ka kurim jong ka la hylla ia ki ban ym kren da ki tiensih, kine ki briew kiba don kumba lai ne saw ngut kiba sah ruh marjan bad ka ing jong u, ki la shu thombor beit ia u Bah Lahbor bad bom ruh da u tyrnem na ki bynta jong ka lbong haduh ba ym tip briew shuh.U la iathuh ruh dei lyngba ka jingiarap jong ka kurim, u la shu lait thaw na ki tyrsim jong ka jingduhei ia la ka jong ka jingim.U la ong shuh shuh ba kiba la sakhi ia kane ka jingjia, dei tang ka kurim bad ki khun ki kti jong u.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit khnang ba lap ia ka jingshisha.
title: MYNSAW U RANGBAH HA WAHLONG BA SHAH TIED DA U TYRNEM HA KI SUBA NONG BUAID

content: : Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) Nongthliew Circle ha ka sngi Balang ka la iakynduh ia u Director jong ka Schools Education & Literacy (SEL) bad aiti ruh da ka dorkhas kaba dawa ban kyntiew kyrdan ia ka Nongthliew Govt Secondary School sha ka Higher Secondary.U President jong ka HYC Nongthliew Circle Bah Joplang Kharnaior haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ka seng ka la buddien bha ia kane ka jingdawa na ka por sha ka por bad ka long ruh ka ishu kaba la slem naduh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la tyrwa naduh u snem 2019 ban kyntiew kyrdan ia kane ka skul.“Ka thaiñ Nongthliew ka donkam bha ia ka shlem pule kaba bha bad kaba bit babiang.  Ia kane ka skul la seng naduh u snem 1956 bad kane ka skul ka la ai jingshakri mynta palat 50 snem, kumjuh ruh kiba bun ki khun samla jong ka thaiñ ki la ioh jingnang jingstad lyngba ka jingdon jong kane ka skul,” ula ong.Une u nongialam ka seng u la ai nuksa ba ka nongbah Shillong ia mynta ka long kaba khapngiah bha, ki briew ruh ki ju ud bha ia kane ka jingeh.“Lada ka Sorkar ka shimkhia ban buh ia ki tnat treikam bapher bapher sha ki thaiñ nongkyndong ka lah ban weng khyndiat ia ka jingkhapngiap kaba la mad baroh shikatta ha nongbah Shillong,” u la ong.Katkum ka dorkhas, ka seng ka la pynpaw ba ha ka thaiñ Nongthliew, ki don 18 tylli ki shnong bad kam pat don wat tang kawei ruh ka Higher Secondary lait noh tang kawei ka Private School.“Ki paidbah ha ka thaiñ Nongthliew ki dei kiba im da ka rep ka riang bad kiba kham duna ka ioh ka kot.  Namarkata, ka jingdon jong ka Higher Secondary School ba la pyniaid da ka Sorkar kan long ka jingkyrkhu ia ki longiing longsem,” ula ong bad bynrap, “ngi kyrmen ruh ba ka Sorkar kan pynurlong noh kham kloi ia kane ka jingthmu na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong ki khynnah skul ha ka thaiñ Nongthliew.”
title: DAWA KA HYC BAN KYNTIEW KYRDAN ÏA KA NONGTHLIEW GOVT. S.S SHA KA HIGHER SECONDARY

content: : Ka Jylla Meghalaya ka la kynjoh sha uwei u pat u mawmer ha kaba pyntreikam ia ka Jal Jeevan Mission ban pynpoi ia ka umkor sha ki palat 4 lak tylli ki longiing ha ka jylla.Haduh mynta T. 3,000 klur la mang pisa hapoh ka JJM na ka bynta Meghalaya. Na ki 4450 tylli ki longing kiba la ioh umkor haduh ka 15 tarik, Nailar, 2019 mynta ka la kynjoh sha ka 4,00,812 lak tylli.Haba pynbna paidbah ia kane ka jingjop, u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K. Sangma u la ai jingiaroh ia ka kynhun jong ka Jal Jeevan Mission, Meghalaya. “Ka Jylla Meghalaya ka la jam sha uwei u mawmer ban pynioh umkor sha ki 4 lak tylli lyngba ka Jal Jeevan Mission Functional Household Tap Connections (FHTCs). Ngi ai khublei ia u soh ka jingtrei shitom jong ka kynhun Jal Jeevan Mission Meghalaya, katba ngi dang beh ban kynjoh sha ka thong kaba kot 100% FHTCs ha ka jylla jong ngi,” la ong u Sangma.U Myntri ka tnat Public Health Engineering (PHE) u Marcuise N. Marak u la ong ba ka tnat ka la buh thong ban kynjoh 5 lak tylli ki jingpynpoi ia ka umkor ha shwa u Nohprah, mynta u snem. Ka Sorkar ka la buh thong ban pynioh ia ka umkor sha ki 6.51 lak tylli ki longiing.“Ka Sorkar Pdeng haduh mynta ka la mang pisa T. 3,000 klur (na ka T. 6,000 klur ) na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya,” u la ong.U Commissioner & Secretary jong ka tnat Public Health Engineering Department ka ka sorkar Meghalaya, bad uba long ruh u Mission Director jong ka Jal Jeevan Mission ha ka Jylla u Syed Md. A. Razi, u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen bad ong, ‘kane ka dei ka jingjop na ka bynta ka Jylla. Ngin ym shongthait halor ka jingiaroh bad ngin bteng ban pynlong ia ka jylla Meghalaya kaba pahuh um ha ki sngi ki ban sa wan. Ka jingangnud jong ngi ka long ban iohi ba ki longing ha ki jaka ba kyndong kin ioh ia ki umdor, bad ngin iai btteng haduh ba ngin da poi sha ka sienjam kaba khatduh eh.”Ka jingiaid lynti jong ka Meghalaya ka pyni ba ka don ka jingiapher ha ka jingioh ia ka umkor ha ki longing ha kylleng ki distrik bapher bapher jong ka jylla. Ka East Garo Hills ka long 80.09%, ka South West Garo Hills ka long 79.02%, ka Ri Bhoi ka long 72.83%, ka North Garo Hills ka long 69.35%, ka Eastern West Khasi Hills ka long 67.56%, ka South Garo Hills ka long 65.56%, ka South West Khasi Hills ka long 65.15%, ka West Garo Hills ka long 59.82%, ka West Khasi Hills ka long 57.52%, ka West Jaiñtia Hills ka long 50.29%, ka East Khasi Hills ka long 50.01%, bad ka East Jaiñtia Hills ka long 44.50%.Ha u Risaw, 2022, ka Meghalaya ka la ioh khusnam ha ka kyrdan baar ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Jal Jeevan Mission. Kane ka jingioh jingithuh ka la pynlong ia ka jylla ban kut jingmut ban poi sha ka thong ba la buh hakhmat.Ka Jal Jeevan Mission, ka dei ka jingthmu ba la pyntreikam ha baroh kawei ka ri, da ka jingangnud ban pynpoi ia ka umbam umdih kaba khuid sha ki longing kiba don sha ki nongkyndong shwa jong u snem 2024.Ha Meghalaya, na ki 600,000 lak tylli k longiing, kumba 400,000 tylli ki longing antad ki la ioh jingmyntoi na ka jingpynpoi ia ka umkor ba la pyntreikam lyngba kane ka skhim, ka pynpaw ba haduh 61% ka jingdon jong ki longing.Ka jingiashim bynta lang jong ki dorbar shnong ka la long kawei pat ka sienjam ban kynjoh sha u mawmer jong ka jingjop da ka jingthaw ia ki Village Water and Sanitation Committee (VWSCs) ha manla ki shnong ki ban peit ba baroh ki nongshong shnong kin ioh ia ka um kaba khuid.Ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la buh thong ruh ban pyndep pura ban pynpoi ia ka umkor lyngba ka Jal Jeevan Mission shwa ban kut ka jingbuh por jong ka Sorkar Pdeng haduh u Lber, 2024.
