title: 4 LAK TYLLI KI LONGÏING KIBA ÏOH UMKOR , KYNJOH KA MEGHALAYA SHA U MAWMER BA LA BUH DA KA JJM

content: Ki nonghikai jong ka skulbah NEHU kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka North Eastern Hill University Teachers Association (NEHUTA) bad ki samla pule kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka North Eastern Hill University Students Union (NEHUSU) ha ka sngi Palei ki la dawa ban wengkam noh mardor ia u Rohit Prasad ia uba la shu thungkam hi da u Vice Chancellor ka skulbah NEHU u Prof. PS Shukla hapoh ka ophis treikam ka jong u kum u Technical Advisor khlem da khot ia ka Advertisement, khlem da pynlong ia ka interview bad khlem da iaid katkum ki kyndon treikam jong kane ka skulbah.Ki samla pule kiba pyrshah ia kane ka jingthungkam sopsop jong u Prof. Shukla ki la kerkut ia ka ophis treikam jong u da kaba pynlong ia ka jingïakhih bad pyrta shla hakhmat ka ophis treikam bad dawa ba dei ban wengkam mardor ia u Rohit Prasad bad ban pynurlong ia ki mat jingdawa ba ki samla pule jong kane ka skulbah ki la iakynduh bun ki jingeh.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President jong ka NEHUSU u samla Ready First June Nongbsap u la pynpaw ka jingsngewsih halor ka jingphet jong u Vice Chancellor u Prof. PS Shukla na ka kamra treikam tang shu ioh jingtip ba ki samla pule kin pynlong ia ka jingïakhih ban pynsngew halor ki mat jingdawa jong ka Union.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong une u nongialam ka NEHUSU, u Rohit Prasad u ioh ia ka jingsiew tulop kaba T.75 hajar shi bnai, nalor ka TA/DA bad ka Quarter.Haba iathuh ia ki mat jingdawa u la ong, “ka jingdawa ka long ban ai ia ka bam ka dih kaba bha sha ki samla pule kiba sah Hostel, ban pynbiang ia u Wifi bad ban pynthikna ruh ba ki samla pule bad kiba sah hapoh ka NEHU Campus kin don hapdeng ka jingshngaiñ.U la iathuh ba NEHUSU ka la dawa ban pyntreikam pura ia ka School of Technology (SoT) khnang ba ki samla pule kin dup ioh jingmyntoi na ka jingdon jong ka Library.“Ngi dawa ruh ia ki bor pyniaid ban pynthymmai ia ki kor computer ha ki Laboratories khnang ba ki samla pule kin dup lah ban kham pyntbit shuh shuh ialade ha kaba leh ia ki jingwad bniah,” la ong u nongialam ka NEHUSU bad bynrap, “ngi dawa ruh ba ki bor pyniaid ka skulbah NEHU ban wanrah ia ka Marking System kaba khuid ba suba.”Haba bynrap halor kane, u President jong ka NEHUTA, u Prof. Lakhon Kma u la ong, ba ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) kan ai por haduh ka por 12 baje mynmiet jong ka 26 tarik, Risaw, 2023 ban wengkam mardor ia u Rohit Prasad hynrei lym kumta ka Joint Action Committee kan pynlong da ka jingïakhih hakhmat ka ophis treikam jong u Vice Chancellor. U la iathuh ruh ba ka JAC ka la dawa ruh ia u Prof. PS Shukla ban pyndam noh mardor ia ka post Campus Director ba la thung hapoh ka Tura Campus hynrei ban thung beit da u Pro. Vice Chancellor kumba ju long hi ka rukom katkum ki kyndon treikam jong ka skulbah NEHU.
title: DAWA KA NEHUTA & NEHUSU BAN WENGKAM ÏA U ROHIT PRASAD

content: Da ka jingïakhih kaba tyngeh haduh lai bnai kynthih jong ki nonghikai ka skulbah NEHU kiba don hapoh shatri jong ka North Eastern Hill University Teachers Association (NEHUTA), u Vice Chancellor Prof. PS Shukla u la hap ban pyndem da kaba khot ia ka jingialang jong ka Academic Council ban ioh ia ka jingmynjur ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyntreikam ia ka National Education Policy (NEP).Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang jong ka Academic Council kaba la long ha ka sngi Palei u President jong ka NEHUTA Prof. Lakhon Kma u la iathuh ba ka jingpyrshah jong ka Assocation ban pyntreikam ia ka National Education Policy (NEP) naduh lai bnai mynshwa ka long namarba u Prof. Shukla u la iuhroit ia ka iktiar jong ka Academic Council da kaba ñiew pynban ia ka Executive Council kum ka bor kaba halor jong ka skulbah NEHU.U la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingialang jong ka Academic Council, la shim ia ka rai ban pyntreikam noh nangne shakhmat ia ka National Education Policy (NEP) na ka bynta ka Four Year Undergraduate Programme (FYUP) bad ha kaba iadei bad ki samla kiba dang pule ha ka First Semester ka North Eastern Hill University Teachers Association (NEHUTA) ka la dawa ia ki bor pyniaid ban pynjlan shwa ia ka jingai jinghikai sa shi bnai kynthih hynrei ym ban shu pynlong noh ia ka eksamin ha u bnai Naiwieng lane Nohprah, 2023 namarba ki samla pule ki la shu duhei ia ki jingioh jinghikai na ka daw ka jingbym iasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ka North Eastern Hill University Teachers Association (NEHUTA) ka Meghalaya College Teachers Association (MCTA) bad u Vice Chancellor jong ka skulbah NEHU u Prof. PS Shukla.U la iathuh ba kane ka jingpyndem jong u Prof. Shukla ka long hadien ba ka NEHUTA ka la ujor sha ka President jong ka Ri India ka Droupadi Murmu bad sha u Lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan.Shuh shuh u la iathuh ba ka jingkhot jong u Prof. Shukla ia ka jingialang jong ka Academic Council ka long hadien ba ka jingaipor khatduh jong ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) kaba kynthup ia ka NEHUTA, NEHUNSA, MCTA, MeTTA-NEHU, NEHUSU bad kiwei kiwei ki kynhun kiba iasnohkti lang kan kut lashai ka sngi Thohdieng.
title: PYNDEM U VC KA NEHU HAKHMAT KA ACADEMIC COUNCIL, PDIANG KA NEHUTA ÏA KA NEP

content: U Vice Chancellor jong ka skulbah North Eastern Hill University (NEHU) u Prof. PS Shukla u la pynksan ba ka jingthungkam ia u Rohit Prasad kum u Technical Advisor ha ka ophis treikam jong u Vice Chancellor ka dei ka rai ba la shim da ka Executive Council.U Prof. Shukla u la pynpaw ia kane hakhmat ki samla pule jong ka NEHU ha ki kynta ba ka synjuk ki samla pule ka North Eastern Hill University Students Union (NEHUSU) ki la kthong ia u Prof. PS Shukla shaduh ka Old Guest House hadien ba kim shym la iohlad ban iakynduh ia u hapoh ka kamra treikam ka jong u, ha ka khyllipmat ba ki la leit ban kerkut ia ka ophis treikam jong u na ka bynta ban ioh pynpaw ia ki mat jingdawa ki jong ki.Shwa kane, tang shu ioh jingtip ba u Vice Chancellor u don ha ka jingialang jong ka North East Philosophy Teachers Meet, 2023 kaba la long ha Seminar Hall, U Kiang Nangbah Guest House (Old Guest House) NEHU, Shillong Campus, ki samla pule ki la rung jubor shapoh ban pynthud ia ka jingialang.Lehse kane kan dei ka sien ka banyngkong eh ba ki samla pule jong kane ka skulbah kin pynthud ia ka jingialang hapoh ka Campus ba la iashim bynta da u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma.Da ka jingkyrpad jong u Rakkam A. Sangma, ki samla pule ki la ap ia u Vice Chancellor shabar ka Guest House tad haduh ban da wai ka jingialang.  Katba ki dang ap ia u Vice Chancellor ban mih na ka jingialang ki samla pule ki la pyrta da ki sur pynrem ia u Vice Chancellor bad dawa ruh ban pynurlong ia ki mat jingdawa.Ka NEHUSU ka la byrngem ban pynlong biang da ka jingiakhih lada u Vice Chancellor um wengkam mardor ia u Rohit Prasad hapoh ka 12 baje mynmiet jong ka sngi Thohdieng bad lada um pynurlong ia ki jingdawa na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki samla pule jong ka NEHU.Da ka jingpan jubab, u Prof. Shukla u la pyntip hakhmat ki samla pule ba ia u Rohit Prasad la thungkam Contractual katkum ki Rule bad Regulation jong ka skulbah NEHU bad nalor kata u la iathuh ba la pyntip ia kane sha baroh ki nonghikai bad ki nongtrei jong ka NEHU.“Lada phi kwah ia ka kopi (thungkam) ngan ai ia phi,” ong u Prof. Shukla sha ki samla pule bad bynrap, “kane kam dei ka rai ba la shim da u Vice Chancellor shimet, hynrei kane ka dei ka rai ba la shim da ka Executive Council.”Shuh shuh u la pynksan ruh ba la thung ia u Rohit Prasad ban shna ia ka NEHU App na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki samla pule.  U la iathuh ruh ba u Prasad u don da ka IT Team kaba iatreilang ruh bad ki samla pule kumno ban shna ia ka App.
title: LA THUNGKAM ÏA U ROHIT PRASAD DA KA RAI KA EC, PYNKSAN U VICE CHANCELLOR KA NEHU

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) West Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Palei ka la dawa ia ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ban ainam ia ka thain Langpih, ka shnong kaba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka West Khasi Hills District da kaba tei ia u durmot ba shi rynieng jong u (L) Bah Hoping Stone Lyngdoh uba la long u MDC bad u MLA la bun bun snem jong ka Nongstoiñ Constituency.Kane ka jingdawa jong ka HYC ka long hadien ba ka District Council ha ki snem ba la leit ka la kular ban tei da u durmot ba shi ryngieng jong u (L) Bah Hoping Stone L. Nonglait.Ka seng hapoh ka jingialam jong u President u samla Lumlang Kharsyiemlieh ka la aiti ia ka dorkhas ha u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka KHADC u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem kaba la bsut ruh ia shibun ki jingdawa.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President ka HYC u Samla Kharsyiemlieh u la iathuh ba u Bah Hoping uba la long MDC la bun bun snem bad uba long teng u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka District Council, la sngewdei ban tei noh ia u dur mot ba shi rynieng bad ruh ban don ka Signboard sah jingkynmaw ia u ha ophis treikam jong ka KHADC ha Nongstoin.
title: PYNSAH NAM ÏA KA LANGPIH HA KA KYRTENG U BAH HOPING, DAWA KA HYC ÏA KA KHADC

content: Ka iew la ka dei ha kano kano ka jaka hapoh ka rilum Khasi bunsien la ju ñiew ba ka dei ka pliang-ja jong ka jaitbynriew hynrei katba ki shalyntem ka por ki nang tyllun ka iew ka la kylla long pynban ka pliang-ja jong ki briew kiba nabar ka jylla bad ia kane la sakhi wat hapoh Iewduh bad ha Khyndai Lad kiba long ki ar tylli ki kad khaii kiba heh tam ha kane ka Jylla Meghalaya.Halor kane, da ka jingsngew khia ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) West Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Palei ka la iakynduh kyrpang ia u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ban un bthah ia u Syiem jong ka Hima Nongstoin ba ki Rangbah Shnong kim bit shuh ban dang ai ia ka No Objection Certificate (NoC) sha ki bar jylla kiba kwah ban leh ia ka kam khaii pateng hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Hima Nongstoiñ.Ha jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Lumlang Khar Syiemlieh u la pynpaw ba mynta ka Iew Shahlang ka la shah knieh noh ha ki bar jylla kiba la don 70 na ka 100 bad long trai ruh ia ki dukan kiba heh katba ki Khasi hap ban shong die jingdie ha madan.Ka Seng ka la pynsngew ruh ha u CEM ka KHADC ia ka jingkynrei jong ki Karkhana beain ha West Khasi Hills kiba ioh NoC na ki dorbar shnong, da kaba ai nuksa ia ka Ms. D. Ferro Alloy kaba la iaid shaid shaid ban trei hapoh ka West Khasi Hills.Nalor kine, ka seng ka la kyntu ia ka District Council ba kan peit bha ia ka jingdon jong ka khyndew ka shyiap hapoh ka West Khasi Hills namar kumba ka long mynta la lap ba bun na ki jaka ki puta ki la hap noh ha ka jingpeit jong kiwei khamtam ha ki jaka khappud.“Ban pynkhlain ia ka khaii ka pateng jong ki trai ri, khamtam ha ki thain khappud kumjuh ruh ia ki iew kiba la rim kiba don ha khappud,” la dawa ka seng bad bynrap, “ban bthah ia ki Hima, ki Sirdarship, ki Dorbar Shnong ba kim dei shuh ban ai NoC pathar ia ki poiwir kiba leh ia ka khaii ka pateng hapoh ka thaiñ (West Khasi Hills) bad kumjuh ruh ban ioh rung ha ki iew ki hat.”Nalor kine, ka HYC ka la kyntu ia ka KHADC ban bthah ia ki Hima, ki Sirdarship, ki Dorbar Shnong ba kin ym pdiang ia ki song pynroi na kiwei ki jylla kum na ka Sorkar Assam khamtam ha khappud lane ban ai ia ki jaka puta sha kiwei ban leh kam eiei.  Ban pyrkhing ia ka jingiap pathar ki dohkha bad ban pynkhlain noh ia ka jingthung ia ki tynrai dieng bad ban thaw ia ka Plantation Committee ka ban peit thuh ha khappud.Ka seng ka la kyntu ia ka KHADC ba kan bthah ia ki Hima, ki Sirdarship, Dorbar Shnong ban ym ai No Objection Certificate (NoC) sha ki briew kiba nabar kiba shah thungkam lyngba ka Post Gramin Dak Sevak (GDS).Kawei na ki mat kaba kongsan, ka seng ka la pynsngew ba ka District Council kan shimkhia ban shna noh ia ka Tirot Sing House khnang ba ki paidbah kiba wan na ki shnong nongkyndong sha Sor Shillong ban wad jingsumar kin iohlad ban pyndonkam ia kane ka ing kum ka iing basa.Ka seng ka la kyntu ia ka Council ban don noh da ka Traditional Dress Day jong ka KHADC ban pynneh pynsah ia ka riam tynrai.
title: KNIEH KI BAR JYLLA ÏA KA KAM KHAÏI PATENG HA ÏEW SHAHLANG, DA 70 NA KA 100

content: Kawei ka taksi kamai bym lah satia ban iohi ia u registration number ka la phetkrad tang shu syllad ia kawei ka Maruti Van kaba don ia u registration number AS01 AG 8909 ha lad Umsaw, Umiam, Ribhoi District kaba kit ia ki khynnah skul jong ka Merry Land School kaba don ha Mawlein Mawkhan, ban leit buh ia ki sha ka iing ba ki sah ha ka shnong Umsawlum ha ka por ba ki la wai skul.Kane ka la jia ha ka sngi Thohdieng ha por kumba 3:30 baje nohphai sngi.Ha kane ka jingjia, ki khynnah skul kiba shong hapoh kane ka kali maruti van kaba la kylla khongpong, ki la lait thaw na ka jingmynsaw hynrei lait noh tang u nongniah jong kane ka kali u Bah Bhakupar Kharbani uba la mynsaw na ki bynta jong ka kti. Tang hadien katto katne por la wan poi ki Pulit jong ka Ribhoi District ban tohkit halor kane ka jingjia bad ban buddien ia ka kali kaba la syllad ia kane ka kali Maruti Van.
title: LAIT THAW KI KHYNNAH SKUL BA SYLLAD KA TAKSI ÏA KA MARUTI VAN HA LAD UMSAW

content: Ka jingduna jong ki nonghikai hapoh ki Government Lower Primary School kiba don ha ka jylli jong ka West Khasi Hills ka la buh jingeh ia ki nonghikai bad don ruh ki skul ha kaba uwei u nonghikai u hap ban ai jinghikai marwei tang ha kawei ka skul.Halor kane ka jingeh kaba ki nonghikai skul ki iakynduh, ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) West Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynsngew sha ki tyndong skhor jong u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma ba un weng ia kane ka jingeh.U President ka seng Bah Lumlang Kharsyiemlieh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingiakynduh ia u Myntri, u la iathuh ba ki don kumba 90 tylli ki Government L.P. School ha West Khasi Hills District bad ka jingdon jong ki khynnah ka long kumba 50 haduh 100 ngut ha manla kawei ka skul.  Ha kawei ka skul, ka Sorkar ka thung nonghikai tang uwei ne arngut ban ai jinghikai sha ki khynnah bad kine ki nonghikai ki hap ban shim klas ia ki khynnah kiba pule naduh Nursery haduh Class-V.U la ai nuksa ruh ia ka skul ha Athiabari, West Khasi Hills, watla ka dei ka Lower Primary School hynrei ka sorkar ka thung tang uwei u nonghikai na ka bynta ki khynnah Pre-primary bad une ujuh u nonghikai u hap ban shim klas ia ki khynnah na ka bynta ka skul baroh kawei.“Ka jingbym thung ia ki nonghikai katkum ka jingdon jong ki khynnah (student-teacher ratio) ka la ktah shikatdei eh ia ka pule puthi ha ka District baroh kawei bad ka long ka jingleh shiliang ia ki khynnah skul kiba pule ha kine ki skul,” u la ong.“Ki don ruh kumba saw tylli ki Government Upper Primary Schools hapoh ka District hynrei ia ki nonghikai ba la thung ha kine ki skul kam shym la long katkum ka jingdonkam bad kane ka pynkha pynban ia ki jingeh bad ka jingkhia jong ka kam ha ki nonghikai kiba la don lypa bad ka skul kam lah ban ai ia ka jinghikai kaba paka sha ki khynnah. Ngi kyntu ia ka Sorkar ba kan thung da ki nonghikai kiba la tbit khnang ba kan pynmyntoi ia ki khynnah,” u la ong.Halor ka jingjot jingpei jong ki skul Sorkar, une u nongialam ka Seng, u la pyntip ha u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ia ka jingdonkam ban maramot kyrkieh ia ki skul Sorkar, namarba bun na kine ki skul kin ym long shuh ban pyndonkam ha ki bnai ki ban sa wan.Ka seng ka la dawa ruh ban pynbiang ia ki tiar namarba bun na ki skul kiba don hapoh ka district kim shym la ioh ia ki tiar katkum ki jingdonkam. “Ha kine ki skul, khamtam ha ki Lower Primary School, ki khynnah ki hap ban shong khapngiah na ka daw ka jingbyn don ki ben shong kiba biang.Ha kaba iadei bad ka Higher Secondary Section jong ka Sib Sing Memorial Govt School kaba la plie naduh u snem 1995 ha Nongstoin, hynrei haduh mynta ka Sorkar kam pat thung nonghikai satia ha ka Higher Secondary Section na ka bynta ka Arts bad Science katkum ka jingdonkam.“Kum ka nuksa, ym shym  la thung nonghikai na ka bynta ka sobjek Mathematics bad na ka bynta kiwei kiwei ki sobjek kiba donkam ha ka Arts haduh mynta.  Ki don kumba 6 ngut ki nonghikai ba la shu thung Contractual Basis bad haduh mynta ka Sorkar kam shym la shimkhia ban thung ia ki nonghikai kiba pura.  Kane ka la ktah ia ki khynnah skul,” la pyntip u Bah Kharsyiemlieh.Ha ka dorkhas ba la aiti ha u Sangma, ka HYC ka la pynpaw, halor ka building jong ka skul ba la plie ha ka 17 tarik, Kyllalyngkot mynta u snem da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba kane ka ing skul kam don ia ka bording elektrik ne kino kino ki tiar ban pyndonkam.  Haduh mynta ia kane ka iing skul la shu ieh iingjah kumjuh.Ka Seng ka la pynsngew ruh halor ka jingbym don ka jaka treikam bapura jong ka District School Education Officer ia kaba la shu trei na ka ophis SDSEO bad ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka la pynpaw ruh ba la donkam ban shna thymmai noh ia ka ophis SDSEO kaba la kynjoh mynta sha ka rta kaba 48 snem.
title: SYRTOK KI NONGHIKAI BARIM BYM THUNG NONGHIKAI KA SORKAR HA KI GOVT. LP SCHOOL KA WKH

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC), Ribhoi Sepngi Circle ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynsngew ha u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma halor ka jingduhnong jong ki khynnah skul jong ka thaiñ Ribhoi Sepngi na ka daw ka jingbym pat lah ban shna pyndep ia ka Residential School kaba don ha ka shnong Jirang, Ribhoi District.Ia kane ka skul, la shna naduh ka 8 tarik, Nohprah, 2014 bad la buh thong ban pyndep hapoh 24 bnai hynrei mynta la khyndai snem kynthih ym pat lah satia ban shna pyndep ia kane ka Residential School.“Lada lah ban shna pyndep noh ia kane ka skul, kan long ka jingmyntoi ia ki khynnah skul jong ka thaiñ bad ka jingpynslem ban plie paidbah ia kane ka skul ka la long pynban ka jingduhnong kaba khraw ia ki khynnah kiba sah ha ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Ri Bhoi sepngi,” ong u President ka HYC Ribhoi Sepngi u Bah RC Thangkhiew ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Ka seng lyngba ka dorkhas, ka la ong, lada ladep shna pyndep hynrei lada shu ieh lyngkrang kumtu khlem da pyndonkam, kane ka iing skul kan long kylla long pynban ka ktem jong ki riewsniew.“Ngi kyntu ia ka Sorkar ba kan shimkhia mardor ban pyntreikam noh ia kane ing skul khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi ia ki khynnah jong ka Ribhoi Sepngi,” u la ong.Ha kajuh ka por, ka seng ka la pynsngew ha u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ban bthah ia ki bor badei peit ban buh noh ia kawei ka MTET Centre na ka bynta ki samla pule kiba shong basah ha Ri Bhoi sepngi, kata, ha  Patharkhmah lane Jirang khnang ba kan pynsuk ia ki samla kiba thoh ia ka eksamin namarba ia mynta, kiba iakhun ia ka eksamin MTET ki hap ban leit thoh eksamin sha Nongpoh nalor ba ka long ka lynti kaba jngai.
title: 9 SNEM SAHTENG KA JINGSHNA ÏA KA RESIDENTIAL SCHOOL HA JIRANG

content: Ka Meghalaya Peoples United Front (MPUF) ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la kynnoh ba ka jingpyrshang jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ialam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ban pynpoi ia ka lynti Rel sha East Jaiñtia Hills District ka long tang ban pynkamai spah ia ki katto katne hynrei ym ia u paidbah ba bun balang.“Ngi kren da kaba shai, ba ka seng kam don jingpyrshah eiei ia ka roi ka par hynrei lada ka Sorkar Jylla ka thmu ban pynpoi ia ka lynti Rel ha East Jaiñtia Hills District ka dei ban pynbiang shwa ia ki aiñ kiba pyrkhing ia ka jingwanrung kyrthep jong ki mynder bad ba ka dei ban pyni shwa sha ki paidbah ba ka jingthmu ka dei ban long kaba shai,” ong u President ka MPUF u Bah Dawanpoimi Laloo ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha nongbah Shillong.“Namarba ngi iohi, lehse ka jingtmu ban wanrah ia ka lynti Rel ka long tang na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jongno re jongno. Kane ka jingthmu ka long ban pyntuid ia ka spah ka phew ha kaba iadei bad ki marpohkhyndew na East Jaiñtia Hills sha ki jylla rithor,” u la ong.Haba iaiban ia ka jingdawa ban wanrah ia ka aiñ bapyrkhing, une u nongialam ka MPUF u la ong, “ngin ym ailad bad ngin ym aili iano iano ban leh ia kano kano ka kam kaba ktah ia ka imlang ka sahlang bad shwa ban wanrah ia ka lynti Rel dei ban ai shwa ia ngi ia ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) ne ia kino kino ki ain ki ban iada khnang ba ngin ym shah tyllep ha ka jingwan jong ka Rel.”“Ngi phah ruh ia u kyrwoh uba shai sha ka Sorkar, lada phim lah ban ai ka jingkular ia ngi, ka seng kan ym ailad ban phin iaid shakhmat ba ka Rel kan wan shapoh ka jylla bad khamtam eh hapoh East Jaiñtia Hills,” u la bynrap.Ha u Naitung, mynta u snem ka MPUF ka la phah ia ka dorkhas sha ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba u Deputy Commisioner jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills ban pynpaw ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingthmu ban pynpoi ia ka lynti Rel khlem da pyntreikam shwa da ki aiñ kiba pyrkhing.Katkum ka jingong jong u Bah Laloo, ka seng ka iohi lada wan ka Rel, kan ktah wat ia ka ioh ka kot jong ki trai kali kiba ju im kamai jakpoh ban buh ia ki trok kit mar bad ia kiba treikam lajong. “Ngi khot ia ki trai kali ba kin iasnohkti lang bad ngi ban pyrshah ia ka jingwan ka Rel sha East Jaiñtia Hills namarba ngim iohi ba kan don ka jingmyntoi na ka jingwan ka Rel hynrei tang ki jingktah suda,” u la ong shuh shuh.U la iathuh ba ka seng kan sa leit ban iakynduh ia u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ban pynpaw ia kane ka jingsngew.Haba kylli, u Bah Laloo, u la ong, “ki MLA ha rilum Jaiñtia kim ju don jingiatylli bad kim ju pyrkhat ia u paidbah hynrei ki pyrkhat tang ia ka malade shimet. Lada donkam ngin iakren (bad ki MLA jong ka rilum Jaiñtia) bad lada kim sngap ngin wer ia u paidbah ban ym ailad ia ki ban pynjot.  Ngi kwah ruh ban tip ia ka buit barieh jong ki namarba lada pynpoi ia ka Rel kan kjit lut ia ka spah East Jaiñtia Hills bad kan kut syndon. Ngi tieng ia kane bad ngi kwah ia ka jingpynshai bad ba ka jingthmu ka dei ban long beit na ka bynta u paidbah hynrei ym na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki katto katne ngut.”U President ka MPUF-East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit Bah Kyrshan Blah u la ong, “ka East Jaiñtia Hills ka dei kaba don markhap bad ka ri Bangladesh, ka jingrung kyrthep jong ki mynder ri ka jur bha haduh mynta. Ka East Jaiñtia Hills ka dang bun ki jingduna naduh ki Hospital, ki skul bad ki kolej sorkar bad kiwei kiwei ki jingduna namarkata ka jingthmu ban pynpoi ia ka rel kam pynmyntoi eiei ruh em.”“Ngi kyrpad ia u MLA jong ka Khliehriat Constituency Bah Kyrmen Shylla uba long ruh u Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla bad ia ka MLA jong ka Sutnga-Saipung Constituency Kong Santa Mary Shylla ba kin pynsngew sha ka Sorkar halor ka jingpyrshah jong ki paidbah ban pynpoi ia ka Rel namarba ka jingbuhai shnong jong ki bar jylla bad ka jingrung tuh jong ki mynder ri sha East Jaiñtia Hills ka jur bha namarba ym don ba peitngor bad ym don ba tehlakam,” la ong u Bah Blah bad bynrap, “ki bar jylla ki treikam laitluid ha East Jaiñtia Hills namarba don kiba kyrshan ia ki nadien.”
title: WANRAH SHWA ÏA KA ILP SA WANRAH ÏA KA LYNTI REL SHA EJH, DAWA KA MPUF

content: Shillong, Risaw 28: U Deputy Chief Minister,  Karnataka u D.K. Shivakumar ha ka sngi thohdieng u la pdiang sngewbha ia u Bah Paul Lyndoh uba long u Myntri jong ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei bad Social Welfare ka Sorkar Meghalaya ha ka ophis treikam bad iakren ruh katto katne ki mat kiba iadei bad ki jingeh jong ka thaiñ bad ka ri.Ka jingiakren hapdeng u DK Shivakumar bad u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ka long ruh halor ka jingiadei hapdeng ki nongialam na kylleng ki thaiñ jong ka ri India.  Kum kane ka jingiakynduh kan pynkhlaiñ ia ka jingiatreilang bad kan wanrah ia ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut, bad ban sngewthuh ia ka jingeh ba ka ri ka la mad.Kine ki arngut ki la iasyllok ruh ban noh synñiang sha u sup u thiar na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ka jylla kaba ki mihkhmat bad ia ka jingdonkam ban kyntiew shaphrang ia ka ri.Kum kine ki jingiakynduh hapdeng ki nongialam kan plie lynti na ka bynta ban iasam jingtip, bad ban pyntyllun shakhmat ia kino kino ki jingthmu.  Kan pynkhlaiñ ruh ia ka jingiatylli bad ka jingiatreilang ka ban tehsong ia ki thaiñ bapher bapher jong ka ri India.Ka jingiakynduh hapdeng u DK Shivakumar bad u Bah Paul Lyngdoh kan wanrah ia ka jingiajan hapdeng ki jylla bad kan pynpaw ruh ia ka mynsiem ialong kawei wat hapdeng ki jingiapher kiba bun bad ban iatreilang ryngkat ryngkat na ka bynta ka jingbha.
title: ÏAKYNDUH U DK SHIVAKUMAR BAD U BAH PAUL LYNGDOH BAN WANRAH KA JINGÏAJAN HAPDENG KI NONGÏALAM

content: Shillong, October 27 : The Department of Telecommunications (DoT) in collaboration with the National Disaster Management Authority will be conducting a Cell Broadcast Alert System testing in Meghalaya on October 30, 2023. The testing is being conducted to enhance emergency communication during disasters and ensure the safety and well-being of citizens.The Cell Broadcast Alert System is a state-of-the-art technology that allows critical and time-sensitive messages for disaster management to be sent to all mobile devices within a designated geographical area, irrespective of whether the recipients are residents or visitors. This ensures that important emergency information reaches as many people as possible in a timely manner.During the testing period, people in Meghalaya may receive simulated emergency alerts on their mobile devices. DoT assures that these alerts are part of the planned testing process and do not indicate an actual emergency. Each test alert will clearly indicate that it is a Test Message to avoid confusion.Cell Broadcast is commonly used to deliver emergency alerts, such as severe weather warnings (e.g., Tsunami, Flash Flood, Earthquake etc., public safety messages, evacuation notices, and other critical information).The DoT urges the public to cooperate with the testing process and to remain calm if they receive a test alert. More information about the Cell Broadcast Alert System is available on the DoT website.
title: MOBILE BROADCAST ALERT SYSTEM TESTING IN MEGHALAYA ON OCTOBER 30

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Khliehriat Police Station kiba la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah ha ka sngi u Blei ki la pynlong ka jingpynap ktem ha ka por 11.30 baje mynstep bad ïoh kurup kurup 274.23 gram u drok Herion uba shong dor T. 1.5 klur.Ïa une u drok la pyrshang ban khaïi be-aiñ da uwei u snar khaïi drok uba la tip kyrteng kum u Rofique Uddin Ahmed na ka shnong Telitakar Part 11 Katogora PS, Catharines.U Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District, u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa, ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor  la ïathuh, ki Pulit kiba la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba tikna ba don uwei u nongkhaïi drok uba kyrteng u Rofique Uddin Ahmed uba shong da ka Bos Nightsuper kaba don u registration number AS-01-FC-7788, uba la rah lang u drok mar mar ki Pulit ki la pynlong ïa ka jingpynap ktem ha surokbah NH-6 hajan Khliehriat Police Station.Dei ha ka por 11.30 baje mynstep ki Pulit ki la ïoh bat ïa ka Bos Nigh Super bad ïa u snar khaïi drok uba shong hapoh kane ka bos.  Ha ka jingtalasi ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong ki riewpaidbah kum ki nongsakhi la kurup ïa u powdar ba long rong stem ba la song bha ha ki 20 tylli ki synduk sabon bad hadien ba la leh tes la pynshisha ruh ba u dei u drok heroin.Ki Pulit ki la kurup noh ïa u drok bad kawei ka Mobile Phone bad kem noh ruh ïa u Rofique Uddin Ahmed.  Ki Pulit ki la register case ha Khliehriat Police Station hapoh ki kyndon jong ka aiñ NDPS Act. Ki Pulit ki dang pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit khnang ban lap dien shuh shuh ïa kiba donkti.
title: KURUP KI PULIT EJH ÏA U DROK BA SHONGDOR 1.5 KLUR, SHAH KEM UWEI

content: Ki Pulit ka Anti-Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) East Khasi Hills District ki la ïohkem sa uwei u snar khaïi drok da ka jingbuddien halor ka jingïohkem ïa ki arngut ki nongkhaii drok ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai na Nongmensong.U kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Bah S. Nongtnger u la pyntip ba ïa une u snar khaïi drok la kem na Baghmara, South Garo Hills bad da ka jingphla jong u, ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup 23.56 gram u drok Heroin ba la thep ha ki ar tylli ki synduk thep sabon na ka ing sah wai jong u ha Nongrim Hills.
title: SHAH KEM U SNAR KHAÏI DROK NA NONGRIM HILLS

content: Watla bun sien ka jingiakynduh jong ki ASHA kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Meghalaya Asha Workers Unions (MAWU) ia ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh kam shym la ai jinghun satia ia kane ka kynhun namarba kam shym lah satia ban ai ia ka rai halor ki mat jingdawa jong ki.Kum ban shu kdew hangne, na ka liang jong ka Union ka la buh ia ki lai tylli ki mat jingdawa hakhmat jong ka Sorkar kaba kynthup halor ka jingdawa kyntiew tulop, halor ka mat ba lada pang ne shitom ki ASHA kim donkam ban siew pisa eiei hynrei dei ban kynthup beit da ka MHIS Card bad kawei pat ka mat kaba kham kongsan ka dei ka jingshah wengkam jong ki ASHA.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingiakynduh ia ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah, ka nongaibuit jong ka Meghalaya Asha Workers Unions ka Kong Soni Kharjana ka la iathuh  ba ka Union kam hun satia ha ka jingiakynduh bad ka Myntri namar ba kam shym la lah ban ai ia ka jubab kaba pynhun ia ki.Na ka liang President jong ka MAWU ka Kong Mira June Myrsing ka la pynbna paidbah ba naduh mynta ka lah sngi U Blei ki ASHA kin shongthait na ka kam kaba ki trei bad ki ap ia ka rai ka ban mih ha ka 6 tarik Naiwieng ha ka jingialang ka ban sa long hapdeng u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma bad ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh halor ki mat jingdawa jong ki ASHA.
title: HADUH KA 6 TARIK U NAIWIENG, YN SANGEH TREIKAM KI ASHA NADUH MYNTA KA SNGI

content: Ka kynhun ba kynthup ia 14 ngut ki Nongthoh Khubor na Maharashtra mynta ka sngi ki la leit jngoh ia ka shnong Mawlynnong, kawei na ki shnong ba khuid tam ha Asia. Ka kynhun ki nongthoh khubor ka la iaroh ia ka deiriti bad ka rukom im kaba iaineh jong ka jylla Meghalaya kaba la don ka jingiahap bad ka mei mariang naduh ki por mynshuwa.  Ka kynhun ka la leit ruh sha Shnongpdeng bad pynlut por harud ka wah Umngot kaba khuid.Ki nongthoh khubor na ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka Maharashtra ki la wan sha Meghalaya bad Assam naduh ka 29 tarik Risaw 2023 haduh 4 tarik Naiwieng 2023 kum shi bynta ka Media Tour ba la pynlong da ka Press Information Bureau, Maharashtra – Goa, Tnat Information and Broadcasting, Sorkar India. Ki nongthoh khubor ki la poi ha nongbah Guwahati hynnin ka sngi bad la pdiang sngewbha ha ki dustur tynrai.Ha ki sngi ban wan, ki nongthoh khubor kin leit iakynduh ia ki kynhun bapher bapher bad iakynduh ia ki riewpawkhmat jong ka Assam bad Meghalaya. Ki kynhun bapher bapher ba ki nongthoh khubor kin leit iakynduh kilong ka Assam Rifles, North East Council, Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council, Assam Police, Tourism Department, AIIMS -Guwahati, IIT-Guwahati bad kiwei kiwei. Kin iakren ruh bad ki lad pathai khubor ba don ha ka thain.Ka Media Tour kadei kaba la thmu ban plie lad ban sngewthuh ia ki sienjam bapher bapher jong ka sorkar ba la sdang ha ki jylla ka thain shatei lammihngi jong ka Meghalaya bad Assam. Ka thmu ruh ban plie lad ban sngewthuh ia ka deiriti  jong ka thain. Kum kine ki jingiakren kin ai jingtip ia ki nongthoh khubor shaphang ki jinglong jingman jong ki briew ka thain, ka ioh ka kot bad ka imlang sahlang bad ka jinglong ki kam saiñpyrthei ha ka jylla bad ki sienjam jong ka sorkar ba iadei bad ka roi ka par. La kyrmen ba lyngba kane ka tour, kan don ka jingiatreilang kaba jrong samoi hapdeng ki lad pathai khubor bad ki tnat sorkar ha kine ki artylli ki thain ka ban plie lad na ka bynta ka jingiasam jingmut.La pynlong ia ka Media tour hapoh ka jingialam jong ka Jaydevi Pujari Swami, Deputy Director, PIB Mumbai ryngkat ka jingkyrshan jong ka PIB Shillong, PIB Guwahati bad DDK Shillong. Ki kynhun pathai khubor print bad electronic ha ki ktien Marathi, Hindi bad English ki la iadon bynta ha kane ka Media Tour.
title: LEIT JNGOH KI NONGTHOH KHUBOR NA MAHARASHTRA ÏA KA SHNONG MAWLYNNONG

content: Ka long ka khubor kaba pynkyndit ia kiba bun balang ban tip ba ha ka Jylla Meghalaya ki briew kiba iap na ka jingpyndonkam ia u duma ki long haduh 8000 hajar ngut manla u snem.Ia kane la pyntip da ka State Nodal Officer jong ka National Tobacco Control Programme (NTCP) Meghalaya ka Dr. Lana E. Lyngdoh Nongbri haba kren ha ka State Level Workshop To Implement WHO-FCTC Article 5.3 Policy in Meghalaya, India halor ka phang, ‘My Meghalaya-Tobacco free-Meghalaya.”Ia kane ka jingiathir ban pynkynmaw jingpynkynmaw bad ban ai jingtip sha ki paitbah nongshong shnong jong ka jylla Meghalaya ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyndonkam ia u duma la pynlong da ka PGIMER Chandigarh, kynthup ruh ka NEIGHRIM Hospital Shillong bad ka Union SEA, New Delhi ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka National Tobacco Controll Programme (NTCP) Meghalaya.Ka Dr. Lana ka la ong ba ka jingthmu ba hakhmat eh jong National Tobacco Control Programme ka long kumno ban pynsngewthuh ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong ba kin pynduna ia ka jingpyndonkam ia u duma.“Ka long ruh ka khubor kaba sngewsih bad phin kyndit ban tip ba ka jingiap jong ki briew hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya na ka jingpyndonkam ia u duma ka long phra hajar ngut manla u snem,” la ong ka Dr. Lana.Ha kane ka jingialang kaba la long ha Landmark Hotel, Shillong la iashim bynta lang da ki ophisar jong ka tnad Pulit lem bad kiwei ophisar na ki katto katne tnad treikam jong ka Sorkar Jylla.
title: 8000 NGUT KIBA ÏAP HA MEGHALAYA MANLA U SNEM NA KA JINGPYNDONKAM ÏA U DUMA

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka lah sngi U Blei lyngba ka New Shillong Township Development Agency ka la aiti ïa ka jaka ban tei ïa ka Permanent Campus jong ka National Law University Meghalaya hapdeng ka jingïasoi soskular ka Meghalaya State Judicial Academy (MSJA) lyngba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma bad u Chief Justice jong ka Meghalaya High Court uba long ruh u Chancellor jong ka National Law University, Meghalaya u Sanjib Banerjee.Ha jingaiti ïa ka jaka ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Mawpdang, Mawkhanu, Shillong la sakhi lang da ka Myntri jong ka tnat Aiñ ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u Rakkam A Sangma bad kiwei kiwei.U Myntri Rangbah haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang u la ong ba ka jingtreikam jong ka Sorkar ka long kaba shai ban kyntiew shaphrang ïa ka Jylla. U la ong ba ka ri India kum ka ri kaba dang kiew shaphrang bad manla ki samla ki dei ban noh synñiang na ka bynta ka jingkiew iriat jong ka ri.  U la ong shuh shuh ki samla ki donkam ban ïoh ïa ki rynsan khnang ba kin dup lah ban noh synñiang sha ka imlang ka sahlang.  U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ruh ïa ki sienjam kiba ka Sorkar ka la buh hakhmat ban tei ïa ki jingshna bapher bapher ha ka jylla na ka bynta ki jingpule kiba shalor bad ki Professional Course.U la bynrap ruh ba ka pule puthi bad ki jaka ai jinghikai pyntbit kim dei ban shu treikam tang ha ki shlem pule hynrei ki dei ban ïaid lang ryngkat da ka jingkyrshan jong ka Sorkar.  “Ki samla kiba dang angnud ban bteng ïa ki  jingpule kiba shalor ki lah ban noh synñiang na ka bynta ki jingdonkam jong ka Sorkar da kaba leh ïa ki jingwad bniah, ki jinglum jingtip bad ka jingbuh jingthoh,” u la ong.U Chief Justice Sanjib Banerjee ha ka jingkren, u la ong, “ngi kwah ba kane ka skulbah kan long ka shlem pule kaba ngi lah ban ïasam ïa ki tiar bad ki buit.  U la pynpaw ruh ka jingkyrmen ba kane ka skulbah ha ki snem ki ban dang wan kan pynrung ïa ki samla pule kiba dei ki nongshong shnong bapura jong ka jylla.U la kyntu ïa iwei pa iwei ban ai jingkyrshan ïa kane ka shlem ai jinghikai ka ban kiew rasong kum ka National Law University Meghalaya ha kaba kan sa long ruh ka shlem pule kaba lah ban paw hakhmat ka pyrthei.Ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi lang da ki Nongbishar ka High Court, Meghalaya, u Vice Chancellor jong ka National Law University, Meghalaya u Professor Indrajit Dube, u Secretary ka Law Department Bah Cyril V. Diengdoh bad u Member Secretary jong ka New Shillong Township Development Agency u Bah E. Kharmalki.
title: AITI KA NTDA ÏA KA JAKA HA MAWPDANG BAN TEI ÏA KA NATIONAL LAW UNIVERSITY, MEGHALAYA

content: Ki Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills ha ka lah sngi U Blei ki la kem ïa u President jong ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) East Khasi Hills District u Bah Bless Dkhar halor ka jingkynnoh ba u donkti ban dawa pisa na ki trok kit mar.Ki Pulit ki la ïathuh ba ka jingkem ïa une u nongïalam ka HNYF  halor ka jingsaphriang jong ka Audio Recording ha ka rynsan Social Media ia ka jingïakren jong u Bah Bless Dkhar bad uwei u briew ba pynshisha ïa ka jinglum pisa jong une u nongïalam ka HNYF na ki trok kit mar ba un ïarap ban pyllait ba kin ïaid na ka Jingkieng Damsite.Ïa kane ka jingïakren u Bah Bles bad uwei u briew uba ym shym la pynithuh la pynmih lyngba ka Audio ha kawei ka lad pathai khubor Electronic Media.Ha ka sngi baar, ki Pulit ki la tian bishar ïa u Bah Bless Dkhar ha Kashari jong u District and Session Judge ka East Khasi Hills District hadien ba la kem ïa u na ka shnong Pohkseh, Shillong bad ka Kashari ka la aibor lai sngi kynthih ïa ki Pulit ban set ha Police Custody na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ki jingtohkit kiba bniah.
title: SHAH KEM U PRESIDENT HNYF-EKH, 3 SNGI AI BOR KA KASHARI ÏA KI PULIT BAN TOHKIT

content: U Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng uba peit ïa ka tnat Road Transport and Highways u Nitin Gadkari ha ka sngi Baar u la pyntip ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la theh pisa kumba T.3 lak klur ha kine ki 10 snem ba la leit noh na ka bynta ban shna ïa ki surokbah National Highway hapoh ki jylla jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi.U Gadkari, u la maham ba ki bor pynïaid ki la ïakynduh mawsiang ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshim jaka ha ki katto katne ki jylla jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kum ka Jylla Meghalaya bad Nagaland bad ki projek ki lah ban shu khang khyrdep noh lada ym lah ban weng noh mardor ïa kine ki jingeh.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang pyrkhat kam halor ka jingpyntrei ïa ki surokbah National Highways ha Assam u Gadkari u la ong, “ki projek kiba shongdor T. 2,89,425 lak klur la theh sha ki Jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ha kine ki 10 snem.  Kine ki long na ka bynta ki projek kiba dang wan, kiba dang pyntrei bad ki projek kiba ladep pyntrei.”U la ong ba ka jingjrong jong ki surokbah National Highway ha kane ka thaiñ ka la nang ïar kumba 10,800 km ha u snem 2014 sha ka 15,740 km haduh mynta. U Myntri u la pynbna ruh ban mang pisa T. 800 klur hapoh ki ar tylli ki skhim na ka bynta ka Jylla Assam.
title: 3 LAK KLUR THEH KA SORKAR PDENG HAPOH 10 SNEM HA NE BAN SHNA ÏA KI SUROK NH: NITIN GADKARI

content: Ka Iingbishar Special Judge (POCSO), East Khasi Hills, Shillong jong ka Swapna G. Momin ha ka 27 tarik Risaw 2023 ka la rai pynrem da kaba set along 14 snem kynthih ia u Mortonjune Kharbani bad ia u Lumding Syiemlieh bad dain kuna ruh  mar 50 hajar marwei halor ka jingdonkti ban leh be-ijot ia kawei ka heprit kaba dang 12 snem, kaba dang pule ia ka Class-VII ha u snem 2018.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills, Shillong Bah Sylvester Nongtnger, u la pyntip, ba ha ka 3 tarik Nohprah 2018, ki Pulit ki la ioh pdiang ia ka ejahar ba mudui ha Mawngap Police Station halor ka jingshah leh be-ijot jong kawei ka heprit kaba dang 12 snem ka rta kaba dang pule ia ka Class VII ha uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Mortonjune Kharbani (45-50 snem ka rta).Katkum ka ejahar la pynpaw ba une u runar u la leh be-ijot ia kane ka heprit la bun bun sien naduh u snem 2017 ha ka ing sah jong ka ha ka por ba ka don marwei.Mar mar ki Pulit ki la register case ha Mawngap Police Station hapoh ka kyndon 506 IPC pule lang bad ka sec 5(l)(m)(n)/6 POCSO Act bad ia ka jingtohkit la pynkhamti ha ka Women Police Sub Inspector ka Kong Larisha Kharjana.Ha ka jingtohkit, la lap ba ka heprit lanot ka la shah leh khelmakor ruh ha uwei pat u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Lumding Syiemlieh. Ynda la pyndep ia ka jingtohkti la pynngat kyndon ia kine ki arngut ki runar.
title: 14 SNEM RAI SET ALONG KA ÏINGBISHAR ÏA KI ARNGUT KI RUNAR BA LEH BE-IJOT ÏA KA HEPRIT

content: “Ka District Council ka dei ka stieh jong ka jaidbyndriew bad katba dang don ka District Council ka jaidbyndriew kan nym don ha tmier kumba bun kiba ong ba ka jaidbynriew Khasi ka la ha tmier,” ong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla haba kren ha ka jingialang kynmaw burom ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap kaba 64 snem jong u Kpa ka Sixth Schedule u Rev. JJM Nichols Roy.Ia kane ka jingrakhe la pynlong da ka Rev. JJM Nichols Roy Memorial Committee bad ka Rev. JJM Nichols Roy College, Qualapaty ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC).U Bah Tynsong ula ong shuh shuh, “lait noh sa tang lada wan ka Article 371 kata kein ka dei ka tmier ia ka jaidbyndriew bad ka jaidbyndriew ka lah ban duh noh.”Ha kane ka jingrakhe, la sakhi lang da u Chief Executive Member jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ryngkat ki Executive Member, ki MDC, ki dkhot jong ka Rev. JJM Nichols Roy Memorial Committee, ki nonghikai jong ka JJM Nichols Roy College, ki samla pule jong ka College bad kiwei kiwei. Ha kane ka sngi la sam ruh ia ki khusnam sha ki nongjop ha ka Debate Competition, ka Cross Country Race & Run ba la pynlong da kane
title: KATBA DANG DON KA DISTRICT COUNCIL, KA JAIDBYNRIEW KAN YM DON HA TMIER : PRESTONE

content: U Bah Sandondor Ryntathiang bad ki katto katne ngut ki nongialam na Jaintia Hills, na Umsning, Ribhoi District bad na Sohiong, East Khasi Hills District da kawei ka jingmut ki la shim ia ka rai ban mih na ka Hills State People Democratic Party (HSPDP) bad ban pyniasoh bad  ka Voice of The People.Ka ktem jong ka HSPDP Youth Wing ka la pra shwa ba ka Jylla kan leit sha ka elekshon Lok Sabha bad Autonomous District Council (ADC) ki ban long shen ha u snem 2024.Ia ka shithi iehnohkam, u Bah Sandondor Ryntathiang bad ki 18 ngut ki nongialam la phah sha u President ka HSPDP Central Body ha ka 1 tarik Naiwieng,Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Sandondor Ryntathiang uba long u President jong ka Hills State People Democratic Party (HSPDP) Youth Wing Central Body ula kam ba ka jingiehnoh jong kum u President bad mih noh na ka party kam don kano kano ka daw hynrei ka jingmih jong u na ka party ka dei namarba ki bun ki jingeh lada un dang iaineh bad ka party HSPDP.“Hooid ka nongrim kaba biang, hynrei ngi iohi ban pynskhem bad pynkhlaiñ ia ka nongrim ban leit sha u paidbah ka eh than ia ngi. Kata ka long ha ka jingiohi jong ngi kum ka kynhun lada ngi don ha ka HSPDP,” u la ong.Haba kylli, u la ong, “hooid, nga don (ka jingthmu ban leit pyniasoh bad kiwei pat ki party), ngam lah ban len ia kata bad ngi ladep shim ruh ia ka rai.  Hooid, ka HSPDP ka don ia ka nongrim kaba skhem hynrei haba ngi peit pat ia ki nongialam ka kham tlot shibun eh. Lada ngim lah ban trei ka shu kut noh tang hangta hi. Ka rai kaba ngi la shim ka long ba ngin pyniasnoh bad ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) kaba don ia ka nongrim kaba skhem kum ka HSPDP hi bad ka jingialam hapoh ka VPP hi ka long kaba khlain kumba ngi iohi ha kine ki taiew bad ki bnai, kylleng ka bri u Hynñiewtrep ki paidbah ki la ai ka jingkyrshan ia ka VPP. Ngi ruh ngin nang pynkhlain shuh shuh da kaba leit pyniasnoh.”U la iathuh ruh ba u la pyniasoh bad ka HSPDP naduh u snem 2019 bad don ruh napdeng ki nongialam kiba la rai ban mih noh na ka HSPDP kiba la pyniasoh mynba u Bah Ardent M. Basaiawmoit u dang long u President ka HSPDP.“Ka jingbym don shuh jong u Bah Ardent hapoh ka HSPDP ka la pynsah khyllung khynnah tangba ngi dang don ka jingkyrmen ban pynkhlaiñ ka HSPDP. Hynrei U Blei u plie pat ia ka lad ka lynti ban iadon lang bad u Bah Ardent ha kane ka kynti ba mynta bad ngi kyrmen skhem ba ngin nang lah ban ai ia ka jingshakri kaba bha ynda ngi ruh ngi la don lang shata (VPP),” u la ong.Shuh shuh u la ong, ban pynkhlain ia ka HSPDP hapoh ka jingialam jong u Bah KP Pangniang ka eh than bad dei halor kane ka nongrim ba ma u lem bad ki paralok jong u, ki la rai ban mih noh na ka HSPDP.Kiwei pat ki nongialam kiba la mih noh na ka HSPDP ki long u Sequacious Pakma, Vice President Youth Wing bad Convenor Jaintia Hills, Helvi Stone Nongbri Vice President Youth Wing, Balumlang Nongbri Vice President Ribhoi bad General Secretary Umsning Circle, Winson Lyngdoh Nonglait, Vice President Umsning Circle, Donbor Marbaniang Organising Secretary Umsning Circle, Shaibanroi Lapang Office Secretary Umsning Circle, Alexius Shadap President Youth Wing Umsning Circle, Ribok Kharpran Vice President Youth Wing Umsning Circle, David Stone Syngkli General Secretary Youth Wing Umsning Circle katba ki dkhot jong ka Umsning Circle ki kynthup ia u Dishon Sun, Aiborlang Synnah, March Born Nongbri, Bah SP Nongbet Adiverser Umsning Circle bad uba long ruh u Hill State Volunteer, Megaland Swer Adviser Sohiong Circle, Janborning Mawlong Adviser Sohiong Circle, Ribanshai Kharbuli General Secretary Sohiong Circle, Shankios Kharbuki Publicity Secretary Sohiong Circle bad Camio Kharbuki dkhot ka Sohiong Circle.
title: PRA KA KTEM U SING, RAI BAN PYNÏASOH VPP U PRESIDENT YOUTH WING BAD KI NONGÏALAM

content: Ka Federation of Khasi-Jaintia & Garo People (FKJGP) ka dap da ka jingsngew lynngoh halor ka jingkynthoh jong u Myntri jong ka Sorkar jylla uba peit ia ka tnad PHE ha ki lad pathai khubor haba iadei bad ka jingshim nongmuna ia ka umbam umdih na ki 46 tylli tyllong um na ki kyntoit bapher bapher jong ka nongbah shillong.“Ka Seng kam sngewpher ia kane ka jingkwah tep eit miaw jong une u Myntri ka tnad PHE namar u hap ban darapjot ia ka jingtreikam thurmur jong ka tnat jong u kaba pynpoi ia ka umbam umdih kiba buh jingma ia u paidbah ha ki 44 tylli ki tyllong um katkum ka kaiphot ba la ioh da ka Seng lyngba ka State Food Testing Laboratory Pasteur Hills, Shillong,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President ka FKJGP Central Body, Bah Dundee C. Khongsit.Haba pynshai halor ka jingshim nongmuna dang shen da ka seng ia ka um na ki kyntoit bapher bapher ka Sor Shillong, u Bah Khongsit u la ong, “khyndiat khnang ban iashai, ka Seng ka shim ia kane ka sienjam banyngkong ban phah shim nongmuna na ki Kor um bad top um na kylleng ki kyntoit bapher bapher jong ka nongbah shillong ka long hadien ka jingujor na ki paidbah na ki shnong bapher bapher kaba la poi sha ka seng. Khnang ban pyntikna ia kane ka jingartatien jong ki paidbah ka Seng kaba don ia ka jingkitkhlieh ka la shim ia kane ka bynta ban phah leh tes ia ka um katkum ka jingbtah kyrpang (Standard Operating Procedure) jong ka State Food Testing Laboratory Pasteur Hills, Shillong ym kumba la kynnoh da u Myntri ba imat ka FKJGP ka la leit tong ruma naei naei ne nangno nangno kaba sngewsih imat une u Myntri u khlem pat pule imat ia kato ka kaiphod (report copy) kaba ngi la aiti sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla bad phah kopi ruh sha u Myntri ka PHE bad sha ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka sorkar jylla bad dei na kata ka daw u sa kren klumar.  Jin lada u la pule un lap bad un tip shai katno tylli ki tyllong ne ki kor um kiba la phah tes bad katno tylli kiba don jingma bad katno tylli kiba shngain.”“Sa kawei ruh ngi kwah ba u Myntri jong ka tnad PHE u dei ban long khuid haba iadei bad kane ka bynta namar u ong ba ka um ba la sam da ka tnad PHE ka long kaba biang bad shngain ban dih namar ki ladep tes na Mawphlang Treatment Plant te sngewbha ai ia ki kopi jong ki kaiphod ba la leh ia kita ki tes lyngba ki lad phathai khubor ym ban shu kren tang da ka shyntur, ko myntri kane ka dei ka kam iap kam im jong u paidbah khamtam u duk u suk namar kum ka Seng ngi kwah ban iada ia u paidbah shwa ban ioh ka jingpang kumba ong ha ka ktien nongwei, ‘Prevention is better than cure” na kaba dih ia kum kine ki jait um ba la sam da ka tnad PHE,” la kynthoh ka Seng.Ka Seng ka kwah ban buh kane ka jingkylli tharai lyngba ka jingpynskhem bad jingpynshai jong u Myntri ba ka um ba la sam da ka tnad PHE ka long kaba la shngain shisha ai ba ka um ba ki Myntri Sorkar ne ki Heh Sorkar kiba shong ha Secreteriat kin dih beit beit ia ka um kaba wan na tyllong ne top um ka PHE, ym donkam shuh ban ia buh kito ki Filter ne Aquaguard namarba bun na ki longiing ki dei ki bym kot bor ne kiba duk kim bym iohlad kumba buh ma ki ha Secreteriat.“Ka Seng kan ym shong kli kti halor kane ka mat kaba ktah im im peit peit ia ka koit ka khiah jong u paidbah bad kyntu ia ka Sorkar ba kan leh la ki jong ki kamram,” la pynkut u kyrwoh.
title: U MYNTRI PHE U DARAPJOT ÏA KA JINGTREIKAM THURMUR KA TNAT JONG U : FKJGP

content: Ki Rangbah Shnong jong ka shnong Mawlai Nongkwar, Umthlong, Mawiong bad Mawiongrim ha ka sngi balang ki la leit ban ud bad nam hakhmat u Myntri ka tnat Public Health Engineering (PHE) u Marcuise N. Marak hapoh ka jingialam jong u MDC ka Mawlai Constituency u Bah Teiborlang Pathaw ban pynsngew halor ka jingslem ban trei pyndep ia ka skhim sam umbam umdih lyngba ka Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM) kaba don ha ka shong Lum Mawnei kaba tan ia ka um na ka tyllong um Lum Shyllong.Lyngba ka skhim JJM, ka tnat PHE ka la buh thong ban pynpoi ia ka umbam umdih sha ki saw tylli ki shnong, kata, ha ka shnong Nongkwar, Umthlong, Mawiong bad Mawiongrim ban pynpoi ia ka umkor sha ki 3 hajar tylli ki thliew iing.Ha ka jingiakren bad lad pathai khubor u Bah Teiborlang Pathaw u la iathuh ba ka jingkynduh ia u Myntrri ka long ban kham pynsted ia kane ka kam ha ka por kaba biang bad kumjuh ruh ban pyndep ha ka por ba ka Sorkar ka la buh.U  la iathuh ba kat haduh mynta ka jaka pyllang um hapoh ka shnong Mawiong bad Mawiongrim ka ladep bad mynta ki dang sdang sa ha ka shnong Umthlong Lum Mawnei bad ka Treatment Plan ha Lum  Mawnei.Shuh shuh u la iathuh, na ka daw ka jingjur shaba palat u slap ha kine ki bnai ba ladep ym shym la lah satia ban pyntrei ia kane ka skhim bad u la pynpaw ka jingkyrmen ba mynta ka bneng ka la rang na ka liang jong ka Sorkar kan sa bthah noh ia ki nongtrei ba kin sdang ban shna noh ia ka Treatment Plan.U la iathuh ba ki dang don katto katne ki jaka kiba dang hap ban ia pynbeit hynrei na ka liang jong kine ki bor synshar shnong kin sa pynbeit ia kane ka kam khnang ba yn dup lah ban shna pyndep ia kane ka skhim hapoh u snem 2024.Ia kane ka skhim JJM ha Lum Mawnei kaba kot 95 klur tyngka la buh mawnongrim da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha u snem 2022 da ka jingsakhi lang jong Myntri barim ka tnat PHE u Bah Reniktor L. Tongkhar, u MDC ka Mawlai Constituency u Bah Teiborlang Pathaw bad ki Rangbah Shnong jong ki shnong bapher bapher ka Mawlai.
title: BYM TREIKAM KA SKHIM JJM HA LUM MAWNEI, PYNSNGEW KI RS HA U MYNTRI PHE

content: U Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri India u Narendra Modi bad ka Myntri Rangbahduh jong ka ri Bangladesh, ka Sheikh Hasina ha ka sngi balang ki la plie paidbah ïa ka lynti rel Akhaura-Agartala.U Secretary jong ka North Eastern Council (NEC) u K Moses Chalai u la ong, na kane ka projek lynti rel kaba 12 kilomitar, 5.45 kilomitar kaba hap ha ka bynta jong ka ri India ka dei kaba la bei tyngka da ka tnat DoNER bad ka NEC kaba kot T. 863 klur. Ka jingmang pisa baroh na ka bynta ka projek kaba 12 kilomitar ka long T. 973 klur ha u bnai Naitung, 2016.  Ka NEC ka ladep pyllait T. 798.73 klur.U la ai jingkren sha ka kynhun jong ki 13 ngut ki nongthoh khubor na ka Jylla Maharashtra kiba la ïakynduh kyrpang ïa u ha ka kamra treikam ha NEC.Kane ka kynhun ka la ïashim bynta ha ka jingleit peit bniah ba la pynlong da ka Press Information Bureau hapoh ka skhim ba la bei tyngka da ka Sorkar Pdeng kaba la tip kum ka Development Communication and Information Dissemination.Kane ka dei da ka jingthmu ban pyni ïa ki kam pynroi bapher bapher ba la sdang ha jylla Meghalaya, ka bynta jong ki kynhun bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar India ban ai jingkyrshan na ka bynta ka jingshngain bad ka roi ka par bad pyni ïa ka jingriewspah ka deiriti jong ka jylla.Haba ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor, u Secretary u la ong ba ka North Eastern Council (NEC) kaba long ka Nodal Agency na ka bynta ka jingkyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot bad ka imlang sahlang jong ka thain Shatei Lammihngi ka la long kaba kongsan ha ki kam jong ka.Ki jingjop ha ki 50 snem ba la leit hadien ba la sdang ïa ka ha u snem 1972, ki la long kiba khraw ha ka liang ka jingkyntiew ïa ki jingdon jingem, ka pule puthi, ka koit ka khiah bad ki kam rep.Namarba ka long ka kynhun kaba pynkhreh kam na ka bynta ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi, ka NEC ka la plie ïa ka North East Resource Centre (NERCEN) da ki jingthmu ban kyntiew ïa ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka Remote Sensing and Satellite Imagery, ka rynsan ai jingtip ïa ki nongjngohkai kaba don nongrim ha ka GIS bad ka jingpeit ïa ka jingduna ha ka jingïasoh lyngba ki surok.Ka jingkyntiew ïa ka jingwad bniah bad ki jingsaiñdur thymmai ha ki kam kiba ïadei bad ka jingkylla ka suiñ bneng, ki teknoloji ba saiñ dur thymmai, ka jingbuh jingtip shaphang ki rukom im tynrai, ki rukom thoh dak bad ki ktien kiba don ha ka jingma ban duh jait bad ki jaka ba sahdien bad ka Data Centre bad ruh kawei ka jaka pdeng ban ïoh jingtip shaphang ki lad kamai jakpoh.U Chalai u la ong ba ka NEC ka dei kaba don bynta ha ka jingsdang bun ki projek kiba heh kum ka Regional Institute of Medical Sciences (RIMS), Imphal, North East Police Academy (NEPA) Shillong, North Eastern Electrical Power Corporation Ltd. (NEEPCO) Shillong, ka North Eastern Region Agriculture Marketing Corporation (NERAMC) Guwahati, North Eastern Regional Institute of Science bad  Technology (NERIST) Itanagar, Regional Institute of Paramedical bad Nursing Sciences (RIPNS) Aizawl, North Eastern Regional Institute of Water and Land Management (NERIWLM) Tezpur, ka Lokpriya Gopinath Bordoloi Regional Institute of Mental Health (LGBRIMH), Tezpur, North Eastern Space Application Centre (NESAC) Shillong,  Bhubaneswar Borooah Cancer Institute, Regional Dental College (BBCIRD) Guwahati, Regional Nursing College (RNC) Guwahati, Regional Institute of Pharmaceutical Science bad Technology (RIPST) Agartala bad ka Cane and  Bamboo Technology Centre (CBTC) ha Guwahati.U la ai jingtip ïa ka kynhun ba la shna 11,432.00 kilomitar ki surok da ka jingbei pisa jong ka NEC ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi. ka la ai jingïarap ban buh ïa ki jaka pynmih bording ba 694.5 megawatt bad ka jingshna 10,341.63 Circuit Kilomitar ki sainar pynpur bording, ka jingshna 11 tylli ki Inter-State Bus Terminus (ISBT) bad ka jingkyntiew ïa ki jingdon jingem ha 5 tylli ki kad liengsuiñ jong ka thaiñ.Ka la ai jingkyrshan ïa ka North Eastern Region Community Resource Management Project (NERCORMP) ka projek na ka bynta ki kam kamai jakpoh ba lah ban ïaineh ryngkat ka jingkyrshan na ka IFAD.Ka Deputy Director, PIB Mumbai ka Jayadevi bad u Deputy Director ka DDK Shillong u Sarnag Pofale, M&CO PIB u Gopajit Das bad ki ophisar jong ka NEC ki la ïadonlang ha kane ka jingïalang.
title: 863 KLUR PYLLAIT KA DoNER BAD NEC NA KA BYNTA KA LYNTI REL AKHAURA-AGARTALA

content: Ka Balang Catholic satlak ka pyrthei ha ka sngi Palei ka la kynmaw burom ïa ka sngi jong ki mynsiem kiba la khladnoh na kane ka sla pyrthei bad ban duwai kyrpang na ka bynta jong ki ban poi suk sha dwai U Blei.Ha kane ka Jyllaniam Bah Shillong, ka Balang Catholic ruh ka la tyrwa ïa ka Mass Bakhuid na bynta ki mynsiem kiba la khlad noh ha kaba u Lyngdohsad jong ka Jyllaniam Bah Shillong u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh u la tyrwa ïa ka kñia ka khriam jong ka Mass na ka bynta ki mynsiem ba la khladnoh ha ryngkat ka jingsynran lang kiwei pat ki Lyngdoh Sohblei bad ki hajar ngut ki bahaing hasem jong ki riewngeit ba la tep ha u lum jingtep jong ka Balang ha Laitumkhrah.Ki bahaing hasem kiba la pynkhuid ïa ki lum jingtep, ki la buh ruh ïa ki syntiew ba la thaiñ kum ki pansngiat bad thang ruh ïa ki mombati kiba la pynthaba khrek ïa u lum jingtep.Hadien ba la kut ka jinglehniam, ki Lyngdoh Sohblei ki la kyrkhu ïa ki lum jingtep ba la synran lang da ki bahaing hasem kiba  pynlong  ruh ïa ka jingduwai na ka bynta ki bahaing hasem kiba la khladnoh na kane ka pyrthei shiphang sngi.U Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh haba pharia ïa ka Ktien U Blei ha ka jinglehniam u la ong, “kumba la kha ïa u briew sha ka pyrthei ka dei ruh ka bynta jong man la u briew ban leit phai pat na kane ka pyrthei bad na kata ka daw ka dei ka kamram jong manla uwei pa uwei ban im ka jingim kaba bha bad kaba sngewrit na bynta ban pynsngewbha ïa U Blei Trai Kynrad.”U la ong kumba ha ka Gospel, u Jisu u khot ba kito kiba shitom bad ïa kiba khia ka jingkit ba kin wan sha U kumta ruh ka dei ka kamram jong manla uwei pa uwei uba ngeit bad leit sha U Jisu ban pynjah thait ïalade.Ha rilum Jaintia, ki i paidriewngeit jong ka Balang Catholic ka Jyllaniam Jowai ki la rakhe kynmaw burom ïa ki mynsiem kiba la khladnoh ne ka ‘All Soul’s Day’ da kaba leit buh syntiew ha ki lum jingtep jong ki bahaing hasem kiba la khlad noh.Ha Parish Jowai, la rakhe ïa kane ka sngi da ka jingleit buh syntiew ha u lum jingtep jong ka Balang Katholik Jowai kaba don ha Moosalangkat ha kaba la pynlong ruh ia ka jingknia ia ka Mass Bakhuid da u Bishop ka Jyllaniam Jowai u Rt. Rev. Ferdinand Dkhar ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong ki Lyngdoh Sohblei bad ki riewniam.Ïa kane ka jingbun syntiew la pynlong ruh ha kiwei kiwei de ki Parish.Ha West Jaiñtia Hills na ka liang jong ka Balang CNI, Jowai ruh ka la kynmaw burom ïa ki mynsiem ba la khladnoh da kaba leit buh syntiew ha u lum jingtep uba don ha Khliehïongriang, Jowai.
title: KYNMAW BUROM KA BALANG CATHOLIC KA JYLLANIAM BAH SHILLONG ÏA KI RIEWNGEIT BA LA KHLAD NOH

content: Ki Pulit ka Anti Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) ka East Khasi Hills District ha ka janmiet sngi thohdieng ki la ïoh kem ïa uwei u snar khaii drok uba la 45 snem ka rta ha Jingkieng Umshyrpi kaba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Jhalupara Out Post.Ha ka jingtalasi, ki Pulit ki la kurup kawei ka mobile Phone, phra tylli ki sla kotkhubor ba la pyndonkam ban song ïa ki dawai kuli, 940 tylli ki dawai kuli Nitrazepam IP 10 mg kiba khia 9400mg, kawei ka pla rong iong.Ki Pulit ki la register case hapoh ka NDPS Act ha Lumdiengjri Police Station halor ka jingdie tuh ïa une u jingdih pynbuaid.
title: NA JINGKIENG UMSHYRPI KEM KI PULIT IA U NONGKHAÏI DROK

content: Tang hapoh khyndiat kynta ba ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) ka la pynlong da ka jingiakhih ha Jantar Mantar, New Delhi ban dawa ia ka Sorkar NDA ba ialam da ka BJP ban pynrung ia ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra, ban mynjur ia ka Inner Line Permit bad ban weng ia ka jingeh jong ki paidbah kiba sah ha khappud ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam, mar mar ka MP jong ka Tura ka Agatha Sangma ka la ialam ia ki MLA na rilum Garo kiba long ruh ki Myntri hapoh ka Sorkar Jylla ban leit iakynduh ia u Secretary ka Ministry of Home Affairs ban pynsngew halor ka jingdawa ban pynrung lang ia ka Ktien Garo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India.Ki MLA ka rilum Garo kiba la synran lang ia ka Agatha ki long u Lamphang ka Ïingdorbar Thawain ka jylla u Thomas Sangma, u Myntri ka tnad PHE u Marcuise N. Marak bad ki nongialam jong ka Achik Literature Society (ALS) Garo hapoh ka jingialam jong ka President ka Dr. Caroline Marak.Kane ka jingleit her kyrkieh jong ka MP bad ki MLA ka rilum Garo ka long hadien ba ka Sorkar India ka la thaw ia ka Committee ka ban bishar bniah ia ki 38 tylli ki jait ktien hapoh ka ri India ba kynthup ruh ia ka Ktien Khasi lait noh ka Ktien Garo na ka bynta ban pynrung ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka ri India.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum la iathuh ba ka Ministry of Home Affairs ka la kular ban kynthup lang ia ka Ktien Garo ha ka thup ki jait Ktien ban ioh jingithuh.“Ka la don ka jingdawa na ki paidbah ban kynthup noh ia ka Ktien Garo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra bad ki Ophisar jong ka Ministry of Home Affairs ki la mynjur ban kynthup ia ka Ktien Garo ha ka thup ki jait ktien ban ioh jingmynjur,” la ong ka Agatha.Ia ka ktien Garo la kren ha ki san tylli ki distrik jong ka rilum Garo ka Jylla Meghalaya bad kynthup ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia.
title: HA U SECRETARY KA MHA PYNSNGEW KA MP TURA BAD KI MLA BAN IOH JINGITHUH KA KTIEN GARO

content: Shillong, Naiwieng 03: Ka Shad Nongkrem kaba dei shi bynta jong ka jingleh niam jong ka Hima Khyrim, ka la nang kiew da ka jingiashim bynta shitrhem bha jong ki khun ki hajar ka Hima bad khamtam eh da ka jingwan tuid jong ki briew kiba nabar ka jylla ban sakhi ia kane ka lehniam kaba paw bha jong ka Hima, katba nang iaid ki sngi bad ki snem.Ka jingpynlong ia kane ka jingshad kaba shisien shisnem ka long ban ai nguh ia u Blei Trai Kynrad ba Un theh ia ki jingkyrkhu na ka bynta ban bha ka rep ka riang bad ka jingkoit jingkhiah jong ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima.Ia kane ka Shad Nongkrem la sdang da ka jingshad noh kjat da ki Bakhraw jong ka Hima na ka iing Sad iing Sunon bad ynda ladep ki Bakhraw la bud pat sa ki khun Syiem jong ka Hima Khyrim ryngkat bad ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima Khyrim.Ki rang kynsai kiba iashim bynta ha kane ka jingshad ki da riam ki da kup ia ka spong ha ryngkat bad u Thuïa, u Paila, u Shanryndang, ka Jymphong, u Ryngkap bad u Symphiah ia uba ki kaweh ha ka shad mastieh.Katba ki thei sotti kiba iashim bynta ha ka shad Ainguh ki da deng da ka Pangsngiat kaba la don lang bad u Lasubon uba long kum u kynja syntiew bad ia ki paila ha ryndang bad u kynjri Tabut rupa lem bad ki sai khyllong bad ki kpieng nalor kiwei pat.Ka riam tynrai ka dei kaba la khring bad pynshoh biej bha ia ki nongwan jngohkai  kynthup ïa kiba wan ban sakhi ha ka sien ba nyngkong ia kane ka lehniam jong ka Hima Khyrim.Mynta u snem 2023, Nalor ki Khun Syiem, ki nongshad kiba la poi ban iashim bynta ha madan shad jong ka Hima Khyrim ki long 395 ngut, kata, 174 ngut ki thei sotti bad 121 ngut ki rangkynsai bad kine ki nongshad ki bud ryntih na ka sur ba la pynmih na ki jingtem jingput jong ki Duhalia.Ia kane ka jingshad la pynkut noh ha ka por janmiet bad hadien kane la sdang pat sa ka jinglehniam jong ka Hima Khyrim hapoh ka iing Sad ia kaba ym shah iano iano ban rung ha kane ka jaka lehniam.Hadien ba ladep, ki Lyngdoh bad ki Bakhraw Batri jong ka Hima ki la hiar sha madan shad ban leh ia ka niam ka rukom hashwa ban ot ia u blang ba la wanrah na ki Raid bapher bapher kiba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Hima Khyrim, hynrei kaei kaba phylla ka long ba kynsan kynsan la wan mih ka kynja puit bad ka leit ban tur shajan jong ka ding kaba la buh hapdeng madan bad haba pyrshang bad tip ka dei kaei, ym shym la don ba lah ban jubab hynrei kiba ong ba ha ka lehniam kin don beit kiba wan paw kum ki khñniang ki lah ban dei ki Ryngkew bad ki Basa.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi ruh ia ki kynrem ki lyndan kiba la wan sakhi hi da la ki jong ki khmat ba kynthup ia u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u Chief Secretary ka jylla u Bah Donald P. Wahlang, u Director General of Police (DGP) u Dr. Lajja Ram Bishnoi, u Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka KHADC u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem, u Dy. CEM Bah Pynshngaiñ N. Syiem nalor ki Executive Member ka KHADC.Hashwa ba kane ka lehniam jong ka Hima Khyrim, u Syiem Khynnah u la pom ia ki Blang kiba la wanrah na ki Raid bapher bapher jong ka Hima Khyrim kiba la wanrah ha iing Sad kaba don ha ka shnong Smit.Ha ka jingiakren bad ka Batesi Tv u Syiem ka Hima Khyrim u Dr. Balajied Sing Syiem u la ong ba ka jingpoi jong ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima ban pyndap smam ia ka madan shad ka long ban pyndon burom ia ka Hima ba shisien shi snem ban ai ka nguh ka dem ha U Blei Trai Kynrad na ka bynta ban khyrku kyrdoh ia baroh.
title: ÏASHIM BYNTA KI THEI SOTTI BAD KI RANGKYNSAI HA KA SHAD NONGKREM

content: Ka Anti Ragging Committee jong ka North-Eastern Hill University (NEHU) ka la shong ia ka jingialang ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la rai ban phah da ka jingthoh sha u Director General of Police ka Jylla u Dr. LR Bishnoi, sha u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah DP Wahlang bad sha u Superintendent of Police jong ka Tura ban kyntu ba kin pynstet ia ka jingtohkit halor ka jingshah thombor jong uwei u samla uba pule ha NEHU Tura Campus.Ka Anti Ragging Committee ka la shim ia kane ka rai hadien ba ka jingshah thombor jong uwei u samla pule ka la ktah haduh katta katta ia ka pule ka puthi hapoh ka skulbah.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Public Relations Officer ka NEHU u Dr. Davidson Pyngrope, ka Committee ka la rai ban phah ruh ia ka jingthoh sha u Campus Director jong ka NEHU Tura Campus, ban pynpaw lada ym lah ban pynithuh mardor ia kiba donkti, ka University ka lah ban shim da ki sienjam kiba tyngeh katkum ki kyndon jong ka University Grants Commission (UGC).La rai ruh ban bthah ia ki nongpeit ia ka Hostel bad kiwei kiwei ki ophisar ba la shah pynkhamti kam kin hap ban ai ia ki jingpynshai kiba bniah halor ka jingdkoh kaba pynslem ban ujor ia ka ejahar kaba iadei bad ka jingjia.Ka Committee ka la tyrwa ban thaw ia ka kynhun kaba saw ngut ki dkhot, kynthup ruh ia ki dkhot kiba na shabar, ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah halor ka jingshah thombor jong u samla pule.Ka University kan bishar bniah ruh halor ka jingkyrpad jong ki nongialam ka jaidbynriew Naga khnang ban ioh ia ka jingkren jong u lanot, da ka jingmynjur jong u lanot, khnang ban dup ithuh noh kham kloi ia kiba donkti.Ka Committee ka la rai ban pynlong biang ia ka jingialang hadien ar taiew khnang ban shong bishar kam halor kane ka jingjia bad kiwei de ki kam kiba mih thymmai.Ha ka jingialang ba la pyniaid da u Vice-Chancellor uba long ruh u Chairman jong ka Committee kala iakren sani bha halor ka jingshah thombor jong u samla pule bad halor ka jingiakynduh bad ki nongialam ka jaidbynriew Naga bad ki sengbhalang bad halor ka jingthaw ia ka Inquiry Committee da ka University ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit halor ka jingjia.Na ka liang jong ka Naga Elders bad ki sengbhalang kynthup ruh ka Inquiry Committee, ki ladep aiti ia ka kaiphod, hynrei haduh mynta ym pat lah satia ban ithuh ia ka durkhmat jong kito kiba donkti ban leh kam sniew.Ha ka jingialang, u Dean of Students’ Welfare, Prof. R. L. Nongkhlaw, u la pyntip halor ka jingpyrshang jong ka University ban iakynduh ia u lanot lyngba ki bahaing hasem jong u.“Kaba sngewsih, ki bahaing hasem ki la pynpaw ka jingbym mon ban ailad ia ki bor jong ka NEHU ban iakynduh ia u halor kane ka kam.  U Proctor Dr. P. Khongji, u la pyntip shaphang ka jingleit jurip jong ka committee ia ka Tura Campus bad pyntip ruh halor ki jingtohkit ba la pynlong da ki Pulit ka Tura ia ki samla pule bad ia u Warden,” la iathuh u kyrwoh.U Dean of Students’ Welfare u la pyntip hakhmat ka Committee ba u ladep iasyllok ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynkynriah noh ia u samla pule sha kawei pat ka tnat pule, ia kaba ka University ka kloi ban leh mardor, hynrei na ka liang jong u lanot u la pynpaw ba um kwah shuh ban dang bteng ia ka jingpule ha kane ka samoi.“Ka NEHU Anti-Ragging Committee kan pynthikna ia ka jingshngaiñ jong ki samla pule bad kan iai bteng ruh ban trei shitom halor kane ka jingjia.  Ka University ka kyntu ia kino kino kiba don jingtip halor kane ka jingjia kin wan shakhmat khnang ba kan iarap ia ka jingtohkit,” la ong u kyrwoh.
title: BA SHAH THOMBOR U SAMLA PULE HA TURA CAMPUS, YN UJOR KA NEHU SHA U DGP BAD CS

content: Ki Motor Vehicle Inspector (MVI) ha ka janmiet sngi thohdieng ki la bat naphang ïa ki trok kit mar ha Lad Umroi, Umïam, kynthup ïa kiba kit marbam mardih kiba dang thmu ban rung sha nongbah ShillongKine ki trok ki la shah bat ha ki MVI jong ka tnat Transport ka Sorkar Jylla ka long namarba la pyntreikam pyrkhing ïa ka hukum jong ka tnad Bording kaba mana bad buh da u pud ban shah ïa ki kali kit mar ba kin ïaid nalor ka jingkieng Damsite.Ïa kane ka hukum la pynmih da ka Under Secretary jong ka tnat Bording ka Kong Josephine Nongbet kaba la phah sha ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills Kong RM Kurbah ba kan pyntreikam mardor.Kane ka heh Ophisar jong ka tnat Bording ka la kynthup ruh ba ka kaiphod halor ka Safety Audit jong kane ka jingkieng pyllait um ha Umïam ba la ïoh na ka IIT, Guwahati, ka la ai jingmut ba ym dei shuh ban shah ïaid ïa ki kali heh na kane ka jingkieng katba ym pat lah shna bha ïa ki Girder Beam bad ïa ka Deck Slab.Ka kynhun ki nonglum khubor kiba la hiar sha Lad Umroi ha ka jingïakren bad ki nongniah trok kiba kit ïa ki marbam ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew khohñïoh halor kane ka jingshah pynphai kylla na Lad Umroi ha kaba ki MVI kim shym la shah shuh ban ïaid lyngba ka jingkieng Damsite.“Kiba bun hi ki dei ki trok kit marbam ba ngi thmu ban leit kit sha Shillong. Lada ki bor bahalor ki khang ban ïaid ïa ki trok ki ladei ban pyntip lypa hynrei ym ban shu leh kumne,” la ong ki nongñiah trok ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Ha kane ka janmiet, la sakhi ruh da ki phew tylli ki trok kit mar ki bym shym la ïoh shuh ban ïaid lyngba na ka jingkieng Damsite.“Ngi kyrpad ïa ki bor bahalor kiba peit ïa kane ba kin pyrkhat.  Khlem ïoh notis ngi shu shah pynieng hangne bad lada poi ki mar kan buh jingeh bad kan pynkiew dor ïa ki marbam,” la ong ki nongñiah trok bad ïathuh ruh ba bun na ki trok kiba la shah bat ki dei beit tang ki trok kiba kit marbam kum u khaw, ka shini, u phan, u piat bad kiwei kiwei.“Ngi lei ngi kit ïa ki marbam tang hapoh 18 ton katba ïa ki kali kiba ïaid mynmiet kiba kit mawiong kam leilei kiba kit 30 ton. Lada ki kali kit marbam ka ktah ïa ka jingkieng hato ki kali kit maw kam ktah seh ïa ka jingkieng kiba kit 30 ton, 40 ton?” la kynthoh kine ki nongñiah trok kiba kit marbam.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong kine ki nongñiah trok, kiba bun na ki trok ki dei kiba la shah bat naduh hynnin ka miet sngi Palei bad ki nongñiah trok ki pynpaw ruh ka jingsngew sih ba ki nongñiah trok kim ïoh wat tang ka bam ka dih.Haba pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah katkum ka hukum ban pyllait tang ïa ki kali kiba kit tang 15 ton, ki nongñiah trok ki la ong, “kam ïahap satia ban pyllait tang 15 ton namarba tang ka kali ruh ka la khia lypa 8 ne 9 ton bad sa ki mar ki mata ka la nang khia shuh shuh. Ngi kyrpad ïa ki bor bahalor ba kin peit bad kin ïarap lem ïa ka jingeh jong ki nongñiah trok.”“Lada ngi ïaid kyllaiñ sha Mawryngkneng ka marbam ka la kiewdor namarba tang  ka jingshah khrong pisa ha lynti ha ki khyrdop, ha ki Pulit kaba hap siew shane shatai ka jinglut ka poi haduh 7 hajar tyngka. Kan ktah beit ïa ka jingkiewdor. Lada ki trok kit marbam kim lah ban ïaid, kumno ki trok kit dewiong bad ki trok kit maw ki lah ban ïaid na ka jingkieng,” la kynthoh ki nongñiah trok.
title: SHAH BAT KI TROK KIT MARBAM HA LAD UMROI KATBA DANG THMU BAN RUNG SHA SHILLONG

content: Ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) North Eastern Hill University (NEHU) ka la byrngem ban pynlong ïa ki jingïakhih kiba jur ha ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai halor ka jingkynnoh ba u Vice Chancellor jong ka skulbah NEHU u Prof. Prabha Shankar Shukla u dang ïai leh mynthi halor ki mat jingdawa.Ki dkhot jong ka JAC ba kynthup ïa ki nonghikai kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka North Eastern Hills University Teachers Association (NEHUTA) bad ki samla pule kiba don ha ka shatri jong ka North Eastern Hills University Student Union (NEHUSU) bad ki nongtrei ïa kaba la tip North Eastern Hills University Non Teaching Staff Association (NEHUNSTA) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la dawa ïa u Vice Chancellor ba u dei ban weng kam noh mardor ïa u Rohit Prasad ïa uba la thung kum u Technical Advisor hapoh kane ka skulbah.Ki dkhot ka JAC ki la pyrta shla ba u Vice Chancellor u dei ban mih shabar bad ban weng kam noh mardor ïa u Rohit Prasad hynrei u Vice Chancellor um shym la treh satia ban mih shabar hynrei u la khot ïa ki nongïalam jong ka Joint Action Committee sha ka miej jingïakren katba na ka liang ki nonghikai ki la kyntait mardor ïa ka jingkhot ïakren.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ki nongïalam ka JAC ki la pyntip ba ka Committee ha ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai, kin dang pynjur shuh shuh ïa ka jingïakhih ban dawa weng kam beit mardor ïa u Rohit Prasad.
title: HA KA 13 TARIK MYNTA U BNAI BYRTHEN KA JAC NEHU BAN PYNJUR KA JINGÏAKHIH

content: : Da ka jingthmu ban pynjanai ïa ka leit ka wan jong ki kali ha ka thaiñ Polo bad ha Madanrting, ka Shillong Traffic Police (STP) ka la rai ban wanrah katto katne ki jingkylla ka rukom pynïaid kali tang kum ka jingpyrshang (trial basis) ha kine ki ar tylli ki jaka naduh ka 6 tarik mynta u bnaiHa ka thaiñ Polo, yn ym shah ban rung ïa ki kali na 4th Furlong Junction kiba kwah ban leit sha Polo.  Kin hap ban khun na CS Junction/Pinewood Junction/B. K. Bajoria Junction.Ym shah ban pynkhun sha ka mon (No Right-Turn) ha Matri Mandir Junction ïa ki kali kiba kwah ban leit sha iew Polo. Kin hap ban ïaid beit sha 4th Furlong.Ym shah ban pynkhun sha ka mon (No Right Turn) na Green Hills Junction na ka bynta ki kali kiba wan na ka surok Polo Towers bad kiba kwah ban leit sha 4th Furlong, kin hap ban pynkhun sha ka mon ha Iew Polo bad ïaid sha 4th Furlong.Ha Madanrting, ïa ka surok naduh Lumbasuk Junction haduh National Law University (NLU) yn pynïaid noh tang shi laiñ, kata ïa ki kali ki lah ban ïaid na Lumbasuk Junction sha NLU.Ka surok na Demthring Petrol Pump Junction sha Madanrting Presbyterian Junction yn pynïaid tang shi laiñ, kata, ki kali ki lah ban ïaid na Demthring Petrol Pump Junction sha Madanrting Presbyterian Junction.Ka surok na Madanrting Market Junction kaba pynïasoh bad ka Demthring Petrol Pump Junction yn pynïaid noh tang shi laiñ, kata, ki kai ki lah ban ïaid na iew Madanrting sha Demthring Petrol Pump Junction.
title: PYNKYLLA KA STP ÏA KA RUKOM PYNÏAID KALI HA POLO BAD MADANRTING

content: Ki nongtrei jong ka EMRI-108 ki la pynpaw ia ka jingbym sngewhun halor ka jingpyntip jong ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ban pynkiew ia ka jingsiew bainong kaba 7 percent na ka jingsiew bainong kaba ki ioh mynta.U President jong ka Meghalaya EMRI Workers Union (MEMRIWU) u Bah Roypar Kharraswai ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la ong, “ha ka jingialang mynta ngi la iakren ia ka jingsiew tulop hadien ba ka Sorkar ka la ong ba kan sa pynkiew da 7 percent ia ka Annual Increment na ka jingsiew tulop kaba mynta.  Tang shu ioh jingtip ia kane, ma ngi ki nongtrei ngi la khih jingmut namarba ka jingpynkiew tulop ka long kaba rit shaba palat.”“Wat ha rilum Garo ki nongtrei jong ka EMRI-108 ruh ki la pynlong ia ka jingialang namarba ka jingtyrwa ban pynkiew tulop ka long kaba rit shaba palat,” long u Bah Kharraswai.“Ngim hun ia ka jingpynkiew tulop kaba 7 percent bad ngi la rai la kumno kumno ka Sorkar kaba la pyniaid hi ia ka EMRI-108 kan ai ka One Time Enhancement mynta shi snem bad kan sa ai pat da ka Annual Increment manla u snem, ia kata ngi pdiang,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ia ka rukom siew tulop jong ngi ba ladep pynkhreh ngin sa rah sha ka Sorkar bad lada kam pynkiew ngim banse ban iaid da kawei pat ka lynti,” la ong une u nongialam ka MEMRIWU.U la iathuh ruh ba ka jingialang ka la iakren sani halor ki jingdawa jong ka Union kiba la pdiang da ka Sorkar Jylla khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ki jingmyntoi jong ki nongtrei, bad khamtam eh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynpaw jong ka Sorkar ban kham pynbun ia ki nongtrei bad ia ki kali Ambulance.Haba kylli, u la ong, “ha ka jingiakren naduh kaba sdang, ka Union ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar ba kan shimti ban pyniaid hi ia ka EMRI-108 hynrei ka Sorkar hi ka pyni bun ki daw hynrei watla katta ngi ieh ia ka jingstad jong ka Sorkar hynrei ka jingdawa ka long beit ba ka Sorkar kan shimti ban pyniaid hi ia kane ka Emergency Service.”“Ngi kwah ba ka Sorkar kan pynheh ia ka jingsiew tulop bad ngin trei ruh hangne da ka jingsuk mynsiem.  Ngim kwah shuh ba kine ki jingjia kiba ladep kin dang jia hadien habud. Ngi buh beit hakhmat ka jingstad ka Sokrar ba kan pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam jong ngi,” u la ong.’Dang shen, ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka la pyntip ba ki don 7 tylli ki Kompeni kiba la thep kyrteng ban shimti ia ka EMRI-108 bad na kine, lai tylli ki la shah jied ban thep ia ka Tender. Kine ki long ka Global Health Services, ka Medulance bad ka Chikitsa.“Ka jingkwah jong ngi ia ka kompeni ka dei ban pyniaid bha i aka kam shakhmat bad ka Sorkar ka dei ban don beit hapdeng ban bishar.  Hynrei haduh mynta hi ngim pdiang ia ka jingaiti ia ka EMRI-108 ban pyniaid da ka Kompeni,” u la ong.“Lada ka Sorkar ka lah ban pyniaid hi ka lah suk namarba la shi snem ka la iaid beit ka kam,” u la ong bad kynthoh, “ym dei ba ka Sorkar kam lah hynrei ka don da kawei pat ka jingthmu haba ka ai wai sha ka kompani, lehse ka lah ban lolng na ka bynta ka jingiohnong jongno re jongno hynrei ym dei na ka bynta ka jingiohnong jong ka jylla.”Haba iathuh ba ka Union ka la wad jingtip shaphang ki lai tylli ki Kompeni kiba thep Tender ban shimti ia ka EMRI-108 ha Meghalaya ula ong, “ngi la wad bniah, ka Medulance ka don ka dak sniew (Black Remark) ba kam lah ban siew tulop ia ki nongtrei ha ka por Covid-19.  Ngi lap ia kata ka rekod. Ka Global Health Service ka iateh lok bad ka UKSSA. Ka UKSSA ba la pyniaid ia ki 108 Ambulance bad 102 ha Delhi bad ha u 2018 ka la don ka jingiakhih jong ki nongtrei ba ka kompeni kam shym la siew tulop ia ki nongtrei namarba ka Sorkar kam ai pisa sha ka UKSSA ba ka rukom pyniaid kam iahap bad ki kyndon pyniaid ba la buh,” la ong u Bah Kharraswai“Ka Chikitsa ka don hapoh ka jingtohkit jong ka CBI ha Rajasthan ba ka pyniaid ia ki kali Ambulance. Ka rekod jong kine ki lai tylli ki dei kiba sniew. Ka jingjied jong ka Sorkar ia kine ki lai tylli ka don eiei sha lyndet. Ngi diaw ban iohi ba ka Sorkar ka leh bakla ha kane ka jingjied. Lada ka Sorkar ka pyniaid hi kan bha shibun.  Ka sorkar kam dei ban iapeiñ ban aiti  ia ka Emergency Health Services sha ki kompeni ba la don dak sniew,” la dawa une u nongialam ka MEMRIWU.
title: KA SORKAR KAM DEI BAN AITI ÏA KA EMRI-108 SHA KI KOMPENI BA LA DON DAK SNIEW : PRESIDENT MERMRIWU

content: : Ki Pulit jong ka Laban Police Station haduh mynta kim pat kem satia ia u Suresh Singh uba la dung pynmynsaw da ka tari ia ka kurim lajong ka Poonam Singh ha ka 31 tarik u Risaw, 2023 ha iing sah ha Laban, kaba la mynsaw jur bad kaba dang shah sumar haduh mynta ha Hospital.Ka Khun kynthei jong ka Poonam Singh, ka Deviani Singh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha sngi Saitjaiñ ka la kren diaw ia ka jingshim sting jong ki Pulit bad ka jingbym kem ia u Kpa jong ka, wat hadien ba la mudui da ka ejahar.Ka Deviani Singh ka la kynnoh ba kane ka jingshim sting jong ki Pulit ka long namarba u kpa jong ka, u Suresh Singh uba dei u Director jong ka Shillong Golf Club, u dei uba don ka jingiadei bad ki briew kiba don ha ka bor.Ha ka ejahar ba ka Poonam Singh ka la mudui sha ki Pulit ka Laban Police Station ka la ong, “hynne ka step (sngi baar) nga la phah ia la u kurim ba un leit ban siew katto katne ki jingsiew na ka bynta ka khun jong nga. U la kyntait da kaba ong ba um don pisa, ha kaba kum kane ka khep nga la ong; “phi don pisa ban pynlut na ka bynta ka Bala bad pynairong airup ia ka iing jong ka hynrei phim don pisa na ka bynta jong ngi.” Kumta ka la mih ka jingiania kaba jur bad u la dung ia nga da ka tari bad thombor ia nga na ki bynta jong ki lbong bad pynmynsaw ia ki shympriah kti jong nga.  Nga la sdang ban lynñiar bad ka khun jong nga ka la wan mareh bad iohi ba nga la phlei snam.  Hadien kane nga la pyntip noh sha ki Pulit kiba la pynkit noh ia nga sha Hospital na ka bynta ban ioh jingsumar,” ong ka Poonam ha ka ejahar.Ka Deviani Singh ka pynpaw ba ka kwah ba ki bor jong ka aiñ kin ai ia ka hok jong ka kmie kaba la shah thombor bad kaba dang don mynta ha ka jingshah sumar ha Hospital.Ka la kynnoh ruh ba kane kam dei satia ka sien banyngkong hynrei u Suresh Singh u ju thombor ruh ia la ka jong ka kurim ha ki snem kiba mynshwa bad ki la don teng ruh ki ejahar ba la mudui pyrshah ia u hynrei ki Pulit kim shym la leh eiei pyrshah ia u.“Ha ka sngi ba u la dung da ka tari ia i mei, u la phet na iing, hynrei ha ka sngi kaba bud u la wan phai bad rung hapoh iing  bad nga iohi ia kata namarba nga ieng habar.
