Nga la pyntip sha ki Pulit ba i pa i don ha ing ba kin wan kem hynrei ki Pulit ki la ong pynban ba ki donkam da ka jingthoh na u Officer in Charge bad kim wan hi ruh.  Nga la telephone ia u Officer Incharge, um shim satia ia ka phone watla ka ring bad ha ka por 7 baje janmiet ynda nga leit mih sha Police Station ban tohkit.  Hynrei ha ka por mynmiet u OC u la telephone ia nga ban ym leh eiei.  Ia mynta nga kwah ba ia kane ka Case dei ban aiti noh shawei kaba u  kpa jong nga um don jingiadei eiei,” la ong ka Deviani Singh.
title: NGA KWAH BAN ÏOH ÏA KA HOK, ONG KA KHUN JONG KA LONGKMIE BA SHAH DUNG TARI HA U KURIM

content: Ka Mawlai Town Dorbar (MTD) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la shimti ban pynbha biang ïa ka jingim jong ki 21 ngut ki khun samla kiba long ki nongshong shnong jong ki shnong kiba don hapoh ka jylli jong ka shnong Mawlai kiba la shah tehmraw ha ka jingim kyrni jong u drok.Ka jingshimti ïa kine ki khun samla ka la long hadien ba ki la pynpaw ïa ka mon kaba jwat ba ki dang kwah ban im biang ïa ka jingim kaba thymmai bad ban iehnoh dak ïa ki jingmlien ba sniew khamtam u drok uba la pynjot ïa ka jingim ka jong ki.Kane ka dei ka sienjam kaba nyngkong eh ba ka Mawlai Town Dorbar kum ka shatri jong ki Dorbar Shnong kiba don hapoh ka jylli jong ka shnong Mawlai ka la shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban plie ïa ka jingkhang da kaba khot bad wer ïa ki khun samla shynrang bad kynthei kiba la im kyrni bad kiba la shah teh mraw ha u drok.Ka Mawlai Town Dorbar ka jingïatreilang bad Manbha Foundation kan sa ai ïa ka jingsumar bad ka jingïasyllok ïa ki khun samla kiba la shah teh mraw ha u drok bad kiba la pyni pat ïa ka mon ba jwat ba ki long kiba kloi ban phaidien noh na une u jingdih buaid.Ha kane ka wat kaba nyngkong, ki don 21 ngut ki samla kiba la pynrung kyrteng ïalade na ka bynta kane ka jingthmu kaba bha ba la shim da ka Mawlai Town Dorbar.Ïa kine ki samla yn sa pynsah haduh saw bnai ha ka jaka ba la ai sngewbha da u MDC jong ka Mawlai Constituency u Bah Teiborlang Pathaw kaba don ha Mawkynroh-Umshing, Shillong ha kaba yn sa pynkhuid ïa u drok na ka met jong ki bad yn sumar ruh ïa ki jingpang ba ki don, nalor kaba ai ruh ïa ka jingïasyllok khnang ba kine ki samla kin ïoh biang ïa ka jingim kaba thymmai.Ha ka jingshimti ïa kine ki 21 ngut ki samla la sakhi lang da ka Dr Rika Lamar na ka Manbha Foundation, u Superintendent of Police (City) Bah Vivek Syiem, u Vice Chancellor jong ka skulbah NEHU, u Prof PS Shukla bad u MDC ka Mawlai Constitunecy u Bah Teiborlang Pathaw, ki Rangbah bad ki nongïalam jong ki shnong ka shnong Mawlai, ki bahaïing hasem jong ki samla kiba la kwah ban ieh syndon ïa u drok ha ka jingim ka jong ki.
title: SHIMTI KA MTD ÏA KI 21 NGUT KI SAMLA KA SHNONG MAWLAI BA LA RAIKUT BAN IEHNOH ÏA U DROK

content: Shillong, Naiwieng 04: Uwei u nongdie drok uba la don dak sniew mynshwa, u la shah kem ha ki paidbah ha ka Sngi Saitjaiñ katba u dang die tuh ïa u drok ha Police Point Laitumkhrah.Ki Pulit ka Laitumkhrah Police Station tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane ki la bthah ïa ka kynhun Pulit Anti Narcotic Task Force ban leit kem mardor ïa une u nongdie drok bad na ka met jong u ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup 10 tylli ki tyndong ba la thep ïa u drok Heroin uba khia 10.97 gram, kawei ka plastic rong ïong kaba la thep ïa ki 35 tylli ki tyndong ba thylli, kawei ka mobile phone bad ka pisa kaba 6 hajar, 310 tyngka.
title: KEM KI PAIDBAH ÏA U NONGDIE DROK NA POLICE POINT LAITUMKHRAH

content: : Ka Medulance, kaba long ka shlem ai jingshakri kyrkieh bapawkhmat, ka la shah pynkhamti ban pynïaid ïa ka EMRI-108 ha Meghalaya.Ka Medulance kaba don ruh ïa ki kali Ambulance ba la pyndait ïa ka 5G, shen kan sa shimti ban pynïaid ïa ka jingai jingshakri sha ki paidbah nong shong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya kiba donkam ïa ka jingïarap kyrkieh ban pynpoi sha ki jaka ai jingsumar kiba don ha kylleng kane ka jylla Meghalaya, kaba ju jia khah ka jingtwa khyndew bad ka jingther jong u lapbah uba jur.Kane ka kompeni ka la buh hakhmat ïa ka thong ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki jingeh ki ban sa wan na ka bynta ban ai ka jingshakri sha ki paidbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei. Da ka jingdon jong ka EDNA Enterprise kum ka kynhun kaba ïatreilang, ka la ïarap ruh haba ka sorkar ka la don hapdeng ka khia ka shon na ka jingiehnoh jong ka GVK EMRI ban pynïaid ïa ki Ambulance, kaba dang ïai bteng haduh mynta.“Ka thong jong ka Medulance ka long ban pyntreikam ïa ka 5G kaba pyndait ha ki kali Ambulance, bad ban pyndait ïa ka GPS ha ki Ambulance. Kane ka long ban pynstet lyngba ka teknoloji ban ai jingïarap kyrkieh ïa ki paidbah kiba donkam jingsumar bad ban ïada ka jingim jong ki paidbah ha kane ka jylla.  Ïa mynta ngi angnud ban pynlong ïa ka jylla Meghalaya ka jylla kaba nyngkong eh ban don ïa ka 5G smart Emergency Response,” ong u Co-Founder jong ka Medulance Healthcare u Mr. Pranav Bajaj.Kane ka kompeni ka dei ruh kaba la ai jingshakri da ka jingkyrshan ka Sorkar Delhi, ban pynïaid ïa ki CATS 102 Services jin saw snem, kynthup ruh haba ka ri India ka la shah lynshop ha ka jingpang khlam COVID-19.  Ka Medulance don ruh ïa ki nongai jinghikai kiba la don 35 snem ka jingbit ban pynïaid ïa ki ALS bad BLS, bad kiwei kiwei.Ka Medulance ka la ai jingshakri ruh ïa ki Public Sector Undertakings (PSU) kum ka NTPC, ka COAL India, bad ïa ka Odisha Jail, kynthup ruh ka Stationed Ambulance services, ki Medical Center, ki Medical Professional bad ka Medical Care.Ka kompeni ka la long kawei na ki kynhun kaba pynïaid ïa ka G20 Summit bad ka sorkar dang shen, da kaba ai jingshakri na ka bynta ki nongïashim bynta ha ka jingïalang G20.
title: PYNBNA KA MEDULANCE BAN SHIMTI ÏA KA EMRI-108 HA MEGHALAYA

content: Ka jingkilan met hapdeng ki shipai India bad ka ri Malaysia ban wanrah ïa ka jingïadei kaba khlaiñ hapdeng ki bor shipai jong kine ki ar tylli ki ri bad ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingpahara ong ki bor shipai ka la poi noh sha kaba kut ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, ïa kaba la pynlong ha Umroi, Ribhoi District.Ha ka jingpynkut ïa kane ka jingkilan met, u Brig. Mayank Vaid u la ong nalor kaba plie lad ban pyni ïa ka bor jong ki shipai India, kane ka jingkilan met kan wanrah ruh ïa ka jingïadei kaba jan hapdeng ki shipai jong ka ri India bad ka ri Malaysia.“Ka jingkilan met kan nang pynïar shuh shuh ïa ka jingïadei hapdeng ki shipai jong ka ri India bad ka ri Malaysia, bad kan tehsong ruh ïa ka jingïadei hapdeng kine ki ar tylli ki ri,” la bynrap u Vaid.Kane ka jingkilan met ka la sdang naduh ka 23 tarik Risaw, hapdeng ki shipai ka ri India na ka Rajput Regiment bad ka 5th Royal Battalion jong ka kynhun shipai ka ri Malaysia. Haduh 120 ngut ki shipai jong kine ki ar tylli ki ri ki la ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingkilan met kaba la neh haduh ar taiew kynthih.Ha ka jingïakilan met, ki shipai ki la ïashim bynta ha ka jingtur thma sha khlaw, ha ki bynta khap sor bad ha ki jaka sor.  Ki shipai ki la pynlong ruh ka jingïaid pahara ha ka por mynmiet ha ka khlaw barben.  Ki shipai ka ri Malaysia ki la pyni ruh  ïa ki buit kumno ban pyllait im ïalade ha khlaw.“Ka jingïashim bynta ha ka jingkilanmet bad ban sngewthuh ïa ka rukom tur thma jong ki shipai ha ki jaka khlaw ka long kaba jop.  Kumjuh ruh, ka jingpyni ïa ki buit ïakhun ha madan ka la nang pynmyntoi shuh shuh ïa ki shipai,” la ong u Commanding Officer u K.K Bajpai. U la bynrap ba ha kane ka jingkilan met la buh thong halor ka jingkhlaiñ ka bormet, ki buit ïakhun bad ka jingïasam jingtip mar kylliang ha ka jingleit tur thma sha ki khlaw ki btap.Ïa kane ka jingkilan met kaba la neh ar taiew kynthih la pynlong ha ki lai bynta, ka jingïasam buit kaba neh lai sngi kynthih, ki phra sngi ki jingkilan met ha madan bad ka jingpyni ïa ki sap ïakhun kaba la neh haduh 48 kynta ha kaba ki heh ophisar shipai jong kine ki ar tylli ki kynhun shipai ki la ai jingkren.Ha ka jingpynkut, la pyni nam ruh ïa ki tiar siat bad ki tiar ïaleh ba la pyndonkam da kine ki ar tylli ki kynhun shipai bad ha kajuh ka por la pyni ruh ïa ka nuksa kumno ban ïakhun thma ïa ki riewkieng atiar.
title: KUT NOH KA JINGKILAN MET BA AR TAÏEW HAPDENG KI SHIPAI INDIA BAD MALAYSIA HA UMROI

content: U Vice President jong ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo Peoples (FKJGP) u samla Kitboklang Nongphlang la pynpaw ba ka jingkynrei jong u drok ha ka nongbah Shillong ka dei ka jinghiar thma ba jarjar jong ki mynder ia ka jaitbynriew.“Bun ki samla khasi kiba la ngop ha u jingdih pynbuaid ki dei tang ki langknia katba kiba pynpoi bad pynngop pat ia u jingdih bunsien ki dei beit ki khyllah jait,” la ong u nongialam ka FKJGP haba kren jingialang pynskhem ia ki dkhot kiba la pyniasoh ialade bad ka seng kaba la long ha ophis treikam jong ka Seng ha Mawlai Kynton Massar, Shillong ha ka 3 tarik mynta u bnai.“Kum ki dkhot jong ka seng ki dei ban long kiba phikir, kiba peitngor bad ban long kiba la khreh ban iakhun thma pyrshah u drok uba la bam kruiñ ia ka jaitbynriew,” u la ong.Ha kane ka sngi, ka seng ka la lum lang ia ki nongialam jong ki Circle kiba kiba don ha ka nongbah Shillong ban shim ia ki sienjan ban pynkhlain ia ka rukom treikam jong ka seng khamtam eh ha ka nongbah Shillong.Ha ka jingialang, ba la pyniaid da u Chief Organising Secretary jong ka FKJGP Central Body u Bah Khrawkupar Nongsiej la don lang ruh u President jong ka seng u Bah Dundee Cliff Khongsit, u Senior Vice President Bah Elton Cliff Warjri bad u General Secretary Bah Eldie N Lyngdoh.U Bah Elton C. Warjri, haba kren ha kane ka jingialang u la pynkynmaw ia ki lynti iaid jong ka seng ha ki snem 2014 terter ha kaba ki dkhot ki dei ban don ia ka mynsiem kaba shitrhem ban shakri ia ka jaitbynriew hi baroh kawei.U Bah Eldie N. Lyngdoh, uba la long teng ruh u Geneneral Secretary ka FKJGP Shillong City ha u snem 2014 u la pynkynmaw ba ki dkhot jong ka Shillong City ha kitei ki snem ki la mad shibun ki jingshah tynjuh lyngba ki jingshahkem, ka jingshah bom shah tied haba ki pyrshang ban iakhun ia kiba bun ki mat na ka bynta ka dawbah jong ka jaitbynriew hynrei kaba sngewtynnad pat ka long ba haduh mynta ka nongrim ka skhem bad kam lah satia ban theh umpjah ia ka mynsiem ieit ri bad u la kyntu ruh ia ki dkhot ba kin nang iai trei shitrhem shuh shuh ban aiti met bad mynsiem na ka bynta ka jaitbynriew.Hashwa ban pynskhem ia ki nongkitkam ba thymmai jong ka FKJGP Shillong City na ka liang jong u Bah Dundee Cliff Khongsit, u la pynshai ia ki nongrim bad ia ki mat treikam jong ka seng da kaba ong, ‘shisien ba phi la pyniaisoh ialade bad ka FKJGP to tip shai ba shiliang ka kjat ka la dei ban don lypa ha ka along bad shiliang pat shabar.”U la kyntu ruh ba kum ki dkhot ki dei ban don ia ka mynsiem kaba shynrang ka bym tieng, bym khawpud bad ka mynsiem kaba ym pyndem satia ban iakhun na ka bynta ka dawbah jong ka jaitbynriew ha kaba u la maham pat ba ki dkhot jong ka seng kim dei satia ban long ki khwan myntoi na ka bynta ka malade.Ki nongialam bad ki dkhot ba la shah pynskhem na ka bynta ka samoi treikam jong u snem 2023-26 ka FKJGP Shillong City ki long, President Arkinfield Khonglam, Vice-President Simon Myrthong, General Secretary Shane Nongrum, Joint Secretary Wanpyndap Marbaniang, Asst. Secretary Kyrshan Syiemlieh, Organising Secretary Alfredy Kharbuli, Barilang Pyngrope, Donkupar Dympep bad Dapkmen Syiemiong, Information Secretary Embhahlang Talang, Asst. Information Secretary Secretary Sherborn Shabong, Education Secretary Garry N. Thangkhiew, Asst. Education Secretary Boney Jyrwa, Socio & Cultural Secretary Larikupar Lyngdoh, Asst. Socio & Cultural Secretary Bantei Nongkhlaw, Sports Secretary Donavan Pyngrope, Asst. Sports Secretary Batkupar Nongkhlaw, Disciplinary Secretary Rist Thabah , Asst. Disciplinary Secretary Kordor Lyngdoh, Environmental Secretary Hopewell Kharkongor,  Asst. Environmental Secretary Collin Turnia, Agriculture Secretary Arban Katrai, Asst. Agriculture Secretary Mark Wahlang.Nalor kine ki nongkitkam la la jied ruh ia ki 36 ngut ki dkhot na kylleng ki jaka kiba hap ha Sor bad Khapsor kum ki dkhot sha ka Executive Committee jong ka FKJGP Shillong City.
title: KA JINGKYNREI U DROK HA SHILLONG KA DEI KA JINGHIAR THMA BA JARJAR JONG KI MYNDER ÏA KA JAIDBYNRIEW : FKJGP

content: : Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynlut T.9.28 klur tang ha East Khasi Hills District ban sumar ïa ki shynrang bad ki kynthei kiba la im kyrni ha u drok.Na kane ka pisa kaba T.9.28 klur la pynlut na ka bynta ban sumar ïa ki 3184 ngut ki shynrang bad 32 ngut ki kynthei ha Shillong. Kane ka jingpynlut ïa ka pisa ka long naduh u snem 2010 haduh u snem 2023.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u nongwad RTI Bah Disparsing Rani ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei hadien ba la ïoh pdiang ïa ka jubab RTI na ka tnat Social Weflare ha ka 6 tarik u bnai ba ladep, u la ïathuh ba haba pan jubab halor ka jingpynlong ïa ki jingpynshai paidbah, ka tnat ka la ai jubab ba kam don satia.“Kaba lyngngoh ban ïohi na kane ka kaiphod ka long ba ki nongdih drok ki don tang lai hajar tam katba ka jingpynlut pisa na ka bynta kine ki lai hajar tam ban sumar bad ban pynthied dawai ka long kaba kyndit ban tip namar ba ka poi haduh T.9,28,90,556 klur,” u la ong.Na kane ka pisa, ka sorkar ka la pynlut T. 30,07,815 ha u snem 2010, T. 34,05,817 ha u snem 2011, T. 38,61,060 ha u snem 2012, T. 40,76,240 ha u snem 2013, T. 53,80,721 ha u snem 2014, T. 39,43,617 ha u snem 2015, T. 35,42,816 ha u snem 2016, T. 36,37,821 ha  u snem 2017, T. 30,17,307 ha u snem 2018, T. 72,71,227 ha u snem 2019, T. 84,73,371 ha u snem 2020, T. 1,48,57,688 ha u snem 2021, T. 1,94,69,467 ha u snem 2022 bad T. 89,45,589 ha u snem2023.“Ka long kaei kaei kaba pynkyndit ïa ka jylla, ïa ki riewpeitngor, ïa ki dorbar shnong, ïa ki sengbhalang bad ïa nga u nongtrei mon sngewbha ban tip ba ki nongdih drok ki don tang lai hajar tam hynrei ka pisa na ka bynta khatlai snem ka jingpynlut ka long haduh T. 9.28 klur.  Uta u dei u dak jingkylli uba eh haduh katta ban ong ba na ka bynta ki nongdih drok kiba tang katta, ka pisa yn pynlut haduh katne,” u la ong.“Lada don ki nongdih drok tang shi lak ngut, ka pisa jong nga jong phi ka la leit lut sha ki nongdih drok (ban ai jingsumar).  Ngan sa pan jubab shuh shuh ha kaba ïadei bad ka rukom pynlut (ïa ka pisa na ka bynta ban sumar ïa kiba dih drok),” u la ong.Haba kylli halor ka pisa, u Bah Disparsing ula ïathuh ba ka kaiphod ka khlem kdew la pynlut kumno ïa ka pisa hynrei la shu pynpaw beit ba ka pisa kaba T. 9.28 klur la pynlut na ka bynta kiba la kyrni ban dih ïa u drok naduh u snem 2010 haduh u snem 2023.
title: PYNLUT KA SORKAR 9.28 KLUR HAPOH 13 SNEM BAN SUMAR ÏA KIBA LA KYRNI DIH DROK

content: : Ka Shillong Civil Hospital ka la iohlum T.6,29,18,877 klur hapoh lai snem na ki nongpang kiba wad jingsumar ha kane ka jaka ai jingsumar.  Ia kane la pyntip da u nongwad RTI u Bah Disparsing Rani katkum ka jubab RTI ba la ioh na ka Civil Hospital.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka lah sngi U Blei u Bah Disparsing Rani u la iathuh ba kane ka jingioh lum pisa jong ka Shillong Civil Hospital ka long na ka CT Scan, MRI, Blood Test, UG Scan bad X-Ray.U la iathuh ba ka jubab RTI ka pynpaw ba ha ki 3 snem, ka Hospital ka la ioh lum T. 2.42 klur na ka jingpyndonkam ki paidbah ia ka CT Scan, T. 26 lak na ka MRI, na ka X-Ray T.4 lak, Blood Test T.2.55 klur bad T. 57 lak na ka UG Scan.“Kane ka jingwad RTI ka dei ban pyntip paidbah ha kaba iadei bad ka jingioh lum ka Shillong Civil Hospital namarba tang ha ki lai snem, kala ioh lum T. 6,29,18,877 klur bad ki paidbah ki donhok ban ioh ki lad jingsumar kiba bha,” ong u Bah Disparsing.U la iathuh ba ka don kawei ka kor MRI Scan kaba shongdor T. 4.90 klur kaba la pyntreikam naduh 2013 hynrei mynta ka la sniew bad kam treikam shuh.Shuh shuh u Bah Disparsing u la iathuh ruh ba katkum ka jubab RTI ba la ioh pdiang na ka ophis jong ka Directorate of Health Services (MI) la pynpaw ba ki don ki Doctor, Staff Nurse bad ki nongtrei 4 Grade hapoh ka Civil Hospital Shillong ki bym ioh tulop naduh ka por ba ki trei haba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la shah lynshop ha ka jingpang khlam COVID-19.“Hadien ba ka Sorkar ka pynpaw ba ka ioh pdiang tang 76 klur na Delhi.  Hynrei ha ka jubab RTI ka pynpaw ba ka la ioh pisa T. 119 klur bad ka pisa kaba dang don bad ka Sorkar ka long sa T. 43 klur.  Balei ka Sorkar kam siew noh ia ka tulop jong kine ki nongtrei.  Haba ki trei ia ka kam, ka Sorkar ruh ka dei ban sngewthuh lem ia ka jingdonkam jong ki,” u la ong.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshna ia ka surok saw laiñ Shillong-Dawki, u Bah Disparsing Rani u la iathuh ba katkum ka jubab RTI ba la ioh na ka Ministry of Raods Transport and Highways ka Sorkar India, la pynpaw ba ia kane ka projek la aiti sha ka M/s PCC Go Tech Pvt Ltd ban shna pynheh ia ka surok na Umshyrpi haduh Umdiengpung, 7 Mer Upper Shillong. Ka kam ka la iaid katkum ka jingaipor haduh 2 snem ban pyndep ia ka Phase-I. Mynta ka pakage-2, Pakage-3, bad 5 ruh ka dang iaid.  Ka don ruh ka projek ba dang pynkhreh ia ka Detailed Project Report (DPR) na ka bynta ka Shillong Eastern Bypass ban shna ia ka surok na Mawlyngkhung, Mawryngkneng, Jowai, Ratacherra kaba jrong 138 kilomiar. Kane ka dang iaid bad ka projek ban shna ia ka surok Mawthir-Kyrshai ruh ka dang iaid shakhmat.”“Nga kyntu ia ki paidbah, ia ki Dorbar Shnong bad ia ki Sengbhalang ba ngin buh lang ia ka thong ba yn dup lah ban pyndep kloi ia kine ki projek bad ym pynthud ia ki kompeni namar ba ka don ka jingkynnoh ba ka don ka jingpynwit bad kata ka pynlehraiñ.  Ki nongtrei jong ki kompeni ki wan sah tang shipor bad ki leit phai noh,” u la ong.“Ngi ruh ngin buh nuksa ia kiwei ki jylla kum ka Mizoram bad Manipur ba ngim dei ban pynthud khnang ba ka jingangnud jong u paidbah kan long kaba biang,” u la ong.
title: HAPOH LAI SNEM IOH LUM PISA 6 KLUR KA SHILLONG CIVIL HOSPITAL NA KIBA SHAH SUMAR

content: Ka Proseshon Eucharist kaba shisien shi snem jong ka Jylla Niambah Shillong kan sa long ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai.Yn sdang ia kane ka sngi, da ka Mass Bakhuid ha ka por 10:00 baje mynstep ban sa pynbynta da u Apostolic Nuncio ka Vatican sha India bad Nepal u Most Rev. Leopoldo Girelli ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Archbishop ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh bad ki lai ngut kiba dang shu dep shah pynkyntang kiba kynthup ia u Bishop jong ka Jylla Niam Nongstoiñ u Most Rev. Wilbert Marweiñ, u Bishop jong ka Jylla Niam Jowai u Most Rev. Ferdinand Dkhar bad u Auxiliary Bishop jong ka Jylla Niam Aizawl u Most Rev. Joachim Walder.U General Secretary ka Parish Pastoral Council (PPC) ka Cathedral of Mary Help of Christians u Bah Barnabas Nangbah ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la khot bad wer ia ki paidriewngeit jong ka Balang Catholic na ka Jylla Niam Jowai bad Nongstoiñ ban iashim bynta ha kane ka Proseshon Eucharist ka ban sa long ha ka por 1:30 baje nohphai sngi ka ban sdang na madan Calvary bad iaid lyngba ka surok Dhankheti-Shillong Jowai bad wan phai sha Don Bosco Square bad pynkut biang ha madan Calvary.Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ki bor pyniaid jong ka Balang ki la iatreilang bad ki bor Pulit jong ka Shillong Traffic Police ban pynbeit ia ki rukom pynieng kali bad ban pyniaid ia ki kali ha ka thain Laitumkhrah baroh kawei.Ka jingpynbeit ia ki jaka ieng kali ki long ha Madan Iew Rynghep, St. Edmund’s college, MIIT Brookdene, St. Margareth’s Convent, St. Mary’s Convent, St. Anthony’s H/S School Mini Stadium, Christ King College, Don Bosco Technical School, Parking Lot ka Loreto School (Hopkinson Road) bad madan Malki.  Kiwei kiwei ki kali ki lah ban pynieng harud surok naduh Barik Point ter ter shaduh Pine mount School bad Seventh Set School, ha Lower Lachumiere naduh Horse Shoe Building shaduh DIPR, ha Treasury Office, ha pyrshah ka Additional Secretariat shaduh Barik Point, ha lyndet iing u Lat, hakhmat ka Don Bosco Hall (Hopkinson Road), ha surok Jacob’s Ladder bad ha Boyce’s Road Shillong College -Bajoria School.“Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ngi la buh ruh ia ki Traffic Volunteers ha baroh ki Parking Lot bad ngi kyrpad ia ki trai kali ba kin ai ka jingiatreilang khnang ban pynieng ia ki kali ha ka rukom kaba dei bad ban ym ktah ia ka leit ka wan jong ki kali.  La kyrpad ia kito kiba pynieng ia ki kali harud surok ba kin ieng tang shiliang khnang ban ym wanrah ia ka jingdheng kali,” la kyrpad u General Secretary ka PPC.Da ka jingiatreilang bad ki bor synshar district, ka PPC ka la pyntip ba ka shilynter jong ka surok naduh Dhankheti-Shillong Jowai Road-Laitumkhrah Main Road-Don Bosco Square – Calvary la pynbna kum ka NO PARKING ZONE ha kane ka sngi.Yn khang ban iaid kali na surok Dhankheti-Don Bosco Square naduh ka por 8.45 baje mynstep tad haduh ban da wai ki jinglehniam.Yn pyrkhing da ka No Entry ia baroh ki kali kiba iaid ha shilynter jong ka surok Shillong-Jowai Road ha Barik Point bad ha Fire Brigade naduh ka por 12.00 baje mynsngi haduh ka por 3.30 baje nohphai sngi (tad haduh ba ka jingiaid proseshon kan da pyndep na Fire Brigade point).  Ki bor synshar district ki la pyntip ruh ba yn ym shah ban die jingdie iano iano ruh, ha shilynter ka surok iaid proseshon, kata naduh surok Dhankheti-Shillong Jowai Road, Laitumkhrah Main Road bad ha Don Bosco Square.“La kyrpad ia ki paidriewngeit ba kin long kiba leh khuid bad bret ia ki jaboh jabaiñ ha ki shang bad ki borti bret ñiut ba la pynkhreh lypa ha ki jaka pynieng kali,” la ong shuh shuh ka PCC.
title: YN WAN SAKHI U APOSTOLIC NUNCIO KA VATICAN SHA INDIA HA KA PROSESHON EUCHARIST

content: U Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem ha ka sngi baar ryngkat ka jingsynran lang jong u Executive Member i/c Taxation u Bah Joseph Fantin Lakadong, bad ki Pulit Enforcement ka KHADC, ki bor synshar ka East Khasi Hills bad na Sohra Civil Sub Division ki la hiar sha ka shnong Majai ban khynra naphang ïa ki dukan jong ki bar jylla kiba leh ïa ka khaïi ka pateng khlem da ïoh ïa ka Trading License na ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council.Kane ka jinghiar jong u CEM ka KHADC sha Majai ka long ruh hadien ba 44 ngut ki bar jylla kiba leh ïa ka khaïi pateng ha Majai, ki la pyni bor ïa ka District Council halor ka Trading Licence da kaba leit tied ïa ka jingkhang jong ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court na ka bynta ban pynthymmai ïa ki laisen kiba la kut ka por.Ha kane ka jingkhynra Trading License la sakhi ba napdeng ki 44 ngut ki la khang lypa ïa ki dukan bad kane ka la pynsuba ba imat kim don ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang ha kaba ïadei bad ka khaïi pateng ha ka shnong Majai.Nalor kata, la lap ruh ba wat ki bar jylla kiba shong dukan kiba biang ïa ki kot ki sla hynrei kim shym la leh satia ïa ka Professional Tax.Na ka liang jong u CEM ka KHADC hadien ba la lap ïa ki dukan ki bym don ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang u la phah khang khyrdep ïa ki dukan bad la bthah ba kin leit mih sha ka ophis jong ka District Council na ka bynta ban pynbiang ïa ki kot ki sla.Ha kane ka sngi u CEM ba ka kynhun ki la hiar ruh sha ka shnong Ichamati ban khynra naphang ïa ki dukan jong ki bar jylla ki bym don ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Pynïaid u la ong, “dang shen ka Ïingbishar Meghalaya High Court ka la bthah ïa ngi ban ai ïa ka Trading License hadien ba ki la leit tied ïa ka jingkhang jong ka Ingbishar. Ngi ruh ngi don ïa ka Trading by Non Tribal Regulation Act bad ngi ruh hap ban bud ïa kane ka aiñ bad ngin ym lah ban ai Trading License ïa ki nongkhaïi bar jylla tang na ka liang ka KHADC khlem da ïoh ïa ka NoC na ka shnong, Raid, ne Hima.”“Kumba long ha Majai kaba hap hapoh ka Hima Sohra, ngi pan ïa ka NoC na u Syiem bad lada ym pat ïoh ïa ka NoC ngim pat lah ban pynthymmai ïa kine kiba aplai (laisen) bad kata ka pynlong ïa ki 44 ngut ki nongkhaïi bar jylla ban leit sha Iingbishar,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jinghiar khynra ha ka shnong Majai, ki don bun tylli ki dukan jong ki bar jylla, ym tang ki 44 ngut, ki bym biang lehse ki kot ki sla ki la khang ïa ki dukan. “Kane ka pynpaw shai ba ki dukan kiba don ha Majai kiba bun kiba khaïi ki dei ki bar jylla. Lada ngi lap bad ngi thikna ba kim dei na Meghalaya ngin ym lah ban ai ïa ka Trading License namar ba kane ka jaka ka don ha syndah bad ka ri Bangladesh,” u la ong.“Kaba sngewsih haba kylli ngi kylli jingkylli ïa ki trai dukan, ngi lap ba ka kyrteng ki dei ki Khasi katba uba ap dukan u dei u bar jylla. Ynda la kylli ïa ki kot ki sla u sei pynban da ka syrnot ïathoh ban pynshisha ba u (bar jylla) shongkha ïa ka thei Khasi,” la ïathuh u Bah Pynïaid.“Ha ka kyrteng jong ka lok, la pynïaid ïa ka kam khaïi da u lok (bar jylla). Watla katta ruh ki bym dei ki Khasi kiba ïoh lok Khasi lada kim pat don ïa ka Professional Tax ne ki nongtrei jong ki ban don ïa ka Labour License na ka liang jong ngi ruh ngi hap ban khang (ïa ki dukan) bad ngin ym ailad ban plie,” u la ong.Ha ka jingwad bniah jong ka KHADC napdeng ki 44 ngut ki bar jylla kiba leit ujor sha ka Ïingbishar, 20 ngut ki dei ki Exporter kaba mut kim don ïa ki dukan hynrei ki don tang ka ophis treikam. “Kine kim ïohlad ban khaïi ba kim ïoh ïa ki kot ki sla.  Kine ki 24 tylli ki dukan nga la phah tohkit khnang ba ngin tip shuh shuh katno ngut kiba plie bad katno ngut kiba khang.  Ha ka jingshem jong ngi, kiba bun ki khang baroh shikatta lane ki khang tang mynta ka sngi ïa kata ngam tip hynrei na ka liang jong ngi ngin hap ban ai da ka Notis sa shisien namar ba ngim tip kino kiba dei trai,” la bynrap u Bah Pynïaid.Haba kylli, “ïa mynta ngim lap mano ba dei ki trai dukan lane ki trai jaka bad mano ruh ba shong dukan.  Ngim banse ban tah da ka Show Cause Notice bad lada ki dang kwah ban khaïi kin hap ban bud ïa ki aiñ ki kyndon.”“Ïa kine ki 44 ngut kiba leit ujor sha Ïingbishar ka shong ha ngi kumno ban pyntreikam ïa ki Rule bad ki Act bad kiba biang hi ïa ki kot ki sla ngin sa peit. Na ka liang jong ka Council lada ngi hap ban ai, ngin ai halor ka nongrim bad lada ngi kyntait ruh ïa ka Trading License ruh ngin kyntait halor ka nongrim bad ngin ym lah ban shu leh kulmar tang ba la don ka jingbthah namar ha kaba kut dei ma ngi kiba thaw ïa ka aiñ bad ma ngi hi kiba hap ban pyntreikam ym ban pynkheiñ ïa ka aiñ,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Pynïaid.U la ong ruh ba ka Council kan ym shongthait ban khynra ïa kino kino ki dukan jong ki bar jylla kiba leh ïa ka khaïi ka pateng khlem da ïoh ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang na ka District Council.Ka KHADC ka don 60 ngut tam ki Pulit Enforcement ban peit ïa ka jingtreikam jong ka Council ha ki san tylli ki District kiba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Council.
title: KHYNRA NAPHANG U CEM ÏA KI DUKAN BAR JYLLA HA MAJAI BA PYNI BOR ÏA KA KHADC

content: Ki nongtrei ASHA kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Meghalaya ASHA Workers Union (MAWU) ha ka sngi baar ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingbym hun halor ka jubab jong ka Myntri ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdawa ban kyntiew ïa ka bai nong jong ki ASHA kiba shakri ha kylleng ki shnong jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ka President ka MAWU ka Kong Mira June Myrsing ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ka la ong, “ha ka jingïakynduh ha ka 30 tarik u Risaw, ïa ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ngi ïoh ka jingkular ba yn ïakren ïa ka jingdawa kyntiew bainong hynrei ngim poi pyrkhat ba kan long pynban da kumne.”Haba kynthoh ïa ka jingkren jong ka Dr. Ampareen halor ka jingïalang ba la long bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ka lah sngi U Blei, ka Kong Mira June ka la ong, “ki nongtrei ASHA kim ju ïoh haduh T.5000 hajar kumba la kren da ka Myntri hynrei ki ïoh tang T. 2000 hajar kata ruh kim ju ïoh lut hynrei ki ïoh tang T.800 na ka National Health Mission (NHM).”“Ngi shaniah ïa ka Sorkar Jylla bad dei namar kane ngim shym la mih sha madan ban ïakhih hynrei ngim lah ban pdiang pat ïa ka jingong jong ka Mynti ba ki ASHA ki ïoh T.5000,” ka la ong.Halor ka jingong jong ka Myntri ba ki ASHA ki dei ki nongtrei mon sngewbha, ka Kong Mira June ka la ong, “lada ki ASHA ki dei ki nongtrei mon sngewbha, ka Myntri kam don hok ban khot ïa ki ASHA ban wan trei noh. Lada ngi dei ki nongtrei mon sngewbha ngi don ka hok ban wan trei ne pep trei.“Ngim lah ban pdiang ïa ka jingkam jong ka Myntri ba ki ASHA ki dei tang ki nongtrei mon sngewbha.  Ngi la shim syndon ïa ka rai ban pynbna ïa ka jingïakhih da kaba sangeh treikam ha baroh kawei ka Jylla,” la ong ka nongïalam jong  ka MAWU.Ka nongaibuit jong ka MAWU ka Kong Sonny Kharjana ka la ong “ka Union ka dawa ïa ka sorkar Jylla ban kyntiew ïa ka bai nong na ka T.2000 hajar sha ka T.5000 manla u bnai namar hadien ba ki kynthei ki shimti ïa ka kam ASHA kim lah shuh ban leit bylla shawei pat.”Ka la ïathuh ruh naduh u snem 2005 ïa ki ASHA la pyndonkam da ki nongtrei jong ka ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ban ïarap haba leit ai injekshon ne ai dawai ïa ki nongshong shnong ha kylleng ki shnong ha ka jylla.Ka la ong ruh ba lada ka Sorkar ka khot ïakren ki nongïalam ka Union ki long kiba kloi ban leit sha ka miej jingïakren.
title: NGIM JU ÏOH BAINONG 5 HAJAR, RAI KI ASHA BAN IAKHIH DA KABA SHONG SNGI HA ÏING

content: Ka kynhun Pulit Anti Narcotics Task Force (ANTF) East Khasi Hills kaba la ioh jingtip kaba bniah mar mar ka la pynlong ia ka jingkhynra ha kawei ka ‘slum’ ha Sweeper Lane bad iohkem ia kawei ka kynthei kaba la 26 snem ka rta ha ka sngi balang.Ha ka jingkhynra ia ka ing sah jong kane ka kynthei, ki Pulit ki la ioh ban kurup 92 tylli ki tyndong ba la thep ia u drok heroin uba khia 99.21 gram, 51 tylli ki tyndong ba thylli, 13 tylli ki synduk sabon ban thep ia u drok, kawei ka mobile phone, bad kawei ka Aadhar Card.U Superintendent of Police, (City) ka East Khasi Hills, Bah Vivek Syiem ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba kane ka nongkhaii drok ka dei kajuh ka briew kaba la paw ha ka video ha GS Road hajan Bimola kaba la saphriang ha ka rynsan Social Media bad kaba la pynsngewkhia haduh katta katta ia kiba bun balang ia ka jingdie pylleiñ pylleiñ ia u drok.“Ka jingthwet ban iohkem ia kiwei pat kiba donkti ban die ia u drok ha kane jaka ka dang iai bteng.  Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ia ka case la rejistar ha Shillong Sadar Police Station hapoh ki kyndon jong ka NDPS Act,” la iathuh u SP (City).
title: SHAH KEM KA KYNTHEI KABA DIE DROK HA SUROK HAJAN SWEEPER LANE

content: Ka Special Cell jong ka tnat Pulit ka East Khasi Hills District ha ka lah sngi U Blei kiba la pynlong ka jingpynap shrip ki la iohkem ia ki lai ngut ki snar nonglute na ka kynhun ‘Gang’ kiba donkti ban rahbor ia ki nongñiah trok kiba kit ban shalan ia u jhur.U Superintendent of Police (City) East Khasi Hills District Bah Vivek Syiem ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai  u la iathuh, hadien ba ki Pulit ki la ioh jingtip ba ka don kawei ka kynhun ‘Gang” kaba pynbiej ia uwei u nongñiah trok bad pynbor ia ki trai ban thied ia u jhur ha ka dor kaba tad. U SP u la iathuh ba kane ka kynhun ki snar lute ka la ialam ia u nongñiah trok shajan ISBT ne Umiam na ka bynta ban leit kit ia u jhur.  Hynrei, kane ka kynhun Gang ka la rahbor pynban ia u nongñiah trok sha kawei ka jaka khlaw bad pynbor ia u nongñiah trok ban pyntip sha u trai ba ladep kit ia u jhur bad ban phah ia ka pisa lyngba ka Google pay ban siew sha ki nongdie jhur kiba dei pynban ki nongrahbor.U SP (City) u la ong, da ka jingiarap jong ki dkhot ka Meghalaya Traders Fresh Vegetable & Ginger Association (MTFVGA) bad ka Khasi Jaiñtia Fresh Vegetable Suppliers Association (KJGVSA) ki Pulit ka Special Cell ka East Khasi Hills ki la pynlong ka jingkhynra ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai bad mar mar ki la ioh ban kem ia ki lai ngut ki briew na surok Mawlai By-Pass hadien ba ki la kit ia u nongñiah trok na Lad Smit bad pynbor ia u ban pyntip sha u trai lyngba ka telephone ba un siew ia ka pisa.Kane ka kynhun ‘Gang’ ka la leh ia kane kajuh ka kam runar la bun bun sien ha kaba la bthah ban ujor ejahar bad ban rejister ia ka ejahar, la iathuh u SP.Ki Pulit ka Special Cell ki dang pynlong ia ka jingthwet kaba jur ia kiwei pat ki dkhot jong kane ka kynhun ki nonglute kiba dang phet rieh ban lait na ka kti ki Pulit.Ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup saw tylli ki mobile phone bad kawei ka kali Maruti Swift Dzire ba la pyndonkam da ki lai ngut ki snar nonglute.U SP (City) u la pyntip ruh ba ym pat lah ban tip la kine ki lai ngut ki don kti ne em ha kiwei kiwei ki kam runar.Ki Pulit ki la register case ha Madanrting Police Station hapoh ka Section 419/420/511/364A/384/340/34 Indian Penal Code (IPC) bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: SHAH KEM 3 NGUT KI ‘GANG’ KIBA RAHBOR ÏA U NONGNIAH TROK BAN DAWA PISA

content: RAI BAN THOH SHA KA PRESIDENT KA RI BAD SHA U LATKa Joint Action Committee (JAC) jong ka NEHUTA, NEHUNSA bad NEHUSU ha ka sngi Balang ka la byrngem ban mudui ha Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court da kaba kynnnoh ba u Vice Chancellor jong ka skulbah North Eastern Hills University (NEHU) u Prof. PS Shukla u la pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon jong ka University Grants Commission Model CRR (Cadre Recruitment Rules) da kaba thungkam be-aiñ ïa u Rohit Prasad kum u Technical Consultant hapoh ka skulbah NEHU.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Chairman jong ka JAC u Prof Lakhon Kma u la kynnoh ba ka jingsaitkhuid jong u Prof. Shukla dang shen ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor haba ïadei bad ka jingthungkam sopsop ïa u Rohit Prasad kum u Technical Consultant ka dei ka jingthok jingshukor bad ka jingïalam bakla ïa ki samla pule bad ïa ki nonghikai jong ka skulbah NEHU bad ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.U Prof. Kma u la ïathuh ba ka JAC kan sa thoh sha ka President jong ka Ri India ka Droupadi Murmu bad sha u Lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan ban ujor pyrshah halor ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon treikam jong ka skulbah NEHU kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka Sorkar Pdeng.“Ka JAC kan sa shong ïa ka jingïalang ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai ba shim ïa ka rai kumno ban ïaid shakhmat ïa ki jingïakhih bad ban ïaphylliew jingmut, la ka donkam ne em ban ujor sha Meghalaya High Court pyrshah ia u Vice Chancellor ka NEHU,” ula ong.Haba takraiñ tyngeh bad pynrem jur ïa ka jingpynksan jong u Prof. Shukla halor ka jingthungkam ïa u Rohit Prasad, u Chairman ka JAC u la ong, “dang shen u Vice Chancellor ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la pynksan ba ka jingthungkam ïa u Rohit Prasad ka long katkum ki kyndon ka UGC Model CRR hadien ba la mynjur da ka Executive Council jong ka skulbah NEHU, hynrei baroh ka long kaba be-aiñ namar ba ka long pyrshah ïa ki kyndon treikam jong ka skulbah NEHU ïa kaba ym shym la khot wat tang ïa ka Advertisement thungkam.”U Prof Lakhon ula kam ba katkum ki kyndon jong ka UGC Model CRR ka kdew shai ba ki Vice Chancellor jong kano kano ka skulbah kim lah ban thungkam, hynrei ïa ka jingthungkam dei ban khmih hi da ka Selection Committee bad hadien kane ka Executive Council kan sa lah ban ai jingmynjur, ïano ban thung ha ka kam.“Ki kyndon jong ka UGC Model CRR ki kdew shai ba lada ka skulbah ka donkam nongtrei ka dei ban pyntip sha ka University Grants Commission (UGC) na ka bynta ban mang pisa, hadien ba la ïoh jingmynjur na ka UGC ka skulbah ka dei ban pyntip paidbah lyngba ki Advertisement ha ki kotkhubor bad hadien kane yn sa shong da ka Selection Committee ban leh ïa kaba donkam kum ka interview,” la ïathuh u Prof Lakhon bad bynrap, “hynrei u Vice Chancellor um shym la bud ïa kine ki kyndon ba la kdew hynrei u la shu pyntip beit beit ba la thung ïa u Rohit Prasad hadien ba ula shim hi ïa ka ban shu leh ïa ka online interview hadien ba la mynjur da ka Executive Council.”Na ka liang jong ka NEHUSU lyngba u Secretary ka la pynrem jur ïa ka jingbym lah jong u Vice Chancellor ban peit ïa ka jingeh jong ki samla pule wat hadien ba ka Union ka ladep pynsngew ïa kiba bun ki jingdawa na ka por sha ka por.
title: KYNNOH KA JAC BA THUNGKAM BE-AIÑ ÏA U ROHIT PRASAD, BYRNGEM BAN MUDUI SHA HIGH COURT

content: Ka Meghalaya State Commission for Women (MCSW) ha ka sngi balang ka la pyntip ba ka la  pan ïa ka kaiphod tohkit na ki Pulit ka Laban Police Station halor ka jingdung pynmynsaw jong u Suresh Singh ïa la ka jong ka kurim ka Poonam Singh ha ka 31 tarik u Risaw, 2023 ha iing sah ha Laban, kaba la mynsaw jur bad kaba dang shah sumar haduh mynta ha Hospital. Ka Commission ka la pyntip ba ka la shimkhia halor kane ka jingjia.“Ha kum kane ka por, ngi sngew ba ka aiñ ka dei ban long kaba kham halor.  Ka aiñ ka dei ban long halor ïa baroh,” ong ka Commission.“Ka Commission ka la ïakynduh ïa ka lanot, ïa ka khun, bad ïa ki bor pynïaid jong ka Civil Hospital. Watla ka lanot (Poonam Singh) kam pat ujor eiei sha ka Commission ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingjia, hynrei ka Commission ka la pan ïa ka kaiphod tohkit na ki Pulit na ka Police Station ba dei peit bad mynta ngi dang ap ïa ka kaiphod shwa ban tuklar halor kane ka kam,” la bynrap ka Commission.
title: NA KI PULIT PAN KAIPHOD TOHKIT KA MSCW BA SHAH DUNG TARI KA KURIM HA U LOK

content: U President ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) u samla Lambokstarwell Mangar u la kynthoh da kaba ong, ba ka jingpyntreikam jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ialam da ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ia ka aiñ Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security Act (MRSSA) tang ha ki hynñiew tylli shnong bad lada ka Sorkar kam shna ia ki khyrdop talasi mynder, ka long thik kum ka ja kaba dang khaw-ot.“Lada pyntreikam tang ha hynñiew tylli ki shnong ia ka aiñ MRSSA bad lada ki khyrdop kim ieng nga sngew ba ka dei ka aiñ ja khawot bad kam pat long satia ka aiñ kaba pura,” la ong u President ka KSU haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei.Ha ka 30 tarik, Risaw, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynmih da ka jingbthah ban pyntreikam ia ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security Act, 2016 da kaba bthah ia ki trai ing bad ia ki nongshong wai  hapoh ki hynñiew tylli ki shnong hapoh ka Sor Shillong ba kin pynrung kyrteng ialade ha ka wat kaba nyngkong. Ki hynñiew tylli ki shnong ki long ka shnong Nongrim Hills, Pohkseh, Nongrah, Nongmensong, Lapalang, Riat Laban bad Wahdienglieng.Ka jingpyntreikam ia kane ka aiñ ka long ban khanglad ia ki riew shimkabu bad ia ki runar ban ioh jaka rieh tngen hapoh ka jylla bad ban pyrkhing da ka aiñ na ka bynta ban khanglad ia ka jingrung kyrthep be-aiñ bad ki nongbylla kiba wan trei be-aiñ kiba lah ban rung bad sah ha ki shnong bapher bapher.“Ka MRSSA ka don ia ka District Task Force ban khlieh da ki Deputy Commissioner bad yn kynthup ia ki nongpyniad shnong bad kumba ngi ioh jingtip ba ki don ki nongpyniaid shnong kiba sngewdiaw ba ha ka jingtreikam ki (sorkar) la iaid lait wat ia ki Dorbar Shnong.  Ia ki shnong ba la pyntreikam ia ka MRSSA ka dei ban kynthup lang ia ki Rangbah Shnong,” u la ong.Haba kynthoh ia ka jingpynslem jong ka Sorkar Jylla kaba ai daw ba ka Inner Line Permit bad ka MRSSA ka dang don hapoh ka jingbishar jong ka Ministry of Home Affairs ka Sorkar Pdeng, u Samla Lambokstar Marngar u la ong, “hynrei ka Sorkar ka la iaid shakhmat da kaba phah sha u Lat bad ynda la buddien biang u Lat u la phah sha ka Sorkar India bad (ka Sorkar Jylla) la shu riehtngen ba ka Sorkar India ka dang bishar ia ka Resolution jong ka ILP bad ka MRSSA.”“Ngi sngew thamula bad ka pynpyrkhat ia ngi ba lehse ka Sorkar kam don mon ban pynurlong ia ki ishu kiba ngi dawa,” u la kynthoh.“Lada ka sorkar ka long kaba shimkhia ia kane ka kam bad katba ka Sorkar India ka dang pule sah ia ka Resolution, ka Sorkar jylla ka ladei ban pyntreikam da la ka jong ka aiñ ba la don lypa da kaba pynieng noh ia ki khyrdop ha ka wat kaba nyngkong ban pyni haduh katno ka jingseisoh haba pyntreikam ia kane ka aiñ bad haduh katno ka lah ban bat ia ki briew kiba wanrung sha ka jylla klem ki kot ki sla kiba biang,” la ong shuh shuh u President ka KSU.“Ha ki khyndiat bnai ngi la iai buddien ia kane ka kam haba ngi la kynduh ia u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla (Bah Prestone Tynsong) u ong ba ka Sorkar India ka la pynphai ia ka MRSSA sha ka Jylla bad ngi la shu iohi tang ia ka jingpyrshang ban pyntreikam ia ka MRSSA ha ki katto katne ki shnong,” u la ong.“Ka Sorkar Jylla ka ladep ithuh ia ki jaka ban pynieng ia ki 18 tylli ki khyrdop talasi mynder (Entry bad Exit Points) bad shipor ngi la khmihlynti ba ka Sorkar ka la shimkhia da kaba tei ia ka khyrdop ha Umling, Ribhoi District hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba kane ka khyrdop talasi mynder ka kylla long pynban kum ka khyrdop talasi Covid bad mynta lei ka la shu kylla iing jah,” ula bynrap.Halor ka jingpynbeit thymmai jong ka Sorkar ia ka MRSSA, 2016, u Samla Lambokstarwell u la ong, “haba tang ia ka aiñ phim pat pyntreikam kumno phin iakren shaphang ka jingpynbeit thymmai. Pyntreikam shwa ia ka aiñ bad phin sa iohi hangno ka jingduna bad ka jingdkoh.  Kano kano ka aiñ kan ym don kaba tang shu shna kan long noh kaba janai hynrei kan don beit ka jingduna.”“Kumba ka long mynta, ka jinglaitlan jong ka khappud Meghalaya bad Bangladesh ka jur bha haduh katta katta. Phi kren ia ka aiñ kam dei than tang ban shu tehlakam ia ka jingwanrung kyrthep jong ki mynder. Hynrei kumba ka long, mynta ka jingma ia ka jylla jong ngi ka dei u drok.  Lada ki khyrdop talasi ki ieng, ngin sa iohi ba yn sa lah ban tem ruh ia ka jingrung kyrthep jong ki briew kiba nabar bad ia ki kam runar ruser kiba pyrshang ban pynjot ia ka jylla jong ngi baroh kawei,” la pynpaw u President ka KSU.“Ka sorkar ka dei ban sngewthuh ba kane ka aiñ ka dei shi bynta ban iakhun ia ki mynder bad shibynta ka jingiakhun ia ki kam kiba shyrkhei khamtam ia u drok uba pynjot ia ki khun samla hapoh kane ka jylla jong ngi,” u la ong.Haba kylli, u President ka KSU u la ong, “da iakren hok hi, ki khyrdop kiba ka Sorkar ka la pynieng ki long “Zero.” Ki 18 tylli ki khyrdop, kiba ka Sorkar ka kdew bad pynpaw ha ka ain bad thoh ruh ia ka First, Second bad Third Phase ka long tang ha ka jingthoh katba ha ka jingshisha ka long “Nil.” Ka shu ieng thik tang kawei ha Umling bad kato mynta ruh ka la kylla iingjah bad sa 17 tylli kiba don ha Secretariat lano kin urlong ia kata ngim tip bad shipor ka Sorkar ka ong ba la ioh jaka bad ban leh sorbe kine kitai ban pynbeit ia ka jingsiew bailutksan ia ki trai jaka.“Shipor ka Sorkar ka riehtngen beit ba ka MRSSA ka la don sha ka Sorkar India bad ngi dang ap ia ka jubab na ka Sorkar India. Ynda kylli ia ka Entry bad Exit point ruh ka kut tang kumta. Ban jubab kham bha ngin hap kylli ia ka Sorkar,” ula ong.U la ong ruh ba ka Sorkar ka kren kyllain bad ka Sorkar kam kwah imat ban peitngor ia ki briew kiba nabar kiba wan rung sha ka jylla.“Lada ka sorkar kaba don ha ka bor kam sngewthuh ioh ba kan poi shisien ka sngi ba kita ki briew kiba dei tang ki nongwei ki dei hok ne kim dei ki nong India bad ki wanrung shapoh ka jylla jong ngi, kin ioh sa ia ki kot ki sla tuh nangne nangtai, ki shong shnong, ki trei bylla, ki ioh sa ki kam ki jam bad kan sa poi ka sngi ba kin sa knieh wat ia ka synshar ka khadar. Kijuh ki briew kiba ma ki (sorkar) ki pynsyiad, kijuh ki briew kiba shisien ka sngi kin sa kynjat ia ka shuki kaba ki shong ma ki (sokrar) mynta bad kin sa long Myntri Rangbah da kita lada kim iohi jngai,” la maham une u nongialam ka KSU.
title: LADA KI KHYRDOP TALASI MYNDER KIM ÏENG, KA MRSSA KAN LONG KUM KA JA KHAW-OT : LAMBOK MANGAR

content: Ka tnat Pulit ha ka sngi palei ka la thang pynkylla dpei ïa u drok ha ka pajwa barhem jong ka karkhana Star Cement, Lumshnong East Jaiñtia Hills Distirct ïa uba la ïoh kurup da ki Pulit na ki snar nongkhaii drok ha kylleng ka jylla.Ha ka jingthang ïa u drok la sakhi lang da u Director General of Police (DGP) ka Jylla u Dr. LR Bishnoi, u Inspector General Law and Order u Mukesh Singh, u Dy. Inspector General Eastern Range u Davis N. Marak, ki Superintendent of Police, ki Additional Superintendent of Police na East Khasi Hills, West Khasi Hills bad na East Jaiñtia Hills District.Ïa u drok uba shongdor haduh 4 klur tyngka la thang ha ka pajwa kaba ka jingkhluit ka long haduh 1200 degree centigrade hadien ba la ïoh ïa ka hukum na ka Iïngbishar Meghalaya High Court.La sdang ban thang ïa u drok da ki Pulit bad hadien kane la thang pynlut da ki nongtrei jong ka Star Cement hapoh ka jingpeit jong u Supervisor.U drok uba ki Pulit ki la thang ha kane ka sngi u dei uba ki la ïoh kurup na ki 51 tylli ki Case ba la rejister bad kiba ïoh kurup dang ha kine ki khyndiat bnai ba la leit noh, kata, na East Khasi Hills District kiba don kumba 10 tylli ki Case, na Ri Bhoi District 2 tylli ki Case bad na West Khasi Hill Districts 14 tylli ki Case, 25 tylli ki case na West Jaiñtia Hills.La pynkylla dpei lut ïa u drok ba kynthup ïa u drok Heroin uba shongdor T. 3 klur bad ïa u Ganja uba shongdor T. 80 lak tyngka bad T. 20 lak bad baroh ka poi sha ka T 4 klur. La thang ruh ïa ki dawai kuli Yaba.La pyntip ruh ba yn sa thang shuh shuh ïa u drok ynda la ïoh hukum na ka Iingbishar.U Dr. LR Bishnoi u la pan ka jingïatreilang ïa ki lad pathai khubor ban pynphriang ïa ki jingai jingpynshai sha ki paidbah ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshyrkhei jong u drok. U la ong ruh ba ka tnat Pulit ka la pynlong bun bah ki jingpynshai haduh  1,500 sien ban pynsngewthuh sha ki paidbah ïa ka jingshyrkhei jong u drok bad u la ïathuh ruh ba ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya kim shym la shongthait ban rat dyngkhong ïa ka jingjyllei jong u drok.Ha kane ka sngi, la pynlong ruh ïa ka jingpynshai paidbah halor ka jingshyrkhei jong u dork ha Donbosco College, Byndihati.U Dr. Bishnoi u la ïathuh ruh ba ha u snem ba la leit noh, ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup 24 kilo u drok Heroin ha kaba manla ka kilogram u drok u shongdor haduh T. 8-10 klur.  U la ïathuh ruh ba palat 500 ngut ki nongkhaïi drok ki la shah kem bad ki Pulit ki la regjister case bad 135 tylli ki ejahar kiba dei ki Criminal Case.U Davis N.R Marak u la  batai shapang ka jingthang ïa u drok da kaba pyntip ba manla ki district ki don ïa ki komiti bad ha kane ka komiti ki don lang ki kynhun jong ka Sorkar na rilum Khasi Jaiñtia bad na rilum Garo kumno ban tehlakam ïa ka jingkhaii tuh ïa u drok hapoh kane ka jylla.
title: THANG KI PULIT ÏA KA 4 KLUR HA PAJWA KA STAR CEMENT, DEI U DROK BA ÏOH KURUP

content: Ka North East Students’ Organization (NESO) ka la dawa tyngeh ïa ka Sorkar India ba kan khot ïa baroh ki kynhun bapher bapher sha ka miej jingïakren bad ban wanrah ïa ka rai kaba pynkut noh shisyndon ïa ka jingïaumsnam ha ka jylla Manipur.Ryngkat lang bad ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi, ka NESO ka la pynlong ruh ïa ka jingïashong kyllaiñ myngngor ha nongbah Shillong ban pynrem ïa ka jingbym lah jong ka Sorkar India ban pynkut noh ïa ka jingïaumsnam ha ka jylla Manipur kaba la kynjoh mynta la hynriew bnai kynthih.Ha kane ka jingïakhih kaba jai jai la ïashim bynta da ki dkhot ka KSU, HITO, GSU, FKJGP, HNYF, RBYF, Shillong Manipuri Students’ Union, Kuki Students’ Organisation Shillong, Naga Students’ Union Shillong, Shillong Socio-Cultural Assamese Students’ Association, Mizo Students’ Union Shillong, Twipra Students’ Federation Shillong, Arunachal Students Union Shillong, Mara Students’ Organisation bad ka Lai Students’ Association.Katto katne ki plakad ba la wah ha kane ka jaka, la thoh, “sangeh noh ka jingleh politik halor ka jingim briew,” “ngi dwai ïa ka jingsuk ha Manipur,”, “ko Sorkar India ka jingbym leh eiei ka pyni ïa ka jingibeiñ ïa ka North East,” “Sorkar India baieid, iehnoh ïa ka politik shadien.:Haba kren sha ki nongïakhih, u Chairman ka NESO u Bah Samuel B Jyrwa u la ong, “da ka jingkyrshan lang jong ki seng bapher bapher, ka NESO ka dawa ïa ka Sorkar India ba kan shimkhia ban wanrah noh ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka Jylla Manipur. Ka dei ban khot lang ïa baroh ki kynhun bapher bapher sha ka miej ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakren khnang ba yn dup lah ban wanrah biang ïa ka jingshongsuk sa shisien pat ha ka jylla Manipur.”“Lada ka Sorkar India ka dang pynslem ban shimkhia ka pynpaw ba ka Sorkar India kam pushe ïa ka bha ka ka miat jong ki riewlum ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi bad ki paid riewlum jong ka Jylla Manipur hynrei ka phaikhmat tang sha ki marpohkhyndew,” ula ong bad bynrap, “kane ka dei ka jingmaham ïa ka Sorkar India lada ki kwah ban pynlong nongwei ïa ki paidbah ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi na ka dewbah India, ka shong ha ka kti jong ka Sorkar India, ki dei ban leh noh mynta, lane ka por ka lah ban dier.”Da kaba pynpaw ba ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka la mad ïa ka jingshah leh bym hok ha ki phew snem ba la leit noh, u Bah Jyrwa u la ong, “ngin ïai ong ïa kane na ka por sha ka por, pateng la pateng ba ka Sorkar India ka la leh bym hok ïa ngi hynrei ka Sorkar India ka la kyntait ba ka la leh bym hok.”“Ki don bun ki khep haba ngi pyrkhat ïa ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi, hadien ba ngi la pynïasoh bad ka ri India.  Ïa ka Manipur la pynïaïoh sha ka ri India da ka bor, ka Meghalaya lyngba ka Instrument of Accession la pynïasoh bad ka ri India bad bun kiwei kiwei ki jylla synshar syiem bad ki jaka ba la shu pynïasoh bad ka ri India,” u la ong.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka Sorkar India ka la pyndonkam da ka aiñ Ïakjakor, ka Armed Forces Special Powers Act (AFSPA) pyrshah ïa ki riewlum ritpaid ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi.  Ki bor shipai ki leh ïa ki kam pyntriem ha kiba bun ki jylla jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ha ka kyrteng ban ïakhun ïa ki lehnoh.U Bah Jyrwa u la ong ba ka Sorkar India ka la leh bym hok da kaba pynrung sha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ïa ki mynder ri be-aiñ na ka ri Bangladesh bad mynjur ruh ïa ka Citizenship Amendment Act ha u snem 2019, khnang ban dup pynlong nongshong shnong ïa ki mynder ri beain na ka ri Bangladesh.U la ong shuh shuh ba ka jingbym leh eiei jong ka Sorkar India halor ka jingïausnam ha ka jylla Manipur ka pynpaw shynna ba ka dei ka jingleh bym hok ha ka saiñpyrthei.“…..ngi la ïasyllok bad ki kynhun bapher bapher jong ka jylla Manipur ïa ki riewpawkhmat bapher bapher ka Manipur, ki ong bad ki kynnoh ba ka don eiei kaba kham sniew shuh shuh kaba ka khmat kam lah ban ïohi.  Kane ka dei kaba kham sheptieng shuh shuh, kane ka dei ka jingjia kaba sngewsih kaba la jia ha ka jylla Manipur bad kum ka NESO  ngi sngew ba ka Sorkar India ka la phiel ban weng ïa ka jingeh ha Manipur,” u la bynrap.U President ka KSU u samla Lambokstarwell Marngar u la ong ba ka jingleh shiliang khmat jong ka Sorkar Inda ka la pynbor ïa ngi ban ngeit ba ka don ka buit barieh ban pynduhjait ïa ki jaidbynriew rit paid kiba sah ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi.U la ong ba ka Sorkar ka la phah da ki hajar ngut ki bor bor pahara sha ka Jylla Manipur tang ban shu long ki nongpeitkai ïa ka drama bad ki bym shym leh eiei ban pynsangeh ïa ka jingïausnam. “Kane ka pynlong ïa nga ban suba jur ba ka BJP kaba bat ïa u lakam synshar ha Delhi ka don ïa ka buit barieh ban kynshoit ïa ka jingïaumsnam hapdeng ki riewlum jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi,” u la ong.“Namarkata, ka KSU ka phah ïa u kyrwoh uba shai sha ka Sorkar India ba ka dei ban shimkhia noh mardor ban wanrah biang ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ka Jylla Manipur,” u la bynrap.U Presideng ka HNYF u Bah Sadon K Blah u la ong, “ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewsih ba ka jingïakajia hapdeng ki ar jaidbynriew ha ka jylla Manipur ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Sorkar India kim shym la shimkhia ha ka rukom kaba dei. Kumba ka long mynta ka jingjia, la ka dei ka Sorkar Jylla ne ka Sorkar Pdeng kim shym la shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban tem ai ka jingïakynad ha ka jylla Manipur bad ha kawei pat ka liang ka i kumba kan nang heh kum ban shu ong noh ba ka jingïohnong na ka jingïakynad jaidbynriew bad na ka jingïakynad saiñpyrhthei ba la ïalehkai da kiba don ha ka bor ban  bat ia u lakam synshar ha ka jylla Manipur.”U la buh jingkylli ruh kumno kane ka jingïakynad jaidbynriew ha Manipur kan shimpor haduh katne. “Lada ïa kane ka jingïakynad ym shym la kyrshan da kane ka kynhun lane da katai ka kynhun, kan ym lah ban long haduh katne bad kan ym lah ban neh slem haduh katne katne,” u la ong.“Namarkata, ka don ka thong bad ka buit barieh shalyndet da ki kynrad saiñpyrthei bad ki seng saiñpyrthei halor ka jingjia ha ka jylla Manipur kiba lah ban dei na ka Jylla Manpur lane na ka Sorkar Pdeng,” la kynnoh u Bah Sadon.
title: KHOT ÏA KI KYNHUN SHA KA JINGÏAKREN, PYNKUT NOH ÏA KI JINGÏAUMSNAM HA MANIPUR : NESO

content: U MDC jong ka Mawlai Constituency u Bah Teiborlang Pathaw ryngkat lang bad ki nongialam shnong ha ka sngi palei ki la hiar jurip ia ki artylli ki surok iaid kali ba la siang rong, kawei kaba pyniasoh na ka shnong Mawlai Motsyiar sha Mawlai Umjaiur kaba jngai kumba 0.459 kilomitar bad kawei pat kaba pyniasoh ia ka Riat Medi sha Mawlai Nongpdeng kaba jngai kumba 0.120 km kiba la mang pisa lyngba ka tnat PWD.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Teibor u la iathuh ba ia ka surok na Riat Medi sha Mawlai Nongpdeng ladep shna sa tang ban plie paidbah noh.  Katba ia ka surok kaba pyniasoh na Mawlai Motsyiar sha Mawlai Umjaiur u la ong ba na ka jingpynthut jong u slap bad ki contractor kin sdang noh ia ka kam namar kat haduh mynta ladep ban shna kumba 70 percent eiei ia ki Nala bad ia ki kynroh bad kaba sah mynta ka long sa tang ban siang ia ka rong.U la ong ba ia kane ka surok la khmihlynti ban pyndep noh ha u Lber 2024 namarba kane ka dei ka surok kaba ki nongshong shnong ki la ap khmih lynti la kumba 40 snem eiei.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne ba ia u mawnongrim ban shna ia kine ki ar tylli ki surok la buh mawnongrim da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bah Prestone Tynsong ha ka 19 tarik, Nohprah, 2022.
title: HADIEN 40 SNEM PYNÏOH U BAH TEIBOR PATHAW ÏA KA SUROK MOT SYIAR -NONGPDENG

content: Shi sngi hadien ba ka Ïingbishar Meghalaya High Court ka la bthah ban pynjulor noh ïa u drok ba la ïoh kurup na kylleng ki bynta jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep, ki dkhot jong ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo People (FKJGP), Shillong City ha ka por kumba 8:45 baje eiei mynmiet jong ka sngi thohdieng ki la bat ïa uwei u briew halor ka jingsuba ba u dei u nongkhaii drok harum ka parking Lot jong ka MUDA ha Khyndai Lad, Shillong.Ki dkhot ka seng hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Assistant Education Secretary u Bah Bonny Jyrwa bad u General Secretary u Bah Shane Nongrum ki la ïoh ban bat ïa une u bar jylla shadien jong ka jaka pynieng kali ka MUDA ha Khyndai Lad.Tang shu ïoh bat ïa une u suba nongdie drok, ki dkhot ka FKJGP ki la leit ban aiti sha ki Pulit jong ka Sadar Police Station bad hadien katto katne por ba la wan poi sha ki pulit jong ka Anti- Narcotic Task Force ka East Khasi Hills ban talasi ïa une uba la sub nongkhaii drok.Ha ka jingtalasi ïa ka met jong une u nongkhaii drok, ki Pulit la ïoh ban kurup ar tylli ki tin golden ba la thep ïa u drok Herion, 33 tylli ki tyndong plastik barit ba la thep ïa u drok Herion, ar tylli ki thyrnia injek, ar tylli ki mobile phone, ka pisa Bangla kaba 10 tyngka, ka pisa kot T. 615 spah bad T. 95 tyngka ki pisa khutia.U Bah Boney Jyrwa, ha ka jingïakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la ïathuh, katba u dang mih na jaka pynieng kali ha MUDA u la ïohi ïa u nongkhaii drok.  “Nga la kren ïa u namarba nga la i suba bad nga la ïohi ba u bat ha kti u powdar rong stem bad mar mar nga la pyntip noh sha u President jong ka FKJGP Shillong City.”U la ïathuh ba une u suba nongkhaii drok u dei u bar jylla Bengalee.Uwei na ki dkhot ka seng u la ong, “ha ka por ba ngi la bat ïa u (suba nongdie drok) u la tyrwa ïa ngi da ka pisa. Hynrei kum ki dkhot ka seng ngim shym la shim ïa kata ka pisa (kaba u tyrwa) hynrei lada ngi shim ïa kata ka pisa, ka jaidbynriew patde ka lah jot.”Haba kylli, u Bah Boney Jyrwa u la ong, “u (suba nongdie drok) la tyrwa ïa ngi da ka pisa sanphew hajar, shilak eiei hynrei ngim shym la ngeit satia bad ngi la rah beit ïa u sha Sadar Police Station.”
title: 1 LAK TYRWA U NONGDIE DROK BA SHAH BAT HARUM MUDA ÏA KI DKHOT KA FKJGP

content: Ka Kong Greatmercy Langte, kaba dei na ka shnong Nongnah kaba hap hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District ka la ïoh phong ïa ka pansngiat Spark Mrs Northeast India 2023 kaba long ka rynsan ïakop thei bhabriew hapoh kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kaba la long ha nongbah Guwahati ha ka 4 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka Kong Greatmercy Langte ka dei ka khun jong ka Kong Kasmutia Langte bad u Bah Sranningstar Paliar na ka shnong Domsohkhai-Nongnah, South West khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka rynsan ïakob ki 8 ngut ki nongjop ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher na artylli ki Category A bad B (age wise) bad napdeng ki nongïashim bynta ka kong Greatmercy Langte ka la jop ïa ka Mrs Northeast India Brand Ambassador (WINNER) Print Model.Kumban shu pynkynmaw ka Kong Greatmercy Langte ka dei ruh kawei na ki nongrwai kaba la jop bad ïoh ïa ka nam “Best Performance of the Day” (Singing category) ha ka rynsan jong ka Meghalaya Superstar Season-2 ha u snem 2016 da kaba ïoh rah ruh ïa ka nam “Miss Popular” ha ka rynsan “Fashion Wizard Mega Model Hunt 2019” bad ka nam ,”Miss India’s Goodness Ambassador” ha ka rynsan “Miss India Black Carpet 2019”.Ka Kong Greatmercy ka la ïohlad ban ïashim bynta ha ka Loreal Hair Show kaba la long ha Hotel Blue Raddison, Guwahati ha u snem 2019 bad ka la poi ruh sha ka jingïakob phainal ha ka rynsan Mrs. Super Mom 2023.Ha kajuh ka por ka dei ruh ka dkhot jong ka All Meghalaya Dancer Association (AMDA).
title: IOH PHONG KA GREATMERCY LANGTE ÏA KA PANSNGIAT SPARK MRS NORTHEAST INDIA 2023

content: Ki Pulit jong ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District kiba la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ki la kem noh ïa uwei u briew uba la 26 snem ka rta ryngkat u drok.Ïa une u briew la iohkem na ka kyntoit Lumiew jong ka shnong Pyndengumiong, Mairang kaba hap hapoh ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District ha ka janmiet jong ka sngi Thohdieng.Katkum u kyrwoh ba la phah da ka tnat Pulit la ïathuh ba ha ka jingtalasi, ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup 2 gram u drok heroin, ka pisa T. 11 hajar bad kawei ka mobile phone.Kane ka dei ka sien ka baar ba ki Pulit jong ka Eastwern West Khasi Hills District kin ïoh kurup ïa u drok hapoh ka District bad kaba nyngkong naduh ba la ïoh ïa la ka jong ka District.
title: NA PYNDENGUMÏONG SHAH KEM U BRIEW RYNGKAT U DROK HA KI PULIT KA EWKH

content: : Ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team (SRT) ka tnat treikam jong ka Fire and Emergency Services (F&ES) ka la ai jinghikai ïa ki dkhot ha ka por bym don kino kino ki jingjia basngewsih ha kylleng ka jylla.Dang ha kine ki khyndiat bnai, ki dhot ka SRT ki ju leit ai jingïarap ha kylleng ka jylla, kata, ha Sor bad ha nongkyndong haba ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki ïakynduh ïa kino kino ki khep ba ki donkam ïa ki jingïarap bakyrkieh.Ha kine ki khyndiat bnai ba la leit noh kane ka kynhun ka la ïarap ïa ki lanot shlei um, ki lanot kiba mad ka jingtwa khyndew, kiba ngam jyllop, ki lanot kiba ïakynduh ïa ki jingjia hap kali bad ngam um ban wad ïa ki briew kiba la shah rong ha ka um da ki sngi, ki taiew bad ki bnai.Dang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi, ka SRT ka la pynlut por ban ai jinghikai ïa ki dkhot kumno ba kin pyntbit shuh shuh ïalade ha ka jingkilan met ha pung Umïam khnang ba kin nang lah ban pynjanai shuh shuh ban ai jingshakri sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka jylla baroh kawei.
title: HA KI POR BYM DON JINGJIA, PYNLUT POR KA SRT BAN HIKAI PYNTBIT ÏA KI DKHOT

content: : “Ka Eucharist ka dei ka pdeng bad ka tyllong jong ka jingngeit Catholic,” ong u Apostolic Nuncio ka India bad Nepal u Most Rev. Leopoldo Girelli haba ai ïa ka Apostolic Message sha ki lak ngut ki paidriewngeit kiba ïalum ha Lum Tyngkong, Laitumkhrah ha ka nohphai sngi jong ka sngi U Blei kiba la ïashim bynta ha ka jingïaid Proseshon Eucharist kaba ju long shisien shisnem.“Nga sngewkmen haduh katta katta ba nga la ïohlad ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka proseshon Eucharist jong ka Shillong Archdiocese ban ïasam bad phi ïa ka jingieid bad ka jingriewblei ha ka Eucharist Bakhuid.  Ka jingmut jong ka proseshon Eucharist ka long ban mane, ban rwai, ban ïaroh bad ban ainguh ïa U Blei uba ieid ïa ngi haduh kaba kut bad Uba la ai ïalade ha ngi lyngba ïa ka Met bad ka Snam. Ka Eucharist ka dei ka jingaiei jong u Trai Jisu Khrist kaba da lade hi U la pynpaw ha ngi ïa ka jingieid ba khlempud jong U Blei ïa ngi ki briew,” la ong u Archbishop Girelli.“Ka jingïaid proseshon ka pynkynmaw ruh ba ka dei ka jingïaid lynti jong ngi ha kane ka sla pyrthei bad U Jisu hi  U la ïaid ryngkat lang bad ngi.  U long U paralok, U long u nongïalam lynti, U long u Kpu uba pynkdang ha ka jingïaid lynti jong ngi sha ka jingim bymjukut,” u la bynrap.“Kum ki Khristan ngi donkam ïa U Khrist ba Un don ha ka jingim jong ngi,” la kyntu u Archbishop Girelli ïa ki paid U Blei bad bynrap, “ka Balang ka ïoh jingim lyngba ka Eucharist. Ka Vatican Council ka pynbna ba ka Eucharist ka dei ka tyllong jong ka jingim Khristan.”U Auxilliary Bishop jong ka Aizawl u Most Rev. Joachim Walder haba pharia ïa ka ktien jong U Blei ha ka ktien Phareng u la ong, “kumba U Blei u la ai ïa ka jingbam ban tei ïa ka met u buh ruh ïa ka Eucharist ba kan long ka jingbam ba kynja mynsiem ba uno uno uba thngan bad uba sliang un ïoh ïa ka jingim kaba pura lada u phai sha u Jisu ha ka Eucharist Bakhuid.”U Bishop jong ka Jyllaniam Jowai u Most Rev. Ferdinand Dkhar uba la ai jingkren ha ka ktien Khasi u la sneng bad kraw ïa ki riewngeit da kaba pynkynmaw ba ka jingwan iuhkjat jong u Apostolic Nuncio uba long u nongmihkhmat jong u Pope Francis, ka jingïadon lang jong u Bishop Joachim Walder na Aizawl bad ki riewngeit na kylleng ka jylla bad wat na shabar ri ka pynpaw shai ba ka Balang Catholic ka long kawei bad ka phaikhmat sha u Jisu kum u nongsharai ba hakhlieh tam kum ka tynrai bad ka tyllong jong ka jingieid.Ha ka jingknia ïa ka Mass Bakhuid ha ka por mynstep kaba la long ha Calvary la pynmynta da u Apostolic Nuncio Archbishop Leopoldo Girelli ryngkat ka jingïadon lang jong Archbishop ka Jylla Niam Bah Shillong u Most Rev. Victor Lyngdoh, u Bishop jong ka Jylla Niam Nongstoiñ u Most Rev. Willbert Marweiñ, u Bishop jong ka Jylla Niam Jowai u Most Rev. Ferdinand Dkhar, u Auxiliary Bishop jong ka Aizawl u Most Rev. Joachim Walder, ki spah ngut ki Lyngdoh Sohblei bad ki lak ngut ki paidriewngeit na ki lai tylli ki Diocese, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Bah Prestone Tynsong, ki Myntri Sorkar ba kynthup ïa ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh bad u Bah AL Hek, u MP ka Shillong Bah Vincent Pala, ki MLA, ki MDC, ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills Kong RM Kurbah bad kiwei kiwei.Ka Balang ha kane ka sngi, ka la pynkup burom ïa ki lai ngut ki Lyngdoh Sad kiba la ïashim bynta lang ha ka jingknia ïa ka Mass Bakhuid bad na ka liang jong ka ka Editorial Board Ka Ïing Khristan (EBIK) ka la pynkup burom da ka khusnam ‘Ka Ïing Khristan Literary Award’ na bynta u snem 2023 ïa u Bah Apol Mawñiuh hadien ba kynhun ki nongbishar ki la ibit ba ka jingthoh jong u halor ka phang ‘Ka jingieid shi kurim ka thymmei jong ka ïing ka sem basuk’ ka long ka jingthoh ba kynsai tam jong u snem 2023.La pynkut ïa ka Proseshon Eucharist da ka jingkyrkhu jong u Apostolic Nuncio ïa ki paid U Blei da ka Eucharist Bakhuid shwa ban pynkut ïa ka jingmane ïa ka Sakramen Bakhuidtam ka Duwan.
title: SHLEI U LUM TYNGKONG DA KI LAK NGUT KI RIEWNGEIT CATHOLIC KA EUCHARIST KA DEI KA JINGAIEI JONG U TRAI JISU KHRIST: MOST REV. LEOPOLDO GIRELLI

content: Ka Khasi Students Union Mission Unit ba la lamkhmat da u General Secretary u samla Albert L. Mawlong ryngkat ki dkhot ki la ïohbat ïa ki san ngut ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba trei bylla hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Mairang Mission, Eastern West Khasi Hills District.Ha ka jingtohkit, ki dkhot jong ka seng ki la lap ba kine ki nongbylla bar jylla ki la poi sha ka shnong Mairang na ka bynta ban tah ïa ki tiles bad ki maw Marble ha kawei ka ïing bad kim don satia ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang.  Mar mar ki dkhot ka seng ki la phah lum ïa ki tiar ki tiar bad beh noh shisyndon ryngkat ka jingmaham tyngeh ïa kine ki briew ba kim bit ban wan phai biang hadien ba la shah beh.Ka seng ka maham tyngeh ïa kiba ju mlien ban wanrah nong trei nabar ka jylla khlem da tohkit bniah la ki don ne em ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang.Ka Seng ka la kynnoh ruh ba bunsien ki don kiba leh Benami bad wanrah ïa ki briew kiba nabar da kaba shim kabu ha kiba bun ki liang.  Ka Seng ka la pynpaw ba kan leh da kaba tyngeh ïa kino kino kiba leh Benami nangne shakhmat.
title: BAT BAD PYNHER KRAD KI DKHOT KA KSU ÏA KI NONGBYLLA BAR JYLLA MAIRANG

content: Ki shipai BSF ka 100 Battalion kiba ap pahara ha khappud jong ka West Garo Hills District da ka jingïatreilang bad ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la ïoh kurup haduh 270 byrni ka shini kaba khia 13,500 kilogram kaba shongdor T.5,40,000 lak na ka shnong Paulpara kaba don ha khappud jong ka West Garo Hills District bad ka ri Bangladesh.Ïa ki byrni ba la thep ïa ka shini la lap hadien ba ki nongkhaii tuh ki la buhrieh ha kawei ka iing da ka jingthmu ban khaii tuh sha ka ri Bangladesh. Ïa ka shini ba la ïoh kurup la shimti noh da ki Pulit na ka bynta ban leh katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.Ki shipai BSF ki ïai long kiba peitngor bha ïa ki kam runar ruser bad ki kam khaii be-aiñ ha shilynter ka khappud jong ka ri.
title: 270 BYRNI KURUP KI BSF ÏA KA SHINI BA THMU KHAÏI SHA BANGLADESH

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youths’ Council (HYC) CEC kam lah ban shu sngap bad long tang ki nongpeit ïa ka jingbym lah jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ïalam da ka National People’s Party (NPP)ban pynbeit ïa ki jingeh bad jingdawa ba shong nongrim jong ki nongtrei ASHA ha kane ka Jylla.“Ka seng ka dawa ïa ka Sorkar ba kan thaw ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynurlong ïa ki jingdawa jong ki ASHA ban ïoh ïa ka jingsiew kaba biang katkum ka kam ba ki trei, ban kynthup ïa ki hapoh ka MHIS na bynta ban ïoh jingsumar ei bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdawa jong ki,” ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President ka HYC u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem ha ka sngi U Blei.“Ngi pynpaw ïa ka jingkyrshan ka bapura ïa ka MAWU halor ka jingïakhih jong ki bad ngim lah ruh khlem da ai khublei bad sngewnguh ïa ki ASHA halor ka jingtrei len lade ka jong ki ha ki jylli treikam kaba ki don khamtam eh ngim dei ban klet kumno ba ki len lade ha ka por ba ngi mad ïa ka Khlam Covid-19, dei ma ki kiba long kita ki nongtur ba hakhmat ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa kane ka khlam.  Ki lah ai ka jingshakri ka bapura ïa ki nongshong shnong ha kato ka por bad ha manla ka sngi ha kaba ïadei bad ka koit ka khiah jong ki nongshong shnong hi baroh,” u la bynrap.“Kumta, kum ki nongshong shnong ruh ngi sngew dap ram ïa ka jingshakri ba len lade ka jong ki bad lyngba kane ka kyrwoh ngi khot ngi wer ïa baroh ki dkhot ka jaidbynriew, ki Dorbar Shnong bad kiwei ba kin kyrshan ïa ki ASHA ha kane ka jingïakhih ka jong ki,” u la ong.“Ngi kyntu ruh ïa ka Sorkar ba kan pynbeit noh kloi ïa kane ka kam namar lada ki ASHA ki bteng ïa ka jingïakhih, kan ktah pat ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka Jylla. Ngi kyntu ruh ïa ka Sorkar ba kam dei ban pyntieng pynsmiej ïa ki nongtrei ASHA ba kin shah weng kam lada kim sangeh ka jingïakhih namar lada ka Sorkar ka bakla ban shim rai bad weng kam ïa ki ASHA kiba ïakhih ban dawa ïa la ka hok, na ka liang ka seng ruh kam banse ban mih shakhmat bad ïakhih pyrshah ïa ka Sorkar Jylla,” la maham ka HYC.
title: MAHAM KA HYC ÏA KA SORKAR MDA LADA WENG ÏA KI ASHA NA KA KAM

content: Ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka la kyrpad ia ki Village Health Council (VHC) ban khih ban ksar da kaba wad ia kino kino kiba lah ban long ki nongtrei monsngewbha (la ki dei ki dkhot ka VHC) ban pyntyllun shakhmat ia ka kam katba ki ASHA ha ka jylla baroh kawei ki dang pynlong ia ka jingsangeh treikam kaba khlem pud sngi.Lyngba u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Joint Secretary u TG Momin, ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka la kyrpad ia ki VHC ba kin iakren bad ki paradkhot ban ai jingiarap ia ki longkmie kiba armet da kaba pynkit sha ki jaka ai jingsumar, ban pyntyllun ia ka jingai injek tika ha ka por ba la pynlong ia ka Village Health and Nutrition Day (VHND) da kaba iatreilang bad ki nongtrei Anganawadi, ban pyntip ia ki medical cases sha ki ANM bad MO bad nalor kiwei kiwei de ki kam, khnang ban pynthikna kino kino ki kam kiba iadei bad ka koit ka khiah jong ki paidbah kan ym shah ktah.Kane ka jingkyrpad jong ka Sorkar ia ki VHC ka long hadien ba ki ASHA kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Meghalaya ASHA Workers Union (MAWU) ki la pynlong da ka jingiakhih shong iing kaba khlem pud sngi halor ka jingkam ba ka jingiakren ba dang shen bad ka Sorkar Jylla lyngba ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kam shym la long kaba seisoh hadien ba ki la pynsngew ia ki mat jingdawa ki jong ki.“Ka tnat kaba sngewthuh ia ka bynta kaba kongsan hapdeng ka jingdei jong ki ASHA bad ka koit ka khiah, ka kyntu ia ki ASHA ba kin bteng ia ki jingshakri ki jong ki sha ka imlang ka sahlang jong ngi khlem kano kano ka jingthud.  Ka Sorkar ka dang iai shaniah ia u synñiang ki nongtrei bahakhmat eh ka koit ka khiah bad ka khmihlynti ruh ia ka jingiatreilang na ki baroh na ka bynta ka bit ka biang jong ka imlang ka sahlang bad ka jylla baroh kawei,” la ong u kyrwoh.Haba pyntip ba ka Sorkar kam ju siew tista ia ka bainong ki ASHA manla u bnai, ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka la ong,  ‘ka long kaba dei ban pyntip ba ha ki snem ba la leit noh, ka Jylla ka la shimkhia ia ki jingeh bad ia ki ishu ba la pynsngew da ki ASHA.  Ka jingpyntreikam ia ka “ASHA First” application na ka bynta ka jingsiew bainong hapoh ka National Health Mission (NHM) ka long ka bynta bakongsan khnang ban pynthikna ba kin ioh tista ia ka bainong ha ka por ba la pyllait pisa. Ki ASHA kiba kham trei shitom ki ioh ia ka jingsiew kaba T. 7000 haduh T. 8000 shi bnai.”Naduh u snem 2022, ka tnat ka la pyllait ia ka pisa sha ki nongtrei ASHA.  Haduh T. 21.89 klur la pyllait ia ka pisa lyngba ka Application ha ki 12 bnai ba la leit noh bad haduh T. 34.50 klur ladep ban pyllait ia ka pisa ha ki 18 bnai baladep.Shuh shuh, ka pisa kaba dang sah ban siew na ka bynta ka Meghalaya Maternity Benefit Scheme (MMBS) bad ka Meghalaya ASHA Benefit Scheme (MABS), kaba kot T. 53 klur kaba dang sah pongding naduh u snem 2013, ladep ban pyllait ha ka jylla hapdeng ki snem 2021-2022, kaba long uwei pat u mawjam.“Ka long ruh kaba donkam ban tip ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la ai ruh ia ka Fixed Incentive kaba T. 2000 shi bnai sha baroh ki ASHA lyngba ka State Scheme, kum ka jingithuh ia ka jingeh kaba ki ASHA ki iakynduh.  Kane ka jingsiew ka long ruh wat ia ki ASHA kiba trei wat ha ki shnong kiba rit kiba dang duna ki nongshong shnong.  Mynta ki ASHA ki ioh ia ki jingsiew, wat ka jingsiew taiew da kaba kam lyngba ka App,” la ong u Momin.Lah ruh ban kdew ba ha ki jaka kiba kham shitom ka leit ka wan, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la bynshet ha ki Village Health Council (VHC) ba kin wanrah ia ki Nurse kiba la ioh jinghikai pyntbit (lada don), kiba lah ban shakri sha ka imlang ka sahlang.“Kane ka jingtyrwa ka la iaid shakhmat. Ka long kaba kongsan ban iaiban ba ki ASHA ki dei ki bynta bakongsan tam ha kaba pyntyllun shakhmat na ka bynta ka koit ka khiah.  Ka jingthud ha ka jingshakri jong ki ka lah ban ktah haduh katta katta ia ka koit ka khiah bad ia ki paidbah ka imlang ka sahlang,” la ong u Kyrwoh.“Tang hapoh ki 18 bnai hadien ba la wanrah ia ki jingtreikam ba thymmai ba la pyntreikam da ka Jylla na ka bynta ki ASHA, sa shisien ki la mih biang ki jingbyrngem bad ki jingiakhih jong ki ASHA kaba ktah ia ka jingmut ba shisha jong ka kam shakri monsngewbha bad kaba pynthud ruh ia ka jingshakri ha ka Koit ka khiah.  Ki jingiakhih ba khah khah, khamtam ha ki por ba dang pynlong ki jingiakhih, ki la don ruh ki jingjia kiba sngewsih, ba kynthup ia ka jingkhladnoh jong kawei ka longkmie ba armet ha Ribhoi District ha u snem 2022. Kum kine ki jingpynthud ia ki jingshakri ba kongsan ha ka liang ka koit ka khiah ki dei ki bym lah satia ban pdiang bad kiba lah ban wanrah ia ki jingeh ha ka imlang ka sahlang baroh kawei,” la pyntip u Joint Secretary ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah.
title: BTHAH KA SORKAR ÏA KI VHC BAN TREIKAM KATBA DANG SANGEH TREIKAM KI ASHA

content: Ka Central Executive Committee (CEC) jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka la shim ia ka rai ban bynshet ha ka State Election Committee (SEC) jong ka party ban ia pyrkhat ha kaba iadei bad ka jingiatreilang jong ka UDP bad ka HSPDP hapoh ka lama jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) na ka bynta ban sei ia u kyrtong monlang ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha u snemn 2024.U President jong ka UDP u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ha kaba iadei bad ka Tura Parliamentary Seat, ka Central Executive Committee (CEC) jong ka party ka la rai ban pynkhamti beit ha ka State Election Committee bad ha ki Senior Leader jong ka party ban wad ia u kyrtong ban pyniakhun ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha.
title: BYNSHET KA UDP HA KA SEC BAN PYRKHAT ÏA U KYRTONG MP NA SHILLONG BAD TURA

content: Ka jingmynthi jong u Vice Chacellor ka skul bah North Eastern Hills University (NEHU) u Prof. PS Shukla ban wengkam mardor ia u Rohit Prasad uba la shah thung tang kum u nongtrei kontrak ha ka kam Technical Advisor, ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) kaba kynthup ia ka NEHUTA, NEHUNSA bad ka NEHUSU ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka la sdang ia ka jingiakhih kaba khlem pud sngi.Ha kane ka sngi ba la sdang ia ka jingiakhih ba khlem pud sngi, na ka liang jong u Vice Chancellor um shym la don satia hapoh ka ophis treikam namarba u leit shuti bad la sakhi ruh ba bun na ki kamra klas ki thylli lut hadien ba ki samla pule ki la hap ban leit phai noh sha la ing na ka daw ka jingiakhih jong ka JAC.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u President ka JAC u Prof. Lakhon Kma, ka jingkam jong u Vice Chancellor ba u la khot iakren ia ki nongialam ka JAC ka long tang ha ki kot khubor ym da kaba phah ne pyntip sha ka JAC.U la pyntip ba ka JAC ka sngewkhia bha na ka bynta ka lawei jong ki samla pule, hynrei ki hap ban pyrkhat ba kumno kin ialeh ban ym duh klas than ki samla pule namarba ki eksamin ruh ki la jan.
title: THYLLI KRENG KRENG KI KAMRA KLAS KA NEHU BA SANGEH SHIM KLAS KI NONGHIKAI

content: Ki nongñiah kamai kali saw barit ne ki Maxi Cab hadien ba la shah khang kamai lyngba ka Police Bazaar ter ter shaduh Motphran, ha la lah sngi U Blei ki la pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah halor kane ka rai kaba la ktah shisha ia ka kamai kajih jong ki.Ia kane ka rai ban khang kamai ia ki kali saw barit la pynmih da u Chief Executive Officer (CEO) jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ka long ban peit haduh katno yn lah ban pynduna ia ka jingdheng kali kaba jur ha shilynter jong ka surok GS Road.Da ka jingbitar ki nongñiah kali saw Maxi Cab ki la tur sha ka ophis treikam jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) ban dawa jingpynshai halor kane ka jingkhang ia ki ban kamai sha ka thaiñ Police Bazar ter ter shaduh Motphran.Kine ki nongñiah kali Maxi Cab, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah jur halor ka rai ba la pynmih da ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) kaba pynlong ia ki paidbah ban ym kiew shuh ha kine ki kali na ka daw ba ki hap ban pynhiar noh tang shiteng lynti kata hakhmat ka Ophis jong ka Deputy Commissioner.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki katto katne ki nongñiah kiba tur sha ka ophis jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) bad ki bym kwah ban pynpaw kyrteng ki la iathuh ba u CEO ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) u la pynshai ba ka jingkhang ia ki Maxi Cab ban rung sha Police Bazar ter ter shaduh Motphran ka long tang ka jingpyrshang na ka bynta hynñiew sngi bad lada jia ba kane ka jingpyrshang kam treikam ka Shillong Municipal Board kan sa pynmih pat da kawei ka hukum.Na ka liang jong ki nongñiah Maxi Cab ki la iathuh ba ia mynta kin ap ia kane ka shitaiew ba la buh por da ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB).
title: BITAR LEP KI DRAIBAR KALI SAW BA SHAH KHANG BAN KAMAI SHA PB BAD MOTPHRAN

content: : Ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la pynpaw ba ki paidbah nongthep vote jong ka Shella Constituency kin ai jingkyrshan beit ia u kyrtong uba thymmai uba ka party kan sei bujli ha ka jaka jong u MDC ba mynta ka Shella Constituency u Bah Teiñwell Dkhar hadien ba u la pynbna paidbah ba un ym iakhun shuh ia ka elekshon MDC sha ka KHADC ka ban sa long ha u snem ban sa wan.U Bah Teiñwell Dkhar u la mihkhmat kum u MDC jong ka Shella Constituency jin 25 snem kynthih sha ka iingdorbar jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council bad long ruh u Executive Member bad u Chief Executive Member ha kine ki 25 snem.U President ka UDP Bah Metbah Lyngdoh ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka lah sngi U Blei hadien ba la wai ka jingialang jong ka Central Executive Council (CEC) ula iathuh ba ka party ka don beit ia ka jingshaniah ha ki paidbah jong ka Shella Constiteuncy ba kin dang pynjop ia u kyrtong uba thymmai ba ka party kan sa pyniakhun ha ka Elekshon MDC ka ban sa long namarba u Bah Teiñwell ha ki jinglong MDC ba la 25 snem kynthih u la leh bun ki kam na ka bynta ka Constituency.
title: NAMAR KI KAM U BAH TEIÑWELL KI PAIDBAH KA SHELLA KIN KYRSHAN BEIT ÏA KA UDP: METBAH

content: Ka kynhun jong ki nongtrei ASHA ka West Khasi Hills ASHA Association kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Meghalaya ASHA Worker Union ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la mih paidbah ha sor Nongstoiñ ban pynlong ïa ka rally kaba jaijai kum ka dak ban pynpaw ïa ka jingbym hun halor ka jubab jong ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh halor ki mat jingdawa jong ki ASHA.La sdang ia ka jingiaid rally na MCH Hospital Nongstoiñ ter ter sha ïew Nongstoiñ ha kaba da ki spah ngut ki ASHA na kylleng ki shnong jong ka West Khasi Hills kynthup lang ki Garo ki la iashim bynta ha ka rally ba la pynkut ha Market Complex New Nongstoiñ da kaba bteng pat sa ka jingialang paidbah.Ka President jong ka Meghalaya ASHA Worker Union ka kong Mirajune Myrsing haba kren ha kane ka jingialang ka la ther tyngeh ia ka ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah da kaba ong ba kum ki ASHA ki sngewkthang ban iohsngew bad sngew lyngngoh ruh ia ka jingkren jong ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah kaba ong ba ki ASHA ki lah ban trei tang 2 snem katba ka National Health Mission ka ong ba lada ki ASHA kiba lah ban trei haduh 10 snem kin sa ioh ia ka Golden Hand Shake kaba 20 hajar tyngka ynda ki la shong thait.Ha kane ka jingialang ki ASHA ki la dawa ia ka sorkar bad ia ka Myntri ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ba kan sngap ia ki jingdawa jong ki hynrei lym kumta ka jingïakhih kaba khlem pud sngi kan dang iai bteng nangne shakhmat tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.
title: SDANG KA JINGÏAKHIH PAIDBAH KI ASHA HA NONGSTOIÑ, YN BTENG KA JINGÏAKHIH

content: : U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla uba peit ïa ka tnat Kam Pohïing ha ka sngi baar u la hukum ïa ka tnat Pulit ba kan leh da kaba tyngeh ïa kino kino kiba ñiah khlemakor ïa ki thuk thuk ar shaka ne ïa ki kali saw shaka.Kane ka jingkren jong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka long hadien ba kawei ka longkmie ka la duhei ïa la ka jong ka jingim hadien ka jingshah tynrah ha kawei ka thuk thuk ba la pynher stet katba ka dang pyrshang ban jam sha shiliang jong ka surok ha Mawlai Mawdatbaki.“Nga ïohi ba kine ki jingjia ba sngewsih ki jia la jan man ka sngi.  Namarkata, nga la bthah ïa u Director General of Police (DGP) bad (u la bthah) la ka long ïa ki Pulit pynïaid kali ne ïa ki bor synshar distrik ne ïa ki SP, ba kino kino kiba ñiah khlemakor ïa ki thuk thuk ar shaka ne ki saw shaka dei ban leh da kaba tyngeh,” la ong u Bah Tynsong ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Ngin ym ailad ïa ka jingñiah kali khlemakor bad ngin pyntikna ba kin ngat ha ki kyndon bad shah daiñ kuna katkum ka aiñ jong ka ri,” u la ong.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynrungkam ha ka tnat Pulit, u Bah Tynsong u la ong, “ki kam ki dang thylli bad mynta ngi dang don ha ka lynti ban shon ïa ka jingpyntip paidbah (Advertisement) namarba dang shen ka kynhun myntri ka ladep ai jingmynjur katto katne ki jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ki Rule kiba la don lypa jong ka Police Central Recruitment Board bad ngi ladep pynbeit thymmai bad shen ngin sa pynmih ïa ka jingpyntip paidbah.”Haba pynpaw ba ki Pulit kin ïai bteng ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingjyllei jong u drok, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la ong, ka kynhun ki Pulit ki la duh thiah duh dem bad ki pyrshang katba lah ban kem ïa ki nongkhaïi drok.“Ngi la pyrshang ban leh ïa kaba bha tam da kaba kem ïa ki nongkhaïi drok.  Na ka bynta kito kiba la im kyrni ha u drok ngi
