tip bha bad wat ki shnong bad ki bahaing hasem ruh ki long kiba kloi ban ai jingtip hynrei ngi donkam ban leh da kaba tyngeh shwa ïa ki snar nongkhaïi.  Ngi la leh ïa kata bad ki Pulit ki la duh thiah duh dem namarba ki trei shitom,” u la ong.Halor ka jingkylli, u Bah Tynsong u la ng, “kam dei satia ba ngim ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah, kam dei satia ba ngi duna ki nongtrei hynrei lada ki paidbah, ki lap ïa kino kino kiba ishan khmat, ki dei ban pyntip sha ngi bad ngin ym pyntip satia ïa ki kyrteng jong ki, shu pyntip ïa ngi ïa kino kino kiba ishankhmat, nangta ki Pulit kin sa leh la ka jong ka kamram.”
title: BTHAH U DY. CM ÏA KI PULIT BAN LEH TYNGEH ÏA KIBA ÑIAH KALI BAD AR SHAKA THURMUR

content: Ka Summersalt kaba long kawei na ki kynhun rwai bapawkhmat ha kane ka jylla ha ka sngi baar ka la pynmih paidbah ia ka jingrwai ha ka ktien Phareng ia kaba la ai kyrteng ‘Survive’, kawei na ki jingrwai kiba don ha ka thup jingrwai baar jong ka kynhun.Haduh mynta, ka Summersalt ka la lah ban pynmih haduh saw tylli ki jingrwai na kane ka thup.Ka jingpynmih ia ka jingrwai ‘Survive’, kan sei na ki trop jong ka kynhun ia ki jingphylla ki ban don ha ki 11 tylli ki jingrwai kiba mynta ki nang mih kawei hadien kawei pat. Kane ka jingrwai ka pynkynmaw ruh ia ka jingim jong uwei u paradkhot jong ka Summersalt uba la khladnoh ha u snem 2020.Ha ka rukom thoh jingrwai jong kane ka kynhun, ka ju tip balei ba ka thoh ia ki jingrwai bad na ka bynta jongno, hynrei ka jingshna ia ka jingrwai ‘Survive’ ka dei kaba maian bha, namar ym shym la tip thikna ka mut aiu, tad haduh ba u lyoh dum u la wan kah ia ka kynhun, da ka jingkhlad noh uwei na ki dkhot, u Bah Baiaineh C. Shangpliang, uba ju khot ieit ‘Nah’.Ka jingrwai hi, ka pynshlur ia ki nongsngap bad khamtam kito kiba im ka jingim jong ka jingkhuslai ban iakhun bad pyrshang ban im ka jingim kaba khiah krat. Ha ka jingiaid lynti ka jingim ki bun ki diengpyngkiang, hynrei ka jingrwai ka bsut ia ka mynsiem shynrang kaba pynlah ia u briew ban tur sha pyrshah ka dak, kam pher hapdeng ki jingeh jingtynjuh kiba bun.Ka jingmut jong ka jingpynlait kawei hadien kawei ka jingrwai, ka long ban ioh kem ia ka jingsngewtynnad jong ki nongsngap, kumno ba kin ioh ban puson ia ki kyntien bad ka sur jong ki jingrwai baroh.Ka jinglong kyrpang jong ka Summersalt ka dei halor ki jingrwai jong ki, kiba don ka khubor ia ka jaitbynriew ha ki sur tynrai, da kaba iamir lang bad ki rukom tem jong ka pyrthei baroh kawei. Ka kynhun hi ka ngeit, ba ka pateng mynta ka donkam ban ia tuid lang bad ki rukom im jong ka pyrthei mynta, hynrei, da kaba bat skhem ia ki jinghikai jong ka mynnor.Ha ki pathai khubor lajong (Social Media), ka Summersalt ka la pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshang ban buh sah kynmaw ia ka lariti ka jaitbynriew bad ka jingithiang ka mariang jong ka ri lum Khasi, da kaba buh kumne “Ki ranab lum ki i im ha ka jinghap jaijai jong u slap, u lyoh ha ka burom uba ia kynduh ha shiteng suiñ bad ki lum jyrngam. Hynrei, ngim lah ban pynkut noh hangta, khlem ka rwai ka siaw bad ka bam ka dih, ban ialeh kmen ha ki jingkyrkhu Uba najrong ia ka jingim ban shngaiñ ka shnong ka thaw. Ngin pynmih ia ka jingangnud u menbarim.”Kane thup jingrwai kaba ar, kaba la ai kyrteng ‘KLIAR” kaba don khatwei tylli ki jingrwai, ka pynshisha ba ka rwai ka siaw ha ri Khasi ka dei kaba la ih bha, namarkata, donkam ban ai ia kaba bha tam ban kyntiew ia ka. Halor kane, ka Summersalt, ka la leit sha Mumbai ban pynjanai ia ka jingshna ia kane ka Album. U Bah Kit Shangpliang kum u nongialam ka kynhun u la ong, “ngi la iaid lynti mynta la 15 snem tam bad la pynsngewthuh ia ngi ba ka rwai ka siaw jong ka ri lum Khasi jong ngi, ka la ih bha haduh ba la i donkam ban pynioh ia ka kor kaba bha tam ha ka pyrthei bad iarap ban pynjanai ia kane ka nongmuna, tad haduh ba ngi la rekod ia kine ki jingrwai ha Yaj Raj Films Studios, kawei na ki studio kiba biang tam ha pyrthei.”Ka jingduh noh ia uwei na ki kaitor jong ka kynhun ha ka 11 tarik u Jymmang 2020, uba long u nongtem ia ka kitar rben ksai, u paralok bad u shipara, u Bah Baiaineh C. Shangpliang (Bah Nah) ka la long kaba pait dohnud bad ka la don noh ka jaka ba suda. Ki bnai ki la nang iaid bad ka kam ka ba dei ban iaid shakhmat ka la nang tyllun kham suki, hynrei, ka jingdwai jong kiba bun kaba la iarap ia ka kynhun ban iaid sha pyrshah ka dak.Ka sur jong ka kitar rben ksai ha ka thup jingrwai ka dei kaba u Bah Nah u la tem janai bha.“Haduh mynta mynne, ngi da sngewbynnud haduh katta katta bad ngi ju kynmaw ia ka dur jong u man ba ngi tem ha ki rynsan bapher bapher. Ngi tip ruh ba ka put ka tem jong ka kynhun, ka urlong kumne dei na ka jingnoh synniang jong u Bah Nah. Mynta ngi tip ba ka put ka tem ka Summersalt kaba phalang ia ka put ka tem u Khasi ha kane ka spah snem, ka dei ruh ka jingnoh synñiang jong u hynmen bad u para nongtem jong ngi”, ong u Bah Greg Nongrum.
title: ‘SURVIVE’, KA JINGRWAI BASAW BA LA PYNMIH DA KA SUMMERSALT NA KA THUP JINGRWAI BAAR

content: Ka jingialehkai hapdeng ka Shillong Lajong bad ka Sreenidi Deccan ka la kut noh da ka jingiakhaid kaba mar 2-2 kol ha ka lympung ialehkai I-League kaba la long ha ka sngi baar ha madan SSA Stadium, Shillong.Ka jingiakhun ka long kaba itynnat na baroh ar liang hadien ba ka Sreenidi ka la pynkhih ia ka jar tang hapoh 10 minit ba la sdang ka jingiakhun lyngba u Rosenberg Gabriel uba la ioh thep ia ka kol ha ka minit kaba 7 hynrei ka Shillong Lajong ka la pynlehnohei ia ki kabu ba la ioh naduh kaba sdang bad dei tad ha ka minit kaba 24 u Ronney Willson Kharbudon u la pyniakhaid ia kane ka shi kol da ka jingiarap jong u Sangti Janai Shianglong .Hadien ba la pyniakhaid ia ka jingiakhun, ka Lajong ka la nang ioh bor bad dei ha ka minit kaba 34 lyngba u nongialehkai ba shakhmat na ka ri Japan u Takuto Miki ka la lah ban tam ia ka jingiakhun da 2-1 kol.Ha ka jingiakhun ha ka kylla miet ka Lajong ka la pyrshang ban pynsuki ia ka jingialehkai hynrei ki rangialehkai jong ka Sreenidi ki la pyrshang borbah ban pynpra ia ka Defend Line jong ka Lajong ban ioh pyniakhaid ha ka minit kaba 63 lyngba u Rosenberg Gabriel uba la ioh thep ar tylli ki kol ha kane ka jingiakhun.Ka dei ka jingialehkai kaba itynnat bha bad kaba la pynshongshit haduh katta katta ia ki nongkyrshan kiba sakhi ia kane ka jingiakhun kaba la kut noh da ka jingiakhaid kaba mar 2-2 kol tad haduh ba ka khyllipmat ba khatduh ba u Referee un pynkut ia ka jingialekai.Ki jingiakhun jong ka Shillong Lajong kiba la shu kut noh ha ki jingiakhaid ha ki lai tylli ki jingialehkai ka la ioh khur mynta 3 poiñ bad mynta kan hap ban pynkhreh ban mih madan sa ha ka jingiakhun ka ban sa long pyrshah ia ka Gokulam Kerala FC na ka jylla Kerala ha ka 19 tarik, Naiwieng, ha ka por 2 baje nohphai sngi ha madan SSA Stadium, Shillong.
title: I-LEAGUE: PYNÏAKHAID KA SREENIDI DECCAN HA KA JINGÏAKHUN PYRSHAH ÏA KA SHILLONG LAJONG

content: Ki trai karkhana ot dieng Sawmill hapoh Hima Jirang, Ri Bhoi District  ki la pynpaw ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingkhot jong ki kynhun Sengbhalang hapoh Hima Jirang ban ïakynduh ïa ki bar jylla ha Jirang ha ka sngi saitjaiñ khlem ka jingtip jong ki trai jaka.U Bah S. Mawiong uwei na ki trai jaka uba buh kor otdieng ha Paham Jirang ula ong, ba kane ka jingleh jong ki kynhun sengbhalang ha Jirang ka dei ka jingñiew beiñ ïa ki trai shnong ban khot ïakren ïa ki bar jylla kiba long tang ki nongpynïaid ïa ki kor otdieng ha Jirang.“Ha ka jingshisha kum ki kynhun sengbhalang kiba trei ïa ka bha ka miat ki dei ban ïakren shwa bad ki trai kiba dei ki Khasi hynrei kaba lyngngoh ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ (jong ka taïew baladep) ki la khot pynban ïa ki bar jylla,” u la ong.U la pynpaw kane ka long kumba ailad shuh shuh ïa ki bar jylla ban trei katba ki mon ïa ki kam khaïi pateng hapoh ka Hima Jirang. Namarba ym dei tang ki kor ot dieng hynrei bun ki bar jylla kiba trei ïa kiwei kiwei ki jait kam hapoh ka Hima Jirang.“Mynshwa ki kynhun sengbhalang ki pyrshah jur ïa ki bar jylla ban trei ne pynïaid ïa ki kor otdieng bad ki kwah ïa ki trai shnong ban pynïaid hi hynrei mynta ki la kylla jutang bad khot ïakren tang bad ki bar jylla ban ïakynduh ban pynbeit bad ym lah ban tip kaei kaba don ha lyndet jong ka jingïakynduh sopsop jong ki,” la kynthoh u Bah Mawiong.U la pyrshah jur ïa kane ka jingleh ki sengbhalang hapoh ka Hima Jirang ba kim ithuh ïa ki trai shnong ba pynïaid ïa ki Sawmill.  “Kaba nga sngewsih palat ïa ka shithi ba la phah da ki sengbhalang halor ka jingïalang la wan ai da u bar jylla ïa nga u trai jaka bad nga la kyntait ïa ka jingpyntip namarba katkum ka rukom ki dei ban ai ïa nga u trai jaka,” u la ong.La ïathuh hapoh Jirang ki don kumba 20 tylli ki kor ot dieng hynrei ki trai kiba dei ki Khasi kim shym la poi sha ka jingïalang ha ka sngi saitjaiñ bad ym lah ban tip kaei ka jingthmu ba don shalyndet ban ïakynduh ïa ki bar jylla na ka jylla Assam hynrei la suba ka lah ban dei halor ka jingïarap pisa namarba manla ka por ki ju dawa pisa na ki Sawmill.Lah ban pynpaw ba bun ki kor ot dieng ha Jirang ki dei kiba pynïaid da ki bar jylla katba ki Khasi ki dei kiba shah kyrteng ha ki kam khaïi bad ki kam baroh la pynïaid hi da ki bar jylla bad kane ka lah ban dei kaba pynlong ïa ki sengbhalang ban kynduh ïa ki bar jylla ha katei ka sngi.
title: SHAH KYNNOH KI SENGBHALANG BA KHOT ÏAKREN SOPSOP ÏA KI BAR JYLLA BA PYNÏAID KARKHANA OT DIENG

content: Kawei ka nongtrei Accredited Social Health Activist (ASHA) na Kyrdem Public Health Centre (PHC) ka ïoh jingsiew haduh T. 82,000 hajar namar ka jingtrei shitom bad ïoh ïa ka jingsiew kum ka Honorarium ha ki hynriew bnai ba la leit noh.Ïa kane la pyntip da ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Balang haba kdew na ka Official Data ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingsiew ba la ai sha ki nongtrei ASHA ha ki 7,000 hajar tylli ki shnong kiba don ha kylleng ka jylla Meghalaya.Katkum ka Official Data, bun na ki nongtrei ASHA ki ïoh ïa ka jingsiew na kaba ki trei kaba long T. 23,000 hajar haduh T. 82,000 ha ki hynriew bnai kata naduh ka 1 tarik, Ïaiong haduh ka 30 tarik, Nailur, 2023 da kaba kdew na ka tarik ba la siew lyngba ka Bank Account.“Nga la peit bniah ïa ka jingsiew na kine ki rusit ba la siew sha ki ASHA ki ïoh ha ki block bapher bapher.  Nga sngew kyndit ban ïohi ba kine ki nongtrei monsngewbha ki ïoh ïa ka jingsiew kaba heh,” la ong ka Dr. Ampareen haba ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang bad ki Ophisar jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah.Haba pynpaw ba ka jingïateh bad ki ASHA naduh ka sngi nyngkong ka long kaba shai ba ka dei tang ka kam trei monsngewbha, ka la ong ba kam shym la don kano kano ka jingkular ban siew tukop ne ka jingkular palat ïa kata lada ki ASHA ki trei.Ki nongtrei ASHA kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Meghalaya ASHA Workers’ Union (MAWU) ki la pynlong da ka jingïakhih kaba khlem pud sngi naduh ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai, kum ka dak ban pyrshah ïa ka jingleh mynthi ka Sorkar ïa ka jingdawa jong ki kaba kynthup ïa ka jingkyntiew ïa ka jingsiew na ka T. 2,000 sha ka T.5,000.Ka Dr. Ampareen ka la ong ba ka don ruh ka jngsngewthuh bakla ba ka Sorkar kam shym la leh eiei na ka bynta ki  ASHA bad ong, “ka kamram jong nga ka long ban pyntip sha ki paidbah ba kata kam long kaba shisha.  Balei ngin leh kumta?Ka la iathuh ba ka Sorkar ha u snem 2021-2022 ka la pynlut T. 91.2 klur na ka bynta ka jingsiew kaba manla u bnai ïa ki ASHANa kane, ka Sorkar ka la siew T. 16.32 klur na ka bynta ka Fixed Monthly Incentive jong ki ASHA bad la siew dep ruh ïa ka Backlog kaba T. 53 klur nalor ka T. 21.96 klur ïa kaba la siew hapoh ka NHM.“Ha ki snem 2022-23, ka Backlog kam don eiei. Ngi dang tohkit ïa ka T. 16.98 klur ba la siew T.2000 sha ki ASHA bad ka jingsiew lyngba ka NHM ngi la pynlut T. 22.68 klur na ka bynta ki ASHA. Ka pisa baroh ka long T. Rs 40.5 klur,” ka la bynrap.Da kaba kyrpad ïa ki nongtrei ASHA ba kin sangeh noh ïa ka jingïakhih bad ban wan sha ka miej jingïakren, ka Myntri ka la ong, “ban dawa ïa ka hok jong phi da kaba iehnoh ïa ka kamram ba phi trei ka dei ka bym lah satia ban pdiang.  Ngi kwah ïa ka jingïatreilang jong phi. Ngi sngewnguh shikatdei eh ïa u synñiang ba la phi la trei.”“Lada phi kwah ban ïakren, ka jingkhang ka plie. Ïa nga la phah sha kane ka ophis da ki paidbah.  Nga dei ka jong ki paidbah bad ngan ïakynduh ïa phi bad wat wan da ka jingkhmihlynti ïa kaba ngam lah ban leh na ka bor jong nga.”Ka Myntri ka la ai khublei ruh ïa ki ASHA kiba dang bteng ban trei ïa la ka kam wat hapdeng ka jingïakhih. “Namarba ki la ïohi ïa ka jingma jong ka jingim jong ki briew ha ki shnong ba ki trei, ki dang ïai bteng hi ban pyndep ïa la kamram,” ka la ong.
title: KA ASHA NA KYRDEM PHC KA ÏOH JINGSIEW 82 HAJAR HA KI 6 BNAI NAMARBA KA TREI SHITOM

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla shen kan sa lum da ka jingïalang ïa ki kynhun bapher bapher hadien ba ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la pynphai kylla ïa ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security Amemdment Bill 2020 da kaba phah lang ruh bad katto katne ki jingkynthoh.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingïakynduh ïa u Bah Prestone Tynsong uba long u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla uba peit ïa ka tnat Kam Pohing, u President ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la ong, “u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka Ministry of Home Affairs, ka don ïa ka bhah kaba ïadei kumno ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan pyntreikam ïa ki kyndon ban buh ïa ki khyrdop ki ban pyrkhing ïa ki briew kiba wan na shabar ka jylla.”“U (Bah Prestone) la pyntip ïa ngi ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka kam, ka Sorkar ha ki sngi ban sa wan kan sa khot da ka jingïalang ïa ki kynhun bapher bapher, ïa ki seng saiñpyrthei, ki nongsynshar shnong ban ïakren halor ka shithi ba la ïoh na ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) bad ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti kumno ka Sorkar kan jubab ïa ka shithi lane kaei kaba ka Sorkar Jylla ka hap ban leh khnang ban pynthikna ba kane ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security Amemdment Bill 2020 yn lah ban pyntreikam bad ban ïoh ïa ka jingmynjur na u Lat jong ka Jylla,” la ong u Bah Synrem.U la ïathuh ba ka Seng ka la pan ïa ka shithi ba la phah da ka MHA khnang ba ka Seng kan ïoh ban peitbniah ïa ki jinglap kiba ka Ministry ka la ai khnang ba ka seng kan dup lah ban ai jingmut sha ka Sorkar Jylla bad kaei kaba ka Sorkar Jylla kan leh na ka bynta kaba bha tam bad ba yn dup lah ban pyntreikam ïa ka Bill.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka Seng ka la pan jingpynshai na u Symbud Myntri Rangbah halor ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) kaba dang sahkut ha ka almari jong ka Sorkar India mynta la lai snem eiei.“Halor ka ILP, hadien ba ka Ïingdorbar Thawaiñ  ka la mynjur ïa ka Resolution ha u snem 2019, ka Sorkar ka la phah sha ka Sorkar Pdeng ban dawa ba dei ban pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) bad ngi la kylli ruh kaei kaba la jia ïa ka ILP.Shwa ka elekshon sha ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ngi la kylli ruh ïa u Symbud Myntri Rangbah bad u la kular ba u Myntri Rangbah bad ka Kynhun Myntri kin sa leit ban ïakynduh ïa u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing u Amit Shah bad ïa u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi,” u la ong bad bynrap, “u (Bah Prestone) la pyntip ba u Myntri Rangbah bad ka Kynhun Myntri ki la ïakynduh ïa u Narendra Modi bad ha kaba ïadei bad ka ILP haduh mynta ka Sorkar India kam pat ai ïa ka jubab kaba shai la kan pyntreikam ne em.”“Ka seng ka la banjur ïa u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba ka kamram jong ka Sorkar Jylla bad ka Ïingdorbar Thawaiñ lane ki 60 ngut ki MLA kam dei ban shu kut tang haba mynjur ïa ka Resolution hynrei ngi kwah ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan ïalam nakhmat ban pynsngewthuh ïa ka Sorkar India ba kum ka jylla kaba dei ka jylla ritpaid balei ngi donkam ïa ka ILP.  U Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba jingleit tied ïa ka jingkhang jong ka Sorkar Pdeng kam pat kut bad ka Sorkar jylla kan dang ïaleh ban pynkynmaw ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng halor ka ILP,” la ïathuh u Bah Synrem.Haba kylli, u la ong, “ka MRSSA 2016 kam don ïa ki bniat kiba lah ban tehlakam ïa ka jingrung kyrthep jong ki briew kiba nabar bad kaei kaba ngi ïohi ka long ba kane ka aiñ ka shu long tang ban buh jingkheiñ ïa ki nongshong wai hynrei kam dei ka register ka ban buh jingkheiñ ïa kiba wan na shabar.”“Namarba ha ka MRSSA 2016 ym dei tang ïa ki briew kiba nabar ki ban shah buh jingkheiñ hynrei wat ki briew jong ngi ruh kiba wan na kiwei ki shnong kiba sahwai khamtam ha nongbah Shillong kin hap ai kyrteng.  Ngi shim ba kane ka aiñ kan ym pyrkhing eiei ïa ka jingrung kyrthep jong ki briew kiba wan nabar bad ngi kwah ba ka MRSS Amendment Bill 2020 kumba ngi la pynpaw ïa kata ha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka lynti ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan pynthikna ba ka Amendment Bill 2020 ka dei ban treikam.”Shuh shuh u la pyntip ba ka jingkynthoh jong ka MHA ka long ba ka aiñ jong ka Sorkar jylla kam dei ban ïatakhuh bad ka aiñ jong ka Sorkar Pdeng.
title: SHEN YN LUM KA SORKAR ÏA KI KYNHUN BA PAN JINGPYNSHAI KA MHA ÏA KA KHYRDOP TALASI MYNDER

content: U Myntri ka tnat Border Area Development u Rakkam A. Sangma ha ka sngi baar u la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan pdiang ïa ka jingtyrwa ban pynïasoh da ka lynti Rel ïa ka shnong Baghmara kaba don ha South Garo Hills bad ïa ka nongbah Guwahati, Assam.U Rakkam uba long ruh u MLA jong ka National Peoples Party (NPP) na Rongara-Siju, u la ong ba ka Meghalaya Land Transfer Act bad ki kyndon jong ka Khyrnit Bahynriew jong ka riti Synshar ka ri India ki dei ki ar tylli ki stieh ïada ïa ki nongshong shnong riewlum jong kane ka jylla Meghalaya haba kynthoh ïa ka jingpyrshah jong ki katto katne ki kynhun ïa ka jingthmu ban pynpoi ïa ka lynti Rel sha rilum Jaiñtia da kaba aidaw ba kan pynjur ïa ka jingwan rung kyrthep jong ki mynder ri bad ki briew kiba nabar jong ka jylla.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Rakkam u la ong ba kane ka jingtyrwa ban pynïasoh ïa ka lynti Rel sha Baghmara ka dei kaba la slem bha naduh ka por ba u Captain Williamson Sangma u la long u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla.“Nga ruh nga dang dawa ban pynurlong ïa kane namarba ka Baghmara ka lah ban long ka lynti ïaid na ka bynta ka Meghalaya bad na ka bynta ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ïa kaba yn pynïasoh lyngba ka nongbah Dhaka, Bangladesh.  Ka khaii ka pateng bad ka jingpynkha ïa ki lad ïohkam kin kiew bad bun na ki samla bad ka khih ka kamai kan kiew,” u la ong bad bynrap, “namarkata, nga sngew dei ban dawa ïa ka Sorkar India bad ngan sa ïakynduh ruh ïa u Myntri Rangbah kum u MLA ban dawa ïa ka lynti rel kaba pynïasoh sha Guwahati sha Baghmara,” ula ong.Katkum ka jingong jong u, ka la don ka jingdawa ban buh ïa ka Integrated Check Gate ha Baghmara khnang ba ki nongjngohkai pyrthei bad ki nongkhaii kin dup lah ban wan namarba lada wan ka Rel, ka ïoh ka kot jong ki briew kan kiew artet.Haba kylli, hato un kyrpad neem ïa ka Sorkar ba kan ai noh ïa ka projek lynti Rel ba la tyrwa ïa ka Shillong bad Byrnihat sha ka Baghmara, u Rakkam u la ong, “lada long, ngan sa kyrpad ïa ka tnat Railway, ïa ka Sorkar India, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban pynïasoh ïa ka Baghmara bad ka lynti rel na Guwahati.”U la ai nuksa ruh da kaba ong, “manla u snem bun tylli ki Graduation bad ki Convocation kiba nga la leit kum u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ha kaba  18,000 hajar haduh 20,000 hajar ngut ki graduates bad ki Post-graduates ki don manla u snem.  Na ki 20,000 ha ka shi snem tang 1,500 – 2000 ngut kiba ïoh kam sorkar katba kiwei pat ki 18,000 ngut ki shu shong khlem kam khlem jam.”Halor ka jingpyrshah ban wanrah ïa ka lynti rel ha rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia, u Myntri u la ong, “haoid, ki don bun ki jingeh bad ngi hap ban peit kino ki jingmyntoi bad ki jingduh jingmyntoi. Lada wan ka lynti Rel sha Shillong ne East Khasi Hills ka lah ban don ka jingduh jingmyntoi bad ka jingmyntoi ruh kan don namarba kan pynsuk ïa ka leit ka wan bad kan plie ruh ïa ki lad ïohkam. Ki paidbah na rilum Garo ki leit thied jaiñ na Dimpur namarba ka dor ka long kaba tad. Namar kata, nga kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin shim rai ynda ki la pynshong nia ïa ki jingmyntoi bad ki jingduh jingmyntoi.U la ong ruh ba ki paidbah ki dei ban ailad ban pynpoi ïa ka rel tang lada ki don ki aiñ bapyrkhing.
title: PAN U RAKKAM SANGMA DA KA LYNTI REL BAN PYNÏASOH ÏA KA BAGHMARA-GUWAHATI

content: Ka District Magistrate jong ka East Khasi Hills District ka Kong Rosetta Mary Kurbah ha ka 13 tarik u Naiwieng, 2023 ka la pyntreikam ia ka iktiar ba la pynkupbor hapoh ka Section 144 Criminal Procedure Code ka la mana ban pyndonkam ia ki Horn kiba pynmih ia ka jingsawa kaba jam shaba palat, ban die paidbah ia ki tiar jingrwai kiba khlem lah ban tehlakam ia ka jingpynsawa, ban pynpah Horn ha ki jaka ba la pynbna kum ki Silence Zones (kata ym duna ia ka 100 mitar na ka jingdon jong ki Hospital, ki jaka pule, ki iingkashari, ki jaka mane Blei), ban pynpah horn ha ka por mynmiet hapdeng ka por 11 baje mynmiet haduh 6 baje mynstep ha ki jaka sah briew hynrei lait noh haba don kino kino ki khep ba kyrkieh, ban pynpah ia ki Air Horn da ki kali kit ñiut hapoh ka Section 179 (1), 190 (2) bad 194F jong ka Motor Vehicle (Amendment) Act, 2019.Katkum kane ka hukum, ka District Magistrate ka la bthah ia ki dukan bad ia ki Workshop kiba die ia ki Duplicate ne ki Replica Exhaust Pipes kim dei shuh ban dang die nangne shakhmat hynrei lym kumta kin ngat ha ka jingshah daiñ kuna hapoh ka Motor Vehicles Act bad kiwei kiwei de ki ain.Ka District Magistrate ka la mana ruh ba ki paidbah kiba pynkhein ia kane ka hukum kin shah pynsajia hapoh ka Section 188 jong ka Indian Penal Code. Shuh shuh ka District Magistrate ka la pyntip ba ka jingpyntreikam ia kane ka hukum ka long hadien ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya lyngba ka Transport Department ka la pynmih ia ka jingpyntip ha ka 4 tarik, Nailar 2023 kaba khang ban pyndonkam ia ki Horn kiba pah huleng, kaba pyndait ia ki silencer kiba sawa bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar kali palat ia kaba la ai jingbit hapoh ka Rule 119 (2) bad Rule 120 (2) jong ka Central Motor Vehicles Rules 1989 bad ka Section 52 jong ka Central Motor Vehicles (CMV) Act khnang ban tehlakam da ka ain bad ban pynduna ia ka jingpynpah Horn jong ki kali bad ki thuk thuk kiba ktah ia ka koit ka khia jong ki birew bad ki paidbah nongshong shnong.Namarba kane ka kam ka long kaba kyrkieh, ka District Magistrate ka la pyntip ruh ba kane ka hukum kan treikam noh mardor tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.
title: SHAH KHANG KI DUKAN BAN DIE ÏA KI SILENCER BA PYNMIH JINGSAWA

content: Ki Pulit ka East Jaiñtia Hills District kiba la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ha ka miet 12.30 baje shiteng synnia jong ka sngi balang ba u don uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Manoj Muksor uba wan na ka thaiñ Silchar ban rung sha Khliehriat, ïa uba la suba jur ba u kit lang bad ki tiar kiba long beaiñ, ki Pulit ki la pynlong ka jingpynap shrip ha Lumshnong bad talasi ïa ki kali kiba wan na kane ka thaiñ.Ha ka talasi ïa ki kali, ki Pulit ki la ïoh bat ïa kawei ka taksi kamai kaba don ïa u nombar ML-11 3594 bad ki don ar ngut ki briew kiba shong hapoh kane ka kali ba kynthup u nongñiah.Ki Pulit ki la pynlong ka jingkhynra ïa ki tiar ki tar jong kine ki ar ngut, kata jong u Manoj Muksor bad u Vicky Dkhar bad na ka pla jong u Manoj Muksor la lap bad kurup 2 tylli ki synduk sabon kiba don îa u powder rong saw byrtem uba don ka jingkhia kaba 21 grams bad na ka pla jong u Vicky Dkhar ki Pulit ki la lap bad kurup 34 tylli ki tynrong barit ba la thep ïa powder ba rongsaw byrtem uba don ïa ka jingkhia kaba 1.03 gram.Hadien ka jingleh test ïa u powder la lap bad pynshisha ba u dei u drok Heroin bad baroh kine powder kiba dei ki drok heroin kiba shongdor kumba T. 18 lak eiei.Ki Pulit ki la lem noh ïa kine ki arngut ki basah ha ka shnong Mihmyntdu, West Jaiñtia Hills District bad ka jingtohkit ïa ki ka dang ïaid shakhmat.
title: SHAH KEM ARNGUT KI SNAR KHAÏI HA KI PULIT EJH BA KIT ÏA U DROK BA SHONGDOR 18 LAK

content: : Ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) jong ka NEHUTA, NEHUNSA bad NEHUSU ha ka sngi Palei ka la rai ban pynsangeh shwa shipor ïa ka jingïakhih kaba khlem pud sngi hadien ba u Vice Chancellor ka NEHU u Prof. P.S Shukla u la pan por san sngi ban bishar shwa ïa ki jingdawa bad kynthup ka jingdawa ban weng kam ïa u Technical Advisor/Senior Consultant.Hadien ka jingïalang, u Chairman jong ka JAC u Prof Lakhon Kma u la ong, “ngi la rai ban pynsangeh shwa shipor ïa ka jingïakhih bad naduh lashai ki klas kin long biang kumba ju long, ki nonghikai kin sa leit phai biang sha ki kamra klas bad ki nongtrei kin sa leit phai biang sha ki ophis treikam.”U la ïathuh ba la shim ïa kane ka rai hadien ba u Vice Chancellor u la kyrpad da kaba pan por san sngi ban bishar ïa ki  jingdawa ba la buh da ka JAC kaba kynthup ruh ïa ka jingdawa ban wengkam ïa u Rohit Prasad uba trei kum u Technical Adviser/Senior Consultant jong kane ka skulbah.Ka jingïalang ka la long kaba jop watla u Vice Chancellor um shym la pyni ïa ka shithi ba la wengkam ïa u Prasad.U Prof Kma u la pyntip ruh ba u VC u la mynjur ban thaw ïa ka komiti ka ban peit ïa ka mat kaba ïadei bad ka Marking System bad ka jot ka pei jong ki Hostel bad ka koit ka khiah.“U VC u la ailad ha ki samla pule ban jied ïa u Chairman u ban khlieh ïa ka komiti ka ban peit ïa ka jingdawa bad ban kham bniah ïa ka marking system jong ka skulbah,” u la ong.U la bynrap ruh ba u VC u la kular ban leh eiei halor ka jingdawa ban thung Statutory Officers bad ki University Engineers khnang ban pynduna ïa ka jingkit bakhia jong ki nonghikai bad ki nongtrei na ki kamram.Halor ka jingdawa ban khmih bniah halor ka bhah pule jong kiba dang sahdien, u Prof Kma u la ïathuh ba u VC u la mynjur ban thaw ïa ka Komiti ïa kaba yn sa shim rai da ka Academic Council halor ka jingthung Chairman bad ki dkhot.“U VC u la kular ïa ka JAC ba ka jingïalang jong ka Academic Council kan sa long ha ka taiew banyngkong jong u bnai Nohprah ha kaba ïa kine ki mat yn sa ïathir ïatai bad yn sa shim rai ruh ha kane ka jingïalang,” u la bynrap.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynrung ïa ki samla pule kum ki dkhot jong ka Academic Council (AC), u general secretary jong ka NEHUSU u samla Banpynbiang Riang u la ong ba u VC u la mynjur ban ailad ïa ki samla pule ban mihkhmat sha ka Council.“Halor ka jingdawa ban pynlong ïa ka Convocation, u VC ula pyntip ba mynta u snem ka skulbah kam shym la lah ban pynlong namarba ka dang ap ïa ka jubab na ka President jong ka ri India hadien ba kane ka skulbah ka la khot sngewbha ban ïashim bynta lang ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap 50 snem jong ka skulbah NEHU,” la bynrap u nongïalam ka NEHUSU.U la pyntip ba u VC u la kular ruh naduh u snem ban sa wan kan sa don ka jingbuh tarik na ka bynta ka skulbah ba kan pynlong ïa ka Convocation manla u snem.
title: SANGEH KA JAC ÏA KA JINGÏAKHIH BA PAN POR U VC KA NEHU BAN WENGKAM ÏA U ROHIT PRASAD

content: Ka Sorkar Assam bad Meghalaya haduh mynta kim pat aiti satia ïa ka jingtohkit sha ka Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) halor ka jingjia ha ka 22 tarik, Naiwieng, 2022 ha ka shnong Mukroh, West Jaiñtia Hills District.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad K. Sangma ha ka sngi Palei u la ong, ‘ban pyntreikam ïa kane ka rai, donkam ban ïaid da ka lynti kaba baroh ar tylli ki jylla ki donkam ban ïasoi ïa ka rai kaba la shim ha ka jingïalang jong ki Myntri Rangbah kaba la long ha ka 30 tarik, Nailur 2023.”“Namarkata, ka kam ka kham shimpor namar ba ki ktien, wat tang uwei u Coma u lah ban pynkylla ïa ka jingmut jong ka rai bad yn hap ban leh bha thik pa thik,” u la ong bad bynrap, “ïa kata la leh mynta.  Baroh arngut ki Myntri Rangbah kin hap ban soi ïa ka rai ba la shim ha ka jingïalang.”“Mynta ka jingïakren (ka rai ban aiti ïa ka jingtohkit sha ka CBI) sha ki commission bapher bapher bad ka Sorkar India yn sa shim rai noh shen,” la bynrap u Sangma.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka jingïalang ka la rai ban weng noh ïa ki bor pahara na ki bynta bapher bapher.“Ki don ruh kiwei ki daw ha kaba ngin sa ïohi ba ka jingweng noh ïa ki bor pahara da ka Sorkar Jylla ha ki bynta bapher bapher.  Nga kwah ban ong ngam da kwah ban batai bniah than khamtam ha ki jaka kiba kham mih ki jingïakynad, ha kaba ngin sa ïohi biang sa shisien ba ki jingïakynad kin sa hiar arsut,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh, u Sangma u la ïathuh ba u la ïai kren bad u Himanta Biswa Sarma ban shim rai halor ka jingleit sorjamin ïa ka Block I bad ka thaiñ Khanduli-Psiar, hynrei ka jingpynslem ka dei na ka daw ka jingdon jong ki katto katne ki elekshon.“Ynda ki elekshon ki la kut, ngi khmihlynti ba ngin sa leit sorjamin ïa ka thaiñ Khanduli-Psiar bad ka Block I ha ka jaka ban sa pynbeit hynrei haduh mynta hi ngim pat ïapynbeit ïa ka jaka,” u la ong.Ha kawei pat ka liang, u Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ba ki Regional Committee ki la sdang ban pyndep ïa ki kaiphod sorjamin ha kaba kin sa aiti shwa ka 31 tarik, Nohprah.“Hadien ka jingïakren bad ki Committee, nangta ngin sa shim rai kumno ban ïaid shakhmat,” u la ong.
title: YM PAT AITI KA SORKAR MEGH-ASSAM ÏA KA JINGTOHKIT SHA KA CBI ÏA KA JINGJIA HA MUKROH

content: : Ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ha ka sngi Palei ka la pynbna ban pynrung da ki kot pule jong ka National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) ban sa pyntreikam da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE) na ka bynta ki khynnah skul kiba pule ïa ka Class I haduh Class-X naduh u snem 2024.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang Kynhun Myntri, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ong, “ngi la mynjur ïa ka jingtyrrwa ban pynrung ïa ki kot pule NCERT kum ka jingpynkylla thymmai ïa ki katto katne ki sobjek ïa kaba yn sa leh da ka MBOSE naduh mynta.”U la ong ba ka jingpynrung ïa ki kot pule NCERT kan long naduh ka Class-I haduh Class-X bad kane kan sdang naduh u snem pule ha u snem ban wan.U Sangma u la ong ba ki don katto katne ki skul kiba hikai da ki ktien lajong, naduh Class-1 haduh Class-V, hynrei da kane ka jingpynbeit thymmai yn sa wanrah ruh ha ka jingpynkylla ha ka ktien.“Tang shu dep ka jingpynkylla ktien, yn sa pynrung noh mardor,” u la ong.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba kane ka long kaba donkam namarba ka Sorkar ka sngewkhia ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ka pule ka dangle baroh kawei.Ïa ka rai la shim hadien ba la pynlong ïa ka jingtih bniah bad ka jingïasyllok bad ki kynhun bapher bapher halor ka pule ka dangle.“Hadien ka jingïasyllok ngi la poi sha ka rai ba ki kot pule kiba la pyndonkam ha ka MBOSE khamtam haba bishar ïa ka sobjek Science, English bad Mathematics, ki kot kim long kiba ïaryngkat kyrdan bad kiwei pat ki skul kiba shabar ka jylla bad namarkata ban pynjanai ïa ki kot pule, ngi la pdiang ïa kane,” u la ong.“Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpule ha ka Elementary, ki kot pule kiba ngi pyndonkam mynta kim long kumjuh bad namar kata ban wanrah ïa kajuh ka jingïadei ha ka pule ka puthi ha ka National Level, ngin hap ban pynkylla ïa ki kot pule bad ka jingpynkylla ïa ki kot pule kan pynduna ruh ïa ki kot pule ba la pyndonkam ha ki Class bapher bapher,” la ong u Sangma.Katkum ka jingong jong u, hapoh ka MBOSE ïa mynta na ka bynta ki Class I, II bad III, ki don haduh 11 tylli ki kot pule  hynrei ynda la pyndonkam ïa ki kot ka NCERT, ki kot pule ki don tang saw tylli.“Namarkata, kan don ka jingduna kaba khraw bha ha ka jingdon jong ki kot pule ban sa pyndonkam. Kan don ruh ka jingkiew bad ka jingpynbha ïa ki jingthoh ban sa ai sha ki khynnah skul.  Kan long kumjuh sha baroh ki khynnah skul ha ka National Level,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba la leh ïa kane khlem da klet noh ïa ki lynnong pule kiba ïadei bad ka jylla kiba ïadei bad ka kolshor, ka pakit ki mynnor jong ka jaidbynriew kim dei ban shah pynjngut noh.“Ki sobjek ba ïadei bad kine ki jingpule, ngin sa shimkhia bha ban pdiang ïa ki jingthoh jong ka NCERT bad ngin sa pynmih pat da ki kot lajong hynrei ïa ki jingthoh yn sa bud katkum ki kyndon jong ka NCERT,” u la bynrap.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka DERT bad ka MBoSE bad ki nonghikai kynthup ruh ïa ki skul bapher bapher kin hap ban ïaid lang ryngkat bad kine ki rai ba la shim.
title: NADUH 2024 RAI KA SORKAR BAN PYNTREIKAM DA KI KOT NCERT NADUH CLASS: 1-10

content: : Ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi Palei ka la rai ban thaw da ka Meghalaya Education Recruitment Board (MERB) ban pyndap ïa ki kam kiba thylli hapoh ka tnat Pule Puthi hapoh por lai bnai haduh hynriew bnai.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad Kongkal Sangma uba la kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang Kynhun Myntri u la ong, “ngi la rai ban thaw ïa ka permanent MERB.”“Ki don mynta kumba 187 tylli ki kam kiba lait ha ka tnat Pule Puthi khamtam ha ka Higher and Technical Education, wat ha ka Secondary bad Higher Secondary bad ha kiwei kiwei ki kyrdan. Ki don katto katne ki bynta ba ka kam ka shu sah thylli la palat 3-4 snem bad namarkata ngi sngewdei ba kane ka Board ka dei ban don bad ba ïa kane ka jingthungkam dei ban pyndep hapoh ki 3-6 bnai ban pyndap noh ïa kine ki kam ba thylli.”Dang shen, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la thaw ïa ka Meghalaya Medical Recruitment Board (MMRB).“Ka daw ba la thaw ïa kane ka long naba ki bun shaba palat ki kam kiba thylli bad ka MPSC kam shym la lah ban pynlong ka eksamin ha ka por kaba biang. Lada phi kynmaw, ka don ka jingthylli kumba san snem ban thungkam ïa ki doktor bad hadien ba ngi la thaw ïa ka Health Recruitment Board, ngi lah ban thungkam haduh 500 ngut ki doktor tang hapoh 3 bnai,” u la bynrap.Haba kylli, u Sangma u la ong, ba ka Education Recruitment Board kan shimkhia ban peit ïa ki jingthungkam kiba ïadei bad ka tnat Pule Puthi.“Namarkata, tang shu pyndep ïa kane ka jingthungkam ha ka wat banyngkong ïa ki nonghikai kaba dang ïaid shakhmat, ïa kane ruh yn sa wnarah hapoh ka Recruitment Board jong ka tnat Pule Puthi khnang ba kan don tang kawei ka Education Recruitment Board bad ïa ki kyndon thungkam na ka bynta ka jingthung ïa ki kam kiba lait yn sa bteng namarba ïa mynta ïa ki nonghikai skul la leh da ki Division Level bad kito ki jingtreikam kin ym kylla hynrei ka Management jong ka thungkam kan hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka Education Board,” u la bynrap.
title: THAW KA SORKAR DA KA MERB BAN THUNGKAM 187 TYLLI HA KA TNAT PULE PUTHI

content: Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka dang bishar na baroh ki liang halor ka jingdawa ban pynlong ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo kum ki Official Languages jong ka jylla Meghalaya.“Ngi hap ban bishar na baroh ki liang bad ngin sa shim ïa ka rai,” la ong u Sangma ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Ha ki por mynshwa kine kijuh ki ishu ban pynbna kum ka Official Language ka shong ha rukom batai kaei ka jingmut jong ka kyntien Official Language.  Namarkata, ïa kine ki bynta baroh yn dang hap ban bishar,” u la ong.Da kaba pynpaw ba ki don ki jingeh, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “lashai, lada ka jingthoh ha ka dulir sorkar yn thoh ha ka ktien Garo kata kan pynmih ïa ka jingeh ne kan ym pynmih jingeh, kumno ngin leh ïa kata.”“Lada mano mano ki thoh ha ka ktien Garo ki briew kiba kren Khasi bad Phareng kin ym lah satia ban sngewthuh ne ban ai ki jingkynthoh bad ngin sa ïakynduh jingeh wat ha ka jingpynïaid ïa ka synshar ka khadar.  Lada kita ki bynta yn hap ban kynthup, lada la long ïa ka Official Language kumno ngin ïaid shakhmat ban weng ïa kine ki jingeh lane lada ngi weng ïa kata, bad ka dulir sorkar bad ki jingthoh ha ki bui kim dei ban long ha ka ktien Khasi ne Garo, hato kata kan dang don jingmut ïa ka kyntien Official.”“Ngi la peit ïa kine ki bynta baroh bad ngin sa lah ban rai kumno ban ïaid shakhmat bad kane namarba kum ka Sorkar bad kum u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla khlempep ngin jin da la kwah palat ban kynthup kum ka Official Language ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo hynrei kaei kata ka jingmut bad kumno ngin leh ïa ki jingeh ki ban mih bad lada ki jingthoh ki wan ha ka ktien Khasi bad Garo kumno ki ophisar ki leh ïa kata bad kaei ka ban jia ïa ka synshar ka khadar,” u la bynrap.
title: BISHAR KA SORKAR BA DAWA BAN PYNLONG OFFICIAL LANGUAGE ÏA KA KTIEN KHASI BAD GARO

content: 17: Ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ki la pynpaw katba ka Sorkar kam pat weng lut ïa ki mukotduma pyrshah ïa ki nongïalam lane katba ym pat ïasoi ïa ka soskular sangeh ïasiat, u Chairman lane u General Secretary jong ka HNLC kin ym lah satia ban ïashim bynta ha ka miej jingïakren.“Ïa mynta ka jingsdang jong ka jingïakren ka la ïaid hapoh ka jingïalam jong u  Vice Chairman barim jong ngi. Hynrei, ka Sorkar ka la ïaiban ïa ka jingïashim bynta lang jong u Chairman bad u General Secretary. Ngi la kren da kaba shai katba ka Sorkar kam pat weng lut ïa ki mukotduma pyrshah ïa ki nongïalam lane katba ym pat ïasoi ïa ka soskular sangeh ïasiat, u Chairman lane u General Secretary jong ka HNLC kin ym lah satia ban ïashim bynta ha ka miej jingïakren,” la ong u kyrwoh ba la soi da u Chairman cum C -in- C Bah Bobby Marweiñ bad u General Secretary cum Publicity Secretary ka HNLC u Bah Saiñkupar Nongtraw ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Ngi la bynshet ha u Vice Chairman ba thymmai u Bah Teimiki Laloo, ban peit ïa ka kam kumno ban pyntyllun shakhmat,” ong u kyrwoh.“Ka HNLC ka kwah ban don ka jingïakren bad ka Sorkar India na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.  Ngi ngeit skhem ba ka rai ka dei ban long na ka bynta ban pynneh ïa ka jingsuk.  Namarkata, ka rai jong ka jingïakren ïasuk kam shym la paw katkum ki kyndon ba la ïa mynjur. Lada dang pynjari ïa ki kyndon, dei ban mynjur ruh da ki arliang mamla ym ban shu hukum tang na kawei ka liang,” la ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.“Ka jingïakren ïasuk ka thmu ban wad ïa ka lynti lyngba ka jingïakren bad ka jingïatreilang.  Hynrei i kumba ka Sorkar India ka shim pynban ïa kine ki jingïakren ha ka rukom ban pyndem wait,” la kynthoh ka HNLC“Ka long kaba donkam ban tip ba bun na ki kynhun kieng atiar ha ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ki ladep wan pyndem bad ki seng jong ki, ki la shah khang.  Watla katta kim shym la ïohi ïa ka jingsuk kaba neh.  Ka jingbym bat ïa ka soskular ka la pynkha thymmai ïa ka kynhun kieng atiar, kaba la nang kham pynsniew shuh shuh ïa ka jinglong jingman.  Ha India, ïa ka NSCN la pdeng da ka jingïasoi ïa ka Shillong Accord 1975, bad ka ULFA ka la mih ha ka jingïakhih kaba jur ha Assam (1979-85) kum ka jubab ïa ka jingeh kaba la mada ki paidbah Assamese. Haba ka Assam Accord of 1985 ka la phiel ban pynurlong ïa ki jingangnud, ka ULFA ka la ïohbor bad long ka kynhun kaba khlaiñ ha ka jingïaleh pyrshah ïa ka Sorkar India. Lada ka Sorkar ka angnud shisha ïa ka jingsuk kaba neh, ki dei ban leh da kajuh ka lynti kumba ka leh ïa ka Mizo Accord 1986,” la ong shuh shuh ka HNLC.“Ngi angnud ïa ka jingsuk kaba neh kaba pynlaitluid bad ïa ka hok da kaba burom ïa ka jingsngew bad ka jingangnud jong ki paidbah Hynñiewtrep.  Ngin pyrshah tyngeh ïa kano kano ka jingpyrshang ban wanrah ïa ka jingsuk kaba tang shipor kaba lah ban buh jingma ïa ka jingdon jong ngi ha ka ri bad ïa ka hok ban ïoh ïa la ka jong synshar ka khadar.
title: KYRNGAH U CHAIRMAN BAD GS KA HNLC BAN ÏASHIM BYNTA HA KA JINGÏAKREN KATBA YM PAT WENG ÏA KI CASE

content: : Khyndiat sngi hadien ba u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la hiar ban khynra naphang ia ki dukan bar jylla ha ka thaiñ Majai, ki 44 ngut ki nongkhaïi bar jylla kiba la leit tied ia ka jingkhang jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court namar ka jingbym ioh ia ka No objection Certificate (NoC) ha ka sngi thohdieng ki la leit ban pyndem hakhmat ka KHADC.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ka 5 tarik mynta u bnai u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ryngkat bad u Executive Member Bah Joseph F. Lakadong ki la sha ka shnong Majai bad ha ka shnong Ichamati ban khynra naphang ïa ki dukan bar jylla ki bym biang ia ki kot ki sla kiba leh ia ki kam khaii pateng ha kine ki ar tylli ki shnong.Kine ki nongkhaïi bar jylla kiba la wan ban pyndem ïalade ha khmat ka KHADC ki don kumba 12 ngut eiei kiba la kynthup lang ia ki Exporter bad ki nongshong dukan.Ha ka jingiakren bad ka Batesi Tv u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la iathuh ba kine kidei ki 44 ngut ki nongkhaïi bar jylla kiba la leit ban tied ia ka jingkhang jong ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court hadien ba ki shym la ïoh satia ïa ka NoC na ka Hima Sohra na ka bynta ban pynthymmai ïa ki Licence jong ki.Napdeng kine ki 44 ngut, 20 ngut ki dei ki Exporter katba 24 ngut ki dei ki nongkhaïi kiba kham rit kiba aplai na ka bynta ban ïoh pynthymmai ia ka License jong ki, hynrei namar ka jingbym biang ki kot ki sla kim shym la ioh satia.U Bah Pyniaid u la ong ba kane ka jingwan jong ki ka long ba ki wan ban pyndem ialade hakhmat ka bor jong ka KHADC ryngkat ka jingkyrpad ia u CEM ban pynioh ia ka Trading License bad ki la aiti ruh da ka shithi ban ioh pynthymmai ia ka License ka jong ki.U la iathuh ba ka KHADC, wat lada kine ki briew ki la wan ban kyrpad ruh ka hap ban peit katkum ka aiñ ym ban shu ai khumar ia ka License.Halor ka jingthaw ia ka iew thymmai ha Khalipara da ki bar jylla ia kiba la suba ba ki dei kiba donkti ban dkhat jubor ia ka jingim jong u Bah Lurshai Hynñiewta ha ka shnong Ichamati, u Bah Pyniaid u la ong ba ki dang ap ia ka jingujor bad tang shu ioh pdiang ia ka jingujor ka District Council kan ym ailad ia ki bar jylla ba kin shu thaw ia ki iew katba ha ka jaka kaba ki mon namarba ka Ichamati ka dei kaba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka District Council.
title: PYNDEM KI BAR JYLLA HA KA KHADC KIBA MUDUI HA HIGH COURT BYM ÏOH NoC NA HIMA SOHRA

content: Ka jingther jong u slap baroh shi sngi na ka jingkylla kynsan ka suiñbneng na ka cyclone Midhili , ki bor pynïaid jong ka tamasa Cherry Blossom ki la hap ban pynsangeh lut ïa baroh ki prokram ha ka sngi sdang jong kane ka tamasa ba la pynlong ha madan Kurkalang, Bhoirymbong ha Ri Bhoi District.Kane ka tamasa kaba lai sngi ban sa pynkut ha ka sngi U Blei, la hap ban pynsangeh lut ïa baroh ki jait prokram ha kane ka sngi sdang kynthup naduh ki nongput nongtep bad ki nongrwai.Kumba la pynbeit da ki bor pynïaid, ha kane ka sngi sdang jong ka tamasa, ki kynhun nongrwai bapaw kiba thmu ban pynlynguh ha ka sngi sdang ïa kane ka tamasa ki kynthup ïa ka kynhun nongwai Sanam Sanam, Hybrid Theory, Kenny Musik, 4th Element, The Band Phantasm, DBRYN, Gwyneth, Dalariti, CYCO, Aminio, Dr Legend, bad Chevinia bad kine ki riew don sap ha ka rwai ka siaw ki la hap ban sangeh noh.Kumba la pynpaw ha ka jingpyntip paidbah da ki bor pynïaid, la ong ba ka daw ba la hap ban pynsangeh shuwa ïa kane ka tamsa bad baroh ki jaid prorkam ha kane ka sngi sdang ka tamasa ka dei ka jingbym shngaiñ na ka jingkylla kynsan ka bor mariang bad ban lait na kino kino ki jingjia ba sngewsih ïa ki nongwan shim bynta ha kane ka tamasa.Ki bor pynïaid, ki la pyntip paidbah ba kito kiba ladep ban thied tiket ban leit sakhi ha kane ka sngi sdang ka tamasa yn ailad ba kin ïashim bynta la ka dei ba ki kwah ban ïashim bynta ha ka sngi babud ne ha ka sngi ba la pynkut ïa ka tamasa kata haduh ka sngi u Blei.Ki bor pynïaid jong ka tamasa ki la pyntip ruh na ka bynta ka Season Pass Holders ba kin sa pynphai biang ïa ka pisa ba ki paidbah ki la thied kaba ïa ryngkat dor katkum ka prokram ba mynta ka sngi lyngba ka RFID Card.Halor kane ka jingpynsangeh noh ïa kane ka sngi sdang jong ka tamasa ïa baroh ki jaid prokram ym dei tang ki bor pynïaid ka tamasa Cherry Blossom kiba hap ban pyrkhat na ka bynta ka jingshngaiñ jong ki nongwan shim bynta, hynrei wat ka India Meteorological Dadpartment (IMD) ka ladep ai lypa ïa ka jingmaham ba kan don ka jingpynthud jong ki bor ka mariang kum ka eriong bad ka jingjur u lapbah kaba lah ban ktah ïa ki bynta jong ki jylla Shatei Lammihngi ka ri India.
title: THER TYNGEH U SLAP,  PYNSANGEH ÏA KA SNGI SDANG KA TAMASA CHERRY BLOSSOM

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pynpaw ba kan sa leit ïakynduh ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma ban kyrpad ba un kyntu lem ïa ki MP jong ka Jylla Assam ba kin ai jingkyrshan ïa ki lai tylli ki mat jingdawa jong ka Jylla.Ki jingdawa ki kynthup ïa ka jingpynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka riti Synshar ka Ri India, ban pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit bad ka jingpynbeit noh ïa ka jingeh ba ki paidbah ki la mad baroh shikatta ha khappud.“Ngi sa leit ban ïakynduh shwa ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma ban kyntu ïa u ba un kyntu ïa ki MP jong ka Jylla Assam ban kyrshan lem ïa ki lai tylli ki jingdawa jong ka jylla hapoh ka Parliament,” la ong u President ka HANM Bah Lamphrang Kharbani ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Ka seng ka la dawa ruh ïa ki lai ngut ki MP jong ka Jylla Meghalaya, kata ïa u MP ka Shillong u Bah Vincent H. Pala, ïa ka MP jong ka Tura ka Agatha Sangma bad ïa u MP ka Rajya Sabha u Dr. Wanwei Roy Kharlukhi ba kin shimkhia kum ki nongmihkhmat kiba la jied da u paidbah ba kin kren hapoh ka Parliament ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdawa jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka Jylla Meghalaya ban pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka Riti Synshar ka ri India, ka jingdawa ban pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit ha kane ka jylla bad ban weng ïa ka jingeh jong ki paidbah kiba shong basah ha khappud.U Bah Kharbani u la ong, “lada ka Sorkar India ka shimkhia hynrei lada ki (MP) jong ngi kim shimkhia kumno ka Parliament kan mynjur ïa kine ki jingdawa jong ka jaidbynriew. Ngi kyrpad ïa ki MP ba ki dei ban sngewthuh ïa ka dor jong ka jaidbynriew, ïa ka dor jong ka pateng ka ban sa wan da kaba rah hapoh ka Parliament.”“Ka shong ha ka jingstad jong kine ki lai ngut kumno ba kin ïasyllok bad kiwei pat ki para MP jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei,” u la ong.U la ong kumba ladep shim ïa ka rai ha Delhi ha ka jingpynlong ïa ka jingïakhih ba jaijai dang shen ha Jantar Mantar, ka seng kan ym shong thait ban ïakynduh ïa kiba bun ki MP jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi.“Ha ka jingïakhih ba la pynlong da ka seng ha Jantar Mantar, New Delhi, ngi la ïakynduh ruh ïa ki Ophisar jong ka Ministry of Home Affairs bad ki la kular ban sa peit bniah ïa ki lai tylli ki jingdawa ïa kiba ka HANM ka ladep ban pynsngew hakhmat jong ka Sorkar India,” la ong u Bah Kharbani.
title: BAN URLONG KA JINGDAWA ILP, KTIEN KHASI, YN PAN JINGKYRSHAN KA HANM NA U CM KA ASSAM

content: Ka kynhun Pulit Anti-Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) jong ka East Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la ïohkem ïa uwei u briew na kawei ka Bos ha ka shnong Mawryngkneng kaba dang wan na Silchar.Ha ka jingtalasi ïa une u briew, ki Pulit ANTF ki la ïoh ban kurup kawei ka Mobile Phone, kawei ka pla rongïong bad 17 tylli ki synduk ba la thep ïa u drok Heroin uba don ka jingkhia 235.77 gram, la ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police (City) East Khasi Hills Bah Vivek Syiem.Halor kane ka jingïoh kem jong ki Pulit ïa une u snar khaïi drok, u Conrad Kongkal Sangma uba long u Myntri Rangbah jong ka Jylla u la ai khublei bad ai jingïaroh lyngba ka rynsan Social Media ïa ki Pulit kiba la ïoh ban kurup ïa u drok uba shongdor 2 klur tyngka.“Ka jingkhublei ïa ki Pulit ka East Khasi Hills kiba la ïoh kurup ïa u drok uba shongdor kumba T.2 klur na u snar nongkhaïi drok ha Mawryngkneng mynta ka sngi.  Hapdeng ki jingtrei shitom jong ngi ban pynpaw ïa ka dur jong ki kam jngohkai pyrthei ha ka Jylla Meghalaya lyngba ka tamasa Cherry Blossom, kine ki snar nongkhaïi ki thmu ban pynhiar dor pynban ïa ka burom jong ka jylla jong ngi,” la ong u Myntri Rangbah ha rynsan X.“Nga ïaroh ïa ka jingaiti lut ki Pulit hapoh ka jingïalam jong u DGP u Dr. LR Bishnoi. Ka Sorkar jong ngi ka buh hakhmat ïa ka thong ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka jingkhaïi drok,” u la bynrap.
title: KEM KI PULIT ÏA U SNAR KHAÏI, KURUP ÏA U DROK BA SHONGDOR 2 KLUR TYNGKA

content: : Hadien ba ka la jingmih ka jingkhñium na ki nongwai dukan ha ka sngi sdang jong ka tamasa Cherry Blossom ha ka sngi Thohdieng namar ka jingbym biang kumba ki bor pynïaid ki la kular halor ki jingaiwai ïa ki dukan ne ki stall, u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la pyntikna ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan sa peit ba ki nongwai dukan ha kane ka tamasa kin ym mad ïa ka jingduhnong.Ka Rockski EMG kaba long ka nongpynïaid ïa kane ka tamasa ka la hap ban pynsangeh ïa ka sngi sdang jong ka tamasa namar ka jingther jong u lapbah uba jur kaba la wanrah ruh ïa ka jingktieh jong ka madan Kurkalang kaba don ha ka shnong Bhoirymbong, Ribhoi District.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi saitjaiñ u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong, “ngam pat ïoh ïa ka kaiphod na ka liang jong ki nongpynïaid. Ngan pynkynmaw biang ïa phi ba kane kam dei ka prokram jong ka Sorkar, hynrei ka dei kawei na ki tamasa kaba ngi la ïatreilang bad ka Rockski EMG.  U synñiang na ka Sorkar Jylla ka long shi klur tam ne duna ar klur bad ka pisa kaba sah nangta sa 7 klur eiei la pynlut hi da ka Rockski EMG.”“Ynda ngi la ïoh ïa ka kaiphod ba ka don hangno hangno ka jingbym biang, ka jingduna, ngin pynthikna ba kan ym don ka jingdunong ïa ki nongwai dukan (ha kane ka tamasa),” la bynrap u Bah Paul.U la ong ruh ba ka tamasa kan ïaid beit mynta bad lashai bad ki duhalia kiba la pynbeit ban pynlynguh ha kane ka tamasa ki bym shym la ïohlad ban kiew rynsan ha ka sngi sdang jong ka tamasa, yn sa ailad ba kin kiew rynsan mynta ka sngi bad kin don ruh ki ban sa kiew rynsan lashai ha ka sngi pynkut jong ka tamasa.“Namarba la kham bun ki nongïashim bynta, ki bynta jong ka tamasa ruh kin kham bun, khnang ba kan ym don ka jingïatynruh bad kan ktah patde ïa ka rukom rung bad ka rukom mih jong ki paidbah,” la ong u Bah Paul.
title: KA SORKAR KAN SA PYNTHIKNA BAN YM DUHNONG KI nongwai DUKAN HA KA TAMASA CHERRY BLOSSOM

content: : U MLA jong ka United Democratic Party (UPD) na West Shillong Constituency Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba long ruh u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla bad kajuh ka por kum u MDC jong ka Jaïaw Constituency ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la kren da kaba shai ba um don jingmut satia ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong Parliamentary Seat, ka ban sa long ha u snem ban wan.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la pynpaw ba ki briew kiba don ïa ka jingthmu ban ïakhun ïa ka election Lok Sabha na ka tiket jong ka UDP ki dei ban wan shakhmat ban pynsngew bad ban bud ryntih ïa ki jingbthah jong ka party.“Kam dei eh shaphang ka jingkwah jong nga ne ka jingkwah jong kiwei kiwei hynrei ka dei tang ka jinglum jingtip jong ka party.  Kaba ngi lah ban leh ka long ban bud ïa ki kyndon treikam ba kino kino kiba don jingmut (ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon Lok Sabha) ki lah ban wan shakhmat ban ai ïa ka aplikeshon jong ki,” la ong u Bah Paul.“Na ka liang jong nga hi shimet hadien ba nga la shimti kum u MLA bad kum u Myntri Sorkar bad ha kajuh ka por kum u MDC kine ki dei ki lai tylli ki kam kiba khia bha bad ngan ym don jingmut ban leit shakhmat. Ki dang don shuh shuh ki riewrangbah kiba la pynpaw ïa ka jingangnud ba kin mih shakhmat bad nga shim ïa kata bad nga ngeit ha ka jingïatreilang ngi donkam sa kiwei de ki ban mih lang shakhmat ban pynkhlaiñ lang ïa ka jingsynshar bad ka jingtreikam jong ka party hapoh Jylla bad ha District Council,” la pynshai u Bah Paul.Haba kylli, u la ong, “kam dei ba nga kynran dien ne tur shakhmat namar nga khlem don hi ruh ha ka madan.  Nga sngew ba kaba bha eh ïa ngi ka long ban jied ïa kito kiba la pynpaw ïa ka jingangnud bad kiba la pynpaw shakhmat bad (ka party hi kan sa) jied ïa kiba kham kynsai tam.”Haduh mynta hi, kiba la paw kyrteng ban pan tiket na ka UDP ban aireng ha kane ka elekshon ki long u President ba la shongthait jong ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin bad u President jong ka Khasi Author Society u Dr. DRL Nonglait.Dang shen ka Central Executive Committee (CEC) jong ka United Democratic Paty (UDP) ba la khlieh da u President u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh ka la shim ïa ka rai ban bynshet ha ka State Election Committee (SEC) jong ka Party ban pyrkhat ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshim rai halor ki kyrtong ban pynïakhun na Shillong Parliamentary Seat bad na Tura Parliamentary Seat.Ka UDP bad ka HSPDP kiba ïatreilang hapoh ka shatri jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) dang shen ki la pynthymmai ïa ka jingïateh kular ban ïatreilang ha ka Elekshon Lok Sabha khnang ban sei tang uwei u kyrtong monlang jong ka RDA ban pynïakhun na Shillong Parliamentary Seat.Ïa mynta, u Bah Vincent H. Pala u dei u MP ka Congress uba mihkhmat ïa ka Shillong Seat, katba ka Agatha K. Sangma ka dei ka MP jong ka NPP kaba mihkhmat ïa ka Tura Seat sha Lok Sabha.
title: NGAM DON JINGMUT EIEI BAN ÏAKHUN ÏA KA ELEKSHON LOK SABHA: BAH PAUL LYNGDOH

content: Ban pynkmen ïa ki khunswet kiba la ïakynduh jingeh ha ka jingim ka jong ki, ka Reach Shillong Ministry ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la ïakmen lang bad kine ki khynnah da kaba pynlong ïa ka jingrakhe Children’s Day ha ka ophis treikam jong UDP.U Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba la long kum u kongsan u la sam ïa ki jingai sngewbha sha ki heprit kiba la ri bad sumar da ka Lawei ba phyrnai Children’s Home, ka Open Day Shelter, ka Open Day Shelter, Mawblei, ka RMS School for Underpriviledge bad ka Open Day Shelter, Nongmensong, 24 Hours Crisis Management Centre.Haba kren kum u Kongsan, u Bah Paul u la ong, “don na phi kiba dei ki khunswet, don na phi kiba la mad ïa ki jingeh ha ka jingim ka jong phi, hynrei ngin kynmaw ïa kane kumba i Pastor Reuben i la ïalam katne snem ïa ka Ministry, kane kan pynkynmaw ïa ngi ba u Nongpynim jong ngi u Trai Jisu Khrist haba ki kmie ki kpa ki ïalam ïa ki khynnah sha u Jisu ba un kyrkhu ïa ki, hynrei ki Synran jong u Jisu ki la beh ïa ki, hynrei u Jisu u la ong, “shah ïa ki khynnah rit ba kin wan sha Nga, namarba ka Hima Bneng ka dei ka jong ki.”“Pastor ïaid beit shakhmat ha kane ka jingïaid lynti jong phi. Ka jingleh jong phi ka pynkynmaw lang ïa ngi ba ka imlang ka sahlang kaba khlain ka dei ka imlang ka sahlang kaba sumar ïa kiba tlot, kaba kdup bad kaba kner sha kiba tlot. Nga kwah ba kane kan dang bteng,” u la ong.“Ngi long kiba donbok haba nga shimti ïa ka tnat Social Welfare dang ar bnai, ka Ministry na Delhi ka la ai ïa ka mang pisa na ka bynta ki Angwandi Centre haduh 226 tylli ki centre bathymmai. U Blei U ïohi, U ïalam bad U btin lynti ïa ngi. Kaba kongsan ka long ma ngi, ngin leh pat la ka jong ka bynta,” u la bynrap.U Pastor Reuben ha ka jingïakren bad u nongthoh khubor u la ïathuh ba ka Reach Shillong Ministry ka don ar tylli ki Children’s Home, ki jaka ri khunlung, saw tylli ki Open Shelter, kata, ha Laitkor, Mawblei, Nongmensong bad Bomfyle Road.“Ngi don ruh ïa ki skul ba ngi la ai jinghikai ïa ki khynnah kiba wan na ki longing ki baduk. Ha ka shibnai ngi ai jingshakri haduh 400 tam ngut ki khynnah ha ki Centre,” la ong u Pastor Reuben bad bynrap, “ki lah ban dei ki khunswet, kiba la shah iehnoh, kiba sah ha ing tangba ka jingim ka jingim jong ki kam long pat kaba shngaiñ.”Haba kylli, u la ong, “la 18 snem ngi la trei kumne bad ngi dang pyrkhat ba kan pynduna ïa kine ki khynnah ha ki Centre hynrei kam shym la long kumta, ngi la hap ban plie shi plie ïa ki Centre. Ka daw kaba ngi lap, katkum ka jingwad bniah, ngi lap ïa ka jinglong lyngkar jong ki longing longsem bad ka jingpait jingpra jong ki longing longsem bad bun na ki khynnah kiba la ri ha ki Open Shelter ki dei kiba ka kmie ka hap ban kit khunrei. Ka long ka bym ishngaiñ.U la ïathuh ruh ba ha ki Centre kiba ka Ministry ka la pynïaid, la ai jingïasyllok, la ai jinghikai (vocational training), la pynleh ïa ki MHIS Card, ki Aadhar Card bad ka thong jong ka Ministry ka long ban pynthikna ba ki khynnah kin ïoh ïa ka jingsumar haba ki pang ki shitom. “Ka jingtrei jong ngi ka long beit ban ïada ïa ka hok jong ki khynnah.”U la ong shuh shuh ba ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei, katkum ka jingshem jong ka Ministry, kiba bun hi ki dei ki longiing kiba ka kmie ka hap ban kit khunrei.“Ka thong jong ka Ministry ka long ban ïada ïa ka hok jong ki khynnah, ka hok ban ïoh jinganng jingstad ka hok ban ïoh ïa ka jigkoit jingkhiah. Ha ka skul kaba ngi la pynïaid ngi hikai khap shniuh, ngi hikai thaiñ mula, hikai suh jaiñ bad kiwei kiwei namarba ki khynnah ki bym da lah bha ha ka jingpule ngi hap ban hikai da kiwei pat ki jait kam da ka jingkhmihlynti ba ha kawei ka sngi kin dup lah ban ieng ha la ki jong ki kjat ynda ki la heh la san bad kin dup lah ban kyrshan ïa la ka ing ka sem,” u la ong.“U don uwei u khynnah uba na surok mynta u la pule ha University, u don uwei u khynnah uba na surok mynta u dei u Instructor jong ngi, uba ai jinghikai ïa kiwei pat ki khynnah. Ki la don hi ki soh kiba bha hynrei ki don ruh kiba la ïaid ha la ka jong ka mon,”la ïathuh u Pastor Reuben ïa ki soh kiba mih na ka jingtrei kaba la 18 snem kynthih jong ka Ministry ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka Sor bad Khapsor.“Ngi da kwah ban pynduna namarba ki khynnah kim dei ban don ha ki jaka ri khunswet hynrei ki dei ban don bad la ki bahaing hasem pynban katba nang mih u snem ki nang bun. Ka jingduk jingkyrduh, ka jingwan tuid jong ki nongkyndong sha sor, kita ki dei kiba ngi ïohi kum ishu kiba eh bha,” u la ïathuh shuh shuh.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka Ministry ka la sorjamin ban wad jaka na ka bynta ban buh ïa ka Centre ha Mawiong.“Ka jingthmu jong ka Ministry ka long ban kham pynleit jingmut tang ha ki jaka sor ba ki don ki longing kiba duk ba kyrduh. Ki longiing kiba duk ha sor ki kham shitom katba sha nongkyndong dang lah ban im,” u la ong.
title: KI KHYNNAH KIBA DON HA OPEN SHELTER BUN KIBA KA KMIE KA HAP KIT KHUNREI: REV. REUBEN G. LALOO

content: U Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la ong ba ka long kaba eh ban pynhun lut ïa baroh bad u la kyrpad ïa ki ASHA ban wan sha ka miej jingïakren bad ki bor badei peit khnang ban dup lah ban pynurlong ïa ki jingdawa ki jong ki.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong, “ka Meghalaya ka la leh kham bha ïa ki nongtrei ASHA lada ïanujor bad kiwei pat ki jylla bad haba ngi la ai ïa ka Fixed Renumeration ka ladei ban don pat ka jingsngewnguh na ka liang jong ki (ASHA).”“Manla ka jingeh ka don ka lad, nga ngeit ba da kata ka mynsiem ba ngin peit kaei kaba bha tam na ka bynta ka jylla, ngin ym ïa trei eh tang ban ong ba ma nga, nga dei bad kiwei ki bakla hynrei da ka mynsiem jong ka jingsngewthuh lang jong ka jingdonkam ki paidbah. (Kin) sngewthuh lang ba ngi don hangne ym tang ban ong ngin ïoh katno hynrei ba ngin ai ruh katno. Kata kein kaba kongsan. Da kata ka mynsiem kaei ka bym lah ban leh, baroh kaba leh ban leh,” u la ong.“Nga sngew ba ka Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka la shimkhia bha ïa kane ka kam. Ha kane ka kam ban pynlut ïa baroh ka shitom bha namar kiba ngi hun bad kiba ngin ym hun kin don beit hynrei kaei kaba ngi la lah ban leh na ka Sorkar ka long ba ka Myntri ka la ai ruh ïa ka jingkular ba lada dang don ki jingduna yn sa nang pynbeit.  Nga sngew ba la biang ha ka jingshisha bad ym dei ban ong ba la khang noh ïa ka jingkhang ban ym ïa pynbeit,” la bynrap u Bah Paul.U la ong shuh shuh, “u don u pud ïa kiei kiei, ngim shym la leh beiñ ïa ki bad ngi dei ka Jylla kaba ngi la ai ïa ka jingsiew bainong kaba biang tam napdeng kiba bun ki jylla.”“Ha ka kam shakri paidbah, ngi dei ban wan shakhmat bad kiba kylluid ban ïakren khamtam ba kane ka kam ka dei hi ka bynta jong ki (ASHA). Ban randien da kaba shu ïakhih sha surok kam dei ka lynti, hynrei ki dei ban ïakynduh ïa ka Myntri kaba dei peit ïa kano kano ka kam kaba dang sahteng,” la bynrap u Bah Paul.
title: KYRPAD U BAH PAUL LYNGDOH ÏA KI ASHA BAN IAKREN SNGEWTHUH JINGMUT BAD KA Dr. AMPAREEN

content: Kan long ka sien kaba nyngkong eh na ki jingiakhun kiba la long ha la ing ba ka kynhun ialehkai jong ka Shilong Lajong Football Club kan pynliem lyndang ia ka kynhun ialehkai jong ka Gokulam Kerela da 3 kol la kawei ha ka jingiakhun kaba la long ha madan ialehkai jong ka SSA Stadium, Shillong ha ka Sngi u Blei.Hapdeng ka jingsakhi lang jong ki hajar ngut ki nongkyrshan, ka Shillong Lajong ka la ioh ban pynkhih nyngkong eh ia ka jar ha ka jingiakhun jong ka kylla step ha ka minit kaba 30 kaba la wan lyngba u Daniel Gonçalves da ka jingiarap jong u Captain u Hardy Cliff Nongbri.Ka Gokulam kaba la iakhun tyngeh ka la ioh ban pyniakhaid ia kane ka shi kol shwa ban poi ka halftime ha ka minit kaba 43 lyngba u Nili Perdomo.Ha ka jingiakhun ha ka kylla miet, ka Shillong Lajong ka la pynkylla ia ka rukom ialehkai bad ioh pynkhih biang ia ka jar ha ka minit kaba 75 da ka jingioh shut Penalty jong u Renan Paulino De Souza. Hapdeng ka jingiakhun kaba jwat, ka Shilllong Lajong ka la ioh ban pynkhih biang ia ka jar ha ka sien kaba lai ha ka minit kaba 98 minit lyngba u Hardy Cliff Nongbri.  Da kine ki lai tylli ki kol ka la biang pura ia ka Shillong Lajong ba kan ioh khur ia ki lai point na kane ka jingiakhun kaba la buh mynta ialade ha ka kyrdan kaba hynriew ha ka miej iakhein point jong ka I-League ha kane ka aiom.Mynta pat, ka Shillong Lajong kan hap ban pynkhreh ban iakhun pyrshah sa ia ka Delhi Football Club ka ban sa long ha ka 22 tarik u Naiwieng, 2023 ha ka por 2 baje ha madan SSA Stadium, Shillong.
title: I-LEAGUE: DA 3-1 KOL KHYRWIT KA SHILLONG LAJONG ÏA KA GOKULAM KERELA

content: Ka Executive Committee jong ka Meghalaya ASHA Workers Union (MAWU) kaba la long ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la shim ïa ka rai ban pynjur shuh shuh ïa ki jingïakhih da kaba pynlong ïa ka jingïashong kyllain myngnor kaba khlem pud sngi hakhmat ka ophis Secretariat ka ban sdang naduh ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai kum shi bynta ban pyrshah ïa ka jingleh kuman jong ka Sorkar ïa ka jingdawa jong ki ASHA ban kyntiew ïa ka jingsiew bainong na ka T.2 hajar sha ka T. 5 hajar.Ka President jong ka Union ka Kong Mirajune Myrsing ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang ka la ong, “ka jingïalang ka la shim beit da kawei ka rai, katba ka Sorkar kam pat sngew pat sngap ïa ki jingdawa jong ka MAWU, ki ASHA ki la rai ban ïaid beit shakhmat ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakhih jong ngi.  Ïa ka wat kaba nyngkong ngi ladep pynlong da ka Peace Rally bad ka wat kaba ar ka long ba ngin ïaid shakhmat naduh ka 27 tarik, Naiwieng, 2033, ki ASHA ki la rai ban shong kyllaiñ mynngor hakhmat ka Ophis Secretariat kaba khlem pud sngi.”Haba kylli, ka Kong Myrsing ka la ong, “hadien ka jingpyndep ïa ki Peace Rally ha ki distrik bapher bapher jong ka Jylla, ngi ïohi ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la sngap kuman beit ïa ki jingdawa jong ki ASHA.  Kat haduh mynta ka Myntri jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka sngap beit bad kam patiaw eiei ïa kaei ka jingdawa bad ka jingkwah jong ki ASHA.”“Ka jingïakhot ïakren jong ka Kong Ampareen ïa ki ASHA, ngi sngew kumba ka shu khot ha madan madiah. Ban shu ong ba ki ASHA lada ki kwah ban ïakren bad nga, nga kloi ban ïakren bad ki, kata ka pyni ba tang na ka liang ki ASHA ki kwah ban kren, katba na ka liang ka Kong Ampareen kam kwah ban don ïa kano kano ka jingïakren bad ki ASHA. Lada dei ba ma ka, ka kwah shisha ban ïakren ïapynbeit ha ka jingshisha ka ladei ban ai da ka shithi (Official Letter) ba katta tarik wan ïakynduh ïa nga.  Hynrei ka jingkhot jong ka, ka long tang lyngba ki lad pathai khubor. Na ka liang jong ka Union ruh ka ngi phah ïa ka khubor sha ka Myntri, lada ma ka, ka kwah ban ïakren bad ki ASHA, ngi long kiba kloi ban leit sha ka jingïakren,” la bynrap ka Kong Myrsing.Ka la ïathuh ruh, shisien ba ki ASHA ki la sdang ïa ka jingïakhih da kaba shong kyllaiñ myngngor ka jingïakhih kan ïaid beit shakhmat bad sngi bad miet.“Ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai, ka jingïashong kyllaiñ myngngor kin dei beit tang ki dkhot jong ka Executive Committee. Lada ka jingïakhih kam poi shaei shaei, ha ka sngi kaba bud, kata, ha ka 28 tarik mynta u bnai, baroh ki ASHA na kylleng ki distrik jong ka Jylla kin sa ïashim bynta lang ha kane ka jingïakhih,” la pyntip ka President jong ka MAWU.Ka Kong Myrsing ka la ai khublei ruh ïa ki nongtrei ASHA kiba la pynlong ïa ki Peace Rally ha ki distrik bapher bapher bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki sengbhalang bad ïa ki Rangbah Shnong jong ki shnong bapher bapher kiba la synran lang bad kiba la ai jingkyrshan ha ka jingïakhih jong ki ASHA ha ka wat kaba nyngkong.
title: RAI KI ASHA BAN SHONG KYLLAIÑ MYNNGOR KHLEM PUD SNGI HAKHMAT SECRETARIAT BA MYNTHI KA SORKAR

content: Ki samla pule jong ka skulbah NEHU kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka NEHUSU ki la dawa ia ki bor pyniaid jong kane ka skulbah ban wengkam mardor ia u Nantu Das halor ka jingkynnoh ba u donkti ban jrongkti ia kawei ka kynthei.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, ka NEHUSU ka la pynbna ba kan sa pynlong ruh da ka jingiashong kyllaiñ myngngor hakhmat ka Administration Block ha ka lah sngi U Blei.“Ngi kyrpad ia ki samla pule ba kin iasnohkti lang bad ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah halor ki kam ba pynhiar dor kiba long be-aiñ.  Ngi kwah ban pynpaw da kaba shai ba ngin kyntait mardor ia ka kam thombor ha ka longryngieng hapoh kane ka skulbah, bad ngin iakhun khlem da pyndem tad haduh ban da ioh ia ka hok,” ong u kyrwoh na ka NEHUSU.“Ai ba ki bor pyniaid kin tip ba kano kano ka jingpyrshang ban iada ia u nongleh kam bymman kin sa iohi ia ka jingkhih bitar jong ki samla.  Ki la pynjari korphiw ha Hostel, ki la pyrkhing ia ka iaid ka ieng laitluid da kaba kam ban wanrah ia ka jingshngaiñ, ki la pyrkhing ia ngi bad ki la teipop ia ka lanot haba ka la pyrshang ban wad ia la ka jong ka hok, hynrei ym don kawei ruh kaba lah ban pynsangeh ia ka jingshah thombor ha ka longryngieng hapoh ka Campus namarba kine ki jingpyrkhing ki long tang ban pyndik ia ki samla pule kiba luilui katba ki nonglehkam bymman ki iaid sahuh ban leh ia ki kam kiba pynisaitmet,” la ong ka NEHUSU.“Ngi ong, lah biang katto, ngim donkam ia ka jingpyrkhing ia ki samla pule, ngim donkam ia ka dur bula jong phi kaba pynpaw ba phi sngewkhia ia ka jingshngaiñ ki kynthei, ngi dawa ban leh da kaba tyngeh ia ki nongthombor bad ngim ym ailad ia kino kino ki jingpyrshang ban iada ia ki,” la bynrap u kyrwoh na ka NEHUSU.
title: DAWA KA NEHUSU BAN WENGKAM MARDOR ÏA U NANTU DAS UBA JRONGKTI ÏA KA KYNTHEI

content: Kum shi bynta ban kyntiew ia ki samla donsap jong ka jylla ha ka rwai ka siaw shaduh ka international Level sa shi sien biang ka Ka Don Bosco Media Network (DBMN) kan pynlong ia ka jingiakop rwai kaba la tip kum Sur Kynud (The Voice)Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka lah sngi U Blei u Bah OL Marbaniang uba long u dkhot jong ka shlem treikam ka Don Bosco Media Network u la pyntip ba jingmut jong kane ka Reality Show ka long ban kyntiew ia ka sap ka phong jong ki kaitor ban rah ia ki shaduh ka International Level bad ia kito kiba kwah ban nang ban rwai lyngba ka jinghikai jong ki Coaches bad ruh kiba dei ki Judge jong kane ka rynsan iakop rwai.U la iathuh ba ka rukom pyniaid ia kane ka rynsan iakob rwai ka long kum ka rynsan iakob ‘The Voice’ ba la pyniaid shabar jong ka ri India.Ka Blind audition kan sa long ha ka 2 tarik, Noprah 2023. Ki nongrwai kin hap ban pynkhreh kawei ka jingrwai kaba ki jied katba ki kwah ban rwai. Lada ki Coaches/Judges ki jied ia u/ka nongrwai ban iaid sha ka kylla kaba bud ne ka Elimination Round-1. Ia u/ka nongrwai kin hap jied ia u/kawei na ki Coach/Judge ban hikai ia u/ka ban rwai. U/ka nongrwai kim donkam shuh ban siew ia ka bai shah hikai ha u/ka Coach/Judge. Ban shah hikai, u/ka nongrwai bad u/ka coach kin hap ban ia pynbeit ia ka por bad katno sien shitaiew kin ioh ia ka jingshah hikai ka ban sa long ha Don Bosco Youth Centre, Laitumkhrah, Shillong.Kin sa don ki Elimination Round naduh 9 tarik Noprah 2023 terter haduh ban da poi sha ka Grand Finale ka ban long ha ka 31tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ha Don Bosco Youth Centre, Laiumkhrah, Shillong. Kito kiba la shah jied na ka Blind Audition, kin sa ioh jinghikai na bynta ka Elimination Round kaba bud bad kito ki bym shah weng ha ka Elimination Round-1, ki sa ioh jinghikai ban iakhun sa sha ka Elimination Round-2 bad ter ter haduh 10 ngut yn jied ban iakob ha ka Grand Finale.Ha ka Grand Finale ki Coaches/Judges kin ym ai Marks shuh hynrei kin don ki External Judge ne ki nongbishar ba shabar ki ban bishar ia ka jingiakob. Naduh ka Elimination Round-1, ki Views ha YouTube ruh ki ai Marks nalor ki Marks ba la ai da ki Coaches/Judges.Ka bai registration kan long shi hajar tyngka bad ki nongiashim bynta kin dei tang ki nongshong shnong jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.Ka khusnam na ka bynta ka jingiakob ka long T.1 lak bad u/ka lahduh kin long ki Brand Ambassador jong ka Don Bosco Media Network ban ioh iashim bynta ha ka International Level kum ka Vocal Star ne ‘The Voice’  ki ban sa long shabar jong ka ri India.  Kin ioh ruh ban rekod bad Videograph ar tylli ki jingrwai ba la shna hi ha kaba ka Don Bosco Media kan siew ia baroh ki jinglut jingsep.Ki phorm  lah ban ioh na Reception Don Bosco Youth Centre ne lah ban shim na ka FB/Instagram/YouTube jong ka Don Bosco Media Networ bad na ka bynta ki jingtip kiba bniah lah ban telephone ha u number: 8119011043 ne thoh da ka Whatsapp ne da ka email shaHa u snem ba ladep ka heprit Chevinia Mawnai ka la long ka nongjop ha ka rynsan iakob rwai bad ka la jop ruh ia ka Vocal Star kaba la long ha United Kingdom.
title: DA KA SUR KYNUD TYNRAI YN KYNTIEW ÏA KI SAMLA DON SAP SHADUH KA INTERNATIONAL LEVEL

content: Ka kynhun ialehkai jong ka Nongnah-Nongkdait Sports Club ka la iohrah ia ka nam lahduh da kaba pynliem noh ia ka kynhun ialehhkai Thiepdiengngan Sports Club ha ka jingiakhun phainal jong ka lympung ialehkai 2nd Wickliff Syiem Memorial Football Tournament 2023 ba la pyniaid da ka KSU Ranikor Circle lem bad ka Nongnah Unit ia kaba la pynlong ha ka shnong Nongnah South West Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang u Assistant Education Secretary jong ka KSU Sengkmie u samla Shalkitbok Kharbani, u Organising Secretary jong ka KSU South West Khasi Hills District u samla Poljohn, President jong ka KSU Ranikor Circle u Samla Marcony Thongni, ki Myntri Shnong bad paidbah.Ka Seng ka la pynkup burom ruh ia ki samla pule jong ka shnong Nongnah bad ia uwei u samla pule na ka shnong Keniong kiba la wanrah ia ka nam ka burom ia ka shnong bad ia ka District baroh kawei ha ka jingleit iashim bynta jong ki ha ki lympung ialehkai bad kiwei kiwei ki rynsan iakop.Ka seng ka la pynkup burom ruh ia ka samla  samla Greatmercy Langte kaba la jop ia ka rynsan jingiakop Spark Mrs Northeast India 2023 ba la pynlong dang shen ha Guwahati.
title: SHONGSHIT KA 2ND WICKLIFF SYIEM MEMORIAL FOOTBALL TOURNAMENT

content: Ki samla pule jong ka skulbah NEHU kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka North Eastern Hill University Students Union (NEHUSU) bad ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) NEHU Unit ha ka lah sngi U Blei ki la ai por ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka skulbah NEHU ban wengkam mardor ia u Sports Director ka NEHU u Nantu Das uba long u nongpeit ia ka Security halor ka jingkynnoh ba u donkti ban thombor ia kawei ka kynthei kaba dei ka Referee ha ka sngi U Blei.Ka NEHUSU bad ka KSU NEHU Unit ki la aiti la ki jong ki jingujor ha u Vice Chancellor jong ka skulbah NEHU u Prof. PS Shukla da kaba dawa ba u dei ban un tuklar mardor halor kane ka jingjia kaba la pynher syrngiew ia ki samla pule kynthei hapoh kane ka skulbah.La sakhi ruh ba ki dkhot ki samla pule jong ka skulbah NEHU ki la rung da ka bor hapoh ka Conference Hall ha ki kynta ba u Vice Chancellor u dang shong jingialang.  U Vice Chancellor u la hap ban pyndem hakhmat ka jingdawa jong ki samla pule da kaba soi ia ka jingujor kaba ki la aiti ha u.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingdawa jong ki samla pule u Prof. Shukla u la pan por hapoh lai sngi ban leh eiei pyrshah ia u Nantu Das uba la shah kem bad uba dang don ha ka kti jong ki Pulit halor kane ka jingshah kynnoh.Ka NEHUSU bad ka KSU NEHU Unit ki la dawa ia u Vice Chancellor ba u dei ban weng lut ia ki kam ba la bat da u Nantu Das katba ka jingtohkit jong ki Pulit ka dang iaid shakhmat hadien ba ki bahaing hasem jong ka lanot ki la mudui da ka ejahar pyrshah ia u Nantu Das sha ki Pulit.U Prof. Shukla ha ka jingiakren bad ki samla pule u la kular ba un sa shimkhia ia kane ka jingjia ba ong ruh ba ka dei ka jingpynpohdor ia ka skulbah bad na ka liang jong u ruh un ym ailad ba kum kine ki kam sniew kin wan jia hapoh ki saw kynroh jong kane ka skulbah.U la ong ruh tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane mynnin ka sngi U Blei u la khot iakren ia u Registrar bad ia ki Ophisar jong ka skulbah na ka bynta iakren sani halor kane ka jingjia.“Kumba phi la ai por ia nga lai sngi, ngan sa leh ia kata,” la kular u Vice Chancellor hakhmat ki samla pule kiba pynrem jur pyrshah ia u Nantu Das.Ka samla Daiaphira Kharsati, ka Research Scholar hapoh kane ka skulbah  ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ka la ong, “kane ka jingleh jong u Nantu Das ma ngi ki Research Scholar kiba trei ha ki Lab haduh 10-11 baje mynmiet ka pynlong ia ngi ban ym don jingshngain lada don kum une u jait briew bad ngi dawa ban weng noh ia u na ka kam kum u Sports Director jong ka Sports Department bad kumjuh ruh uba dei u incharge Security ha Nehu.’“Haba u nongpeit jong ka Security ka NEHU u long kumne, ngim sngew shngain kum ki kynthei kiba pule ha kane ka skulbah.  Ngi ruh ngi kyrshan ia ka jingdawa jong ka NEHUSU kaba aipor ia ka NEHU ban weng kam ia u,” ka la ongU President jong ka KSU NEHU Unit u Samla Sandy Sohtun u la iathuh ba ka Seng ka la ioh jingtip ba u Nantu Das u leit shaw da kali ia ka Referee na Umshyrpi hadien ba la wan phai na shnong bad jrongkti ia ka hapoh kali bad ynda la poi ha Kiang Nangbah Old Guesthouse u la pyrshang ban jrong kti ia ka bad ha ka jingiaksaid ka la lait phet na ki tyrsim jong une u runar.“Ngim da tip bha kumno ka jia bad ha kano ka rukom ka jia.  Ngi la syllok bad I,” u la ong.“Ka dei ka Refree kaba u Nantu Das u kular ban ialam ia ka sha Orissa namarba ka don ka Inter University.  Ka Tournament kan sdang la shem taiew hynrei u Nantu Das u la phah wan ia ka hynnin ka sngi U Blei nalor ba ka dei ka sngi shuti,” u la ong bad bynrap, “hynrei sngewsynei ba ha kum kata ka por u la shim kabu ban jrong kti pynban.”Nalor kata, une u nongialam ka KSU NEHU Unit u la iathuh ba ka seng ka la ioh jingtip ba u Nantu Das u la kyrpad ia kane lanot ban iasuk bad ban iamap noh bad u khnang ba un lait ialade na kane ka jingkhlemraiñ.
title: KYNNOH BA THOMBOR U NANTU DAS ÏA KA REFEREE, DAWA KA NEHUSU BAD KSU ÏA KA NEHU BAN WENG KAM

content: Ki Pulit jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka 20 tarik u Naiwieng, 2023 ki la ioh kurup 4,135 bilor ka dawai Phensydel kiba don ia ka dawai kaba 100 ml ha manla uwei pa uwei u bilor ba la kit be-aiñ da kawei ka trok kit umphniang Diesel kaba don ia u nombar NL-01-AH-2246.Ki Pulit ki la kem ia u Shakeep Sheik uba dei na ka jylla Maharashtra bad register case hapoh ka Khliehriat Police Station hapoh ka Section 279/337/338/427 Indian Penal Code pule lang bad ka Sec 22(c)/29 jong ka NDPS Act khnang ban buddien shuh shuh halor ka jingioh kurup ia kine ki dawai.U Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaintia Hills District, u Jagpal Singh Dhanoa ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ha ka sngi Thohdieng jong ka taiew baladep, ki Pulit ki la ioh jingtip ha ka por kumba 6.30 baje mynstep ba ka don kawei ka trok kit umphniang kaba la thung khongpong ha kawei ka riat kaba jylliew ha ka shnong Umtyra bad ia u nongñiah jong ka trok uba la sahkut hapoh ka Cabin jong kane ka trok ia uba la tip kyrteng kum u Shakeep Sheik la ioh sei bad la pynkit mar mar sha ka jaka ai jingsumar ha  Civil Hospital, Khliehriat.Ha ka jingtohkit, une u nongñiah jong ka trok u la kam ba ka trok ka dei kaba kit ia ka umphniang Diesel bad ia ki kot ki sla jong ka kali la lap na ka Cabin ba shong u nongñiah trok.  Hadien ba la tohkit ia ki kot ki sla, ka kyrteng jong u trai kali bad ka jaka sah ki iapher katkum kaba paw ha ka e-challan App.U SP u la iathuh ba ki Pulit ki la tohkit na ka Bharat Petroleum Transport Office, ha kaba la lap ba kane ka kali kam shym la kit satia ia ka umphniang (diesel) na ka karkhana bad kam don satia kano kano ka jingbuh jingthoh kaba don hapoh ka ophis jong ki bad kane ka la pynsuba sniew ia ki Pulit.Shuh shuh u SP, u la iathuh ba ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai, ki Pulit ki la talasi ia ka trok bad ia ki bynta ba shapoh jong ka top umphniang ha kaba ki la lap ia kaei re kaei kaba la buhrieh hapoh ka Chamber jong ka top umphniang. Marmar la khot ia ki nongsakhi sha ka jaka ba don ka trok bad da ka jingiarap jong ki nongot la lah ban weng ia ki nar jong ka top umphniang na ka Chamber ha kaba la lap pynban ba la thep ia ki dawai bilor Phensedyl.“Haduh 4,135 tylli ki bilor dawai Phensedyl la ioh ban kurup kiba dap da ka dawai 100 ml,” ong u SP bad bynrap, “hadien ba la pyndep ia ki jingtohkit katkum ka NDPS Act la kurup noh ia ka dawai.”
title: 4,135 BILOR KA DAWAI PHENSEDYL KURUP KI PULIT EJH NA KA TROK KIT UMPHNIANG, KEM UWEI

content: RONGBIRIA SENG KUT SNEMShi hat shitaiew shwa ka jingrakhe ïa ka Seng Kut Snem, ka Seng Khasi Kmie, lyngba ka Rongbiria Committee ka la pynlong ïa ka Rongbiria ha madan Second Ground, SRGT, Polo.Hashwa ban sdang ïa ka Rongbiria, la kyntiew ïa ka lama jong ka Seng Khasi da u long u Acting President jong ka Seng Khasi Kmie u Rangbah O. Pyngrope bad hadien kane u Rangbah Skor Jala uba long u Chairman jong ki Riewtymmen Riewsan ka Seng Khasi Kmie u la pyndep ïa ka nguh ka dem  bad ka jingkren balyngkot na u Rangbah O. Pyngrope bad na u General Secretary jong ka Seng Khasi Kmie u Rangbah Hainess Marbaniang.Ha ka por janmiet, u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem u la long kum u Kongsan ryngkat ka jingsynlang jong ki katto katne ki rangbah kiba dei ki dkhot jong ka Jylli Pyrkhat Kam ka Seng Khasi Kmie.Haba kren kum u kongsan, u Bah Pynïaid u pynpaw ba u da sngewkmen shi katdei eh  ban ïoh ban ïashim bynta lang ha kane  ka lympung ha kaba ka Rongbiria ka dei kaba la hikai da ki longshwa ki manshwa bad kane ka ïai im namarba ka Seng Khasi ka dang pynim ïa kane ka bynta.U pynpaw ruh kumno ban don ïa ka jingïadei kaba ïajan hapdeng ka District Council bad ka Seng Khasi ha kaba ïadei bad kiba bun ki kam kiba donkam ban ïatreilang na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki riti ki dustur kiba u longshwa manshwa u la hikai.U Bah Pynïaid u la ong ba kane ka dei kawei ka bynta kaba yn sa shimkhia da ka District Council ïa kaba yn ïatrei lang ym tang mynta lehse manla u snem ha kaba yn pynïaid beit ïa ka rongbiria wat ha kiwei kiwei ki jaka jong ka ri lum Khasi.U la ong ruh ba ka Rongbiria kam da dei eh tang ka jingïashim bynta ha ka jingïasiat khnam, pynban kaba long shibynta ha ka kren ka khana ka dwai ka phirat, ïa kaba ka pynurlong ïa kane ka kam.Haba phai sha ki jingïakob, ha ka ïakob siat kaba para marwei, u nam tam ha kane ka kynti u dei u Teibor Warbah na Laitkyrhong, uba wan ba-ar u dei u Bok L. Marshillong na Mawpat bad uba wan ba-lai dei u Hed Nongrum na Deingsong.Ha jingïakob siat kynhun, ki lahduh ki dei  ki shi jur na Wahumlawbah ba la mihkhmat da u Diwan Kharshiing bad u Training Sawkmie, ka kynhun kaba wan ba-ar ka dei ka Umkdait-A ba la mihkhmat da u Olik Jyrwa bad u  Wudshed Kharshiing.  Katba ka kynhun kaba wan ba-lai dei ki ar kynhun ba la shah rem noh ha ka por ba la ïakhun ïa ka semifinal bad kine ki long Seng Khasi Nongmadan ba la mihkhmat da u  Shemborlang Sawkmie bad u Diwansing Rani bad  ka kynhun ka Malki ‘A’ ba la mihkhmat da u B. Kharmawphlang bad u Deiborlang Nongsteng.Ïa ki khusnam la ïarap ban sam lang da u Rangbah Rangpher Rynjah, u Rangbah P.D Nongrum lem bad u kongsan u Bah Pynïaid  Sing Syiem.Ïa ka jingïakob baroh kawei la pynkut da ka jingpynhiar ïa ka lama  ka Seng da u Rangbah Wallamphang Roy Vice President Seng Khasi Kmie bad Chairman ka Rongbiria Committee.
title: LAHDUH U TEIBOR WARBAH HA KA IAKOB BA PARA MARWEI, KA WAHUMLAWBAH HA KA IAKOB SIAT KYNHUN
