content: Ki dkhot jong ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Movement (HNYM) kiba thmu ban hiar sha ka shnong Majai ha ka sngi baar ki la shah pakhang lynti ha ki Pulit jong ka Sohra Police Station bad ha ki Magistrate jong ka Sohra Civil Sub-division ha Umstew, ka jaka kaba don hapdeng ka shnong Laitryngew shwa ban poi sha Sohra.Ha ka jingiakren bad ka BatesiTV, u Vice President jong ka Seng u Bah Marshall Nonglait u la iathuh ba kane ka jingthmu jong ka Seng ban hiar sha ka shnong Majai ka long hadien ba ka la don ka jingkynnoh ba ki mynder na ka ri Bangladesh ki la pynkheiñ ia ka hukum jong ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court kaba mana ia ki trok ban kit palat 12 ton shaneng hynrei, katkum ka jingtip ba ka seng ka la ioh pdiang, la iathuh ba ki bor synshar district kim shym la leh eiei watla ki trok kit mawshun jong ki mynder na ka ri Bangladesh ki kit ia u mawshun 20-24 ton kaba pynlong ia ka Sorkar ban duhei ia ka jingioh lum khajna.“Da ka jingtuklar jong ki Magistrate, na ka liang jong u Commissioner and Secretary ka tnat Transports u la kyrpad ia ngi ban iakren hapoh ka ophis treikam jong u halor kane ka kam shwa ba ka seng kan shim ia kano kano ka rai,” la ong u Bah Nonglait.“Kumba ka long ka jingiakren ka dang iaid bad lada u Commissioner and Secretary jong ka tnat Transports u lah ban pynbha ka la bha syndon bad lada um lah ban pynbha bad lada ngi ioh ia ka jingtip ba ka jingiakren kam long ngin tur beit shathie (sha Majai) ka mat jia eiei ngin ym khuslai ia kata,” la byrngem u Bah Nonglait.Haba iathuh bniah ia kane ka jingthmu jong ka seng ban hiar sha Majai, u Bah Nonglait u la ong, “shibun tylli ki shithi ngi ladep aiti sha ki tnat treikam bapher bapher ha kaba iadei bad ka Majai namarba bun ki kam be-ain kiba don ha Majai.  Katkum ka hukum ba la pynmih da ka Iingbishar Meghalaya High Court la shah ban kit tang 12 ton u mawshun. Hynrei ha Majai ki kit palat 22, 23,24 ton.”“Ka seng ka ladep mudui da ka ejahar ha u bnai Jymmang 2023. Ka jingkit palat pud ka long ka jingduhnong ia ka jylla. Ka Sorkar ka duh ia ka khajna. Na ka liang ka seng ngin ym shongthait namarba ka ejahar ba ngi la ujor kam shym la treikam satia bad ki trok ki iaid beit kumba ju long manla ka sngi,” la ong u Bah Marshall.U la kynnoh ruh ba ha ka shnong Majai, ka shnong kaba don markhap bad ka ri Bangladesh, ki kot ki sla jong ki trok kit maw jong ki bar jylla ki long ki bym biang satia bad kynnoh ruh ba ka jingleh Benami ruh ka long kaba shyrkhei bha hapdeng ki mynder ri na ka ri Bangladesh bad ki Khasi kiba sah ha ka shnong Majai.“Manla ka thliew iing ki don beit ia ki Sticker. U mynder ri (na Bangladesh) u thied ha ka dor T. 8 -10 hajar kawei ka Sticker ban ioh mar. U briew (trai jylla) ioh beit thik tang ka bai Sticker kaba T.8-10 hajar katba ka kamai kajih ka dei beit na ka bynta ki nongkhaii maw na Bangladesh,” la kynnoh u Bah Nonglait.“Kane kaei kaei kaba pynsngewkhia ia ka seng namarba ka pynduhnong ia ka khajna jong ka jylla. Sa bun ki kam be-aiñ ban pynriewspah ia ki poiei bar-ri,” u la ong.Na ka liang jong u Magistrate ka Sohra Civil Sub-division u Bah R. Kharbihkhiew u la ong ba ka jingbat ia ki dkhot ka HNYM ha Umstew ka long ban khanglad ioh ka mih kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih lada ailad ba kin hiar sha ka shnong Majai.
title: PAKHANG LYNTI KI PULIT ÏA KI DKHOT HNYM BA THMU HIAR KHYNRA TROK KIT MAWSHUN SHA MAJAI

content: Ka Pay For Right Football Academy bad ka Mylliemlum Sports Club ki la long ki ar tylli ki kynhun ialehkai kiba la ioh kiew sha ka kyrdan 2Division Football League ban sa pynlong da ka Shillong Sports Association ha ka aiom ialehkai jong u snem u ban sa wan.Ha ka jingiakhun phainal ha ka 3Division Football League 2023 kaba la long ha madan ialehkai First Ground, ha Polo ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka Pay For Right Football Academy ka la iohrah syndon ia ka nam lahduh ha kane ka jingialehkai jong kane ka aiom da kaba pynliem noh da 2-0 kol ia ka Mylliemlum Sports Club.Ia kine ki ar tylli ki kol la ioh thep da u Robi Maring ha ka minit kaba 62 bad u Andy Suting ha ka minit kaba 70 ha ka jingiakhun jong ka kylla miet ha kane ka lympung ialehkai phainal ba la pynlong da ka Shillong Sports Assciation.Ka PFR FA kaba la long ka lah duh ka la ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba T.40 hajar katba ka Mylliemlum kaba wan baar ka la ioh pdiang ia ka song pisa kaba T.20 hajar.  Ha kane ka sngi, la sakhi lang da ki nongpyniaid jong ka SSA bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha.
title: KIEW KA PFR FA BAD MYLLIEMLUM SC SHA KA 2ND DIVISION FOOTBALL TOURNAMENT KA SSA

content: Ka NEHUTA kaba long ka kynhun jong ki nonghikai ka skulbah NEHU ha ka sngi Baar ka la dawa ia u Vice Chancellor jong ka skulbah NEHU ba u dei ban thung da ka jingtohkit watla u Nantu Das uba la shah kynnoh ba u donkti ban jrong kti ia kawei ka Referee u dang donkti mynta ha ka kti jong ki Pulit.“Watla u Nantu Das u dang don mynta hapoh ka Judicial Custody, hynrei u Vice-Chancellor u dei ban thung ia ka jingtohkit hapoh ka NEHU khnang ba u nongleh kam bymman un ym lah shuh ban wan phai sha ka kam bad ban pynjngut ia ka jinglong jingman hapoh ka skulbah.  Lada ym bud ia ki kyndon kumba la dawa da ki kynhun bapher bapher, yn ñiew ia u Vice-Chancellor  ba u pyrshang ban ai jingiada ia u nongleh bymman.  Na ka bynta ka jingshngaiñ jong ki samla pule, khamtam ki samla pule kynthei, ki nonghikai bad ki dkhot jong ki kynhun kiba iadei kam bad ka NEHU, lada mih kano kano ka jingshah kynthoh kan ktah beit beit ia ka kyrteng jong u Vice-Chancellor.”“Namarkata, ngi kyntu ia u Prof. P. S. Shukla ban pynshitom ia u nongleh kam bymman.  Shwa ban mih kino kino ki kynrum kynram, ka dei ka kamram jong ki bor ba dei peit bad khamtam eh u Vice Chancellor ban pynthikna ba ka Campus jong ka skulbah ka dei ban long kaba shngaiñ na kino kino ki riewbymman.”“Ngi kyntu ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya bad ia ki kynhun bapher bapher kiba don hapoh ka skulbah ban shimkhia bha ia kane ka jingjia bad ban peitngor halor ki lad ki lynti ban shim da ki bor pyniaid jong ka NEHU khnang ba kan long kaba khuid kaba shai hakhmat ki paidbah,” la ong ka NEHUTA.“Ngi sngewkhia haduh katta katta ia ki jingshah thombor ka longryngieng jong kawei ka kynthei Referee ha u Asst. Sports’ Director u Nantu Das, ha kaba ka jingpyrshang jong u ban leh be-jot ia ka lanot ka la mih tang ka jingpynrem.  Ha ka jingshisha, kumba ka paw, u Nantu Das u dei uba la donkti la bunsien ha kine ki jait kam, katkum ka sakhi na ki katto katne ki kynthei kiba pynpaw ba ka jingjrongkti jong u Das uba shim kabu ia ki kynthei haba don ki jingialehkai sports,” la ong ka NEHUTA ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u President u Prof. Lakhon Kma bad u General Secretary u  Dr. Marbhador M. Khymdeit sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Ki briew kum u Nantu Das ki dei ban ngat ha jingshah pynshitom.  Bun tylli ki jingthombor ia ki samla pule kynthei la leh da une u runar uba pyrshang ban pynjaboh ia la ka kamram tang ban pynhun ia la ka jong ka jingthrew shimet,” la kynnoh ka NEHUTA.“Ka NEHUTA ka sngewkhia ba ka skulbah ka la phiel ban iada na ki kam runar kiba ju jia na ka por sha ka por bad mynta ka kynti da u briew uba bat kum u Security-in-charge bad ka jingkylli kaba mih mynta long halor ka bha ka miat jong ki kynthei kiba kham bun kiba pule ha kane ka skulbah bad kiba ju iashim bynta bha ha ki jingialehkai sports bad kiwei kiwei ki kam hapoh ka skulbah,” la ong u kyrwoh bad bynrap, “naduh ka por jong u Prof. S. K. Srivastava, ki don ki riewsniew kiba pyndonkam bakla ia la ka jong ka iktiar thombor ia ka longryngieng.”
title: WATLA U NANTU DAS U DANG DON HA KTI KA AIÑ, U VC U DEI BAN THUNG ÏA KA JINGTOHKIT : NEHUTA

content: :  Ka Khasi Student Union, Nongthymmai Circle kum shi bynta ban kyntiew ia ki khun samla kiba don sap ha ki kam ialehkai ka la plie paidbah ia ka jaka kilan met ia kaba la tip kum ka Maitshaphrang MMA and Fitness Team, ia kaba la pynlong ha Lumiawblot Community Hall, Nongthymmai.Ia kane ka Maitshaphrang MMA and Fitness Team la plie paidbah da u President jong ka KSU Seng Kmie u samla Lambokstar Marngar ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Rangbah Shnong ka Lumiawblot Pyllon u Bah Don Khongshei uba la long kum u Symbud Kongsan, u MDC jong ka Nongthymmai Constituency u Bah Latiplang Kharkongor nalor kiwei kiwei pat.La pynbit pynbiang ia kane ka Maitshaphrang MMA and Fitness Team lyngba ka Sport Committee jong ka KSU Nongthymmai Circle bad ka jingplie ia kane ka shlem ka long kum shi bynta ban ailad bad ban pynshlur ia ki samla ha ka jingkilan met bad kumjuh ruh ban lait na ki jingdih kiba sniew khamtam eh ka jingjyllei jong u drok ha ka imlang ka sahlang.Ha kane ka sngi la pynkup burom ia ki samla kiba la wanrah nam ha ka jingiakop niah saikil kaba la long ha Tawang Arunachal Pradesh bad ha Punmudi, Kerela bad kine kiba shah pynkup burom ki kynthup ia u Samla Apshai Griffit Ñiangti bad u Samla Ridor Ñiangti.Ban pynbyrngia ha kane ka sngi ba la plie ia ka Maitshaphrang MMA and Fitness Team la don katto katne ka jingialehkai Mixed Martial Arts na ka kynhun jong ka MMA.
title: DA MAITSHAPHRANG MMA AND FITNESS TEAM, PLIE KA KSU BAN AI JINGHIKAI ÏA KI SAMLA DON SAP

content: U Bah Standling David Khongwir uba long u Symbud Myntri Rangbah barim jong ka Jylla Meghalaya u la khladnoh na kane ka sla pyrthei ha ka step sngi Baar ha NEIGRIMHS Hospital.Une u rangbah uba la don 90 snem ka rta ia uba ki paidbah ki ju tip kum u Bah SD Khongwir u la khladnoh hadien ka jingpang kaba la bat la kham slem.U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Conrad Kongkal Sangma tang shu ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia u la leit sngewlem ha ing jong u Bah Khongwir bad pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewsih bad ong ruh ba u Bah Khongwir u dei u riewsaiñpyrthei uba la ih bha bad uba la aiti lut ia la ka jingim ha ka kam shakri paidbah tad haduh ba un da khladnoh na kane ka sla pyrthei.La synran ia u Myntri Rangbah da ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh lem, ka MLA jong ka Sutnga Saipung Constituency ka Kong Santa Mary Shylla bad u MLA jong ka Sohra Constiteuncy u Bah Gavin M. Mylliem.  Nalor kine, la sakhi ruh ia u Chief Secretary barim ka Jylla u Bah WMS Pariat bad kiwei kiwei ki riewpawkhmat kiba la leit sngewlem ha ka ing jong u Bah Khongwir.U la pynpaw ba ka Jylla ka la ithuh ia u Bah Standling kum u briew uba la noh shibun eh ia u synñiang u bynhei ia ka Mawlai Constituency bad ia ka Jylla baroh kawei ha ka jinglong nongmihkhmat paidbah haduh 25 snem kynthih.“La ju tip ia u (Bah Standling) kum u briew uba ki paidbah ki ieid bad ki ñiew burom bha.  Kane ka paw na ka jingioh ia ka jingkyrshan wat hadien ba um long shuh u MLA, watla katta ka jingkyrshan, ka jingieid na ki paidbah ka pynpaw shai ba u dei u nongialam uba kumno,” ong u Conrad.“Nga la ioh ka lad ban iakren, ban iakynduh bad ban iatrei lang bad u (Bah Standling) ha ki snem ba la leit noh. Ha ka por ba u dei dang long u Rangbah Shnong ngi la iakynduh la katto katne sien.  Namarkata, nga la ioh bha ka kabu ban ioh jinghikai na u bad ban ioh iasyllok bun kiei kiei kiba la long ki jingmyntoi,” la iathuh u Myntri Rangbah.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka jingkhladnoh jong u Bah Khongwir ka dei ka jingduh ym tang ia ka Mawlai Constituency hynrei wat ia ka Jylla hi baroh kawei.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum na ki bahaiing hasem, ia ka met ba dang sah jong u Bah SD Khongwir yn pyndep ha ka 24 tarik u Naiwieng, 2023.U Bah SD Khongwir u la shakri kum u MLA jong ka Mawlai Constituency haduh 25 snem kynthih.  U la jop ia ka Elekshon ha u snem 1972 bad u la shakri ia ki paidbah jong ka shnong Mawlai haduh u snem 1993.Ha ka jinglong nongmihkmat u la Bah Khongwir ula long ruh u Symbud Myntri Rangbah hapoh ka Sorkar jong u bad u Bah Brington Buhai Lyngdoh bad ha shwa kata, u la bat ia ki tnat kiba heh hapoh ka Sorkar jong u Bah Darwin Diengdoh Pugh .U long ruh u Chairman jong ka State Planning Board bad u la noh synñiang shikatdei eh ban pynwandur ia ka jingkiew irat jong ka jylla.U Bah Khongwir ula rung sha ka jylli jong ka saiñpyrthei da kaba pyniasoh bad ka Hills State People Democratic Party (HSPDP) bad u la long uwei na ki riewrangbah uba la don bynta ha kaba pynkha pat ia ka United Democratic Party (UDP).U la long u Rangbah Shnong jong ka shnong Mawlai Nonglum jin haduh 55 snem kynthih .Ha u snem 1968, u la shakri ruh kum u President jong ka Mawlai Town Dorbar (MTD) haduh u snem 1988.
title: KHLADNOH U BAH SD KHONGWIR, U MLA BARIM KA MAWLAI BAD DY. CM BARIM KA MEGHALAYA

content: Ka kynhun ialehkai jong kaShillong Lajong FC ka la kiew sha ka kyrdan balai ha ka lympung ialehkai Hero I- League  ba mynta ka samoi hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem da 2-1 kol pyrshah ia ka Tiddim Road Athletic Union (TRAU) FC ha ka jingiakhun kaba la long ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ha 1st Ground jong ka Shillong Sports Association, Polo.Ka Shillong Lajong kumba ka la angnud, ka la urlong, wat hadien ba ka la shah thep nyngkong ha ka TRAU FC ha kane ka North East Derby I-League.Ka TRAU FC ka la ioh ban pynkhih nyngkong ia ka jar lyngba u Robinson Singh Soraisam ha ka minit kaba 13 jong ka kyllastep bad ka Lajong ka la ioh ban pyniakhaid lyngba ka Penalty kaba u Hardy Cliff Nongbri u la thep ha ka 18 minit jong ka kyllastep.Ka Shillong Lajong FC ka la ioh ia kane ka Penalty da ka jingktah u Sunil Benchamin ia ka bol da ka kti bad uba la ioh syndon da ka Red Card bad naduh ka 16 minit shaneng ka TRAU FC ka la hap ban ialehkai sa tang 10 ngut  ha madan.Ha ka jingiakhun ha ka kyllamiet ka Shillong Lajong FC ka la lah ban ialehkai bha bad ka pynjem khnap ia ka TRAU FC ha kaba bun ki kabu ki la sepei bad ki khlem lah ban pynurlong, hynrei khatduh ha ka 86 minit u rangialehkai jong ka Shillong Lajong u la ioh ban khyrwit ia ka bol kaba la dei beit beit ia u Thomas Singh Thounaojam u rangialehkai jong ka TRAU FC bad ka bol ka la rung sha ka kol jong u hi.  Dane ka kol, ka Shillong Lajong FC ka la jam da 2-1 bad jop syndon ia ka jingiakhun ha kane ka lympung.
title: PYNHUN KA SHILLONG LAJONG FC ÏA KI NONGKYRSHAN DA KABA PYNJEM KHNAP ÏA KA TRAU FC

content: Ka Employment Monitoring Cell jong ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la dawa ïa ka skulbah North Eastern Hill University (NEHU) ban ailad kyrpang ïa ki samla khasi kiba thep ïa ki kam Non Teaching Posts jong ka Grade-B bad C ba ka skulbah NEHU ka dang shu pyllait shen.Ka seng hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Chairman ka Employment Cell u samla Reuben Najiar ka la ïakynduh ïa u Vice Chancellor jong ka skulbah NEHU u Prof Prabha Shankar Shukla ban ïakren halor kane ka bynta.Ha kane ka jingïakynduh ka seng ka la pynkynmaw ïa ka jingïakren hapdeng ka seng bad u Vice Chancellor kaba la long ha ka 16 tarik, Nailar 2023 ha kaba ka seng ka la dawa ban ailad kyrpang ïa ki samla Khasi kiba thep ïa ki kam ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher jong ka skulbah NEHU.Ka seng ka la pynpaw ruh ha u Prof Shukla ba ka jingdon jong ki samla Khasi ha ki Department bapher bapher jong ka skulbah NEHU kan wanrah ïa ka jingai jingshakri kaba pura namar ka jingsngewtrai ka jong ki ïa la ka skulbah NEHU kaba don hapoh ka jylla lajong.Kumjuh ka seng ka la ïaiban ruh ïa ka jingjia ba dang shu jia shen hapoh NEHU ha kaba wei u ophisar jong ka NEHU u la thmu ban leh be-ijot ïa kawei ka samla Khasi ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai bad kane ka la pynshong syier ïa shibun ki samla pule kiba pule hapoh ka skulbah NEHU.  Ka Seng ka la pynpaw ba na ka liang ki bor ba dei khmih ïa ka NEHU kim dei ban ailad ba kum kine ki jingjia kin nang jia shuh bad ban pyntikna ruh ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ki samla pule kynthei kiba pule hapoh ka skul bah.U Vice Chancellor u la mynjur ïa kaei kaba ka seng ka la buh jingdawa hakhmat jong u bad u la ai ruh ïa ka jingkular ba ka skulbah NEHU kan ailad kyrpang ïa ki samla Khasi kiba thep ha ïa ki kam bapher bapher bad kiba lah ban pyndep ïa ki kyndon ba ka NEHU ka dawa.
title: KYRPAD KA KSU ÏA U VC KA NEHU BAN AILAD SHWA ÏA KI SAMLA KHASI HA KI KAM GRADE-B BAD C

content: Shen ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) kan sa pynlong ïa ka jingsorjamin ïa ki jaka shong die madan ha shilynter ka surok Khyndai Lad, Jail-Road, Barik, Malki-Dhankheti, Laitumkhrah bad Polo naduh ka 4 tarik haduh ka 16 tarik, Nohprah, 2023.Kane ka jingsorjamin ïa ki lynti ïaid kjat ba la shong da ki nongdie madan ka long hadien ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynmih paidbah ïa ka ‘Meghalaya Street Vendors (Protection of Livelihood and Regulation of Street Vending) Scheme, 2023’ ha ka 25 tarik, Risaw ba la shna hapoh ki kyndon jong ka “Street Vendors (Protection of Livelihood and Regulation of Street Vending) Act, 2014”U Chairman jong ka Town Vending Committee uba long ruh u Chief Executive Officer (CEO) jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) u la ong ba kane ka skhim ka long ban ïada ïa ki nongshong die madan bad ban ithuh da ka aiñ ïa ka kam die jingdie harud surok da kaba ai ïa ka jaka kaba kham kylluid khnang ba ki nongdie madan kin dup lah ban leh ïa ka khaïi k ka pateng.  Kane ka skhim ka long ruh ba pyntreikam haba shit haba shai haba ai ïa ki jaka ban shong die madan, ban pynthikna ba ka jingai jaka kan long khlem kano kano ka jingpynïapher.  Ka skhim ka don ruh ïa ki kyndon kiba ïadei bad ka koit ka khiah bad ka jingshngaiñ ka ban pynthikna na ka bynta ki paidbah.“Ka skhim kan don ruh ïa ki kyndon ban ithuh bad ban pynrung kyrteng ïa ki nongdie madan lyngba ka jingleh ïa ka jingsorjamin da ki Town Vending Committee (TVC), kiba hap hapoh ka jylli treikam jong ki,”ong u Chairman ka Town Vending Committee.Ïa ka jingleh sorjamin yn sa leh da ka Digital Format lyngba ka aplikeshon ban sa shna da ka Sorkar Meghalaya. Ha ka Data ban sa lum jingkheiñ ha ka por ba leh sorjamin yn sa pynrung ïa ki jingtip kiba bniah jong ki nongdie madan bad ïa ki jait jingdie, ïa ka por shong die jingdie, ka rukom die, bad kiwei kiwei.Katkum ki kyndon jong ka skhim, ki nongdie madan harud surok kin sa hap ban pynrung kyrteng ban ïoh ïa ka jingpynithuh, ka jingpynshisha ba ki dei kiba shong basah ha Meghalaya la kumno kumno lai snem, ka jingpynshisha ba  ki dei kiba ju im kamai jakpoh na ka kam die jingdie harud surok ha kajuh ka jaka ne shnong (kumjuh ruh na ka bynta kiba shu die ha ki kali) na ka bynta hynriew bnai kata naduh ka sngi ba la pynmih ïa ka jingpynbna ban leh ïa ka jingsorjamin.Ka jingpynrung kyrteng ïa ki nongdie madan kan long tang na ka bynta san snem. Hadien ba la pynrung kyrteng ïa ki nongdie madan ba dei hok, ka TVC kan sa ai ïa ka Certificate of Vending (CoV) katkum ka jingdon jong ka jaka ban shong die jingdie bad kumjuh ruh yn sa ai ïa ka ID Card sha ki nongdie madan ba la ïoh jingithuh ka ban treikam tang na ka bynta shi snem.Tang ka CoV kan long ka dulir ban pynshisha ïa ka hok jong ki nongdie madan ban shong die jingdie ha ki jaka ba la ithuh.  Ha kajuh ka por, ka Sorkar bad ka TVC kin sa pynkhreh ruh ïa ki City/Town Street Vending Plans ïa kiba yn sa phiah ïa ki jaka die bad ïa ki jaka bym shah shong die madan ha kiba bun ki bynta jong ka nongbah/shnong.“Ka skhim kan long kum ka sakhi ïa ka jingkular jong ka Sorkar ban pynkupbor ïa ki nongseng kam la jong bad ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka imlang ka sahlang.  Kan plie lad ym tang ïa ka khih ka kamai hynrei kan kyntiew ruh ïa ka jingim jong ki nongshong shnong,” la ong u Chairman jong ka Town Vending Committee.
title: HA U NOHPRAH, YN SORJAMIN KA MUNICIPAL ÏA KI JAKA DIE MADAN, HAP PYNBIANG DULIR KI NONGDIE

content: Ka Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IOCL) kaba dei peit ïa ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi lyngba ka ophis jong u Chief General Manager (CGM) Indian Oil ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang bad ki nongsam LPG Cylinder jong ka Khasi bad Jaiñtia Hills District ha ryngkat bad ka jingïatrei lang bad ka ophis jong ka Online Tent Service Centre, Shillong kaba la shimti ban pyntyllun ïa ka jingpynrung kyrteng ïa ki nongïoh jingmyntoi na kane ka skhim ryngkat ka jingïatrei lang bad ki seng treimon sngewbha, ki kynhun bapher bapher, ki seng samla bad ki Society bapher bapher.Ha kane ka jingïalang la ïadon lang ryngkat ruh ki heh nongpynïaid jong ka Indian Oil Corporation Limited kata naduh u D.P Vidyarthi, CGM LPG, Indian Oil bad u Kalyan Nath, u Divisional LPG Sales Head na Guwahati.La pynïaid ïa kane ka jingïalang da ka Sashwati Mudoi kaba long ka Manager LPG Sales hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.  La ïa don lang ruh ki nongsam Gas Cylinder ha ka Jylla kumjuh ruh ki kynhun bapher bapher na baroh ki district jong ka Khasi bad Jaiñtia Hills District.Ha ka jingai jingkren jong u CGM u la ai mynsiem ïa ki seng trei mon sngewbha lyngba ka jingïarap jong u Bah Jubanlang Kharbihkhiew uba long kum uwei u State Mobiliser ïa kane ka skhim baroh kawei.
title: NA KA PMUY YN ÏOH LPG GAS CYLINDER KI KYNTHEI NA KI LONGÏING BADUK

content: Ka ophis Indian Audit and Accounts Department (IAAD) ha Shillong ka la rakhe ïa ka Audit Diwas kaba lai da ki prokram naduh ka 16 haduh ka 24 tarik u Naiwieng 2023.Shibynta jong ka prokram la pynlong ïa ka Panel Discussion halor ka phang “Strengthening the Functioning and Oversight of Local Governance Institutions in Meghalaya” ha ka  22 tarik u Naiwieng 2023 ha kaba ka Kong Patricia Mukhim, Editor “The Shillong Times” bad u Prof S. Umdor, Head, Economics Department, North Eastern Hill University Shillong ki la dei ki nongai jingkren ba kongsan.Nalor kata la pynlong ruh da ka Inter College Quiz Competition bad ka Seminar halor ka phang “Enhancing Accountability through Geo-spatial Technology” ha ka 24 tarik u Naiwieng ba la pynlong ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka North Eastern Space Applications Centre (NESAC), Ka Tnat Kam Haw Haw.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka President jong ka India ka la plié paidbah ïa ka jingrakhe ïa ka Audit Diwas kaba lai ha kylleng ka ri ha ka 16 tarik u Naiwieng 2023 ha ka ophis CAG of India, New Delhi. La rakhe ïa ka Audit Diwas 2023 kum ka dak jong ka histori bad ka jinghiar pateng jong ka kynhun audit ba halor tam jong ka India.Ka sngi ba khatduh jong kane ka jingrakhe kaba shi taïew ha Shillong ka la long ha ophis jong u Pr Accountant General (A&E), Meghalaya Shillong ha ka 24 tarik u Naiwieng 2023ha kaba u Bah C H Kharshiing Pr Accountant General (A&E) bad kaShefali S AndaleebPr Accountant General (Audit) & Director Genaral, Regional Capacity Building and Knowledge Institute Shillong ki la ai jingkren shaphang ka jinglong kyrpang jong kane ka prokram bad ka bynta jong ki kynhun ka CAG ban wanrah jingbahkhlieh katkum ka kamram jong ka kumba la batai ha ka RitiSynshar jong ka ri.Ha ka jingai jingkren shaphang ka bynta jong ka Teknoloji Haw Haw na ka bynta ka roi ka par jong ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi, u Dr S.P. Aggarwal, Director, NESAC u la kren shaphang ki jingjam shakhmat jong ka Indian Space Research Organisation ban pynkylla ïa ka India sha kawei na ki ri ba hakhmat tam ha kine ki kam.U la batai ruh shapahang ki lad ki lynti kiba don ha ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka spatial teknoloji ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ki kam audit. U Dr Dibyajyoti Chutia, Head, GID, NESAC u la kren shaphang ka bynta jong ka Geospatial Teknoloji ba la pynkupbor da ka ICT ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ki kam jong ka Sorkar ha ka thaiñ shateilammihngi katba u Nilay Nishant Scientist-SE, GID, NESAC u la pyni ia ka North East Spatial Data Repository (NeSDR) bad ki atiar jong ka na ka bynta ki kam ka Sorkar bad ki kam peitngor.Ha ka bynta kaba khatduh jong ka inter-College Quiz Competition ba la pynïaid da u Bah Nicholas Jyrwa, u nongpynïaid quiz ba pawnam na ka nongbah, la don ka jingïashim bynta da hynriew tylli ki kynhun kiba la poi sha kane ka bynta kaba khatduh. Ha kaba kut, ka St Anthony’s College ba la mihkhmat da ka Christina Themsingphi A.S. bad u Debashish Kakati ki la long ki lahduh katba ka K L Bajoria College ba la mihkhmat da u Dondor Nongrum bad Kenneth Lalringlien ki la wan ba ar bad u Marbiangdor Syiem bad Aiborlang Marbaniang na ka Shillong Law College ki la wan ba lai.
title: HA SHILLONG RAKHE KA OPHIS IAAD ÏA KA ‘AUDIT DIWAS’ DA KI PROKRAM BAPHER BAPHER

content: Ki Ophisar jong ka ophis Commissioner of Customs (Preventive), Shillong kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka Ministry of Finance, Sorkar India kiba la ïoh jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ba don kawei ka kali kaba wan na Silchar, ha ka jingpynapshrip ki la ïohbat ïa kawei ka kali Tata Punch ha ka jammiet sngi Balang ha Nongmensong, Shillong.Ha ka jingtohkit ïa kiba shong hapoh kane ka kali, ki la len ba kim shym la kit eiei ïa kino kino ki mar kiba long be-aiñ.Hynrei hadien ba la talasi ïa ka kali baroh kawei, la lap haduh 30 tylli ki synduk thep sabon na ki bynta ba shapoh jong ka kali. Ynda la leh test, la pynshisha ba u powder uba la ïoh kurup 370 gram u dei u Heroin.Marmar la kurup noh ïa une u drok uba shongdor kumba 2.59 klur antad.Arngut ki briew ki la shah kem halor kane ka jingïoh kurup ïa u drok bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat.Ka tnat Custom ka la buh hakhmat ïa ka thok ban ïakhun ïa ki kam runar ruser kum ka jingkhaïi tuh ïa ka ksiar, sikret, u drok, ïa ki dkhotmet jong ki mrad khlaw, ïa ki pisa thok, ïa ki tiar thok.  Ka tnat Customs ka ju ïatreilang ryngkat bad kiba bun ki tnat treikam kiba peit ïa ka aiñ ban tem ïa kine ki kam runar.Kino kino ki lah ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ki kam khaïi tuh ha khappud da kaba ai jingtip sha ka tnat Customs.  Ïa ki kyrteng jong ki nongai jingtip yn buh rieh noh, bad kan don ruh ka jingai khusnam, kaba lait na ka jingsiew khajna.
title: 2.59 KLUR U DROK KURUP KI NONGTREI KA CUSTOM NA KA KALI HA NONGMENSONG

content: : Kan long ka sien ka banyngkong eh ba ka Dorbar Shnong kan tei ïa ka jaka kilan met na ka bynta ki heprit bad ïa ki samla khnang ba kin pynbyrngia ïalade ha kaba pyneh dohksah bad pyngngad ka bor jabieng khamtam ha kum kane ka juk ba ka imlang ka sahlang ha kine ki sngi kiba mynta ki la nang sniew shaba palat da ka jingshah pynngop jong ki samla lud ha u drok uba la pynjot ïa kiba bun ki longing longsem.Ïa ka jaka kilan met kaba la ai kyrteng Community Health Park la tei da ka Dorbar Shnong Lawsohtun kum shi bynta ban plie lad ïa ki paidbah nongshong ka shnong Lawsohtun hi baroh kawei ha ka kam kilan met.Ïa kane ka park ban kilan met ka Dorbar Shnong ka la tei da ka jingnoh synñiang pisa jong ki Kontraktor kiba pyntrei ïa ka skhim Jal Jivan Mission ban pynpoi um ha manla ki tyngkong iing.Ha kane ka sngi ba plie paidbah ïa kane ka Health Park la ïa don lang ki nongïalam shnong, ki seng longkmie, ki dkhot ka KSU  bad kumjuh ruh ki samla kynthei bad shynrang jong ka shnong.Ïa kane ka park la khap ribon da u Chief Executive Member jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem uba la long kum u kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingdon lang jong u MLA barim ka Mylliem Constituency u Bah Hamletson Dohling bad kiwei kiwei.Ha kane ka sngi la sam ïa ki jingai sngewbha ïa ki kongsan bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki lai ngut ki Kontraktor kiba pyntrei ïa ka skhim JJM bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki shlem ai jinghikai Cricket bad Football.
title: TEI KA SHNONG LAWSOHTUN DA KA JAKA KILAN MET ÏA KI HEPRIT BAD KI SAMLA SHNONG

content: Ki shipai BSF ka Meghalaya ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la pynpulom ïa ka jingthmu jong ki runar ban khaïi tuh ïa ka shini na u pud u sam jong ka ri India bad ïa kiwei kiwei ki mar khaïi kiba shongdor haduh 11 lak tyngka ïa kiba la thmu ban shalan sha ka ri Bangladesh.Hadien ba la ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat, ki shipai BSF jong ka 200 Battalion ki la pynlong ka jingkhynra ha khapud jong ka Dambukaphal, West Garo Hills District. Ha kane ka jingkhynra ki shipai BSF ki la ïoh kurup 5000 kilo ka shini India ba la thmu khaïi be-aiñ sha Bangladesh.Ha kajuh ka por, ha kawei ka jingkhynra ki shipai BSF jong ka 110 Battalion Meghalaya ki la ïoh khang kdong ïa kawei ka trok Pickup ha khappud Kasinda, East Khasi Hills District, kaba kit ïa ka shini ba la thmu ban khaïi sha ka ri Bangladesh.Ïa kine ki mar khaïi ruh la aiti noh sha ka ophis Custom ban leh ïa kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: KURUP KI BSF ÏA KA SHINI BA SHONGDOR 11 LAK NA KHAPPUD KA MEGHALAYA

content: : Ki dkhot ka Khasi Student Union Mairang Circle, ha ka sngi Palei, kaba dei ruh ka Seng Kut Snem jong ka Seng Khasi ki la leit khang khyrdep ia ki ophis bad ia ki Bank kiba plie ha kane ka sngi.Ka KSU Mairang Circle ha ka por mynstep ka la leit ban khang tala ia ka ophis treikam jong ka Post Office kaba don ha Mairang, kumjuh ruh ki dkhot jong ka KSU Shillong Mihngi Circle ki la leit khang khyrdep ia ka NIFT bad ka NEIAH kiba don ha Mawdiangdiang bad hadien ia ka jingiakynduh ia ki bor ba dei peit la pynsngewthuh ba kin burom ia kane ka sngi khraw jong ka jaidbynriew.Shuh shuh ka KSU Mawlai Circle ruh ka la leit ban khang ia ki ophis bad ki Bank kiba plie khlem da burom shuh ia ki sngi shuti jong ka jylla.
title: KHANG TALA KA KSU ÏA KI OPHIS BAD BANK BA PLIE HA KA SENG KUT SNEM

content: Arngut ki briew ki la mynsaw jur hadien ba kawei ka Scooty kaba ki shong kaba don ia u nombar ML05AB 8875 ka la shah tynrah ha kawei ka kali Bolero kaba don ia u nombar ML04-B 5829 kaba la pynher stet bha.Kane ka la jia ha ka shnong Sohra Rim bad ia kine ki arngut kiba la mynsaw la pynkit noh sha CHC Sohra ban ioh ia ka jingsumar.Tad haduh ka por ba la pynkit sha CHC Sohra, kine ki arngut kim pat pat tip briew satia bad u nongñiah jong ka Bolero u la phet krad na kane ka jaka hadien kane ka jingjia.Kat haduh ba la thoh ia kane ka khubor ym pat lah satia ban ioh jingtip shaphang ka kyrteng bad ka jaka sah jong kine ki arngut kiba la mynsaw.
title: TYNRAH KA BOLERO ÏA KA SCOOTY HA SOHRA RIM, MYNSAW ARNGUT

content: Ka High Command jong ka party National Poeples Party (NPP) ka la ai  ia ka jingmynjur ban pynieng ia ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba long ka MLA jong ka East Shillong Constituency bad ka Myntri jong ka Sorkar jylla ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong parliamentary seat ka ban sa long ha u snem ban sa wan.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Thohdieng u State President jong ka NPP Meghalaya State Unit Bah prestone Tynsong u la iathuh ruh ba ka party kan pynieng biang da ka Agatha K. Sangma na Tura Parliamentary Seat ha kane ka elekhon.Shuh shuh u la kam ruh ba ka NPP kan ioh knieh ia ka Shillong Seat na ka Congress namarba lada ianujor ia ka jingioh vote ha ka elekshon MLA kaba dang shu dep long mynta u snem 2023, ka NPP ka long kaba nyngkong eh ban ioh kham bun ki vote, baar ka UDP bad balai ka Congress bad TMC.Haba kylli, “ngi pdiang sngewbha ia kino kino ki seng saiñpyrthei kiba kloi ban tyrwa ia ka jingiatreilang bad ka NPP ha kane ka elekshon.”Kat haduh mynta, dei tang ka Voice of the People Party kaba ladep pynbna ia u Dr. Ricky J Syngkon kum u kyrtong ban iakhun ia ka elekshon na Shillong Seat. Katba ka UDP kaba iatreilang bad ka HSPDP hapoh ka lama jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) ki dang wad ia u kyrtong monlang ban pyniakhun ia kane ka elekshon na Shillong Seat.
title: LOK SABHA ELECTION: DA KA DR. AMPAREEN NA SHILLONG BAD KA AGATHA NA TURA PYNÏAKHUN KA NPP

content: Ka Seng HYC ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Bah Lahkmen Rymbui, Chairman jong ka Committee on the Welfare of Scheduled Tribe etc, halor ka jingpynkheiñ ki tnad treikam jong ka sorkar pdeng kiba don ha Meghalaya ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingthungkam ia ki trai jylla.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u President jong ka HYC u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem, u la ïathuh bad katkum ka Office Memorandum (OM) ba la pynmih da ka Ministry of Personel, Public Grievances and Pension ha u snem 2005 bad ha u snem 2022, la bthah ba baroh ki ophis sorkar pdeng kidei ban thungkam ym palat ïa ka 50 percent ïa ki trai jylla ha ki tnad treikam jong ka sorkar pdeng kiba don ha ki jylla ba ki ophis ki don na ka bynta ki post Group C bad Group D. “Kane kadei ka OM kaba la pynmih da katei ka tnad treikam jong ka sorkar pdeng kaba la kdew shai ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingthungkam ha ki Group C bad D”, la ong u Nongïalam ka HYC.Kane ka jingthungkam kan long katkum ka jingbun briew ha kine ki jylla. Na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya, na kane ka 50 percent ba la mang, la bhah ruh 44% na ka bynta ki trai ri trai muluk, nangta 5% na ka bynta ki OBC bad 1% na ka bynta ki SC.Hynrei la ju lap ba ki tnad treikam jong ka sorkar pdeng, kum ka NEHU, ka NEIGRIHMS, ki Post Office bad kiwei kiwei imat kim bud ïa kane ka jingbthah na ka sorkar pdeng.Kumta na la liang ka Seng ka ai da ka jingthoh sha u Chairman kane ka Committee jong ka Assembly, namar ba kane ka Committee ka don la ka jong ka bor ban tuklar halor kane, ha kaba ka lah ban khot ne pan jingkheiñ ïa ka jingdon ki nong Meghalaya kiba trei ha kine ki ophis sorkar pdeng ha Meghalaya.  Nangta ka lah ban bthah ïa ka sorkar jylla ban tuklar ïa kane ka kam. U Bah Roy, u la ong ba lada kine ki ophis kim sngap lane ka sorkar jylla ne kane ka Committee kam sngap, ka Seng ka lah ban ïaid ruh sha ka sorkar jylla bad sha ka sorkar pdeng ruh.
title: UJOR KA HYC BA PYNKHEIÑ KI TNAD KA SORKAR PDENG ÏA KA JINGTHUNGKAM HA MEGHALAYA

content: : Ka kynhun Grant Centre for Bhutan bad ka GNH Study ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la wan ïuhkjat ha ophis treikam jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ban ïakynduh ïa u Chief Executive Member (CEM) u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem khnang ban tih bniah halor ka jingtreikam jong ki Autonomous District Council katkum ba la pynkup bor da ka Khyrnit Bahynriew jong ka Riti Synshar ka Ri India.Kine ki nongwad bniah na ka ri Bhutan ki la ïa kynduh ruh ïa u Symbud Lamphang jong ka KHADC u Bah Charles Marngar, ïa ki Executive Member ba kynthup ïa u Fantin J. Lakadong bad ïa u Bah Carness Sohshang.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Pynïaid u la ong ba ha kane ka jingïakynduh kine nongwad bniah na ri Bhutan ki la ïoh jingtip halor ka jingtrei kam jong ka District Council, halor ka Khyrnit Bahynriew bad halor ka synshar ka khadar bad ka rukom bat khyndew bat shyiap.
title: WAD JINGTIP KI SAMLA KA RI BHUTAN ÏA KA SYNSHAR KA KHADAR HA KHADC

content: Ka long kaei kaei kaba pynkyndit thret ïa ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council bad ïa ka Dorbar Shnong Laitkor kiba la lap tyngkreiñ ba uwei u bar jylla u la kamai jem haduh 15 snem kynthih hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Laitkor khlem ka Trading License na ka District Council.La lap ïa kane, hadien ba u Executive Member uba peit ïa ka tnat Trade ka KHADC Bah Gigur Myrthong ryngkat ki Pulit Enforcement ka KHADC bad ki nongkitkam jong ka shnong Laitkor ki la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra Trading License ïa ki dukan bar jylla kiba la jyllei haduh katta katta ha kane ka shnong.Ïa kane ka jingkhynra la sdang na Lad Nongkrem ter ter shaduh sha Kseh Bilat.Ha kane ka jingkhynra Trading License la shem ba bun na ki dukan bar jylla kim don satia ïa ka Trading License bad la don uwei u bar jylla uba la kamai jem la kumba 15 snem ban khaïi beain khlem ka Trading Lisence. Na ka liang jong u Bah Gigur u la bthah ïa ki bar jylla ki bym don ïa ki kot ki sla bad ïa ka Trading License ba kin khang shwa ïa ki dukan jong ki bad ban leit mih sha ka ophis jong ka Council ban ïoh ïa ka laisen khaïi.Ha kane ka jingkhynra la lap ruh ba ki don ki Khasi kiba kam trai ïa ki dukan jong ki bar jylla bad na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Shnong Laitkor ka la byrngem ba kan sa leh da kaba tyngeh bad ban tih bniah haduh ban da lap ïa ka jingshisha la kane ka jingkam trai ka long neem kaba shisha bad kaba shongnia.“Ka jingwan jurip ka long hadien ba ka dorbar shnong ka la pyntip ba ki don ki bar jylla kiba wan khaïi hangne. Ngi la lap katto katne bad ki don ruh kiba shu pynshah kyrteng ha ki Khasi, ïa kata ngim lah ban tip hynrei ka shnong kan hap ban wad bniah,” u la ong.Haba kylli, u la ïathuh ba ki don kumba 20 tylli ki dukan jong ki bar jylla kiba leh ïa ka kam khaïi khlem ka Trading License.“Haba ngi tohkit, ki don ki (bar jylla) kiba pynïaid ïa ka kam khaïi la 15 snem, 16 snem bad ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewsih ba wat ka Dorbar Shnong ruh kam don jingtip. Ngin sa shim ïa ka sienjam ba ngi dei ban leh. Ngi lah batai ba kin wan mih sha ophis bad ngin sa leh ïa kaei kaba donkam,” u la bynrap.Na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Shnong ka la pyntip ruh ba ki don ki bar jylla kiba trei bylla hapoh kane ka shnong bad ki bym pat shim wat ïa ka NoC na ka Dorbar Shnong.“Naduh ba nga la shimti kum u Rangbah Shnong mynta la 4 snem eiei, ngi la pyrshang katba lah ban leh da ka bor jong ka Dorbar Shnong hynrei kine ki briew (bar jylla) kim sngap. Kim pyntip hi ruh wat ïa ka bor jong ka shnong bad ki shu ïakren sop sop tang bad ki trai jaka. Ki shu wai ïa ka jaka bad ki shu trei beit kumto,” la ong u Rangbah Shnong.“Ki don ki nongshong shnong jong ngi kiba ai ïa ki jaka riehtngen ïa kine ki bar jylla bad kiba kam ba ka (kam) jong ki hynrei kaba ngi tip shai ka don ka jingleh Benami. Don ruh kiba buh la ka buh ïa ki bar jylla kum ki nongtrei ha ki karkhana bad kumta ter ter,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ba ka Dorbar Shnong ka la pan jingkheiñ ruh ïa ki kyrteng jong ki nongbylla bar jylla kiba trei ha ki karkhana bad ha kiwei kiwei ki jait kam hapoh pud u sam jong ka shnong.“Hynrei ki (bar jylla) sngap kuman bad kim pyntip eiei.  Hadien ba ngi la shong ïa ka Executive Committee ngi la pyntip sha ka KHADC.  Ngi maham da kaba tyngeh ïa kino kino ki (bar jylla) kiba leh ïa ka khaïi ka pateng hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong kim dei ban ïaid lait na ki bor jong ka shnong. Lada phi (Khasi) donkam ïa ki bar jylla kum ki nongtrei jong phi sngewbha da pyntip sha ka Dorbar Shnong ba ngin ïoh bishar bniah,” la ong shuh shuh u Rangbah Shnong.“Nangne shakhmat phi baroh kiba khaïi pateng hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong kiba buh dukan bad kiba buh karkhana kin sngewbha ban ïatreilang bad ka shnong bad sngewbha wat nym ïaid lait ïa ka bor jong ka shnong namar lada nangne shakhmat phi dang ïaid lait ïa ka bor jong ka shnong lada phim pyntip ïa ka bor shnong ngin khang khyrdep beit,” la maham u Rangbah Shnong.
title: 15 SNEM KAMAI JEM U BAR JYLLA KHLEM LAISEN HA LAIKOR, KAM TRAI KI KHASI ÏA KI DUKAN BAR JYLLA

content: Ka District Council Affairs (DCA) jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka ladep thaw ïa ka Komiti ba la kynthup lang ïa ka tnat PWD bad ki lai tylli ki Autonomous District Council jong ka Khasi, Jaiñtia bad Garo ban pynbeit ryntih ïa ka jingdon jong ki khyrdop khrong khajna hapoh ki jylli treikam jong ki District Council ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, ka Meghalaya Truck Owner Association (MTOA) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la ïakynduh ïa u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem ban pynsngew halor ka jingbun shaba palat jong ki khyrdop khrong khajna.“Kum ka seng ngi la ïaid naduh u snem 2019 ban pynsngew ïa ki CEM barim jong ka Council ban siew khajna na ki trok sha ki khyrdop khrong khajna jong ka Council. Ki don katto katne ki jingpynibor jong ki nonglum khajna ïa ki nongñiah trok bad u CEM ka KHADC hadien ba u la ïohi ïa kine ki jingjia ha ki lad pathai khubor u la khot ïakren ïa ngi. Ngi la pynsngew ha u CEM ba ngim lah shuh ban dang siew khajna ïa ki khyrdop ba ki la bun shaba palat,” la ong u President ka MTOA u Bah Moslander Marngar ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.U la pyntip ruh ba u CEM ka KHADC u la ïathuh ba ym pat lah ong katno tylli ki khyrdop khrong khajna kiba be-ain bad kiba la ïoh jingbit.  “U CEM u la ïathuh ba u la phah ïa ka Working Plan sha ka Sorkar bad haduh mynta kim pat ïoh ïa ka jingmynjur na ka Sorkar,” la ong u Bah Marngar.U la ïathuh ba ki khyrdop lum khajna ka KHADC kim map wat ïa ki kali kiba kit ïa ki dieng thang ban shet ja sngi ha ki skul.“Dang mynshisngi, ngi hap ban tuklar da ma ngi ki nongïalam, wat ïa ka trok kit khaw kaba wan na Assam kaba wan lyngba ka surok Rani ruh kim (nongkhrong khajna) map. Ki pynieng bad ngi ki nongïalam ngi hap ban pynsngew bad ban ïakren. U CEM hi u la pynshai ba ka Ophis kam shym la bthah eiei ruh em ban leh kumta hynrei ki la shu ïa leh katba mon da ki nongwai khyrdop,” u la ong shuh shuh.“Ka jingwan shibun ki khyrdop khrong khajna, kiba shu khrong naphang na ngi ki trai jylla, ka wanrah jingeh ïa ka kamai jong ngi bad ka wanrah jingeh ïa ki paidbah. Lada don ki khyrdop khrong khajna tang 10 tylli, ngi hap ot na ka bai kali, na ki mahajon bad mano ba jynjar, un jynjar hi u paidbah,” u la bynrap.
title: UJOR KA MTOA SHA KA KHADC BA JYLLEI KI KHYRDOP KHRONG KHAJNA KUM KI TIT

content: : Ka Meghalaya ASHA Worker Union (MAWU) kaba la ïakhih da kaba sangeh treikam mynta la lai taiew tam namar ka jingmynthi jong ka Sorkar Jylla ïa ki mat jingdawa, ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la shim ïa ka rai ban pynkut noh ïa ki jingïakhih bad ban leit phai biang ki kam ki jam ba ki ju trei baroh shikatta.Ïa kane ka rai ki ASHA ki la shim ha ka jingïalang jong ka Executive Committee.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ka President jong ka MAWU ka Kong Mirajune Myrsing ka la ïathuh ba ha ka jingïalang da kawei ka sur la rai ban leit phai biang sha ki kam ba ki ju trei baroh shikatta bad ka la pyntip ruh ba ki la weng ïa ka jingïakhih kaba la thmu ban pynlong ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla dang shen ka la rai ban pynkiew ïa ka Fixed Incentive jong ki nongtrei ASHA na ka T. 2000 sha ka T. 3000 hapoh ka skhim ba thymmai kaba la tip kum ka Community Based Health Incentive Scheme (CBHIS) na ka bynta ki nongtrei ASHA.Ïa kane ka rai la shim ha ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid da ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong ki heh ophisar ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah bad ki nongïalam ka Meghalaya ASHA Workers’ Union ha Main Secretariat, Shillong.Hapoh kane ka skhim, ki Village Health Council (VHC) ba la khlieh da ki Rangbah Shnong ha ki shnong bapher bapher kin kitkhlieh ban bishar bad ban kheiñ ban diah ïa ka jingtreikam jong ki ASHA ha kaba pyndep ïa ki kam jong ka koit ka khiah.Ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah la pyntip ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma u la mynjur ba yn siew tam sa T. 1000 bad ban kheiñ lang ïa ka jingsiew kaba T.2 hajar ka Fixed Incentive na ka Sorkar Jylla.
title: WENG KI ASHA ÏA KA JINGÏAKHIH, YN LEIT BIANG SHA KI KAM

content: : Ïa ka met ba dang sah jong u Bah Standlington David Khongwir, la tep donburom ha ka sngi Thohdieng hapdeng ka jingleh burom kaba la pynjaw ummat ia kiba la sakhi lang kane ka sngi.Hadien ka jingleh burom ha ing, ka Mawlai Town Durbar ka la shimti ban leh burom ha Basketball Court jong ka shnong Mawlai Nonglum ia une u MLA uba nyngkong eh jong ka Mawlai Constituency u Bah SD Khongwir.Ha kane ka jingïalang leh burom ïa u Bah SD Khongwir ki nongïalam shnong, ki riewrangbah bad ki riew paidbah ki la wan ban leh burom khatduh ïa une u nongïalam.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ka jingkren na u MLA ka Mawlai u Bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang, u MDC u Bah Teiborlang Pathaw, u President ka Mawlai Town Durbar bad kiwei kiwei.Ki nongkren ba pher ba pher ha kane ka sngi ki la niew tang ïa ki katto katne ki kam radbah kiba une u nongïalam ki la ieh shadien bad kiba ïai long ki sakhi ïa ki matti jong u.Hadien ba la dep ïa ka jingleh burom la rah noh sha lum jingtep jong ka Balang Presbyterian Nonglum ban tep don burom ïa u Bah SD Khongwir.Na ka liang jong ka UDP hapoh ka jingialam u Working President u Paul Lyngdoh ruh u buh syntiew bad pynpaw ka jngsngewlem.Na ka liang ka Shnong Mawlai Nonglum u Secretary jong ka Shnong, u la ïathuh ba dei ha ka por ba long MLA bad Deputy Chief Minister i Bah SD Khongwir ba la weng noh ïa ka Pata System lane kata ka aiñ iadie iathied khyndew kaba don hapdeng ki Khasi kaba ki nongthied kim ju ïoh syndon ïa ka jaka, hynrei ki shu ïoh tang ki nongshongwai bad ki nongpyndonkam ïa ka jaka.Ka Shnong ka la pynkynmaw ruh ba ka kyntien Rangbah Shnong ruh ka dei ka jingai jingmut jong i, ha ka por ba i shimti kum u Rangbah Shnong, ha kaba mynshuwa ïa u Rangbah Shnong la ju ong kum u Tymmen Shnong bad ïa kane ka jingai jingmut jong i la pdiang bad pyndonkam ruh ha baroh kawei ka Ri Khasi Jaiñtia da ka kyntien Rangbah Shnong. I la ïathuh ba u Bah Khongwir, udei ruh u nongïalehkai Sports uba tbit khamtam ha Shot Put ha kaba u bat ïa ka record jong ka Mawlai haduh mynta. U long ruh u nongïalehkai Phutbol kum u nongap kol uba tbit.La ïoh ruh ïa ka jingkren na iwei na ki Ksiew kynthei jong i, iba la ïathuh ba u Paieit jong i, u long u briew uba ieit ïa ki jingrwai bad u ju pyllut por bad ki ksiew ban sngap jingrwai.La ïoh ruh artylli ki jingrwai na ki Ksiew kiba dei ki jingrwai ba i Bah Standling i ju sngewtynnad ban sngap.
title: HAPDENG KI JINGJAW UMMAT LA TEP DON BUROM ÏA U BAH SD KHONGWIR MLA BANYNGKONG KA MAWLAI

content: : Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka la pyntip ka la phah da ka Legal Notice sha u nongialam jong ka Seiñ Raij Jowai u Bah Chandalok Dkhar halor ka jingkren be-ain pyrshah ia ki District Council bad ia ki MDC.“Mynta ka sngi u Secretary jong ka Executive Committee u la phah da ka Legal Notice sha u Bah Chandalok ban dawa ban pynshai halor ka jingkren jong u,” la ong u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka KHADC u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Thohdieng.U la pyntip ba u Bah Chandalok Dkhar u dei u Chairman jong ka Arts Committee jong ka Seiñ Raij Jowai ha kaba u CEM u la kam ba une u rangbah ha ka sngi rakhe Seng Kut Snem ka Seng Khasi Kmie ula ong ba dei ban pynduh noh ia ki District Council namarba kim lah ban pynneh ia ka riti dustur.“Ha Meghalaya ki don lai tylli ki District Council, u thew ia kano ka District Council ka bym lah ban tip hynrei ban shu thew kyllum lang ia baroh ki District Council ba kim treikam, ka long kaei kaei kaba bakla bad kaba ngim lah ban pdiang,” la ong u Bah Pyniaid.“Namarkata nga kyntu ia une u rangbah ba u dei ban pynshai halor kane ka nongrim ba u la kren ban kynthup lang ia ngi baroh. Phi dei ban pynthikna, kiei kita ki District Council kiba pynduh ia ka riti dustur bad kino kita ki District Council ki bym bit bym biang,” u la ong bad bynrap, “lada kim don ki District Council, shaei ki nongsynshar, ki Syiem, ki Doloi, shaei ki nong synshar raid, ki rangbah shnong, ki doloi kin poi.”“Peit mynta ka Hima Khyriem bad Hima Mylliem, kiba dang bat ia ka niam ka rukom, lada ym don ka District Council 70 snem mynshwa ki la duh noh namar ngim ioh ia ka aiñ jingiada ba kyrpang ha ka riti synshar ka Ri India ban pynneh” ula ong.Halor ka jingkynnoh bamsap, u CEM la ong ba um lah ban pdiang.  “Une u rangbah u kren iano ruh ngim tip, u shu kynnoh lut ia baroh ki MDC bad ia kane hi daleilei ngim lah ban pdiang namar kane ka la pynhiar kyrdan ia baroh ki MDC hapoh Meghalaya” u la ong.
title: DA KA LEGAL NOTICE PAN JINGPYNSHAI KA KHADC ÏA U NONGÏALAM KA SEIÑ RAIJ, JOWAI

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) East Jaiñtia Hills District Unit ha ka sngi baar ka la kyrpad ia u Branch Manager jong ka State Bank of India (SBI) Ladrymbai Branch ba un pynshai bad pynsngewthuh ia ki paidbah hadien ba ka seng ka la ioh jingujor halor ka jingshah thok bad shah pynngop ha ka kam pisa da kaba kular ban ai nong shibun tang da ka jingsiew pisa kaba rit lyngba ki Kompeni ne ki Online Gaming, Online Trading kiba thok.Ka seng hapoh ka jingialam jong u Asst Secretary u samla Pynshai Kupar Dkhar bad ki la iakynduh ia u Branch Manager jong ka SBI Ladrymbai ban iatrei lang bad ka seng da kaba pynlong ia ki jingpynshai paidbah halor kine ki jingshah pynngop jong ki paidbah ba luilui ka East Jaiñtia Hills District ba kynthup naduh ki khynnah skul, ki samla pule kolej, ki longkmie bad ki rangbah.“Khnang ba kin lait na ki jingshah pynbiej ha ki kompeni, Online Earning Apps lane ki briew ba kular ban pynioh nong shiphew shah na ka jingpynlut ba khyndiat, u Branch Manager u la pdiang sngewbha ia ka jingtyrwa jong ka seng bad kular ruh ban iasnohkti lang bad ka seng ban ai jinghikai ia ki paidbah ban lait na ki riew shim kabu kiba kwah ban bam pisa ei khlem da pynmih syep ia ka pisa jong u paidbah,” la ong u kyrwoh na ka seng.Ka KSU ka kyntu ruh kumjuh ia ki paidbah ban long kiba husiar bha ia kino kino ki jait kompeni lane ia kino kino ki briew kiba khroh ia ki ban kamai suk.
title: BAN LAIT NA KA SHAH THOK PISA, PAN JINGIATREILANG KA KSU ÏA KA SBI LADRYMBAI

content: CHANDAME SUNGOH, CHAIRMAN HYNÑIEWTREP BORDER DISPUTED REDRESSAL FORUMNga ngeit baroh na ngi ngim pat klet ïa ka jingjia kaba sngewngiew bad kaba sngewsih ba ha ka step jong ka 22 tarik, Naiwieng 2022 haba san ngut ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Mukroh ki shah siat ïap im im peit peit ha ki Forest Guard bad Pulit Assam. Kiba tip kyrteng kum, u Tal Nartiang, u Thal Shadap, u Six Talang, u Shirup Sumer bad u Si Dhar. Nga ngeit kito ki paralok parajor ki bym ïoh lad ban leit peit ha kane ka jaka ba jia ruh kim dam hi ban ïapeit ha ki Mobile jong ki lyngba ki Social Media bad ruh ki lad pathai khubor ba pher bapher. Ngim lah shisha khlem da lung mynsiem bad pait dohnud ba ki san ngut ki paradoh parasnam jong ngi ki duh ïa la ka jingim.Tang hadien khyndiat kynta la wan poi nyngkong ki Pulit kiba la leh ïa la ka kamram ban peit ban sylli ban ban phah leh ïa ka post-mortem, ki heh sorkar kum u MLA jong ka thaiñ u Nujorki Sungoh u Home Minister u Lahkmen Rymbui bad kiwei kiwei de nangta sa ki sengbhalang bapher bapher bad ki ruh sa ki riew paitbah ki pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew dom sngew bitar bad ka jingpynrem jur ïa ki Pulit Assam bad ruh ka jingsngewlem ïa kito ki mynsiem ba la khlad noh bad ïa ki bahaiing hasem jong ki.Kum ka jingïarap ïa ka longïing jong kito kiba la khlad, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la ai sanlak tyngka uwei uwei kumba juh long hi ka rukom ba ka Sorkar ka ai bailutsan. Ka sorkar Assam ruh ka kloi ban ai hynrei ka shnong bad ki bahaïing hasem jong kine ki lanot kim treh ban pdiang. Nangta ki don ruh sa kiwei kiwei de ki kynhun kiba ai sngewbha katkum ka jingkotbor jong ki.Ban lap ïa ka daw tynrai bad ïa ki jingshisha jong kane ka jingjia ki Human Right Commission jong ki ar sorkar ka Assam bad Meghalaya ki thung hi ïa la ka jong ka Inquiry Commission ban tohkit halor kane. Na ka liang ka Meghalaya la lam khmat da u nongbishar ba la shong thait u Justice C. Vaiphei bad na ka liang ka Assam pat da ka nongbishar ka Kumi Rani Phukan Ha ka jingshisha, ïa kawei ka Case dei ban don tang kawei ka Commission lane tang kawei ka kynhun tohkit, hynrei dei namarba kane ka jaka kaba don hapdeng ka jingïakajia namar ka jingkam jubor jong ka Assam ki ar Sorkar ki thung hi ïa la ka jong ka jong ka Commission bad pynksan hi ia la ka jong ka jong ka nia.Kumta kane ka kam,  kam shym la poi shaei shaei bad kine ki lanot kim pat ïoh satia ïa ka hok jong ki. Kumba ngi la ïoh-i ha ki lad pathai khubor ba ki ki ar Chief Ministers, Assam Meghalaya ki la rai ban aiti noh ïa ka jingtohkit da ka Central Bureau of Investigation lane kata ka CBI hynrei kane ruh imat kam poi shaei shaei  bad imat kine ki lanot ki dang slem bha ban ïoh ïa ka hok jong ki.Ngam kwah ban tih jylliew ïa ki daw  jong kane ka jingkynad namar ba ka Case hi ruh ka dang ïaid sha khmat hynrei tang tiak nga kwah ban ong khyndiat ïa ka daw tynrai jong kane ka jingjia:Katkum ka jingkam jong ka Assam kumba ngi shait ïoh-i bad ïoh sngew ha ki lad pathai khubor ka ong ba kane ka jingjia ka mih na ka daw jong ka jingwan tuh wan lute dieng ki nong Mukroh napoh  Karbi Anglong Assam. Ka shnong Mukroh bad kane jaka ïakajia ka dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Assam. Ka jingsiat jong ki pulit Assam ka dei na ka bynta ban ïada ïalade namar ba ki nong Mukroh ki la sdang ban kerkut bad ban thombor ïa ki da ki wait ki dieng. Hynrei na ka liang jong ka Commission jong ka sorkar Meghalaya pat ngim pat ïoh ïa ka jingtip kaba shai.Katkum ka jingtip jong nga pat, ka daw tynrai jong kane ka jingjia ka dei na ka daw jong ka jingkyntur pud bad jingkam jubor jong ka West Karbi Anglong Assam shapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong Mukroh.  Kane ka jingleh jong ka sorkar Assam ka pynbitar ïa ki pait nongshong shnong jong kane shnong.  Ka wan buh ruh ïa ka Forest Check Gate jong ka hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong. Bad wei ba la leit trei leit ktah, leit kit leit bah ïa kino kino ki mar ki mata sha palat jong kane ka Check-Gate ka Assam ka la kynnoh beit ba ki wan tuh wan lute napoh Karbi Anglong Assam.  Ki bapli ki Mukroh ruh lada kim leit trei leit ktah leit rep leit riang leit tong um leit thohdieng hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong kin leit shaei? Kum kane ka jingjia ka ju jia ym tang ha ka shnong Mukroh hynrei sha kiwei pat ki jaka kum sha Khanduli Lapangap ruh kajuh hi.Haba nga peit ïa kito ki dieng kiba don hapoh jong kato ka trok kaba don ha ka jaka  bad ka por ba ki shah siat, nga ïoh-i tang ki dieng rit, ki dieng ngan bad dieng sning kiba kdor kim dei ki dieng kiba  bha bad ki remdor lymne kim dei ki dieng supply.  La sngewthuh ba ki nong Mukroh ki kit tang ban pyndonkam ïalade ban shna ïing shna sem. Kumta, ka jingkynnoh jong ka Forest Assam ka long tang ban ïohdong ïohdaw ban pynrem ïa ki briew jong ngi.Na ka daw ka jingbymlah jong ka sorkar bad ka District Council bad ïada bad ban pyntikna ïa u pud u sam tang katkum ka Notification 13 April, 1951 ba la pynmih da ka sorkar Assam hi ka wanrah shibun ki jingeh ïa ki pait nongshong shnong kiba don ha shilynter ki jaka khappud. Balei nga ong kumta, namarba lada ngi peit kat kum ka Notification 13 April, 1951 ka shnong Mukroh bad ka area shnong jong ki ka dang hap pura hapoh u pud u sam jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad jong ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council. Hynrei na ka daw ka jingkheiñ sting bad jingleh klet jong ka sorkar Meghalaya ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council bad ka jylla Assam ka ïoh ban kamtrai bad leh jubor ïa ki briew jong ngi.Lada ngi phai sha ki por kiba ladep kata ha ka snem 2002 ka Mukroh ka la duh ruh ïa ki san ngut ki briew ha ki ktang suloi jong ki lehnoh Karbi kiba lah ban tip kyrteng u Dia Myrten, u Wen Samaiang, u Sngaid ( kyrteng sin) Hasem, u Trevor Talang, u Phun Hasem, u Dik Sumer bad u Tdan (kyrteng sin) Shadap. Kine ruh ki shah siat ïap im im peit peit ha ki lehnoh Karbi katba ki dang rep lyngkha sha ki thaiñ Umlaphiah  kham sharum jong ka shnong Mukroh. La ong ruh ba ïa u Tdan( kyrteng sin) Shadap ki pynïap da ka rukom kaba sngew sangsot bha, kata da kaba shu tep im bad u bapli u ïap da ka jingïap kaba sngew kordit bha.  Ym tang kine, hapoh kine ki khadsan arphew snem ngi la duh shibun ki mynsiem briew na ka daw jong u pud u sam, kum ban pynkynmaw ba ha ka 14 tarik Jymmang 2010 ruh ngi laduh saw ngut ki riew rangbah ha ka thaiñ Langpih kiba tip kyrteng kum u Columbus Hoojon, u Denish Nongsiej, u Ekros Rani bad u Charles Lyngkhoi kine ki shah siat ïap ha ki ktang suloi jong ki Pulit Assam.Lada ngi pyrkhat bad puson bha katno ka long kaba sngew sangsot ia ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew jong ngi. Kat kine ki mynsiem briew kiba ngi la duh ruh ka Sorkar kam da shimkhia than ban pynbeit ïa u pud u sam ha ka rukom kaba dei  bad ban ai ka jing ïada kaba pura ïa ki paid nongshong shnong kiba don ha ki thaiñ khappud.Kumta, ka ladei ka por ba ngi kum ki pait nongshong shnong jong ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep Trep  ba ngin kyndit bynriew noh, ban long kiba ïa tylli ïa ryntih bad kiba sngewkhia bad kiba kloi ban ïeng ïada ia la u pud u sam ka khyndew ka shyiap ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew. Ngim dei ban shu shaniah tang ha ka sorkar namarba ngi ïohi ba ka sorkar jong ngi ka dei kaba tlot bad kaba khawpud.Hadien kato ka jingjia ha Mukroh ka Sorkar ka la ong  ba dei ban pynkynriah lane pynduh pyndam noh ïa ka Forest Check-gate  jong ka Assam kaba don hangto, hynrei kane kam poi shaei shaei ruh, ka long pynban kum ka jingkyrkhu ïa ka ne ka Check gate ha kaba mynta ki la shna da ka Building kaba kham skhem kham bha bad ka kynroh kaba jrong bad shkem bha. Hynrei na ka liang jong ngi pat, tang ïa ka Police Outpost ba dei ban buh ha Mukroh ruh la pynkynriah pynban shaduh sha Barato.Kane ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar ka long kaba pynduh jingkyrmen shibun ïa ngi ki paid nongshong shnong kiba shong sha ki thaiñ khappud.  Hynrei kum ki samla ki  rangbah kynthei bad shynrang kiba don jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ka imlang sahlang ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew ngim dei ban tieng lymne  randien hynrei to ngin long kiba shlur bad kiba len lade.Ngi ïoh ban imsuk im saiñ mynta da ka jingïaleh jong ki kpa tymmen jong ngi, ngi ruh ngi dei ban ïeng ïaleh mynta khnang ban imsuk imsaiñ ki longdien jong ngi.
title: DAP SHISNEM KA JINGSHAH SIAT KI PNAR HA MUKROH

content: Kumba ju long manla u snem ban bha ka kamai kajih ha Iewduh bad ruh ban bha ka synshar ka khadar, ka Raid Mylliem ha ka sngi baar ka la pynlong ia ka lehniam Iewduh ha khlieh iewduh da kaba la sdang ia ka duwai ka phirat ha u nongbuh nongthaw ban bha ka kamai ka kajih jong ki nongshong iew ha Iewduh kaba dei kawei na ki kad khaii kaba heh tam hapoh kane ka jylla, ia kaba la ju tip ruh kum ka pliang ja ka Ri Khasi.Hadien ba la pyndep ia ka duwai phirat, la ot shwa ia u syiar ryngkuh ban lehniam bad la pynbud pat sa da kaba pom ia ki ar tylli ki blang shynrang ban bit ban biang ki khun ki hajar jong ka Raid bad kumjuh ruh jong ka Hima Mylliem hi baroh kawei .Ha kane ka lehniam la pom lai tylli ki blang, ar tylli ki syiar bad uwei u sniang da ka jingsakhi lang jong u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem u Paiem Ainam Manik Syiem ryngkat ki Myntri bad ki Bakhraw jong Hima.Hadien ba ladep ka lehniam na khlieh iewduh jong ka Raid Mylliem la pynbud pat sa ka jingpom ia ka blang kynthei bad ka kñia ka khriam ha Basa Tympew da ka jingsakhi lang ki khun ki hajar jong ka Raid Mylliem.Ia kane ka lehniam jong ka raid Mylliem la pyniaid da u Lyngdoh jong ka Raid ryngkat bad u Lyngskor lyngba u Myntri Sohtun jong ka Hima Mylliem lem bad u Kharkongor uba shim ia ka bynta ban ot ia ki syiar bad ia ki blang.
title: HAP KI KHLIEH U ‘LANG SHYNRANG HA JAKA LEHNIAM KA RAID MYLLIEM BAN BHA KA KAMAI KAJIH HA ÏEWDUH

content: : Saw tylli ki projek hapoh ka skhim Pilgrimage Rejuvenation And Spiritual Augmentation Drive (PRASAD) na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya ki dei kiba la pyllait ha ka International Tourism Mart kaba 11, kiba kynthup ia ka jingkyntiew ia ki jingdon jingem na ka bynta ki nongleit pilkrim sha ka iingmane jong ka Balang Presbyterian ha Nongsawlia, Nartiang Shakti Peeth, ka pung Aitnar bad ka Charantala Kali Temple.Ia ka International Tourism Mart kaba 11 la plie ha nongbah Shillong da u Myntri Khynnah jong ka Sorkar Pdeng uba khmih ia ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei u Shripad Yesso Naik ha ka jingiadonlang u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma.Hapoh ka skhim PRASAD ka tnat Jngohkai Pyrthei jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la mang 8 tylli ki projek kaba kot T. 256.45 klur na ka bynta ka jingkyntiew ia ki jaka leit pilkrim ba la ithuh ha ki jylla ka thain Shatei Lammihngi.Ka Durga Temple ha Nartiang ka dei ka jaka kaba khring bha ia ki briew kiba leit jngoh ia ka deiriti ha Jaintia Hills bad kane ka don hajan ka jaka kaba bun bha ki mawbynna.Ka iingmane jong ka Balang Presbyterian ha Nongsawlia, ka dei kaba la shna ha u snem 1846 da u Thomas Jones, ka long kawei na ki iingmane ba la rim tam ha ka thain Shatei Lammihngi jong ka ri.Ka pung Aitnar ka dei ka bynta ba kongsan jong ka lehniam Behdienkhlam, ka jinglehniam kaba heh tam jong ki Pnar.Ka Charantala Temple ha West Garo Hills ka dei ka jaka mane kaba kongsan na ka bynta ki jaitbynriew Hajong bad ki Koch ha ka thain bad kane ka jaka ka khring ruh ia bun ki briew kiba nabar.Ka Sorkar India ka la plie ia ka skhim PRASAD ha u snem 2014-2015 hapoh ka rnat Jngohkai Pyrthei.Kane ka skhim ka phaikhmat ban kyntiew bad ithuh ia ki jaka leit pilkrim ha kylleng ka ri ban kyntiew ia ki kam jngoh kai kiba iadei bad ka niam.  Ka thmu ban pyniasoh ia ki jaka leit pilkrim ha ka rukom kaba la pynkhreh bha bad kaba lah ban iaineh kaba don lut ki jingshakri na ka bynta ki nongjngoh kai. Ka jingkiew ki kam jngoh kai ha ka thain ka shong ha ki kam jngoh kai kiba iadei bad ka jingleit pilkrim.U Myntri Rangbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka jingialang plie u la pynpaw ka jingkmen ba ka nongbah Shillong ka ioh ban pynlong ia ka International Tourism Mart ha ka sien kaba ar.U la ong ba ka Sorkar India, hapoh ka jingialam jong u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi, ka la bteng ban pynthikna ba ka thain Shatei Lammihngi ka kiew ryngkat bad ka ri baroh kawei da kaba plié lut ia ki lad kiba don ha ki kam bapher bapher ka ban wanrah ia ka lawei bad ka ioh ka kot kaba kham bha ia ka thain.U la pynpaw ruh ba ka International Tourism Mart ka la long kaba kongsan ban plié ia ki lad kiba don ha ka thain Shatei Lammihngi kiba iadei bad ki kam jngohkai, da kaba pyni ia ka deiriti ba kyrpang jong ka thain, ka pateng, ki dustur tynrai bad ki tiar bad ka long ka jaka pdeng ha kaba kito kiba don bynta ha ki kam jngohkai ki lah ban pyniasoh bad ki nongthied kiba nabar ri bad kumjuh ruh na ka ri.
title: 4 TYLLI KI PROJEK HA MEGHALAYA MANG KA SORKAR PDENG HAPOH KA SKHIM PRASAD

content: : Ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la rai ban pynkiew ïa ka Fixed Incentive jong ki nongtrei ASHA na ka T. 2000 sha ka T. 3000 hapoh ka skhim ba thymmai kaba la tip kum ka Community Based Health Incentive Scheme (CBHIS) na ka bynta ki nongtrei ASHA.Ïa kane ka rai la shim ha ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid da ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong heh ophisar ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ha ka sngi Balang bad ki nongïalam ka Meghalaya ASHA Workers’ Union ha Main Secretariat, Shillong.Ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka la pyntip ba ka Sorkar ka la pynlut kumba T. 17 klur ha ka shi snem ban siew ïa ka Fixed incentives kaba T. 2000 shi bnai kum ka Honorarium ba la ai sha ki ASHA nalor na kaba pynlut sa kumba T. 22 – 23 klur na ka NHM kum ka Performance-based Incentives.Ka Fixed Incentives na ka bynta ki ASHA la pyntreikam ha u Ïaiong, 2021 namar kumba 70 % ki shnong ha Meghalaya ki dei kiba don ïa ki nongshong shnong kiba duna bad namarkata ban wanrah ïa ka jingïaryngkat ha ka rukom siew ïa ka bainong sha ki ASHA, ka Jylla ka la pyntreikam da ka Fixed Incentices System.Hapoh kane ka skhim ki Village Health Councils (VHC) ba la khlieh da ki Rangbah Shnong ha ki shnong bapher bapher kin kitkhlieh ban bishar bad ban khein ban diah ïa ka jingtreikam jong ki ASHA ha kaba pyndep ïa ki kam jong ka koit ka khiah.Ka la pyntip ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma u la mynjur ba yn sa siew tam sa T. 1000 bad ban kheiñ lang ïa ka jingsiew kaba T.2 hajar ka Fixed Incentive na ka Sorkar Jylla.Hapoh kane ka skhim ba thymmai, ka jingbishar ïa ka jingsiew bainong ïa ki ASHA, yn pynshong nongrim katkum ka jingtrei jong ki ASHA ryngkat bad ki VHC, ki nongtrei na ki PHC/CHC/Sub-center khnang ban pynjanai ïa ka jingtreikam ha ki shnong ki thaw.Kine ki kynthup, ban trei shitom ban ïada ïa ka jingim jong ki longkmie bad ki khynnah, ban peit bad ban phah ïa ki NCD Cases, ban pynthikna ba shispah na ka shispah ban pynïoh injek tika ïa ki khunlung ba dang shu kha haduh shi snem bad ban  pynthikna shispah na ka shispah ban pyntreikam ïa ka ANC Coverage na ka bynta ki longkmie ba armet bad kiwei kiwei.La pyntip ruh ba kan sa don ka Committee ban pynbeit ïa kane ka skhim ba thymmai, kata ka Community Based Health Incentive Scheme for ASHA.Ka Committee kan kynthup ïa kawei ka ASHA kaba mihkhmat na kawei ka district, u nongmihkhmat na ka VHC na kawei ka district, ki ophisar ka NHM, bad ki ophisar ka Sorkar Jylla. Ka Committee kan sa peit ruh ïa ki jingpynsngew ba la buh da ki ASHA ha ka jingïalang kaba la long mynta ka sngi.U Principal Secretary jong ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah u Sampath Kumar u la ïaiban ba ka Jylla ka ladep shimkhia ïa ka jingpynsngew jong ki ASHA.  U la ong ba ka Jylla ka la trei khlem shongthait ban sngap ïa ki jingeh ba la ïakynduh da ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah. Ka Jylla ka la buh eh hakhmat ïa ki ASHA ban siew ïa ka bainong bad ban kiar katba lah ban pynslem ïa ka jingsiew bainong.Shuh shuh u la ong ka thong ka long ba ym dei ban klet ban ïada ïa ki jingim.U la pyntip, khnang ban pynthikna ba ki ASHA kim ym khia palat ka kam, ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah dang shen ka la pynmih ïa ka ‘Executive Order” kaba batai shaphang ka kamram jong ki Medical Officer, Mid Level Health Care Provider bad ki ANM ha manla ki jaka ba don ki shlem ai jingmut na ka bynta ban leit jngoh khah khah ïa ki shnong bad ban pynjan ïa ka jingshakri sha ki paidbah.
title: DA KA CBHI SCHEME KABA T. 1000 ÏA KI ASHA PYNTREIKAM KA SORKAR JYLLA

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ha ka sngi balang ka la teh da ki Banner bad ki Poster ha kylleng ki bynta ka sor Shillong ban pynkynmaw ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba la ialam da ka Nationa People’s Party (NPP) ba kan shimkhia ban pynioh ia ka hok jong ki san ngut ki Khasi-Pnar kiba la duhei ia la ka jong ka jingim ha ka 22 tarik u Naiwieng, 2022 ha ka jingshah synreit kuli ha ki nongap pahara khlaw bad ki Pulit ka Jylla Assam ha ka shnong Mukroh, West Jaiñtia Hills District.Ki san ngut ki Khasi-Pnar kiba la duhei ia la ka jong ka jingim ki long u Tal Nartiang, u Thal Shadap, u Six Talang, u Shirup Sumer bad u Si Dhar.Ka Sorkar Assam bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya ha ka 30 tarik u Nailur, 2023 ki la rai ban aiti ia ka jingtohkit ia ka jingjia ha Mukroh sha ka Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI). Ia ki Judicial Commission ba la thaw da ki ar tylli ki Sorkar Jylla ban tohkit halor kane ka jingjia la pynkut noh shisyndon hadien ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Meghalaya u Conrad K. Sangma ki la iakynduh ban iakren ia pynbeit ia u pud u sam ha Khanapara.Ki jaka kiba ka KSU ka la wah ia ki Banner ki long ha Secretariat bad ha Khyndai Lad ha kaba ki Pulit ki la weng noh tang hapoh khyndiat por.  Kiwei pat ki jaka ki long hakhmat u durmot jong u Kiang Nangbah, ha Motphran, Laitumkhrah bad ha GolfLinks.Hadien ba ki Pulit ki la weng ia ki Banner, ka KSU hapoh ka jingialam jong u General Secretary u samla Donald V. Thabah ki la leit teh biang ha ka wat kaba ar ha Khyndai Lad bad hakhmat ka ophis jong ka Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills.“Mynta u snem ngi leh ia ka Poster bad Banner Campaign ka dei ka jingkynmaw bad ka jingai burom ia ki san ngut kiba la aiti ia la ka jong ka jingim na ka bynta ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew. Kane ka long ban pynkynmaw ia ki paradoh parasnam ba ka jaidbynriew jong ngi ka don ha tmier ka riat bad ha kano kano ka por ngi lah ban shah thombor. Ngi la iohi ia kaei kaba jia ha Langpih, ha Madan Umwang, hajan Block-I bad ha Lapangap bad ngi pynsngewthuh ia ki (paradoh parasnam) ba ngi dei ban long kiba la khreh ban ieng na ka bynta ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew,” u la ong.Haba kynthoh ia ka jingweng ki bor Pulit ia ki banner ba la teh da ka KSU, u samla Thabah u la ong, “ka long kaba lyngngoh ha ki katto katne ki thaiñ ba ngi wah, ka sorkar ka ialeh ban weng ia ki Banner bad kane ka pynlynngoh ia ngi haba tang ia ki Banner ruh ki weng, katba kiwei kiwei ki kynhun ki bym dei na ka jaidbynriew jong ngi ki wah ia ki Banner ha Khyndai Lad ym ju don ba weng bad ki neh da ki bnai, katba ia ki jong ngi mar syn wah, mar syn weng.”“Kane ka pynpyrkhat lehse, namarba ka dang don ka prokram jong ka tnat Sorkar ha kaba ki heh ki haiñ na kylleng ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi bad na ka ri India ki wan sha kane ka jylla ban iashim bynta ha kata ka prokram, ka sorkar kam kwah ban pyni ba ka jylla ka don hapdeng ka jingshah thombor, ka don hapdeng ka jingshah banbeiñ bad ka jingshah pyniap na ka por sha ka por. Lehse ba ki don ki heh ki haiñ na Assam ha kaba lada ki iohi ia kine ki Poster ka pyntieng ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya ioh ki shah kynhied ne ki shah mai ha ki heh Sorkar Assam,” la kynthoh u samla Thabah.“Ka jingkylli kaba ngi hap ban pyrkhat mynta ka long lada tang ban wah ia ki banner ruh kim nud ban pyni hakhmat ka  Sorkar Assam mutdur ynda ki la don ha ka miej jingiakren ban iapynbeit ia u pud u sam paramaki, hato ki nud ne kim nud ban ang ia la ka shyntur ban kam ia ka Mukroh, ia ka Lapangap, ia ka Khanduli, ia ka Langpih bad kumta ter ter ki thaiñ khapppud kiba don hapdeng ka jingiakajia,’” la buh jingkylli une u nongialam ka General Secretary ka KSU.
title: KA SORKAR KA PYRSHANG BAN BUHRIEH ÏA KI JINGSHAH THOMBOR HAKHMAT KI HEH SORKAR ASSAM : KSU

content: Ka Khasi Student’s Union (KSU) ka la pynpaw ba ka pdiang ia ka jingshim rai ka Sorkar Assam bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban aiti ia ka jingtohkit sha ka Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) halor ka jingshah siat iap ki san ngut ki Khasi-Pnar ha ka shnong Mukroh ha ka 22 tarik, Naiwieng, 2022 kaba la dap shisnem pura mynta ka sngi Balang.Ka Sorkar Assam bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya ha ka 30 tarik u Nailur, 2023 ki la rai ban aiti ia ka jingtohkit ia ka jingjia ha Mukroh sha ka Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI). Ia ki Judicial Commission ba la thaw da ki ar tylli ki Sorkar Jylla ban tohkit halor kane ka jingjia la pynkut noh shisyndon hadien ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla Meghalaya u Conrad K. Sangma ki la iakynduh ban iakren ia pynbeit ia u pud u sam ha Khanapara.“Lada ki aiti sha ka CBI ruh ka biang, tangba ka jingtohkit ka dei ban long kaba khuid.  Ym tang katta, tangba ngi hap ban sngewthuh ruh ynda ladep ka jingtohkit, jop mano mano ruh ngim tip hynrei ioh ki briew jong ngi ha khappud kin dang shah pyndik.  Kaba donkam eh ka long ba ngin don ia ki Pulit ki ban iada ia ki briew (jong ngi) ha khappud bad ki Pulit ruh kim dei ban shu ieng ha khapud ba shu peitkai ia ka jingshah thombor jong ki paradoh parasnam jong ngi hynrei ki hap ban iakhun,”  la ong u samla Donal V. Thabah ha ka jingiakren bad u nongthoh khubor ha ka sngi Balang.“Lada ka Nagaland ka lah, lada ka Mizoram ka lah, ka jylla jong ngi ruh ka dei ban lah,” la iaiban u samla Thabah.“ “Mynshem snem haba ngi pynlong ia ki jingiakhih, ki don ki jingpyntieng kohtympan ba kin khang ia ka Petrol, kin khang noh ia u khaw bad lada ngi tieng noh ia kata, na ka por sha ka por ngin shah pyniap. Lashai lada ki (Assam) lah ioh ia ka Mukroh kin nang kyntur bad lashai baroh kawei ka jylla kan hap biang sha kaAssam. Ngin hap ban pyrkhat bad ban puson bha ia kata.  Kaba kongsan eh ka dei ka jingshngaiñ bad ka jingiada ia ki paradoh parasnam kiba sah ha khappud bad ka jylla Assam bad kumjuh ruh kiba sah ha khappud jong ka ri Bangladesh,” u la ong.Haba kylli, u General Secretary ka KSU u la ong, “ka jingshongshngaiñ hi kam don, teng teng ka wan, teng teng ka leit.  Ki jong ngi lei ki iaid la ka jong ka lynti ki trei ki ktah hynrei dei kitei (Karbi) na sha shilinag (Assam) kiba pyndik.  Kumba jia ha Lapangap naduh ka por hyndai hyndai ki (Khasi-Pnar) rep ia u kba hangto bad ha ka por ba ki dang rep ia u kba ki (Karbi) shah hynrei ynda la dei ka por ot kim (Karbi) shah. Kaei ka jingthmu, ki thmu ban kurup ei ia u khaw ba ki la thung shitom da ki briew jong ngi.”“Ngi hap ban pyrkhat ba kine ki jingshah pyndik ha ki thaiñ khappud, khamtam na Assam ka long kaei kaei kaba ngin shu sngap ngim lah. Na ka por sha ka por ngi la hiar sha khappud ban iakren bad ngi la pynlong ki jingialang bad don bynta lang bad ki.  Kaba lah hi ban tehlakam ia ka jingthombor jong ki lehnoh, ki paidbah bad ki pulit bad Forest Guard (ka Assam) ka dei ka Sorkar Meghalaya,” u la bynrap.U la ong shuh shuh ba ka jingiapynbeit ia u pud u sam ka dei ban long ba ki shnong Khasi hi ki dei beit ban hap hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya khang ba ka jingmut jong ka Hill State kan long kaba pura, kaba paka bad kaba jop.
title: PDIANG KA KSU BAN AI TOHKIT HA KA CBI ÏA KA JINGSHAH SIAT ÏAP KI 5 NGUT HA MUKROH

content: : Da ki hajar ngut ki paid Khasi ki la iashim bynta ha ka jingrakhe ia ka Seng Kut Snem jong ka Seng Khasi kaba la long ha ka sngi Palei.  La sdang ia kane ka sngi, da ka jingleh niam, ka nguh na dem ha iing seng kaba don ha Mawkhar ha ka por mynstep bad pynlong ïa ka jingrakhe ha madan Weiking, Jaïaw.Ha kane ka sngi la pynlong ruh ïa ka jingïaid paidbah bad ka jingpyni riti da ki Tabut na Madan Ïewrynghep sha madan Weiking da kaba sdang shuwa ka duwai ka phirat lyngba ka kynhun ki Tymmen ki San jong ka Seng Khasi Kmie.La kren pdiang burom da u Rangbah Oplysor Pyngrope uba dei u President jong ka Seng Khasi Kmie, ka jingkren na u Rangbah Keringland Wahlang President, Seng Khasi Lawbah, u Rangbah Chandlok Dkhar Chairman, Art and Culture Committee Seiñ Raij Jowai bad ka jingkren ai khublei na u Rangbah Hainess Marbaniang General Secretary, Seng Khasi Kmie.Ha kane ka sngi ki khun Khasi na kylleng ka Ri Khasi bad Jaiñtia ki la ïa poi sha kane ka jingrakhe kaba 124 snem jong ka Seng kut Snem ban pynphuh pynphieng ïa kane ka sngi ha kaba la don ki jingshat bad ki jing rwai da ki kynhun bapher bapher na ki shnat ka Seng Khasi.Ka Seng Khasi Kmie ha kane ka sngi ka la pynkup burom ruh ïa u samla Philip J. Khongsngi uba shong ba sah ha Wahingdoh uba la ai sngewbha ïa ka seng Khasi da ka jaka ba 6 acre ha Mawpdang, New Shillong bad kumjuh ruh ïa ka kmie kaba la wan ban synran lang bad ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingrakhe ïa ka Seng Kut Snem.Nalor ki Rangbah jong ka Seng Khasi, la wan ban ïashim bad sakhi lang ruh ïa ka Seng Kut Snem 2023, ba kynthup u Justice HS Thangkhiew, Judge ka Meghalaya High Court, Pa’iem Ainam Manik Syiem, Syiem ka Hima Mylliem, Pa’iem Balajied Sing Syiem, Syiem Hima Khyriem, Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem, CEM ka KHADC, Bah Adelbert Nongrum MLA ka North Shillong, Kong Matsiewdor War Nongbri, ki nongïalam jong ki sengbhalang bad kiwei kiwei.
title: DA KI HAJAR ÏASHIM BYNTA KI PAID KHASI HA KA SENG KUT SNEM BA 124 SNEM KA SENG KHASI

content: U Bah Avner Medon Pariat ha ka sngi U Blei u la pynrem jur ia ka jingpyrshang Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) khamtam ia u Chief Executive Member (CEM) da kaba kynnoh ba u pyrshang ban pynkheiñ ia ka hok ban kren jong u Bah Chanlok Dkhar halor ka jingkynnoh bamsap ia ki District CouncilHa u kyrwoh, u Bah Pariat uba long u nongthoh bad u riewsaiñ pyrthei u la ong, “u Bah Dkhar, ubalong u nongshong shnong uba don jingsngewkhia kum ma nga, u la wanrah ia kane ka mat da kaba u ngeit ba ka dei kaba ktah ia ka imlang ka sahlnag bad kaba pynkheiñ ia ki nongrim jong ka synshar ka khadar.”“Ka long kaba sngewsih ban iohi ba ka KHADC ka la ai jubab da kaba phah ia ka legal action ha ka jaka kren ia ki mat kiba ktah, kaba pynmih ia ka jingpyrshah na ki nongpeitngor bad ban pyrshah ia ka hok katkum ka riti synshar paidbah kaba ngi ñiew burom ha ka imlang ka sahlang,” u la ong.U Bah Pariat u la ong ba ka KHADC ka dei ban bishar biang ia ka rai bad ban iakren sngewthuh jingmut halor kane ka mat ba la pynpaw“Ban shu khñiot ia ka sur kren ka pyntlot noh ia ki nongrim jong ka riti synshar paidbah bad ka pynduh noh ia ka jingshaniah jong ki paidbah ha ki shlem treikam,” u la ong.,
title: PYNREM U BAH AVNER PARIAT ÏA KA KHADC BA PAN JINGSHAI NA U BAH CHANLOK DKHAR

content: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la pyrshah ia ka jingpynrung kyrteng ia ki Ex-servicemen na ka jylla Manipur bad kiwei kiwei ki jylla da ka Meghalaya Zilla Welfare Department.Ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Secretary ka General Administration Department u Bah Cyril V Darlong Diengdoh ha ka sngi thohdieng, u general secretary ka KHNAM u Bah James MA Neng u la ong, “ngi la ioh jingtip ba ka ZWD ka la buh hakhmat ia ka bit ka biang jong ki Ex-servicemen na kiwei ki jylla bad pynduh pat ia kajuh ka hok sha ki shipai ba la shongthait na kane ka jylla.  Ka jingshisha ka long ba u ophisar ka Zilla Sainik Welfare na Manipur um dei ban long ka daw ban pynduh ia ka hok ia la ki jong ki shipai ba la shongthait ban ioh ia ki jingmyntoi katkum ki kyndon treikam jong ka Kendra Sainik Board.”U la ong ba ka party ka la ioh jingtip ba ka Zilla Welfare Department, kaba long ka ophis kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka GAD ka la pynrung kyrteng ia ki shipai ba la shongthait na ka jylla Manipur.“Ngi sngewsih ia ka jingiaumsnam ha Manipur bad ngi duwai ba ka shongsuk shongsaiñ kan wan phai biang ha kane ka jylla.  Hynrei, na ka daw ka jingiaumsngam, ngi la ioh jingtip ba ki don bun ngut ki shipai ba la shongthait na ka Jylla Manipur ki la rejistar bad ka Meghalaya Zila Sainik Department.  Ha kawei pat ka liang, ki shipai ba la shongthait na ka jylla Manipur ki dei ban pynrung kyrteng hi la ka jong ka jylla khnang ba kin dup lah ban ioh ia ki jingmyntoi ba la ai na  ka por sha ka por ha la ka jong ka jylla,” ong u Bah Neng.Une u nongialam ka KHNAM u la ong ba ka Kendra Sainik Board ka ai ruh ia ka riti treikam jong ka Department of Sainik Welfare ha manla ki jylla bad ki Union Territories na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki shipai ba la shongthait ha la ki jong ki jylla ki jong ki.
title: PYRSHAH KA KHNAM BA PYNRUNG KYRTENG KI SHIPAI BA LA SHONGTHAIT NA MANIPUR HA MEGHALAYA

content: Ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC), Shillong ka la shim suo motu halor ka jingbym ioh tulop hynriew ngut ki nongtrei kontrak jong ka tnat Transports ha South Garo Hills District, katkum ka khubor ba la pynmih ha kawei na ki Kotkhubor Phareng ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai.Katkum kane ka khubor, kumba hynriew ngut ki nongtrei kontrak jong ka tnat Transport ha South Garo Hills la kynnoh ba kim shym la ioh ia ka tulop la palat ar snem kynthih ha kaba uwei na ki nongtrei u la khladnoh khlem da ioh satia ia ka bainong kaba palat 20 bnai kaba dang dei ban siew ia u.Ka Commission ka la phah ia ka notis sha u Chief Secretary ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia bad ban phah ia ka kaiphod kaba bniah sha ka Commission hapoh 15 sngi,  ong u Secretary jong Meghalaya Human Rights Commission ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka lah sngi U Blei.
title: PAN KAIPHOD KA MHRC NA KA SORKAR BYM ÏOH TULOP 2 SNEM KI NONGTREI KONTRAK KA TNAT TRANSPORT

content: Haduh200 tylli ki kam ki lait ia kiba nang ban kren ia ka ktien Phareng ha ka Ri Slovakia, kaba don ha syndah bad ka ri Poland ha thain Europe.U CEO & Founder Director, Asporea, Siliguri u Yash Gurung bad ki officer jong u ha ka jingiakynduh ia u Co-Chairman jong ka Meghalaya State Planning Board, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ha Shillong u Bah John F Kharshiing ki la pyntip ba kane ka kynhun ka kwah da ki samla na ki jylla jong kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi.Kane ka kynhun na Siliguri ka long kaba don jingiadei ha ki ri baher bapher bad ki la pyntip ba ia mynta ki don 200 tam ne duna ki kam ha ka kharkhana shna kali Peugeot 208, Citroen C3, jong ka Company Stellantis, Slovakia ha ka jingsiew kaba T. 63,000 haduh T. 72,000 shi bnai bad ka don ruh ka jingsiew kaba heh ia ka extra time lada ki nongtrei ki dei kiba smat bad kiba trei shitom.Ki la pyntip ba ka kynhun jong ki ka don ka jingiateh bad ka kynhun pynioh kam kaba heh na Kathmandu, Nepal kiba la don lypa ki jingiadei bad ka kharkhana shna kali, ha kaba ki don ka lad ban pynioh ia ki kam lada ki nongwad kam ki don ia ka jingtbit. Kane ka kharkhana kali ka dei kaba heh bad ki shna 62 tylli ki kali ha ka shi kynta bad ki pynmih haduh 1395 tylli ki kali shi sngi ha slovakia.Ha ka jingiakynduh, ka kynhun ka la mynjur ia ki jingai jingmut jong u Bah John F. Kharshiing ba un sa pynbeit ia ka jingiakynduh bad ki heh jong ka tnad Labour ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban iakren sngewthuh ban iatrei ryngkat kumno ba ki samla ITI / Politechnic bad kiwei kiwei hapoh Meghalaya kin lah ban shim ia ka lad ka kabu ban mih shakhmat ban trei shitom ban poi sha kitei ki kam.Ki la pyntip ruh ba ki don ruh ki kam ba bun jait kiba kane ka kynhun ka la don lypa ki jingiadei ha ki Ri bapher bapher ha kaba ka jingdawa ia ki nongtrei ka jur bha kum ki Nurse, ki nongtrei hapoh ki jaka sumar Hospital bad kiwei kiwei ha Japan bad Germany tangba ha kitei ki Ri donkam ban pas shwa ar level ha ka ktien Japan bad German.Kane ka kynhun ka la pyntip ha u Bah John ba kine ki jingplielad ba ki nong india kin ioh leit sha kiwei ki Ri ki dei naduh ba u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi u la wanrah ki polisi ban plielad ia ki nong india ban leit shabar lyngba ki jingiateh bad ki ri bapher bapher lyngba ka Ministry of External Affairs, ka Sorkar India khamtam namar mynta ka don ruh ka jingsdang duna ka jingdon paid ha kiba bun ki ri ka dewbah Europe.
title: LAIT KAM 200 TYLLI HA STELLANTIS SLOVAKIA EUROPE, WAN WAD NA NORTH EAST
