content: Ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) ha ka sngi u Blei ki la pynpulom ia ka jingthmu jong ki snar khaii tuh ban khaii beain sha ka ri Bangladesh ia ki jait tiar bapher bapher kiba shongdor palat 11 lak tyngka.Da ka jingai jingtip jong ki tnat syntiat, ki shipai BSF Meghalaya ki la pynlong ia ka jingap ktem ha khappud ha kaba ki la ioh kurup ia ki muid, ki dawai jyrhoh Phensedyl, ka shini, ki jaiñ bad kiwei kiwei ki jait tiar.Ia kine ki mar ba la kurup la aiti noh sha ka ophis Custom ban leh ia kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: KURUP KI SHIPAI BSF ÏA KI MAR KHAÏI BE-AIÑ BA SHONGDOR 11 LAK NA KHAPPUD

content: Ka International Federation of Muay Thai Association (IFMTA) kum shi bynta ban pynryntih ha baroh kawei ka pyrthei, ha shwa ban kan ioh rung sha ka lympung ialehkai Olympic, dang shen ka la pynlong ia ka jingai jinghikai ia ki rang bad thei ialehkai jong ka ri India, kaba la long ha ka jylla Kerela.Ha kane ka jingshah ai jinghikai kaba la tip kum ka One Standart Muaythai ne ka OSM, na ka jylla jylla Meghalaya kiba leit shah hikai ki kynthup ia ki ar ngut ki kynthei bad 15 ngut ki shynrang kiba la lah ban pyndep ia ka Course OSM.Ha kane ka jingai jinghikai la phiah ha ki ar bynta na ka bynta kawei ka Course, kata ka Theoretical module bad ka Practical module bad ha kaba kut jong ka Course baroh kiba iashim bynta kin ioh ia ka jingithuh na ka IFMA kum ki Coach, Manager bad kum ki nongialehkai Muay Thai.
title: 17 NGUT KI RANG BAD KI THEI ÏAKURA MUAYTHAI KIBA LA SHAH PYNBTIT HA KA OSM

content: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council, kum shi bynta ban pyrkhing ia ka jingkhaïi laitluid jong ki bar jylla ki bym biang ia ki kot ki sla ha ka lah sngi U Blei ka 27 tarik u Naiwieng ka la khynra naphang ia ki dukan jong ki bar jylla kiba buh dukan ha ka shnong Laitumkhrah ki bym don ia ki kot ki sla kiba biang. Kine ki kynthup ia ki bar jylla kiba shong wai ha ki dukan bad ia kiba shu shong die jingdie harud surok.Ia kane ka jingkhynra la ialam hi da u Executive Member ba peit ia ka tnad Taxation Bah Fantin Lakadong bad u Executive Member uba peit ia ka tnad Land Bah Teibor Pathaw ryngkat bad ki heh ophisar ka tnad Trade lem bad ki ophisar ka tnad Enforcement.Ia ka jingkhynra la sdang na Fire Brigade terter haduh Beat House kumjuh ruh ha ki bynta jong ka Iew Shyllong bad ha Police Point ter ter shaduh sha Don Bosco Square.Katba ka jingkhynra ka dang iaid shakhmat, ki bar jylla kiba shong die jingdie harud surok ki kam ki la shong die jingdie harud surok da ka jingaibor jong ka Meghalaya and Greater Shillong Progressive Hawkers and Street Vendors Association.Halor ka jinglap ia ki dukan ki bym biang ia ka Trading Licence na ka liang ki ophisar ka tnad Enforcement ki la khang khyrdep noh ia ki dukan bad ia kiba shong die madan la bthah ba kin lum lut ia ki jingdie bad la bthah ba kin pynbiang shwa ia ki kot ki sla.
title: KAM KI BAR JYLLA BA SHONG DIE MADAN HA LAITUMKHRAH BA AIBOR KA MGSPHSVA

content: Kawei ka kudam buh tiar jong kawei ka longiing kaba don ha ka shnong Sngithiang, Lower Mawprem ka la kylla dpei hadien ba ki thylliej ding kiba klang ki la bamduh ia kane ka iing baroh kawei.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum la iathuh ba ka jingpluh jong kane ka iing ba la pynlong kudam buh tiar ka la jia ha ka lah sngi U Blei ha ka por 5:00 baje eiei mynstep na ka daw ka jingthud jong ka bording.Ki paramarjan kiba la iohi ia ka jingklang jong ka ding ha kane ka kudam buh tiar ba la shna tang kum ka iing tap shiliang ki la pyrshang ban theh da ka um ban pynlip ia ka ding katba ki pulit kim pat poi sha kane ka jaka namar ka jingkhim shaba palat ka lynti ba ki kali Pynlip ding kin rung sha kane jaka.  La iathuh ruh ba ki trai jong kane ka kudam ki dei kiba sah shapoh jong ka ing katba ka kudam kaba pluh ka dei kaba don sha ka mala kaba shajrong. Kat haduh ba la pynmih ia kane ka khubor kam shym la don satia kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih hynrei lait noh tang ka jingingkhong jong ki mar ki mata kiba don hapoh kane ka kukam buh tiar.
title: BAMDUH KA DING ÏA KA KUDAM BUH TIAR HA SNGITHIANG LOWER MAWPREM

content: Ka Khun Hynñiewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la phah ia ka jingtyrwa sha ka Sorkar Jylla da kaba aiti ia ka dorkhas lyngba u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah Donald P. Wahlang ban bhah kyrpang 80 na ka 100 ia ki kam na ki trai ri trai muluk jong kane ka jylla Meghalaya ha ki Private Sector/Organised Sector.Kane ka jingtyrwa jong ka KHNAM ka long ba ka Sorkar Jylla kan wanrah ia ka jingpynbeit thymmai ha ka State Reservation Policy kaba dang iaid shakhmat.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u General Secretary jong ka KHNAM u Bah James M.A Neng u la iathuh ba u Chief Secretary u la kular ban un sa rah ia kane ka jingtyrwa jong ka KHNAM sha ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan dup lah ban bishar bniah shwa ban shim ia kano kano ka rai.Kane ka jingtyrwa jong ka KHNAM ka long ban weng ia ka jingkyrduh kam kyrduh jam jong ki samla da kaba kynthup lang ia ki Private Sector hapoh ka State Reservation Policy.
title: TYRWA KA KHNAM BAN BHAH KAM 80% ÏA KI TRAI JYLLA HA KI PRIVATE SECTOR

content: Sa tang khyndiat taiew shwa ba ka pyrthei baroh kawei kan pynkhreh ia ka lehniam Christmas, ka shnong Moolamylliang kaba don ha rilum Jaintia bad kaba hap hapoh ka East Jaiñtia Hills district ka la ioh pdiang ia ka khusnam “IconSWM-CE Excellence Award 2023” ha ka jingialang “13th International Conference on Sustainable Waste Management & Circular Economy and IPLA Global Forum 2023” kaba la long ha nongbah Mumbai ha ka 29 tarik, Naiwieng 2023.Ia ka khusnam la aiti sha u Rangbah Shnong jong ka shnong Moolamylliang u Bah Apmon Pachang, da u Consul General jong ka Kingdom of Netherland u Bart De Jong bad u President jong ka ISWMAW u Sadhan Ghosh ryngkat kiwei de ki kynrem ki lyndan.Na kane ka jylla Meghalaya la sakhi lang ia kane ka jingioh khusnam jong ka shnong Moolamylliang da u Environmental Engineer jong ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board u Bah S Syiem ryngkat u Principal jong ka Synod College Shillong u Dr. RM Lyngdoh.Kane ka shnong ka dei kaba la paw bha ha kane ka jylla bad ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong kane ka Ri India, na ka jingkhuid jong ka bad khamtam ha ka Aiom Christmas, ka dei ka por kaba khring bha ia ki paidbah na kylleng ka jylla ban leit jngoh ia kane ka shnong khamtam ynda la dum ka suin bneng, namar naduh ki khyndiat snem mynshuwa, tang ha kane ka shnong la lah ban sakhi ia ka jingrakhe Christmas kaba long baroh shi aiom, da kaba pyndait ia ki bording kiba thaba jingshai laiphew jaid ha baroh kawei ka shnong.Hapoh ka jingialam jong u Rangbah Shnong bad kiwei de ki nongkit kam, ka shnong ka la thung ia ki tynrai dieng ha ki kyndong kynshrot jong ka shnong bad rakhe ia ka Christmas ha ka rukom kaba pher na kiwei pat kaba long ka jingkyrshan lang jong ki nongshong shnong.
title: ÏOH KHUSNAM “ICON SWM-CE EXCELLENCE AWARD 2023” KA SHNONG MOOLAMYLLIANG

content: Hadien hynriew sngi ba la lah ban pyniaid beit shaphrang ia ka 7th Elite Men’s National Boxing Championship, 26 ngut ki rangiakura ki la jam sha ka final bad ban iaknieh ia ka nam lahduh ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Ha kane ka lympung iakura kaba la long ha SAI Indoor Hall, ki la don haduh 400 bout ha ki hynriew sngi ba la lah ban pyndep ia ki jingiakhun kiba don haduh 13 tylli ki kyrdan ialehkai bad hynne ka sngi la lah ban pyndep ia baroh ki jingiakhun semi final. Mynta ki nongiakura ki la khmih lynti ban pynurlong na ka bynta ban khur ia ki takma ksiar bad ruh ban pynkhreh na ka bynta ki lympung iaknieh rung sha ka Olympic.U rangiakura ka Services u Amit Panghal, uba la khur ia ka takma rupa ha ka World Championships 2019, u la lah ban pynliem noh ia u rangiakura ka Railways u Ankit ha ka flyweight 48-51kg. Ha kum kane ka jingiakhun na ka liang ki nongbishar ki la rai jop ia u da 5-2.Kumjuh kam shym la don jingeh ia u khlur iakura ka Assam u Shiva Thapa, uba la khur takma teng haduh hynriew sien ha ka Asian Championships, ha kaba u la khur jingjop ha ka light welterweight 60-63.5kg da 5-0 pyrshah ia u Harivansh Tawari jong ka Maharashtra.U Harsh Choudhary na Rajasthan u la lah ban poi sha ka final ha ka kyrdan iakura jong ka light heavyweight 75-80kg, hadien ba u la lah ban pynliem ia u rangiakura na Delhi u Harsh Lakra.Ha ka kyrdan iakura jong ki heavyweight 86-92kg bad super heavyweight 92kg-plus, u Sanjeet, uba long u lahduh ha ka Asian Championship 2021, jong ka Services u la khur jingjop lyngba ka jingiarai lang da baroh ki nongbishar pyrshah ia u Vicky jong ka All India Police.U rangiakura ka Railways u Sagar, uba la khur ia ka takma rupa ha ka Commonwealth Games 2022 u la jop da 5-0 ia u Vishal Kumar uba na Delhi.Ïa kane ka lympung iakura la pynlong da ka Meghalaya Boxing Association ha ryngkat ka jingïatrei lang bad ka Boxing Federation of India bad kaba la kyrshan lang da ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs jong ka Sorkar Jylla. Ia ka jingiakhun final yn pyni paidbah lyngba ka channel Doordarshan bad kumjuh ha ka YouTube channel jong ka Boxing Federation of India (BFI).
title: RUNG FINAL KI KHLUR ÏAKURA HA KA 7TH ELITE MEN’S NATIONAL BOXING CHAMPIONSHIP

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ha ka sngi Balang ka dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan pyndam noh mardor ïa ka shithi ba la pynmih da u ophisar jong ka tnat Social Welfare kaba batai bakla ïa ka KHAD (Khasi Social Custom of Lineage) Act, 1997.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingïalang bad u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u President jong ka HYC u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la ong, “ngi la kyrpad ïa u Myntri ba un pynmih da ka jingbthah ban phah pyndam mardor ïa ka shithi.”U la ong ba ka shithi jong ka tnat Social Welfare ka ong, “shuh shuh, lah ban kdew ba ka Lineage Act, 1997 kam khang satia ban ai ïa ka syrnot ST sha u ne ka nongaplai da kaba shim bujli ïa ka jait la ka long na u kpa ne na ka kmie bad la shah ruh ban pdiang ïa ka jait jong u tnga da ka kynthei ka bym dei ka Khasi.”“(Ka HYC) ka ladep thoh sha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC), Shillong, ban pan jingpynshai la ka aiñ kaba la shna da ka KHADC kaba la tip kum ka KHAD (Khasi Social Custom of Lineage) Act, 1997 ka shah neem ban ai syrnot Schedule Tribe.  Halor ka jingujor jong ngi, ka Registration Authority, jong ka KHADC, lyngba ka Shithi DC.II/RA/24/2023/2 dated Shillong, the 8th May, 2023 ka la phah sha u Under Secretary ka tnat Social Welfare ka jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, ban ai ïa ka jingpynshai bad kyntu ruh ïa ki bor ba dei peit ban ym ai syrnot ST kaba long kum ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka KHAD (Khasi Social Custom of Lineage) Act, 1997 bad ka Rules ba ladep shna,” ong u Bah Synrem.“Kane ka shithi kaba wan na u Under Secretary jong ka tnat Social Welfare, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka long kaba be-aiñ bad kaba long pyrshah ïa ka riti ka dustur bad kaba ïatakhuh bad ki aiñ jong ka KHAD (Khasi Social Custom of Lineage) Act, 1997 bad ka Rules ba ladep shna.  Namarkata, dei ban pyndam noh mardor ïa kane ka shithi,” u la bynrap.
title: IALAM BAKLA KA SOCIAL WELFARE ÏA KA LINEAGE ACT KA KHADC, DAWA PYNDAM KA HYC ÏA KA SHITHI

content: Ka Directorate of Dairy Development ha ka sngi Palei ka la rakhe ïa ka National Milk Day ha Central Dairy Campus, Mawiong ha kaba u Myntri ka tnat  Animal Husbandry & Veterinary u A.L Hek u la long kum u Kongsan ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Secretary ka tnat A.H & Veterinary u S.C Sadhu kum u Symbud Kongsan.Haba kren kum u Kongsan u Bah A.L Hek u la ong ba ka Meghalaya bad ka ri baroh kawei ka la rakhe ïa ka National Milk Day ban kynmaw burom ïa ka sngi kha jong u Dr. Verghese Kurien, uba long u Kpa jong ka White Revolution, uba la trei met bad mynsiem ban kyntiew bad ban pynkylla dur ïa ka Dairy Sector bad lyngba ki jingtrei shitom bad lyngba u synñiang u bynhei, ka kam ri masi khem dud ka la long kawei na ki lad aikam kaba pynmyntoi haduh katta katta ïa ki nongrep.U la ong ba ha ki snem ba la leit noh, ki paidbah jong ka jylla ki la sdang ban sngewthuh ïa ka bynta bakongsan bad ka jingkoit jingkhiah na kaba dih ïa ka dud bad kiwei ki jingbam ba la shna na ka dud bad kane ka la wanrah ïa ka jingdawa kaba jur bha ban pynmih ïa ka dud.  Watla ka Jylla Meghalaya Milk Mission, ki Dairy Farmers’ and Cooperative Societies kiba la sdang ïa ka kam ri masi khem dud ki la ïohi ïa ka jingkiew irat jong ka Dairy Sector bad ka la pynmyntoi bha haduh katta katta.U Mynri u la pynpaw ruh ka jingkyrmen ba ha ki snem ban sa wan, ka Sorkar Pdeng kan sa wanrah kham bun ki skhim ban kyntiew shuh shuh ïa ka jingpynmih dud ha ka ri.Ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri u la aiti ïa ki khusnam sha ki khynnah kiba ïashim bynta ha ki jingïakob bapher bapher bad ai khusnam ruh ïa ki nongri masi khem dud bad ïa ki Cooperative Society kiba la kiew bha ha ka jingpynmih ïa ka dud ha ka jylla.
title: KIEW KA JINGPYNMIH DUD BA TREI SHITOM KI NONGRI MASI KHEM DUD, ONG U BAH AL HEK

content: : Ka KTIEW EMS Trust ha ka sngi balang ka la aiti da ki tiar jingsumar ban pyndonkam ha Labour Room ïa ka Dr. H. Gordon Robert Hospital, Shillong khnang ba kane ka shlem ai jingsumar kaba la kynjoh ïa ka jingdap 100 snem kan nang lah ban pyntyllun ïa ki jingai jingshakri kiba kham bha sha ki paidbah ha ka liang ka Koit ka Khiah.Ki tiar ai jingsumar ba la bei pisa da ka KTIEW EMS Trust UK (FCRA 2023-2024) kaba kot T. 35 lak ki kynthup ïa ka Cardiac Monitor bad ka Wall Mount, ka Cardio Toco Graphy CTG machine, ka Syringe Infusion Pump, ka Radiant Warmer, ka Eclamsia Bed, ka OT Bed na ka bynta OBGYN OT Room, ka Diatheremy machine, ka Cubicle Track System.Ïa kine ki tiar la aiti da u Bah Michael Kharsyntiew ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha ophis jong ka Governing Board ka Hospital ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang jong u Medical Superintendent u Dr. R. Nongrum, ka incharge Labour Room ka Sr. Tisralyne Reenbohn, Specialist Obstetrics and Gynecology ka Dr. Mercy Shylla, u Chairman ka Governing Board ka Hospital u Rev. SS Majaw, Sr. Medical Officer, Obstetrics and Gynecology  Dr. E. Blah, u Hospital Chaplain u Rev. George W. Chen bad kiwei kiwei.
title: DA KI TIAR SUMAR HA LABOUR ROOM AITI KA KTIEW EMS TRUST ÏA KA ROBERT HOSPITAL

content: Ka Meghalaya Upper Primary School Teachers Association (MUPSTA) kan sa kynjoh sha ka jingïaid lynti kaba 30 snem kynthih ha kaba ai jingshakri bad ban peit ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki nonghikai skul Upper Primary ka rilum Khasi-Jaiñtia bad Garo.Kum ka jingrakhe ïa kane ka jingdap 30 snem, ka MUPSTA kan sa pynlong da ka lympungbah jong ki nonghikai skul Upper Primary ha ka shnong Mukhla, West Jaiñtia Hills District ha ka 5 tarik, Nohprah, 2023 ka ban sdang ha ka por 11:00 baje mynstep.U President ka MUPSTA, Babu Kenneth Shadap ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ïathuh ba u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ka Sorkar u Rakkam A. Sangma un sa long u kongsan ha kane ka sngi ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u Adviser jong ka tnat Pule Puthi u Bah Himalaya Muktan Shangpliang bad ki nonghikai jong ki skul Upper Primary na rilum Khasi-Jaiñtia bad na rilum Garo.“Ngi khot bad wer ïa baroh ki nonghikai jong ki skul Upper Primary shynrang bad kynthei na rilum Khasi, Jaiñtia bad Garo ba kin ïashim bynta lang ha kane ka sngi,” la ong u Babu Shadap.U la ong ruh ba hadien ba u la shimti ïa ka kam President jong ka MUPSTA naduh u snem 2001-2002 un sa shongthait noh hadien ka lympungbah bad un sa pynkhamti noh sha kiwei pat ki ban shimti thymmai ïa kane ka lyngkor.“Namarba kan long ruh kum ka jingïakynduh kaba khatduh bad nga kum u President, nga ïawer ïa ki nonghikai ba kin wan khnang ha kane ka sngi ba ka MUPSTA kaba dei ka kynhun kaba la rejistar naduh u snem 1993 kan sa rakhe ïa ka jingdap 30 snem,” u la ong.“Wat lada ngan shongthait noh, hynrei ngan dang ïarap ïa ka MUPSTA kum u Adviser,” u la bynrap.Haba kylli, u Babu Shadap u la ong, “ha kine ki 30 snem ba la leit noh, kum ka seng kaba ngi lah ban leh ka long haba ki nonghikai ki ïakynduh ïa kino kino jingeh khamtam haba ki nonghikai ki shah wengkam khlem daw, ki don ki nonghikai kiba shah ot palat ka tulop jong ki. Haba ki wan sha ka seng, ngi shimkhia bha ban pynbeit ïa kine ki jingeh. Ngi ïaleh ban don ka jingïatreilang bad ki School Management Committee.”“Haduh mynta ngim lah ban len ba ki skul Adhoc Upper Primary ki dei kiba la rim bha naduh u snem 1989-1990 bad kam shym la don ka jingkyntiew kyrdan sha ka Deficit System,” la ong u Babu Shadap.U la ïathuh ruh ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingdawa ba dang sahteng, ka Sorkar Jylla ka la pynkhamti ha ka  State Education Commisson (SEC) bad ka Seng ka shaniah beit ha ka Commission ban shim rai.“Katkum ka jingïakren, ka State Education Commission kan pyrshang hi ban ai ïa ka hok katba lah. Nga sngewskhem ba ka jingtrei hok jong ka Commission bad lada ka Sorkar ka shim ïa ka jingai jingmut jong ka Commission yn sa lah ban weng ïa ka jingeh jong ki nonghikai bad ki nonghikai kim donkam shuh ban mih sha surok ban dawa ïa ka hok,” la bynrap u Babu Shadap.
title: 30 SNEM KYNJOH KA JINGSHAKRI KA MUPSTA ÏA KI NONGHIKAI UPPER PRIMARY

content: Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la buh sngi ban khot ïakren ïa ki nongïalam jong ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkynriah ïa ki briew kiba sah ha Them Iew Mawlong.U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla uba peit ïa ka tnat Pynroi Sor Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ha ka jingïakren bad ki la pathai khubor ha ka sngi palei u la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jingïalang ka ban sa long shen, yn ïakren ïa ka jingkyrpad jong ki nongïalam ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) ïa ka Sorkar ban pynbeit khyndiat kynsoit ïa ki katto katne ki jingïapynbeit ha ka Blue Print ïa kiba yn sa shim rai ha kane ka jingïalang.“Ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha kine ki bnai ladep, ki (HPC) kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar ym dei ba ki dawa ban pynkylla khyndiat ïa ka Blue Print.  Ngi la pyrshang ban pynbeit khyndiat khynsoit katba ngi lah bad ka rai kaba khatduh kaba ngin sa shim kan long beit ha ka 7 tarik, Nohprah,” ula ong.Haba kylli, ula ong ba kaei kaba don ha ka Blue Print ka Sorkar kan sa ïakren beit ha kane ka jingïalang ka ban sa long.
title: ISHU THEM IEW MAWLONG: YN SHIM RAI HA KA 7 TARIK, NOHPRAH HALOR KA BLUE PRINT, ONG U DY. CM

content: Ka MLA jong ka East Shillong Constituency ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba la shah jied kum ka kyrtong jong ka National Peoples Party (NPP) ban ïakhun na ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency ha ka sngi Palei ka la lum lang ïa ki saw ngut ki MLA ka party na rilum Jaiñtia bad ïa ki nongïalam bahakhmat eh ka NPP na ki hynñiew tylli ki Constituency kiba don ha rilum Jaiñtia.Ha kane ka jingïalang, la ïashim bynta lang da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, u Myntri Sorkar u Bah Comingone Ymbon bad ki MLA kiba kynthup ïa ka Kong Santa Mary Shylla bad u Bah Wailadkimi Shylla, u Chief Executive Member jong ka Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) u Bah Thombor Shiwat bad kiwei kiwei.Ïa ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh la synran lang da ki bahaing hasem kynthup ruh ïa u khun shynrang bad  ka khun kynthei.Ïa kane ka jingïalang la khot da ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ha nongbah Shillong kum ka jingpynkhreh ïa kane ka elekshon khnang ban pynthikna ba ki dkhot bad ki nongïalam jong ka NPP kin durut tyngeh ha rilum Jaiñtia ha ka elekshon sha ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ Lok Sabha ka ban sa long ha u snem ban sa wan.U Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “ngi sngewkmen ba ki nongïalam na ki hynñiew tylli ki Constituency ruh ki la wan poi lut. Ka jingïalang ka long ban ïathir ïatai kumno ban trei shitom bha khnang ba ka kyrtong kan ïoh ïa ka jingjop.”Haba kylli, u la ong, “kum ki nongïalam jong ka Party ngi don ka jingsngewskhem bad ngi kwah ban pynjop donburom i Dr. Ampareen.”U la ong ba katkum ka jingïohi jong u, ki paidbah nongthep vote ka Jylla Meghalaya ki la sdang ban kyntait bad lah ban dei ka thong jong ka NPP ban ïohrah ïa ka jingjop ha kane ka kynti.Ha ka elekshon MLA ba dang shu dep long shen, u Bah Vincent H. Pala u la shah rem noh ha ka Kong Santa Mary Shylla kaba long ka kyrtong jong ka NPP.“Ha ka elekshon ba ladep, u (Bah Vincent Pala) shah rem ha ka kynthei bad kumba kren biria mynta ruh ha ka kynthei ka lah ban jop bad u lah ban shah rem biang.  Kata ka dei ka jingkren biria jong ki nongkren hynrei ngi don ka jingkyrmen bad ngi kwah ba ka kyrtong jong ngi kan jop ha ka elekshon ka ban sa wan,” ong u Bah Dhar.Haba kylli, hato ka VPP kan long diengpyngkiang ne em ïa ka NPP ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha, u Bah Sniawbhalang ula ong, “ka VPP ka don la ka jong ka vote bank, ka Congress ka don la ka jong ka vote bank, ka BJP ka don la ka jong ka vote bank bad ka NPP ruh kumjuh hi. Ha ka elekshon MLA ba ladep, ka NPP ka ïoh khur vote haduh 3.50 lak kynthup lang ïa u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh bad u Bah Gavin M. Mylliem kiba la pynïasoh bad ngi.”
title: LUM KA DR. AMPAREEN ÏA KI MLA BAD NONGÏALAM KA NPP NA JAIÑTIA BAN PYNKHREH ELEKSHON MP

content: Ka tnat Pule Puthi jong ka Sorkar Jylla kaba la thung ïa ka jingtohkit ka la lap ba ki  don ym duna ïa ka 15 na ka 100 percent ki skul rngai ha rilum Khasi-Jaiñtia bad ha rilum Garo.U President jong ka Meghalaya Upper Primary School Teachers Association (MUPSTA) Babu Kenneth Shadap ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei u la ong, “ïa kane ka pynpaw hi da ki Ophisar kiba ngam kwah ban ïathuh kyrteng namarba ma ngi ruh kim sngewtynnat ba ngan ïathuh ïa ka kyrteng jong ki.”“Ki la leit sorjamin bad ban tohkit bad ki lap ba ki don ki skul ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher naduh ki skul Deficit, ki Adhoc haduh ki skul Sorkar kiba don tang arngut ki nonghikai bad arngut ki khynnah skul bad lai ne saw ngut ki nonghikai. Kane ka long ha baroh kawei ka jylla ki don,” u la ong.“Ngam tip haduh katno ka Sorkar kan pynbeit ïa kine,” u la bynrap.Haba kylli, u la ong, “ki don hi kylleng sawdong ka ri Khasi Jaiñtia bad Garo bad nga lah ban shu ong malu mala kumba 15 percent ki don hi (ki skul rngai). Kata ka dei ka jingïakren jong nga bad ki ophisar ka tnat Pule Puthi kiba leit sorjamin. Ki ïathuh (hi ma ki) ïa nga.
title: KUMBA 15 PERCENT KI DON KI SKUL RNGAI HA RILUM KHASI-JAINTIA BAD GARO

content: Ka Seng Kur Warjri kan rakhe ia ka Lyngkhuh Arphewsan snem jong ka Dorbar Kur Warjri ka ba la sdang naduh u snem 1998. Ka Dorbar Kur Warjri kan  long ha ka 12tarik Nohprah, 2023 ha shnong Thynroit ha ka ba la khmih lynti ba ki parakur parajait Warjri na kylleng ka Ri Khasi ba kin ia poi ryntih naduh dang step. La plie ia ka rakhe lyngkhuh arphewsan snem jong ka Dorbar Kur Warjri ka ba la long ha Sohryngkham ha ka 11tarik Naiwieng 2022 bad yn pynwai ia ka jingrakhe ha ka Dorbar ha Thynroit. Ha kata ka sngi yn sdang shwa da ka marehthong Marathon naduh 8baje mynstep na Thangsning sha Thynroit, ka ban bud artat da ka Dorbar, tang shu kut ka marehthong. Ha kane ka shisnem ba la lah, la pynlong ia ki ba bun ki rong ki taw ban lehkmen bad kyntiew ia ki sap tynrai jong ki khynnah bad samla jong ka Kur Warjri. Ha ka ba sdang la pynlong ia ka jingpyninam ia ki syntiew bad la pynlong ruh ia ka lehkai kilan met kum ka Football bad Basketball, nangta ka thoh Essay, poitri, ka rwai ka siaw, ka shad ka kimen, ka pyninam ia ki riam ki beit bad ka thohdur thohdar. Ki nongjop ha kita ki jinglehkai kilan met bad kilan jabieng kin sa ioh la ki khusnam ha kata ka sngi ban long ka Dorbar ha Thynroit.Nalor ki jingrakhe baroh shisnem, ka la jia ryngkhat ba ka 12tarik Nohprah, 2023 ka dei ka sngi snem thymmai Khasi katkum u bnai bneng. Kumta na ka liang ka Seng Kur Warjri ka la mynjur ban ia syllok bad ka synjuk ki barikor, ka Riti Academy ha ka ban rakhe artat ia kata ka snem thymmai Khasi ka ban sdang naduh ka sngi babud, 13tarik Nohprah 2023. ha kane ka sngi kut yn sa don ruh ka byrngia lehkmen lyngba ka rwai ka siaw ka put ka tem da ki kaitor bad duhalia na ka Kur Warjri. Kum ka jingpyrshang ban tehsong ia ki parakur parajait ki ba dei na kajuh ka thymmei, ka Seng Kur Warjri ka la rai ban wer sngewbha ia ki parakur parajait ki ba la kylla lyngba ki ryta da ka ba la sot na ki kyrteng shnong trai kum ki Kur War Nongbri, War Tynghah, War Manai, War Wahksing bad Nongbri. Ka jingthmu jong kata ka long ban pynkynmaw ia la ki parakur parajait ban tipkur tipkha khnang ban lait na ka shongsang bad ban ym iakam kur bakla bad ki ba ym dei kur dei jait na kajuh ka thymmei. Na ka daw ba la don teng ka jingbakla ha ka imlang sahlang namar ba khlem da phikir ha ka jingkam kur kam jait ha la ki paradoh parasnam bad kumjuh ruh ia ki ba ym dei na la ka jaitbynriew, kynthup ruh ia ka shongsang ka ba la jia na ka por sha ka por, kumta la rai shijingmut ban tehsong ha la ki parakur parajait ki ba dei nba ka juh ka thymmei.
title: RAKHE LYNGKHUH ARPHEWSAN SNEM KA DORBAR KUR WARJRI

content: Hadien ka jingkut noh ka samoi treikam jong ka Khasi Student Union (KSU) Mawlai Circle, ka seng ha ka Lah Sngi U Blei ka la pynlong da ka jingjied ia ki nongkitkam ba thymmai na ka bynta ka samoi treikam jong u snem 2023-2026.Ia kane ka jingjied nongkitkam la pynlong ha Indoor Stadium Mawlai Phudmuri.  Lai tylli ki post ym shym la don satia kiba iakhun pyrshah ia u samla Biangbor Lyngdoh Paliar ia ka post President, u samla Mac Iver Thabah ia ka post Vice President bad ia u samla Eddie Malngiang ia ka post General Secretary.Ki nongkitkam ba la shah jied thymmai ha kane ka sngi ki long Asst Secretary Macdonald Jitem, Organising secretary Nangrikupar Malngiang, Publicity Secretary Garry Mawlieh, Education Secretary Sam Lyngdoh Nonglait, Environment Secretary Wellborn Nonglang bad Office Secretary Rishot Jana.Ha kane ka sngi ba pynlong ia kane ka jingjied nongkitkam la sakhi lang da u President jong ka KSU Seng Kmie u u samla Lambokstar Marngar uba la long kum u kongsan bad u General Secretary u samla Donald V. Thabah kum u symbud kongsan.
title: SHAH JIED BIANG U BIANGBOR PALIAR KUM U PRESIDENT KA KSU MAWLAI CIRCLE

content: Shillong, Naiwieng, 27: Ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) kan pynlong ia ka Executive Committee ha ka 2 tarik Nohprah 2023 ha ophis trei kam jong ka seng ha ka por 1.30 baje nohphai sngi ban iakren ia ka shithi kaba la wan na ka sorkar pdeng lyngba ka Ministry of Home Affairs halor ki dorkhas bad ka jingiakhih ba ka seng ka la pynlong ha ka 3 tarik mynta u bnai ha Jantar mantar, New Delhi.Ha kane ka jingialang yn ia kren ruh ban pynthymmai ia ki komiti bapher bapher kiba don hapoh ka seng, ka komiti ba peit ia ka khyndew ka shyiap, ka komiti ba dei peit ia ka kam pisa, ka komiti ba peit ia ki lad iohkam iohjam bad ka komiti ba peit ia ka jingpyniaid beit hapoh ka seng.Ha kane ka jingialang yn ia kren ruh kumno ban pynkhlain ia ka jingtreikam jong ka Central Executive Committee bad kiwei kiwei ki kam lada don ban ia kren.Ka phang pdeng jong ka jingiakren ha kane ka jingalang kan long halor ki ar tylli ki shithi kiba la wan na ka Sorkar Pdeng hadien ba ka seng ka la leit ban ai ia ki dorkhas bad ka jingiakhih kaba la pynlong ha Jantar Mantar, New Delhi, ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Bah Venus Rangsliang, Nongaiktien ka HANM seng kmie.
title: KHOT KA HANM ÏA KA EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE BAN ÏAKREN ÏA KA SHITHI BA WAN NA KA SORKAR PDENG

content: : Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ha ka sngi baar ka la leit ban ai jingiarap ia ki samla ki ban mih khmat sha ka National Youth Champion League kaba lai sngi, kata naduh ka 8 tarik, haduh ka 10 tarik Nohphrah 2023 ba la pynlong da ka Pro MMA League ha Priyadarshini Youth Complex, Malund West, Mumbai.Ka Seng hapoh ka jingialam jong u Sport Secretary  u samla Eric Nongkynrih ka la noh synñiang sha ki saw ngut ki samla kiba mihkhmat lyngba ka Shlem School of Martial Arts kaba don hapoh Mawlai Iewrynghep.U Samla Eric haba ai jingkren u la kyntu kynpham ia ki samla ki ban mihkhmat ba kin trei shitom ban ioh ia u soh ka jingjop ha ka jingiakhun ka jong ki bad kumjuh ban iai kyntiew lem ia ki para samla namar ka jingialehkai sports ka dei kawei ka lad ka lynti ka ban pynjngai ia ki samla na ki jingdih pynbuaid kum u drok uba la kynrei bha hapoh kane ka jylla.U la pynkynmaw ruh ia ki sienjam kiba ka seng ka la shim ha kaba ka la plie ia ka Maitshaphrang MMA and Fitness Team ha ka shnong Nongthymmai kum kawei na ki shlem ban ai jinghikai ia ki samla ha ka liang ka jingkilan met bad kumjuh ban kyntiew ia ki samla ha ki kam ialehkai sports.
title: KYNPHAM KA KSU ÏA KI SAMLA KI BAN MIHKHMAT SHA KA NATIONAL YOUTH CHAMPION LEAGUE

content: : Ka Dorbar Shnong Umkiang, ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewbynniaw halor ka jingbym shimkhia jong ka Sorkar na ka bynta ban pynbha ia ka surok National Highway-6 ha ka thaiñ Umkiang, East Jaiñtia Hills District,  naduh Umkiang Pyrtakuna Kuliang, Dona bad ka thain khappud Narpuh baroh kawei.“Ka jingbym shimkhia jong ka Sorkar ban bthah ia ka NHAI/NHIDLC ban pynbha ia ka surok National Highway-6 ka la pynlong ia ki nongshong shnong ban ioh pang haba ring mynsiem khamtam ki khynnah khyllung ha kine ki bnai tlang. Ki paitbah nongshong shnong kiba sah ha shilynter jong ka surok kim lah shuh ban pynkhreh ia ka jinglehkmen Christmas namar ym long shuh ban ai rong  ne pynbha pynitynnad ia ki iing ki sem na ka daw ka jingjur palat u pum pum,” la ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Waheh Shnong ka shnong Umkiang u Bah Lasting Pala bad u Secretary Shnong u Bah Nicholas Lyngdoh.“Ha ka jingshisha ka don ka kompeni Laxmi na Silchar kaba wan trei teng teng  malu mala bad kaba trei tang dep rukom  bad ka khlem lah ban pynbha kumba dei ban leh.  Haba ki nongialam shnong ki kylli balei kim trei bha ia ka surok, ka jubab ka long pynban ba kim ioh pisa na ka Sorkar,” la ong u kyrwoh.Kane ka jingbym kheiñ snep jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya/NHIDCL ban shna pynbha ia ka surok ka la pynkordit ia ki nongleit nongwan bad ia ki nongshong shnong namar ki hap ban sait ia ki pliang shwa ban bam jingbam na ka daw ka jingsop da u pumpum nalor ka jingbun ki Kali heh/ barit kiba iaid 24 kynta, la bynrap u kyrwoh.Ka Dorbar Shnong Umkiang ka la maham ruh lada ka Sorkar Meghalaya kam sngap ia ka jingud jong ki paitbah nongshong shnong ka thain Umkiang ban pynbha ia ka surok NH-6 ha kine ki sngi kin pynlong da ka jingiakhih da kaba mih paidbah sha surok.
title: BYRNGEM KA DORBAR SHNONG UMKIANG BAN IAKHIH BYM MARAMOT KA NHAI ÏA KA SUROK NH-6

content: Ki trai petrol pump ki la ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka tnat Pulit ba kin kem naphang ïa ki nongtuh bad ïa ki katto katne ki nongñiah trok kiba donkti ban sei be-aiñ ïa ka umphniang petrol na ki trok kit umphniang ha shiteng lynti shwa ban pynpoi sha ki Petrol Pump bapher bapher jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.U President jong ka Petroleum Dealers Association of Meghalaya (PDAM) Bah Kennedy C. Khryiem ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi baar u la ong, “namarba ka Meghalaya kam don ïa ka umphniang petrol na lade, namarkata la wanrah na Assam bad ki trok kit umphniang ki ïaid na Jorabad bad ynda la poi ha Lad Umroi, ki don kiba leit sha Jowai bad shaduh Silchar.  Hynrei ha shiteng lynti, ki don ki jaka ba ïa ka umphniang ba don ha ki kali la tuh noh.”“Ngam ong ïa baroh ki nongñiah kali hynrei hynrei katto katne ki nongñiah jong ki trok kit umphniang,” u la ong bad bynrap, ‘na kawei ka Tanker kaba 20 hajar litar ka umphniang ka dang jah haduh 200 litar tam, ka Tanker kaba 12 hajar litar ka petrol ka jah 60 haduh 100 litar.  Kane ka dei ka jingduh kaba khraw ïa ngi kum ki trai petrol pump. Ki don ruh ki jingïakhleh ïa ka umphniang.”U la ïathuh ba ki Pulit Meghalaya ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai ki la kyndang ïa ki jaka tuh umphniang bad ki la ïoh kem ruh markhmat ïa kiba donkti bad kurup ruh ïa ki top buh umphniang, ïa ki kot ki sla bad kurup ruh ïa ki trok kit umphniang.“Kum ki Dealers ka Jylla, ngi ai ka jingïasnohkti ïa ka Sorkar bad ïa ka tnat Pulit kiba la kyndang ïa kane ka jingïatuh ïathiem ha shiteng lynti na kine ki kali kit umphniang petrol. Katkum ka aiñ ym lah ban buh pathar ha kano kano ka jaka namarba ka umphniang petrol ka dei kaba lah ban buh jingmynsaw. Kane ka la dei lypa ka kam be-aiñ,” u la ong.Haba kynthoh ïa ka jingkynnoh jong ka North East Petroleum Mazdoor Union (NEPMU), u Bah Kennedy u la ong, “haba peit ïa ka jingthoh ba ki ujor ba ka don ka jingleh tohmet, shah leh bein (jong ki nongñiah trok kit umphniang petrol) bad lada ka don kum kata na ka liang jong ngi, ngim kyrshan hynrei lada kum kata kam don bad kaei kaba ngi ïohi ka long beit ba ki Pulit ki lap, ki kurup bad ki don ruh ki video clip kaba ki Pulit ki la ring ha kaba ki la kyndang ïa ki jaka buh petrol be-aiñ.”U la ong ruh ba ka Association kam kdew kti ïano ïano ruh hynrei tangba ka kyrshan ba ka aiñ kan pynshitom ïa kiba donkti.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ki paidbah kim dei ban khih jingmut namarba ka umphniang petrol ka dap pura na ka bynta ka jylla baroh kawei.Ka NEPMU ka la pynbna ban sangeh noh ka jingpynpoi ïa ka petrol sha Meghalaya naduh 29 tarik mynta u bnai da kaba kynnoh ba ki Pulit ka Meghalaya ki leh donbor ha surokbah ka Ri-bhoi District.Halor kane, ka sorkar kan pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha Ribhoi hapdeng ka tnat Pulit, ka tnat Food and Civil Supply ka Sorkar Jylla, ki bor synshar district bad ka Mazdoor Union.
title: NGI KYRSHAN TYNGEH ÏA KI PULIT BAN KEM ÏA KI NONGTUH PETROL; ONG KI TRAI PETROL PUMP

content: U Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla uba peit ïa ka tnad Food Civil Supply and Consumer Affairs u Bah Comingone Ymbon ha ka sngi baar u la bthah ïa u Commissioner & Secretary jong ka Food Civil Supply u Parvin Bakshi ban leit mih khmat ha ka jingïalang ka ban sa long ha Nongpoh, Ribhoi ban ïakren pynbeit halor ka jingbyrngem jong ka North East Petroleum Mazdoor Union ban sangeh noh ka jingpynpoi ïa ka umphniang petrol sha kane ka jylla halor ka jingkynnoh ba ki nongñiah trok kit umphniang ki la mad ïa ka jingshah pyndik ha ki bor Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya.“Mar ïa ïoh jingtip shaphang kane, nga hi lade nga la shimkhia ban telephone ïa ki ophisar bad nga la bthah ïa u Commissioner and Secretary ba un ïakren bad ki (Mazdoor Union). Ha ka jingshisha ngi la khot ban ïakren shane hynrei kim treh.Hadien kata, ngi la pynbeit ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha Nongpoh lashai ka sngi ban khot lang ïa ka tnat Pulit, ïa ka Mazdoor Union, ki trai petrol pump. Ngin ym kwah ba ka jylla jong ngi kan mad ïa ka jingjynjar na ka jingkyrduh umphniang,” la ong u Bah Ymbon.Haba kylli, u la ong, “ngam pat ïoh jingtip haduh mynta, hynrei nga dang shu ïohi tang lyngba ki lad pathai khubor. Na kata ka daw nga la shimkhia mar mar khnang ba ki paidbah kin ym jynjar. Katkum ka jingujor ba ki la thoh sha nga kum u Myntri Sorkar nga ïohi ba ka don jingkynnoh ba ki Pulit ki pyndik, ki leh tohmet bad ngam pat nud ban ong ba ka don shisha ka jingshah leh tohmet bad kan don shisha kata ka jingïohkem ïa kiba leh tuh. Ngam pat lah ban ong eiei.  Namar haduh mynta hi, nga kyrpad ïa ka tnat Pulit.”“Lada ngi lap ngin pynshitom ïa kiba donkti bad ngim kwah ba kane ka jingjia kan ktah tang ïa ki trai petrol pump hynrei kan ktah ruh wat ïa ka jinglum khajna jong ka Sorkar. Wat u trai petrol pump ruh u duhnong bha lada ka petrol ka jah 100 litar ha ka shi sngi,” u la ong.“Ngim kwah shuh nangne shakhmat ba kan jia kumne,” u la bynrap.
title: BA BYRNGEM KA MAZDOOR UNION, KHOT ÏAKREN KA SORKAR HAPOH 24 KYNTA

content: Ki Pulit pynïaid kali ka nongbah Shillong bad ki Pulit Enforcement jong ka tnat Transports ha ka sngi baar ki la bteng ban talasi naphang ïa ki thuk thuk ar shaka kiba ïaid ha kylleng ka sor Shillong.Kane ka jingtalasi jong ki Pulit ïa ki thuk thuk ar shaka ka long hadien ba la mih ki jingjia kiba sngewsih ha kine ki khyndiat bnai namar ka jingñiah thuk thuk khlemakor shaba palat jong ki nongñiah kaba lam shaduh u pud ba ki nongïaid lynti kin shu duhei ïa la la jong ka jingim bad don ruh kiba mynsaw jur. Nalor kata, ki don ruh ki nongñiah thuk thuk ar shaka kiba dang hapoh 18 snem ka rta kiba ñiah lymmuh bad ñiah shongshit khlem da pyrkhat shuh ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ki nongñiah kali saw shaka ne ki nongñiah thuk thuk ar shaka kiba ñiah da ka jingphikir.Ha kane ka jingtalasi, ki Pulit ki la lap ba bun na ki nongñiah thuk thuk ar shaka ki dei ki bym don satia ïa ka Driving License bad don ruh ki bym don ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang bad ki la daiñ kuna ïa ki.Ïa kane ka jingtalasi, ki Pulit ki la pynlong ha Umshyrpi Point, ha Mawblei, ha Mawlai, ha Laban bad ha Rilbong.Nalor kata, ki Pulit ki la bat ruh ïa ki khynnah skul kiba dang hapoh 18 snem ka rta kiba la ñiah thuk thuk khlem laisen ha kaba la daiñ kuna ruh ïa ki.Don ruh ki nongñiah thuk thuk kiba la shah daiñ kuna namarba ki ñiah thuk thuk da kaba phong da ki slipar namarba ka aiñ ñiah kali kam shah satia katkum ka Motor Vehicle Act.
title: SHAH DAIÑ KUNA KI NONGNIAH THUK THUK BYM DON LAISEN, KYNTHUP KI KHYNNAH SKUL

content: Hadien ka jingkulmar jingmut jong kiba bun ki paidbah ka jylla na ka jingbyrngem sangeh pynpoi petrol, diesel bad Gas sha ka jylla lyngba ka Northeast Petroleum Mazdoor Union (NEPMU) ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka sngi balang  ka la lum da ka jingïalang ha Circuit House Nongpoh ban ïakren na ka bynta ban pynthikna ba kan ym don ka jingkyrduh umphñiang ha ka jylla bad khamtam ban ïakren halor ka jingbyrngem sangeh pynpoi umphñiang sha ka jylla.Ha ka jingïalang ba la khlieh da u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnad Food and Civil Supplies ka sorkar jylla u Pravin Bakshi la donlang u Additional Deputy Commissioner jong ka Ri-Bhoi u Bah MB Tongper, u heh Pulit ka East Khasi Hills u K. Prasad, u Additional Superintendent of Police u Bah B. Diengngan, u General Secretary jong ka North East Petroleum Mazdoor Union u Ramen Das, u President jong ka Petroleum Dealers Association of Meghalaya u Bah Kennedy C Khyriem, u President jong ka Meghalaya Indane Distributor Association u Bah RL Blah  bad ki ophisar na ka tnad Food and Civil Supplies ryngkat ki trai Petrol Pump.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne ba ki Pulit ka Crime Branch ki la hiar sha Ri-Bhoi ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai ban khynra naphang ïa ki jaka ba la suba ba ka don ka jingkhaïi tuh ïa ka umphñiang ha ki jaka bapher bapher ha ka thaiñ 22 mer bad ki la kem ruh kumba 14 ngut ki briew ba la suba donkti ha kane ka kam.  Kane ka jingjia ka la pynlong ïa ka NEPMU ban kynnoh ba ki Pulit ki la leh palat pud ïa ki nongñiah kali kit umphñiang wat kiba dang ïeng bamja ha ki Dhaba bad phah ruh da ka ujor sha ka Sorkar.Hadien ka jingïalang u Pravin Bakshi u la ong, ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkhynra jong ki Pulit dang shen, ai ba ka aiñ kan leh ïa kaba donkam namarba ki Pulit ki dang pynlong ka jingtohkit hynrei kam dei ban don kano kano ka jingthud ha ka jingpynpoi petrol sha ka jylla bad ba ki paidbah kim dei ban khuslai lane ban khih khohreh, namarba kam don ka jingsangeh pynpoi petrol sha ka jylla.“Kumba ki Pulit ki la leh ïa kaba donkam katkum ka aiñ halor ka jingkhaïi tuh ïa ka umphñiang Petrol, la ïoh ruh ban ïakren ba kam dei pat ban don kano kano ka jingpynngat ïa kiba luilui kiba pyndep ïa la ka kamram ban pynpoi Petrol sha ka jylla,” la ong u Pravin Bakshi da kaba bynrap ruh ba ka tnad Pulit lyngba ka tnad Crime Branch kan leh ïa kaba donkam ban pynlong ka jingtohkit.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkhohreh ki paidbah ban leit thep Petrol bad ban ïeng laiñ ha ki petrol pump u Pravin Bakshi u la ong, “kaei kaba la lah ban ïakren ha kane ka sngi la lah ban poi sha ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut bad kam dei ban don kano kano ka jingthud bad ka jingsngewthuh bakla sha ki paidbah namar ka umphñiang ka bun ha ka jylla bad lyngba kane ka jingïakynduh ka la poi noh sha ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut ha kaba ka Union ruh ka la rai ruh ban weng noh ïa ka jingïakhih.
title: WENG KA NEPMU ÏA KA JINGBYRNGEM BAN SANGEH PYNPOI PETROL SHA MEGHALAYA

content: Kum shi bynta ban pynmih pisa ia ka Club na ka bynta ka 1st Division Football League bad 1st Division Cricket League, ka Malki Sports Club kan pynlong ia ka Penalty Shootout ha ka 1 tarik bad 2 tarik Nohprah 2023 ha madan Malki naduh ka por 10:00 baje mynstep.Ha ka 1 tarik Nohprah, kiba jop kin ioh ia ka song pisa kaba T. 10,000 bad kiba wan baar kin ioh ia ka song pisa kaba T. 5000.Ka bai rung ha kane jingialehkai kan dei T. 500 .Ha ka 2 tarik Nohprah, kiba jop kin ioh ia ka song pisa kaba T. 15,000 bad kiba wan baar kin ioh T. 10,000 .  Ka bai rung ha kane ka sngi kan long T. 700. Kino kino ki kynhun kiba kwah ban iashim bynta kin sngewbha ban poi noh ha madan Malki ha ka por 1:00 baje mynstep.Nalor ka Penalty Shootout ka Club kan pynlong ruh ia ka Fete ha ka 1 tarik bad 2 tarik Nohprah ha kaba ka Bumper Prize jong ka Housie ka long 50,000 hajar ha ka 1 tarik Nohprah bad 1,00,000 lak ha ka 2 tarik Nohprah 2023. Ka Housie kan sdang naduh ka por 6:00 baje janmiet.
title: YN PYNLONG KA MALKI SC ÏA KA PENALTY SHOOTOUT

content: MAHAM IA KIBA ÏOH TNGA BAR JYLLAKa Dorbar Shnong Laitkor Mawrie Lumheh hadien ka jingkhynra Trading License bad Labour License hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong, ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la shim ïa ka rai ban ai por hynriew bnai ïa ki bar jylla ba kin pynkynriah noh ïa ki kam khaii pateng sha kiwei pat ki jaka bad ruh ban mih noh napoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong.Ha ka jingïakren bad u nonglum khubor, u Rangbah Shnong jong ka shnong Laitkor Mawrie Lumheh Bah Pynshailang Mawrie, u la ïathuh ba ïa kane ka rai la shim ha ka dorbar jong ka shnong kaba la long mynta ka sngi.“Ha ka sngi thohdieng jong ka taiew baladep ngi ladep khynra Trading License bad Labour License da ka jingïatreilang bad ka KHADC. Ha kato ka sngi, ngi la lap ba ki don shibun bah kiba khaii be-aiñ hapoh u pud u sam jong ka shnong bad ngi lap ruh ba ki don bun ngut ki bar jylla kiba trei ba ktah be-aiñ hapoh u pud u sam jong ngi khlem da ïoh jingbit na ka Dorbar Shnong,” la ong u Bah Mawrie.“Hapoh ka shnong ka thaw jong ngi, naduh barim bajah ngi don beit ka jingpyrkhing ba ngi la rai ba ngim ju shah ïa ki bar jylla ban wan trei wan ktah hapoh u pud u sam jong ngi.  Ngi la shong ïa ka Executive Committee jong ka shnong ha kaba ngi la ïathir ïatai bha halor kane ka bynta bad da kawei ka sur ngi la shim da kawei ka jingmut, ba kam long ban ai ïa ka Trading License ne Labour License ïa kino kino ki bar jylla hapoh ka shnong bad lada ngi leh kumta (ai laisen) ngin ym nang shuh ban jied ïa kano ka kam ngin ai bad ïa kano ka jait kam ngin ym ai,” u la ong.“Lada ngi la ai mynta ïa ka laisen, ïa kiba wan hadien habud ruh ngin hap ban ai. Suki suki, kin sa nang kharoi ki bar jylla bad ngin ym lah shuh ban tehlakam ïa ki jingleh Benami pat. Lada ngim ai ïa ka Trading License kin bun hi ki bar jylla ki ban wan da ka kyrteng jong ki Khasi bad kin sa ong ba ka kam ka dei ka jong ki Khasi bad kin sa ong ba ki dei tang ki nongbylla.  Kan don ka jingleh Benami kaba jur hapoh u pud u sam jong ngi,” la ong shuh shuh u Bah Mawrie.U la ong ba ka EC ka la shim beit da ka rai ban shu khang lut wat ïa kiba la don mynta ruh.  “Ngim sngew eiei ban khang ïa ki namarba kiba don mynta ruh ki dei kiba long be-aiñ lypa kiba khlem pat ïoh ïa ka No Objection Certificate (NoC) na ka Dorbar Shnong,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh u la ong, “ban shim kat ïa kane ka rai, namarba ka dei ka kam ïap kam im, kan bha shibun ban shim lang ruh ïa ka sur jong u paidbah. Ngin peit la ki paidbah ki kwah ban don ki bar jylla lane ki pyrshah.  Hadien ba la lum ïa ka dorbar mynta ka step ngi shem ba baroh ki paidbah ki kwah ba ngin kyndang beit ïa ki bar jylla bad ki paidbah ki ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka EC bad ngi la shim da ka rai jong ka Dorbar Shnong.”“Ngi la aipor ïa ki 6 bnai ba kin pynkynriah noh sha kiwei ki jaka bad ban mih napoh une u pud u sam jong ngi bad ngin aipor haduh ka 30 tarik Jymmang, 2024 ba kin mih noh napoh u pud sam,” la ïathuh u Bah Mawrie bad bynrap, “naduh ka 1 tarik, Jylliew, 2024 ngin ym shah shuh ïa ki bar jylla ban leh ïa ka khaii ka pateng hapoh u pud u sam jong ngi.”“Ïa kiba trei bylla ruh namarba ki don ki Khasi kiba buh nongtrei da ki bar jylla, ïa kine ruh ngi la aipor kylluid hynriew bnai bad ki dei ban bujli ïa ki nongtrei da ki trai jylla.  Kane kan treikam salonsar ïa baroh, naduh kiba don ïa ki Showroom kali, ba don Petrol Pump, ki Karkhana bad kiwei kiwei ki jait kam dei ban long beit da ki Khasi,” u la ong.Ha kaba ïadei bad ki Karkhana bad Workshop bad ki kam kiba donkam ïa ki briew kiba nabar, ka Dorbar Shnong ka la rai ba ki nongaikam ki lah ban khot ïa ki nongtrei nabar jylla tang hapoh 15 sngi ha ka shi snem. Nalor kata, ka Dorbar Shnong ka la pyrkhing ruh ba ki nongaikam kim lah ban wanrah ïa ki nongtrei bar jylla palat ïa uwei ne ar ngut.Ïa ki nongshong shnong kiba donkam ïa ki Architech nabar jylla ban shna pynwandur ïa ki ing ki sem, ka Dorbar Shnong ka la rai ba yn ai jingbit ïa ki nongbylla bar jylla ban trei tang hapoh shi bnai.“Na ka bynta ki kam ba dang lah hi ban trei ki Khasi, ka Dorbar Shnong kan ym ai NoC da leilei ruh em ban trei da ki bar jylla,” la ïathuh u Bah Mawrie.Ka Dorbar Shnong ka la bthah ruh ïa ki nongaikam ba ki dei ban da thoh aplikeshon, ban ai ruh ïa ka EPIC bad ban pynthikna ruh wat ïa ka jaka sah jong ki nongbylla bar jylla. “Lada ngi ïohi ba ka jingpan jingbit ka long kaba biang, ngin sa ai da ka Special Permission na ka bynta katta sngi bad katta taiew.  Hynrei ym ban shu ïaid lait ïa ka Dorbar Shnong. Lada lap ïa kiba khot bylla khlem ka jingtip jong ka Dorbar Shnong kin ngat ha ka jingpynshitom kaba tyngeh,” la maham ka Dorbar Shnong.Halor ka shongkha shongman, u Bah Mawrie u la ïathuh ba ka Dorbar Shnong ka la shim ïa ka rai ba kino kino kiba ïapoi kha bad ki briew ki bym dei ki Khasi, yn ym shah ban shong ban sah hapoh ka shnong.“Ngim pyrshah ïa ka jingpoikha poiman jong ki, hynrei katkum ka kyndon shnong, kito kiba ïoh kurim da ki bym dei ki Khasi ki hap ban mih noh napoh ka shnong ka thaw,” la ong u Bah Mawrie bad bynrap, “kane kan long ka jingmaham ïa ki khun samla jong ngi ba kin long kiba phikir.”
title: 6 BNAI AIPOR KA DS LAITKOR MAWRIE ÏA KI NONGKHAÏI BAR JYLLA BAN MIH NOH NA SHNONG

content: U Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka shithi ba la phah da u Under Secretary sha ki Deputy Commissioner da kaba kdew ba ka tnga bym dei ka Khasi ka lah ban shim ïa ka jait ka khong jong u tnga Khasi ka long kaba sngewlynngoh bad ka dei kaba la shu ïalam bakla ïa ka KHAD (Khasi Social Custom of Lineage) Act, 1997.“Hooid, nga sngewthuh ïa ka sur jingsngewkhia ba la pynpaw da ka HYC halor kane ka kam. Ka long kaba lyngngoh ban pynmih kum ïa kata ka jingpynbna,” la ong u Bah Paul ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Thohdieng.Katkum ka jingong jong u, katkum ka lynti jong ka aiñ shisien ba ïa ka Aiñ-Rew ladep mynjur da ka Council bad ka la ïoh ïa ka jingmynjur na u Lat ka Jylla ka mut ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka ladep bishar bniah nadong shadong.“Ym dei satia ban pynmih ïa kano kano ka jingpynbna kaba pynjngut noh ïa ka bynta ba la mynjur da ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ khamtam ïa ka Aiñ kaba la ïoh jingmynjur na u Lat,” la ong u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba u la pan ïa ka File na ka tnat Social Welfare bad ong ruh ba un sa bishar bniah bin pa bin.Ha ka sngi palei, ka KHADC ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha ka Sorkar Jylla ban phah weng noh mardor ïa ka shithi jong u Under Secretary ka tnat Social Welfare halor ka jingkynnoh ba ka la batai bakla ïa ka KHAD (Khasi Social Custom of Lineage) Act, 1997.“Ngin sa thoh sha ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan weng noh ïa kane ka shithi. Ka Council haduh mynta kam pat ïoh ïa ka kopi jong ka shithi bad ngi shu ïoh jingtip halor kane,” la ong u Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka KHADC Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem ha ka sngi Palei.Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ha ka sngi balang ka la dawa ïa ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban weng mardor ïa kane ka shithi.Ka shithi ka ong, “ka Lineage Act, 1997 kam mana ban ai syrnot ST ïa kino kino kiba aplai ban shim ïa ka jait ka khong jong u Kpa ne ka Kmie, bad ka jingshim ïa ka jait jong u tnga da ka tnga ka bym dei ka Khasi ka dei kaba ju shah.”
title: YN PAN JINGPYNSHAI U MYNTRI BA BATAI BAKLA U OPHISAR ÏA KA LINEAGE ACT

content: Khliehriat, Nohprah 01 : Ka FKJGP Khliehriat Circle mynta ka sngi ka 1 tarik u Nohprah 2023 ha ka por 11 baje mynstep kala iohi ia kawei ka trok kaba pynhap tiar ha surok bah ha Ladrymbai khlem da pyrkhat iaka leit ka wan kiwei namar da ka jingleh jong katei ka trok kala don ka jingdheng kali ha katei ka thain bad la pynlong ia ki kali kiba wan na ka liang ba pynhap tiar katei ka trok ban shakut ha katei ka surok bad na ka liang jong ka seng haba iohi ia kane ka jingleh jong kane ka trok kala pynher krad ia katei ka trok  pynhiar mar ha surokbah bad ryngkat ka jingmaham ba ymdei ban pynhiar tiar ha ki por mynsngi ha ki jaka ba long pdeng bad ki jaka kiba ktah ia ka iaid ka ieng uba bun balang namar ka por pynhap ki mar ki mata kadei naduh 8 baje mynmiet haduh 7 baje mynstep. Kane kadei ka por ia kito kiba ym biang ka jaka pynhap hynrei kito kiba biang ka jaka pynieng kali ban pynhap tiar kiba ym ktah ia ka iaid ka ieng u paidbah ki lah ban pynhap kat kaba ki mon.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka bynta ka FKJGP Khliehriat Circle kala ju phah da ki jingujor lyngba ki jingthoh sha u Deputy commissioner ka East Jaintia bad na ka liang u DC ruh u ladep pynlong ia ka meeting bad ki Waheh Shnong ryngkat ka jingdonlang ka seng hynrei ha ka jingpeit ka seng ki trok pynhap mar kila sdang biang ban pynhap mar thurmur bad ka seng ka ladep  lap bunsien ka jingsah kut Kali ha ki thain Khliehriat, Ladrymbai kadei da ka jingleh khlem akor kum kitei truck bad na ka liang jong ka seng  ka kyntu ia kiwei ki trok kiba ju leit pynhap mar iew sha ki thain Khliehriat, Ladrymbai ban pyrkhat lang ia kiwei.
title: NAMAR BA PYNHAP TIAR KHLEM PYRKHAT IA KIWEI, BEH KA FKJGP KHLIEHRIAT CIRCLE

content: Ka Services Sports Control Board ka la khur ia ka nam kum ka kynhun iakura kaba kynsai ha ka sngi kut jong ka 7th Elite Men’s National Boxing Championship hynne ka sngi ha SAI Indoor Hall bad kane ka kynhun ka la lah ban khur haduh 10 tylli ki jingjop ha kane ka jingiakhun final.Kane ka kynhun jong ka Services ka la sar naphang ha kaba 12 ngut ki la rung sha ka final ha ki 13 tylli ki bout bad ka la khur jingjop 10 ngut napdeng kine ki 12 ngut.Ha kane ka sngi la lah ban pynlong ia baroh ki jingiakhun final na ki 13 tylli ki bout, ha kaba ki khlur iakura kum u Shiva Thapa na Assam, Amit Panghal na ka Services bad u Sanjeet an ka Services ki la khur ia ka jingjop. Ha kine ki hynniew tylli ki sngi, ki paidbah na ka jylla ki la ioh ban sakhi ia kane ka lympung iakura kaba la long ha kane ka nongbah naduh ba ka la ioh ban pynlong ia ka South Asian Games ha u snem 2016.Ia kane ka lympung kaba la sdang naduh 25 tarik u Naiwieng, la pynlong da ka Meghalaya Boxing Association (MBA), ryngkat ka Boxing Federation of India (BFI) bad la kyrshan lang da ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs jong ka Sorkar Jylla.Ha kane ka sngi la wan sakhi lang da u Myntri ka tnat ialehkai u Bah Shakliar Warjri, kumjuh u MLA ka Mawlai u Bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang, kumjuh u Secretary General ka BFI u Hemanta Kumar Kalita bad u Working President ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association u Bah John F Kharshiing nalor kiwei patKi la don haduh 9 ngut ki rangiakura ak Jylla kiba la ioh ban iashim bynta bad tang ar ngut kiba la lah ban jam shaduh ka pre-quarterfinal, hynrei ki la mad noh ia ka jingshah rem watla ki la lah ban pynpaw ia ka jingtbit ha kane ka jingiakhun.Ka jingwanrah ia kum kine ki lympung ka la long ka jingpynshlur bad ai mynsien ia ki nongialehkai ka Jylla ba kin long kiba trei shitom. Te kumta ka long kaba donkam ban ioh ia ki jaka ialehkai kiba biang, ki rukom jied kiba kat kum ka juk mynta bad ka jingai jinghikai kaba paka na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ki nongialehkai bad ruh ban lah ha ka ban pynurlong na ka bynta ban ioh rung sha ka Olympic Games.“Nga sngwkmen ban iohi ia ka jingtrei shitom hapdeng ka MBA, BFI bad ka Sorkar Jylla ha kaba ka la long kaba jop,” la pynpaw u Bah Warjri. “Naduh ba nga la shimti kum u Myntri ka tnat ialehkai, nga la ioh ban iaid kylleng ka jylla bad nga la ioh ruh ban iakren bad ki samla bad ki nongialehkai. Ka Sorkar ka iohi jngai ia ki nongialehkai kiba don ia ki sap ialehkai ba kynsai bad ngi donkam ban iatrei lang bad ki samla lem bad ki synjuk ialehkai na ka bynta ban iohi ia ka jingkiew ki nongialehkai. Kane ka dei ka thong ka jong ngi bad ban pynurlong ia ki.”Shuh shuh utei u Myntri u la pynpaw ruh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshim khia na ka bynta ban tes haduh 14,500 ngut ki khynnah ialehkai. Napdeng kitei, 200 ngut la pynduna ki ban hap hapoh ka Elite Pathway Programme bad haduh 12 ngut kiba la shah jied ban ioh rung sha ka Super Elite Pathway Programme.Ha kane ka lympung manla uwei pa uwei u rangialehkai ki la hap ban iakhun haduh saw sien ban ioh rung sha ka final bad kiba bun ki bout kiba la kut hynne ka sngi ki dei kiba la iarai lang da baroh ki nongbishar.Ha kane ka jingiakhun, u Barun Singh na ka Services u la lah ban pynliem noh ia u Yaiphaba Soibam na Manipur da 5-0 ha ka 46-48kg, hadien la bud sa u rangiakura uba la khur ia ka takma rupa ha ka World Championships 2019 u Amit Panghal (Services) uba la jop ia u Anshul Punia na Chandigarh da 5-0 ha ka flyweight 48-51kg.U Lalit jong ka All India Police u la long uba nyngkong ban pynliem ia u rangiakura uba na ka Services u Pawan, ha ka bantam 51-54kg da 4-3.Ha ka final jong ka featherweight 54-57kg ki ar ngut ki Sachin ki la lah ban khur ia ka takma ksiar, ha kaba ka Services ka la jop ia ka Railways. Hadien ha ka final jong ka lightweight 57-60kg, ka Services ka la jop ia ka Railways lyngba u Akash uba la jop ia u Varinder Singh.U Shiva Thapa na Assam u la lah ban pynliem noh ia u rangiakura na ka Services ha ka light welterweight 60-63.5kg. Watla ma u lem bad u Vanshaj ki la iakhaid ha ka rukom iakhun, hynrei na ka liang ki nongbishar ki la rai jop ia u Thapa.Ka Services ka la khur jingjop biang ia ka jingjop ha kiwei pat ki hynriew tylli ki jingiakhun final. Ha ka welterweight 63.5-67kg, u Rajat u la jop ia u Abhishek Yadav na ka Railways, katba u Akash u la pynliem ia u Abhinab Saikia na Assam (uba la ioh ia ka nam Best Challenger Boxer) ha ka light middleweight 67-71kg. Ha ka middleweight 71-75kg, u Deepak u la jop ia u Ishmeet Singh na ka Railways bad u Lakshya u la lah ban pynliem noh ia u Harsh Choudhary na Rajasthan ha ka light heavyweight 75-80kg. Kine baroh ki jingjop ki long da 5-0.Ka jingiakhun kaba khadwei ka dei ka cruiserweight 80-86kg, u Vishal na Haryana u la sdang ban pyni ia ka jingkhlaiñ bor hashwa ba u Jugnoo na ka Services un kura da kaba tyngeh ha ka wat kaba khatduh na ka bynta ban jop da 5-2.U Sanjeet na ka Services, uba long u lahduh ha ka Asian Champion 2021 u la khur jingjop ha ka heavyweight 86-92kg da 5-0 pyrshah ia u Naveen Kumar na Haryana.Ha ka jingiakhun final kaba khatduh jong ka super heavyweight 92kg-plus hadpdeng u Sagar na ka Railways bad u Jaipal Singh na ka Punjab. Ha kane ka jingiakhun u Sagar, uba la khur ia ka takma rupa ha ka Commonwealth Games 2022, u la shah rem noh ha ka wat kaba lai hadien ba u Jaipal u la kura da kaba tyngeh bad na ka liang u rephri u la hap ban pynsangeh noh ia ka jingialehkai.Ha kane ka lympung, ka Services ka la iohpdiang ia ka nam Best Team, u Akash u la iohpdiang ia ka nam Best Boxer bad u coach ka SSCB u Jai Patil u la iohpdiang ia ka nam Best Coach. Ka Railways ka la wan ha ka kyrdan ba-ar. ia ki khusnem shimet la khur da u Abhinab Saikia na Assam ia ka nam Best Challenger Boxer bad u Pradeep Bisht ia ka nam Best Official. Ka Meghalaya ka la iohpdiang ia ka khusnam Fair Play.
title: KA SERVICES KUM KA KYNHUN BA KYNSAI HA KA 7TH ELITE MEN’S NATIONAL BOXING CHAMPIONSHIP

content: Ha step jong ka sngi Saitjaiñ kawei ka kudam buh ata jong ka Magic Cook kaba don ha Garikhana ka la kylla dpei ha kaba ki thylliej ding barhem ki la bamduh ïa kane ka kudam baroh kawei.  La antad ba ka jingjulor ka la kot da ki lak tyngka.Kane ka kudam, kaba la long trai da ka longiing Bajoria, ka la kem ding ha ka por kumba 1:00 baje eiei mynstep bad la suba ka lah ban dei na ka jingthud jong ka bording elektrik.Ka kynhun Pulit jong ka tnat Fire & Emergency Services, ka kynhun SDRF ki la wan poi ha kane ka jaka ban pynlim ïa ka ding khnang ban ïada na ka jingpur jong ka ding sah ki jaka kiba marjan.Ha kane jingjia, kam shym la don kano kano ka jingjia kaba sngewsih.Ka State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) tang shu ïoh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia, mar mar hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Commandant ka SDRF u Bah PH Khongsngi, bad u 2nd in-Command u Bah B. Sahkhar ki la leit sha kane ka jaka.Katkum ka jingpyntip jong u Divisional Commandant of Home Guards, Shillong u Bah PH Shylla u la ïathuh ba ka SDRF ka la pynkut ïa ka jingklang jong ka ding kaba la neh haduh  shiphew kynta da ka jingïatreilang bad kiwei pat ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar.Ka jingpluh jong kane ka kudam buh ata, ka la wanrah ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba jur bha ha ka thaiñ Garikhana bad ïa ki kali kiba wan na ka thaiñ Mawlai la pynïaid lyngba ka surok Motphran.U Sanjeeb Kumar Bajoria uba dei u trai jong kane ka karkhana ha ka jingïakren bad u nonglum khubor u la ïathuh ba u la ïoh jingtip ha ka por kumba 12:30 baje mynmiet katba u dang don sha Guwahati.“(Tang shu ïoh jingtip nga la wan her marmar) bad nga poi hangne ha ka por 2:00 baje mynstep bad ïohi tang ïa ki briew kiba ïalum bad ïa ka jingklang jong ka ding hapoh ka kudam. Nga ïohi ïa ki kali pynlip ding bad ïa ki kynhun ai jingïarap kiba pyrshang ban pynlip ïa ka ding,” ula ong.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u Bajoria, kane ka kudam ka dei kaba la rim bad kaba shu shna da ki dieng bad ka jingjulor ruh ka dei kaba la bun bha.Haba kylli, ula ïathuh ba hapoh kane ka kudam, la buh ïa u ata, moida, suji.
title: INGKHONG KA KUDAM BUH ATA, MOIDA MAGIC COOK HA GARIKHANA, JULOR DA KI LAK

content: Ki shipai BSF Meghalaya kiba la pynlong ka talasi kali ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la ïoh bat ïa kawei ka trok kit shini kaba don ïa u nombar ML 04 C 5133.  Ïa kane ka trok la bat da ki shipai BSF kiba ap pahara lyngba ka Mobile Check Post (MCP) ha surok Sonapur-Lumshnong kaba ban leit sha surok Lailong-Harai, East Jaiñtia Hills, Meghalaya.Ïa kane ka shithi la buhrieh hapoh u shyiap bad nalor ka buhrieh ïa ki tiar jong ka NBCC.Hadien la pynieng ïa ka kali, ki shipai BSF kiba la talasi ïa ka kali ki la lap ba la buhrieh ïa ka shini hapoh kali.  Mardor, ki shipai ki la bat noh ïa u nongñiah jong ka trok namarba um shym la lah ban pyni ïa ki dulir ban kit ïa ka shini bad nalor kata la lap ruh ba la pyndonkam ïa ka kali da kaba shu tap eitmiaw ba la kit ïa ki tiar jong ka NBCC.Ha kawei pat ka jingkhynra, ki shipai BSF Meghalaya ki la ïoh kurup ïa ki tiar khaïi be-aiñ kiba shongdor palat 28 lak ïa kiba la thmu ban shalan ruh sha ka ri Bangladehs.Ïa u nongñiah jong ka trok bad ïa ka shini la aiti noh sha ki Pulit jong ka Umkiang Out Post ban leh ïa kaba donkam.
title: KURUP KI BSF ÏA KI MAR KHAÏI TUH BA SHONGDOR 28 LAK, SHAH KEM UWEI

content: U Bah George B. Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ u la resaiñ noh kum u Vice President jong ka Trinamool Congress da kaba aidaw, ‘ba ka dei ka rai shimet’.U Bah George u dei uwei napdeng ki 12 ki MLA ka seng Congress kiba la pynïasoh bad ka TMC ha u snem 2021, bad long ruh ka party kaba khlaiñ ha ka Liang Pyrshah jong ka Iingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla.  U Bah George u la ïakhun ïa ka elekshon MLA kaba dang shu dep long shen mynta u snem na ka tiket jong ka TMC na Umroi bad u la shah rem.“Nga phah ïa ka shithi iehnohkam kum u Vice-President, TMC Meghalaya bad kum u President jong ka Umroi TMC Block Committee naduh kane ka khyllipmat,” ong u Bah Goerge ha ka shithi iehnohkam ba u la phah sha u State President jong ka Party u Bah Charles Pyngrope.“Ki snem ba la leit noh hapoh ka jingïalam bad ka jingkdew lynti jong phi ki la long shisha ki jingïaid lynti kiba kordor.  Ma phi bad ki para nongïalam phi la long ki nongkdew lynti ïa nga, bad ïa kito kiba ju don ryngkat ban tbeh jingshai kumno ban pynkylla ïa ki jingeh sha ki jingjop bad ïa ki jyrwit jyrwat sha ki kabu,” ula ong.U la ai khublei ruh ïa ki nongïalam bad ïa ki dkhot jong ka party kiba katkum ka jingshem jong u,ki la long ki nongïalam lynti bad ki nongkyrshan ha kiba bun ki liang ban ai ïa ka jingshakri sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka jylla.“Nga kyrmen ba ha ki sngi ki ban nang wan, ngi dang ïai bteng ban ïasam jingmut, khamtam ïa kito kiba pynmyntoi ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ngi,”u la ong.
title: RESAIÑ U BAH GEORGE LYNGDOH KUM U VP KA TMC, PYNPAW BA KA DEI KA RAI SHIMET

content: : Ki Pulit jong ka East Khasi Hills District kiba la pynlong ka jingkhynra ha ka miet sngi thohdieng ki la ïoh kurup 1538.8 litar ka Beer, 43775 litar ka kiad IMFL bad 270 litar ka kiad pyrsi na ki bynta bapher bapher ba la die be-aiñ bad ïa kine ki jingdih pynbuaid la pynjulor noh ha ka jaka ba la ïoh kurup.U Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills Bah Sylvester Nongtnger ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, kane ka jingkhynra jong ki Pulit ka long ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban tehlakam ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ.U la ïathuh ba ki Pulit ki la pynlong ka jingïaid pahara bad ban khynra ïa ki kali.“Ha une u bnai Nohprah bun ki tamasa kin sa nang wan. Ban khanglad ïa ki jingjia basngewsih, ki Pulit ki la shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka nongbah,” ula ong.U SP u la ïathuh ba ka jingtalasi bad pynngat kyndon ïa kiba buaid bad ïa kiba niah kali khlemakor la ka long ïa ki nongñiah kali saw shaka lane ar shaka kan dang ïai bteng khnang ban ïada ïa ki jingjia aksiden bad ka jingduhei ki mynsiem briew.
title: KURUP KI PULIT ÏA KA KIAD BAD KA BEER BA DIE BE-AIÑ

content: Ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) jong ka Sorkar Pdeng kam shym la ai ïa ka jubab kaba shai ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdawa ban pyntreikam noh ïa ka Inner Line Permit ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.Ka Sorkar Jylla ha u snem 2020 ka la phah sha ka Sorkar Pdeng ïa ka Resolution ban pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya ïa kaba la ai jingmynjur da ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla ha u Nohprah, 2019.Dang shen ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) ka la pynlong da ka jingïakhih bajaijai ha Jantar Mantar, New Delhi ban dawa ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng ba kan ai jingmynjur ban pyntreikam noh ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP), ban pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra bad ban ïapynbeit noh ïa u pud u sam hapdeng ka Jylla Meghalaya bad Assam.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang jong ka Central Executive Committee (CEC) u President ka seng u Bah Lamphrang Kharbani u la ong ba ka Ministry of Home Affairs ka la phah ïa ka jubab sha ka seng ha ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai halor ki ki lai tylli ki mat jingdawa jong ka seng.U la ïathuh ba ka Ministry of Home Affairs kam shym la kren shai ha kaba ïadei bad ka mat jingdawa ban pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) hapoh Meghalaya.“Kam (MHA) shym ong haoid lane em halor kane ka bynta,” u la ong.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdawa ban thaw ïa ka Boundary Commission, u Bah Kharbani u la ïathuh ba ka MHA ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha ka CS Division kaba khmih ïa ka jingïapynbeit pud ïa baroh ki jylla kiba don hapoh pud u sam jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka ri India.“Ka CS Division ka hap hapoh ka jingpeit ïa ka jingïapynbeit pud,”  u la ong.“Ka seng kan ym shongthait ban buddien halor kitei ki lai tylli ki mat tad haduh ban da poi sha ka thong jong ka jingjop,” u la bynrap.“Ka jingai jubab jong ka MHA ïa ki lai tylli ki jingkylli jong ka seng (halor ka ILP, ka ktien Khasi bad Garo, ka jingïapynbeit pud) ka dei ka jingburom ïa ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew bad ïa ki paidbah ka Jylla Meghalaya,” la pynpaw u Bah Kharbani.Halor ka jingdawa ban pynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka Khyrnit Baphra, u Bah Kharbani ula ong, “ka MHA ka kren ba ki jingpynsngew jong ngi lyngba ka jingaiti ïa ki dorkhas sha ki Myntri Sorkar Pdeng ka long ba ka hap ban pdiang ïa ki jingpynsngew tangba kam shym la kren eiei pat da kaba shai.”“Ngin ym shongthait bad ngin ym shong kli kti hynrei ngin ap beit ïa kaei kaba ka Sorkar thymmai ha Delhi kan pynpaw pyrthei. Shwa kata ruh, kumba ngi la smai bad ngi la rai kum ki nongïalam, ngi hap ban ïakren bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya,” u la ong.“Ngi kwah ba ki nongsynshar jong ngi, kin hap ban pynbeit ïa ki rukom speldak jong ka ktien Khasi. Ka Department of Khasi jong ka skulbah NEHU ka hap ban shimkhia ruh halor kane ka bynta,” ula ong.
title: YM AI JUBAB SHAI KA MHA ÏA KA HANM ÏA KA JINGDAWA ILP HA MEGHALAYA

content: Ka ophis jong ka Commissioner for Persons with Disabilities ka Sorkar Jylla ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka ophis State Resource Centre on Disability Affairs, Shillong, ka la pyntip ba ka jingrakhe ïa ka sngi kyrpang jong ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet la pynkynriah sha ka 4 tarik, Nohprah.“Ngi la pynkynriah ïa kane ka sngi, namarba ka 3 tarik, Nohprah ka hap ha ka sngi u Blei,” la ong ka Assistant Commissioner for Persons with Disabilities ka Kong Bridget Warshong ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ.Mynta u snem, ka jingrakhe ïa kane ka sngi kyrpang jong ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet lane ka ‘International Day of Persons with Disabilities, 2023’ kan long halor ka phang, “A Day For All”. Ka jingrakhe kan sa long ha U Soso Tham Auditorium naduh ka 10:30 baje mynstep.Ka Kong Warshong ka la ong ba ka jingpynlong ïa kane ka jingrakhe ka long ban pynsngewthuh paidbah ha kaba ïadei bad ka hok bad ka bha ka mïat jong ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhot met katkum ba hok ba la bsuh hapoh ka Rights of Persons With Disabilities Act, 2016 ha kaba kane ka aiñ ka kren shai ïa ka jingkynthup lang ïa ki briew kiba duna ha ki dkhotmet hapoh ka imlang ka sahlang.“Ka thong jong kane ka prokram ka long ban kynthup lang ïa ki briew kiba duna dkhotmet da kaba ailad ba kin pyni ïa ka sap ka phong kaba ki don bad ka jinglah ka jong ki,” la ong ka Kong Warshong.U State Resource Centre on Disability Affairs Bah Dylan Syiem, u la bynrap ba kane ka dei ka sien banyngkong eh ba yn pynlong ïa kane ka prokram na ka bynta ki briew kiba duna ha ki dkhotmet ha ka rukom ka jingïalehkmen.
title: SHA KA LAH SNGI U BLEI PYNKYNRIAH KA JINGRAKHE ÏA KA SNGI KYRPANG KIBA DUNA DKHOT LMET

content: Ki nongrep kiba la pynkhreh ban ïashim bynta ha ka Meghalaya Farmer’s Parliament ka ban sa long ha ka 4 tarik bad 5 tarik Nohprah ki la pynkhreh lypa ïa ki jingkylli ba kin sa buh hakhmat jong ki tnat treikam bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar Jylla.Ha kane ka sngi, ka Hill Farmer Union (HFU) kan sa rakhe ruh ïa ka sngi kyrpang jong ki nongrep ne ka Meghalaya Farmer’s DayU President ka HFU, Bah Commander Shangpliang ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ïathuh ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma, u Myntri ka tnat Animal Husbandry and Veterinary u Bah Alexander L. Hek, bad ka Myntri ka Rep ka Riang ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh kin sa ïashim bynta lang ha ka sngi plie ïa kane ka dorbar ki nongrep ka ban sa long ha nongbah Shillong.“Kin sa don ki jingbatai na ki tnat treikam bapher bapher halor ki skhim ba la ai jingmyntoi ïa ki nongrep,kata, na ka tnat Agriculture, Horticulture, Fisheries, Veterinary bad khamtam eh ïa ki mishon bapher bapher ba ka Sorkar ka la wanrah na ka bynta ki nongrep,” la ïathuh u Bah ShangplianKan sa don ruh ka kynta kylli jingkylli kumba long hapoh ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ba ki nongrep na manla kawei pa kawei ka Block ki ladep pynkhreh lypa ïa kiba ka Union ka ladep phah sha ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar ba kin ai jubab ha ka dorbar.Haba kylli, u General Secretary jong ka HFU, Bah Alfondbirth Kharsyntiew u la ong, ki jingkylli ki kynthup, “ïa ka jingbym biang ki symbai ba ka tnat ka ju pynpoi sha ki nongrep. Ka jingpynpoi ïa u symbai lyngba ki Block ka slem palat namarba tengteng ka por thung kam dei shuh, katba ki symbai ki dang wan poi.“Ka jingpynslem jong ka Sorkar, naduh u snem 2021 haduh 2023, ba ki nongrep kim pat ïoh ïa ka bailutksan halor ka jingshah pynjot jong ki marrep ha ki bor jong ka mariang,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba ki nongrep ki la pynpaw ruh ha ka jingkylli halor ka jingsngewkhia ba ki don ki khynnah ba la pep skul shiteng po“Ki nongrep ki la pan jubab na ka tnat Pule Puthi, kaei ka thong jong ka Sorkar ban pynduna ïa ka jingpep skul shiteng por ki khynnah ha ki shnong jong ki bad bynrap, “na East Jaiñtia Hills, ki nongrep ki kwah ban buh ïa ka Free Coaching Centre khnang ba ki khun jong ki nongrep kin ïoh ban pyntbit ïalade ha ki eksmin bapher bapher kum ka JEE, NEET bad kiwei kiwei namarba ki khun jong ki nongrep ki don ruh kiba thrang ban ïakhun wat ïa ka eksamin MPSC.“Kawei ka jingkylli kaba mih ka long ruh balei ka Sorkar haduh mynta kam lah ban pynduh ïa ka jingot kilo,” la ïathuh u Bah Kharsyntiew.
title: HA KA FARMER’S PARLIAMENT, PYNKHREH KI NONGREP DA KI JINGKYLLI ÏA KA SORKAR JYLLA

content: : U President jong ka Khasi Author Society (KAS) u Dr. DRL Nonglait, ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la iathuh ba u la shim ia ka rai ban ym iakhun satia ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha.Dang ha kine ki khyndiat taiew, ka khubor ka la mih ba u Dr. DRL Nonglait u dei uwei napdeng kiba la pynkhreh ban iakhun ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong Seat, ka ban sa long ha u snem 2024.“Ym dei ma nga uba pat tiket, hynrei dei ki nongialam ka UDP kiba tyrwa ia ka kyrteng jong nga,” la ong u Dr. Nonglait ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.U la iathuh ba katba u don sha Delhi na ka bynta ka jingpynlong ia ka jingiathir nia halor ka jingpynrung ia ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka riti synshar ka ri India, u la iohi ia ka khubor ba un iakhun ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha.“Ynda nga la wan phai na Delhi, nga la iakynduh markhmat ia ki nongialam jong ka UDP bad nga la pynpaw ba kam long satia ia nga ban iehnoh ia ka kam kaba nga dang bat mynta (kum u President ka KAS) bad namarkata ngan ym aplai satia ia ka tiket na ka UDP lane na kano kano ka party,” la ong u Dr. Nonglait.“Ban pynkylla ia ka kam na kaba nga bat mynta ka dei ka rai kaba eh haduh katta katta. Hadien ba la iakynduh ia ki (nongialam ka UDP), ngam shym la kyntait jyndat, nga la iakren bad pynshongnia bha.  Ki jingkit ki dei kiba bun syrtap bad ngam pat long ban iehnoh ia ki,” u la ong.U la iathuh ba ka la don ka jingiakren ban pynrung ia u kum u dkhot jong ka UDP na Mawthadraishan Circle.  “Ka la don ka jingïakren bad ngam pat ai ktien bad khamtam mynta leilei ngam don jingmut ban ialeh ia kano kano ka elekshon bad ka jingkylli ban rung sha ka UDP ne sha kano kano ka party kam mih,” u la bynrap.Kum ban shu pyntip, ka UDP ka la thung ia ka State Election Committee (SEC) ban wad kyrtong na ka bynta ban pyniakhun ha ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong bad na Tura Seat.Ki seng saiñpyrthei kiba ladep pynbna ia ki kyrtong ban pyniakhun na Shillong Seat ki long ka VPP kaba la pyniakhun da u Dr. Ricky J. Syngkon, ka NPP da ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh bad na ka Agatha Sangma na Tura. Katba ka Congress ka la don lypa ia u MP ba mynta jong ka Shillong Seat u Bah Vincent Pala u ban iakhun ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha ha ka wat kaba lai.Ka BJP ruh haduh mynta kam pat ioh kyrtong satia ban pyniakhun ha kane ka elekshon na Shillong bad na Tura watla ka la pyneh beit triang ban iakhun marwei khlem da iatreilang bad kano kano ka seng saiñpyrthei.
title: SHIM RAI U DR. DRL NONGLAIT BAN YM ÏAKHUN ÏA KA ELEKSHON LOK SABHA

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) ka la aipor 10 sngi ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya ba kan leh eiei halor ka jingkyntur pud jong ka Sorkar Assam ha ka shnong Bakhlapara, kaba hap hapoh ka Hima Nongspung, Ribhoi District.Ka Sorkar Assam ka la shna be-aiñ ïa ka surok ha ka shnong Bakhlapara wat hapdeng ka jingpyrshah kaba jur na ki nongsynshar Hima bad ki paidbah nongshong shnong khlem da pynsngap satia wat ïa ki jingpynsngew jong ki nongsynshar ka Hima Nongspung.“Ngin aipor 10 sngi ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya lyngba ka Regional Committee ba kan tuklar mardor ïa kane ka kam hynrei lym kumta ka seng kan shim da ka sienjam kaba tyngeh ban leh ,eiei la ka long kaba be-aiñ ne da kino ki lynti,” la ong u General Secretary ka HAHM, Bah Kyllang Thongni ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi saitjaiñ hadien ba la wai ka Central Executive Committee (CEC) jong ka Seng.“U Chairman jong ka Regional Committee ka Ribhoi District u dei ban tuklar mardor da kaba phah pynsangeh ïa ka jingshna surok be-aiñ da ka Sorkar Assam ha Bakhlapara hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Jylla Meghalaya,” ula ong.“Ngi la aipor 10 sngi, lada ka Sorkar Meghalaya kam shimkhia, ngim banse ban pyni da ki kam, la ka long da ka kam kaba be-aiñ lane da ka kam kaba long aiñ,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ba ka seng kan sa shong jingïalang bad u Acting Syiem ka Hima Nongspung ban ïakren bad ban ïa phylliew jingmut halor ka jingïai kyntur pud jong ka Sorkar Assam sha ka jylla.
title: BA SHNA SUROK BE-AIÑ KA ASSAM HA BAKHLAPARA, 10 SNGI AIPOR KA HANM ÏA KA SORKAR JYLLA

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma u la ong ba Sorkar kan kyrshan borbah ia ki nongrep jong kane ka jylla ha kaba pynmih ia ki marrep bad kumjuh ruh ban weng ia ki jingeh ba ki nongrep ki mad ha kaba iadei bad ka rep ka riang.Ia kane u Myntri Rangbah u la pynpaw haba kren ha ka dorbarbah jong ki nongrep lane ka Meghalaya Farmers’ Parliament kaba la long ha State Convention Centre, Shillong.Ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u la pyllait paidbah ruh ia ka Regeneration Meghalaya Project Program.Lyngba kane ka dorbarbah, ka ban sa kut ha ka sngi baar ka thong jong ka Sorkar ka long ban plie lad ia ki nongrep na kylleng ka jylla ba kin iasam ia ki jingtip bad ban sngap ruh ia ki jingeh ba ki iakynduh ha ka rep ka riang.Ha kane ka dorbarbah, la iashim bynta lang da ka Myntri jong ka Rep ka Riang ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Myntri ka tnat Animal Husbandry and Veterinary Department u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek, ka Secretary jong ka tnat ka Rep ka Riang ka Kong Isawanda Laloo bad ki nongrep na kylleng ka jylla.
title: YN KYRSHAN BORBAH KA SORKAR MDA ÏA KI NONGREP HA KA JYLLA; ONG U CM

content: Namar ka jingbun shaba palat jong ki briew kiba shim kabu ban khrong pisa be-aiñ ha ka kyrteng jong ka seng bad kumjuh ruh namar ka jingbym lah shuh ban register ia ka seng, ki nongialam jong ka Meghalaya Liberation Assocation of Visually Impaired (MLA0VI) ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ki la pynbna paidbah ba ka jingialang paidbah kaba la long dang shen ka la shim ia ka rai ban pynduh pyndam noh ia kane ka seng naduh kane ka sngi.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u President jong ka Seng u Bah Elkin Rynñiaw u la iathuh ba ha ka jaka jong ka  Meghalaya Liberation Assocation of Visually Impaired (MLAoVI) la pynkha thymmai da ka National Inclusive Society For Downtrodden Community (NISFDC) ka ban peit ia ka bha ka miat jong ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ka bor iohi jong ki khmat.U President ka Seng u la maham tyngeh ruh ia ki dkhot ka seng lane ia kino kino kiba shim kabu ban lum pisa ha ka kyrteng jong ka ka  Meghalaya Liberation Assocation of Visually Impaired (MLAoVI) ba ka seng hi ka ladep ban pynduh pyndam.U la pyntip ruh ba ka Seng ka la pynsangeh noh ban die paidbah ia ka Raffle Ticket.“Namar ka jingkhñium bad ka jingud shaba palat jong ki briew ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdie jong ka seng ia ka Raffle Ticket ban pynmih pisa na ka bynta ki jingdonkam babun jong ka seng bad khamtam eh ha kaba iadei bad ka projek ba ka seng ka la pyntrei ha ka shnong Mawlai Mawtawar, Shillong, ngi la shim ia ka rai ban pynsangeh noh ia ka jingdie ia ki Raffle Ticket,” ong u Bah Rynñiaw.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u, ki Raffle Ticket kiba ka seng ka ladep ban die paidbah haduh mynta ki dang long tang kumba 5 percent na kaba la shna.“Ngi kyrpad ia kito kiba ladep thied ia ki Raffle Ticket, ba kin ym sngew eiei halor kane ka jingpynsangeh jong ngi bad ngi kloi ruh ban pynphai ia ka pisa kaba ki paidbah ki ladep thied bad ngi long ruh kiba pdiang kylluid mynsiem lada ki don kiba kloi ban shu noh synñiang ia ka pisa jong ka Raffle Ticket sha ka seng,” la ong u Bah Rynñiaw.
title: BA JUR KA JINGSHIM KABU KIBA KHRONG PISA BE-AIÑ, LA PYNDAM NOH MLAoVI

content: Kum shi bynta ban ialap ia ka jingsniew jong u drok khamtam na ka jingngop jong ki khun samla ha ka jingkyrni ban dih ia u drok, ka United Democratic Party  (UDP) Youth Wing, Shillong City ka la pynlong da ka lympung ialehkai football kaba la tip kum ka 1st knockout  football tournament 2023, kaba don ruh ia ka phang pdeng, kaba ong, “United against drugs, deny drugs embrace life”.Ia kane ka lympung ialehkai ba la pynlong ha madan jong ka MFA, la sdang naduh mynta ka lah sngi U Blei bad yn sa pynkut ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha ka sngi sdang jong kane ka lympung ialehkai la ai jingpynshai halor ka jingsniew jong u drok da  u Superintendent of Police (City), East Khasi Hills District u Bah Vivek Syiem uba la long kum u resource person ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u President ka UDP u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh uba la long kum u kongsan bad kiwei kiwei.
title: IALAP PYRSHAH DROK KI SAMLA UDP DA KA JINGÏALEHKAI PHUTBOL

content: U President jong ka Khasi Author Society (KAS) u Dr. DRL Nonglait, u la kynthoh tyngeh ia u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ba u dei tang u khlein la thang, jwat la bam.Kane ka jingkynthoh jong u Dr. DRL Nonglait ka long hadien ba ka ophis jong u Myntri Rangbah kam shym la phah satia ia ka shithi sha ka tnat Political ba ka Khasi Author Society (KAS) ka ladep phah sha ka Sorkar Jylla khnang ban phah sha u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Sorkar Pdeng u Amit Shah ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdawa ban pynrung ia ka ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka riti synshar ka ri India.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei, u Dr. Nonglait u la kynnoh ruh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la shim sting shaba palat halor kane ka jingdawa ban pynrung ia ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra.“Ka dorkhas ba ngi phah sha ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) ka long kaba kham eh namarba ka jingdawa ka long ban wanrah ia ka Official Bill ha ka dorbar ka ban sa wan. Namarba ka Sorkar India ka ioh por tang ar bnai duna ban shim ia ki sienjam halor kane, imat kam pat long kaba kloi ban leh ia kata,” u la ong.“Kam (Sorkar India) pat don satia ia ka jingmut ban pynbeit thymmai ia ka Khyrnit Baphra jong ka riti synshar ka ri. Lehse ka jingdawa jong ngi ka long kaba kham eh, kim (MHA) shym la ai ia kano kano ka rai halor kane ka jingdawa,” la iathuh u Dr. Nonglait.“Ka jingtlot bad ka jingsuki na ka liang jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka dei kawei ka daw.  Hadien ba la wan na Delhi, ngi la leit da ka kynhun kaba khlain ban iakynduh ia u Myntri Rangbah, ban dawa ba dei ban pynlong ktien Sorkar noh ia ka ktien Khasi bad ha kajuh ka por ban thoh sha u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohing ka Ri ban pynkhreh ia ka Official Bill ban pynrung ia ka Ktien Khasi ha ka Khyrnit Baphra,” u la ong bad bynrap, “wat u Myntri Rangbah ruh u la kular ia ngi da kaba shai ban leh ia kata bad ha kaba iadei bad ka shithi kum ka jingkyrshan ia ka jingdawa jong ngi, ngi dawa ban wanrah ia ka Official Bill.”“U (Myntri Rangbah) la ong ba un leh noh ia kane hapoh kine ki taiew bad u ong ruh sngewbha ban pynkhreh ma phi ia ka shithi bad ngin shu pynbiang tang ia kiba long Official.  Ngi la ong ba phin phah ma phi na ka tnat Political bad ngi la leit ai ia ka shithi bad ka jingbuddien ka shithi kam mih satia. Hynrei ynda la telephone ia u PA jong u Myntri Rangbah u ong ba ki dang peit ban pynbit pynbiang ia ka shithi.
