Ka long thik kumba ong, “khlain la thang, jwat la bam.” Kane ka dei ka jingleh suki na ka liang jong ka Sorkar Jylla,” la kynthoh u Dr. Nonglait.“Namarba ka KAS ka dei kaba im sngi ia kane ka kam, ngim don ka jingdiaw mynsiem hynrei ngin sa shim da kawei pat ka sienjam ban iaid shakhmat ban pynjur ia ka jingdawa jong ngi,” la kren heh mynsiem u Dr. Nonglait.Haba kylli, hato ka jingpynslem jong u Myntri Rangbah ka dei neem namarba u ap lang ban leh ia ka ktien Garo, “ngam lah ban ong eiei hynrei u Myntri Rangbah u tip ia kata.”U la iathuh ruh ba ka KAS kan sa khot ia ka Central Executive Committee bad hadien ia kata ia ka General Meeting ban pyrkhat ia kiei ki kam ban leh nangne shakhhmat bad ka jingiatreilang kam dei shuh tang ha Meghalaya hynrei ban iatreilang bad kiwei pat ki kynhun na kiwei pat ki jylla kiba dawa ban ioh jingithuh ia ka ktien ha ka Khyrnit Baphra.
title: KHLEIÑ LA THANG, JWAT LA BAM, KYNTHOH U DR. DRL NONGLAIT ÏA U MYNTRI RANGBAH

content: Kaophis Commissioner for Persons with Disabilities ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka State Resource Centre on Disability Affairs ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la rakhe ia ka International Day for Person with Disabilities phyllaw jong ka State Central Library, Shillong.Ia ka ‘EMPOWERFEST-2023’ la plie paidbah da u Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Social Welfare u Pravin Bakshi  bad kiwei kiwei.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la banjur ba ka imlang ka sahlang ka dei ban pyniaryngkat kyrdan  bad ban pynkuupbor ia ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet.  U la ong b aka Sorkar ka la trei shitom ban phah ia ki jingtyrwa ban shna ia ki lynti iaid ba paka  na ka bynta ki briew kiba don jingduna dkhot ha ki ophis sorkar bad ki shlem treikam.Ha kane ka sngi, ka ophis Commissioner for Persons with Disabilities ka la pynkup burom ia u Director jong ka Sanker Rehabilitation Centre u Dr. Sandi Syiem da ka Champion of Mental Health Advocacy Award bad ia u Carmo Naronha jong ka Bethany Society da ka Leader of Equality Award.Kiwei pat kiba la shah pynkup burom ha kane ka sngi ki long ka kynhun Meghalaya Blind Women’s Football da ka khusnam Inclusive Sportsmanship Award, u heprit Rupari Nongrum da ka khusnam Inspirational Artist Award, ka St. Edmunds College da ka khusnam Trailblaizer in Accessibility Award, u Sengrang G Momin da ka khusnam Inclusive Media Representation Award bad ka Ibadalin Kharbuli da ka khusnam Literacy Award.U Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare u la pyllait paidbah ruh ia ka megAbility App naka bynta ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhotmet.Ha kane ka sngi, ka ophis District Social Welfare Officer, East Khasi Hills, Shillong ka la pynlong ia kane ka jingrakhe ha ka shnong Mawtap Pyllun, Sohiong C&RD Block.Ka District Programme Officer, ICDS Cell, East Khasi Hills District ka Kong S. Bang ka la long kum ka Kongsan ryngakat ka jingdonlang jong ka District Social Welfare Officer, East Khasi Hills ka Kong E. Kharchandy, u Rangbah Shnong ka Mawtap Pyllun u Bah R. C. Lyngkhoi, ka Kong B. Kharbuli na ka District Legal Services Authority, East Khasi Hills bad ki nongshong shnong.La pynlong ruh ia ka medical check up camp ba khlem donkam siew pisa da ka jingiatreilang bad ka Sohiong Community Health Centre.
title: ÏOH KHUSNAM U DR. SANDI SYIEM BAD U CARMO NARONHA HA KA INTERNATIONAL DAY FOR PWD

content: U Director General of Police (DGP) ka Meghalaya u Dr. L. R Bishnoi u la pyntip ba ki don haduh 2.5 lak ngut kiba pyndonkam ïa u drok ha ka jylla.Haba kren ha ka jingpyllait paidbah ïa ka DREAM project ha Shillong, u Dr. Bishnoi u la ong ba ka Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment, ka Sorkar India ka la pynlong ïa ka jingsorjamin ha ka ri baroh kawei bad kynthup ruh ha ki Union Territories.“Ha u snem 2019 ka Ministry ka la ai jingkheiñ ba ki don 7.5 klur ngut ki nongdih drok ha ka ri bad ki don 2.5 lak ngut ki nongdih drok ha Meghalaya” la ong u Dr. Bishnoi.U la ong ba ka Meghalaya ka dei kaba ïajan tam eh bad ka Golden Triangle kaba ju pyndonkam da ki snar khaïi drok kum ka lynti ïaid, ba kynthup ïa ka ri Myanmar, Thailand bad Laos namarba ka jingpynmih ïa u Opium, Heroine bad kiwei kiwei ki jait jingdih ba sniew la pynmih na kine ki ri.U la bynrap, naduh ba ka Meghalaya ka la long ka khyrdop rung bad mih, mynta ka la long ka ktem jong ki nongkhaïi drok.“Mynta ki nongpyndonkam ïa u drok ha ka jylla ka la nang kiew artet, mynshwa ka long tang ha ki jaka sor, hynrei mynta ka la rung wat sha ki nongkyndong. Mynshwa kiba dih drok ki dei tang ki shynrang hynrei mynta wat ki samla kynthei ba dang rit ka rta ruh ki ngop ha ka jingdih drok,” u la bynrap.U DGP u la kam ba ka jingpyndkam ïa u drok, kan ïalam sha ka jingmih ki kam runar ruser bad ka jingïapait hapoh ka ing ka sem bad ki jingjia aksiden.“Phin sngew lynngoh ba tang ha nongbah Shillong ki don 4 haduh 5 tyllli ki Cases jong ka jingïapait shiiing shisem ba la ujor manla ka sngi sha ki thanat bad manla ka sngi, 3-4 tylli ki jingjia aksiden ki jia ha nongbah Shillong bad haba ngi tohkit shaphang kata, ka daw ka long na u drok bad na ka kiad,” la ïathuh u Dr. Bishnoi.U la ïathuh ba ha u snem 2022, haduh 116 tylli ki Case la rejistar hapoh ka NDPS Act bad 234 ngut ki briew ki la shah kem bad tang ha une u snem 2023 kumba 183 tylli ki case la rejister bad 349 ngut ki la shah kem.“Ha u snem 2022, ngi la kurup haduh 7 kilo tam u drok heroin bad ha u snem 2023, ngi la kurup 16.7 kilo bad 1 kilo u drok heroin uba don ïa ka bor ban pynlong ïa ki 200 ngut ki briew ki ban im kyrni ha u drok,” u la bynrap.Haba ïadei bad Ganja, u DGP u la ïathuh ba ha u snem  2022, haduh 1,400  kilo la ïoh ban kurup bad tang ha une u snem ka la kiew sha ka 4,000 hajar kilo, 13,000 tylli ki dawai kuli Yabba ba la kurup ha u snem 2022 bad 61,000 tylli ha kurup ha u snem 2023.U la bynrap ruh ba ha u snem baladep, haduh 17,000 tylli ki dawai kuli Psychrotrophic Tablets la ïoh ban kurup bad mynta  u snem 44,000 tylli la ïoh ban kurup bad ka dawai jyrhoh ba la ïoh kurup ha u snem baladep ka long 27,000 tylli bad mynta u snem ki Pulit ki la ïoh ban kurup 1.5 lak tylli.“Ha u snem baladep ngi la kurup ruh ïa ka pisa na ki nongkhaïi drok kaba kot T. 37 lak bad mynta u snem ka la kiew sha ka T. 47 lak,” la ïathuh shuh shuh u Dr. Bishnoi.
title: 2.5 LAK NGUT KI NONGDIH DROK KI DON MYNTA HA MEGHALAYA; PYNTIP U DGP KA JYLLA

content: : Ka Shillong College Central Library, Shillong ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïathir ïatai sani kaba saw sngi ha u bnai baladep halor ka ka phang, “Beyond books: Unveiling the Digital Realm” na ka bynta ki samla kiba dang pule ha ka First Semester.Ka jingthmu ba la pynlong ïa kane ka jingïatai ka long ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki samla pule ïa ka jingïaid stet jong ka por ba la donkam ïa ka Digital nalor ki kot pule bad ban pynsngewthuh ruh ha ki ïa ka bynta jong ka New Education Policy (NEP), ba ka College ka la thmu ban ai jinghikai sha ki samla pule katkum ka jingdawa jong ka por ban pyndonkam ïa ki teknoloji.Ha kane ka sngi, la ai jingkren da u Vice Principal jong ka Shillong College u Bah Badondor Syiem u la pynpaw ba ka thong jong ka Library ka long ka shlem pule kaba kongsan bha, bad kyntu ruh ïa ki samla pule ban pyndonkam hok ïa ki tyllong jingtip ba ki ïoh na ka Library.U Vice Principal u la kyntu ruh ïa ki samla pule ba kin phaikhmat da kaba pyndonkam ïa ka Digital khnang ban ïoh ïa ki tyllong jingtip kiba kham thikna.La ai jingpynshai shuh shuh sha ki samla pule da ka Librarian jong ka College ka Kong B. Lyngdoh. Ka la pyntip ruh sha ki samla pule ba ki tyllong jingtip ki don da ki hajar bad ki phew hajar tylli lyngba ka e-resources.Ka la pyni nuksa ruh kumno ban pyndonkam ïa ka e-reader apps bad ïa kiwei pat ki rynsan, kaba pynshlur ïa ki samla pule ba kin nang kumno ban pyndonkam ïa ka e-resources kaba la don lypa la ka long na ka College lane na kiwei pat ki bynta.
title: PHAIKHMAT KA SHILLONG COLLEGE CENTRAL LIBRARY BAN PYNDONKAM ÏA KA DIGITAL

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha ka sngi baar u la kular hakhmat ki nongtrei COVID-19 Emergency Care Services Staff  ba la thung kontrak da ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah bad ka Sorkar kan sa siew dep ïa ka tulop jong ki hapoh ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai.“Ngi la rai ban ai por khatduh ïa ka Sorkar haduh ka 11 tarik, mynta u bnai, lada ka tulop kam poi, ngin pynlong da ka jingshah thngan hakhmat ka ophis Secretariat ha ka 15 tarik mynta u bnai,” la ong u Bah Kasperline ïawphniaw ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingïakynduh ïa u Myntri Rangbah.Shwa kane, kata, ha ka por mynstep, kine ki nongtrei COVID-19 na rilum Khasi-Jaiñtia bad na rilum Garo ki la tur paidbah sha ka ophis Directorate of Health Services (MI) ban dawa ïa la ka jong ka bainong kaba kim shym la ïoh mynta la kumba 6 ne 7 bnai kynthih.U Bah Kasparline u la ïathuh ba ka DHS ka la pynshai ba baroh ki kot ki sla kiba ïadei bad ka tulop jong ki nongtrei ladep phah lut sha ka Sorkar bad ka shong pat sa ha ka Sorkar ban pyndep ïa ka kamram kaba sah.Ka jingpan jingpynshai na ka DHS ka long hadien ba uwei na ki nongwad RTI Bah Disparsing Rani u la lap lyngba ka jubab RTI ba ka pisa ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la mang ban ïarap ïa ka jylla Meghalaya ka dang sah sa 43 klur tyngka.“Dei halor kane ka daw, ngi la wad jingtip na ka DHS hadien ba ka ong bym don pisa.  Ngi la ïakynduh ruh ïa ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh hynrei ka kren kyllaiñ pynban da kumne kumtai bad ka khynñiat sha ki Dealing Assistant. Ha ka jingtih bniah, ngi la leit tohkit ruh na ki ophisar jong ka tnat Pla Tyngka jong ka sorkar,” la ong u Bah Kasperline.U la pyntip ruh ba ha ka jingïakynduh markhmat bad u Myntri Rangbah, kane ka kynhun ka la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar ban thungkam biang sa shisien namarba bun na ki nongtrei ki dei kiba la don jingtbit namarba ki dei kiba la trei naduh ka por ba ka khlam COVID-19 ka la wan lynshop ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka sien banyngkong ha u snem 2020 bad ha u snem 2021.“U Myntri Rangbah um shym la ai kano kano ka jingkular hynrei u la pyntip ba un sa shong bishar bad ban lum ïa ka jingïalang shwa ban shim ïa ka rai,” la ïathuh u Bah Kasperline.Shuh shuh u la ïathuh ba ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah lyngba ka DHS bad ki District Medical & Health Officer (DM&HO) ki la thungkam ïa ki hajar ngut ki briew ha ka por ba dang wan lynshop nyngkong eh ka khlam COVID-19 hynrei kiba bun ki la iehnohkam ïa ka kam tang shu phah leit sha ki kamram COVID-19.“Ki tieng ban trei ha ki COVID Ward.  Ki don pat kiba ïai neh ha ka kam naduh ka por ba dang sdang ka jingpang COVID-19 nyngkong eh bad kiba dang trei haduh ban da shah pynkut ha u Nailur, mynta u snem,” la ïathuh u Bah Kasperline.U la pyntip ba ka DHS ka ladep phah da ka jingthoh sha ka Sorkar ba ka tnat ka Koit ka Khiah ka donkam bha ïa ki briew kiba la tbit bad kiba la trei ha ka por ba la wan lynshop ka jingpang khlam COVID-19.  Ngi la pynsngew ha u Myntri Rangbah ïa kane bad u la ong ba un sa bishar shwa ïa kine ki jingpynsngew.
title: HAPOH 10 TARIK NOHPRAH KULAR U CM BAN SIEW ÏA KA TULOP KI NONGTREI COVID-19

content: U Lamphang jong ka Ïingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla u Thomas A. Sangma ha ka sngi baar u la leit jurip bad pynïaid ka jingïalang pyrkhat kam ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshna ïa ka Assembly ba thymmai ha Mawdiangdiang.Ha ki jingïalang, la ïashim bynta lang da u Symbud Lamphang  Timothy D. Shira, ryngkat bad u Commissioner & Secretary jong ka Meghalaya Assembly u Dr. Andrew Simons, ki ophisar na ki tnat treikam bapher bapher bad na ka Assembly Secretariat.U Lamphang u la ïathuh ba la buh por khatduh ban pyndep ïa ka jingtei ïa ka Assembly ba thymmai kan long hashwa u Naitung lane Nailar, 2024.  U la ong ba ka jingthmu ban pyndep noh kham kloi ka long na ka bynta ban ïoh pynlong ïa ka Dorbar Synrai ha kane ka Assembly ba thymmai jong ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly.“Ngi la khot ïa ki tnat treikam bapher bapher mynta ka sngi . Ngi la khot ïa ka tnat PHE, ka ban shimkhia ban peit ïa ka jingbit jingbiang jong ka um hapoh ka ing. Ngi la khot ïa ka Social Forestry Department, ba kan shimkhia ban peit ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ka jaka bad ïa kiwei kiwei ki tnat kum ka Arts and Culture ka ban peit ïa ka jingpynitynnat ïa ki dur tynrai bad kiwei pat ki tnat treikam kum ka Information and Technology, ka National Informatic Centre.  Ngi la shim ïa ki jingai jingmut jong ki tnat treikam khnang ba ka kam kan ïaid shakhmat bad ngim kwah satia ba ka kam kan shu tyllun suki,” la ong u Lamphang.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshna biang ïa u tnum pyllun (Dome), u Lamphang u la ïathuh ba ladep pynkhuid lut ïa ki synrum ba la twa bad ka jingsdang ban shna biang ka la ïaid shakhmat.  U la batai ruh ba ïa u tnum pyllun yn shna da ki nar ban shu pyndait, ha kaba ki tiar kin sa wan poi ha une u bnai lane ha u Kyllalyngkot, 2024.  Ka jingpyndait ïa ki nar yn sdang la kumno kumno ha u Rymphang bad ban pyndep ha u bnai Ïaiong.Shuh shuh, u la ïathuh ba ka jingshna ïa u tnum pyllun yn sa peit bad khmih da ka Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Guwahati bad ka IIT Roorkee.Halor ka jingïakren ban pyndep ïa ka wat kaba ar jong kane ka kam, u Lamphang u la pyntip ba ka Ministry of the Development of North East Region (DoNER) ka la ai jingkular, ban mang pisa na ka bynta ka wat kaba ar bad ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka Detailed Project Report (DPR) ka dang ïaid shakhmat.U la pynpaw ruh ka jingkmen ba ka jingmang pisa na ka bynta ka wat kaba ar kan long ha poh ka mang tyngka jong une u snem.
title: SHWA KA DORBAR SYNRAI, 2024 BUH THONG BAN PYNDEP ÏA KA ASSEMBLY HA MAWDIANGDIANG

content: Kum ka dak ka jingkynmaw burom ia ka Phan Nonglait kaba dei ka nongialeh laitluid bad ka riewshlur jong ka Hima Nongkhlaw, ka kur lyngdoh Nonglait ha ka sngi Balang ka la kynmaw burom ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap ba 173 snem jong ka Phan Nonglait da kaba leit buh syntiew bad pynlong ia ka jingialang kaba lyngkot ha phyllaw jong ka ing sah jong ka kaba don ha ka shnong Nongrmai.La kha ia ka Phan Nonglait ha u snem 1799 bad ka la khlad noh ha ka 6 tarik Nhprah 1850 ha ka rta kaba 51 snem. Ka Phan Nonglait ka dei kaba la don bynta ha ka jingialeh laitluid bad ka kynthei riewshlur kaba nyngkong eh jong kane ka jylla Meghalaya ban ialeh pyrshah ia ki shipai Phareng kaba la jia ha ka jingiakhun thma hapdeng u Syiem Tirot Sing pyrshah ia ki shipai Phareng bad namar ki kam shlur jong ka Phan Nonglait, ki bor synshar jong ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District ki la pynbna ia ka sngi iap jong ka Phan Nonglait kum ka sngi shuti hapoh ka District manla u snem, kata, ha ka 6 tarik u Nohprah.Ha kane ka jingleh burom ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap jong ka Phan Nonglait la sakhi lang da u Syiem jong ka Hima Nongkhlaw u Pa’iem PM Syiemlieh uba la long kum u kongsan, u Additional Deputy Commissioner jong ka Eastern West Khasi Hills u Bah M.Diengdoh uba la long kum u symbud kongsan, ki Kur Lyngdoh Nonglait, u Sordar jong ka shnong Nongrmai u Bah Shailes Nongrang bad kiwei kiwei.
title: 173 SNEM KA LA KHLAD, KA KYRTENG KA PHAN NONGLAIT KA DANG IM HADUH MYNTA

content: : Ka Meghalaya Upper Primary School Teachers Association (MUPSTA), ha ka sngi baar ka la rakhe ïa ka jingïaid lynti kaba 30 snem kynthih ban ai jingshakri bad ban peit ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki nonghikai kiba hikai ha ki skul Adhoc Upper Primary kiba don ha ka jylla baroh kawei.Ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha madan Khwang Ummulong West Jaiñtia Hills District la ïashim bynta lang da u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi ka Sorkar Jylla u Rakkam A. Sangma uba la long kum u Kongsan, u Adviser jong ka tnat Pule Puthi u Bah HM Shangpliang, ka MLA jong ka Sutnga Saipung Constituency ka Kong Santa Mary Shylla,  u MDC ka Jowai North u Bah Brightstar Chyrmang, u President ka MUPSTA u Bah Kenneth Shadap bad ki nonghikai kiba la wan na kylleng ka ri Khasi-Jaiñtia bad Garo.Haba kren kum  Kongsan u Sangma u la ai mynsiem ïa ki nonghikai bad u la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ki nonghikai kiba haba hapoh ka shatri jong ka MUPSTA kiba la ai ka jingshakri la 30 snem kynthih.U la ong ba ka Sorkar kan wad ki lad ki lynti ban kyntiew ïa ka jingsiew jong ki nonghikai skul Upper Primary ynda la ïoh ïa ka jingai jingmut na ka State Education Commission ba ka Sorkar ka la thung.“Kumba ka long mynta ka Sorkar kam shym la shong klikti ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban ai ka jingïarap ïa ki nonghikai,” u la ong bad bynrap, “watla ki skul ki dei kiba la pynïaid da ki riewshimet bad ki kynhun bapher bapher hynrei ka Sorkar ka la jingkyrshan ban kyntiew ïa ka pule ka puthi.”U la ong kaba kongsan kum ki nonghikai ki dei ban shakri hok ïa ka kam khnang ban kyntiew ïa ka jingnang jingstad jong ki khynnah hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.  U la ong ruh ym tang ïa ki nonghikai hynrei ïa ki kmie ki kpa bad ïa ki nongmihkhmat jong ka jylla ki dei ban don ka jingïatreilang ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkyntiew shajrong ïa ka jingnang jingstad.Kumba long mynta ka jylla Meghalaya ka don ha trai duh ha ka pule puthi bad u Myntri u la kyrpad jur ïa ki nonghikai ba ki dei ban long kiba trei shitom khlem da buh ïa kata ka jingeh kaba ki don.La pynphuh pynphieng ïa kane ka jingrakhe da ki jingrwai bad ki jingshad tynrai ba la ïa shim bynta da ki dkhot na ki District bapher bapher.
title: 30 SNEM ÏAID LYNTI KA MUPSTA BAN SHAKRI ÏA KI NONGHIKAI ADHOC UPPER PRIMARY

content: Ki nongïalam bahakhmat eh jong ka seng kieng atiar Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) kim pat ai ïa kano kano ka rai halor ka jingkyrpad jong ka Sorkar ba kin wan shakhmat ban bteng ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong, “haduh mynta, ngim pat ïoh (kano kano ka jingpyntip na ki nongïalam ka seng HNLC).U la ong ba ka HNLC ka la pyntip sha ka Sorkar ba kano kano ka jingpyntip kaba wan na ka Sorkar ka dei ban ïaid lyngba na u ksiang ba ka seng ka la thung u Bah Sadon Blah, uba long ruh u President jong ka Hynñiewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF).Halor ka jingdawa jong ka HNLC ban map noh ïa ki mukotduma, u Bah Tynsong u la ong, “ïa kine ki ishu ngin sa lah ban ïakren ha ka miej.  Ynda ki nongïalam bahakhmat eh jong ka HNLC ryngkat bad ki Ksiang jong ngi na ka Jylla bad na ka Sorkar Pdeng ki la shong jingïalang kin sa lah ban pynpaw hakhmat ka Sorkar bad ong kiei ki jingmynjur.”U la ong ba ka Sorkar ka  ïaiban ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk kan dei ban long beit bad ki nongïalam ba hakhliehduh jong ka HNLC.“Ngan ïai kyrpad ïa ki nongïalam bahakhmat ka HNLC, ka jingkhang ka plie ban ïakren. Kawei ka kylla jong ka jingïakren ka ladep.  Ngi kwah ban ïohi sa ïa ka kylla kaba ar, kaba lai bad kaba saw tad haduh ba ngin sa poi haduh kaba kut,” la bynrap u Bah Tynsong.
title: DANG SNGAP JARJAR KI HEH HNLC ÏA KA JINGKYRPAD KA SORKAR BAN WAN ÏAKREN

content: Ka Maitshaphrang ka la rakhe ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap ba 173 snem jong ka riewshlur ka jaidbynriew, ka Phan Nonglait da kaba kyntu ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ban pynbna noh ïa ka 6 tarik Nohprah kum ka “Phan Nonglait Day,” kata kum ka dak ka jingai burom ïa ka jingnoh synñiang bad ka jinglen lade bad ruh ban ai da ka khusnam kum ka dak ka jingleh burom na ka bynta jong ka.Ka Maitshaphrang ka pynkynmaw ruh ba ka la pynlong ïa ki jingïalehkai drama ba la ai kyrteng, “Ka Drama jong ka Phan Nonglait” ha kiba bun tylli ki shnong ha ka nongbah Shillong bad ha ka shnong Nongkhlaw ha ki snem 1994-95, da kaba pynpaw halor ki jingnoh synñiang ki jong ka halor ka jingïaleh laitluid.ïa ka kot kaba ïadei bad kane ka drama ruh la pynmih ha kaba ïa ka kyntien maitphang la thoh da u (L) Dr. Barrister Pakem uba dei u Vice Chancellor barim jong ka skulbah North Eastern Hill University.Ka kot ba la ai kyrteng “Ka Phan Nonglait – A Lady Freedom Fighter of India” ba la thoh da u muktiar ka Supreme Court u Bah Daniel Stone Lyngdoh hadien ka jingwad bniah ïa kaba la don bynta ruh da u Salman Khurshid bad ïa kaba la pyllait paidbah ha ka 29 tarik u ïaïong 2022 ka la nang pynskhem halor ka jingdonkam kyrkieh ban ai ïa katei ka jingithuh.Nalor kata ka Maitshaphrang ha u kyrwoh lyngba u Bah Michael N Syiem Convenor ka pynpaw ruh ba kine ki kam shlur jong ka Phan Nonglait ki aiñ mynsiem ïa ka jaidbynriew jong ngi mynta namar ka dei ka jaidbynriew rit paid kaba la shah kerkut da ki jaidbynriew kiba heh paid suda.Kumta ka donkam palat ïa ka jingïatreilang kaba jan bha hapdeng ki kynthei bad ki shynrang khamtam ha ka bynta ban pyntreikam ïa ka Meghalaya Compulsory Registration of Marriage Act bad ban kyrshan ban pynlong aiñ noh ïa ka Equitable Distribution of Self Acquired and Ancestral Property.Shuh shuh ka pynpaw ruh ba ki kam shlur jong ka Phan Nonglait ki pyni lynti ruh ba ha ka khim ha ka banse, sha ki jaka ba ki shynrang kim long shuh ban tur dei ki kynthei kiba lah ban rung haduh ki kamra ba thiah ki nongshun.
title: DAWA KA MAITSHAPHRANG BAN PYNBNA ÏA KA 6 TARIK NOHPRAH KUM KA “PHAN NONGLAIT DAY”

content: : U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la pynpaw ba ka Sorkar kan sa khot noh shen ïa ka jingïalang jong ki kynhun bapher bapher ban ïathir ïatai bad ban ïathew ïawoh halor ka jingpynphai jong ka Ministry of Home Affairs ka Sorkar Pdeng ïa ka Meghalaya Residetns Safety and Security (Amendment Bill) 2020 bad phah ruh katto katne ki jingkynthoh.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Balang, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ba ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) Sorkar Pdeng ka la pynpaw ba ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security (Amendment Bill), 2020 ka ïatakhuh bad ki aiñ ba la mynjur da ka Parliament namarba ka jingthmu jong kane ka Bill ka long ban pynieng ïa ki khyrdop talasi mynder ne ki Facilitation Centre.U la ïathuh ba u Myntri Rangbah un sa khot noh shen ïa ka jingïalang bad ki kynhun bapher bapher na ka bynta pan ïa ki jingai jingmut bad ki jingsngew na baroh ki kynhun halor kane jingkynthoh bad ka jingpynphai biang jong ka Ministry ïa ka MRSS (Amendment) Bill, 2020.“Ka MHA ka ong ba ki Amendment Bill ka ïatakhuh bad ki aiñ ba la mynjur da ka Parliament namarba ngi thmu ban buh ïa ki Facilitation Centre ne ki Khyrdop talasi. Ki (MHA) pynpaw ba kane ka ktah namarba ka Meghalaya ka dei ka khyrdop rung bad mih, bad phim lah ban pynwit ïa ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah na ka them Barak Valley lane kiba wan na Guwahati ban leit sha Mizoram,” u la ong.Haba kylli, u la ong, “ka ILP ka dei kawei pat ka ishu.  Ka MRSSA ka dei kawei pat ka ishu. Ngi la ïai ban ba ngi dei ban ïoh ïa ka ILP bad ka ILP ka dei ka aiñ jong ka Sorkar Pdeng.  Kane ka aiñ ha ka por ba ki mynjur ïa ka, ki la don lypa ki kyndon, kaba ong ba phi donkam ban leh ïa kane khamtam ka Meghalaya ka dei ka khyrdop.  Phi hap ban leh ïa kane bad ban pynthikna ba ka leit ka wan jong ki kali bad ki paidbah kam dei ban shah pynwit. Kata ka dei ka ILP.”“Hynrei kaei kaba ngi leh ïa ka MRSSA, balei ki pyni, ki ong ba kane ka ishu ka ïatakhuh namarba kum ki nongshong shnong jong ka ri India ki lah ban ïaid laitluid na kawei ka jylla sha kawei pat bad kam don kano kano ka aiñ kaba lah ban khanglad ïa ki ban ïaid na kawei ka jylla sha kawei pat.  Kane ka ladei kawei pat ka ishu,” la ong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah.U la ong ruh, lada ka Sorkar ka mynjur ïa ka ILP, kin don ki kyndon kiba pynthikna ba kam dei ban don kano kano ka jingpynwit ïa ki paidbah kiba ïaid lynti na kane ka jylla.“Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la buddien ïa kane ka kam na ka Sorkar Pdeng halor ka ILP. U Myntri Rangbah u la ïalam ïa ka kynhun Myntri bad ngi la ïakynduh ïa u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri bad ngi ladep ïakren ym tang halor ka ILP hynrei wat ha kaba ïadei  bad ka jingpynrung ïa ka Ktien Khasi bad Garo,” la ïathuh u Bah Tynsong.
title: PYNTIP KA MHA BA IATAKHUH KA MRSS (AMENDMENT) BILL, 2020 BAD KI AIN KA PARLIAMENT

content: : Ryngkat lang bad ka ri India baroh kawei, ka tnad Home Guard and Civil Defence ka Jylla Meghalaya ha ka sngi Balang ka la rakhe ïa ka All India Home Guards and Civil Defence Raising Day 2023.Ha kane ka jingrakhe kaba la long ha Headquarter jong ka tnat Home Guards and Civil Defence kaba don ha Mawdiangdiang, la sakhi lang da u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla uba peit ïa ka tnat Home Guards and Civil Defence Bah Bah Coming One Ymbon uba la long kum u Kongsan ryngkat ka jingdonlang jong ka Director General ka Kong I.Nongrang, ki Pulit Ophisar jong ka tnat Home Guards and Civil Defence bad kiwei kiwei.U Bah Coming One Ymbon haba kren kum u Kongsan u la ong ba ka jingïatreilang jong ki Pulit Home Guards Volunteers ban pynïaid beit ïa ka jingdheng kali, ka jingpahara ïa ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ, bad ka jingïarap ïa ki Pulit ha kiba bun ki liang ka la long ka jingmyntoi haduh katta katta.U la ong ba ki Home Guard Volunteer bad ka tnat Pulit ki la ong ki ar tylli ki tnat treikam kiba la ïarap ïa ki bor synshar district ban peit ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ haba wan ki heh ki haiñ sha ka Jylla.U la ai jingïaroh ïa kane ka kynhun kaba ju ai jinghikai sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong kumno ban ïada bad ai jingïarap ïa kiwei pat haba wan ki jinglynshop na ki bor ka mariang.“Da ki jinghikai ba ka tnat Civil Defence ka ju ai barabor ka la pynmyntoi haduh katta katta ïa ki Dorbar Shnong, Nokma bad ïa ki paidbah,” ula ong.U Myntri u la pyntip ruh ba ka tnat ka ladep ai jinghikai pyntbit ïa ki 7110 ngut ki paidbah bad ïa ki khynnah skul ha ka Disaster Management, Search & Rescue bad First Aid ha ki sor bad khapsor.Shuh shuh u la bynrap ba ha u snem 2022-23, haduh 2531 ngut ki Home Guards Volunteers bad 330 ngut ki Civil Defence Volunteers ki la ïoh jinghikai. U la ïathuh ki don kumba 1391 ngut ki Home Guards Volunteers ba la ïoh jinghikai.Shwa kane, u Kongsan u la aiti ïa ki medal na ka bynta ka Home Guards and Civil Defence Medal for Meritorious Service sha ki san ngut ki Civil Defence bad Home Guards. U la sam ruh ïa ka Director General Civil Defence Disc & Commendation Certificate, MHA, New Delhi 2022 sha ki 12 ngut ki nongïoh khusnam.Ka Director General of Civil Defence & Home Guards, Meghalaya Kong I. Nongrang ka la sam ïa ka khusnam pisa kaba la tip kum ka Director General of Civil Defence and Home Guards, Meghalaya bad ka Commendation Certificate, 2021 sha ki hynriew ngut ki Pulit CD &HG.Ka Kong MW Nongbri kaba long ka Executive Director jong ka State Disaster Management Authority (SDMA), ka Kong C. Kharkongor kaba long ka Secretary jong ka tnat Civil Defence & Home Guards, u A Agarwal, uba dei u Inspector General of Police, CRPF, u MK Sangma uba dei u Joint Director jong ka Civil Defence, Meghalaya, bad u Bah RP Khongwar uba dei u Joint Commandant General of Home Guards, Meghalaya bad u Bah V. Syiem, SP City ki la sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi.
title: 22 NGUT KI PULIT HOME GUARD BAD CIVIL DEFENCE KIBA SHAH PYNKUP BUROM HA KA RAISING DAY

content: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha ka sngi Balang ka la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra Trading License ha Iewduh hadien ka jingïoh ujor na kawei ka kynhun kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Khun Kynthei Hynñiewtrep Association (KKHA) ba ki don ki nongdie dukan ha Iewduh kiba bym don ïa ka Trading License bad ki don ruh kiba shu leh Benami.Ïa ka jingujor ka KKHA ka la aiti ha u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem dang shen bad ha kane ka jingkhynra mynta ka sngi, ki nongïalam jong kane ka kynhun kim shym la wan mih satia ban ïalam lynti bad ban kdew ïa ki dukan jong ki bar jylla ki bym license.Ha kane ka jingkhynra ba la lamkhmat da u Executive Member i/c Trade la synrang lang da ki MDC ba kynthup ïa u Bah Fantin Lakadong bad u Bah Gabriel Wahlang, u Syiem jong ka Hima Mylliem u Pa’iem Ainam Manik Syiem, ki Myntri ka Hima Mylliem, ki Ophisar jong ka KHADC, ki Pulit ka tnat Enforcemnt bad ki Pulit Syiem.Namar ka jingbym tip shai katkum ka jingujor jong ka KKHA halor ka jingkynnoh ba ka don ka jingleh Benami ki kynthei Khasi kiba shong die jingdie ha Iewduh, na ka liang jong ka KHADC bad ka Ophis u Syiem Mylliem ka la pynlong tang ïa ka jingkhynra ha Basa dei Kot bad la shu phah noh ïa ki Enforcement ban khynra pyndep hapoh Iewduh bad ha kane ka jingkhynra ka KHADC ka la khang tala saw tylli ki dukan kiba khlem pynthymmai shuh ïa ki laisen ki jong ki.
title: JAH KLEP KI NONGUJOR HA ÏEWDUH, KHYNRA LAISEN TANG DEP KI EM BYM TIP ÏA KI JAKA LEH BENAMI

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ha ka sngi Balang ka la dawa ia ki bor pyniaid jong ka North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS) ban ailad ia ki samla trai ri trai muluk ba kin thoh ia ka eksamin ha la ka jong ka jylla.Ka KSU ba la lamkhmat da u General Secretary u Samla Donald V. Thabah ka la aiti da ka dorkhas ha u Director ka NEIGRIHMS u Prof (Dr.) Nalin Mehta ban pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingthungkam ha ka post Group-B bad Group-C.Ha ka shithi, ka Union ka la pynpaw ba ka lap ba bun na ki nongthep kam kiba dei ki trai jylla jong ka jylla Meghalaya kiba aplai ia ki post ha ka Group B bad C la bthah ba kin leit thoh eksamin sha ki Centre kiba don shabar ka jylla.“Kane la pyndiaw bha haduh katta katta ia ki samla namarba ki jaka thok eksamin la leh khnang da kaba phah sha bar jylla khnang ban pynduhlad ia ki bad ban ailad ia kiwei pat ki bym dei ki riewlum ban ioh rung ha kine ki kam,” ong u General Secretary ka KSU.“Ka Union ka lap ba ki nongaplai kam na Meghalaya ki hap ban leit thoh eksamin shabar ka jylla na ka bynta ki kam ba la thep katba ki kam ki dei kiba hap ban trei ha la ka jong ka jylla bad kane kam dei satia ka sien kaba nyngkong bad kane ka la jia la bunsien bad ka Seng kan ym ailad satia ba kum kine ki jingjia kin dang jia biang hadien habud,” u la ong.U la ong ruh ba ka Union ka la kyrpad ia ki bor badei peit ba ki dei ban sngewthuh ba bun na ki nongaplai kam na kane ka jylla ki dei kiba wan na ki longing kiba kham duna ka ioh ka kot bad kam long satia kaba suk ia ki ban leit sha kiwei pat ki jylla tang ban thoh ia ka eksamin bad kane ka long kumba pynduh ia ka hok ka jong ki.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka Seng ka la dawa ia ki bor pyniaid ka NEIGRIHMS ban ailad shwa ia ki trai jylla ha kane ka jingthungkam.
title: NGAT THOH EKSAMIN KAM KI TRAI JYLLA SHABAR JYLLA, ÏAKYNDUH KA KSU ÏA U DIRECTOR NEIGRIHMS

content: U Bull N. Lyngdoh uba ki paidbah ki tip kum u Bull u dei u President ba saw jong ka KSU. U la shimti ia ka kam President ha u snem 1983 tad haduh u snem 1990. U la bat ruh kum u Secretary General ka North East Students’ Union (NERSU) hapdeng kine ki snem.U Bah Bull u pawkhmat bha halor ka jingiakhih pyrshah Nepali ha u snem 1987 kaba la tip ruh kum ka 2nd Anti-foreigners Movement hadien ka jingiakhih pyrshah kharbangla ha u 1979 ba la lam khmat da u Bah Michael Syiem. U Bah Bull ha ki por u Bah Mike u bat kum u Disciplinary Secretary ka seng.Lyngba ka Indo-Nepal Treaty 1950, da ki phew hajar ngut ki Nepali ki la wan tuid sha Meghalaya naduh u snem 1980 terter ban buhai shnong. Ynda ki la roi ki la sdang ban dakhol naphang ia ki jaka ki puta ki Khasi, ki la khang ia ki Khasi ban rung sha ki dong ba bun ma ki bad ki la bom la tied naphang ia ki Khasi ha manla ki jaka khlem da map shuh wat ia ki kynthei Khasi ba sait jaiñ ha Urkaliar, ha kaba ki la leh be-i-jot ia ki.Ha u snem 1987, la seng ia ka kynhun pyntriem Nepali, ka Gorkha National Liberation Front ha Shillong bad la lam khmat da u Captain Amitabh Thapa, u ex-army. U Captain Amitabh Thapa lem bad ki runar Nepali ha utei u snem ki la leit ieng habar khyrdop jong man ki college ha Laitumkhrah ha ka por ba dang ai Admission. Ki la bat lut ia ki khynnah Khasi (kynthei bad shynrang) bad tar ia ki Application Forms jong ki bad shah tang ia ki Nepali ban thep klas. La mih ka khubor ruh ba ki gang u Amitabh ki la batbor ia kawei ka samla pule Khasi ha kyrpong ka St. Anthony’s College.Ha kane ka por, u Bah Bull u dang shu pyndep ia ka B.Sc bad bteng ia ka LLB ha Shillong Law College. Ki samla wad klas ki la ujor sha ka KSU ba kim ioh thep klas namarba la khang da u Captain Amitabh Thapa bad ki gang Nepali ki jong u. U Bah Bull lem bad kiwei ki dkhot ka KSU ki la tur sha Laitumkhrah bad shoh naphang ia ki gang Nepali kynthup ia u Captain Thapa kiba pahara ha ki khyrdop College. Hadien kane ki Khasi ki la ioh ban thep klas tangba ki Nepali ki la sat sia bad sdang pyntriem ia ki Khasi da kaba shoh dat naphang ia ki ha ki shnong ki thaw khamtam ha Mawprem, Mawlai, Laban bad Nongmensong. Ki la pynkylla jubor ia ka kyrteng Nongmensong sha ka Lalchand Basti. Ki la dawa ruh ban pynkylla kyrteng ia ka Ri Bhoi Sub Division sha ka Gorkha District.Dei hangne ba ka KSU lyngba u Bah Bull ki la ieng rangbah ban iakhun ia ki Nepali kiba pyntriem ia ka jaidbynriew bad ka jingiakhih ka la neh haduh shi snem kynthih. Ha u 1987, khlem long skul, long trei ne long klas.Bun ngut ki Khasi ki la shah kem, shah pyniap bad shah set along. Ki bor shipai, CRPF bad Pulit ki thom naphang ia ki Khasi. U Bah Bull u shah kem bad shah tied naphang ha ki bor sorkar. Shisien ha DC ophis, ki Pulit ki thlieh pathar ia u da ki lathi tad haduh ban da pait ka khlieh jong u bad ka snam jong u ka lyngkien ha madan DC ophis.Hynrei u Bah Bull u khlem pyndem, ka jingiakhih ka iai bteng. Phet ki Nepali na Mawlai, Lower Mawprem, Nongmensong bad Ri Bhoi. Ki bor Sorkar ki kput da kaba siat iap ia u Paul Biswal Makri, u dkhot ka KSU na Umrit, Ri Bhoi ha Motphran.U Bah Bull u la iakhun ilekshon ha u 1990 na Malki-Nongthymmai Constituency bad u la jop, hynrei hadien um treh ieng ilekshon shuh namar u la i ngiah ia ka jyrsieh politics.Namar ka jingshah tied shah pynshitom ha ki bor Pulit, u Bah Bull um lah kyrda shuh na ki jingpang bad u la khlad noh na ka pyrthei ha ka 7 tarik, Nohprah 1994 ha ka rta ba dang lung, kata 42 snem.
title: U BULL NONGJOP LYNGDOH, KHYNDIAT SHAPHANG JONG U

content: : Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la rai ban ai tam sa 1.4 akar ka jaka na ka bynta ban pynkynriah ïa ki 342 tylli ki longing na Them Iew Mawlong bad pynpaw ruh ba yn sa lah ban pynkut noh ïa kane ka kam ha ka taiew baar jong u Kyllalyngkot, 2024.Ïa kane ka rai la pynbna hadien ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba peit ïa ka tnat Kam Pohing Bah Prestone Tynsong bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba peit ïa ka tnat Pynroi Sor Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Main Secretariat ha ka sngi Palei bad ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC), ba la synran lang da ki nongmihkhmat jong ka Delhi Gurudwara.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Tynsong u la ïathuh ba ka HPC ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor katto katne ki ishu bad pan por ban ïasylllok shwa bad ki briew kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong.“Ngi la buh ïa ka sngi ban ïakren biang, kata, ha lane shwa ka taiew baar jong u Kyllalyngkot bad ngin sa ïakynduh biang ban shim syndon ïa ka rai bakhatduh,” la ong u Bah Tynsong bad bynrpa, “ngi sngew thikna bha ba ngin sa lah ban weng ïa kane ka mat ba la sah pongding ha ka taiew baar jong u bnai Kyllalyngkot,” u la ong.Haba kylli halor ka Blueprint ba la kham pynbha da ka Sorkar Jylla ha ka jingïalang, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “ka ophis ba mynta jong ka Shillong Municipal Board ka heh kumba 2.14 akar.  Namarba kam pat biang ban pynrung lut ïa ki 342 tylli ki longing, ngi la mynjur ban ai jaka sa khyndiat ka jaka, kaba heh kumba 1.4 akar.”“Ngi la pyni ha ki, (ïa ka modified blueprint) bad ïa kaba sah nangta ngin sa ïakren ha ka wat kaba khatduh,” u la bynrap.U Bah Tynsong u la kyntait ban ïathuh ïa kaei kaba ka HPC ka la pynpaw.Shuh shuh u Bah Tynsong u la ong ba ha kane ka jingïalang ym shym la ïakren ïa ka jingpynlut pisa kaba ïadei bad ïa ka jingshna ïa ki ing na ka bynta 342 tylli ki longing. “Ïa mynta ngi la rai da kawei ka sur ban pynkynriah (ïa kiba sah ha them Iew Mawlong) sha ka jaka sah ba thymmai,” la bynrap u Bah Tynsong.U Secretary jong ka HPC u Gurjit Singh u la ong ba ki hun ïa ka Blueprint jong ka Sorkar bad ki don katto katne ki mat ba kongsan ïa kiba yn dang hap ban ïakren bad kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong.“Ka HPC kan sa lum da ka jingïalang ïa ki briew kiba sah ha Them Iew Mawlong ban ïathir ïatai halor ka jingïakren kaba mih na ka jingïalang mynta ka sngi bad ka sorkar,” u la ong.U General Secretary jong ka Delhi Sikh Gurdwara Management Committee u Jagdeep Singh u la ong ki don katto katne ki kam ïa kiba ym pat lah ban shim rai bad ïa kiba yn dang hap ban shim rai na kawei pat ka liang.Ka Sorkar ka la hap ban shim ïa ka rai ban pynkynriah ïa ki briew kiba sah ha Them Iew Mawlong ka long hadien ka jingshah shoh pynmynsaw jong ki katto katne ngut ki briew Them Iew Mawlong kaba lam shaduh u pud ban mih ka jingïakynad hapdeng ki Khasi bad ki jaidbynriew Sikh ha u Jymmang, 2018.Ki bor synshar ka East Khasi Hills District ki la hap ban pynjari da ka korphiw ban tem ïa ka jingbitar jong ki paidbah.
title: SA 1.4 AKAR AI JAKA KA SORKAR BAN SHNA ÏA KI 324 TYLLI KI LONGÏING NA THEM IEWMAWLONG

content: : Ka Kashari jong u Special Judge (POCSO) Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills kaba la pynshong nongrim na ki sakhi sabut ba la ïoh ha ka jingtohkit, ka la rai pynrem ïa u Tephor Wardkhar bad hukum ban set along haduh 10 snem kynthih nalor kaba daiñ kuna T. 30 hajar kum ka jingpynshitom hapoh ka Section 6 jong ka POCSO Act.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka Eastern West Khasi Hills sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Palei, la pyntip ba ki Pulit ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ka ejahar ha ka 18 tarik Rymphang, 2017 ba iwei i heprit kynthei i la shah leh beijot ha u Tephor Wardkhar.Ki Pulit ki la register case pyrshah ïa u nongleh kam bymman ha Mairang Police Station hapoh ka Section 5(n)/6 POCSO Act bad ïa ka jingtohkit la bynshet ha ka WPSI RR Marak jong ka Mairang Police Station bad ïa ka case la pynngat kyndon da ka Investigating Officer hapoh ka Section 5(n)/6 POCSO Act.Ka Kashari u Special Judge (POCSO) Nongstoiñ, West Khasi Hills ka la pynmih ïa ka rai ba la pynrem ïa u Tephor Wardkhar  ha ka 30 tarik u bnai baladep.
title: 10 SNEM SHAH SET ALONG U TEPHOR WARDKHAR UBA LEH BE-IJOT ÏA I HEPRIT

content: a Meghalaya Medical Drugs & Services Limited (MMDSL) ha ka sngi Palei ka la pynshai ba katkum ka kaiphod ba la leh test (Quality Test report) ka la pynthikna ba u dawai kuli Albendazole u biang nadong shadong katkum ki kyndon bad kam don kano kano ka jingktah kumba la pur ka hamsaia ha ka jylla.Ha u kyrwoh, u Managing Director jong ka MMDSL u Ramkumar S u la ong tang shu ïoh ïa ka kaiphod ha State Warehouse, ïa u dawai kuli Albendazole batch no. MS4AI2301 (Manufacturing Date: Jan-2023, Expiry Date: Dec-2025) la bthah sha ki District katkum ka jingdonkam.Ïa ka test la leh ha u Rymphang, 2023, kynthup ruh ïa ka jingleh test ha ka jaka ba la shna bad ka kaiphod leh test jong ka National Accreditation Board for Testing and Calibration Laboratories (NABL) ki pynshisha ba u dawai kuli u dei uba biang nadong shadong.Halor ka jingïoh pdiang ïa ka jingtip na ka Regional Drug Testing Lab (RDTL), Assam, ha u Risaw, 2023, kaba kdew ba u dawai kuli, ‘um don ïa ka standard quality,” mar mar ka bthah ban pynsangeh ka jingsam ïa une u dawai kuli.U Ramkumar u la ong ba ïa ka Comprehensive Quality Reassessment la pynlong biang sa shisien ha u Naiwieng, 2023 da ka Quality Control Division of Meghalayan Medical Drugs & Services Ltd kaba la shim ïa ki nuksa dawai kuli na ki Warehouse.Ïa kine ki nuksa la phah sha ka NABL, ka Laboratory ba la ïoh jingithuh ha Kolkata, katba ïa ka jingshna bad ïa u Batch Number la buhrieh noh.  U Batch Number ba la pynmih da ka Quality Assurance department u dei u MMDSL QC 0022.“Ka kaiphod ka pynshisha ba u dawai kuli Albendazole uba don ïa u batch no. MS4AI2301 (Manufacturing Date: Jan-2023, Expiry Date: Dec-2025) u dei uba biang pura,” u la ong haba pynpaw ba ka jingleh ïa ki tes ka long ha ka Laboratory jong ka NABL bad ha ka Manufacturer’s in-house Lab.“Kine ki ar tylli ki Laboratory ki pynshisha ba u dawai u dei uba biang, uba shngaiñ bad ka Meghalayan Medical Drugs & Services Ltd ka la shim ïa ki sienjam ban phah peit bniah ïa ka jinglong jong u dawai, hadien ba la mih ka khubor hamsaïa.Nalorkata, kam don kano kano ka jingktah ba la pynpaw haduh mynta,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u Managing Director u la kular ba ka Sorkar ka la shimkhia bha ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ki dawai ban pynthikna ba ka jingai jingshakri sha ki paidbah ka long ha ka por kaba biang.
title: PYNSHAI KA MMDSL BA U DAWAI KULI ALBENDAZOLE UM DON KANO KANO KA JINGKTAH

content: U Myntri ka tnat Bording ka Sorkar Jylla u Abu Taher Mondal u la leit jngoh ïa ka Pump Storage Programme at Purulia (PPSP), kaba don ha West Bengal, kaba lah ban pynmih bording haduh 4×225 Mega Watt kaba la pyntreikam naduh u snem 2007.Ïa u Myntri la synran lang da u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Bording u Sanjay Goyal, u Director (Generation) jong ka West Bengal State Electricity Distributor Company Limited (WBSEDEL) u Subhasankar Debsarma Biswas.U Subhasankar Debsarma Biswas u la pyni ruh ïa ka Presentation ha u Myntri bad pyntip ruh ïa ki rukom pyntreikam ïa kane ka projek.Ka jingleit jngoh jong u Myntri ïa ka PPSP ka long ban sngewthuh kum ban weng ïa ka jingkyrduh bording ba la mad da ka jylla Meghalaya.“Ka jingleit jngoh ïa ka Purulia Pumped Storage Project (PPSP) ka la ai jingmyntoi haduh katta katta.  Kane ka projek ka dei kaba nyngkong eh ha ka ri India kaba don ïa ka pumped storage kaba pynmih bording 900 megawatt.  Ban kynjoh sha ka thong ba ka Jylla Meghalaya ka donkam ïa ka bording, ngi hap ban sngewthuh bad ban khmih bniah ïa ki tiar kiba lah ban pynmih ïa ka bording,” ong u Mondal.Ka PPSP ka dei ka Pump Storage Technology ba la pynmih lyngba ka um ne ka Hydel Power Generation. Ka thong jong ka PPSP ka long ban pyndap ïa ka jingkyrduh bording bad ban pyndonkam ïa ka bording ha ka por ba duna slap, bad kan pynduna ruh ïa ka jingdawa.  Ka Meghalaya ïa mynta ka pynmih bording na ki phra tylli ki Hydroelectric Power Plant kaba kot 355 megawatta, da kaba thied pat sa 228 megawatt na ki shlem pynmih bording ka sorkar pdeng.  Kumba 68% ka tyllong pynmih bording ka dei na ka Hydroelectric, kaba pynlong ïa ka jylla Meghaya kawei na ki jylla kaba pynmih ïa ka bording kaba khuid tam ha ka ri.U Sanjay Goyal u la pynpaw ba ka sorkar kan wad ïa ki lad ki lynti kumno ban weng ïa ka jingkyrduh bording.  Ki don bun tylli ki Hydro Project ha ka jylla bad ka jingleit jngoh ïa ka Purulia ka long ban pyntreikam kumjuh ha kane ka jylla.
title: LEIT JURIP U ABU TAHER MONDAL ÏA KA PURULIA PUMPED STORAGE PROJECT HA WEST BENGAL

content: : Ki Pulit ka kynhun Anti-Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) West Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Balang ki la ïohkem ïa uwei u nongdie drok ha ka por kumba 8:00 baje mynmiet uba shong basah ha Mawlai Nongkwar, East Khasi HillsÏa une u nongdie drok, ki Pulit ki la ïohkem ha ka shnong Upper New Nongstoiñ bad ha ka jingtalasi, ki Pulit ki la ïoh kurup 4 gram u drok, 43 tylli ki tyndong, 2 tylli ki thyrnia injek bad ka pisa T. 1736.Ki pulit ki la register case pyrshah ïa une uba la shah kem bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakkhmat.
title: KEM KI PULIT NONGSTOIÑ ÏA U NONGDIE DROK BA SAH MAWLAI NONGKWAR

content: Shillong, Nohprah, 08: Ka North East Students’ Organization (NESO) ka la pynbna kum ka sngi badum ne ka Black Day ha baroh ki Jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ka ri India ha ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai kum ka jingpyrshah ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019, kaba long ka jingleh bym hok pyrshah ïa ki riewlum ritpaid jong kane ka thaiñ.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah ha ka sngi Thohdieng, u Chairman jong ka NESO u Bah Samuel B. Jyrwa u la ong ba ka NESO ka kwah ban pynkynmaw biang ïa ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei ba ha ka 11 tarik, Nohprah 2019, wat hapdeng ka jingpyrshah kaba jur jong ki riewlum ritpaid ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Bill 2019, ka Sorkar India kam shym la shah skhor satia bad khatduh ïawai lyngba ka Rajya Sabha la mynjur ïa kane ka Aiñ Ïakjakor kaba la tip kum ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act 2019.“Kum ka jingïaibteng ban ñiew ïa kane ka sngi kum ka Sngi Badum, ka NESO ka la rai ban teh lama iong ha baroh ki jaka ba kongsan jong ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ha ka 11 tarik, Nohprah, 2023,” ong u Bah Jyrwa.“Kane ka jingpynbna ka long ban phah ïa u kyrwoh sha ka Sorkar India ba ngi pyrshah ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act 2019 bad ha kajuh ka por ban pynkynmaw ïa ki paidbah bad ïa ki jingshah leh bym hok ba ka Sorkar India ka la leh pyrshah ïa ka mon jong ki paid riewlum ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi,” u la ong.U Bah Jyrwa u la ongba ka NESO, ka khot bad wer ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ban ai jingkyrshan ha kane ka sngi bad ha kajuh ka por ban bteng ïa ka jingïakhun na ka bynta kane ka jingshah leh bym hok.
title: PYNBNA KA NESO ÏA KA 11 TARIK, NOHPRAH KUM KA ‘SNGI BADUM’ BAN PYRSHAH ÏA KA CAA

content: : Ki Pulit jong ka Pillangkata Out Post bad ka Umiam Police Station, Ribhoi District kiba la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat jong ki shipai ka Eastern Command ki la pynlong ka jingkhyra ha ka shnong 9th Mile Baridua, Ri Bhoi District ha kaba ki la iohkem ia uwei u briew uba dei u nongshong shnong jong ka jylla Mizoram.Ki Pulit ki la ioh kurup ruh haduh 1001 tylli ki kuli jong ka suloi AK-47, 7 tylli ki kuli jong ka suloi LMG 7.62, 14 tylli ki kuli jong ka suloi INSAS 5.56, 30 tylli ki kuli jong ka pistol .32 pistol, 3 tylli ki tyndong thep kuli ba la thylli, uwei u tear smoke grenade, uwei u hand grenade, kawei ka tyndong thep kuli ba la thylli jong ka suloi INSAS, 3 tylli ki tyndong thep kuli ba la thylli jong ka suloi AK47, kawei ka tyngam ba don bad ki bniat jong u sniang khlaw, 7 tylli ki reng Skei, kawei ka shynrong khlieh skei, bad 34 tylli ki muhor jong ki tnat treikam bapher bapher ka Sorkar.Une uba la shah kem mynta u dang don ha kti jong ki Pulit bad ka jingtohkit pyrshah ia u ka dang iaid shakhmat ban lap ksai shuh shuh ia ka kynhun kaba donkti lang bad une uba la shah kem.
title: KURUP KI PULIT RIBHOI ÏA KI KULI, GRENADE, RENG SIER BAD MUHOR, KEM UWEI

content: Ka Kashari jong u Special Judge (POCSO), Shillong u M. Kumar ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai ka la rai pynrem bad ai jingpynsajia ïa u Dresstar Kurbah da kaba set along 20 snem bad ryngkat ka jingshaiñ kuna kaba 10 hajar tyngka.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills, Bah S. Nongtnger, u la pyntip, ha ka 2 tarik, Naiwieng, 2021 ki Pulit jong ka Mawlai Police Station ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ka ejahar ba la kynnoh ba kawei ka khynnah kaba la 15 snem ka rta ka la shah leh be-ijot ha u Dresstar Kurbah ha u bnai Jylliew, 2021.Ki Pulit ki la register case ha Mawlai Police Station hapoh ka Section 5(j) (ii)/6 POCSO Act bad ïa ka jingtohkit la bynshet ha ka WP/Sub-Inspector Lavinia S. Kongwang.Hadien ba la pyndep ïa ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia, la pynngat kyndon pyrshah ïa u nongleh kam bymman ha ka 12 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2022.
title: 20 SNEM DA KABA SET ALONG AI JINGPYNSAJIA KA KASHARI ÏA U DRESSTAR KURBAH

content: : Ha ka sien banyngkong eh ki doktor jong ka Mawkyrwat Civil Hospital ki la shim ïa ka rai ba nyngkong eh ban puid nongpang hapoh kane ka jaka ai jingsumar.U Medical Superintendent jong ka Mawkyrwat Civil Hospital u Dr. W. Sutnga u la ïathuh naduh ba la plie ïa kane ka jaka sumar ba 100 jingthiah  mynta la kumba shi snem duna, kum u khlieh duh jong kane ka jaka sumar ryngkat bad ki nongtrei baroh u la pyrshang katba lah ban ai ka jingshakri kaba bha bad thaw ki lad ki lynti ban pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam, kata, naduh ki nongtrei bad kumjuh ruh na ka bynta kiba wan shim dawai bad kiba wan thiah pang, hynrei hapdeng kita ki jingpyrshang ba rit, ki dang don ruh ki jingduna hangne hangtai.U Bah Jrimson Shangdiar, uba 72 snem ka rta uba don ka jingpang ha ki bynta jong ka kjat mynta la kumba 50 snem ei ei na ka shnong Manad, South West Khasi Hills District u dei uba nyngkong eh ban shah puid hapoh kane ka jaka sumar.U Dr. Sutnga u la ong ruh ba nangne shakhmat na ka bynta kiwei ki jingsumar yn sa ïaleh bad ïaid shakhmat, hynrei kaei kaba donkam mynta ka long ba lada donkam snam, ha kane ka jaka sumar ki dang shem jynjar namar ym pat don ïa ka Blood Storage.Ha kaba ïa dei bad ki tiar ki tar, u Dr. Sutnga u la ong ba ka jingïarap markylliang ne jingkyrshan na kawei ka jaka sumar sha kawei pat ka long kaba donkam, kumta ka jingïatreilang ka lah ban wanrah ïa u soh jong ka jingjop ha kano kano ka jingthmu. Kumta u kyrmen ba da ka jingwan ïuh kjat jong ka Myntri ka tnad ka Koit ka Khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka sngi Palei  yn sa lah ban pynbiang ha i por ba lyngkot.U la kyrpad bad ai mynsiem ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka South West Khasi Hills District ba ki dei ban wan shakhmat ban phah sumar ïa ki jingpang ba ki don namar ïa kaei kaba na ka liang ki doktor ki lah ban leh ïa kata kin pyrshang.Shwa ban rung sha ka kamram puid, u Bah Jrimson Shangdiar ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ïathuh ba kane ka jingpang ha ki bynta jong ka kjat ka la bat ïa u mynta ka kumba 50 snem eiei ha kaba naduh dang khynnah u la kum bakla bad theh da ka umphniang sharak bad kem ding ha ka patlun.  U la ong ba u hun beit ha ka kti jong ki doktor ban sumar  wat lada u poi ha ka jingïap ruh.U la ong ban ot ïa ka kjat um da sngew don mon namar u dang don ka jingkyrmen ba hadien ka jingshah sumar un sa lah biang ban ïaid bad ha kajuh ka por u la pynpaw ia ka jingkyrmen lyngba ka jingsumar jong ki doktor bad ki nurse un sa ïoh biang ka jingkoit jingkhiah.
title: HA KA SIEN NYNGKONG LAMKHMAT U DR. W. SUTNGA BAN PUID NONGPANG HA MAWKYRWAT CIVIL HOSPITAL

content: Lai ngut ki samla kiba donkti ban leh “Stunt” ha Laitumkhrah, Shillong ha ka step jong ka 1 tarik mynta u bnai ki la shah kem ha ki Pulit jong ka Laitumkhrah Police Station bad ia ka kali ruh la kurup noh da ki Pulit na ka sem set kali kaba don ha ka shnong Kynton-u-Mon, Laitkor, East Khasi Hills District.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ, u Superintendent of Police (City) East Khasi Hills District Bah Vivek Syiem u la iathuh ba ha ka 1 tarik, Nohprah, 2023, kawei ka kali Maruti 800, rong lieh ka bym don ia u number plate la ioh ring video ia ka rukom niah kali kaba ima bha ha Laitumkhrah Police Point. La iohi ba kane ka kali ka la tynrah ruh wat ia ka kynroh pyllun ha Laitumkhrah Police Point. Hadien kane ka jingjia ki Pulit ki ujor da ka suo-moto case ha Laitumkhrah Police Station hapoh ka Section 279 Indian Penal Code (IPC) bad hapoh kiwei pat ki Section bapher bapher jong ka Motor Vehicle Act.Namar ba ka video ba la ioh ring ka dei kaba la saphriang bha ha ka rynsan jong ka Social Media na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Shnong Laitumkhrah Pyllun ruh ka la mudui da ka ejahar Laitumkhrah Police Station ha kaba ki Pulit ki la bynrap lang ia kane ka ejahar bad ka jingujor suo-moto.Ki Pulit ka Laitumkhrah Police Station ba la lamkhmat da u Officer Incharge, ha ka jingtohkit ki la ioh kurup ia ka kali na ka sem set kali na ka shnong Laitkor Kynton-u-mon. Lai ngut kiba donkti ha kane ka jingniah kali ki la shah kem bad ki la phla ruh ba ki la leh ia kane ka kam hadien ba ki la shongshit khawyiang.U SP u la iathuh ba kane ka kali ka dei kaba don ia u registration number ML05 U 4845 bad ia kine ki lai ngut kiba donkti la ialam sha Laitumkhrah Police Station na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit.Ka tnat Pulit ka la kyrpad ia ki samla ba kin kiar na kaba leh ‘Stunt’ haba niah kali namarba ym tangba ka buh ia ki ha ka jingmynsaw hynrei ka buh jingma ruh wat ia kiwei pat kiba iaid lynti ha surok.Shuh shuh ka tnat Pulit ka la kyrpad ia ki paidbah ba kin pyntip sha ki Pulit lyngba u nombar 112 lada ki lap ia kum kine ki jingjia nangne shakhmat.
title: SHAH KEM LAI NGUT KIBA LEH “STUNT” HA LAITUMKHRAH, KURUP KI PULIT ÏA KA KALI

content: : Ka long ka jingkmen kaba khraw ia ka jylla Meghalaya bad khamtam ia ki nongrep, hadien ba hynriew ngut ki nongrep napoh kane ka jylla Meghalaya ki la shah pynkup burom da ka khusnam “Millionaire Farmer of India Awards 2023” ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha madan PUSA, New Delhi.Ia kane ka Krishi Jagran Millionaire Farmer of India Awards 2023’, la pynlong ha ka 6 tarik haduh ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai bad ha kine ki lai sngi kine ki hynriew ngut ki nongrep ki la iohlad ruh ban iashim bynta ha ki prokram bapher bapher ba la pynlong ha kine ki sngi.Kine ki nongrep ki dei na ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka jylla kiba kynthup ia ka Tinash Momin kaba na West Garo Hills, ka Baphira Nongdhar na East Khasi Hills, Springwell Kharmarshra na West Khasi hills, Jelum R. Marak na South Garo Hills, Tanly Lapasam na Jaintia Hills bad Grithilson M. Sangma na East Garo Hills District.
title: DA KA MILLIONAIRE FARMER OF INDIA AWARDS, 2023 ÏOH KI 6 NGUT KI NONGREP KA MEGHALAYA

content: Ka Education Cell jong ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la ïakynduh ïa u Myntri ka tnat Pule Puthi u Rakkam A. Sangma ha iing sah jong u ban pynsngew halor ka jingpynslem jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban pyllait ïa ka baibam (Schorlarship) bad halor ka jingmih ki kynrum kynram jong ka eksamin Meghalaya Teachers Eligibility Test (MTET) ba la pynlong da ka Directorate of Educational Research and Training (DERT).Ka Seng hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Assistant Education Secretary ka KSU CEC u samla Shelkitbok Kharbani ka la aiti ruh ai ka dorkas ha u Myntri.Na ka liang jong u Sangma u la pynsngew ba ha kaba ïadei bad baibam (Scholarship) ka Sorkar Pdeng kam pat pyllait satia ïa ka pisa hynrei ïa mynta ka pisa ka dang don tang khyndiat ha ka Sorkar Jylla bad ïa kane ruh ka Sorkar Jylla ka la nang pyllait naduh sngi Palei.U Myntri u la kular ha ka taiew ban wan la khmih lynti ba ka pisa kan poi noh bad ka Sorkar kan ïoh ban pyllait lut sha baroh ki samla pule.Ka seng ka la kyntu ruh ïa ka tnat kaba dei peit ba kum kine ki jingpynslem ïa ka baibam jong ki samla pule kam dei shuh ban dang ïai jia ha ki snem ki ban wan.Halor ka kynrum kynram haba ïadei bad ka eksamin MTET kaba la long ha ka 1 tarik mynta u bnai, u Myntri u la pynpaw ba ki jubab ba ki nongiakhun eksamin ki thoh kiba dei hi kin dei beit kumba ki long bad ïa ka Answer Key ba mih bakla bad ba la pynklumar kan ym ktah ïa ki.U la ong ba ïa ki nongthoh eksamin, lada ki don ka jingbym hun ki lah ban ai da ka jingujor ban phah pynbeit biang ïa ka Answer Script jong ki wat hadien ba la ïoh ïa ka resol bad nalor kata, ki nongïakhun eksamin lada ki dang khuslai ki lah ban thoh da ka aplikeshon sha ka DERT ban pynbeit bad ban pan jingpynshai.Ka seng ka la pynsngew ruh ba ka jingkynrum kynram ha kaba ïadei bad ka eksamin MTET kam dei shuh ka sien ba nyngkong kumta ka seng ka la kyntu ïa u Myntri ba un pynthikna ba ka dei ban ïaid beit ïaid rynti khnang ba kan nym buh jingartatien ne sah umdum ïa kiba ïakhun ïa kane ka eksamin.U Myntri ruh u la kular ba ka Sorkar kan sa peit bniah bad kan sa shim ïa ka rai kaba biang khnang ba kan long ka ban pynhun ïa baroh bad kan ïaid beit ïaid ryntih.
title: BA SLEM KA SCHOLARSHIP BAD KYNRUM KYNRAM KA MTET PYNSNGEW KA KSU HA U MYNTRI

content: : Ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) Meghalaya State Unit ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ka la pyniasyriem ia ka Bamsap bad ka Congress ba ki long kumjuh.Ki dkhot jong ka BJP ba la lamkhmat da u Chief Spokesperson u Bah M. Kharkrang ki la pynlong da ka jingiakhih hakhmat ka ophis treikam jong ka party ha nongbah Shillong ban pynrem halor ka jingkynnoh donkti ha ka jyrsieh bamsap da u MP jong ka Seng Congress na Jharkhand u Dheeraj Sahu.“Nga ngeit ba phi la iohi lut haduh mynta ym pat lah ban ñiew ia ki pisa ba la ioh na ki ïing bad ki ophis jong u MP ka Jharkhand. Kane ka ddang dei tang kaba rit duh bad ki dang bun shuh kiwei kiwei (ki pisa bym pat ioh kurup) ong u Bah M. Kharkrang ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.“Haduh mynta ka pisa ka la poi 300 klur.  Ka dei ka pisa jongno?  Ka dei ka pisa u paidbah. Ngi wan hangne ban pynrem ia ka kam bamsap jong ka seng Congress kaba iatakhuh bha bad ka bamsap,” u la ong.“Lada manla ka por ki ioh ia ki sakhi kiba biang, ki tnat treikam jong ka Sorkar Kmie kin trei la ka kam jong ki bad kin lap hi. Kim (Congress) lah ban buhrieh. Lada ka dei ka pisa kaba shu tuh phim lah ban buh ha bank, phin buhrieh katno? Ha kawei ka sngi, yn sa lap hi,” u la bynrap.Haba pynksan ia ka jingkhynra jong ka tnat Income Tax ia ki shlem ka kompeni shna kiad jong u Dheeraj Sahu, u Spokesperson jong ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit u la ong, “ka jingkhynra jong ka Sorkar Kmie ka long ban pynpaw sha ka pyrthei haduh katno ki politishian jong kiwei kiwei ki party khamtam eh ka Congress ki la pynjot ia kane ka ri ka jong ngi.”Da kaba iaroh ia u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi, u la bynrap, “dang ha kine ki sngi ka don ka jingwad bniah ia ki nongialam jong ki ri bapher bapher bad u Modi u wan banyngkong ha ka jingtbit ban ialam ia ka ri jong ngi bad da ka jingtrei shitom ngin sa lah ban pynduh ia kane ka bamsap kaba la bam kruiñ ia kane ka ri jong ngi.”Haba kylli, u Bah Kharkrang u la ong, “kano ka Jylla kaba synshar da ka BJP ka bym don ia ki kam pynroi , ai ia nga kawei ka nuksa ba kawei ka jylla ba la synshar ka BJP ba kam don ka roi ka par.  Lada peit ia ka Assam, kaei ka jingphylla bad kiei kiba thymai kiba wan ha ka jylla Assam. Ngi khmihlynti ha kane ka jylla jong ngi ruh kan sa long kumjuh bad kan sa synshar ha ka BJP ha kawei ka sngi bad phin sa iohi katno ngi la duh ha kine ki snem ba la leit noh.”U la bynrap ruh ba lada ka don ka jyrsieh bamsap ha kane ka Jylla Meghalaya, lada ioh ia ki sakhi ki sabut kiba biang, ka BJP kan mih beit shakhmat ban pynrem. “Lada lap ia ki sakhi sabut kin (tnat treikam ka Sorkar Pdeng) leh beit ia kaba donkam.  Lada lap, ngin hap hi ban pynrem bad ngin ym ailad bad ngi kwah hi ba kane ka jylla jong ngi kan kiew shaphrang bad ka dei ban kynjoh lang sha kiwei kiwei ki jylla kiba la iaid shakhmat namarba ngi la sahdien palat,” ong u Bah Kharkrang.Kum ban shu pyntip hangne, ka tnat Income Tax ka la ioh ban kurup kumba 300 klur ka pisa ha ka jingkhynra ha ki lai tylli ki jylla kiba don jingiadei bad ka karkhana shna kiad kaba na Odisha.  Ka jingioh kurup ia kane ka pisa ka long hadien ba ki nongtrei jong ka tnat Income Tax ki la khynra ia ka jaka treikam jong ka Boudh Distillery Private Limited, kaba don ha Boudh District jong ka Jylla Odisha, ha Jharkhand bad ha West Bengal ha ka 8 tarik u Nohprah, 2023.  Ka jingkhynra ban ioh kurup ia ka pisa ka dang iai bteng haduh mynta bad la ong ruh ba ka pisa ba la ioh kurup kan dang tam shuh shuh wat ia ka 300 klur namarba ka jingniew ia ka pisa ka dang iai bteng.Kane ka kompeni ka dei ruh kaba don jingiadei bad u MP Rajya Sabha ka seng Congress na Jharkhand u Dheeraj Sahu.  U Khun jong u Dheeraj, uba la tip kyrteng kum ku Ritesh Sahu u dei u Managing Director, katba u hymmen u Uday Shanker Prasad u dei u chairman jong ka kompeni kaba shna ia ka kiad. Ki nongtrei jong ka Incom Tax ki ong ba ka Boudh Distillery Private Limited ka dei ka paralok kaba iatreilang bad ka Baldeo Sahu & Group of Companies ia kaba la kynnoh ba ka la pyrshang ban kiar na kaba siew ia ka khajna bad kaba la ngat mynta ha ka jingshah khynra.
title: PYNSYRIEM KA BJP ÏA KA BAMSAP BAD KA CONGRESS BA KURUP 300 KLUR KA IT NA U MP CONGRESS

content: : Ka Aiom Christmas ka la wan bad bun ki long iing ki la bun kam ban thied leit pet ia ki riam ki beit na ka bynta ki khun ki kti, hynrei ki mad pat ia ka jingeh ba khraw hadien ba ki Pulit kim shym la shah ia ki kali Private ban pynieng kali ha ka Parking Lot jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) kaba don pyrshah ia ka State Bank of India (SBI) hajan ka Shillong Club Ltd.Katkum ka hukum ba la pynmih da ka District Magistrate jong ka East Khasi Hills ha ka 28 tarik Naiwieng 2023, la bthah ba baroh ki kali Shillong Tourist Taxi kiba kamai sha Guwahati naduh ka 1 tarik mynta u bnai ki dei ban pynieng ia ki kali kamai ha kane ka jaka bad ym shym la kdew ha ka hukum ban ym shah shuh ia ki kali Private ban pynieng ha kane Parking Lot.Ha ka jingleit jurip ia kane ka Parking Lot, la sakhi ba ka la thylli bad bun ki kali kamai Tourist kim shym la rung satia ban pynieng ia ki bad kiba wan ki don kai kumba san ne hynriew tylli ki kali.Ki nongwai jong kane ka Parking Lot ki la iathuh ba bun sien ki shah tim da ka sih ka sang ha ki paidbah namar ka jingbym shah rung ia ki kali Private, hynrei la phah ia ki ban ieng shapoh khrum kaba dei ka jaka kaba ktieh bad bym don wat tang ka bording bad tang shu poi 4:00 baje lah dum hi tliw bad ki bun ki bym sngew shngaiñ ban pynieng ia ki kali.Ki nongpeit bad nongpyniaid ia kane ka Parking Lot, ki la iathuh ba ha kawei ka step la don ki Pulit kiba la bthah ba kim dei ban shah rung ia ki kali Private bad lada lap ba ki don yn pyndait da ki khnap bad yn kem ruh wat ia ki nongap ka Parking Lot.
title: KHANG KI PULIT ÏA KI KALI PRIVATE BAN PYNIENG HA PARKING LOT  KA MUNICIPAL

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) Khliehriat Town Unit bad ka Ladrymbai Unit ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la leit ïa kynduh bad u Additional Superintendent of Police (ASP) jong ka East Jaiñtia Hills u Bah Banraplang Jyrwa uba khmih ïa ka tnat Pynïaid Kali (Traffic) halor ka jingjur shaba palat ka jingdheng kali ha iew Ladrymbai bad iew Khliehriat naduh ka por mynstep, mynsngi haduh jan miet kaba la jia manla ka sngi.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ka KSU ha kine ki kyndiat bnai ba ladep ka la aiti da ka dorkhas bad pynsgew sha u Myntri ka tnat Kam Pohiiing Bah Prestone Tynsong ban wanrah da ka Traffic Branch hapoh ka District khnang ba yn dup lah ban tehlakam bha ïa ka rukom pynïaid kali ha ka District, hynrei kaba sngewsih haduh mynta ka Sorkar ka khlem leh eiei halor kane ka jingdawa jong ka seng.Ka seng lyngba u General Secretary jong ka Ladrymbai Unit u samla Chanky Shylla bad u President jong ka Khliehriat town Unit u samla Kyrshan Dkhar ki la ai jingmut ïa ka tnad Traffic Cell ban tehlakam ïa ka jingjur palat ka dheng kali ha ka district bad ha iew Ladrymbai da kaba pynmih ïa ka Advisory lane Hukum ka ban pynïaid noh ïa ki trok thylli na ka surok Bypass Ladrymbai PWD khnang lait na ka dheng kali ba ha ka por mynsngi ha Ladrymbai bad Khliehriat kaba ktah shisha ïa ka ïaid ka ieng ki paidbah bad ïa ki khynnah skul bad khamtam ïa ki kali Fire Brigade bad ambulanceÏa kane ka seng ka la ai jingmut ban leh shwa kum ka jing pyrshang bad ban peit kumno ka seisoh neem.Ka seng ka ïaiban ba ka Traffic Branch ka dei ban don noh hapoh ka District khnang ba ki paidbah ka thaiñ kin nym shah ktah.
title: ÏAIBAN KA KSU BAN PYNÏOH ÏA KA TRAFFIC BRANCH HA EAST JAIÑTIA HILLS

content: Ki shipai BSF, Meghalaya jong ka 4th Battalion kiba la pynlong ia ka jingkhynra ha ka sngi Thohdieng ki la ioh ban pynpulom ia ka jingthmu jong ki snar khaii tuh ban shalan be-aiñ lyngba ka khappud jong ka ri India-Bangladesh da kaba kurup 375 bilor ka dawai jyrhoh Phensedyl bad ka shini ia kiba la thmu ban khaii tuh sha ka ri Bangladesh lyngba ka khappud jong ka East Khasi Hills, Meghalaya.Ki shipai BSF kiba la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah, mar mar ki la pynlong ka jingpynap shrip bad ioh kurup ia kine ki mar khaii tuh bad aiti noh sha ka ophis Custom ban leh ia kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: KURUP KI BSF ÏA KA DAWAI PHYNSEDEL BAD SHINI NA KHAPPUD EKH

content: : Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka pyrshah jur ïa ki sien jam ba la shim da ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ban ai ei ïa ka jaka kaba heh haduh 1.4 akar hapdeng ka sor Shillong nalor ka jaka ba la don lypa kaba heh haduh 2.4 akar ban pynsah ïa ki briew na Them Ïew Mawlong ha kaba bun na kine ki dei lypa kiba sah beaiñ ha ka jaka sorkar.“Ka VPP kam don jingujor eiei lada ka Sorkar ka ai jaka sah ïa ki nongtrei Sorkar kiba dei hok ban sah ha ki ingsah jong ka Sorkar katba ki dang trei ha ka kam hynrei ka jingai jaka sha kine ki briew paidbah ka long kaba ym lah ban peiphang bad ka long ruh shabar na u pud jong ka aiñ nalorkata kam shym la don ka jingpynshai kaba tikna na ka liang jong ka Sorkar ha kano ka rukom ka lah ban shu ai kumne,” ong u kyrwoh ka VPP ba la phah da u dkhot ka Media Cell kaVPP u Dr Rusievan Shangpliang.“Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka Sorkar Jylla ha ki por ba la leit ka la dep rai ban ym ai ïa kino kino ki jaka sorkar sha ki riew shimet. Hynrei mynta ka kynti pat ka jingshim jong ka sorkar ïa kane ka rai kaba long da khongpong ïa kaei kaba ka la dep rai teng,” u la ong.“Ai ba ka sorkar MDA kan pyni nuksa hangno ba ka la ju ai ïa ki jaka sorkar sha ki briew jong ka jylla kiba duk bad ki bym don jaka puta bad kiba donkam ban ïoh la ka jaka sah. Hato ka sorkar ha ki por ba la dep ka la ju ai jaka ne ingsah sorkar sha ki khun ki kti ne ki bahaïing hasem jong ki nongtrei sorkar? Ki paidbah jong ka jylla ki kwah ïa ka jingpynshai kaba shong nongrim halor kane ka jingleh palat pud na ka sorkar,” la bynrap u Dr. Shangpliang.
title: PYRSHAH KA VPP BA AI JAKA EI KA SORKAR SA 1.4 AKAR ÏA KIBA SAH HA THEM IEWMAWLONG

content: Ka Shillong College Central Library ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC), Shillong College ka la pynkut noh ïa ka Library Orientation Programme kaba san sngi halor ka phang, “Beyond Books: Unveiling the Digital Realm” kaba la sdang naduh ka 4 tarik bad pynkut noh ha ka 8 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka thong jong kane ka orientation programme ka long ban pynkupbor ïa ki samla pule ba kin sngewthuh kham bniah kumno ban tih ïa ki tyllong jingtip da kaba pyndonkam ïa ka Digital.U Co-ordinator, ka IQAC Dr. Sharma, haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi u la pynkynmaw ïa ki lynti ïaid kiba jwat jong ka Library ha ka College. U la banjur ruh ïa ki bynta bakongsan jong ki Library, wat hapdeng ka jingkiew irat jong ki tyllong jingtip na ka Digital. U la kyntu ïa ki samla pule ba kin pynlong ïa ki Library kum tang ki jaka buh kot, hynrei ban shim kum ka jingpynïar ïa ki jingtip kyllum Digital kiba long shabar na ki par jingtip.Ka Principal jong ka College ka Dr. (Mrs.) Evakorlang Kharkongor ka la ai mynsiem ïa ki samla pule ba kin shim ïa ka Library kum ka saw kynroh kaba pynroi bad pynproh ïa ki par jingtip kiba bun.  Ka Dr. Kharkongor ka la pyntip ruh ïa ki jingkylla ka jingtreikam jong ka Library.Ka la ïaiban ïa ka bynta ba kongsan jong ka Library ha kaba pynbeit ïa kiba bun ki kot pule da ka jingwan jong ka National Education Policy (NEP), ka la pynshlur ïa ki smala pule ba kin shim kabu na ki kot kiba don hapoh kane ka Libraty.  Ka la kular ba ka Shillong College kan ïai bteng ban kyntiew ïa ka Library da ki teknoloji kiba thymmai, khnang ba kan long ka shlem pule kaba pynsngewtynnat ïa baroh.Ka Mrs. B. Lyngdoh, kaba long ka Librarian bad Resource Person ka la ong ba ka Library ka dei kaba la buh khnang na ka bynta ki samla pule ba kin ïoh ïa ki kot kiba donkam ha kaba ki don da ki phew hajar tylli ki e-resources ba la thied da ka College bad ka Open Educational Resources kaba lah ban ïoh ha ka rynsan Online.
title: SAN SNGI KYNTHIH PYNSHAI KA SCCL ÏA KI SAMLA PULE ÏA KI TYLLONG JINGTIP NA KA DIGITAL

content: U MLA jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka North Shillong Constituency Bah Adelbert Nongrum  ha ka sngi U Blei u la kynthoh ba ka jingai tam ka Sorkar Jylla sa 1.4 akar ka jaka ban shna ïa ki iing jong ki 342 tylli ki longïing kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong ha Quater jong ka Shillong Mucipal Board (SMB), ka dei tang ka jingpynbiej elekshon MP bad MDC.Ha ka sngi Palei jong ka taiew baladep ka jingïalang ba la khlieh da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka tnat Kam Pohïing Bah Prestone Tynsong bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka tnat Pynroi Sor Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ki la kular hakhmat ki nongïalam jong ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la mynjur ban ai tam ïa ka jaka sa 1.4 akar nalor kaba ladep ai mynshwa 2.14 akar.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Nongrum u la pynkynmaw ba katkum ka jingshim jingkheiñ ba la aiti sha ka Sorkar, ki don tang 184 tylli ki longing ba la ithuh kum ki nongtrei ka Sorkar.Na kine, 128 ngut la ithuh kum ki nongtrei ka SMB bad 56 ngut kum ki nongtrei jong kiwei pat ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar.“Ka long kaba sngew kyndit ban tip ba ki longing ki la kiew sha ka 342  tylli, kaba mut ba sa 158 tylli tam ki longing (la kynthup ïa ka List) na ka bynta kane ka jingpynkynriah sha ka jaka ba thymmai.  Namrkata, ngi kwah ban tip kiei kine ki 158 tylli ki longing,” la buh jingkylli u Bah Nongrum.“Ha ka jingïakynduh (hapdeng ka Sorkar Jylla bad ki nongïalam ka Harijan Panchayat Committee) ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ki ong ban sa pynkynriah noh da kaba ai jaka 1.4 akar, lehse kane ka dei ka jingpynbiej elekshon MP bad MDC,” ong u Bah Nongrum ha u kyrwoh khubor ba la phah lyngba ka Video sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Kane ka dei kaba nga kren da ka jngsngewkhia ba ki paidbah ki dei ban sngewthuh ba kita kiba ju pyrta na ka por sha ka por ngi pyrshah ïa kane ka ishu kin sngewbha ban kynthoh namarba ngi dei ki trai shnong bad ki trai iing bad ngi dei ban sngewthuh kumno ban leh ïa ki nongshong wai. Ngin dang ïapeit bad ngin da ïai buddien ïa kane ka ishu,” la pynpaw u Bah Nongrum.U la ong ba kum u MLA jong ka North Shillong Constituency u la ïai buddien khlem shongthait halor ka ishu ban pynkynriah ïa ki briew kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong.“Shwa ka elekshon 2023 nga ladep ban ong ba ka Constituency bad ka jaidbynriew baroh kawei kan ym khmihlynti ïa nga ba ngan leit iuhkjat (ha Them Iewmawlong) kum u kyrtong ne ba ngan ïapeiñ tang na ka bynta ka elekshon. La jied ïa nga ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki pateng ki ban sa wan,” u la bynrap.Shuh shuh u la buh jingkylli ruh ba balei ka Sorkar kum ka trai iing ka hap ban pyndem hakhmat ki nongshongwai.U la ong ruh ba ka VPP kan sa leh la ka jong ka kamram ynda ka la wan ha ka bor.U la kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah ban sangeh noh ban khot ïa ki briew kiba sah ha Them Iew Mawlong kum ka ‘Harijan Colony’, ka ‘Punjabi Colony’ lane ‘Sweepers’ Lane’.
title: KA SORKAR KA PYNBIEJ ELEKSHON MP DA KABA AI JAKA SA 1.4 AKAR ÏA KIBA SAH HA THEM IEWMAWLONG : MLA VPP

content: Ka Meghalaya Peoples’Human Rights Council (MPHRC) kum shibynta ban ïasnoh kti lang ha shityllup ka pyrthei, ka kynmaw burom mynta ka sngi ka 10 Tarik u Nophrah kum ka Sngi Rakhe ïa ka Hok Longbriew Manbriew. Dei ha kane ka sngi ba ha u snem 1948, ka Dorbar Bah jong ka Synjuk ki Ri (United Nations) ka la pdiang ban pynjari ïa ka Dulir pawnam kaba tip salonsar kum “Ka Jingpynbna-ïar Satlak ïa ki Hok Longbriew Manbriew” (Universal Declaration of Human Rights). Ka phang jong ka jingrakhe ka dei “Ka Jinglaitluid, ka jingïaryngkat bad Ka Jingbishar Hok ïa baroh”.“Kane ka Dulir pawnam kaba tip mynta kum ka Jingpynbna-ïar Satlak ïa ki Hok Longbriew Manbriew ka la pynskhem ba ïa ki bynriew baroh la kha laitluid bad ki ïaryngkat ha ka burom bad ki hok kynti bad jinglaitluid khlem ka jingpynïapher la ka long kum ka jaitbynriew, ka rong ka sniehdoh, ka ktien ka thylliej ne kano kano ka jinglong” ong ka MPHRC.“Ha kane ka sngi, ngi khot bad ngi wer ïa baroh ki paid nongshong shnong ba ngin ïaipynskhem bad ïaikut jingmut ban ïeng tylli bad ïada ïa ka Hok Longbriew Manbriew, ban ai jingkyrshan khamtam eh ïa kito ki briew kiba dang ïaksaid ban ïoh ïa ka Jingbishar Hok bad ha kajuh ka por  ban pynrem jur pat ïa kito ki briew ne ki kynhun kiba ïuhroit bad pynhiar dor ïa kyrdan jong ka Hok Longbriew Manbriew kaba la pynkhamti katkum riti synshar paidbah ne da ka aiñ hi” ong u Bah Dino DG. Dympep, Chairman, MPHRC.“Ngi ai ka burom kaba kyrpang khamtam eh ïa ka jingnud bad jingshlur jong ki riewshimet, ki nongtrei monsngewbha, ki seng bhalang kiba ju mih shakhmat khlem jingtieng ne jingsmiej ban kren bad ïaksaid ïa ki mat kiba ktah ïa ka hok paidbah ha kane ka jylla, la ka long da ka lynti jong ka jingïasaid ban pynshongñia lyngba ki jingïakhih kiba jai jai bad ka basuk basaiñ” ong ka MPHRC.“Ngi ïai ai ka jingkyrshan kaba pura ïa kiba paidbah bad ki sengbhalang baroh kiba ju mih shakhmat ban  dawa bad ban pynïoh ïa ka jingbishar hok khamtam eh na ka bynta kito ki briew kiba la ngat ha ka jingshah sait ïap bad mynsaw jur bad shah pynkheiñ, shah ïuhroit ïa la ka Hok Longbriew Manbriew ha ka kti  ki Pulit. Halor kine ki jingjia kiba sngewsih ngi ban jur ba ka sorkar Meghalaya b ka dei ban pynïoh mardor ïa ka Jingbishar Hok sha ki bahaïing hasem jong kito kiba la khlad noh bad kiba mynsaw bad  ban pyntikna ba kin lah pat ban ïoh ïa ka lad ban im suk, im saiñ kumba marïaryngkat lang salonsar” ong ka MPHRC.“Ngi pynrem jur ïa baroh ki kam sniew bad ka jingkhihkla kiba la jia shen ha ka jylla khamtam eh ba ki la don bun ngut ki briew shimet kiba la ngat ha kum kine ki jingjia kiba khlem poi pyrkhat la ka dei ïa ki paid trai ri muluk, ki jait bynriew ritpaid ne kino kino ki kynhun bad khamtam eh ïa ka jingshah ktah kti jong ki nongthoh khubor.Ha kum kine ki jingjia ka Sorkar ka dei pynlong da ki jingtohkit  kaba  bniah khnang ba ki briew kiba ngat ha kum kita ki apot kin lah pat ban ïoh  ïa ka jingbishar kaba hok” ong ka MPHRC.“Ngi dawa jur na ka Sorkar ba haba ka don kano kano ka jingshah kynnoh ba ka don ka jingthombor bad ka jingshah ïuhroit ïa ka Hok Longbriew Manbriew ïa kum kita ki jingshah kynnoh dei ban pynlong da ka jingtohkit kaba khlem ïa shah liang bad haba lap ïa kino kino ki briew Sorkar ba ki long ki nongpynkheiñ aiñ  ka dei ban pynsaja mardor ïa ki” ong ka MPHRC.“Nga ban jur ïa ka Commission Sorkar ba kam dei ban shu shong khli kti bad ban shu peitkai ïa baroh ki jingjia kiba ïadei bad ka jingthombor ïa ka Hok Longbriew Manbriew, hynrei ka dei ban shim khia mardor ïa ki synjam ban  pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit khnang ba kan don ka jingbishar hok ïa kita ki kam thombor kiba ju leh da ki kynhun pulit bad ki briew Sorkar” ong ka MPHRC.“Kyntang ïawai, ngi pynkynmaw ïa baroh ba ka Hok Longbriew Manbriew katkum ka Dulir kaba la pruid dak naduh u snem 1948 ka pynkupbor ha man uwei pa kawei kum ki  nongshong shnong ba ngi don ïa ka Hok ban ïoh jingïada bad ka jingshongshngaiñ kiba yn ym lah ban pynïakhlad na ka burom bad ka jingsan laitluid ha ka longbriew manbriew  jong baroh,” la pynkut ka MHPRC.
title: IASNOHKTI LANG KA MPHRC BAD KA PYRTHEI BAN RAKHE ÏA KA HOK LONGBRIEW MANBRIEW

content: Ka Khasi Students Union, kaba long kawei na ki kynhun kaba iatreilang bad ka North East Students Organisation ha ka 11 tarik u Nohprah, 2023 ka la teh da ki lama iong bad ki Banner ha kylleng ki bynta jong ka Sor Shillong ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingbym sngap jong ka Sorkar India ia ka sur jong ki riewlum ritpaid jong ki jylla ka thain Shatei Lammihngi da kaba mynjur ia ka Ain ïakjakor kaba la tip kum ka Citizenship Amendment Act, 2019.Ha kawei na ki Banner kiba ka KSU ka la teh, ka la thoh ia kine ki kyntien kiba ong, “11 tarik, Nohprah, 2019, haba ka CAB ka la kylla long ka CAA. Ka sngi badum na ka bynta ki paid riewlum jong ka thain Shatei Lammihngi bad ka sngi bakmen na ka bynta ki mynder ri poiwir.”Ka KSU, ka la dawa ia ka Sorkar ban thwet, ban pyndam bad ban pynphai biang ia baroh ki mynder ri poiwir kiba wan rung hashwa jong u snem 1971, hynrei ym ban ai ia ka jaka riehtngen ia ki.Dang shen, u Chairman jong ka NESO u Bah Samuel B. Jyrwa u la ong ba ka NESO ka kwah ban pynkynmaw biang ïa ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi baroh kawei ba ha ka 11 tarik, Nohprah 2019, wat hapdeng ka jingpyrshah kaba jur jong ki riewlum ritpaid ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Bill 2019, ka Sorkar India kam shym la shah skhor satia bad khatduh ïawai lyngba ka Rajya Sabha la mynjur ïa kane ka Aiñ Ïakjakor kaba la tip kum ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act 2019.“Kane ka jingpynbna ka long ban phah ïa u kyrwoh sha ka Sorkar India ba ngi pyrshah ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act 2019 bad ha kajuh ka por ban pynkynmaw ïa ki paidbah bad ïa ki jingshah leh bym hok ba ka Sorkar India ka la leh pyrshah ïa ka mon jong ki paid riewlum ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi,” u la ong.
title: KA SNGI BADUM ÏA KA NORTH EAST, TEH LAMA ÏONG KA KSU BAN PYRSHAH ÏA KA CAA

content: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka la tyrwa ban shna ia ka Surok Four Lane ha New Shillong Township. U la iathuh ruh ba ka Sorkar ka la tyrwa ban shna kham bun ki surok kiba pyniasnoh bad ki Surokbah National Highways la ka long ia ka surok Shillong Bypass lane ia ka surokbah Shillong-Jowai.Ha ka jingiakren bad ka Batesi Tv u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la iathuh ba u la lum ia ka jingialang bad ka Central Division PWD, Bypass Division PWD bad ka National Highway Division, ryngkat lang bad ka Deputy Commisssioner, ka tnat Finance bad Forest ban iathir iatai sani ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshna ia ki surok hapoh ka sor Shillong bad kumjuh ruh ha New Shillong Township khnang ban weng ia ka jingdheng kali kaba jur.“Nga la khot ia kane ka jingialang bad kine ki lai tylli ki Division ryngkat ka tnat Finance, Forest bad ngi la iathir iatai ia kine ki mat bad ka Deputy Commissioner ha kaba ngi la wad ia ki lad ki lynti kumno ban shna pynbeit ia ki surok bad kumjuh ban shna kham bun ki surok khnang ban pynduna shisyndon ia ka jingdheng kali,” la iathuh u Symbud Myntri Rangbah.Haba kylli, u la iathuh ba Sorkar Jylla kan sa pan jingiarap pisa na ka Sorkar Pdeng ban shna ia kine ki surok.U Bah Tynsong, ula kyntait ruh ba ka Sorkar kan shna ia ka surok Four Lane ha Shillong.  “Kaei kaba ngi kwah ka long la kumno kumno ngin shna ia ki Intermediate Lane bad nga tharai kata ka dei kaba biang palat,” u la bynrap.Ka jingdheng kali ha nongbah Shillong katba nang mih ki sngi bad ki snem ka la nang jur na ka jingkharoi jong ki kali katba ki surok ki sah kumjuh.Dang shen, ka Ingbishar Meghalaya High Court ha ka 24 tarik, Naiwieng ka la bthah ia ka Sorkar Jylla ban wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban pynduna ia ka jingdheng kali da kaba iasyllok bad kino kino ki Agency kiba lah ban ai jingmut halor kane.
title: DA KA SUROK FOUR LANE TYRWA KA SORKAR BAN SHNA HA NEW SHILLONG TOWNSHIP

content: Ka Meghalaya Chess Association ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka All India Chess Federation ka la pynlong ia ka Seminar kaba lai sngi, kata naduh ka 8-10 tarik, Nohprah kaba long ruh shi bynta ban ai jinghikai ia ki nongiashim bynta shwa ban pynsdang ia ka lympung ialehkai Chess kaba la tip kum ka 1st Meghalaya International Open Grand Master Chess Tournament ha SAI, STC Indoor Sports Stadium ha NEHU ka ban sdang naduh ka 12 tarik, u Nohprah 2023 bad ia kaba yn sa pynkut ha ka 20 tarik u Nohprah, 2023.U President jong ka Association u Bah Khizar Meheraj Warjri ha ka jingiakren bad kau la iathuh ba ha kane ka lympung ialehkai Chess yn ailad ban iashim bynta naduh ki khynnah kiba la kynjoh ia ka rta kaba 10 snem shaneng haduh ki rangbah kiba la kham iaw ka rta ha kaba yn sa phiah la ki jong ki jong ki kyrdan na ka bynta ki shynrang bad ki kynthei.U la iathuh ba kin sa don ruh ki nongiashim bynta kum ki Grand Master nabar ka jylla, kata, na ki jylla jong ka thain Shatei Lammihngi, na ki jylla jong ka dewbah India bad na shabar jong ka ri India, kata, na ka ri USA, Vietnam, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Egypt, Zambia, Thailand bad kiwei kiwei.U la iathuh ba ka khusnam na ka bynta  ki lahduh ha ka Grand Master ka long 30 lak bad na ka bynta ki nongiashim bynta kiba na kane ka jylla bad na ki jylla ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi la phiah la ka jong ka khusnam, na ka bynta ki kyrdan katkum ki rta bapher bapher jong ki nongiashim bynta.
title: LAI SNGI HIKAI KA MCA SHWA BAN SDANG KA OPEN INTERNATIONAL GRAND MASTER CHESS TOURNAMENT

content: U MLA jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) na ka North Shillong Constituency Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la pynphai nia ia ka jingkynthoh jong u Bah Vivan G. Kynta, uba dei u Senior Lawyer da kaba ong ba u paidbah hi un sa bishar mano ba batai stad bad mano ba balain.Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi baar, u Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la ong, “ka jingkren jong u Bah Vivan G. Kynta, ba don kiba balain bad kiba batai stad, nga kwah ban ong, u paidbah un sa bishar, mano ba batai stad bad mano ba balain.”“Nga ong ia phi, muktiar badonburom, ynnai sngew stad bad ym donkam hi ruh ban phin hikai skul, ngi tip bha kaei ka Land Transfer Act haei ka treikam bad haei kam treikam.
