Hynrei kam mut ba ki kyntien jong phi ka pynshlur ia ka Sorkar, ba dei ka Non-Schedule Area bad ka European Ward ka sorkar kan leh katba mon hynrei ka dei (ka nongkynti) jong u paidbah bad kan ym lah ban leh katba mon. Bishar paidbah shwa ban shim ia ka rai,” la ong u Bah Nongrum.Haba kynthoh halor ka jingong jong u Bah Kynta ban pyntreikam da ka aiñ MPDA, u Bah Nongrum u la ong, “phi tip bha bad ngi tip bha kaei ka aiñ MPDA bad kumno ka treikam. Hynrei ngan ong, yn ym don aiñ ha pyrthei ban iada ia phi Muktiar. Wat ym long ka daw ba phin long ka daw ban thang ia u kyndok jingpruid.”
title: U PAIDBAH UN SA BISHAR, MANO BA BATAI STAD BAD MANO BA BALAIÑ: ADELBERT NONGRUM

content: Ka North East Petroleum Mazdoor Union (NEPMU) ha ka ujor ba la phah sha u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat Food Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Pravin Bakshi, ka la rai ban ym wan kit shuh ia ka petrol sha ka Jylla Meghalaya naduh ka 12 tarik, u Nohprah, 2023.Ha ka ujor ba la soi da u General Secretary u Ramen Das, ka NEPMU ka la pyntip ba ka jingshim ia kane ka rai ka long hadien ba ki dkhot jong ka Union kiba la shah kem ha ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya naduh ka 24 tarik u Naiwieng, 2023 ki dang shah set haduh mynta mynne ha ka along ki Pulit ka Nongpoh, Ribhoi District halor ka jingshah kynnoh ba ki dei kiba donkti ban sei tuh ia ka umphniang petrol na ki kali kit Umphniang ha shiteng lynti.Kane ka jingpynbna jong ka Union ka long hadien ba ki dkhot jong ka Union kim pat ioh jamin satia wat hadien ka jingiakynduh ia u Myntri ka tnat  Food Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Bah Coming One Ymbon ha ka 27 tarik, u Naiwieng, 2023.“Hadien kane, ngi la kyrpad ia u Myntri ka tnat  Food Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs ha ka 27 tarik, Naiwieng, 2023 bad ha ka High Level Meeting kaba long hapoh ka jingpyniaid jong phi bad shim rai ba kan ym don kano kano ka jingleh tohmet sha ki dkhot ba luilui.  Na ka bynta ban bah jamin ia kiba dang shah set ha along, ka Union kan iaid katkum ki lynti jong ka aiñ bad kan bud ruh ia ki kyndon treikam jong ka Oil Management,” la ong ka Union ha ka ujor sha u Commissioner and Secretary.“Hynrei haduh mynta, wat uwei ruh u (dkhot) um pat lait satia na along wat hapdeng ka jingiakhun jong u Muktiar.  Mynta ki dkhot jong ngi, ki dap da ka jingbitar halor kane, bad shim rai ba kin ym wan kit umphniang Petrol na ka bynta ka Jylla Meghalaya naduh ka 12 tarik, Nohprah, 2023 tad haduh ba (ki dkhot) kin da lait na along,” la ong ka Union.
title: NADUH 12 TARIK, NOHPRAH, YN SANGEH WANKIT PETROL KA MAZDOOR UNION SHA MEGHALAYA

content: Ki Pulit jong ka West Khasi Hills District ha ka sngi Baar ki la synran ïa ka kynhun ki Pulit ka Crime Scene Unit bad ïa ka kynhun K-9 Unit Dog Squad kiba la hiar sha Mynniar ka jaka ba la jia ka jingshah shoh bad shah lute ia ki ar ngut ki nonghikai ka Rangsapara Secondary School kaba la jia ha ka janmiet jong ka Lah Sngi u Blei.Hadien ba ki Pulit ki la pyndep nadong shadong ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingtohkit ha kane ka jaka ki la rah noh ïa ka met ba dang sah jong u T.R Sangma u nonghikai uba la khlad noh hashen ha ka jingshah thombor ha ki runar bad ban leh ïa ka Post Mortem.Ki Pulit ki la lap ruh ïa ka thuk thuk ba la pyndonkam da kine ki arngut ki nonghikai kaba la kyllon harud surok.Haduh mynta ki Pulit ki dang pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit kaba bniah bha halor kane ka jingjia bad ban thwet tyngeh ïa ki runar kiba donkti ha ka kam lute bad ka kam pynïap briew.U Tengton R. Sangma u dei u Headmaster jong kawei ka skul Upper Primary  kaba don ha ka shnong Rangsahpara.La iathuh ba kane ka la  jia ha ka por kumba 3. 30 baje eiei nohphai sngi katba kine ki arngut ki dang wan phai na Nongstoiñ bad da ka thuk thuk ar shaka kaba don ïa u nombar AS 25 E 1324 bad ynda la poi ha kawei ka jaka kaba long khongdong kaba jngai kumba 32 kilomitar na Nongstoiñ kaba dei ka surok na Rwiang sha Langpih ki runar kiba la ap ktem lypa ki la khang lynti ia kine ki arngut bad ki la bom la tied ïa kine ki arngut ha kaba u S.R Chetri u la mynsaw jur bad u la lait phet da ka said katba u Tengton R Sangma pat u la khlad noh hadien.Ki runar hadien ba ki ladep bom, ki la patan ïa ka met jong u Tengton sha khlaw ki la khynñiat ïa ka motorbike sharud surok.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingjia, la ong ba hadien katto kane por ba kine ki arngut ki la ngat ha kane ka apot la wan poi kawei ka Bus bad ki briew kiba don hapoh ka Bus ki la pyntip mar mar sha ki nongshong shnong sha Nonglang ha kaba ki la wan poi ha katei ka jaka bad ki la pyntip noh sha ki Pulit.Nalor kata ki la pyntip ruh sha ki nongtrei jong Nonglang PHC bad ka kali kit nongpang na kane ka PHC ka la leit buh ïa u Chetri uba mynsaw sha Nongstoiñ Civil Hospital hynrei na ka daw ba u la shitom jur palat la pynkit noh ïa u sha Civil Hospital, Shillong .Ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingjia u Supritendent of Police jong ka West Khasi Hills u Bikram Marak ryngkat  bad ki Pulit  jong ka Crime Scene Unit  na Shillong ba la don ryngkat ruh da ki Pulit  jong ka Langpih Border Out Post kiba la don lypa naduh mynmiet ha Mynniar ki la pynlong ka jingtohkit kaba bniah ha kane ka jaka ba don ka  met ïap ha kaba ki la lap lai tylli ki nar rod ba ki runar ki la pyndonkam ban bom ban tied ïa ki arngut ki nonghikai.Hadien ba la pyndep nadong shadong ia ki jingtohkit, ki Pulit ki la kurup noh ïa ki nar rod bad ïa ka met ïap jong uba la khladnoh, la pynkit noh sha Nongstoiñ Civil Hospital ban pyndep ïa ka Post Mortem bad hadien ba la dep ïa ka Post Mortem la aiti noh ïa ka met sha ki bahaïng ban pyndep ia ka jinglehniam kaba khatduh.Ki pulit ki la register case halor kane ka jingjia bad jingtohkit ban lap dien ïa ki runar kiba don kti ha kane ka kam runar ka la ïaid shakhmat.
title: LAI TYLLI KI NAR ROD LAP KI PULIT NA KA JAKA BA SHAH PYNIAP U NONGHIKAI HA MYNNIAR

content: : Ki Pulit ka Traffic Branch jong ka Lumdiengjri Police Station, Shillong ha ka sien kaba ar ki la shim halade ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban maramot ïa ka surok GS Road kaba la sniew haduh katta katta ha ka shnong Lumdiengjri, Shillong namarba kane ka surok ka la sniew shaba palat bad ka wanrah ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba jur.Shibnai tam mynshuwa kine ki juh ki Pulit pynïaid kali ki la maramot ïa kane ka surok namarba ka la sniew shaba palat.Shuwa ïa kane ki la phah da ka jingthoh sha ka tnat PWD (Roads) jong ka Sorkar Jylla ban maramot noh kloi ïa kane ka surok hynrei ka jingbym sngap jong ka tnat PWD (Roads) kim banse ban mih hi shakhmat ban maramot dalade sa shisien biang ha kane ka sien ka baar.Ha kane ka kynti ba mynta ki Pulit ki la pyndonkam ban kit ïa u khyndew da ka kali Gypsy kaba ki ju pyndonkam ban leit sha la ki kamram jong ki.
title: MARAMOT KI PULIT TRAFFIC ÏA KA SUROK HA LUMDIENGJRI HA KA SIEN BAAR

content: : Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew baladep ka la pynthymmai ïa ka shnat treikam jong ka KSU Dehradun Unit ha nongbah Dehradun.Ha kane ka sngi la don lang ruh u Education Secretary ka KSU u samla Pynkmenlang Sanmiet, u Asst. Finance Secretary u samla Ïashanborlang Mukhim, u nongïalam jong ka KSU Delhi Unit u samla Nicholas Chyrmang.Ka KSU Dehradun Unit ka la pynlong ruh ïa ka Freshers’ Meet ha kaba u President ka KSU-CEN u samla Lambokstarwell Marngar u la long kum u Kongsan bad ka Kong Mily Rabon kum ka Symbud Kongsan da ka jingïashim bynta jong ki samla Khasi kiba pule ha ka nongbah Dehradun bad kumjuh ruh la pynshngain lem da ki samla pule na kiwei pat ki Jylla jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kiba kynthup ïa ki samla na ka jylla Mizoram, Nagaland bad kiwei kiwei.
title: PYNTYLLUN KA KSU DEHRADUN ÏA KI MAT LYNGBA KI NONGKITKAM BATHYMMAI

content: Ka North-Eastern Hill University (NEHU) ka la rakhe ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap kaba 151 snem jong u Khlawait nongïaleh laitluid ka rilum Garo u Pa Togan Sangma.Ha kane ka jingleh burom ha phyllaw jong kane ka skulbah, la pynïaid ïa ka jingïalang da u Prof. D. K. Nayak uba long u Vice-Chancellor incharge ka skulbah bad u Prof. S. R. Joshi, uba dei u Registrar Incharge.Ki nonghikai bad ki samla pule jong ka skulbah NEHU ruh ki la leh burom hakhmat ka dur jong u Pa Togan Sangma bad hadien kane la pynlong ïa ka jingkren shaphang ki kam shlur jong u Pa Togan Sangma da ka Dr. Jacqueline R. Marak na ka Department of Garo, North-Eastern Hill University, Tura Campus.Ka jingleh burom ka long da ka jingbuh syntiew hakhmat u dur jong u Pa Togan Sangma, ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewnguh ïa u synñiang u bynhei ba une u khlawait nongïaleh laitluid u la leh na ka bynta ka dawbah jong ka ri.U Prof. D. K. Nayak, ha ka jingkren jong u, u la ong ba ka long kaba donkam ban rakhe kynmaw burom ïa ki nongïaleh laitluid bad ïa ki kpa tymmen kiba la len ïa la ka jong ka jingim na ka bynta ban pyllait luid ïa ka ri.  U la ong ba kum kine ki jingrakhe, ki pynkynmaw ïa kane ka pateng ba mynta ïa ka jingaiti lut jong ki kpa tymmen.Ka Dr. Jacqueline R. Marak kaba la ai jingkren halor ka jingim jong u Pa Togan Sangma ka la kdew ruh ïa kiwei pat ki riew ïaleh laitluid jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi, kiba la noh ïa u synñiang u bynhei uba ka dewbah India ka dang shu tip paidbah.Ka Dr. Marak ka la ïathuh ruh ïa ki kam shlur jong u Pa Togan Sangma ba u la leh haba ki shipai Phareng ki la dakhol ïa ka rilum Garo. Ka la ong ba u dei u Pa Togan u dei u jrong ryngieng hapdeng ki Garo, uba la ïalam ïa la ki jong ki briew ban ïakhun markhmat ïa ki shipai Phareng ban ïada ïa la ki jong ki shnong ki thaw.Hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Pa Togan Sangma, ki Garo kiba don ïa ki atiar tang da ki tiar ïaleh kiba rit ki la ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki shipai Phareng.Ka Dr. Marak ka la kren ruh  halor ka jingshlur jong ki riewïaleh Garo, watla kim don ïa ki tiar siat, hynrei ki la lah ban pynsheptieng ïa ki shipai Phareng lyngba ka jingshlur jong ki.Ka Dr. Marak ka la kren ruh khyndiat shaphang ki riewshlur kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi kiba la ieng pyrshah ïa ka jingdakhol jaka jong ki shipai Phareng, kum u Sonaram R. Sangma ha ka spah snem kaba 19. Ka Dr. Marak ka la pynpaw ruh ba dei u Sonaram R. Sangma uba la lah ban pynïatylli ïa ki paidbah ka rilum Garo, ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka jaka, ka jingshah dakhol jaka bad kumno ban pynneh pynsah ïa la ka jong ka khyndew ka shyiap.
title: KYNMAW BUROM KA NORTH-EASTERN HILLS UNIVERSITY ÏA KA SNGI ÏAP U KHLAWAIT PA TOGAN SANGMA

content: Ka Organising Committee jong ka KSU Mawlai Circle ha ka sngi Baar ka la khynra ïa ki mynder kiba trei bylla ha ki shnong bapher bapher kiba don hapoh ka jyllli jong ka shnong Mawlai.Ha kane ka jingkhynra, ha ka thaiñ Mawiong, Nongkwar bad Iewrynghep ka seng la lap ïa shibun ki mynder kiba ban trei ïa ki kam ñiad rong, tah tiles bad kiwei ki kam trei misteri ki bym biang bad bym don kino kino ki kot ki sla khamtam ka Work Permit.Na ka liang jong ka seng hadien ba ka la lap ïa ki mynder bym don ki kot ki sla ba biang ka la pynher krad bad pynphai sha ka jaka kaba ki wan bad ka la maham tyngeh ba kim bit ban dang wan trei wan ktah hapoh ka shnong Mawlai bad ha Ri khasi hi baroh kawei, ong u kyrwoh ba la phah da u Asst. Secretary ka KSU Mawlai Circle u samla Macdonald Jitem.“Ka KSU Mawlai circle ka kyntu ïa baroh ki trai ïing, ki Kontraktor bad ïa baroh ki para ri ba ki dei ban kiar na ka jingaikam aijam ïa ki mynder namarba kane kan nang pynkharoi shuh shuh ïa ki mynder ri hangne ha ri jong ngi bad kan buh jingma ïa ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew hi baroh kawei, namarba lada ki mynder ki wan sha ka ri jong ngi lada kim ïoh ki kam ki jam ba kin im bad kamai ja kpoh kin ym lah ban shong bad ban sah hangne ha ka ri jong ngi,” ong u kyrwoh.“Kyntang ïawai ka seng ka ïawer ïa baroh ki para ri ban sangeh noh ban aikam ïa ki briew kiba nabar bad ban sdang ai kam para Khasi kum shi bynta ba ngin ïaleh pyrshah bad ïada ïa ka jingsdang ban wan buhai shnong ki mynder ri hapoh ka ri baieid jong ngi,” ong shuh shuh u kyrwoh.
title: BEH KRAD KA KSU ÏA KI MYNDER BA TREI BYLLA BE-AIÑ HA KI THAIÑ MAWLAI

content: Ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) ha ka sngi Baar ka la shim ïa kawei ka rai ban ïatreilang hapoh ka shatri jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) na ka bynta ka elekshon Lok Sabha bad elekshon MDC, ki ban sa long ha u snem ban wan.Ka RDA shen kan sa pynbna ïa u kyrtong na ka bynta ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat, ba la mihkhmat mynta da u MP ka Seng  Congress u Bah Vincent H. Pala.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang, u Chairman jong ka RDA u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh  u la ong, “mynga ngi la sdang ïa ka jingïakren ha kaba ïadei bad ka elekshon MP bad ka elekshon MDC. Ngi la rai ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon MP bad ka elekshon MDC (kum ka RDA).”U Bah Metbah u la ong ba shen ka RDA kan sa ïakynduh biang ban shim rai ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshim rai ban pynieng ïa u kyrtong monlang jong kine ki ar tylli ki seng sainpyrthei na ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency.“La bthah ïa ki dkhot ba hapoh shi sngi ne ar sngi ba ngin ïakynduh biang ban shong bad ban shim rai noh halor u kyrtong ka RDA,” u la ong.Haba pynpaw ba ka ïa ban pynbna ïa u kyrtong kam pat poi, u Chairman ka RDA u la ong, “ngi dang don ha ka lynti ban ïasyllok bad kiwei kiwei de ki kam ha kaba ngi la ïakren bad ïa kane kajuh ka mat yn sa ïakren bïang ha ka jingïalang ka ban sa long.”Haba kylli, u Bah Metbah u la ong ba ym pat don kyrtong na ka RDA.“Ngim pat ïakren ïa ka kyrteng jongno jongno ha ka RDA hynrei ngin sa pynbna ha ka por kaba biang, ïa kaba ngin sa ïakren ha ka jingïalang ka ban sa long shen,” u la ong.Ha kawei pat ka liang u Bah Metbah u la ïathuh ba hynriew ngut ki dkhot na ka HSPDP bad san ngut na ka UDP ki la shah kynthup kum ki dkhot jong ka RDA. Mynta ka jingdon jong ki dkhot ka RDA ka la kynjoh sha ka 15 ngut.
title: PAT LAH SHIM RAI KA UDP BAD HSPDP BAN SEI ÏA U KYRTONG KA RDA HA KA ELEKSHON MP

content: : U MLA jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) na North Shillong Constituency u Bah Adelbert Nongrum ha ka Sngi Baar ula pynphai nia ia ka jingkynthoh jong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong da kaba ong, “ka Voice of the People Party kan ym ialam bakla ia u paidbah.”Ha u kyrwoh ba la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor lyngba ka Video, u Bah Nongrum u la ong, “nga don ha Riwai, Pynursla, bad nga kwah ban kren halor ka jingkren jong u Bah Prestone halor ka ishu Them Iewmawlong ba u ong ba um kwah ban pynlut kai ia ka por. Nga ruh ngam kwah ban pynlut kai ia ka por hynrei ngam iahap satia ba phi ong ia ki nongialam VPP wat ialam bakla bad wat ym leh politik.  Hynrei nga kwah ban pynkynmaw ba ka VPP kan ym ialam bakla ia u paidbah. Hynrei ngi kwah ban ong tang kawei namaarba la pynkha ia ka VPP ym dei tang namar ka politic hynrei namar ka polisi.”“Kaba ar, nga kwah ban pynpaw ba ka jaka ka dei ka jingim bad na kata ka daw kane ka dei ka jingim bad ka jingiap na ka bynta ki pateng ki ban sa wan,” u la ong.“Halor ka jingong jong u Bah Prestone ba um don por ban pynshai, hynrei lada u Bah Prestone uba dei u Symbud Myntri Rangbah bad u Chairman jong ka High Level Committee (HLC) lada phim don por te mano ban shim ia kata ka por ka jong phi. Ki sengbhalang ki ong ban sa pan da ka RTI, nga ruh nga kular ba ngan iai buddien la ka long ha madan lane ha Ingdorbar Thawaiñ ka Jylla,” la ong u Bah Nongrum.“Kane kam mut ba nga la long uba nga shun bad nga isih ia kiwei pat ki para nongshong shnong, hynrei ka long kaba isynei ia ka shong ka sah jong ki (briew ha Them Iewmawlong) ka long kaba isaitmet haduh katta katta. Tang kiba iohi, ki sngewthuh katno ka jingeh na ka bynta jong ki,” la bynrap u Bah Nongrum.“Ka dei ka kamram jong nga kum u kpa jong ka Constituency ban iakhun na ka bynta jong ki (briew kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong) ruh halor ka jingsngew briew ba dei ban pynkynriah ia ki. Ka koit ka khiah kam don, ka jingkhapngiah ruh ka long kaba shyrkhei,” u la ong.Haba buh jingkylli ia u Symbud Myntri Rangbah Bah Prestone Tynsong, u Bah Nongrum u la ong, “nga ai ka jingiaroh ia ka jingshimkhia jong ka Sorkar. Bad ka jingkylli mynta, ka long balei phi hap ban da ai kyrpang ia kata ka jaka?  Lada ia ki nongtrei ka Municipal phi la rah sha Quarter jong ka Municipal ka biang palat Sorkar MDA. Hynrei balei pat ia kiwei ki nongtrei jong kiwei ki tnat treikam ka Sorkar phim aiti sha ki tnat ba dei peit ba kin pynkynriah sha ki Quarter jong ki bad ka la lait ka jingai ia ka jaka kaba 1.4 akar?“Nga sngew iahap bad u Bah prestone ka long ba ka jaka ba la ai kam dei ban long trai da ki briew kiba sah ha Them Iewmawlong, haoid, kan long trai ka Municipal hynrei balei phi hap ban ai pat ia katei ka jaka?” la kynthoh u Bah Nongrum.
title: KA VPP KAN YM ÏALAM BAKLA ÏA U PAIDBAH, JUBAB U MLA KA VPP ÏA U DY. CM

content: Ka kynhun Search and Rescue Team jong ka tnat Fire and Emeregency Service bad ki Pulit jong ka Mawlai Police Station ha ka sngi Balang ki la ioh sei ia kawei ka metiap jong iwei i khunlung kaba la per ha sla um jong ka wah Umkhrah ia iba ym pat lah satia ban pyntikna la i dei i khunlung kynthei ne shynrang.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum la iathuh ba ia kane ka metiap jong ine i khunlung ba dang shu kha ia kaba la suba ba la bret dusmon da ki kmie ki kpa, la lap da ki paidbah kiba sah hajan ka Wah Umkhrah sha lyndet jong ka Seng Khasi College.Hadien ba ki Pulit ki la shimti ia kane ka met iap jong ine i khunlung, la pynkit noh sha Civil Hospital, Shillong.
title: PER KA METÏAP KHUNLUNG HA WAH UMKHRAH

content: Ka Shillong Traffic Police ha ka sngi balang ka la pynjulor noh haduh 181 tylli ki Modified Silencer ba la ïoh kurup na ki nongniah kali saw shaka bad thuk thuk ar shaka ha ki jingkhynra bapher bapher.Ka jingpynjulor ïa kine ki Modified Silencer da ki Pulit ka long kum shi bynta ka jingtrei shitom jong ki Pulit ban pyntreikam ïa ka aiñ kaba mana pyrshah ïa kino kino ki kali bad ki thuk thuk kiba pyndait ïa ki Modified Silencer.Ïa kine ki 181 tylli ki Modified Silencer la ïoh kurup naduh u bnai Nailar, 2023 haduh mynta da ki Pulit.Ïa ka jingpynjulor ïa kine ki 181 tylli ki Modified Silencer la leh ha phyllaw jong ka Police Reserve, Shillong ha kaba la sakhi lang da u Superintendent of Police ka East Khasi Hills u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger, u Superintendent of Police (City) Bah Vivek Syiem, u SP (Traffic) K. Prasad bad kiwei kiwei.U Bah Nongtnger ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ka Shillong Traffic Police ka la trei shitom naduh u snem ba ladep bad pynjur ïa ka jingtalasi ïa ki kali bad thuk thuk naduh u bnai Kyllalyngkot mynta u snem khnang ban pynkut shisyndon ïa ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki Modified Silencer kiba pynmih ïa ka jingsawa kaba sngew jli haduh katta katta bad kaba pynthud haduh katta katta ïa ki paidbah nongleit nongwan.Shwa ba ka tnat Pulit kan pyntreikam ïa ka hukum, ka la pynmih shwa da ka jingkyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba buh kali saw shaka bad ar shaka ba kin weng hi dalade ïa ki Modified Silencer, hynrei hadien kane, ki pulit kiba la pynlong ka jingtalai ïa ki kali bad thuk thuk ki la lap ba dang byllai ki bym shym la sngap ïa ka jingkyrpad ka tnat Pulit.Ka jingïoh lum pisa na ka jingdaiñ kuna ïa ki nongpynkheiñ ka la kot haduh T. 12,46,500 tang mynta u snem.“Ïa kane pisa ba la ïoh lum na ka jingdaiñ kuna la thep sha ka pla tyngka jong ka Sorkar,” la ïathuh u Dy. S.P Bah G. Marngar.
title: 181 TYLLI KI MODIFIED SILENCER PYNJULOR KI PULIT, 12 LAK ÏOH LUM NA KA KUNA

content: ka Seng Kur Lyngdoh Thabah Seng Kmie ka ban sa rakhe ïa ka Jubili Ksiar ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai  ha Jaïaw Lumpyllon Dorbar Community Hall ka la khot bad wer ïa baroh ki parakur kiba don ha kylleng ka Bri u Hynñiewtrep  ban ïashim bynta lang ha kane ka sngi.U President ka Kur u Bah  N.R. Thabah u la ng ba ha kane ka sngi, kin sa don bun tylli ki prokram.U President u la kyntu ruh ïa ki parakur kiba ju ai tang ïa ka jait Lyngdoh hynrei ki dei ban da thoh pura ïa ka jait Lyngdoh Thabah.  “Ki don bun ki jait Lyngdoh ha rilum Khasi bad Jaiñtia, bad namarkata ka long kaba donkam ban pyndonkam beit ban thoh da ka jait Thabah, khnang ba kan ym pynbakla bad ban kiar na kaba wanrah ïa ka jingïasngewthuh bakla ha ka rukom ïakheiñ kur,” u la ong.U General Secretary jong ka Seng Kmie u Bah R.B. Thabah u la ong ba ha kane ka jingrakhe yn sa pynkup burom ïa kiba pas bha naduh SSLC haduh Ph.D, bad kumjuh ruh yn sa pynkup burom ïa ki riewtymmen jong ka Kur kiba la kynjoh ïa ka rta kaba la 85 snem.“Ka jingwan lyngshop ka khlam jingpang 2020 ka la khanglad ïa ngi ban pynkup burom ïa ki khun ki pyrsa jong ka kur, hynrei ha kane ka sngi yn pynkup burom ïa ki khun ki pyrsa kiba la pas bha naduh u snem 2021 haduh u snem 2023,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ruh ba kin don kumba 500 ngut ki dkhot jong ka kur na kylleng ka jylla ki ban sa ïashim bynta ha kane ka sngi, la ïathuh u President ka Seng Samla Seng Kur Thabah u Bah Kiewshaphrang JW Thabah.  U la pyntip ba ki nongjop ha ka raffle ticket draw yn sa pynbna hi ha kane ka sngi.U General Secretary jong ka Seng Samla Seng Kur Thabah u samla Banteibor Thabah u la pyntip ba ka kur kan sa pyllait paidbah ïa ka Almanak 2024, bad kyntu ruh ïa ki parakur Thabah ba kin shimkhia ban poi lang sha kane ka jingrakhe ïa ka jubili ksiar.
title: WER KA SENG KUR THABAH ÏA KI PARAKUR SHA KA JINGRAKHE ÏA KA JUBILI KSIAR

content: Da ki hajar ngut ki parakur Warjri ki la poi sha ka sngi rakhe ia ka lyngkhuh snem ba arphew san jong ka Seng Kur Warjri ha shnong Thynroit. Ka rakhe baphuh baphieng la wan pynshngaiñ lang da ki rangbah jong ka Synjuk Ki Rangbah Kur Ka Bri U Hynñiewtrep bad ki samla nongialam jong ka seng Hynñiewtrep Youth Council. Ka jingrakhe ka pynlong ruh ia byllai ki kam pyninam ia ki sap ki phong jong ki khynnah bad samla na ka kur Warjri ha baroh shisnem ki ba kynthup ia ka Football, Basketball, Painting, Essay, Poetry, Dancing, Music bad ha ka step jong ka sngi long dorbar la pynlong da ka Marathon. Hadien kata la bteng ka Dorbar ba la kren da ki rangbah kur Warjri bad la sam ia ki khusnam jop jong ki samla ki ba lahduh ha ki kam pynisap bapher bapher bad la pyninam ruh ia ka rwai ka shad na ki nongjop bad nonghikai ba kynthup ia ka shad da I Dapalei Warjri bad ka kynhun bad ka jingrwai da I Noury Warjri.Nalor ki jingiakob pyninam bapher bapher, la pynkup burom ruh ia ki samla na ka kur ki ba la kiew shaphrang ha la ki jingtbit ba shimet jong ki ba kynthup ia ka samla Ellerene Warjri ba la ioh ka nam lahduh kyrdan ba-ar ha ka Bachelor of Education Examination, 2023, NEHU, Obinas Warjri ba la ioh takma ksiar ha ka 5Annual National Martial Arts Games, Badahunshisha Warjri ba ioh kyrdan ba-ar ha ka Poster Contest 2023 da ka Forest and Environment Department, Meghalaya ha ka ba synrop bad ka Global Tribal Forum. Kumjuh ruh la pynkup burom ia ki rangbah kur ki ba la kitkhia ia ka Seng Kur Warjri naduh ba la seng na arphewsan snem mynshwa, bad la ainam aiburom ia u khliehduh ba nyngkong, Bah D L Warjri (bam kwai ha dwar U Blei) ba la pdiang sngewbha da ka takma sahnam ha I kmie ki khun Kong P O Kharkongor, ba la synran lang bad ki khun ki kti.Ha ka ba pynwai noh ia ka jingrakhe la pynhiar lama da ki rangbah kur Warjri ba kynthup ia u Bah George A Warjri, Bah Sunshine Warjri, Bah P Barkos O Warjri, Bah R V Warjri, Bah Kestar Warjri bad kiwei kiwei ki rangbah kur na ka seng kmie. Ha kane ka sngi rakhe la ioh jingkren na u Bah Shakliar Warjri, myntri sorkar jylla, u Rangbah R L Kharpran, Symbud Khliehduh ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Kur bad na u Samla Roy Kupar Synrem, khliehduh ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council. U Bah Shakliar Warjri u la pynpaw ka jingkmen bakhraw na ka bynta ka jingrakhe lyngkhuh arphewsan snem jong ka Seng Kur Warjri bad u la kyntu ia ki rangbah ban kin dang iai duriap ban pyniar ia ki kam jong ka Kur Warjri. U Rangbah R L Kharpran u la kren mardor halor ka jingdonkam ban tehsong ia ki seng kur ha satlak ka Ri Khasi bad ban pynskhem ia ka longkur longkha. Kum shi bynta jong ka jingrakhe ia ka lyngkhuh arphewsan snem jong ka Seng Kur Warjri la rakhe ruh ia ka snem thymmai katkum u bnai bneng ki Khasi ba la maitphang da u Bah Raphael Warjri bad la ioh jingkren na u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u ba la kyntu ia ki paidbah ban long ki ba tipkur tipkha, tipbriew tipblei bad kamai ia ka hok da ka ba kdew artat ba ka tipkur tipkha ka long ka ba kongsan na ka bynta ka lawei jong ka jaitbynriew ha baroh ki liang.Ki samla ba jop ha ki jingiakop ki long ha ka Mareh Marathon na ka liang ki shynrang u ba jop kyrdan nyngkong dei u Teibanstone Warjri na shnat Thynroit, kyrdan baar u Denzil Gordy Warjri na Mawlai, kyrdan balai u Bateiskhem Warjri na Thynroit. Na ka liang ki kynthei ha ka Marathon la jop kyrdan nyngkong da ka Aquilin Warjri na shnat Wahlang, kyrdan baar Banrisuk Warjri na Wahlang, kyrdan balai Shishabahun Nongkynrih, na ki nongshimbynta ba khynnah tam dei u Morgan Jones na shnat Sohryngkham, bad ba tymmen tam dei I  Langtimai Siejiong bad ki ba la ioh takma tang ban pyntngen ki long Phibanshimti Warjri na shnat Nongkynrih, Sanhil Warjri na Thynroit, bad Anginia Warjri na Umphrew shnat Umrynjah. Ha ka Basketball na ka liang shynrang la jop ka shnat Mawlai pyrshah ia ka shnat Mawprem, liang kynthei la jop ka shnat Mawlai pyrshah ia ka Wahlang; ka shnat Mawnai ka la jop ha ka Football pyrshah ia ka shnat Urur Rangshken, bad ki wei ki khusnam shimet ki long Best Goalkeeper la jop u Freddy Fender Warjri na shnat Manai, Top scorers la jop da u Balajied Warjri na Manai bad Shimbor Warjri na Urur Rangshken, Best player la jop da u Balajied Warjri bad Promising Football player la jop da u Micky Berth Warjri.  Ki nongjop ha ka Pyniriam na ki ba rit ba long kyrdan nyngkong u  Wanbok Warjri, (Mawkneng), kyrdan ba ar ka Marbakordor Warjri, (Siejiong), kyrdan balai u Mebanshngain Warjri, (Siejiong) ha ka Pyniriam baheh pat ka Graceful joy Warjri (Mawkneng) kyrdan ba nyngkong, ka Wandarika Stella Warjri (Sohryngkham) kyrdan baar, ka Cynthia Warjri, (Upper shillong) bad ka Iaphira Warjri, (Mawkneng) ki jop kyrdan balai. Ki nongjop ha ka Thohdur ki long u Bankhraw Warjri, Lummawbah kyrdan ba nyngkong, ka  Naphida B Warjri, Mawprem kydan baar, Badahunshisha Warjri , Pyndengumiong kyrdan balai bad u Mewanshwa Warjri, Siejiong ba dang khyndai snem la ainam kyrpang da ka khusnam bad syrnot. Ki ba jop ha ka rwai ba heh ki long ka Noury Warjri (Laitkor) kyrdan ba nyngkong, ka Ibasuklang Warjri (Siejïong) kyrdan baar, bad ka Ibapynjanai Warjri (Mawkriah) kyrdan balai. Na ki barit ha ka rwai pat la jop kyrdan nyngkong u Hamebansan Warjri – Nongmynsong, kyrdan baar ka Ila Warjri – Kynshi, kyrdan balai ka Shisha Warjri – Mairang. Ha ka iakop thoh Essay ki nongjop ki long kyrdan nyngkong ka Sharina Warjri, kyrdan baar ka Dollyrene Warjri na shnat Mawkneng, kyrdan balai ka  Ibapynsuk Warjri na shnat Myrkhan. Ha ka iakob thoh poitri la jop ka  Bamisha Warjri shimet bad ha ka iakob shad la jop kyrdan nyngkong ka Dafini Warjri na shnat Mawkneng, kyrdan baar ka Jesika warjri na shnat Mawkneng bad ka ka Letizia Warjri na shnat Mawprem.….……………….
title: WER KA SENG KUR THABAH ÏA KI PARAKUR SHA KA JINGRAKHE ÏA KA JUBILI KSIAR

content: Ka ITC Cementation India Ltd. hadien ba la ïoh jingbit na ka Sorkar Jylla ka la sdang ban maramot ïa ka jingkieng Damsite ha ka sngi Balang bad ha kajuh ka por ka la buh thong ban pyndep ia kane ka kam hapoh 4 bnai eiei.La sakhi ia ka jingsdang ban ksam thliew ïa ka jingkieng bad kane kan ktah bha ïa ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah ha kaba na ka liang ki bor Pulit ka Ri-Bhoi ki la bunkam ban pynbeit ïa ki kali ba leit ba wan.Ki kali paidbah kiba ïaid lyngba ka surok National Highway-6 ki la ngat ha ka dheng kali kaba jur naduh ka thaiñ Umïam ban kiew sha nongbah Shillong namar ka jingsdang ban maramot biang ïa ka jingkieng Damsite kaba la sdang ban orpait bad buh jingma ïa ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah namar ïa ki kali la hap ban pynïaid tang shilliang jong ka surok ban jam ïa ka jingkieng Umïam.  Namar ka jingjur palat ka dheng kali ki bor pulit ka Ri-Bhoi ha ka por janmiet ki la khang noh ïa baroh ki kali ban kiew sha nongbah Shillong bad ban ïaid lyngba na ka jingkieng Damsite katba ka jingmaramot ka dang ïaid shakhmat.Baroh ki kali kiba kiew sha nongbah Shillong ki la hap ban ïaid na Umroi ban kiew na Umrynjah lyngba ka surok VIP Road ban mih sha Mawlai Mawkynroh, katba ki kali kiba mih na Shillong ban leit sha Guwahati kin dang ïoh hi ban ïaid lyngba ka jingkieng Damsite.U Construction Manager jong ka ITC Cementation India Ltd. u Hanuman Kalamb u la ong ba ka jingmaramot ïa ka jingkieng ka long da kaba ksam thliew ha ki bynta ba shapoh ba donkam ha ka jingkieng ban thep dewbilat ban kyrshan ha ki bynta ba la shong synjor ka jingkieng.U la kubur ba ka jingkieng Damsite ka dei shisha kaba la rim bad kaba la kut ka por jong ka bad ka buh jingma shikatdei namar ka jingkhlaiñ jong ka um kaba la lang ha ka pung Umïam kumta lyngba ka jingmaramot biang ïa ka jingkieng kan sa lah ban pynjlan biang ïa ka por bad jingkhlaiñ jong ka jingkieng sa kumba 25 snem eiei bad ka jingmaramot kan neh kumba saw bnai.
title: SDANG KA JINGMARAMOT ÏA KA JINGKIENG DAMSITE, HAPOH 4 BNAI YN PYNDEP KA ITC INDIA LIMITED

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha ka sngi Balang u la ong ba dei tang ka Kashari kaba lah ban ai jamin ïa ki dkhot ba la shahkem jong ka North East Petroleum Mazdoor Union (NEPMU) hynrei ym da ka  Sorkar.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Sangma u la ong, “ngi la ïakren lut ïa baroh halor kane bad ka kam ka dang don ha ka Kashari. Ki la kyrpad ban ai jamin hynrei ïa ka jamin dei tang ka Kashari kaba lah ban ai hynrei ym da ka Sorkar.  Ka kam ka dang ïaid mynta shakhmat.”“Hynrei ha kum kane ka por, katto katne ki nongñiah Trok kim hun satia bad dei halor kane la pynlong ïa ka jingïathir ïatai kaba dang ïaid mynta shakhmat. Ka Sorkar ka la trei shitom ban pynthikna ba ki paidbah kim dei ban mad jingeh,” u la bynrap.Da kaba kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin ym khuslai jingmut, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “ha kum kane ka por, nga kwah ban kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei ban khih khuslai haba kum kine ki jingjia ki wan namarba ka Sorkar kan sa pyntip sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong bad wat shah ba ngin shah ïalam bakla ha ki hamsaïa. Ngim dei ban khuslai jingmut namarba kam don eiei ka ban pynkhuslai.”“Haoid, ki jingeh ki don hynrei ka jingïakren ka dang ïaid bad ngi la pyrshang ban weng ïa kane ka jingeh bad kam don satia kano kano ka jingeh kaba ïadei bad ka jingwanrah ïa ka umphniang petrol bad diesel sha ka Jylla. Nga kwah ban kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kim dei ban khuslai jingmut.  Lada ka don kano kano ka jingjia, ngin sa ïoh jingtip hynrei ïa mynta ngi dang lah ban tehlalam,” la kular u Myntri Rangbah.
title: JUBAB U CM ÏA KA NEPMU, DEI KA KASHARI BA AI JAMIN YM DEI SATIA KA SORKAR

content: : U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha ka sngi Balang u la ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka dang bishar bniah halor ka Meghalaya Residents, Safety and Security (Amendment) Bill (MRSSAB), 2020, hadien la pynphai biang da ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) ka Sorkar India.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Sangma u la ong, “ka MRSSAB ka dei kawei pat ka lad ha ka jaka jong ka Inner Line Permit ïa kaba ngi la khynñiat bad mynjur hapoh ka Ingdorbar Thawaiñ bad ngim shym pat ïoh ïa ka jingmynjur na u Lat hynrei la phah pynban sha Delhi bad sha u President ka ri ban ïoh jingmynjur bad dei halor kane ka daw ba ka Sorkar India ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ong ba phi dei ban khmih bniah ïa ka namarba ki don katto katne ki Section ki bym ïahap bad ki katto katne ki kyndon.”“Dei halor kane mynta ngi la hap ban shong bishar biang (ïa ka MRSSAB) bad ngi la ïakren ruh ïa ki kynhun bapher bapher,  ïa ka kynhun ki stad aiñ bad ïa u Advocate General khnang ban dup lah ban ïaid shakhmat.  Ka long kaba kyllaiñ namarba ki aiñ ka Sorkar Pdeng, ki aiñ ka Sorkar Jylla ki dei kiba ngi hap ban da bishar bniah shwa ban shim rai halor kane bad ka kam ka dang ïaid mynta shakhmat bad ngin sa nang ïai buddien,” u la ong.U la ïathuh ba ka jingïalang bad ka kynhun bapher bapher shen kan sa long ha u snem thymmai.Haba kylli, u Sangma u la ong, “haoid ka dei ka jingong jong phi ba ka ishu wan rung kyrthep ki briew kiba nabar bad khlempep ki don bun tylli ki kam bad ki sienjam ba la leh ha ki bynta bapher bapher.  Namarkata, kam dei satia ba kam don eiei kaba ym shym la leh hynrei ka Sorkar ka la leh la ka jong ka kamram, la ka long ha ka ka jingtalasi ha Infiltration Check Gate, la la long ha ki tnat treikam bapher bapher ban wad ïa kine ki briew bad ban kumno ban pynphai biang sha ka jaka ba ki wan.”U la ong ruh ba kine ki dei ki kam kiba la ïaid shakhmat tangba ka ïapher bha bad ka ILP bad MRSSA namarba ka jingthmu jong kine ki ar tylli ki aiñ, ka long ban don ïa ka khyrdop talasi ïa manla uwei pa uwei u briew uba wan rung shapoh ka jylla.“Katkum ka ILP, u briew u hap ban da ïoh jingbit shwa ban rung sha ka jylla.Namarkata, ka la mih ka jingdawa kaba jur na ki paidbah bad hadien kata la mynjur ïa ka Resolution ba ka dei ban don ka ILP ha ka jylla Meghalaya bad ngi la kyrpad ïa ka Sorkar India hynrei ka Sorkar India kam shym la ai dak eiei ruh em halor kane,” la bynrap u Sangma.U la bynrap ba ka Sorkar Meghalaya haduh mynta ka dang ap ïa ka jingmynjur jong ka Sorkar Pdeng bad haduh mynta ka Sorkar Jylla ka dang ïai pynkynmaw ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng ban eksamin bad ban shim rai halor ka Resolution jong ka ILP.
title: HA U SNEM THYMMAI YN LUM KA SORKAR ÏA KI KYNHUN BAN ÏATAI ÏA KA MRSS (AMENDMENT) BILL

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, u Conrad Kongkal Sangma ha ka sngi Balang u la ong ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka dang bishar bniah shwa ban pynkha ïa ki Police Station ba thymmai.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Sangma u la ong, “ngi dang bishar ïa kine ki bynta namarba ki bun bha kiba dawa ïa ka Police Station ha baroh kawei ka jylla bad nga ruh nga dei uwei uba pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew ba ngi dei ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ki Police Station kiba la don lypa bad ban pyntreikam shispah na ka shispah bad ban bishar bniah shwa ban ïaid shakhmat.”“Kumba phi la ïohi, ngi don kumba 2000 tylli ki jingthungkam bad ka jingpyndap ïa ki kam ba lait na ki Police Stations bad Out Post ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka jylla bad ka thong jong nga ka long ban pyndep shwa ïa kata,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u la ong, “ka thong banyngkong bad kaba hakhmat eh ka long ban pynbiang shwa ïa ka jingdon jong ki nongtrei, ka jingpynbiang ïa ki tiar ki tar, ki kali, ki tiar siat, ki jinghikai pyntbit bad baroh ki jingdonkam nadong shadong bad ynda kine ki la biang pura ngin sa lah ban pynkha shuh shuh ïa ki Police Station.”
title: YN PYNKHLAIÑ SHWA ÏA KI POLICE STATION BA LA DON LYPA SHWA BAN PYNKHA THYMMAI: CONRAD

content: Ka District Magistrate jong ka East Khasi Hills ha ka sngi Palei ka la pynmih ia ka hukum hapoh ka Section 144 jong ka Criminal Procedure Code (Cr.PC), ban pyntip ba la shah tang ia ki Bos kiba kit ia ki passenger bad ia ki kali rit ban iaid lyngba ka jingkieng Damsite.Ha kane ka hukum ka District Magistrate ka la pyntip ruh ba ki kali MMV/HMV kiba wan na East bad West Jaintia Hills District kin hap ban iaid na Mawryngkneng lyngba ka surok Shillong Bye Pass. Katba ki kali kiba wan na West, South West bad Eastern West Khasi Hills District kin hap ban iaid lyngba ka shnong Pomlakrai ban poi sha Mawryngkneng bad rung sha ka surok Shillong Bye-Pass.Namar ka jingkyrkieh jong ka kam, ka District Magistrate ka la pyntip ba kane ka hukum kan treikam noh mardor tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei patHa  kane ka hukum  ka District Magistrate ka la phah kopi ruh sha u Superintendent of Police jong ka East Khasi Hills District, da kaba bthah ba un buh ia ka khyrdop talasi kali ha surok lad Mawryngkneng ban rung sha ka surok Shillong Bye-pass bad ha ka shnong Mawiong ban peit ia ka leit ka wan jong ki kali.
title: SHAH BAN ÏAID NA JINGKIENG DAMSITE TANG ÏA KI BOS KIT PASSENGER BAD KI KALI RIT

content: U President ka Petroluem Dealers Association of Meghalaya (PDAM) Bah Kennedy C. Khyriem ha ka sngi Palei u la kren da kaba shai ba ka Association kan trei borbah ban pynduhjait ïa ka jingtuh umphniang na ki Kali kit Umphniang Petrol ha ka surokbah National Highway bad kynthoh tyngeh ruh ba kane kam dei shuh kam tuh ka barit bad ka dei ka kam tuh kaba la kot da ki phew klur tyngka ha ka shisnem.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Nongpoh ba la pynlong da ka sorkar Meghalaya ryngkat bad ki nongïalam ka Mazdoor Union, u Bah Kennedy u la ong, “lada kheiñ tang da ki jingshah tuh kaba tang da ka 50 litar shi sngi bad lada kheiñ kyllum kan poi sha ka 27 klur ha ka shi snem, namar lyngba kane ka surok ha ka shi sngi ym duna ki Kali kit umphniang petrol kiba ïaid kumba 400 tylli ban shalan umphniang sha ka jylla Meghalaya bad kiwei ki jaka kum sha Silchar, Hailagandi, Karimganj, Tripura, Mizoram bad kiwei kiwei ki jaka.”U la ai khublei ïa ka sorkar Meghalaya da ka jingshim khia jong u Myntri ka tnad Food Civil Supply and Consumer Affairs ka Sorkar Jylla Bah Comingone Ymbon ban ïakren bad ka Mazdoor Union ha kaba ki la shim ïa ka rai ban bteng biang ka jingshalan umphniang sha ka jylla Meghalaya bad kin sangeh noh ïa ki jingkhih hadien ka jingïaphylliew jingmut halor ki jingeh ba ki paidbah kin sa mad lada sangeh ka jingwanrah ïa ka umphniang petrol bad diesel sha ka jylla Meghalaya.U la ong ruh watla ka Mazdoor Union ka la sangeh ka jingïakhih hynrei kan dang ïakhun pyrshah ban pynduhjaid ïa ki kam beain ba ki kali kit umphniang ki shah tuh ïa ka umphniang petrol bad diesel ha shiteng lynti shuwa ba kin poi sha ki Petrol Pump.Kane ka jingtuh umnphniang kam dei ka jingshah ktah tang ïa ki trai Petrol Pump ba ka dei ka hok ka jong ki bad lada kum kine ki jinglehtuh ïa ka umphniang ka dang bteng kane kan ktah ruh ïa ki paidbah ka jylla khamtam ka jingïakhih ban sangeh shalan umphniang lada ka dang bteng kan ktah nyngkong eh ïa ki paidbah lada ka jylla ka mad ïa ka jingkyrduh ïa ka umphniang.U la ong ba ka jingkem jong ki Pulit ka Jylla Meghalaya ïa kiba don kti dang shen na Ri Bhoi, ka dei hi kaba ki lap ïa ki sakhi sabut ha kaba ki hap ban kem, namarba kane ka dei ka kam kaba long beaiñ bad ban dawa pat na ka Sorkar ba dei ban pyllait noh ïa ki, kam dei ka kamram jong ka Sorkar ban leh ïa kata bad ka la dei ka kamram jong ka ïingkashari ba kan ai ïa ka jingbishar bad lada lap ba kim don kti kin sa lait hi na ka jingpynshitom kiba dei katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: 27 KLUR SHISNEM DUHNONG KI TRAI PETROL PUMP BA JAH KA PETROL HA SHITENG LYNTI

content: : Ka Sorkar Jylla kan pynlut pisa palat 23 klur na ka bynta ban pynlong  ia ka Meghalaya Games ha Tura, West Garo Hills District naduh ka 15 tarik haduh 20 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, 2024.Palat 3,000 hajar ngut ki nongialehkai kin sa iashim bynta ha ki 22 tylli ki jingiakob. Yn sa pynlong ruh ia ki jingialehkai tynrai kum shi bynta ban kyntiew ia ka kolshor jong ki Khasi, Jaiñtia  bad Garo lyngba ka sport.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Myntri ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs Bah Shakliar Warjri u la ong ba ka jingpynkhreh na ka bynta ka Meghalaya Games ka la iaid shakhmat.“Baroh ki la long kiba la khrheh bad ngi pynthikna ba kan long ka lympung ialehkai kaba jop.  Nga la leit jurip hi da lade sha Tura la 7 sien eiei ban pynthikna ba ki nongialehkai, ki jaka sah kin long kiba biang,” u la ong.U la iathuh ba ka Sorkar kan pynlut kumba 23 klur na ka bynta ka Meghalaya Games. Haba pynksan ia kane, u Bah Warjri u la ong, “ngin pynlut khnang ban iohi ba ki nongialehkai kin bit kin biang ha ka leit ka wan bad ka shong ka sah. Ngin sa pynlong 22 ki jait jingialehkai bad ngam tharai ba kin bun than namarba ngi kwah ban ailad ia ki samla, dei na kata ka daw ba ngi pynlut. Palat 3,000 hajar ngut ki nongialehkai kin sa iashim bynta.”U la ong ba ym don shuh kano kano ka jingshna thymmai ban dang tei namarba ka Sorakr ka ladep pan jingiarap na ki skul bad kolej ban pynsah ia ki nongialehkai bad ia ki Official.   Ka jingialehkai  kan long ha ki jaka ialehkai bapher bapher ha Tura.“Ka Maw-point, kaba dei ka jingialeh kai kaba shongshit bha ha Khasi Hills, yn sa pynrung ha kane ka jingialehkai. Ngin sa peit ruh ia ki jingialehkai na Jaintia bad Garo Hills ia kaba ngim pat lah ban shim rai,” u la ong.
title: 23 KLUR YN PYNLUT KA SORKAR JYLLA BAN PYNLONG ÏA KA MEGHALAYA GAMES HA TURA

content: : Naduh ki nongïaidkai step haduh ki khynnah skul, kiba leit trei leit ktah haduh kiba leit iew leit hat, mano mano ba ïaid ba ieng ha ki surok ha sor Shillong ki mad beit ïa ka jingeh namar ka jingsniew palat ki surok.Kum ban shu kdew ba jan baroh ki surok ka sor Shillong bad khamtam eh ki rurok ha ka thain Nongthymmai, Garikhana, Demseiniong ki la nang sniew na ka jingtih kabym i kut shuh kaba la pynthut ïa ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah haduh kala pynlong ïa ka tnad Traffic ban pyndap hi dalade ïa ki thliew kumba la paw ha ki lad pathai khubor khamtam kum ha kane ka por Khristmas kaba dei kawei na ki aiom bakhraw na ka bynta ki khun Khristan ha kylleng ka pyrthei bad kumjuh ha kane ka jylla.Da kaba shim khia ïa kane, u Vice President ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit u Bah Wankitbok Pohshna u la buh ka jingkyrpad ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba ka dei ban shimkhia wutwut ban pyllait ïa ki paidbah na ki jingeh namar ka jingsniew palat ki surok ha ki shnong ki thaw khnang ba ka jinglehkmen Khristmas kan long kaba shongkun ym tang ban shu ïa khuslai na ka jingbymbiang ki surok.U Bah Pohshna u la bynrap, “ngi sngewthuh ba kam long kaba suk ban khanglad ïa ka jingsniew ki surok ki lynti syngkien namar ka jylla Meghalaya ka ïoh ïa u slap ba bun tam ha ka shisnem. Hynrei lada mon hi ka Sorkar ka lah ban shimkhia ban saiñdur janai ïa ka rukom shna surok bad ha kano ka rukom yn lah ban lait na ka jingjot khari khari. Ka party BJP, ka sngewdei ba ka Sorkar Jylla ka hap pynbiang noh da ka kynja song pisa ba la mang lypa ban pynlut marmar ban maramot ïa ki surok manla ka por haba don ka jingjulor la ka dei kaba rit ne kaba heh.”“Ka long kaba sngewlyngoh haduh katta kattta ba kat haduh mynta khamtam hadien ka jingdon jong ki kor ki bor ba thymmai, ka tnad badei peit ïa ki surok kam pat don ïa ka rukom treikam kaba janai ban khmih bniah ïa kum kine ki jingjia khamtam ban lait na ka jingjlan ban ïoh jingmynjur na ka sorkar ban maramot ïa ki jingjulor kiba rit, namar lada shu ieh ïa ki jingjot jingpeit barit, ka lam pynban sha jinglut bunshah lada leh bymsuitniew naduh basdang kumba ong hi ka ktein phareng, a stitch in time saves nine” la bynrap u kyrwoh.Kum ka party kaba ïatreilang hapoh ka Sorkar MDA, ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit ka long barabor kaba kloi ban ïatreilang bad baroh ki party kiba sngewïahap jingmut khnang ba ka jylla kan nang kiew nang bha ha baroh ki liang.“Namar tang da ka jingïatreilang, ngin sa lah ban pyntikna ba kin nym don shuh ki thliew ha ki surok nangne shakhmat bad ka leit ka wan ki paidbah kan aaram khamtam kum lei ha kane ka por aiom khristmas” la bynrap u Vice President ka party.
title: KUMNO LADA ÏOH SUROK BABHA SHWA KA KHRISTMAS, KYLLI KA  BJP

content: U Johnny Nongrum uba dei u khlur iakura Mixed Martial Art ba pawnam bha jong kane ka jylla u la lah ban pynliem lyndang tang 8 sekon ia u Farid uba dei u rangiakura  na ka jylla Madya Pradesh ha ka sngi sdang jong ka Yolo Carnival ba la pynlong da ka WFC kaba la sdang ha ka 15 tarik, Nohprah ha Madan Kurkalang Ri Bhoi District.U Johny Nongrum, kumba u ladep kren lypa ha ka Face Off kaba la long ha ka 14 tarik u Nohprah, ba u don ka jingshaniah kaba 99.9 percent ha lade ban pynliem lyndang ia une u nongiakura, kumta ruh ka la urlong kumba u la kren.
title: TANG 8 SEKON PYNLIEM LYNDANG U JOHNNY NONGRUM ÏA U FARID

content: Ki shipai BSF ka 193 Battalion, Meghalaya ha ka sngi Palei kiba la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ka la pynlong ia ka jingkhynra ha khappud jong ka East Khasi Hills district bad ioh kurup ia ki ïtkhmat kiba shongdor palat 50 lak tyngka. Ia kine ki ïitkhmat la thmu ban shalan tuh sha ka ri Bangladesh.Shwa kane, ki shipai BSF ki la lap ia kawei ka kali kaba kit palat pud kaba pynieng harud ka lynti khim kaba mih sha khappud. Ha ka jingtalasi, la lap napoh ka kali ba la kit ia ki mar ba la suba ban khaii tuh, khamtam ki ïikhmat.  Ia u nongniah bad ia u nongbud la kem da ki shipai BSF hadien ba kim shym la lah ban ai ia ka jubab kaba biang bad halor ka jingbym lah ban pyni ia ki dulir ban kit ia ki ïitkhmat.Ia kine ki arngut bad ia ki mar ba la ioh kurup, la aiti noh sha ki Pulit ka Dangar Police Station na ka bynta ban leh katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ.
title: KURUP KI BSF ÏA KI ÏTKHMAT BA SHONGDOR PALAT 50 LAK NA KHAPPUD

content: Ki nongtrei jong ka Ophis Commissioner of Customs (Preventive) Shillong, kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka Ministry of Finance, ka Sorkar India kiba la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba bniah na ki tnat syntiat ba ka don ka jingkit tuh ia ka ksiar bar ri ban khaii tuh lyngba ka khappud ba la kit ha kawei ka kali kaba thmu ban leit sha Barpeta, ki la pynlong ka jingap ktem ha Diengpasoh ha ka sngi Balang bad ioh bat ia kawei ka kali Maruti EECO Van.Ha ka jingtohkit, la lap ba ia kine ki ksiar ba la thmu ban khaii tuh la buhrieh bha hapoh ka kali. Da ka jingtalasi ia ka kali, la lap ia ka ksiar ba la buhrieh bha hapoh ka khrum jong ka jaka shong kaba hapdeng.Ka ophis CCP ka la pyntip, ba ki lyngkhot Ksiar ba la ioh kurup ki don haduh 20 tylli ba la song bha da ka Black Tape ha ki saw tylli ki song.  Ka jingkhia jong kine kine ki lyngkhot ksiar ka long 2331.82 gram bad shongdor T. 1.42 klur.  Ki nongtrei ka Custom ki la kem noh ia uwei u briew bad ka jingtohkit ka la iaid shakhhmat.Ha kawei pat ka jingpynap ktem ha ka sngi Palei, ki nongtrei ka Custom ki la ioh ban kurup 50 byrni u rynsun China uba khia 950 kilo uba don ia ka kyrteng Huaguang, ia uba la thmu ban khaii tuh lyngba ka khappud.  Ka jingtohkit halor kane ka dang iaid shakhmat.“Kino kino ki riewpaidbah ki lah ban iakhun pyrshah ia ki kam khaii tuh lyngba ka khappud bad pyntip ruh ba ia ka kyrteng jong ki nongai jingtip yn buhrieh noh bad yn ai ruh ia ka khusnam,” la pyntip ka ophis Custom.
title: 1.42 KLUR KA KSIAR KURUP KA OPHIS CUSTOM NA DIENGPASOH BAD 50 BYRNI U RYNSUN CHINA

content: : Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la kyntu ïa ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ba kan tuklar pyrshah ïa ka jingphah thoh eksamin sha ki Centre kiba don shabar ka jylla Meghalaya ïa ki nongthepkam trai jylla ha ka post Group B & C hapoh ka North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health & Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS).“Ngi kyntu ïa phi ban tuklar lem ïa ka jingphah thoh eksamin na ka bynta Group B & C ha NEIGRIHMS ha kaba la ïoh jingtip ba ki nongthep kam trai jylla kiba napoh ka jylla ki la hap ban leit thoh ïa ki eksamin shabar jylla Meghalaya,” ong u General Secretary ka KSU u samla Donald V Thabah ha ka dorkhas ba la phah sha ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah.U la pyntip ba ka KSU ka la pyrshang ruh ban ïakynduh ïa ka Myntri ka Koit ka Khiah hynrei namarba ka don shabar ka nongbah Shillong, kumta la shu pynsngew ïa ka lyngba ka telephone.U la ong ba ka Myntri ka la kular ïa ka KSU ba ma ka, ryngkat bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma kin sa shimkhia ïa kane ka kam ha New Delhi.“(Ka la kular) ba kan ïakynduh ïa ki Ophisar jong ka Union Health Ministry ban weng ïa kane ka jingeh bad ban kyrpad ba baroh ki nongthep kam trai jylla ki dei ban ïoh lad ban thoh eksamin ha ki Centre kiba don hapoh ka jylla,” u la ong da kaba pyntip ïa ka jingïathuh jong ka Myntri.U General Secretary ka KSU u la ïathuh ba un sa rah ïa kane ka ishu sha u Myntri Rangbah ba un tuklar mardor ïa kane ka kam.Ha kajuh ka por, ka KSU ka ladep phah ïa ka jingthoh sha u Director jong ka NEIGRIHMS u Dr. Nalin Mehta ban pyrkhat lem ïa kane ka jingeh kaba la mad da ki nongthep kam trai jylla.Dang shen ha ka jingïakynduh ïa u Director, ka KSU ka la ïoh jingtip ba ki nongthep kam trai jylla ki la ïoh ïa ki Centre thoh eksamin ha Shillong, Guwahati, Jorhat bad Delhi. Ïa ka jingthoh eksamin yn pynlong da ka HLL Agency.“Hynrei, kaba pynsngewsih ïa ngi ka long ba ki nongthep kam kiba dei na kiwei pat ki Centre, la ailad ba kin jied hi ïa ki jaka thoh eksamin, kata, ha Shillong, Guwahati & New Delhi,” la ong ka KSU.“Bun na ki nongthep kam trai jylla ki jied hi ïa ka Shillong kum ka jaka thoh eksamin kaba nyngkong bad ka Guwahati kum ka jaka thoh eksamin kaba ar hynrei kaba pynsngewsih ïa ki, ka long ba la ai ïa ki ban jied ïa ka Jorhat ne Dibrugarh kum ka jaka thoh eksamin.Ka KSU ka la pynkynmaw ruh ba bun na ki nongshong shnong ka jylla ki dei kiba wan na ki longing longsem kiba kham duna ka ïoh ka kot bad kane kan buh jingeh ruh ïa ki nongthep kam namar ba kin hap ban pynlut ïa ka pisa ha ka bai leit bai wan bad ka thiah ka dem.Ka KSU ka la pynkynmaw ruh ïa u Director halor ka jingkular ban pynlong ïa ka sorbe ha ki Computer Centre bapher bapher kiba don ha Shillong na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka CBT System Examination.
title: PHAH TUKLAR KA KSU HA KA SORKAR BA PHAH THOH EKSAMIN KAM KA NEIGRIHMS SHABAR JYLLA

content: U Chief Spokesperson jong ka BJP Meghalaya State Unit u Bah Mariahom Kharkrang u la ai khublei ia u Myntri ka Sorkar Pdeng uba peit ia ka Road Transport and Highways u Nitin Gadkari bad ia u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi ban mang pisa T. 1,241 klur na ka bynta ban shna pynheh ia ka surok Phulbari-Tura ha surokbah National Highway 127B ha Meghalaya.Ia kane ka surok kaba don ha shilynter jong ka shnong Phulbari-Tura ha surokbah National Highway 127B yn sa shna noh kum ka surok ar lain bad kan pynsuk ruh ia ka leit ka wan sha Tura, kaba dei ka District Headquarter jong ka West Garo Hills bad kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ka jylla Meghalaya lyngba ka surok NH-217 (Tura-Dalu) bad Tura-Jengjal-Rongjeng-Nongstoin-Shillong.U Bah Khrakrang u la ong, “ha ki 76 tylli ki snem ba la ioh ia ka jinglaitluid ha ka ri bad ha ka jingdap 50 snem ka jingioh Jylla bapura, ki sorkar barim ki la kyntait ban ithuh ia ka jylla Meghalaya ban ioh ia ki jingmyntoi ha ka liang ka surok bad ki lynti ki synkieng.  Kawei ka sorkar hadien kawei pat, ki la leh bym suidñiew ia ka jingdonkam ki surok kiba kongsan tam na ka bynta ki paidbah nongshong shnong bad kumjuh ruh ki surok kiba pyniasoh na ka bynta ka khaii ka pateng.“Ngi sngew sarong ba ngi don ia ka Sorkar Pdeng kaba sngewthuh ia ka jingdonkam jong ka jylla jong ngi bad kaba trei shitom ban weng ia ki jingeh kiba ngi iakynduh. U Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri, u Modi u la long u paralok jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lammihngi naduh ka sngi kaba nyngkong bad ki projek kam pynroi kiba ha kane ka thain Shatei Lammihngi ki la long ki sakhi.  Ka jingbhah pisa ka pynkhlaiñ ia ka jingsngewthuh a ngi don ia ka Sorkar Pdeng kaba peit lem ia ka bha ka miat jong ka Jylla Meghalaya.  Ka BJP Meghalaya Unit kan iai bteng ban trei na ka bynta ban pynskhem ia ka kti u Narendra Modi,” u la bynrap.
title: KHATDUH IAWAI PHAI KHMAT KA SORKAR PDENG BAN SHNA ÏA KI SUROK HA MEGHALAYA: BJP

content: Ka Jylla Meghalaya ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ka la rakhe kynmaw burom ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap kaba 83 snem jong u Soso Tham, u Myllung bakhraw jong ka ri Khasi uba la noh synñiang shikatdei eh sha u sup u thiar jong ka thoh ka tar Khasi.La sakhi ba ki kynhun bapher bapher ki la leit buh syntiew hakhmat u durmot jong u Soso Tham ha phyllaw jong ka State Central Library, Shillong kiba kynthup ia ki bahaing hasem jong u Myllung Soso Tham, ki dkhot bad ki nongialam jong ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo People (FKJGP) ba la lamkhmat da u President u Bah Dundee C. Khongsit, ka Hynñiewtrep Youths Council (HYC) ba lamkhmat da u President u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem bad kiwei kiwei.Nalor ki sengbhalang, la sakhi ruh ia ki dkhot jong ka National People’s Party (NPP) Youth Wing kiba la leit ban buh syntiew hakhmat u durmot jong u Myllung Soso Tham ba la lamkhmat da u MLA barim jong ka Mylliem Constituency u Bah Hamletson Dohling bad ki dkhot.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, ka Khasi Students Union, ka la kynmaw burom da kaba leit buh syntiew hakhmat u durmot jong u Soso Tham uba don hakhmat jong ka Khasi Department ka skulbah NEHU.Ka Khasi Student’s Union, South Khasi Hills Unit, ha kane ka sngi ka la kynmaw burom da leit buh syntiew hakhmat u durmot jong u Myllung Soso Tham uba la tei ha ka shnong Saitsohpen, Sohra.Ha rilum Jaiñtia, ka  Khasi Author’s Society (KAS), shnat Khliehriat ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Khasi Department jong ka Jaintia Eastern College, Khliehriat ka la rakhe ia ka lyngkhuh sngi iap jong u Myllung Soso Tham da kaba pynlong ia ka lympung iamir jingtip halor ka phang, “u synñiang jong u Myllung Soso Tham sha ka jaitbynriew Khasi”, ia kaba la pynlong ha Jaintia Eastern College, Khliehriat.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang da u MP ka Rajya Sabha u Dr. WR. Kharlukhi uba la long kum u Kongsan, u Myntri ka Sorkar Jylla Bah Kyrmen Shylla kum u symbud kongsan, u President ka Khasi Authors Society u Dr. DRL Nonglait, u Principal jong ka Jaintia Eastern College, Khliehriat u Dr. Phervision Nongtdu, u Vice President jong ka KAS, shnat Khliehriat u Bah ES. Shangpliang, ka Prof. S. Dkhar kaba dei ka Head jong ka Khasi Department, NEHU, Shillong, ki nonghikai bad ki samla pule jong ka Thomas Jones Synod College, Jowai, ka Kiang Nangbah Govt. College, Jowai, ka Nongtalang College, ka Don Bosco College, Byndihati bad ka Jaiñtia Eastern College, Khliehriat.U Dr. Kharlukhi u la pyllait paidbah ruh ïa ka kot ‘Shi Hara ki sur Myllung bad ki Esse” ba la thoh da u Dr. Davidson Diengdoh.
title: KYNMAW BUROM KA MEGHALAYA ÏA KA LYNGKHUH SNGI ÏAP KABA 83 SNEM U MYLLUNG SOSO THAM

content: Shillong, Nohprah, 18: U MDC shu sieh ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council, Bah Bindo Mathew Lanong ha ka Lah Sngi  u la pynpaw pyrthei ba u la rai ban ai jingkyrshan ia ka Khasi Hills Democratic Front (KHDF) ba ialam da u Chief Executive Member (CEM), u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem.U Bah Bindo u la shim ia kane ka rai hadien ba ki nongialam jong ka UDP kim shym la ai jubab ia ka shithi kaba u la thoh ban pynpaw ia ka mon ban iakhun ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong Parliamentary seat.Ha kajuh ka por, une u MDC ba la rangbah u la kyntait ba um don jingmut satia ban pyniasoh bad ka NPP namarba mynta u la long u briew uba laitluid.“Kumba ka long mynta, ngam don jingthmu eiei ban pyniasoh bad kano kano ka party namarba nga ban kmen ha kane ka por ba nga long uba laitluid.  Hynrei ngan sap hah ia ka shithi ai jingkyrshan jong nga sha ka EC ba la ialam da ka NPP ha ka sngi Baar,” la iathuh u Bah Bindo ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.U Bah Bindo u la ong ba u la rai ban thoh sha ki nongialam jong ka party ha u bnai Iaiong mynta u snem da ka jingkyrpad ban shim ia ka sienjam kaba thymmai hadien ba u la rai ban iakhun kum u kyrtong Independent na Nongkrem Constituency pyrshah ia u kyrtong ba la pynieng da ka UDP ha ka elekshon MLA kaba la long mynta u snem.“Nga ladep phah jingthoh sha u President bad sha u General Secretary ka party ban pynpaw ba nga long uba kloi ban iakhun ia ka elekshon Lok Sabha, Hynrei ka party kam shym la ai jubab satia ia nga,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u la pynpaw ba u la phah biang ha ka wat kaba ar ia ka shithi ha u bnai Jylliew kum ka jingpynkynmaw halor ka shithi kaba u la thoh ha u bnai Iaiong.U la pynpaw ba kane ka jingshah leh bym kheiñ snep ha ki nongialam ka UDP ka la pynkyndit ia u namrba u President ka UDP u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh hi dalade u la kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ba u Bah Bindo u dang dei hi u dkhot jong ka UDP.“Kaba pynlong ia u ban sngew ba ka party kam donkam shuh ia u, ka long hadien ba ngam shym la shah khot sha ka jingialang jong ka General Council,” u la ong.Da kaba pynpaw ba kiba bun mynta hapoh ka UDP ki dei ki riewthymmai, u Bah Bindo u la ong ba um pat ju kynthih ne kylliang sha kano kano ka party naduh ba u la rung sha ka jylli jong ka saiñpyrthei bad hadien ba u la jop ia ka elekshon MDC ha u snem 1972.“Nga la long u dkhot jong ka APHLC, HPU bad khatduh tad ynda la pynkylla sha ka UDP ha u snem 1997. Ka party ka la kylliang ia ka kyrteng, hynrei ngan iai neh beit bad kajuh ka party,”u la bynrap.Haba kylli, hato ka rai ba un kyrshan ia ka EC ba la ialam da ka NPP ka dei neem ka jingshet kylla ia ka UDP namarba ka la ailad ba un dang iai neh ha ka shuki kum u MDC shu sieh, u Bah Bindo u la ong ba um mynjur satia ba ki nongialam kiba mynta jong ka UDP kin dei kiba don ka jingkhlieh ba un dang iai bteng kum u MDC shu sieh hapoh ka KHADC.“Nga la shah thung kum u MDC shu sieh da ka jingmynjur jong u President barim jong ka UDP, u (L) Dr Donkupar Roy. Dei u Dr Donkupar Roy uba la ai ia nga kane ka shuki,” la ong u Bah Bindo.
title: RAI RANGBAH U BAH BINDO LANONG BAN KYRSHAN ÏA KA EC BA ÏALAM KA NPP HA KHADC

content: Ka samla Ibanriakor Lyngkhoi na ka shnong Weiloi, East Khasi Hills kaba hap hapoh Mawsynram Constituency ha ka sngi U Blei ka la shah pynkup burom ha ka Weiloi Sport Club hadien ba ka ioh ia ka jingjop ha ka jingmareh Marathon ba la tip kum ka Tata Steel Kolkata 25K.Ia kane ka jingpynkup burom la pynlong ha ISBT, Mawiongrim, Shillong hadien ba ka la wanphai na nongbah Kolkata, West Bengal ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei ha kaba la sakhi lang da u Adviser jong ka Weiloi Sports Club u Bah Presius Kharnaior.Kane ka long ka sien banyngkong eh ia ka samla Ibanriakor Lyngkhoi kaba la 20 snem ka rta ban leit iashim bynta ha ka jingiakob mareh Marathon shabar jong ka Jylla Meghalaya bad poi ha ka kyrdan ba nyngkong napdeng ki nongiashim bynta kiba ha ka rta kaba 18 haduh 24 snem ha ka Open 25k da kaba pyndep ia ka jingmareh ha ka 1 kynta, 58 minit, 19 sekhon.
title: JOP KA IBANRIAKOR LYNGKHOI HA KA MARATHON TATA STEEL KOLKATA 25K

content: Ka synjuk ki barikor na jylla Meghalaya, ka Ri Academy of Visual Arts ka la pynlong ia ka lyngwiar  thohdur jong ki barikor ha ICSSR, NEHU ba la plie da u Kher Rangbah ka tnat sorkar Mattithaw bad Deiriti, u Bah Frederick Roy Kharkongor. La iasnoh kti lang da ka Santiniketan Kala Bhavan Praktoni, ka synjuk ki barikor rangbah na Santiniketan na ka bynta ban sei pyrthei ia ki sap kyrpang jong ki samla ka jylla ki ba angnud ban trei bad kyntiew ia lade kum ki barikor batbit. La aiti sahnam ia kane ka lynwiar thohdur ha ka kyrteng jong u Myllung Soso Tham, kum ban sot na ki snap jingstad jong ka saiñ pyrkhat jongu na ka bynta ban tei ia ka imlang sahlang. La nguh burom ia u Myllung Soso Tham da baroh ki ba ia don ryngkat naduh ki kynrem ki lyndan haduh ki paidbah da ka ba thoh shun ha ka sladur ba la mang lypa na ka bynta ka jingthmu. U kongsan ha kane ka lyngwiar thohdur, u Bah F R Kharkongor u la pyrto ia ka thoh ka tar ka ba la kyrsoi na ka janor bad dohnud jong u Myllung Soso Tham ha kita ki snem ki ba ka imlang sahlang ka dang doh ha ki latlat jong ka synshar donbor ka sorkar Bilat bad ha ba dang sdang seilung ka thoh ka tar Khasi. U la pynkynmaw ruh ba ka snap tynrai Khasi ka shong tynrai ha ka khyndew, ka kur bad ka ktien, ha ka ba donkam ban pynneh pynsah na ka bynta ka lawei jong ka imlang sahlang.Ka jinglong dukha jong ki barikor ha ka lynti jingim ka long ka phang ka ba la phalng lyngba ka jingkren jong ki kynrem lyndan ha kane ka sngi, ba kynthup ia u khliehduh ka ICSSR u Prof B Panda, bad u Dr Jank Jhankar Narzari, u khliehduh jong ka Santiketan Kala Bhavan Praktoni. U Dr Janak Jhankar Narzari u la bynñiaw halor ka jinglong jingman ha ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi ka ba la sahdien ha ka laing jong ka thohdur, wat lada ka mynsiemn shitrhem jong ki samla ka iai kyrsoi bad na ka por sha ka por ki sap nylla jong ki barikor ki dang iai shylluit manla ka por. U nongialam rangbah jong ka synjuk ki barikor ha jylla, u Bah Raphael Warjri u la kubur ia ka jingkren jong kita ki kynrem lyndan bad u la ban khia halor ka jingdonkam ban mih ki shlem hikai shlem pule ha ka liang ka kam thohdur thohdar ha jylla na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ki samla ki ba angnud ban kiew irat ha kane ka liang. Kum shibynta ban kyntiew ia ka thohdur thohdar ha jylla bad ban ban plie lynti ia ki barikor na jylla, ka Santiniketan Kala Bhavan Praktoni ka la ia soi ia ka dorkhas soskular bad ka Riti Academy of Visual Arts, Shillong na ka bynta ban sam kylliang ia ki jingtip bad jingstad shaphang ka thohdur da ki lympung ki ba yn pynkhreh markylliang ha Shillong bad sha kiwei kiwei ki jaka ha Ri India.Ha ka Lyngwiar Thohdur ka ba dang iaid shitrhem mynta ha ICSSR, salonsari NEHU kan don ruh ka jingiaphylliew jingmut jong ki barikor na baroh arliang ha ka ba pyninam ia la ki sap ki phong bad ban batai ia ka jinglong jingman jong ka Thohdur ha la ki jylli lajong. Kumta ki don ki mat iatai ki ba yn sa pashat jingmut da ki barikor na Shillong bad na shabar ka jylla ba kynthup ia u Prof. Janak Jhankar Narzari, Soumitra Chatterji, Rathin Kanji, Prof. Niaz Majumdar, Falguni Mukherji, Shamita Goswami, Ketaki Choudhury, Mario Pathaw bad Raphael Warjri, halor ki phang ba ki ia tyngkhuh ha la shimet bad ki ba iadei bad ka lyngwiar thohdur ha ka imlang sahlang.
title: KA LYNGWIAR THOHDUR BAN AITI SAHNAM HA U MYLLUNG SOSO THAM

content: Shillong, Nohprah, 18: Ka Bouncers Association of Meghalaya bad ka Teilang Welfare Society (TWS) da ka jingkyrshan jong ka Directorate of Sport and Youth Affairs ka Sorkar Jylla kin sa pynlong ia ka Shillong Arms Fight All India Championship kaba lai sngi lynter ha nongbah Shillong.U President jong ka BAM Bah June Star Kharbuli ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khuor u la iathuh ba kane ka rynsan iakhun kti kan sdang ha ka 19 tarik bad yn pynkut ha ka 23 tarik myntu bnai Nohprah.  Ka jaka ban pynlong ia kane ka lympung iakhun kan sa long ha State Central Library, Shillong.Ban khring shuh shuh ia ki paidbah u Bah Kharbuli u la iathuh ba kin sa don ki khlur akphlim jong ka Bollywood ba kynthup ia ka Preeti Jhangiani bad u Parvin Dabas ki ban sa wan sakhi lang ha kine ki sngi.Shuh shuh u la pyntip ba ka khusnam Champion of the Champion na ka bynta ki shynrang ka long T.25 hajar, katba ia ki kynthei ka khusnam ka long T.20 hajar bad ki don ruh ki khusnam na ka bynta ki nongjop ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher.U Bah Kharbuli, u laiathuh ba ha kane ka rynsan iakhun la plie lad ruh ia ki rang bad ki thei iakhu kti kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhot met.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Bah Kharbuli, ki nongiashim bynta nabar ka jylla ki kynthup na ka jylla Uttar Pradesh, nongbah Delhi, nongbah Mumbai, Jylla Kerela bad Haryana.
title: YN WAN SAKHI KI KHLUR BOLLYWOOD ÏA KA SHILLONG ARMS FIGHT

content: Ka khuid ka suba ka dei ka spah bah jong ka koit ka khiah, kumta u Khasi naduh ki por u mynbarim u la hikai ban leh khuid bad leh suba la ka long ha iing ha sem ne ha shnong ha thaw, hynrei ka Sorkar India ka dang kyndit bynriew mynta dang tang khyndiat por ban wanrah ia ka swatch Bharat.Ia kane la ong da u President ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Nongthymmai Pyllun Bah Bantylli Nari haba kren ha ka jingialang kaba u Chief Executive Member ka KHADC Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la aiti ia ka kali kit ñiut sha ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah kaba la pynlong ruh ia ka jingpynkhuid shnong ha ka Lah Sngi u Blei.U Bah Pyniaid u la pynioh ia ka Kali kit niut lyngba ka Chief Minister Development Fund (CMDF).Nalor u Bah Pyniaid la sakhi lang ruh da u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem u Paiem Ainam Manik Syiem, ki nongialam ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Nongthymmai Pyllun, ki paidbah ka shnong lem bad ki nong shong dukan.U Pa’iem Ainam uba la long kum u Symbud Kongsan u la noh synñiang T. 25 hajar sha ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah kum ka jingkyrshan ia ki jingpynlut pynsep ha kane ka jingpynkhuid shnong.Ha kane ka sngi na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Shnong ka la leh burom kyrpang ia ki ASHA, ki Aganwadi bad ia ki Helper kiba la trei shitom bad kiba long ruh ki paia bad ki rishot jong ka Dorbar Shnong kiba ju leit rung manla ka thliew iing haba ki donkam ban iarap ia ki longkmie kiba armet bad ia ki khunlung.Haba kren kum u kongsan, u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la pynpaw ba ka KHADC naduh ba la wanrah ïa ka Solid Waste Management Act 2020 ka District Council ka la lah ban ïarap da ki kali kit ñuit sha kiba bun ki Dorbar Shnong kiba hap hapoh ka jylli treikam jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council, kata ha East Khasi Hills, Ribhoi, West, South West bad Eastern West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, u MDC jong ka Mawkhar-Pynthorumkhrah Constituency Bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem u la aiti da ka trok kit ñiut sha ka Dorbar Shnong Golflink Pynthorumkhrah kaba u la pynioh lyngba ka 15th Finance Commission Tide Grand 2022-23, kaba dei ruh ka sngi ba ka Dorbar Shnong Golflink Pynthorumkhrah ka la pynlong ia ka jingpynkhuid shnong.Ha ka jingaiti ia kane ka trok kit niut la sakhi lang da u Rangbah Shnong u Bah Micheal Hek, ki nongialam shnong, ki seng samla bad kumjuh ruh ki seng longkmie.
title: U KHASI NADUH HYNDAI U LA TIP ÏA KA JINGKHUID, KA SORKAR DANG MYNTA LYNGBA KA SWACHH BHARAT

content: U Bah Shemstar Rynjah uba shong basah ha ka shnong Lawsohtun, ha ka sngi Baar u la pynbna paidbah ba un iakhun kum u kyrtong shimet ia ka elekshon MDC jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council na Laban-Mawprem Constituency.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Shemstar u la iathuh ba ka jingshim rai jong u ban iakhun ia ka elekshon MDC ka dei lyngba ka jingkyntu kynpham jong ki paralok kiba ju iohi ba u dei uwei na ki rangbah uba ju ialam lynti ia kiba bun ki khynnah bad ki samla ha ki kam ialehkai sports ha ka jylla.“Kum u nongkitkam shnong nga la long u Sports Secretary bad u Rangbah Dong, nga tip lut ia baroh ki longing kiba don ha Laban kino kiba duk bad kino kiba kham duna ka ioh ka kot,” u la ong.U la ong ruh ba lada u ioh ia ka jingjop, u don ka thong ban wanrah ia ki jingkylla ha Laban-Mawprem Constituency bad ban kren ia ka ishu halor ka khyndew ka shyiap bad ka ishu khappud kaba ki paidbah ki la mad jingeh haduh katta katta.
title: YN AIRENG U BAH SHEMSTAR RYNJAH HA KA ELEKSHON MDC NA LABAN

content: Ka Mawphlang PHE Workers’ Union (MPWU), kaba long ka shatri jong ki nongtrei casual bad work charge staff kiba trei hapoh ka tnat PHE jong ka Mawphlang Division ha ka sngi Baar ki la kyrpad ia ka Sorkar ba kan pyllait noh ia ka tulop kaba sahteng naduh u bnai Risaw, Naiwieng bad kumjuh ruh na ka bynta u bnai Nohphrah mynta u snem 2023.U President jong ka Union u Bah Napoleon Mawphniang ha ka jingiakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la iathuh ba ka Union ka ladep phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri jong ka tnat PHE u Marcuise N. Marak bad sha ki bor bahalor jong kane ka tnat ba kin wad ia ki lad ki lynti na ka bynta ban siew noh ia ka tulop jong ki nongtrei Casual kiba la shakri la 10 snem, 20 snem bad 30 snem kynthih.“Ha ka 22 tarik, Naiwieng, ngi la phah ia ka shithi sha ki Executive Engineer jong ki ar tylli ki Division jong ka Mawphlang Division bad ha ka 24 tarik Naiwieng, ngi la phah shithi ruh sha u Myntri ka tnat PHE, sha u Deputy Secretary ka tnat PHE bad sha u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnat PHE bad sha u Deputy Commissioner Labour jong ka District Labour Officer ka East Khasi Hills,” u la ong.Hadien kane ka jingphah jingthoh, u la iathuh, ba ka tnat PHE ka la pyllait ia ka tulop kaba tang shi bnai sha ki nongtrei Casual, kata, na ka bynta u bnai Nailur.“Ngi kyrpad ia ki bor bahalor ba kin pyllait noh ia ka tulop jong u bnai Risaw, Naiwieng bad kumjuh ruh ia ka tulop jong u bnai Nohprah.  Ngim banse ban mih shakhmat namarba ki nongtrei Casual ki dei kiba shu trei mynsngi bad bam da miet namarba ka jingioh jong ki ka long kaba rit bad ka jinglut pat kaba heh,” la ong u Bah Mawphniang.Ka Union ka la kyrpad ruh ia ka tnat PHE ba kan pyllait noh ia ka pisa na ka Variable Dearness Allowance (VDA) na ka bynta ki nongtrei Casual ka tnat PHE.U la iathuh ruh ba kane ka jingeh jong ki nongtrei Casual bad Work Charge kam long satia tang ha ka tnat PHE Mawphlang Division hynrei ha ka tnat PHE ha ka jylla hi baroh kawei.Tang ha Mawphlang Division ki nongtrei Casual bad Work Charge ki don kumba shih ajar ngut, la pyntip u Bah Mawphniang.Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Bah Mawphniang, ki bor bahalor jong ka tnat PHE ki la kular ban pyllait ia ka pisa shwa ka Khristmas hynrei haduh mynta ki nongtrei Casual kim pat ioh satia wat ia ka tulop jong u bnai Risaw bad Naiwieng.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdon jong ki nongtrei Casual, Work Charge Staff, Muster Roll bad kumjuh ruh halor ka rukom siew bainong, ka Union ka la pyntip ba kan sa pan jingtip da ka RTI na ka tnat PHE jong ka Sorkar Jylla.
title: 2 BNAI YM ÏOH TULOP KI NONGTREI CASUAL KA PHE MAWPHLANG DIVISION

content: : Ka Sorkar Jylla ka la rai ban weng noh ïa ka kyntien ‘backward classes’ na ka Meghalaya Public Service Commission Regulations.Ïa kane ka rai ban  pynbeit ïa ka kyndon la mynjur da ka Kynhun Myntri ba la pynïaid da u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi Baar.“Kam don kano kano ka bhah kyrpang ïa kiwei pat ki jaidbynriew ba dang sahdien ha ka jylla jong ngi.  Namarkata, ka kyntien kaba don ha ka (MPSC) Rules kam kit jingmut eiei.  Namarkata, la shim ïa ka rai mynta ka snig ba kam don kano kano ka bhah kyrpang ïa ki jaidbynriew ba dang sahdien bad kam donkam satia ban don ïa ka kyntien “backward classes” bad namarkata, ngi la weng noh ïa kane ka kyntien “backward classes” naduh mynta ka sngi,” la ong u Sangma ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Ka Kynhun Myntri ka la mynjur ban wanrah ïa ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ka Service Rules jong ka Meghalaya Civil Defense and Home Guards. U Sangma u la ong ba ki don kumba 300-400 tylli ki post kiba thylli.“Khnang ban dup lah ban pyndap ïa ki post kiba thylli kumba ngi la leh ha kiwei pat ki tnat treikam kum ka Tnat Pule Puthi, ka Koit ka Khiah bad kumjuh ruh ha ka tnat Pulit. Ha ka Home Guards and Civil Defense ruh, ka tant ka la kyrpad ban wanrah ïa ka jingpynbeit thymmai ïa ka kyrdan pule ka ban ïaryngkat bad ka tnat Pulit bad ka jingdonkam ha ka tnat Home Guards and Civil Defense ka shu heh khyndiat haba nujor bad ka tnat Pulit bad namarkata ki la kyrpad bad kyntu ba dei ban pynlong kumjuh bad ka tnat Pulit bad ka Kynhun Myntri ka la ai ïa ka jingmynjur khnang ba kin dup lah ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka jingpynrungkam,” u la ong.
title: WENG NOH KA SORKAR JYLLA ÏA KA KYNTIEN “BACKWARD CLASSES” NA KA KYNDON MPSC

content: Ka Meghalaya Retired Deficit School Teachers Association (MRDSTA) kaba long ka kynhun jong ki nonghikai skul Deficit ba la shongthait, ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ ki la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba kam dei satia ban shu leh kyrkieh halor ka jingshim rai ban pynrung bujli da ki kot jong ka NCERT ha ki skul pule ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u President jong ka Association u Bah ED Nongsiang u la ong, “ha kaba ïadei bad (ka jingshim rai ban pynrung da ki kot pule NCERT) nga sngew ba ka kham biang, ym dei ban pynkyrkieh. Shu buh ki (Sorkar) pynmih (hukum) mynta mynta, bad kin sa ong shim noh (ban pyndonkam) ïa ki kot kam long.”“Ki kham biang ki kot NCERT ban ïa ki (kot) jong ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE), hynrei ka rukom pyntreikam pat ïa kane, ka long kyrkieh. Mynta ki ong (shim rai) la shem snem la pynmih. Ka bym lah ban long, kumno kin lah ban pynbeit bha ïa ki kot,” u la ong.“Mynshwa ka MBoSE ka da khot lang ïa lang ïa ki nonghikai ban ïasyllok ha kaba ïadei bad ki kot ba la pynmih da ka Board bad ngi la ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka Board ban peit la ki biang ne kim biang ban shim ïa ki kot ha ki skul. Mynta ruh ka dei ban long kumjuh. Lada ïa ka NCERT la shu pynmih kynsan kynsan, khlem ïasyllok ïano ïano, khlem da ai por ïa ki khynnah  skul, ïa ki kmie ki kpa ban hap thied thymmai (ïa ki kot) namarba ki hap bret ïa kot kiba rim bad ki hap ban thied da ki kot  kiba thymmai. Ki don ki longing longsem kiba don ïa ki hymmen ki para kiba pule, ki la duh noh ban shim ïa ki kot kiba rim bad ki la hap ban thied thymmai. Kam long ban shu leh kyrkieh, hynrei ka biang eh lada ki leit ïa ka NCERT,”la ong President ka MRDSTA.Haba bynrap, u Vice President ka MRDSTA, Babu Ronjit Marbaniang, u la ong, “ka Sorkar ka dei ban da iit ïa ki nonghikai ne ïa ki riew shemphang kiba lah ban wanrah na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong ka jylla haba ki pynmih thymmai ïa ki kot pule.U la ïathuh ba ka don ka jingïalang kaba la ïakynduh ha kaba ki nonghikai ki la ong, ba ka tnat Pule Puthi kam dei ban leit na bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki nongpynmih kot, hynrei dei ban leit na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki khynnah skul.“Nga kynmaw, (ngan ym jer kyrteng) iwei na ki ophisar, i mih syndon na ka jingïalang. Ngi hap ban kynthoh namarba ngi tip. Ka jingwan ki kynrum kynram ha ka pule ka puthi, ka long ba ka Sorkar kam shim naduh mynshwa bad kine ki jingeh ki lang bad ki wan lut mynta,”u la ong.“Ka pule ka puthi kam dei ban long tang ka pule puthi kaba malu mala hynrei ka dei ban long ka pule puthi kaba don ïa ka dor ha kum kane ka juk ba mynta. Haba ong, ka pule puthi kaba don ïa ka dor, phi la sngewthuh ka mut mano ban rung bad long ki nonghikai,” la ai nuksa u Babu Ron.
title: KI KHAM BIANG KI KOT NCERT, TANGBA KA SORKAR KAM DEI BAN LEH KYRKIEH: MRDSTA

content: Kum ka jingpynkhreh ban kynmaw burom ïa ka jingwan longbriew jong u khunlung Jisu sha kane ka sla pyrthei, ka MCrown Hotel kaba long ka ing basa kaba don ha Khyndai Lad, Shillong, kumba ju leh manla u snem, ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ka la khot sngewbha ïa ki khunswet ba la ri bad sumar da ka Reach Shillong Ministry ban bamja sngi ha 3 Olives Restaurant kaba don hapoh kane ka Hotel.Hadien ba ki khynnah ki ladep bam, ki nongpynïaid jong kane ka Hotel, ki la ïalam kai ïa kine ki khynnah sha ka jaka pynbyrngia niah kali ïa kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Playdom by 3 Phoenix kaba don hapoh ka mala jong ka Hotel MCrown ïa kaba la khap ribbon hi da kine ki khynnah. Kine ki khynnah, ki la ïoh lad ruh ban pynbyrngia ïalade da kaba niah ïa ki kali kiba la tip kum ki Bumper Cars.Ha kane kajuh ka sngi, ka Showroom JN Suzuki ka la rakhe ïa ka Christmas da kaba pynlong ïa ka jingïaid Christmas Carol kaba la sdang na Showroom kaba kaba don ha ka shnong Mawblei bad ïaid lyngba ka shnong Laitumkhrah, Khyndai Lad, Polo, Mawlai bad pynkut biang haduh ha Mawblei.Ha kane ka jingïaid Carol, da ki thuk thuk ar shaka, la ïashim bynta lang da ki nongtrei jong ka Showroom JN Suzuki bad kumjuh ruh ki Customer lem bad u RJ Zack na ka Red FM.
title: KHOT BAMJA KA MCROWN HOTEL ÏA KI KHUNSWET HA KA ADVANCE CHRISTMAS

content: Ka Rotary Club Shillong Heritage (RCSH) ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka Synjuk ki Seng Samla Shnong (SSSS) Shillong City ki la pynkup burom da ka khusnam Sharak Rit kum shi bynta ban ai mynsiem ïa ki samla kiba don ha la ki jong ki jong ki sap pule ne treikam bad khamtam kito kiba ieng ha la ki jong ki kjat ban sengkam bad ban ai jingïarap ïa kito ki samla kiba donkam shisha ka jingïarap bad ïa ki Seng Samla Shnong kiba trei bad shakri kham bha hapoh shnong hapoh thaw.Ki nongïoh khusnam ha kane ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Pinewood Hotel, Shillong ki long ka samla Ibadalin Kharbuli, samla Alisdora Kharkongor, samla Bandarika Kharkongor, Welkin Stone Shadap, Glorify Kurbah, Ferddy Banteilang Jyrwa, Kynsai Kharmawphlang, Daphilahun Wahlang, George GH Suting, Bony Brodson P Warjri, Wallam Jingsuk Khongshun, Kampherika Thangkhiew, Robinson Jyrwa, Christopher Wahlang, Ryan Nongkhlaw, Aiborlang Kharthangaw, Mordekai S Kharpuri, Jonathan Ïawphniaw, Donbok shabong, Gabriel Jeffernel Jyrwa Marwein, Seng Samla Lum Shyiap Pyllun, Seng Samla Mawlai Pyllun, bad ka Spring of Hope Children’s Home.La pynïaid bad pdiang burom ïa baroh da u President jong ka Rotary Club Shillong Heritage u Vishal Amarnani bad u General Secretary u Jasbir Singh, katba na ka liang ka Synjuk ki Seng Samla Shnong la lamkhmat da u Chairman u Bah Bah Pynshaiboklang Diengdoh bad u General Secretary Bah Vivan Kharkongngor.Ka jingai khusnam, ka long da ka Pisa bad ki syrnot.U President jong ka Rotary Club Shillong Heritage u la ai khublei kitbok kitrwiang sha baroh kiba ïoh khusnam bad ka long ruh kum shibynta ba ai mynsiem ïa kiwei pat ki para samla ba kin dang ïai trei minot ha la ki jong ki jong ki sap bapher bapher.U Chairman ka SSSS Shillong City u la ong ba kim dei ban tieng, ban randien ne duh jingkymen ha ka jingïaid lynti ka jong ki.“Kin don bun ki diengpynkiang, hynrei long kiba skhem ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat bad kynmaw barabor ban buh beit ha ki jingduwai shwa ban sdang ne ïaid ha ka lynti ka jong ki,” la ong u Bah Diengdoh.
title: DA KA KHUSNAM SHARAK RIT, PYNKUP BUROM KA ROTARY BAD SSSS ÏA KI SAMLA DONSAP

content: : Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan pyndap noh ïa ki 8 tylli ki post kiba shu sah thylli ha ka tnat Agriculture bad bad Horticuture ha Ribhoi District naduh u snem 2010.Ha ka dorkhas ba la phah sha ka Myntri ka Rep ka Riang ka Sorkar Jylla ka Dr. M. Ampareen Lyngdoh lyngba u General Secretary Dr. Ricky A.J Syngkon, ka VPP ka la ong, “ka tnat, namarkata ka donkam bha ïa ka jingphaikhmat ym tang ha kaba pynsdang ïa ki skhim bapher bapher hynrei kaba kham kongsan eh ka long ban pyntreikam ïa ki. Ka jingpyntreikam pura ïa ki skhim bad ka jingpynsdang ka shong eh ha ki Field Officer. Hynrei, halor kane ka mat, ka long kaba pyndiaw mynsiem ban tip ba ki don bun tylli ki post kiba shu sah thylli mynta da ki snem khamtam ha Ri Bhoi District.”Ka VPP ka la pyntip ba ki post kiba sah thylli ki long ha ka ophis Horticulture Development Officer, Nongpoh naduh u snem 2013, ha ophis Horticulture Development Officer (HDO) Umling Block kaba thylli naduh u snem 2017 3, ha ophis Horticulture Development Officer (HDO) Umsning Block kaba thylli naduh u snem 2020, ha ophis Agriculture Development Officer (ADO) Marketing Nongpoh kaba sah thylli naduh u snem 2019, ha ophis Agricuhure Development Officer (ADO) Bhoirymbong Circle kaba sah thylli naduh u snem 2010, ha ophis Agriculture Development Officer (ADO) Patharkhmah Circle kaba thylli naduh u snem 2016, ha ophis Agriculture Development Officer (ADO) Umling Block kaba thylli naduh u snem 2020 bad ha ophis Agriculture Development Officer (ADO), Nongpoh kaba thylli naduh u snem 2020.“Namarkata, ngi kyntu ïa phi ban shimkhia mardor halor kane ka mat bad ngi kyntu ruh ïa phi ba phin thawlad ban pyndap noh ïa ki post kiba sah thylli kham kloi khnang ban pynthikna ba kin tyllun bad kin treikam pura na ki ophis ba dei peit,” la ong ka VPP ha ka dorkhas.Ka VPP ka la kyntu ruh ïa ka Sorkar ba kan pynkha shuh shuh ïa ki post ha kane ka tnat, khamtam ha Ri Bhoi District bad ha kiwei kiwei ki Distrik.
title: DAWA KA VPP BAN PYNDAP ÏA KI POST BA THYLLI HA AGRICULTURE BAD HORTICULTURE

content: Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ha ka sngi Thohdieng jong ka taïew baladep ka la dawa ïa ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan shimkhia bad ban peitngor ïa ka jingshim kabu jong ki nongkhaïi doh nabar ka jylla kiba kwah ban pynïap ïew ïa ki nongkhaïi doh trai jylla da ka jingïarap hi jong ki runar napoh ka jylla kiba donkti ha kane ka kam.Ha ka dorkhas ba la phah sha u Myntri ka tnat Animal Husbandry &Veterinary Bah Alexander L. Hek ba la soi da u General Secretary ka VPP u Dr. Ricky A.J Syngkon u la ong, “ha kane ka aiom mynta ka jur bha ka ka jingdawa ïa ka doh bad kan long ruh ka aiom kaba pynïoh kamai bha ïa ki nongrep.  Ha kum kane ka aiom, ki nongkhaïi doh nabar ka jylla ki shim kabu ban bsut hapoh ïew ban pynïaid ïew ïa ka doh kaba wanrah nabar ka jylla bad khynñiat sharud ïa ki nongdie doh trai jylla.
